Nyika yakaŋga isina-kugadzirwa, isinecinhu; rima rakaŋga riri’po pamsoro
Mŋari akati: Ciedza ŋgaciʋe’po, ciedza cikaʋa’po.
Mŋari akaʋona ciedza, kuti cakanaka; Mŋari akaparadzanisa ciedza nerima.
Mŋari akatumidza ciedza, akati Masikati, nerima akaritumidza, akati Ʋusiku. Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa rimŋe.
Mŋari akati: Nɀimbo ŋgaiʋe’po pakati pemvura, kuti iparadzanise mvura nemvura.
Mŋari akaita nɀimbo; akaparadzanisa mvura yakaŋga iri pasi penɀimbo, nemvura yakaŋga iri pamsoro penɀimbo; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Mŋari akatumidza nɀimbo, akati Ƌeŋga. Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa repiri.
Mŋari akati: Mvura iri pasi peɗeŋga ŋgaiʋuŋgane pamŋe cete, kuti pasi pakawoma paʋonekwe; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Mŋari akatumidza pasi pakawoma, akati Nyika; nemvura yakaʋuŋgana akaitumidza, akati Makuŋgwa; Mŋari akaʋona kuti ɀakanaka.
Mŋari akati: Nyika ŋgaimerese ʋuswa nemiriʋo inoɓereka mbeu, nemiti inoɓereka micero inamarudzi ayo, mbeu dzayo dziri mukati mayo, panyika; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Nyika ikameresa ʋuswa, nemiriʋo inoɓereka mbeu dzinamarudzi adzo, nemiti inoɓereka micero, mbeu dzayo dziri mukati mayo, inamarudzi ayo; Mŋari akaʋona kuti ɀakanaka.
Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa retatu.
Mŋari akati: Ɀiedza ŋgaɀiʋe’po panɀimbo yeɗeŋga, kuti ɀiparadzanise masikati noʋusiku; kuti ɀiʋe ɀiratidzo, nenguʋa, namazuʋa, namakore;
ŋgaɀiʋe ɀiedza panɀimbo yeɗeŋga, kuti ɀivenekere panyika; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Mŋari akaita ɀiedza ɀikuru ɀiʋiri; ciedza cikuru kuti ciɓate ʋushe masikati, neciedza ciɗuku, kuti ciɓate ʋushe ʋusiku, nenyeredzi ʋo.
Mŋari akaɀiisa pasi penɀimbo yeɗeŋga, kuti ɀivenekere panyika,
ɀiɓate ʋushe masikati noʋusiku, nokuparadzanisa ciedza nerima; Mŋari akaʋona kuti ɀakanaka.
Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa recinna.
Mŋari akati: Mvura ŋgaizare neɀipenyu ɀizhinji, neshiri dzibururuke pamsoro penyika munɀimbo yeɗeŋga.
Mŋari akasika mhuka huru dzeguŋgwa, neɀipenyu ɀose ɀinokambaira, iɀo mvura yakaŋga izere naɀo, ɀinamarudzi aɀo, neshiri dzose dzinamapapiro, dzinamarudzi adzo; Mŋari akaʋona kuti ɀakanaka.
Mŋari akaɀiropafadza, akati: Ƃerekai, muwande, muzadze mvura iri mumakuŋgwa; neshiri ŋgadziwande panyika.
Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa reshanu.
Mŋari akati: Nyika ŋgaiɓereke ɀipenyu ɀinamarudzi aɀo, neɀipfuwo, neɀinokambaira, nemhuka dzenyika, ɀinamarudzi aɀo; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Mŋari akaita mhuka dzenyika dzinamarudzi adzo, neɀipfuwo ɀinamarudzi aɀo, neɀinhu ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika ɀinamarudzi aɀo; Mŋari akaʋona kuti ɀakanaka.

Mŋari akati: Ŋgatiite munhu nomufananidzo weɗu, akafanana nesu; ŋgaaʋe nesimba pamsoro pehoʋe dzeguŋgwa, napamsoro peshiri dzeɗeŋga, napamsoro peɀipfuwo, napamsoro penyika yose, napamsoro peɀipenyu ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika.
Mŋari akasika munhu nomufananidzo wake, akamusika nomufananidzo waMŋari; akaʋasika murume nomukadzi.

Mŋari akaʋaropafadza, Mŋari akati kwaʋari: Ƃerekai, muwande, muzadze nyika, muɓate ʋushe pairi; muʋe nesimba pamsoro pehoʋe dzeguŋgwa, napamsoro peshiri dzeɗeŋga, napamsoro peɀipenyu ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika.
Mŋari akati: Tarirai, ndakakupai miriʋo yose inoɓereka mbeu, iri panyika yose, nemiti yose inemicero yemiti inoɓereka mbeu, kuti ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀenyu.
Mhuka dzose dzenyika, neshiri dzose dzeɗeŋga, neɀipenyu ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika, ɀinomŋeya woʋupenyu, ndakaɀipa miriʋo yose minyoro, kuti ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀaɀo; ɀikaita saiɀoɀo.
Mŋari akaʋona ɀose ɀaakaita, ʋonei ɀakanaka kwaɀo. Maɗeko akaʋa’po, namaŋgwanani akaʋa’po, zuʋa retanhatu.
Ƌeŋga nenyika ɀikapera saiɀoɀo, noʋuzhinji bgaɀo.
Mŋari akapedza ɓasa rake raakaita nomusi wecinomŋe; akazorora nomusi wecinomŋe paɓasa rake rose raakaita.
Mŋari akaropafadza musi wecinomŋe, akauita mutȿene; nokuti wakazorora nawo paɓasa rake rose, raakaŋga asika nokuita iye Mŋari.
Ndiko kuʋamba kweɗeŋga nenyika, musi waɀakasikwa: Nezuʋa irero Jehova Mŋari raakasika naro nyika neɗeŋga,
makwenzi esaŋgo akaŋga acigere kuʋa’po panyika, nemiriʋo yesaŋgo yakaŋga icigere kumera; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wakaŋga asati anisa mvura panyika, ʋuye kwakaŋga kusinomunhu kuzorima pasi;
asi mhute yaisikwira icibva panyika icinyoroʋesa nyika yose.
Jehova Mŋari akaʋumba munhu neguruʋa revu, akafuridzira mŋeya woʋupenyu mumhino dzake; munhu akaʋa mŋeya mupenyu.
Jehova Mŋari akasima munda muEdeni, kumabvazuʋa, akaisa’po munhu waakaŋga aʋumba.
Jehova Mŋari akameresa pasi miti yose inofadza meso, neyakanaka kudya; ʋuye muti woʋupenyu pakati pomunda, nomuti wokuziʋa ɀakanaka neɀakaipa.
MuEdeni mukaɓuɗa rwizi kuzoɗiridza munda uyo, rukaparadzana ipapo, dzikaita hoʋa inna.
Zita rorwokutaŋga ndiPishoni; ndirwo runopoteredza nyika yose yeHavira, panendarama ipapo;
ndarama yenyika iyeyo yakanaka; ʋuye ʋo panederiumu nebge reoniksi.
Zita rorwizi rwecipiri ndiGihoni; ndirwo runopoteredza nyika yose yeKushi.
Zita rorwizi rwecitatu ndiHidekeri; ndirwo runoyerera kumabvazuʋa kweAsiria. Rwizi rwecinna ndiYufratesi.
Jehova Mŋari akatora munhu, akamuisa mumunda weEdeni, kuti aurime nokuuceŋgeta.
Jehova Mŋari akaraira munhu, aciti: Uŋgadya hako miti yose yomunda;
asi muti wokuziʋa ɀakanaka neɀakaipa usaudya; nokuti nomusi waunoudya, ucafa ɀirokwaɀo.
Jehova Mŋari akati ɀe. Haɀina‐kunaka kuti munhu agare ari woga; ndicamuitira muɓatsiri wakamukwanira.
Jehova Mŋari akaʋumba nevu mhuka dzose dzesaŋgo, neshiri dzose dzeɗeŋga, akadziisa kumunhu kuti aʋone kuti ucadzitumidza mazita api; ɀipenyu ɀose seɀaɀakatumidzwa nomunhu, ndiwo akaʋa mazita aɀo.
Munhu akatumidza ɀipfuwo ɀose mazita, neshiri dzeɗeŋga, nemhuka dzose dzesaŋgo; asi kwakashaikwa muɓatsiri wakamukwanira iye munhu.
Ipapo Jehova Mŋari wakaʋatisa munhu hope huru, akaʋata; akatora rumbabvu rwake rumŋe, akadziʋira nyama panɀimbo yarwo.
Norumbabvu urwo Jehova Mŋari rwaakatora pamunhu, akaita mukadzi narwo, akamuisa kumunhu.
Munhu akati: Ɀino uyu ifupa ramafupa aŋgu, nenyama yenyama yaŋgu; ucatumidzwa Mukadzi, nokuti wakabviswa paMurume.
Naiɀoɀo munhu unofanira kusiya ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, anamatire mukadzi wake, ʋaʋe nyama imŋe.
Ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kusimira, munhu nomukadzi wake, asi haʋana‐kunyara.
Ɀino nyoka yakaŋga inamano kupfuʋura mhuka dzose dzesaŋgo dzakaŋga dzaitwa naJehova Mŋari. Ikati kumukadzi: Nhai, ndiɀo here kuti Mŋari wakati: Regai kudya miti yose yomunda?
Mukadzi akati kunyoka; Tiŋgadya heɗu micero yemiti pamunda,
asi kana iri micero yomuti uri pakati pomunda, Mŋari wakati: Regai kuudya, kana kuuɓata, kuti murege kufa.
Nyoka ikati kumukadzi: Hamuŋgafi ɀirokwaɀo;
nokuti Mŋari unoziʋa kuti nomusi wamunoɀidya nawo, meso enyu acaȿinudzwa, mukaʋa saMŋari, muciziʋa ɀakanaka neɀakaipa.
Ɀino mukadzi wakati aciʋona kuti muti wakanaka kudyiwa, ʋuye kuti unofadza meso, ʋuye kuti muti unoɗikanwa kuŋgwadza munhu, akatora micero yawo, akadya, akapa ʋo murume wake, akadya naiye ʋo.
Ipapo meso aʋo, iʋo ʋaʋiri, akaȿinudzwa, ʋakaziʋa kuti haʋana‐kusimira; ʋakasonanidza mashizha omuʋonde, ʋakaɀiitira ŋguʋo.
Ʋakanzwa inzwi raJehova Mŋari acifamba mumunda kwotonhorera maɗekwana; munhu nomukadzi wake ndokundoʋanda pamberi paJehova Mŋari pakati pemiti yomunda.
Jehova Mŋari akaɗana munhu, akati kwaari: Uripiko?
Iye akati: Ndakanzwa inzwi renyu mumunda, ndikatya, nokuti ndakaŋga ndisina‐kusimira; ndikaʋanda.
Iye akati: Ndianiko wakakuʋudza kuti hauna‐kusimira — Wadya kanhi muti wandakakuraira kuti urege kuudya?
Munhu akati: Mukadzi wamakandipa kuti aʋe neni, ndiye wakandipa ɀomuti ndikadya.
Jehova Mŋari akati kumukadzi: Cinyiko ico cawaita? Mukadzi akati: Nyoka yakandinyeŋgera, ndikadya.
Jehova Mŋari akati kunyoka: Ɀawaita iɀoɀo, watukwa kupfuʋura ɀipfuwo ɀose, nokupfuʋura mhuka dzose dzesaŋgo; ucafamba neɗumbu rako, ucadya guruʋa mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgako.
Ndicaisa ruʋeŋgo pakati pako nomukadzi, napakati porudzi rwako norudzi rwake; irwo rucapxanya musoro wako, newe ucapxanya citsitsinho carwo.
Kumukadzi akati: Ndicawanza ɀikuru kurwadziwa kwako nokutora mimba kwako; ucaɓereka ʋana ucirwadziwa; kuɗa kwako kucaʋa kumurume wako, iye ucaʋa ishe wako.
Kumunhu akati: Ɀawakaterera inzwi romukadzi wako, ukadya muti wandakakuraira ndiciti: Usaudya, ɀino nyika yatukwa nemhoȿa yako; ucadya ɀiɓereko ɀayo nokutambudzika mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgako;
icakuɓerekera minzwa noʋutumbambeʋa; iwe ucadya miriʋo yomusaŋgo;
ucadya ɀokudya ɀako neziya reciso cako kuȿikira ucidzokera kuvu; nokuti wakatorwa kwariri. Ɀauri guruʋa, ucadzokera ɀe kuguruʋa.
Munhu akatumidza mukadzi wake zita rinonzi Eva; nokuti ndiye mai ʋaʋapenyu ʋose.
Jehova Mŋari akaitira munhu nomukadzi wake ŋguʋo dzamatebge, akaʋafukidza idzo.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari akati: Tarirai, munhu waʋa somumŋe weɗu ɀaanoziʋa ɀakanaka neɀakaipa; ɀino ɀimŋe uŋgatambanudza ruʋoko rwake akatora ʋo ɀomuti woʋupenyu, akadya, akararama nokusiŋgaperi.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova Mŋari akamuɓuɗisa mumunda weEdeni, kuti arime ivu raakatorwa kwariri.
Naiɀoɀo akadziŋga munhu, akaisa makerubi kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rwomunda weEdeni, nomuraɀo womunondo waimonereka kumatiʋi ose, kurindira nzira yomuti woʋupenyu.
Ɀino Adama wakaziʋa mukadzi wake Eva; iye ndokutora mimba, akapona Kaini, akati: Ndawana munhu,
Akazopona ɀe munuŋuna wake Aberi. Aberi wakaŋga ari mufudzi wamakwai, Kaini wakaŋga ari murimi wevu.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yapfuʋura, Kaini akaʋuya neɀiɓereko ɀevu, ciʋe cipo kunaJehova.
NaAberi ʋo akaʋuya namakwaiana ake emhoŋgora namafuta awo. Jehova ndokugamucira Aberi necipiriso cake;
asi Kaini necipiriso cake haana‐kucigamucira. Ipapo Kaini akatsamŋa kwaɀo, ciso cake cikawunyana.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaKaini: Watsamŋireiko? Ciso cako cakawunyana nei?
Kana ukaita ɀakanaka, hauŋgafari here paciso cako? Kana usiŋgaiti ɀakanaka, ɀiʋi ɀinokuʋandira pamukoʋa; ɀicakutȿaka, asi iwe unofanira kuɀikunda.
Ɀino Kaini wakataurirana nomunuŋuna wake Aberi; ʋakati ʋari kusaŋgo, Kaini ndokumukira Aberi munuŋuna wake, akamuʋuraya.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaKaini. Uripiko Aberi, munuŋuna wako? Iye akati: Handiziʋi; ndini mufudzi womunuŋuna waŋgu kanhi?
Akati: Waiteiko? Inzwi reropa romunuŋuna wako rinoɗanidzira kwandiri panyika.
Ɀino watukwa, wadziŋgwa panyika, iyo yakashamisa muromo wayo kugamucira ropa romunuŋuna wako paruʋoko rwako;
kana ucirima ivu, hariŋgakupi simba raro; ucaʋa mutizi nomudzuŋgairi panyika.
Ipapo Kaini akati kunaJehova: Kurobga kwaŋgu kukuru, handiŋgakutakuri.
Tarirai, mandidziŋga nhasi panyika ino; ndicaʋanda pamberi penyu; ndicaʋa mutizi nomudzuŋgairi panyika; aninani unondiwana ucandiʋuraya.
Jehova akati kwaari: Naiɀoɀo aninani unoʋuraya Kaini ucatsibga kanomŋe. Jehova ndokuisira Kaini ciratidzo, kuti munhu unozomuwana arege kumuʋuraya.
Ipapo Kaini wakabva pamberi paJehova, akandogara panyika yeNodi, kumabvazuʋa kweEdeni.
Kaini akaziʋa mukadzi wake, akatora mimba, akapona Enoki; akaʋaka guta, akatumidza guta zita romŋanakomana wake Enoki.
Enoki akaɓerekerwa Iradi; Iradi akaɓereka Mehujaeri; Mehujaeri akaɓereka Metushaeri; Metushaeri akaɓereka Rameki;
Rameki akawana ʋakadzi ʋaʋiri, zita romumŋe rainzi Ada, zita romumŋe rainzi Zira.
Ada akapona Jabari; iye waiʋa ɓaɓa ʋaʋanhu ʋanogara mumatente ʋaneɀipfuwo.
Zita romunuŋuna wake raiʋa Jubari; iye waiʋa ɓaɓa ʋaʋose ʋanoridza mbira nenyere.
Zira wakapona Tubarikaini, mupfuri wenhumbi dzose dzendarira neɗare; hanɀadzi yaTubarikaini waiʋa Naama.
Rameki akati kuʋakadzi ʋake:
Ada naZira, inzwai inzwi raŋgu;
Imi ʋakadzi ʋaRameki, tererai ɀandinotaura;
Nokuti ndinoʋuraya munhu unondikuʋadza,
Nejaya rinondipxanya;
Kana Kaini acatsibga kanomŋe,
Ɀirokwaɀo Rameki kanamakumi manomŋe nenomŋe.
Adama akaziʋa ɀe mukadzi wake; akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Seti; nokuti
NaSeti wakaɓerekerwa mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Enoshi. Neŋguʋa iyo ʋanhu ʋakataŋga kuɗana zita raJehova.
Ndiyeyi buku yamarudzi aAdama. Musi waakasika munhu, Mŋari wakamuita nomufananidzo waMŋari;
wakaʋasika murume nomukadzi; akaʋaropafadza, akaʋatumidza zita rinonzi Munhu, musi waʋakasikwa.
Adama wakagara makore anezana namakumi matatu, akaɓereka
Mazuʋa aAdama shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaSeti akaŋga ari makore anamazana masere; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgaAdama akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi matatu, akafa.
Seti wakagara makore anezana namashanu, akaɓereka Enoshi;
Seti akagara makore anamazana masere namanomŋe shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaEnoshi, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana;
mazuʋa ose aSeti akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe negumi namaʋiri, akafa.
Enoshi wakagara makore makumi mapfumbamŋe, akaɓereka Kenani;
Shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaKenani Enoshi akagara makore anamazana masere negumi namashanu; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana;
mazuʋa ose aEnoshi akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe namashanu, akafa.
Kenani wakagara makore makumi manomŋe, akaɓereka Maharareri;
shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaMaharareri Kenani wakagara makore anamazana masere namakumi manna; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Mazuʋa ose aKenani akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe negumi, akafa.
Maharareri wakagara makore makumi matanhatu namashanu, akaɓereka Jaredi;
shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaJaredi, Maharareri akagara makore anamazana masere namakumi matatu, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana;
mazuʋa ose aMaharareri akaŋga ari makore anamazana masere namakumi mapfumbamŋe namashanu, akafa.
Jaredi wakagara makore anezana namakumi matanhatu namaʋiri, akaɓereka Enoki;
shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaEnoki Jaredi akagara makore anamazana masere; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana;
mazuʋa ose aJaredi akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi matanhatu namaʋiri, akafa.
Enoki wakagara makore makumi matanhatu namashanu, akaɓereka Metusara;
shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaMetusara, Enoki wakafamba naMŋari makore anamazana matatu; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Mazuʋa ose aEnoki akaŋga ari makore anamazana matatu namakumi matanhatu namashanu.
Enoki akafamba naMŋari, akasazoʋa’po, nokuti Mŋari wakamutora.
Metusara wakagara makore anezana namakumi masere namanomŋe, akaɓereka Rameki;
shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaRameki, Metusara akagara makore anamazana manomŋe namakumi masere namaʋiri; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Mazuʋa ose aMetusara akaŋga ari makore anamazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi matanhatu namapfumbamŋe, akafa.
Rameki wakagara makore anezana namakumi masere namaʋiri; akaɓereka mŋanakomana;
akamutumidza zita rinonzi Noa, aciti: Uyu ucatiʋaraidza paɓasa reɗu napakutambudzika kwamaʋoko eɗu, ɀinobva panyika yakatukwa naJehova.
Shure kwokuɓerekwa kwaNoa, Rameki akagara makore anamazana mashanu namakumi mapfumbamŋe namashanu; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Mazuʋa ose aRameki akaŋga ari makore anamazana manomŋe namakumi manomŋe namanomŋe, akafa.
Noa wakaŋga anamakore anamazana mashanu; Noa akaɓereka Shemi, naHami, naJafeti.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋotaŋga kuwanda panyika, ʋaciɓerekerwa ʋanasikana,
ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari ʋakaʋona ʋakunda ʋaʋanhu kuti ʋakanaka, ʋakaɀitsaurira pakati paʋose ʋaʋakaɗa kuʋa ʋakadzi ʋaʋo.
Ipapo Jehova akati: Mŋeya waŋgu hauŋgarambi ucigara mumunhu nokusiŋgaperi, ɀaari wenyama ʋo hake; naiɀoɀo mazuʋa ake acaʋa makore anezana namakumi maʋiri.

Paŋguʋa iyo kwakaŋga kunaʋanhu ʋarefu kwaɀo panyika, napashure ʋo, kana ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari ʋakapinda kuʋanasikana ʋaʋanhu, iʋo ʋakaʋaɓerekera ʋana. Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋanesimba ʋakare, ʋakaŋga ʋakakurumbira.
Ɀino Jehova wakaʋona kuti kuipa kwaʋanhu kwakaŋga kuri kukuru panyika, nendaŋgariro dzokufuŋga kwemŋoyo yaʋo dzakaŋga dzakaipa ɓedzi ŋguʋa dzose.
Jehova akaɀidemba pamsoro pokuita kwake ʋanhu panyika, akaʋa neshuŋgu pamŋoyo pake.
Jehova akati: Ndicaparadza ʋanhu ʋandakasika ndiʋabvise panyika — ʋanhu, nemhuka, neɀinokambaira, neshiri dzeɗeŋga; nokuti ndinoɀiɗemba kuti ndakaɀiita.
Asi Noa wakawana tsitsi pamberi paJehova.
Marudzi aNoa ndiwo: Noa wakaŋga ari munhu wakarurama, asinemhoȿa mumarudzi ake; Noa wakafamba naMŋari.
Noa akaɓereka ʋanakomana ʋatatu,
Nyika yakaŋga yakaʋora pamberi paMŋari, nyika yakaŋga izere nokumanikidzana.
Mŋari akaʋona nyika kuti yakaʋora; nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaʋodza mufambiro waʋo panyika.
Ipapo Mŋari wakati kunaNoa: Kupera kwaʋanhu ʋose kwaȿika pamberi paŋgu; nokuti ʋakazadza nyika nokumanikidzana; tarirai, ndicaʋaʋuraya pamŋe cete nenyika.
Uɀiitire areka nomuti wegoferi; uite makamuri muareka, uinamire necomukati necokunze nenamo.
Unofanira kuiita kuɗai: Kureɓa kweareka ŋgakuʋe makubiti
Usiye ɓuri paareka; uripedze kana kwasara kubiti rimŋe kubva kumsoro; nomukoʋa weareka uuise parutiʋi rwayo; uiite inedzimba nhatu, musara wokutaŋga, nowecipiri, nowecitatu.
Tarira, ini ndinoʋuyisa panyika mvura zhinji, kuti iparadze ɀipenyu ɀose, ɀinomŋeya woʋupenyu, pasi peɗeŋga; ɀose ɀiri panyika ɀicafa.
Asi ndicaita suŋgano yaŋgu newe; unofanira kupinda muareka, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako, nomukadzi wako, naʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋako pamŋe cete newe.
Napaɀipenyu ɀose ɀenyama uise muareka ɀiʋiri‐ɀiʋiri ɀamarudzi ose, kuti ɀirarame pamŋe cete newe; ngaɀiʋe mukono nehadzi.
Shiri namarudzi adzo, neɀipfuwo namarudzi aɀo, neɀinokambaira pasi ɀose namarudzi aɀo, ɀicaʋuya kwauri ɀiʋiri‐ɀiʋiri ɀamarudzi ose, kuti ɀiraramiswe.
Iwe utore marudzi ose eɀokudya ɀose ɀinodyiwa, uɀiʋuŋganidzire kwauri; kuti ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀako neɀaɀo.
Noa akaita saiɀoɀo; seɀaakarairwa naMŋari, wakaita ɀose saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaNoa: Pindai muareka, iwe nemhuri yako yose; nokuti ndakuʋona iwe kuti wakarurama pamberi paŋgu parudzi urwu.
Pamhuka dzose dzakanaka utore nomŋe‐nomŋe, mukono nehadzi yayo; napamhuka dzose dzisakanaka utore mbiri‐mbiri, mukono nehadzi yayo;
napashiri dzeɗeŋga utore nomŋe‐nomŋe, joŋgwe nemhambo, kuti uraramise marudzi ose ari panyika.
Nokuti kwasara mazuʋa manomŋe, ipapo ndicanisa mvura panyika mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku ʋunamakumi manna; ɀipenyu ɀose ɀandakaita ndicaɀiparadza panyika;
Noa akaita ɀose seɀaakarairwa naJehova.
Noa wakaŋga aʋa namakore anamazana matanhatu paŋguʋa yokuʋuya kwemvura zhinji panyika.
Ipapo Noa wakapinda muareka, naʋanakomana ʋake, nomukadzi wake, naʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋake, nokuɗa kwemvura zhinji.
Pamhuka dzakanaka, napamhuka dzisakanaka, neshiri, neɀose ɀinokambaira panyika,
ɀakapinda kunaNoa muareka ɀiʋiri‐ɀiʋiri, mukono nehadzi, Mŋari seɀaakaraira Noa.
Mazuʋa manomŋe akati apfuʋura, mvura zhinji ikaʋa’po panyika.
Pagore ramazana matanhatu roʋupenyu bgaNoa, nomŋedzi wecipiri, nezuʋa regumi namanomŋe romŋedzi, nezuʋa irero matsime ose apakadzika‐dzika akadziʋurwa, namawindi eɗeŋga akazarurwa;
mvura zhinji ikanaya panyika mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku ʋunamakumi manna.
Nomusi iwoyo Noa wakapinda muareka, naShemi, naHami, naJafeti, ʋanakomana ʋaNoa, nomukadzi waNoa, naʋakadzi ʋatatu ʋaʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye;
iʋo, nemhuka dzose namarudzi adzo, neɀipfuwo ɀose namarudzi aɀo, neɀinokambaira ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika namarudzi aɀo, neɀinobururuka ɀose namarudzi aɀo, neshiri dzose dzamarudzi ose.
Ɀakapinda kunaNoa muareka, ɀiʋiri‐ɀiʋiri ɀeɀipenyu ɀose ɀinomŋeya woʋupenyu.
Ɀose, ɀakapinda, ɀakapinda ɀiciita mukono nehadzi, ɀose ɀipenyu, seɀaakarairwa naMŋari, Jehova akamuzaririra mukati.
Mvura zhinji ikaʋa’po panyika mazuʋa anamakumi manna; mvura ikawanda, ikasimudza areka, ikakwiridzirwa pamsoro penyika.
Mvura ikakwirira, ikawanda kwaɀo panyika, areka ikafamba pamsoro pemvura.
Mvura ikakwirira kwaɀo‐kwaɀo panyika, makomo marefu ose pasi peɗeŋga rose akafukidzwa.
Mvura ikakwirira kuȿikira pamakubiti anegumi namashanu pamsoro
Ɀipenyu ɀose ɀaifamba panyika ɀikafa, ɀaiti, shiri, neɀipfuwo, nemhuka, neɀinokambaira, ɀose ɀaikambaira panyika, naʋanhu ʋose;
ɀinhu ɀose, ɀakaŋga ɀinokufema kwomŋeya woʋupenyu mumhino dzaɀo, ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri pakawoma pasi, ɀikafa.
Ɀipenyu ɀose, ɀakaŋga ɀiri pasi pose, ɀikaparadzwa, ɀaiti, ʋanhu, neɀipfuwo, neɀinokambaira, neshiri dzeɗeŋga; ɀikaparadzwa panyika; Noa oga akasara, neɀakaŋga ɀiri muareka naye.
Mvura ikaramba yakakwirira panyika mazuʋa anezana namakumi mashanu.
Ɀino Mŋari wakaraŋgarira Noa neɀipenyu ɀose, neɀipfuwo ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri muareka naye; Mŋari akafambisa mhepo panyika, mvura ikaserera,
namatsime apakadzika namawindi eɗeŋga akazarirwa, nemvura yakabva kuɗeŋga ikadziʋiswa,
mvura ikaramba icidzoka panyika; mazuʋa anezana namakumi mashanu akati apfuʋura, mvura ikaɗerera.
Nomŋedzi wecinomŋe, nezuʋa regumi namanomŋe romŋedzi, areka ikamira pamsoro pamakomo eArarati.
Mvura ikaramba iciɗerera kuȿikira pamŋedzi wegumi; nomŋedzi wegumi, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi misoro yamakomo ikaʋonekwa.
Mazuʋa anamakumi manna akati apfuʋura, Noa akazarura windi reareka raakaŋga aita;
akaɓuɗisa guŋguʋu, iro rikaramba ricibururukabururuka kuȿikira mvura yapxa panyika.
Ipapo akabururusa njiʋa paakaŋga ari, kuti aʋone kana mvura yaserera panyika;
asi njiʋa haina‐kuwana pokuzorodza rutsoka rwayo, ikadzokera kwaari kuareka, nokuti mvura yakaŋga iri pamsoro penyika yose; akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akaitora, akaipinza kwaari muareka.
Ipapo akagara mamŋe mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe, akaɓuɗisa ɀe njiʋa paareka;
njiʋa ikapinda kwaari maɗekwana; ʋonei mumuromo mayo makaŋga munorushizha rwomuorivi rwakatanhwa; naiɀoɀo Noa wakaziʋa kuti mvura yakaŋga yaserera panyika.
Akagara ɀe mazuʋa manomŋe, akaɓuɗisa ɀe njiʋa; iyo haina‐kudzokera ɀe kwaari.
Pagore ramazana matanhatu nerimŋe, pamŋedzi wokutaŋga, nomusi wokutaŋga womŋedzi, mvura yakaŋga yapxa panyika; ipapo Noa akabvisa ɗeŋga reareka, akatarira, ʋonei pasi pose pawoma.
Nomŋedzi wecipiri, nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe romŋedzi, nyika yakaŋga yawoma.
Ɀino Mŋari wakataura naNoa, akati:
Ƃuɗai muareka, iwe, nomukadzi wako, naʋanakomana ʋako, naʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋako, pamŋe cete newe.
Ƃuɗisa ʋo pamŋe cete newe ɀipenyu ɀose ɀenyama ɀinewe, ɀinoti, shiri, neɀipfuwo, neɀinokambaira ɀose, neɀinokambaira panyika, kuti ɀiwande panyika, ɀiɓereke, ɀiʋe ɀizhinji panyika.
Ipapo Noa akaɓuɗa, iye naʋanakomana ʋake, nomukadzi wake, naʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye;
nemhuka dzose, neɀinokambaira ɀose, neshiri dzose, neɀose ɀinofamba panyika, namarudzi aɀo, ɀakaɓuɗa paareka.
Noa akaʋakira Jehova artari, akatora dzimŋe pamhuka dzose dzakanaka neshiri dzose dzakanaka, akapisira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa paartari.

Jehova akanzwa kunhuwira kwakanaka, Jehova akati mumŋoyo make: Handicazotuki ɀe nyika nokuɗa kwomunhu; nokuti kufuŋga kwomŋoyo womunhu kwakaipa kubva paʋuɗuku bgake; handicazoroʋi ɀe ɀipenyu ɀose, seɀandakaita.
Ŋguʋa yose yenyika kudɀara nokuceka, kutonhora nokudziya, zhezha necando, masikati noʋusiku haɀiŋgagumi.
Ɀino Mŋari wakaropafadza Noa naʋanakomana ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Ƃerekai, muwande, muzadze nyika.
Mhuka dzose dzenyika, neshiri dzose dzeɗeŋga, dzicakutyai nokukuvundukai; ɀose ɀinokambaira pasi, nehoʋe dzose dzeguŋgwa, ɀinoiswa pamaʋoko enyu.
Ɀose ɀinofamba ɀipenyu ɀicaʋa ɀokudya ɀenyu; ndinokupai ɀose, seɀandakakupai miriʋo mitema.
Asi nyama, kana inoʋupenyu bgayo, iro ropa rayo, musaidya iyo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ropa renyu, roʋupenyu bgenyu, ndicaritȿaka; ndicaritȿaka paɀipenyu ɀose, ndicatȿaka ʋupenyu bgomunhu paruʋoko rwomunhu naparuʋoko rwehama yomunhu.
Aninani unoteʋura ropa romunhu, ropa rake ricateʋurwa ʋo nomunhu; nokuti Mŋari wakaita munhu nomufananidzo wake.
Asi imi ɓerekai, muwande; ɓerekai ɀikuru panyika, muwande mukati mayo.
Ɀino Mŋari wakataura naNoa naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋanaye, akati:
Tarirai, ini ndinoita suŋgano yaŋgu nemi naʋana ʋenyu ʋanokuteʋerai;
neɀipenyu ɀose ɀinemi, ɀinoti, shiri, neɀipfuwo, nemhuka dzose dzenyika dzinemi; ɀose ɀinoɓuɗa paareka, idzo mhuka dzose dzapanyika.
Ndicaita suŋgano yaŋgu nemi; ɀose ɀenyama haɀiŋgazopedzwi ɀe nemvura zhinji: mvura zhinji haiŋgazoʋi’po ɀe kuti iparadze nyika.
Ipapo Mŋari wakati: Ndico ciratidzo cesuŋgano yandinoita pakati paŋgu nemi neɀipenyu ɀose ɀinemi kuȿikira kumarudzi asiŋgaperi:
Ndinoisa muraraʋuŋgu waŋgu mugore, kuti ciʋe ciratidzo cesuŋgano pakati paŋgu nenyika.
Ɀino ndicati kana ndikaʋuyisa gore pamsoro penyika, muraraʋuŋgu uyu ukaʋonekwa mugore,
ndicaraŋgarira suŋgano yaŋgu iri pakati paŋgu nemi, napakati peɀipenyu ɀose ɀenyama; mvura haicazoʋi zhinji ɀe kuti iparadze ɀose ɀenyama.
Muraraʋuŋgu ucaʋa’po mugore; ndicautarira, kuti ndiraŋgarire suŋgano isiŋgaperi pakati paMŋari neɀipenyu ɀose ɀenyama ɀiri panyika.
Mŋari akati kunaNoa: Ndico ciratidzo cesuŋgano yandakaita pakati paŋgu neɀose ɀenyama ɀiri panyika.
Ʋanakomana ʋaNoa ʋakaɓuɗa muareka ndiʋaʋa: Shemi, naHami, naJafeti; Hami ndiye ɓaɓa ʋaKanani.
Ndiʋaʋa ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaNoa; nyika yose yakazadzwa naʋo.
Noa wakataŋga kuʋa murimi, akarima munda womuzambiriŋga;
akanwa waini, akaɓatwa, akaɀifukura mutente rake.
Ɀino Hami, ɓaɓa ʋaKanani, wakaʋona kusasimira kwaɓaɓa ʋake, akaziʋisa ʋakuru ʋake ʋaʋiri.
Ipapo Shemi naJafeti ʋakatora ŋguʋo, ʋakaiisa pamafudzi aʋo, ʋakaenda manhenda shure, ʋakafukidzira kusasimira kwaɓaɓa ʋaʋo; ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakaŋga ɀakatarira shure, ʋakasaʋona kusasimira kwaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ɀino Noa akapeŋgenuka pawaini yake, akaziʋa ɀaakaitirwa nomŋanakomana wake muɗuku,
akati:
Kanani ŋgaatukwe;
Ucaʋa muranda waʋaranda kuʋakuru ʋake.
Akati:
Jehova Mŋari waShemi ŋgaakudzwe,
Kanani ŋgaaʋe muranda wake.
Mŋari ŋgaakurise Jafeti,
Ŋgaagare mumatente aShemi,
Kanani ŋgaaʋe muranda wake.
Noa wakagara shure kwemvura zhinji makore anamazana matatu namakumi mashanu.
Mazuʋa ose aNoa akaŋga ari mazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi mashanu, akafa.
Ndiwo marudzi aʋanakomana ʋaNoa, naShemi, naHami, naJafeti; iʋo ʋakaɓerekerwa ʋana shure kwemvura zhinji.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJafeti ndiʋo: Gomeri, naMagogi, naMadai, naJavani, naTubari, naMesheki, naTirasi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGomeri ndiʋo: Ashkenazi, naRifati, naTogarma.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJavani ndiʋo: Erisha, naTarshisi, naKitimi, naDodanimi.
Kwaʋari kwakabva ʋanhu ʋeɀiwi ɀakapararira.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHami ndiʋo: Kushi, naMizraimi, naPuti, naKanani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKushi ndiʋo: Seba, naHavira, naSabta, naRaama, naSabteka; naʋanakomana ʋaRaama ndiʋo: Sheba naDedani.
Kushi wakaɓereka Nimirodi, ndiye wakataŋga kuʋa nesimba panyika.
Wakaŋga ari mudzimba mukuru pamberi paJehova; naiɀoɀo ʋanoti: SaNimirodi, mudzimba mukuru pamberi paJehova.
Ʋushe bgake bgakataŋga paBaberi, neEreki, neAkadi, neKarine, panyika yeShinari.
Akaɓuda kunyika iyo, akaenda Asiria, akaʋaka Ninevi, neRohoboti‐Iri, neKara,
neReseni, pakati peNinevi neKara (iri iguta guru).
Mizraimi wakaɓereka ʋaRudi, naʋaAnami, naʋaRehabi, naʋaNaftuhi,
naʋaPatrusi, naʋaKasruhi, (ʋaFiristia ʋakabva kwaʋari), naʋaKaftori.
Kanani wakaɓereka Zidoni, ɗaŋgwe rake, naHeti;
naʋaJebusi, naʋaAmori, naʋaGirgashi;
naʋaHivi, naʋaArki, naʋaSini,
naʋaArvadi, naʋaZemari, naʋaHamati. Shure kwaiʋaʋa mhuri dzaʋaKanani dzakapararira.
Muganho waʋaKanani wakataŋga paZidoni, ukaenda Gerari, ukaȿika Gaza, ukaenda Sodoma, neGomora, neAdama, neZiboimi, ukaȿika paRasha.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaHami, mhuri dzaʋo, nendimi dzaʋo, munyika dzaʋo, nendudzi dzaʋo.
Naiye Shemi, ɓaɓa ʋaʋana ʋose ʋaEberi, mukuru waJafeti, wakaɓerekerwa ʋana.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShemi ndiʋo: Erami, naAsheri, naArpakshadi, naRudi, naArami.
Ʋanakomana ʋaArami ndiʋo: Uzi, naHuri, naGeteri, naMashi.
Arpakshadi wakaɓereka Shera, Shera akaɓereka Eberi.
Eberi akaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri, zita romumŋe rakaŋga riri Peregi, nokuti pamazuʋa ake nyika yakakamurwa; zita romunuŋuna wake rakaŋga riri Joktani.
Joktani wakaɓereka Armodadi, naSherefi, naHazamarveti, naJera;
naHadorami, naUsari, naDikra;
naObari, naAbimaeri, naSheba;
naOfiri, naHavira, naJobabi; aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaJoktani.
Kwaʋakagara ndiko: Kubva paMesha, kuenda Sefari, kugomo rokumabvazuʋa.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaShemi, mhuri dzaʋo, nendimi dzaʋo, munyika dzaʋo, nendudzi dzaʋo.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaNoa, nedzimba dzaʋo, nendudzi dzaʋo; kwaʋari kwakabva ndudzi dzose dzakapararira, shure kwemvura zhinji.
Nyika yose yakaŋga inorurimi rumŋe nokutaura kumŋe.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitamira mabvazuʋa, ʋakawana ɓani munyika yeShinari, ʋakagara’ko.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Ʋuyai, ŋgatiite ɀitina, tiɀipise kwaɀo. Ɀitina ɀakaʋa mabge aʋo, nebitumini rakaʋa ɗope raʋo.
Ʋakati: Ʋuyai, ŋgatiɀiʋakire guta, noruȿiŋgo, runomusoro unoȿikira kuɗeŋga; tiɀimutsire mukurumbira, kuti tirege kupararira panyika yose.
Ipapo Jehova wakaɓuruka kuzotarira guta noruȿiŋgo, rwakaŋga ruciʋakwa naʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.
Jehova akati: Tarirai, ʋanhu aʋa ndiʋamŋe, ʋanorurimi rumŋe ʋose; ɀino ndiɀo ɀaʋanotaŋga kuita; ɀino hakucinecinhu caʋaŋgaɗa kuita caʋaŋgadziʋiswa.
Hendei, tiɓuruke, tindopesanisa rurimi rwaʋo ipapo, kuti ʋarege kunzwana kana ʋotaurirana.
Jehova akaʋaparadzira ipapo, ʋakapararira panyika yose, ʋakarega kuʋaka guta
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaritumidza Baberi, nokuti ipapo Jehova wakapesanisa rurimi rwenyika yose; Jehova akaʋaparadzira ipapo, ʋakaenda kunyika dzose.
Ndiwo marudzi aShemi. Shemi wakaŋga anamakore anezana, akaɓereka Arpakshadi, mvura zhinji yapfuʋura makore maʋiri;
wakati aɓereka Arpakshadi, Shemi akagara makore anamazana mashanu; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Arpakshadi wakagara makore anamakumi matatu namashanu, akaɓereka Shera;
wakati aɓereka Shera, Arpakshadi akagara makore anamazana manna namatatu, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Shera wakagara makore anamakumi matatu, akaɓereka Eberi.
Wakati aɓereka Eberi, Shera akagara makore anamazana manna namatatu; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Eberi wakagara makore anamakumi matatu namanna, akaɓereka Peregi,
wakati aɓereka Peregi, Eberi akagara makore anamazana manna namakumi matatu, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Peregi wakagara makore anamakumi matatu, akaɓereka Rehu;
wakati aɓereka Rehu, Peregi akagara makore anamazana maʋiri namapfumbamŋe, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Rehu wakagara makore anamakumi matatu namaʋiri, akaɓereka Serugi;
wakati aɓereka Serugi, Rehu akagara makore anamazana maʋiri namanomŋe; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Serugi wakagara makore anamakumi matatu, akaɓereka Nahori;
wakati aɓereka Nahori, Serugi akagara makore anamazana maʋiri, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Nahori wakagara makore anamakumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe, akaɓereka Tera;
Nahori akagara makore anezana negumi namapfumbamŋe, akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Tera wakagara makore anamakumi manomŋe, akaɓereka Abrama naNahori, naHarani.
Ndiwo marudzi aTera: Tera wakaɓereka Abrama, naNahori, naHarani; Harani akaɓereka Roti;
Harani akafa, ɓaɓa ʋake Tera ʋaciri ʋapenyu, panyika yokuɓerekwa kwake, paUri yaʋaKardia.
Abrama naNahori ʋakaɀiwanira ʋakadzi; zita romukadzi waAbrama rainzi Sarai; zita romukadzi waNahori rainzi Mirika, mukunda waHarani, ɓaɓa ʋaMirika, naɓaɓa ʋaIsika.
Sarai wakaŋga asiŋgaɓereki, wakaŋga asinomŋana.

Ɀino Tera wakatora mŋanakomana wake Abrama, naRoti, mŋanakomana waHarani, mŋanakomana womŋanakomana wake, naSarai, mukadzi womŋanakomana wake Abrama; ʋakatama naʋo ʋakabva Uri yaʋaKardia, kuti ʋaende kunyika yeKanani, ʋakaȿika Harani, ʋakagara’po.
Mazuʋa aTera akaŋga ari makore anamazana maʋiri namashanu; Tera akafira Harani.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaAbrama: Ibva panyika yako, nokuhama dzako, nokuimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, uende kunyika yandicakuratidza iyo;
ndicakuita rudzi rukuru, ndicakuropafadza, ndicakudza zita rako, iwe uropafadze ʋamŋe.
Ndicaropafadza iʋo ʋanokuropafadza; unokutuka, ndicamutuka ʋo; marudzi ose enyika acaropafadzwa mauri.
Naiɀoɀo Abrama wakaenda seɀaakaʋudzwa naJehova; naRoti wakaenda naye. Abrama wakaŋga anamakore anamakumi manomŋe namashanu pakubva kwake Harani.

Abrama akatora Sarai, mukadzi wake, naRoti, mŋanakomana womunuŋuna wake, nefuma yaʋo yose yaʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋganidza, naʋana ʋaʋakaŋga ʋaɓereka paHarani, ʋakaɓuɗa kuenda kunyika yeKanani; ʋakandoȿika kunyika yeKanani.
Abrama akagura nenyika iyo akaȿika panɀimbo inonzi Shekemi, pamuti womuouki weMore; ŋguʋa iyo ʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋari munyika iyo.
Ɀino Jehova wakaɀiratidza kunaAbrama, akati: Ndicapa ʋana ʋako nyika iyi; akaʋakira Jehova artari ipapo, iye wakaŋga aɀiratidza kwaari.
Akabva ipapo, akaenda kugomo riri kumabvazuʋa aBeteri, akadzika’po tente rake; Beteri rakaŋga riri kumaʋirazuʋa neAi kumabvazuʋa; akaʋakira’po Jehova artari, akanamata Zita raJehova ipapo.
Kubva ipapo Abrama wakaramba acitamira kumaʋirazuʋa.
Ɀino nzara yakaŋga iri’po panyika iyo; Abrama ndokuɓurukira Egipita kundogara’ko; nokuti nzara yakaŋga iri huru panyika iyo.
Ɀino wakati oɗa kupinda Egipita, akati kunaSarai, mukadzi wake: Tarira, ndinoziʋa kuti uri mukadzi wakanaka paciso cako;
kana ʋaEgipita ʋacikuʋona, ʋacati: Ndiye mukadzi wake; ʋacandiʋuraya, asi iwe ʋacakurega uri mupenyu.
Uti hako uri hanɀadzi yaŋgu, kuti ndiitirwe ɀakanaka nokuɗa kwako, kuti mŋeya waŋgu urarame nokuɗa kwako.
Ɀino Abrama aciȿika Egipita, ʋaEgipita ʋakaʋona mukadzi kuti wakanaka kwaɀo.
Namacinda aFarao akamuʋona ʋo, ʋakandomurumbidza kunaFarao; mukadzi akatorwa, akaiswa mumba maFarao.
Akaitira Abrama ɀakanaka nokuɗa kwake; waiʋa namakwai, neŋombe, namakono emboŋgoro, naʋaranda, naʋarandakadzi, namakadzi emboŋgoro, namakamera.
Asi Jehova wakatambudza Farao naʋeimba yake namaɗambudziko makuru nokuɗa kwaSarai, mukadzi waAbrama.
Ɀino Farao wakaɗana Abrama, akati: Cinyiko ici cawandiitira — Wakaregereiko kundiziʋisa kuti mukadzi wako?
Wareʋereiko uciti: Ihanɀadzi yaŋgu? Naiɀoɀo ndakamutora kuti aʋe mukadzi waŋgu; naiɀoɀo ɀino hoyu mukadzi wako, mutore, uende hako.
Ɀino Farao akaraira ʋamŋe ʋarume pamsoro pake, ʋakamuperekedza iye nomukadzi wake neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo.
Ɀino Abrama wakakwira, akabva Egipita, iye nomukadzi wake, neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, naRoti ʋo anaye; ʋakaenda kurutiʋi rwenyasi.
Abrama wakaŋga akafuma kwaɀo ŋombe, nesirveri, nendarama.
Akafamba nzendo dzake acibva nyasi kuȿikira paBeteri, kunɀimbo iya kwaiʋa netente rake pakutaŋga, pakati peBeteri neAi;
kunɀimbo yeartari, yaakaŋga aita’po pakutaŋga; Abrama akanamata zita raJehova ipapo.
NaRoti ʋo, iye wakaenda naAbrama, wakaŋga anamakwai, neŋombe, namatente.
Nyika ikasaʋariŋgana, kuti ʋagare panɀimbo imŋe; nokuti fuma yaʋo yakaŋga iri zhinji; ʋakasagona kugara panɀimbo imŋe.
Ʋafudzi ʋeɀipfuwo ɀaAbrama naʋafudzi ʋeɀipfuwo ɀaRoti ʋakaita nharo; ʋaKanani naʋaPerezi ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika iyo.
Ipapo Abrama akati kunaRoti: Nharo ŋgadzirege kuʋa’po pakati paŋgu newe, napakati paʋafudzi ʋaŋgu naʋafudzi ʋako, nokuti tiri hama.
Ko nyika yose haizi pamberi pako here? Paradzana hako neni; kana iwe ukaenda kuruɓoshwe, ini ndicaenda kurudyi; kana iwe ukaenda kurudyi, ini ndicaenda kuruɓoshwe.

Roti akasimudzira meso ake, akaʋona ɓani rose reJoridani, kuti rakaŋga rinemvura pose, Jehova acigere kuparadza Sodoma neGomora; rakaŋga rakaita somunda waJehova, senyika yeEgipita, kana munhu acienda Zoari.
Roti akaɀitsaurira ɓani rose reJoridani; Roti akaenda kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; ʋakaparadzana haʋo.
Abrama akagara panyika yeKanani, Roti akagara pamaguta aiʋa kuɓani, akasweɗedzera tente rake kuȿikira paSodoma.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeSodoma ʋakaŋga ʋakaipa, ʋaitadzira Jehova kwaɀo‐kwaɀo.
Ɀino Roti wakati aparadzana naye, Jehova akati kunaAbrama: Simudza hako meso ako ipapo paugere, utarire kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, norwenyasi, norwokumabvazuʋa, norwokumaʋirira;
nokuti nyika yose yaunoʋona, ndicaipa iwe naʋana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndicaita ʋana ʋako seguruʋa renyika; kuti kana kunomunhu unogona kuʋereŋga guruʋa renyika, naʋana ʋako ʋaŋgaʋereŋgwa ʋo.
Simuka, ufambe nenyika pakureɓa kwayo, napaʋupamhi bgayo, nokuti ndicakupa iyo.
Ipapo Abrama wakabvisa tente rake, akandogara pamiti yemiouki yeMamre, iri paHebroni, akaʋakira’po Jehova artari.
Ɀino neŋguʋa yaAmraferi, mambo weShinari, naArioki mambo weErasari, naKedori‐raomeri, mambo weErami, naTidari, mambo weGoyimi,
ʋakarwa naBera, mambo weSodoma, naBerisha, mambo weGomora, naShinabi, mambo weAdama, naShemeberi, mambo weZeboimi, namambo weBera (rinonzi ʋo Zoari).
Aʋa ʋose ʋakasoŋgana mumupata weSidimi (ndiro Guŋgwa roMunyu).
Ʋakaŋga ʋaʋa ʋaranda ʋaKedori‐raomeri makore anegumi namaʋiri, ʋakamumukira negore regumi namatatu.
Ipapo Kedori‐raomeri wakaʋuya negore regumi namanna, namadzimambo aakaŋga anawo, akakunda ʋaRefaimi paAshteroti‐karnaimi, naʋaZuzimi paHami, naʋaEmimi paShave‐kiriataimi,
naʋaHori pagomo raʋo reSeiri, kuȿikira paErparani, pedyo nesaŋgo.
Ʋakadzoka, ʋakaȿika Enimishpati (rinonzi ʋo Kadeshi), ʋakakunda nyika yose yaʋaAmareki, naʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋagere paHazazonitamari.
Ɀino mambo weSodoma, namambo weGomora, namambo weAdama, namambo weZeboimi, namambo weBera (rinonzi ʋo Zoari), ʋakaɓuɗa ʋakagadzira hondo kuzorwa naʋo pamupata weSidimi;
kuti ʋarwe naKedori‐raomeri, mambo weErami, naTidari, mambo weGoyimi, naAmraferi, mambo weShinari, naArioki, mambo weErasari; madzimambo manna kuti arwe namadzimambo mashanu.
Ɀino mupata weSidimi wakaŋga uzere namakomba anebitumini, madzimambo eSodoma neGomora ʋakatiza ʋakawira’mo; ʋakasara ʋakatizira kugomo.
Ʋakatora fuma yose yeSodoma neGomora, neɀokudya ɀaʋo ɀose, ʋakaenda.
Ʋakatora ʋo Roti, mŋanakomana womunuŋuna waAbrama wakaŋga agere paSodoma, nefuma yake, ʋakaenda.
Ɀino mumŋe wakaŋga apukunyuka wakaȿika, akaʋudza Abrama, muHeberu; iye wakaŋga agere pamiti yemiouki yaMamre, muAmori, munuŋuna waEshkori, nomunuŋuna waAneri; aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋaita suŋgano naAbrama
Ɀino Abrama wakati acinzwa kuti hama yake yatapxa, akaraira ʋarume ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋadzidziswa kurwa, ʋakaɀarwa paimba yake, ʋanamazana matatu negumi naʋasere, akaʋateʋerera kuȿikira paDani;
akakamura ʋarwi ʋake ʋusiku, iye naʋaranda ʋake, akaʋakunda, akaʋateʋerera kuȿikira paHoba, riri kurudyi rweDamasiko.
Akadzosa fuma yose, akadzosa ʋo Roti, hama yake, nefuma yake, naʋakadzi ʋo naʋanhu.
Ipapo mambo weSodoma wakaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naye pakudzoka kwake pakuʋuraya Kedori‐raomeri namadzimambo akaŋga anaʋo pamupata weShave (ndiwo mupata wamambo).
Merkizedeki, mambo weSaremi, akaʋuya neciŋgwa newami; iye wakaŋga ari muprista waMŋari woKuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga.
Akamuropafadza, akati: Abrama ŋgaaropafadzwe naMŋari woKuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga, muridzi wokuɗeŋga napasi.
Mŋari woKuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ŋgaakudzwe, wakapa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu mumaʋoko enyu. Akamupa cegumi ceɀose.
Ɀino mambo weSodoma akati kunaAbrama: Ndipe ʋanhu, iwe utore hako fuma.
Abrama akati kunamambo weSodoma: Ndakasimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kunaJehova, Mŋari woKuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga, muridzi wokuɗeŋga napasi,
kuti handiŋgatori rucinda kana rukanda rweshaŋgu, kana cinhu cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀenyu, kuti murege kuzoti: Ndini ndakafumisa Abrama;
ini handiɗi haŋgu, asi ɀakadyiwa namajaya cete, nomugoʋe waʋanhu ʋakaenda neni, ʋanaAneri, naEshkori, naMamre, ŋgaʋatore migoʋe yaʋo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaAbrama paneɀaakaratidzwa, riciti: Usatya Abrama; ini ndiri nhoʋo yako nomuɓairo wako mukuru‐kuru.
Abrama akati: Ishe Jehova, mucandipeiko, ɀandofa haŋgu ndisinomŋana; ucaʋa mudyi wenhaka yeimba yaŋgu ndiEriezeri weDamasiko kanhi?
Abrama akati: Tarirai, hamuna‐kundipa mŋana; ɀino uyo wakaponerwa mumba maŋgu ndiye ucaʋa mudyi wenhaka yaŋgu.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwaari, rikati: Uyu haaŋgaʋi mudyi wenhaka yako; asi uyo, ucaɓuɗa paʋura bgako, ndiye ucaʋa mudyi wenhaka yako.
Akamuɓuɗisa panze, akati: Ɀino tarira kuɗeŋga, uʋereŋge nyeredzi, kana ucigona kudziʋereŋga. Akati kwaari: Ndiɀo ɀicaita ʋana ʋako.
Iye akatenda Jehova, akamuti ndiko kururama kwake.
Akati kwaari: Ndini Jehova wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeUri yaʋaKardia, kuti ndikupe nyika iyi, iʋe nhaka yako.
Iye akati: Ishe Jehova, ndicaziʋa seiko kuti icaʋa nhaka yaŋgu?
Akati kwaari: Nditorere tsiru rinamakore matatu, neshece yembudzi inamakore matatu, negondobge rinamakore matatu, nenjiʋa, nomŋana wenjiʋa.
Akandomutorera iɀoɀo ɀose, akaɀipamura napakati, akagadzika rumŋe rutiʋi rwakatarisana norumŋe; asi shiri haanakudzipamura.
Ipapo magora akaɓurukira kunyama, asi Abrama wakaadziŋga.
Ɀino zuʋa rakati roʋira, Abrama ndokuɓatwa nehope huru; akawirwa nokutya kwakabva parima guru.
Akati kunaAbrama: Uziʋe kwaɀo kuti ʋana ʋako ʋacaʋa ʋatorwa munyika isati iri yaʋo: ʋacaʋa ʋaranda ʋaʋo; ʋacatambudzwa makore anamazana manna;
asi ini ndicatoŋga rudzi urwo rwaʋacashumira; pashure ʋacaɓuda’po nefuma zhinji.
Asi iwe ucaenda kunamadziɓaɓa ako norugare; ucaʋigwa wakwegura kwaɀo.
Rudzi rwecinna rucadzokera pano, nokuti kusarurama kwaʋaAmori kucigere kuzara.
Ɀino zuʋa rakati raʋira, kwaȿiɓa, coto cinopfuŋgaira nezhenje romŋoto ɀakaʋonekwa ɀicipfuʋura napakati penhindi idzedzo dzenyama.
Nomusi iwoyo Jehova akaita suŋgano naAbrama, akati: Ʋana ʋako ndaʋapa nyika iyi, kubva parwizi rweEgipita kuȿikira kurwizi rukuru, runonzi Yufratesi:
ƲaKeni, naʋaKenizi, naʋaKadmoni,
naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaRefaimi,
naʋaAmori, naʋaKanani, naʋaGirgashi, naʋaJebusi.
Ɀino Sarai, mukadzi waAbrama, wakaŋga asiŋgamuɓerekeri ʋana; iye wakaŋga anomurandakadzi, muEgipita, wainzi Hagari.
Sarai akati kunaAbrama: Tarira, Jehova wakandikonesa kuɓereka; pinda hako kumurandakadzi waŋgu, ɀimŋe ndiŋgawana ʋana naye. Abrama akaterera shoko raSarai.
Ɀino Sarai, mukadzi waAbrama, wakatora Hagari, muEgipita, murandakadzi wake, — Abrama ɀino wakaŋga agara makore anegumi panyika yeKanani, — akamupa Abrama, murume wake, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Akapinda kunaHagari, iye akatora mimba; ɀino wakati oʋona kuti waʋa nemimba, akashoʋora ʋatenzi ʋake.

Ipapo Sarai akati kunaAbrama: Kukaŋganiswa kwaŋgu ŋgakuʋe pamsoro pako; ndini ndakapa murandakadzi waŋgu pacifuʋa cako; ɀino iye wakati oʋona kuti waʋa nemimba, akandishoʋora; Jehova ŋgaatoŋge pakati paŋgu newe.
Abrama akati kunaSarai: Tarira, murandakadzi wako uri paruʋoko rwako, umuitire seɀaunoɗa. Ɀino Sarai wakamunetsa, akatiza.
Mutumŋa waJehova akamuwana patsime remvura musaŋgo, patsime riri panzira inoenda Shuri.
Akati: Nhandi Hagari, murandakadzi waSarai, wabvepiko? Unoendepiko — Iye akati: Ndinotiza ʋatenzi ʋaŋgu Sarai.
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kwaari: Dzokera kuʋatenzi ʋako, uɀiɗukupise pasi pake.
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kwaari: Ndicawandisa ʋana ʋako, ʋarege kuʋereŋgwa nokuwanda kwaʋo.
Mutumŋa waJehova akati ʋo kwaari: Tarira waʋa nemimba, ucaɓereka mŋanakomana; umutumidze zita rinonzi Ishmaeri, nokuti Jehova wakanzwa kutambudzika kwako.
Iye ucaʋa sembizi pakati paʋanhu; ucarwa naʋanhu ʋose, naʋanhu ʋose ʋacarwa naye; ucagara akatarisana nehama dzake dzose.
akatumidza Jehova wakataurirana naye, zita rinonzi: Ndimi Mŋari unoʋona; nokuti wakati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndamuʋona pano oenda, iye unondiʋona!
Naiɀoɀo tsime iro rakatumidzwa Beeri‐raahi‐roi (tsime raiye mupenyu unondiʋona); riri pakati peKadeshi neBeredi.
Hagari akaɓerekera Abrama mŋanakomana; Abrama akatumidza mŋanakomana wake, wakaɓerekwa naHagari, zita rinonzi Ishmaeri.
Abrama wakaŋga anamakore makumi masere namatanhatu, Hagari acimuɓerekera Ishmaeri.
Abrama wakati aȿika makore anamakumi mapfumbamŋe namapfumbamŋe, Jehova akaɀiratidza kunaAbrama, akati kwaari: Ndini Mŋari wamasimba ose; famba pamberi paŋgu, uʋe wakarurama.
Ndicaita suŋgano yaŋgu pakati paŋgu newe, ndicakuwanza kwaɀo.
Ipapo Abrama akawira pasi neciso cake, Mŋari akataura naye, akati:
Kana ndirini, tarira, suŋgano yaŋgu inewe, ucaʋa ɓaɓa ʋendudzi zhinji‐zhinji.
Zita rako haricazonzi Abrama, asi zita rako ricanzi Abrahama; nokuti ndakakuita ɓaɓa ʋendudzi zhinji‐zhinji.
Ndica kuɓerekesa ʋana ʋazhinji‐zhinji; ndicakuita ndudzi, namadzimambo acabva kwauri.
Ndicasimbisa suŋgano yaŋgu pakati paŋgu newe, naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera pamarudzi aʋo ose, kuti iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi; ndicaʋa Mŋari wako nowaʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera.
Ndicakupa iwe naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera, nyika mauri mutorwa iwe, nyika yeKanani yose, kuti iʋe yako nokusiŋgaperi; ini ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Mŋari akati ʋo kunaAbrahama: Kana uri’we, ceŋgeta suŋgano yaŋgu, iwe naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera pamarudzi aʋo ose.
Ndiyo suŋgano yaŋgu, yamunofanira kuceŋgeta pakati paŋgu nemi naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera: Ʋanakomana ʋose pakati penyu ŋgaʋadziŋgiswe.
Mudziŋgiswe panyama yecikanda cenyu capamberi, kuti ciʋe ciratidzo cesuŋgano iri pakati paŋgu nemi
Mŋanakomana unamazuʋa masere pakati penyu ŋgaadziŋgiswe, mukomana mumŋe nomumŋe pamarudzi enyu, kana akaɀarwa mumba, kana akateŋgwa nemari kuʋatorwa ʋapi naʋapi, ʋasati ʋari ʋaʋana ʋako.
Wakaɀarwa mumba mako, nowakateŋgwa nemari, ʋanofanira kudziŋgiswa; suŋgano yaŋgu iʋe panyama yenyu, iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi.
Munhurume usina‐kudziŋgiswa, usina‐kudziŋgiswa panyama yecikanda cake capamberi, munhu wakaɗai unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake; wakaputsa suŋgano yaŋgu.
Mŋari akati ʋo kunaAbrahama: Kana ari Sarai, mukadzi wako, haufaniri kuzomutumidza zita rinonzi Sarai, asi zita rake ricanzi Sara;
ndicamuropafadza iye, ndikupe mŋanakomana kwaari; ndicamuropafadza iye, kuti aʋe
Ipapo Abrahama wakawira pasi neciso cake, akaseka, akati mumŋoyo make: Ko munhu unamakore anezana uŋgaɓerekerwa mŋana here? NaSara, waʋa namakore anamakumi mapfumbamŋe, uŋgaɓereka here?
Abrahama akati kunaMŋari: Ƌai Ishmaeri acirarama hake pamberi penyu!

Mŋari akati kwaari: Kwete, asi Sara, mukadzi wako, ndiye ucakuɓerekera mŋanakomana, unofanira kumutumidza zita rinonzi Isaka; ndicaita suŋgano yaŋgu naye, iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi pakati paʋana ʋake ʋanomuteʋera.
Kana ari Ishmaeri, ndakunzwa ʋo; tarira, ndamuropafadza, ndicamuɓerekesa ʋana ʋazhinji, nokumuwanzisa kwaɀo; ucaɓereka madzishe anegumi namaʋiri, ndicamuita rudzi rukuru.
Asi suŋgano yaŋgu ndicaisimbisa naIsaka, uyo waucaɓerekerwa naSara neŋguʋa iyi makei.
Akapedza kutaura naye, Mŋari akakwira acibva kunaAbrahama.

Ipapo Abrahama wakatora Ishmaeri, mŋanakomana wake, naʋose ʋakaɀarwa mumba make, naʋose ʋakateŋgwa nemari yake, munhurume mumŋe nomumŋe kuʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋari paimba yaAbrahama, akaʋadziŋgisa ɀikanda ɀaʋo ɀapamberi nomusi iwoyo, seɀaakaʋudzwa naMŋari.
Abrahama wakaŋga anamakore anamakumi mapfumbamŋe nan apfumbamŋe musi wokudziŋgiswa kwake.
Ishmaeri, mŋanakomana wake, wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namatatu musi wokudziŋgiswa kwake
Nomusi uyo Abrahama wakadziŋgis a pamŋe cete naIshmaeri, ŋanakomana wake.
Naʋarume ʋose ʋeimba yake, ʋakaŋga ʋaɀarirwa mumba make, naʋakaŋga ʋateŋgwa nemari kuʋatorwa, ʋakadziŋgiswa pamŋe cete naye.
Ɀino Jehova wakaɀiratidza kwaari pamiti yemiouki yeMamre, agere pamukoʋa wetente masikati zuʋa ricipisa;
akasimudza meso ake, akatarira, akaʋona ʋarume ʋatatu ʋamire ʋakatarisana naye; wakati aciʋaʋona, akabva pamukoʋa wetente, akamhanya kundosoŋgana naʋo, akakotamira pasi,
akati: Ishe waŋgu, kana ndawana nyasha kwamuri, musapfuʋura henyu pamuranda wenyu.
Ŋgaʋaʋuye nemvura shomanene, mushambidze tsoka dzenyu, muzorore pasi pomuti;
ini nditore cimeɗu ceciŋgwa, musimbise mŋoyo yenyu; mugozopfuʋura henyu, nokuti ndiɀo ɀamaʋuyira kumuranda wenyu. Iʋo ʋakati: Ita hako seɀawataura.
Abrahama akakurumidza kupinda mutente kunaSara, akati: Kurumidza ugadzire ɀiyero ɀitatu
Naiye Abrahama akamhanyira kuŋombe, akatora mhuru inenyama yakapfaʋa, yakanaka, akapa muranda wake; iye akakurumidza kuigadzira.
Akatora mukaka wakafa, nomukaka, nemhuru yaakaŋga agadzira, akaɀiisa pamberi paʋo; akamira naʋo munyasi momuti, ʋakadya.
Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Sara, mukadzi wako, uripiko Iye akati: Tarirai, uri mutente.
akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, kana gore rapfuʋura, ndicaʋuya ɀe kwauri; neŋguʋa iyo Sara, mukadzi wako, ucaʋa nomŋanakomana. Ɀino Sara wakaŋga aciterera ari pamukoʋa wetente shure kwake.
Ɀino Abrahama naSara ʋakaŋga ʋakwegura, ʋaʋa namakore mazhinji; nomutoʋo waʋakadzi wakaŋga watoguma kunaSara.
Sara akaseka mumŋoyo make, akati: Ini ndiŋgaɀifarira here ɀandacembera, naiye tenzi waŋgu akwegura ʋo?
Jehova akati kunaAbrahama: Sara wasekereiko, aciti: Ko ini mucembere ndicaɓereka mŋana ɀirokwaɀo here?
Kunecinhu ciŋgakunda Jehova here? Ŋguʋa ino, gore rapfuʋura, ndicadzokera kwauri; Sara ucaʋa nomŋanakomana.
Asi Sara wakaramba, aciti: Handina‐kuseka; nokuti wakaŋga acitya. Iye akati: Kwete, waseka hako.
Ɀino ʋaya ʋarume ʋakasimuka, ʋakabva ipapo, ʋakatarira Sodoma; Abrahama akaenda naʋo aciʋaperekedza.
Ɀino Jehova akati: Ndicaʋanzira Abrahama ɀandinoita here?
Abrahama ɀaacaʋa rudzi rukuru runesimba, nendudzi dzose dzenyika dzicaropafadzwa maari?
Nokuti ndakamutsaura, kuti araire ʋana ʋake naʋeimba yake ʋanomuteʋera, kuti ʋaceŋgete nzira yaJehova, ʋaite ɀakarurama neɀakanaka; kuti Jehova aʋuyise pamsoro paAbrahama iɀo ɀaakataura pamsoro pake.
Ipapo Jehova akati: Kuɗanidzira kweSodoma neGomora kukuru kwaɀo; ɀirokwaɀo ɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀakaipa kwaɀo;
ndicaɓuruka ɀino kuti ndiʋone iɀo ɀaʋaita, kana ɀakafanana nokuɗanidzira kwaʋo kwakaȿika kwandiri; kana ɀisina‐kuɗaro, ndicaɀiziʋa.
Ɀino ʋaya ʋarume ʋakabva, ʋakaenda Sodoma; asi Abrahama wakaramba amire pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino Abrahama wakasweɗera, akati: Mucaparadza ʋakarurama pamŋe cete naʋakaipa here?
Ɀimŋe ʋaŋgaʋa’po ʋakarurama ʋanamakumi mashanu muguta; mucaparadza nɀimbo iyo, mukasainzwira tsitsi nokuɗa kwaʋakarurama ʋanamakumi mashanu ʋari’mo here?
Ŋgaɀiʋe kure nemi kuita kuɗaro, kuʋuraya ʋakarurama pamŋe cete naʋakaipa, kuti ʋakarurama ʋaʋe saʋakaipa; ŋgaɀiʋe kure nemi; Mutoŋgi wenyika yose haaŋgaiti ɀakarurama here?
Ipapo Jehova akati: Kana ndikawana muSodoma ʋakarurama ʋanamakumi mashanu mukati meguta, ndicanzwira nɀimbo yose tsitsi nokuɗa kwaʋo.
Abrahama akapindura, akati: Tarirai ɀino, ndatsuŋga kutaura naJehova, ini guruʋa neɗota haŋgu;
ɀimŋe kucashaikwa ʋashanu kuʋakarurama ʋanamakumi mashanu; muŋgaparadza guta rose kana ʋashanu ʋashaikwa here? Akati: Handiŋgariparadzi, kana ndikawana’mo makumi manna naʋashanu.
Akataura ɀe naye, akati: Ɀimŋe kucawanikwa’mo makumi manna. Akati: Handiŋgaɀiiti nokuɗa kwamakumi manna.
Akati: Jehova ŋgaarege hake kunditsamŋira, kana ndikataura ɀe: Ɀimŋe ʋanamakumi matatu ʋacawanikwa’mo. Akati: Handiŋgaɀiiti, kana ndikawana makumi matatu.
Akati: Tarirai, ndatsuŋga kutaura naJehova; ɀimŋe ʋanamakumi maʋiri ʋacawanikwa’mo. Akati: Handiŋgariparadzi nokuɗa kwamakumi maʋiri.
Akati: Jehova ŋgaarege hake kunditsamŋira, kana ndikataura ɀe kamŋe cete; ɀimŋe ʋanegumi rimŋe cete ʋangawanikwa’mo. Akati: Handiŋgariparadzi nokuɗa kwaiʋaʋo ʋanegumi.
Ipapo Jehova akabva, apedza kutaura naAbrahama; naAbrahama wakadzokera kumba kwake.
Ʋatumŋa ʋaʋiri ʋakaȿika Sodoma maɗekwana; Roti wakaŋga agere pasuʋo reSodoma; Roti akaʋaʋona, akasimuka, akaenda kundosoŋgana naʋo, akakotamira pasi neciso cake;

akati: Tarirai, madzishe aŋgu, ciɗotsaukirai henyu kumba kwomuranda wenyu, muʋate ʋusiku bgose, mushambidze tsoka dzenyu, mugofumira parwendo rwenyu. Iʋo ʋakati: Kwete, ticaʋata heɗu paɗare ʋusiku bgose.
Akaʋanyeŋgetera ɀikuru; ʋakadzimana ʋotsaukira kwaari, ʋakapinda mumba make; akaʋagadzirira cirayiro, akaɓika ciŋgwa cisinembiriso, ʋakadya;
ɀino ʋasati ʋaʋata, ʋarume ʋeguta, iʋo ʋarume ʋeSodoma, ʋakakomba imba, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋanhu ʋose ʋokumatiʋi ose;
ʋakaɗanidzira kunaRoti, ʋakati kwaari: Ʋaripiko ʋarume ʋakapinda kumba kwako ʋusiku ʋuno — Ʋaɓuɗisirei kwatiri, kuti tiʋaziʋe.
Roti akaɓuɗa akaenda kwaʋari kumukoʋa, akazarira mukoʋa shure kwake.
Akati: Regai henyu kuita ɀakaipa ɀakaɗai, hama dzaŋgu.
Tarirai, ndinaʋakunda ʋaʋiri ʋasina‐kumboziʋa murume; regai ndiʋaɓuɗisire kwamuri, muʋaitire iʋo seɀamunoɗa; asi ʋarume aʋa, musaʋaitira cinhu, nokuti ndiɀo ɀaʋakapindira mumumvuri weɗeŋga raŋgu.

Iʋo ʋakati: Suɗuruka! Ʋakati: Munhu uyu wakaʋuya kuzogara pano ari mutorwa, nambera ɀino iye unoɗa kuʋa mutoŋgi. Ɀino ticakuitira ɀakaipa iwe kupfuʋura iʋo. Ʋakamanikidza murume uyo Roti, ʋakasweɗera kuputsa gonhi.
Asi ʋarume ʋakatambanudza maʋoko aʋo, ʋakakweʋera Roti mumba maʋakaŋga ʋari, ʋakapfiga gonhi.
Ʋakapofumadza ʋakaŋga ʋari pamukoʋa, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru; ʋakaɀinetsa ʋacitȿaka mukoʋa.
Ʋarume ʋakati kunaRoti: Unaʋamŋe pano here — Kana mukuwasha, kana ʋanakomana ʋako, kana ʋanasikana ʋako, naʋose ʋaunaʋo muguta; uʋaɓuɗise muno.
Nokuti toɗa kuparadza nɀimbo ino; nokuti kuɗanidzira kwaʋo kwaʋa kukuru kunaJehova; Jehova wakatituma kuiparadza.
Ipapo Roti akaɓuɗa, akandotaura naʋakuwasha ʋake, ʋakaŋga ʋacazowana ʋakunda ʋake, akati: Simukai, ibvai muno; nokuti Jehova ucaparadza guta rino. Asi ʋakuwasha ʋake ʋakati: Unoita hake musere.
Ʋutoŋga ʋucitȿuka ʋatumŋa ʋakakurumidzisa Roti, ʋaciti: Simuka, uende nomukadzi wako, naʋakunda ʋako ʋaʋiri ʋari pano, kuti urege kuparadzwa kana guta rorobga.
Asi ʋakanonoka; ʋarume ʋakaɓata ruʋoko rwake, noruʋoko rwomukadzi wake, namaʋoko aʋakunda ʋake ʋaʋiri; nokuti Jehova wakaŋga anetsitsi naye; ʋakamuɓuɗisa, ʋakamuisa kunze kweguta.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋaɓuɗisa kunze,
Roti akati kwaʋari: Kwete, ishe waŋgu, regai kuɗaro.
Tarirai, muranda wenyu wakawana nyasha kwamuri, makurisa tsitsi dzenyu dzamakandiitira, ɀamandiraramisa; asi handigoni kutizira kugomo, ɀimŋe ɀakaipa ɀiŋgandiwira ndikafa.
Tarirai, guta iri riri pedyo, nditizire haŋgu ikoko; iɗuku haro, nditenderei kuti nditizire ikoko, (harizi ɗuku here?) mŋeya waŋgu urarame.
Iye akati kwaari: Tarira, ndakunzwira tsitsi pacinhu ici ʋo, kuti handiŋgaparadzi guta iri rawareʋa.
Kurumidza, utizire’ko, nokuti handigoni kuita cinhu usati waȿika’po. Naiɀoɀo zita reguta rakanzi Zoari.
Zuʋa rakaŋga raɓuɗa panyika, Roti aciȿika paZoari.
Ipapo Jehova akanisa pamsoro peSodoma neGomora surferi nomŋoto, ɀicibva kuɗeŋga kunaJehova;
akaparadza maguta awo, neɓani rose, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumaguta, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀamera pavu.
Asi mukadzi wake wakaceuka ari shure kwake, akaitwa shoŋgwe yomunyu.
Ɀino Abrahama wakamuka maŋgwanani, akaenda ikoko kwaakaŋga amire pamberi paJehova;
akatarira kurutiʋi rweSodoma neGomora nokunyika yose yeɓani, akaʋona ʋutsi bgenyika iyo ʋucikwira soʋutsi bgecoto.
Ɀino Mŋari wakati aciparadza maguta eɓani, Mŋari akaraŋgarira Abrahama, akaɓuɗisa Roti pakati pokuparadzwa ikoko, ŋguʋa yaakaparadza maguta makaŋga mucigara Roti.
Ɀino Roti wakakwira, acibva muZoari, akandogara mugomo, naʋakunda ʋake ʋaʋiri pamŋe cete naye; nokuti wakatya kugara muZoari; akagara, muɓako, iye naʋakunda ʋake ʋaʋiri.
Ɀino ɗaŋgwe rakati kumuɗuku: Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu ʋakwegura; hakunomurume panyika ino uŋgapinda kwatiri nomutoʋo wenyika yose;
ʋuya, tinwise ɓaɓa ʋeɗu waini, tiʋate naʋo, kuti ticeŋgete rudzi naɓaɓa ʋeɗu.
Ʋusiku ibgobgo ʋakanwisa ɓaɓa ʋaʋo waini, weɗaŋgwe akapinda, akandoʋata naɓaɓa ʋake; iʋo haʋana‐kuziʋa kuʋata kwake pasi kana kumuka kwake.
Fume maŋgwana weɗaŋgwe akati kumuɗuku: Tarira, ndaʋata naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋusiku bgazuro; ŋgatiʋanwise waini ʋusiku bguno ʋo, iwe ugopinda, undoʋata naʋo, kuti ticeŋgete rudzi naɓaɓa ʋeɗu.
Ʋakanwisa ɓaɓa ʋaʋo waini ʋusiku ibgobgo ʋo, muɗuku akasimuka, akandoʋata naʋo; iʋo haʋana‐kuziʋa kuʋata kwake pasi kana kumuka kwake.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakunda ʋaRoti ʋaʋiri ʋakaʋa nemimba kunaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Weɗaŋgwe akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Moabi; ndiʋo ɓaɓa ʋaʋaMoabi kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Nomuɗuku ʋo wakaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Beni‐ami; ndiʋo ɓaɓa ʋaʋana ʋaAmoni kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino Abrahama wakabva’po, akaenda kunyika yenyasi, akandogara pakati peKadeshi neShuri; akaʋa mutorwa muGerari.
Abrahama akati pamsoro paSara, mukadzi wake: Ihanɀadzi yaŋgu; Abimereki, mambo weGerari, akatuma ʋanhu kundotora Sara.
Asi Mŋari wakaʋuya kunaAbimereki ʋusiku pakurota, akati kwaari: Tarira, ucafa nokuɗa kwomukadzi wawatora; nokuti mukadzi uyu unomurume.
Ɀino Abimereki wakaŋga asina‐kusweɗera kwaari; akati: Ishe, mucaʋuraya norudzi rwakarurama ʋo here?
Ko iye haana‐kundiʋudza here, aciti, ihanɀadzi yaŋgu; naiye mukadzi haana‐kuti, ihanɀadzi yaŋgu, here — Ndakaita iɀoɀo nomŋoyo wakarurama namaʋoko akacena.
Mŋari akati kwaari pakurota: Hoŋo, ndinoziʋa kuti wakaita cinhu ici nomŋoyo wakarurama, ndikakudziʋisa ʋo kuti urege kunditadzira; naiɀoɀo handina‐kukutendera kumuɓata.
Saka ɀino dzosa mukadzi womurume uyu, nokuti muprofita; iye ucakunyeŋgeterera, kuti urarame; kana ukasamudzosa, uziʋe kuti ucafa ɀirokwaɀo, iwe naʋose ʋari ʋako.
Abimereki akamuka maŋgwanani, akaɗana ʋaranda ʋake ʋose, akaʋaʋudza iɀoɀo ɀose munzeʋe dzaʋo; ʋarume ʋakavunduka kwaɀo.
Ipapo Abimereki akaɗana Abrahama, akati kwaari: Cinyiko cinhu ici cawatiitira — Ini ndakutadzireiko, ɀawaʋuyisa mhoȿa huru pamsoro paŋgu napamsoro poʋushe bgaŋgu — Wandiitira ɀisakafanira kuitwa.
Abimereki akati kunaAbrahama: Waŋga uciti kuɗiniko, ɀawaita cinhu ici?
Abrahama akati: Nokuti ndakati: Ɀirokwaɀo haʋatyi Mŋari panɀimbo ino; ɀimŋe ʋacandiʋuraya pamsoro pomukadzi waŋgu.
Ʋuye, ɀirokwaɀo ihanɀadzi yaŋgu, mukunda waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, asi haazi mŋana wamai ʋaŋgu; akazowanikwa neni.
Ɀino Mŋari wakati acindiɓuɗisa paimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, kuti ndidzuŋgaire, ndikati kwaari: Heci cinhu cakanaka caunofanira kundiitira: Pose patinoȿika, uti pamsoro paŋgu, ihanɀadzi yaŋgu.
Abimereki akatora makwai, neŋombe, naʋaranda, naʋarandakadzi, akapa Abrahama iɀoɀo, akamudzosera ʋo Sara, mukadzi wake.
Abimereki akati: Tarira, nyika yaŋgu iri pamberi pako; gara hako paunoɗa.
Akati kunaSara: Tarira, ndapa hanɀadzi yako
Abrahama akanyeŋgetera kunaMŋari, Mŋari akaporesa Abimereki, nomukadzi wake, naʋarandakadzi ʋake, ʋakaɓereka ʋana.
Nokuti Jehova wakaŋga azarira ɀiɀaro ɀose ɀaʋeimba yaAbimereki nokuɗa kwaSara, mukadzi waAbrahama.
Ɀino Jehova wakashanyira Sara, seɀaakataura; Jehova akaitira Sara seɀaakaʋaʋudza.
Sara akaʋa nemimba, akaɓerekera Abrahama mŋanakomana pakukwegura kwake neŋguʋa iyeyo yakaŋga yarebga naMŋari.
Abrahama akatumidza mŋanakomana wake, waakaɓerekerwa naSara, zita rinonzi Isaka.
Abrahama akadziŋgisa mŋanakomana wake Isaka aita mazuʋa masere, seɀaakarairwa naMŋari.
Abrahama wakaŋga aȿika makore anezana, ŋguʋa yaakaɓerekerwa mŋanakomana wake Isaka.
Ipapo Sara akati: Mŋari wandisekesa; ʋose, ʋanonzwa iɀoɀi, ʋacaseka neni.
Akati: Ndianiko waitoŋgoti kunaAbrahama: Sara ucamnisa ʋana — Nokuti ndakamuɓerekera mŋanakomana pakukwegura kwake.
Mŋanakomana wakazokura, akarumurwa; Abrahama akaita mutambo mukuru nomusi wokurumurwa kwaIsaka.
Ɀino Sara akaʋona mŋanakomana waHagari, muEgipita, waakaɓerekera Abrahama, aciseka.
Saka wakati kunaAbrahama: Dziŋga muɓatiri uyu nomŋanakomana wake, nokuti mŋanakomana womuɓatiri uyu haaŋgadyi nhaka pamŋe cete nomŋanakomana waŋgu Isaka.
Shoko iro rakaŋga rakaipa kwaɀo kunaAbrahama, nokuɗa kwomŋanakomana wake.
Ipapo Mŋari akati kunaAbrahama: Ŋgaɀirege haɀo kuʋa ɀakaipa kwauri nokuɗa kwomukomana nokwomuɓatiri wako; uterere Sara paɀinhu ɀose ɀaanotaura kwauri; nokuti rudzi rwako rucatumidzwa nezita raIsaka.
Naiye mŋanakomana womuɓatiri ndicamuita rudzi rukuru ʋo, nokuti mŋanakomana wako.
Abrahama akamuka maŋgwanani, akatora ciŋgwa negucu remvura, akapa Hagari, akaɀiisa pafudzi rake, nomŋana ʋo, akamuendisa; iye akaenda, akandodzuŋgaira murenje reBeeri‐sheba.
Mvura yegucu yakati yapera, akakanda mŋana pasi munyasi megwenzi;
iye akandogara pasi pakatarisana naye nhambge ineŋge iŋgaȿika museʋe kana waposhwa; nokuti wakati: Ndirege kuʋona haŋgu mŋana acifa. Akagara pakatarisana naye, akacema kwaɀo.
Mŋari akanzwa inzwi romukomana; mutumŋa waMŋari akaɗanidzira kunaHagari, ari kuɗeŋga, akati kwaari: Ɀaita seiko Hagari — Usatya, nokuti Mŋari wanzwa inzwi romukomana apo paari.
Simuka, usimudze mukomana, umuɓate noruʋoko rwako, nokuti ndicamuita rudzi rukuru.
Ipapo Mŋari akaȿinudza meso ake, akaʋona tsime remvura; akaenda, akazadza gucu nemvura, akanwisa mukomana.
Mŋari akaʋa nomukomana, akakura, akagara murenje, akaʋa munhu unofura noʋuta.
Akagara murenje reParani, mai ʋake ʋakamutorera mukadzi kunyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Abimereki naPikori, mukuru wehondo yake, ʋakataura naAbrahama, ʋakati: Mŋari unewe paɀinhu ɀose ɀaunoita;
naiɀoɀo ɀino ndipikire pano naMŋari kuti hauŋgandinyeŋgeri ini, kana ʋana ʋaŋgu, kana ʋana ʋaʋana ʋaŋgu; asi seɀandakakuitira tsitsi, uite ʋo saiɀoɀo kwandiri, nokunyika mawakagara uri mutorwa.
Abrahama akati: Ndicapika.
Asi Abrahama wakatuka Abimereki nokuɗa kwetsime remvura rakaŋga ratorwa nesimba naʋaranda ʋaAbimereki.
Abimereki akati: Handiziʋi wakaita iɀoɀo, newe hauna‐kundiʋudza, ini handina‐kumboɀinzwa, asi nhasi.
Abrahama akatora makwai nenzombe, akapa Abimereki, iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakaita suŋgano.
Abrahama akaraʋura ɀishece ɀinomŋe ɀamakwai;
Abimereki akati kunaAbrahama: Ko ɀishece iɀi ɀinomŋe ɀawaraʋura ndeɀeiko?
Iye akati: Ɀishece iɀi ɀinomŋe uɀigamucire paruʋoko rwaŋgu, ciʋe capupu caŋgu, kuti ndini ndakacera tsime iri.
Naiɀoɀo wakatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Beeri‐sheba, nokuti ndi’po paʋakapika iʋo ʋaʋiri.
Saiɀoɀo ʋakaita suŋgano paBeeri‐sheba; Abimereki akasimuka, naPikori, mukuru wehondo yake, ʋakadzokera kunyika yaʋaFiristia.
akasima muti womutamariski paBeeri‐sheba, akanamata’po zita raJehova Mŋari usiŋgaperi.
Abrahama akagara ari mutorwa panyika yaʋaFiristia mazuʋa mazhinji.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Mŋari wakaidza Abrahama, akati kwaari: Abrahama! Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Ɀino tora mŋanakomana wako, mŋanakomana wako mumŋe cete, waunoɗa, Isaka, uende kunyika yeMoria umuite ciɓayiro cinopiswa panerimŋe gomo randicakuʋudza.
Abrahama akamuka maŋgwanani, akasuŋga mboŋgoro yake, akatora majaya ake maʋiri naIsaka, mŋanakomana wake, akatsemura huni dzeciɓayiro cinopiswa, ndokusimuka, akaenda kunɀimbo yaakaʋudzwa naMŋari.
Ɀino nomusi wetatu Abrahama akasimudza meso ake, akaʋona nɀimbo iyo ari kure.
Abrahama akati kumajaya ake: Imi cigarai henyu pano nemboŋgoro, ini nomŋana ticaenda ikoko; ticambondonamata, tigodzokera kwamuri.
Abrahama akatora huni dzeciɓayiro cinopiswa, akadzitakudza Isaka, mŋanakomana wake; akatora mŋoto neɓaŋga muruʋoko rwake, ʋakaenda ʋari ʋaʋiri.
Isaka akataura naAbrahama, ɓaɓa ʋake, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu! Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu, mŋana waŋgu. Akati: Hoyu mŋoto nehuni; asi gwaiana reciɓayiro cinopiswa riripiko?
Abrahama akati: Mŋari ucapa amene gwaiana reciɓayiro cinopiswa, mŋana waŋgu; saiɀoɀo ʋakafamba ʋari ʋaʋiri.
Ʋakandoȿika panɀimbo yaakaʋudzwa naMŋari; Abrahama akaʋaka’po artari, akagadzira huni, ndokusuŋga mŋanakomana wake, akamuisa paartari pamsoro pehuni.
Ɀino Abrahama akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akatora ɓaŋga, kuti aɓaye mŋanakomana wake.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova wakaɗanidzira kwaari, ari kuɗeŋga, akati: Abrahama! Abrahama! Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Usaisa ruʋoko rwako kumŋana, usamuitira cinhu; nokuti ɀino ndinoziʋa kuti unotya Mŋari, ɀausina‐kundinyima mŋanakomana wako, iye mŋanakomana wako mumŋe cete.
Abrahama akasimudza meso ake, akatarira, ndokuʋona shure kwake gondobge rakaŋga rakaɓatwa nyaŋga dzaro mugwenzi; Abrahama akatora gondobge iro, akaripisa cikaʋa ciɓayiro panɀimbo yomŋanakomana wake.
Abrahama akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Jehova-jire; saka nanhasi ʋanositi: Pagomo raJehova ndi’po paacaʋonekwa.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova wakaɗana Abrahama rwecipiri, ari kuɗeŋga,
akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakapika neni ndimene, ndiciti: Ɀawaita iɀoɀo, ukasandinyima mŋanakomana wako mumŋe cete;
ndicakuropafadza kwaɀo, ndicawanza ʋana ʋako kwaɀo senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga, ʋuye sejeca riri pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa; ʋano ʋako ʋacaʋa ʋaridzi ʋamasuʋo aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo;
ndudzi dzose dzenyika dzicaropafadzwa muʋana ʋako, ɀawakaterera inzwi raŋgu.
Ipapo Abrahama wakadzokera kumajaya ake, ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda ʋose Beeri‐sheba; Abrahama akagara paBeeri‐sheba.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Abrahama wakaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarira, Mirka wakaɓerekera ʋo munuŋuna wako Nahori ʋanakomana
Uzi, ɗaŋgwe rake, naBuzi, munuŋuna wake, naKemueri, ɓaɓa ʋaArami,
naKesedi, naHazo, naPirdashi, naJidrafi, naBetueri.
Betueri akaɓereka Rebeka; aʋa ʋasere ndiʋo ʋakaɓerekerwa Nahori, munuŋuna waAbrahama, naMirka.
Nomuroŋgo wake wainzi Ruma, wakaɓereka ʋo Teba, naGahami, naTahashi, naMaaka.
Ɀino Sara wakagara makore anezana namakumi maʋiri namanomŋe; ndiwo makore oʋupenyu bgaSara.
Sara akafa paKiriyati‐arba (rimŋe zita ndiHebroni) panyika yeKanani; Abrahama akaʋuya kuzocema Sara nokumuririra.
Ɀino Abrahama akasimuka panowakafa wake, akataurirana naʋana ʋaHeti, akati:
Ndiri mŋeni nomutorwa pakati penyu; ndipei nɀimbo yokuʋiga pakati penyu, iʋe nɀimbo yaŋgu, kuti ndiʋige wakafa waŋgu, ndirege kumuʋona.
Ʋana ʋaHeti ʋakapindura Abrahama, ʋakati kwaari:
Citinzwai, ishe weɗu, imi muri mucinda waMŋari pakati peɗu; ʋigai wakafa wenyu pabgiro bgakanaka pakati pamabgiro eɗu ose; hakunomunhu pakati peɗu uŋgakunyimai bgiro bgake, kuti muʋige wakafa wenyu.
Ipapo Abrahama wakasimuka akakotamira pasi pamberi paʋanhu ʋenyika iyo, iʋo ʋana ʋaHeti,
akataurirana naʋo, akati: Kana mucitenda kuti ndiʋige wakafa waŋgu, ndirege kumuʋona, cindinzwai, mundikumbirire kunaEfroni, mŋanakomana waZohari,
kuti andipe ɓako reMakpera, raanaro, riri pamugumo womunda wake; andipe iro, ndiripe muteŋgo wose, iʋe nɀimbo yaŋgu yokuʋiga pakati penyu.
Efroni ɀino wakaŋga agere pakati paʋana ʋaHeti; Efroni, muHeti, akapindura Abrahama, ʋana ʋaHeti ʋaciɀinzwa, iʋo ʋose ʋaipinda pasuʋo reguta rake, akati:
Kwete, ishe waŋgu, cindinzwai; tererai, ndinokupai munda, nairo ɓako riri’mo, ndinokupai iro; ndinokupai iɀoɀo pamberi paʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ʋigai henyu wakafa wenyu.
Abrahama akakotama pamberi paʋanhu ʋenyika iyo,
akataura naEfroni, ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋaciɀinzwa, aciti: Kana uciɗa, cinditerera hako, ndicakupa muteŋgo womunda, uugamucire kwandiri, kuti ndiʋige wakafa waŋgu’po.
Efroni akapindura Abrahama, akati kwaari:
Ishe waŋgu, cinditererai; munda unoteŋgwa namashekeri esirveri anamazana manna, ciŋgaʋa cinyiko pakati paŋgu newe — Ʋigai henyu wakafa wenyu.
Abrahama akaterera Efroni: Abrahama akayerera Efroni mashekeri esirveri aakareʋa, ʋana ʋaHeti ʋaciɀinzwa, mashekeri esirveri anamazana manna,
Naiɀoɀo munda waEfroni, wakaŋga uri paMakpera pakatarisana neMamre, munda neɓako rakaŋga riri’mo, nemiti yose yakaŋga iri mumunda neyakaŋga iri panyika yose yakapoteredza,
ɀikaʋa ɀaAbrahama pamberi paʋana ʋaHeti, pamberi paʋose ʋaipinda pasuʋo reguta rake.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Abrahama akaʋiga Sara, mukadzi wake, muɓako romunda weMakpera, pakatarisana neMamre (rimŋe zita ndiHebroni), panyika yeKanani.
Ɀino munda neɓako rakaŋga riri’mo ɀakasimbisiwa kunaAbrahama naʋana ʋaHeti, kuti ɀiʋe ɀake, ikaʋa nɀimbo yake yokuʋiga.
Abrahama ɀino wakaŋga akwegura, aʋa mutana kwaɀo; Jehova wakaŋga aropafadza Abrahama paɀinhu ɀose.
Abrahama akataura nomuranda wake, waiʋa mukuru weimba yake, waiceŋgeta ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, aciti: Cimboisa canza cako pasi pecidɀa caŋgu,
ndikupikise naJehova, Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, naMŋari wenyika, kuti hauŋgatoreri mŋanakomana waŋgu mukadzi kuʋanasikana ʋeKanani, ʋandinogara pakati paʋo;
asi uende kunyika yaŋgu, nokuhama dzaŋgu, undotorera
Muranda akati kwaari: Ɀimŋe mukadzi haaŋgatendi kunditeʋera kunyika ino; ɀino ndiŋgafanira kudzosera mŋanakomana wenyu kunyika kwamakabva here?
Abrahama akati kwaari: Cenjera kuti urege kudzosera mŋanakomana waŋgu ikoko.

Jehova, Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, wakandibvisa paimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu nomunyika yokuɀarwa kwaŋgu, wakataura neni, akandipikira, aciti: Nyika ino ndicapa ʋana ʋako; ndiye ucatuma mutumŋa wake pamberi pako, kuti utorere mŋanakomana waŋgu mukadzi ikoko.
Kana mukadzi asiŋgatendi kukuteʋera, iwe ucasunuŋgurwa pakupika kwako uku kwandiri; asi usadzosera mŋanakomana waŋgu ikoko.
Ipapo muranda akaisa canza cake pasi pecidɀa catenzi wake, akamupikira pamsoro pecinhu ico.
Muranda akatora makamera anegumi pamakamera atenzi wake, akaenda, anenhumbi dzose dzakanaka dzatenzi wake; akasimuka, akaenda Mesopotamia kuguta raNahori.
Akafugamisa makamera kunze kweguta patsime remvura neŋguʋa yamaɗekwana, iri ŋguʋa yaiɓuɗa ʋakadzi kundocera mvura;
akati: Jehova, Mŋari watenzi waŋgu Abrahama, ndifambisei henyu ɀakanaka nhasi; muitire tenzi waŋgu Abrahama ŋgoni.
Tarirai ndimire patsime remvura, ʋakunda ʋaʋanhu ʋeguta ʋoɓuɗa kuzocera mvura.

Ɀino ŋgakuitwe kuti musikana wandicati kwaari: Nditurire ʋo ciroŋgo cako, ndinwe; kana akati: Inwai henyu, namakamera enyu ndicaanwisa ʋo; ŋgaaʋe iye wamakatsaurira muranda wenyu Isaka; naiɀoɀo ndicaziʋa kuti makaitira tenzi waŋgu ŋgoni.
Ɀino wakaŋga asati apedza kutaura, Rebeka, wakaɓerekerwa Betueri, mŋanakomana waMirka, mukadzi waNahori, munuŋuna waAbrahama, wakaȿika aneciroŋgo pafudzi rake.
Ɀino musikana uyu wakaŋga akanaka kwaɀo pameso ake, mhandara isina‐kumbozibga nomurume; akaɓurukira kutsime, akazadza ciroŋgo cake, akakwira ɀe.
Ipapo muranda wakamhanyira kundosoŋgana naye, akati: Ƌondipa ʋo ɀimvura paciroŋgo cako, ndinwe.
Iye akati: Inwai henyu, ishe waŋgu; akakurumidza kutura ciroŋgo cake paruʋoko rwake, akamunwisa.
Wakati apedza kumunwisa, akati: Ndicacerera makamera enyu ʋo kuȿikira aguta.
Akakurumidza, akaɗurura mvura yakaŋga iri muciroŋgo cake mucinwiro; akamhanyira kutsime kundocera ɀe, akacerera makamera ake ose.
Murume akamutarisisa, anyerere, kuti aziʋe kana Jehova amufambisa ɀakanaka parwendo rwake, kana kwete.
Makamera akati apedza kunwa, murume akatora cindori cendarama cakaita hafu yeshekeri rimŋe rendarama
akati: Uri mukunda waaniko — Ndiʋudze hako. Kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋako kunopokuʋata here?
Iye akati: Ndiri mukunda waBetueri, mŋanakomana waMirka, waakaɓerekera Nahori.
Akati kwaari ʋo: Tinabgo ʋuswa bgakawoma neɀokudya ɀizhinji, nopokuʋata ʋo.
Murume akakotamisa musoro wake, akanamata Jehova.
Akati: Jehova, Mŋari watenzi waŋgu Abrahama ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, usina‐kurega nyasha dzake nokutendeka kwake kunatenzi waŋgu; kana ndirini, Jehova wakandifambisa, akandiȿitsa kuimba yehama dzatenzi waŋgu
Ipapo musikana wakamhanya, akandoʋudza ʋeimba yamai ʋake mashoko iwaya.
Ɀino Rebeka wakaŋga anehanɀadzi yainzi Rabani; Rabani akaɓuɗa, akamhanyira kumurume kutsime.

Nokuti wakati aciʋona cindori neɀishoŋgo pamaʋoko ehanɀadzi yake, nokunzwa ʋo mashoko aRebeka, hanɀadzi yake, aciti: Ndiɀo ɀakataura murume kwandiri, akaenda kumurume, akamuwana amire pamakamera patsime.
Akati: Pinda, iwe, wakaropafadzwa naJehova; unomirireiko kunze — Nokuti ndagadzira imba nenɀimbo yamakamera.
Murume akapinda mumba; akasunuŋgura makamera, akapa makamera ʋuswa bgakawoma neɀokudya; nemvura kuti ashambidze tsoka dzake netsoka dzaʋarume ʋaakaŋga anaʋo.
Ipapo ɀokudya ɀakaiswa pamberi pake kuti adye; asi iye wakati: Handiŋgadyi ndisati ndambotaura mashoko aŋgu. Akati: Taura hako.
Iye akati: Ndiri muranda waAbrahama.
Jehova wakaropafadza tenzi waŋgu kwaɀo; waʋa mukuru; wakamupa makwai, neŋombe, nesirveri, nendarama, naʋaranda, naʋarandakadzi, namakamera, nemboŋgoro.
NaSara, mukadzi watenzi waŋgu, wakaɓerekera tenzi waŋgu mŋanakomana pakukwegura kwake; ndiye waakapa ɀose ɀaanaɀo.
Tenzi waŋgu akandipikisa, akati: Usatorera mŋanakomana waŋgu mukadzi kuʋanasikana ʋeKanani, pandigere munyika yaʋo;
asi uende kunaʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu nokuhama dzaŋgu, undotorera mŋanakomana waŋgu mukadzi ikoko.
Ndikati kunatenzi waŋgu: Ɀimŋe mukadzi haaŋgatendi kunditeʋera.
Iye akati: Jehova wandinosifamba pamberi pake, ucatuma mutumŋa wake newe, akufambise ɀakanaka parwendo rwako; undotorera mŋanakomana waŋgu mukadzi kuhama dzaŋgu nokunaʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu;
ucasunuŋgurwa pakupika kwako kwandiri kana waȿika kuhama dzaŋgu; kana ʋakaramba kukupa iye, ucasunuŋgurwa pakupika kwako kwandiri.
Ɀino ndakaȿika nhasi kutsime, ndikati: Jehova, Mŋari watenzi waŋgu Abrahama, kana muciɗa kundifambisa ɀakanaka parwendo rwaŋgu rwandinofamba,
tarirai, ndimire patsime remvura; ɀino ŋgaɀiitwe, kuti musikana unoɓuɗa kuzocera mvura, wandicati kwaari: Ƌondipa ʋo ɀimvura paciroŋgo cako, ndinwe,
iye akati kwandiri: Inwai henyu, imi, ʋuye ndicacerera makamera enyu ʋo, iye aʋe mukadzi wakatsaurirwa mŋanakomana watenzi waŋgu naJehova.
Ɀino ndisati ndapedza kutaura mumŋoyo maŋgu, ndikaʋona Rebeka aciʋuya aneciroŋgo cake pafudzi rake; akaɓurukira kutsime, akacera; ndikati kwaari: Ƌondipa ʋo, ndinwe.
Iye akakurumidza, akatura ciroŋgo cake pafudzi rake, akati: Inwai henyu, ʋuye ndicanwisa makamera enyu ʋo; ini ndikanwa, akanwisa makamera ʋo.
Ɀino ndakamubvunza, ndikati: Uri mukunda waaniko — Iye akati: Ndiri mukunda waBetueri, mŋanakomana waNahori, waakaɓerekerwa naMirka; ipapo ndakaisa cindori mumhino dzake, neɀishoŋgo pamaʋoko ake.

Ndikakotamisa musoro waŋgu, ndikanamata Jehova, ndikaʋoŋga Jehova, Mŋari watenzi waŋgu Abrahama, iye wakandifambisa panzira yakarurama, kuti nditorere mŋanakomana watenzi waŋgu mukunda womunuŋuna watenzi waŋgu, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ɀino kana muciɗa kuitira tenzi waŋgu noʋunyoro nokutendeka, mundiʋudze; kana musiŋgaɗi, mundiʋudze, kuti ndiende kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe.
Ipapo Rabani naBetueri ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Cinhu ici cinobva kunaMŋari: isu hatigoni kutaura kwauri ɀakaipa kana ɀakanaka.
Tarira, Rebeka uri pamberi pako, umutore, uende, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake, seɀakarebga naJehova.
Ɀino muranda waAbrahama wakati anzwa mashoko aʋo, akakotamira pasi pamberi paJehova;
muranda akaɓuɗisa ɀishoŋgo ɀesirveri, neɀendarama, neŋguʋo; akaɀipa Rebeka; akapa ʋo hanɀadzi yake namai ʋake nhumbi dzinokosha.
Ʋakadya, ʋakanwa, iye naʋarume ʋaakaŋga anaʋo; ʋakagara’po ʋusiku bgose, ʋakamuka maŋgwanani; iye akati: Regai, ndiende kunatenzi waŋgu.
Asi hanɀadzi yake namai ʋake ʋakati: Musikana acimbogara nesu mazuʋa ɀimŋe anegumi, agozoenda hake.
Asi iye wakati kwaʋari: Musandidzora henyu, Jehova ɀaakandifambisa ɀakanaka parwendo rwaŋgu; regai ndiende kunatenzi waŋgu.
Iʋo ʋakati: Ŋgatiɗane musikana, tinzwe muromo wake.
Ʋakaɗana Rebeka, ʋakati kwaari: Ucaenda nomurume uyu here — Akati: Ndicaenda.
Ipapo ʋakatendera Rebeka, hanɀadzi yaʋo, nomureri wake, kuti ʋaende nomuranda waAbrahama, naʋanhu ʋake.
Ʋakaropafadza Rebeka, ʋakati kwaari: Iwe, hanɀadzi yeɗu, uʋe mai ʋeɀuru ɀamazana; ʋana ʋako ŋgaʋaʋe ʋaridzi ʋamasuʋo aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Rebeka akasimuka, naʋasikana ʋake, ʋakataȿa makamera, ʋakateʋera murume uyo; muranda akatora Rebeka, akaenda parwendo rwake.
Ɀino Isaka wakaŋga acibva nenzira yeBeeri‐rakai‐roi; nokuti wakaŋga agere kunyika yenyasi.
Isaka akaɓuɗa kundoraŋgarira kusaŋgo neŋguʋa yamaɗekwana; akasimudza meso ake, akatarira, akaʋona makamera aciʋuya.
Rebeka akasimudza ʋo meso ake; wakati aciʋona Isaka, akaɓuruka pakamera rake.
Akati kumuranda: Murume uyo, unofamba musaŋgo kuzosoŋgana nesu ndianiko — Muranda akati: Nditenzi waŋgu; iye akatora cokufukidzira ciso cake, akaɀifukidza.
Ɀino muranda akaʋudza Isaka ɀose ɀaakaŋga aita.
Isaka akamuisa mutente ramai ʋake Sara, akawana Rebeka, akaʋa mukadzi wake; akamuɗa. Isaka akanyaradzwa shure kwokufa kwamai ʋake.
Ɀino Abrahama wakawana ɀe mumŋe mukadzi, wainzi Ketura.
Iye akamuɓerekera Zimrami, naJokshani, naMedani, naMidiani, naIshbaki, naShua.
Jokshani akaɓereka ShebanaDedani. Ʋanakomana ʋaDedani ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaAshuri, naʋaRetushi, naʋaReumi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMidiani ʋakaŋga ʋari Efa, naEferi, naHanoki, naAbida, naErda Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋana ʋaKetura.
Abrahama akapa Isaka ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo.
Asi ʋanakomana ʋaʋaroŋgo ʋaAbrahama ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, Abrahama wakaʋapa ɀipo; akaʋatuma, iye aciri mupenyu, ʋabve kunaIsaka mŋanakomana wake, ʋaende kumabvazuʋa, kunyika yokumabvazuʋa.
Ndiwo mazuʋa amakore oʋupenyu bgaAbrahama: Makore anezana namakumi manomŋe namashanu.
Abrahama akaɓuɗisa mŋeya wake, akafa akwegura kwaɀo, aʋa mutana, makore ake aʋa mazhinji, akasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake.
Isaka naIshmaeri, ʋanakomana ʋake, ʋakamuʋiga muɓako reMakpera, mumunda waEfroni, mŋanakomana waZohari, waʋaHeti, wakatarisana neMamre;
ndiwo munda wakaŋga wateŋgwa naAbrahama kuʋana ʋaHeti; ndi’po pakaʋigwa Abrahama naSara, mukadzi wake.
Ɀino Abrahama wakati afa, Mŋari akaropafadza Isaka, mŋanakomana wake; Isaka akagara paBeeri‐rakai‐roi.
Ndiwo marudzi aIshmaeri, mŋanakomana waAbrahama, wakaɓerekerwa Abrahama naHagari, muEgipita, murandakadzi waSara.
Ndiwo mazita aʋanakomana ʋaIshmaeri, ndiwo mazita aʋo pakuɀarwa kwaʋo: Weɗaŋgwe waIshmaeri wakaŋga ari Nebayoti, naKedari, naAdberi, naMibsami,
naMishma, naDuma, naMasa,
naHadadi, naTema, naJeturi, naNafishi, naKedema;
ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaIshmaeri, ndiwo mazita aʋo, pamisha yaʋo napamatente aʋo; macinda anegumi namaʋiri nendudzi dzaʋo.
Ndiwo makore oʋupenyu bgaIshmaeri, makore anezana namakumi matatu namanomŋe; akaɓuɗisa mŋeya wake, akafa, akasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake.
Ʋakagara kubva paHavira kuȿikira paShuri, mberi kweEgipita, kana munhu acienda Asiria; akandogara akatarisana nehama dzake dzose.
Ndiwo marudzi aIsaka, mŋanakomana waAbrahama: Abrahama wakaɓereka Isaka;
Isaka wakaŋga anamakore anamakumi manna pakuwana kwake Rebeka, mukunda waBetueri, muAramia, wePadani‐arami, hanɀadzi yaRabani, muAramia, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ɀino Isaka wakanyeŋgeterera mukadzi wake kunaJehova, nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaɓereki; Jehova akanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwake, Rebeka, mukadzi wake, akaʋa nemimba.
Ɀino ʋana ʋakasundana mukati make, akati: Kana ɀakaɗaro, ndakaitirweiko iɀoɀi — Akandobvunza Jehova.
Jehova akati kwaari:
Munendudzi mbiri muciɀaro cako,
Ndudzi mbiri dzicaparadzana, dzicibva muɗumbu rako;
Rumŋe rudzi rucakunda rumŋe rudzi nesimba;
Mukuru ucashumira muɗuku.
Ɀino mazuʋa ake okuɓereka akati aȿika, ʋonei ʋana ʋaʋiri ʋari muciɀaro cake.
Wokutaŋga akaɓuɗa ari mutȿuku, muʋiri wose wakaita seŋguʋo inemvere; ʋakatumidza zita rake Esau.
Pashure munuŋuna wake akaɓuɗa, ruʋoko rwake rwakaɓata citsitsinho caEsau, ʋakatumidza zita rake Jakobo; Isaka wakaŋga anamakore makumi matanhatu pakuɓerekwa kwaʋo.
Ʋakomana ʋakakura; Esau akaʋa mudzimba wakacenjera, murume wesaŋgo; Jakobo wakaŋga ari murume wakarurama, waigara mumatente.
Isaka akaɗa Esau, nokuti waiɗa nyama yemhuka, asi Rebeka wakaŋga aciɗa Jakobo.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaŋga aɓika ɀokudya, Esau akaȿika acibva kusaŋgo aɀiya;
Esau akati kunaJakobo: Ƌondipa ʋo iɀo ɀakatȿuka ndidye, nokuti ndaziya; saka wakatumidzwa zita rinonzi Edomi.
Jakobo akati: Cimbonditeŋgesera ʋuɗaŋgwe bgako.
Esau akati: Tarira, ndofa haŋgu, ʋuɗaŋgwe ʋucandiɓatsireiko?
Jakobo akati: Cimbondipikira; akamupikira, akateŋgesera Jakobo ʋuɗaŋgwe bgake.
Jakobo akapa Esau ciŋgwa neɀokudya ɀenyemba; akadya, akanwa, akasimuka, ndokuenda hake; Esau akaɀidza ʋuɗaŋgwe bgake saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino nzara yakaŋga iri’po panyika; isati iri nzara yakaŋga iri’po pamazuʋa aAbrahama. Isaka akaenda Gerari kunaAbimereki, mambo waʋaFiristia.
Jehova akaɀiratidza ɀe kwaari, akati: Usaɓurukira Egipita; gara munyika yandakakuʋudza;
gara hako munyika ino uri mutorwa; ini ndicaʋa newe, ndicakuropafadza; nokuti ndicakupa iwe, naʋana ʋako, nyika idzi dzose; ndicasimbisa mhiko yandakapikira Abrahama, ɓaɓa ʋako;
ndicawanza ʋana ʋako senyeredzi dzeɗeŋga; ndudzi dzose dzenyika dzicaropafadzwa muʋana ʋako;
nokuti Abrahama wakaterera inzwi raŋgu, akaceŋgeta ɀandakamuraira, nemirairo yaŋgu, nemitemo yaŋgu, nemirau yaŋgu.
Isaka akagara Gerari;
ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakamubvunza pamsoro pomukadzi wake, akati: Ihanɀadzi yaŋgu; nokuti wakaŋga acitya kuti, mukadzi waŋgu, aciti: Ɀimŋe ʋanhu ʋenyika
Ɀino wakati aʋa’po ŋguʋa refu, Abimereki, mambo waʋaFiristia, wakatarira napawindi, akaʋona Isaka acitamba naRebeka, mukadzi wake.
Ipapo Abimereki akaɗana Isaka, akati: Tarira, ɀirokwaɀo mukadzi wako; wakataura seiko uciti, ihanɀadzi yaŋgu — Isaka akati kwaari: Nokuti ndakati: Ɀimŋe ndiŋgafa nokuɗa kwake.
Abimereki akati kwaari: Ndokuɗiniko kuti watiitira cinhu ici — Ƌai mumŋe waʋanhu aiʋata nomukadzi wako, uŋgaɗai watiisa pamhoȿa.
Abimereki akaraira ʋanhu ʋose, akati: Unoɓata munhu uyu kana mukadzi wake, ucaʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Ɀino Isaka wakadɀara ɀiyo munyika iyo, akawana gore iro runezana; Jehova akamuropafadza.
Munhu uyu akaʋa mukuru, akaramba aciwedzerwa, kuȿikira waʋa mukuru kwaɀo;
wakaŋga anefuma yamakwai, neyeŋombe, nemhuri huru; ʋaFiristia ʋakamugoɗora.
ƲaFiristia ʋakadziʋira matsime ose akaŋga acerwa naʋaranda ʋaɓaɓa ʋake pamazuʋa aɓaɓa ʋake Abrahama, ʋakaafusira nevu.
Abimereki akati kunaIsaka; Ibva hako kwatiri, nokuti watipfuʋura kwaɀo nesimba.
Isaka akabva’po, akandodzika matente ake mumupata weGerari, akagara’po.
Isaka akacera ɀe matsime emvura, akaŋga acerwa pamazuʋa aɓaɓa ʋake, Abrahama; nokuti ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaadziʋira Abrahama afa; akaatumidza mazita aakaŋga atumidzwa naɓaɓa ʋake.
Ʋaranda ʋaIsaka ʋakacera mumupata, ʋakawana’po tsime remvura inotuɓuka.
Ʋafudzi ʋeGerari ʋakaitirana nharo naʋafudzi ʋaIsaka, ʋaciti: Imvura yeɗu; akatumidza tsime iro zita rinonzi Eseki; nokuti ʋakapesana naye.
Ɀino wakandocera ɀe rimŋe tsime; ʋakaitirana nharo pamsoro pairero ɀe; akaritumidza zita rinonzi Sitna.
Akabva’po, akandocera ɀe rimŋe tsime; irero haʋana‐kuzoitirana nharo pamsoro paro; akaritumidza zita rinonzi Rehoboti; akati: Nokuti ɀino Jehova wakandiitira nɀimbo huru, kuti tiwande munyika ino.
Akabva’po, akakwira Beeri‐sheba;
Jehova akaɀiratidza kwaari ʋusiku ibgobgo, akati: Ndini Mŋari waAbrahama, ɓaɓa ʋako; usatya, nokuti ndinewe, ndicakuropafadza, nokuwanza rudzi rwako nokuɗa kwaAbrahama, muranda waŋgu.
Akaʋaka’po artari, akanamata zita raJehova, akadzika tente rake ipapo; ʋaranda ʋaIsaka ʋakacera’po tsime.
Ipapo Abimereki akaenda kwaari, acibva Gerari, aneshamŋari yake Ahuzati, naPikori, mukuru wehondo yake.
Isaka akati kwaʋari: Maʋuyireiko kwandiri, ɀamunondiʋeŋga, mukandidziŋga kwamuri?
Iʋo ʋakati: Takaʋona kwaɀo kuti Jehova unewe, tikati: Ɀino mhiko ŋgaiʋe’po pakati peɗu, pakati peɗu newe, tiite suŋgano newe;
kuti urege kutiitira ɀakaipa, seɀatisina‐kukuɓata iwe, seɀatakakuitira ɀakanaka ɓedzi, tikakuendisa norugare; ɀino iwe ndiwe hako muropafadzwa waJehova.
Iye akaʋagadzirira ɀokudya, ʋakadya, ʋakanwa,
ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakapikirana; ipapo Isaka akaʋatendera kuenda, ʋakabva kwaari norugare.
Nomusi iwoyo ʋaranda ʋaIsaka ʋakaʋuya, ʋakamuʋudza kuti ʋakaŋga ʋacera tsime, ʋakati kwaari: Mvura taiwana.
Akaritumidza zita rinonzi Shiba; naiɀoɀo zita reguta ndiBeeri‐sheba kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
