Ɀino Esau wakati aȿika makore makumi manna, akawana Juditi, mukunda waBeeri, muHeti, naBasemati, mukunda waEroni, muHeti;
iʋaʋo ʋakarwadza mŋoyo waIsaka naRebeka.
Ɀino Isaka wakati aʋa mutana, meso ake oʋonera madzerere, asicagoni kuʋona, wakaɗana Esau, mŋanakomana wake mukuru, akati kwaari: Mŋana waŋgu; iye akati kwaari: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Tarira ɀino ndakwegura; handiziʋi zuʋa rokufa kwaŋgu.
Ɀino ɗotora hako nhumbi dzako dzokuvima nadzo, dzinoti goɓa rako, noʋuta bgako, uende kusaŋgo undivimire mhuka;
undigadzirire nyama yakanaka, seɀandinoiɗa, uʋuye nayo kwandiri, ndidye, mŋeya waŋgu ukuropafadze ndisati ndafa.
Ɀino Rebeka wakanzwa Isaka acitaura naEsau, mŋanakomana wake. Esau akaenda kusaŋgo kundovima mhuka, kuti aʋuye nayo.
Rebeka akataura naJakobo, mŋanakomana wake, akati: Tarira, ndanzwa ɓaɓa ʋako ʋacitaura naEsau, mukoma wako, ʋaciti:
Nditorere mhuka, undigadzirire nyama yakanaka, kuti ndiidye, ndikuropafadze pamberi paJehova ndisati ndafa.
Ɀino mŋana waŋgu, terera inzwi raŋgu seɀandinokuraira.
Enda ɀino kuɀipfuwo, unditorere’po mbudzana mbiri dzakanaka, ndigadzirire ɓaɓa ʋako nadzo nyama yakanaka, seɀaʋanoɗa;
ugoenda nayo kunaɓaɓa ʋako, ʋadye, kuti ʋakuropafadze ʋasati ʋafa.
Jakobo akati kunaRebeka, mai ʋake: Tarirai, Esau, mukoma waŋgu, munhu unemvere, asi ini ndiri munhu ndisinemvere.
Ɀimŋe ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋacandiɓata‐ɓata, ndikaʋa somunyeŋgedzeri pamberi paʋo, ndikaɀiʋuyisira kutukwa pacigaro cokuropafadzwa.
Mai ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Kutukwa kwako ŋgakuʋe pamsoro paŋgu, mŋana waŋgu; terera hako inzwi raŋgu, ʋende unditorere idzo.
Iye akaenda, akadzitora, akadziisa kunamai ʋake; mai ʋake ʋakagadzira nyama yakanaka, yaiɗikanwa naɓaɓa ʋake
Ɀino Rebeka akatora nguʋo dzakaiȿo‐naka dzaEsau, mŋanakomana wake mukuru, dzaaiʋa nadzo mumba, akadzifukidza Jakobo, mŋanakomana wake muɗuku;
akaisa ŋguʋo dzembudzana pamaʋoko ake, napamutsipa wake pakaŋga pasinemvere;
akaisa nyama yakanaka neciŋgwa, ɀaakaŋga agadzira, muruʋoko rwaJakobo, mŋanakomana wake.
Iye akaenda kunaɓaɓa ʋake, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu; iʋo ʋakati: Ndiri pano haŋgu; ndiwe aniko mŋana waŋgu?
Jakobo akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ndini Esau, ɗaŋgwe renyu; ndaita seɀamandiraira; simukai henyu, mugare, mudye nyama yaŋgu yemhuka, mŋeya wenyu undiropafadze.
Isaka akati kumŋanakomana wake: Wakurumidza seiko kuiwana, mŋana waŋgu — Iye akati: Nokuti Jehova, Mŋari wenyu, waituma pamberi paŋgu.
Isaka akati kunaJakobo: Cimbosweɗera hako, ndikuɓate‐ɓate, mŋana waŋgu, kuti ndiziʋe kana uri mŋanakomana waŋgu Esau amene, kana usi’we.
Jakobo akasweɗera kunaIsaka, ɓaɓa ʋake; iʋo ʋakamuɓata‐ɓata, ʋakati: Inzwi inzwi raJakobo, asi maʋoko maʋoko aEsau.
Asi haana‐kumuziʋa, nokuti maʋoko ake akaŋga anemvere, samaʋoko omukuru wake Esau; akamuropafadza.
Akati: Ndiwe mŋanakomana waŋgu Esau amene here — Iye akati: Ndini iye.
Akati: Uisweɗedze pedyo neni, kuti ndidye nyama yemhuka yomŋanakomana waŋgu, mŋeya waŋgu ukuropafadze. Iye akaisweɗedza pedyo naye, akadya; akamupa ʋo waini, akanwa.
Ipapo ɓaɓa ʋake Isaka ʋakati kwaari: Sweɗera ɀino undiȿete, mŋana waŋgu.
Akasweɗera, akamuȿeta; akanzwa munhuwi weŋguʋo dzake, akamuropafadza, akati:
Tarira munhuwi womŋakomana waŋgu
Wakaita somunhuwi wesaŋgo rakaropafadzwa naJehova;
Mŋari ŋgaakupe ɗoʋa rokuɗeŋga,
Mafuta enyika,
Neɀiyo newaini ɀakawanda.
Ʋanhu ŋgaʋakushumire,
Marudzi ose ŋgaakufugamire;
Uʋe ishe wehama dzako,
Ʋanakomana ʋamai ʋako ŋgaʋakufugamire;
Ʋose ʋanokutuka ŋgaʋatukwe,
Ʋose ʋanokuropafadza ŋgaʋaropafadzwe.
Ɀino Isaka wakati apedza kuropafadza Jakobo, Jakobo acaŋgoɓuɗa pamberi paIsaka ɓaɓa ʋake, Esau mukoma wake, akapinda, acibva pakuvima kwake.
Naiye akagadzira nyama yakanaka, akaenda nayo kunaɓaɓa ʋake; akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ŋgaʋasimuke, ŋgaʋadye nyama yemhuka yomŋanakomana waʋo, kuti mŋeya wenyu undiropafadze.
Ipapo Isaka ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakati: Ndiwe aniko — Iye akati: Ndini mŋanakomana wenyu, ɗaŋgwe renyu Esau.
Isaka akabvunda kwaɀo‐kwaɀo, akati: Ndianiko wakaŋga avima mhuka, akaʋuya nayo kwandiri, ndikadya ɀose, iwe usati waȿika, ndikamuropafadza — Hoŋo, ɀirokwaɀo iye ucaropafadzwa hake.
Esau wakati acinzwa mashoko aɓaɓa ʋake, akacema nokucema kukuru kunorwadza mŋoyo, akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ndiropafadzei neni ʋo, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu!
Akati: Munuŋuna wako wakaʋuya nokunyeŋgedzera, akatora kuropafadzwa kwako.

Iye akati: Haana‐kutumidzwa zita rakamufanira here, rokuti Jakobo — Nokuti ɀino wandinyeŋgedzera kaʋiri; wambonditorera ʋuɗaŋgwe bgaŋgu, ɀino tarira, wanditorera kuropafadzwa kwaŋgu. Akati: Hamuna‐kundiceŋgetera ʋo kuropafadzwa here?
Isaka akapindura, akati kunaEsau: Tarira, ndamuita ishe wako, nehama dzake dzose ndakamupa iye, kuti ʋaʋe ʋaranda ʋake; ndamusimbisa neɀiyo newaini; ɀino cinyiko candiŋgakuitira iwe, mŋana waŋgu?
Esau akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Munoŋgoʋa nokuropafadza kumŋe kwoga here, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu — Ndiropafadzei, neni ʋo, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu! Esau akacema nokucema kukuru.
Ipapo Isaka ɓaɓa ʋake, akapindura, akati kwaari:
Tarira, ʋugaro bgako ʋucaʋa kure namafuta enyika,
Kure neɗoʋa rokuɗeŋga rinobva kumsoro;
Ucararama nomunondo wako, ucashumira munuŋuna wako;
Ucati kana woɀimutsa iwe,
Ucavuna joko rake ribve pamutsipa wako.
Esau akaʋeŋga Jakobo nokuɗa kwokuropafadzwa kwaakaropafadzwa nako naɓaɓa ʋake; Esau akati mumŋoyo make: Mazuʋa okucema ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu oɗo‐kuȿika; ipapo ndicaʋuraya munuŋuna waŋgu Jakobo.

Ɀino Rebeka wakaʋudzwa mashoko aEsau, mŋanakomana wake mukuru; akatuma munhu kundoɗana Jakobo, mŋanakomana wake muɗuku, akati kwaari: Tarira, mukoma wako Esau unoɀiʋaraidza pamsoro pako, aciti ucakuʋuraya.
Saka ɀino, mŋana waŋgu, terera inzwi raŋgu; simuka, utizire Harani kunaRabani hanɀadzi yaŋgu;
undogara kwaari mazuʋa mashomanene, kuȿikira shuŋgu dzomukoma wako dzanyarara;
kuȿikira kutsamŋa kwomukoma wako kwanyarara kwauri, kana akaŋganwa iɀo ɀawamuitira: ipapo ndicatuma munhu kuzokutora ikoko; ndicatorerwa seiko nomusi mumŋe imi mose muri ʋaʋiri?
Rebeka akati kunaIsaka: Ndanetswa noʋupenyu bgaŋgu nokuɗa kwaʋakunda ʋaHeti; kana Jakobo akawana ʋo mukadzi kuʋakunda ʋaHeti, wakaita saiʋaʋa, kuʋakunda ʋenyika ino, ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ʋuŋgandiɓatsirei?
Ɀino Isaka wakaɗana Jakobo, akamuropafadza, akamuraira, akati kwaari: Usawana mukadzi kuʋakunda ʋeKanani.
Simuka ʋende Padani‐arami, kuimba yaBetueri, ɓaɓa ʋamai ʋako, uɀiwanire’ko mukadzi kuʋakunda ʋaRabani, hanɀadzi yamai ʋako.
Mŋari wamasimba ose ŋgaakuropafadze, akuɓerekese ʋana, akuwanze, kuti uʋe ndudzi zhinji dzaʋanhu;
akupe kuropafadzwa kwaAbrahama, iwe, naʋana ʋako pamŋe cete newe; kuti ugare nhaka yenyika maugere uri mutorwa, iyo yakapiwa Abrahama naMŋari.
Isaka akati Jakobo aende, akaenda Padani‐arami, kunaRabani, mŋanakomana waBetueri, muAramia, hanɀadzi yaRebeka, mai ʋaJakobo naEsau.
Ɀino Esau wakaʋona kuti Isaka wakaŋga aropafadza Jakobo, akati aende Padani‐arami, kuti aɀiwanire’ko mukadzi; ʋuye ʋo kuti pakumuropafadza kwake akamuraira, aciti: Usawana mukadzi kuʋakunda ʋeKanani;
ʋuye ɀe, kuti Jakobo wakaterera ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, akaenda Padani‐arami;
Esau akaʋona kuti ʋakunda ʋeKanani haʋanakufadza Isaka ɓaɓa ʋake;
Esau akaenda kunaIshmaeri, akawedzera kuʋakadzi ʋake, ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, Maharati mukunda waIshmaeri, mŋanakomana waAbrahama, hanɀadzi yaNebayoti, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaɓuɗa paBeeri‐sheba, akaenda Harani;
akaȿika paneimŋe nɀimbo, akaʋata’po ʋusiku, nokuti zuʋa rakaŋga raʋira; akatora rimŋe ibge ipapo, akaritsamira, akaʋata pasi ipapo.
Akarota, akaʋona ɗanhu rakaŋga ramiswa panyika, musoro waro wakaȿika kuɗeŋga; akaʋona ʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari ʋacikwira nokuɓuruka naro.
Akaʋona Jehova amire naye, akati: Ndini Jehova, Mŋari waAbrahama ɓaɓa ʋako, naMŋari waIsaka; nyika yauʋete pamsoro payo ndicakupa iyo, iwe naʋana ʋako;
ʋana ʋako ʋacaita seguruʋa renyika; ucapararira kumaʋirazuʋa, nokumabvazuʋa, nokumsoro, nenyasi; ndudzi dzose dzenyika dzicaropafadzwa mauri nomuʋana ʋako.
Tarira, ndinewe, ndicakuceŋgeta kwose kwaunoenda, nokukudzosera kunyika ino; nokuti handiŋgakusiyi kuȿikira ndaita iɀoɀo ɀandakakuʋudza.
Ipapo Jakobo akapepuka pahope dzake, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo Jehova uri panɀimbo ino, asi ini handina‐kuɀiziʋa.
Akatya, akati: Nɀimbo ino inotyisa seiko! Iyi iimba caiyo yaMŋari, isuʋo rokuɗeŋga.
Jakobo akamuka maŋgwanani, akatora ibge raakaŋga akatsamira, akarimisa kuti riʋe shoŋgwe, akaɗira mafuta pamsoro paro;
akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Beteri; asi zita reguta pakutaŋga rainzi Ruzi.
Ipapo Jakobo akapika mhiko, aciti: Kana Mŋari akaʋa neni, akandiceŋgeta panzira yandinoenda, akandipa ɀokudya, ndidye, neɀokufuka, ndifuke;
ndikadzokera ɀe norugare kuimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, Jehova ucaʋa Mŋari waŋgu;
neriri ibge, randakamisa rikaʋa shoŋgwe, ricaʋa imba yaMŋari; neɀinhu ɀose ɀamucandipa, ɀirokwaɀo ndicakupai cegumi caɀo.
Jakobo akasimuka’po, akaenda kunyika yaʋanhu ʋamabvazuʋa.
Akatarira, akaʋona tsime kusaŋgo, namapoka matatu amakwai aʋete pasi pariri; nokuti ʋainwisa mapoka aʋo patsime irero; pamuromo wetsime irero pakaŋga panebge guru.
Ndipapo paiʋuŋgana mapoka ose; ɀino ʋaikuŋgurusa ibge pamuromo wetsime, ʋakanwisa makwai aʋo, ʋacidzosera ɀe ibge pamuromo wetsime paʋugaro bgaro;
Jakobo akati kwaʋari: Hama dzaŋgu, mabvepiko — Iʋo ʋakati: Tabva Harani.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Munoziʋa Rabani, mŋanakomana waNahori, here — Ʋakati: Tinomuziʋa.
Akati kwaʋari: Wakafara here — Iʋo ʋakati: Wakafara hake; hoyo Rakeri mukunda wake, woʋuya namakwai.
Akati: Tarirai, aciri masikati makuru, ŋguʋa yokuʋuŋganidza ɀipfuwo icigere kuȿika; nwisai makwai, mugondoafudza.
Iʋo ʋakati: Hatiŋgagoni kuȿikira mapoka ose aʋuŋganidzwa pamŋe cete, ibge rikakuŋguruswa pamuromo wetsime; ipapo tinonwisa makwai.
Wakati acataura naʋo, Rakeri akaȿika namakwai aɓaɓa ʋake, nokuti ndiye waiʋa mufudzi wawo.
Ɀino Jakobo wakati aciʋona Rakeri, mukunda waRabani, hanɀadzi yamai ʋake, Jakobo akasweɗera, akakuŋgurusa ibge pamuromo wetsime, akanwisa makwai aRabani, hanɀadzi yamai ʋake.
Jakobo akaȿeta Rakeri, akacema kwaɀo.
Jakobo akaʋudza Rakeri kuti iye ihama yaɓaɓa ʋake, mŋanakomana waRebeka ipapo iye akamhanya, akandoʋudza ɓaɓa ʋake.
Rabani wakati anzwa mashoko aJakobo, mŋanakomana wehanɀadzi yake, akamhanya kundosoŋgana naye, akamumbundikira, akamuȿeta, akamuisa kumba kwake. Iye akaʋudza Rabani ɀinhu iɀo ɀose.
Rabani akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo uri fupa raŋgu nenyama yaŋgu. Akagara naye mŋedzi wose.
Ɀino Rabani akati kunaJakobo: Ko uŋgandiɓatira usiŋgapiwi muɓairo, nokuti uri hama yaŋgu here — Ndiʋudze kuti muɓairo wako uʋe weiko.
Ɀino Rabani wakaŋga anaʋakunda ʋaʋiri; zita romukuru rakaŋga riri Rea, nezita romuɗuku Rakeri.
Rea wakaŋga anameso akaneta, asi Rakeri wakaŋga akanaka kwaɀo pamuʋiri napaciso.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaŋga aciɗa Rakeri, akati: Ndicakuɓatirai makore manomŋe pamsoro paRakeri, mukunda wenyu muɗuku.
Rabani akati kwaari: Ɀirinani kuti ndimupe iwe, ndirege kumupa mumŋe murume; gara hako neni.
Jakobo akamuɓatira makore manomŋe pamsoro paRakeri: asi akaʋa samazuʋa mashoma kwaari, nokuti wakaŋga acimuɗa.
Ɀino Jakobo akati kunaRabani: Ndipei mukadzi waŋgu, nokuti mazuʋa aŋgu aȿika, kuti ndipinde kwaari.
Rabani akakoka ʋanhu ʋose ʋo’ko, akaita mutambo.
Ɀino kuzoti aʋa maɗeko, akatora Rea, mukunda wake, akamuisa kwaari; iye akapinda kwaari.
Rabani akapa Rea, mukunda wake, Zirpa, murandakadzi wake, kuti aʋe mushandiri wake.
Ɀino maŋgwana akaʋona kuti ndiRea; akati kunaRabani: Cinyiko ici cawandiitira — Handina‐kukuɓatira pamsoro paRakeri here — Wandinyeŋgedzera seiko?
Rabani akati: Hakunzarwo ʋuno kweɗu, kuti munuŋuna ataŋge kuwaniswa, mukuru acigere.
Pedzisa viki
Jakobo akaita saiɀoɀo, akapedza viki
Rabani akapa Rakeri, mukunda wake, Birha murandakadzi wake, kuti aʋe mushandiri wake.
Akapinda ʋo kunaRakeri, akaɗa Rakeri ʋo kupfuʋura Rea, akamuɓatira mamŋe makore manomŋe ɀe.
Ɀino Jehova wakaʋona kuti Rea wakaŋga asiŋgaɗikanwi, akamuɓerekesa; asi Rakeri wakaŋga asiŋgaɓereki.
Rea akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Rubeni; nokuti wakati: Jehova wakaʋona ɗambudziko raŋgu; nokuti ɀino murume waŋgu ucandiɗa.
Akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akati: Jehova wakanzwa kuti handiɗikanwi, naiɀoɀo wakandipa ʋo uyu; akamutumidza zita rinonzi Simeoni.
Akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akati: Ɀino ŋguʋa ino murume waŋgu ucandinamatira, nokuti ndamuɓerekera ʋanakomana ʋatatu; naiɀoɀo zita rake rakanzi Revi.
Akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akati: Ŋguʋa ino ndicarumbidza Jehova; naiɀoɀo wakamutumidza zita rinonzi Juda; akaguma kuɓereka.
Ɀino Rakeri wakati aciʋona kuti haaɓerekeri Jakobo ʋana, Rakeri akagoɗora mukoma wake, akati kunaJakobo: Ndipe ʋana; kana usiŋgandipi, ndicafa.
Ipapo Jakobo akatsamŋira Rakeri, akati: Ndiri panɀimbo yaMŋari kanhi, wakakushaisa ciɓereko?
Iye akati: Hoyo murandakadzi waŋgu Birha; pinda kwaari, kuti aɓereke pamabvi aŋgu, neni ndiwane ʋana kwaari
Akamupa Birha, murandakadzi wake, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake; Jakobo akapinda kwaari.
Ɀino Birha akaʋa nemimba, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana
Rakeri akati: Mŋari wakandiruramisira, akandipa mŋanakomana; naiɀoɀo akamutumidza zita rinonzi Dani.
Birha, murandakadzi waRakeri akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana wecipiri.
Ɀino Rakeri akati: Ndakarwa nokurwa kukuru nomukoma waŋgu, ndikakunda; akamutumidza zita rinonzi Naftari.
Ɀino Rea wakati aciʋona kuti waguma kuɓereka ʋana akatora Zirpa, murandakadzi wake, akamupa Jakobo, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Zirpa, murandakadzi waRea, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana.
Rea akati: Makorokoto! akamutumidza zita rinonzi Gadi.
Zirpa, murandakadzi waRea, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana wecipiri.
Rea akati: Ndinomufaro mukuru, nokuti ʋanasikana ʋacati, ndinomufaro mukuru, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Asheri.
Ɀino Rubeni wakaenda pamazuʋa okuceka ɀiyo, akandowana micero yomududayi kusaŋgo, akaʋuya nayo kunamai ʋake Rea. Rakeri akati kunaRea: Ƌondipa ʋo micero yomʋdudayi yomŋanakomana wako.

Iye akati kwaari: Cinhu ciɗuku here kuti wakatora murume waŋgu — Ɀino woɗa kutora ɀe micero yomududayi yomŋanakomana waŋgu — Rakeri akati: Naiɀoɀo ŋgaaʋate newe ʋusiku ʋuno nokuɗa kwemicero yomududayi yomŋanakomana wako.
Ɀino Jakobo wakati obva kusaŋgo maɗeko, Rea akaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naye, akati: Unofanira kupinda kwandiri; nokuti ndakakuteŋga nemicero yomududayi yomŋanakomana waŋgu. Akaʋata naye ʋusiku ubgo.
Ɀino Mŋari akanzwa Rea, akaʋa nemimba, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana wecishanu.
Rea akati: Mŋari wakandipa muɓairo waŋgu, nokuti ndakapa murandakadzi waŋgu murume waŋgu; akamutumidza zita rinonzi Isakari.
Rea akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓerekera Jakobo mŋanakomana wecitanhatu.
Rea akati: Mŋari wakandipa cipo cakanaka; ɀino murume waŋgu ucagara neni, nokuti ndamuɓerekera ʋanakomana ʋatanhatu; akamutumidza zita rinonzi Zeburuni.
Pashure akazoɓereka mŋanasikana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Dina.
Ɀino Mŋari akaraŋgarira ʋo Rakeri, Mŋari akamunzwa, akazarura ciɀaro cake.
Iye akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana; akati: Mŋari wakabvisa kuɀidzwa kwaŋgu;
akamutumidza zita rinonzi Josefa, aciti: Jehova ŋgaandiwedzere mumŋe mŋanakomana.
Ɀino Rakeri wakati aɓereka Josefa, Jakobo akati kunaRabani: Ndiregei, ndiende kumusha kwaŋgu, nokunyika yaŋgu.
Ndipei ʋakadzi ʋaŋgu naʋana ʋaŋgu, ʋandakakuɓatirai, ndiende haŋgu, nokuti imi munoziʋa kuɓata kwaŋgu kwandakakuɓatirai nako.
Rabani akati: Ɀino kana ndawana nyasha pamberi pako,
Akati: Ndiʋudze muɓairo wako, ndigokupa iwo.
Iye akati: Imi munoziʋa mumene seɀandakakuɓatirai, ʋuye kugara kweɀipfuwo ɀenyu kwandiri.
Nokuti ɀamaiʋa naɀo, ndisati ndaȿika, ɀaŋga ɀiri ɀishoma, ɀikazowanda, ɀikaʋa ɀizhinji; Jehova wakakuropafadzai pose pandakatsika; ɀino ndicaɓatira imba yaŋgu riniko?
Iye akati: Ndokupeiko — Jakobo akati: Musandipa cinhu; kana mukandiitira cinhu ici, ndicafudza ɀe ɀipfuwo ɀenyu nokuɀiceŋgeta.
Ndicafamba pakati peɀipfuwo ɀenyu ɀose nhasi, ndiciraʋura pakati paɀo ɀose ɀinamaʋara neɀinamakwapa, namatema pakati pamakwai, nedzinamaʋara nedzinamakwapa pakati pembudzi;
Nenzira iyi kururama kwaŋgu kucandipupurira pashure, kana mucizoʋuya kuʋona muɓairo waŋgu uri pamberi penyu; dzose dzisinamaʋara nedzisinamakwapa pakati pembudzi, namatema pakati pamakwai, iɀoɀo
Rabani akati: Ndiɀo haɀo, ŋgaɀiʋe seɀawataura.

Nomusi iwoyo akaraʋura nhoŋgo dzembudzi dzakaŋga dzinemitsetsa, nedzinamakwapa, nenhunɀi dzose dzembudzi dzakaŋga dzinamaʋara nedzinamakwapa, dzose dzakaŋga dzinoruʋara rucena, napakati pamakwai ose akaŋga anoruʋara rutema, akaɀipa ʋana ʋake;
akaisa runhambo rwamazuʋa matatu pakati pake naJakobo; Jakobo akafudza ɀipfuwo ɀaRabani ɀakaŋga ɀasara.
Ɀino Jakobo akatora matanda omustoraksi, noomuamanda, noomuprani, akaȿuʋura mitaro micena paari, kuti kucena kuʋonekwe kwakaŋga kuri maari;
akaisa matanda aakaŋga aȿuʋura pamberi peɀipfuwo muɀinwiro, paiʋuya ɀipfuwo ɀicinwa; ɀikatora zamu kana ɀoʋuya kunwa.
Ɀipfuwo ɀikatora zamu pamberi pamatanda; ɀipfuwo ɀikaɓereka ʋana ʋanemitsetsa, naʋanamaʋara, naʋanamakwapa
Ɀino Jakobo akaraʋura makwaiana, akataridza ɀipfuwo kuneɀaiʋa nemitsetsa, neɀitema pakati peɀipfuwo ɀaRabani; akaisa mapoka ake ari oga; haana‐kuɀiisa kuɀipfuwo ɀaRabani.
Ɀino ŋguʋa imŋe neimŋe kana ɀaiʋa nesimba paɀipfuwo ɀicitora zamu, Jakobo wakaisa matanda pamberi peɀipfuwo muɀi nwiro, kuti ɀitore zamu pakati pamatanda;
asi kana ɀipfuwo ɀicishaiwa simba haana‐kuaisa; naiɀoɀo ɀakaŋga ɀisinesimba ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀaRabani, asi ɀaiʋa nesimba ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀaJakobo.
Murume uyu akaʋa mukuru kwaɀo, akaʋa neɀipfuwo ɀizhinji, naʋaranda, naʋarandakadzi, namakamera, nemboŋgoro.
Ɀino wakanzwa mashoko aʋanakomana ʋaRabani, ʋaciti: Jakobo watora ɀose ɀaiʋa ɀaɓaɓa ʋeɗu; waɀiwanira fuma yose iyi kuneɀaiʋa ɀaɓaɓa ʋeɗu.
Jakobo akaʋona ʋo kuti ciso caRabani cakaŋga cisakaita kwaari sapakutaŋga.
Jehova akati kunaJakobo: Dzokera kunyika yamadziɓaɓa ako, nokuhama dzako; ini ndicaʋa newe.
Ipapo Jakobo akatuma munhu kundoɗana Rakeri naRea ʋaʋuye kusaŋgo kuɀipfuwo ɀake;
akati kwaʋari: Ndinoʋona kuti ciso caɓaɓa ʋenyu hacizakaita kwandiri sapakutaŋga; asi Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu wakaŋga aneni.
Munoziʋa kuti ndakaɓatira ɓaɓa ʋenyu nesimba raŋgu rose.
Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakandinyeŋgedzera, ʋakashandura muɓairo waŋgu kagumi; asi Mŋari haana‐kutendera kuti ʋandiitire ɀakaipa.
Kana ʋakati: Ɀinamaʋara ŋgaɀiʋe muɓairo wako, ɀipfuwo ɀose ndokuɓereka ɀinamaʋara; kana ʋakati: Ɀinemitsetsa ŋgaɀiʋe muɓairo wako, ɀipfuwo ɀose ndokuɓereka ɀinemitsetsa.
Naiɀoɀo Mŋari wakatorera ɓaɓa ʋenyu ɀipfuwo ɀaʋo, akandipa ini iɀo.
Ɀino ɀipfuwo ɀakati ɀicitora mazamu, ndakatarira ndikaʋona pakurota kwaŋgu nhoŋgo, dzakaŋga dzicikwira ɀipfuwo, dzakaŋga dzinemitsetsa, namaʋara, nedzakaita pfumbu.
Ipapo mutumŋa waMŋari akati kwandiri pakurota kwaŋgu: Jakobo! Ini ndikati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Ɀino tarira, uʋone, kuti nhoŋgo dzose, dzinokwira ɀipfuwo, dzinemitsetsa, namaʋara, dzakaita pfumbu; nokuti ndaɀiʋona ɀose Rabani ɀaanoita kwauri.
Ndini Mŋari weBeteri, paya pawakazodza shoŋgwe, paya pawakandipikira mhiko; ɀino simuka, ubve munyika ino, udzokere kunyika kwawakaɓerekerwa.
Ipapo Rakeri naRea ʋakapindura ʋakati kwaari: Ko ticinomugoʋe nenhaka kuimba yaɓaɓa ʋeɗu here?
Hatizaʋa saʋatorwa kwaʋari here — Nokuti ʋakatiteŋgesa, ʋakapedza ʋo cose muteŋgo weɗu.
Nokuti fuma yose, yakatorerwa ɓaɓa ʋeɗu naMŋari, ndeyeɗu neyaʋana ʋeɗu; naiɀoɀo ɀino ciita hako seɀawaʋudzwa naMŋari.
Ipapo Jakobo akasimuka, akataȿisa ʋana ʋake naʋakadzi ʋake pamakamera;
akatora ɀipfuwo ɀake ɀose, nefuma yake yose, yaakaŋga aʋuŋganidza, ɀipfuwo ɀaakaŋga apfuwa, ɀaakaŋga aʋuŋganidza paPadani‐arami, kuti aende kunaIsaka ɓaɓa ʋake, kunyika yeKanani.
Ɀino Rabani wakaŋga aenda kundoʋeʋura makushe amakwai ake; Rakeri akaɓa cifananidzo cainamatwa caɓaɓa ʋake.
Jakobo akanyeŋgedzera Rabani, muAramia, nokuti haana‐kumuʋudza kuti ndotiza.
Naiɀoɀo wakatiza neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo; akasimuka, akayambuka Rwizi, akariŋgira kugomo reGiriadi.
Ɀino nomusi wetatu Rabani akaʋudzwa kuti Jakobo watiza.
Iye akaenda nehama dzake, akamuteʋerera rwendo rwamazuʋa manomŋe; akandomuɓata kugomo reGireadi.
Mŋari akaʋuya kunaRabani, muAramia, pakurota ʋusiku, akati kwaari: Cenjera, kuti urege kutaura kunaJakobo cinhu, kana cakanaka kana cakaipa.
Rabani akaȿika kunaJakobo. Ɀino Jakobo wakaŋga adzika tente rake mugomo; Rabani nehama dzake ʋakadzika matente aʋo ʋo mugomo reGireadi.
Ɀino Rabani akati kunaJakobo: Waita seiko iwe, nokuti wandinyeŋgedzera, ukaenda naʋakunda ʋaŋgu ʋakaita saʋakatapxa nomunondo?
Watizireiko pakaʋanda, ukandinyeŋgedzera; wakaregerei kundiʋudza, ndikakutendera kuti uende nomufaro, nenziyo, neŋgoma, noruɗimbga?
Hauna‐kunditendera kuti ndiȿete ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu naʋakunda ʋaŋgu. Ɀino waita seɓenzi.
Ndinesimba paruʋoko rwaŋgu rokukuitira ɀakaipa; asi Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako wakataura neni ʋusiku bgazuro, akati: Cenjera, kuti urege kutaura kunaJakobo kana cakanaka kana cakaipa.
Ɀino, kana wakaɗa kuenda hako, ɀawakaŋga ucishuʋa ɀikuru imba yaɓaɓa ʋako, wagoɓireiko ʋamŋari ʋaŋgu?
Jakobo akapindura, akati kunaRabani: Nokuti ndakaŋga ndicitya; nokuti ndakati: Ɀimŋe muŋganditorera ʋakunda ʋenyu nesimba.
Iye wamuŋgawana anaʋamŋari ʋenyu, ŋgaarege kurarama. Ɀino hama dzeɗu dziciri’ko, natsai kutȿaka ɀinhu ɀenyu ɀiri kwandiri, mugoɀitora; nokuti Jakobo wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi kuti Rakeri wakaŋga aɀiɓa.
Ɀino Rabani akapinda mutente raJakobo, nomutente raRea, nomutente raʋarandakadzi ʋaʋiri, asi haana‐kuɀiwana. Ipapo akaɓuɗa patente raRea, akapinda patente raRakeri.
Ɀino Rakeri wakaŋga atora ʋamŋari, akaʋaisa mucigaro cekamera, akagara pamsoro paɀo. Rabani akaɓata‐ɓata pose mutente, asi haana‐kuɀiwana.
Iye akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ishe waŋgu ŋgaarege kutsamŋa, nokuti handigoni kusimuka pamberi penyu; nokuti mutoʋo waʋakadzi uri kwandiri. Iye akatȿakisisa, asi haana‐kuwana ʋamŋari.
Ɀino Jakobo akatsamŋa, akapopotera Rabani; Jakobo akapindura akati kunaRabani: Kuɗarika kwaŋgu ndokweiko — Ko kutadza kwaŋgu ndokwei, ɀamanditeʋera neshuŋgu dzakaɗai?
Ɀino ɀamaɓata‐ɓata nhumbi dzaŋgu dzose, magowaneiko panhumbi dzose ɀokumba kwenyu — Ɀiisei pano pamberi pehama dzaŋgu nedzenyu, ʋatoŋge pakati peɗu isu ʋaʋiri.
Ndakagara nemi makore aya makumi maʋiri; matunɀi enyu amakwai nenhunɀi dzenyu dzembudzi haɀina‐kuȿodza, makondobge enyu amakwai handinakuadya.
Ɀakarumŋa neɀikara handina‐kuʋuya naɀo kwamuri; asi ndakaɀiripa ini; makaɀireʋa pamaʋoko aŋgu, kana ɀakaɓiwa masikati, kana ɀakaɓiwa ʋusiku.
Masikati ndakafa nezuʋa, ʋusiku necando; hope dzaŋgu dzikabva kumeso aŋgu.
Makore aya makumi maʋiri ndakagara mumba menyu; ndakakuɓatirai makore anegumi namanna pamsoro paʋakunda ʋenyu ʋaʋiri, namakore matanhatu pamsoro peɀipfuwo ɀenyu; makashandura muɓairo waŋgu kagumi.

Ƌai Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋangu, Mŋari waAbrahama, iye wakatyiwa naIsaka, asaiʋa neni, ɀirokwaɀo muŋgaɗai maindiendisa ndisinecinhu. Mŋari wakaʋona kutambudzika kwaŋgu namaɓasa amaʋoko aŋgu, akakurairai ʋusiku bgazuro.

Rabani akapindura, akati kunaJakobo: Ʋakunda aʋa ʋakunda ʋaŋgu; ʋana aʋa ʋana ʋaŋgu; ɀipfuwo iɀi ɀipfuwo ɀaŋgu, neɀose ɀaunoʋona ndeɀaŋgu; nhasi ndiŋgaitei kuʋakunda ʋaŋgu aʋa, kana ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaʋakaɀara?
Ʋuya ɀino ŋgatiite suŋgano, ini newe; ciʋe capupu pakati paŋgu newe.
Jakobo akatora ibge, akarimisa, rikaʋa shoŋgwe.
Jakobo akati kuhama dzake: Ʋuŋganidzai mabge; iʋo ʋakatora mabge, ʋakaita murwi; ʋakadya ipapo pamurwi.
Rabani akautumidza Jegari‐sahaduta; asi Jakobo wakautumidza Garidi.
Rabani akati: Murwi uyu ŋgaciʋe capupu pakati paŋgu newe zuʋa ranhasi. Naiɀoɀo wakatumidzwa zita rinonzi Garidi;
ʋuye ʋo Mizpa, nokuti wakati: Jehova ŋgaarinde pakati paŋgu newe, kana tisiŋgaʋonani.
Kana ukazotambudza ʋakunda ʋaŋgu, kana kuwana ʋamŋe ʋakadzi kunze kwaʋakunda ʋaŋgu, hakunomunhu ucaʋa nesu; asi tarira, Mŋari ndico capupu pakati paŋgu newe.
Ɀino Rabani akati kunaJakobo: Tarira murwi uyu, tarira shoŋgwe iyi, yandakamisa pakati paŋgu newe.

Murwi uyu cicaʋa capupu, neshoŋgwe iyi cicaʋa capupu, kuti ini handiŋgapfuʋuri murwi uyu ndicienda kwauri, newe kuti urege kupfuʋura murwi uyu, neshoŋgwe iyi, ucienda kwandiri, kuti tiitirane ɀakaipa.
Mŋari waAbrahama, Mŋari waNahori, Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋaʋo, ŋgaatoŋge pakati peɗu. Jakobo akapika naiye waityiwa naIsaka, ɓaɓa ʋake.
Ipapo Jakobo akaɓayira ciɓayiro mugomo; akakoka hama dzake kuti ʋadye ɀokudya; ʋakadya ɀokudya, ʋakaʋata ʋusiku mugomo.
Rabani akamuka maŋgwanani, akaȿeta ʋanakomana ʋake naʋakunda ʋake, akaʋaropafadza; Rabani akabva, akadzokera kumusha kwake.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaenda nenzira yake, ʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari ndokusoŋgana naye.
Wakati aciʋaʋona, Jakobo akati: Ihondo yaMŋari; akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Mahanaimi.
Ɀino Jakobo akatuma nhume pamberi pake kunaEsau, mukuru wake, kunyika yeSeiri, munyika yeEdomi.
Akaʋaraira, akati: Taurai nashe waŋgu, Esau, muti: Ɀanzi nomuranda wenyu Jakobo: Ndakaŋga ndiri mutorwa kunaRabani, ndikagara’ko kuȿikira ɀino;
ndineŋombe, nemboŋgoro, namakwai, naʋaranda, naʋarandakadzi; ndatuma ʋanhu kuzoʋudza ishe waŋgu
Nhume dzikadzokera kunaJakobo, dzikati: Takandoȿika kumukuru wenyu Esau; naiye unoʋuya kuzosoŋgana nemi anaʋarume ʋanamazana manna.
Jakobo akatya kwaɀo, akatambudzika; akaparadzanisa ʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, namakwai neŋombe namakamera, akaita mapoka maʋiri;
akati: Kana Esau akaȿika kunerimŋe ɓoka, akariparadza, ɓoka rakasara riŋgatiza.
Ɀino Jakobo akati: Imi, Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu Abrahama, naMŋari waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu Isaka; imi Jehova, ndimi makati kwandiri: Dzokera kunyika yako, nokuhama dzako, ndigokuitira ɀakanaka;
handina‐kufanirwa nenyasha dzenyu dzose nokutendeka kwenyu kwose kwamakaitira muranda wenyu; nokuti ndakayambuka Joridani urwu netȿimbo yaŋgu yoga; ɀino ndaʋa mapoka maʋiri.
Ƌondirwirai paruʋoko rwomukuru waŋgu, paruʋoko rwaEsau; nokuti ndinomutya, kuti ucaʋuya akandiparadza ini, namai, pamŋe cete naʋana.
Ndimi makati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndicakuitira ɀakanaka, ndicaita ʋo rudzi rwako sejeca reguŋgwa, risiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa nokuwanda kwaro.
Akaʋata’po ʋusiku ubgo; akatora ɀimŋe kuneɀaakaŋga anaɀo, kuti ciʋe cipo kunaEsau, mukuru wake;
ɀaiti: Nhunɀi dzembudzi dzinamazana maʋiri, nenhoŋgo dzinamakumi maʋiri, namatunɀi amakwai anamazana maʋiri, namakondobge anamakumi maʋiri,
namakamera anokamŋa anamakumi matatu nemhuru dzawo, nemhou dzeŋombe dzinamakumi manna, nehando dzeŋombe dzinegumi, namakadzi emboŋgoro anamakumi maʋiri, nemhuru dzinegumi.
Akaɀipa mumaʋoko aʋaranda ʋake, ɓoka rimŋe nerimŋe riri roga; akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Yambukai pamberi paŋgu, musiye runhambo pakati peɓoka rimŋe nerimŋe.
Akaraira wokutaŋga, akati: Kana Esau, mukuru waŋgu, akasoŋgana newe, akabvunza, aciti: Uri munhu waaniko — Unoendepiko — Iɀi ɀiri pamberi pako ndeɀaani?
Uti: Ndeɀomuranda wenyu Jakobo; cipo cakatumirwa ishe waŋgu Esau; tarirai, naiye uri mashure meɗu ʋo;
akaraira ʋo wecipiri nowecitatu, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋera mapoka, akati: Kana mukamuwana Esau, mutaure kwaari muciɗaro;
muti: Tarirai, naiye muranda wenyu Jakobo uri mashure meɗu. Nokuti wakati: Ndicambomunyaradza necipo cinondituŋgamirira, ndigoti ndoʋona ciso cake; ɀimŋe ucandigamucira.
Naiɀoɀo cipo cakayambuswa mberi kwake; asi iye amene wakaʋata ʋusiku ubgo pakati peʋuŋgano.
Ɀino wakamuka ʋusiku ubgo, akatora ʋakadzi ʋake ʋaʋiri naʋarandakadzi ʋake ʋaʋiri, naʋana ʋake ʋanegumi nomumŋe, akayambuka pazambuko reJaboko.
Akaʋatora, akaʋayambusa parukoʋa, akayambusa ʋo ɀaakaŋga anaɀo.
Asi Jakobo wakasara ari oga; mumŋe murume akaita mitsimba naye kuȿikira ʋutoŋga bgucitȿuka.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti haagoni kumukunda, akamuɓata pahudyu, hudyu ikaniŋguka nemitsimba naye.
Iye akati: Cindirega ndiende, nokuti ʋutoŋga bgotȿuka. Iye akati: Handiŋgakuregiyi kuti muende, musati mandiropafadza.
Akati kwaari: Zita rako ndianiko — Iye akati: Jakobo.
Akati: Zita rako haricazonzi Jakobo, asi Israeri; nokuti wakarwa naMŋari naʋanhu, ukakunda.
Jakobo akamubvunza, akati: Ndiʋudzei ʋo zita renyu. Iye akati: Unondibvunzireiko zita raŋgu — Akamuropafadza ipapo.
Ɀino Jakobo akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Penieri; nokuti wakati: Ndakaʋonana naMŋari, ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ʋukaceŋgetwa.
Zuʋa rikamuɓuɗira acipfuʋura napaPenieri; akakamhina pahudyu yake.
Naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋadyi nanhasi runda rehudyu riri pafupa rehudyu; nokuti wakaɓata hudyu yaJakobo parunda rehudyu.
Ɀino Jakobo akasimudza meso ake, akatarira, akaʋona Esau aciʋuya anaʋarume ʋanamazana manna. Akagoʋera ʋana kunaRakeri naRea naʋarandakadzi ʋaʋiri.
Akaisa ʋarandakadzi naʋana ʋaʋo mberi, Rea naʋana ʋake shure kwaʋo, naRakeri naJosefa pakupedzisira.
Iye amene akapfuʋura aciʋatuŋgamirira, akakotamira pasi kaŋomŋe, kuȿikira asweɗera pedyo nomukuru wake.
Ipapo Esau akamhanyira kundosoŋgana naye, akamumbundikira, akawira pamutsipa wake, ndokumuȿeta; ʋakacema ʋose.
Akasimudza meso ake, akaʋona ʋakadzi naʋana, akati: Aʋa ʋaunaʋo ndiʋanani — Iye akati: Ndiʋo ʋana ʋakapiwa muranda wenyu naMŋari nenyasha dzake.
Ʋarandakadzi ʋakasweɗera, iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakakotama.
NaRea naʋana ʋake ʋakasweɗera ʋo, ʋakakotama; pashure Josefa naRakeri ʋakasweɗera, ʋakakotama.
Akati: Ko ɓoka iri rose randasoŋgana naro ndereiko — Iye akati: Kuti ndiwane nyasha kunashe waŋgu.
Esau akati: Ini ndineɀizhinji, munuŋuna waŋgu; iɀo ɀaunaɀo, ŋgaɀiʋe ɀako.
Jakobo akati: Kwete, kana ndawana nyasha kwamuri ɀino, ndinokumbiro kuti mugamucire cipo caŋgu paruʋoko rwaŋgu; nokuti ndaʋona ciso cenyu, cikaita seciso caMŋari, mukafara neni.
Gamucirai henyu cipo caŋgu camunopiwa; nokuti Mŋari wakandiitira nyasha, ndineɀizhinji. Akamugwaririra, akazocitora.
Akati: Ŋgatipfuʋure heɗu parwendo rweɗu, tiende, ini ndicakutuŋgamirira.
Iye akati kwaari: Ishe waŋgu unoziʋa kuti ʋana ʋaciri ʋaɗuku, ʋuye kuti makwai neŋombe ɀandinaɀo ɀinomŋisa; kana ʋakaɀitinhisa zuʋa rimŋe, ɀipfuwo ɀose ɀicafa.
Ishe waŋgu ŋgaapinde hake mberi kwomuranda wake; ini ndicanatso‐ɀisesedza seɀaɀinogona kufamba, iɀi ɀipfuwo ɀiri pamberi paŋgu, naʋana seɀaʋanogona kufamba, kudzimana ndaȿika kunashe waŋgu paSeiri.
Esau akati: Ɀino ŋgandisiye kwauri ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋandinaʋo. Iye akati: Mucaitireiko kuɗaro — Ndiwane haŋgu nyasha kunashe waŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo Esau akadzoka zuʋa iro, akaenda Seiri.
Asi Jakobo wakaenda Sukoti, akaɀiʋakira imba, akaitira ɀipfuwo ɀake mataŋga; naiɀoɀo zita renɀimbo iyo rakanzi Sukoti.
Jakobo akaȿika ɀakanaka kuguta reShekemi, riri panyika yeKanani, pakubva kwake paPadani‐arami; akadzika matente ake pakatarisana neguta.
Akateŋga rutiʋi rwenyika, paakaŋga apetenura tente rake, kuʋana ʋaHamori, ɓaɓa ʋaShekemi, nezana remari.
Akaʋaka’po artari, akaritumidza zita rinonzi Eri‐erohe‐Israeri.
Ɀino Dina, mŋanasikana waRea, waakaɓerekera Jakobo, wakaɓuɗa kundoʋona ʋakunda ʋenyika iyo.
Ipapo Shekemi, mŋanakomana waHamori, muHivi, mucinda wenyika, wakamuʋona; akamutora, akaʋata naye, akamunyadza.
Mŋeya wake ukanamatira Dina, mukunda waJakobo, akamuɗa musikana uyo, akataura ɀakafadza mŋoyo womusikana.
Ɀino Shekemi akataura naɓaɓa ʋake, Hamori, akati: Nditorerei musikana uyo, aʋe mukadzi waŋgu.
Ɀino Jakobo wakanzwa kuti wakacinya Dina, mukunda wake; ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋari kuɀipfuwo ɀake kusaŋgo, Jakobo akanyarara hake kuȿikira ʋaʋuya.
Hamori, ɓaɓa ʋaShekemi, ʋakaenda kunaJakobo kundotaurirana naye.

Ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo ʋakaʋuya ʋacibva kusaŋgo; ɀino ʋarume aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋaneshuŋgu kwaɀo, ʋakatsamŋa ɀikuru, nokuti wakaŋga aita cinhu cakaipa kwaɀo pakati paʋaIsraeri kuti aʋate nomukunda waJakobo; cinhu ico cakaŋga cisiŋgafaniri kuitwa.
Ɀino Hamori akataurirana naʋo, akati: Mŋeya womŋanakomana waŋgu, Shekemi, unoshuʋa mukunda wenyu; ɗomupai henyu iye, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Wananai henyu nesu, tipei ʋakunda ʋenyu, mugotora ʋakunda ʋeɗu.
Garai henyu nesu, nyika icaʋa pamberi penyu; garai’mo, mushambadzire, muɀiʋuŋganidzire’mo fuma.
Ipapo Shekemi akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake nokuhanɀadzi dzake: Ndiwane haŋgu nyasha kwamuri; ɀamunoreʋa kwandiri, ndicakupai.
Kumbirai henyu kwandiri roʋoro huru necipo cikuru; ɀamunoreʋa kwandiri ndicakupai; asi ndipei musikana aʋe mukadzi waŋgu.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaJakobo ʋakapindura Shekemi naHamori, ɓaɓa ʋake, nokunyeŋgera, ʋakataura nokuti wakaŋga acinya hanɀadzi yaʋo Dina,
ʋakati kwaʋari: Hatiŋgagoni kuita cinhu ici, kuti tipe munhu usina‐kudziŋgiswa hanɀadzi yeɗu, nokuti iɀeɀo ɀiŋgatinyadza;
tiŋgatenderana nemi kwoga
ipapo isu ticakupai ʋakunda ʋeɗu, nesu ʋo ticatora ʋakunda ʋenyu; tigare nemi, tiʋe saʋanhu ʋamŋe.
Kana musiŋgatitereri, kuti mudziŋgiswe, ticatora mukunda weɗu, tikabva.
Mashoko aʋo akafadza Hamori naShekemi, mŋanakomana waHamori.
Jaya harina‐kunonoka kuita cinhu ico, nokuti wakaŋga acifarira mukunda waJakobo; naiye wakaŋga acikudzwa kupfuʋura ʋose ʋeimba yose yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino Hamori naShekemi, mŋanakomana wake, ʋakaʋuya kusuʋo reguta raʋo, ʋakataurirana naʋanhu ʋeguta raʋo, ʋakati:
Ʋanhu aʋa ʋanorugare nesu; naiɀoɀo ŋgaʋagare haʋo munyika
Asi ʋanhu aʋa ʋacatenderana nesu kugara nesu, nokuita saʋanhu ʋamŋe nesu, kwoga kana ticiita cinhu ici, kuti ʋarume ʋose kwatiri ʋadziŋgiswe, seɀaʋakadziŋgiswa iʋo.
Ko ŋombe dzaʋo, nefuma yaʋo, neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo ɀose haɀicaʋi ɀeɗu here — Ŋgatitenderane naʋo kwoga, ʋagogara nesu.
Ɀino ʋose ʋaiɓuɗa pasuʋo reguta rake ʋakaterera Hamori, naShekemi, mŋanakomana wake; ipapo ʋarume ʋose ʋakadziŋgiswa, ʋose ʋaiɓuɗa pasuʋo reguta rake.

Ɀino pazuʋa retatu, ʋaciri pakurwadziwa, ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri ʋaJakobo, Simeoni naRevi, hanɀadzi dzaDina, ʋakatora mumŋe nomumŋe munondo wake, ʋakapinda muguta ʋanhu ʋasiŋgarindiri, ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋose.
Ʋakaʋuraya naHamori naShekemi, mŋanakomana wake, neminondo inopinza, ʋakatora Dina mumba maShekemi, ʋakaenda.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo ʋakaenda kunaʋakaʋurawa, ʋakapamba guta, nemhaka yokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacinya hanɀadzi yaʋo.
Ʋakatora makwai aʋo, neŋombe dzaʋo, nemboŋgoro dzaʋo, neɀakaŋga ɀiri muguta, neɀakaŋga ɀiri kusaŋgo;
ʋakatapa fuma yaʋo yose, naʋana ʋaʋo ʋaɗuku, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, ʋakaɀiita mhambara, neɀinhu ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri mudzimba.

Ipapo Jakobo akati kunaSimeoni naRevi: Manditorera mufaro, ɀamandinhuwisa pakati paʋanhu ʋanogara munyika ino, pakati paʋaKanani naʋaPeresi; ini ɀandinaʋanhu ʋashoma, ʋacandiʋuŋganira, ʋakandiʋuraya; ndicaparadzwa ini naʋeimba yaŋgu.
Iʋo ʋakati: Iye wagoitireiko nehanɀadzi yeɗu seɀinoitwa necifeʋe?
Ɀino Mŋari wakati kunaJakobo: Simuka, ukwire Beteri, undogara’ko; uitire Mŋari artari’po, iye wakaɀiratidza kwauri paŋguʋa yokutiza kwako pamberi paEsau, mukuru wako.
Ipapo Jakobo akati kumhuri yake, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanaye: Bvisai ʋamŋari ʋedzimŋe ndudzi ʋari pakati penyu, ɀinatsei, mufuke dzimŋe ŋguʋo;
tisimuke, tikwire Beteri; ipapo ndicaitira Mŋari artari, iye wakaŋga aneni panzira yandakaŋga ndicifamba nayo.
Iʋo ʋakapa Jakobo ʋamŋari ʋose ʋedzimŋe ndudzi ʋakaŋga ʋari pamaʋoko aʋo, neɀindori ɀakaŋga ɀiri panzeʋe dzaʋo; Jakobo akaɀicerera pasi pomuti womuouki wakaŋga uri paShekemi.
ʋakapfuʋura norwendo rwaʋo, maguta akaŋga akaʋakomba akatya Mŋari kwaɀo, ʋakasateʋerera ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo.
Jakobo akaȿika Ruzi, guta riri panyika yeKanani (rimŋe zita ndiBeteri), iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo.
Akaʋaka’po artari, akatumidza zita renɀimbo iyo Eri‐beteri; nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga aɀiratidza kwaari ipapo, paŋguʋa yokutiza kwake pamberi pomukuru wake.
Debora, mureri waRebeka, akafa, akaʋigwa zasi kweBeteri munyasi momuouki; zita rapo rikanzi Aroni‐bakuti.
Ipapo Mŋari akaɀiratidza ɀe kunaJakobo pakubva kwake Padani‐arami, akamuropafadza.
Mŋari akati kwaari: Zita rako ndiJakobo; zita rako haricazonzi Jakobo, asi zita rako ricanzi Israeri; akamutumidza zita rinonzi Israeri.
Ɀino Mŋari akati kwaari: Ndini Mŋari wamasimba ose; ɓereka ʋana, uwande; rudzi neɓoka rendudzi ɀicaɓuɗa kwauri, namadzishe acaɓuɗa paciʋuno cako;
nyika yandakapa Abrahama naIsaka, ndicakupa iyo; ʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera ndicaʋapa nyika iyo.
Mŋari akakwira, akabva kwaari, ipapo paakaŋga acitaura naye.
Jakobo akamisa shoŋgwe ipapo paakaŋga ataura naye, shoŋgwe yebge; akaɗurura pamsoro payo cipiriso cinoɗururwa, akaɗira ʋo mafuta pamsoro payo.
Jakobo akatumidza nɀimbo iyo, pakaŋga pataura Mŋari naye, zita rinonzi Beteri.
Ɀino ʋakafamba ʋacibva Beteri; cinhambo cakaŋga cici’po cokuȿika Efrati; Rakeri akaɀara, akatambudzika pakupona kwake.
Wakati acitambudzika pakupona kwake, mbuya ʋakati kwaari: Usatya hako, nokuti ɀino ucaʋa nomumŋe mŋanakomana ɀe.
Ɀino mŋeya wake wakati uciɓuɗa (nokuti wakafa), akamutumidza Benoni; asi ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamutumidza Benjamini.
Rakeri akafa, akaʋigwa panzira inoenda Efrati (rimŋe zita ndiBetrehema).
Jakobo akamisa shoŋgwe pamsoro perinda rake, ndiyo shoŋgwe yerinda raRakeri kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Israeri akafamba, akapfuʋurira mberi, akadzika tente rake neseri kweshoŋgwe yeEderi.
Ɀino Israeri agere munyika iyo, Rubeni akandoʋata naBirha, muroŋgo waɓaɓa ʋake, Israeri akaɀinzwa.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo ʋaiʋa gumi naʋaʋiri;
ʋanakomana ʋaRea: Rubeni, ɗaŋgwe raJakobo, naSimeoni, naRevi, naJuda, naIsakari, naZeburuni;
ʋanakomana ʋaRakeri: Josefa naBenjamini;
ʋanakomana ʋaBirha, murandakadzi waRakeri: Dani naNaftari;
ʋanakomana ʋaZirpa, murandakadzi waRea: Gadi naAsheri. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo, ʋaakaɀarirwa paPadani‐arami.
Jakobo akaȿika kunaIsaka, ɓaɓa ʋake paMamre, paKiriyati‐arba (rimŋe zita ndi Hebroni), paigara Abrahama naIsaka ʋari ʋatorwa.
Mazuʋa aIsaka akaŋga ari makore anezana namakumi masere.
Mŋeya waIsaka ukaɓuɗa, akafa, akasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake, akwegura, aʋa namazuʋa mazhinji; Esau naJakobo, ʋanakomana ʋake, ʋakamuʋiga.
Ndiwo marudzi aEsau (rimŋe zita ndiEdomi):
Esau wakawana ʋakadzi ʋake kuʋakunda ʋeKanani, ʋaiti: Ada, mukunda waEroni, muHeti, naOhoribama, mukunda waAna, mukunda waZibeoni, muHivi;
naBasemati, mukunda waIshmaeri, hanɀadzi yaNebayoti.
Ada wakaɓerekera Esau Erifazi; Basemati wakaɓereka Reuri;
Ohoribama wakaɓereka Jeushi, naJarami, naKora; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaEsau, ʋaakaɓerekerwa panyika yeKanani.

Ɀino Esau wakatora ʋakadzi ʋake, naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋakunda ʋake, naʋanhu ʋose ʋeimba yake, neɀipfuwo ɀake, neŋombe dzake dzose, nefuma yake yose yaakaŋga aʋuŋganidza munyika yeKanani, akaenda kunyika iri kure nomunuŋuna wake Jakobo.
Nokuti fuma yaʋo yakaŋga yawanda, naiɀoɀo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kugara panɀimbo imŋe; nyika yoʋutorwa bgaʋo yakaŋga isiŋgaʋariŋgani nokuɗa kweɀipfuwo ɀaʋo.
Esau akandogara kugomo reSeiri; Esau ndiye Edomi.
Marudzi aEsau, ɓaɓa ʋaʋaEdomi, kugomo reSeiri, ndiwo:
Mazita aʋanakomana ʋaEsau ndiwo: Erifazi, mŋanakomana waAda, mukadzi waEsau, naReuri, mŋanakomana waBasemati, mukadzi waEsau.
Ʋanakomana ʋaErifazi ʋaiʋa Temani, naOmari, naZefo, naGatami, naKenazi.
Timna wakaŋga ari muroŋgo waErifazi, mŋanakomana waEsau; iye wakaɓerekera Erifazi Amareki; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAda, mukadzi waEsau.
Ʋanakomana ʋaReuri ndiʋo: Nahati naZera, naShama naMiza; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBasemati, mukadzi waEsau.
Ʋanakomana ʋaOhoribama, mukunda waAna, mukunda waZibeoni, mukadzi waEsau, ndiʋo: Iye wakaɓerekera Esau Jeushi, naJarami, naKora.
Awa ndiwo madzishe pakati paʋana ʋaEsau: Ʋanakomana ʋaErifazi, ɗaŋgwe raEsau: Ishe Temani, nashe Omari, nashe Zefo, nashe Kenazi,
nashe Kora, nashe Gatami, nashe Amareki; ndiwo madzishe okwaErifazi munyika yeEdomi; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAda.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaReuri, mŋanakomana waEsau: Ishe Nahati, nashe Zera, nashe Shama, nashe Miza; ndiwo madzishe okwaReuri munyika yeEdomi; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBasemati, mukadzi waEsau.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaOhoribama, mukadzi waEsau: Ishe Jeushi, nashe Jarami, nashe Kora; ndiwo madzishe okwaOhoribama, mukunda waAna, mukadzi waEsau.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaEsau, ndiwo madzishe aʋo. Ndiye Edomi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaSeiri, muHori, ʋaigara panyika iyo: Rotani, naShobari, naZibeoni, naAna,
naDishoni, naEzeri, naDishani; ndiwo madzishe okuʋaHori, ʋanakomana ʋaSeiri munyika yeEdomi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRotani, ʋaiʋa Hori, naHemani; hanɀadzi yaRotani waiʋa Timna.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaShobari: Arvani, naManahati, naEbari, naShefo, naOnami.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaZibeoni: Aja, naAna; ndiye Ana wakawana matsime emvura inopisa kusaŋgo, acifudza mboŋgoro dzaZibeoni, ɓaɓa ʋake.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAna: Dishoni, naOhoribama, mukunda waAna.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaDishoni: Hemdani, naEshbani, naItrani, naKerani.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaEzeri: Birhani, naZaavani, naAkani.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaDishani: Uzi naArani.
Awa ndiwo madzishe okuʋaHori: Ishe Rotani, nashe Shobari, nashe Zibeoni, nashe Ana,
nashe Dishoni, nashe Ezeri, nashe Dishani; ndiwo madzishe okuʋaHori, namarudzi aʋo munyika yeSeiri.
Awa ndiwo madzimambo akaɓata ʋushe munyika yeEdomi, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacigere kuʋa namadzimambo:
Bera, mŋanakomana waBeori, wakaɓata ʋushe paEdomi; zita reguta rake rainzi Dinhaba.
Akafa, Jobabi, mŋanakomana waZera weBozra akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake.
Jobabi akafa, Hushami wenyika yaʋaTemani akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake.
Hushami akafa, Hadadi, mŋanakomana waBedadi, uya wakaʋuraya Midiani kusaŋgo reMoabi, akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake; zita reguta rake rainzi Aviti.
Hadadi akafa, Samra weMasreka akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake.
Samra akafa, Shauri weRehoboti paRwizi akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake.
Shauri akafa, Baari‐hanani, mŋanakomana waAkbori akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake.
Baari‐hanani, mŋanakomana waAkbori, akafa, Hadari akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake; zita reguta rake rainzi Pau; zita romukadzi wake rainzi Mehetaberi, mukunda waMatredi, mukunda waMehazahadi.
Awa ndiwo mazita amadzishe okwaEsau, nedzimba dzaʋo, namaguta aʋo, namazita aʋo: Ishe Timna, nashe Arva, nashe Jeteti;
nashe Ohoribama, nashe Era, nashe Pinoni;
nashe Kenazi, nashe Temani, nashe Mibzari;
nashe Magdieri, nashe Irami; ndiwo madzishe aEdomi, paʋakagara munyika yakaŋga iri yaʋo. Ndiye Esau, ɓaɓa ʋaEdomi.
Ɀino Jakobo wakagara munyika yoʋutorwa bgaɓaɓa ʋake, munyika yeKanani.

Marudzi aJakobo ndiwo: Josefa wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namanomŋe, akafudza makwai pamŋe cete naʋakoma ʋake; wakaŋga aciri mukomana pamŋe cete naʋanakomana ʋaBirha, naʋanakomana ʋaZirpa, ʋakadzi ʋaɓaɓa ʋake; Josefa akasiʋaʋudzisira kunaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ɀino Israeri wakaŋga aciɗa Josefa kupfuʋura ʋana ʋake ʋose, nokuti wakaŋga ari mŋanakomana woʋutana bgake; akamuitira ŋguʋo yakaŋga yakareɓa inamaʋoko.
Ʋakoma ʋake ʋakaʋona kuti ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋanomuɗa kupfuʋura ʋakoma ʋake ʋose; ʋakamuʋeŋga, ʋakasagona kutaura naye nomufaro.
Ɀino Josefa akarota hope, akaʋudza ʋakoma ʋake, ipapo ʋakanyanya kumuʋeŋga.
Akati kwaʋari: Inzwai ʋo hope dzaŋgu dzandarota.
Tarirai, takaŋga ticisuŋga ɀisote mumunda, ʋonei cisote caŋgu cikasimuka, cikaramba cimire; ndikaʋona ɀisote ɀenyu ɀicikomba caŋgu, ɀikakotama pamberi pecisote caŋgu.
Ʋakoma ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Ko iwe ucaɓata ʋushe pamsoro peɗu kanhi — Ko iwe ucaʋa nesimba pamsoro peɗu kanhi — Ʋakanyanya kumuʋeŋga nokuɗa kwokurota kwake nokwamashoko ake.
akapamha kurota ɀe, akaʋudza ʋakoma ʋake, akati: Tarirai, ndarota ɀe dzimŋe hope; ndakaʋona zuʋa, nomŋedzi, nenyeredzi dzinegumi neimŋe, dzicikotamira pamberi paŋgu.
Akaʋudza ɓaɓa ʋake naʋakoma ʋake iɀoɀo; ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamutuka, ʋakati kwaari: Kurota kwako uku kwawarota kurota kunyi — Ini namai ʋako naʋakoma ʋako ticaʋuya tikakotama pasi pamberi pako kanhi?
Ʋakoma ʋake ʋakamugoɗora; asi ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakaceŋgeta shoko iro.
Ɀino ʋakoma ʋake ʋakandofudza makwai aɓaɓa ʋaʋo paShekemi.
Israeri akati kunaJosefa: Ʋakoma ʋako haʋafudzi makwai paShekemi here — Ʋuya ndikutumire kwaʋari. Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati kwaari: Ɀino, cienda undotarira kana ʋakoma ʋako ʋakafara, namakwai kana akafara ʋo; ugodzoka kuzondiʋudza. Naiɀoɀo wakamutuma, ari pamupata weHebroni, akandoȿika Shekemi.
Ɀino mumŋe murume wakamuwana acidzuŋgaira musaŋgo; murume akamubvunza, akati: Unotȿakeiko?
Iye akati: Ndinotȿaka ʋakoma ʋaŋgu; ɗondiʋudza hako kwaʋanofudza makwai.
Murume akati: Ʋabva pano, nokuti ndakaʋanzwa ʋaciti: Ŋgatiende Dotani. Josefa akateʋera ʋakoma ʋake, akandoʋawana paDotani.
Iʋo ʋakamuʋona aciri kure; ɀino asati aȿika kwaʋari, ʋakaraŋgana kuti ʋamuʋuraye.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Hoyo, muroti uya woʋuya.
Ʋuyai ɀino timuʋuraye, timukandire munerimŋe ramakomba
Rubeni akaɀinzwa, akamurwira mumaʋoko aʋo, akati: Ŋgatirege kumuʋuraya.
Rubeni akati kwaʋari: Musaɗurura ropa; mumukandirei mugomba iri riri musaŋgo, asi regai kutambanudza maʋoko enyu kwaari; kuti amurwire pamaʋoko aʋo, agomudzosera kunaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino Josefa wakati aȿika kuʋakoma ʋake, ʋakabvisira Josefa ŋguʋo yake, ŋguʋo iya yakaŋga yakareɓa inamaʋoko, yaakaŋga akafuka;
ʋakamutora, ʋakamukandira mugomba; gomba rakaŋga risinecinhu, maŋga musinemvura.

Ʋakagara pasi, ʋakadya ɀokudya; ɀino ʋakasimudza meso aʋo, ʋakatarira, ʋakaʋona ɓoka raʋaIshmaeri ʋacifamba, ʋacibva Gireadi, makamera aʋo akatakura ɀinhu ɀinonhuwira, nebarsami, nemura, ʋacindoɀiisa Egipita.
Ɀino Juda akati kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake: Tiŋgawaneiko kana tikaʋuraya munuŋuna weɗu ticiʋanza ropa rake?
Ʋuyai timuteŋgese kuʋaIshmaeri; maʋoko eɗu arege kuʋa kwaari; nokuti munuŋuna weɗu, nyama imŋe nesu. Ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamuterera.
Ɀino ʋateŋgesi ʋaʋaMidiani ʋakapfuʋura’po, ʋakakwidza Josefa ʋacimuɓuɗisa mugomba, ʋakateŋgesa Josefa kuʋaIshmaeri namashekeri anamakumi maʋiri
Ɀino Rubeni wakadzokera kugomba, akawana Josefa asisi’mo mugomba; akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake.
Akadzokera kuʋanuŋuna ʋake, akati: Mŋana haaci’po; ini ɀino ndicaendepiko?
Ɀino ʋakatora ŋguʋo yaJosefa, ʋakaʋuraya nhoŋgo yembudzi, ʋakanyika ŋguʋo muropa;
ʋakatumira ŋguʋo iyo yakareɓa inamaʋoko kunaɓaɓa ʋaʋo, ʋakati: Tanoŋga cinhu ici; fananidzai ɀakanaka kana iri ŋguʋo yomŋanakomana wenyu, kana isati iri iyo.
Iʋo ʋakafananidza, ʋakati: Iŋguʋo yomŋanakomana waŋgu; wadyiwa necikara; Josefa ɀirokwaɀo waparadzwa.
Jakobo akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akasimira magumbu paciʋuno cake, akacema mŋanakomana wake mazuʋa mazhinji.
Ʋanakomana ʋake ʋose naʋakunda ʋake ʋose ʋakasimuka ʋakamunyaradza; asi wakaramba kunyaradzwa, akati: Ndicaɓurukira kubgiro kumŋanakomana waŋgu, ndicicema. Ƃaɓa ʋake ʋakamuwuŋgudzira.
Ɀino ʋaMidiani ʋakandomuteŋgesa Egipita kunaPotifari, muranda waFarao, mukuru waʋarindi.
Neŋguʋa iyo Juda wakabva kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, akaɓuruka, akatsaukira kunomumŋe murume muAdurami, wainzi Hira.
Juda akaʋona’po mukunda womumŋe munhu muKanani, wainzi Shua, akamutora, akapinda kwaari.
Iye akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Eri.
Akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Onani.
Akaʋa nemimba ɀe, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Shera; iye wakaŋga ari paKezibi
Ɀino Juda wakatorera ɗaŋgwe rake Eri mukadzi wainzi Tamari.
Asi Eri, ɗaŋgwe raJuda, wakaŋga ari munhu wakaipa pamberi paJehova; Jehova akamuʋuraya.
Ɀino Juda akati kunaOnani: Pinda kumukadzi womukoma wako, umuwane, umuitire ɀakafanira munuŋuna womurume, umutsire mukoma wako ʋana.
Ɀino Onani wakaziʋa kuti ʋana aʋo haʋaŋgaʋi ʋake; naiɀoɀo wakati kana opinda kumukadzi womukoma wake, worashira mbeu pasi, kuti arege kupa mukoma wake ʋana.
Cinhu ici caakaita cakaŋga cakaipa pamberi paJehova; akamuʋuraya naiye ʋo.

Ipapo Juda akati kunaTamari, mukadzi womŋana wake: Cigara hako uri cirikadzi paimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, kuȿikira Shera, mŋanakomana waŋgu, akura; nokuti wakati: Ɀimŋe uŋgafa saʋakoma ʋake. Tamari akandogara kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake.
Mazuʋa mazhinji akati apfuʋura, mukunda waShua, mukadzi waJuda, akafa; ɀino Juda wakati anyaradzwa, akakwira kuʋaʋeʋuri ʋamakwai ake paTimna, iye naHira, shamŋari yake muAdurami.
Tamari akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarira ɓaɓa ʋomurume wako ʋanokwira Timna kundoʋeʋura makwai aʋo;
ipapo iye akabvisa ŋguʋo dzoʋucirikadzi bgake, akaɀifukidza necokufukidzira cake, akaɀiputira, akagara pasuʋo reEnaimi,
Ɀino Juda wakati acimuʋona, akati cifeʋe, nokuti wakaŋga afukidza ciso cake.
Akatsaukira kwaari panzira, akati: Ƌoʋuya, ndipinde kwauri; nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi, kuti mukadzi womŋanakomana wake. Iye akati: Unogondipeiko, kuti upinde kwandiri?
Akati: Ndicakutumira mbudzana inobva kuɀipfuwo ɀaŋgu. Akati: Ucandipa ruɓatso kuȿikira waituma here?
Akati: Ndicagokupa ruɓatso rweiko — Iye akati: Cimhete cako, norwonzi rwako, netȿimbo yako iri paruʋoko rwako. Akamupa iɀoɀo, akapinda kwaari, akaʋa nemimba naye.
Akasimuka, akaenda, akabvisa cokufukidzira cake, akafuka ŋguʋo dzoʋucirikadzi bgake.
Ɀino Juda akatuma mbudzana noruʋoko rweshamŋari yake, muAdurami, kuti atore ruɓatso paruʋoko rwomukadzi, asi haana‐kumuwana
Akabvunza ʋanhu ʋokwake, aciti: Ciripiko cifeʋe ciya, cakaŋga ciri paEnaimi panzira — Ʋakati: Kwakaŋga kusinecifeʋe pano.
Akadzokera kunaJuda, akati: Handina‐kumuwana; naʋanhu ʋoko ʋakati: Kwakaŋga kusinecifeʋe pano.
Ipapo Juda akati: Ŋgaaɀitore hake, kuti tirege kunyadziswa; tarira, ndatuma mbudzana iyi, iwe ukasamuwana.
Ɀino mŋedzi ineŋge mitatu yakati yapfuʋura, Juda akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tamari, mukadzi womŋanakomana wako, wakaita ʋupombge; waʋa nemimba noʋupombge bgake. Juda akati: Ʋuyai naye, apiswe.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciʋuya naye, akatuma shoko kunaɓaɓa ʋomurume wake, aciti: Ndinemimba nomurume unenhumbi idzi; akati: Ƌocerekedzai kuti iɀi ndeɀani, ɀinoti, cimhete, norwonzi, netȿimbo.
Juda akaɀiziʋa, akati: Iye wakarurama kukunde’ni, nokuti handina‐kumupa Shera, mŋanakomana waŋgu. Haana‐kuzomuziʋa ɀe.
Ɀino neŋguʋa yokuɓereka kwake ʋana ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋari muɗumbu rake.
Ɀino wakati aciɓereka, mumŋe akaɓuɗisa ruʋoko; ipapo mbuya ʋakatora rwonzi rutȿuku, ʋakarusuŋgira paruʋoko rwake, ʋaciti: Uyu wataŋga kuɓuɗa.
Ɀino uyu wakati adzosera ruʋoko rwake, munuŋuna wake akaɓuɗa; iʋo ʋakati: Waɀipasanurira seiko — Naiɀoɀo akamutumidza zita rinonzi Perezi.
Pashure mukoma wake akaɓuɗa, wakaŋga anorwonzi rutȿuku paruʋoko rwake; zita rake rikatumidzwa Zera.
Josefa wakaŋga aɓurusirwa Egipita; Potifari, gota raFarao, mukuru waʋarindi, muEgipita, akamuteŋga pamaʋoko aʋaIshmaeri, ʋakaŋga ʋamuɓurusira Egipita.
Jehova ɀino wakaŋga anaJosefa, akaramba acikwirira; akagara mumba matenzi wake, muEgipita.
Tenzi wake akaʋona kuti Jehova unaye, ʋuye kuti Jehova wakafambisa ɀakanaka ɀose ɀaaiita namaʋoko ake.
Josefa akawana nyasha kwaari, akamuɓatira; iye akamuita mutariri weimba yake; ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo akaɀiisa pamaʋoko ake.

Ɀino kubva pakuitwa kwake mutariri weimba yake nowaɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, Jehova akaropafadza imba yomuEgipita nokuɗa kwaJosefa; kuropafadza kwaJehova kwakaŋga kuri pamsoro peɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo mumba nokumunda.
Waisiya ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo pamaʋoko aJosefa; iye anaye, haazairaŋgarira cinhu, asi ɀokudya ɀake ɀoga ɀaaidya. Ɀino Josefa wakaŋga anomuʋiri wakanaka, akanaka ʋo paciso.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo mukadzi watenzi wake wakatarira Josefa, akati: Ʋata neni.
Asi iye wakaramba, akati kumukadzi watenzi wake: Tarirai, nokuɗa kwaŋgu tenzi waŋgu haaraŋgariri ɀiri mumba, asi wakaisa ɀose ɀaanaɀo pamaʋoko aŋgu;
hakunomukuru kwandiri paimba ino; haana‐kundidziʋisa cinhu, asi imi moga; nokuti muri mukadzi wake; ɀino ndiŋgaita seiko cinhu ici cakaipa ɀikuru nditadzire Mŋari?
Ɀino wakati ataura naJosefa mazuʋa ose, iye asiŋgamutereri kuti aʋate naye, kana kuʋa naye,
neŋguʋa iyo akapinda mumba kuti aɓate‐ɓasa rake; makaŋga musinaʋamŋe ʋarume ʋeimba imomo.
Ipapo akamuɓata ŋguʋo yake, akati: Ʋata neni; iye akasiya ŋguʋo yake muruʋoko rwake, akatiza, akaɓuɗa panze.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti wasiya ŋguʋo yake muruʋoko rwake, atiza, aenda,
akaɗana ʋarume ʋeimba yake, akataura naʋo, akati: Tarirai, iye wakaʋuyisa muHeberu pakati peɗu kuti atiɗaɗire; wakapinda kwandiri, kuti aʋate neni, ndikaridza mhere nenzwi guru.
Ɀino wakati acinzwa kuti ndinoɗanidzirisa ndiciridza mhere, akasiya ŋguʋo yake neni, akatiza, akaɓuɗa panze.
Akaceŋgeta ŋguʋo yake kuȿikira tenzi wake acipinda mumba.
Akataura kwaari mashoko iwayo akati: Muranda muHeberu wawakaisa pakati peɗu, wakaʋuya kwandiri kuti andiɗaɗire.
Ndikaɗanidzirisa, ndikaridza mhere, akasiya ŋguʋo yake neni, akatizira panze.
Tenzi wake wakati acinzwa mashoko aakaʋudzwa nomukadzi wake, aciti: Ndiɀo ɀandakaitirwa nomuranda wako, hasha dzake dzikamuka.
Tenzi waJosefa akamutora, akamupinza mutoroŋgo, paisuŋgwa ʋasuŋgwa ʋamambo; akaʋa mutoroŋgo.
Asi Jehova wakaʋa naJosefa, akamuitira tsitsi, kuti anzwirwe ŋgoni nomutariri wetoroŋgo.
Mutariri wetoroŋgo akapa mumaʋoko aJosefa ʋasuŋgwa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari mutoroŋgo; iye wakaŋga ari muiti weɀose ɀaiitwa’mo.
Mutariri wetoroŋgo wakaŋga asinehanya necinhu cakaŋga ciri pamaʋoko ake, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga anaye; ɀose ɀaaiita, Jehova wakaɀiruramisa.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo muɗiri wamambo weEgipita nomuɓiki wake ʋakatadzira tenzi waʋo, mambo weEgipita.
Farao akatsamŋira kwaɀo ʋaranda ʋake ʋaʋiri, iʋo mukuru waʋaɗiri nomukuru waʋaɓiki.
Akaʋasuŋga kuti ʋaceŋgetwe mumba momukuru waʋarindi, mutoroŋgo, pakaŋga pakasuŋgwa Josefa.
Mukuru waʋarindi akaraira Josefa kuʋaceŋgeta; iye akaʋaɓatira, ʋakaita ŋguʋa ʋaciceŋgetwa.
Ɀino ʋose ʋaʋiri ʋakarota hope ʋusiku ʋumŋe, mumŋe nomumŋe kurota kwake, kurota kumŋe nokumŋe kuneɗudziro yako, iʋo muɗiri nomuɓiki ʋamambo weEgipita, ʋakaŋga ʋakasuŋgwa mutoroŋgo.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana Josefa akapinda kwaʋari, Akaʋatarira, akaʋona kuti haʋafari.
Akabvunza ʋaranda ʋaFarao ʋakaŋga ʋaceŋgetwa pamŋe cete naye mumba matenzi wake, akati: Nhasi makashuwa neiko?
Ʋakati kwaari: Tarota hope, asi hakunomunhu unogona kudziɗudzira. Josefa akati kwaʋari: Kuɗudzira hakuzi kwaMŋari here — Ƌondirondedzerai henyu.
Ɀino mukuru waʋaɗiri akarondedzera kurota kwake kunaJosefa, akati kwaari: Pakurota kwaŋgu ndakaʋona muzambiriŋga pamberi paŋgu; pamuzambiriŋga pakaŋga panamataʋi matatu;
ukaita sokutumbuka, ukaɓuɗisa maruʋa; masumbu awo akaɓereka mazambiriŋga akaibva;
mukombe waFarao wakaŋga uri muruʋoko rwaŋgu; ɀino ndikatora mazambiriŋga, ndikaaȿinira mumukombe waFarao, ndikaisa mukombe muruʋoko rwaFarao.
Josefa akati kwaari: Kuɗudzirwa kwadzo ndiko: Mataʋi matatu mazuʋa matatu;
mazuʋa matatu agere kupera Farao ucasimudza musoro wako, nokukudzosera kuɓasa rako; ipapo ucaisa mukombe waFarao muruʋoko rwake ɀe, seɀawaiita kare uciri muɗiri wake.
Asi undiraŋgarire hako kana woitirwa ɀakanaka; undiitire ŋgoni, undireʋerere kunaFarao, kuti ndiɓuɗiswe paimba ino;
nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, ndakaɓiwa kunyika yaʋaHeberu; napano handina‐kuita cinhu cakafanira kuti ʋandiise mugomba iri.
Ɀino mukuru waʋaɓiki wakati aʋona kuti ɗudziro yakanaka, akati kunaJosefa: Neni ʋo ndakaŋga ndiri pakurota kwaŋgu, ndikaʋona tswanda nhatu dzeciŋgwa cicena dzakaŋga dziri pamusoro waŋgu;
mutswanda yapamsoro makaŋga muneɀokudya ɀamarudzi ose ɀakaɓikwa ɀaFarao; shiri dzikaɀidya mutswanda yaiʋa pamusoro waŋgu.
Ipapo Josefa akapindura, akati. Kuɗudzirwa kwadzo ndiko: Tswanda nhatu mazuʋa matatu;
mazuʋa matatu agere kupera, Farao ucasimudza musoro wako akaubvisa pamsoro pako, akusuŋgirire pamuti; shiri dzicadya nyama yako, dziciibvisa kwauri.
Ɀino nomusi wetatu, musi wokuɀarwa kwaFarao, iye wakaitira ʋaranda ʋake ʋose mutambo. Akasimudza musoro womukuru waʋaɗiri, nomusoro womukuru waʋaɓiki pakati paʋaranda ʋake,
akadzosera mukuru waʋaɗiri kuɓasa rake rokuɗira kwake, akapa mukombe waFarao muruʋoko rwaFarao;
asi wakasuŋgirira mukuru waʋaɓiki, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaɗudzirwa naJosefa.
Asi mukuru waʋaɗiri haana‐kuraŋgarira Josefa, asi wakamukaŋganwa.
Makore maʋiri akati apera cose, Farao akarota hope; akaɀiʋona amire parwizi.
Akaʋona mhou nomŋe dzicikwira dziciɓuɗa murwizi, dzakaŋga dzakanaka, dzakakora; dzikafura pakati penhokwe.
Ɀino akaʋona dzimŋe mhou nomŋe dzicikwira mashure madzo, dzicibva murwizi, dzakaŋga dzakaipa, dzakawonda; dzikamira nedzimŋe mhou pamhenderekedzo yorwizi.
Ɀino mhou dzakaipa, dzakawonda, dzikadya mhou dziya nomŋe dzakanaka, dzakakora. Farao akapepuka.
Akaʋata ɀe, akarota rwecipiri; akaʋona hura nomŋe dzeɀiyo dzakaŋga dzatumbuka padzinde rimŋe, dzakaŋga dzakakora, dzakanaka,
akaʋona hura nomŋe, dzakaŋga dzakatetepa, dzakaŋga dzapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuʋa, dziciɓuɗa shure kwadzo.
Ɀino hura dzakatetepa dzikamedza hura nomŋe dzakakora, dzakaŋga dzizere. Farao akapepuka, akaʋona kuti warota.

Ɀino fume maŋgwana mŋeya wake ukatambudzika, akatuma ʋanhu kundoɗana ŋaŋga dzose dzeEgipita naʋakacenjera ʋose ʋo’ko; Farao akaʋaʋudza kurota kwake; asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waigona kuɀiɗudzira kunaFarao.
Ipapo mukuru waʋaɗiri akaʋudza Farao, akati: Nhasi ndinoraŋgarira kutadza kwaŋgu;
Farao wakaŋga akatsamŋira ʋaranda ʋake, mukandisuŋga, ndikaceŋgetwa mumba momukuru waʋarindi, ini nomukuru waʋaɓiki;
tikarota hope noʋusiku ʋumŋe, ini naiye; tikarota mumŋe nomumŋe hope dzineɗudziro yadzo.
Ɀino ipapo pakaŋga panesu jaya romuHeberu, muranda womukuru waʋarindi; tikamuʋudza, iye akatiɗudzira kurota kweɗu; akaɗudzira mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakarota.
Ɀikazoitika seɀaakatiɗudzira; ini ndikadzoserwa kuɓasa raŋgu, asi iye wakasuŋgirirwa.
Ipapo Farao akatuma munhu kundoɗana Josefa, ʋakakurumidza kumuɓuɗisa mugomba; ʋakaʋeʋura ndebvu dzake nokumufukidza dzimŋe ŋguʋo; akapinda kunaFarao.
Farao akati kunaJosefa: Ndarota hope, asi hakunomunhu unogona kundiɗudzira idzo; ɀino ndanzwa kuti iwe, kana wanzwa kurota, unogona kuɀiɗudzira.
Josefa akapindura Farao, akati: Kwete, handizi’ni; Mŋari ndiye uŋgapa Farao ɗudziro yorugare.
Farao akarondedzera kunaJosefa, akati: Pakurota kwaŋgu ndakaɀiʋona ndimire pamhenderekedzo yorwizi;
ndikaʋona murwizi muciɓuɗa mhou nomŋe, dzakaŋga dzakakora, dzakanaka; dzikafura pakati penhokwe;
ndikaʋona ɀe dzimŋe mhou nomŋe dzicikwira shure kwadzo dzinenzara, dzakaipa kwaɀo, dzakawonda, handina‐kumboʋona dzakaipa dzakaɗai panyika yose yeEgipita.
Ɀino mhou idzo dzakawonda, dzakaipa, dzikadya mhou dziya dzakakora dzokutaŋga;
dzakat dzadzidya, hadzina‐kutoŋgozikanwa kuti dzadzidya; asi dzakaŋga dzakaŋgoipa sapakutaŋga. Ɀino ndikapepuka.
Ndikaʋona ɀe pakurota kwaŋgu hura nomŋe dzakaŋga dzatumbuka padzinde rimŋe, dzizere, dzakanaka;
ndikaʋona ɀe dzimŋe hura nomŋe, dzakawoma, dzakatetepa, dzakapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuʋa, dziciɓuɗa shure kwadzo.
Hura idzo dzakatetepa dzikamedza hura nomŋe dzakanaka; ndikaʋudza ŋaŋga, asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakagona kundiɗudzira iɀoɀo.
Ipapo Josefa akati kunaFarao: Kurota kwaFarao ndokumŋe; iɀo Mŋari ɀaanoɗa kuita, ndiɀo ɀaakaziʋisa Farao.
Mhou nomŋe dzakanaka makore manomŋe, nehura nomŋe dzakanaka makore manomŋe ʋo; kurota ndokumŋe.
Mhou nomŋe dzakawonda, dzakaipa, dzakakwira shure kwaidzedzo, makore manomŋe, nehura nomŋe dzakaputa, dzakapiswa nemhepo yokumabvazuʋa, acaʋa makore manomŋe enzara.
Ndiro shoko randataura kunaFarao; iɀo Mŋari ɀaanoɗa kuita, ndiɀo ɀaakaratidza Farao.
Tarirai, kunoʋuya makore manomŋe amaguta kwaɀo panyika yose yeEgipita;
shure kwaiwayo kucateʋera makore manomŋe enzara; ipapo maguta ose acakaŋganikwa panyika yeEgipita; nzara icapedza nyika;
maguta haaŋgazozikanwi munyika nokuɗa kwenzara iyo inozoteʋera, nokuti icanyanya kwaɀo.
Kurota uku kwakapamhidzwa kunaFarao kaʋiri, nokuti iɀoɀo ɀakatarwa naMŋari, ʋuye Mŋari ucakurumidza kuɀiita.
Naiɀoɀo Farao ŋgaatȿake munhu wakaŋgwara, wakacenjera, amuite muɓati wenyika yeEgipita.
Farao ŋgaaite iɀoɀo, ŋgaaise ʋatariri panyika yose, atore ceshanu ceɀiyo ɀenyika yeEgipita pamakore manomŋe eguta.
Ŋgaʋaʋuŋganidze ɀokudya ɀose ɀamakore iwayo akanaka anoʋuya, ʋaʋige ɀiyo nomurairo waFarao, ɀiʋe ɀokudya mumaguta; ʋaɀiceŋgete.
Ɀokudya iɀo ɀicaceŋgeterwa nyika makore manomŋe enzara, icazoʋa’po panyika yeEgipita, kuti nyika irege kuparadzwa nenzara.
Cinhu ici cakaŋga cakanaka kunaFarao naʋaranda ʋake ʋose.
Farao akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Ko tiŋgawana mumŋe munhu wakafanana noyuyu, unomŋeya waMŋari maari here?
Farao akati kunaJosefa: Mŋari ɀaakakuratidza iɀoɀo ɀose, hapanomunhu wakaŋgwara, wakacenjera sewe;
ndiwe ucaʋa muɓati weimba yaŋgu; ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋacarairwa neshoko rako; asi pacigaro caŋgu coʋushe ndi’po pandicaʋa mukuru kwauri.
Ɀino Farao akati kunaJosefa: Tarira, ndakuita muɓati panyika yeEgipita yose.
Farao akabvisa cimhete cake paruʋoko rwake, akaciisa paruʋoko rwaJosefa, akamufukidza ŋguʋo dzomuceka wakanakisa, akamushoŋgedza ciketani cendarama pamutsipa wake;
akamufambisa neŋgoro yecipiri yaakaŋga anayo; ʋakaɗanidzira pamberi pake, ʋaciti: Fugamai! Akamuita muɓati wenyika yose yeEgipita.
Farao akati kunaJosefa: Ndini Farao, asi kunze kwako hapanomunhu ucasimudza ruʋoko rwake kana rutsoka rwake panyika yose yeEgipita.
Farao akatumidza Josefa zita rinonzi Zafanati‐panea; akamupa Asenati, mukunda waPotifera, muprista weOni, aʋe mukadzi wake. Josefa akaɓuɗa, akafamba nenyika yose yeEgipita.
Ɀino Josefa wakaŋga anamakore makumi matatu, ŋguʋa yaakamira pamberi paFarao, mambo weEgipita. Josefa akaɓuɗa pamberi paFarao, akafamba, akapota nenyika yose yeEgipita.
Nyika ikaɓereka ɀizhinji‐zhinji namakore manomŋe amaguta.
Akaʋuŋganidza ɀokudya ɀose ɀamakore manomŋe, akaŋga ari’po panyika yeEgipita, akaʋiga ɀokudya mumaguta; ɀokudya ɀeminda yakaŋga yakapoteredza guta rimŋe nerimŋe, wakaɀiʋiga’mo.
Josefa akaʋiga ɀiyo, ɀikaita sejeca reguŋgwa, ɀizhinji‐zhinji, kuȿikira akarega kuɀiʋereŋga; nokuti ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa.
Ɀino gore renzara risati raȿika, Josefa wakaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri, ʋaakaɓerekerwa naAsenati, mukunda waPotifera, muprista weOni.
Josefa akatumidza weɗaŋgwe zita rinonzi Manase, aciti: Nokuti Mŋari wakandikaŋganwisa kutambudzika kwaŋgu kwose, neimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu yose.
Zita rowecipiri wakaritumidza Efraimi, aciti: Nokuti Mŋari wakandiɓerekesa ʋana panyika yokutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Ɀino makore manomŋe amaguta, akaŋga aʋa’po panyika yeEgipita, akapera.
Makore manomŋe enzara akataŋga kuȿika, seɀakataura Josefa; nzara ikaʋa’po panyika dzose; asi panyika yose yeEgipita pakaŋga paneɀokudya.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋeEgipita ʋofa nenzara, ʋakacemera ɀokudya kunaFarao; Farao akati kunaʋose ʋeEgipita: Endai kunaJosefa; itai ɀaanotaura kwamuri.
Nzara ikaʋa’po panyika dzose; Josefa akazarura matura ose, akateŋgesera ʋaEgipita; nokuti nzara yakaŋga yakanyanya panyika yeEgipita.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika dzose ʋakaenda Egipita kunaJosefa kuzoteŋga ɀiyo; nokuti nzara yakaŋga yakanyanya panyika dzose.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaʋona kuti ɀiyo ɀiri’po muEgipita, Jakobo akati kuʋanakomana ʋake: Munotarirana neiko?
Akati: Ndanzwa kuti ɀiyo ɀiri’po muEgipita; ɓurukirai’ko, mundotiteŋgera’ko, tipone, tirege kufa.
Ipapo ʋakoma ʋaJosefa ʋanegumi ʋakaɓuruka kundoteŋga ɀiyo Egipita.
Asi Benjamini, munuŋuna waJosefa, Jakobo haana‐kumutuma naʋakoma ʋake; nokuti wakati: Ɀimŋe uŋgawirwa nenjodzi.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya kuzoteŋga pakati paʋamŋe ʋaiʋuya, nokuti nzara yakaŋga iri’po panyika yeKanani.
Ɀino Josefa wakaŋga ari muɓati wenyika; ndiye waiteŋgesera ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika; ʋakoma ʋaJosefa ʋakaʋuya, ʋakamufugamira, ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakatarira pasi.
Josefa akaʋona ʋakoma ʋake, akaʋaziʋa, asi wakaita saasiŋgaʋaziʋi, akataura nehasha naʋo, akati kwaʋari: Mabvepiko — Iʋo ʋakati: Tabva kunyika yeKanani kuzoteŋga ɀokudya.
Josefa akaziʋa ʋakoma ʋake, asi iʋo haʋana‐kumuziʋa.
Ipapo Josefa akaraŋgarira kurota kwake kwaakaɗeya kurota pamsoro paʋo, akati kwaʋari: Muri ʋashori, maʋuya kuzoʋona kuti nyika yakashama papi.
Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Kwete, ishe weɗu, asi ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋaʋuya kuzoteŋga ɀokudya.
Tiri ʋanakomana ʋomunhu mumŋe cete tose; tiri ʋanhu ʋakatendeka, ʋaranda ʋenyu haʋazi ʋashori;
iye akati kwaʋari: Kwete, maʋuya kuzoʋona nyika kuti yakashama papi.
Iʋo ʋakati: Isu ʋaranda ʋenyu, tiri ʋanakomana ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋomunhu mumŋe cete panyika yeKanani; ɀino worugotwe uri kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu nhasi; mumŋe haaci’po.
Josefa akati kwaʋari: Ndiɀo ɀandandicitaura kwamuri, ndiciti, muri ʋashori;
heci cinhu camucaidzwa naco: Noʋupenyu bgaFarao, hamuŋgaɓuɗi pano kana munuŋuna wenyu worugotwe asina‐kuʋuya pano.
Tumai mumŋe wenyu kuti andotora munuŋuna wenyu, asi imi mucafanira kugara makasuŋgwa, kuti mashoko enyu aidzwe, kana makatendeka; kana ɀisina‐kuɗaro, ɀirokwaɀo, noʋupenyu bgaFarao muri ʋashori.
Ipapo akaʋaisa pamŋe cete ʋose mutoroŋgo, kuti ʋaceŋgetwe mazuʋa matatu.
Josefa akati kwaʋari nezuʋa retatu: Itai cinhu ici, mupone; ini ndinotya Mŋari;
kana muri ʋanhu ʋakatendeka, mumŋe waʋanuŋuna ʋenyu ŋgaagare akasuŋgwa mutoroŋgo yenyu; asi imi endai makatakura ɀiyo kundopa mhuri dzenyu dzinenzara.
Mugoʋuya nomunuŋuna wenyu worugotwe kwandiri; naiɀoɀo mashoko enyu acasimbiswa, murege kufa. Ʋakaita saiɀoɀo.
Ʋakataurirana ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo tinemhoȿa nokuɗa kwomunuŋuna weɗu, nokuti takaʋona kutambudzika kwomŋeya wake musi uya waakatinyeŋgetera, tikaramba kumuterera; naiɀoɀo tawirwa nokutambudzika uku.
Ipapo Rubeni akapindura, akati: Handina‐kukuʋudzai here, ndiciti: Regai kutadzira mŋana, mukaramba kunditerera — Naiɀoɀo tarirai, ropa rake rotȿakwa.
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuti Josefa unonzwisisa, nokuti kwaŋga kunomupinduri pakati paʋo.
Ipapo Josefa akabva kwaʋari, akacema; akadzokera ɀe kwaʋari, akataura naʋo, akatora Simeoni pakati paʋo, akamusuŋga ʋaciɀiʋona.
Josefa akaraira kuti midziyo yaʋo izadzwe neɀiyo, ʋuye kuti mumŋe nomumŋe adzoserwe mari yake muhomo yake, ʋuye kuti ʋapiwe ʋo mbuʋa yokufamba nayo; ʋakaitirwa saiɀoɀo.
Ipapo ʋakatakudza mboŋgoro dzaʋo ɀiyo ɀaʋo, ʋakaenda.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋo wakati acisunuŋgura homo yake, kuti ape mboŋgoro yake ɀokudya paʋakaʋata ʋusiku, akawana mari yake; heyo yakaŋga iri mumuromo wehomo yake.
Akati kuhama dzake: Mari yaŋgu yadzoswa; heyi iri muhomo yaŋgu; ipapo ʋakaʋora mŋoyo, ʋakatarirana, ʋacibvunda, ʋakati: Cinyiko ici cataitirwa naMŋari?
Ʋakaȿika kunaɓaɓa ʋaʋo panyika yeKanani, ʋakaʋaʋudza ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaʋawira;
ʋakati: Murume uya, ishe wenyika iyo, wakataura nesu nehasha, akati, tiri ʋashori ʋenyika.
Tikati kwaari: Tiri ʋanhu ʋakatendeka, hatizi ʋashori;
tiri ʋanakomana ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋomunhu mumŋe cete, ʋanakomana ʋaɓaɓa ʋeɗu; mumŋe haaci’po, worugotwe uri kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu nhasi panyika yeKanani.
Ɀino murume uya, ishe wenyika, akati kwatiri: Heci cinhu candicaziʋa naco kana muri ʋanhu ʋakatendeka; Siyai mumŋe wenyu kwandiri, mutore ɀiyo, mundopa mhuri dzenyu dzinenzara, muende.
Mugoʋuya ɀe kwandiri nomunuŋuna wenyu worugotwe; ipapo ndicaziʋa kuti hamuzi ʋashori, asi kuti muri ʋanhu ʋakatendeka: ipapo ndicakupai munuŋuna wenyu, mugoteŋga panyika ino.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɗurura homo dzaʋo, tarira ciputu cemari yomumŋe nomumŋe cakaŋga ciri muhomo yake; ʋakati ʋaciʋona ɀiputu ɀemari yaʋo, ʋakatya iʋo naɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ɀino Jakobo akati kwaʋari: Manditorera ʋana; Josefa haaci’po, naSimeoni haaci’po, ɀino moɗo‐kutora naBenjamini ʋo; ɀinhu ɀose iɀi ɀandiwira.
Ipapo Rubeni akataura naɓaɓa ʋake, akati: Muŋgaʋuraya henyu ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ʋaʋiri, kana ndisiŋgadzoki naye kwamuri; cimuisai henyu mumaʋoko aŋgu, ini ndicaʋuya naye ɀe kwamuri.
Ʋakati: Mŋanakomana waŋgu haaŋgaɓuruki nemi, nokuti mukoma wake wafa, iye wasiyiwa ari oga; kana akawirwa nenjodzi parwendo rwamunofamba, mucaɓurusira vudzi raŋgu jena kubgiro nokucema.
Ɀino nzara yakaŋga iri huru munyika iyo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza ɀiyo, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋabva naɀo Egipita, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋakati kwaʋari: Dzokai, endai ɀe mutiteŋgere ɀokudya ɀishoma.
Juda akataura naʋo, akati: Murume uya wakatinyeʋera kwaɀo, akati: Hamuŋgatoŋgoʋoni ciso caŋgu, kana munuŋuna wenyu asati anemi.
Kana mukatuma munuŋuna weɗu nesu, ticaɓuruka, kundoteŋga ɀokudya;
asi kana musiŋgamutumi, hatiŋgaɓuruki; nokuti murume uya wakati kwatiri: Hamuŋgaʋoni ciso caŋgu, kana munuŋuna wenyu asati anemi.
Israeri akati: Makandiitireiko ɀakaipa ɀakaɗai, ɀamakaʋudza murume uya kuti munomunuŋuna?

Iʋo ʋakati: Murume uya wakatibvunzisisa pamsoro peɗu, napamsoro pehama dzeɗu, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋapenyu here — Munomunuŋuna here — Tikamupindura namashoko awa; taigoziʋa here kuti ucati: Ƃurukai nomunuŋuna wenyu?
Ɀino Juda akati kunaIsraeri, ɓaɓa ʋake: Tumai henyu mukomana neni, tisimuke, tiende, tirarame, tirege kufa, isu nemi, naʋanana ʋeɗu.
Ini ndicaʋa ruɓatso rwake; muŋgamureʋa paruʋoko rwaŋgu; kana ndikasaʋuya naye, ndikamuisa pamberi penyu, ini ndicaʋa nemhoȿa kwamuri nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti ɗai tisina‐kunonoka, ɀirokwaɀo, tiŋgaɗai tadzoka ɀino rwecipiri.

Ipapo Israeri, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Kana ɀakaɗaro, itai cinhu ici: Torai micero yakanaka yenyika mumidziyo yenyu, muɓuruke necipo kumunhu uyo, cebarsami shomanene, noʋuci ʋushomanene, neɀinonhuwira, nemura, nemicero yomuti wepistakio, namaamanda;
mutore mari yakapamhidzwa kaʋiri mumaʋoko enyu, neiya mari yakaŋga yadzoserwa mumiromo yehomo dzenyu, muende makaiɓata mumaʋoko enyu; ɀimŋe ʋakakaŋganisa.
Nomunuŋuna wenyu mumutorei, musimuke, mudzokere kumurume uyo;
Mŋari wamasimba ose ŋgaakupei nyasha pamberi pomurume uyo, akusunuŋgurirei mumŋe munuŋuna wenyu naBenjamini ʋo. Kana ndatorerwa ʋana ʋaŋgu, ndatorerwa haŋgu.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋakatora cipo ico, ʋakaɓata mumaʋoko aʋo mari yakapamhidzwa kaʋiri, naBenjamini, ʋakasimuka, ʋakaɓurukira Egipita, ʋakandomira pamberi paJosefa.
Ɀino Josefa wakati aciʋona Benjamini anaʋo, akati kumutariri weimba yake: Ʋuya naʋarume mumba, uɓaye, ugadzire; nokuti ʋarume aʋa ʋacadya neni masikati.
Murume uyo akaita seɀaakaʋudzwa naJosefa; murume uyo akaisa ʋarume aʋo mumba maJosefa.

Ʋarume ʋakatya, ɀaʋakaiswa mumba maJosefa, ʋakati: Tinoiswa’mo nokuɗa kwemari yakadzoserwa muhomo dzeɗu paŋguʋa yokutaŋga, kuti atȿake mhoȿa kwatiri, atiʋambe, nokutiita ʋaranda ʋake, acitora ʋo mboŋgoro dzeɗu.
Ipapo ʋakasweɗera kumutariri weimba yaJosefa, ʋakataura naye pamukoʋa weimba;
ʋakati: Haiwa, ishe weɗu, ɀirokwaɀo paŋguʋa yokutaŋga takaɓuruka kuzoteŋga ɀokudya;
tikati ticiȿika patakaʋata ʋusiku, tikasunuŋgura homo dzeɗu, ʋonei mari yomumŋe nomumŋe iri mumuromo wehomo yake, mari yeɗu yose seɀayakayerwa; ɀino tadzoka nayo pamaʋoko eɗu.
Ɀino taɓuruka tineimŋe mari ɀe mumaʋoko eɗu kuti titeŋge ɀokudya nayo; hatiziʋi kuti mari yeɗu yakaiswa muhomo dzeɗu nani.
Iye akati: Farai henyu, musatya; Mŋari wenyu, Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋenyu, wakakupai fuma muhomo dzenyu; mari yenyu yakaȿika kwandiri. Akaʋaɓuɗisira Simeoni.
Murume uyo akaisa ʋarume aʋo muimba yaJosefa, akaʋapa mvura, ʋakashambidza tsoka dzaʋo, akapa ʋo mboŋgoro dzaʋo ɀokudya.
Ʋakagadzira cipo kuȿikira kuʋuya kwaJosefa masikati, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa kuti ʋacadya ɀokudya ipapo.
Josefa wakati aȿika kumba, ʋakapinda mumba necipo cakaŋga ciri mumaʋoko aʋo, ʋakakotamira pasi pamberi pake.
Iye akaʋabvunza mufaro waʋo, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakafara here, uya mutana wamaireʋa — Ʋaciri ʋapenyu here?
Iʋo ʋakati: Muranda wenyu, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, ʋakafara haʋo, ʋaciri ʋapenyu. Ʋakakotama, ʋakanamata.
Iye akasimudza meso ake, akaʋona Benjamini, munuŋuna wake, mŋanakomana wamai ʋake, akati: Ndiye here munuŋuna wenyu muɗuku, worugotwe, wamakandiʋudza — Akati: Mŋari ŋgaaʋe nenyasha newe, mŋana waŋgu.
Ɀino Josefa akakurumidza, nokuti mŋoyo wake wakacema munuŋuna wake, akatȿaka paaŋgacema; akapinda muimba yake yomukati, akacema’po.
Akazoshambidza ciso cake, akaɓuɗa ɀe, akaɀidzora, akati: Pakurai ɀokudya.
Ʋakamupakurira iye oga, naiʋo ʋoga, naʋaEgipita, ʋaisidya naye, ʋoga ʋo, nokuti ʋaEgipita haʋana‐kutenderwa kudya naʋaHeberu, nokuti ɀinonyaŋgadza kunaʋaEgipita.
Ʋakagara pamberi pake, weɗaŋgwe paʋuɗaŋgwe bgake, nomuɗuku kunaʋose paʋuɗuku bgake; ʋarume ʋakatarirana, ʋakashamiswa.
Akaʋagoʋera ɀokudya ɀakaŋga ɀiri pamberi pake, asi mugoʋe waBenjamini wakaenzana nowaʋashanu ʋaʋo. Ʋakanwa, ʋakafara naye.
Ɀino wakaraira mutariri weimba yake, aciti: Zadza homo dzaʋarume neɀokudya, seɀaʋanogona kutakura, uise ʋo mari yomumŋe nomumŋe pamuromo wehomo yake.
Nomukombe waŋgu, mukombe wesirveri, uuise pamuromo wehomo yomuɗuku, pamŋe cete nemari yeɀiyo ɀake. Iye akaita seɀaakaʋudzwa naJosefa.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana kwoedza ʋarume ʋakatenderwa kuenda, iʋo nemboŋgoro dzaʋo.
Ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa muguta, ʋasati ʋaenda kure, Josefa akaʋudza mutariri wake, akati: Simuka, teʋera ʋarume; kana waʋaɓata, uti kwaʋari: Matsindikireiko ɀamaitirwa ɀakanaka?
Ko hacizi cinhu cinonwira ishe waŋgu, caanoshopera naco here — Cinhu ici camaita cakaipa.
Akandoʋaɓata, akataura mashoko iwayo kwaʋari.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ko ishe weɗu unotaurirei mashoko akaɗai — Haiȿa, ʋaranda ʋenyu haʋaŋgaiti cinhu cakaɗai.
Tarirai, mari yatakawana pamiromo yehomo dzeɗu takadzoka nayo kwamuri ticibva kunyika yeKanani; taigoɓa seiko sirveri kana ndarama mumba mashe wenyu?
Aninani waʋaranda ʋenyu unowanikwa anawo, ŋgaafe; nesu ticaʋa ʋasuŋgwa ʋashe weɗu.
Iye akati. Ndiɀo haɀo, ŋgaɀiʋe seɀamataura; iye unowanikwa anomukombe, ndiye ucaʋa musuŋgwa waŋgu; imi ʋamŋe hamuŋgaʋi nemhoȿa.
Ipapo ʋakakurumidza mumŋe nomumŋe kuɓurusira homo yake pasi, mumŋe nomumŋe akasunuŋgura homo yake.
Iye akatȿaka, akataŋga kumukuru, akaguma kumuɗuku; mukombe ukawanikwa muhomo yaBenjamini.
Ipapo ʋakabvarura ŋguʋo dzaʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe akatakudza mboŋgoro yake, akadzokera kuguta.
Juda naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake ʋakadzokera kuimba yaJosefa, iye aciri’mo, ʋakawira pasi pamberi pake.
Ɀino Josefa akati kwaʋari: Cinyiko ici camaita — Hamuziʋi kuti munhu wakaita seni unogona kushopera here?
Juda akati: Ko tiŋgaɗiniko kunashe waŋgu — Tiŋgataureiko — Tiŋgaɀipembedza sei — Mŋari wakawana kutadza kwaʋaranda ʋenyu; tarirai tiri ʋasuŋgwa ʋashe weɗu, isu naiye wakawanikwa anomukombe.
Iye akati: Haiȿa, handiŋgaiti saiɀoɀo; munhu uyo wakawanikwa anomukombe muruʋoko, ndiye ucaʋa musuŋgwa waŋgu; kana muri’mi, endai henyu norugare kunaɓaɓa ʋenyu.

Ipapo Juda akasweɗera kwaari, akati: Haiwa, ishe waŋgu, ɗotenderai henyu muranda wenyu kutaura shoko munzeʋe dzashe waŋgu, kutsamŋa kwenyu kurege kumukira muranda wenyu, nokuti imi makaenzana naFarao.
Ishe waŋgu wakabvunza ʋaranda ʋake, aciti: Munaɓaɓa here, kana munuŋuna?
Isu tikati kunashe weɗu: Tinaɓaɓa ʋaʋa mutana, ʋanomŋana woʋutana bgaʋo, uciri muɗuku hake; mukoma wake wakafa, iye wakasara ari oga, mŋana wamai ʋake, ɓaɓa ʋake ʋanomuɗa.
Imi mukati kuʋaranda ʋenyu: Ƃurukai naye kwandiri, ndimuʋone nameso aŋgu.
Isu tikati kunashe weɗu: Mukomana haaŋgasiyi ɓaɓa ʋake, nokuti kana akasiya ɓaɓa ʋake, ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaŋgafa.
Ɀino makati kuʋaranda ʋenyu: Kana munuŋuna wenyu worugotwe asiŋgaɓuruki nemi, hamuŋgaʋoni ɀe ciso caŋgu.
Ɀino takati takwira kumuranda wenyu, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, tikaʋaʋudza mashoko ashe weɗu.
Ƃaba ʋeɗu ʋakati: Endai ɀe, mutiteŋgere ɀokudya ɀishomanene.
Isu tikati: Hatiŋgaɓuruki, kana munuŋuna weɗu asiŋgaɓuruki nesu; nokuti hatiŋgaʋoni ciso comurume uya, kana munuŋuna weɗu asi nesu.
Muranda wenyu, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, ʋakati kwatiri: Munoziʋa kuti mukadzi waŋgu wakandiɓerekera ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri;
mumŋe wakabva kwandiri, ndikati: Ɀirokwaɀo wakabvamburwa; kubva musi iwoyo handina‐kuzomuʋona ɀe;
kana mukanditorera noyuyu ʋo, akawirwa nenjodzi, mucaɓurusira vudzi raŋgu jena kubgiro nokucema.
Naiɀoɀo, kana ɀino ndikandoȿika kumuranda wenyu, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, tisinaiye mukomana, mŋeya waʋo ɀawakaɓatanidzwa nomŋeya womukomana,
ʋacati kana ʋaciʋona kuti mukomana asinesu, ʋacafa; naiɀoɀo ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋacaɓurusira vudzi jena romuranda wenyu, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, kubgiro nokucema.
Nokuti muranda wenyu wakaɀiita ruɓatso rwomukomana kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndikati: Kana ndikasaʋuya naye kwamuri, ini ndicaʋa nemhoȿa kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ndinokumbira kuti muranda wenyu agare hake ari musuŋgwa washe waŋgu pacigaro comukomana, asi mukomana akwire hake naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake.
Nokuti ndiŋgakwira seiko kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndisinomukomana — Ndirege haŋgu kuʋona njodzi icawira ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.

Ɀino Josefa haana‐kugona kuɀidzora pamberi paʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye, akaɗana, aciti: Ƃuɗisai ʋanhu ʋose ʋari pano neni. Ɀino kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakamira naye Josefa aciɀiziʋisa kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake.
Akacema kwaɀo, ʋaEgipita naʋeimba yaFarao ʋakaɀinzwa ʋo.
Ipapo Josefa akati kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake: Ndini Josefa! Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaciri ʋapenyu here — Ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake ʋakasagona kumupindura, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya pamberi pake.
Josefa akati kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake: Ƌosweɗerai henyu kwandiri. Ɀino ʋakasweɗera. Iye akati: Ndini Josefa, mŋana waɓaɓa ʋenyu wamakateŋgesa
Ɀino musaɀidya mŋoyo, kana kuɀitsamŋira, ɀamakanditeŋgesera kuno; nokuti Mŋari wakandituma pamberi penyu, kuti ndiceŋgete ʋupenyu.
Nokuti ɀino aʋa makore maʋiri enzara panyika ino; mamŋe makore mashanu aci’ko, aʋasiŋgazorimi nokukohwa nawo.
Mŋari wakandituma pamberi penyu kuti ndikuceŋgetei, muʋe naʋamŋe ʋacasara panyika, ndikuraramisei kuti musunuŋgurwe nokusunuŋgurwa kukuru.
Ɀino hamuzi’mi makandituma pano, asi Mŋari; iye wakandiita ɓaɓa kunaFarao nashe weimba yake yose, nomuɓati wenyika yose yeEgipita.
Kurumidzai, mukwire kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, mundoti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJosefa, mŋanakomana wenyu: Mŋari wakandiita ishe weEgipita rose; ɓurukirai kwandiri, musanonoka;
mugare panyika yeGosheni, mugoʋa pedyo neni, imi, naʋanakomana ʋenyu, naʋana ʋaʋona ʋenyu, namakwai enyu, neŋombe dzenyu, neɀose ɀamunaɀo;
ndicakuceŋgetai’po, nokuti mamŋe makore mashanu enzara aci’po, kuti murege kuzoʋa ʋarombo, imi, naʋeimba yenyu, neɀose ɀamunaɀo.
Tarirai, meso enyu anoʋona, nameso omunuŋuna waŋgu Benjamini, kuti muromo waŋgu unotaura kwamuri
Mundoʋudza ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu kukudzwa kwaŋgu kwose paEgipita, neɀose ɀamaʋona; mukurumidze kuɓurusira ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu kuno.
Akawira pamutsipa waBenjamini, munuŋuna wake, akacema; naiye Benjamini akacema pamutsipa wake.
Akaȿeta ʋakoma ʋake ʋose, akacema pamsoro paʋo; shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋakoma ʋake ʋakataura naye.
Ɀino mukurumbira waɀo wakanzwika mumba maFarao, ɀicinzi: Ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋaJosefa ʋaȿika! Farao naʋaranda ʋake ʋakafara naiɀoɀo.
Farao akati kunaJosefa: Iti kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋako: Itai cinhu ici: Takudzai ɀipfuwo ɀenyu, mufambe, muende kunyika yeKanani;
mundotora ɓaɓa ʋenyu naʋedzimba dzenyu muʋuye kwandiri; ndicakupai ɀinhu ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀenyika yeEgipita, mudye ɀakakora ɀenyika.
Ɀino warairwa, ciita iɀoɀo; torerai ʋana ʋenyu ʋaɗuku naʋakadzi ʋenyu ŋ oro panyika yeEgipita, mundotora ɓaɓa ʋenyu, muʋuye.
Musafuŋga nhumbi dzenyu, nokuti ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀenyika yose yeEgipita ndeɀenyu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo: Josefa akaʋapa ŋgoro, seɀaakarairwa naFarao, akaʋapa mbuʋa yokufamba nayo.
Akapa ʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe ŋguʋo dzakanaka; asi Benjamini wakamupa mashekeri anamazana matatu esirveri
Naɓaɓa ʋake wakaʋatumira mboŋgoro dzinegumi, dzakaŋga dzakatakura ɀinhu ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀeEgipita, namakadzi emboŋgoro anegumi akaŋga akatakura ɀiyo, neciŋgwa, neɀokudya ɀaɓaɓa ʋake ɀorwendo.
Ɀino akatendera ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake kuenda, ʋakabva; akati kwaʋari: Cenjerai, musatukana munzira.
Ipapo ʋakabva Egipita, ʋakakwira, ʋakandoȿika kunyika yeKanani kunaJakobo, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ʋakaʋaʋudza, ʋakati: Josefa uciri mupenyu; ndiye muɓati wenyika yose yeEgipita. Ipapo mŋoyo waʋo wakati rukutu, nokuti haʋana‐kutenda.
Ʋakaʋaʋudza mashoko ose aJosefa; ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋona ŋgoro dzakaŋga dzatumŋa naJosefa kuzoʋatakura, mŋeya waJakobo, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, ukapona ɀe;
Israeri akati: Ɀariŋgana! Josefa, mŋanakomana waŋgu uciri mupenyu; ndicaenda ndimuʋone ndisati ndafa.
Ɀino Israeri wakabva neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, akaȿika Beeri‐sheba, akaɓayira Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋake Isaka ɀiɓayiro.
Mŋari akataura naIsraeri neɀiratidzo ʋusiku, akati: Jakobo! Jakobo! Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Ndini Mŋari, iye Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako; usatya hako kuɓurukira Egipita; nokuti ndicakuita rudzi rukuru ikoko;
ndicaɓurukira Egipita newe, ndigokudzosa ɀe ɀirokwaɀo; Josefa ndiye ucatsika meso ako.
Jakobo akasimuka, akabva Beeri‐sheba; ʋanakomana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatakura Jakobo, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, naʋana ʋaʋo ʋaɗuku, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, neŋgoro dzakaŋga dzatumŋa naFarao kuti dziʋatakure.
Ʋakatora ŋombe dzaʋo nenhumbi dzaʋo dzaʋakaŋga ʋawana munyika yeKanani, ʋakaȿika Egipita, Jakobo naʋanakomana ʋake ʋose pamŋe cete naye;
ʋanakomana ʋake, naʋana ʋaʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye, naʋakunda, ʋake, naʋakunda ʋaʋanakomana ʋake, naʋose ʋorudzi rwake, ʋakaenda naʋo Egipita.
Ndiwo mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaȿika Egipita: Jakobo, naʋanakomana ʋake,
Naʋanakomana ʋaRubeni: Hanoki, naParu, naHezroni, naKarmi.
Naʋanakomana ʋaSimeoni: Jemueri, naJamini, naOhadi, naJakini, naZohari, naShauri, waiʋa mŋanakomana womukadzi weKanani.
Naʋanakomana ʋaRevi: Gershoni, naKohati, naMerari.
Naʋanakomana ʋaJuda: Eri, naOnani, naShera, naPerezi, naZera; asi Zera naOnani ʋakafira panyika yeKanani. Ʋanakomana ʋaPerezi ʋaiʋa Hezroni, naHamuri.
Naʋanakomana ʋaIsakari: Tora, naPuva, naJobo, naShimroni.
Naʋanakomana ʋaZeburuni: Seredi, naEroni, naJareeri.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaRea, ʋaakaɓerekera Jakobo paPadani‐arami, nomukunda wake Dina; ʋanakomana ʋake naʋakunda ʋake ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋanamakumi matatu naʋatatu.
Naʋanakomana ʋaGadi: Zifioni, naHagi, naShumi, naEzboni, naEri, naArodi, naAreri.
Naʋanakomana ʋaAsheri: Imna, naIshva, naIshvi, naBeria, naSera, hanɀadzi yaʋo; naʋanakomana ʋaBeria ʋaiʋa Heberi, naMarkieri.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaZirpa, Rabani waakapa Rea, mukunda wake; wakaɓerekera Jakobo ʋanhu aʋa ʋanegumi naʋatanhatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRakeri, mukadzi waJakobo, ʋaiʋa Josefa naBenjamini.
Josefa akaɓerekerwa Manase naEfraimi panyika yeEgipita, ndiʋo ʋaakaɓerekerwa naAsenati, mukunda waPotifera, muprista weOni.
Naʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini: Bera, naBekeri, naAshberi naGera, naNaamani, naEhi, naRoshi, naMupimi, naHupimi, naArdi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaRakeri, ʋakaɓerekerwa Jakobo; ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanegumi naʋanna.
Naʋanakomana ʋaDani: Hushimi
Naʋanakomana ʋaNaftari: Jazeeri, naGuni, naJezeri, naShiremi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBirha, Rabani waakapa Rakeri, mukunda wake; ndiʋo ʋaakaɓerekera Jakobo; ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanomŋe.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuya naJakobo Egipita, ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa paciʋuno cake, ʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋaJakobo ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi, ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋanamakumi matanhatu naʋatanhatu.
