Ʋanakomana ʋaJosefa ʋaakaŋga aɓerekerwa Egipita ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋaʋiri; ʋose ʋeimba yaJakobo, ʋakaʋuya Egipita, ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe.
Akatuma Juda pamberi pake kunaJosefa kuti amuratidze nzira inoenda Gosheni.
Ipapo Josefa akagadzira ŋgoro yake, akakwira Gosheni, kundosoŋgana naIsraeri, ɓaɓa ʋake; akaɀiziʋisa kwaʋari, akawira pamutsipa waʋo, akacema pamutsipa waʋo ŋguʋa huru.
Israeri akati kunaJosefa: Ɀino ŋgandicifa haŋgu, nokuti ndaʋona ciso cako, kuti uciri mupenyu.
Ɀino Josefa akati kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake: Ini ndicakwira kundoʋudza Farao, ndiciti kwaari: Ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ʋaigara kunyika yeKanani, ʋaȿika kwandiri;
ʋarume aʋa ʋafudzi, nokuti ʋaipfuwa ɀipfuwo; ʋaʋuya namakwai aʋo, neŋombe dzaʋo, neɀose ɀaʋanaɀo.
Ɀino kana moɗanwa naFarao, akati: Ƃasa renyu nderei?
Muti: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋaiʋa ʋapfuwi ʋeɀipfuwo kubva paʋucece bgeɗu kuȿikira ɀino, isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu; kuti mugare munyika yeGosheni, nokuti ʋafudzi ʋose ʋanonyaŋgadza ʋaEgipita.
Ɀino Josefa akaenda, akandoʋudza Farao, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaȿika, ʋacibva kunyika yeKanani, ʋanamakwai aʋo, neŋombe dzaʋo, neɀose ɀaʋanaɀo; ɀino, tarirai ʋari munyika yeGosheni.
Akatora ʋarume ʋashanu kuʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, akaʋaisa pamberi paFarao.
Farao akati kuʋakoma ʋake: Ƃasa renyu ndereiko — Ʋakati kunaFarao: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋafudzi, isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu tose
Ʋakati kunaFarao: Taʋuya kuzogara tiri ʋatorwa munyika ino; nokuti hakunamafuro amakwai aʋaranda ʋenyu, nokuti kunenzara kunyika yeKanani; ɀino tinokumbira kuti ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋagare munyika yeGosheni
Ipapo Farao akataura naJosefa, akati: Ƃaba ʋako naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋako ʋaʋuya kwauri;

nyika yeEgipita iri pamberi pako; ɓaɓa ʋako naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋako ŋgaʋagare panɀimbo yakaiȿo‐naka ʋanyika ino, ŋgaʋagare panyika yeGosheni; kana uciziʋa kuti pakati paʋo panaʋarume ʋakaŋgwara, uʋaite ʋatariri ʋeŋombe dzaŋgu.
Josefa akapinda naJakobo, ɓaɓa ʋake, akaʋaisa pamberi paFarao; Jakobo akaropafadza Farao.
Farao akati kunaJakobo: Maŋganiko mazuʋa amakore oʋupenyu bgenyu?

Jakobo akati kunaFarao: Mazuʋa amakore oʋutorwa bgaŋgu makore anezana namakumi matatu; mazuʋa amakore oʋupenyu bgaŋgu akaŋga ari mashoma hawo, akaipa, haana‐kuȿikira pamazuʋa amakore oʋupenyu bgamadziɓaɓa aŋgu pamazuʋa oʋutorwa bgaʋo.
Jakobo akaropafadza Farao, akaɓuɗa pamberi paFarao.
Ɀino Josefa akapa ɓaɓa ʋake naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake pokugara, akaʋapa nɀimbo panyika yeEgipita, kuti iʋe yaʋo, pakaiȿo‐naka panyika iyo, panyika yeRamesesi, seɀaakarairwa naFarao.
Josefa akaceŋgeta ɓaɓa ʋake, naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, naʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, akaʋapa ɀokudya aciʋereŋga naʋana ʋaʋo ʋo.
Ɀino pakaŋga pasineɀokudya panyika yose, nokuti nzara yakaŋga iri huru, nyika yeEgipita nenyika yeKanani dzikaziya nenzara.
Josefa akaʋuŋganidza mari yose yakaŋga iri panyika yeEgipita, napanyika yeKanani, yaʋakateŋga ɀiyo nayo, Josefa akaisa mari iyo mumba maFarao
Mari yose yakati yapera munyika yeEgipita, napanyika yeKanani, ʋaEgipita ʋose ʋakaʋuya kunaJosefa, ʋakati: Tipei ɀokudya, nokuti tiŋgafa seiko pamberi penyu — Nokuti mari yapera.
Josefa akati: Ʋuyai neŋombe dzenyu, ndikupei ɀokudya pamsoro peɀipfuwo ɀenyu, kana mari yapera.
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya kunaJosefa neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo; Josefa akaʋapa ɀokudya, ʋacitsinhanha namabiza, namakwai, neŋombe, nemboŋgoro; akaʋararamisa neɀokudya, ʋacitsinhanha neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo ɀose gore irero.

Gore iro rakati rapera, ʋakaʋuya kwaari negore recipiri, ʋakati kwaari: Hatiŋgaʋanziri ishe weɗu kuti mari yeɗu yose yapera, mapoka eɀipfuwo aʋa ashe weɗu; hakucina‐cakasara pamberi pashe weɗu, asi miʋiri yeɗu neminda yeɗu;

ɀino tiŋgafa seiko pamberi penyu, isu nenyika yeɗu — Titeŋgei henyu, isu nenyika yeɗu, mutipei ɀokudya, isu nenyika yedu, tiʋe ʋaranda ʋaFarao; tipei ʋo mbeu, tirarame, tirege kufa, nenyika irege kushanduka iite saŋgo.
Ɀino Josefa akateŋgera Farao nyika yose yeEgipita, nokuti ʋaEgipita ʋakateŋgesa mumŋe nomumŋe munda wake, nokuti nzara yakaŋga iri huru pamsoro paʋo, nyika ikaʋa yaFarao.
Kana ʋari ʋanhu wakaʋatamisa kumaguta, kubva kumuganhu mumŋe weEgipita kuȿikira kunomumŋe muganhu wayo.
Asi nyika yaʋaprista yoga haana‐kuiteŋga, nokuti ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋaganhurirwa mugoʋe waʋo naFarao; ʋaidya mugoʋe waʋo waʋaipiwa naFarao: naiɀoɀo haʋana‐kuteŋgesa nyika yaʋo.
Ɀino Josefa akati kuʋanhu: Tarirai, ndakateŋgera Farao imi nenyika yenyu nhasi, hedzi mbeu, mudɀare panyika.
Neŋguʋa yokukohwa munofanira kupa Farao ceshanu, ɀinna ɀicaʋa ɀenyu, ɀiʋe mbeu dzeminda, neɀokudya ɀenyu, neɀaʋari mudzimba dzenyu, neɀokudya ɀepxere dzenyu.
Iʋo ʋakati: Ndimi makaticeŋgeta; ŋgatiwane heɗu nyasha panashe weɗu, tiʋe ʋaranda ʋaFarao.
Josefa akatema mutemo panyika yeEgipita,
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara panyika yeEgipita, panyika yeGosheni, ʋakaɀiwanira fuma’mo, ʋakaɓereka ʋana, ʋakawanda kwaɀo.
Jakobo akagara panyika yeEgipita makore anegumi namanomŋe; naiɀoɀo mazuʋa aJakobo, makore oʋupenyu bgake, akaŋga ari makore anezana namakumi manna namanomŋe.

Ɀino ŋguʋa yokufa kwaIsraeri yakaŋga yasweɗera, iye akaɗana mŋanakomana wake Josefa, akati kwaari: Kana ndawana nyasha kwauri, ciisa hako ruʋoko rwako pasi pecidɀa caŋgu, undiitire ŋgoni neɀokwaɗi; rega hako kundiʋiga paEgipita;
asi kana ndaʋata namadziɓaɓa aŋgu, undibvise paEgipita, undondiʋiga mubgiro bgaʋo. Iye akati: Ndicaita seɀamataura.
Ʋakati: Ndipikire; iye akaʋapikira. Ipapo Israeri akakotamira pamusoro woʋuʋato bgake.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Josefa wakaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarira, ɓaɓa ʋako ʋanorwara; iye akatora ʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri, Manase naEfraimi.
Jakobo akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarirai, mŋanakomana wenyu, Josefa, woʋuya kwamuri. Israeri akaɀisimbaradza, akagara paʋuʋato.
Ɀino Jakobo akati kunaJosefa: Mŋari wamasimba ose wakaɀiratidza kwandiri paRuzi, panyika yeKanani, akandiropafadza,
akati kwandiri: Tarira, ndicakuɓerekesa, ndicakuwanza, ndicakuita ndudzi zhinji; ndicapa ʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera nyika ino, iʋe yaʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋako ʋaʋiri, ʋawakaɓerekerwa panyika yeEgipita, ndisati ndaȿika kwauri paEgipita, ndaʋaŋgu; Efraimi naManase ʋacaʋa ʋaŋgu saʋanaRubeni naSimeoni.
Asi ʋana ʋako, ʋawakaɓereka shure kwaʋo, ʋacaʋa ʋana ʋako, ʋacatumidzwa nezita raʋakuru ʋaʋo panhaka yaʋo.
Kana ndirini, pakubva kwaŋgu paPadani, ndakafirwa naRakeri panyika yeKanani munzira ndaȿika pedyo neEfrati, ndikamuʋiga’po panzira inoenda Efrati (rimŋe zita ndiBetrehema).
Israeri akaʋona ʋanakomana ʋaJosefa, akati: Ndiʋananiko?
Josefa akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ʋandakapiwa pano naMŋari. Ʋakati: Ƌoʋuya naʋo kwandiri ndiʋaropafadze.
Ɀino meso aIsraeri akaŋga oʋona madzerere nokukwegura, wakaŋga asicagoni kuʋona. Akaʋasweɗedza kwaʋari, Israeri akaʋaȿeta, akaʋambundikira.
Israeri akati kunaJosefa: Handina‐kufuŋga kuti ndicaʋona ciso cako ɀe, ɀino tarira, Mŋari wakandiʋonesa naʋana ʋako ʋo.
Josefa akaʋabvisa pakati pamabvi aʋo, akakotamira pasi neciso cake.
Josefa akaʋaɓata ʋari ʋaʋiri, Efraimi norudyi rwake kuruɓoshwe rwaIsraeri, naManase noruɓoshwe rwake kurudyi rwaIsraeri, akaʋasweɗedza pedyo naye.

Israeri akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake rworudyi, akaruisa pamusoro waEfraimi, waiʋa muɗuku, noruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe pamusoro waManase, akapesanisa maʋoko ake aciɀiziʋa, nokuti Manase wakaŋga ari weɗaŋgwe.
Akaropafadza Josefa, akati: Mŋari uya, wakafamba madziɓaɓa aŋgu pamberi pake, ʋana‐Abrahama naIsaka, Mŋari wakandifudza paʋupenyu bgaŋgu bgose kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi;
mutumŋa wakandidzikinura paneɀakaipa ɀose, ŋgaaropafadze ʋakomana aʋa; zita raŋgu ŋgaritumidzwe kwaʋari, namazita amadziɓaɓa aŋgu, Abrahama naIsaka, ʋawande kwaɀo panyika.
Ɀino Josefa wakati aciʋona kuti ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaisa ruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi pamusoro waEfraimi, haɀina‐kumufadza, akaɓata ruʋoko rwaɓaɓa ʋake, kuti arubvise pamusoro waEfraimi, aruise pamusoro waManase.
Josefa akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Regai kuɗaro, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, nokuti ndiye weɗaŋgwe, isai ruʋoko rwenyu pamusoro wake.
Ƃaɓa ʋake ʋakaramba, ʋakati: Ndinoziʋa, mŋana waŋgu, ndinoziʋa; naiye ʋo ucaʋa rudzi, naiye ucaʋa mukuru ʋo; asi munuŋuna wake ucaʋa mukuru kwaari, ʋana ʋake ʋacaʋa ndudzi zhinji.
Akaʋaropafadza nomusi iwoyo, akati: Newe ʋaIsraeri ʋacaropafadza, ʋaciti: Mŋari ŋgaakuite saEfraimi naManase. Akaisa Efraimi pamberi paManase.
Ɀino Israeri akati kunaJosefa: Tarira, ndofa, asi Mŋari ucaʋa nemi, ucakudzoserai kunyika yamadziɓaɓa enyu.
Newe ndinokupa mugoʋe mumŋe kupfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋako, uya wandakatorera ʋaAmori nomunondo waŋgu noʋuta bgaŋgu.
Ɀino Jakobo wakaɗana ʋanakomana ʋake, akati: Ʋuŋganai, ndikuʋudzei ɀamucaitirwa namazuʋa anoteʋera.
Ʋuŋganai, munzwe, imi ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo,
Tererai Israeri, ɓaɓa ʋenyu.
Rubeni, iwe uri ɗaŋgwe raŋgu, simba raŋgu, nokutaŋga kwesimba raŋgu;
Ʋukuru bgokukudzwa, noʋukuru bgesimba;
Unotutuma semvura, hauŋgaʋi noʋukuru;
Nokuti wakakwira kuʋuʋato bgaɓaɓa ʋako,
Ukaʋuȿiɓisa; wakakwira kumubeda waŋgu.
Simeoni naRevi ʋana ʋamai ʋamŋe;
Minondo yaʋo inhumbi dzokurwa nesimba.
Mŋeya waŋgu, rega kupinda pakuraŋgana kwaʋo,
Kukudzwa kwaŋgu, rega kusoŋganiswa neʋuŋgano dzaʋo;
Nokuti pakutsamŋa kwaʋo ʋakaʋuraya ʋanhu,
Nokuɗa kwaʋo ʋakagura marunda eŋombe.
Kutsamŋa kwaʋo ŋgakutukwe, nokuti kwakaŋga kuri kukuru;
Nehasha dzaʋo, nokuti dzakaŋga dzakaipa;
Ndicaʋaparadzanisa pakati paJakobo,
Nokuʋaparadzira pakati paIsraeri.
Iwe Juda, ucarumbidzwa nehama dzako;
Ruʋoko rwako rucaʋa pamitsipa yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋako,
Ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋako ʋacakotamira pamberi pako.
Juda mŋana weshumba;
Iwe mŋanakomana waŋgu, wakwira ucibva paneɀakaʋurawa;
Wakakotama, wakanyaŋga seshumba,
Seshumbakadzi; ndianiko ucamumutsa?
Tȿimbo yoʋushe haiŋgabvi kunaJuda,
Kana muɗonɀo womuɓati pakati petsoka dzake,
Kuȿikira Shiro aʋuya;
Ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu dzicamuerera iye.
Unosuŋgira mboŋgoro yake pamuzambiriŋga,
Nomŋana wemboŋgoro yake pamuzambiriŋga wakaiȿo‐naka;
Wakasuka ŋguʋo dzake newaini,
Neɀokufuka ɀake muropa ramazambiriŋga
Meso ake acatȿuka newaini,
Meno ake acacena nomukaka.
Zeburuni ucagara pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa;
Iye ucaʋa mhenderekedzo panopinda ɀikepe;
Muganhu wake ucaȿika paZidoni.
Isakari imboŋgoro inesimba,
Inoʋata pasi pakati pamataŋga amakwai;
Akaʋona zororo kuti rakanaka.
Nenyika kuti inofadza,
Akarerekera fudzi rake kuti atakure,
Akaʋa muɓatiri wecibaro.
Dani ucatoŋga mhaka dzaʋanhu ʋake,
Sorumŋe rwamarudzi aIsraeri.
Dani ucaʋa senyoka munzira,
Semvumbi mugwara,
Inoruma ɀitsitsinho ɀebiza;
Kuti mutaȿi waro awire pasi neshure.
Ndakamirira ruponeso rwenyu, imi Jehova.
Gadi ucaʋambga nehondo,
Asi iye ucaʋaʋamba paɀitsitsinho ɀaʋo.
Asheri ucaʋa neɀokudya ɀakakora;
Iye ucaʋuya neɀinonaka ɀinofanira madzishe.
Naftari ishece yemhembge yakasunuŋguka,
Unotaura mashoko akanaka.
Josefa iɗaʋi rinoɓereka,
Iɗaʋi rinoɓereka patsime;
Mataʋi ake anoɗarika madziro.
Ʋafuri noʋuta ʋakamutambudza kwaɀo,
Ʋakamufura, ʋakamuʋeŋga;
Asi ʋuta bgake bgakaramba ʋunesimba,
Maʋoko eɀanza ɀake akasimbiswa
Namaʋoko oWamasimba ose waJakobo,
(Ndi’po panobva Mufudzi, neBge raIsraeri),
Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako ucakuɓatsira;
Wamasimba ose, ucakuropafadza
Neropafadzo dzinobva kuɗeŋga kumsoro,
Ropafadzo dzinobva pamvura yakadzika iri pasi,
Ropafadzo dzamazamu nedzeciɀaro.
Ropafadzo dzaɓaɓa ʋako
Dzinopfuʋura ropafadzo dzamateteguru aŋgu,
Kuȿikira kumugumo wamakomo asiŋgaperi;
Dzicagara pamusoro waJosefa,
Pamusoro waiye wakaŋga ari mucinda pakati pehama dzake.
Benjamini iɓere rinoparadza;
Maŋgwanani ucadya cakaʋurawa,
Maɗeko ucagoʋera ɀaakapamba.
Aʋa ʋose ndiwo marudzi anegumi namaʋiri aIsraeri; ndiɀo ɀakataura ɓaɓa ʋaʋo kwaʋari, akaʋaropafadza; ʋakaropafadza mumŋe nomumŋe nokuropafadzwa kwake.
Akaʋaraira, akati kwaʋari: Ini ndobva ndosoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋaŋgu; mundondiʋiga kunamadziɓaɓa aŋgu, muɓako riri mumunda waEfroni, muHeti,
ɓako riri mumunda weMakpera, pakatarisana neMamre, panyika yeKanani, riya rakateŋgwa naAbrahama pamŋe cete nomunda kunaEfroni, muHeti, kuti ɀiʋe ɀake, iʋe nɀimbo yake yokuʋiga;
ndi’po paʋakaʋiga Abrahama naSara, mukadzi wake; ndi’po paʋakaʋiga Isaka naRebeka, mukadzi wake; ndi’po pandakaʋiga Rea;
munda uya neɓako riri mukati mawo, ɀakateŋgwa kuʋana ʋaHeti.
Ɀino Jakobo wakati apedza kuraira ʋanakomana ʋake, akadzosera tsoka dzake paʋuʋato, mŋeya wake ukaɓuɗa, akasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀino Josefa akawira pamsoro peciso caɓaɓa ʋake, akacema pamsoro pake, akamuȿeta.
Josefa akaraira ʋaranda ʋake dzakaŋga dziri ŋaŋga, kuti dzisasike ɓaɓa ʋake, ŋaŋga dzikasasika Israeri.
Ʋakapedza mazuʋa makumi manna naye, nokuti ndiwo aiʋa mazuʋa okusasika; naʋaEgipita ʋakamucema mazuʋa makumi manomŋe.
Ɀino mazuʋa okucema akati apera, Josefa akataura naʋeimba yaFarao, akati: Ɀino kana ndawana nyasha kwamuri, ɗoreʋai munzeʋe dzaFarao, muti:

Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakandipikisa, ʋaciti: Tarira, ndofa; mubgiro bgandakaɀicerera munyika yeKanani, ndi’mo maunofanira kundiʋiga’mo. Naiɀoɀo ɀino ɗonditenderai henyu kuti ndikwire, ndindoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndigodzoka.
Farao akati: Kwira, undoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋako, seɀaʋakakupikisa.
Ipapo Josefa akakwira kundoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋake, naʋaranda ʋose ʋaFarao ʋakakwira naye, ʋakuru ʋeimba yake, naʋakuru ʋenyika yeEgipita,
naʋeimba yose yaJosefa, naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake; asi pxere dzaʋo dzoga, namakwai aʋo, neŋombe dzaʋo, ʋakaɀisiya panyika yeGosheni,
ŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋakakwira ʋo naye, rikaʋa ɓoka guru‐guru.
Ʋakaȿika paɓuriro raAtadi, riri mhiri kwaJoridani, ʋakamucema’po nokucema kukuru kwaɀo; akacema ɓaɓa ʋake mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋaigara panyika yeKanani ʋakati ʋaciʋona kucema ikoko paɓuriro raAtadi, ʋakati: Kucema uku kukuru ndokwaʋaEgipita; naiɀoɀo nɀimbo iyo ikatumidzwa Aberi‐mizraimi, iri mhiri kwaJoridani.
Ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakamuitira seɀaakaŋga aʋaraira;

nokuti ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakandomuisa kunyika yeKanani, ʋakamuʋiga muɓako romunda weMakpera, riya rakateŋgwa naAbrahama, pamŋe cete nomunda kunaEfroni muHeti, pakatarisana neMamre, kuti ɀiʋe ɀake, iʋe nɀimbo yake yokuʋiga.
Ɀino Josefa wakati aʋiga ɓaɓa ʋake, akadzokera Egipita, iye naʋakoma ʋake, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakwira naye kundoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino ʋakoma ʋaJosefa ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋafa, ʋakati: Ɀimŋe Josefa ucatiʋeŋga, nokutitsiʋa kwaɀo ɀakaipa ɀose ɀatakamuitira.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakatuma shoko kunaJosefa, ʋaciti: Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakaraira, ʋasati ʋafa, ʋaciti:

Taurai naJosefa, muti: Ɀino ɗokaŋganwirai henyu kutadza kwaʋakoma ʋenyu; neɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nokuti ʋakakuitirai ɀakaipa; ɀino ɗokaŋganwirai kutadza kwaʋaranda ʋaMŋari waɓaɓa ʋenyu. Josefa akacema pakutaura kwaʋo naye.
Ʋakuru ʋake ʋakaenda ʋo, ʋakawira pasi pamberi pake, ʋakati: Tarirai, tiri ʋaranda ʋenyu.
Josefa akati kwaʋari: Musatya, nokuti ini ndiri pacigaro caMŋari here?
Kana muri’mi, makandifuŋgira ɀakaipa, asi Mŋari wakafuŋga kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka, kuti ɀiitwe seɀinoitwa nhasi, kuti ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋararamiswe.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino musatya: ndicakuceŋgetai, nepxere dzenyu. Akaʋanyaradza, akataura naʋo nomŋoyo wakanaka.
Josefa akagara Egipita, iye naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake; Josefa akagara makore anezana negumi.
Josefa akaʋona ʋana ʋaEfraimi ʋorudzi rwecitatu, naʋana ʋaMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, ʋakaɓerekerwa pamabvi aJosefa.
Josefa akati kuhama dzake: Ndofa, asi Mŋari ucakumutsai ɀirokwaɀo, nokukuɓuɗisai panyika ino, muende kunyika yaakapikira Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo.
Josefa akapikisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati: Mŋari ucakumutsai ɀirokwaɀo, nemi mutakure mafupa aŋgu abve pano.
Ipapo Josefa akafa, aʋa namakore anezana negumi; ʋakamusasika, akaiswa mubokisi paEgipita.
Ndiwo mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋaenda Egipita: mumŋe nomumŋe wakaenda naJakobo anaʋeimba yake:
Rubeni, naSimeoni, naRevi, naJuda,
naIsakari, naZeburuni, naBenjamini,
naDani, naNaftari, naGadi, naAsheri
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋabva muciʋuno caJakobo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe; asi Josefa wakaŋga atoʋa Egipita.
Ɀino Josefa akafa, naʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake ʋose, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanezero naʋo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓerekana, ʋakawanda kwaɀo, ʋakaʋa nesimba guru‐guru; nyika yakaŋga izere naʋo.
Ɀino paEgipita pakamuka mumŋe mambo mutȿa, wakaŋga asina‐kuziʋa Josefa.
Iye akati kuʋanhu ʋake: Tarirai, ʋanhu aʋa, ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋanotipfuʋura isu pakuwanda nesimba;
ʋuyai, ŋgatiʋafuŋgire zano, ʋarege kuwandisa, kuti kana kurwa kukamuka, iʋo ʋaŋgaɓatsirana naʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu, ʋakarwa nesu, ʋakabva panyika ino.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakagadza pamsoro paʋo ʋatariri ʋeɓasa, kuti ʋaʋanetse nemirimo yaʋo. Ʋakaʋakira Farao maguta anamatura, Pitomi neRamesesi.
Asi ʋaciramba ʋaciʋanetsa, iʋo ʋakaramba ʋaciwanda kwaɀo, ʋaciŋgopararira. Ʋakaʋora mŋoyo nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri
ƲaEgipita ʋakaʋaɓatisa ɀinorema;
ʋakanetsa ʋupenyu bgaʋo neɓasa rinorema pamatope neɀitina, namaɓasa ose eminda, maɓasa aʋo ose, ʋaciʋaɓatisa ɀinorema.
Ɀino mambo weEgipita akaʋudza madzimbuya aʋaHeberu, ʋainzi mumŋe Shifra, mumŋe Pua;
akati: Kana muciɓatsira ʋakadzi ʋaʋaHeberu paɓasa ramadzimbuya, muciʋaʋona pakupona, kana ari mŋanakomana mumuʋuraye, kana ari mŋanasikana, ŋgaararame hake.
Asi madzimbuya akaŋga acitya Mŋari, akasaita seɀaakarairwa namambo weEgipita, asi ʋakarega ʋanakomana ʋari ʋapenyu haʋo.
Mambo weEgipita akaɗana madzimbuya, akati kwaʋari: Makaitireiko iɀoɀo, mukarega ʋanakomana ʋari ʋapenyu?
Madzimbuya akati kunaFarao: Nokuti ʋakadzi ʋaʋaHeberu haʋana‐kufanana naʋakadzi ʋaʋaEgipita, nokuti ʋanesimba; mbuya ʋasati ʋaȿika kwaʋari, ʋatopona haʋo.
Naiɀoɀo Mŋari akaitira madzimbuya ɀakanaka, ʋanhu ʋakawanda kwaɀo, ʋakaʋa nesimba kwaɀo.
Ɀino madzimbuya ɀaakaŋga acitya Mŋari, iye akaʋapa mhuri.
Farao akaraira ʋanhu ʋake ʋose, akati: Ʋanakomana ʋose ʋanozoɓerekwa, muʋakandire murwizi, asi ʋasikana ʋose muʋarege ʋari ʋapenyu haʋo.
Ɀino mumŋe murume weimba yaʋaRevi wakawana mukunda waʋaRevi.
Mukadzi akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana; ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti mŋana wakanaka, akamuʋanza mŋedzi mitatu.
Wakati asicagoni kumuʋanza, akamutorera tswanda yenhokwe, akainamira nebitumini nenamo, akaisa mŋana mukati mayo, akaigadzika pakati petsaŋga pamhenderekedzo dzorwizi.
Hanɀadzi yake ikandomira kure ɀishoma, kuti aziʋe ɀicaitwa naye.
Ɀino mukunda waFarao wakaɓuruka kundoshamba murwizi, ʋasikana ʋake ʋakafamba‐famba pamhenderekedzo dzorwizi; iye akaʋona tswanda pakati petsaŋga, ndokutuma musikana wake kundoitora.
Akaizarura, akaʋona mŋana, mŋana wecikomana, ʋonei unocema. Akamunzwira ŋgoni, akati: Ndomumŋe waʋana ʋaʋaHeberu.
Ipapo hanɀadzi yake yakati kumukunda waFarao: Ko handiŋgaendi ndikakuɗanirai mumŋisi kuʋakadzi ʋaʋaHeberu, kuti akumŋisirei mŋana here?
Mukunda waFarao akati kwaari: Enda. Musikana akaenda, akandoɗana mai ʋomŋana.
Mukunda waFarao akati kwaari: Tora mŋana uyu, undimŋisire iye, ndigokupa muɓairo wako. Mukadzi akatora mŋana, akandomumŋisa.
Mŋana akakura, akandomuisa kumukunda waFarao, akaʋa mŋanakomana wake, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Mosesi, akati: Nokuti ndamunyukura mumvura.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo Mosesi akura, akaenda kundoʋona hama dzake, akandotarira mirimo yaʋo; akaʋona muEgipita aciroʋa muHeberu, mumŋe wehama dzake.
Akariŋga‐riŋga, ɀino aciʋona kuti hapanomunhu’po, akaʋuraya muEgipita, akamuʋiga mujeca.
Akaɓuɗa ɀe nezuʋa recipiri, akaʋona ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋaHeberu ʋacirwa; akati kunaiye waiʋa nemhoȿa: Unoroʋereiko munhu wokwako?
Iye akati: Ndianiko wakakuita ishe nomutoŋgi weɗu? Unoɗa kundiʋuraya ini seɀawakaʋuraya uya muEgipita kanhi? Mosesi akatya, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, cinhu ici cazikanwa.
Ɀino Farao wakati anzwa cinhu ico, akatȿaka kuʋuraya Mosesi. Asi Mosesi wakatiza pamberi paFarao, akandogara kunyika yeMidiani, akagara pasi patsime.
Ɀino muprista weMidiani wakaŋga anaʋakunda ʋanomŋe; iʋo ʋakaʋuya kuzocera mvura, ʋakazadza ɀinwiro, kuti ʋanwise makwai aɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ʋafudzi ʋakaʋuya, ʋakaʋadziŋga’po, asi Mosesi wakasimuka, akaʋaɓatsira, akanwisa makwai aʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika kunaRehueri, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, iʋo ʋakati: Makurumidza kudzoka seiko nhasi?
Ʋakati: MuEgipita wakatirwira pamaʋoko aʋafudzi, akaticerera mvura, akanwisa makwai.
Akati kuʋakunda ʋake: Ɀino uripiko? Munhu uyu mamusiyirei? Muɗanei, adye ɀokudya.
Mosesi akatenda kugara nomunhu uyo; akapa Mosesi mukunda wake Zipora.
Akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Gershomi, nokuti wakati: Ndakaŋga ndiri mutorwa munyika yaʋamŋe.
Ɀino mazuʋa mazhinji akati apfuʋura, mambo weEgipita akafa; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakagomera nokuɗa kwoʋuranda bgaʋo, ʋakaɗanidzira, kuɗanidzira kwaʋo kukaȿika kunaMŋari nokuɗa kwoʋuranda.
Mŋari akanzwa kugomba kwaʋo, Mŋari akaraŋgarira suŋgano yake naAbrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo.
Mŋari akaʋona ʋana ʋaIsraeri, Mŋari akaʋaraŋgarira.
Ɀino Mosesi wakaŋga acifudza makwai aJetero, mukarabga wake, muprista weMidiani; akaisa makwai mberi murenje, akaȿika kugomo raMŋari rinonzi Horebi.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova akaɀiratidza kwaari mumuraɀo womŋoto pakati pegwenzi; akatarira, akaʋona gwenzi ricipfuta nomŋoto, asi rakaŋga risiŋgatȿi.
Mosesi akati: Regai, nditsaukire ndiʋone cishamiso ico cikuru, kuti gwenzi haritȿi neiko.
Ɀino Jehova wakati aciʋona kuti wotsaukira kuti aʋone, Mŋari akaɗana ari mukati megwenzi, akati: Mosesi, Mosesi! Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Usasweɗera pano; bvisa shaŋgu dzako patsoka dzako, nokuti paumire patȿene.
Akati ʋo: Ndini Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako, naMŋari waAbrahama, naMŋari waIsaka, naMŋari waJakobo. Mosesi akaʋanza ciso cake, nokuti wakatya kutarira Mŋari.
Ɀino Mŋari akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakaʋona kunetswa kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋari muEgipita, ndikanzwa kuɗanidzira kwaʋo nokuɗa kwaʋatariri ʋaʋo ʋamaɓasa; nokuti ndinoziʋa kucema kwaʋo;

ndaɓuruka kuti ndiʋarwire mumaʋoko aʋaEgipita nokuʋaɓuɗisa munyika iyo, ndindoʋaisa kunyika yakanaka huru, kunyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci; uko kunogara ʋaKanani, naʋaHeti, naʋaAmori, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi.
Ɀino tarira, kucema kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri kwakaȿika kwandiri, ndaʋona kutambudzwa kwaʋanotambudzwa nako naʋaEgipita.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ʋuya ndikutume kunaFarao, kuti undoɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri muEgipita.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaMŋari: Ini ndini aniko, kuti ndiende kunaFarao, ndiɓuɗise ʋana ʋaIsraeri muEgipita here?
Akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndicaʋa newe; heci ciratidzo cokuti ndakutuma: Kana maɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu muEgipita, mucanamata Mŋari pagomo rino.
Ipapo Mosesi akati kunaMŋari: Tarirai, kana ndikaȿika kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, ndikati kwaʋari: Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu wakandituma kwamuri, iʋo ʋakati kwandiri: Ko zita rake ndiani? ndicatiyi kwaʋari?
Mŋari akati kunaMosesi: NDICAƲA IYE WANDICAƲA. Akati: Undoti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: NDICAƲA ndiye wakandituma kwamuri.

Mŋari akati ʋo kunaMosesi: Undoti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Jehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu, Mŋari waAbrahama, naMŋari waIsaka, naMŋari waJakobo, wakandituma kwamuri; ndiro zita raŋgu nokusiŋgaperi, ndiro zita raʋacandiraŋgarira naro kuȿikira kumarudzi ose.

Enda, undoʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Jehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu, Mŋari waAbrahama, nowaIsaka, nowaJakobo, wakaɀiratidza kwandiri, akati: Ndakakushanyirai ɀirokwaɀo, ndikaʋona iɀo ɀamakaitirwa Egipita;
ndikati: Ndicakuɓuɗisai pakunetswa kwenyu paEgipita, ndimuise kunyika yaʋaKanani, neyaʋaHeti, neyaʋaAmori, neyaʋaPerezi, neyaʋaHivi, neyaʋaJebusi, kunyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.

Ʋacaterera inzwi rako; uende, iwe naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, kunamambo weEgipita, muti kwaari: Jehova, Mŋari waʋaHeberu, wakasoŋgana nesu; ɀino titendere kuenda rwendo rwamazuʋa matatu murenje, tindoɓayira Jehova, Mŋari weɗu.
Ndinoziʋa kuti mambo weEgipita haaŋgakutenderiyi kuenda, kwete, kunyaŋge noruʋoko runesimba.
Ndicatambanudza ruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndiroʋe Egipita neɀishamiso ɀaŋgu ɀose, ɀandicaita’mo; pashure ucakutenderai kuenda.
Ndicapa ʋanhu aʋa nyasha pamberi paʋaEgipita, kuti kana mucizoenda, murege kuenda musinecinhu.

Asi mukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kukumbira kunowaanogara naye, nokumutorwa unogara mumba make, ʋukomba bgesirveri nobgendarama, neŋguʋo, kuti mufukidze ʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu; munofanira kutorera ʋaEgipita
Ɀino Mosesi akapindura, akati: Asi tarirai, haʋaŋganditendi, kana kuterera inzwi raŋgu, nokuti ʋacati: Jehova haana‐kuɀiratidza kwauri.
Jehova akati kwaari: Cinyiko ico ciri muruʋoko rwako? Akati: Itȿimbo.
Akati: Ikandire pasi. Akaikandira pasi, ikashanduka nyoka, Mosesi akaitiza.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tambanudza ruʋoko rwako, uiɓate parumhinda; (iye akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akaiɓata, ikashanduka tȿimbo muruʋoko rwake);
kuti ʋatende kuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, Mŋari waAbrahama, naMŋari waIsaka, naMŋari waJakobo, wakaɀiratidza kwauri.
Jehova akati ʋo kwaari: Isa ruʋoko rwako mucifuʋa cako: akaisa ruʋoko rwake mucifuʋa cake; ɀino wakati acirubvisa, ʋonei ruʋoko rwake rwaʋa namaperembudzi, rwati
Akati: Isa ruʋoko rwako mucifuʋa cako ɀe. (Iye akaisa ruʋoko rwake mucifuʋa cake ɀe; ɀino wakati acirubvisa mucifuʋa cake, ʋonei rwashanduka ɀe senyama yake.)
Ɀino kana ʋaciramba kukutenda, kana kuterera inzwi reciratidzo cokutaŋga, ʋacatenda inzwi reciratidzo cecipiri.
Ɀino kana ʋaciramba kutenda ɀiratidzo iɀo ɀiʋiri, kana kutenda inzwi rako, ucere mvura yomurwizi, uiɗururire pakawoma, ipapo mvura yawacera icashanduka ropa ipapo pakawoma.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaJehova: Haiwa, Jehova, handizi munhu
Jehova akati kwaari: Ndianiko wakaita muromo womunhu, ndianiko unoita mbeʋeʋe kana matsi, kana unoʋona, kana ɓofu? Ko handizini Jehova here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cienda, ini ndicaʋa muromo wako, ndikudzidzise ɀaunofanira kutaura.
Iye akati: Haiwa, Ishe, tumai henyu wamunoɗa kutuma naye.

Ɀino kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira Mosesi, akati: Ko Aroni, mukoma wako, muRevi, haazi’po here? Ndinoziʋa kuti iye unogona kutaura kwaɀo. Ɀino tarira, wotoɓuɗa kusoŋgana newe; kana acikuʋona ucafara mumŋoyo make.
Utaure naye, ugoisa mashoko mumuromo make; ini ndicaʋa nomuromo wako, ʋuye nomuromo wake, ndikudzidzisei ɀamunofanira kuita.
Iye ucataura naʋanhu panɀimbo yako, agoʋa muromo wako, iwe ucaʋa saMŋari kwaari.
Ɀino tora tȿimbo iyi muruʋoko rwako, ugoita ɀiratidzo nayo.

Ɀino Mosesi wakaenda, akadzokera kunaJetero, mukarabga wake, akati kwaari: Ƌonditenderai henyu kuenda, ndidzokere kuhama dzaŋgu Egipita, ndindoʋona kana ʋaciri ʋapenyu. Jetero akati kunaMosesi: Enda hako norugare.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi paMidiani: Enda, udzokere Egipita, nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋaitȿaka kukuʋuraya ʋakafa.
Ipapo Mosesi akatora mukadzi wake naʋana ʋake ʋaʋakomana, akaʋataȿisa pamboŋgoro, akadzokera kunyika yeEgipita; Mosesi akatora tȿimbo yaMŋari muruʋoko rwake.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Kana wodzokera Egipita, cenjera kuti uite pamberi paFarao ɀishamiso ɀose ɀandaisa muruʋoko rwako; asi ndicawomesa mŋoyo wake, kuti arege kutendera ʋanhu kuenda.
Ɀino undoti kunaFarao: Ɀanzi naJehova: Israeri, mŋanakomana waŋgu, iɗaŋgwe raŋgu;
ndakati kwauri: Tendera mŋanakomana waŋgu kuenda andinamate; iwe ukaramba kumutendera; ɀino tarira ndicaʋuraya mŋanakomana wako weɗaŋgwe.
Ɀino ʋaciri panzira, paʋakaŋga ʋaʋata, Jehova akasoŋgana naye, akatȿaka kumuʋuraya.
Ipapo Zipora akatora ibge rinopinza, akaceka rukanda rwapamberi rwomŋanakomana wake, akarukanda patsoka dzake, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, uri cikomba ceropa kwandiri.
Naiɀoɀo wakamurega. Ipapo akati: Uri cikomba ceropa nokuɗa kwokudziŋgiswa.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaAroni: Enda kurenje undosoŋgana naMosesi. Iye akaenda, akandosoŋgana naye pagomo raMŋari, akamuȿeta.
Ipapo Mosesi akaʋudza Aroni mashoko ose aJehova, aakaŋga amutuma nawo, neɀiratidzo ɀose ɀaakaŋga amuraira.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaenda, ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋose ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Aroni akataura mashoko ose akataurwa naJehova kunaMosesi, akaita ɀiratidzo pamberi pameso aʋanhu.
Ʋanhu ʋakatenda; ɀino ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti Jehova washanyira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, akaʋona kunetswa kwaʋo, ʋakakotamisa misoro yaʋo, ʋakanamata
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Mosesi naAroni ʋakaenda, ʋakati kunaFarao: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda, kuti ʋandiitire mutambo murenje.
Farao akati: Jehova ndiye aniko, kuti nditerere inzwi rake, kuti nditendere ʋaIsraeri kuenda? Handimuziʋi iye Jehova, neni handiŋgatenderi ʋaIsraeri kuenda.
Ʋakati: Mŋari waʋaHeberu wakasoŋgana nesu; ɗotitenderai kuenda rwendo rwamazuʋa matatu murenje, tindoɓayira Jehova Mŋari weɗu; kuti arege kutiroʋa neɗenda kana nomunondo.
Ipapo mambo weEgipita akati kwaʋari: Imi Mosesi naAroni, munotsausireiko ʋanhu pamaɓasa aʋo? Endai kumirimo yenyu.
Farao akati: Tarirai, ʋanhu ʋenyika ino ʋatoʋa ʋazhinji, ɀino imi moɗa kuʋazorodza pamirimo yaʋo.
Nomusi iwoyo Farao akaraira ʋarairi ʋamaɓasa aʋanhu, naʋatariri ʋaʋo, akati:
Musaramba mucipa ʋanhu ʋuswa bgokuita ɀitina nabgo, seɀamakaita kuȿikira ɀino; ŋgaʋaende ʋandoɀiʋuŋganidzira ʋuswa ʋamene.
Asi ɀitina ɀaʋakaita kuȿikira ɀino, muʋatarire iɀoɀo; musaɀitapudza, nokuti haʋana‐caʋanoɓata, saka ʋanoɗana, ʋaciti: Titenderei tindoɓayira Mŋari weɗu.
Ʋarume ŋgaʋawedzerwe ɓasa rinorema, ʋaremerwe naro; kuti ʋarege kuraŋgarira mashoko enhema.
Ipapo ʋarairi ʋamabasa aʋanhu naʋatariri ʋaʋo ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakataura naʋanhu, ʋakati: Ɀanzi naFarao: Handicakupiyi ʋuswa.
Endai mumene mundoɀitorera ʋuswa pamuŋgaʋuwana, nokuti ɓasa renyu haritapudzwi.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakapararira kunyika yose yeEgipita kuzoʋuŋganidza mashaŋga panɀimbo yoʋuswa.
Ʋarairi ʋamaɓasa ʋakaʋakurudzira, ʋaciti: Pedzai ɓasa renyu, maɓasa amaifanira kuita mazuʋa ose mucinoʋuswa.
Naʋatariri ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋaiswa pamsoro paʋo naʋarairi ʋaFarao, ʋaisirobga, ɀicinzi: Makaregerei kupedza ɓasa renyu razuro neranhasi muciita ɀitina seɀamakaita kuȿikira ɀino?
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya ʋacicema kunaFarao, ʋaciti: Munoitireiko kuɗaro naʋaranda ʋenyu?
Ʋaranda ʋenyu haʋapiwi ʋuswa, asi ʋanoti kwatiri: Itai ɀitina; tarirai ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋanorobga, asi mhaka iri kuʋanhu ʋenyu.
Asi iye akati: Hamuna‐camunoɓata, hamuna‐camunoɓata, saka munoti: Titenderei kundoɓayira Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo endai ɀino, muɓate, nokuti hamucapiwi ʋuswa, asi munofanira kupedza ɀitina ɀakatarwa.
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋona kuti ʋari panjodzi, ɀaɀakanzi: Hamuŋgatapudzi paɀitina ɀenyu, ɀamunofanira kuita mazuʋa ose.
Ʋakasoŋgana naMosesi naAroni, ʋakaŋga ʋamire panzira pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo pamberi paFarao;
ʋakati kwaʋari: Jehova ŋgaakutarirei akutoŋgei, nokuti matinyadzisa pamberi paFarao naʋaranda ʋake, Mukaisa munondo muruʋoko rwaʋo wokutiʋuraya nawo.
Ipapo Mosesi akadzokera kunaJehova, akati: Ishe, maitireiko ʋanhu aʋa ɀakaipa? Manditumireiko?
Nokuti kubva paŋguʋa yandakaenda nayo kunaFarao kundotaura nezita renyu, iye wakaitira ʋanhu aʋa ɀakaipa; hamuna‐kutoŋgorwira ʋanhu ʋenyu.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ɀino mucaʋona ɀandicaitira Farao, nokuti ucaʋatendera kuenda noruʋoko runesimba, ucaʋadziŋga munyika yake noruʋoko runesimba.
Mŋari akataura ʋo naMosesi, akati kwaari: Ndini JEHOVA.
Ndakaɀiratidza kunaAbrahama, nokunaIsaka, nokunaJakobo ndiri Mŋari wamasimba ose, asi ndakaŋga ndisiŋgazikanwi naʋo nezita raŋgu rinonzi JEHOVA.
Ɀino ndakasimbisa suŋgano yaŋgu naʋo kuti ndiʋape nyika yeKanani, nyika yoʋutorwa bgaʋo, maʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatorwa.
Ndakanzwa kugomba kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasuŋgwa naʋaEgipita paʋuranda, ndikaraŋgarira suŋgano yaŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo muti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Ndini Jehova, ini ndicakuɓuɗisai pamirimo yaʋaEgipita, ndicakusunuŋgurai paʋuranda bgenyu, ndicakudzikinurai noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ʋuye nokutoŋga kukuru.
Ndicakutorai imi kuti muʋe ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ini ndicaʋa Mŋari wenyu; imi mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu, iye unokuɓuɗisai pamirimo yaʋaEgipita.
Ndicakuisai kunyika, yandakasimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kuti ndiipe Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo; ndicakupai iyo iʋe nhaka yenyu; ndini Jehova.
Mosesi akataura saiɀoɀo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, asi haʋana‐kuterera Mosesi nokuɗa kweshuŋgu dzomŋeya nedzoʋuranda bgakaŋga ʋucirema.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Pinda, undotaura naFarao mambo weEgipita, kuti atendere ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuɓuɗa munyika yake.
Mosesi akataura pamberi paJehova, akati: Tarirai, ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋana‐kunditerera; ɀino Farao uŋganditerera seiko, ini munhu unemiromo isina‐kudziŋgiswa?
Ipapo Jehova akataura naMosesi naAroni, akaʋatuma neshoko kuʋana ʋaIsraeri nokunaFarao, mambo weEgipita, kuti ʋaɓuɗise ʋana ʋaIsraeri munyika yeEgipita.
Ndiyo misoro yedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo: Ʋanakomana ʋaRubeni, ɗaŋgwe raIsraeri, ʋaiʋa Hanoki, naParu, naHezroni, naKarmi; ndiʋo ʋedzimba dzaRubeni.
Ʋanakomana ʋaSimeoni ʋaiʋa Jemueri, naJamini, naOhadi, naJakini, naZohari, naShauri, mŋanakomana womukadzi muKanani; ndiʋo ʋedzimba dzaSimeoni.
Ndiwo mazita aʋanakomana ʋaRevi namarudzi aʋo: Gershoni, naKohati, naMerari; makore oʋupenyu bgaRevi aiʋa makore anezana namakumi matanhatu namanomŋe.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGershoni ʋaiʋa Ribni, naShimei, namarudzi aʋo.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKohati ʋaiʋa Amrami, naIzari, naHebroni, naUzieri; makore oʋupenyu bgaKohati aiʋa makore anezana namakumi matatu namatatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari ʋaiʋa Makri, naMushi. Ndiʋo ʋedzimba dzaʋaRevi pamarudzi aʋo.
Amrami akawana Jokebedi, hanɀadzi yaɓaɓa ʋake, iye akamuɓerekera Aroni naMosesi; makore oʋupenyu bgaAmrami aiʋa makore anezana namakumi matatu namanomŋe.
Ʋanakomana ʋaIzari ʋaiʋa Kora, naNefegi, naZikri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaUzieri ʋaiʋa Mishaeri, naErzafani, naSitri.
Aroni akawana Erisheba, mukunda waAminadabi, hanɀadzi yaNashoni, iye akamuɓerekera Nadabi naAbihu, naEreazari, naItamari.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKora ʋaiʋa Asiri, naErikana, naAbiasafi; ndiʋo ʋedzimba dzaʋaKora.
Ereazari, mŋanakomana waAroni, akawana mumŋe waʋakunda ʋaPutieri, iye akamuɓerekera Pinehasi. Ndiyo misoro
Ndiʋo ʋaya ʋanaAroni naMosesi ʋakanzi naJehova: Ƃuɗisai ʋana ʋaIsraeri munyika yeEgipita nehondo dzaʋo.
Ndiʋo ʋakataura naFarao, mambo weEgipita, kuti ʋaɓuɗise ʋana ʋaIsraeri muEgipita; ndiʋo ʋaya ʋanaMosesi naAroni.
Nomusi iwoyo Jehova akataura naMosesi munyika yeEgipita,
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati: Ndini Jehova; ʋudza Farao, mambo weEgipita, ɀinhu ɀose ɀandakakuʋudza.
Ipapo Mosesi akati pamberi paJehova: Tarirai, ndiri munhu unemiromo isina‐kudziŋgiswa, ɀino Farao ucanditerera seiko?
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tarira, ndakuita samŋari kunaFarao; Aroni, mukoma wako, ucaʋa muprofita wako.
Taura ɀose ɀandinokuraira; Aroni, mukoma wako, ucataura naFarao, kuti atendere ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋaɓuɗe munyika yake.
Ini ndicawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, ndicawanza ɀiratidzo ɀaŋgu neɀishamiso ɀaŋgu panyika yeEgipita.
Asi Farao haaŋgakutereriyi; ipapo ndicaisa ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro peEgipita, ndikaɓuɗisa hondo dzaŋgu, iʋo ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri, munyika yeEgipita nokutoŋga kukuru.
ƲaEgipita ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndicitambanudza ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro peEgipita, ndicibvisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri pakati paʋo.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ʋakaita saiɀoɀo.
Mosesi wakaŋga anamakore makumi masere, naAroni makore makumi masere namatatu, paŋguʋa yaʋakataura naFarao.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Kana Farao acitaura nemi, akati: Tiratidzei cinoshamisa, uti kunaAroni: Tora tȿimbo yako, uikandire pasi pamberi paFarao, ishanduke nyoka.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakapinda kunaFarao, ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova, Aroni akakandira tȿimbo yake pasi pamberi paFarao napamberi paʋaranda ʋake, ikashanduka nyoka.
Ipapo Farao akaɗana ʋo ʋakacenjera naʋaroyi; naiʋo ʋo, idzo ŋaŋga dzeEgipita, ʋakaita saiɀoɀo noʋuroyi bgaʋo.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakakandira pasi tȿimbo yake, dzikashanduka nyoka; asi tȿimbo yaAroni yakamedza tȿimbo dzaʋo.
Ɀino mŋoyo waFarao ukawomeswa, akasaʋaterera; seɀakarebga naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Mŋoyo waFarao mukukutu, haaɗi kutendera ʋanhu kuenda.
Enda kunaFarao maŋgwanani; tarira, ucaɓuɗa acienda kumvura; iwe undomira pamhenderekedzo dzorwizi kuti usoŋgane naye, wakaɓata muruʋoko rwako tȿimbo iya yakashanduka nyoka.
Ugoti kwaari: Jehova, Mŋari waʋaHeberu, wakandituma kwauri, aciti: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandinamate murenje; ɀino tarira, kuȿikira ɀino hauna‐kunditerera.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova necinhu ici: Tarira, ndicaroʋa mvura iri murwizi netȿimbo iri muruʋoko rwaŋgu, ikashanduka ropa.
Hoʋe dziri murwizi dzicafa, rwizi rucanhuwa; ʋaEgipita ʋacanetswa nokutȿaka kunwa mvura yorwizi.

Jehova akati ʋo kunaMosesi: Uti kunaAroni: Tora tȿimbo yako, utambanudzire ruʋoko rwako pamsoro pemvura yaʋaEgipita, pamsoro penzizi dzaʋo, napamsoro pehoʋa dzaʋo, napamsoro pamadziʋa aʋo, napamsoro pamakaŋgwa aʋo ose, ɀishanduke ropa; riʋe’po panyika yose yeEgipita, mumidziyo yose yamatanda nemidziyo yamabge.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova, ʋakasimudza tȿimbo, ʋakaroʋa mvura yakaŋga iri murwizi pamberi paFarao napamberi paʋaranda ʋake, mvura yose yomurwizi ikashanduka ropa.
Hoʋe dzomurwizi dzikafa, rwizi rukanhuwa, ʋaEgipita ʋakasagona kunwa mvura yorwizi; ropa rikaʋa’po panyika yose yeEgipita.
Ŋaŋga dzeEgipita dzikaita ʋo saiɀoɀo noʋuroyi bgadzo; asi mŋoyo waFarao wakawomeswa, akasaʋaterera, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova.
Ipapo Farao akadzoka, akapinda mumba make; haana‐kuraŋgarira necinhu ici ʋo.
ƲaEgipita ʋose ʋakacera nhiʋi dzorwizi ʋacitsaka mvura yokunwa; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kunwa mvura yorwizi.
Mazuʋa manomŋe akapera kubva pakurobga kworwizi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaMosesi: Pinda kunaFarao, uti kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandondinamata.
Kana ukaramba kuʋatendera, tarira, ndicaroʋa nyika yako yose namataca;

rwizi rucazara kwaɀo namataca; acakwira, acipinda mumba mako, nomuimba yako yokuʋata, napanhoʋo dzako, nomudzimba dzaʋaranda ʋako, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋako, nomuɀoto ɀako, nomumidziyo yako momunokanyira
mataca acakwira pamsoro pako napamsoro paʋanhu ʋako, napamsoro paʋaranda ʋako ʋose.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Iti kunaAroni: Tambanudzira ruʋoko rwako rwakaɓata tȿimbo yako pamsoro penzizi, napamsoro pehoʋa, napamsoro pamadziʋa, uraire mataca kuti akwire panyika yeEgipita.
Ipapo Aroni akatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake pamsoro pemvura yeEgipita, mataca akakwira, akafukidza nyika yeEgipita.
Ŋaŋga dzikaita saiɀoɀo noʋuroyi bgadzo dzikaraira mataca, kuti akwire panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino Farao akaɗana Mosesi naAroni, akati: Nyeŋgeterai kunaJehova kuti abvise mataca kwandiri nokuʋanhu ʋaŋgu, nditendere ʋanhu kuenda kundoɓayira Jehova.
Mosesi akati kunaFarao: Imi mukudzwe kupfuʋure’ni! Ndokunyeŋgetererai ŋguʋa ipi, imi naʋaranda ʋenyu, naʋanhu ʋenyu, kuti mataca aparadzwe kwamuri, nomudzimba dzenyu, asare murwizi ɓedzi?
Iye akati: Maŋgwana. Akati: Ɀicaitwa seɀamareʋa; kuti muziʋe kuti hakunomumŋe wakafanana naJehova, Mŋari weɗu.
Mataca acabva kwamuri, nomudzimba dzenyu, nokuʋaranda ʋenyu, nokuʋanhu ʋenyu; acasara murwizi ɓedzi.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaɓuɗa munaFarao, Mosesi akaɗana kunaJehova nokuɗa kwamataca aakaŋga atuma kunaFarao.
Jehova akaita seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naMosesi, mataca akafa mudzimba nomuʋazhe nokuruwa.
Ʋakaaʋuŋganidza, ʋakaaita mirwi, nyika ikanhuwa.
Ɀino Farao wakati aciʋona kuti ɀaʋa ɀirinani, akawomesa mŋoyo wake, akasaʋaterera; seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Iti kunaAroni: Tambanudza tȿimbo yako, uroʋe guruʋa rapasi, rishanduke ʋutuŋga panyika yose yeEgipita.
Ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; Aroni akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake rwakaɓata tȿimbo yake, akaroʋa guruʋa rapasi, ʋutuŋga ʋukaʋa’po paʋanhu napaɀipfuwo; guruʋa rose rapasi rikashanduka ʋutuŋga panyika yose yeEgipita.
Ŋaŋga dzikaita saiɀoɀo noʋuroyi bgadzo kuti dziɓuɗise ʋutuŋga, asi hadzina‐kugona; ʋutuŋga bgakaŋga ʋuri paʋanhu napaɀipfuwo.
Ɀino ŋaŋga dzakati kunaFarao: Munwe waMŋari; asi mŋoyo waFarao wakawomeswa, akasaʋaterera, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaMosesi: Fumira maŋgwanani, undomira pamberi paFarao; tarira, ucaɓuɗa acienda kumvura; uti kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandinamate.

Nokuti kana ukaramba kutendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, tarira ndicatuma ɓute renhunzi pamsoro pako, napamsoro paʋaranda ʋako, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋako, nomudzimba dzako; dzimba dzaʋaEgipita dzicazara namapute enhunzi, kunyaŋge nevu padzimire.
Nomusi iwoyo ndicatsaura nyika yeGosheni pagere ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, kuti ipapo mapute enhunzi arege kuʋa’po; kuti uziʋe kuti ndini Jehova pakati penyika dzose.
Ndicaparadzanisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu naʋanhu ʋako; ciratidzo ici cicaʋa’po maŋgwana.
Ɀino Jehova akaita saiɀoɀo, mapute makuru‐kuru enhunzi akapinda mumba maFarao, nomudzimba dzaʋaranda ʋake, nomunyika yose yeEgipita; nyika ikaʋodzwa namapute enhunzi.
Ɀino Farao akaɗana Mosesi naAroni, akati: Endai, mundoɓayira Mŋari wenyu munyika ino.
Mosesi akati: Haɀina‐kunaka kuita saiɀoɀo, nokuti ticaɓayira Jehova, Mŋari weɗu, ɀiɓayiro ɀinonyaŋgadza ʋaEgipita; tarirai, kana tikaɓayira ɀinonyaŋgadza ʋaEgipita haʋaŋgatitaki namabge here?
Ticaenda rwendo rwamazuʋa matatu murenje, tigoɓayira Jehova Mŋari weɗu seɀaanotiraira.
Farao akati: Ndicakutenderai kuenda mundoɓayira Jehova Mŋari wenyu murenje, asi musaenda kure‐kure. Ndinyeŋgetererei.

Mosesi akati: Tarirai, ndinoɓuɗa kwamuri, ndicandonyeŋgetera kunaJehova kuti mapute enhunzi abve kunaFarao, nokuʋaranda ʋake, nokuʋanhu ʋake maŋgwana; asi Farao ŋgaarege kuzonyeŋgera ɀe, aciramba kutendera ʋanhu kuenda kundoɓayira Jehova.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɓuɗa kunaFarao, akandonyeŋgetera kunaJehova.
Jehova akaita seɀakakumbira Mosesi, akabvisa mapute enhunzi kunaFarao, nokuʋaranda ʋake, nokuʋanhu ʋake; haina‐kusara kunyaŋge neimŋe.
Asi Farao wakawomesa mŋoyo wake neŋguʋa iyo ʋo, akasatendera ʋanhu kuenda.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Pinda kunaFarao, undomuʋudza, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waʋaHeberu: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandinamate.
Nokuti kana ukaramba kuʋatendera, ukaramba uciʋadziʋisa,

tarira, ruʋoko rwaJehova rucaʋa pamsoro peɀipfuwo ɀako ɀiri kusaŋgo, napamsoro pamabiza, napamsoro pemboŋgoro, napamsoro pamakamera, napamsoro peŋombe, napamsoro peɀipfuwo ɀiɗuku; hosha yakaipa kwaɀo icaʋa’po.
Jehova ucaraʋura ɀipfuwo ɀaʋaIsraeri paɀipfuwo ɀaʋaEgipita; hapanecimŋe ciŋgafa paɀipfuwo ɀose ɀaʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehova akatara ŋguʋa, akati: Maŋgwana Jehova ucaita cinhu ici munyika ino.
Fume maŋgwana Jehova akaita cinhu ico, ɀipfuwo ɀose ɀeEgipita ɀikafa; asi paɀipfuwo ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri hapana‐ɀakafa, kunyaŋge necimŋe cete.
Farao akatuma
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi naAroni: Torai tsama dzamaɗota ecoto, Mosesi aakushire kuɗeŋga pamberi paFarao.
Acashanduka guruʋa rakatsetseka panyika yose yeEgipita, aciita mamota anoputika semhoni paʋanhu napaɀipfuwo ɀose ɀeEgipita.
Iʋo ʋakatora maɗota ecoto, ʋakamira pamberi paFarao, Mosesi akaakushira kuɗeŋga, akaita mamota anoputika semhoni paʋanhu napaɀipfuwo.
Ɀino ŋaŋga dzakaŋga dzisiŋgagoni kumira pamberi paMosesi nokuɗa kwamamota, nokuti mamota akaŋga ari paŋaŋga napaʋaEgipita ʋose.
Jehova wakawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, akasaʋaterera, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova kunaMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaMosesi: Fumira maŋgwanani, undomira pamberi paFarao, uti kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waʋaHeberu: Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandinamate.
Nokuti neŋguʋa ino ndicatuma maɗambudziko aŋgu ose pamsoro pomŋoyo wako, napamsoro paʋaranda ʋako, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋako, uziʋe kuti hapana‐wakafanana neni panyika dzose.
Nokuti ɗai ndisakaɗaro, ndiŋgaɗai ndaitambanudza ruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndikakuroʋa iwe naʋanhu ʋako nehosha yakaipa, ukaparadzwa cose panyika;
asi ɀirokwaɀo ndakakuraramisa nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo, kuti ndikuratidze simba raŋgu, ʋuye kuti zita raŋgu rikurumbire kunyika dzose.
Ɀino ucaramba uciŋgoɀikudza ucirwa naʋanhu ʋaŋgu, usiŋgaɗi kuʋatendera kuenda here?
Tarira, maŋgwana, neŋguʋa yakaita seino, ndicanisa cimvuramabge cakaipa kwaɀo, cisina‐kumboʋa’po paEgipita kubva pakuʋambga kwayo kuȿikira ɀino.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino tuma ʋanhu, uʋuŋganidze ɀipfuwo ɀako neɀose ɀaunaɀo kusaŋgo, nokuti ʋanhu ʋose neɀipfuwo ɀose ɀinowanikwa kusaŋgo, ɀisina‐kuiswa mudzimba, ɀicarobga necimvuramabge ɀikafa.
Ɀino ʋakatya shoko raJehova pakati paʋaranda ʋaFarao ʋakaraira kuti ʋaranda ʋaʋo neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo ɀitizire mudzimba.
Asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgatereri shoko raJehova, ʋakarega ʋaranda ʋaʋo neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo kusaŋgo.

Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tambanudzira ruʋoko rwako kuɗeŋga, cimvuramabge ciʋe’po panyika yose yeEgipita, pamsoro paʋanhu, napamsoro peɀipfuwo, napamsoro pemiriʋo yose yeminda panyika yose yeEgipita.
Mosesi akatambanudzira tȿimbo yake kuɗeŋga, Jehova akatuma kutinhira necimvuramabge, mŋoto
Cimvuramabge cikaʋa’po, nomŋoto wakaveŋgana necimvuramabge, cikanyanya kwaɀo, cisina‐kumboʋa’po panyika yose yeEgipita, kubva pakutaŋga kworudzi ipapo.
Cimvuramabge cikaroʋa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri kusaŋgo, ʋanhu neɀipfuwo, panyika yose yeEgipita; cimvuramabge cikaroʋa miriʋo yose yeminda, cikavuna miti yose yesaŋgo.
Asi munyika yeGosheni ɓedzi, imo makaŋga munaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ndi’po pakaŋga pasinecimvuramabge.
Ɀino Farao akatuma ʋanhu kundoɗana Mosesi naAroni, akati kwaʋari: Ŋguʋa ino ndatadza; Jehova wakarurama, asi ini naʋaranda ʋaŋgu takaipa.
Nyeŋgeterai kunaJehova, nokuti kutinhira kukuru kwaMŋari necimvuramabge ɀariŋgana; ndicakutenderai kuenda, murege kugara.
Mosesi akati kwaari: Kana ndaŋgoɓuɗa paguta, ndicatambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu kunaJehova; ipapo kutinhira kucanyarara, necimvuramabge hacicazoʋi’po; mucaziʋa kuti nyika yose ndeyaJehova.
Asi kana muri’mi naʋaranda ʋenyu, ndinoziʋa kuti hamuŋgatyi Jehova Mŋari.
Miti yorucinda nebari ɀikarobga, nokuti bari yakaŋga yatumbuka, nemiti yorucinda yakaŋga yaʋa namaruʋa.
Asi ɀiyo ɀekoroni neɀesipereti haɀina‐kurobga, nokuti ɀakaŋga ɀisinakukura.
Ɀino Mosesi akaɓuɗa muguta pamberi paFarao, akatambanudzira maʋoko ake kunaJehova, kutinhira necimvuramabge ɀikanyarara, nemvura ikasaɗururirwa panyika.
Ɀino Farao wakati aʋona kuti mvura necimvuramabge nokutinhira ɀanyarara, akawedzera kutadza, akawomesa mŋoyo wake, iye naʋaranda ʋake.
Mŋoyo waFarao ukawomeswa, akasatendera ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuenda; seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Pinda kunaFarao, nokuti ndawomesa mŋoyo wake, nemŋoyo yaʋaranda ʋake, kuti ndiise ɀiratidzo ɀaŋgu iɀo pakati paʋo;
kuti iwe ugotaura munzeʋe dzomŋanakomana wako, nedzomŋanakomana womŋanakomana wako, ɀose ɀandakaitira Egipita, neɀiratidzo ɀandakaita pakati paʋo; muziʋe kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino Mosesi naAroni ʋakapinda kunaFarao, ʋakati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waʋaHeberu: Ucaramba kuɀininipisa pamberi paŋgu kuȿikira riniko? Tendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda ʋandinamate.
Nokuti kana ukaramba kutendera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kuenda, tarira, maŋgwana ndicaʋuyisa mhashu panyika yenyu;
dzicafukidza nyika yose, kuti munhu asagona kuʋona pasi; dzicadya ɀakasara ɀakapukunyuka, ɀamakasiyirwa necimvuramabge, dzicadya miti yose inokumererai muminda;

nedzimba dzenyu dzicazara, nedzimba dzaʋaranda ʋenyu ʋose, nedzimba dzaʋaEgipita ʋose; ɀakaɗaro haɀina‐kumboʋonekwa namadziɓaɓa enyu, namadziɓaɓa amadziɓaɓa enyu, kubva pazuʋa raʋakataŋga panyika kuȿikira zuʋa rino. Ipapo akatendeʋuka akaɓuɗa pamberi paFarao.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaFarao ʋakati kwaari: Munhu uyu ucaʋa musuŋgo kwatiri kuȿikira riniko? Tenderai henyu ʋanhu kuenda, ʋandonamata Jehova Mŋari waʋo; hamuziʋi here kuti Egipita raparadzwa?
Ɀino Mosesi naAroni ʋakadzoserwa ɀe kunaFarao, iye akati kwaʋari: Endai mundonamata Jehova Mŋari wenyu; asi ʋacaenda ndiʋananiko?
Mosesi akati: Ticaenda naʋaɗuku ʋeɗu, naʋakuru ʋeɗu, naʋanakomana ʋeɗu naʋanasikana ʋeɗu; ticaenda namakwai eɗu, neŋombe dzeɗu; nokuti tinofanira kuitira Jehova mutambo.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Jehova ŋgaaʋe nemi kana ini ndikatoŋgokutenderai kuenda, imi nepxere dzenyu! Cenjerai, nokuti muneŋge munofuŋga ɀakaipa.
Haiȿa! Imi ʋarume endai henyu, mundonamata Jehova, nokuti ndiɀo ɀamakumbira. Ʋakadziŋgwa pamberi paFarao.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tambanudzira ruʋoko rwako pamsoro penyika yeEgipita, mhashu dziʋuye pamsoro penyika yeEgipita, dzidye miti yose yenyika yose yakaŋga yasiyiwa necimvuramabge.

Mosesi akatambanudzira tȿimbo yake pamsoro penyika yeEgipita, Jehova akaʋuyisa pamsoro penyika mhepo yakabva kumabvazuʋa zuʋa iro rose noʋusiku bgose; ɀino fume maŋgwana mhepo yokumabvazuʋa ikaʋuyisa mhashu.

Mhashu dzikaʋuya pamsoro penyika yose yeEgipita, dzikandomhara munyika yose yeEgipita; dzakaŋga dzakawanda kwaɀo; mhashu dzakaɗai hadzina‐kumboʋa’po kubva pakutaŋga, ʋuye dzakaita saidzodzo hadziŋgazoʋi’po ɀe.

Nokuti dzakafukidza nyika yose‐yose, nyika ikati ɀi! Dzikadya miti yose yenyika, nemicero yose yemiti, yakaŋga yasiyiwa necimvuramabge; hapana‐kuzosara kunyaŋge cinhu cimŋe citema pamiti, kana pamiriʋo yeminda, panyika yose yeEgipita.
Ipapo Farao akakurumidza kuɗana Mosesi naAroni, akati: Ndatadzira Jehova, Mŋari wenyu, nemi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ndikaŋganwirei ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ŋguʋa ino ɓedzi, mukumbire kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu, kuti abvise kwandiri rufu urwu ɓedzi.
Akaɓuɗa pamberi paFarao, akandokumbira kunaJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akadzosera mhepo inesimba kwaɀo, yakabva kumaʋirazuʋa, ikasimudza mhashu ikadzikandira muGuŋgwa Dɀuku; hakuna‐kuzosara kunyaŋge nemhashu imŋe cete munyika yose yeEgipita.
Asi Jehova wakawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, akasatendera ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuenda.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tambanudzira ruʋoko rwako kuɗeŋga, rima riʋe’po panyika yeEgipita, rima riŋgaita seriŋgaɓatwa
Mosesi akatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kuɗeŋga, rima guru rikaʋa po panyika yose yeEgipita, rikaita mazuʋa matatu;
haʋana‐kuʋonana, ʋuye hapanomumŋe wakasimuka paakaŋga agere mazuʋa matatu; asi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaneciedza kwaʋaigara.
Ɀino Farao akaɗana Mosesi, akati: Endai, mundonamata Jehova; asi makwai enyu neŋombe dzenyu ŋgadzisare; nepxere dzenyu dziŋgaenda hadzo nemi.
Mosesi akati: Munofanira kutipa ʋo mumaʋoko eɗu ɀokuɓayira neɀipiriso ɀokupisa ɀatiŋgandoɓayira Jehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀipfuwo ɀeɗu ɀicaenda ʋo nesu, hakuŋgasari kunyaŋge nehwanda rimŋe, nokuti tinofanira kutora kwaɀiri kuti tinamate naɀo Jehova Mŋari weɗu; hatiziʋi ɀatiŋganamata Jehova naɀo kudzimana taȿika po.
Asi Jehova wakawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, akaramba kuʋatendera kuenda.
Ɀino Farao akati kwaari: Ibva pamberi paŋgu, cenjera kuti urege kuʋona ɀe ciso caŋgu, nokuti nomusi waunoʋona ciso caŋgu ucafa.
Mosesi akati: Mareʋa kwaɀo, handicazoʋoni ciso cenyu ɀe.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaMosesi: Ndicaʋuyisa ɗambudziko rimŋe ɀe pamsoro paFarao napamsoro peEgipita, ipapo ucakutenderai kubva pano; musi waacakutenderai kuenda, ɀirokwaɀo ucakudziŋgai cose pano.
Ɀino ʋudza ʋanhu ʋanzwe, kuti murume mumŋe nomumŋe akumbire kunowokwake, nomukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe akumbire kunowokwake,
Ɀino Jehova akapa ʋanhu nyasha pamberi paʋaEgipita. Naiye munhu uyu Mosesi, wakaŋga ari mukuru kwaɀo munyika yeEgipita, pamberi paʋaranda ʋaFarao, napamberi paʋanhu.
Ɀino Mosesi akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana paʋa pakati poʋusiku, ndicaɓuɗa ndikafamba napakati peEgipita;
mataŋgwe ose munyika yeEgipita acafa, kutaŋga paɗaŋgwe raFarao unogara pacigaro coʋushe, kuȿikira paɗaŋgwe romurandakadzi uri paguyo, naʋana ʋose ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo.
Pan ika yose yeEgipita pacaʋa nokucema kukuru, kwakaɗaro hakuna‐kumboʋa’po, ʋuye hakuŋgaʋi’po ɀe.
Asi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, pakati paʋanhu kana ɀipfuwo, hapaŋgaʋi nembga icasimudza rurimi rwayo; kuti muziʋe kuti Jehova wakatsaura pakati paʋaEgipita naʋaIsraeri.
Naʋaranda ʋenyu ʋose aʋa ʋacaɓurukira kwandiri, ʋacandifugamira, ʋaciti: Ibvai henyu, naʋanhu ʋose ʋanokuteʋerai; shure kwaiɀoɀo ndicaɓuɗa. Akaɓuɗa pamberi paFarao, akatsamŋa kwaɀo.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Farao haaŋgakutereriyi kuti ɀishamiso ɀaŋgu ɀiwanzwe panyika yeEgipita.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaita ɀishamiso ɀiya ɀose pamberi paFarao, asi Jehova wakawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, akasatendera ʋana ʋaIsraeri kubva munyika yake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni munyika yeEgipita, akati:
Mŋedzi uno unofanira kuʋa mŋedzi wokutaŋga kwamuri, unofanira kuʋa mŋedzi wokutaŋga wegore.
Taurai kuʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri, muti: Nomusi wegumi womŋedzi uno mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaatore gwaiana, ʋaciʋereŋga dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo; mhuri imŋe neimŋe iʋe negwaiana rayo.
Kana mhuri iri ɗuku ʋasiŋgagoni kupedza gwaiana, iʋo naʋagere pedyo neimba yaʋo ŋgaʋatore rimŋe rinoriŋgana ʋanhu. Muriŋganise gwaiana pakudya kwomumŋe nomumŋe.
Gwaiana renyu ŋgarirege kuʋa necinhu cisakafanira, mukono wegore rimŋe; muritore pamakwai kana pambudzi;
ɀino muriceŋgete kuȿikira pazuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi, ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yaʋanhu ʋose ʋaIsraeri ŋgaʋariʋuraye maɗekwana.
Ɀino ŋgaʋatore rimŋe ropa raro, ʋariise pamagwatidziro maʋiri egonhi, napaciʋiʋo cokumsoro, padzimba paʋacaridyira.
Ʋadye nyama yaro ʋusiku ubgo, yakagocwa pamŋoto, neciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa; ʋaidye nemiriʋo inoʋaʋa.
Regai kuidya isanhi yaibva, kana yakaɓikwa nemvura, asi yakagocwa pamŋoto; musoro waro namakumbo aro pamŋe cete noʋura bgaro.
Musasiya cimŋe caro kuȿikira maŋgwana; ɀose ɀaro ɀinosara kuȿikira maŋgwana muɀipise nomŋoto.
Muridye kuɗai: Makasuŋga ɀiʋuno ɀenyu, makapfeka shaŋgu dzenyu patsoka dzenyu, makaɓata tȿimbo dzenyu mumaʋoko enyu; muridye mucikurumidza; ipaseka yaJehova.
Nokuti noʋusiku ubgo ndicafamba napakati penyika yeEgipita, ndiciroʋa mataŋgwe ose aʋanhu panyika yeEgipita, naʋana ʋose ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo; ndicatoŋga ʋamŋari ʋose ʋeEgipita; ndini Jehova.
Asi ropa ricaʋa ciratidzo kwamuri padzimba mamugere; kana ndiciʋona ropa ndicakupfuʋurai, kuti ɗambudziko rirege kukuwirai, rikuparadzei, kana ndiciroʋa nyika yeEgipita.
Zuʋa iri ricaʋa ciraŋgaridzo kwamuri, munofanira kutambira Jehova mutambo naro; munofanira kutamba mutambo naro pamarudzi enyu ose uʋe murairo nokusiŋgaperi.

Mudye ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe; nezuʋa rokutaŋga mubvise mbiriso yose padzimba dzenyu; nokuti munhu unodya ciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa kubva pazuʋa rokutaŋga kuȿikira pazuʋa recinomŋe ŋgaabviswe pakati paIsraeri.
Nezuʋa rokutaŋga munofanira kuita ungano tȿene, ʋuye nezuʋa recinomŋe ʋuŋgano tȿene ɀe; namazuʋa iwayo maɓasa ose ŋgaarege kuitwa, asi ɀinodyiwa nomunhu mumŋe nomumŋe ɀiŋgagadzirwa nemi, iɀoɀo ɓedzi.

Munofanira kutamba mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, nokuti ndiro zuʋa randakabvisa naro hondo dzenyu dzose panyika yeEgipita; naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai zuʋa iro kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose, uʋe murairo nokusiŋgaperi.
wokutaŋga nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi, maɗekwana, munofanira kudya ɀingwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa kuȿikira pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri nerimŋe romŋedzi maɗekwana.
Mazuʋa manomŋe mbiriso irege kuwanikwa mudzimba dzenyu, nokuti aninani unodya ɀakaʋiriswa unofanira kubviswa paʋuŋgano yaʋaIsraeri, kana ari mutorwa, kana ari munhu wakaɓerekerwa munyika.
Regai kudya cinhu cakaʋiriswa; padzimba dzenyu dzose mudye ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa.
Ɀino Mosesi akaɗana ʋakuru ʋose ʋaʋaIsraeri, akati kwaʋari: Endai mundotora makwaiana anoriŋgana mhuri dzenyu, muɓaye paseka.

Mutore sumbu rehisopi, murinyike muropa riri mumudziyo, muzodze ciʋiʋo cokumsoro, namagwatidziro maʋiri egonhi neropa riri mumudziyo; kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu unoɓuɗa pamukoʋa weimba yake kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Nokuti Jehova ucapfuʋura napakati
Ceŋgeta cinhu ico, uʋe murairo kwauri nokuʋana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino kana mucizoȿika panyika yamucapiwa naJehova, seɀaakakupikirai, muceŋgete ɓasa iri.
Ɀino kana ʋana ʋenyu ʋakati kwamuri: Ƃasa iri rinoti kuɗiniko?
Muti kwaʋari: Ndico ciɓayiro cepaseka yaJehova, wakaɗarika dzimba dzaʋana ʋaIsraeri paEgipita nomusi waakaroʋa ʋaEgipita, akaponesa dzimba dzeɗu. Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakakotamisa misoro yaʋo, ʋakanamata.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; Mosesi naAroni seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita.

Ɀino pakati poʋusiku Jehova wakaroʋa mataŋgwe ose panyika yeEgipita, kubva paɗaŋgwe raFarao waizogara pacigaro cake coʋushe, kuȿikira paɗaŋgwe romusuŋgwa wakaŋga ari mutoroŋgo, naʋana ʋose ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo.
Ɀino Farao akamuka ʋusiku, iye naʋaranda ʋake naʋaEgipita ʋose, kukaʋa nokucema kukuru paEgipita, nokuti kwakaŋga kusineimba musinawakafa;
akaɗana Mosesi naAroni ʋusiku, akati: Simukai, ibvai pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu, imi naʋana ʋaIsraeri: endai mundonamata Jehova seɀamakataura.
Torai makwai enyu neŋombe dzenyu, seɀamakataura, endai, neni mundiropafadze ʋo.
ƲaEgipita ʋakakurudzira ʋanhu kwaɀo, kuti ʋakurumidze kuʋaɓuɗisa panyika, nokuti ʋakati: Isu tofa tose!
Ʋanhu ʋakatora mukanyiwa waʋo, usati waʋiriswa, nemidziyo yaʋo yokukanyira yakaputirwa muŋguʋo dzaʋo pamafudzi aʋo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naMosesi, ʋakakumbira kunaʋaEgipita ɀishoŋgo ɀesirveri, neɀishoŋgo ɀendarama, neŋguʋo.
Jehova akapa ʋanhu nyasha pamberi paʋaEgipita, ʋakaʋapa iɀoɀo ɀaʋakakumbira; ʋakapedzera ʋaEgipita.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabva Ramesesi, ʋakaenda Sukoti, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋanofamba netsoka ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ɀitanhatu, ʋana ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Naʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋakaveŋgana ʋakaenda naʋo, namakwai neŋombe, ɀiri ɀipfuwo ɀizhinji‐zhinji.
Ʋakaɓika ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa nomukanyiwa waʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa nawo paEgipita, nokuti wakaŋga usinakuʋiriswa; nokuti ʋakadziŋgwa muEgipita, ʋakasagona kunonoka, ʋakasaɀigadzirira mbuʋa.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakagara ʋana ʋaIsraeri muEgipita akaŋga ari makore anamazana manna namakumi matatu.
Pakupera kwamakore anamazana manna namakumi matatu, nomusi iwoyo, hondo dzose dzaJehova dzakaɓuɗa munyika yeEgipita.
Ʋusiku ubgo ʋunofanira kuraŋgarirwa Jehova, nokuti wakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita nabgo. Ndibgo ʋusiku bgaJehova, ʋunofanira kuraŋgarirwa kwaɀo naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose namarudzi aʋo ose.
Jehova akati ʋo kunaMosesi naAroni: Murairo wepaseka ndiwo: Mutorwa ŋgaarege kuidya.
Asi muranda womunhu mumŋe nomumŋe wakateŋgwa nemari, uŋgaidya kana mamudziŋgisa.
Mutorwa kana muranda unoripirwa ŋgaarege kuidya.
Inofanira kudyirwa mumba mumŋe; haufaniri kutora imŋe nyama ukaenda nayo kunze kweimba; ʋuye musavuna fupa raro.
Ʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri inofanira kuiita.

Kana mutorwa ugere newe aciɗa kuitira Jehova paseka, ʋanhurume ʋose ʋari kwaari ŋgaʋadziŋgiswe, ipapo ŋgaasweɗere hake kuiita; ɀino wafanana nomunhu wakaɓerekerwa panyika; asi usina‐kudziŋgiswa ŋgaarege kuidya.
Murairo ŋgauʋe mumŋe kunowakaɓerekerwa mumusha nokumutorwa ugere pakati penyu.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; Mosesi naAroni seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita.
Nezuʋa iro Jehova akaɓuɗisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yeEgipita nehondo dzaʋo.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Nditsaurirei mataŋgwe ose; ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kana kuʋanhu kana kuɀipfuwo, ndeɀaŋgu.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kuʋanhu: Raŋgarirai zuʋa iri ramakaɓuɗiswa naro paEgipita, paimba yoʋuranda, nokuti Jehova wakakuɓuɗisai pano noruʋoko runesimba; ciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa ŋgacirege kudyiwa nemi.
Nhasi munoɓuɗa nomŋedzi weAbibi.

Ɀino kana Jehova akuȿitsa kunyika yaʋaKanani, neyaʋaHeti, neyaʋaAmori, neyaʋaHivi, neyaʋaJebusi, yaakambopikira madziɓaɓa ako, kuti ucakupa iyo, nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, unofanira kundoita ɓasa iri nomŋedzi uno.
Unofanira kudya ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe; pazuʋa recinomŋe Jehova ŋgaaitirwe mutambo.
Ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa ŋgacidyiwe mazuʋa manomŋe: ciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa ŋgacirege kuʋonekwa kwauri, kunyaŋge mbiriso ŋgairege kuʋonekwa kwauri panyika yako yose.
Ʋudza mŋanakomana wako nomusi iwoyo, uti:
Cinofanira kuʋa ciratidzo kwauri paruʋoko rwako, neciraŋgaridzo pakati pameso ako, kuti murairo waJehova uʋe mumuromo mako; nokuti Jehova wakakuɓuɗisa paEgipita noruʋoko runesimba.
Naiɀoɀo unofanira kuceŋgeta murairo uyu neŋguʋa yawo gore rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ɀino kana Jehova akuȿitsa kunyika yaʋaKanani, seɀaakakupikira iwe namadziɓaɓa ako, akakupa iyo,
unofanira kusanaŋgurira Jehova ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, neɀokutaŋga ɀose paɀipfuwo ɀaunaɀo, ɀirume ndeɀaJehova.
Mŋana wokutaŋga wemboŋgoro unofanira kuudzikinura negwaiana; kana usiŋgaɗi kuudzikinura, unofanira kuvuna mutsipa wawo; mataŋgwe ose aʋanhu pakati paʋanakomana ʋako unofanira kuadzikinura.
Ɀino kana mŋanakomana wako acizokubvunza paŋguʋa inoʋuya, akati: Cinyiko ici? Uti kwaari: Jehova wakatiɓuɗisa noruʋoko runesimba paEgipita paimba yoʋuranda;

nokuti paŋguʋa iyo Farao yaakaramba kutitendera kuenda, Jehova wakaʋuraya mataŋgwe ose enyika yeEgipita, mataŋgwe ose aʋanhu naʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo; naiɀoɀo ndinoɓayira Jehova ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, kana ɀiri ɀirume; asi mataŋgwe ose aʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ndinoadzikinura.
Ici cicaʋa ciratidzo paruʋoko rwako, norundanyara pameso ako; nokuti Jehova wakatiɓuɗisa paEgipita noruʋoko runesimba.

Ɀino Farao wakati aregedza ʋanhu kuti ʋaende, Mŋari haana‐kuʋafambisa nenzira yapanyika yaʋaFiristia, kunyaŋge yaiʋa pedyo, nokuti Mŋari wakati: Ɀimŋe ʋanhu ʋaŋgaɀiɗemba, kana ʋaciʋona kurwa, ʋakadzokera Egipita;
asi Mŋari wakapotesa ʋanhu nokure, nenzira yokurenje rapaGuŋgwa Dɀuku; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓuɗa panyika yeEgipita ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa.
Mosesi akatora mafupa aJosefa, akaenda nawo; nokuti wakaŋga apikisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo Mŋari ucakushanyirai, mucabva pano, mugoenda ʋo namafupa aŋgu.
Ɀino ʋakataŋga rwendo rwaʋo ʋakabva Sukoti, ʋakandoʋaka misasa yaʋo paEtami, pamuceto werenje.
Jehova akaʋatuŋgamirira masikati neshoŋgwe yegore rokuʋaperekedza panzira, ʋusiku neshoŋgwe yomŋoto yokuʋavenekera, kuti ʋafambe masikati noʋusiku
Shoŋgwe yegore yakaŋga isiŋgabvi pamberi paʋanhu masikati, kana shoŋgwe yomŋoto ʋusiku.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋadzoke, ʋaʋake misasa yaʋo pamberi paPihahiroti, pakati peMigdori neguŋgwa, pamberi peBaari‐zefoni; muʋake misasa yenyu paguŋgwa pakatarisana napo.
Ɀino Farao ucati pamsoro paʋana ʋaIsraeri: Ʋarasha nzira panyika, renje raʋadziʋirira.
Ndicawomesa mŋoyo waFarao kuti aʋateʋerere; ini ndicakudzwa pamsoro paFarao napahondo yake yose; ʋaEgipita ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova. Ʋakaita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino mambo weEgipita wakaʋudzwa kuti ʋanhu ʋatiza; mŋoyo waFarao nowaʋaranda ʋake ukashandukira ʋanhu, ʋakati: Taita seiko ɀatatendera ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋacitiɓatira kuti ʋaende?
Ɀino akagadzira ŋgoro yake, akaenda naʋanhu ʋake;
akatora ŋgoro dzakatsaurwa dzinamazana matanhatu, neŋgoro dzose dzeEgipita, dzinaʋatariri ʋadzo dzose.
Jehova akawomesa mŋoyo waFarao, mambo weEgipita, akateʋerera ʋana ʋaIsraeri, nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa noruʋoko runesimba.
ƲaEgipita ʋakaʋateʋerera namabiza ose neŋgoro dzaFarao, naʋataȿi ʋake ʋamabiza, nehondo yake, ʋakaʋaɓata ʋaciri pamisasa paguŋgwa, paPihahiroti pamberi peBaari‐zefoni.
Ɀino Farao wakati aȿika pedyo, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimudza meso aʋo, ʋakaʋona ʋaEgipita ʋaciʋateʋerera, ʋakatya kwaɀo; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema kunaJehova.
Ʋakati kunaMosesi: Makaŋga muciti hamunamabgiro paEgipita, mukatibvisa’ko kuti tifire murenje here? Makatiitireiko ɀamatiɓuɗisa paEgipita?
Ko harizi shoko iro ratakakuʋudzai paEgipita here, ticiti: Tiregei, tiɓatire heɗu ʋaEgipita? Nokuti ɀiri nani kuti tiɓatire ʋaEgipita, pakuti tifire murenje.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kuʋanhu: Musatya henyu, mirai, mugoʋona sunuŋguro yaJehova, yaacakuitirai nhasi, nokuti ʋaEgipita ʋamaʋona nhasi, hamuŋgazoʋaʋoni ɀe nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova ucakurwirai, imi munofanira kunyarara henyu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Unoɗanidzireiko kwandiri? Ʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋapfuʋurire mberi.
Iwe simudza tȿimbo yako, utambanudzire ruʋoko rwako pamsoro peguŋgwa, uritsemure napakati, kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋafambe pakawoma mukati meguŋgwa.
Tarira, ndicawomesa mŋoyo yaʋaEgipita, kuti ʋapinde ʋo ʋaciʋateʋerera, ini ndizokudzwa pamsoro paFarao napamsoro pehondo yake yose, napamsoro peŋgoro dzake, napamsoro paʋataȿi ʋake ʋamabiza.
Ipapo ʋaEgipita ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndakudzwa pamsoro paFarao, napamsoro peŋgoro dzake, napamsoro paʋataȿi ʋake ʋamabiza.
Ɀino mutumŋa waMŋari, wakaŋga akatuŋgamirira hondo yaʋaIsraeri, wakabva’po, akaenda shure kwaʋo; shoŋgwe yegore ikabva mberi kwaʋo, ikandomira shure kwaʋo.
Ikapinda pakati pemisasa yaʋaEgipita nemisasa yaʋaIsraeri; gore nerima, ɀikaʋa’po asi rakavenekera ʋusiku; haʋana‐kusweɗerana ʋusiku bgose.
Ɀino Mosesi akatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake pamsoro peguŋgwa, Jehova akadziŋga guŋgwa nemhepo inesimba, yakabva mabvazuʋa ʋusiku bgose, akashandura guŋgwa, rikaita ivu rakawoma, mvura ikatsemuka.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapinda nomukati meguŋgwa pakawoma, mvura ikaʋaitira madziro kurudyi rwaʋo nokuruɓoshwe rwaʋo.
ƲaEgipita ʋakaʋateʋerera, ʋakapinda shure kwaʋo mukati meguŋgwa namabiza aFarao ose, neŋgoro dzake naʋataȿi ʋake ʋamabiza.
Maŋgwanani Jehova akatarira hondo yaʋaEgipita, ari mushoŋgwe yomŋoto neyegore, akavundusa hondo yaʋaEgipita.
Akanyudza makumbo eŋgoro dzaʋo, dzikatambudzika pakufamba; ʋaEgipita ʋakazoti: Ŋgatitize pamberi paʋaIsraeri, nokuti Jehova unoʋarwira iʋo, asi unorwa naʋaEgipita.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tambanudzira ruʋoko rwako pamsoro peguŋgwa, kuti mvura idzokere pamsoro paʋaEgipita, napamsoro peŋgoro dzaʋo, napamsoro paʋataȿi ʋaʋo ʋamabiza.
Mosesi akatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake pamsoro peguŋgwa, guŋgwa rikadzokera kwakare kwoedza; ʋaEgipita ʋakatizira mukati maro; Jehova akaparadza ʋaEgipita mukati meguŋgwa;
mvura ikadzoka, ikafukidza ŋgoro, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza, nehondo yose yaFarao yakaŋga yapinda muguŋgwa iciʋateʋerera; hakuna‐kusara kunyaŋge nomumŋe waʋo.
Asi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba pakawoma mukati meguŋgwa; mvura ikaʋaitira madziro kurudyi rwaʋo nokuruɓoshwe rwaʋo.
Jehova akarwira ʋaIsraeri saiɀoɀo nomusi iwoyo pamaʋoko aʋaEgipita; ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋona ʋaEgipita ʋakaŋga ʋafa pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋona ɓasa guru rakaŋga raitirwa ʋaEgipita naJehova, ʋanhu ʋakatya Jehova, ʋakatenda Jehova naMosesi muranda wake.
Ɀino Mosesi naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaimbira Jehova rwiyo urwu, ʋakataura ʋaciti:
Ndicaimbira Jehova, nokuti wakasimuka nesimba rake;
Wakakandira biza nomutaȿi waro muguŋgwa.
Jehova ndiro simba raŋgu norwiyo rwaŋgu;
Iye wakaʋa ruponeso rwaŋgu;
Uyu ndiye Mŋari waŋgu, ndicamurumbidza;
Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndicamukudza.
Jehova munhu wokurwa;
Jehova ndiro zita rake.
Wakakandira ŋgoro dzaFarao nehondo yake muguŋgwa;
Ʋarwi ʋake ʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋakanyudzwa muGuŋgwa Dɀuku.
Ʋakanyura makadzika sebge.
Rudyi rwenyu, Jehova, rwakakudzwa nesimba
Rudyi rwenyu, Jehova, runoputsanya ʋaʋeŋgi.
Noʋumambo bgenyu ʋukuru munowisira pasi ʋanokumukirai simba;
Munotuma kutsamŋa kwenyu, kunoʋapisa sehundi.
Nokufema kwemhino dzenyu, mvura yakaʋuŋganidzwa pamŋe cete;
Nzizi dzikamira dzikaita murwi,
Muʋeŋgi wakati:
Ndicateʋerera, ndicaʋaɓata, ndicagoʋera ɀandapamba;
Kuciʋa kwaŋgu kucagutswa naʋo;
Ndicavomora munondo waŋgu, ruʋoko rwaŋgu rucaʋaparadza.
Makafema mŋeya wenyu, guŋgwa rikaʋafukidza,
Ʋakanyura somutobvu mumvura inesimba.
Ndianiko wakafanana nemi, Jehova, pakati paʋamŋari?
Ndianiko wakafanana nemi paʋukuru bgoʋutȿene,
Munorumbidzwa mucityisa, munoita ɀishamiso?
Makatambanudza ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi,
Nyika ikaʋamedza.
Makafambisa nenyasha dzenyu ʋanhu ʋamakadzikinura;
Makaʋaperekedza nesimba renyu kuʋugaro bgenyu ʋutȿene.
Ʋanhu ʋakanzwa ʋakaɗeɗera,
Maɓayo akawira ʋanhu ʋagere Firistia.
Ipapo macinda eEdomi akashamiswa,
Kuɗeɗera kwakawira ʋanhu ʋanesimba ʋeMoabi;
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋanogara Kanani ʋakanyauka.
Kutya nokuvunduka kwakaʋawira;
Ʋakanyarara sebge noʋukuru bgoruʋoko rwenyu;
Kuȿikira ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋayambuka, Jehova,
Kuȿikira ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋamakaɀitȿakira ʋayambuka.
Mucaʋapinza, nokuʋasima pagomo renhaka yenyu,
Paʋugaro bgamakaɀiitira, kuti mugare’po, Jehova;
Patȿene pakaitwa namaʋoko enyu.
Jehova ucaɓata ʋushe nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti mabiza aFarao akapinda muguŋgwa pamŋe cete neŋgoro dzake, naʋataȿi ʋake ʋamabiza, Jehova akadzosera mvura yeguŋgwa pamsoro paʋo; asi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba pakawoma mukati meguŋgwa.
Ɀino Miriami, muprofitakadzi, hanɀadzi yaAroni, wakatora gandira muruʋoko rwake, ʋakadzi ʋose ʋakaɓuɗa ʋakamuteʋera ʋanamakandira, ʋacitamba.
Miriami akaʋapindura, akati:
Imbirai Jehova, nokuti wakasimuka nesimba rake;
Wakakandira biza nomutaȿi waro muguŋgwa.
Ɀino Mosesi wakatuŋgamirira ʋaIsraeri, ʋakabva paGuŋgwa Dɀuku, ʋakaenda kurenje reShuri, ʋakaita mazuʋa matatu ʋacifamba murenje ʋasiŋgawani mvura.
Ʋakaȿika Mara, asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kunwa mvura yapaMara, nokuti yakaŋga iciʋaʋa; naiɀoɀo zita ra’po rakanzi Mara.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakapopotera Mosesi, ʋakati: Ticanweiko?
Iye akacema kunaJehova, Jehova akamuratidza muti, akaukandira mumvura, mvura ikanaka. Akaʋaitira’po murairo nomutemo, akaʋaidza’po;

akati: Kana uciterera nomŋoyo wose inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, ukaita ɀakarurama pamberi pake, ukarerekera nzeʋe dzako kumirairo yake, ukaceŋgeta ɀaakatema ɀose, handiŋgaisi pamsoro pako marwadzi andakaisa pamsoro paʋaEgipita, nokuti ndini Jehova murapi wako.
Ɀino ʋakaȿika Erimi, pakaŋga panamatsime emvura anegumi namaʋiri, nemicindwe inamakumi manomŋe, ʋakaʋaka’po misasa pamvura.
Ɀino ʋakabva Erimi parwe ndo rwaʋo, ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri ikaȿika parenje reSini, riri pakati peErimi neSinai, nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi wecipiri pakubva kwaʋo panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri ikapopotera Mosesi naAroni murenje;

ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kwaʋari: Tiŋgaɗai takafira heɗu munyika yeEgipita noruʋoko rwaJehova, tigere heɗu pahari dzenyama, ticidya ɀiŋgwa ticiguta; nokuti matiɓuɗisira kurenje iri, kuti muʋuraye ʋuŋgano iyi yose nenzara.

Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tarira, ndicakunisirai ciŋgwa cinobva kuɗeŋga; ʋanhu ʋacafanira kuɓuɗa kundoɀiʋuŋganidzira ciyero cinoriŋgana zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ndiʋaidze ndiʋone kana ʋaciɗa kuterera murairo waŋgu, kana kwete.
Ɀino nomusi wetanhatu kana ʋogadziraiɀo ɀaʋaʋuya naɀo, ɀicaita ɀiyero ɀiʋiri kana ʋacienzanisa neciyero caʋanosiʋuŋganidza zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ɀino Mosesi naAroni ʋakati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose: Maɗekwana mucaziʋa kuti Jehova ndiye wakakuɓuɗisai panyika yeEgipita.
Fume maŋgwana mucaʋona kubginya kwaJehova, nokuti iye wakanzwa kupopota kwamakapopotera Jehova nako; isu tisu ʋananiko, ɀamunotipopotera isu?
Mosesi akati: Mucaʋona
Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Ʋudza ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Sweɗerai pamberi paJehova, nokuti wakanzwa kupopota kwenyu.
Ɀino Aroni wakati acataura neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋo ʋakatarira kurutiʋi rwokurenje, ʋakaʋona kubginya kwaJehova kuciratidzwa mugore.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ndanzwa kupopota kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri; taura naʋo, uti: Maɗekwana mucadya nyama, fume maŋgwana mucaguta ɀiŋgwa; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino maɗekwana ɀihuta ɀikakwira, ɀikafukidza misasa; fume maŋgwana ɗoʋa rakaŋga rakapoteredza misasa
Ɀino ɗoʋa rakaŋga riri pasi rakati radzimuka, ʋakaʋona ɀinhu ɀiɗuku ɀakaʋuruŋgana ɀakaŋga ɀiri pasi murenje, ɀiɗuku secando pavu.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona ʋakabvunzana, ʋaciti: Cinyiko? Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɀiziʋi. Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Ndico ciŋgwa camapiwa naJehova kuti mudye.
Ɀino heri shoko rakarairwa naJehova: Muɀiʋuŋganidzire cinhu ico, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaanosidya; munhu mumŋe nomumŋe omeri
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo, ʋamŋe ʋakaʋuŋganidza ɀizhinji, ʋamŋe ɀishoma.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋoɀiidza neomeri, uyo wakaŋga aʋuŋganidza ɀizhinji haana‐kusarirwa necinhu, naiye wakaŋga aʋuŋganidza ɀishoma haana‐kushaiwa; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga aʋuŋganidza seɀaaisidya.
Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Kurege kuʋa nomunhu unosiya ɀimŋe kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Asi haʋana‐kuterera Mosesi, asi ʋamŋe ʋakasiya ɀimŋe kuȿikira maŋgwana; ɀikazara nehonye, ɀikanhuwa; Mosesi akaʋatsamŋira.
Ʋakaɀiʋuŋganidza maŋgwanani ose, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaaidya; kana zuʋa ropisa ɀakanyakatika.
Nezuʋa retanhatu ʋaiʋuŋganidza ciŋgwa ʋaciita ɀiyero ɀiʋiri, mumŋe nomumŋe omeri mbiri; ɀino ʋakuru ʋose ʋeʋuŋgano ʋakaʋuya kuzoʋudza Mosesi.
Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Ndiɀo ɀakataurwa naJehova: Maŋgwana izuʋa rezororo, isaɓata rakatsaurirwa Jehova; gocai ɀamunoɗa kugoca, ɓikai ɀamunoɗa kuɓika; ɀose ɀasara muɀiʋige, muɀiceŋgetere maŋgwana.
Ʋakaɀiʋiga kuȿikira maŋgwana, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naMosesi; ɀino iɀo haɀina‐kunhuwa, nehonye hadzina‐kuzoʋa’mo.
Mosesi akati: Cidyai henyu iɀoɀo nhasi, nokuti nhasi isaɓata raJehova. Nhasi hamuŋgaɀiwani kusaŋgo.
Munofanira kuɀiʋuŋganidza mazuʋa matanhatu; asi zuʋa recinomŋe isaɓata; ne
Ɀino nezuʋa recinomŋe ʋamŋe ʋakaɓuɗa kundoɀiʋuŋganidza, asi haʋana‐kuwana cinhu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Munoramba kuceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu nemirau yaŋgu kuȿikira riniko?
Tarirai, Jehova ɀaakakupai saɓata, naiɀoɀo unokupai ɀokudya ɀamazuʋa maʋiri nezuʋa retanhatu; mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ngaagare kwaagere, kurege kuʋa’po nomunhu unoɓuɗa kwaagere nezuʋa recinomŋe.
Ʋanhu ʋakazorora nezuʋa recinomŋe
Ɀino ʋeimba yaIsraeri ʋakatumidza iɀoɀo zita rinonzi Mana; cakaŋga ciri cicena setsaŋga yekorianderi; kunaka kwaɀo kwakaŋga kwakafanana neɀiŋgwa
Ɀino Mosesi akati: Ndiro shoko rakarairwa naJehova: Omeri izere ŋgaiceŋgeterwe marudzi enyu, ʋaʋone ciŋgwa candakakugutsai naco murenje, ŋguʋa yandakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Tora hari uise’mo omeri izere nemana, uigadzike pamberi paJehova, kuti iceŋgeterwe marudzi enyu.
Seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova, saiɀoɀo Aroni wakaɀigadzika pamberi peCipupuriro, kuti ɀiceŋgetwe’po.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakadya mana makore makumi manna, kudzimana ʋaciȿika panyika yakagarwa naʋanhu; ʋakadya mana kudzimana ʋaciȿika pamiganhu yenyika yeKanani.
Ɀino omeri cegumi ceefa.

Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri yakabva murenje reSini, ʋakafamba ʋaciita nzendonzendo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo paRefidimi; ɀino ipapo pakaŋga pasinemvura iŋganwiwa naʋanhu.
Ʋanhu ʋakarwa naMosesi, ʋakati: Tipe mvura tinwe. Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Munorwireiko neni? Munoidzireiko Jehova?
Ʋanhu ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋanenyota yemvura ipapo, ʋanhu ʋakapopotera Mosesi, ʋakati: Watiɓuɗisireiko Egipita, kuti utiʋuraye nenyota, isu naʋana ʋeɗu, neɀipfuwo ɀeɗu?
Mosesi akacema kunaJehova, akati: Ndicaiteiko naʋanhu aʋa? Ʋoɗa kunditaka namabge.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tuŋgamira pamberi paʋanhu, uende naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, utore tȿimbo yako yawakamboroʋa rwizi nayo muruʋoko rwako uende.
Tarira ndicamira pamberi pako paɗombo riri paHorebi, uroʋe ɗombo iro, mvura icaɓuɗa pariri, ʋanhu ʋagonwa. Mosesi akaita saiɀoɀo pamberi paʋakuru ʋaIsraeri.
Akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Masa neMeriba nokuɗa kwokurwa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri; ʋuye nokuti ʋakaidza Jehova, ʋaciti: Jehova uri pakati peɗu here, kana kwete?
Ɀino Amareki wakaʋuya kuzorwa naʋaIsraeri paRefidimi.
Mosesi akati kunaJoshua: Utitsaurire ʋarume, ugondorwa naAmareki; maŋgwana ini ndicamira pamsoro pecikomo, ndakaɓata tȿimbo yaMŋari muruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Joshua akaita seɀaakaŋga aʋudzwa naMosesi, akandorwa naAmareki; Mosesi naAroni naHuri ʋakakwira pamsoro pecikomo.
Ɀino ɀakati kana Mosesi osimudza ruʋoko rwake, ʋaIsraeri ʋokunda, kana oregera ruʋoko rwake pasi, Amareki wokunda.

Asi maʋoko aMosesi akazoneta, ɀino ʋakatora ibge, ʋakariisa pasi pake, akagara pamsoro paro, Aroni naHuri ʋakatsigira maʋoko ake, mumŋe kunorumŋe rutiʋi, mumŋe kunorumŋe rutiʋi; maʋoko ake akaʋa nesimba kuȿikira pakuʋira kwezuʋa.
Joshua akakunda Amareki naʋanhu ʋake neminondo inopinza.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Nyora iɀi mubuku, ʋaɀiraŋgarire, uɀirondedzere ʋo munzeʋe dzaJoshua, kuti ini ndicabvisa cose pasi pokuɗeŋga ɀose ɀinoraŋgaridza Amareki.
Ipapo Mosesi akaʋaka artari, akaitumidza zita rinonzi: Jehova‐nisi;
akati: Noruʋoko pacigaro coʋushe caJehova, ndinopika ndiciti: Jehova ucarwa naAmareki kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Ɀino Jetero, muprista weMidiani, mukarabga waMosesi, wakanzwa ɀose ɀakaitira Jehova Mosesi naʋaIsraeri, ʋanhu ʋake, kuti Jehova wakaɓuɗisa ʋaIsraeri muEgipita.
Jetero, mukarabga waMosesi, akatora Zipora, mukadzi waMosesi, nokuti wakaŋga amudzosera
naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri — zita romumŋe rainzi Gershomi, nokuti wakati: Ndakaŋga ndiri mŋeni panyika yaʋamŋe;
nezita romumŋe rainzi Eriezeri, nokuti wakati: Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋaŋgu wakaŋga ari muɓatsiri waŋgu, akandirwira pamunondo waFarao —
Jetero, mukarabga waMosesi, akaʋuya naʋanakomana ʋaMosesi nomukadzi wake kunaMosesi murenje, pagomo raMŋari, paakaŋga aʋaka misasa;
akati kunaMosesi: Ini mukarabga wako, Jetero, ndaʋuya kwauri nomukadzi wako naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri ʋanaye.
Mosesi akandosoŋgana nomukarabga wake, akakotamira pasi pamberi pake, akamuȿeta; ʋakabvunzana mufaro, ʋakapinda mutente.
Ɀino Mosesi akaʋudza mukarabga wake ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitira Jehova Farao naʋaEgipita nokuɗa kwaʋaIsraeri, nokutambudzika kwose kwakaʋawira panzira nokurwirwa kwaʋo naJehova.
Jetero akafara pamsoro peɀose ɀakanaka ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa ʋaIsraeri naJehova, kuti wakaʋarwira pamaʋoko aʋaEgipita.
Jetero akati: Jehova ŋgaakudzwe wakakurwirai pamaʋoko aʋaEgipita, napamaʋoko aFarao, iye wakarwira ʋanhu pamaʋoko aʋaEgipita.
Ɀino ndinoziʋa kuti Jehova mukuru kuʋamŋari ʋose pacinhu ico caʋakaɀikudza naco kwaʋari.
Ipapo Jetero, mukarabga waMosesi, wakaʋuya kunaMŋari necipiriso cokupisa ne
Ɀino fume maŋgwana Mosesi wakagara acitambira ʋanhu mhaka dzaʋo, ʋanhu ʋakamira pamberi paMosesi kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Ɀino mukarabga waMosesi wakati aciʋona ɀose ɀaakaŋga aciitira ʋanhu, akati: Unoitireiko ʋanhu ɀinhu iɀi? Unogarireiko uri woga, ʋanhu ʋacimira pamberi pako kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira maɗekwana?
Mosesi akati kumukarabga wake: Nokuti ʋanhu ʋanoʋuya kwandiri kuzobvunza Mŋari;
kana ʋaneshoko ʋanosiʋuya kwandiri; ndinositamba mhaka dziri pakati pomunhu nowokwake, ndiciʋaziʋisa ɀakatemŋa naMŋari nemirairo yake.
Ɀino mukarabga waMosesi akati kwaari: Cinhu ici caunoita hacina‐kunaka.
Ɀirokwaɀo ucaneta kwaɀo, iwe naʋanhu ʋaunaʋo; nokuti cinhu ici cinokuremera; hauŋgagoni kuciita uri woga.
Terera ɀino inzwi raŋgu, ndikurairire, Mŋari agoʋa newe. Iwe umirire ʋanhu pamberi paMŋari, uise mashoko aʋo kunaMŋari;
uʋadzidzise ɀakatemŋa nemirairo, uʋaratidze nzira yaʋanofanira kufamba nayo, neɓasa raʋanofanira kuita.
Asi utȿake pakati paʋanhu ʋose ʋarume ʋakacenjera, ʋanotya Mŋari, ʋarume ʋeɀokwaɗi, ʋanoʋeŋga kufufurwa; uʋaite ʋaɓati ʋaʋo ʋeɀuru, naʋaɓati ʋamazana, naʋaɓati ʋamakumi mashanu, naʋaɓati ʋamakumi;
iʋo ŋgaʋatambire ʋanhu mhaka dzaʋo ŋguʋa dzose; ɀino kana paneshoko guru, ŋgaʋariise kwauri; asi kana ari mashoko maɗuku ŋgaʋaatambe ʋamene; naiɀoɀo iwe ucarerusirwa, naiʋo ʋacatakura
Kana ukaita cinhu ici, Mŋari akakuraira saiɀoɀo, iwe ucagona kutsuŋga, naʋanhu aʋa ʋose ʋacaenda ku
Mosesi akaterera inzwi romukarabga wake, akaita ɀose ɀaakaŋga aʋudzwa naye.
Mosesi akatsaura ʋarume ʋakacenjera pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋose, akaʋaita ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu, ʋaɓati ʋeɀuru, naʋaɓati ʋamazana, naʋaɓati ʋamakumi mashanu, naʋaɓati ʋamakumi.
Iʋo ʋakatamba mhaka dzaʋanhu ŋguʋa dzose; mashoko makuru ʋaisiʋuya nawo kunaMosesi, asi mashoko ose maɗuku ʋaiatamba ʋamene.
Ɀino Mosesi akatendera mukarabga wake kuenda hake; iye akaenda kunyika yake.
Nomŋedzi wecitatu wokuɓuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yeEgipita, nezuʋa iro ʋakaȿika murenje reSinai.
Ʋakati ʋabva paRefidimi, ʋakaȿika murenje reSinai, ʋakadzika matente aʋo murenje; ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋaka’po misasa pamberi pegomo.
Ɀino Mosesi akakwira kunaMŋari, Jehova ari mugomo akamuɗana, akati: Unofanira kutaura kuɗai kunaʋeimba yaJakobo, uʋudze ʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti:
Makaʋona ɀandakaitira ʋaEgipita, ʋuye kuti ndakakutakurai imi pamapapiro egondo, ndikakuȿitsai kwandiri.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino kana mukaterera inzwi raŋgu nomŋoyo wose, mukaceŋgeta suŋgano yaŋgu, mucaʋa fuma yaŋgu caiyo pakati pendudzi dzose, nokuti nyika ndeyaŋgu;
mucaʋa kwandiri ʋushe bgaʋaprista, norudzi rutȿene. Ndiwo mashoko aunofanira kundoʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Mosesi akadzoka, akaɗana ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu, akaisa pamberi paʋo mashoko iwayo ose, aakaŋga arairwa naJehova.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakapindura pamŋe cete, ʋaciti: Ɀose ɀataurwa naJehova ticaɀiita. Mosesi akandoʋudza Jehova mashoko aʋanhu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tarira ndinoʋuya kwauri mugore gobvu, kuti ʋanhu ʋanzwe kana ndicitaura newe, ʋagotenda misi yose. Mosesi akaʋudza Jehova mashoko aʋanhu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Enda kuʋanhu, uʋatsaure nhasi namaŋgwana, ʋasuke ŋguʋo dzaʋo,
ʋagare ʋakaɀigadzira nezuʋa retatu, nokuti nezuʋa retatu Jehova ucaɓuruka pamberi paʋanhu ʋose pamsoro pegomo reSinai.
Iwe utarire ʋanhu miganhu yakaʋapoteredza, uti
ngaarege kuɓatwa noruʋoko, asi atakwe ɀirokwaɀo namabge, kana afurwe; kana ciri cipfuwo, kana munhu, haafaniri kurarama;
Ɀino Mosesi akaɓuruka mugomo, akaenda kuʋanhu, akatsaura ʋanhu; iʋo ʋakasuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo.
Akati kuʋanhu: Garai makaɀigadzira nezuʋa retatu; musasweɗera kumukadzi.
Ɀino nezuʋa retatu kwoedza kutinhira kukaʋa’po pamsoro pegomo, nemheni, negore ɗema, nenzwi rehwamanda rinesimba guru; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari pamisasa ʋakaɗeɗera.
Ɀino Mosesi
Gomo rose reSinai rakaŋga ricipfuŋgaira, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aɓurukira pamsoro paro mumŋoto; ʋutsi bgaro ʋukakwira soʋutsi bgeʋira; gomo rose rikazunuŋguka kwaɀo.
Ɀino inzwi rehwamanda rakati ricirira nokurira kwaɀo, Mosesi akataura, Mŋari akamupindura nenzwi.
Ipapo Jehova akaɓurukira pamsoro pegomo reSinai, Jehova akaɗana Mosesi
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ƃuruka, undoraira ʋanhu kuti ʋarege kupaza kunaJehova kundotarira, kuti ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋarege kufa.
Naʋaprista ʋanosweɗera kunaJehova, ŋgaʋaɀitsaure, kuti Jehova arege kuʋaparadza.
Mosesi akati kunaJehova: Ʋanhu haʋaŋgagoni kukwira kugomo reSinai, nokuti makatiraira, muciti: Tarai miganhu pagomo, muritsaure.
Jehova akati kwaari: Enda uɓuruke, mukwire ɀe, iwe naAroni, anewe; asi ʋaprista naʋanhu ŋgaʋarege kupaza kunaJehova, kuti arege kuʋaparadza.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɓurukira kuʋanhu, akandoʋaʋudza.
Ɀino Mŋari wakataura mashoko awa ose, akati:
Ndini Jehova, Mŋari wako, wakakubvisa munyika yeEgipita, muimba yoʋuranda.
