Usaʋa naʋamŋe ʋamŋari kunze kwaŋgu.
Usaɀiitira mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, kana uri mufananidzo wecinhu ciri kuɗeŋga kumsoro, kana weciri panyika pasi, kana weciri mumvura pasi penyika.
Usafugamira iɀoɀo, kana kuɀishumira; nokuti ini Jehova, Mŋari wako, ndiri Mŋari unegoɗo; ndinoroʋa ʋana nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kuȿikira kurudzi rwecitatu norwecinna rwaʋanondiʋeŋga;
ndiciitira nyasha ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ʋanondiɗa, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu.
Usareʋa zita raJehova Mŋari wako pasina; nokuti Jehova haaŋgaregi kupa mhoȿa unoreʋa zita rake pasina.
Raŋgarira zuʋa resaɓata, kuti uriceŋgete riʋe dɀene.
Uɓate mazuʋa matanhatu, uite maɓasa ako ose;

asi zuʋa recinomŋe isaɓata raJehova Mŋari wako; usatoŋgoɓata maɓasa naro, iwe, kana mŋanakomana wako, kana mŋanasikana wako, kana muranda wako, kana murandakadzi wako, kana ɀipfuwo ɀako, kana mŋeni wako uri mukati mamasuʋo ako;
nokuti namazuʋa matanhatu Jehova wakaita ɗeŋga napasi, neguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo, akazorora nezuʋa recinomŋe; naiɀoɀo Jehova wakaropafadza zuʋa resaɓata akariita dɀene.
Kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako, kuti mazuʋa ako aʋe mazhinji panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Usaʋuraya.
Usaita ʋupombge.
Usaɓa.
Usapupurira wokwako nhema.
Usaciʋa imba yowokwako, usaciʋa mukadzi wowokwako, kana muranda wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana nzombe yake, kana mboŋgoro yake, kana cimŋe cowokwako.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋona kutinhira, nemheni, nenzwi rehwamanda, negomo rinopfuŋgaira, ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaciʋona iɀoɀo, ʋakaɗeɗera ʋakamira kure.
Ʋakati kunaMosesi: Imi citaurai henyu nesu, tinzwe; asi Mŋari ŋgaarege kutaura nesu, tirege kufa.
Mosesi akati kuʋanhu: Musatya henyu, nokuti Mŋari wakaʋuya kuzokuidzai, kuti mugare mucimutya, murege kutadza.
Ʋanhu ʋakamira kure, Mosesi akasweɗera kurima guru kwakaŋga kunaMŋari.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Iti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Imi makaʋona mumene kuti ndakataura nemi ndiri kuɗeŋga.
Musaita

Undiitire artari yevu, uɓayire pamsoro payo ɀipiriso ɀako ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀako ɀokuyananisa, namakwai ako nenzombe dzako; panɀimbo imŋe neimŋe pandicaraŋgaridza zita raŋgu, ndicaʋuya’po kwauri, ndicikuropafadza.
Ɀino kana ucindiʋakira artari yamabge, urege kuiʋaka namabge akaʋezwa, nokuti kana ukasimudzira mbezo yako pamsoro pebge, wariȿiɓisa.
Rega kukwira ʋo kuartari yaŋgu neɀikwiriso, kuti kunyasi kwako kurege kufukurwa kwairi.
Ɀino ndiyo mirairo yaunofanira kuisa pamberi paʋo:
Kana ukateŋga muranda muHeberu, ŋgaakuɓatire makore matanhatu; asi nerecinomŋe unofanira kuɓuɗa hake asina‐caanoripa.
Kana acipinda ari oga, unofanira kuɓuɗa ari oga; kana anomukadzi, mukadzi wake unofanira kuɓuɗa naye.
Kana tenzi wake akamupa mukadzi, iye akamuɓerekera ʋanakomana naʋanasikana, mukadzi naʋana ʋake ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋatenzi wake, asi iye unofanira kuɓuɗa ari oga.
Asi kana iye muranda akati: Ndinoɗa tenzi waŋgu nomukadzi waŋgu naʋana ʋaŋgu, handiɗi kuɓuɗa haŋgu;
ɀino tenzi wake unofanira kumuisa kunaMŋari, ndokumuisa kumukoʋa, kana kugwatidziro romukoʋa; ipapo tenzi wake unofanira kumuʋurura nzeʋe yake norunji; ɀino unofanira kumuɓatira nokusiŋgaperi.
Kana munhu akateŋgesa mukunda wake kuti aʋe murandakadzi, iye haafaniri kuɓuɗa saʋaranda ʋarume.
Kana asiŋgafadzi tenzi wake, wakafuŋga kumuwana amene, unofanira kutendera kuti adzikinurwe; haaŋgaʋi nesimba rokumuteŋgesa kuʋatorwa, nokuti wamunyeŋgedzera.
Kana akamuwanisa nomŋanakomana wake, unofanira kumuitira nenzira yaʋakunda.
Kana akazowana mumŋe mukadzi, haafaniri kutapudza ɀokudya ɀake, kana ŋguʋo dzake, kana ɀaanofanirwa naɀo pakuwanikwa.
Kana akasamuitira ɀinhu iɀi ɀitatu, unofanira kuɓuɗa hake asiŋgaripi cinhu, asiŋgaripi mari.
Unoroʋa munhu, akafa, ɀirokwaɀo iye unofanira kuʋurawa.
Asi kana munhu asina‐kumuʋandira, asi Mŋari aciŋge atendera kuti awire muruʋoko rwake, ndicakutarira nɀimbo kwaaŋgatizira.
Kana munhu akaita nobgoni kunowokwake, akamuʋuraya nokunyeŋgedzera, iwe unofanira kumubvisa paartari yaŋgu afe.
Unoroʋa ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa
Unoɓa munhu, akamuteŋgesa, kana ɀimŋe akawanikwa ari muruʋoko rwake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa.
Unotuka ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa.
Kana ʋanhu ʋakaita nharo, mumŋe akaroʋa mumŋe nebge, kana netsiʋa, akasafa, asi akaʋata panhoʋo;
kana akazomuka ɀe, akafamba panze aciɗonɀa, wakamuroʋa haaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa, asi unofanira kuripira ŋguʋa yaakarashikirwa nayo, ʋuye unofanira kumurapisa kuȿikira apora kwaɀo.
Kana munhu akaroʋa muranda wake kana murandakadzi wake neshamhu, akafira paruʋoko rwake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kutsibga.
Asi kana akararama zuʋa rimŋe kana maʋiri, haafaniri kutsibga; nokuti iye imari yake.
Kana ʋarume ʋakarwa, ʋakakuʋadza mukadzi unemimba, akashaya, asi asina‐kukuʋadzwa hake ɀikuru, iye unofanira kuripiswa seɀaanotarirwa nomurume womukadzi uyo; unofanira kuripa seɀinotarwa naʋatoŋgi.
Asi kana aciŋge akuʋadzwa kwaɀo, iye unofanira kutsiʋa ʋupenyu noʋupenyu ʋo,
ziso neziso, zino nezino, ruʋoko noruʋoko, rutsoka norutsoka,
kutȿa nokutȿa, ʋaŋga neʋaŋga, kukuʋadzwa nokukuʋadzwa.
Kana munhu akaroʋa ziso romuranda wake, kana ziso romurandakadzi wake, akariʋuraya, unofanira kumurega kuti aende hake nokuɗa kweziso rake.
Kana akaroʋa muranda wake kana murandakadzi wake, zino rake rikabva, unofanira kumurega kuti aende hake nokuɗa kwezino rake.
Kana nzombe ikatuŋga murume kana mukadzi, akafa, nzombe iyo inofanira kutakwa namabge, nenyama yayo haifaniri kudyiwa; asi muridzi wenzombe haaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa.
Asi kana nzombe yaisituŋga kare, muridzi wayo akaʋudzwa iɀoɀo, akasaiceŋgeta, ikaʋuraya murume kana mukadzi, nzombe inofanira kutakwa namabge, naiye muridzi wayo unofanira kuʋurawa.
Kana aciŋge atarirwa rudzikinuro, unofanira kuripa ɀose ɀaatarirwa, kuti adzikinure ʋupenyu bgake.
Kunyaŋge ikatuŋga mŋanakomana kana mŋanasikana ʋanofanira kumuitira nomurairo uyu.
Kana nzombe ikatuŋga muranda kana murandakadzi, muridzi wayo unofanira kuripira tenzi wake mashekeri esirveri anamakumi matatu,
Kana munhu akadziʋura gomba, ʋuye kana munhu akacera gomba, akasaridziʋira, nzombe kana mboŋgoro ikawira’mo,
muridzi wegomba unofanira kuripa, unofanira kuɓuɗisira muridzi wayo mari, asi cipfuwo cakafa cicaʋa cake
Kana nzombe yomumŋe munhu ikatuŋga yomumŋe, ikafa, ʋanofanira kuteŋgesa nzombe mhenyu, ʋagoʋane muteŋgo wayo, naiyo yakafa ʋanofanira kuigoʋana.
Kana ʋaiziʋa kare kuti nzombe iyo inotuŋga, muridzi wayo akasaiceŋgeta, ɀirokwaɀo, unofanira ku ripa, nzombe nenzombe, asi yakafa icaʋa yake.
Kana munhu akaɓa nzombe kana gwai, akaɀiʋuraya, kana akaɀiteŋgesa, unofanira kuripa nenzombe shanu panzombe imŋe, namakwai manna pagwai rimŋe.
Kana mbava ikaɓatwa icipaza, ikarobga, ikafa,
Asi kana zuʋa rakaŋga ramuɓuɗira, ucaʋa nemhoȿa paropa rake, unofanira kuripa; kana asinecinhu unofanira kuteŋgeswa nokuɗa kwokuɓa kwake.
Kana caakaŋga aɓa cikawanikwa muruʋoko rwake ciciri cipenyu, kana iri nzombe, kana mboŋgoro, kana gwai, unofanira kuripa kaʋiri.
Kana munhu akadyisa munda, kana munda wemizambiriŋga, akasundira cipfuwo cake, cikandodya munda womumŋe, unofanira kuripa neɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀomunda wake, neɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀomunda wake wemizambiriŋga.
Kana mŋoto ukaɗarikira, ukaɓata minzwa, ukapisa murwi weɀiyo, kana ɀiyo ɀiciri mumunda, kana munda
Kana munhu aciŋge apa wokwake mari kana nhumbi kuti aɀiceŋgete, ɀikaɓiwa mumba momunhu uyo, mbava, kana ikawanikwa, inofanira kuripa kaʋiri.
Kana mbava ikasawanikwa, muridzi weimba unofanira kusweɗera kunaMŋari, kuti

pamhaka dzose dzokuɗarika, kana iri yenzombe, kana yemboŋgoro, kana yegwai, kana yecokufuka, kana yecinhu cipi necipi cakarashika, kana ɀikanzi, Ndico! mhaka yaʋose ʋaʋiri inofanira kuʋuya pamberi paMŋari; uyo unopiwa mhoȿa naMŋari unofanira kuripira wokwake kaʋiri.
Kana munhu akapa wokwake mboŋgoro, kana nzombe, kana gwai, kana cimŋe cipfuwo, kuti aciceŋgete, cikafa, kana kukuʋara, kana kutinhwa asinakuɀiʋona;
iʋo ʋaʋiri ŋgaʋapikirane pamberi paJehova, kuti
Asi kana ɀikaɓiwa ɀiri kwaari, unofanira kuripira muridzi waɀo
Kana ɀikabvamburwa
Kana munhu aciŋge akumbira cinhu kunowokwake, cikakuʋara, kana kufa, muridzi waco asisi’po, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuciripa.
Kana muridzi waco ari’po, haafaniri kuripa; kana ciri cinhu cairipirwa, muripo waco waʋuya panɀimbo yaco.
Kana munhu aciŋge anyeŋgedzera musikana usina‐kunyeŋgwa, akaʋata naye, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kumuroʋora, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Kana ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakaramba cose kumupa iye, unofanira kuripa mari yakaenzana neroʋoro yaʋasikana.
Usarega muroyi ari mupenyu.
Aninani unoʋata necipfuwo, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa.
Unoɓayira mumŋe mŋari, asi Jehova cete, unofanira kuparadzwa cose.
Usaitira mutorwa ɀakaipa, kana kumumanikidza, nokuti nemi ʋo maiʋa ʋatorwa munyika yeEgipita.
Usatambudza cirikadzi kana nherera.
Kana ukatoŋgoʋatambudza, ʋakaɗana kwandiri, ndicaterera kuɗana kwaʋo;
kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kucamuka, ndikakuʋurayai nomunondo: ʋakadzi ʋenyu ʋacaʋa cirikadzi, naʋana ʋenyu nherera.
Kana ukapa mumŋe waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaunaʋo cikwerete cemari, ari murombo, usaita kwaari somupi wecikwerete; usareʋa mhindu kwaari.
Kana ukatoŋgotora ŋguʋo yowokwako ruʋe ruɓatso, unofanira kuidzosera kwaari zuʋa roʋira;
nokuti ndico cokufuka cake coga, iŋguʋo yake yaanofukidza nayo ganda rake; ucaʋata neiko? Kana iye akaɗana kwandiri, ndicamunzwa, nokuti ndinetsitsi.
Usatuka Mŋari, kana kushuridzira muɓati pakati paʋanhu ʋako.
Usanonoka kupa
Uite ʋo saiɀoɀo nenzombe dzako namakwai ako; rigare mazuʋa manomŋe namai ʋaro, ugondipa iro nezuʋa rorusere.
Imi munofanira kuʋa ʋanhu ʋatȿene kwandiri; naiɀoɀo hamufaniri kudya nyama yakabvamburwa
Usaita makuhwa; usaɓatsirana nowakaipa pakuita capupu cisakarurama.
Usateʋera ʋazhinji pakuita ɀakaipa; usapupura pamhoȿa pamŋe cete naʋazhinji kuti irege kururamiswa;
usatsaura murombo ucimuitira tsitsi pamhaka yake.
Kana ukasoŋgana nenzombe kana mboŋgoro yakarashika yomuʋeŋgi wako, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuidzosera kwaari.
Kana ukaʋona mboŋgoro yomuʋeŋgi wako yawira pasi nomutoro wayo, usaramba kumuɓatsira, ɀirokwaɀo umuɓatsire kuisunuŋgura.
Usatsausa ɀakarurama ɀomurombo pamhaka yake.
Unɀeŋge shoko renhema; usaʋuraya munhu usinemhoȿa ʋuye wakarurama, nokuti handiŋgaruramisiri wakaipa.
Usagamucira fufuro, nokuti fufuro inopofumadza ʋanoʋona, nokukaŋganisa mashoko aʋakarurama.
Usatambudza mutorwa, nokuti munoziʋa mŋoyo womutorwa, ɀamakaŋga muri ʋatorwa munyika yeEgipita.
Dɀara munda wako makore matanhatu, ucikohwa ɀiɓereko ɀawo.
Asi negore recinomŋe unofanira kuuzorodza nokurega kuurima, kuti ʋarombo ʋaʋanhu ʋako ʋadye, nemhuka dzesaŋgo dzidye ɀaʋasiya. Saiɀoɀo uite ʋo nomunda wako wemizambiriŋga nomunda wako wemiorivi.
Uɓate maɓasa ako namazuʋa matanhatu, ugozorora nezuʋa recinomŋe; kuti nzombe yako nemboŋgoro yako ɀizorore, nomŋanakomana womurandakadzi wako nomutorwa ʋambofema haʋo.
Ɀinhu ɀose ɀandakakuʋudzai muɀiterere; musareʋa zita raʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ŋgarirege kunzwika pamiromo yenyu.
Undiitire mutambo katatu pagore.

Uite mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa; udye ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe, seɀandakakuraira, paŋguʋa yakatarwa pamŋedzi weAbibi (nokuti wakaɓuɗa nawo Egipita); kurege kuʋa nomunhu unoʋuya pamberi paŋgu asinecinhu;
ʋuye mutambo wokuceka, weɀitȿa ɀamaɓasa ako, ɀawakadɀara mumunda mako; ʋuye mutambo wokuʋuŋganidza pakupera kwegore, kana woʋuŋganidza ɀamaɓasa ako pamunda.
Ʋarume ʋenyu ʋose ŋgaʋaʋuye pamberi paShe Mŋari katatu negore.
Usandiʋigira ropa reciɓayiro caŋgu pamŋe cete neciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa; namafuta omutambo waŋgu arege kuʋata ʋusiku bgose kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Ɀokutaŋga ɀeɀitȿa ɀomunda wako unofanira kuʋuya naɀo kumba kwaJehova Mŋari wako. Usaɓika mbudzana mumukaka wamai ʋayo.
Tarira, ndinotuma mutumŋa pamberi pako, akuceŋgete panzira, akuise panɀimbo yandakakugadzirira.
Mumunzwei, muterere inzwi rake, musamutsamŋisa, nokuti haaŋgakukaŋganwiriyi kuɗarika kwenyu, nokuti zita raŋgu riri maari.
Asi kana ukaterera inzwi rake kwaɀo, ukaita iɀoɀo ɀose ɀandinotaura, ndicaʋa muʋeŋgi waʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, nomudziʋisi waʋadziʋisi ʋako.
Nokuti mutumŋa waŋgu ucakutuŋgamirira, akuȿitse kuʋaAmori, naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaKanani, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi; ini ndicaʋaparadza.
Usafugamira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, kana kuʋashumira, kana kuteʋera maɓasa aʋo; asi unofanira kuʋaparadza cose, nokuputsanya shoŋgwe dzaʋo.
Shumira Jehova Mŋari wako, kuti aropafadze ciŋgwa cako nemvura yako; neni ndicabvisa ʋurwere pakati penyu.
Hakuŋgaʋi necinhu cinoȿodza, kana cisiŋgaɓereki panyika yako; ndicazadzisa mazuʋa ako.
Ndicatuma cityiso caŋgu pamberi pako, nokukaŋganisa ndudzi dzose dzaucaȿika kwadziri, ndicafuratidza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose.
Ndicatuma mago pamberi pako, adziŋge ʋaHivi, naʋaKanani, naʋaHeti pamberi pako.
Handiŋgaʋadziŋgi pamberi pako negore rimŋe, kuti nyika irege kuita renje, ɀikara ɀesaŋgo ɀirege kukuwandira.
Ndicanatsoʋadziŋga pamberi pako, kuȿikira maʋa ʋazhinji, upiwe nyika iʋe nhaka yako.
Ndicaisa miganhu yako kubva paGuŋgwa Dɀuku kuȿikira kuGuŋgwa raʋaFiristia, nokubva kurenje kuȿikira kuRwizi, nokuti ndicapa ʋagere munyika mumaʋoko enyu, uʋadziŋge pamberi pako.
Rega kuita suŋgano naʋo, kana naʋamŋari ʋaʋo.
Haʋafaniri kugara munyika yako, kuti ʋarege kukutadzisa pamberi paŋgu, nokuti kana ukashumira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, ɀirokwaɀo iɀo ɀicaʋa musuŋgo kwauri.
Ɀino iye wakati kunaMosesi: Kwira kunaJehova, iwe naAroni, naNadabi naAbihu, naʋakuru anamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋaIsraeri, mufugame muri kure;
Mosesi ŋgaasweɗere pedyo naJehova, asi iʋo ŋgaʋarege kusweɗera pedyo, naʋanhu ŋgaʋarege kukwira naye.
Ɀino Mosesi akaʋuya akaʋudza ʋanhu mashoko ose aJehova, neɀaakaŋga atema ɀose, ʋanhu ʋakapindura nenzwi rimŋe, ʋakati: Mashoko ose akarebga naJehova ticaaita.
Mosesi akanyora mashoko ose aJehova, akamuka maŋgwanani, akandoʋaka artari pasi pegomo, akamisa shoŋgwe dzinegumi nembiri, ɀakafanana namarudzi anegumi namaʋiri aʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino akatuma majaya aʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapisira Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, noku
Mosesi akatora hafu yeropa, akariisa mumidziyo, imŋe hafu akasasa paartari.
Akatora buku yesuŋgano akaraʋa ʋanhu ʋaciɀinzwa; iʋo ʋakati: Ɀose ɀarebga naJehova ticaɀiita, ticaterera.
Ipapo Mosesi akatora ropa akarisasa pamsoro paʋanhu, akati: Tarirai ropa resuŋgano yakaitwa naJehova nem pamsoro pamashoko iwaya ose.
Ɀino Mosesi, naAroni, naNadabi, naAbihu, naʋakuru ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋaIsraeri ʋakakwira.
Ʋakaʋona Mŋari waʋaIsraeri; pasi petsoka dzake pakaŋga pakaita samabge esafiri, ɀaiʋonekera sokuɗeŋga caiko.
Asi haana‐kutambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kuʋakuru iʋaʋo ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri; ʋakaʋona Mŋari, ʋakadya, ʋakanwa.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Kwira kwandiri muno mugomo, ugare’po; ndicakupa mahwendefa amabge anomurairo nomurau wandanyora, kuti uʋadzidzise.
Mosesi akasimuka naJoshua, muranda wake, Mosesi akakwira mugomo raMŋari,
akati kuʋakuru: Timirirei pano, kuȿikira ticidzokera ɀe kwamuri; tarirai Aroni naHuri ʋanemi; aninani unemhaka ŋgaaende kwaʋari.
Ɀino Mosesi akakwira mugomo, gore rikafukidza gomo.
Kubginya kwaJehova kukagara pagomo reSinai, gore rikarifukidza mazuʋa matanhatu; nezuʋa recinomŋe wakaɗana Mosesi ari mukati megore.
Kubginya kwaJehova kukaʋonekwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri kwakaita somŋoto unopisa kwaɀo, uri pamusoro wegomo.
Mosesi akapinda mukati megore, akakwira mugomo; Mosesi akagara mugomo mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku ʋunamakumi manna.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋandipe cipo; munditorere cipo kunomumŋe nomumŋe unoɗa kundiitira iɀoɀo nomŋoyo wake.
Ndico cipo camunofanira kutora kwaʋari: Ndarama, nesirveri, nendarira,
ne
namatebge amakondobge akazodzwa ɀitȿuku, namatebge amatenhe, namatanda omuakasia,
namafuta emŋenje, neɀinonhuwira ɀamafuta okuzodza, noʋupfu ʋunonhuwira,
neɀibge ɀeoniksi, neɀibge ɀokuisa paefodi napahomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Ŋgaʋandiitire nɀimbo tȿene, kuti ndigare pakati paʋo;
seɀandicakuratidza ɀose, iwo mufananidzo wetabernakeri, nomufananidzo wenhumbi dzayo dzose, munofanira kuita saiɀoɀo.
Ŋgaʋaite areka yamatanda omuakasia, kureɓa kwayo kunofanira kuʋa makubiti
Unofanira kuifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, uifukidze necomukati necokunze, uite pamsoro payo ʋo hata yendarama inoipotedza.
Uiʋumbire ɀindori ɀinna ɀendarama, uɀiise pamakumbo ayo manna, ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀiʋe parutiʋi rumŋe, neɀindori ɀiʋiri panorumŋe rutiʋi.
Uʋeze matanda omuakasia, ndokuafukidza nendarama.
Ugopinza matanda iwayo muɀindori ɀiri panhiʋi dzeareka, kuti areka itakurwe nawo.
Matanda anofanira kugara muɀindori ɀeareka, ŋgaarege kubviswa kwaɀiri.
Ɀino unofanira kuisa mukati meareka cipupuriro candicakupa.
Uite ʋo cifunhiro cokuyananisa nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; kureɓa kwaco makubiti maʋiri nehafu, noʋupamhi bgaco kubiti rimŋe nehafu.
Uite ʋo makerubi maʋiri endarama, uaite nendarama yakapambadzirwa pamiromo miʋiri yecifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Ita kerubi rimŋe pamuromo mumŋ nerimŋe kerubi panomumŋe muromo; uite makerubi pamiromo yaco miʋiri ɀiʋe cinhu cimŋe necifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Makerubi atambanudzire mapapiro awo kumsoro, akafukidza cifunhiro cokuyananisa namapapiro awo, ɀiso ɀawo ɀakatarisana; ɀiso ɀamakerubi ŋgaɀitarire kucifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Uise cifunhiro cokuyananisa pamsoro peareka, ugoisa mukati meareka cipupuriro candicakupa.

Ndi’po pandicasoŋgana newe, nditaure newe, ndiri pamsoro pecifunhiro cokuyananisa, ndiri pakati pamakerubi maʋiri ari pamsoro peareka yecipupuriro, ndikuʋudze ɀose ɀandicakupa, kuti uraire ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri.
Ita ʋo tafura yamatanda omuakasia; kureɓa kwayo makubiti maʋiri, noʋupamhi bgayo kubiti rimŋe, nokukwirira kwayo kubiti rimŋe nehafu.
Uifukidze nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, ugoiitira ʋo hata yendarama inoipotedza.
Uiitire ʋukomba ʋunoipotedza, ʋunoʋupamhi sobgecanza, ugoiitira ʋo hata yendarama inopotedza ʋukomba bgayo.
Uiitire ɀindori ɀinna ɀendarama, ugoisa ɀindori pamakona manna ari pamakumbo ayo manna.
Ɀindori ɀiʋe pedyo noʋukomba, paʋe pokutakura tafura napo namatanda.
Matanda uaite nomuakasia, uafukidze nendarama, tafura igotakurwa nawo.
Uite ʋo midziyo yayo, nembiya dzayo, neɀiroŋgo ɀayo, nemikombe yayo yokuɗira nayo; uɀiite nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.
Misi yose unofanira kuisa pamberi paŋgu patafura ciŋgwa cokuratidza.

Unofanira kuita ʋo cigadziko cemŋenje cendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; cigadziko ciitwe nendarama yakapambadzirwa, cigadziko caco, nehunde yaco, neɀimbiya ɀaco, namafundo aco, namaruʋa aco; ɀose ŋgaɀiitwe ciʋe cinhu cimŋe naco;
kumatiʋi aco ŋgakuɓuɗe mataʋi matanhatu; mataʋi matatu ecigadziko kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwaco, namataʋi matatu ecigadziko kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwaco.

neɀimbiya ɀitatu ɀakaʋumbga samaruʋa omuamanda paɗaʋi rimŋe, nefundo, neruʋa, neɀimbiya ɀitatu ɀakaʋumbga samaruʋa omuamanda panerimŋe ɗaʋi, nefundo, neruʋa: saiɀoɀo mataʋi matanhatu anoɓuɗa pacigadziko;
ʋuye pacigadziko

nefundo panyasi pamataʋi maʋiri akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naco, nefundo panyasi pamamŋe mataʋi akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naco, nefundo panyasi pamataʋi maʋiri akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naco, akafanana namataʋi matanhatu anoɓuɗa pacigadziko.
Mafundo aɀo namataʋi aɀo ŋgaɀiʋe pamŋe cete naɀo; ɀose ɀiʋe cinhu cimŋe cakaʋumbga nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka yakapambadzirwa.
Uite ʋo mŋenje yaco minomŋe; ʋagotuŋgidza mŋenje yaco, kuti ivenekere pamberi paco.
Nembato dzaco, nendiro dzaco, nemŋenje yaco, ɀiʋumbge nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.
Ŋgaɀiʋumbge netarenta rendarama
Ucenjerere kuti uɀiite nomufananidzo waɀo wawakaratidzwa pagomo.
Uite tabernakeri namacira anegumi, uaite nomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, wakarukwa, ne
Kureɓa kwejira rimŋe nerimŋe ŋgakuʋe makubiti makumi maʋiri namasere, noʋupamhi bgejira rimŋe nerimŋe makubiti manna; macira ose aenzane.
Macira mashanu ŋgaaɓatanidzwe pamŋe cete, namamŋe macira mashanu ŋgaaɓatanidzwe pamŋe cete ɀe.
Uite ɀiswe ɀitema pamupendero wejira rimŋe rokupedzisira panaakaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete; ugoita ʋo saiɀoɀo pamupendero wejira rokupedzisira panaakaɓatanidzwa ɀe pamŋe cete.
Uite ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pajira rimŋe, nokuita ʋo ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pamupendero wejira ramamŋe akaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete, ɀiswe ɀitarisane.
Uite ʋo ɀikorekedzo ɀendarama ɀinamakumi mashanu, ugoɓatanidza macira neɀikorekedzo iɀoɀo, tabernakeri ciʋe cinhu cimŋe cete.
Uite macira emvere dzembudzi riʋe tente pamsoro petabernakeri; uiite namacira anegumi nerimŋe.
Kureɓa kwejira rimŋe ŋgakuʋe makubiti anamakumi matatu, noʋupamhi bgejira rimŋe makubiti manna; macira anegumi nerimŋe aenzane.
Uɓatanidze macira mashanu pamŋe cete, namacira matanhatu pamŋe cete, ugopeta jira recitanhatu, riite mheto mbiri kumuromo kwetente.
Uite ʋo ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pamupendero wejira rimŋe rokupedzisira panaakaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete, neɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pamupendero wejira rokupedzisira panamamŋe akaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete.
Uite ʋo ɀikorekedzo ɀinamakumi mashanu ɀendarira, ugoisa ɀikorekedzo muɀiswe, uɓatanidze tente pamŋe cete, ciʋe cinhu cimŋe cete.
Rutiʋi rwakasara runorembera pamacira etente, hafu yejira rimŋe rakasara, ŋgarirembere neceshure kwetabernakeri.
Ʋuye kubiti rimŋe panorumŋe rutiʋi, nekubiti rimŋe panorumŋe rutiʋi ɀe, ɀakasara pakureɓa kwamacira etente, ŋgaɀirembere panhiʋi dzetabernakeri necoʋuno necokoko, kuifukidza.
Uitire ʋo tente cifukidzo camatebge amakondobge akazodzwa muti mutȿuku, necifukidzo camatebge amatenhe pamsoro paiɀoɀo.
Uitire ʋo tabernakeri mapuraŋga anomiswa omuakasia.
Kureɓa kwepuraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe ŋgakuʋe makubiti anegumi, noʋupamhi bgepuraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe kubiti rimŋe nehafu.
Puraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe ŋgariitirwe ɀiɓato ɀiʋiri, ɀakaɓatanidzwa; ndiɀo ɀaunofanira kuitira mapuraŋga ose etabernakeri.
Unofanira kuita mapuraŋga etabernakeri, mapuraŋga anamakumi maʋiri okurutiʋi rwezasi, anotarira zasi.

Ita ʋo ɀigadziko ɀesirveri ɀinamakumi manna pasi pamapuraŋga anamakumi maʋiri, ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe paɀiɓato ɀaro ɀiʋiri, neɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi perimŋe puraŋga paɀiɓato ɀaro ɀiʋiri;
ʋuye mapuraŋga makumi maʋiri kurutiʋi rwecipiri rwetabernakeri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro;
neɀigadziko ɀawo ɀesirveri ɀinamakumi manna, ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe, neɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi perimŋe puraŋga.
Ita ʋo mapuraŋga matanhatu kurutiʋi rwemberi rwetabernakeri kumaʋirazuʋa.
Uite ʋo mapuraŋga maʋiri kumakona etabernakeri kurutiʋi rwemberi.
Ŋgaaite maʋiri necenyasi; saiɀoɀo ŋgaaʋe maʋiri akaɓatanidzwa kuȿikira kumsoro kucindori cokutaŋga; ŋgaaitwe saiɀoɀo ari maʋiri, aʋe’po pamakona maʋiri.
Aʋe mapuraŋga masere aneɀigadziko ɀawo ɀesirveri, ɀiʋe ɀigadziko ɀinegumi neɀitanhatu; ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri ɀiʋe pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe, neɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi perimŋe puraŋga.
Uite ʋo mbariro dzomuakasia, shanu dzamapuraŋga orumŋe rutiʋi rwetabernakeri;
nembariro shanu dzamapuraŋga orutiʋi rwecipiri rwetabernakeri, nembariro shanu dzamapuraŋga orutiʋi rwetabernakeri kurutiʋi rwemberi kumaʋirazuʋa.
Rumbariro rwapakati ŋgaruʋe pakati pamapuraŋga, rubve kunorumŋe rutiʋi rucindoȿikira kunorumŋe rutiʋi.
Ufukidze mapuraŋga nendarama; uite ʋo ɀindori ɀawo nendarama, paŋgagara mbariro: nembariro udzifukidze nendarama.
Uʋake tabernakeri nomufananidzo wayo wawakaratidzwa mugomo.
Uite ʋo cidzitiro ne
Ucirembedze pambiru inna dzomuakasia dzakafukidzwa nendarama; ɀikorekedzo ɀadzo ɀiʋe ɀendarama, ʋuye dzinofanira kumira paɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinna ɀesirveri.
Urembedze cidzitiro pasi peɀikorekedzo, ugoisa’mo areka yecipupuriro mukati mecidzitiro; cidzitiro cigoʋa kwamuri cinhu cinoparadzanisa pakati penɀimbo tȿene nenɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene.
Uise ʋo cifunhiro cokuyananisa pamsoro peareka yecipupuriro panɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene.
Tafura uiise kunze kwecidzitiro necigadziko cemŋenje cakatarisana netafura parutiʋi rwetabernakeri kurutiʋi rwenyasi; tafura uiise kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Unofanira kuitira ʋo mukoʋa wetente cidzitiro ce
Uitire cidzitiro mbiru shanu dzomuakasia, ucidzifukidza nendarama; ɀikorekedzo ɀadzo ɀiʋe ɀendarama, ʋuye uɀiʋumbire ɀigadziko ɀishanu ɀendarira.
Unofanira kuita artari nomuakasia; kureɓa kwayo makubiti mashanu, noʋupamhi bgayo makubiti mashanu; artari ŋgaiʋe nenhiʋi inna dzakaenzana; kukwirira kwayo ŋgakuʋe makubiti matatu.
Uite ʋo nyaŋga dzayo pamakona ayo manna; nyaŋga dzayo dziʋe cinhu cimŋe nayo; uifukidze nendarira.
Uiitire hari dzokubvisa maɗota ayo, nefoshoro dzayo, nemidziyo yayo, neɀikokoʋonho ɀenyama, neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto; midziyo yayo yose unofanira kuiita nendarira.
Unofanira kuiitira ʋo cakarukwa cendarira cakarukwa samambure; pamambure uite ɀindori ɀinna ɀendarira pamakona awo manna.
Uɀiise pasi pecitsiko ceartari cakaipotedza necenyasi, kuti mambure aȿikire pakati peartari.
Uitire artari matanda omuakasia, ugoafukidza nendarira.
Matanda iwayo aiswe muɀindori, matanda agoʋa panhiʋi mbiri dzeartari kana ʋoitakura.
Uiite namapuraŋga, isaʋa necinhu mukati, seɀawakaratidzwa mugomo, uiite saiɀoɀo.
Unofanira kuita ʋo ruʋazhe rwetabernakeri; kurutiʋi rwezasi, rwakatarira zasi, ŋgakuʋe nemiceka yakarembedzwa yakaiȿo‐naka, yakarukwa; kureɓa kwayo makubiti anezana kurutiʋi rumŋe;
ŋgapaʋe nembiru dzinamakumi maʋiri, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinamakumi maʋiri, ɀendarira, neɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ɀiʋe ɀesirveri.

Saiɀoɀo ʋo kurutiʋi rwokumsoro rwakareɓa ŋgapaʋe ʋo nemiceka yakarembedzwa, kureɓa kwayo makubiti anezana; nembiru dzayo dzinamakumi maʋiri, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinamakumi maʋiri, ɀendarira; ɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ŋgaɀiʋe ɀesirveri.
Paʋupamhi bgoruʋazhe kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa panofanira kuʋa nemiceka yakarembedzwa inamakubiti makumi mashanu, nembiru dzinegumi neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinegumi.
Napaʋupamhi bgoruʋazhe kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, kunotarira kumabvazuʋa, ŋgakuʋe namakubiti anamakumi mashanu.
Miceka yakarembedzwa kurutiʋi rumŋe
Nokunorumŋe rutiʋi ŋgapaʋe nemiceka yakarembedzwa inamakubiti anegumi namashanu, nembiru dzayo nhatu, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀitatu.
napasuʋo roruʋazhe ŋgapaʋe necidzitiro cinamakubiti anamakumi maʋiri ce
Mbiru dzose dzoruʋazhe dzakapotedza ŋgadziʋe neɀindori ɀesirveri, neɀikorekedzo ɀadzo ɀesirveri, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀendarira.
Kureɓa kworuʋazhe kunofanira kuʋa makubiti anezana, noʋupamhi makubiti makumi mashanu kwose, nokukwirira makubiti mashanu;
Nhumbi dzose dzetabernakeri dzamaɓasa ayo ose, nembambo dzayo dzose, nembambo dzose dzoruʋazhe ŋgadziʋe dzendarira.
Unofanira kuraira ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋaʋuye kwauri namafuta omuorivi akaiȿo‐naka akaȿinhiwa omŋenje, kuti avenekese mŋenje ŋguʋa dzose.

Mutente rokusoŋgana, kunze kwecidzitiro ciri pamberi pecipupuriro, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ŋgaʋaugadzire’mo pamberi paJehova, kubva pamaɗekwana kuȿikira maŋgwanani; ŋgauʋe mutemo nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino usweɗedze kwauri Aroni, mukuru wako, naʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye, ʋaɓuɗe pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti andishumire paɓasa roʋuprista, ʋanoti, Aroni, naNadabi, naAbihu, naEreazari, naItamari, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni.
Uitire Aroni, mukuru wako, ŋguʋo tȿene, akudzwe nadzo, ʋuye bguʋe ʋukomba.
Utaure naʋose ʋanemŋoyo yakacenjera, ʋandakazadza nomŋeya woʋucenjeri, kuti ʋaitire Aroni ŋguʋo dzokumuita mutȿene nadzo, kuti andishumire paɓasa roʋuprista.

Ŋguʋo dzaʋanofanira kuita ndidzo: Homboɗo yecifuʋa, neefodi, nejasi, neŋguʋo yakarukwa, neŋgoani, nebanhire; ŋgaʋaitire Aroni, mukoma wako, naʋanakomana ʋake ŋguʋo tȿene, kuti andishumire paɓasa roʋuprista.
Ŋgaʋatore ndarama, ne
Efodi ŋgaʋaiite nendarama, ne
Ŋgaiʋe namabande maʋiri pamafudzi akaɓatanidzwa pamiromo yayo miʋiri; kuti iɓatanidzwe saiɀoɀo.
Nebanhire rakarukwa nomuɓati wakacenjera, riri pamsoro payo, rokuisuŋga naro, ŋgariitwe saiyo, ʋuye ciʋe cinhu cimŋe cete nayo, iitwe nendarama, ne
Utore ʋo mabge maʋiri eoniksi, ugonyora pamsoro pawo mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri,
mazita matanhatu pabge rimŋe, namazita matanhatu akasara panerimŋe ibge ɀe, pakuɀarwa kwaʋo.
Unyore pamabge iwayo maʋiri, seɓasa romuʋezi wamabge, seɀinonyorwa ibge rokusimbisa, mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri; uanyudze muɀiruʋa ɀendarama.
Ɀino uise mabge iwayo maʋiri pamabande apamafudzi eefodi, kuti aʋe mabge okuraŋgaridza ʋana ʋaIsraeri; Aroni ŋgaatakure mazita awo pamberi paJehova pamafudzi ake maʋiri, ciʋe cokuraŋgaridza.
Unofanira kuita ʋo ɀiruʋa ɀendarama,
neɀiketani ɀiʋiri ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; uɀiite sorwonzi rwakakoshwa, ugoisa ɀiketani iɀo ɀakamoniwa paɀiruʋa iɀoɀo.
Unofanira kuita ʋo homboɗo yecifuʋa yokutoŋga, riʋe ɓasa romuɓati wakacenjera; uiite ifanane neefodi, uiite nendarama, ne
Ŋgaiʋe nenhiʋi inna dzakaenzana, dzakaita mheto mbiri; kureɓa kwayo kuite sapanoȿika minwe, noʋupamhi bgayo sapanoȿika minwe ʋo.
Uise mukati mayo ɀiruʋa ɀinamabge, misara minna yamabge; mumŋe musara uʋe nesardio, netopasi, nekarbunkeri. Ndiwo musara wokutaŋga.
Pamusara wecipiri smaragdino, nesafiri, nedaimani;
pamusara wecitatu hiakinti, neagati, neametisi;
pamusara wecinna beriri neoniksi, nejaspiri; ŋgaapotedzwe nendarama muɀiruʋa ɀawo.
Mabge iwayo ŋgaaʋe namazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri anegumi namaʋiri, seɀinoita mazita aʋo; ŋgaaʋe namarudzi anegumi namaʋiri, rimŋe nerimŋe riʋe nezita raro, seɀinonyorwa ibge rokusimbisa.
Napahomboɗo yecifuʋa unofanira kuita ɀiketani ɀakafanana norwonzi, ɀendarama yakamoniwa yakaiȿo‐naka.
Uite ʋo pahomboɗo yecifuʋa ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, ugoisa ɀindori iɀo ɀiʋiri pamiceto miʋiri yehomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Ɀino uise ɀiketani ɀiʋiri ɀendarama yakamoniwa paɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀiri pamiceto yehomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Nemimŋe miromo miʋiri yeɀiketani ɀiʋiri ɀakamoniwa uɀiise paɀiruʋa ɀiʋiri; uɀiise pamabande apamafudzi eefodi necemberi kwayo.
Uite ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, ugoɀiisa pamiceto miʋiri yehomboɗo yecifuʋa pamupendero wayo uri kurutiʋi rweefodi necomukati.
Unofanira kuita ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, ugoɀiisa pamabande maʋiri apamafudzi eefodi zasi necemberi kwayo, pedyo payakaɓatanidzwa napo, pamsoro pebanhire reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri.
Ɀino ŋgaʋasuŋganidze homboɗo yecifuʋa neɀindori ɀayo paɀindori ɀeefodi norwonzi rutema, kuti ruʋe pamsoro pebanhire reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri, kuti homboɗo yecifuʋa irege kusunuŋguka paefodi.
Naiɀoɀo Aroni unofanira kutakura mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri pahomboɗo yecifuʋa yokutoŋga pamŋoyo wake, kana acipinda panɀimbo tȿene, kuti ciʋe ciraŋgaridzo pamberi paJehova ŋguʋa dzose.

Unofanira kuisa ʋo muhomboɗo yecifuʋa yokutoŋga Urimi neTumimi, kuti ɀiʋe pamŋoyo waAroni kana acipinda pamberi paJehova; Aroni agotakura kutoŋgwa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri pamŋoyo wake pamberi paJehova ŋguʋa dzose.
Unofanira kuita jasi reefodi rose romuceka mutema.
Ŋgariʋe neburi rokupinza musoro pakati paro, riʋe nomupendero wakarukwa unopotedza ɓuri raro, sapaɓuri reŋguʋo yokurwa, kuti irege kubvaruka.
Pamipendero yaro unofanira kuita matamba e
Ŋgapaʋe necitare cimŋe neɗamba rimŋe, citare cimŋe neɗamba rimŋe pamipendero yejasi kunhiʋi dzose.
Aroni ŋgaarifuke kana acishumira, kuti kurira kwaɀo kunzwike, kana acipinda panɀimbo tȿene pamberi paJehova, ʋuye kana aciɓuɗa, kuti arege kufa.
Unofanira kuita ʋo hwendefa rendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, ugonyora pamsoro paro seɀinonyorwa ibge rokusimbisa, uciti: MUTⱾENE KUNAJEHOVA.
Uriise parwonzi rutema, rigoiswa paŋgoani, riʋe necemberi kweŋgoani.

Ŋgariʋe pahuma yaAroni, Aroni atakure ɀakaipa ɀiŋgaʋa’po paɀinhu ɀitȿene, ɀicaitwa ɀitȿene naʋana ʋaIsraeri paɀipo ɀaʋo ɀitȿene ɀose; rinofanira kugara pahuma yake ŋguʋa dzose, kuti iʋo ʋagamucirwe pamberi paJehova.
Unofanira kuita ʋo ŋguʋo yakarukwa yomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, ʋuye uite ŋgoani yomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, ʋuye uite ʋo banhire, riʋe ɓasa romusoni unogona.
Naʋanakomana ʋaAroni unofanira kuʋaitira ŋguʋo, uʋaitire ʋo mabanhire, uʋaitire ʋo ŋgoani dzomusoro, ʋakudzwe nadzo, ʋuye bguʋe ʋukomba.
Udzifukidze Aroni, mukoma wako, pamŋe cete naʋanakomana ʋake; ʋuye uʋazodze, nokuʋagadza, nokuʋatsaura, kuti ʋandishumire paɓasa roʋuprista.
Unofanira kuʋaitira maburuku omuceka kuti ʋafukidze nyama yaʋo yakashama; ŋgaataŋge paɀiʋuno, aȿikire pacidɀa;

ŋgaafukwe naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake kana ʋacipinda mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋuye kana ʋacisweɗera paartari kushumira panɀimbo tȿene; kuti ʋarege kuɀitorera mhoȿa, ʋakafa; ŋgauʋe mutemo usiŋgaperi kwaari nokuʋana ʋake ʋanomuteʋera.
Ɀino ndico cinhu caunofanira kuʋaitira kuti uʋaite ʋatȿene, ʋandishumire paɓasa roʋuprista: Utore nzombe imŋe ɗuku; namakondobge maʋiri asinemhoȿa,
neciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa, neɀiŋgwa ɀiɗuku ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀakakanyiwa namafuta, neɀiŋgwa ɀitete ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀakazodzwa mafuta; unofanira kuɀiita noʋupfu bgakatsetseka bgekoroni.
Uɀiise muɗeŋgu rimŋe, ugoʋuya naɀo ɀiri muɗeŋgu, pamŋe cete nenzombe ɗuku namakondobge maʋiri.
Ɀino uʋuye naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ugoʋashambidza nemvura;
utore ʋo hanzu, ugofukidza Aroni ŋguʋo nejasi reefodi, neefodi, nehomboɗo yecifuʋa; ʋuye umusuŋge ciʋuno cake nebanhire reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri;
uise ʋo ŋgoani pamusoro wake, nokuisa ʋo korona tȿene paŋgoani.
Ɀino unofanira kutora mafuta ecizoro, uaɗire pamusoro wake, umuzodze.
Ɀino uʋuyise ʋo ʋanakomana ʋake, uʋafukidze majasi.
Uʋasuŋge ɀiʋuno ɀaʋo nebanhire, iye Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake, ugoʋaisa ŋgoani; ʋaʋe ʋaprista nomutemo usiŋgaperi; ugadze Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake.
Ɀino unofanira kuʋuyisa nzombe pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋagoisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wenzombe.
Ugoɓaya nzombe pamberi paJehova pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino utore ropa renzombe, ugoriisa panyaŋga dzeartari nomunwe wako, ndokuɗururira ropa rose mujiŋga meartari.
Ɀino utore ʋo mafuta ose anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari padziri, uɀipise pamsoro peartari.
Asi nyama yenzombe, neɗebge rayo, namaɀiɀi ayo, unofanira kuɀipisa nomŋoto kunze kwemisasa; cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Unofanira kutora ʋo gondobge rimŋe, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋagoisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wegondobge;
ɀino uɓaye gondobge, utore ropa raro, urisase panhiʋi dzose dzeartari.
Ipapo ucekanye gondobge, nokusuka ʋura bgaro, namakumbo aro, uise iɀoɀo pamŋe cete nenhindi dzaro, nomusoro waro.
Ɀino unofanira kupisa gondobge rose paartari; cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova, cipo cinonhuwira, cipiriso cakaitirwa Jehova pamŋoto.
Ɀino utore ʋo gondobge rimŋe, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaise maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wegondobge.

Ipapo unofanira kuɓaya gondobge, ndokutora rimŋe ropa raro, ugoriisa pamuceto wezasi wenzeʋe yorudyi yaAroni, napamiceto yenzeʋe dzorudyi dzaʋanakomana ʋake napamagunwe amaʋoko orudyi, napamagunwe etsoka dzaʋo dzorudyi, nokusasa ʋo ropa panhiʋi dzose dzeartari.

Ɀino unofanira kutora rimŋe ropa, riri paartari, namamŋe mafuta okuzodza, uɀisase pamsoro paAroni napaŋguʋo dzake, napamsoro paʋanakomana ʋake, napaŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake, pamŋe cete naye, kuti aʋe mutȿene iye, neŋguʋo dzake, naʋanakomana ʋake, neŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake, pamŋe cete naye.
Ɀino utore ʋo mamŋe mafuta egondobge, neɓemhe raro, namafuta anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari padziri, neɓandauko rorudyi, (nokuti igondobge rokugadza naro),
neɓundu rimŋe reciŋgwa, neciŋgwa cimŋe ciɗuku cinamafuta, neciŋgwa cimŋe citete cinobva muɗeŋgu reɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, ɀiri pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino uɀiise ɀose pamaʋoko aAroni napamaʋoko aʋanakomana ʋake, ʋagoɀizuŋguzira, ciʋe cipo cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino uɀibvise pamaʋoko aʋo, uɀipise paartari pamsoro pecipiriso cinopiswa, kuti ciʋe cipo cinonhuwira pamberi paJehova; cipiriso cakaitirwa Jehova pamŋoto.
Utore ʋo cityu cegondobge rokugadza naro raAroni, urizuŋguzire pamberi paJehova, kuti ciʋe cipo cinozuŋguzirwa; ndiwo mugoʋe wako.
Ɀino cityu cinozuŋguzirwa ucitsaure, neɓandauko recipiriso cinosimudzwa, cinozuŋguzirwa nokusimudzwa, ɀegondobge rokugadza naro, kuti ɀiʋe ɀaAroni neɀaʋanakomana ʋake.

Iɀoɀo ɀinofanira kupiwa Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake naʋana ʋaIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti cipiriso cinosimudzwa; cinofanira kuʋa cipiriso cinosimudzwa, cinobva kuʋana ʋaIsraeri paɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀokuyananisa, ciʋe cipiriso caʋo cinosimudzirwa Jehova.
Ŋguʋo dzaAroni dzicaʋa dzaʋanakomana ʋake ʋanomuteʋera, kuti ʋazodzwe ʋakadzifuka, ʋagadzwe ʋakadzifuka.
Mŋanakomana wake unopinda paʋuprista panɀimbo yake, unofanira kudzifuka mazuʋa manomŋe, kana acipinda mutente rokusoŋgana kushumira panɀimbo tȿene.
Ɀino unofanira kutora gondobge rokugadza naro, uɓike nyama yaro panɀimbo tȿene.
Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ŋgaʋadye nyama yegondobge, neciŋgwa ciri muɗeŋgu pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ʋanofanira kudya iɀoɀo ɀaiyananiswa naɀo, pakugadzwa nokutsaurwa kwaʋo; asi mŋeni ŋgaarege kuɀidya, nokuti ɀitȿene.
Kana imŋe nyama yokugadza nayo ikasara, kana cimŋe ciŋgwa, kuȿikira maŋgwana, unofanira kupisa ɀasara nomŋoto; haɀifaniri kudyiwa, nokuti ɀitȿene.
Unofanira kuitira Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake saiɀoɀo, ɀose seɀandakakuraira; uite mazuʋa manomŋe uciʋagadza.
Zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe unofanira kuɓayira nzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, cokuyananisa naco; unofanira kunatsa artari, kana uciiyananisira; uizodze kuti uitsaure.
Unofanira kuita mazuʋa manomŋe pakuyananisira artari, nokuitsaura; kuti artari iʋe tȿene kwaɀo, ʋuye ɀose ɀinoɓata paartari ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀitȿene.
Ɀino ndiɀo ɀaunofanira kuɓayira paartari: Zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ŋguʋa dzose makwaiana maʋiri.
Rimŋe gwaiana unofanira kuriɓayira maŋgwanani, rimŋe gwaiana unofanira kuriɓayira maɗekwana.
Pamŋe cete negwaiana rimŋe unofanira
Rimŋe gwaiana uriɓayire maɗekwana, uriitire seɀawakaitira cipiriso coʋupfu camaŋgwanani, neɀawakaitira cipiriso caro cinonwiwa, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinonhuwira, cipiriso cakaitirwa Jehova pamŋoto.
Cinofanira kuʋa cipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose pamarudzi enyu ose, pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana pamberi paJehova, pandicasoŋgana nemi, nditaure’po newe.
Ndi’po pandicasoŋgana naʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋuye
Tente rokusoŋgana neartari ndicaɀitsaura; ʋuye Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ndicaʋatsaura, kuti ʋandishumire paɓasa roʋuprista.
Ndicagara pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ndiʋe Mŋari waʋo.
Ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova waʋo, wakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, kuti ndigare pakati paʋo; ndini Jehova Mŋari waʋo.
Unofanira kuita ʋo artari yokupisira’po ɀinonhuwira; uiite nomuti womuakasia.
Kureɓa kwayo ŋgakuʋe kubiti
Unofanira kuifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, kumsoro kwayo, nokunhiʋi dzayo dzose, nenyaŋga dzayo; uiitire ʋo hata yendarama inoikomberedza.
Uiitire ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama pasi pehata yayo, pakona dzayo mbiri, panhiʋi dzayo mbiri, paʋe paiŋgatakurwa namatanda.
Uite ʋo matanda omuakasia, nokuafukidza nendarama.
Ɀino unofanira kuiisa pamberi pecidzitiro ciri paareka yecipupuriro, pamberi pecifunhiro cokuyananisa ciri pamsoro pecipupuriro, pandicasoŋgana newe.
Aroni unofanira kupisa pamsoro payo ɀinonhuwira ɀemiti yakanaka; ŋgaaɀipise maŋgwanani ose, kana acigadzira mŋenje.
Kana Aroni acituŋgidza mŋenje maɗekwana, ŋgaaɀipise, ɀiʋe ɀinonhuwira pamberi paJehova nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Musapisira pamsoro payo ɀinonhuwira ɀisina‐kufanira, kana cipiriso cinopiswa, kana cipiriso coʋupfu; musaɗururira pamsoro payo cipiriso cinoɗururwa.

Aroni unofanira kuyananisa panyaŋga dzayo kamŋe cete pagore; unofanira kuyananisa pamsoro payo kamŋe cete pagore, neropa recipiriso ceɀiʋi cinoyananisa, kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose; cinhu citȿene kwaɀo kunaJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Kana uciʋereŋga ʋana ʋaIsraeri,
Ʋanofanira kupa kuɗai: Mumŋe nomumŋe unoɗarika kunaʋakaʋereŋgwa hafu yeshekeri,
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoɗarika kunaʋakaʋereŋgwa, waʋa namakore makumi maʋiri kana wapfuʋura makore iwayo, unofanira kupa Jehova cipo iceco.
Mufumi ŋgaarege kuwedzera, nomurombo ŋgaarege kutapudza pahafu yeshekeri, kana ʋopa cipo ico, kuti muyananisire mŋeya yenyu.
Ɀino unofanira kutora mari yokuyananisira kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, ugoripira ɓasa retente rukusoŋgana; kuti ciʋe ciraŋgaridzo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri pamberi paJehova, kuti mŋeya yenyu iyananisirwe.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Unofanira kuita ʋo mudziyo wendarira wokushambidzira, necigadziko cawo cendarira, ugouisa pakati petente rokusoŋgana neartari, ndokuisa’mo mvura.
Kuti Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋashambe’mo maʋoko aʋo netsoka dzaʋo.
Kana ʋopinda mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋanofanira kuɀishambidza nemvura, kuti ʋarege kufa, kana ʋosweɗera paartari kuzoshumira, kana kupisira Jehova cipiriso cinopiswa nomŋoto.
Ʋanofanira kushamba maʋoko aʋo namakumbo aʋo, kuti ʋarege kufa; unofanira kuʋa mutemo usiŋgaperi kwaʋari, kwaari nokuʋanakomana ʋake kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose.
Jehova wakataura ʋo naMosesi, akati:
Tora ʋo miti inonhuwira inokunda mimŋe,
namazana mashanu ekasia, ʋacienzanisa neshekeri rapanɀimbo tȿene, nehini
uite naɀo mafuta matȿene okuzodza nawo, ɀiʋe ɀinonhuwira ɀakaveŋganiswa noʋucenjeri bgomuveŋganisi weɀinonhuwira; aʋe mafuta matȿene okuzodza nawo.
Ɀino unofanira kuzodza nawo tente rokusoŋgana neareka yecipupuriro,
netafura nenhumbi dzayo dzose, necigadziko cemŋenje nenhumbi dzaco, neartari yeɀinonhuwira,
neartari yeɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nomudziyo wokushambidzira necigadziko cawo.
Uɀitsaure, ɀiʋe ɀinhu ɀitȿene kwaɀo; ɀose ɀinoɀigunɀa ɀicaʋa ɀitȿene ʋo.
Unofanira kuzodza ʋo Aroni na
Uʋudze ʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Iwaya anofanira kuʋa pamberi paŋgu mafuta matȿene okuzodza nawo kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Ŋgaarege kuɗirwa panyama yomunhu; ʋuye musaita mamŋe akafanana nawo, akaitwa saiwo; matȿene, anofanira kuʋa cinhu citȿene kwamuri.
Aninani unoveŋganisa mafuta akafanana nawo, ʋuye aninani unoisa mamŋe awo pamutorwa, ŋgaabviswe pakati porudzi rwake.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tora miti inonhuwira, inoti: Sitakte, neonika, negarbano, miti yakanaka neɀinonhuwira ɀakaiȿo‐naka; ɀose ɀienzane pakurema kwaɀo.
Ugoita naɀo ɀinonhuwira, ɀinonhuwira ɀinonaka, ɀakaveŋganiswa noʋucenjeri bgomuveŋganisi weɀinonhuwira, ɀakaruŋgwa nomunyu, ɀakaiȿo‐naka, ɀitȿene.
Unofanira kuswa ɀimŋe ɀaɀo kwaɀo, ugoɀiisa pamberi pecipupuriro mutente rokusoŋgana, mandicasoŋgana newe, kuti ɀiʋe ɀitȿene kwaɀo kwamuri.
Ɀinonhuwira ɀamunoɀiitira imi, musaɀiita seɀamunoita iɀoɀi; ɀinofanira kuʋa kwamuri ɀitȿene kunaJehova.
Aninani unoita ɀakafanana naɀo, kuti aɀinhuwidze, ŋgaabviswe pakati porudzi rwake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Tarira, ndaɗana Bezareri, mŋanakomana waUri, mŋanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJuda, nezita rake,
ndikamuzadza noMŋeya waMŋari, noʋucenjeri, nokunzwisisa, nokuziʋa kwose, nokugona marudzi ose amaɓasa,
kuti afuŋge mano oʋumhizha, nokuɓata nendarama, nesirveri, nendarira,
nokuʋeza mabge anoiswa mukati, nokuʋeza matanda, nokugona marudzi ose amaɓasa.
Ʋuye ini, tarira ndakagadza pamŋe cete naye Ohoriabi, mŋanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaDani; nomumŋoyo yaʋose ʋanemŋoyo yakaŋgwara ndakaisa ʋucenjeri, kuti ʋaite ɀose ɀandakakuraira,
: Tente rokusoŋgana, neareka yecipupuriro, necifunhiro cokuyananisa ciri pamsoro payo, nenhumbi dzose dzetabernakeri,
netafura nenhumbi dzayo, necigadziko cemŋenje cakaiȿo‐naka nenhumbi dzaco dzose, neartari yeɀinonhuwira,
neartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nomudziyo wokushambidzira necigadziko cawo,
neŋguʋo dzakarukwa ɀakanaka, neŋguʋo tȿene dzaAroni muprista, neŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake dzokuɓate‐ɓasa roʋuprista nadzo,
namafuta okuzodza nawo, neɀinonhuwira ɀemiti inonaka ɀapanɀimbo tȿene; ʋanofanira kuita ɀose seɀandakakuraira.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Ɀirokwaɀo munofanira kuceŋgeta masaɓata aŋgu; nokuti ciratidzo pakati paŋgu nemi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose, muziʋe kuti ndini Jehova unokutsaurai.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai saɓata, nokuti idɀene kwamuri; aninani unoriɀidza ŋgaaʋurawe ɀirokwaɀo; nokuti aninani unoɓate‐ɓasa ripi neripi naro, munhu uyo ŋgaabviswe pakati porudzi rwake.
Maɓasa ose ŋgaaɓatwe namazuʋa matanhatu, asi zuʋa recinomŋe isaɓata rokuzorora kwaɀo, idɀene kunaJehova; aninani unoɓate‐ɓasa ripi neripi nezuʋa resaɓata, ŋgaaʋurawe ɀirokwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kuceŋgeta saɓata, ʋaraŋgarire saɓata kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose; iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi.
Ciratidzo pakati paŋgu naʋana ʋaIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti Jehova wakaita ɗeŋga nenyika namazuʋa matanhatu, akazorora nezuʋa recinomŋe, akasimbiswa.
Ɀino wakati apedza kutaura naMosesi pagomo reSinai, akamupa mahwendefa maʋiri ecipupuriro, mahwendefa amabge akaŋga akanyorwa nomunwe waMŋari.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti Mosesi wononoka kuɓuruka mugomo, ʋakaʋuŋgana kunaAroni, ʋakati kwaari: Simuka, utiitire ʋamŋari ʋaŋgatituŋgamirira, nokuti kana ari Mosesi uyu, uya munhu wakatiɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, hatiziʋi cakaitika naye.
Ɀino Aroni akati kwaʋari: Gurai ɀindori ɀendarama ɀiri panzeʋe dzaʋakadzi ʋenyu nedzaʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu, muʋuye naɀo kwandiri.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakagura ɀindori ɀendarama ɀakaŋga ɀiri panzeʋe dzaʋo, ʋakaʋuya naɀo kunaAroni.
Iye akaɀigamucira pamaʋoko aʋo, akaɀiʋeza nenhumbi yokuʋeza nayo, akaita naɀo mhuru yakaʋumbga. Iʋo ʋakati: Ndiʋo ʋamŋari ʋenyu, imi ʋaIsraeri, ʋakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino Aroni wakati aciɀiʋona, akaʋaka artari pamberi payo, Aroni akaɗanidzira, akati: Maŋgwana mutambo ucaʋa’po kunaJehova.
Ʋakafumira maŋgwanani, ʋakapisira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, ʋakaʋuya ʋo neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ʋanhu ʋakagara pasi, ʋakadya nokunwa, ʋakasimuka, ʋakatamba.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati: Enda, ɓuruka, nokuti ʋanhu ʋako, ʋawaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, ʋaɀitadzira.
Ʋakurumidza kutsauka panzira yandakaʋaraira, ʋakaɀiitira mhuru yakaʋumbga, ʋakainamata, ʋakaiɓayira ɀiɓayiro, ʋaciti: Ndiʋo ʋamŋari ʋenyu, imi ʋaIsraeri, ʋakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ndatarira ʋanhu aʋa, ndaʋona kuti ʋanhu ʋanemitsipa mikukutu;
naiɀoɀo ɀino ndirege hako, kuti shuŋgu dzaŋgu dziʋamukire, ndiʋapedze, ndikuite iwe rudzi rukuru.
Ipapo Mosesi akakumbira kunaJehova Mŋari wake, akati: Haiwa, Jehova, shuŋgu dzenyu dziŋgagomukireiko ʋanhu ʋenyu, ʋamakaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita nesimba guru ʋuye noruʋoko runesimba:
ƲaEgipita ʋaŋgazoreʋa seiko ʋaciti: Wakaʋaɓuɗisira kuneɀakaipa, kuti aʋaʋuraye mumakomo, nokuʋaparadza panyika? Dzorai shuŋgu dzenyu huru, muɀiɗembe pamsoro pokuitira ʋanhu ʋenyu ɀakaipa ɀakaɗai.

Raŋgarirai henyu Abrahama, naIsaka, naIsraeri, ʋaranda ʋenyu, ʋamakaɀipikira mumene, mukati kwaʋari: Ndicawanza ʋana ʋenyu senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga, nenyika yose iyi, yandakareʋa, ndicaipa ʋana ʋenyu, ʋaigare nhaka nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino Jehova akaɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaakaŋga acifuŋga kuitira ʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀino Mosesi akatendeʋuka, akaɓuruka pagomo, anamahwendefa maʋiri ecipupuriro muruʋoko rwake; mahwendefa akaŋga akanyorwa nhiʋi dzawo dzose, akaŋga akanyorwa seri neseri.
Mahwendefa iwayo rakaŋga riri ɓasa raMŋari, norunyoro rwakaŋga ruri runyoro rwaMŋari, rwakaŋga rwakatemŋa pamahwendefa.
Ɀino Joshua wakati acinzwa mhere‐mhere yaʋanhu ʋanopururudza, akati kunaMosesi: Kunemhere‐mhere yokurwa kumisasa.
Iye akati: Haazi manzwi aʋanhu ʋanoɗanidzira pakukunda kwaʋo, kana manzwi aʋanhu ʋanoɗanidzira pakukundwa kwaʋo; asi ndinonzwa mhere‐mhere yaʋanhu ʋanoimba.
Ɀino wakati asweɗera kumisasa, akaʋona mhuru nokutamba. Ipapo shuŋgu dzaMosesi dzikamuka, akakanda mahwendefa aiʋa mumaʋoko ake pasi, akaaputsa mujiŋga megomo.
Akatora mhuru yaʋakaŋga ʋaita, akaipisa nomŋoto, akaikuya ikaita ʋupfu, akaikanda mumvura, ndokunwisa ʋaIsraeri iɀoɀo.
Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋakakuitireiko, ɀawaʋuyisa ciʋi ici cikuru pamsoro paʋo?
Aroni akati: Shuŋgu dzashe waŋgu ŋgadzirege kumuka hadzo; munoziʋa ʋanhu aʋa, kuti ʋanoŋgoɗa kutadza.
Nokuti ʋakati kwandiri: Tiitirei ʋamŋari ʋaŋgatituŋgamirira, nokuti kana ari Mosesi uyu, munhu uya wakatiɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, hatiziʋi cakaitika naye.
Ndikati kwaʋari: Aninani unendarama, ŋgaaigure; ɀino ʋakandipa, ndikaikandira mumŋoto, mhuru iyi ikaɓuɗa’mo.
Ɀino Mosesi wakati aʋona kuti ʋanhu ʋarasha
Mosesi akandomira musuʋo remisasa, akati: Aninani uri kurutiʋi rwaJehova, ŋgaaʋuye kwandiri. Ʋana ʋaRevi ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana kwaari.

Akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri: Mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ŋgaasuŋgire munondo wake pacidɀa cake, mufambe‐fambe mucibva panerimŋe suʋo mucienda kunerimŋe suʋo pakati pemisasa, mumŋe nomumŋe aʋuraye hama yake, nomumŋe nomumŋe shamŋari yake, nomumŋe nomumŋe munhu wokwake.
Ʋana ʋaRevi ʋakaita seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naMosesi; nomusi iwoyo ʋakafa pakati paʋanhu ʋaneŋge ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu.
Ɀino Mosesi akati: Ɀiparadzanisei nhasi kunaJehova, kuti munhu mumŋe nomumŋe arwe nomŋanakomana wake ʋuye nehama yake, kuti akuropafadzei nhasi.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana Mosesi akati kuʋanhu: Imi makatadza nokutadza kukuru, asi ɀino ini ndicakwira kunaJehova, ɀimŋe ndiŋgayananisira ɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Mosesi akadzokera kunaJehova, akati: Haiwa, ʋanhu aʋa ʋakatadza nokutadza kukuru, ʋakaɀiitira ʋamŋari ʋendarama;
ɀino ɗai muciʋakaŋganwira henyu ɀiʋi ɀaʋo; asi kana musiŋgaɗi henyu, ndidzimei pabuku yenyu yamakanyora.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Uyo wakanditadzira, ndiye wandicadzima pabuku yaŋgu.
Ɀino cienda, uperekedze ʋanhu ʋaende kwandakaʋaʋudza; tarira, mutumŋa waŋgu ucakutuŋgamirira; asi nomusi wandicaroʋa nawo, ndicaʋaroʋa nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Jehova akaroʋa ʋanhu, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaita mhuru yakaitwa naAroni.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati: Ibva pano, kwira, iwe naʋanhu ʋawakaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, muende kunyika yandakapikira Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo, ndiciti, ndicaipa ʋana ʋako;
ndicatuma mutumŋa pamberi penyu, kuti ndidziŋge ʋaKanani, naʋaAmori, naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi,
kunyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, nokuti ini handiŋgakwiri pakati penyu, nokuti muri ʋanhu ʋanemitsipa mikukutu, kuti ndirege kukuparadzai panzira.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacinzwa mashoko iwayo akaipa, ʋakacema; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakashoŋga ɀishoŋgo ɀake.

Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Uti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Muri ʋanhu ʋanemitsipa mikukutu; kana ndikapinda pakati penyu ciŋguʋa cimŋe ciɗuku‐ɗuku, ndiŋgakuparadzai; naiɀoɀo bvisai ɀishoŋgo ɀenyu ɀino, ndiziʋe candiŋgakuitirai.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabvisa ɀishoŋgo ɀaʋo kubva pagomo reHorebi.

Ɀino Mosesi waisitora tente, acindoridzika kunze kwemisasa, kure nemisasa, akaritumidza zita rinonzi, Tente rokusoŋgana. Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe waitȿaka Jehova, waiɓuɗira kutente rokusoŋgana, rakaŋga riri kunze kwemisasa.
Ɀino kwaiti kana Mosesi oɓuɗira kuTente, ʋanhu ʋose ʋaisimuka, ʋakamira mumŋe nomumŋe pamukoʋa wetente rake, ʋakaramba ʋakatarira Mosesi kuȿikira apinda muTente.
Ɀino kana Mosesi apinda muTente, shoŋgwe yegore yaJehova yaiɓuruka ikamira pamukoʋa weTente, Jehova akataura naMosesi.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋona shoŋgwe yegore imire pamukoʋa weTente, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakasimuka, ʋakanamata pasi mumŋe nomumŋe pamukoʋa wetente rake.
Ipapo Jehova waitaura naMosesi ɀiso ɀakatarisana, somunhu unotaurirana neshamŋari yake. Ɀino wodzokera ɀe kumisasa; asi muranda wake Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, mujaya, haazaibva paTente.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaJehova: Tarirai, makati kwandiri: Kwira naʋanhu aʋa, asi hamuna‐kundiziʋisa kuti mucatuma ani neni, kunyaŋge makati: Ndinokuziʋa nezita rako, wakawana nyasha pamberi paŋgu.
Ɀino kana ndakawana nyasha pamberi penyu, cindiratidzai nzira dzenyu, kuti ndikuziʋei, ndiwane nyasha pamberi penyu; raŋgarirai ʋo kuti rudzi urwu ndiʋanhu ʋenyu.
akati: Ini ndimene ndicaenda newe, ndikupe zororo.
Akati kwaari: Kana imi mumene musiŋgaendi
Nokuti ɀicazikanwa seiko kuti ndakawana nyasha pamberi penyu, ini naʋanhu ʋenyu? Hakuzi kuti muende nesu, tigoʋa ʋakatsaurwa, ini naʋanhu ʋenyu pakati paʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋose ʋapanyika dzose here?
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ndicaita ʋo cinhu ici cawareʋa, nokuti wawana nyasha pamberi paŋgu, ndinokuziʋa nezita rako.
Iye akati: Ƌondiratidzai henyu kubginya kwenyu.
akati: Ndicapfuʋudza kunaka kwaŋgu kwose pamberi pako, nokuɗana zita raJehova pamberi pako; asi ndicanzwira nyasha wandinoɗa kunzwira nyasha, ndicanzwira tsitsi wandinoɗa kunzwira tsitsi.
Akati ʋo: Hauŋgaʋoni ciso caŋgu, nokuti hakunomunhu uŋgandiʋona, akazorarama.
Jehova akati ʋo: Tarira, panenɀimbo ʋuno kwandiri, uŋgamira pabge.
Ɀino kana kubginya kwaŋgu kwopfuʋura, ndicakupinza mumukaha webge, ndigokufukidza noruʋoko rwaŋgu kuȿikira ndapfuʋura;
ipapo ndicabvisa ruʋoko rwaŋgu, ugondiʋona neceshure; asi ciso caŋgu haciʋonekwi.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ɀiʋezere mahwendefa maʋiri amabge akafanana nookutaŋga, kuti ndinyore pamabwendefa mashoko aya akaŋga ari pamahwendefa okutaŋga awaputsa.
Gara waɀigadzira maŋgwanani, ukwire mugomo reSinai maŋgwanani, umire pamberi paŋgu pamsoro pegomo.
Asi mumŋe munhu ŋgaarege kukwira newe, ʋuye ŋgakurege kuʋonekwa munhu pagomo rose, namakwai neŋombe ŋgaɀirege kufura pamberi pegomo iri.
Ipapo Mosesi akaʋeza mahwendefa maʋiri akafanana nookutaŋga, akamuka maŋgwanani, akakwira mugomo reSinai, seɀaakaŋga arairwa naJehova, akaɓata mahwendefa maʋiri muruʋoko rwake.
Jehova akaɓuruka ari mugomo, akamira’po naye, akaɗana zita raJehova.
Jehova akapfuʋura pamberi pake, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Jehova, Jehova, Mŋari uzere nyasha neŋgoni, unononoka kutsamŋa, unetsitsi huru neɀokwaɗi.
unoceŋgetera ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana nyasha dzake, unoʋakaŋganwira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo nokuɗarika kwaʋo neɀiʋi ɀaʋo, asi usiŋgapembedzi
Ipapo Mosesi akakurumidza kukotamisa musoro wake pasi, akafugama.
Akati: Ishe, kana ndakawana nyasha kwamuri, Ishe ŋgaafambe pakati peɗu, nokuti ʋanhu aʋa ʋanemitsipa mikukutu; tikaŋganwirei henyu ɀakaipa ɀeɗu neɀiʋi ɀeɗu, mutigamucirei, tiʋe nhaka yenyu.
akati: Tarira, ndinoita suŋgano
Raŋgarira ɀandinokuraira nhasi: Tarira, ndodziŋga pamberi pako ʋaAmori, naʋaKanani, naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi.
Cenjera kuti urege kuita suŋgano naʋanhu ʋagere munyika iyo kwaunoenda, kuti ɀirege kuʋa musuŋgo kwauri;
asi munofanira kuputsa artari dzaʋo, nokuputsanya mabge emifananidzo yaʋo, nokutema matanda aʋo aʋanonamata nawo;
nokuti usafugamira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, nokuti Jehova, unezita rinonzi Unegoɗo, ndiMŋari unegoɗo;
kuti urege kuita suŋgano naʋanhu ʋagere munyika iyo, ɀino kana iʋo ʋopata ʋaciteʋera ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, ʋaciɓayira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, mumŋe akuɗane kuti udye
iwe ukatorera ʋanakomana ʋako ʋakunda ʋaʋo, ɀino kana ʋakunda ʋaʋo ʋopata ʋaciteʋera ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, ʋapatise ʋanakomana ʋako ʋo ʋateʋere ʋamŋari ʋaʋo.
Usaɀiitira ʋamŋari ʋakaʋumbga.
Uite mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa. Unofanira kudya ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe, seɀandakakuraira neŋguʋa yakatarwa pamŋedzi weAbibi, nokuti wakaɓuɗa paEgipita pamŋedzi weAbibi.
Ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro ndeɀaŋgu, napaɀipfuwo ɀako ɀikono ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, kana paŋombe kana pamakwai;

mŋana wokutaŋga wemboŋgoro unofanira kuudzikinura negwaiana; kana usiŋgaɗi kuudzikinura, unofanira kuvuna mutsipa wawo. Mataŋgwe ose paʋanakomana ʋako unofanira kuʋadzikinura. Kurege kuʋa nomunhu unoʋuya pamberi paŋgu asinecinhu.
Unofanira kuɓata mazuʋa matanhatu, asi nezuʋa recinomŋe uzorore, neŋguʋa yokurima neyokukohwa uzorore.
Unofanira kuraŋgarira mutambo wamaviki, weɀitȿa ɀekoroni inokohwiwa, nomutambo wokuʋuŋganidza pakupera kwegore.
Ʋarume ʋako ʋose ŋgaʋaʋuye pamberi paShe Mŋari, iye Mŋari waIsraeri, katatu negore.
Nokuti ndicadziŋga ndudzi pamberi pako, ndikurise miganhu yako; hakuŋgaʋi nomunhu ucaciʋa nyika yako, kana ucikwira katatu pagore kuti uɀiratidze pamberi paJehova, Mŋari wako.
Usaʋuya neropa reciɓayiro caŋgu pamŋe cete neciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa; ʋuye ciɓayiro comutambo wepaseka ŋgacirege kuʋata ʋusiku kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Ɀokutaŋga ɀeɀitȿa ɀomunda wako unofanira kuʋuya naɀo kumba kwaJehova Mŋari wako. Usaɓika mbudzana mumukaka wamai ʋayo.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Nyora mashoko iwaya, nokuti ndaita suŋgano newe naʋaIsraeri seɀinoreʋa mashoko iwaya.
Akaʋa’ko kunaJehova mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku ʋunamakumi manna; wakaŋga asiŋgadyi ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura. Akanyora pamahwendefa mashoko esuŋgano, iyo mirairo inegumi.

Ɀino Mosesi wakati aciɓuruka pagomo reSinai, Mosesi akaɓata mahwendefa maʋiri ecipupuriro mumaʋoko ake, Mosesi wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi, aciɓuruka pagomo, kuti ganda reciso cake rakaŋga ricibginya ɀaakaŋga ataura naye.
Ɀino Aroni naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋaciʋona Mosesi, ʋakaʋona ganda reciso cake ricibginya, ʋakatya kusweɗera kwaari;
ipapo Mosesi akaʋaɗana, Aroni naʋakuru ʋose ʋeʋuŋgano ʋakadzokera kwaari, Mosesi akataura naʋo.
Pashure ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakasweɗera, iye akaʋaraira ɀose ɀaakaŋga aʋudzwa naJehova pagomo reSinai.
Ɀino Mosesi wakati apedza kutaura naʋo akaisa cifukidzo paciso cake.
Asi kana Mosesi opinda pamberi paJehova kundotaura naye, waibvisa cifukidzo kuȿikira aciɓuɗa; ɀino woɓuɗa, ndokuʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀarairwa.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋona ciso caMosesi, kuti ganda reciso caMosesi raibginya; ɀino Mosesi wodzosera ɀe cifukidzo paciso cake, kuȿikira opinda kundotaura naye.
Ɀino Mosesi wakaʋuŋganidza ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati kwaʋari: Ndiwo mashoko akarairwa naJehova kuti muaite:
Maɓasa ose ŋgaaɓatwe namazuʋa matanhatu, asi zuʋa recinomŋe rinofanira kuʋa kwamuri zuʋa dɀene, saɓata rokuzorora kwaɀo pamberi paJehova; aninani unoɓate‐ɓasa ripi neripi naro, ŋgaaʋurawe.
Regai kuʋesa mŋoto padzimba dzenyu dzose nezuʋa resaɓata.
Mosesi akataura neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati: Ndico cinhu cakarairwa naJehova, aciti:
Ripirai Jehova cipo paɀinhu ɀenyu; aninani unomŋoyo unoɗa, ŋgaaʋuye naco, ciʋe cipo caJehova, ɀinoti: Ndarama, nesirveri, nendarira,
ne
namatebge amakondobge akazodzwa ɀitȿuku, namatebge amatenhe, namatanda omuakasia,
namafuta omŋenje, neɀinonhuwira ɀamafuta okuzodza, noʋupfu ʋunonhuwira,
neɀibge ɀeoniksi, neɀibge ɀokuisa paefodi napahomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Ʋarume ʋose pakati penyu ʋanemŋoyo yakacenjera ŋgaʋaʋuye, ʋaite ɀose ɀakarairwa naJehova;
ɀinoti: Tabernakeri netente rayo, necifukidzo cayo, neɀikorekedzo ɀayo, namapuraŋga ayo, nembariro dzayo, nembiru dzayo, neɀigadziko ɀayo;
neareka, namatanda ayo, necifunhiro cokuyananisa, necidzitiro cinodzitira,
netafura, namatanda ayo, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, neciŋgwa cokuratidza,
necigadziko cemŋenje yokuveneka nayo, nenhumbi dzaco, nemŋenje yaco, namafuta okuvenekesa nawo,
neartari yeɀinonhuwira, namatanda ayo, namafuta okuzodza nawo, noʋupfu ʋunonhuwira, necidzitiro comukoʋa pamukoʋa wetabernakeri,
neartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, necakarukwa cayo cendarira, namatanda ayo, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nomudziyo wokushambidzira, necigadziko cawo,
neɀidzitiro ɀoruʋazhe, nembiru dzaɀo, neɀigadziko ɀadzo, necidzitiro cesuʋo roruʋazhe,
nembambo dzetabernakeri, nembambo dzoruʋazhe, netambo dzadzo,
neŋguʋo dzakarukwa ɀakanaka dzokushumira nadzo panɀimbo tȿene, neŋguʋo tȿene dzaAroni muprista, neŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake dzokushumira nadzo paɓasa roʋuprista.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri yakabva kunaMosesi,
ʋakaʋuya, mumŋe nomumŋe wakamutswa nomŋoyo wake, nomumŋe nomumŋe wakatendiswa nomŋeya wake, ʋakaʋuya necipo caJehova, cokuɓate‐ɓasa retente rokusoŋgana namaɓasa aro ose, neŋguʋo tȿene.

Ʋakaʋuya ʋarume naʋakadzi, ʋose ʋaiʋa nemŋoyo yakaŋga iciɗa, ʋakaʋuya neɀikorekedzo, neɀindori ɀenzeʋe, neɀindori ɀokusimbisa, neɀishoŋgo ɀamaʋoko, neɀishoŋgo ɀose ɀendarama; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaʋigira Jehova cipo cendarama.
Murume mumŋe nomumŋe waiʋa ne
Mumŋe nomumŋe
Ʋakadzi ʋose ʋaiʋa nemŋoyo yakaŋgwara ʋakaruka namaʋoko aʋo, ʋakaʋuya neɀaʋakaruka, ɀaiti:
Ʋakadzi ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamutswa nemŋoyo yaʋo kuʋa ʋakacenjera ʋakaruka
Naʋakuru ʋakaʋuya neɀibge ɀeoniksi, neɀibge ɀokuisa paefodi, napahomboɗo yecifuʋa,
nemiti inonhuwira, namafuta okuvenekesa nawo, neɀokuzodza naɀo, noʋupfu ʋunonhuwira.

Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya nemŋoyo yaʋo neɀipo ɀokupa Jehova; murume mumŋe nomumŋe nomukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe waitendiswa nomŋoyo wake kuti aʋigire ɀokuɓata naɀo ɓasa rose rakaŋga rarairwa naJehova, kuti riitwe naMosesi.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Tarirai, Jehova wakaɗana nezita rake Bezareri, mŋanakomana waUri, mŋanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJuda,
akamuzadza noMŋeya waMŋari aʋe nokucenjera, nokunzwisisa, nokuziʋa kwose, nokugona marudzi ose amaɓasa,
kuti afuŋge mano oʋumhizha, nokuɓata nendarama, nesirveri, nendarira,
nokuʋeza mabge anoiswa mukati, nokuʋeza matanda, nokugona kuɓata maɓasa ose oʋumhizha.
Akaisa mumŋoyo make ʋucenjeri bgokudzidzisa ʋamŋe, iye naOhoriabi, mŋanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaDani.
Akaʋazadza nokucenjera kwomŋoyo, kuti ʋagone kuɓata maɓasa ose omuʋezi wamabge, neemhizha, naaʋasoni ʋe

Ɀino Bezareri naOhoriabi ʋanofanira kuɓate‐ɓasa pamŋe cete naʋarume ʋose ʋanemŋoyo yakaŋgwara, ʋakapiwa naJehova kucenjera nokunzwisisa kuti ʋaziʋe kuɓata maɓasa ose okushuma panɀimbo tȿene, ɀose ɀakarairwa naJehova.
Ɀino Mosesi akaɗana Bezareri naOhoriabi, naʋarume ʋose ʋaiʋa nemŋoyo yakaŋgwara, ʋakapiwa kucenjera mumŋoyo yaʋo naJehova, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamutswa nemŋoyo yaʋo, kuti ʋaʋuye kuzoɓate‐ɓasa;
ʋakapiwa naMosesi ɀipo ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaʋuyiswa naʋana ʋaIsraeri, ɀokuɓatisa naɀo ɓasa rokushuma panɀimbo tȿene. Asi iʋo ʋakaramba ʋaciʋuya nemŋoyo yaʋo kwaari maŋgwanani ose neɀipo ɀaʋo.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋakacenjera, ʋakaŋga ʋaciɓata maɓasa ose enɀimbo tȿene, ʋakabva mumŋe nomumŋe paɓasa rake raakaŋga aciita,
ʋakataura naMosesi, ʋaciti: Ʋanhu ʋanoʋuya neɀakawandisa kupfuʋura ɀinokwana kuite‐ɓasa rakarairwa naJehova kuti riitwe.
Mosesi akaraira kuti shoko riparidzwe kumisasa, rokuti: Kunyaŋge murume kana mukadzi ŋgaarege kuzoita ɀe ɓasa rimŋe reɀipo ɀokupa nɀimbo tȿene. Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakadziʋiswa kuzoʋuya neɀimŋe.
Nokuti ɀaʋakaŋga ʋanaɀo, ɀakakwanira maɓasa ose aʋaifanira kuita, ɀimŋe ɀikasara.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋaiʋa nemŋoyo yakaŋgwara pakati paʋaɓati ʋakaita tabernakeri namacira anegumi; ʋakaɀiita nemiceka yakarukwa yakaiȿo‐naka, ne
Kureɓa kwejira rimŋe kwaiʋa makubiti makumi maʋiri namasere, noʋupamhi bgejira rimŋe makubiti manna; macira ose akaŋga akaenzana.
Akaɓatanidza macira mashanu pamŋe cete, namamŋe macira akaaɓatanidza pamŋe cete ɀe.
Akaita ɀiswe ɀitema pamupendero wejira rokupedzisira panaakaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete; akaita ʋo saiɀoɀo pamupendero wejira rokupedzisira panamamŋe akaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete.
Akaita ʋo ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pajira rimŋe, neɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu ɀe pamupendero wejira ramamŋe akaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete; ɀiswe ɀakaŋga ɀakatarisana.
Akaita ʋo ɀikorekedzo ɀendarama ɀinamakumi mashanu, akaɓatanidza macira neɀikorekedzo iɀoɀo; naiɀoɀo tabernakeri ikaʋa cinhu cimŋe cete.
Akaita ʋo macira e
Kureɓa kwejira rimŋe nerimŋe kwaiʋa makubiti anamakumi matatu, noʋupamhi bgejira rimŋe nerimŋe makubiti manna; macira anegumi nerimŋe akaŋga akaenzana.
Akaɓatanidza macira mashanu pamŋe cete, namacira matanhatu pamŋe cete ɀe;

akaita ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu pamupendero wejira rimŋe rokupedzisirapanaakaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete, neɀimŋe ɀiswe ɀinamakumi mashanu ɀe pamupendero wejira rokupedzisira pana mamŋe akaɓatanidzwa pamŋe cete ɀe.
Akaita ʋo ɀikorekedzo ɀinamakumi mashanu ɀendarira ɀokuɓatanidza tente, kuti ciʋe cinhu cimŋe cete.
Akaitira ʋo tente cifukidzo camatebge amakondobge akazodzwa muti mutȿuku, necifukidzo camatebge amatenhe pamsoro paiɀoɀo.
Akaitira ʋo tabernakeri mapuraŋga omuakasia akamiswa.
Kureɓa kwepuraŋga rimŋe kwaiʋa makubiti anegumi, noʋupamhi bgepuraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe bgaiʋa kubiti rimŋe nehafu.
Puraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe rakaitirwa ɀiɓato ɀiʋiri ɀakaɓatanidzwa; akaita mapuraŋga ose etabernakeri saiɀoɀo.
Akaita mapuraŋga etabernakeri anamakumi maʋiri okurutiʋi rwezasi, akatarira zasi.
Akaita ʋo ɀigadziko ɀesirveri ɀinamakumi manna pasi pamapuraŋga anamakumi maʋiri, ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe paɀiɓato ɀaro ɀiʋiri.
Akaita mapuraŋga anamakumi maʋiri kurutiʋi rwecipiri rwetabernakeri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro,
neɀigadziko ɀawo ɀesirveri ɀinamakumi manna, ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe, neɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi perimŋe puraŋga ɀe.
Akaita ʋo mapuraŋga matanhatu kurutiʋi rwemberi rwetabernakeri kumaʋirazuʋa.
Akaita ʋo mapuraŋga maʋiri kumakona etabernakeri kurutiʋi rwemberi.
Akaŋga akaita maʋiri necenyasi; saiɀoɀo ɀe akaŋga akaita maʋiri akaɓatanidzwa kuȿikira kumsoro kucindori cokutaŋga; saiɀoɀo akaaitira ose maʋiri pamakona maʋiri.
Akaʋa mapuraŋga masere aneɀigadziko ɀawo ɀesirveri, ɀikaʋa ɀigadziko ɀinegumi neɀitanhatu, ɀigadziko ɀiʋiri pasi pepuraŋga rimŋe nerimŋe.
Akaita ʋo mbariro dzomuakasia, shanu dzamapuraŋga orumŋe rutiʋi rwetabernakeri,
nembariro shanu ɀe dzamapuraŋga etabernakeri kurutiʋi rwemberi kumaʋirazuʋa.
Akaita ʋo rumbariro rwapakati rwaiʋa pakati pamapuraŋga rwaibva kunorumŋe rutiʋi rukandoȿikira kunorumŋe rutiʋi.
Akafukidza mapuraŋga nendarama, akaita ɀindori ɀawo ɀendarama, kuti mbariro dzigare’po, akafukidza ʋo mbariro nendarama.
Akaita ʋo cidzitiro ne
Akaciitira mbiru inna dzomuakasia, akadzifukidza nendarama; ɀikorekedzo ɀadzo ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀendarama, akadziʋumbira ʋo ɀigadziko ɀinna ɀesirveri.
Akaitira ʋo mukoʋa weTente cidzitiro ce
Ʋuye mbiru dzaco shanu neɀikorekedzo ɀadzo; akafukidza misoro yadzo neɀindori ɀadzo nendarama; neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀendarira.
Ɀino Bezareri akaita areka yamatanda omuakasia; kureɓa kwayo kwaiʋa makubiti maʋiri nehafu, noʋupamhi bgayo kubiti rimŋe nehafu, nokukwirira kwayo kubiti rimŋe nehafu;
akaifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka necomukati necokunze, akaita pamsoro payo hata yendarama yakaipotedza.
Akaiʋumbira ɀindori ɀinna ɀendarama, akaɀiisa pamakumbo ayo manna; ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀaiʋa parutiʋi rumŋe, neɀindori ɀiʋiri panorumŋe rutiʋi ɀe.
Akaʋeza matanda omuakasia, akaafukidza nendarama,
akapinza matanda iwayo muɀindori ɀaiʋa panhiʋi dzeareka, kuti areka itakurwe nawo.
Akaita ʋo cifunhiro cokuyananisa nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; kureɓa kwaco kwaiʋa makubiti maʋiri nehafu, noʋupamhi bgaco kubiti rimŋe nehafu;
akaita makerubi maʋiri endarama, akaaita nendarama yakapambadzirwa pamiromo miʋiri yecifunhiro cokuyananisa,
kerubi rimŋe pamuromo mumŋe, nerimŋe kerubi panomumŋe muromo; akaita makerubi pamiromo yaco miʋiri, ɀikaʋa cinhu cimŋe cete necifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Makerubi akaŋga akatambanudzira mapapiro awo kumsoro, akafukidza cifunhiro cokuyananisa namapapiro awo, ɀiso ɀawo ɀakatarisana; ɀiso ɀamakerubi ɀakaŋga ɀakatarira kucifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Akaita ʋo tafura yamatanda omuakasia; kureɓa kwayo kwaiʋa makubiti maʋiri, noʋupamhi bgayo kubiti rimŋe, nokukwirira kwayo kubiti rimŋe nehafu.
Akaifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, akaiitira ʋo hata yendarama yakaŋga iciipotedza;
akaiitira ʋo ʋukomba bgakaŋga ʋuciipotedza, ʋupamhi bgabgo secanza; akaiitira ʋo hata yendarama yaipotedza ʋukomba bgayo.
Akaiitira ɀindori ɀinna ɀendarama, akaisa ɀindori pamakona manna aiʋa pamakumbo ayo manna.
Ɀindori ɀaiʋa pedyo noʋukomba, paiʋa pokutakura tafura napo namatanda.
Akaita matanda omuakasia, akaafukidza nendarama, kuti tafura itakurwe nawo.
Akaita ʋo midziyo yaigara pamsoro petafura, ndiro dzayo, nembiya dzayo, nemikombe yayo, neɀiroŋgo ɀayo ɀokuɗira naɀo, ɀose ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.

Akaita ʋo cigadziko cemŋenje cendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; akaita cigadziko nendarama yakapambadzirwa, cigadziko caco, nehunde yaco, notumbiya twaco, namafundo aco, namaruʋa aco; ɀose ɀikaʋa cinhu cimŋe cete naco;
kumatiʋi aco kukaɓuɗa mataʋi matanhatu, mataʋi matatu ecigadziko kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwaco, namataʋi matatu ecigadziko kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwaco.

Tumbiya tutatu twakaʋumbga samaruʋa omuamanda paɗaʋi rimŋe, nefundo neruʋa, notumbiya tutatu ɀe twakaʋumbga samaruʋa omuamanda panerimŋe ɗaʋi, nefundo neruʋa; saiɀoɀo mataʋi matanhatu akaɓuɗa pacigadziko.
Ʋuye pacigadziko pakaŋga panotumbiya tunna twakaŋga twakaʋumbga samaruʋa omuamanda, namafundo atwo, namaruʋa atwo;
nefundo panyasi pamataʋi maʋiri akaŋga akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naco; nefundo ɀe panyasi pamataʋi maʋiri akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naco, akafanana namataʋi matanhatu akaɓuɗa pacigadziko.
Mafundo aɀo namataʋi aɀo akaŋga akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naɀo, ɀose ɀikaʋa cinhu cimŋe cakaŋga cakaʋumbga nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, yakapambadzirwa.
Akaita mŋenje yaco minomŋe, nembato dzaco, nendiro dzaco,
Akaciʋumba netarenta rendarama

Akaita ʋo artari yeɀinonhuwira nomuakasia; kureɓa kwayo kwakaŋga kuri kubiti rimŋe, noʋupamhi bgayo kubiti rimŋe ɀe; nhiʋi dzose inna dzakaŋga dzakaenzana; kukwirira kwayo kwaiʋa makubiti maʋiri, nenyaŋga dzayo dzakaŋga dziri cinhu cimŋe cete nayo.
Akaifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, kumsoro kwayo, nenhiʋi dzayo dzose, nenyaŋga dzayo; akaiitira ʋo hata yendarama yakaŋga yakaipotedza.
Akaiitira ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama pasi pehata yayo, pakona dzayo mbiri, panhiʋi dzayo mbiri, pakaʋa pokuitakura napo namatanda.
Akaita ʋo matanda omuakasia, akaafukidza nendarama.
Akaita ʋo mafuta matȿene okuzodza nawo, neɀinonhuwira ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀemiti inonaka, ɀikaʋa ɀakaveŋganiswa noʋucenjeri bgomuveŋganisi weɀinonhuwira.

Akaita artari yeɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa nomuakasia; kureɓa kwayo kwaiʋa makubiti mashanu, noʋupamhi bgayo makubiti mashanu; yakaŋga inenhiʋi inna dzakaŋga dzakaenzana, nokukwirira kwayo kwaiʋa makubiti matatu.
Akaita ʋo nyaŋga dzayo pamakona ayo manna, nyaŋga dzayo dzikaʋa cinhu cimŋe cete nayo; akaifukidza nendarira.
Akaita nhumbi dzose dzeartari, hari, nefoshoro, nemidziyo, neɀikokoʋonho ɀenyama, neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto, nhumbi dzose akadziita nendarira.
Akaitira ʋo artari cakarukwa cendarira, cakarukwa samambure, pasi pecitsiko cakaipotedza necenyasi, cakaȿikira pakati payo.
Akaitira makona manna ecakarukwa cendarira ɀindori ɀinna paiʋa pokutakura napo namatanda.
Akaita matanda omuakasia, akaafukidza nendarira.
Akaisa matanda mukati meɀindori ɀaiʋa panhiʋi dzeartari, kuti itakurwe nawo; akaiita namapuraŋga, ikasaʋa necinhu mukati.
Akaita, ʋo mudziyo wokushambidzira wendarira, necigadziko cawo cendarira, neɀiʋoni‐ʋoni ɀaʋakadzi ʋaishandira pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Akaita ʋo ruʋazhe; kurutiʋi rwezasi, rwakatarira zasi, kwakaŋga kuneɀirembedzwa ɀemiceka yakaiȿo‐naka yakarukwa, makubiti anezana;
mbiru dzayo dzakaŋga dzinamakumi maʋiri, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinamakumi maʋiri ɀendarira, neɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri.
Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro kwaiʋa namakubiti anezana, nembiru dzayo dzinamakumi maʋiri, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinamakumi maʋiri ɀendarira, neɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri.
Kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa kwakaŋga kuneɀirembedzwa ɀemiceka ɀinamakubiti anamakumi mashanu, nembiru dzaɀo dzinegumi, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinegumi; ɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri.
Kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kunotarira kumabvazuʋa kwaiʋa namakubiti makumi mashanu.
Ɀirembedzwa ɀemiceka kurutiʋi rumŋe
Nokunorumŋe rutiʋi ʋo; kurutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwesuʋo roruʋazhe kwakaŋga kuneɀirembedzwa ɀemiceka ɀinamakubiti anegumi namashanu, nembiru dzaɀo nhatu, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀitatu.
Ɀirembedzwa ɀose ɀemiceka paruʋazhe ɀaipotedza nhiʋi dzose, ɀaiʋa ɀomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka wakarukwa.

Neɀigadziko ɀembiru ɀaiʋa ɀendarira, neɀikorekedzo ɀembiru neɀindori ɀadzo ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri; nemisoro yadzo yakaŋga yakafukidzwa nesirveri; mbiru dzose dzoruʋazhe dzakaŋga dzakaɓatanidzwa neɀindori ɀesirveri.
Cidzitiro cesuʋo roruʋazhe cakaŋga cakaitwa nomusoni, ne
Mbiru dzayo dzaiʋa inna, neɀigadziko ɀadzo ɀinna ɀendarira; ɀikorekedzo ɀadzo ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri, misoro yadzo neɀindori ɀadzo ɀakaŋga ɀakafukidzwa nesirveri.
Mbambo dzose dzetabernakeri nedzoruʋazhe, rwakaŋga ruciipotedza kunhiʋi dzose, dzaiʋa dzendarira.
Ndiko kuwanda kweɀinhu ɀetabernakeri, ɀetabernakeri yecipupuriro, pakuʋereŋgwa kwaɀo nokuraira kwaMosesi; ʋaRevi ʋakaite‐ɓasa iro ʋacirairwa naItamari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista.
Bezareri, mŋanakomana waUri, mŋanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJuda, wakaita ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova,
anaOhoriabi, mŋanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaDani, muʋezi nomuɓati wakacenjera, nomusoni we
Ndarama
Nesirveri
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe
Namatarenta esirveri anezana aiʋa okuʋumbisa nawo ɀigadziko ɀapaimba tȿene neɀigadziko ɀecidzitiro; ɀigadziko ɀinezana ɀakaitwa namatarenta anezana, cigadziko cimŋe necimŋe netarenta rimŋe.
Namashekeri anecuru cimŋe namazana manomŋe namakumi manomŋe namashanu wakaita ɀikorekedzo ɀembiru, akafukidza misoro yadzo, nokuɀiitira ʋo ɀindori.
Ndarira
Nayo wakaita ɀigadziko ɀomukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, neartari yendarira, necakarukwa cayo cendarira, nenhumbi dzose dzapaartari,
neɀigadziko ɀose ɀoruʋazhe rwakaŋga rwakapotedza, neɀigadziko ɀesuʋo roruʋazhe, nembambo dzose dzetabernakeri, nembambo dzose dzoruʋazhe rwakaŋga rwakapotedza.
Ʋakaita ʋo ŋguʋo dzakarukwa ɀakanaka neɀitema, neɀishaʋa, neɀitȿuku, dzokushumira nadzo panɀimbo tȿene; ʋakaita ŋguʋo tȿene dzaAroni, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaita efodi nendarama, ne
Ʋakapambadzira ndarama, ʋakaita maɓape matete, ʋakaiceka, ʋakaita nhare dzokusonisa nadzo
Ʋakaiitira mabande pamafudzi akaɓatanidzwa; akaŋga akaɓatanidzwa pamiromo yayo miʋiri.
Nebanhire rakarukwa nomuɓati wakacenjera, rakaŋga riri pamsoro payo, rokuisuŋga naro; cakaŋga ciri cinhu cimŋe cete nayo, rakaitwa saiyo; rendarama, ne
Ʋakagadzira mabge eoniksi, akanyudzwa mukati meɀiruʋa ɀendarama, mazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri akanyorwa’po, seɀinonyorwa ibge rokusimbisa.
Akaaisa pamabande apamafudzi eefodi, kuti aʋe mabge okuraŋgaridza ʋana ʋaIsraeri, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaita ʋo homboɗo yecifuʋa, raiʋa ɓasa romuɓati wakacenjera, seɀakaitwa ʋo efodi; akaiita nendarama, ne
Yakaŋga inenhiʋi inna dzakaenzana; ʋakaita homboɗo yecifuʋa inemheto mbiri; kureɓa kwayo kwakaŋga kwakaita sapanoȿika minwe, noʋupamhi bgayo sapanoȿika minwe ʋo, inemheto mbiri.
Ʋakaisa mukati mayo misara minna yamabge, mumŋe musara waiʋa nesardio, netopasi, nekarbunkeri. Ndiwo musara wokutaŋga.
Napamusara wecipiri smaragdino, nesafiri, nedaimani.
Napamusara wecitatu hiakinti, neagati, neametisi.
Napamusara wecinna beriri, neoniksi, nejaspiri; akaŋga akanyudzwa muɀiruʋa ɀendarama.
Mabge akaŋga akaita samazita aʋana ʋaIsraeri, anegumi namaʋiri, samazita aʋo;
Napahomboɗo akaita ɀiketani ɀakafanana norwonzi rwendarama yakamoniwa yakaiȿo‐naka.
Ʋakaita ʋo ɀiruʋa ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, neɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, akaisa ɀindori ɀiʋiri pamiceto miʋiri yehomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Ʋakaisa ʋo ɀiketani ɀiʋiri ɀendarama yakamoniwa paɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀaiʋa pamiceto yehomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Ne
Ʋakaita ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama, ʋakaɀiisa pamiceto miʋiri yehomboɗo yecifuʋa pamupendero wayo, uri kurutiʋi rweefodi necomukati.
Ʋakaita ʋo ɀindori ɀiʋiri ɀendarama ʋakaɀiisa pamabande maʋiria pamafudzi eefodi zasi necemberi kwayo, pedyo napayakaɓatanidzwa napo, pamsoro pebanhire reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri.

Ʋakasuŋganidza homboɗo yecifuʋa neɀindori ɀayo paɀindori ɀeefodi norwonzi rutema, kuti ruʋe pamsoro pebanhire reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri, kuti homboɗo yecifuʋa irege kusunuŋguka paefodi, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaita ʋo jasi reefodi rakarukwa; rose rakaŋga riri romuceka mutema.
Akaita ɓuri rejasi pakati paro, seɓuri reŋguʋo yokurwa, rakaŋga rinomupendero wakapotedza ɓuri raro, kuti rirege kubvaruka.
Pamipendero yejasi ʋakaita matamba
Ʋakaita ʋo ɀitare
pakaʋa necitare cimŋe neɗamba rimŋe, necitare cimŋe ɀe neɗamba rimŋe ɀe, pamipendero yejasi kunhiʋi dzose,
Ʋakaitira Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ŋguʋo dzakarukwa nomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka,
neŋgoani yomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, nedzimŋe ŋgoani dzakanaka dzomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, namaburuku omuceka wakarukwa wakaiȿo‐naka,
nebanhire romuceka wakaiȿo‐naka wakarukwa, ne
Ʋakaita ʋo hwendefa rekorona tȿene nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, ʋakanyora pamsoro paro seɀinonyorwa ibge rokusimbisa,
Ʋakasuŋgira pariri rwonzi rutema, kuti ʋariɓatanidze naro paŋgoani kumsoro, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ɓasa rose retabernakeri yetente rokusoŋgana rakapera; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova, ʋakaita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya netabernakeri kunaMosesi,
necifukidzo camatebge amakondobge akazodzwa muti mutȿuku, necifukidzo camatebge amatenhe, necidzitiro cokudzitira naco;
neareka yecipupuriro, namatanda okutakura nawo, necifunhiro cokuyananisa;
netafura, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, neciŋgwa cokuratidza;
necigadziko cakaiȿo‐naka, nemŋenje yaco, mŋenje yokugadzirira’po, nenhumbi dzaco dzose, namafuta okuvenekesa nawo;
neartari yendarama, namafuta okuzodza nawo, neɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka, necidzitiro comukoʋa weTente;
neartari yendarira, necakarukwa cayo cendarira, namatanda, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nomudziyo wokushambidzira, necigadziko cawo;
neɀirembedzwa ɀaparuʋazhe, nembiru dzaɀo, neɀigadziko ɀadzo, necidzitiro cesuʋo roruʋazhe, norwonzi rwaco, nembambo dzaco, nenhumbi dzose dzokuɓata nadzo patabernakeri, patente rokusoŋgana;
neŋguʋo dzakarukwa ɀakanaka noʋucenjeri dzokushumira nadzo panɀimbo tȿene, neŋguʋo tȿene dzaAroni muprista, neŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake, dzokushumira nadzo paɓasa roʋuprista.
Ɀose seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova, saiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita maɓasa ose.
Mosesi akatarira maɓasa ose, akaʋona kuti ʋakaŋga ʋaaita seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita; Mosesi akaʋaropafadza.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Nomusi wokutaŋga womŋedzi unofanira kumisa tabernakeri netente rokusoŋgana.
Unofanira kuisa mukati mayo areka yecipupuriro, nokudzitira areka necidzitiro
Upinze ʋo tafura, nokugadzira ɀinhu ɀinofanira kuʋa pamsoro payo; upinze ʋo cigadziko cemŋenje, ugotuŋgidza mŋenje yaco.
Uise ʋo artari yendarama yeɀinonhuwira pamberi peareka yecipupuriro, ugoisa cidzitiro comukoʋa wetabernakeri.
Ɀino uise ʋo artari yeɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa pamberi pomukoʋa wetabernakeri yetente rokusoŋgana.
Uise ʋo mudziyo wokushambidzira pakati petente rokusoŋgana neartari, ugoɗira mvura mukati mawo.
Ɀino ugadzire ʋo ruʋazhe nokurembedza cidzitiro cesuʋo roruʋazhe.
Utore ʋo mafuta okuzodza nawo, uzodze tabernakeri nawo, neɀose ɀiri mukati mayo; ugoitsaura, iyo neɀose ɀiri’mo, kuti ciʋe cinhu citȿene.
Uzodze ʋo artari neɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa, nemidziyo yayo yose, kuti utsaure artari, artari ciʋe cinhu citȿene‐tȿene.
Uzodze ʋo mudziyo wokushambidzira necigadziko cawo, uutsaure.
Ɀino usweɗedze Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ugoʋashambidza nemvura.
Ipapo ufukidze Aroni ŋguʋo tȿene, ugomuzodza nokumutsaura, kuti andishumire paɓasa roʋuprista.
Usweɗedze ʋo ʋanakomana ʋake, ugoʋafukidza ŋguʋo.
Uʋazodze, seɀawazodza ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, kuti ʋandishumire paɓasa roʋuprista; kuzodzwa kwaʋo kunofanira kuʋa kwaʋari ʋuprista nokusiŋgaperi, kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose.
Mosesi akaita saiɀoɀo; ɀose ɀaakaŋga arairwa naJehova, wakaɀiita saiɀoɀo.
Tabernakeri ikamiswa nomŋedzi wokutaŋga wegore recipiri nomusi wokutaŋga womŋedzi.
Mosesi akamisa tabernakeri, akaisa ɀigadziko ɀayo, akamisa mapuraŋga ayo, akaisa mbariro dzayo, nokumisa mbiru dzayo.
Akawarira tente pamsoro petabernakeri, akaisa cifukidzo cetente pamsoro payo, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akatora cipupuriro, akaciisa muareka, akapinza matanda paareka, akaisa cifunhiro cokuyananisa pamsoro peareka;
akapinza areka mutabernakeri, akarembedza cidzitiro cokudzitira naco, akadzitira areka yecipupuriro; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaisa tafura mutente rokusoŋgana, kurutiʋi rwetabernakeri necokumsoro, kunze kwecidzitiro.
Akagadzira ʋo ciŋgwa pamsoro payo pamberi paJehova, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaisa cigadziko cemŋenje mutente rokusoŋgana, cakatarisana netafura, kurutiʋi rwetabernakeri necenyasi.
Akatuŋgidza mŋenje pamberi paJehova, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaisa artari yendarama mutente rokusoŋgana pamberi pecidzitiro;
akapisira’po ɀinonhuwira ɀemiti yakanaka, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akagadzira ɀirembedzwa ɀomukoʋa wetabernakeri.
Akaisa artari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa pamukoʋa wetabernakeri yetente rokusoŋgana, akapisira pamsoro payo cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaisa mudziyo wokushambidzira pakati petente rokusoŋgana neartari, akaisa mukati mayo mvura yokushambidza nayo.
Ipapo Mosesi naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakashamba maʋoko aʋo netsoka dzaʋo’po;
pakupinda kwaʋo mutente rokusoŋgana, napakusweɗera kwaʋo kuartari, ʋaishamba, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akagadzira ʋo ruʋazhe rwaipotedza tabernakeri neartari, akarembedza cidzitiro cesuʋo roruʋazhe. Naiɀoɀo Mosesi akapedza ɓasa
Ipapo gore rakafukidza tente rokusoŋgana, kubginya kwaJehova kukazadza tabernakeri.
Mosesi akasagona kupinda mutente rokusoŋgana, nokuti gore rakaramba rigere pamsoro paro ʋuye kubginya kwaJehova kwakaŋga kwazadza tabernakeri.
Ɀino kana gore rokwidzwa ricibva pamsoro petabernakeri, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapfuʋura ʋacifamba nzendo dzaʋo dzose.
Asi kana gore risina‐kukwidzwa, haʋana‐kufamba, kuȿikira musi warinozokwidzwa.
Nokuti gore raJehova rakaŋga riri pamsoro petabernakeri masikati, nomŋoto waiʋa mariri ʋusiku, pamberi paʋose ʋeimba yaIsraeri panzendo dzaʋo dzose.
Ɀino Jehova wakaɗana Mosesi, akataura naye ari mutente rokusoŋgana, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana mumŋe wenyu aciɗa kuʋigira Jehova cipo cake, munofanira kumuʋigira ɀipo ɀenyu ɀeɀipfuwo, kana ɀeŋombe kana ɀamakwai.
Kana cipo cake ciri cipiriso cinopiswa ceŋombe, unofanira kuʋigira mukono usinemhoȿa; ŋgaaciɓayire pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, kuti agamucirwe pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wecipiriso cinopiswa, kuti cigamucirwe panɀimbo yake, cimuyananisire.
Ŋgaaɓaye nzombe pamberi paJehova, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista, ʋagoʋuya neropa, ʋasase ropa kunhiʋi dzose dzeartari, iri pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino ŋgaaviye cipiriso cinopiswa, nokucigura‐gura.
