Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, muprista, ŋgaʋaise mŋoto paartari, nokugadzira ʋo huni pamsoro pomŋoto.
Ipapo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista, ʋanofanira kugadzira nhindi, nomusoro, namafuta pamsoro pehuni dziri pamŋoto uri pamsoro peartari.
Asi ŋgaasuke ʋura bgaco namakumbo aco nemvura, muprista agopisa ɀose paartari, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Kana cipo cake ciri cipiriso cinopiswa ceɀipfuwo ɀiɗuku ɀamakwai kana mbudzi, unofanira kuʋigira mukono usinemhoȿa.
Ŋgaaciɓaye parutiʋi rweartari necokumsoro pamberi paJehova; ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista, ʋanofanira kusasa ropa raco kunhiʋi dzose dzeartari.
Ipapo unofanira kugura‐gura nhindi pamŋe cete nomusoro waco namafuta aco, muprista agoɀigadzira pamsoro pehuni dziri pamŋoto pamsoro peartari.
Asi ʋura namakumbo ŋgaaɀisuke nemvura, muprista agoɀiɓayira ɀose, nokuɀipisira paartari, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cakaitwa nomŋoto, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Kana cipo cake kunaJehova ciri cipiriso cinopiswa ceshiri, ŋgaaʋigire ciɓayiro cake cenjiʋa, kana twana twenjiʋa.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kuciisa paartari, ndokugura musoro ndokuupisa paartari, agoɗonhedzera ropa raco parutiʋi rweartari;
ɀino unofanira kutora cihururu cayo neminheŋga yayo, ndokuɀirasha kurutiʋi rweartari kumaɓuɗazuʋa kunorashwa maɗota.

Ipapo unofanira kuibvambura namapapiro ayo asiŋgaiparadzanisi, muprista agoipisa paartari pamsoro pehuni dziri pamŋoto; ico cipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cakaitwa nomŋoto, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Kana munhu aciʋuya kunaJehova necipo coʋupfu, cipo cake ŋgaciʋe coʋupfu bgakatsetseka; ɀino ŋgaaɗire mafuta pamsoro paco, agoisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamsoro paco.
Ipapo ŋgaaciise kuʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista; iye atsamure tsama yake imŋe yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka namafuta neɀinonhuwira ɀiri’po, muprista agoɀipisa paartari,
Ɀakasara pacipiriso coʋupfu ɀicaʋa ɀaAroni naʋanakomana ʋake; ico cinhu citȿene‐tȿene pakati peɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀakaitwa nomŋoto.
Kana uciʋuya necipo coʋupfu cakaɓikwa mucoto, ŋgaciʋe ceɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, neɀiŋgwa ɀitete ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀakazodzwa mafuta.
Kana cipo cako ciri cipiriso coʋupfu cakaɓikwa mugaŋgo, ŋgaciʋe coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgusina‐kuʋiriswa, bgakakanyiwa namafuta.
Unofanira kucimeɗura, nokuɗira mafuta pamsoro paco; ndico cipiriso coʋupfu.
Kana cipo cako ciri cipiriso coʋupfu
Unofanira kuʋuya kunaJehova necipiriso coʋupfu cakaitwa neɀinhu iɀi; ŋgacipiwe muprista, iye agociisa paartari.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaatsamure pacipiriso coʋupfu cokuraŋgaridza caco, acipisire pamsoro peartari; ico cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Ɀakasara pacipiriso coʋupfu ŋgaɀiʋe ɀaAroni naʋanakomana ʋake; ico cinhu citȿene‐tȿene pakati peɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀinoitwa nomŋoto.
Cipiriso cipi necipi coʋupfu camunoʋuya naco kunaJehova ŋgacirege kuitwa nembiriso, nokuti hamufaniri kupisira Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto cinembiriso kana ʋuci.
Muŋgaɀiʋigira Jehova ɀiri ɀipiriso ɀeɀitȿa ɀenyu, asi ŋgaɀirege kuiswa paartari kuti ɀiʋe ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka.
Ɀipiriso ɀako ɀose ɀoʋupfu unofanira kuɀiruŋga nomunyu; usarega kuisa munyu wesuŋgano yaMŋari wako pacipiriso cako coʋupfu, asi uise munyu paɀipiriso ɀako ɀose.
Kana uciʋigira Jehova cipiriso coʋupfu ceɀitȿa, uʋuye nehura dzeɀiyo dzakakaŋgiwa pamŋoto, ɀiyo ɀakaswiwa ɀehura itȿa, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu ceɀitȿa.
Unofanira kuisa mafuta pamsoro paco, nokuisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamsoro paco, kuti ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaapise cokuraŋgaridza caco, ɀimŋe ɀeɀiyo ɀaco ɀakaswiwa, neɀimŋe ɀamafuta aco, pamŋe cete neɀinonhuwira ɀaco; cipiriso cinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto.
Kana cipo cake ciri ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, kana aciʋuya neŋombe, kana iri nzombe kana hadzi, ŋgaaʋuye necisinemhoȿa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wecipiriso cake, aciʋuraye pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista, ʋagosasa ropa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Ɀino ŋgaape Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto paciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, cokuti mafuta anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ose ari paʋura,
netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari pamsoro padzo, ari paciʋuno, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, ŋgaaɀibvise pamŋe cete netȿo.
Ipapo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋanofanira kuɀipisa paartari pamsoro pecipiriso cinopiswa, ciri pamsoro pehuni dziri pamŋoto; kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Kana cipo cake ceciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa ciri ceɀipfuwo ɀiɗuku, kana uri mukono kana hadzi, ŋgaaʋuye necisinemhoȿa.
Kana aciʋuya negwaiana recipiriso cake, ŋgaaʋuye naro pamberi paJehova,
ɀino aise ruʋoko rwake pamsoro pecipo cake, ndokuciʋuraya pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋagosasa ropa raco pamsoro peartari panhiʋi dzose.
Ɀino ŋgaape Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto paciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, cokuti mafuta aro neɓemhe rose, aɀibvise pedyo nomusana, namafuta anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ose ari pamsoro poʋura,
netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari pamsoro padzo, ari paciʋuno, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, ŋgaaɀibvise pamŋe cete netȿo.
Ipapo muprista ŋgaaɀipise pamsoro peartari; ndiɀo ɀokudya ɀecipiriso cinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto.
Kana cipo cake ciri cembudzi, ŋgaaʋuye nayo pamberi paJehova;
ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wayo, aiʋuraye pamberi petente rokusoŋgana; ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋagosasa ropa rayo pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Ɀino ŋgaape ɀimŋe ɀaɀo ciʋe cipo cake, cipiriso cinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto; ɀinoti mafuta anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ose ari pamsoro poʋura,
netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari pamsoro padzo, ari paciʋuno, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, aɀibvise pamŋe cete netȿo.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaaɀipise pamsoro peartari; ndiɀo ɀokudya ɀecipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto, ɀiʋe ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka; mafuta ose ndeaJehova.
Ŋgauʋe murairo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose padzimba dzenyu dzose, kuti murege kudya mafuta neropa.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Kana munhu akatadza nokusaziʋa pacinhu cimŋe ceɀakarairwa naJehova kuti ɀirege kuitwa, akaita cimŋe caɀo;
kana muprista wakazodzwa akatadza, akapinza ʋanhu pamhoȿa, unofanira kuʋigira Jehova nzombe ɗuku isinemhoȿa, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza, kuti ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Ŋgaaʋuye nenzombe ɗuku pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana pamberi paJehova, aise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wenzombe, ndokuʋuraya nzombe pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino muprista wakazodzwa ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa renzombe, ariise patente rokusoŋgana,
muprista agonyika munwe wake muropa, ndokusasa rimŋe ropa kanomŋe pamberi paJehova, pamberi pecidzitiro cenɀimbo tȿene.

Ɀino muprista aise rimŋe ropa pamberi paJehova panyaŋga dzeartari yeɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka, iri mutente rokusoŋgana, agoɗurura rimŋe ropa rose renzombe mujiŋga meartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, iri pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino ŋgaabvise mafuta ose enzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, mafuta anofukidza ʋura, namafuta ose ari pamsoro poʋura,
netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari pamsoro padzo, ari paciʋuno, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, ŋgaaɀibvise pamŋe cete netȿo,
seɀaanobviswa panzombe yecipiriso cokuyananisa naco; ɀino muprista ŋgaaɀipise pamsoro peartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa.
Ƌebge renzombe, nenyama yayo yose, pamŋe cete nomusoro wayo, namakumbo ayo, noʋura bgayo, namaɀiɀi ayo;
nzombe yose iyo unofanira kuitakurira kunze kwemisasa, pakanaka, panorashirwa maɗota, ndokuipisira pamsoro pehuni nomŋoto; ŋgaipisirwe panorashirwa maɗota.
Kana ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri ikatadza, cinhu ico cikasazikanwa neʋuŋgano, kana ʋakaita cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀakarairwa naJehova kuti ɀirege kuitwa, ʋakapara mhaka;
kana ciʋi caʋakatadza cikazozikanwa, ɀino ʋuŋgano ŋgaiʋuye nenzombe ɗuku, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, iʋuyiswe pamberi petente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋeʋuŋgano ŋgaʋaise maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wenzombe pamberi paJehova, nzombe igoʋurawa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino muprista wakazodzwa ŋgaaʋuye nerimŋe ropa renzombe patente rokusoŋgana,
muprista anyike munwe wake muropa, arisase kanomŋe pamberi paJehova, pamberi pecidzitiro.
Ɀino ŋgaaise rimŋe ropa panyaŋga dzeartari iri pamberi paJehova, iri mutente rokusoŋgana; rimŋe ropa rose agoriɗururira mujiŋga meartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, iri pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino ŋgaabvise mafuta ose ari’po, aapise pamsoro peartari.
Ndiɀo ɀaanofanira kuitira nzombe; seɀaakaitira nzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, ndiɀo ɀaanofanira kuitira iyi; muprista unofanira kuʋayananisira, ʋakaŋganwirwe.
Ɀino unofanira kutakurira nzombe kunze kwemisasa, andoipisa, seɀaakapisa nzombe yokutaŋga; ndico cipiriso ceɀiʋi ceʋuŋgano.
Kana mukuru akatadza, akaita nokusaziʋa cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀose ɀakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wake kuti ɀirege kuitwa, akapara mhaka;
kana ciʋi cake caakatadza akaciziʋiswa, ŋgaaʋuye nenhoŋgo yembudzi isinemhoȿa, ciʋe cipiriso cake.
Ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wembudzi, aiʋuraye panoʋurayirwa cipiriso cinopiswa pamberi paJehova, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa recipiriso ceɀiʋi nomunwe wake, ariise panyaŋga dzeartari yecipiriso cinopiswa, nerimŋe ropa rayo ariɗururire mujiŋga meartari yecipiriso cinopiswa.
Mafuta ayo ose ŋgaapiswe pamsoro peartari, seɀaʋakaita namafuta ecipiriso cokuyananisa; muprista amuyananisire pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake, akaŋganwirwe.
Kana mumŋe waʋanhu ɀaʋo akatadza akaita nokusaziʋa cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀakarairwa naJehova kuti ɀirege kuitwa, akapara mhaka;
kana ciʋi cake caakatadza akaciziʋiswa, ŋgaaʋuye neshece yembudzi isinemhoȿa, ciʋe cipiriso cake pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza.
Ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wecipiriso ceɀiʋi, aʋuraye cipiriso ceɀiʋi panoʋurayirwa cipiriso cinopiswa.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa rayo nomunwe wake, ariise panyaŋga dzeartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, asi rimŋe ropa rayo rose ŋgaariɗururire mujiŋga meartari.

Ɀino ŋgaabvise mafuta ayo ose, seɀinobviswa mafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa naɀo, muprista agoapisa pamsoro peartari, ciʋe cinhu cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova; muprista unofanira kumuyananisira, akaŋganwirwe.
Kana akaʋuya negwaiana rokuita naro cipiriso cake ceɀiʋi, ŋgaaʋuye neshece isinemhoȿa.
Ɀino ŋgaaise ruʋoko rwake pamusoro wecipiriso ceɀiʋi, agoriʋuraya panoʋurayirwa cipiriso cinopiswa.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa recipiriso ceɀiʋi nomunwe wake, ariise panyaŋga dzeartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, asi rimŋe ropa raro rose ŋgaariɗururire mujiŋga meartari;

ɀino ŋgaabvise mafuta aro ose, seɀinobviswa mafuta egwaiana paciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa naɀo; muprista aapise pamsoro peartari seɀinoitwa neɀipiriso ɀose ɀaJehova ɀinoitwa nomŋoto; muprista unofanira kumuyananisira pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza, akaŋganwirwe.
Kana munhu akatadza, ari capupu akapikirwa kupupura cinhu caakaʋona, kana caanoziʋa, akasaɗudza, ucaʋa nemhoȿa yake.

Kunyaŋge kana munhu akaŋga aɓata cinhu cisakanaka, kana ciri citunha cemhuka isakanaka, kana citunha ceŋombe isakanaka, kana citunha ciɀinokambaira ɀisakanaka, ɀikasazikanwa naye, akaȿiɓiswa, ucaʋa nemhoȿa.
Kana akaŋga aɓata ɀisakanaka ɀomunhu, kana ɀiri ɀisakanaka ɀipi neɀipi akaȿiɓiswa naɀo, ɀikasazikanwa naye; kana akazoɀiziʋa, ucaʋa nemhoȿa.

Kana munhu akapika nomuromo wake, asiŋgafuŋgi kwaɀo, kundoita ɀakaipa kana kundoita ɀakanaka, cinhu cipi necipi caakapika, asiŋgafuŋgi kwaɀo, cikasazikanwa naye; kana akazociziʋa, ucaʋa nemhoȿa kunecimŋe caiɀoɀo;
ɀino kana akaʋa nemhoȿa kunecimŋe caiɀoɀo, unofanira kuɀireʋurura ɀaakatadza.

Ɀino ŋgaaʋuye necipiriso cake cemhoȿa pamberi paJehova pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza, ŋgaiʋe hadzi yeɀipfuwo ɀiɗuku, kana gwaiana kana mbudzana, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; muprista ŋgaamuyananisire pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake.
Kana asiŋgagoni kuʋuya negwaiana, ŋgaaʋigire Jehova njiʋa mbiri, kana twana tuʋiri twenjiʋa, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa yake yaakatadza; imŋe iʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, imŋe cipiriso cinopiswa.
Ɀino ŋgaaʋuye nadzo kumuprista, iye ataŋge kuɓaya imŋe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, agure musoro wayo pamutsipa, asi arege kuiparadzanisa;
ɀino ŋgaasase ropa recipiriso ceɀiʋi kurutiʋi rweartari, asi ropa rakasara riȿinirwe mujiŋga meartari; cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Yecipiri ŋgaaite nayo cipiriso cinopiswa, seɀamakarairwa; muprista amuyananisire pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaakatadza, akaŋganwirwe.
Asi kana akasagona kuʋuya nenjiʋa mbiri, kana notwana tuʋiri twenjiʋa, ŋgaaʋuye necipiriso cake pamsoro pokutadza kwake,
Ɀino ŋgaaʋuye nabgo kumuprista, muprista atsamure tsama imŋe yabgo, ciʋe cokuraŋgaridza caco; ɀino ŋgaabguise pamsoro peartari, seɀinoitwa neɀimŋe ɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀinoitwa nomŋoto; cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Muprista unofanira kumuyananisira pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza pacinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀo, akaŋganwirwe. Ɀakasara ŋgaɀiʋe ɀomuprista, seɀinoitwa necipiriso coʋupfu.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:

Kana munhu akaɗarika, akatadza nokusaziʋa paɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀaJehova, ŋgaaʋuye kunaJehova necipiriso cemhoȿa yake, cegondobge risinemhoȿa ramakwai ake, ucimutarira mashekeri esirveri ucienzanisa neshekeri
Ŋgaatsiʋe cinhu caakatadza pacinhu citȿene, awedzere paciri cimŋe ceshanu caco, acipe muprista, muprista agomuyananisira negondobge recipiriso cemhoȿa, akaŋganwirwe.
Kana munhu akatadza, akaita cinhu cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naJehova kuti ɀirege kuitwa; kunyaŋge asina‐kuziʋa, unemhoȿa, mhaka unayo.
Ŋgaaʋuye kumuprista negondobge ramakwai ake risinemhoȿa, seɀaunofuŋga iwe, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa, muprista agomuyananisira pamsoro pecinhu caakaŋga atadza nokusaziʋa, asiŋgaɀiʋi, akaŋganwirwe.
Cipiriso cemhoȿa; ɀirokwaɀo unemhoȿa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Kana munhu akatadza, akaɗarika murairo waJehova, akanyeŋgera wokwake pacinhu caakaŋga apiwa kuceŋgeta, kana cakaŋga caiswa paruʋoko rwake, kana pakumuɓira, kana pakumanikidza wokwake;
kana akanoŋga cakaŋga carashika, akanyeŋgera paciri, akapika nhema; pacinhu cipi necipi caɀose iɀo, kana munhu aciŋge aita akatadza paciri;
ɀino kana akatadza, anemhoȿa, unofanira kudzosa caakaŋga atora nokuɓa, kana caakaŋga awana nokumanikidza, kana caakaŋga apiwa kuceŋgeta, kana cakaŋga carashika akacinoŋga;
kana cinhu cipi necipi caakaŋga apika nhema pamsor paco; ŋgaacidzose cose, awedzere kwaciri ceshanu caco, acipe muridzi waco nomusi waanowanikwa kuti unemhoȿa.
Unofanira kuʋuya kumuprista necipiriso cemhoȿa yake kunaJehova, cegondobge ramakwai ake risinemhoȿa, seɀaunotara iwe, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa;
ɀino muprista amuyananisire pamberi paJehova, akaŋganwirwe pamsoro pemhoȿa ipi neipi yaakaita.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:

Raira Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake, uti: Murairo wecipiriso cinopiswa ndiwo: Cipiriso cinopiswa cinofanira kuʋata pacoto pamsoro peartari ʋusiku bgose kuȿikira maŋgwanani, mŋoto urambe ucipfuta pamsoro paco.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaafuke ŋguʋo yake yomuceka, nokufuka ʋo buruku rake romuceka pamuʋiri wake, abvise maɗota ecipiriso cinopiswa, capiswa nomŋoto paartari, aaise parutiʋi rweartari.
Ɀino ŋgaabvise ŋguʋo dzake, afuke dzimŋe ŋguʋo, agotakurira maɗota kunze kwemisasa panɀimbo yakanaka.

Mŋoto paartari unofanira kuramba ucipfuta pamsoro payo, haufaniri kudzima; muprista unofanira kuɓatidza huni pamsoro payo maŋgwanani ose; ɀino ŋgaagadzire cipiriso cinopiswa pamsoro payo, apise mafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa pamsoro payo.
Mŋoto ŋgaurambe ucipfuta pamsoro peartari ŋguʋa dzose, urege kudzima.
Murairo wecipiriso coʋupfu ndiwo: Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋanofanira kuʋuya naco pamberi paJehova paartari.

Zino ŋgaatsamure tsama imŋe yake yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka bgecipiriso coʋupfu, namamŋe mafuta aco, neɀinonhuwira ɀose ɀiri pamsoro pecipiriso coʋupfu, aɀipise pamsoro peartari, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka, cokuraŋgaridza caco, kunaJehova.
Ɀakasara ɀaco ŋgaɀidyiwe naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake; ɀidyiwe ɀisinembiriso panɀimbo tȿene; ŋgaʋaɀidye paruʋazhe rwetente rokusoŋgana.
Ŋgaɀirege kuɓikwa nembiriso; ndakaʋapa ico, uʋe mugoʋe waʋo weɀipiriso ɀaŋgu ɀinoitwa nomŋoto; cinhu citȿene kwaɀo, secipiriso ceɀiʋi, necipiriso cemhoȿa.
Ʋarume ʋose kuʋana ʋaAroni ŋgaʋaɀidye, uʋe murairo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose paɀipiriso ɀose ɀaJehova ɀinoitwa nomŋoto; munhu upi noupi unoɀiɓata, ucaʋa mutȿene.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ndico cipo caAroni necaʋanakomana ʋake caʋanofanira kupa Jehova nomusi waanozodzwa nawo: Cegumi ceefa
Ŋgaciɓikwe namafuta mugaŋgo; kana caibva, uʋuye naco; unofanira kuʋuya necipiriso coʋupfu ɀimeɗu‐ɀimeɗu ɀakakaŋgwa, ciʋe cinhu cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Muprista unozodzwa panɀimbo yake pakati paʋanakomana ʋake, ndiye unofanira kuʋuya naco; uʋe mutemo usiŋgaperi kuti cipisirwe Jehova cose.
Cipiriso cimŋe necimŋe coʋupfu comuprista cinofanira kupiswa cose; hacifaniri kudyiwa.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake uti: Murairo wecipiriso ceɀiʋi ndiwo: Panoʋurayirwa cipiriso cinopiswa ndi’po panofanira kuʋurayirwa ʋo cipiriso ceɀiʋi pamberi paJehova; citȿene kwaɀo.
Muprista unociɓayira pamsoro peɀiʋi, ndiye unofanira kucidya; cinofanira kudyiwa panɀimbo tȿene, paruʋazhe rwetente rokusoŋgana.
Cinhu cipi necipi cinogunɀa nyama yaco cicaʋa citȿene; kana rimŋe ropa raco rikaɗonhera paŋguʋo ipi neipi, unofanira kusuka ico cakaɗonherwa naro panɀimbo tȿene.
Asi hari yevu mayakaɓikirwa, inofanira kuputswa; kana yakaɓikwa muhari yendarira inofanira kukwizwa nokusukurudzwa nemvura.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose kuʋaprista ʋanofanira kucidya; citȿene kwaɀo.
Ɀipiriso ɀose ɀeɀiʋi, kana rimŋe ropa raɀo rakaiswa mutente rokusoŋgana kuzoyananisira panɀimbo tȿene, ŋgaɀirege kudyiwa; ɀinofanira kupiswa nomŋoto.
Murairo wecipiriso cemhoȿa ndiwo: Citȿene kwaɀo.
Paʋanoʋurayira cipiriso cinopiswa, ndi’po paʋanofanira kuʋuraya cipiriso cemhoȿa; ropa raco unofanira kurisasa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Ɀino ŋgaapisire mafuta aco ose, mafuta eɓemhe, namafuta anofukidza ʋura,
netȿo mbiri, namafuta ari pamsoro padzo, ari paciʋuno, namafuta ari pamsoro peciropa, ŋgaaɀibvise pamŋe cete netȿo.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaaɀipise paartari, ciʋe cipiriso cinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto; cipiriso cemhoȿa.
Ʋarume ʋose kuʋaprista ŋgaʋacidye; cidyiwe panɀimbo tȿene; citȿene kwaɀo.
Seɀinoitwa necipiriso ceɀiʋi, ndiɀo ɀinoitwa ʋo necipiriso cemhoȿa; murairo waɀo ndomumŋe; cicaʋa comuprista unoyananisira naco.
Ʋuye muprista, unopisira cipiriso cinopiswa comunhu, uyo muprista unofanira kupiwa ɗebge recipiriso cinopiswa caakaʋuya naco.
Cipiriso cimŋe necimŋe coʋupfu, cakaɓikwa mucoto, neɀose ɀakagadzirwa mugaŋgo kana muhari, ɀicaʋa ɀomuprista unoʋuya naɀo.
Cipiriso cimŋe necimŋe coʋupfu, cakakanyiwa namafuta, kana cakawoma, cinofanira kupiwa ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaAroni, mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋacienzaniswa.
Ndiwo murairo weɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ɀinofanira kupiwa Jehova:

Kana munhu akaɀipa, kuti aʋoŋge naɀo, pamŋe cete neciɓayiro cokuʋoŋga naco, unofanira kupa ɀiŋgwa ɀiɗuku ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀakakanyiwa namafuta, neɀiŋgwa ɀitete ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀakazodzwa mafuta, neɀiŋgwa ɀakakanyiwa namafuta ɀoʋupfu bgakatsetseka ɀakakaŋgwa.
Unofanira kupa ʋo cipo cake ceɀiŋgwa ɀakaʋiriswa pamŋe cete neciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa ɀokuʋoŋga naɀo.
Ɀino
Nyama yeciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa ɀokuʋoŋga naɀo inofanira kudyiwa nomusi waanopa cipo cake; haafaniri kusiya cimŋe caco kuȿikira maŋgwanani.
Asi kana ciɓayiro cecipo cake ciri cinhu caakapika, kana cipo cokuɗa kwake, cinofanira kudyiwa nomusi waanoɓayira ciɓayiro cake; ɀakasara paɀiri ɀinofanira kudyiwa maŋgwanani;
asi ɀakasara ɀenyama yeciɓayiro ɀinofanira kupiswa nomŋoto nezuʋa retatu.

Kana imŋe nyama yeciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa ikadyiwa nezuʋa retatu, haɀiŋgagamucirwi nomufaro kana kunzi ɀakanaka kunaiye wakaɀipa; cicaʋa cinhu cinonyaŋgadza, nomunhu unoɀidya ucaʋa nemhoȿa.
Nyama yakaɓatana necinhu cisakanaka, haifaniri kudyiwa, inofanira kupiswa nomŋoto. Asi
Asi munhu unodya nyama yeciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ɀiri ɀaJehova, aciri netȿina yake, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.

Kana aninani akaɓata cinhu cisakanaka, kana ɀiri ɀisakanaka ɀomunhu kana ɀemhuka isakanaka, kana cimŋe cinhu cisakanaka cinonyaŋgadza, akadya nyama yeciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa ɀiri ɀaJehova, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Musadya mafuta, kana eŋombe, kana egwai, kana embudzi.
Mafuta ecinhu cakaŋgofa coga, namafuta ecinhu cakaʋurawa neɀikara, aŋgaɓatwa nawo pamaɓasa ose, asi hamufaniri kutoŋgoadya.
Nokuti aninani unodya mafuta eɀipfuwo ɀaʋanoitira Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto, munhu unoadya unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Regai kudya ropa ripi neripi, kana riri reshiri, kana reɀipfuwo, padzimba dzenyu dzose.
Aninani unodya ropa ripi neripi, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Munhu unoɓayira Jehova ciɓayiro cake ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, unofanira kuʋuya necipo cake kunaJehova cinobva paciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa;
maʋoko ake amene anofanira kuʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto; ŋgaaʋuye namafuta pamŋe cete necityu, kuti cityu cizuŋguzirwe, ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaapise mafuta paartari, asi cityu ndecaAroni naʋanakomana ʋake.
Munofanira kupa muprista ɓandauko rorudyi, ciʋe cipiriso cinosimudzwa paɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀokuyananisa.
Uyo pakati paʋanakomana ʋaAroni unopisira ropa reɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa namafuta, ndiye ucapiwa ɓandauko rorudyi uʋe mugoʋe wake.

Nokuti cityu cinozuŋguzirwa neɓandauko rinosimudzwa, ndiɀo ɀandakatora kuʋana ʋaIsraeri pakati peɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀokuyananisa, ndikaɀipa Aroni muprista, naʋanakomana ʋake, ciʋe caʋo nokusiŋgaperi, cinobva kuʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ndiwo mugoʋe waAroni, nomugoʋe waʋanakomana ʋake paɀipiriso ɀinoitirwa Jehova nomŋoto, nomusi waakaʋagadza nawo kuti ʋaɓatire Jehova paɓasa roʋuprista;
wakarairwa naJehova kuti ʋapiwe naʋana ʋaIsraeri nomusi wokuzodzwa kwaʋo. Ndiwo mugoʋe waʋo nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose.
Ndiwo murairo wecipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu, necipiriso ceɀiʋi, necipiriso cemhoȿa, nowokugadza, noweɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa;
wakarairwa Mosesi naJehova pagomo reSinai, nomusi waakaraira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋape Jehova ɀipo ɀaʋo murenje reSinai.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Tora Aroni, naʋanakomana ʋake, neŋguʋo, namafuta okuzodza nawo, nenzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, namakondobge maʋiri, neɗeŋgu reɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa;
uʋuŋganidze ʋuŋgano yose pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Mosesi akaita seɀaakarairwa naJehova, ʋuŋgano ikaʋuŋganidzwa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kuʋuŋgano: Ndiɀo ɀakarairwa naJehova kuti ɀiitwe.
Mosesi akaʋuya naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake, akaʋashambidza nemvura,
akamufukidza jasi, ndokumusuŋga ciʋuno nebanhire, akamufukidza ŋguʋo, akamuisa efodi, nokumusuŋga ciʋuno nebande reefodi rakarukwa noʋucenjeri, ndokurisuŋgira kwaari naro.
Akamuisa homboɗo yecifuʋa, ndokuisa Urimi neTumimi muhomboɗo yecifuʋa.
Akaisa ʋo ŋgoani pamusoro wake; paŋgoani necemberi akaisa hwendefa rendarama, ndiyo korona tȿene; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Mosesi akatora mafuta okuzodza nawo, akazodza tabernakeri, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri’mo, akaɀitsaura.
Akasasa mamŋe kanomŋe paartari, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nomudziyo wokushambidzira, necigadziko cawo, kuti aɀitsaure.
Akaɗira ʋo mamŋe mafuta okuzodza nawo pamusoro waAroni, akamuzodza kuti amutsaure.
Ipapo Mosesi akaʋuya naʋanakomana ʋaAroni, akaʋafukidza majasi, akaʋasuŋga ɀiʋuno namabanhire, akaʋaisa ŋgoani, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaʋuya nenzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wenzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi;
akaiɓaya; Mosesi ndokutora ropa, ndokuriisa panyaŋga dzeartari kunhiʋi dzose nomunwe wake, akanatsa artari, ndokuɗururira ropa mujiŋga meartari, akaitsaura, kuti aiyananisire.
Akatora mafuta ose akaŋga ari pamsoro poʋura, namafuta akaŋga ari pamsoro peciropa, netȿo mbiri, namafuta adzo, Mosesi akaɀipisa paartari.
Asi nzombe neɗebge rayo, nenyama yayo, namaɀiɀi ayo, wakaɀipisa nomŋoto kunze kwemisasa, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Akaʋuya negondobge recipiriso cinopiswa; Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wegondobge.
Akariʋuraya; Mosesi akasasa ropa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Akagura‐gura gondobge, Mosesi akapisa musoro nenhindi namafuta.
Akasuka ʋura namakumbo nemvura, Mosesi akapisa gondobge rose paartari, cikaʋa cipiriso cinopiswa cainhuwira ɀakanaka; cikaʋa cipiriso cakaitirwa Jehova nomŋoto; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino akaʋuya ʋo nerimŋe gondobge, gondobge rokugadza naro, Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wegondobge.
Akariɓaya, Mosesi akatora rimŋe ropa raro, akariisa pamuceto wezasi wenzeʋe yaAroni yorudyi, napagunwe roruʋoko rwake rworudyi, napagunwe rorutsoka rwake rworudyi.

Akaʋuyisa ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, Mosesi akaisa rimŋe ropa pamiceto yezasi yenzeʋe dzaʋo dzorudyi, napamagunwe amaʋoko aʋo orudyi, napamagunwe etsoka dzaʋo dzorudyi; Mosesi akasasa ropa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Akatora mafuta neɓemhe, namafuta ose akaŋga ari pamsoro poʋura, namafuta akaŋga ari pamsoro peciropa, netȿo mbiri, namafuta adzo, neɓandauko rorudyi;

akatora muɗeŋgu reɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, ɀaiʋa pamberi paJehova, ciŋgwa cimŋe ciɗuku cisina‐kuʋiriswa, neciŋgwa cimŋe ciɗuku ceɀiŋgwa ɀakazodzwa mafuta, neciŋgwa citete cimŋe, akaɀiisa pamsoro pamafuta, napamsoro peɓandauko rorudyi;
akaisa ɀose pamaʋoko aAroni, napamaʋoko aʋanakomana ʋake, akaɀizuŋguzira pamberi paJehova, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɀitora ɀose pamaʋoko ake, akaɀipisa paartari pamsoro pecipiriso cinopiswa; ɀikaʋa ɀokugadza naɀo, ɀikanhuwira ɀakanaka; cikaʋa cipiriso cakaitirwa Jehova nomŋoto.
Ɀino Mosesi akatora cityu akacizuŋguzira pamberi paJehova, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa; ndiwo waiʋa mugoʋe waMosesi pagondobge rokugadza naro; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.

Ipapo Mosesi akatora mamŋe mafuta okuzodza nawo, nerimŋe ropa rakaŋga riri paartari, akarisasa pamsoro paAroni napamsoro peŋguʋo dzake, napamsoro paʋanakomana ʋake, napamsoro peŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye; akatsaura Aroni neŋguʋo dzake, naʋanakomana ʋake, neŋguʋo dzaʋanakomana ʋake pamŋe cete naye.

Mosesi akati kunaAroni naʋanakomana ʋake: Ƃikai nyama pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, muidyire’po neciŋgwa ciri muɗeŋgu rokugadza naro, seɀandakaraira ndiciti: Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋanofanira kuɀidya.
Asi ɀakasara ɀenyama neciŋgwa munofanira kuɀipisa nomŋoto.
Musaɓuɗa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana mazuʋa manomŋe, kuȿikira mazuʋa okugadza kwenyu apera; nokuti iye ucakugadzai mazuʋa manomŋe.
Seɀakaitwa zuʋa ranhasi, Jehova wakaraira kuti ɀiitwe saiɀoɀo, kuti muyananisirwe.
Garai pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana masikati noʋusiku mazuʋa manomŋe, muceŋgete ɀamakarairwa naJehova, kuti murege kufa; nokuti ndiɀo ɀandakarairwa.
Ɀino Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaita ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino nomusi worusere Mosesi wakaɗana Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri,
akati kunaAroni: Tora mukono wemhuru ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, negondobge ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, ɀisinemhoȿa, uʋuye naɀo pamberi paJehova.
Utaure naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Torai nhoŋgo yembudzi ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, nemhuru, negwaiana, ɀose ɀegore rimŋe, ɀisinemhoȿa, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenzombe, negondobge ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, muɀiɓayire pamberi paJehova; necipiriso coʋupfu bgakakanyiwa namafuta, nokuti nhasi Jehova unoɀiratidza kwamuri.
Ɀino iʋo ʋakaʋuya neɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naMosesi pamberi pomukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ʋuŋgano yose ikasweɗera, ʋakamira pamberi paJehova.
Ipapo Mosesi akati: Ndico cinhu cakarairwa naJehova kuti muciite, kuti kubginya kwaJehova kuɀiratidze kwamuri.
Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Sweɗera kuartari uɓayire cipiriso cako ceɀiʋi, necipiriso cako cinopiswa, uɀiyananisire iwe naʋanhu; uʋuye ʋo necipo caʋanhu, kuti uʋayananisire, seɀakarairwa naJehova.
Ipapo Aroni wakasweɗera kuartari, akaɓaya mhuru yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, cakaŋga ciri cake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakaʋuya neropa kwaari, iye akanyika munwe wake muropa, akariisa panyaŋga dzeartari, akaɗurura ropa mujiŋga meartari;
asi mafuta, netȿo, namafuta akaŋga ari pamsoro peciropa cecipiriso ceɀiʋi, wakaɀipisa pamsoro peartari, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Nyama neɗebge akaɀipisa nomŋoto kunze kwemisasa.
Akaɓaya cipiriso cinopiswa; ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakamugamucidza ropa, iye akarisasa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose.
Ipapo ʋakamugamucidza ʋo cipiriso cinopiswa, nhindi imŋe neimŋe, nomusoro, akaɀipisa pamsoro pecipiriso cinopiswa pamsoro peartari.
Akasuka ʋura namakumbo, akaɀipisa pamsoro peartari.
Ipapo akaʋuya necipo caʋanhu, akatora mbudzi yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, caiʋa caʋanhu, akaiɓaya, akaiɓayira ɀiʋi, seyokutaŋga.
Ipapo akaʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, akaciɓayira seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa.
Akaʋuya ʋo necipiriso coʋupfu, akatsamura’po tsama yake, ndokucipisira pamsoro peartari, aciwedzera pacipiriso cinopiswa camaŋgwanani.
Akaɓaya ʋo nzombe negondobge, kuti ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisira ʋanhu; ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakamugamucidza ropa, akarisasa pamsoro peartari kunhiʋi dzose;
namafuta enzombe, neegondobge, neɓemhe, namafuta anofukidza ʋura, netȿo, namafuta anofukidza ciropa;
akaisa mafuta pamsoro pecityu, akapisa mafuta pamsoro peartari;
Aroni akazuŋguzira ɀityu neɓandauko rorudyi, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naMosesi.
Ɀino Aroni wakasimudzira maʋoko ake kuʋanhu, akaʋaropafadza; akaɓuruka, apedza kuɓayira cipiriso ceɀiʋi, necipiriso cinopiswa, neɀiɓayiro ɀokuyananisa naɀo.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakapinda mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋakaɓuɗa ɀe, ʋakaropafadza ʋanhu; kubginya kwaJehova kukaʋonekwa naʋanhu ʋose.
Ipapo mŋoto wakaɓuɗa pamberi paJehova, ukapisa cipiriso cinopiswa namafuta pamsoro peartari; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo.

Ɀino Nadabi naAbihu, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋakatora mumŋe nomumŋe haryana yake yeɀinonhuwira, ʋakaisa’mo mŋoto, ndokuisa ɀinonhuwira pamsoro pawo, ʋakaʋuya pamberi paJehova nomŋoto usina‐kutenderwa waasina‐kuraira.
Ipapo mŋoto wakaɓuɗa pamberi paJehova, ukaʋaʋuraya, ʋakafa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Jehova wakataura cinhu ici, akati: Ndicaɀiratidza kuti ndiri mutȿene munaʋose ʋanosweɗera kwandiri, ndicaɀirumbidza pamberi paʋanhu ʋose. Aroni akanyarara.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɗana Mishaeri naErzafani, ʋanakomana ʋaUzieri, ɓaɓamunini ʋaAroni, akati kwaʋari: Sweɗerai, mubvise hama dzenyu pamberi penɀimbo tȿene, muʋatakurire kunze kwemisasa.
Ipapo ʋakasweɗera, ʋakaʋatakurira kunze kwemisasa ʋanamajasi aʋo, seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa naMosesi.

Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaAroni nokunaEreazari nokunaItamari, ʋanakomana ʋake: Musasunuŋgura vudzi remisoro yenyu, kana kubvarura ŋguʋo dzenyu, kuti murege kufa, naiye arege kutsamŋira ʋuŋgano yose; asi hama dzenyu, ʋeimba yose yaIsraeri, iʋo ŋgaʋaceme kupisa kwakatuŋgidzwa naJehova.
Musaɓuɗa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, kuti murege kufa, nokuti mafuta okuzodza aJehova ari pamsoro penyu. Ʋakaita seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naAroni, akati:
Usanwa waini kana cinhu cinoɓata, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako pamŋe cete newe, kana mucipinda mutente rokusoŋgana, kuti murege kufa; uʋe murairo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Munofanira kutsaura pakati peɀitȿene neɀisati ɀiri ɀitȿene, pakati peɀisina‐kunaka neɀakanaka;
munofanira kudzidzisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri mirairo yose yakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.

Ɀino Mosesi wakataura naAroni naEreazari naItamari, ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋasara, akati: Torai cipiriso coʋupfu cakasara paɀipiriso ɀakapisirwa Jehova nomŋoto, muɀidyire kurutiʋi rweartari ɀisinembiriso, nokuti ɀitȿene kwaɀo;
munofanira kuɀidyira panɀimbo tȿene, nokuti ndiwo mugoʋe wako nomugoʋe waʋanakomana ʋako paɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀinoitwa nomŋoto, nokuti ndiɀo ɀandakarairwa.

Munofanira kudyira panɀimbo tȿene cityu cinozuŋguzirwa neɓandauko rinosimudzwa, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako pamŋe cete newe, nokuti makaɀipiwa, kuti uʋe mugoʋe wako, nomugoʋe waʋanakomana ʋako paɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Ʋanofanira kuʋuya neɓandauko rinosimudzwa; necityu cinozuŋguzirwa, pamŋe cete neɀipiriso ɀamafuta ɀinopiswa nomŋoto, kuti ʋaɀizuŋguzire, ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova; cinofanira kuʋa cako necaʋanakomana ʋako, pamŋe cete newe; unofanira kuʋa murairo usiŋgaperi, seɀakarairwa naJehova.
Ɀino Mosesi wakanatso‐tȿaka mbudzi yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, akawana kuti yapiswa, akatsamŋira Ereazari naItamari, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakaŋga ʋasara, akati:
Makaregerei kudyira cipiriso ceɀiʋi panɀimbo tȿene, ɀaciri citȿene kwaɀo, ʋuye nokuti wakakupai ico, kuti mubvise kutadza kweʋuŋgano, muʋayananisire pamberi paJehova?
Tarirai, ropa rayo harina‐kuʋuyiswa mukati menɀimbo tȿene, seɀandakaraira.

Ipapo Aroni akati kunaMosesi: Tarira, ʋakapisa nhasi cipiriso caʋo ceɀiʋi, necipiriso caʋo cinopiswa pamberi paJehova, ini ndikawirwa neɀinhu iɀi ɀakaɗai; ɀino ɗai ndakadya cipiriso ceɀiʋi nhasi, ɀiŋgaɗai ɀaifadza Jehova here?
Mosesi wakati acinzwa iɀoɀo, akatenda naɀo.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati kwaʋari:
Taurai naʋana ʋaIsraeri, muti: Ndiɀo ɀipenyu ɀamuŋgadya pakati pemhuka dzose dziri panyika:
Ɀose pakati pemhuka ɀinamahwanda akaparadzana, kana ɀinetȿoka dzakaparadzana, ɀinodzeya, muŋgaɀidya.
Asi pakati peɀinodzeya, kana pakati peɀinamahwanda akaparadzana, regai kudya kamera, nokuti inodzeya, asi hainamahwanda akaparadzana; inofanira kuʋa cinhu cisina‐kunaka kwamuri;
nembira, nokuti inodzeya, asi hainamahwanda akaparadzana; inofanira kuʋa cinhu cisina‐kunaka kwamuri.
netsuro, nokuti inodzeya, asi hainamahwanda akaparadzana; inofanira kuʋa cinhu cisina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Neŋguruʋe, nokuti inetsoka dzakaparadzana, asi haidzeyi; inofanira kuʋa cinhu cisina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Regai kudya nyama yaɀo, kana kuɓata ɀitunha ɀaɀo; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Ndiɀo ɀamuŋgadya kuneɀose ɀiri mumvura: Ɀose ɀiri mumvura, mumakuŋgwa nomunzizi, ɀineɀimbi namakwande, ndiɀo ɀamuŋgadya.
Asi ɀose ɀisineɀimbi namakwande ɀiri mumakuŋgwa nomunzizi, paɀose ɀinopfakanyika mumvura, paɀose ɀipenyu ɀiri mumvura, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri.
Ŋgaɀiʋe ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri; musadya nyama yaɀo, neɀitunha ɀaɀo ɀinofanira kuʋa cinhu cinonyaŋgadza kwamuri.
Ɀose ɀiri mumvura ɀisineɀimbi namakwande ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri.
Iɀi pakati peshiri ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri, ŋgaɀirege kudyiwa, ŋgaɀiʋe ɀinonyaŋgadza: Gora guru, negondo guru, nenyamudzura;
noruʋaŋgu, nenjerere, namarudzi adzo;
namarudzi ose amakuŋguʋu;
nemhou, nezizi, neshiri yeguŋgwa, namarudzi ose oruʋaŋgu;
nezizi ɗuku, nekanyurura‐hoʋe, nezizi guru;
nejicidza, nekondo, negora;
nezimudo, namarudzi ose ekondo, nemhupupu, neciremŋaremŋa.
Ɀose ɀinamapapiro ɀicikambaira, ɀicifamba namakumbo manna, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinhu ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri.
Asi iɀi muŋgadya pakati peɀose ɀinamapapiro ɀicikambaira, ɀicifamba namakumbo manna, ɀinamakumbo pamsoro petsoka dzaɀo aɀinokwakuka nawo panyika.
Ndiɀo ɀamuŋgadya pakati paɀo: Marudzi ose emhashu, namarudzi ose ecinjiki, namarudzi eɓambamukota, namarudzi egwatakwata.
Asi ɀose ɀinamapapiro ɀicikambaira, ɀinamakumbo manna, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza kwamuri.
Mucaȿiɓiswa neɀiɀi: Aninani unoɓata ɀitunha ɀaɀo ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Aninani wakatakura citunha caɀo, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Mhuka dzose dzinamahwanda akaparadzana, asi dzisinetsoka dzakaparadzana, dzisiŋgadzeyi, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisakanaka kwamuri; mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀiɓata ucaʋa usina‐kunaka.
Ɀose ɀinofamba netsoka dzakapfaʋa pakati pemhuka dzose dzinofamba namakumbo manna, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisakanaka kwamuri; aninani unoɓata ɀitunha ɀaɀo ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Munhu unotakura ɀitunha ɀaɀo ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisakanaka kwamuri.
Ɀisakanaka kwamuri pakati peɀinokambaira, ɀinokambaira panyika ndiɀo: Ciɗembo, negonzo, namarudzi egwaʋaʋa,
necipfira, nedɀinyu, negoroʋodyo, nedambakura, norwaivi.
Iɀoɀo ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisakanaka kwamuri pakati peɀose ɀinokambaira; aninani unoɀiɓata kana ɀakafa ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.

Cinhu cipi necipi cinowirwa necimŋe caɀo kana cakafa, cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka; kana iri nhumbi yamatanda, kana ŋguʋo, kana ɗebge, kana homboɗo, kana iri nhumbi ipi neipi inoɓatwa ɓasa nayo, inofanira kunyikwa mumvura, iʋe isina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; ipapo icaʋa yakanaka.
Hari imŋe neimŋe yevu yawirwa mukati mayo necimŋe caɀo, ɀose ɀiri mukati mayo ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisina‐kunaka, naiyo munofanira kuiputsa.
Ɀokudya ɀose
Ɀose ɀinowirwa necitunha caɀo, ɀicaʋa ɀisina‐kunaka, kana coto, kana cikuʋa cehari, ɀinofanira kuputswa cose; haɀina‐kunaka, ŋgaɀiʋe ɀisina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Asi tsime kana dziʋa makaceŋgetwa mvura, ɀicaʋa ɀakanaka; asi cinogunɀa citunha caɀo cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka.
Kana citunha cecimŋe caɀo cikawira pamsoro pembeu yakaŋga yokushwa, icaʋa yakanaka.
Asi kana mbeu ikaɗirwa mvura, citunha cecimŋe caɀo cikawira pamsoro payo, inofanira kuʋa isina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Kana mhuka ipi neipi iŋgadyiwa, ikafa, aninani unogunɀa citunha cayo ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Unodya citunha cayo ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; nomunhu unotakura citunha cayo ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Ɀose ɀinokambaira, ɀinokambaira panyika, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza, haɀifaniri kudyiwa.
Ɀose ɀinofamba neɗumbu, ʋuye ɀose ɀinofamba namakumbo manna, ʋuye ɀose ɀinofamba namakumbo mazhinji, ɀose ɀinokambaira, ɀinokambaira panyika, hamufaniri kuɀidya; nokuti ɀinonyaŋgadza.
Musaɀiita ʋanonyaŋgadza necinokambaira cipi necipi, musaɀiita ʋasina‐kunaka naɀo, kuti murege kuȿiɓiswa naɀo.
Nokuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu; naiɀoɀo ɀitsaurei, muʋe ʋatȿene, nokuti ini ndiri mutȿene; musaɀiȿiɓisa necinokambaira cipi necipi cinopfakanyika panyika.
Nokuti ndini Jehova wakakuɓuɗisai panyika yeEgipita, kuti ndiʋe Mŋari wenyu; naiɀoɀo muʋe ʋatȿene, nokuti ini ndiri mutȿene.
Ndiwo murairo wemhuka, noweshiri, noweɀipenyu ɀose ɀinopfakanyika mumvura, neɀisikwa ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika;
kuti mutsaure pakati peɀisakanaka neɀakanaka, napakati peɀipenyu ɀiŋgadyiwa neɀipenyu ɀisiŋgadyiwi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Kana mukadzi akaʋa nemimba, akapona mŋanakomana, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka mazuʋa manomŋe, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka sapaŋguʋa yaari kumŋedzi.
Nomusi worusere
Ɀino mukadzi unofanira kugara mazuʋa makumi matatu namatatu aciɀinatsa paropa rake; ŋgaarege kuɓata cinhu citȿene, kana kupinda paimba tȿene, kuȿikira mazuʋa okuɀinatsa kwake apera.
Asi kana akapona mŋana womusikana, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka viki mbiri, sapamazuʋa okuʋa kwake kumŋedzi; ŋgaagare aciɀinatsa paropa rake mazuʋa anamakumi matanhatu namatanhatu.

Kana mazuʋa okuɀinatsa kwake apera pakupona mŋanakomana kana mŋanasikana, ŋgaaʋuye negwaiana regore rimŋe, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, nakana kenjiʋa, kana vukutiʋa, kuti ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana kumuprista;
agociɓayira pamberi paJehova, kumuyananisira; ɀino wanatswa pakuyerera kweropa rake. Ndiwo murairo kunounopona mŋana womukomana kana womusikana.
Kana akasakwanisa kuʋuya negwaiana, ŋgaatore njiʋa mbiri kana twana tuʋiri twenjiʋa; imŋe ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, neimŋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kuti muprista amuyananisire, anake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Kana munhu anapakaɀimba kana panofunuka, kana ciʋara paganda romuʋiri wake, pakaita

muprista ɀino unofanira kucerekedza hosha iri paganda romuʋiri wake; kana mvere dziri panehosha dzakashanduka dzikaʋa cena, hosha ikaʋonekwa kuti yakapinda kwaɀo mukati meganda romuʋiri wake, ihosha yamaperembudzi; muprista ŋgaamucerekedze, agoreʋa kuti haana‐kunaka.

Kana ciʋara ciri cicena paganda romuʋiri wake, cikaʋonekwa kuti hacina‐kupinda mukati meganda kwaɀo, mvere dzisina‐kushanduka, dzikaʋa cena, muprista unofanira kupfigira munhu uyo unehosha mazuʋa manomŋe;
nomusi wecinomŋe muprista unofanira kumucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti hosha yakaita seyamira, kuti hosha haina‐kunyeŋga paganda, ɀino muprista unofanira kumupfigira mamŋe mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe;

ɀino muprista unofanira kumucerekedza nezuʋa recinomŋe; kana akaʋona kuti hosha yaita nani, kuti hosha haina‐kunyeŋga paganda, ɀino muprista ucareʋa kuti munhu wakanaka hake; pakaŋga pakafunuka hapo; ipapo unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake agoʋa wakanaka.
Asi kana pakafunuka paciramba pacinyeŋga paganda, amboɀiratidza kumuprista kuti anzi wakanaka, ipapo unofanira kuɀiratidza ɀe kumuprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti pakafunuka panyeŋga paganda, ipapo muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka, maperembudzi.
Kana hosha yamaperembudzi iri pamunhu, unofanira kuiswa kumuprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti panapakaɀimba pacena paganda, mvere dzikashanduka, dzikaita cena, pakaɀimba pakaʋa nenyama yakatȿuka,
ndiwo maperembudzi aŋguʋa aʋa’po paganda romuʋiri wake, ɀino muprista ŋgaarege kumupfigira, nokuti haana‐kunaka, ŋgaareʋe kuti haana‐kunaka.
Kana maperembudzi akaɓuɗa pose‐pose paganda, maperembudzi akafukidza ganda rose romunhu unehosha, kubva pamusoro wake kuȿikira kutsoka dzake, pose panoʋonekwa nomuprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kutarira; kana akaʋona kuti maperembudzi akazadza muʋiri wake wose, unofanira kureʋa kuti munhu unehosha wakanaka, ɀose ɀashanduka ɀacena, wakanaka hake.
Asi kana nyama yakatȿuka ikaʋonekwa kwaari, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka;
Kana muprista akaʋona nyama yakatȿuka, unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; nyama yakatȿuka haina‐kunaka, maperembudzi.
Kana nyama yakatȿuka ikashanduka ɀe, ikaita cena, unofanira kuʋuya kumuprista.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kumucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti hosha yashanduka, ikaita cena, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti unehosha yakanaka, wakanaka hake.
Ɀino kana nyama inemota paganda, pakapora,
panɀimbo yemota pakaʋuya pakaɀimba pakacena, kana ciʋara cakaita secitȿuku, ɀinofanira kuratidzwa muprista;

ɀino muprista unofanira kucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti pakadzika pasi peganda, mvere dza’po dzikashanduka dzikaita cena, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; ihosha yamaperembudzi yaɓuɗa napamota.
Asi kana muprista akapacerekedza, akaʋona kuti hakunemvere cena ipapo, pasina‐kudzika pasi peganda, asi paʋa nani; muprista unofanira kumupfigira mazuʋa manomŋe.
Kana pakanyeŋga pose paganda, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; ihosha.
Asi kana ciʋara cikarambira panɀimbo yaco, cikasanyeŋga, iʋaŋga haro remota; muprista unofanira kuti wakanaka.
Kana nyama yomunhu inapakatȿa paganda rake, nyama yakatȿuka ya’po ikaita ciʋara cicena cakaita secitȿuku kana cicena,

muprista unofanira kupacerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti mvere dzapaciʋara dzashanduka, dzikaita cena, akaʋona kuti pakaita sapakadzika paganda, aʋa maperembudzi akaɓuɗa napakatȿa; muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; ihosha yamaperembudzi.
Asi kana muprista akapacerekedza, akaʋona kuti hapanemvere cena paciʋara, ʋuye kuti hapanakudzika pasi peganda, asi paʋa nan hapo, muprista unofanira kumupfigira mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kumucerekedza nezuʋa recinomŋe; kana pakaramba pacinyeŋga paganda, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; ihosha yamaperembudzi.
Kana ciʋara cikaramba ciri panɀimbo yaco, cikasanyeŋga paganda, asi caʋa nani, ndiko kuɀimba kwokutȿa hako, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti wakanaka hake, nokuti ciʋara cokutȿa.
Kana murume kana mukadzi anehosha pamusoro kana pandebvu,

muprista unofanira kucerekedza hosha; kana akaʋona kuti yakapinda mukati, pasi peganda, mvere dziri’po dziri tȿuku dzakaita secena, dziri nhete, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti haana‐kunaka; pafunuka, ndiwo maperembudzi omusoro kana endebvu.
Kana muprista akacerekedza hosha yakafunuka, akaʋona kuti haina‐kupinda mukati pasi peganda, pasinemvere nhema ipapo, muprista unofanira kupfigira munhu unehosha yokufunuka mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nomusi wecinomŋe muprista unofanira kucerekedza hosha; kana akaʋona kuti pakafunuka hapana‐kunyeŋga, pasinemvere tȿuku, dzakaita secena, akaʋona kuti haina‐kupinda mukati pasi peganda,
unofanira kuʋeʋurwa, asi ŋgaarege kuʋeʋura pakafunuka; ɀino muprista unofanira kupfigira munhu unapakafunuka mamŋe mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe;

nomusi wecinomŋe muprista unofanira kucerekedza pakafunuka; kana akaʋona kuti pakafunuka hapana‐kunyeŋga paganda, ʋuye kuti hapana‐kupinda mukati pasi peganda, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti wakanaka hake; ɀino iye ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, anake.
Asi kana pakafunuka pakanyeŋga pose paganda shure kwokunatswa kwake;
muprista unofanira kumucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti pakafunuka panyeŋga paganda, ŋgaarege hake kutȿaka mvere tȿuku dzakaita secena; haana‐kunaka.
Asi kana iye akaʋona kuti pakafunuka paita sapamira, nemvere nhema dzaɓuɗa’po, pakafunuka papora hapo, wanaka; muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti wakanaka hake.
Kana murume kana mukadzi ʋaneɀiʋara paganda renyama yaʋo, ɀiri ɀiʋara ɀicena;
muprista unofanira kuɀicerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti ɀiʋara paganda renyama ɀiri ɀicena, ɀisiŋgabginyi, imhizi dzakaɓuɗa paganda, ʋakanaka haʋo.
Kana vudzi romunhu rakabva pamusoro wake, waʋa nemhazha; asi wakanaka hake.
Kana vudzi rake rakabva pamusoro wake necemberi, unemhazha pahuma, asi wakanaka hake.
Asi kana pamhazha, kana pamhazha yapahuma, panehosha cena yakaita setȿuku, maperembudzi anoɓuɗa pamhazha, kana pamhazha yapahuma.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kumucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti pakaɀimba pehosha pacena pakaita sapatȿuku pamhazha yake, kana pamhazha yake yapahuma, pakafanana namaperembudzi paganda renyama,
munhu uyo unamaperembudzi, haana‐kunaka; muprista unofanira kureʋa kwaɀo kuti haana‐kunaka; hosha yake iri pamusoro wake.

Ɀino munhu unamaperembudzi, unehosha iyo, ŋguʋo dzake dzinofanira kubvarurwa, nevudzi romusoro wake rinofanira kusunuŋgurwa, ʋuye unofanira kufukidza muromo wake wokumsoro, agoɗanidzira, aciti: Ndakaipa, ndakaipa!
Mazuʋa ose aanehosha iyo, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka; haana‐kunaka; ŋgaagare ari oga; pokugara kwake panofanira kuʋa kunze kwemisasa.
Ŋguʋo ʋo inehosha yamaperembudzi, kana iri ŋguʋo yamakushe amakwai, kana iri ŋguʋo yomuceka;
kana iri yakarukwa, kana yakakoshwa; kana yomuceka, kana yamakushe amakwai; kana yeɗebge, kana cinhu cakaitwa neɗebge;
kana hosha yakaita senhema, kana tȿuku paŋguʋo, kana paɗebge, kana paneɀakarukwa, kana paneɀakakoshwa, kana pacinhu cipi necipi ceɗebge; ihosha yamaperembudzi inofanira kuratidzwa muprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kucerekedza hosha iyo, agopfigira cinhu cinehosha mazuʋa manomŋe;

ɀino unofanira kucerekedza hosha nezuʋa recinomŋe; kana hosha yakanyeŋga paŋguʋo, kana iri yakarukwa, kana yakakoshwa, kana yeɗebge, rineɓasa ripi neripi; hosha iyo ndeyamaperembudzi akaipa kwaɀo; haina‐kunaka.

Ɀino unofanira kupisa ŋguʋo, kana iri yakarukwa, kana yakakoshwa, kana yamakushe amakwai, kana yomuceka, kana ipi neipi yeɗebge, inehosha iyo; nokuti maperembudzi akaipa kwaɀo; inofanira kupiswa nomŋoto.
Kana muprista akatarira, akaʋona kuti hosha haina‐kunyeŋga paŋguʋo, kana pakarukwa, kana pakakoshwa, kana pacinhu cipi necipi ceɗebge;
muprista unofanira kuraira kuti ʋasuke cinhu cinehosha, ɀino acipfigire mamŋe mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe;

muprista agocerekedza ɀe kana hosha yasukwa; kana akaʋona kuti hosha haina‐kushanduka ruʋara rwayo, ʋuye kuti hosha haina‐kunyeŋga, hacina‐kunaka; unofanira kucipisa nomŋoto; yapinda mukati kwaɀo, kana necapamsoro kana necapanyasi.
Kana muprista akacerekedza, akaʋona kuti hosha yaʋa nani pakusukwa kwayo, unofanira kubvarura ŋguʋo kupabvisa’po, kana paɗebge, kana pakarukwa, kana pakakoshwa;
asi kana ikaramba iciʋonekwa paŋguʋo, kana pakarukwa, kana pakakoshwa, kana pacinhu cipi necipi ceɗebge,
asi ŋguʋo yaunosuka, kana pakarukwa, kana pakakoshwa, kana ciri cinhu cipi necipi ceɗebge, kana hosha ikabva kwaciri, cinofanira kusukwa rwecipiri, cigoʋa cakanaka.
Ndiwo murairo wehosha yamaperembudzi paŋguʋo yamakushe amakwai, kana yomuceka, kana cinhu cipi necipi ceɗebge, kuti cigonzi cakanaka, kana hacina‐kunaka.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Ndiwo murairo womunhu unamaperembudzi nomusi wokunatswa kwake: Unofanira kuiswa kumuprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kuɓuɗa kunze kwemisasa, muprista agocerekedza
muprista unofanira kuraira kuti unoɗa kunatswa atorerwe shiri mbiri mhenyu dzakanaka, neɗanda romusidari, nomuceka mutȿuku, nehisopi.
Ɀino muprista araire kuti shiri imŋe iʋurawe muhari yevu, pamsoro pemvura inoyerera.
Ɀino unofanira kutora shiri mhenyu, neɗanda romusidari, nomuceka mutȿuku, nehisopi, ndokuɀinyika pamŋe cete neshiri mhenyu muropa reshiri yakaʋurawa pamsoro pemvura inoyerera.
Ɀino unofanira ku

Ɀino munhu unoɗa‐kunatswa unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokuʋeʋura vudzi rake rose, ndokushamba mumvura, agoʋa wakanaka; pashure unofanira kupinda mukati memisasa, asi ŋgaagare kunze kwetente rake mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nomusi wecinomŋe unofanira kuʋeʋura vudzi rake rose romusoro wake, nendebvu dzake, netsiye dzake, aʋeʋure vudzi rake rose; ɀino ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, ndokushamba muʋiri wake, agoʋa wakanaka.
Nomusi worusere unofanira kutora makwaiana maʋiri amakondobge, asinemhoȿa, negwaiana rimŋe reshece rinegore rimŋe, risinemhoȿa, neɀegumi ɀitatu
Ɀino muprista, unomunatsa, unofanira kuisa munhu unoɗa‐kunatswa pamberi paJehova, pamŋe cete neɀinhu iɀi, pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana;
muprista ndokutora rimŋe ramakwaiana amakondobge, ndokuriɓayira, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa, nerogi yamafuta, agoɀizuŋguzira, ciʋe cipiriso cokuzuŋguzira pamberi paJehova;
ɀino unofanira kuʋuraya gwaiana regondobge paʋanoʋurayira cipiriso ceɀiʋi necipiriso cinopiswa panɀimbo tȿene; nokuti cipiriso cemhoȿa ndecomuprista secipiriso ceɀiʋi; citȿene kwaɀo.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kutora rimŋe ropa recipiriso cemhoȿa, muprista agoriisa pamuceto wenzeʋe yorudyi yomunhu unonatswa, napagunwe roruʋoko rwake rworudyi, napagunwe rorutsoka rwake rworudyi;
ɀino muprista unofanira kutora mamŋe mafuta erogi, ndokuaɗira mucanza coruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe;
ɀino muprista ŋgaanyike mutendeka wake worudyi mumafuta ari muruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe, asase mamŋe mafuta nomunwe wake kanomŋe pamberi paJehova;

mamŋe mafuta akasara muruʋoko rwake muprista unofanira kuaisa pamuceto wenzeʋe yorudyi yomunhu unonatswa, napagunwe roruʋoko rwake rworudyi, napagunwe rorutsoka rwake rworudyi, pamsoro peropa recipiriso cemhoȿa;
mamŋe mafuta akasara muruʋoko rwomuprista unofanira kuaisa pamusoro womunhu unonatswa; kuti muprista amuyananisire pamberi paJehova.
Muprista unofanira kupisa cipiriso ceɀiʋi, kuti ayananisire munhu unonatswa, nokuɗa kwokusanaka kwake; pashure unofanira kuʋuraya cipiriso cinopiswa;
muprista unofanira kupisa cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu pamsoro peartari, kuti muprista amuyananisire, anake.

Kana ari murombo, asiŋgagoni kuwana ɀizhinji ɀakaɗai, unofanira kutora gwaiana rimŋe regondobge, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa cokuzuŋguzira, kumuyananisira, necegumi ceefa yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu, pamŋe cete nerogi yamafuta;
nenjiʋa mbiri, notwana tuʋiri twenjiʋa, seɀaanogona kuwana; imŋe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, imŋe ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nomusi worusere unofanira kuʋuya naɀo kumuprista pamsoro pokunatswa kwake, kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kutora gwaiana recipiriso cemhoȿa, nerogi yamafuta, muprista agoɀizuŋguzira, ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova;
ɀino ŋgaaʋuraye gwaiana recipiriso cemhoȿa, agotora rimŋe ropa recipiriso cemhoȿa, ariise pamuceto wenzeʋe yomunhu unonatswa, napagunwe roruʋoko rworudyi, napagunwe rorutsoka rwake rworudyi;
ɀino muprista ŋgaaɗire mamŋe mafuta mucanza coruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe;
muprista agosasa nomutendeka wake worudyi mamŋe mafuta ari muruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe kanomŋe pamberi paJehova.

Ɀino muprista ŋgaaise mamŋe mafuta ari muruʋoko rwake pamuceto wenzeʋe yorudyi yomunhu unonatswa, napagunwe roruʋoko rwake rworudyi, napagunwe rorutsoka rwake rworudyi, panɀimbo yeropa recipiriso cemhoȿa.
Mamŋe mafuta akasara muruʋoko rwomuprista unofanira kuaisa pamusoro womunhu unonatswa, kuti amuyananisire pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino unofanira kuɓayira njiʋa imŋe, kana kana kenjiʋa, seɀaanogona kuwana;
seɀaanogona kuwana, imŋe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, imŋe cipiriso cinopiswa, pamŋe cete necipiriso coʋupfu; kuti muprista ayananisire munhu unonatswa pamberi paJehova.
Ndiwo murairo wehosha yamaperembudzi kumunhu usiŋgagoni kuwana ɀakakwanisira kunatswa kwake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Kana maȿika kunyika yeKanani, iyo yandakupai, kuti iʋe yenyu, kana ndikaisa hosha yamaperembudzi muimba yenyika yenyu;
muridzi weimba unofanira kuʋuya kuzoʋudza muprista, aciti: Ndinoʋona kuti imba yaŋgu ineŋge inehosha.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kuraira kuti ʋaɓuɗise ɀose ɀiri mumba, iye muprista asina‐kupinda kundotarira hosha, kuti ɀose ɀiri mumba ɀirege kuȿiɓiswa; pashure muprista apinde kundotarira imba iyo.
Ɀino ŋgaacerekedze hosha; kana akaʋona kuti hosha iri mumadziro eimba; inamaʋara akapinda, akaita samatema kana matȿuku, akaita saakapinda mukati mamadziro,
muprista unofanira kuɓuɗa paimba, ndokuenda kumukoʋa weimba, ndokupfiga imba mazuʋa manomŋe;
ɀino muprista unofanira kudzoka ɀe nezuʋa recinomŋe, kuti acerekedze; kana akaʋona kuti hosha yakapararira pamadziro eimba;
muprista unofanira kuraira kuti ʋabvise mabge anehosha paari, ʋaakandire panɀimbo isina‐kunaka kunze kweguta;
ipapo ŋgaaraire kuti imba iparwe mukati mayo kunhiʋi dzose, mavu aʋanopara agoɗururirwa kunze kweguta panɀimbo isina‐kunaka;
ɀino mamŋe mabge atorwe, aiswe panɀimbo yamamŋe iwayo, iye atore rimŋe ivu aʋuwe imba naro.
Kana hosha ikadzoka ɀe, ikaɓuɗa muimba iyo, mabge ambobviswa, imba yaparwa nokuʋuyiwa,
muprista unofanira kupinda nokucerekedza; kana akaʋona kuti hosha yapararira mumba, ndiwo maperembudzi akaipa kwaɀo, yaʋa yakaipa.
Ɀino unofanira kuputsa imba, namabge ayo, namatanda ayo, nevu rose reimba, ndokuɀitakurira kunze kweguta kunɀimbo isina‐kunaka.
Ʋuye aninani unopinda mumba paŋguʋa yose yokupfigwa kwayo ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Munhu wakaʋata muimba iyo, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake.
Kana muprista akapinda, akatarira, akaʋona kuti hosha haina‐kupararira mumba, kubva pakuʋuyiwa kweimba, muprista unofanira kureʋa kuti imba yakanaka, nokuti hosha yapora.
Ɀino unofanira kutora shiri mbiri, neɗanda romusidari, nomuceka mutȿuku, nehisopi, kuti anatse imba;
ipapo ŋgaaʋuraye shiri imŋe muhari yevu pamsoro pemvura inoyerera,
ndokutora ɗanda romusidari, nehisopi, nomuceka mutȿuku, neshiri mhenyu, aɀinyike muropa reshiri yakaʋurawa ʋuye mumvura inoyerera, ndokusasa imba kanomŋe;
unofanira kunatsa imba neropa reshiri nemvura inoyerera neshiri mhenyu, neɗanda romusidari, nehisopi nomuceka mutȿuku;
asi shiri mhenyu unofanira kuiregedza, kuti iende hayo kunze kweguta kusaŋgo; saiɀoɀo unofanira kuyananisira imba iyo, kuti iʋe yakanaka.
Ndiwo murairo wamarudzi ose amaperembudzi napakafunuka;
nowamaperembudzi eŋguʋo, neeimba,
nowapakaɀimba, nowapakafunuka, noweciʋara,
kuziʋisa muprista kana cinhu cisina‐kunaka kana cakanaka. Ndiwo murairo wamaperembudzi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Taurai naʋana ʋaIsraeri, muti kwaʋari: Kana murume aneɀimŋe ɀinoyerera, ɀinoɓuɗa pamuʋiri wake, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka nokuɗa kwokuyerera kwake.
Ndiko kusanaka kwokuyerera kwake: Kana muʋiri wake uciɓuɗisa ɀinoyerera, kana muʋiri warega hawo kuɓuɗisa ɀinoyerera, ndiko kusanaka kwokuyerera kwake.
Nhoʋo imŋe neimŋe yaanoʋata pamsoro payo icaʋa isina‐kunaka; necinhu cimŋe necimŋe caanogara cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka.
Aninani unoɓata nhoʋo dzake, ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Munhu unogara pacinhu cakagarwa naiye uneɀinoyerera, ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Munhu unoɓata muʋiri waiye uneɀinoyerera, ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Kana munhu uneɀinoyerera akapfira mumŋe wakanaka mate, iye ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Cigaro cipi necipi cinogarwa nomunhu uneɀinoyerera cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka.
Aninani unoɓata cinhu cakaŋga ciri pasi pake, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; kunyaŋge wakatakura ɀinhu iɀo ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Aninani unoɓatwa nomunhu uneɀinoyerera, kana asina‐kumboshamba maʋoko ake nemvura, ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Hari yevu inoɓatwa nomunhu uneɀinoyerera ŋgaiputswe; kana uri mudziyo wamatanda, mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kusukurudzwa nemvura.
Kanamunhu uneɀinoyerera akanatswa pakuyerera kwake, unofanira kuɀitarira mazuʋa manomŋe okuɀinatsa kwake, ɀino asuke ŋguʋo dzake, ndokushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura inoyerera, anake.
Nomusi worusere unofanira kutora njiʋa mbiri kana twana tuʋiri twenjiʋa, aʋuye pamberi paJehova pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ape muprista idzedzo;
ɀino muprista unofanira kudziɓayira, imŋe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, imŋe cipiriso cinopiswa; muprista amuyananisire pamberi paJehova pamsoro pokuyerera kwake.
Kana mbeu yomurume upi noupi ikaɓuɗa kwaari, unofanira kushambidza muʋiri wake wose nemvura, agoʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Ŋguʋo ipi neipi, neɗebge ripi neripi, ɀaɗonherwa nembeu, ɀinofanira kusukwa nemvura, ɀiʋe ɀisina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Mukadzi ʋo wakaʋata nomurume nembeu, ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋanofanira kuɀishambidza nemvura, ʋaʋe ʋasina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Kana mukadzi aneɀinoyerera, ɀinoyerera pamuʋiri wake riri ropa, ucaʋa pakusanaka kwake mazuʋa manomŋe; aninani unomuɓata ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Cinhu cipi necipi caanoʋata pamsoro paco pakusanaka kwake cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka, ʋuye cinhu cipi necipi caanogara cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka.
Aninani unoɓata nhoʋo dzake unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Aninani unoɓata cinhu cipi necipi caanogara, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Kana akaɓata cinhu ciri panhoʋo, kana cinhu cipi necipi caanogara, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Ʋuye murume upi noupi kana akaʋata naye aciri pakusanaka kwake, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka mazuʋa manomŋe; nhoʋo dzose dzaanoʋata pamsoro padzo dzicaʋa dzisina‐kunaka.

Kana mukadzi anokuyerera kweropa rake mazuʋa mazhinji paŋguʋa isati iri yokuʋa kwake kumŋedzi, ʋuye kana aneɀinoyerera kuɗarika ŋguʋa yokuʋa kwake kumŋedzi, mazuʋa ose okuyerera kwokusanaka kwake unofanira kuita seɀaanoita pamazuʋa okuʋa kwake kumŋedzi. Waʋa usina‐kunaka.
Nhoʋo ipi neipi yaanoʋata pamsoro payo mazuʋa ose okuyerera kwake icaʋa kwaari senhoʋo yokuʋa kwake kumŋedzi; cinhu cipi necipi caanogara cicaʋa cisina‐kunaka, sa
Aninani unoɓata ɀinhu iɀo ucaʋa usina‐kunaka, ŋgaasuke ŋguʋo dzake, aɀishambidze nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Asi kana anatswa pakuyerera kwake, unofanira kuɀitarira mazuʋa manomŋe; kana iwo apera ucaʋa wakanaka.
Nomusi worusere unofanira kutora njiʋa mbiri, kana twana tuʋiri twenjiʋa, aʋuye nadzo kumuprista, kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kuʋuraya imŋe, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, imŋe ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa; muprista amuyananisire pamberi paJehova pamsoro pokuyerera kwokusanaka kwake.
Saiɀoɀo munofanira kuparadzanisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri pakusanaka kwaʋo, kuti ʋarege kufa pakusanaka kwaʋo, kana ʋaciȿiɓisa tabernakeri yaŋgu iri pakati paʋo.
Ndiwo murairo womunhu uneɀinoyerera, nounoɓuɗisa mbeu yake, akazoʋa usina‐kunaka naɀo;
nounorwara nokuʋa kwake kumŋedzi, nouneɀinoyerera, kana ari murume, kana ari mukadzi, nowounoʋata naiye usina‐kunaka.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, shure kwokufa kwaʋanakomana ʋaʋiri ʋaAroni, musi waʋakasweɗera pamberi paJehova, ʋakafa;

Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Taura naAroni mukuru wako, kuti arege kupinda ŋguʋa dzose panɀimbo tȿene mukati mecidzitiro, pamberi pecifunhiro cokuyananisa, ciri pamsoro peareka, kuti arege kufa; nokuti ndicaɀiratidza mugore pamsoro pecifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Ɀino Aroni ŋgaapinde munɀimbo tȿene neɀinhu iɀi: Nzombe ɗuku, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, negondobge, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa.

Unofanira kufuka jasi dɀene romuceka, aʋe ʋo namaburuku omuceka pamuʋiri wake, nokuɀisuŋga ciʋuno cake nebanhire romuceka, nokudzika ʋo ŋgoani yomuceka; ndidzo ŋguʋo tȿene; ŋgaashambidze muʋiri wake nemvura, agoɀifuka.
Ɀino unofanira kutora kuʋuŋgano yaʋana ʋaIsraeri nhoŋgo mbiri dzembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, negondobge rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa.
Aroni unofanira kuʋuya nenzombe yake ɗuku yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, kuti aɀiyananisire, iye naʋeimba yake.
Ɀino ŋgaatore mbudzi mbiri, adziise pamberi paJehova pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana;
Aroni ɀino unofanira kukanda mijenya pamsoro pembudzi mbiri, mumŋe mujenya waJehova, mumŋe waAzazeri.
Ɀino Aroni unofanira kuʋuya nembudzi yakaɓatwa nomujenya pamberi paJehova, ndokuiɓayira ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Asi mbudzi yakaɓatwa nomujenya waAzazeri, inofanira kuiswa iri mhenyu pamberi paJehova kuti ayananisire pamsoro payo, igoregedzwa iende kurenje, iʋe yaAzazeri.
Ɀino Aroni unofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku yake yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, kuti aɀiyananisire nayo, iye naʋeimba yake, aʋuraye nzombe yake yecipiriso ceɀiʋi;
ipapo ŋgaatore haryana yeɀinonhuwira, izere namazimbe omŋoto uri paartari pamberi paJehova, namaʋoko ake azere neɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka ɀakakuyiwa, aʋuye naɀo mukati mecidzitiro;
ɀino ŋgaaise ɀinonhuwira pamsoro pomŋoto pamberi paJehova, kuti gore roʋutsi bgeɀinonhuwira rifukidze cifunhiro cokuyananisa ciri pamsoro pecipupuriro, kuti arege kufa;
ɀino ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa renzombe, arisase nomunwe wake pamsoro pecifunhiro cokuyananisa, kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, nerimŋe ropa arisase nomunwe wake kanomŋe pamberi pecifunhiro cokuyananisa.
Ipapo unofanira kuʋuraya mbudzi yecipiriso ceɀiʋi caʋanhu, ndokuʋuya neropa rayo mukati mecidzitiro, agoita neropa rayo seɀaakaita neropa renzombe, arisase pamsoro pecifunhiro cokuyananisa;

unofanira kuyananisira ʋo nɀimbo tȿene nokuɗa kwokusanaka kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwaʋo neɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀose; saiɀoɀo unofanira kuitira ʋo tente rokusoŋgana rinogara naʋo pakati pokusanaka kwaʋo.
Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu mutente rokusoŋgana, kana iye acipinda’mo kundoyananisira panɀimbo tȿene kuȿikira aɓuɗa, apedza kuɀiyananisira iye naʋeimba yake, neʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri.
Ipapo unofanira kuɓuɗa kuartari iri pamberi paJehova, agondoiyananisira; ŋgaatore rimŋe ropa renzombe, nerimŋe ropa rembudzi, ariise panyaŋga dzeartari panhiʋi dzose.
Rimŋe ropa ŋgaarisase kanomŋe pamsoro payo nomunwe wake, kuti ainatse nokuiita tȿene pakusanaka kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Kana apedza kuyananisira nɀimbo tȿene netente rokusoŋgana, neartari, ŋgaaʋuye nembudzi mhenyu,

Aroni agoisa maʋoko ake ose pamusoro wembudzi mhenyu, ndokureʋurura pamsoro payo ɀakaipa ɀose ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri nokuɗarika kwaʋo kwose, iɀo ɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀose; ŋgaaɀiise pamusoro wembudzi, ndokuiregedza, itumŋe kurenje nomunhu wakaŋga arairwa.
Mbudzi iyo inofanira kutakurira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose kunyika isinaʋanhu; unofanira kuregedza mbudzi iyo murenje.
Ɀino Aroni unofanira kupinda mutente rokusoŋgana, unofanira kubvisa ŋguʋo dzake dzomuceka, idzo dzaakaŋga akafuka pakupinda kwake panɀimbo tȿene, agodzisiya’po.
Unofanira kushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura munɀimbo tȿene, ndokufuka ŋguʋo dzake ndokuɓuɗa, agoɓayira cipiriso cake cinopiswa necipiriso cinopiswa caʋanhu, kuti aɀiyananisire iye naʋanhu.
Ɀino ŋgaapise mafuta ecipiriso ceɀiʋi pamsoro peartari.
Uya munhu unondoregedza mbudzi yaAzazeri unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura, agozopinda mumisasa pashure.

Asi nzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, nembudzi yecipiriso ceɀiʋi ɀakaisirwa ropa raɀo panɀimbo tȿene kuti ɀiyananisire, ɀinofanira kutakurirwa kunze kwemisasa; ɀino ʋanofanira kupisa matebge aɀo nenyama yaɀo namaɀiɀi aɀo nomŋoto.
Nomunhu unoɀipisa unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura, agozopinda mumisasa pashure.

Unofanira kuʋa murairo usiŋgaperi kwamuri: Nomŋedzi wecinomŋe, nezuʋa regumi romŋedzi, munofanira kucema pamŋeya yenyu, nokusaɓata maɓasa ose, kana ari munhu wakaɓerekerwa pakati penyu, kana ari mutorwa ugere pakati penyu;
nokuti munofanira kuyananisirwa nezuʋa iro, kuti munatswe; munofanira kunatswa paɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀose pamberi paJehova.
Rinofanira kuʋa saɓata rokuzorora kwaɀo kwamuri, munofanira kucema pamŋeya yenyu; murairo usiŋgaperi.
Muprista ucazozodzwa nokugadzwa paʋuprista panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake, iye unofanira kuyananisira nokufuka ŋguʋo dzomuceka, idzo ŋguʋo tȿene;
unofanira kuyananisira nɀimbo tȿene, ʋuye unofanira kuyananisira tente rokusoŋgana neartari; ʋuye unofanira kuyananisira ʋaprista naʋanhu ʋose ʋeʋuŋgano.
Uyu unofanira kuʋa murairo usiŋgaperi kwamuri, kuyananisira ʋana ʋaIsraeri kamŋe cete pagore pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo. Akaita seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, uti kwaʋari: Ndiro shoko rakarairwa naJehova:
Munhu upi noupi kunaʋeimba yaIsraeri unoʋuraya nzombe, kana gwaiana, kana mbudzi, mukati memisasa, kana unoɀiʋuraya kunze kwemisasa,
asina‐kuɀiisa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, kuɀiisa pamberi petabernakeri yaJehova kuti ciʋe cipo kunaJehova, munhu uyu unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake;
kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaʋuye neɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo ɀaʋanoɓayira kusaŋgo, ʋaʋuye naɀo kunaJehova kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana kumuprista, kuti ʋaɀiɓayire Jehova, ɀiʋe ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisira.
Ɀino muprista ŋgaasase ropa raɀo paartari yaJehova, pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana; apise ʋo mafuta, kuti ɀinhuwire ɀakanaka pamberi paJehova.
Haʋafaniri kuzoɓayira nhoŋgo ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo, idzo dzaʋaiteʋera pakupata kwaʋo. Uyo unofanira kuʋa murairo usiŋgaperi kwaʋari kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose.
Iwe unofanira kuti kwaʋari: Munhu upi noupi waʋeimba yaIsraeri, kana waʋatorwa ʋagere pakati paʋo, unopisira cipiriso cinopiswa kana cimŋe ciɓayiro,
asiŋgaʋuyi naco kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, kuti aciɓayire Jehova, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Munhu upi noupi waʋeimba yaIsraeri, kana waʋatorwa ʋagere pakati paʋo, unodya ropa ripi neripi, ndicatoŋga munhu uyo unodya ropa, ndimubvise pakati porudzi rwake.
Nokuti ʋupenyu bgenyama bguri muropa; ndakakupai iro paartari, kuti riyananisire mŋeya yenyu; nokuti iropa rinoyananisira nokuɗa kwoʋupenyu
Naiɀoɀo ndakati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu ucadya ropa, kana mutorwa upi noupi ugere pakati penyu, ŋgaarege kudya ropa.
Munhu upi noupi kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, kana kuʋatorwa ʋagere pakati paʋo, wakaɓata pakuvima kwake mhuka ipi neipi kana shiri inodyiwa, unofanira kuɗurura ropa rayo, ndokurifukidza neguruʋa.
Nokuti kana bguri ʋupenyu bgenyama yose, ropa raɀo ndibgo ʋupenyu bgaɀo, naiɀoɀo ndakati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Regai kudya ropa raɀo; aninani unoridya unofanira kubviswa.

Munhu upi noupi unodya cinhu cakaŋgofa coga, kana cakaʋurawa neɀikara, kana ari munhu wakaɓerekerwa pakati penyu, kana ari mutorwa, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokuɀishambidza nemvura, aʋe usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; ipapo ucazoʋa wakanaka.
Asi kana asiŋgadzisuki, kana kushambidza muʋiri wake, ucafanira kuʋa nemhoȿa yake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu.
Regai kuita seɀakaŋga ɀiciitwa panyika yeEgipita mamakaŋga mugere, ʋuye regai kuita seɀinoitwa panyika yeKanani, kwandicazokuisai; musafamba netsika dzaʋo.
Itai ɀandakatoŋga ini, ceŋgetai ɀireʋo ɀaŋgu, kuti mufambe maɀiri; ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai ɀireʋo ɀaŋgu, neɀandakatoŋga; kana munhu akaɀiita ucararama naɀo; ndini Jehova.
Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unosweɗera kuhama yake yomumba, kuti amufukure, ndini Jehova.
Usafukura ɓaɓa ʋako, namai ʋako; ndimai ʋako, usaʋafukura.
Usafukura mukadzi waɓaɓa ʋako; ndiko kufukura ɓaɓa ʋako.
Usafukura hanɀadzi yako, mŋanasikana waɓaɓa ʋako, kana mŋanasikana wamai ʋako, kana ʋakaɓerekerwa mumusha, kana ʋakaɓerekerwa kumŋe.
Usafukura mŋanasikana womŋanakomana wako, kana mŋanasikana womŋanasikana wako; nokuti kufukurwa kwaʋo ndiko kwako.
Usafukura mŋanasikana womukadzi waɓaɓa ʋako, wakaɓerekwa naɓaɓa ʋako, ihanɀadzi yako.
Usafukura ʋatete ʋako; ihama yomumba maɓaɓa ʋako.
Usafukura mainini ʋako, nokuti ihama yomumba mamai ʋako.
Usafukura ɓaɓamunini ʋako, usasweɗera kumukadzi wake, ndimainini ʋako.
Usafukura mukadzi womŋanakomana wako, ndimukadzi womŋanakomana wako; usamufukura.
Usafukura mukadzi womunuŋuna wako, ndiko kufukurwa kwomŋanakomana wako.
Usafukura mukadzi pamŋe cete nomŋanasikana wake; usatora mŋanasikana womŋanakomana wake, kana mŋanasikana womŋanasikana wake, kuti umufukure; ihama dzomumba; ɀakashata.
Usatora mukadzi pamŋe cete nomunuŋuna wake, arwidzane naye, kuti umufukure pamŋe cete nomumŋe aciri mupenyu.
Usasweɗera kumukadzi kuti umufukure, acakaipa nokuʋa kumŋedzi kwake.
Usaʋata nomukadzi wowokwako, kuti uɀiȿiɓise naye.
Usapa mumŋe waʋana ʋako kuti apinde mumŋoto kunaMoreki, ʋuye usamhura zita raMŋari wako; ndini Jehova.
Usaʋata nomurume seɀinoʋatwa nomukadzi; ɀinonyaŋgadza.
Usaʋata necipfuʋo cipi necipi kuti uɀiȿiɓise naco; nomukadzi ŋgaarege kumira pamberi pecipfuwo kuti akwirwe naco; ɀinonyaŋgadza kwaɀo.
Regai kuɀiȿiɓisa kunecinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀi; nokuti ʋahedeni ʋakaȿiɓiswa neɀinhu iɀi ɀose, iʋo ʋandakadziŋga pamberi penyu;
nenyika yakaȿiɓiswa; naiɀoɀo ndinoiroʋa pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀayo, nyika irutse ʋanhu ʋagere’mo.
Naiɀoɀo imi ceŋgetai mitemo yaŋgu neɀandakatoŋga, kuti murege kuita cinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀo ɀinonyaŋgadza; kana ari wakaɓerekerwa munyika yenyu, kana ari mutorwa ugere pakati penyu.
(Nokuti ʋanhu ʋenyika ino, ʋakakutaŋgirai, ʋakaita ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza, nyika ikaȿiɓiswa;)
kuti nyika irege kukurutsai ʋo, kana muciiȿiɓisa, seɀayakarutsa ʋanhu ʋakakutaŋgirai.
Nokuti aninani unoita cinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀi ɀinonyaŋgadza, ʋanhu ʋanoɀiita ʋacabviswa pakati porudzi rwaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai ɀandakakurairai, kuti murege kuita tsika idzo dzose dzinonyaŋgadza, dzaiitwa musati maʋa’po, kuti murege kuɀiȿiɓisa naɀo; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Iʋai ʋatȿene, nokuti ini Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiri mutȿene.
Mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu unofanira kutya mai ʋake naɓaɓa ʋake, ʋuye munofanira kuceŋgeta masaɓata aŋgu; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Musaʋa nehanya neɀifananidzo, kana kuɀiitira ʋamŋari ʋakaʋumbga; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Kana mucipa Jehova ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, munofanira kucipa kuti mugamucirwe.
Cinofanira kudyiwa nomusi wamunocipa nawo, ʋuye nomusi unoteʋera; kana ɀimŋe ɀikasara kuȿikira pazuʋa retatu, ɀinofanira kupiswa nomŋoto.
Kana cikatoŋgodyiwa nezuʋa retatu, ɀinonyaŋgadza; hacigamucirwi.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe unocidya, ucaʋa nemhoȿa, nokuti wamhura cinhu citȿene caJehova; munhu uyu unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Kana mucikohwa gohwa reminda yenyu, rega kukohwa miceto yomunda wako, ʋuye usaʋuŋganidza ɀawira pasi pakukohwa kwako.
Usakohwa ɀose pamunda wako wemizambiriŋga, ʋuye usaʋuŋganidza micero yawira pasi yomunda wako wemizambiriŋga; unofanira kuɀisiyira ʋarombo naʋaeni; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Musaɓa; musanyeŋgera, musareʋerana nhema.
Musapika nhema nezita raŋgu, kuti usamhura zita raMŋari wako; ndini Jehova.
Usamanikidza wokwako, kana kumutorera; haufaniri kugara ʋusiku bgose kuȿikira maŋgwana nomuɓayiro womuranda unokuɓatira.
Usatuka matsi, kana kupiŋganidza ɓofu; asi unofanira kutya Mŋari wako; ndini Jehova.
Musaita ɀisakarurama pakutoŋga; usatsaura murombo, kana kukudza unesimba; asi unofanira kutoŋga wokwako nokururama.
Usafamba‐famba pakati paʋanhu ʋokwako, uciʋacera; usapupurira ropa rowokwako; ndini Jehova.
Usaʋeŋga hama yako mumŋoyo mako; unofanira kuraira wokwako kwaɀo, kuti urege kuʋa neɀiʋi nokuɗa kwake.
Usatsiʋa, kana kugara wakatsamŋira ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋokwako, asi unofanira kuɗa wokwako seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe; ndini Jehova.
Ceŋgetai mitemo yaŋgu. Usaɓerekesa ɀipfuwo ɀako norumŋe rudzi; usadɀara mbeu dzamarudzi maʋiri mumunda mako; usafuka ŋguʋo yakarukwa neɀinhu ɀamarudzi maʋiri.
Aninani unoʋata nomukadzi ari murandakadzi, wakanyeŋgwa nomurume, asina‐kudzikinurwa kwaɀo, kana kusunuŋgurwa, ʋanofanira kurobga; asi haʋafaniri kuʋurawa, nokuti wakaŋga asina‐kusunuŋgurwa.
Ŋgaaʋuye necipiriso cemhoȿa kunaJehova pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, riʋe gondobge recipiriso cemhoȿa.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kumuyananisira negondobge recipiriso cemhoȿa pamberi paJehova pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza; ipapo ucakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadza.
Kana muciȿika munyika, mukasima miti yamarudzi ose anodyiwa, munofanira kuti micero yayo yakaita seisina‐kudziŋgiswa; makore matatu icaʋa kwamuri seisina‐kudziŋgiswa; haifaniri kudyiwa.
Asi negore recinna micero yayo yose icaʋa mitȿene, kuti murumbidze Jehova naɀo.
Negore recishanu muŋgadya micero yayo, kuti irambe icimuɓerekera micero yayo; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Musadya cinhu cineropa raco; musaita mazaŋgo, kana kutenda mashura.
Musaʋeʋura misoro yenyu muciita matendeʋure, ʋuye musashatsa nhiʋi dzendebvu dzenyu.
Musaɀiceka miʋiri yenyu nokuɗa kwaʋakafa, kana kuɀitema nyora; ndini Jehova.
Usaisa mŋanasikana wako, ucimuita cifeʋe; kuti nyika irege kupata, nyika izare neɀakaipa.
Ceŋgetai masaɓata aŋgu, nokutya imba yaŋgu tȿene; ndini Jehova.
Musaʋa nehanya namaȿikiro, kana naʋaʋuki; musaʋatȿaka, kuti muȿiɓiswe naʋo; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Unofanira kusimukira wacena vudzi, nokukudza mutana, ʋuye utye Mŋari wako; ndini Jehova.
Kana mutorwa agere newe panyika yenyu, usamuitira ɀakaipa.
Mutorwa ugere nemi ŋgaaʋe kwamuri somunhu wakaɓerekerwa pakati penyu, unofanira kumuɗa seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe, nokuti nemi ʋo makaŋga muri ʋatorwa munyika yeEgipita; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Musaita ɀisina‐kururama pakutoŋga, kana pakuyera necitanda, kana pakuyera kurema, kana paciyero.
Iʋai neɀiyero ɀakarurama, neɀokuenzanisa naɀo ɀakarurama, neefa yakarurama, nehini yakarurama; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu, wakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita.
Ceŋgetai mitemo yaŋgu yose, neɀandakatoŋga ɀose, kuti muɀiite; ndini Jehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:

Ʋuye ɀe, uti kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Aninani pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kana paʋatorwa ʋagere pakati paʋaIsraeri, unopa Moreki ʋana ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa; ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋanofanira kumutaka namabge.
Neni ʋo ndicanaŋanidza munhu uyo, ndicamubvisa pakati porudzi rwake; nokuti wakapa Moreki ʋamŋe pakati paʋana ʋake, kuti aȿiɓise imba yaŋgu tȿene, nokumhura zita raŋgu dɀene.
Kana ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakaita saʋasiŋgaʋoni munhu uyo, kana acipa Moreki ʋamŋe pakati paʋana ʋake, ʋakasamuʋuraya;
ipapo ini ndicanaŋanidza munhu uyo nemhuri yake, ndimubvise pakati porudzi rwake, iye naʋose ʋanomuteʋera pakupata naMoreki.
Munhu unotsaukira kumaȿikiro naʋaʋuki kuʋateʋera pakupata, ndicanaŋanidza munhu uyo, ndimubvise pakati porudzi rwake.
Naiɀoɀo ɀitsaurei, muʋe ʋatȿene; nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Munofanira kuceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu, nokuiita; ndini Jehova unokutsaurai.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unotuka ɓaɓa ʋake, kana mai ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa; munhu wakatuka ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake, mhoȿa yeropa rake icaʋa pamsoro pake.
Munhu unoita ʋupombge nomukadzi womumŋe, iye unoita ʋupombge nomukadzi wowokwake, ɀirokwaɀo mhombge necifeʋe ʋose ʋacaʋurawa.
Munhu unoʋata nomukadzi waɓaɓa ʋake, wafukura ɓaɓa ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋanofanira kuʋurawa; mhoȿa yeropa raʋo icaʋa pamsoro paʋo.
Kana munhu akaʋata nomukadzi womŋanakomana wake, ɀirokwaɀo ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋanofanira kuʋurawa; ʋakaita ɀinoyaŋgadza kwaɀo; mhoȿa yeropa raʋo icaʋa pamsoro paʋo.
Kana munhu akaʋata nomurume seɀinoitwa nomukadzi, ɀirokwaɀo ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza, ʋose ʋanofanira kuʋurawa; mhoȿa yeropa raʋo icaʋa pamsoro paʋo.
Kana munhu akatora mukadzi pamŋe cete namai ʋake, ɀakaipa; ʋanofanira kupiswa nomŋoto ʋose, iye naiʋo; kuti kurege kuʋa neɀakaipa pakati penyu.
Kana munhu akaʋata necipfuwo, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa; necipfuwo ʋo munofanira kuciʋuraya.
Kana mukadzi akasweɗera kucipfuwo cipi necipi kuti aʋate pamberi paco, munofanira kuʋuraya mukadzi necipfuwo; ɀirokwaɀo ɀinofanira kuʋurawa; mhoȿa yeropa raɀo icaʋa pamsoro paɀo.

Kana munhu akatora hanɀadzi yake, mŋanasikana waɓaɓa ʋake, kana mŋanasikana wamai ʋake, akamufukura, naiye ʋo akamufukura, cinhu cinonyadza; ʋacabviswa pamberi paʋana ʋorudzi rwaʋo; wafukura hanɀadzi yake, iye ucaʋa nemhoȿa yake.
Kana munhu akaʋata nomukadzi paŋguʋa yokuʋa kumŋedzi kwake, akamufukura, wafukura tsime rake, naiye wafukura tsime reropa rake; iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋose ʋanofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwaʋo.
Usafukura mainini ʋako, kana ʋatete ʋako, nokuti wafukura hama yake yomumba; ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yaʋo.
Kana munhu akaʋata nomukadzi waɓaɓamunini ʋake, wafukura ɓaɓamunini ʋake; ʋacaʋa neɀiʋi ɀaʋo; ʋacafa ʋasinaʋana.
Kana munhu akatora mukadzi womunuŋuna wake, cinhu cinetȿina; wafukura munuŋuna wake; ʋacashaiwa ʋana.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai mitemo yaŋgu yose, neɀose ɀandakatoŋga, kuti muɀiite; kuti nyika yandinozokuisai kwairi, kuti mugare’mo, irege kukurutsai.
Musafamba netsika dzorudzi rwaʋanhu ʋandicadziŋga pamberi penyu; nokuti iʋo ʋakaita iɀoɀo ɀose, naiɀoɀo ndakaʋasema.
Asi ndakakuʋudzai imi, ndikati: Mucagara nhaka yenyika yaʋo, ndicakupai iyo iʋe yenyu; inyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu, wakakutsaurai pakati pedzimŋe ndudzi.

Naiɀoɀo tsaurai ɀipfuwo ɀakanaka paneɀakaipa, neshiri dzakaipa panedzakanaka; kuti murege kuʋa ʋanhu ʋanonyaŋgadza neɀipfuwo, kana neshiri, kana necinhu cipi necipi cinokambaira panyika candakatsaura kwamuri ndiciti, haɀina‐kunaka.
Munofanira kuʋa ʋatȿene kwandiri; nokuti ini Jehova ndiri mutȿene, ndakakutsaurai pakati pedzimŋe ndudzi, kuti muʋe ʋaŋgu.
Murume kana mukadzi unoȿikirwa, kana uri muʋuki, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa; ʋanofanira kutakwa namabge; mhoȿa yeropa raʋo icaʋa pamsoro paʋo.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Taura naʋaprista, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, uti kwaʋari:
asi kuhama yake yomumba, kana mai ʋake, kana ɓaɓa ʋake, kana mŋanakomana wake, kana mŋanasikana wake, kana munuŋuna wake;
kana hanɀadzi yake iciri mhandara, hama yomumba, usina‐kumboʋa nomurume; uŋgaɀiȿiɓisa kwaari.
Ŋgaarege kuɀiȿiɓisa, ɀaari mukuru pakati pehama dzake, kuti aɀishatise.
Haʋafaniri kuʋeʋura misoro yaʋo, ʋaciita mhazha, kana kuʋeʋura rutiʋi rumŋe rwendebvu dzaʋo, kana kutema nyora pamiʋiri yaʋo.
Ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋatȿene kunaMŋari waʋo, ʋarege kumhura zita raMŋari waʋo; nokuti ndiʋo ʋanoʋuya neɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀinopiswa, ɀokudya ɀaMŋari waʋo; naiɀoɀo ŋgaʋaʋe ʋatȿene.
Haʋafaniri kutora mukadzi cifeʋe, kana wakacinyiwa; ŋgaʋarege kutora mukadzi wakarambga nomurume wake, nokuti mutȿene kunaMŋari wake.
Naiɀoɀo unofanira iwe kumutsaura, nokuti ndiye unoʋuya neɀokudya ɀaMŋari wako; unofanira kuʋa mutȿene kwauri, nokuti ini Jehova ndinokutsaurai, ndiri mutȿene.
Kana mŋanasikana womuprista upi noupi aciɀishatsa nokupata, unoshatsa ɓaɓa ʋake; unofanira kupiswa nomŋoto.
Munhu, uri muprista mukuru pakati pehama dzake, wakaɗirwa mafuta ecizoro pamusoro wake, wakatsaurwa kuti afuke ŋguʋo
Ŋgaarege kuȿika pacitunha, kana kuɀiȿiɓisa kunaɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake;
ŋgaarege kuɓuɗa panɀimbo tȿene, kana kushatsa nɀimbo tȿene yaMŋari wake, nokuti mafuta okugadza aMŋari wake ari pamsoro pake; ndini Jehova.
Ŋgaaɀitorere mukadzi iciri mhandara.
Ŋgaarege kutora cirikadzi, kana wakarambga nomurume wake, kana wakacinyiwa, kana cifeʋe, asi ŋgaatore mukadzi iciri mhandara pakati porudzi rwake.
Ŋgaarege kushatsa ʋana ʋake pakati porudzi rwake; nokuti ndini Jehova ndinomutsaura.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni, uti: Aninani wakaremara pakati paʋana ʋako pamarudzi aʋo ose, ŋgaarege kusweɗera kuʋuya neɀokudya ɀaMŋari wake.
Nokuti munhu upi noupi wakaremara ŋgaarege kusweɗera — kana riri ɓofu, kana unokamhina, kana wakaremara paciso, kana unomutezo wakareɓesa,
kana munhu unorutsoka rwakavunika, kana ruʋoko rwakavunika,
kana unomusana wakakombama, kana wakawonda kwaɀo, kana unoruʋara paziso rake, kana unemhizi, kana unapakafunuka, kana wakaremara pamberi;
munhu upi noupi worudzi rwomuprista Aroni wakaremara haafaniri kusweɗera kuʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa ɀaJehova; wakaremara, haafaniri kusweɗera kuʋuya neɀokudya ɀaMŋari wake.
Uŋgadya
Asi haafaniri kupinda mukati mecidzitiro, kana kusweɗera kuartari nokuti wakaremara; kuti arege kushatsa nɀimbo dzaŋgu tȿene; nokuti ndini Jehova ndinoʋatsaura.
Mosesi akataura saiɀoɀo naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake, kuti ʋaɀitsaure paɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀavana ʋaIsraeri, ɀaʋanonditsaurira, kuti ʋarege kushatsa zita raŋgu dɀene; ndini Jehova.
