Uti kwaʋari: Aninani kuʋana ʋenyu kumarudzi enyu ose, unosweɗera kuɀinhu ɀitȿene, ɀakatsaurirwa Jehova naʋana ʋaIsraeri, asina‐kunaka, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pamberi paŋgu; ndini Jehova.
Aninani kuʋana ʋaAroni unamaperembudzi kana uneɀinoyerera ŋgaarege kudya ɀinhu ɀitȿene kuȿikira anaka. Aninani unoɓata cinhu cakaȿiɓiswa nowakafa kana munhu unoɓuɗirwa nembeu yake;
kana aninani unoɓata cinhu cipi necipi cinokambaira ciŋgamuȿiɓisa, kana munhu waaŋgaȿiɓiswa naye, unokusanaka kupi nokupi.
Munhu unoɓata cinhu cipi necipi cakaɗai, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; haafaniri kudya ɀinhu ɀitȿene asati ashambidza muʋiri wake nemvura.
Kana zuʋa raʋira ucaʋa wakanaka; pashure uŋgadya hake ɀinhu ɀitȿene, nokuti ndiɀo ɀokudya ɀake.
Ŋgaarege kudya cinhu cakafa coga, kana cakaʋurawa neɀikara, kuti aɀiȿiɓise naɀo; ndini Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanofanira kuceŋgeta ɀandakaraira, kuti ʋarege kuʋa neɀiʋi nokuɗa kwaɀo, ʋafe naɀo, kana ʋaɀishatsa; ndini Jehova, ndinoʋatsaura.
Mŋeni ŋgaarege kudya cinhu citȿene; mutorwa ugere nomuprista, kana muranda, ŋgaʋarege kudya cinhu citȿene.
Asi kana muprista akateŋga munhu nomuteŋgo wemari yake, iye uŋgaɀidya; ʋuye ʋose ʋanoɓerekerwa mumba make, ʋaŋgadya ɀokudya ɀake.
Kana mŋanasikana womuprista akawanikwa nomŋeni, ŋgaarege kudya cipiriso cinotsaurwa ceɀinhu ɀitȿene.
Asi kana mŋanasikana womuprista iri cirikadzi, kana warambga nomurume, asinaʋana, akadzokera kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake, sapaʋusikana bgake, iye uŋgadya ɀokudya ɀaɓaɓa ʋake; asi mŋeni ŋgaarege kuɀidya.
Kana munhu akadya cinhu citȿene asiŋgaziʋi, ucafanira kuwedzera ceshanu caco kwaciri, kuti adzosere kumuprista cinhu citȿene.
Ŋgaʋarege kushatsa ɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀaʋanopa Jehova;
kuti ʋarege kuʋa nemhoȿa yeɀiʋi, kana ʋacidya ɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀitȿene; nokuti ndini Jehova ndinoʋatsaura.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:

Taura naAroni, naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, uti kwaʋari: Aninani weimba yaIsraeri, kana waʋatorwa pakati paʋaIsraeri, unoʋuya necipo cake, kana ciri cemhiko, kana iri nhendo ipi neipi yokuɗa kwaʋo, caʋanoʋuya naco kunaJehova, kuti cipiswe;
nomukono usina‐kuremara kana weŋombe, kana gondobge ramakwai, kana nhoŋgo yembudzi, kuti mugamucirwe.
Asi musaʋuya necinhu cakaremara, nokuti hamuŋgagamucirwi nokuɗa kwaco.

Aninani unoʋuya neciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa kunaJehova, cokupika naco, kana kuti iʋe nhendo yokuɗa kwake, kana ciri ceŋombe kana camakwai, cinofanira kuʋa cakakwana, kuti cigamucirwe; ŋgacirege kuʋa cakaremara.
Kana ciri cinhu cakaita ɓofu, kana cakavunika, kana cakakuʋara, kana cinamaronda, kana cinecikwekwe, kana cinapakafunuka, murege kupa Jehova iɀoɀo, musapisira Jehova iɀoɀo paartari.
Kana iri nzombe ɗuku kana gwaiana ɀinemitezo yakareɓesa kana yakafupika, muŋgaʋuya naɀo kuti muite nhendo yokuɗa kwenyu, asi haɀiŋgagamucirwi pakuripira mhiko.
Musapa Jehova cinhu cinamanhu akakuʋadzwa, kana akapxanyika, kana akaputswa, kana akacekwa; musaɗaro panyika yenyu.
Musagamucira ɀakaɗai paruʋoko rwomutorwa, kuti mupe Mŋari wenyu ɀokudya ɀakaɗai, nokuti ɀakaipa, ɀakaremara, haɀiŋgagamucirwi nokuɗa kwenyu.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Kana nzombe, kana gwai, kana mbudzi ɀiciɓerekwa, ɀinofanira kugara panamai ʋaɀo mazuʋa manomŋe; kubva pazuʋa rorusere napashure paro ɀiŋgagamucirwa kuti ɀiite cipo cinopisirwa Jehova.
Kana iri mhou kana nhunɀi, musaɀiʋuraya pamusi mumŋe naʋana ʋaɀo.
Kana muciɓayira Jehova ciɓayiro cokuʋoŋga, munofanira kuciɓayira saiɀoɀo kuti mugamucirwe.
Cinofanira kudyiwa nomusi iwoyo; musasiya ɀimŋe kuȿikira maŋgwana; ndini Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai mirairo yaŋgu, muiite; ndini Jehova.
Usashatsa zita raŋgu dɀene; ndinoɗa kutsaurwa pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, ndini Jehova, ndinokutsaurai;
ndakakuɓuɗisai panyika yeEgipita, kuti ndiʋe Mŋari wenyu; ndini Jehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Mitambo yakatarwa naJehova, yamunofanira kuparidzira muciti ndidzo ʋuŋgano tȿene, ndiyo mitambo yaŋgu yakatarwa.
Maɓasa ŋgaaɓatwe mazuʋa matanhatu; asi zuʋa recinomŋe isaɓata rokuzorora kwaɀo, iʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata ɓasa ripi neripi; isaɓata raJehova mudzimba dzenyu dzose.
Ndiyo mitambo yaJehova yakatarwa, ndidzo ʋuŋgano tȿene, dzamunofanira kuparidzira neŋguʋa dzakatarwa:
Nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi, maɗekwana, ipaseka raJehova.
Nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi iwoyo ndiwo mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa; munofanira kudya ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nomusi wokutaŋga munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata ɓasa raʋaranda.
Asi munofanira kupa Jehova cipiriso cinopiswa mazuʋa manomŋe; pazuʋa recinomŋe munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata ɓasa raʋaranda.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana muciȿika munyika yandicakupai, mukakohwa ɀiyo ɀayo, munofanira kuʋuya necisote ceɀitȿa ɀokukohwa kwenyu kumuprista,
iye unofanira kuzuŋguzira cisote ico pamberi paJehova, kuti cigamucirwe kwamuri; muprista unofanira kucizuŋguzira nomusi unoteʋera saɓata.
Nomusi wamunozuŋguzira cisote nawo, munofanira kuʋuya negwaiana regondobge risina‐kuremara, rinegore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.
Necipiriso caco coʋupfu cinofanira kuʋa ceɀegumi ɀiʋiri ɀeefa
Musadya ciŋgwa, kana ɀiyo ɀakakaŋgiwa, kana hura itȿa, kuȿikira pamusi iwoyo, kuȿikira maʋuya necipo caMŋari wenyu; ndiwo mutemo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose padzimba dzenyu dzose.
Ɀino munofanira kuʋereŋga kubva pamusi unoteʋera saɓata, kubva pamusi wamakaʋuya nawo necisote cinozuŋguzirwa, masaɓata manomŋe.
Munofanira kuʋereŋga mazuʋa makumi mashanu kuȿikira pamusi unoteʋera saɓata recinomŋe; ipapo munofanira kupa Jehova cipiriso citȿa coʋupfu.
Munofanira kutora kudzimba dzenyu ɀiŋgwa ɀiʋiri ɀinozuŋguzirwa ɀeɀegumi ɀiʋiri ɀeefa; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, ɀiɓikwe nembiriso, kuti ɀiʋe ɀitȿa kunaJehova.

Pamŋe cete neɀiŋgwa munofanira kuʋuya namakwaiana manomŋe asina‐kuremara, egore rimŋe, nenzombe imŋe ɗuku, namakondobge maʋiri; iɀoɀo ɀinofanira kuʋa ciɓayiro cinopisirwa Jehova, pamŋe cete necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu neɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Ʋuye munofanira kuɓayira nhoŋgo imŋe, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, namakwaiana maʋiri, mikono yegore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.
Muprista unofanira kuɀizuŋguzira pamŋe cete neɀiŋgwa ɀitȿa, ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa pamberi paJehova, pamŋe cete namakwaiana maʋiri iwayo; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀitȿene kunaJehova ɀiri ɀomuprista.
Munofanira kuparidza nomus woyo kuti muʋe neʋuŋgano itȿa; hamufaniri kuɓata maɓasa aʋaranda; uʋe mutemo usiŋgaperi padzimba dzenyu dzose kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Kana mucikohwa gohwa reminda yenyu, rega kukohwa kwaɀo miceto yomunda wako, ʋuye usaʋuŋganidza ɀawira pasi pakukohwa kwako; unofanira kuɀisiyira ʋarombo naʋaeni; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Pamŋedzi wecinomŋe, zuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi rinofanira kuʋa kwamuri zuʋa rokuzorora kwaɀo, rinoyeʋudzwa nokuridzwa kwehwamanda, iʋe ʋuŋgano tȿene.
Musaɓata
Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Zuʋa regumi romŋedzi uyu wecinomŋe izuʋa rokuyananisira; munofanira kuita naro ʋuŋgano tȿene, munofanira kucema pamŋeya yenyu, nokuʋigira Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto.
Nomusi uyo musaɓata ɓasa ripi neripi, nokuti izuʋa rokuyananisirwa, kuti muyananisirwe pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Nokuti aninani usiŋgacemi pamŋeya wake nomusi iwoyo, ucabviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Nomunhu upi noupi unoɓata ɓasa ripi neripi nomusi iwoyo, munhu uyo ndicamuparadza pakati porudzi rwake.
Musaita ɓasa ripi neripi; mutemo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose padzimba dzenyu dzose.
Rinofanira kuʋa kwamuri saɓata rokuzorora kwaɀo, munofanira kucema pamŋeya yenyu; munofanira kuceŋgeta saɓata renyu, nezuʋa repfumbamŋe romŋedzi maɗekwana, kubva pamaɗekwana kuȿikira pamaɗekwana ɀe.
Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi uyu wecinomŋe Jehova unofanira kuitirwa mutambo wamatumba mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nomusi wokutaŋga kunofanira kuʋa neʋuŋgano tȿene; musaita ɓasa ripi neripi raʋaranda.

Munofanira kuʋigira Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto mazuʋa manomŋe; nomusi worusere munofanira kuʋa neʋuŋgano tȿene; muʋigire Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto; izuʋa romutambo mukuru, musaɓata ɓasa ripi neripi raʋaranda.

Ndiyo mitambo yakatarwa yaJehova, yamunofanira kuparidzira, muciti iʋuŋgano tȿene, kuti muʋigire Jehova cipiriso cinoitwa nomŋoto, cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu, neciɓayiro, neɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, cimŋe necimŋe nezuʋa raco;
, kunze kwamasaɓata aJehova, nokunze kweɀipo ɀenyu, nokunze kwemhiko dzenyu dzose, nokunze kwenhendo dzenyu dzose dzokuɗa kwenyu, dzamunopa Jehova.

Ɀino pazuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi wecinomŋe, kana makohwa gohwa reminda, munofanira kuita mutambo waJehova mazuʋa manomŋe; zuʋa rokutaŋga rinofanira kuʋa rokuzorora kwaɀo, nezuʋa rorusere rinofanira kuʋa rokuzorora kwaɀo.
Pazuʋa rokutaŋga munofanira kutora micero yemiti yakanaka, namashizha emicindwe, namataʋi emiti mikobvu, nemikonacando yomurukoʋa; munofanira kufara pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu mazuʋa manomŋe.
Munofanira kuitira Jehova mutambo mazuʋa manomŋe gore rimŋe nerimŋe; uʋe mutemo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose; munofanira kuuita nomŋedzi wecinomŋe.
Munofanira kugara mumatumba mazuʋa manomŋe; ʋose ʋakaɓerekerwa munyika pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kugara mumatumba.
Kuti marudzi enyu aziʋe, kuti ndakagarisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri mumatumba, ŋguʋa yandakaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ipapo Mosesi wakarondedzera kuʋana ʋaIsraeri mitambo yakatarwa yaJehova.
Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Raira ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋaʋuye kwauri namafuta akanaka amaorivi, akaiȿo‐naka akaȿiniwa omŋenje, kuti avenekese mŋenje ŋguʋa dzose.

Kunze kwecidzitiro cecipupuriro, mutente rokusoŋgana, Aroni unofanira kuigadzira kubva maɗekwana kuȿikira maŋgwanani ŋguʋa dzose pamberi paJehova; unofanira kuʋa mutemo usiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Unofanira kugadzira mŋenje pacigadziko cakaiȿo‐naka ŋguʋa dzose pamberi paJehova.
Iwe unofanira kutora ʋupfu bgakatsetseka, ugoɓika nabgo ɀiŋgwa ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri; ciŋgwa cimŋe necimŋe cinofanira kuitwa neɀegumi ɀiʋiri
Unofanira kuɀigadzika patafura yakaiȿo‐naka pamberi paJehova uciita nhurikidzwa mbiri, ɀitanhatu panhurikidzwa.
Unofanira kuisa ʋo pamsoro penhurikidzwa imŋe neimŋe ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka, kuti ciʋe cokuraŋgaridza ceciŋgwa, ciʋe cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.
Musi mumŋe nomumŋe wesaɓata unofanira kuɀiroŋgedza pamberi paJehova ŋguʋa dzose; iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi inoitwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀaAroni naʋanakomana ʋake; ʋaɀidye panɀimbo tȿene, nokuti citȿene kwaɀo kwaari pakati peɀipiriso ɀinopisirwa Jehova nomutemo usiŋgaperi.
Ɀino mŋanakomana womukadzi muIsraeri, asi ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaiʋa munhu weEgipita, wakafamba pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri; mŋanakomana womukadzi muIsraeri akarwa nomurume muIsraeri pamisasa.
Mŋanakomana womukadzi muIsraeri akamhura zita
Ʋakamuisa mutoroŋgo, kuti ʋaziʋiswe ɀinorebga naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ƃuɗisa mutuki kunze kwemisasa; ɀino ʋose, ʋakamunzwa, ʋanofanira kuisa maʋoko aʋo pamusoro wake, ʋuŋgano yose igomutaka namabge.
Ɀino iwe utaure naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Aninani unotuka Mŋari wake unofanira kurobga pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake.
Munhu unomhura zita raJehova, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa; ʋuŋgano yose inofanira kumutaka namabge, kana ari mutorwa, kana ari wakaɓerekerwa munyika, kana acimhura zita
Munhu unoroʋa mumŋe, akafa, ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuʋurawa;
nomunhu unoroʋa cipfuwo, cikafa, unofanira kuciripa; ʋupenyu pacigaro coʋupenyu.
Kana munhu akamanikidza wokwake, seɀaakaita iye, unofanira kuitirwa ʋo;
kuvunika kucatsibga nokuvunika, ziso neziso, zino nezino, seɀaakamanikidza mumŋe, naiye unofanira kuitirwa saiɀoɀo.
Munhu unoʋuraya cipfuwo, unofanira kuripa; unoʋuraya munhu, unofanira kuʋurawa.
Munofanira kuʋa nomurairo mumŋe cete kumutorwa kana kunowakaɓerekerwa panyika; nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Mosesi akataura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋo ʋakaɓuɗisa mutuki kunze kwemisasa, ʋakamutaka namabge. Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi pagomo reSinai, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana muciȿika munyika yandicakupai, nyika inofanira kuitira Jehova saɓata.
Unofanira kudɀara munda wako makore matanhatu, nokugurira mizambiriŋga yako makore matanhatu, nokuʋuŋganidza micero yayo.
Asi pagore recinomŋe nyika inofanira kuzorora kwaɀo, riʋe saɓata kunaJehova; usadɀara munda wako, kana kugurira mizambiriŋga yako.
Magoko ako usaakohwa, namazambiriŋga womuzambiriŋga wako usina‐kugurirwa usaatanha; rinofanira kuʋa gore rokuzorora kwaɀo kwenyika.
resaɓata renyika ndiɀo ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀokudya ɀenyu; ɀako neɀomuranda wako, neɀomurandakadzi wako, neɀomuɓatiri wako, neɀomutorwa wako ugere newe;
neɀeɀipfuwo ɀako, neɀemhuka dziri munyika yako; ɀiɓereko ɀaɀo ɀose ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀokudya ɀaɀo.
Unofanira kuʋereŋga ʋo masaɓata manomŋe amakore, manomŋe akaʋereŋgwa kanomŋe; kuti mazuʋa amasaɓata manomŋe amakore aite kwauri makore makumi manna namapfumbamŋe.
Ɀino pazuʋa regumi romŋedzi wecinomŋe unofanira kuraira kuti hwamanda iridzwe kwaɀo; pazuʋa rokuyananisira munofanira kuraira kuti hwamanda iridzwe panyika yenyu yose.
Munofanira kutsaura gore ramakumi mashanu, mugoparidza sunuŋguko panyika yose kunaʋose ʋagere’mo; rinofanira kuʋa
Gore irero ramakumi mashanu rinofanira kuʋa rejuberi kwamuri; musadɀara, ʋuye musakohwa naro magoko, ʋuye musatanha naro
Nokuti
Negore iri rejuberi munofanira kudzokera mumŋe nomumŋe kuneɀake.
Ɀino kana uciteŋgesera wokwako cinhu, kana kuteŋga cinhu kwaari, musamanikidzana.
Uteŋge kunowokwako ucienzanisa namakore kubva pagore rejuberi, naiye unofanira kukuteŋgesera acienzanisa namakore
Unofanira kuwedzera muteŋgo waɀo ucienzanisa nokuwanda kwamakore, ʋuye unofanira kutapudza muteŋgo ucienzanisa noʋushoma bgamakore; nokuti iye unokuteŋgesera ŋguʋa dzokukohwa.
Musamanikidzana, asi utye Mŋari wako; nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuita ɀandakatema, nokuceŋgeta ɀandakatoŋga, nokuɀiita, kuti mugare munyika makaceŋgeteka.
Nyika icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo, imi mucadya mukaguta, mukagara’mo makaceŋgeteka.
Ɀino kana mukati: Ticadyei negore recinomŋe? Tarirai, hatifaniri kudɀara, hatifaniri kuʋuŋganidza ɀiɓereko ɀeɗu;
ipapo ndicaraira kuti mukomborerwe neni pagore recitanhatu, kuti rikuɓerekerei ɀiɓereko ɀicariŋgana makore matatu.
Negore rorusere mucadɀara, mucidya ɀiɓereko ɀisharu; kuȿikira gore repfumbamŋe, kuȿikira ɀiɓereko ɀaro ɀiciȿika, mucadya ɀisharu.
Nyika haifaniri kuteŋgeswa cose nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti nyika ndeyaŋgu; nokuti muri ʋaeni naʋatorwa kwandiri.
Panyika yenyu yose munofanira kutendera kuti nyika idzikinurwe.
Kana hama yako ikaʋa murombo, ikateŋgesa ɀimŋe ɀayo, ipapo hama yako yomumba inofanira kuʋuya kuzodzikinura iɀo ɀakateŋgeswa nehama yako.
Kana munhu akashaiwa unoɀidzikinura, akazoʋa mufumi, akawana ɀinoriŋgana kuɀidzikinura;
unofanira kuʋereŋga makore kubva pakuteŋgeswa kwaɀo, agodzosera kunaiye waakateŋgana naye ɀakasara, iye ndokudzokera kuneɀake;
asi kana asiŋgagoni kuɀidzikinura, iɀo ɀaakateŋgesa ɀinofanira kugara kunaiye wakaɀiteŋga kuȿikira pagore rejuberi; ɀino pagore rejuberi ɀinofanira kusunuŋgurwa, iye agodzokera kuneɀake.
Kana munhu akateŋgesa imba iri muguta rakakombga namaȿiŋgo, uŋgaidzikinura gore rose raakateŋga naro risati rapera; unofanira kuʋa nesimba rokuidzikinura gore rose.
Kana isiŋgadzikinurwi gore rose rikapera, ɀino imba iyo iri muguta rakakombga namaȿiŋgo inofanira kusimbiswa kuti ndeyaiye wakaiteŋga nokusiŋgaperi, nokumarudzi ake; haiŋgasunuŋgurwi negore rejuberi.
Asi dzimba dzemisha isina‐kukombga namaȿiŋgo dzinofanira kuʋereŋgwa pamŋe cete neminda yenyika; dziŋgadzikinurwa, dzicasunuŋgurwa pagore rejuberi.
Asi
Kana munhu akadzikinura kuʋaRevi, imba yakateŋgeswa neguta rake ɀinofanira kusunuŋgurwa pagore rejuberi; nokuti dzimba mumaguta aʋaRevi ndedzaʋo pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Asi minda yokuruwa rwamaguta aʋo haiŋgateŋgeswi, nokuti ndeyaʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Kana hama yako ikaʋa murombo, akapera simba anewe, unofanira kumuɓatsira, agare newe somŋeni kana mutorwa.
Usatora mhindu yemari kwaari kana yeɀiɓereko kwaari, asi unofanira kutya Mŋari wako, kuti hama yako igare newe.
Usamupa mari yako ucireʋa mhindu, kana ɀokudya ɀako ucireʋa kuwedzerwa.
Ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu, wakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita, kuti ndikupei nyika yeKanani, ndiʋe Mŋari wenyu.
Kana hama yako ikaʋa murombo, agere newe, akaɀiteŋgesa kwauri, usamuɓatisa somusuŋgwa;
ŋgaaʋe somuɓatiri unopiwa muɓairo, kana somutorwa kwauri; ŋgaakuɓatire kuȿikira pagore rejuberi.
Ipapo ŋgaaɓuɗe hake kwauri, iye pamŋe cete naʋana ʋake, adzokere kuhama dzake, adzokere kunamadziɓaɓa ake.
Nokuti iʋo ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋandakaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita; ŋgaʋarege kuteŋgeswa, seɀinoitwa ʋasuŋgwa.
Usamuɓata nehasha, asi utye Mŋari wako.
Kana ʋari ʋasuŋgwa ʋako, ʋarume kana ʋakadzi, ʋaucazoʋa naʋo — muŋgaɀiteŋgera ʋasuŋgwa, ʋarume naʋakadzi, kumarudzi anokupoteredzai.
Muŋgateŋga ʋo kuʋana ʋaʋatorwa ʋagere pakati penyu nokuʋana ʋaʋo ʋari pakati penyu, ʋaʋakaɓereka panyika yenyu; iʋo ʋaŋgaʋa ʋenyu.
Muʋaite nhaka yaʋana ʋenyu ʋanokuteʋerai, kuti ʋaʋe ʋaʋo; munofanira kutora ʋasuŋgwa ʋenyu kwaʋari nokusiŋgaperi; asi kana dziri hama dzenyu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri, mumŋe ŋgaarege kuɓata mumŋe nehasha.
Kana mŋeni kana mutorwa akafuma agere newe, asi hama yako igere naye ikaʋa murombo, akaɀiteŋgesa kumŋeni kana mutorwa uyo ugere newe, kana kumŋana worudzi rwomŋeni uyo,
kana ateŋgeswa, uŋgadzikinurwa; munuŋuna kana mukoma wake uŋgamudzikinura;
kana ɓaɓamunini ʋake, kana mŋanakomana waɓaɓamunini ʋake, uŋgamudzikinura, kana aninani ʋehama dzake dzomumba make uŋgamudzikinura; kana iye akazoʋa mufumi, uŋgaɀidzikinura amene.

Ɀino iye nomuteŋgi wake ʋanofanira kuʋereŋga makore kubva pagore raakaɀiteŋgesa naro kwaari kuȿikira pagore rejuberi, muteŋgo waakaɀiteŋgesa nawo unofanira kuenzaniswa namakore; ŋguʋa yokugara kwake naye inofanira kuenzaniswa neŋguʋa yomuɓatiri unopiwa muɓairo wake.
Kana makore mazhinji aciŋge asara, unofanira kudzosera mari yokudzikinurwa kwake yakaenzaniswa namakore iwayo, ɀicibva pamari yaakaŋga ateŋga nayo.
Kana kuciŋge kwasara makore mashoma kuȿikira pagore rejuberi, unofanira kuraŋgana naye; unofanira kudzosera mari yokudzikinurwa kwake ɀicienzaniswa namakore ake.
Unofanira kugara naye gore rimŋe nerimŋe somuɓatiri unopiwa muɓairo wake; ŋgaarege kumuɓata nehasha pamberi pako.
Kana asiŋgadzikinurwi nemitoʋo iyi, unofanira kusunuŋgurwa negore rejuberi, iye naʋana ʋake pamŋe cete naye.
Nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaranda ʋaŋgu; ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋandakaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Musaɀiitira ɀifananidzo, kana kuɀimutsira mufananidzo wakaʋezwa kana shoŋgwe yebge; musaisa ibge rinomufananidzo munyika yenyu kuti mufugamire’po, nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Munofanira kuceŋgeta masaɓata aŋgu, nokukudza imba yaŋgu tȿene; ndini Jehova.
Kana mucifamba nemitemo yaŋgu, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu, muciiita;
ini ndicakunisirai mvura neŋguʋa yayo, nenyika icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo, nemiti yesaŋgo icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Kupura kwenyu kucaȿika pakukohwa mazambiriŋga, nokukohwa mazambiriŋga kucaȿika paŋguʋa yokudɀara; mucadya ɀokudya ɀenyu mukaguta, nokugara munyika yenyu makaceŋgeteka.
Ndicakupai rugare panyika, kuti muʋate pasi musiŋgavunduswi nomunhu; ɀikara ndicaɀipedza panyika, nomunondo hauŋgapfuʋuri nomunyika yenyu;
mucadziŋga ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, ʋakaparadzwa nomunondo pamberi penyu.
Ʋashanu ʋenyu ʋacadziŋga ʋanezana, naʋanezana ʋenyu ʋacadziŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo pamberi penyu.
Ini ndicakuraŋgarirai, ndicakuɓerekesai nokukuwanzai; ndicasimbisa suŋgano yaŋgu nemi.
Mucadya ɀiyo ɀakaceŋgetwa ŋguʋa huru, mucafanira kuɓuɗisa ɀekare kudziʋurira ɀitȿa.
Ndicagadza tabernakeri yaŋgu pakati penyu; mŋeya waŋgu hauŋgakusemiyi.
Ndicafamba pakati penyu, ndicaʋa Mŋari wenyu, nemi mucaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu, wakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita, kuti murege kuʋa ʋatapxa ʋaʋo; ndakavuna matanda ejoko renyu, ndikakufambisai makati tasa.
Asi kana musiŋgaɗi kunditerera, musiŋgaɗi kuita mirairo iyi yose;
kana muciramba mitemo yaŋgu, kana mŋeya yenyu icisema ɀandakatoŋga, kuti murege kuɗa kuita mirairo yaŋgu yose, asi muciputsa suŋgano yaŋgu,
neni ʋo ndicakuitirai iɀi: Ndicaʋuyisa ɀinotyisa pamsoro penyu, hosha yorukosoro nefiviri ɀicaparadza meso nokuwondisa mŋeya yenyu; mucadɀara mbeu yenyu pasina, nokuti ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋacaɀidya.
Ndicakutoŋgai kuti mukundwe pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, ʋanokuʋeŋgai ʋacaʋa ʋaɓati ʋenyu; mucatiza kunyaŋge kusinomunhu unokudziŋgai.
Ɀino kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kana musiŋgaɗi kunditerera, ndicawedzera kukuroʋai kanomŋe pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Ndicaputsa kuɀikudza kwenyu pamsoro pesimba renyu, ɗeŋga renyu ndicariita sesimbi, nenyika yenyu sendarira;
simba renyu ricaperera pasina; nokuti nyika yenyu haiŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀayo, nemiti yenyika haiŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Kana mucindiramba, musiŋgaɗi kunditerera, ndicawedzera kanomŋe maɗambudziko pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Ndicatuma ɀikara ɀesaŋgo pakati penyu, ɀicakupedzerai ʋana ʋenyu, nokuparadza ɀipfuwo ɀenyu, nokukutapudzai; nzira dzenyu dzicashaiwa ʋanhu.
Ɀino kana musiŋgaɗi kudzorwa neni neɀinhu iɀi, asi mucindiramba,
neni ʋo ndicakurambai; neni ʋo, ini ndimene, ndicakuroʋai kanomŋe pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Ndicaʋuyisa munondo pamsoro penyu, ucatsiʋa suŋgano yaŋgu; mucaʋuŋganidzwa mumaguta enyu, ini ndicatuma matenda pakati penyu; mucaiswa mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.
Kana ndicivuna muɗonɀo wenyu weciŋgwa, ʋakadzi ʋanegumi ʋacaɓika ciŋgwa cenyu mucoto cimŋe, ʋacikudzoserai ciŋgwa cenyu cayerwa; mucadya, asi hamuŋgaguti.
Ɀino kana musiŋgaɗi naiɀoɀo ɀose kunditerera, asi mucindiramba,
ipapo neni ʋo ndicakurambai nokutsamŋa kukuru; ndicakuroʋai kanomŋe pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Mucadya nyama yaʋanakomana ʋenyu, nenyama yaʋanasikana ʋenyu mucaidya.
Ndicaparadza nɀimbo dzenyu dzakakwirira, nokuputsa mifananidzo yenyu yezuʋa, nokukanda ɀitunha ɀenyu pamsoro peɀitunha ɀeɀifananidzo ɀenyu; mŋeya waŋgu ucakusemai.
Ndicaita maguta enyu matoŋgo, nenɀimbo dzenyu tȿene ndicadziparadza, handiŋganhuwidzi munhuwi weɀinozipa ɀenyu.
Ndicaparadza nyika yenyu; ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋacagara’mo, ʋacashamiswa naɀo.
Ndicakurashanyai pakati paʋahedeni, nokuvomora munondo shure kwenyu; nyika yenyu icaʋa renje, maguta enyu acaʋa matoŋgo.
Ɀino nyika icafarira masaɓata ayo, paŋguʋa yokuparadzwa kwayo, imi muri munyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu; paŋguʋa iyo nyika icazorora, icifarira masaɓata ayo.
Paŋguʋa yose yokuparadzwa kwayo icazorora nokuzorora kwayakashaiwa pamasaɓata enyu, paŋguʋa yamakagara’mo.

Kana ʋari ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋakasara, ndicatuma kutya pamŋoyo yaʋo ʋari munyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; kana ʋacinzwa shizha ricipepereka, ʋacatiza; ʋacatiza somunhu unotiza munondo, ʋacawa kunyaŋge kusinomunhu unoʋadziŋga.
Ʋacawirana saʋanhu ʋanowa pamberi pomunondo, kusinomunhu unoʋadziŋga; hamuŋgaʋi nesimba rokumira pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.
Mucandofira pakati paʋahedeni, nenyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu icakudyai.
Ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋakasara ʋacawonda muɀiʋi ɀaʋo panyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; ʋacawonda samadziɓaɓa aʋo akawonda muɀiʋi ɀawo.
Ɀino ʋacaɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaʋo neɀiʋi ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo, nokuɗarika kwaʋakaɗarika nako kwandiri, ʋuye ɀaʋakandiramba,
neni ʋo ndakaʋaramba, ndikaʋaisa kunyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; ɀino kana mŋoyo yaʋo isina‐kudziŋgiswa ikaɀininipisa, ʋakatenda kurobga pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo;
ipapo ndicaraŋgarira suŋgano yaŋgu naJakobo; nesuŋgano yaŋgu naIsaka, nesuŋgano yaŋgu naAbrahama, ndicairaŋgarira; nyika ndicairaŋgarira ʋo.
Nyika icafanira kusiyiwa naʋo, kuti ifarire masaɓata ayo icakaparadzwa iʋo ʋasi’po; ʋacarobga pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nokuti ʋakaramba ɀandakaŋga ndatoŋga, mŋeya yaʋo ikasema mitemo yaŋgu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, kana ʋari munyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, handiŋgaʋarashi, handiŋgaʋasemi, ndiʋaparadze cose, nokuputsa suŋgano yaŋgu naʋo; nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari waʋo;
asi nokuɗa kwaʋo ndicaraŋgarira suŋgano
Ndiyo mitemo neɀakatoŋgwa nemirairo yakaitwa naJehova pakati pake naʋana ʋaIsraeri pagomo reSinai nomuromo waMosesi.
Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana munhu akaɀisuŋga nokupika kukuru, ʋanhu ŋgaʋaʋe ʋaJehova seɀaunotara iwe.
Kana ucitara
Kana ari mukadzi, kutara kwako ŋgakuite mashekeri makumi matatu esirveri.
Kana anamakore anobva pamashanu kuȿikira pamakore makumi maʋiri, kutara kwako kwomurume ŋgakuite mashekeri makumi maʋiri, nokwomukadzi mashekeri anegumi.
Kana anomŋedzi mumŋe kuȿikira pamakore mashanu, kutara kwako kwomurume ŋgakuite mashekeri mashanu esirveri, nokutara kwako kwomukadzi ŋgakuite mashekeri matatu esirveri.
Kana anamakore makumi matanhatu naanopfuʋura, kana ari murume, kutara kwako ŋgakuite mashekeri anegumi namashanu, kana ari mukadzi mashekeri anegumi.
Kana ari murombo, asiŋgaȿiki pakutara kwako, unofanira kuiswa pamberi pomuprista, kuti muprista amutarire; muprista unofanira kumutarira iye wakapika seɀaaŋgagona kuripa.
Kana ciri cipfuwo cinopiwa Jehova, cokutenda naco, ɀose ɀaco ɀinopa munhu Jehova ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀitȿene.
Haafaniri kuɀishandura kana kutsinhanhisa cakaipa necakanaka, kana cakanaka necakaipa; kana atsinhanhisa cipfuwo necipfuwo, ico necakatsinhiwa, ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀitȿene.
Kana ciri cipfuwo cisina‐kunaka, cisiŋgapiwi Jehova cokutenda naco, cipfuwo ico cinofanira kuiswa kumuprista;
ɀino muprista unofanira kucitarira muteŋgo, kana cakanaka kana cakaipa; seɀawakacitarira iwe muprista, ndiɀo ɀacicaita.
Ɀino kana aciɗa kucidzikinura, unofanira kuwedzera ceshanu caco pakutara kwako.
Kana munhu aciita imba yake tȿene, kuti iʋe tȿene kunaJehova, muprista unofanira kuitarira, kana yakanaka kana yakaipa; seɀainotarirwa nomuprista, ɀinofanira kuramba ɀakaɗaro.
Kana iye wakaita imba yake tȿene aciɗa kuidzikinura, unofanira kuwedzera ceshanu cemari yawakatara iwe, ipapo icaʋa yake.
Kana munhu akaitira Jehova ndima yomunda wake tȿene, iwe unofanira kuitarira muteŋgo ucienzanisa neɀakadɀarwa’mo; homeri
Kana aciita munda wake mutȿene kubva pagore rejuberi, seɀawakautarira iwe, ɀinofanira kuramba ɀakaɗaro.
Asi kana acitsaura munda wake shure kwegore rejuberi, muprista unofanira kumutarira mari yakaenzana namakore akasara kuȿikira pagore rejuberi; ɀino mari iyo inofanira kutapudzwa pakutara kwako.
Kana munhu wakatsaura munda wake aciɗa kuudzikinura, unofanira kuwedzera ceshanu cemari yawakamutarira, ugoʋa wake.
Kana asiŋgaɗi kudzikinura munda, kana ɀimŋe aciŋge ateŋgesa munda kunomumŋe, hauŋgazodzikinurwi;
asi munda uyu, kana ucisunuŋgurwa negore rejuberi, unofanira kuʋa mutȿene kunaJehova, somunda wakayeriswa; ucaʋa womuprista.
Kana acitsaurira Jehova munda waakateŋga, usati uri munda wenhaka yake,
muprista unofanira kumutarira muteŋgo seɀawakatara iwe kuȿikira pagore rejuberi; ɀino iye unofanira kuripa mari seɀawakatara iwe, ciʋe cinhu citȿene kunaJehova.
Pagore rejuberi munda unofanira kudzokera kumunhu waakaŋga ateŋga kwaari, kunaiye wakaŋga ari muridzi wenyika.
Kutara kwako kwose kunofanira kuenzaniswa neshekeri rapanɀimbo tȿene; shekeri rimŋe rinoita magera maʋiri.
Asi mŋana wemhoŋgora pakati peɀipfuwo, uri waJehova ɀauri mŋana wemhoŋgora, ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unoutsaura; kana iri nzombe, kana gwai, ndeɀaJehova.
Kana ciri cipfuwo cisina‐kunaka, unofanira kucidzikinura seɀawakacitarira iwe, aciwedzera ʋo ceshanu caco; kana cisiŋgadzikinurwi, cinofanira kuteŋgeswa seɀawakacitarira iwe.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, hakunecinhu cakayeriswa, cakayerisirwa Jehova nomunhu paɀose ɀaanaɀo, kana ciri caʋanhu, kana ɀipfuwo, kana munda wenhaka yake, ciŋgateŋgeswa kana kudzikinurwa; cinhu cipi necipi cakayeriswa, cinofanira kuʋa citȿene kwaɀo kunaJehova.
Munhu upi noupi wakayeriswa, kana ari munhu wakayeriswa kuʋanhu, haaŋgadzikinurwi; unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Ɀegumi ɀose ɀenyika, kana ɀiri ɀembeu dzenyika, kana micero yemiti, ndeɀaJehova; ɀitȿene kunaJehova.
Kana munhu aciɗa kudzikinura cimŋe paɀegumi ɀake, unofanira kuwedzera kwaciri ceshanu caco.
Ɀegumi ɀose ɀeŋombe, kana ɀeɀipfuwo ɀiɗuku, ɀose ɀinopfuʋura napazasi petȿimbo, cegumi cinofanira kuʋa citȿene kunaJehova.
Haafaniri kucerekedza kana ciri cakanaka kana cakaipa, kana kucitsinhanhisa necimŋe; kana aciŋge atsinhanhisa necimŋe, ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri, ico necakatsinhiwa, ɀicaʋa ɀitȿene; haɀiŋgadzikinurwi.
Ndiyo mirairo yaʋana ʋaIsraeri yakarairwa Mosesi naJehova pagomo reSinai.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi murenje reSinai, patente rokusoŋgana, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wecipiri negore recipiri rokuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita, akati:
Ʋereŋga ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋarume ʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe.
Iwe naAroni muʋereŋge mapoka aʋo, ʋanamakore anamakumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋanogona kundorwa.
Munofanira kuenda nomurume worudzi rumŋe norumŋe, mukuru weimba yamadziɓaɓa ake.
Ndiwo mazita aʋarume ʋanofanira kukuɓatsirai: WokwaRubeni, Erizuri, mŋanakomana waShedeuri.
WokwaSimeoni, Sherumieri, mŋanakomana waZurishadai.
WokwaJuda, Nashoni, mŋanakomana waAminadabi.
WokwaIsakari, Netaneri, mŋanakomana waZuari.
WokwaZeburuni, Eriabi, mŋanakomana waHeroni.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaJosefa: WokwaEfraimi, Erishama, mŋanakomana waAmihudi; wokwaManase, Gamarieri, mŋanakomana waPedazuri.
WokwaBenjamini, Abidani, mŋanakomana waGideoni.
WokwaDani, Ahiezeri, mŋanakomana waAmishadai.
WokwaAsheri, Pagieri, mŋanakomana waOkrani.
WokwaGadi, Eriasafi, mŋanakomana waDeueri.
WokwaNaftari, Ahira, mŋanakomana waEnani.
Ndiʋo ʋakaɗanwa paʋuŋgano, ari macinda amarudzi amadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzaʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Mosesi naAroni ʋakatora ʋarume aʋa ʋarebga mazita aʋo,

ʋakakoka ʋuŋgano yose nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wecipiri, iʋo ʋakaʋarondedzera marudzi aʋo, mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore anamakumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, mumŋe nomumŋe.
Akaʋaʋereŋga murenje reSinai, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.

Ʋokuʋana ʋaRubeni, mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe waIsraeri naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋarume ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaRubeni ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀitanhatu namazana mashanu.

Ʋokuʋana ʋaSimeoni, namarudzi aʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari namazita aʋo, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaSimeoni, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀipfumbamŋe namazana matatu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaGadi, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaGadi, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀishanu namazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaJuda, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaJuda, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀinna namazana matanhatu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaIsakari, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaIsakari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu namazana manna.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaZeburuni, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaZeburuni, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀinomŋe namazana mashanu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaJosefa, iʋo ʋana ʋaEfraimi, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaEfraimi, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna namazana mashanu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaManase, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaManase, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀiʋiri namazana maʋiri.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaBenjamini, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaBenjamini, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀishanu namazana manna.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaDani, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaDani, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu namazana manomŋe.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaAsheri, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaAsheri, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna necuru cimŋe, namazana mashanu.
Ʋokuʋana ʋaNaftari, naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namazita aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋorudzi rwaNaftari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀitatu namazana manna.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni, namacinda aʋaIsraeri; ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, mumŋe nomumŋe panɀimbo yeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Naiɀoɀo ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋose ʋaigona kundorwa pakati paʋaIsraeri,
ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana matanhatu neɀitatu namazana mashanu namakumi mashanu.
Asi ʋaRevi, norudzi rwamadziɓaɓa aʋo, haʋana‐kuʋereŋgwa pakati paʋo.
Nokuti Jehova wakaŋga ataura naMosesi, akati:
Asi ʋorudzi rwaRevi ʋoga usaʋaʋereŋga, usaʋaʋereŋgera pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri;

asi ʋaRevi uʋagadze, ʋaʋe ʋatariri ʋetabernakeri yecipupuriro, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, neɀose ɀayo; ndiʋo ʋanofanira kutakura tabernakeri, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, nokushumira’po, nokukomba tabernakeri nemisasa yaʋo.
Ɀino kana tabernakeri icipfuʋura mberi, ʋaRevi ndiʋo ʋanofanira kuibvisa; ʋuye kana tabernakeri icidzikwa ɀe, ʋaRevi ndiʋo ʋanofanira kuiʋaka; munhu usina‐kufanira unosweɗera’ko, unofanira kuʋurawa.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kudzika matente aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe pamisasa yoʋokwake, mumŋe nomumŋe pamureza woʋokwake, ʋaciita mapoka aʋo.
Asi ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kudzika matente aʋo ʋacikomba tabernakeri yecipupuriro, kuti ʋuŋgano yaʋana ʋaIsraeri irege kutsamŋirwa; ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kuɓata maɓasa etabernakeri yecipupuriro.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; Mosesi seɀaakarairwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kudzika matente aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe pamureza woʋokwake, neɀiratidzo ɀedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo; ʋanofanira kudzika matente aʋo ʋakatarisana netente rokusoŋgana ʋakarikomba.
Ʋanodzika kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, nokunoɓuɗa zuʋa nako, ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋomureza wemisasa yaJuda, namapoka aʋo; Nashoni mŋanakomana waAminadabi ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaJuda.
Ƃoka rake naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀinna namazana matanhatu.
Ʋanodzika kurutiʋi rwaʋo ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋorudzi rwaIsakari; Netaneri, mŋanakomana waZuari ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaIsakari.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀinna, namazana manna.
Noʋorudzi rwaZeburuni; Eriabi, mŋanakomana waHeroni, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaZeburuni.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀinomŋe, namazana manna.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋemisasa yaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana neɀuru ɀinamakumi masere neɀitanhatu namazana manna, namapoka aʋo. Ndiʋo ʋanofanira kutaŋga kusimuka.
Kurutiʋi rwezasi ndiko kunofanira kuʋa nomureza wemisasa yaRubeni, namapoka aʋo; Erizuri, mŋanakomana waShedeuri, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaRubeni.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀitanhatu namazana mashanu.
Rudzi rwaSimeoni ndiʋo ʋanofanira kudzika kurutiʋi rwake; Sherumieri, mŋanakomana waZurishadai, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaSimeoni.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀipfumbamŋe namazana matatu.
Norudzi rwaGadi: Eriasafi, mŋanakomana waReueri, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaGadi.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀishanu namazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa pamisasa yaRubeni ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinezana rimŋe namakumi mashanu necuru cimŋe namazana manna namakumi mashanu, namapoka aʋo. Ndiʋo ʋanofanira kuȿimuka rwecipiri.

Ɀino tente rokusoŋgana rinofanira kusimuka pamŋe cete nemisasa yaʋaRevi pakati pemisasa yose; nomutoʋo waʋanodzika matente aʋo, ʋanofanira kusimuka saiɀoɀo, mumŋe nomumŋe panɀimbo yake, pamureza wake.
Kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa kunofanira kuiswa mureza wemisasa yaEfraimi, namapoka aʋo; Erishama, mŋanakomana waAmihudi, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaEfraimi.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna namazana mashanu.
Rudzi rwaManase ʋanofanira kudzika kurutiʋi rwaʋo; Gamarieri, mŋanakomana waPedashuri, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaManase.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀiʋiri namazana maʋiri.
Norudzi rwaBenjamini: Abidani, mŋanakomana waGideoni, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaBenjamini.
Ƃoka rake, naʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀishanu namazana manna.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa pamisasa yaEfraimi ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinezana neɀisere nezana rimŋe, namapoka aʋo. Ndiʋo ʋanofanira kuȿimuka rwecitatu.
Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro kunofanira kuiswa mureza wemisasa yaDani, namapoka aʋo; Ahiezeri, mŋanakomana waAmishadai, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaDani.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu neɀiʋiri namazana manomŋe.
Rudzi rwaAsheri ndiʋo ʋanofanira kudzika kurutiʋi rwaʋo; Pagieri, mŋanakomana waOkrani, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaAsheri.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna necimŋe namazana mashanu.
Norudzi rwaNaftari; Ahira, mŋanakomana waEnani, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda waʋana ʋaNaftari.
Ƃoka rake, naʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀitatu namazana manna.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa pamisasa yaDani ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinezana namakumi mashanu neɀinomŋe namazana matanhatu. Ndiʋo ʋanofanira kusimuka pakupedzisira pamireza yaʋo.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo; ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa pamisasa yaʋo, namapoka aʋo, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana matanhatu neɀitatu namazana mashanu namakumi mashanu.
Asi ʋaRevi haʋana‐kuʋereŋgwa pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; Mosesi seɀaakarairwa ɀose naJehova, saiɀoɀo ʋakadzika matente aʋo pamireza yaʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe pamhuri dzaʋo, padzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀino ndiwo marudzi aAroni naMosesi nomusi wakataura Jehova nawo naMosesi pagomo reSinai:
Ndiwo mazita aʋanakomana ʋaAroni: Weɗaŋgwe Nadabi, teʋere Abihu naEreazari naItamari.
Ndiwo mazita aʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista ʋakazodzwa, ʋaakagadza kuti ʋashumire paɓasa roʋuprista.

Asi Nadabi naAbihu ʋakafa pamberi paJehova ŋguʋa yaʋakaʋuyisa mŋoto usakafanira pamberi paJehova murenje reSinai; ʋakaŋga ʋasinaʋana; asi Ereazari naItamari ʋakashumira paɓasa roʋuprista pamberi paAroni, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Sweɗedza rudzi rwaRevi, uʋaise pamberi paAroni muprista, kuti ʋamushumire.
Ʋanofanira kumuɓatira iye, nokuɓatira ʋuŋgano yose pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, kuti ʋapedzise maɓasa etabernakeri.
Ʋanofanira kuceŋgeta nhumbi dzose dzetente rokusoŋgana, nokuɓatira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋapedzise maɓasa etabernakeri.
Unofanira kupa Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaRevi; ʋakaʋapiwa cose pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Asi Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake unofanira kuʋagadza, kuti ʋaɓate ɓasa roʋuprista bgaʋo; usina‐kufanira, unosweɗera’po, unofanira kuʋurawa.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Tarira, ini ndimene ndakatora ʋaRevi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri panɀimbo yamataŋgwe ose anotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri; ʋaRevi ndaʋaŋgu;
nokuti mataŋgwe ose ndaaŋgu; musi wandakaʋuraya mataŋgwe ose panyika yeEgipita, ndakaɀitsaurira mataŋgwe ose paʋaIsraeri, paʋanhu napaɀipfuwo; anofanira kuʋa aŋgu; ndini Jehova.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi murenje reSinai, akati:
Ʋereŋga ʋana ʋaRevi nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, nemhuri dzaʋo; unofanira kuʋereŋga ʋarume ʋose ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura.
Ipapo Mosesi akaʋaʋereŋga neshoko raJehova seɀaakarairwa.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaRevi namazita aʋo: Gershoni, na Kohati, naMerari.
Ndiwo mazita aʋanakomana ʋaGershoni, nemhuri dzaʋo: Ribni naShimei.
Naʋanakomana ʋaKohati nemhuri dzaʋo: Amrami naIzhari naHebroni naUzieri.
Naʋanakomana ʋaMerari nemhuri dzaʋo: Mari naMushi. Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaRevi, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Gershoni ndiye teteguru waʋaRibni naʋaShimei; ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaGershoni.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋari ʋarume ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana mashanu.
Mhuri dzaʋaGershoni dzinofanira kudzika matente adzo shure kwetabernakeri kumaʋirazuʋa.
Eriasafi, mŋanakomana waRaeri, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda weimba yamadziɓaɓa aʋaGershoni.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGershoni ʋanofanira kuceŋgeta ɀinhu iɀi mutente rokusoŋgana: Tabernakeri, netente, necifukidzo cayo, necidzitiro comukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana,
neɀirembedzwa ɀoruʋazhe, necidzitiro comukoʋa woruʋazhe, ruri patabernakeri nokunhiʋi dzose dzeartari, namaɓote ayo, ɀokuɓata maɓasa ayo ose.
Kohati ndiye teteguru waʋaAmrami, naʋaIzhari, naʋaHebroni, naʋaUzieri; ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaKohati.
Ʋarume ʋose ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀisere namazana matanhatu; ndiʋo ʋaiɓata maɓasa paimba tȿene.
Mhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaKohati dzinofanira kudzika matente adzo kurutiʋi rwetabernakeri necenyasi.
Erizafani, mŋanakomana waUzieri, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda weimba yamadziɓaɓa emhuri dzaʋaKohati.
Iʋo ʋanofanira kuceŋgeta areka, netafura, necigadziko cemŋenje, neartari, nenhumbi dzeimba tȿene, dzaʋanoɓata nadzo, necidzitiro, namaɓasa ose ayo.
Ereazari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda wamacinda aʋaRevi, iye unofanira kuʋa mutariri waʋanoɓata maɓasa paimba tȿene.
Merari ndiye teteguru waʋaMari naʋaMushi; ndidzo mhuri dzaMerari.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, iʋo ʋarume ʋose ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀitanhatu namazana maʋiri.
Zurieri, mŋanakomana waAbihairi, ndiye unofanira kuʋa mucinda weimba yamadziɓaɓa emhuri dzaMerari; iʋo ʋanofanira kudzika matente aʋo kurutiʋi rwetabernakeri necokumsoro.
Ƃasa rakatarirwa ʋanakomana ʋaMerari nderokuceŋgeta matanda etabernakeri, nembariro dzayo, nembiru dzayo, neɀigadziko ɀadzo, nenhumbi dzayo dzose, namaɓasa ayo ose;
nembiru dzaparuʋazhe kunhiʋi dzose, neɀigadziko ɀadzo, nembambo dzadzo, namaɓote adzo.

Aʋo ʋanodzika matente aʋo pamberi petabernakeri kumabvazuʋa, pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, kurutiʋi runoɓuɗa zuʋa, ndiʋo Mosesi naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake, ʋanoɓate‐ɓasa renɀimbo tȿene, ndiro ɓasa raʋana ʋaIsraeri; usina‐kufanira unosweɗera’po unofanira kuʋurawa.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaʋaRevi, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova, nemhuri dzaʋo, ʋarume ʋose ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ʋereŋga mataŋgwe ose aʋarume aʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura, ugonyora kuwanda kwamazita aʋo.
Ɀino unofanira kunditorera ʋaRevi (ndini Jehova) panɀimbo yamataŋgwe ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri, neŋombe dzaʋaRevi panɀimbo yaʋana ʋose ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Mosesi akaʋereŋga mataŋgwe ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri, seɀaakarairwa naJehova.
Namataŋgwe ose aʋarume namazita aʋanomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri namazana maʋiri namakumi manomŋe namatatu.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Tora ʋaRevi panɀimbo yamataŋgwe ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri, neŋombe dzaʋaRevi panɀimbo yeŋombe dzaʋo; nokuti ʋaRevi ndaʋaŋgu; ndini Jehova.
Ɀino kuti udzikinure mataŋgwe anamazana maʋiri namakumi manomŋe namatatu aʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋanopfuʋura ʋaRevi pakuwanda kwaʋo,
unofanira kutora mashekeri
Ɀino unofanira kupa Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake mari iyo yokudzikinura aʋo ʋakapfuʋura pakuʋereŋgwa pakati paʋo.
Mosesi akatora mari yokudzikinura kunaiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakapfuʋura ʋakadzikinurwa naʋaRevi;
wakatora mari iyi kumataŋgwe aʋana ʋaIsraeri, mashekeri anecuru cimŋe namazana matatu namakumi matanhatu namashanu, acienzanisa neshekeri rapanɀimbo tȿene.
Mosesi akapa Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake mari iyo yokudzikinura, seshoko raJehova, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Ʋereŋga ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaKohati pakati paʋana ʋaRevi, nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo,
ʋanamakore anamakumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura, kuȿikira pamakore makumi mashanu, ʋose ʋanopinda paɓasa, kuti ʋaite ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana.
Ndiro ɓasa raʋanakomana ʋaKohati mutente rokusoŋgana paɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene:
Kana ʋuŋgano icisimuka, Aroni unofanira kupinda naʋanakomana ʋake, ʋagobvisa cidzitiro, ndokufukidza areka yecipupuriro naco.
Ɀino ʋanofanira kuisa pamsoro paɀo cokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ndokuwarira pamsoro paɀo muceka mutema wose, ɀino ndokupinza matanda okutakura nawo.
Ʋanofanira kuwarira ʋo muceka mutema patafura yeciŋgwa cokuratidza, ndokuisa pamsoro payo midziyo, nembiya, nemikombe, neɀimbiya ɀokuɗira naɀo; neciŋgwa camazuʋa ose cinofanira kuʋa pamsoro payo.
Ɀino ʋanofanira kuwarira pamsoro paɀo muceka mutȿuku, ndokuufukidza necokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ɀino ndokupinza matanda okutakura nawo.
Ʋanofanira kutora ʋo muceka mutema, ʋagofukidza nawo cigadziko cemŋenje yokuvenekesa nayo, nemŋenje yaco, nembato dzaco, nendiro dzaco, nemidziyo yaco yose yamafuta, yaʋanoɓata nayo.
Ɀino ʋanofanira kuciputira pamŋe cete nenhumbi dzaco dzose mucokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ndokuciisa pamatanda.
Ʋanofanira kuwarira ʋo muceka mutema pamsoro peartari yendarama, ndokuifukidza necokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ɀino ndokupinza matanda ayo okutakura nawo.
Ʋanofanira kutora ʋo nhumbi dzose dzokuɓata nadzo paimba tȿene, ʋagodziputira mumuceka mutema, ndokudzifukidza necokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ndokuɀiisa pamatanda.
Ʋanofanira kubvisa ʋo maɗota paartari, ndokuwarira pamsoro payo muceka mushaʋa,

ndokuisa pamsoro payo nhumbi dzayo dzose, dzaʋanoɓata nadzo pairi, dzinoti: Ɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto, neɀikokoʋonho ɀenyama, nefoshoro, nemidziyo, nhumbi dzose dzeartari, ʋagowarira pamsoro payo cokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ndokupinza matanda okutakura nawo.

Ɀino kana Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋapedza kufukidza imba tȿene, nenhumbi dzose dzeimba tȿene, kana ʋuŋgano iciɗa‐kusimuka, ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaKohati ʋanofanira kuʋuya kuitakura, asi ŋgaʋarege kuɓata ɀinhu ɀitȿene, kuti ʋarege kufa. Ɀinhu iɀi ndiɀo ɀinofanira kutakurwa naʋanakomana ʋaKohati patente rokusoŋgana.

Ƃasa raEreazari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista, nderamafuta okuvenekesa nawo, neɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka, necipiriso coʋupfu camazuʋa ose, namafuta okuzodza nawo, nokuceŋgeta tabernakeri yose neɀose ɀiri’mo, neimba tȿene, nenhumbi dzayo.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Rudzi rwemhuri dzaʋaKohati ŋgarurege kuparadzwa pakati paʋaRevi;
asi muʋaitire iɀi kuti ʋararame, ʋarege kufa, kana ʋacisweɗera kuɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene; Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋanofanira kupinda nokuʋagadza, mumŋe nomumŋe, paɓasa rake napamutoro wake.
Asi ŋgaʋarege kupinda kundoʋona imba tȿene, kunyaŋge iri ŋguʋa ɗuku, kuti ʋarege kufa.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ʋereŋga ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaGershoni, dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, nemhuri dzaʋo.
Uʋereŋge ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura kuȿikira makore makumi mashanu; ʋose ʋanopinda kundoɓate‐ɓasa, kuɓata mutente rokusoŋgana.
Ndiro ɓasa remhuri dzaʋaGershoni pakuɓata napakutakura mitoro:
Iʋo ʋanofanira kutakura macira etabernakeri, netente rokusoŋgana; necokufukidzira cayo, necokufukidzira camatebge amatenhe, ciri pamsoro payo, necidzitiro comukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana;

neɀirembedzwa ɀoruʋazhe, necidzitiro comukoʋa wesuʋo roruʋazhe, ruri patabernakeri nokunhiʋi dzose dzeartari, namaɓote aɀo, nenhumbi dzaɀo dzose dzinoɓata maɓasa aɀo, neɀose ɀinoɓatwa naɀo, ndiro ɓasa raʋo.
Maɓasa ose aʋanakomana ʋaGershoni, ɀose ɀaʋanofanira kutakura neɀaʋanofanira kuɓata, ɀinofanira kurairwa naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake; munofanira kuʋagadza paɓasa raʋo rose rokutakura.
Ndiro ɓasa remhuri dzaʋana ʋaGershoni patente rokusoŋgana; paɓasa raʋo rose ʋanofanira kurairwa naItamari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista.
Kana ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaMerari, unofanira kuʋaʋereŋga nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Uʋereŋge ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura kuȿikira makore makumi mashanu, mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋose ʋanopinda paɓasa, kuɓate‐ɓasa retente rokusoŋgana.
Ndiro ɓasa raʋo rokutakura, seɀaʋanofanira kuɓata mutente rokusoŋgana: Matanda etabernakeri, nembariro dzayo, nembiru dzayo, neɀigadziko ɀayo;

nembiru dzoruʋazhe rwakapotedza, neɀigadziko ɀadzo, nembambo dzadzo dzose, namaɓote adzo, nenhumbi dzadzo dzose, neɀose ɀaʋanoɓata naɀo; unofanira kuʋatarira namazita aʋo nhumbi dzaʋanofanira kuceŋgeta pakutakura.
Ndiro ɓasa remhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaMerari, seɀaʋaifanira kuɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋacirairwa naItamari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista.
Ɀino Mosesi naAroni namacinda eʋuŋgano ʋakaʋereŋga ʋanakomana ʋaKohati nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo;
ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura kuȿikira pamakore makumi mashanu, mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋose ʋaifanira kupinda paɓasa, kuɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana;
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari nemhuri dzaʋo ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana manomŋe namakumi mashanu.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋemhuri dzaʋaKohati, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni, seɀakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaʋanakomana ʋaGershoni nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo,
ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura kuȿikira pamakore makumi mashanu, mumŋe nomumŋe waifanira kupinda paɓasa, kuɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari nemhuri dzaʋo nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana matanhatu namakumi matatu.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋemhuri dzaʋana ʋaGershoni, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni, seɀakarairwa naJehova.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋemhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaMerari, nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo,
ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura kuȿikira pamakore makumi mashanu, mumŋe nomumŋe waifanira kupinda paɓasa, kuɓate‐ɓasa mutente rokusoŋgana;
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari nemhuri dzaʋo, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀitatu namazana maʋiri.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋemhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaMerari, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni, seɀakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaʋaRevi, ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni namacinda aIsraeri, nemhuri dzaʋo, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo,
ʋakaŋga ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋanopfuʋura, kuȿikira pamakore makumi mashanu, mumŋe nomumŋe waifanira kupinda kuzoɓate‐ɓasa, neɓasa rokutakura mitoro mutente rokusoŋgana,
ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari vakaȿika ɀuru ɀisere namazana mashanu namakumi masere.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa seɀakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi, mumŋe nomumŋe paɓasa rake, napamutoro wake; ʋakaʋereŋgwa saiɀoɀo naye, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Raira ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋaɓuɗise pakati pemisasa ʋose ʋanamaperembudzi, naʋose ʋanehosha yokuyerera, naʋose ʋakaȿiɓiswa naʋakafa.
Munofanira kuɓuɗisa ʋose, ʋarume naʋakadzi; muʋaɓuɗise kunze kwemisasa, kuti ʋarege kuȿiɓisa misasa yaʋo, yandigere pakati payo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; ʋakaʋaɓuɗisa kunze kwemisasa; seɀakataura Jehova naMosesi, ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Kana murume kana mukadzi aciŋge atadza nokutadza kwaʋanhu, akatadzira Jehova, munhu uyu akaʋa nemhoȿa;
ipapo unofanira kureʋurura ɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakaita, ndokuripira mhoȿa yake yose, aciwedzera ceshanu cayo, ndokupa iye waakatadzira.
Kana munhu uyo asinehama, iŋgaripirwa pamsoro pemhoȿa iyo, muripo wemhoȿa, unoripirwa Jehova, unofanira kuʋa womuprista; kunze kwegondobge rokuyananisira, raanofanira kuyananisirwa naro.
Neɀipiriso ɀinotsaurwa paɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀose ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ɀaʋanoʋuya naɀo kumuprista, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀake.
Ɀinhu ɀakatsaurwa ɀomunhu mumŋe nomumŋe ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀake; cinhu cipi necipi cinopiwa muprista nomunhu cinofanira kuʋa cake.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana mukadzi womurume upi noupi akacinya, akamutadzira,
mumŋe murume akaʋata naye, ɀikaʋanzwa kumurume wake, ɀikasazikanwa, iye akaȿiɓiswa, asi ʋakashaiwa capupu, naiye asina‐kuɓatwa aciita iɀoɀo:
akaɓatwa nomŋeya weshuŋgu, akaʋa neshuŋgu nomukadzi wake, wakaȿiɓiswa; kana ɀimŋe akaɓatwa nomŋeya weshuŋgu, akaʋa neshuŋgu nomukadzi wake, usina‐kuȿiɓiswa;

ipapo murume unofanira kuʋuya nomukadzi wake kumuprista, aciʋuya ʋo necipo cake pamsoro pake, cinoti, cegumi coʋupfu bgebari; haafaniri kuɗira mafuta pamsoro pabgo, kana kuisa ɀinonhuwira pamsoro pabgo; nokuti ico cipiriso coʋupfu ceshuŋgu, cipiriso coʋupfu cokuraŋgaridza, cinoraŋgaridza ɀakaipa.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kumusweɗedza, ndokumuisa pamberi paJehova.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kutora mvura tȿene mumudziyo wevu, muprista agotora ʋo guruʋa riri pasi mutabernakeri, ndokuriisa mumvura.

Ɀino muprista unofanira kuisa mukadzi pamberi paJehova, ndokusunuŋgura vudzi romusoro womukadzi, ndokuisa cipiriso cokuraŋgaridza mumaʋoko ake, ico cipiriso coʋupfu ceshuŋgu; muprista ndokuɓata muruʋoko rwake mvura inoʋaʋisa, inoʋuyisa kutuka.

Ipapo muprista unofanira kumupikisa, aciti kumukadzi: Kana kusinomurume wakaʋata newe, kana usina‐kutsaukira kuneɀakaipa, uri pasi pomurume wako, usunuŋgurwe hako pamvura iyi inoʋaʋisa, inoʋuyisa kutuka;
asi kana wakatsauka, uri pasi pomurume wako, ukaȿiɓiswa, mumŋe murume asati ari murume wako aciŋge aʋata newe,

ɀino muprista unofanira kupikisa mukadzi mhiko inoʋuyisa kutuka, muprista ndokuti kumukadzi: Jehova ŋgaakuite cipiko cemhiko pakati porudzi rwako, kana Jehova aciwondisa hudyu yako nokuɀimbisa ɗumbu rako;
mvura iyi inoʋuyisa kutuka icapinda muʋura bgako, ndokuɀimbisa ɗumbu rako, nokuwondisa hudyu yako; ɀino mukadzi unofanira kuti: Ameni, ameni.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kunyora kutuka uku parugwaro, ndokukusuka nemvura inoʋaʋisa.
Ɀino unofanira kunwisa mukadzi mvura inoʋaʋisa, inoʋuyisa kutuka; mvura inoʋuyisa kutuka inofanira kupinda mukati make, imuʋaʋise.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kutora cipiriso coʋupfu ceshuŋgu paruʋoko rwomukadzi, ndokuzuŋguzira cipiriso coʋupfu pamberi paJehova, ndokuʋuya naco kuartari;
muprista ndokutora tsama imŋe yecipiriso coʋupfu, kuti ciʋe cokuraŋgaridza caco, ndokubgupisa paartari, ndokunwisa mukadzi mvura iyo pashure.

Ɀino kana amunwisa mvura iyo, kana aciŋge aȿiɓiswa, atadzira murume wake, mvura iyo inoʋuyisa kutuka icapinda maari, ikamuʋaʋisa, ɗumbu rake ricaɀimba, nehudyu yake icawonda; mukadzi uyu ucaʋa cituko pakati porudzi rwake.
Asi kana mukadzi uyo asina‐kuȿiɓiswa, akanaka hake, ucasunuŋgurwa hake, akaʋa nemimba ɀe.
Ndiwo murairo weshuŋgu, kana mukadzi ari pasi pomurume wake, akacinya, akaȿiɓiswa;
kana ɀimŋe murume aciŋge aɓatwa nomŋeya weshuŋgu, aneshuŋgu nomukadzi wake; ipapo unofanira kuisa mukadzi pamberi paJehova, muprista agomuitira nomurairo uyu wose.
Murume haaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa, asi mukadzi unofanira kuʋa nemhoȿa yake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana murume, kunyaŋge mukadzi, akaɀisuŋga nokupika kukuru, kupika kwomuNaziri, kuti aɀitsaurire Jehova;
unofanira kuramba waini neɀinoɓata; haafaniri kunwa vinega yewaini, kana vinega yeɀinoɓata, ʋuye haafaniri kunwa muto wemizambiriŋga, kana kudya mazambiriŋga matȿa kana akawomeswa.
Mazuʋa ose okuɀitsaura kwake haafaniri kudya cinhu cinobva pamuti womuzambiriŋga kubva paȿurwe kuȿika pamateko.
Mazuʋa ose okupika kwake kuɀitsaura haafaniri kuʋeʋurwa musoro wake neciȿo; unofanira kuʋa mutȿene, nevudzi romusoro wake unofanira kurirega rireɓe, kuȿikira mazuʋa apera aakaɀitsaurira Jehova nawo.
Ŋgaarege kusweɗera kucitunha mazuʋa ose aanoɀitsaurira Jehova nawo.
Haafaniri kuɀiȿiɓisa nokuɗa kwaɓaɓa ʋake, kana nokuɗa kwamai ʋake, kana nokuɗa kwomunuŋuna wake, kana nokuɗa kwehanɀadzi yake, kana ʋafa; nokuti wakaɀitsaurira Mŋari.
Mutȿene kunaJehova mazuʋa ose okuɀitsaura kwake.
Kana munhu akafa kamŋe‐kamŋe pedyo naye, akaȿiɓisa musoro wake wakatsaurwa; ipapo unofanira kuʋeʋura musoro wake nomusi wokunatswa kwake, nomusi wecinomŋe unofanira kuuʋeʋura.
Nomusi worusere unofanira kuʋuya kumuprista nenjiʋa mbiri, kana twana tuʋiri twenjiʋa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana;
muprista agoɓayira imŋe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, neimŋe ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, amuyananisire ɀaakatadza nokuɗa kwowakafa, anatse musoro wake nomusi uyo.

Unofanira kutsaurira Jehova mazuʋa okuɀitsaura kwake, ndokuʋuya negwaiana regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa; asi mazuʋa okutaŋga haaŋgaʋereŋgwi, nokuti kuɀitsaura kwake kwakaŋga kwaȿiɓiswa.
Ndiwo murairo womuNaziri, kana mazuʋa okuɀitsaura kwake aciŋge apera: Unofanira kuiswa kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana;

kuti ape Jehova cipo cake, cinoti gwaiana rimŋe, regondobge regore rimŋe, risina‐kuremara, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, negwaiana rimŋe reshece regore rimŋe, risina‐kuremara, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, negondobge rimŋe risina‐kuremara, ciʋe cipiriso cokuyananisa,

neɗeŋgu reɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, neɀiŋgwa ɀiɗuku ɀoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, neɀiŋgwa ɀitete ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, ɀakazodzwa namafuta, necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa.
Muprista unofanira kuʋuya naɀo pamberi paJehova, ndokugadzira cipiriso cake ceɀiʋi necipiriso cake cinopiswa;
ndokuʋuya negondobge ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa kunaJehova, pamŋe cete neɗeŋgu reɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa; muprista unofanira kuʋuya ʋo necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Ɀino muNaziri unofanira kuʋeʋura musoro wake wakatsaurwa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ndokutora vudzi romusoro wake wakatsaurwa, ndokuriisa pamŋoto uri pasi peciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.

Ɀino muprista unofanira kutora ɓandauko regondobge rakaɓikwa, neciŋgwa cimŋe ciɗuku cisina‐kuʋiriswa paɗeŋgu, necimŋe ciŋgwa citete cisina‐kuʋiriswa, ndokuɀiisa pamaʋoko omuNaziri, kana iye apedza kuʋeʋura musoro wake wakatsaurwa.

Ɀino muprista unofanira kuɀizuŋguzira pamberi paJehova, ciʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa; cinhu citȿene comuprista, pamŋe cete necityu cinozuŋguzirwa, neɓandauko rinosimudzwa; ɀino muNaziri uŋganwa waini.
Ndiwo murairo womuNaziri pakupika kwake, necipo cake cokuɀitsaurira Jehova, ɀimŋe ɀaaŋgagona kuʋuya naɀo ɀisiŋgaʋereŋgwi; seɀaakapika, ndiɀo ɀaanofanira kuita nomurairo wokuɀitsaura nawo.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni naʋanakomana ʋake, uti: Munofanira kuropafadza ʋana ʋaIsraeri nomutoʋo uyu: Muti kwaʋari:
Jehova akuropafadze, akuceŋgete;
Jehova akuvenekere neciso cake, akunzwire nyasha;
Jehova akusimudzire ciso cake, akupe rugare.
Nokuɗaro ʋacaisa zita raŋgu paʋana ʋaIsraeri; neni ndicaʋaropafadza.
Ɀino nomusi Mosesi waakapedza kumisa tabernakeri nawo, nokuizodza, nokuitsaura nenhumbi dzayo dzose, neartari, nemidziyo yayo yose, wakati aɀizodza nokuɀitsaura,
macinda aʋaIsraeri, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakaʋuya

ʋakaʋuya neɀipo ɀaʋo pamberi paJehova, ɀinoti: Ŋgoro nhanhatu dzaiʋa namatente, nenzombe dzinegumi nembiri, macinda maʋiri aneŋgoro imŋe, mumŋe nomumŋe anenzombe imŋe; ʋakaʋuya naɀo pamberi petabernakeri.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Gamucira iɀoɀo kwaʋari, kuti maɓasa etente rokusoŋgana aitwe naɀo; unofanira kuɀipa ʋaRevi, mumŋe nomumŋe ɀinoriŋgana maɓasa ake.
Ipapo Mosesi akagamucira ŋgoro idzo nenzombe, akaɀipa ʋaRevi.
Akapa ʋanakomana ʋaGershoni ŋgoro mbiri nenzombe inna, ɀakariŋgana maɓasa aʋo.
Akapa ʋo ʋanakomana ʋaMerari ŋgoro inna nenzombe sere, ɀakariŋgana maɓasa aʋo, ʋacirairwa naItamari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista.
Asi haana‐kupa ʋanakomana ʋaKohati cinhu nokuti ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaneɓasa reimba tȿene; ʋaifanira kuɀitakura pamafudzi aʋo.
Macinda akaʋuya neɀipo ɀokutsaurira artari nomusi wayakazodzwa nawo, macinda akaʋuya neɀipo ɀawo pamberi peartari.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ŋgaʋaʋuye neɀipo ɀaʋo ɀokutsaurira artari, mucinda mumŋe nomumŋe nomusi wake.
Ɀino wakaʋuya necipo cake nezuʋa rokutaŋga wakaŋga ari Nashoni, mŋanakomana waAminadabi, worudzi rwaJuda.
Cipo cake yakaŋga iri ndiro imŋe huru yesirveri, kurema kwayo kwakaŋga kuri mashekeri anezana namakumi matatu, nomudziyo mumŋe wesirveri wamashekeri
nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe negondobge rimŋe, negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa,
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;

nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caNashoni, mŋanakomana waAminadabi.
Nezuʋa repiri Netaneri, mŋanakomana waZuari, mucinda waIsakari, wakaʋuyisa
Wakaʋuya necipo cake,
nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe, negondobge rimŋe, negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;
nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caNetaneri, mŋanakomana waZuari.
Nezuʋa retatu Eriabi, mŋanakomana waHeroni, mucinda waʋana ʋaZeburuni, wakaʋuya.

Cipo cake caiti: Ndiro imŋe huru yesirveri, kurema kwayo kwakaŋga kuri mashekeri anezana namakumi matatu, nomudziyo mumŋe wesirveri wamashekeri anamakumi manomŋe, ɀicienzaniswa neshekeri reimba tȿene; ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri ɀakaŋga ɀizere noʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu;
nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe, negondobge rimŋe, negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;
nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caEriabi, mŋanakomana waHeroni.
Nezuʋa recinna Erizuri, mŋanakomana waShedeuri, mucinda waʋana ʋaRubeni, wakaʋuya.

Nezuʋa reshanu Sherumieri, mŋanakomana waZurishadai, mucinda waʋana ʋaSimeoni, wakaʋuya.

nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caSherumieri, mŋanakomana waZurishadai.
Nezuʋa retanhatu Eriasafi, mŋanakomana waDeueri, mucinda waʋana ʋaGadi, wakaʋuya.

Nezuʋa recinomŋe Erishama, mŋanakomana waAmihudi, mucinda waʋana ʋaEfraimi, wakaʋuya.

Nezuʋa rorusere Gamarieri, mŋanakomana waPedazuri, mucinda waʋana ʋaManase, wakaʋuya.

nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,

nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;

Nezuʋa repfumbamŋe Abidani, mŋanakomana waGideoni, mucinda waʋana ʋaBenjamini, wakaʋuya.

nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;
nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caAbidani, mŋanakomana waGideoni.
Nezuʋa regumi Ahiezeri, mŋanakomana waAmishadai, mucinda waʋana ʋaDani,

Cipo cake caiti: Ndiro imŋe huru yesirveri, kurema kwayo kwakaŋga kuri mashekeri anezana namakumi matatu, nomudziyo mumŋe wesirveri wamashekeri anamakumi manomŋe, ɀicienzaniswa neshekeri reimba tȿene; ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri ɀakaŋga ɀizere noʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu;
nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe, negondobge rimŋe, negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;

nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caAhiezeri, mŋanakomana waAmishadai.
Nezuʋa regumi nerimŋe Pagieri, mŋanakomana waOkrani, mucinda waʋana ʋaAsheri, wakaʋuya.

nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe, negondobge rimŋe negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;
nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caPagieri, mŋanakomana waOkrani.
Nezuʋa regumi namaʋiri Ahira, mŋanakomana waEnani, mucinda waʋana ʋaNaftari, wakaʋuya.

Cipo cake caiti: Ndiro imŋe huru yesirveri, kurema kwayo kwakaŋga kuri mashekeri anezana namakumi matatu, nomudziyo mumŋe wesirveri wamashekeri anamakumi manomŋe, ɀicienzaniswa neshekeri reimba tȿene; ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri ɀakaŋga ɀizere noʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu;
nendiro imŋe yendarama yamashekeri anegumi, izere neɀinonhuwira,
nenzombe imŋe, negondobge rimŋe, negwaiana rimŋe regondobge regore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;
nenzombe mbiri, namakondobge mashanu, nenhoŋgo shanu dzembudzi, namakwaiana mashanu amakondobge egore rimŋe, ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; ndico caiʋa cipo caAhira, mŋanakomana waEnani.
Ndico cipo cokutsaurwa kweartari, nomusi wayakazodzwa nawo namacinda aIsraeri: Ndiro huru dzesirveri dzinegumi nembiri, nemidziyo yesirveri inegumi nembiri, nendiro dzendarama dzinegumi nembiri;

ndiro imŋe neimŋe huru yesirveri yakaȿika mashekeri anezana namakumi matatu, nomudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe mashekeri anamakumi manomŋe; sirveri yose yemidziyo yose yakaȿika mashekeri aneɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana manna, ɀicienzaniswa neshekeri reimba tȿene;

nendiro dzinegumi nembiri dzendarama, dzakaŋga dzizere neɀinonhuwira, imŋe neimŋe yakaŋga inamashekeri anegumi, ɀicienzaniswa neshekeri reimba tȿene; ndarama yose yendiro yakaȿika mashekeri anezana namakumi maʋiri;

nzombe dzose dzeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa dzakaȿika nzombe dzinegumi nembiri, namakondobge anegumi namaʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge egore rimŋe anegumi namaʋiri, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀoʋupfu; nenhoŋgo dzembudzi gumi nembiri, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi;

nzombe dzose dzeciɓayiro ceɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa dzakaȿika nzombe dzinamakumi maʋiri nenna, namakondobge anamakumi matanhatu, nenhoŋgo dzembudzi dzinamakumi matanhatu, namakwaiana amakondobge egore rimŋe anamakumi matanhatu. Ndico cipo cokutsaurwa kweartari, shure kwokuzodzwa kwayo.

Ɀino Mosesi wakati apinda mutente rokusoŋgana, kuti ataure naye, akanzwa Inzwi ricitaura naye, ricibva pacifunhiro cokuyananisa, cakaŋga ciri pamsoro peareka yecipupuriro, ricibva pakati pamakerubi maʋiri: akataura naye.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naAroni, uti kwaari: Kana ucimisa mŋenje, mŋenje minomŋe inofanira kuvenekera pamberi pecigadziko.
Aroni akaita saiɀoɀo; akamisa mŋenje yaco,

Cigadziko cakaŋga cakaitwa kuɗai: Cakaŋga cakaitwa nendarama yakapambadzirwa; kuȿikira pasi paco napamaruʋa aco cakaŋga cakaitwa nendarama yakapambadzirwa; nomufananidzo wakakaŋga wakaratidzwa Mosesi naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaakaita cigadziko.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Bvisa ʋaRevi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, uʋanatse.
Pakuʋanatsa unofanira kuʋaitira kuɗai: Sasa pamsoro paʋo mvura inosuka ɀiʋi, ugoʋaraira kuti ʋaʋeʋurwe muʋiri waʋo wose neciȿo, ʋasuke ŋguʋo dzaʋo, nokuɀinatsa.
Ɀino ʋanofanira kutora nzombe ɗuku, necipiriso cayo coʋupfu, ʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta; newe utore imŋe nzombe ɗuku, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Ɀino uise ʋaRevi pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, ndokukoka ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Unofanira kuisa ʋaRevi pamberi paJehova, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋagoisa maʋoko aʋo pamsoro paʋaRevi.
Ɀino Aroni unofanira kuzuŋguzira ʋaRevi pamberi paJehova, ʋaʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋagare’po kuzoɓate‐ɓasa raJehova.
Ɀino ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kuisa maʋoko aʋo pamisoro yenzombe ɗuku, iwe ugoɓayira Jehova imŋe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, neimŋe ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, kuti uyananisire ʋaRevi.
Ɀino unofanira kuisa ʋaRevi pamberi paAroni naʋanakomana ʋake, ugoʋazuŋguzira ʋaʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa kunaJehova.
Unofanira kubvisa ʋaRevi saiɀoɀo pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋaRevi ʋaʋe ʋaŋgu.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kupinda kuzoɓate‐ɓasa patente rokusoŋgana; unofanira kuʋanatsa nokuʋazuŋguzira ʋaʋe cipiriso cinozuŋguzirwa.
Nokuti ndakaʋapiwa ini cose pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri; ndakaɀitorera iʋo panɀimbo yaʋose ʋanotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, iwo mataŋgwe aʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Nokuti mataŋgwe ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri ndaaŋgu, kana aʋanhu, kana eɀipfuwo; ndakaɀitsaurira iwo nomusi wandakaʋuraya mataŋgwe ose munyika yeEgipita.
Ndakatora ʋaRevi panɀimbo yamataŋgwe ose pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri,

Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ndikaʋapa ʋaRevi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋaɓate ɓasa raʋana ʋaIsraeri patente rokusoŋgana, nokuyananisira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti hosha irege kuʋa’po pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kana ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacisweɗera kuimba tȿene.
Mosesi naAroni neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaitira ʋaRevi saiɀoɀo; ɀose seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova pamsoro paʋaRevi, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋaitira saiɀoɀo.
ƲaRevi ʋakaɀinatsa paɀiʋi
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋaRevi ʋakapinda kuzoɓate‐ɓasa patente rokusoŋgana pamberi paAroni napamberi paʋana ʋake; seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova pamsoro paʋaRevi, ndiɀo ɀaakaʋaitira.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ndiwo murairo waʋaRevi: Aʋo ʋaȿika pamakore makumi maʋiri namashanu, naʋanopfuʋura, ʋanofanira kupinda kuzorwa namaɓasa etente rokusoŋgana;
asi kana ʋaȿika makore anamakumi mashanu ʋanofanira kurega ɓasa iri; haʋacafaniri kuɓata;
asi ʋaŋgaɓatsirana haʋo nehama dzaʋo patente rokusoŋgana, kuti ʋariceŋgete, asi ŋgaʋarege kuɓate‐ɓasa. Ndiɀo ɀaunofanira kuitira ʋaRevi pamsoro pamaɓasa aʋo.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi murenje reSinai pamŋedzi wokutaŋga wegore recipiri rokuɓuɗa kwaʋo panyika yeEgipita, akati:
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kutamba paseka paŋguʋa yayo yakatarwa.
Nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi uno, maɗekwana, munofanira kuitamba paŋguʋa yayo yakatarwa; munofanira kuitamba
Ipapo Mosesi akataura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋatambe paseka.
Iʋo ʋakatamba paseka nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi, maɗekwana, murenje reSinai; ɀose seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova, ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunaʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kunaka nokuɗa kwecitunha comunhu, naiɀoɀo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kudya paseka nomusi iwoyo; naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋuya kunaMosesi naAroni nomusi iwoyo;
ʋarume aʋa ʋakati kwaari: Hatina‐kunaka nokuɗa kwecitunha comunhu; tiŋgadziʋiswa seiko kupa cipo caJehova neŋguʋa yaco yakatarwa pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri?
Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Mirai, ndinzwe ɀinorairwa naJehova pamsoro penyu.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Kana mumŋe wenyu, kana waʋana ʋenyu, aciŋge aʋa usina‐kunaka nokuɗa kwecitunha, kana ɀimŋe ari kurwendo ruri kure, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro unofanira kutamba paseka yaJehova.
Iʋo ʋanofanira kuidya nomŋedzi wecipiri, nezuʋa regumi namanna, maɗekwana; ʋanofanira kuidya neciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa nemiriʋo inoʋaʋa.
Haʋafaniri kusiya ɀimŋe kuȿikira maŋgwana, kana kuvuna fupa rimŋe rayo, asi ʋanofanira kuitamba ʋaciterera mitemo yose yepaseka.
Asi kana munhu akanaka hake, asati ari parwendo, akasadya paseka, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake; ɀaasinakupa cipo caJehova paŋguʋa yakatarwa, munhu uyo ucaʋa neɀiʋi ɀake.
Kana ari mutorwa ugere nemi, akaɗa kudya paseka yaJehova, unofanira kuidya aciterera mutemo wepaseka, nomurairo wayo; munofanira kuʋa nomutemo mumŋe, womutorwa nomunhu wakaɓerekwa munyika.
Nomusi wokumiswa kwetabernakeri, gore rakafukidza tabernakeri, iro tente recipupuriro; maɗekwana rakaŋga riri pamsoro petabernakeri rakaita somŋoto kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Ɀakaŋga ɀakaɗaro ŋguʋa dzose; gore rakaifukidza, asi ʋusiku rakaŋga rakaita somŋoto.
Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana gore ricisimudzwa pamsoro peTente, shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaifamba; paindomira gore, ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaidzika matente aʋo;
seɀaʋairairwa naJehova, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaifamba, seɀaʋairairwa naJehova ʋaidzika matente aʋo; ŋguʋa yose kana gore rimire pamsoro petabernakeri, iʋo ʋairambira mumatente aʋo.
Kana gore ricirambira pamsoro petabernakeri mazuʋa mazhinji, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaiceŋgeta ɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ʋakasafamba.
Dzimŋe ŋguʋa gore raigara pamsoro petabernakeri mazuʋa mashomanene; ɀino seɀairaira Jehova ʋairamba ʋagere pamatente aʋo, ʋuye seɀairaira Jehova ʋaifamba.
Dzimŋe ŋguʋa gore raiʋa’po kubva maɗeko kuȿikira maŋgwana; ɀino kana gore ricisimudzwa maŋgwana, ʋaifamba; kana masikati kana ʋusiku, kana gore ricisimudzwa, ʋaifamba.
Kana gore rikaramba riri pamsoro petabernakeri mazuʋa maʋiri, kana mŋedzi, kana gore, ricimira pamsoro payo, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋairamba ʋagere mumatente aʋo, ʋasiŋgafambi; asi kana rasimudzwa, ʋaifamba.
Seɀaʋairairwa naJehova, ʋaidzika matente aʋo; seɀaʋairairwa naJehova, ʋaifamba; ʋaiceŋgeta ɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, seɀakaraira Jehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Uɀiitire hwamanda mbiri dzesirveri; unofanira kudziita nesirveri yakapambadzirwa; idzo dzinofanira kukuɓatsira kuɗana ʋuŋgano nokuraira kuti mapoka afambe.
Kana ʋacidziridza ʋuŋgano yose inofanira kuʋuŋgana kwauri pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Kana ʋaciridza imŋe cete, ɀino macinda ʋari ʋakuru ʋeɀuru ɀaʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kuʋuŋgana kwauri.
Kana muciridzisa, mapoka okurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa anofanira kusimuka, ʋafambe.
Kana muciridzisa rwecipiri mapoka okurutiʋi rwezasi anofanira kusimuka, ʋafambe; ʋanofanira kuridzisa kana ʋofamba nzendo.
Asi kana ʋuŋgano icifanira kuʋuŋganidzwa, munofanira kuridza, asi musaridzisa.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋaprista, ndiʋo ʋanofanira kuridza hwamanda; ŋgaɀiʋe tsika kwamuri nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Kana mucindorwa munyika yenyu nomuʋeŋgi unokumanikidzai, munofanira kuridzisa nehwamanda; ipapo mucaraŋgarirwa pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu, mugoponeswa paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.

Ʋuye nomusi wamunofara nawo, napamitambo yenyu yakatarwa, napakutaŋga kwemŋedzi yenyu, munofanira kuridza hwamanda pamsoro peɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa, napamsoro peɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, kuti Jehova akuraŋgarirei naɀo; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino negore recipiri, nomŋedzi wecipiri, nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri romŋedzi, gore rakasimudzwa pamsoro petabernakeri yecipupuriro.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimuka murenje reSinai, kuzofamba nzendo dzaʋo; gore rikandomira murenje reParani.
Ʋakataŋga kufamba seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Pakutaŋga mureza weɓoka raʋana ʋaJuda wakasimuka namapoka aʋo; ɓoka rake rakaŋga ricirairwa naNashoni, mŋanakomana waAminadabi.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaIsakari rakaŋga ricirairwa naNetaneri, mŋanakomana waZuari.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaZeburuni rakaŋga ricirairwa naEriabi, mŋanakomana waHeroni.
Ɀino tabernakeri yakabviswa, ʋanakomana ʋaGershoni naʋanakomana ʋaMerari, ʋatakuri ʋetabernakeri, ʋakasimuka.
Ɀino mureza weɓoka raRubeni wakasimuka namapoka aʋo; ɓoka rake rakaŋga ricirairwa naErizuri, mŋanakomana waShedeuri.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni rakaŋga ricirairwa naSherumieri, mŋanakomana waZurishadai.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaGadi rakaŋga ricirairwa naEriasafi, mŋanakomana waDeureri.
Ɀino ʋaKohati ʋakasimuka, ʋakatakura imba tȿene; ʋamŋe ʋakamisa tabernakeri iʋo ʋacigere kuȿika.
Ɀino mureza weɓoka raʋana ʋaEfraimi wakasimuka namapoka aʋo; ɓoka rake rakaŋga ricirairwa naErishama, mŋanakomana waAmihudi.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaManase rakaŋga ricirairwa naGamarieri, mŋanakomana waPedashuri.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaBenjamini rakaŋga ricirairwa naAbidani, mŋanakomana waGideoni.
Ipapo mureza weɓoka raʋana ʋaDani, ndiʋo ʋokupedzisira pamapoka ose, ʋakasimuka namapoka aʋo; ɓoka rake rakaŋga ricirairwa naAhiezeri, mŋanakomana waAmishadai.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaAsheri rakaŋga ricirairwa naPagieri, mŋanakomana waOkrani.
Ƃoka rorudzi rwaʋana ʋaNaftari rakaŋga ricirairwa naAhira, mŋanakomana waEnani.
Ndiko kufamba kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri namapoka aʋo; ʋakasimuka.

Ɀino Mosesi akati kunaHobabi, mŋanakomana waReueri, muMidiani, mukarabga waMosesi: Toenda kunɀimbo iyo yakanzi naJehova, ndicakupai iyo; endai nesu, tigokuitirai ɀakanaka, nokuti Jehova wakataura ɀakanaka pamsoro paʋaIsraeri.
Iye akati kwaari: Handiŋgaendi, asi ndicaenda haŋgu kunyika yaŋgu nokuhama dzaŋgu.
Iye akati: Ndinonyeŋgetera kuti murege henyu kutisiya, ɀamunoziʋa mudzikirwe wamatente eɗu murenje, mucaʋa meso eɗu.
Kana mukaenda nesu, kana Jehova akatiitira ɀakanaka ɀipi neɀipi, ticakuitirai iɀoɀo ʋo.
Ɀino ʋakasimuka pagomo raJehova, ʋakafamba mazuʋa matatu; areka yesuŋgano yaJehova ikaʋatuŋgamirira mazuʋa matatu, kuʋatȿakira pokuzorora.
Gore raJehova rikaʋa pamsoro paʋo masikati pakusimuka kwaʋo pamisasa.
Ɀino areka yakati yasimuka, Mosesi akati: Simukai Jehova, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ŋgaʋaparadzwe; naʋanokuʋeŋgai ŋgaʋatize pamberi penyu.
Ɀino pakuzorora kwayo, akati: Dzokai Jehova, kuɀuru ɀinegumi ɀeɀuru ɀaʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaita saʋanyunyuti, ʋakataura ɀakaipa munzeʋe dzaJehova; ipapo Jehova wakati aɀinzwa, akatsamŋa kwaɀo, mŋoto waJehova ukapfuta pakati paʋo, ukaparadza kumudziʋo wemisasa.
Ʋanhu ʋakacema kunaMosesi, Mosesi akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, mŋoto ukadzimŋa.
Zita renɀimbo iyo rikanzi Tabera, nokuti mŋoto waJehova wakapfuta’po pakati paʋo.
Ɀino ʋatorwa ʋazhinji, ʋakaŋga ʋari pakati paʋo, ʋakataŋga kufa nenhomba yenyama; naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema ʋo, ʋakati: Ndianiko ucatipe‐nyama kuti tidye?
Tinoraŋgarira hoʋe dzataidya Egipita, tisiŋgateŋgi, namakake, namaŋwiwa, nerikisi, nehanyanisi, negariki.
Asi ɀino mŋeya yeɗu yawoma, hapane
Mana yakaŋga yakafanana nembeu dzekorianderi, yakaŋga yakaita sebedaro.
Ʋanhu ʋaipararira kundoinoŋga, ʋakaikuya pamakuyo, kana kuiswa mumaturi, nokuiɓika muhari, nokuita ɀiŋgwa ɀiɗuku nayo; kana yodyiwa yakaita seɀiŋgwa ɀakaɓikwa namafuta.
Kana ɗoʋa riciwira pamisasa ʋusiku, mana yakawa ʋo pamŋe cete naro.
Ɀino Mosesi wakanzwa ʋanhu ʋacicema padzimba dzaʋo dzose, mumŋe nomumŋe pamukoʋa wetente rake; Jehova akatsamŋa kwaɀo; naiye Mosesi wakanga asiŋgafari.
Mosesi akati kunaJehova: Makaitireiko muranda wenyu ɀakaipa? Ndakaregereiko kunzwirwa nyasha nemi, ɀamakanditakudza mutoro waʋanhu aʋa ʋose?
Ko ndini ndakagamucira ʋanhu aʋa ʋose here? Ko ndini ndakaʋaɓereka here, ɀamunoti kwandiri: Uʋatakure pacifuʋa cako, somureri unotakura mŋana unomŋa,
Ndicawanepiko nyama yandiŋgapa ʋanhu aʋa ʋose? Nokuti ʋanondicemera, ʋaciti: Tipe nyama, tidye.
Handigoni kutakura ʋanhu aʋa ʋose ndoga, nokuti ɀinondiremera kwaɀo.
Kana muciɗa kundiitira saiɀoɀo, cindiʋurayai henyu kamŋe, kana ndanzwirwa nyasha nemi; ndirege haŋgu kuʋona ʋurombo bgaŋgu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ʋuŋganidza kwandiri ʋarume ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, ʋaunoziʋa kuti ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu, naʋatariri ʋaʋo, uʋuye naʋo patente rokusoŋgana, kuti ʋamire’po newe.
Ipapo ndicaɓuruka, nditaure newe ipapo; ɀino ndicatora pamŋeya uri pamsoro pako, ndikauisa pamsoro paʋo; iʋo ʋacatakura mutoro waʋanhu pamŋe cete newe, kuti urege kuutakura iwe woga.

Ɀino iwe uti kuʋanhu: Ɀinatsirei maŋgwana, nokuti mucadyenyama; nokuti makacema munzeʋe dzaJehova, muciti: Ndianiko ucatipe‐nyama, tidye? Nokuti takaŋga ticifara heɗu Egipita. Naiɀoɀo Jehova ucakupai nyama, mudye.
Hamuŋgadyi zuʋa rimŋe, kana mazuʋa maʋiri, kana mazuʋa mashanu, kana mazuʋa anegumi, kana mazuʋa anamakumi maʋiri;
asi mŋedzi wose, kuȿikira iciɓuɗa kumhino dzenyu, ikakusemesai; nokuti makarasha Jehova uri pakati penyu, mukacema pamberi pake, muciti: Takaɓuɗireiko Egipita?
Ɀino Mosesi akati: Ʋanhu aʋa, ʋandiri pakati paʋo, ʋanofamba namakumbo, ʋanoȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana matanhatu, ɀino moti: Ndicaʋape‐nyama, ʋaidye mŋedzi wose!
Ko ʋacaɓayirwa makwai neŋombe, kuti ʋariŋgane here? Kana ʋaŋgaʋuŋganidzirwa hoʋe dzose dziri muguŋgwa, kuti ʋariŋgane here?
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ko ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakafupiswa here? Ucaʋona hako ɀino kana shoko raŋgu riciitika kana risiŋgaitiki.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɓuɗa, akandoʋudza ʋanhu mashoko aJehova; akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋakuru ʋaʋanhu, akaʋapotedza Tente.
