Ipapo Jehova akaɓuruka mugore, akataura naye, akatora pamŋeya wakaŋga uri pamsoro pake, akauisa pamsoro paʋakuru aʋo ʋanamakumi manomŋe; ɀino mŋeya wakati ucigara pamsoro paʋo, iʋo ʋakaprofita, asi haʋana‐kuzoita ɀe saiɀoɀo.
Asi ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋakasara pamisasa, zita romumŋe rainzi Erdadi, nezita romumŋe Medadi; mŋeya ukagara pamsoro paʋo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakanyorwa, asi haʋana‐kuɓuɗira kuTente; ʋakaprofita pamisasa.
Ɀino mumŋe mukomana wakamhanya, akandoʋudza Mosesi, akati: Erdadi naMedadi ʋanoprofita pamisasa.
Ipapo Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, muranda waMosesi kubva paʋujaya bgake, akapindura, akati: Ishe waŋgu, Mosesi, ʋadziʋisei.
Mosesi akati kwaari: Ko uneshuŋgu nokuɗa kwaŋgu here? Ƌai ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJehova ʋaiʋa ʋaprofita, Jehova akaisa mŋeya wake pamsoro paʋo!
Ipapo Mosesi akaenda kumisasa, iye naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino mhepo yakabva kunaJehova, ikaʋuyisa ɀihuta, ɀaibva kuguŋgwa, ikaɀikandira pamisasa kumatiʋi ose, ɀikaita rwendo rwezuʋa rimŋe kurutiʋi rumŋe, norwendo rwezuʋa rimŋe ɀe kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwemisasa, nomurwi wakakwirira makubiti
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakasimuka zuʋa iro rose, noʋusiku ubgo bgose, neramaŋgwana rose, ʋakaʋuŋganidza ɀihuta. Wakaʋuŋganidza ɀishoma wakaʋuŋganidza mahomeri
Nyama yakaŋga iciri pakati pameno aʋo, isati yatseŋgwa, kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira ʋanhu, Jehova akaroʋa ʋanhu nehosha yakaipa kwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo nɀimbo iyo yakatumidzwa Kibroti‐hataʋa, nokuti ndipo paʋakaʋiga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋafa nenhomba yenyama.
Ʋanhu ʋakasimuka ʋakabva Kibroti‐hataʋa ʋakaȿika Hazeroti; ʋakagara paHazeroti.
Ɀino Miriami naAroni ʋakapopotera Mosesi nokuɗa kwomukadzi waiʋa muKushi, waakaŋga awana; nokuti wakaŋga awana mukadzi waiʋa muKushi.
Ʋakati: Ko Jehova wakataura naMosesi iye oga here? Ko haana‐kutaura nesu ʋo here? Jehova akaɀinzwa.
Ɀino munhu uyu Mosesi wakaŋga ari munhu munyoro kwaɀo, kupfuʋura ʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa panyika.
Jehova akataura pakarepo naMosesi naAroni naMiriami,
Ipapo Jehova akaɓuruka mushoŋgwe yegore, akamira mumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, akaɗana Aroni naMiriami; iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakaɓuɗa.
Ɀino akati: Tererai mashoko aŋgu; kana kunomuprofita pakati penyu, ini Jehova ndicaɀiziʋisa kwaari neciratidzo, ndicataura naye nokurota hope.
Muranda waŋgu Mosesi haana‐kuɗaro; wakatendeka paimba yaŋgu yose.
Iye ndicataura naye nomuromo, pacena,
Ipapo kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakaʋamukira, iye akabva.
Gore rikabva pamsoro petente rokusoŋgana, ʋonei Miriami waʋa namaperembudzi, akacena secando; Aroni akatarira Miriami, ʋonei waʋa namaperembudzi.
Ɀino Aroni akati kunaMosesi: Haiwa, Ishe waŋgu, musaisa mhoȿa yeɀiʋi pamsoro peɗu, kunyaŋge takaita heɗu noʋupenzi, tikatadza.
Ŋgaarege kuʋa somŋana wakaɓerekwa akafa, imŋe nyama yake yakaʋora pakuɓuɗa kwake paɗumbu ramai ʋake.
Ɀino Mosesi akacema kunaJehova, akati: Haiwa Mŋari, ɗomuporesai henyu.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ƌai ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋamupfira mate kuciso cake, haazaifanira kunyara mazuʋa manomŋe here? Ŋgaaɓuɗiswe kunze kwemisasa mazuʋa manomŋe, agopinzwa pashure.
Ipapo Miriami akaɓuɗiswa kunze kwemisasa mazuʋa manomŋe, ʋanhu ʋakasafamba, kuȿikira Miriami adzoswa ɀe.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakasimuka ʋakabva Hazeroti, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo murenje reParani.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Tuma ʋarume kuti ʋandoshora nyika yeKanani, yandicapa ʋana ʋaIsraeri; utume mumŋe worudzi rumŋe norumŋe rwamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋose ʋaʋe ʋakuru pakati paʋo.
Mosesi akaʋatuma, ʋakabva murenje reParani, nokuraira kwaJehova, ʋose ʋaʋo ʋari ʋarume ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ndiwo mazita aʋo: Ʋokurudzi rwaRubeni, Shamua, mŋanakomana waZakuri.
Ʋokurudzi rwaSimeoni, Shafati, mŋanakomana waHori.
Ʋokurudzi rwaJuda, Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune.
Ʋokurudzi rwaIsakari, Igari, mŋanakomana waJosefa.
Ʋokurudzi rwaEfraimi, Hoshea, mŋanakomana waNuni.
Ʋokurudzi rwaBenjamini, Parti, mŋanakomana waRafu.
Ʋokurudzi rwaZeburuni, Gadieri, mŋanakomana waSodi.
Ʋokurudzi rwaJosefa, irwo rudzi rwaManase, Gadi, mŋanakomana waSusi.
Ʋokurudzi rwaDani, Amieri, mŋanakomana waGemari.
Ʋokurudzi rwaAsheri, Seturi, mŋanakomana waMikaeri.
Ʋokurudzi rwaNaftari, Nabi, mŋanakomana waVofsi.
Ʋokurudzi rwaGadi, Geueri, mŋanakomana waMaki.
Ndiwo mazita aʋarume ʋakatumŋa naMosesi kundoshora nyika. Mosesi akatumidza Hoshea, mŋanakomana waNuni, zita rinonzi Joshua.
Mosesi akaʋatuma kundoshora nyika yeKanani, akati kwaʋari: Endai nenzira iyi yeZasi, mukwire mumakomo;
mundoʋone‐nyika, kuti yakaɗiniko, naʋanhu ʋagere’mo, kana ʋanesimba, kana ʋasina, kana ʋari ʋashoma, kana ʋari ʋazhinji;
nenyika ʋo yaʋagere’mo, kuti yakaɗiniko, kana yakanaka, kana yakaipa; namaguta maʋagere, kuti akaɗiniko, kana ʋagere mumisasa kana munhare;
nevu, kuti rakaɗiniko, kana rakaʋorera kana risinakuʋorera, kana panemiti kana pasinemiti; tsuŋgai mŋoyo, mugoʋuya neɀiɓereko ɀenyika iyo. Ɀino yaiʋa ŋguʋa yokutaŋga kuibva kwamazambiriŋga.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakakwira ʋakandoshorenyika, ʋacibva murenje reZini, kuȿikira Rehobi, paʋanopinda Hamati.
Ʋakapinda neZasi, ʋakaȿika Hebroni; ipapo pakaŋga panaAhimani naSheshai naTarmai, ʋanakomana ʋaAnaki. (Pakuʋakwa Hebroni rakataŋgira Zoani paEgipita namakore manomŋe.)
Ʋakandoȿika pamupata weEshkori, ʋakatema ɗaʋi raiʋa nesumbu rimŋe ramazambiriŋga, ʋakaritakura paɗanda pakati paʋanhu ʋaʋiri; ʋakaʋuya ʋo namatamba namaʋonde.
Nɀimbo iyo ʋakaitumidza mupata weEshkori nokuɗa kwesumbu rakatemŋa’po naʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Mazuʋa anamakumi manna akati apera, ʋakadzoka pakushore‐nyika.
Ʋakaȿika kunaMosesi naAroni neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, murenje reParani paKadeshi, ʋakaʋaʋudza mashoko nokuʋaratidza iʋo neʋuŋgano yose ɀiɓereko ɀenyika iyo.
Ʋakamuʋudza, ʋakati: Takaenda kunyika iyo kwamakatituma; ɀirokwaɀo inoyerera mukaka noʋuci; iɀi ndiɀo ɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Asi ʋanhu ʋagere munyika iyo ʋanesimba, maguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, makuru kwaɀo; ʋuye, takaʋona’po ʋana ʋaAnaki.
ƲaAmareki ʋagere munyika neceZasi, naʋaHeti, naʋaJebusi, naʋaAmori ʋagere mumakomo; ʋaKanani ʋagere paguŋgwa, nokurutiʋi rwaJoridani.
Ipapo Karebi akanyaradza ʋanhu pamberi paMosesi, akati: Ŋgatikwire pakarepo, tindoitora, nokuti tinogona kwaɀo kuikunda.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakwira naye, ʋakati: Hatigoni kukwira kundorwa naʋanhu aʋo, nokuti ʋanotikurira nesimba.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋuya kuʋana ʋaIsraeri neshoko rakaipa pamsoro penyika iyo, yaʋakaŋga ʋaenda kundoishora, ʋaciti: Nyika iyo yatakapfuʋura napakati payo kuishora, inyika inopedza ʋanhu ʋagere’mo; ʋanhu ʋose ʋatakaʋona’mo ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋakakura kwaɀo.
Takaʋona’po ʋanhu ʋarefu, ʋana ʋaAnaki, ʋanobva paʋarefu; kana ticiɀifananidza, takaŋga takaita semhashu, ndoɀatakaŋga takaita kwaʋari ʋo.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yakacema ɀikuru; ʋanhu ʋakacema ʋusiku ibgobgo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakapopotera Mosesi naAroni, ʋuŋgano yose ikati kwaʋari: Haiwa, Ƌai takafira heɗu munyika yeEgipita! Ƌai takafira heɗu murenje rino!
Jehova wakaʋuyireiko nesu munyika ino, tiʋurawe nomunondo? Ʋakadzi ʋeɗu naʋana ʋeɗu ʋacatapxa. Hakuzaiʋa nani kuti tidzokere Egipita here?
Ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Ŋgatiɀitȿakire mukuru, tidzokere Egipita.
Ipapo Mosesi naAroni ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo pamberi peʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
NaJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, naKarebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, ʋakaŋga ʋandoshore‐nyika pamŋe cete naʋamŋe, ʋakabvarura ŋguʋo dzaʋo,
ʋakataura neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakati: Nyika yatakapfuʋura napakati payo kuishora, inyika yakanaka kwaɀo‐kwaɀo.
Kana Jehova acifara nesu, ucatiisa kunyika iyo, nokutipa iyo; inyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Asi regai kumukira Jehova, ʋuye musatya ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo, nokuti iʋo ɀokudya ɀeɗu; mumvuri waʋo wabviswa pamsoro paʋo, Jehova unesu, regai kutya.
Asi ʋuŋgano yose yakati ʋatakwe namabge. Ipapo kubginya kwaJehova kwakaʋonekwa mutente rokusoŋgana naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋacandiɀidza kuȿikira riniko? Ʋacaramba kunditenda ini kuȿikira riniko, neɀishamiso ɀose ɀandakaita pakati paʋo?
Ndicaʋaroʋa neɗenda, nokuʋatorera nhaka yaʋo, ndikuite iwe rudzi runoʋakunda iʋo noʋukuru nesimba.
Mosesi akati kunaJehova: ƲaEgipita ʋacaɀinzwa, nokuti makaɓuɗisa ʋanhu aʋa pakati paʋo nesimba renyu;

ʋacaʋudza ʋanhu ʋagere munyika ino iɀoɀo; iʋo ʋakanzwa kuti imi Jehova muri pakati paʋanhu aʋa, nokuti imi Jehova munoʋonekwa naʋo pacena, gore renyu rinomira pamsoro paʋo, nemi munoʋatuŋgamirira masikati neshoŋgwe yegore, noʋusiku neshoŋgwe yomŋoto.
Ɀino kana mukaʋuraya ʋanhu aʋa ʋose‐ʋose, ndudzi dzaʋanhu, dzakanzwa mukurumbira wenyu, dzicataura, dziciti:
Jehova wakaŋga asiŋgagoni kuisa ʋanhu aʋa kunyika yaakaŋga aʋapikira, saka wakaʋaʋuraya murenje.
Ɀino ndinokumbira kuti simba raShe waŋgu riʋe guru, seɀamakataura, muciti:
Jehova unononoka kutsamŋa, unenyasha huru, unokaŋganwira ɀakaipa nokuɗarika; haaŋgatoŋgopembedzi munhu unemhoȿa; unoroʋa ʋana nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kuȿikira kurudzi rwecitatu norwecinna.
Ndinokumbira kuti mukaŋganwire henyu ɀakaipa ɀaʋanhu aʋa noʋukuru bgenyasha dzenyu, ʋuye seɀamakakaŋganwira ʋanhu aʋa kubva Egipita kuȿikira ɀino.
Ipapo Jehova akati: Ndakaŋganwira seɀawakumbira.
Asi ɀirokwaɀo, noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, ʋuye nyika yose ɀaicazara nokubginya kwaJehova,
ʋarume aʋa ʋose ʋakaʋona kubginya kwaŋgu neɀiratidzo ɀaŋgu, ɀandakaita muEgipita nomurenje, ʋakandiidza ɀino runegumi, ʋasiŋgatereri inzwi raŋgu,
ɀirokwaɀo, haʋaŋgaʋoni nyika yandakapikira madziɓaɓa aʋo; hakunomumŋe waʋakandiɀidza ucaiʋona,
asi muranda waŋgu Karebi, nokuti wakaŋga anomumŋe mŋeya mukati make, akanditeʋera nomŋoyo wose, ndiye wandicapinza munyika maakambopinda; icaʋa yaʋana ʋake.
Ɀino ʋaAmareki naʋaKanani ʋaigara mumupata uyo; maŋgwana dzokai, muende kurenje nenzira inoenda kuGuŋgwa Dɀuku.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Ʋuŋgano iyi yakaipa icaramba icindinyunyutira kuȿikira riniko? Ndakanzwa kunyunyuta kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kwaʋanondinyunyutira nako.
Uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀirokwaɀo, noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, seɀamakataura munzeʋe dzaŋgu, ndiɀo ɀandicakuitirai.
Ɀitunha ɀenyu ɀicawira murenje rino; imi mose makaʋereŋgwa, nokuwanda kwenyu kwose, ʋose ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, ʋakandinyunyutira,
ɀirokwaɀo, imi hamuŋgapindi munyika yandakupikirai, ndiciti, ndicakugarisai’mo, asi Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni.
Asi ʋana ʋenyu ʋamakati ʋacatapxa, ndiʋo ʋandicapinza; iʋo ʋacaziʋa nyika yamakaramba imi.
Asi kana muri’mi, ɀitunha ɀenyu ɀicawira murenje rino.
Ʋana ʋenyu ʋacadzuŋgaira saʋafudzi murenje makore anamakumi manna, ʋacirobga nokuɗa kwokupata kwenyu, kuȿikira ɀitunha ɀenyu ɀaparadzwa murenje.

Samazuʋa amakaŋga mucishora nyika nawo, iwo mazuʋa anamakumi manna, saiɀoɀo mucaʋa nemhoȿa yokutadza kwenyu, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ricaita gore rimŋe, ndiwo makore anamakumi manna, mugoziʋa kuti ndakakufuratirai.
Ini Jehova, ndakataura iɀoɀo, ndicaitira saiɀoɀo ʋuŋgano iyi yose yakaipa, yakaʋuŋgana kuzorwa neni; ʋacaparadzwa murenje rino, ʋacafira’po.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋatumŋa naMosesi kundoshora nyika, ʋaya ʋakadzoka ʋonyunyutisa ʋuŋgano yose pamsoro pake, ɀaʋakaʋuya namashoko akaipa pamsoro penyika iyo,
ʋarume aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya neshoko rakaipa pamsoro penyika iyo, ʋakafa neɗenda pamberi paJehova.
Asi Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, naKarebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, ʋakasara ʋari ʋapenyu paʋarume ʋaya ʋakandoshora nyika.
Ɀino Mosesi wakaʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri mashoko iwaya ose; ʋanhu ʋakacema kwaɀo,
ʋakafumira maŋgwanani, ʋakakwira kumusoro wegomo, ʋakati: Tarirai, tiri pano heɗu, ticandokwira kwatakarairwa naJehova, nokuti tatadza.
Mosesi akati: Munoɗarikireiko murairo waJehova, nokuti mucaʋona nhamo.
Musakwira, nokuti Jehova haazi pakati penyu; kuti murege kuparadzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.
Nokuti ʋaAmareki naʋaKanani ʋari mberi kwenyu ipapo; mucaʋurawa nomunondo, nokuti makadzoka pakuteʋera Jehova, naiɀoɀo Jehova haaŋgaʋi nemi.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaidza haʋo kukwira kumusoro wegomo nokuɀikudza kwaʋo; asi areka yesuŋgano yaJehova hainakubva pamisasa, naiye Mosesi ʋo.
Ipapo ʋaAmareki naʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere mugomo iro ʋakaɓuruka, ʋakaʋaparadza nokuʋadziŋgirira kuȿikira paHorma.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana mapinda munyika yamunozogara, yandinokupai;

kana muciɗa kugadzirira Jehova cipiriso pamŋoto, cipiriso cinopiswa, kana ciɓayiro, cokupika naco, kana cokuŋgopa nokuɗa kwenyu, kana pamitambo yenyu yakatarwa, kuti mupe Jehova cinonhuwira ɀakanaka, ceŋombe kana camakwai;
ɀino iye unopa cipo cake, unofanira kupa Jehova cipiriso coʋupfu cecegumi ceefa
unofanira kugadzira ʋo waini yecipiriso cinoɗururwa, cecinna cehini, pamŋe cete necipiriso cinopiswa, kana neciɓayiro, pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe.
Kana riri gondobge, unofanira kurigadzirira cipiriso coʋupfu ceɀegumi ɀiʋiri ɀeefa yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa necetatu cehini yamafuta;
unofanira kupa ʋo cetatu cehini yewaini, ciʋe cipiriso cinoɗururwa, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Kana ucigadzira nzombe ɗuku kuti ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, kana ciɓayiro cokupika naco, kana kuti ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa naɀo kunaJehova;
pamŋe cete nenzombe ɗuku ŋgaaʋuye necipiriso coʋupfu ceɀegumi ɀitatu ɀeefa yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa nehafu yehini yamafuta.
Unofanira kupa ʋo hafu yehini yewaini, ciʋe cipiriso cinoɗururwa, ciʋe cipiriso cinoitwa pamŋoto, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Ŋgaɀiitwe saiɀoɀo panzombe imŋe neimŋe, kana gondobge rimŋe nerimŋe, kana gwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe, kana mbudzana imŋe neimŋe.
Munofanira kuitira cimŋe necimŋe saiɀoɀo, ɀienzane neɀose ɀamunogadzira.
Ʋose ʋanoɓerekerwa munyika yenyu ʋanofanira kuita iɀoɀo nenzira iyi, kana ʋaciʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.

Kana kunomutorwa ugere nemi, kana aninani uri pakati penyu kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose, kana aciɗa kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova; seɀamunoita imi, naiye unofanira kuita ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Paʋuŋgano yenyu panofanira kuʋa nomutemo mumŋe wenyu nowomutorwa ugere nemi, uʋe murairo usiŋgaperi, kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose; seɀamakaita imi, ndiɀo ɀinofanira kuita mutorwa pamberi paJehova.
Munofanira kuʋa nomurairo mumŋe netsika imŋe, imi nomutorwa ugere nemi.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana muciȿika kunyika kwandinokuisai,
kana modya ɀokudya ɀenyika, munofanira kupa Jehova cipiriso cinotsaurwa.
Paɀitȿa ɀoʋupfu bgenyu munofanira kuʋuya neciŋgwa ciɗuku, ciʋe cipiriso cinotsaurwa; seɀamunoita necipiriso cinotsaurwa ceɓuriro, munofanira kucitsaura saiɀoɀo.
Munofanira kupa Jehova paɀitȿa ɀoʋupfu bgenyu cipiriso cinotsaurwa kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose.
Kana mucitadza, musiŋgaceŋgeti mirairo iyi yose, yakataurwa naJehova kunaMosesi,
ɀose ɀamakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi, kubva pazuʋa rakataŋga kuraira Jehova, kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose,

ɀino kana ɀiciŋge ɀaitwa ʋuŋgano isiŋgaziʋi, ʋuŋgano yose inofanira kuʋuya nenzombe imŋe ɗuku, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova, pamŋe cete necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa, seɀakarairwa, nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.

Muprista unofanira kuyananisira ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋganwirwe; nokuti kwaiʋa kutadza, ʋakazoʋuya necipo caʋo pamberi paJehova, ciri cipiriso cinoitirwa Jehova pamŋoto, necipiriso ceɀiʋi pamsoro pokutadza kwaʋo.
Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri icakaŋganwirwa, nomutorwa ugere pakati paʋo; nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiita haʋo nokusaziʋa.
Kana munhu mumŋe akatadza nokusaziʋa, unofanira kuʋuya neshece yembudzi yegore rimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kuyananisira munhu wakatadza, kana akaita ɀiʋi nokusaziʋa, pamberi paJehova, kuti amuyananisire, akaŋganwirwe.
Munofanira kuʋa nomurairo mumŋe cete pamsoro pomunhu wakaita cinhu nokusaziʋa, kana ari munhu wakaɓerekerwa panyika pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kana ari mutorwa ugere pakati paʋo.
Asi munhu unoita cinhu nokuɀikudza, kana ari munhu wakaɓerekerwa munyika, kana ari mutorwa, iye unomhura Jehova; munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati porudzi rwake.
Nokuti wakaɀidza shoko raJehova, akaputsa murairo wake; munhu uyu unofanira kubviswa cose; mhoȿa yokutadza kwake iri pamsoro pake.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaciri murenje, ʋakaʋona munhu aciʋuŋganidza tsotso nomusi wesaɓata.
Aʋo ʋakamuwana aciʋuŋganidza tsotso ʋakamuisa kunaMosesi naAroni, nokuʋuŋgano yose.
Ʋakamuisa mutoroŋgo, nokuti kwakaŋga kusina‐kurebga ɀaaifanira kuitirwa.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Munhu uyu, ɀirokwaɀo, unofanira kuʋurawa; ʋuŋgano yose inofanira kumutaka namabge kunze kwemisasa.
Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yakamuisa kunze kwemisasa, ʋakamutaka namabge, akafa; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uʋaraire kuti ʋaɀiitire masa pamipendero yeŋguʋo dzaʋo, kuȿikira kumarudzi aʋo ose, ʋaise paisa rimŋe nerimŋe pamupendero rwonzi rutema.
Cinofanira kuʋa kwamuri isa ramuŋgasiʋona, mugoraŋgarira mirairo yose yaJehova, kuti muiite; kuti murege kuteʋera kuɗa kwomŋoyo yenyu nokwameso enyu, kwamaisiteʋera pakupata kwenyu;
kuti muraŋgarire nokuita mirairo yaŋgu yose, nokuʋa ʋatȿene kunaMŋari wenyu.
Ndini Jehova wenyu, wakakuɓuɗisai munyika yeEgipita, kuti ndiʋe Mŋari wenyu; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino Kora, mŋanakomana waIzari, mŋanakomana waKohati, mŋanakomana waRevi, naDatani naAbirami, ʋanakomana ʋaEriabi, naOni, mŋanakomana waPereti, ʋanakomana ʋaRubeni, ʋakatora ʋarume,
ʋakamukira Mosesi, ʋanaʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋeʋuŋgano ʋanamazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu, ʋakaŋga ʋakaɗanwa kumakurukota, ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakakurumbira;
ʋakaʋuŋganira kunaMosesi naAroni, ʋakati kwaʋari: Ɀariŋgana, nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋeʋuŋgano ʋatȿene, mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo; Jehova uri pakati paʋo; imi munoɀikudzireiko pamakurukota aJehova?
Mosesi wakati aciɀinzwa, akawira pasi neciso cake;
akataura naKora neɓoka rake rose, akati: Maŋgwana Jehova ucaratidza kuti ʋanhu ʋake ndiʋanani, ʋuye kuti mutȿene ndiani, ʋuye kuti ndiani waacasweɗedza
Itai kuɗai: Torai haryana dzeɀinonhuwira, iwe Kora, naʋeɓoka rako rose;
maŋgwana muise mŋoto mukati madzo, nokuisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamsoro padzo pamberi paJehova; ɀino munhu unotsaurwa naJehova, ndiye ucaʋa mutȿene. Ɀariŋgana, imi ʋanakomana ʋaRevi.
Mosesi akati ʋo kunaKora: Tererai, imi ʋanakomana ʋaRevi:
Ko munoti cinhu ciɗuku kuti Mŋari waIsraeri wakakutsaurai paʋuŋgano yaIsraeri, kuti akusweɗedzei kwaari, kuti muɓate ɓasa retabernakeri yaJehova, nokumira pamberi peʋuŋgano, nokuʋaɓatira,
akakusweɗedza, nehama dzako dzose, ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, pamŋe cete newe here? Ɀino motȿaka ʋuprista ʋo here?
Naiɀoɀo iwe neɓoka rako rose maʋuŋgana kuzorwa naJehova; Aroni ndianiko, ɀamunomupopotera iye?
Ipapo Mosesi akatuma munhu kundoɗana Datani naAbirami, ʋanakomana ʋaEriabi; asi iʋo ʋakati: Hatiɗi kukwira’ko.
Cinhu ciɗuku here ɀawakatiɓuɗisa munyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, kuti utiʋurayire murenje; ɀino woɗo‐kuɀiita ishe pamsoro peɗu here?
Ʋuye hauna‐kutiisa munyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, kana kutipe‐nhaka yeminda neyeminda yemizambiriŋga; ɀino unoɗa kutumbura meso aʋanhu aʋa here? Hatiɗi kukwira’ko.
Ipapo Mosesi akatsamŋa kwaɀo, akati kunaJehova: Musagamucira cipiriso caʋo; handina‐kuʋatorera mboŋgoro imŋe, handina‐kuitira mumŋe waʋo ɀakaipa.
Ipapo Mosesi akati kunaKora: Iwe neɓoka rako rose, ʋuyai pamberi paJehova maŋgwana, iwe, naiʋo, naAroni;

mumŋe nomumŋe atore haryana yake yeɀinonhuwira, muise ɀinonhuwira mukati madzo, muʋuye nadzo pamberi paJehova, mumŋe nomumŋe haryana yake yeɀinonhuwira, haryana dzinamazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu; newe ʋo, naAroni, mumŋe nomumŋe haryana yake.
Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe wakatora haryana yake, akaisa mŋoto mukati mayo, akaisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamsoro padzo, akandomira pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, pamŋe cete naMosesi naAroni.
Kora akaʋuŋganidza ʋuŋgano yose pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana; kubginya kwaJehova kukaʋonekwa neʋuŋgano yose.
Ipapo Jehova akataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Ɀitsaurei imi paʋuŋgano iyi, ndiʋaparadze pakarepo.
Ɀino ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋakati: Haiwa, Mŋari, Mŋari wemŋeya yaʋanhu ʋose, ko kana munhu mumŋe akatadza, muŋgatsamŋira ʋuŋgano yose here?
Ipapo Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura neʋuŋgano, uti: Ibvai patabernakeri yaKora, naDatani, naAbirami.
Ipapo Mosesi akasimuka, akaenda kunaDatani naAbirami; ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri ʋakamuteʋera.
Akataura neʋuŋgano, akati: Ibvai pamatente aʋarume aʋa ʋakaipa, musatoŋgoɓata cinhu caʋo, kuti murege kuparadzwa paɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakabva patabernakeri yaKora, naDatani, naAbirami, kumatiʋi ose; Datani naAbirami ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakandomira pamikoʋa yamatente aʋo naʋakadzi ʋaʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, neɀana ɀaʋo ɀiɗuku.
Ɀino Mosesi akati: Mucaziʋa neɀiɀi kuti Jehova wakandituma kuti ndiite maɓasa awa ose; nokuti handina‐kuaita nokuɗa kwaŋgu.
Kana ʋarume aʋa ʋakafa saʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋose, kana ɀimŋe ʋakaȿikirwa neɀinoȿikira ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋose, Jehova haana‐kundituma.
Asi kana Jehova akasika cinhu citȿa, nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo, ikaʋamedza, iʋo neɀose ɀaʋo, ʋakaɓurukira mubgiro ʋari ʋapenyu, ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ʋarume aʋa ʋakaɀidza Jehova.
Ɀino wakati apedza kutaura mashoko awa ose, pasi paʋo pakatsemuka,
nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo, ikaʋamedza, iʋo nemhuri dzaʋo, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaKora, nenhumbi dzaʋo dzose.
Naiɀoɀo iʋo, neɀose ɀaʋo, ʋakaɓurukira kubgiro ʋari ʋapenyu; ivu rikaʋafukidza, ʋakaparadzwa pakati peʋuŋgano.
Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋakomba ʋakatiza nokucema kwaʋo, nokuti ʋakati: Nyika irege kutimedza ʋo.
Ipapo mŋoto ukaɓuɗa kunaJehova, ukaparadza ʋarume aʋo ʋaiʋa namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu, ʋakaŋga ʋacipisira ɀinonhuwira.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naEreazari, mŋanakomana waAroni muprista, kuti anoŋge haryana dzeɀinonhuwira pakati pomŋoto, iwe uparadzire mŋoto kure, nokuti
idzo haryana dzeɀinonhuwira dzaʋanhu aʋo ʋakatadza ʋakaʋurawa, dzipambadzirwe, kufukidza artari nadzo; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya nadzo pamberi paJehova, naiɀoɀo itȿene; cicaʋa ciratidzo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino muprista Ereazari wakatora haryana dzeɀinonhuwira dzendarira, dzakaŋga dzaʋuyiswa naʋakazopiswa, akadzipambadzira kuti artari ifukidzwe nadzo;

kuti ciʋe ciraŋgaridzo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti mutorwa, usati ari worudzi rwaAroni, arege kusweɗera kuti apise ɀinonhuwira pamberi paJehova, arege kuzoitirwa saKora neɓoka rake; seɀakataura Jehova naye nomuromo waMosesi.
Fume maŋgwana ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri yakapopotera Mosesi naAroni, ʋaciti: Imi makaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋaJehova.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yakati yaʋuŋgana kuzorwa naMosesi naAroni, ʋakatarira kutente rokusoŋgana, ʋakaʋona kuti gore rarifukidza, nokubginya kwaJehova kukaʋonekwa.
Ipapo Mosesi naAroni ʋakandomira pamberi petente rokusoŋgana,
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ibvai paʋuŋgano iyi, ndiʋaparadze pakarepo. Iʋo ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo.

Mosesi akati kunaAroni: Tora haryana yako yeɀinonhuwira, uise mŋoto unobva paartari mukati mayo, nokuisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamsoro payo, ukurumbidze kuenda naɀo kuʋuŋgano, uʋayananisire; nokuti Jehova watsamŋa, ɗenda rataŋga.
Aroni akaitora, seɀakataura Mosesi, akamhanyira pakati peʋuŋgano, ʋonei ɗenda rakaŋga rataŋga pakati paʋanhu; akaisa ɀinonhuwira pamsoro payo, akayananisira ʋanhu.
Akandomira pakati paʋakafa naʋapenyu, ɗenda rikaguma.
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋafa neɗenda ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinegumi neɀinna namazana manomŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋafa nokuɗa kwaKora ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Ipapo Aroni akadzokera kunaMosesi kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ɗenda rikaguma.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:

Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, utore kwaʋari tȿimbo, imŋe paimba imŋe neimŋe yamadziɓaɓa aʋo, tȿimbo dzinegumi nembiri, pamacinda aʋo ose nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo; ɀino unofanira kunyora zita romumŋe nomumŋe patȿimbo yake.
Asi zita raAroni unofanira kurinyora patȿimbo yaRevi; nokuti kunofanira kuʋa netȿimbo imŋe yomukuru mumŋe nomumŋe wedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀino unofanira kudziceŋgeta mutente rokusoŋgana pamberi peareka yecipupuriro, pandinosoŋgana nemi.
Ipapo munhu wandicatsaura, tȿimbo yake icaɓuka, kuti ndigumise kunyunyuta kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri kwaʋanokunyunyutira nako.

Ɀino Mosesi akataura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, macinda aʋo ose akamupa tȿimbo, imŋe yomucinda mumŋe nomumŋe nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ndidzo tȿimbo gumi nembiri; netȿimbo yaAroni yakaŋga iri pakati petȿimbo dzaʋo.
Mosesi akaceŋgeta tȿimbo idzo pamberi paJehova mutente recipupuriro.
Fume maŋgwana Mosesi akapinda mutente recipupuriro, ʋonei tȿimbo yaAroni yeimba yaRevi yakaŋga yaɓuka, yaʋa namaɓukira, yaɓuɗisa maruʋa, yaɓereka maamanda akaŋga aibva.
Ipapo Mosesi akaɓuɗisa tȿimbo dzose pamberi paJehova kuʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ʋose; ʋakatarira, mumŋe nomumŋe akatora tȿimbo yake.
Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Dzosera tȿimbo yaAroni pamberi pecipupuriro, iceŋgetwe ciʋe ciratidzo caʋanhu ʋakandimukira; kuti ugumise kundinyunyutira kwaʋo, ʋarege kufa.
Mosesi akaita saiɀoɀo; seɀaakarairwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀaakaita.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakataura naMosesi, ʋakati: Tarira, tofa, topera, topera tose.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unosweɗera, unosweɗera kutabernakeri yaJehova, unofa; ɀino ticafa tose kanhi?

Ɀino Jehova akati kunaAroni: Iwe naʋanakomana ʋako, naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako pamŋe cete newe, munofanira kutakura ɀakaipa ɀeimba tȿene; iwe naʋanakomana ʋako pamŋe cete newe munofanira kutakura ɀakaipa ɀoʋuprista bgenyu.
Nehama dzako dzorudzi rwaRevi, dzorudzi rwaɓaɓa ʋako, udzisweɗedze pamŋe cete newe, dziʋe newe, dzikuɓatire; asi iwe naʋanakomana ʋako pamŋe cete newe, munofanira kuʋa pamberi petente recipupuriro.
Ʋanofanira kukuceŋgeta iwe nokuceŋgeta Tente rose; asi haʋafaniri kusweɗera kunhumbi dzeimba tȿene neartari, kuti ʋarege kufa, kana iʋo kana imi.
Ʋanofanira kuʋa newe, nokuceŋgeta tente rokusoŋgana, nokuita maɓasa ose eTente; usina‐kufanira haafaniri kusweɗera kwamuri.
Munofanira kuceŋgeta imba tȿene, nokuceŋgeta artari, kuti kutsamŋa kurege kuʋuya pamsoro paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ini ndimene, tarirai, ndakatsaura hama dzenyu ʋaRevi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋaʋe cipo kwamuri,
Iwe naʋana ʋako pamŋe cete newe munofanira kuɓate‐ɓasa roʋuprista bgenyu paɀinhu ɀose ɀeartari, neɀose ɀiri mukati mecidzitiro;

Jehova akataura ʋo naAroni, akati: Ini, tarira, ndakakupa ɓasa rokuceŋgeta ɀipiriso ɀaŋgu ɀinotsaurwa, iɀo ɀinhu ɀose ɀakatsaurwa ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri; ndakakupa iɀo uʋe mugoʋe wako nowaʋanakomana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀinhu iɀi ndiɀo ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀako paɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀikuru,
Munofanira kuɀidya panɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene; ʋarume ʋose ʋanofanira kuɀidya; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀitȿene kwamuri.

Iɀi ndiɀo ɀako: Cipiriso cinotsaurwa ceɀipo ɀaʋo, iɀo ɀipiriso ɀose ɀinozuŋguzirwa ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri; ndakakupa iɀo, iwe, naʋanakomana ʋako, naʋanasikana ʋako pamŋe cete newe, ɀiʋe ɀenyu nokusiŋgaperi; ʋose ʋakanaka mumba mako ʋaŋgaɀidya.
Ndakakupa mafuta ose akaiȿo‐naka, newaini yakaiȿo‐naka, neɀiyo ɀose ɀakaiȿo‐naka, iɀo ɀitȿa ɀaɀo ɀaʋanopa Jehova.
Ɀiɓereko ɀitȿa ɀose ɀeɀose ɀiri munyika yaʋo, ɀaʋanoʋuya naɀo kunaJehova, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀako; mumŋe nomumŋe wakanaka mumba mako uŋgaɀidya.
Ɀose ɀakayeriswa pakati paIsraeri ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀako.

Ɀose ɀinotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, panyama yose yaʋanoʋuyisa kunaJehova, kana ɀiri ɀaʋanhu, kana ɀeɀipfuwo, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀako; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mataŋgwe aʋanhu unofanira kuadzikinura; ʋana ʋose ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo unofanira kuʋadzikinura ʋo.
Ɀose ɀinofanira kudzikinurwa paɀiri, ɀomŋedzi mumŋe neɀinopfuʋura, unofanira kuɀidzikinura seɀaunotara iwe, nemari inoȿika pamashekeri

Asi usadzikinura mŋana wemhoŋgora yeŋombe, kana yegwai, kana yembudzi; ɀitȿene; unofanira kusasa ropa raɀo pamsoro peartari, nokupisa mafuta aɀo, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Asi nyama yaɀo inofanira kuʋa yako, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀako secityu cinozuŋguzirwa neɓandauko rorudyi.

Ɀipiriso ɀose ɀinotsaurwa ɀeɀinhu ɀinopiwa Jehova naʋana ʋaIsraeri, ndakakupa iɀo, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako pamŋe cete newe, ɀiʋe ɀako nokusiŋgaperi; isuŋgano yomunyu nokusiŋgaperi pamberi paJehova, kwauri naʋazukuru ʋako pamŋe cete newe.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaAroni: Iwe hauŋgaʋi nenhaka panyika yaʋo, hauŋgaʋi nomugoʋe pakati paʋo; ini ndiri mugoʋe wako nenhaka yako pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Tarira, ʋana ʋaRevi ndakaʋapa ɀegumi ɀeɀose ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋe nhaka yaʋo, uʋe muɓayiro weɓasa raʋanoɓata, iro ɓasa rapatente rokusoŋgana.
Kubva ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ŋgaʋarege kusweɗera kutente rukosoŋgana, kuti ʋarege kuʋa nemhoȿa yeɀiʋi ɀaʋo, ʋakafa.

Asi ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kuɓate‐ɓasa rapatente rokusoŋgana, iʋo ʋanofanira kutakura ɀakaipa ɀaʋo; unofanira kuʋa mutemo nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose; haʋaŋgaʋi nenhaka pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti ɀegumi ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀaʋanopa Jehova, ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀinotsaurwa, ndiɀo ɀandakapa ʋaRevi, kuti iʋe nhaka yaʋo; naiɀoɀo ndakati kwaʋari, haʋaŋgaʋi nenhaka pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋaRevi, uti kwaʋari: Kana mucitora kuʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀegumi ɀaʋo ɀandakakupai, kuti iʋe nhaka yenyu, munofanira kupa Jehova cegumi ceɀegumi iɀo, ciʋe cipiriso cinotsaurwa.
Cipiriso cenyu cinotsaurwa cicaʋereŋgwa kwamuri seɀiyo ɀiri paɓuriro, ʋuye sewaini izere muciȿiniro cewaini.
Saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo mucapa Jehova cipiriso cinotsaurwa ceɀegumi ɀenyu ɀose ɀamunopiwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri; ɀino kunaiɀoɀo munofanira kupa Aroni muprista cipiriso cinotsaurwa caJehova.
Paɀose ɀamunopiwa, munofanira kupa Jehova ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀose ɀinotsaurwa, mucitsaura ɀakaiȿo‐naka kwaɀiri, mugoʋe wakatsaurwa pakati paɀo.
Naiɀoɀo uti kwaʋari: Kana matsaura ɀakaiȿo‐naka kwaɀiri, ɀinofanira kuʋereŋgerwa ʋaRevi seɀakapurwa paɓuriro, neɀakaȿiniwa paciȿiniro cewaini.
Munofanira kuɀidya panɀimbo dzose, imi nemhuri dzenyu; nokuti ndiwo muɓairo wenyu weɓasa ramunoɓata patente rokusoŋgana.
Hamuŋgazoʋi neɀiʋi nokuɗa kwaɀo, kana mambotsaura ɀakaiȿo‐naka kwaɀiri; hamufaniri kuɀidza ɀinhu ɀitȿene ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti murege kufa.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi naAroni, akati:
Ndiwo murairo wakarairwa naJehova, aciti: Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaʋuye kwauri netsiru dɀuku risinemhoȿa, risina‐kuremara, risina‐kumboiswa joko.
Ɀino munofanira kuripa Ereazari muprista, iye ariɓuɗise kunze kwemisasa, rigoʋurawa pamberi pake.
Ipapo Ereazari muprista unofanira kutora ropa raro nomunwe wake, nokusasa ropa raro kanomŋe kurutiʋi rwemberi rwetente rokusoŋgana;
ɀino tsiru rinofanira kupiswa pamberi pake; ɗebge raro, nenyama yaro, neropa raro, pamŋe cete namaɀiɀi aro, ɀinofanira kupiswa.
Ɀino muprista unofanira kutora rutanda rwomusidari nehisopi, nomuceka mutȿuku, ndokuɀikandira pakati pomŋoto unopisa tsiru.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura, ndokuzopinda mumisasa, muprista agoʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Nomunhu unoripisa unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake nemvura, nokushambidza muʋiri wake nemvura, agoʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Ɀino mumŋe munhu wakanaka unofanira kuʋuŋganidza maɗota etsiru, ndokuaceŋgeta kunze kwemisasa panɀimbo yakanaka, kuti aceŋgeterwe ʋuŋgano yaʋana ʋaIsraeri,
Ɀino iye wakaʋuŋganidza maɗota etsiru, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, agoʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko; unofanira kuʋa mutemo usiŋgaperi kuʋana ʋaIsraeri nokuʋatorwa ʋagere pakati paʋo.
Munhu unoɓata citunha comunhu upi noupi, unofanira kuʋa usina‐kunaka mazuʋa manomŋe.
Iye unofanira kuɀinatsa nayo nezuʋa retatu, agoʋa wakanaka nezuʋa recinomŋe; asi kana asiŋgaɀinatsi nezuʋa retatu, haaŋgaʋi wakanaka nezuʋa recinomŋe.

Aninani unoɓata wakafa, ciri citunha comunhu upi noupi wakafa, akasaɀinatsa, unoȿiɓisa tabernakeri yaJehova; munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati paʋaIsraeri; mvura inonatsa ɀaisinakusaswa pamsoro pake, unofanira kuʋa usina‐kunaka; tȿina yake iciri kwaari.
Ndiwo murairo kana munhu akafa mutente: Mumŋe nomumŋe unopinda mutente, nomumŋe nomumŋe uri mutente, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nemidziyo yose yakashama, isinecifunhiro cakasuŋgirwa, icaʋa isina‐kunaka.
Aninani unoɓata munhu wakaʋurawa kusaŋgo nomunondo, kana citunha, kana fupa romunhu, kana bgiro, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino munhu usina‐kunaka unofanira kundotorerwa maɗota ecipiriso ceɀiʋi cakapiswa, mvura inoyerera igoɗirwa pamsoro pawo mumudziyo,

ɀino munhu wakanaka unofanira kutora hisopi, ndokuinyika mumvura, ndokuisasa patente, napanhumbi dzose, napaʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa’po, napamunhu wakaɓata fupa, kana wakaŋga aʋurawa, kana wakafa, kana bgiro;

ɀino munhu wakanaka unofanira kusasa munhu usina‐kunaka nezuʋa retatu nerecinomŋe; nezuʋa recinomŋe unofanira kumunatsa; ɀino iye unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake, nokuɀishambidza nemvura, agoʋa wakanaka maɗeko.
Asi kana munhu akaȿiɓiswa akasaɀinatsa, munhu uyo unofanira kubviswa pakati peʋuŋgano, nokuti waȿiɓisa imba tȿene yaJehova; mvura inonatsa haina‐kusaswa pamsoro pake; haana‐kunaka.
Unofanira kuʋa mutemo usiŋgaperi kwaʋari. Munhu unosasa mvura inonatsa, unofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzake; naiye unoɓata mvura inonatsa, ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Neɀose ɀinoɓatwa nomunhu usina‐kunaka, ɀicaʋa ɀisina‐kunaka; nomunhu unoɀiɓata ucaʋa usina‐kunaka kuȿikira maɗeko.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋuŋgano yose, ʋakaȿika murenje reZini nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, ʋanhu ʋakagara paKadeshi. Miriami akafira’po, akaʋigwa ʋo ’po.
Ipapo pakaŋga pasine‐mvura yokunwa yeʋuŋgano yose; ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaʋuŋganira kunaMosesi naAroni.
Ʋanhu ʋakarwa naMosesi, ʋakataura, ʋaciti: Ƌai takafa heɗu ŋguʋa yakafa hama dzeɗu pamberi paJehova!
Makaʋuyisireiko ʋuŋgano yaJehova murenje rino, kuti tifire’mo, isu neɀipfuwo ɀeɗu?
Makatiɓuɗisireiko muEgipita, kuzotiisa panɀimbo iyi yakaipa? Haizi nɀimbo yembeu, kana yamaʋonde, kana yemizambiriŋga, kana yamatamba; nemvura yokunwa hapana.
Ipapo Mosesi naAroni ʋakabva paʋuŋgano, ʋakaenda kumukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo; kubginya kwaJehova kukaratidzwa kwaʋari.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Tora tȿimbo, uʋuŋganidze ʋuŋgano, iwe naAroni mukuru wako, mutaure neɗombo pamberi paʋo, kuti riɓuɗise mvura yaro; unofanira kuʋaɓuɗisira mvura paɗombo, unwise ʋuŋgano neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo.
Ipapo Mosesi akatora tȿimbo, yakaŋga iri pamberi paJehova, seɀaakaŋga arairwa naye.
Mosesi naAroni ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋuŋgano pamberi peɗombo, akati kwaʋari: Ɀino, cinzwai, imi ʋokumukira
Ipapo Mosesi akasimudza ruʋoko rwake, akaroʋa ɗombo kaʋiri netȿimbo yake, mvura ikaɓuɗa zhinji‐zhinji, ʋuŋgano ikanwa, neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi naAroni: Ɀamusina‐kutenda kwandiri, kunditsaura pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri, hamuŋgapinzi ʋuŋgano iyi munyika yandakaipa.
Ndiyo mvura yeMeriba, nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakarwa naJehova, akaɀiratidza kwaʋari ari Mutȿene.
Ɀino Mosesi akatuma nhume, dzaibva Kadeshi, kunamambo weEdomi, aciti: Ɀanzi nomunuŋuna wako Israeri: Unoziʋa nhamo dzose dzakatiwira;
kuti madziɓaɓa eɗu akaɓurukira Egipita, tikagara Egipita ŋguʋa huru, ʋaEgipita ʋakatiitira ɀakaipa, isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu;
ɀino takati ticicema kunaJehova, iye akanzwa manzwi eɗu, akatuma mutumŋa kutiɓuɗisa paEgipita; ɀino tarirai, tiri paKadeshi, paguta riri pamuganho wenyika yako;

ɗotitendera kupfuʋura napanyika yako; hatiŋgafambi napaminda, kana napaminda yemizambiriŋga; hatiŋganwi mvura yamatsime; ticafamba nenzira huru yamambo; hatiŋgatsaukiri kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe, kuȿikira taɓuɗa panyika yako.
Ipapo Edomi akati kwaari: Hauŋgapfuʋuri nokwandiri, kuti ndirege kuʋuya kuzorwa newe nomunondo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kwaari: Ticakwira nenzira huru; kana tikanwa mvura yako, ini neɀipfuwo ɀaŋgu, ndicaripa muteŋgo wayo; nditendere kwoga kupfuʋura namakumbo aŋgu, hakunerimŋe shoko.
Iye akati: Hauŋgapfuʋuri. Ɀino Edomi akaʋuya kuzorwa naye naʋanhu ʋazhinji, noruʋoko runesimba.
Naiɀoɀo Edomi wakaramba kutendera ʋaIsraeri kupfuʋura napanyika yake. Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋakatsauka kwaari.
Ɀino ʋakasimuka paKadeshi, ʋana ʋaIsraeri, iyo ʋuŋgano yose, ʋakaȿika pagomo reHori.
Ipapo Jehova akataura naMosesi naAroni pagomo reHori, pamuganho wenyika yaEdomi, akati:
Aroni ucasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake, nokuti haaŋgapindi munyika yandakapa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, nokuti makaramba shoko raŋgu pamvura yeMeriba.
Tora Aroni nomŋanakomana wake Ereazari, ukwire naʋo pagomo reHori;
ɀino ubvise ŋguʋo dzake, ugodzifukidza Ereazari mŋanakomana wake; ipapo Aroni ucasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake, ucafira’po.
Mosesi akaita seɀaakarairwa naJehova; ʋakakwira pagomo reHori pamberi peʋuŋgano yose.
Ɀino Mosesi wakabvisa ŋguʋo dzaAroni, akadzifukidza Ereazari mŋanakomana wake; Aroni akafira’po pamusoro wegomo; Mosesi naEreazari ʋakaɓuruka haʋo pagomo.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yakati iciʋona kuti Aroni wafa, ʋakacema Aroni mazuʋa makumi matatu, iyo imba yose yaIsraeri.
Ɀino mambo weAradi, muKanani, wakaŋga agere kunyika yeZasi, wakati anzwa kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋoʋuya nenzira yeAtarimi, akarwa naʋaIsraeri, akatapa ʋamŋe ʋaʋo.
Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋakapikira Jehova mhiko, ʋakati: Kana mukapa ʋanhu aʋa mumaʋoko eɗu, ticaparadza maguta aʋo cose.
Jehova akaterera inzwi raʋaIsraeri, akaʋapa ʋaKanani; ʋakaʋaparadza cose namaguta aʋo; nɀimbo iyo ikanzi Horma.
Ɀino ʋakasimuka pagomo reHori, ʋakafamba nenzira inoenda kuGuŋgwa Dɀuku, kuti ʋanyenyeredze nyika yaEdomi; ʋanhu ʋakapera mŋoyo kwaɀo panzira.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakapopotera Mŋari naMosesi, ʋakati: Makatiɓuɗisireiko Egipita, kuti tifire murenje? Nokuti hapane‐ɀokudya, hapane‐mvura; mŋeya yeɗu inosema ɀokudya iɀi ɀakaipa.
Jehova akatuma nyoka dzinopeŋga pakati paʋanhu, dzikaruma ʋanhu, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaIsraeri ʋakafa.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaʋuya kunaMosesi, ʋakati: Takatadza, nokuti takapopotera Jehova nemi; kumbirai kunaJehova kuti abvise nyoka kwatiri. Mosesi akakumbirira ʋanhu.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Uɀiitire nyoka inopeŋga, ugoiturika paɗanda; ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe wakarumŋa kana akaitarira, ucararama.
Mosesi akaita nyoka yendarira, akaiturika paɗanda; ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe wakati kana arumŋa, akatarira nyoka iyo yendarira, wakararama.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paOboti.
Ʋakabva Oboti, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paIje‐abarimi, murenje riri pamberi paMoabi, kumabvazuʋa.
Ʋakafamba ʋacibva ipapo, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo pamupata weZeredi.
Ʋakafamba ʋacibva ipapo, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo kumhiri kwaArnoni, rwizi rwaiʋa murenje, rwaibva kunyika yaʋaAmori; nokuti Arnoni ndiwo muganho waʋaMoabi, pakati paMoabi naʋaAmori.
Naiɀoɀo pabuku yeHondo dzaJehova panoti:
Vahebi paSufa,
Nemipata yaArnoni,
Nemikwidzwa yemipata
Inorerekera kunɀimbo yeAri,
Inosendamira pamuganho waMoabi.
Ʋakafamba ʋacibva ipapo, ʋakaenda Beeri; ndiro tsime rakanzi naJehova kunaMosesi: Ʋuŋganidza ʋanhu, ndicaʋapa mvura.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakaimba rwiyo urwu:
Civaira, iwe tsime; imi muriimbire;
Ndiro tsime rakacerwa namacinda,
Rakacerwa naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu
Netȿimbo yoʋushe, ʋuye netȿimbo dzaʋo.
Ʋakabva murenje, ʋakaenda Matana;
ʋakabva Matana, ʋakaenda Naharieri; ʋakabva Naharieri, ʋakaenda Bamoti;
ʋakabva Bamoti, ʋakaenda kumupata uri kuɓani raMoabi, kuȿikira kumusoro
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakatuma nhume kunaSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, ʋaciti:
Nditendere kupfuʋura napanyika yako; hatiŋgatsaukiri kumunda kana kumunda wemizambiriŋga; hatiŋganwi mvura yamatsime; ticafamba nenzira huru yamambo, kuȿikira taɓuɗa panyika yako.
Asi Sihoni wakaramba kutendera ʋaIsraeri kupfuʋura napanyika yake; Sihoni akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋake ʋose, akaenda kurenje kundorwa naʋaIsraeri, akaȿika paJahazi; akarwa naʋaIsraeri.
Asi ʋaIsraeri ʋakamukunda neminondo inopinza, ʋakatora nyika yake kubva paArnoni kuȿikira paJaboki, kuȿikira paʋana ʋaAmoni; nokuti muganho waʋana ʋaAmoni wakaŋga wakasimba.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakakunda maguta iwayo ose; ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara mumaguta ose aʋaAmori, muHeshboni napamisha yaro yose.
Nokuti Heshboni rakaŋga riri guta raSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, iye wakaŋga arwa namambo wokutaŋga waMoabi, akamutorera nyika yake yose kuȿikira paArnoni.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanotaura neshumo ʋanoti:
Ʋuyai muHeshboni,
Guta raSihoni ŋgariʋakwe, risimbiswe;
Nokuti mŋoto wakaɓuɗa muHeshboni,
Nomuraɀo paguta raSihoni,
Ukaparadza Ari waMoabi,
Madzishe enɀimbo dzakakwirira dzaArnoni.
Unenhamo iwe Moabi!
Mapera imi ʋanhu ʋeKemoshi;
Wakapa
Naʋanasikana ʋake ʋatapxe,
Sihoni, mambo waʋaAmori.
Takaʋafura; Heshboni raparadzwa kuȿikira paDiboni,
Takaparadza kuȿikira paNofa,
Mŋoto ukaȿika paMedeba.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara munyika yaʋaAmori.
Ɀino Mosesi akatuma ʋanhu kundoshora Jazeri, ʋakakunda misha yaro, ʋakadziŋga ʋaAmori ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo.
Ipapo ʋakadzoka, ʋakakwira nenzira inoenda Bashani; ɀino Ogi, mambo weBashani, akaʋuya kuzorwa naʋo paEdrei, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Usamutya hako, nokuti ndakamupa mumaʋoko ako, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose, nenyika yake; unofanira kumuitira iye seɀawakaitira Sihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, waigara paHeshboni.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakamukunda, iye naʋanakomana ʋake ʋose, kudzimana asina‐kusarirwa nomumŋe; ʋakatora nyika yake.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo pamapani eMoabi, mhiri kwaJoridani paJeriko.
Ɀino Baraki, mŋanakomana waZipori, wakaŋga aʋona ɀose ɀakaitirwa ʋaAmori naʋaIsraeri.
Moabi akatya ʋanhu aʋo kwaɀo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋazhinji; Moabi akavunduka nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Ipapo Moabi akati kuʋakuru ʋaMidiani: Ɀino ʋanhu aʋa ʋazhinji ʋacananɀa ɀose ɀakatipoteredza, seŋombe inonanɀa ʋuswa bgesaŋgo; Baraki, mŋanakomana waZipori ndiye wakaŋga ari mambo waMoabi neŋguʋa iyo.
Ipapo akatuma nhume kunaBarami, mŋanakomana waBeori, paPetori paRwizi, kunyika yaʋana ʋorudzi rwake, kuzomuɗana, aciti: Tarira,

Naiɀoɀo ɗoʋuya hako ɀino, unditukire ʋanhu aʋa; nokuti ʋanondikurira nesimba; ɀimŋe ndiŋgagona kuʋakunda, ndiʋadziŋge munyika ino; nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti munhu wakaropafadzwa newe, wakaropafadzwa kwaɀo, ʋuye munhu wakatukwa newe, wakatukwa kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋaMoabi naʋakuru ʋaMidiani ʋakaenda ʋakaɓata shanu yokuʋuka mumaʋoko aʋo, ʋakaȿika kunaBarami, ʋakamuʋudza mashoko aBaraki.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ʋatai ʋusiku bguno pano, ndikudzoserei neshoko, seɀandicaʋudzwa naJehova; macinda aMoabi akagara’po kunaBaraki.
Ɀino Mŋari akaʋuya kunaBarami, akati: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋari kwauri ndiʋananiko?
Barami akati kunaMŋari: Baraki, mŋanakomana waZipori, mambo waMoabi, wakatuma
Tarira, ʋanhu ʋakabva Egipita ʋakafukidza nyika yose; ɀino, ʋuya unditukire iʋo; ɀimŋe ndiŋgagona kurwa naʋo, nokuʋadziŋga.
Ipapo Mŋari akati kunaBarami: Haufaniri kuenda naʋo; haufaniri kutuka ʋanhu aʋo; nokuti ʋakaropafadzwa.
Barami akamuka maŋgwanani, akati kumacinda aBaraki: Endai kunyika yenyu, nokuti Jehova unoramba kunditendera kuenda nemi.
Ipapo macinda aMoabi akasimuka, akaenda kunaBaraki, akati: Barami waramba kuʋuya nesu.
Ɀino Baraki akapamha ɀe kutuma macinda mazhinji kunaiʋo naʋakakudzwa kupfuʋura iʋo.
Ʋakaȿika kunaBarami, ʋakati kwaari: Ɀanzi naBaraki, mŋanakomana waZipori: Usatendera cinhu kukudziʋisa kuʋuya kwandiri;
nokuti ndicakukudza ɀikuru kwaɀo, ɀose ɀaunondiraira ndicaɀiita; naiɀoɀo ɗoʋuya hako unditukire ʋanhu aʋa.
Barami akapindura, akati kuʋaranda ʋaBaraki: Kunyaŋge Baraki akandipa imba yake izere nesirveri nendarama, handiŋgagoni kuɗarika shoko raJehova Mŋari waŋgu, kuti nditapudze kana ndiwedzere kwariri.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino nemi ʋo ɗoʋatai henyu pano ʋusiku bguno, kuti ndiziʋe ɀandicaʋudzwa ɀe naJehova.
Ɀino Mŋari akaʋuya kunaBarami ʋusiku, akati kwaari: Ʋanhu aʋa kana ʋakaʋuya kuzokuɗana simuka uende naʋo; asi shoko randicataura kwauri, unofanira kuita iro roga.
Ɀino Barami akamuka maŋgwanani, akaisa cigaro pamboŋgoro yake, akaenda namacinda aMoabi.
Asi Mŋari wakamutsamŋira, ɀaakaenda; mutumŋa waJehova akandomira munzira yake, kuti arwe naye. Ɀino iye wakaŋga akataȿa mboŋgoro yake, naʋaranda ʋake ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋanaye.
Ipapo mboŋgoro ikaʋona mutumŋga waJehova amire munzira, anomunondo wakavomorwa muruʋoko rwake; mboŋgoro ikatsauka panzira, ikaenda nokusaŋgo; Barami akaroʋa mboŋgoro kuti aidzorere kunzira.
Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova akandomira panzira nhete pakati peminda yemizambiriŋga, ruȿiŋgo ruri kurutiʋi runo, noruȿiŋgo kunorumŋe rutiʋi ɀe.
Mboŋgoro ikaʋona mutumŋa waJehova, ikaɀisundira kuruȿiŋgo, ikambandidzira rutsoka rwaBarami paruȿiŋgo; ipapo akairoʋa ɀe.
Mutumŋa waJehova akapfuʋura mberi, akandomira pakaŋga pakamanikana, pakaŋga pasinenɀimbo yokutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe.
Mboŋgoro ikaʋona mutumŋa waJehova, ikaʋata pasi, Barami ari pamsoro payo; Barami akatsamŋa, akaroʋa mboŋgoro netȿimbo yake.
Ɀino Jehova akashamisa muromo wemboŋgoro, ikati kunaBarami: Ndakakuitireiko, ɀamandiroʋa ɀino katatu?
Barami akati kumboŋgoro: Nokuti wakandiɗaɗira; ɗai ndaiʋa nomunondo muruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndiŋgaɗai ndakuʋuraya pakarepo.
Mboŋgoro ikati kunaBarami: Ko ini handizi mboŋgoro yenyu yamakataȿa makore enyu ose kuȿikira zuʋa rino here? Ko ndaigara ndicikuitirai saiɀoɀo here? Iye akati: Kwete.
Ipapo Jehova akaȿinudza meso aBarami, akaʋona mutumŋa waJehova amire munzira, anomunondo wakavomorwa muruʋoko rwake; akakotamisa musoro wake, akawira pasi neciso cake.
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kwaari: Waroʋereiko mboŋgoro yako ɀino katatu? Tarira, ini ndimene ndaɓuɗa kuzokudziʋisa, nokuti nzira yako inoʋaʋarira kuneɀakaipa pamberi paŋgu.
Mboŋgoro yakandiʋona, ikatsauka pamberi paŋgu katatu; ɗai isinakutsauka pamberi paŋgu, ɀirokwaɀo ndiŋgaɗai ndakuʋuraya iwe, ndikairaramisa iyo.
Ipapo Barami akati kumutumŋa waJehova: Ndatadza, nokuti ndakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi kuti ndiwe wakaŋga umire munzira ucindidziʋisa; naiɀoɀo ɀino, kana usiŋgafari naɀo, ndicadzoka haŋgu.
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kunaBarami: Enda hako naʋarume aʋa, asi shoko roga randicataura kwauri, ndiro raunofanira kutaura. Naiɀoɀo Barami akaenda namacinda aBaraki.
Ɀino Baraki wakati anzwa kuti Barami waȿika, akaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naye paIri‐Moabi riri pamuganho weArnoni, pamugumo wenyika.
Ɀino Baraki akati kunaBarami: Ko handina‐kutuma
Barami akati kunaBaraki: Tarira, ndaʋuya kwauri; ko ini ndinesimba rokutaura cinhu here? Shoko rinoiswa mumuromo maŋgu naMŋari, ndiro randicataura.
Ɀino Barami akaenda naBaraki, akaȿika paKiriati‐huzoti.
Baraki akaɓaya nzombe namakwai, akaɀitumira kunaBarami namacinda akaŋga anaye.
Ɀino maŋgwanani Baraki akatora Barami, akamukwidza panɀimbo dzakakwirira dzaBaari, akaʋona, ari’po, ʋanhu ʋokumudziʋo.
Ɀino Barami akati kunaBaraki: Ndiʋakire pano artari nomŋe, undigadzirire pano nzombe nomŋe namakondobge manomŋe.
Baraki akaita seɀakataura Barami; Baraki naBarami ʋakaɓayira paartari imŋe neimŋe nzombe imŋe negondobge rimŋe.

Ɀino Barami akati kunaBaraki: Cimira iwe pacipiriso cako cinopiswa, asi ini ndicaenda; ɀimŋe Jehova ucaʋuya kuzosoŋgana neni; ɀose ɀaanondiratidza, ndicakuʋudza iɀo. Akaenda pakakwirira, pakaŋga pasinecinhu.
Ipapo Mŋari akasoŋgana naBarami, iye akati kwaari: Ndagadzira artari nomŋe, ndikaɓayira nzombe negondobge paartari imŋe neimŋe.
Jehova akaisa shoko mumuromo waBarami, akati: Dzokera kunaBaraki, utaure kwaari kuɗai.
Akadzokera kwaari, akamuwana amire pacipiriso cake cinopiswa, iye namacinda ose aMoabi.
Ipapo akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Baraki wakanditora paArami,
Mambo waMoabi
Ʋuya, unditsamŋire Israeri.
Ini ndiŋgatuka seiko usina‐kutukwa naMŋari;
Ini ndiŋgatsamŋira seiko usina‐kutsamŋirwa naJehova?
Nokuti ndinomuʋona ndiri pamsoro pamatombo,
Ndinomutarira ndiri pamsoro peɀikomo;
Tarira, ndiʋanhu ʋanogara ʋari ʋoga,
Haʋaŋgaʋereŋgwi pakati pendudzi.
Ndianiko uŋgaʋereŋga guruʋa raJakobo,
Kana kuʋereŋga cikamu cecinna caIsraeri?
Kuguma kwaŋgu ŋgakufanane nokwake!
Ɀino Baraki akati kunaBarami: Wandiiteiko? Ndandokutora kuti utuke ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu; tarira, waramba uciŋgoʋaropafadza.
Akapindura, akati: Ko handifaniri kucenjera kuti nditaure ɀinoiswa naJehova mumuromo maŋgu here?
Baraki akati kwaari: Ƌoʋuya hako neni kuneimŋe nɀimbo, pauŋgaʋaʋona uri’po; uŋgaŋgoʋona ʋokumudziʋo ʋoga, hauŋgaʋaʋoni ʋose; nditukirei iʋo uri ipapo.
Ɀino akaenda naye kumunda waZofimi, pamsoro pePisga, akaʋaka artari nomŋe, akaɓayira nzombe negondobge paartari imŋe neimŋe.
Akati kunaBaraki: Cimira pano pacipiriso cako cinopiswa, ini ndindosoŋgana
Ipapo Jehova akasoŋgana naBarami, akaisa shoko mumuromo make, akati: Dzokera kunaBaraki, utaure kuɗai.
Iye akaenda kwaari, akamuwana amire pacipiriso cake cinopiswa, macinda aMoabi anaye. Baraki akati kwaari: Jehova wakataureiko?
Ipapo akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Simuka, iwe Baraki, unzwe;
Nditerere, iwe mŋanakomana waZipori:
Mŋari haazi munhu, haaŋgareʋi nhema;
Kunyaŋge mŋanakomana womunhu, haaŋgashanduki;
Caakataura, haaŋgaciiti kanhi?
Caakataura, haaŋgacisimbisi kanhi?
Tarira, ndakarairwa kuti ndiropafadze;
Iye wakaropafadza, ini handigoni kuɀishandura.
Haana‐kuʋona ɀakaipa kunaJakobo;
Haana‐kuʋona ɀakashata kunaIsraeri;
Jehova Mŋari wake unaye,
Ʋanopupurira mambo pakati paʋo.
Mŋari wakaʋaɓuɗisa Egipita,
Unesimba rakafanana nerenyati.
Ɀirokwaɀo hakunoʋuŋaŋga kunaJakobo,
Ʋuye hakuno‐kuʋuka kunaIsraeri;
Ɀino ɀicarebga pamsoro paJakobo napamsoro paIsraeri,
Ɀakaitwa naMŋari.
Tarirai, ʋanhu
Ʋanosimuka seshumba.
Haʋaŋgaʋati pasi ʋasati ʋadya cakaɓatwa,
Nokunwa ropa recakaʋurawa.
Ɀino Baraki akati kunaBarami: Usatoŋgoʋatuka, kana kutoŋgoʋaropafadza.
Asi Barami wakapindura, akati kunaBaraki: Handina‐kukuʋudza here, ndikati: Ɀose ɀinotaurwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀandinofanira kuita?
Baraki akati kunaBarami: Ʋuya ɀino, ndiende newe kuneimŋe nɀimbo; ɀimŋe Mŋari uŋgafara naɀo kuti unditukire iʋo, uri ipapo.
Ɀino Baraki akaenda naBarami pamsoro pePeori, panotarira pasi kurenje.
Barami akati kunaBaraki: Ndiʋakire pano artari nomŋe, undigadzirire pano nzombe nomŋe namakondobge manomŋe.
Baraki akaita seɀakarebga naBarami, akaɓayira nzombe negondobge paartari imŋe neimŋe.
Ɀino Barami wakati aciʋona kuti ɀakaŋga ɀicifadza Jehova kuropafadza Israeri, haana‐kuzoenda sapanedzimŋe ŋguʋa, kutȿaka ʋuŋaŋga, asi wakariŋgira kurenje,
Barami akasimudza meso ake, akaʋona ʋaIsraeri ʋagere namarudzi aʋo; Mŋeya waMŋari akaʋuya pamsoro pake,
akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Ɀanzi naBarami, mŋanakomana waBeori,
Ɀanzi nomurume wakaȿinudzwa meso ake,
Ɀanzi naiye unonzwa mashoko aMŋari,
Iye unoʋona ɀinoratidzwa naWamasimba ose,
Iye unowira pasi, aȿinudzwa meso ake:
Matente ako akanaka ɀikuru sei,
iwe Jakobo,
Nedzimba dzako, iwe Israeri!
Ʋakatasanurwa semipata,
Seminda kunhiʋi dzorwizi,
Samagaʋakaʋa akasimŋa naJehova,
Semicindwe pedyo nemvura.
Mvura inobva paɀiroŋgo ɀake,
Mbeu dzake dzicaʋa pamvura zhinji.
Mambo wake ucakurira Agagi,
Ʋushe bgake bgucakuriswa.
Mŋari wakamuɓuɗisa Egipita,
Unesimba rakafanana nerenyati;
Ucapedza ʋahedeni, iʋo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake;
Ucavuna‐vuna mafupa aʋo,
Nokuʋabvoʋora nemiseʋe yake.
Unokotama, unoʋata pasi seshumba,
Seshumbakadzi; ndianiko ucamumutsa?
Mumŋe nomumŋe unokuropafadza, ŋgaaropafadzwe,
Mumŋe nomumŋe unokutuka, ŋgaatukwe.
Ipapo Baraki akatsamŋira Barami kwaɀo, akaɓuɓudza maʋoko ake; Baraki akati kunaBarami: Ndakuɗana, kuti utuke ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, asi tarira, waramba uciŋgoʋaropafadza katatu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino citiza hako kunɀimbo yako; nokuti ndakati ndicakukudza kwaɀo; asi tarira, Jehova wadziʋisa kukudzwa kwako.
Barami akati kunaBaraki: Ko handina‐kutaura ʋo kunhume dzako, dzawakatuma kwandiri, ndiciti:
Kunyaŋge Baraki akandipa imba yake izere nesirveri nendarama, handiŋgagoni kuɗarika shoko raJehova, ndiite nomŋoyo waŋgu ɀakanaka kana ɀakaipa; ɀinotaurwa naJehova, ndiɀo ɀandicaita?
Ɀino tarira, ndinoenda haŋgu kurudzi rwaŋgu; ʋuya ndikuʋudze ɀicaitirwa ʋanhu ʋako naʋanhu aʋa pamazuʋa okupedzisira.
Akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Ɀanzi naBarami, mŋanakomana waBeori,
Ɀanzi nomurume wakaȿinudzwa meso ake;
Ɀanzi naiye unonzwa mashoko aMŋari,
Iye unoziʋa ziʋo yoWokuɗeŋgaɗeŋga,
Iye unoʋona ɀinoratidzwa noWamasimba ose,
Iye unowira pasi, aȿinudzwa meso ake:
Ndinomuʋona, asi
Ndinomuʋona, asi handimuʋoneri pedyo;
Nyeredzi icaɓuɗa kunaJakobo,
Netȿimbo yoʋushe icabva kunaIsraeri;
Icabvoʋora nyika yaMoabi,
Nokuparadza ʋanakomana ʋose ʋeɓope.
Edomi icaʋa nhaka yake,
NeSeiri ʋo icaʋa nhaka yake, ndiʋo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake;
Asi Israeri ucakunda.
Mumŋe, ucabva kunaJakobo, ucaʋa noʋushe,
Ucaparadza ʋakasara muguta.
Ɀino akatarira Amareki, akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Amareki ndiye wokutaŋga waʋahedeni,
Asi pakupedzisira ucaparadzwa.
Ɀino akatarira ʋaKeniti, akataura nomufananidzo wake, akati:
Ʋugaro bgako bgakasimba,
Ƌendere rako rakateyiwa paɗombo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Kaini ucaparadzwa,
Kusikira iwe ucitapxa naAshuri.
Akataura nomufananidzo wake akati:
Haiwa! ndianiko ucararama, kana Mŋari aciita saiɀoɀo?
Asi ɀikepe ɀicabva kurutiʋi rweKitimi,
Ɀicarwadza Ashuri, nokurwadza Eberi,
Naiye ʋo ucaparadzwa.
Ipapo Barami akasimuka, akadzokera kunɀimbo yake; naBaraki akaenda ʋo.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara paShitimi, ʋanhu ʋakataŋga kuita ʋupombge naʋanasikana ʋaMoabi;
nokuti ʋakaɗana ʋanhu ʋaʋuye kuɀiɓayiro ɀaʋamŋari ʋaʋo; ʋanhu ʋakadya, ʋakafugamira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakaɀisuŋganidza naBaari‐peori; Jehova akatsamŋira Israeri kwaɀo.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tora ʋakuru ʋose ʋaʋanhu, uʋasuŋgirire masikati makuru pamberi paJehova, kuti kutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova kudzorwe kunaIsraeri.
Mosesi akati kuʋatoŋgi ʋaIsraeri: Mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ŋgaaʋuraye ʋanhu ʋake ʋakaɀisuŋganidza naBaari‐peori.
Ɀino ʋonei mumŋe murume waʋana ʋaIsraeri akaʋuya kuhama dzake nomukadzi muMidiani, Mosesi neʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaciɀiʋona, iʋo ʋari pakucema pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Ɀino Pinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari, mŋanakomana womuprista Aroni, wakati aciɀiʋona, akasimuka, akaɓuɗa pakati peʋuŋgano anepfumo muruʋoko rwake,
akateʋera murume uyo muIsraeri mukati metente, akaʋaɓaya nepfumo nomuɗumbu, iʋo ʋaʋiri, murume muIsraeri nomukadzi; naiɀoɀo ɗenda rakaguma pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋafa neɗenda iro ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:

Pinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari, mŋanakomana womuprista Aroni, wadzora kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kuʋana ʋaIsraeri; nokuti wakaŋga aneshuŋgu pakati paʋo, dzakafanana neshuŋgu dzaŋgu, naiɀoɀo handina‐kuparadza ʋana ʋaIsraeri neshuŋgu dzaŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo uti: Tarira, ndinomupa suŋgano yaŋgu yorugare,
icaʋa kwaari nokuʋana ʋake ʋanomuteʋera suŋgano yoʋuprista bgusiŋgaperi; nokuti wakaŋga aneshuŋgu nokuɗa kwaMŋari wake, akayananisira ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Zita romurume uyo muIsraeri wakaʋurawa, iye wakaʋurawa pamŋe cete nomukadzi muMidiani, rakaŋga riri Zimri, mŋanakomana waSaru, mucinda weimba yamadziɓaɓa pakati paʋaSimeoni.
Zita romukadzi muMidiani wakaʋurawa, rakaŋga riri Kozbi, mŋanasikana waZuri; iye wakaŋga ari mukuru waʋanhu weimba yamadziɓaɓa paʋaMidiani.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Ʋambana naʋaMidiani, uʋaparadze;

nokuti iʋo ʋakaʋambana nemi namano aʋo, aʋakakunyeŋgerai nawo paneɀakaitwa paPeori neɀakaitwa naKozbi, mŋanasikana womucinda waʋaMidiani, hanɀadzi yaʋo, wakaʋurawa nomusi weɗenda nokuɗa kweɀakaitwa paPeori.
Ɀino ɗenda rakati rapfuʋura, Jehova akataura naMosesi naEreazari, mŋanakomana womuprista Aroni, akati:
Ʋereŋgai ʋanhu ʋose ʋaIsraeri, ʋanamakore anamakumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋose ʋanogona kuenda kuhondo pakati paIsraeri.
Mosesi naEreazari muprista ʋakataura naʋo pamapani aMoabi, paJoridani paJeriko, ʋakati:
ʋanamakore anamakumi maʋiri naʋanopfuʋura; Jehova seɀakaraira Mosesi naʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaɓuɗa panyika yeEgipita.
Rubeni ndiye waiʋa mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe waIsraeri; ʋanakomana ʋaRubeni ndiʋo: Hanoki, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHanoki; naParu, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaParu.
NaHezroni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHezroni; naKarmi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaKarmi.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaRubeni: Ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀitatu, namazana manomŋe namakumi matatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaParu ʋaiʋa Eriabi;
naʋanakomana ʋaEriabi, Nemueri naDatani naAbirami; Datani naAbirami ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaɗanwa kumakurukota, ʋakarwa naMosesi naAroni paɓoka raKora, ŋguʋa yaʋakarwa naJehova,
nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo, ikaʋamedza pamŋe cete naKora musi wakafa ɓoka iro; ŋguʋa iyo mŋoto ukaparadza ʋarume ʋanamazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu, ʋakaitwa ciratidzo.
Asi ʋanakomana ʋaKora haʋana‐kufa.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaSimeoni, nemhuri dzaʋo: Nemueri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaNemueri, naJamini, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJamini, naJakini, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJakini;
naZera, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaZera; naShauri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShauri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaSimeoni, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri namazana maʋiri.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaGadi nemhuri dzaʋo: Zefoni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaZefoni; naHagi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHagi; naShuni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShuni;
naOzni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaOzni; naEri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaEri;
naArodi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaArodi; naAreri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaAreri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaGadi; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna namazana mashanu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJuda: Eri naOnani; asi Eri naOnani ʋakafira munyika yeKanani.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJuda, nemhuri dzaʋo: Shera, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShera; naPerezi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaPerezi; naZera, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaZera.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaPerezi: Hezroni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHezroni; naHamuri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHamuri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaJuda; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀitanhatu namazana mashanu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaIsakari, nemhuri dzaʋo: Tora, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaTora; naPuva, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaPuva;
naJashubi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJashubi; naShimroni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShimroni.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaIsakari; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu neɀinna namazana matatu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaZeburuni, nemhuri dzaʋo: Seredi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaSeredi; naEroni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaEroni; naJareeri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJareeri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaZeburuni; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu namazana mashanu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJosefa, nemhuri dzaʋo: Manase naEfraimi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaManase: Makiri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaMakiri; Makiri wakaɓereka Gireadi; kunaGireadi kwakabva mhuri yaʋaGireadi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaGireadi: Jezeri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJezeri; naHereki, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHereki;
naAsrieri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaAsrieri; naShekemi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShekemi;
naShemida, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShemida; naHeferi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHeferi.
Asi Zerofehadi, mŋanakomana waHeferi, wakaŋga asinaʋanakomana, asi ʋanasikana ɓedzi; mazita aʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi aiʋa Makra, naNoa, naHogra, naMirka, naTirza.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaManase; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀiʋiri namazana manomŋe.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaEfraimi, nemhuri dzaʋo: Shutera, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShutera; naBekeri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaBekeri; naTahani, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaTahani.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaShutera: Erani, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaErani.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋanakomana ʋaEfraimi; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀiʋiri, namazana mashanu. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJosefa, nemhuri dzaʋo.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini, nemhuri dzaʋo: Bera, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaBera; naAshberi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaAshberi; naAhirami, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaAhirami;
naShefufami, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShufami; naHufami, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHufami.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBera: Ardi naNamani;
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini, nemhuri dzaʋo; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀishanu namazana matanhatu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaDani, nemhuri dzaʋo: Shuhami, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShuhami. Ndiʋo ʋemhuri dzaDani, nedzimba dzaʋo.
Mhuri dzose dzaʋaShuhami, ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu neɀinna namazana manna.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAsheri, nemhuri dzaʋo: Imna, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaImna; naIshvi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaIshvi; naBeria, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaBeria.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBeria: Heberi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaHeberi; naMarkieri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaMarkieri.
Zita romŋanasikana waAsheri rakaŋga riri Sera.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaAsheri; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu neɀitanhatu namazana manna.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaNaftari, nemhuri dzaʋo: Jazeeri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJazeeri; naGuni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaGuni;
naJezeri, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaJezeri; naShiremi, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaShiremi.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaNaftari, nemhuri dzaʋo; ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀishanu namazana manna.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana matanhatu necuru cimŋe namazana manomŋe namakumi matatu.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Nyika inofanira kugoʋerwa pakati paiʋaʋa, iʋe nhaka yaʋo, ʋaciʋereŋgwa namazita aʋo.
Ʋazhinji unofanira kuʋapa nhaka zhinji; ʋashoma unofanira kuʋapa nhaka shoma; mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kupiwa seɀaʋakaʋereŋgwa.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro nyika inofanira kugoʋerwa nemijenya; ʋacapiwe‐nhaka namazita amarudzi amadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Nhaka yaʋo inofanira kugoʋerwa nemijenya kana ʋari ʋazhinji kana ʋari ʋashoma.
Ɀino ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa kuʋaRevi, nemhuri dzaʋo: Gershoni, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaGershoni; Kohati, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaKohati; Merari, kwakabva mhuri yaʋaMerari.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaʋaRevi: Mhuri yaʋaRibni, nemhuri yaʋaHebroni, nemhuri yaʋaMari, nemhuri yaʋaMushi, nemhuri yaʋaKora. Kohati akaɓereka Amrami.
Zita romukadzi waAmrami rakaŋga riri Jokebedi, mŋanasikana waRevi, wakaɓerekerwa Revi paEgipita; ndiye wakaɓerekera Amrami, Aroni, naMosesi, naMiriami, hanɀadzi yaʋo.
Aroni akaɓerekerwa Nadabi, naAbihu, naEreazari, naItamari.
Nadabi naAbihu ʋakafa, ŋguʋa yaʋakaʋuyisa mŋoto usina‐kufanira pamberi paJehova.

Ʋakaʋereŋgwa kwaʋari ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀitatu, murume mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga anomŋedzi mumŋe naʋanopfuʋura; nokuti haʋana‐kuʋereŋgwa pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, nokuti haʋana‐kupiwa nhaka pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naEreazari muprista, ʋakaʋereŋga ʋana ʋaIsraeri pamapani aMoabi, paJoridani paJeriko.
Asi pakati paʋo kwakaŋga kusinomurume mumŋe waʋaya ʋakaʋereŋgwa naMosesi naAroni, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋereŋga ʋana ʋaIsraeri murenje reSinai.
Nokuti Jehova wakaŋga ati pamsoro paʋo: Ɀirokwaɀo ʋacafira murenje. Hakunomumŋe waʋo wakaŋga asara, asi Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni.
Ɀino ʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi, mŋanakomana waHeferi, mŋanakomana waGireadi, mŋanakomana waMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, wemhuri dzaManase, mŋanakomana waJosefa, ʋakasweɗera
ʋakamira pamberi paMosesi napamberi paEreazari muprista, napamberi pamacinda neʋuŋgano yose, pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, ʋakati:
Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu ʋakafira murenje, asi ʋakaŋga ʋasi pakati peɓoka raʋaya ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzorwa naJehova, ʋeɓoka raKora; ʋakafira haʋo muɀiʋi ɀaʋo, ʋasinaʋanakomana.
Ɀino zita raɓaɓa ʋeɗu ricabvisirweiko pakati pemhuri yaʋo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasinaʋanakomana? Tipei ʋo nhaka pakati pehama dzaɓaɓa ʋeɗu.
Mosesi akaisa shoko raʋo pamberi paJehova.
Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi ʋanotaura kwaɀo; ɀirokwaɀo, unofanira kuʋapa nhaka pakati pehama dzaɓaɓa ʋaʋo; unofanira kuʋagarisa nhaka yaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ɀino unofanira kutaura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uciti: Kana munhu akafa asinomŋanakomana, munofanira kugarisa mŋanasikana wake nhaka yake.
Kana asinomŋanasikana, munofanira kupa ʋakuru ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake nhaka yake.
Kana asinaʋakuru kana ʋanuŋuna, munofanira kupa ʋakuru kana ʋanuŋuna ʋaɓaɓa ʋake nhaka yake.
Kana ɓaɓa ʋake ʋasinaʋakuru kana ʋanuŋuna, munofanira kupa hama yake yomumba nhaka yake, iʋe yake. Unofanira kuʋa mutemo wokutoŋga nawo pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaMosesi: Kwira pagomo iri reAbarimi, uʋone nyika yandakapa ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ipapo kana waiʋona, newe ʋo ucasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋako, seɀakasoŋganiswa mukuru wako Aroni;
nokuti makaramba shoko raŋgu murenje reZini, paŋguʋa yokurwa kweʋuŋgano, mukarega kunditsaura pamberi paʋo pamvura. (Ndiyo mvura yeMeriba paKadeshi, murenje reZini.)
Ɀino Mosesi akataura naJehova, akati:
Jehova, Mŋari wemŋeya yaʋanhu ʋose, ŋgaagadze murume paʋuŋgano iyi,
ucaɓuɗa pamberi paʋo, nokupinda pamberi paʋo, uŋgaʋaɓuɗisa nokuʋapinza; kuti ʋuŋgano yaJehova irege kuʋa samakwai asinomufudzi.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tora Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, murume unomŋeya mukati make, uise ruʋoko rwako pamsoro pake.
Umuise pamberi paEreazari muprista, napamberi peʋuŋgano yose, ugomurairira pamberi paʋo.
Uise pamsoro pake ɀoʋukuru bgako, kuti ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri imuterere.

Iye unofanira kumira pamberi pomuprista Ereazari, iye amuvunzire pamberi paJehova nokutoŋga kweUrimi; nokuraira kwake, ʋanofanira kuɓuɗa, nokuraira kwake, ʋanofanira kupinda, iye pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋuŋgano yose.
Mosesi akaita seɀaakarairwa naJehova; akatora Joshua, akamuisa pamberi pomuprista Ereazari, napamberi peʋuŋgano yose;
akaisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake, akamurairira, seɀakataura Jehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Raira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Munofanira kuraŋgarira kundipa neŋguʋa yaɀo yakafanira ɀipo ɀaŋgu, iɀo ɀokudya ɀaŋgu ɀeɀipiriso ɀaŋgu ɀinopiswa, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kwandiri.
Unofanira kuti kwaʋari: Ndico cipiriso cinopiswa camunofanira kupa Jehova: Makwaiana amakondobge egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara, maʋiri zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose.
Rimŋe gwaiana unofanira kuʋuya naro maŋgwanani, rimŋe gwaiana unofanira kuʋuya naro maɗekwana;
necegumi ceefa yoʋupfu bgakatsetseka, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu, bgakakanyiwa nececinna cehini yamafuta akaȿiniwa.
Ndico cipiriso cinofanira kupiswa ŋguʋa dzose, cakarairwa pagomo reSinai, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka, cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.
Necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa cinofanira kuʋa cecinna cehini cegwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe; unofanira kuɗururira Jehova cipiriso ceɀinoɓata.

Rimŋe gwaiana unofanira kuʋuya naro maɗekwana; unofanira kuʋuya naro pamŋe cete necipiriso coʋupfu, necipiriso cinoɗururwa, ɀakafanana neɀamaŋgwanani, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa, cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova.
Asi nomusi wesaɓata
Ndico cipiriso cinopiswa cesaɓata rimŋe nerimŋe, kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Pakuʋamba kwemŋedzi yenyu munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova: Nzombe mbiri ɗuku negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana manomŋe amakondobge egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
neɀegumi ɀitatu
necegumi cimŋe coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe; ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa cinonhuwira ɀakanaka cinopisirwa Jehova.

Ɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀehafu yehini yewaini panzombe imŋe, necetatu cehini pagondobge rimŋe, nececinna cehini pagwaiana rimŋe; ndico cipiriso cinopiswa cinofanira kuitwa mŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe wemŋedzi yegore rose.
Ʋuye nhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi kunaJehova; cinofanira kuʋuyiswa kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi, munofanira kuraŋgarira paseka yaJehova.
Mutambo unofanira kuitwa nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi uyo; ciŋgwa cisina — kuʋiriswa cinofanira kudyiwa mazuʋa manomŋe.
Pazuʋa rokutaŋga kunofanira kuʋa neʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata maɓasa aʋaranda pazuʋa iro;
asi munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova: Nzombe mbiri ɗuku, negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana amakondobge manomŋe egore rimŋe, ɀiʋe ɀisina‐kuremara kwamuri;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta; munofanira kuʋuya neɀegumi ɀitatu panzombe imŋe, neɀegumi ɀiʋiri pagondobge rimŋe.
Unofanira kuʋuya necegumi cimŋe pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe pamakwaiana manomŋe;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, cokuyananisira naco.
Munofanira kuʋuya naiɀoɀo kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa camaŋgwanani, cinofanira kupiswa ŋguʋa dzose.

Saiɀoɀo munofanira kuʋuya neɀokudya ɀecipiriso cinopiswa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe pamazuʋa manomŋe, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova; cinofanira kuʋuyiswa kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Pazuʋa recinomŋe munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata maɓasa aʋaranda
Ʋuye pazuʋa reɀitȿa, kana muciʋuya necipiriso citȿa coʋupfu kunaJehova pamutambo wenyu wamaviki, munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; musaɓata maɓasa aʋaranda.
Asi munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova, ɀinoti: Nzombe mbiri ɗuku, negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana amakondobge egore rimŋe;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta; ɀegumi ɀitatu panzombe imŋe, neɀegumi ɀiʋiri pagondobge rimŋe,
necegumi cimŋe pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe ramakwaiana manomŋe;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ɀokuyananisira naɀo.
Munofanira kuʋuya naɀo (ɀiʋe kwamuri ɀisina‐kuremara) neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu.
Nomŋedzi wecinomŋe, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi, munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; hamufaniri kuɓata maɓasa aʋaranda naro; rinofanira kuʋa kwamuri zuʋa rokuridza hwamanda naro.
Munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova, ɀinoti: Nzombe imŋe ɗuku, negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana amakondobge manomŋe, egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta, ɀegumi ɀitatu panzombe, neɀegumi ɀiʋiri pagondobge,
necegumi cimŋe pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe ramakwaiana manomŋe;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi, cokuyananisira naco;

kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa pakugara kwomŋedzi, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, seɀakarairwa; ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka, ciʋe cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.
Nezuʋa regumi romŋedzi wecinomŋe munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; munofanira kucema pamŋeya yenyu; musatoŋgoɓate‐ɓasa.
Asi munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cokupisira Jehova, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka, ɀinoti: Nzombe imŋe ɗuku, negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana amakondobge manomŋe egore rimŋe; ɀiʋe ɀisina‐kuremara kwamuri;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta; ɀegumi ɀitatu panzombe, neɀegumi ɀiʋiri pagondobge rimŋe;
necegumi cimŋe pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe ramakwaiana manomŋe;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso ceɀiʋi cokuyananisira naco, necipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi wecinomŋe munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; hamufaniri kuɓate‐ɓasa raʋaranda naro; munofanira kuitira Jehova mutambo wamazuʋa manomŋe.

Munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cinopiswa nomŋoto, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova, ɀinoti: Nzombe ɗuku dzinegumi nenhatu, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe; ɀiʋe ɀisina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, coʋupfu bgakatsetseka, bgakakanyiwa namafuta; ɀegumi ɀitatu panzombe imŋe neimŋe panzombe dzinegumi nenhatu, neɀegumi ɀiʋiri pagondobge rimŋe nerimŋe pamakondobge maʋiri;
necegumi cimŋe pagwaiana rimŋe nerimŋe pamakwaiana anegumi namanna;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa repiri munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku dzinegumi nembiri, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe asina‐kuremara.
Necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa ɀenzombe, namakondobge namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose; necipiriso caco coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa retatu munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku dzinegumi neimŋe, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa recinna munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku dzinegumi, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa reshanu munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku pfumbamŋe, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa retanhatu munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe sere, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaco ɀinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa recinomŋe munofanira kuʋuya nenzombe ɗuku nomŋe, namakondobge maʋiri, namakwaiana amakondobge anegumi namanna egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀakaenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.
Nezuʋa rorusere munofanira kuita ʋuŋgano tȿene; hamufaniri kuɓate‐ɓasa raʋaranda naro.

Asi munofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa, cipiriso cinopiswa nomŋoto, ciʋe cinonhuwira ɀakanaka kunaJehova, ɀinoti: Nzombe imŋe ɗuku, negondobge rimŋe, namakwaiana amakondobge manomŋe egore rimŋe, asina‐kuremara;
necipiriso caɀo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, ɀenzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, ɀinofanira kuenzana nokuwanda kwaɀo, seɀakarairwa;
nenhoŋgo imŋe yembudzi ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; kunze kwecipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso caco coʋupfu, necipiriso caco cinoɗururwa.

Ndiɀo ɀamunofanira kuʋuya naɀo kunaJehova pamitambo yenyu yakatarwa, kunze kwemhiko dzenyu, neɀipo ɀokuɗa kwenyu, ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa, neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀoʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinoɗururwa, neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀokuyananisa.
Mosesi akaʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino Mosesi wakataura naʋakuru ʋamarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati: Ndico cinhu cakarairwa naJehova:
Kana munhu aciŋge apikira Jehova mhiko, kana kuɀisuŋga nokupika, haafaniri kushandura shoko rake; unofanira kuita ɀose ɀakaɓuɗa mumuromo make.
Nomukadzi ʋo, kana aciŋge apikira Jehova, kana kuɀisuŋga nokusuŋga
ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakanzwa kupika kwake, nokuɀisuŋga kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamunyararira haʋo, ipapo kupika kwake kwose kucaʋa nesimba, nokusuŋga kwake kwose, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, kucaʋa nesimba.
Asi kana ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamudziʋisa nomusi waʋanoɀinzwa nawo, kupika kwake kwose, nokuɀisuŋga kwake kwose, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, hakuŋgaʋi nesimba; Jehova ucamukaŋganwira, nokuti ɓaɓa ʋake ʋamudziʋisa.
Kana akawanikwa nomurume acakasuŋgwa nokupika kwake, kana namashoko aakareʋa asina‐kuraŋgarira ɀakanaka, aakaɀisuŋga nawo;
murume wake akaɀinzwa, akamunyararira hake nomusi waanoɀinzwa nawo, ipapo kupika kwake kucaʋa nesimba, nokuɀisuŋga kwake, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, kucaʋa nesimba.

Asi kana murume wake akamudziʋisa nomusi waanoɀinzwa nawo, ipapo iye unokonesa kupika kwake, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, namashoko aakareʋa asina‐kuraŋgarira ɀakanaka, aakaɀisuŋga nawo; Jehova ucamukaŋganwira.
Asi kupika kwecirikadzi, kana kwomukadzi wakarambga nomurume wake, cinhu cipi necipi caakaɀisuŋga naco, ɀicaʋa nesimba kwaari.
Kana aciŋge apika ari mumba momurume wake, kana kuɀisuŋga nokupika,
murume wake akaɀinzwa, akamunyararira, asiŋgamudziʋisi, ipapo kupika kwake kucaʋa nesimba, nokuɀisuŋga kwose, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako, kucaʋa nesimba.

Asi kana murume wake akaɀikonesa kwaɀo nomusi waakaɀinzwa nawo, ipapo ɀose ɀakaɓuɗa mumuromo make pakupika kwake, kana kuɀisuŋga kwake, haɀiŋgaʋi nesimba; murume wake waɀikonesa; Jehova ucamukaŋganwira.
Mhiko dzose, nokupika kwose kwaanoɀisuŋga nako kucema pamŋeya wake, murume wake uŋgaɀisimbisa, kana murume wake uŋgaɀikonesa.
Asi kana murume wake akamunyararira cose zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ipapo unosimbisa mhiko dzake dzose nokuɀisuŋga kwake kwose, kwaakaɀisuŋga nako; waɀisimbisa, nokuti wamunyararira nomusi waakaɀinzwa nawo.
Asi kana akazoɀikonesa kwaɀo, aɀinzwa hake, iye unofanira kuʋa nemhoȿa yake.
Ndiyo mitemo yakarairwa Mosesi naJehova, pakati pomurume nomukadzi wake, napakati paɓaɓa nomŋanasikana waʋo, aciri musikana paimba yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Tsiʋa ʋana ʋaIsraeri kuʋaMidiani; shure kwaiɀoɀo iwe ucasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋako.
Mosesi akataura naʋanhu, akati: Ʋarume pakati penyu ŋgaʋaɀigadzirire kurwa, kuti ʋandorwa naʋaMidiani, ʋatsiʋire Jehova kuʋaMidiani.
Munofanira kutumira kuhondo ʋanecuru cimŋe kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe amarudzi aʋaIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋereŋga kuɀuru ɀaʋaIsraeri curu cimŋe kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe, ʋakaȿika ɀuru gumi neɀiʋiri ʋakaɀigadzirira kundorwa.
Mosesi akaʋatuma kundorwa, curu cimŋe kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe, iʋo naPinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari muprista, kundorwa, iye akaɓata nhumbi dzeimba tȿene nehwamanda dzokuridzisa nadzo.
Ʋakarwa naʋaMidiani, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova, ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋose.

Ʋakaʋuraya ʋo madzimambo aʋaMidiani, pamŋe cete naʋamŋe ʋakaʋurawa, ʋaiti: Evi, naRekemi, naZuri, naHuri, naReba, madzimambo mashanu aʋaMidiani; naBarami, mŋanakomana waBeori, ʋakamuʋuraya ʋo nomunondo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatapa ʋakadzi ʋaʋaMidiani naʋana ʋaʋo; neŋombe dzaʋo dzose namakwai aʋo ose, nefuma yaʋo yose, ʋakaɀitapa.
Namaguta aʋo yose maʋakaŋga ʋagere, nemisasa yaʋo ose, ʋakaɀipisa nomŋoto.
Ʋakatora ɀaʋakapamba ɀose, nenhapxa dzose dzaʋanhu nedzeɀipfuwo.
Ʋakaʋuya naʋatapxa, neɀaʋakatapa, neɀaʋakapamba kunaMosesi, nokunaEreazari muprista, nokuʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kumisasa pamapani aMoabi, ari paJoridani paJeriko.
Ɀino Mosesi naEreazari muprista, namacinda ose eʋuŋgano, ʋakaenda kundosoŋgana naʋo kunze kwemisasa.
Mosesi akatsamŋira ʋatariri ʋehondo, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋakuru ʋamazana, ʋakaŋga ʋacidzoka pakundorwa;
Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Makaceŋgeta ʋakadzi ʋose ʋari ʋapenyu here?
Tarirai, ndiʋo ʋakatadzisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri pamberi paJehova paɀakaitwa paPeori, ʋapiwa mano naBarami, ɗenda rikaʋa’po pakati peʋuŋgano yaJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ʋurayai ʋakomana ʋose ʋari pakati paʋana, muʋuraye ʋo mukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe wakaʋata nomurume;
asi muɀiceŋgetere ʋanasikana ʋose, ʋasina‐kumboʋata nomurume.
Asi imi, endai mundogara mazuʋa manomŋe kunze kwemisasa; aninani wakaʋuraya munhu, naaninani wakaɓata munhu wakaʋurawa, muɀinatse pazuʋa retatu nerecinomŋe, imi naʋatapxa ʋenyu.
Munofanira ʋo kusuka ŋguʋo dzenyu dzose, neɀose ɀakaitwa namatebge, neɀose ɀakarukwa nemvere dzembudzi, neɀinhu ɀose ɀakaitwa namatanda.
Ereazari muprista akati kuʋarwi ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋandorwa: Uyu ndiwo murairo wakarairwa Mosesi naJehova:
Ndarama, nesirveri, nendarira, neɗare, netini, nomutobvu,
ɀose ɀisiŋgaparadzwi nomŋoto, munofanira kuɀipinza mumŋoto kuti ɀinatswe; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ɀinofanira kuceneswa nemvura yokunatsa; asi ɀose ɀiŋgaparadzwa nomŋoto, munofanira kuɀipinza mumvura.
Munofanira kusuka ŋguʋo dzenyu nezuʋa recinomŋe, kuti muʋe ʋakanaka, mugopinda mumisasa pashure.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Ʋereŋga ɀakatapxa ɀamakatapa ɀaʋanhu neɀeɀipfuwo, iwe naEreazari muprista, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa eʋuŋgano;
mukamure ɀakatapxa napakati, iʋe migoʋe miʋiri;
ɀino uraire kuti mugoʋe wakatarwa utsaurirwe Jehova naʋarume ʋehondo ʋakaŋga ʋandorwa: Cipenyu cimŋe kumazana mashanu, kuʋanhu, nokuŋombe, nokumboŋgoro, nokumakwai;
uɀitore pahafu yaʋo, ugoɀipa Ereazari muprista, ciʋe cipiriso cinotsaurirwa Jehova.
Asi pahafu yaʋana ʋaIsraeri unofanira kutora cimŋe kumakumi mashanu, kuʋanhu, nokuŋombe, nokumboŋgoro, nokumakwai, kuɀipfuwo ɀose, ugoɀipa ʋaRevi ʋanoceŋgeta tabernakeri yaJehova.
Mosesi naEreazari ʋakaita seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino ɀakatapxa ɀakaŋga ɀasara, ʋarume ʋehondo ʋatora mugoʋe waʋo, ɀaiʋa makwai aneɀuru ɀinamazana matanhatu neɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀuru ɀishanu,
neŋombe dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀiʋiri,
nemboŋgoro dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu necuru cimŋe;
naʋakadzi ʋasina‐kumboʋata naʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀiʋiri.
Hafu, yakagoʋerwa ʋakaŋga ʋaenda kundorwa, aiʋa makwai aneɀuru ɀinamazana matatu, neɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu, neɀuru ɀinomŋe, namazana mashanu;
mugoʋe wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehova, waiʋa makwai anamazana matanhatu namakumi manomŋe namashanu.
Ŋombe dzaiʋa ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀitanhatu; mugoʋe wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehova kunaidzo, waiʋa
Mboŋgoro dzaiʋa ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu namazana mashanu; mugoʋe wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehova kunaidzo, waiʋa
Ʋanhu ʋaiʋa ɀuru ɀinegumi neɀitanhatu; mugoʋe wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehova kunaiʋo, waiʋa ʋanhu ʋanamakumi matatu naʋaʋiri.
Mosesi akapa Ereazari muprista mugoʋe wakatarwa, cakaŋga ciri cipiriso cakatsaurirwa Jehova, seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
