Pahafu yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, yakaŋga yakamurwa naMosesi kuʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋandorwa,
(ɀino hafu yeʋuŋgano yaiʋa makwai aneɀuru ɀinamazana matatu namakumi matatu, neɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana mashanu,
neŋombe dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀuru ɀitatu,
nemboŋgoro dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu namazana mashanu,
naʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀitanhatu.)
Pahafu yaʋana ʋaIsraeri Mosesi akatora cimŋe kumakumi mashanu, kuʋanhu nokuɀipfuwo, akaɀipa ʋaRevi ʋaiceŋgeta tabernakeri yaJehova; seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋaiʋa pamsoro peɀuru ɀehondo, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru, naʋakuru ʋamazana ʋakasweɗera kunaMosesi,
ʋakati kunaMosesi: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋakaʋereŋga ʋarume ʋehondo ʋanorairwa nesu; hakunomumŋe weɗu usi’po.

Ɀino taʋuya necipo caJehova, ɀakawanikwa nomumŋe nomumŋe: Ɀishoŋgo ɀendarama, neketani dzomumakumbo nedzomumaʋoko, neɀindori ɀeminwe, neɀindori ɀomunzeʋe, neɀomumutsipa, kuyananisira mŋeya yeɗu pamberi paJehova.
Mosesi naEreazari muprista ʋakagamucira kwaʋari ndarama, ɀiri ɀishoŋgo ɀamarudzi ose ɀakaitwa nayo.
Ndarama yose yecipiriso cakatsaurwa, caʋakapa Jehova, caʋakuru ʋeɀuru necaʋakuru ʋamazana, aiʋa mashekeri aneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀitanhatu namazana manomŋe namakumi mashanu.
(Nokuti ʋarume ʋehondo ʋakaŋga ʋatora mugoʋe waʋo weɀakatapxa, mumŋe nomumŋe.)
Mosesi naEreazari muprista ʋakagamucira ndarama kuʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋamazana, ʋakaiisa mutente rokusoŋgana, kuti ciʋe ciraŋgaridzo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri pamberi paJehova.
Ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀipfuwo ɀizhinji kwaɀo; ɀino ʋakati ʋacitarira nyika yeJazeri nenyika yeGireadi, ʋakaʋona kuti inɀimbo yakafanira ɀipfuwo.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni ʋakaʋuya ʋakataurirana naMosesi naEreazari muprista namacinda eʋuŋgano, ʋakati:
Ataroti neDiboni neJazeri neNimra neHeshboni neEreari neSebami neNebo neBeoni —
Nyika dzakakundwa naJehova pamberi peʋuŋgano yaIsraeri, inyika yakafanira ɀipfuwo; ɀino isu ʋaranda ʋenyu, tineɀipfuwo.
Ʋakati: Kana takawana nyasha pamberi penyu, nyika ino ŋgaipiwe ʋaranda ʋenyu, iʋe yaʋo; musatiyambusa henyu Joridani.
Mosesi akati kuʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni: Ko hama dzenyu dziŋgaenda kundorwa, imi mukagara pano here?
Munoʋodzereiko mŋoyo yaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋarege kuenda kunyika yaʋakapiwa naJehova?
Ndiɀo ɀakaita madziɓaɓa enyu ŋguʋa yandakaʋatuma ʋari paKadeshi‐barnea, kundoshora nyika.
Nokuti ʋakati ʋakwira kumupata weEshkori, ʋakaʋona nyika, ʋakaʋodza mŋoyo yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋarege kupinda munyika yaʋakaŋga ʋapiwa naJehova.
Jehova akatsamŋa nomusi iwoyo, akapika, akati:
Ɀirokwaɀo, hakuŋgaʋi nomumŋe waʋarume ʋakaɓuɗa Egipita, unamakore makumi maʋiri nounopfuʋura, uŋgandoʋona nyika yandakapikira Abrahama naIsaka naJakobo, nokuti haʋana‐kunditeʋera nomŋoyo wose;
asi Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, muKenizi, naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, nokuti iʋo ʋakateʋera Jehova nomŋoyo wose.
Jehova akatsamŋira ʋaIsraeri, akaʋadzuŋgairisa murenje makore anamakumi manna, kuȿikira rudzi rwose rwakaŋga rwatadza pamberi paJehova rwaparadzwa.
Ɀino tarirai, imi makamuka panɀimbo yamadziɓaɓa enyu, ʋana caiʋo ʋaʋanhu ʋeɀiʋi, kuti muwedzere kutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova pamsoro paIsraeri.
Nokuti kana mukatsauka pakumuteʋera, ucaʋasiya ɀe murenje; imi mucaparadza ʋanhu aʋa ʋose
Ʋakasweɗera kwaari, ʋakati: Ticaʋakira ɀipfuwo ɀeɗu mataŋga naʋana ʋeɗu ʋaɗuku maguta pano;
asi isu ticaɀigadzirira kurwa, kuti tituŋgamirire ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kudzimana taʋaȿitsa kunɀimbo yaʋo; ʋana ʋeɗu ʋacagara mumaguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo nokuɗa kwaʋanhu ʋagere munyika.
Hatiŋgadzokeri kudzimba dzeɗu kudzimana ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋapiwa nhaka yaʋo.
Nokuti hatiŋgagari nhaka pamŋe cete naʋo mhiri kwaJoridani nemberi; nokuti isu tagoʋerwa nhaka yeɗu necoʋuno mhiri kwaJoridani kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa.
Ɀino Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Kana mukaita cinhu ici, kana mukashoŋga nhumbi dzenyu dzokurwa, kuti muende pamberi paJehova kundorwa,
mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu wakashoŋga akayambuka Joridani pamberi paJehova, kudzimana iye adziŋga ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake pamberi pake,
nyika ikakundwa pamberi paJehova, ipapo muŋgadzoka henyu, hamuŋgaʋi nemhoȿa kunaJehova nokuʋaIsraeri; nyika ino igoʋa nhaka yenyu pamberi paJehova.
Asi kana mukasaita saiɀoɀo, tarirai matadzira Jehova, muziʋe kuti ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀicakuwanai.
Ʋakirai henyu ʋana ʋenyu maguta namakwai enyu mataŋga; itai seɀamakataura.
Ʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni ʋakataura naMosesi, ʋakati: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋacaita seɀakaraira tenzi weɗu.
Ʋana ʋeɗu, naʋakadzi ʋeɗu, neɀipfuwo ɀeɗu, neŋombe dzeɗu dzose, ɀicagara mumaguta eGireadi;
asi ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋacayambuka, ʋose ʋakaɀigadzirira kundorwa, kundorwa pamberi paJehova, seɀakataurwa natenzi weɗu.
Naiɀoɀo Mosesi akaraira pamsoro paʋo Ereazari muprista, naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa amarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri,

Mosesi akati kwaʋari: Kana ʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni ʋakayambuka nemi, murume mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɀigadzira kundorwa pamberi paJehova, nyika ikakundwa pamberi penyu; ipapo munofanira kuʋapa nyika yeGireadi, iʋe yaʋo.
Asi kana ʋasiŋgayambuki nemi, ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzaʋo dzokurwa, ʋanofanira kupiwa nhaka yaʋo pakati penyu panyika yeKanani.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Seɀakareʋa Jehova kuʋaranda ʋenyu, ndiɀo ɀaticaita.
Ticayambukira pamberi paJehova kunyika yeKanani, takashoŋga nhumbi dzeɗu dzokurwa, kuti tipiwe nhaka yeɗu necoʋuno mhiri kwaJoridani.

Ɀino Mosesi akaʋapa, iʋo ʋana ʋaGadi naʋana ʋaRubeni, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, mŋanakomana waJosefa, ʋushe bgaSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, noʋushe bgaOgi, mambo weBashani, nyika namaguta ayo nemiganho yayo, iwo maguta enyika yose yakapoteredza.
Ʋana ʋaGadi ʋakaʋaka Diboni, neAtaroti, neAroeri,
neAtroti‐shofani, neJazeri, neJogbeha,
neBeti‐nimra, neBeti‐harani, ari maguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, anamataŋga amakwai.
Ʋana ʋaRubeni ʋakaʋaka Heshboni, neEreari, neKiriataimi,
neNebo, neBaari‐meoni (ʋashandura mazita awo), neSibma; ʋakatumidza maguta aʋakaʋaka mamŋe mazita.
Ʋana ʋaMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, ʋakaenda Gireadi, ʋakarikunda, ʋakadziŋga ʋaAmori ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo.
Mosesi akapa Makiri, mŋanakomana waManase, Gireadi, iye akagara’mo.
Jairi, mŋanakomana waManase, akakunda misha yaro, akaitumidza Misha yaJairi.
Noba akandokunda Kenati, nemisha yaro yakaŋga yakaɓatwa naro, akaritumidza Noba, nezita rake.
Ndidzo nzendo dzaʋana ʋaIsraeri, pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo panyika yeEgipita namapoka aʋo ʋacituŋgamirirwa naMosesi naAroni.
Mosesi akanyora kusimuka kwaʋo nenzendo dzaʋo, arairwa naJehova; ndidzo nzendo dzaʋo nokusimuka kwaʋo.
Ʋakasimuka paRamesesi nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi wokutaŋga; maŋgwanani akateʋera paseka ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓuɗa noruʋoko runesimba pamberi paʋaEgipita ʋose,
ʋaEgipita ʋaciʋiga mataŋgwe aʋo ose, akaŋga aʋurawa naJehova pakati paʋo; Jehova akatoŋga ʋo ʋamŋari ʋaʋo.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakasimuka paRamesesi, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paSukoti.
Ʋakasimuka paSukoti, ʋakandodzika paEtami, pamuʋuyo werenje.
Ʋakasimuka paEtami, ʋakadzokera Pi‐hahiroti, pamberi peBaari‐sefoni, ʋakadzika pamberi peMigdori.
Ʋakasimuka pamberi peHahiroti, ʋakapinda nomukati meguŋgwa, ʋakaȿika murenje; ʋakafamba mazuʋa matatu murenje reEtami, ʋakandodzika paMara.
Ʋakasimuka paMara, ʋakaȿika Erimi; paErimi pakaŋga panamatsime anegumi namaʋiri emvura, nemiti yemicindwe inamakumi manomŋe; ʋakadzika matente aʋo ipapo.
Ʋakasimuka paErimi, ʋakandodzika paGuŋgwa Dɀuku.
Ʋakasimuka paGuŋgwa Dɀuku, ʋakandodzika murenje reSini.
Ʋakasimuka murenje reSini, ʋakandodzika paDofka.
Ʋakasimuka paDofka, ʋakandodzika paArushi.
Ʋakasimuka paArushi, ʋakandodzika paRefidimi, pakaŋga pasine‐mvura yokunwa yaʋanhu.
Ʋakasimuka paRefidimi, ʋakandodzika murenje reSinai.
Ʋakasimuka murenje reSinai, ʋakandodzika paKibroti‐hatava.
Ʋakasimuka paKibroti‐hatava, ʋakandodzika paHazeroti.
Ʋakasimuka paHazeroti, ʋakandodzika paRitma.
Ʋakasimuka paRitma, ʋakandodzika paRimoni‐perezi.
Ʋakasimuka paRimoni‐perezi, ʋakandodzika paRibna.
Ʋakasimuka paRibna, ʋakandodzika paRisa.
Ʋakasimuka paRisa, ʋakandodzika paKeherata.
Ʋakasimuka paKeherata, ʋakandodzika pagomo reSheferi.
Ʋakasimuka pagomo reSheferi, ʋakandodzika paHarada.
Ʋakasimuka paHarada, ʋakandodzika paMakeroti.
Ʋakasimuka paMakeroti, ʋakandodzika paTahati.
Ʋakasimuka paTahati, ʋakandodzika paTera.
Ʋakasimuka paTera, ʋakandodzika paMitka.
Ʋakasimuka paMitka, ʋakandodzika paHashmona.
Ʋakasimuka paHashmona, ʋakandodzika paMoseroti.
Ʋakasimuka paMoseroti, ʋakandodzika paBene‐jakani.
Ʋakasimuka paBene‐jakani, ʋakandodzika paHori‐hagidgadi.
Ʋakasimuka paHori‐hagidgadi, ʋakandodzika paJotbata.
Ʋakasimuka paJotbata, ʋakandodzika paAbrona.
Ʋakasimuka paAbrona, ʋakandodzika paEzioni‐geberi.
Ʋakasimuka paEzioni‐geberi, ʋakandodzika murenje reZini (ndipo paKadeshi).
Ʋakasimuka paKadeshi, ʋakandodzika pagomo reHori, pamuʋuyo wenyika yeEdomi.
Aroni muprista akakwira pagomo reHori, arairwa naJehova, akafira’po, negore ramakumi manna rokuɓuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri paEgipita, nomŋedzi wecishanu, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi.
Aroni wakaŋga anamakore anezana namakumi maʋiri namatatu pakufa kwake pagomo reHori.
Ɀino mambo weAradi, muKanani, wakaŋga agere kurutiʋi rweZasi munyika yeKanani, akanzwa kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋoʋuya.
Ʋakasimuka pagomo reHori, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paZarmona.
Ʋakasimuka paZarmona, ʋakandodzika paPunoni.
Ʋakasimuka paPunoni, ʋakandodzika paOboti.
Ʋakasimuka paOboti, ʋakandodzika paIye‐abarimi, pamuganhu weMoabi.
Ʋakasimuka paIyimi, ʋakandodzika paDiboni‐gadi.
Ʋakasimuka paDiboni‐gadi, ʋakandodzika paArmoni‐dibrataimi.
Ʋakasimuka paArmoni‐dibrataimi, ʋakandodzika paAbarimi, pamberi peNebo.
Ʋakasimuka pamakomo eAbarimi, ʋakandodzika pamapani eMoabi, paJoridani paJeriko.
Ʋakadzika matente aʋo paJoridani, kubva paBeti‐jeshimoti kuȿika paAberishitimi, pamapani eMoabi.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi pamapani eMoabi, paJoridani paJeriko, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana mayambuka Joridani, mukaȿika munyika yeKanani,
munofanira kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere munyika pamberi penyu, nokuparadza ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo
Munofanira kutora nyika, iʋe yenyu, mugare’mo; nokuti ndakakupai nyika iyo, iʋe yenyu.

Munofanira kupiwa nhaka yenyika iyo nemijenya, nemhuri dzenyu; ʋazhinji munofanira kuʋapa nhaka zhinji, ʋashoma munofanira kuʋapa nhaka shoma; seɀaakagoʋerwa nemijenya, saiɀoɀo inofanira kuʋa nhaka yomunhu; munofanira kugara nhaka namarudzi amadziɓaɓa enyu.
Asi kana musiŋgaɗi kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋagere munyika pamberi penyu, ipapo iʋo kwaʋari ʋamunorega ʋacaʋa secinhu cinoɓaya pameso enyu, neseminzwa panhiʋi dzenyu, ʋacarwa nemi munyika mamugere.
Ipapo ndicakuitirai imi seɀandakafuŋga kuʋaitira iʋo.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Raira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana maȿika munyika yeKanani, (ndiyo nyika icaʋa nhaka yenyu, iyo nyika yeKanani, kuȿikira kumiganho yayo,)
rutiʋi rwenyu rwezasi runofanira kutaŋga murenje reZini rucienda nokurutiʋi rweEdomi; muganho wenyu wezasi ucataŋga pamuʋuyo weGuŋgwa roMunyu, ucienda kumabvazuʋa;
ɀino muganho wenyu upote necezasi kwegomo reAkrabimi, ndokupfuʋurira kuZini, ugoɓuɗa necezasi kweKadeshi‐barnea; ɀino upfuʋure kuHazari‐adari, ugondoȿika Azmoni;
ɀino muganho unofanira kupota ucitaŋga paAzmoni, kuȿika kurukoʋa rweEgipita, ndokuɓuɗa paGuŋgwa.
Muganho wenyu wokumaʋirazuʋa ndiro Guŋgwa Guru nenyika yaro; ndiwo muganho wokumaʋirazuʋa.
Ndiwo muganho wenyu wokumsoro: Kubva paGuŋgwa Guru munofanira kutara muganho wenyu kuȿika pagomo reHori;
kubva paHori munofanira kutara muganho wenyu kuȿika paʋanopinda paHamati, muganho ugondogumira paZedadi.
Ɀino muganho upfuʋurire kuȿika paZifroni, ugondoguma paHazari‐enani; ndiwo muganho wenyu wokumsoro.
Munofanira kutara ʋo muganho wenyu wokumabvazuʋa, kubva paHazari‐enani kuȿika paShefami.
Kubva paShefami muganho uɓurukire Ribra, kumabvazuʋa kweAini; ɀino muganho uɓuruke, ugondoȿika kurutiʋi rweguŋgwa reKinereti kumabvazuʋa;
ɀino muganho uɓurukire kuJoridani, ugondoguma paGuŋgwa roMunyu; ndiyo icaʋa nyika yenyu nemiganho yayo kunhiʋi dzose.
Mosesi akaraira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati: Ndiyo nyika yamucapiwa nemijenya iʋe nhaka yenyu, yakarairwa naJehova kuti ipiwe marudzi mapfumbamŋe nehafu;
nokuti rudzi rwaʋana ʋaRubeni, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, norudzi rwaʋana ʋaGadi, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋatopiwa haʋo, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋatopiwa haʋo nhaka yaʋo;
marudzi awa maʋiri nehafu akapiwa nhaka yawo necemhiri kwaJoridani paJeriko, kumabvazuʋa kunoɓuɗa zuʋa nako.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi, akati:
Ndiwo mazita aʋarume ʋanofanira kukugoʋerai nyika kuti iʋe nhaka yenyu: Ereazari muprista, naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni.
Munofanira kutsaura ʋo mucinda mumŋe kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe kugoʋera nyika iʋe nhaka yenyu.
Ndiwo mazita aʋarume iʋaʋo: Kurudzi rwaJuda, Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni, Shemueri, mŋanakomana waAmihudi;
kurudzi kwaBenjamini, Eridadi, mŋanakomana waKisroni;
kurudzi rwaʋaDani, mucinda Buki, mŋanakomana waJogri;
kuʋana ʋaJosefa, kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaManase, mucinda Hanieri, mŋanakomana waEfodi;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaEfraimi, mucinda Kemueri, mŋanakomana waShiftani;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaZeburuni, mucinda Erizafani, mŋanakomana waParnaki;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaIsakari, mucinda Partieri, mŋanakomana waAzani;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaAsheri, mucinda Ahihudi, mŋanakomana waSheromi;
kurudzi rwaʋana ʋaNaftari, mucinda Pedaheri, mŋanakomana waAmihudi.
Ndiʋo ʋakarairwa naJehova kuti ʋagoʋere nyika yeKanani, iʋe nhaka yaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi pamapani eMoabi, paJoridani paJeriko, akati:
Raira ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋape ʋaRevi panhaka yaʋakagara iʋo, maguta maʋaŋgagara; munofanira ʋo kupa ʋaRevi ruwa runopoteredza maguta aʋo.
Ʋanofanira kuʋa namaguta maʋaŋgagara; noruwa rwawo runofanira kuʋa rweŋombe dzaʋo, nefuma yaʋo, neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo ɀose.
Ruwa rwamaguta, amunofanira kupa ʋaRevi, runofanira kutaŋga paruȿiŋgo rweguta ndokupoteredza guta kuȿika pamakubiti anecuru cimŋe kunhiʋi dzose.

Munofanira kuyera kunze kweguta, kurutiʋi rwokumabvazuʋa makubiti aneɀuru ɀiʋiri, nokurutiʋi rwezasi makubiti aneɀuru ɀiʋiri, nokurutiʋi rwokumsoro makubiti aneɀuru ɀiʋiri, guta riri pakati. Ndirwo runofanira kuʋa ruwa rwamaguta aʋo.
Maguta amunopa ʋaRevi anofanira kuʋa maguta matanhatu oʋutiziro, amunofanira kuʋapa, kuti muʋurayi atizire kwaari; kunze kwaiwayo munofanira kuʋapa maguta anamakumi manna namaʋiri.
Maguta ose amunopa ʋaRevi anofanira kuʋa maguta anamakumi manna namasere, iwo noruwa rwawo.

Kana ari maguta amunotora panhaka dzaʋana ʋaIsraeri, kunaʋanamazhinji munofanira kutora mazhinji, kunaʋanamashoma munofanira kutora mashoma; rudzi rumŋe norumŋe runofanira kupa ʋaRevi mamŋe maguta, seɀarwakapiwa nhaka yarwo.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naMosesi, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Kana mayambuka Joridani, mukapinda munyika yeKanani,
munofanira kuɀisanaŋgurira maguta, aʋe maguta oʋutiziro kwamuri; kuti muʋurayi, unoʋuraya munhu asiŋgaiti nobgoni atizire’ko.
Maguta iwayo anofanira kuʋa kwamuri ʋutiziro pamutsiʋi, kuti muʋurayi arege kufa, asinakumbotoŋgwa pamberi peʋuŋgano.
Maguta amunoʋapa, anofanira kuʋa kwamuri maguta matanhatu oʋutiziro.
Munofanira kuʋapa maguta matatu mhiri kwaJoridani, namamŋe maguta matatu munofanira kuʋapa munyika yeKanani; ndiwo anofanira kuʋa maguta oʋutiziro.
Maguta iwayo matanhatu anofanira kuʋa ʋutiziro kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, nokumŋeni, nokumutorwa ugere pakati paʋo; kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakaʋuraya munhu, asina‐kuita nobgoni, atizire’ko.
Asi kana aciŋge amuroʋa nenhumbi yeɗare, akafa, waʋa muʋurayi; ɀino muʋurayi unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Kana aciŋge amuʋuraya nebge riri muruʋoko rwake, riŋgaʋuraya munhu, akafa, waʋa muʋurayi; ɀino muʋurayi unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Kana aciŋge amuroʋa nenhumbi yamatanda iri muruʋoko rwake, iŋgaʋuraya munhu, akafa, waʋa muʋurayi; muʋurayi unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Mutsiʋi weropa ndiye unofanira kuʋuraya muʋurayi amene; kana akasoŋgana naye, unofanira kumuʋuraya.
Kana aciŋge amusunda acimuʋeŋga, kana kumuposhera, amuʋandira, akafa;
kana ɀimŋe akamuroʋa noruʋoko, acimuʋeŋga, akafa, wakamuroʋa unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo; muʋurayi; mutsiʋi weropa, unofanira kuʋuraya muʋurayi, kana akasoŋgana naye.
Asi kana aciŋge amusunda kamŋe‐kamŋe, asinakumuʋeŋga, kana kumuposhera necinhu, asina‐kumuʋandira,
kana nebge, riŋgaʋuraya munhu, akarikanda pamsoro pake, asiŋgamuʋoni, akafa, iye asinakumuʋeŋga, kana kutȿaka kumukuʋadza;
ɀino ʋuŋgano inofanira kutoŋga mhoȿa pakati pomukuʋadzi nomutsiʋi weropa nemirairo iyi:

Ipapo ʋuŋgano inofanira kurwira muʋurayi paruʋoko rwomutsiʋi weropa, ʋuŋgano igomudzosera kuguta rake roʋutiziro, kwaakaŋga atizira; ɀino iye unofanira kugara’mo kuȿikira muprista mukuru afa, iye wakazodzwa namafuta matȿene.
Asi kana ŋguʋa ipi neipi muʋurayi akaɗarika muganho weguta rake roʋutiziro, kwaakaŋga atizira,
mutsiʋi weropa akamuwana kunze kwomuganho weguta rake roʋutiziro, mutsiʋi weropa akaʋuraya muʋurayi uyo, iye haaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa yeropa rake;
nokuti waifanira kugara muguta rake roʋutiziro kuȿikira muprista mukuru afa; asi kana muprista mukuru afa, muʋurayi unofanira kudzokera kunyika yake.
Iɀi ɀinofanira kuʋa kwamuri murairo wokutoŋga nawo kuȿikira kumarudzi enyu ose kwamunogara kwose.
Aninani unoʋuraya munhu, muʋurayi unofanira kuʋurawa nokupupura kweɀapupu; asi capupu cimŋe hacifaniri kupupurira munhu akaʋurawa.
Ʋuye hamufaniri kugamucira dzikinuro pamsoro poʋupenyu bgomuʋurayi, unofanira kuti aʋurawe; asi unofanira kuʋurawa ɀirokwaɀo.
Musagamucira dzikinuro pamsoro pomunhu wakatizira kuguta roʋutiziro, kuti adzokere kugara munyika yake, kuȿikira muprista afa.
Naiɀoɀo hamufaniri kuȿiɓisa nyika mamugere, nokuti ropa rinoȿiɓisa nyika; nyika haiŋgayananisirwi pamsoro peropa rakateʋurirwa’mo, asi kwoga neropa romunhu wakariteʋura.
Musaȿiɓisa nyika mamugere, mandigere ʋo ini; nokuti ini Jehova ndigere pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa ʋemhuri yaʋana ʋaGireadi, mŋanakomana waMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, ʋemhuri dzaʋana ʋaJosefa, ʋakasweɗera, ʋakataura pamberi paMosesi, napamberi pamacinda, ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋana ʋaIsraeri,

ʋakati: Jehova wakaraira tenzi waŋgu, kuti agoʋere nyika nemijenya pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋe nhaka yaʋo; ʋuye ɀe, tenzi waŋgu wakarairwa naJehova kupa ʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi, munuŋuna weɗu, nhaka yake.

Ɀino kana iʋo ʋakawanikwa nomumŋe waʋanakomana ʋamarudzi mamŋe aʋana ʋaIsraeri, nhaka yaʋo icafanira kubviswa panhaka yamadziɓaɓa eɗu, ikawedzerwa panhaka yorudzi kwaʋanozondogara; saiɀoɀo icabviswa panhaka yatakapiwa nemijenya.
Ɀino kana gore reJuberi raʋana ʋaIsraeri riciȿika, nhaka yaʋo icawedzerwa panhaka yorudzi kwaʋagere; naiɀoɀo nhaka yaʋo icabviswa panhaka yorudzi rwamadziɓaɓa eɗu.
Ɀino Mosesi akaraira ʋana ʋaIsraeri seɀakataura Jehova, akati: Rudzi rwaʋana ʋaJosefa runotaura kwaɀo.
Ndiro shoko rakarairwa naJehova pamsoro paʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi: Ŋgaʋawanikwe naʋaʋanoɗa; asi ŋgaʋawanikwe naʋeimba yorudzi rwaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo hapanenhaka yaʋana ʋaIsraeri iŋgabva kunorumŋe rudzi ikaenda kunorumŋe; nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira, mumŋe nomumŋe, kunamatira nhaka yorudzi rwamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Mŋanasikana mumŋe nomumŋe unenhaka parudzi rupi norupi rwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ŋgaawanikwe nomumŋe weimba yorudzi rwaɓaɓa ʋake, kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri, mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋagare nhaka yamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Naiɀoɀo hapanenhaka iŋgazobva kunorumŋe rudzi, ikaenda kunorumŋe; nokuti marudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri acanamatira, rumŋe norumŋe, nhaka yarwo.
Ʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi ʋakaita seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Nokuti Mara, naTirza, naHogra, naMirka, naNoa, iʋo ʋanasikana ʋaZerofehadi, ʋakawanikwa naʋanakomana ʋaʋanuŋuna ʋaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ʋakawanikwa padzimba dzaʋana ʋaManase, mŋanakomana waJosefa, nhaka ikagara parudzi rweimba yaɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ndiyo mirairo nemitemo, yakarairwa ʋana ʋaIsraeri naJehova nomuromo waMosesi pamapani eMoabi paJoridani paJeriko. [ɀaeŋga]
Ndiwo mashoko akataurwa naMosesi kuʋaIsraeri ʋose mhiri kwaJoridani murenje, muMupata wakatarisana neSufi, pakati peParani, neTofera, neRabani, neHazeroti, neDizahabi.
Kubva paHorebi, nenzira yokugomo reSeiri, kuȿika paKadeshi‐barnea, munhu unofamba mazuʋa anegumi nerimŋe.
Ɀino pagore ramakumi manna, pamŋedzi wegumi nomumŋe, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi, Mosesi wakaʋudza ʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀose ɀaʋakarairwa naJehova naye;
wakati akunda Sihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga agere Heshboni, naOgi, mambo weBashani, wakaŋga agere Ashtaroti, paEdrei,
Mosesi akataŋga kuɗudzira murairo uyu ʋari mhiri kwaJoridani, panyika yokwaMoabi, akati:
Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakataura nesu paHorebi, akati: Makagara ŋguʋa yakariŋgana pagomo iri.

Dzokai, mufambe, muende kumakomo aʋaAmori nokunɀimbo dzose dziri pedyo nawo, kuMupata, nokumakomo, nokumapani, nokurutiʋi rwezasi, nokumhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa, okunyika yaʋaKanani, nokuRebanoni, kuȿikira kurwizi rukuru, rwizi Ufratesi.
Tarirai, ndakaisa nyika pamberi penyu; pindai, mutore nyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa enyu naJehova, kunaAbrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo, kuti ʋacaipiwa iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo ʋanoʋateʋera.
Ŋguʋa iyo ndakataura nemi, ndikati: Handigoni kukutakurai ndiri ndoga;
Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakakuwanzai; tarirai, nhasi maʋa senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga pakuwanda kwenyu.
Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu ŋgaakuwedzerei runecuru camazana pamakaȿika ɀino, amuropafadze seɀaakakupikirai.
Ini ndoga ndiŋgatakura seiko kurema kwenyu, nomutoro wenyu, nokurwa kwenyu?
Muɀitsaurirei ʋarume ʋakacenjera, ʋakaŋgwara, ʋanozikaŋwa, kumarudzi enyu, ndiʋaite ʋakuru ʋenyu.
Mukandipindura, mukati: Cinhu ico camataura cakanaka kuti ticiite.

Ipapo ndakatora ʋakuru ʋamarudzi enyu, ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakacenjera, ʋakaŋga ʋakazikanwa, ndikaʋaita ʋakuru ʋenyu, ʋaʋe ʋakuru ʋeɀuru, naʋakuru ʋamazana, naʋakuru ʋamakumi mashanu, naʋakuru ʋegumi, naʋatariri kumarudzi enyu.
Neŋguʋa iyo ndikaraira ʋatoŋgi ʋenyu, ndikati: Tererai mhoȿa dziri pakati pehama dzenyu, mururamisire pakati pomunhu nehama yake, nomutorwa ugere naye.
Musatsaura ʋanhu pakutoŋga kwenyu; munofanira kuterera muɗuku nomukuru nomutoʋo mumŋe; musatya munhu; nokuti kutoŋga ndokwaMŋari; asi kana kunemhaka yamusiŋgagoni, muʋuye nayo kwandiri kuti ndiinzwe.
Neŋguʋa iyo ndakakurairai ɀose ɀamunofanira kuita.
Ɀino takasimuka paHorebi, tikafamba murenje iro rose guru rinotyisa, ramakaʋona panzira yokumakomo aʋaAmori, seɀatakarairwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu; tikaȿika paKadeshi‐barnea.
Ndikati kwamuri: Maȿika panyika yamakomo yaʋaAmori, yatinopiwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Tarirai, Jehova, Mŋari wenyu wakaisa nyika iyo pamberi penyu; kwirai, muitore, seɀamakaʋudzwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu; musatya kana kuvunduka.
Ipapo imi makasweɗera mose kwandiri, mukati: Ŋgatitume ʋarume ʋatituŋgamirire, ʋatishorere nyika, ʋagoʋuya kuzotiʋudza nzira yatinofanira kukwira nayo, namaguta aticandoȿika kwaari.
Shoko iro rikandifadza; ndikatsaura ʋarume ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri pakati penyu, murume mumŋe kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe.
Iʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakakwira mugomo, ʋakaȿika mumupata weEshkori, ʋakaishora.
Ʋakatora mimŋe micero yenyika mumaʋoko aʋo, ʋakaɓurukira kwatiri nayo, ʋakadzoka neshoko kwatiri, ʋakati: Inyika yakanaka, yatinopiwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Asi makaramba kukwira, mukamukira kuraira kwaJehova Mŋari wenyu;
mukanyunyuta mumatente enyu, mukati: Jehova wakatiʋeŋga, saka wakatiɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, kuti atiise mumaʋoko aʋaAmori, kuti atiparadze.
Ɀino ticaendepiko? Hama dzeɗu dzanyawusa mŋoyo yeɗu, dziciti: Ʋanhu aʋo ʋanotikunda nokukura nokureɓa; maguta makuru, akakombga namaȿiŋgo anoȿika kuɗeŋga; ʋuye, takaʋonako ʋana ʋaEnaki.
Ipapo ini ndikati kwamuri: Musavunduka henyu, kana kuʋatya.
Jehova Mŋari wenyu unokutuŋgamirirai, iye ucakurwirai, seɀaakakuitirai ɀose paEgipita pamberi penyu,
nomurenje pamakaʋona muɓerekerwe wamakaɓerekwa nawo naJehova Mŋari wenyu, somunhu unoɓereka mŋana wake; panzira dzenyu dzose dzamakafamba nadzo, kudzimana muciȿika panɀimbo iyi.
Asi pacinhu ici hamuna‐kutenda Jehova Mŋari wenyu;
iye wakakutuŋgamirirai panzira, kuti akutȿakirei pamuŋgadzika matente enyu, nomŋoto ʋusiku, kuti akuratidzei nzira yamunofanira kufamba nayo, ʋuye negore masikati.
Ɀino Jehova akanzwa inzwi ramashoko enyu, akatsamŋa, akapika, aciti:
Ɀirokwaɀo, hakuŋgaʋi nomumŋe waʋanhu aʋa, ʋorudzi urwu rwakaipa, ucaʋona nyika yakanaka, yandakapika ndiciti ndicaipa madziɓaɓa enyu,
asi Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune, ndiye ucaiʋona; ndicamupa iye naʋana ʋake nyika yaakatsika, nokuti iye wakateʋera Jehova nomŋoyo wose.
Jehova akanditsamŋira neni ʋo nokuɗa kwenyu, akati: Newe ʋo hauŋgapindi ikoko;
Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, umire pamberi pako, ndiye ucapinda ikoko; umusimbise, nokuti ndiye ucagarisa ʋaIsraeri nhaka yaʋo.
Ʋana ʋenyu ʋaɗuku, ʋamakati ʋacatapxa, naʋana ʋenyu ʋasiŋgaziʋi nhasi ɀakanaka neɀakaipa, ndiʋo ʋacapinda ikoko; ndicaʋapa iyo, iʋe yaʋo.
Asi kana muri’mi, dzokai mufambe murenje nenzira yokuGuŋgwa Dɀuku.

Ɀino imi mukapindura, mukati kwandiri: Takatadzira Jehova, ticakwira heɗu tindorwa, ɀose seɀatakarairwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu. Mukashoŋga mumŋe nomumŋe nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, mukaɗa kukwira mugomo.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Uti kwaʋari: Musakwira kana kurwa, nokuti ini handizi pakati penyu; kuti murege kukundwa pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ndakataura nemi, asi makaramba kunditerera; asi makamukira murairo waJehova, mukaita manyawi, mukakwira mugomo.
Ɀino ʋaAmori ʋakaŋga ʋagere mugomo iro, ʋakaɓuɗa kuzorwa nemi, ʋakakudziŋgai, seɀinoita nyuci, ʋakakuparadzai kuȿikira paHorma.
Ipapo makadzoka, mukacema pamberi paJehova, asi Jehova haana‐kuterera inzwi renyu, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzake.
Naiɀoɀo makagara paKadeshi mazuʋa mazhinji, ŋguʋa yamakagara’po.
Ɀino takadzoka, tikafamba ticipinda murenje nenzira inoenda kuGuŋgwa Dɀuku, seɀandakaʋudzwa naJehova, tikapota‐pota gomo reSeiri mazuʋa mazhinji.
Ɀino Jehova akataura neni, akati:
Mapota‐pota gomo iri ŋguʋa yariŋgana; dzokai muende necokumsoro.
Raira ʋanhu, uti: Munofanira kupfuʋura nomunyika yehama dzenyu, ʋana ʋaEsau, ʋagere Seiri; iʋo ʋacakutyai, saka cenjerai.
Musaʋaʋamba, nokuti handiŋgakupiyi nyika yaʋo, kunyaŋge paŋgatsikwa norutsoka; nokuti ndakapa Esau gomo reSeiri, riʋe rake.
Munofanira kuteŋga ɀokudya kwaʋari nemari, mudye, nemvura munofanira kuiteŋga ʋo kwaʋari, munwe.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako wakakuropafadza pamaɓasa ose amaʋoko ako; iye unoziʋa kufamba kwako murenje iri guru. Jehova Mŋari wako wakaʋa newe makore awa makumi manna; haunakushaiwa cinhu.
Naiɀoɀo takapfuʋura hama dzeɗu, ʋana ʋaEsau, ʋagere Seiri, tikasiya nzira yokuMupata, inobva Erati napaEzioni‐geberi.
Tikadzoka, tikapfuʋura nenzira yokurenje rokwaMoabi.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Usarwa naʋaMoabi, kana kuʋaʋamba pakurwa; nokuti handiŋgakupi nyika yaʋo, iʋe yako; nokuti ndakapa Ari ʋana ʋaRoti, iʋe yaʋo.
(Kare ʋaEmi ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo, ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋakuru, ʋazhinji, ʋarefu, saʋaAnaki;
ʋanonzi ʋorudzi rwaʋaRefaimi, saʋaAnaki, asi ʋaMoabi ʋanoʋaidza ʋaEmi.
NaʋaHori ʋo ʋakaŋga ʋagere Seiri kare; asi ʋana ʋaEsau ʋakaʋateʋera, ʋakaʋaparadza pamberi paʋo, ʋakagara panɀimbo yaʋo; seɀakaita ʋaIsraeri nenyika yaʋo yaʋakapiwa naJehova iʋe yaʋo.)
Ɀino simukai, muyambuke rukoʋa Zeredi. Tikayambuka rukoʋa Zeredi.

Ɀino mazuʋa okubva kweɗu paKadeshi‐barnea kuȿikira tayambuka rukoʋa Zeredi, aiʋa makore makumi matatu namasere; kuȿikira rudzi rwose rwaʋarume ʋehondo ʋaparadzwa pakati pemisasa, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋapikirwa naJehova.
Ʋuye ruʋoko rwaJehova ʋo rwairamba rucirwa naʋo, kuti ʋaparadzwe pakati pemisasa kuȿikira ʋapera.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋehondo ʋakati ʋapera nokufa pakati paʋanhu,
Jehova akataura neni, akati:
Nhasi unofanira kupfuʋura napaAri, pamuganho waMoabi;
kana wosweɗera pakatarisana naʋana ʋaAmoni, usarwa naʋo, kana kuʋaʋamba; nokuti handiŋgakupi nyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni, iʋe yako; nokuti ndakaipa ʋana ʋaRoti, iʋe yaʋo.
(Naiyo ʋo yainzi inyika yaʋaRefaimi; ʋaRefaimi ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo kare; asi ʋaAmoni ʋaiʋaidza ʋaZamzumi;
ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋakuru, ʋazhinji, ʋarefu saʋaAnaki; asi Jehova wakaʋaparadza pamberi paʋo, ʋakaʋateʋera, ʋakagara panɀimbo yaʋo;
seɀaakaita naʋana ʋaEsau, ʋanogara Seiri, ŋguʋa yaakaparadza ʋaHori pamberi paʋo, iʋo ʋakaʋateʋera, ʋakagara panɀimbo yaʋo kuȿikira nhasi;
ʋaAvi, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumisha kuȿikira Gaza, ʋakaparadzwa naʋaKaftori, ʋakabva Kaftori, ʋakagara panɀimbo yaʋo)
Simukai, mufambe, muyambuke rwizi Arnoni; tarirai, ndakaisa mumaʋoko enyu Sihoni muAmori, mambo weHeshboni, nenyika yake; taŋgai kuitora, muʋambe kurwa naye.
Nhasi ndicataŋga kuvundusa nokutyisa ndudzi dziri pasi peɗeŋga rose pamsoro penyu, iʋo ʋacanzwa guhu pamsoro penyu, ʋacabvunda nokutya kwaɀo pamsoro penyu.
Ɀino ndakatuma nhume tiri murenje reKedemoti, kunaSihoni, mambo weHeshboni, namashoko orugare, ndiciti:
Nditendere kupfuʋura nomunyika yako, ndicafamba nenzira huru, handiŋgatsaukiri kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe.
Muŋganditeŋgesera ɀokudya nemari, ndidye; muŋgandipa mvura ndiciripa nemari, ndinwe, asi nditendere henyu kupfuʋura namakumbo;
seɀandakaitirwa naʋana ʋaEsau ʋagere Seiri, naʋaMoabi, ʋagere Ari; kuȿikira ndayambuka Joridani, ndikapinda munyika yatinopiwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Asi Sihoni, mambo weHeshboni, wakaramba kutitendera kupfuʋura nokwaari, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako wakawomesa mŋeya wake, akarambidza mŋoyo wake, kuti amuise iye muruʋoko rwako, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Tarira, ndataŋga kuisa Sihoni nenyika yake kwauri; taŋga kutora, kuti nyika iʋe yako.
Ipapo Sihoni akaʋuya, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose kuzorwa nesu paJahazi.
Jehova Mŋari weɗu akamuisa
Neŋguʋa iyo tikakunda maguta ake ose, tikaparadza cose maguta ose aiʋa naʋanhu, pamŋe cete naʋakadzi naʋana ʋaɗuku, hatina‐kusiya kunyaŋge nomumŋe.
Asi ɀipfuwo ɀoga takaɀitora ɀiʋe ɀeɗu ɀatakatapa, pamŋe cete neɀatakapamba pamaguta atakakunda.
Kubva paAroeri pamuʋuyo worwizi Arnoni, nokuguta riri parwizi, kuȿikira Gireadi, kwakaŋga kusineguta rakatikurira; Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakaaisa ose
asi hamuna‐kusweɗera kunyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni; kurutiʋi rwose rworwizi Jaboki, namaguta enyika yamakomo, napose patakaŋga tadziʋiswa naJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀino takadzoka, tikakwira nenzira inoenda Bashani; Ogi, mambo weBashani, akaɓuɗa, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose, kuzorwa nesu paEdrei.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Usamutya, nokuti ndakamuisa paruʋoko rwako, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose, nenyika yake; unofanira kuita naye seɀawakaitira Sihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga agere Heshboni.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakaisa mumaʋoko eɗu naiye Ogi ʋo, mambo weBashani, naʋanhu ʋake ʋose; tikamukunda kuȿikira asinomunhu waakasiyirwa.
Neŋguʋa iyo tikakunda maguta ake ose; kwakaŋga kusineguta rimŋe ratisina‐kumutorera, maguta anamakumi matanhatu, nenyika yose yeArgobi, noʋushe bgaOgi muBashani.
Iwo akaŋga ari maguta akapoteredzwa ose namaȿiŋgo marefu, namasuʋo, namazariro, kunze kwemisha mizhinji‐zhinji yakaŋga isinamaȿiŋgo.
Tikaaparadza cose, seɀatakaitira Sihoni, mambo weHeshboni, tikaparadza cose maguta ose akaŋga anaʋanhu, pamŋe cete naʋakadzi naʋana ʋaɗuku.
Asi ɀipfuwo ɀose, neɀakapambga pamaguta awo, iɀo takaɀitapa isu.
Neŋguʋa iyo takatorera madzimambo maʋiri aʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mhiri kwaJoridani, nyika yaʋo kubva parwizi Arnoni, kuȿikira pagomo reHermoni;
(Hermoni rinotumidzwa Sirioni naʋaSidoni, asi ʋaAmori ʋanoritumidza Seniri;)
maguta ose eɓani, neGireadi rose, neBashani rose, kuȿikira paSareka neEdrei, iwo maguta oʋushe bgaOgi muBashani.
(Nokuti Ogi, mambo weBashani, ndiye woga wakaŋga asara kunaʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaʋaRefaimi; mubeda wake wakaŋga uri wamatare; ko hauzi paRaba raʋana ʋaAmoni here? Kureɓa kwawo kwakaŋga kuciȿika pamakubiti
Nyika iyi takaitora neŋguʋa iyo, ikaʋa yeɗu; ndikapa ʋaRubeni naʋaGadi nyika inobva paAroeri, parwizi Arnoni, nehafu yenyika yamakomo yeGireadi, namaguta ayo;
ndikapa hafu yorudzi rwaManase pakaŋga pasara paGireadi, neBashani rose, ʋushe bgaOgi, nenyika yose yeArgobi, ndiro Bashani rose. (Ndiyo inonzi nyika yaʋaRefaimi.
Jairi, mŋanakomana waManase, akatora nyika yose yeArgobi, kuȿikira pamuganho waʋaGeshuri naʋaMaakati, akaitumidza, iro Bashani rose, zita rake, Havoti‐jairi, kuȿikira nhasi.)
Ndikapa Makiri Gireadi.
Asi ʋaRubeni naʋaGadi ndakaʋapa kubva paGireadi kuȿikira parwizi Arnoni, ʋuye pakati pomupata nenyika yawo, kuȿikira parwizi Jaboki, ndiyo nyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni.
Ʋuye noMupata, neJoridani, nenyika inobva paKinereti, kuȿikira kuguŋgwa roMupata, ndiro Guŋgwa roMunyu, pajiŋga pegomo rePisga, kumabvazuʋa.

Neŋguʋa iyo ndakakurairai, ndikati: Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakakupai nyika iyo kuti iʋe yenyu; ɀino munofanira kuyambuka pamberi pehama dzenyu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri, makashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa, imi ʋarume ʋose mhare.
Asi ʋakadzi ʋenyu, naʋana ʋenyu ʋaɗuku, neɀipfuwo ɀenyu (ndinoziʋa kuti muneɀipfuwo ɀizhinji), iɀo ɀinofanira kusara mumaguta andakakupai;
kuȿikira Jehova apa hama dzenyu zororo semi, kuti naiʋo ʋaʋe nenyika yaʋanopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu mhiri kwaJoridani; ipapo muŋgadzokera mumŋe nomumŋe kunhaka yake, yandakakupai.
Neŋguʋa iyo ndikaraira ʋo Joshua, ndikati: Meso ako akaʋona ɀose ɀakaitirwa madzimambo awa maʋiri naJehova Mŋari wenyu; saiɀoɀo Jehova ucaitira ʋushe bgose kwamunoyambuka.
Hamufaniri kuʋatya, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiye unokurwirai.
Neŋguʋa iyo ndikanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, ndikati:
Imi Jehova Mŋari, makataŋga kuratidza muranda wenyu ʋukuru bgenyu, noruʋoko rwenyu runesimba; nokuti ndoupiko mŋari kuɗeŋga kana panyika uŋgaita ɀakafanana namaɓasa enyu, nesimba renyu?
Ƌonditenderai henyu kuyambuka, ndiʋone nyika yakanaka iri mhiri kwaJoridani, negomo iro rakanaka, neRebanoni.
Asi Jehova wakanditsamŋira nokuɗa kwenyu, akasandinzwa; Jehova akati kwandiri: Ɀariŋgana! cirega kuzotaura ɀe neni pamsoro peshoko iro.
Kwira pamsoro‐soro pePisga, utarire kumaʋirazuʋa, nokumsoro, nezasi, nokumabvazuʋa, uʋone nameso ako; nokuti hauŋgayambuki Joridani urwu.
Asi raira Joshua, umutse mŋoyo wake nokumusimbisa, nokuti iye ucayambuka pamberi paʋanhu aʋa, iye ucaʋagarisa nhaka yenyika yaucaʋona.
Ɀino tikagara pamupata wakatarisana neBeti‐peori.
Ɀino imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, tererai ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀandinokudzidzisai, kuti muɀiite; kuti murarame, mupinde mutore nyika, yamunopiwa naJehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu.
Musawedzera kana kutapudza pashoko randinokurairai, kuti muceŋgete mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, yandinokurairai.
Meso enyu akaʋona ɀakaitwa naJehova nokuɗa kweɀakaitwa paBaari‐peori; nokuti ʋarume ʋose ʋakateʋera Baari‐peori, Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakaʋaparadza pakati penyu.
Asi imi, makanamatira Jehova Mŋari wenyu, imi mose muri ʋapenyu kuȿikira nhasi.
Tarirai, ndakakudzidzisai ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa, seɀandarairwa naJehova Mŋari waŋgu, kuti muite saiɀoɀo panyika yamunopinda, kuti iʋe yenyu.
Naiɀoɀo muceŋgete iɀoɀo, muɀiite; nokuti ndiko kucenjera kwenyu nokuŋgwara kwenyu pamberi paʋanhu ʋacanzwa ɀose iɀi ɀakatemŋa, ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, rudzi urwu rukuru ndiʋanhu ʋakacenjera ʋakaŋgwara.
Nokuti rudzi rukuru ruripiko, runamŋari uri pedyo naʋo, saJehova Mŋari weɗu ŋguʋa ipi neipi yatinoɗana kwaari?
Rudzi rukuru ruripiko, runeɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa ɀakarurama somurairo uyu wose, wandinoisa pamberi penyu nhasi?

Asi ɀicenjererei, mushiŋgaire kuceŋgeta mŋeya yenyu, kuti murege kukaŋganwa ɀinhu ɀamakaʋona nameso enyu, ɀirege kuzobva pamŋoyo yenyu mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgenyu; asi munofanira kuɀiziʋisa ʋana ʋenyu naʋana ʋaʋana ʋenyu;

musi wamakaŋga mumire pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu paHorebi, musi Jehova waakati kwandiri: Ndiʋuŋganidzire ʋanhu, ndiʋaʋudze mashoko aŋgu, kuti ʋadzidze kunditya mazuʋa ose aʋacagara panyika, ʋagodzidzisa ʋana ʋaʋo ʋo.
Imi mukasweɗera, mukamira pajiŋga pegomo; gomo rikapfuta nomŋoto kuȿikira pakati peɗeŋga, pamŋe cete nerima, negore, nokuȿiɓa kukuru.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura nemi ari mukati momŋoto; mukanzwa inzwi ramashoko, asi hamuna‐kuʋona kuti wakaɗini; makanzwa inzwi roga.
Ipapo wakaɗudzira suŋgano yake kwamuri, yaakakurairai, kuti muiite, iyo mirairo inegumi; akainyora pamahwendefa maʋiri amabge.
Neŋguʋa iyo Jehova akandiraira, kuti ndikudzidzisei ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa, kuti mundoɀiita panyika iyo, kwamunoenda, kuzoiita yenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀicenjererei ɀikuru, nokuti hamuna‐kuʋona kuti wakaŋga akaɗini, musi Jehova waakataura nemi paHorebi ari pakati pomŋoto.
Kuti murege kuɀishatsa, muciɀiitira cifananidzo cakaʋezwa, cakafanana necinhu cipi necipi, kana mufananidzo womurume kana womukadzi,
Kana mufananidzo wemhuka ipi neipi iri panyika, kana mufananidzo weshiri ipi neipi inamapapiro, inobururuka muɗeŋga,
kana mufananidzo wecinhu cipi necipi cinokambaira pasi, kana mufananidzo wehoʋe ipi neipi iri mumvura pasi penyika;

kuti murege kusimudzira meso enyu kuɗeŋga, ɀino kana muciʋona zuʋa nomŋedzi nenyeredzi, hondo yose yokuɗeŋga, mukatsauswa mukanamata kwaɀiri nokuɀishumira, iɀo ɀakagoʋerwa ndudzi dzose dziri pasi peɗeŋga naJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Asi Jehova wakakutorai imi, akakuɓuɗisai mucoto camatare, paEgipita, kuti muʋe ʋanhu ʋenhaka yake, seɀamuri nhasi.
Jehova akanditsamŋira ʋo nokuɗa kwenyu, akapika kuti ini handiŋgayambuki Joridani, ndipinde munyika iyo yakanaka, yamunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu, kuti iʋe yenyu.
Asi ini ndinofanira kufira munyika ino, handifaniri kuyambuka Joridani; asi imi mucayambuka henyu, mukapiwa nyika iyo yakanaka.
Muɀicenjerere, kuti murege kukaŋganwa suŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, yaakaita nemi, mukaɀiitira cifananidzo cakaʋezwa comufananidzo wecinhu cipi necipi, cawakadziʋiswa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako, mŋoto unoparadza, naMŋari unegoɗo.

Ɀino kana iwe waɓereka ʋana naʋazukuru, mukagara ŋguʋa huru panyika, mukaɀishatsa, mukaita cifananidzo cakaʋezwa nomufananidzo wecinhu cipi necipi, mukaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, mukamutsamŋisa;

ini ndinoɗana ɗeŋga napasi ɀikupupurirei nhasi, kuti mucakurumidza kuparadzwa cose panyika yamunoyambukira Joridani kuti muende kwairi kuiita yenyu; hamuŋgaiti’mo mazuʋa mazhinji, asi mucaparadzwa cose.
Jehova ucakuparadzirai pakati pendudzi, mucasara muri ʋashoma pakati pendudzi, kwamucandoiswa naJehova.
Apo mucashumira ʋamŋari, ʋakaitwa namaʋoko aʋanhu, ʋamatanda naʋamabge, ʋasiŋgaʋoni, kana kunzwa, kana kudya, kana kunhuwidza.
Asi kana mukazotȿaka Jehova Mŋari wako, ipapo, ucamuwana, kana ukamutȿaka nomŋoyo wako wose nomŋeya wako wose.
Ɀino kana uri munjodzi, ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ɀakuwira, pamazuʋa okupedzisira ucadzokera kunaJehova Mŋari wako, ukaterera inzwi rake.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako ndiMŋari unenyasha; haaŋgakusiyi, kana kukuparadza, kana kukaŋganwa suŋgano yamadziɓaɓa ako, yaakaʋapikira.

Nokuti bvunzai henyu ɀino pamazuʋa akapfuʋura, imi musati maʋa’po, kubva pazuʋa rokusikwa kwaʋanhu panyika naMŋari, kubva panorumŋe rutiʋi rweɗeŋga kuȿikira kunorumŋe, kana kwaimboʋa’po cinhu cikuru cakaɗai, kunyaŋge kumbonzwika cakaɗai?
Ko kunaʋanhu, ʋakambonzwa inzwi raMŋari ricitaura riri mukati momŋoto, seɀamakanzwa imi, ʋakararama here?
Kana Mŋari wakatoŋgoidza kundoɀitsaurira rudzi pakati po
Imi makaratidzwa iɀoɀo, kuti muziʋe kuti Jehova ndiye Mŋari; hakunomumŋe kunze kwake.
Wakakunzwisai inzwi rake ari kuɗeŋga, kuti akudzidzise; panyika wakakuʋonesa mŋoto wake mukuru; iwe wakanzwa mashoko ake ari mukati momŋoto.
Wakaɗa madziɓaɓa ako, naiɀoɀo akaɀitsaurira ʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaʋateʋera, akakuɓuɗisa paEgipita, iye anewe nesimba rake guru;
kuti adziŋge pamberi pako ndudzi dzinokupfuʋura noʋukuru nesimba, akupinze iwe, akupe nyika yaʋo iʋe nhaka yako, seɀaakaita nhasi.
Naiɀoɀo uziʋe nhasi, uɀiceŋgete mumŋoyo mako, kuti Jehova ndiye Mŋari kuɗeŋga kumsoro napanyika pasi; hakunomumŋe.
Unofanira kuceŋgeta ɀaakatema, nemirairo yake, yandinokuraira nhasi, kuti ufare iwe naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera, kuti uwedzere mazuʋa ako panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino Mosesi akatsaura maguta matatu mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa;
kuti muʋurayi agone kutizira’ko, iye wakaʋuraya wokwake, asina‐kuita nobgoni, asina‐kumuʋeŋga kare; kuti kana aciŋge atizira kunerimŋe ramaguta iwayo, ararame;
aiti: Bezeri murenje, kunyika yamapani, waʋaRubeni, neRamoti paGireadi, waʋaGadi, neGorani paBashani, waʋaManase.
Ɀino ndiwo murairo wakaiswa naMosesi pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri:
Ndiɀo ɀakapupurwa, neɀakatemŋa, neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀakataurwa naMosesi kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita;
kumabvazuʋa kwaJoridani, pamupata wakatarisana neBeti‐peori, munyika yaSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga agere Heshboni, iye wakakundwa naMosesi naʋana ʋaIsraeri, pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita;
ʋakatora nyika yake, nenyika yaOgi, mambo weBashani, ikaʋa yaʋo; iwo madzimambo maʋiri aʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwaJoridani, kumabvazuʋa;
kubva paAroeri, pamuʋuyo womupata weArnoni, kuȿikira pagomo reSioni (ndiro Hermoni),
noMupata wose uri mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa, kuȿikira paguŋgwa romupata, pajiŋga pePisga.
Ɀino Mosesi akaɗana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, akati kwaʋari: Inzwai ʋaIsraeri, ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀandinotaura nhasi muciɀinzwa, kuti muɀidzidze nokuɀiceŋgeta mugoɀiita.
Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakaita suŋgano nesu paHorebi.
Jehova haana‐kuita suŋgano iyi namadziɓaɓa eɗu, asi nesu, isu tose tiri ʋapenyu nhasi pano.
Jehova akataura nemi, ɀiso ɀakatarisana, ari mukati momŋoto,
(Neŋguʋa iyo ini ndakaŋga ndimire pakati paJehova nemi, kuti ndikuziʋisei shoko raJehova; nokuti imi makaŋga mucitya nokuɗa kwomŋoto, mukasakwira mugomo;) akati:
Ndini Jehova Mŋari wako, wakakuɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, muimba yoʋuranda.
Usaʋa naʋamŋe ʋamŋari kunze kwaŋgu.
Usaɀiitira mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, kana uri mufananidzo wecinhu ciri kuɗeŋga kumsoro, kana weciri panyika pasi, kana weciri mumvura pasi penyika.
Usafugamira iɀoɀo, kana kuɀishumira; nokuti ini Jehova Mŋari wako, ndiri Mŋari unegoɗo; ndinoroʋa ʋana nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kuȿikira kurudzi rwecitatu norwecinna rwaʋanondiʋeŋga;
ndiciitira nyasha ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ʋanondiɗa, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu.
Usareʋa zita raJehova Mŋari wako pasina; nokuti Jehova haaŋgaregi kumupa mhoȿa unoreʋa zita rake pasina.
Ceŋgeta zuʋa resaɓata, riʋe dɀene, seɀawakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Uɓate mazuʋa matanhatu, uite maɓasa ako ose.

Asi zuʋa recinomŋe isaɓata raJehova Mŋari wako; usatoŋgoɓata maɓasa naro, iwe, kana mŋanakomana wako, kana mŋanasikana wako, kana muranda wako, kana murandakadzi wako, kana ŋombe yako, kana mboŋgoro yako, kana cimŋe ceɀipfuwo ɀako, kana mŋeni wako uri mukati mamasuʋo ako; kuti muranda wako nomurandakadzi wako ʋazorore sewe.

Unofanira kuraŋgarira kuti newe ʋo waiʋa muranda panyika yeEgipita, Jehova Mŋari wako akakuɓuɗisa necanza cinesimba noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa; naiɀoɀo Jehova Mŋari wako wakakuraira kuti uceŋgete zuʋa resaɓata.
Kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako, seɀawakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wako; kuti mazuʋa ako aʋe mazhinji, ufare panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Usaʋuraya.
Ʋuye usaita ʋupombge.
Ʋuye usaɓa.
Ʋuye usapupurira wokwako nhema.
Ʋuye usaciʋa mukadzi wowokwako; ʋuye usacocora imba yowokwako, kana munda wake, kana muranda wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana ŋombe yake, kana mboŋgoro yake, kana cimŋe cinhu cowokwako.
Jehova wakataura mashoko awa ose pagomo kuʋuŋgano yenyu yose, ari mukati momŋoto negore, nokuȿiɓa kukuru, nenzwi guru; haana‐kuwedzera mamŋe. Akaanyora pamahwendefa maʋiri amabge, akandipa iwo.
Ɀino imi makati mucinzwa inzwi ricibva mukati merima, negomo ricipfuta nomŋoto, mukasweɗera kwandiri, ʋakuru ʋose ʋamarudzi enyu, naʋakuru ʋenyu,
mukati: Tarirai, Jehova Mŋari weɗu watiratidza kubginya kwake noʋukuru bgake, tikanzwa inzwi rake ricibva mumŋoto; taʋona heɗu nhasi kuti Mŋari uŋgataura nomunhu, akararama hake.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ticafireiko? Nokuti mŋoto uyu mukuru ucatiparadza; kana tikaramba ticinzwa inzwi raJehova Mŋari weɗu ticafa.
Nokuti ndianiko pakati paʋanhu ʋose wakanzwa inzwi raMŋari mupenyu acitaura ari mumŋoto, sesu, akararama here?
Sweɗera hako iwe, unzwe ɀose ɀicarebga naJehova Mŋari weɗu, ugozotiʋudza ɀose ɀaucaʋudzwa iwe naJehova Mŋari weɗu; ticaɀinzwa, nokuɀiita.
Ɀino Jehova akanzwa inzwi ramashoko enyu, ŋguʋa yamakataura neni; Jehova akati kwandiri: Ndanzwa inzwi ramashoko aʋanhu aʋa, aʋakataura newe; ɀose ɀaʋakareʋa ʋakataura haʋo ɀakanaka.
Ƌai ʋaiʋa nemŋoyo yakaɗai, ʋakanditya nokuceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu ŋguʋa dzose, kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka naʋo, iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, nokusiŋgaperi!
Enda, undoti kwaʋari: Dzokerai kumatente enyu.
Asi iwe, mira pano kwandiri, ndikuʋudze murairo wose, neɀakatemŋa, neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀaunofanira kuʋadzidzisa, kuti ʋaɀiite panyika yandinoʋapa, kuti iʋe yaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo cenjerai, kuti muite seɀamakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu; musatsaukira kurutiʋi rworudyi kana rworuɓoshwe.
Munofanira kufamba nenzira yose yamakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu, kuti murarame, ɀiʋe ɀakanaka nemi, namazuʋa enyu aʋe mazhinji panyika iyo, icaʋa yenyu.
Ɀino ndiwo murairo, neɀakatemŋa, neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀandakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu kuti ndikudzidzisei, kuti muɀiite kunyika kwamunoenda kuti iʋe yenyu;

kuti utye Jehova Mŋari wako, uceŋgete ɀose ɀaakatema nemirairo yake, yandinokuraira, iwe, nomŋanakomana wako, nomŋanakomana womŋanakomana wako, mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgako, kuti mazuʋa ako aʋe mazhinji.
Naiɀoɀo cinzwa Israeri, ucenjere kuti uɀiite; kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka newe, muwande kwaɀo, seɀamakapikirwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ako, panyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Cinzwa Israeri, Jehova Mŋari weɗu ndiJehova mumŋe cete.
Uɗe Jehova Mŋari wako nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose, nesimba rako rose.
Ɀino mashoko awa andinokuraira nhasi, anofanira kuʋa mumŋoyo mako;
unofanira kushiŋgaira kuadzidzisa ʋana ʋako, nokuataura kana ugere mumba mako, kana ucifamba munzira, kana uciʋata pasi, kana ucimuka.
Unofanira kuasuŋgira paruʋoko rwako, ciʋe ciratidzo; ʋuye anofanira kuʋa rundanyara pakati pameso ako.
Unofanira kuanyora pamagwatidziro emikoʋa yeimba yako, napamasuʋo ako.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako aciŋge akupinza munyika, yaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo, kuti ucakupa iyo,
nedzimba dzizere neɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka, dzausina‐kuzadza iwe, namakaŋgwa akacerwa, ausina‐kucera iwe, neminda yemizambiriŋga nemiorivi, yausina‐kusima iwe; iwe ukadya ukaguta,
ɀino cenjera kuti urege kukaŋganwa Jehova, wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, paimba yoʋuranda.
Unofanira kutya Jehova Mŋari wako, nokumushumira, nokupika nezita rake.
Regai kuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋamŋari ʋendudzi dzinokupoteredzai;
nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako, uri pakati pako, ndiMŋari unegoɗo; kuti Jehova Mŋari wako arege kukutsamŋira, akuparadze panyika pose.
Musaidza Jehova Mŋari wenyu, seɀamakamuidza paMasa.
Munofanira kushiŋgaira kuceŋgeta mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, neɀipupuriro ɀake, neɀaakatema, ɀaakakuraira.
Ʋuye unofanira kuita ɀakarurama neɀakanaka pamberi paJehova, kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka newe, upinde munyika yakanaka iʋe yako, iyo yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa ako naJehova,
kuti iye ucadziŋga ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose pamberi pako, seɀakataurwa naJehova.
Ɀino kana mŋanakomana wako akakubvunza pashure, aciti: Ko iɀi ɀipupuriro, neɀakatemŋa, neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀamakarairwa naJehova Mŋari weɗu, ɀinoɗiniko?
Unofanira kuti kumŋanakomana wako: Isu takaŋga tiri ʋaranda ʋaFarao, Jehova akatiɓuɗisa paEgipita necanza cinesimba;
Jehova akaita ɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa kwaɀo, ɀakaipa, paEgipita, nokunaFarao, nokuimba yake yose, ticiɀiʋona;
akatiɓuɗisa’po, kuti atipinze pano, atipe nyika yaakapikira madziɓaɓa eɗu.
Jehova akaraira kuti tiite iɀi ɀose ɀaakatema, titye Jehova Mŋari weɗu, kuti tiitirwe ɀakanaka ŋguʋa dzose, aticeŋgete tiʋe ʋapenyu, seɀatakaita nhasi.
Ɀicaʋa ɀakarurama kwatiri, kana ticicenjerera kuti tiite murairo wose pamberi paJehova Mŋari weɗu, seɀatakarairwa naye.

Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari akupinza munyika maunoenda, kuiita yako, akadziŋga ndudzi zhinji pamberi pako, dzinoti: ʋaHeti, naʋaGirgashi, naʋaAmori, naʋaKanani, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHiʋi, naʋaJebusi, ndudzi nomŋe dzinokukunda noʋukuru nesimba;
kana Jehova Mŋari wako akaʋaisa
usawanana naʋo, usapa mŋanakomana wake mŋanasikana wako, kana kutorera mŋanakomana wako mŋanasikana wake.
Nokuti ucatsausa mŋanakomana wako arege kunditeʋera, kuti ashumire ʋamŋe ʋamŋari; naiɀoɀo Jehova ucakutsamŋirai kwaɀo, akakurumidza kukuparadza.
Asi ndiɀo ɀamunofanira kuʋaitira: Munofanira kuputsa artari dzaʋo, nokuputsanya shoŋgwe dzaʋo, nokutema matanda aʋo aʋanonamata nawo, nokupisa mifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋezwa.
Nokuti uri rudzi rutȿene kunaJehova Mŋari wako; Jehova Mŋari wako wakakutsaura kuti uʋe rudzi rwake cairwo pakati pendudzi dzose dziri panyika dzose.
Jehova haana‐kukuɗai, kana kukutsaurai, nokuti makaŋga makapfuʋura dzimŋe ndudzi nokuwanda; nokuti imi makaŋga muri ʋashoma kundudzi dzose.

Asi nokuti Jehova unokuɗai, ʋuye nokuti wakaŋga aciɗa kusimbisa kupika kwaakapikira madziɓaɓa enyu, nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo Jehova wakakuɓuɗisai necanza cinesimba, akakudzikinurai paimba yoʋuranda paruʋoko rwaFarao, mambo weEgipita.
Naiɀoɀo uziʋe kuti Jehova Mŋari wako, ndiye Mŋari, Mŋari wakatendeka, unosimbisa suŋgano yake nenyasha dzake kunaʋanomuɗa, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yake kusikira kumarudzi anecuru camazana;
unotsiʋa ʋanomuʋeŋga mumŋe nomumŋe, kuti aʋaparadze; haaŋganonokeri munhu unomuʋeŋga, asi ucamutsiʋa iye amene.
Naiɀoɀo unofanira kuceŋgeta murairo, neɀaakatema, neɀaakatoŋga, ɀandinokuraira nhasi, kuti uɀiite.
Ɀino kana muciterera iɀi ɀakatoŋgwa, mukaɀiceŋgeta nokuɀiita, Jehova Mŋari wako ucakusimbisira suŋgano yake nenyasha dzake seɀaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako;

iye ucakuɗa, nokukuropafadza, nokukuwanza; ucaropafadza ʋo ɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako, neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, ɀiyo ɀako, newaini yako, namafuta ako, neɀakaɓerekwa neŋombe dzako, namakwaiana amakwai ako, panyika yaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, kuti ucakupa iyo.
Ucaropafadzwa iwe kupfuʋura dzimŋe ndudzi dzose; hapaŋgaʋi pakati penyu murume kana mukadzi usiŋgaɓereki, kana pakati peɀipfuwo ɀenyu.
Jehova ucabvisa kwamuri hosha dzose; haaŋgatumiri kwamuri matenda akaipa eEgipita aunoziʋa, asi ucaatuma kuʋanhu ʋose ʋanokuʋeŋga.
Iwe ucaparadza ndudzi dzose dzicaiswa
Ɀino kana ukati mumŋoyo mako: Ndudzi idzi dzinotipfuʋura nokuwanda, ndiŋgadzitorera seiko
Haufaniri kuʋatya; unofanira kuraŋgarira ɀakanaka ɀakaitirwa Farao naʋaEgipita ʋose naJehova Mŋari wako;

nemiidzo mikuru yamakaʋona nameso enyu, neɀiratidzo, neɀinoshamisa, necanza cinesimba, noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ɀawakaɓuɗiswa naɀo naJehova Mŋari wako; ndiɀo ɀicaitira Jehova Mŋari wako ʋanhu ʋose ʋaunotya.
Ʋuye Jehova Mŋari wako ucatuma mago pakati paʋo, kuȿikira aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasara, ʋakaʋanda, ʋaparadzwa pamberi pako.
Usaʋatya, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako uri pakati pako, Mŋari mukuru unotyisa.
Jehova Mŋari wako ucadziŋga ndudzi idzo pamberi pako, rumŋe‐rumŋe; haufaniri kuʋaparadza ʋose kamŋe, kuti ɀikara ɀesaŋgo ɀirege kukuwandira.
Asi Jehova Mŋari wako ucaʋaisa
Ucaisa ʋo madzimambo aʋo mumaʋoko ako, kuti uroɀe mazita aʋo pasi peɗeŋga; hapanomunhu uŋgagona kumira pamberi pako, kuȿikira waʋaparadza.

Munofanira kupisa mifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋezwa yaʋamŋari ʋaʋo; haufaniri kucocora sirveri kana ndarama iri paʋari, kana kuitora, kuti urege kuteyiwa naɀo; nokuti ɀinonyaŋgadza pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako;
usapinza cinonyaŋgadza mumba mako, kuti iwe urege kuʋa cinhu cakayeriswa saico; unofanira kucisema cose, nokuciʋeŋga cose, nokuti cinhu cakayeriswa.
Murairo wose wandinokuraira nhasi munofanira kucenjera kuti muuite, kuti mugorarama, nokuwanda, nokupinda munyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa enyu naJehova, muiite yenyu.

Unofanira kuraŋgarira nzira yose yawakafambiswa nayo naJehova Mŋari wako murenje makore awa makumi manna, kuti akuninipise, nokukuidza, kuti aziʋe ɀaiʋa mumŋoyo mako, kana wakaŋga uciɗa kuceŋgeta mirairo yake, kana kwete.

Akakuninipisa, akakuziyisa nenzara, akakugutsa nemana, yawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi, kunyaŋge madziɓaɓa ako akaŋga asiŋgaziʋi ʋo; kuti akuziʋise kuti munhu haararami neɀokudya ɀoga, asi kuti munhu unorarama neɀose ɀinoɓuɗa mumuromo waJehova.
Ŋguʋo dzako hadzinakukusakarira, netsoka dzako hadzina‐kuɀimba makore awa makumi manna.
Fuŋga mumŋoyo mako, kuti Jehova Mŋari wako unokuraŋga somunhu unoraŋga mŋanakomana wake.
Unofanira kuceŋgeta mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ufambe nenzira dzake nokumutya.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako unokupinza munyika yakanaka, nyika inehoʋa dzemvura, namatsime, namadziʋa akadzika, anoɓuɗa pamipata napamakomo;
nyika ineɀiyo, nabari, nemizambiriŋga, nemiʋonde, nemitamba; nyika yemiorivi inamafuta, noʋuci;
nyika kwaucadya ciŋgwa, usiŋgashaiwi, kwausiŋgatoŋgoshaiwi cinhu; nyika inamabge emhaŋgura, napamakomo ayo ucacera ndarira.
Ucadya ukaguta, ukaʋoŋga Jehova Mŋari wako nokuɗa kwenyika yakanaka yaakakupa.
Cenjera kuti urege kukaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari wako, ukasaceŋgeta mirairo yake, neɀaakatoŋga, neɀaakatema, ɀandinokuraira nhasi;
kuti kana wadya ukaguta, ukaʋaka dzimba dzakanaka, ukagara madziri,
neŋombe dzako namakwai ako akawanda, nesirveri yako nendarama yako ikawanda, neɀose ɀaunaɀo ɀikawanda,
mŋoyo wako ukaɀikudza, ukakaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari wako, wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, paimba yoʋuranda;
iye wakakufambisa murenje guru rinotyisa,
wakakugutsa murenje nemana, yakaŋga isina‐kuzikanwa namadziɓaɓa ako, kuti akuninipise akuidze, kuti akuitire ɀakanaka pakupedzisira;
kuti urege kuzoti mumŋoyo mako: Simba raŋgu nokugona kworuʋoko rwaŋgu ndiɀo ɀakandiwanisa fuma iyi.
Asi unofanira kuraŋgarira Jehova Mŋari wako, nokuti ndiye unokupa simba rokufuma; kuti asimbise suŋgano yake, yaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, seɀaanoita nhasi.
Ɀino kana ukakaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari wako, ukateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ukaʋashumira, ukanamata kwaʋari, ndinokupupurirai nhasi kuti mucaparadzwa ɀirokwaɀo.
Imi mucaparadzwa sendudzi dzinoparadzwa naJehova pamberi penyu; nokuti makaramba kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Inzwa, iwe Israeri, nhasi unofanira kuyambuka Joridani, kuti upinde
naʋanhu ʋakuru ʋarefu, ʋana ʋaAnaki, ʋaunoziʋa, ʋawakanzwa ɀicinzi: Ndianiko uŋgamira pamberi paʋana ʋaAnaki?

Naiɀoɀo uziʋe nhasi kuti Jehova Mŋari wako ndiye unokutuŋgamirira somŋoto unoparadza; iye ucaʋaparadza, iye ucaʋakunda pamberi pako; naiɀoɀo iwe ucaʋadziŋga, nokuʋaparadza nokukurumidza, seɀawakaʋudzwa naJehova.

Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako aʋadziŋga pamberi pako, usataura mumŋoyo mako, uciti: Jehova wakandipinza munyika ino iʋe yaŋgu, nokuɗa kwokururama kwaŋgu; nokuti Jehova unodziŋga ndudzi idzi nokuɗa kwokuipa kwaʋo.

Haupindi munyika yaʋo, iʋe yako, nokuɗa kwokururama kwako, kana nokuɗa kwokururama kwomŋoyo wako; asi Jehova Mŋari wako unodziŋga ndudzi idzi pamberi pako nokuɗa kwokuipa kwaʋo, ʋuye kuti asimbise shoko rakapikirwa madziɓaɓa ako naJehova, kunaAbrahama, nokunaIsaka, nokunaJakobo.
Naiɀoɀo uziʋe kuti Jehova Mŋari wako haakupi nyika iyi yakanaka iʋe yako, nokuɗa kwokururama kwako; nokuti uri rudzi runemitsipa mikukutu.
Raŋgarira, usakaŋganwa, kuti wakatsamŋisa Jehova Mŋari wako sei murenje; kubva pazuʋa rawakaɓuɗa naro panyika yeEgipita kudzimana maȿika kunɀimbo iyi, makaramba mucimukira Jehova.
NapaHorebi makatsamŋisa Jehova, Jehova akakutsamŋirai, akaɗa kukuparadzai.

Ŋguʋa yandakakwira pagomo kundogamucira mahwendefa amabge, iwo mahwendefa esuŋgano, yaakaita iye Jehova nemi, ndakagara mugomo mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna; ndakaŋga ndisiŋgadyi ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura.
Ɀino Jehova akandipa mahwendefa maʋiri amabge, akaŋga akanyorwa nomunwe waMŋari; pamsoro pawo
Ɀino mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna ɀakati ɀapera, Jehova akandipa mahwendefa maʋiri amabge, iwo mahwendefa esuŋgano.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Simuka, kurumidza kuɓuruka pano, nokuti ʋanhu ʋako ʋawakaɓuɗisa paEgipita, ʋaɀitadzira; ʋakurumidza kutsauka panzira yandakaʋaraira; ʋaɀiitira mufananidzo wakaʋumbga.
Ʋuye Jehova akataura neni, akati: Ndaʋona rudzi urwu, tarira, rudzi runemitsipa mikukutu;
ndirege, ndiʋaparadze, ndidzime zita raʋo pasi peɗeŋga, ndikuite iwe rudzi runoʋapfuʋura nesimba noʋukuru.
Naiɀoɀo ndakadzoka, ndikaɓuruka pagomo, gomo rikapfuta nomŋoto; ɀino mahwendefa maʋiri esuŋgano akaŋga ari mumaʋoko aŋgu maʋiri.
Ndikatarira, ndikaʋona kuti makaŋga matadzira Jehova Mŋari wenyu; makaŋga maɀiitira mhuru yakaʋumbga; makaŋga makurumidza kutsauka panzira yamakaŋga marairwa naJehova.
Ndikaɓata mahwendefa maʋiri, ndikaarashira pasi namaʋoko aŋgu maʋiri, ndikaaputsa muciɀiʋona.

Ndikawira pasi pamberi paJehova, sapakutaŋga, mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna; ndakaŋga ndisiŋgadyi ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀose ɀamakaŋga matadza, muciita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, mucimutsamŋisa.
Nokuti ndakatya hasha nokutsamŋa kukuru, kwamakatsamŋirwa nako naJehova, nokuti wakaŋga aciɗa kukuparadzai. Asi Jehova wakandinzwa ʋo neŋguʋa iyo.
Jehova wakaŋga aneshuŋgu ʋo kwaɀo naAroni, akaɗa kumuparadza, ndikanyeŋgeterera Aroni ʋo neŋguʋa iyo.
Ndikatora ɀiʋi ɀenyu, iyo mhuru iya yamakaŋga maʋumba, ndikaipisa nomŋoto, ndikaipxanya, nokuikuya kwaɀo, kuȿikira yatsetseka seguruʋa; ndikakandira guruʋa rayo murukoʋa rwakaŋga rucibva mugomo.
NapaTabera ʋo, napaMasa, napaKibroti‐hatava makatsamŋisa Jehova.
Neŋguʋa yamakatumŋa naJehova kuti mubve paKadeshi‐barnea, aciti: Kwirai, mutore nyika, yandakakupai, iʋe yenyu, makamukira murairo waJehova Mŋari wenyu, mukasamutenda, nokusaterera inzwi rake.
Makaramba mucimukira Jehova kubva pazuʋa randakataŋga kukuziʋai.
Ɀino ndikawira pasi pamberi paJehova mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna,
Ɀino ndikanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, ndikati: Haiwa, Jehova Mŋari, musaparadza henyu ʋanhu ʋenyu nenhaka yenyu, ʋamakadzikinura noʋukuru bgenyu, ʋamakaɓuɗisa paEgipita necanza cinesimba.
Raŋgarirai ʋaranda ʋenyu, Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo; musatarira kusindimara kwaʋanhu aʋa, kana kuipa kwaʋo, kana ɀiʋi ɀaʋo;
kuti nyika kwamakatiɓuɗisa, irege kuzoti: Jehova wakaʋaɓuɗisa akaʋaʋurayira murenje, nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgagoni kuʋapinza munyika yaakaŋga aʋapikira, ʋuye nokuti wakaŋga aciʋaʋeŋga.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro rudzi rwenyu nenhaka yenyu, rwamakaɓuɗisa nesimba renyu guru, noruʋoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa.
Neŋguʋa iyo Jehova akati kwandiri: Uɀiʋezere mahwendefa maʋiri amabge, akafanana nookutaŋga, ukwire kwandiri kugomo, ugoɀiitira areka yamatanda.
Ini ndicanyora pamahwendefa mashoko aya akaŋga ari pamahwendefa okutaŋga, awakaputsa, ugoaisa muareka.
Naiɀoɀo ndikaita areka yamatanda omuakasia, ndikaʋeza mahwendefa maʋiri amabge, akaŋga akaita sookutaŋga, ndikakwira mugomo ndakaɓata mahwendefa maʋiri muruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Akanyora pamahwendefa ɀakafanana norunyoro rwokutaŋga, aya mashoko anegumi, amakaʋudzwa naJehova pagomo, ari pakati pomŋoto, nezuʋa reʋuŋgano; Jehova akandipa iwo.
Ɀino ndikadzoka, ndikaɓuruka pagomo, ndikaisa mahwendefa muareka yandakaŋga ndaita; ndipo paaciri ɀino, seɀandakarairwa naJehova.
(Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimuka paBeeroti Benejaakani, ʋakaenda Mosera; ndipo pakafira Aroni, napaakaʋigwa; Ereazari, mŋanakomana wake, akaɓata ʋuprista panɀimbo yake.
Ʋakasimuka’po, ʋakaenda Gudgoda; ʋakasimuka paGudgoda ʋakaȿika Jotbata, panyika yakaŋga inehoʋa dzemvura.
Ŋguʋa iyo Jehova akatsaura rudzi rwaʋaRevi, kuti ʋatakure areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, nokumira pamberi paJehova ʋacimushumira, nokuropafadza ʋanhu nezita rake, kuȿikira nhasi.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaRevi haʋanomugoʋe kana nhaka pakati pehama dzaʋo; Jehova ndiye nhaka yaʋo, seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.)
Ini ndikagara mugomo mazuʋa anamakumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna, sapakutaŋga; Jehova akandinzwa neŋguʋa iyo ʋo; Jehova akasakuparadza.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Simuka, utuŋgamirire ʋanhu, ʋapinde, ʋatore nyika, yandakapikira madziɓaɓa aʋo, kuti ndicaʋapa iyo.
Ɀino, Israeri, Jehova Mŋari wako unotȿakeiko kwauri, asi kuti utye Jehova Mŋari wako, ufambe munzira dzake dzose, nokumuɗa, nokushumira Jehova Mŋari wako nomŋoyo wako wose ʋuye nomŋeya wako wose,
nokuceŋgeta mirairo yaJehova, neɀaakatema, ɀandinokuraira nhasi kuti ufare ɀakanaka.
Tarira, ɗeŋga neɗeŋga ramateŋga, nenyika neɀose ɀiri mukati mayo, ndeɀaJehova Mŋari wako.
Asi Jehova wakafarira madziɓaɓa ako, akaʋaɗa, akatsaura ʋana ʋaʋo ʋanoʋateʋera, iyemi, kupfuʋura ndudzi dzose, se
Naiɀoɀo dziŋgisai mŋoyo yenyu, murege kuʋa nemitsipa mikukutu.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiMŋari waʋamŋari, naShe wamadzishe, Mŋari mukuru, unotyisa, usiŋgatsauri ʋanhu, kana kugamucira muɓayiro.
Iye unoruramisira nherera necirikadzi, unoɗa mutorwa, acimupa ɀokudya neŋguʋo.
Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuɗa mutorwa, nokuti imi makaŋga muri ʋatorwa panyika yeEgipita.
Unofanira kutya Jehova Mŋari wako; unofanira kumushumira iye, nokumunamatira, nokupika nezita rake.
Ndiye waunofanira kurumbidza, ndiye Mŋari wako, wakakuitira ɀinhu iɀi ɀikuru ɀinotyisa, ɀawakaʋona nameso ako.
Madziɓaɓa ako akaɓurukira Egipita ʋari ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe; ɀino Jehova Mŋari wako wakakuwanza senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga.
Naiɀoɀo unofanira kuɗa Jehova Mŋari wako, nokuceŋgeta ŋguʋa dzose murairo wake, neɀaakatema, neɀaakatoŋga, neɀaakaraira.
Ziʋai nhasi — nokuti handitauri naʋana ʋenyu ʋasina‐kuziʋa, ʋasina‐kuʋona kuraŋga kwaJehova Mŋari wenyu — ʋukuru bgake, necanza cake cinesimba, noruʋoko rwake rwakatambanudzwa,
neɀiratidzo ɀake, namaɓasa ake, aakaitira Farao, mambo weEgipita, pakati peEgipita nenyika yake yose;
neɀaakaitira hondo yeEgipita, namabiza aʋo, neŋgoro dzaʋo; kuti wakaʋafukidza nemvura yeGuŋgwa Dɀuku, ŋguʋa yaʋakakuteʋererai, Jehova akaʋaparadza kuȿikira nhasi;
nezaakakuitirai murenje, kudzimana makaȿika panɀimbo ino;

neɀaakaitira Datani naAbirami, ʋanakomana ʋaEriabi, mŋanakomana waRubeni; namashamisire akaita nyika muromo wayo, ikaʋamedza, iʋo naʋedzimba dzaʋo, namatente aʋo, neɀipenyu ɀaʋo ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiciʋateʋera, pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Asi meso enyu akaʋona maɓasa ose makuru aJehova aakaita.
Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuceŋgeta murairo wose wandinokuraira nhasi, kuti musimbe, mupinde, mutore nyika iyo kwamunoyambuka kundoiita yenyu;
kuti mazuʋa enyu awedzerwe panyika, yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa enyu naJehova, kuti ucaipa iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, nyika moyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Nokuti nyika kwaunoenda kundoiita yako, haina‐kufanana nenyika yeEgipita, kwamakaɓuɗa, kwawaidɀara mbeu dzako, ucidziɗiridza namakumbo ako, somunda wemiriʋo;
asi nyika kwamunoyambuka, kundoiita yenyu, inyika yamakomo nemipata, inonwa mvura yokuɗeŋga;
inyika inoceŋgetwa naJehova Mŋari wako; meso aJehova Mŋari wako anoramba aciitarira, kubva pakutaŋga kwegore kuȿikira pakupedzisira kwegore.
Ɀino kana mukaterera ɀakanaka mirairo yaŋgu, yandinokuraira nhasi, mukaɗa Jehova Mŋari wenyu nokumushumira nomŋoyo wenyu wose ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu wose,
ndicapa nyika yenyu mvura paŋguʋa yayo, mvura yokutaŋga nemvura yokuteʋerera, kuti ugone kukohwa ɀiyo ɀako, newaini yako, namafuta ako.
Ndicameresa ʋuswa bgeŋombe dzako pamafuro ako, udye, ugute.
Cenjerai kuti mŋoyo yenyu irege kunyeŋgerwa, murege kutsauka, mukashumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, nokunamata kwaʋari;
kuti Jehova arege kukutsamŋirai, akapfiga kuɗeŋga, kuti mvura irege kunaya nenyika irege kuɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo; imi mukakurumidza kuparadzwa panyika yakanaka yamunopiwa naJehova.
Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuceŋgeta mashoko aŋgu awa mumŋoyo yenyu nomumŋeya yenyu; munofanira kuasuŋgira pamaʋoko enyu, ciʋe ciratidzo, ʋuye anofanira kuʋa rundanyara pakati pameso enyu.
Ʋuye munofanira kuadzidzisa ʋana ʋenyu, mucitaurirana pamsoro pawo, kana iwe ugere paimba yako, kana ucifamba panzira, kana uciʋata pasi, ʋuye kana ucimuka;
unofanira kuanyora pamagwatidziro emikoʋa yeimba yako, napamasuʋo ako;
kuti mazuʋa enyu awedzerwe, namazuʋa aʋana ʋenyu, panyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa enyu naJehova kuti ucaʋapa iyo, aite samazuʋa okuɗeŋga pamsoro penyika.
Nokuti kana mukaceŋgeta ɀakanaka murairo uyu wose wandinokurairai, kuti muuite; mukaɗa Jehova Mŋari wenyu, nokufamba nenzira dzake dzose, nokumunamatira;
Jehova ucadziŋga ndudzi idzi dzose pamberi penyu, imi mucaɓata ndudzi dzinokupfuʋurai noʋukuru nesimba, dziʋe dzenyu.
Nɀimbo ipi neipi inotsikwa netsoka dzenyu icaʋa yenyu, nenyika yenyu icabva parenje, neRebanoni, kubva parwizi, rwizi Ufratesi, kuȿikira kuguŋgwa rokumaʋirazuʋa.
Hakunomunhu uŋgagona kumira pamberi penyu; Jehova Mŋari wenyu ucatyisa nokuvundusa nyika yose pamsoro penyu, nyika iyo yamucazotsika pamsoro payo, seɀaakataura kwamuri.
Tarirai, nhasi ndinoisa pamberi penyu kuropafadzwa nokutukwa;
kuropafadzwa, kana mukaterera mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, yandinokurairai nhasi;
nokutukwa, kana musiŋgatereri mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, asi mucitsauka panzira yandinokurairai nhasi, mukateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ʋamusina‐kuziʋa.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako akupinza panyika, kwamunoenda, kundoiita yako, unofanira kuisa kuropafadzwa pagomo reGerizimi, nokutukwa pagomo reEbari.
Ko
Nokuti munofanira kuyambuka Joridani, mupinde kundotora nyika yamunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu; icaʋa yenyu, mugare’mo.
Cenjerai kuti muite ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa ɀose, ɀandinoisa pamberi penyu nhasi.
Ndiɀo ɀakatemŋa, neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀamunofanira kucenjera kuti muɀiite panyika yawakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ako, kuti iʋe yako, mazuʋa ose amunogara panyika.
Munofanira kuparadza cose nɀimbo dzose, apo, ndudzi dzose dzamunopiwa kuti dziʋe dzenyu, padzaishumira ʋamŋari ʋadzo, pamakomo marefu, napaɀikomo, napasi pemiti mitema yose;
munofanira kuputsa artari dzaʋo, nokuputsanya shoŋgwe dzaʋo, nokupisa matanda aʋo okunamata nawo; muteme ʋo mifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋezwa; kuti muparadze zita raɀo panɀimbo iyo.
Regai kuitira Jehova Mŋari wenyu saiɀoɀo.
Asi munofanira kushanyira panɀimbo yakatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu pakati pamarudzi enyu ose, kuti aise zita rake’po, paanogara, ndipo pamunofanira kushanyira’po, nokuenda’po;

munofanira kuʋuya’po neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa, neɀiɓayiro ɀenyu, neɀegumi ɀenyu, neɀipiriso ɀakatsaurwa namaʋoko enyu, neɀipikiso ɀenyu, neɀipo ɀokuɗa kwenyu, naʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzenyu nedzamakwai enyu;
ndipo pamunofanira kudya pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu, mucifarira ɀose ɀamunoɓata namaʋoko enyu, imi, nemhuri dzenyu, seɀamakaropafadzwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Hamufaniri kuita seɀatinoita pano nhasi, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaanoʋona kuti ndiɀo ɀakanaka;
nokuti mucigere kuȿika pazororo napanhaka, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Asi kana mayambuka Joridani, mogara munyika yamunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu, iʋe nhaka yenyu, kana iye acikupai zororo paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose ʋanokukombai, mogara makaceŋgetwa,

ɀino kunɀimbo yakatsaurwa naJehova, kuti aise zita rake’po, ndiko kwamunofanira kuʋuya neɀose ɀandinokurairai, ɀinoti: ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa, neɀiɓayiro ɀenyu, neɀegumi ɀenyu, neɀipiriso ɀakatsaurwa namaʋoko enyu, neɀipikiso ɀenyu ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀamunopikira Jehova;

mufare pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu, imi naʋanakomana ʋenyu, naʋanasikana ʋenyu, naʋaranda ʋenyu, naʋarandakadzi ʋenyu, nomuRevi uri mukati mamasuʋo enyu, nokuti iye haanamugoʋe kana nhaka pakati penyu.
Cenjera kuti urege kuʋuya neɀipiriso ɀako ɀinopiswa panɀimbo ipi neipi yaunoʋona,
asi panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova panorumŋe rwamarudzi ako, ndipo paunofanira kuʋuya neɀipo ɀako ɀinopiswa, ndipo paunofanira kuita ɀose ɀandinokuraira.
Asi uŋgaɓaya hako nokudya hako nyama mukati mamasuʋo ako ose, seɀinoɗa mŋoyo wako, ʋuye seɀawakaropafadzwa naJehova Mŋari wako; usina‐kunaka nowakanaka ʋose ʋaŋgaidya, se
Asi hamufaniri kudya ropa; unofanira kuriteʋurira pasi semvura.

Usadya mukati mamasuʋo ako ɀegumi ɀeɀiyo ɀako, kana ɀewaini yako, kana ɀamafuta ako, kana ʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzako, kana dzamakwai ako, kana cipikiso cipi necipi caunopika naco, kana ɀipo ɀokuɗa kwako, kana cipiriso cinotsaurwa noruʋoko rwako;

asi unofanira kuɀidya pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, iwe, naʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako, naʋaranda ʋako naʋarandakadzi ʋako, nomuRevi uri mukati mamasuʋo ako; unofanira kufara pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako paɀose ɀaunoɓata namaʋoko ako.
Cenjera kuti urege kukaŋganwa muRevi ŋguʋa yose yaunogara munyika yako.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako akurisa nyika yako, seɀaakakupikira, iwe ukati: Ndicadya nyama, nokuti mŋoyo wako unoɗa kudya nyama, uŋgadya hako nyama, seɀinoɗa mŋoyo wako.

Kana nɀimbo yakatsaurwa naJehova, kuti aise zita rake’po, iri kure newe, unofanira kuɓaya ɀimŋe ɀeŋombe dzako, kana ɀamakwai ako, ɀawakapiwa naJehova, seɀandakakuraira, ugoɀidya mukati mamasuʋo ako, seɀinoɗa mŋoyo wako.
Unofanira kuɀidya se
Asi cenjera kwaɀo kuti urege kudya ropa, nokuti ropa ndibgo ʋupenyu; usadya ʋupenyu pamŋe cete nenyama.
Usaridya, asi unofanira kuriteʋurira pasi semvura.
Usaridya, kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka newe, iwe, naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera, kana uciita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova.
Asi ɀinhu ɀako ɀitȿene, neɀipikiso ɀako, unofanira kuɀitora nokuenda naɀo kunɀimbo yakatsaurwa naJehova.
Ɀino unofanira kugadzira ɀipiriso ɀako ɀinopiswa, nyama neropa, paartari yaJehova Mŋari wako; ropa reɀiɓayiro ɀako rinofanira kuteʋurirwa paartari yaJehova Mŋari wako, asi iwe unofanira kudya nyama.
Terera unzwe ɀakanaka mashoko awa andinokuraira, kuti ɀive ɀakanaka newe, iwe, naʋana ʋako ʋanokuteʋera nokusiŋgaperi, kana uciita ɀakanaka neɀakarurama pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako aciparadza pamberi pako ndudzi idzo, dzaunoenda kwadziri kundodziita dzako, ukadziita dzako, ukagara munyika yadzo;
ucenjere kuti urege kunyeŋgerwa kuzodziteʋera, idzo dzamboparadzwa pamberi pako; kuti urege kubvunza ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, uciti: Ndudzi idzi dzinoshumira ʋamŋari ʋadzo seiko? Neni ndicaita ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Usaitira Jehova Mŋari wako saiɀoɀo; nokuti iʋo ʋakaitira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova, neɀaanoʋeŋga; nokuti kunyaŋge ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo ʋanoʋapisira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo pamŋoto.
Cinhu cipi necipi candinokurairai, cenjerai kuti muɀiite; musawedzera kwaɀiri, kana kutapudza kwaɀiri.
Ɀino kana muprofita kana muroti akamuka pakati pako, akakuratidza ciratidzo kana cinoshamisa,
ico ciratidzo kana cinoshamisa cikaitika, caakataura kwauri, aciti: Ŋgatiteʋere ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi, tiʋashumire;
usaterera mashoko omuprofita uyo kana muroti uyo, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu unokuidzai, kuti aziʋe kana muciɗa Jehova Mŋari wenyu nomŋoyo wenyu wose ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu wose.
Munofanira kuteʋera Jehova Mŋari wenyu nokumutya, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake, nokuterera inzwi rake, nokumushumira, nokumunamatira.
Asi muprofita uyo kana muroti uyo ʋanofanira kuʋurawa; nokuti wakataura

Kana munuŋuna wako, kana mŋanakomana wamai ʋako, kana mŋanakomana wako, kana mŋanasikana wako, kana mukadzi unoɗikanwa newe, kana shamŋari yako yaunoɗa kwaɀo, ʋakakutsausa pakaʋanda, ʋaciti: Hendei tindoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi, iwe, kana madziɓaɓa ako;
ʋari ʋamŋari ʋendudzi dzakakupoteredzai, dziri pedyo newe, kana kure newe, kubva panorumŋe rutiʋi rwenyika kuȿikira kunorumŋe rutiʋi rwenyika;
haufaniri kumutenda, kana kumuterera; ziso rako rirege kumunzwira tsitsi, kana kumurega, kana kumuʋanza;
asi unofanira kumuʋuraya ɀirokwaɀo; ruʋoko rwako ŋgarutaŋge kumuʋuraya, pashure maʋoko aʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋose.
Unofanira kumutaka namabge, afe, nokuti wakatȿaka kukutsausa ubve kunaJehova Mŋari wako, iye wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita paimba yoʋuranda.
ƲaIsraeri ʋose ʋaɀinzwe, ʋatye, ʋarege kuzoita ɀakaipa ɀakaɗai pakati pako.
Kana ukanzwa ʋacikuʋudza munerimŋe ramaguta ako aunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ugare’mo, ʋaciti:
Ʋananyakuti ʋakaiȿo‐ipa ʋari’po, ʋakaɓuɗa pakati pako, ʋakatsausa ʋagere muguta raʋo, ʋaciti: Hendei tindoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋamakaŋga musiŋgaziʋi;
ɀino unofanira kuferefeta, nokutȿakisisa, nokubvunzisisa kwaɀo; ɀino kana ukaʋona kuti ndeɀamaɀokwaɗi, kuti ndiɀo, kuti cinhu cinonyaŋgadza cakaɗai cakaitwa pakati pako;
ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuparadza ʋanhu ʋagere muguta iro nomunondo unopinza, nokuriparadza cose, iro neɀose ɀiri mukati maro, neɀipfuwo ɀaro, nomunondo unopinza.
Ɀakapambga ɀose unofanira kuɀiʋuŋganidzira pakati penzira huru yaro, ndokupisira Jehova Mŋari wako guta neɀakapambga ɀaro ɀose‐ɀose; ɀinofanira kuʋa murwi nokusiŋgaperi; harifaniri kuʋakwa ɀe.
Cinhu cimŋe ceɀakayeriswa ŋgacirege kunamatira pamaʋoko ako, kuti Jehova aɀidzore pakutsamŋa kwake kukuru, akunzwire nyasha, aʋe netsitsi newe, akuwanze, seɀaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako;
kana ukaterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, ukaceŋgeta mirairo yake yose, yandinokuraira nhasi, uciita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako.
Imi muri ʋana ʋaJehova Mŋari wenyu; musaɀitema, kana kuɀiʋeʋura pakati pameso pamsoro paʋakafa.
Nokuti uri rudzi rutȿene kunaJehova Mŋari wako; Jehova wakakutsaura pakati pendudzi dzose dzaʋanhu ʋari panyika, kuti uʋe rudzi rwake cairwo.
Usadya cinhu cipi necipi cinonyaŋgadza.
Mhuka dzamuŋgadya ndidzo: Ŋombe, negwai, nembudzi;
nenondo, nemhara, nemhembge, netsoma, nemharapara, nenyati, neŋgururu.
Mhuka ipi neipi inamahwanda akaparadzana, inetsoka dzakaparadzana, inodzeva ndidzo dzamuŋgadya henyu.
Asi idzi dzinodzeya, kana dzinamahwanda akaparadzana, regai kudzidya: Kamera, netsuro, nembira; nokuti dzinodzeya, asi hadzinamahwanda akaparadzana, hadzina‐kunaka kwamuri;
neŋguruʋe; nokuti inamahwanda akaparadzana, asi haidzeyi; haina‐kunaka kwamuri; musadya nyama yadzo, ʋuye musaɓata ɀitunha ɀadzo.
Ndiɀo ɀamuŋgadya kuneɀose ɀiri mumvura: Ɀose ɀineɀimbi namakwande muŋgaɀidya;
asi ɀose ɀisineɀimbi namakwande, musaɀidya iɀo, haɀina‐kunaka kwamuri.
Muŋgadya shiri dzose dzakanaka.
Asi dzamusiŋgafaniri kudya ndidzo: Gora guru, negondo guru, nenyamudzura;
norukodzi, nenjerere, noruʋaŋgu namarudzi arwo;
namarudzi ose amakuŋguʋu;
nemhou, nezizi, neshiri yeguŋgwa, namarudzi ose oruʋaŋgu;
nezizi ɗuku, nezizi guru, nejicidza;
nehukurwizi, negora, nekanyurura‐hoʋe;
nezimudo, nekondo, namarudzi ayo, nemhupupu, neciremŋa‐remŋa.
Ɀose ɀinamapapiro ɀinokambaira ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisina‐kunaka kwamuri; haɀifaniri kudyiwa.
Asi shiri dzose dzakanaka muŋgadzidya henyu.

Musadya cinhu cakaŋgota coga; uŋgacipa mŋeni uri mukati mamasuʋo ako, iye acidye, kana uŋgaciteŋgesa kumutorwa; nokuti iwe uri rudzi rutȿene kunaJehova Mŋari wako. Usaɓika mbudzana mumukaka wamai ʋayo.
Utsaure ɀakanaka ɀegumi ɀeɀiɓereko ɀose ɀembeu dzako, dzinobva mumunda mako gore rimŋe nerimŋe.

Unofanira kudya pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, panɀimbo yaacatsaura kugarisa zita rake’po, ɀegumi ɀeɀiyo ɀako, neɀewaini yako, neɀamafuta ako, neɀaʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzako nedzamakwai ako, kuti udzidze kutya Jehova Mŋari wako ŋguʋa dzose.
Kana nzira iri kuresa, ukasagona kuɀiȿitsa’ko, nokuti nɀimbo iyo yawakatsaurirwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti aise zita rake’po, iri kure newe, kana Jehova Mŋari wako akakuropafadza,
unofanira kuɀiteŋgesa nemari, ndokuɓata mari mumaʋoko ako, ugoenda kunɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako,

ndokuteŋga nemari iyo ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako, kana ŋombe, kana makwai, kana waini, kana ɀinoɓata, kana ɀose ɀinoreʋa mŋoyo wako kwauri, udyire’po pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, ufare, iwe nemhuri yako.
Ʋuye muRevi uri mukati mamasuʋo ako, usamukaŋganwa, nokuti haanomugoʋe kana nhaka newe.
Ŋguʋa dzose kana makore matatu apera, unofanira kuʋuya neɀegumi ɀose ɀeɀiɓereko ɀako ɀegore iro, ugoɀiceŋgeta mukati mamasuʋo ako.

Ɀino muRevi, ɀaasinomugoʋe kana nhaka newe, nomŋeni, nenherera, necirikadzi, ʋari mumasuʋo ako, ʋanofanira kuʋuya kuzodya, ʋagute; kuti Jehova Mŋari wako akuropafadze pamaɓasa ose aunoita namaʋoko ako.
Ŋguʋa dzose kana makore manomŋe apera munofanira kuʋa nesunuŋguro.
Nzira yesunuŋguro ndiyo: Mumŋe nomumŋe wakapa cikwerete, unofanira kusunuŋgura ico caakapa hama yake; ŋgaarege kucireʋa kunowokwake kana hama yake; nokuti sunuŋguro yaJehova yaparidzwa.
Uŋgaɀireʋa kumutorwa; asi ɀose ɀako ɀiri paruʋoko rwehama yako, unofanira kuɀisunuŋgura.
Asi usaʋa naʋarombo pakati pako (nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova ucakuropafadza panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe nhaka yako),
kana uciŋgoshiŋgaira kwoga kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ucenjere kuita murairo uyu wose, wandinokuraira nhasi.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuropafadza, seɀaakakupikira; iwe ucapa dzimŋe ndudzi zhinji cikwerete, asi iwe usatora cikwerete; iwe ucaɓata ndudzi zhinji, asi idzo hadziŋgakuɓati iwe.
Kana kunomurombo kwauri, mumŋe wehama dzako, mukati mamasuʋo api naapi panyika yako, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, usatsuŋgira hama yako murombo, kana kumufumbatirira ruʋoko rwako;
asi umutambanudzire ruʋoko rwako kwaɀo, umuɓatsire necikwerete ɀinoriŋgana pakushaiwa kwake, seɀaanokumbira.

Cenjera kuti urege kufuŋga ɀakaipa mumŋoyo mako, uciti: Gore recinomŋe, iro gore resunuŋguro, riri pedyo; iwe ukaʋa nomufuŋgo wakaipa kuhama yako, ukasamupa cinhu; iye akacema kunaJehova Mŋari wako pamsoro pako, cikaʋa ciʋi kwauri.
Unofanira kumupa ɀakanaka, mŋoyo wako haufaniri kuʋa neshuŋgu, kana ucimupa; nokuti nokuɗa kwecinhu ici Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuropafadza pamaɓasa ako ose, napaɀose ɀaunoɓata namaʋoko ako.
Nokuti ʋarombo haʋaŋgatoŋgoperi panyika; naiɀoɀo ndinokuraira ndiciti: Utambanudzire ruʋoko rwako ɀakanaka kuhama yako, kunaiye unoshaiwa, nokunaʋarombo ʋako panyika yako.
Kana hama yako murume muHeberu kana mukadzi muHeberu aciŋge ateŋgeswa kwauri, akakuɓatira makore matanhatu, iwe unofanira kumurega negore recinomŋe aende hake.
Ɀino kana ucimurega kuti aende hake, usamuendisa asinecinhu.
Unofanira kumugoʋerera ɀakanaka pamakwai ako, napaɓuriro rako, napaciȿiniro cako cewaini; seɀawakaropafadzwa naJehova Mŋari wako, unofanira kumupa saiɀoɀo.
Unofanira kuraŋgarira iwe kuti wakaŋga uri muranda munyika yeEgipita, Jehova Mŋari wako akakudzikinura; naiɀoɀo ndinokuraira cinhu ici nhasi.
Asi kana akati kwauri: Handiɗi haŋgu kubva kwamuri, nokuti unokuɗa iwe naʋeimba yako, nokuti unofara hake newe,
ipapo unofanira kutora runji ndokuʋurura nzeʋe yake narwo pamukoʋa, iye agoʋa muranda wako nokusiŋgaperi. Ʋuye murandakadzi wako unofanira kumuitira ʋo saiɀoɀo.

Haɀifaniri kuita sokukuȿiɓisa mŋoyo wako kana ucimurega kuti aende hake; nokuti wakakuɓatira makore matanhatu, acifanirwa nomuɓairo waʋaranda ʋaʋiri; Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuropafadza paneɀose ɀaunoita.

Mikono yose yaʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzako nedzamakwai ako, unofanira kutsaurira Jehova Mŋari wako; haufaniri kuɓate‐ɓasa nomŋana wemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzako, kana kuʋeʋura ʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzamakwai ako.
Unofanira kuɀidya pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako gore rimŋe nerimŋe panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova, iwe nemhuri yako.
Kana cakaremara, ɀimŋe
Unofanira kucidya mukati mamasuʋo ako; wakanaka nousina‐kunaka ʋose ʋanofanira kucidya, seɀaʋanodya mhara nenondo.
Asi urege kudya ropa raco, unofanira kuriteʋurira pasi semvura.
Raŋgarira mŋedzi weAbibi, udye paseka yaJehova Mŋari wako nawo; nokuti nomŋedzi weAbibi Jehova Mŋari wako wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita ʋusiku.
Unofanira kuɓayira Jehova Mŋari wako paseka yamakwai neŋombe panɀimbo inotsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti agarise zita rake’po.

Usadya ciŋgwa cakaʋiriswa pamŋe cete nayo; unofanira kuita mazuʋa manomŋe ucidya ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa pamŋe cete nayo, ndico ciŋgwa cokutambudzika; nokuti wakaɓuɗa panyika yeEgipita nokukurumidza; kuti uraŋgarire zuʋa rawakaɓuɗa naro panyika yeEgipita mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgako.
Mazuʋa manomŋe mbiriso haifaniri kutoŋgoʋonekwa panyika yako yose; ʋuye nyama yamunoɓayira pazuʋa rokutaŋga maɗekwana, haifaniri kutoŋgosara ʋusiku bgose kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Haufaniri kuɓayira paseka mukati merimŋe ramasuʋo ako, aunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako;
asi panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti agarise zita rake’po, ndipo paunofanira kuɓayira paseka maɗekwana, kana zuʋa roʋira, paŋguʋa yawakaɓuɗa nayo Egipita.
Unofanira kuiɓika, nokuidya panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako; fume maŋgwana unofanira kudzokera kumatente ako.
Unofanira kudya ciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa matanhatu; pazuʋa recinomŋe unofanira kuita ʋuŋgano huru kunaJehova Mŋari wako; usaɓata maɓasa naro.
Unofanira kuʋereŋga maviki manomŋe; kubva paŋguʋa yaunotaŋga kukohwa ɀiyo ɀigere kukohiwa, unofanira kuʋereŋga maviki manomŋe.
Ɀino uitire Jehova Mŋari wako mutambo wamaviki, uciʋuya muruʋoko rwako necipo cokuɗa kwako, ucipa seɀawakaropafadzwa naJehova Mŋari wako.

Unofanira kufara pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, iwe nomŋanakomana wako nomŋanasikana wako, nomuranda wako, nomurandakadzi wako, nomuRevi uri mukati mamasuʋo ako, nomŋeni, nenherera, necirikadzi, ʋagere pakati pako, panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti agarise zita rake’po.
Unofanira kuraŋgarira kuti iwe wakaŋga uri muranda paEgipita; unofanira kuceŋgeta nokuita iɀi ɀakatemŋa.
Unofanira kutamba mutambo wamatumba mazuʋa manomŋe, kana wapedza kuʋuŋganidza
Unofanira kufara pamutambo wako, iwe, nomŋanakomana wako, nomŋanasikana wako, nomuranda wako, nomurandakadzi wako, nomuRevi, nomŋeni, nenherera, necirikadzi, ʋari mukati mamasuʋo ako.

Unofanira kutambira Jehova Mŋari wako mutambo mazuʋa manomŋe panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuropafadza paɀiɓereko ɀose ɀeminda yako, napamaɓasa ose amaʋoko ako, kuti ufare kwaɀo.

Ʋarume ʋenyu ʋose ʋanofanira kuʋuya pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako katatu pagore panɀimbo yaacatsaura, pamutambo weciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa, napamutambo wamaviki, napamutambo wamatumba; haʋafaniri kuʋuya pamberi paJehova ʋasinecinhu.
Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaaʋuye necipo mumaʋoko ake, seɀaanogona, seɀawakaropafadzwa naJehova Mŋari wako, seɀaakakupa.
