Unofanira kuɀitsaurira ʋatoŋgi naʋakuru mukati mamasuʋo ako, aunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, namarudzi ako; iʋo ʋanofanira kutoŋga ʋanhu nokutoŋga kwakarurama.
Usakaŋganisa pakutoŋga kwako, usatsaura ʋanhu, usagamucira fufuro, nokuti fufuro inopofumadza meso aʋakaŋgwara, nokuminamisa mashoko aʋakarurama.
Teʋera ɀakarurama kwaɀo cete, kuti urarame, ugare nhaka yenyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Usaɀisimira matanda okunamata nawo, emiti ipi neipi, parutiʋi rweartari yaJehova Mŋari wako, yaunofanira kuɀiitira.
Ʋuye usaɀimisira shoŋgwe, inoʋeŋgwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Usaɓayira Jehova Mŋari wako ŋombe kana gwai rakaremara, kana rinecakaipa cipi necipi; nokuti iɀo ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova Mŋari wako.
Kana pakati pako mukati merimŋe ramasuʋo ako, aunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, murume kana mukadzi akawanikwa, unoita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, aciɗarika suŋgano yake,
akandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, akanamata kwaʋari, kana kuzuʋa kana mŋedzi, kana kunecimŋe cehondo dzokuɗeŋga, candisina‐kukuraira;
iwe ukaʋudzwa iɀoɀo, ukaɀinzwa, ipapo unofanira kubvunzisisa kwaɀo; ɀino kana ukaʋona kuti ndiɀo, ndeɀamaɀokwaɗi, kuti cinhu cinonyaŋgadza cakaɗai caitwa pakati paIsraeri;
ipapo unofanira kuɓuɗisa murume uyo, kana mukadzi uyo, wakaita cinhu ici cakaipa, kumasuʋo ako, iye murume nomukadzi, ugoʋataka namabge, ʋafe.
Nokupupura kweɀapupu ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu iye unofanira kufa, ŋgaaʋurawe; nokupupura kwecapupu cimŋe ŋgaarege kuʋurawa.
Maʋoko eɀapupu ndiwo anofanira kutaŋga kumuʋuraya; pashure maʋoko aʋanhu ʋose. Saiɀoɀo unofanira kubvisa ɀakaipa pakati pako.

Kana mhaka ikamuka yamusiŋgagoni kutoŋga, kana yokuʋurayana, kana yokukwirirana, kana yokukuʋadzana, dziri mhaka dzenharo pakati pamasuʋo ako; ipapo unofanira kusimuka nokukwira kunɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako;
uende kuʋaprista ʋaRevi, nokumutoŋgi ucaʋa’po pamazuʋa iwayo, uʋabvunze; iʋo ʋacakuziʋisa kutoŋga kwakafanira.
Ɀino unofanira kuita seɀaʋanokutoŋgera panɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova; ucenjere kuti uite seɀaʋanokudzidzisa;
unofanira kuita nomurairo waʋanokuraira, ʋuye nokutoŋga kwaʋanokuʋudza; haufaniri kutsauka kana kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe, pakutoŋga kwaʋacakuratidza.
Munhu unoita nokuɀikudza, asiŋgaɗi kuterera muprista unomira’po pakushumira Jehova Mŋari wako, kana mutoŋgi, munhu uyo unofanira kufa; iwe unofanira kubvisa ɀakaipa pakati paIsraeri.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋacaɀinzwa, ʋacatya, ʋakasazoita nokuɀikudza.
Ɀino kana ukaȿika panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, ikaʋa yako, ukagara’mo, ukati: Ndicaɀigadzira mambo, seɀinoita ndudzi dzose, dzinondipoteredza;
ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuɀigadzira hako mambo ucatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako; unofanira kugadza mumŋe kuhama dzako, kuti aʋe mambo wako; haufaniri kugadza mutorwa, isati iri hama yako.
Asi ŋgaarege kuɀiwanzira mabiza, kana kudzosera ʋanhu Egipita, kuti aɀiwanzire mabiza; nokuti Jehova wakati kwauri: Usadzoka ɀe kubva ɀino nenzira iyo.
Ʋuye ŋgaarege kuɀiwanzira ʋakadzi, kuti mŋoyo wake urege kutsauka; ʋuye ŋgaarege kuɀiwanzira ɀikuru sirveri nendarama.
Ɀino kana iye ogara pacigaro cake coʋushe, unofanira kunyora murairo uyu mubuku yake, acitora mashoko ari kuʋaprista ʋaRevi;
inofanira kugara naye, kuti araʋe’mo mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake; kuti adzidze kutya Jehova Mŋari wake, nokuceŋgeta mashoko ose omurairo uyu neɀakatemŋa iɀi, kuti aɀiite;
kuti mŋoyo wake urege kuɀikudza pamsoro pehama dzake, arege kutsauka pamurairo uyu, kana kurudyi, kana kuruɓoshwe; kuti awedzere mazuʋa ake paʋushe bgake, iye, naʋana ʋake, pakati paIsraeri.
Ʋaprista ʋaRevi, norudzi rwose rwaRevi, haʋafaniri kuʋa nomugoʋe kana nhaka pamŋe cete naIsraeri; ʋanofanira kudya ɀipiriso ɀaJehova ɀinopiswa nenhaka yake.
Haʋafaniri kuʋa nenhaka pakati pehama dzaʋo; Jehova ndiye nhaka yaʋo, seɀaakataura kwaʋari.
Ɀino ndiɀo ɀinofanira kupiwa ʋaprista naʋanhu, naiʋo ʋanoʋuya neciɓayiro, kana iri nzombe kana gwai; ʋanofanira kupa muprista ɓandauko, neshaya mbiri, nesusu.
Ɀitȿa ɀeɀiyo ɀako, neɀewaini yako, neɀamafuta ako, nemvere dzokutaŋga dzamakwai ako, ndiɀo ɀaunofanira kuʋapa.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako wakamutsaura iye pakati pamarudzi ako ose, kuti amire acishumira nezita raJehova, iye, naʋanakomana ʋake nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino kana muRevi akabva kunerimŋe ramasuʋo ako maIsraeri mose, kwaagere, akaʋuya nomŋoyo wake wose kunɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova,
iye unofanira kuɓate‐ɓasa nezita reJehova Mŋari wake, seɀinoita hama dzake dzose ʋaRevi dzinomira’po pamberi paJehova.
Ʋanofanira kupiwa migoʋe yakaenzana yeɀokudya, kunze kweɀaakawana pakuteŋgesa nhaka yamadziɓaɓa ake.
Ɀino kana waȿika munyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, usadzidza kuteʋera ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀendudzi idzo.
Pakati pako hapafaniri kuwanikwa munhu unopinza mŋanakomana wake kana mŋanasikana wake mumŋoto, kana unoʋuka, kana unotenda mashura, kana unoita mazaŋgo, kana muroyi,
kana ŋaŋga, kana unobvunza maȿikiro, kana muʋuki, kana unobvunza ʋakafa.
Nokuti ʋose ʋanoita ɀinhu iɀi ʋanonyaŋgadza Jehova; nokuɗa kweɀinonyaŋgadza iɀi Jehova Mŋari wako unoʋadziŋga pamberi pako.
Unofanira kuʋa wakarurama pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako.
Nokuti ndudzi idzi dzamunopiwa dziʋe dzenyu, dzinoterera ʋanotenda mashura naʋanoʋuka; asi iwe Jehova Mŋari wako haanakukutendera kuita iɀoɀo.
Jehova Mŋari wako ucakumutsira muprofita, unobva pakati pako, pahama dzako, wakafanana neni; unofanira kumuterera iye;
seɀawakakumbira kunaJehova Mŋari wako paHorebi nomusi weʋuŋgano, uciti: Ndirege haŋgu kuzonzwa ɀe inzwi raJehova Mŋari waŋgu, ʋuye ndirege haŋgu kuzoʋona ɀe mŋoto uyu mukuru, ndirege kufa.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Ɀose ɀaʋakareʋa, ʋakataura haʋo ɀakanaka.
Ndicaʋamutsira muprofita, unobva pakati pehama dzaʋo, wakafanana newe; ndicaisa mashoko aŋgu mumuromo make, iye ucaʋaʋudza ɀose ɀandinomuraira.
Ɀino munhu upi noupi usiŋgatereri mashoko aŋgu, aacataura muzita raŋgu, ndicamubvunza
Asi muprofita unotaura shoko muzita raŋgu aciɀikudza, riri shoko randisina‐kumuraira kuti aritaure, kana ɀimŋe unotaura muzita raʋamŋe ʋamŋari, muprofita uyo unofanira kufa.
Ɀino kana iwe ukati mumŋoyo mako: Ko ticaziʋa seiko shoko risina‐kutaurwa naJehova?
Kana muprofita aciŋge ataura muzita raJehova, cinhu ico cikasaitika, cikasaʋa’po, ndico cinhu cisina‐kutaurwa naJehova; muprofita wakaritaura aciɀikudza, haufaniri kumutya.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako aciparadza ndudzi dzaunopiwa nyika yadzo naJehova Mŋari wako, iwe ukapinda panɀimbo yaʋo, ukagara mumaguta aʋo nomudzimba dzaʋo;
unofanira kuɀitsaurira maguta matatu munyika yako, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe yako.
Unofanira kuɀigadzirira nzira, nokuganhura nyika yako, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe nhaka yako, uciita migoʋe mitatu, kuti munhu upi noupi wakaʋuraya agone kutizira’ko.
Ɀino ndiwo murairo womuʋurayi unotizira’ko akazorarama: Munhu upi noupi unoʋuraya wokwake, nokusaziʋa, asina‐kumuʋeŋga kare;

somunhu unoti kana acienda nowokwake kuɗondo kundotema huni, akasimudza ruʋoko rwake kuti ateme muti nesanhu, ɗare ndokuvomoka pamupinyi, ndokutema wokwake akafa; iye unofanira kutizira kunerimŋe ramaguta awa, ararame.
Kuti mutsiʋi weropa arege kuteʋerera muʋurayi, mŋoyo wake ucineshuŋgu, akamuɓata nokuti kure, akamuroʋa akafa; iɀo wakaŋga asina‐kufanirwa norufu, nokuti wakaŋga asina‐kumuʋeŋga kare.
Saka ndinokuraira, ndiciti: Unofanira kuɀitsaurira maguta matatu.
Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako acizokurisa nyika yako, seɀaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, akakupa nyika yose yaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, kuti ucaʋapa iyo;

kana ukaceŋgeta murairo uyu wose nokuuita, uyu wandinokuraira nhasi, kuti uɗe Jehova Mŋari wako, nokufamba munzira dzake, ŋguʋa dzose; ipapo unofanira kuzowedzera ɀe mamŋe maguta matatu kunawawa matatu;
kuti ropa romunhu usinemhoȿa rirege kuteʋurwa panyika yako, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe yako; kuti nokuɗaro ropa rirege kuʋa pamsoro pako.
Asi kana munhu upi noupi akaʋeŋga wokwake, akamuʋandira, akamumukira, ndokumuroʋa akafa, kana iye akatizira kunerimŋe ramaguta awa;
ipapo ʋakuru ʋeguta rake ʋanofanira kutuma munhu kundomutora’ko, ʋagomuisa mumaʋoko omutsiʋi weropa, afe.
Haufaniri kumunzwira tsitsi, asi iwe unofanira kubvisa ropa romunhu usinemhoȿa pakati paIsraeri, kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka newe.
Usashandura miganho yowokwako, yakatarwa naʋekare, panhaka yako yaucazopiwa, panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe yako.
Capupu cimŋe hacifaniri kupupurira munhu pacinhu cakaipa cipi necipi, kana ciʋi cipi necipi, ciri ciʋi cipi necipi caakatadza; shoko rinofanira kusimbiswa neɀapupu ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu.
Kana capupu cisina‐kururama cikapupurira munhu upi noupi kuti wakatadza;
ipapo ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋose ʋanenharo ʋanofanira kumira pamberi paJehova, pamberi paʋaprista naʋatoŋgi ʋacaʋa’po namazuʋa iwayo;
ɀino ʋatoŋgi ʋanofanira kuferefeta kwaɀo; kana ʋakaʋona kuti capupu ico capupu cenhema, cakapupurira hama yaco nhema,
munofanira kumuitira iye seɀaakafuŋga kuitira hama yake; nokuɗaro iwe unofanira kubvisa cakaipa pakati pako.
Ʋakasara ʋanofanira kuɀinzwa ʋo, ʋatye, ʋarege kuzoita cakaipa cakaɗai pakati pako.
Haufaniri kumunzwira tsitsi; ʋupenyu bgunofanira kutsibga noʋupenyu, ziso neziso, zino nezino, ruʋoko noruʋoko, rutsoka norutsoka.
Kana ukaɓuɗa kundorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, ukaʋona mabiza, neŋgoro, naʋanhu ʋakawanda kupfuʋura iwe, usaʋatya; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako unewe, iye wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino kana mosweɗera pakurwa, muprista unofanira kuʋuya kuzotaura naʋanhu,
aciti kwaʋari: Inzwai imi Israeri, nhasi mosweɗera pakurwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu; mŋoyo yenyu ŋgairege kupera simba; regai kutya, kana kuɗeɗera, kana kuvunduka pamberi paʋo;
nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiye unoenda nemi, kukurwirai paʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, kukuponesai.
Naʋakuru ʋanofanira kutaura naʋanhu, ʋaciti: Panomunhu here wakaʋaka imba itȿa, ucigere kutaŋga kuigara? Ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake; kuti arege kufa pakurwa, mumŋe akataŋga kuigara.
Ʋuye, panomunhu here wakarima munda wemizambiriŋga, ucigere kudya micero yawo? Ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake; kuti arege kufa pakurwa, mumŋe akadya micero yawo.
Ʋuye, panomunhu here wakanyeŋga musikana, ucigere kumuwana? Ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake; kuti arege kufa pakurwa, mumŋe akamuwana.
Ʋuye ʋakuru ʋanofanira kutaura ʋo kuʋanhu, ʋaciti: Panomunhu here unotya, unomŋoyo unovunduka? Ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake; kuti mŋoyo yehama dzake irege kunyauka somŋoyo wake.
Ɀino kana ʋakuru ʋapedza kutaura naʋanhu, ʋanofanira kugadza ʋatariri ʋehondo ʋaŋgatuŋgamirira ʋanhu.
Kana wosweɗera pedyo neguta kuti urwe naro, unofanira kuriparidzira rugare.
Ɀino kana iʋo ʋacikupindura norugare, ʋakakuzarurira masuʋo aʋo, ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋanowanikwa mukati maro ʋanofanira kukuterera mutero nokukuɓatira.
Kana ʋasiŋgaɗi kuyanana newe, asi kurwa newe, iwe unofanira kurikomba;
kana Jehova Mŋari wako akariisa mumaʋoko ako, unofanira kuparadza ʋarume ʋose ʋari’mo nomunondo unopinza;
asi ʋakadzi, nepxere, neŋombe, neɀose ɀiri muguta, ɀose ɀiŋgapambga, unofanira kuɀitapira iɀo; iwe ucadya ɀakapambga kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, ɀaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Unofanira kuita saiɀoɀo namaguta ose ari kure kwaɀo newe, asati ari maguta endudzi idzi.
Asi kana ari maguta aʋanhu aʋa, ʋaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ʋaʋe nhaka yako, haufaniri kurega cinhu cimŋe cinofema ciri cipenyu;
asi unofanira kuʋaparadza cose, iʋo ʋaHeti, naʋaAmori, naʋaKanani, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi; seɀawakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wako;
kuti ʋarege kukudzidzisai kuita ɀose ɀaʋo ɀinonyaŋgadza, ɀaʋakaitira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo; imi mukatadzira Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Kana ukakomba guta ŋguʋa refu, ucirwa naro, kuti urikunde, haufaniri kuparadza miti yaro, uciitema nesanhu; uŋgaidya, haufaniri kuitema; nokuti muti womusaŋgo munhu here, kuti ukombge newe?
Asi miti yaunoziʋa kuti miti isiŋgadyiwi, unofanira kuiparadza uciitema; guta rinorwa newe unofanira kuriʋakira mhanda kuȿikira rakundwa.
Kana panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe yako, pakawanikwa munhu wakaʋurawa akatandaʋara kusaŋgo, kusiŋgazikanwi kuti wamuʋuraya ndiani,
ipapo ʋakuru ʋako naʋatoŋgi ʋako ʋanofanira kundoyera cinhambo kuȿika kumaguta akapoteredza munhu wakaʋurawa;
ɀino guta riri pedyo nomunhu wakaʋurawa, ʋakuru ʋeguta iro ʋanofanira kutora tsiru reŋombe, risina‐kumboɓatwa naro, risina‐kumbokweʋa pajoko,
ʋakuru ʋeguta iro ʋagoenda netsiru kumupata unorukoʋa runemvura inoyerera, usina‐kumborimŋa kana kudɀarwa, ndokuvuna mutsipa wetsiru imomo mumupata;

ʋaprista ʋana ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kusweɗera, nokuti ndiʋo ʋakatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ʋamushumire, nokuropafadza ʋanhu nezita raJehova; nokuti cireʋo cenharo dzose nokukuʋadza kwose ɀinofanira kutemŋa naʋo;
ɀino ʋakuru ʋose ʋeguta iro riri pedyo nomunhu wakaʋurawa ʋanofanira kushamba maʋoko aʋo pamsoro petsiru rakavuniwa mutsipa waro pamupata,
ʋagopindura, ʋaciti: Maʋoko eɗu haana‐kuteʋura ropa iro, nameso eɗu haana‐kuriʋona.
Imi Jehova, kaŋganwirai henyu ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, ʋamakadzikinura; musatendera kuti ropa risinemhoȿa rigare pakati paʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri. Ipapo ʋacakaŋganwirwa ropa iro.
Saiɀoɀo unofanira kubvisa ropa risinemhoȿa pakati pako, kana waita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova.
Kana ucindorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, Jehova Mŋari wako akaʋaisa mumaʋoko ako, ukaʋatapa,
ukaʋona pakati paʋatapxa mukadzi wakanaka, ukamuɗa, ukaɗa kumuwana aʋe mukadzi wako,
unofanira kuenda naye kumba kwako; ɀino iye unofanira kuʋeʋura musoro wake, nokugura nzara dzake,
nokurasha ŋguʋo dzake dzokutapxa, ndokugara mumba mako acicema ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake mŋedzi wose; pashure paiɀoɀo iwe uŋgapinda kwaari, iwe uʋe murume wake, iye aʋe mukadzi wako.
Ɀino kana iwe usiŋgafari naye, unofanira kumurega kuti aende hake kwaanoɗa; asi haufaniri kutoŋgomuteŋgesa nemari; haufaniri kumuitira seɀinoitirwa muranda, nokuti wakataŋga wamunyadzisa.
Kana murume aciŋge anaʋakadzi ʋaʋiri, mumŋe unoɗikanwa, nomumŋe unoʋeŋgwa, ʋakamuɓerekera ʋana, unoɗikanwa nounoʋeŋgwa ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri; ɀino kana mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe ari waiye unoʋeŋgwa,
musi waanogarisa ʋanakomana ʋake nhaka yake, haafaniri kupa mŋanakomana wounoɗikanwa ʋuɗaŋgwe, aciɗarika mŋanakomana wounoʋeŋgwa, iye ari mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe caiye;
asi unofanira kutenda mŋanakomana wounoʋeŋgwa, kuti ndiye weɗaŋgwe, amupe migoʋe miʋiri yeɀose ɀaanaɀo; nokuti ndiye wokutaŋga wesimba rake; ndiye unofanirwa noʋuɗaŋgwe.
Kana munhu anomŋanakomana wakasindimara usiŋganzwi, usiŋgaɗi kuterera inzwi raɓaɓa ʋake kana inzwi ramai ʋake, usiŋganzwi kana ʋacimuraŋga;
ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake ʋanofanira kumuɓata ndokuenda naye kuʋakuru ʋeguta rake, nokusuʋo renɀimbo yake,
ʋagoti kuʋakuru ʋeguta rake: Mŋanakomana weɗu uyu wakasindimara, unotimukira, haaɗi kuterera inzwi reɗu; unopedza fuma, nokunwa ɗoro.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋeguta ʋanofanira kumutaka namabge, kuti afe; saiɀoɀo unofanira kubvisa cakaipa pakati pako; ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaɀinzwe, ʋatye.
Kana munhu aciŋge atadza ciʋi cinofanirwa norufu, akaʋurawa, ukamusuŋgirira pamuti;

citunha cake hacifaniri kuʋata pamuti ʋusiku bgose, asi unofanira kumuʋiga nomusi iwoyo, nokuti munhu wakasuŋgirirwa wakatukwa naMŋari; kuti urege kuȿiɓisa nyika yako yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe yako.
Haufaniri kuʋona nzombe yehama yako, kana gwai rake, ɀicirashika, ukaɀinyenyeredza; ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kuɀidzosera kuhama yako.
Kana hama yako iri kure newe, ɀimŋe usiŋgaciziʋi, unofanira kuenda naco kumusha kwako, cigare kwauri kuȿikira hama yako icicitȿaka, ugocidzosera kwaari.

Unofanira kuita saiɀoɀo ʋo nemboŋgoro yake; unofanira kuita saiɀoɀo ʋo neŋguʋo yake; unofanira kuita saiɀoɀo ʋo neɀinhu ɀose ɀehama yako ɀakarashika, caakaŋga arashikirwa naco, cikawanikwa newe; haufaniri kuɀinyenyeredza.
Haufaniri kuʋona mboŋgoro, kana nzombe, ɀehama yako ɀawira pasi panzira, ukaɀinyenyeredza; unofanira kumuɓatsira ɀirokwaɀo kuɀimutsa.
Mukadzi haafaniri kufuka ŋguʋo dzomurume, nomurume haafaniri kufuka ŋguʋo dzomukadzi; nokuti aninani unoita iɀoɀo unonyaŋgadza Jehova Mŋari wako.
Kana ukawana ɗendere reshiri panzira, pamuti upi noupi, kana pasi, rinaʋana kana mazai, mai icivuvatira ʋana kana mazai, haufaniri kutora mai naʋana;
unofanira kurega mai, asi ʋana uŋgatora hako; kuti ɀiʋe ɀakanaka newe, uwedzerwe mazuʋa ako.
Kana ukaʋaka imba itȿa, unofanira kuisa rumhanda paɗeŋga rako, kuti urege kuʋuyisa mhoȿa yeropa pamsoro peimba yako, kana mumŋe munhu akawa’po.
Haufaniri kudɀara mbeu dzamarudzi maʋiri pamunda wako wemizambiriŋga, kuti ɀiɓereko ɀose ɀirege kutsaurirwa
Usarima nenzombe nemboŋgoro ɀakasuŋgwa pamŋe cete.
Usafuka ŋguʋo dzakarukwa neɀinhu ɀakaveŋganiswa, mvere pamŋe cete nomuceka.
Unofanira kuziitira masa pamiromo minna yeŋguʋo yako yaunoɀifukidza nayo.
Kana munhu akawana mukadzi, akapinda kwaari, akazomuʋeŋga,
akamupomera ɀinonyadza, nokutaura ɀakaipa pamsoro pake, aciti: Ndakawana mukadzi uyu, asi ndakati ndicisweɗera kwaari, handina‐kuwana ɀiratidzo ɀoʋumhandara bgake kwaari;
ɀino ɓaɓa ʋomusikana namai ʋake ʋanofanira kuenda neɀiratidzo ɀoʋumhandara bgake kuʋakuru ʋeguta pasuʋo;
ɀino ɓaɓa ʋomusikana ʋanofanira kuti kuʋakuru: Ndakapa murume uyu mŋanasikana waŋgu, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake, asi ɀino womuʋeŋga;

tarirai, wamupomera ɀinhu ɀinonyadza, aciti: Handina‐kuwana ɀiratidzo ɀoʋumhandara kumŋanasikana wako; asi heɀi ɀiratidzo ɀoʋumhandara bgomŋanasikana waŋgu. Ɀino ʋanofanira kuwarira ŋguʋo pamberi paʋakuru ʋeguta.
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋeguta iro ʋanofanira kuɓata murume uyo, ʋamuroʋe;
nokumuripisa mashekeri
Asi kana riri shoko reɀokwaɗi, kuti ɀiratidzo ɀoʋumhandara ɀakashaikwa kumusikana,

ʋanofanira kuɓuɗisira musikana kumukoʋa weimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋarume ʋeguta rake ʋagomutaka namabge, afe; nokuti wakaita seɓenzi pakati paIsraeri, pakupata kwake paimba yaɓaɓa ʋake; saiɀoɀo unofanira kubvisa ɀakaipa pakati pako.
Kana murume akawanikwa aciʋata nomukadzi wakawanikwa nomurume wake, iʋaʋo ʋose ʋanofanira kuʋurawa, murume wakaʋata nomukadzi naiye mukadzi ʋo; saiɀoɀo iwe unofanira kubvisa ɀakaipa pakati paIsraeri.
Kana kunomusikana, iciri mhandara, wakanyeŋgwa nomurume, mumŋe murume akamuwana muguta, akaʋata naye;

ipapo munofanira kuʋaɓuɗisa ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri pasuʋo reguta, mugoʋataka namabge, ʋafe, musikana nokuti haana‐kuridza mhere, ari muguta hake, ʋuye murume, nokuti wanyadzisa mukadzi wowokwake; saiɀoɀo iwe unofanira kubvisa ɀakaipa pakati pako.
Asi kana murume akawana musikana uyo wakanyeŋgwa ari kusaŋgo, murume akaita simba naye, akaʋata naye, iye murume wakaʋata naye unofanira kufa, iye oga;
asi musikana haufaniri kumuita cinhu; musikana haana‐kuita ciʋi cinofanirwa norufu; nokuti shoko iri rakafanana neromurume wakamukira wokwake akamuʋuraya;
nokuti wakamuwana kusaŋgo, musikana wakanyeŋgwa akaridza mhere, asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu kumurwira.
Kana murume akawana musikana, iciri mhandara, ugere kunyeŋgwa, akaita simba naye, akaʋata naye, ʋakaʋonekwa;
ipapo murume wakaʋata naye unofanira kupa ɓaɓa ʋake mashekeri
Murume haafaniri kutora mukadzi waɓaɓa ʋake, haafaniri kufukura nhere yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Munhu wakakuʋadzwa manhu ake kana cirema cake haafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova.
Mŋana woʋupombge haafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova; kunyaŋge kuȿikira parudzi rwegumi ʋana ʋake haʋafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova.
MuAmoni nomuMoabi haʋafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova; kunyaŋge kuȿikira parudzi rwegumi mumŋe wokwaʋo haafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova nokusiŋgaperi;
nokuti haʋana‐kundokuciŋgurai neɀokudya nemvura panzira, ŋguʋa yamakaɓuɗa Egipita; ʋuye nokuti ʋakatsaka kuripira Barami, mŋanakomana waBeori, wePetori, paMesopotamia, kuti akutuke.
Asi Jehova Mŋari wako wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kuterera Barami, asi Jehova Mŋari wako wakashandura kutuka akakuropafadza, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako wakakuɗa.
Haufaniri kuʋatȿakira rugare kana mufaro, mazuʋa ako ose nokusiŋgaperi.
Haufaniri kusema muEdomi, nokuti ihama yako; haufaniri kusema muEgipita, nokuti wakaŋga uri mutorwa iwe panyika yake.
Ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaʋanoɓerekerwa parudzi rwecitatu, ʋaŋgapinda paʋuŋgano yaJehova.
Kana ucindorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, unofanira kuɀiceŋgeta paɀinhu ɀose ɀakaipa.
Kana kunomumŋe pakati penyu usina‐kunaka nokuɗa kweɀakamuwira ʋusiku, unofanira kuɓuɗa kunze kwemisasa, ŋgaarege kupinda pamisasa;
ɀino kana aʋa maɗekwana, unofanira kuɀishambidza nemvura; kana zuʋa raʋira uŋgapinda hake pamisasa.
Iwe unofanira kuʋa nenɀimbo kunze kwemisasa kwauŋgaenda.
Unofanira kuʋa neciraya ʋo pakati penhumbi dzako dzokurwa nadzo; ɀino kana woenda kunze, unofanira kucera naco, ndokuzofusira ɀinobva kwauri;

nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako unofamba pakati pemisasa yako, kuti akurwire, nokuisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako mumaʋoko ako; naiɀoɀo misasa yako inofanira kuʋa mitȿene, kuti arege kuʋona cinhu cakaipa pakati penyu, akufuratire.
Usadzosera muranda kunatenzi wake, wakatizira kwauri, acibva kunatenzi wake;
unofanira kugara newe, pakati pako, paanotsaura hake pakati perimŋe ramasuʋo ako, paanofarira; haufaniri kumumanikidza.
Hapafaniri kuʋa necifeʋe pakati paʋanasikana ʋaIsraeri; ʋuye hapafaniri kuʋa nemhombge pakati paʋanakomana ʋaIsraeri.
Haufaniri kuʋuya nomuɓayiro wecifeʋe, kana muteŋgo wembga, muimba yaJehova Mŋari wako, kuti upike nawo; nokuti iɀo ɀiʋiri ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova Mŋari wako.
Usapa hama yako cikwerete, ucireʋa mhindu, iri mhindu yemari, kana yeɀokudya, kana yecinhu cipi necipi cinopiwa cicireʋa mhindu.

Mutorwa uŋgamupa cikwerete, ucireʋa mhindu; asi haufaniri kupa hama yako cikwerete, ucireʋa mhindu; kuti Jehova Mŋari wako akuropafadze paɀose ɀaunoɓata namaʋoko ako, panyika yaunoenda kuti iʋe yenyu.
Kana ukapikira Jehova Mŋari wako mhiko, usanonoka kuiripa; nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova Mŋari wako ucaibvunza kwauri; ɀiŋgaʋa ɀiʋi kwauri.
Asi kana ukarega hako kupika, haɀiŋgaʋi ɀiʋi kwauri.
Ucenjere kuti uite seɀawakataura; seɀawakapikira Jehova Mŋari wako, ciri cipo cokuɗa kwako, cawakapikira nomuromo wako.
Kana ukapinda mumunda wemizambiriŋga wowokwako, uŋgadya mazambiriŋga seɀaunoɗa, ugute; asi haufaniri kuisa mamŋe mumudziyo wako.
Kana ukapinda muɀiyo ɀowokwako ɀigere kukohiwa, uŋgavuna hako hura noruʋoko rwako; asi haufaniri kuceka ɀivo ɀowokwako nejeko.

Kana murume akatora mukadzi, akamuwana, ɀino akasafara naye, nokuti wawana cinhu cisina‐kufanira kwaari, unofanira kumunyorera rugwaro rwokumuramba, ndokuruisa muruʋoko rwake, ndokumubvisa mumba make.
Ɀino kana aɓuɗa mumba make, uŋgandowanikwa nomumŋe murume.
Kana murume uyu ɀe akamuʋeŋga, akamunyorera rugwaro rwokumuramba, akamupa irwo muruʋoko rwake, akamubvisa mumba make, kunyaŋge murume uyu akazofa, iye wakazomuwana,
murume wake wokutaŋga, wakaɗeya kumubvisa, haaŋgamuwani ɀe, ɀaakaȿiɓiswa; nokuti iɀo ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova; haufaniri kutadzisa nyika, yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe nhaka yako.
Kana munhu acaŋgowana mukadzi, haafaniri kuenda kuhondo, kana kuɓatiswa rimŋe ɓasa; unofanira kugara kumusha gore rimŋe akasunuŋguka, kuti afadze mukadzi wake waakawana.
Munhu haafaniri kutora guyo kana huyo, kuti ruʋe ruɓatso; nokuti unotora ruɓatso rwoʋupenyu bgomunhu.
Kana munhu akawanikwa aciɓa mumŋe wehama dzake kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, akamuita muranda wake, kana kumuteŋgesa, uyo muɓi unofanira kufa; saiɀoɀo unofanira kubvisa cakaipa pakati pako.
Cenjera pahosha yamaperembudzi kuti uceŋgete nokuita ɀakanaka ɀamunodzidziswa naʋaprista ʋaRevi; seɀandakaʋaraira, ndiɀo ɀamunofanira kuita.
Raŋgarira ɀakaitirwa Miriami naJehova Mŋari wako panzira, muciɓuɗa Egipita.
Kana ukaposwa nowokwako cinhu cipi necipi, haufaniri kupinda mumba make kundotora ruɓatso rwake.
Unofanira kumira kunze, kuti munhu wakaposwa newe akuɓuɗisire kunze ruɓatso rwake.
Kana aciŋge ari murombo, haufaniri kundoʋata noruɓatso rwake.
Unofanira kumudzosera ruɓatso kana zuʋa roʋira, kuti aʋate neŋguʋo yake, akuropatadze; ucaruramiswa pamsoro paiɀoɀo naJehova Mŋari wako.
Usamanikidza muranda unokuɓatira, ari murombo unoshaiwa, kana ari mumŋe wehama dzako, kana waʋatorwa ʋako ʋari munyika yako, mukati mamasuʋo ako.
Unofanira kumupa muɓairo wake zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, zuʋa ŋgarirege kuʋira asanhi apiwa; nokuti murombo, nomŋoyo wake unoutarira; kuti arege kuzocema kunaJehova pamsoro pako, ɀikaʋa ɀiʋi kwauri.
Madziɓaɓa haafaniri kuʋurawa pamsoro paʋana ʋaʋo, naʋana haʋafaniri kuʋurawa pamsoro pamadziɓaɓa aʋo; munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kuʋurayirwa ɀiʋi ɀake.
Usatoŋgera mutorwa kana nherera ɀisina‐kururama; ʋuye haufaniri kutora ŋguʋo yecirikadzi kuita ruɓatso nayo.
Asi unofanira kuraŋgarira kuti wakaŋga uri muranda paEgipita, Jehova Mŋari wako akakudzikinura ipapo; naiɀoɀo ndinokuraira kuita cinhu ici.

Kana ukakohwa ɀiyo ɀako mumunda mako, ukakaŋganwa cisote mumunda, haufaniri kudzokera kundocitora; cinofanira kuʋa comutorwa, nenherera, necirikadzi; kuti Jehova Mŋari wako akuropafadze pamaɓasa ose amaʋoko ako.
Kana ucizuza muti wako womuorivi, usatȿakisisa pamataʋi ɀe; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀomutorwa nenherera, necirikadzi.
Kana uciʋuŋganidza
Unofanira kuraŋgarira kuti wakaŋga uri muranda panyika yeEgipita; naiɀoɀo ndinokuraira cinhu ici.
Kana ʋanhu ʋakaita nharo, ʋakaʋuya kutoŋgerwa,
Ɀino kana wakatadza acifanirwa nokurobga, mutoŋgi unofanira kumutsiʋamisa pasi, agorobga pamberi pake ɀakaenzana nokutadza kwake.
Unofanira kumuroʋa kanamakumi manna, haafaniri kupfuʋudza; kuti, kana akapfuʋudza, akamuroʋa kupfuʋura ipapo kazhinji, hama yako irege kuɀidzwa pamberi pako.
Usasuŋga muromo wenzombe inopura ɀiyo.

Kana ʋana ʋomunhu mumŋe ʋagere pamŋe cete, mumŋe waʋo akafa asinomŋanakomana, mukadzi wowakafa haafaniri kuwanikwa nomutorwa kunze kwehama; munuŋuna womurume wake unofanira kupinda kwaari, aʋe mukadzi wake, amuitire seɀinofanira kuita munuŋuna womurume.
Ɀino mŋana weɗaŋgwe waacaɓereka, ndiye unofanira kupinda panɀimbo yomukoma wake wakafa, kuti zita rake rirege kudzimŋa pakati paIsraeri.

Kana munhu asiŋgaɗi kuwana mukadzi womukoma wake, mukadzi womukoma wake unofanira kukwira kusuʋo raʋakuru, agoti: Munuŋuna womurume waŋgu unoramba kumutsira mukoma wake zita munaIsraeri, haaɗi kundiitira seɀinofanira kuita munuŋuna womurume.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋeguta rake ʋanofanira kumuɗana, ʋataure naye; kana akaramba, aciti: Handiɗi haŋgu kumuwana;

mukadzi womukoma wake unofanira kuʋuya kwaari pamberi paʋakuru, ndokubvisa shaŋgu yake parutsoka rwake, ndokumupfira mate pameso, agopindura aciti: Ndiɀo ɀinofanira kuitirwa munhu usiŋgaʋaki imba yomukoma wake.
Zita rake munaIsraeri rinofanira kunzi: Imba yomunhu wakabviswa shaŋgu yake.
Kana ʋarume ʋakarwa, mukadzi womumŋe akasweɗera kurwira murume wake paruʋoko rwaiye unomuroʋa, akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akamuɓata pamberi,
iwe unofanira kugura ruʋoko rwake, haufaniri kumunzwira tsitsi.
Haufaniri kuʋa neɀiyereso ɀisina‐kuenzana muhomboɗo yako, cikuru neciɗuku.
Haufaniri kuʋa neɀiyero ɀisina‐kuenzana mumba mako, cikuru neciɗuku.
Unofanira kuʋa neciyereso cakakwana, cakarurama; kuti mazuʋa ako aʋe mazhinji panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Nokuti ʋose ʋanoita ɀinhu ɀakaɗai, iʋo ʋose ʋanoita ɀisina‐kururama, ʋanonyaŋgadza Jehova Mŋari wako.
Raŋgarira ɀawakaitirwa naAmareki panzira, pakuɓuɗa kwenyu Egipita;
kuti wakakuwira panzira, akaparadza ʋanhu ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋari shure, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasinesimba, paŋguʋa yamakaŋga maziya nokuneta; iye wakaŋga asiŋgatyi Mŋari.

Ɀino kana Jehova Mŋari wako akupa zororo paʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose, ʋanokupoteredza panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, iʋe nhaka yako, unofanira kubvisa pasi pokuɗeŋga ɀose ɀinoraŋgaridza Amareki; usakakaŋganwa.
Ɀino kana wapinda panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti iʋe nhaka yako, ikaʋa yako, ukagara’mo;
unofanira kutora ɀitȿa ɀeɀiɓereko ɀose ɀenyika, ɀaunowana panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, ndokuɀiisa muɗeŋgu, ndokuenda naɀo kunɀimbo icatsaurwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kuti agarise’po zita rake.
Ɀino uende kumuprista ucaʋa’po pamazuʋa iwayo, uti kwaari: Ndinoreʋa pacena nhasi pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, kuti ndaȿika panyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa eɗu naJehova, kuti ucatipa iyo.
Ipapo muprista unofanira kutora ɗeŋgu paruʋoko rwako, ndokurigadza pamberi peartari yaJehova Mŋari wako.

Iwe ugopupura, uciti pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakaŋga ʋari muArameya, mufambi wakaŋga oɗo‐kuparara, akaɓurukira Egipita, akagara’po, anaʋanhu ʋashoma haʋo; ʋakaitwa’po rudzi rukuru, runesimba, runaʋanhu ʋazhinji.
ƲaEgipita ʋakatiitira ɀakaipa, nokutitambudza, ʋakatiɓatisa maɓasa anorema.
Ipapo takaɗana kunaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu, Jehova akanzwa inzwi reɗu, akaʋona kutambudzika kweɗu, namaɓasa eɗu, nokuremedzwa kweɗu;
Jehova akatiɓuɗisa paEgipita necanza cinesimba, noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, neɀinotyisa, neɀiratidzo, neɀishamiso;
akatiȿitsa panɀimbo ino, akatipa nyika ino, nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Ɀino tarira, ndaʋuya neɀitȿa ɀeɀiɓereko ɀenyika yamakandipa, imi Jehova. Ipapo unofanira kuɀiisa pasi pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako; ndokunamata pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako.
Unofanira kufarira ɀose ɀakanaka, ɀaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, iwe, naʋeimba yako, nomuRevi, nomutorwa uri pakati pako.

Ɀino kana wapedza kutsaura ɀegumi ɀeɀiɓereko ɀako ɀose negore recitatu, nokuti ndiro gore rokutsaura ɀegumi, unofanira kuɀipa muRevi, nomutorwa, nenherera, necirikadzi, kuti ʋadye mukati mamasuʋo ako, ʋagute.

Ipapo iwe unofanira kutaura pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako, uciti: Ndabvisa mumba maŋgu ɀinhu ɀakatsaurwa, ndikaɀipa muRevi, nomutorwa, nenherera, necirikadzi, ɀose seɀamakandiraira; handina‐kuɗarika mumŋe wemirairo yenyu, kana kuikaŋganwa.
Handina‐kuɀidya pakucema kwaŋgu, kana kuʋiga ɀimŋe ɀaɀo, ndisinakunaka, kana kupa ʋakafa ɀimŋe ɀaɀo; ndakaterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari waŋgu, ndikaita ɀose ɀamakandiraira.
Ƌotarirai muri paʋugaro bgenyu bgutȿene, pakuɗeŋga, muropafadze ʋanhu ʋenyu Israeri, nenyika yamakatipa, seɀamakapikira madziɓaɓa eɗu, nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Nhasi Jehova Mŋari wako unokuraira kuti uite iɀi ɀakatemŋa neɀakatoŋgwa; naiɀoɀo unofanira kuɀiceŋgeta nokuɀiita nomŋoyo wako wose nomŋeya wako wose.
Wapikisa Jehova nhasi kuti aʋe Mŋari wako, newe kuti unofanira kufamba munzira dzake, nokuceŋgeta ɀaakatema, nemirairo yake, neɀaakatoŋga, ʋuye kuti ucaterera inzwi rake.
NaJehova wakakupikisa iwe kuti ucaʋa rudzi rwake cairwo, seɀaakakupikira, ʋuye kuti ucaceŋgeta mirairo yake yose;
kuti akukurise kwaɀo kupfuʋura ndudzi dzose dzaakaita, pakurumbidzwa, napamukurumbira, napakukudzwa; kuti uʋe rudzi rutȿene kunaJehova Mŋari wako, seɀaakataura.
Ɀino Mosesi naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri ʋakaraira ʋanhu, ʋakati: Ceŋgetai mirairo yose yandinokurairai nhasi.
Ɀino nomusi wamunoyambuka Joridani mucipinda munyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, unofanira kuɀimisira mabge makuru nokuacenesa nesuko;
ugonyora pamsoro pawo mashoko ose omurairo uyu, kana wayambuka; kuti upinde munyika yawakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, seɀawakapikirwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ako.
Ɀino kana mayambuka Joridani, munofanira kumisa mabge iwayo, seɀandinokurairai nhasi, pagomo reEbari, nokuacenesa nesuko.
Ipapo unofanira kuʋakira’po Jehova Mŋari wako artari, artari yamabge; haufaniri kusimudzira nhumbi yeɗare pamsoro payo.
Unofanira kuʋaka artari yaJehova Mŋari wako namabge asina‐kuʋezwa, ugoɓayira’po Jehova Mŋari wako ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa.
Unofanira kuɓayira’po ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, nokudya’po; unofanira kufara pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako.
Unofanira kunyora pamsoro pamabge awo mashoko ose omurairo uyu, ɀiʋonekwe kwaɀo.
Ɀino Mosesi naʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakataura naʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakati: Iwe Israeri, nyarara, unzwe; nhasi waitwa rudzi rwaJehova Mŋari wako.
Naiɀoɀo unofanira kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, uite mirairo yake neɀaakatema, ɀandinokuraira nhasi.
Mosesi akaraira ʋanhu nomusi uyo, akati:
Ndiʋo ʋanofanira kundomira pamsoro pegomo reGerizimi, kuti ʋaropafadze ʋanhu, kana mayambuka Joridani: Simeoni, naRevi, naJuda, naIsakari, naJosefa, naBenjamini.
Ʋuye ndiʋo ʋanofanira kundomira pagomo reEbari, kuti ʋaʋatuke: Rubeni, naGadi, naAsheri, naZeburuni, naDani, naNaftari.
Ɀino ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kupindura, ʋaciti kuʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri nenzwi guru:
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoita mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, kana wakaʋumbga, unonyaŋgadza Jehova, riri ɓasa ramaʋoko emhizha, aciumisa pakaʋanda. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kupindura, ʋaciti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoɀidza ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoshandura muganho wehama yake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unotsausa ɓofu panzira. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unotoŋgera mutorwa nenherera necirikadzi ɀisakarurama. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoʋata nomukadzi waɓaɓa ʋake, nokuti wafukura nhere yaɓaɓa ʋake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoʋata nemhuka ipi neipi. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoʋata nehanɀadzi yake, kana nomŋanasikana waɓaɓa ʋake, kana nomŋanasikana wamai ʋake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoʋata namai ʋomukadzi wake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unoroʋa wokwake pakaʋanda. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu unogamucira fufuro kuti aʋuraye mumŋe usinemhoȿa. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ŋgaatukwe munhu usiŋgasimbisi mashoko omurairo uyu, nokuaita. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuti: Ameni.
Ɀino kana uciterera ɀakanaka inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, nokucenjera kuita mirairo yake yose, yandinokuraira nhasi, Jehova Mŋari wako ucakukurisa kupfuʋura ndudzi dzose dziri panyika.
Kuropafadzwa uku kwose kucaitika kwauri, ucateʋererwa nako, kana uciterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako.
Ucaropafadzwa muguta, ucaropafadzwa mumunda.
Ɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako, neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, neɀiɓereko ɀeŋombe dzako, neɀiɓereko ɀemhou dzako, namakwaiana amakwai ako, ɀicaropafadzwa.
Ƌeŋgu rako, nomudziyo wako wokukanyira ciŋgwa, ɀicaropafadzwa.
Ucaropafadzwa kana ucipinda, ucaropafadzwa kana uciɓuɗa.
Jehova ucakukundisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, ʋanokumukira, pamberi pako; ʋacaʋuya kuzorwa newe nenzira imŋe, ʋacatiza pamberi pako nenzira nomŋe.
Jehova ucaraira kuti uropafadzwe pamatura ako, napaɀose ɀaunoɓata namaʋoko ako; ucakuropafadza panyika yaunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Jehova ucakusimbisa, kuti uʋe rudzi rwake rutȿene, seɀaakakupikira; kana uciceŋgeta mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wako, nokufamba munzira dzake.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋacaʋona kuti iwe wakatumidzwa nezita raJehova; ʋacakutya.
Jehova ucakuwanzira mufaro paɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako, napaɀiɓereko ɀeŋombe dzako, napaɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, panyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa ako naJehova, kuti ucakupa iyo.
Jehova ucakuzarurira fuma yake yakanaka yokuɗeŋga, akupe mvura yenyika yako neŋguʋa yayo; nokuropafadza maɓasa ose amaʋoko ako; iwe ucapa ndudzi zhinji cikwerete, asi iwe umene hauŋgatori cikwerete.
Jehova ucakuita musoro, haaŋgakuiti muswe; ucaʋa kumsoro ɓedzi, hauŋgaʋi pasi; kana uciterera mirairo yaJehova Mŋari wako, yandinokuraira nhasi, ucishiŋgaira kuiita;
usiŋgatsauki panerimŋe ramashoko andinokuraira, kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe, uciteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari kuti uʋashumire.
Asi kana uciramba kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako kuti ucenjere kuita mirairo yake yose, neɀaakatema, ɀandinokuraira nhasi; kutukwa uku kwose kucaitika kwauri, ucateʋererwa nako.
Ucatukwa muguta, ucatukwa mumunda.
Ƌeŋgu rako ricatukwa, nomudziyo wako wokukanyira ciŋgwa.
Ɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako ɀicatukwa, neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, neɀiɓereko ɀemhou dzako, namakwaiana amakwai ako.
Ucatukwa kana ucipinda, ucatukwa kana uciɓuɗa.
Jehova ucatuma pamsoro pako kutukwa, nokunyoŋganiswa, nokuraŋgwa, paɀose ɀaunoɓata namaʋoko ako, kuȿikira waparadzwa, ʋuye kuȿikira wakurumidza kupera, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaunoita, ɀawakandisiya naɀo.
Jehova ucakunamatidza ɗenda, kuȿikira akupedza kunyika kwaunoenda, kuti iʋe yako.
Jehova ucakuroʋa norukosoro, nefiviri, nokupisa kwomuʋiri, nokuʋaʋiswa kwaɀo, ʋuye nokushaiwa mvura, nenyunje, nokuvuva; iɀo ɀicakuteʋerera kuȿikira waparadzwa.
Ƌeŋga rako riri pamsoro pako ricaita sendarira, nenyika iri pasi pako seɗare.
Jehova ucashandura mvura yenyika yako iʋe ɓukuta neguruʋa; ɀicaɓurukira pamsoro pako ɀicibva kuɗeŋga, kuȿikira waparadzwa.
Jehova ucatendera kuti ukundwe naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako; ucaɓuɗa kundorwa naʋo nenzira imŋe, ucatiza pamberi paʋo nenzira nomŋe; ucaʋa cinhu cinotyisa pakati poʋushe bgose bgenyika.
Ɀitunha ɀako ɀicaʋa ɀokudya ɀeshiri dzose dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀenyika, kusinomunhu unoɀidziŋga.
Jehova ucakuroʋa namamota eEgipita, namaronda, nemhizi, nokufunuka, ɀicaramba kupora.
Jehova ucakuroʋa nokupeŋga, noʋupofu, ʋuye nokukaŋganiswa kwomŋoyo;
ucatȿaŋgadzira masikati, seɓofu rinotȿaŋgadzira murima, hauŋgafari panzira dzako; ucaremedzwa nokuɓirwa ŋguʋa dzose, hakuŋgaʋi nomunhu unokurwira.
Ucanyeŋga mukadzi, asi mumŋe murume ucaʋata naye; ucaʋaka dzimba, asi hauŋgagari’mo; ucarima munda wemizambiriŋga, asi hauŋgaŋgadyi micero yayo.
Ŋombe yako icaɓayiwa uciɀiʋona, asi hauŋgaidyi; mboŋgoro yako icatorwa nesimba uciɀiʋona, asi haiŋgadzoserwi kwauri; makwai ako acapiwa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, hauŋgawani unokurwira.
Ʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako ʋacapiwa rumŋe rudzi; meso ako acatarira, ukaneta kuʋashuʋa zuʋa rose; asi ucashaiwa simba paruʋoko rwako.
Ɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, neɀamaɓasa ako, ɀicadyiwa norudzi rwausiŋgaziʋi; ucaŋgoremedzwa nokutambudzwa ŋguʋa dzose.
Ucapeŋgeswa neɀaucaʋona nameso ako.
Jehova ucakuroʋa pamabvi ako, napamakumbo ako, namamota anorwadza, acaramba kupora, kubva parutsoka kuȿikira pamsoro pomusoro wako.
Jehova ucakuisa iwe namambo wako waucaɀitsaurira kurudzi rwawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi iwe namadziɓaɓa ako; ɀino ucandoshumira’po ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ʋamatanda namabge.
Iwe ucaitwa cishamiso, neshumo, neciseko, pakati paʋanhu ʋose kwaucandoiswa naJehova.
Ucatakurira mbeu zhinji kumunda, asi ucaʋuŋganidza ɀishoma; nokuti ɀicapedzwa nemhashu.
Ucarima minda yemizambiriŋga nokuigadzira, asi hauŋganwi waini yayo, kana kutanha
Ucaʋa nemiti yemiorivi panyika yako yose, asi hauŋgazori mafuta ayo, nokuti miorivi yako icazuka.
Ucaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana, asi haʋaŋgaʋi ʋako, nokuti ʋacatapxa.
Miti yako yose neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako ɀicadyiwa nemhashu.
Mutorwa ugere pakati pako ucaramba acikwirira kupfuʋura iwe; iwe ucaramba uciɗerera.
Iye ucakupa cikwerete, asi iwe hauŋgamupi cikwerete; iye ucaʋa musoro, iwe ucaʋa muswe.
Kutukwa uku kwose kucaitika kwauri, nokukuteʋera, nokukuɓata, kuȿikira waparadzwa; nokuti hauna‐kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake naɀaakatema, ɀaakakuraira.
Ɀicaʋa pamsoro pako napamsoro paʋana ʋako, ɀiʋe ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso nokusiŋgaperi;
nokuti hauna‐kushumira Jehova Mŋari wako nomufaro, nomŋoyo unofara, nokuɗa kwokuwanda kweɀose.
Naiɀoɀo ucafanira kuɓatira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, ʋaucatumirwa naJehova kuti urwe naʋo, ucinzwa nzara, nenyota, ucishaiwa ɀokufuka neɀose iɀi; iye ucaisa joko reɗare pamutsipa wako, kuȿikira akuparadza.
Jehova ucaʋuyisa rudzi runobva kure kuzorwa newe, runobva kumagumisiro enyika, segondo rinobururuka, rudzi rwausiŋganzwisisi rurimi rwarwo;
rudzi runehasha, rusiŋgaraŋgariri ʋatana, kana kunzwira majaya tsitsi.

Ʋacadya ɀiɓereko ɀeŋombe dzako, neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, kuȿikira waparadzwa; haʋaŋgakusiyiri ɀiyo, kana waini, kana mafuta, kana ɀakaɓerekwa nemhou dzako, kana makwaiana amakwai ako, kuȿikira waparadzwa naʋo.
Ʋacakukomba pamasuʋo ako ose, kuȿikira maȿiŋgo ako marefu anesimba awa ose, awakatenda munyika yako yose; ʋacakukomba pamasuʋo ako ose panyika yako yose, yawakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wako.
Ucadya ɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako, nyama yaʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako, ʋawakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wako, kana wokombga nokumanikidzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako.
Murume unoʋundere nounoʋuneŋgwe kwaɀo pakati pako ucaʋa nomufuŋgo wakaipa kuhama yake, nokumukadzi wake waanoɗa, nokuʋana ʋake ʋaaneŋge asarirwa naʋo;
haaŋgapi mumŋe waʋo nyama yaʋana ʋake ʋaacadya, nokuti iye haaŋgaʋi necaakasarirwa naco, kana wokombga nokumanikidzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako pamasuʋo ako ose.

Mukadzi unoʋundere nounoʋuneŋgwe pakati pako, wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kutsika pasi norutsoka rwake nokuɗa kwoʋuneŋgwe bgake noʋundere bgake, ucaʋa nomufuŋgo wakaipa kumurume wake waanoɗa, nomŋanakomana wake, nomŋanasikana wake;
nokumŋana wake muɗuku, waacaŋgoɓereka, nokuʋana ʋake ʋaacazoɓereka; nokuti ucadya pakaʋanda nokuɗa kwokushaiwa ɀinhu ɀose, kana wokombga nokumanikidzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako pamasuʋo ako.
Kana usiŋgacenjeri kuita mashoko ose omurairo uyu, akanyorwa mubuku iyi, kuti utye zita iri rinobginya nerinotyisa, rinoti: JEHOVA MŊARI WAKO;
Jehova ucakuroʋa iwe naʋana ʋako namadambudziko anoshamisa, maɗambudziko makuru, asiŋgakurumidzi kupera, namatenda akaipa, asiŋgakurumidzi kupera.
Ucaʋuyisa ɀe pamsoro pako hosha dzose dzeEgipita, dzawakaŋga ucitya, kuti dzikunamatire.
Namatenda ose, namaɗambudziko ose, asina‐kunyorwa mubuku yomurairo uyu, ndiwo acaʋuyiswa naJehova pamsoro pako, kuȿikira waparadzwa.
Mucasara maʋa ʋashoma, kunyaŋge makaŋga muri ʋazhinji senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga; nokuti hauna‐kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako.
Ɀino Jehova seɀaakaŋga acikufarirai aciɗa kukuitirai ɀakanaka, nokukuwanzai, saiɀoɀo Jehova ucafara pamsoro penyu kukupedzai nokukuparadzai; mucadzurwa kunyika kwaunoenda, kuti iʋe yako.

Jehova ucakurashanya pakati pendudzi dzose, kubva pamugumo mumŋe wenyika kuȿikira kunomumŋe mugumo; ipapo ucandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ʋawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi, iwe namadziɓaɓa ako, ʋamŋari ʋamatanda naʋamabge.
Pakati pendudzi idzo hauŋgawani zororo, netsoka dzako hadziŋgawani pokuzorora; asi Jehova ucakupa ipapo mŋoyo unoɗeɗera, nameso anoneta, nomŋeya unowonda;
ʋupenyu bgako bgucarembera pamberi pako, ucatya ʋusiku namasikati, hauŋgaziʋi kana ucararama;
maŋgwanani ucati: Ƌai aiʋa maɗekwana! Maɗekwana ucati: Ƌai aiʋa maŋgwanani! nokutya kwomŋoyo wako, kwaucatya nako, ʋuye nokuɗa kweɀaucaʋona nameso ako.
Jehova ucakuisa ɀe Egipita neɀikepe nenzira yandakati kwauri: Haucazoiʋoni ɀe; ipapo mucandoɀiteŋgesa kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, kuti muʋe ʋaranda naʋarandakadzi, asi hakuŋgaʋi nomunhu ucakuteŋgai.
Ndiwo mashoko esuŋgano yakarairwa Mosesi naJehova, kuti aiite naʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yaMoabi, kunze kwesuŋgano yaakaita naʋo paHorebi.
Ɀino Mosesi akaɗana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, akati kwaʋari: Makaʋona ɀose ɀakaitwa naJehova pamberi penyu panyika yeEgipita kunaFarao naʋaranda ʋake ʋose, nokunyika yake yose;
miidzo iya mikuru yamakaʋona nameso enyu, neɀiratidzo, neɀishamiso ɀiya ɀikuru.
Asi Jehova haana‐kukupai mŋoyo inoziʋa, nameso anoʋona, nenzeʋe dzinonzwa kuȿikira nhasi.
Ndakakutuŋgamirirai murenje makore anamakumi manna; ŋguʋo dzenyu hadzinakukusakarirai, neshaŋgu dzako hadzina‐kusakara patsoka dzako.
Hamunakudya ciŋgwa, kana kunwa waini neɀinoɓata; kuti muziʋe kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino makati muciȿika panɀimbo ino, Sihoni, mambo weHeshboni, naOgi, mambo weBashani, ʋakaʋuya kuzorwa nesu, tikaʋakunda;
tikatora nyika yaʋo, tikaipa ʋaRubeni naʋaGadi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, kuti iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ceŋgetai mashoko esuŋgano iyi, muiite, kuti mufare paɀose ɀamunoita.
Mumire nhasi mose pamberi paJehova Mŋari, ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋenyu, namarudzi enyu, naʋakuru ʋenyu, naʋatariri ʋenyu, iʋo ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri,
nepxere dzenyu, naʋakadzi ʋenyu, naʋatorwa ʋako ʋari pakati pemisasa yako, kubva paʋatemi ʋehuni dzako kuȿikira kuʋaceri ʋemvura yako;
kuti upinde pasuŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wako, napakupika kwake kwaanokupikira nhasi iye Jehova Mŋari wako;
kuti akusimbise nhasi uʋe rudzi rwake, iye aʋe Mŋari wako, seɀaakataura kwauri, ʋuye seɀaakapikira madziɓaɓa ako, Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo.
Handiiti suŋgano iyi nokupika uku nemi moga;
asi naiʋo ʋamire pano nesu nhasi pamberi paJehova Mŋari weɗu, ʋuye naʋasi’po nesu nhasi;
(Nokuti munoziʋa kugara kweɗu panyika yeEgipita, nokufamba kweɗu pakati pendudzi, dzamakapfuʋura pakati padzo;
mukaʋona ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo, neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀamatanda neɀamabge, nesirveri nendarama, ɀakaŋga ɀiri pakati paʋo;)

kuti pakati penyu parege kuʋa nomurume, kana mukadzi, kana mhuri, kana rudzi, ʋanomŋoyo unotsauka kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu nhasi, kuti ʋandoshumira ʋamŋari ʋendudzi idzo; kuti pakati penyu parege kuʋa nomudzi unoɓereka ɀinoʋuraya negaʋakaʋa;
ɀino kana acinzwa mashoko okupika uku, aɀirumbidze pamŋoyo wake, aciti: Ndicaʋa norugare, kunyaŋge ndicifamba haŋgu noʋukukutu bgomŋoyo waŋgu, kuti ɀakanyoroʋa neɀakawoma ɀiparadzwe pamŋe cete;

Jehova haaŋgamukaŋganwiri, asi neŋguʋa iyo kutsamŋa kwaJehova neshuŋgu dzake ɀicapfuŋgairira munhu uyo, nokutukwa kwose kwakanyorwa mubuku iyi kucamunamatira; Jehova ucadzima zita rake pasi pokuɗeŋga.
Jehova ucamutsaurira ɀakaipa ɀose pakati pamarudzi ose aIsraeri, kuti atukwe nokutuka kwose kwesuŋgano yakanyorwa mubuku iyi yomurairo.
Ɀino rudzi runoteʋera, iʋo ʋana ʋenyu ʋacamuka pashure penyu, naʋatorwa ʋanobva kunyika iri kure, kana ʋaciʋona maɗambudziko enyika iyo, namatenda aicarwadziswa nawo naJehova;

ʋuye kuti nyika yose isurferi, nomunyu, nokutȿa, kuti haidɀarwi, haimedzi, ʋuye kuti ʋuswa habgumeri’mo, sapakuparadzwa kweSodoma neGomora, neAdma neZeboimi, aya maguta akaparadzwa naJehova pakutsamŋa kwake neshuŋgu dzake;
ʋuye ndudzi dzose dzicati: Jehova wakaitira nyika iyo saiɀoɀo neiko? Kupisa kwokutsamŋa uku kukuru kunoti kuɗiniko?
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋacati: Nokuti ʋakasiya suŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, yaakaita naʋo ŋguʋa yaakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita;
ʋakashumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋakanamata kwaʋari, ʋamŋari ʋaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi, ʋaʋasina‐kupiwa naye;
naiɀoɀo kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira nyika iyi, kuti aituke nokutuka kwose kwakanyorwa mubuku iyi.
Jehova akaʋadzipura panyika yaʋo nokutsamŋa kwake neshuŋgu dzake nehasha dzake huru, akaʋarashira kuneimŋe nyika, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.
Ɀinhu ɀakaʋanzwa ndeɀaJehova Mŋari weɗu; asi ɀinhu ɀakaratidzwa pacena ndeɀeɗu, isu naʋana ʋeɗu nokusiŋgaperi, kuti tiite mashoko ose omurairo uyu.
Ɀino kana ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ɀicikuwira, iko kuropafadzwa nokutukwa, kwandakaisa pamberi pako, ukaɀiraŋgarira pakati pendudzi dzose, pawakadziŋgirwa naJehova Mŋari wako,
ukadzokera kunaJehova Mŋari wako, ukaterera inzwi rake, seɀandinokuraira ɀose nhasi, iwe naʋana ʋako, nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose;
ipapo Jehova Mŋari wako ucashandura kutapxa kwako, nokukunzwira tsitsi, nokukuʋuŋganidza ɀe pandudzi dzose, kwaakakurashanyira kwadziri, iye Jehova Mŋari wako.
Kunyaŋge ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgirwa kumagumisiro okuɗeŋga, Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuʋuŋganidza’po, ucandokutora’po;
Jehova Mŋari wako ucakuʋuyisa munyika, yakaŋga iri yamadziɓaɓa ako, kuti iʋe yako; ucakuitira ɀakanaka, nokukuwanza kupfuʋura madziɓaɓa ako.
Jehova Mŋari wako ucadziŋgisa mŋoyo wako, nemŋoyo yaʋana ʋako, kuti uɗe Jehova Mŋari wako nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose, kuti urarame.
Jehova Mŋari wako ucatuka ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako nokutuka uku kwose, naʋose ʋanokuʋeŋga ʋanokutambudza.
Ɀino iwe ucadzoka nokuterera inzwi raJehova, nokuita mirairo yake yose, yandinokuraira nhasi.

Jehova Mŋari wako ucawanza ɀinoɓatwa namaʋoko ako, neɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako, neɀiɓereko ɀeŋombe dzako, neɀiɓereko ɀevu rako, kuti ɀifare; nokuti Jehova ucakufarira ɀe ɀakanaka, seɀaakafarira madziɓaɓa ako;
kana uciterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wako, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake neɀaakatema, ɀakanyorwa mubuku iyi yomurairo; kana ukadzokera kunaJehova Mŋari wako nomŋoyo wako wose nomŋeya wako wose.
Nokuti murairo uyu wandinokuraira nhasi hauŋgakuremeri ɀikuru, ʋuye hauzi kure.
Hauzi kuɗeŋga, kuti uti: Ndianiko ucatikwirira kuɗeŋga, kundotitorera iwo, nokutinzwisa iwo, kuti tiuite?
Hauzi mhiri kweguŋgwa, kuti uti: Ndianiko ucatiyambukira mhiri kweguŋgwa, andotitorera iwo, nokutinzwisa iwo, tiuite?
Asi shoko riri pedyo kwaɀo newe, mumuromo mako, nomumŋoyo mako, kuti uriite.
Tarira ndaisa pamberi pako nhasi ʋupenyu neɀakanaka, norufu neɀakaipa.

Ɀandinokuraira nhasi ndiɀo, kuti uɗe Jehova Mŋari wako, nokufamba munzira dzake, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake neɀaakatema neɀaakatoŋga, kuti urarame, uwande, ʋuye kuti Jehova Mŋari wako akuropafadze kunyika kwaunoenda kwairi, kuti iʋe yako.
Asi kana mŋoyo wako ukatsauka, ukaramba kuterera, ukatsauswa kunamata ʋamŋe ʋamŋari nokuʋashumira,
ndinokuʋudzai nhasi, kuti mucaparadzwa ɀirokwaɀo; hamuŋgaʋi namazuʋa mazhinji kunyika kwaunoyambukira nhasi, kuti iʋe yako.
Ndinoɗana kuɗeŋga napasi kukupupurirai nhasi, kuti ndaisa pamberi pako ʋupenyu norufu, kuropafadzwa nokutukwa; naiɀoɀo tsaura ʋupenyu, kuti urarame, iwe naʋana ʋako;

kuti uɗe Jehova Mŋari wako, nokuterera inzwi rake, nokumunamatira; nokuti ndibgo ʋupenyu bgako, nokuwanzwa kwamazuʋa ako; kuti ugare munyika yakapikira Jehova madziɓaɓa ako, Abrahama naIsaka naJakobo, kuti ucaʋapa iyo.
Ɀino Mosesi akaenda kundotaura mashoko awa kuʋaIsraeri ʋose,
akati kwaʋari: Ndaʋa namakore anezana namakumi maʋiri nhasi, handicagoni kuɓuɗa nokupinda; ɀino Jehova wakati kwandiri: Iwe hauŋgayambuki Joridani urwu.
Jehova Mŋari wako ndiye ucakutuŋgamirira pakuyambuka; iye ucaparadza ndudzi idzi dzose pamberi pako, dzicaʋa dzako; Joshua ndiye ucakutuŋgamirira pakuyambuka, seɀakataurwa naJehova.
Jehova ucaʋaitira iʋo seɀaakaitira Sihoni naOgi, madzimambo aʋaAmori, nenyika yaʋo, ʋaakaparadza.
Jehova ucaʋaisa
Simbai, mutsuŋge mŋoyo, musatya kana kuvunduswa naʋo; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako ndiye unoenda newe, haaŋgakuregi, haaŋgakusiyi.

Ɀino Mosesi akaɗana Joshua, akati kwaari pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose: Simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo, nokuti iwe ucaenda naʋanhu aʋa panyika yakapikirwa madziɓaɓa aʋo naJehova, kuti ucaʋapa iyo; iwe ucaʋagarisa nhaka iyo.
Jehova ndiye unokutuŋgamirira, iye ucaʋa newe, haaŋgakuregi, haaŋgakusiyi; usatya kana kuvunduswa.
Ɀino Mosesi akanyora murairo uyu, akaupa ʋaprista naʋana ʋaRevi, ʋaitakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, naʋakuru ʋose ʋaIsraeri.
Mosesi akaʋaraira, akati: Ŋguʋa dzose pakupera kwamakore manomŋe, paŋguʋa yakatarwa pagore resunuŋguro, pamutambo wemisasa,
kana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaʋuya kuɀiratidza pamberi paJehova Mŋari wako panɀimbo icatsaurwa naye, unofanira kuraʋa murairo uyu pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋaunzwe.
Ʋuŋganidza ʋanhu, ʋarume naʋakadzi, nepxere, naʋatorwa ʋako ʋari pakati pamasuʋo ako, kuti ʋanzwe, ʋadzidze, ʋatye Jehova Mŋari wenyu, ʋacenjere kuita mashoko ose omurairo uyu;
ʋuye kuti ʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi ʋanzwe, ʋadzidze kutya Jehova Mŋari wenyu, ŋguʋa yose yamucazogara panyika yamunoyambuka Joridani kwairi, kuti iʋe yenyu.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tarira, mazuʋa okufa kwako asweɗera; ɗana Joshua mundomira mutente rokusoŋgana, kuti ndimuraire iye. Mosesi naJoshua ʋakandomira mutente rokusoŋgana.
Jehova akaɀiratidza muTente mushoŋgwe yegore, shoŋgwe yegore ikamira pamsoro pomukoʋa weTente.

Ipapo Jehova akati kunaMosesi: Tarira, iwe ucaʋata namadziɓaɓa ako; ɀino ʋanhu aʋa ʋacasimuka ndokupata ʋaciteʋera ʋamŋari ʋaʋatorwa ʋenyika, kwaʋanondogara pakati paʋo; ʋacandisiya, nokuputsa suŋgano yandakaita naʋo.

Ɀino kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kucaʋamukira neŋguʋa iyo, ndicaʋasiya nokuʋaʋanzira ciso caŋgu, ʋacaparadzwa, neɀakaipa ɀizhinji nenhamo zhinji ɀicaʋawira; naiɀoɀo neŋguʋa iyo ʋacati: Ko ɀinhu ɀakaipa iɀi haɀina‐kutiwira nokuti Mŋari weɗu haazi pakati peɗu here?
Neŋguʋa iyo ndicaʋanza ciso caŋgu nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀose ɀaʋakaita pakutsaukira kwaʋo kunaʋamŋe ʋamŋari.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino munofanira kuɀinyorera rwiyo urwu, ugorudzidzisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri; uruise mumiromo yaʋo, kuti rwiyo urwu rundipupurire kuʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Nokuti kana ndaʋapinza panyika yandakapikira madziɓaɓa aʋo, iyo inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, iʋo ʋakadya, ʋakaguta, ʋakakora, ipapo ʋacatsaukira kunaʋamŋe ʋamŋari nokuʋashumira, ʋakandiɀidza ini, nokuputsa suŋgano yaŋgu.

Ɀino kana ɀakaipa ɀizhinji nenhamo zhinji ɀikaʋawira, rwiyo urwu rucaʋa capupu kupupura pamberi paʋo; nokuti haruŋgakaŋganikwi pamiromo yaʋana ʋaʋo, nokuti ndinoziʋa ndaŋgariro dzaʋanoruka nhasi, ndicigere kuʋapinza panyika yandakaʋapikira.
Naiɀoɀo Mosesi wakanyora rwiyo urwu nomusi iwoyo, akarudzidzisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Akaraira Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, akati: Simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo, nokuti iwe ucapinza ʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yandakaʋapikira; neni ndicaʋa newe.
Ɀino Mosesi wakati apedza kunyora mashoko omurairo uyu mubuku, kuȿikira apera,
Mosesi akaraira ʋaRevi, ʋaitakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, akati:
Torai buku iyi yomurairo, muiise parutiʋi rweareka yesuŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, kuti ikupupurire’po.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kusanzwa nokusaterera kwenyu; tarirai, ini ndiciri mupenyu pakati penyu nhasi, makamukira Jehova; hamucanyanyisi here kana ndafa?
Ʋuŋganidzai kwandiri ʋakuru ʋose ʋamarudzi enyu, naʋatariri ʋenyu, kuti ʋanzwe ndicitaura mashoko awa nokuɗana ɗeŋga napasi ɀiʋapupurire.

Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti kana ndafa mucaɀishatsa kwaɀo, nokutsauka panzira yandakakurairai; ɀakaipa ɀicakuwirai pamazuʋa okupedzisira, nokuti makaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, mucimutsamŋisa namaɓasa amaʋoko enyu.
Ɀino Mosesi akataura mashoko orwiyo urwu, kuȿikira apera, ʋuŋgano yose iciɀinzwa.
Inzwa iwe ɗeŋga, ndicataura;
Nenyika ŋgainzwe mashoko omuromo waŋgu;
Kudzidzisa kwaŋgu kucaɗonha semvura,
Kutaura kwaŋgu kucayerera seɗoʋa,
Seguti paɓumhudza nyoro,
Sokupfunha kwemvura paʋuswa;
Nokuti ndicaparidza zita raJehova;
Rumbidzai ʋukuru bgaMŋari weɗu.
Iye ndiro ɗombo, ɓasa rake rakakwana;
Nokuti nzira dzake dzose dzakarurama.
Ndiye Mŋari wakatendeka, usiŋganyeŋgeri,
Wakarurama, ndowaɀokwaɗi.
Ʋakamuitira ɀakashata, haʋazi ʋana ʋake, ndiko kuremara kwaʋo;
Iʋo rudzi rwakatsauka, rwakakombama.
Munoripira Jehova saiɀoɀo here,
Nhai, imi mapenzi asina‐kuŋgwara?
Ko haazi ɓaɓa ʋako ʋakakuɓereka here?
Ndiye wakakuita, nokukusimbisa.
Raŋgarira mazuʋa ekare,
Fuŋga makore amarudzi mazhinji;
Bvunza ɓaɓa ʋako, ndiʋo ʋacakuratidza;
Naʋatana ʋako, ndiʋo ʋacakuʋudza.
Wokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ŋguʋa yaakapa ndudzi nhaka yadzo,
Ŋguʋa yaakaparadzanisa ʋana ʋaʋanhu,
Wakatema miganho yendudzi
Aciraŋgarira kuwanda kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti mugoʋe waJehova ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋake;
Jakobo ndiyo nhaka yake yakayerwa.
Wakamuwana munyika yesaŋgo,
Murenje risinecinhu, rinotyisa;
Wakamukomberedza, nokumutarira,
Nokumuceŋgeta semboni yeziso rake;
Segondo rinomutsa ʋana ʋaro,
Ricieŋgerera pamsoro paʋana ʋaro,
Ricitambanudza mapapiro aro, riciʋagamucira,
Riciʋaɓereka pamapapiro aro;
Saiɀoɀo Jehova, iye oga, wakamutuŋgamirira,
Kwakaŋga kusinamŋari wokumŋe kwaari.
Wakamutaȿisa panɀimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika,
Wakadya micero yeminda;
Wakamuȿutidza ʋuci bgunobva paɗombo,
Namafuta anobva paɗombo romusarasara,
Nomukaka wakafa wemhou, nomukaka wamakwai,
Pamŋe cete namafuta amakwaiana,
Namakondobge orudzi rwapaBashani, nembudzi,
Namafuta etȿo dzekoroni;
Iwe wakanwa waini yeropa ramazambiriŋga.
Asi Jeshuruni wakazokora, ndokupfura,
Iwe wakakora, wakaʋa mukobvu, ukaʋa namafuta,
Ɀino iye akarasha Mŋari wakamuita,
Akaɀidza ɗombo rakamuceŋgeta.
Ʋakamugoɗoresa naʋamŋari ʋokumŋe,
Ʋakamutsamŋisa neɀinonyaŋgadza;
Ʋakaɓayira mŋeya yakaipa, yakaŋga isi Mŋari,
Ʋari ʋamŋari ʋaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi,
Ʋatȿa ʋakaŋga ʋacaŋgomuka,
Ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgatyiwi namadziɓaɓa enyu.
Ƌombo, rakakuɓereka, hauriraŋgariri,
Wakakaŋganwa Mŋari wakakupona.
Jehova wakaɀiʋona, akaʋarasha,
Nokuti wakatsamŋiswa naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanasikana ʋake.
Akati: Ndicaʋaʋanzira ciso caŋgu,
Ndinoɗa kuʋona kuguma kwaʋo, kuti kwakaɗiniko;
Nokuti iʋo rudzi rwakatsauka kwaɀo,
Ʋana ʋasina‐kutendeka cose.
Ʋakamutsa goɗo raŋgu necinhu cisati ciri Mŋari;
Ʋakanditsamŋisa neɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀisinamaturo;
Neni ʋo ndicaʋagoɗoresa naʋasati ʋari ʋanhu;
Ndicaʋatsamŋisa norudzi runopeŋga.
Nokuti mŋoto wakaɓatidzwa pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu,
Unopisa kuȿikira pasi kugomba raʋakafa,
Unoparadza nyika neɀiɓereko ɀayo,
Unotuŋgidza nheyo dzamakomo.
Ndicatutira njodzi pamsoro paʋo,
Ndicapedza miseʋe yaŋgu ndiciʋafura.
Ʋacawonda nenzara, nokuparadzwa nokupisa kukuru,
Nokuparadzwa kwakaiȿo‐ipa;
Ndicatuma meno eɀikara kwaʋari,
Pamŋe cete nomuti unoʋuraya weɀinokambaira muguruʋa.
Munondo ucaʋatorera kunze,
Nokutyisa mudzimba dzomukati;
Ɀicaparadza jaya nemhandara,
Mŋana unomŋa pamŋe cete naʋarume, ʋacena vudzi.
Ndakati, ndicaʋafuridzira kure,
Ndicagumisa kuraŋgarirwa kwaʋo pakati paʋanhu;
Ƌai ndisina‐kutya kutsamŋa kwaʋaʋeŋgi,
Kuti ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋasanzwisisa,
Ʋakati: Ruʋoko rweɗu ndirwo rwakakunda,
Haazi Jehova wakaita iɀoɀo ɀose.
Nokuti iʋo rudzi rusinamano,
Hakuna‐kunzwisisa pakati paʋo.
Ƌai ʋakaŋga ʋakacenjera, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋakaɀinzwisisa,
Ʋaŋgaɗai ʋakaʋona kuguma kwaʋo!
Munhu mumŋe uŋgadziŋga seiko
Naʋanhu ʋaʋiri ʋaŋgatizisa seiko
Kana ɗombo raʋo risina‐kuʋateŋgesa,
NaJehova asina‐kuʋaisa
Nokuti ɗombo raʋo harina‐kufanana neɗombo reɗu,
Kunyaŋge ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋamene ʋacitoŋga.
Nokuti muzambiriŋga waʋo wakabva pamuzambiriŋga weSodoma,
Napaminda yeGomora;
Mazambiriŋga aʋo mazambiriŋga enduru,
Masumbu awo anoʋaʋa;
Waini yaʋo ʋuturu bgenyoka,
Noʋuturu bgunoʋuraya kwaɀo bgemhuŋgu.
Ko iɀi haɀina‐kuʋuŋganidzwa kwandiri here?
Haɀina‐kufunhurwa pakati pefuma yaŋgu here?
Kutsiʋa ndokwaŋgu, nokutsiʋidza,
Paŋguʋa yokutedzemuka kwetsoka dzaʋo;
Nokuti zuʋa renjodzi yaʋo riri pedyo,
Neɀinhu ɀicaʋawira ɀicakurumidza kuʋuya.
Nokuti Jehova ucaruramisira ʋanhu ʋake,
Nokunzwira ʋaranda ʋake tsitsi,
Kana aciʋona kuti simba raʋo raenda,
Ʋuye kuti ʋapera ʋose,
Ɀino iye ucati: Ʋamŋari ʋaʋo ʋaripiko,
Neɗombo raʋakaŋga ʋaciʋimba naro?
Iʋo ʋaidya mafuta eɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo,
Ʋainwa waini yeɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀinoɗururwa.
Ŋgaʋasimuke, ʋakuɓatsirei,
Ŋgaʋaʋe ʋutiziro bgenyu.
Tarirai ɀino,
Hakunomumŋe mŋari pamŋe cete neni;
Ini ndinoʋuraya, ini ndinoraramisa;
Ini ndakakuʋadza, ini ndinoporesa;
Hakuna‐uŋgarwirwa paruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Nokuti ndinosimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kuɗeŋga,
Ndiciti:
Kana ndarodza munondo waŋgu unobginya,
Noruʋoko rwaŋgu rukaɓata kutoŋga,
Ndicatsiʋa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu,
Nokutsiʋidza ʋanondiʋeŋga.
Ndicanyudza miseʋe yaŋgu muropa,
Munondo waŋgu ucadya nyama;
Neropa raʋakaʋurawa neraʋakatapxa,
Neremisoro yaʋatuŋgamiri ʋaʋaʋeŋgi.
Farai, imi ndudzi, pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋake,
Nokuti ucatsiʋa ropa raʋaranda ʋake,
Nokutsiʋidza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake,
Nokudzikinura nyika yake naʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀino Mosesi akaʋuya ndokutaura mashoko ose orwiyo urwu ʋanhu ʋaciɀinzwa, iye naHoshea, mŋanakomana waNuni.
Mosesi akapedza kutaura mashoko awa ose kuʋaIsraeri ʋose;
akati kwaʋari: Tererai nemŋoyo yenyu mashoko ose andinokupupurirai nhasi, kuti muraire ʋana ʋenyu, ʋagocenjera kuita mashoko ose omurairo uyu.
Nokuti hacizi cinhu cisinamaturo kwamuri, asi ndibgo ʋupenyu bgenyu; necinhu ici mucawedzera mazuʋa enyu panyika, yamunoyambuka Joridani kwairi, kuti iʋe yenyu.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naMosesi nomusi iwoyo, akati:
Kwira pagomo iri reAbarimi, kugomo reNebo, riri panyika yaMoabi, rakatarisana neJeriko, uʋone nyika yeKanani, yandinopa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋe yaʋo;
ufire pagomo raunokwira, ugosoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋako; seɀakafa Aroni, mukuru wako, pagomo reHori, akasoŋganiswa naʋanhu ʋake;
nokuti makaita nomutoʋo usina‐kutendeka kwandiri pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri pamvura yeMeriba paKadeshi murenje reZini; nokuti hamuna‐kunditsaura pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti ucaʋona hako nyika pamberi pako, asi hauŋgapindi’po panyika yandinopa ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ndiko kuropafadza kwaMosesi, munhu waMŋari, kwaakaropafadza nako ʋana ʋaIsraeri, asati afa.
Akati:
Jehova wakabva Sinai,
Akaʋaɓuɗira acibva Seiri;
Akapenya ari pagomo reParani,
Akaʋuya acibva paɀuru ɀinegumi ɀaʋatȿene;
Paruʋoko rwake rworudyi pakaŋga panomurairo womŋoto kwaʋari.
Ɀirokwaɀo unoɗa ndudzi;
Ʋatȿene ʋake ʋose ʋari paruʋoko rwenyu;
Ʋakagara pasi patsoka dzenyu;
Mumŋe nomumŋe ucagamucira mashoko enyu.
Mosesi wakatiraira murairo,
Ndiyo nhaka yeʋuŋgano yaJakobo.
Wakaŋga ari mambo paJeshuruni,
Pakuʋuŋgana kwaʋakuru ʋaʋanhu,
Marudzi ose aʋaIsraeri pamŋe cete.
Rubeni ŋgaararame, arege kufa,
Asi ʋanhu ʋake ŋgaʋaʋe ʋashoma haʋo.
Kuropafadzwa kwaJuda ndiko: Akati:
Inzwai Jehova inzwi raJuda,
Mumuȿitse kuʋanhu ʋake;
Wakaʋarwira namaʋoko ake;
Imi mucamuɓatsira kurwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋake.
Pamsoro paRevi wakati:
Tumimi yenyu neUrimi yenyu ndeɀa‐unoɗikanwa nemi,
Iye wamakaidza paMasa,
Wamakarwa naye pamvura yeMeriba;
Iye wakati pamsoro paɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake:
Handina‐kumuʋona;
Nehama dzake haana‐kudziraŋgarira,
Kana kuziʋa ʋana ʋake,
Nokuti ʋakaita shoko renyu,
Nokuceŋgeta suŋgano yenyu.
Ʋacadzidzisa Jakobo ɀamakatoŋga,
NaIsraeri murairo wenyu;
Ʋacaisa ɀinonhuwira pamberi penyu,
Neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa ɀakakwana paartari dzenyu.
Jehova, ropafadzai simba rake,
Gamucirai ɓasa ramaʋoko ake;
Gurai ɀiʋuno ɀaʋanomumukira,
Neɀaʋanomuʋeŋga, kuti ʋarege kusimuka ɀe.
Pamsoro paBenjamini wakati:
Muɗikanwa waJehova ucagara kwaari akaceŋgetwa;
Unomufukidza zuʋa rose,
Unogara pakati pamafudzi ake.
Pamsoro paJosefa wakati:
Nyika yake ŋgairopafadzwe naJehova;
Neɀinhu ɀakanakisa ɀeɀiɓereko ɀezuʋa,
Neɀinhu ɀakanakisa ɀinomedzwa nomŋedzi;
Neɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀamakomo ekare,
Neɀinhu ɀakanakisa ɀeɀikomo ɀisiŋgaperi,
Neɀinhu ɀakanakisa ɀenyika nokuzara kwayo,
Nomŋoyo wakanaka waiye wakaŋga agere mugwenzi;
Kuropafadzwa ŋgakuʋuye pamusoro waJosefa,
Napamsoro pomusoro waiye wakatsaurwa pakati pehama dzake.
Mŋana wemhoŋgora weŋombe dzake, ndibgo ʋumambo bgake;
Nyaŋga dzake inyaŋga dzenyati;
Nadzo ucaɓaya ndudzi dzose dzaʋo, namagumisiro enyika;
Ndiʋo ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ɀinegumi ɀaEfraimi,
Ndiʋo ʋaneɀuru ɀaManase.
Pamsoro paZeburuni wakati:
Cifara, Zeburuni, pakuɓuɗa kwako,
Newe Isakari, pamatente ako.
Ʋacaɗanira ʋanhu kumakomo;
Ipapo ʋacaʋuya neɀiɓayiro ɀokururama;
Nokuti ʋacanwa fuma zhinji yamakuŋgwa,
Nefuma zhinji yakaʋanzwa nejeca.
Pamsoro paGadi wakati:
Unokurisa Gadi ŋgaaropafadzwe;
Iye unogara seshumbakadzi,
Unobvambura ruʋoko, kunyaŋge nomusoro.
Wakaɀitsaurira mugoʋe wokutaŋga;
Nokuti ndipapo pakaceŋgetwa mugoʋe womuɓati;
Wakaʋuya naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu;
Wakaita ɀakarurama ɀaJehova,
Neɀaakatoŋga pamsoro paIsraeri.
Pamsoro paDani wakati:
Dani ndiye mŋana weshumba,
Unokwakuka acibva Bashani.
Pamsoro paNaftari wakati:
Iwe Naftari, wakaguta nyasha,
Uzere nokuropafadzwa naJehova;
Tora maʋirazuʋa nenyasi ɀiʋe ɀako.
Pamsoro paAsheri wakati:
Asheri ŋgaaropafadzwe apiwe ʋana;
Ŋgaaɗikanwe nehama dzake,
Ŋgaanyike rutsoka rwake mumafuta.
Ɀipfigiso ɀako ɀicaʋa ɀamatare nendarira;
Nesimba rako ricaenzana namazuʋa ako.
Iwe Jeshuruni, hakuna‐wakafanana naMŋari,
Iye unotaȿa ɗeŋga kuti akuɓatsire,
Napamsoro pamakore noʋukuru bgake.
Mŋari usiŋgaperi ndibgo ʋugaro
Pasi pako kunamaʋoko asiŋgaperi;
Iye wakadziŋga ʋaʋeŋgi pamberi pako,
Akati: Paradzai.
Israeri unogara akaceŋgetwa,
Tsime raJakobo riri roga,
Panyika yeɀiyo newaini;
Ƌeŋga rake rose rinonisa ɗoʋa.
Israeri, iwe wakaropafadzwa;
Ndiani wakatodzana newe, rudzi rwakaceŋgetwa naJehova?
Ndiye nhoʋo inokuɓatsira,
Nomunondo waunokudzwa nawo!
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋacaɀiisa pasi pako,
Newe ucatsika panɀimbo dzaʋo dzakakwirira.
Ɀino Mosesi wakabva pamapani okwaMoabi, akakwira kugomo reNebo, pamsoro pePisga, pakatarisana neJeriko. Jehova akamuratidza nyika yose yeGireadi, kuȿikira Dani;
neNaftari yose, nenyika yaEfraimi naManase, nenyika yose yaJuda, kuȿikira paguŋgwa rokumaʋirazuʋa;
nenyika yezasi, neƂani romupata weJeriko, guta remicindwe, kuȿikira Zoari.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwaari: Ndiyo nyika yandakapikira Abrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo, ndiciti: Ndicaipa ʋana ʋako; ndikakuʋonesa iyo nameso ako, asi hauŋgapindi’mo.
Ipapo Mosesi muranda waJehova akafira’po panyika yaMoabi, seɀakataurwa naJehova.
Akamuʋiga pamupata panyika yaMoabi, pakatarisana neBeti‐peori; asi hapanomunhu unoziʋa rinda rake kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino Mosesi wakaŋga anamakore anezana namakumi maʋiri pakufa kwake; meso ake akaŋga acigere kuʋonera madzerere, nesimba rake rakaŋga ricigere kuɗerera.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema Mosesi pamapani okwaMoabi mazuʋa anamakumi matatu; naiɀoɀo mazuʋa aʋakacema pakucema Mosesi akapera.
Ɀino Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, wakaŋga azere nomŋeya wokucenjera; nokuti Mosesi wakaŋga aisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakamuterera, ʋakaita seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Hakuna‐kuzomuka ɀe muprofita pakati paIsraeri wakafanana naMosesi, wakaŋga acizikanwa naJehova, ɀiso ɀakatarisana;
paɀiratidzo ɀose neɀishamiso, paakatumŋa naJehova kundoɀiita panyika yeEgipita, kunaFarao, nokuʋaranda ʋake ʋose, nokunyika yake yose;
napaɀose ɀakaitwa noruʋoko rwake runesimba, napakutyisa kukuru kwose, kwakaitwa naMosesi ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaciɀiʋona.
Ɀino Mosesi, muranda waJehova, wakati afa, Jehova akataura naJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, muranda waMosesi, akati:
Mosesi, muranda waŋgu wafa; ɀino simuka iwe uyambuke Joridani urwu, iwe naʋanhu aʋa ʋose, muende kunyika yandinoʋapa iʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nɀimbo imŋe neimŋe icatsikwa netsoka dzenyu ndakakupai iyo, seɀandakataura naMosesi.
Kubva murenje neRebanoni iri, kuȿikira parwizi rukuru, irwo rwizi Ufratesi, nenyika yose yaʋaHeti, kuȿikira kuguŋgwa guru, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiyo nyika yenyu.
Hakunomunhu ucagona kumira pamberi pako mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgako; ndicaʋa newe seɀandaisiʋa naMosesi; handiŋgakuregi kana kukusiya.
Simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo, nokuti ucagarisa ʋanhu aʋa nhaka yandakapikira madziɓaɓa aʋo, kuti ndicaʋapa iyo, iʋe yaʋo.
Asi usimbe nokutsuŋga mŋoyo kwaɀo, kuti ucenjere kuita murairo wose wandakaraira Mosesi muranda waŋgu; usatsauka kwauri, kana kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe, kuti uʋe nomufaro pose paunoenda.

Buku iyi yomurairo haifaniri kubva pamuromo wako, asi unofanira kuiraŋgarira masikati noʋusiku, kuti ucenjere kuita ɀose ɀakanyorwa’mo; nokuti nokuɗaro ucaɀiwanira mufaro panzira yako nokuɓata nokucenjera.
Ko handina‐kukuraira here? Simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo; usatya kana kuvunduswa, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wako unewe kwose kwaunoenda.
Ipapo Joshua akaraira ʋatariri ʋaʋanhu, akati:

Pindai napakati pemisasa, muraire ʋanhu, muti: Ɀigadzirirei mbuʋa, nokuti mazuʋa matatu acigere kupera mucafanira kuyambuka Joridani urwu, kuti mupinde panyika iyo yamunopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu, iʋe yenyu.
Joshua akataura naʋaRubeni naʋaGadi, nokuhafu yorudzi rwaManase, akati:
Raŋgarirai shoko ramakarairwa naMosesi, muranda waJehova, aciti: Jehova Mŋari wenyu ucakupai zororo, nokukupai nyika iyi.

Ʋakadzi ʋenyu nepxere dzenyu neɀipfuwo ɀenyu ɀicasara panyika yamakapiwa naMosesi necoʋuno mhiri kwaJoridani, asi imi ʋarume ʋose ʋanesimba noʋumhare munofanira kuyambuka pamberi pehama dzenyu makashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa, muʋaɓatsire;

kuȿikira Jehova apa hama dzenyu zororo semi, nenyika yaʋanopiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu iʋe yaʋo; ipapo muŋgadzokera kunyika yenyu, yamakapiwa naMosesi, muranda waJehova, iri necoʋuno mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa, kuti iʋe yenyu.
Ʋakapindura Joshua, ʋakati: Ɀose ɀamunotiraira, ticaɀiita, pose pamunotituma ticaenda’po.
Seɀataiterera Mosesi paɀose, saiɀoɀo ticakutererai nemi ʋo; Jehova Mŋari wenyu ŋgaaʋe nemi, seɀaaiʋa naMosesi.
Aninani unomukira murairo wenyu, asiŋgaɗi kuterera mashoko enyu paɀose ɀamunoraira, iye ucaʋurawa; asi simbai, mutsuŋge mŋoyo.

Ɀino Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, wakatuma ʋarume ʋaʋiri pakaʋanda, ʋacibva Shitimi, kuti ʋandoshora, aciti: Endai mundotarira nyika neJeriko. Ʋakaenda, ʋakapinda muimba yecifeʋe, cainzi Rakabi, ʋakaʋata’po.
Ɀino mambo weJeriko akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarirai, ʋarume ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapinda muno ʋusiku bguno kuzoshora nyika.
Ɀino mambo weJeriko akatuma shoko kunaRakabi, akati: Ƃuɗisa ʋarume ʋakaȿika kwauri, ʋapinda mumba mako, nokuti ʋaʋuya kuzoshora nyika yose.
Mukadzi akatora ʋarume aʋo ʋaʋiri, akaʋaʋanza, akati: Hoŋo, ʋarume ʋakaȿika haʋo kwandiri, asi ndakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi kuti ʋaibve’pi.
Ɀino neŋguʋa yokupfigwa kwesuʋo, kwaȿiɓa, ʋarume ʋakaɓuɗa ɀe; kwaʋakazoenda iʋo ʋarume, ini handikuziʋi; kurumidzai kuʋateʋera, nokuti muŋgandoʋaɓata.
Asi wakaŋga aʋakwidza pamsoro peɗeŋga, akaʋaʋanza pasi poʋutanda bgamasosoʋori, bgakaŋga bgakaroŋgwa naye paɗeŋga.
Ʋarume ʋakaʋateʋerera nenzira inoenda Joridani, kuȿikira kumazambuko; ɀino ʋakaʋateʋerera ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa, suʋo rikazarirwa.
Ɀino ʋacigere kuʋata, Rakabi ndokukwira kwaʋari pamsoro peɗeŋga,
akati kuʋarume: Ndinoziʋa kuti Jehova wakakupai nyika, tinokutyai kwaɀo, ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere munyika ʋavunduka pamberi penyu.

Nokuti takanzwa kuti Jehova wakapxisa mvura yeGuŋgwa Dɀuku pamberi penyu, ŋguʋa yokuɓuɗa kwenyu Egipita, neɀamakaitira madzimambo maʋiri aʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwaJoridani, iʋo Sihoni naOgi, ʋamakaparadza cose.
Ɀino pakarepo takati ticinzwa iɀoɀo mŋoyo yeɗu ikavunduka, hakunomunhu ucinokutsuŋga pamŋoyo pake nokuɗa kwenyu, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu, ndiye Mŋari kuɗeŋga kumsoro napanyika pasi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ndipikirei henyu naJehova, kuti ɀandakakuitirai ɀakanaka, nemi ʋo mucaitira imba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ɀakanaka; mundipei ʋo ciratidzo cakasimba,
kuti mucararamisa ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu namai ʋaŋgu nehanɀadzi dzaŋgu naʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu, neɀose ɀaʋanaɀo, nokurwira ʋupenyu bgeɗu parufu.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋakati kwaari: Isu ŋgatife panɀimbo yenyu, kana musiŋgaɓuɗisi pacena ɓasa reɗu iri; kana Jehova acitipa nyika iyi, ticakuitira ɀakanaka neɀokwaɗi.
Ipapo akaʋaɓurusira pasi neɓote napawindi, nokuti imba yake yakaŋga iri pamsoro poruȿiŋgo
Akati kwaʋari: Tizirai henyu kumakomo, kuti ʋateʋeri ʋarege kusoŋgana nemi, muʋande’po mazuʋa matatu, kuȿikira ʋateʋeri ʋadzoka; pashure muŋgaenda henyu.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋakati kwaari: Hatiŋgasuŋgwi nemhiko yako iyi yawakatipikisa.

Tarira, ŋguʋa yatinopinda panyika ino, unofanira kusuŋgira ɓote iri dɀuku rakakoshwa pawindi pawakatiɓurusira pasi napo; unofanira ʋo kuʋuŋganidza mumba mako ɓaɓa ʋako, namai ʋako, nehanɀadzi dzako, naʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako.

Ɀino aninani unoɓuɗa kunze kwemikoʋa yeimba vako, ropa rake ricaʋa pamsoro pomusoro wake, asi isu hatiŋgaʋi nemhoȿa; aninani unewe mumba mako, ropa rake ricaʋa pamsoro pemisoro yeɗu, kana akaitirwa ɀakaipa noruʋoko rwomunhu.
Asi kana ukaɓuɗisa pacena ɓasa reɗu iri, isu hatiŋgasuŋgwi nemhiko yako yawakatipikisa.
Iye akati: Ŋgaɀiitwe seɀamakataura; akaʋaendisa, ʋakabva, iye ndokusuŋgira ɓote dɀuku pawindi.
Iʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakaȿika kumakomo, ʋakagara’po mazuʋa matatu, kuȿikira ʋateʋeri ʋadzoka; ʋateʋeri ʋakaʋatȿaka panzira iyo yose, asi haʋana‐kuʋawana.
Ɀino ʋarume aʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakadzoka, ʋakaɓuruka pamakomo, ʋakayambuka, ʋakaȿika ɀe kunaJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni; ʋakamuʋudza ɀose ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaitirwa.
Ʋakati kunaJoshua: Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova wakaisa nyika yose pamaʋoko eɗu; ʋuye ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere panyika iyo ʋavunduka pamberi peɗu.
Ɀino Joshua wakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakabva Shitimi, ʋakaȿika paJoridani, iye naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose; ʋakaʋata’po ʋasati ʋayambuka.
Mazuʋa matatu akati apera, ʋatariri ʋakapinda napakati pemisasa,
ʋakaraira ʋanhu, ʋaciti: Kana muciʋona areka yesuŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, naʋaprista ʋaRevi ʋoitakura, munofanira kusimuka pamugere, nokuiteʋera.
Asi munofanira kusiya nɀimbo pakati penyu naiyo, inoȿika makubiti
Ɀino Joshua akati kuʋanhu: Ɀinatsei, nokuti maŋgwana Jehova ucaita ɀinoshamisa pakati penyu.
Joshua akataura naʋaprista, akati: Simudzai areka yesuŋgano, mutuŋgamirire ʋanhu pakuyambuka. Iʋo ʋakasimudza areka yesuŋgano, ʋakatuŋgamirira ʋanhu.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Nhasi ndicataŋga kukukudza pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋaziʋe kuti ndicaʋa newe, seɀandaisiʋa naMosesi.
Iwe unofanira kuraira ʋaprista kuti ʋatakure areka yesuŋgano, uciti: Kana maȿika parutiʋi rwemvura yaJoridani, munofanira kumira muJoridani.
Ɀino Joshua akati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Ʋuyai pano, munzwe mashoko aJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Joshua akati: Mucaziʋa necinhu ici kuti Mŋari mupenyu uri pakati penyu, ʋuye kuti ucadziŋga ɀirokwaɀo pamberi penyu ʋaKanani, naʋaHeti, naʋaHivi, naʋaPerezi, naʋaGirgashi, naʋaAmori, naʋaJebusi.
Tarirai, areka yesuŋgano yaShe wenyika yose inokutuŋgamirirai pakuyambuka Joridani.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino muɀitorerei ʋarume ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri pamarudzi ose aʋaIsraeri, mumŋe mumŋe parudzi rumŋe norumŋe.
Ɀino kana tsoka dzaʋaprista ʋanotakura areka yaJehova, Ishe wenyika yose, dzicitsika mumvura yaJoridani, mvura yaJoridani icagurwa, iyo mvura inobva kumsoro; icamira, ikaita murwi mukuru.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacibva pamatente aʋo, kuti ʋayambuke Joridani, ʋaprista ʋaitakura areka ʋakatuŋgamirira ʋanhu;

ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka ʋakati ʋaciȿika paJoridani, netsoka dzaʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka dzicinyikwa pamuceto wemvura, (nokuti Joridani runofashamira nhiʋi dzarwo dzose ŋguʋa yose yokukohwa,)

mvura yakaŋga icibva kumsoro ikamira, ikaita murwi mukuru, kuȿikira kurekure paAdama, guta riri kurutiʋi rweZaretani; neyakaŋga iciyerera kuguŋgwa reAraba, ndiro Guŋgwa roMunyu, yakagurwa cose; ʋanhu ʋakayambuka pakatarisana neJeriko.
Ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova ʋakaramba ʋamire pasi pakawoma pakati paJoridani; ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakayambuka pavu rakawoma kuȿikira rudzi rwose rwapedza kuyambuka Joridani.
Ɀino rudzi rwose rwakati rwapedza kuyambuka Joridani, Jehova akataura naJoshua, akati:
Uɀitorere ʋarume ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri kuʋanhu, mumŋe mumŋe parudzi rumŋe norumŋe;
ugoʋaraira, uciti: Pano pakati paJoridani, pakaramba pamire tsoka dzaʋaprista, muɀitorere mabge anegumi namaʋiri, muyambuke nawo, mundoaisa paʋato, pamucandoʋata ʋusiku bguno.
Ipapo Joshua akaɗana ʋarume aʋo ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, ʋaakaŋga agadza pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, mumŋe mumŋe parudzi rumŋe norumŋe,
Joshua akati kwaʋari: Tuŋgamirirai areka yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, muyambuke kuȿikira pakati paJoridani, mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu anoŋge ibge ariise pafudzi rake, aenzane namarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Kuti cinhu ici ciʋe ciratidzo pakati penyu, kuti kana ʋana ʋenyu ʋacizobvunza pashure, ʋaciti: Mabge awa anoti kuɗiniko?

Imi muti kwaʋari: Nokuti mvura yaJoridani yakagurwa pamberi peareka yesuŋgano yaJehova; ŋguʋa yayakayambuka Joridani, mvura yaJoridani yakagurwa; mabge awa acaʋa ciraŋgaridzo pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi.

Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naJoshua, ʋakanoŋga mabge anegumi namaʋiri pakati paJoridani, seɀakataura Jehova kunaJoshua, akaenzana namarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakayambuka nawo, ʋakaatakura, kuȿikira paʋakandoʋata, ʋakaaisa’po.
Ɀino Joshua akamisa mabge anegumi namaʋiri mukati maJoridani, pakaŋga pamire tsoka dzaʋaprista ʋaitakura areka yesuŋgano; ari’po kuȿikira nhasi.

Nokuti ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka ʋakamira mukati maJoridani kuȿikira ɀose ɀapera ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Joshua naJehova, kuti aɀiʋudze ʋanhu, ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Joshua naMosesi; ʋanhu ʋakakurumidza kuyambuka.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋapedza kuyambuka, areka yaJehova ikayambuka ʋo, naʋaprista pamberi paʋanhu.
Naʋana ʋaRubeni, naʋana ʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, ʋakayambuka pamberi paʋanhu, ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa, seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naMosesi.
Ʋaneŋge ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manna, ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa, ndiʋo ʋakayambuka pamberi paJehova, ʋakaenda kumapani eJeriko kundorwa.
Nomusi uyo Jehova akakudza Joshua pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose; ʋakamutya seɀaʋaitya Mosesi mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Ɀino Jehova akataura naJoshua, akati:
Raira ʋaprista ʋanotakura areka yecipupuriro, kuti ʋakwire ʋaɓuɗe mukati maJoridani.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akaraira ʋaprista, akati: Kwirai, muɓuɗe mukati maJoridani.

Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova ʋakati ʋakwira ʋaɓuɗa mukati maJoridani, netsoka dzaʋaprista dzasimudzwa dzaȿika pasi pakawoma, mvura yaJoridani ikadzokera panɀimbo yayo, ikaɗarika nhiʋi dzarwo dzose sakare.
Ʋanhu ʋakakwira ʋakaɓuɗa paJoridani pazuʋa regumi romŋedzi wokutaŋga, ʋakadzika matente aʋo muGirgari, pamuganho wamabvazuʋa eJeriko.
Joshua akamisa aya mabge anegumi namaʋiri aʋakanoŋga muJoridani paGirgari.
Akataura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati: Kana ʋana ʋenyu ʋacizobvunza madziɓaɓa aʋo paŋguʋa inoʋuya, ʋaciti: Mabge awa anoti kuɗiniko?
Imi munofanira kuziʋisa ʋana ʋenyu, muciti: Israeri ʋakayambuka Joridani urwu ʋacitsika pasi pakawoma.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari wakapxisa mvura yaJoridani pamberi penyu, kuȿikira mayambuka, seɀaakaita iye Jehova Mŋari wenyu paGuŋgwa Dɀuku, raakapxisa pamberi peɗu, kuȿikira tayambuka;
kuti ndudzi dzose dzenyika dziziʋe kuti ruʋoko rwaJehova ndirwo runesimba; kuti ʋatye Jehova Mŋari wenyu nokusiŋgaperi.

Ɀino madzimambo ose aʋaAmori, akaŋga agere mhiri kwaJoridani kumaʋirazuʋa, namadzimambo ose aʋaKanani, akaŋga agere paguŋgwa, akati acinzwa kuti Jehova wakapxisa mvura yaJoridani pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuȿikira tayambuka, mŋoyo yaʋo ikavunduka, ʋakasazoʋa nomŋeya mukati maʋo, nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Neŋguʋa iyo Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Uɀiitire mapaŋga amabge anopinza, udziŋgise ɀe ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Joshua akaɀiitira mapaŋga amabge anopinza, akadziŋgisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri pacikomo ceɀikanda ɀapamberi.
Joshua akaʋadziŋgisa nemhaka iyi, nokuti ʋanhurume ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa Egipita, iʋo ʋarume ʋehondo, ʋakaŋga ʋafira panzira murenje pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaɓuɗa Egipita ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgiswa; asi ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaponerwa murenje panzira pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita, ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa.

Nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba makore anamakumi manna murenje, kuȿikira rudzi rwose, iʋo ʋarume ʋehondo ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa Egipita, ʋaparadzwa, nokuti haʋana‐kuterera inzwi raJehova; Jehova akapika kwaʋari kuti haaŋgaʋaʋonesi nyika, yaakaŋga apikira madziɓaɓa aʋo, kuti ucatipa iyo, iri nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaakaŋga amutsa panɀimbo yaʋo, ndiʋo ʋakadziŋgiswa naJoshua; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa panzira.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza kudziŋgisa rudzi rwose, ʋakagara paʋakaŋga ʋari pamisasa kuȿikira ʋapora.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Nhasi ndabvisa kwamuri kuɀidzwa kwamakaɀidzwa nako naʋaEgipita. Naiɀoɀo nɀimbo iyo yakanzi Girgari, kuȿikira nhasi.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo paGirgari, ʋakadya paseka pazuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi maɗekwana, pamapani eJeriko.
Nomusi uyo, uri musi wakateʋera paseka, ʋakadya ɀiɓereko ɀenyika iyo, ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa pamŋe cete nehura dzakakaŋgwa nomusi iwoyo.
Mana ikaguma nomusi wakateʋera uyo waʋakadya nawo ɀiɓereko ɀenyika iyo; ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋana‐kuzoʋa nemana ɀe, asi ʋakadya ɀiɓereko ɀenyika yeKanani gore irero.

Ɀino Joshua wakati ari Jeriko akasimudza meso ake, akatarira, akaʋona murume amire pakatarisana naye, akaɓata munondo wake wakavomorwa muruʋoko rwake; Joshua akaenda kwaari, akati kwaari: Uri mumŋe weɗu here, kana waʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu?
Iye akati: Kwete, asi ndaʋuya ini mukuru wehondo yaJehova. Ipapo Joshua akawira pasi neciso cake, akanamata kwaari, akati kwaari: Ishe waŋgu unoreʋeiko kumuranda wake?
Mukuru wehondo yaJehova akati kunaJoshua: Bvisa shaŋgu yako parutsoka rwako, nokuti paumire patȿene; Joshua akaita saiɀoɀo.
(Ɀino guta reJeriko rakaŋga rapfigwa kwaɀo nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waiɓuɗa kana kupinda.)
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Tarira, ndakapa mumaʋoko ako Jeriko, namambo waro, naʋarume ʋaro ʋanesimba noʋumhare.
Munofanira kukomba guta, imi ʋarume ʋose ʋehondo, mupoteredze guta kamŋe cete. Unofanira kuita saiɀoɀo mazuʋa matanhatu.
Ʋaprista ʋanomŋe ʋanofanira kufamba pamberi peareka ʋakaɓata hwamanda nomŋe dzenyaŋga dzamakondobge; nomusi wecinomŋe munofanira kupoteredza guta kanomŋe, ʋaprista ʋaciridza hwamanda.

Ɀino kana ʋoridzisa norunyaŋga rwegondobge, kana imi mucinzwa kurira kwehwamanda, ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuɗanidzira nokuɗanidzira kukuru; ipapo ruȿiŋgo rweguta rucakoromoka cose, naʋanhu ʋanofanira kupinda, mumŋe nomumŋe ipapo pakaruramana naye.
Ɀino Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, akaɗana ʋaprista, akati kwaʋari: Simudzai areka yesuŋgano, ʋaprista ʋanomŋe ʋafambe ʋakaɓata hwamanda nomŋe dzenyaŋga dzamakondobge pamberi peareka yaJehova.
Akati kuʋanhu: Pfuʋurai, mupoteredze guta, ʋarume ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa ʋatuŋgamirire areka yaJehova.
Ɀino Joshua wakati ataura naʋanhu, ʋaprista ʋanomŋe ʋakatuŋgamira ʋakaɓata hwamanda nomŋe dzenyaŋga dzamakondobge, ʋakaridza hwamanda, areka yesuŋgano yaJehova ikaʋateʋera.
Ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa ʋakatuŋgamirira ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋaciridza hwamanda, naʋarindi ʋeshure ʋakateʋera areka, ʋaprista ʋakafamba ʋaciŋgoridza hwamanda.

Ɀino Joshua akaraira ʋanhu, akati: Regai kuɗanidzira, namanzwi enyu ŋgaarege kunzwika, kana shoko rimŋe ŋgarirege kuɓuɗa pamiromo yenyu, kuȿikira pamusi wandinokurairai kuti muɗanidzire; ipapo munofanira kuɗanidzira.
Naiɀoɀo wakaraira kuti areka yaJehova ipoteredze guta, iripote kamŋe cete; ʋakapinda ɀe mumisasa, ʋakaʋata’mo.
Joshua akamuka maŋgwanani, ʋaprista ʋakasimudza areka yaJehova.

Naʋaprista ʋanomŋe ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓata hwamanda nomŋe dzenyaŋga dzamakondobge pamberi peareka yaJehova, ʋakaramba ʋacifamba ʋaciŋgoridza hwamanda; naʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa ʋakaʋatuŋgamirira; naʋarindi ʋeshure ʋakateʋera areka yaJehova, ʋaprista ʋakafamba ʋaciŋgoridza hwamanda.
Nomusi wecipiri ʋakapoteredza guta kamŋe cete, ʋakadzokera kumisasa; ʋakaita saiɀoɀo mazuʋa matanhatu.
Nomusi wecinomŋe ʋakafumira maŋgwanani, ʋakapoteredza guta nomutoʋo iwoyo kanomŋe; nomusi iwoyo ɓedzi ʋakapoteredza guta kanomŋe.
Ɀino paŋguʋa yecinomŋe, ʋaprista ʋakati ʋaciridza hwamanda, Joshua akati kuʋanhu: Ƌanidzirai, nokuti Jehova wakupai guta.
Asi guta rinofanira kuyeriswa kunaJehova, iro neɀose ɀiri mukati maro; asi Rakabi ɓedzi, cifeʋe ciya, ŋgaaregwe ari mupenyu, iye naʋose ʋari mumba make, nokuti wakaʋanza nhume dzatakatuma.
Asi imi, cenjerai paɀinhu ɀinoyera, kuti murege kutora cinhu cinoyera, mambociyerisa; naiɀoɀo muŋgatukisa misasa yaIsraeri mukaipinza muɗambudziko.
