Asi sirveri yose, nendarama, nemidziyo yendarira, neyamatare ɀitȿene kunaJehova; ɀinofanira kuiswa muciʋigiro cefuma caJehova.

Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakaɗanidzira, naʋaprista ʋakaridza hwamanda; ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacinzwa kurira kwehwamanda, ʋanhu ʋakaɗanidzira nokuɗanidzira kukuru, ruȿiŋgo ndokukoromoka cose, ʋanhu ʋakakwira ʋacipinda muguta, mumŋe nomumŋe pakaruramana naye, ʋakakunda guta.
Ʋakaparadza cose nomunondo unopinza ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri muguta, ʋarume naʋakadzi, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, nenzombe, namakwai, nemboŋgoro.
Joshua akati kuʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋandoshora nyika: Pindai muimba yecifeʋe, muɓuɗise mukadzi neɀose ɀaanaɀo, seɀamakapika kwaari.
Ɀino majaya iwayo, ʋashori, ʋakapinda, ʋakaɓuɗisa Rakabi, naɓaɓa ʋake, namai ʋake, nehanɀadzi dzake, neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, ʋakaɓuɗisa ʋo hama dzake dzose, ʋakaʋaisa kunze kwemisasa yaIsraeri.
Ipapo ʋakapisa guta nomŋoto, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri mukati maro; asi sirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo yendarira, neyamatare, ʋakaɀiisa muciʋigiro cefuma ceimba yaJehova.

Asi Joshua wakarega Rakabi, cifeʋe ciya, ari mupenyu, iye naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo; iye akagara pakati paIsraeri kuȿikira nhasi; nokuti wakaŋga aʋanza nhume dzakatumŋa naJoshua kundoshora Jeriko.

Neŋguʋa iyo Joshua akaʋapikisa, aciti: Munhu unozomuka akaʋaka guta iri reJeriko ŋgaatukwe; ucarashikirwa neɗaŋgwe rake kana aciteya nheyo dzaro, ʋuye ucarashikirwa norugotwe rwake kana acimutsa masuʋo aro.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova wakaŋga anaJoshua; mukurumbira wake ukanzwika panyika yose.

Asi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɗarika pacinhu cakayeriswa; nokuti Akani, mŋanakomana waKarmi, mŋanakomana waZabdi, mŋanakomana waZera, worudzi rwaJuda, wakatora cinhu ceɀakayeriswa; kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Joshua akatuma ʋarume ʋabve Jeriko ʋaende Ai, guta riri parutiʋi rweBeti‐aveni, kumabvazuʋa eBeteri, akataura naʋo, akati: Kwirai, mundoshora nyika. Ʋarume ʋakakwira, ʋakandoshora Ai.

Ʋakadzokera kunaJoshua, ʋakati kwaari: Ʋanhu ʋose ŋgaʋarege kukwira; ʋarume ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu ŋgaʋaende kundorwa neAi, asi ʋanhu ʋose ŋgaʋarege haʋo kutambudzwa kuenda’ko, nokuti ʋashoma haʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu ʋakaenda’ko, iʋo ʋakatiza pamberi paʋarume ʋeAi.

Ʋarume ʋeAi ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋaneŋge makumi matatu naʋatanhatu ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋateʋerera kubva pamberi pesuʋo kuȿikira Shebarimi, ʋaciʋaʋuraya pakuɓuruka kwaʋo; ipapo mŋoyo yaʋanhu yakanyauka, ikaita semvura.
Ɀino Joshua akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akawira pasi neciso cake pamberi peareka yaJehova kuȿikira maɗekwana, iye naʋakuru ʋaʋaIsraeri, ʋakaisa guruʋa pamisoro yaʋo.
Joshua akati: Haiwa! Ishe Mŋari, makayambusireiko ʋanhu aʋa paJoridani, kuti mutiise mumaʋoko aʋaAmori, ʋatiparadze? Ƌai takatenda heɗu kugara mhiri kwaJoridani!
Haiwa, Ishe, ndicati kuɗiniko, ʋaIsraeri ɀaʋakafuratira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo!
Nokuti ʋaKanani naʋose ʋagere munyika ino ʋacaɀinzwa, ʋacatikomba, nokudzima zita reɗu panyika; ɀino zita renyu guru mucariiteiko?
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Simuka, wawireiko kuɗai paciso cako?
ƲaIsraeri ʋatadza, ʋaɗarika suŋgano yaŋgu yandakaʋaraira; ʋatora cinhu cakayeriswa, ʋaɓa ʋo, nokunyeŋgera, nokuciʋiga pakati penhumbi dzaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋaŋgagoni kukunda ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋanofuratira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, nokuti ʋaʋa ʋanhu ʋakatukwa; handicazoʋi nemi, kana musiŋgaparadzi cinhu cakayeriswa pakati penyu.

Simuka, utsaure ʋanhu, uti: Ɀitsaurirei maŋgwana, nokuti ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Kunecinhu cakayeriswa pakati penyu, Israeri; hamuŋgakundi ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, kuȿikira mabvisa cinhu cakayeriswa pakati penyu.

Naiɀoɀo maŋgwana munofanira kusweɗera namarudzi enyu; ɀino rudzi runoɓatwa naJehova, runofanira kusweɗera nedzimba dzarwo, neimba inoɓatwa naJehova, inofanira kusweɗera nemhuri dzayo, nemhuri inoɓatwa naJehova, inofanira kusweɗera murume mumŋe nomumŋe.
Ɀino uyo unoɓatwa anecinhu cakayeriswa, unofanira kupiswa nomŋoto, iye neɀose ɀaanaɀo; nokuti wakaɗarika suŋgano yaJehova, ʋuye nokuti wakaita cinhu cakaipa kwaɀo pakati paIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua wakamuka maŋgwanani, akaswededza ʋaIsraeri namarudzi aʋo; rudzi rwaJuda ndokuɓatwa;
ɀino akasweɗedza dzimba dzaJuda, imba yaZera ikaɓatwa; ɀino akasweɗedza murume mumŋe nomumŋe weimba yaʋaZera, Zabdi akaɓatwa;
ɀino akasweɗedza mhuri yake, murume mumŋe nomumŋe, Akani mŋanakomana waKarmi, mŋanakomana waZabdi, mŋanakomana waZera, worudzi rwaJuda akaɓatwa.
Ɀino Joshua akati kunaAkani: Mŋana waŋgu, cikudza Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, uɀireʋurure kwaari; ndiʋudze ɀino ɀawakaita, usandiʋanzira iɀo.
Ipapo Akani akapindura Joshua, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakatadzira Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, ndakaita ɀokuti neɀokuti;
ndakaʋona pakati peɀakapambga ŋguʋo yakanaka, inobva Babironi, nesirveri yakaȿika mashekeri anamazana maʋiri,
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akatuma nhume, iʋo ʋakamhanyira kutente rake, ʋakandowana ɀakaʋigwa mutente rake, sirveri iri pasi paɀo.
Ʋakaɀibvisa mutente, ʋakaɀiisa kunaJoshua, nokuʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakaɀiisa pasi pamberi paJehova.

Ipapo Joshua naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanaye ʋakatora Akani, mŋanakomana waZera, nesirveri, neŋguʋo, nemboŋgoro dzake, namakwai ake, netente rake, neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, ʋakakwira naʋo kumupata weAkori.
Ɀino Joshua akati: Wakatipinzireiko paɗambudziko? Jehova ucakupinza paɗambudziko nhasi. Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakamutaka namabge, ʋakaʋapisa nomŋoto, nokuʋataka namabge.
ʋakaʋuŋganidza pamsoro pake mabge akaita murwi mukuru uri’po kuȿikira nhasi; Jehova akaɀidzora pakutsamŋa kwake kukuru. Naiɀoɀo zita renɀimbo iyo rakanzi Mupata weAkori kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaJoshua: Usatya, kana kuvunduswa; tora ʋanhu ʋose ʋehondo, musimuke, mukwire Ai; tarira, ndaisa muruʋoko rwako mambo weAi naʋanhu ʋake, neguta rake, nenyika yake.
Unofanira kuitira Ai seɀawakaitira Jeriko namambo waro; asi munofanira kutapa ɀiŋgatapxa ɀaro, neŋombe dzaro, ɀiʋe ɀenyu; uɀigadzirire ʋaŋgaʋandira guta neceseri kwaro.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akasimuka, naʋarume ʋose ʋehondo, kuti ʋakwire Ai; Joshua akatsaura ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, akaʋatuma ʋusiku.
Akaʋaraira, akati: Tarirai, munofanira kundoʋandira guta neceseri kwaro; musaenda kure neguta, asi mugare makaɀigadzira mose;
ɀino ini naʋanhu ʋose ʋandinaʋo, ticasweɗera kuguta; ɀino kana ʋaciɓuɗa kuzorwa nesu, sapakutaŋga, isu ticatiza pamberi paʋo;
ipapo ʋacaɓuɗa, ʋacititeʋera, kuȿikira taʋanyeŋgera kure neguta; nokuti ʋacati: Ʋanotiza pamberi peɗu sapakutaŋga; nesu ticatiza pamberi paʋo;
ipapo imi munofanira kusimuka pamakaŋga makaʋandira, mundokunda guta, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ucariisa mumaʋoko enyu.
Ɀino kana makunda guta, munofanira kuripisa nomŋoto; munofanira kuita seɀakarebga naJehova; tarirai, ndakurairai.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋatuma, ʋakaenda kundoʋanda, ʋakagara pakati peBeteri neAi, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa rweAi; asi Joshua wakaʋata pakati paʋanhu ʋusiku ubgo.
Ɀino Joshua akamuka maŋgwanani, akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu, akakwira iye naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, ʋakatuŋgamirira ʋanhu kuenda Ai.
Naʋarume ʋose ʋehondo ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakakwira, ʋakasweɗera pamberi peguta, ʋakadzika matente aʋo kurutiʋi rwokumsoro rweAi. Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomupata pakati pake neAi.
Akatsaura ʋarume ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀishanu, akaʋaraira kuʋanda pakati peBeteri neAi, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa rweguta.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaraira ʋanhu, iyo hondo yose yaiʋa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro rweguta, naʋaiʋanda kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa rweguta; asi Joshua wakaenda ʋusiku ubgo pakati pomupata.

Ɀino mambo weAi wakati aʋona iɀoɀo, ʋakakurumidza kumuka maŋgwanani, ʋarume ʋeguta ʋakaɓuɗa kundorwa naIsraeri, iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋose, panɀimbo yakaŋga yatarwa, paMupata; asi haana‐kuziʋa kuti kwakaŋga kunaʋaʋandiri neceseri kweguta.
Ɀino Joshua naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaita saʋakundwa naʋo, ʋakatiza nenzira yerenje.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari muguta ʋakakokwa kundoʋateʋera; ʋakateʋera Joshua, ʋakanyeŋgerwa kure neguta.
Kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakasara paAi neBeteri, asina‐kuɓuɗa kundoteʋera Israeri; ʋakasiya guta rakashama, ʋakateʋera Israeri.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Tambanudzira pfumo riri muruʋoko rwako kurutiʋi rweAi, nokuti ndicariisa muruʋoko rwako. Joshua akatambanudzira pfumo rakaŋga riri muruʋoko rwake kurutiʋi rweguta;
ipapo ʋaʋandiri ʋakakurumidza kusimuka paʋakaŋga ʋagere, ʋakamhanya pakarepo pakutambanudza kwake ruʋoko rwake, ʋakapinda muguta, ʋakarikunda; ʋakakurumidza kupisa guta.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeAi ʋakati ʋaciceuka, ʋonei ʋutsi bgeguta bgucikwira kuɗeŋga, ʋakashaiwa kwaʋaŋgatizira kupi nokupi; naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋatizira kurenje ʋakadzoka kuzorwa naʋaiʋateʋera.
Ɀino Joshua naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋaʋona kuti ʋaʋandiri ʋakunda guta, ʋuye kuti ʋutsi bgeguta bgokwira kuɗeŋga, ʋakadzoka ɀe kuzoʋuraya ʋarume ʋeAi.
Naʋamŋe ʋakaɓuɗa muguta kuzorwa naʋo; naiɀoɀo ʋakaŋga ʋari pakati paʋaIsraeri, ʋamŋe necoʋuno ʋamŋe necokoko; ʋakaʋaʋuraya, kuȿikira ʋasina‐kurega mumŋe waʋo ari mupenyu, kana wakatiza.
Ʋakaɓata mambo weAi, aciri mupenyu, ʋakamuisa kunaJoshua.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋapedza kuʋuraya nomunondo unopinza ʋanhu ʋose ʋeAi kusaŋgo, kurenje kwaʋakaŋga ʋaʋateʋerera, kuȿikira ʋapera, ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzokera Ai, ʋakariparadza nomunondo unopinza.
Ʋose ʋakaʋurawa nomusi iwoyo, ʋarume naʋakadzi, ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, iʋo ʋarume ʋose ʋeAi,
nokuti Joshua haana‐kudzosa ruʋoko rwake, rwaakaŋga akatambanudza pfumo, kuȿikira aparadza cose ʋanhu ʋeAi.
Asi ŋombe neɀiŋgatapxa ɀeguta iro ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɀitapa kuti ɀiʋe ɀaʋo, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova, raakaraira Joshua.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akapisa Ai, akariita murwi

Akasuŋgirira mambo weAi pamuti kuȿikira maɗekwana; asi pakuʋira kwezuʋa Joshua akaʋaraira, ʋakaturura citunha cake pamuti, ʋakacikanda panopindwa napo pasuʋo reguta, ʋakatutira pamsoro paco murwi mukuru wamabge; ari’po kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino Joshua wakaʋakira Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri artari pagomo reEbari,

seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa ʋana ʋaIsraeri naMosesi, muranda waJehova, seɀakanyorwa mubuku yomurairo waMosesi; yakaŋga iri artari yamabge asina‐kuʋezwa; hakunomunhu wakaŋga asimudzira ɗare pamsoro pawo; ʋakaɓayira’po Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, nokuɓayira ʋo ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.
Akanyora ɀe ipapo pamabge murairo waMosesi, waakanyora pamberi paʋaIsraeri.

ƲaIsraeri ʋose naʋakuru ʋaʋo naʋatariri ʋaʋo, naʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakamira paareka necoʋuno neceseri, pamberi paʋaprista ʋaRevi, ʋaisitakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, pamŋe cete naʋatorwa naʋakaŋga ʋaɓerekerwa munyika; hafu yaʋo pamberi pegomo reGerizimi, nehafu yaʋo pamberi pegomo reEbari; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naMosesi, muranda waJehova, kuti ʋataŋge kuropafadza ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Pashure akaraʋa mashoko ose omurairo, okuropafadza nookutuka, seɀaɀakanyorwa ɀose mubuku yomurairo.
Kwakaŋga kusineshoko rimŋe, paɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naMosesi, risina‐kurabga naJoshua pamberi peʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri, naʋakadzi naʋana, naʋatorwa ʋakaŋga ʋagere pakati paʋo.

Ɀino madzimambo ose akaŋga agere mhiri kwaJoridani, panyika yamakomo nenyika yamapani, napamhenderekedzo dzose dzeguŋgwa guru pamberi peRebanoni, ʋaHeti, naʋaAmori, naʋaKanani, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi, ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo,
ʋakaʋuŋgana nomŋoyo mumŋe kundorwa naJoshua naʋaIsraeri.
Asi ʋanhu ʋeGibeoni ʋakati ʋacinzwa ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa Jeriko neAi naJoshua,
ʋakatȿaka mano, ʋakaenda senhume, ʋakaenda nehomo dzakasakara pamsoro pemboŋgoro dzaʋo, nehomboɗo dzewaini dzakasakara, dzakaŋga dzakaparuka, nokusonanidzwa ɀe;
neshaŋgu dzakasakara, dzaiʋa neɀiremo patsoka dzaʋo, neŋguʋo dzakasakara; ɀiŋgwa ɀaʋo ɀose ɀembuʋa yaʋo ɀakaŋga ɀakawoma nokuvuva.
Ʋakaenda kunaJoshua kumisasa paGirgari, ʋakati kwaari nokuʋarume ʋaIsraeri: Tinobva kunyika iri kure; naiɀoɀo itai suŋgano nesu ɀino.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kuʋaHivi: Ɀimŋe mugere pakati peɗu; tiŋgaita suŋgano nemi seiko?
Iʋo ʋakati: Tiri ʋaranda ʋenyu. Joshua akati kwaʋari: Ndimi aniko? Munobvepi?
Ʋakati: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋabva kunyika iri kure‐kure, nokuɗa kwezita raJehova Mŋari wenyu, nokuti takanzwa mukurumbira wake neɀose ɀaakaita Egipita.
Ʋuye ɀose ɀaakaitira madzimambo maʋiri aʋaAmori, akaŋga ari mhiri kwaJoridani, naSihoni mambo weHeshboni, naOgi mambo weBashani, wakaŋga ari paAshtaroti.
Ʋakuru ʋeɗu naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika yeɗu ʋakataura nesu, ʋakati: Torai mbuʋa yenzira mumaʋoko enyu, mundosoŋgana naʋo, muti kwaʋari: Tiri ʋaranda ʋenyu; ɀino itai suŋgano nesu.
Ɀiŋgwa iɀo ɀembuʋa yeɗu takaɀitora ɀicakapisa mudzimba dzeɗu musi watakaɓuɗa, ticiʋuya kwamuri; asi ɀino tarirai, ɀawoma, ɀavuva.
Nehomboɗo idzi dzewaini, dzatakazadza, dzakaŋga dziri itȿa; tarirai, dzaparuka; neŋguʋo dzeɗu idzi, neshaŋgu dzeɗu ɀasakara nemhaka yorwendo rurefu‐refu.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋakatora ɀimŋe ɀembuʋa yaʋo, ʋasiŋgabvunzi muromo waJehova.
Joshua akayanana naʋo, akaita suŋgano naʋo, kuti ʋacaʋarega ʋari ʋapenyu; macinda eʋuŋgano akapika kwaʋari.
Ɀino mazuʋa matatu akati apera, ʋaita suŋgano naʋo, ʋakanzwa kuti ʋagere pedyo naʋo napakati paʋo.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakafamba, ʋakaȿika pamaguta aʋo nezuʋa retatu. Maguta aʋo aiʋa Gibeoni, neKefira, neBeroti, naKiriati‐jearimi.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋana‐kuʋaparadza, nokuti macinda eʋuŋgano akaŋga apika kwaʋari naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri. Ʋuŋgano yose ikapopotera macinda.
Asi macinda ose akati kuʋuŋgano yose: Takapika kwaʋari naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, naiɀoɀo ɀino hatigoni kuʋaitira cinhu.
Ticaʋaitira cinhu ici, ticaʋarega ʋari ʋapenyu, kuti tirege kuwirwa nokutsamŋa kwaMŋari nokuɗa kwokupika, kwatakapika kwaʋari.
Ɀino macinda akati kwaʋari: Ŋgaʋararame haʋo. Ʋakaʋa ʋatemi ʋehuni naʋateki ʋemvura ʋeʋuŋgano yose, seɀaʋakaʋudzwa namacinda.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋaɗana, akataura naʋo, akati: Matinyeŋgedzerereiko, muciti: Takabva kure‐kure nemi, ɀamugere pakati peɗu?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino muri ʋanhu ʋakatukwa, mucaŋgosiʋa ʋaranda naʋatemi ʋehuni naʋateki ʋemvura ʋeimba yaMŋari waŋgu.

Ʋakapindura Joshua, ʋakati: Nokuti ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋakaŋga ʋaʋudzwa ɀirokwaɀo kuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakaŋga araira muranda wake Mosesi, kuti akupei nyika yose, nokuparadza ʋose ʋagere panyika ino pamberi penyu; naiɀoɀo takatya kwaɀo nokuɗa kwenyu kuti ticaʋurawa, tikaita cinhu ici.
Ɀino tarirai, tiri pamaʋoko enyu, itai nesu seɀamunoti ndiɀo ɀakanaka neɀakarurama.
Akaʋaitira saiɀoɀo, akaʋarwira pamaʋoko aʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋo ʋakasaʋaʋuraya.
Musi iwoyo Joshua akaʋaita ʋatemi ʋehuni naʋateki ʋemvura yeʋuŋgano neyeartari yaJehova, kuȿikira nhasi panɀimbo yaizotsaurwa naye.

Ɀino Adoni‐zedeki, mambo weJerusarema, wakati acinzwa kuti Joshua wakakunda Ai, akariparadza cose, ʋuye kuti wakaitira Ai namambo waro seɀaakaitira Jeriko namambo waro, ʋuye kuti ʋanhu ʋeGibeoni ʋakaŋga ʋayanana naʋaIsraeri, ʋakagara pakati paʋo;
ʋakatya kwaɀo, nokuti Gibeoni rakaŋga riri guta guru, rakaŋga rakaita somumŋe wemizinda yamambo; ʋuye nokuti rakaŋga riri guru kupfuʋura Ai, naʋarume ʋaro ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanesimba.
Naiɀoɀo Adoni‐zedeki, mambo weJerusarema, akatuma nhume kunaHohami, mambo weHebroni, nokunaPirami, mambo weJarmuti, nokunaJafia, mambo weRakishi, nokunaDebiri, mambo weEgroni, akati:
Kwirai kwandiri, mundiɓatsire, tirwe naʋaGibeoni, nokuti ʋakayanana naJoshua naʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Naiɀoɀo madzimambo mashanu aʋaAmori, ʋaiti mambo weJerusarema, namambo weHebroni, namambo weJarmuti, namambo weRakishi, namambo weEgroni ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakaenda iʋo nehondo dzaʋo dzose, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pamberi peGibeoni, ʋakarwa naro.

Ipapo ʋarume ʋeGibeoni ʋakatuma nhume kunaJoshua kumisasa yakaŋga iri paGirgari, ʋakati: Musaregerera henyu ʋaranda ʋenyu; kurumidzai mukwire kwatiri, mutirwire nokutiɓatsira, nokuti madzimambo ose aʋaAmori ʋagere munyika yamakomo ʋakatiʋuŋganira kuzorwa nesu.
Ipapo Joshua akakwira acibva Girgari, iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋehondo ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, naʋarume ʋose ʋaiʋa nesimba noʋumhare.
Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Usaʋatya, nokuti ndaʋaisa mumaʋoko ako; hakunomunhu ucagona kumira pamberi pako.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akaʋarwira pakarepo; akafamba ʋusiku bgose acibva Girgari.
Ɀino Jehova akaʋavundusa pamberi paIsraeri, akaʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru paGibeoni, akaʋadziŋgirira nenzira yaikwira Beti‐horoni, akaʋaparadza kuȿikira Azeka, nokuȿikira Makeda.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitiza pamberi paʋaIsraeri, ʋari pamatenusirwa anoɓurukira Beti‐horoni, Jehova akakanda pamsoro paʋo mabge makuru akaŋga acibva kuɗeŋga, kuȿikira Azeka, ʋakafa; iʋo, ʋakafa necimvuramabge, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋazhinji kunaʋakaʋurawa neminondo naʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Joshua akataura naJehova nomusi Jehova waakaisa ʋaAmori mumaʋoko aʋana ʋaIsraeri, akati pamberi paʋaIsraeri:
Iwe zuʋa mira pamsoro peGibeoni,
Newe mŋedzi pamupata weAjaroni.
Zuʋa rikamira, nomŋedzi ukarambira’po,
Kuȿikira rudzi rwatsiʋa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋarwo.
Iɀi haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yaJashari? Zuʋa rikaramba rimire pakati peɗeŋga, rikasakurumidza kuʋira ŋguʋa yakaita sezuʋa rose.
Hakuna‐kumboʋa nezuʋa rakaɗaro kubva pakutaŋga kana shure kwaro, kuti Jehova wakaterera inzwi romunhu; nokuti Jehova wakarwira Israeri.
Joshua akadzokera naʋaIsraeri ʋose kumisasa paGirgari.
Madzimambo awo mashanu akatiza, ʋakandoʋanda muɓako paMakeda.
Joshua akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Madzimambo iwayo mashanu akawanikwa, akaʋanda muɓako paMakeda.
Ɀino Joshua akati: Kuŋgurusai mabge makuru pamuromo weɓako, nokuisa ʋarume ipapo kuʋarinda.
Asi imi musamira henyu; teʋerai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, mundoʋuraya ʋeshure ʋaʋo; musaʋatendera kupinda mumaguta aʋo, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakaʋaisa mumaʋoko enyu.
Ɀino Joshua naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋapedza kuʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru, kuȿikira ʋaparadzwa, naʋakaŋga ʋasara kwaʋari ʋapinda mumaguta akaʋakirwa maȿiŋgo;
ʋanhu ʋose ʋakadzokera kumisasa kunaJoshua paMakeda norugare; hakunomunhu wakasimudzira mumŋe waʋana ʋaIsraeri rurimi rwake.
Ɀino Joshua akati: Zarurai muromo weɓako, muɓuɗise madzimambo mashanu iwayo muɓako muʋuye nawo kwandiri.
Iʋo ʋakaita saiɀoɀo, ʋakaɓuɗisa madzimambo iwayo mashanu muɓako ʋakaʋuya naʋo kwaari, ʋaiti mambo weJerusarema, namambo weHebroni, namambo weJarmuti, namambo weRakishi, namambo weEgroni.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋaɓuɗisa madzimambo iwayo ʋakaʋuya naʋo kunaJoshua, Joshua akaɗana ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri, akati kuʋakuru nehondo ʋakaŋga ʋanaye: Sweɗerai, muise tsoka dzenyu pamitsipa yamadzimambo awa. Iʋo ʋakasweɗera, ʋakaisa tsoka dzaʋo pamitsipa yaʋo.
Ɀino Joshua akati kwaʋari: Musatya, kana kuvunduswa; simbai mutsuŋge mŋoyo, nokuti Jehova ucaita saiɀoɀo naʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose, ʋamunorwa naʋo.
Pashure Joshua akaʋaɓaya, akaʋaʋuraya, ndokuʋasuŋgirira pamiti mishanu; ʋakaramba ʋakasuŋgirirwa pamiti kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Neŋguʋa yokuʋira kwezuʋa Joshua akaraira ʋanhu, ʋakaʋaturura pamiti, ʋakaʋakandira muɓako maʋakaŋga ʋakaʋanda, ʋakaisa mabge makuru pamuromo weɓako; ari’po kuȿikira zuʋa rino ranhasi.

Joshua akakunda Makeda nomusi iwoyo, akariparadza neminondo inopinza, namambo waro; akaʋaparadza cose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo; haana‐kusiya kunyaŋge nomumŋe; akaitira mambo weMakeda seɀaakaitira mambo weJeriko.
Ɀino Joshua akabva Makeda, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaenda Ribna ʋakarwa neRibna;
Jehova akariisa ʋo namambo waro mumaʋoko aIsraeri; akariparadza neminondo inopinza, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo; haana‐kusiya’mo kunyaŋge nomumŋe; akaitira mambo waro seɀaakaitira mambo weJeriko.
Ɀino Joshua akabva Ribna, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaenda Rakishi, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pedyo naro, ʋakarwa naro;
Jehova akaisa Rakishi mumaʋoko aʋaIsraeri, akarikunda nezuʋa repiri, akariparadza neminondo inopinza, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo, seɀose ɀaakaitira Ribna.
Ɀino Horami, mambo weGezeri, wakakwira kuzoɓatsira Rakishi; Joshua akamuʋuraya naʋanhu ʋake, kuȿikira asina‐kumusiyira kunyaŋge nomunhu mumŋe.
Ɀino Joshua akabva Rakishi, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaenda Egroni; ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pedyo naro, ʋakarwa naro;
ʋakarikunda nomusi iwoyo, ʋakariparadza neminondo inopinza; ʋakaparadza cose nomusi iwoyo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo, seɀose ɀaakaitira Rakishi.
Ɀino Joshua akabva Egroni, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaenda Hebroni, ʋakarwa naro;

ʋakarikunda, nokuriparadza neminondo inopinza, namambo waro, namaguta aro ose, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo; haana‐kusiya kunyaŋge nomumŋe, seɀose ɀaakaitira Egroni; asi wakariparadza cose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo.
Ɀino Joshua akadzokera Debiri, naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo; ʋakarwa naro;

akarikunda, namambo waro, namaguta aro ose; ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza, nokuparadza cose ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo; haana‐kusiya kunyaŋge nomumŋe; seɀaakaitira Hebroni, ndiɀo ɀaakaitira Debiri ʋo, namambo waro; seɀaakaitira ʋo Ribna namambo waro.

Saiɀoɀo Joshua wakaparadza nyika yose, nyika yamakomo neyenyasi, neyamapani, neyemitenusirwa, namadzimambo adzo ose, haana‐kusiya kunyaŋge nomumŋe; asi wakaparadza ɀose ɀipenyu, seɀakaraira Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Joshua akaʋaparadza kubva Kadeshi‐barnea kuȿikira Gaza, nenyika yose yeGosheni kuȿikira Gibeoni.
Madzimambo iwayo ose nenyika dzawo akakundwa naJoshua neŋguʋa imŋe, nokuti Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri wakarwira Israeri.
Ipapo Joshua akadzokera kumisasa paGirgari, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo.
Ɀino Jabini, mambo weHazori wakati aciɀinzwa, akatuma nhume kunaJobabi, mambo weMadoni, nokunamambo weShimroni, nokunamambo weAkshafi,
nokuna‐madzimambo akaŋga ari kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, panyika yeɀikomo, nomumupata kurutiʋi rwenyasi rweKineroti, nomumapani, nokuɀikomo ɀapaDori, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa,
nokuʋaKanani kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa nokumaʋirira, naʋaAmori, naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaJebusi, panyika yamakomo, naʋaHivi ʋakaŋga ʋagere mujiŋga meHermoni, panyika yeMizpa.
Ʋakaɓuɗa, iʋo nehondo dzaʋo dzose dzaʋakaŋga ʋanadzo, ʋari ʋazhinji, sejeca riri pamhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa nokuwanda, namabiza neŋgoro zhinji‐zhinji.
Madzimambo awa ose akaʋuŋgana, ʋakaʋuya pamŋe cete kuʋaka misasa yaʋo pamvura yeMeromi, kuzorwa naʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino Jehova akati kunaJoshua: Usaʋatya, nokuti maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino ndicaʋaisa ʋose mumaʋoko ako, ʋaʋurawe pamberi paʋaIsraeri; unofanira kugura marunda amakumbo amabiza aʋo, nokupisa ŋgoro dzaʋo nomŋoto.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋuya pakarepo, iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋehondo ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, kuti arwe naʋo pamvura yeMeromi, akaʋaʋamba.
Jehova akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaIsraeri, ʋakaʋaparadza nokuʋadziŋga kuȿikira
Joshua akaʋaitira seɀaakaŋga arairwa naJehova; akagura marunda amakumbo amabiza aʋo, nokupisa ŋgoro dzaʋo nomŋoto.
Neŋguʋa iyo Joshua akadzoka, akakunda Hazori, akaʋuraya mambo waro nomunondo; nokuti pakutaŋga Hazori waiʋa muzinda woʋushe ibgo bgose.
Ʋakaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo neminondo inopinza, ʋakaʋaparadza cose; hakunecinhu cimŋe cinofema cakasara; ʋakapisa Hazori nomŋoto.
Joshua akakunda ʋo maguta ose amadzimambo iwayo, namadzimambo awo ose, akaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza, akaʋaparadza cose; seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naMosesi muranda waJehova.
Asi maguta akaŋga ari paɀikomo ɀaʋo, ʋaIsraeri haʋana‐kuapisa kunyaŋge nerimŋe cete, asi Hazori cete; Joshua wakapisa irero.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatapa ɀose ɀaʋakapamba ɀamaguta iwayo, neŋombe; asi ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋose neminondo inopinza, kuȿikira ʋaʋaparadza; haʋana‐kusiya kunyaŋge necinhu cimŋe cete cinofema.
Seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi muranda wake naJehova, ndiɀo Mosesi ɀaakaraira Joshua; Joshua akaita saiɀoɀo, haana‐kusiya cinhu cimŋe cete paɀose ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Saiɀoɀo Joshua akakunda nyika iyo yose, iyo nyika yamakomo, nenyika yose yezasi, nenyika yose yeGosheni, neɓani, noMupata, nenyika yamakomo yaIsraeri, neɓani rayo;
kubva pagomo reHaraki, rinokwira Seiri, kuȿikira paBaari‐gadi pamupata weRebanoni, mujiŋga megomo reHermoni; akakunda madzimambo aro ose, akaʋaparadza nokuʋaʋuraya.
Joshua akarwa namadzimambo iwayo ose mazuʋa mazhinji.
Hakuneguta rakayanana naʋaIsraeri, asi ʋaHivi ʋakaŋga ʋagere Gibeoni; ʋakakunda ɀose pakurwa.
Nokuti Jehova ndiye wakawomesa mŋoyo yaʋo, kuti ʋarwe naʋaIsraeri, kuti aʋaparadze cose, ʋarege kunzwirwa tsitsi; asi aʋaparadze, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa Mosesi naJehova.

Neŋguʋa iyo Joshua akaenda akaparadza ʋaAnaki panyika yamakomo, paHebroni, napaDebiri, napaAnabi, napanyika yose yamakomo yaJuda, napanyika yose yamakomo yaIsraeri; Joshua akaʋaparadza cose pamŋe cete namaguta aʋo.
Hakuna‐kuʋaAnaki wakasara panyika yaʋana ʋaIsraeri; asi paGaza, napaGadi, napaAshdodi ndipo pakasara ʋamŋe.
Joshua akakunda saiɀoɀo nyika yose seɀose ɀakaʋudzwa Mosesi naJehova; Joshua akaipa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti iʋe nhaka yaʋo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋakamurwa namarudzi aʋo. Nyika ikazorora pakurwa.
Ndiwo madzimambo enyika akakundwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋaʋakatorera nyika yaʋo mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa, kubva pamupata weArnoni kuȿikira pagomo reHermoni, nerenje rose riri kumabvazuʋa:
Sihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga agere Heshboni, waiɓata ʋushe kubva paAroeri, parutiʋi rwomupata weArnoni,
nerenje, kuȿikira paguŋgwa reKineroti kumabvazuʋa, nokuȿikira paguŋgwa rerenje, iro Guŋgwa roMunyu, kumabvazuʋa nenzira inoenda Beti‐jeshimoti; nokurutiʋi rwezasi pajiŋga pePisga;
nenyika yaOgi, mambo weBashani, wakaŋga asara paʋaRefaimi, ʋakaŋga ʋagere paAshtaroti neEdrei,
waiɓata ʋushe pagomo reHermoni, napaSareka, napaBashani rose, kuȿikira kumuganho waʋaGeshuri, naʋaMaakati, nehafu yeGireadi; ndiyo nyika yaSihoni, mambo weHeshboni.
Mosesi muranda waJehova, naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋakunda; Mosesi muranda waJehova akaipa Rubeni, naʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, kuti iʋe yaʋo.

Ndiwo madzimambo enyika iyo akakundwa naJoshua naʋana ʋaIsraeri mhiri kwaJoridani kumaʋirazuʋa, kubva paBaari‐gadi mumupata weRebanoni, kuȿikira pagomo reHaraki rinokwira ricienda Seiri; Joshua akaipa marudzi aʋaIsraeri seɀaʋakaŋga ʋakamurirwa, kuti iʋe yaʋo.
Panyika yamakomo, nomumapani, nomuAraba, napamitenusirwa, nomurenje, nezasi; ndiyo yaiʋa nyika yaʋaHeti, neyaʋaAmori, neyaʋaKanani, neyaʋaPerezi, neyaʋaHivi, neyaʋaJebusi,
mambo weJeriko ndiye mumŋe; namambo weAi, pedyo neBeteri, mumŋe;
namambo weJerusarema, mumŋe; namambo weHebroni, mumŋe;
namambo weJarmuti, mumŋe; namambo weRakishi, mumŋe;
namambo weEgroni, mumŋe; namambo weGezeri, mumŋe;
namambo weDebiri, mumŋe; namambo weGederi, mumŋe;
namambo weHorma, mumŋe; namambo weAradi, mumŋe;
namambo weRibna, mumŋe, namambo weAdurami, mumŋe;
namambo weMakeda, mumŋe; namambo weBeteri, mumŋe;
namambo weTapua, mumŋe; namambo weHeferi, mumŋe;
namambo weAfeki, mumŋe; namambo weRasharoni, mumŋe;
namambo weMadoni, mumŋe; namambo weHazori, mumŋe;
namambo weShimroni‐meroni, mumŋe; namambo weAkshafi, mumŋe;
namambo weTaanaki, mumŋe; namambo weMegido, mumŋe;
namambo weKedeshi, mumŋe; namambo weJokneami paKarmeri, mumŋe;
namambo weDori panyika yamakomo yaDori, mumŋe; namambo weGoimi paGirgari, mumŋe;
namambo weTirza, mumŋe; madzimambo ose akaŋga anamakumi matatu nomumŋe.
Ɀino Joshua wakaŋga akwegura, aʋa namakore mazhinji; Jehova akati kwaari: Wakwegura, waʋa namakore mazhinji, dziciri’ko nyika zhinji dzinofanira kuʋa dzenyu.
Nyika yasara ndiyo: Nyika dzose dzaʋaFiristia, naʋaGeshuri ʋose;

kubva paShihori kurutiʋi rweEgipita, kuȿikira kumuganho weEkroni kumsoro, wainzi ndowaʋaKanani; madzishe mashanu aʋaFiristia, ʋaiti: WeGaza, noweAshdodi, noweAshkeroni, noweGiti, noweEkroni, naʋaAvimi,
kurutiʋi rweZasi, nyika yose yaʋaKanani, neMeara, waiʋa waʋaZidoni, kuȿikira paAfeki, kuȿikira kumuganho waʋaAmori;
nenyika yaʋaGebari, neRebanoni rose kumabvazuʋa, kubva paBaari‐gadi pajiŋga pegomo reHermoni, kuȿikira paʋanopinda paHamati;

ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere panyika yamakomo, kubva paRebanoni kuȿikira paMisrefoti‐maimi, naʋaZidoni ʋose, iʋaʋo ndicaʋadziŋga pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri; asi iwe unofanira kuipa ʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋe nhaka yaʋo, seɀandakakuraira.
Ɀino unofanira kugoʋera nyika iyi pakati pamarudzi mapfumbamŋe nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
ƲaRubeni naʋaGadi ʋakapiwa nhaka yaʋo pamŋe cete naye, iyo yaʋakaŋga ʋapiwa naMosesi mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa, seɀaʋakapiwa naMosesi, muranda waJehova;
kubva paAroeri, parutiʋi rwomupata weArnoni, neguta raiʋa pakati pomupata, neɓani rose reMedeba kuȿikira paDiboni;
namaguta ose aSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga aciɓata ʋushe paHeshboni, kuȿikira kumuganho waʋana ʋaAmoni;
neGireadi, nenyika yaʋaGeshuri naʋaMaakati, negomo rose reHermoni, neBashani rose kuȿikira paSareka,
noʋushe bgose bgaOgi paBashani, wakaŋga aciɓata ʋushe paAshtaroti neEdrei (ndiye wakaŋga asara paʋaRefaimi); nokuti ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakundwa naMosesi ʋakadziŋgwa naye.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋana ʋaIsraeri haʋana‐kudziŋga ʋaGeshuri kana ʋaMaakati; asi ʋaGeshuri naʋaMaakati ʋagere pakati paʋaIsraeri kuȿikira nhasi.
Asi rudzi rwaʋaRevi ɓedzi haana‐kurupa nhaka; ɀipiriso ɀaJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, ɀaipiswa, ndiɀo ɀaiʋa nhaka yaʋo, seɀaakataura naye.
Joshua akapa rudzi rwaʋana ʋaRubeni
Nyika yaʋo yakabva paAroeri, parutiʋi rwomupata weArnoni, neguta raiʋa pakati pomupata, neɓani rose paMedeba;
Heshboni namaguta aro ose ari paɓani; Diboni, neBamoti‐baari, neBeti‐baari‐meoni;
neJahazi, neKedemoti, neMefahati;
neKiriataimi, neSibma, neZereti‐shahari mugomo romupata;
neBeti‐peori, nemitenusirwa yePisga, neBeti‐jeshimoti;

namaguta ose eɓani, noʋushe bgose bgaSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, wakaŋga aciɓata ʋushe paHeshboni, wakaŋga akundwa naMosesi pamŋe cete naʋakuru ʋeMidiani, neEvi, neRekemi, neZuri, neHuri, neReba, namacinda aSihoni, akaŋga agere munyika iyo.
Barami, mŋanakomana waBeori, muʋuki, naiye ʋo wakaʋurawa nomunondo naʋana ʋaIsraeri pakati paʋamŋe ʋakaʋurawa naʋo.
Muganho waʋana ʋaRubeni rwakaŋga ruri Joridani nenyika yarwo. Ndiyo yaiʋa nhaka yaʋana ʋaRubeni nemhuri dzaʋo, iwo maguta nemisha yawo.
Mosesi akapa rudzi rwaʋaGadi, iʋo ʋana ʋaGadi,
Nyika yaʋo raiʋa Jazeri, namaguta ose eGireadi, nehafu yenyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni, kuȿikira paAroeri, pamberi peRaba;
nokubva paHeshboni, kuȿikira paRamati‐mizpe, neBetonimi; nokubva paMahanaimi, kuȿikira pamuganho weDebiri;

nomumupata Beti‐harami, neBeti‐nimra, neSukoti, neZafoni, noʋumŋe ʋushe bgakaŋga bgasara bgaSihoni, mambo weHeshboni, neJoridani nenyika yarwo, kuȿikira pamagumisiro eguŋgwa reKineroti, mhiri kwaJoridani, kumabvazuʋa.
Ndiyo nhaka yaʋana ʋaGadi nemhuri dzaʋo iwo maguta nemisha yawo.
Mosesi akapa hafu yorudzi rwaManase
Nyika yaʋo yakabva paMahanaimi, neBashani rose, noʋushe bgaOgi, mambo weBashani, nemisha yose yeJairi, yaiʋa paBashani, maguta makumi matanhatu;
nehafu yeGireadi, neAshtaroti, neEdrei, maguta oʋushe bgaOgi paBashani, ndiyo yaiʋa yaʋana ʋaMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, yehafu yaʋana ʋaMakiri nemhuri dzaʋo.
Ndidzo nhaka dzakagoʋerwa naMosesi pamapani aMoabi, mhiri kwaJoridani paJeriko kumabvazuʋa.
Asi rudzi rwaʋaRevi haruna‐kupiwa nhaka naMosesi; Jehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri, iye amene, ndiyo nhaka yaʋo, seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naye.
Ndidzo nhaka dzakagamucirwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yeKanani, dzaʋakagoʋerwa nomuprista Ereazari, naJoshua mŋanakomana waNuni, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa amarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋakagoʋerwa nhaka yaʋo nemijenya, seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi,
Nokuti Mosesi wakaŋga apa marudzi maʋiri nehafu nhaka yaʋo mhiri kwaJoridani; asi ʋaRevi haana‐kuʋapa nhaka pakati paʋo.
Nokuti ʋana ʋaJosefa ʋakaŋga ʋanamarudzi maʋiri, rwaManase norwaEfraimi; haʋana‐kupa ʋaRevi mugoʋe munyika iyo, asi maguta maʋaŋgagara, namafuro awo eŋombe dzaʋo nefuma yaʋo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita seɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova, ʋakakamura nyika.

Ɀino ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakasweɗera kunaJoshua paGirgari, Karebi mŋanakomana waJefune, muKenizi, akati kwaari: Unoziʋa shoko rakataurwa naJehova kunaMosesi munhu waMŋari, pamsoro paŋgu napamsoro pako, paKadeshi‐barnea.
Ini ndakaŋga ndaȿika makore anamakumi manna ŋguʋa yandakatumŋa naMosesi muranda waJehova paKadeshi‐barnea kundoshora nyika, ndikadzoka neshoko kwaari seɀandakafuŋga ini.
Asi hama dzaŋgu dzakaŋga dzakwira neni dzakaʋodza mŋoyo yaʋanhu; asi ini ndakateʋera Jehova Mŋari waŋgu nomŋoyo wose.
Mosesi akapika nomusi uyo, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, nyika yakatsikwa norutsoka rwako, icaʋa nhaka yako neyaʋana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti wakateʋera Jehova Mŋari waŋgu nomŋoyo wako wose.

Ɀino tarira, Jehova wakandiceŋgeta ndiri mupenyu, seɀaakataura, makore ano anamakumi manna namashanu kubva paŋguʋa Jehova yaakataura shoko iri kunaMosesi, ʋaIsraeri ʋacafamba murenje; ɀino, tarira, nhasi ndaʋa namakore anamakumi masere namashanu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, nanhasi ndicinesimba seɀandakaŋga ndakaita nomusi wandakatumŋa naMosesi; seɀarakaŋga rakaita musi iwoyo, ndiɀo ɀakaita simba raŋgu nanhasi, kana rokurwa kana kuɓuɗa kana kupinda.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino cindipa nyika iyi yamakomo yakarebga naJehova musi iwoyo; nokuti nomusi iwoyo wakanzwa iwe kuti ʋaAnaki ʋakaŋga ʋari’po namaguta makuru anamaȿiŋgo; ɀimŋe Jehova ucaʋa neni, ndikagona kuʋadziŋga, seɀakataurwa naJehova.
Ipapo Joshua akamuropafadza, akapa Karebi mŋanakomana waJefune Hebroni, iʋe nhaka yake.
Naiɀoɀo Hebroni rakazoʋa nhaka yaKarebi mŋanakomana waJefune, muKenizi, kuȿikira nhasi; nokuti wakaŋga ateʋera Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri nomŋoyo wake wose.
Zita reHebroni pakutaŋga rakaŋga riri Kiriati‐arba;
Mugoʋe worudzi rwaʋana ʋaJuda nemhuri dzaʋo wakaȿikira pamuganho waEdomi, iko kurenje reZini kurutiʋi rwezasi, kuȿikira zasi kwaɀo.
Muganho waʋo wezasi wakabva pamuganho weGuŋgwa roMunyu, kubva apo pakapinda nyika muguŋgwa, panotarira kurutiʋi rwezasi;
ndokupfuʋura zasi kwegomo reAkrabimi, ndokupfuʋura nokurutiʋi rweZini, ndokukwira necenyasi kweKadeshi‐barnea, ndokupfuʋura napaHezroni, ndokukwira napaAdari, ndokudzoka napaKarka;
ndokupfuʋura kuȿikira paAzmoni, ndokuɓuɗa naparukoʋa rweEgipita; muganho uyu ndokuguma paguŋgwa; ndiwo unofanira kuʋa muganho wezasi.
Muganho wokumabvazuʋa wakataŋga paGuŋgwa roMunyu kuȿikira pamuganho waJoridani. Muganho worutiʋi rwokumsoro wakataŋga apo panopinda nyika muguŋgwa kuȿikira pamugumo waJoridani,
ndokukwira kuBeti‐hogra, ndokupfuʋura nokumsoro kweBeti‐araba; muganho ndokukwira kubge raBohani, mŋanakomana waRubeni;

muganho ndokukwira nokuDebiri, ucibva pamupata weAkori, ndokuɗaro ucienda kumsoro wakatarisana neGirgari, pakatarisana ɀe negomo reAdumimi, riri kurutiʋi rwezasi rworwizi; muganho ndokupfuʋura napamvura yeEni‐shemeshi, ndokuguma paEni‐rogeri;

muganho ndokukwira napamupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwaʋaJebusi zasi (ndiro Jerusarema); muganho ndokukwira kuȿikira pamusoro wegomo riri pamberi pomupata weHinomi kumaʋirazuʋa, uri pamugumo kwaɀo womupata weRefaimi, kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Muganho ndokutarwa kubva pamsoro pegomo kuȿikira kutsime remvura yeNeftoa, ndokuguma pamaguta pagomo reEfroni; ɀino muganho ndokutarwa kuȿikira Bara (ndiro Kiriati‐jearimi).

Muganho ndokudzoka ucibva paBara nokumaʋirazuʋa kuȿikira pagomo reSeiri, ndokupfuʋura nokurutiʋi rwegomo reJearimi necokumsoro (ndiro Kesaroni), ndokuɓurukira kuȿikira paBeti‐shemeshi, ndokupfuʋura napaTimna;
muganho ndokupfuʋura kurutiʋi rweEkroni, kumsoro; muganho ndokutarwa kuȿikira paShikeroni, ndokupfuʋura napagomo reBara, ndokupfuʋura paJabneeri; muganho ndokuguma paguŋgwa.
Muganho wokumaʋirazuʋa wakaȿika kuguŋgwa guru nenyika yarwo. Ndiwo muganho waʋana ʋaJuda kunhiʋi dzose nemhuri dzaʋo.
Asi wakapa Karebi, mŋanakomana waJefune mugoʋe pakati paʋana ʋaJuda; seɀakarairwa Joshua naJehova, akamupa Kiriati‐arba;
Karebi akadziŋga’po ʋanakomana ʋatatu ʋaAnaki, ʋaiti: Sheshai, naAhimani, naTarmai, ʋanakomana ʋaAnaki.
Akabva’po, akandorwa naʋaigara Debiri; zita reDebiri kare raiʋa Kiriati‐seferi.
Karebi akati: Munhu unorwa neKiriati‐seferi, akarikunda, ndicamupa mukunda waŋgu Aksa, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ipapo Otnieri, mŋanakomana waKenazi, munuŋuna waKarebi, akarikunda; iye akamupa mukunda wake Aksa, akaʋa mukadzi wake.
Ɀino iye wakati aciȿika
Akati: Ndipei cipo; ɀamakandiisa kunyika yezasi, ndipei ʋo matsime emvura. Akamupa matsime okumsoro namatsime ezasi.
Ndiyo nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaJuda nemhuri dzaʋo.
Maguta okumudziʋo orudzi rwaʋana ʋaJuda kumuganho waEdomi zasi akaŋga ari Kabzeeri, neEderi, neJaguri;
neKina, neDimona, neAdada,
neKedeshi, neHazori, neItnani;
neZifi, neTeremi, neBearoti;
neHazori‐hadata, neKerioti‐hezroni (ndiro Hazori);
neAmami, neShema, neMorada;
neHazari‐gada, neHeshmoni, neBeti‐pereti;
neHazari‐shuari, neBeeri‐sheba, neBiziotia;
neBaara, neIyimi, neEzemi;
neErtoradi, neKesiri, neHorma;
neZikragi, neMadmana, neSansana;
neRebaoti, neShirimi, neAini, neRimoni; maguta iwayo ose aiʋa namakumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Paɓani pakaŋga paneEshtaori, neZora, neAshna;
neZanoa, ne Eniganimi, neTapua, neEnami;
neJarmuti, neAdurami, neSoko, neAzeka;
neSharaimi, neAditaimi, neGedera, neGederotaimi; maguta anegumi namanna, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Zenani, neHadasha, neMigdarigadi;
neDirani, neMizpe, neJokteeri;
neRakishi, neBoskati, neEgroni;
neKaboni, neRamani, neKiterishi;
neGederoti, neBetidagoni, neNaama, neMakeda; maguta anegumi namatanhatu, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Ribna, neEteri, neAshani;
neIfta, neAshna, neNezibi;
neKeira, neAkzibi, neMaresha; maguta ampfumbamŋe, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Ekroni, nemisha yaro, nemisha miɗuku yaro;
kubva paEkroni kuȿikira paguŋgwa,
Ashdodi, nemisha yaro, nemisha miɗuku yaro; neGaza, nemisha yaro, nemisha miɗuku yaro, kuȿikira kurukoʋa rweEgipita, napaguŋgwa guru, nenyika yaro.
Nokunyika yamakomo, Shamiri, neJatiri, neSoko;
neDana, ne‐Kiriati‐sana (ndiro Debiri);
neAnabi, neEshtemo, neAnimi;
neGosheni, neHoroni, neGiro; maguta anegumi nerimŋe, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Arabi, neDuma, neEshani;
neJanimi, neBeti‐tapua, neAfeka;
neHumta, neKiriati‐arba (ndiro Hebroni), neZiori; maguta mapfumbamŋe, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Maoni, neKarmeri, neZifi, neJuta;
neJezreeri, neJokdeami, neZanoa;
neKaini, neGibea, neTimna; maguta anegumi, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Harkuri, neBeti‐zuri, neGedori;
neMaarati, neBeti‐anoti, neErtekoni; maguta matanhatu, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Kiriati‐baari (ndiro Kiriati‐jearimi), neRaba; maguta maʋiri, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Murenje pakaŋga paneBeti‐arba, neMidini, neSekaka;
neNibshani, neGuta roMunyu, neEni‐gedi; maguta matanhatu, pamŋe cete nemisha yawo.
Asi ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kudziŋga ʋaJebusi ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema; asi ʋaJebusi ʋakagara Jerusarema pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaJuda kuȿikira nhasi.
Mugoʋe waʋana ʋaJosefa wakataŋga paJoridani paJeriko, pamvura yeJeriko kumabvazuʋa kurenje, ucitaŋga paJeriko, ndokukwira napanyika yamakomo ucienda Beti‐eri;
ndokubva Beti‐eri kuȿikira paRuzi, ndokupfuʋura napamuganho waʋaArkiti kuȿikira paAtaroti;
ndokuɓurukira kumaʋirazuʋa kumuganho waʋaJafereti, kuȿikira kumuganho weBeti‐horoni rezasi, kuȿikira Gezeri, ndokuguma paguŋgwa.
Ʋana ʋaJosefa, Manase naEfraimi, ʋakatora nhaka yaʋo.
Muganho waʋana ʋaEfraimi nemhuri dzaʋo ndiwo: Muganho wenhaka yaʋo kumabvazuʋa wakaŋga uri Ataroti‐adari, kuȿikira paBeti‐horoni kumsoro;
ɀino muganho ndokuenda kumaʋirazuʋa paMikmetati kumsoro; ɀino muganho ndokudzoka kumabvazuʋa kuȿikira paTanati‐shiro, ndokupfuʋura ipapo kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa eJanoa;
ndokubva paJanoa, ndokuɓurukira Ataroti, neNaara, ndokuȿika paJeriko, ndokuguma paJoridani.
Kubva paTapua muganho wakaenda kumaʋirazuʋa, kuȿikira parukoʋa Kana, ndokuguma paguŋgwa. Ndiyo nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaEfraimi nemhuri dzaʋo;
pamŋe cete namaguta akaŋga akakamurirwa ʋana ʋaEfraimi pakati penhaka yaʋana ʋaManase, maguta ose nemisha yawo.
Haʋana‐kudziŋga ʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere Gezeri; asi ʋaKanani ʋakagara pakati paʋaEfraimi kuȿikira nhasi; ʋakaʋa ʋaɓati ʋecibaro.
Ndiwo mugoʋe worudzi rwaManase; nokuti iye wakaŋga ari mŋana weɗaŋgwe waJosefa. Kana ari Makiri, mŋana weɗaŋgwe waManase, ɓaɓa ʋaGireadi, iye wakapiwa Gireadi neBashani, nokuti wakaŋga ari murwi.
Ʋamŋe ʋana ʋaManase

Asi Zerofeadi, mŋanakomana waHeferi, mŋanakomana waGireadi, mŋanakomana waMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase, wakaŋga asinaʋanakomana, asi ʋanasikana ɓedzi; mazita aʋanasikana ʋake akaŋga ari Mara, naNoa, naHogra, naMirka, naTirza.

Iʋo ʋakasweɗera kumuprista Ereazari, nokunaJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, nokumacinda, ʋakati: Jehova wakaraira Mosesi kuti atipe nhaka pakati pehama dzeɗu; naiɀoɀo akaʋapa nhaka pakati paʋanuŋuna ʋaɓaɓa ʋaʋo, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naJehova.
Manase akapiwa migoʋe inegumi, kunze kweGireadi neBashani mhiri kwaJoridani;
nokuti ʋanasikana ʋaManase ʋakaŋga ʋanenhaka pakati paʋanakomana ʋake; nyika yeGireadi yakaŋga iri yaʋamŋe ʋanakomana ʋaManase.
Muganho waManase wakabva kwaAsheri, ndokuȿika paMikmetati, pamberi peShekemi; ɀino muganho ndokuenda kuruʋoko rworudyi, kuȿikira kuʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Eni‐tapua.
Nyika yeTapua yakaŋga iri yaManase; asi Tapua pamuganho waManase rakaŋga riri guta raʋana ʋaEfraimi.
Ɀino muganho ndokuɓuruka kurukoʋa Kana, necezasi kworukoʋa; maguta iwayo akaŋga ari aEfraimi pakati pamaguta aManase; muganho waManase wakaŋga uri necokumsoro kworukoʋa, ndokuguma paguŋgwa.
Kurutiʋi rwezasi nyika yakaŋga iri yaEfraimi; kurutiʋi rwokumsoro yakaŋga iri yaManase; guŋgwa waiʋa muganho wake; miganho ikaȿika kwaAsheri kumsoro, nokwaIsakari kumabvazuʋa.

Pakati paIsakari naAsheri Manase wakaŋga aneBeti‐sheani nemisha yaro, neJibreami nemisha yaro, naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Dori nemisha yaro, naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Endori nemisha yaro, naʋakaŋga ʋagere Taanaki nemisha yaro, naʋakaŋga ʋagere Megido nemisha yaro, ari makomo matatu.
Asi ʋana ʋaManase ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumaguta iwayo; asi ʋaKanani ʋakaramba ʋaciɗa kugara panyika iyo.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋaʋa nesimba, ʋakaita ʋaKanani ʋaɓati ʋecibaro, haʋana‐kuʋadziŋga cose.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaJosefa ʋakataura naJoshua, ʋakati: Makatipireiko mugoʋe mumŋe cete necikamu cimŋe cete, kuti iʋe nhaka yeɗu, ɀatiri ʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuti Jehova wakatiropafadza kuȿikira ɀino?
Joshua akati kwaʋari: Kana muri ʋanhu ʋazhinji, endai henyu kuɗondo, mundoɀitemera
Ʋana ʋaJosefa ʋakati: Nyika yamakomo haiŋgatikwaniri; ʋuye ʋaKanani ʋose ʋanogara munyika yomupata ʋaneŋgoro dzamatare, iʋo ʋose ʋari paBeti‐sheani nemisha yaro, naʋari mumupata weJezreeri.
Ɀino Joshua akataura naʋeimba yaJosefa, iʋo ʋaEfraimi naʋaManase, akati: Imi muri ʋanhu ʋazhinji, munesimba guru, hamuŋgaʋi nomugoʋe mumŋe cete;

asi nyika yamakomo icaʋa yenyu; nokuti kunyaŋge riri ɗondo, mucafanira kuritema, maɓuɗiro aro ose agoʋa enyu; nokuti munofanira kudziŋga ʋaKanani, kunyaŋge ʋaneŋgoro dzamatare, ʋuye kunyaŋge ʋanesimba.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri yakaʋuŋgana paShiro, ikadzika’po tente rokusoŋgana; nyika yakaŋga yakundwa naʋo.
Asi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri kwakaŋga kwasara marudzi manomŋe akaŋga acigere kukamurirwa nhaka yawo.
Ɀino Joshua akati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Mucanonoka kuȿikira riniko kupinda nokutora nyika, yamakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu?
Ɀitsaurirei ʋarume ʋatatu kurudzi rumŋe norumŋe, ini ndiʋatume, ʋasimuke ʋafambe nenyika, ʋagorondedzera nhaka yaʋo; ipapo ʋaʋuye kwandiri.
Ʋanofanira kuiganhura ʋaciita migoʋe minomŋe; ʋaJuda ʋanofanira kugara panyika yaʋo kurutiʋi rwezasi, ʋuye ʋeimba yaJosefa ʋanofanira kugara panyika yaʋo kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Ɀino munofanira kurondedzera nyika, muciita migoʋe minomŋe, mugoʋuya

Nokuti ʋaRevi haʋanomugoʋe pakati penyu; nokuti ʋuprista bgaJehova ndiyo nhaka yaʋo; ɀino ʋaGadi naʋaRubeni, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋakapiwa nhaka yaʋo mhiri kwaJoridani kumabvazuʋa, yaʋakaŋga ʋapiwa naMosesi muranda waJehova.

Ɀino ʋarume aʋo ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda; Joshua akaraira iʋaʋo ʋakaenda kundorondedzera nyika, akati: Endai, mufambe nenyika, muirondedzere, mugodzokera kwandiri, ndikukandirei mijenya pano pamberi paJehova paShiro.
Ʋarume ʋakaenda, ʋakafamba nenyika, ʋakarondedzera mubuku nyika namaguta ayo, ʋaciita migoʋe minna, ʋakaȿika kunaJoshua pamisasa paShiro.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋakandira mijenya paShiro pamberi paJehova; ipapo Joshua akagoʋera ʋana ʋaIsraeri nyika seɀaʋakaŋga ʋakamurirwa.
Rudzi rwaʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakagoʋerwa mugoʋe waʋo nemhuri dzaʋo; nyika yomugoʋe waʋo yakaŋga iri pakati paʋana ʋaJuda naʋana ʋaJosefa.
Muganho waʋo kurutiʋi rwokumsoro wakabva paJoridani; ɀino muganho ndokukwira kurutiʋi rweJeriko necokumsoro, ndokukwira nenyika yamakomo kumaʋirazuʋa, ndokuguma murenje reBeti‐aveni.
Muganho ndokubva’po, ndokupfuʋura napaRuzi, kurutiʋi rwezasi rweRuzi (ndiro Beteri); ɀino muganho ndokuɓurukira Ataroti‐adari, pedyo negomo riri zasi kweBeti‐horoni rezasi.

Muganho ndokutarwa, ucibva kumaʋirazuʋa ucidzokera zasi; kubva pagomo riri pamberi peBeti‐horoni zasi, ndokuguma paKiriati‐baari (ndiro Kiriati‐jearimi), guta raʋana ʋaJuda; ndirwo rwaiʋa rutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa.
Rutiʋi rwezasi rwakabva pamugumo weKiriati‐jearimi, muganho ndokuramba ucienda kumaʋirazuʋa, ndokuɓuɗira kutsime remvura yeNeftoa;

ɀino muganho ndokuɓurukira kumugumo wegomo riri pamberi pomupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, mumupata weRafaimi kumsoro; ndokuɓurukira kumupata waHinomi, kurutiʋi rwaʋaJebusi zasi, ndokuɓurukira Eni‐rogeri;
ɀino ndokutarwa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, kubva paEni‐shemeshi kuȿikira paGeriroti, rakatarisana nejiŋga reAdunimi; ndokuɓurukira kubge raBohani, mŋanakomana waRubeni;
ɀino ndokupfuʋurira kurutiʋi rwakatarisana neAraba, kumsoro, ndokuɓurukira kuAraba;
muganho ndokupfuʋura nokurutiʋi rweBeti‐hogra kumsoro, ndokuguma kumsoro apo pakapinda nyika muGuŋgwa roMunyu, kumugumo wezasi waJoridani; ndiwo waiʋa muganho wezasi.
Joridani ndirwo rwakaŋga ruri muganho wayo kumabvazuʋa. Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yaʋana ʋaBenjamini, nemiganho yayo kunhiʋi dzose, nemhuri dzaʋo.
Maguta orudzi rwaʋana ʋaBenjamini, nemhuri dzaʋo, akaŋga ari Jeriko, neBeti‐hogra, neEmeki‐kezizi,
neBeti‐araba, neZemaraimi, neBeteri,
neAvimi, nePara, neOfra,
neKefari‐amoni, neOfni, neGeba; maguta anegumi namaʋiri nemisha yawo;
neGibeoni, neRama, neBeeroti,
neMizpe, neKefira, neMoza,
neRekemi, neIrpeeri, neTarara,
neZera, neErefi, neJebusi (ndiro Jerusarema), neGibeati, neKiriati; maguta anegumi namanna nemisha yawo; ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yaʋana ʋaBenjamini nemhuri dzaʋo.
Mugoʋe wecipiri wakapiwa Simeoni, irwo rudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni nemhuri dzaʋo; nhaka yaʋo yakaŋga iri pakati penhaka yaʋana ʋaJuda.
Panhaka yaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaneBeeri‐sheba, kana Sheba, neMorada,
neHazari‐shuari, ne‐Bara, neEzemi,
neErtoradi, neBeturi, neHorma,
neZikragi, neBeti‐markaboti, neHazari‐susa,
neBeti‐rebaoti, neSharuheni; maguta anegumi namatatu nemisha yawo:
Aini, neRimoni, neEteri, neAshani; maguta manna nemisha yawo;
nemisha yose yakapoteredza maguta iwayo kuȿikira paBaarati‐beeri, raiʋa Rama rezasi. Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni nemhuri dzaʋo.
Nhaka yaʋana ʋaSimeoni yakaŋga yatorwa pamugoʋe waʋana ʋaJuda, nokuti mugoʋe waʋana ʋaJuda wakaŋga uri mukurusa; naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaSimeoni ʋakapiwa nhaka pakati penhaka yaʋo.
Mugoʋe wecitatu wakapiwa ʋana ʋaZeburuni, nemhuri dzaʋo; muganho wenhaka yaʋo wakaȿika paSaridi.
Muganho waʋo wakakwira kumaʋirazuʋa, kuȿikira paMarara, ndokuȿikira paDabesheti, ndokuȿikira kurukoʋa rwaiʋa pamberi peJokneami;
kubva paSaridi wakadzokera kumabvazuʋa, kunoɓuɗa zuʋa, kuȿikira kumuganho weKisroti‐tabori, ndokuɓuɗira kuDaberati, ndokukwira Jafia;
kubva ipapo wakapfuʋura kumabvazuʋa ucienda Gati‐heferi, kuȿikira paEti‐kazini, ndokuguma paRimoni, rinoȿika paNea;
ɀino muganho ndokudzoka kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ndokuenda Hanatoni, ndokuguma pamupata weIftaeri;
neKatati, neNaharari, neShimroni, neIdara, neBeti‐rehemi; maguta anegumi namaʋiri nemisha yawo.
Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yaʋana ʋaZeburuni, nemhuri dzaʋo, maguta iwayo nemisha yawo.
Mugoʋe wecinna wakapiwa Isakari, iʋo ʋana ʋaIsakari, nemhuri dzaʋo.
Muganho waʋo wakaȿika paJezreeri, neKesuroti, neShunemi,
neHafaraimi, neShioni, neAnaharoti,
neRabiti, neKishioni, neEbesi,
neRemeti, neEni‐ganimi, neEni‐hada, neBeti‐pazezi;
muganho ukaȿika paTabori, neShahazuma, neBeti‐shemeshi; muganho ndokugumira paJoridani; maguta anegumi namatanhatu nemisha yawo.
Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaIsakari nemhuri dzaʋo, maguta nemisha yawo.
Mugoʋe wecishanu wakapiwa rudzi rwaʋana ʋaAsheri nemhuri dzaʋo.
Muganho waʋo wakaŋga uri: Herkati, neHari, neBeteni, neAkshafi,
neAramereki, neAmadi, neMishari, ndokuȿikira paKarmeri kumaʋirazuʋa, nokuShihori‐riɓnati;
ndokudzokera kumabvazuʋa kuBeti‐dagoni ndokuȿikira kwaZeburuni, nokumupata weIftaeri kumsoro, kuȿikira paBeti‐emeki, neNeyeri, nokuɓuɗira paKaburi kuruɓoshwe,
neEbroni, neRehobi, neHamoni, neKana, kuȿikira paZidoni guru;
ɀino muganho ndokudzokera kuRama, nokuguta reTire rakakombga noruȿiŋgo; muganho ndokudzokera Hosa, ndokuguma paguŋgwa panyika yeAkzibi;
ʋuye Uma, neAfeki, neRehobi; maguta makumi maʋiri namaʋiri nemisha yawo.
Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaAsheri, nemhuri dzaʋo, maguta iwaya nemisha yawo.
Mugoʋe wecitanhatu wakapiwa ʋana ʋaNaftari, iʋo ʋana ʋaNaftari nemhuri dzaʋo.
Muganho waʋo wakabva paHerefi, kubva pamuouki weZaananimi, neAdami‐nekebi, neJabneeri, kuȿikira paRakumi, ndokuguma paJoridani;

ipapo muganho wakadzoka kumabvazuʋa, ndokuenda Aznoti‐tabori; ndokubva’po, ndokuenda Hukoki; ndokuȿika kwaZeburuni kurutiʋi rwezasi, ndokuȿika kwaAsheri kumaʋirazuʋa, ndokuȿika kwaJuda paJoridani kumabvazuʋa.
Maguta akaŋga akakombga namaȿiŋgo akaŋga ari Zidimi, neZera, neHamati, neRakati, neKinereti,
neAdama, neRama, neHazori,
neKedeshi, neEdrei, neEni‐hazori,
neIroni, neMigdari‐eri, neHoremi, neBeti‐anati, neBeti‐shemeshi; maguta anegumi namapfumbamŋe, nemisha yawo.
Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaNaftari nemhuri dzaʋo, maguta iwaya nemisha yawo.
Mugoʋe wecinomŋe wakapiwa rudzi rwaʋana ʋaDani nemhuri dzaʋo.
Muganho wenhaka yaʋo wakaŋga uri Zora, neEshtaori, neIri‐shemeshi;
neShaarabini, neAjaroni, neItra,
neEroni, neTimna, neEkroni,
neErteke, neGibetoni, neBaarati,
neJehudi, neBeni‐beraki, neGati‐rimoni,
neMe‐jarkoni, neRakoni, nenyika yakatarisana neJopa.
Asi nyika yaʋana ʋaDani yakaŋga iri ɗukusa; naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaDani ʋakandorwa neReshemi, ʋakarikunda, ʋakariparadza neminondo inopinza, ʋakapiwa
Ndiyo yakaŋga iri nhaka yorudzi rwaʋana ʋaDani nemhuri dzaʋo, maguta iwaya nemisha yawo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakapedza kugoʋera nyika, yakaŋga iri nhaka yaʋo nemiganho yayo; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapa Joshua, mŋanakomana waNuni nhaka yake pakati paʋo;
seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova, ʋakamupa guta raakakumbira, Timnati‐sera, panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi; akaʋaka guta iro, akagara’mo.

Ndidzo nhaka dzakagoʋerwa nemijenya paShiro pamberi paJehova, pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana, nomuprista Ereazari, naJoshua mŋanakomana waNuni, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa amarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri, kuti dziʋe nhaka dzaʋo. Naiɀoɀo ʋakapedza kugoʋera nyika.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura naJoshua, akati:
Taura naʋana ʋaIsraeri, uti: Muɀitsaurire maguta oʋutiziro, andakakuʋudzai nomuromo waMosesi;
kuti munhu wakaʋuraya mumŋe nokusaziʋa kana asina‐kuita nobgoni, atizire’po; acaʋa kwamuri ʋutiziro pamutsiʋi weropa.

Unofanira kutizira kunerimŋe ramaguta iwayo, agondomira panopindwa napo pasuʋo reguta, agoreʋa mhoȿa yake panzeʋe dzaʋakuru ʋeguta iro; ipapo ʋanofanira kumugamucira pakati paʋo muguta, ʋamupe pokugara, agogara pakati paʋo.
Ɀino kana mutsiʋi weropa aciŋge amuteʋera, haʋafaniri kuisa muʋurayi paruʋoko rwake, nokuti wakaʋuraya wokwake asiŋgaiti nobgoni, asina‐kumuʋeŋga kare.

Ɀino iye unofanira kugara muguta iro, kuȿikira amira pamberi peʋuŋgano atoŋgwe, kuȿikira pakufa kwomuprista mukuru ucaʋa’po namazuʋa iwayo; ipapo muʋurayi unofanira kudzoka, aende kuguta rake nokumba kwake, kuguta kwaakaŋga atiza.
Ipapo ʋakatsaura Kedeshi muGarirea panyika yamakomo yaNaftari, neShekemi, panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, neKiriati‐arba (ndiro Hebroni) panyika yamakomo yaJuda.
Nemhiri kwaJoridani paJeriko kumabvazuʋa ʋakatsaura Bezeri murenje paɓani kurudzi rwaRubeni, neRamoti muGireadi kurudzi rwaGadi, neGorani muBashani kurudzi rwaManase.

Ndiwo maguta akatsaurirwa ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, naʋatorwa ʋaigara pakati paʋo, kuti aninani unoʋuraya munhu nokusaziʋa atizire’ko, arege kufa noruʋoko rwomutsiʋi weropa, kuȿikira amira pamberi peʋuŋgano.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaRevi ʋakasweɗera kumuprista Ereazari, nokunaJoshua, mŋanakomana waNuni, nokuʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa amarudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri,
ʋakataura naʋo paShiro panyika yeKanani, ʋakati: Jehova wakaraira nomuromo waMosesi, kuti tipiwe maguta matiŋgagara, namafuro awo eŋombe dzeɗu.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapa ʋaRevi panhaka dzaʋo maguta awa namafuro awo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova.
Mhuri dzaʋaKohati dzikagoʋerwa nemijenya; ʋana ʋomuprista Aroni ʋaiʋa ʋaʋaRevi ʋakagoʋerwa nemijenya maguta anegumi namatatu pakati porudzi rwaJuda, norwaSimeoni, norwaBenjamini.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋaKohati ʋakagoʋerwa nemijenya maguta anegumi pakati pemhuri dzorudzi rwaEfraimi, norudzi rwaDani, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase.
Ʋana ʋaGershoni ʋakagoʋerwa nemijenya maguta anegumi namatatu pamhuri dzorudzi rwaIsakari, norudzi rwaAsheri, norudzi rwaNaftari, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase muBashani.
Ʋana ʋaMerari nemhuri dzaʋo ʋakapiwa maguta anegumi namaʋiri pakati porudzi rwaRubeni, norudzi rwaGadi, norudzi rwaZeburuni.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapa ʋaRevi maguta iwayo namafuro awo nemijenya, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ʋakaʋapa maguta iwayo, akarebga mazita awo pano, pakati porudzi rwaʋana ʋaJuda, norudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni.
Akaʋa aʋana ʋaAroni, ʋemhuri dzaʋaKohati, ʋaiʋa ʋana ʋaRevi, nokuti ndiʋo ʋakataŋga kugoʋerwa nemijenya.
Ʋakaʋapa Kiriati‐arba, iye Arba wakaŋga ari ɓaɓa ʋaAnaki (ndiro Hebroni), panyika yamakomo yaJuda, namafuro aro akaŋga akaripoteredza.
Asi minda yeguta, nemisha yaro, ʋakaɀipa Karebi mŋanakomana waJefune, ɀiʋe ɀake.
Ʋakapa ʋana ʋomuprista Aroni Hebroni namafuro aro, rakaŋga riri guta roʋutiziro romuʋurayi, ʋuye Ribna namafuro aro,
neJatiri namafuro aro, neEshtemoa namafuro aro,
neHoroni namafuro aro, neDebiri namafuro aro,
neAini namafuro aro, neJuta namafuro aro, neBeti‐shemeshi namafuro aro; maguta mapfumbamŋe pakati pamarudzi iwayo maʋiri.
Napakati porudzi rwaBenjamini Gibeoni namafuro aro, neGeba namafuro aro,
neAnatoti namafuro aro, neArmon namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Maguta ose aʋana ʋaAroni muprista akaŋg ari maguta anegumi namatanhatu namafuro awo.
Mhuri dzaʋana ʋaKohati, iʋo ʋaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaʋana ʋaKohati, ʋakapiwa maguta aʋo nemijenya pakati porudzi rwaEfraimi.
Ʋakaʋapa Shekemi namafuro aro panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, raiʋa guta roʋutiziro romuʋurayi, neGezeri namafuro aro,
neKibzaimi namafuro aro, neBeti‐horoni namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati porudzi rwaDani, Erteki namafuro aro, neGebitoni namafuro aro,
neAjaroni namafuro aro, neGati‐rimoni namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati pehafu yorudzi rwaManase, Taanaki namafuro aro, neGati‐rimoni namafuro aro; maguta maʋiri.
Maguta ose emhuri dzaʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaʋana ʋaKohati aiʋa gumi namafuro awo.
Ʋana ʋaGershoni, ʋemhuri dzaʋaRevi, ʋakaʋapa Gorani namafuro aro, raiʋa guta roʋutiziro romuʋurayi, pakati pehafu yorudzi rwaManase, neBeeshtera namafuro aro; maguta maʋiri.
Napakati porudzi rwaIsakari, Kishioni namafuro aro, neDaberati namafuro aro,
neJarmuti namafuro aro, neEni‐ganimi namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati porudzi rwaAsheri, Mishari namafuro aro, neAbdoni namafuro aro,
neHerkati namafuro aro, neRehobi namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati porudzi rwaNaftari, Kedeshi muGarirea namafuro aro, raiʋa guta roʋutiziro romuʋurayi, neHamoti‐dori namafuro aro, neKartani namafuro aro; maguta matatu.
Maguta ose aʋaGershoni, nemhuri dzaʋo, akaŋga ari maguta anegumi namatatu namafuro awo.
Mhuri dzaʋana ʋaMerari, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasara kuʋaRevi, ʋakaʋapa pakati porudzi rwaZeburuni, Jokneami namafuro aro, neKatra namafuro aro,
neDimna namafuro aro, neNaharari namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati porudzi rwaRubeni, Bezeri namafuro aro, neJahazi namafuro aro,
neKedemoti namafuro aro, neMefaati namafuro aro; maguta manna.
Napakati porudzi rwaGadi, Ramoti muGireadi namafuro aro, raiʋa guta roʋutiziro romuʋurayi, neMahanaimi namafuro aro,
neHeshboni namafuro aro, neJazeri namafuro aro; iwo ose maguta manna.
Maguta awa ose akaŋga ari aʋana ʋaMerari, nemhuri dzaʋo, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋemhuri dzaʋaRevi; mugoʋe waʋo wakaŋga uri maguta anegumi namaʋiri.
Maguta ose aʋaRevi pakati penhaka yaʋana ʋaIsraeri aiʋa maguta anamakumi manna namasere namafuro awo.
Maguta awa ose akaŋga anamafuro awo, guta rimŋe nerimŋe; ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita maguta iwayo ose.
Saiɀoɀo Jehova akapa ʋaIsraeri nyika yose yaakaŋga apika, kuti ucaipa madziɓaɓa aʋo; ikaʋa yaʋo, ʋakagara’mo.
Jehova akaʋazorodza kumatiʋi ose, pose paakaŋga apikira madziɓaɓa aʋo; hakunomunhu kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose wakamira pamberi paʋo; asi Jehova wakaisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose pamaʋoko aʋo.
Hakunecinhu cimŋe ceɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀakaŋga ɀataurwa naJehova kuimba yaIsraeri cakakona; ɀose ɀakaitika.
Ɀino Joshua akaɗana ʋaRubeni naʋaGadi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase,
akati kwaʋari: Makaita ɀose ɀamakarairwa naMosesi muranda waJehova, nokuterera ʋo inzwi raŋgu paɀose ɀandakakurairai;
hamuna‐kusiya hama dzenyu mazuʋa awa mazhinji kuȿikira nhasi, asi makaita cireʋo camakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakazorodza hama yenyu, seɀaakataura kwaʋari; naiɀoɀo ɀino dzokai, muende kumatente enyu, kunyika yenyu yamakapiwa naMosesi muranda waJehova, mhiri kwaJoridani.

Asi cenjerai kwaɀo kuti muite mirau nemirairo yamakarairwa naMosesi muranda waJehova, kuti muɗe Jehova Mŋari wenyu, nokufamba munzira dzake dzose, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake, nokumunamatira, nokumushumira nemŋoyo yenyu yose ʋuye nemŋeya yenyu yose.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋaropafadza, akaʋaendisa; ʋakaenda kumatente aʋo.

Ɀino Mosesi wakaŋga apa imŋe hafu yorudzi rwaManase nhaka yaʋo muBashani; asi imŋe hafu yorudzi yakapiwa nhaka yayo naJoshua, pamŋe cete nehama dzaʋo, mhiri kwaJoridani kumaʋirazuʋa. Ɀino Joshua akaʋaropafadza ʋo pakuʋaendisa kwake kumatente aʋo.
Akataura naʋo, akati: Dzokerai kumatente enyu munefuma zhinji neŋombe zhinji kwaɀo, nesirveri, nendarama, nendarira, namatare, neŋguʋo zhinji, mugoʋane nehama dzenyu ɀamakapamba kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.

Ɀino ʋana ʋaRubeni, naʋana ʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋakadzoka, ʋakaparadzana naʋana ʋaIsraeri paShiro munyika yeKanani, ʋakaenda kunyika yeGireadi, kunyika yaʋakaŋga ʋapiwa kuti iʋe yaʋo, seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa nomurairo waJehova nomuromo waMosesi.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika panyika yapaJoridani, munyika yeKanani, ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋakaʋaka artari paJoridani, artari huru kana iciʋonekwa.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakanzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarirai, ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋaʋaka artari pakatarisana neKanani, panyika yapaJoridani, kurutiʋi rwaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋuŋgano yose yaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana paShiro, kuti ʋaende kundorwa naʋo.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatuma Pinehasi, mŋanakomana womuprista Ereazari, kuʋana ʋaRubeni, nokuʋana ʋaGadi nokuhafu yorudzi rwaManase, panyika yeGireadi;
iye namacinda anegumi naye, mucinda mumŋe weimba imŋe neimŋe yamadziɓaɓa pakati pamarudzi aʋaIsraeri; mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo wakaŋga ari mukuru wedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo pakati peɀuru ɀaʋaIsraeri.
Iʋo ʋakaȿika kuʋana ʋaRubeni, nokuʋana ʋaGadi, nokuhafu yorudzi rwaManase, kunyika yeGireadi, ʋakataura naʋo, ʋakati:
Ɀanzi neʋuŋgano yaJehova: Kuɗarika uku kwamakaɗarikira Mŋari waIsraeri nako kwakaɗiniko, nokuti munotsauka nhasi pakuteʋera Jehova, ɀamakaɀiʋakira artari, kuti mumukire Jehova nhasi?
Ko ɀakaipa ɀePeori ɀigere kutiriŋgana here, iɀo ɀaticigere kuɀinatsa paɀiri kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, kunyaŋge hosha yakawira ʋuŋgano yaJehova,
ɀamoɗa‐kutsauka nhasi pakuteʋera Jehova? Ɀino ɀamakamukira Jehova nhasi, maŋgwana ucatsamŋira ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri.

Asi kana nyika yenyu isakanaka, yambukirai kunyika yaJehova, pagere tabernakeri yaJehova, kuti mupiwe nhaka pakati peɗu; asi regai kumukira Jehova, kana kutimukira isu, pakuɀiʋakira imŋe artari parutiʋi rweartari yaJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ko Akani, mŋanakomana waZera, haana‐kuɗarika pacinhu cakayeriswa, kutsamŋa kukawira ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri here? Munhu uyo akasafa ari oga pakutadza kwake.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaRubeni, naʋana ʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋakapindura, ʋakati kuʋakuru ʋeɀuru ʋaʋaIsraeri:
Mŋari, iye Mŋari Jehova, Mŋari, iye Mŋari Jehova, iye unoziʋa, naIsraeri ʋacaziʋa; kana takamukira Jehova, kana kumuɗarikira, (musatiponesa nhasi,)

ɀatakaɀiʋakira artari, kuti titsauke tirege kuteʋera Jehova; kana takaɀiita kuti tiɓayire pamsoro payo ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, kana ɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, kana kuɓayira’po ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, Jehova amene ŋgaabvunzisise pamsoro paɀo;
kana tisina‐kuita cinhu ici nokucenjera ʋuye nokufuŋga, ticiti: Ɀimŋe paŋguʋa inoʋuya ʋana ʋenyu ʋacataura naʋana ʋeɗu, ʋaciti: Imi munemhaka yeiko naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri?
Nokuti Jehova wakaita Joridani muganho pakati peɗu nemi, imi ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi; hamunomugoʋe kunaJehova; naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋenyu ʋaŋgaregesa ʋana ʋeɗu kutya Jehova.
Saka takati: Ŋgatiɀigadzire, tiɀiʋakire artari, isati iri yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, kana yokuɓayira’po;

asi ciʋe capupu pakati peɗu nemi, napakati paʋana ʋeɗu ʋanotiteʋera, kuti ticaita ɓasa raJehova pamberi pake neɀipiriso ɀeɗu ɀinopiswa, neɀiɓayiro ɀeɗu, neɀipiriso ɀeɗu ɀokuyananisa, kuti ʋana ʋenyu ʋarege kuzoti kuʋana ʋeɗu paŋguʋa inoʋuya: Hamunomugoʋe kunaJehova.

Naiɀoɀo takati: Kana ʋacizoɗaro kwatiri kana kuʋana ʋeɗu paŋguʋa inoʋuya, isu ticati: Tarirai muʋone mufananidzo weartari yaJehova, yakaitwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu, isati iri yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, kana yokuɓayira’po; asi capupu pakati peɗu nemi.

Mŋari atiɓatsire, tirege kumukira Jehova, nokutsauka nhasi pakuteʋera Jehova, ticiʋaka artari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neyeɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, kana yokuɓayira’po, parutiʋi rweartari yaJehova, Mŋari weɗu, iri pamberi petabernakeri yake.
Ɀino Pinehasi muprista, namacinda eʋuŋgano, iʋo ʋakuru ʋeɀuru ɀaʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋanaye, ʋakati ʋanzwa mashoko akataurwa naʋana ʋaRubeni, naʋana ʋaGadi, naʋana ʋaManase, ʋakafara naɀo.

Pinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari muprista, akati kuʋana ʋaRubeni, nokuʋana ʋaGadi, nokuʋana ʋaManase: Nhasi tinoziʋa kuti Jehova uri pakati peɗu, nokuti hamuna‐kuɗarikira Jehova pacinhu ici; makarwira ʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀino paruʋoko rwaJehova.
Ipapo Pinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari muprista, namacinda ʋakabva kuʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi, panyika yeGireadi, ʋakadzokera kunyika yeKanani, kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaʋadzosera shoko iro.
Ɀino shoko iro rakafadza ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakakudza Mŋari; haʋana‐kuzotaura kuti ʋacandorwa naʋo, kuti ʋaparadze nyika makaŋga mugere ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaRubeni naʋana ʋaGadi ʋakatumidza artari iyo: Ndico capupu pakati peɗu, kuti Jehova ndiye Mŋari.
Ɀino mazuʋa mazhinji akati apfuʋura, Jehova azorodza ʋaIsraeri paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋapoteredza, naJoshua akwegura, aʋa namakore mazhinji,
Joshua akaɗana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakuru ʋaʋo naʋatuŋgamiriri ʋaʋo, naʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo, naʋatariri ʋaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Ndakwegura, ndaʋa namakore mazhinji.
Imi makaʋona ɀose ɀakaitirwa ndudzi idzi dzose naJehova Mŋari wenyu nokuɗa kwenyu; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiye wakakurwirai.
Tarirai, ndakakupai ndudzi idzi dzasara, iʋe nhaka yamarudzi enyu, kubva paJoridani, pamŋe cete nendudzi dzose dzandakaparadza, kuȿikira kuguŋgwa guru kumaʋirazuʋa.
Jehova Mŋari wenyu amene ucadziɓuɗisa pamberi penyu, nokudzidziŋga murege kudziʋona, kuti mupiwe nyika yadzo, seɀamakaʋudzwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo simbai kwaɀo kuti muceŋgete nokuita ɀose ɀakanyorwa mubuku yomurairo waMosesi, murege kutsauka kwaɀiri kana kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe;
kuti murege kuveŋgana nendudzi idzo dzakasara pakati penyu, kana kureʋa mazita aʋamŋari ʋaʋo, kana kupikisa naʋo, kana kuʋashumira, kana kuʋafugamira;
asi namatirai Jehova Mŋari wenyu, seɀamakaita kuȿikira nhasi.
Nokuti Jehova wakadziŋga pamberi penyu ndudzi huru dzaiʋa nesimba; asi kana muri’mi, hakunomunhu wakamira pamberi penyu kuȿikira nhasi.
Munhu mumŋe kwamuri ucadziŋga ʋanhu ʋanecuru cezana, nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu ndiye unokurwirai, seɀaakakuʋudzai.
Naiɀoɀo cenjerai kuti muɗe Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Nokuti kana mukatoŋgodzokera, mukanamatira ʋakasara ʋendudzi idzi, idzo dzakasara pakati penyu, mukawanana naʋo, mukapinda kwaʋari, naiʋo ʋakapinda kwamuri;

muziʋe ɀirokwaɀo, kuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu haaŋgadziŋgi ndudzi idzi pamberi penyu; asi ʋacaʋa musuŋgo neriʋa kwamuri, netyaʋa kunhiʋi dzenyu, neminzwa pameso enyu, kuȿikira mapera panyika iyo yakanaka yamakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.

Tarirai, nhasi ini ndoenda nenzira yenyika yose; ɀino imi munoziʋa mumŋoyo yenyu yose nomumŋeya yenyu yose, kuti hapanecinhu cimŋe paɀose ɀakanaka ɀakataurwa pamsoro penyu naJehova Mŋari wenyu, cakakona.

Ɀino seɀamakaitirwa iɀo ɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka, ɀakataurwa pamsoro penyu naJehova Mŋari wenyu, saiɀoɀo Jehova ucakuitirai ɀose ɀakaipa, kuȿikira akuparadzai panyika yakanaka, yamakapiwa naJehova Mŋari wenyu.

Kana mukaɗarika suŋgano yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, yaakakurairai, mukandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, mukafugama pamberi paʋo, ipapo kutsamŋa kwaJehova kucakumukirai, mukakurumidza kupera, nokubviswa panyika iyo yakanaka, yamakapiwa naye.
Ɀino Joshua akaʋuŋganidza marudzi ose aʋaIsraeri paShekemi, akaɗana ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, naʋatuŋgamiriri ʋaʋo, naʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo, naʋatariri ʋaʋo; ʋakaɀiisa pamberi paMŋari.
Joshua akati kuʋanhu ʋose: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Madziɓaɓa enyu aigara kare mhiri kwoRwizi, iye Tera, ɓaɓa ʋaAbrahama, naNahori, acishumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari.
Ini ndikatora ɓaɓa ʋenyu Abrahama mhiri kwoRwizi, ndikamufambisa panyika yose yeKanani, ndikawanza ʋana ʋake, ndikamupa Isaka.
Ndikapa Isaka Jakobo naEsau; ndikapa Esau gomo reSeiri, riʋe rake; Jakobo naʋana ʋake ʋakaɓurukira Egipita.
Ndikatuma Mosesi naAroni, ndikatambudza Egipita, neɀandakaita pakati payo; pashure ndikakuɓuɗisai.
Ndikaɓuɗisa madziɓaɓa enyu paEgipita, mukaȿika paguŋgwa; ʋaEgipita ʋakateʋera madziɓaɓa enyu ʋaneŋgoro ʋuye naʋanhu ʋakataȿa mabiza kuȿikira paGuŋgwa Dɀuku.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yaʋakacema kunaJehova, akaisa rima pakati penyu naʋaEgipita, akaʋuyisa guŋgwa pamsoro paʋo, akaʋafukidza; meso enyu akaʋona ɀandakaita paEgipita, mukagara mureŋje mazuʋa mazhinji.
Ndikakuȿitsai kunyika yaʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mhiri kwaJoridani; iʋo ʋakarwa nemi, ndikaʋaisa mumaʋoko enyu, nyika yaʋo ikaʋa yenyu, ndikaʋaparadza pamberi penyu.
Ɀino Baraki mŋanakomana waZipori, mambo waMoabi, akasimuka, akarwa naIsraeri, akatuma nhume kundoɗana Barami, mŋanakomana waBeori, kuti amutuke.
Asi ini ndakaramba kunzwa Barami, naiɀoɀo wakaramba aciŋgokuropafadzai; naiɀoɀo ndakakurwirai paruʋoko rwake.
Ɀino makayambuka Joridani, mukaȿika paJeriko; ʋarume ʋeJeriko ʋakarwa nemi, ʋaiti: ƲaAmori, naʋaPerezi, naʋaKanani, naʋaHeti, naʋaGirgashi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi; ndikaʋaisa mumaʋoko enyu.
Ndikatuma pamberi penyu mago, akaʋadziŋga pamberi penyu, iwo madzimambo maʋiri aʋaAmori; haʋana‐kudziŋgwa neminondo yenyu kana noʋuta bgenyu.
Ndikakupai nyika yomusina‐kurima, namaguta amusina‐kuʋaka, mamugere ɀino; munodya minda yemizambiriŋga neyemiorivi yamusina‐kusima.
Naiɀoɀo ityai Jehova ɀino, mumushumirei nomŋoyo wose neɀokwaɗi; rashai ʋamŋari ʋaishumirwa namadziɓaɓa enyu mhiri kwoRwizi napaEgipita, imi mushumire Jehova.

Kana muciti ɀakaipa kushumira Jehova, ɀitsaurirei nhasi wamunoɗa kushumira, kana ʋamŋari ʋaishumirwa namadziɓaɓa enyu mhiri kwoRwizi, kana ʋamŋari ʋaʋaAmori ʋamugere munyika yaʋo; asi kana ndirini naʋeimba yaŋgu ticashumira Jehova.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakapindura ʋakati: Mŋari atiɓatsire, kuti tirege kurasha Jehova ticishumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari.

Nokuti Jehova Mŋari weɗu, ndiye wakatiɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu, paimba yoʋuranda; ndiye wakaita ɀiratidzo ɀikuru ticiɀiʋona, akaticeŋgeta panzira yose yatakafamba nayo, napakati pendudzi dzose dzatakapfuʋura nokwadziri.
Jehova ndiye wakadziŋga ndudzi dzose pamberi peɗu, iʋo ʋaAmori ʋakaŋga ʋagere munyika ino; naiɀoɀo nesu ʋo ticashumira Jehova, nokuti ndiye Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀino Joshua akati kuʋanhu: Hamuŋgagoni kushumira Jehova, nokuti ndiMŋari mutȿene, ndiMŋari unegoɗo, haaŋgakukaŋganwiriyi kuɗarika kwenyu neɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Kana mukarasha Jehova, mukashumira ʋamŋari ʋaʋatorwa, iye ucakushandukirai nokukuitirai ɀakaipa, nokukuparadzai, ambokuitirai ɀakanaka.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakati kunaJoshua: Kwete, asi ticashumira Jehova.
Joshua akati kuʋanhu: Munoɀipupurira kuti makatsaura Jehova kuti mumushumirei. Iʋo ʋakati: Tiri ɀapupu heɗu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino rashai ʋamŋari ʋaʋatorwa ʋari pakati penyu, murerekere mŋoyo yenyu kunaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Ʋanhu ʋakati kunaJoshua: Jehova Mŋari weɗu ndiye waticashumira, ticaterera inzwi rake.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akaita suŋgano naʋanhu musi iwoyo, akaʋasimbisira mutemo nomurairo paShekemi.
Joshua akanyora mashoko iwayo mubuku yomurairo waMŋari, akatora ibge guru, akarimisa pasi pomuouki, wakaŋga uri paimba tȿene yaJehova.
Joshua akati kuʋanhu ʋose: Tarirai, ibge iri ricakupupurirai, nokuti rakanzwa mashoko ose atakataura naJehova; naiɀoɀo ricakupupurirai, kuti murege kuzoramba Mŋari wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo Joshua akaendisa ʋanhu, mumŋe nomumŋe akaenda kunhaka yake.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Joshua mŋanakomana waNuni, muranda waJehova, wakafa, aʋa namakore anezana negumi.
Ʋakamuʋiga panyika yenhaka yake paTimnati‐sera, panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, necokumsoro kwegomo reGaashi.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakashumira Jehova mazuʋa ose aJoshua, namazuʋa ose aʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋaciri ʋapenyu Joshua atofa, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakaziʋa maɓasa ose akaŋga aitirwa ʋaIsraeri naJehova.

Mafupa aJosefa, akaŋga aʋuya naʋana ʋaIsraeri pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita, ʋakaaʋiga paShekemi, panɀimbo yenyika yakaŋga yateŋgwa naJakobo kuʋana ʋaHamori, ɓaɓa ʋaShekemi, nezana remari; ikazoʋa nhaka yaʋana ʋaJosefa.
Ɀino Ereazari, mŋanakomana waAroni, akafa, ʋakamuʋiga mucikomo comŋanakomana wake Pinehasi, caakaŋga apiwa munyika yamakomo yaEfraimi.
Ɀino Joshua wakati afa, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabvunza Jehova, ʋakati: Ndianiko kwatiri unofanira kutaŋga kundorwa naʋaKanani?
Jehova akati: Juda ndiye unofanira kuenda; tarirai ndakaisa nyika
Ɀino Juda akati kunaSimeoni mukuru wake: Hendei tose kumugoʋe waŋgu, tirwe naʋaKanani, neni ndigoenda newe kumugoʋe wako. Ipapo Simeoni akaenda naye.
Ɀino Juda akaenda, Jehova akaisa ʋaKanani naʋaPerizi mumaʋoko ake, ʋakaʋuraya muBezeki ʋarume ʋaʋo ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi.
Ʋakawana Adoni‐bezeki muBezeki, ʋakarwa naye, ʋakaʋuraya ʋaKanani naʋaPerizi.
Asi Adoni‐bezeki wakatiza; ʋakamuteʋera, ʋakamuɓata, ndokumugura magunwe ake namagunwe amakumbo ake.
Ipapo Adoni‐bezeki akati: Madzimambo anamakumi manomŋe, akaŋga akagurwa magunwe awo namagunwe amakumbo awo, ainoŋga
Ɀino ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakandorwa neJerusarema, ʋakarikunda, ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza, ʋakapisa guta nomŋoto.
Pashure ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakaɓuruka ʋakandorwa naʋaKanani, ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika yamakomo, nezasi nokumapani.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakandorwa naʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere Hebroni (ɀino zita reHebroni kare raiʋa Kiriati‐arba); ʋakaparadza Sheshai, naAhimani, naTarmai.
Ʋakabva’po, ʋakandorwa naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Debiri. (Ɀino zita reDebiri kare raiʋa Kiriati‐seferi).
Karebi akati: Munhu unorwa neKiriati‐seferi, akarikunda, ndicamupa mukunda waŋgu Aksa, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ipapo Otnieri, mŋanakomana waKenazi, munuŋuna waKarebi, akarikunda; iye akamupa mukunda wake Aksa, akaʋa mukadzi wake.
Ɀino iye wakati aciȿika
Akati: Ndipei cipo; ɀamakandiisa kunyika yezasi, ndipei ʋo matsime emvura. Akamupa matsime okumsoro namatsime ezasi.
Ɀino ʋana ʋomuKeni, mukarabga waMosesi, ʋakaɓuɗa paguta remicindwe, ʋakakwira pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaJuda kurenje raJuda, riri zasi kweAradi; ʋakandogara naʋanhu ʋo’ko.
Juda akaenda naSimeoni mukuru wake, ʋakakunda ʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere Zefati; ʋakariparadza cose. Guta iro rikazotumidzwa Horma.
ƲaJuda ndokukunda ʋo Gaza nenyika yaro neAshkeroni nenyika yaro, neEkroni nenyika yaro.
Jehova akaʋa naJuda akadziŋga ʋanhu
Ʋakapa Karebi Hebroni seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa naMosesi, akadziŋga’po ʋana ʋaAnaki ʋatatu.
Asi ʋana ʋaBenjamini haʋana‐kudziŋga ʋaJebusi ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema; asi ʋaJebusi ʋakagara Jerusarema pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaBenjamini kuȿikira nhasi.
Ʋeimba yaJosefa naiʋo ʋakakwira ʋakandorwa neBeti‐eri, Jehova akaʋa naʋo.
Ʋeimba yaJosefa ʋakandoshora Beti‐eri. (Ɀino zita reguta iri pakutaŋga raiʋa Ruzi.)
Nharirire dzikaʋona munhu aciɓuɗa muguta, dzikati kwaari: Ƌotiratidza hako panopindwa napo paguta, tigokuitira ɀakanaka.
Akaʋaratidza panopindwa napo paguta, ʋakakunda guta neminondo inopinza; asi ʋakatendera munhu uyo nemhuri yake yose kuenda hake.
Ɀino munhu uyo akaenda kunyika yaʋaHeti, akandoʋaka guta rake, akaritumidza zita rinonzi Ruzi; ndiro zita raro kuȿikira nhasi.
Manase haana‐kudziŋga ʋanhu
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋasimba, ʋakaɓatisa ʋaKanani ɓasa recibaro, haʋana‐kuʋadziŋga cose.
Efraimi haana‐kudziŋga ʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere Gezeri; asi ʋaKanani ʋakagara Gezeri pakati paʋo.
Zeburuni haana‐kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Kitroni, kana ʋakaŋga ʋagere Naharori; asi ʋaKanani ʋakagara pakati paʋo, ʋakaʋa ʋaɓati ʋecibaro.
Asheri haana‐kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Ako, kana ʋakaŋga ʋagere Zidoni, kana Akrabi, kana Aksibi, kana Herba, kana Afiki, kana Rehobi;
asi ʋaAsheri ʋakagara pakati paʋaKanani, ʋakaŋga ʋagere munyika iyo; nokuti haʋana‐kuʋadziŋga.

Naftari haana‐kudziŋga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Beti‐shemeshi, kana ʋakaŋga ʋagere Beti‐anati; asi ʋakagara pakati paʋaKanani, ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika iyo; asi ʋakaŋga ʋagere Beti‐shemeshi neBeti‐anati ʋakaʋa ʋaɓati ʋecibaro.
ƲaAmori ʋakasundira ʋana ʋaDani kunyika yamakomo, nokuti haʋana‐kuʋatendera kuɓurukira kumupata;
asi ʋaAmori ʋakaramba ʋaciɗa kugara mugomo reHeresi, muAjaroni nomuShaarbimi; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ruʋoko rwaʋeimba yaJosefa rwakakunda, ʋakaʋa ʋaɓati ʋecibaro.
Muganho waʋaAmori wakabva pamukwidzwa weAkrabimi, kubva paɗombo, ucikwira.

Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova wakabva Girgari, akaenda Bokimi, akati: Ndakakuɓuɗisai muEgipita, ndikakuȿitsai panyika yandakapikira madziɓaɓa enyu, ndikati: Handiŋgatoŋgoputsi suŋgano yaŋgu nemi nokusiŋgaperi;
nemi hamufaniri kuita suŋgano naʋanhu ʋagere panyika ino; munofanira kuputsa artari dzaʋo. Asi hamuna‐kuterera inzwi raŋgu; makaitireiko iɀoɀo?
Saka ini ndakati ʋo: Handiŋgaʋadziŋgi pamberi penyu; asi ʋacaʋa seminzwa kunhiʋi dzenyu, naʋamŋari ʋaʋo ʋacaʋa ɀisuŋgo kwamuri.
Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova wakati ataura mashoko iwayo kuʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakacema kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋakatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Bokimi, ʋakaɓayira’po Jehova.
Ɀino Joshua wakati aendisa ʋanhu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaenda mumŋe nomumŋe kunhaka yake, kuti ʋagare panyika yaʋo.
Ʋanhu ʋakashumira Jehova mazuʋa ose aJoshua, namazuʋa ose aʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋaciri ʋapenyu Joshua atofa, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaʋona maɓasa makuru akaŋga aitirwa ʋaIsraeri naJehova.
Ɀino Joshua mŋanakomana waNuni, muranda waJehova akafa, aʋa namakore anezana negumi.
Ʋakamuʋiga panyika yenhaka yake paTimnati‐heresi, panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, necokumsoro kwegomo reGaashi.
Ɀino ʋorudzi urwo rwose ʋakasoŋganiswa namadziɓaɓa aʋo, rumŋe rudzi rukamuka shure kwaʋo rwakaŋga rusiŋgaziʋi Jehova, kana ɓasa raakaitira ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ʋakashumira ʋaBaari;
ʋakarasha Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, wakaŋga aʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, ʋakateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ʋaʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋapoteredza, ʋakaʋafugamira, ʋakatsamŋisa Jehova.
Ʋakarasha Jehova, ʋakashumira Baari neAshtaroti.

Kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira ʋaIsraeri, akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaparadzi ʋakaʋaparadza, akaʋateŋgesa mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋapoteredza; naiɀoɀo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kumira pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Pose‐pose paʋaienda, ruʋoko rwaJehova rwairwa naʋo nokuʋaitira ɀakaipa, seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa naJehova, ʋuye seɀaʋakaŋga ʋapikirwa naJehova; ʋakatambudzika kwaɀo.
Ɀino Jehova akamutsa ʋatoŋgi, ʋaiʋarwira mumaʋoko aʋaiʋaparadza.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro haʋana‐kuterera ʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo, nokuti ʋakapata ʋaciteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋakaʋafugamira; ʋakakurumidza kutsauka panzira yaifamba madziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋaiterera mirairo yaJehova; asi iʋo haʋana‐kuita saiɀoɀo.

Ɀino Jehova waiti kana aciŋge aciʋamutsira mutoŋgi, Jehova waiʋa nomutoŋgi uyo, ndokuʋarwira pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo mazuʋa ose omutoŋgi uyo; nokuti Jehova wakaɀiɗemba pamsoro pokugomba kwaʋo nokuɗa kwaʋaiʋamanikidza nokuʋanetsa.
Asi kana mutoŋgi afa, ʋakadzoka ɀe, ʋakaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura madziɓaɓa aʋo, pakuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, nokuʋashumira, nokuʋafugamira; haʋana‐kurega maɓasa aʋo kana mufambire wemŋoyo yaʋo mikukutu.
Ipapo kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira ʋaIsraeri, akati: Rudzi urwu ɀarwakaɗarika suŋgano yaŋgu, yandakaita namadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakasaterera inzwi raŋgu,
neni ʋo handicazodziŋgi pamberi paʋo rudzi rumŋe rwendudzi dzakasiyiwa naJoshua pakufa kwake;
kuti ndiidze ʋaIsraeri nadzo, kana ʋaciɗa kuceŋgeta nzira yaJehova, kana ʋaciɗa kufamba’mo, seɀayaiceŋgetwa namadziɓaɓa aʋo, kana ʋasiŋgaɗi.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova akasiya ndudzi idzo, akasakurumidza kudzidziŋga; ʋuye haana‐kudziisa muruʋoko rwaJoshua.
Ɀino ndidzo ndudzi dzakasiyiwa naJehova, kuti aidze ʋaIsraeri nadzo, iʋo
nemhaka iyo ɓedzi kuti marudzi aʋana ʋaIsraeri aziʋe, kuti aʋadzidzise kurwa, iʋo ʋasina‐kumboziʋa iɀoɀo pakutaŋga;
Madzishe mashanu aʋaFiristia, naʋaKanani ʋose, naʋaZidoni, naʋaHivi, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mugomo reRebanoni, kubva pagomo reBaari‐hermoni, kuȿikira paʋanopinda paHamati.
Iʋo ʋakasiyiwa’po, kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋaidzwe naʋo, kuti kuzikanwe kana ʋaciɗa kuterera mirairo yaJehova yaakaŋga araira madziɓaɓa aʋo naMosesi.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara pakati paʋaKanani, naʋaHeti, naʋaAmori, naʋaPerizi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi.
Iʋo ʋakawana ʋakunda ʋaʋo, kuti ʋaʋe ʋakadzi ʋaʋo, ʋakapa ʋanakomana ʋaʋo ʋakunda ʋaʋo, ʋakashumira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ʋakakaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari waʋo, ʋakashumira ʋaBaari namatanda okunamata nawo.
Saka kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira ʋaIsraeri, akaʋateŋgesa muruʋoko rwaKushani‐rishataimi, mambo weMesopotamia; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakashumira Kushani‐rishataimi makore masere.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋacicema kunaJehova, Jehova akamutsira ʋana ʋaIsraeri muponesi, wakaʋaponesa, iye Otnieri, mŋanakomana waKenazi, munuŋuna waKarebi.
Mŋeya waJehova akaʋuya pamsoro pake, akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri; akandorwa, Jehova akaisa Kushani‐rishataimi, mambo weMesopotamia, muruʋoko rwake; ruʋoko rwake rukakunda Kushani‐rishataimi.
Ipapo nyika yakazorora makore anamakumi manna. Otnieri, mŋanakomana waKenazi, akafa.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀe ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, Jehova akasimbisa Egroni, mambo waMoabi, kuti arwe naʋaIsraeri, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
Akaʋuŋganidza kwaari ʋana ʋaAmoni naʋaAmareki, akandokunda ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaʋatorera guta remicindwe.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakashumira Egroni, mambo waMoabi, makore anegumi namasere.

Asi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋacicema kunaJehova, Jehova akaʋamutsira muponesi, iye Ehudi, mŋanakomana waGera, muBenjamini, munhu waiʋa neziɓoshwe; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatumira Egroni, mambo waMoabi, cipo naye.
Ɀino Ehudi wakaɀiitira munondo wakaŋga wakarodzwa kunhiʋi dzose, wakaŋga wakaȿika kubiti
Ipapo akandopa Egroni, mambo waMoabi, cipo; Egroni wakaŋga ari munhu wakakora kwaɀo.
Ɀino wakati apedza kumupa cipo, akaendisa ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura cipo.
Asi iye amene wakadzoka pamifananidzo yakaʋezwa yamabge paGirgari, akati: Ndineshoko rakaʋanzika nemi mambo. Iye akati: Nyararai. Ipapo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye ʋakabva kwaari.
Ɀino Ehudi akasweɗera kwaari; iye wakaŋga agere ari oga muimba yake inotonhorera; Ehudi akati: Ndineshoko kwamuri rinobva kunaMŋari. Iye ndokusimuka pacigaro cake.
Ipapo Ehudi akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe, akavomora munondo pacidɀa cake corudyi, akamuɓaya nawo nomuɗumbu rake;
ciɓato cikapinda ʋo ciciteʋera cese, mafuta akadziʋira pamsoro pecese, nokuti haana‐kuvomora munondo muɗumbu rake, mafuta akaɓuɗa.
Ɀino Ehudi akaɓuɗa paɓiraʋira, akapfiga mikoʋa yeimba yokumsoro shure kwake, akaikiya.
Wakati aɓuɗa, ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaȿika, ʋakawana mikoʋa yeimba yokumsoro yakapfigwa; ʋakati: Ɀimŋe unofukidza makumbo ake paimba yake inotonhorera.
Ɀino ʋakamira kuȿikira ʋapera mano, asi haana‐kuzarura mikoʋa yeimba yokumsoro; ipapo ʋakatora kiyi, ʋakazarura mukoʋa, ʋakawana ishe waʋo akawira pasi, afa.
Asi iʋo ʋacanonoka, Ehudi akapukunyuka, akapfuʋura mifananidzo yakaʋezwa yamabge, akapukunyukira Seira.
Wakati aȿika’po, akaridza hwamanda panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓuruka naye panyika yamakomo, iye akaʋatuŋgamirira.

Akati kwaʋari: Nditeʋerei, nokuti Jehova wakaisa ʋaMoabi, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, mumaʋoko enyu. Ʋakaɓuruka ʋacimuteʋera, ʋakandogarira mazambuko aJoridani paiyambukira ʋaMoabi, ʋakasatendera munhu mumŋe kuyambuka.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋaMoabi ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀinegumi, ʋose ʋari ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋoʋumhare, hakunomunhu mumŋe wakapukunyuka.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaMoabi ʋakakundwa musi iwoyo noruʋoko rwaʋaIsraeri, nyika ikazorora makore anamakumi masere.
Shure kwake kwakaŋga kunaShamgari, mŋanakomana waAnati, wakaʋuraya kuʋaFiristia ʋanamazana matanhatu norutanda rwokuɓaya ŋombe narwo; iye akaponesa ʋo ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino shure kwokufa kwaEhudi ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀe ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
