Jehova akaʋateŋgesa muruʋoko rwaJabini, mambo weKanani, wakaŋga aciɓata ʋushe paHazori; mukuru wehondo yake wakaŋga ari Sisera, wakaŋga agere paHarosheti raʋahedeni.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema kunaJehova, nokuti wakaŋga aneŋgoro dzamatare dzinamazana mapfumbamŋe, akamanikidza ʋana ʋaIsraeri kwaɀo makore anamakumi maʋiri.
Neŋguʋa iyo Debora, muprofitakadzi, mukadzi waRapidoti, wakaŋga acitoŋga ʋaIsraeri.
Iye waigara pasi pomucindwe waDebora, pakati peRama neBeti‐eri, panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaisienda kwaari kuzotoŋgerwa mhaka dzaʋo.

Iye akatuma nhume kundoɗana Baraki, mŋanakomana waAbinoami, paKedeshi‐naftari, akati kwaari: Jehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri haana‐kukuraira here, aciti: Enda usweɗere kugomo reTabori, uende naʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi ʋaʋana ʋaNaftari naʋana ʋaZeburuni?
Neni ndicatumira kwauri kurukoʋa Kishoni, Sisera mukuru wehondo yaJabini, neŋgoro dzake naʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji, ndiʋaise muruʋoko rwako.
Baraki akati kwaari: Kana imi mukaenda neni, ini ndicaenda, asi kana imi musiŋgaendi neni, ini handiŋgaendi.
Iye akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndicaenda newe, asi iwe hauŋgakudzwi parwendo urwu rwaunofamba, nokuti Jehova ucateŋgesa Sisera muruʋoko rwomukadzi. Debora akasimuka, akaenda Kedeshi naBaraki.
Baraki akakoka Zeburuni naNaftari paKedeshi, akakwira anaʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi ʋakaŋga ʋacimuteʋera; naDebora wakaenda ʋo naye.
Ɀino Heberi muKeni, wakaŋga aparadzana naʋaKeni, iʋo ʋana ʋaHobabi, mukarabga waMosesi, akadzika tente rake kuȿikira pamuouki paZaananimi, paKedeshi.
Ɀino ʋakaʋudza Sisera kuti Baraki, mŋanakomana waAbinoami, wakwira mugomo reTabori.
Sisera akaʋuŋganidza ŋgoro dzake dzose, idzo ŋgoro dzamatare, dzinamazana mapfumbamŋe, naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, kubva paHarosheti raʋahedeni kuȿikira parukoʋa Kishoni.

Ɀino Debora akati kunaBaraki: Simuka, nokuti iri ndiro zuʋa raJehova, raacaisa naro Sisera muruʋoko rwako; Jehova haana‐kukutuŋgamirira here? Ipapo Baraki akaɓuruka pagomo reTabori, ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi ʋacimuteʋera.
Ɀino Jehova akavundusa Sisera neŋgoro dzake dzose, nehondo yake yose, neminondo inopinza pamberi paBaraki; Sisera akaɓuruka paŋgoro yake, akatiza namakumbo.
Asi Baraki wakateʋera ŋgoro nehondo kuȿikira paHarosheti raʋahedeni, hondo yose yaSisera ikaʋurawa neminondo inopinza, hakuna‐kusara kunyaŋge nomumŋe cete.
Asi Sisera wakatiza namakumbo kutente raJaeri, mukadzi waHeberi, muKeni, nokuti kwakaŋga kunorugare pakati paJabini, mambo weHazori, neimba yaHeberi muKeni.
Jaeri akaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naSisera, akati kwaari: Tsaukai, ishe waŋgu, tsaukirai henyu kwandiri, regai kutya. Ipapo akatsaukira kwaari mutente, akamufukidza nejira.
Iye akati kwaari: Ndipe ʋo ɀimvura, ndinwe, nokuti ndinenyota. Akadziʋura ɗende romukaka, akamupa, akanwa, akamufukidza.
Akati kwaari: Mira pamukoʋa wetente, ɀino kana aninani akaʋuya akakubvunza, aciti: Pano panomunhu here? Uti: Kwete.

Ipapo Jaeri, mukadzi waHeberi, akatora mbambo yetente, akatora ʋo nyundo paruʋoko rwake, akanatsosweɗera kwaari, akaroʋera mbambo napacaʋoʋo cake, ikaɓuɗa neseri, ikaɓayira pasi, nokuti wakaŋga aɓatwa kwaɀo nehope, aneta; akafa.

Ɀino tarira, Baraki wakati aciteʋera Sisera, Jaeri akaɓuɗa akandosoŋgana naye, akati kwaari: Ʋuyai, ndikuratidzei munhu wamunotȿaka. Iye akapinda kwaari, akaʋona Sisera akatandaʋara pasi, afa, mbambo iciri pacaʋoʋo cake.
Naiɀoɀo nomusi iwoyo Jehova wakakunda Jabini, mambo weKanani, pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaramba ʋaciŋgokunda Jabini, mambo weKanani, kuȿikira ʋaparadza Jabini, mambo weKanani.
Ɀino Debora naBaraki, mŋanakomana waAbinoami, ʋakaimba nomusi iwoyo, ʋakati:
Kudzai Jehova,
Nokuti ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋakatuŋgamirira ʋaIsraeri,
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaʋuya nokuɗa kwaʋo.
Inzwai, imi madzimambo, tererai,
imi macinda;
Ini, iyeni, ndicaimbira Jehova;
Ndicarumbidza Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri nenziyo.
Jehova, pakuɓuɗa kwenyu paSeiri,
Pakufamba kwenyu mucibva kusaŋgo reEdomi,
Nyika yakaɗeɗera, ʋuye ɗeŋga rakaɗonha,
Ɀirokwaɀo makore akaɗonha mvura.
Makomo akayerera pamberi paJehova,
Nairo Sinai pamberi paJehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Pamazuʋa aShamgari, mŋanakomana waAnati,
Pamazuʋa aJaeri, nzira huru dzakaŋga dzisiŋgafambgi,
Ʋafambi ʋaifamba nenzira dzinopota‐pota.
Misha yakaŋga isinaʋanhu munaIsraeri, yakaŋga isinaʋanhu,
Kuȿikira ini Debora ndicisimuka,
Ndicisimuka ini, mai pakati paIsraeri.
Ʋakaɀitsaurira ʋamŋari ʋatȿa;
Kurwa kukaʋa’po pamasuʋo.
Kwakaŋga kuciʋonekwa here nhoʋo kana pfumo
Pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manna here?
Mŋoyo waŋgu unorumbidza ʋaɓati ʋaIsraeri,
Aʋo ʋakaʋuya nokuɗa kwaʋo pakati paʋanhu;
Kudzai Jehova!
Paridzai iɀoɀo, imi makataȿa mboŋgoro cena,
Imi, mugere pamhasa dzinokosha,
Nemi, munofamba nenzira.
Kure namanzwi aʋanofura noʋuta,
paʋanoteka mvura,
Ndipo paʋacarumbidza maɓasa akarurama aJehova,
Maɓasa akarurama oʋushe bgake munaIsraeri.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋaJehova ʋakaɓurukira kumasuʋo.
Muka, muka, Debora;
Muka, muka, uimbe rwiyo!
Simuka Baraki, utape ʋatapxa ʋako, iwe mŋanakomana waAbinoami.
Ipapo ʋakaŋga ʋakasara ʋaʋakuru naʋanhu ʋakaɓuruka,
Jehova wakaɓuruka nokuɗa kwaŋgu kuzorwa naʋanesimba.
KunaEfraimi ndokwakabva ʋanomudzi waʋo paAmareki,
Ʋacikuteʋera iwe Benjamini pakati paʋanhu ʋako.
PaMakiri ndipo pakaɓurukira ʋarairi,
NokunaZeburuni aʋo ʋakaɓata tȿimbo yokukunda.
Macinda aIsakari akaŋga anaDebora;
SaIsakari, ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita ʋo Baraki;
Ʋakamhanyira kumupata ʋaciteʋera tsoka dzake.
Pahoʋa dzaRubeni
Pakaŋga panemiraŋgariro mikuru yomŋoyo.
Wakagarireiko pasi pakati pamataŋga eɀipfuwo,
Uciterera kurira kwenyere dzinoridzirwa makwai?
Pahoʋa dzaRubeni
Pakaŋga panokunɀera kukuru kwomŋoyo.
Gireadi wakagara mhiri kwaJoridani;
Newe Dani, wakagarireiko paɀikepe?
Asheri wakagara ɀake pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa,
Wakarambira apo panopinda mvura panyika.
Zeburuni ndiʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgatyi kuȿikira parufu,
NaNaftari panɀimbo dzenyika dzakakwirira.
Madzimambo akaʋuya akarwa,
Ipapo madzimambo eKanani akarwa ʋo
PaTaanaki, pamvura zhinji yeMegido;
Haʋana‐kuwana fuma yemari.
Nyeredzi dzakarwa dziri kuɗeŋga,
Dzakarwa naSisera dziri panzira dzadzo.
Rwizi Kishoni rwakaʋakukura,
Irwo rwizi rwekare, rwizi Kishoni.
Mŋeya waŋgu, pfuʋura nesimba.
Ŋguʋa iyo makumbo amabiza akaroʋera pasi
Nokumhanya, kuri kumhanya kwaʋakasimba.
Tuka Merozi, ndiɀo ɀinotaura mutumŋa waJehova,
Tuka ɀakaipa aʋo ʋagere’mo;
Nokuti haʋana‐kuʋuya kuzoɓatsira Jehova,
Kuzoɓatsira Jehova pakurwa kwake naʋanesimba.
Pakati paʋakadzi Jaeri ŋgaarumbidzwe,
Iye mukadzi waHeberi muKeni,
Ŋgaarumbidzwe pakati paʋakadzi patente.
Wakakumbira mvura, iye akamupa mukaka;
Wakamuʋigira mukaka wakafa pandiro yamambo.
Wakaɓata mbambo noruʋoko rwake,
Nenyundo yomuɓati norudyi rwake,
Akaroʋa Sisera nenyundo, akabvoʋora musoro wake;
Wakaroʋa, akabvoʋora ɀaʋoʋo ɀake.
Wakakotama patsoka dzake, akawa,
ndokutandaʋara;
Wakakotama patsoka dzake, akawa;
Ipapo paakakotama, ndipo paakawira pasi, afa.
Wakatarira pawindi, akaɗana,
Mai ʋaSisera
Ŋgoro yake inononokireiko kuȿika?
Makumbo eŋgoro dzake anononokireiko?
Ʋakadzi ʋake, ʋakakudzwa, ʋakacenjera, ʋakamupindura,
Naiye amene wakaɀipindura, aciti:
Haʋana‐kuwana here ɀaʋakapamba, haʋana‐kuɀigoʋana here?
Ɀimŋe murume mumŋe nomumŋe
Ɀimŋe Sisera
Ŋguʋo dzakapambga dzemiceka yakarukwa yamaʋara‐ʋara,
Ŋguʋo dzamaʋara‐ʋara dzakarukwa kunhiʋi dzose, dzakafanira mitsipa yaʋakapamba?
Saiɀoɀo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose ŋgaʋaparadzwe, Jehova;
Asi iʋo ʋanokuɗai ŋgaʋaʋe sezuʋa,
kana riciɓuɗa nesimba raro!
Nyika ikazorora makore anamakumi manna.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, Jehova akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aMidiani makore manomŋe.
Midiani akakunda Israeri; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɀiitira pokuʋanda pamakomo, namapako, nenhare, nokuɗa kwaMidiani.
Nokuti ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kana ʋakusha, ʋaMidiani naʋaAmareki naʋana ʋamabvazuʋa ndokukwira kuzorwa naʋo.
Ʋakadzika matente aʋo pakatarisana naʋo, ndokuparadza ɀiɓereko ɀeminda kuȿikira paGaza; haʋana‐kusiyira ʋaIsraeri ɀokudya kana makwai kana ŋombe, kana mboŋgoro.
Nokuti ʋaikwira neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo, namatente aʋo; ʋaiʋuya ʋakawanda semhashu, ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa, iʋo namakamera aʋo; ʋaipinda munyika kuti ʋaiparadze.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakaʋa ʋarombo kwaɀo nokuɗa kwaMidiani; ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema kunaJehova.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋacicema kunaJehova nokuɗa kwaMidiani,
Jehova akatuma muprofita kuʋana ʋaIsraeri; iye akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakakukwidzai, ndicikuɓuɗisai paEgipita, nokukuɓuɗisai paimba yoʋuranda;
ndikakurwirai mumaʋoko aʋaEgipita, nomumaʋoko aʋose ʋaikumanikidzai, ndikaʋadziŋga pamberi penyu, ndikakupai nyika yaʋo;
ndikati kwamuri: Ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu; hamufaniri kutya ʋamŋari ʋaʋaAmori, ʋamugere munyika yaʋo; asi hamuna‐kuterera inzwi raŋgu.

Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova wakaȿika, akagara pasi pomuouki wakaŋga uri paOfra, waiʋa waJoashi, muAbiezeri; Gideoni mŋanakomana wake, wakaŋga acipura ɀiyo paciȿiniro cewaini, kuti aɀiʋanze nokuɗa kwaʋaMidiani.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova akaɀiratidza kwaari, akati kwaari: Jehova unewe, iwe murume unesimba noʋumhare.

Gideoni akati kwaari: Haiwa, Ishe waŋgu, kana Jehova anesu, ko iɀi ɀose ɀakagotiwirireiko? Ɀiripiko ɀishamiso ɀake ɀose, ɀataiʋudzwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu, ʋaciti: Jehova haana‐kutikwidza here, acitiɓuɗisa paEgipita? Asi ɀino Jehova wakatirasha, akatiisa mumaʋoko aMidiani.
Ipapo Jehova akatendeʋukira kwaari, akati: Enda nesimba rako iri, undoponesa Israeri pamaʋoko aMidiani, handizi’ni ndakakutuma here?
Akati kwaari: Haiwa, Ishe, ndicagoponesa Israeri neiko? Tarirai rudzi rwaŋgu ruɗuku kunaʋose paManase, neni ndiri muɗuku kunaʋose paimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Jehova akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ini ndicaʋa newe, iwe ucakunda ʋaMidiani somunhu mumŋe.
Akati kwaari: Kana ndawana nyasha pamberi penyu ɀino, ndiratidzei ciratidzo kuti ndimi munotaura neni.
Regai henyu kubva pano, kuȿikira ndadzokera kwamuri, ndikuʋigirei cipo caŋgu, ndiciise pamberi penyu. Iye akati: Ndicagara pano kuȿikira wadzoka ɀe.
Ipapo Gideoni akapinda, akandogadzira mbudzana neɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa ɀeefa
Asi mutumŋa waJehova akati kwaari: Tora nyama neɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, uɀiise paɗombo iri, ugoɗurura ʋo muto. Iye akaita saiɀoɀo.

Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova ndokutambanudza muromo wetȿimbo, yakaŋga iri muruʋoko rwake, akagunɀa nyama neɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa, mŋoto ukaɓuɗa paɗombo, ukapedza nyama neɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa. Mutumŋa waJehova ndokunyaŋgarika pamberi pake.
Ipapo Gideoni akaʋona kuti mutumŋa waJehova. Gideoni akati: Haiwa, Jehova Mŋari! nokuti ndaʋona mutumŋa waJehova ɀiso ɀakatarisana.
Asi Jehova wakati kwaari: Rugare ŋgaruʋe newe, usatya, hauŋgafi.
Ipapo Gideoni akaʋakira’po Jehova artari, akaitumidza zita rinonzi Jehova‐sharomi; iciri’po paOfra raʋaAbiezeri kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino noʋusiku ibgobgo Jehova akati kwaari: Tora nzombe yaɓaɓa ʋako, iya yecipiri inamakore manomŋe, uputse artari yaBaari yaɓaɓa ʋako, uteme ʋo ɗanda rokunamata naro riri’po.
Uʋakire Jehova Mŋari wako artari pamsoro penhare iyi, nomutoʋo wakafanira, ugotora nzombe iyo yecipiri, uɓayire cipiriso cinopiswa nehuni dzeɗanda rokunamata naro raunofanira kutema.
Ipapo Gideoni akatora ʋarume ʋanegumi kuʋaranda ʋake, akaita seɀaakaʋudzwa naJehova; asi haana‐kuita iɀoɀo masikati, asi wakaɀiita ʋusiku, nokuti wakatya ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake naʋarume ʋeguta.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeguta ʋakati ʋacimuka maŋgwanani, ʋakaʋona artari yaBaari yaputswa, neɗanda rokunamata naro raiʋa’po ratemŋa, nenzombe yecipiri yaɓayirwa paartari yakaŋga yaʋakwa’po.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Ndianiko wakaita cinhu ici? Ʋakati ʋacinɀera nokubvunzisisa, ɀikanzi: Gideoni mŋanakomana waJoashi, ndiye wakaita cinhu ici.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeguta ʋakati kunaJoashi: Ƃuɗisa mŋanakomana wako, afe, nokuti waputsa artari yaBaari, ʋuye watema ɗanda rokunamata naro raiʋa’po pairi.

Asi Joashi wakati kunaʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacimupopotera: Moɗa kurwira Baari kanhi? Moɗa kumuponesa? Unomurwira ucaʋurawa maŋgwanani ano; kana ari mŋari, ŋgaaɀirwire amene, ɀaakaputsirwa artari yake nomunhu.
Saka nomusi iwoyo akamutumidza zita rinonzi Jerubaari, aciti: Baari ŋgaarwe naye, ɀaakaputsa artari yake.
Ɀino ʋaMidiani ʋose naʋaAmareki naʋana ʋamabvazuʋa ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakayambuka, ʋakadzika matente aʋo pamupata weJezreeri.
Asi Mŋeya waJehova wakaȿika pamsoro paGideoni, akaridza hwamanda, ʋaAbiezeri ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋakamuteʋera.
Akatuma nhume pakati paʋaManase ʋose, naiʋo ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋakamuteʋera; akatuma ʋo nhume kunaAsheri, naZeburuni, naNaftari, naiʋo ʋakakwira kuzosoŋgana naʋo.
Ipapo Gideoni akati kunaMŋari: Kana muciɗa kuponesa Israeri noruʋoko rwaŋgu, seɀamakataura,
tarirai, ndicaisa ɗebge rinemvere paɓuriro; kana kukaʋa neɗoʋa paɗebge ɓedzi, pasi pose pakawoma, ndicaziʋa kuti munoɗa kuponesa Israeri noruʋoko rwaŋgu, seɀamakataura.
Ɀikaʋa saiɀoɀo; nokuti wakamuka maŋgwanani, akambundanidza ɗebge, akaȿina mvura paɗebge, ikazadza mbiya.
Ɀino Gideoni akati kunaMŋari: Regai henyu kunditsamŋira, kana ndikataura ɀe kamŋe cete; nditenderei ndiidze ɀe kamŋe cete neɗebge; ɀino paɗebge ɓedzi paʋe pakawoma, asi pasi pose paʋe neɗoʋa.
Mŋari akaita saiɀoɀo ʋusiku ubgo; nokuti paɗebge ɓedzi pakaŋga pakawoma, asi ɗoʋa rakaŋga riri pasi pose.
Ɀino Jerubaari, ndiye Gideoni, wakamuka maŋgwanani, iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo patsime reHarodi; misasa yaMidiani yakaŋga iri necokumsoro kwaʋo, pacikomo ceMore pamupata.
Jehova akati kunaGideoni: Ʋanhu ʋaunaʋo ʋakawandisa, kuti ndiise ʋaMidiani mumaʋoko aʋo; kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋarege kuɀikudza pamberi paŋgu, ʋaciti: Maʋoko eɗu ndiwo akatiponesa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, enda undoparidza ʋanhu ʋaɀinzwe, uti: Aninani unotya, unoɗeɗera, ŋgaadzoke hake, abve pagomo reGireadi. Ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri ʋakadzoka, ʋakasara ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi.

Ipapo Jehova akati kunaGideoni: Naɀino ʋanhu ʋaciri ʋazhinji; enda naʋo kumvura ndiʋaidze’po; ɀino kana ndikati kwauri: Uyu unofanira kuenda newe, ndiye ucaenda newe; asi kana ndikati kwauri: Uyu haafaniri kuenda newe, iye haaŋgaendi.

Ipapo akaenda naʋanhu kumvura; Jehova akati kunaGideoni: Mumŋe nomumŋe unokapa mvura norurimi seɀinokapa imbga, unofanira kumuisa kurutiʋi ari oga; saiɀoɀo ʋo mumŋe nomumŋe unofugama pamabvi ake pakunwa.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakapa, ʋaciisa maʋoko aʋo kumiromo, ʋakaȿika ʋarume ʋanamazana matatu; asi ʋamŋe ʋose ʋakafugama pamabvi aʋo pakunwa mvura.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaGideoni: Ndicakuponesai naʋarume aʋa ʋanamazana matatu ʋakakapa mvura, nokuisa ʋaMidiani muruʋoko rwako; ʋanhu ʋose ŋgaʋaende haʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe kutente rake.

Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakatora mbuʋa yaʋo mumaʋoko aʋo, nehwamanda dzaʋo; akaendisa ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri, mumŋe nomumŋe kutente rake, asi wakasara naʋanamazana matatu; misasa yaMidiani yakaŋga iri pasi pake mumupata.
Ɀino noʋusiku ubgo Jehova akati kwaari: Simuka, uɓurukire kumisasa, nokuti ndakaʋaisa muruʋoko rwako.
Asi kana ucitya kuɓuruka, uɓuruke kumisasa unaPura muranda wako;
ugondonzwa ɀaʋanotaura; shure kwaiɀoɀo maʋoko ako acasimbiswa kuɓurukira kumisasa. Ipapo akaɓuruka anaPura muranda wake, kuȿikira kumudziʋo waʋarwi, ʋakaŋga ʋari pamisasa.
Ɀino ʋaMidiani naʋaAmareki naʋana ʋose ʋamabvazuʋa ʋakaŋga ʋari mumupata, ʋakawanda semhashu; namakamera aʋo akaŋga asiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa, akaŋga akawanda sejeca riri pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa.

Ɀino Gideoni wakati aȿika, akanzwa munhu wakaŋga acirondedzera kurota kwake kushamŋari yake, akati: Tarira, ndarota hope, ndikaʋona ciŋgwa cakaɓikwa cebari cicikuŋgurukira kumisasa yaMidiani, cikaȿika patente, ndokuriroʋa rikawa; cikaritsindikira, tente rikaʋata pasi.
Shamŋari yake ikapindura, ikati: Hacizi cimŋe cinhu, asi ndiwo munondo waGideoni, mŋanakomana waJoashi, murume waIsraeri; Mŋari wakaisa Midiani nehondo yose muruʋoko rwake.
Ɀino Gideoni wakati acinzwa kurondedzerwa kwokurota uku nokuɗudzirwa kwako, akanamata; akadzokera kumisasa, akati: Simukai, nokuti Jehova wakaisa misasa yaMidiani mumaʋoko enyu.
Ɀino akakamura ʋarume aʋo ʋanamazana matatu, akaita mapoka matatu, akapa mumŋe nomumŋe hwamanda muruʋoko rwake, neɀiroŋgo ɀisineciro, nezhenje mukati meɀiroŋgo.
Akati kwaʋari: Mutarire kwandiri, mugoita seni; tarirai, kana ndiciȿika kumudziʋo wemisasa, seɀandinoita ini, nemi ʋo muite saiɀoɀo.
Kana ndoridza hwamanda ini naʋose ʋandinaʋo, nemi ʋo muridze hwamanda kunhiʋi dzose dzemisasa, muciti:

Naiɀoɀo Gideoni naʋarume ʋanezana ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaȿika kumudziʋo wemisasa pakutaŋga kweŋguʋa yapakati yoʋusiku, ʋacaŋgoisa ʋarindi; ʋakaridza hwamanda, ʋakaputsa ɀiroŋgo ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumaʋoko aʋo.
Ipapo mapoka matatu akaridza hwamanda, ʋakaputsa ɀiroŋgo, ʋakaɓata zhenje mumaʋoko aʋo oruɓoshwe, nehwamanda dzokuridza mumaʋoko aʋo orudyi, ʋakaɗanidzira ʋaciti: Munondo waJehova nowaGideoni!
Ʋakamira mumŋe nomumŋe panɀimbo yake, ʋakakomba misasa; hondo yose ikamhanya, ʋakaridza mhere, ʋakatiza.

Ʋakaridza hwamanda dzinamazana matatu, Jehova akarwisa munondo womumŋe nomumŋe neshamŋari yake, ʋuye nehondo yose; hondo ikatiza kuȿikira paBeti‐shita kurutiʋi rweZerera, kuȿikira kumuganho weAberimehora, paTabati.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋacibva kwaNaftari, nokwaAsheri, nokwaManase, ʋakateʋera Midiani.
Gideoni akatuma nhume panyika yose yamakomo yaEfraimi, akati: Ƃurukai mundorwa naMidiani, muʋataŋgire kugarira nzizi dzemvura kuȿikira paBeti‐bara neJoridani ʋo.

Ʋakaɓata macinda maʋiri aMidiani, Orebi naZeebi, ʋakaʋuraya Orebi paɗombo raOrebi, naZeebi ʋakamuʋuraya paciȿiniro cewaini caZeebi, ʋakateʋera ʋaMidiani; ʋakaʋuya nemisoro yaOrebi naZeebi kunaGideoni mhiri kwaJoridani.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaEfraimi ʋakati kwaari: Watiitireiko, ɀausina‐kutiɗana ŋguʋa yawakandorwa naMidiani? Ʋakamupopotera kwaɀo.
Akati kwaʋari: Ini ɀino ndaiteiko haŋgu, kana ndiciɀifananidza nemi? Handiti ɀakaʋuŋganidzwa naEfraimi ɀinopfuʋura kukohwa kwose kwaAbiezeri here?
Mŋari wakaisa macinda maʋiri aMidiani, Orebi naZeebi, mumaʋoko enyu; ɀino ini ndaigona kuitei ʋo, kana ndiciɀifananidza nemi? Ipapo kutsamŋa kwaʋo kwakanyarara kwaari, aʋaʋudza iɀoɀo.
Gideoni akaȿika paJoridani, akayambuka, iye naʋarume ʋanamazana matatu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo; ʋakaŋga ʋaneta, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋerera haʋo.
Akati kuʋarume ʋeSukoti: Ipai henyu ʋanhu aʋa ʋanonditeʋera mapundu eɀiŋgwa, nokuti ʋaneta; ndinoteʋerera Zeba naZarmuna, madzimambo aMidiani.
Macinda eSukoti akati: Ko Zeba naZarmuna ʋatokundwa newe here, ɀowoti, tipe hondo yako ciŋgwa?
Gideoni akati: Saka, kana Jehova akaisa Zeba naZarmuna muruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndicapura nyama yenyu neminzwa yomurenje norukato.
Akabva’po, akakwira Penueri, akandotaura naʋo saiɀoɀo. Ʋarume ʋePenueri ʋakamupindura seɀakapindura ʋarume ʋeSukoti.
Akataura ʋo naʋarume ʋePenueri, akati: Kana ndikadzoka norugare, ndicaputsa ruȿiŋgo urwu.

Ɀino Zeba naZarmuna ʋakaŋga ʋari Karkori, ʋanehondo dzaʋo ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀishanu; ndiʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakasara pahondo yose yaʋana ʋamabvazuʋa; nokuti ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu, ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋurawa.
Gideoni akakwira nenzira yaʋaigara pamatente, nokumabvazuʋa kweNoba neJogobeha, akakunda hondo; nokuti hondo yakaŋga yakafara.
Ipapo Zeba naZarmuna ʋakatiza, iye akaʋateʋerera; akaɓata madzimambo maʋiri aMidiani, Zeba naZarmuna, akavundusa hondo yose.
Gideoni, mŋanakomana waJoashi, akadzoka pakurwa pamukwidzwa weHeresi.
Akaɓata jaya raʋarume ʋeSukoti, akamubvunzisisa; iye akamunyorera
Akaȿika kuʋarume ʋeSukoti, akati: Tarirai, Zeba naZarmuna, ʋamakandiseka pamsoro paʋo, muciti: Ko Zeba naZarmuna ʋatokundwa newe here, ɀowoti, tipe ʋarume ʋako ʋaneta ciŋgwa?
Ipapo akatora ʋakuru ʋeguta, neminzwa yomurenje norukato, akapura ʋarume ʋeSukoti naɀo.
Akaputsa ruȿiŋgo rwePenueri, akaʋuraya ʋarume ʋeguta.
Ipapo akati kunaZeba naZarmuna: Ʋarume ʋamakaʋuraya paTabori ʋakaŋga ʋakaɗiniko? Ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Seɀamakaita imi, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaŋga ʋakaita iʋo; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga akafanana nomŋana wamambo.
Akati: Ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu, ʋanakomana ʋamai ʋaŋgu; naJehova mupenyu, ɗai makaʋarega ʋari ʋapenyu, ndiŋgaɗai ndisinakukuʋurayai imi.
Ɀino akati kunaJeteri, ɗaŋgwe rake: Simuka, uʋaʋuraye. Asi jaya harina‐kuvomora munondo waro, nokuti rakatya, ɀarakaŋga riciri mukomana.

Ipapo Zeba naZarmuna ʋakati: Simukai imi, mutiʋuraye, nokuti seɀakaita murume, ndiɀo ɀakaita simba rake. Ipapo Gideoni akasimuka, akaʋuraya Zeba naZarmuna, akatora ɀishoŋgo ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana nomŋedzi, ɀakaŋga ɀiri pamitsipa yamakamera aʋo.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kunaGideoni: Mutiɓate ʋushe imi nomŋanakomana wenyu, nomŋanakomana womŋanakomana wenyu ʋo, nokuti makatiponesa pamaʋoko aʋaMidiani.
Gideoni akati kwaʋari: Ini handiŋgakuɓatiyi ʋushe, kunyaŋge mŋanakomana waŋgu haaŋgakuɓatiyi ʋushe; Jehova ndiye ucakuɓatai.

Gideoni akati kwaʋari: Ndinoɗa kukumbira cinhu cimŋe kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ŋgaandipe ɀindori ɀemhino ɀiri pakati peɀakapambga ɀake. (Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀindori ɀemhino ɀendarama, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaIshmaeri.)
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Ticakupai iɀo nomŋoyo wose! Ipapo ʋakawarira ŋguʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe akakandira’po ɀindori ɀemhino, ɀakaŋga ɀiri pakati peɀakapambga ɀaʋo.
Ɀindori iɀo ɀemhino ɀendarama, ɀaakakumbira kwaʋari, pakurema kwaɀo ɀikaȿika mashekeri
Gideoni akaita efodi naɀo, akaiisa muguta rake, ipo paOfra; ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakapata ʋaciiteʋera ipapo; ukaʋa musuŋgo kunaGideoni nokunaʋeimba yake.
Saiɀoɀo ʋaMidiani ʋakakundwa pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri, haʋana‐kuzosimudza ɀe misoro yaʋo. Nyika ikazorora makore anamakumi manna pamazuʋa aGideoni.
Ɀino Jerubaari, mŋanakomana waJoashi, akandogara mumba make.
Gideoni wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋakaŋga ʋaɓerekwa naye, nokuti wakaŋga anaʋakadzi ʋazhinji;
ʋuye nomuroŋgo wake, wakaŋga ari paShekemi, wakamuɓerekera mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Abimereki.
Gideoni, mŋanakomana waJoashi, akafa akwegura, akaʋigwa mubgiro bgaJoashi ɓaɓa ʋake paOfra raʋaAbiezeri.
Ɀino Gideoni wakati acaŋgofa, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzokera shure, ʋakapata ʋaciteʋera ʋaBaari, ʋakaita Baari‐beriti mŋari waʋo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasaraŋgarira Jehova Mŋari waʋo, iye wakaŋga aʋarwira mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose kunhiʋi dzose;
ʋuye haʋana‐kuitira ʋeimba yaJerubaari, iye Gideoni, ɀakanaka pamsoro peɀose ɀakanaka ɀaakaŋga aitira ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Abimereki, mŋanakomana waJerubaari, wakaenda Shekemi, kunamadzisekuru ake, akataurirana naʋo ʋuye norudzi rwose rweimba yaɓaɓa ʋamai ʋake, akati:

Taurai henyu, ʋarume ʋose ʋeShekemi ʋanzwe, muti: Cinhu cakanaka ndecipiko, kuti muɓatwe ʋushe naʋanakomana ʋose ʋaJerubaari ʋanoȿika ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe, kana muɓatwe nomunhu mumŋe here? Raŋgarirai ʋo kuti ini ndiri fupa renyu nenyama yenyu.
Ɀino madzisekuru ake akataura mashoko awa ose pamsoro pake, ʋarume ʋeShekemi ʋaciɀinzwa; mŋoyo yaʋo ikaɗa kuteʋera Abimereki, nokuti ʋakati: Ihama yeɗu.
Ʋakamupa mari yesirveri yakaȿika

Akaenda kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake paOfra, akaʋuraya pabge rimŋe ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJerubaari, ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanamakumi manomŋe; asi Jotami, mŋanakomana worugotwe waJerubaari wakapukunyuka, nokuti wakaŋga aʋanda.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋeShekemi ʋakaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete naʋose ʋeimba yaMiro, ʋakandoita Abimereki mambo pamuouki weshoŋgwe yakamiswa paShekemi.
Ʋakati ʋaʋudza Jotami iɀoɀo, iye akaenda, akandomira pamsoro pegomo reGerizimi, akaɗana nenzwi guru, akati kwaʋari: Mundinzwei, imi ʋarume ʋeShekemi, kuti Mŋari akunzwei ʋo imi.
Imŋe ŋguʋa miti yakandoɀizodzera mambo wayo; ikati kumuorivi: Iʋa mambo weɗu iwe.
Asi muorivi wakati kwairi: Ko ini ndiŋgarega mafuta aŋgu, anorumbidzwa naMŋari naʋanhu mandiri ndipepere uko nokoko pamsoro pemiti here?
Ɀino miti ikati kumuʋonde: Ʋuya iwe, uʋe mambo weɗu.
Asi muʋonde wakati kwairi: Ko ini ndiŋgarega kutapira kwaŋgu nemicero yaŋgu yakanaka, ndipepere uko nokoko pamsoro pemiti here?
Ɀino miti ikati kumuzambiriŋga: Ʋuya iwe, uʋe mambo weɗu.
Muzambiriŋga ukati kwairi: Ko ini ndiŋgarega waini yaŋgu, inofadza Mŋari naʋanhu, ndipepere uko nokoko pamsoro pemiti here?
Ipapo miti yose yakati kurukato: Ʋuya iwe, uʋe mambo weɗu.
Rukato rukati kumiti: Kana mukandizodza kuti ndiʋe mambo wenyu ɀirokwaɀo, ciʋuyai muʋande pamumvuri waŋgu; kana musiŋgaɗi, mŋoto ŋgauɓuɗe parukato, uparadze misidari yeRebanoni.
Saka ɀino kana makaita ɀakanaka neɀakarurama, ɀamakaita Abimereki mambo wenyu, ʋuye kana makaitira Jerubaari neimba yake ɀakanaka, nokumuitira seɀaakafanirwa pamsoro peɀaakakuitirai,
(nokuti ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakakurwirai, ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri ʋupenyu bgaʋo, ʋakakurwirai mumaʋoko aMidiani;

imi mukamukira nhasi imba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, mukaʋuraya pabge rimŋe ʋanakomana ʋake, ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe, mukaita Abimereki, mŋanakomana womurandakadzi wake, mambo waʋarume ʋeShekemi, ɀairi hama yenyu;)
kana makaitira Jerubaari neimba yake ɀakanaka neɀakarurama nhasi, cifarirai henyu Abimereki, naiye akufarirei ʋo;
asi kana ɀisina‐kunaka, mŋoto ŋgauɓuɗe kunaAbimereki, uparadze ʋarume ʋeShekemi, naʋeimba yaMiro; ʋuye mŋoto ŋgauɓuɗe kuʋarume ʋeShekemi, naʋeimba yaMiro, uparadze Abimereki.
Ipapo Jotami akamhanya, akatiza, akandogara paBeeri, nokuti wakatya Abimereki mukuru wake.
Abimereki akaɓata ʋushe paʋaIsraeri makore matatu.
Mŋari akazotuma mŋeya wakaipa pakati paAbimereki naʋarume ʋeShekemi; ʋarume ʋeShekemi ʋakanyeŋgera Abimereki;

kuti ɀakashata ɀakaitirwa ʋanakomana ʋaJerubaari ʋanamakumi manomŋe ɀitsibge, neropa raʋo ritsibge kunaAbimereki, munuŋuna waʋo wakaʋaʋuraya, nokuʋarume ʋeShekemi ʋakaŋga ʋasimbisa maʋoko ake kuti aʋuraye ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ʋarume ʋeShekemi ʋakaisa ʋanhu ʋakamuʋandira pamsoro pamakomo, ʋakapamba ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacipfuʋura kwaʋari nenzira iyo; Abimereki akaʋudzwa iɀoɀo.
Ɀino Gaari mŋanakomana waEbedi, wakaʋuya nehama dzake, ʋakaenda Shekemi; ʋarume ʋeShekemi ʋakaʋimba naye.
Ʋakaɓuɗira kuminda yaʋo, ʋakakohwa mazambiriŋga aʋo, ʋakatsika‐tsika

Ɀino Gaari mŋanakomana waEbedi, akati: Abimereki ndianiko, Shekemi ndianiko, kuti timushumire? Haazi mŋanakomana waJerubaari here? NaZeburi haazi munyai wake here? Imi shumirai henyu ʋarume ʋaHamori, ɓaɓa ʋaShekemi; asi isu ticamushumireiko?
Haiwa, ɗai ʋanhu aʋa ʋaiʋa muruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndaidziŋga Abimereki. Ɀino akati kunaAbimereki: Wedzera hondo yako, uɓuɗe kuzorwa.
Ɀino Zeburi muɓati weguta, wakati acinzwa mashoko aGaari mŋanakomana waEbedi, akatsamŋa kwaɀo.
Akatuma nhume kunaAbimereki nokunyeŋgera, akati: Tarira, Gaari, mŋanakomana waEbedi nehama dzake ʋaȿika paShekemi; tarira ʋanokurudzira guta kurwa newe.
Saka ɀino cimuka ʋusiku, iwe naʋanhu ʋaunaʋo, muʋande musaŋgo.
Ɀino maŋgwanani, zuʋa ricaŋgoɓuɗa, unofanira kufumira kundoʋamba guta; kana iye naʋanhu ʋaanaʋo ʋaciɓuɗa kuzorwa newe, iwe uŋgaita naʋo seɀaunoɗa.
Ipapo Abimereki akamuka ʋusiku, iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakandoʋandira Shekemi ʋakaita mapoka manna.
Ɀino Gaari, mŋanakomana waEbedi, akamira paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo reguta; Abimereki akasimuka, iye naʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo paʋakaŋga ʋakaʋandira.
Ɀino Gaari wakati aciʋona ʋanhu, akati kunaZeburi: Tarira, kunaʋanhu ʋanoɓuruka ʋacibva kumsoro kumakomo. Zeburi akati kwaari: Unoʋona hako mimvuri yamakomo, yakafanana naʋanhu.
Gaari akapamhidza ɀe, akati: Tarira, kunaʋanhu ʋanoɓuruka ʋacibva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nerimŋe ɓoka rinoʋuya ricibva nenzira yomuouki weMeonenimi.
Ipapo Zeburi akati kwaari: Ɀino muromo wako uripi, ɀawakaŋga uciti: Abimereki ndianiko, kuti timushumire? Ko aʋa haʋazi ʋanhu aʋo ʋawakaɀidza here? Ɀino ciɓuruka hako undorwa naʋo.
Ipapo Gaari akaɓuɗa pamberi paʋarume ʋeShekemi, akandorwa naAbimereki.
Abimereki akadziŋgana naye, akatiza pamberi pake, ʋazhinji ʋakaʋurawa kuȿikira paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo.
Abimereki akagara paAruma, Zeburi akadziŋga Gaari nehama dzake, kuti ʋarege kuzogara paShekemi.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋanhu ʋakaɓuɗa kusaŋgo; ʋakaʋudza Abimereki.
Iye akatora ʋanhu akaʋakamura, akaita mapoka matatu, akandoʋaʋandira kusaŋgo; akatarira, akaʋona ʋanhu ʋaciɓuɗa muguta, akasimuka, akandorwa naʋo, akaʋaʋuraya.
Abimereki namapoka akaŋga anaye, ʋakamhanya, ʋakandomira paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo reguta; namapoka maʋiri akamhanyira kunaʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari kusaŋgo, ʋakaʋaʋuraya.
Abimereki akarwa neguta musi iwoyo wose, akakunda guta, akaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo; akaputsa guta, ndokurikusha munyu.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋoruȿiŋgo rweShekemi ʋakati ʋaɀinzwa, ʋakapinda munhare, mumba maEri‐beriti.
Abimereki akaʋudzwa kuti ʋarume ʋose ʋoruȿiŋgo rweShekemi ʋaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete.

Abimereki akakwira pagomo reZarmoni, iye naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo; Abimereki akatora masanhu muruʋoko rwake, akatema ɗaʋi romuti, akarisimudza, akariisa pafudzi rake; akati kuʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo: Kurumidzai, muite seɀamakaʋona ndiciita ini.

Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakatema mumŋe nomumŋe ɗaʋi rake, ʋakateʋera Abimereki; ʋakaaisa kunhare, ʋakapisa nhare nomŋoto, iʋo ʋari’mo, naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari muruȿiŋgo rweShekemi ʋakafa, ʋaneŋge curu cimŋe caʋarume naʋakadzi.
Ɀino Abimereki akaenda Tebezi, akamisa misasa yaʋo paTebezi, akarikunda.
Asi mukati meguta makaŋga munoruȿiŋgo rwakaŋga rwakasimba, ʋarume naʋakadzi ʋose ʋakatizira’mo, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari muguta ʋakaɀipfigira’mo, ʋakakwira kuɗeŋga roruȿiŋgo.
Abimereki akaȿika paruȿiŋgo, akarwa narwo, akasweɗera pedyo nomukoʋa woruȿiŋgo, kuti arupise nomŋoto.
Ipapo mumŋe mukadzi akakanda guyo pamusoro waAbimereki, akaputsa ɗehenya rake.
Ipapo akakurumidza kuɗana jaya raitakura nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, akati kwariri: Vomora munondo wako, undiʋuraye, kuti ʋanhu ʋarege kuzoti: Wakaʋurawa nomukadzi. Jaya rake rikamuɓaya, akafa.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti Abimereki wafa, ʋakaenda mumŋe nomumŋe kumba kwake.
Saiɀoɀo Mŋari akatsiʋa ɀakashata ɀaAbimereki ɀaakaitira ɓaɓa ʋake, ɀaakaʋuraya ʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake ʋanamakumi manomŋe,
neɀakashata ɀose ɀaʋarume ʋeShekemi ɀakatsibga naMŋari kwaʋari; kutuka kwaJotami mŋanakomana waJerubaari, kukaitika kwaʋari.
Shure kwaAbimereki, Tora mŋanakomana waPua, mŋanakomana waDodo, murume waIsakari, wakamuka akaponesa Israeri; iye waigara paShamiri panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi.
Iye akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri makore anamakumi maʋiri namatatu, akafa; akaʋigwa paShamiri.
Shure kwake Jairi muGireadi wakamuka, iye akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri makore anamakumi maʋiri namaʋiri.
Wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanamakumi matatu, ʋaitaȿa ʋana ʋemboŋgoro ʋanamakumi matatu, ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋanamaguta anamakumi matatu, anonzi Havori‐jairi kuȿikira nhasi, ari munyika yeGireadi.
Jairi akafa, akaʋigwa paKamoni.

Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀe ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ʋakashumira ʋaBaari naʋaAshtaroti naʋamŋari ʋaʋaSiria, naʋamŋari ʋeSidoni, naʋaMŋari ʋaMoabi, naʋamŋari ʋaʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋamŋari ʋaʋaFiristia; ʋakarasha Jehova, ʋakasamushumira.
Ipapo kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira ʋaIsraeri, akaʋateŋgesa mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia, nomumaʋoko aʋana ʋaAmoni.
Iʋo ʋakanetsa nokumanikidza ʋana ʋaIsraeri gore iro; ʋakamanikidza ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere mhiri kwaJoridani munyika yaʋaAmori, yaiʋa paGireadi, makore anegumi namasere.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakayambuka Joridani, ʋakarwa ʋo naʋaJuda, naʋaBenjamini, ʋuye neimba yaʋaEfraimi; naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakamanikidzwa kwaɀo.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakacema kunaJehova, ʋakati: Takakutadzirai imi, nokuti takarasha Mŋari weɗu, tikashumira ʋaBaari.
Jehova akati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Handina‐kukuponesai here paʋaEgipita, naʋaAmori, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋaFiristia?
ƲaSidoni, naʋaAmareki, naʋaMaoni ʋakakutambudzai ʋo, imi mukacema kwandiri, ndikakuponesai pamaʋoko aʋo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro makandirasha, mukandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari; naiɀoɀo handina‐kukuponesai ɀe.
Endai mundocema henyu kuʋamŋari ʋamakaɀisanaŋgurira; iʋo ŋgaʋakuponesei paŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwenyu.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kunaJehova: Takatadza; tiitirei henyu seɀamunofuŋga, asi tinokumbira kuti mutirwirei henyu nhasi.
Ipapo ʋakarasha ʋamŋari ʋatorwa ʋakaŋga ʋari pakati paʋo, ʋakashumira Jehova; mŋoyo wake ukacema pamsoro pokutambudzika kwaʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana, ʋakadzika matente aʋo paGireadi. Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋo, ʋakadzika matente aʋo paMizpa.
Ɀino ʋanhu, iwo macinda aGireadi, ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Ndianiko munhu ucataŋga kurwa naʋana ʋaAmoni? Iye ucaʋa mukuru waʋose ʋagere Gireadi.
Ɀino Jefta muGireadi, wakaŋga ari munhu unesimba noʋumhare, asi wakaŋga ari mŋanakomana wecifeʋe; Gireadi ndiye wakaɓereka Jefta.
Mukadzi waGireadi akamuɓerekera ʋanakomana; ɀino ʋanakomana ʋomukadzi wake ʋakati ʋakura, ʋakadziŋga Jefta, ʋakati kwaari: Hauŋgadyi nhaka mumba maɓaɓa ʋeɗu, nokuti uri mŋanakomana womumŋe mukadzi.
Ipapo Jefta akatiza ʋanuŋuna ʋake, akandogara panyika yeTobi; ʋarume ʋakaipa ʋakaʋuŋganira kunaJefta, ʋakasiɓuɗa naye
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yapfuʋura, ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakandorwa naʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakati ʋorwa naʋaIsraeri, ʋakuru ʋeGireadi ʋakandotora Jefta panyika yeTobi.
Ʋakati kunaJefta: Ʋuya, uʋe ishe weɗu, kuti tindorwa naʋana ʋaAmoni.
Jefta akati kuʋakuru ʋeGireadi: Hamunakundiʋeŋga, mukandidziŋga mumba maɓaɓa ʋaŋgu here? Ɀino maʋuyireiko kwandiri, ɀamaʋa munjodzi?
Ʋakuru ʋeGireadi ʋakati kunaJefta: Naiɀoɀo tadzokera kwauri, kuti uende nesu kundorwa naʋana ʋaAmoni, iwe ugoʋa mukuru weɗu nowaʋose ʋagere Gireadi.
Jefta akati kuʋakuru ʋeGireadi: Kana mucindidzosa kuti ndirwe naʋana ʋaAmoni, kana Jehova akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aŋgu, ndicaʋa mukuru wenyu here?
Ʋakuru ʋeGireadi ʋakati kuna Jefta: Jehova ŋgaaʋe capupu pakati peɗu; ɀirokwaɀo ticaita seɀawataura iwe.
Ɀino Jefta akaenda naʋakuru ʋeGireadi, ʋanhu ʋakamuita mukuru nashe waʋo; Jefta akataura mashoko ake ose pamberi paJehova paMizpa.
Ɀino Jefta akatuma nhume kunamambo waʋana ʋaAmoni, akati: Mhoȿa yako ndeyeiko, ɀawaʋuya kuzorwa neni nenyika yaŋgu?

Mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni akapindura nhume dzaJefta, akati: Nokuti ʋaIsraeri ʋakatora nyika yaŋgu, ŋguʋa yaʋakabva Egipita, kubva paArnoni kusikira paJaboki neJoridani; saka ɀino cidzosai nyika idzo norugare.
Ipapo Jefta akatuma ɀe nhume kunamambo waʋana ʋaAmoni,
akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJefta: ƲaIsraeri haʋana‐kutora nyika yaMoabi, kana nyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni;
asi paŋguʋa yakakwira ʋaIsraeri ʋacibva Egipita, ʋakafamba murenje kuȿikira paGuŋgwa Dɀuku, ʋakaȿika paKadeshi,

ʋaIsraeri ʋakatuma nhume kunamambo waEdomi, ʋaciti: Nditenderei henyu kupfuʋura napanyika yenyu; asi mambo waEdomi wakaramba kunzwa. Saiɀoɀo akatuma ʋo nhume kunamambo waMoabi; asi iye wakaramba; ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara paKadeshi.

Ipapo ʋakafamba nomurenje, ʋakapota nyika yaEdomi, nenyika yaMoabi, ʋakaenda nokumabvazuʋa enyika yaMoabi, ʋakadzika matente aʋo necemhiri kwaArnoni; asi haʋana‐kuɗarika muganho waMoabi, nokuti Arnoni waiʋa muganho waMoabi.
Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋakatuma nhume kunaSihoni, mambo waʋaAmori, mambo weHeshboni; ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kwaari: Titenderei henyu kupfuʋura napanyika yenyu, kuȿikira panɀimbo yeɗu.
Asi Sihoni haana‐kutenda ʋaIsraeri kuti ʋaɗarike muganho wake; Sihoni akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋake ʋose, akandodzika matente ake paJahazi, akarwa naʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri akaisa Sihoni naʋanhu ʋake ʋose mumaʋoko aʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋaʋuraya; naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakatora nyika yose yaʋaAmori, ʋakaŋga ʋagere munyika iyo, ikaʋa yaʋo.
Nyika yose yaʋaAmori ikaʋa yaʋo, kubva paArnoni kuȿikira paJaboki, kubva kurenje, kuȿikira paJoridani.
Saka ɀino Jehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri ndiye wakatorera ʋaAmori nyika yaʋo pamberi paʋanhu ʋake ʋaIsraeri, ɀino imi moɗa kuʋatorera ɀe here?
Ko imi hamuŋgatori iɀo ɀamunopiwa namŋari wenyu Kemoshi here, nesu ʋo titore nyika yaʋose ʋanodziŋgwa pamberi peɗu naJehova Mŋari weɗu?
Ko ɀino imi makanaka kupfuʋura Baraki mŋanakomana waZipori, mambo waMoabi here? Iye wakatoŋgopopotera ʋaIsraeri, kana kurwa naʋo here?
Ŋguʋa yakagara ʋaIsraeri paHeshboni nemisha yaro, napaAroeri nemisha yaro, napamaguta ose ari parutiʋi rwaArnoni, makore anamazana matatu, makaregereiko kuʋatorera
Naiɀoɀo ini handinakukutadzira, asi ndiwe unondiitira ɀakaipa, uciɗa kurwa neni; Jehova, iye Mutoŋgi, ŋgaatoŋge nhasi pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋana ʋaAmoni.
Asi mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni haana‐kuterera mashoko aJefta, aakatuma kwaari.
Ɀino Mŋeya waJehova wakaʋuya pamsoro paJefta, akapfuʋura kunyika yaGireadi neyaManase, akapfuʋura ʋo napaMizpe paGireadi, akabva paMizpe paGireadi, akapfuʋura kuʋana ʋaAmoni.
Jefta akapikira Jehova mhiko, akati: Kana mukaisa ʋana ʋaAmoni mumaʋoko aŋgu,
ipapo aninani unoɓuɗa pamikoʋa yeimba yaŋgu kuzosoŋgana neni, musi wandinodzoka norugare ndicibva kuʋana ʋaAmoni, ucaʋa waJehova; ndicaʋuya naye, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa.
Ipapo Jefta akapfuʋurira kuʋana ʋaAmoni, akandorwa naʋo; Jehova akaʋaisa mumaʋoko ake.
Akaʋaparadza nokuparadza kukuru kwaɀo, kubva paAroeri kuȿikira paMiniti, maguta anamakumi maʋiri, nokuȿikira paAberi‐keramimi. Ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakakundwa saiɀoɀo pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Jefta akaȿika paMizpa paimba yake, ɀino tarira, mukunda wake akaɓuɗa kuzosoŋgana naye namakandira, nokupembera. Iye wakaŋga ari mŋana wake mumŋe cete, wakaŋga asinomumŋe mŋana kunze kwake, kana mŋanakomana, kana mŋanasikana.

Ɀino wakati acimuʋona, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akati: Haiwa! mukunda waŋgu! iwe wandiʋonesa nhamo kwaɀo, iwe uri pakati paʋanondiisa panjodzi; nokuti ndakashamisa muromo waŋgu kunaJehova, handiŋgagoni kudzoka.
Iye akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, makashamisa muromo wenyu kunaJehova; ndiitirei henyu seɀamakataura, nokuti Jehova wakakutsiʋirai kwaɀo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, iʋo ʋana ʋaAmoni.
Akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Nditenderei henyu cinhu ici: Nditenderei mŋedzi miʋiri, ndiende, ndiɓurukire kumakomo, ndiceme ʋumhandara bgaŋgu, ini neshamŋari dzaŋgu.
Iʋo ʋakati: Cienda hako. Akamutendera mŋedzi miʋiri; akaenda, iye neshamŋari dzake, akandocema ʋumhandara bgake kumakomo.
Ɀino mŋedzi miʋiri yakati yapera, akadzokera kunaɓaɓa ʋake, iʋo ʋakamuitira seɀaʋakaŋga ʋapika; wakaŋga asina‐kuziʋa murume. Ikazoʋa tsika pakati paʋaIsraeri,
kuti ʋakunda ʋaIsraeri ʋaende makore ose mazuʋa manna pagore kundocema mukunda waJefta muGireadi.

Ɀino ʋarume ʋaEfraimi ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakapfuʋurira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ʋakati kunaJefta: Wakapfuʋurireiko kundorwa naʋana ʋaAmoni, ukasatiɗana isu kuti tiende ʋo newe? Ticapisa imba yako pamsoro pako nomŋoto.
Jefta akati kwaʋari: Ini naʋanhu ʋaŋgu takaŋga ticitambudzika kwaɀo naʋana ʋaAmoni; ɀino paŋguʋa yandakakuɗanai, imi hamuna‐kundiponesa pamaʋoko aʋo.

Ɀino ndakati ndiciʋona kuti hamuna‐kundiponesa, handina‐kuraŋgarira ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, asi ndakapfuʋura ndikandorwa naʋana ʋaAmoni, Jehova akaʋaisa muruʋoko rwaŋgu; ɀino makwirireiko nhasi kwandiri kuzorwa neni?

Ipapo Jefta akaʋuŋganidza ʋarume ʋose ʋeGireadi, akarwa naEfraimi, ʋarume ʋeGireadi ʋakakunda Efraimi, nokuti ʋakati: Muri ʋanhu ʋakatiza kunaEfraimi, imi ʋaGireadi, mucigara pakati paEfraimi, napakati paManase.

Ipapo ʋaGireadi ʋakandogarira mazambuko aJoridani paiyambukira ʋaEfraimi. Ɀino kana mumŋe waʋakatiza kunaEfraimi akati: Nditenderei kuti ndiyambuke, ʋarume ʋeGireadi ndokuti kwaari: Uri muEfraimi here? Kana akati, kwete,

ipapo ʋakati kwaari: Ɀino citi: Shiboreti; iye ndokuti: Siboreti, nokusagona kureʋa kwaɀo; ipapo ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamuʋuraya pamazambuko aJoridani; neŋguʋa iyo ʋaEfraimi ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀiʋiri ʋakaʋurawa.
Jefta akatoŋga Israeri makore matanhatu. Ipapo Jefta muGireadi akafa, akaʋigwa munerimŋe ramaguta aGireadi.
Shure kwake Ibzani weBeti‐rehemi wakatoŋga Israeri.

Iye wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanamakumi matatu; ʋanasikana ʋake ʋanamakumi matatu akaʋatuma ʋakandowanikwa kumŋe, akandotora ɀe kumŋe ʋamŋe ʋanasikana ʋanamakumi matatu ʋakawanikwa naʋanakomana ʋake. Iye akatoŋga Israeri makore manomŋe.
Ibzani akafa, akaʋigwa paBeti‐rehemi.
Shure kwake Eroni muZeburuni wakatoŋga Israeri; akatoŋga Israeri makore anegumi.
Eroni muZeburuni akafa, akaʋigwa paAjaroni, panyika yaZeburuni.
Shure kwake Abdoni mŋanakomana waHireri, muPiratoni, wakatoŋga Israeri.
Iye wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanamakumi manna, naʋazukuru ʋanamakumi matatu, ʋaitaȿa ʋana ʋembongoro ʋanamakumi manomŋe; iye akatoŋga Israeri makore masere.
Abdoni mŋanakomana waHireri, muPiratoni, akafa, akaʋigwa paPiratoni, panyika yaEfraimi, panyika yamakomo yaʋaAmareki.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita ɀe ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, Jehova akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia makore anamakumi manna.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe murume weZora, weimba yaDani, wainzi Manoa; mukadzi wake wakaŋga asinomŋanakomana, asiŋgaɓereki.
Mutumŋa waJehova akaɀiratidza kumukadzi uyu, akati kwaari: Tarira ɀino, iwe hauɓereki, haunomŋana; asi ucaʋa nemimba, nokuɓereka mŋanakomana.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cicenjera hako kuti urege kunwa waini, kana ɀimŋe ɀinoɓata, kana kudya cinhu cisina‐kunaka;

nokuti tarira, ucaʋa nemimba, nokuɓereka mŋanakomana; musoro wake haufaniri kuʋeʋurwa neciȿo, nokuti mŋana uyu unofanira kuʋa muNaziri waMŋari kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋake; iye ucataŋga kuponesa Israeri pamaʋoko aʋaFiristia.

Ɀino mukadzi akandoʋudza murume wake, akati: Munhu waMŋari wakaʋuya kwandiri, ciso cake cakaŋga cakafanana neciso comutumŋa waMŋari, caityisa kwaɀo; handina‐kumubvunza kuti unobvepi, ʋuye iye haana‐kundiʋudza zita rake;

asi wakati kwandiri: Tarira, ucaʋa nemimba, nokuɓereka mŋanakomana; ɀino cirega kunwa waini, kana ɀimŋe ɀinoɓata, usadya cinhu cisina‐kunaka, nokuti mŋana uyu ucaʋa muNaziri waMŋari kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋake kuȿikira pazuʋa rokufa kwake.
Ipapo Manoa akakumbira kunaJehova, akati: Jehova, ndinokumbira kuti munhu waMŋari wamakatuma, aʋuye ɀe kwatiri, atidzidzise ɀatinofanira kuitira mŋana ucazoɀarwa.
Jehova akanzwa inzwi raManoa; mutumŋa waMŋari akaʋuya ɀe kumukadzi agere pamunda; asi Manoa, murume wake, wakaŋga asi’ko kwaari.
Mukadzi akakurumidza, akamhanya, akandoʋudza murume wake, akati kwaari: Tarira, murume uya waɀiratidza ɀe kwandiri, iye wakaɗeya kuʋuya kwandiri musi uya.
Manoa akasimuka, akateʋera mukadz, wake akaȿika kumurume, akati kwaari: Ndiwe murume wakataura nomukadzi here? Iye akati: Ndini.
Manoa akati: Ɀino kana mashoko enyu aciŋge aitika, tsika dzomŋana dzinofanira kuʋa dzipi, neɓasa rake rinofanira kuʋa reiko?
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kunaManoa: Mukadzi ŋgaacenjere pamsoro peɀose ɀandakamuʋudza.
Haafaniri kudya cinhu cipi necipi cinobva pamuti womuzambiriŋga; haafaniri kunwa waini, kana ɀimŋe ɀinoɓata, kana kudya cinhu cisina‐kunaka; ŋgaaceŋgete ɀose ɀandakamuraira.
Manoa akati kumutumŋa waJehova: Titenderei henyu tikunonosei, tikugadzirirei mbudzana.

Mutumŋa waJehova akati kunaManoa: Kunyaŋge ukandinonosa, handiŋgadyi ciŋgwa cako; kana ukaɗa kugadzira cipiriso cinopiswa, unofanira kucipa Jehova. Nokuti Manoa wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi kuti mutumŋa waJehova.
Manoa akati kumutumŋa waJehova: Zita renyu ndianiko? Kuti tiziʋe kukukudzai kana mashoko enyu acizoitika?
Mutumŋa waJehova akati kwaari: Unondibvunzireiko zita raŋgu, ɀarinoshamisa?
Ipapo Manoa akatora mbudzana pamŋe cete necipiriso ceɀokudya, akaɀiɓayira Jehova paɗombo; mutumŋa akaita cinhu cinoshamisa, Manoa nomukadzi wake ʋakataririra.
Nokuti muraɀo womŋoto wakati ucikwira kuɗeŋga ucibva paartari, mutumŋa waJehova ndokukwira mumuraɀo weartari, Manoa nomukadzi wake ʋakataririra; ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo.
Asi mutumŋa waJehova haana‐kuzoɀiratidza ɀe kunaManoa, kana kumukadzi wake. Ipapo Manoa akaziʋa kuti mutumŋa waJehova.
Ɀino Manoa akati kumukadzi wake: Ticafa ɀirokwaɀo, nokuti takaʋona Mŋari.

Asi mukadzi wake wakati kwaari: Ƌai Jehova aiɗa kutiʋuraya, uŋgaɗai asina‐kugamucira cipiriso cinopiswa necipiriso ceɀokudya pamaʋoko eɗu; uŋgaɗai asina‐kutiratidza ɀinhu iɀi ɀose, kana kutiʋudza mashoko akaɗai paŋguʋa ino.
Ɀino mukadzi akapona mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Samsoni; mŋana akakura, Jehova akamuropafadza.
Mŋeya waJehova akataŋga kumumutsa paMahane‐dani, pakati peZora neEshtaori.
Ɀino Samsoni wakaɓurukira Timna, akaʋona paTimna mukadzi pakati paʋakunda ʋaʋaFiristia.
Akakwira akandoʋudza ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, akati: Ndaʋona mukadzi paTimna pakati paʋakunda ʋaʋaFiristia; naiɀoɀo ɀino nditorerei iye, aʋe mukadzi waŋgu.

Ipapo ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Ko pakati paʋakunda ʋehama dzako, kana pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋose, hapanomukadzi here, ɀowoɗa‐kundoɀitorera mukadzi pakati paʋaFiristia ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa? Samsoni akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Nditorerei iye, nokuti unondifadza kwaɀo.
Asi ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake haʋana‐kuziʋa kuti ɀakaŋga ɀicibva kunaJehova, nokuti wakaŋga acitȿaka mhaka yokurwa naʋaFiristia. Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓata Israeri.
Ɀino Samsoni wakaɓurukira Timna naɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, ʋakaȿika paminda yemizambiriŋga paTimna; ʋonei mŋana weshumba ukamuʋombera.
Ipapo Mŋeya waJehova wakaʋuya pamsoro pake nesimba guru, akaibvambura sembudzana; ɀino wakaŋga asinecinhu muruʋoko rwake; asi haana‐kuʋudza ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake ɀaakaŋga aita.
Akaɓuruka, akandotaura nomukadzi, iye akafadza Samsoni kwaɀo.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yapfuʋura, akadzoka kuzomutora, akatsauka kuzoʋona citunha ceshumba, ndokuʋona ɓumha renyuci mucitunha ceshumba, noʋuci.
Akabgutora namaʋoko ake, akaenda acidya; akaȿika kunaɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, akaʋapa ʋakadya ʋo; asi haana‐kuʋaʋudza kuti wakaŋga aɓura ʋuci mucitunha ceshumba.
Ƃaɓa ʋake ʋakaɓurukira kumukadzi, Samsoni akagadzira’po mutambo, nokuti majaya aisiita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakaʋuya neshamŋari dzinamakumi matatu kuzoʋa naye.

Samsoni akati kwaʋari: Ndikutaurirei cirabge ɀino; kana mukagona kundiɗudzira ico pamazuʋa manomŋe omutambo, mukawana ɗudziro yaco, ini ndicakupai ŋguʋo dzomuceka dzinamakumi matatu, nehanzu dzakanaka dzinamakumi matatu.
Asi kana musiŋgagoni kundiɗudzira ico, imi mucafanira kundipa ŋguʋo dzomuceka dzinamakumi matatu, nehanzu dzakanaka dzinamakumi matatu. Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Citaura hako cirabge cako, ticinzwe.
Akati kwaʋari:
Cokudya cakaɓuɗa kumudyi,
Ʋuye ɀinotapira ɀakaɓuɗa kunounesimba.
Asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuɗudzira cirabge ico namazuʋa matatu.

Ɀino nezuʋa recinomŋe ʋakati kumukadzi waSamsoni: Nyeŋgetedza murume wako, atiɗudzire cirabge, tirege kukupisa nomŋoto, iwe naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako; makatiɗana kuti mutitorere ɀatinaɀo kanhi? Ndiɀo here?

Ipapo mukadzi waSamsoni wakacema kumurume wake, akati: Unondiʋeŋga hako, haundiɗi; wakataurira ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋangu cirabge, asi hauna‐kundiʋudza ico ini. Akati kwaari: Tarira, handina‐kuciʋudza ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu kana mai ʋaŋgu; ɀino ndiŋgakuʋudza ico iwe here?
Akaramba acicema kwaari mazuʋa manomŋe paŋguʋa yomutambo; ɀino nezuʋa recinomŋe akamuʋudza, nokuti wakamutambudza kwaɀo; ipapo akandoʋudza ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋake cirabge ico.
Nezuʋa recinomŋe zuʋa ricigere kuʋira, ʋarume ʋeguta ʋakati kwaari: Ko cinotapira kukunda ʋuci cinyi? Ʋuye cinesimba kukunda shumba cinyiko? Iye akati kwaʋari:
Ƌai musina‐kurima netsiru raŋgu,
Hamuzaiwana cirabge caŋgu.

Mŋeya waJehova akaʋuya pamsoro pake nesimba guru, akaɓurukira Ashkeroni, akaʋuraya ʋarume ʋanamakumi matatu kwaʋari, akatora ŋguʋo dzaʋo, akandopa ʋakaɗudzira cirabge hanzu dzaʋo dzakanaka. Asi kutsamŋa kwake kwakaŋga kwamutswa kwaɀo, akadzokera kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake.
Asi mukadzi waSamsoni akapiwa shamŋari yake, wakaŋga amuperekedza.
Asi ŋguʋa ɗuku yakati yapera, paŋguʋa yokukohwa ɀiyo, Samsoni akandoshanyira mukadzi wake, akaɓata mbudzana; akati: Ndinoɗa kupinda kumukadzi waŋgu mumba. Asi ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakaramba kumutendera kupinda.
Ƃaɓa ʋake ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakati wamuʋeŋga kwaɀo; saka ndakamupa shamŋari yako. Ko munuŋuna wake haamupfuʋuri nokunaka here? Mutore hake iye panɀimbo yake.
Samsoni akati kwaʋari: ŋguʋa ino handiŋgaʋi nemhoȿa kuʋaFiristia, kana ndikaʋaitira ɀakaipa.
Ipapo Samsoni akandoɓata makaʋa anamazana matatu, akatora mazhenje, akaɓatanidza miswe miʋiri‐miʋiri, ndokuisa zhenje pakati pemiswe miʋiri.
Ɀino akatuŋgidza mazhenje, ndokuaregedza, akapinda muɀiyo ɀaʋaFiristia ɀakaŋga ɀigere kukohiwa, akapisa ɀiyo ɀakaŋga ɀaʋuŋganidzwa neɀakaŋga ɀigere kukohiwa, neminda yemizambiriŋga neyemiorivi.
Ipapo ʋaFiristia ʋakati: Ndianiko waita iɀoɀo? Ʋakati: NdiSamsoni, mukuwasha womuTimna, nokuti wakatora mukadzi wake, akamupa shamŋari yake. Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakakwira, ʋakamupisa iye
Samsoni akati kwaʋari: Kana mukaita saiɀoɀo, ɀirokwaɀo ndicakutsiʋai, pashure ndigorega.
Akaʋaroʋa paɀidɀa neɀiʋuno, akaʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru; akaɓuruka, akandogara paɓako reɗombo reEtami.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakakwira, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paJuda, ʋakapararira muRehi.
Ʋarume ʋaJuda ʋakati: Makwirireiko kuzorwa nesu: Iʋo ʋakati: Takwira kuzosuŋga Samsoni, timuitire seɀaakatiitira isu.

Ipapo ʋarume ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu ʋakaɓurukira kuɓako reɗombo reEtami, ʋakati kunaSamsoni: Hauziʋi kuti ʋaFiristia ʋaɓati ʋeɗu here? Cinyiko ici cawatiitira? Akati kwaʋari: Seɀaʋakandiitira ini, ndiɀo ɀandakaʋaitira ʋo.
Ʋakati kwaari: Isu taɓurukira ʋuno kuzokusuŋga, kuti tikuise mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia. Samsoni akati kwaʋari: Pikai kwandiri, kuti imi hamuŋgandiʋambi mumene.
Ʋakataura naye, ʋakati: Kwete; asi ticakusuŋga, nokukuisa mumaʋoko aʋo; asi ɀirokwaɀo hatiŋgakuʋurayi. Ʋakamusuŋga netambo mbiri itȿa, ʋakakwira naye ʋacibva paɗombo.

Ɀino wakati aciȿika Rehi, ʋaFiristia ʋakamupurudzira. Ipapo Mŋeya waJehova akaʋuya pamsoro pake nesimba guru; tambo dzakaŋga dzakasuŋga maʋoko ake dzikafanana norucinda rwakatȿa nomŋoto, ɀisuŋgo ɀake ɀikanyauka pamaʋoko ake.
Akawana rushaya rwemboŋgoro, akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akarutora, ndokuʋuraya ʋarume ʋanamazana anegumi narwo.
Ipapo Samsoni akati:
Norushaya rwemboŋgoro
Norushaya rwemboŋgoro ndakaʋuraya ʋanamazana anegumi.
Ɀino wakati apedza kutaura, akakanda kure rushaya rwakaŋga ruri muruʋoko rwake; nɀimbo iyo ikanzi: Ramati‐rehi.
Ipapo akanzwa nyota kwaɀo, akacema kunaJehova, akati: Matirwira kwaɀo noruʋoko rwomuranda wenyu; ɀino ndicafa nenyota, ndikawira mumaʋoko aʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa.
Asi Mŋari wakapamura mukaha paRehi, mvura ikaɓuɗa’po; ɀino wakati anwa, mŋeya wake ukadzokera maari, akapona ɀe; naiɀoɀo ipapo pakatumidzwa Enihakori, tsime riri paRehi kuȿikira nhasi.
Iye akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri makore makumi maʋiri pamazuʋa aʋaFiristia.
Ɀino Samsoni wakaenda Gaza, akaʋona’po mukadzi waiʋa cifeʋe akapinda kwaari.
ƲaGaza ʋakaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Samsoni waȿika pano. Iʋo ʋakamukomba, ʋakamuʋandira ʋusiku bgose pasuʋo reguta, ʋakaramba ʋanyerere ʋusiku bgose, ʋaciti: Maŋgwana kana kwaedza ticamuʋuraya.

Samsoni akaʋata kuȿikira pakati poʋusiku, akamuka pakati poʋusiku, akaɓata masasa esuʋo reguta, namatanda aro maʋiri, akaavomora pamŋe cete nomuzariro waro, akaaisa pamafudzi ake, ndokuatakurira kugomo riri pamberi peHebroni.
Ɀino pashure akaɗa mukadzi wakaŋga agere pamupata weSoreki, wainzi Derira.

Madzishe aʋaFiristia akakwira kumukadzi, akati kwaari: Munyeŋgetedze, uʋone kunobva simba rake guru, ʋuye kuti tiŋgamukunda sei, kuti timusuŋge timumanikidze; ipapo mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu ucakupa mashekeri
Ɀino Derira akati kunaSamsoni: Ndiʋudze hako kuti simba rako guru rinobvepi, ʋuye kuti uŋgasuŋgwa neiko, umanikidzwe.
Samsoni akati kwaari: Kana ʋakandisuŋga namarunda matȿa manomŋe acigere kuwomeswa, ndicashaiwa simba, ndikaʋa somumŋe munhu.
Ipapo madzishe aʋaFiristia akamuʋigira marunda matȿa manomŋe acigere kuwomeswa, iye akamusuŋga nawo.

Ɀino wakaŋga anaʋaʋandiri ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋandira muimba yomukati. Akati kwaari: Samsoni, ʋaFiristia ʋaȿika! Iye akaɗambura marunda, seɀinoɗamburwa rwonzi rworucinda kana rwanzwa mŋoto. Naiɀoɀo simba rake harinakuzikanwa.
Ipapo Derira akati kunaSamsoni: Tarira, wandiɗaɗira, nokundireʋera nhema; ɀino cindiʋudza hako kuti uŋgasuŋgwa nei.
Akati kwaari: Kana ʋakaŋgondisuŋga haʋo namaɓote matȿa, asina‐kumboɓatisa, ndicashaiwa simba, ndikaʋa somumŋe munhu.
Ipapo Derira akatora maɓote matȿa, akamusuŋga nawo, akati kwaari: Samsoni, ʋaFiristia ʋaȿika! Ʋaʋandiri ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋandira muimba yomukati. Ipapo akaaɗambura pamaʋoko ake sorucinda.

Derira akati kunaSamsoni: Kuȿikira ɀino wakaŋga uciŋgondiɗaɗira, ucindireʋera nhema; cindiʋudza hako kuti uŋgasuŋgwa nei. Akati kwaari: Kana ukarukira mhotsi nomŋe dzevudzi romusoro waŋgu pamŋe cete nomuceka unorukwa.
Iye akarisuŋga nembambo, akati kwaari: Samsoni, ʋaFiristia ʋaȿika! Ipapo akapepuka pahope dzake, akavomora mbambo yeɗanda pamŋe cete nomuceka wakarukwa.
Iye akati kwaari: Ɀino uŋgataura seiko uciti: Ndinokuɗa, kana mŋoyo wako usiŋganditendi? Ɀino wandiɗaɗira katatu, usiŋgandiʋudzi kuti simba rako guru rinobvepi.
Ɀino wakati aciŋgomutambudza mazuʋa ose namashoko ake, acimugombedzera, mŋoyo wake ukanetswa kuȿikira pakufa.

Akamuʋudza nomŋoyo wake wose akati kwaari: Musoro waŋgu hauna‐kutoŋgoʋeʋurwa neciȿo, nokuti ndiri muNaziri waMŋari kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu; kana ndikaʋeʋurwa, simba raŋgu ricabva kwandiri, ndiŋgashaiwa simba, ndikaita somumŋe munhu.

Ɀino Derira wakati aʋona kuti wamuʋudza nomŋoyo wake wose, akatuma munhu kundoɗana madzishe aʋaFiristia, akati: Kwirai henyu ʋuno ŋguʋa ino, nokuti wandiʋudza nomŋoyo wake wose. Ipapo madzishe aʋaFiristia akakwira kwaari, ʋakaʋuya nemari mumaʋoko aʋo.
Iye akamuʋatisa pamabvi ake, akaɗana munhu kuzoʋeʋura mhotsi nomŋe dzevudzi romusoro wake; akataŋga kumumanikidza; simba rake rikabva kwaari.
Akati: Samsoni, ʋaFiristia ʋaȿika! Ipapo Samsoni akapepuka pahope dzake, akati: Ndicaɓuɗa ŋguʋa ino ʋo sapanedzimŋe ŋguʋa, ndikaɀisunuŋgura; asi wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi kuti Jehova wakaŋga abva kwaari.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamutumbura meso, ʋakaɓuruka naye Gaza, ndokumusuŋga neɀisuŋgo ɀendarira, akakuya mutoroŋgo.
Asi vudzi romusoro wake rakataŋga kureɓa ɀe shure kwokuʋeʋurwa kwake.
Ɀino madzishe aʋaFiristia akaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete kuzoɓayira Dagoni mŋari waʋo ciɓayiro cikuru, ndokufara; nokuti ʋakati: Mŋari weɗu wakaisa mumaʋoko eɗu muʋeŋgi weɗu Samsoni.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakarumbidza mŋari waʋo, nokuti ʋakati: Mŋari weɗu wakaisa mumaʋoko eɗu muʋeŋgi weɗu, nomuparadzi wenyika yeɗu, wakaʋuraya ʋazhinji ʋeɗu.
Ɀino mŋoyo yaʋo yakati yofara, ʋakati: Ciɗanai Samsoni, atitambire. Ʋakandoɗana Samsoni mutoroŋgo, akatamba pamberi paʋo, ʋakamuisa pakati pembiru.
Ɀino Samsoni akati kumukomana wakaŋga akaɓata ruʋoko rwake: Nditendere kuti ndiɓate mbiru dzakatsigira imba, ndisendamire padziri.
Ɀino imba yakaŋga izere naʋarume naʋakadzi; namadzishe aʋaFiristia akaŋga ari’mo ose; napamsoro peɗeŋga pakaŋga panaʋarume naʋakadzi ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀitatu, ʋakaŋga ʋacitarira kutamba kwaSamsoni.
Ipapo Samsoni akaɗana kunaJehova akati: Ishe Mŋari, ndiraŋgarirei henyu, ndisimbisei henyu ŋguʋa ino ɓedzi, imi Mŋari, nditsiʋirwe meso aŋgu maʋiri kuʋaFiristia.
Samsoni akaɓata mbiru mbiri dzapakati, dzakaŋga dzakatsigira imba, akadzisunda, imŋe noruʋoko rwake rworudyi neimŋe noruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe.

Ipapo Samsoni akati: Ŋgandife haŋgu pamŋe cete naʋaFiristia. Akakotama nesimba rake rose, imba ikawira pamsoro pamadzishe, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋaiʋa’mo. Naiɀoɀo ʋakafa ʋaakaʋuraya pakufa kwake, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋazhinji kunaʋakaʋurawa naye aciri mupenyu.
Ɀino hama dzake, naʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋakaɓuruka, ʋakamutora, ʋakakwira naye, ndokumuʋiga pakati peZora neEshtaori, pabgiro bgaManoa, ɓaɓa ʋake. Iye wakatoŋga ʋaIsraeri makore anamakumi maʋiri.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomurume panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, wainzi Mika.
Iye akati kunamai ʋake: Mashekeri

Akadzosera mashekeri esirveri anegumi ramazana nezana rimŋe kunamai ʋake; mai ʋake ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo, sirveri iyi ndinoitsaurira Jehova, kuti mŋanakomana waŋgu aite nayo mufananidzo wakaʋezwa nomufananidzo wakaʋumbga; naiɀoɀo ɀino ndicakudzosera iyo.

Ɀino wakati adzosera mari iyo kunamai ʋake, mai ʋake ʋakatora mashekeri esirveri anamazana maʋiri, akaapa muʋumbi, iye akaita nawo mufananidzo wakaʋezwa nomufananidzo wakaʋumbga; ɀikagara mumba maMika.
Ɀino murume uyu Mika wakaŋga aneimba yaʋamŋari, akaita efodi neterafimi, akagadza mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋake kuti aʋe muprista wake.
Pamazuʋa iwayo kwakaŋga kusinamambo pakati paʋaIsraeri; munhu mumŋe nomumŋe waiita seɀaakafuŋga kuti ndiɀo ɀakanaka.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunejaya raibva Beti‐rehemi‐juda, weimba yaJuda, waiʋa muRevi, wakaŋga agere’po.
Murume uyu akabva paguta, paBeti‐rehemi‐juda, kundoɀitȿakira nɀimbo yokugara; pakufamba kwake akaȿika panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi paimba yaMika.
Mika akati kwaari: Wabvepiko? Iye akati kwaari: Ndiri muRevi weBeti‐rehemi‐juda, ndinotȿaka kwandiŋgagara.
Mika akati kwaari: Gara neni, uʋe ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu nomuprista waŋgu, ndikupe mashekeri
MuRevi akatenda kugara nomunhu uyu; jaya rikaʋa somumŋe waʋanakomana ʋake.
Mika akagadza muRevi, jaya iro rikaʋa muprista wake, akagara mumba maMika.
Ɀino Mika akati: Ndinoziʋa ɀino kuti Jehova ucandiitira ɀakanaka, ɀandaʋa nomuprista waŋgu uri muRevi.

Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo kwakaŋga kusinamambo pakati paʋaIsraeri; namazuʋa iwayo ʋaDani ʋakaɀitȿakira nhaka yokugara’mo, nokuti kuȿikira paŋguʋa iyo ʋakaŋga ʋacigere kupiwa nhaka pakati pamarudzi aʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino pakati paʋo ʋose ʋana ʋaDani ʋakatuma ʋarume ʋashanu ʋeimba yaʋo, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare, ʋakabva Zora neEshtaori, kuzoshora nyika, nokuitarisisa; ʋakati kwaʋari: Endai, mundotarisisa nyika; iʋo ʋakaȿika kunyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, kuimba yaMika, ʋakaʋata’po.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋari paimba yaMika, ʋakaziʋa inzwi rejaya muRevi; ʋakatsaukira’ko, ʋakati kwaari: Ndianiko wakakuȿitsa pano? Unoɓatei pano? Unotȿakei pano?
Iye akati kwaʋari: Mika wakandiitira ɀokuti neɀokuti, akandiripira, ndikaʋa muprista wake.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ɀino citibvunzira hako Mŋari, tiziʋe kana ticafamba ɀakanaka panzira yeɗu yatinofamba nayo.
Muprista akati kwaʋari: Endai norugare, nzira yenyu yamunofamba nayo inofadza Jehova.

Ɀino ʋarume ʋashanu ʋakaenda, ʋakaȿika Raishi, ʋakaʋona ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo, kuti ʋagere pasinenjodzi nomutoʋo waʋaZidoni, ʋakagarika, ʋanorugare; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waiʋa nesimba rokuraira, waimanikidza ʋanhu pacinhu cipi necipi; ʋakaŋga ʋagere kure naʋaZidoni, ʋasiŋgafambidzani naʋamŋe ʋanhu.
Ʋakaȿika kuhama dzaʋo paZora napaEshtaori; hama dzaʋo dzikati kwaʋari: Munoreʋeiko?
Ʋakati: Simukai, tikwire, tindorwa naʋo; nokuti takatarira nyika, tikaʋona kuti yakanaka kwaɀo; munogara seiko musiŋgaiti cinhu? Musaʋa noʋusimbe bgokupinda, kuti nyika iʋe yenyu.
Kana mucienda mucandoȿika kuʋanhu ʋagere pasinenjodzi, ʋuye nyika ihuru; nokuti Mŋari wakakupai iyo mumaʋoko enyu; apo hapashaikwi cinhu ciri panyika.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋeimba yaʋaDani ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa, ʋakaenda’ko, ʋacibva Zora neEshtaori.
Ʋakakwira, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paKiriati‐jearimi, paJuda; naiɀoɀo ʋakatumidza nɀimbo iyo Mahane‐dani kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi; tarirai, riri shure kweKiriati‐jearimi.
Ʋakabva’po, ʋakapfuʋura kuȿikira panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, ʋakaȿika paimba yaMika.

Ɀino ʋarume ʋashanu, ʋakaŋga ʋandoshora nyika yeRaishi, ʋakapindura, ʋakati kuhama dzaʋo: Munoziʋa here kuti mudzimba idzi muneefodi, neterafimi, nomufananidzo wakaʋezwa nomufananidzo wakaʋumbga? Saka ɀino fuŋgai ɀakanaka ɀamunofanira kuita.
Ipapo ʋakatsaukira’ko, ʋakaȿika paimba yejaya muRevi, iyo imba yaMika, ʋakabvunza mufaro.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzaʋo dzokurwa nadzo, ʋaiʋa ʋaʋana ʋaDani, ʋakamira panopindwa napo pasuʋo,

ʋarume ʋashanu ʋakaŋga ʋandoshora nyika ʋakakwira, ʋakapinda’mo, ʋakatora mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, neefodi, neterafimi, nomufananidzo wakaʋumbga; muprista akamira panopindwa napo pasuʋo kuʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo.
Ɀino iʋo ʋakati ʋapinda mumba maMika, ʋakatora mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, neefodi, neterafimi, nomufananidzo wakaʋumbga, muprista akati kwaʋari: Munoiteiko?

Ʋakati kwaari: Nyarara, fumbira muromo wako, uende nesu, uʋe ɓaɓa ʋeɗu nomuprista weɗu; ɀirinani kwauri ndeɀipi, kuti uʋe muprista paimba yomunhu mumŋe cete, kana kuʋa muprista worudzi rwose neimba yose yaʋaIsraeri here?
Ɀino mŋoyo womuprista ukafara, akatora efodi, neterafimi, nomufananidzo wakaʋezwa, akapinda napakati paʋanhu.
Ʋakatsauka, ndokuenda, ʋakatuŋgamidza ʋana ʋaɗuku, neɀipfuwo nenhumbi.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋafamba runhambo kubva paimba yaMika, ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋagere padzimba dzaiʋa pedyo neimba yaMika ʋakaʋuŋganidzwa, ʋakateʋera ʋaDani, ʋakaʋaɓata.
Ʋakaɗanidzira kuʋana ʋaDani. Iʋo ʋakaceuka, ʋakati kunaMika: Unotȿakeiko, ɀawaʋuya neɓoka rakaɗai?
Iye akati: Manditorera ʋamŋari ʋaŋgu ʋandakaŋga ndaita, nomuprista waŋgu, mukaenda
Ʋana ʋaDani ʋakati kwaari: Inzwi rako ŋgarirege kunzwika pakati peɗu, kuti ʋarume ʋaneshuŋgu ʋarege kukuwira, ukarashikirwa noʋupenyu bgako pamŋe cete noʋupenyu bgaʋamŋe ʋeimba yako.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaDani ʋakaenda haʋo; ɀino Mika wakati aciʋona kuti simba raʋo rinokunda rake, akadzokera kumba kwake.
Iʋo ʋakatora ɀakaŋga ɀakaitwa naMika, nomuprista waakaŋga anaye, ʋakaȿika Raishi, kuʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakagarika, ʋagere pasinenjodzi, ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza, ʋakapisa guta raʋo nomŋoto.
Ʋakashaiwa unoʋarwira, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari kure neZidoni; ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgafambidzani naʋamŋe ʋanhu;
Ʋakatumidza guta zita rinonzi Dani, nezita raɓaɓa ʋaʋo Dani, wakaŋga akaɓerekerwa Israeri; asi zita reguta raiʋa Raishi pakutaŋga.
Ʋana ʋaDani ʋakaɀimisira mufananidzo uyo wakaʋezwa; Jonatani, mŋanakomana waGershomi, mŋanakomana waMosesi, iye naʋana ʋake ʋakaʋa ʋaprista ʋorudzi rwaʋaDani, kuȿikira pazuʋa rokutapxa
Ʋakaɀimisira mufananidzo wakaʋezwa waMika, waakaŋga aita, ukaʋa’po ŋguʋa yose yokugara kweimba yaMŋari paShiro.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo kusisinamambo pakati paIsraeri, mumŋe muRevi waigara mberi kwenyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, akaɀitorera mukadzi muroŋgo pa‐Beti‐rehemi‐juda.
Ɀino muroŋgo wake akafeʋa, akabva kwaari, akaenda kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake paBeti‐rehemi‐juda, akagara’ko mŋedzi minna.

Ɀino murume wake akasimuka, akamuteʋera, anomuranda wake nemboŋgoro mbiri, akataura ɀakanaka naye, kuti amudzosere ɀe kwaari, iye mukadzi akamuisa kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake; ɀino ɓaɓa ʋomusikana ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakafara kusoŋgana naye.
Mukarabga wake, iʋo ɓaɓa ʋomusikana, ʋakamudziʋisa kuenda, akagara naye mazuʋa matatu, ʋakadya, ʋakanwa, ʋakaʋata’po.
Ɀino nomusi wecinna ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, iye akasimuka aciɗa kuenda; ɓaɓa ʋomusikana ʋakati kumukuwasha waʋo: Simbisa mŋoyo wako necimeɗu ceciŋgwa, mugoenda henyu.
Ipapo ʋakagara pasi, ʋakadya, ʋakanwa ʋose; ɓaɓa ʋomusikana ʋakati kumurume: Tenda hako ugare ʋusiku bgose, mŋoyo wako ufare.
Asi murume wakasimuka, aciɗa kubva; mukarabga wake akamugombedzera, akaʋata’po ɀe.
Nomusi weshanu akamuka maŋgwanani, aciɗa kubva; ɓaɓa ʋomusikana ʋakati: Simbisa mŋoyo wako, ugare kuȿikira zuʋa roʋira; ʋakadya ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri.

Ɀino murume wakati acisimuka, aciɗa kubva, iye nomuroŋgo wake, nomuranda wake, mukarabga wake, iʋo ɓaɓa ʋomusikana, akati kwaari: Tarira, zuʋa roʋira, aʋa maɗekwana, cigara hako ʋusiku bgose; tarira, zuʋa roɗa kupera, ʋata hako pano, mŋoyo wako ufare, mugofumira maŋgwana parwendo rwenyu kumusha kwenyu.

Asi murume wakaramba kuʋata’po ʋusiku ubgo, asi wakasimuka, akabva, ndokuȿika pakatarisana neJebusi (ndiro Jerusarema); wakaŋga anemboŋgoro mbiri dzakaŋga dzakaiswa ɀigaro; nomuroŋgo wake wakaŋga anaye.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika pedyo neJebusi, zuʋa rikaŋga roʋira; muranda akati kunatenzi wake: Ŋgatitsaukire heɗu kuguta iri raʋaJebusi, tiʋate’mo.
Tenzi wake akati kwaari: Hatiŋgatsaukiri kuguta raʋatorwa, kusinaʋana ʋaIsraeri; asi ticapfuʋura heɗu kuȿikira paGibea.
Akati kumuranda wake: Hendei, tisweɗere kuneimŋe yenɀimbo idzi, tiʋate paGibea kana paRama.
Ipapo ʋakapfuʋura parwendo rwaʋo, ʋakaʋirirwa pedyo neGibea, raiʋa guta raʋaBenjamini.
Ʋakatsaukira’ko, ʋaciɗa kuʋata paGibea; akapinda, akagara pasi munzira yomuguta; nokuti kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakaʋaɗana kuzoʋata mumba make.
Ɀino mumŋe mutana akaȿika, acibva kuɓasa rake kumunda maɗekwana; ɀino murume uyo wakaŋga ari wenyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, asi wakagara hake paGibea; asi ʋarume ʋenɀimbo iyo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaBenjamini.
Iye akatarira, akaʋona murume uyu mufambi ari munzira yomuguta; mutana akati: Ko unoendepi? ʋuye, Unobvepiko?

Iye akati kwaari: Tinobva Beti‐rehemi‐juda, tinopfuʋurira kurutiʋi rwemberi rwenyika yamakomo yaEfraimi; ndiko kwandakabva, ndikaenda Beti‐rehemi‐juda, ɀino ndinoenda kumba kwaJehova, asi hakunomunhu wakandiɗana kugara mumba make.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro tinabgo ʋuswa neɀokudya ɀemboŋgoro dzeɗu, neciŋgwa newaini ɀinondiriŋgana ini nomurandakadzi wenyu nejaya rinaʋaranda ʋenyu; hakunecinhu cinoshaikwa.
Ɀino mutana akati: Faro hako, ɀose ɀaunoshaiwa, ini ndicakupa; asi usaʋata munzira yomuguta.
Ipapo akaʋaisa mumba make, akapa mboŋgoro ɀokudya; ʋakashambidza tsoka dzaʋo, ʋakadya nokunwa.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋofara pamŋoyo yaʋo, tarirai ʋarume ʋeguta, ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋakakomba imba kunhiʋi dzose, ʋakagogodza pamukoʋa; ʋakataura nomŋene weimba, iye mutana, ʋakati: Ƃuɗisa murume wakaȿika paimba yako, timuziʋe.
Ɀino murume uyo, mŋene weimba, akaɓuɗa kwaʋari, akati kwaʋari: Kwete, hama dzaŋgu, regai kuita ɀakaipa ɀakaɗai; musaita samapenzi, nokuti murume uyu wakapinda mumba maŋgu.
Tarirai, hoyu mukunda waŋgu mhandara, nomuroŋgo wake; ndicaʋaɓuɗisa ɀino, muʋaɀidze, muʋaitire seɀamunoɗa; asi regai kuitira murume uyu cakaipa cakaɗai.
Asi ʋarume ʋakaramba kumuterera; ipapo murume akaɓata muroŋgo wake, akamuɓuɗisira kwaʋari; ʋakamuziʋa, ʋakamucinya ʋusiku bgose kuȿikira maŋgwana; ʋakamurega kwoedza.
Ɀino mukadzi akaʋuya kwoedza, akawira pasi pamukoʋa weimba yomunhu, makaŋga munashe wake, akaʋa’po kuȿikira kwaedza kwaɀo.
Ɀino ishe wake wakamuka maŋgwanani, akazarura mikoʋa yeimba, akaɓuɗa, aciɗa kupfuʋura parwendo rwake; akawana mukadzi, iye muroŋgo wake, akawira pasi pamukoʋa weimba, maʋoko ake ari pacikumbaridzo.
Akati kwaari: Simuka, tiende; asi hakuna‐wakapindura; ipapo akamuisa pamboŋgoro yake, murume akasimuka, akaenda kumba kwake.
Wakati aȿika kumba kwake, akatora ɓaŋga, akaɓata muroŋgo wake, akaɗimuranya mitezo yake, akaita nhindi dzinegumi nembiri, akadzituma munyika yose yaʋaIsraeri.

Ɀino ʋose ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakati: Ciŋguʋa ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakakwira ʋacibva panyika yeEgipita, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, hakunecinhu cakaɗai cakaitwa kana cakaʋonekwa; raŋgarirai iɀoɀo, muraŋgane, mutaure.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋuŋgano yose ikaʋuŋgana nomŋoyo mumŋe kubva paDani kuȿikira paBeeri‐sheba, pamŋe cete nenyika yeGireadi, kunaJehova paMizpa.
Madzishe aʋanhu ʋose, iʋo ʋamarudzi ose aʋaIsraeri, ʋakandomira paʋuŋgano yaʋanhu ʋaMŋari, ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana manna ɀaʋanhu ʋaifamba namakumbo, ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo.
(Ɀino ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakwira Mizpa.) Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati: Tiʋudzei kuti ɀakashata iɀi ɀakaitwa sei.
Ɀino muRevi, murume womukadzi wakaŋga aʋurawa, akapindura, akati: Ndakaŋga ndaȿika paGibea raʋaBenjamini ndinomuroŋgo waŋgu, kuti tiʋate’po.
Ʋarume ʋeGibea ʋakandimukira, ʋakakomba imba ʋusiku kuzorwa neni; ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kundiʋuraya ini, ʋuye muroŋgo waŋgu ʋakamucinya, akafa.
Ipapo ndikatora muroŋgo waŋgu, ndikamuɗimuranya, ndikamutuma kunyika yose yenhaka yaIsraeri, nokuti ʋakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza neɀoʋupenzi pakati paIsraeri.
Tarirai, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, imi mose, mutipei zano nomuraŋgariro wenyu pano.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakasimuka nomŋoyo mumŋe, ʋakati: Hakunomumŋe weɗu uŋgaenda kutente rake, hakunomumŋe weɗu uŋgadzokera kumba kwake.
Asi ticaitira ʋanhu ʋeGibea cinhu ici: Ticandorwa naʋo, seɀatinoratidzwa nemijenya.

Ticatora ʋarume ʋanegumi pazana rimŋe nerimŋe ramarudzi ose aʋaIsraeri, naʋanezana pacuru cimŋe necimŋe, naʋanecuru paɀuru ɀinegumi ɀimŋe neɀimŋe, ʋandotorera ʋanhu mbuʋa, kuti kana ʋaciȿika paGibea raʋaBenjamini ʋaʋaitire ɀakaenzana noʋupenzi bgaʋakaita pakati paIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana paguta ʋanomŋoyo mumŋe.
Ɀino marudzi aʋaIsraeri akatuma ʋarume kurudzi kwose rwaBenjamini, ʋakati: Iɀi ɀakashata ɀakaitwa pakati penyu ndeɀeiko?
Saka ɀino tipei ʋarume aʋo, ʋanhu ʋakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋari paGibea, tiʋaʋuraye, tibvise ɀakaipa pakati paIsraeri; asi ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaramba kuterera inzwi rehama dzaʋo, iʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakabva kumaguta ʋakaʋuŋgana paGibea, kuti ʋarwe naʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaŋga ʋabva kumaguta ʋakaʋereŋgwa musi uyo ʋakaȿika ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀitanhatu, ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo; ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋagere Gibea haʋana‐kuʋereŋgwa, iʋo ʋakaȿika ʋarume ʋanamazana manomŋe ʋakasanaŋgurwa.
Pakati paʋanhu aʋa ʋose kwakaŋga kunaʋarume ʋanamazana manomŋe ʋakasanaŋgurwa, ʋakaŋga ʋaneziɓoshwe; mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo waigona kuroʋa ruvudzi nebge asiŋgaposhi.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, kunze kwaʋaBenjamini, ʋakaʋereŋgwa, ʋakaȿika ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana manna, ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo; aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋarwi.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda Beti‐eri, ʋakandobvunza zano kunaMŋari, ʋakati: Ndianiko kwatiri unofanira kutaŋga kundoʋamba ʋana ʋaBenjamini? Jehova akati: Juda ndiye unofanira kutaŋga.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakandodzika matente aʋo kuzorwa naʋeGibea.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓuɗa kundorwa naʋaBenjamini; ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaroŋgedza hondo kuzorwa naʋo paGibea.
Ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaɓuɗa paGibea, ʋakaʋurayira pasi nomusi iwoyo ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri.
Ipapo ʋanhu, ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaɀisimbisa, ʋakaroŋgedza ɀe hondo paʋakaŋga ʋairoŋgedza nezuʋa rokutaŋga.

(Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakakwira, ʋakandocema kunaJehova kuȿikira maɗekwana; ʋakabvunza Jehova, ʋakati: Tinofanira kusweɗera ɀe kundorwa nehama dzeɗu, ʋana ʋaBenjamini, here? Jehova akati kwaʋari: Kwirai, mundorwa naʋo.)
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakasweɗera kuzorwa naʋana ʋaBenjamini nezuʋa repiri.
ƲaBenjamini ʋakaɓuɗa paGibea kuzorwa naʋo nezuʋa repiri, ʋakaʋurayira pasi ʋarume ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀisere; aʋa ʋose ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo.

Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakakwira ʋakaȿika paBeti‐eri, ʋakacema, ʋakagara’po pamberi paJehova, ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya zuʋa iro kuȿikira maɗekwana; ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa kunaJehova.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabvunza Jehova, (nokuti areka yesuŋgano yaMŋari yakaŋga iri’po pamazuʋa iwayo.

NaPinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari, mŋanakomana waAroni, wakamira pamberi payo namazuʋa iwayo), ʋakati: Tinofanira kuɓuɗa ɀe kundorwa nehama dzeɗu, iʋo ʋana ʋaBenjamini, kana tirege here? Jehova akati: Kwirai, nokuti maŋgwana ndicaʋaisa mumaʋoko enyu.
ƲaIsraeri ʋakaisa ʋanhu kuʋandira Gibea kunhiʋi dzose.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakandorwa naʋana ʋaBenjamini nezuʋa retatu, ʋakaɀiroŋgedza kundorwa neGibea sapanedzimŋe ŋguʋa.
Ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaɓuɗa kuzorwa naʋanhu, ʋakanyeŋgerwa ndokuɓuɗa kure neguta; ʋakataŋga sapanedzimŋe ŋguʋa kuɓaya nokuʋuraya ʋamŋe ʋanhu panzira huru
Ɀino ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakati: Ʋakundwa nesu sapakutaŋga. Asi ʋaIsraeri ʋakati: Ŋgatitize, tiʋanyeŋgere ʋaɓuɗe kunzira huru dziri kure neguta.
Ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimuka kwaʋakaŋga ʋari, ʋakaɀiroŋgedza paBaari‐tamari; ʋuye ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋandira, ʋakakurumidza kuɓuɗa kwaʋakaŋga ʋari, paMaaregeba;
ʋakaɓuɗa pakatarisana neGibea

Ɀino Jehova akaparadza Benjamini pamberi paIsraeri, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaparadza nomusi iwoyo ʋarume ʋaBenjamini ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀishanu nezana rimŋe; aʋa ʋose ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaʋona kuti ʋakundwa; nokuti ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakatiza pamberi paBenjamini, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciʋimba naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaiswa kuʋandira paGibea.
Ɀino ʋaʋandiri ʋakakurumidza, ʋakamhanyira Gibea; ʋaʋandiri ʋakapfuʋura, ʋakaparadza guta rose neminondo inopinza.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri naʋaʋandiri ʋakaŋga ʋatenderana pamsoro peciratidzo, kuti ʋacamutsa gore guru roʋutsi rinobva muguta.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakatendeʋuka pakurwa kwaʋo, ʋaBenjamini ʋakataŋga kuɓaya nokuʋuraya ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋaneŋge makumi matatu; nokuti ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakundwa nesu sapakurwa kwokutaŋga.
Asi gore rakati rotaŋga kukwira ricibva muguta, seshoŋgwe yoʋutsi, ʋaBenjamini ʋakaceuka, ʋakaʋona guta rose ricipfuŋgairira kuɗeŋga.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzoka, ʋarume ʋaBenjamini ʋakavunduswa, nokuti ʋakaʋona kuti ʋawirwa nenjodzi.
Ipapo ʋakatiza pamberi paʋarume ʋaIsraeri, ʋakamhanya nenzira inoenda kurenje; asi hondo yakaʋateʋera, ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋacibva mumaguta ʋakaʋaʋuraya pakati pawo.
Ʋakakomba ʋaBenjamini kunhiʋi dzose, ʋakaʋadziŋga ndokuʋaɓata paʋakazorora kuȿikira pakatarisana neGibea kumabvazuʋa.
Ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀisere ʋaBenjamini ʋakaʋurawa; aʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋoʋumhare.
Ʋakatendeʋuka, ndokutizira kurenje kuɗombo reRimoni; ʋakaʋuraya ʋamŋe ʋaʋo panzira huru ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀishanu; ʋakaʋateʋera kuȿikira paGidomi, ʋakaʋuraya pakati paʋo ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀiʋiri.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋaBenjamini, ʋakaʋurawa nezuʋa iro, ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀishanu, ʋarume ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo; aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋoʋumhare.
Asi ʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋakatendeʋuka, ʋakatizira kurenje kuɗombo reRimoni, ʋakagara paɗombo reRimoni mŋedzi minna.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzokera ɀe kuʋana ʋaBenjamini, ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza, guta rose, neŋombe, neɀose ɀaʋakawana’po; ʋakapisa ʋo maguta ose aʋakawana.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋapika paMizpa, ʋaciti: Hakunomumŋe weɗu ucapa muBenjamini mukunda wake, kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ʋanhu ʋakaȿika paBeti‐eri, ʋakagara’po pamberi paMŋari kuȿikira maɗekwana; ʋakacema kwaɀo.
Ʋakati: Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, cinhu ici cakaitirweiko pakati paIsraeri, kuti nhasi rumŋe rudzi rushaikwe pakati paIsraeri?
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋanhu ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakaʋaka’po artari, ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.

Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati: Ndianiko pakati pamarudzi ose aIsraeri ʋasinakukwira kuʋuŋgano yaJehova? Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋapika nokupika kukuru pamsoro pomunhu usina‐kukwira kunaJehova paMizpa, ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, unofanira kuʋurawa.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɀiɗemba pamsoro paʋaBenjamini, hama dzaʋo, ʋakati: Nhasi rumŋe rudzi rwagurwa pakati paʋaIsraeri.
Ticaɗiniko kuti tiwanire ʋakasara ʋakadzi, ɀatakapika naJehova, kuti hatiŋgaʋapi ʋakunda ʋeɗu ʋaʋe ʋakadzi ʋaʋo?
Ʋakati: Ndianiko pamarudzi aIsraeri usina‐kukwira kunaJehova paMizpa? Ʋonei, kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakabva Jabeshi‐gireadi wakakwira kumisasa kuʋuŋgano.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaciʋereŋgwa, ʋonei kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waʋagere Jabeshi‐gireadi ipapo.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano ikatumira’ko ʋarume ʋoʋumhare kwaɀo ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, ʋakaʋaraira ʋaciti: Endai mundoʋuraya ʋagere Jabeshi‐gireadi neminondo inopinza, pamŋe cete naʋakadzi naʋana.
Munofanira kuita ʋo cinhu ici: Munofanira kuparadza cose ʋarume ʋose, nomukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe wakamboʋata nomurume.
Ɀino ʋakandowana kunaʋagere Jabeshi‐gireadi mhandara dzinamazana manna, ʋasina‐kumboʋata nomurume; ʋakaʋuya naʋo kumisasa paShiro munyika yeKanani.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yakatuma nhume kundotaurirana naʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaŋga ʋari paɗombo reRimoni, ʋakaʋaparidzira rugare.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋaBenjamini ʋakadzoka; ʋakaʋapa ʋakadzi ʋaʋakaŋga ʋaceŋgeta ʋari ʋapenyu paʋakadzi ʋeJabeshi‐gireadi; asi haʋana‐kuʋariŋgana.
Ʋanhu ʋakaɀiɗemba pamsoro paʋaBenjamini, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aparadza
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋeʋuŋgano ʋakati: Ticaɗiniko kuti tiwanire ʋakasara ʋakadzi, ʋakadzi ɀaʋaparadzwa pakati paʋaBenjamini?
Ʋakati: ƲaBenjamini ʋakapukunyuka ʋanofanira kuʋa nenhaka yaʋo, kuti rudzi rumŋe rurege kuroʋa pakati paʋaIsraeri.
Asi hatiŋgaʋapi ʋakunda ʋeɗu, ʋaʋe ʋakadzi ʋaʋo; nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋapika, ʋaciti: Munhu unopa ʋaBenjamini mukadzi ŋgaatukwe.
Ʋakati: Gore rimŋe nerimŋe kunomutambo waJehova paShiro, kurutiʋi rwokumsoro kweBeti‐eri, kumabvazuʋa enzira huru inobva Beti‐eri icikwira Shekemi, nezasi kweRebona.
Ʋakaraira ʋana ʋaBenjamini, ʋaciti: Endai, mundoʋandira muminda yemizambiriŋga;
mutarire, muʋone kana ʋakunda ʋeShiro ʋaciɓuɗa kuzotamba; ɀino muɓuɗe paminda yenyu yemizambiriŋga, murume mumŋe nomumŋe agoɀitorera mukadzi pakati paʋakunda ʋeShiro, muende kunyika yaʋaBenjamini.

Ɀino kana madziɓaɓa aʋo kana hama dzaʋo ʋaciʋuya kuzoʋakwirira kwatiri, isu ticati kwaʋari: Citipai henyu iʋaʋo ɀakanaka, nokuti hatina‐kuʋatapira ʋose ʋakadzi pakurwa; nemi ʋo hamunakuʋapa iʋo, muŋgaɗai munemhoȿa.
Ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaita saiɀoɀo, ʋakaɀitorera ʋakadzi kunaʋakaŋga ʋacitamba, ʋakaʋariŋgana; ʋakaenda naʋo; ʋakabva ndokudzokera kunhaka yaʋo, ʋakaʋaka maguta, ndokugara mukati mawo.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabva’po neŋguʋa iyo, murume mumŋe nomumŋe kurudzi rwake nokumhuri yake; ʋakaɓuɗa’po murume mumŋe nomumŋe akaenda kunhaka yake.
Namazuʋa iwayo kwakaŋga kusinamambo pakati paIsraeri; murume mumŋe nomumŋe waiita seɀaakafuŋga kuti ndiɀo ɀakanaka.
Ɀino namazuʋa okutoŋga kwaʋatoŋgi nzara yakaŋga iri’po panyika. Mumŋe murume weBeti‐rehemi‐juda akandogara panyika yaMoabi, iye nomukadzi wake naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri.
Zita romurume rakaŋga riri Erimereki, nezita romukadzi wake Naome; mazita aʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri aiʋa Maroni naKirioni, ʋaEfrata ʋeBeti‐rehemi‐juda. Iʋo ʋakaȿika panyika yaMoabi, ʋakagara’ko.
Ɀino Erimereki murume waNaome, akafa, iye akasiyiwa naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri.
Iʋo ʋakaɀiwanira ʋakadzi kuʋaMoabi; zita romumŋe raiʋa Orpa, nezita romumŋe Rute; ʋakagara’ko makore aneŋge gumi.
Maroni naKirioni ʋakafa ʋo, ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri, mukadzi akasiyiwa asinaʋanakomana ʋake ʋaʋiri nomurume wake.
Ipapo akasimuka naʋakadzi ʋaʋana ʋake, aciɗa kubva kunyika yaMoabi; nokuti wakaŋga anzwa aciri panyika yaMoabi, kuti Jehova wakaraŋgarira ʋanhu ʋake, akaʋapa ɀokudya.
Akabva kwaakaŋga ari naʋakadzi ʋaʋana ʋake ʋaʋiri, ʋakafamba nenzira inodzokera kunyika yaJuda.
Ɀino Naome akati kuʋakadzi ʋaʋana ʋake ʋaʋiri: Endai, dzokerai mumŋe nomumŋe kumba kwamai ʋake; Jehova ŋgaakuitirei ɀakanaka, seɀamakaitira ʋakafa neni ʋo.
Jehova ŋgaakuzorodzei, mumŋe nomumŋe mumba momurume wake. Akaʋaȿeta, iʋo ʋakacema kwaɀo.
Ʋakati kwaari: Kwete, ticaenda nemi kana modzokera kuʋanhu ʋenyu.
Naome akati: Dzokai, ʋana ʋaŋgu, mucaendireiko neni? Ini ndicinaʋamŋe ʋanakomana mumuʋiri waŋgu ʋaŋgazoʋa ʋarume ʋenyu here?
Dzokai, ʋana ʋaŋgu, endai henyu, nokuti ini ndacembera, handiŋgawanikwi nomurume ɀe. Kunyaŋge ndikati: Ndicinetariro kuti ndiŋgaɓereka ʋanakomana, kana ndaiʋa nomurume ʋusiku bguno,
muŋgaʋamirira kuȿikira ʋakura here? Muŋgaramba kuwanikwa naʋamŋe ʋarume naiɀoɀo here? Kwete, ʋana ʋaŋgu, nokuti ndineshuŋgu kwaɀo nokuɗa kwenyu, nokuti ruʋoko rwaJehova runorwa neni.
Ipapo ʋakacema ɀe kwaɀo, Orpa akaȿeta ʋamŋene ʋake, asi Rute wakaʋanamatira.
Akati: Tarira, ʋakoma ʋako ʋadzokera kuʋanhu ʋako, nokumŋari wake; dzoka newe ʋo, uteʋere ʋakoma ʋako.

Rute akati: Musandirwaririra kuti ndikusiyei, ndirege kukuteʋerai; nokuti pamunoenda, neni ndicaenda’po ʋo; pamunoʋata, neni ndicaʋata’po ʋo; ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, naMŋari wenyu ucaʋa Mŋari waŋgu;
pamunondofira, ndi’po pandicandofira neni ʋo, ndi’po pandicaʋigwa ʋo; Jehova ŋgaandiroʋe, arambe aciɗaro, kana imi neni tikaparadzaniswa necinhu, asi norufu ɓedzi.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti watsuŋgirira kwaɀo kuenda naye, akarega kuzotaura naye.
Naiɀoɀo iʋaʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakafamba kuȿikira paBeti‐rehemi. Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika paBeti‐rehemi, guta rose rikashamiswa pamsoro paʋo; ʋakadzi ʋakati: Uyu ndiye Naome here?
Akati kwaʋari: Regai kundiidza Naome, asi mundiidze Mara, nokuti Wamasimba‐ose wakandiitira ɀinoʋaʋa kwaɀo.
Ndakaɓuɗa ndizere, Jehova akandidzosera ɀe kumusha ndisinecinhu; munondiidzireiko Naome, Jehova ɀaakandipupurira mhoȿa, Wamasimba‐ose ɀaakandimanikidza?
Naiɀoɀo Naome akadzoka naRute muMoabi, mukadzi womŋana wake, ʋacibva kunyika yaMoabi; ʋakaȿika paBeti‐rehemi ʋanhu ʋotaŋga kukohwa bari.
Ɀino Naome wakaŋga anehama yomurume wake, murume wakaŋga anesimba nefuma, weimba yaErimereki, wainzi Boazi.
Rute muMoabi akati kunaNaome: Nditenderei ndiende kumunda, ndindoʋuŋganidza hura dzeɀiyo shure kwaiye unondinzwira nyasha. Akati kwaari: Enda hako, mŋana waŋgu.
Iye akaenda, akandoʋuŋganidza pamunda aciteʋera ʋaceki; akaʋa neropa rakanaka kuti wakaȿika pamunda waBoazi weimba yaErimereki.
Ɀino ʋonei, Boazi wakabva Beti‐rehemi, akati kuʋaceki: Jehova aʋe nemi. Iʋo ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Jehova akuropafadzei ʋo.
Boazi akati kumuranda wake wakaŋga ari mutariri waʋaceki: Musikana uyu ndowaniko?
Muranda, wakaŋga ari mutariri waʋaceki, akapindura, akati: Ndiye musikana muMoabi, wakadzoka naNaome ʋacibva kunyika yaMoabi;
iye akati: Nditenderei ʋo ndiʋuŋganidze, ndinoŋge shure kwaʋaceki pakati peɀisote; naiɀoɀo akaʋuya, akaswera’po kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira ɀino; asi wakagara mumba ŋguʋa ɗuku.
Ipapo Boazi akati kunaRute: Cinzwa hako, mŋanasikana waŋgu. Usandoʋuŋganidza kunomumŋe munda, ʋuye usabva pano, asi urambire pano kuʋasikana ʋaŋgu.
Meso ako ŋgaarambe acitarira munda waʋanoceka, newe uʋateʋere; ndakaraira majaya aŋgu kuti ʋarege kukutambudza. Kana ukanzwa nyota, enda hako kumidziyo, unwe mvura yakatekwa namajaya.
Ipapo akawira pasi neciso cake, akakotamira pasi, akati kwaari: Ndanzwirwa nyasha nemi neiko, kuti muʋe nehanya neni, ɀandiri mutorwa haŋgu?

Boazi akapindura, akati kwaari: Ndakaziʋiswa ɀose ɀawakaitira ʋamŋene ʋako kubva pakufa kwomurume wako, kuti wakasiya ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako nenyika kwawakaɓerekerwa, ukaʋuya kuʋanhu ʋawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi kare.
Jehova ŋgaakuripire seɀawakaɓata, upiwe muɓairo wakakwana naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, wawakaʋuya kuzoʋanda pasi pamapapiro ake.
Iye akati: Ndinzwirwe haŋgu nyasha nemi, ishe waŋgu; nokuti makandinyaradza, mukataura ɀakanaka nomurandakadzi wenyu, kunyaŋge ndisina‐kufanana nomumŋe waʋarandakadzi ʋenyu.
