Neŋguʋa yokudya Boazi akati kwaari: Ʋuya pano, udye ciŋgwa, useʋere musuʋa wako muvinega. Iye akagara naʋaceki, iʋo ʋakamugamucidza ɀiyo ɀakakaŋgwa, akadya, akaguta, akasiya ɀimŋe.
Ɀino wakati asimuka kuzoʋuŋganidza
Mumuvomorere ʋo dzimŋe hura patsama, mudzisiye, aʋuŋganidze hake, musamutuka.
Naiɀoɀo akaʋuŋganidza pamunda kuȿikira maɗekwana; akandopura ɀaakaʋuŋganidza, ɀikaʋaʋarira kuȿika efa
Akaɀisimudza, ndokupinda muguta; ʋamŋene ʋake ʋakaʋona ɀaakaŋga aʋuŋganidza; akaɓuɗisa ʋo ɀakaŋga ɀasara aguta hake, akaʋapa iɀo.

Ipapo ʋamŋene ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Wandoʋuŋganidzepiko nhasi? Wandoɓate‐ɓasa kupiko? Iye wakaʋa nehanya newe ŋgaaropafadzwe. Akaʋudza ʋamŋene ʋake kuti wakandoɓate‐ɓasa kunani, akati: Zita romurume wandakandoɓata kwaari nhasi ndiBoazi.
Naome akati kumukadzi womŋana wake: Ŋgaaropafadzwe naJehova, iye usina‐kubvisa ŋgoni dzake kuʋapenyu naʋakafa. Naome akati kwaari: Murume uyu ihama yeɗu yomumba, mumŋe waʋadzikinuri ʋeɗu.
Rute muMoabi akati: Hoŋo, wakati kwandiri: Unofanira kurambira kumajaya aŋgu, kuȿikira ʋapedza kuceka ɀose ɀaŋgu.
Naome akati kunaRute, mukadzi womŋana wake: Ɀakanaka mŋana waŋgu, kuti uende naʋasikana ʋake, urege kuʋonekwa kunomumŋe munda.
Naiɀoɀo akarambira kuʋasikana ʋaBoazi, akaʋuŋganidza kuȿikira pakupera kwokucekwa kwebari nokucekwa kweɀiyo; akagara naʋamŋene ʋake.
Ɀino Naome, ʋamŋene ʋake, akati kwaari: Mŋanasikana waŋgu, handifaniri kukutȿakira zororo, kuti ufare here?
Ɀino Boazi, kwawakaŋga uri kuʋasikana ʋake, haizi hama yeɗu here? Tarira iye ucarudza bari maɗekwanano paɓuriro.
Ɀino ciɀishambidza, uzore mafuta, ufuke ŋguʋo dzako, ndokuɓurukira kuɓuriro; asi usaɀiratidza kumurume uyo, kuȿikira apedza kudya nokunwa.
Ɀino kana iye acindoʋata, iwe unofanira kucerekedza paanondoʋata, ugoenda ndokufukura tsoka dzake, ndokuʋata’po pasi; iye ucakuʋudza ɀaucafanira kuita.
Akati kwaari: Ɀose ɀamunondiʋudza ndicaɀiita.
Ipapo akaɓurukira kuɓuriro, akandoita ɀose ɀaakaŋga arairwa naʋamŋene ʋake.
Ɀino Boazi wakati apedza kudya nokunwa, mŋoyo wake ukafara, akandoʋata pamuceto womurwi weɀiyo; ipapo iye akanatso‐ȿika, akafukura tsoka dzake, ndokuʋata pasi.
Pakati poʋusiku murume akavunduka, akashanduka, ʋonei mukadzi uʋete patsoka dzake.
Akati: Ndiwe aniko? Akapindura, akati: Ndini Rute, murandakadzi wenyu; fukidzai murandakadzi wenyu neŋguʋo yenyu, nokuti muri hama yomumba.
Ipapo iye akati: Uropafadzwe naJehova, mŋanasikana waŋgu, nokuti pakupedzisira wakaita nokunaka kupfuʋura pakutaŋga; nokuti hauna‐kuteʋera majaya, kunyaŋge aiʋa ʋarombo kana ʋafumi.
Ɀino mŋanasikana waŋgu, usatya hako; ndicakuitira ɀose seɀaunotaura; nokuti ʋose ʋeguta raŋgu ʋanoziʋa kuti uri mukadzi wakanaka kwaɀo.
Ɀino iɀo ɀirokwaɀo kuti ini ndiri hama yomumba, asi kuneimŋe hama iri pedyo kupfuʋure’ni.

Ʋata hako ʋusiku bguno; ɀino maŋgwana, kana iye aciɗa kukuitira ɀinofanira kuitwa nehama, ndiɀo haɀo; ŋgaaite ɀinofanira kuitwa nehama; asi kana asiŋgaɗi kukuitira ɀinofanira kuitwa nehama, ini ndicakuitira ɀinofanira kuitwa nehama, ndinopika naJehova mupenyu; ciʋata hako kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Iye akaʋata patsoka dzake kuȿikira maŋgwanani, akamuka ʋanhu ʋacigere kunatso‐ʋona. Nokuti wakati: Ŋgaɀirege kuzikanwa, kuti mukadzi wakaʋuya paɓuriro.
Akati: Ʋuya neŋguʋo yawakafuka, uiɓate; akaiɓata, iye akayera ɀiyero ɀitanhatu ɀebari, akamutakudza iɀo, akapinda muguta.
Ɀino wakati aciȿika kuʋamŋene ʋake, iʋo ʋakati: Ɀazoɗiniko mŋana waŋgu? akaʋaʋudza ɀose ɀaakaŋga aitirwa nomurume uya.
Akati: Iye wandipa ɀiyero iɀi ɀitanhatu ɀebari, nokuti wakati: Usaenda kuʋamŋene ʋako usinecinhu.
Ɀino ʋakati: Cigara hako, mŋana waŋgu, kuȿikira waʋona mugumo weshoko iri; nokuti murume uyu haaŋgazorori kuȿikira apedza shoko iri nhasi.
Ɀino Boazi wakakwira kusuʋo, akagara pasi’po; hama yomumba yakaŋga yarebga naBoazi, ndokupfuʋura napo; akati kwaari: Nhai’we, tsaukira ʋuno, ugare pasi. Iye akatsauka, akagara pasi.
Akatora ʋarume ʋanegumi kuʋakuru ʋeguta, akati: Garai pasi pano. Iʋo ʋakagara pasi.
Ɀino akati kuhama yomumba: Naome, uya wakadzoka acibva kunyika yaMoabi, unoɗa kuteŋgesa mugoʋe wenyika waiʋa womunuŋuna weɗu Erimereki;

ndakati ndicakuʋudza iɀoɀo, ndiciti: Ciuteŋga pamberi paʋanhu ʋagere pano, napamberi paʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋaŋgu. Kana uciɗa kuudzikinura, ndiʋudze, ciudzikinura hako, asi kana usiŋgaɗi kuudzikinura, ndiʋudze, ndiziʋe, nokuti hakuna‐uŋgaudzikinura asi iwe; unokuteʋera ndini. Akati: Ndicaudzikinura ini.
Ɀino Boazi akati: Zuʋa iro raunoteŋga munda uyo kunaNaome, unofanira kuuteŋga ʋo kunaRute muMoabi, mukadzi wowakafa, kuti umutse zita rowakafa panhaka yake.
Hama iyo yomumba ikati: Handigoni kuɀidzikinurira uyo, kuti ndirege kutadzira nhaka yaŋgu; citora hako iwe simba raŋgu rokudzikinura, nokuti ini handigoni kuudzikinura.

Ɀino iyi ndiyo tsika yakaŋga iri’po kare pakati paʋaIsraeri kana ʋacidzikinura nokutsinhanha, kuti ɀose ɀisimbiswe: Munhu waibvisa shaŋgu yake, ndokuipa hama yake; ndiwo waiʋa mutoʋo wokupupura nawo paʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino hama iyo yomumba ikati kunaBoazi: Ciɀiteŋgera hako uyo. Akabvisa shaŋgu yake.
Ɀino Boazi akati kuʋakuru nokuʋanhu ʋose: Imi muri ɀapupu nhasi, kuti ndateŋga kunaNaome ɀose ɀaiʋa ɀaErimereki, neɀose ɀaiʋa ɀaKirioni neɀaMaroni.

Ndateŋga ʋo Rute muMoabi, mukadzi waMaroni, kuti aʋe mukadzi waŋgu, kuti ndimutse zita rowakafa panhaka yake, zita rowakafa rirege kuroʋa pakati pehama dzake napasuʋo renɀimbo yake; imi muri ɀapupu nhasi.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari pasuʋo naʋakuru ʋakati: Tiri ɀapupu heɗu. Jehova ŋgaaite mukadzi uyu waʋuya kumba kwako saRakeri ʋuye saRea, iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakaʋaka imba yaIsraeri; newe ʋo uʋe nesimba paEfrata, ukurumbire paBeti‐rehemi;
imba yako iʋe seimba yaPerezi, wakaɓerekerwa Juda naTamari, naʋana ʋaucapiwa naJehova kumukadzi uyu uciri muɗuku.
Ipapo Boazi akawana Rute, akaʋa mukadzi wake, akapinda kwaari, Jehova akamutoresa mimba, akapona mŋanakomana.
Ɀino ʋakadzi ʋakati kunaNaome: Jehova ŋgaakudzwe, usina‐kukushaisa hama yomumba nhasi, zita rake rikurumbire pakati paIsraeri.
Ucaʋa kwauri muraramisi woʋupenyu, nomuriritiri woʋucembere bgako; nokuti mukadzi womŋana wako uyu, unokuɗa, unopfuʋura ʋanakomana ʋanomŋe kwauri, ndiye wakamuɓereka.
Ɀino Naome akatora mŋana, akamufuŋgatira pacifuʋa cake, akaʋa mureri wake.
Ʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋagere naye ʋakamutumidza zita, ʋaciti: Naome wakaponerwa mŋanakomana; ʋakamutumidza zita rinonzi Obedi; ndiye wakazoʋa ɓaɓa ʋaJese, ɓaɓa ʋaDavidi.
Ɀino ndiwo marudzi aPerezi: Perezi wakaɓereka Hezroni;
Hezroni akaɓereka Rami, Rami akaɓereka Aminadabi;
Aminadabi akaɓereka Nashoni, Nashoni akaɓereka Sarmoni;
Sarmoni akaɓereka Boazi, Boazi akaɓereka Obedi;
Obedi akaɓereka Jese, Jese akaɓereka Davidi.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe murume weRamataimi‐zofimi, wenyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, wainzi Erikana, mŋanakomana waJehorami, mŋanakomana waErihu, mŋanakomana waTohu, mŋanakomana waZufi, muEfrata.
Iye wakaŋga anaʋakadzi ʋaʋiri, zita romumŋe rainzi Hana, ʋuye zita romumŋe rainzi Penina; Penina wakaŋga anaʋana, asi Hana wakaŋga asinaʋana.
Ɀino murume uyu waisikwira gore rimŋe nerimŋe acibva kuguta rake kundonamata nokuɓayira Jehova wehondo paShiro. Ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri ʋaEri, Hofni naPinehasi, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋari ʋaprista ʋaJehova.
Ɀino zuʋa rokuɓayira kwake rakati riciȿika, Erikana akapa mukadzi wake Penina, naʋanakomana ʋake ʋose naʋanasikana ʋake migoʋe yaʋo;
asi Hana wakamupa migoʋe miʋiri; nokuti wakaŋga aciɗa Hana, asi Jehova wakaŋga azarira ciɀaro cake.
Ɀino muʋeŋgi wake akamunetsa kwaɀo, kuti aɀidye mŋoyo, nokuti Jehova wakazarira ciɀaro cake.
Akaita saiɀoɀo gore rimŋe nerimŋe, kana acikwira kuimba yaJehova; akamunetsa saiɀoɀo, saka wakacema, akaramba kudya.
Ɀino murume wake Erikana akati kwaari: Hana, unocemeiko? Unorambireiko kudya? Mŋoyo wako uneshuŋgu nei? Ko ini handikupfuʋuriri ʋanakomana ʋanegumi here?
Saka Hana wakasimuka, ʋapedza kudya paShiro, ʋuye ʋapedza kunwa. Ɀino Eri muprista wakaŋga agere pacigaro cake pamukoʋa wetembere yaJehova.
Ɀino Hana wakaŋga aneshuŋgu kwaɀo, akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, akacema kwaɀo.

Akapika mhiko, akati: Jehova wehondo, kana mukaʋa nehanya kwaɀo nokutambudzika kwomurandakadzi wenyu, mukandiraŋgarira, mukasakaŋganwa murandakadzi wenyu, asi mukapa murandakadzi wenyu mŋana womukomana, ipapo ndicamupa Jehova mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake, musoro wake hauŋgaʋeʋurwi neciȿo.
Ɀino wakati aciramba acinyeŋgetera pamberi paJehova, Eri akacerekedza muromo wake.
Nokuti Hana wakaŋga acitaura necomumŋoyo make, miromo yake yoga yakaŋga icimeŋenyedzwa, asi inzwi rake rakaŋga risiŋganzwiki; saka Eri wakati waɓatwa
Eri akati kwaari: Ucaramba wakaɓatwa kuȿikira riniko? Rasha waini yako.
Hana akapindura akati: Kwete, ishe waŋgu, ndiri mukadzi uneshuŋgu pamŋeya, handinakunwa waini, kana ɀinoɓata, asi ndaɗurura mŋeya waŋgu pamberi paJehova.
Musati murandakadzi wenyu mŋanasikana wakaiȿo‐ipa, nokuti kuȿikira ɀino ndakaŋga ndicitaura nokuɗa kwokucema kwaŋgu kukuru nokutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Ipapo Eri akamupindura, akati: Enda hako norugare; Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakupe cawakakumbira kwaari.
Iye akati: Murandakadzi wenyu ŋgaanzwirwe tsitsi nemi. Naiɀoɀo mukadzi akaenda hake, akazodya, ciso cake cikashanduka.
Ɀino ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakanamata kunaJehova, ʋakadzokera ndokuȿika kumba kwaʋo paRama; Erikana akaziʋa mukadzi wake Hana, Jehova akamuraŋgarira.
Ŋguʋa yakati yapfuʋura, Hana akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Samueri, aciti: Nokuti ndakamukumbira kunaJehova.
Ɀino murume Erikana naʋose ʋeimba yake ʋakakwira kunaJehova kundoɓayira ciɓayiro cegore rimŋe nerimŋe,
Asi Hana haana‐kukwira, nokuti wakati kumurume wake:

Erikana murume wake akati kwaari: Ita seɀaunofuŋga; cimbogara hako kuȿikira wamurumura; asi Jehova ŋgaasimbise shoko rake. Naiɀoɀo mukadzi akambogara hake, akamŋisa mŋanakomana wake, kuȿikira amurumura.
Wakati amurumura, akakwira naye anenzombe nhatu, neefa
Ɀino ʋakaɓaya nzombe, ʋakaisa mŋana kunaEri.
akati: Ishe waŋgu, nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, ishe waŋgu, ndini mukadzi wakaɗeya kumira pano pamberi penyu, ndicinyeŋgetera kunaJehova.
Ndakakumbira mŋana uyu, Jehova akandipa candakakumbira kwaari;
saka neni ʋo ndamupa Jehova; mazuʋa ose okurarama kwake wakapiwa Jehova. Akanamata kunaJehova ipapo.
Hana akanyeŋgetera, akati:
Mŋoyo waŋgu unofarira Jehova,
Runyaŋga rwaŋgu rwakakwiridzwa munaJehova;
Muromo waŋgu wakashamira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
Nokuti ndinofarira ruponeso rwenyu.
Hakunomutȿene wakafanana naJehova;
Nokuti hakunomumŋe kunze kwenyu.
Ʋuye hakuneɗombo rakafanana naMŋari weɗu.
Musaramba mucitaura muciɀikudza ɀikuru,
Manyawi ŋgaarege kuɓuɗa pamiromo yenyu;
Nokuti Jehova ndiMŋari unoziʋa,
Maɓasa
Ʋuta bgaʋanhu ʋanesimba bgakavunika,
Ʋakaŋga ʋacigumburwa ʋakasuŋgwa ɀiʋuno nesimba.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakaguta ʋakandoɓatira ɀokudya ɀaʋo,
Ʋakaŋga ʋanenzara ʋozorora.
Wakaŋga asiŋgaɓereki wakaɓereka ʋanomŋe;
Asi iye wakaŋga anaʋana ʋazhinji woshaiwa simba.
Jehova ndiye unoʋuraya, nokuraramisa ʋo;
Ndiye unoɓurusira kubgiro, nokukwidza ʋo.
Jehova ndiye unopa ʋurombo,
ndiye unofumisa ʋo.
Ndiye unoɗukupisa, nokukwiridza ʋo.
Ndiye unosimudza ʋarombo paguruʋa,
Unosimudza rombe, acimubvisa paɗurunhuru;
Kuti aʋagarise pamŋe cete namacinda,
Aʋagarise nhaka yecigaro coʋushe cinobginya.
Nokuti mbiru dzenyika ndedzaJehova,
Iye wakateya nyika pamsoro padzo.
Ucaceŋgeta tsoka dzaʋatȿene ʋake,
Asi ʋakaipa ʋacanyaradzwa murima;
Nokuti hakunomunhu ucakunda nesimba rake.
Ʋanorwa naJehova ʋacapxanyiwa;
Ucaʋatinhirira ari kuɗeŋga;
Jehova ucatoŋga migumo yenyika;
Ucapa mambo wake simba,
Nokukwiridza runyaŋga rwomuzodzwa wake.
Ɀino Erikana akaenda kumba kwake paRama. Mŋana akaɓatira Jehova pamberi pomuprista Eri.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaEri ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanhu ʋakaiȿo‐ipa; haʋana‐kuraŋgarira Jehova.
Tsika yaʋaprista pamberi paʋanhu yakaŋga iri iyi: Kana aninani akaʋuya neciɓayiro, muranda womuprista waiʋuya aneciɓayiso cenyama cinameno matatu muruʋoko rwake, kana nyama iciɓikwa;
ɀino ndokuɓaya naco mugaŋgo, kana muharyana, kana mugate, kana muhari; ɀose ɀaiɓuɗiswa neciɓayiso cenyama ɀaitorwa nomuprista. Ndiɀo ɀaʋaiitira ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaiʋuya paShiro.
Ɀino kunyaŋge ʋasati ʋapisa mafuta, muranda womuprista waiʋuya, ndokuti kumunhu wakaŋga aciɓayira: Ndipe nyama yokugocera muprista; nokuti haaŋgagamuciri kwauri nyama yakaɓikwa, asi mbishi.
Ɀino kana munhu uyo akati kwaari: Ŋgaʋataŋge kupisa mafuta, ugotora hako ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako, ipapo iye ndokuti: Kwete, cindipa iyo ɀino; kana usiŋgaɗi, ndicaitora nesimba.
Ɀiʋi ɀamajaya ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀikuru pamberi paJehova, nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaɀidza cipiriso caJehova.
Asi Samueri waiɓata pamberi paJehova, aciri mŋana hake, akasuŋgwa ciʋuno neefodi yomuceka.
Namai ʋake ʋo ʋakamuitira ŋguʋo ɗuku, ʋakaʋuya nayo kwaari gore rimŋe nerimŋe, kana oʋuya nomurume wake kuzoɓayira ciɓayiro cegore rimŋe nerimŋe.
Eri akaropafadza Erikana nomukadzi wake, akati: Jehova ŋgaakupe ʋana kumukadzi uyu panɀimbo yaiye wamakapa Jehova. Ʋakaenda kumusha kwaʋo.
Ɀino Jehova akashanyira Hana, akaʋa nemimba, akazoɓereka ʋanakomana ʋatatu naʋanasikana ʋaʋiri. Iye mŋana Samueri akazokura pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino Eri wakaŋga akwegura kwaɀo; akanzwa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiciitirwa ʋaIsraeri ʋose naʋanakomana ʋake, namaʋatire aʋaiita naʋakadzi ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa pamukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.
Akati kwaʋari: Munoitireiko ɀinhu ɀakaɗai? Nokuti ndinoŋgosinzwa kuʋanhu ʋose aʋa ɀakaipa ɀamunoita.
Kwete, ʋana ʋaŋgu; nokuti mashoko andinonzwa haana‐kunaka; munoɗarikisa ʋanhu ʋaJehova.

Kana munhu mumŋe akatadzira mumŋe, mutoŋgi ucamutoŋga mhoȿa yake; asi kana munhu akatadzira Jehova, ndianiko ucamureʋerera? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, haʋana kuterera inzwi raɓaɓa ʋaʋo, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aciɗa kuʋaʋuraya.
Iye mŋana Samueri akaramba acikura, akaɗikanwa naJehova ʋuye naʋanhu ʋo.
Ɀino mumŋe murume waMŋari akaʋuya kunaEri, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Handina‐kuɀiratidza here kuimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, ʋaciri Egipita ʋakasuŋgwa neimba yaFarao here?

Handina‐kumutsaura here pakati pamarudzi aIsraeri, kuti aʋe muprista waŋgu, akwire kuartari yaŋgu kupisa ɀinonhuwira, nokufuka efodi pamberi paŋgu here? Handina‐kupa imba yaɓaɓa ʋako ɀipiriso ɀose ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀinopiswa here?
Ɀino munopfunhurireiko ciɓayiro caŋgu necipiriso caŋgu, ɀandakaraira mumba

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova waIsraeri: Ndakati nomŋoyo wose kuti imba yako, neimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, ʋafambe pamberi paŋgu nokusiŋgaperi, asi ɀino ɀanzi naJehova: Handiŋgaɗaro, nokuti ʋanondikudza ndicaʋakudza ʋo, ʋanondiɀidza ndicaʋashoʋora ʋo.
Tarira, mazuʋa acaȿika, andicagura nawo ruʋoko rwako, noruʋoko rwaʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, kuȿikira pasisinamutana paimba yako.
Ucaʋona kutambudzika kweimba yaŋgu, pakati pefuma yose icapiwa Israeri
Munhu weimba yako wandicarega kubvisa paartari yaŋgu, iye ucapedza meso ako, nokucemedza mŋoyo wako; ʋana ʋose ʋeimba yako ʋacafa ʋaciri ʋarume ʋanesimba raʋo.
Ɀino heci ciratidzo candinokupa, cicaitika kuʋanakomana ʋako ʋaʋiri Hofni naPinehasi, ʋacafa ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri nomusi mumŋe.
Neni ndicaɀimutsira muprista wakatendeka, ucaita ɀiri pamŋoyo waŋgu nomuraŋgariro waŋgu; ndicamuʋakira imba yakasimba, ucafamba pamberi pomuzodzwa waŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe uneŋge asara paimba yako, ucaʋuya kuzomufugamira, acikumbira cimari cesirveri neɓundu reciŋgwa, aciti: Ƌondipai ʋo rimŋe ɓasa raʋaprista, ndidye ʋo cimeɗu ceciŋgwa.
Ɀino mŋana Samueri waiɓatira Jehova pamberi paEri. Asi shoko raJehova rakaŋga ricinzwika kashoma pamazuʋa iwayo;
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Eri wakati aʋata pasi panɀimbo yake, (meso ake ɀino akaŋga oʋonera madzerere, asiŋgagoni kuʋona kwaɀo,)
mŋenje waMŋari usati wadzimŋa, naSamueri akaŋga aʋata pasi patembere yaJehova, pakaŋga paneareka yaMŋari;
Jehova akaɗana Samueri. Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akamhanyira kunaEri, akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu, nokuti mandiɗana. Eri akati: Handina‐kukuɗana, ciʋata hako ɀe. Iye akandoʋata ɀe.
Ipapo Jehova akapamha ɀe kuɗana, akati: Samueri! Samueri akamuka, akaenda kunaEri, akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu, nokuti mandiɗana. Akapindura, akati: Handina‐kukuɗana, mŋana waŋgu; ciʋata hako ɀe.
Asi Samueri wakaŋga acigere kuziʋa Jehova, ʋuye shoko raJehova rakaŋga ricigere kumuziʋiswa.
Ɀino Jehova akapamha ɀe kuɗana Samueri rwecitatu. Iye akamuka, akaenda kunaEri, akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu, nokuti mandiɗana. Ipapo Eri akaziʋa kuti ndiJehova wakaɗana mŋana.
Saka Eri akati kunaSamueri: Cindoʋata hako; ɀino kana iye okuɗana, uti: Taurai Jehova, nokuti muranda wenyu unonzwa. Naiɀoɀo Samueri akaenda, akandoʋata panɀimbo yake.
Ipapo Jehova akaʋuya, akamira, akaɗana sapaŋguʋa dzimŋe dzokutaŋga, akati: Samueri, Samueri! Samueri akati: Taurai henyu, nokuti muranda wenyu unonzwa.
Jehova akati kunaSamueri: Tarira, ndicaita cinhu pakati paIsraeri, nzeʋe dzomumŋe nomumŋe unocinzwa dzicawuŋga.
Nomusi uyo ndicaitira Eri ɀose ɀandakataura pamsoro peimba yake, kubva pakutaŋga kuȿikira pakupedzisira.
Nokuti ndakamuʋudza kuti ndicatoŋgesa imba yake nokusiŋgaperi pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaakaŋga aciziʋa hake; nokuti ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaciɀigadzirira kutukwa, asi iye haana‐kuʋadziʋisa.
Saka ndakapika pamsoro peimba yaEri, kuti ɀakaipa ɀeimba yaEri haɀiŋgayananiswi neɀiɓayiro kana neɀipiriso nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino Samueri akaʋata kuȿikira maŋgwana, akazarura mikoʋa yeimba yaJehova. Asi Samueri wakatya kuziʋisa Eri ɀaakaŋga aratidzwa.
Ɀino Eri akaɗana Samueri, akati: Samueri, mŋana waŋgu. Iye akati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati: Cinyiko cawakaʋudzwa
Ipapo Samueri akamurondedzera ɀose‐ɀose, haana‐kumuʋanzira cinhu cimŋe. Eri akati: NdiJehova, ŋgaaite hake seɀaanoɗa.
Samueri akakura; Jehova akaʋa naye, haana‐kutendera kuti rimŋe ramashoko ake riwire pasi.
ƲaIsraeri ʋose, kubva paDani kuȿikira paBeeri‐sheba, ʋakaziʋa kuti Samueri wakaŋga asimbiswa kuʋa muprofita waJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akaɀiratidza ɀe paShiro, nokuti Jehova wakaɀiratidza kunaSamueri paShiro neshoko raJehova.
Shoko raSamueri rakaȿika kuʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋakaenda kundorwa naʋaFiristia, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pedyo neEbeni‐ezeri; ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo paAfeki.
ƲaFiristia ʋakaɀigadzira kurwa naʋaIsraeri; ɀino ʋakati ʋorwa, ʋaIsraeri ʋakakundwa naʋaFiristia, ʋakaʋuraya pakati paʋakaŋga ʋakagadzirirwa kurwa ʋarume ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀinna.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaȿika kumisasa, ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri ʋakati: Jehova wakatiroʋereiko nhasi pamberi paʋaFiristia? Hendei, titore areka yesuŋgano yaJehova paShiro, iʋuye pakati peɗu itirwire pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakatuma nhume Shiro kundotora’po areka yesuŋgano yaJehova wehondo, ugere pamsoro pamakerubi; ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri ʋaEri, Hofni naPinehasi, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po paareka yesuŋgano yaMŋari.
Ɀino areka yesuŋgano yaJehova yakati yaȿika pamisasa, ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakapururudza nokupururudza kukuru, nyika ikaita mawuŋgira.
ƲaFiristia ʋakati ʋacinzwa inzwi rokupururudza, ʋakati: Inzwi iro rokupururudza riri kumisasa yaʋaHeberu rinoti kuɗiniko? Ʋakanzwa kuti areka yaJehova yaȿika kumisasa.
ƲaFiristia ʋakatya, nokuti ʋakati: Mŋari waȿika kumisasa. Ʋakati: Tinenhamo! nokuti cinhu cakaɗai hacina‐kumboʋa’po.
Tinenhamo! Ndianiko ucatirwira pamaʋoko aʋamŋari aʋa ʋane‐simba? Ndiʋo ʋamŋari ʋakaɗeya kuroʋa ʋaEgipita namaɗambudziko amarudzi mazhinji murenje.
Simbai, muite saʋarume, imi ʋaFiristia, kuti murege kuʋa ʋaranda ʋaʋaHeberu, seɀaʋaŋga ʋakaita kwamuri; itai saʋarume, murwe.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakarwa, ʋaIsraeri ʋakakundwa, ʋakatiza, mumŋe nomumŋe kutente rake, kukaʋa’po kuʋurawa kukuru; nokuti kuʋaIsraeri kwakafa ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu ʋaifamba namakumbo.
Areka yaMŋari ikatorwa, ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri ʋaEri, Hofni naPinehasi, ʋakaʋurawa.
Ɀino mumŋe murume waʋaBenjamini akabva kuhondo, akamhanya, akaȿika paShiro nomusi iwoyo, aneŋguʋo dzakabvarurwa neguruʋa pamusoro wake.

Pakuȿika kwake, Eri wakaŋga agere pacigaro cake kurutiʋi rwenzira, akataririra, nokuti mŋoyo wake wakaŋga ucibvunda pamsoro peareka yaMŋari. Murume wakati aȿika muguta, akaʋaʋudza iɀoɀo, ʋanhu ʋose ʋeguta ʋakacema.
Ɀino Eri wakati acinzwa inzwi rokucema, akati: Inzwi reɓopoto iri rinoti kuɗiniko? Murume akakurumidza, akandoʋudza Eri.
Ɀino Eri wakaŋga aʋa namakore anamakumi mapfumbamŋe namasere, meso ake akaŋga aʋa norutara, asicagoni kuʋona kwaɀo.
Murume akati kunaEri: Ndini ndakabva kuhondo, ndatiza nhasi kuhondo. Akati: Kwaitweiko, mŋana waŋgu?

Ɀino murume wakaŋga aʋuya neshoko akapindura, akati: ƲaIsraeri ʋatiza pamberi paʋaFiristia; ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaʋurawa; ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋenyu ʋaʋiri, Hofni naPinehasi, ʋafa ʋo; ʋuye areka yaMŋari yatorwa.
Ɀino wakati acireʋa areka yaMŋari,

Ɀino mukadzi womŋanakomana wake Pinehasi, wakaŋga aʋa nemimba, oɗa‐kupona mŋana; akati acinzwa kuti areka yaMŋari yatorwa, ʋuye kuti ɓaɓa ʋomurume wake, nomurume wake ʋo, ʋafa ʋose, akafugama, akapona mŋana, nokuti wakaȿikirwa nokurwadziwa kwake.
Neŋguʋa yokufa kwake ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po naye ʋakati: Usatya hako, nokuti wapona mŋana womukomana. Asi haana‐kupindura, kana kuraŋgarira iɀoɀo.
Akatumidza mŋana zita rinonzi Ikabodi, aciti: Kukudzwa kwabviswa kunaIsraeri; nokuti areka yaMŋari yakaŋga yatorwa, ʋuye nokuɗa kwaɓaɓa ʋomurume wake, nomurume wake.
Akati: Kukudzwa kwabviswa kunaIsraeri; nokuti areka yaMŋari yatorwa.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakatora areka yaMŋari, ʋakabva nayo Ebeni‐ezeri, ʋakaiisa Ashdodi.
ƲaFiristia ʋakatora areka yaMŋari ʋakaiisa mumba maDagoni, ʋakaigadzika kurutiʋi rwaDagoni.
Ɀino ʋeAshdodi ʋakati ʋacimuka maŋgwanani, ʋonei Dagoni wawira pasi neciso pamberi peareka yaJehova. Ʋakatora Dagoni, ʋakamugadzika ɀe panɀimbo yake.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋacimuka maŋgwanani, ʋonei Dagoni wawira pasi neciso pamberi peareka yaJehova; nomusoro waDagoni neɀanza ɀamaʋoko ake ose maʋiri ɀakaŋga ɀavunika, ɀiri pacikumbaridzo comukoʋa; Dagoni wakaŋga asarirwa
Saka ʋaprista ʋaDagoni, naʋose ʋanopinda mumba maDagoni, haʋatsiki pacikumbaridzo caDagoni paAshdodi kuȿikira nhasi.
Asi ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakatambudza ʋeAshdodi, akaʋaparadza nokuʋaroʋa namamota, iʋo ʋeAshdodi nenyika yaʋo.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeAshdodi ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ndiɀo ɀaʋanoitirwa, ʋakati: Areka yaMŋari waIsraeri ŋgairege kugara pakati peɗu; nokuti ruʋoko rwake runotitambudza isu namŋari weɗu Dagoni.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakatuma nhume kundoʋuŋganidza kwaʋari madzishe ose aʋaFiristia, ʋakati: Ticaita seiko neareka yaMŋari waIsraeri? Ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Areka yaMŋari waIsraeri ŋgaiiswe Gati. Ʋakaisa areka yaMŋari ikoko.
Ʋakati ʋaiisa’ko, ruʋoko rwaJehova rukavundusa guta nokuvundusa kukuru; akaroʋa ʋarume ʋeguta, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋakapomerwa mamota.
Naiɀoɀo iʋo ʋakatumira areka yaMŋari Ekroni. Ɀino areka yaMŋari yakati yaȿika Ekroni, ʋeEkroni ʋakacema kwaɀo, ʋakati: Ʋaʋuya neareka yaMŋari waIsraeri kwatiri, kuzotiʋuraya, isu naʋanhu ʋeɗu.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakatuma nhume kundoʋuŋganidza madzishe ose aʋaFiristia, ʋakati: Tumai areka yaMŋari waIsraeri, ibve, idzoserwe kunɀimbo yayo, kuti irege kutiʋuraya, isu naʋanhu ʋeɗu; nokuti guta rose rakaŋga ravunduswa nokuvundusa kworufu; ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaʋatambudza ɀikuru ipapo.
Ʋarume, ʋasino‐kufa, ʋakarobga namamota, kucema kweguta kukakwira kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino areka yaJehova yakagara munyika yaʋaFiristia mŋedzi minomŋe.
ƲaFiristia ʋakaɗana ʋaprista naʋaʋuki, ʋakati: Ticaita seiko neareka yaJehova? Tiziʋisei mutoʋo watiŋgaidzosera nawo kunɀimbo yayo.
Ʋakati: Kana mucidzosera areka yaMŋari waIsraeri, musaituma isinecinhu; asi munofanira kumutumira cipiriso cemhoȿa; ipapo mucapora, mugoziʋa kuti ruʋoko rwake runoregereiko kubviswa kwamuri.

Ɀino ʋakati: Cipiriso cemhoȿa catinofanira kumuripira naco ndeceiko? Ʋakati: Mamota mashanu endarama, namakonzo mashanu endarama, ɀakaenzana namadzishe aʋaFiristia; nokuti makaŋga marobga neɗambudziko rimŋe, imi mose namadzishe enyu.

Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuita mufananidzo wamamota enyu, nomufananidzo wamakonzo enyu anotadzira nyika, mukudze Mŋari waIsraeri; ɀimŋe ucarerusa ruʋoko rwake pamsoro penyu, napamsoro paʋamŋari ʋenyu, napamsoro penyika yenyu.
Mucawomesereiko mŋoyo yenyu, seɀakaita ʋaEgipita naFarao ʋakawomesa mŋoyo yaʋo? Ŋguʋa yaakaita ɀishamiso pakati paʋo, haʋana‐kurega ʋanhu here, ʋakaenda?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino torai mugadzire ŋgoro itȿa, nemhou mbiri dzinomŋisa dzisinakumboiswa joko, musuŋge mhou paŋgoro, asi muraʋurire mhuru dzadzo kumusha;
ɀino mutore areka yaJehova, mugoiisa paŋgoro; neɀishoŋgo ɀendarama, ɀamunomuripira naɀo kuti ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa, muɀiise mubokisi parutiʋi rwayo, mugoituma iende.
Ɀino tarirai, kana ikakwira nenzira yenyika yayo kuBeti‐shemeshi, ndiye wakatiitira njodzi huru iyi; asi kana isiŋgaɗaro, ticaziʋa kuti haruzi ruʋoko rwake rwakatiroʋa, cinhu haco catiwira.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋakaita saiɀoɀo; ʋakatora mhou mbiri dzakaŋga dzicimŋisa, ʋakadzisuŋga paŋgoro, ʋakapfigira mhuru dzadzo kumusha;
ʋakaisa areka yaJehova pamsoro peŋgoro, nebokisi rakaŋga rinamakonzo endarama, nemifananidzo yamamota aʋo.

Ɀino mhou dzikarurama nenzira inoenda Beti‐shemeshi, dzikafamba nenzira huru, dzikaenda dziciŋgokuma; hadzina‐kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe; madzishe aʋaFiristia akadziteʋera kuȿikira kumuganho weBeti‐shemeshi.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋeBeti‐shemeshi ʋakaŋga ʋaciceka ɀiyo ɀaʋo pamupata, ʋakatarira, ʋakaʋona areka, ʋakafara ʋaciiʋona.
Ŋgoro ikaȿika pamunda waJoshua muBeti‐shemeshi, ikamira pakaŋga panebge guru; ipapo ʋakapamura matanda eŋgoro, ʋakaɓayira mhou ʋakadziita cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.

Ɀino ʋaRevi ʋakaɓurusa areka yaJehova, nebokisi rakaŋga riri pairi, makaŋga muneɀishoŋgo ɀendarama, ʋakaɀiisa pabge guru, ʋarume ʋeBeti‐shemeshi ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa ʋakaɓayira Jehova ɀiɓayiro nomusi uyo.
Ɀino madzishe mashanu aʋaFiristia akati aʋona iɀoɀo, akadzokera Ekroni nomusi iwoyo.
Ɀino ndiwo mamota endarama akaripxa namadzishe aʋaFiristia, kuti ciʋe cipiriso cemhoȿa kunaJehova; rimŋe raiʋa reAshdodi, rimŋe reGaza, rimŋe reAshkeroni, rimŋe reGati, rimŋe reEkroni;

namakonzo endarama akaŋga akaenzana namaguta ose aʋaFiristia, akaŋga ari amadzishe mashanu, aiʋa maguta akapoteredzwa namaȿiŋgo nemisha miɗuku yokuruwa. Ʋuye ibge guru raʋakagadzika areka yaJehova pamsoro paro, rici’po pamunda waJoshua muBeti‐shemeshi kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeBeti‐shemeshi ʋakati: Ndianiko unogona kumira pamberi paJehova, Mŋari uyu Mutȿene? Ucakwira kunani, kana acibva kwatiri?
Ipapo ʋakatuma nhume kunaʋakaŋga ʋagere Kiriati‐jearimi, ʋakati: ƲaFiristia ʋadzosa areka yaJehova; ɓurukai imi, muzoiisa kwenyu.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋeKiriati‐jearimi ʋakaʋuya, ʋakatora areka yaJehova, ʋakaiisa kumba kwaAbinadabi pagomo; ʋakatsaura Ereazari mŋanakomana wake, kuti aceŋgete areka yaJehova.
Kubva pamusi wokuȿika kweareka paKiriati‐jearimi, yakagara’po ŋguʋa refu, nokuti akaŋga ari makore makumi maʋiri; imba yose yaIsraeri ikacema kunaJehova.

Samueri akataura neimba yose yaIsraeri, akati: Kana muciɗa kudzokera kunaJehova nomŋoyo wenyu wose, bvisai ʋamŋari ʋatorwa neAshtaroti pakati penyu, mugadzirire Jehova mŋoyo yenyu, mumushumire iye oga; ipapo iye ucakusunuŋgurai pamaʋoko aʋaFiristia.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakabvisa ʋaBaari neAshtaroti, ʋakashumira Jehova oga.
Ɀino Samueri akati: Ʋuŋganidzai ʋaIsraeri ʋose paMizpa, ini ndikunyeŋgetererei kunaJehova.
Ʋakaʋuŋgana paMizpa, ʋakacera mvura, ʋakaiɗururira pamberi paJehova, ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya nomusi iwoyo, ʋakati ipapo: Takatadzira Jehova. Samueri akatoŋga ʋana ʋaIsraeri paMizpa.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana paMizpa, madzishe aʋaFiristia akakwira kundorwa naʋaIsraeri. Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaciɀinzwa ʋakatya ʋaFiristia.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakati kunaSamueri: Musarega henyu kuramba mucicema kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu nokuɗa kweɗu, kuti atirwire pamaʋoko aʋaFiristia.
Samueri akatora gwaiana rinomŋa, akagadzirira Jehova naro cipiriso cinopiswa cose. Samueri akacema kunaJehova nokuɗa kwaʋaIsraeri; Jehova akamunzwa.

Samueri wakati acapisira Jehova cipiriso cinopiswa, ʋaFiristia ʋakasweɗera kuzorwa naʋaIsraeri; asi Jehova akatinhira nokutinhira kukuru pamsoro paʋaFiristia nomusi iwoyo, akaʋavundusa, ʋakakundwa naʋaIsraeri.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaɓuɗa Mizpa, ʋakateʋera ʋaFiristia, ʋakaʋaparadza kuȿikira panyasi peBeti‐kari.
Ɀino Samueri akatora ibge, akarimisa pakati peMizpa neSheni, akaritumidza zita raro Ebeni‐ezeri, aciti: Jehova wakatiɓatsira kuȿikira pano.
ƲaFiristia ʋakakundwa saiɀoɀo; haʋana‐kuzoʋuya ɀe munyika yaʋaIsraeri; ruʋoko rwaJehova rukarwa naʋaFiristia mazuʋa ose aSamueri.

Namaguta akaŋga atorerwa ʋaIsraeri naʋaFiristia akadzoserwa ɀe kuʋaIsraeri, kubva paEkroni kuȿikira paGati, nenyika yaʋo yakasunuŋgurwa naʋaIsraeri pamaʋoko aʋaFiristia; rugare rukaʋa’po pakati paʋaIsraeri naʋaAmori.
Samueri akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Waipota gore rimŋe nerimŋe napaBeti‐eri, neGirgari, neMizpa, akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri panɀimbo idzo dzose.
Akasidzokera Rama, nokuti ndipo paakaŋga agere; akatoŋga ʋaIsraeri ipapo, akaʋakira Jehova artari ipapo.
Ɀino Samueri wakati akwegura akagadza ʋanakomana ʋake kuti ʋaʋe ʋatoŋgi pakati paIsraeri.
Zita romŋana wake weɗaŋgwe rakaŋga riri Joeri, nezita rowecipiri Abija; iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋatoŋgi paBeeri‐sheba.
Asi ʋanakomana ʋake haʋana‐kufamba nenzira dzake, asi ʋakatsaukira kufuma yakaipa, ʋakagamucira fufuro, nokusaruramisa pakutoŋga.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakaʋuya kunaSamueri paRama,
ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, imi makwegura, asi ʋanakomana ʋenyu haʋafambi nenzira dzenyu; ɀino tigadzirei mambo uŋgatitoŋga, seɀinoitwa kundudzi dzose.
Asi shoko iro harina‐kufadza Samueri, iro rokuti: Tipei mambo uŋgatitoŋga. Samueri akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova.
Ipapo Jehova akati kunaSamueri: Terera hako ɀose ɀinotaura ʋanhu kwauri, nokuti haʋana‐kukuramba iwe, asi ʋakandiramba ini, kuti ndirege kuʋa mambo waʋo.
Ɀose ɀaʋakaita kubva zuʋa randakaʋakwidza ndiciʋaɓuɗisa paEgipita kuȿikira nhasi, ʋacindirasha nokushumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ndiɀo ɀaʋanokuitira iwe ʋo.
Ɀino terera hako manzwi aʋo; asi uʋapupurire kwaɀo, uʋaziʋise tsika dzamambo, ucaʋaɓata.
Ɀino Samueri akaʋudza ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋacikumbira mambo kwaari mashoko ose aJehova.
Akati: Tsika dzamambo, ucakuɓatai, ndidzo: Ucatora ʋanakomana ʋenyu akaʋaisa paŋgoro dzake, nokuʋaita ʋataȿi ʋamabiza ake; ʋacamhanya pamberi peŋgoro dzake.
Ucaɀitsaurira ʋamŋe ʋaʋe ʋakuru ʋeɀuru, naʋakuru ʋamakumi mashanu; ucaraira ʋamŋe kumurimira minda yake, nokukohwa micero yake, nokumuitira nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, nenhumbi dzeŋgoro dzake.
Ucatora ʋanasikana ʋenyu, ʋaʋe ʋaveŋganisi ʋeɀinonhuwira, naʋaɓiki ʋeɀokudya, naʋaɓiki ʋeciŋgwa.
Ucatora minda yenyu neminda yenyu yemizambiriŋga, neminda yenyu yemiorivi yakaiȿo‐naka kukunda mimŋe, acipa ʋaranda ʋake.
Ucatora ɀegumi ɀembeu dzenyu, neɀamazambiriŋga enyu, acipa ʋaranda ʋake naʋaɓatiri ʋake.
Ucatora ʋaranda ʋenyu naʋarandakadzi ʋenyu, namajaya enyu akaiȿo‐naka kukunda ʋamŋe ʋose, nemboŋgoro dzenyu, aciɓatisa maɓasa ake naɀo.
Ucatora ɀegumi ɀamapoka enyu amakwai; nemi mucaʋa ʋaranda ʋake.
Nezuʋa iro mucacema kwaɀo nokuɗa kwamambo wenyu wamuneŋge maɀitsaurira; asi Jehova haaŋgakupinduriyi nezuʋa iro.
Asi ʋanhu ʋakaramba kuterera inzwi raSamueri, ʋakati: Kwete, tinoɗa heɗu mambo uŋgatiɓata,
kuti isu ʋo tifanane nedzimŋe ndudzi; mambo weɗu atitoŋge, atituŋgamirire, nokurwa pahondo dzeɗu.
Samueri akanzwa mashoko ose aʋanhu, akaarondedzera panzeʋe dzaJehova.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaSamueri: Terera hako manzwi aʋo, uʋagadzire mambo. Samueri akati kuʋarume ʋaIsraeri: Endai henyu, mumŋe nomumŋe kuguta rake.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomurume waBenjamini, wainzi Kishi, mŋanakomana waAbieri, mŋanakomana waZerori, mŋanakomana waBekorati, mŋanakomana waAfia, mŋanakomana womuBenjamini, munhu waiʋa nesimba noʋumhare.

Uyu munhu wakaŋga anomŋanakomana wainzi Sauro, jaya rakanaka; kwakaŋga kusinomumŋe munhu pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri wakaŋga akamukunda pakunaka; kubva pamafudzi ake kuȿika kumusoro wake wakaŋga akapfuʋura ʋanhu ʋose pakureɓa.
Ɀino mboŋgoro dzaKishi, ɓaɓa ʋaSauro, dzakaŋga dzarashika. Ipapo Kishi akati kunaSauro, mŋanakomana wake: Enda nomumŋe waʋaranda, mundotȿaka mboŋgoro.

Iye akapfuʋura nokunyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, akapfuʋura ʋo nokunyika yeSharisha, asi haʋana‐kudziwana; ɀino ʋakapfuʋura ɀe nokunyika yeSharimi, asi naipapo dzakaŋga dzisi’po; ipapo akapfuʋura nokunyika yaʋaBenjamini, asi haʋana‐kudziwana.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika kunyika yeZufi, Sauro akati kumuranda wake, wakaŋga anaye: Ŋgatidzoke heɗu; ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ɀimŋe ʋaŋgarega kufuŋga mboŋgoro, ʋakafuŋganya pamsoro peɗu.
Iye akati kwaari: Tarirai, muguta rino munomunhu waMŋari, munhu unokudzwa kwaɀo; ɀose ɀaanotaura ɀinoitika; hendei ɀino ikoko, ɀimŋe uŋgatiʋudza nzira yatiŋgafamba nayo.
Ɀino Sauro akati kumuranda wake: Asi tarira, kana tikaenda, ticandoʋigirei munhu uyo? Nokuti ɀiŋgwa ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumidziyo yeɗu ɀapera; hapanacipo catiŋgaʋigira munhu waMŋari; tineiko?
Ipapo muranda akapindura ɀe, akati kunaSauro: Tarirai, ndinececinna ceshekeri
(Kare pakati paʋaIsraeri kana munhu ondobvunza Mŋari, waiti: Hendei kumuʋoni; nokuti unonzi Muprofita ɀino wainzi Muʋoni kare.)
Ipapo Sauro akati kumuranda wake: Ishoko rakanaka, hendei. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaenda kuguta kwakaŋga kunomunhu waMŋari.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacikwira kuguta, ʋakasoŋgana naʋasikana ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa kundoteka mvura, ʋakati kwaʋari: Muʋoni uri pano here?
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Uri’po; tarirai, hoyo pamberi penyu; kurumidzai henyu ɀino, nokuti waȿika muguta nhasi; nokuti ʋanhu ʋanoɓayira nhasi paɗunhu rakakwirira.

Kana maŋgoti mapinda muguta, mucamuwana pakarepo acigere kukwira kuɗunhu rakakwirira kundodya’po; nokuti ʋanhu haʋaŋgadyi, iye asati aȿika, nokuti ndiye unoropafadza ciɓayiro; pashure iʋo ʋakakokwa ʋacadya. Naiɀoɀo cikwirai ɀino, nokuti mucamuwana neŋguʋa ino.
Ipapo ʋakakwira kuguta. Ʋakati ʋoȿika muguta, ʋakaʋona Samueri oɓuɗa, akasoŋgana naʋo okwira kuɗunhu rakakwirira.
Ɀino Jehova wakaŋga aziʋisa Samueri zuʋa rakataŋgira kuȿika kwaSauro, akati:

Maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino ndicatuma kwauri munhu unobva kunyika yaBenjamini; unofanira kumuzodza, kuti aʋe mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, aponese ʋanhu ʋaŋgu mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia; nokuti ndakatarira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, nokuti kucema kwaʋo kwakaȿika kwandiri.
Ɀino Samueri wakati aciʋona Sauro, Jehova akati kwaari: Ndiye munhu wandakakuʋudza ndiciti, ndiye ucaɓata ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ipapo Sauro akasweɗera kunaSamueri pasuʋo, akati: Ndiʋudzei ʋo kuti imba yoMuʋoni iripi?
Samueri akapindura Sauro, akati: Ndini Muʋoni; ndituŋgamirirei mukwire kuɗunhu rakakwirira, nokuti munofanira kudya neni nhasi; maŋgwana ndicakutendera kuenda, ndigokuʋudza ʋo ɀose ɀiri pamŋoyo wako.

Asi kana dziri mboŋgoro dzako dzakaŋga dzarashika mazuʋa matatu, usadzifuŋga hako, nokuti dzatowanikwa hadzo. Asi ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa naIsraeri haɀizi kwauri here? Haɀizi kwauri nokunaʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako here?
Sauro akapindura, akati: Ko handizi muBenjamini, worudzi ruɗuku kumarudzi ose aIsraeri here? Ʋuye mhuri yaŋgu haizi ɗuku kumhuri dzose dzorudzi rwaBenjamini here? Munotaurireiko kuɗaro kwandiri?
Samueri akatora Sauro nomuranda wake, akapinda naʋo mumba mokudyira, akaʋagarisa paʋakakudzwa kupfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋakakokwa, ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋaneŋge makumi matatu.
Ɀino Sauro akati kumuɓiki: Ʋuya nomugoʋe wandakakupa ndiciti: Ciuceŋgeta uri woga.
Muɓiki akatora cidɀa neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri paciri, akaɀigadza pamberi paSauro.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaɓuruka paɗunhu rakakwirira, ʋakapinda muguta, akataurirana naSauro paɗeŋga reimba.
Ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, mambakwedza, Samueri akaɗana Sauro paɗeŋga reimba, akati: Muka, ndikuendise. Ipapo Sauro akamuka, ʋakaɓuɗa iye naSamueri ʋari ʋaʋiri.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋoɓuruka pamugumo weguta, Samueri akati kunaSauro: Raira muranda atuŋgamire mberi kweɗu (iye akatuŋgamira hake); asi iwe cimbomira hako, ndikuziʋise shoko raMŋari.
Ɀino Samueri akatora cinu camafuta, akaaɗurura pamusoro wake, akamuȿeta, akati: Jehova haana‐kukuzodza here kuti uʋe mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋenhaka yake?

Kana ukabva kwandiri nhasi, ucandowana ʋarume ʋaʋiri parinda raRakeri, pamuganho waBenjamini, paZerza; iʋo ʋacati kwauri: Mboŋgoro dzawakaŋga ucitȿaka dzawanikwa; ɀino tarira, ɓaɓa ʋako haʋacinehanya nemboŋgoro, asi ʋofuŋganya pamsoro pako, ʋaciti: Ndicaita seiko pamsoro pomŋanakomana waŋgu?

Ɀino ucabva’po ukapfuʋura mberi, ukaȿika pamuouki weTabori; ipapo ucasoŋgana naʋarume ʋatatu ʋanokwira kunaMŋari paBeti‐eri, mumŋe akatakura mbudzana nhatu, mumŋe akatakura mapundu matatu eɀiŋgwa, ʋuye mumŋe akatakura ɗende rewaini;
iʋo ʋacakukwazisa, ndokukupa mapundu maʋiri eɀiŋgwa; ugamucire iɀoɀo pamaʋoko aʋo.

Pashure ucaȿika pagomo raMŋari, paneɓoka raʋarwi raʋaFiristia; ɀino kana uciȿika paguta, ucasoŋgana neɓoka raʋaprofita ʋanoɓuruka paɗunhu rakakwirira ʋakatuŋgamirirwa nemiteŋgeranwa, neŋgoma, nenyere, nembira, ʋaciŋgoprofita;
ipapo Mŋeya waJehova ucaʋuya pamsoro pako nesimba, ukaprofita pamŋe cete naʋo, ukashanduka ukaʋa mumŋe munhu.
Ɀino kana ɀiratidzo iɀi ɀikaʋonekwa newe, uite cinhu cipi necipi caunoratidzwa kuti uciite, nokuti Mŋari unewe.

Ɀino undituŋgamirire Girgari; tarira, ini ndicaɓurukira kwauri, kuti ndiɓayire ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; unofanira kundimirira mazuʋa manomŋe, kuȿikira ndaʋuya kwauri, ndikuratidze ɀaunofanira kuita.
Ɀino wakati atendeʋuka, obva kunaSamueri, Mŋari akamupa mumŋe mŋoyo; ɀiratidzo iɀo ɀose ɀikaitika nomusi iwoyo.
Ʋakati ʋaciȿika pagomo, ɓoka raʋaprofita rikasoŋgana naye; Mŋeya waMŋari akaʋuya pamsoro pake nesimba, akaprofita pakati paʋo.
Ɀino ʋose ʋaimuziʋa kare ʋakati ʋaciʋona iɀoɀo, kuti woprofita pamŋe cete naʋo, ʋanhu ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Cinyiko cawira mŋanakomana waKishi? Sauro waʋa pakati paʋaprofita ʋo here?
Ɀino mumŋe wa’po akapindura, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaʋo ndianiko? Naiɀoɀo yakazoʋa shumo kuti: Ko Sauro waʋa pakati paʋaprofita here?
Akati apedza kuprofita, akaȿika paɗunhu rakakwirira.
Ƃaɓamunini ʋaSauro ʋakati kwaari, nokumuranda wake: Makaŋga maendepiko? Akati: Kundotȿaka mboŋgoro, asi takati ticiʋona kuti hadziwanikwi, tikaenda kunaSamueri.
Ƃaɓamunini ʋaSauro ʋakati: Ƌondiʋudza ʋo ɀamakaʋudzwa naSamueri.
Ipapo Sauro akati kunaɓaɓamunini ʋake: Wakatiʋudza pacena, kuti mboŋgoro dzatowanikwa hadzo. Asi haana‐kumuʋudza shoko roʋushe rakaŋga rataurwa naSamueri.
Ɀino Samueri akakoka ʋanhu kunaJehova paMizpa,
akati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakaɓuɗisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri paEgipita, ndikakurwirai pamaʋoko aʋaEgipita, napamaʋoko amadzimambo ose aikuremedzai;

asi nhasi maramba Mŋari wenyu, iye unokuponesai amene panjodzi dzenyu dzose nenhamo dzenyu, mukati kwaari: Kwete, asi tigadzire mambo uŋgatiɓata. Naiɀoɀo ɀino ʋuŋganai pamberi paJehova namarudzi enyu ʋuye neɀuru ɀenyu.
Naiɀoɀo Samueri akasweɗedza marudzi ose aIsraeri, rudzi rwaBenjamini rukaɓatwa.
Akasweɗedza rudzi rwaBenjamini, nedzimba dzarwo, imba yaMatri ikaɓatwa; ipapo Sauro mŋanakomana waKishi akaɓatwa; asi ʋakati ʋomutȿaka, akashaikwa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakabvunza ɀe Jehova, ʋakati: Iye munhu uri pano here? Jehova akapindura, akati: Tarirai, waʋanda pakati penhumbi.
Ipapo ʋakamhanya ʋakamutora’po; ɀino wakati amira pakati paʋanhu, akapfuʋura ʋanhu ʋose pakureɓa kubva pamafudzi ake kuȿika kumusoro wake.
Samueri akati kuʋanhu ʋose: Munoʋona wakatsaurwa naJehova, kuti hakuna‐wakafanana naye pakati paʋanhu ʋose here? Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Mambo ŋgaararame.
Ɀino Samueri akaʋudza ʋanhu tsika dzoʋushe, akadzinyora mubuku, akaɀiceŋgeta pamberi paJehova. Samueri akaendisa ʋanhu ʋose mumŋe nomumŋe kumba kwake.
NaSauro ʋo wakaenda kumba kwake paGibea, ʋuye ʋarume ʋose ʋoʋumhare ʋakaŋga ʋaɓayiwa mŋoyo yaʋo naMŋari ʋakaenda ʋo naye.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakaiȿo‐ipa ʋakati: Munhu uyu uŋgatiponesa seiko? Ʋakamushoʋora, ʋakasamuʋigira ɀipo. Asi iye wakaramba anyerere hake.
Ɀino Nahashi muAmoni wakakwira akaʋaka misasa yake paJabeshi‐gireadi kuzorwa naro; ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋeJabeshi ʋakati kunaNahashi: Itai suŋgano nesu, tikushumirei.
Nahashi muAmoni akati kwaʋari: Ndicatenda kuita suŋgano nemi kana meso enyu ose orudyi acitumburwa, kuti ndinyadze ʋaIsraeri ʋose naɀo.
Ʋakuru ʋeJabeshi ʋakati kwaari: Titenderei mazuʋa manomŋe, titume nhume kunyika yose yaIsraeri; ɀino kana pasina‐uŋgatiponesa, ticaɓuɗa kwauri.
Ɀino nhume dzikaȿika paGibea, kwaSauro, dzikataura mashoko iwayo kuʋanhu; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakacema kwaɀo.
Ɀino Sauro wakabva kumunda acitinha ŋombe dzake; Sauro akati: Ʋanhu ʋanonzweiko ɀaʋanocema kuɗai? Akaʋudzwa mashoko aʋarume ʋeJabeshi.
Ipapo Mŋeya waMŋari wakaʋuya pamsoro paSauro nesimba, acinzwa mashoko iwayo, kutsamŋa kwake kukamutswa kwaɀo.

Akatora nzombe mbiri, akadziguranya, ndokutuma nhindi idzo kunyika yose yaIsraeri namaʋoko enhume, akati: Aninani unoramba kuɓuɗa nokuteʋera Sauro naSamueri, ucaitirwa nzombe dzake saiɀoɀo. Ɀino kutya, kwakabva kunaJehova, kwakaɓata ʋanhu, ʋakaɓuɗa ʋose‐ʋose.
Iye akaʋaʋereŋga paBezeki; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana matatu, naʋarume ʋaJuda ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu.
Ʋakati kunhume dzakaʋuya: Ʋudzai ʋarume ʋeJabeshi‐gireadi, muti: Maŋgwana kana zuʋa ropisa, mucarwirwa. Nhume dzikaenda, dzikaʋudza ʋarume ʋeJabeshi, iʋo ʋakafara.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋeJabeshi ʋakati: Maŋgwana ticaɓuɗa kwamuri, mutiitire henyu seɀamunoɗa.

Fume maŋgwana Sauro akagadzira ʋanhu, akaʋaita mapoka matatu, ʋakapinda pakati pemisasa neŋguʋa yamaŋgwanani, ʋakaʋuraya ʋaAmoni kuȿikira zuʋa ropisa; ɀino ʋakasara ʋakaparadzirwa, hakuna‐kusara ʋaʋiri pamŋe cete.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati kunaSamueri: Ndianiko wakati: Sauro uŋgatiɓata ʋushe here? Hendei, tiʋaʋuraye.
Sauro akati: Ŋgakurege kuʋurawa munhu mumŋe nhasi, nokuti Jehova wakarwira Israeri.
Ɀino Samueri akati kuʋanhu: Hendei Girgari, tindoʋandudza ʋushe ipapo.

Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaenda Girgari, ʋakagadza Sauro aʋe mambo waʋo pamberi paJehova paGirgari, ʋakaɓayira’po ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa pamberi paJehova; Sauro naʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakafara kwaɀo ipapo.
Ɀino Samueri akati kuʋaIsraeri ʋose: Tarirai, ndakaterera manzwi enyu paɀinhu ɀose ɀamakataura kwandiri, ndikakugadzirai mambo.
Ɀino tarirai, mambo wenyu unofamba pamberi penyu; ini ndakwegura, ndacena vudzi; tarirai, ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ʋari pakati penyu; ini ndakafamba pamberi penyu kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu kuȿikira nhasi.

Ndiri pano; cindipupurirai pamberi paJehova napamberi pomuzodzwa wake: Ndianiko wandakatorera nzombe yake? Ndianiko wandakatorera mboŋgoro yake? Ndianiko wandakanyeŋgera? Ndianiko wandakatambudza? Ndianiko wandakagamucira fufuro kwaari, kuti ndipofumadze meso aŋgu naɀo?
Iʋo ʋakati: Hamuna‐kutinyeŋgera, kana kutitambudza; hamuna‐kugamucira cinhu kumunhu upi noupi.
Akati kwaʋari: Jehova unokupupurirai, naiye muzodzwa wake unopupura nhasi, kuti hamuna‐kuwana mhoȿa kwandiri. Ʋakati: Ndiye capupu.
Ɀino Samueri akati kuʋanhu: Jehova ndiye wakaŋga agadza Mosesi naAroni, nokuɓuɗisa madziɓaɓa enyu panyika yeEgipita.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cirambai mumire, kuti nditaurirane nemi pamberi paJehova pamsoro peɀose ɀakarurama ɀamakaitirwa naJehova, imi namadziɓaɓa enyu.
Ŋguʋa yakaenda Jakobo Egipita, madziɓaɓa enyu akacema kunaJehova, Jehova akatuma Mosesi naAroni, ʋakaɓuɗisa madziɓaɓa enyu Egipita, ʋakaʋagarisa pano.
Asi ʋakakaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari waʋo, iye akaʋateŋgesa kunaSisera, mukuru wehondo yaHazori, nokunaʋaFiristia, nokunamambo waʋaMoabi, ʋakarwa naʋo.
Ipapo ʋakacema kunaJehova, ʋakati: Takatadza, nokuti takasiya Jehova, tikashumira ʋaBaari neAshtaroti; asi ɀino tirwirei henyu pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu, tikushumirei.
Ipapo Jehova akatuma Jerubaari, naBedani, naJefta, naSamueri, akakurwirai pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu kunhiʋi dzose, mukagara ɀakanaka.
Ɀino makati moʋona Nahashi, mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni, aciʋuya kuzorwa nemi, mukati kwandiri: Kwete, tinofanira kuɓatwa nesu ʋo namambo, kunyaŋge Jehova Mŋari wenyu wakaŋga ari mambo wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, hoyo mambo wamakatsaura, wamakakumbira; tarirai Jehova wakakugadzirai mambo.
Kana mukatya Jehova, mukamushumira, mukaterera inzwi rake, mukasaramba murairo waJehova, mukateʋera Jehova Mŋari wenyu, imi naiye mambo unokuɓatai,
asi kana musiŋgatereri inzwi raJehova, mukaramba murairo waJehova, ruʋoko rwaJehova rucarwa nemi, seɀarwakarwa namadziɓaɓa enyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino rambai mumire, muʋone cinhu ici cikuru cicaitwa naJehova pamberi pameso enyu.
Hakuzi kucekwa kweɀiyo nhasi here? Ndicaɗana kunaJehova, kuti atume kutinhira nemvura, imi muziʋe muʋone kuti makatadza kwaɀo pamberi paJehova, ɀamakaɀikumbirira mambo.
Naiɀoɀo Samueri akaɗana kunaJehova, Jehova akatuma kutinhira nemvura nomusi iwoyo; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakatya Jehova naSamueri kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati kunaSamueri: nyeŋgetererai henyu ʋaranda ʋenyu kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu, tirege kufa, nokuti takawedzera paɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɀose cinhu ici cakaipa, kuti takaɀikumbirira mambo.
Samueri akati kuʋanhu: Musatya henyu; makaita henyu ɀakaipa iɀi ɀose, asi regai kutsauka pakuteʋera Jehova, asi shumirai Jehova nemŋoyo yenyu yose;
musatsauka, nokuti
Nokuti Jehova haaŋgasiyi ʋanhu ʋake nokuɗa kwezita rake guru, nokuti Jehova wakafara naɀo kukuitai imi ʋanhu ʋake.
Kana ndirini, Mŋari ŋgaandiɓatsire ndirege kutadzira Jehova pakurega kukunyeŋgetererai imi, asi ndicakudzidzisai nzira yakanaka yakarurama.
Asi ityai Jehova, mumushumire neɀokwaɗi nemŋoyo yenyu yose, nokuti raŋgarirai ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀaakakuitirai.
Asi kana mukaramba muciita ɀakaipa, mucaparadzwa, imi namambo wenyu.
Sauro wakaŋga anamakore

Sauro akaɀitsaurira ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu; ɀuru ɀiʋiri ɀaʋo ɀaigara kunaSauro paMikmashi pagomo reBeti‐eri, necuru cimŋe caigara naJonatani paGibea kwaBenjamini; ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋose akaʋadzosera, mumŋe nomumŋe kutente rake.
Jonatani akaparadza ɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia ʋaigara Geba; ʋaFiristia ʋakaɀinzwa. Ɀino Sauro akaridza hwamanda panyika yose, akati: ƲaHeberu ŋgaʋanzwe.
ƲaIsraeri ʋose ʋakanzwa kuti Sauro waparadza ɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia, ʋuye kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋoʋeŋgwa naʋaFiristia. Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuŋganidzwa kuti ʋaende Girgari naSauro.

Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzorwa naʋaIsraeri, ʋaneŋgoro dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu, naʋataȿi ʋaneɀuru ɀitanhatu, naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakafanana nejeca reguŋgwa pakuwanda kwaʋo; ʋakakwira ʋakandodzika matente aʋo paMikmashi, kumabvazuʋa kweBeti‐aveni.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋaʋa panjodzi (nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋomanikidzwa), ʋanhu ʋakaʋanda mumapako, nomumatenhere, napakati pamatombo, nomunhare, nomumakomba.
Ʋuye ʋamŋe ʋaʋaHeberu ʋakaŋga ʋayambuka Joridani kunyika yaGadi neyaGireadi; asi Sauro wakaŋga aciri Girgari, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamuteʋera ʋacibvunda.
Akamira mazuʋa manomŋe akaŋga atarwa naSamueri; asi Samueri haanakuȿika paGirgari, ʋanhu ʋakataŋga kupararira ʋacimusiya.
Ɀino Sauro akati: Ʋuyai kwandiri necipiriso cinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa. Akapisa cipiriso cinopiswa.
Ɀino wakati acaŋgopedza kupisa cipiriso cinopiswa, Samueri akaȿika; Sauro akaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naye, kuti amukwazise.
Samueri akati: Waiteiko? Sauro akati: Ndakaʋona kuti ʋanhu ʋopararira, ʋacindisiya, ʋuye kuti imi hamunakuȿika namazuʋa akaŋga atarwa, ʋuye kuti ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana paMikmashi,
saka ndikati: Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋacaɓuruka kuzondiʋamba paGirgari ini ndicigere kukumbira Jehova kundiɓatsira; naiɀoɀo ndakaɀigombedzera ndikapisira cipiriso cinopiswa, ndisiŋgaɗi haŋgu.
Samueri akati kunaSauro: Waita seɓenzi; hauna‐kuceŋgeta murairo waJehova Mŋari wako, waakaŋga akuraira; nokuti ɀino Jehova wakaŋga aciɗa kusimbisa ʋushe bgako pakati paʋaIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi ɀino ʋushe bgako habguŋgagari; Jehova wakaɀitȿakira munhu unofadza mŋoyo wake, Jehova akamugadza aʋe mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋake, nokuti iwe hauna‐kuceŋgeta ɀawakaŋga warairwa naJehova.
Samueri akasimuka, akabva Girgari, akaenda Gibea kwaBenjamini. Sauro akaʋereŋga ʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaȿika ʋarume ʋaneŋge mazana matanhatu.
Sauro naJonatani mŋanakomana wake, naʋanhu ʋaʋakaŋga ʋanaʋo, ʋakagara paGeba kwaBenjamini; asi ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaʋaka misasa yaʋo paMikmashi.
Ɀino ʋaparadzi ʋakaɓuɗa kumisasa yaʋaFiristia, ʋakaita mapoka matatu; ɓoka rimŋe rakaɓuɗa nenzira inoenda Ofra kunyika yaShuari,
rimŋe ɓoka rikaɓuɗa nenzira inoenda Beti‐horoni; nerimŋe ɓoka rikaɓuɗa nenzira yakaenda kumuganho unotarira kumupata weZeboimi, kurutiʋi rwerenje.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kusinomupfuri munyika yose yaIsraeri, nokuti ʋaFiristia ʋakati: ƲaHeberu ŋgaʋarege kuɀipfurira minondo namapfumo.
Asi ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋaifanira kuɓurukira kuʋaFiristia, mumŋe nomumŋe kana aciɗa kurodzerwa muromo wegeja rake, neɓadza rake, nesanhu rake, nembezo yake;
ŋguʋa imŋe neimŋe kana mbezo dzaʋo, namapadza aʋo, neforogo dzaʋo, namasanhu aʋo ɀokomara; ʋuye kugadzirirwa ɀokuɓaya ŋombe naɀo.
Naiɀoɀo paŋguʋa yokurwa kwakaŋga kusinomunondo, kana pfumo muruʋoko rwomunhu mumŋe waʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋanaSauro naJonatani; asi Sauro naJonatani mŋanakomana wake ʋakaŋga ʋanaɀo.
Ɀino ɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia rakaɓuɗa kumupata weMikmashi.
Ɀino rimŋe zuʋa Jonatani mŋanakomana waSauro akati kujaya raiɓata nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo: Hendei tiyambukire kuɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia ʋari mhiri uko. Asi haana‐kuʋudza ɓaɓa ʋake.
Sauro wakaŋga agere pamugumo weGibea, pasi pomutamba wakaŋga uri paMigroni; wakaŋga anaʋarume ʋaneŋge mazana matanhatu naye.
Ahija, mŋanakomana waAhitubi, mukuru waIkabodi, mŋanakomana waPinehasi, mŋanakomana waEri, wakaŋga ari muprista waJehova paShiro, akafuka efodi. Ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuti Jonatani waenda.

Ɀino pakati pemipata, Jonatani paakaŋga aciɗa kuyambukira napo mhiri kuɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia, pakaŋga paneshoŋgwe yebge kurutiʋi rumŋe, neshoŋgwe yebge ɀe kunorumŋe rutiʋi; zita reimŋe rakaŋga riri Bozezi, nezita reimŋe Sene.
Shoŋgwe imŋe yakaŋga imire kurutiʋi rwokumsoro pamberi paMikmashi, neimŋe ɀe kurutiʋi rwezasi pamberi peGeba.

Ɀino Jonatani akati kujaya raiɓata nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo: Hendei tiyambukire kuɓoka raʋarwi raʋasino‐kudziŋgiswa aʋa; ɀimŋe Jehova ucatiɓatsira, nokuti hakunecinhu ciŋgadziʋisa Jehova kuponesa, kunyaŋge naʋazhinji kana naʋashoma.
Ipapo muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo akati kwaari: Itai ɀose ɀamunofuŋga; endai henyu, ini ndine’mi pamunoɗa kuita napo.
Ipapo Jonatani akati: Tarira, ticayambukira kuʋarume aʋo, tindoɀiratidza kwaʋari.
Kana ʋakati kwatiri: Mirai kuȿikira taȿika kwamuri, ticaramba timire kwatiri, hatiŋgakwiri kwaʋari.
Asi kana ʋakati: Kwirai ʋuno kwatiri, ticakwira, nokuti Mŋari waʋaisa mumaʋoko eɗu; ndico cicaʋa ciratidzo kwatiri.
Ɀino ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakaɀiratidza kuɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia. ƲaFiristia ʋakati: Tarira, ʋaHeberu ʋoɓuɗa mumakomba maʋakaŋga ʋakaʋanda.

Ʋarume ʋeɓoka raʋarwi ʋakapindura Jonatani nomuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, ʋakati: Kwirai ʋuno kwatiri, tikuratidzei cinhu. Jonatani akati kumuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo: Kwira unditeʋere, nokuti Jehova waʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaIsraeri.
Jonatani akakwira namaʋoko ake namakumbo ake, muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo acimuteʋera; iʋo ʋakakundwa naJonatani, nomuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo akamuteʋera aciʋuraya.
Ɀino pakuʋuraya uku kwokutaŋga, Jonatani nomuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋaneŋge makumi maʋiri pahafu yendima yomunda.
Ʋanhu, ʋakaŋga ʋari pamisasa, napaminda, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakabvunda; neɓoka raʋarwi, naʋaparadzi, naiʋo ʋakabvunda; nenyika ʋo yakaɗeŋgenyeka; naiɀoɀo kwakaŋga kunokubvunda kukuru.
Ɀino nharirire dzaSauro paGibea kwaBenjamini ʋakatarira, ʋakaʋona ɓoka guru raʋanhu ricinyaŋgarika, ricipararira.
Ipapo Sauro akati kuʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo: Ʋereŋgai ɀino, muʋone kuti ndianiko usisi’po kwatiri. Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋereŋga, ʋakaʋona kuti Jonatani nomuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo haʋa’po.
Sauro akati kunaAhija: Ʋuya pano neareka yaMŋari. Nokuti areka yaMŋari yakaŋga iri’po pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri neŋguʋa iyo.
Ɀino Sauro wakati acataurirana nomuprista, ɓopoto rakaŋga riri pamisasa yaʋaFiristia rikaramba ricinyanya. Sauro akati kumuprista: Dzosa ruʋoko rwako.
Sauro naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakarwa, ʋakawana munondo womumŋe nomumŋe ucirwa neshamŋari yake, kukaʋa nokutambudzika kukuru.
NaʋaHeberu, ʋaiɓatsira ʋaFiristia kare, ʋakaŋga ʋakwira naʋo kumisasa ʋaibva kunhiʋi dzose, naiʋo ʋakaʋashandukira, ʋakaɓatsira ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋanaSauro naJonatani.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋanda kunyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti ʋaFiristia ʋotiza, naiʋo ʋakaʋateʋera kuzorwa naʋo.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova akaponesa ʋaIsraeri nomusi uyo; kurwa kukapfuʋura napaBeti‐aveni.

Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaziya nomusi uyo, asi Sauro wakapikira ʋanhu, akati: Aninani unodya ɀokudya kuȿikira maɗekwana, kuȿikira ndatsiʋira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, ŋgaatukwe. Naiɀoɀo hakunomunhu wakaraʋira ɀokudya.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaȿika paɗondo, ʋakawana ʋuci bguri’po pasi.
Ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaȿika paɗondo, ʋakawana ʋuci bgoyerera pasi, asi hakunomunhu wakaisa ruʋoko rwake kumuromo wake, nokuti ʋanhu ʋakatya kupika

Asi Jonatani wakaŋga asinakunzwa ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaciraira ʋanhu nokupika kwaʋo; naiɀoɀo akatambanudza muromo wetȿimbo yake, yakaŋga iri muruʋoko rwake, akainyika muziŋga roʋuci, akaisa ruʋoko rwake kumuromo wake, meso ake akaȿinudzwa.
Ipapo mumŋe waʋanhu akapindura, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋakaraira ʋanhu kwaɀo nokupika ʋaciti: Aninani unodya ɀokudya nhasi ŋgaatukwe. Asi ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaziya.
Ɀino Jonatani akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋanetsa nyika. Ciʋonai henyu, meso aŋgu aȿinudzwa seiko, nokuti ndaraʋira ʋuci ubgu;
ndoɗa kana ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋatenderwa kudya ɀaʋakaŋga ʋapamba kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo! Asi ɀino haʋanakuʋuraya ʋaFiristia ʋazhinji.
Nomusi uyo ʋakaʋuraya ʋaFiristia kubva paMikmashi kuȿikira paAjaroni; ʋanhu ʋakaziya kwaɀo.
Ʋanhu ʋakamhanyira ɀakapambga, ʋakatora makwai, neŋombe, nemhuru, ʋakaɀiʋurayira pasi, ʋanhu ʋakaɀidya pamŋe cete neropa raɀo.
Ɀino ʋakaʋudza Sauro, ʋakati: Tarirai, ʋanhu ʋanotadzira Jehova, nokuti ʋanodya pamŋe cete neropa. Akati: Makaita nokusatendeka; ndikuŋgurusirei pano ibge guru nhasi.

Ɀino Sauro akati: Pararirai pakati paʋanhu, muti kwaʋari: Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaaʋuye kwandiri nenzombe yake, mumŋe nomumŋe negwai rake, aɀiʋurayire pano, adye, murege kutadzira Jehova mucidya pamŋe cete neropa. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuya ʋusiku ubgo mumŋe nomumŋe nenzombe yake, ʋakadziʋurayira’po.
Sauro akaʋakira Jehova artari; iyo artari ndiyo yokutaŋga yaakaʋakira Jehova.

Ɀino Sauro akati: Ŋgatiɓuruke, titeʋere ʋaFiristia ʋusiku, tiʋapambare kuȿikira kwoedza, tirege kusiya munhu mumŋe kwaʋari. Iʋo ʋakati: Itai henyu seɀamunoɗa. Ipapo muprista akati: Ŋgatisweɗere kunaMŋari pano.
Sauro akabvunza Mŋari, akati: Ndoɓuruka, nditeʋere ʋaFiristia here? Mucaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaIsraeri here? Asi haana‐kumupindura musi iwoyo.
Sauro akati: Sweɗerai pano, imi ʋakuru ʋose ʋaʋanhu, muziʋe nokuʋona kuti ciʋi ici cakaitwa nhasi ndeceiko?
Nokuti naJehova mupenyu, iye unoponesa Israeri, kunyaŋge ɀiri kunaJonatani mŋanakomana waŋgu, ucafanira kufa ɀirokwaɀo. Asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu pakati paʋanhu ʋose wakamupindura.
Ɀino akati kuʋaIsraeri ʋose: Imi mirai kurutiʋi rumŋe, neni naJonatani mŋanakomana waŋgu ticamira kunorumŋe rutiʋi. Ʋanhu ʋakati kunaSauro: Itai henyu seɀamunoɗa.
Ɀino Sauro akati kunaJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ratidzai ɀakarurama. Ɀino Jonatani naSauro ʋakaɓatwa
Ɀino Sauro akati kuʋaIsraeri ʋose: Kandai mijenya pakati paŋgu naJonatani mŋanakomana waŋgu. Jonatani akaɓatwa.
Ɀino Sauro akati kunaJonatani: Ndiʋudze cawaita. Jonatani akamuʋudza, akati: Ndakaraʋira haŋgu ɀiʋuci nomuromo wetȿimbo yandakaŋga ndakaɓata muruʋoko rwaŋgu; ɀino ndinofanira kufa haŋgu.
Sauro akati: Mŋari ŋgaandiroʋe, arambe aciɗaro, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kufa, Jonatani.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati kunaSauro: Jonatani uŋgafa seiko, iye wakaponesa ʋaIsraeri nokuponesa kukuru uku? Haiȿa! NaJehova mupenyu, ruvudzi rumŋe rwomusoro wake haruŋgawiri pasi, nokuti wakaɓata pamŋe cete naMŋari nhasi. Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakadzikinura Jonatani, akasafa.
Ɀino Sauro akarega kuteʋera ʋaFiristia, ʋaFiristia ʋakaenda kunyika yaʋo.
Ɀino Sauro wakati agadzwa ʋushe bgaIsraeri, akarwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋose kunhiʋi dzose, naʋaMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋaEdomi, namadzimambo eZoba, naʋaFiristia; pose paakaenda wakakunda.
Akarwa noʋumhare, akakunda ʋaAmareki, akarwira ʋaIsraeri pamaʋoko aʋaiʋapambara.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaSauro ʋaiʋa Jonatani, naIshvi, naMarkishua, namazita aʋanasikana ʋake ʋaʋiri aiti: Zita roweɗaŋgwe Merabi, nezita romuɗuku Mikari.
Zita romukadzi waSauro raiʋa Ahinoami, mŋanasikana waAhimaazi, nezita romutuŋgamiriri wehondo yake raiʋa Abineri, mŋanakomana waNeri, ɓaɓamunini ʋaSauro.
Kishi ndiye waiʋa ɓaɓa ʋaSauro; naNeri, ɓaɓa ʋaAbineri, waiʋa mŋanakomana waAbieri.
Pamazuʋa ose aSauro ʋakaŋga ʋacirwa ɀikuru naʋaFiristia; ɀino Sauro wakati kana aciʋona murume unesimba kana murume unoʋumhare, waimugarisa naye.
Ɀino Samueri akati kunaSauro: Jehova wakandituma kuti ndikuzodze, uʋe mambo waʋanhu ʋake iʋo ʋaIsraeri; naiɀoɀo ɀino cinzwa mashoko aJehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndakacerekedza ɀakaitirwa Israeri naʋaAmareki, kuti wakaʋadziʋirira panzira ŋguʋa yokubva kwaʋo Egipita.
Ɀino cienda undokunda ʋaAmareki, uparadze cose ɀose ɀaʋanaɀo, usaʋarega; asi uʋuraye ʋarume naʋakadzi ʋose, naʋacece naʋanomŋa, neŋombe namakwai, namakamera nemboŋgoro.
Sauro akaɗana ʋanhu, akaʋaʋereŋga paTeraimi, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri ɀaʋaifamba namakumbo, naʋarume ʋaʋaJuda ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi.
Sauro akaȿika paguta raʋaAmareki, akaʋaʋandira pamupata.

Sauro akati kuʋaKeni: Endai mubve, muɓuruke mubve pakati paʋaAmareki, ndirege kukuparadzai pamŋe cete naʋo; nokuti imi makaʋa nomŋoyo munyoro naʋana ʋose ʋaIsraeri, paŋguʋa yokuɓuɗa kwaʋo Egipita. Naiɀoɀo ʋaKeni ʋakabva pakati paʋaAmareki.
Ipapo Sauro akaparadza ʋaAmareki, kubva paHavira kuȿikira paShuri, pakatarisana neEgipita.
Akaɓata Agagi, mambo waʋaAmareki aciri mupenyu, akaparadza ʋanhu ʋose cose neminondo inopinza.

Asi Sauro naʋanhu ʋakarega Agagi, namakwai akaiȿo‐naka, nedzimŋe ŋombe, neɀimŋe ɀakakora, namakwaiana, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀakanaka, ʋakaramba kuɀiparadza cose; asi ɀose ɀaʋakaɀidza, ɀakaŋga ɀisino‐kunaka, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaparadza cose.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaSamueri, rikati:
Ndinoɀiɗemba ɀandakagadza Sauro aʋe mambo, nokuti wadzoka, haacanditeʋeri, haana‐kuita seɀandakamuraira. Samueri akaʋa neshuŋgu, akacema kunaJehova ʋusiku bgose.
Ɀino Samueri akamuka maŋgwanani kundosoŋgana naSauro. Samueri akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Sauro wakaȿika Karmeri, akaɀimisira shoŋgwe, ɀino watsauka, wapfuʋura, waɓurukira Girgari.
Samueri akaȿika kunaSauro, Sauro akati kwaari: Jehova ŋgaakuropafadze; ndaita seɀandakarairirwa naJehova.
Samueri akati: Ko kucema uku kwamakwai munzeʋe dzaŋgu nokukuma kweŋombe kwandinonzwa kunoti kuɗiniko?
Sauro akati: Ʋabva naɀo kuʋaAmareki, nokuti ʋanhu haʋanakuʋuraya makwai akaiȿo‐naka nenzombe, kuti ʋaɓayire Jehova Mŋari wenyu; asi ɀimŋe ɀose takaɀiparadza cose.
Ipapo Samueri akati kunaSauro: Nyarara, ndikuziʋise ɀandakaʋudzwa naJehova ʋusiku ubgu. Akati kwaari: Taurai henyu.
Samueri akati: Kunyaŋge wakaŋga uri muɗuku pakufuŋga kwako, hauna‐kuitwa mukuru wamarudzi aʋaIsraeri here? Jehova wakakuzodza, kuti uʋe mambo waIsraeri;
Jehova akakutuma parwendo, akati: Enda, uparadze cose ʋatadzi, iʋo ʋaAmareki, urwe naʋo kuȿikira ʋapera.
Ɀino wakaregereiko kuterera inzwi raJehova, asi wakamhanyira ɀakapambga, ukaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova?
Sauro akati kunaSamueri: Ɀirokwaɀo ndakaterera inzwi raJehova, ndikaenda nenzira yandakaŋga ndatumŋa naJehova, ndikaʋuya naAgagi mambo waʋaAmareki, ndikaparadza ʋaAmareki cose.
Asi ʋanhu, ndiʋo ʋakatora ɀakapambga, iwo makwai nenzombe, neɀakanaka paɀinhu ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurwa, kuti ʋaɓayire Jehova Mŋari wenyu paGirgari.
Samueri akati: Ko Jehova uŋgafarira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀiɓayiro, seɀaanofarira kuterera inzwi raJehova here? Tarira, kuterera kunokunda ɀiɓayiro, nokunzwa kunokunda mafuta amakondobge.
Nokuti kumukira
Ipapo Sauro akati kunaSamueri: Ndakatadza, nokuti ndakaɗarika murairo waJehova, ʋuye namashoko enyu, nokuti ndakatya ʋanhu, ndikaterera manzwi aʋo.
Ɀino ndinokumbira kuti mundikaŋganwire ʋo ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu, mudzoke neni, ndinamate kunaJehova.
Samueri akati kunaSauro: Handiŋgadzoki newe, nokuti wakaramba shoko raJehova, naJehova wakuramba newe ʋo, kuti urege kuʋa mambo waIsraeri.
Ɀino Samueri wakati acitendeʋuka, aciɗo‐kubva,
Samueri akati kwaari: Jehova wakabvarura ʋushe bgaIsraeri kwauri nhasi, akabgupa mumŋe wokwako unokukunda nokunaka.
Ʋuye ʋo Mutendiwa waIsraeri haaŋgareʋi nhema, kana kuɀiɗemba; nokuti haazi munhu uŋgaɀiɗemba.
Ipapo iye akati: Ndakatadza haŋgu, asi ndikudzei henyu pamberi paʋakuru ʋaŋgu, napamberi paIsraeri, mudzoke neni, ndinamate kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo Samueri akadzoka, akaenda naSauro, Sauro akanamata kunaJehova.
Ɀino Samueri akati: Ʋuyai kwandiri naAgagi mambo waʋaAmareki. Agagi akaʋuya kwaari, akafara. Agagi akati: Ɀirokwaɀo kuʋaʋa kworufu kwapfuʋura.
Samueri akati: Munondo wako seɀawakashaisa ʋakadzi ʋana, saiɀoɀo mai ʋako ʋacashaiwa ʋana pakati paʋakadzi. Samueri akaguranya Agagi pamberi paJehova paGirgari.
Ɀino Samueri akaenda Rama, naSauro ʋo akakwira kumba kwake paGibea kwaSauro.
Samueri akasazoʋuya ɀe kuʋona Sauro kuȿikira pazuʋa rokufa kwake; asi Samueri wakacema Sauro, naJehova ʋo akaɀiɗemba nokuti wakaŋga aita Sauro mambo waIsraeri.

Ɀino Jehova wakati kunaSamueri: Ucacema Sauro kuȿikira riniko, ɀandakamuramba ini, kuti arege kuʋa mambo waIsraeri? Zadza gonaŋombe rako namafuta, uende, ndikutume kunaJese muBeti‐rehemi; nokuti ndakaɀitȿakira mambo pakati paʋana ʋake.
Samueri akati: Ndiŋgaenda seiko? Kana Sauro akaɀinzwa, ucandiʋuraya. Jehova akati: Enda netsiru, uti: Ndaʋuya kuzoɓayira Jehova.
Ɀino uɗane Jese aʋuye kuciɓayiro, ini ndicakuziʋisa ɀaunofanira kuita, ugondizodzera wandicakuratidza.
Samueri akaita ɀakataurwa naJehova, akaenda Beti‐rehemi. Ʋakuru ʋeguta ʋakandosoŋgana naye, ʋacibvunda, ʋakati: Maʋuya norugare here?
Akati: Hoŋo, norugare; ndaʋuya kuzoɓayira Jehova, muɀinatsei, muende neni kundoɓayira. Ipapo akanatsa Jese naʋanakomana ʋake, akaʋaɗana kuciɓayiro.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika, akatarira Eriabi, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, muzodzwa waJehova uri pamberi pake.
Asi Jehova wakati kunaSamueri: Usatarira ciso cake, kana mumhu wake, nokuti ndamuramba; nokuti
Ɀino Jese akaɗana Abinadabi, akamupfuʋudza pamberi paSamueri. Akati: Kunyaŋge noyuyu Jehova haana‐kumutsaura.
Ɀino Jese akapfuʋudza Shama. Akati: Noyuyu Jehova haana‐kumutsaura.
Jese akapfuʋudza ʋanomŋe ʋaʋanakomana ʋake pamberi paSamueri. Samueri akati kunaJese: Jehova haanakutsaura aʋa.

Ɀino Samueri akati kunaJese: Ʋana ʋako ʋari pano ʋose here? Akati: Muɗuku kunaʋose ndiye wasara; tarirai unorisa makwai. Samueri akati kunaJese: Tuma munhu amutore, nokuti hatiŋgagari pakudya kuȿika iye aʋuya pano.
Akatuma munhu, akapinda naye. Ɀino wakaŋga ari mutȿuku, akanaka kumeso, anomuʋiri wakanaka. Jehova akati: Simuka, umuzodze, nokuti ndiye.
Ipapo Samueri akatora gonaŋombe ramafuta, akamuzodza pakati pehama dzake. Mŋeya waJehova akaʋuya pamsoro paDavidi nesimba, kubva pazuʋa iro ɀicienda mberi. Ɀino Samueri akasimuka, akaenda Rama.
Ɀino Mŋeya waJehova wakaŋga abva kunaSauro, mŋeya wakaipa, wakaŋga watumŋa naJehova, ukamuvundusa.
Ʋaranda ʋaSauro ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai ɀino, mŋeya wakaipa, wakatumŋa naMŋari, unokuvundusai.

Ɀino tenzi weɗu ŋgaatiraire isu ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋari pamberi penyu, kuti titȿake munhu unoziʋa kuridza mbira kwaɀo; ɀino kana mŋeya wakaipa, unotumŋa naMŋari, aciʋuya pamsoro penyu, iye aridze noruʋoko rwake, mupore.
Sauro akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Cinditȿakirai munhu unogona kuridza ɀakanaka, muʋuye naye kwandiri.

Ɀino mumŋe wamajaya akapindura, akati: Tarirai, ndakaʋona mŋanakomana waJese muBeti‐rehemi unoziʋa kuridza kwaɀo, munhu unesimba noʋumhare, murwi, wakacenjera pakutaura, munhu wakanaka, ʋuye Jehova unaye.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akatuma nhume kunaJese, akati: Nditumire mŋanakomana wako Davidi, uri kumakwai.
Jese akatora mboŋgoro, akaitakudza ciŋgwa, neɗende rewaini, nembudzana, akaɀituma kunaSauro nomŋanakomana wake Davidi.
Davidi akaȿika kunaSauro, akamira pamberi pake; iye akamuɗa kwaɀo, akaʋa muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa.
Sauro akatuma shoko kunaJese, akati: Tendera hako Davidi amire pamberi paŋgu, nokuti ndinomufarira kwaɀo.
Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana mŋeya wakaipa, wakatumŋa naMŋari, uciʋuya pamsoro paSauro, Davidi ndokutora mbira, nokuridza noruʋoko rwake; Sauro akanyaradzwa, akapora, mŋeya wakaipa ndokubva kwaari.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakakoka hondo dzaʋo kuzorwa, ʋakaʋuŋgana paSoko raiʋa raJuda, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pakati peSoko naAzeka paEfesi‐damimi.
Sauro naʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋo, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo pamupata weEra, ʋakagadzira hondo kuzorwa naʋaFiristia.
ƲaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋamire pagomo kunorumŋe rutiʋi, naʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋamire pagomo kunorumŋe rutiʋi; mupata wakaŋga uri pakati paʋo.
Ɀino kumisasa yaʋaFiristia kwakaɓuɗa mhare, yainzi Goriati weGati; kureɓa kwake kwakaŋga kunamakubiti
Wakaŋga aneŋgoani yendarira pamusoro wake, ʋuye wakaŋga akafuka ŋguʋo dzokurwa dzamaɓape
Wakaŋga aneɀidzitiro ɀamakumbo ɀendarira, nemharu yendarira pakati pamafudzi ake.
Rwiriko rwepfumo rake rwakaŋga rwakafanana neɗanda romuruki, necese yepfumo rake yakaȿika mashekeri
Akamira, akaɗanidzira kuhondo dzaʋaIsraeri, akati kwaʋari: Maɓuɗireiko mucigadzira hondo yenyu? Ini handizi muFiristia, nemi ʋaranda ʋaSauro here? Imi muɀitsaurire murume, aɓurukire ʋuno kwandiri.
Kana akagona kurwa neni, akandiʋuraya, isu ticaʋa ʋaranda ʋenyu; asi kana ini ndikamukunda, ndikamuʋuraya, imi mucaʋa ʋaranda ʋeɗu, mucatiɓatira.
MuFiristia akati: Nhasi ndinoshoʋora hondo dzaʋaIsraeri; ndipei munhu, tirwe.
Ɀino Sauro naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋacinzwa mashoko awa omuFiristia, ʋakavunduka, ʋakatya kwaɀo.
Ɀino Davidi wakaŋga ari mŋanakomana womuEfrati weBeti‐rehemi‐juda, wainzi Jese; iye wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋasere, asi munhu uyu wakaŋga aʋa mutana pamazuʋa aSauro, akwegura pakati paʋarume.
Ʋanakomana ʋatatu ʋakuru ʋaJese ʋakaŋga ʋaenda naSauro kundorwa; ɀino mazita aʋana ʋake ʋatatu, ʋakaŋga ʋaenda kundorwa, akaŋga ari: Eriabi weɗaŋgwe, teʋere Abinadabi, wecitatu Shama.
Davidi wakaŋga ari muɗuku kunaʋose; ʋakuru ʋatatu ʋakaŋga ʋaenda naSauro.
Ɀino Davidi waisienda kunaSauro, acidzoka kuzofudza makwai aɓaɓa ʋake paBeti‐rehemi.
MuFiristia waisweɗera maŋgwana namaɗeko, akamira’po mazuʋa anamakumi manna.
Ɀino Jese akati kunaDavidi mŋanakomana wake: Cindopa ʋakuru ʋako efa
asi mapundu awa omukaka wakafa anegumi uise kumukuru wecuru caʋo, ugotarira kuti ʋakuru ʋako ʋakaɗiniko, ndokutora kwaʋari cokuʋonera’po.
Ɀino Sauro, naiʋo, naʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋari pamupata weEra ʋacirwa naʋaFiristia.
Davidi akamuka maŋgwanani, akasiya makwai ake kumufudzi, akatora
ƲaIsraeri naʋaFiristia ʋakaɀigadzira kurwa, hondo dzakatarisana.
Davidi akasiya nhumbi dzake pamaʋoko omutariri wenhumbi, akamhanyira kuhondo, akaȿika akakwazisa ʋakuru ʋake.
Ɀino wakati acataura naʋo, iya mhare ikaɓuɗa kuhondo yaʋaFiristia, iye muFiristia weGati, wainzi Goriati, akataura mashoko aaisitaura, Davidi akaanzwa.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋaciʋona murume uyu, ʋakamutiza, ʋakatya kwaɀo.

Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakati: Maʋona here murume uyo, wakwira? Ɀirokwaɀo wakwira kuzoshoʋora Israeri; munhu unomuʋuraya, mambo ucamufumisa nefuma zhinji, nokumupa ʋo mŋanasikana wake, nokusunuŋgura imba yaɓaɓa ʋake munaIsraeri.

Ɀino Davidi akataura naʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye, akati: Munhu, unoʋuraya muFiristia uyu, akabvisa kushoʋorwa kwaʋaIsraeri ucapiweiko? Nokuti muFiristia uyu usino‐kudziŋgiswa ndianiko, unoshoʋora hondo dzaMŋari mupenyu?
Ʋanhu ʋakamupindura saiɀoɀo, ʋakati: Munhu, unomuʋuraya, ucapiwa cokuti necokuti.

Ɀino Eriabi mukoma wake mukuru akanzwa acitaura naʋarume aʋo, Eriabi akatsamŋira Davidi, akati: Waɓurukireiko pano iwe? Makwai aya mashoma waasiya naniko murenje? Ndinoziʋa manyawi ako, nokuipa kwomŋoyo wako; nokuti waɓuruka kuzoʋona hondo.
Davidi akati: Ɀino ndaɗiniko haŋgu? Handina‐kuŋgobvunza haŋgu here?
Akatendeʋukira ɀe kunomumŋe, akataura ɀe saiɀoɀo; ʋanhu ʋakamupindura ɀe saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanzwa mashoko akataurwa naDavidi, ʋakaarondedzera kunaSauro; akatuma munhu kuzomuɗana.
Davidi akati kunaSauro: Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unopera mŋoyo nokuɗa kwake; muranda wenyu ucaenda kundorwa nomuFiristia uyo.
Sauro akati kunaDavidi: Hauŋgagoni kundorwa nomuFiristia uyo, nokuti uciri mukomana, asi iye murume murwi kubva paʋuɗuku bgake.
Davidi akati kunaSauro: Muranda wenyu waifudza makwai aɓaɓa ʋake; ɀino kana shumba ikaȿika, kana ɓere, kuzotora gwaiana paɓoka,
ndaiɓuɗa, ndikaiteʋera, ndikaiʋuraya, ndikarirwira pamuromo wayo; kana iciŋge ikandimukira, ndaiiɓata ndebvu dzayo, ndokuiɓaya nokuiʋuraya.
Muranda wenyu akaɀiʋuraya ɀose, kunyaŋge shumba kunyaŋge ɓere; muFiristia uyu usino‐kudziŋgiswa ucafanana necimŋe caɀo, nokuti wakashoʋora hondo dzaMŋari mupenyu.
Davidi akati: Jehova wakandirwira pagumbo reshumba negumbo reɓere, iye ucandirwira ʋo paruʋoko rwomuFiristia uyu. Ipapo Sauro akati kunaDavidi: Enda hako, Jehova ucaʋa newe.
Sauro akafukidza Davidi ŋguʋo dzake, akadzika ŋgoani yendarira pamusoro wake, akamufukidza ŋguʋo dzokurwa dzamaɓape

Ɀino Davidi akasuŋgira munondo wake pamsoro peŋguʋo dzake, akaidza kufamba; nokuti wakaŋga asino‐kumboidza iɀoɀo. Davidi akati kunaSauro: Handigoni kufamba nadzo, nokuti handina‐kumbodziidza. Davidi akadzibvisa.

Akaɓata tȿimbo muruʋoko rwake, akaɀitsaurira huruŋguɗo shanu parukoʋa, akadziisa muhomboɗo yake yomufudzi, yaakaŋga anayo, imo munhaʋa yake; cifura‐mabge cake cakaŋga ciri muruʋoko rwake; akasweɗera kumuFiristia.
MuFiristia akaʋuya, akasweɗera kunaDavidi; munhu wakaŋga akaɓata nhoʋo yake akamutuŋgamirira.
Ɀino muFiristia wakati acitarira, akaʋona Davidi, akamuɀidza; nokuti wakaŋga aciri mukomana hake, mutȿuku, aneciso cakanaka.
MuFiristia akati kunaDavidi: Ndiri imbga kanhi, ɀaunoʋuya kwandiri netȿimbo? MuFiristia akatuka Davidi naʋamŋari ʋake.
MuFiristia akati kunaDavidi: Ʋuya ʋuno kwandiri, ndipe shiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀeɓundo nyama yako.
Ipapo Davidi akati kumuFiristia: Iwe unoʋuya kwandiri nomunondo, nepfumo, nemharu; asi ini ndinoʋuya kwauri nezita raJehova wehondo, Mŋari wehondo dzaʋaIsraeri, ʋaunoshoʋora.

Nhasi Jehova ucakuisa muruʋoko rwaŋgu; ndicakuʋuraya, ndicakugura musoro wako, ndicapa shiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀenyika ɀitunha ɀehondo dzaʋaFiristia nhasi, kuti nyika yose iziʋe kuti Mŋari uri’po pakati paIsraeri.
Ɀino kuti ʋuŋgano iyo yose iziʋe, kuti Jehova haaponesi nomunondo kana nepfumo, nokuti kurwa ndokwaJehova, iye ucakuisa mumaʋoko eɗu.
Ɀino muFiristia wakati acisimuka, aciʋuya kuzosoŋgana naDavidi, Davidi akakurumidza, akamhanyira kuhondo kuzosoŋgana nomuFiristia.
Davidi akapinza ruʋoko rwake muhomboɗo yake, akabvisa’mo ibge, akariposhera, akaroʋa muFiristia pahuma yake; ibge rikanyura muhuma yake, iye akawira pasi neciso.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akakunda muFiristia necifura‐mabge nebge, akakunda muFiristia, akamuʋuraya; asi kwakaŋga kusinomunondo muruʋoko rwaDavidi.

Ɀino Davidi akamhanya, akamira pamsoro pomuFiristia, akatora munondo wake, akauvomora pamuhara wawo, akamuʋuraya, akamugura musoro wake nawo. Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti mhare yaʋo yafa, ʋakatiza.

Ɀino ʋarume ʋaIsraeri naʋaJuda ʋakasimuka, ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋakateʋera ʋaFiristia kuȿikira paGati napamasuʋo eEkroni. Ʋakaŋga ʋakuʋadzwa ʋaʋaFiristia ʋakawira pasi panzira inoenda Shaaraimi, kuȿikira paGati napaEkroni.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzoka pakudziŋgirira ʋaFiristia, ʋakapambara misasa yaʋo.
Davidi akatora musoro womuFiristia, akauisa Jerusarema, asi ŋguʋo dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakadziisa mutente rake.
Ɀino Sauro wakati aciʋona Davidi aciɓuɗa kundorwa nomuFiristia, akati kunaAbineri, mukuru wehondo: Abineri, mukomana uyo mŋanakomana waaniko? Abineri akati: Nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, mambo, handiziʋi.
Mambo akati: Bvunza ɀakanaka kuti mukomana uyu mŋanakomana waaniko.
Ɀino pakudzoka kwaDavidi pakuʋuraya muFiristia Abineri akamutora akamuisa pamberi paSauro, acakaɓata musoro womuFiristia muruʋoko rwake.
Sauro akati kwaari: Ndiwe mŋanakomana waaniko, iwe jaya? Davidi akapindura, akati: Ndiri mŋanakomana womuranda wenyu Jese muBeti‐rehemi.
Ɀino wakati apedza kutaura naSauro, mŋoyo waJonatani ukanamatira mŋoyo waDavidi, Jonatani akamuɗa seɀaakaŋga aciɗa mŋoyo wake.
Sauro akamutora zuʋa iro, akasaɗa kumutendera kudzokera kumusha kwake, kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino Jonatani akaita suŋgano naDavidi, nokuti wakaŋga acimuɗa seɀaakaŋga aciɗa mŋoyo wake.
Jonatani akabvisa ŋguʋo yaakaŋga akafuka, akaipa Davidi, neɀisimiro ɀake, kunyaŋge nomunondo wake, noʋuta bgake, nebanhire rake.
Davidi akasienda kwose kwaaitumŋa naSauro, akaɓata maɓasa ose nokuŋgwara; Sauro akamuita mukuru waʋarume ʋehondo; ɀikafadza ʋanhu ʋose ʋuye naʋaranda ʋaSauro ʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika pakudzoka kwaDavidi pakuʋuraya muFiristia, ʋakadzi ʋakaɓuɗa kumaguta ose aʋaIsraeri ʋaciimba, ʋacitamba, kuzosoŋgana namambo Sauro neŋgoma, nokufara, ʋuye neɀimŋe ɀokuridza.
Ʋakadzi ʋakaimba ʋacibvumirana pakuridza kwaʋo, ʋakati:
Sauro wakaʋuraya ɀuru ɀamazana ake,
Asi Davidi makumi eɀuru ɀamazana ake.
Sauro akatsamŋa kwaɀo, shoko iri rikasamufadza, akati: Ʋakapa Davidi makumi eɀuru ɀamazana, asi ini ʋakandipa ɀuru ɀoga; caanoshaiwa ɀino cinyiko, asi ʋushe bgoga?
Ɀino kubva pazuʋa iro namazuʋa ose Sauro akacenjerera Davidi.

Ɀino fume maŋgwana mŋeya wakaipa, wakaŋga watumŋa naMŋari, ukaʋuya pamsoro paSauro nesimba, iye akataura nokupeŋga mukati meimba yake; Davidi akaridza noruʋoko rwake seɀaaiita zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe; Sauro wakaŋga akaɓata pfumo muruʋoko rwake.
Sauro akaposha pfumo, nokuti wakati: Ndicaɓayira Davidi pamadziro. Davidi akanɀeŋga kaʋiri pamberi pake.
Sauro akatya Davidi, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga anaye, asi wakaŋga abva kunaSauro.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akamutamisa abve kwaari, akamuita mukuru wecuru, akaɓuɗa nokupinda pakati paʋanhu.
Davidi akafamba nokuŋgwara paɀose ɀaakaita, Jehova akaʋa naye.
Ɀino Sauro wakati aciʋona kuti unofamba nokuŋgwara kukuru, akamutya kwaɀo.
Asi ʋaIsraeri ʋose naʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaɗa Davidi, nokuti waiɓuɗa nokupinda pakati paʋo.

Ɀino Sauro akati kunaDavidi: Tarira, mukunda waŋgu mukuru Merabi, ndicakupa iye aʋe mukadzi wako; asi iwe uʋe mhare yaŋgu, urwe hondo dzaJehova. Nokuti Sauro wakati: Ruʋoko rwaŋgu ŋgarurege kumuʋuraya, asi maʋoko aʋaFiristia ŋgaamuʋuraye.
Davidi akati kunaSauro: Ini ndini aniko, noʋupenyu bgaŋgu cinyiko, kana imba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu pakati paIsraeri, kuti ndiʋe mukwambo wamambo?
Asi ŋguʋa iyo Merabi mukunda waSauro yaaifanira kupiwa Davidi, iye akapiwa Adrieri muMehorati, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ɀino Mikari mukunda waSauro, wakaŋga aciɗa Davidi; ʋakaʋudza Sauro, akafara naɀo.
Ipapo Sauro akati: Ndicamupa iye, aʋe musuŋgo kwaari, ʋuye kuti ʋaFiristia ʋarwe naye. Naiɀoɀo Sauro akati kunaDavidi: Nhasi ucaʋa mukwambo waŋgu rwecipiri.
Ipapo Sauro akaraira ʋaranda ʋake, akati: Tauriranai naDavidi pakaʋanda, muti: Tarira, mambo unokufarira, naʋaranda ʋake ʋose ʋanokuɗa; naiɀoɀo ɀino ciʋa mukwambo wamambo.
Ʋaranda ʋaSauro ʋakataura mashoko iwayo munzeʋe dzaDavidi. Davidi akati: Imi munoti ɀitete here kuʋa mukwambo wamambo, ɀandiri murombo haŋgu usiŋgakudzwi?
Ʋaranda ʋaSauro ʋakamuʋudza ʋakati: Davidi wataura mashoko okuti.
Sauro akati: Muti kunaDavidi: Mambo haatȿaki kuroʋorerwa, asi ɀikanda ɀapamberi ɀinezana ɀaʋaFiristia, kuti mambo atsiʋe ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake. Asi Sauro wakafuŋga kuʋurayisa Davidi naʋaFiristia.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋake ʋakati ʋaciʋudza Davidi mashoko iwayo, Davidi akafara kuʋa mukwambo wamambo. Ɀino mazuʋa asati apera,

Davidi akasimuka, akaenda iye naʋanhu ʋake, akaʋuraya ʋarume ʋanamazana maʋiri aʋaFiristia; Davidi akaʋuya neɀikanda ɀaʋo ɀapamberi, akaɀipa ɀiri ɀose kunamambo, kuti aʋe mukwambo wamambo. Ipapo Sauro akamupa Mikari mukunda wake, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akaziʋa nokuʋona kuti Jehova unaDavidi; Mikari mukunda waSauro akamuɗa.
Sauro akanyanya kutya Davidi; Sauro akaramba aciʋeŋga Davidi.
Ɀino macinda aʋaFiristia akaɓuɗa; ŋguʋa dzose kana ʋoɓuɗa, Davidi akakunda ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋose ʋaSauro pakuŋgwara; naiɀoɀo zita rake rikakurumbira kwaɀo.
Ɀino Sauro akataura naJonatani mŋanakomana wake, naʋaranda ʋake ʋose, kuti ʋaʋuraye Davidi.

Asi Jonatani mŋanakomana waSauro, wakaŋga acifarira Davidi kwaɀo. Naiɀoɀo Jonatani akaʋudza Davidi, akati: Sauro, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ʋanotȿaka kukuʋuraya; naiɀoɀo ɀino, cenjera kwaɀo maŋgwana, ugare pakaʋanda, uʋande;
ini ndicaɓuɗa, ndicandomira kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu mumunda, mauri, nditaurirane naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu pamsoro pako; kana ndiciŋge ndikaʋona cinhu, ndicakuʋudza.
Ipapo Jonatani akareʋerera Davidi ɀakanaka kunaSauro ɓaɓa ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Mambo ŋgaarege kutadzira Davidi muranda wake, nokuti iye haana‐kukutadzirai imi, asi wakakuitirai ɀakanaka kwaɀo;

nokuti wakaɓata ʋupenyu bgake mumaʋoko ake, akaʋuraya muFiristia; Jehova akakundisa ʋaIsraeri nokukunda kukuru; imi makaɀiʋona, mukafara; naiɀoɀo mucatadzireiko ropa risinemhoȿa, mukaʋuraya Davidi asinemhaka hake?
Sauro akaterera inzwi raJonatani, Sauro akapika, akati: NaJehova mupenyu, haaŋgaʋurawi!
Ɀino Jonatani akaɗana Davidi, Jonatani akamuziʋisa ɀinhu iɀo ɀose. Jonatani akaenda naDavidi kunaSauro, akagara pamberi pake sapakutaŋga.
Ɀino kurwa kukaʋa’po ɀe, Davidi akaɓuɗa kundorwa naʋaFiristia, akaʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru, ʋakatiza pamberi pake.
Mŋeya wakaipa, wakaŋga watumŋa naJehova, ukaʋuya pamsoro paSauro, agere mumba make anepfumo rake muruʋoko rwake; Davidi akaridza noruʋoko rwake.
Sauro akaidza kuɓayira Davidi pamadziro nepfumo; Davidi akatiza, akapukunyuka ʋusiku ubgo.
Ipapo Sauro akatuma nhume kumba kwaDavidi kumurinda nokumuʋuraya maŋgwanani; Mikari mukadzi waDavidi, akamuʋudza, akati: Kana ukasaponesa ʋupenyu bgako ʋusiku bguno, ucaʋurawa maŋgwana.
Naiɀoɀo Mikari akaɓurusa Davidi pasi napawindi; akaenda, akatiza, akapukunyuka.
Mikari akatora terafimi, akairadzika panhoʋo, akaisa mutsamiro wemvere dzembudzi pamusoro wayo, akaifukidza nejira.
Ɀino Sauro wakati acituma nhume kuzoɓata Davidi, iye akati: Unorwara.
Ipapo Sauro akatuma nhume kuzotarira Davidi, akati: Ʋuyai naye kwandiri ari panhoʋo, ndimuʋuraye.
Ɀino nhume dzakati dzicipinda, dzikaʋona terafimi iri panhoʋo nomutsamiro wemvere dzembudzi pamusoro wayo.
Sauro akati kunaMikari: Wandinyeŋgereiko kuɗai, ukarega muʋeŋgi waŋgu acienda, akapukunyuka? Mikari akapindura Sauro, aciti: Iye wakati kwandiri: Ndirege, ndiende; ndicakuʋurayireiko?
Davidi akatiza, akapukunyuka, akaȿika kunaSamueri paRama, akamuʋudza ɀose ɀaakaŋga aitirwa naSauro. Iye naSamueri ʋakandogara Naioti.
Ɀino Sauro wakaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Tarirai, Davidi uri Naioti paRama.

Sauro akatuma nhume kundoɓata Davidi; asi idzo dzakati dziciʋona ɓoka raʋaprofita ʋaciprofita, naSamueri amire ari mutuŋgamiriri waʋo, Mŋeya waMŋari akaʋuya pamsoro penhume dzaSauro, naidzo dzikaprofita ʋo.
Ɀino Sauro wakati aciʋudzwa iɀoɀo, akatuma ɀe dzimŋe nhume, naidzo dzikaprofita ʋo. Ipapo Sauro akatuma ɀe nhume rwecitatu, naidzo dzikaprofita ʋo.
Ɀino naiye akaenda ʋo Rama, akaȿika patsime guru riri paSeku, akabvunza, akati: ƲanaSamueri naDavidi ʋaripiko? Mumŋe akati: Tarirai, ʋari Naioti paRama.
Iye akaenda’ko Naioti paRama, Mŋeya waMŋari akaʋuya pamsoro pake ʋo, akafamba aciprofita kudzimana aȿika Naioti paRama.
Akabvisa ʋo ŋguʋo dzake, akaprofita pamberi paSamueri, akaʋata pasi, asakafuka, zuʋa iro rose noʋusiku ubgo bgose. Naiɀoɀo ʋanoti: Sauro uri pakati paʋaprofita ʋo here?
Ɀino Davidi wakatiza paNaioti paRama, akaenda akati kunaJonatani: Ndaɗiniko? Kutadza kwaŋgu ndokwei? Ciʋi caŋgu pamberi paɓaɓa ʋako ndecipi, ɀaʋanotȿaka kundiʋuraya?
Iye akati kwaari: Haiȿa, usaɗaro, hauŋgafi; tarira ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu haʋaŋgaiti cinhu cikuru kana ciɗuku, ʋasiŋgandiziʋisi ico; ɀino ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaŋgandiʋanzirireiko cinhu ici? Haɀizi iɀo.

Ipapo Davidi akapika ɀe, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋanoziʋa kwaɀo kuti ini ndakawana nyasha kwauri; naiɀoɀo ʋakati: Jonatani ŋgaarege kuɀiziʋa, ɀimŋe uŋgaɀidya mŋoyo; asi ɀirokwaɀo, naJehova mupenyu, nomŋeya wako mupenyu, kunenhambge imŋe cete pakati paŋgu norufu.
Ipapo Jonatani akati kunaDavidi: Ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako, ndicakuitira iɀoɀo.
Davidi akati kunaJonatani: Tarira, maŋgwana mŋedzi wogara, ndicafanira kundogara pakudya namambo; asi nditendere, ndiende kundoʋanda mumunda kuȿikira maɗekwana ezuʋa recitatu.
Kana ɓaɓa ʋako ʋakandishaiwa, uti kwaʋari: Davidi wakakumbira ɀikuru kwandiri, kuti amhanyire Beti‐rehemi, kuguta rake; nokuti ikweyo kunoitwa ciɓayiro cegore rimŋe nerimŋe caʋose ʋeimba yake.
Kana ʋakati: Ɀakanaka haɀo! muranda wako ucaʋa norugare; asi kana ʋakatsamŋa, uziʋe kuti ʋagara ʋandifuŋgira ɀakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo ciitira hako muranda wako ɀakanaka; nokuti wakaita suŋgano nomuranda wako pamberi paJehova; asi kana ɀakaipa ɀiri’ko kwandiri, undiʋuraye iwe, nokuti ucandiisireiko kunaɓaɓa ʋako?
Jonatani akati: Usaɗaro, nokuti ɗai ndaiziʋa kuti ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋagara ʋafuŋga kukuitira ɀakaipa, handizaikuʋudza here?
Davidi akati kunaJonatani: Ndianiko ucandiʋudza kana ɓaɓa ʋako ʋaciŋge ʋakupindura nehasha?
Jonatani akati kunaDavidi: Hendei kusaŋgo. Iʋo ʋakaenda ʋari ʋaʋiri kusaŋgo.
Ɀino Jonatani akati kunaDavidi: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri
Jehova ŋgaaroʋe Jonatani, arambe aciɗaro, kana ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaciŋge ʋaciɗa kukuitira ɀakaipa, ini ndikasakuziʋisa iɀoɀo, ndikakuendisa norugare; Jehova ŋgaaʋe newe, seɀaaiʋa naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
