Newe ʋo undiitire tsitsi dzaJehova ndiciri mupenyu, ndirege kufa,
ʋuye usabvisa tsitsi dzako kunaʋeimba yaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi, kunyaŋge kana Jehova abvisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaDavidi, mumŋe nomumŋe panyika yose.
Naiɀoɀo Jonatani akaita suŋgano neimba yaDavidi, akati: Jehova ŋgaaɀitȿake kumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaDavidi.
Jonatani akapikisa Davidi ɀe noruɗo rwake kwaari, nokuti wakaŋga acimuɗa seɀaakaɗa mŋoyo wake.
Ɀino Jonatani akati kwaari: Maŋgwana mŋedzi wogara; iwe ucashaikwa, nokuti cigaro cako cicashaiwa munhu.
Kana wagara mazuʋa matatu, unofanira kukurumidza kuɓurukira kunɀimbo iya pawakaʋanda musi watakataurirana pamsoro peshoko riya, ugogara pabge rinonzi Ezeri.
Ɀino ini ndicaposha miseʋe mitatu kurutiʋi rwaro, ndiciita sendinoposhera cinhu cakatimikwa.

Ipapo, tarira, ndicatuma mukomana, ndiciti: Enda undotȿaka miseʋe. Kana ndikati kumukomana: Tarira, miseʋe iri necoʋuno kwako, ʋuya nayo, ipapo uŋgaʋuya hako, nokuti kunorugare kwauri; hakunemhoȿa, naJehova mupenyu.
Asi kana ndikati kumukomana: Tarira, miseʋe iri mberi kwako, ipapo uende hako, nokuti Jehova wakuendisa.
Kana riri shoko ratakataurirana pamsoro paro iwe neni, tarira Jehova uri pakati pako neni nokusiŋgaperi.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akandoʋanda musaŋgo; ɀino mŋedzi wakati wagara, mambo akagara pakudya kuti adye.
Mambo akagara pacigaro cake, sapaŋguʋa dzose, pacigaro caiʋa pamadziro; Jonatani akasimuka, Abineri akagara parutiʋi rwaSauro; asi cigaro caDavidi cakashaiwa munhu.
Asi Sauro haana‐kutaura cinhu musi iwoyo; nokuti wakati, ɀimŋe wawirwa necinhu, ɀimŋe haana‐kunaka, ɀirokwaɀo haana‐kunaka.

Ɀino pazuʋa rakateʋera kugara kwomŋedzi, pazuʋa recipiri, cigaro caDavidi cakashaiwa ɀe munhu; ipapo Sauro akati kunaJonatani mŋanakomana wake: Mŋanakomana waJese wakaregereiko kuʋuya kuzodya zuro kana nhasi?
Jonatani akapindura Sauro, akati: Davidi wakakumbira ɀikuru kwandiri kuti aende Beti‐rehemi,
akati: Nditendere ʋo ndiende, nokuti ʋeimba yeɗu ʋanoɓayira muguta; mukuru waŋgu wakandiraira
Ipapo Sauro akatsamŋira Jonatani, akati kwaari: Iwe mŋanakomana womukadzi usiŋganzwi, wakapanduka, handiziʋi kanhi kuti wakatsaura mŋanakomana waJese unyadzwe iwe, namai ʋako ʋanyadzwe ʋo?
Nokuti iwe hauŋgasimbiswi noʋushe bgako, kana mŋanakomana waJese aciri mupenyu panyika. Naiɀoɀo ɀino cituma munhu aʋuye naye kwandiri, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo unofanira kufa.
Jonatani akapindura Sauro ɓaɓa ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Ko unofanira kuʋurayirwei? Waiteiko?
Ipapo Sauro akaposha pfumo rake kwaari, aciɗa kumuɓaya. Naiɀoɀo Jonatani wakaziʋa kuti ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakagara ʋafuŋga kuʋuraya Davidi.
Naiɀoɀo Jonatani akasimuka patafura, atsamŋa kwaɀo, akasadya ɀokudya nomusi wecipiri womŋedzi; nokuti wakaŋga aneshuŋgu pamŋoyo pamsoro paDavidi, nokuti wakaŋga anyadzwa naɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana Jonatani akaenda kusaŋgo neŋguʋa yakaŋga yatarwa naDavidi, anomukomana muɗuku.
Akati kumukomana wake: Mhanya utȿake miseʋe yandinoposha. Ipapo mukomana wakati acimhanya, iye akaposha museʋe mberi kwake.
Ɀino mukomana wakati aciȿika pakaŋga paposhwa museʋe naJonatani, Jonatani akaɗanidzira kumukomana, akati: Ko museʋe hauzi mberi kwako here?
Jonatani akaɗanidzira ɀe kumukomana akati: Kasira, kurumidza, usamira. Mukomana waJonatani akanoŋga miseʋe, akaʋuya nayo kunatenzi wake.
Asi mukomana haana‐kuziʋa cinhu; asi Jonatani naDavidi ʋoga ndiʋo ʋakaziʋa shoko iro.
Ɀino Jonatani akapa mukomana nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, akati kwaari: Enda nadzo undodziisa kuguta.
Mukomana wakati aenda, Davidi akasimuka kurutiʋi rwezasi, akawira pasi neciso cake, akakotama katatu, ʋakaȿetana, ʋakacema ʋose, kuȿikira Davidi anyanya kwaɀo.

Jonatani akati kunaDavidi: Enda hako norugare, nokuti takapika tose nezita raJehova, ticiti: Jehova ucaʋa pakati paŋgu newe, napakati paʋana ʋaŋgu naʋako nokusiŋgaperi. Akasimuka, akaenda, naJonatani akapinda muguta.
Ɀino Davidi akaȿika Nobi kunaAhimereki muprista; Ahimereki akasoŋgana naDavidi aciɗeɗera; akati kwaari: Uri woga neiko, usinomumŋe newe?
Davidi akati kunaAhimereki muprista: Mambo wakandiraira ɓasa, akati kwandiri: Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unoziʋa cinhu ceɓasa randinokutuma naro, nerandinokuraira. Majaya ndakaaraira
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, muneiko pano? Ndipei ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu muruʋoko rwaŋgu, kunyaŋge ɀipi neɀipi ɀiri’po.
Muprista akapindura Davidi, akati: Hapaneciŋgwa cinosidyiwa muruʋoko rwaŋgu, asi ciŋgwa citȿene ndico ciri’po; kwoga kana majaya akaɀidzora kuʋakadzi.

Davidi akapindura muprista, akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakadzi ʋakadziʋiswa kwatiri sapaŋguʋa dzose kana ndicifamba rwendo; nhumbi dzamajaya dzakaŋga dziri tȿene, kunyaŋge rwaiʋa rwendo rwamazuʋa ose harwo, ndoɗa nhasi nhumbi dzaʋo dzicaʋa tȿene.
Naiɀoɀo muprista akamupa
Ɀino mumŋe muranda waSauro wakaŋga ari’po nomusi iwoyo, anonoswa pamberi paJehova, wainzi Doegi, muEdomi, mutariri waʋafudzi ʋaSauro.
Davidi akati kunaAhimereki: Hapana pfumo kana munondo kwamuri here? Nokuti handina‐kuʋuya nomunondo waŋgu, kana nhumbi dzaŋgu dzokurwa nadzo, nokuti ɓasa ramambo raifanira kukurumidzirwa.

Muprista akati: Munondo waGoriati muFiristia, wawakaʋuraya pamupata weEra, uri pano, wakaputirwa mumuceka mberi kweefodi; kana uciɗa kuutora, citora hako, nokuti hakunomumŋe asi iwoyo. Davidi akati: Hakunomumŋe wakafanana nawo, ndipe hoyo.
Davidi akasimuka akatiza musi iwoyo nokutya Sauro, akaenda kunaAkishi, mambo weGati.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaAkishi ʋakati kwaari: Ko uyu haazi Davidi mambo wenyika here? Haazi iye waʋakaimbira ʋacibvumirana pakutamba kwaʋo, ʋaciti:
Sauro wakaʋuraya ɀuru ɀamazana ake,
Asi Davidi makumi eɀuru ɀamazana ake?
Davidi akaraŋgarira mashoko iwayo mumŋoyo make, akatya kwaɀo Akishi mambo weGati.
Akashandura mugarire wake pamberi paʋo, akaɀiita seɓenzi pakati paʋo, akakwara‐kwara pamagonhi esuʋo, akarega mate ake acisiririka pandebvu dzake.
Ɀino Akishi akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Tarirai, munhu uyu iɓenzi; maʋuyireiko naye ʋuno kwandiri?
Ini ndinoshaiwa mapenzi kanhi, ɀamaʋuya nomunhu uyu kuzoratidza ʋupenzi bgake pamberi paŋgu? Munhu wakaɗai uŋgapinda mumba maŋgu here?
Naiɀoɀo Davidi wakabva’po, akatizira kuɓako reAdurami; ɀino hama dzake naʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakaɓurukira’ko kwaari.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari panjodzi, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanemhoȿa, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaneshuŋgu ʋakaʋuŋgana kwaari, akaʋa mutuŋgamiriri waʋo; kwakaŋga kunaʋarume ʋaneŋge mazana manna naye.
Ɀino Davidi akabva’po, akaenda Mizpe kwaMoabi; akati kunamambo waMoabi: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu namai ʋaŋgu ndinokumbira kuti ʋaʋuye ʋagare nemi, kuȿikira ndaziʋa candicaitirwa naMŋari.
Akaʋaisa kunamambo waMoabi, ʋakagara naye ŋguʋa yose yokugara kwaDavidi munhare.
Ɀino muprofita Gadi akati kunaDavidi: Usaramba ugere munhare, asi ibva undogara panyika yaJuda. Ipapo Davidi akabva, akaȿika kuɗondo reHereti.

Ɀino Sauro wakanzwa kuti Davidi wawanikwa, iye naʋarume ʋaiʋa naye; Sauro wakaŋga agere Gibea, munyasi momuti womutamariski paRama, akaɓata pfumo rake muruʋoko rwake, naʋaranda ʋake ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye.

Ɀino Sauro wakati kuʋaranda ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye: Inzwai ɀino, imi ʋaBenjamini! Mŋanakomana waJese ucakupai mose minda neminda yemizambiriŋga here? Ucakuitai mose ʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋakuru ʋamazana here?

Ɀamandiraŋgana mose, ɀakusinomumŋe unondiziʋisa kana mŋanakomana waŋgu akaita suŋgano nomŋanakomana waJese, ɀakusinomumŋe wenyu unondinzwira tsitsi, kana unondiziʋisa kuti mŋanakomana waŋgu wakamutsa muranda waŋgu kuti andimukire, andiʋandire, seɀaanoita nhasi here?
Ipapo Doegi muEdomi, wakaŋga amire naʋaranda ʋaSauro, akapindura, akati: Ndakaʋona mŋanakomana waJese aciȿika Nobi, kunaAhimereki mŋanakomana waAhitubi.
Iye akamubvunzira kunaJehova, akamupa mbuʋa, akamupa ʋo munondo waGoriati muFiristia.
Ipapo mambo akatuma nhume kundoɗana Ahimereki muprista, mŋanakomana waAhitubi, naʋeimba yake yose, iʋo ʋaprista ʋaiʋa paNobi; ʋakaʋuya ʋose kunamambo.
Ɀino Sauro akati: Ɀino cinzwa, iwe mŋanakomana waAhitubi. Iye akapindura, akati: Ndiri pano, ishe waŋgu.
Sauro akati kwaari: Mandiraŋganireiko, iwe nomŋanakomana waJese, ɀawakamupa ciŋgwa, nomunondo, nokumubvunzira kunaMŋari, kuti andimukire, andiʋandire seɀaanoita nhasi?
Ipapo Ahimereki akapindura mambo, akati: Ndianiko pakati paʋaranda ʋenyu ʋose wakatendeka saDavidi, mukwambo wamambo, unosiraŋgana nemi, unokudzwa mumba menyu?

Ndiko nhasi kwandataŋga kumubvunzira kunaMŋari here? Haiȿa! mambo ŋgaarege hake kusundira muranda wake mhoȿa, kunyaŋge ʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu; nokuti muranda wenyu haaziʋi iɀoɀo ɀose, kunyaŋge ɀiɗuku kana ɀikuru.
Ipapo mambo akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ucafa Ahimereki, iwe naʋose ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako.

Mambo akati kuʋanyai ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye: Tendeʋukai, muʋuraye ʋaprista ʋaJehova, nokuti maʋoko aʋo anoɓatsira Davidi, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciziʋa kuti watiza, asi haʋana‐kundiziʋisa. Asi ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋakaramba kutambanudzira maʋoko aʋo kuʋuraya ʋaprista ʋaJehova.

Ipapo mambo akati kunaDoegi: Tendeʋuka iwe, uʋuraye ʋaprista. Doegi muEdomi, akatendeʋuka, akaʋuraya ʋaprista, akaparadza nomusi iwoyo ʋanhu ʋanamakumi masere naʋashanu ʋakaŋga ʋakafuka efodi yomuceka.
Akaparadza ʋo Nobi, guta raʋaprista, neminondo inopinza, ʋarume naʋakadzi ʋose, naʋana naʋakaŋga ʋacimŋa, neŋombe, nemboŋgoro, namakwai; ɀose ɀakaparadzwa neminondo inopinza.
Asi mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaAhimereki mŋanakomana waAhitubi, wainzi Abiatari, wakapukunyuka, akatiza, akateʋera Davidi.
Abiatari akaʋudza Davidi kuti Sauro waʋuraya ʋaprista ʋaJehova.
Davidi akati kunaAbiatari: Musi uya
Gara hako neni, usatya; nokuti unotȿaka kundiʋuraya ini, ndiye unotȿaka kukuʋuraya iwe ʋo; nokuti kana ukagara neni ucaceŋgetwa.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaʋudza Davidi, ʋakati: Tarirai, ʋaFiristia ʋanorwa neKeira, ʋacipambara ɀiri pamapuriro.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akabvunza Jehova, akati: Ndoenda, ndindoparadza ʋaFiristia aʋo here? Jehova akati kunaDavidi: Enda undoparadza ʋaFiristia, uponese Keira.
Ʋarume ʋaDavidi ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, isu tinotya ticiri pano paJuda, ndoɗa kana tikaenda Keira kundorwa nehondo dzaʋaFiristia.
Ɀino Davidi akabvunza ɀe Jehova, Jehova akamupindura, akati: Simuka, uɓurukire Keira, nokuti ndicaisa ʋaFiristia muruʋoko rwako.
Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaenda Keira, ʋakandorwa naʋaFiristia, ʋakaʋatorera ŋombe dzaʋo, ʋakaʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru. Naiɀoɀo Davidi akaponesa ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere Keira.
Ɀino Abiatari mŋanakomana waAhimereki pakutizira kwake kunaDavidi paKeira, wakaenda akaɓata efodi paruʋoko rwake.
Sauro akaʋudzwa kuti Davidi waȿika Keira. Sauro akati: Mŋari wamuisa muruʋoko rwaŋgu, nokuti wazaririrwa’mo, ɀaapinda muguta rinamasuʋo neɀipfigiso.
Sauro akaɗana ʋanhu ʋose kundorwa, akaɓurukira Keira, akakomba Davidi naʋanhu ʋake.
Asi Davidi wakaziʋa kuti Sauro wakafuŋga kumuitira ɀakaipa, akati kunaAbiatari muprista: Ʋuya pano neefodi.
Ɀino Davidi akati: Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, muranda wenyu wakanzwa ɀirokwaɀo kuti Sauro unoɗa kuʋuya Keira, kuzoparadza guta nokuɗa kwaŋgu.
Ko ʋarume ʋeKeira ʋacandiisa mumaʋoko ake here? Ko Sauro ucaɓuruka here, seɀakanzwa muranda wenyu? Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, ndinokumbira muziʋise henyu muranda wenyu. Jehova akati: Ucaɓuruka.
Davidi akati: Ko ʋarume ʋeKeira ʋacandiisa naʋanhu ʋaŋgu muruʋoko rwaSauro here? Jehova akati: Ʋacakuisa.
Ipapo Davidi naʋanhu ʋake, ʋaneŋge mazana matanhatu, ʋakasimuka, ʋakabva Keira, ʋakafamba‐famba haʋo. Sauro akaʋudzwa kuti Davidi wapukunyuka paKeira, akarega hake kuenda’ko.
Davidi akagara murenje munhare, akaramba agere panyika yamakomo murenje reZifi. Sauro akamutȿaka mazuʋa ose, asi Mŋari haana‐kumuisa muruʋoko rwake.
Ɀino Davidi akaʋona kuti Sauro wakaŋga aɓuɗa kuzotȿaka kumuʋuraya, Davidi akagara murenje reZifi muɗondo.
Ipapo Jonatani mŋanakomana waSauro, akasimuka, akaenda kunaDavidi muɗondo, akamusimbisa munaMŋari.
Akati kwaari: Usatya, nokuti ruʋoko rwaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu Sauro haruŋgakuwani; ucaʋa mambo waIsraeri, neni ndicaʋa muɗuku kwauri; naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu Sauro ʋanoɀiziʋa.
Iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakaita suŋgano pamberi paJehova; Davidi akagara muɗondo, Jonatani akadzokera kumba kwake.
Ɀino ʋaZifi ʋakakwira kunaSauro paGibea, ʋakati: Ko Davidi haazinoʋanda kwatiri, panhare muɗondo, mugomo reHakira riri kurutiʋi rwezasi rwerenje here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, mambo ɓurukai, seɀinoɗa mŋoyo wenyu; kana tiri’su ndiro ɓasa reɗu kuti timuise pamaʋoko amambo.
Ipapo Sauro akati: Imi muropafadzwe naJehova, nokuti makandinzwira tsitsi.
ciendai henyu, mucerekedze kwaɀo, muziʋe nokuʋona kwaari, kwaanogara, ʋuye kuti ndianiko wakamuʋona’ko; nokuti ndaʋudzwa kuti unamano kwaɀo.

Naiɀoɀo tarisisai, muziʋe ɀakanaka nɀimbo dzake dzose dzaanoʋanda kwadziri, mugodzokera ɀe kwandiri ɀirokwaɀo, ndiende nemi; ɀino kana aciŋge ari munyika iyo, ndicandomutȿakisisa pakati peɀuru ɀaʋaJuda.
Ipapo ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda Zifi pamberi paSauro, asi Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋari murenje reMaoni paAraba kurutiʋi rwezasi rwerenje.
Ɀino Sauro naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaenda kundomutȿaka. Davidi akaʋudzwa iɀoɀo; naiɀoɀo akaɓurukira kuɗombo, akandogara murenje reMaoni. Ɀino Sauro wakati aciɀinzwa, akateʋera Davidi kurenje reMaoni.
Sauro akaenda necoʋuno kwegomo, Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaenda neceseri kwegomo; Davidi akakurumidza kubva, nokutya Sauro; nokuti Sauro naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋakomba Davidi naʋanhu ʋake, kuti ʋaʋaɓate.
Asi nhume yakaȿika kunaSauro, ikati: Kurumidzai, muʋuye, nokuti ʋaFiristia ʋopambara nyika.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akadzoka pakuteʋera Davidi, akandorwa naʋaFiristia. Naiɀoɀo ʋakapatumidza Sera‐hamarekoti.
Davidi akakwira, akabva’po, akandogara munhare dzapaEni‐gedi.
Ɀino Sauro wakati adzoka pakuteʋera ʋaFiristia, akaʋudzwa ɀicinzi: Tarirai, Davidi uri murenje reEni‐gedi.
Ipapo Sauro akatora ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu ʋakaŋga ʋatsaurwa kuʋaIsraeri ʋose, akandotȿaka Davidi naʋanhu ʋake pamatombo eŋgururu.
Akaȿika pamataŋga amakwai panzira pakaŋga paneɓako, Sauro akapinda’mo kuti afukidze tsoka dzake. Ɀino Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋagere mukati‐kati meɓako.
Ʋanhu ʋaDavidi ʋakati kwaari: Iri ndiro zuʋa ramakaʋudzwa naJehova,
Asi pashure hana yaDavidi yakamutambudza, nemhaka yokuti wakaŋga agura ŋguʋo yaSauro.
Akati kuʋanhu ʋake: Jehova ŋgaandidziʋise, ndirege kuitira ishe waŋgu, muzodzwa waJehova, cinhu cakaɗai, nditambanudzire ruʋoko rwaŋgu kwaari, nokuti ndiye muzodzwa waJehova.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akadziʋisa ʋanhu ʋake namashoko iwayo, akasaʋatendera kumukira Sauro. Sauro akasimuka, akaɓuɗa muɓako, akaenda hake.
NaDavidi wakasimuka ʋo, akaɓuɗa muɓako, akaɗanidzira kunaSauro, akati: Ishe waŋgu, mambo! Ɀino Sauro wakati aciceuka, Davidi akakotamira pasi neciso, akafugama.
Davidi akati kunaSauro: Munoterereiko mashoko aʋanhu, ʋanoti: Tarira, Davidi unotȿaka kukukuʋadzai?

Tarirai, zuʋa rino meso enyu akaʋona kuti Jehova wakakuisai nhasi mumaʋoko aŋgu muɓako; ʋamŋe ʋakati ndikuʋurayei, asi ndakakuregai, ndikati: Handiŋgatambanudzi ruʋoko rwaŋgu kunashe waŋgu, nokuti ndiye muzodzwa waJehova.

Ɀino ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, tarirai, hoyo mupendero weŋguʋo yenyu muruʋoko rwaŋgu; nokuti ɀandakagura mupendero weŋguʋo yenyu, ndikasakuʋurayai, muziʋe, muʋone, kuti hakunecakaipa kana kuɗarika kwandiri; handina‐kukutadzirai, kunyaŋge makandivima kuti munditorere ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Jehova ŋgaatoŋge pakati paŋgu nemi, Jehova ŋgaanditsiʋe kwamuri; asi ruʋoko rwaŋgu haruŋgarwi nemi.
Seɀinoreʋa shumo yaʋekare: Kunowakaipa kunoɓuɗa ɀakaipa; asi ruʋoko rwaŋgu haruŋgarwi nemi.
Ko mambo waIsraeri wakaɓuɗa acitȿaka aniko? Munodziŋgana naniko? Imbga yakafa, rutata harwo.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova ŋgaaʋe mutoŋgi, ŋgaatoŋge pakati paŋgu nemi, aʋone, andireʋerere pamhoȿa yaŋgu, andirwire paruʋoko rwenyu.
Davidi wakati apedza kutaura mashoko iwayo kunaSauro, Sauro akati: Inzwi rako here, mŋana waŋgu Davidi? Sauro akacema kwaɀo.
Akati kunaDavidi: Iwe unondikunda pakururama, nokuti iwe wakandiitira ɀakanaka, asi ini ndakakuitira ɀakaipa.
Warondedzera nhasi pawakandiitira ɀakanaka, nokuti hauna‐kundiʋuraya, kunyaŋge Jehova akandiisa muruʋoko rwako.
Nokuti kana munhu aciŋge awana muʋeŋgi wake, uŋgamurega akaenda hake here? Naiɀoɀo Jehova ŋgaakuripire ɀakanaka nokuɗa kweɀawakandiitira nhasi.
Ɀino tarira, ndinoziʋa kuti iwe ucazoʋa mambo ɀirokwaɀo, ʋuye kuti ʋushe bgaIsraeri bgucasimbiswa muruʋoko rwako.
Naiɀoɀo pika ɀino kwandiri naJehova kuti hauŋgaparadzi ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋanonditeʋera, ʋuye kuti hauŋgaparadzi zita raŋgu mumba maɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ipapo Davidi akapika kunaSauro. Sauro akaenda kumusha kwake, asi Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaenda kunhare yaʋo.
Ɀino Samueri wakafa; ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakamucema, ʋakamuʋiga mumba make paRama. Davidi akasimuka, akaɓurukira kurenje reParani.

Ɀino paMaoni pakaŋga panomunhu, waiʋa nefuma yake paKarmeri; munhu uyu wakaŋga ari mukuru kwaɀo, wakaŋga anamakwai aneɀuru ɀitatu, nembudzi dzinecuru cimŋe; iye wakaŋga aciʋeʋura makwai ake paKarmeri.

Zita romunhu uyu raiʋa Nabari, ʋuye zita romukadzi wake Abigairi; mukadzi wakaŋga akaŋgwara, ʋuye wakaŋga akanaka kumeso; asi murume wakaŋga anomŋoyo mukukutu, akaipa pamugarire wake; waiʋa weimba yaKarebi.
Ɀino Davidi wakanzwa kurenje kuti Nabari wakaŋga aciʋeʋura makwai ake.
Davidi akatuma majaya anegumi, Davidi akati kumajaya: Kwirai Karmeri, muende kunaNabari, mundomukwazisa nezita raŋgu.
Mugoti kunaiye ugere pakati pefuma yake: Rugare ŋgaruʋe nemi, rugare ŋgaruʋe neimba yenyu, ʋuye rugare ŋgaruʋe paɀinhu ɀose ɀamunaɀo.
Ɀino ndakanzwa kuti munaʋaʋeʋuri; ʋafudzi ʋenyu ʋaiʋa nesu ɀino, asi hatina‐kuʋatambudza, ʋuye haʋana‐kurashikirwa necinhu ŋguʋa yose yaʋakagara paKarmeri.
Bvunzai majaya enyu, ʋakuʋudzei; ɀino majaya ŋgaanzwirwe tsitsi nemi, nokuti tinoʋuya nezuʋa rakanaka; ipai henyu ʋaranda ʋenyu nomŋanakomana wenyu Davidi cinhu cipi necipi camunaco.
Ɀino majaya aDavidi akati aȿika, akaʋudza Nabari mashoko iwayo ose nezita raDavidi, ʋakanyarara haʋo.
Ipapo Nabari akapindura ʋaranda ʋaDavidi, akati: Davidi ndianiko? Mŋanakomana waJese ndianiko? Mazuʋa ano ʋaranda ʋazhinji ʋanotiza ʋatenzi ʋaʋo.
Ndiŋgatora ɀiŋgwa ɀaŋgu, nemvura yaŋgu, nenyama yaŋgu yandakaʋurayira ʋaʋeʋuri ʋaŋgu, ndiɀipe ʋarume ʋandisiŋgaziʋi kuti ʋanobvepiko here?
Naiɀoɀo majaya aDavidi akapinduka hawo, akadzoka, akandomuʋudza mashoko iwayo ose.

Davidi akati kuʋanhu ʋake: Mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ŋgaasuŋge munondo wake; mumŋe nomumŋe akasuŋga munondo wake; naiye Davidi ʋo akasuŋga munondo wake; ʋarume ʋaneŋge mazana manna ʋakateʋera Davidi, ʋanamazana maʋiri ʋakasara panhumbi.
Asi mumŋe wamajaya wakandoʋudza Abigairi, mukadzi waNabari, akati: Tarirai, Davidi wakaŋga atuma nhume, ari kurenje, kundokwazisa tenzi weɗu; iʋo ʋakaʋatuka kwaɀo.
Asi ʋarume aʋo ʋaitiitira ɀakanaka, hatina‐kutambudzwa naʋo; hatina‐kurashikirwa necinhu mazuʋa ose atakafambidzana naʋo kusaŋgo.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakaita
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciziʋai mufuŋge ɀamuŋgaita, nokuti tenzi weɗu naʋose ʋeimba yake ʋagara ʋafuŋgirwa ɀakaipa; nokuti munhu wakaiȿo‐ipa wakaɗaro, kuti hakunomunhu uŋgagona kutaura naye.

Ipapo Abigairi akakurumidza kutora ɀiŋgwa ɀinamazana maʋiri, namatende maʋiri ewaini, namakwai mashanu akaŋga agadzirwa, neɀiyero ɀishanu ɀeɀiyo ɀakakaŋgwa, namasumbu amazambiriŋga akawoma anezana, namapundu amaʋonde anamazana maʋiri, akaɀiisa pamsoro pemboŋgoro.
Akati kumajaya ake: Ndituŋgamirirei, tarirai, ndinokuteʋerai. Asi haana‐kuʋudza murume wake Nabari.
Ɀino wakati acifamba akataȿa mboŋgoro yake, akaɓurukira pamupata pagomo, Davidi naʋarume ʋake ʋakaɓurukira ʋo kwaari; iye akasoŋgana naʋo.
Ɀino Davidi wakaŋga ati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndaiceŋgeta haŋgu ɀinhu ɀose ɀomunhu uyu nhandu murenje, hakunecinhu cimŋe cake cakarashika; akanditsiʋa neɀakaipa paneɀakanaka.
Mŋari ŋgaaroʋe ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaDavidi, arambe aciɗaro, kana ndikarega kunyaŋge mŋanakomana mumŋe cete kunaʋose ʋaanaʋo ari mupenyu kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Ɀino Abigairi wakati aciʋona Davidi, akakurumidza kuɓuruka pamboŋgoro yake, akawira pasi neciso cake pamberi paDavidi, akakotamira pasi.
Akawira patsoka dzake, akati: Mhoȿa ŋgaiʋe kwandiri, ishe waŋgu, ndinokumbira kuti murandakadzi wenyu ataure nemi, munzwe mashoko omurandakadzi wenyu.

Ndinokumbira kuti ishe waŋgu arege hake kuraŋgarira munhu uyu wakaiȿo‐ipa, iye Nabari; nokuti sezita rake ndiɀo ɀaakaita ʋo iye; zita rake ndiNabari, naiye iɓenzi; asi ini murandakadzi wenyu, handina‐kuʋona majaya ashe waŋgu amakatuma.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, ishe waŋgu, naJehova mupenyu, ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, ɀaari Jehova wakakudziʋisai kuteʋura ropa nokuɀitsiʋa noruʋoko rwenyu, naiɀoɀo ɀino ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu naʋanotȿaka kuitira ishe waŋgu ɀakaipa, ŋgaʋaʋe saNabari.
Ɀino, ishe waŋgu, cipo ici camakaʋigirwa nomurandakadzi wenyu, ŋgacipiwe haco majaya anoteʋera ishe waŋgu.
Kaŋganwirai henyu kuɗarika kwomurandakadzi wenyu, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo Jehova ucaitira ishe waŋgu imba yakasimba, nokuti ishe waŋgu unorwa hondo dzaJehova; ɀakaipa haɀiŋgawanikwi kwamuri mazuʋa enyu ose.

Kunyaŋge munhu akasimuka kukudziŋgirirai, nokutȿaka kukuʋurayai, mŋeya washe waŋgu ucaramba wakasuŋgirwa pacisote caʋapenyu ʋari kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu; asi mŋeya yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ucaiposhera kure, iciita seinobva mucikanda cecifuramabge.
Ɀino kana Jehova azoitira ishe waŋgu ɀose ɀakanaka ɀaakaŋga ataura pamsoro penyu, akakugadzai mukaʋa mambo waIsraeri,

murege kuɀiɗemba pamsoro pecinhu ici, ʋuye ishe waŋgu arege kuɀidya mŋoyo, nokuti makateʋura ropa risinemhoȿa, kana nokuti ishe waŋgu wakaɀitsiʋa; ɀino kana Jehova aciŋge aitira ishe waŋgu ɀakanaka, muraŋgarire ʋo murandakadzi wenyu.
Davidi akati kunaAbigairi: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakudzwe, iye wakakutuma nhasi kuzosoŋgana neni;
nokuŋgwara kwako ŋgakukudzwe, newe ʋo ukudzwe, nokuti wakandidziʋirira nhasi kuti ndirege kuteʋura ropa, nokuɀitsiʋa noruʋoko rwaŋgu.

Ɀirokwaɀo, naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri mupenyu, iye wakandidziʋirira kuti ndirege kukuitira ɀakaipa, ɗai usina‐kukurumidza kuʋuya kuzosoŋgana neni, Nabari ɀirokwaɀo haazaisarirwa maŋgwana kana kwoedza nomŋana mumŋe womukomana.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akagamucira paruʋoko rwake ɀaakaŋga amuʋigira, akati kwaari: Kwira hako norugare kumba kwako; tarira, ndaterera inzwi rako, ndakunzwira tsitsi.

Abigairi akaȿika kunaNabari, akamuwana ari kumutambo mumba make, wakaŋga wakafanana nomutambo wamambo; mŋoyo waNabari wakaŋga wakafara mukati make, nokuti wakaŋga aɓatwa kwaɀo; naiɀoɀo haana‐kumuʋudza cinhu, kunyaŋge ciɗuku kana cikuru, kuȿikira maŋgwana kwoedza.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana, waini yakati yabva kunaNabari, mukadzi wake akamurondedzera mashoko iwayo, mŋoyo wake ukafa mukati make, akaita sebge.
Mazuʋa aneŋge gumi akati apera, Jehova akaroʋa Nabari, akafa.

Ɀino Davidi wakati anzwa kuti Nabari wafa, akati: Jehova ŋgaakudzwe wakanditsiʋa pakuɀidzwa kwaŋgu naNabari, akadziʋirira muranda wake kuti arege kuita ɀakaipa; ɀakaipa ɀaNabari Jehova wakaɀidzosera pamusoro wake. Ipapo Davidi akatuma nhume kunaAbigairi kukumbira kuti aʋe mukadzi wake.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakati ʋaciȿika kunaAbigairi paKarmeri, ʋakataura naye, ʋakati: Davidi wakatitumira kwauri kuzokutora uʋe mukadzi wake.
Ipapo akasimuka, akakotamira pasi neciso cake, akati: Tarirai murandakadzi wenyu, ndiri murandakadzi unoshambidza tsoka dzashe waŋgu.
Abigairi akakurumidza, akasimuka, akataȿa mboŋgoro, akaenda anaʋasikana ʋake ʋashanu; akateʋera nhume dzaDavidi, akaʋa mukadzi wake.
Davidi akawana ʋo Ahinoami muJezreeri, iʋo ʋose ʋaʋiri ʋakaʋa ʋakadzi ʋake.
Ɀino Sauro wakaŋga akapa Parti, mŋanakomana waRaishi, waiʋa weGarimi, mukunda wake Mikari, mukadzi waDavidi.
Ɀino ʋaZifi ʋakaʋuya kunaSauro paGibea, ʋakati: Ko Davidi haazinoʋanda pacikomo ceHakira, ciri pamberi perenje here?
Ipapo Sauro akasimuka, akaɓurukira kurenje reZifi, anaʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu, ʋakaŋga ʋakatsaurwa kuʋaIsraeri, kuti atȿake Davidi mureŋje reZifi.
Sauro akaʋaka misasa yake pacikomo ceHakira, ciri pamberi perenje, kurutiʋi rwenzira. Asi Davidi wakaŋga agere murenje, akaʋona Sauro acimuteʋera murenje.
Ɀino Davidi akatuma ʋashori, akanzwa kuti Sauro waȿika ɀirokwaɀo.

Davidi akasimuka, akaȿika pakaŋga pakaʋaka Sauro misasa yake, Davidi akaʋona pakaŋga paʋete Sauro, anaAbineri mŋanakomana waNeri, mukuru wehondo yake; Sauro wakaŋga aʋete pakati peŋgoro dzakaŋga dzakaroŋgedzwa, asi ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaʋaka misasa yaʋo ʋakamupoteredza.
Ɀino Davidi akapindura, akati kunaAhimereki muHeti, nokunaAbishai mŋanakomana waZeruya, munuŋuna waJoabi,

Naiɀoɀo Davidi naAbishai ʋakaȿika kuʋanhu ʋusiku, ʋakawana Sauro aʋete pakati peŋgoro dzakaŋga dzaroŋgedzwa, pfumo rake rakaɓayirwa pasi pamusoro wake; Abineri naʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaʋete ʋakamupoteredza.
Ɀino Abishai akati kunaDavidi: Nhasi Mŋari wakaisa muʋeŋgi wako pamaʋoko ako; naiɀoɀo nditendere ndimuɓayire pasi nepfumo kamŋe cete, handiŋgamuɓayi rwecipiri.
Davidi akati kunaAbishai: Usamuʋuraya, nokuti ndianiko uŋgagona kutambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kumuzodzwa waJehova, akasaʋa nemhoȿa?
Davidi akati: NaJehova mupenyu, Jehova ndiye ucamuʋuraya; ɀimŋe zuʋa rake rokufa ricaȿika, ɀimŋe ucaɓurukira kundorwa akaparadzwa’po.
Jehova ŋgaandidziʋise, ndirege kutambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kumuzodzwa waJehova; asi ɀino tora hako pfumo riri pamusoro wake, neciroŋgo cemvura, tiende.

Naiɀoɀo Davidi akatora pfumo neciroŋgo cemvura, ɀakaŋga ɀiri pamusoro waSauro, ʋakaenda; hakunomunhu wakaɀiʋona, kana kuɀiziʋa, hakuna‐wakapepuka, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaʋete ʋose, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa nehope kwaɀo, dzakaŋga dzatumŋa naMŋari.
Ɀino Davidi akayambukira mhiri, akamira pamsoro pegomo ari kure; asi pakati paʋo pakaŋga panenhambo huru;
Davidi akashoʋedzera kuʋanhu nokunaAbineri mŋanakomana waNeri, akati: Nhandi Abineri, hauɗaʋiri here? Ipapo Abineri akaɗaʋira, akati: Ndiwe aniko unoshoʋedzera kunamambo.

Davidi akati kunaAbineri: Ko iwe hauzi murume wemhare here? Ndianiko wakafanana newe kuʋaIsraeri? Wakaregereiko kurinda ishe wako mambo? Nokuti mumŋe munhu wakaŋga apinda kuzoparadza mambo, ishe wako.

Ici cinhu cawaita hacina‐kunaka. NaJehova mupenyu, maifanira kufa, nokuti hamuna‐kurinda ishe wenyu, muzodzwa waJehova. Ɀino citarira, pfumo ramambo neciroŋgo cemvura cakaŋga ciri pamusoro wake ɀiripiko?
Sauro akaziʋa inzwi raDavidi, akati: Ndiro inzwi rako here, mŋana waŋgu Davidi? Davidi akati: Inzwi raŋgu, ishe waŋgu, mambo.
Akati: Ko Ishe waŋgu unoteʋerereiko muranda wake? Nokuti ndakaiteiko? Ɀakaipa ɀiri mandiri ndeɀeiko?

Naiɀoɀo ɀino ishe waŋgu mambo ciɗonzwai mashoko omuranda wenyu. Kana ari Jehova wakakukurudzirai kurwa neni, ŋgaapiwe cipiriso; asi kana ʋari ʋana ʋaʋanhu, ŋgaʋaʋe ʋakatukwa pamberi paJehova, nokuti ʋakandidziŋga nhasi, kuti ndirege kugara panhaka yaJehova, ʋaciti: Enda, undoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ropa raŋgu ŋgarirege kuwira pasi kure naJehova, nokuti mambo waIsraeri waɓuɗa kuzotȿaka rutata rumŋe, somunhu unovima hwari mumakomo.
Ipapo Sauro akati: Ndatadza, dzoka hako, mŋana waŋgu Davidi, nokuti handicazokuitiri ɀakaipa, nokuti ʋupenyu bgaŋgu bgakaŋga bgucikosha pameso ako nhasi; tarira, ndaita seɓenzi, ndatadza kwaɀo.
Ipapo Davidi akapindura, akati: Tarirai pfumo ramambo! mumŋe wamajaya ŋgaayambukire ʋuno aritore.
Jehova unoripira munhu mumŋe nomumŋe kururama kwake nokutendeka kwake; nokuti Jehova wakakuisai nhasi kwandiri, asi ndakaramba kutambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kumuzodzwa waJehova.
Ɀino tarirai, ʋupenyu bgenyu seɀandakabgukudza nhasi, saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ŋgabgukudzwe naJehova, iye andirwire pakutambudzika kwaŋgu kwose.
Ipapo Sauro akati kunaDavidi: Wakaropafadzwa iwe mŋana waŋgu Davidi; ucaʋa nesimba, ʋuye ucakunda kwaɀo. Naiɀoɀo Davidi akaenda hake, naSauro akadzokera kumusha kwake.

Ɀino Davidi akati mumŋoyo make: Mumŋe musi ndicaparadzwa haŋgu noruʋoko rwaSauro; ɀirinani kwaɀo kwandiri kuti nditizire kunyika yaʋaFiristia; Sauro ucazoʋora mŋoyo pamsoro paŋgu, akarega kunditȿaka panyika yose yaIsraeri; saiɀoɀo ndicapukunyuka paruʋoko rwake
Davidi akasimuka, akayambuka, iye naʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, akaenda kunaAkishi, mŋanakomana waMaoki, mambo weGati.
Davidi akagara naAkishi paGati, iye naʋanhu ʋake, munhu mumŋe nomumŋe anemhuri yake, iye Davidi anaʋakadzi ʋake ʋaʋiri, Ahinoami muJezreeri, naAbigairi muKarmeri, waiʋa mukadzi waNabari.
Sauro akaʋudzwa kuti Davidi watizira Gati, akasazomutȿaka ɀe.
Ɀino Davidi akati kunaAkishi: Ɀino kana ndakanzwirwa tsitsi nemi, ŋgandipiwe haŋgu pokugara panerimŋe guta renyika ino, ndigare’po, nokuti muranda ucagarireiko pamuzinda pamŋe cete nemi?
Naiɀoɀo Akishi akamupa Zikragi nomusi iwoyo; naiɀoɀo Zikragi nderamadzimambo aJuda kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino mazuʋa akagara Davidi panyika yaʋaFiristia akaȿika gore rose nemŋedzi minna.
Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakakwira ʋakandopambara ʋaGeshuri naʋaGirzi, naʋaAmareki; nokuti marudzi iwayo ndiwo akaŋga agere panyika iyo kare, kana munhu acienda Shuri kuȿikira panyika yeEgipita.
Davidi akakunda nyika iyo, haana‐kurega murume kana mukadzi ari mupenyu, akatapa makwai, neŋombe, nemboŋgoro, namakamera, neŋguʋo; akadzoka, akaȿika kunaAkishi.
Akishi akati: Mandopambara kupiko nhasi? Davidi akati: Kurutiʋi rwezasi rwaʋaJuda, nokurutiʋi rwezasi rwaʋaJerameeri, nokurutiʋi rwezasi rwaʋaKeni.

Davidi haana‐kurega murume kana mukadzi ari mupenyu, kuti aʋuye naʋo paGati, aciti: Ŋgaʋarege kutiʋudzisira, ʋaciti: Davidi wakaita ɀokuti neɀokuti, ndiyo tsika yake ŋguʋa yose acigere munyika yaʋaFiristia.
Akishi akatenda Davidi, aciti: Waɀiʋeŋgesa kwaɀo naʋanhu ʋake Israeri; naiɀoɀo ucaʋa muranda waŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuŋganidza hondo dzaʋo kuzorwa naʋaIsraeri. Akishi akati kunaDavidi: Ziʋa kwaɀo kuti unofanira kuenda neni nehondo, iwe naʋanhu ʋako.
Davidi akati kunaAkishi: Naiɀoɀo mucaziʋa muranda wenyu ɀaanogona kuita. Akishi akati kunaDavidi: Naiɀoɀo ndicakuita muceŋgeti womusoro waŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Samueri ɀino wakaŋga afa; ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋamucema, ʋamuʋiga paRama, imo muguta rake; Sauro akaŋga abvisa panyika maȿikiro naʋaʋuki.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo paShunemi; Sauro akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose, iʋo ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo paGirboa.
Ɀino Sauro wakati aciʋona hondo dzaʋaFiristia, akatya, mŋoyo wake ukaɗeɗera kwaɀo.
Sauro akabvunza Jehova, asi Jehova haana‐kumupindura, kunyaŋge pakurota, kana neUrimi, kana naʋaprofita.
Ipapo Sauro akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Nditȿakirei mukadzi unoȿikirwa, ndiende kwaari ndindomubvunza iye. Ʋaranda ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, kunomukadzi unoȿikirwa paEndori.
Sauro akaɀishandura, akafuka dzimŋe ŋguʋo, akaenda, iye naʋamŋe ʋarume ʋaʋiri, ʋakaȿika kumukadzi ʋusiku; akati: Ndiʋukire ʋo nomŋeya unokuȿikira, undikwidzire wandicakuʋudza.
Mukadzi akati kwaari: Tarira, unoziʋa ɀakaitwa naSauro, kuti wakaparadza maȿikiro naʋaʋuki panyika, unoteyireiko ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, ndiʋurawe?
Sauro akapika kwaari naJehova, akati: NaJehova mupenyu, iwe hauŋgaʋi nemhoȿa pacinhu ici.
Ɀino mukadzi akati: Ndokukwidzira aniko? Akati: Ndikwidzire Samueri.
Mukadzi wakati aciʋona Samueri, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru. Mukadzi akataura naSauro, akati: Mandinyeŋgerereiko? Nokuti ndimi Sauro.
Mambo akati kwaari: Usatya hako, asi unoʋoneiko? Mukadzi akati kunaSauro: Ndinoʋona mudzimu unokwira aciɓuɗa panyika.
Akati kwaari: Wakaɗiniko? Akati: Kunomutana unokwira, akafuka ŋguʋo. Sauro akaziʋa kuti ndiye Samueri, akakotamira pasi neciso cake, akanamata kwaari.

Samueri akati kunaSauro: Wanditambudzireiko ucindikwidza? Sauro akapindura, akati: Ndinotambudzika kwaɀo; nokuti ʋaFiristia ʋanorwa neni, naMŋari wabva kwandiri, haacatoŋgondipinduri, kunyaŋge naʋaprofita, kana nokurota; naiɀoɀo ndakuɗanai imi, kuti mundiziʋise ɀandinofanira kuita.
Samueri akati: Unondibvunzireiko ini, Jehova ɀaakabva kwauri, akaʋa muʋeŋgi wako?
Jehova wakaɀiitira iɀo ɀaakataura neni; Jehova akabvarura ʋushe pamaʋoko ako, akabgupa mumŋe wokwako, iye Davidi.
Nokuti hauna‐kuterera inzwi raJehova, hauna‐kuitira ʋaAmareki nokutsamŋa kwake kukuru; naiɀoɀo Jehova wakakuitira cinhu ici nhasi.
Ɀino Jehova ucaisa ʋaIsraeri pamŋe cete newe mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia; maŋgwana iwe naʋanakomana ʋako mucaʋa neni; Jehova ucaisa hondo yaʋaIsraeri mumaʋoko aʋaFiristia.
Ipapo Sauro akawira pasi pakarepo, akatsiʋama, akatya kwaɀo pamsoro pamashoko aSamueri; kwakaŋga kusinesimba maari, nokuti wakaŋga asina‐kudya ɀokudya zuʋa iro rose, kunyaŋge noʋusiku bgose.

Ɀino mukadzi akaʋuya kunaSauro, akaʋona kuti unotambudzika kwaɀo, akati kwaari: Tarirai, murandakadzi wenyu wakaterera inzwi renyu, ndikasaraŋgarira ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, asi ndakaterera mashoko enyu amakandiʋudza.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, citererai ʋo inzwi romurandakadzi wenyu, ndiise cimeɗu ceciŋgwa pamberi penyu, mudye, muʋe nesimba kana moenda henyu.
Asi iye wakaramba, akati: Handiɗi haŋgu kudya. Asi ʋaranda ʋake ʋakamukurudzira pamŋe cete nomukadzi, akazoterera manzwi aʋo. Naiɀoɀo akasimuka pasi, akagara panhoʋo.
Ɀino mukadzi wakaŋga anemhuru yakakodzwa mumba; akakurumidza akaiɓaya, akatora ʋupfu, akabgukanya, akaɓika nabgo ciŋgwa cisino‐kuʋiriswa;
akaɀiisa pamberi paSauro napamberi paʋaranda ʋake; ʋakadya. Ipapo ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda ʋusiku ibgobgo.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuŋganidza hondo dzaʋo dzose paAfeki, asi ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo patsime raiʋa paJezreeri.
Madzishe aʋaFiristia akapfuʋura akaita mazana‐mazana neɀuru‐ɀuru, naDavidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakapfuʋura ʋo ʋaciteʋera Akishi.

Ipapo macinda aʋaFiristia akati: Ko ʋaHeberu aʋa ʋanoiteiko pano? Akishi akati kumacinda aʋaFiristia: Ko uyu haazi Davidi, muranda waSauro, mambo waIsraeri, ugere neni mazuʋa ano kana makore ano here? Handina‐kuwana mhoȿa kwaari, ciŋguʋa caakatizira kwandiri kuȿikira nhasi.

Asi macinda aʋaFiristia akamutsamŋira, macinda aʋaFiristia akati kwaari: Dzosa munhu uyu, adzokere uko kwake kwawakamuisa iwe, asi ŋgaarege kuɓuruka kundorwa nesu, kuti arege kutipandukira akaʋa muʋeŋgi weɗu pakurwa. Nokuti munhu uyu uŋgandoyananisa ishe wake neiko? Hatiti nemisoro yaʋanhu aʋa here?
Ko uyu haazi Davidi uya waʋakaimbira ʋacibvumirana pakutamba kwaʋo, ʋaciti:
Sauro wakaʋuraya ɀuru ɀamazana ake,
Asi Davidi makumi eɀuru ɀamazana ake?

Ipapo Akishi akaɗana Davidi, akati kwaari: NaJehova mupenyu, iwe wakaŋga uri munhu wakarurama, nokuɓuɗa kwako nokupinda kwako pahondo kwakaŋga kucindifadza ini, nokuti handina‐kuwana ɀakaipa kwauri kubva pazuʋa rawakaȿika kwandiri kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi; asi madzishe haakufariri.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cidzoka hako, uende norugare, kuti urege kuzoita cisiŋgafadzi madzishe aʋaFiristia.
Davidi akati kunaAkishi: Ndaɗiniko? Makawaneiko kumuranda wenyu ciŋguʋa candakagara nemi kuȿikira nhasi, kuti ndirege kundorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋashe waŋgu mambo?
Akishi akapindura, akati kunaDavidi: Ndinoziʋa kuti unondifadza ini, somutumŋa waMŋari; asi macinda aʋaFiristia akati: Ŋgaarege kukwira nesu kundorwa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cimuka hako acirimaŋgwanani pamŋe cete naʋaranda ʋashe wako ʋakaʋuya newe; ɀino kana mamuka maŋgwanani, mogona kuʋona, muende henyu.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akamuka maŋgwanani, iye naʋanhu ʋake, ʋakaenda maŋgwanani, ʋakadzokera kunyika yaʋaFiristia. ƲaFiristia ʋakakwira ʋakaenda Jezreeri.
Ɀino Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakati ʋaciȿika paZikragi nezuʋa retatu, ʋakawana kuti ʋaAmareki ʋakaŋga ʋandopambara kurutiʋi rwezasi, neZikragi ʋo, ʋakakunda Zikragi nokuripisa nomŋoto;
ʋakatapa ʋakadzi naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru; ʋakaŋga ʋasinokuʋuraya munhu, asi ʋakaʋatapa, ʋakaenda haʋo.
Ɀino Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakati ʋaciȿika paguta ʋakariwana rapiswa nomŋoto, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋanasikana ʋaʋo ʋatapxa.
Davidi naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋanaye ʋakacema kwaɀo, kuȿikira ʋasisina simba rokucema.
Naʋakadzi ʋaʋiri ʋaDavidi ʋakaŋga ʋatapxa ʋo, ʋana Ahinoami muJezreeri naAbigairi waiʋa mukadzi waNabari muKarmeri.

Davidi akatambudzika ɀikuru, nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋoɗa kumutaka namabge, nokuti mŋoyo yaʋanhu ʋose yakaŋga ineshuŋgu, mumŋe nomumŋe pamsoro paʋanakomana ʋake naʋanasikana ʋake; asi Davidi wakatȿaka simba rake kunaJehova Mŋari wake.
Ɀino Davidi akati kunaAbiatari muprista, mŋanakomana waAhimereki: Ƌoʋuya hako pano neefodi. Abiatari akaenda neefodi kunaDavidi.
Davidi akabvunza Jehova, akati: Kana ndikateʋera ɓoka iro, ndiŋgaʋaɓata here? Akamupindura, akati: Teʋera hako, nokuti ucaʋaɓata kwaɀo, ʋuye ucarwira ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akaenda, iye naʋarume ʋanamazana matanhatu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋakaȿika parukoʋa Besori, pakasara ʋamŋe ʋaakasiya.
Asi Davidi wakateʋerera, iye naʋanhu ʋanamazana manna, nokuti ʋanamazana maʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋasara shure, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaneta kwaɀo, ʋasiŋgagoni kuyambuka rukoʋa Besori.
Ʋakawana muEgipita kusaŋgo, ʋakaʋuya naye kunaDavidi, ʋakamupa ɀokudya, akadya, ʋakamupa ʋo mvura yokunwa;

ʋakamupa ʋo cimeɗu ceɓundu ramaʋonde namasumbu maʋiri amazambiriŋga akawomeswa; ɀino wakati adya, mŋeya wake ukararama ɀe mukati make, nokuti wakaŋga asina‐kudya ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura, mazuʋa matatu noʋusiku ʋutatu.
Davidi akati kwaari: Uri waaniko? Unobvepiko? Iye akati: Ndiri jaya rakabva Egipita, muranda womunhu waʋaAmareki; tenzi waŋgu wakandisiya, nokuti mazuʋa matatu akapfuʋura ndakarwara.
Takaŋga tandopambara kurutiʋi rwezasi rwaʋaKereti, nokunyika yaJuda, nokurutiʋi rwezasi rwaKarebi, tikapisa ʋo Zikragi nomŋoto.
Davidi akati kwaari: Uŋgandiɓurusira kuɓoka iro here? Iye akati: Ndipikirei naMŋari kuti hamuŋgandiʋurayi, kana kundiisa mumaʋoko atenzi waŋgu. Ipapo ndiŋgakuɓurusirai kuɓoka iro.
Ɀino wakati amuɓurusira’ko, ʋakaʋawana ʋakapararira pasi pose, ʋacidya, nokunwa, nokutamba pakati peɀizhinji ɀaʋakaŋga ʋapamba, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋatora kunyika yaʋaFiristia nokunyika yaʋaJuda.
Davidi akarwa naʋo kubva parubvunza‐ʋaeni kuȿikira maɗeko ezuʋa repiri; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakapukunyuka, asi majaya anamazana manna, akaŋga akataȿa makamera, ndiwo akatiza.
Davidi akarwira ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀatorwa naʋaAmareki; Davidi akarwira ʋo ʋakadzi ʋake ʋaʋiri.
Ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kurashikirwa necinhu, kunyaŋge ciɗuku kana cikuru, kana ʋanakomana, kana ʋanasikana, kana nhumbi, kana cinhu cipi necipi caʋakaŋga ʋatora; Davidi wakaɀidzosa ɀose.
Davidi akatora ʋo makwai neŋombe dzose, ʋakaɀitinha pamberi peɀimŋe ɀipfuwo, ʋakati: Ndiɀo ɀakapambga naDavidi.

Ɀino Davidi akaȿika kuʋarume ʋanamazana maʋiri, ʋaya ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuteʋera Davidi nokuneta kwaʋo, ʋaʋakaŋga ʋasiya kurukoʋa Besori; iʋo ʋakandosoŋgana naDavidi, nokusoŋgana ʋo naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋanaye; ɀino Davidi wakati asweɗera kwaʋari, akaʋakwazisa.

Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakashata, naʋanhu ʋakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋakaŋga ʋaenda naDavidi, ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Ɀaʋasina‐kuenda nesu, hatiŋgaʋapi cinhu cimŋe ceɀakapambga ɀatakandorwira, asi mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaapiwe mukadzi wake naʋana ʋake, ʋaʋaperekedze, ʋaende naʋo.
Ipapo Davidi akati: Hamuŋgaiti kuɗaro, hama dzaŋgu, neɀatakapiwa naJehova, iye wakaticeŋgeta, akaisa ɓoka rakaŋga raʋuya kuzorwa nesu pamaʋoko eɗu.
Ndianiko uŋgakutererai pashoko rakaɗai? Nokuti mugoʋe wowakaenda kundorwa, ucafanana nomugoʋe wowakasara panhumbi; migoʋe yaʋo inofanira kufanana.
Ɀino kubva pazuʋa iro iye akatema kuti uʋe mutemo nomurairo kuʋaIsraeri kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino Davidi wakati aȿika Zikragi, akatuma ɀimŋe ɀakaŋga ɀapambga kuʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda, idzo hama dzake, akati: Heco cipo cenyu ceɀakapambga kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaJehova;
kunaʋakaŋga ʋari Beti‐eri, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Ramoti kurutiʋi rwezasi, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Jatiri,
nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Aroeri, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Sifmoti, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Eshtemoa;
nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Rakari, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari kumaguta aʋaJerameeri, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari pamaguta aʋaKeni,
nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Horma, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Korashani, nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Ataki,
nokunaʋakaŋga ʋari Hebroni, nokunaʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari panɀimbo dzaifamba Davidi amene naʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakarwa naʋaIsraeri; ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakatiza pamberi paʋaFiristia, ʋakawira pasi ʋaʋurawa pagomo reGirboa.
ƲaFiristia ʋakateʋerera Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake kwaɀo, ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuraya Jonatani, naAbinadabi, naMarki‐shua, ʋanakomana ʋaSauro.
Sauro akakurirwa kwaɀo pakurwa; ʋafuri ʋoʋuta ʋakamuɓata, akatambudzika kwaɀo nokuɗa kwaʋafuri ʋoʋuta.

Ipapo Sauro akati kunowaiɓata nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo: Vomora munondo wako, undiɓaye nawo, kuti aʋa ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa ʋarege kuȿika ʋandiɓaye, nokundiɗaɗira. Asi muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakaramba, nokuti wakaŋga acitya kwaɀo. Naiɀoɀo Sauro akatora munondo wake, akaɀiwisira pauri.
Ɀino muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakati aciʋona kuti Sauro wafa, naiye akaɀiwisira pamunondo wake ʋo, akafa pamŋe cete naye.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akafa, pamŋe cete naʋanakomana ʋake ʋatatu, nomuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, naʋanhu ʋake ʋose nomusi iwoyo.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwomupata, naʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwaJoridani, ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ʋatiza, ʋuye kuti Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋafa ʋo, ʋakabva pamaguta, ʋakatiza; ʋaFiristia ʋakaȿika, ʋakagara’mo.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋaciʋuya kuzokunuŋgura ʋakaʋurawa, ʋakawana Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake ʋatatu ʋafa pagomo reGirboa.
Ʋakagura musoro wake, nokukunuŋgura nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, ʋakatuma nhume kumatiʋi ose enyika yaʋaFiristia, kundoziʋisa mashoko iwayo kuimba yeɀifananidzo ɀaʋo, nokuʋanhu.
Ʋakaisa nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo muimba yaAshtaroti, ʋakasuŋgira citunha cake pamadziro eBeti‐shani.
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jabeshi‐Gireadi ʋakati ʋacinzwa ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa Sauro naʋaFiristia,
mhare dzose dzikasimuka, dzikafamba ʋusiku bgose, dzikatora citunha caSauro neɀitunha ɀaʋanakomana ʋake pamadziro eBeti‐shani, ʋakaenda Jabeshi ʋakaɀipisa’po.
Ʋakatora mafupa aʋo, ʋakaaʋiga pasi pomuti womutamariski paJabeshi, ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino Sauro wakati afa, Davidi akadzoka pakuʋuraya ʋaAmareki, Davidi akagara mazuʋa maʋiri paZikragi;
ɀino nezuʋa retatu mumŋe munhu wakaȿika acibva kumisasa kunaSauro, ŋguʋo dzake dzakabvaruka, ʋuye anevu pamusoro wake; akati aciȿika kunaDavidi, akaɀiwisira pasi, akanamata kwaari.
Davidi akati kwaari: Wabvepiko? Akati kwaari: Ndapukunyuka ndicibva kumisasa yaIsraeri.
Davidi akati kwaari: Kwakaitweiko? Ndiʋudze hako. Akapindura, akati: Ʋanhu ʋatiza pakurwa, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋawira pasi ʋafa, ʋuye Sauro nomŋanakomana wake Jonatani ʋafa ʋo.
Ipapo Davidi akati kujaya rakamuʋudza iɀoɀo: Unoziʋa sei kuti Sauro naJonatani mŋanakomana wake ʋafa ʋo.
Jaya rikamuʋudza, rikati: Ndakaŋga ndicifamba haŋgu pagomo reGirboa, ndikaʋona Sauro acisendamira papfumo rake, ndikaʋona ʋo ŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋacimuteʋerera kwaɀo.
Ɀino iye wakati aciceuka, akandiʋona, akandiɗana. Ndikapindura, ndikati: Ndiri pano haŋgu.
Akati kwandiri: Ndiwe aniko? Ndikamupindura, ndikati: Ndiri muAmareki.
Akati kwandiri: Mira ʋuno kwandiri, undiʋuraye, nokuti ndaɓatwa nedzuŋgu kwaɀo, nokuti ʋupenyu bgaŋgu bguciri mandiri cose.

Naiɀoɀo ndikamira kwaari, ndikamuʋuraya, nokuti ndakaŋga ndiciziʋa kwaɀo kuti haaŋgararami, kana aciŋge awira pasi; ndikatora korona yakaŋga iri pamusoro wake, norundarira rwaiʋa paruʋoko rwake, ndikaʋuya naɀo pano kunashe waŋgu.
Ipapo Davidi akaɓata ŋguʋo dzake, akadzibvarura, naʋarume ʋose ʋaiʋa naye ʋakaita ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Ʋakacema, nokuwuŋgudza, nokuɀinyima ɀokudya kuȿikira maɗeko pamsoro paSauro naJonatani mŋanakomana wake, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋaJehova, napamsoro peimba yaIsraeri, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaʋurawa nomunondo.
Davidi akati kujaya rakaŋga ramuʋudza iɀoɀo: Uri wepiko? Iye akapindura, akati: Ndiri mŋanakomana womutorwa, muAmareki.
Davidi akati kwaari: Hauna‐kutya neiko kutambanudza ruʋoko rwako kuti uparadze muzodzwa waJehova?
Ipapo Davidi akaɗana rimŋe jaya, akati: Sweɗera, umuʋuraye. Iye akamuɓaya, akafa.
Davidi akati kwaari: Ropa rako ŋgariʋe pamusoro wako, nokuti muromo wako wakupupurira, ɀawakati: Ndakaʋuraya muzodzwa waJehova.
Davidi akacema Sauro naJonatani mŋanakomana wake nokucema uku:
Akaʋaraira kuti ʋadzidzise ʋana ʋaJuda
Haiwa Israeri! kubginya kwako kwaʋurawa pamatunhu ako akakwirira!
Haiwa! ʋanesimba ʋakawira pasi sei!
Musaɀireʋa paGati,
Musaɀiparidza panzira dzeAshkeroni;
Kuti ʋakunda ʋaʋaFiristia ʋarege kufara,
Kuti ʋakunda ʋaʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa ʋarege kupembera.
Imi makomo eGirboa,
Ŋgakurege kuʋa neɗoʋa kana mvura pamsoro penyu, kana minda yeɀipo;
Nokuti ndipo pakaŋgorashwa nhoʋo dzemhare,
Nhoʋo yaSauro, seisina‐kuzodzwa mafuta.
Ʋuta bgaJonatani habguna‐kudzoka
Bgusineropa raʋakaʋurawa, namafuta aʋanesimba.
Nomunondo waSauro hauna‐kudzoka usina.
Sauro naJonatani ʋakaŋga ʋakaɗikanwa, ʋakanaka, paʋupenyu bgaʋo;
Napakufa kwaʋo haʋana‐kuparadzaniswa;
Ʋaikurumidza kupfuʋura makondo,
Ʋaiʋa nesimba kupfuʋura shumba.
Imi ʋakunda ʋaIsraeri, cemai Sauro,
Iye waikufukidzai no
Waiisa ɀishoŋgo ɀendarama paɀisimiro ɀenyu.
Haiwa! ʋanesimba ʋakawira pasi sei pakurwa!
Jonatani wakaʋurawa pamatunhu akakwirira.
Ndinotambudzika kwaɀo pamsoro pako, munuŋuna waŋgu Jonatani;
Wakaŋga ucindifadza kwaɀo;
Ruɗo rwako kwandiri rwaishamisa,
Rwaipfuʋura ruɗo rwaʋakadzi.
Haiwa! ʋanesimba ʋakawira pasi sei!
Nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzakaparadzwa sei!
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Davidi wakabvunza Jehova, akati: Ndokwira kunerimŋe guta raJuda here? Jehova akati: Kwira. Davidi akati: Ndokwira kuneripi? Iye akati: Hebroni.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akakwira’ko, naʋakadzi ʋake ʋaʋiri ʋo, ʋana‐Ahinoami muJezreeri, naAbigairi, mukadzi waNabari muKarmeri.
Davidi akakwira ʋo naʋanhu ʋake ʋaiʋa naye, mumŋe nomumŋe neimba yake, ʋakandogara pamaguta eHebroni.
Ʋarume ʋaJuda ʋakaʋuya ʋakazodza Davidi’po, kuti aʋe mambo weimba yaJuda.
Ʋakaʋudza Davidi, ʋaciti: Ʋarume ʋeJabeshi‐gireadi ndiʋo ʋakaʋiga Sauro.
Davidi akatuma nhume kuʋarume ʋeJabeshi‐gireadi, akati kwaʋari: Muropafadzwe naJehova, ɀamakaitira ishe wenyu Sauro cinhu ici cakanaka, mukamuʋiga.
Ɀino Jehova ŋgaakuitirei ʋo ɀakanaka neɀokwaɗi; neni ʋo ndicakuitirai ɀakanaka, ɀamakaita iɀoɀi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, maʋoko enyu ŋgaaʋe nesimba, muʋe noʋumhare; nokuti Sauro ishe wenyu wakafa, ɀino ʋeimba yaJuda ʋakandizodza, kuti ndiʋe mambo waʋo.
Ɀino Abineri, mŋanakomana waNeri, mukuru wehondo yaSauro, wakaŋga atora Ishi‐bosheti, mŋanakomana waSauro, akamuisa Mahanaimi;
akamuita mambo weGireadi, nowaʋaAshuri, noweJezreeri, nowaEfraimi, nowaBenjamini, nowaʋaIsraeri ʋose.
(Ishi‐bosheti, mŋanakomana waSauro, wakaŋga aʋa namakore anamakumi manna ŋguʋa yokutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri, akaɓata ʋushe makore maʋiri). Asi ʋeimba yaJuda ʋakateʋera Davidi.
Ŋguʋa yakaɓata Davidi ʋushe bgeimba yaJuda paHebroni aiʋa makore manomŋe nemŋedzi mitanhatu.
Ɀino Abineri, mŋanakomana waNeri, naʋaranda ʋaIshi‐bosheti, mŋanakomana waSauro, ʋakabva Mahanaimi, ʋakaenda Gibeoni.
NaJoabi, mŋanakomana waZeruya, naʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakaɓuɗa ʋo, ʋakasoŋgana naʋo padziʋa reGibeoni; ʋakagara pasi, ʋamŋe necoʋuno kwedziʋa, ʋamŋe necemhiri kwedziʋa.
Abineri akati kunaJoabi: Majaya ŋgaasimuke, atambe pamberi peɗu. Joabi akati: Ŋgaʋasimuke haʋo.
Ipapo ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda namapoka; gumi naʋaʋiri kurutiʋi rwaBenjamini naIshi‐bosheti, mŋanakomana waSauro, ʋuye gumi naʋaʋiri ʋaʋaranda ʋaDavidi.
Mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata musoro wowakatarisana naye, ʋakaɓayana neminondo kunhiʋi dzaʋo, naiɀoɀo ʋakawira pasi pamŋe cete; naiɀoɀo nɀimbo iyo yakanzi Herkati‐haruzimi, iri paGibeoni.
Kurwa kukanyanya kwaɀo zuʋa iro; Abineri naʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakakundwa naʋaranda ʋaDavidi.
Ʋanakomana ʋatatu ʋaZeruya ʋakaŋga ʋari’po, ʋana‐Joabi, naAbishai, naAsaheri; Asaheri waigona kumhanya seceŋgu.
Asaheri akateʋerera Abineri; ɀino pakumhanya kwake haana‐kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe pakuteʋerera Abineri.
Abineri akaceuka, akati: Ndiwe Asaheri here? Akapindura, akati: Ndini.
Abineri akati kwaari: Tsaukira hako kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe, uɓate hako rimŋe ramajaya, utore nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo. Asi Asaheri wakaramba kutsauka pakumuteʋerera.
Abineri akati ɀe kunaAsaheri: Tsauka hako pakunditeʋerera; ndicakuʋurayireiko? Ndiŋgazondoʋonana sei naJoabi mukuru wako?

Asi wakaramba kutsauka; naiɀoɀo Abineri wakamuɓaya nomuɗumbu necireya cepfumo, pfumo rikaɓuɗa neseri kwake; akawira pasi ipapo, akafira’po; ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋaciȿika pakaŋga pawira Asaheri pasi pakufa kwake, ʋakamira.
Asi Joabi naAbishai ʋakateʋerera Abineri, zuʋa rikaʋira pakuȿika kwaʋo pacikomo ceAma, caiʋa pamberi peGiya panzira yerenje inoenda Gibeoni.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaBenjamini ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzoteʋera Abineri, ʋakaita ɓoka rimŋe, ʋakamira pamsoro pecikomo.

Abineri akasheʋedzera kunaJoabi, akati: Ko munondo ucaramba uciŋgoparadza nokusiŋgaperi here? Hauziʋi kuti ɀicaʋaʋa pakupedzisira here? Ucanonoka kuȿikira riniko kuraira ʋanhu kuti ʋadzoke pakuteʋerera hama dzaʋo?
Joabi akati: NaMŋari mupenyu, ɗai usina‐kutaura, ɀirokwaɀo ʋanhu ʋaŋgaɗai ʋarega maŋgwana kuteʋerera mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake.
Naiɀoɀo Joabi akaridza hwamanda, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamira, ʋakarega kuzoteʋerera Israeri, ʋakasazorwa ɀe.
Abineri naʋanhu ʋake ʋakagura neAraba ʋusiku ubgo bgose, ʋakayambuka Joridani, ʋakagura neBitroni yose, ʋakaȿika Mahanaimi.
Ipapo Joabi akadzoka pakuteʋerera Abineri; ɀino wakati aʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋose, ʋarume ʋanegumi naʋapfumbamŋe naAsaheri ʋakashaikwa kuʋaranda ʋaDavidi.
Asi ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuraya ʋarume ʋanamazana matatu namakumi matatu ʋaʋaBenjamini naʋarume ʋaAbineri.
Ʋakasimudza Asaheri, ʋakandomuʋiga mubgiro bgaɓaɓa ʋake, bgaiʋa paBeti‐rehemi. Joabi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakafamba ʋusiku bgose, ʋutoŋga bgukatȿuka pakuȿika kwaʋo paHebroni.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunokurwa ŋguʋa huru pakati peimba yaSauro neimba yaDavidi; Davidi akaramba aciwedzerwa simba, asi imba yaSauro yakaramba icitorerwa simba.
Davidi akaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana paHebroni; ɗaŋgwe rake raiʋa Amoni,
wecipiri waiʋa Kireabi,
wecinna waiʋa Adonia, mŋanakomana waHagiti; wecishanu waiʋa Shefatia, mŋanakomana waAbitari;
wecitanhatu waiʋa Itreami, mŋanakomana waEgra mukadzi waDavidi. Ndiʋo ʋakaɓerekerwa Davidi paHebroni.
Ɀino kurwa kwakati kuri’po pakati peimba yaSauro neimba yaDavidi, Abineri akaɀisimbisa paimba yaSauro.
Ɀino Sauro wakaŋga anomuroŋgo, wainzi Rizpa, mukunda waAya;

Ipapo Abineri akatsamŋa kwaɀo namashoko aIshi‐bosheti, akati: Ndiri musoro wembga yokwaJuda here? Ikonhasi ndinoitira imba yaSauro, ɓaɓa ʋako, naʋanuŋuna ʋake, nehama dzake, ɀakanaka, newe handina‐kukuisa paruʋoko rwaDavidi; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, unondipomera mhaka nhasi pamsoro pomukadzi uyu.
Mŋari ŋgaaroʋe Abineri, arambe aciɗaro, kana ndisiŋgaitiri Davidi seɀakapika Jehova kwaari;
aciti ucatamisa ʋushe paimba yaSauro, amutse cigaro coʋushe caDavidi pakati paIsraeri naJuda, kubva paDani kuȿikira paBeeri‐sheba.
Akasagona kupindura Abineri kunyaŋge neshoko rimŋe, nokuti wakaŋga acimutya.
Ɀino Abineri akatuma nhume kunaDavidi kwaakaŋga ari, akati: Nyika iyi ndeyaniko? Akati: Ita suŋgano neni, ruʋoko rwaŋgu ruʋe newe, ndiʋuyise ʋaIsraeri ʋose kwauri.
Akati: Ɀakanaka, ndicaita suŋgano newe, asi ndinokuʋudza cinhu cimŋe, kuti hauŋgaʋoni ciso caŋgu, kana usiŋgaʋuyi naMikari, mukunda waSauro, kana uciʋuya kuzoʋona ciso caŋgu.
Davidi akatuma nhume kunaIshi‐bosheti, mŋanakomana waSauro, akati: Ndipe Mikari mukadzi waŋgu, wandakanyeŋga neɀikanda ɀapamberi ɀaʋaFiristia ɀinezana.
Ipapo Ishi‐bosheti akatuma nhume kundomutora kumurume wake Partieri, mŋanakomana waRaishi.
Murume wake akamuteʋera aciŋgocema, kuȿikira paBahurimi. Ipapo Abineri akati kwaari: Enda, udzoke; iye akadzoka hake.
Abineri akaraŋgana naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, akati: Kare makaŋga mucitȿaka Davidi kuti aʋe mambo wenyu.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciitai henyu kuɗaro, nokuti Jehova wakataura pamsoro paDavidi, akati: Noruʋoko rwomuranda waŋgu Davidi ndicaponesa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri pamaʋoko aʋaFiristia, napamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose.
Abineri akataura ʋo naʋaBenjamini, Abineri akaenda akataura ʋo naDavidi, ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀicifadza Israeri neimba yose yaBenjamini.
Naiɀoɀo Abineri akaȿika kunaDavidi paHebroni, anaʋarume ʋanamakumi maʋiri. Davidi akaitira Abineri naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋanaye mutambo.

Abineri akati kunaDavidi: Ndicasimuka, ndikaenda kundoʋuŋganidzira ishe waŋgu mambo ʋaIsraeri ʋose, kuti ʋaite suŋgano nemi, muɓate ʋushe pose pamunoɗa napo nomŋoyo wenyu. Davidi akaendisa Abineri, akaenda norugare.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaDavidi naJoabi ʋakadzoka pakundopambara, ʋakaʋuya neɀakapambga ɀizhinji; asi Abineri wakaŋga asi’po kunaDavidi paHebroni, nokuti wakaŋga amuendisa, akaenda hake norugare.
Ɀino Joabi nehondo yose yakaŋga inaye ʋakati ʋaȿika, Joabi akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Abineri, mŋanakomana waNeri, wakaȿika kunamambo, akaendiswa hake norugare.
Ipapo Joabi akaenda kunamambo, akati: Maiteiko? Tarirai, Abineri wakaŋga aȿika kwamuri, mamuregereiko acienda, ɀino waenda cose?
Munoziʋa Abineri mŋanakomana waNeri, kuti wakaŋga aʋuya kuzokunyeŋgerai, aziʋe kuɓuɗa kwenyu nokupinda kwenyu, nokuziʋa ɀose ɀamunoita.
Joabi akati aɓuɗa kunaDavidi, akatuma nhume dziteʋere Abineri, idzo dzikamudzora patsime reSira; asi Davidi wakaŋga asiŋgaɀiziʋi.
Ɀino Abineri wakati adzoswa Hebroni, Joabi akaenda naye ʋari ʋoga pakati pesuʋo, kuti ataurirane naye ʋari ʋoga, akamuɓaya’po nomuɗumbu, akafa, nokuɗa kweropa romunuŋuna wake Asaheri.
Pashure Davidi wakati aciɀinzwa, akati: Ini noʋushe bgaŋgu hatinemhoȿa pamberi paJehova nokusiŋgaperi pamsoro peropa raAbineri mŋanakomana waNeri;

ŋgaɀiʋe pamusoro waJoabi napamsoro peimba yose yaɓaɓa ʋake; imba yaJoabi igare inaʋanhu ʋanehosha yokuyerera, kana ʋanamaperembudzi, kana ʋanoɗonɀa nomuɗonɀo, kana ʋanoʋurawa nomunondo, kana ʋanoshaiwa ɀokudya.
Naiɀoɀo Joabi naAbishai munuŋuna wake ʋakaʋuraya Abineri, nokuti wakaŋga aʋuraya munuŋuna waʋo Asaheri pakurwa paGibeoni.
Ɀino Davidi akati kunaJoabi, nokunaʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋo: Bvarurai ŋguʋo dzenyu, musimire magumbu paɀiʋuno ɀenyu, muceme pamberi paAbineri. Mambo Davidi akateʋera bganyanza.
Ʋakaʋiga Abineri paHebroni, mambo akacema kwaɀo pabgiro bgaAbineri; naʋanhu ʋose ʋakacema.
Mambo akacema Abineri, akati:
Abineri waifanira kufa nomufire weɓenzi here?
Maʋoko ako akaŋga asino‐kusuŋgwa, namakumbo ako akaŋga asino‐kupinzwa mumatare;
Iwe wakafa sokufa kwomunhu pamberi paʋana ʋeɀakaipa.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamucema ɀe.

Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuya kuzokurudzira Davidi kudya ɀokudya aciri masikati; asi Davidi wakapika, akati: Mŋari ŋgaandiroʋe, arambe aciɗaro, kana ndikaraʋira ciŋgwa kana cimŋe cinhu zuʋa ricigere kuʋira.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaɀiʋona, ʋakafara naɀo, nokuti ɀose ɀineŋge ɀakaŋga ɀiciitwa namambo ɀakafadza ʋanhu ʋose.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋose naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaziʋa kuti wakaŋga asi mambo wakaraira kuti Abineri mŋanakomana waNeri aʋurawe.
Ɀino mambo akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Hamuziʋi here kuti nhasi mucinda nomunhu mukuru wafa pakati paIsraeri?
Ini nhasi handinesimba, kunyaŋge ndiri mambo wakazodzwa; ʋarume aʋa ʋanakomana ʋaZeruya ʋanondikurira; Jehova ŋgaatsiʋe muiti weɀakaipa ɀakafanira kuipa kwake.
Ɀino

Ɀino mŋanakomana waSauro wakaŋga anaʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋamapoka; zita romumŋe rakaŋga riri Baana, zita romumŋe Rehabi; ʋaiʋa ʋana ʋaRimoni muBeeroti, waʋana ʋaBenjamini; (nokuti Beeroti rakaŋga riciʋereŋgerwa ʋo kunaBenjamini;
ʋaBeeroti ʋakatizira Gitaimi, ʋakaʋa ʋatorwa’po kuȿikira nhasi).
Ɀino Jonatani mŋanakomana waSauro, wakaŋga anomŋanakomana wakaremara pamakumbo ake. Iye wakaŋga aʋa namakore mashanu paŋguʋa yokuȿika kweshoko
Ʋana ʋaRimoni muBeeroti, ʋanaRekabi naBaana, ʋakaenda, ʋakaȿika paimba yaIshi‐bosheti zuʋa ricipisa, iye acizorora masikati.
Ʋakapinda mukati meimba, ʋaciita sokuɗa kutora ɀiyo, ʋakamuɓaya nomuɗumbu; Rekabi naBaana ndokutiza.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋapinda mumba, iye aʋete panhoʋo dzake mumba make mokuʋata, ʋakamuɓaya, ʋakamuʋuraya, ʋakagura musoro wake, ndokutora musoro wake, ʋakaenda nenzira yeAraba ʋusiku bgose.

Ʋakaisa musoro waIshi‐bosheti kunaDavidi paHebroni, ʋakati kunamambo: Hoyo musoro waIshi‐bosheti mŋanakomana waSauro muʋeŋgi wenyu, wakaŋga acitȿaka kukuʋurayai; Jehova wakatsiʋa ishe waŋgu mambo nhasi pamsoro paSauro naʋana ʋake.
Davidi akapindura Rekabi naBaana munuŋuna wake, ʋana ʋaRimoni muBeeroti, akati kwaʋari: NaJehova mupenyu, wakadzikinura mŋeya waŋgu panjodzi dzose,
musi wandakaʋudzwa nomumŋe, aciti: Tarirai, Sauro wafa, acifuŋga kuti waʋuya neshoko rakanaka, ndakamuɓata, ndikamuʋuraya paZikragi; ndiwo waiʋa muɓairo wandakamupa pamsoro peshoko rake.
Ndoɗa kana ʋanhu ʋakaipa ʋaʋuraya munhu wakarurama hake mumba make, aʋete panhoʋo dzake, handiŋgareʋi ropa rake pamaʋoko enyu ɀino, ndikakubvisai panyika here?

Ipapo Davidi akaraira majaya ake, ʋakaʋaʋuraya, ʋakagura maʋoko aʋo netsoka dzaʋo, ʋakaʋaturika kurutiʋi rwedziʋa paHebroni. Asi ʋakatora musoro waIshi‐bosheti, ʋakauʋiga mubgiro bgaAbineri paHebroni.
Ɀino marudzi ose aʋaIsraeri akaʋuya kunaDavidi paHebroni, akataura, akati: Tarirai tiri mafupa enyu nenyama yenyu.
Kare Sauro aciri mambo weɗu, ndimi maituŋgamirira ʋaIsraeri muciɓuɗa naʋo nokupinda naʋo; Jehova akati kwamuri: Iwe ucafudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, nokuʋa mutuŋgamiriri waʋaIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakuru ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya kunamambo paHebroni, mambo Davidi akaita suŋgano paHebroni pamberi paJehova; iʋo ʋakazodza Davidi, kuti aʋe mambo waIsraeri.
Davidi wakaŋga anamakore anamakumi matatu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, akaɓata ʋushe makore anamakumi manna.
Akaɓata ʋushe paHebroni paʋaJuda makore manomŋe nemŋedzi mitanhatu; akaɓata ʋo ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi matatu namatatu paʋaIsraeri naʋaJuda ʋose.

Iye mambo naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaenda Jerusarema kundorwa naʋaJebusi ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika iyo; iʋo ʋakataura naDavidi, ʋakati: Hauŋgapindi pano, mapofu neɀirema ʋaŋgakudziŋga, nokuti ʋakati, Davidi haaŋgapindi pano.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Davidi wakakunda nhare yeZioni; ndiro guta raDavidi.
Davidi akati nezuʋa iro: Aninani unoparadza ʋaJebusi, ŋgaakwire kumugero wemvura, aʋuraye ɀirema namapofu, ʋanoʋeŋgwa nomŋeya waDavidi. Naiɀoɀo ʋanoti: Mapofu neɀirema haʋaŋgapindi mumba.
Davidi akagara munhare, akaitumidza guta raDavidi. Davidi akaʋaka kunhiʋi dzose, kubva paMiro, ɀicipinda mukati.
Davidi akaramba acikura, nokuti Jehova, Mŋari wehondo, wakaŋga anaye.
Hirami mambo weTire akatuma nhume kunaDavidi namatanda emisidari, naʋaʋezi, naʋaʋaki, ʋakaʋakira Davidi imba.
Ɀino Davidi akaziʋa kuti Jehova wakaŋga amusimbisa kuti aʋe mambo waIsraeri, ʋuye kuti wakaŋga akudza ʋushe bgake nokuɗa kwaʋanhu ʋake Israeri.
Davidi wakati abva Hebroni, akaɀitorera ʋamŋe ʋaroŋgo naʋakadzi paJerusarema, Davidi akaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Ndiwo mazita aʋaakaɓerekerwa Jerusarema: Shamua, naShobai, naNatani, naSoromoni,
naIbhari, naErishua, naNefegi, naJafia,
naErishama, naEriada, naErifereti.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti Davidi wakaŋga azodzwa kuti aʋe mambo waʋaIsraeri, ʋaFiristia ʋose ʋakakwira kundotȿaka Davidi; Davidi akaɀinzwa, akaɓurukira kunhare.
ƲaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaȿika, ʋakapararira pamupata weRefaimi.
Davidi akabvunza Jehova, akati: Ndokwira kundorwa naʋaFiristia here? Mucaʋaisa mumaʋoko aŋgu here? Jehova akati kunaDavidi: Kwira, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndicaisa ʋaFiristia mumaʋoko ako.
Davidi akaȿika paBaari‐perazimi, Davidi akaʋaparadza’po. Akati: Jehova wakapxanya ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu pamberi paŋgu, sokupxanya kwemvura. Naiɀoɀo akatumidza nɀimbo iyo Baari‐perazimi.
Ʋakasiya ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ipapo, Davidi naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaɀitora.
ƲaFiristia ʋakaʋuya ɀe, ʋakapararira pamupata weRefaimi.
Ɀino Davidi wakati acibvunza Jehova, iye akati: Usakwira, asi upote shure kwaʋo, ugoʋaʋamba pakatarisana nemiti yemibarsami.
Ɀino kana ucinzwa kutinhira kwokufamba paŋgara dzemiti yemibarsami, unofanira kukurumidza, nokuti ndiJehova wakutuŋgamirira kundoparadza hondo yaʋaFiristia.
Davidi akaita seɀaakarairwa naJehova; akaparadza ʋaFiristia kubva paGeba kuȿikira paGezeri.
Ɀino Davidi wakaʋuŋganidza ɀe ʋarume ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakatsaurwa ʋaʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu.
Davidi akasimuka, akaenda naʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo, ʋacibva Baari‐juda, kuti ʋatore’po areka yaMŋari, panoɗanwa Zita, iro Zita raJehova wehondo, ugere pamsoro pamakerubi.
Ʋakaisa areka yaMŋari pamsoro peŋgoro itȿa, ʋakaibvisa paimba yaAbinadabi, yakaŋga iri pacikomo, Uza naAhiyo, ʋanakomana ʋaAbinadabi, ʋakafambisa ŋgoro itȿa.
Ʋakaibvisa paimba yaAbinadabi, yakaŋga iri pacikomo, ineareka yaMŋari; Ahiyo akatuŋgamirira areka.
Davidi neimba yose yaIsraeri ʋakaridza pamberi paJehova ɀinoridzwa ɀamarudzi ose, ɀomusipresi, nembira, nemiteŋgeranwa, neŋgoma, namatare, anoridzwa, namakandira.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika paɓuriro raNakoni, Uza ndokutambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kuareka yaMŋari, akaiɓata, nokuti nzombe dzakaŋga dzogumburwa.
Kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira Uza, Mŋari akamuʋuraya ipapo nemhaka yokutadza kwake, iye akafira’po paareka yaMŋari.
Davidi akaʋora mŋoyo nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aroʋa Uza, akatumidza nɀimbo iyo Perezi‐uza kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Davidi akatya Jehova zuʋa iro, akati: Ɀino areka yaJehova icaȿika seiko kwandiri?
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akaramba kuisa areka yaJehova kwaari muguta raDavidi; asi Davidi wakaitsausira kumba kwaObedi‐edomi muGiti.
Areka yaJehova ikagara mumba maObedi‐edomi muGiti mŋedzi mitatu; Jehova akaropafadza Obedi‐edomi neimba yake yose.

Ɀino ʋakaʋudza mambo Davidi, ʋaciti: Jehova wakaropafadza imba yaObedi‐edomi neɀose ɀake nokuɗa kweareka yaMŋari. Ipapo Davidi akaenda akatora areka yaMŋari kumba kwaObedi‐edomi, akakwira nayo kuguta raDavidi nomufaro.
Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana iʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura areka ʋaciŋge ʋafamba nhambge nhanhatu, akaɓaya ŋombe nemhuru yakakora.
Davidi akatamba pamberi paJehova nesimba rake rose; Davidi akaŋga akafuka efodi yomuceka.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi neimba yose yaIsraeri ʋakakwira neareka yaJehova ʋacipururudza nokuridza hwamanda.
Ɀino areka yaJehova yakati iciȿika muguta raDavidi, Mikari mukunda waSauro akatarira napawindi, akaʋona mambo Davidi acipembera nokutamba pamberi paJehova, akamushoʋora mumŋoyo make.
Ʋakapinda neareka yaJehova, ʋakaiisa panɀimbo yayo pakati petente rayakaŋga yadzikirwa naDavidi; Davidi akaɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino Davidi wakati apedza kuɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, akaropafadza ʋanhu nezita raJehova wehondo.

Akagoʋera ʋanhu ʋose, iʋo ʋaIsraeri ʋazhinji ʋose, ʋarume naʋakadzi, mumŋe nomumŋe ɓundu reciŋgwa, nenhindi yenyama, nesumbu ramazambiriŋga akawomeswa. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakabva, mumŋe nomumŋe akaenda kumba kwake.

Davidi akadzoka kuzoropafadza imba yake. Mikari mukunda waSauro akaɓuɗa kuzosoŋgana naDavidi, akati: Haiwa, mambo waIsraeri waɀikudza sei nhasi, ɀaakaɀifukura pamberi paʋarandakadzi ʋaʋaranda ʋake, sokuɀifukura kweɓenzi risiŋganyari!
Davidi akati kunaMikari:
Ndicaɀiɗukupisa kupfuʋura iɀoɀo, ndicaɀininipisa pacaŋgu; asi kana ʋari ʋarandakadzi ʋawareʋa, ndicakudzwa naʋo.
Mikari mukunda waSauro, wakaŋga asinaʋana kuȿikira zuʋa rokufa kwake.
Ɀino mambo wakati agere mumba make, Jehova amuzorodza paʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakamupoteredza,
mambo akati kumuprofita Natani: Ɀino tarira, ini ndigere muimba yomusidari, asi areka yaMŋari igere pakati pemiceka.
Natani akati kunamambo: Endai, muite henyu ɀose ɀiri mumŋoyo menyu, nokuti Jehova unemi.
Ɀino noʋusiku ubgo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaNatani, riciti:
Enda undoʋudza muranda waŋgu Davidi, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Iwe ucandiʋakira imba mandiŋgagara here?
Nokuti handina‐kugara mumba kubva pazuʋa randakandotora ʋana ʋaIsraeri Egipita kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, asi ndaifamba mutente nomutabernakeri.

Pose pandakafamba naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ndakatoŋgotaura here shoko rimŋe kunomumŋe waʋatoŋgi ʋaIsraeri, ʋandakaraira kufudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, ndiciti: Makaregereiko kundiʋakira imba yomusidari?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, unofanira kuti kumuranda waŋgu Davidi: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndakakutora kumafuro, kwawakaŋga ucifudza makwai, kuti uʋe muɓati waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri;
ndikaʋa newe pose pawakafamba, ndikaparadza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose pamberi pako; ndicakuitira zita guru, riŋgafanana namazita aʋakuru ʋari panyika.
Ndicatarira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri nɀimbo, ndicaʋasima, ʋagare panɀimbo yaʋo, ʋarege kubviswa ɀe; naʋakaipa haʋaŋgaʋatambudzi ɀe sapakutaŋga,
nokubva pazuʋa randakaraira ʋatoŋgi kuti ʋaɓate ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri. Asi iwe ndicakuzorodza paʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose. Ʋuye ɀe Jehova unokuʋudza kuti Jehova ucakumisira imba.
Kana ŋguʋa yako yaȿika, iwe ukaʋata namadziɓaɓa ako, ndicamutsa
Iye ucaʋakira zita raŋgu imba, neni ndicasimbisa cigaro cake coʋushe nokusiŋgaperi.
Ini ndicaʋa ɓaɓa ʋake, naiye ucaʋa mŋanakomana waŋgu; kana akazoita ɀakaipa, ndicamuraŋga neshamhu yaʋanhu, ʋuye nokurobga kwaʋana ʋaʋanhu;
asi nyasha dzaŋgu hadziŋgabvi kwaari, seɀandakadzibvisa kunaSauro, wandakabvisa pamberi pako.
Imba yako noʋushe bgako ɀicasimbiswa pamberi pako nokusiŋgaperi; necigaro cako coʋushe cicasimbiswa nokusiŋgaperi.
Natani akaʋudza Davidi mashoko awa ose, neɀose ɀaakaŋga aratidzwa.
Ipapo mambo Davidi akapinda, akagara pamberi paJehova, akati: Jehova Mŋari, ndini aniko, neimba yaŋgu cinyiko, ɀamakandiȿitsa kuȿikira pano?
Asi cinhu ici cakaŋga cici ciɗuku pamberi penyu, Jehova Mŋari, asi makataura ʋo pamsoro peimba yomuranda wenyu kuȿikira paŋguʋa huru inozoʋuya; asi iyi ndiyo tsika yaʋanhu, Jehova Mŋari!
Ko Davidi uŋgareʋei ɀe kwamuri? Nokuti munoziʋa henyu muranda wenyu, Jehova Mŋari.
Nokuɗa kweshoko renyu, ʋuye seɀamakafuŋga mumŋoyo menyu, makaita ɀinhu iɀi ɀikuru ɀose, kuɀiziʋisa muranda wenyu.
Naiɀoɀo muri mukuru, Jehova Mŋari, nokuti hakunomumŋe wakafanana nemi, hakunomumŋe Mŋari kunze kwenyu, seɀatakanzwa ɀose nenzeʋe dzeɗu.

Rumŋe rudzi ruripiko panyika rwakafanana naʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, ʋakandodzikinurwa naMŋari, ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋake, kuti iye akurumbire, ʋuye akuitirei imi ɀinhu ɀikuru, nenyika yenyu ɀinhu ɀinotyisa, pamberi paʋanhu ʋenyu, ʋamakaɀidzikinurira paEgipita, ʋabve pakati paʋahedeni naʋamŋari ʋaʋo?
Mukaɀisimbisira ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋenyu nokusiŋgaperi; imi Jehova mukaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari, shoko ramakataura pamsoro pomuranda wenyu napamsoro peimba yake, murisimbisei henyu nokusiŋgaperi, muite seɀamakataura.
Zita renyu ŋgarikudzwe nokusiŋgaperi, ɀicinzi: Jehova wehondo ndiMŋari waIsraeri; imba yomuranda wenyu Davidi icasimbiswa pamberi penyu.
Nokuti imi Jehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, makaziʋisa muranda wenyu, muciti: Ndicakuʋakira imba; naiɀoɀo muranda wenyu wakatsuŋga kunyeŋgetera munyeŋgetero uyu kwamuri.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari, ndimi Mŋari, ʋuye mashoko enyu ndeeɀokwaɗi, makapikira muranda wenyu cinhu ici cakanaka;

naiɀoɀo ɀino ciropafadzai henyu imba yomuranda wenyu, kuti irambe iri’po pamberi penyu nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti imi Jehova Mŋari makataura saiɀoɀo; imba yomuranda wenyu ŋgairopafadzwe nokuropafadza kwenyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Davidi wakarwa naʋaFiristia akaʋakunda; Davidi akatorera ʋaFiristia cikuriri comuzinda waʋo.

Akakunda Moabi ʋo, akaʋayera neɓote, amboʋaʋatisa pasi; akayera namaɓote maʋiri ʋaifanira kuʋurawa, ʋuye neɓote rimŋe rose ʋaifanira kuregwa ʋari ʋapenyu. ʋaMoabi ʋakaitwa ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakamuʋigira ɀipo.
Davidi akakunda ʋo Hadadezeri mŋanakomana waRehobi, mambo weZoba, pakuenda kwake kundotora ʋushe bgake paRwizi.

Davidi akamutorera ʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋanecuru cimŋe namazana manomŋe, naʋaifamba namakumbo ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri; Davidi akagura marunda amakumbo amabiza ose aikweʋa ŋgoro, asi wakaceŋgetera ŋgoro dzinezana mamŋe awo.
Ɀino ʋaSiria ʋeDamasko ʋakati ʋaciʋuya kuzoɓatsira Hadadezeri mambo weZoba, Davidi akaʋuraya ʋaSiria ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri.
Davidi akaisa mapoka aʋarwi muSiria paDamasko; ʋaSiria ʋakaʋa ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakamuʋigira ɀipo. Jehova akakundisa Davidi pose paakaenda.
Davidi akatora nhoʋo dzendarama dzakaŋga dzakashoŋgwa naʋaranda ʋaHadadezeri, akadziisa Jerusarema.
Mambo Davidi akatora ʋo ndarira zhinji kwaɀo paBeta napaBerotai, aiʋa maguta aHadadezeri.
Ɀino Toi mambo weHamati wakati anzwa kuti Davidi wakaŋga aparadza hondo yose yaHadadezeri,

Toi akatuma mŋanakomana wake Jorami kunamambo Davidi kumukwazisa nokumukorokotedza, pamsoro pokurwa kwake naHadadezeri nokumukunda, nokuti Hadadezeri wairwa naToi. Jorami akaʋuya nemidziyo yesirveri, nemidziyo yendarama, nemidziyo yendarira.
Neyiyi ʋo mambo Davidi wakaitsaurira Jehova, pamŋe cete nesirveri nendarama yaakamutsaurira, yakabva kundudzi dzose dzaakaŋga akunda;
kuʋaSiria, naʋaMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋaFiristia, naʋaAmareki, neɀakaŋga ɀatapxa kunaHadadezeri mŋanakomana waRehobi, mambo weZoba.
Davidi akakurumbira kwaɀo ŋguʋa yaakadzoka pakuʋuraya ʋaSiria paMupata woMunyu, ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀisere.
Akaisa mapoka aʋarwi paEdomi; wakaisa mapoka aʋarwi paEdomi yose, ʋaEdomi ʋose ʋakaʋa ʋaranda ʋaDavidi. Jehova akakundisa Davidi pose paakaenda.
Davidi akaɓata ʋaIsraeri ʋose; Davidi akatoŋga ʋanhu ʋake ʋose akaʋaitira ɀakarurama.
Joabi mŋanakomana waZeruya ndiye wairaira hondo, naJehoshafati mŋanakomana waAhirudi waiʋa sahwira;
Zadoki mŋanakomana waAhitubi, naAhimereki mŋanakomana waAbiatari, ʋaiʋa ʋaprista, naSeraya waiʋa munyori.
Benaya mŋanakomana waJehoyada ndiye wairaira ʋaKereti naʋaPereti; ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋaDavidi ʋaiʋa ʋanheʋanje.
Ɀino Davidi wakati: Kucinomumŋe wakasara weimba yaSauro, wandiŋgaitira ɀakanaka nokuɗa kwaJonatani here?
Ɀino kwakaŋga kucinomuranda weimba yaSauro wainzi Ziba, ʋakamuɗanira kunaDavidi; mambo akati kwaari: Ndiwe Ziba here? Iye akati: Muranda wenyu ndiye.
Mambo akati kwaari: Hakucinomumŋe weimba yaSauro, wandiŋgaitira kunaka kwaMŋari here? Ziba akati kunamambo: Jonatani ucinomŋanakomana wakaremara tsoka.
Mambo akati kwaari: Uripi? Ziba akati kunamambo: Tarirai, uri kumba kwaMakiri mŋanakomana waAmieri paRo‐debari.
Ipapo mambo Davidi akatuma nhume kundomutora kumba kwaMakiri mŋanakomana waAmieri paRo‐debari.
Naiɀoɀo Mefibosheti mŋanakomana waJonatani, mŋanakomana waSauro, akaȿika kunaDavidi, akawira pasi neciso cake, akamufugamira. Davidi akati: Mefibosheti! Iye akapindura, akati: Tarirai muranda wenyu.
Davidi akati kwaari: Usatya, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndicakuitira ɀakanaka nokuɗa kwaJonatani ɓaɓa ʋako, ʋuye ndicakudzosera nyika yose yaɓaɓa ʋako Sauro; iwe ucagara ucidya ɀokudya patafura yaŋgu.
Iye akamufugamira, akati: Muranda wenyu cinyiko, ɀamakatarira imbga yakafa seni?
Ipapo mambo akaɗana Ziba muranda waSauro, akati kwaari: Ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀaSauro neimba yake yose, ndakaɀipa mŋanakomana watenzi wako.

Iwe unofanira kumurimira minda, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako, naʋaranda ʋako, nokukohwa micero, kuti mŋanakomana watenzi wako aʋe neɀokudya ɀaaŋgadya; asi Mefibosheti mŋanakomana watenzi wako, ucagara acidya ɀokudya patafura yaŋgu. Ɀino Ziba waiʋa naʋanakomana ʋanegumi naʋashanu naʋaranda ʋanamakumi maʋiri.
Ipapo Ziba akati kunamambo: Muranda wenyu ucaita ɀose ɀinorairwa muranda wenyu nashe waŋgu mambo.
Ɀino Mefibosheti waiʋa nomŋanakomana muɗuku, wainzi Mika. Ʋuye ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumba maZiba ʋaiʋa ʋaranda ʋaMefibosheti.
Naiɀoɀo Mefibosheti wakagara Jerusarema, nokuti waigara acidya patafura yamambo; wakaŋga akaremara tsoka dzake dzose.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni wakafa, Hanuni mŋanakomana wake akaɓata ʋushe panɀimbo yake.

Ɀino Davidi akati: Ndicaitira Hanuni mŋanakomana waNahashi ɀakanaka, seɀandakaitirwa ɀakanaka naɓaɓa ʋake. Naiɀoɀo Davidi akatuma ʋaranda ʋake kumuɓata ruʋoko pamsoro paɓaɓa ʋake. Ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakaȿika kunyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni.

Asi macinda aʋana ʋaAmoni akati kunaHanuni ishe waʋo: Munofuŋga kuti Davidi unoɗa kukudza ɓaɓa ʋenyu ɀaatuma ʋaɓati ʋoruʋoko kwamuri here? Davidi haana‐kutuma ʋaranda ʋake kwamuri kuti anɀere guta nokurishora, nokuriputsa here?
Naiɀoɀo Hanuni akaɓata ʋaranda ʋaDavidi, akaʋeʋura rumŋe rutiʋi rwendebvu dzaʋo, akagura ŋguʋo dzaʋo napakati kuȿikira pamagaro aʋo, akaʋadziŋga.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋudza Davidi iɀoɀo, akatuma ʋanhu kundosoŋgana naʋo; nokuti ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋacinyara kwaɀo. Mambo akati: Garai henyu Jeriko kuȿikira ndebvu dzenyu dzamera ɀe, mugodzoka henyu.

Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋoʋeŋgwa naDavidi, ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakatuma nhume ʋakaripira ʋaSiria ʋeBeti‐rehobi, naʋaSiria ʋeZoba, ʋaifamba namakumbo ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri, namambo weMaaka anaʋarume ʋanecuru cimŋe, naʋarume ʋeTobi ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri.
Davidi wakati aɀinzwa, akatuma Joabi nehondo yose yaʋarume ʋanesimba.
Ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakagadzira hondo paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo; ʋaSiria ʋeZoba, naʋeRehobi, naʋarume ʋeTobi neMaaka ʋakaŋga ʋari pacaʋo ʋoga pasaŋgo.
Ɀino Joabi wakati aciʋona kuti woʋaʋarirwa mberi neshure, akatsaura ʋamŋe kunaʋakatsaurwa ʋose ʋaIsraeri, akaʋagadzira kuti ʋarwe naʋaSiria.
Ʋamŋe ʋanhu, ʋakaŋga ʋasara, akaʋaisa kunaAbishai, munuŋuna wake, akaʋagadzira kuti ʋarwe naʋana ʋaAmoni.
Akati: Kana ʋaSiria ʋakandikurira, iwe unofanira kundiɓatsira; asi kana ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakakukurira iwe, ini ndicaʋuya kukuɓatsira.
Tsuŋga mŋoyo, tirwire ʋanhu ʋeɗu namaguta aMŋari weɗu saʋarume; naJehova ŋgaaite seɀaanoɗa.
Naiɀoɀo Joabi naʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo ʋakasweɗera kuzorwa naʋaSiria, iʋo ʋakatiza pamberi pake.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋaSiria ʋatiza, naiʋo ʋakatiza ʋo saiɀoɀo pamberi paAbishai, ʋakapinda muguta. Ipapo Joabi akadzoka kuʋana ʋaAmoni, akaȿika Jerusarema.
Ɀino ʋaSiria ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋakundwa naʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana,
Hadarezeri akatuma ʋanhu kundotora ʋaSiria ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwoRwizi, ʋakaȿika paHerami, ʋakatuŋgamirirwa naShobaki mukuru wehondo yaHadarezeri.
Davidi akaʋudzwa iɀoɀo; akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakayambuka Joridani, ʋakaȿika paHerami. ƲaSiria ʋakaɀigadzira, ʋakarwa naDavidi.
ƲaSiria ʋakatiza pamberi paʋaIsraeri; Davidi akaʋuraya kuʋaSiria
Ɀino madzimambo ose, akaŋga ari ʋaranda ʋaHadarezeri, ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋakundwa naʋaIsraeri, ʋakayanana naʋaIsraeri, ʋakaʋashumira. Naiɀoɀo ʋaSiria ʋakatya kuzoɓatsira ʋana ʋaAmoni.
Ɀino gore rakati rapera, paŋguʋa yokurwa kwamadzimambo, Davidi akatuma Joabi pamŋe cete naʋaranda ʋake naʋaIsraeri ʋose; ʋakaparadza ʋana ʋaAmoni, ʋakakomba ʋo Raba. Asi Davidi wakasara Jerusarema.

Ɀino neŋguʋa yamaɗekwana, Davidi akamuka panhoʋo dzake, akafamba pamsoro peɗeŋga reimba yamambo; akaʋona, ari’po paɗeŋga, mukadzi wakaŋga acishamba; ɀino mukadzi uyo wakaŋga akanaka kwaɀo pakuʋonekwa kwake.
Davidi akatuma munhu kundobvunza kuti mukadzi uyo ndianiko? Mumŋe akati: Ko haazi iye Bati‐sheba mukunda waEriami, mukadzi waUria muHiti here?
Davidi akatuma nhume kundomutora, akaȿika kwaari, akaʋata naye (nokuti wakaŋga anatswa pakusanaka kwake;) iye akadzokera kumba kwake.
Mukadzi akatora mimba, akatuma shoko kunaDavidi akamuʋudza, akati: Ndaʋa nemimba.
Davidi akatuma shoko kunaJoabi, akati: Tuma Uria muHiti, aʋuye kwandiri. Joabi akatuma Uria kunaDavidi.
Ɀino Uria wakati aciȿika kwaari, Davidi akamubvunza kuti Joabi wakaɗini, naʋanhu ʋakaɗini, nokurwa kwakaɗini.
Ɀino Davidi akati kunaUria: Ƃurukira kumba kwako, undoshambidza tsoka dzako. Uria akabva paimba yamambo, akatumirwa cipo ceɀokudya namambo.
Asi Uria wakaʋata pamukoʋa weimba yamambo pamŋe cete naʋaranda ʋose ʋatenzi wake, haana‐kuɓurukira kumba kwake.
Ɀino Davidi wakati aciʋudzwa kuti Uria haana‐kuɓurukira kumba kwake, Davidi akati kunaUria: Hauna‐kubva kurwendo here? Waregereiko kuɓurukira kumba kwako?

Uria akati kunaDavidi: Areka, naʋaIsraeri, naʋaJuda ʋagere mumatumba, nashe waŋgu Joabi, naʋaranda ʋashe waŋgu ʋari mumatente aʋo kusaŋgo; ɀino ini ndiŋgapinda seiko mumba maŋgu ndidye ndinwe, ndiʋate nomukadzi waŋgu? Noʋupenyu bgenyu, ʋuye noʋupenyu bgomŋeya wenyu, handiŋgatoŋgoiti cinhu ici.
Davidi akati kunaUria: Gara pano nanhasi, maŋgwana ndicakutendera kuenda. Naiɀoɀo Uria akagara Jerusarema zuʋa iro neramaŋgwana.
Ipapo Davidi akamuɗana, akadya nokunwa pamberi pake, akamuɓatisa neɗoro; ɀino maɗeko akaɓuɗa akandoʋata panhoʋo dzake naʋaranda ʋashe wake, asi haana‐kuɓurukira kumba kwake.
Ɀino maŋgwana Davidi akanyorera Joabi rugwaro, akarutuma noruʋoko rwaUria.
Akanyora parugwaro, akati: Isa Uria pamberi panonyanyisa kurwiwa, mumusiye ari oga, aʋurawe, afe.
Ɀino Joabi wakati acerekedza guta, akaisa Uria paakaŋga aciziʋa kuti ʋarume ʋoʋumhare ʋari’po.
Ʋanhu ʋeguta ʋakaɓuɗa kuzorwa naJoabi, ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakaʋurawa, naiye Uria muHiti akafa ʋo.
Ipapo Joabi akatuma munhu kundoʋudza Davidi mashoko ose okurwa.
Akaraira nhume, akati: Kana wapedza kurondedzera kunamambo mashoko ose okurwa,
kana kutsamŋa kwamambo kukamuka, iye akati kwauri: Makasweɗerereiko pedyo ɀikuru neguta pakurwa kwenyu? Hamuna kuziʋa here kuti ʋacafura ʋari paruȿiŋgo?

Ndianiko wakaʋuraya Abimereki mŋanakomana waJerbesheti? Wakaŋga asiri mukadzi wakakanda huyo pamsoro pake ari paruȿiŋgo, akafira paTebezi here? Makasweɗerereiko pedyo ɀikuru noruȿiŋgo? Ipapo iwe uti: Muranda wenyu Uria muHiti, wafa ʋo.
Naiɀoɀo nhume yakaenda, ikaȿika, ikaʋudza Davidi ɀose ɀayakaŋga yatumirwa naJoabi.
Nhume ikati kunaDavidi: Ʋarume aʋo ʋakatikurira, ʋakaɓuɗira kwatiri kusaŋgo, tikaʋadziŋgirira kuȿikira paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo.
Ʋafuri ʋakafura ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋari paruȿiŋgo, ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋakafa, naiye muranda wenyu Uria muHiti wafa ʋo.
Ipapo Davidi akati kunhume: Iti kunaJoabi: Iɀi ŋgaɀirege kukushuwisa, nokuti munondo unoparadza mumŋe pano nomumŋe kumŋe; tsuŋga hako pakurwa neguta, uriputse; newe enda undomusimbisa.
Ɀino mukadzi waUria wakati anzwa kuti murume wake Uria wafa, akacema murume wake.
Akati apedza kucema, Davidi akatuma nhume kumutora, akamuisa mumba make, akaʋa mukadzi wake, akamuɓerekera mŋanakomana. Asi cinhu ici, cakaŋga caitwa naDavidi, hacina‐kufadza Mŋari.
Ɀino Jehova akatuma Natani kunaDavidi. Akaȿika kwaari, akati kwaari: Kwakaŋga kunaʋarume ʋaʋiri muguta rimŋe; mumŋe wakaŋga akafuma, asi mumŋe wakaŋga ari murombo.
Mufumi wakaŋga anamakwai neŋombe zhinji kwaɀo;

asi murombo wakaŋga asinecinhu, asi gwaiana rimŋe ɗuku reshece, raakaŋga ateŋga, akarirera; rikakura kwaari pamŋe cete naʋana ʋake, rikadya ɀokudya ɀake, nokunwira pamukombe wake, nokuʋata pacifuʋa cake, rikafanana nomukunda wake.
Ɀino mufambi wakati aciȿika kumufumi, iye akaramba kutora
Ipapo kutsamŋa kwaDavidi kwakamukira munhu uyu kwaɀo, akati kunaNatani: NaJehova mupenyu, munhu wakaita kuɗai, unofanira kufa.
Ʋuye unofanira kuripira gwaiana iro namanna, ɀaakaita iɀoɀo, ʋuye ɀaakaŋga asinenyasha.
Natani akati kunaDavidi: Ndiwe munhu uyo! Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakakuzodza iwe kuti uʋe mambo waIsraeri, ndikakurwira paruʋoko rwaSauro,
ndikakupa imba yatenzi ʋako, naʋakadzi ʋatenzi ʋako pacifuʋa cako, ndikakupa imba yaIsraeri neyaJuda; ʋuye ɗai iɀo ɀisino‐kuriŋgana, ndaikuwedzera ɀokuti neɀokuti.
Waɀidzireiko shoko raJehova, ukaita ɀakaipa pamberi pake? Waʋuraya Uria muHiti nomunondo, ukatora mukadzi wake kuti aʋe mukadzi wako, ukamuʋurayisa nomunondo waʋaAmoni.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino munondo hauŋgabvi paimba yako nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti wakandiɀidza, ukatora mukadzi waUria muHiti kuti aʋe mukadzi wako.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndicakumutsira ɀakaipa ɀicabva mumba mako, ndicatora ʋakadzi ʋako pamberi pako ndiciʋapa waugere naye, iye ucaʋata naʋakadzi ʋako masikati macena.
Nokuti iwe wakaɀiita pakaʋanda, asi ini ndicaɀiita pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose, ari masikati macena.
Ipapo Davidi akati kunaNatani: Ndatadzira Jehova. Natani akati kunaDavidi: Jehova wakaŋganwira ʋo ɀiʋi ɀako; hauŋgafi.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ɀawakaɓatsira kwaɀo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaJehova kumumhura necinhu ici cawaita, uyo mŋana wawaɓerekerwa, ɀirokwaɀo ucafa.
Natani akabva, akaenda kumba kwake.
Jehova akaroʋa mŋana wakaŋga aɓerekerwa Davidi nomukadzi waUria, akarwara kwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akanyeŋgeterera mŋana kunaJehova, akaɀinyima ɀokudya, akapinda, akaʋata pasi ʋusiku bgose.
Ʋakuru ʋeimba yake ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda kwaari, ʋakaɗa kumumutsa pasi; asi iye wakaramba, akasadya ʋo ɀokudya naʋo.

Ɀino nezuʋa recinomŋe mŋana akafa. Ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakatya kumuʋudza kuti mŋana wafa, nokuti ʋakati: Tarirai, mŋana aciri mupenyu, takataura naye, akasaterera manzwi eɗu; ɀino ucatambudzika seiko, kana tikamuʋudza kuti mŋana wafa.
Asi Davidi wakati aciʋona kuti ʋaranda ʋake ʋanoita zeʋe‐zeʋe, Davidi akaziʋa kuti mŋana wafa; Davidi akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Mŋana wafa here? Iʋo ʋakati: Wafa.
Ipapo Davidi akasimuka pasi, akashamba, akazora mafuta, akafuka dzimŋe ŋguʋo, akapinda mumba maJehova, akanamata; ipapo akaenda kumba kwake, akakumbira ɀokudya, ʋakamupa, akadya.
Ipapo ʋaranda ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Ndokuɗiniko? Aciri mupenyu makaɀinyima ɀokudya, mukacema mŋana, asi ɀino mŋana wakati afa, mukasimuka mukadya ɀokudya.
Iye akati: Mŋana aciri mupenyu ndakaɀinyima ɀokudya, ndikacema, nokuti ndakati: Ndianiko uŋgaziʋa, ɀimŋe Mŋari uŋgandinzwira tsitsi, mŋana akararama hake?
Asi ɀino wafa hake, ndicaɀinyimireiko ɀokudya? Ndiŋgamudzosa ɀe here? Ini ndicaenda kwaari, asi iye haaŋgadzokeri kwandiri.
Davidi akanyaradza mukadzi wake Bati‐sheba, akapinda kwaari, akaʋata naye, iye akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Soromoni. Iye akaɗikanwa naJehova.
akatuma shoko nomuromo waNatani muprofita, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Jedidia, nokuɗa kwaJehova.
Ɀino Joabi akandorwa neRaba,
Joabi akatuma nhume kunaDavidi, akati: Ndandorwa neRaba, ndikakunda guta remvura.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, ʋuŋganidzai ʋanhu ʋakasara, mudzike matente enyu paguta, murikunde, ini ndirege kuzokunda guta, rikatumidzwa zita raŋgu.
Davidi akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋose, ʋakaenda Raba, ʋakarwa naro, ʋakarikunda.
Akabvisa korona yamambo waʋo pamusoro wake; iyo yakaȿika tarenta rimŋe rendarama pakurema kwayo, ʋuye yakaŋga inamabge anokosha, ikaiswa pamusoro waDavidi. Akapamba ɀizhinji kwaɀo paguta iro.
