Ɀino pagore ramazana manna namakumi masere shure kwokuɓuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yeEgipita, pagore recinna rokuɓata ʋushe kwaSoromoni pakati paIsraeri, nomŋedzi weZifi, ndiwo mŋedzi wecipiri, wakataŋga kuʋaka imba yaJehova.
Imba yakaʋakirwa Jehova namambo Soromoni yakaȿika makubiti makumi matanhatu pakureɓa kwayo, namakubiti makumi maʋiri paʋupamhi bgayo, namakubiti makumi matatu pakukwirira kwayo;
ʋuye ɓiraʋira pamberi petembere yeimba
Akaitira ʋo imba mawindi eɀitanda ɀakacinjikwa.
Akaʋaka dzimba dzakaturikidzana pacidziro ceimba kunhiʋi dzose, pamadziro eimba kunhiʋi dzose, etembere napaitaura Jehova; akaita ʋo makamuri panhiʋi dzose dzakapoteredza;

ʋupamhi bgeimba yapanyasi bgaiʋa namakubiti mashanu, noʋupamhi bgeimba yapakati makubiti matanhatu, noʋupamhi bgeimba yecitatu makubiti manomŋe; nokuti necokunze wakaʋaka ɀitukuriso pamadziro eimba kunhiʋi dzose, kuti matanda arege kupinda mukati mamadziro eimba.
Ɀino imba pakuʋakwa kwayo, yakaʋakwa namabge akaŋga agadzirwa ipapo paʋaiaputsa; pakuʋakwa kwayo hakuna‐kunzwika mukati meimba nyundo, kana sanhu, kana nhumbi ipi neipi yeɗare.
Mukoʋa wamakamuri apanyasi enhiʋi wakaŋga uri kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba; ɀino ʋaikwira neɀikwiriso ɀinomonereka kumakamuri apakati, ʋuye kana ʋobva panaapakati ʋacienda kuneecitatu.
Naiɀoɀo akaʋaka imba, akaipedza; ndokufukidza imba namatanda ʋuye namapuraŋga emisidari.
Akaʋaka dzimba dzakaturikidzana paimba yose, imŋe neimŋe yakaŋga yakaita makubiti
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaSoromoni, riciti:
Kana iri imba iyi yaunoʋaka, kana ukafamba nemitemo yaŋgu, ukaita ɀandakatoŋga, ukaceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu yose ukafamba nayo, ini ndicasimbisa shoko raŋgu newe, iro randakataura kunaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋako.
Ndicagara pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, handiŋgarashi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo Soromoni akaʋaka imba, akaipedza.
Akaʋaka madziro eimba mukati namapuraŋga omusidari; kubva paguʋa reimba kuȿikira paɗeŋga ramadziro, akaafukidza necomukati namapuraŋga; akafukidza guʋa reimba namapuraŋga omusipresi.
Akaʋaka ʋo neceshure kweimba
Ɀino imba, iyo tembere, yakaŋga iri pamberi, yakaȿika makubiti makumi manna.
Matanda omusidari mukati meimba akaŋga akaʋezwa namafundo namaruʋa akazaruka; yaiʋa misidari yoga, kwaŋga kusinebge rakaʋonekwa.
Akagadzira paŋgataura
Paŋgataura
Naiɀoɀo Soromoni wakafukidza imba yose necomukati mayo nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; akacinjikisa maketani endarama pamberi papaŋgataura
Akafukidza imba yose nendarama kuȿikira imba yose yapera; akafukidza ʋo artari yose yaiʋa yapaŋgataura
Akaitira paŋgataura
Ƃapiro rimŋe rekerubi rakaȿika makubiti mashanu pakureɓa kwaro, nerimŋe ɓapiro ʋo rekerubi makubiti mashanu; kubva pamuromo weɓapiro rimŋe kuȿikira pamuromo werimŋe ɀe, aiʋa makubiti anegumi.
Rimŋe kerubi rakaȿika ʋo makubiti anegumi; makerubi ose maʋiri akaŋga akaenzana pakukura nokuʋumbga.
Rimŋe kerubi rakaȿika makubiti anegumi, ʋuye ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita rimŋe ʋo.

Akagadza makerubi mukati meimba yomukati; mapapiro amakerubi akaŋga akatambanudzwa, ɓapiro rimŋe rekerubi rimŋe rakaȿika kumadziro mamŋe, ʋuye ɓapiro rimŋe rekerubi rimŋe ɀe rakaȿika kunamamŋe madziro; mapapiro awo akagunɀana pakati peimba.
Akafukidza makerubi nendarama.
Akaʋeza pamadziro ose eimba kunhiʋi dzose mifananidzo yakaʋezwa yamakerubi nemicindwe, namaruʋa akazaruka, mukati nokunze;
akafukidza ʋo guʋa reimba nendarama, mukati nokunze.
Akaitira mikoʋa yapaŋgataura
Naiɀoɀo akaita magonhi maʋiri omuorivi, akaʋeza pamsoro pawo mifananidzo yamakerubi nemicindwe, namaruʋa akazaruka, akaafukidza nendarama; akaisa ndarama pamsoro pamakerubi napamicindwe.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo akaitira mikoʋa yetembere ɀiʋiʋo ɀemiorivi, ɀakaŋga ɀinenhiʋi inna dzakaenzana;
namagonhi maʋiri omusipresi; mapeŋga maʋiri egonhi rimŋe aipetwa, ʋuye mapeŋga maʋiri erimŋe gonhi ɀe aipetwa.
Akaʋezera’po makerubi nemicindwe namaruʋa akazaruka; akaɀifukidza nendarama, yakanatso‐iswa pamsoro peɀakaʋezwa.
Akaʋaka ruʋazhe rwomukati nemisara mitatu yamabge akaʋezwa, nomusara wamatanda omusidari.
Nheyo dzeimba yaJehova dzakaʋambga negore recinna raSoromoni, nomŋedzi weZivi.
Negore regumi nerimŋe, nomŋedzi weBuri, ndiwo mŋedzi worusere, imba ikapera cose neɀose ɀayo, seɀayaifanira kuʋakwa. Naiɀoɀo wakapedza makore manomŋe pakuiʋaka.
Soromoni wakepedza makore anegumi namatatu pakuʋaka imba yake, akapedza imba yake yose.
Nokuti wakaʋaka imba nemiti yamatondo eRebanoni; yakaŋgaya kaȿika makubiti
Yakaŋga yakafukidzwa namatanda emisidari kumsoro, pamsoro pamakamuri aiʋa namakumi manna namashanu pamsoro pembiru, makamuri anegumi namashanu pamusara mumŋe.
Kwakaŋga kunemisara mitatu yamawindi, windi rimŋe rakatarisana nerimŋe windi, pamisara mitatu yakaturikidzana.
Magonhi ose namagwatidziro ɀaiʋa namatiʋi manna akaenzana; windi rimŋe rakaŋga rakatarisana nerimŋe windi, pamisara mitatu yakaturikidzana.
Akaita ɓiraʋira rembiru; rakaŋga rakaȿika makubiti makumi mashanu pakureɓa kwaro, namakubiti makumi matatu paʋupamhi bgaro, neɓiraʋira pamberi padzo, nedzimŋe mbiru namatanda makobvu pamberi padzo.
Akaita ʋo ɓiraʋira recigaro cake coʋushe, paaŋgatoŋga mhaka, iro ɓiraʋira rokutoŋga; iro rakaŋga rakafukidzwa namapuraŋga omusidari kubva paguʋa kuȿikira paɗeŋga.
Neimba yake yokugara, kunorumŋe ruʋazhe mukati meɓiraʋira, yakaŋga yakaitwa saiɀoɀo. Akaitira ʋo mukunda waFarao imba, (waakaŋga awana iye Soromoni,) yakaŋga yakafanana neɓiraʋira iro.
Idzi dzose dzakaŋga dzakaʋakwa namabge anokosha, ari mabge akaʋezwa, akaenzaniswa ɀakanaka, akacekwa namajeko mukati nokunze, kubva panheyo kuȿikira kumsoro, nokunze ʋo kuȿikira kuruʋazhe rukuru.
Nheyo dzakaŋga dzakaʋakwa namabge anokosha, mabge makuru, mabge akaȿika makubiti anegumi, namabge akaȿika makubiti masere.
Kumsoro kwakaŋga kunamabge anokosha, mabge akaʋezwa, akaenzaniswa ɀakanaka, namapuraŋga omusidari.
Ruʋazhe rukuru rwakaŋga rwakapoteredza, rwakaŋga runemisara mitatu yamabge akaʋezwa, nomusara mumŋe wamatanda omusidari; rwakaŋga rwakafanana noruʋazhe rwomukati rweimba yaJehova, neɓiraʋira reimba.
Ɀino mambo Soromoni akatuma ʋanhu kundotora Hirami paTire.

Iye wakaŋga ari mŋanakomana wecirikadzi yorudzi rwaNaftari; ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaiʋa munhu weTire, mupfuri wendarira; iye wakaŋga akaŋgwara kwaɀo anenjere noʋumhizha kuɓata maɓasa ose endarira. Akaʋuya kunamambo Soromoni, akaɓata maɓasa ake ose.
Nokuti wakaʋumba mbiru mbiri dzendarira, imŋe neimŋe yakaȿika makubiti anegumi namasere pakureɓa; ʋuye pakuyera rwonzi rwakaȿika makubiti anegumi namaʋiri rwakapoteredza mbiru imŋe neimŋe.
Akaʋumba ʋo misoro miʋiri yendarira yakanyauswa, kuti iiswe pamsoro pembiru; musoro mumŋe wakaȿika makubiti mashanu pakureɓa, nomumŋe musoro makubiti mashanu ʋo pakureɓa.
Misoro, yaiʋa pamsoro pembiru, yakaŋga inemimbure yakarukwa yendarira, neɀishoŋgo ɀamaketani; minomŋe yomusoro mumŋe, neminomŋe yomumŋe musoro ɀe.
Akaita ʋo matamba; kwakaŋga kunemisara miʋiri yakapoteredza pamsoro pomumbure mumŋe, kufukidza misoro yakaŋga iri pamsoro pembiru; akaitira mumŋe musoro saiɀoɀo.
Misoro, yaiʋa pamsoro pembiru paɓiraʋira, yakaŋga inamaruʋa amahapa akaʋezwa, akaȿika makubiti manna.
Kumsoro kwakaŋga kunemisoro ʋo pamsoro pembiru mbiri, pedyo neɗumbu rakaŋga riri parutiʋi rwomumbure wakarukwa; namatamba akaŋga anamazana maʋiri, akaita misara yakapoteredza pamsoro pomumŋe musoro.
Ɀino akamisa mbiru paɓiraʋira retembere, akamisa mbiru yorudyi, akatumidza zita rayo Jakini; akamisa mbiru yoruɓoshwe, akatumidza zita rayo Boazi.
Pamsoro pembiru pakaŋga paneɀishoŋgo ɀamaruʋa amahapa; naiɀoɀo ɓasa rapambiru rakapera.

Ɀino akaita dziʋa rendarira yakanyauswa, rakaȿika makubiti anegumi paʋupamhi pamuromo, rakatenderera; kukwirira kwaro kwakaȿika makubiti mashanu; ʋuye pakuyera rwonzi rwakaȿika makubiti makumi matatu rwakaripoteredza.
Pasi pomuromo waro pakaŋga panamafundo akaripoteredza, akaŋga anegumi pakubiti rimŋe nerimŋe, aipoteredza dziʋa; mafundo akaita misara miʋiri, akaʋumbga pamŋe cete naro.

Rakaŋga rimire pamsoro penzombe gumi nembiri, nhatu dzakaŋga dzakatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nhatu kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, nhatu kurutiʋi rwezasi, ʋuye nhatu kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; dziʋa rakaŋga rakagadzwa pamsoro padzo, idzo dzakafuratirana.
Ʋukobvu bgaro bgaiʋa soʋupamhi bgecanza, ʋuye muromo waro wakaŋga wakafanana nomuromo wembiya, seruʋa rehapa; mukati maro maipinda mabati
Akaita ʋo ɀiŋgoro ɀinegumi ɀendarira; ciŋgoro cimŋe necimŋe caiȿika makubiti manna pakureɓa, namakubiti manna paʋupamhi, namakubiti matatu pakukwirira.
Ɀiŋgoro ɀakaŋga ɀakaitwa kuɗai: Ɀaiʋa noʋukomba, ʋukomba ubgo bgakakombga nemiɗeŋgerero.
Paʋukomba ubgo pakati pemiɗeŋgerero paiʋa neshumba, nenzombe, namakerubi; pamsoro pemiɗeŋgerero pakaŋga pakaɗaro ʋo; pasi peshumba nenzombe paiʋa neɀishoŋgo ɀakarembera.

Ciŋgoro cimŋe necimŋe caiʋa namakumbo manna endarira neɀokumonerekera’po ɀendarira; makumbo aco manna aiʋa neɀitsigiro; ɀitsigiro iɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaʋumbirwa pasi pomudziyo wokushambidzira, neɀishoŋgo kurutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe.

Muromo wawo pakati pomusoro nokumsoro kwawo wakaȿika kubiti rimŋe; muromo wawo wakaŋga wakatenderera, wakafanana necigadziko, kubiti rimŋe nehafu; pamuromo wawo paiʋa neɀakanyorwa, asi ʋukomba bgawo bgaiʋa namatiʋi manna akaenzana, ɀisina‐kutenderera.
Makumbo manna akaŋga ari pasi poʋukomba, ʋuye ɀokuɓatisa makumbo ɀaiʋa paŋgoro; gumbo rimŋe nerimŋe rakaȿika kubiti rimŋe nehafu pakukwirira kwaro.
Makumbo akaŋga akafanana namakumbo eŋgoro; ɀokuɓatisa makumbo, namafero, namasipoki, namaneivi ɀakaŋga ɀakaʋumbga ɀose.
Paiʋa neɀitsigiro ɀinna pamakona manna eciŋgoro cimŋe necimŋe; ɀitsigiro ɀaiʋa ɀimŋe neŋgoro imene.
Pamsoro peciŋgoro paiʋa necitenderere cakaȿika hafu yekubiti pakukwirira, ʋuye pamsoro peŋgoro ɀitsigiro ɀayo noʋukomba bgayo ɀaiʋa ɀimŋe.
Panhiʋi dzeɀitsigiro ɀayo, ʋuye paʋukomba bgayo akaʋeza makerubi neshumba, nemiti yemicindwe paɀakariŋgana, neɀishoŋgo kunhiʋi dzose.
Akaita ɀiŋgoro ɀinegumi saiɀoɀo; ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana pakuʋumbga nokuenzana, nomufananidzo mumŋe.
Akaita midziyo yokushambidzira inegumi; mudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe waipinda mabati
Akaisa ɀiŋgoro, ɀishanu kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba, ʋuye ɀishanu kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe rweimba; akagadzika dziʋa kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba kumabvazuʋa necezasi.
Hirami akaita midziyo yokushambidzira, nefoshoro, nembiya. Naiɀoɀo Hirami akapedza maɓasa ose aakaitira Soromoni paimba yaJehova;
ɀaiti: Mbiru mbiri, nembiya mbiri dzemisoro miʋiri, yaiʋa pamisoro yembiru; ʋuye mimbure miʋiri yokufukidza nayo mbiya mbiri dzemisoro miʋiri yaiʋa pamsoro pembiru;
namatamba anamazana manna emi mbure miʋiri, misara miʋiri yamatamba pamumbure mumŋe nomumŋe, kufukidza mbiya mbiri yemisoro yaiʋa pamsoro pembiru;
neɀiŋgoro ɀinegumi, nemidziyo yokushambidzira inegumi pamsoro peɀiŋgoro;
nedziʋa rimŋe, nenzombe gumi nembiri pasi pedziʋa;
nehari, nefoshoro, nembiya; nhumbi idzi dzose dzakaitirwa mambo Soromoni naHirami mumba maJehova, dzakaŋga dzakaitwa nendarira yakabginyiswa.
Mambo akadziʋumba paɓani raJoridani, pakati peSukoti neZaretani, paiʋa nevu rokuʋumba.
Soromoni haana‐kuyera nhumbi dzose, nokuti dzaiʋa zhinji kwaɀo; ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋereŋga kurema kwendarira.
Soromoni akaita nhumbi dzose dzaiʋa mumba maJehova, dzaiti: Artari yendarama, netafura yendarama paiʋa neɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza;
nemŋenje yendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, mishanu kurutiʋi rworudyi, nemishanu kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe, pamberi papaŋgataura

nemikombe, nembato dzemŋenje, nembiya, neɀiroŋgo, neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; neɀiɓato ɀamagonhi ɀendarama, ɀamagonhi eimba yomukati, iyo nɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene, neɀamagonhi eimba, iyo tembere.

Naiɀoɀo ɓasa rose, rakaitwa namambo Soromoni paimba yaJehova, rakapera. Soromoni akaisa ʋo nhumbi dzakaŋga dzatsaurirwa Mŋari naDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, sirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo, akadziisa padzimba dzokuceŋgeta fuma dzeimba yaJehova.

Ɀino Soromoni wakaʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, naʋakuru ʋose ʋamarudzi, iwo macinda edzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋana ʋaIsraeri, kunamambo Soromoni paJerusarema, akakwidza areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, ibve paguta raDavidi, iro Zioni.
Ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana kunamambo Soromoni pamutambo pamŋedzi weEtanimi, ndiwo mŋedzi wecinomŋe.
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya, ʋaprista ʋakasimudza areka.
Ʋakakwira neareka yaJehova netente rokusoŋgana, nemidziyo mitȿene yose yaiʋa muTente, ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakakwira nayo.
Mambo Soromoni, neʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri yakaŋga yaʋuŋganira kwaari, ʋakafamba naye pamberi peareka, ʋakaɓayira makwai nenzombe, ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgagoni kurabga kana kuʋereŋgwa nokuwanda kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋaprista ʋakagadzika areka yesuŋgano yaJehova panɀimbo yayo, panɀimbo tȿene yeimba, panɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene, ipo panyasi pamapapiro amakerubi.
Nokuti makerubi akatambanudza mapapiro awo pamsoro penɀimbo yeareka, makerubi akafukidza areka namatanda ayo necokumsoro.
Matanda akaŋga akareɓa; naiɀoɀo miromo yamatanda yakaŋga iciʋonekwa kana munhu ari panɀimbo tȿene pamberi penɀimbo paŋgataura
Mukati meareka makaŋga musisinecinhu, asi mahwendefa maʋiri amabge, akaŋga aiswa’mo naMosesi paHorebi, ŋguʋa Jehova yaakaita suŋgano nayo naʋana ʋaIsraeri pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa panɀimbo tȿene, gore rikazadza imba yaJehova,
naiɀoɀo ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kumira paɓasa nokuɗa kwegore; nokuti kubginya kwaJehova kwakazadza imba yaJehova.
Ipapo Soromoni akati: Jehova wakati, ndinoɗa kugara mukati merima guru.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakakuʋakirai imba pamuŋgagara, nɀimbo mamuŋgagara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino mambo akatendeʋudza ciso cake, akaropafadza ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri; ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri ikasimuka.
Akati: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakudzwe, iye wakataura nomuromo wake naDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, akaɀizadzisa noruʋoko rwake, aciti:

Kubva pazuʋa randakaɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri paEgipita, handina‐kutsaura guta rimŋe pamarudzi ose aIsraeri, paʋaŋgandiʋakira imba, kuti zita raŋgu rigare’po; asi ndakatsaura Davidi aɓate ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, imba.
Asi Jehova wakati kunaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu: Wakaita ɀakanaka, ɀawakaŋga uciɗa kuʋakira zita raŋgu imba.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro iwe hauŋgaʋaki imba iyo, asi mŋanakomana wako waucaɓereka, ndiye ucaʋakira zita raŋgu imba.

Ɀino Jehova wasimbisa shoko rake raakataura, nokuti ini ndamuka panɀimbo yaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndikagara pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri, seɀakapikira Jehova, ndikaʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, imba.
Imomo ndakagadzirira areka nɀimbo, imo munesuŋgano yaJehova, yaakaita namadziɓaɓa eɗu paŋguʋa yaakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino Soromoni akamira pamberi peartari yaJehova, pamberi peʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri, akatambanudzira maʋoko ake kuɗeŋga,
akati: Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, hakunomumŋe Mŋari wakafanana nemi kuɗeŋga kumsoro kana panyika pasi; munoraŋgarira suŋgano nenyasha kuʋaranda ʋenyu, ʋanofamba pamberi penyu nomŋoyo waʋo wose.
Imi makaitira muranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, seɀamakamupikira; makataura nomuromo wenyu, mukaɀiita noruʋoko rwenyu, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, itirai muranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu seɀamakamupikira, muciti: Hauŋgashaiwi munhu ucagara pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri pamberi paŋgu, kana ʋana ʋako ʋakaŋgwarira kufamba kwaʋo, ʋakafamba pamberi paŋgu, seɀawakafamba iwe pamberi paŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Mŋari waIsraeri, ndinokumbira kuti shoko renyu riitike, iro ramakataura kumuranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ko mukati Mŋari uŋgagara panyika here? Tarira, ɗeŋga nokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga haɀiŋgamuriŋgani; ndoɗa imba ino yandakaʋaka!
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, iʋai nehanya nomunyeŋgetero womuranda wenyu, nokukumbira kwake, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, munzwe kuɗanidzira nokunyeŋgetera kwomuranda wenyu, kwaanonyeŋgetera pamberi penyu nhasi;

meso enyu arambe acirindira imba ino ʋusiku namasikati, nɀimbo iyi yamakataura pamsoro payo, muciti: Zita raŋgu ricagara’po; inzwai munyeŋgetero womuranda wenyu waanozonyeŋgetera akatarira kunɀimbo ino.
Inzwai kukumbira kwomuranda wenyu, nokwaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kana ʋacizonyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kunɀimbo ino; ɗonzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga, kwamunogara; ɀino kana mukanzwa, muʋakaŋganwire henyu.
Kana munhu aciŋge atadzira waanogara naye, akapikiswa mhiko, akaʋuya akapika pamberi peartari yenyu muimba ino,
inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, muite, mururamisire ʋaranda ʋenyu, mupe wakaipa mhoȿa, arobge pamsoro pomufambire wake; asi mururamisire wakarurama, apiwe ɀakafanira kururama kwake.
Kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri ʋaciŋge ʋakundwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, nemhaka yokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakutadzirai; kana ʋakadzokera ɀe kwamuri, ʋakatenda zita renyu, ʋakanyeŋgetera kwamuri nokukumbira muimba ino;
inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, mukaŋganwire ɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, muʋadzosere ɀe kunyika yamakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo.

Kana ɗeŋga riciŋge razarirwa, mvura ikasanaya nemhaka yokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakutadzirai; kana ʋakanyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kunɀimbo ino, ʋakatenda zita renyu, ʋakatendeʋuka paɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nokuti muneŋge maʋaroʋa;

inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, mukaŋganwire ɀiʋi ɀaʋaranda ʋenyu, neɀaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, nokuti munoʋadzidzisa nzira yakanaka yaʋanofanira kufamba nayo; munise mvura panyika iyo yamakapa ʋanhu ʋenyu kuti iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
Kana nzara ikaʋa’po panyika, kana ɗenda rikaʋa’po, kana nyunji nokuvuva ɀikaʋa’po, nemhashu nehonye; kana ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakaʋakomba panyika inamaguta aʋo; kana nyatwa kana hosha ipi neipi ikaʋa’po;
kana munhu upi noupi, kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakanyeŋgetera kana kukumbira, mumŋe nomumŋe aciziʋa kutambudzika kuri pamŋoyo pake, akatambanudzira maʋoko ake kuimba ino;

inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, mukaŋganwire, muite, muripire mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakafanira mufambire wake wose, iye wamunoziʋa mŋoyo wake; nokuti imi, imi moga, ndimi munoziʋa mŋoyo yaʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋose;
kuti ʋakutyei mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgaʋo panyika yamakapa madziɓaɓa eɗu.
Ɀino kana ari mutorwa, asati ari waʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kana akabva kunyika iri kure nokuɗa kwezita renyu;
nokuti ʋacazonzwa mukurumbira wezita renyu guru, noworuʋoko rwenyu runesimba, noruʋoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa — kana akaʋuya akanyeŋgetera akatarira kuimba ino;

inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, muitire mutorwa ɀose seɀaanokumbira, kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋaziʋe zita renyu, ʋakutyei, seɀinoita ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, ʋaziʋe kuti imba ino yandakaʋaka yakatumidzwa zita renyu.
Kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakandorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋakaenda nenzira ipi neipi yamucaʋatuma nayo, ʋakanyeŋgetera kunaJehova ʋakatarira kuguta ramakatsaura, nokuimba yandakaʋakira zita renyu,
inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo nokukumbira kwaʋo, muʋaruramisire.
Kana ʋakakutadzirai, (nokuti hakunomunhu usiŋgatadzi), mukaʋatsamŋira, mukaʋaisa
kana ʋakazoɀifuŋga kunyika kwaʋakatapirwa, ʋakadzoka ɀe, ʋakakumbira kwamuri panyika yaʋatapi ʋaʋo, ʋaciti: Tatadza, taita ɀakaipa, taita ɀisakarurama;

kana ʋakadzokera ɀe kwamuri nomŋoyo waʋo wose, nomŋeya waʋo wose, panyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakaʋatapa; kana ʋakanyeŋgetera kwamuri ʋakatarira kunyika yaʋo, yamakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo, kuguta ramakatsaura, nokuimba yandakaʋakira zita renyu;
inzwai henyu kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo nokukumbira kwaʋo iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, muʋaruramisire;
mukaŋganwire ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakakutadzirai, nokuɗarika kwaʋo kwose, kwaʋakaɗarika nako kwamuri; muʋawanise tsitsi kunaʋakaʋatapa, kuti ʋaʋanzwire nyasha;
nokuti ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋenyu, nenhaka yenyu, yamakaɓuɗisa Egipita pakati peʋira ramatare;
meso enyu ŋgaaʋone kukumbira kwomuranda wenyu, nokukumbira kwaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kuti muʋanzwe ŋguʋa ipi neipi yaʋanocema kwamuri.
Nokuti imi Jehova, makaʋatsaura kundudzi dzose dzenyika, ʋaʋe nhaka yenyu, seɀamakataura nomuromo waMosesi muranda wenyu, ŋguʋa yamakaɓuɗisa madziɓaɓa eɗu paEgipita.
Ɀino Soromoni wakati apedza kunyeŋgetera kunaJehova munyeŋgetero uyu wose nokukumbira uku, akasimuka pamberi peartari yaJehova, paakaŋga akafugama namabvi ake, maʋoko ake akatambanudzirwa kuɗeŋga.
Akamira akaropafadza ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri nenzwi guru, akati:
Jehova ŋgaakudzwe, wakapa ʋanhu ʋake kuzorora, seɀaakatipikira ɀose; hapaneshoko rimŋe paɀose ɀakanaka ɀaakatipikira rakakona, iɀo ɀaakatipikira nomuromo waMosesi muranda wake.
Jehova Mŋari weɗu ŋgaaʋe nesu, seɀaaiʋa namadziɓaɓa eɗu; ŋgaarege kutisiya, kana kutirasha;
kuti arerekese mŋoyo yeɗu kwaari, tifambe panzira dzake dzose, ticeŋgete mirairo yake, neɀaakatema, neɀaakatoŋga, iɀo ɀaakaraira madziɓaɓa eɗu.
Ɀino mashoko awa andakakumbira nawo pamberi paJehova, ŋgaagare pedyo naJehova Mŋari weɗu masikati noʋusiku, aruramisire muranda wake, naʋanhu ʋake ʋaIsraeri, panoɗikanwa napo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe;
kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋaziʋe kuti Jehova ndiye Mŋari, hakunomumŋe.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo yenyu iʋe yakarurama kwaɀo kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu, mufambe paneɀaakatema, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake, seɀamunoita nhasi.
Ɀino mambo naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamŋe cete naye ʋakaɓayira ɀiɓayiro pamberi paJehova.

Soromoni akaɓayira ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ɀaakaɓayira Jehova, nzombe dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri, namakwai aneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi maʋiri. Naiɀoɀo mambo naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakatsaurira Jehova imba iyo.

Nomusi uyo mambo akatsaura ʋo nɀimbo yapakati yoruʋazhe rwakaŋga ruri pamberi peimba yaJehova; nokuti ndipo paakaɓayira cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu, namafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; nokuti artari yendarira, yaiʋa pamberi paJehova, yakaŋga iri ɗuku kwaɀo, isiŋgagoni kuriŋgana cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu, namafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.

Naiɀoɀo Soromoni akatamba mutambo ŋguʋa iyo yose, naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamŋe cete naye, ʋakaita ʋuŋgano huru, kubva paʋanopinda paHamati kuȿikira parukoʋa rweEgipita, pamberi paJehova Mŋari weɗu, mazuʋa manomŋe namazuʋa manomŋe ɀe, ndiwo mazuʋa anegumi namanna.
Pazuʋa rorusere akaendisa ʋanhu, iʋo ʋakatenda mambo, ʋakaenda kumatente aʋo nemŋoyo yakaŋga icifara, icifarira ɀakanaka ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa Davidi muranda wake naIsraeri ʋanhu ʋake naJehova.
Ɀino Soromoni wakati apedza kuʋaka imba yaJehova, neimba yamambo, neɀose Soromoni ɀaakaŋga aciɗa kuita,
Jehova akaɀiratidza kunaSoromoni rwecipiri, seɀaakaɀiratidza kwaari paGibeoni.

Jehova akati kwaari: Ndakanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwako nokukumbira kwako kwawakaita pamberi paŋgu; ndakatsaura imba iyi yawakaʋaka, kuti ndiise zita raŋgu’po nokusiŋgaperi; meso aŋgu nomŋoyo waŋgu ɀicaʋa’po ŋguʋa dzose.
Kana uri’we, kana ukafamba pamberi paŋgu saɓaɓa ʋako Davidi nomŋoyo usiŋganyeŋgeri, nokururama, ukaita ɀose ɀandakakuraira, ukaceŋgeta ɀandatema neɀandatoŋga,
ipapo ini ndicasimbisa cigaro cako coʋushe pakati paIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi, seɀandakapikira ɓaɓa ʋako Davidi, ndiciti: Hauŋgashaiwi munhu ucagara pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri.
Asi kana mukatsauka pakunditeʋera, imi kana ʋana ʋenyu, mukasaceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu neɀandatema ɀandakaisa pamberi penyu, asi mukandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, mukanamata kwaʋari;
ipapo ndicaparadza Israeri panyika yandakaʋapa; neimba iyi yandakatsaurira zita raŋgu, ndicairashira kure ndirege kuiʋona; ʋaIsraeri ʋacaʋa shumo neciseko pakati paʋanhu ʋose;
ʋuye imba iyi kunyaŋge yakakwirira ikaɗai, ʋose ʋanopfuʋura nayo ʋacakanuka nokuridza muridzo, ʋaciti: Jehova wakaitireiko kuɗai nenyika ino, ʋuye neimba ino?

Ʋacapindura, ʋaciti: Nokuti ʋakasiya Jehova Mŋari waʋo, wakaŋga aɓuɗisa madziɓaɓa aʋo munyika yeEgipita, ʋakanamatira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋakanamata kwaʋari, nokuʋashumira; saka Jehova wakaʋapinza panjodzi idzi dzose.
Makore anamakumi maʋiri akati apera, Soromoni aakaʋaka nawo dzimba idzi mbiri, iyo imba yaJehova neimba yamambo;
(ɀino Hirami mambo weTire wakaŋga atȿakira Soromoni misidari, nemisipresi, nendarama, neɀose ɀaakaŋga aciɗa), mambo Soromoni akapa Hirami maguta anamakumi maʋiri panyika yeGarire.
Hirami akabva Tire kuzoʋona maguta aakaŋga apiwa naSoromoni, asi haana‐kumufadza.
Akati: Maguta kunyiko awa awandipa, hama yaŋgu? Akaitumidza nyika yeKaburi kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Hirami akatumira mambo matarenta endarama anezana namakumi maʋiri.
Ɀino ndiro shoko recibaro cakarairwa namambo Soromoni, kuzoʋaka imba yaJehova, neimba yake, neMiro, noruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema, neHazori, neMegido, neGezeri.
Farao mambo weEgipita wakaŋga andokunda Gezeri, akaripisa nomŋoto, akaʋuraya ʋaKanani ʋakaŋga ʋagere muguta, akaripa mukunda wake, mukadzi waSoromoni.
Soromoni akaʋaka Gezeri, neBeti‐horoni rezasi,
neBarati, neTamari, murenje munyika iyo,
namaguta ose amatura aSoromoni, namaguta eŋgoro dzake, namaguta aʋataȿi ʋamabiza ake, neɀose Soromoni ɀaaiɗa kuɀiʋakira paJerusarema, napaRebanoni, napanyika yose yakaŋga yakaɓatwa naye.
Kuʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaʋaAmori, naʋaHeti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi, ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋana ʋaIsraeri;
naʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasara panyika shure kwaʋo, iʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋaparadza cose, kunaiʋaʋo Soromoni wakaraira cibaro caʋaranda kuȿikira nhasi.
Asi Soromoni haana‐kuita ʋaranda pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, asi iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋarwi ʋake, naʋaɓatiri ʋake, namacinda ake, naʋakuru ʋake, naʋarairi ʋeŋgoro dzake, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ake.
Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋatariri ʋakuru ʋamaɓasa aSoromoni, ʋaiʋa namazana mashanu namakumi mashanu, ʋairairira ʋanhu ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa.
Ɀino mukunda waFarao wakabva kuguta raDavidi, akaenda kuimba yake, yaakaŋga aʋakirwa

Katatu pagore Soromoni waiɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa pamsoro peartari yaakaŋga aʋakira Jehova, akapisa ɀinonhuwira pamŋe cete naɀo paartari yakaŋga iri pamberi paJehova. Naiɀoɀo akapedza imba.
Mambo Soromoni wakaʋaka ʋo ɀikepe ɀizhinji paEzioni‐geberi, pedyo neEroti, pamhenderekedzo yeGuŋgwa Dɀuku, panyika yaEdomi.
Hirami akatuma neɀikepe iɀo ʋaranda ʋake, ʋaiʋa ʋafambisi ʋeɀikepe ʋaiziʋa guŋgwa kwaɀo, pamŋe cete naʋaranda ʋaSoromoni.
Ʋakaȿika Ofiri, ʋakatora’po ndarama yakaȿika matarenta anamazana manna namakumi maʋiri,
Ɀino mambokadzi weSheba, wakati anzwa mbiri yaSoromoni pamsoro pezita raJehova, akaʋuya kuzomuidza nemibvunzo mikukutu.
Akaȿika Jerusarema naʋanhu ʋazhinji namakamera aitakura ɀinonhuwira, nendarama zhinji‐zhinji, neɀibge ɀinokosha; ɀino wakati aȿika kunaSoromoni, akataurirana naye pamsoro peɀose ɀaiʋa mumŋoyo make.
Soromoni akapindura mibvunzo yake yose; hakunecinhu cakaŋga cakaʋanzirwa mambo, caakaŋga asiŋgagoni kumuʋudza.
Ɀino mambokadzi weSheba wakati aʋona kuŋgwara kwose kwaSoromoni, neimba yaakaŋga aʋaka,
neɀokudya ɀaiʋa patafura yake, nokugara kwaʋaranda ʋake, nokushumira kwaʋaɓatiri ʋake, neŋguʋo dzaʋo, naʋaɗiri ʋake, necikwiriso cake caaikwira naco kuimba yaJehova, akapera mŋeya.
Akati kunamambo: Guhu randakanzwa munyika yaŋgu ramashoko enyu nokuŋgwara kwenyu rakaŋga riri raɀokwaɗi.
Asi handina‐kutenda mashoko iwayo, kuȿikira ndaʋuya, ndikaʋona nameso aŋgu; asi tarirai, handina‐kuʋudzwa kunyaŋge hafu yaɀo; kuŋgwara kwenyu neɀakanaka ɀenyu ɀinokunda ɀose ɀandakanzwa.
Ʋarume ʋenyu ʋanomufarwa, naʋaranda ʋenyu aʋa ʋanomufarwa, ʋanomira pamberi penyu ŋguʋa dzose ʋacinzwa kuŋgwara kwenyu.
Jehova Mŋari wenyu ŋgaakudzwe, wakafadzwa nemi, akakugadzai pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri; Jehova wakaɗa Israeri nokusiŋgaperi, saka wakakuitai mambo kuti mutoŋge nokururamisa.
Akapa mambo matarenta anezana namakumi maʋiri endarama,
Ɀikepe ɀaHirami, ɀaibva Ofiri nendarama, ɀaiʋuya ʋo nemiti yemiarmugi neɀibge ɀinokosha ɀaibva Ofiri.
Mambo akaita namatanda iwayo emiarmugi mbiru dzeimba yaJehova, nedzeimba yamambo, ʋuye mbira, nemiteŋgeranwa ɀaʋaimbi; miti yemiarmugi yakaɗai haina‐kumboʋuyiswa kana kuʋonekwa kuȿikira nhasi.
Mambo Soromoni akapa mambokadzi weSheba ɀose ɀaaiɗa neɀaakakumbira; ɀimŋe ɀaakapiwa naSoromoni ɀefuma yake ɀisiŋgaʋereŋgwi. Naiɀoɀo akadzoka, akaenda kunyika yake, iye naʋaranda ʋake.
Ɀino ndarama yakaʋuyiswa kunaSoromoni gore rimŋe nerimŋe yakaȿika matarenta anamazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu namatanhatu
ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgi iyo yaiʋuya naʋashambadziri, neyaiʋuya nokuteŋga kwaʋateŋgesi, neyaibva kumadzimambo ose endudzi dzakaveŋgana, nokuʋaɓati ʋenyika.
Mambo akaita nhoʋo huru dzinamazana maʋiri nendarama yakapambadzirwa; nhoʋo imŋe neimŋe yakaŋga yakaitwa namashekeri anamazana matatu endarama;
akaita ʋo nhoʋo ɗuku dzinamazana matatu dzendarama yakapambadzirwa; ndarama, yakaȿika mapaundi matatu pakurema, yaiiswa panhoʋo imŋe neimŋe; mambo akaɀiisa muimba yeɗondo reRebanoni.
Mambo akaita ʋo cigaro cikuru coʋushe cenyaŋga dzenzou, akacifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.

Cigaro ico coʋushe caiʋa neɀikwiriso ɀitanhatu, ʋuye musoro wecigaro wakaŋga wakatenderedzwa shure kwaco; kwaiʋa neɀitsigiro kunhiʋi mbiri dzecigaro, ʋuye shumba mbiri dzakaŋga dzimire kunhiʋi dzecitsigiro.
Kwaiʋa neshumba gumi nembiri dzakaŋga dzimire paɀikwiriso ɀitanhatu, mbiri‐mbiri kunhiʋi dzecimŋe necimŋe; hakuna‐kumboitwa cakaɗai kunobgumŋe ʋushe.

Mikombe yose yokunwira nayo yamambo Soromoni yaiʋa yendarama, ʋuye midziyo yose yeimba yeɗondo reRebanoni yaiʋa yendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; kwakaŋga kusinecinhu cimŋe cesirveri; iyo yainzi hainomurimo pamazuʋa aSoromoni.
Nokuti mambo waiʋa neɀikepe ɀeTarshishi paguŋgwa pamŋe cete neɀikepe ɀaHirami; ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi ɀaiʋuya kamŋe pamakore matatu ɀinendarama, nesirveri, nenyaŋga dzenzou, netsoko, namatendera.
Naiɀoɀo mambo Soromoni wakakunda madzimambo ose enyika pakufuma nokucenjera.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika dzose ʋaiʋuya kushanyira Soromoni, kuzonzwa kuŋgwara kwake, kwakaŋga kwaiswa naJehova mumŋoyo make.
Mumŋe nomumŋe waiʋuya necipo cake cemidziyo yesirveri, nemidziyo yendarama, neŋguʋo, nenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo, neɀinonhuwira, namabiza, namahesera, gore rimŋe nerimŋe.
Soromoni akaʋuŋganidza ŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza; wakaŋga aneŋgoro dzinecuru cimŋe namazana manna, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, ʋaakaisa kumaguta eŋgoro, nokunamambo paJerusarema.
Mambo akaʋuŋganidza sirveri paJerusarema, ikawanda ikaita samabge, nemisidari ikaita semiʋonde yaiʋa pamapani.
Mabiza aSoromoni aaiʋa nawo aibva Egipita; ʋateŋgesi ʋamambo ʋaindoatora’ko, ʋaciita mapoka‐mapoka, ɓoka rimŋe nerimŋe rinomuteŋgo waro.
Ŋgoro imŋe neimŋe, yaibva Egipita, yaiteŋgwa namashekeri esirveri anamazana matanhatu,
Ɀino mambo Soromoni wakaŋga aciɗa ʋakadzi ʋazhinji ʋatorwa pamŋe cete nomukunda waFarao, ʋakadzi ʋaʋaMoabi, naʋaAmoni, naʋaEdomi, naʋaZidoni, naʋaHiti;

ʋaiʋa ʋendudzi dzakaŋga dzanzi naJehova kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Musaenda pakati paʋo, naiʋo ŋgaʋarege kupinda pakati penyu; nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacatsausa mŋoyo yenyu mukazoteʋera ʋamŋari ʋaʋo; ɀino Soromoni wakanamatira iʋaʋo aciʋaɗa.
Wakaŋga anaʋakadzi ʋanamazana manomŋe, ʋakunda ʋamadzimambo, naʋaroŋgo ʋanamazana matatu; ʋakadzi ʋake ʋakatsausa mŋoyo wake.

Nokuti Soromoni wakati akwegura, ʋakadzi ʋake ʋakatsausa mŋoyo wake kuti ateʋere ʋamŋe ʋamŋari; mŋoyo wake hauna‐kuzoʋa wakarurama kwaɀo kunaJehova Mŋari wake, seɀakaŋga ɀakaita mŋoyo waDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake.
Nokuti Soromoni wakateʋera Ashtoreti, mŋarikadzi waʋaZidoni, naMirkomi
Naiɀoɀo Soromoni wakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, haana‐kuteʋera Jehova kwaɀo, seɀakaita Davidi ɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino Soromoni akaʋakira Kemoshi,
Saiɀoɀo akaitira ʋo ʋakadzi ʋake ʋose ʋatorwa, ʋaipisira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo ɀinonhuwira nokuʋaɓayira.
Ɀino Jehova akatsamŋira Soromoni, nokuti mŋoyo wake wakatsauka kunaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, iye wakaŋga aɀiratidza kaʋiri kwaari,
akamuraira pamsoro pecinhu ici, kuti arege kuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari; asi haana‐kuita iɀo ɀaakaŋga arairwa naMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova akati kunaSoromoni: Ɀawaita iɀoɀi, ukasaceŋgeta suŋgano yaŋgu nemitemo yaŋgu, yandakakuraira, ɀirokwaɀo ndicabvarura ʋushe bgako, ndibgubvise kwauri, ndibgupe muranda wako.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handiŋgaɀiiti pamazuʋa ako nokuɗa kwaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋako; asi ndicabgubvarura, ndikabgubvisa paruʋoko rwomŋanakomana wako.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handiŋgabgubvaruri ndikabgubvisa bgose, asi ndicapa mŋanakomana wako rudzi rumŋe nokuɗa kwaDavidi muranda waŋgu, ʋuye nokuɗa kweJerusarema, iro guta randakatsaura.
Ɀino Jehova akamutsira Soromoni Hadadi muEdomi, kuti arwe naye; iye wakaŋga ari worudzi rwamambo paEdomi.
Nokuti paŋguʋa iya Davidi ari paEdomi, Joabi mukuru wehondo wakati akwira kundoʋiga ʋakaŋga ʋaʋurawa, apedza kuʋuraya ʋarume ʋose paEdomi;
(nokuti Joabi naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakagara’po mŋedzi mitanhatu, kuȿikira aparadza ʋarume ʋose paEdomi;)
Hadadi akatiza, akaenda Egipita, iye naʋamŋe ʋaEdomi pakati paʋaranda ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, iye Hadadi aciri mŋana muɗuku.
Iʋo ʋakasimuka, ʋakabva Midiani, ʋakaȿika Parani; ʋakatora ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋeParani, ʋakaenda Egipita kunaFarao mambo weEgipita; iye akamupa imba, akaraira kuti apiwe ɀokudya, akamupa ʋo nyika pokugara.
Hadadi akazofarirwa kwaɀo naFarao; naiɀoɀo akamupa muramu wake, munuŋuna waʋahosi ʋake Tapenesi, aʋe mukadzi wake.
Munuŋuna waTapenesi akamuɓerekera mŋanakomana wake Genubati, wakarumurwa naTapenesi mumba maFarao; Genubati akagara mumba maFarao, pakati paʋanakomana ʋaFarao.
Ɀino Hadadi wakati acinzwa paEgipita, kuti Davidi waʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋuye kuti Joabi mukuru wehondo wafa, Hadadi akati kunaFarao: Regai ndiende haŋgu kunyika yaŋgu.
Farao akati kwaari: Washaiweiko kwandiri, ɀowoɗakudzokera kunyika yako? Akapindura, akati: Handina‐kushaiwa cinhu; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndiregei henyu ndiende.
Ɀino Jehova akamumutsira ɀe mumŋe kuzorwa naye, Rezoni mŋanakomana waEriada, wakaŋga atiza kunashe wake Hadadezeri mambo weZoba;
akaʋuŋganidzira ʋanhu kwaari, akaʋa mukuru wehondo paŋguʋa Davidi yaakaʋuraya ʋeZoba; ʋakaenda Damasko, ʋakagara’po, ʋakaɓata ʋushe paDamasko.
Iye akarwa naIsraeri mazuʋa ose aSoromoni, ɀimŋe ɀakashata ɀakaitwa naHadadi ɀisiŋgarebgi; iye akaʋeŋga ʋaIsraeri, akaɓata ʋushe paSiria.
Jeroboami ʋo, mŋanakomana waNebati, muEfraimi weZereda, muranda waSoromoni, zita ramai ʋake rainzi Zerua, yaiʋa cirikadzi, wakamukira ʋo mambo.
Iye wakamukira mambo nemhaka yokuti Soromoni wakaŋga aʋaka Miro, akagadzira pakaŋga pakaputsika paguta raDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake.
Ɀino murume uyu Jeroboami wakaŋga ari murume wesimba noʋumhare, Soromoni akaʋona kuti jaya iro raiɓata kwaɀo, akamuita mutariri wamaɓasa ose eimba yaJosefa.
Ɀino paŋguʋa iyo Jeroboami wakati aciɓuɗa Jerusarema, muprofita Ahija muShiro akasoŋgana naye panzira; ɀino Ahija wakaŋga akafuka ŋguʋo itȿa; iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋoga kusaŋgo.
Ahija akaɓata ŋguʋo itȿa yaakafuka, akaibvaruranya akaita mapande anegumi namaʋiri.
Akati kunaJeroboami: Ciɀitorera mapande anegumi, nokuti ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarira, ndinobvarura ʋushe, ndibgubvise kunaSoromoni, ndikupe marudzi anegumi.
(Asi iye ucaʋa norudzi rumŋe nokuɗa kwaDavidi muranda waŋgu, ʋuye nokuɗa kweJerusarema, guta randakatsaura kumarudzi ose aIsraeri;)

nokuti ʋakandirasha, ʋakanamata kunaAshtoreti mŋarikadzi waʋaZidoni, naKemoshi mŋari waʋaMoabi, naMirkomi mŋari waʋana ʋaAmoni; haʋana kufamba panzira dzaŋgu, nokuita ɀakarurama pamberi paŋgu, nokuceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu neɀandakatoŋga, seɀakaita Davidi ɓaɓa ʋake.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handiŋgabvisi ʋushe bgose paruʋoko rwake, asi ndicamuita mucinda mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake nokuɗa kwaDavidi muranda waŋgu, wandakatsaura; nokuti wakaceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu neɀandakatema.
Asi ndicabvisa ʋumambo kumŋanakomana wake, ndibgupe iwe, iwo marudzi anegumi.
Asi mŋanakomana wake ndicamupa rudzi rumŋe, kuti Davidi muranda waŋgu aʋe nomŋenje ŋguʋa dzose pamberi paŋgu paJerusarema, iro guta randakaɀitsaurira, ndiise zita raŋgu’po.
Ndicakutora iwe, ugoɓata ʋushe seɀinoɗa mŋoyo wako, ugoʋa mambo waIsraeri.

Kana ukaterera ɀose ɀandinokuraira, ukafamba munzira dzaŋgu, ukaita ɀakarurama pamberi paŋgu, ukaceŋgeta ɀandatema nemirairo yaŋgu, seɀakaita Davidi muranda waŋgu, ini ndicaʋa newe, ndicakuʋakira imba yakasimba, seɀandakaʋakira Davidi, ndigokupa Israeri.
Nokuti nemhaka iyi ndicatambudza ʋana ʋaDavidi, asi handiŋgaɀiiti nokusiŋgaperi.
Naiɀoɀo Soromoni akatȿaka kuʋuraya Jeroboami; asi Jeroboami wakasimuka, akatizira Egipita kunaShishaki mambo weEgipita, akagara’po paEgipita kuȿikira pakufa kwaSoromoni.
Ɀino mamŋe mashoko aSoromoni, neɀose ɀaakaita, nokuŋgwara kwake, haɀina‐kunyorwa here pabuku yamaɓasa aSoromoni?
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakaɓata Soromoni ʋaIsraeri ʋose paJerusarema aiʋa makore makumi manna.
Ipapo Soromoni akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa muguta raDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, Rehoboami mŋanakomana wake akazomuteʋera pakuɓata ʋushe.
Ɀino Rehoboami wakaenda Shekemi, nokuti ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana paShekemi kuzomuita mambo.
Ɀino Jeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, wakati aciɀinzwa, (nokuti wakaŋga aciri Egipita kwaakaŋga atizira nokuɗa kwaSoromoni, Jeroboami akagara Egipita,
ʋakatuma nhume kundomuɗana;) Jeroboami neʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri ʋakaȿika ʋakataura naRehoboami, ʋakati:
Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakatitakudza joko rinogozha; naiɀoɀo ɀino imi cirerusai ɓasa raɓaɓa ʋenyu rakaŋga ricigozha; nejoko raʋo rinorema raʋakaisa pamsoro peɗu, tigokushumirai.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Cimboendai henyu, mugare mazuʋa matatu, mugodzokera kwandiri. Ʋanhu ʋakaenda.
Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akaraŋgana naʋakuru, ʋaimira pamberi paSoromoni ɓaɓa ʋake, ʋaciri ʋapenyu, akati: Muŋgandipa zano reiko, randiŋgapindura ʋanhu aʋa naro?
Iʋo ʋakataura kwaari, ʋakati: Kana mukatenda kuʋa muranda waʋanhu aʋa nhasi, mukaʋashumira, mukaʋapindura nokutaura mashoko akanaka kwaʋari, ipapo ʋacaʋa ʋaranda ʋenyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi iye wakaramba zano raʋakuru, raʋakaŋga ʋamupa, akaraŋgana namajaya ezero rake, aimira pamberi pake.
Akati kwaʋari: Imi muŋgandipa zano reiko, ratiŋgapindura naro ʋanhu aʋa ʋakataura neni, ʋaciti: Rerusai joko rakaiswa pamsoro peɗu naɓaɓa ʋenyu?

Ɀino majaya ezero rake akataura kwaari, aciti: Iti kuʋanhu aʋa ʋakataura newe, ʋaciti: Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakatitakudza joko rinogozha, asi imi citirerusirai iro, utaure kwaʋari, uti: Munwe waŋgu muɗuku mukobvu kupfuʋura ciʋuno caɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ɀino, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ɀaʋakakutakudzai joko rinorema, ini ndicawedzera pajoko renyu; ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaikuroʋai neshamhu; asi ini ndicakuroʋai neɀinyaʋaɗa.
Naiɀoɀo Jeroboami naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaȿika kunaRehoboami nomusi wetatu, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa namambo, aciti: Dzokerai kwandiri ɀe nomusi wetatu.
Mambo akapindura ʋanhu nehasha, akarasha zano raʋakuru, raʋakaŋga ʋamupa;
akataura kwaʋari seɀaakaŋga apiwa zano namajaya, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakakutakudzai joko rinorema, asi ini ndicawedzera pajoko renyu; ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaikuroʋai neshamhu, asi ini ndicakuroʋai neɀinyaʋaɗa.
Naiɀoɀo mambo haana‐kuterera ʋanhu; nokuti cinhu ico cakaŋga cabva kunaJehova, kuti Jehova asimbise shoko rake, raakataura naAhija muShiro kunaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati.

Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti mambo haana‐kuʋaterera, ʋanhu ʋakapindura mambo ʋakati: Tinomugoʋe weiko kunaDavidi? Ʋuye hatinenhaka kumŋanakomana waJese; endai kumatente enyu, ʋaIsraeri; iwe Davidi, citarira hako imba yako; naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakaenda kumatente aʋo.
Asi kana ʋari ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumaguta aJuda, Rehoboami wakaŋga ari mambo waʋo.
Ɀino mambo Rehoboami akatuma Adorami mutariri waʋanhu ʋecibaro, ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakamutaka namabge, akafa. Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akakurumidza kukwira ŋgoro yake, akatizira Jerusarema.
Saiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakamukira imba yaDavidi kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti Jeroboami wadzoka, ʋakatuma nhume kuzomuɗanira kuʋuŋgano, ʋakamuita mambo waʋaIsraeri ʋose; hakuna‐wakateʋera imba yaDavidi, asi rudzi rwaJuda ɓedzi.

Ɀino Rehoboami wakati aciȿika Jerusarema, akaʋuŋganidza ʋose ʋeimba yaJuda, noʋorudzi rwaBenjamini, ʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀinezana namakumi masere, ʋaigona kurwa, kuzorwa neimba yaIsraeri, kuti ʋadzosere ʋushe ɀe kunaRehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni.
Asi shoko raMŋari rakaȿika kunaShemaya munhu waMŋari, riciti:
Taura naRehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni, mambo waʋaJuda, nokuimba yose yaJuda neyaBenjamini, nokunaʋamŋe ʋanhu, uti:

Ɀanzi naJehova: Hamufaniri kukwira kundorwa nehama dzenyu iʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri; mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake, nokuti cinhu ici cinobva kwandiri. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaterera shoko raJehova, ʋakadzoka, ʋakaenda haʋo, seɀaʋakaʋudzwa naJehova.
Ipapo Jeroboami wakaʋaka Shekemi panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, akagara’mo; akabva’po, akandoʋaka Penueri.
Jeroboami akati mumŋoyo make: Ɀino ʋushe bgucadzokera ɀe kuimba yaDavidi.

Kana ʋanhu aʋa ʋakakwira kundoɓayira ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo mumba maJehova paJerusarema, ipapo mŋoyo yaʋanhu aʋa icadzokera kunashe waʋo, iye Rehoboami mambo waJuda; ʋacandiʋuraya, ʋakadzokera kunaRehoboami mambo waJuda.
Naiɀoɀo mambo akaraŋgana
Akagadza imŋe paBeteri, imŋe akaiisa paDani.
Cinhu ici cikaʋa ciʋi, nokuti ʋanhu ʋakandonamata kwadziri idzo mbiri, kuȿikira paDani.
Akaʋaka ʋo dzimba pamatunhu akakwirira, akatora ʋamŋe pakati paʋanhu akaʋaita ʋaprista, ʋasati ʋari ʋaʋana ʋaRevi.

Ɀino Jeroboami akaraira mutambo pamŋedzi worusere, nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi, wakaŋga wakafanana nomutambo waiʋa kuʋaJuda; akaɓayira paartari; akaita ʋo saiɀoɀo paBeteri, akaɓayira mhuru dzaakaʋumba; akagadza ʋo paBeteri ʋaprista ʋamatunhu akakwirira aakaita.

Akandoɓayira paartari yaakaʋaka paBeteri nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi worusere, iwo mŋedzi waakafuŋga hake mumŋoyo make; akaraira ʋana ʋaIsraeri mutambo, akandoɓayira paartari, akapisa ɀinonhuwira.
Ɀino tarira, mumŋe munhu waMŋari wakaŋga arairwa neshoko raJehova, wakabva kwaJuda, akaȿika Beteri; Jeroboami wakaŋga amire paartari acipisa ɀinonhuwira.

Iye akaɗanidzira kuartari, neshoko raJehova, akati: Iwe artari, artari, ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, imba yaDavidi icaponerwa mŋanakomana, ucanzi Josia; iye ucaɓaya pamsoro pako ʋaprista ʋamatunhu akakwirira, ʋanopisira ɀinonhuwira pamsoro pako, ʋuye ʋacapisa mafupa aʋanhu pamsoro pako.
Akaʋapa ciratidzo nezuʋa iro, akati: Ndico ciratidzo cakataurwa naJehova: Tarirai, artari icapamuka, namaɗota ari pamsoro payo acarashirwa pasi.

Ɀino mambo wakati acinzwa shoko romunhu waMŋari, raakaɗanidzira kuartari paBeteri, Jeroboami akasimudza ruʋoko rwake paartari, akatendeka narwo, akati: Muɓatei! Ipapo ruʋoko rwake rwaakaŋga amutendeka narwo rwakawoma, akasagona kurudzosa ɀe.
Artari ʋo yakapamuka, namaɗota akarashirwa pasi paartari, ciratidzo cakaŋga capiwa nomunhu waMŋari cikaitika, ico cakaŋga carairwa naJehova.

Ipapo mambo akapindura, akati kumunhu waMŋari: Kumbira hako kunaJehova Mŋari wako andinzwire nyasha, undinyeŋgeterere, kuti ndiporeserwe ɀe ruʋoko rwaŋgu. Munhu waMŋari akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, mambo akaporeserwa ɀe ruʋoko rwake, rukaita sakare.
Ipapo mambo akati kumunhu waMŋari: Enda neni kumba kwaŋgu, uɀisimbise’po, ini ndikupe ʋo muɓairo.
Asi munhu waMŋari wakati kunamambo: Kunyaŋge mukandiganhurira imba yenyu napakati, handiŋgapindi kwamuri, kunyaŋge kudya ɀokudya, kana kunwa pano;
nokuti Jehova wakandiraira neshoko rake, akati: Usadya ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura, kana kudzoka nenzira yawaenda nayo.
Naiɀoɀo akadzoka neimŋe nzira, haana‐kudzoka nenzira yaakaŋga aenda nayo Beteri.
Ɀino paBeteri pakaŋga pagere muprofita mutana; mŋanakomana wake akandomuʋudza maɓasa ose akaitwa nomunhu waMŋari paBeteri pazuʋa iro; namashoko aakataura kunamambo, naiwo ʋakaʋudza ʋo ɓaɓa ʋaʋo.
Ipapo ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋakati kwaʋari: Waenda nenzira ipiko? Ɀino ʋana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaʋona nzira yaendwa nayo nomunhu waMŋari wokwaJuda.
Akati kuʋanakomana ʋake: Ndisuŋgirei cigaro pamboŋgoro; iʋo ʋakamusuŋgirira cigaro pamboŋgoro, akaitasa.
Akateʋera munhu waMŋari, akamuwana agere pasi pomuti womuouki, ndokuti kwaari: Ndiwe munhu waMŋari wakabva kwaJuda here? Akati: Ndini.
Ipapo akati kwaari: Hendei kumba kwaŋgu, undodya ɀokudya.
Iye akati: Handiŋgagoni kudzoka nemi, kana kupinda kwamuri, handiŋgadyi ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura nemi pano;
nokuti ndakarairwa neshoko raJehova, akati: Usadya ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura’po, kana kudzoka nenzira yawaenda nayo.
Ipapo akati kwaari: Neni ʋo ndiri muprofita sewe; ɀino mutumŋa wakandiʋudza shoko raJehova, akati: Dzoka naye kumba kwako, adye ɀokudya nokunwa mvura. Akareʋa nhema kwaari.
Naiɀoɀo akadzoka naye, akandodya ɀokudya mumba make nokunwa mvura.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋagere patafura, shoko raJehova rikaȿika kumuprofita wakamudzosa,
akaɗanidzira kumunhu waMŋari, wakaŋga abva kwaJuda, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀausina‐kuterera muromo waJehova, ukasaceŋgeta murairo wawakarairwa naJehova Mŋari wako,
ukadzoka, ukadya ɀokudya, ukanwa mvura ipapo paakati kwauri: Usadya ɀokudya nokunwa mvura, naiɀoɀo citunha cako haciŋgaȿiki mubgiro bgamadziɓaɓa ako.
Ɀino wakati adya ɀokudya, nokunwa, akamusuŋgirira cigaro pamboŋgoro, iye muprofita waakadzosa.
Ɀino wakati aenda, shumba ikasoŋgana naye munzira, ikamuʋuraya, citunha cake cikakandirwa munzira, mboŋgoro ikamira naco, ʋuye shumba ʋo ikamira pacitunha.
Ɀino ʋonei, ʋanhu ʋakapfuʋura napo, ʋakaʋona citunha cakakandirwa munzira, ʋuye shumba imire pacitunha; ʋakaenda, ʋakandoɀiʋudza ʋanhu muguta, makaŋga mugere muprofita mutana.

Ɀino muprofita, wakamudzosa panzira, wakati aciɀinzwa, akati: Ndiye munhu waMŋari usina‐kuterera muromo waJehova; naiɀoɀo Jehova wakamukweʋerera pashumba, ikamubvambura, ikamuʋuraya, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova raakataura kwaari.
Akati kuʋanakomana ʋake: Ndisuŋgirirei cigaro pamboŋgoro, ʋakaisuŋgira cigaro.
Akaenda, akandowana citunha cake cakakandirwa munzira, ʋuye mboŋgoro neshumba ɀimire pacitunha; shumba yakaŋga isina‐kudya citunha kana kubvambura mboŋgoro.
Ipapo muprofita akasimudza citunha comunhu waMŋari, akaciisa pamsoro pemboŋgoro, akadzoka naco; akaȿika kuguta romuprofita mutana, akamucema nokumuʋiga.
Akaisa citunha cake mubgiro bgake; ʋakamucema,
Ɀino wakati amuʋiga, akataura naʋanakomana ʋake, akati: Kana ndafa, mundiʋige mubgiro makaʋigwa munhu waMŋari; muise mafupa aŋgu kurutiʋi rwamafupa ake;
nokuti iɀo ɀaakataura, paakaɗanidzira acirairwa naJehova, kuartari paBeteri, nokudzimba dzose dzamatunhu akakwirira, ari pamaguta eSamaria, ɀicaitika ɀirokwaɀo.

Pashure pecinhu ici Jeroboami haana‐kutendeʋuka panzira yake yakaipa, asi wakatsaura ɀe ʋamŋe pakati paʋanhu ʋose, akaʋaita ʋaprista pamatunhu akakwirira; aninani waaiɗa, waimugadza, akaʋaita ʋaprista pamatunhu akakwirira.
Cinhu ici cikaʋa ciʋi paimba yaJeroboami, kuti iparadzwe nokupedzwa panyika.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Abija mŋanakomana waJeroboami akarwara.

Jeroboami akati kumukadzi wake: Simuka hako, ushandure ŋguʋo dzako, kuti urege kuzikanwa kuti ndiwe mukadzi waJeroboami, ugoenda Shiro; tarira, muprofita Ahija uri’po, iye wakaɗeya kutaura pamsoro paŋgu, kuti ndizoʋa mambo waʋanhu aʋa.
Uende neɀiŋgwa ɀinegumi, neɀiŋgwa ɀiɗuku, necitende coʋuci, uɀiise kwaari; iye ucakuʋudza ɀicaitirwa mŋana.
Mukadzi waJeroboami akaita saiɀoɀo, akasimuka, akaenda Shiro, akaȿika paimba yaAhija. Ɀino Ahija wakaŋga asiŋgagoni kuʋona, nokuti meso ake akaŋga oʋonera madzerere nemhaka yokukwegura kwake.

Ɀino Jehova akati kunaAhija: Tarira, mukadzi waJeroboami unoʋuya kuzokubvunza pamsoro pomŋanakomana wake, nokuti unorwara; unofanira kutaura ɀokuti neɀokuti kwaari, nokuti kana acipinda, ucaɀiita somumŋe mukadzi.
Ɀino Ahija wakati acinzwa kufamba kwetsoka dzake, acipinda pamukoʋa, akati: Cipinda hako, iwe mukadzi waJeroboami, unoɀiitireiko somumŋe? Nokuti ndatumŋa kwauri namashoko anorwadza mŋoyo.
Enda, uʋudze Jeroboami, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakakukudza pakati paʋanhu, ndikakuita mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri,

ndikabvarura ʋushe, ndikabgubvisa paimba yaDavidi, ndikabgupa iwe; asi iwe hauna‐kuʋa saDavidi muranda waŋgu, waiceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu, akanditeʋera nomŋoyo wake wose, aciita ɀakanaka ɀoga pameso aŋgu;
asi iwe wakaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura ʋose ʋakakutaŋgira, ukandoɀiitira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari nemifananidzo yakaʋumbga, kuti unditsamŋise; ukandirashira shure kwomusana wako.

Naiɀoɀo, tarira, ndicaitira imba yaJeroboami ɀakaipa; ndicaparadza kunaJeroboami ʋana ʋakomana ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru kuʋaIsraeri, nditȿaire cose imba yaJeroboami, somunhu unotȿaira marara kuȿikira abva ose.
Aninani weimba yaJeroboami unofira paguta ucadyiwa nembga; unofira kusaŋgo ucadyiwa neshiri dzokuɗeŋga; nokuti Jehova wakataura saiɀoɀo.
Naiɀoɀo iwe, simuka uende kumba kwako; kana tsoka dzako dzicipinda paguta, mŋana ucafa.
ƲaIsraeri ʋose ʋacamucema, ʋakamuʋiga; nokuti ndiye woga waJeroboami ucaȿika pabgiro, nokuti maari makawanikwa cinhu cakanaka cakafadza Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, paimba yaJeroboami.
Jehova ucaɀimutsira ʋo mambo kuʋaIsraeri, ucaparadza imba yaJeroboami nomusi uyo. Nomusi uyo here? Ɀotoitwa ɀino.

Nokuti Jehova ucaroʋa Israeri, sorutsaŋga runozunuŋguswa mumvura; ucadzura Israeri panyika ino yakanaka, yaakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo, nokuʋaparadzira mhiri kwoRwizi; nokuti ʋakaɀiitira matanda okunamata nawo ʋakatsamŋisa Jehova.
Ucaisa Israeri
Ɀino mukadzi waJeroboami akasimuka, akaenda, akaȿika Tirza; wakati aciȿika pacikumbaridzo ceimba, mŋana akafa.
ƲaIsraeri ʋose ʋakamuʋiga, ʋakamucema, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova nomuromo womuranda wake muprofita Ahija.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJeroboami, kurwa kwake, nokuɓata kwake ʋushe, tarirai ɀakanyorwa pabuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri.
Mazuʋa okuɓata ʋushe kwaJeroboami akaŋga ari makore makumi maʋiri namaʋiri; akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, Nadabi mŋanakomana wake, akamuteʋera paʋushe.

Ɀino Rehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni, wakaɓata ʋushe bgaJuda. Rehoboami wakaŋga anamakore makumi manna nerimŋe pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, akaɓata ʋushe makore anegumi namanomŋe paJerusarema, iro guta rakaŋga ratsaurwa naJehova pakati pamarudzi ose aIsraeri, kuti aise zita rake’po. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Naama muAmoni.
ƲaJuda ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ʋakamutsa shuŋgu dzake neɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciita, ʋakapfuʋura ɀose ɀakaitwa namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Nokuti naiʋo ʋakaɀiʋakira matunhu akakwirira, neshoŋgwe, namatanda okunamata nawo paɀikomo ɀose ɀakakwirira, napasi pemiti yose mitema.
Ʋasodomi ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋo panyika; iʋo ʋakaita nemitoʋo yokunyaŋgadza kwose kwendudzi dzakaŋga dzadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino pagore recishanu ramambo Rehoboami, Shishaki mambo weEgipita akakwira kuzorwa naJerusarema;
akatora fuma yeimba yaJehova, nefuma yeimba yamambo; akaɀitora ɀose, akatora ʋo nhoʋo ɗuku dzose dzendarama dzakaŋga dzaitwa naSoromoni.
Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akaita panɀimbo yadzo nhoʋo ɗuku dzendarira, akadziisa pamaʋoko aʋakuru ʋaʋarindi, ʋairinda mukoʋa weimba yamambo.
Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana mambo acipinda mumba maJehova, ʋarindi ʋaidziɓata, ndokudzidzosera ɀe mumba maʋarindi.
Mamŋe maɓasa aRehoboami, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here pabuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda.
Asi kurwa kwaiʋa’po ŋguʋa dzose pakati paRehoboami naJeroboami.
Rehoboami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Naama muAmoni. Abijami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino negore regumi namasere ramambo Jeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, Abijami wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaJuda.
Akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore matatu; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Maaka, mukunda waAbisharomi.
Iye akafamba paɀiʋi ɀose ɀaɓaɓa ʋake, ɀaʋakamutaŋgira kuita; mŋoyo wake wakaŋga usina‐kururama kwaɀo kunaJehova Mŋari wake, somŋoyo waDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro nokuɗa kwaDavidi, Jehova Mŋari wake akamupa mŋenje paJerusarema, akamumutsira mŋanakomana wake shure kwake, asimbise Jerusarema;
nokuti Davidi waiita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, haana‐kutsauka pacinhu cimŋe caakamuraira mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake, asi pamhaka yaUria muHiti ɓedzi.
Kurwa kwakaŋga kuri’po pakati paRehoboami naJeroboami mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAbijami, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda? Kurwa kwakaŋga kuri’po pakati paAbijami naJeroboami.
Abijami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga muguta raDavidi; Asa mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore ramakumi maʋiri raJeroboami mambo waIsraeri, Asa wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe paJuda.
Akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi manna nerimŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Maaka mukunda waAbisharomi.
Asa akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita Davidi ɓaɓa ʋake.
Akabvisa ʋasodomi panyika, akabvisa ʋo ɀifananidzo ɀose ɀakaitwa namadziɓaɓa ake.
Akabvisa ʋo Maaka mai ʋake paʋuhosi bgaʋo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaitira matanda okunamata nawo cifananidzo cinonyaŋgadza; Asa akaparadza cifananidzo caʋo, akacipisa parukoʋa Kidroni.
Asi matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mŋoyo waAsa wakaŋga wakarurama kwaɀo kunaJehova mazuʋa ake ose.
Akaisa mumba maJehova nhumbi dzakaŋga dzatsaurwa naɓaɓa ʋake, nenhumbi dzaakaŋga atsaura iye amene, sirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo.
Ɀino kurwa kwakaŋga kuri’po pakati paAsa naBaasha mambo waIsraeri mazuʋa aʋo ose.
Baasha mambo waIsraeri akakwira kundorwa naJuda, akaʋaka Rama, kuti arege kutendera munhu kuɓuɗa kana kupinda kunaAsa mambo waJuda.

Ipapo Asa akatora sirveri yose nendarama ɀakaŋga ɀasara pafuma yeimba yaJehova, napafuma yeimba yamambo, akaɀipa mumaʋoko aʋaranda ʋake, mambo Asa akaɀitumira kunaBeni‐hadadi mŋanakomana waTabrimoni, mŋanakomana waHezioni, mambo weSiria wakaŋga agere Damasko, akati:
Suŋgano iri’po pakati paŋgu nemi, pakati paɓaɓa ʋaŋgu naɓaɓa ʋenyu; tarirai, ndinokutumirai cipo cesirveri nendarama, endai muputse suŋgano yenyu naBaasha mambo waIsraeri, abve kwandiri.
Beni‐hadadi akaterera mambo Asa, akatuma ʋakuru ʋehondo dzake kundorwa namaguta aIsraeri, akakunda Ijoni, neDani, neAberi‐beti‐maaka, neKineroti rose, nenyika yose yaNaftari.
Ɀino Baasha wakati aciɀinzwa, akarega kuʋaka Rama, akandogara Tirza.
Ipapo mambo Asa akakoka ʋaJuda ʋose, hakuna‐wakaɗarikwa, ʋakandotora mabge eRama, namatanda aro, ɀaakaŋga aciʋaka naɀo iye Baasha; mambo Asa akaʋaka naɀo Geba rokwaBenjamini neMizpa.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa ose aAsa, nesimba rake rose, neɀose ɀaakaita, namaguta aakaʋaka, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadziɓaɓa aJuda? Asi paŋguʋa yokukwegura kwake wakaŋga acinzwa makumbo.
Asa akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake paguta raDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake; Josafati mŋanakomana wake, akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino Nadabi mŋanakomana waJeroboami, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri negore recipiri raAsa mambo waJuda, akaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri makore maʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akafamba nenzira yaɓaɓa ʋake, nomuɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Ipapo Baasha mŋanakomana waAhija, weimba yaIsakari, akamumukira; Baasha akamuʋuraya paGibetoni raiʋa raʋaFiristia; nokuti Nadabi naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakomba Gibetoni.
Baasha akamuʋuraya negore retatu raAsa mambo waJuda, akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino wakati acaŋgogara ʋushe, akaʋuraya ʋose ʋeimba yaJeroboami; haana‐kusiyira Jeroboami mumŋe wakaŋga acafema, kuȿikira amuparadza, seɀaɀakarebga naJehova nomuromo womuranda wake Ahija muShiro;
nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami, ɀaakaita iye, neɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo, nokuɗa kwokutambudza kwaakatambudza Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri nako.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aNadabi, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Kurwa kwakaŋga kuri’po ŋguʋa dzose pakati paAsa naBaasha mambo waIsraeri.
Negore recitatu raAsa mambo waJuda, Baasha mŋanakomana waAhija, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaʋaIsraeri ʋose paTirza, akaɓata makore makumi maʋiri namanna.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akafamba nenzira yaJeroboami, nomuɀiʋi ɀake, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJehu mŋanakomana waHanani, pamsoro paBaasha, riciti:
Ndakakukudza ndikakubvisa paguruʋa, ndikakuita mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri; asi wakafamba nenzira yaJeroboami, ukatadzisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, ʋakamutsa shuŋgu dzaŋgu neɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Tarira, ndicabvisa Baasha neimba yake cose; ndicaita imba yako seɀandakaita imba yaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati.
Aninani weimba yaBaasha unofira muguta, ucadyiwa nembga; aninani unofira kusaŋgo, ucadyiwa neshiri dzokuɗeŋga.
Mamŋe maɓasa aBaasha, neɀaakaita, nesimba rake, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Baasha akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa paTirza, Era mŋanakomana wake, akamuteʋera paʋushe.

Shoko raJehova rikaʋuya ʋo nomuromo womuprofita Jehu mŋanakomana waHanani, pamsoro paBaasha, napamsoro peimba yake, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀose ɀaakaita pamberi paJehova, akamutsa shuŋgu dzake pamsoro pamaɓasa amaʋoko ake, akaŋga akafanana neeimba yaJeroboami, ʋuye nokuti wakaŋga amuparadza.
Negore ramakumi maʋiri namatanhatu raAsa mambo waJuda, Era mŋanakomana waBaasha, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paTirza, akaɓata makore maʋiri.
Ipapo muranda wake Zimri, mukuru wehafu yeŋgoro dzake, akamumukira; ɀino iye wakaŋga ari paTirza, acinwa aciɓatwa mumba maArza, mutariri weimba yake paTirza.
Zimri akapinda, akamuɓaya, akamuʋuraya negore ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe raAsa mambo waJuda, akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, acaŋgogara pacigaro cake coʋushe, akaʋuraya ʋose ʋeimba yaBaasha; haana‐kumusiyira mŋana mumŋe womukomana, kana mumŋe wehama dzake, kana mumŋe weshamŋari dzake.
Naiɀoɀo Zimri wakaparadza imba yose yaBaasha, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova, shoko iro raakataura pamsoro paBaasha nomuprofita Jehu,
nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀose ɀaBaasha, neɀiʋi ɀaEra mŋanakomana wake, ɀaʋakaita, neɀaʋakatadzisa Israeri naɀo, ʋakamutsa shuŋgu dzaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, neɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀisinamaturo.
Mamŋe maɓasa aEra, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Negore ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe raAsa mambo waJuda, Zimri akaɓata ʋushe paTirza mazuʋa manomŋe. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋari kumisasa, ʋaciɗa kurwa naʋaGibetoni raiʋa raʋaFiristia.
Ɀino ʋanhu, ʋakaŋga ʋari kumisasa, ʋakanzwa, ɀicinzi: Zimri wamukira mambo akamuʋuraya; naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋari kumisasa, ʋakagadza Omri, mukuru wehondo, aʋe mambo waIsraeri zuʋa iro.
Ipapo Omri akabva paGibetoni, akaenda naʋaIsraeri ʋose kuzokomba Tirza.
Ɀino Zimri wakati aciʋona kuti guta rakundwa, akapinda munhare paimba yamambo, akapisira imba yamambo pamsoro pake, akafa;
nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀake pakuita kwake ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, acifamba nenzira yaJeroboami, nomuɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakaita, acitadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Mamŋe maɓasa aZimri, nokumukira kwake mambo, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ʋakaparadzana, ʋakaita mapoka maʋiri; ʋamŋe ʋakateʋera Tibni mŋanakomana waGinati, ʋaciɗa kumuita mambo waʋo, asi ʋamŋe ʋakateʋera Omri.
Asi ʋanhu, ʋakateʋera Omri, ʋakakunda ʋanhu ʋakateʋera Tibni mŋanakomana waGinati; naiɀoɀo Tibni akafa, Omri akaɓata ʋushe.
Negore ramakumi matatu nerimŋe raAsa mambo waJuda, Omri akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri, akaɓata makore anegumi namaʋiri; akaɓata ʋushe paTirza makore matanhatu.
Akateŋga gomo reSamaria kunaShemeri namatarenta maʋiri esirveri,
Asi Omri wakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akapfuʋura ʋose ʋakamutaŋgira pakuita ɀakaipa.
Nokuti wakafamba nenzira yose yaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, nomuɀiʋi ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo, ʋakamutsa shuŋgu dzaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri neɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀakaŋga ɀisinamaturo.
Mamŋe maɓasa aOmri, aakaita, nesimba rakaʋonekwa kwaari, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Naiɀoɀo Omri akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa paSamaria, Ahabi mŋanakomana wake, akamuteʋera paʋushe.

Negore ramakumi matatu namasere raAsa mambo waJuda, Ahabi mŋanakomana waOmri wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri; Ahabi mŋanakomana waOmri akaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria makore anamakumi maʋiri namaʋiri.
Ahabi mŋanakomana waOmri akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akakunda ʋose ʋakamutaŋgira.
Cakaŋga ciri cinhu ciɗuku haco kwaari kufamba muɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, asi wakawana Izeberi mukunda waEti‐baari, mambo waʋaZidoni, akandoshumira Baari, akanamata kwaari.
Akaʋakira Baari artari muimba yaBaari, yaakaʋaka paSamaria.
Ahabi akaita ʋo matanda okunamata nawo, Ahabi akawedzera kumutsa shuŋgu dzaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, kupfuʋura madzimambo ose akamutaŋgira.

Pamazuʋa ake Hieri muBeteri akaʋaka Jeriko; akafirwa neɗaŋgwe rake, Abirami, ŋguʋa yaakaroŋga nheyo dzaro, ʋuye akafirwa nomŋanakomana wake worugotwe, Segubi, paŋguʋa yaakamisa masuʋo; seɀaɀakarebga naJehova nomuromo waJoshua mŋanakomana waNuni.
Ɀino Eria muTishbi, waigara Gireadi, wakati kunaAhabi: NaJehova mupenyu, Mŋari waIsraeri, iye wandimire pamberi pake, hapaŋgaʋi neɗoʋa kana mvura makore ano, asi kana ndareʋa ini.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwaari, riciti:
Cibva pano, uende kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, undoʋanda parukoʋa Keriti, ruri pamberi paJoridani.
Unofanira kunwa mvura yorukoʋa, ʋuye ndakaraira makuŋguʋu kukupa ɀokudya ipapo.
Naiɀoɀo akaenda, akaita seɀaakaʋudzwa naJehova; nokuti wakandogara parukoʋa Keriti ruri pamberi paJoridani.
Makuŋguʋu akamuʋigira ciŋgwa nenyama maŋgwanani, neciŋgwa nenyama maɗekwana; akanwa mvura yorukoʋa.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yapfuʋura rukoʋa rukapxa, nokuti mvura yakaŋga isiŋgani panyika.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwaari, riciti:
Simuka, uende Zarefati panyika yeZidoni, ugare’po; tarira, ndaraira cirikadzi igere’po, kuti ikupe ɀokudya.
Naiɀoɀo akasimuka, akaenda Zarefati; wakati aȿika pasuʋo reguta, akaʋona cirikadzi yakaŋga igere’po, iciʋuŋganidza ʋutsotso; akamuɗana, akati: Nditorere ʋo mvura shomanene mumukombe, ndinwe.
Ɀino wakati acienda kuzoitora, akamuɗana, akati: Ƌondiʋigira ʋo cimeɗu ceciŋgwa muruʋoko rwako.

Iye akati: NaJehova Mŋari wenyu mupenyu, handineciŋgwa, asi tsama imŋe yoʋupfu muɗende, namafuta mashomanene mucinu; tarirai, ndakaŋga ndiciʋuŋganidza ʋutsotso ʋuʋiri, ndiciti ndoenda ndiɀigadzirire ini nomŋanakomana waŋgu, tidye, tife heɗu.
Ipapo Eria akati kwaari: Usatya hako, enda undoita seɀandataura; asi cimbondiitira ini ciŋgwa ciɗuku, undiʋigire ico, ugoɀiitira iwe nomŋanakomana wako pashure.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ʋupfu bguri muɗende habguŋgaperi, namafuta ari mucinu haaŋgashaikwi, kuȿikira pazuʋa Jehova raacanisa naro mvura panyika.
Iye akaenda, akandoita seɀakataura Eria; iye mukadzi, naiye
Ʋupfu bgakaŋga bguri muɗende habguna‐kupera, namafuta akaŋga ari mucinu haana‐kushaikwa, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova nomuromo waEria.
Ɀino pashure paiɀoɀo mŋanakomana womukadzi, mŋene weimba, akarwara; kurwara kwake kukanyanya kwaɀo, kuȿikira apererwa nomŋeya.
Mukadzi akati kunaEria: Ndineiko nemi, imi munhu waMŋari? Makapinda mumba maŋgu kuti ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ɀiraŋgarirwe, ʋuye kuti mŋanakomana waŋgu aʋurawe here?
Akati kwaari: Ndipe mŋanakomana wako. Akamutora pacifuʋa comukadzi, akamutakurira kuimba yokumsoro, kwaaigara, akamuradzika panhoʋo dzake,
akaɗanidzira kunaJehova, akati: Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, makaitireiko cirikadzi yandigere nayo cakaipa cakaɗai, ɀamaʋuraya mŋanakomana wake?
Akatsiʋama pamsoro pomŋana katatu, akaɗanidzira kunaJehova, akati: Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, ndinokumbira, mŋeya womŋana uyu ŋgaudzokere ɀe kwaari.
Jehova akanzwa inzwi raEria, mŋeya womŋana ukadzokera ɀe kwaari, akararama ɀe.
Ipapo Eria akatora mŋana, akaɓuruka naye paimba yokumsoro, akamuisa mumba, akamupa mai ʋake. Eria akati: Tarira, mŋana wako mupenyu.
Mukadzi akati kunaEria: Ɀino ndinoziʋa kuti muri munhu waMŋari, ʋuye kuti shoko raJehova, riri mumuromo menyu, nderaɀokwaɗi.
Ɀino mazuʋa mazhinji akati apfuʋura, shoko raJehova rikaȿika kunaEria negore recitatu, riciti: Enda undoɀiratidza kunaAhabi; ndigotuma mvura panyika.
Ipapo Eria akandoɀiratidza kunaAhabi. Ɀino nzara yakaŋga yanyanya kwaɀo paSamaria.
Ahabi akaɗana Obadia, iye wakaŋga ari mutariri weimba yake. (Ɀino Obadia wakaŋga acitya Jehova kwaɀo;
nokuti neŋguʋa iyo Izeberi yaakaparadza nayo ʋaprofita ʋaJehova, Obadia wakatora ʋaprofita ʋanezana, akaʋaʋanza makumi mashanu namakumi mashanu ɀe muɓako, akaʋapa ciŋgwa nemvura.)
Ɀino Ahabi akati kunaObadia: Famba nenyika, kumatsime emvura, nokuhoʋa dzose; ɀimŋe tiŋgawana ɓundo, tiraramise mabiza namahesera, tirege kurashikirwa neɀipfuwo ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakagoʋana nyika, kuti ʋafambe nayo; Ahabi akaenda ari oga kunorumŋe rutiʋi, Obadia akaenda ʋo ari oga kunorumŋe rutiʋi.
Ɀino Obadia wakati ari panzira, Eria akasoŋgana naye; akamuziʋa, akawira pasi neciso cake, akati: Ndimi here, ishe waŋgu Eria?
Iye akamupindura, akati: Ndini; enda undoʋudza ishe wako, uti: Tarirai, Eria uri pano.
Iye akati: Ndatadzeiko, ɀamoɗa kuisa muranda wenyu mumaʋoko aAhabi, andiʋuraye?
NaJehova Mŋari wenyu mupenyu, hapanorudzi kana ʋushe kwaasina‐kutuma iye ishe waŋgu kukutȿakai; kana ʋakati: Haapo pano, waipikisa ʋushe ubgo kana rudzi urwo, kuti haʋana‐kukuwanai.
Ɀino moti: Enda undoʋudza ishe wako, uti: Eria uri pano.
Ɀimŋe ndicaŋgobva kwamuri, Mŋeya waJehova ndokukuisai kwandisiŋgaziʋi; ɀino kana ndikandoʋudza Ahabi, akakushaiwai, ucandiʋuraya; asi ini muranda wenyu ndinotya Jehova kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.

Ishe waŋgu haana‐kuʋudzwa here ɀandakaita paŋguʋa iya Izeberi yaakaʋuraya nayo ʋaprofita ʋaJehova, kuti ndakaʋanza ʋaprofita ʋaJehova ʋanezana, makumi mashanu namakumi mashanu muɓako, ndikaʋapa ɀiŋgwa nemvura?
Ɀino moti: Cindoʋudza ishe wako, uti: Eria uri pano; iye ucandiʋuraya.
Eria akati: NaJehova wehondo mupenyu, iye wandimire pamberi pake, ndicaɀiratidza kwaari nhasi ɀirokwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo Obadia akaenda kunaAhabi, akamuʋudza, Ahabi akandosoŋgana naEria.
Ɀino Ahabi wakati aciʋona Eria, Ahabi akati kwaari: Ndiwe here, iwe mutambudzi waIsraeri?
Iye akati: Ini handina‐kutambudza Israeri; asi ndiwe neimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, nokuti makasiya mirairo yaJehova, mukateʋera ʋaBaari.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino cituma ʋanhu uʋuŋganidze ʋaIsraeri ʋose pagomo reKarmeri, naʋaprofita ʋaBaari ʋanamazana manna namakumi mashanu, naʋaprofita ʋamatanda okunamata nawo ʋanamazana manna ʋanodya patafura yaIzeberi.
Naiɀoɀo Ahabi akatuma ʋanhu kuʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, akaʋuŋganidza ʋaprofita pagomo reKarmeri.

Ɀino Eria akasweɗera kuʋanhu ʋose, akati: Mucaramba mucifuŋga mifuŋgo miʋiri kuȿikira riniko? Kana Jehova ari Mŋari, mumuteʋere, kana ari Baari, mumuteʋere iye. Asi ʋanhu haʋana‐kupindura shoko rimŋe.
Ipapo Eria akati kuʋanhu: Ini, iyeni ndoga, ndini ndasara kuʋaprofita ʋaJehova, asi ʋaprofita ʋaBaari ʋanoȿika ʋarume ʋanamazana manna namakumi mashanu.

Naiɀoɀo ŋgaʋatipe nzombe mbiri, iʋo ʋaɀitsaurire nzombe imŋe, ʋaiguranye, ʋaiise pamsoro pehuni, asi ʋarege kuisa mŋoto pasi payo; neni ʋo ndicagadzira imŋe nzombe, ndiciiisa pamsoro pehuni, asi ndisiŋgaisi mŋoto pasi payo.
Ɀino imi muɗane zita ramŋari wenyu, ini ndiɗane ʋo zita raJehova; Mŋari unopindura nomŋoto, iye ŋgaaʋe Mŋari. Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Ɀarebga ɀakanaka.
Ipapo Eria akati kuʋaprofita ʋaBaari: Ciɀitsaurirai nzombe imŋe, mutaŋge kuigadzira, nokuti muri ʋazhinji; muɗane zita ramŋari wenyu, asi murege kuisa mŋoto pasi payo.

Iʋo ʋakatora nzombe yaʋakaŋga ʋapiwa, ʋakaigadzira, ʋakaɗana zita raBaari kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira masikati makuru, ʋaciti: Baari, tinzwei! Asi kwakaŋga kusinenzwi kana unopindura. Ʋakapoteredza artari yakaŋga yaʋakwa ʋacipembera.
Ɀino paŋguʋa yamasikati makuru Eria akaʋaseka, akati: Ƌanidzirai kwaɀo; nokuti mŋari, ɀimŋe uri pakufuŋga, ɀimŋe waenda kumŋe, ɀimŋe wafamba rwendo, kana ɀimŋe uʋete hake, unofanira kumutswa.
Ipapo ʋakaɗanidzira kwaɀo, ʋakaɀiceka netsika dzaʋo neminondo namapfumo, kuȿikira ropa ricidzutuka kwaʋari.
Masikati makuru akati apfuʋura, ʋakaprofita kuȿikira paŋguʋa yokuɓayira cipo
Ipapo Eria akati kuʋanhu ʋose: Sweɗerai kwandiri; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakasweɗera kwaari. Ɀino wakagadzira artari yaJehova yakaŋga yaputswa.
Eria akatora mabge anegumi namaʋiri akaenzana namarudzi aʋana ʋaJakobo, iye, wakaŋga aʋudzwa naJehova, ɀicinzi: Zita rako ricanzi Israeri.
Akaʋaka artari namabge iwayo nezita raJehova, akacera goroŋga rakakomba artari rakaŋga rakaenzana napaŋgadɀarwa ɀiyero ɀiʋiri
Akaroŋga huni, akaguranya nzombe, akaiisa pamsoro pehuni, akati: Cizadzai ɀiroŋgo ɀinna nemvura, muiɗire pamsoro pecipiriso cinopiswa, napamsoro pehuni.
Akati: Itai iɀoɀo rwecipiri, ʋakaɀiita rwecipiri. Akati: Itai iɀoɀo rwecitatu; ʋakaɀiita rwecitatu.
Mvura ikayerera, ikapoteredza artari; akazadza negoroŋga ʋo nemvura.
Neŋguʋa yokuɓayira cipo
Ndinzwei Jehova, ndinzwei, kuti ʋanhu aʋa ʋaziʋe kuti imi Jehova ndimi Mŋari, ʋuye kuti ndimi makadzosa ɀe mŋoyo yaʋo.
Ipapo mŋoto waJehova wakaɓuruka, ukapedza cipiriso cinopiswa, nehuni, namabge, neguruʋa, ukananɀa mvura yakaŋga iri mugoroŋga.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋakati: Jehova ndiye Mŋari, Jehova ndiye Mŋari!
Eria akati kwaʋari: Ƃatai ʋaprofita ʋaBaari, ʋarege kupukunyuka kunyaŋge nomumŋe waʋo. Ʋakaʋaɓata. Eria akaɓuruka naʋo kurukoʋa Kishoni, akaʋaʋurayira’po.
Eria akati kunaAhabi: Ciroŋgedzai, mudye, munwe, nokuti kunokuwuŋga kwemvura zhinji.
Naiɀoɀo Ahabi akaroŋgedza kundodya nokunwa. Eria akakwira pamsoro pegomo reKarmeri, akagwaɗamira pasi, akaisa ciso cake pakati pamabvi ake;
akati kumuranda wake: Cikwira ɀino, utarire kurutiʋi rweguŋgwa. Akakwira akatarira, akati: Hakunecinhu. Akati: Enda ɀe, kanomŋe.

Ɀino paŋguʋa yecinomŋe akati: Tarirai, kunegore ɗuku, rinokwira ricibva muguŋgwa, rakafanana necanza comunhu. Akati: Enda, undoti kunaAhabi: Suŋgai ŋgoro yenyu, muɓuruke, kuti murege kudziʋirirwa nemvura.
Ɀino ŋguʋa ɗuku yakati yapfuʋura, ɗeŋga rikaȿiɓa namakore nemhepo, mvura zhinji ikanaya. Ahabi akaenda neŋgoro, akaȿika Jezreeri.
Ruʋoko rwaJehova rukasimbisa Eria; akaɀisuŋga ciʋuno cake, akamhanya pamberi paAhabi kuȿikira pasuʋo reJezreeri.
Ɀino Ahabi wakaʋudza Izeberi ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitwa naEria, ɀokuʋuraya kwake ʋaprofita ʋose nomunondo.
Ipapo Izeberi akatuma nhume kunaEria, akati: Ʋamŋari ŋgaʋandiroʋe, ŋgaʋarambe ʋaciɗaro, kana ini ndikasafananidza ʋupenyu bgako noʋupenyu bgomumŋe waʋo maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona iɀoɀo, akasimuka, akatiza, kuti arege kuʋurawa, akaȿika paBeeri‐sheba raiʋa raJuda, akasiya muranda wake ipapo.

Asi iye wakafamba rwendo rwezuʋa rimŋe kurenje, akandogara pasi pomurara, akakumbira kuti afe hake; akati: Ɀariŋgana haɀo; ɀino Jehova, citorai henyu ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, nokuti handipfuʋuri madziɓaɓa aŋgu pakururama.
Akaʋata pasi, akaʋata hope pasi pomurara. Ɀino mutumŋa akamugunɀa, akati kwaari: Simuka, udye.
Akatarira, akaʋona pedyo nomusoro wake ciŋgwa ciɗuku cakaŋga cagocwa pamazimbe, neciroŋgo cemvura. Akadya, akanwa, akaʋata pasi ɀe.
Mutumŋa waJehova akaȿika ɀe rwecipiri, akamugunɀa, akati: Simuka, udye, nokuti ucakundwa norwendo.
Akasimuka, akadya, akanwa, akafamba asimbiswa neɀokudya iɀo, mazuʋa makumi manna noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna kuȿikira paHorebi, pagomo raMŋari.
Akapinda’po muɓako, akagara’po. Ɀino shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwaari, iye akati kwaari: Unoɓateiko pano Eria?

Iye akati: Ndakaŋga ndicishiŋgairira Jehova Mŋari wehondo kwaɀo, nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakarasha suŋgano yenyu, ʋakaputsa artari dzenyu, nokuʋuraya ʋaprofita ʋenyu nomunondo; ini, ini ndoga, ndasara haŋgu; ɀino ʋotȿaka kundiʋuraya.

Iye akati: Enda, undomira pagomo pamberi paJehova. Ɀino Jehova akapfuʋura’po, mhepo huru inesimba ikapamura makomo, ikaputsanya mabge pamberi paJehova; asi Jehova wakaŋga asiri mumhepo. Mhepo yakati yapfuʋura, kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika kukaʋa’po; asi Jehova wakaŋga asiri mukuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika.
Kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika kwakati kwapfuʋura, mŋoto ukateʋera; asi Jehova wakaŋga asiri mumŋoto; mŋoto wakati wapfuʋura, kufefetera kwokudzikama kukaʋa’po.
Ɀino Eria wakati aciɀinzwa, akafukidza ciso cake neŋguʋo yake, akaɓuɗa, akandomira pamuromo weɓako. Ipapo inzwi rikaȿika kwaari, rikati: Unoɓateiko pano, Eria?

Iye akati: Ndakaŋga ndicishiŋgairira Jehova Mŋari wehondo kwaɀo; nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakarasha suŋgano yenyu, ʋakaputsa artari dzenyu, ʋakaʋuraya ʋaprofita ʋenyu nomunondo; ini, ini ndoga, ndasara haŋgu; ɀino ʋotȿaka kundiʋuraya.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwaari: Dzoka nenzira yako yokurenje reDamasko; kana waȿika’po, uzodze Hazaeri, aʋe mambo weSiria,
naJehu mŋanakomana waNimshi umuzodze aʋe mambo waIsraeri, naErisha mŋanakomana waShafati weAberi‐mehora, umuzodze aʋe muprofita panɀimbo yako.
Nokuti unopukunyuka pamunondo waHazaeri, ucaʋurawa naJehu; unopukunyuka pamunondo waJehu, ucaʋurawa naErisha.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicasiya pakati paIsraeri ɀuru ɀinomŋe ɀaʋanhu ʋasina‐kufugamira Baari namabvi aʋo, ʋasina‐kumuȿeta nemiromo yaʋo.

Naiɀoɀo akabva’po, akandowana Erisha mŋanakomana waShafati, wakaŋga acirima nenzombe dzakasuŋgwa pamajoko anegumi namaʋiri, iye ari pajoko regumi namaʋiri; Eria akapfuʋura nokwaari, akakanda ŋguʋo yake pamsoro pake.
Iye akasiya nzombe, akamhanya aciteʋera Eria, akati: Nditenderei henyu ndimbondoȿeta ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu namai ʋaŋgu, ndigokuteʋerai. Iye akati kwaari: Cidzoka hako, nokuti ndakuiteiko?
Akadzoka pakumuteʋera, akatora nzombe dzejoko iro, akadziɓaya, akagoca nyama yadzo aciita nhumbi dzadzo huni, ndokupa ʋanhu, iʋo ʋakadya. Ɀino wakasimuka, akateʋera Eria, akamuɓatira.
Ɀino Beni‐hadadi, mambo weSiria, wakakoka hondo dzake dzose; iye waiʋa namadzimambo anamakumi matatu namaʋiri, namabiza, neŋgoro pamŋe cete naye; akaenda, akakomba Samaria, akarwa naro.
Akatuma nhume kunaAhabi, mambo waIsraeri, mukati meguta, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naBeni‐hadadi:
Sirveri yako nendarama yako ndeɀaŋgu, naʋakadzi ʋako naʋana ʋako ʋakanaka ndaʋaŋgu.
Mambo waIsraeri akapindura, akati: Ndiɀo haɀo ɀamareʋa, ishe waŋgu mambo; ndiri wenyu, neɀose ɀandinaɀo.
Nhume dzikadzoka, dzikati: Ɀanzi naBeni‐hadadi: Ndakatuma shoko kwauri, ndikati: Unofanira kundipa sirveri yako nendarama yako, naʋakadzi ʋako naʋana ʋako;
asi ndicatuma ʋaranda ʋaŋgu kwauri maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino; iʋo ʋacanɀera imba yako, nedzimba dzaʋaranda ʋako; ɀino, ɀose ɀinofadza meso ako ʋacaɀitora namaʋoko aʋo, ndokuenda naɀo.

Ipapo mambo waIsraeri wakaɗana ʋakuru ʋose ʋenyika, akati: Cerekedzai, muʋone, kuti munhu uyu unotȿaka kutiitira ɀakaipa; nokuti wakatuma shoko kwandiri, aciti ucatora ʋakadzi ʋaŋgu naʋana ʋaŋgu, nesirveri yaŋgu nendarama yaŋgu, ndikasamurambira cinhu.
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakati kwaari: Regai kumuterera, kana kumutenda.

Naiɀoɀo akati kunhume dzaBeni‐hadadi: Ʋudzai ishe waŋgu mambo, muti: Ɀose ɀamakaziʋisa muranda wenyu pakutaŋga, ndicaɀiita; asi cinhu ici handiŋgagoni kuciita. Nhume dzikaenda, dzikadzokera kwaari nemhinduro.
Ipapo Beni‐hadadi akatuma shoko kwaari, akati: Ʋamŋari ŋgaʋandiroʋe, ʋarambe ʋaciɗaro, kana guruʋa reSamaria rikagona kuriŋgana kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋanonditeʋera ʋatsamure tsama namaʋoko aʋo.
Mambo waIsraeri akapindura, akati: Muʋudzei muti: Unoshoŋga nhumbi dzake dzokurwa ŋgaarege kuɀirumbidza saiye wodzibvisa.
Ɀino iye wakati acinzwa shoko iro ari pakunwa, iye namadzimambo, pamisasa, akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Roŋgedzai! Iʋo ʋakaroŋgedza kundorwa neguta.
Ɀino mumŋe muprofita akasweɗera kunaAhabi mambo waIsraeri, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Waʋona ʋanhu aʋa ʋazhinji here? Tarira, ndicaʋapa mumaʋoko ako nhasi, ugoziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ahabi akati: Naniko? Iye akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Namajaya amacinda amatiʋi enyika. Iye akati: Ndianiko unofanira kuʋamba kurwa? Akapindura, akati: Iwe!
Ipapo akaʋereŋga majaya amacinda amatiʋi enyika, ʋakaȿika mazana maʋiri namakumi matatu namaʋiri; ɀino akaʋereŋga ʋanhu ʋose, iʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinomŋe.
Ʋakasimuka masikati makuru. Ɀino Beni‐hadadi wakaŋga ari pakunwa pamisasa, akaɓatwa, iye namadzimambo, iwo madzimambo makumi matatu namaʋiri akaŋga acimuɓatsira.
Ɀino majaya amacinda amatiʋi enyika akataŋga kutuŋgamira; Beni‐hadadi akatuma nhume, ʋakamuʋudza, ʋaciti: Kunaʋarume ʋanoɓuɗa Samaria.
Iye akati: Kunyaŋge ʋaɓuɗa ʋacitȿaka rugare, muʋaɓate ʋari ʋapenyu, kunyaŋge ʋaɓuɗa ʋacitȿaka kurwa, muʋaɓate ʋari ʋapenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaɓuɗa muguta, iwo majaya amacinda amatiʋi enyika nehondo yakaʋateʋera.
Mumŋe nomumŋe akaʋuraya munhu wake, ʋaSiria ʋakatiza, ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋateʋerera; naBeni‐hadadi mambo weSiria akatiza, akataȿa biza anaʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋakataȿa mabiza.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akaɓuɗa, akaparadza mabiza neŋgoro, akaʋuraya ʋaSiria ʋazhinji‐zhinji.
Ɀino muprofita akasweɗera kunamambo waIsraeri, akati kwaari: Enda undoɀisimbisa, ucenjere, ufuŋge ɀakanaka ɀaunofanira kuita; nokuti kana gore rapera mambo weSiria ucaʋuya kuzorwa newe.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋamambo weSiria ʋakati kwaari: Mŋari waʋo ndimŋari wamakomo, nemhaka iyo ʋakatikunda; asi ŋgatirwe naʋo paɓani, ipapo ɀirokwaɀo ticaʋakunda.
Naiɀoɀo itai cinhu ici: Mubvise madzimambo, mumŋe nomumŋe panɀimbo yake, mugoisa ʋaɓati panɀimbo yaʋo;
mugoɀiʋuŋganidzira hondo yakafanana nehondo yamakarashikirwa nayo, biza panɀimbo yebiza, neŋgoro panɀimbo yeŋgoro, tirwe naʋo paɓani; ɀirokwaɀo ticaʋakunda. Iye akaterera inzwi raʋo, akaita saiɀoɀo.
Pakupera kwegore Beni‐hadadi akaʋuŋganidza ʋaSiria, akaenda Afeki kundorwa naʋaIsraeri.

Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋganidzwa ʋo, ʋakapiwa mbuʋa, ʋakandorwa naʋo; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakadzika matente aʋo pakatarisana naʋo, ʋakafanana namapoka maɗuku maʋiri embudzi, asi ʋaSiria ʋakaŋga ʋakazadza nyika.

Ɀino munhu waMŋari akasweɗera, akataura kunamambo waIsraeri, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: ƲaSiria ɀaʋakati: Jehova ndimŋari wamakomo, asi haazi mŋari wamapani, naiɀoɀo ndicapa ʋanhu aʋa ʋose mumaʋoko ako, ʋaziʋe kuti ini ndiri Jehova.
Ɀino ʋakagara pamisasa ʋakatarisana mazuʋa manomŋe. Nomusi wecinomŋe ʋakasoŋgana ʋakarwa, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuraya ʋaSiria ʋaifamba namakumbo ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana nomusi mumŋe.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakatizira muguta reAfeki, ruȿiŋgo ndokuwira pamsoro paʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinomŋe ʋakaŋga ʋasara. NaBeni‐hadadi akatiza ʋo, akaȿika muguta, akapinda mukamuri yomukati.

Ipapo ʋaranda ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai ɀino, takanzwa kuti madzimambo eimba yaIsraeri madzimambo anenyasha; ɀino ŋgatisuŋge magumbu paɀiʋuno ɀeɗu namakaʋi pamisoro yeɗu, tiɓuɗire kunamambo waIsraeri; ɀimŋe ucakuregai muri ʋapenyu.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakasuŋga magumbu paɀiʋuno ɀaʋo, namakaʋi pamisoro yaʋo, ʋakaenda kunamambo waIsraeri, ʋakati: Ɀanzi nomuranda wenyu Beni‐hadadi: Ndinokumbira kuti murege kundiʋuraya henyu. Akati: Uciri mupenyu here? Iye ihama yaŋgu.
Ɀino ʋarume aʋo ʋakacerekedza kwaɀo, ʋakakurumidza kugamucira shoko iro kwaari, ʋakati:
Ɀino Beni‐hadadi akati kwaari: Ndicadzosa maguta akatorerwa ɓaɓa ʋako naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu; uŋgaɀiitira migwagwa muDamasko, seɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu paSamaria.
Ɀino mumŋe murume waʋana ʋaʋaprofita akati kushamŋari yake arairwa naJehova: Ndiroʋe hako. Murume akaramba kumuroʋa.
Ipapo akati kwaari: Ɀausina‐kuterera inzwi raJehova, tarira, ucaʋurawa neshumba kana ucaŋgobva kwandiri. Ɀino wakati acaŋgobva kwaari, shumba ikamuwana, ikamuʋuraya.
Ɀino akawana ɀe mumŋe murume, akati: Ndiroʋe hako. Murume uyo akamuroʋa, akamukuʋadza kwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo muprofita akabva, akandomirira mambo panzira, akaɀishandura nomuceka waakaŋga asuŋga kumeso kwake.

Ɀino mambo wakati acipfuʋura, akaɗanidzira kunamambo, akati: Muranda wenyu wakaŋga apinda pakati pokurwa, ndikaʋona munhu acitsauka, akaʋuya kwandiri nomumŋe murume, akati: Rinda munhu uyu; kana akatoŋgoshaikwa, ʋupenyu bgake bgucatsibga noʋupenyu bgako; kana iɀo ɀikakona, ucafanira kuripa netarenta resirveri.
Ɀino muranda wenyu wakati aciɓata‐ɓata hake pano napapo, iye akanyaŋgarika. Mambo waIsraeri akati kwaari: Ndiɀo ɀaucatoŋgerwa, waɀitoŋga umene.
Akakurumidza kubvisa muceka kumeso kwake, mambo waIsraeri akamuziʋa kuti ndomumŋe waʋaprofita.

Iye akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀawatendera munhu kupukunyuka pamaʋoko ako, iye wakaŋga atukwa neni kuti aparadzwe, naiɀoɀo ʋupenyu bgake bgucatsibga noʋupenyu bgako, ʋuye ʋanhu ʋake ʋacatsibga naʋanhu ʋako.
Mambo waIsraeri akaenda kumba kwake aʋora mŋoyo aneshuŋgu, ndokuȿika paSamaria.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Naboti muJezreeri wakaŋga anomunda wemizambiriŋga, waiʋa paJezreeri, pedyo neimba yoʋushe yaAhabi mambo weSamaria.

Ɀino Ahabi akataura naNaboti, akati: Ndipe munda wako wemizambiriŋga, ndiuite munda wemiriʋo, nokuti uri pedyo neimba yaŋgu; ini ndigokupa mumŋe munda wemizambiriŋga unokunda uyu; ɀimŋe, kana uciɗa, ndiŋgakupa mari yakariŋgana muteŋgo wawo.
Ipapo Naboti akati kunaAhabi: Jehova ŋgaandidziʋise, ndirege kukupai nhaka yamadziɓaɓa aŋgu.

Ipapo Ahabi akapinda mumba make, aʋora mŋoyo, aneshuŋgu, nokuɗa kweshoko raakaŋga aʋudzwa naNaboti muJezreeri; nokuti iye wakaŋga ati: Handiŋgakupiyi nhaka yamadziɓaɓa aŋgu. Akaʋata panhoʋo yake, akatendeʋudza ciso cake, akaramba kudya.
Ɀino Izeberi mukadzi wake akaenda kwaari, akati: Mŋoyo wenyu uneshuŋgu neiko, ɀamusiŋgaɗi kudya?

Iye akati kwaari: Nokuti ndakataura naNaboti muJezreeri, ndikati kwaari: Ndipe munda wako wemizambiriŋga, ndiuteŋge nemari; asi kana uciɗa hako, ndicakupa mumŋe munda wemizambiriŋga panɀimbo yawo, iye akapindura, akati: Handiŋgakupiyi munda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga.
Ɀino Izeberi mukadzi wake akati kwaari: Ko hamuzi’mi munoɓata ʋushe pakati paIsraeri here? Mukai, mudye, mŋoyo wenyu ufare, nokuti ini ndicakupai munda wemizambiriŋga waNaboti muJezreeri.
Naiɀoɀo akanyora ŋwadi nezita raAhabi, akadzisimbisa necisimbiso cake, akatuma ŋwadi idzo kuʋakuru, nokumacinda, ʋaiʋa muguta rake, ʋakaŋga ʋagere naNaboti.
Akanyora paŋwadi idzo, aciti: Tarai musi wokuɀinyima ɀokudya nawo, mukudze Naboti pakati paʋanhu.
Mugoraira ʋanhu ʋaʋiri ʋakaiȿo‐ipa ʋamire pamberi pake, ʋamupupurire, ʋaciti: Iwe wakatuka Mŋari namambo. Ipapo muende naye kunze kweguta, mumutake namabge, afe.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋeguta rake, iʋo ʋakuru namacinda, ʋakaŋga ʋagere muguta rake, ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naIzeberi, seɀakanyorwa paŋwadi dzaʋakaŋga ʋatumirwa naye.
Ʋakatara zuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya, ʋakakudza Naboti pakati paʋanhu.
