Ɀino ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋakaiȿo‐ipa ʋakapinda, ʋakandogara pamberi pake; ʋarume aʋa ʋakaiȿo‐ipa ʋakamupupurira, iye Naboti, pamberi paʋanhu, ʋakati: Naboti wakatuka Mŋari namambo. Ɀino ʋakaɓuɗa naye paguta, ʋakamutaka namabge, akafa.
Ipapo ʋakatuma shoko kunaIzeberi, ʋakati: Naboti watakwa namabge, wafa.

Ɀino Izeberi wakati acinzwa kuti Naboti watakwa namabge, wafa, Izeberi akati kunaAhabi: Simukai, mundoɀitorera munda wemizambiriŋga waNaboti muJezreeri, uyo waakaɗeya kuramba kukupai, ŋguʋa yamakaɗa kumupa mari, nokuti Naboti haaciri mupenyu, asi wafa.
Ɀino Ahabi wakati acinzwa kuti Naboti wafa, Ahabi akasimuka, akaɓuruka kumunda wemizambiriŋga waNaboti muJezreeri, kundoɀitorera iwo.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaEria muTishbi, riciti:
Simuka, ɓuruka undosoŋgana naAhabi mambo waIsraeri, unogara Samaria; ucamuwana ari mumunda wemizambiriŋga waNaboti, kwaaɓurukira kundoɀitorera iwo.
Umuʋudze, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Waʋuraya, ɀino watora ʋo here? Ɀino umuʋudze ʋo, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Apo pakananɀa imbga ropa raNaboti, ndipo padzicananɀa ropa rako ʋo.
Ahabi akati kunaEria: Wandiwana, iwe muʋeŋgi waŋgu, here? Akapindura, akati: Ndakuwana; nokuti waɀiteŋgesa kuti uite ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
Tarira, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro pako, ndicakutȿaira cose, ubve, ndicaparadza ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaAhabi, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru kuʋaIsraeri.
Imba yako ndicaiita seimba yaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, neimba yaBaasha mŋanakomana waAhija, nemhaka yokuti wakanditsamŋisa iwe, ukatadzisa Israeri.
Ʋuye Jehova akataura pamsoro paIzeberi, akati: Imbga dzicadya Izeberi paruȿiŋgo rweJezreeri.
Aninani waAhabi, unofira muguta, ucadyiwa nembga, aninani, unofira kusaŋgo, ucadyiwa neshiri dzokuɗeŋga.
(Asi hakunomunhu wakafanana naAhabi, wakaɀiteŋgesa kuti aite ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, acikurudzirwa naIzeberi mukadzi wake.
Akaita ɀakanyaŋgadza kwaɀo, nokuti wakateʋera ɀifananidzo netsika dzose dzaʋaAmori, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri).
Ɀino Ahabi wakati acinzwa mashoko iwayo, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akasimira magumbu pamuʋiri wake, akaɀinyima ɀokudya, akaʋata pasi namagumbu, akanatso‐famba.
Ɀino shoko reJehova rikaȿika kunaEria muTishbi, riciti:

Unoʋona here kuti Ahabi unoɀininipisa pamberi paŋgu? Ɀaanoɀininipisa pamberi paŋgu, handiŋgaʋuyisi ɀakaipa iɀo pamazuʋa ake; asi pamazuʋa omŋanakomana wake ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa iɀo pamsoro peimba yake.
Ɀino ʋakagara makore matatu kusino‐kurwa pakati paʋaSiria naʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino negore recitatu Jehoshafati mambo waJuda wakaɓurukira kunamambo waIsraeri.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Munoziʋa here kuti Ramoti‐gireadi ndereɗu? Asi isu tigere heɗu tinyerere, tisiŋgaritori kunamambo weSiria.
Akati kunaJehoshafati: Ucaenda neni kundorwa neRamoti‐gireadi here? Jehoshafati akati kunamambo waIsraeri: Ini ndakaita sewe, naʋanhu ʋaŋgu saʋanhu ʋako, namabiza aŋgu samabiza ako.
Jehoshafati akati kunamambo waIsraeri: Ƌombobvunza hako shoko raJehova nhasi.

Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akaʋuŋganidza ʋaprofita, ʋaneŋge ʋarume ʋaiʋa namazana manna, akati kwaʋari: Ndiende kundorwa neRamoti‐gireadi here, kana ndirege? Iʋo ʋakati: Endai, nokuti Ishe ucariisa mumaʋoko amambo.
Asi Jehoshafati akati: Hakucinomumŋe muprofita waJehova pano here, timubvunze?

Mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Mumŋe murume uci’ko, Mikaya mŋanakomana waImra, watiŋgabvunza kuɗa kwaJehova naye, asi ini ndinomuʋeŋga, nokuti haaprofiti ɀakanaka pamsoro paŋgu, asi ɀakaipa. Jehoshafati akati: Mambo ŋgaarege kuɗaro.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akaɗana muranda, akati: Kurumidza undotora Mikaya mŋanakomana waImra.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri naJehoshafati mambo waJuda ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumŋe nomumŋe pacigaro cake coʋushe, ʋakafuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzoʋushe paɗare pasuʋo reSamaria; ʋaprofita ʋose ʋakaprofita pamberi paʋo.
Zedekia mŋanakomana waKenaani akaɀiitira nyaŋga dzamatare, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Nedzidzi mucatuŋga ʋaSiria, kuȿikira ʋapera.
Naʋamŋe ʋaprofita ʋose ʋakaprofita saiɀoɀo, ʋakati: Endai Ramoti‐gireadi, mucakunda, nokuti Jehova ucariisa muruʋoko rwamambo.

Ɀino nhume yakaŋga yandoɗana Mikaya yakataura kwaari, ikati: Tarirai, mashoko aʋaprofita anobvumirana acitaura ɀakanaka kunamambo; ɀino ndinokumbira kuti shoko renyu riʋe seshoko romumŋe waʋo, mutaure ʋo ɀakanaka.
Ipapo Mikaya akati: NaJehova mupenyu, iɀo ɀinorebga naJehova kwandiri, ndiɀo ɀandicataura.
Ɀino wakati aciȿika kunamambo, mambo akati kwaari: Mikaya, tiende kundorwa neRamoti‐gireadi here, kana tirege? Akamupindura, akati: Endai henyu, mucakunda, nokuti Jehova ucariisa muruʋoko rwamambo.
Mambo akati kwaari: Ndinofanira kukupikisa kaŋgani here kuti undiʋudze ɀokwaɗi yoga nezita raJehova?
Iye akati: Ndaʋona ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakapararira pamakomo samakwai asino‐mufudzi; Jehova akati: Aʋa haʋanatenzi, mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaadzokere kumusha kwake norugare.
Mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Handina‐kukuʋudza here, kuti haaŋgaprofiti ɀakanaka pamsoro paŋgu, asi ɀakaipa?
akati: Ɀino cinzwai shoko raJehova: Ndakaʋona Jehova agere pacigaro cake coʋushe, nehondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzimire naye kurudyi rwake nokuruɓoshwe rwake.
Ipapo Jehova akati: Ndianiko ucandonyeŋgera Ahabi, aende, andoʋurawa paRamoti‐gireadi? Ɀino mumŋe akati ɀokuti, nomumŋe ɀe akati ɀokuti.
Ɀino mŋeya ukaɓuɗa, ukamira pamberi paJehova, ukati: Ini ndicandomunyeŋgera.
Jehova akati kwauri: Neiko? Iwo ukati: Ndicaenda, ndicaʋa mŋeya wenhema mumiromo yaʋaprofita ʋake ʋose. Iye akati: Iwe ndiwe ucamunyeŋgera, ucakunda ʋo; enda hako, undoita saiɀoɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, tarirai, Jehova wakaisa mŋeya wenhema mumiromo yaʋaprofita ʋenyu aʋa ʋose, asi Jehova wakataura ɀakaipa pamsoro penyu.
Ipapo Zedekia mŋanakomana waKenaani akasweɗera, akaroʋa Mikaya paɗama rake, akati: Mŋeya waJehova wakaenda nepiko ucibva kwandiri kundotaura newe?
Mikaya akati: Ucaɀiʋona musi uyo waucandoʋanda mukamuri yomukati.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akati: Ƃatai Mikaya, mumuise kunaAmoni muɓati weguta, nokunaJoashi mŋanakomana wamambo,
muti: Ɀanzi namambo: Pinzai munhu uyu mutoroŋgo, mumupe ɀokudya ɀokutambudzika, nemvura yokutambudzika, kuȿikira ndicidzoka norugare.
Ipapo Mikaya akati: Kana mukadzoka norugare, Jehova haana‐kutaura neni. Akati: Inzwai, imi ʋanhu, imi mose.
Naiɀoɀo mambo waIsraeri naJehoshafati mambo waJuda ʋakaenda Ramoti‐gireadi.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Ini ndicaɀishandura, ndigondorwa; asi iwe cifuka ŋguʋo dzako dzoʋushe. Mambo waIsraeri akaɀishandura, akandorwa.
Ɀino mambo weSiria wakaŋga araira ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro dzake, ʋanamakumi matatu naʋaʋiri, akati: Regai kurwa naʋaɗuku kana naʋakuru, asi namambo waIsraeri oga.
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro ʋakati ʋaciʋona Jehoshafati, ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndiye mambo waIsraeri. Ʋakatsaukira kundorwa naye; ɀino Jehoshafati akaridza mhere.
Ipapo ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti haazi mambo waIsraeri, ʋakadzoka pakumuteʋera.
Ɀino mumŋe murume akahwembura ʋuta bgake asiŋgashumbi hake, akafura mambo waIsraeri pakati peɀisuŋgo ɀeŋguʋo dzake dzokurwa nadzo; ipapo
Kurwa kukanyanya kwaɀo nomusi uyo; mambo akatsigirwa muŋgoro yake pakurwa naʋaSiria, akafa maɗekwana; ropa rikaɓuɗa paʋaŋga rikayerera mukati meŋgoro.
Ɀino zuʋa rakati roʋira mhere ikanzwika pahondo yose, iciti: Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaadzokere kuguta rake, mumŋe nomumŋe kunyika yake.
Naiɀoɀo mambo akafa, akaiswa Samaria, ʋakaʋiga mambo paSamaria.
Ʋakasuka ŋgoro padziʋa reSamaria, imbga dzikananɀa ropa rake; (ndipo paishamba ɀifeʋe); seɀakaŋga ɀarebga neshoko raJehova.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAhabi, neɀose ɀaakaita, neimba yenyaŋga dzenzou yaakaʋaka, namaguta ose aakaʋaka, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Naiɀoɀo Ahabi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, Ahazia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino Jehoshafati mŋanakomana waAsa, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaJuda negore recinna raAhabi mambo waIsraeri.
Jehoshafati wakaŋga aʋa namakore makumi matatu namashanu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata makore makumi maʋiri namashanu paJerusarema. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Azuba, mukunda waShirhi.

Akafamba panzira dzose dzaɓaɓa ʋake Asa; haana‐kutsauka padziri, asi wakaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa, ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciŋgoɓayira nokupisira ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira.
Jehoshafati akayanana namambo waIsraeri.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehoshafati, nesimba rakaʋonekwa kwaari, nokurwa kwake, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Ʋasodomi ʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋasiyiwa pamazuʋa aAsa ɓaɓa ʋake, akaʋabvisa ʋo panyika.
Asi paEdomi pakaŋga pasinamambo, mumŋe wakaŋga aciɓata panɀimbo yamambo.
Jehoshafati akaʋaka ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi kuenda Ofiri kuzotora ndarama; asi haɀina‐kuenda, nokuti ɀikepe ɀakaputsika paEzioni‐geberi.
Ɀino Ahazia mŋanakomana waAhabi akati kunaJehoshafati: Ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ŋgaʋaende naʋaranda ʋako neɀikepe. Asi Jehoshafati wakaramba.
Jehoshafati akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake paguta raDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, Jehorami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ahazia mŋanakomana waAhabi, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria pagore regumi namanomŋe raJehoshafati mambo waJuda, akaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri makore maʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akafamba nenzira yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋuye nenzira yamai ʋake, ʋuye nenzira yaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, wakatadzisa Israeri.
Nokuti wakashumira Baari, akanamata kwaari, akatsamŋisa Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, seɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake paɀose.
Ɀino ʋaMoabi ʋakamukira ʋaIsraeri, shure kwokufa kwaAhabi.

Ɀino Ahazia wakaŋga awira pasi napawindi yekamuri yake yokumsoro, yaiʋa paSamaria, akarwara, akatuma nhume, akati kwaʋari: Endai mundobvunza Baari‐zebubi, mŋari weEkroni, kana ndicapora pakurwara uku.
Asi mutumŋa waJehova akati kunaEria muTishbi: Simuka, undosoŋgana nenhume dzamambo weSamaria, uti kwaʋari: Asi hapanaMŋari here pakati paIsraeri, ɀamondobvunza Baari‐zebubi, mŋari weEkroni?
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Hauŋgaɓuruki ɀe pamubeda wawakwira, asi ɀirokwaɀo ucafa. Eria akabva.
Ipapo nhume dzakadzokera kwaari, iye akati kwaʋari: Madzokereiko?

Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Mumŋe murume wakaʋuya akasoŋgana nesu, akati kwatiri: Endai, dzokerai kunamambo wakakutumai, muti kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Asi hapanaMŋari here pakati paIsraeri, ɀawotuma ʋanhu kundobvunza Baari‐zebubi mŋari weEkroni? Naiɀoɀo hauŋgaɓuruki ɀe pamubeda wawakwira, asi ɀirokwaɀo ucafa.
Akati kwaʋari: Murume, wakaʋuya akasoŋgana nemi, akakuʋudzai mashoko awo, wakaŋga akaɗiniko?
Ʋakamupindura, ʋakati: Wakaŋga ari murume wakafuka
Ipapo

Eria akapindura, akati kumukuru waʋanamakumi mashanu: Kana ndiri munhu waMŋari, mŋoto ŋgauɓuruke kuɗeŋga, ukuparadze iwe naʋanhu ʋako ʋanamakumi mashanu. Ipapo mŋoto ukaɓuruka kuɗeŋga, ukamuparadza iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋanamakumi mashanu.
Akatuma ɀe kwaari mumŋe mukuru waʋanamakumi mashanu, anaʋanhu ʋake ʋanamakumi mashanu. Iye akapindura, akati kwaari: Nhai munhu waMŋari, ɀanzi namambo: Kurumidzai muɓuruke.

Eria akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Kana ndiri munhu waMŋari, mŋoto ŋgauɓuruke kuɗeŋga, ukuparadze iwe naʋanhu ʋako ʋanamakumi mashanu. Ipapo mŋoto waMŋari ukaɓuruka kuɗeŋga, ukamuparadza iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋanamakumi mashanu.

Akatuma ɀe mumŋe mukuru waʋanamakumi mashanu, wecitatu, anaʋanhu ʋake ʋanamakumi mashanu. Ɀino iye mukuru waʋanamakumi mashanu, wecitatu, akakwira, akafugama namabvi ake pamberi paEria, akakumbira, akati kwaari: Haiwa, munhu waMŋari, ʋupenyu bgaŋgu nobgaʋaranda ʋenyu aʋa ʋanamakumi mashanu, ŋgaciʋe cinhu cinokosha pamberi penyu.
Tarirai, mŋoto wakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga, ukapisa ʋakuru ʋaʋiri ʋaʋanamakumi mashanu ʋokutaŋga naʋanhu ʋaʋo ʋanamakumi mashanu; naiɀoɀo ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ɀino ŋgaciʋe cinhu cinokosha pamberi penyu.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova akati kunaEria: Ƃuruka naye, usamutya hako. Akasimuka, akaenda naye kunamambo.

Akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀawakatuma nhume kundobvunza Baari‐zebubi, mŋari weEkroni, asi hapanaMŋari here pakati paIsraeri, wauŋgabvunza shoko rake? Naiɀoɀo hauŋgaɓuruki ɀe pamubeda wawakwira, asi ɀirokwaɀo ucafa.

Naiɀoɀo akafa seshoko raJehova rakaŋga rarebga naEria. Jehorami akamuteʋera paʋushe, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe pagore recipiri raJehorami mŋanakomana waJehoshafati mambo waJuda; nokuti iye wakaŋga asinomŋana.
Mamŋe maɓasa aAhazia aakaɓata, haana‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yaȿika Jehova yaakaɗa kukwidza Eria nayo kuɗeŋga necinyampupuri, Eria akaenda naErisha ʋacibva Girgari.
Eria akati kunaErisha: Iwe cigara pano, nokuti Jehova wakandituma Beti‐eri. Erisha akati: NaJehova mupenyu, ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, handiŋgakusiyiyi. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaɓurukira Beti‐eri.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ʋaiʋa paBeti‐eri, ʋakaȿika kunaErisha, ʋakati kwaari: Munoziʋa here kuti Jehova ucakubvisirai tenzi wenyu nhasi? Iye akati: Hoŋo, ndinoziʋa; nyararai henyu.
Eria akati kwaari: Erisha, iwe cigara pano, nokuti Jehova wakandituma Jeriko. Iye akati: NaJehova mupenyu, ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, handiŋgakusiyiyi. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaȿika Jeriko.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita, ʋaiʋa paJeriko, ʋakasweɗera kunaErisha, ʋakati kwaari: Munoziʋa here kuti Jehova ucakubvisirai tenzi wenyu nhasi? Iye akapindura, akati: Hoŋo, ndinoziʋa; nyararai henyu.
Eria akati kwaari: Iwe cigara pano, nokuti Jehova wakandituma kwaJoridani. Iye akati: NaJehova mupenyu, ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, handiŋgakusiyiyi. Iʋo ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakapfuʋura haʋo.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋanamakumi mashanu ʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ʋakaenda ʋakandomira pakatarisana naʋo ʋari kure; iʋo ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakamira paJoridani.
Ipapo Eria akatora ŋguʋo yake, akaipeta, akaroʋa mvura, ikaparadzaniswa napakati, naiɀoɀo iʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakayambuka pakawoma.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋayambuka, Eria akati kunaErisha: Kumbira candiŋgakuitira, ndicigere kubviswa kwauri. Erisha akati: Ndipei migoʋe miʋiri yomŋeya wenyu.
Akati: Wakumbira cinhu cinogozha; asi kana ukandiʋona ndicibviswa kwauri, ucaitirwa iɀoɀo; asi kana usiŋgandiʋoni, hauŋgaitirwi iɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacifamba, ʋaciŋgotaurirana haʋo, ŋgoro yomŋoto namabiza omŋoto ɀikaȿika, ɀikaʋaparadzanisa iʋo ʋaʋiri; Eria akakwira kuɗeŋga necinyampupuri.
Erisha akaɀiʋona, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ŋgoro yaIsraeri naʋataȿi ʋayo ʋamabiza! Akasazomuʋona ɀe; akaɓata ŋguʋo dzake akadzibvarura napakati.
Akanoŋga jasi raEria rakaŋga rawa kwaari, akadzoka akamira pamhenderekedzo yaJoridani;
akatora jasi raEria rakaŋga rawa kwaari, akaroʋa mvura, akati: Jehova Mŋari waEria uripiko? Ɀino wakati aroʋa mvura, ikaparadzaniswa ʋo napakati, Erisha akayambuka.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ʋakaŋga ʋari paJeriko pakatarisana naye, ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakati: Mŋeya waEria wogara pamsoro paErisha. Ʋakandosoŋgana naye, ʋakakotamira pasi pamberi pake.

Ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, isu ʋaranda ʋenyu, tinaʋarume ʋanamakumi mashanu ʋanesimba; iʋo ŋgaʋaende haʋo kundotȿaka tenzi wenyu, ɀimŋe Mŋeya waJehova wamukwidza, ukamukandira panerimŋe gomo, kana munomumŋe mupata. Iye akati: Regai henyu kuʋatuma.
Asi iʋo ʋakati ʋamugombedzera, kuȿikira anyara, akati: Tumai henyu. Naiɀoɀo ʋakatuma ʋarume ʋanamakumi mashanu, ʋakatȿaka mazuʋa matatu, asi haʋana‐kumuwana.
Ʋakadzokera ɀe kwaari aciri paJeriko, iye akati kwaʋari: Handina‐kukuʋudzai here, ndikati: Regai kuenda?
Ɀino ʋarume ʋeguta ʋakati kunaErisha: Tarirai henyu, nɀimbo yeguta yakanaka hayo, seɀamunoʋona, ishe weɗu, asi mvura yakaipa, nenyika haiɓereki ɀakanaka.
Iye akati: Ndiʋigire ndiro itȿa, mugoisa munyu’mo. Ʋakamuʋigira iyo.
Akaenda kucituɓu cemvura, akaɗira munyu imomo, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndarapa mvura iyi, hapacazobvi’po rufu, kana kusaɓereka.
Naiɀoɀo mvura ikarapxa kuȿikira nhasi, seɀaakataura, iye Erisha.
Ɀino wakabva’po, akaenda Beti‐eri; akati acikwira nenzira, ɀikomana ɀikaɓuɗa muguta, ɀikamuseka, ɀikati kwaari: Iwe nyamanza, kwira, iwe nyamanza, kwira!
Iye akaceuka, akaʋaʋona, akaʋatuka nezita raJehova. Ipapo maperekadzi maʋiri akaɓuɗa muɗondo, akaparadza ʋana ʋanamakumi manna naʋaʋiri ʋaʋo.
Akabva’po, akaenda kugomo reKarmeri, akabva’po, akadzokera Samaria.
Ɀino Jehorami mŋanakomana waAhabi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria negore regumi namasere raJehoshafati mambo waJuda, akaɓata ʋushe makore anegumi namaʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, asi haana‐kuita saɓaɓa ʋake kana samai ʋake; nokuti wakabvisa shoŋgwe yaBaari yakaŋga yaitwa naɓaɓa ʋake.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, wakanamatira ɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo: haana‐kutsauka kwaɀiri.
Ɀino Mesha mambo waMoabi wakaŋga ari mŋene wamakwai, waipa mambo waIsraeri makushe amakwaiana aneɀuru ɀinezana, naamakondobge aneɀuru ɀinezana.
Asi Ahabi wakati afa, mambo waMoabi akamukira mambo waIsraeri.
Mambo Jehorami akaɓuɗa paSamaria neŋguʋa iyo, akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose.

Akatuma shoko kunaJehoshafati mambo waJuda, aciti: Mambo waMoabi wandimukira, ucaenda neni kundorwa naMoabi here? Iye akati: Ndicaenda; ini ndakaita sewe, naʋanhu ʋaŋgu saʋanhu ʋako, namabiza aŋgu samabiza ako.
Iye akati: Ticaenda nenzira ipiko? Akati: Nenzira yokurenje raEdomi.
Naiɀoɀo mambo waIsraeri akaenda, namambo waJuda, namambo waEdomi, ʋakapota ʋakafamba mazuʋa manomŋe, ʋakashaiwa mvura yokunwisa hondo neɀipfuwo ɀaʋakaŋga ʋanaɀo.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akati: Haiwa! Jehova wakaɗana madzimambo awa matatu, kuti aʋaise mumaʋoko aʋaMoabi.

Ɀino Jehoshafati akati: Hapanamuprofita waJehova pano, tibvunze Jehova naye here? Mumŋe waʋaranda ʋamambo waIsraeri akapindura, akati: Erisha mŋanakomana waShafati uri pano, iye wakaɗeya kusururidza mvura pamaʋoko aEria.
Jehoshafati akati: Shoko raJehova riri kwaari. Ɀino mambo waIsraeri, naJehoshafati, namambo waEdomi ʋakaenda kwaari.

Erisha akati kunamambo waIsraeri: Ndineiko nemi? Endai kuʋaprofita ʋaɓaɓa ʋenyu nokuʋaprofita ʋamai ʋenyu. Mambo waIsraeri akati kwaari: Kwete, nokuti Jehova ndiye wakaɗana madzimambo awa matatu, kuti aʋaise mumaʋoko aʋaMoabi.
Erisha akati: NaJehova wehondo mupenyu, iye wandimire pamberi pake, ɀirokwaɀo ɗai ndisaiʋa nehanya naJehoshafati mambo waJuda uri pano, handizaitarira kwamuri, kana kukuʋonai imi.
Asi ɀino ʋuyai kwandiri nomuridzi wembira. Ɀino muridzi wembira wakati aciridza, ruʋoko rwaJehova rukaʋuya pamsoro pake.
Akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Cerai makoroŋga mazhinji pamupata uyu.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Hamuŋgaʋoni mhepo, hamuŋgaʋoni mvura; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mupata uyu ucazadzwa nemvura; imi mucanwa, imi neɀipfuwo ɀenyu, neɀinotakura nhumbi dzenyu.
Cinhu ici ciɗuku haco pamberi paJehova; asi iye ucaisa ʋo ʋaMoabi mumaʋoko enyu.
Mucaparadza guta rimŋe nerimŋe rakasimbiswa, neguta rimŋe nerimŋe rakatsaurwa, mucatema muti mumŋe nomumŋe wakanaka, nokudziʋira matsime ose emvura, nokushatsa namabge munda mumŋe nomumŋe wakanaka.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana, neŋguʋa yokuɓayira cipo, mvura ikaʋonekwa icibva nenzira yaEdomi, nyika ikazadzwa nemvura.
Ɀino ʋaMoabi ʋose ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti madzimambo akaŋga aȿika kuzorwa naʋo, ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kupfeka nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo, naʋakaʋapfuʋura pamakore, ʋakandomira pamuganho.
Ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ʋakaʋona zuʋa ricipenya pamvura, ʋaMoabi ʋakaʋona mvura ʋari kure yakatȿuka seropa.
Ʋakati: Iropa; ɀirokwaɀo madzimambo aparadzwa, ʋaʋurayana; naiɀoɀo ɀino, ʋaMoabi, endai mundopamba.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika pamisasa yaʋaIsraeri, ʋaIsraeri ʋakasimuka, ʋakaparadza ʋaMoabi, ʋakatiza pamberi paʋo; ʋakapinda munyika yaʋo ʋaciparadza ʋaMoabi.

Ʋakaputsa maguta, mumŋe nomumŋe akakanda ibge rake pamunda mumŋe nomumŋe wakanaka, ikazara; ʋakadziʋira matsime ose emvura, ʋakatema miti yose yakanaka, kuȿikira ʋasiya mabge oga paKiri‐hareseti; ʋaposheri ʋamabge ʋakarikomba, ʋakariparadza.
Ɀino mambo waMoabi wakati aciʋona kuti wakundwa pakurwa, akatora ʋarume ʋanamazana manomŋe ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo, akaidza kupasanura kunamambo waEdomi; asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni.

Ipapo akatora mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe, waifanira kumuteʋera paʋushe, akamuɓayira ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa pamsoro poruȿiŋgo. Ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋakatsamŋa kwaɀo, ʋakabva kwaari, ʋakadzokera kunyika yaʋo.

Ɀino mumŋe mukadzi waʋakadzi ʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita wakacema kunaErisha, akati: Muranda wenyu, murume waŋgu, wafa; munoziʋa kuti muranda wenyu wakaŋga acitya Jehova; ɀino uyo, waakaŋga atora cikwerete kwaari, waʋuya kuzotora ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋaʋiri kuzoʋa ʋaranda ʋake.
Erisha akati kwaari: Ndiŋgakuɓatsira seiko? Ndiʋudze. Uneiko mumba mako? Iye akati: Murandakadzi wenyu haanecinhu mumba, asi hari inamafuta.
Ipapo akati: Enda undokwereta kunaʋose ʋaugere naʋo midziyo isineciro; usakwereta mishoma.
Ɀino upinde, iwe naʋana ʋako, ndokupfiga mukoʋa, uɗire mumidziyo iyo yose, ucigadzika yose yazara kurutiʋi.
Naiɀoɀo akabva kwaari, akapfiga mukoʋa, iye naʋana ʋake ʋari mukati; iʋo ʋakamuȿitsa midziyo, akaɗira.
Midziyo yakati yazara, akati kumŋanakomana wake: Ndipe ɀe mumŋe mudziyo. Iye akati kwaari: Hapacinomumŋe mudziyo; mafuta akaguma ʋo.
Ipapo akandoʋudza munhu waMŋari, iye akati: Cienda undoteŋgesa mafuta, uripe cikwerete cako, urarame neɀakasara, iwe naʋanakomana ʋako.
Ɀino mumŋe musi Erisha akapfuʋura napaShunemi, pakaŋga pagere mukadzi wakakurumbira, iye akamugombedzera kudya ɀokudya. Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana acipfuʋura napo, waitsaukira’ko kuzodya ɀokudya.
Akati kumurume wake: Tarirai ɀino, ndinoʋona kuti uyu murume, unosipfuʋura nokwatiri, munhu mutȿene waMŋari.
Ŋgatiʋake kamuri ɗuku pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, timuisire’mo mubeda, netafura, necigaro, necigadziko comŋenje; ɀino kana aciŋge aciʋuya kwatiri, agotsaukira’mo.
Ɀino mumŋe musi akaȿika’po, akatsaukira kukamuri iyo ɗuku, akandoʋata’mo.
Akati kunaGehazi muranda wake: Ƌana

Akati kwaari: Citaura kwaari ɀino, uti: Tarirai, makaticeŋgeta ɀikuru kwaɀo, ɀino tiŋgakuitirei ʋo? Munoɗa kuti tikureʋerei kunamambo, kana kumukuru wehondo here? Iye akapindura, akati: Ndigere haŋgu ɀakanaka pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Akati: Ɀino tiŋgamuitireiko? Gehazi akapindura, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo haanomŋanakomana, nomurume wake wakwegura.
Iye akati: Muɗane. Wakati amuɗana, iye akamira pamukoʋa.
Akati: Neŋguʋa ino kana gore rapera, ucafuŋgatira mŋana. Iye akati: Kwete, ishe waŋgu, munhu waMŋari, regai kureʋa nhema kumurandakadzi wenyu.
Mukadzi akaʋa nemimba, akapona mŋanakomana neŋguʋa iyo pakupera kwegore, seɀakaŋga ɀataura Erisha kwaari.
Ɀino mŋana wakati akura, akaenda mumŋe musi kunaɓaɓa ʋake kuʋakohwi.
Akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Musoro waŋgu, musoro waŋgu! Iʋo ʋakati kumuranda: Muɓereke uende naye kunamai ʋake.
Iye akamutora, akamuisa kunamai ʋake, akagara pamabvi aʋo kuȿikira masikati makuru, akafa.
Iʋo ʋakakwira, ʋakandomuradzika pamubeda womunhu waMŋari, ʋakamupfigira’mo, ʋakaɓuɗa.
Akaɗana murume wake, akati: Nditumire ʋo mumŋe muranda nemboŋgoro imŋe, ndimhanyire kumunhu waMŋari, ndigodzoka ɀe.
Iye akati: Unoɗa kuendireiko kwaari nhasi? Hakuzi kugara kwomŋedzi, kana Saɓata. Iye akati: Haɀinemhoȿa.
Ɀino akaisa cigaro pamboŋgoro, akati kumuranda wake: Uifambise, ipfuʋurire mberi; rega kundinonosa pakufamba, asi kana ndikakuʋudza.
Naiɀoɀo akaenda, akaȿika kumunhu waMŋari pagomo reKarmeri. Munhu waMŋari wakati acimuʋona aciri kure, akati kunaGehazi muranda wake: Tarira hoyo
Mhanya hako ɀino undosoŋgana naye, uti kwaari: Makafara here? Murume wenyu wakafara here? Nomŋana wakafara here? Iye akapindura, akati: Haiwa, takafara heɗu!

Ɀino wakati aȿika kumunhu waMŋari pagomo, akaɓata tsoka dzake. Gehazi akasweɗera aciɗa kumusundira kure; asi munhu waMŋari akati: Murege hake, nokuti mŋeya wake uneshuŋgu mukati make. Asi Jehova wakandiʋanzira iɀoɀo, haana‐kundiʋudza.
Ipapo iye akati: Ko ndakakumbira mŋanakomana kunashe waŋgu here? Ko handina‐kuti: Regai kundinyeŋgedzera here?

Ipapo akati kunaGehazi: Ciɀisuŋga ciʋuno, uɓate tȿimbo yaŋgu muruʋoko rwako, uende; kana ukasoŋgana nomunhu, rega kumukwazisa; kana mumŋe akakukwazisa, usamuɗaʋira; ugondoisa tȿimbo yaŋgu pamsoro peciso comŋana.
Ɀino mai ʋomŋana ʋakati: NaJehova mupenyu, ʋuye nomŋeya wenyu mupenyu, handiŋgakusiyiyi. Akasimuka, akamuteʋera.
Gehazi akaʋatuŋgamirira, akandoisa tȿimbo paciso comŋana, asi kwakaŋga kusino‐kutaura kana kunzwa. Naiɀoɀo akadzoka kuzosoŋgana naye, akati kwaari: Mŋana haana‐kupepuka.
Erisha wakati apinda mumba akawana mŋana akafa, akaradzikwa pamubeda wake.
Naiɀoɀo akapinda, akapfiga mukoʋa, iye ari mukati nomŋana, iʋo ʋaʋiri, akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova.
Akakwira, akatsiʋama pamsoro pomŋana, akaisa muromo wake pamuromo wake, nameso ake pameso ake, namaʋoko ake pamaʋoko ake; akatsiʋama pamsoro pake; nyama yomŋana ikadziya.
Ɀino akadzoka, akafamba‐famba mumba kamŋe, akakwira ɀe, akatsiʋama pamsoro pake; mŋana akahotsira kanomŋe, mŋana ndokuȿinudza meso ake.
Ipapo akaɗana Gehazi, akati: Ƌana
Ɀino iye akapinda, akaɀiwisira patsoka dzake, akakotamira pasi; akasimudza mŋanakomana wake, akaɓuɗa.
Ɀino Erisha akaenda ɀe Girgari; nzara yakaŋga iri’po panyika; ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamberi pake, akati kumuranda wake: Gadza hari huru, uɓikire ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ɀokudya.
Ɀino mumŋe akaenda kusaŋgo kundotanha miriʋo, akawana muti unotanda, akatanha’po magake, akazadza ŋguʋo yake nawo, akaȿika akaacekera muhari yeɀokudya, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaaziʋi.
Ɀino ʋakapakurira ʋanhu kuti ʋadye. Iʋo ʋakati ʋodya ɀokudya, ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋakati: Munhu waMŋari, rufu ruri muhari. Ʋakasagona kuɀidya.
Asi iye akati: Ʋuyai noʋupfu. Akabguɗira muhari, akati: Cipakurai henyu, ʋanhu ʋadye. Ɀino kwakaŋga kusinecinhu cakaipa muhari.
Ɀino mumŋe murume wakaȿika, acibva Baari‐sharisha, akaʋigira munhu waMŋari ɀokudya ɀeɀitȿa, ɀiŋgwa ɀebari ɀinamakumi maʋiri, nehura itȿa dzeɀiyo muhomo yake. Akati: Ipai ʋanhu, ʋadye.
Muranda wake akati: Ndiŋgaisa iɀi pamberi paʋanhu ʋanezana seiko? Asi iye akati: Ipai ʋanhu, ʋadye, nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋacadya, ʋakasiya ɀimŋe.
Naiɀoɀo akaɀiisa pamberi paʋo, ʋakadya, ʋakasiya ɀimŋe, seɀakataura shoko raJehova.

Ɀino Naamani, mukuru wehondo dzamambo weSiria, waiʋa munhu mukuru kunatenzi wake, nomunhu waikudzwa; nokuti Jehova wakaŋga akundisa ʋaSiria naye; ʋuye waiʋa munhu wesimba noʋumhare, asi wakaŋga anamaperembudzi.
Ɀino ʋaSiria ʋakaŋga
Akati kunatenzikadzi wake: Ƌai ishe waŋgu aiʋa kumuprofita uri paSamaria, uŋgaɗai akaʋaporesa maperembudzi ake.
Ɀino mumŋe akapinda, akandoʋudza ishe wake, akati: Musikana wenyika yaIsraeri wakataura cokuti necokuti.
Mambo weSiria akati: Enda, ndinoɗa kutuma ŋwadi kunamambo waIsraeri. Akabva, akaenda namatarenta anegumi esirveri,
Akaenda neŋwadi kunamambo waIsraeri, yakaŋga iciti: Ɀino kana ŋwadi iyi iciȿika kwamuri, muziʋe kuti ndatuma Naamani muranda waŋgu kwamuri, kuti mumuporese maperembudzi ake.

Ɀino mambo waIsraeri wakati araʋa ŋwadi iyo, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akati: Asi ndini Mŋari kanhi? Ndinoziʋa kuʋuraya nokuraramisa kanhi, munhu uyu ɀaatuma shoko kwandiri, kuti ndiporese munhu maperembudzi ake? Asi fuŋgai, muʋone, kuti unotȿaka kurwa neni.

Ɀino Erisha munhu waMŋari, wakati acinzwa kuti mambo waIsraeri wabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akatuma shoko kunamambo, akati: Mabvarurireiko ŋguʋo dzenyu? Ŋgaaʋuye hake ɀino kwandiri, aziʋe kuti muprofita uri’po pakati paIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo Naamani akaenda namabiza ake neŋgoro dzake, akandomira pamukoʋa weimba yaErisha.
Erisha akatuma nhume kwaari, akati: Enda, undoshamba kanomŋe munaJoridani, nyama yako idzokere ɀe kwauri, uʋe wakanaka.
Asi Naamani wakatsamŋa, akabva, akati: Tarirai, ndaŋga ndiciti: Ɀirokwaɀo ucaɓuɗa kwandiri, akamira, akaɗana zita raJehova Mŋari wake, nokupuruzira’po noruʋoko rwake, agoporesa maperembudzi.
Ko Abana neFarpari, idzo nzizi dzeDamasko, hadzina‐kunaka kukunda mvura yose iri pakati paIsraeri here? Handiŋgashambi madziri, ndikaʋa wakanaka here? Naiɀoɀo akaenda, akabva atsamŋa kwaɀo.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋake ʋakasweɗera, ʋakataura naye, ʋakati: Nhai, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, Ƌai muprofita akakurairai kuita cinhu cikuru, hamuzaiciita here? Ndoɗa ɀaakati kwamuri: Shamba, uʋe wakanaka?
Ipapo akaɓuruka, akandonyura munaJoridani kanomŋe, seɀakaŋga ɀataura munhu waMŋari; nyama yake ikadzoka, ikafanana nenyama yomŋana muɗuku, akaʋa wakanaka.

Ɀino akadzokera kumunhu waMŋari, iye neɓoka rake rose, akaȿika, akamira pamberi pake, akati: Tarirai, ɀino ndoziʋa kuti hapanaMŋari pasi pose, asi pakati paIsraeri; naiɀoɀo ɀino, gamucirai henyu cipo kumuranda wenyu.
Asi iye akati: NaJehova mupenyu, iye wandimire pamberi pake, handiŋgagamuciri cinhu. Akamugombedzera, kuti agamucire, asi wakaramba.

Ɀino Naamani akati: Kana musiŋgaɗi henyu, muranda wenyu ŋgaapiwe hake mitoro yevu iŋgatakurwa namahesera maʋiri; nokuti kubva ɀino muranda wenyu haaŋgaɓayiri ʋamŋe ʋamŋari cipiriso cinopiswa kana cimŋe ciɓayiro asi Jehova oga.

Asi Jehova ŋgaakaŋganwire hake muranda wake pacinhu ici: Kana tenzi waŋgu acipinda mumba maRimoni kuzonamata’po, akasendamira paruʋoko rwaŋgu, ini ndikafugama mumba maRimoni; kana ndikafugama mumba maRimoni Jehova ŋgaakaŋganwire muranda wake pacinhu ici.
Akati kwaari: Enda hako nomufaro. Naiɀoɀo akabva kwaari, akafamba cinhambo ciɗuku.

Asi Gehazi muranda waErisha, munhu waMŋari, akati: Tarirai, tenzi waŋgu wakarega Naamani uyu muSiria, ɀaasina‐kugamucira kwaari caakaŋga aʋuya naco; asi naJehova mupenyu, ndicamhanya, ndikamuteʋera, nditore cinhu kwaari.
Naiɀoɀo Gehazi akateʋera Naamani. Ɀino Naamani wakati aciʋona munhu acimhanya acimuteʋera, akaɓuruka paŋgoro kuti asoŋgane naye, akati: Makafara henyu mose here?

Iye akati: Takafara heɗu tose. Tenzi waŋgu wakandituma, aciti: Tarirai, ɀino‐ɀino majaya maʋiri, ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita, ʋakaȿika kwandiri, ʋacibva kunyika yamakomo yaEfraimi; dondipai ʋo tarenta rimŋe resirveri,

Naamani akati: Ndinokumbira kuti utore hako matarenta maʋiri. Akamugombedzera, akasuŋgira matarenta maʋiri esirveri muhomo mbiri, pamŋe cete neŋguʋo mbiri dzakanaka, akaɀitakudza ʋaranda ʋake ʋaʋiri, ʋakaɀitakurira pamberi pake.
Ɀino wakati aȿika pacikomo, akaɀitora pamaʋoko aʋo, akaɀiʋiga mumba, akadzosa ʋanhu, ʋakaenda haʋo.
Ipapo akapinda, akamira pamberi patenzi wake. Erisha akati kwaari: Wabvepiko, Gehazi? Iye akati: Muranda wenyu wakaŋga aciŋgoʋa pano hake.

Iye akati kwaari: Mŋoyo waŋgu hauna‐kuenda newe here ŋguʋa iya murume acidzoka paŋgoro kuzosoŋgana newe? Ko ndiyo ŋguʋa yokugamucira mari, nokugamucira ŋguʋo, neminda yemiorivi, neminda yemizambiriŋga, namakwai nenzombe, naʋaranda naʋarandakadzi here?
Naiɀoɀo maperembudzi aNaamani acakunamatira iwe naʋana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi. Ipapo akaɓuɗa pamberi pake aʋa namaperembudzi, akati mbembe secando.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita ʋakati kunaErisha: Tarirai ɀino, apa patigere pamberi penyu pakamanikana, hapatiriŋgani.
Titenderei henyu tiende kwaJoridani, mumŋe nomumŋe atore ɗanda’po, tiɀiʋakire’po patiŋgagara. Iye akapindura, akati: Endai henyu.
Ɀino mumŋe akati: Tinokumbira kuti imi mutende kuenda ʋo naʋaranda ʋenyu. Akapindura, akati: Ndicaenda.
Naiɀoɀo akaenda naʋo. Ʋakati ʋaȿika kwaJoridani, ʋakatema matanda.
Asi mumŋe wakati acitema ɗanda, cese ndokuwira mumvura; akaɗanidzira, aciti: Haiwa! tenzi waŋgu! nokuti rakaŋga rakumbirwa.
Munhu waMŋari akati: Yawirepiko? Akamuratidza payakaŋga yawira. Erisha akatema rutanda, akarukandira’ko, akapapamadza ɗare.
Akati: Ciritora hako. Iye akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akaritora.
Ɀino mambo weSiria wakarwa naʋaIsraeri; akaraŋgana naʋaranda ʋake, akati: Matente aŋgu anofanira kudzikwa pokuti nopokuti.
Ɀino munhu waMŋari ndokutuma shoko kunamambo waIsraeri, akati: Cenjerai, murege kupfuʋura nopokuti, nokuti ʋaSiria ʋoɓurukira ipapo.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akatuma ʋanhu ikoko kwaakaʋudzwa nokunyeʋerwa nomunhu waMŋari, akaɀiŋgwarira’po asiŋgaɗaro kamŋe nakaʋiri ɓedzi.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo wamambo weSiria ukadzianiswa kwaɀo pamsoro pecinhu ici; akaɗana ʋaranda ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Hamuŋgandiratidzi here, kuti ndianiko pakati patiri unonzwana namambo waIsraeri?
Mumŋe waʋaranda ʋake akati: Kwete, ishe waŋgu mambo, asi Erisha muprofita, uri pakati paIsraeri, ndiye unoʋudza mambo waIsraeri mashoko amunotaura muimba yenyu yomukati.
Akati: Endai mundotarira kwaari, nditume ʋanhu kuzomutora. Akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Uri paDotani.
Naiɀoɀo akatumira’ko mabiza, neŋgoro, nehondo huru; ʋakafamba ʋusiku, ʋakakomba guta.
Ɀino muranda womunhu waMŋari wakati amuka maŋgwanani, akaɓuɗa, ndokuʋona hondo namabiza neŋgoro ɀakakomba guta. Muranda wake akati kwaari: Haiwa! tenzi waŋgu, ticaɗiniko?
Iye akapindura, akati: Usatya hako, nokuti ʋari kwatiri ʋanopfuʋura ʋari kwaʋari pakuwanda.
Ɀino Erisha akanyeŋgetera, akati: Jehova, ȿinudzai henyu meso ake, aʋone. Ipapo Jehova akaȿinudza meso ejaya, akaʋona gomo rizere namabiza, neŋgoro dzomŋoto ɀakaŋga ɀakakomba Erisha.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓurukira kwaari, Erisha akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, akati: Ƌoroʋai ʋanhu aʋa noʋupofu. Jehova akaʋaroʋa noʋupofu, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naErisha.
Erisha akati kwaʋari: Haizi iyo nzira, ʋuye guta iri harizi iro; nditeʋerei ini, ndikuisei kumunhu wamunotȿaka. Akaenda naʋo Samaria.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika Samaria, Erisha akati: Jehova, ȿinudzai meso aʋanhu aʋa, ʋaʋone. Jehova akaȿinudza meso aʋo, ʋakaʋona kuti ʋaʋa mukati meSamaria.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri wakati aciʋaʋona, akati kunaErisha: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndoʋaʋuraya here? Ndoʋaʋuraya here?
Iye akapindura, akati: Usaʋaʋuraya; ko uŋgaʋuraya ʋawakatapa nomunondo wako noʋuta bgako here? Gadzika ciŋgwa nemvura pamberi paʋo, ʋadye, ʋanwe, ʋaende kunatenzi waʋo.
Iye akaʋagadzirira ɀokudya ɀizhinji; ɀino ʋakati ʋadya nokunwa, akaʋaendisa, ʋakadzokera kunatenzi waʋo. Ɀino hondo dzaʋaSiria hadzina‐kuzopinda ɀe munyika yaIsraeri.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo, Beni‐hadadi mambo weSiria akaʋuŋganidza hondo yake yose, akandokomba Samaria.
Nzara huru ikaʋa’po paSamaria; nokuti ʋakarikomba kuȿikira musoro wemboŋgoro uciteŋgeswa namashekeri esirveri anamakumi masere,
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri wakati acipfuʋura napamsoro poruȿiŋgo, mumŋe mukadzi akaɗanidzira kwaari, akati: Ndiɓatsirei ʋo ishe waŋgu mambo!
Iye akati: Kana Jehova asiŋgakuɓatsiri, ini ndiŋgakuɓatsira neiko? Neɀinobva paɓuriro kana paciȿiniro cewaini kanhi?
Mambo akati kwaari: Unoreʋeiko? Akapindura, akati: Mukadzi uyu wakati kwandiri: Ʋuya nomŋanakomana wako, timudye nhasi, maŋgwana tigodya mŋanakomana waŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo takaɓika mŋanakomana waŋgu, tikamudya; fume maŋgwana ndikati kwaari: Ʋuya nomŋanakomana wako, timudye, iye ndokuʋanza mŋanakomana wake.
Ipapo mambo wakati acinzwa mashoko omukadzi, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake; (ɀino wakaŋga acipfuʋura naparuȿiŋgo;) ʋanhu ʋakatarira, ʋakaʋona kuti wakafuka magumbu mukati pamuʋiri wake.
Ipapo akati: Mŋari ŋgaandiroʋe, arambe aciɗaro, kana musoro waErisha mŋanakomana waShafati ukaramba uri pamsoro pake nhasi.
Asi Erisha wakaŋga agere mumba make, ʋakuru ʋagere ʋo naye;
Ɀino wakati acataurirana naʋo, nhume ikaɓurukira kwaari; iye akati: Tarirai, cakaipa ici cinobva kunaJehova; ndicamirireiko Jehova?
Erisha akati: Inzwai shoko raJehova: Ɀanzi naJehova: Maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino, ciyero cimŋe
Ɀino mukuru uyo, mambo waakaŋga akasendama paruʋoko rwake, akapindura munhu waMŋari, akati: Tarirai, kunyaŋge Jehova akaita mawindi kuɗeŋga, cinhu ici ciŋgaitika here?
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunaʋarume ʋanna ʋaiʋa namaperembudzi kunze kwesuʋo; iʋo ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Tinogarireiko pano kuȿikira tafa?

Kana tikati: Ticapinda muguta, nzara huru iri muguta, ticandofira’mo; kana tikagara pano, ticafa ʋo. Naiɀoɀo ɀino hendei tiende heɗu kuhondo dzaʋaSiria; kana ʋakatirega tiri ʋapenyu, tararama heɗu; kana ʋakatiʋuraya, tafa heɗu.
Ipapo ʋakasimuka mambakwedza, ʋakaenda kumisasa yaʋaSiria; ʋakati ʋaȿika kumisasa yokumudziʋo yaʋaSiria, ʋakawana kusinomunhu.

Nokuti Jehova wakaŋga anzwisa hondo yaʋaSiria kutinhira kweŋgoro, nokutinhira kwamabiza, kuri kutinhira kwehondo huru; ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Tarirai, mambo waIsraeri wakakoka madzimambo aʋaHiti namadzimambo aʋaEgipita kuzorwa nesu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakamuka mambakwedza, ʋakasiya matente aʋo, namabiza aʋo, namahesera aʋo, musasa wose wakaŋgoɗaro, ʋakatiza kuti ʋararame.

Ɀino ʋaya ʋaiʋa namaperembudzi ʋakati ʋaciȿika kumisasa yokumidziʋo, ʋakapinda patente rimŋe, ʋakadya nokunwa, ʋakatora’mo sirveri nendarama neŋguʋo, ʋakandoɀiʋiga; ʋakadzoka ɀe, ʋakapinda munerimŋe tente, ʋakatora ɀakaŋga ɀiri’mo ʋo, ʋakandoɀiʋiga.

Ipapo ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Hatiiti ɀakanaka; nhasi izuʋa reshoko rakanaka, asi isu tinoŋgonyarara heɗu; kana tikanonoka kuȿikira kwaedza, ticaʋiŋgwa nokurobga; naiɀoɀo hendei ɀino, tindoʋudza imba yamambo.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakaenda ʋakaɗanidzira kuʋatariri ʋesuʋo reguta, ʋakaʋaʋudza, ʋakati kwaari: Takaȿika kumisasa yaʋaSiria, tikawana kusisinomunhu’po, kunyaŋge inzwi romunhu, asi mabiza akasuŋgirwa, namahesera akasuŋgirwa, namatente akaŋgoɗaro.
Ipapo ʋatariri ʋesuʋo ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋakaʋudza ʋomumba mamambo mukati.

Mambo akamuka pakati poʋusiku, akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Ndicakuʋudzai ɀataitirwa naʋaSiria. Ʋanoziʋa kuti tinenzara; naiɀoɀo ʋakaɓuɗa pamisasa ʋakandoʋanda kusaŋgo, ʋaciti: Kana ʋakaɓuɗa muguta, ticaʋaɓata ʋari ʋapenyu, isu tigopinda muguta.

Ipapo mumŋe muranda wake akapindura, akati: Ʋamŋe ŋgaʋatore mabiza mashanu kunaakasara, akasiyiwa muguta, (tarirai, ʋakafanana naʋamŋe ʋaIsraeri ʋazhinji ʋakasara’mo; tarirai, ʋakafanana ʋo naʋamŋe ʋaIsraeri ʋazhinji ʋatoparadzwa haʋo;) tiʋatume, tiʋone.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakatora ŋgoro mbiri namabiza adzo, mambo akatuma ʋanhu kuzoteʋera hondo yaʋaSiria, akati: Endai, mundoʋona.
Iʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakaʋateʋera kuȿikira kwaJoridani, ʋakawana nzira yose izere neŋguʋo, nenhumbi, dzakaŋga dzarashwa naʋaSiria nokumhanya kwaʋo. Nhume dzikadzoka, dzikaʋudza mambo.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakapamba misasa yaʋaSiria. Naiɀoɀo ciyero coʋupfu bgakatsetseka cakateŋgeswa neshekeri rimŋe, neɀiyero ɀiʋiri ɀebari neshekeri rimŋe, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova.
Mambo akagadza mukuru uya, waakaŋga akasendama paruʋoko rwake, kuti arindire suʋo; ʋanhu ʋakamutsikirira musuʋo, akafa seɀakaŋga ɀarebga nomunhu waMŋari, wakataura
Ɀikaitika seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa nomunhu waMŋari kunamambo, ɀaakati: Maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino ɀiyero ɀiʋiri ɀebari ɀicateŋgeswa neshekeri, neciyero cimŋe coʋupfu bgakatsetseka neshekeri pasuʋo reSamaria;
mukuru uyo akapindura munhu waMŋari, akati: Ɀino tarira, kunyaŋge Jehova akaita mawindi kuɗeŋga, cinhu ici cakaɗai ciŋgaitwa here? Iye akati: Tarira, ucaɀiʋona nameso ako, asi hauŋgaɀidyi.
Ndiɀo ɀaakazoitirwa; nokuti ʋanhu ʋakamutsikirira musuʋo, akafa.

Ɀino Erisha wakataura nomukadzi uya waakaŋga amutsira mŋanakomana wake, akati: Simuka uende, iwe neimba yako, undogara kwaunogona kugara hako; nokuti Jehova wakaraira nzara; icaʋa panyika makore manomŋe.
Ɀino mukadzi akasimuka, akaita seɀaakaʋudzwa nomunhu waMŋari, akaenda naʋeimba yake, akandogara panyika yaʋaFiristia makore manomŋe.
Ɀino makore iwayo akati apera, mukadzi ndokudzoka kunyika yaʋaFiristia; akaenda kunamambo kundocema pamsoro peimba yake nomunda wake.
Ɀino mambo wakaŋga acitaurirana naGehazi muranda womunhu waMŋari,

Ɀino wakati acaʋudza mambo kuti wakamutsa wakafa, iye mukadzi wakaŋga amutsirwa mŋanakomana wake, akacema kunamambo pamsoro peimba yake nomunda wake. Ipapo Gehazi akati: Ishe waŋgu mambo, ndiyeyu mukadzi, noyuyu ndiye mŋanakomana wake, wakamutswa naErisha.
Mambo wakati abvunza mukadzi, iye akamuʋudza. Naiɀoɀo mambo wakaraira mumŋe mukuru pamsoro pake, akati: Mudzosere ɀose ɀaiʋa ɀake, nemicero yomunda, kubva pazuʋa raakabva naro panyika kuȿikira ɀino.
Ɀino Erisha wakaȿika Damasko; Beni‐hadadi mambo weSiria wakaŋga acirwara, akaʋudzwa, ɀicinzi: Munhu waMŋari waȿika pano.
Ipapo mambo akati kunaHazaeri: Tora cipo muruʋoko rwako, undosoŋgana nomunhu waMŋari, ubvunze Jehova naye, uti: Ndicapora pakurwara uku here?

Naiɀoɀo Hazaeri akandosoŋgana naye, akaenda necipo ceɀose ɀakaŋga ɀakanaka paDamasko, mutoro wakariŋgana makamera anamakumi manna, akaȿika akamira pamberi pake, akati: Mŋanakomana wenyu Beni‐hadadi mambo weSiria, wakandituma kwamuri, aciti: Ndicapora here pakurwara uku?
Erisha akati kwaari: Enda, undoti kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo hauŋgapori; asi Jehova wakandiratidza kuti ɀirokwaɀo iye ucafa.
Akaramba akamunaŋanidza kuȿikira anyara; munhu waMŋari akacema.

Ipapo Hazaeri akati: Munocemeiko, ishe waŋgu? Akapindura, akati: Nokuti ndinoziʋa ɀakaipa ɀaucaitira ʋana ʋaIsraeri; ucapisa nhare dzaʋo, ucaʋuraya majaya aʋo nomunondo, ucapxanya pxere dzaʋo, ucatumbura ʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋanemimba.
Hazaeri akati: Ko muranda wenyu cinyiko, iyo imbga hayo, kuti ndiite cinhu ici cikuru cakaɗai? Erisha akapindura, akati: Jehova wakandiziʋisa, kuti iwe ucaʋa mambo weSiria.
Ipapo akabva kunaErisha, akaenda kunatenzi wake; iye akati kwaari: Erisha wati kuɗiniko kwauri? Akapindura, akati: Wakandiʋudza kuti ɀirokwaɀo mucapora henyu.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana akatora jira, akarinyika mumvura, ndokumufumbira ciso, naiɀoɀo akafa; Hazaeri akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino negore recishanu raJorami mŋanakomana waAhabi, mambo waIsraeri, Jehoshafati ari mambo waJuda, Jehorami mŋanakomana waJehoshafati mambo waJuda, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Iye akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore makumi matatu namaʋiri; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore masere.
Akafamba nenzira yamadzimambo aIsraeri, seɀakaita imba yaAhabi; nokuti mukunda waAhabi waiʋa mukadzi wake; akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Jehova wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kuparadza Juda, nokuɗa kwaDavidi muranda wake, nokuti wakaŋga amupikira, kuti ucamupa mŋenje waʋana ʋake ŋguʋa dzose.
Ɀino namazuʋa ake ʋaEdomi ʋakamukira ʋaJuda, ʋakaɀigadzira mambo.
Ipapo Jorami akaenda Zairi, aneŋgoro dzake dzose; akamuka ʋusiku, akaparadza ʋaEdomi ʋakaŋga ʋakamukomba naʋakuru ʋeŋgoro; ʋanhu ʋakatizira kumatente aʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaEdomi ʋakamukira ʋaJuda, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi. Ipapo Ribna akaʋamukira ʋo neŋguʋa iyo.
Mamŋe maɓasa aJorami, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Jorami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi; Ahazia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore regumi namaʋiri raJorami mŋanakomana waAhabi mambo waIsraeri, Ahazia mŋanakomana waJehorami mambo waJuda, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Ahazia wakaŋga anamakore anamakumi maʋiri namaʋiri pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema gore rimŋe. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Ataria, mukunda waOmri mambo waIsraeri.
Iye wakafamba nenzira yeimba yaAhabi, akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaitwa neimba yaAhabi; nokuti wakaŋga ari mukuwasha weimba yaAhabi.
Akaenda naJorami mŋanakomana waAhabi kundorwa naHazaeri mambo weSiria paRamoti‐gireadi; ʋaSiria ʋakakuʋadza Jorami.

Mambo Jorami akadzokera Jezreeri kuti arapxe maʋaŋga ake aakatemŋa naʋaSiria paRama, ŋguʋa yaakarwa naHazaeri mambo weSiria. Ipapo Ahazia mŋanakomana waJehorami mambo waJuda akaenda kundoʋona Jorami mŋanakomana waAhabi paJezreeri, nokuti wakaŋga acirwara.
Ɀino muprofita Erisha wakaɗana mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita, akati kwaari: Ciɀisuŋga ciʋuno cako, utore cinu ici camafuta muruʋoko rwako, uende Ramoti‐gireadi.
Ɀino kana waȿika’po, utȿake’po Jehu mŋanakomana waJehoshafati mŋanakomana waNimshi; upinde
Ipapo utore cinu camafuta, ugoaɗira pamusoro wake, uciti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakuzodza, kuti uʋe mambo waIsraeri. Ipapo uzarure mukoʋa, utize, usanonoka.
Naiɀoɀo jaya, iro jaya romuprofita, rakaenda Ramoti‐gireadi.
Wakati aȿika’po, akawana ʋakuru ʋehondo ʋagere pasi; akati: Ndineshoko nemi, imi mukuru. Jehu akati: Kunani, kwatiri tose? Iye akati: Kunemi, imi mukuru.
Ipapo akasimuka, akapinda mumba; akaɗira mafuta pamusoro wake, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakuzodza uʋe mambo waʋanhu ʋaJehova, iʋo ʋaIsraeri.
Ucaparadza imba yatenzi wako Ahabi, kuti nditsiʋe ropa raʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋaprofita, neropa raʋaranda ʋose ʋaJehova kunaIzeberi.
Nokuti ʋose ʋeimba yaAhabi ʋacaparadzwa: ndicaparadza kunaAhabi ʋana ʋaʋakomana ʋose, ʋakuru naʋaɗuku pakati paIsraeri.
Ndicaita imba yaAhabi seimba yaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ʋuye seimba yaBaasha mŋanakomana waAhija.
Imbga dzicadya Izeberi panyika yeJezreeri, hakuna‐ucamuʋiga. Ipapo akazarura mukoʋa, ndokutiza.
Ɀino Jehu akaɓuɗa kuʋaranda ʋashe wake, mumŋe akati kwaari: Kunomufaro here? Ƃenzi iri rakaʋiŋgeiko kwauri? Iye akati kwaʋari: Munoziʋa henyu munhu uyu, nokutaura kwake.
Iʋo ʋakati: Inhema! Tiʋudze. Iye akati: Wandiʋudza ɀokuti neɀokuti, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakakuzodza uʋe mambo waIsraeri.
Ipapo ʋakakurumidza, mumŋe nomumŋe akatora ŋguʋo yake, akaiisa pasi pake pamsoro peɀikwiriso, ʋakaridza hwamanda, ʋakati: Jehu ndimambo!
Naiɀoɀo Jehu mŋanakomana waJehoshafati, mŋanakomana waNimshi, akamukira Jorami. (Ɀino Jorami wakaŋga acidziʋirira Ramoti‐gireadi, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose, nokuɗa kwaHazaeri mambo weSiria.

Asi mambo Jorami wakaŋga adzokera Jezreeri kuzorapxa maʋaŋga ake, aakaŋga atemŋa naʋaSiria, ŋguʋa yaakarwa naHazaeri mambo weSiria). Ipapo Jehu akati: Kana mucitenda naɀo, ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unotiza muguta, kundoʋudza iɀoɀo paJezreeri.
Naiɀoɀo Jehu akafamba neŋgoro, akaenda Jezreeri, nokuti Jorami wakaŋga aʋete’po. Ɀino Ahazia mambo waJuda wakaŋga aenda’ko kuzoʋona Jorami.
Ɀino nharirire yakaŋga imire pamsoro peshoŋgwe yeJezreeri, ikaʋona ɓoka raJehu riciʋuya, ikati: Ndinoʋona ɓoka

Naiɀoɀo mumŋe akakwira biza, akandosoŋgana naye, akati: Ɀanzi namambo: Kunorugare here? Jehu akati: Uneiko norugare? Enda shure kwaŋgu. Ipapo nharirire yakataura, ikati: Nhume yakaȿika kwaʋari, asi haidzoki ɀe.
Ɀino akatuma wecipiri, wakaŋga akataȿa biza, iye akaȿika kwaari, akati: Ɀanzi namambo: Kunorugare here? Jehu akapindura, akati: Uneiko norugare? Enda shure kwaŋgu.
Ɀino nharirire yakataura, ikati: Wakaȿika hake kwaʋari, asi haadzoki ɀe; ʋuye kufambisa kwakafanana nokufambisa kwaJehu mŋanakomana waNimshi, nokuti unofambisa ɀinotyisa.
Ipapo Jorami akati: Suŋgai
Ɀino Jorami wakati aciʋona Jehu, akati: Kunorugare here, nhai Jehu? Iye akapindura, akati: Rugare rwei! kana ʋufeʋe bgamai ʋako Izeberi noʋuroyi bgaʋo ʋuciri’po ʋuzhinji bgakaɗai!
Ipapo Jorami akadzosa ŋgoro yake, akatiza, akati kunaAhazia: Tanyeŋgerwa Ahazia!
Ipapo Jehu akahwembura ʋuta bgake nesimba rose, akafura Jorami pakati pamafudzi ake, museʋe ndokuɓuɗa napamŋoyo wake, akawira muŋgoro yake.
Ɀino

Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakaʋona zuro ropa raNaboti, neropa raʋanakomana ʋake; ini ndicakutsiʋa paɓindu iri romunda, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Naiɀoɀo ɀino, mutore umukandire paɓindu romunda, seɀakataurwa naJehova.
Asi Ahazia mambo waJuda, wakati aciɀiʋona, akatiza nenzira yakapfuʋura napaimba yomunda, Jehu akamuteʋera, akati: Muʋuraye naiye ʋo muŋgoro.
Ʋaranda ʋake ʋakamutakurira Jerusarema neŋgoro, ʋakamuʋiga pabgiro bgake kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi.
Ahazia akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaJuda pagore regumi nerimŋe raJorami mŋanakomana waAhabi.
Ɀino Jehu wakati aciȿika paJezreeri, Izeberi akaɀinzwa; akazodza kumeso kwake, nokushoŋgedza musoro wake, akatarira napawindi.
Ɀino Jehu wakati acipinda napasuʋo, akati: Kunorugare here, nhai iwe Zimri, muʋurayi watenzi wako?
Iye akatarira kumsoro kuwindi, akati: Ndianiko unonzwana neni? Ndianiko? Ipapo ʋaranda ʋaʋiri kana ʋatatu ʋakatarira kwaari napawindi.
Akati: Musundire pasi. Naiɀoɀo ʋakamusundira pasi, rimŋe ropa rake rikacambgadzira pamadziro napamabiza, akamutsika namakumbo ake.
Ɀino wakati apinda, akadya nokunwa, akati: Ɀino ciendai mundotarira mukadzi uyo wakatukwa, mumuʋige, nokuti mukunda wamambo.
Ʋakaenda kundomuʋiga, asi haʋana‐kuwana cinhu, asi ɗehenya rake, netsoka, neɀanza ɀamaʋoko ake.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakadzoka ʋakamuʋudza. Iye akati: Ndiro shoko raJehova, raakataura nomuranda wake Eria muTishbi, ɀaakati: Imbga dzicadya nyama yaIzeberi panyika yeJezreeri;
ʋuye citunha caIzeberi cicaʋa somupfudze pamsoro pomunda panyika yeJezreeri; naiɀoɀo haʋangati: Uyu ndiye Izeberi.
Ɀino Ahabi wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanamakumi manomŋe paSamaria. Jehu akanyora ŋwadi, akadzitumira Samaria kuʋaɓati ʋeJezreeri, iʋo ʋakuru, nokuʋareri ʋaʋana ʋaAhabi, akati:
Ɀino kana ŋwadi iyi iciȿika kwamuri, ʋanakomana ʋatenzi waŋgu ɀaʋari’ko kwamuri, neŋgoro namabiza ɀiri’ko kwamuri, neguta rakakombga noruȿiŋgo, nenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo;
ciɀitsaurirai mŋanakomana watenzi wenyu wakaiȿo‐naka wakakwana kukunda ʋamŋe, mumugadze pacigaro coʋushe caɓaɓa ʋake, murwire imba yatenzi wenyu.
Asi iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋacitya kwaɀo, ʋakati: Madzimambo maʋiri akaŋga asiŋgagoni kumukunda, ɀino isu ticamukunda seiko?
Ɀino mutariri weimba nomutariri weguta, naʋakuru, naʋareri

Ipapo wakanyora ŋwadi rwecipiri kwaʋari, akati: Kana mukanzwana neni, kana mukaterera inzwi raŋgu, ʋuyai kwandiri Jezreeri maŋgwana neŋguʋa ino nemisoro yaʋarume, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋatenzi wenyu. Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋamambo, iʋo ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe, ʋaiʋa kuʋakuru ʋeguta, ʋaiʋarera.
Ɀino ŋwadi iyo yakati iciȿika kwaʋari, ʋakaɓata ʋanakomana ʋamambo, ʋakaʋaʋuraya, iʋo ʋanhu ʋanamakumi manomŋe, ʋakaisa misoro yaʋo mumateŋgu, ndokuitumira kwaari Jezreeri.
Nhume ikaȿika, ikamuʋudza, ikati: Ʋaʋuya nemisoro yaʋanakomana ʋamambo. Iye akati: Itai mirwi miʋiri nayo, muiise paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo, kuȿikira maŋgwana.
Fume maŋgwana akaɓuɗa, akandomira’po, akati kuʋanhu ʋose: Imi hamunemhoȿa henyu; tarirai, ndini ndamukira tenzi waŋgu, ndikamuʋuraya; asi ndianiko waʋuraya aʋa ʋose?
Ɀino muziʋe kuti hakuneshoko rimŋe raJehova ricawira pasi, rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro peimba yaAhabi; nokuti Jehova wakaita ɀaakataura nomuranda wake Eria.
Naiɀoɀo Jehu akaʋuraya ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋeimba yaAhabi paJezreeri, naʋanhu ʋake ʋakuru ʋose, neshamŋari dzake, naʋaprista ʋake, kuȿikira asina‐kumusiyira nomumŋe.
Ɀino akasimuka, akabva, akaenda Samaria. Wakati aȿika paimba yaʋafudzi panzira, paʋaiʋeʋura makwai,
Jehu akasoŋgana naʋanuŋuna ʋaAhazi mambo waJuda, akati: Ndimi aniko? Iʋo ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Tiri ʋanuŋuna ʋaAhazia, toɓuruka kundokwazisa ʋana ʋamambo naʋana ʋaʋahosi.
Iye akati: Ʋaɓatei ʋari ʋapenyu. Ʋakaʋaɓata ʋari ʋapenyu, ʋakaʋaʋuraya padziʋa reimba paʋaiʋeʋura makwai, ʋarume ʋaiʋa ʋanamakumi manna naʋaʋiri; haana‐kusiya mumŋe waʋo.

Ɀino wakati abva’po, akasoŋgana naJehonadabi mŋanakomana waRehabi, waŋga aciʋuya kuzosoŋgana naye; akamukwazisa, akati kwaari: Mŋoyo wako wakarurama here, sokururama kwomŋoyo waŋgu kwauri? Jehonadabi akapindura, akati: Wakarurama hawo. Kana ɀakaɗaro, ndiɓate ruʋoko rwaŋgu. Iye akaɓata ruʋoko rwake, ndokumukwidza muŋgoro maakaŋga ari.
Akati: Hendei, undoʋona kushiŋgaira kwandinoshiŋgairira Jehova nako. Naiɀoɀo ʋakamufambisa muŋgoro yake.
Wakati aȿika Samaria, akaʋuraya ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaAhabi muSamaria, kuȿikira amuparadza, seshoko raJehova rakaŋga rarebga naEria.
Ipapo Jehu akaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋose, akati kwaʋari: Ahabi wakashumira Baari ɀishoma, asi Jehu ucamushumira kwaɀo.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciɗanai ʋaprofita ʋose ʋaBaari, naʋose ʋanonamata kwaari, naʋaprista ʋake ʋose, ʋaʋuye kwandiri; ŋgakurege kushaikwa kunyaŋge nomumŋe; nokuti ndinoɗa kuɓayira Baari ciɓayiro cikuru; aninani unoshaikwa haaŋgararami. Asi Jehu wakaita iɀoɀo namano, aciɗa kuʋuraya ʋanamati ʋaBaari.
Ɀino Jehu akati: Tsaurirai Baari zuʋa romutambo mukuru. Ʋakaparidza iɀoɀo.
Ɀino Jehu akatuma nhume pakati paIsraeri pose, ʋose ʋanamati ʋaBaari ʋakaʋuya; hakunomunhu wakasara, akasaʋuya. Ʋakapinda mumba maBaari, imba yaBaari ikazara, kuȿika kumadziro nokumadziro.
Akati kumutariri weŋguʋo: Ʋigira ʋanamati ʋaBaari ʋose ŋguʋo. Iye akaʋaʋigira ŋguʋo.

Ipapo Jehu akapinda mumba maBaari, anaJehonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi, akati kuʋanamati ʋaBaari: Tȿakai, mutarire kwaɀo kuti pano pakati penyu parege kuʋa nomuranda mumŋe waJehova, asi ʋanamati ʋaBaari ɓedzi.

Ʋakapinda kundoɓayira ɀiɓayiro neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa. Ɀino Jehu wakaŋga araira ʋarume ʋanamakumi masere panze, aciti: Kana mumŋe waʋarume ʋandinoisa pamaʋoko enyu akapukunyuka, munhu unomurega akapukunyuka, ucamufira.

Ɀino wakati apedza kuɓayira cipiriso cinopiswa, Jehu akati kuʋarindi nokuʋakuru: Pindai, muʋaʋuraye; musatendera mumŋe kuɓuɗa. Iʋo ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza; ʋarindi naʋakuru ʋakaʋarashira kunze, ʋakaenda kuguta reimba yaBaari.
Ipapo ʋakaɓuɗisa mbiru dzaiʋa mumba maBaari, ʋakadzipisa.
Ʋakaputsa ʋo mbiru yaBaari, ʋakaputsa ʋo imba yaBaari, ʋakaiita imba yecishaŋgo kuȿikira nhasi.
Naiɀoɀo Jehu wakaparadza Baari pakati paIsraeri.
Asi Jehu haana‐kurega kuteʋera ɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo, ɀemhuru dzendarama dzaiʋa paBeti‐eri, nedzaiʋa paDani.

Ɀino Jehova akati kunaJehu: Ɀawakaita ɀakanaka ukaita ɀakarurama pamberi paŋgu, ukaitira imba yaAhabi ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumŋoyo maŋgu, ɀino ʋana ʋako ʋorudzi rwecinna ʋacagara pacigaro coʋushe bgaIsraeri.
Asi Jehu haana‐kuraŋgarira kufamba nomŋoyo wose nomurairo waJehova Mŋari waIsraeri; haana‐kurega ɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Pamazuʋa iwayo Jehova wakataŋga kutapudza Israeri; Hazaeri akaʋakunda panyika yose yaIsraeri;
kubva kunaJoridani ɀicienda mabva‐zuʋa, nenyika yose yaGireadi, neyaʋaGadi, neyaʋaRubeni, neyaʋaManase, kubva paAroeri pamupata weArnoni, ndiro Gireadi neBashani.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehu, neɀose ɀaakaita, nesimba rake rose, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Jehu akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga paSamaria, Jehoahazi mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ŋguʋa yakaɓata Jehu ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria aiʋa makore anamakumi maʋiri namasere.
Ɀino Ataria mai ʋaAhazia, wakati aciʋona kuti mŋanakomana wake wafa, akasimuka, akaparadza ʋose ʋorudzi rwamambo.

Asi Jehosheba mukunda wamambo Jorami, hanɀadzi yaAhazia, wakatora Joashi mŋanakomana waAhazia, akamuɓa pakati paʋanakomana ʋamambo ʋaiʋurawa, iye nomureri wake, mumba mokuʋata; ʋakamuʋanza panaAtaria, naiɀoɀo haana‐kuʋurawa.
Akagara naye akaʋanzwa mumba maJehova makore matanhatu; Ataria akaɓata ʋushe panyika.
Ɀino negore recinomŋe Jehoyada akatuma
Akaʋaraira, akati: Munofanira kuita kuɗai: Imi ʋanopinda nesaɓata, cetatu cenyu munofanira kuʋa ʋarindi ʋeimba yamambo;
cimŋe cetatu cinofanira kumira pasuʋo rinonzi Suri; cimŋe cetatu ɀe ʋanofanira kumira pasuʋo riri shure kwaʋarindi ʋamambo; saiɀoɀo munofanira kurinda imba, nokuidziʋirira.
Mapoka enyu maʋiri, imi mose munoɓuɗa nesaɓata, munofanira kurinda imba yaJehova mucikomba mambo.
Mukombe mambo, mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo muruʋoko rwake; aninani unopinda pakati pemisara, unofanira kuʋurawa; mugare namambo kana aciɓuɗa ʋuye kana acipinda.
Ʋakuru ʋamazana ʋakaita ɀose ɀaʋakarairwa nomuprista Jehoyada; mumŋe nomumŋe akatora ʋanhu ʋake, iʋo ʋaifanira kupinda nesaɓata, naiʋo ʋaifanira kuɓuɗa nesaɓata, ʋakaȿika kumuprista Jehoyada.
Muprista akapa ʋakuru ʋamazana mapfumo nenhoʋo ɀaiʋa ɀamambo Davidi, ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumba maJehova.
Ɀino ʋarindi ʋamambo ʋakamira mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo muruʋoko rwake, kubva kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba kuȿikira kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe rweimba, napaartari neimba, ʋakakomba mambo.
Ipapo akaɓuɗisa mŋanakomana wamambo, akamudzika korona,
Ɀino Ataria wakati acinzwa mhere‐mhere yaʋarindi ʋamambo naʋanhu, akapinda kuʋanhu mumba maJehova.

Akatarira, ndokuʋona mambo amire pambiru, netsika yaʋo, naʋakuru naʋakaŋga ʋanehwamanda ʋamire kunamambo; ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋakafara, ʋakaridza hwamanda. Ipapo Ataria akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Ndamukirwa, ndamukirwa!

Ɀino muprista Jehoyada akaraira ʋakuru ʋamazana, ʋairaira hondo, akati kwaʋari: Muɓuɗisei pakati pemisara yaʋanhu; aninani unomuteʋera iye, munofanira kumuʋuraya nomunondo; nokuti muprista wakati: Ŋgaarege kuʋurayirwa mukati meimba yaJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakamudziʋirira nzira, akaenda nenzira yaipinda mabiza nayo kumba kwamambo, ndokuʋurayirwa’po.
Ɀino Jehoyada akaita suŋgano pakati paJehova namambo naʋanhu, kuti ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋaJehova; ʋuye ʋo pakati pamambo naʋanhu.

Ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋakaenda kumba kwaBaari, ʋakaiputsa; ʋakaputsanya kwaɀo artari dzake nemifananidzo yake, ʋakaʋuraya Matani muprista waBaari pamberi peartari. Muprista akagadza ʋatariri paimba yaJehova.

Akatora ʋakuru ʋamazana, naʋaKari, naʋarindi ʋamambo, naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, ʋakaɓurusa mambo paimba yaJehova, ʋakaenda kumba kwamambo nenzira yesuʋo raʋarindi ʋamambo. Iye akagara pacigaro coʋushe camadzimambo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋakafara, guta rikanyarara; ʋakaʋuraya Ataria nomunondo paimba yamambo.
Jehoashi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe anamakore manomŋe.
Ɀino negore recinomŋe raJehu, Jehoashi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi manna; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Zibia weBeeri‐sheba.
Jehoashi akaita ɀakanaka pamberi paJehova mazuʋa ake ose, aakadzidziswa nawo nomuprista Jehoyada.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa; ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciɓayira ɀiɓayiro nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira.

Ɀino Jehoashi akati kuʋaprista: Mari yose yeɀinhu ɀakatsaurwa, inoiswa mumba maJehova, mari yaʋanhu ʋakaʋereŋgwa, nemari yaʋose seɀaʋakatarirwa mumŋe nomumŋe, nemari yose, inoiswa mumba maJehova nomumŋe nomumŋe nomŋoyo wake,
ʋaprista ŋgaʋatore mari iyo, mumŋe nomumŋe kumuzikanwi wake, ʋagadzire ɀakaputsika paimba, pose pose paʋanowana pakaputsika.
Asi negore ramakumi maʋiri namatatu ramambo Jehoashi ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋacigere kugadzira ɀakaputsika paimba.

Ɀino mambo Jehoashi akaɗana muprista Jehoyada naʋamŋe ʋaprista, akati kwaʋari: Munoregereiko kugadzira ɀakaputsika paimba? Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciregai kutora mari kuʋazikanwi ʋenyu, asi muiɓuɗisire ɀakaputsika paimba.
Ʋaprista ʋakatenda kusatora mari kuʋanhu, kunyaŋge kugadzira ɀakaputsika paimba.
Asi muprista Jehoyada wakatora bokisi, akabvoʋora ʋuri pacifunhiro caro, akarigadzika kurutiʋi rweartari, kurudyi rwomunhu, kana acipinda paimba yaJehova.
Ɀino ʋakati kana ʋoʋona kuti mari zhinji yaʋa’mo mubokisi, munyori wamambo nomuprista mukuru ndokuʋuya, ndokuiisa muhomo, ʋaciʋereŋga mari yakawanikwa mumba maJehova.
Ʋakaisa mari yakayerwa mumaʋoko aʋaiɓata ɓasa iro, ʋaitarira imba yaJehova; ɀino iʋo ʋairipira nayo ʋaʋezi naʋaʋaki ʋaiɓata paimba yeJehova,
naʋairoŋga naʋaiʋeza mabge, ʋakateŋga matanda namabge akaʋezwa okugadzirisa nawo ɀakaputsika paimba yaJehova, nokuripira ɀose ɀaiɗikanwa kuzogadzirisa naɀo imba.
Asi haʋana‐kuitira imba yaJehova mikombe yesirveri, nembato dzemŋenje, nembiya, nehwamanda, nemidziyo yendarama, nemidziyo yesirveri, nemari yakaiswa mumba maJehova,
nokuti ʋakaiisa kunaʋaiɓate‐ɓasa, kuti ʋagadzirise imba yaJehova nayo.
Ʋuye haʋana‐kuzobvunza ʋanhu aʋo, ʋaʋaipa mari mumaʋoko aʋo, kuzoripira ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa; nokuti iʋo ʋaiɓata ʋakatendeka.
Asi mari yeɀipiriso ɀemhoȿa, nemari yeɀipiriso ɀeɀiʋi, haɀina‐kuiswa mumba maJehova; yakapiwa ʋaprista.
Ɀino Hazaeri mambo weSiria wakaenda kundorwa neGati, akarikunda, Hazaeri akarinza ciso cake kuenda Jerusarema.

Asi Jehoashi mambo waJuda, wakatora ɀinhu ɀose ɀakatsaurwa, ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurwa namadziɓaɓa ake, Jehoshafati, naJehorami, naAhazia, madzimambo aJuda, neɀinhu ɀake ɀose ɀakatsaurwa, nendarama yose yakawanikwa pafuma yeimba yaJehova neimba yamambo, akaɀituma kunaHazaeri mambo weSiria; iye akabva Jerusarema.
Mamŋe maɓasa aJoashi, neɀose ɀaakaita, hazina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋake ʋakasimuka, ʋakaraŋgana, ʋakaʋuraya Joashi paimba yaMiro,
Nokuti Jozakari mŋanakomana waShimeati, naJehozabadi mŋanakomana waShomeri, ʋaranda ʋake, ʋakamuɓaya, akafa; ʋakamuʋiga kumadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi; Amazia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino negore ramakumi maʋiri namatatu raJoashi mŋanakomana waAhazia, mambo waJuda, Jehoahazi mŋanakomana waJehu wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria, akaʋuɓata makore anegumi namanomŋe.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akateʋera ɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo; haana‐kutsauka kwaɀiri.
Ɀino Jehova akatsamŋira Israeri, akaʋaisa muruʋoko rwaHazaeri mambo weSiria, nomuruʋoko rwaBeni‐hadadi mŋanakomana waHazaeri mazuʋa ose.
Ipapo Jehoahazi akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, Jehova akamunzwa; nokuti wakaʋona kutambudzwa kwaIsraeri kwaʋakatambudzwa nako namambo weSiria.
(Asi Jehova wakapa Israeri muponesi, ʋakasunuŋguka pamaʋoko aʋaSiria; ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakagara mumatente aʋo sakare.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro haʋana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀeimba yaJeroboami, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo, asi ʋakaramba ʋacifamba maɀiri; ʋuye matanda okunamata nawo akaramba ari’po paSamaria.)

Nokuti haana‐kusiyira Jehoahazi ʋanhu, asi ʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋanamakumi mashanu, neŋgoro dzinegumi, naʋanhu ʋaifamba namakumbo ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi; nokuti mambo weSiria wakaʋaparadza, akaʋaita seguruʋa rinotsikwa pasi.
Mamŋe maɓasa aJehoahazi, neɀose ɀaakaita, nesimba rake, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Jehoahazi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga paSamaria; Joashi mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore ramakumi matatu namanomŋe raJoashi mambo waJuda, Jehoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria, akaʋuɓata makore anegumi namatanhatu.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo; asi wakaramba acifamba maɀiri.
Mamŋe maɓasa aJoashi, neɀose ɀaakaita, nesimba rake raakarwa naro naAmazia mambo waJuda, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Joashi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, Jeroboami akagara pacigaro cake coʋushe; Joashi akaʋigwa paSamaria kunamadzimambo aIsraeri.
Ɀino Erisha wakarwara nokurwara kwaakazofa nako, Joashi mambo waIsraeri akaenda kwaari, akacema pamsoro pake, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ŋgoro yaIsraeri naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ayo!
Erisha akati kwaari: Tora ʋuta nemiseʋe; akatora ʋuta nemiseʋe.
Akati kunamambo waIsraeri: Isa ruʋoko rwako paʋuta; iye akaisa ruʋoko rwake

Akati: Zarura windi rinotarira mabvazuʋa; iye akarizarura. Ɀino Erisha akati: Fura! Iye akafura. Akati: Ndiwo museʋe waJehova unokunda, ndiwo museʋe unokunda ʋaSiria; nokuti imi mucakunda ʋaSiria paAfeki, kuȿikira maʋaparadza.
Akati: Tora miseʋe; iye akaitora. Akati kunamambo waIsraeri: Roʋa pasi! Iye akaroʋa pasi katatu, akarega.
Ipapo munhu waMŋari akamutsamŋira, akati: Waifanira kuroʋa kashanu kana katanhatu, ipapo waikunda ʋaSiria kuȿikira waʋaparadza cose; asi ɀino ucakunda ʋaSiria katatu ɓedzi.
Erisha akafa, ʋakamuʋiga. Ɀino hondo dzaʋaMoabi dzikapinda munyika pakutaŋga kwegore.
Ɀino mumŋe musi ʋakati ʋaciʋiga munhu, ʋakaʋona hondo yaʋaMoabi, ʋakakandira munhu mubgiro bgaErisha; ɀino munhu uyo wakati acigunɀa mafupa aErisha, akararama ɀe, akamira namakumbo ake.
Ɀino Hazaeri mambo weSiria akatambudza ʋaIsraeri mazuʋa ose aJehoahazi.
Asi Jehova wakaʋanzwira tsitsi, akaʋa nenyasha naʋo, akaʋa ʋo nehanya naʋo, nokuɗa kwesuŋgano yake naAbrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo; akasaɗa kuʋaparadza, kana kuʋarashira kure naye paŋguʋa iyo.
Ɀino Hazaeri mambo weSiria akafa, Beni‐hadadi mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ipapo Jehoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi akatorera ɀe Beni‐hadadi mŋanakomana waHazaeri, maguta aakaŋga atorera ɓaɓa ʋake Jehoahazi pakurwa. Joashi akamukunda katatu, akatora ɀe maguta aIsraeri.
Negore recipiri raJoashi mŋanakomana waJoahazi mambo waIsraeri, Amazia mŋanakomana waJoashi mambo waJuda, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe anamakore makumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jehoadini weJerusarema.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, asi haana‐kufanana naɓaɓa ʋake Davidi; akaita ɀose ɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake Joashi.
Asi matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa, asi ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciɓayira nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira.
Ɀino ʋushe bgakati ʋucaŋgosimbiswa naye, akaʋuraya ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuraya mambo ɓaɓa ʋake.

Asi haana‐kuʋuraya ʋana ʋaʋaʋurayi, seɀaɀakanyorwa mubuku yomurairo waMosesi, seɀakaraira Jehova, aciti: Madziɓaɓa ŋgaarege kuʋurawa nokuɗa kwaʋana, kana ʋana ŋgaʋarege kuʋurawa nokuɗa kwamadziɓaɓa; asi munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaafire ɀiʋi ɀake.
Akaʋuraya ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi ɀaʋaEdomi pamupata womunyu, akakunda ʋo Sera pakurwa, akaritumidza zita rinonzi Jokteeri, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino Amazia akatuma nhume kunaJehoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi mŋanakomana waJehu, mambo waIsraeri, akati: Ʋuya, tiʋonane.
Jehoashi mambo waIsraeri akatuma
Iwe wakunda ʋaEdomi, ɀino mŋoyo wako woɀikudza; ciɀikudza hako, ugare kumusha; nokuti unotȿakireiko njodzi, uwire’mo, iwe naJuda pamŋe cete newe?
Asi Amazia wakaramba kunzwa. Naiɀoɀo Jehoashi mambo waIsraeri akaenda; iye naAmazia mambo waJuda ʋakaʋonana paBeti‐shemeshi raiʋa raJuda.
ƲaJuda ʋakakundwa naʋaIsraeri, mumŋe nomumŋe akatizira kutente rake.

Jehoashi mambo waIsraeri akasuŋga Amazia mambo waJuda, mŋanakomana waJehoashi, mŋanakomana waAhazia, paBeti‐shemeshi, akaȿika Jerusarema, akaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema, kubva pasuʋo raEfraimi kuȿikira pasuʋo rapakona, makubiti anamazana manna.
Akatora ndarama yose nesirveri, nemidziyo yose yakawanikwa mumba maJehova, napafuma yomumba mamambo, naʋanhu kuzoʋa ruɓatso, akadzokera Samaria.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehoashi aakaita, nesimba rake, nokurwa kwake naAmazia mambo waJuda, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Jehoashi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa paSamaria kunamadzimambo aIsraeri; Jeroboami akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Amazia mŋanakomana waJoashi mambo waJuda wakaramba ari mupenyu makore anegumi namashanu, shure kwokufa kwaJehoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi mambo waIsraeri.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAmazia haana‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Ɀino ʋakaraŋgana kumuʋuraya paJerusarema, akatizira Rakishi; asi ʋakatuma ʋanhu Rakishi ʋacimuteʋera, ʋakamuʋurayira’po.
Ʋakaʋuya naye pamabiza, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda ʋakatora Azaria, wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namatanhatu, ʋakamuita mambo panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake Amazia.
Akaʋaka Erati, akaridzosera kunaJuda, mambo aʋata namadziɓaɓa ake.
Negore regumi namashanu raAmazia mŋanakomana waJoashi mambo waJuda, Jeroboami mŋanakomana waJoashi, mambo waIsraeri, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe paSamaria, akaʋuɓata makore anamakumi manna nerimŋe.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀose ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.

Akakunda ɀe nyika yaIsraeri, kubva paʋanopinda paHamati kuȿikira paguŋgwa reAraba, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, raakataura nomuromo womuranda wake Jona, mŋanakomana waAmitai, muprofita weGati‐heferi.
Nokuti Jehova wakaʋona kutambudzika kwaIsraeri, kuti kwakaŋga kwakanyanya kwaɀo; nokuti kwakaŋga kusinaʋakuru naʋaɗuku, kwakaŋga kusinomuɓetseri waIsraeri.
Asi Jehova haana‐kutaura kuti ucadzima zita raIsraeri pasi peɗeŋga, asi wakaʋaponesa noruʋoko rwaJeroboami mŋanakomana waJoashi.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJeroboami, neɀose ɀaakaita, nesimba rake, nokurwa kwake, nokudzosera kwake Damasko neHamati kunaIsraeri, aiʋa
Jeroboami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, madzimambo aIsraeri; Zekaria mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe raJeroboami mambo waIsraeri, Azaria mŋanakomana waAmazia mambo waJuda wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namatanhatu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anamakumi mashanu namaʋiri; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jekoria weJerusarema.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake Amazia paɀose.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa; ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciɓayira nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira.
Jehova akaroʋa mambo, akaʋa namaperembudzi kuȿikira zuʋa rokufa kwake, akagara ari oga muimba. Jotami mŋanakomana wamambo akaʋa mutariri weimba, akatoŋga ʋo mhoȿa dzaʋanhu ʋenyika.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAzaria, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Azaria akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi; Jotami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore ramakumi matatu namasere raAzaria mambo waJuda, Zekaria mŋanakomana waJeroboami wakaʋa mambo waIsraeri paSamaria mŋedzi mitanhatu.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita madziɓaɓa ake; haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Sharumi mŋanakomana waJabeshi akamumukira, akamuɓaya pamberi paʋanhu, akamuʋuraya, iye akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aZekaria, tarirai akanyorwa mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri.
Ndiro shoko raJehova raakataura kunaJehu, aciti: Ʋanakomana ʋako ʋacagara pacigaro coʋushe bgaIsraeri kuȿikira parudzi rwecinna. Ɀikaitwa saiɀoɀo.
Sharumi mŋanakomana waJabeshi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe negore ramakumi matatu namapfumbamŋe raUzia mambo waJuda; akaɓata ʋushe paSamaria mŋedzi mumŋe.
Ɀino Menahemi mŋanakomana waGadi akabva Tirza, akaȿika Samaria, akaɓaya Sharumi mŋanakomana waJabeshi paSamaria, akamuʋuraya, akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aSharumi, nokumukira kwake, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamakoronike amadziɓaɓa aIsraeri.

Ɀino Menahemi akaparadza Tifsa, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari mukati maro, nenyika yaro, kubva paTirza; akariparadza, nokuti ʋakaramba kumuzarurira; akatumbura ʋakadzi ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanemimba, ʋaiʋa mukati maro.
Negore ramakumi matatu namapfumbamŋe raAzaria mambo waJuda, Menahemi mŋanakomana waGadi, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri, akaʋuɓata makore anegumi paSamaria.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; mazuʋa ake ose haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.
Ɀino Puri mambo weAsiria akaʋuya kuzorwa nenyika; Menahemi akapa Puri matarenta anecuru cimŋe cesirveri,
Menahemi akateresa Israeri, mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga anesimba, akafuma, akaɓuɗisa mashekeri anamakumi mashanu esirveri,
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aMenahemi, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri?
Menahemi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, Pekahia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore ramakumi mashanu raAzaria mambo waJuda, Pekahia mŋanakomana waMenahemi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria, akaʋuɓata makore maʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.

Ɀino Peka mŋanakomana waRemaria, mukuru wake wehondo akamumukira, akamuʋuraya paSamaria, munhare yeimba yamambo, iye naArgobi naArie naʋanhu ʋanamakumi mashanu ʋaGireadi ʋaakaŋga anaʋo; akamuʋuraya, akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aPekahia, neɀose ɀaakaita, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri.
Negore ramakumi mashanu namaʋiri raAzaria mambo waJuda, Peka, mŋanakomana waRemaria, akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria, akaʋuɓata makore makumi maʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; haana‐kutsauka paɀiʋi ɀaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, ɀaakatadzisa Israeri naɀo.

Namazuʋa aPeka mambo waIsraeri, Tigrati‐pireseri mambo weAsiria akaȿika, akakunda Ijoni, neAberibeti‐maaka, neJanoa, neKadeshi, neHazori, neGireadi, neGariri, iyo nyika yose yeNaftari; akaʋatapa, akaenda naʋo Asiria.
Ɀino Hoshea mŋanakomana waEra akaita ndaŋga pamsoro paPeka mŋanakomana waRemaria, akamuɓaya, akamuʋuraya, ndokumuteʋera paʋushe, negore ramakumi maʋiri raJotami mŋanakomana waUzia.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aPeka, neɀose ɀaakaita, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aIsraeri.
Negore recipiri raPeka mŋanakomana waRemaria mambo waIsraeri, Jotami mŋanakomana waUzia mambo waJuda, wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Wakaŋga aȿika makore anamakumi maʋiri namashanu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namatanhatu; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jerusha mukunda waZadoki.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, akaita ɀose ɀakaitwa naɓaɓa ʋake Uzia.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa; ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciɓayira nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira. Ndiye wakaʋaka suʋo rokumsoro reimba yaJehova.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJotami, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Namazuʋa iwayo Jehova akataŋga kutuma Rezini mambo weSiria naPeka mŋanakomana waRemaria kuzorwa naJuda.
Jotami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa kunamadziɓaɓa ake muguta raɓaɓa ʋake Davidi; Ahazi mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Negore regumi namanomŋe raPeka mŋanakomana waRemaria, Ahazi mŋanakomana waJotami mambo waJuda wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
Ahazi akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore makumi maʋiri; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namatanhatu. Asi haana‐kuita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake, saɓaɓa ʋake Davidi.
Nokuti wakafamba nenzira yamadziɓaɓa aIsraeri, akapinza ʋo mŋanakomana wake mumŋoto netsika dzeɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋahedeni, ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Akaɓayira nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira, napaɀikomo, napasi pemiti yose mitema.
Ipapo Rezini mambo weSiria, naPeka mŋanakomana waRemaria, mambo waIsraeri, ʋakaȿika Jerusarema kuzorwa
Neŋguʋa iyo Rezini mambo weSiria akadzosera ɀe Siria Erati, akadziŋga ʋaJuda paErati; ʋakaenda Erati, ʋakagara’po kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino Ahazi akatuma nhume kunaTigrati‐pireseri mambo weAsiria, akati: Ndiri muranda wenyu nomŋanakomana wenyu; ʋuyai mundirwire muruʋoko rwamambo weSiria, nomuruʋoko rwamambo waIsraeri, ʋanondimukira.
Ipapo Ahazi akatora sirveri nendarama ɀakawanikwa mumba maJehova, napafuma yeimba yamambo, akaɀituma kunamambo weAsiria, ciʋe cipo.
Mambo weAsiria akamunzwa, mambo weAsiria akandorwa neDamasko, akarikunda, akatapa ʋanhu, akaʋaisa Kiri, akaʋuraya Rezini.

Ɀino mambo Ahazi akaenda Damasko kundosoŋgana naTigrati‐pireseri mambo weAsiria, akaʋona artari yakaŋga iri paDamasko; mambo Ahazi akatuma mufananidzo weartari kunaUria muprista, nomuʋakirwe wayo, nomuitirwe wayo wose.
Muprista Uria akaʋaka artari yakafanana neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀatumŋa namambo Ahazi aciri Damasko, muprista Uria akaiita saiɀoɀo mambo Ahazi acigere kudzoka Damasko.
Ɀino mambo wakati adzoka Damasko, mambo akaʋona artari, mambo akasweɗera paartari, kuzoɓayira pamsoro payo.
Akapisira pamsoro peartari cipiriso cake cinopiswa, necipiriso cake coʋupfu, akaɗururira’po cipiriso cake cinoɗururwa, akasasira’po ropa reɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa.
Ʋuye artari yendarira, yaiʋa pamberi paJehova, wakaibvisa pamukoʋa weimba, pakati peartari yake neimba yaJehova, akaiisa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro rweartari yake.

Ɀino mambo Ahazi akaraira muprista Uria, akati: Cipisira cipiriso camaŋgwanani paartari huru, necipiriso coʋupfu camaɗekwana, necipiriso camambo cinopiswa, necipiriso cake coʋupfu, necipiriso caʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, necipiriso caʋo coʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀinoɗururwa; ʋuye usasire pamsoro payo ropa rose recipiriso cinopiswa, neropa rose reɀiɓayiro; asi artari yendarira ndiyo yandicabvunza
Naiɀoɀo muprista Uria akaita ɀose ɀaakaŋga arairwa namambo Ahazi.
Mambo Ahazi akagura ʋukomba bgeɀiŋgoro, akabvisa mudziyo wokushamba pamsoro paɀo, akabvisa ʋo dziʋa pamsoro penzombe dzendarira dzakaŋga dziri pasi paro, akariisa pacigadziko camabge.
Nenzira, yaiʋa neɗeŋga, yakaitirwa saɓata, yaʋakaŋga ʋaʋaka mumba, nomukoʋa wamambo necokunze, wakaɀishandura mukati meimba yaJehova, nokuɗa kwamambo weAsiria.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAhazi aakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadziɓaɓa aJuda?
Ahazi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa muguta raDavidi, Hezekia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino negore regumi namaʋiri raAhazi mambo waJuda, Hoshea mŋanakomana waEra wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri paSamaria, akabguɓata makore mapfumbamŋe.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova; asi haana‐kufanana namadzimambo aIsraeri akamutaŋgira.
Ɀino Sharmaneseri mambo weAsiria akaȿika kuzorwa naye, Hoshea akaʋa muranda wake, akamuterera mutero.

Asi mambo weAsiria wakati aciʋona kuti Hoshea woraŋgana naʋamŋe kumumukira, nokuti wakaŋga atuma nhume kunaSo mambo weEgipita, akarega kuterera mambo weAsiria mutero seɀaaiita gore rimŋe nerimŋe, mambo weAsiria akamupfigira mutoroŋgo akamusuŋga.
Ipapo mambo weAsiria akafamba nenyika yose, akaenda Samaria, akarikomba makore matatu.
Negore repfumbamŋe raHoshea, mambo weAsiria akakunda Samaria, akatapa ʋaIsraeri, akaenda naʋo Asiria, akaʋaisa paHara, napaHabori, parwizi Gozani, napamaguta aʋaMedi.
Iɀoɀo ɀakaitwa, nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatadzira Jehova Mŋari waʋo, iye wakaŋga aʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita kwaʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa naFarao mambo weEgipita, ʋakatya ʋamŋe ʋamŋari,
ʋakafamba nemitemo yendudzi dzakaŋga dzadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri, neyamadzimambo aIsraeri yaʋakatema iʋo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaita pakaʋanda ɀisina‐kururama pamberi paJehova Mŋari waʋo, ʋakaɀiʋakira matunhu akakwirira mumaguta aʋo ose, kubva pacirindo caʋarindi kuȿikira pamaguta akakombga.
Ʋakaɀimutsira shoŋgwe namatanda okunamata nawo pamatunhu ose akakwirira, napasi pemiti yose mitema.
Ʋakapisira’po ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu ose akakwirira, seɀaiita ndudzi dzakaŋga dzabviswa pamberi paʋo naJehova; ʋakaita ɀakashata ɀakatsamŋisa Jehova;
ʋakashumira ɀifananidzo, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋanzi naJehova: Regai kuita cinhu ici.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Jehova wakapupurira Israeri naJuda nemiromo yaʋaprofita ʋose naʋaʋoni ʋose, akati: Dzokai panzira dzenyu dzakaipa, muceŋgete mirairo yaŋgu neɀandakatema, seɀakarebga nomurairo waŋgu wose wandakaraira madziɓaɓa enyu, wandakatuma nemiromo yaʋaprofita ʋaranda ʋaŋgu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ʋakaramba kuterera, ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo, semitsipa yamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgatendi Jehova Mŋari waʋo.

Ʋakaramba mitemo yake nesuŋgano yake yaakaita namadziɓaɓa aʋo, neɀipupuriro ɀake ɀaakaʋapupurira, ʋakateʋera ɀisinamaturo, iʋo ʋakaʋa ʋasinamaturo, ʋakateʋera ndudzi dzakaʋapoteredza, iʋo ʋaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naJehova kuti ʋarege kuita saiʋo.
Ʋakasiya mirairo yose yaJehova Mŋari waʋo, ʋakaɀiitira ɀifananidzo ɀakaʋumbga, ɀemhuru mbiri; ʋakaita ʋo matanda okunamata nawo, ʋakanamata hondo yose yokuɗeŋga, ʋakashumira Baari.
Ʋakapinza ʋanakomana naʋakunda ʋaʋo mumŋoto, ʋakaʋuka nokuita ʋuroyi bgaʋo, ʋakaɀiteŋgesa kuti ʋaite ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ʋakamutsamŋisa.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova wakatsamŋira ʋaIsraeri kwaɀo, akaʋabvisa paciso cake; hakuna‐ʋakasiyiwa, asi rudzi rwaJuda ɓedzi.
Kunyaŋge naʋaJuda ʋo haʋana‐kuceŋgeta mirairo yaJehova Mŋari waʋo, asi ʋakafamba nemitoʋo yaʋaIsraeri, yaʋakatema.
Jehova akarasha ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose, akaʋatambudza, akaʋapa mumaʋoko aʋaparadzi, kuȿikira aʋarashira kure neciso cake.
Nokuti wakabvarura ʋaIsraeri paimba yaDavidi; ʋakaita Jeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, mambo waʋo, Jeroboami akatsausa ʋaIsraeri, ʋakarega kuteʋera Jehova, akaʋatadzisa neciʋi cikuru.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakafamba paɀiʋi ɀose ɀaJeroboami, ɀaakaita; haʋana‐kutsauka kwaɀiri;
kuȿikira Jehova abvisa Israeri kure neciso cake, seɀaakataura nemiromo yaʋaprofita, ʋaranda ʋake ʋose. Naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakatapxa panyika yaʋo, ʋakaiswa Asiria kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino mambo weAsiria wakatora ʋanhu paBabironi, napaKuta, napaAva, napaHamati, napaSefarvaimi, akaʋaisa mumaguta eSamaria panɀimbo yaʋana ʋaIsraeri; Samaria rikaʋa raʋo, ʋakagara mumaguta aro.
Ɀino pakutaŋga kwokugara’po kwaʋo haʋana‐kutya Jehova, Jehova akatuma shumba pakati paʋo, dzikaʋuraya ʋamŋe ʋaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋudza mambo weAsiria, ʋakati: Ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzamakatapa, mukaʋaisa mumaguta eSamaria, hadziziʋi tsika dzaMŋari wenyika
Ipapo mambo weAsiria akaraira, akati: Isai’ko mumŋe waʋaprista ʋamakatapa’po; ŋgaʋaende kundogara’ko, aʋadzidzise tsika dzaMŋari wenyika
Naiɀoɀo mumŋe waʋaprista ʋaʋakatapa paSamaria, wakandogara paBeti‐eri, akaʋadzidzisa seɀaʋaifanira kutya Jehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro rudzi rumŋe norumŋe rwakaɀiitira ʋamŋari ʋarwo, ʋakaʋaisa mudzimba dzamatunhu akakwirira, dzakaʋakwa naʋaSamaria, rudzi rumŋe norumŋe pamaguta arwo, kwaʋaigara.
Ʋanhu ʋeBabironi ʋakaʋaka Sukoti‐benoti, ʋanhu ʋeKuti ʋakaʋaka Nergari, ʋanhu ʋeHamati ʋakaʋaka Ashima,
ʋaAvi ʋakaʋaka Nibhazi neTartaki, ʋaSefarvaimi ʋakapisa ʋana ʋaʋo mumŋoto kunaAdramereki naAnamereki, ʋamŋari ʋeSefarvaimi.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakatya Jehova, ʋakaɀitsaurira pakati paʋo ʋaprista ʋamatunhu akakwirira, ʋaiʋaɓayirira mudzimba dzamatunhu akakwirira.
Ʋakatya Jehova, ʋakashumira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, ʋaciteʋera tsika dzendudzi kwaʋakaŋga ʋatapxa’ko.

Kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi ʋanoteʋera tsika dzakare; haʋatyi Jehova, kana kuita seɀaʋanorairwa nemitemo yaʋo, kana ɀireʋo ɀaʋo, kana murairo waʋo, kana mirau yaʋo, yakaŋga yarairwa ʋana ʋaJakobo naJehova, iye waakatumidza zita rinonzi Israeri;
Jehova akaita suŋgano naʋo, akaʋaraira, akati: Regai kutya ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, kana kuʋafugamira, kana kuʋashumira, kana kuʋaɓayira;
asi Jehova, wakakuɓuɗisai paEgipita nesimba guru, noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ndiye wamunofanira kutya, ndiye wamunofanira kufugamira, ndiye wamunofanira kuɓayira.
Mitemo, neɀireʋo, nomurairo, nomurau, ɀaakakunyorerai, munofanira kuɀiceŋgeta nokusiŋgaperi; hamufaniri kutya ʋamŋe ʋamŋari;
ʋuye hamufaniri kukaŋganwa suŋgano yandakaita nemi; ʋuye hamufaniri kutya ʋamŋe ʋamŋari;
asi munofanira kutya Jehova Mŋari wenyu; iye ucakusunuŋgurai pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro haʋana‐kuterera, asi ʋakateʋera tsika dzakare.
Naiɀoɀo ndudzi idzi dzakatya Jehova, dzikashumira ʋo ɀifananidzo ɀadzo ɀakaʋezwa; naʋana ʋaʋo, naʋana ʋaʋana ʋaʋo, ʋanoita saiɀoɀo kuȿikira nhasi, seɀakaita madziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀino negore recitatu raHoshea mŋanakomana waEra mambo waIsraeri, Hezekia mŋanakomana waAhazi mambo waJuda wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe.
