Akataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Abi mukunda waZekaria.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake Davidi.

Akabvisa matunhu akakwirira, akaputsa shoŋgwe, akaparadza matanda okunamata nawo; akaputsa‐putsa nyoka yendarira yakaŋga yakaitwa naMosesi; nokuti kuȿikira pamazuʋa iwayo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaiipisira ɀinonhuwira; akaitumidza Nehustani.
Akatenda kunaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri; naiɀoɀo hakuna‐wakaŋga akafanana naye pakati pamadzimambo ose aJuda, kunaʋakamuteʋera, kana ʋakamutaŋgira.
Nokuti wakanamatira Jehova, haana‐kutsauka pakumuteʋera; asi wakaceŋgeta mirairo yake, yakarairwa Mosesi naJehova.
Jehova akaʋa naye; kwose kwaakaenda wakafambiswa ɀakanaka; akamukira mambo weAsiria, akasamushumira.
Akakunda ʋaFiristia kuȿikira paGaza nenyika yaro, kubva pacirindo comurindi kuȿikira pamaguta akakombga noruȿiŋgo.
Ɀino negore recinna ramambo Hezekia, riri gore recinomŋe raHoshea mŋanakomana waEra mambo waIsraeri, Sharmaneseri mambo weAsiria akandorwa neSamaria, akarikomba.
Pakupera kwamakore matatu ʋakarikunda; Samaria rikakundwa negore retanhatu raHezekia, riri gore repfumbamŋe raHoshea mambo waIsraeri.
Mambo weAsiria akatapa ʋaIsraeri, akaenda naʋo Asiria, akaʋaisa paHara, napaHabori, parwizi Gozani, nomumaguta aʋaMedi;
nokuti haʋana‐kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari waʋo, asi ʋakaɗarika suŋgano yake, iɀo ɀose ɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naMosesi muranda waJehova, ʋakaramba kunzwa, kana kuɀiita.
Ɀino negore regumi namanna ramambo Hezekia, Sanheribi mambo weAsiria akandorwa namaguta ose aJuda akakombga namaȿiŋgo, akaakunda.

Ɀino Hezekia mambo waJuda akatuma shoko kunamambo weAsiria paRakishi, akati: Ndatadza, dzokai henyu mubve kwandiri; ɀose ɀamunoreʋa kwandiri ndicaɀiripa. Ipapo mambo weAsiria akaripisa Hezekia mambo waJuda matarenta anamazana matatu esirveri
Hezekia akamupa sirveri yose yakaŋga iri mumba maJehova, napafuma yeimba yamambo.
Neŋguʋa iyo Hezekia wakabvisa ndarama pamikoʋa yeimba yaJehova, napambiru dzakaŋga dzafukidzwa nayo naHezekia mambo waJuda, akaipa mambo weAsiria.

Ɀino mambo weAsiria akatuma mukuru wehondo, nomukuru wamacinda, nomukuru waʋatariri ʋabve Rakishi nehondo huru ʋaende kunaHezekia paJerusarema. Iʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakaȿika Jerusarema. Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika, ʋakamira pamugero wedziʋa rokumsoro, riri panzira huru inoenda kumunda womusuki.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaɗana mambo, Eriakimi mŋanakomana waHirkia, waiceŋgeta imba, naShebna munyori, naJoa mŋanakomana waAsafi sahwira, ʋakaɓuɗira kwaʋari.
Ɀino mukuru waʋatariri akati kwaʋari: Ɀino imi muti kunaHezekia: Ɀanzi namambo mukuru, mambo weAsiria: Caunoʋimba naco cinyi?
Iwe unoti (asi mashoko omuromo hawo): Mano nesimba ɀokurwa naɀo ɀiri’po haɀo. Ɀino unoʋimba naniko, ɀawandimukira ini?

Tarira ɀino, unoʋimba nomuɗonɀo worutsaŋga urwu rwakapxanyika, Egipita, runoti kana munhu akasendama kwaruri, rucapinda muruʋoko rwake, rukamuɓaya; ndiɀo ɀakaita Farao mambo weEgipita kunaʋose ʋanoʋimba naye.

Asi kana ukati kwandiri: Tinoʋimba naJehova Mŋari weɗu, ko haazi iye wakabvisirwa matunhu akakwirira neartari dzake naHezekia, akati kunaJuda naJerusarema: Munofanira kunamata pamberi peartari iri paJerusarema, here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, cipikiranai henyu natenzi waŋgu mambo weAsiria, ndikupe mabiza aneɀuru ɀiʋiri, kana iwe ukagona kuisa ʋataȿi pamsoro pawo.
Uŋgagona seiko kukunda mukuru mumŋe kunaʋaɗuku ʋaʋaranda ʋatenzi ʋaŋgu, kana ukaʋimba neEgipita kuti upiwe ŋgoro namabiza naʋo?
Ini ndaʋuya kuzorwa nenɀimbo iyi kuti ndiiparadze ndisinaJehova here? Ndiye Jehova wakati kwandiri: Enda undorwa nenyika iyo, uiparadze.

Ipapo Eriakimi mŋanakomana waHirkia, naShebna, naJoa ʋakati kumukuru waʋatariri: Tinokumbira kuti mutaure henyu naʋaranda ʋenyu norurimi rweciAramia, nokuti tinocinzwisisa; murege henyu kutaura nesu norurimi rwaʋaJuda, ʋanhu ʋose ʋari paruȿiŋgo ʋaɀinzwe.

Asi mukuru waʋatariri wakati kwaari: Tenzi waŋgu wakandituma kunatenzi wako nokwauri here, kuti nditaure mashoko awa? Haana‐kundituma here kuʋanhu ʋagere pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, kuti ʋadye ndoʋe yaʋo nemvura yaʋo pamŋe cete nemi?
Ipapo mukuru waʋatariri akamira, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru norurimi rwaʋaJuda, akataura, aciti: Inzwai shoko ramambo mukuru, iye mambo weAsiria.
Ɀanzi namambo: Hezekia ŋgaarege kukunyeŋgerai; nokuti haagoni kukurwirai pamaʋoko ake;
Hezekia ŋgaarege kukuʋimbisai naJehova, aciti: Jehova ucatirwira ɀirokwaɀo, ʋuye kuti guta iri hariŋgaiswi mumaʋoko amambo weAsiria.
Musaterera Hezekia, nokuti ɀanzi namambo weAsiria: Yananai neni, muɓuɗirei kwandiri, mudye mumŋe nomumŋe muzambiriŋga wake, mumŋe nomumŋe muʋonde wake, munwe mumŋe nomumŋe mvura yetsime rake;

kuȿikira ini ndaʋuya ndikutorei, ndikuisei kunyika yakafanana neyenyu, nyika ineɀiyo newaini, nyika ineciŋgwa neminda yemizambiriŋga, nyika inamafuta emiorivi noʋuci, murarame, murege kufa; regai kuterera Hezekia, kana acikugombedzerai, aciti: Jehova ucatirwira.
Ko mumŋe waʋamŋari ʋendudzi wakatomborwira nyika yake paruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria here?
Ʋamŋari ʋeHamati neArpadi ʋaripi? Ʋamŋari ʋeSefarvaimi, neHena, neIva ʋaripi? Ʋakarwira Samaria paruʋoko rwaŋgu here?
Ndaʋapiko pakati paʋamŋari ʋose ʋenyika ʋakarwira nyika yaʋo paruʋoko rwaŋgu, ɀamunoti Jehova ucarwira Jerusarema paruʋoko rwaŋgu?
Asi ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋanyerere, haʋana‐kumupindura shoko rimŋe, nokuti murairo wamambo wakaŋga uciti: Regai kumupindura.
Ɀino Eriakimi mŋanakomana waHirkia, waitarira imba, naShebna munyori, naJoa, mŋanakomana waAsafi sahwira, ʋakaenda kunaHezekia, ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzabvarurwa, ʋakamuʋudza mashoko omukuru waʋatariri.
Ɀino mambo Hezekia wakati aciɀinzwa, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akafuka magumbu, akapinda mumba maJehova.
Akatuma Eriakimi waitarira imba, naShebna munyori, naʋakuru ʋaʋaprista, ʋakafuka magumbu, kunomuprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ɀanzi naHezekia: Nhasi izuʋa rokutambudzika, nerokutukwa, nerokuɀidzwa; nokuti ʋana ʋakaȿika pakuɀarwa, asi hakunesimba rokuɀara naro.

Ɀimŋe Jehova Mŋari wenyu ucanzwa mashoko ose omukuru waʋatariri, wakatumŋa namambo weAsiria tenzi wake, kuɀidza Mŋari mupenyu, agoʋatuka pamsoro pamashoko akanzwa Jehova Mŋari wenyu; naiɀoɀo nyeŋgetererai ʋakasara.
Ipapo ʋaranda ʋamambo Hezekia ʋakaȿika kunaIsaya.
Isaya akati kwaʋari: Ʋudzai tenzi wenyu, muti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Usatya hako mashoko awakanzwa, andakamhurwa nawo naʋaranda ʋamambo weAsiria.
Tarira, ndicaisa mŋeya
Naiɀoɀo mukuru waʋatariri wakadzoka, akawana mambo weAsiria acirwa neRibna, nokuti wakaŋga anzwa kuti wabva paRakishi.
Ɀino wakati acinzwa pamsoro paTirhaka mambo weEtiopia, ɀicinzi: Tarirai, woʋuya kuzorwa nemi, akatuma ɀe nhume kunaHezekia, aciti:
Endai mundoʋudza Hezekia mambo waJuda, muti: Mŋari wako, waunoʋimba naye, ŋgaarege kukunyeŋgera, aciti: Jerusarema hariŋgaiswi muruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria.
Tarira, wakanzwa ɀakaitirwa nyika dzose namadzimambo eAsiria, kuti ʋakadziparadza cose; ɀino iwe ucarwirwa here?
Ko ʋamŋari ʋedzimŋe ndudzi ʋakadzirwira here, idzo dzakaparadzwa namadziɓaɓa aŋgu, ʋanaGozani, naHarani, naRezefi, naʋana ʋaEdeni, ʋaiʋa paTerasari?
Mambo weHamati uripiko, namambo weArpadi, namambo weguta reSefarvaimi, neHena, neIva?
Hezekia akagamucira ŋwadi pamaʋoko enhume, akairaʋa; Hezekia akakwira kumba kwaJehova, akaipetenura pamberi paJehova.
Ipapo Hezekia akanyeŋgetera pamberi paJehova, akati: Haiwa! Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, iye ugere pamsoro pamakerubi! Ndimi Mŋari, imi moga, woʋushe bgose bgenyika, ndimi makaita kuɗeŋga napasi.
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu, Jehova, munzwe; ȿinudzai meso enyu, Jehova, muʋone; inzwai mashoko aSanheribi, aakatuma kuzoɀidza Mŋari mupenyu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova, madzimambo eAsiria akaparadza ndudzi nenyika dzadzo,
akakandira ʋamŋari ʋadzo mumŋoto; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋamŋari, asi rakaŋga riri ɓasa ramaʋoko aʋanhu, ari matanda namabge; naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋaparadza.
Ɀino, Jehova Mŋari weɗu, citiponesai henyu paruʋoko rwake, kuti ʋushe bgose bgenyika ʋuziʋe kuti ndimi Jehova Mŋari, imi moga.
Ipapo Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi, wakatuma shoko kunaHezekia, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ɀawanyeŋgetera kwandiri pamsoro paSanheribi mambo weAsiria, ndakunzwa.
Heri shoko rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro pake: Mhandara, mukunda weZioni, wakakushoʋora nokukuseka; mukunda weJerusarema wakakudzuŋgudzira musoro wake.
Ndianiko wawakatuka nokumhura? Wakaɀikudza kunaniko nenzwi rako, meso ako akatarira aniko kuɗeŋga? NdiMutȿene waIsraeri!

Wakatuka Jehova nenhume dzako, ukati: Ndakwira kumakomo marefu neŋgoro dzaŋgu zhinji, kunɀimbo dzomukati dzeRebanoni; ndicatema misidari mirefu iri’po, nemisipresi yakatsaurwa iri’po, ndicapinda kuȿikira paimba yake yomukati, kuɗondo rake rinoɓereka ɀakanaka.
Ndakateka ndikanwa mvura yedzimŋe nyika, ndicapxisa nzizi dzose dzeEgipita nokutsika kwetsoka dzaŋgu.
Hauna‐kunzwa here kuti ndakaɀiita kare, kuti ndakaɀiraira neŋguʋa dzokutaŋga‐taŋga? Ɀino ndaraira ɀiitike, kuti iwe uʋe muparadzi wamaguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, aʋe matoŋgo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋagere’mo ʋakaŋga ʋanesimba ɗuku, ʋakavunduswa nokunyadzwa; ʋakafanana noʋuswa bgesaŋgo, nomuriʋo mutema, noʋuswa bguri pamsoro peimba, neɀiyo ɀakatȿa ɀicigere kukura.
Asi ndinoziʋa kugara kwako pasi, nokuɓuɗa kwako, nokupinda kwako, ʋuye hasha dzako kwandiri.
Nokuɗa kwehasha dzako kwandiri, ʋuye nokuti ndakanzwa kuɀikudza kwako, ndicaisa rwauro rwaŋgu mumhino dzako, netomu raŋgu mumiromo yako, ndikudzosere nenzira yawakaʋuya nayo.

Ici ndico cicaʋa ciratidzo kwauri: Nhaka mucadya ɀinoŋgomera ɀoga, negore recipiri mucadya ɀinomera ɀe kwaɀiri; asi negore recitatu munofanira kudɀara, nokuceka, nokusima minda yemizambiriŋga, mudye micero yayo.
Ɀino ʋakasara, ʋakapukunyuka ʋeimba yaJuda, ʋacaita ɀe midzi pasi, nokuɓereka micero kumsoro.
Nokuti ʋakasara ʋacaɓuɗa paJerusarema, naʋakapukunyuka pagomo reZioni; kushiŋgaira kwaJehova kucaɀiita.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro pamambo weAsiria: Haaŋgapindi muguta rino, kana kuposhera museʋe imomo, kana kuȿika pamberi paro nenhoʋo, kana kututira gomo revu pariri.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nenzira yaakaʋuya nayo, ucadzoka ɀe nayo; haaŋgapindi muguta rino.
Nokuti ndicadzitira guta rino, ndirirwire nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ʋuye nokuɗa kwomuranda waŋgu Davidi.
Ɀino noʋusiku ubgo mutumŋa waJehova wakaɓuɗa, akaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi masere neɀishanu pamisasa yaʋaAsiria; ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacimuka maŋgwanani, ʋakawana ɀaʋa ɀitunha ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo Sanheribi mambo weAsiria akabva, akaenda, akadzokera kwakare, akandogara Nineve.
Ɀino wakati acinamata mumba maNisroki mŋari wake, Adramereki naSharezeri ʋakamuʋuraya nomunondo, iʋo ʋakatizira kunyika yeArarati. Esari‐hadoni akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo Hezekia wakarwara, kuȿikira pakufa. Muprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi akaȿika kwaari, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ciraira nhaka yako, nokuti ucafa, hauŋgararami.
Ipapo akatendeʋukira kumadziro, akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, akati:
Ƌoraŋgarirai henyu, Jehova, kuti ndakafamba pamberi penyu neɀokwaɗi nomŋoyo wose, ndikaita ɀakanaka pamberi penyu. Hezekia akacema kwaɀo.
Ɀino Isaya wakaŋga acigere kuɓuɗa paruʋazhe rwapakati, shoko raJehova rikaʋuya kwaari, riciti:

Dzoka ɀe, undoti kunaHezekia, mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋaŋgu: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waDavidi ɓaɓa ʋako: Ndanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwako, ndaʋona misodzi yako; ɀino tarira, ndicakuporesa; nezuʋa recitatu ucakwira kuimba yaJehova.
Ndicawedzera pamazuʋa ako makore anegumi namashanu; ndicakurwira iwe neguta rino paruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria, ndicadzitira guta rino nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ʋuye nokuɗa kwaDavidi muranda waŋgu.
Ipapo Isaya akati: Ʋuyai neɓundu ramaʋonde. Iʋo ʋakaʋuya naro, ʋakariisa pamota, akapora.
Ɀino Hezekia akati kunaIsaya: Ciratidzo cicaʋa ceiko kuti Jehova ucandiporesa, ndikwire kumba kwaJehova nezuʋa recitatu here?
Isaya akati: Ici cicaʋa ciratidzo caJehova kwauri, kuti Jehova ucaita seɀaakataura: Unoɗa kuti mumvuri upfuʋurire mberi mitaro inegumi, kana udzoke mitaro inegumi here?
Hezekia akapindura, akati: Ɀakareruka kuti mumvuri upfuʋurire mberi mitaro inegumi; kwete, mumvuri ŋgaudzoke mitaro inegumi.
Ipapo muprofita akaɗana kunaJehova, akadzosera mumvuri shure mitaro inegumi pacikati caAhazi.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Berodaki‐baradani mŋanakomana waBaradani, mambo weBabironi, akatuma ŋwadi necipo kunaHezekia; nokuti wakaŋga anzwa kuti Hezekia wairwara.

Hezekia akaʋanzwa, akaʋaratidza imba yose yakaŋga ineɀinokosha ɀake, sirveri, nendarama, neɀinonhuwira, namafuta anokosha, neimba yaiʋa nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri pafuma yake; kwakaŋga kusisinecinhu mumba make, kana muʋushe bgake bgose, caʋasina‐kuratidzwa naHezekia.
Ɀino muprofita Isaya akaȿika kunamambo Hezekia, akati kwaari: Ko ʋarume aʋa ʋakati kuɗini? Ʋaȿika kwauri ʋacibvepiko? Hezekia akati: Ʋakabva kunyika iri kure, Babironi.
Akati: Ʋakaʋonei mumba mako? Hezekia akapindura, akati: Ʋakaʋona ɀose ɀiri mumba maŋgu; hakunecinhu pakati pefuma yaŋgu candisina‐kuʋaratidza.
Ipapo Isaya akati kunaHezekia: Inzwa shoko raJehova.
Tarira, mazuʋa acaȿika, neŋguʋa iyo ɀose ɀiri mumba mako neɀose ɀakaʋuŋganidzwa namadziɓaɓa ako kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi ɀicaiswa Babironi; hakunecinhu cicasiyiwa, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋanakomana ʋako, ʋacabva kwauri, ʋaucaɓereka, ʋacatapxa; ʋacaʋa ʋaranda mumba mamambo weBabironi.
Ipapo Hezekia akati kunaIsaya: Shoko raJehova, ramataura, rakanaka haro. Akati ʋo: Ko handiɀo here, kana rugare neɀokwaɗi ɀiri’po haɀo pamazuʋa aŋgu?
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aHezekia, nesimba rake, nokuita kwake dziʋa nomugero, nokuȿitsa kwake mvura muguta, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Hezekia akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, Manase mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Manase wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anegumi namaʋiri; akaɓata ʋushe makore anamakumi mashanu namashanu paJerusarema; zita ramai ʋake raiʋa Hefziba.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akateʋera ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋahedeni ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.

Nokuti wakaʋaka ɀe matunhu akakwirira, akaŋga aparadzwa naɓaɓa ʋake Hezekia; akamutsira Baari artari, akaisa’po ɗanda rokunamata naro, seɀakaita Ahabi mambo waIsraeri; akanamata hondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga, akadzishumira.
Akaʋaka artari mumba maJehova, kunyaŋge Jehova wakaŋga ati: PaJerusarema ndi’po pandicaisa zita raŋgu.
Akaʋakira hondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga artari muʋazhe mbiri dzeimba yaJehova.
Akapinza mŋanakomana wake mumŋoto, akatenda mashura, akaita mazaŋgo, akagadza maȿikiro naʋaʋuki; akaita ɀakaipa ɀizhinji pamberi paJehova, ndokumutsamŋisa naɀo.

Akaisa mufananidzo weɗanda rokunamata naro raakaʋeza mumba makanzi naJehova kunaDavidi nokunaSoromoni mŋanakomana wake: Ndicaisa zita raŋgu nokusiŋgaperi paimba ino napaJerusarema, randakaɀitsaurira pakati pamarudzi ose aIsraeri.
Handicazofamba‐fambisi tsoka dzaʋaIsraeri kunze kwenyika yandakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo; kana ʋacicenjera ɓedzi kuita ɀandakaʋaraira, nomurairo wose waʋakarairwa naMosesi muranda waŋgu.
Asi haʋana‐kuterera; Manase akaʋatsausa ʋakaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura ɀakaitwa nendudzi dzakaparadzwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Jehova akataura
Manase mambo waJuda ɀaakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza iɀi, akaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura ɀose ɀakaitwa naʋaAmori ʋakamutaŋgira, akatadzisa ʋo Juda neɀifananidzo ɀake.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisira Jerusarema naJuda ɀakaipa ɀikaɗai, kuti ʋose ʋanoɀinzwa nzeʋe dzaʋo dzicawuŋga.
Ndicayera Jerusarema norwonzi rwandakayera Samaria narwo, ʋuye norwonzi rwandakaruramisa imba yaAhabi narwo; ndicapisika Jerusarema somunhu unopisika ndiro, unoipisika akaitsindikira.
Ndicarasha ʋakasara ʋenhaka yaŋgu, ndiʋaise mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; ʋacapedzwa nokuparadzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose;
nokuti ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paŋgu, ʋakanditsamŋisa, kubva pazuʋa rokuɓuɗa kwamadziɓaɓa aʋo paEgipita kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.

Manase akateʋura ʋo ropa rakawanda risinemhoȿa, kuȿikira azadza Jerusarema kubva kurutiʋi rumŋe kuȿikira kunorumŋe rutiʋi; ɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakatadzisa Juda naɀo, aciita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, ɀisiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aManase, neɀose ɀaakaita, neɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Manase akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa mumunda weimba yake, mumunda waUza; Amoni mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Amoni wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namaʋiri, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore maʋiri; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Meshuremeti, mukunda waHaruzi weJotiba.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita Manase ɓaɓa ʋake.
Akafamba nenzira yose yakafambga naɓaɓa ʋake, akashumira ɀifananidzo ɀakashumirwa naɓaɓa ʋake, akaɀinamata;
akasiya Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ake, akasafamba nenzira yaJehova.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaAmoni ʋakamuraŋgana ʋakamumukira, ʋakaʋuraya mambo mumba make.
Asi ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakazoʋuraya ʋose ʋakaraŋgana ʋakamukira mambo Amoni; ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakaita mŋanakomana wake Josia mambo panɀimbo yake.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAmoni aakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Akaʋigwa mubgiro bgake mumunda waUza; Josia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Josia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore masere; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anamakumi matatu nerimŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jedida mukunda waAdaya weBozikati.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, akafamba nenzira yose yaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, haana‐kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe.
Ɀino negore regumi namasere ramambo Josia, mambo akatuma munyori Shafani mŋanakomana waAzaria, mŋanakomana waMeshurami, kumba kwaJehova, akati:
Enda kunaHirkia muprista mukuru, umuʋudze aʋereŋge mari inoiswa mumba maJehova, yakaʋuŋganidzwa naʋatariri ʋomukoʋa kuʋanhu;
ʋaipe mumaʋoko aʋaɓati ʋeɓasa, ʋanotarira imba yaJehova; iʋo ʋaipe ʋaɓati ʋeɓasa ʋari mumba maJehova, kuti ʋagadzirise ɀakaputsika paimba;
iʋo ʋaʋezi, naʋaʋaki, naʋanoroŋga mabge, ʋuye ʋateŋge nayo matanda, namabge akaʋezwa, kuti ʋagadzire imba.
Asi haʋana‐kubvunzwa pamsoro pemari yakaiswa mumaʋoko aʋo, nokuti ʋaiɓata ʋakatendeka.
Ipapo Hirkia muprista mukuru akati kunaShafani munyori: Ndawana buku yomurairo mumba maJehova. Hirkia akapa Shafani buku yomurairo, iye akairaʋa.
Ɀino Shafani munyori akaȿika kunamambo, akadzoka neshoko kunamambo, akati: Ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋaɗurura mari yakawanikwa mumba, ʋakaipa mumaʋoko aʋaɓati ʋeɓasa, ʋanotarira imba yaJehova.
Shafani munyori akati kunamambo: Muprista Hirkia wandipa buku. Shafani akairaʋira mambo.
Ɀino mambo wakati acinzwa mashoko ebuku yomurairo, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake.
Mambo akaraira muprista Hirkia, naAhikami mŋanakomana waShafani, naAkbori mŋanakomana waMikaya, naShafani munyori, naAsaya muranda wamambo, akati:

Endai mundondibvunzira Jehova, ini naʋanhu naʋaJuda ʋose, pamsoro pamashoko ebuku iyi yakawanikwa; nokuti kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwaakatitsamŋira nako kukuru kwaɀo, nokuti madziɓaɓa eɗu haana‐kuterera mashoko ebuku iyi, haʋana‐kuita ɀose ɀatakarairwa.

Naiɀoɀo muprista Hirkia, naAhikami, naAkbori, naShafani, naAsaya ʋakaenda kuna‐Hurda muprofitakadzi, mukadzi waSharumi mŋanakomana waTikva, mŋanakomana waHarhasi, muceŋgeti weŋguʋo; (ɀino iye mukadzi wakaŋga agere paJerusarema kurutiʋi rutȿa rweguta;) ʋakataurirana naye.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ʋudzai munhu wakakutumai kwandiri, muti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, napamsoro paʋagere’po, iwo mashoko ose ebuku yakarabga namambo waJuda;
nokuti ʋakandirasha, ʋakapisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira, ʋakanditsamŋisa namaɓasa ose amaʋoko aʋo; naiɀoɀo kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kucamukira nɀimbo iyi; hakuŋgadzimŋi.
Asi muti kunamambo waJuda wakakutumai kuzobvunza Jehova: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Kana ari mashoko awakanzwa,

mŋoyo wako ɀawakaŋga uri munyoro, ukaɀininipisa pamberi paJehova, ŋguʋa yawakanzwa ɀandakataura pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, napamsoro paʋagere’mo, kuti ʋacaitwa ɗoŋgo necinhu cakatukwa, ukabvarura ŋguʋo dzako, ukacema pamberi paŋgu; ɀino ɀanzi naJehova: Ini ndakunzwa ʋo.
Naiɀoɀo tarira, ndicakuisa kunamadziɓaɓa ako, ucaʋigwa mubgiro bgako norugare; meso ako haaŋgaʋoni ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandicaʋuyisa pamsoro penɀimbo iyi. Ʋakadzoka neshoko kunamambo.
Ɀino mambo akatuma ʋanhu ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋose ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema.

Mambo akakwira kumba kwaJehova, anaʋarume ʋose ʋaJuda, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema, naʋaprista, naʋaprofita, naʋanhu ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru; akaʋaraʋira mashoko ose ebuku yesuŋgano yakawanikwa mumba maJehova.

Mambo akamira pambiru, akaita suŋgano pamberi paJehova, akaɀisuŋga kuteʋera Jehova, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake neɀipupuriro, neɀaakatema, nomŋoyo wake wose nomŋeya wake wose, kuti asimbise mashoko esuŋgano iyi, akaŋga akanyorwa mubuku iyi; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakasimbisa suŋgano iyo.

Ipapo mambo akaraira muprista mukuru Hirkia, naʋaprista ʋaimuteʋera, naʋatariri ʋomukoʋa, kuti ʋaɓuɗise patembere yaJehova nhumbi dzose dzakaŋga dzaitirwa Baari neAshera nehondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga; akadzipisa kunze kweJerusarema muruwa rwaKidroni, akaisa maɗota adzo paBeti‐eri.

Akaparadza ʋaprista ʋeɀifananidzo, ʋakaŋga ʋagadzwa namadzimambo aJuda kuti ʋapise ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira mumaguta aJuda, nenɀimbo dzakapoteredza Jerusarema; ʋuye ʋose ʋaipisa ɀinonhuwira kunaBaari, nezuʋa, nomŋedzi, nenyeredzi, nehondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga.
Akaɓuɗisa ʋo Ashera mumba maJehova, akaiisa kunze kweJerusarema kurukoʋa rwaKidroni, akaipisa parukoʋa rwaKidroni, akaikuya ikaita maɗota, akakanda maɗota ayo pamsoro pamarinda aʋarombo.
Akaputsa ʋo dzimba dzaʋasodomi, dzakaŋga dziri paimba yaJehova, pairukira ʋakadzi macira eAshera.

Akaɓuɗisa ʋaprista ʋose mumaguta aJuda, akashatsa matunhu akakwirira, paipisira ʋaprista ɀinonhuwira, kubva paGeba kuȿikira paBeeri‐sheba; akaputsa matunhu akakwirira pamasuʋo, aiʋa paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo raJoshua muɓati weguta, aiʋa kuruɓoshwe rwomunhu kana opinda nesuʋo reguta.
Asi ʋaprista ʋamatunhu akakwirira haʋazaikwira kuartari yaJehova paJerusarema, asi ʋaidya ɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa pakati pehama dzaʋo.
Akashatsa Tofeti raiʋa pamupata waʋana ʋaHinomi, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu unopinza mŋanakomana wake kana mŋanasikana wake mumŋoto nokuɗa kwaMoreki.
Akabvisa mabiza akaŋga apiwa namadzimambo kuzokudza zuʋa paʋanopinda napo paimba yaJehova, pakamuri yaNatani‐mereki mutariri weimba yomukati yakaŋga iri paɓiraʋira, akapisa ŋgoro dzezuʋa.

Akaputsa ʋo artari dzaiʋa pamsoro peɗeŋga rekamuri yokumsoro yaAhazi, dzakaŋga dzaʋakwa namadzimambo aJuda, neartari dzakaŋga dzaʋakwa naManase muʋazhe mbiri dzeimba yaJehova, akadzikoromora, akakanda guruʋa radzo murukoʋa Kidroni.

Mambo akashatsa ʋo matunhu akakwirira aiʋa pamberi peJerusarema, aiʋa kurudyi rwegomo rokuparadza, akaŋga aʋakirwa Ashtoreti, mŋari unonyaŋgadza waʋaZidoni, naKemoshi, mŋari unonyaŋgadza waMoabi, naMirkomi, mŋari unonyaŋgadza waʋana ʋaAmoni, naSoromoni mambo waIsraeri.
Akaputsanya ʋo shoŋgwe dzamabge, akaparadza matanda okunamata nawo, ndokuzadza nɀimbo yaɀo namafupa aʋanhu.

Ʋuye artari ʋo yaiʋa paBeti‐eri, neɗunhu rakakwirira rakaʋakwa naJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, iye wakatadzisa Israeri, artari iyo neɗunhu iro rakakwirira akaɀiputsa, akapisa ɗunhu rakakwirira, akariputsanya rikaita guruʋa, akapisa ɗanda rokunamata naro.

Ɀino Josia wakati acitendeʋuka, akaʋona marinda aiʋa mugomo, akatuma ʋanhu ʋakatora mafupa aiʋa mumarinda, ʋakaapisa paartari iyo, akaishatsa seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa neshoko raJehova rakaparidzwa nomunhu waMŋari, iye wakaɗeya kuparidza ɀinhu iɀi.
Ɀino akati: Shoŋgwe iyi yandinoʋona ndeyeiko? Ʋanhu ʋeguta ʋakati kwaari: Ndiro rinda romunhu waMŋari, wakaɗeya kubva kwaJuda, akaparidza ɀinhu iɀo ɀamakaitira artari yeBeti‐eri.
Akati: Ŋgaazorore hake; ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unobvisa mafupa ake. Naiɀoɀo ʋakarega mafupa ake pamŋe cete namafupa omuprofita wakaŋga abva Samaria.
Ʋuye dzimba dzose dzamatunhu akakwirira dzaiʋa pamaguta eSamaria, dzakaŋga dzakaʋakwa namadzimambo aIsraeri, ʋakatsamŋisa
Akaʋuraya ʋaprista ʋose ʋamatunhu akakwirira ʋaiʋa’po, pamsoro peartari, akapisira pamsoro padzo mafupa aʋanhu; akadzokera Jerusarema.
Ɀino mambo akaraira ʋanhu ʋose, akati: Itirai Jehova Mŋari wenyu paseka, seɀakanyorwa mubuku iyi yesuŋgano.
Ɀirokwaɀo, haʋana‐kumboita paseka yakaɗai, kubva pamazuʋa aʋatoŋgi ʋaitoŋga Israeri, kana pamazuʋa ose amadzimambo aIsraeri, kana madzimambo aJuda.
Asi negore regumi namasere ramambo Josia ʋakaitira Jehova paseka iyi paJerusarema.

Josia akabvisa ʋo maȿikiro ose, naʋaroyi, namaterafimi, neɀifananidzo, neɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza, ɀakawanikwa munyika yaJuda napaJerusarema, kuti asimbise mashoko omurairo, akaŋga akanyorwa mubuku yakawanikwa mumba maJehova naHirkia muprista.

Hakunamambo wakamutaŋgira wakaŋga akafanana naye, wakatendeʋukira kunaJehova nomŋoyo wake wose, nomŋeya wake wose, nesimba rake rose, aciteʋera murairo wose waMosesi; ʋuye hakunomumŋe wakamuteʋera wakaŋga akafanana naye.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Jehova haana‐kushandura kutsamŋa kwake kukuru, kwakamutsa hasha dzake kunaJuda, nokuɗa kwokutsamŋisa kwose kwaakatsamŋiswa nako naManase.
Jehova akati: NaJuda ʋo ndicaʋabvisa pamberi paŋgu, seɀandakabvisa Israeri; ndicaramba guta iri reJerusarema, randakaɀitsaurira, neimba yandakati pamsoro payo: Zita raŋgu ricagara’po.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJosia, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Pamazuʋa ake Farao‐neko mambo weEgipita, akandorwa namambo weAsiria kurwizi Yufratesi, mambo Josia akandorwa naye; asi wakati amuʋona,

Ʋaranda ʋake ʋakamutakura neŋgoro afa, ʋakabva naye paMegido, ʋakamuisa Jerusarema, ʋakamuʋiga mubgiro bgake. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakatora Jehoahazi mŋanakomana waJosia, ʋakamuzodza, ʋakamuita mambo panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Jehoahazi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namatatu, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema mŋedzi mitatu. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Hamutari, mukunda waJeremia weRibna.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova seɀakaita madziɓaɓa ake paɀose.
Asi Farao‐neko wakamusuŋga paRibra munyika yeHamati, kuti arege kuɓata ʋushe paJerusarema; akateresa nyika matarenta esirveri anezana,
Farao‐neko akaita Eriyakimi mŋanakomana waJosia mambo panɀimbo yaJosia ɓaɓa ʋake, akashandura zita rake, rikazoʋa Jehoyakimi; asi wakaenda naJehoahazi, akaȿika Egipita, ndokufira’ko.

Jehoyakimi akapa Farao sirveri nendarama, asi wakateresa nyika kuti agone kuripa mari seɀaakarairwa naFarao; akaripisa ʋanhu ʋenyika sirveri nendarama, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakamutarira, kuti aipe Farao‐neko.
Jehoyakimi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi nerimŋe. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Zebida mukunda waPedaya weRuma.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova seɀakaita madziɓaɓa ake paɀose.
Ɀino pamazuʋa ake Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi akaȿika, Jehoyakimi akaitwa muranda wake makore matatu; ipapo akamuramba akamumukira.

Jehova akatuma kwaari hondo dzaʋaKardea, nehondo dzaʋaSiria, nehondo dzaʋaMoabi, nehondo dzaʋana ʋaAmoni, kuzorwa naye; akadzituma kuzoparadza Juda, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova, raakataura nemiromo yaʋaranda ʋake ʋaprofita.
Ɀirokwaɀo iɀi ɀakaitirwa Juda nokuraira kwaJehova, kuti aʋabvise pamberi pake, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀaManase ɀose ɀaakaita;
ʋuye nokuɗa kweropa risinemhoȿa raakateʋura; nokuti wakazadza Jerusarema neropa risinemhoȿa; Jehova akaramba kuʋakaŋganwira.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehoyakimi, neɀose ɀaakaita, haɀina‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamakoronike amadzimambo aJuda?
Jehoyakimi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, mŋanakomana wake Jehoyakini akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Mambo weEgipita haana‐kuzoɓuɗa ɀe munyika yake, nokuti mambo weBabironi wakaŋga akunda ɀose ɀaiʋa ɀamambo weEgipita, kubva parukoʋa rweEgipita kuȿikira parwizi Yufratesi.
Jehoyakini wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anegumi namasere, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema mŋedzi mitatu. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Nehushta mukunda waErnatani weJerusarema.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita madziɓaɓa ake paɀose.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋaranda ʋaNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, ʋakaȿika Jerusarema, ʋakakomba guta.
Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, akaȿika paguta, ʋaranda ʋake ʋakarikomba.
Ɀino Jehoyakini mambo waJuda akaɓuɗira kunamambo weBabironi, iye namai ʋake, naʋaranda ʋake, namacinda ake, naʋatariri ʋake; mambo weBabironi akamuɓata negore rorusere rokuɓata kwake ʋushe.
Akaenda nefuma yose yeimba yaJehova, nefuma yeimba yamambo, akatema‐tema nhumbi dzose dzendarama dzakaŋga dzaitwa naSoromoni mambo waIsraeri mutembere yaJehova, seɀakaŋga ɀataurwa naJehova.
Akatapa ʋose ʋeJerusarema, namacinda ose, nemhare dzose, ʋatapxa ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi, nemhizha dzose, naʋapfuri ʋose; hakuna‐ʋakasara, asi ʋanhu ʋarombo ʋenyika.
Akatapa ʋo Jehoyakini, akamuisa Babironi; namai ʋamambo, naʋakadzi ʋamambo, naʋatariri ʋake, naʋakuru ʋenyika, akaʋatapa paJerusarema akaʋaisa Babironi.
Ʋarume ʋose ʋaiʋa nesimba ʋaneɀuru ɀinomŋe, nemhizha, naʋapfuri ʋanegumi ramazana, aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa nesimba ʋaigona kurwa, mambo weBabironi wakaʋatapa, akaʋaisa Babironi.
Mambo weBabironi akaita Matania ɓaɓamunini
Zedekia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore makumi maʋiri nerimŋe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi nerimŋe. Zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Hamitari mukunda waJeremia weRibna.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova seɀakaita Jehoyakini paɀose.
Nokuti iɀoɀo ɀakaitirwa Jerusarema naJuda nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kwaJehova, kuȿikira aʋarashira kure kwaari; Zedekia akamukira mambo weBabironi.

Ɀino negore repfumbamŋe rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, nomŋedzi wegumi, nezuʋa regumi romŋedzi, Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi akaȿika, iye nehondo yake yose, kuzorwa neJerusarema, ʋakadzika matente aʋo’po, ʋakarikomba nenhare.
Naiɀoɀo guta rakakombga kuȿikira pagore regumi nerimŋe ramambo Zedekia.
Ɀino negore repfumbamŋe romŋedzi wecinna nzara ikanyanya kwaɀo paguta, ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakashaiwa ɀokudya.
Ʋakaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweguta, ʋanhu ʋose ʋehondo
Asi hondo yaʋaKardea yakateʋera mambo, ʋakamuɓata pamapani eJeriko, hondo yake yose ikapararira ikabva kwaari.
Ɀino ʋakaɓata mambo, ʋakaenda naye kunamambo weBabironi paRibra, ʋakamutoŋgera’po.
Ʋakaʋuraya ʋana ʋaZedekia aciɀiʋona, ʋakatumbura meso aZedekia, ʋakamusuŋga namatare, ʋakamuisa Babironi.
Ɀino nomŋedzi wecishanu, nezuʋa ricinomŋe romŋedzi, negore regumi namapfumbamŋe ramambo Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi, muranda wamambo weBabironi akaȿika Jerusarema;
akapisa imba yaJehova, neimba yamambo; akapisa ʋo dzimba dzose dzeJerusarema, dzimba dzose huru, nomŋoto.
Hondo yose yaʋaKardea, yakaŋga inomukuru waʋarindi, ikaputsa maȿiŋgo eJerusarema kunhiʋi dzose.
Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi, akatapa ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasara muguta, naʋakaŋga ʋatiza, ʋakaenda kunamambo weBabironi, naʋakaŋga ʋasara kuʋazhinji.
Asi mukuru waʋarindi wakasiya ʋarombo ʋenyika, kuti ʋaʋe ʋarimi ʋeminda yemizambiriŋga nemimŋe minda.
ƲaKardea ʋakaputsanya mbiru dzendarira dzaiʋa mumba maJehova, neɀiŋgoro, nedziʋa rendarira, ɀaiʋa mumba maJehova, ʋakaenda nendarira yaɀo Babironi.
Ʋakatora ʋo hari nefoshoro, nembato dzemŋenje, neɀiroŋgo, nenhumbi dzose dzendarira dzaʋaiɓata nadzo.
neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto, nembiya, neɀose ɀaiʋa ɀendarama neɀose ɀaiʋa ɀesirveri, mukuru waʋarindi akaɀitora.
Nembiru mbiri, nedziʋa rimŋe, neɀiŋgoro, ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa imba yaJehova naSoromoni; kurema kwendarira yenhumbi idzi dzose kwakaŋga kusiŋgagoni kuyerwa.
Kureɓa kwembiru imŋe kwakaȿika makubiti
Mukuru waʋarindi akatora Saraya muprista mukuru, naZefania muprista wecipiri, naʋarindi ʋatatu ʋomukoʋa;

ʋuye paguta akatora mukuru waitarira ʋarume ʋehondo, naʋarume ʋashanu ʋaisiʋonana namambo, ʋaakawana muguta; nomunyori, nomukuru wehondo waiʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋenyika, naʋarume ʋanamakumi matanhatu ʋaʋanhu ʋenyika, ʋaakawana muguta.
Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akaʋatora, akaʋaisa kunamambo weBabironi paRibra.
Mambo weBabironi akaʋaɓaya, akaʋaʋuraya paRibra, panyika yeHamati. Naiɀoɀo ʋaJuda ʋakatapxa panyika yaʋo.
Kana ʋari ʋanhu ʋakasiyiwa panyika yaJuda, ʋakasiyiwa naNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, wakaita Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, mŋanakomana waShafani, muɓati waʋo.

Ɀino ʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo, iʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo, ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti mambo weBabironi wakaŋga aita Gedari muɓati waʋo, ʋakaenda kunaGedaria paMizpa, ʋaiti: Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania, naJohanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naSeraya mŋanakomana waTanhumeti muNetofati, naJaazania mŋanakomana womuMaakati, iʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo.
Gedaria akapika kwaʋari, iʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Regai kutya nokuɗa kwaʋaranda ʋaʋaKardea; garai panyika, mushumire mambo weBabironi, mugofara henyu.

Asi nomŋedzi wecinomŋe Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania, mŋanakomana waErishama, worudzi rwamambo, wakaȿika anaʋarume ʋanegumi, akaɓaya Gedaria, akafa iye pamŋe cete naʋaJuda naʋaKardea ʋaiʋa naye paMizpa.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, naʋakuru ʋehondo ʋakasimuka ʋakaenda Egipita, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ʋaKardea.

Ɀino negore ramakumi matatu namanomŋe rokutapxa kwaJehoyakini mambo waJuda, nomŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe romŋedzi, Eviri‐merodaki mambo weBabironi, negore raakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe naro, wakasimudza musoro waJehoyakini mambo waJuda, akamubvisa mutoroŋgo;
akataura naye nomŋoyo munyoro, akakudza cigaro cake coʋushe kupfuʋura ɀigaro ɀoʋushe ɀamadzimambo aiʋa naye paBabironi.
Akashandura ŋguʋo dzake dzokusuŋgwa, akaramba acidya ɀokudya pamberi pake mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Kana ɀiri ɀokurarama naɀo, waisipiwa ɀokurarama naɀo namambo ŋguʋa dzose, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe mugoʋe waro, mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Adama, naSeti, naEnoshi;
naKenani, naMaharareri, naJaredi;
naEnoki, naMetusera, naRameki;
naNoa, naShemi, naHami, naJafeti.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJafeti: Gomeri, naMagogi, naMadai, naJavani, naTubari, naMesheki, naTirasi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGomeri: Ashkenazi, naDifati, naTogarma.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJavani: Erisha, naTarshishi, naKitimi, naRodanimi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHami: Kushi, naMizraimi, naPuti, naKanaani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKushi: Seba, naHavira, naSabta, naRaama, naSabteka. Ʋanakomana ʋaRaama: Sheba, naDedani.
Kushi akaɓereka Nimrodi; iye akataŋga kuʋa munhu unesimba panyika.
Mizraimi akaɓereka Rudimi, naAnamimi, naRehabimi, naNaftuhimi,
naPatrusimi, naKasruhimi (ƲaFiristia ʋakabva kwaari), naKaftorimi.
Kanaani akaɓereka Zidoni mŋana wake weɗaŋgwe, naHeti,
naʋaJebusi, naʋaAmori, naʋaGirgashi;
naʋaHivi, naʋaArki, naʋaSini,
naʋaArvadi, naʋaZemari, naʋaHamati.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShemi: Erami, naAshuri, naArpakshadi, naRudi, naArami, naUzi, naHuri, naGeteri, naMesheki.
Arpakshadi akaɓereka Shera, Shera akaɓereka Eberi.
Eberi akaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋiri, zita romumŋe raiʋa Peregi, nokuti pamazuʋa ake nyika yakaganhurwa; zita romunuŋuna wake raiʋa Joktani.
Joktani akaɓereka Armodadi, naSherefi, naHazarmaveti, naJera,
naHadorami, naUzari, naDikra,
naEbari, naAbimaeri, naSheba,
naOfiri, naHavira, naJobabi. Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaJoktani.
Shemi, naArpakshadi, naShera,
naEberi, naPeregi, naReu,
naSerugi, naNahori, naTera,
Abrama (ndiye Abrahama).
Ʋanakomana ʋaAbrahama: Isaka, naIshmaeri.
Ndiwo marudzi aʋo: Mŋana weɗaŋgwe waIshmaeri, Nebaioti, teʋere Kedari, naAbdeeri, naMibsami,
naMishma, naDuma, naMasa; naHadadi, naTema,
naJeturi, naNafishi, naKedema. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaIshmaeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKetura, muroŋgo waAbrahama: Iye wakaɓereka Zimrani, naJokshani, naMedani, naMidiani, naIshbaki, naShua. Ʋanakomana ʋaJokshani: Sheba, naDedani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMidiani: Efa, naEferi, naHanoki, naAbida, naErda. Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaKetura.
Abrahama wakaɓereka Isaka. Ʋanakomana ʋaIsaka: Esau, naIsraeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEsau: Erifazi, naReueri, naJeushi, naJarami, naKora.
Ʋanakomana ʋaErifazi: Temani, naOmari, naZefi, naGatami, naKenazi, naTimna, naAmareki.
Ʋanakomana ʋaReueri: Nahati, naZera, naShama, naMiza.
Ʋanakomana ʋaSeiri: Rotani, naShobari, naZibeoni, naAna, naDishani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRotani: Hori, naHomami; Timna waiʋa hanɀadzi yaRotani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShobari: Ariani naManahati, naEbari, naShefi naOnami. Ʋanakomana ʋaZibeoni: Aia naAna.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAna: Dishoni. Ʋanakomana ʋaDishoni: Hamrani naEshbani naItrani naKerani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEzeri: Birhani naZaavani, naJaakani. Ʋanakomana ʋaDishani: Uzi naArani.
Ɀino ndiwo madzimambo akaɓata ʋushe panyika yaEdomi, ʋaIsraeri ʋacigere kuʋa namambo: Bera mŋanakomana waBeori; zita reguta rake raiʋa Dinhaba.
Bera akafa, Jobabi mŋanakomana waZera weBozra akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Jobabi akafa, Hushami wenyika yaʋaTemani akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Hushami akafa, Hadadi mŋanakomana waBedadi, wakaɗeya kuʋuraya Midiani pamunda waMoabi, akamuteʋera paʋushe; zita reguta rake raiʋa Aviti.
Hadadi akafa, Samra weMasreka akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Samra akafa, Shauri weRehoboti paRwizi akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Shauri akafa, Baari‐hanani mŋanakomana waAkbori akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Baari‐hanani akafa, Hadadi akamuteʋera paʋushe; zita reguta rake raiʋa Pai; ʋuye zita romukadzi wake raiʋa Mehetaberi, mukunda waMatredi, mukunda waMezahabi.
Hadadi akafa. Madzishe aEdomi ndiwo: Ishe Timna, nashe Aria, nashe Jeteti,
nashe Ohoribama, nashe Era, nashePinoni,
nashe Kenazi, nashe Temani, nashe Mibzari,
nashe Magdieri, nashe Irami. Ndiwo madzishe aEdomi.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaIsraeri: Rubeni, naSimeoni, naRevi, naJuda, naIsakari naZeburuni,
naDani, naJosefa naBenjamini, naNaftari, naGadi, naAsheri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJuda: Eri, naOnani, naShera; ʋanakomana aʋa ʋatatu wakaʋaɓerekerwa naBati‐shua muKanaani. Asi Eri, mŋana weɗaŋgwe waJuda, wakaŋga ari munhu wakaipa pamberi paJehova, akamuʋuraya.
Tamari mukadzi womŋana wake, akamuɓerekera Perezi naZera. Ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋashanu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaPerezi: Hezroni naHamuri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaZera: Zimri, naEtani, naHemani, naKarkori, naDara; ʋose ʋari ʋashanu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKarmi: Akari, mutambudzi waIsraeri, wakatadza pacinhu cakaŋga cakayeriswa.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEtani: Azaria.
Ʋanakomana ʋo ʋaHezroni, ʋaakaɓerekerwa: Jerameeri, naRami, naKerubai.
Rami akaɓereka Aminadabi, Aminadabi akaɓereka Nashoni, mucinda waʋana ʋaJuda;
Nashoni akaɓereka Sarma, Sarma akaɓereka Boazi;
Boazi akaɓereka Obedi, Obedi akaɓereka Jese;
Jese akaɓereka mŋana wake weɗaŋgwe Eriabi, teʋere Abinadabi wecipiri, naShimea wecitatu;
naNetaneri wecinna, naRadai weshanu;
naOzemi wetanhatu, naDavidi wecinomŋe.
Hanɀadzi dzaʋo dzaiʋa Zeruya naAbigairi. Ʋanakomana ʋaZeruya: Abishai, naJoabi, naAsaheri, ʋatatu.
Abigairi akaɓereka Amasa; ɓaɓa ʋaAmasa ʋaiʋa Jeteri muIshmaeri.
Karebi mŋanakomana waHezroni akaɓerekerwa
Azuba akafa, Karebi akawana Efrati, wakamuɓerekera Huri.
Huri akaɓereka Uri, Uri akaɓereka Bezareri.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Hezroni akapinda kumukunda waMakiri ɓaɓa ʋaGireadi, waakawana aȿika makore anamakumi matanhatu; iye akamuɓerekera Segubi.
Segubi akaɓereka Jairi, wakaŋga anamaguta anamakumi maʋiri namatatu panyika yeGireadi.
Geshuri naArami ʋakatorera ʋaJairi maguta aʋo, pamŋe cete naKenati nemisha yaro, maguta anamakumi matanhatu. Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaMakiri ɓaɓa ʋaGireadi.
Ɀino Hezroni wakati afa paKarebi‐efrata, Abija mukadzi waHezroni akamuɓerekera Ashuri ɓaɓa ʋaTekoa.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJerameeri, mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe waHezroni, ʋaiʋa, Rami weɗaŋgwe, naBuna, naOreni, naOzemi, naAhija.
Ɀino Jerameeri wakaŋga anomumŋe mukadzi, wainzi Atara; iye wakaŋga ari mai ʋaOnami.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRami, weɗaŋgwe waJerameeri, ʋaiʋa Maazi, naJamini, naEkeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaOnami ʋaiʋa Shamai, naJada. Ʋanakomana ʋaShamai: Nadabi naAbishuri.
Zita romukadzi waAbishuri raiʋa Abihairi; iye akamuɓerekera Abani, naMoridi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaNadabi: Seredi, naApaimi; asi Seredi wakafa asinaʋana.
Ʋanakomana ʋaApaimi: Ishi. Ʋanakomana ʋaIshi: Sheshani. Ʋanakomana ʋaSheshani: Arai.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJada, munuŋuna waShamai: Jeteri, naJonatani; Jeteri akafa asinaʋana.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJonatani: Pereti naZaza. Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaJerameeri.
Ɀino Sheshani wakaŋga asinaʋanakomana, asi ʋanasikana. Sheshani wakaŋga anomuranda, muEgipita, wainzi Jara.
Sheshani akapa Jara muranda wake mukunda wake aʋe mukadzi wake; iye akamuɓerekera Atai.
Atai akaɓereka Natani, Natani akaɓereka Zabadi;
Zabadi akaɓereka Efrari, Efrari akaɓereka Obedi;
Obedi akaɓereka Jehu, Jehu akaɓereka Azaria;
Azaria akaɓereka Herezi, Herezi akaɓereka Ereasa;
Ereasa akaɓereka Sismai, Sismai akaɓereka Sharumi;
Sharumi akaɓereka Jekamia, Jekamia akaɓereka Erishama.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKarebi munuŋuna waJerameeri, ʋaiʋa Mesha weɗaŋgwe wake, wakaŋga ari ɓaɓa ʋaZifi; naʋanakomana ʋaMaresha ɓaɓa ʋaHebroni.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHebroni: Kora, naTapua, naRekemi, naShema.
Shema akaɓereka Rahami, ɓaɓa ʋaJorkeami; Rekemi akaɓereka Shamai.
Mŋanakomana waShamai wakaŋga ari Maoni; Maoni wakaŋga ari ɓaɓa ʋaBeti‐zuri.
Efa muroŋgo waKarebi, akaɓereka Harani, naMoza, naGazezi; Harani akaɓereka Gazezi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJadai: Regemi, naJotami, naGeshani, naPereti, naEfa, naShaafi.
Maaka, muroŋgo waKarebi, akaɓereka Sheberi naTirhana.
Iye akaɓereka ʋo Shaafi ɓaɓa ʋaMadmana, Sheva ɓaɓa ʋaMakbena, naɓaɓa ʋaGibea; mukunda waKarebi wakaŋga ari Aksa.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaKarebi: Mŋanakomana waHuri, weɗaŋgwe waEfrata: Shobari ɓaɓa ʋaKiriati‐jearimi;
Sarma ɓaɓa ʋaBeti‐rehemi, Harefi ɓaɓa ʋaBeti‐gaderi.
Shobari ɓaɓa ʋaKiriati‐jearimi wakaŋga anaʋanakomana: Haroe, nehafu
Marudzi aKiriati‐jearimi: ƲaItri, naʋaPuti, naʋaShumati, naʋaMishrai; kwaʋari ndiko kwakabva ʋaZorati naʋaEshtaori.
Ʋanakomana ʋaSarma: Beti‐rehemi, naʋaNetofati, Atroti‐beti‐Joabi, nehafu
Ʋuye marudzi aʋanyori, aigara paJabezi: ƲaTirati, ʋaShimeati, naʋaSukati. Ndiʋo ʋaKeni ʋakabva kunaHamati ɓaɓa ʋeimba yaRekabi.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaDavidi, ʋakamuɓerekerwa paHebroni: Weɗaŋgwe Amnoni,
wecitatu Absaromi mŋanakomana waMaaka, mukunda waTarmai mambo weGeshuri; wecinna Adonia mŋanakomana waHagiti;
weshanu Shefatia waAbitari; wetanhatu Itreami kunaEgra mukadzi wake.
Wakaɓerekerwa ʋatanhatu paHebroni; akaɓata ʋushe’po makore manomŋe nemŋedzi mitanhatu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi matatu namatatu.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋaakaɓerekerwa paJerusarema: Shimea, naShobabi, naNatani, naSoromoni, iʋo ʋanna, ʋaBati‐shua mukunda waAmieri;
naIbhari, naErishama, naErifereti;
naNoga, naNefegi, naJafia;
naErishama, naEriada, naErifereti, iʋo ʋapfumbamŋe.
Ndiʋo ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋana ʋaDavidi, ʋanakomana ʋaʋaroŋgo ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi; ʋuye Tamari wakaŋga ari hanɀadzi yaʋo.
Mŋanakomana waSoromoni wakaŋga ari Rehoboami, mŋanakomana wake
mŋanakomana wake Jorami, mŋanakomana wake Ahazia, mŋanakomana wake Joashi;
mŋanakomana wake Amazia, mŋanakomana wake Azaria, mŋanakomana wake Jotami;
mŋanakomana wake Ahazi, mŋanakomana wake Hezekia, mŋanakomana wake Manase;
mŋanakomana wake Amoni, mŋanakomana wake Josia.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJosia: Weɗaŋgwe Johanani, wecipiri Jehoyakimi, wecitatu Zedekia, wecinna Sharumi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJehoyakimi: Mŋanakomana wake Jekonia, mŋanakomana wake Zedekia.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJekonia, wakatapxa: Sheartieri mŋanakomana wake,
naMarkirami, naPedaya, naShenazari, Jekamia, Hoshama, naNedabia.
Ʋanakomana ʋaPedaya: Zerubaberi, naShimei; ʋanakomana ʋaZerubaberi: Meshurami, naHanania; ʋuye Sheromiti wakaŋga ari hanɀadzi yaʋo;
naHashuba, naOheri, naBerekia, naHasadia, naJushabi‐hesedi, iʋo ʋashanu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHanania: Peratia, naJeshaya; ʋanakomana ʋaRefaya, ʋanakomana ʋaArnani, ʋanakomana ʋaObadia, ʋanakomana ʋaShekania.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShekania: Shemaya; naʋanakomana ʋaShemaya: Hatushi, naIgari, naBaria, naNearia, naShafati, iʋo ʋatanhatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaNearia: Erioenai, naHizkia, naAzrikami, iʋo ʋatatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaErioenai: Hodavia, naEriashibi, naPeraya, naAkubi, naJohanani, naDeraya, naAnani, iʋo ʋanomŋe.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJuda: Perezi, naHezroni, naKarmi, naHuri, naShobari.
Reaya mŋanakomana waShobari akaɓereka Jahati; Jahati akaɓereka Ahumai naRahadi. Ndiwo marudzi aʋaZorati.
Ʋuye aʋa ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaɓaɓa ʋaEtami: Jezreeri, naIshma, naIdbashi; ʋuye zita rehanɀadzi yaʋo rakaŋga riri Hazereponi;
naPenueri ɓaɓa ʋaGedori, naEzeri ɓaɓa ʋaHusha. Ndiʋo ʋana ʋaHuri, weɗaŋgwe waEfrata, ɓaɓa ʋaBeti‐rehemi.
Ɀino Ashuri ɓaɓa ʋaTekoa wakaŋga anaʋakadzi ʋaʋiri, Hera naNaara.
Naara akamuɓerekera Ahuzami, naHeferi, naTemeni, naHaahashtari. Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaNaara.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHera ʋaiʋa Zereti, naIzhari, naEtnani.
Hakozi akaɓereka Anubi, naZobeba, nehama dzaAhareri mŋanakomana waHarumi.
Jabezi akakudzwa kukunda ʋanuŋuna ʋake, mai ʋake ʋakamutumidza zita rinonzi Jabezi, ʋaciti: Nokuti ndakamuɓereka ndicitambudzika.

Jabezi akaɗana kunaMŋari waIsraeri, akati: Haiwa, ɗai mucindiropafadza henyu, nokukurisa nyika yaŋgu, nokundifambisa noruʋoko rwenyu, nokundiceŋgeta kuneɀakaipa, kuti ɀirege kundiwira! Mŋari akamupa ɀaakakumbira.
Kerubi munuŋuna waShuha akaɓereka Mehiri, iye wakaŋga ari ɓaɓa ʋaEshtoni.
Eshtoni akaɓereka Beti‐rafa, naPasea, naTehina ɓaɓa ʋaIri‐nahashi. Ndiʋo ʋana ʋaReka.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKenazi: Otnieri, naSeraya; ʋanakomana ʋaOtnieri: Hatati.
Meonotai akaɓereka Ofra; Seraya akaɓereka Joabi ɓaɓa ʋaGe‐harashimi; nokuti dzaiʋa mhizha.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKarebi mŋanakomana waJefune: Iru, naEra, naNaami; ʋanakomana ʋaEra: Kenazi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJehareri: Zifi, naZifa, naTiria, naAsareri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEzra: Jeteri, naMeredi, naEferi, naJaroni.
Mukadzi wake muJuda akaɓereka Jeredi ɓaɓa ʋaGedori, naHeberi ɓaɓa ʋaSoko, naJekutieri ɓaɓa ʋaZanoa. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBitia mukunda waFarao, wakaŋga akawanikwa naMeredi.
Ʋanakomana ʋomukadzi waHodia, hanɀadzi yaNahami ʋakaŋga ʋari ɓaɓa ʋaKeira muGarmi, naEshtemoa muMaakati.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShimoni: Amnoni, naRina, naBeni‐hanani, naTironi. Ʋanakomana ʋaIshi; Zoheti, naBeni‐zoheti.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShera mŋanakomana waJuda: Eri ɓaɓa ʋaReka, naRaada ɓaɓa ʋaMaresha, nehama yedzimba dzaiʋo ʋairuka muceka wakaiȿo‐naka, ʋeimba yaAshbea;
naJokimi, naʋarume ʋeKozeba, naJoashi, naSarafi, ʋaiɓata ʋushe bgaMoabi, naJashubi‐rehemi. Mashoko awa nde‐ekare.
Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋaʋumbi ʋehari, ʋuye ʋaigara paNetaimi neGedera; ndipo paʋaigara namambo kuzoɓate‐ɓasa rake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaSimeoni: Nemueri, naJamini, naJaribi, naZera, naShauri;
mŋanakomana wake Sharumi, mŋanakomana wake Mibsami, mŋanakomana wake Mishma.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMishma: Mŋanakomana wake Hamueri, mŋanakomana wake Zakuri, mŋanakomana wake Shimei.
Ɀino Shimei wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋanegumi naʋatanhatu naʋanasikana ʋatanhatu; asi ʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋasinaʋana ʋazhinji, ʋuye rudzi rwaʋo rwose haruna‐kuwanda, saʋana ʋaJuda.
Iʋo ʋakagara paBeeri‐sheba, neMorada, neHazari‐shuari;
napaBirha, napaEzemi, napaToradi;
napaBetueri, napaHorma, napaZikragi;
napaBeti‐markaboti, napaHazari‐susimi napaBeti‐biri, napaShaaraimi. Ndiwo aiʋa maguta aʋo kuȿikira Davidi aciɓata ʋushe.
Misha yaʋo yakaŋga iri Etami, neAini, neRimoni, neTokeni, neAshani, maguta mashanu;
nemisha yaʋo yose, yakaŋga yakakomba maguta iwayo, kuȿikira paBaari. Ndipo paʋaigara, ʋuye mazita amarudzi aʋo ari’po.
NaMeshobabi, naJamreki, naJosha mŋanakomana waAmazia;
naJoseri, naJehu mŋanakomana waJoshibia, mŋanakomana waSeraya, mŋanakomana waAsieri;
naErioenai, naJaakoba, naJeshohaya, naAsaya, naAdieri, naJeshmieri, naBenaya;
naZiza mŋanakomana waShifi, mŋanakomana waAroni, mŋanakomana waJedaya, mŋanakomana waShimri, mŋanakomana waShemaya;
aʋa ʋakarebga mazita aʋo, ʋaiʋa macinda pamarudzi aʋo; dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo dzikawanda kwaɀo.
Ʋakaenda paʋanopinda paGedori, kuȿikira parutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rwomupata, kutȿakira makwai aʋo mafuro.
Ʋakawana mafuro akanaka kwaɀo, ʋuye nyika yakaŋga iri mhami, inorugare nokunyarara; nokuti ʋaigara’po kare ʋaiʋa ʋana ʋaHami.

Aʋa, ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋo, ʋakaȿika pamazuʋa aHezekia mambo waJuda, ʋakaputsa matente aʋo ʋuye ʋaMeunimi ʋaʋakawana’po, ʋakaʋaparadza cose, kuȿikira nhasi, ʋakagara panyika yaʋo; nokuti kwakaŋga kunamafuro’po amakwai aʋo.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋo, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaSimeoni, ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanamazana mashanu, ʋakaenda kugomo reSeiri, ʋakatuŋgamirirwa naPeratia, naNearia, naRefaia, naUzieri, ʋanakomana ʋaIshi.
Ʋakakunda ʋakaŋga ʋasara ʋaʋaAmareki, ʋakapukunyuka, ʋakagara’po kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.

Ʋana ʋaRubeni mŋana weɗaŋgwe waIsraeri, (nokuti ndiye wakaŋga ari weɗaŋgwe; asi ɀaakaȿiɓisa nhoʋo yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋuɗaŋgwe bgake bgakapiwa ʋanakomana ʋaJosefa mŋanakomana waIsraeri; naiɀoɀo mazita amadziteteguru haaʋereŋgwi noʋuɗaŋgwe.
Nokuti Juda ndiye wakaŋga ari mukuru pakati paʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake, mutuŋgamiriri akabva kwaari; asi ʋuɗaŋgwe bgakaŋga ʋuri bgaJosefa;)
ʋanakomana ʋaRubeni mŋana weɗaŋgwe waIsraeri: Hanoki, naParu, naHezroni, naKarmi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJoeri: Shemaya mŋanakomana wake, Gogi mŋanakomana wake, naShimei mŋanakomana wake;
Mika mŋanakomana wake, naReaya mŋanakomana wake, naBaari mŋanakomana wake;
naBeera mŋanakomana wake, iye wakatapxa naTirgati‐pirneseri mambo weAsiria; iye wakaŋga ari mucinda waʋaRubeni.
Naʋanuŋuna ʋake nedzimba dzaʋo kana mazita amadziteteguru aciʋereŋgwa: Mukuru Jeyieri, naZekaria,
naBera mŋanakomana waAzazi, mŋanakomana waShema, mŋanakomana waJoeri, waigara paAroeri kuȿikira paNebo neBaari‐meoni;
kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa wakaŋga agere kuȿikira pakutaŋga kwerenje kubva kurwizi Yufratesi; nokuti ŋombe dzaʋo dzakaŋga dzawanda panyika yeGireadi.
Namazuʋa aSauri ʋakarwa naʋaHagari, ʋakaʋakunda; ʋakagara pamatente aʋo panyika yose yakaŋga iri kumabvazuʋa eGireadi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGadi ʋakaŋga ʋagere kwakatarisana naʋo panyika yeBashani, kuȿikira paSareka;
Joeri mukuru, naShafani wecipiri, naJanai, naShafati, paBashani;
naʋanuŋuna ʋaʋo ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo: Mikaeri, naMeshurami, naSheba, naJorai, naJakani, naZiya, naEberi, iʋo ʋanomŋe.
Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAbihairi mŋanakomana waHuri, mŋanakomana waJaroa, mŋanakomana waGireadi, mŋanakomana waMikaeri, mŋanakomana waJeshishai, mŋanakomana waJado, mŋanakomana waBuzi,
naAhi, mŋanakomana waAbdieri, mŋanakomana waGuni, mukuru wedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋagere paGireadi paBashani, nomumisha yaro mikuru, nomuruwa reSharoni, kuȿikira kumiganhu yayo.
Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋereŋgwa namazita amadziteteguru aʋo pamazuʋa aJotami mambo waJuda, napamazuʋa aJeroboami mambo waIsraeri.

Ʋanakomana ʋaRubeni, naʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare, ʋarume ʋaigona kushoŋga nhoʋo neminondo, nokufura noʋuta, ʋaigona kurwa, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀinna namazana manomŋe namakumi matanhatu, ʋaigona kundorwa.
Ʋakarwa naʋaHagari, naJeturi, naNafishi, naNodabi.
Ʋakaɓatsirwa pakurwa naʋo, ʋaHagari ʋakakundwa naʋo, naʋose ʋaiʋa naʋo; nokuti ʋakaɗana kunaJehova ʋari pakurwa, akaʋanzwa; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitenda kwaari.
Ʋakatapa ɀipfuwo ɀaʋo, makamera aneɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu, namakwai aneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu, nemboŋgoro dzineɀuru ɀiʋiri, naʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana.
Ʋazhinji ʋakafa ʋaʋurawa, nokuti kurwa kwaŋga kuri kwaMŋari. Iʋo ʋakagara panɀimbo yaʋo kuȿikira pakutapxa kwaʋo.
Ʋanakomana ʋehafu yorudzi rwaManase ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika iyo; ʋakawanda kubva paBashani kuȿikira paBaari‐hermoni neSeniri, negomo reHermoni.
Ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo ndiʋo: Eferi, naIshi, naErieri, naAsrieri, naJeremia, naHodavia, naJadieri, ʋarume ʋaiʋa nesimba noʋumhare, ʋanhu ʋaiʋa nembiri, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Asi ʋakazotadzira Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakapata ʋaciteʋera ʋamŋari ʋendudzi dzenyika iyo, dzakaŋga dzaparadzwa naMŋari pamberi paʋo.

Mŋari waIsraeri akamutsa mŋeya waPuri mambo weAsiria, nomŋeya waTirgati‐pirneseri mambo weAsiria; iye akaʋatapa, iʋo ʋaRubeni, naʋaGadi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, akaʋaisa Hara, neHabori, neHara, nokurwizi Gozani kuȿikira nhasi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRevi: Gershoni, naKohati, naMerari;
naʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Amrami, naIshari, naHebroni, naUzieri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAmrami: Aroni, naMosesi, naMiriami. Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni: Nadabi, naAbihu, naEriazari, naItamari.
Eriazari akaɓereka Pinehasi, Pinehasi akaɓereka Abishua,
Abishua akaɓereka Buki, Buki akaɓereka Uzi,
Uzi akaɓereka Zerahiya, Zerahiya akaɓereka Merayoti,
Merayoti akaɓereka Amaria, Amaria akaɓereka Ahitubi,
Ahitubi akaɓereka Zadoki, Zadoki akaɓereka Ahimaazi,
Ahimaazi akaɓereka Azaria, Azaria akaɓereka Johanani,
Johanani akaɓereka Azaria, (ndiye waiɓate‐ɓasa romuprista muimba yakaʋakwa naSoromoni paJerusarema;)
Azaria akaɓereka Amaria, Amaria akaɓereka Ahitubi,
Ahitubi akaɓereka Zadoki, Zadoki akaɓereka Sharumi,
Sharumi akaɓereka Hirkia, Hirkia akaɓereka Azaria,
Azaria akaɓereka Seraya, Seraya akaɓereka Jehozadaki,
Jehozadaki akatapxa, ŋguʋa yakatapa Jehova Juda neJerusarema noruʋoko rwaNebukadnezari.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRevi: Gershomi, naKohati, naMerari:
Mazita aʋanakomana ʋaGershomi ndiwo: Ribni naShimei.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Amrami, naIshari, naHebroni, naUzieri;
naʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Mari, naMushi. Ʋuye ndidzo dzimba dzaʋaRevi, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo:
ƲaGershoni: Ribni mŋanakomana wake, naJahati mŋanakomana wake, naZima mŋanakomana wake,
naJoa mŋanakomana wake, naIdo mŋanakomana wake, naZera mŋanakomana wake, naJeaterai mŋanakomana wake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Aminadabi mŋanakomana wake, naKora mŋanakomana wake, naAsiri mŋanakomana wake,
naErkana mŋanakomana wake, naAbiasafi mŋanakomana wake, naAsiri mŋanakomana wake,
naTahati mŋanakomana wake, naUrieri mŋanakomana wake, naUzi mŋanakomana wake, naShauri mŋanakomana wake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaErkana: Amasai, naAhimoti.
Kana ari Erkana: Ʋanakomana ʋaErkana: Zofai mŋanakomana wake, naNahati mŋanakomana wake,
naEriabi mŋanakomana wake, naJehorami mŋanakomana wake, naErkana mŋanakomana wake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaSamueri: Weɗaŋgwe
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Mari, naRibni mŋanakomana wake, naShimei mŋanakomana wake, naUza mŋanakomana wake,
naShimra mŋanakomana wake, naHagia mŋanakomana wake, naAsaya mŋanakomana wake.
Ʋuye aʋa ndiʋo ʋakagadzwa naDavidi kuzofambisa ɓasa rokuimba mumba maJehova, areka yawana pokuzorora.
Ʋaishumira pakuimba pamberi petabernakeri yetente rokusoŋgana, kuȿikira Soromoni aʋaka imba yaJehova paJerusarema; ʋakamira paɓasa raʋo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋagoʋerwa napo.
Ndiʋo ʋaimira’po naʋanakomana ʋaʋo: Kuʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Hemani muimbi, mŋanakomana waJoeri, mŋanakomana waSamueri;
mŋanakomana waErkana, mŋanakomana waJehorami, mŋanakomana waErieri, mŋanakomana waToa;
mŋanakomana waZufi, mŋanakomana waErkana, mŋanakomana waMahati, mŋanakomana waAmasai;
mŋanakomana waErkana, mŋanakomana waJoeri, mŋanakomana waAzaria, mŋanakomana waZefania,
mŋanakomana waTahati, mŋanakomana waAsiri, mŋanakomana waEbiasafi, mŋanakomana waKora;
mŋanakomana waIshari, mŋanakomana waKohati, mŋanakomana waRevi, mŋanakomana waIsraeri.
Munuŋuna wake Asafi, wakaŋga amire kurudyi rwake, iye Asafi mŋanakomana waBerekia, mŋanakomana waShimea;
mŋanakomana waMikaeri, mŋanakomana waBaaseya, mŋanakomana waMarkija;
mŋanakomana waItni, mŋanakomana waZera, mŋanakomana waAdaya;
mŋanakomana waEtani, mŋanakomana waZima, mŋanakomana waShimei;
mŋanakomana waJahati, mŋanakomana waGershomi, mŋanakomana waRevi.
Kuruɓoshwe rwaʋo, hama dzaʋo iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Etani mŋanakomana waKishi, mŋanakomana waAbdi, mŋanakomana waMaruki;
mŋanakomana waHashabia, mŋanakomana waAmazia, mŋanakomana waHirkia;
mŋanakomana waAmzi, mŋanakomana waBani, mŋanakomana waShemeri;
mŋanakomana waMari, mŋanakomana waMushi, mŋanakomana waMerari, mŋanakomana waRevi.
Hama dzaʋo iʋo ʋaRevi ndiʋo ʋakagoʋerwa maɓasa ose patabernakeri yeimba yaJehova.

Asi Aroni naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaiɓayira paartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, napaartari yeɀinonhuwira, ʋaiɓata maɓasa ose apanɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene, nokuyananisira Israeri, ʋaciita ɀose ɀakarairwa naMosesi muranda waMŋari.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ndiʋo: Eriazari mŋanakomana wake, naPinehasi mŋanakomana wake, naAbishua mŋanakomana wake;
naBuki mŋanakomana wake, naUzi mŋanakomana wake, naZerahiya mŋanakomana wake;
naMerayoti mŋanakomana wake, naAmaria mŋanakomana wake, naAhitubi mŋanakomana wake;
naZadoki mŋanakomana wake, naAhimaazi mŋanakomana wake.
Kwaʋaigara, kwaʋaidzika matente aʋo panyika yaʋo, ndiko: Ʋanakomana waAroni, ʋedzimba dzaʋaKohati, nokuti ndiʋo ʋakataŋga kugoʋerwa,
iʋo ʋakapiwa Hebroni panyika yaJuda, namafuro aro akaŋga akapoteredza;
asi minda yeguta, nemisha yaro, yakapiwa Karebi mŋanakomana waJefune.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakapiwa maguta oʋutiziro, aiti: Hebroni, neRibna namafuro awo, neJatiri, neEshtemoa namafuro awo;
neHireni namafuro aro, neDebiri namafuro aro;
neAshani namafuro aro, neBeti‐shemeshi namafuro aro.
Ʋuye ʋorudzi rwaBenjamini: Geba namafuro aro, neAremeti namafuro aro, neAnatoti namafuro aro. Maguta aʋo ose pakati pedzimba dzaʋo dzose, aiʋa maguta anegumi namatatu.
Ʋamŋe ʋanakomana ʋaKohati ʋakapiwa nemijenya maguta anegumi pakati pehafu yorudzi rwaManase, iyo hafu yaManase.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGershomi nedzimba dzaʋo, ʋo rudzi rwaIsakari, noʋorudzi rwaAsheri, noʋorudzi rwaNaftari, noʋorudzi rwaManase paBashani,
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari nedzimba dzaʋo
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapa ʋaRevi maguta namafuro awo.
Ʋakaʋapa nemijenya maguta iwayo akarebga mazita awo ʋorudzi rwaʋana ʋaJuda, noʋorudzi rwaʋana ʋaSimeoni, noʋorudzi rwaʋana ʋaBenjamini.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋedzimba dzaʋana ʋaKohati ʋakaŋga ʋanamaguta panyika yaʋo, ʋorudzi rwaEfraimi.
Ʋakaʋapa maguta oʋutiziro,
neJokmeami namafuro aro, neBeti‐horoni namafuro aro,
neAjaroni namafuro aro, neGatrimoni namafuro aro;
ʋehafu yorudzi rwaManase
Ʋanakomana ʋaGershomi
noʋorudzi rwaIsakari: Kedeshi namafuro aro, neDaberati namafuro aro,
neRamoti namafuro aro, neAnemi namafuro aro;
noʋorudzi rwaAsheri: Mashari namafuro aro, neAbdoni namafuro aro;
neHukoki namafuro aro, neRehobi namafuro aro;
noʋorudzi rwaNaftari: Kedeshi paGarire namafuro aro, neHamoni namafuro aro, neKiriataimi namafuro aro.
Ʋamŋe
ʋuye mhiri kwaJoridani paJeriko, kumabvazuʋa aJoridani, ʋorudzi rwaRubeni, ʋakapiwa Bezeri riri kurenje namafuro aro, neJaza namafuro aro,
neKedemoti namafuro aro, neMefati namafuro aro;
noʋorudzi rwaGadi: Ramoti paGireadi namafuro aro, neMahanaimi namafuro aro,
neHeshboni namafuro aro, neJazeri namafuro aro.
Ʋanakomana ʋaIsakari: Tora, naPua, naJashubi, naShimroni, iʋo ʋanna.

Ʋanakomana ʋaTora: Uzi, naRefaya, naJerieri, naJamai, naIbsami, naShemueri, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, idzo dzaTora; ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare pakati pamarudzi aʋo; pamazuʋa aDavidi ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri namazana matanhatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaUzi: Izrahiya; naʋanakomana ʋaIzrahiya: Mikaeri naObadia, naJoeri, naIshia, iʋo ʋashanu; aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru.
Kwaʋari, kumarudzi aʋo nokudzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kwakaŋga kunamapoka ehondo dzokurwa aneɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀitanhatu; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋakadzi ʋazhinji naʋanakomana ʋazhinji.
Hama dzaʋo pakati pedzimba dzose dzaIsakari, iʋo ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi masere neɀinomŋe, kana ʋaciʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo ose.

Ʋanakomana ʋaBera: Ezboni, naUzi, naUzieri, naJerimoti, naIri, iʋo ʋashanu. Iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri namakumi matatu naʋanna.
Ʋanakomana ʋaBekeri: Zemira, naJoashi, naEriezeri, naErioenai, naOmri, naJeremoti, naAbiia, naAnatoti, naAremeti. Iʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaBekeri.
Ʋakaʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo namarudzi aʋo, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri namazana maʋiri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJediyaeri: Birhani, naʋanakomana ʋaBirhani: Jehushi, naBenjamini, naEhudi, naKenana, naZetani, naTarshishi, naAhishahari.

Iʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaJediyaeri, ʋaciʋereŋgwa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinegumi neɀinomŋe namazana maʋiri, ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kuenda kuhondo kundorwa.
NaShupimi ʋo, naHupimi, ʋanakomana ʋaIri, naHushimi, ʋanakomana ʋaAheri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaNaftari: Jazieri, naGuni, naJezeri, naSharumi, ʋanakomana ʋaBirha.
Ʋanakomana ʋaManase: Asrieri, waakaɓerekerwa
Makiri akawana mukadzi worudzi rwaHupimi naShupimi, zita rehanɀadzi yake raiʋa Maaka;) zita rowecipiri rakaŋga riri Zerofehadi; Zerofehadi wakaŋga anaʋakunda.
Maaka mukadzi waMakiri akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akatumidza zita rake Pereshi; zita romunuŋuna wake raiʋa Shereshi, ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋari Urami naRakemi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaUrami: Bedani. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaGireadi mŋanakomana waMakiri, mŋanakomana waManase.
Hanɀadzi yake Hamoreketi akaɓereka Ishodi, naAbiezeri, naMara.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShemida: Ahiani, naShekemi, naRiki naAniami.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEfraimi: Shutera, naBeredi mŋanakomana wake, naTahati mŋanakomana wake, naEreada mŋanakomana wake, naTahati mŋanakomana wake,
naZabadi mŋanakomana wake, naShutera mŋanakomana wake, naEzeri, naEreadi; iʋo ʋakaʋurawa naʋanhu ʋeGati ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓerekerwa panyika iyo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaɓurukira kwaʋari kuzotora ɀipfuwo ɀaʋo.
Efraimi ɓaɓa ʋaʋo akaʋacema mazuʋa mazhinji, hama dzake dzikaʋuya kuzomuɓata ruʋoko.
Akapinda kumukadzi wake, iye akaʋa nemimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Beria; nokuti imba yake yakaŋga icitambudzika.
Mukunda wake waiʋa Sheera, iye akaʋaka Beti‐horoni rezasi nerokumsoro, neUzeni‐sheera.
Mŋanakomana wake waiʋa Refa, naReshefi, naTera mŋanakomana wake, naTahani mŋanakomana wake;
naRadani mŋanakomana wake, naAmihudi mŋanakomana wake, naErishama mŋanakomana wake,
naNuni mŋanakomana wake, naJehoshua mŋanakomana wake.
Nyika yaʋo nokwaʋakaŋga ʋagere ndiBeti‐eri nemisha yaro; nokumabvazuʋa, Naarani, nokumaʋirira Gezeri nemisha yaro; neShekemi nemisha yaro, kuȿikira paAza nemisha yaro;
nokumiganhu yaʋana ʋaManase. Beti‐sheani nemisha yaro, neTaanaki nemisha yaro, neMegido nemisha yaro, neDori nemisha yaro. Ʋana ʋaJosefa mŋanakomana waIsraeri ʋakagara mumisha iyi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaAsheri: Imna, naIshva, naIshvi, naBeria, naSera hanɀadzi yaʋo.
Ʋanakomana ʋaBeria: Heberi, naMarkieri, waiʋa ɓaɓa ʋaBirzaiti.
Heberi akaɓereka Jafreti, naShomeri, naHotami, naShua hanɀadzi yaʋo.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJafreti: Pasaki, naBimari, naAshvati. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJafreti.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShemeri: Ahi, naRoga, naJehuba, naArami.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHeremi munuŋuna wake: Zofa, naImna, naShereshi, naAmari.
Ʋanakomana ʋaZofa: Sua, naHarneferi, naShuari, naBeri, naImra;
naBeseri, naHodi, naShama, naShirsha, naItrani, naBeera.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJeteri: Jefune, naPispa, naAra.
Ʋanakomana ʋaUra: Ara, naHanieri, naRizia.

Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋana ʋaAsheri, ʋari ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakatsaurwa, ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakuru ʋamacinda. Ʋakaʋereŋgwa namazita aʋo, iʋo ʋaigona kurwa, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀitanhatu.
Benjamini wakaɓereka mŋana wake weɗaŋgwe Bera, naAshberi wecipiri, naAhara wecitatu;
naNoa wecinna, naRafa weshanu.
Bera akaɓereka ʋanakomana: Adari, naGera, naAbihudi;
naAbishua, naNaamani, naAhoa;
naGera, naShefufani, naHurami.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaEhudi: Ndiʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aigara paGeba, ʋakaʋatapa, ʋakaenda naʋo Manahati;
naNaamani, naAhiya, naGera, iye akaʋatapa; akaɓereka Uza naAhihudi.
Shaharaimi akaɓereka ʋanakomana panyika yaMoabi, adziŋga ʋakadzi ʋake Hushimi naBaara.
Akaɓereka kumukadzi wake Hodeshi: Jobabi, naZibia, naMesha, naMarkami;
naJeuzi, naShakia, naMirma. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋake, ʋakuru
Hushimi akaɓereka Abitubi naErpaari.
Ʋanakomana ʋaErpaari: Eberi, naMishami, naShemedi; ndiye wakaʋaka Ono, neRodi, nemisha yawo;
naBeria, naShema, iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakuru
naAhiyo, naShashaki, naJeremoti;
naZebadia, naAradi, naEderi;
naMikaeri, naIshpa, naJoha, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBeria;
naZebadia, naMeshurami, naHizki, naHeberi;
naIshmerai, naIzria, naJobabi, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaErpari;
naJakimi, naZikri, naZabdi;
naErienai, naZiretai, naErieri;
naAdaya, naBeraya, naShimrati, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaShimei;
naIshpani, naEberi, naErieri;
naAbdoni, naZikri, naHanani;
naHanania, naErami, naAnatotiya;
naIfdeya, naPenueri, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaShashaki;
naShamsherai, naSheharia, naAtaria;
naJareshia, naEria, naZikri, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJehorami.
Iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakuru
PaGibeoni paigara ɓaɓa ʋaGibeoni,
Mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe waiʋa Abdoni, naZuri, naKishi, naBaari, naNadabi;
naGedori, naAhio, naZekeri.
Mikroti akaɓereka Shimea. Naiʋo ʋaigara nehama dzaʋo Jerusarema, ʋakatarisana nehama dzaʋo.
Neri akaɓereka Kishi, Kishi akaɓereka Sauro, Sauro akaɓereka Jonatani, naMarkishua, naAbinadabi, naEshbaari.
Mŋanakomana waJonatani wakaŋga ari Meribi‐baari; Meribi‐baari akaɓereka Mika.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMika: Pitoni, naMereki, naTarea, naAhazi.
Ahazi akaɓereka Joada, Joada akaɓereka Aremeti, naAzmaveti, naZimri; Zimri akaɓereka Moza;
Moza akaɓereka Binea; Rafa waiʋa mŋanakomana wake, naEreasa mŋanakomana wake, naAzeri mŋanakomana wake.
Azeri wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋatanhatu; mazita aʋo ndiwo: Azrikami, naBokeru, naIshmaeri, naShearia, naObadia, naHanani. Aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaAzeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEsheki munuŋuna wake: Urami mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe, naJeuzi wecipiri, naErifereti wecitatu.

Ʋanakomana ʋaUrami ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋafuri ʋemiseʋe; ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋanakomana ʋazhinji, naʋanakomana ʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋo, ʋakaȿika zana namakumi mashanu. Iʋo ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo; tarirai, akanyorwa ose mubuku yamadzimambo aIsraeri. ƲaJuda ʋakazotapxa, ʋakaiswa Babironi nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwaʋo.
Ɀino, ʋakataŋga kugara panyika yaʋo napamaguta aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaIsraeri, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋaNetinimi.
PaJerusarema ndipo pakaŋga pagere ʋana ʋaJuda, naʋana ʋaBenjamini, naʋana ʋaEfraimi, naʋaManase;
Utai mŋanakomana waAmihudi, mŋanakomana waOmri, mŋanakomana waImri, mŋanakomana waBani, waʋana ʋaPerezi mŋanakomana waJuda.
NaʋaShiro: Asaya mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe, naʋanakomana ʋake.
Ʋanakomana ʋaZera: Jeueri, nehama dzaʋo, ʋanamazana matanhatu namakumi mapfumbamŋe.
Ʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini: Saru, mŋanakomana waMeshrami, mŋanakomana waHodavia, mŋanakomana waHasenua.
NaIbneya, mŋanakomana waJehorami, naEra mŋanakomana waUzi, mŋanakomana waMikri, naMeshurami mŋanakomana waShefatia, mŋanakomana waReueri, mŋanakomana waIbniya;
nehama dzaʋo, marudzi aʋo aiȿika mazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi mashanu namatanhatu. Ʋarume aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa padzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ʋaʋaprista: Jedaya, naJehoyaribi, naJakini;
naAzaria, mŋanakomana waHirkia, mŋanakomana waMeshurami, mŋanakomana waZadoki, mŋanakomana waMerayoti, mŋanakomana waAhitubi, mukuru paimba yaMŋari;

naAdaya, mŋanakomana waJehorami, mŋanakomana waPashuri, mŋanakomana waMarkija, naMaasai, mŋanakomana waAdieri, mŋanakomana waJazera, mŋanakomana waMeshurami, mŋanakomana waMeshiremiti, mŋanakomana waImeri;
nehama dzaʋo, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo ʋakaȿika curu cimŋe namazana manomŋe namakumi matanhatu; ʋarume ʋanesimba kwaɀo noʋumhare paɓasa rokushumira paimba yaMŋari.
ƲaʋaRevi: Shemaya mŋanakomana waHashubi, mŋanakomana waAzrikami, mŋanakomana waHashabia, waʋanakomana ʋaMerari;
naBakbakari, naHoreshi, naGarari, naMatania mŋanakomana waMika, mŋanakomana waZikri, mŋanakomana waAsafi;
naObadia mŋanakomana waShemaya, mŋanakomana waGarari, mŋanakomana waJedutuni; naBerekia mŋanakomana waAsa, mŋanakomana waErkana, ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamisha yaʋaNetofati.
Ʋatariri ʋamasuʋo: Sharumi, naAkubi, naTarmoni, naAhikami, nehama dzaʋo; Sharumi ndiye wakaŋga ari mukuru;
ndiʋo ʋaitarira suʋo ramambo rokumabvazuʋa kuȿikira ɀino; ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatariri ʋamasuʋo emisasa yaʋana ʋaRevi.

Sharumi mŋanakomana waKore, mŋanakomana waEbiasafi, mŋanakomana waKora, nehama dzake, iʋo ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋaKora, ndiʋo ʋaiʋa neɓasa rokushumira, ʋakatarira masuʋo etabernakeri; madziɓaɓa aʋo aitarira misasa yaJehova, nokuceŋgeta mikoʋa.
Pinehasi mŋanakomana waEreazari waiʋa murairi waʋo kare, Jehova akaʋa naye.
Zekaria mŋanakomana waMesheremia, wakaŋga ari mutariri womukoʋa wetente rokusoŋgana.

Aʋa ʋose, ʋakatsaurwa kuti ʋaʋe ʋatariri ʋamasuʋo, ʋakaȿika mazana maʋiri negumi naʋaʋiri. Aʋa ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo pamisha yaʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋakagadzwa paɓasa raʋo rakatarwa naDavidi naSamueri muʋoni.
Naiɀoɀo iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatariri ʋamasuʋo eimba yaJehova, iyo imba yetabernakeri, ʋaciraʋana.
Ʋatariri ʋakaŋga ʋari kumatiʋi manna, kumabvazuʋa, nokumaʋirira, nokumsoro, nenyasi.
Hama dzaʋo pamisha yaʋo ʋaifanira kuʋuya ŋguʋa dzose kana mazuʋa manomŋe apera, kuzogara naʋo.
Nokuti ʋatariri ʋanna ʋakuru ʋemikoʋa, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaRevi, ʋaiʋa paɓasa iri rakatarwa, ʋaitarira makamuri neɀiʋigiro ɀefuma paimba yaMŋari.
Ʋaigara’po ʋakapoteredza imba yaMŋari, nokuti ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋapiwa ɓasa iri, ʋaiʋa neɓasa rokuizarura maŋgwanani ose.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋaifanira kutarira midziyo yokushumira nayo; nokuti yaipinzwa iciʋereŋgwa, ʋuye yaiɓuɗiswa iciʋereŋgwa.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ɀe ʋakaŋga ʋakagadzwa kuti ʋatarire nhumbi nemidziyo yose nenɀimbo tȿene, noʋupfu bgakatsetseka, newaini, namafuta, neɀinonhuwira, nemiti inonhuwira.
Ʋamŋe ɀe ʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋaprista ʋaifanira kugadzira ɀinonhuwira ɀakaveŋganiswa.
Matitia, mumŋe waʋaRevi, mŋanakomana weɗaŋgwe waSharumi, waʋaKora, wakaŋga akatarirwa ɓasa reɀinhu ɀaiɓikwa mugaŋgo.
Naʋamŋe ʋehama dzaʋo, ʋaʋana ʋaKora, ʋaifanira kutarira ɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, kuɀigadzira saɓata rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ʋuye ndiʋo ʋaimbi, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaRevi, ʋaigara mumakamuri ʋasiŋgaɓati ɀimŋe; nokuti ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa raʋo masikati noʋusiku.
Iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaRevi, ʋakuru kumarudzi aʋo; ndiʋo ʋaigara Jerusarema.
Ɀino paGibeoni pakaŋga pagere ɓaɓa ʋaGibeoni, Jeieri; zita romukadzi wake rakaŋga riri Maaka.
Mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe waiʋa Abdoni, teʋere Zuri, naKishi, naBaari, naNeri, naNadabi;
naGedori, naAhio, naZekaria, naMikroti.
Mikroti wakaɓereka Shimeami. Iʋo ʋaigara ʋo pamŋe cete nehama dzaʋo paJerusarema, pakatarisana nehama dzaʋo.
Neri akaɓereka Kishi, Kishi akaɓereka Sauro, Sauro akaɓereka Jonatani, naMarki‐shua, naAbinadabi, naEshbaari.
Mŋanakomana waJonatani waiʋa Meribi‐baari. Meribi‐baari akaɓereka Mika.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMika: Pitoni, naMereki, naTarea,
Ahazi akaɓereka Jara, Jara akaɓereka Armeti naAzmaveti, naZimri; Zimri akaɓereka Moza;
Moza akaɓereka Binea, naRefaya mŋanakomana wake, naEreasa mŋanakomana wake, naAzeri mŋanakomana wake;
Azeri wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋatanhatu; mazita aʋo ndiwo: Azrikami, naBokeru, naIshmaeri, naShearia, naObadia, naHanani. Ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAzeri.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakarwa naʋaIsraeri; ʋarume ʋaIsraeri ʋakatiza pamberi paʋaFiristia, ʋakawira pasi ʋaʋurawa pagomo reGirboa.
ƲaFiristia ʋakateʋerera Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake kwaɀo, ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋuraya Jonatani, naAbinadabi, naMarkishua, ʋanakomana ʋaSauro.
Sauro akakurirwa kwaɀo pakurwa, ʋafuri ʋoʋuta ʋakamuɓata; akatambudzika kwaɀo nokuɗa kwaʋafuri ʋoʋuta.

Ipapo Sauro akati kumuɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo: Vomora munondo wako, undiɓaye nawo, kuti aʋa ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa ʋarege kuȿika ʋandiɗaɗire. Asi muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakaramba, nokuti wakaŋga acitya kwaɀo. Naiɀoɀo Sauro akatora munondo wake, akaɀiwisira pauri.
Ɀino muɓati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakati aciʋona kuti Sauro wafa, naiye akaɀiwisira ʋo pamunondo wake, akafa ʋo.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akafa naʋanakomana ʋake ʋatatu; ʋeimba yake yose ʋakafa pamŋe cete.
Ɀino ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamupata uyo, ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋatiza, ʋuye kuti Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake ʋafa, iʋo ʋakabva pamaguta aʋo, ʋakatiza; ʋaFiristia ʋakaȿika ʋakagara’mo.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋaciʋuya kuzokunuŋgura ʋakaŋga ʋaʋurawa, ʋakawana Sauro naʋanakomana ʋake ʋatatu ʋakafa pagomo reGirboa.
Ʋakamukunuŋgura, ʋakatora musoro wake nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, ʋakatuma nhume kumatiʋi ose enyika yaʋaFiristia, kundoziʋisa ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo shoko iro.
Ʋakaisa nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo muimba yaʋamŋari ʋaʋo, ʋakasuŋgira musoro wake mumba maDagoni.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋeJabeshi‐gireadi ʋakati ʋanzwa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa Sauro naʋaFiristia,
mhare dzose dzikasimuka, ʋakabvisa citunha caSauro neɀitunha ɀaʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaenda naɀo Jabeshi, ʋakaʋiga mafupa aʋo pasi pomuouki paJabeshi, ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya mazuʋa manomŋe.
Naiɀoɀo Sauro akafa nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwake kwaakaitira Jehova, ʋuye nokuɗa kweshoko raJehova raasina‐kuceŋgeta; ʋuye nokuti wakatȿaka mano kuȿikiro, kubvunza naro,
akasabvunza Jehova; naiɀoɀo wakamuʋuraya, akaisa ʋushe kunaDavidi mŋanakomana waJese.
Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana kunaDavidi paHebroni, ʋakati: Tarirai, isu tiri mafupa enyu nenyama yenyu.
Kare, kunyaŋge Sauro akaŋga ari mambo, ndimi maiɓuɗa nokupinda naIsraeri; Jehova Mŋari wenyu akati kwamuri: Iwe ucafudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, nokuʋa mutuŋgamiriri waIsraeri.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakuru ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaenda kunamambo paHebroni, Davidi akaita suŋgano paHebroni pamberi paJehova; iʋo ʋakazodza Davidi, kuti aʋe mambo waIsraeri, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga naJehova nomuromo waSamueri.
Davidi naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakakwira Jerusarema (ndiro Jebusi); ɀino ʋaJebusi, ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋaigara paJebusi ʋakati kunaDavidi: Hauŋgapindi pano. Asi Davidi wakakunda nhare yeZioni; ndiro guta raDavidi.
Ipapo Davidi akati: Unotaŋga kuɓaya ʋaJebusi ndiye ucaʋa mutuŋgamiriri nomukuru. Ɀino Joabi mŋanakomana waZeruya akataŋga kukwira, akaitwa mutuŋgamiriri.
Davidi akagara panhare; naiɀoɀo ʋakaritumidza zita rinonzi guta raDavidi.
Akaʋaka guta kumatiʋi ose, kubva paMiro kuȿikira kumatiʋi ose; Joabi akagadzira ɀimŋe ɀeguta.
Davidi akaramba acikura, nokuti Jehova wehondo waiʋa naye.
Ɀino ndiʋo ʋakuru ʋaʋarume ʋanesimba ʋaiʋa naDavidi, ʋaimusimbisa paʋushe bgake, pamŋe cete naʋaIsraeri ʋose, kuti ʋamugadze aʋe mambo, seɀakarebga naJehova pamsoro paIsraeri.
Ndiko kuwanda kwaʋarume ʋanesimba ʋaiʋa naDavidi: Jashobeami mŋanakomana womuHakmoni, mukuru waʋanamakumi matatu; iye wakasimudza pfumo rake akarwa naʋanamazana matatu, akaʋaʋuraya neŋguʋa imŋe.
Wakamuteʋera wakaŋga ari Ereazari, mŋanakomana waDodo muAhohi, mumŋe waʋarume ʋatatu ʋaiʋa nesimba.
Iye wakaŋga anaDavidi paPasi‐damini; ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana’po kuzorwa paɓindu rakaŋga rizere nebari; ʋanhu ʋakatiza pamberi paʋaFiristia.
Ʋakamira pakati peɓindu, ʋakarirwira, ʋakaʋuraya ʋaFiristia, Jehova akaʋarwira nokukunda kukuru.
Ɀino ʋatatu ʋaʋakuru ʋaʋanamakumi matatu ʋakaɓurukira kuɗombo kunaDavidi kuɓako reAdurami; ɀino hondo yaʋaFiristia yakaŋga yadzika matente pamupata weRefaimi.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Davidi wakaŋga ari munhare, ʋuye ɓoka raʋarwi ʋaʋaFiristia raiʋa paBeti‐rehemi neŋguʋa iyo.
Davidi akapaŋga, akati: Haiwa! ɗai mumŋe acindipa mvura yetsime reBeti‐rehemi, riri pasuʋo, ndinwe!

Ipapo mhare idzo nhatu dzakapasanura napakati pehondo yaʋaFiristia, ʋakandoteka mvura patsime reBeti‐rehemi, riri pasuʋo, ʋakaitora, ʋakaʋuya nayo kunaDavidi; asi Davidi wakaramba kuinwa, akaiɗururira kunaJehova,

akati: Mŋari waŋgu ŋgaandidziʋise, ndirege kuita cinhu ici! Ndiŋganwa ropa raʋarume aʋa ʋakaenda ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri ʋupenyu bgaʋo here? Nokuti ʋakaʋuya nayo ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri ʋupenyu bgaʋo. Naiɀoɀo akaramba kuinwa. Ndiɀo ɀakaitwa nemhare idzo nhatu.
Abishai munuŋuna waJoabi, ndiye wakaŋga ari mukuru waʋatatu aʋo, nokuti wakasimudza pfumo rake akarwa naʋanamazana matatu, akaʋaʋuraya; akaʋa nomukurumbira pakati paʋatatu aʋo.
Pakati paʋatatu ndiye wakaŋga anembiri kukunda ʋamŋe ʋaʋiri, akaʋa mukuru waʋo; asi haana‐kuenzana naʋatatu
Benaya mŋanakomana waJehoyada, mŋanakomana wemhare weKabzeeri, wakaŋga aita maɓasa makuru, iye wakaʋuraya

Akaʋuraya ʋo muEgipita, murume wakaŋga akakura kwaɀo wakaȿika makubiti mashanu; muEgipita uyu wakaŋga akaɓata pfumo muruʋoko rwake, asi iye wakaɓurukira kwaari akaɓata tȿimbo, akabvuta pfumo muruʋoko rwomuEgipita, akamuʋuraya nepfumo rake iro.
Ɀinhu iɀi ɀakaitwa naBenaya mŋanakomana waJehoyada, wakaŋga akakurumbira pakati pemhare idzo nhatu.
Tarirai, iye wakaŋga anembiri kukunda ʋanamakumi matatu, asi haana‐kuenzana naʋatatu
Mhare dzehondo dzaiʋa: Asaheri munuŋuna waJoabi, naErhanani mŋanakomana waDodo weBeti‐rehemi;
naShamoti muHarori, naHerezi muPeroni;
naIra mŋanakomana waIkeshi muTekoi, naAbiezeri muAnatoti;
naSibekai muHushati, naIrai muAhohi;
naMaharai muNetofati, naHeredi mŋanakomana waBaana muNetofati;
naItai mŋanakomana waRibai weGibea waʋana ʋaBenjamini, naBenaya muPiratoni;
naHurai wehoʋa dzeGaashi, naAbieri muArbati;
naAzmaveti muBaharumiti, naEriaba muShaarboni;
naʋanakomana ʋaHashemi muGizoni, naJonatani mŋanakomana waShage muHarari,
naAhiami mŋanakomana waSakari muharari, naErifari mŋanakomana waUri;
naHeferi muMekerati, naAhiya muPeroni;
naHezro muKarmeri, naNaarai mŋanakomana waEzbai;
naJoeri munuŋuna waNatani, naMibhari mŋanakomana waHagri;
naZereki muAmoni, naNaharai muBeeroti, muɓati wenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzaJoabi mŋanakomana waZeruya;
naIra muItri, naGarebi muItri;
naUria muHiti, naZabadi mŋanakomana waArai;
naAdina mŋanakomana waShiza muRubeni, mukuru waʋaRubeni, naʋanamakumi matatu naye;
naHanani mŋanakomana waMaaka, naJoshafati muMitni;
naUzia muAshterati, naShama naJeieri ʋanakomana ʋaHotami muAroeri;
naJediaeri mŋanakomana waShimri, naJoha munuŋuna wake, muTizi;
naErieri muMahavi, naJeribai, naJoshavia, ʋanakomana ʋaErnaami, naItma muMuabi;
naErieri, naObedi, naJaasieri muMezoba.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋakaenda kunaDavidi paZikragi, acakaʋanda nokuɗa kwaSauro mŋanakomana waKishi; iʋo ʋaiʋa mhare, ʋaimuɓatsira pakurwa.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓata ʋuta, ʋuye ʋaigona kuposha mabge nemiseʋe noʋuta noruʋoko rworudyi kana rworuɓoshwe ʋo; dzaiʋa hama dzaSauro ʋokwaBenjamini.
Mukuru wakaŋga ari Ahiezeri, teʋere Joashi, ʋanakomana ʋaShemaa muGibeati; naJezieri, naPereti, ʋanakomana ʋaAzmaveti; naBeraka, naJehu muAnatoti;
naIshmaya muGibeoni, mhare pakati paʋanamakumi matatu, wairaira ʋanamakumi matatu; naJeremia, naJahazieri, naJohanani, naJozabadi muGederati;
naEruzai, naJerimoti, naBearia, naShemaria, naShefatia muHarufi;
naErkana, naIshiya, naAzareri, naJoezeri, naJashobeami, ʋaKora;
naJoera, naZebadia ʋanakomana ʋaJehorami muGedori.

Ʋamŋe ʋaʋaGadi ʋakaɀiraʋura ʋo, ʋakaenda kunaDavidi kunhare kurenje, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋadzidza kurwa, ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kuɓata nhoʋo nepfumo; ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita seɀeshumba, ʋuye ʋaimhanya semharapara pamakomo;
Ezeri wakaŋga ari mukuru, wecipiri Obadia, wecitatu Eriabi;
wecinna Mismana, weshanu Jeremia;
wetanhatu Atai, wecinomŋe Erieri;
worusere Johanani, wepfumbamŋe Erzabadi;
wegumi Jeremia; wegumi nomumŋe Makbanai.
Ndiʋo kuʋana ʋaGadi ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋehondo; muɗuku kwaʋari wakaŋga akaenzana naʋanezana, nomukuru naʋanecuru cezana.
Ndiʋo ʋakayambuka Joridani pamŋedzi wokutaŋga, paŋguʋa yarwakafashamira kunhiʋi dzarwo dzose; ʋakadziŋga ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamipata, kumabvazuʋa nokumaʋirira.
Naʋamŋe ʋana ʋaBenjamini naʋaJuda ʋakaenda ʋo kunaDavidi munhare.

Davidi akaɓuɗa akasoŋgana naʋo, akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Kana maʋuya kwandiri norugare kuzondiɓatsira, mŋoyo waŋgu ucaʋa nemi; asi kana maʋuya kuzondinyeŋgera, kundiisa kuʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu, kunyaŋge ndisineɀakaipa pamaʋoko aŋgu, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu ŋgaaɀiʋone, akutukei pamsoro paɀo.
Ipapo mŋeya wakaʋuya pamsoro paAmasai waiʋa mukuru waʋanamakumi matatu,

KwaManase ʋo ʋakabva ʋamŋe, ʋakaenda kunaDavidi, ŋguʋa yaakaenda naʋaFiristia kundorwa naSauro, asi haʋana‐kuʋaɓatsira; nokuti madzishe aʋaFiristia akaraŋgana, akamudzosa, aciti: Ucatinyeŋgera, acienda kunatenzi wake Sauro, misoro yeɗu ikaʋa panjodzi.
Ɀino wakati acienda Zikragi, ʋamŋe ʋaManase ʋakabva, ʋakaȿika kwaari,
Ʋakaɓatsira Davidi pakurwa neɓoka ramakororo; nokuti ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, naʋakuru pahondo.
Zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ʋamŋe ʋakaȿika kunaDavidi kuzomuɓatsira, kuȿikira yaʋa hondo huru, sehondo yaMŋari.
Ndiko kuwanda kwaʋakuru ʋakashoŋgera kurwa, ʋakaenda kunaDavidi paHebroni, kuzodzosera ʋushe bgaSauro kwaari, seɀakarebga naJehova.
Ʋana ʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhoʋo nepfumo, ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀitanhatu namazana masere, ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋgera kurwa.
Kuʋana ʋaSimeoni ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare pakurwa ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀinomŋe nezana rimŋe.
Kuʋana ʋaRevi ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀinna namazana matanhatu.
Jehoyada waiʋa mutuŋgamiriri weimba yaAroni; ʋakaŋga ʋanaye ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀitatu namazana manomŋe;
naZadoki, jaya raiʋa nesimba noʋumhare, naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Kuʋana ʋaBenjamini, hama dzaSauro, ɀuru ɀitatu; nokuti kuȿikira paŋguʋa iyo ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋakaramba ʋakanamatira imba yaSauro.
Kuʋana ʋaEfraimi ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri namazana masere, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaŋga ʋanembiri padzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Kuhafu yorudzi rwaManase, ɀuru ɀinegumi neɀisere, ʋakaŋga ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋo, ʋakaȿika kuzoita Davidi mambo.
Kuʋana ʋaIsakari, ʋarume ʋaiziʋa ŋguʋa ɀakanaka, ʋuye kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kuitei, ʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋaiʋa mazana maʋiri; hama dzaʋo dzose dzairairwa naʋo.
KuʋaZeburuni, aʋo ʋaigona kufamba namapoka, nokugona kuroŋgedza hondo, ʋakaɓata nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo, ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu; ʋaigona kurwa ʋasinemŋoyo miʋiri.
KuʋaNaftari ʋakuru ʋanecuru cimŋe, ʋuye ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓata nhoʋo nepfumo ʋaiʋa naʋo, ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀinomŋe.
KuʋaDani ʋaigona kuroŋgedza hondo, ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀisere namazana matanhatu.
KuʋaAsheri, aʋo ʋaigona kufamba namapoka, nokugona kuroŋgedza hondo, ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna.
