Ʋuye mhiri kwaJoridani, kuʋaRubeni naʋaGadi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, aʋo ʋaiʋa nenhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo, ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri.

Aʋa ʋose, ʋarume ʋehondo, ʋaigona kuroŋgedza hondo, ʋakaȿika paHebroni nemŋoyo yakarurama kwaɀo, kuzoita Davidi mambo waʋaIsraeri ʋose; naʋaIsraeri ʋamŋe ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanomŋoyo mumŋe kuita Davidi mambo.
Ʋakagara’po naDavidi mazuʋa matatu, ʋakadya nokunwa, nokuti hama dzaʋo dzakaŋga dzaʋagadzirira.

Ʋuye ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋagere pedyo naʋo kuȿikira kwaIsakari naZeburuni naNaftari, ʋakaʋuya neɀokudya ɀakatakurwa nemboŋgoro, namakamera, namahesera, nenzombe, ɀiri ɀokudya ɀoʋupfu, namapundu amaʋonde, namasumbu amazambiriŋga akawoma, newaini, namafuta, nenzombe, namakwai mazhinji; nokuti mufaro wakaŋga uri’po pakati paIsraeri.
Ɀino Davidi wakaraŋgana naʋakuru ʋecuru camazana naʋamazana, naʋatuŋgamiriri ʋose,
Davidi akati kuʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri: Kana imi muciti ɀakanaka, ʋuye kana ɀicibva kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu, ŋgatitume
tidzosere ɀe areka yaMŋari weɗu kwatiri, nokuti hatina‐kuiraŋgarira pamazuʋa aSauro.
Ʋuŋgano yose ikatenda kuɀiita; nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ɀakanaka.
Ɀino Davidi akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose, kubva paShihori irwo
Davidi akakwira, iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakaenda Baara, ndiro Kiriati‐jearimi raiʋa raJuda, kuzotora’po areka yaMŋari, iye Jehova ugere pamsoro pamakerubi, paʋanonamata Zita
Ʋakatakura areka yaMŋari paŋgoro itȿa, ʋakaibvisa paimba yaAbinadabi; Uza naAhio ʋakafambisa ŋgoro.
Davidi naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakatamba pamberi paMŋari nesimba raʋo rose, nenziyo, nembira, nemiteŋgeraŋwa, neŋgoma, namakandira, nehwamanda.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika paɓuriro raKidoni, Usa akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake kuti aɓate areka, nokuti nzombe dzakaŋga dzogumburwa.
Kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira Uza, akamuʋuraya, nokuti wakatambanudza ruʋoko rwake kuti aɓate areka; akafira’po pamberi paMŋari.
Ipapo Davidi akaʋora mŋoyo nokuti Jehova wakaroʋa Uza; akatumidza nɀimbo iyo zita rinonzi Perezi‐uza kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Davidi akatya Mŋari nomusi uyo, akati: Ndiŋgaisa areka yaMŋari kumusha kwaŋgu seiko?
Naiɀoɀo Davidi haana‐kuisa areka yaMŋari kumusha kwaDavidi, asi wakaitsausira kumba kwaObedi‐edomi muGiti.
Areka yaMŋari ikagara pamhuri yaObedi‐edomi mumba make mŋedzi mitatu; Jehova akaropafadza imba yaObedi‐edomi neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo.
Ɀino Hirami mambo weTiro wakatuma nhume kunaDavidi, namatanda emisidari, naʋaʋaki, naʋaʋezi, kuti ʋamuʋakire imba.
Davidi akaʋona kuti Jehova wakamusimbisa kuti aʋe mambo waIsraeri; nokuti ʋushe bgake bgakaŋga bgakudzwa kwaɀo nokuɗa kwaʋanhu ʋake Israeri.
Davidi akaɀitorera ɀe ʋamŋe ʋakadzi paJerusarema, Davidi akaɓereka ʋamŋe ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Ɀino ndiwo mazita aʋana ʋaakaŋga anaʋo paJerusarema: Shamua, naShobabi, naNatani, naSoromoni;
naIbhari, naErishua, naErpereti;
naNoga, naNefegi, naJafia;
naErishama, naBeriada, naErifereti.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti Davidi wazodzwa kuti aʋe mambo waʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋaFiristia ʋose ʋakakwira kundotȿaka Davidi; Davidi akaɀinzwa, akaɓuɗa kuzorwa naʋo.
Ɀino ʋaFiristia ʋakaŋga ʋaȿika, ʋakapararira pamupata weRefaimi.
Davidi akabvunza Jehova, akati: Ndokwira kundorwa naʋaFiristia here? Mucaʋaisa mumaʋoko aŋgu here? Jehova akati kunaDavidi: Kwira, nokuti ndicaʋaisa mumaʋoko ako.
Ʋakaȿika paBaari‐perazimi, Davidi akaʋaparadza’po; Davidi akati: Mŋari wakapxanya ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu noruʋoko rwaŋgu, sokupxanya kwemvura. Naiɀoɀo ʋakatumidza nɀimbo iyo Baari‐perazimi.
Ʋakasiya ʋamŋari ʋaʋo’po, Davidi akaraira, ʋakaʋapisa nomŋoto.
ƲaFiristia ʋakapararira ɀe pamupata uyo.
Ipapo Davidi akabvunza Mŋari ɀe; Mŋari akati kwaari: Usandoʋateʋera; tsauka ubve kwaʋari, ugoʋaʋamba pakatarisana nemiti yemibarsami.
Ɀino kana ucinzwa kutinhira kwokufamba pamisoro yemiti yemibarsami, ipapo unofanira kundorwa; nokuti Mŋari wakutuŋgamirira kundoparadza hondo yaʋaFiristia.
Davidi akaita seɀaakarairwa naMŋari; ʋakaparadza hondo yaʋaFiristia kubva paGibeoni kuȿikira paGezeri.
Mbiri yaDavidi ikaɓuɗira kunyika dzose; Jehova akavundusa marudzi ose pamsoro pake.
Ɀino Davidi akati: Hakunomunhu unofanira kutakura areka yaMŋari asi ʋaRevi; nokuti ndiʋo ʋakatsaurwa naJehova kutakura areka yaMŋari, nokumushumira nokusiŋgaperi.
Davidi akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose paJerusarema kuti ʋaise areka yaJehova kunɀimbo yayo, yaakaŋga aigadzirira.
Davidi akaʋuŋganidza ʋanakomana ʋaAroni naʋaRevi;
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Urieri mukuru, nehama dzake dzinezana namakumi maʋiri;
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Asaya mukuru, nehama dzake dzinamazana maʋiri namakumi maʋiri;
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaGershomi: Joeri mukuru, nehama dzake dzinezana namakumi matatu.
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaErizafani: Shemaya mukuru, nehama dzake dzinamazana maʋiri;
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaHebroni: Erieri mukuru, nehama dzake dzinamakumi masere;
pakati paʋanakomana ʋaUzieri: Aminadabi mukuru, nehama dzake dzinezana negumi naʋaʋiri.
Davidi akaɗana Zadoki naAbiyatari ʋaprista, naʋaRevi
Akati kwaʋari: Ndimi ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaRevi; ciɀinatsai imi nehama dzenyu, kuti mukwire neareka yaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, kunɀimbo yandakaigadzirira.
Nokuti nemhaka yokuti hamuna
Naiɀoɀo ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakaɀinatsa, kuti ʋakwire neareka yaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Ʋana ʋaRevi ʋakatakura areka yaMŋari pamafudzi aʋo namatanda akaŋga ari’po, seɀa
Davidi akataura naʋakuru ʋaʋaRevi kuti ʋagadze hama dzaʋo ʋaʋe ʋaimbi ʋaneɀokuridza naɀo, ɀaiti miteŋgeraŋwa, nembira, namakandira, ʋaɀiridze nesimba nokuimbisa nomufaro.
Ipapo ʋaRevi ʋakagadza Hemani mŋanakomana waJoeri; napakati pehama dzake, Asafi mŋanakomana waBerekia; napakati paʋanakomana ʋaMerari, hama dzaʋo, Etani mŋanakomana waKushaya;

ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo hama dzaʋo dzeɓoka recipiri, Zekaria, naBeni, naJaazieri, naShemiramoti, naJehieri, naUni, naEriabi, naBenaya, naMaaseya, naMatitiya, naEriferehu, naMikneya, naObedi‐edomi, naJeieri, ʋatariri ʋemikoʋa.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋaimbi ʋaiti Hemani, naAsafi, naEtani,
naZekaria, naAzieri, naShemiramoti, naJehieri, naUni, naEriabi, naMaaseya, naBenaya, ʋanemiteŋgeraŋwa inamanzwi matete;
naMatitiya, naEriferehu, naMikneya, naObedi‐edomi, naJeieri, naAzaziya, ʋanembira dzinamanzwi makobvu kutuŋgamirira
Kenaniya mukuru waʋaRevi, ndiye waiimbisa ʋanhu; ndiye waidzidzisa
Berekia naErkana ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatariri ʋemikoʋa yeareka.
Shebanaya, naJoshafati, naNetaneri, naAmasai, naZekaria, naBenaya, naEriezeri, ʋaprista, ndiʋo ʋairidza hwamanda pamberi peareka yaMŋari; Obedi‐edomi naJehiya ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatariri ʋemikoʋa yeAreka.
Ɀino Davidi naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, naʋakuru ʋecuru camazana, ʋakandobvisa areka yesuŋgano yaJehova mumba maObedi‐edomi nomufaro.
Ɀino Mŋari wakati aciɓatsira ʋaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋacitakura areka yesuŋgano yaJehova, ʋakaɓayira
Davidi wakaŋga akafuka ŋguʋo yomuceka wakanaka, naʋaRevi ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacitakura areka, naʋaimbi, naKenaniya, mudzidzisi wokuimba, pamŋe cete naʋaimbi; ʋuye Davidi wakaŋga akafuka efodi yomuceka.
Saiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakakwira neareka yesuŋgano yaJehova ʋacipururudza, nokuridza mimanzi, nehwamanda, namakandira, ʋaciridza ɀikuru miteŋgeraŋwa nembira.
Ɀino areka yesuŋgano yaJehova yakati iciȿika muguta raDavidi, Mikaeri mukunda waSauro, akatarira napawindi, akaʋona mambo Davidi acipembera nokutamba; akamushoʋora mumŋoyo make.
Ʋakapinza areka yaMŋari, ʋakaiisa pakati petente rayakaŋga yadzikirwa naDavidi; ʋakaɓayira pamberi paMŋari ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa.
Ɀino Davidi wakati apedza kuɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, akaropafadza ʋanhu nezita raJehova.
Akapa mumŋe nomumŋe waʋaIsraeri, murume nomukadzi, mumŋe nomumŋe ɓundu reciŋgwa, nenhindi
Akagadza ʋamŋe ʋaRevi, kuti ʋashumire pamberi peareka yaJehova, nokurumbidza, nokuʋoŋga, nokukudza Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri;
mukuru waiʋa Asafi, teʋere Zekaria, naJeieri, naShemiramoti, naJehieri, naMatitiya, naEriabi, naBenaya, naObedi‐edomi, naJeieri, ʋanemiteŋgeraŋwa nembira; Asafi wairidza kwaɀo makandira.
Benaya naJahazieri ndiʋo
Ɀino nezuʋa iro Davidi wakataŋga kuraira kuti ʋaʋoŋge Jehova nomuromo waAsafi nehama dzake:
Ʋoŋgai Jehova, muɗane zita rake;
Ziʋisai ɀaakaita pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu.
Muimbirei, mumuimbire nziyo dzokukudza;
Rondedzerai maɓasa ake ose anoshamisa.
Ɀirumbidzei muzita rake dɀene;
Mŋoyo yaʋanotȿaka Jehova ŋgaifare kwaɀo.
Tȿakai Jehova nesimba rake;
Tȿakai ciso cake ŋguʋa dzose.
Raŋgarirai maɓasa ake anoshamisa,
aakaita;
Ɀishamiso ɀake, neɀaakatoŋga nomuromo wake.
Imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, muranda wake,
Imi ʋana ʋaJakobo ʋasanaŋgurwa ʋake.
Ndiye Jehova Mŋari weɗu:
Ɀaakatoŋga ɀiri pasi pose.
Raŋgarirai suŋgano yake nokusiŋgaperi,
Iro shoko raakaraira kumarudzi anecuru;
Nemhiko yake kunaIsaka;
Akaɀisimbisira Jakobo, kuti uʋe mutemo,
KunaIsraeri kuti iʋe suŋgano isiŋgaperi;
Aciti: Ndicakupa iwe nyika yeKanani,
Uʋe mugoʋe wenhaka yenyu;
Paŋguʋa imi muciri ʋarume ʋashoma pakuʋereŋgwa,
Ɀirokwaɀo ʋashoma kwaɀo, naʋatorwa mairi.
Ʋakafamba‐famba ʋacibva kunorumŋe rudzi ʋacienda kunorumŋe,
Nokubva kunoʋumŋe ʋushe ʋacienda kunaʋamŋe ʋanhu.
Haana‐kutendera munhu kuʋaitira ɀakaipa;
Ɀirokwaɀo wakatuka madzimambo nokuɗa kwaʋo;
Aciti: Musagunɀa ʋazodzwa ʋaŋgu,
Naʋaprofita ʋaŋgu musaʋaitira cakaipa.
Imbirai Jehova, pasi pose;
Paridzirai kuponesa kwake zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe,
Ƌudzirai kubginya kwake pakati paʋahedeni,
Namaɓasa ake anoshamisa pakati pendudzi dzose.
Nokuti Jehova mukuru, unofanira kurumbidzwa kwaɀo;
Iye unofanira kutyiwa kupfuʋura ʋamŋari ʋose.
Nokuti ʋamŋari ʋose ʋendudzi ɀifananidzo
Asi Jehova ndiye wakaita kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga.
Kukudzwa noʋumambo ɀiri pamberi pake;
Simba nomufaro ɀiri panɀimbo yake;
Ipai Jehova, imi ndudzi dzaʋanhu,
Ipai Jehova kukudzwa nesimba.
Ipai Jehova kukudzwa kunofanira zita rake;
Ʋuyai necipiriso, ʋuyai pamberi pake;
Namatai kunaJehova muneŋguʋo tȿene.
Ƌeɗera pamberi pake, nyika yose;
Nyika ʋo yakasimbiswa kuti irege kuzunuŋguswa.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ŋgakufare, napasi ŋgapafarisise;
Pakati pendudzi ŋgaʋati: Jehova unoɓata ʋushe.
Guŋgwa ŋgaritinhire, nokuzara kwaro;
Saŋgo ŋgarifarisise kwaɀo, neɀose ɀiri mariri;
Ŋguʋa iyo miti yeɗondo icaimba nomufaro pamberi paJehova;
Nokuti unoʋuya kuzotoŋga pasi.
Ʋoŋgai Jehova; nokuti wakanaka;
Nokuti nyasha dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Muti: Tiponesei, Mŋari woruponeso rweɗu,
Mutiʋuŋganidze pamŋe cete, mutirwire pandudzi,
Kuti tiʋoŋge zita renyu dɀene,
Tifarisise pakukurumbidzai.
Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakudzwe,
Kubva pakusiŋgaperi kuȿikira pakusiŋgaperi.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati: Ameni, ʋakarumbidza Jehova.
Ɀino akasiya’po pamberi peareka yesuŋgano yaJehova Asafi nehama dzake, kuti ʋashumire pamberi peareka ŋguʋa dzose, seɀakafanira zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe;
naObedi‐edomi nehama dzaʋo, makumi matanhatu naʋasere; naObedi‐edomi ʋo mŋanakomana waJedutuni, naHosa, kuti ʋaʋe ʋatariri ʋemikoʋa;
nomuprista Zadoki, nehama dzake ʋaprista, pamberi petabernakeri yaJehova paɗunhu rakakwirira rakaŋga riri paGibeoni;
kuti ʋaɓayire Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, ŋguʋa dzose, maŋgwanani namaɗeko, paartari yeɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, seɀakanyorwa ɀose mumurairo waJehova, waakaraira Israeri;
ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo Hemani naJedutuni naʋamŋe ʋakatsaurwa, ʋakaŋga ʋarebga mazita aʋo, kuti ʋaʋoŋge Jehova; nokuti nyasha dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi;
ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo Hemani naJedutuni ʋanehwamanda namakandira, ɀaifanira kuridzwa naʋaridzi, ʋuye ɀokuridzira nziyo dzaMŋari; ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋaJedutuni kuti ʋatarire suʋo.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaenda mumŋe nomumŋe kumba kwake; Davidi akadzoka kuzoropafadza imba yake.
Ɀino Davidi wakati agere mumba make, Davidi akati kumuprofita Natani: Tarira, ini ndigere muimba yomusidari, asi areka yesuŋgano yaJehova
Natani akati kunaDavidi: Itai henyu ɀose ɀiri mumŋoyo menyu, nokuti Mŋari unemi.
Ɀino noʋusiku ubgo shoko raMŋari rakaȿika kunaNatani, riciti:
Enda undoʋudza Davidi muranda waŋgu, uti: Iwe hauŋgandiʋakiri imba mandiŋgagara;
nokuti handina‐kugara mumba kubva pazuʋa randakandotora ʋaIsraeri, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi; asi ndakabva patente rimŋe ndicienda kunerimŋe, napatabernakeri imŋe
Pose pandakafamba naʋaIsraeri ʋose, ndakatoŋgotaura here shoko rimŋe kunomumŋe waʋatoŋgi ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋandakaraira kufudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndiciti: Makaregereiko kundiʋakira imba yomusidari?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, unofanira kuti kumuranda waŋgu Davidi: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndakakutora kumafuro, kwawakaŋga ucifudza makwai, kuti uʋe muɓati waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri;
ndikaʋa newe pose pawakafamba, ndikaparadza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose pamberi pako; ndicakuitira zita riŋgafanana namazita aʋakuru ʋari panyika.
Ndicagadzirira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri nɀimbo, ndicaʋasima, ʋagare panɀimbo yaʋo, ʋarege kubviswa ɀe; naʋakaipa haʋaŋgaʋaparadzi ɀe sapakutaŋga,
nokubva pazuʋa randakaraira ʋatoŋgi kuti ʋaɓate ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri; ʋuye ndicakunda ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose. Ʋuye ndinokuʋudza kuti Jehova ucakumisira imba.
Ɀino kana ŋguʋa yako yaȿika, yaunofanira kuenda nayo kunamadziɓaɓa ako, ndicamutsa
Iye ucandiʋakira imba, neni ndicasimbisa cigaro cake coʋushe nokusiŋgaperi.
Ini ndicaʋa ɓaɓa ʋake, naiye ucaʋa mŋanakomana waŋgu; handiŋgabvisi nyasha dzaŋgu kwaari, seɀandakadzibvisa kunaiye wakakutaŋgira;
asi ndicamugarisa mumba maŋgu nomuʋushe bgaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi; cigaro cake coʋushe cicasimbiswa nokusiŋgaperi.
Natani akaʋudza Davidi mashoko awa ose, neɀose ɀaakaratidzwa.
Ipapo mambo Davidi akapinda, akagara pamberi paJehova, akati: Jehova Mŋari, ndini aniko, neimba yaŋgu cinyiko, ɀamakandiȿitsa kuȿikira pano?
Asi cinhu ici cakaŋga ciri ciɗuku pamberi penyu, Mŋari, asi makataura pamsoro peimba yomuranda wenyu kuȿikira paŋguʋa huru inozoʋuya, mukandiitira seɀinoitirwa munhu unokudzwa kwaɀo, Jehova Mŋari.
Davidi uŋgareʋeiko ɀe kwamuri pamsoro pokukudzwa kwomuranda wenyu? Nokuti munoziʋa muranda wenyu.
Jehova, makaita iɀi ɀikuru ɀose nokuɗa kwomuranda wenyu, ʋuye nokuɗa kwomŋoyo wenyu, kuti muziʋise ɀinhu
Jehova, hakunomumŋe wakafanana nemi, hakunomumŋe Mŋari asi imi moga, seɀatakanzwa ɀose nenzeʋe dzeɗu.

Rumŋe rudzi ruripiko panyika rwakafanana naʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, ʋakandodzikinurwa naMŋari, ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋake, kuti imi mukurumbire neɀinhu ɀikuru neɀinotyisa, ɀamakadziŋga ndudzi pamberi paʋanhu ʋenyu, ʋamakadzikinura paEgipita?
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri makaʋaita ʋanhu ʋenyu paruzima nokusiŋgaperi; imi Jehova mukaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Ɀino Jehova, shoko ramakataura pamsoro pomuranda wenyu napamsoro peimba yake ŋgarisimbiswe nokusiŋgaperi, muite seɀamakataura.
Ʋuye zita renyu ŋgarisimbiswe nokukudzwa nokusiŋgaperi, ɀicinzi: Jehova wehondo ndiye Mŋari waIsraeri, ndiye Mŋari kunaIsraeri; imba yaDavidi muranda wenyu icamiswa pamberi penyu.
Nokuti imi, Mŋari waŋgu, makaziʋisa muranda wenyu kuti mucamumisira imba; saka muranda wenyu wakatsuŋga kunyeŋgetera pamberi penyu.
Ɀino Jehova, ndimi Mŋari, makapikira muranda wenyu cinhu ici;
ɀino makafara naɀo kuropafadza imba yomuranda wenyu, kuti irambe iri’po pamberi penyu nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti imi Jehova makairopafadza, ɀino icaropafadzwa nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo Davidi akarwa naʋaFiristia akaʋakunda; akatorera ʋaFiristia Gati nemisha yaro.
Akakunda Moabi ʋo, ʋaMoabi ʋakaitwa ʋaranda ʋaDavidi, ʋakamuʋigira ɀipo.
Davidi akakunda ʋo Hadarezeri mambo weZoba, kuȿikira paHamati, pakuenda kwake kundosimbisa ʋumambo bgake parwizi Yufratesi.

Davidi akamutorera ŋgoro dzinecuru cimŋe naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋaneɀuru ɀinomŋe, naʋaifamba namakumbo ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri; Davidi akagura marunda amakumbo amabiza ose aikweʋa ŋgoro, asi wakaceŋgetera ŋgoro dzinezana mamŋe awo.
Ɀino ʋaSiria ʋeDamasko ʋakati ʋaciʋuya kuzoɓatsira Hadarezeri mambo weZoba, Davidi akaʋuraya ʋaSiria ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri.
Davidi akaisa
Davidi akatora nhoʋo dzendarama dzakaŋga dzakashoŋgwa naʋaranda ʋaHadarezeri, akadziisa Jerusarema.
NapaTibhati napaKuni, maguta aHadarezeri, Davidi wakatora ndarira zhinji kwaɀo, Soromoni yaakazoita nayo dziʋa rendarira, nembiru, nemidziyo yendarira.
Ɀino Tou mambo weHamati wakati acinzwa kuti Davidi wakaparadza hondo yose yaHadarezeri mambo weZoba,
akatuma Hadorami mŋanakomana wake kunamambo Davidi, kundomukwazisa, nokumukorokotedza pamsoro pokurwa kwake naHadarezeri nokumukunda; nokuti Hadarezeri wairwa naTou;
Neyiyi ʋo mambo Davidi akaitsaurira Jehova, pamŋe cete nesirveri nendarama yaakaŋga atora kundudzi dzose; kunaʋaEdomi, naʋaMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋaFiristia, naʋaAmareki.
Ʋuye Abishai mŋanakomana waZeruya, wakaʋuraya ʋaEdomi paMupata woMunyu ʋaiʋa ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀisere.
Akaisa mapoka aʋarwi paEdomi; ʋaEdomi ʋose ʋakaʋa ʋaranda ʋaDavidi. Jehova akakundisa Davidi pose paakaenda.
Davidi akaɓata ʋaIsraeri ʋose; akatoŋgera ʋanhu ʋake ʋose akaʋaitira ɀakarurama.
Joabi mŋanakomana waZeruya ndiye wairaira hondo, naJehoshafati mŋanakomana waAhirudi waiʋa sahwira,
Zadoki mŋanakomana waAhitubi, naAhimereki mŋanakomana waAbiyatari, ʋaiʋa ʋaprista, naShavsha waiʋa munyori;
ʋuye Benaya mŋanakomana waJehoyada ndiye wairaira ʋaKereti naʋaPereti; ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋaDavidi ʋaiʋa ʋakuru kuteʋera mambo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni wakafa, mŋanakomana wake akaɓata ʋushe panɀimbo yake.

Ɀino Davidi akati: Ndicaitira Hanuni mŋanakomana waNahashi ɀakanaka, seɀandakaitirwa ɀakanaka naɓaɓa ʋake. Naiɀoɀo Davidi akatuma nhume kumuɓata ruʋoko pamsoro paɓaɓa ʋake. Ʋaranda ʋaDavidi ʋakaȿika panyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni kunaHanuni, kuzomuɓata ruʋoko.

Asi macinda aʋana ʋaAmoni akati kunaHanuni ishe waʋo: Munofuŋga kuti Davidi unoɗo‐kukudza ɓaɓa ʋenyu, ɀaatuma ʋaɓati ʋoruʋoko kwamuri here? Ʋaranda ʋake haʋana‐kuʋuya kwamuri kunɀera, nokuputsa, nokushora nyika here?
Naiɀoɀo Hanuni akaɓata ʋaranda ʋaDavidi, akaʋeʋura

Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakandoʋudza Davidi ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa ʋarume. Akatuma ʋanhu kusoŋgana naʋo, nokuti ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋacinyara kwaɀo. Mambo akati: Garai henyu Jeriko kuȿikira ndebvu dzenyu dzamera ɀe, mugodzoka henyu.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋaɀiʋeŋgesa naDavidi, Hanuni naʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakatuma matarenta esirveri anecuru cimŋe

Naiɀoɀo ʋakaripira ŋgoro dzine‐ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀiʋiri, namambo weMaaka naʋanhu ʋake; iʋo ʋakaȿika ʋakadzika matente aʋo pamberi peMedeba. Ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋacibva kumaguta aʋo, ʋakaʋuya kuzorwa.
Ɀino Davidi wakati aciɀinzwa, akatuma Joabi nehondo yose yaʋarume ʋanesimba.
Ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakagadzira hondo paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo; asi madzimambo, akaŋga aʋuya, aiʋa pacawo oga pasaŋgo.
Ɀino Joabi wakati aciʋona kuti woʋaʋarirwa mberi neshure, akatsaura ʋamŋe kunaʋakatsaurwa ʋose ʋaIsraeri, akaʋagadzira kuti ʋarwe naʋaSiria.
Ʋamŋe ʋanhu, ʋakasara, akaʋaisa kunaAbishai, munuŋuna wake, ʋakaɀigadzira kuti ʋarwe naʋana ʋaAmoni.
Akati: Kana ʋaSiria ʋakandikurira ini, iwe unofanira kundiɓatsira; asi kana ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakakukurira iwe, ini ndicaʋuya kukuɓatsira.
Tsuŋga mŋoyo, tirwire ʋanhu ʋeɗu namaguta aMŋari weɗu saʋarume; naJehova ŋgaaite seɀaanoɗa.
Naiɀoɀo Joabi naʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo ʋakasweɗera kuzorwa naʋaSiria, iʋo ʋakatiza pamberi pake.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋaSiria ʋatiza, naiʋo ʋakatiza ʋo saiɀoɀo pamberi paAbishai, ʋakapinda muguta. Ipapo Joabi akaenda Jerusarema.
Ɀino ʋaSiria ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋakundwa naʋaIsraeri, ʋakatuma nhume, ʋakaɗana ʋaSiria ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kwoRwizi, ʋakatuŋgamirirwa naShofaki mukuru wehondo yaHadarezeri.
Davidi akaʋudzwa iɀoɀo; akaʋuŋganidza ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakayambuka Joridani, ʋakaȿika kwaʋari, akaɀigadzira kuzorwa naʋo. Ɀino Davidi wakati aɀigadzira kuzorwa naʋaSiria, iʋo ʋakarwa naye.
ƲaSiria ʋakatiza pamberi paʋaIsraeri; Davidi akaʋuraya pakati paʋaSiria
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋaHadarezeri ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti ʋakundwa naIsraeri, ʋakayanana naDavidi, ʋakamushumira; ʋaSiria ʋakazoramba kuɓatsira ʋana ʋaAmoni.

Ɀino gore rakati rapera, paŋguʋa yokurwa kwamadzimambo, Joabi akaenda nehondo inesimba, akaparadza nyika yaʋana ʋaAmoni, akandokomba Raba. Asi Davidi wakasara Jerusarema. Joabi akakunda Raba, akariputsa.
Davidi akabvisa korona yamambo waʋo pamusoro wake, akawana kuti inoȿika tarenta rimŋe rendarama
Akaɓuɗisa ʋo ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋarimo, akaʋaceka namajeko, nembambo dzamatare, ʋuye namasanhu. Davidi akaita saiɀoɀo namaguta ose aʋana ʋaAmoni. Davidi naʋanhu ʋose ʋakadzokera Jerusarema.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo kurwa kukazomuka paGezeri naʋaFiristia; Sibekai muHushati, akaʋuraya Sipai, mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaRafa.
Ʋakarwa ɀe naʋaFiristia; Erhanani mŋanakomana waJairi akaʋuraya Rami munuŋuna waGoriati muGiti, rwiriko rwepfumo rake rwakaŋga rwakafanana neɗanda romuruki.
Ʋakarwa ɀe paGati, pakaŋga panomunhu murefu kwaɀo, wakaŋga aneminwe neɀigunwe
Ɀino wakati acishoʋora ʋaIsraeri, Jonatani mŋanakomana waShimea, munuŋuna waDavidi akamuʋuraya.
Ndiʋo ʋakaɓerekerwa Rafa paGati; ʋakaʋurawa naDavidi, ʋuye naʋaranda ʋake.
Ɀino Satani wakamukira ʋaIsraeri, akakurudzira Davidi kuti aʋereŋge ʋaIsraeri.
Davidi akati kunaJoabi nokumacinda aʋanhu: Endai mundoʋereŋga ʋaIsraeri kubva paBeeri‐sheba kuȿikira paDani; mudzoke neshoko, ndiziʋe kuwanda kwaʋo.

Joabi akati: Jehova ŋgaawedzere ʋanhu ʋake runezana pakuwanda kwaʋo ɀino; asi ishe waŋgu mambo, ʋose haʋazi ʋaranda ʋashe waŋgu here? Ishe waŋgu unotȿakireiko cinhu ici? Ucapinzireiko ʋaIsraeri pamhoȿa?
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro shoko ramambo rakakurira Joabi. Ɀino Joabi akaenda, akapota pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋose, akaȿika Jerusarema.

Joabi akarondedzera kuwanda kwaʋanhu kunaDavidi. ƲaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀineɀuru neɀuru ɀinezana ɀaʋanhu ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo; ʋuye ʋaJuda ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀamazana manna namakumi manomŋe ʋaigona kurwa nomunondo.
Asi haana‐kuʋereŋga ʋaRevi naʋaBenjamini pakati paʋo; nokuti shoko ramambo rakaŋga rakaipa kwaɀo kunaJoabi.
Ɀino Mŋari wakaŋga asiŋgafari necinhu ici; saka wakaroʋa Israeri.
Davidi akati kunaMŋari: Ndatadza kwaɀo ɀandaita cinhu ici; asi ɀino bvisai henyu kuipa kwomuranda wenyu; nokuti ndaita seɓenzi kwaɀo.
Jehova akataura naGadi, muʋoni waDavidi, akati:
Enda undotaura naDavidi, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndinokuisira ɀinhu ɀitatu, ciɀitsaurira cimŋe caɀo, ndikuitire ico.
Ɀino Gadi akaenda kunaDavidi, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Citsaura caunoɗa;

makore matatu enzara, kana kuparadzwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako mŋedzi mitatu, ucidziŋgwa nomunondo waʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, kana munondo waJehova mazuʋa matatu, ndiro ɗenda panyika, mutumŋa waJehova aciparadza panyika yose yaIsraeri. Ɀino cifuŋga hako, uraŋgarire mhinduro yandiŋgadzosera kunaiye wakandituma.
Ipapo Davidi akati kunaGadi: Ndiri pakumanikidzwa kukuru; ndiwire haŋgu ɀino muruʋoko rwaJehova, nokuti nyasha dzake ihuru, asi ndirege haŋgu kuwira muruʋoko rwomunhu.
Ipapo Jehova akatuma ɗenda pakati paIsraeri; ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe ʋakafa pakati paIsraeri.

Mŋari akatuma mutumŋa Jerusarema kuzoriparadza; ɀino wakati oɗa kuparadza, Jehova akatarira, akaɀiɗemba pamsoro pecinhu ico cakaipa, akati kumutumŋa wakaŋga aciparadza: Ndiɀo, cidzosa ruʋoko rwako. Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova wakaŋga amire paɓuriro raOrnani muJebusi.

Davidi akatarira, akaʋona mutumŋa waJehova amire pakati penyika nokuɗeŋga, akaɓata munondo wakavomorwa muruʋoko rwake, wakatambanudzwa pamsoro peJerusarema. Ipapo Davidi naʋakuru ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋakafuka magumbu.

Ɀino Davidi akati kunaMŋari: Ko handizi ini here ndakaraira kuti ʋanhu ʋaʋereŋgwe? Ndini ndakatadza haŋgu ndikaita ɀakaipa ɀikuru; asi makwai awa akaiteiko? Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, ruʋoko rwenyu ŋgarundiroʋe harwo ini neimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu; asi ŋgarurege kuroʋa ʋanhu ʋenyu, nokuʋatambudza.
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova wakaraira Gadi kuti aʋudze Davidi kuti Davidi akwire aʋakire Jehova artari paɓuriro raOrnani muJebusi.
Davidi akakwira nokureʋa kwaGadi kwaakataura nezita raJehova.
Ornani akaceuka, akaʋona mutumŋa; ʋanakomana ʋake ʋanna, ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakaʋanda. Ɀino Ornani wakaŋga acipura ɀiyo.
Davidi wakati aciȿika kunaOrnani, Ornani akatarira akaʋona Davidi, akaɓuɗa paɓuriro, akakotamira pasi neciso cake pamberi paDavidi.
Ipapo Davidi akati kunaOrnani: Ndipe nɀimbo yeɓuriro iri, kuti ndiʋakire’po artari kunaJehova; unofanira kundipa iro

Ipapo Ornani akati kunaDavidi: Ritorei henyu, ishe waŋgu, mambo aite seɀaanoɗa; tarirai, ndinokupai nzombe ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, nenhumbi dzokupura nadzo dziʋe huni, neɀiyo ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu; ndinoɀipa ɀose.
Mambo Davidi akati kunaOrnani: Kwete, asi ɀirokwaɀo ndicariteŋga nomuteŋgo wakafanira; nokuti handiŋgatori cinhu cako ndikapa Jehova, kana kuʋuya necipiriso cinopiswa cisinomuteŋgo.
Naiɀoɀo Davidi akapa Ornani mashekeri anamazana matanhatu endarama
Davidi akaʋakira Jehova artari ipapo, akaɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, akashumira Jehova; iye akamupindura nomŋoto wakabva kuɗeŋga
Jehova akaraira mutumŋa, iye akadzosera ɀe munondo wake mumuhara wawo.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Davidi wakati aʋona kuti Jehova wamupindura paɓuriro raOrnani muJebusi, akaɓayira’po.
Nokuti paŋguʋa iyo tabernakeri yaJehova, yakaŋga yaʋakwa naMosesi murenje, neartari yokupisira ɀipiriso, ɀakaŋga ɀiri paɗunhu rakakwirira paGibeoni.
Asi Davidi wakaŋga asiŋgagoni kuenda’ko kuzobvunza Mŋari pamberi payo; nokuti wakaŋga acitya nemhaka yomunondo womutumŋa waJehova.
Davidi akati: Iyi ndiyo imba yaJehova Mŋari, neyiyi ndiyo artari yokupisira ɀipiriso ɀaIsraeri.
Ɀino Davidi wakaraira kuti ʋatorwa ʋakaŋga ʋari panyika yaIsraeri ʋaʋuŋganidzwe; akagadza ʋaʋezi ʋamabge, kuti ʋaʋeze mabge okuʋaka nawo imba yaMŋari.
Davidi akagadzira ʋo matare mazhinji okupfura nawo mbambo dzamagonhi amasuʋo neɀikorekedzo; ʋuye ndarira zhinji isina‐kuidzwa kurema kwayo.
Namatanda emisidari asina‐kuʋereŋgwa; nokuti ʋaZidoni naʋeTire ʋakaʋuya nemisidari yakawanda kunaDavidi.

Davidi akati: Soromoni mŋanakomana waŋgu uciri muɗuku usinesimba, ʋuye imba, inofanira kuʋakirwa Jehova, inofanira kuʋa huru kwaɀo, iŋgarumbidzwa nokukudzwa panyika dzose; saka ini ndicaigadzirira. Naiɀoɀo Davidi akagadzira ɀizhinji asati afa.
Ipapo akaɗana Soromoni mŋanakomana wake, akamuraira kuti aʋakire Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri imba.
Davidi akati kunaSoromoni mŋanakomana wake: Kana ndirini, ndakaŋga ndiciti mumŋoyo maŋgu ndicaʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waŋgu imba.
Asi shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti: Iwe wakateʋura ropa rakawanda, ʋuye wakarwa ɀizhinji; iwe hauŋgaʋakiri zita raŋgu imba, nokuti wakateʋura ropa rakawanda panyika pamberi paŋgu;
asi tarira, ucaɓerekerwa mŋanakomana, ucaʋa munhu wezororo; ndicamuzorodza paʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋose ʋanomupoteredza; nokuti zita rake ricanzi Soromoni, ndicapa Israeri rugare nokunyarara pamazuʋa ake;
iye ucaʋakira zita raŋgu imba; iye ucaʋa mŋanakomana waŋgu, neni ndicaʋa ɓaɓa ʋake; ini ndicasimbisa cigaro cake coʋushe pakati paIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino, mŋana waŋgu, Jehova ŋgaaʋe newe; ufambiswe ɀakanaka iwe, uʋake imba yaJehova Mŋari wako, seɀaakataura pamsoro pako.
Asi Jehova ŋgaakupe kuŋgwara nokucenjera, akuraire pamsoro paIsraeri; kuti saiɀoɀo uceŋgete murairo waJehova Mŋari wako.
Nokuɗaro ucafambiswa ɀakanaka, kana ucicenjera kuita mitemo neɀakatoŋgwa, ɀakarairwa Mosesi naJehova pamsoro paIsraeri; simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo, usatya kana kuvunduswa.
Ɀino tarira, ndakatambura ndicigadzirira imba yaJehova matarenta aneɀuru ɀinezana ɀendarama, namatarenta anecuru ceɀuru esirveri; nendarira namatare ɀisinakuidzwa, nokuti ɀakawanda kwaɀo
Ʋuye ʋaɓati unaʋo ʋazhinji, ʋaputsi naʋaʋezi ʋamabge namatanda, naʋarume ʋose ʋakaŋgwara pamaɓasa ose;
ndarama, nesirveri, nendarira, namatare haɀiŋgaʋereŋgwi; simuka, uɓate, Jehova aʋe newe.
Davidi akaraira ʋo macinda ose aIsraeri kuti ʋaɓatsire Soromoni mŋanakomana wake,
Ko Jehova Mŋari wenyu haazi nemi here? Haana‐kukuzorodzai kumatiʋi ose here? Nokuti wakaisa ʋanhu ʋagere panyika iyi muruʋoko rwaŋgu; ɀino nyika yakundwa pamberi paJehova napamberi paʋanhu ʋake.

Ɀino shiŋgairai nemŋoyo yenyu ʋuye nemŋeya yenyu kutȿaka Jehova Mŋari wenyu; naiɀoɀo simukai muʋake imba tȿene yaJehova Mŋari, kuti mugoisa areka yesuŋgano yaJehova nenhumbi tȿene dzaMŋari muimba inofanira kuʋakirwa zita raJehova.
Ɀino Davidi wakaŋga akwegura, aʋa namazuʋa mazhinji; akaita Soromoni mŋanakomana wake mambo waIsraeri.
Akaʋuŋganidza macinda ose aIsraeri pamne cete naʋaprista naʋaRevi.
ƲaRevi ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋanamakore makumi matatu naʋakapfuʋura ipapo; pakuwanda kwaʋo, ʋaciʋereŋgwa musoro womurume mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi matatu neɀisere.
Pakati paʋo ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna ʋaitarira maɓasa eimba yaJehova; ʋaneɀuru ɀitanhatu ʋaiʋa ʋatariri naʋatoŋgi;
ʋaneɀuru ɀinna ʋaiʋa ʋatariri ʋemikoʋa; ʋaneɀuru ɀinna ʋairumbidza Jehova neɀokuridza ɀandakaita (ndiɀo ɀakareʋa Davidi) kuti
Davidi akaʋakamura, akaita mapoka akaenzana naʋanakomana ʋaRevi, Gershoni, naKohati, naMerari.
ƲokwaGershoni: Radani naShimei.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRadani: Jehieri mukuru, naZetami, naJoeri, ʋose ʋatatu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShimei: Sheromoti, naHazieri, naHarani, ʋose ʋatatu. Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aRadani.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShimei: Jahati, naZina, naJeushi, naBeria. Aʋa ʋanna ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaShimei.
Jahati wakaŋga ari mukuru, wecipiri Ziza; asi Jeushi naBeria ʋakaŋga ʋasinaʋanakomana ʋazhinji; saka ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋaciita imba imŋe yamadziɓaɓa.
Ʋanakomana ʋaKohati: Amrami, naIshari, naHebroni, naUzieri, ʋose ʋanna.

Ʋanakomana ʋaAmrami: Aroni, naMosesi; Aroni ndiye wakatsaurwa, kuti anatse ɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene, iye naʋanakomana ʋake, nokusiŋgaperi; kuti ʋapise ɀinonhuwira pamberi paJehova, nokumushumira, nokuropafadza ʋanhu nezita rake nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi kana ari Mosesi munhu waMŋari, ʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaʋereŋgwa kurudzi rwaRevi.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMosesi: Gershomi naEriezeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaGershomi: Shebueri mukuru.
Ʋanakomana ʋaEriezeri: Rehabia mukuru. Eriezeri wakaŋga asinaʋamŋe ʋanakomana; asi ʋanakomana ʋaRehabia ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋazhinji‐zhinji.
Ʋanakomana ʋaIshari: Sheromiti mukuru.
Ʋanakomana ʋaHebroni: Jeria mukuru, Amaria wecipiri, Jahazieri wecitatu, Jekameami wecinna.
Ʋanakomana ʋaUzieri: Mika mukuru, naIshia wecipiri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Mari naMushi. Ʋanakomana ʋaMari: Ereazari naKishi.
Ereazari wakafa asinaʋanakomana, asi ʋanasikana ʋoga; hama dzaʋo, ʋanakomana ʋaKishi, dzikaʋawana.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMushi: Mari, naEderi, naJeremoti, ʋose ʋatatu.

Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, iʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa ʋakaʋereŋgwa pakati paʋo, ʋaciʋereŋgwa namazita aʋo musoro womumŋe nomumŋe, ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa paimba yaJehova, ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋakapfuʋura ipapo.
Nokuti Davidi wakati: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri wakazorodza ʋanhu ʋake; iye unogara Jerusarema nokusiŋgaperi;
ʋuye ʋaRevi haʋacazofaniri kutakura tabernakeri nenhumbi dzayo dzokuɓata maɓasa ayo.
Nokuti namashoko aDavidi okupedzisira ʋanakomana ʋaRevi ʋakaʋereŋgwa, ʋanamakore makumi maʋiri naʋakapfuʋura ipapo.
Nokuti ɓasa raʋo rakaŋga riri rokuɓatsira ʋanakomana ʋaAroni pakushumira paimba yaJehova, paʋazhe, napamakamuri, napakusuka ɀinhu ɀitȿene, riri ɓasa rokushumira paimba yaMŋari;
ɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, noʋupfu bgakatsetseka bgecipiriso coʋupfu, kana ceɀiŋgwa ɀitete ɀisinembiriso, kana ɀakaɓikwa mugaŋgo, kana ɀakakanyiwa namafuta, marudzi ose eɀiyero neɀitanda ɀokuyera naɀo;
nokumira maŋgwanani ose ʋaciʋoŋga nokurumbidza Jehova, ʋuye maɗekwana ʋo saiɀoɀo;
nokuɓayira Jehova ɀipiriso ɀose ɀinopiswa, pamasabata, napakugara kwomŋedzi, napamitambo yakatarwa paŋguʋa dzose dzakarairwa, mazuʋa ose pamberi paJehova.
Ʋuye kuti ʋaceŋgete tente rokusoŋgana, nokuceŋgeta nɀimbo tȿene, nokuceŋgeta ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, hama dzaʋo, paɓasa reimba yaJehova.
Ɀino mapoka aʋanakomana ʋaAroni
Asi Nadabi naAbihu ʋakafa ʋasinaʋana, ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋaciri ʋapenyu; saka Ereazari naItamari ʋakaɓate‐ɓasa roʋuprista.
Davidi, pamŋe cete naZadoki, mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaEreazari, naAhimereki, mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaItamari, ʋakaʋakamura seɀaʋakaŋga ʋagoʋerwa maɓasa aʋo.

Ʋakawana ʋakuru ʋazhinji pakati paʋanakomana ʋaEreazari kupfuʋura pakati paʋanakomana ʋaItamari; ʋakakamurwa kuɗai: Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaEreazari kwakaŋga kunaʋanegumi naʋatanhatu, ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa; napakati paʋanakomana ʋaItamari, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋasere.
Nokuɗaro ʋakakamurwa nemijenya, mumŋe pano mumŋe koko; nokuti kwakaŋga kunamacinda eimba tȿene, namacinda aMŋari pakati paʋanakomana ʋaEreazari, ʋuye pakati paʋanakomana ʋaItamari.

Shemaya mŋanakomana waNetaneri, munyori, wakaŋga ari waʋaRevi, akaʋanyora pamberi pamambo, namacinda, nomuprista Zadoki, naAhimereki mŋanakomana waAbiyatari, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaprista naʋaRevi; ʋacitsaura mhuri imŋe kunaEreazari, nemhuri imŋe kunaItamari.
Ɀino mujenya wokutaŋga wakaɓata Jehoyaribi, wecipiri Jedaya;
wecitatu Harimi, wecinna Seorimi,
weshanu Markiya, wetanhatu Miyamini;
wecinomŋe Hakozi, worusere Abija;
wepfumbamŋe Jeshua, wegumi Shekania;
wegumi nomumŋe Eriashibi, wegumi nemiʋiri Jakimi;
wegumi nemitatu Hupa, wegumi neminna Jeshebeabi;
wegumi nemishanu Birga, wegumi nemitanhatu Imeri;
wegumi neminomŋe Heziri, wegumi nemisere Hapizeri;
wegumi nemipfumbamŋe Petahia, wamakumi maʋiri Jehezekeri;
wamakumi maʋiri nomumŋe Jakini, wamakumi maʋiri nemiʋiri Gamuri;
wamakumi maʋiri nemitatu Deraya, wamakumi maʋiri neminna Maazia.
Ndiko kukamurwa kwaʋo pamaɓasa aʋo, kuti ʋapinde imba yaJehova paʋakaŋga ʋarairwa napo naAroni ɓaɓa ʋaʋo, seɀaakarairwa naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Kana ʋari ʋamŋe ʋanakomana ʋaRevi: Ʋaʋanakomana ʋaAmrami: Shubaeri; ʋaʋanakomana ʋaShubaeri: Jedeiya.
ƲaRehabia: Ʋaʋanakomana ʋaRehabia: Ishia mukuru.
ƲaʋaIzhari: Sheromoti; ʋaʋanakomana ʋaSheromoti: Jahati.
Ʋaʋanakomana
Ʋanakomana ʋaUzieri: Mika; ʋaʋanakomana ʋaMika: Shamiri.
Munuŋuna waMika: Ishia; ʋaʋanakomana ʋaIshia Zekaria.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari: Mari naMushi; ʋanakomana ʋaJazia: Beno.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMerari: ƲaJazia: Beno, naShohami, naZakuri, naIbri.
ƲaMari: Ereazari, wakaŋga asinaʋanakomana.
ƲaKishi: Ʋanakomana ʋaKishi: Jerameeri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaMushi: Mari, naEderi, naJerimoti. Ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo.

Naiʋo ʋakakanda ʋo mijenya sehama dzaʋo, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni pamberi pamambo Davidi, naZadoki, naAhimereki, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa dzaʋaprista naʋaRevi; dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa dzomukuru dzaiʋereŋgwa sedzomunuŋuna wake.
Davidi naʋakuru ʋehondo ʋakatsaurira ʋo ɓasa
Ʋaʋanakomana ʋaAsafi: Zakuri, naJosefa, naNetania, naAsharera, ʋanakomana ʋaAsafi; ʋairairwa naAsafi, waiprofita nomurairo wamambo.
ƲaJedutuni: Ʋanakomana ʋaJedutuni: Gedaria, naZeri, naJeshaya, naHashabia, naMatitia, ʋatanhatu; iʋo ʋairairwa naɓaɓa ʋaʋo Jedutuni nembira, waiprofita aciʋoŋga nokurumbidza Jehova.
ƲaHemani: Ʋanakomana ʋaHemani: Bukia, naMatania, naUzieri, naShebueri, naJerimoti, naHanania, naHanani, naEriata, naGidareti, naRomamti‐ezeri, naJoshbekasha, naMaroti, naHotiri, naMahazioti.
Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaHemani muʋoni wamambo pamashoko aMŋari; Mŋari akapa Hemani ʋanakomana ʋanegumi naʋanna, naʋakunda ʋatatu, kuzomusimbisa.
Aʋa ʋose ʋairairwa naɓaɓa ʋaʋo pakuimba kwaʋo paimba yaJehova namakandira, nemiteŋgeraŋwa, nembira, paɓasa reimba yaMŋari; Asafi, naJedutuni, naHemani ʋairairwa namambo.
Aʋa ʋose, pamŋe cete nehama dzaʋo dzakaŋga dzadzidziswa kuimbira Jehova, iʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kwaɀo, ʋakaȿika mazana maʋiri namakumi masere naʋasere.
Ʋakakanda mijenya kuzoratidzwa maɓasa aʋo, kusina‐unoɗarikwa, ʋaɗuku pamŋe cete naʋakuru, naʋadzidzisi pamŋe cete naʋadzidzi.
Mujenya wokutaŋga waAsafi ukaɓata Josefa; wecipiri Gedaria; iye naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋari gumi naʋaʋiri;
wecitatu Zakuri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wecinna Izri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
weshanu Netania, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wetanhatu Bukia, naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wecinomŋe Jesharera, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
worusere Jeshaya, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wepfumbamŋe Matania, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi Shimei, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi nomumŋe Azareri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋaʋiri Hashabia, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋatatu Shubaeri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋanna Matitia, naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋashanu Jeremoti, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋatanhatu Hanania, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋanomŋe Joshbekasha, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋasere Hanani, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wegumi naʋapfumbamŋe Maroti, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wamakumi maʋiri Eriati, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wamakumi maʋiri nomumŋe Hotiri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wamakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri Gidareti, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wamakumi maʋiri naʋatatu Mahazioti, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri;
wamakumi maʋiri naʋanna Romamti‐ezeri, naʋanakomana ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake, gumi naʋaʋiri.
Mapoka aʋatariri ʋemikoʋa
Mesheremia wakaŋga anaʋanakomana aʋa: Zekaria weɗaŋgwe, wecipiri Jediaeri, wecitatu Zebadia, wecinna Jatnieri;
wecishanu Erami, wecitanhatu Johanani, wecinomŋe Erihonai.
NaObedi‐edomi wakaŋga anaʋanakomana aʋa: Shemaya weɗaŋgwe, wecipiri Jehozabadi, wecitatu Joa, wecinna Sakari, weshanu Netaneri;
wetanhatu Amieri, wecinomŋe Isakari, worusere Peuretai; nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga amuropafadza.
NaShemaya mŋanakomana wake, wakaɓerekerwa ʋo ʋanakomana ʋakaɓata imba yaɓaɓa ʋaʋo; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare.
Ʋanakomana ʋaShemaya ʋakaŋga ʋari: Otni, naRefaeri, naObedi, naErzabadi; ʋanuŋuna ʋake Erihu naSemakia, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋoʋumhare.
Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaObedi‐edomi; iʋo naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋanuŋuna ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋanesimba ʋaigona kuɓate‐ɓasa; ʋakaŋga ʋanamakumi matanhatu naʋaʋiri ʋaObedi‐edomi.
Mesheremia wakaŋga anaʋanakomana naʋanuŋuna, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare, ʋanegumi naʋasere.
NaHosa ʋo, mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaMerari, wakaŋga anaʋanakomana; mukuru wakaŋga ari Shimri, (nokuti kunyaŋge wakaŋga asati ari weɗaŋgwe ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamuita mukuru;)
wecipiri Hirkia, wecitatu Tebaria, wecinna Zekaria; ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaHosa naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaȿika gumi naʋatatu.
Mapoka aʋatariri ʋemikoʋa ʋakabva pakati paiʋaʋo, pakati paʋarume ʋakuru, ʋakapiwe‐ɓasa saʋanuŋuna ʋaʋo kuɓata muimba yaJehova.
Ʋakakanda mijenya, ʋaɗuku pamŋe cete naʋakuru, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo
Sheremia akaratidzwa mugoʋe wokumabvazuʋa. Ɀino ʋakakanda mijenya pamsoro paZekaria mŋanakomana wake, gurukota rakaŋga rakaŋgwara; mugoʋe wake ukaratidzwa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
WaObedi‐edomi kurutiʋi rwezasi; waʋanakomana ʋake wokuceŋgeta ɗura.
WaShupimi naHosa kumaʋirazuʋa, pasuʋo reShareketi pamugwagwa unokwira, ʋarindi ʋakatarisana.
Kumabvazuʋa kwakaŋga kunaʋaRevi ʋatanhatu, kurutiʋi rwokumsoro zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ʋanna, kurutiʋi rwezasi zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ʋanna, ʋuye paɗura ʋaʋiri‐ʋaʋiri.
WaParbari kumaʋirazuʋa, ʋanna pamugwagwa, naʋaʋiri paParbari.
Ndiyo migoʋe yaʋatariri ʋemikoʋa, ʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋaKora naʋanakomana ʋaMerari.
Pakati paʋaRevi Ahija waitarira ɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yeimba yaMŋari, neɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yeɀinhu ɀitȿene.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRadani: Ʋanakomana ʋaʋaGershoni ʋaiʋa ʋaRadani, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aRadani muGershoni: Jehieri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJehieri: Zetami, naJoeri munuŋuna wake, ʋaitarira ɀiʋigiro ɀeimba yaJehova.
Pakati paʋaAmrami, naʋaIshari, naʋaHebroni, naʋaUzieri:
Shebueri mŋanakomana waGershomi, mŋanakomana waMosesi, wairaira ɀiʋigiro.
Naʋanuŋuna ʋake: ƲaEriezeri, mŋanakomana wake Rehabia, nomŋanakomana wake Jeshaya, nomŋanakomana wake Jorami, nomŋanakomana wake Zikri, nomŋanakomana wake Sheromoti.
Sheromoti uyu naʋanuŋuna ʋake ndiʋo ʋaitarira ɀiʋigiro ɀose ɀeɀinhu ɀitȿene, ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurwa namambo Davidi, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋamazana, naʋakuru ʋehondo.
Pakati peɀakapambga pakurwa ʋakatsaura ɀimŋe ɀokugadzirisa naɀo imba yaJehova.

Ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurwa naSamueri muʋoni, ʋuye naSauro mŋanakomana waKishi, naAbneri mŋanakomana waNeri, naJoabi mŋanakomana waZeruya; ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurwa nani nani ɀakaŋga ɀiciceŋgetwa naSheromoti naʋanuŋuna ʋake.
Pakati paʋaIshari: Kenania naʋanakomana ʋake ʋaiɓata maɓasa okunze pakati paIsraeri, ʋari ʋatariri naʋatoŋgi.
Pakati paʋaHebroni, Hashabia naʋanuŋuna ʋake, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare, ʋanecuru cinamazana manomŋe, ʋaitarira Israeri mhiri kwaJoridani kumaʋirazuʋa, kuti ʋaɓate maɓasa ose aJehova namaɓasa amambo.

Pakati paʋaHebroni, Jeriya wakaŋga ari mukuru, ipo pakati paʋaHebroni, namarudzi aʋo nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo. Pagore ramakumi manna rokuɓata ʋushe kwaDavidi ʋakatȿakwa, ʋakawana pakati paʋo ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare paJazeri reGireadi.

Ʋanuŋuna ʋake, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana manomŋe, ʋari ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋakaŋga ʋaitwa namambo Davidi ʋatariri ʋaʋaRubeni, naʋaGadi, naʋehafu yorudzi rwaManase, kuti ʋaite ɀose ɀaMŋari, namaɓasa ose amambo.

Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋereŋgwa ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋamazana, naʋatariri ʋaʋo ʋaiɓatira mambo paɀinhu ɀose ɀamapoka aipinda nokuɓuɗa mŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe, mŋedzi yose yegore, ɓoka rimŋe nerimŋe rikaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mutariri weɓoka rokutaŋga, pamŋedzi wokutaŋga, wakaŋga ari Jashobeami mŋanakomana waZabdieri; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Iye wakaŋga ari mumŋe waʋana ʋaPerezi, mukuru waʋatariri ʋose ʋehondo pamŋedzi wokutaŋga.
Mutariri weɓoka romŋedzi wecipiri wakaŋga ari Dodai muAhohi, neɓoka rake; Mikroti ndiye waiʋaraira; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru wecitatu wehondo pamŋedzi wecitatu, wakaŋga ari Benaya, mŋanakomana womuprista Jehoyada, iye mukuru; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Uyu ndiye Benaya uya, wakaŋga ari munhu wesimba pakati paʋanamakumi matatu, waiʋa mutariri waʋanamakumi matatu; Amizabadi mŋanakomana wake wakaŋga ari weɓoka rake.
Mukuru wecinna, pamŋedzi wecinna, wakaŋga ari Asaheri munuŋuna waJoabi, naZebadia mŋanakomana wake waimuteʋera; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru weshanu, pamŋedzi weshanu, wakaŋga ari Shamhuti muIzrahi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru wetanhatu, pamŋedzi wetanhatu, wakaŋga ari Ira mŋanakomana waIkeshi muTekoi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru wecinomŋe, pamŋedzi wecinomŋe, wakaŋga ari Herezi muPeroni, waʋana ʋaEfraimi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru worusere, pamŋedzi worusere, wakaŋga ari Sebekai muHushati, waʋaZerahi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru wepfumbamŋe, pamŋedzi wepfumbamŋe, wakaŋga ari Abiezeri muAnatoti, waʋaBenjamini; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Mukuru wegumi, pamŋedzi wegumi, wakaŋga ari Maharai muNetofati, waʋaZerahi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
wegumi nomumŋe, pamŋedzi wegumi nomumŋe, wakaŋga ari Benaya muPiratoni, waʋana ʋaEfraimi; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
wegumi naʋaʋiri, pamŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, wakaŋga ari Herdai muNetofati, waOtnieri; paɓoka rake pakaŋga paneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀinna.
Ʋuye,
wokwaRevi: Hashabia, mŋanakomana waKemueri; wokwaAroni: Zadoki;
wokwaJuda: Erihu, mumŋe waʋanuŋuna ʋaDavidi; wokwaIsakari: Omri mŋanakomana waMikaeri;
wokwaZeburuni: Ishmaya mŋanakomana waObadia; wokwaNaftari: Jeremoti mŋanakomana waAzrieri;
wokuʋana ʋaEfraimi: Hoshea mŋanakomana waAzazia; wokuhafu yorudzi rwaManase: Joeri mŋanakomana waPedaya;
wokuhafu yorudzi rwaManase paGireadi: Ido mŋanakomana waZekaria; wokwaBenjamini: Jasieri mŋanakomana waAbneri;
wokwaDani: Azareri mŋanakomana waJerohami. Ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋamarudzi aIsraeri.
Asi Davidi haana‐kuʋereŋga ʋamakore makumi maʋiri naʋaɗuku kwaʋari; nokuti Jehova wakataura kuti ucawanza ʋaIsraeri, ʋaʋe senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga.
Joabi mŋanakomana waZeruya wakataŋga kuʋereŋga, asi haana‐kupedza; kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukamukira ʋaIsraeri nemhoȿa iyi; ʋuye haʋana‐kuisa kuwanda kwaʋo pamakoronike amambo Davidi.
Mutariri wefuma yamambo wakaŋga ari Asmaveti mŋanakomana waAdieri mutariri wefuma yapaminda, napamaguta, napamisha, neyapanhare, wakaŋga ari Jonatani mŋanakomana waUzia;
mutariri waʋanhu ʋaiɓata paminda ʋacirima pasi, wakaŋga ari Ezri mŋanakomana waKerubi.
Mutariri weminda yemizambiriŋga, wakaŋga ari Shimei muRamati; mutariri weɀiɓereko ɀeminda yemizambiriŋga, wedzimba dzewaini, wakaŋga ari Zabdi muShifmi;
mutariri wemiorivi nemiʋonde yakaŋga iri pamapani, wakaŋga ari Baari‐hanani muGederi; mutariri wedzimba dzamafuta wakaŋga ari Joashi.
Mutariri wamapoka eɀipfuwo, ɀaifura paSharoni, wakaŋga ari Shitrai muSharoni, ʋuye mutariri wamapoka aigara pamipata, wakaŋga ari Shafati mŋanakomana waAdrai;
mutariri wamakamera wakaŋga ari Obiri muIshmaeri; ʋuye mutariri wemboŋgoro wakaŋga ari Jedeya muMeronoti;
mutariri wamapoka amakwai wakaŋga ari Jazizi muHagri. Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarairi ʋenhumbi dzamambo Davidi.
Ʋuye Jonatani muzukuru waDavidi wakaŋga ari gurukota, murume wakaŋgwara, munyori; Jehieri mŋanakomana waHakmoni waigara naʋanakomana ʋamambo;
Ahitoferi wakaŋga ari gurukota ramambo; naHushai muArki yaiʋa shamŋari yamambo;
waiteʋera Ahitoferi ndiJehoyada mŋanakomana waBenaya, naAbiyatari; mukuru wehondo yamambo wakaŋga ari Joabi.

Ɀino Davidi wakaʋuŋganidza paJerusarema macinda ose aIsraeri, macinda amarudzi, naʋakuru ʋamapoka aiɓatira mambo vaciita mapoka, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru, naʋakuru ʋamazana, naʋatariri ʋenhumbi dzose nefuma yose yamambo naʋanakomana ʋake, pamŋe cete naʋaranda naʋanesimba, ʋarume ʋose ʋoʋumhare.

Ipapo mambo Davidi akasimuka, akamira namakumbo ake, akati: Cindinzwai hama dzaŋgu, naʋanhu ʋaŋgu! Kana ndirini, ndakaŋga ndiciti mumŋoyo maŋgu ndicaʋakira areka yesuŋgano yaJehova necitsiko caMŋari weɗu imba yokuzorora; ɀino ndakaŋga ndagadzira
Asi Mŋari wakati kwandiri: Iwe haufaniri kuʋakira zita raŋgu imba, nokuti uri munhu wokurwa, wakateʋura ropa.
Asi Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, wakanditsaura paimba yose yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu kuti ndiʋe mambo waIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti wakatsaura Juda kuti aʋe mutuŋgamiriri; paimba yaJuda
Ɀino pakati paʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ʋose (nokuti Jehova wakandipa ʋanakomana ʋazhinji) wakatsaura mŋanakomana waŋgu Soromoni, kuti agare pacigaro coʋushe caJehova munaIsraeri.
Akati kwandiri: Soromoni mŋanakomana wako ndiye ucaʋaka imba yaŋgu neʋazhe dzaŋgu; nokuti ndakamutsaura kuti aʋe mŋanakomana waŋgu, neni ndicaʋa ɓaɓa ʋake.
Ndicasimbisa ʋushe bgake nokusiŋgaperi, kana iye acitsuŋgirira kuita ɀandakaraira neɀandakatoŋga, seɀaanoita nhasi.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose, neʋuŋgano yose yaJehova, Mŋari weɗu aciɀinzwa, ceŋgetai nokutȿaka mirairo yose yaJehova Mŋari wenyu; kuti nyika ino yakanaka iʋe yenyu, mugoisiyira ʋana ʋenyu ʋanokuteʋerai, iʋe nhaka yaʋo nokusiŋgaperi.

Ɀino iwe Soromoni, mŋanakomana waŋgu, ziʋa Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako, umushumire nomŋoyo wakarurama, ʋuye nomŋeya unoɗa kwaɀo; nokuti Jehova unonɀera mŋoyo yose, unonzwisisa ndaŋgariro dzose dzemifuŋgo; kana ukamutȿaka, iye ucawanikwa newe; asi kana ukamusiya, iye ucakurasha nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino cenjera, nokuti Jehova wakakutsaura, kuti uʋake imba iʋe nɀimbo tȿene; ciʋa nesimba, uɀiite.
Ipapo Davidi akapa mŋanakomana wake Soromoni mufananidzo weɓiraʋira
nemifananidzo yeɀose yakaŋga iri mumŋeya wake, yeʋazhe dzeimba yaJehova, neyamakamuri ose anokomberedza, neyeɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yeimba yaMŋari, neyeɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yenhumbi dzakatsaurwa;
neyamapoka aʋaprista naʋaRevi, neyamaɓasa ose eimba yaJehova, neyenhumbi dzose dzokuɓata nadzo paimba yaJehova;
neyendarama, kurema kwayo, yokuʋumba nayo nhumbi dzendarama, nhumbi dzose dzamarudzi ose amaɓasa;
nokurema ʋo kwendarama yokuʋumba nayo ɀigadziko ɀendarama, nemŋenje yaɀo, kurema kwecigadziko cimŋe necimŋe nemŋenje yaco;
nendarama, kurema kwayo, yokuʋumba nayo tafura dzeɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, yetafura imŋe neimŋe; nesirveri yetafura dzesirveri;
neɀikokoʋonho ɀenyama, nendiro, nemikombe ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; nemidziyo yendarama, kurema kwomudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe; nemidziyo yesirveri, kurema kwomudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe;
nokurema kwendarama yakanatswa yeartari yeɀinonhuwira; nendarama yomufananidzo weŋgoro, wamakerubi akatambanudza
Iɀi ɀose,

Ɀino Davidi akati kunaSoromoni mŋanakomana wake: Simba, utsuŋge mŋoyo, uɀiite; usatya kana kuvunduswa, nokuti Jehova Mŋari, iye Mŋari waŋgu, unewe; haaŋgakuregi, kana kukusiya, kuȿikira maɓasa ose okushumira nawo paimba yaJehova apedzwa.

Ɀino tarira, ndiwo mapoka aʋaprista naʋaRevi, ʋaŋgaɓata maɓasa ose eimba yaMŋari; ʋuye ɀe pamaɓasa ose ucaʋa nemhizha dzose dzinoɗa kuɓata nomŋoyo wadzo maɓasa amarudzi ose; naʋakuru naʋanhu ʋose ʋacaterera cose mirairo yako.
Ɀino mambo Davidi wakati kuʋuŋgano yose: Mŋanakomana waŋgu Soromoni, wakatsaurwa iye oga naMŋari, uciri muɗuku usinesimba, asi ɓasa iguru; nokuti imba huru haizi yomunhu, asi ndeyaJehova Mŋari.

Ɀino ini nesimba raŋgu rose ndakagadzirira imba yaMŋari waŋgu ndarama yokuʋumba nayo ɀinhu ɀendarama, nesirveri yeɀinhu ɀesirveri, nendarira yeɀinhu ɀendarira, namatare eɀinhu ɀamatare, namatanda eɀinhu ɀamatanda; neɀibge ɀeoniksi, neɀibge ɀokuisa mukati, neɀibge ɀoʋukomba, neɀinamaʋara‐maʋara, namamŋe marudzi mazhinji eɀibge ɀinokosha, namabge macena akawanda.
Ʋuye ɀe, ɀandakaɗa ɀikuru imba yaMŋari waŋgu, ini ɀandinefuma yaŋgu pacaŋgu yendarama nesirveri, ndinoɀipa imba yaMŋari waŋgu, ndiciwedzera paneɀose ɀandakagadzirira imba tȿene;
ɀinoti, matarenta endarama aneɀuru ɀitatu,
nendarama yokuʋumba nayo ɀinhu ɀendarama, nesirveri yeɀinhu ɀesirveri, neɀamaɓasa ose anofanira kuitwa namaʋoko aʋapfuri. Ɀino ndianiko unoɗa kupa nhendo dzake nomŋoyo wake wose kunaJehova nhasi?
Ipapo macinda edzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, namacinda amarudzi aIsraeri, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋamazana, pamŋe cete naʋatariri ʋamaɓasa amambo ʋakapa nomŋoyo waʋo wose;
ʋakapa kuɓate‐ɓasa reimba yaMŋari ndarama, matarenta aneɀuru ɀishanu,
Ʋakaŋga ʋaneɀibge ɀinokosha ʋakaɀipa ɀiiswe pafuma yeimba yaJehova, ɀicitarirwa naJehieri muGershoni.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakafara ɀaʋakapa nomŋoyo wose, nokuti ʋakapa Jehova nomŋoyo wose wakarurama; namambo Davidi ʋo wakafara nomufaro mukuru.
Ɀino Davidi akakudza Jehova pamberi peʋuŋgano yose; Davidi akati: Imi mukudzwe, Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri ɓaɓa ʋeɗu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋukuru ndobgenyu, Jehova, nesimba, nokubginya, nokukunda, noʋumambo; nokuti ɀose ɀiri kuɗeŋga neɀiri pasi
Fuma nokukudzwa ɀinobva kwamuri, imi munoɓata ʋushe pamsoro peɀose; paruʋoko rwenyu panesimba noʋushe; ruʋoko rwenyu ndirwo runokurisa nokupa ʋose simba.
Saka ɀino Mŋari weɗu, tinokuʋoŋgai nokurumbidza zita renyu rinobginya.
Asi ini ndini ani, naʋanhu ʋangu cinyiko, ɀatiŋgagona kupa nomŋoyo wose kuɗai? Nokuti ɀose ɀinobva kwamuri, takaŋgokupai ɀakabva paruʋoko rwenyu.
Nokuti tiri ʋaeni pamberi penyu naʋatorwa, seɀakaŋga ɀakaita madziɓaɓa eɗu; mazuʋa eɗu panyika akafanana nomumvuri, hakunetariro.
Jehova Mŋari weɗu, iɀi ɀose ɀakawanda ɀatakagadzira kukuʋakirai imba yezita renyu dɀene, ɀinobva paruʋoko rwenyu, ɀose ndeɀenyu;

ndinoziʋa ʋo Mŋari waŋgu, kuti imi munoidza mŋoyo, munofarira kururama. Kana ndirini, ndakapa iɀi ɀose nomŋoyo wakarurama nomŋoyo wose; ɀino ndakafara ndiciʋona ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋari pano ʋacikupai nomŋoyo wose.
Jehova Mŋari waAbrahama, naIsaka, naIsraeri, madziɓaɓa eɗu, garisai iɀi nokusiŋgaperi pandaŋgariro dzemifuŋgo yemŋoyo yaʋanhu ʋenyu; rereʋudzai mŋoyo yaʋo kwamuri;
ipai Soromoni mŋanakomana waŋgu mŋoyo wakarurama, kuti aceŋgete mirairo yenyu, neɀipupuriro ɀenyu, neɀamakatema, kuti aite ɀinhu iɀi ɀose, aʋake imba huru yandakagadzirira ɀose.
Ipapo Davidi akati kuʋuŋgano yose: Ɀino kudzai Jehova Mŋari wenyu. Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yakakudza Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakakotamisa misoro yaʋo, ʋakanamata kunaJehova namambo.

Ʋakaɓayira Jehova ɀiɓayiro, ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa kunaJehova maŋgwanani pazuʋa rakateʋera, ɀaiti: Nzombe dzinecuru cimŋe, namakondobge anecuru cimŋe, namakwaiana anecuru cimŋe, pamŋe cete neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀinoɗururwa, neɀiɓayiro ɀakawanda ɀaʋaIsraeri ʋose;
ʋakadya, ʋakanwa pamberi paJehova nomufaro mukuru nezuʋa iro. Ʋakaita Soromoni mŋanakomana waDavidi mambo rwecipiri, ʋakamuzodzera Jehova aʋe mutuŋgamiriri, naZadoki aʋe muprista.
Ipapo Soromoni akagara pacigaro coʋushe caJehova akaʋa mambo panɀimbo yaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, akafambiswa ɀakanaka; ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakamuterera.
Macinda ose, naʋanhu ʋose ʋanesimba, naʋanakomana ʋose ʋamambo Davidi ʋakaɀiisa pasi pamambo Soromoni.
Jehova akakudza Soromoni kwaɀo‐kwaɀo pamberi paʋaIsraeri ʋose, akamupa ʋumambo bgakakura, ʋusina‐kumbopiwa mumŋe mambo waIsraeri wakamutaŋgira.
Ɀino Davidi mŋanakomana waJese wakaɓata ʋaIsraeri ʋose paʋushe bgake.
Ŋguʋa yaakaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri aiʋa makore anamakumi manna; wakaɓata ʋushe paHebroni makore manomŋe, napaJerusarema wakaɓata ʋushe makore makumi matatu namatatu.
Akazofa akwegura kwaɀo, aʋa namakore mazhinji, nefuma, nokukudzwa; Soromoni mŋanakomana wake akaɓata ʋushe panɀimbo yake.
Ɀino maɓasa amambo Davidi, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, tarirai, akanyorwa pamashoko omuʋoni Samueri, napamashoko omuprista Natani, napamashoko omuʋoni Gadi;
pamŋe cete
Ɀino Soromoni mŋanakomana waDavidi wakasimbiswa paʋushe bgake, Jehova Mŋari wake akaʋa naye, akamukurisa ɀikuru kwaɀo.
Ɀino Soromoni akataura naʋaIsraeri ʋose, naʋakuru ʋeɀuru naʋamazana, naʋatoŋgi, namacinda ose pakati paIsraeri ʋose, iʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa.
Ipapo Soromoni neʋuŋgano yose pamŋe cete naye ʋakaenda kuɗunhu rakakwirira raiʋa paGibeoni; nokuti ndipo pakaŋga panetente rokusoŋgana raMŋari, rakaŋga raʋakwa murenje naMosesi muranda waJehova.
Asi Davidi wakaŋga atora areka yaMŋari paKiriati‐jearimi, akaiisa panɀimbo, Davidi yaakaŋga aigadzirira; nokuti wakaŋga aidzikira tente paJerusarema.
Neareka yendarira yakaŋga yaʋumbga naBezareri mŋanakomana waUri, mŋanakomana waHuri, yakaŋga iri’po pamberi petabernakeri yaJehova; Soromoni neʋuŋgano yose ʋakairaŋgarira.
Soromoni akakwira’ko pamberi paJehova kuartari yendarira, yakaŋga iri patente rokusoŋgana, akaɓayira pamsoro payo ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa ɀinecuru cezana.
Ɀino noʋusiku ubgo Mŋari akaɀiratidza kunaSoromoni, akati kwaari: Kumbira caunoɗa kuti ndikupe.
Soromoni akati kunaMŋari: Makaitira ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu Davidi tsitsi huru, mukandiita ini mambo panɀimbo yaʋo.
Ɀino Jehova Mŋari, shoko ramakapikira Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ŋgarisimbiswe; nokuti makandiita mambo waʋanhu ʋakafanana neguruʋa renyika pakuwanda kwaʋo.
Ɀino ndipei henyu njere nokuziʋa, kuti ndiɓuɗe nokupinda pamberi paʋanhu aʋa; nokuti ndiani uŋgagona kutoŋga ʋanhu ʋenyu aʋa ʋakawanda ʋakaɗai?

Mŋari akati kunaSoromoni: Ɀawaraŋgarira cinhu ici mumŋoyo mako, ukasakumbira fuma, neɀakawanda, kana kukudzwa, kana kufa kwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, kana kukumbira ʋupenyu ʋurefu, asi wakaɀikumbirira njere nokuziʋa, kuti ugone kutoŋga ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋandakakuita mambo waʋo;
ɀino njere nokuziʋa unoɀipiwa iwe; ʋuye ndicakupa fuma, neɀakawanda, nokukudzwa, ɀisina‐kumbopiwa mumŋe wamadziɓaɓa akakutaŋgira; ʋuye hapanomumŋe ucakuteʋera ucaʋa neɀakaɗai.
Ɀino Soromoni akabva panɀimba yakakwirira yakaŋga iri paGibeoni, pamberi petente rokusoŋgana, akaȿika Jerusarema, akaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri.
Soromoni akaʋuŋganidza ŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza; wakaŋga aneŋgoro dzinecuru cimŋe namazana manna, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, ʋaakaisa mumaguta eŋgoro nokunamambo paJerusarema.
Mambo akaʋuŋganidza sirveri nendarama paJerusarema ɀikawanda ɀikaita samabge, nemisidari ikaita semiʋonde yaiʋa pamapani.
Mabiza aSoromoni aaiʋa nawo, aibva Egipita; ʋateŋgesi ʋamambo ʋaindoatora’ko ʋaciita mapoka‐mapoka, ɓoka rimŋe nerimŋe rinomuteŋgo waro.
Ʋakandoɀitora Egipita, ʋakaʋuya naɀo, ŋgoro imŋe neimŋe iciteŋgwa namashekeri esirveri anamazana matanhatu,
Ɀino Soromoni wakaɗa kuʋakira zita raJehova imba, neimba yoʋushe bgake.
Soromoni akaʋereŋga ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe kuzotakura mitoro, naʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi masere kuzotema matanda pamakomo, naʋaneɀuru ɀitatu namazana matanhatu kuzoʋa ʋatariri ʋaʋo.
Soromoni akatuma
Tarirai, ndoʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waŋgu imba, ndimutsaurire iyo, kuti ndipisire pamberi pake ɀinonhuwira ɀemiti yakanaka,
Imba yandinoʋaka ihuru; nokuti Mŋari weɗu mukuru kupfuʋura ʋamŋari ʋose.
Asi ndianiko unogona kumuʋakira imba, ɗeŋga nokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ɀarisiŋgagoni kumuriŋgana? Ɀino ini ndini aniko, kuti ndimuʋakire imba, asi kuŋgopisa ɀinonhuwira pamberi pake?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cinditumirai murume wakaŋgwara pakuɓata maɓasa endarama, nesirveri, nendarira, namatare,
Nditumirei ʋo misidari, nemisipresi, namatanda emiarmugi yapaRibanoni; nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋanenjere dzokutema matanda paRibanoni; tarirai, ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacaʋa naʋaranda ʋenyu,
kundigadzirira matanda akawanda; nokuti imba yandobva ndoʋaka icaʋa huru ɀinoshamisa.
Tarirai, ndicapa ʋaranda ʋenyu, iʋo ʋanotema matanda, ɀiyero ɀineɀuru ɀamakumi maʋiri
Ipapo Hurami mambo weTire akapindura norunyoro rwaakatuma kunaSoromoni, akati: Jehova wakaɗa ʋanhu ʋake, saka wakakuita mambo waʋo.
Hurami akati ʋo: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakudzwe, iye wakasika kuɗeŋga napasi, wakapa mambo Davidi mŋanakomana wakaŋgwara, wakapiwa kuŋgwara nokuziʋa, kuʋakira Jehova imba neimba yoʋushe bgake.
Ɀino ndatuma munhu wakacenjera, wakapiwa ziʋo, iye Hurami Abi,

mŋanakomana womukadzi pakati paʋakunda ʋaDani, ɓaɓa ʋake waiʋa munhu weTire, unoziʋa kuɓata maɓasa endarama, nesirveri, nendarira, namatare, namabge, namatanda, nemiceka mishaʋa, nemitema, nemiceka yakaiȿo‐naka, nemiceka mitȿuku; ʋuye kuʋeza kwose, nokufuŋga mano ose; iye ŋgaapiwe ʋugaro pakati paʋarume ʋenyu ʋakacenjera, naʋarume ʋakacenjera ʋashe waŋgu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ishe waŋgu ŋgaatumire ʋaranda ʋake ɀiyo, nebari, namafuta newaini, seɀaakataura;
isu ticatema matanda paRebanoni seɀamunoɗa; ticaaȿitsa kwamuri akaɓatanidzwa, aende Jopa neguŋgwa; imi mugokwira nawo Jerusarema.
Ipapo Soromoni akaʋereŋga ʋatorwa ʋose ʋaiʋa panyika yaIsraeri, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaʋereŋgwa naDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinezana namakumi mashanu neɀitatu namazana matanhatu.
Akaira ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋe ʋatakuri ʋemitoro, naʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi masere ʋateme matanda pamakomo, ʋuye ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu namazana matanhatu ʋaʋe ʋatariri kuzoraira ʋanhu pakuɓata.
Ipapo Soromoni akataŋga kuʋaka imba yaJehova paJerusarema pagomo reMoria, pakaŋga paɀiratidza
Wakataŋga kuʋaka
Ɀino ndidzo nheyo dzakaʋambga naSoromoni pakuʋaka imba yaMŋari: kureɓa kwayo, kana ʋacienzanisa namakubiti

Ƃiraʋira, raiʋa pamberi peimba, kureɓa kwaro kwakaŋga kwakafanana noʋupamhi bgeimba, makubiti makumi maʋiri, nokukwirira kwaro makubiti anezana namakumi maʋiri; akaifukidza necomukati nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.
Akafukidza imba huru namatanda omusipresi, akafukidzwa nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, akaʋezera pamsoro pawo micindwe namaketani.
Akashoŋgedza imba ʋukomba bgamabge anokosha; ndarama yakaŋga iri ndarama yeParvaimi.
Akafukidza ʋo imba nendarama, namatanda ayo, neɀikumbaridzo ɀayo, namadziro ayo, namagonhi ayo; akaʋeza makerubi pamadziro.

Akaʋaka ʋo imba tȿene‐tȿene; kureɓa kwayo kwakaŋga kwakafanana noʋupamhi bgeimba, makubiti anamakumi maʋiri, noʋupamhi bgayo makubiti anamakumi maʋiri; akaifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka yakaȿika matarenta mazana matanhatu.
Kurema kwembambo kwakaȿika mashekeri endarama anamakumi mashanu.
Paimba tȿene‐tȿene akaita makerubi maʋiri ɀiri ɀifananidzo ɀakaʋezwa; akaafukidza nendarama.

Mapapiro amakerubi akaȿika makubiti anamakumi maʋiri pakureɓa kwawo; ɓapiro rerimŋe rakaŋga rinamakubiti mashanu, riciȿika kumadziro eimba; nerimŋe ɓapiro ʋo rakaŋga rinamakubiti mashanu, riciȿika kuɓapiro rerimŋe kerubi.
Neɓapiro rerimŋe kerubi rakaŋga rinamakubiti mashanu, riciȿika kumadziro eimba; nerimŋe ɓapiro ʋo rakaŋga rinamakubiti mashanu, riciɓatana neɓapiro rerimŋe kerubi.
Mapapiro amakerubi awa akaŋga akatambanudzwa, akaȿika makubiti makumi maʋiri; akaŋga amire namakumbo awo, ɀiso ɀawo ɀakariŋgira kumba.
Akaita ʋo cidzitiro ne
Akaita ʋo pamberi peimba mbiru mbiri; kukwirira kwadzo kwakaȿika makubiti anamakumi matatu namashanu, nomusoro wakaŋga uri pamsoro peimŋe neimŋe wakaȿika makubiti mashanu.
Akaita ʋo maketani panɀimbo tȿene, akaaisa pamisoro yembiru; akaita matamba anezana, akaaisa pamaketani.
Akamisa mbiru mbiri pamberi petembere, imŋe kurudyi, imŋe kuruɓoshwe; yokurudyi akaitumidza zita rinonzi Jakini, neyokuruɓoshwe akaitumidza Boazi.
Wakaita ʋo artari yendarira, kureɓa kwayo kwakaŋga kunamakubiti anamakumi maʋiri, noʋupamhi bgayo makubiti anamakumi maʋiri, nokukwirira kwayo anegumi.

Akaita ʋo dziʋa rendarira yakanyauswa, rakaȿika makubiti anegumi paʋupamhi pamuromo, rakatenderera; nokukwirira kwaro kwakaȿika makubiti mashanu; ʋuye pakuyera rwonzi rwakaȿika makubiti anamakumi matatu rwakaripoteredza.

Pasi paro pakaŋga paneɀifananidzo ɀenzombe dzakaŋga dzicirikomberedza, ɀiciita gumi pakubiti rimŋe nerimŋe, ɀicipoteredza dziʋa. Nzombe dzakaita misara miʋiri, dzakaʋumbga pamŋe cete naro pakuʋumbga kwaro.

Rakaŋga rimire pamsoro penzombe gumi nembiri, nhatu dzakaŋga dzakatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nhatu kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, nhatu kurutiʋi rwezasi, nenhatu kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; dziʋa rakaŋga rakagadzwa pamsoro padzo, idzo dzakafuratirana.
Ʋukobvu bgaro bgakaŋga bgakaita soʋupamhi bgecanza, nomuromo waro wakaŋga wakafanana nomuromo wembiya, seruʋa rehapa; mukati makaɗirwa ʋuye makariŋgana mabati aneɀuru ɀitatu.
Akaita ʋo midziyo yokusukira inegumi, akaisa mishanu kurudyi nemishanu kuruɓoshwe, yokusukira’mo; ɀinhu ɀeɀipiriso, ɀaipiswa, ɀaisukirwa’mo; asi dziʋa rakaŋga riri raʋaprista rokushambidzira’mo.
Akaita ʋo ɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀinegumi ɀendarama, seɀaakaŋga arairwa pamsoro paɀo; akaɀiisa patembere, ɀishanu kurudyi ʋuye ɀishanu kuruɓoshwe.
Akaita ʋo tafura dzinegumi, akadziisa mutembere, shanu kurudyi ʋuye shanu kuruɓoshwe. Akaita midziyo yendarama inezana.
Ʋuye wakaita ʋo ruʋazhe rwaʋaprista, noruʋazhe rukuru, nemikoʋa yoruʋazhe, akafukidza mikoʋa yarwo nendarira.
Akaisa dziʋa kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba kumabvazuʋa, kwakatarira zasi.
Hurami akaita hari, nefoshoro, nembiya. Naiɀoɀo Hurami akapedza maɓasa ose aakaitira Soromoni paimba yaJehova;
ɀaiti: Mbiru mbiri, nembiya, nemisoro miʋiri, yakaŋga iri pamisoro yembiru; nemimbure miʋiri yokufukidza nayo mbiya mbiri dzemisoro miʋiri yakaŋga iri pamisoro yembiru;
namatamba anamazana manna emimbure miʋiri, misara miʋiri yamatamba pamumbure mumŋe nomumŋe, kufukidza mbiya mbiri yemisoro yakaŋga iri pamsoro pembiru;
akaita ʋo ɀiŋgoro ɀinegumi, nemidziyo yokushambidzira pamsoro peɀiŋgoro;
nedziʋa rimŋe, nenzombe gumi nembiri pasi pedziʋa.
Nehari ʋo, nefoshoro, neɀikokoʋonho ɀenyama, nenhumbi dzose dzayo, Hurami Abi wakaɀiitira mambo Soromoni nendarira inobginya, ɀiʋe ɀeimba yaJehova.
Mambo akaɀiʋumba paɓani raJoridani, pakati peSukoti neZereda.
Saiɀoɀo Soromoni akaita nhumbi dzose idzi dzakawanda kwaɀo; nokuti kurema kwendarira kwakaŋga kusiŋgayerwi.
Soromoni akaita nhumbi dzose dzakaŋga dziri mumba maMŋari, neartari yendarira ʋo netafura pakaŋga paneɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza;
neɀigadziko ɀemŋenje nemŋenje yaɀo, kuti ipfute pamberi penɀimbo tȿene, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa,
namaruʋa, nemŋenje, nembato, ɀendarama, iri ndarama yakanaka kwaɀo;
nembato, nembiya, neɀiroŋgo, neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto,
Saiɀoɀo maɓasa ose akaitirwa imba yaJehova naSoromoni akapera. Ɀino Soromoni akapinza ɀinhu ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurirwa

Ɀino Soromoni akaʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, naʋakuru ʋose ʋamarudzi, iwo macinda edzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋana ʋaIsraeri, paJerusarema, akakwidza areka yesuŋgano yaJehova ibve paguta raDavidi, iro Zioni.
Ʋarume ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana kunamambo pamutambo, wakaŋga uri pamŋedzi wecinomŋe.
Ʋakuru ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakaȿika, ʋaRevi ʋakasimudza areka.
Ʋakakwira neareka, netente rokusoŋgana, nenhumbi dzose tȿene dzakaŋga dziri muTente; ʋaprista ʋaRevi ʋakakwira naiɀoɀo.
Mambo Soromoni, neʋuŋgano yose yaʋaIsraeri yakaŋga yaʋuŋganira kwaari, ʋakafamba pamberi peareka, ʋakaɓayira makwai nenzombe, ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa nokuwanda kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋaprista ʋakagadzika areka yesuŋgano yaJehova panɀimbo yayo, panɀimbo tȿene yeimba, panɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene, ipo panyasi pamapapiro amakerubi.
Nokuti makerubi akatambanudza mapapiro awo pamsoro penɀimbo yeareka, makerubi akafukidza areka namatanda ayo necokumsoro.
Matanda akaŋga akareɓa; naiɀoɀo miromo yamatanda yakaŋga iciʋonekwa kana munhu ari paareka pamberi penɀimbo tȿene; asi akaŋga asiŋgaʋonekwi necokunze; ici’po kuȿikira nhasi.
Mukati meareka makaŋga musisineciro, asi mahwendefa maʋiri akaŋga aiswa’mo naMosesi paHorebi, ŋguʋa Jehova yaakaita suŋgano nayo naʋana ʋaIsraeri pakuɓuɗa kwaʋo paEgipita.
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa panɀimbo tȿene, (nokuti ʋaprista ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po, ʋakaŋga ʋaɀinatsa, ʋasiŋgaiti namapoka aʋo;

naʋaRevi ʋose ʋo, ʋaiʋa ʋaimbi, ʋose ʋaʋo, ʋaiti, Asafi, naHemani, naJedutuni, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋanuŋuna ʋaʋo, ʋakafuka miceka yakanaka kwaɀo, ʋanamakandira, nemiteŋgeranwa, nembira, ʋakamira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rweartari, ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo ʋaprista ʋanezana namakumi maʋiri, ʋaciridza hwamanda;)

ɀino ʋaridzi ʋehwamanda, naʋaimbi, ʋakati ʋaciita mawa, ʋaciita nenzwi rimŋe ʋacirumbidza nokuʋoŋga Jehova; ʋakati ʋaciimbisa pamŋe cete nehwamanda, namakandira, neɀokuridzisa naɀo, ʋacirumbidza Jehova,
naiɀoɀo ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kumira paɓasa nokuɗa kwegore; nokuti kubginya kwaJehova kwakazadza imba yaMŋari.
Ipapo Soromoni akati: Jehova wakati, ndinoɗa kugara mukati merima guru.
Asi ndakakuʋakirai imba pamuŋgagara, nenɀimbo yamuŋgagara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino mambo akatendeʋudza ciso cake, akaropafadza ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri; ʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri ikasimuka.
Akati: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri ŋgaakudzwe, iye wakataura nomuromo wake naDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, akaɀizadzisa noruʋoko rwake, aciti:

Kubva pazuʋa randakaɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri paEgipita, handina‐kutsaura guta rimŋe pamarudzi ose aIsraeri, paʋaŋgandiʋakira imba, kuti zita raŋgu rigare’po; ʋuye handina‐kutsaura munhu mumŋe aʋe mutuŋgamiriri waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri;
asi ndakatsaura Jerusarema, kuti zita raŋgu rigare’po; ʋuye ndakatsaura Davidi kuti aɓate ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waIsraeri imba.
Asi Jehova wakati kunaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu: Wakaita ɀakanaka, ɀawakaŋga uciɗa kuʋakira zita raŋgu imba;
kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro iwe hauŋgaʋaki imba iyo; asi mŋanakomana wako waucaɓereka, ndiye ucaʋakira zita raŋgu imba.
Ɀino Jehova wakaita shoko rake raakataura, nokuti ini ndamuka panɀimbo yaDavidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndikagara pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri, seɀakapika Jehova, ndikaʋakira zita raJehova Mŋari waIsraeri imba.
Imomo ndakaisa areka, munesuŋgano yaJehova, yaakaita naʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Akamira pamberi peartari yaJehova, pamberi peʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri, akatambanudza maʋoko ake;

(nokuti Soromoni wakaŋga aita nendarira pokumira pakakwirira, kureɓa kwapo kwakaȿika makubiti mashanu, noʋupamhi makubiti mashanu, nokukwirira makubiti matatu, akaɀiisa pakati poruʋazhe; akamira pamsoro paɀo, akafugama pamberi peʋuŋgano yose yaIsraeri, akatambanudzira maʋoko ake kuɗeŋga;)
akati: Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, hakunomumŋe Mŋari wakafanana nemi kuɗeŋga kumsoro kana panyika pasi; munoraŋgarira suŋgano nenyasha kuʋaranda ʋenyu, ʋanofamba pamberi penyu nomŋoyo waʋo wose.
Imi makaitira muranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, seɀamakamupikira; makataura nomuromo wenyu, mukaɀiita noruʋoko rwenyu, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, itirai muranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, seɀamakamupikira, muciti: Hauŋgashaiwi munhu ucagara pacigaro coʋushe caIsraeri pamberi paŋgu, kana ʋana ʋako ʋakaŋgwarira kufamba kwaʋo, ʋakafamba pamberi paŋgu seɀawakafamba iwe pamberi paŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, shoko renyu ŋgariitike, iro ramakataura kumuranda wenyu Davidi ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ko mukati Mŋari uŋgagara panyika here? Tarira, ɗeŋga nokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga haɀiŋgamuriŋgani; ndoɗa imba ino yandakaʋaka!
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, iʋai nehanya nomunyeŋgetero womuranda wenyu, nokukumbira kwake, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, munzwe kuɗanidzira nokunyeŋgetera kwomuranda wenyu, kwaanonyeŋgetera pamberi penyu nhasi;

meso enyu ŋgaarambe acirindira imba ino masikati noʋusiku, nɀimbo iyi yamakataura pamsoro payo, muciti mucagarisa zita renyu’po; inzwai munyeŋgetero womuranda wenyu waanozonyeŋgetera akatarira kunɀimbo ino.
Munzwe kukumbira kwomuranda wenyu, nokwaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kana ʋacizonyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kunɀimbo iyi; ɗonzwai iko kuɗeŋga, kwamunogara; ɀino kana mukanzwa, muʋakaŋganwire henyu.
Kana munhu aciŋge atadzira waanogara naye, akapikiswa mhiko, akaʋuya akapika pamberi peartari yenyu muimba ino;
inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, muite, mururamisire ʋaranda ʋenyu, mupe wakaipa mhoȿa, arobge pamsoro pomufambire wake; asi mururamisire wakarurama, apiwe ɀakafanira kururama kwake.
Kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri ʋaciŋge ʋakundwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, nemhaka yokuti ʋakakutadzirai; kana ʋakadzokera ɀe kwamuri, ʋakatenda zita renyu, ʋakanyeŋgetera kwamuri nokukumbira muimba ino;
inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, mukaŋganwire ɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, muʋadzosere ɀe kunyika yamakaʋapa iʋo namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Kana kuɗeŋga kuciŋge kwazarirwa, mvura ikasanaya nemhaka yokuti ʋakakutadzirai; kana ʋakanyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kunɀimbo ino, ʋakatenda zita renyu, ʋakatendeʋuka paɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nokuti muneŋge maʋaroʋa;

inzwai iko kuɗeŋga, mukaŋganwire ɀiʋi ɀaʋaranda ʋenyu, neɀaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, nokuti munoʋadzidzisa nzira yakanaka yaʋanofanira kufamba nayo; munise mvura panyika iyo yamakapa ʋanhu ʋenyu kuti iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
Kana nzara ikaʋa’po panyika, kana ɗenda rikaʋa’po, kana nyunji nokuvuva ɀikaʋa’po, nemhashu nehonye; kana ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakaʋakomba panyika inamaguta aʋo; kana nyatwa kana hosha ipi neipi ikaʋa’po;
kana munhu upi noupi, kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋose ʋaIsraeri ʋakanyeŋgetera kana kukumbira, mumŋe nomumŋe aciziʋa kutambudzika kuri pamŋoyo wake kana kucema kwake, akatambanudzira maʋoko ake kuimba ino;
inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, mukaŋganwire muripire mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakafanira mufambire wake wose, iye wamunoziʋa mŋoyo wake; (nokuti imi, imi moga, ndimi munoziʋa mŋoyo yaʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋose;)
kuti ʋakutyei, ʋafambe munzira dzenyu, ŋguʋa yose yaʋanogara panyika yamakapa madziɓaɓa eɗu.

Ɀino kana ari mutorwa, asati ari waʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, kana akabva kunyika iri kure nokuɗa kwezita renyu guru, noruʋoko rwenyu runesimba, noruʋoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa; kana ʋakaʋuya ʋakanyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kuimba ino;

inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, muitire mutorwa ɀose ɀaanokumbira, kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋaziʋe zita renyu, ʋakutyei, seɀinoita ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, ʋaziʋe kuti imba ino yandakaʋaka yakatumidzwa zita renyu.
Kana ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakandorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋakaenda nenzira ipi neipi yamucaʋatuma nayo, ʋakanyeŋgetera kwamuri ʋakatarira kuguta rino ramakatsaura, nokuimba yandakaʋakira zita renyu;
inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo nokukumbira kwaʋo, muʋaruramisire.
Kana ʋakakutadzirai, (nokuti hakuno‐munhu usiŋgatadzi), mukaʋatsamŋira, mukaʋaisa kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋakatapxa kunyika yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, kana kure kana pedyo;
kana ʋakazoɀifuŋga panyika kwaʋakatapirwa, ʋakadzoka ɀe, ʋakakumbira kwamuri panyika yokutapxa kwaʋo, ʋakati: Tatadza, taita ɀakaipa, taita ɀisakarurama;

kana ʋakadzokera ɀe kwamuri nomŋoyo waʋo wose, nomŋeya wose, panyika yokutapxa kwaʋo, kwaʋakaʋatapira, ʋakanyeŋgetera ʋakatarira kunyika yaʋo, yamakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo, nokuguta ramakatsaura imi, nokuimba yandakaʋakira zita renyu;
inzwai henyu iko kuɗeŋga kwamunogara, kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo nokukumbira kwaʋo, muʋaruramisire; mukaŋganwire ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakakutadzirai.
Ɀino Mŋari waŋgu, meso enyu ŋgaaȿinure, nenzeʋe dzenyu ŋgadziterere ɀakanaka munyeŋgetero unonyeŋgeterwa munɀimbo ino.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino simukai, Jehova Mŋari, mupinde munɀimbo yenyu yokuzorora, imi neareka yesimba renyu; ʋaprista ʋenyu, Jehova Mŋari, ŋgaʋafukidzwe noruponeso, naʋatȿene ʋenyu ŋgaʋafarire ɀakanaka.
Jehova Mŋari, musafuratira ciso comuzodzwa wenyu; raŋgarirai maɓasa akanaka aDavidi muranda wenyu.
Ɀino Soromoni wakati apedza kunyeŋgetera, mŋoto ndokuɓuruka kuɗeŋga, ukapedza cipiriso cinopiswa neɀimŋe ɀiɓayiro; kubginya kwaJehova kukazadza imba.
Ʋaprista ʋakakoniwa kupinda muimba yaJehova, nokuti kubginya kwaJehova kwakaŋga kwazadza imba yaJehova.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakatarira mŋoto uciɓuruka kuɗeŋga nokubginya kwaJehova kucigara pamsoro peimba; ʋakakotamira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo pakaroŋgwa namabge, ʋakanamata nokuʋoŋga Jehova,
Ipapo mambo naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaɓayira ɀiɓayiro pamberi paJehova.
Mambo Soromoni akaɓayira ciɓayiro cenzombe dzineɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀiʋiri, namakwai aneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi maʋiri. Saiɀoɀo mambo naʋanhu ʋose ʋakatsaurira Mŋari imba iyo.

Ʋaprista ʋakamira’po, seɀaʋakagoʋerwa maɓasa aʋo; naʋaRevi ʋo ʋaneɀokuridzira Jehova, ɀakaitwa namambo Davidi, ɀokuʋoŋga Jehova naɀo, nokuti nyasha dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi, paŋguʋa iya Davidi yaakakudza

Soromoni akatsaura ʋo nɀimbo yapakati yoruʋazhe rwakaŋga ruri pamberi peimba yaJehova; nokuti ndi’po paakaɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, namafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa; nokuti artari yendarira yakaitwa naSoromoni yakaŋga isiŋgagoni kuriŋgana cipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso coʋupfu, namafuta.
Naiɀoɀo Soromoni akatamba mutambo paŋguʋa iyo mazuʋa manomŋe, naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamŋe cete naye,
Ɀino pazuʋa rorusere ʋakatamba mutambo wokupedzisira; nokuti ʋakatsaura artari mazuʋa manomŋe, ʋakaita mutambo mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namatatu romŋedzi wecinomŋe akaendisa ʋanhu kumatente aʋo nemŋoyo yakaŋga icifara, icifarira ɀakanaka ɀose ɀakaitira Jehova Davidi, naSoromoni, naʋanhu ʋake ʋaIsraeri.
Saiɀoɀo Soromoni akapedza imba yaJehova, neimba yamambo; ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumŋoyo waSoromoni kuita muimba yaJehova, nomumba make, wakaɀiita kwaɀo.
Ipapo Jehova akaɀiratidza kunaSoromoni ʋusiku, akati kwaari: Ndanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwako, ndaɀitsaurira nɀimbo iyi, iʋe imba yokuɓayira ɀiɓayiro.
Kana ndiciŋge ndadziʋira kuɗeŋga, kuti mvura irege kunaya, kana ɀimŋe ndiciŋge ndaraira mhashu, kuti dzipedze nyika, kana ɀimŋe ndiciŋge ndatuma ɗenda pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu;

kana ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋakatumidzwa nezita raŋgu, ʋakaɀininipisa, ʋakanyeŋgetera nokutȿaka ciso caŋgu, nokurega nzira dzaʋo dzakaipa; ipapo ndicanzwa kuɗeŋga ndicaʋakaŋganwira ɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nokupodza nyika yaʋo.
Ɀino meso aŋgu acaȿinura, nzeʋe dzaŋgu dzicaterera ndinzwe munyeŋgetero unoitwa panɀimbo iyi.
Nokuti ɀino ndatsaura imba ino nokuiita tȿene, zita raŋgu riʋe’po nokusiŋgaperi; meso aŋgu nomŋoyo waŋgu ɀicaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi.
Kana uri’we, kana ukafamba pamberi paŋgu saɓaɓa ʋako Davidi, ukaita ɀose ɀandakakuraira, ukaceŋgeta ɀandatema neɀandatoŋga,
ipapo ini ndicasimbisa cigaro cako coʋushe, seɀandakapikira ɓaɓa ʋako Davidi, ndiciti: Hauŋgashaiwi munhu ucaɓata ʋushe bgaIsraeri.
Asi kana mukatsauka, mukasiya ɀandatema neɀandaraira ɀandakaisa pamberi penyu, mukandoshumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, mukaʋanamata;
ipapo ndicaʋadzura nemidzi panyika yaŋgu yandakaʋapa, neimba iyi yandakatsaurira zita raŋgu, ndicairashira kure ndirege kuiʋona, ndiiite shumo neciseko pakati paʋanhu ʋose.
Neimba iyi kunyaŋge yakakwirira ikaɗai, ʋose ʋanopfuʋura nayo ʋacakanuka, ʋaciti: Jehova wakaitireiko kuɗai nenyika ino, ʋuye neimba iyi?

Ʋacapindura, ʋaciti: Nokuti ʋakasiya Jehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, wakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, ʋakanamatira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋakaʋanamata, nokuʋashumira; saka Jehova wakaʋapinza panjodzi idzi dzose.
Makore makumi maʋiri akati apera, Soromoni aakaʋaka nawo imba yaJehova neimba yake,
Soromoni akaʋaka maguta akaŋga apiwa Soromoni naHurami, akagarisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri imomo.
Soromoni akaenda Hamati‐zoba, akarikunda.
Akaʋaka Tadmori murenje, namaguta ose amatura aakaʋaka paHamati.
Akaʋaka ʋo Beti‐horoni rokumsoro neBeti‐horoni rezasi, ari maguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, anamasuʋo, namazariro;

neBaarati, namaguta ose amatura akaŋga ari aSoromoni, namaguta ose eŋgoro dzake, namaguta aʋataȿi ʋamabiza ake, neɀose Soromoni ɀaakaŋga aciɗa kuɀiʋakira paJerusarema, napaRebanoni, napanyika yose yakaɓatwa naye.
Kana ʋari ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara paʋaHeti, naʋaAmori, naʋaPerizi, naʋaHivi, naʋaJebusi, ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋaʋaIsraeri;
paʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasara panyika shure kwaʋo, ʋasati ʋakaparadzwa naʋaIsraeri, pakati paʋo Soromoni wakaraira cibaro caʋaranda kuȿikira nhasi.
Asi Soromoni haana‐kuita ʋaranda pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri, asi iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarwi, naʋakuru ʋaʋatuŋgamiriri ʋake ʋehondo, naʋarairi ʋeŋgoro dzake, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ake.
Ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋatariri ʋakuru ʋamambo Soromoni, ʋaiʋa namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu, ʋairaira ʋanhu.

Ɀino Soromoni akandotora mukunda waFarao muguta raDavidi, akamuisa kuimba yaakaŋga amuʋakira; nokuti wakati: Mukadzi waŋgu haafaniri kugara muimba yaDavidi mambo waIsraeri, nokuti panɀimbo paȿika areka yaJehova patȿene.
Ɀino Soromoni wakaɓayira Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa paartari yaJehova, yaakaŋga aʋaka pamberi peɓiraʋira,

seɀaʋaifanira kuita zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ʋakaɓayira seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naMosesi, pamasaɓata, napakugara kwomŋedzi, napamitambo yakatarwa, katatu pagore, pamutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisinemvuʋiro, napamutambo wamaviki, napamutambo wamatumba.

Akagadza, seɀaakarairwa naDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, mapoka aʋaprista pamaɓasa aʋo, naʋaRevi pamaɓasa aʋo, kuti ʋarumbidze nokuɓata pamberi paʋaprista, seɀaʋaifanira kuita zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe; naʋatariri ʋemikoʋa pamapoka aʋo pasuʋo rimŋe nerimŋe; nokuti ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naDavidi munhu waMŋari.
Haʋana‐kutsauka pamurairo wamambo kuʋaprista naʋaRevi pamsoro peɀinhu ɀose napamsoro pefuma.
Ɀino maɓasa ose aSoromoni akapera kugadzirwa pazuʋa rokuʋambga kweimba kuȿikira pakupera kwayo. Imba yaJehova ikazopera cose.
Ipapo Soromoni akaenda Ezioni‐geberi neEroti, pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa panyika yaEdomi.
Hurami akamutumira naʋaranda ʋake ɀikepe, naʋaranda ʋaiziʋa guŋgwa kwaɀo; ʋakaenda Ofiri naʋaranda ʋaSoromoni, ʋakandotora’po ndarama yakaȿika matarenta anamazana manna namakumi mashanu,

Ɀino mambokadzi weSheba wakati anzwa mbiri yaSoromoni, akaȿika Jerusarema kuzoidza Soromoni nemibvunzo mikukutu, anaʋanhu ʋazhinji, namakamera aitakura ɀinonhuwira, nendarama zhinji‐zhinji, neɀibge ɀinokosha; ɀino wakati aȿika kunaSoromoni, akataurirana naye pamsoro peɀose ɀiri mumŋoyo make.
Soromoni, akapindura mibvunzo yake yose; hakunecinhu cakaŋga cakaʋanzirwa Soromoni, caakaŋga asiŋgagoni kumuʋudza.
Ɀino mambokadzi weSheba wakati aʋona kuŋgwara kwaSoromoni, neimba yaakaʋaka,

neɀokudya ɀakaŋga ɀiri patafura yake, nokugara kwaʋaranda ʋake, nokushumira kwaʋaɓatiri ʋake, neŋguʋo dzaʋo, naʋaɗiri ʋake neŋguʋo dzaʋo, necikwiriso cake caaikwira naco kuimba yaJehova, akapera mŋeya.
Akati kunamambo: Guhu randakanzwa munyika yaŋgu ramashoko enyu nokuŋgwara kwenyu rakaŋga riri raɀokwaɗi.
Asi handina‐kutenda mashoko aʋo, kuȿikira ndaʋuya, ndikaʋona nameso aŋgu; asi tarirai handina‐kuʋudzwa kunyaŋge hafu yoʋukuru bgokuŋgwara kwenyu; imi munokunda mbiri yandakanzwa.
Ʋarume ʋenyu ʋanomufarwa, naʋaranda ʋenyu aʋa ʋanomufarwa, ʋanomira pamberi penyu ŋguʋa dzose ʋacinzwa kuŋgwara kwenyu.

Jehova Mŋari wenyu ŋgaakudzwe, wakafadzwa nemi, akakugadzai pacigaro cake coʋushe, muʋe mambo waJehova Mŋari wenyu; nokuti Mŋari wenyu wakaɗa Israeri, kuti aʋasimbise nokusiŋgaperi, saka wakakuitai mambo waʋo, kuti mutoŋge nokururamisa.
Akapa mambo matarenta anezana namakumi maʋiri endarama,
Naʋaranda ʋo ʋaHurami, naʋaranda ʋaSoromoni, iʋo ʋaiʋuya nendarama ʋacibva Ofiri, ʋakaʋuya ʋo nemiti yemiargumi neɀibge ɀinokosha.
Mambo akaita namatanda emiargumi ɀikwiriso ɀeimba yaJehova, neɀeimba yamambo, nembira nemiteŋgeraŋwa ɀaʋaimbi; ɀakaɗai haɀina‐kumboʋonekwa panyika yaJuda.
Mambo Soromoni akapa mambokadzi weSheba ɀose ɀaaiɗa neɀaakakumbira; ɀimŋe ɀaakaʋuya naɀo kunamambo ɀisiŋgaʋereŋgwi. Naiɀoɀo akadzoka, akaenda kunyika yake, iye naʋaranda ʋake.
Ɀino ndarama yakaʋuyiswa kunaSoromoni gore rimŋe nerimŋe yakaȿika matarenta anamazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu namatanhatu
ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgi iyo yakaʋuya naʋashambadziri naʋateŋgesi; namadzimambo ose eArabia naʋaɓati ʋenyika ʋakaʋuya nendarama nesirveri kunaSoromoni.
Mambo Soromoni akaita nhoʋo huru dzinamazana maʋiri nendarama yakapambadzirwa; nhoʋo imŋe neimŋe yakaŋga yakaitwa namashekeri anamazana matatu endarama;
akaita ʋo nhoʋo ɗuku dzinamazana matatu dzendarama yakapambadzirwa; ndarama yakaȿika
Mambo akaita ʋo cigaro cikuru coʋushe cenyaŋga dzenzou, akacifukidza nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.

Cigaro ico coʋushe cakaŋga cineɀikwiriso ɀitanhatu, necitsiko cendarama, ɀakaŋga ɀakaɓatanidzwa necigaro coʋushe, neɀitsigiro kunhiʋi mbiri dzecigaro, neshumba mbiri dzakaŋga dzimire kunhiʋi dzeɀitsigiro.
Kwakaŋga kuneshumba gumi nembiri dzimire paɀikwiriso ɀitanhatu, mbiri‐mbiri kunhiʋi dzecimŋe necimŋe; hakuna‐kumboitwa cakaɗai kunoʋumŋe ʋushe.
