Mikombe yose yokunwa nayo yamambo Soromoni yaiʋa yendarama, nemidziyo yose yeimba yeɗondo reRebanoni yaiʋa yendarama yakaiȿo‐naka; sirveri yakaŋga icinzi hainomurimo pamazuʋa aSoromoni.
Nokuti mambo wakaŋga aneɀikepe ɀaienda Tarshishi naʋaranda ʋaHurami; ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi ɀaiʋuya kamŋe cete pamakore matatu ɀinendarama, nesirveri, nenyaŋga dzenzou, netsoko namatendera.
Naiɀoɀo mambo Soromoni wakakunda madzimambo ose enyika pakufuma nokucenjera.
Madzimambo ose enyika aiʋuya kushanyira Soromoni, kuzonzwa kuŋgwara kwake, kwakaŋga kwaiswa naMŋari mumŋoyo make.
Mumŋe nomumŋe waiʋuya necipo cake cemidziyo yesirveri, nemidziyo yendarama, nehanzu, nenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo, neɀinonhuwira, namabiza, namahesera, gore rimŋe nerimŋe.
Soromoni wakaŋga aneɀidyiro ɀamabiza neŋgoro, ɀineɀuru ɀinna, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, ɀaakaisa pamaguta eŋgoro, nokunamambo paJerusarema.
Akaɓata ʋushe bgamadzimambo ose, kubva paRwizi kuȿikira panyika yaʋaFiristia, nokumuganho weEgipita.
Mambo akaʋuŋganidza sirveri paJerusarema ikawanda ikaita samabge, nemisidari ikaita semiʋonde yaiʋa pamapani.
Ʋakandotorera Soromoni mabiza paEgipita, nokunyika dzose.

Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aSoromoni, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, haana‐kunyorwa here pabuku yomuprofita Natani, napamashoko akaprofitiwa naAhiya muShironi, napaneɀakaʋonekwa nomuʋoni Ido pamsoro paJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati?
Soromoni akaɓata ʋushe bgaʋaIsraeri ʋose paJerusarema makore anamakumi manna.
Ipapo Soromoni akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa muguta raDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake, Rehoboami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino Rehoboami wakaenda Shekemi, nokuti ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana paShekemi kuzomuita mambo.
Ɀino Jeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, wakati aciɀinzwa, (nokuti wakaŋga aciri Egipita kwaakaŋga atizira nokuɗa kwaSoromoni,) Jeroboami ndokudzoka acibva Egipita.
Ʋakatuma
Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakatitakudza joko rinogozha; naiɀoɀo ɀino imi cirerusai ɓasa raɓaɓa ʋenyu rakaŋga ricigozha, nejoko raʋo rinorema raʋakaisa pamsoro peɗu, tigokushumirai.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Dzokerai ɀe kwandiri kana mazuʋa matatu apera. Ʋanhu ʋakaenda.
Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akaraŋgana naʋakuru, ʋaimira pamberi paSoromoni ɓaɓa ʋake, ʋaciri ʋapenyu, akati: Muŋgandipa zano reiko, randiŋgapindura ʋanhu aʋa naro?
Iʋo ʋakataura kwaari, ʋakati: Kana mukaitira ʋanhu aʋa nomŋoyo wakanaka, nokuʋafadza, nokutaura mashoko akanaka kwaʋari, ipapo ʋacaʋa ʋaranda ʋenyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi iye wakaramba zano raʋakuru, raʋakamupa, akaraŋgana namajaya ezero rake, akaŋga acimira pamberi pake.
Akati kwaʋari: Imi muŋgandipa zano reiko, ratiŋgapindura naro ʋanhu aʋa ʋakataura neni, ʋaciti: Rerusai joko rakaiswa pamsoro peɗu naɓaɓa ʋenyu?

Ɀino majaya ezero rake akataura kwaari, akati: Iti kuʋanhu aʋa ʋakataura newe, ʋaciti: Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋakatitakudza joko rinogozha, asi imi citirerusirai iro, utaure kwaʋari uti: Munwe waŋgu muɗuku mukobvu kupfuʋura ciʋuno caɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ɀino, ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ɀaʋakakutakudzai joko rinorema, ini ndicawedzera pajoko renyu; ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaikuroʋai neshamhu, asi ini ndicakuroʋai neɀinyaʋaɗa.
Naiɀoɀo Jeroboami naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaȿika kunaRehoboami nezuʋa retatu, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa namambo, aciti: Dzokerai kwandiri ɀe nezuʋa retatu.
Mambo akaʋapindura nehasha; mambo Rehoboami akarasha zano raʋakuru,
akataura kwaʋari seɀaakaŋga apiwa zano namajaya, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakakutakudzai joko rinorema, asi ini ndicawedzera pajoko renyu; ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaikuroʋai neshamhu, asi ini ndicakuroʋai neɀinyaʋaɗa.
Naiɀoɀo mambo haana‐kuterera ʋanhu; nokuti ɀakaŋga ɀabva kunaMŋari, kuti Jehova asimbise shoko rake, raakataura naAhija muShiro kunaJeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati.

Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti mambo haana‐kuʋaterera, ʋanhu ʋakapindura mambo, ʋakati: Tinomugoʋe weiko kunaDavidi? Ʋuye hatinenhaka kumŋanakomana weJese; endai henyu munhu mumŋe nomumŋe kutente rake, imi Israeri! Ɀino Davidi, citarira hako imba yako. Naiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaenda kumatente aʋo.
Asi kana ʋari ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumaguta aJuda, Rehoboami waiʋa mambo waʋo.
Ɀino mambo Rehoboami akatuma Hadorami mutariri waʋanhu ʋecibaro, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakamutaka namabge, akafa. Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akacimbidzika kukwira ŋgoro yake, akatizira Jerusarema.
Saiɀoɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋakamukira imba yaDavidi kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.

Ɀino Rehoboami wakati aciȿika Jerusarema, akaʋuŋganidza ʋeimba yaJuda naBenjamini, ʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋaiʋa neɀuru ɀinezana namakumi masere, ʋaigona kurwa, kuti ʋarwe naʋaIsraeri, kuti ʋadzosere ʋushe ɀe kunaRehoboami.
Asi shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaShemaya munhu waMŋari, riciti:
Taura naRehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni, mambo waJuda, naʋaIsraeri ʋose paJuda naBenjamini, uti:

Ɀanzi naJehova: Hamufaniri kukwira kundorwa nehama dzenyu; mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaadzokere kumba kwake, nokuti cinhu ici cinobva kwandiri. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaterera mashoko aJehova, ʋakadzoka pakundorwa naJeroboami.
Rehoboami akagara Jerusarema, akaʋaka maguta enhare paJuda.
Akaʋaka Beti‐rehemi, neEtami, neTekoa,
neBeti‐zuri, neSoko, neAdurami,
neGati, neMaresha, neZifi,
neAdoraimi, neRakishi, neAzeka,
neZora, neAjaroni, neHebroni, akaŋga ari maguta akakombga paJuda neBenjamini.
Akasimbisa nhare, akaisa’mo ʋakuru, neɀokudya ɀakaʋuŋganidzwa’mo, namafuta, newaini.
Muguta rimŋe nerimŋe akaisa nhoʋo namapfumo, akaasimbisa kwaɀo kwaɀo. Juda naBenjamini ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋake.
Naʋaprista naʋaRevi, ʋaiʋa pakati paIsraeri yose, ʋakaʋuŋgana kwaari, ʋacibva panyika yaʋo yose.
Nokuti ʋaRevi ʋakabva pamafuro aʋo nefuma yaʋo, ʋakaenda kwaJuda neJerusarema; nokuti Jeroboami naʋanakomana ʋake ʋakaʋadziŋga, kuti ʋarege kuɓate‐ɓasa roʋuprista pamberi paJehova.
Iye akaɀitsaurira ʋaprista ʋapamatunhu akakwirira,
Ɀino ʋose pakati pamarudzi ose aʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋacitȿaka Jehova nomŋoyo wose, ʋakaʋateʋera, ʋakaenda Jerusarema kuzoɓayira Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Saiɀoɀo ʋakasimbisa ʋushe bgaJuda, ʋakasimbisa Rehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni, makore matatu; nokuti ʋakafamba panzira yaDavidi naSoromoni makore matatu.
Rehoboami akawana mukadzi, Maharati mukunda waJerimoti mŋanakomana waDavidi, nowaAbihairi mukunda waEriabi mŋanakomana waJese.
Iye akamuɓerekera ʋanakomana, ʋaiti: Jeushi, naShamaria, naZahami.
Pashure wakawana ʋo Maaka mukunda waAbsaromi; iye akamuɓerekera Abija, naAtai, naZiza, naSheromiti.

Rehoboami akaɗa Maaka mukunda waAbsaromi kupfuʋura ʋakadzi ʋake ʋose naʋaroŋgo ʋake; (nokuti wakawana ʋakadzi ʋanegumi naʋasere naʋaroŋgo ʋanamakumi matanhatu, akaɓereka ʋanakomana ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋasere naʋanasikana ʋanamakumi matanhatu.)
Rehoboami akagadza Abija mŋanakomana waMaaka aʋe mukuru nomucinda pakati paʋana ʋaɓaɓa ʋake; nokuti wakaŋga aciɗa kumuita mambo.
Akaita nokuŋgwara, akaparadzira ʋanakomana ʋake ʋose panyika dzose dzaJuda naBenjamini kumaguta ose enhare; akaʋapa ɀokudya ɀakawanda. Akaʋatȿakira ʋo ʋakadzi ʋazhinji.
Ɀino ʋushe bgaRehoboami bgakati bgasimbiswa, iye aʋa nesimba, akarasha murairo waJehova, naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamŋe cete naye.
Ɀino pagore recishanu ramambo Rehoboami, Shishaki mambo weEgipita akaȿika kuzorwa neJerusarema, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋatadzira Jehova,
aneŋgoro dzinecuru cimŋe namazana maʋiri, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi matanhatu, naʋanhu ʋakabva naye Egipita, ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa,
Akakunda maguta akakombga aJuda, akaȿika Jerusarema.

Ɀino Shemaya muprofita akaȿika kunaRehoboami nokumacinda aJuda akaŋga akaʋuŋgana paJerusarema nemhaka yaShishaki, akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Mandirasha, saka ndakakuregerai ʋo paruʋoko rwaShishaki.
Ipapo macinda aIsraeri namambo ʋakaɀininipisa, ʋakati: Jehova wakarurama.

Ɀino Jehova wakati aciʋona kuti ʋaɀininipisa, shoko raJehova rikaȿika kunaShemaya, riciti: Ʋaɀininipisa, handiŋgaʋaparadzi, asi ndobva ndoʋarwira; kutsamŋa kwaŋgu hakuŋgaɗururwi pamsoro peJerusarema noruʋoko rwaShishaki.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋacaʋa ʋaranda ʋake; kuti ʋaziʋe kuti ɀakaɗini kundishumira ini nokushumira ʋushe bgenyika dzimŋe.
Naiɀoɀo Shishaki mambo weEgipita wakandorwa neJerusarema, akatora fuma yeimba yaJehova, nefuma yeimba yamambo; akaɀitora ɀose; akatora ʋo nhoʋo ɗuku dzose dzendarama dzakaitwa naSoromoni.
Ipapo mambo Rehoboami akaita panɀimbo yaɀo nhoʋo ɗuku dzendarira, akadziisa pamaʋoko aʋakuru ʋaʋarindi, ʋairinda mukoʋa weimba yamambo.
Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana mambo acipinda mumba maJehova, ʋarindi ʋaidziɓata, ndokudzidzosera ɀe mumba maʋarindi.
Ɀino wakati aɀininipisa, kutsamŋa kwaJehova kukabviswa kwaari, akasaparadzwa cose; ʋuye ɀe, kunaJuda ɀimŋe ɀakanaka ɀakawanikwa.

Nokuɗaro mambo Rehoboami wakaɀisimbisa paJerusarema, akaɓata ʋushe; nokuti Rehoboami wakaŋga anamakore makumi manna nerimŋe pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namanomŋe, iro guta rakaŋga ratsaurwa naJehova pamarudzi ose aIsraeri, kuti aise zita rake’mo; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Naama muAmoni.
Akaita ɀakaipa, nokuti haana‐kushiŋgaira kutȿaka Jehova.

Ɀino maɓasa aRehoboami, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, haana‐kunyorwa here mumashoko omuprofita Shemaya, noomuʋoni Ido, mazita amadziteteguru aciʋereŋgwa ʋo? Ɀino kurwa kwakaŋga kuri’po pakati paRehoboami naJeroboami ŋguʋa dzose.
Rehoboami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa muguta raDavidi; Abija mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Pagore regumi namasere ramambo Jeroboami, Abija wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe bgaJuda.
Akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore matatu; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Mikaya, mukunda waUrieri weGibea. Kurwa kukaʋa’po pakati paAbija naJeroboami.

Abija akarwa anehondo yaʋarwi dzaiʋa mhare, ʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana manna; Jeroboami ʋo akagadzira hondo kuzorwa naye, anaʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana masere, ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare.
Abija akamira pamsoro pegomo rainzi Zemaraimi, raiʋa panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, akati: Ndinzwei, Jeroboami naʋaIsraeri ʋose:
Ko hamufaniri kuziʋa here kuti Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri wakapa Davidi ʋushe bgaIsraeri nokusiŋgaperi, iye naʋanakomana ʋake nesuŋgano yomunyu?
Asi Jeroboami mŋanakomana waNebati, muranda waSoromoni mŋanakomana waDavidi, wakasimuka akamukira ishe wake.
Kukaʋuŋganira kwaari ʋanhu ʋakaipa, ʋakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋakaɀisimbisa kundorwa naRehoboami mŋanakomana waSoromoni, iye Rehoboami aciri muɗuku anomŋoyo unotya, asiŋgagoni kurwa naʋo.
Ɀino munoɗa kurwa noʋushe bgaJehova ʋuri mumaʋoko aʋanakomana ʋaDavidi; ɀamuri ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji, munemhuru dzendarama dzakaitwa naJeroboami kuti ʋaʋe ʋamŋari ʋenyu.
Hamuna‐kudziŋga here ʋaprista ʋaJehova, ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, naʋaRevi, imi mukaɀitsaurira ʋaprista netsika dzaʋanhu
Asi kana tiri’su, Jehova ndiMŋari weɗu, hatina‐kumurasha; isu tinaʋaprista ʋanoshumira Jehova, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, naʋaRevi pamaɓasa aʋo;
ndiʋo ʋanopisira Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀinonhuwira maŋgwanani ose namaɗekwana ose; neɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza

Ɀino tarirai, Mŋari unesu acitituŋgamirira, naʋaprista ʋake ʋanehwamanda dzokuridza nadzo, kuti ʋakuridzirei mhere imi. Nhandi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, regai kurwa naJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu; nokuti hamuŋgakundi.
Asi Jeroboami wakaisa ʋaʋandiri kuti ʋaʋakombe neceshure kwaʋo; ɀino iʋo ʋakaʋa pamberi paJuda, naʋaʋandiri ʋakaŋga ʋari shure kwaʋo.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati ʋaciceuka, ʋakaʋona kurwa mberi kwaʋo neshure kwaʋo; ʋakacema kunaJehova, ʋaprista ʋakaridza hwamanda.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋaJuda ʋakaridza mhere; ʋakati ʋaridza mhere, Mŋari akaparadza Jeroboami naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamberi paAbija naJuda.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatiza pamberi paJuda, Mŋari akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋo.
Abija naʋanhu ʋake ʋakaʋaʋuraya nokuʋuraya kukuru; naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana mashanu ʋakaʋurawa pakati paIsraeri.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakamanikidzwa saiɀoɀo neŋguʋa iyo, ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakakunda, nokuti ʋakaʋimba naJehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Abija akateʋerera Jeroboami, akamutorera maguta, aiti: Beti‐eri nemisha yaro, neJeshana nemisha yaro, neEfroni nemisha yaro.
Jeroboami haana‐kuzoʋa nesimba ɀe pamazuʋa aAbija; Jehova ndokumuroʋa, akafa.
Asi Abija wakaɀisimbisa, akawana ʋakadzi ʋanegumi naʋanna, akaɓereka ʋanakomana ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri, naʋanasikana ʋanegumi naʋatanhatu.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAbija, netsika dzake, namashoko ake, ɀakanyorwa paɗudziro yomuprofita Ido.
Ɀino Abija wakaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa muguta raDavidi; Asa mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe; pamazuʋa ake nyika yakaŋga inorugare makore anegumi.
Asa akaita ɀakanaka neɀakarurama pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake.
Nokuti wakabvisa artari
akaraira ʋaJuda kuti ʋatȿake Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, nokuceŋgeta murau nomurairo.
Akabvisa ʋo pamaguta ose aʋaJuda matunhu akakwirira neɀifananidzo ɀezuʋa; ʋushe ʋukaʋa norugare iye ari mambo.
Akaʋaka maguta akakombga paJuda; nokuti nyika yakaŋga inorugare, wakaŋga asina‐kurwa pamakore iwayo; nokuti Jehova wakaŋga amuzorodza.

Nokuti wakati kuʋaJuda: Ŋgatiʋake maguta iwayo, tiapoteredze namaȿiŋgo, neshoŋgwe, namasuʋo, namazariro; nyika iciri pamberi peɗu, nokuti takatȿaka Jehova Mŋari weɗu; takamutȿaka, akatizorodza pamatiʋi ose. Ipapo ʋakaʋaka, ʋakagara ɀakanaka.

Asa wakaŋga anehondo yaʋaJuda, ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana matatu, ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhoʋo huru namapfumo; neyaʋaBenjamini ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri namakumi masere, ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhoʋo ʋaifura noʋuta; aʋa ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare.
Ɀino Zera muEtiopia wakaʋuya kuzorwa naʋo nehondo yaʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀeɀuru, neŋgoro dzinamazana matatu; akaȿika Maresha.
Ipapo Asa akaɓuɗa kuzorwa naye, ʋakagadzira kuzorwa pamupata weZefata paMaresha.

Asa akacema kunaJehova Mŋari wake, akati: Jehova hakuna‐uŋgaɓatsira usinesimba kurwa nounesimba, asi imi moga; tiɓatsirei Jehova Mŋari weɗu; nokuti tinoʋimba nemi, taȿika kuzorwa naʋazhinji aʋa nezita renyu. Imi Jehova, ndimi Mŋari weɗu; munhu ŋgaarege kukukundai imi.
Ipapo Jehova akaparadza ʋaEtiopia pamberi paAsa, napamberi paʋaJuda, ʋaEtiopia ʋakatiza.

Asa naʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo ʋakaʋateʋerera kuȿikira paGerari; ʋaEtiopia ʋakaʋurawa ʋazhinji, ʋakakoniwa kuzosimba ɀe; nokuti ʋakaparadzwa pamberi peJehova napamberi pehondo yake; ʋakaenda neɀizhinji kwaɀo ɀaʋakapamba.
Ʋakaparadza maguta ose akapoteredza Gerari; nokuti ʋakavunduswa naJehova; ʋakapamba maguta ose, nokuti kwakaŋga kuneɀiŋgapambga ɀizhinji maari.
Ʋakaparadza ʋo matente eɀipfuwo, ʋakatapa makwai mazhinji namakamera, ndokudzokera Jerusarema.
Ɀino Mŋeya waMŋari wakaʋuya pamsoro paAzaria mŋanakomana waOdedi;
akaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naAsa, akati kwaari: Nditererei imi, Asa naʋaJuda naʋaBenjamini mose; Jehova unemi, kana imi munaye; kana mukamutȿaka, ucawanikwa nemi; asi kana mukamurasha, iye ucakurashai ʋo.
Ɀino ŋguʋa huru ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋasinaMŋari waɀokwaɗi, kana muprista unodzidzisa, kana murairo;
asi ʋakati ʋacitendeʋukira kunaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri pakutambudzika kwaʋo, nokumutȿaka, iye akawanikwa naʋo.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo waiɓuɗa nowaipinda ʋakaŋga ʋasinorugare, asi ʋanhu ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika idzo, ʋaiʋa pakutambudzika kukuru.
Ʋaiparadzana, rumŋe rudzi ruciparadza rumŋe, rimŋe guta riciparadza rimŋe; nokuti Mŋari waiʋatambudza nenhamo dzose.
Asi iʋai nesimba, maʋoko enyu ŋgaarege kushaiwa simba; nokuti ɓasa renyu ricapiwa muɓairo.

Ɀino Asa wakati acinzwa mashoko awa, neɀakaprofitiwa nomuprofita Odedi, ndokutsuŋga mŋoyo, akabvisa ɀainyaŋgadza panyika yose yaJuda naBenjamini, napamaguta aakaŋga akunda panyika yamakomo yaEfraimi; akaʋandudza artari yaJehova, yakaŋga iri pamberi peɓiraʋira raJehova.

Ipapo akaʋuŋganidza ʋaJuda, naʋaBenjamini ʋose, naʋatorwa ʋakaŋga ʋagere pakati paʋo ʋaibva kunaEfraimi, naManase, naSimeoni; nokuti ʋazhinji ʋaibva kunaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya kwaari, pakuʋona kwaʋo kuti Jehova Mŋari wake unaye.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋuŋgana paJerusarema nomŋedzi wecitatu, negore regumi namashanu rokuɓata ʋushe kwaAsa.
Ʋakaɓayira Jehova zuʋa irero ɀimŋe ɀaʋakaŋga ʋapamba ʋakaʋuya naɀo,
Ʋakaɀisuŋga kutȿaka Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo nemŋoyo yaʋo yose ʋuye nemŋeya yaʋo yose;
ʋuye kuti aninani usiŋgatȿaki Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri aʋurawe, kana ari muɗuku kana ari mukuru, kana mukadzi kana murume.
Ʋakapika kunaJehova nenzwi guru, nokupururudza, nehwamanda ʋuye nemimanzu.
ƲaJuda ʋose ʋakafara nokupika uku; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋapika nemŋoyo yaʋo yose, nokumutȿaka nokuɗa kwaʋo kwose; iye akawanikwa naʋo; Jehova ndokuʋapa zororo kumatiʋi ose.
Akabvisa ʋo Maaka mai ʋamambo Asa, paʋuhosi bgaʋo; nokuti wakaŋga aitira Ashera cifananidzo cinonyaŋgadza; Asa akaparadza cifananidzo cake, akacikuyakuya, ndokucipisa parukoʋa Kidroni.
Asi matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa pakati paIsraeri; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mŋoyo waAsa wakaŋga wakarurama kwaɀo mazuʋa ake ose.
Akaisa mumba maMŋari ɀinhu ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurirwa
Kurwa hakuna‐kuzoʋa’po kuȿikira pagore ramakumi matatu namashanu rokuɓata ʋushe kwaAsa.
Ɀino negore ramakumi matatu namatanhatu rokuɓata ʋushe kwaAsa, Baasha mambo waIsraeri akakwira kundorwa naJuda, akaʋaka Rama, kuti arege kutendera munhu kuɓuɗa kana kupinda kunaAsa mambo waJuda.
Ipapo Asa akaɓuɗisa sirveri nendarama muɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yeimba yaJehova neimba yamambo, akatuma
Suŋgano iri’po pakati paŋgu nemi, seɀayakaʋa’po pakati paɓaɓa ʋaŋgu naɓaɓa ʋenyu; tarirai, ndinokutumirai sirveri nendarama; endai muputse suŋgano yenyu naBaasha mambo waIsraeri, abve kwandiri.
Beni‐hadadi akaterera mambo Asa, akatuma ʋakuru ʋehondo dzake kundorwa namaguta aIsraeri, akakunda Ijoni, neDani, neAberi‐maimi, namaguta ose amatura aNaftari.
Ɀino Baasha wakati aciɀinzwa, akarega kuʋaka Rama, akarega ɓasa rake.
Ipapo mambo Asa akatora ʋaJuda ʋose; ʋakandobvisa mabge eRama, namatanda aro, ɀaakaŋga aʋaka naɀo iye Baasha, akaʋaka naɀo Geba neMizpa.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo muʋoni Hanani akaȿika kunaAsa mambo waJuda, akati kwaari: Ɀawakaʋimba namambo weSiria, ukasaʋimba naJehova Mŋari wako, ɀino hondo yamambo weSiria yapukunyuka paruʋoko rwako.
Ko ʋaEtiopia naʋaRubimi ʋakaŋga ʋasi hondo huru‐huru, ʋaneŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋazhinji here? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ɀawakaʋimba naJehova, iye wakaʋaisa muruʋoko rwako.
Nokuti meso aJehova anotarira‐tarira kumatiʋi ose enyika yose, kuti aratidze simba rake kunaiye unomŋoyo wakarurama kwaɀo kwaari. Pacinhu ici waita seɓenzi; nokuti kubva ɀino ucaʋiŋgwa nokurwa.
Ipapo Asa akatsamŋira muʋoni, akamuisa mutoroŋgo; nokuti wakaŋga amutsamŋira kwaɀo nokuɗa kwecinhu ici. Neŋguʋa iyo Asa akatambudza ʋo ʋamŋe ʋanhu.
Ɀino tarirai, maɓasa aAsa, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, akanyorwa mubuku yamadzimambo aJuda naaIsraeri.
Asi pagore ramakumi matatu namapfumbamŋe rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, Asa akazonzwa makumbo; ʋurwere bgake ʋukanyanya kwaɀo; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, paʋurwere bgake haana‐kutȿaka Jehova, asi ŋaŋga.
Asa akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akafa negore ramakumi manna nerimŋe rokuɓata kwake ʋushe.

Ʋakamuʋiga pamabgiro ake, aakaŋga aɀiʋezera muguta raDavidi, ʋakamuradzika panhoʋo dzizere neɀinonhuwira ɀamarudzi mazhinji, ɀakaŋga ɀagadzirwa naʋaiti ʋeɀinonhuwira ʋakaŋgwara; ʋakamupisira ɀizhinji‐zhinji.
Ɀino Jehoshafati mŋanakomana wake akaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake, akaɀisimbisa kundorwa naʋaIsraeri.
Akaisa ʋarwi mumaguta ose akakombga aJuda, akaisa ʋo mapoka aʋarwi panyika yaJuda, napamaguta aEfraimi, akaŋga akundwa naAsa ɓaɓa ʋake.
Jehova akaʋa naJehoshafati, nokuti wakafamba munzira dzokutaŋga dzaɓaɓa ʋake Davidi; haana‐kundobvunza ʋaBaari;
asi wakabvunza Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋake, akafamba nemirairo yake, asiŋgateʋeri maɓasa aIsraeri.
Saka Jehova wakasimbisa ʋushe paruʋoko rwake; ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaʋigira Jehoshafati ɀipo, akaʋa nefuma nokukudzwa ɀizhinji.
Mŋoyo wake ukashiŋgairira nzira dzaJehova; ʋuye wakabvisa ʋo matunhu akakwirira namatanda okunamata nawo pakati paJuda.
Ʋuye pagore recitatu rokuɓata kwake ʋushe wakatuma macinda ake, ʋanaBeni‐hairi, naObadia, naZekaria, naNetaneri, naMikaya, kundodzidzisa mumaguta aJuda;

ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo ʋaRevi, ʋanaShemaya, naNetania, naZebadia, naAsaheri, naShemiramoti, naJehonatani, naAdonija, naTobija, naTobi‐adonija, ʋari ʋaRevi; ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo Erishama naJehorami, ʋaprista.
Ʋakandodzidzisa pakati paJuda, ʋanebuku yomurairo waJehova; ʋakafamba ʋacipota namaguta ose aJuda, ʋacidzidzisa pakati paʋanhu.
Ʋushe bgose bgenyika dzose dzakaŋga dzakapoteredza Juda, ʋakavunduswa naJehova, ʋakasarwa naJehoshafati.
Ʋamŋe ʋaFiristia ʋakaʋigira Jehoshafati ɀipo, nesirveri yomutero; ʋaArabia ʋo ʋakamuʋigira makwai, makondobge aneɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana manomŋe, nenhoŋgo dzembudzi dzineɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana manomŋe.
Jehoshafati akazoʋa mukuru kwaɀo, akaʋaka pakati paJuda nhare namaguta amatura.
Waiʋa namaɓasa mazhinji mumaguta aJuda, naʋarwi, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare paJerusarema.
Ɀino ndiwo mazita aʋo nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo: Pakati paJuda, ʋakuru ʋeɀuru: Adna mukuru, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana matatu;
teʋere Jehohanani mukuru, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri namakumi masere;
teʋere Amasia mŋanakomana waZikri, wakaɀipa kunaJehova nomŋoyo wake wose; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri;
pakati paʋaBenjamini: Eriada munhu unesimba noʋumhare, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓata ʋuta nenhoʋo;
teʋere Jehozabadi, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi masere, ʋakaŋga ʋakaɀigadzirira kurwa.
Ndiʋo ʋaiɓatira mambo, ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋaiswa namambo mumaguta akakombga panyika yose yaJuda ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Ɀino Jehoshafati wakaŋga anefuma zhinji nokukudzwa kukuru; akawanirana ʋo naAhabi.
Ɀino mamŋe makore akati apfuʋura, iye akaɓurukira Samaria kunaAhabi. Ahabi akamuʋurayira iye naʋanhu ʋaakaŋga anaʋo makwai nenzombe zhinji, akamukurudzira kuenda
Ipapo Ahabi mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati mambo waJuda: Mucaenda neni Ramoti‐gireadi here? Iye akapindura, akati: Ini ndakaita sewe, naʋanhu ʋaŋgu saʋanhu ʋako; ticaenda newe kundorwa.
Jehoshafati akati kunamambo waIsraeri: ɗombobvunza hako shoko raJehova nhasi.

Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akaʋuŋganidza ʋaprofita, ʋarume ʋaiʋa namazana manna, akati kwaʋari: Tiende kundorwa neRamoti‐gireadi here, kana ndirege? Iʋo ʋakati: Endai, nokuti Mŋari ucariisa mumaʋoko amambo.
Asi Jehoshafati akati: Hakucina‐mumŋe muprofita waJehova pano here, timubvunze?

Mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Mumŋe murume uci’ko, watiŋgabvunza kuɗa kwaJehova naye, asi ini ndinomuʋeŋga, nokuti haatoŋgoprofiti ɀakanaka pamsoro paŋgu, asi mazuʋa ose ɀakaipa; ndiye Mikaya mŋanakomana waImra. Jehoshafati akati: Mambo ŋgaarege kuɗaro.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akaɗana muranda, akati: Kurumidza undotora Mikaya mŋanakomana waImra.

Ɀino mambo waIsraeri naJehoshafati mambo waJuda ʋakaŋga ʋagere mumŋe nomumŋe pacigaro cake coʋushe, ʋagere ʋakafuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzoʋushe paɗare pasuʋo reSamaria; ʋaprofita ʋose ʋakaprofita pamberi paʋo.
Zedekia mŋanakomana waKenaani akaɀiitira nyaŋga dzamatare, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Nedzidzi mucatuŋga ʋaSiria, kuȿikira ʋapera.
Naʋamŋe ʋaprofita ʋose ʋakaprofita saiɀoɀo, ʋakati: Endai Ramoti‐gireadi, mucakunda, nokuti Jehova ucariisa paruʋoko rwamambo.
Ɀino nhume yakaŋga yandoɗana Mikaya yakataura kwaari, ikati: Tarirai, mashoko aʋaprofita anobvumirana acitaura ɀakanaka kunamambo; ɀino ndinokumbira kuti shoko renyu riʋe se
Ipapo Mikaya akati: NaJehova mupenyu, iɀo ɀinorebga naMŋari waŋgu, ndiɀo ɀandicataura.
Ɀino wakati aciȿika kunamambo, mambo akati kwaari: Mikaya, tiende kundorwa neRamoti‐gireadi here, kana ndirege? Iye akati: Endai henyu, mucakunda; ʋacaiswa muruʋoko rwenyu.
Mambo akati kwaari: Ndinofanira kukupikisa kaŋgani here, kuti undiʋudze ɀokwaɗi yoga nezita raJehova?
Iye akati: Ndakaʋona ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakapararira pamakomo samakwai asino‐mufudzi; Jehova akati: Aʋa haʋanatenzi, mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaadzokere kumusha kwake norugare.
Mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Handina‐kukuʋudza here, kuti haaŋgaprofiti ɀakanaka pamsoro paŋgu, asi ɀakaipa?
akati: Ɀino cinzwai shoko raJehova: Ndakaʋona Jehova agere pacigaro cake coʋushe, nehondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzimire kurudyi rwake nokuruɓoshwe rwake.
Ipapo Jehova akati: Ndianiko ucandonyeŋgera Ahabi, aende, andoʋurawa paRamoti‐gireadi? Ɀino mumŋe akataura aciti ɀokuti, nomumŋe ɀe akati ɀokuti.
Ɀino mŋeya ukaɓuɗa, ukamira pamberi paJehova, ukati: Ini ndicandomunyeŋgera. Jehova akati kwauri: Neiko?
Iwo ukati: Ndicaenda, ndicaʋa mŋeya wenhema mumiromo yaʋaprofita ʋake ʋose. Iye akati: Iwe ndiwe ucamunyeŋgera, ucakunda ʋo; enda hako, undoita saiɀoɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, tarirai Jehova wakaisa mŋeya wenhema mumiromo yaʋaprofita ʋenyu aʋa ʋose, asi Jehova wakataura ɀakaipa pamsoro penyu.
Ipapo Zedekia mŋanakomana waKenaani akasweɗera, akaroʋa Mikaya paɗama rake, akati: Mŋeya waJehova wakaenda nepiko ucibva kwandiri kundotaura newe?
Mikaya akati: Ucaɀiʋona musi uyo waucandoʋanda nawo mukamuri yomukati.
Ipapo mambo waIsraeri akati: Ƃatai Mikaya, mumuise kunaAmoni muɓati weguta, nokunaJoashi mŋanakomana wamambo,
muti: Ɀanzi namambo: Pinzai munhu uyu mutoroŋgo, mumupe ɀokudya ɀokutambudzika, nemvura yokutambudzika, kuȿikira ndicidzoka norugare.
Ipapo Mikaya akati: Kana mukatoŋgodzoka norugare, Jehova haana‐kutaura neni. Akati: Inzwai, imi ʋanhu, imi mose.
Naiɀoɀo mambo waIsraeri naJehoshafati mambo waJuda ʋakaenda Ramoti‐gireadi.
Ɀino mambo waIsraeri akati kunaJehoshafati: Ini ndicaɀishandura, ndigondorwa; asi iwe cifuka ŋguʋo dzako dzoʋushe. Mambo waIsraeri akaɀishandura, ʋakandorwa.
Ɀino mambo weSiria wakaŋga araira ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro dzake, akati: Regai kurwa naʋaɗuku kana naʋakuru, asi namambo waIsraeri oga.

Ɀino ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro ʋakati ʋaciʋona Jehoshafati, ʋakati: Ndiye mambo waIsraeri. Naiɀoɀo ʋakatsaukira kundorwa naye; asi Jehoshafati wakaridza mhere, Jehova akamuɓatsira; Mŋari akaʋakurudzira kumurega.
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋeŋgoro ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti haazi mambo waIsraeri, ʋakadzoka pakumuteʋera.

Ɀino mumŋe murume akawembura ʋuta bgake asiŋgashumbi hake, akafura mambo waIsraeri pakati peɀisuŋgo ɀeŋguʋo dzake dzokurwa nadzo; ipapo mambo akati kumufambisi weŋgoro: Dzoka, undiise kunze kwehondo, nokuti ndakuʋadzwa kwaɀo.
Kurwa kukanyanya kwaɀo nomusi uyo; asi mambo waIsraeri wakaɀitsigira muŋgoro yake akarwa naʋaSiria kuȿikira maɗekwana; ɀino paŋguʋa yokuʋira kwezuʋa akafa.
Ɀino Jehoshafati mambo waJuda wakadzokera norugare kumusha kwake paJerusarema.
Ipapo Jehu mŋanakomana womuʋoni Hanani akaenda kundosoŋgana naye, akati kunamambo Jehoshafati: Ɀakanaka kuɓatsira ʋakaipa, nokuɗa ʋanoʋeŋga Jehova here? Nokuɗa kwecinhu ici Jehova wakutsamŋirai.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ɀimŋe ɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀakawanikwa kwamuri, nokuti makabvisa Asheroti panyika, mukatȿaka Mŋari nomŋoyo wose.
Jehoshafati akagara paJerusarema, akaɓuɗa ɀe pakati paʋanhu kubva paBeeri‐sheba kuȿikira kunyika yamakomo yaEfraimi, akaʋadzosera ɀe kunaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Akagadza ʋatoŋgi panyika pamaguta ose akakombga aJuda, guta rimŋe nerimŋe;
akati kuʋatoŋgi: Cenjerai ɀamunoita; nokuti hamutoŋgeri ʋanhu imi asi Jehova; iye unemi pakutoŋga kwenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino kutya Jehova ŋgakuʋe nemi; cenjerai, muɀiite, nokuti kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu hakuneɀakaipa, kana kutsaura ʋanhu, kana kugamucira fufuro.
Jehoshafati wakaisa ʋo paJerusarema ʋamŋe ʋaRevi naʋaprista, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aIsraeri, kuzotoŋga ɀinhu ɀaJehova nemhaka dzenharo. Ipapo ʋakadzokera Jerusarema.
Akaʋaraira, aciti: Ndiɀo ɀamunofanira kuita mucitya Jehova, makatendeka, munemŋoyo yakarurama.

Ɀino kana mhaka yenharo ikaȿika kwamuri icibva kuhama dzenyu dzigere pamaguta aʋo, kana riri shoko rokuʋurayana, kana romurau kana murairo, kana ɀakatemŋa kana ɀakatoŋgwa, munofanira kuʋanyeʋera kuti ʋarege kupara mhaka panaJehova, kuti murege kutsamŋirwa imi nehama dzenyu; itai iɀoɀo, mugorega kuʋa nemhoȿa.

Ɀino tarirai, Amaria muprista mukuru ucakurairai pamashoko ose aJehova; naZebadia mŋanakomana waIshmaeri, mutariri weimba yaJuda, pamashoko ose amambo; naʋaRevi ʋacaʋa ʋatariri ʋenyu. Itai nesimba, Jehova aʋe naʋakanaka.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋamŋe ʋaʋaAmoni pamŋe cete naʋo, ʋakaȿika kuzorwa naJehoshafati.
Ipapo ʋamŋe ʋakaȿika, ʋakaʋudza Jehoshafati, ʋaciti: Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanoʋuya, ʋacibva Siria mhiri kweguŋgwa, kuzorwa nemi; tarirai, ʋari paHazazoni‐tamari (ndiro Enigedi).
Ipapo Jehoshafati akatya, akashiŋgaira kundobvunza Jehova; akatara zuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya panyika yose yaʋaJuda.
ƲaJuda ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzotȿaka ɓetsero kunaJehova; ʋakabva kumaguta ose aJuda kuzotȿaka Jehova.
Jehoshafati akasimuka paʋuŋgano yaʋaJuda na
akati: Haiwa, Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu, imi hamuzi Mŋari uri kuɗeŋga here? Imi hamuzi muɓati woʋushe bgose bgendudzi here? Paruʋoko rwenyu panesimba noʋushe, naiɀoɀo hapanomunhu uŋgakudziʋisai.
Imi Mŋari weɗu, hamuna‐kudziŋga here ʋaigara panyika ino pamberi paʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri, mukaipa ʋana ʋaAbrahama shamŋari yenyu nokusiŋgaperi?
Ʋakagara’mo, ʋakakuʋakirai’mo imba tȿene yezita renyu, ʋaciti:

Kana tikawirwa neɀakaipa, kana munondo wokutoŋga, kana ɗenda, kana nzara, ticamira pamberi peimba ino napamberi penyu, (nokuti zita renyu riri muimba ino), tigocema kwamuri tiri pakutambudzika kweɗu; ipapo mucatinzwa nokutirwira.
Ɀino tarirai ʋana ʋaAmoni naʋaMoabi naʋapagomo reSeiri, ʋamusina‐kutendera ʋaIsraeri kupinda pakati paʋo ŋguʋa yaʋakabva panyika yeEgipita, asi ʋakaʋarega, ʋakasaʋaparadza;
tarirai ʋotitsiʋa, ʋaciʋuya kuzotidziŋga panyika yenyu, yamakatipa iʋe nhaka yeɗu.
Haiwa, Mŋari weɗu, hamuŋgaʋatoŋgi here? Nokuti hatinesimba rokurwa naʋazhinji aʋa ʋanoʋuya kuzorwa nesu; hatiziʋi catiŋgaita, asi meso eɗu akatarira kwamuri.
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakamira pamberi paJehova, pamŋe cete nepxere dzaʋo, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, naʋana ʋaʋo.
Mŋeya waJehova ukaʋuya pamsoro paJahazieri, mŋanakomana waZekaria, mŋanakomana waBenaya, mŋanakomana waJeieri, mŋanakomana waMatanya, muRevi, waʋanakomana ʋaAsafi, pakati peʋuŋgano;

iye akati: Tererai, imi ʋaJuda mose, nemi mugere paJerusarema, nemi mambo Jehoshafati; ɀanzi naJehova kwamuri: Musatya, kana kuvunduka nokuɗa kwaʋanhu aʋa ʋazhinji; nokuti kurwa hakuzi kwenyu, asi ndokwaMŋari.
Ƃurukai maŋgwana mundorwa naʋo; tarirai ʋanokwira napamukwidza weZizi; mucaʋawana pakuguma kwomupata, pamberi perenje reJerueri.

Imi hamuŋgafaniri henyu kurwa’po; ɀigadzirei’po, murambe mumire henyu, muʋone kurwirwa kwenyu naJehova, imi ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema; musatya kana kuvunduswa; ɓuɗai maŋgwana mundorwa naʋo, nokuti Jehova unemi.
Ipapo Jehoshafati akakotamisa musoro wake, ciso cakatarira pasi; ʋaJuda ʋose naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema ʋakawira pasi pamberi paJehova, ʋakanamata Jehova.
NaʋaRevi ʋaʋana ʋaʋaKohati, naʋana ʋaʋaKora, ʋakasimuka ʋakarumbidza Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri nenzwi guru kwaɀo.

Ʋakamuka maŋgwanani, ndokuɓuɗira kurenje reTekoa; ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗa, Jehoshafati akamira, akati: Cindinzwai imi ʋaJuda nemi mugere Jerusarema; tendai Jehova Mŋari wenyu, mugosimbiswa; tendai ʋaprofita ʋake, mugokunda.
Ɀino wakati araŋgana naʋanhu, akagadza ʋaifanira kuimbira Jehova, nokumurumbidza neŋguʋo tȿene, ʋakafamba pamberi pehondo, ʋaciti: Ʋoŋgai Jehova, nokuti nyasha dzake hadziperi.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitaŋga kuimba nokurumbidza, Jehova akaisa ʋaʋandiri kuzorwa naʋana ʋaAmoni, naʋaMoabi, naʋapagomo reSeiri, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kuzorwa naʋaJuda; ʋakakundwa.
Nokuti ʋana ʋaAmoni naʋaMoabi ʋakamukira ʋakaŋga ʋagere pagomo reSeiri kuti ʋaʋaʋuraye nokuʋaparadza cose; ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋagere paSeiri, mumŋe nomumŋe ndokuɓatsira pakuʋurayana.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati ʋaciȿika kuruȿiŋgo rwenharirire rwokurenje, ʋakatarira ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ndokuʋona ɀaʋaɀitunha ɀawira pasi, kwakaŋga kusina‐wakapukunyuka.

Ɀino Jehoshafati naʋanhu ʋake ʋakati ʋaciȿika kuzotora ɀaʋaŋgapamba, ʋakawana pakati paʋo fuma zhinji, neɀisimiro, neɀinhu ɀinokosha, ʋakaɀitorera iɀo, asi ʋakakoniwa kuɀitakura ɀose nokuwanda kwaɀo; ʋakaita mazuʋa matatu ʋacitora mhambara, nokuɗa kwokuwanda kwaɀo.
Ɀino pazuʋa recinna ʋakaʋuŋgana pamupata weBeraka; nokuti ʋakandokudza Jehova ipapo; naiɀoɀo zita renɀimbo iyo rakatumidzwa Mupata weBeraka kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema ʋakadzoka, Jehoshafati akaʋatuŋgamirira, ʋakadzokera Jerusarema nomufaro; nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aʋafadza pamsoro paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Ʋakaȿika Jerusarema nemiteŋgeranwa, nembira, nehwamanda, kuȿikira paimba yaJehova.
Ipapo ʋushe bgose bgenyika iyo bgakatya Mŋari kwaɀo, pakunzwa kwaʋo kuti Jehova wakarwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino ʋushe bgaJehoshafati bgakaʋa norugare; nokuti Mŋari wake wakamuzorodza pamatiʋi ose.

Jehoshafati akaɓata ʋushe bgaJuda; wakaŋga aȿika makore makumi matatu namashanu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi maʋiri namashanu; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Azuba, mukunda waShirhi.
Akafamba nenzira yaɓaɓa ʋake Asa; haana‐kutsauka pairi, akaramba aciita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro matunhu akakwirira haana‐kubviswa, naʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋacigere kuteʋera Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo nomŋoyo wose.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehoshafati, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, tarirai akanyorwa pamashoko aJehu, mŋanakomana waHanani, akaiswa mubuku yamadzimambo aIsraeri.
Shure kwaiɀoɀi Jehoshafati mambo waJuda wakasuŋgana naAhazia mambo waIsraeri; iye waifamba nenzira yakaipa kwaɀo;
akasuŋgana naye pakuʋaka ɀikepe ɀaienda Tarshishi; ʋakaʋaka ɀikepe paEzioni‐geberi.
Ipapo Eriezeri mŋanakomana waDodavahu weMaresha akaprofita pamsoro paJehoshafati, akati: Ɀawasuŋgana naAhazia, Jehova waparadza maɓasa ako. Ɀikepe ɀikaputsika, ɀikakoniwa kuenda Tarshishi.
Ɀino Jehoshafati akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, akaʋigwa namadziɓaɓa ake muguta raDavidi; Jehorami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Iye wakaŋga anaʋanuŋuna, ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋaJehoshafati,
Ƃaɓa ʋaʋo ʋakaʋapa ɀipo ɀikuru ɀesirveri, nendarama, neɀinhu ɀinokosha, pamŋe cete namaguta akakombga paJuda; asi ʋushe wakabgupa Jehorami, nokuti iye wakaŋga ari weɗaŋgwe.
Ɀino Jehorami wakati apinda paʋushe bgaɓaɓa ʋake, ndokuɀisimbisa, akaʋuraya ʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋose nomunondo, naʋamŋe ʋo ʋamacinda aIsraeri.
Jehorami wakaŋga aȿika makore makumi matatu namaʋiri pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore masere.
Akafamba nenzira yamadzimambo aIsraeri, seɀakaita imba yaAhabi; nokuti mukunda waAhabi wakaŋga ari mukadzi wake; akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Jehova wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kuparadza imba yaDavidi, nokuɗa kwesuŋgano yaakaŋga aita naDavidi, ʋuye nokuti wakaŋga amupikira kuti ucamupa mŋenje iye naʋana ʋake ŋguʋa dzose.
Ɀino namazuʋa ake ʋaEdomi ʋakamukira ʋaJuda, ʋakaɀiitira mambo waʋo.
Ipapo Jehorami akaenda naʋakuru ʋake, aneŋgoro dzake dzose naye; akamuka ʋusiku, akaparadza ʋaEdomi ʋakaŋga ʋakamukomba naʋakuru ʋeŋgoro.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaEdomi ʋakamukira ʋaJuda, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi. Ipapo ʋeRibna ʋo ʋakamumukira neŋguʋa iyo; nokuti wakaŋga arasha Jehova, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ake.
Wakaita ʋo matunhu akakwirira pamakomo aJuda, akapatisa ʋagere Jerusarema, nokutsausa ʋaJuda.
Ipapo ŋwadi yakabva kumuprofita Eria, ikaȿika kwaari, iciti: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako Davidi: Ɀausina‐kufamba nenzira dzaɓaɓa ʋako Jehoshafati, kana nenzira dzaAsa mambo waJuda;
asi wakafamba nenzira dzamadzimambo aIsraeri, ukapatisa Juda naʋagere Jerusarema, seɀakaita imba yaAhabi, ukaʋuraya ʋo ʋanuŋuna ʋako ʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, ʋakaŋga ʋakanaka kupfuʋura iwe;
ɀino tarira, Jehova ucaroʋa ʋanhu ʋako, naʋana ʋako, naʋakadzi ʋako, neɀinhu ɀako ɀose, nenjodzi yakaipa;
iwe ucaʋa nehosha yakaipa yomuʋura kuȿikira ʋura bgako ʋuciɓuɗa kunze nemhaka yehosha iyo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ɀino Jehova akakurudzira mŋeya yaʋaFiristia neyaʋaArabia, ʋakaŋga ʋari kurutiʋi rwaʋaEtiopia, kuzorwa naJehorami;

ʋakandorwa naʋaJuda, ʋakapinda nyika yaʋo nesimba, ndokutora nhumbi dzose dzaʋakawana mumba mamambo, naʋanakomana ʋake, naʋakadzi ʋake; naiɀoɀo haana‐kusarirwa nomŋanakomana, kunyaŋge nomumŋe, asi Jehoahazi, muɗuku waʋanakomana ʋake ʋose.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ɀose Jehova akamuroʋa muʋura bgake nehosha isiŋgagoni kurapxa.
Ɀino makore maʋiri akati apera, ʋura bgake ʋukaɓuɗa kunze nemhaka yoʋurwere, akafa nehosha dzakaipa; ʋanhu ʋake ʋakasamupisira, seɀaʋakapisira madziɓaɓa ake.

Wakaŋga aȿika makore makumi matatu namaʋiri pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore masere; akaenda hake asiŋgaɗikanwi, ʋakamuʋiga paguta raDavidi, asi haʋana‐kumuʋiga pamarinda amadzimambo.

Ɀino ʋagere Jerusarema ʋakaita Ahazia, mŋanakomana wake muɗuku, mambo panɀimbo yake, nokuti ɓoka raʋanhu, ʋakaʋuya naʋaArabia, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuraya ʋakuru ʋake ʋose. Naiɀoɀo Ahazia mŋanakomana waJehorami mambo waJuda, wakaɓata ʋushe.
Ahazia wakaŋga aȿika makore makumi manna namaʋiri pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema gore rimŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Ataria, mukunda waOmri.
Naiye wakafamba nenzira dzeimba yaAhabi; nokuti mai ʋake ʋaiʋa murairi wake pakuita ɀakaipa.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova seɀakaitwa naʋeimba yaAhabi; nokuti ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakati ʋafa, ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋarairi ʋake, ʋakamuisa pakuparadzwa.
Akafamba ʋo seɀaʋakamuraira, akaenda naJehorami mŋanakomana waAhabi mambo waIsraeri, kundorwa naHazaeri mambo weSiria paRamoti‐gireadi; ʋaSiria ʋakakuʋadza Jehorami.

Akadzokera Jezreeri kuzorapxa maʋaŋga aakatemŋa paRama, ŋguʋa yaakarwa naHazaeri mambo weSiria. Ipapo Azaria mŋanakomana waJehorami mambo waJuda, akaenda kundoʋona Jehorami mŋanakomana waAhabi paJezreeri, nokuti wakaŋga acirwara.

Ɀino kuparadzwa kwaAhazia kwakabva kunaMŋari, ɀaakaenda kunaJorami; nokuti wakati aȿika’po, akaenda naJehorami kundorwa naJehu mŋanakomana waNishi, wakaŋga azodzwa naJehova kuti aparadze imba yaAhabi.
Ɀino Jehu wakati aciitira imba yaAhabi ɀakaŋga ɀatoŋgwa

Akatȿaka Ahazia ʋo, ʋakamuɓata, (nokuti wakaŋga aʋanda paSamaria), ʋakamuisa kunaJehu, ʋakamuʋuraya; ʋakamuʋiga, nokuti ʋakati: Mŋanakomana waJehoshafati, wakatȿaka Jehova nomŋoyo wake wose. Asi kwakaŋga kusinomumŋe weimba yaAhazia wakaŋga anesimba rokuɓata ʋushe.
Ɀino Ataria mai ʋaAhazia, wakati aciʋona kuti mŋanakomana wake wafa, akasimuka, akaparadza ʋose ʋorudzi rwamambo ʋeimba yaJuda.

Asi Jehoshabeati mukunda wamambo, wakatora Joashi mŋanakomana waAhazia, akamuɓa pakati paʋanakomana ʋamambo ʋaiʋurawa, akamuisa iye nomureri wake mumba mokuʋata. Naiɀoɀo Jehoshabeati mukunda wamambo Jehorami, mukadzi waJehoyada muprista, (nokuti waiʋa hanɀadzi yaAhazia,) akamuʋanza panaAtaria, naiɀoɀo haana‐kumuʋuraya.
Akagara naʋo akaʋanzwa mumba maMŋari makore matanhatu; Ataria akaɓata ʋushe panyika.
Ɀino negore recinomŋe Jehoyada wakaɀisimbisa, akaita suŋgano naʋakuru ʋamazana,
Ʋakapota nenyika yaJuda, ʋakakokera ʋaRevi ʋapamaguta ose aJuda, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aIsraeri, ʋakaȿika Jerusarema.
Ʋuŋgano yose ikaita suŋgano namambo mumba maMŋari. Iye akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, mŋanakomana wamambo ucaɓata ʋushe, seɀakarebga naJehova pamsoro paʋanakomana ʋaDavidi.
Munofanira kuita kuɗai: Imi ʋanopinda nesaɓata, cetatu cenyu caʋaprista naʋaRevi, munofanira kuʋa ʋarindi ʋemikoʋa;
cimŋe cetatu cinofanira kuʋa paimba yamambo, necimŋe cetatu pasuʋo renheyo; naʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kuʋa paʋazhe dzeimba yaJehova.
Asi ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu mumŋe unopinda mumba maJehova, asi ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋanoɓata’mo; iʋo ŋgaʋapinde nokuti ʋatȿene; asi ʋanhu ʋose ʋanofanira kurinda
ƲaRevi ʋanofanira kukomba mambo, mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo muruʋoko rwake; aninani unopinda paimba, unofanira kuʋurawa; mugare namambo kana acipinda ʋuye kana aciɓuɗa.

Naiɀoɀo ʋaRevi naʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaita ɀose ɀaʋakarairwa nomuprista Jehoyada; mumŋe nomumŋe akatora ʋanhu ʋake, iʋo ʋaifanira kupinda nesaɓata naiʋo ʋaifanira kuɓuɗa nesaɓata; nokuti muprista Jehoyada haana‐kutendera mapoka kuenda.
Muprista Jehoyada akapa ʋakuru ʋamazana mapfumo, nenhoʋo, nenhoʋo ɗuku, ɀaiʋa ɀamambo Davidi, ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumba maMŋari.
Akaroŋgedza ʋanhu ʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo muruʋoko rwake, kubva kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba kuȿikira kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe rweimba, napaartari neimba, ʋakakomba mambo.
Ipapo ʋakaɓuɗisa mŋanakomana wamambo, ʋakamudzika korona,
Ɀino Ataria wakati acinzwa mhere‐mhere yaʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋacimhanya nokurumbidza mambo, akapinda kuʋanhu mumba maJehova;

akatarira, akaʋona mambo amire pambiru yake paʋaipinda napo, naʋakuru naʋanehwamanda ʋamire kunamambo; ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋakafara, ʋakaridza hwamanda; ʋaimbi ʋo ʋakaridza ɀokuridza naɀo, ʋakaraira ʋairumbidza nokuimba kwaʋo. Ipapo Ataria akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akati: Ndamukirwa, ndamukirwa!

Muprista Jehoyada akaɓuɗisa ʋakuru ʋamazana ʋairaira hondo, akati kwaʋari: Muɓuɗisei pakati pemisara yaʋanhu; aninani unomuteʋera iye, ŋgaaʋurawe nomunondo; nokuti muprista wakati: Regai kumuʋuraya mumba maJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakamudziʋurira nzira, akaenda nenzira yaipinda mabiza nayo kumba kwamambo, ʋakamuʋurayira’po.
Ipapo Jehoyada akaita suŋgano, iye naʋanhu ʋose namambo, kuti ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋaJehova.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaenda kumba kwaBaari, ʋakaiputsa; ʋakaputsanya artari dzake nemifananidzo yake, ʋakaʋuraya Matani muprista waBaari pamberi peartari.

Jehoyada akaraira maɓasa eimba yaJehova kuti atarirwe naʋaprista ʋaRevi, ʋakaŋga ʋaroŋgedzwa naDavidi mumba maJehova, kuti ʋapisire Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, seɀakanyorwa pamurairo waMosesi, nomufaro nokuimba, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naDavidi.
Akagadza ʋo ʋatariri pamasuʋo eimba yaJehova, kuti parege kupinda munhu wakaȿiɓiswa necinhu cipi necipi.
Akaenda naʋakuru ʋamazana, naʋaikudzwa, naʋaɓati ʋaʋanhu, naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, ʋakaɓurusa mambo paimba yaJehova, ʋakapinda mumba mamambo napasuʋo rokumsoro, ʋakagadza mambo pacigaro coʋushe.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋakafara, guta rikanyarara; asi Ataria ʋakaŋga ʋamuʋuraya nomunondo.
Joashi wakaŋga aȿika makore manomŋe pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi manna; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Zibia weBeeri‐sheba.
Joashi akaita ɀakanaka pamberi paJehova mazuʋa ose omuprista Jehoyada.
Jehoyada akamutȿakira ʋakadzi ʋaʋiri; akaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀi Joashi akaraŋgarira kuʋandudza imba yaJehova.

Akakokera ʋaprista naʋaRevi, akati kwaʋari: Ƃuɗirai kumaguta aJuda, muʋuŋganidze kuʋaIsraeri ʋose mari yokugadzirisa nayo imba yaMŋari wenyu gore rimŋe nerimŋe; ʋuye mumba macimbidzikira cinhu ici! Asi ʋaRevi haʋana‐kucimbidzika.
Ɀino mambo akaɗana mukuru Jehoyada, akati kwaari: Makaregereiko kuraira ʋaRevi kundoʋuŋganidza mutero waMosesi muranda waJehova paJuda napaJerusarema napaʋuŋgano yaIsraeri,
Nokuti ʋanakomana ʋaAtaria, mukadzi uya wakaipa, ʋakaŋga ʋaputsa imba yaMŋari; neɀinhu ɀose ɀeimba yaJehova, ɀakaŋga ɀakatsaurirwa
Naiɀoɀo mambo akaraira, ʋakaʋeza bokisi, ʋakariisa kunze kwesuʋo reimba yaJehova.
Ɀino ʋakatuma shoko pakati paJuda neJerusarema, kuti ʋanhu ʋaʋigire Jehova mutero wakarairwa ʋaIsraeri murenje naMosesi muranda waMŋari.
Macinda ose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakafara, ʋakaʋuya naɀo, ʋakaɀikanda mubokisi, kuȿikira ʋapedza.

Ɀino ŋguʋa dzose kana bokisi riciiswa paimba yamambo namaʋoko aʋaRevi, kana ʋakaʋona kuti mari zhinji yaʋa’mo, munyori wamambo nomutariri womuprista mukuru ʋakaʋuya ʋakaɗurura ɀiri mubokisi, ʋakaritora ndokuridzosera ɀe panɀimbo yaro. Ʋakaita kuɗaro zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ʋakaʋuŋganidza mari zhinji.
Ɀino mambo naJehoyada ʋakaipa ʋaiɓata maɓasa paimba yaJehova; ʋakaripira ʋaʋezi ʋamabge namatanda, kuti ʋaʋandudze imba yaJehova, naʋapfuri ʋamatare nendarira, kuti ʋagadzire imba yaJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaɓati ʋakaɓata, ɓasa rikapedzwa naʋo; ʋakagadzira imba yaMŋari seɀayakaŋga yakaita kare, ʋakaisimbisa.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza, ʋakaʋuya nemari yakasara kunamambo naJehoyada, ʋakaita nayo midziyo yeimba yaJehova, iri midziyo yokuɓata nayo, nokuɓayira nayo, neɀiroŋgo, nemidziyo yendarama nesirveri. Ʋaiɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa mumba maJehova mazuʋa ose aJehoyada.
Asi Jehoyada wakazokwegura, akaʋa namazuʋa mazhinji ndokufa; wakaŋga anamakore anezana namakumi matatu pakufa kwake.
Ʋakamuʋiga paguta raDavidi pakati pamadzimambo; nokuti wakaŋga aitira Mŋari neimba yake ɀakanaka pakati paIsraeri.
Ɀino Jehoyada wakati afa, macinda aJuda akaȿika, akanamata mambo. Ipapo mambo akaʋaterera.
Ʋakasiya imba yaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋakashumira matanda okunamata nawo neɀifananidzo;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaʋatumira ʋaprofita kuzoʋadzosera ɀe kunaJehova; iʋo ʋakaʋapupurira, asi ʋakaramba kunzwa.
Ipapo Mŋeya waMŋari wakaʋuya pamsoro paZekaria, mŋanakomana womuprista Jehoyada, akamira
Ipapo ʋakaraŋgana, ʋakamutaka namabge paruʋazhe rweimba yaJehova, ʋarairwa namambo.
Nokuɗaro mambo Joashi haana‐kuraŋgarira ɀakanaka ɀaakaŋga aitirwa naJehoyada ɓaɓa ʋake, asi wakaʋuraya mŋanakomana wake. Ɀino wakati acifa, akati: Jehova ŋgaatarire cinhu ici, acitsiʋe.
Ɀino gore rakati ropera, hondo yaʋaSiria ikaȿika kuzorwa naye; ʋakaȿika paJuda napaJerusarema ʋakaparadza macinda ose aʋanhu pakati paʋanhu, ʋakatuma ɀose ɀaʋakapamba kunamambo weDamasko.
Nokuti hondo yaʋaSiria yakaʋuya neɓoka ɗuku raʋanhu; Jehova akaisa pfumo guru‐guru mumaʋoko aʋo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiya Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo. Nokuɗaro ʋakaitira Joashi ɀakaŋga ɀatoŋgwa

Ɀino ʋakati ʋabva kwaari (nokuti ʋakamusiya acirwara kwaɀo), ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaraŋgana pamsoro pake nemhaka yeropa raʋanakomana ʋomuprista Jehoyada, ʋakamuʋurayira panhoʋo yake, akafa; ʋakamuʋiga muguta raDavidi, asi haʋana‐kumuʋiga kumarinda amadzimambo.
Ʋakaraŋgana pamsoro pake ndiʋaʋa: Zabadi mŋanakomana waShimeati, mukadzi muAmoni, neJehozabadi mŋanakomana waShimriti mukadzi muMoabi.
Ɀino kana ɀiri ɀaʋanakomana ʋake, namashoko makuru
Amazia wakaŋga anamakore makumi maʋiri namashanu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jehoadani weJerusarema.
Iye akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, asi haana‐kuita nomŋoyo wose.
Ɀino wakati asimba paʋushe bgake, akaʋuraya ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaʋuraya mambo ɓaɓa ʋake.

Asi haana‐kuʋuraya ʋana ʋaʋo, asi wakaita seɀakanyorwa pamurairo pabuku yaMosesi, seɀakarairwa naJehova, aciti: Madziɓaɓa haafaniri kufira ʋana ʋaʋo, naʋana haʋafaniri kufira madziɓaɓa aʋo; asi munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kufira ɀiʋi ɀake.
Amazia akaʋuŋganidza ʋo ʋaJuda, akagadza pamsoro paʋo ʋatariri ʋeɀuru naʋatariri ʋamazana nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, iʋo ʋaJuda ʋose naʋaBenjamini; akaʋaʋereŋga,
Akaripira ʋo ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana ʋaʋaIsraeri, akaʋapa matarenta anezana esirveri.
Asi mumŋe munhu waMŋari wakaʋuya kwaari, akati: Haiwa, mambo, hondo yaʋaIsraeri ŋgairege kuenda nemi, nokuti Jehova haa’po panaIsraeri, paʋana ʋaEfraimi ʋose.
Asi endai imi moga, shiŋgai murwe nesimba; Mŋari uŋgakukundisai naʋaʋeŋgi here? Nokuti Mŋari unesimba rokuɓatsira nerokukundisa.
Ipapo Amazia akati kumunhu waMŋari: Ɀino ticaita seiko pamsoro pamatarenta anezana
Ipapo Amazia akaʋaraʋura, iro pfumo rakaŋga raʋuya kwaari ricibva kwaEfraimi, kuti ʋadzokere ɀe kumusha; nemhaka iyo ʋakatsamŋira Juda kwaɀo, ʋakadzokera kumusha ʋatsamŋa kwaɀo.
Ɀino Amazia akatsuŋga mŋoyo, akatuŋgamirira ʋanhu ʋake, akaenda kuMupata woMunyu, akaʋuraya ʋana ʋaSeiri ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi.
Ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakatapa ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi ʋari ʋapenyu, ʋakaenda naʋo pamsoro peɗombo, ʋakaʋakandira pasi paɗombo, ʋakavunikanya ʋose.

Asi ʋarume ʋehondo ʋakaŋga ʋadzoswa naAmazia, kuti ʋarege kundorwa naye, ʋakandowira maguta aJuda, kubva paSamaria kuȿikira paBeti‐horoni, ʋakaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu kwaʋari, ʋakapambara ɀizhinji.
Ɀino Amazia wakati acidzoka pakuʋuraya ʋaEdomi, akaʋuya naʋamŋari ʋaʋana ʋaSeiri, akaʋaita ʋamŋari ʋake, akaʋafugamira, nokuʋapisira ɀinonhuwira.
Saka Jehova wakatsamŋira Amazia, akatuma muprofita kwaari; iye akati kwaari: Wakabvunzireiko ʋamŋari ʋaʋanhu ʋakakoniwa kurwira ʋanhu ʋaʋo pamaʋoko ako?
Ɀino wakati acataura naye,
Ipapo Amazia mambo waJuda akatȿaka zano, akatuma kunaJoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi, mŋanakomana waJehu, mambo waIsraeri, akati: Ʋuya, tirwe.

Joashi mambo waIsraeri akatuma shoko kunaAmazia mambo waJuda, akati: Rukato rwakaŋga ruri paRebanoni rwakatuma shoko kumusidari wakaŋga uri paRebanoni, rukati: Ipa mŋanakomana waŋgu mukunda wako aʋe mukadzi wake; ɀino imŋe mhuka yakaŋga iri paRebanoni ikapfuʋura’po, ikatsika‐tsika rukato.
Iwe unoti: Tarira wakunda Edomi; ɀino mŋoyo wako waʋa namanyawi, woɀikudza; gara hako ɀino kumusha kwako; nokuti ucatȿakireiko njodzi, uwire’mo, iwe naJuda pamŋe cete newe?
Asi Amazia wakaramba kunzwa; nokuti ɀakaŋga ɀicibva kunaMŋari, kuti aʋaise mumaʋoko
Naiɀoɀo Joashi mambo waIsraeri akaenda; iye naAmazia mambo waJuda ʋakarwa paBeti‐shemeshi riri paJuda.
Juda ʋakakundwa naIsraeri, mumŋe nomumŋe akatizira kutente rake.

Joashi mambo waIsraeri akasuŋga Amazia mambo waJuda, mŋanakomana waJoashi, mŋanakomana waJehoahazi, paBeti‐shemeshi, akaenda naye Jerusarema, akaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema, kubva pasuʋo raEfraimi kusikira pasuʋo rapakona, makubiti anamazana manna.
ndarama yose nesirveri, nemidziyo yose yakawanikwa mumba maMŋari kunaObedi‐edomi, nefuma yomumba mamambo, naʋanhu kuzoʋa ruɓatso, akadzokera Samaria.
Ɀino Amazia mŋanakomana waJoashi mambo waJuda wakagara ari mupenyu makore anegumi namashanu shure kwokufa kwaJoashi mŋanakomana waJehoahazi mambo waIsraeri.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aAmazia, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, tarirai, haana‐kunyorwa here mubuku yamadzimambo aJuda naIsraeri?
Ɀino kubva paŋguʋa yakarega Amazia kuteʋera Jehova, ʋakamuraŋgana, ʋakamumukira paJerusarema; iye ndokutizira Rakishi; asi ʋakatuma ʋanhu Rakishi ʋacimuteʋera, ʋakamuʋurayira’po.
Ʋakaʋuya naye pamabiza, ʋakamuʋiga kumadziɓaɓa ake muguta raJuda.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda ʋakatora Uzia, wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namatanhatu, ʋakamuita mambo panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake Amazia.
Iye akaʋaka Eroti, akaridzosera kunaJuda, mambo aʋata namadziɓaɓa ake.
Uzia wakaŋga anamakore anegumi namatanhatu pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anamakumi mashanu namaʋiri; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jekiria weJerusarema.
Iye akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, seɀose seɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake Amazia.
Akashiŋgaira kutȿaka Mŋari namazuʋa aZekaria, wakaŋga anenjere pakuziʋa ɀaMŋari; ɀino pamazuʋa aakatȿaka Jehova, Mŋari wakamukundisa.
Akandorwa naʋaFiristia, akaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweGati, noruȿiŋgo rweJabne, noruȿiŋgo rweAshdodi; akaʋaka maguta
Mŋari akamuɓatsira pakurwa naʋaFiristia, naʋaArabia, ʋakaŋga ʋagere Guri‐baari, naʋaMeunimi.
ƲaAmoni ʋakaʋigira Uzia ɀipo; mbiri yake ikapararira kuȿikira paʋanopinda napo paEgipita; nokuti wakasimba kwaɀo.
Uzia wakaʋaka ʋo shoŋgwe paJerusarema pasuʋo rekona, napasuʋo romupata, napakudzoka
Akaʋaka ʋo shoŋgwe murenje, akacera ʋo madziʋa mazhinji, nokuti wakaŋga aneɀipfuwo ɀizhinji; napamapani ʋo, napanyika yokumakomo;
Ʋuye ʋo Uzia wakaŋga anehondo yaʋarwi, ʋaindorwa ʋaciita mapoka, seɀaʋakaʋereŋgwa naJeieri munyori, naMaaseya murairi, ʋakatuŋgamirirwa naHanania mumŋe waʋakuru ʋamambo.
Ʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa kuʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, iʋo ʋarume ʋaiʋa nesimba noʋumhare, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana matanhatu.
Iʋo ʋairaira hondo yakaŋga yakadzidziswa, ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana matatu neɀinomŋe namazana mashanu, ʋaigona kurwa nesimba guru, kuzoɓatsira mambo kurwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Uzia akaʋagadzirira, iʋo ʋose ʋehondo, nhoʋo, namapfumo, neŋgoani, neŋguʋo dzamatare, noʋuta, namabge okufura nawo.

Akaita ʋo paJerusarema micini, yakaitwa naʋanhu ʋakaŋgwara, ikaiswa pashoŋgwe napamakona amaȿiŋgo, kuzoposhera nayo miseʋe namabge makuru. Mbiri yake ikapararira; nokuti wakaɓatsirwa ɀinoshamisa, kuȿikira asimba.
Asi wakati asimba, mŋoyo wake ukaɀikudza, akazoita ɀakashata, akatadzira Jehova Mŋari wake; nokuti wakapinda patembere yaJehova kundopisa ɀinonhuwira paartari yeɀinonhuwira.
Ipapo muprista Azaria wakamuteʋera akapinda anaʋaprista ʋaJehova ʋanamakumi masere, ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋoʋumhare.

Iʋo ʋakadziʋisa mambo Uzia, ʋakati kwaari: Nhandi Uzia, haɀifaniri kuti imi mupisire Jehova ɀinonhuwira, asi ʋaprista ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, ʋakatsaurwa kupisa ɀinonhuwira; ɓuɗai panɀimbo tȿene, nokuti maɗarika; hamuŋgakudzwi naJehova Mŋari nokuɗa kwecinhu ici.

Ipapo Uzia akatsamŋa kwaɀo; ɀino iye wakaŋga akaɓata haryana yeɀinonhuwira kuti apise ɀinonhuwira; ɀino wakati acakatsamŋira ʋaprista, maperembudzi akaɓuɗa pahuma yake pamberi paʋaprista muimba yaJehova, kurutiʋi rweartari yeɀinonhuwira.

Ɀino Azaria muprista mukuru naʋaprista ʋose ʋakatarira kwaari, ʋakaʋona kuti waʋa namaperembudzi pahuma yake, ʋakacimbidzika kumuɓuɗisa’po; kunyaŋge naiye wakacimbidzika kuɓuɗa, nokuti Jehova wakaŋga amuroʋa.
Ɀino mambo Uzia akaʋa namaperembudzi kuȿikira pazuʋa rokufa kwake, akagara ari oga muimba, anamaperembudzi; nokuti wakadziʋiswa
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aUzia, okutaŋga nookupedzisira, akanyorwa nomuprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi.
Naiɀoɀo Uzia akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga kumadziɓaɓa ake mumunda wamarinda aiʋa amadzimambo; nokuti ʋakati: Unamaperembudzi; Jotami mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Jotami wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aȿika makore makumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namatanhatu; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Jerusha mukunda waZadoki.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, akaita ɀose ɀakaitwa naɓaɓa ʋake Uzia; asi haana‐kupinda mutembere yaJehova. Ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciita ɀakashata.
Akaʋaka suʋo rokumsoro reimba yaJehova, akaʋaka ʋo ɀizhinji pamsoro poruȿiŋgo rweOferi.
Wakaʋaka ʋo maguta panyika yamakomo yaJuda, ʋuye akaʋaka nhare neshoŋgwe mumatondo.
Wakarwa ʋo namambo waʋana ʋaAmoni, akaʋakunda. Negore iro ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakamupa matarenta esirveri anezana,
Naiɀoɀo Jotami akasimba, nokuti wakagadzira nzira dzake pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJotami, nokurwa kwake kwose, netsika dzake, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamadzimambo aIsraeri naaJuda.
Wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aȿika makore makumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namatanhatu.
Jotami akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake; ʋakamuʋiga muguta raDavidi; Ahazi mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ahazi wakaŋga anamakore makumi maʋiri pakutaŋga kwake kuɓata ʋushe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi namatanhatu; asi haana‐kuita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, saɓaɓa ʋake Davidi;
asi wakafamba nenzira dzamadziɓaɓa aIsraeri, akaitira ʋaBaari ʋo ɀifananidzo ɀendarira yakanyauswa.
Ʋuye wakapisa ʋo ɀinonhuwira pamupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, akapisa ʋana ʋake mumŋoto, seɀainyaŋgadza ɀaʋahedeni, ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Akaɓayira nokupisa ɀinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira, napaɀikomo, napasi pemiti yose mitema.

Saka Jehova Mŋari wake wakamuisa muruʋoko rwamambo weSiria; ʋakamukunda, ʋakaenda naʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji ʋakatapxa, ʋakandoʋaisa Damasko. Naiye amene wakaiswa muruʋoko rwamambo waIsraeri, wakamukunda, akaʋuraya ʋazhinji‐zhinji.
Nokuti Peka mŋanakomana waRemaria wakaʋuraya paJuda ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi maʋiri pazuʋa rimŋe; ʋose ʋari ʋarume ʋoʋumhare; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiya Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Zikri murume waEfraimi, wakaŋga anesimba, akaʋuraya Maaseya mŋanakomana wamambo, naAzrikami mutariri weimba, naErkana mukuru kuteʋera mambo.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakatapa pakati pehama dzaʋo ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinamazana maʋiri, ʋakadzi, naʋanakomana, naʋanasikana, ʋakapamba ʋo ɀizhinji kwaʋari; ʋakandoisa Samaria iɀo ɀakapambga.

Asi kwakaŋga kunomuprofita waJehova, wainzi Odedi; iye akaenda kundosoŋgana nehondo yakaŋga yoʋuya Samaria, akati kwaʋari: Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu wakaŋga atsamŋira ʋaJuda, saka wakaʋaisa mumaʋoko enyu, mukaʋaʋuraya nehasha dzakaȿikira kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino munoti mucamanikidza ʋana ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema, ʋaʋe ʋatapxa ʋenyu ʋaranda naʋarandakadzi; ko imi hamunemhoȿa ʋo mumene pamberi paJehova Mŋari wenyu here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cindinzwai, mudzose ʋatapxa ʋamakatapa pakati pehama dzenyu; nokuti Jehova wakutsamŋirai kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋaʋana ʋaEfraimi,
ʋakati kwaʋari: Hamuŋgapindi pano naʋatapxa, nokuti munoʋaʋarira kuita cinhu cicatiparisa mhaka panaJehova, mugowedzera paɀiʋi ɀeɗu nemhoȿa yeɗu; nokuti mhoȿa yeɗu ihuru, ʋaIsraeri ʋatsamŋirwa kwaɀo
Ipapo ʋarwi ʋakasiya ʋatapxa neɀakapambga kumacinda neʋuŋgano yose.

Ɀino aʋa ʋarume ʋarebga mazita aʋo, ʋakasimuka, ʋakatora ʋatapxa, ʋakafukidza ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakashama pakati paʋo neɀakapambga, ʋakaʋapfekedza nokuʋaisa shaŋgu, ndokuʋapa ɀokudya neɀokunwa, ʋakaʋazodza, ʋakataȿisa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasinesimba pamboŋgoro, ʋakaʋaisa Jeriko, guta remicindwe, kuhama dzaʋo; ipapo ʋakadzokera Samaria.
Paŋguʋa iyo mambo Ahazi akatuma
Nokuti ʋaEdomi ʋakaŋga ʋaȿika ɀe, ʋakakunda ʋaJuda ʋakatapa ʋatapxa.

NaʋaFiristia ʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaʋamba maguta amapani, naaiʋa kurutiʋi rwezasi rwaJuda, ʋakakunda Beti‐shemeshi, neAijaroni, neGederoti, neSoko, nemisha yawo, neTimna, nemisha yaro, neGimzo nemisha yaro; ʋakagara’po.
Nokuti Jehova wakaninipisa ʋaJuda nokuɗa kwaAhazi mambo waIsraeri; nokuti wakaŋga aita ɀakaipa paJuda, akatadzira Jehova kwaɀo.
Ɀino Tirgati‐pirineseri mambo weAsiria akaʋuya kuzorwa naye, akamumanikidza, asi haana‐kumukunda.
Nokuti Ahazi wakatora mugoʋe
Asi paŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwake, wakanyanya kutadzira Jehova, iye mambo Ahazi.

Nokuti wakaɓayira ʋamŋari ʋeDamasko, ʋakaŋga ʋamukunda, akati: Ʋamŋari ʋamadzimambo aSiria ɀaʋanoʋaɓatsira, ini ndicaʋaɓayira ʋo, kuti ʋandiɓatsire ʋo. Asi iʋo ʋakamuparadza iye naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamŋe cete naye.
Ɀino Ahazi akaʋuŋganidza midziyo yeimba yaMŋari, akaputsanya midziyo yeimba yaMŋari, akapfiga mikoʋa yeimba yaJehova; akaɀiitira artari pose‐pose paJerusarema.
Akaita ʋo matunhu akakwirira paguta rimŋe nerimŋe raJuda kuzopisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira ipapo, akatsamŋisa Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ake.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa ake, netsika dzake dzose, dzokutaŋga nedzokupedzisira, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamadzimambo aJuda naIsraeri.
Ahazi akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga muguta, imo muJerusarema; nokuti haʋanakumuisa pamarinda amadzimambo aIsraeri; Hezekia mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Hezekia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aȿika makore makumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore makumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Abija mukunda waZekaria.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova seɀose ɀakaita ɓaɓa ʋake Davidi.
Pagore rokutaŋga rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, akazarura mikoʋa yeimba yaJehova, akaigadzira.
Akapinza ʋaprista naʋaRevi, akaʋaʋuŋganidza paɗare pamabvazuʋa,
akati kwaʋari: Cindinzwai, imi ʋaRevi; ciɀinatsai ɀino, munatse ʋo imba yaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu; mutakurire kunze tȿina yose iri munɀimbo tȿene.
Nokuti madziɓaɓa eɗu akaɗarika, ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova Mŋari weɗu, ʋakamusiya, ʋakarega kutarira kuʋugaro bgaJehova, ndokumufuratira.
Ʋakapfiga ʋo mikoʋa yeɓiraʋira, nokudzima mŋenje; haʋana‐kupisira ɀinonhuwira, kana kuɓayira Mŋari waIsraeri ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa panɀimbo tȿene.
Saka Jehova wakatsamŋira ʋaJuda neJerusarema, akaʋaita cityiso necishamiso, cinoridzirwa muridzo, seɀamunoʋona nameso enyu.
Nokuti tarirai, madziɓaɓa eɗu akaparadzwa nomunondo; ʋanakomana ʋeɗu naʋanasikana ʋeɗu naʋakadzi ʋeɗu ʋakatapxa nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀi.
Ɀino mŋoyo waŋgu unoɗa kuita suŋgano naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, kuti kutsamŋa kwake kukuru kubviswe kwatiri.
Ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu, regai kuʋa ʋanhu ʋasinehanya ɀino, nokuti Jehova wakakutsaurai kuti mumire pamberi pake, mumuɓatirei, nokuʋa ʋaɓatiri ʋake, nokumupisira ɀinonhuwira.

Ipapo ʋaRevi ʋakasimuka, Mahati mŋanakomana waAmasai, naJoeri mŋanakomana waAzaria pakati paʋanakomana ʋaʋaKohati; napakati paʋanakomana ʋaMerari, Kishi mŋanakomana waAbdi, naAzaria mŋanakomana waJeharereri; napakati paʋaGershoni, Joa mŋanakomana waZimma, naEdeni mŋanakomana waJoa;
napakati paʋanakomana ʋaErizafani, Shimri naJeueri; napakati paʋanakomana ʋaAsafi, Zekaria naMatania;
napakati paʋanakomana ʋaHemani, Jehueri naShimei; napakati paʋanakomana ʋaJedutuni, Shemaya naUzieri.
Iʋo ʋakaʋuŋganidza hama dzaʋo, ʋakaɀinatsa, ʋakapinda seɀaʋakarairwa namambo namashoko aJehova, kuti ʋanatse imba yaJehova.
Ʋaprista ʋakapinda mukati meimba yaJehova, kuti ʋainatse, ʋakaɓuɗisa marara ose aʋakawana mutembere yaJehova kuruʋazhe rweimba yaJehova. ƲaRevi ʋakaatora, ndokuatakurira kunze kurukoʋa Kidroni.
Ʋakataŋga kunatsa
Ipapo ʋakapinda kunamambo Hezekia mukati
Ʋuye nhumbi dzose dzakarashwa namambo Ahazi pakuɗarika kwake ŋguʋa yaakaɓata ʋushe, tadzigadzira nokudzinatsa; tarirai, dziri pamberi peartari yaJehova.
Ɀino mambo Hezekia akamuka maŋgwanani, akaʋuŋganidza macinda eguta, akaenda kumba kwaJehova.

Ʋakaʋuya nenzombe nomŋe, namakondobge manomŋe, namakwaiana manomŋe, nenhoŋgo dzembudzi nomŋe, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi coʋushe neimba tȿene naʋaJuda. Akaraira ʋaprista iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni, kuti ʋaɀiɓayire paartari yaJehova.
Ipapo ʋakaʋuraya nzombe, ʋaprista ʋakaciŋga ropa, ndokurisasa paartari; ʋakaʋuraya makondobge, ʋakasasa ropa paartari; ʋakaʋuraya ʋo makwaiana, ʋakasasa ropa paartari.
Ʋakasweɗedza ʋo nhoŋgo dzembudzi, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi pamberi pamambo neʋuŋgano, ʋakaisa maʋoko aʋo pamsoro padzo;
ʋaprista ʋakadziʋuraya, ʋakaita cipiriso ceɀiʋi neropa radzo paartari, kuti ʋayananisire ʋaIsraeri ʋose; nokuti mambo wakaraira kuti ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋapisirwe cipiriso cinopiswa necipiriso ceɀiʋi.

Akaisa ʋaRevi mumba maJehova, ʋanamakandira, nemiteŋgeranwa, nembira, seɀaʋakarairwa naDavidi, ʋuye nomuʋoni wamambo Gad, ʋuye nomuprofita Natania; nokuti wakaŋga ari Jehova wakaraira naʋaprofita ʋake.
ƲaRevi ʋakamira neɀokuridza ɀaDavidi, naʋaprista ʋanehwamanda.
Hezekia akaraira kuti ʋaɓayire cipiriso cinopiswa paartari. Ɀino cipiriso cinopiswa cakati cicitaŋga
Ʋuŋgano yose ndokunamata, ʋaimbi ʋakaimba, naʋaridzi ʋehwamanda ʋakaridza; iɀoɀi ɀose
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza kupisira, mambo naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’po naye ʋakakotamira pasi, ʋakanamata.
Mambo Hezekia namacinda ʋakaraira ʋo ʋaRevi kuimbira Jehova ʋacimukudza namashoko aDavidi nomuʋoni Asafi. Ʋakaimba nziyo dzokukudza nomufaro, ʋakakotamisa misoro yaʋo ʋakanamata.

Ipapo Hezekia akapindura, akati: Ɀino ɀamaɀitsaurira Jehova, sweɗerai muʋuye neɀiɓayiro neɀipiriso ɀokuʋoŋga naɀo mumba maJehova. Ʋuŋgano ndokuʋuya neɀiɓayiro neɀipiriso ɀokuʋoŋga; ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋanomŋoyo unoɗa, ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa.
Ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, ɀakaʋuyiswa neʋuŋgano, ɀakaȿika nzombe dzinamakumi manomŋe, namakondobge anezana, namakwaiana anamazana maʋiri pakuwanda kwaɀo; iɀi ɀose cakaŋga ciri cipiriso cokupisira Jehova.
Ɀinhu ɀakatsaurirwa

Asi ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgariŋgani, ʋakakoniwa kuviya ɀipiriso ɀose ɀinopiswa; saka ʋaRevi hama dzaʋo, ʋakaʋaɓatsira, kuȿikira ɓasa rapera, ʋuye kuȿikira ʋaprista ʋaɀinatsa; nokuti mŋoyo yaʋaRevi yakaŋga yakarurama pakuɀinatsa kupfuʋura ʋaprista.
Ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa ɀakaŋga ɀakawanda ʋo kwaɀo, namafuta eɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, neɀipiriso ɀaiɗururwa ɀecipiriso cimŋe necimŋe caipiswa. Naiɀoɀo ɓasa reimba yaJehova rakagadzirwa.
Ipapo Hezekia akafara, naʋanhu ʋose, nokuɗa kweɀose ɀakaŋga ɀagadzirirwa ʋanhu naMŋari; nokuti cinhu ici cakaitwa nokucimbidzika.
Ɀino Hezekia wakatuma
Nokuti mambo namacinda ake, neʋuŋgano yose paJerusarema ʋakaŋga ʋaraŋgana kuita paseka nomŋedzi wecipiri.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuiita neŋguʋa iyo, nokuti ʋaprista, ʋakanatswa, ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgariŋgani, naʋanhu ʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kuʋuŋgana paJerusarema.
Ɀino cinhu ici cakaŋga cakarurama pamberi pamambo neʋuŋgano yose.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakasimbisa cireʋo, ʋakaziʋisa pakati paIsraeri pose, kubva paBeeri‐sheba kuȿikira paDani, kuti ʋanhu ʋaʋuye kuzoitira Jehova Mŋari waʋaIsraeri paseka paJerusarema; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kuiita ŋguʋa huru, seɀakaŋga ɀakanyorwa.

Ipapo nhume dzakamhanya dzikaenda neŋwadi dzamambo namacinda ake pakati paʋaIsraeri ʋose naʋaJuda, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa namambo, ʋakati: Imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, dzokerai ɀe kunaJehova Mŋari waAbrahama, naIsaka, naIsraeri, kuti iye adzokere ɀe kunaʋakasara pakati penyu, ʋakapukunyuka pamaʋoko amadzimambo eAsiria.
Regai kuʋa samadziɓaɓa enyu, nehama dzenyu, ʋakaɗarika

Regai kuʋa nemitsipa mikukutu, seɀakaŋga ɀakaita madziɓaɓa enyu; ɓatai ruʋoko rwaJehova, mupinde paimba yake tȿene, yaakanatsa nokusiŋgaperi, mushumire Jehova Mŋari wenyu, kuti kutsamŋa kwake kubviswe kwamuri.

Nokuti kana imi mukadzokera kunaJehova, hama dzenyu naʋana ʋenyu ʋacanzwirwa tsitsi naʋatapi ʋaʋo, ʋagodzokera ɀe kunyika ino; nokuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu uneŋgoni nenyasha; haaŋgafuratidzi ciso cake kwamuri, kana mukadzokera kwaari.
Naiɀoɀo nhume dzakamhanya dzikapota pamaguta ose panyika yose yaEfraimi naManase, kuȿikira paZeburuni; asi ʋakaʋaseka, nokuʋaɗaɗira.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋaAsheri naʋaManase naʋaZeburuni, ʋakaɀininipisa, ʋakaenda Jerusarema.
NapaJuda ʋo ruʋoko rwaMŋari rwakaʋapa mŋoyo mumŋe, kuti ʋaterere murairo wamambo namacinda neshoko raJehova.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana paJerusarema, kuzoita mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa nomŋedzi wecipiri, ikaita ʋuŋgano huru kwaɀo.
Ʋakasimuka, ndokubvisa artari dzaiʋa paJerusarema, ʋakabvisa ʋo artari dzose dzeɀinonhuwira, ʋakadzikandira murukoʋa Kidroni.
Ipapo ʋakaʋuraya
Ʋakamira panɀimbo yaʋo seɀaʋakarairwa nomurairo waMosesi, iye munhu waMŋari; ʋaprista ʋakasasa ropa
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋaiʋa’po paʋuŋgano ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kuɀinatsa; saka ʋaRevi ʋaiʋa neɓasa rokuʋurayira ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kunatswa,

Nokuti ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋaEfraimi naʋaManase, naʋaIsakari naʋaZeburuni, ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kuɀinatsa; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakadya paseka nomutoʋo wakapesana nowakanyorwa. Nokuti Hezekia wakaŋga aʋanyeŋgeterera, aciti: Jehova wakanaka ŋgaakaŋganwire mumŋe nomumŋe,
unoshiŋgaira nomŋoyo wake kutȿaka Mŋari, Jehova, Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋake, kunyaŋge
Jehova akanzwa Hezekia, akaporesa ʋanhu.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋaiʋa paJerusarema, ʋakaita mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa nomufaro mukuru mazuʋa manomŋe; ʋaRevi naʋaprista ʋakarumbidza Jehova zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe,

Hezekia akataura noʋunyoro naʋaRevi ʋose ʋaigona kuɓatira Jehova ɀakanaka. Naiɀoɀo ʋakadya pamutambo mazuʋa manomŋe, ʋakaɓayira ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ʋaciɀireʋurura kunaJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀino ʋuŋgano yose yakaraŋgana kuita mamŋe mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe; ʋakaita mazuʋa manomŋe ɀe nomufaro.

Nokuti Hezekia mambo waJuda wakapa ʋuŋgano nzombe dzinecuru cimŋe, namakwai aneɀuru ɀinomŋe, kuti ʋaɓayire naɀo; namacinda ʋo akapa ʋuŋgano nzombe dzinecuru cimŋe, namakwai aneɀuru ɀinegumi; ʋaprista ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaɀinatsa.
Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yaJuda, pamŋe cete naʋaprista naʋaRevi, neʋuŋgano yose yakabva pakati paIsraeri, naʋatorwa ʋakabva panyika yaIsraeri, naʋakaŋga ʋagere paJuda, ʋakafara ʋose.
Naiɀoɀo mufaro mukuru ukaʋa’po paJerusarema; nokuti kubva paŋguʋa yaSoromoni mŋanakomana waDavidi, mambo waIsraeri, hakuna‐kuitwa ɀakaɗaro paJerusarema.
Ipapo ʋaprista ʋaRevi ʋakasimuka, ʋakaropafadza ʋanhu; manzwi aʋo akanzwika, nokunyeŋgetera kwaʋo kukaȿika kuʋugaro bgake ʋutȿene iko kuɗeŋga.

Ɀino iɀo ɀose ɀakati ɀapera, ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’po, ʋakaɓuɗa kumaguta aJuda, ʋakaputsa shoŋgwe, nokutema matanda okunamata nawo, ʋakaputsa matunhu akakwirira neartari kwaJuda nokwaBenjamini kwose, nokwaEfraimi nokwaManase, kuȿikira ʋaɀiparadza ɀose. Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakadzokera kumaguta aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe kuɀinhu ɀake.

Hezekia akaraira mapoka aʋaprista naʋaRevi pamapoka aʋo, munhu mumŋe nomumŋe paɓasa rake, ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋose, kuɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, kushumira nokuʋoŋga, nokurumbidza mumasuʋo emisasa yaJehova.
ʋo mugoʋe wefuma yamambo weɀipiriso ɀinopiswa,
Wakaraira ʋo ʋanhu ʋeJerusarema kupa ʋaprista naʋaRevi mugoʋe waʋo, kuti iʋo ʋasimbe pamurairo waJehova.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacaŋgonzwa murairo uyu, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakapa ɀakawanda ɀeɀitȿa, ɀeɀiyo newaini, namafuta, noʋuci, nemicero yose yeminda; ʋuye cegumi ceɀinhu ɀose ʋakaʋuya naɀo ɀiri ɀizhinji.
Naʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamaguta aJuda ʋakaʋuya ʋo neɀegumi ɀenzombe namakwai, neɀegumi ɀeɀinhu ɀakatsaurwa ɀakaŋga ɀatsaurirwa Jehova Mŋari waʋo, ʋakaɀiita mirwi.
Ʋakataŋga kuita mirwi pamŋedzi wecitatu, ʋakapedza nomŋedzi wecinomŋe.
Ɀino Hezekia namacinda, ʋakati ʋaȿika nokuʋona mirwi, ʋakaʋoŋga Jehova naʋanhu ʋake ʋaIsraeri.
Ipapo Hezekia wakabvunza ʋaprista naʋaRevi pamsoro pemirwi.

Azaria muprista mukuru weimba yaZadoki akamupindura, akati: Kubva ŋguʋa yaʋakataŋga kuisa ɀipo muimba yaJehova, takadya, tikaguta, tikasarirwa neɀizhinji, nokuti Jehova wakaropafadza ʋanhu ʋake; ɀasara ndiɀo ɀizhinji iɀi.
Ipapo Hezekia wakaraira kuti ʋagadzire makamuri mumba maJehova; ʋakaagadzira.
Ʋakapinza ɀipo, nomutoʋo wakatendeka, neɀegumi, neɀinhu ɀakatsaurirwa

naJehieri, naAzazia, naNahati, naAsaheri, naJerimoti, naJozabadi, naErieri, naIsmakia, naMahati, naBenaya, ʋaiʋa ʋatariri pasi paKonania naShimei munuŋuna wake, ʋakaŋga ʋagadzwa namambo Hezekia naAzaria mutariri weimba yaMŋari.
Kore mŋanakomana waImna muRevi, mutariri
Pasi pake pakaŋga panaEdeni, naMiniamini, naJeshua, naShemaya, naAmaria, naShekania, mumaguta aʋaprista, pamaɓasa aʋo akatarwa, kuti ʋape hama dzaʋo namapoka, ʋakuru naʋaɗuku ʋose;

ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgi ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋo, kubva pamakore matatu naʋanopfuʋura, aninani waipinda mumba maJehova, kuzoita maɓasa akaɗikanwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, pamaɓasa aʋo aʋakaŋga ʋapiwa namapoka aʋo;
naʋakaŋga ʋaʋereŋgwa pamazita aʋaprista nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, naʋaRevi ʋamakore makumi maʋiri naʋakapfuʋura, pamaɓasa aʋo namapoka aʋo;
naʋakaʋereŋgwa namazita epxere dzaʋo dzose, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋanasikana ʋaʋo, paʋuŋgano yose; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaɀinatsa noʋutȿene pamaɓasa aʋo akatarwa;

naʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋari kuminda yoruwa rwamaguta aʋo, paguta rimŋe nerimŋe, kwaiʋa naʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋo, kuti ʋape ʋarume ʋose pakati paʋaprista migoʋe yaʋo, naʋose ʋakaʋereŋgwa mazita aʋo pakati paʋaRevi.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita Hezekia kwaJuda kwose; akaita ɀakanaka neɀakarurama neɀakatendeka pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake.
Paɓasa rimŋe nerimŋe raakataŋga pakushumira paimba yaMŋari, napamurairo, napamirau, napakutȿaka Mŋari wake, wakaɀiita nomŋoyo wake wose, akakunda.
Shure kweɀinhu iɀi, nokutendeka uku, Sanheribi mambo weAsiria wakaȿika akapinda kwaJuda, akadzika matente kuzorwa namaguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, acifuŋga kuɀikundira iwo.
Ɀino Hezekia wakati aciʋona kuti Sanheribi waȿika, ʋuye kuti wakaŋga aciʋaʋarira kurwa neJerusarema,
akaraŋgana namacinda ake naʋarume ʋake ʋanesimba, kuti ʋadziʋire mvura yamatsime akaŋga ari kunze kweguta; iʋo ʋakamuɓatsira.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakadziʋira matsime ose norukoʋa rwakaŋga ruciyerera napakati penyika iyo, ʋaciti: Madzimambo eAsiria acaȿikirei’ko, akawana mvura zhinji?

Iye akatsuŋga mŋoyo, akaʋaka ruȿiŋgo rwose rwaŋga rwakoromoka, akaruʋaka kuȿikira pashoŋgwe, norumŋe ruȿiŋgo rwokunze ʋo, akasimbisa Miro paguta raDavidi, akapfura nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo nenhoʋo zhinji.
Akagadza ʋo ʋakuru ʋehondo pamsoro paʋanhu, akaʋaʋuŋganidza kwaari paɗare pasuʋo reguta, akataura noʋunyoro naʋo, aciti:
Iʋai nesimba, mutsuŋge mŋoyo, regai kutya kana kuvunduka pamberi pamambo weAsiria, kana pamberi paʋazhinji ʋose ʋaanaʋo; nokuti une’su mukuru kunowaanaye iye;
iye unoruʋoko rwenyama, asi une’su ndiJehova Mŋari weɗu, kuzotiɓatsira nokurwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu. Ʋanhu ʋakaʋimba namashoko aHezekia mambo waJuda.

Shure kwaiɀoɀi Sanheribi mambo weAsiria wakatuma ʋaranda ʋake Jerusarema, (ɀino iye wakaŋga ari pamberi peRakishi, anehondo yake yose) kunaHezekia mambo waJuda, nokuʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari Jerusarema, akati:
Ɀanzi naSanheribi mambo weAsiria: Cinyiko camunoʋimba naco, ɀamunorambira paJerusarema makakombga?
Ko Hezekia haazino‐kukurudzirai, kuti mugozofa nenzara nenyota here, ɀaanoti: Jehova Mŋari weɗu ucatirwira paruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria?
Haazi iye Hezekia wakabvisa matunhu ake akakwirira neartari dzake, akaraira Juda neJerusarema, aciti: Munofanira kunamata pamberi peartari imŋe, ʋuye munofanira kupisa ɀinonhuwira ipapo here?
Hamuziʋi here ɀatakaitira ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ino, ini namadziɓaɓa aŋgu? Ko ʋamŋari ʋendudzi dzenyika idzo ʋakatoŋgogona kurwira nyika yaʋo paruʋoko rwaŋgu here?
Ndianiko pakati paʋamŋari ʋose ʋendudzi idzo dzakaparadzwa cose namadziɓaɓa aŋgu, wakatoŋgogona kurwira ʋanhu ʋake paruʋoko rwaŋgu here? Ɀino Mŋari wenyu ucagona kukurwirai paruʋoko rwaŋgu here?

Ɀino naiɀoɀo Hezekia ŋgaarege kukunyeŋgerai, kana kukukurudzirai nomutoʋo uyu; regai henyu kumutenda, nokuti hakunamŋari worudzi rupi norupi, kana ʋushe, wakagona kurwira ʋanhu ʋake paruʋoko rwaŋgu naparuʋoko rwamadziɓaɓa aŋgu; ɀikuru sei Mŋari wenyu haŋgakoniwi kukurwirai paruʋoko rwaŋgu here?
Ʋaranda ʋake ʋakawedzera kushoʋora Jehova Mŋari nomuranda wake Hezekia.

Akanyora ʋo ŋwadi yokuɗaɗira nayo Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, nokumushoʋora, aciti: Ʋamŋari ʋendudzi dzenyika idzo seɀaʋasina‐kurwira ʋanhu ʋaʋo paruʋoko rwaŋgu, saiɀoɀo ʋo Mŋari waHezekia haaŋgarwiri ʋanhu ʋake paruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ʋakaɗanidzira nenzwi guru norurimi rwaʋaJuda kuʋanhu ʋeJerusarema ʋakaŋga ʋari pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, kuʋatyisa, nokuʋavundusa, kuti ʋagokunda guta.
Ʋakataura pamsoro paMŋari weJerusarema, ʋacimuenzanisa naʋamŋari ʋaʋanhu ʋenyika, ʋakaitwa namaʋoko aʋanhu.
Ɀino mambo Hezekia nomuprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi, ʋakanyeŋgetera nokuɗa kwacinhu ici, ʋakacemera kuɗeŋga.

Ipapo Jehova akatuma mutumŋa wakaparadza ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanesimba noʋumhare, naʋatuŋgamiriri, naʋakuru pamisasa yamambo weAsiria. Saka iye wakadzokera kunyika yake acinyara. Ɀino wakati acipinda mumba mamŋari wake, aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuɗa paciʋuno cake ʋakamuʋurayira’po nomunondo.
Saiɀoɀo Jehova wakarwira Hezekia naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema paruʋoko rwaSanheribi mambo weAsiria napamaʋoko aʋose, akaʋaceŋgeta pamatiʋi ose.
Ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuya neɀipo kunaJehova paJerusarema, neɀinhu ɀinokosha kunaHezekia mambo waJuda; naiɀoɀo kubva paŋguʋa iyo wakakudzwa pamberi pendudzi dzose.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo Hezekia akarwara, kuȿikira pakufa; akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, iye akataura naye, akamupa ciratidzo.
Asi cinhu ico cakanaka caakaitirwa, Hezekia haana‐kuciripira ɀakanaka, nokuti mŋoyo wake wakaɀikudza,
Asi Hezekia wakazoɀininipisa pamsoro pokuɀikudza kwomŋoyo wake, iye naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema, saka kutsamŋa kwaJehova hakuna‐kuʋaʋiŋga pamazuʋa aHezekia.
Hezekia wakaŋga anefuma zhinji nokukudzwa, akaɀiitira ɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yesirveri, neyendarama, neyeɀibge ɀinokosha, neyeɀinonhuwira, neyenhoʋo, neyemidziyo yose yakanaka yamarudzi ose;
namatura eɀiyo ɀakawanda,
Wakaɀiwanira ʋo maguta, nefuma yamakwai neŋombe zhinji; nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga amupa fuma zhinji kwaɀo.
Ndiye Hezekia ʋo wakadziʋira tsime rokumsoro remvura yeGihoni, akaifambisa ikarurama kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa rweguta raDavidi. Hezekia akakunda pamaɓasa ake ose.
Asi
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aHezekia, neɀakanaka ɀaakaɓata, tarirai, ɀakanyorwa paneɀakaʋonekwa nomuprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi, mubuku yamadzimambo aJuda naIsraeri.

Hezekia akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga kumukwidzwa unoenda kumarinda aʋanakomana ʋaDavidi; ʋaJuda ʋose naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema ʋakamukudza pakufa kwake. Mŋanakomana wake Manase akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Manase wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anegumi namaʋiri; akaɓata ʋushe makore anamakumi mashanu namashanu paJerusarema;
akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, akateʋera ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋahedeni ʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti wakaʋaka ɀe matunhu akakwirira, akaŋga aputswa naɓaɓa ʋake Hezekia; akamutsira ʋaBaari artari, akaisa’po ʋo matanda okunamata nawo; akanamata kuhondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga, akadzishumira.
Akaʋaka artari mumba maJehova, kunyaŋge Jehova wakati: PaJerusarema ndi’po pacagara zita raŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Akaʋakira hondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga artari muʋazhe mbiri dzeimba yaJehova.

Akapinza ʋo ʋana ʋake mumŋoto pamupata womŋanakomana waHinomi; akatenda mashura, akaita mazaŋgo, akaɓata noʋuroyi, akagadza maȿikiro naʋaʋuki; akaita ɀakaipa ɀizhinji pamberi paJehova, ndokumutsamŋisa naɀo.
Akaisa mufananidzo wakaʋezwa wecifananidzo
Ʋuye handicabvisi tsoka dzaIsraeri panyika yandakaratidza madziɓaɓa enyu; kana ʋacicenjera ɓedzi kuita ɀose ɀandakaʋaraira, murairo wose, neɀakatemŋa, neɀakarairwa naMosesi.
Manase akatsausa ʋaJuda naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema, ʋakaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura ɀakaitwa nendudzi dzakaparadzwa naJehova pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Jehova akataura naManase naʋanhu ʋake; asi haʋana‐kuterera.
Saka Jehova wakaʋuyisa ʋakuru ʋehondo yamambo weAsiria kuzorwa naʋo, iʋo ʋakaɓata Manase neɀikokoʋonho, ʋakamusuŋga namaketani, ʋakaenda naye Babironi.
Ɀino wakati ari pakutambudzika kwake, akacema kunaJehova Mŋari wake, akaɀininipisa kwaɀo pamberi paJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ake;
akanyeŋgetera kwaari, akamuterera, akanzwa kukumbira kwake, ndokumudzosera Jerusarema paʋushe bgake. Ipapo Manase wakaziʋa kuti Jehova ndiye Mŋari.
Shure kwaiɀoɀi wakaʋaka ruȿiŋgo necokunze kweguta raDavidi, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa rweGihoni, mumupata, ipo paʋanopinda napo pasuʋo rehoʋe; akakomberedza Oferi, akaʋaka
Akabvisa ʋamŋari ʋatorwa, necifananidzo mumba maJehova, neartari dzose dzaakaŋga aʋaka mugomo reimba yaJehova, napaJerusarema, ndokuɀirashira kunze kweguta.
Akaʋaka ɀe artari yaJehova, akaɓayira’po ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, neɀokuʋoŋga, akaraira ʋaJuda kuti ʋashumire Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋaciɓayira pamatunhu akakwirira, asi
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aManase, nomunyeŋgetero wake kunaMŋari wake, namashoko aʋaʋoni ʋakataura kwaari nezita raJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamaɓasa amadzimambo aIsraeri.

Munyeŋgetero wake ʋo, nokunzwika kwomunyeŋgetero wake, neɀiʋi ɀake ɀose, nokuɗarika kwake, nenɀimbo paakaʋaka matunhu akakwirira napaakaisa matanda okunamata nawo nemifananidzo yakaʋezwa, acigere kuɀininipisa, tarirai ɀakanyorwa pakurondedzera kwaHozai.
Ipapo Manase akaʋata namadziɓaɓa ake, ʋakamuʋiga mumba make, Amoni mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Amoni wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namaʋiri akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore maʋiri.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova, seɀakaita Manase ɓaɓa ʋake; Amoni akaɓayira mifananidzo yose yakaʋezwa, yakaŋga yaitwa naManase ɓaɓa ʋake, akaɀishumira.
haana‐kuɀininipisa pamberi paJehova, sokuɀininipisa kwaManase ɓaɓa ʋake; asi Amoni uyu wakaramba aciŋgowedzera kuɗarika kwake.
Ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaraŋgana ʋakamumukira, ʋakamuʋuraya mumba make.
Asi ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakazoʋuraya ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaraŋgana ʋakamukira mambo Amoni; ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakaita mŋanakonana wake Josia mambo panɀimbo yake.
Josia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore masere; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anamakumi matatu nerimŋe.
Akaita ɀakarurama pamberi paJehova, akafamba nenzira yaɓaɓa ʋake Davidi, haana‐kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe.
Nokuti pagore rorusere rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, aciri muɗuku, wakataŋga kutȿaka Mŋari waDavidi ɓaɓa ʋake; ɀino pagore regumi namaʋiri akataŋga kunatsa Juda neJerusarema,

Ʋakakoromora artari dzaʋaBaari, iye ari’po; akatema mifananidzo yezuʋa yakaŋga yakaitwa pamsoro padzo; akaputsanya matanda okunamata nawo, nemifananidzo yakaʋezwa, nemifananidzo yakaʋumbga, akaɀikuya ɀikaita guruʋa, akarisasa pamarinda aʋaiɀiɓayira.
Akapisa mafupa aʋaprista paartari dzaʋo, akanatsa Juda neJerusarema.
ʋo saiɀoɀo pamaguta aManase naEfraimi naSimeoni, kuȿikira paNaftari, pamatoŋgo awo.
Akaputsa artari, akakuya matanda okunamata nawo nemifananidzo yakaʋezwa ɀikaita guruʋa, akatema mifananidzo yose yezuʋa panyika yose yaIsraeri, ndokudzokera Jerusarema.

Ɀino pagore regumi namasere rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, wakati anatsa nyika neimba, ndokutuma Shafani mŋanakomana waAzaria, naMaaseya, muɓati weguta, naJoa mŋanakomana waJoahazi, sahwira, kundogadzira imba yaJehova Mŋari wake.
Ʋakaȿika kunaHirkia muprista mukuru, ʋaka
Ʋakaipa pamaʋoko aʋaɓati ʋakaŋga ʋacitarira imba yaJehova, naʋaɓati ʋakaŋga ʋaciɓata mumba maJehova, ʋakairipa kuzoʋandudza nokugadzirisa imba;
ʋakaipa ʋaʋezi naʋaʋaki, kuti ʋateŋge mabge akaʋezwa namatanda okuɓatanidza, nokuita mapaŋgo edzimba dzakaŋga dzaparadzwa namadzimambo aJuda.
Ʋanhu aʋo ʋakaɓate‐ɓasa nokutendeka; ʋatariri ʋaʋo ʋaiʋa Jahati naObadia, ʋaRevi ʋaʋanakomana ʋaMerari, naZekaria, naMeshurami, ʋaʋanakomana ʋaKohati, kuzoraira ɓasa; na
Iʋo ʋaitarira ʋo ʋatakuri ʋemitoro, ʋakaraira ʋo ʋose ʋaiɓata maɓasa amarudzi ose; pakati paʋaRevi pakaŋga panaʋanyori, naʋatariri, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗisa mari yakaŋga yaiswa mumba maJehova, muprista Hirkia ndokuwana buku yomurairo waJehova,
Hirkia akapindura, akati kunaShafani munyori: Ndawana buku yomurairo mumba maJehova. Hirkia ndokupa buku iyo kunaShafani.
Ɀino Shafani akaenda nebuku kunamambo, ʋuye akaenda ʋo neshoko kunamambo, akati: Ɀose ɀakarairwa ʋaranda ʋenyu, ʋanoɀiita.
Ʋaɗurura mari yakawanikwa mumba maJehova, ʋakaiisa mumaʋoko aʋatariri, nomumaʋoko aʋaɓati ʋeɓasa.
Ɀino Shafani munyori akaʋudza mambo, akati: Muprista Hirkia wandipa buku. Ipapo Shafani akaraʋa’mo pamberi pamambo.
Ɀino mambo wakati acinzwa mashoko omurairo, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake.
Mambo akaraira Hirkia naAhikami mŋanakomana waShafani, naAbdoni mŋanakomana waMika, naShafani munyori, naAsaya muranda wamambo, akati:
