Endai mundondibvunzira Jehova, ini naʋakasara ʋaIsraeri naʋaJuda pamsoro pamashoko ebuku yakawanikwa; nokuti kutsamŋa kwaJehova, kwaɗururwa pamsoro peɗu, kukuru, nokuti madziɓaɓa eɗu haana‐kuceŋgeta shoko raJehova, kuti ʋaite ɀose ɀakanyorwa mubuku iyi.
Ipapo Hirkia naʋakaŋga
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ʋudzai munhu wakakutumai kwandiri, muti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, napamsoro paʋagere’po, iko kutuka kwose kwakanyorwa mubuku iyo yaʋakaraʋa pamberi pamambo waJuda.
Nokuti ʋakandirasha, ʋakapisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira, ʋakanditsamŋisa namaɓasa ose amaʋoko aʋo; naiɀoɀo kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kwaɗururwa pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, hakuŋgadzimŋi.
Asi muti kunamambo waJuda, wakakutumai kuzobvunza Jehova: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Kana ari mashoko awakanzwa,

mŋoyo wako ɀawakaŋga uri munyoro, ukaɀininipisa pamberi paMŋari, ŋguʋa yawakanzwa mashoko ake pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, napamsoro paʋagere’mo, ukaɀininipisa pamberi paŋgu, ukabvarura ŋguʋo dzako, ukacema pamberi paŋgu, ɀino ɀanzi naJehova: Ini ndakunzwa ʋo.
Tarira, ndicakuisa kumadziɓaɓa ako, ucaʋigwa mubgiro bgako nomufaro; meso ako haaŋgaʋoni ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandicaʋuyisa pamsoro penɀimbo iyi, naʋanhu ʋagere’mo. Ʋakadzoka neshoko kunamambo.
Ipapo mambo akatuma ʋanhu ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋakuru ʋose ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema.

Mambo akakwira kumba kwaJehova, anaʋarume ʋose ʋaJuda, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋanhu ʋose, ʋakuru naʋaɗuku; akaʋaraʋira mashoko ose ebuku yesuŋgano yakaŋga yawanikwa mumba maJehova.

Mambo akamira panɀimbo yake, akaita suŋgano pamberi paJehova, akaɀisuŋga kuteʋera Jehova, nokuceŋgeta mirairo yake, neɀipupuriro ɀake, neɀaakatema, nomŋoyo wake wose nomŋeya wake wose, kuti aite mashoko esuŋgano akanyorwa mubuku iyi.
Akaraira ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari Jerusarema naBenjamini kuabvumira. Ʋagere Jerusarema ʋakaita seɀakarebga pasuŋgano yaMŋari, iye Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Josia akabvisa ɀakaŋga ɀicinyaŋgadza ɀose panyika dzose dzaiʋa dzaʋana ʋaIsraeri, akaraira ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari pakati paIsraeri kushumira
Ɀino Josia wakaitira Jehova paseka paJerusarema; ʋakaʋuraya
Akagadza ʋaprista pamaɓasa aʋo, akaʋatsuŋgisa paɓasa reimba yaJehova.

Akati kuʋaRevi ʋaidzidzisa ʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatȿene kunaJehova: Isai areka tȿene muimba yakaʋakwa naSoromoni mŋanakomana waDavidi mambo waIsraeri; hamucazoʋi nomutoro pamafudzi enyu; ɀino, shumirai Jehova Mŋari wenyu, naʋanhu ʋake Israeri.
Ɀigadzirei, nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa enyu namapoka enyu, seɀakanyorwa naDavidi mambo waIsraeri, neɀakanyorwa naSoromoni mŋanakomana wake.
Mumire panɀimbo tȿene, seɀamakagoʋerwa nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa ehama dzenyu iʋo ʋana ʋaʋanhu; imba imŋe neimŋe yamadziɓaɓa aʋaRevi
Muʋuraye
Ipapo Josia akapa ʋana ʋaʋanhu ɀimŋe ɀipfuwo, makwaiana nembudzana, ɀose kuti ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀepaseka,
Namacinda ake akapa ʋo nomŋoyo wose kunaʋanhu, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi. Hirkia, naZekaria, naJehieri, ʋaɓati ʋeimba yaMŋari, ʋakapa ʋaprista
NaKonania, naShemaya, naNetaneri, hama dzake, naHashabia, naJeyieri, naJozabadi, ʋakuru ʋaʋaRevi, ʋakapa ʋaRevi
Ƃasa rikagadzirwa saiɀoɀo, naʋaprista ʋakamira panɀimbo yaʋo, naʋaRevi pamapoka aʋo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa namambo.
Ipapo ʋakaʋuraya
Ʋakabvisa ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, kuti ʋaɀipe nemigoʋe yedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋana ʋaʋanhu, kuti ʋaɀiɓayire Jehova, seɀakanyorwa mubuku yaMosesi. Ʋakaita saiɀoɀo nenzombe ʋo.
Ʋakagoca paseka pamŋoto, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa; ʋakaɓika ɀipiriso ɀitȿene muhari, nomumakate, nomumakaŋgo, ʋakacimbidzika kuɀiisa kuʋana ʋose ʋaʋanhu.

Pashure ʋakaɀigadzirira iʋo naʋaprista; nokuti ʋaprista ʋanakomana ʋaAroni ʋakaŋga ʋaciɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa namafuta aɀo kuȿikira ʋusiku; saka ʋaRevi ʋakaɀigadzirira iʋo naʋaprista, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAroni.

Naʋaimbi iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAsafi, ʋakaŋga ʋari panɀimbo yaʋo, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa naDavidi, naAsafi, naHemani, naJedutuni muʋoni wamambo; naʋarindi ʋakaŋga ʋari pamasuʋo ose; iʋo haʋana‐kufanira kubva pamaɓasa aʋo, nokuti hama dzaʋo ʋaRevi dzakaʋagadzirira.
Ƃasa rose raJehova rikagadzirwa saiɀoɀo pazuʋa iro, rokuita paseka, nokuɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa paartari yaJehova, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa namambo Josia.
Ɀino ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋakaita paseka neŋguʋa iyo, nomutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe.

Paseka yakaɗai hainakumboitwa pakati paIsraeri kubva pamazuʋa omuprofita Samueri; hakuna‐kumboʋa mumŋe wamadzimambo aIsraeri wakaita paseka yakaŋga yakafanana neyakaitwa naJosia, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋaJuda naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’po naʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema.
Paseka iyo yakaitwa negore regumi namasere rokuɓata ʋushe kwaJosia.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ɀose, Josia agadzira tembere, Neko mambo weEgipita akandorwa naKarkemishi paUfratesi; Josia akandorwa naye.
Asi iye wakatuma nhume kwaari, aciti: Ndineiko newe, iwe mambo waJuda? Handina‐kuʋuya kuzorwa newe nhasi, asi neimba yandinosirwa nayo; Mŋari wakandiraira kuti ndicimbidzike; ɀino iwe cirega hako
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Josia wakaramba kumurega, asi wakaɀishandura kuti arwe naye; haana‐kuterera mashoko aNeko, akabva pamuromo waMŋari, akaenda kundorwa naye pamupata waMegido.
Ɀino ʋafuri ʋoʋuta ʋakafura mambo Josia; mambo akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Ndibvisei, nokuti ndakuʋadzwa kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋaranda ʋake ʋakamubvisa paŋgoro yake, ʋakamuisa paŋgoro yake yecipiri yaakaŋga anayo, ʋakamuisa Jerusarema; akafa, akaʋigwa mumabgiro amadziɓaɓa ake. ƲaJuda ʋose neJerusarema ʋakacema Josia.

Jeremia akaita rwiyo rwokucema Josia; naʋaimbi ʋose ʋarume naʋaimbi ʋakadzi ʋakareʋa ɀaJosia panziyo dzaʋo dzokucema kuȿikira nhasi; ʋakaɀiita tsika pakati paIsraeri; tarirai ɀakanyorwa panziyo dzokucema.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJosia, neɀakanaka ɀaakaita, ɀakanzwana neɀakanyorwa mumurairo waJehova,
neɀaakaita, ɀokutaŋga neɀokupedzisira, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamadzimambo aIsraeri naJuda.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakatora Jehoahazi mŋanakomana waJosia, ʋakamuita mambo panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake paJerusarema.
Joahazi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namatatu, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema mŋedzi mitatu.
Mambo weEgipita akamubvisa paʋushe paJerusarema, akaripisa nyika matarenta esirveri anezana,
Mambo weEgipita akagadza Eriyakimi munuŋuna wake aʋe mambo waJuda neJerusarema, akashandura zita rake, rikazoʋa Jehoyakimi. Neko akatora munuŋuna wake Joahazi, akaenda naye Egipita.
Jehoyakimi wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri namashanu; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi nerimŋe; akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake.
Ɀino Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi akaȿika kuzorwa naye, akamusuŋga namaketani, kundomuisa Babironi.
Nebukadnezari akaenda ʋo nedzimŋe nhumbi dzeimba yaJehova akadziisa Babironi, akadziisa mutembere yake paBabironi.
Ɀino mamŋe maɓasa aJehoyakimi, neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀake ɀaakaita, neɀakawanikwa maari, tarirai ɀakanyorwa mubuku yamadzimambo aIsraeri naJuda; Jehoyakini mŋanakomana wake akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Jehoyakini wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore masere, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema mŋedzi mitatu namazuʋa anegumi; akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino gore rakati rapera mambo Nebukadnezari akatuma
Zedekia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore makumi maʋiri nerimŋe; akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi nerimŋe.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova Mŋari wake; haana‐kuɀininipisa pamberi pomuprofita Jeremia,
Wakamukira ʋo mambo Nebukadnezari, wakaŋga amupikisa naMŋari; asi wakawomesa mutsipa wake, nokuwomesa mŋoyo wake, akarega kutendeʋukira kunaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri.
Ʋuye ʋakuru ʋose ʋaprista naʋanhu ʋakaɗarika ɀikuru kwaɀo, ʋakateʋera ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀose ɀaʋahedeni, ʋakaȿiɓisa imba yaJehova yaakaŋga atsaura paJerusarema.
Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aʋo akatuma
asi ʋakaseka nhume dzaMŋari, ʋakaɀidza mashoko ake, ʋakaɗaɗira ʋaprofita ʋake, kuȿikira Jehova atsamŋira ʋanhu ʋake, kuȿikira ʋasicagoni kurapxa.

Saka wakaʋuyisa mambo waʋaKardea kwaʋari, akaʋuraya majaya aʋo nomunondo paimba yaʋo tȿene; haana‐kunzwira tsitsi kunyaŋge jaya, kana musikana, kana mutana, kana wakacena vudzi; wakaʋaisa ʋose muruʋoko rwake.
Nhumbi dzose ʋo dzeimba yaMŋari, huru neɗuku, nefuma yeimba yaJehova, nefuma yamambo neyamacinda ake, wakaɀiisa ɀose Babironi.
Ʋakapisa imba yaMŋari, ʋakaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema, ʋakapisa dzimba dzose dzoʋushe dzaro nomŋoto, ʋakaparadza nhumbi dzose dzinokosha dzaro.
Aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋapukunyuka pamunondo, wakaenda naʋo Babironi; ʋakandoʋa ʋaranda ʋake naʋaʋanakomana ʋake kuȿikira ʋushe ʋuciɓatwa naʋaPersia;
kuti shoko raJehova, rakaŋga rarebga nomuromo waJeremia, riitike; kuȿikira nyika yafarira masaɓata ayo, nokuti paŋguʋa yose yokuparadzwa kwayo yakaceŋgeta masaɓata, ikaȿitsa makore anamakumi manomŋe.

Ɀino negore rokutaŋga raKoreshi mambo wePersia, kuti shoko raJehova rakaŋga rarebga nomuromo waJeremia riitike, Jehova wakamutsa mŋeya waKoreshi mambo wePersia, akaparidza paʋushe bgake bgose, akaɀinyora ʋo, aciti:

Ɀanzi naKoreshi mambo wePersia: Jehova Mŋari wokuɗeŋga wakandipa ʋushe bgose bgenyika, akandiraira kuti ndimuʋakire imba paJerusarema riri paJuda. Aninani uri’po pakati penyu waʋanhu ʋake, Jehova Mŋari wake ŋgaaʋe naye, ŋgaakwire hake’ko.

Ɀino negore rokutaŋga raKoreshi mambo wePersia, kuti shoko raJehova rakarebga nomuromo waJeremia riitike, Jehova wakamutsa mŋeya waKoreshi mambo wePersia, akaparidza paʋushe bgake bgose, akaɀinyora ʋo, akati:
Ɀanzi naKoreshi mambo wePersia: Jehova Mŋari wokuɗeŋga wakandipa ʋushe bgose bgenyika, akandiraira kuti ndimuʋakire imba paJerusarema riri paJuda.
Ɀino aninani uri’po pakati penyu waʋanhu ʋake, Jehova Mŋari wake ŋgaaʋe naye, ŋgaakwire hake Jerusarema riri paJuda, kundoʋaka imba yaJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, (ndiye Mŋari), unogara Jerusarema.
Aninani wakasara, papi napapi paanogara, ʋarume ʋokwake ŋgaʋamuɓatsire nesirveri, nendarama, nenhumbi, neŋombe, ʋuye neɀipo ɀaʋanopa nokuɀiɗira,
Ipapo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aJuda naBenjamini ʋakaɀigadzira, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, iʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamutswa mŋeya yaʋo naMŋari, kundoʋaka imba yaJehova yakaŋga iri paJerusarema.
Ʋuye ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋapoteredza ʋakasimbisa maʋoko aʋo nemidziyo yesirveri, nendarama, nenhumbi, neŋombe, neɀinhu ɀinokosha, pamŋe cete neɀose ɀaʋakaʋapa nomŋoyo waʋo.
Naiye mambo Koreshi ʋo wakaɓuɗisa midziyo yeimba yaJehova, yakaŋga yatorwa paJerusarema naNebukadnezari ikaiswa naye paimba yaʋamŋari ʋake;
Koreshi mambo wePersia akaraira Mitredati muceŋgeti wefuma kuɓuɗisa iyeyo, akaiʋereŋga aciipa Sheshibazari, mucinda waJuda.
Kuwanda kwayo ndikoku: Ndiro dzendarama dzinamakumi matatu, nendiro dzesirveri dzinecuru cimŋe, namapaŋga anamakumi maʋiri namapfumbamŋe;
nembiya dzendarama dzinamakumi matatu, nembiya dzesirveri dzorumŋe rudzi dzinamazana manna negumi, nemimŋe midziyo inecuru cimŋe.
Midziyo yose yendarama neyesirveri yakaŋga ineɀuru ɀishanu namazana manna. Iɀo ɀose Sheshibazari wakaenda naɀo paŋguʋa yokubva kwaʋatapxa Babironi ʋacienda Jerusarema.
Ɀino aʋa ndiʋo ʋana ʋorutiʋi rwenyika ya
iʋo ʋakaʋuya naZerubaberi, naJeshua, naNehemia, naSeraya, naReeraya, naMordekai, naBirshani, naMispari, naBigvai, naRehumi, naBaana.
Kuwanda kwaʋarume ʋaʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ndiko: Ʋana ʋaParoshi, ɀuru ɀiʋiri nezana namakumi manomŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaShefatia, mazana matatu namakumi manomŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaAra, mazana manomŋe namakumi manomŋe naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋaPahati‐moabi, ʋaʋana ʋaJeshua
Ʋana ʋaErami, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaZetu, mazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi manna naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋaZakai, mazana manomŋe namakumi matanhatu.
Ʋana ʋaBani, mazana matanhatu namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaBebai, mazana matanhatu namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋana ʋaAzgadi, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaAdonikami, mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu naʋatanhatu.
Ʋana ʋaBigvai, ɀuru ɀiʋiri namakumi mashanu naʋatanhatu.
Ʋana ʋaAdini, mazana manna namakumi mashanu naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaAteri, waHezekia, makumi mapfumbamŋe naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaBezai, mazana matatu namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋana ʋaJora, zana negumi naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaHashumi, mazana maʋiri namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋana ʋeGibari, makumi mapfumbamŋe naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋeBeti‐rehemi, zana namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋarume ʋeNetofa, makumi mashanu naʋatanhatu.
Ʋarume ʋeAnatoti, zana namakumi maʋiri naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋeAzmaveti, makumi manna naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋeKiriati‐arimi, neKefira, neBeeroti, mazana manomŋe namakumi manna naʋatatu.
Ʋana ʋeRama neGeba, mazana matanhatu namakumi maʋiri nomumŋe.
Ʋarume ʋeMikmashi, zana namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Ʋarume ʋeBeti‐eri neAi, mazana maʋiri namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋarume ʋeNebo, makumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋeMagbishi, zana namakumi mashanu naʋatanhatu.
Ʋana ʋaErami wecipiri, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaHarimi, mazana matatu namakumi maʋiri.
Ʋana ʋeRodi, neHadidi, neOno, mazana manomŋe namakumi maʋiri naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋeJeriko, mazana matatu namakumi manna naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋeSenaa, ɀuru ɀitatu namazana matanhatu namakumi matatu.
Ʋaprista
Ʋana ʋeImeri, curu cimŋe namakumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaPashuri, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi manna naʋanomŋe.
Ʋana ʋaHarimi, curu cimŋe negumi naʋanomŋe.
ƲaRevi
Ʋaimbi
Ʋana ʋaʋarindi ʋemikoʋa
ƲaNetinimi
naʋana ʋaKerosi naʋana ʋaSiaha, naʋana ʋaPadoni;
naʋana ʋaRebana, naʋana ʋaHagaba, naʋana ʋaAkubi;
naʋana ʋaHagabi, naʋana ʋaShamrai, naʋana ʋaHanani;
naʋana ʋaGideri, naʋana ʋaGahari, naʋana ʋaReaya;
naʋana ʋaRezini, naʋana ʋaNekoda, naʋana ʋaGazami;
naʋana ʋaUza, naʋana ʋaPasea, naʋana ʋaBesai;
naʋana ʋaAsna, naʋana ʋaMeunimi, naʋana ʋaNefisimi;
naʋana ʋaBakbuki, naʋana ʋaHakufa, naʋana ʋaHarhuri;
naʋana ʋaBazruti, naʋana ʋaMehida, naʋana ʋaHarsha;
naʋana ʋaBarkosi, naʋana ʋaSisera, naʋana ʋaTema;
naʋana ʋaNezia, naʋana ʋaHatifa.
Ʋana ʋaʋaranda ʋaSoromoni
naʋana ʋaJaara, naʋana ʋaDarkoni, naʋana ʋaGideri;
naʋana ʋaShefatia, naʋana ʋaHatiri, naʋana ʋaPokereti‐hazebaimi, naʋana ʋaAmi.
ƲaNetinimi ʋose naʋana ʋaʋaranda ʋaSoromoni ʋaiʋa mazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ndiʋo ʋakakwira ʋacibva Terimera, neTeriharsha, neKerubi, neAdani, neImeri; asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuɗudza dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, namarudzi aʋo, kana ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaIsraeri:
Ʋana ʋaDeraya, naʋana ʋaTobia, naʋana ʋaNekoda, mazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Naʋana ʋaʋaprista
Aʋa ʋakatȿaka mazita aʋo
Ipapo muɓati akaʋaʋudza kuti ʋarege kudya ɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene, kuȿikira kwamuka muprista uneUrimi neTumimi.
Ʋuŋgano yose yakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀiʋiri namazana matatu namakumi matanhatu,
ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgi ʋaranda ʋaʋo naʋarandakadzi ʋaʋo, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana matatu namakumi matatu naʋanomŋe; ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋaimbi ʋarume naʋakadzi ʋanamazana maʋiri.
Ʋakaŋga ʋanamabiza anamazana manomŋe namakumi matatu namatanhatu; mahesera aʋo akaŋga anamazana maʋiri namakumi manna namashanu;
namakamera aʋo, mazana manna namakumi matatu namashanu, nemboŋgoro dzaʋo ɀuru ɀitanhatu namazana manomŋe namakumi maʋiri.
Ʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, pakuȿika kwaʋo paimba yaJehova paJerusarema, ʋakaʋigira nomŋoyo waʋo ɀipo ɀaʋo, kuti ʋamutse imba yaMŋari paʋugaro bgayo.
Ʋakapa seɀaʋakagona mari yokuɓate‐ɓasa nayo madariki
Ɀino ʋaprista naʋaRevi, naʋamŋe ʋanhu, naʋaimbi naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaNetinimi, ʋakagara pamaguta aʋo, naʋaIsraeri ʋose pamaguta aʋo.
Ɀino mŋedzi wecinomŋe wakati waȿika, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaʋa mumaguta

Ipapo Jeshua mŋanakomana waJozadaki, nehama dzake ʋaprista, naZerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, nehama dzake, ʋakasimuka, ʋakaʋaka artari yaMŋari waIsraeri, kuti ʋaɓayire’po ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, seɀakanyorwa pamurairo waMosesi munhu waMŋari.
Ʋakagadzika artari panɀimbo yayo, nokuti ʋakatya ʋanhu ʋenyika
Ʋakaita ʋo mutambo wamatumba, seɀakaŋga ɀanyorwa; ʋakaʋuya neɀipiriso ɀaipiswa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe seɀakatarwa, seɀaʋakarairwa, ɀakaɗikanwa pazuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ʋuye pashure cipiriso caipiswa ŋguʋa dzose,
Ʋakataŋga kuɓayira Jehova ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa pazuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wecinomŋe; asi nheyo dzetembere yaJehova dzakaŋga dzicigere kuteyiwa.

Ʋakapa ʋo ʋaʋezi ʋamabge namatanda mari, ʋuye ʋeZidoni naʋeTire ɀokudya neɀokunwa namafuta, kuti ʋatore miti yemisidari paRebanoni, ʋaiise Jopa paguŋgwa, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋatenderwa naKoreshi mambo wePersia.

Ɀino negore recipiri rokuȿika kwaʋo paimba yaMŋari paJerusarema, nomŋedzi wecipiri, Zerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, naJeshua mŋanakomana waJozadaki, nedzimŋe hama dzaʋo ʋaprista naʋaRevi, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋadzokera Jerusarema pakutapxa kwaʋo, ʋakataŋga

Ipapo Jeshua naʋanakomana ʋake nehama dzake, naKadmieri naʋanakomana ʋake, ʋanakomana ʋaJuda, ʋakamira nomŋoyo mumŋe ʋacitarira ʋaiɓata paimba yaMŋari; naʋanakomana ʋaHenadadi, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo nehama dzaʋo, ʋaRevi.

Ɀino ʋaʋaki ʋakati ʋaciteya nheyo dzetembere yaJehova, ʋaprista ʋakamira’po ʋakafuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo, ʋakaɓata hwamanda, naʋaRevi, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaAsafi, ʋakaɓata makandira, kuti ʋarumbidze Jehova seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naDavidi mambo waIsraeri.

Ʋakateŋgezana ʋaciimba, ʋacirumbidza nokuʋoŋga Jehova, ʋaciti: Nokuti wakanaka, nokuti nyasha dzake hadziperi kunaIsraeri. Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakapururudza nokupururudza kukuru pakurumbidza kwaʋo Jehova; nokuti nheyo dzeimba yaJehova dzakaŋga dzateyiwa.
Asi ʋazhinji ʋaʋaprista naʋaRevi, naʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋaya ʋatana ʋakaŋga ʋaʋona imba yokutaŋga, ʋakacema kwaɀo ʋaciʋona nheyo dzeimba iyi dziciteyiwa; ʋazhinji ʋakapururudza nomufaro;
naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kutsaura inzwi rokupururudza romufaro nenzwi rokucema kwaʋanhu; nokuti ʋanhu ʋakapururudza nokupururudza kukuru, inzwi rikanzwika kure kwaɀo.
Ɀino ʋadziʋisi ʋaʋaJuda naʋaBenjamini ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti ʋatapxa ʋoʋakira Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri tembere;

ʋakasweɗera kunaZerubaberi, nokuʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋakati kwaʋari: Ŋgatiʋake nemi, nokuti tinotȿaka Mŋari wenyu, semi ʋo; tinomuɓayira kubva pamazuʋa aEsarihadoni mambo waAsiria, wakatiȿitsa pano.

Asi Zerubaberi, naJeshua, naʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aIsraeri ʋakati kwaʋari: Imi hamuŋgatoŋgoɓatsirani nesu pakuʋakira Mŋari weɗu imba; asi isu toga ticaʋakira Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, seɀatakarairwa namambo Koreshi mambo wePersia.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakashaisa maʋoko aʋanhu ʋaJuda simba, ʋakaʋatambudza pakuʋaka;
ʋakaripira ʋanhu ʋokuʋaraira, kuti ʋakaŋganise ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuita, mazuʋa ose aKoreshi mambo wePersia, kuȿikira Dariusi mambo wePersia acizoɓata ʋushe.
Ɀino Ahasheroshi wakati oɓata ʋushe, ʋakanyora ŋwadi yokukwirira ʋakaŋga ʋagere kwaJuda neJerusarema.
Ɀino pamazuʋa aArtashasta, Bishrami, naMitredati, naTabeeri nedzimŋe shamŋari dzake, ʋakanyorera Artashasta mambo wePersia; iyo ŋwadi yakaŋga yakanyorwa
Rehumi mukuru naShimshai munyori ʋakanyorera mambo Artashasta ŋwadi yokukwirira ʋeJerusarema yaiti:
Rehumi mukuru, naShimshai munyori, nedzimŋe shamŋari dzaʋo, iʋo ʋaDinai, naʋaAfarsatki, naʋaTarperi, naʋaAfarsi, naʋaArkevi, naʋaBabironi, naʋaShushanki, naʋaDehai, naʋaErami,
nedzimŋe ndudzi dzakaʋuya naOsnapari mukuru wakakurumbira, dzikaiswa paguta reSamaria, napanamamŋe matiʋi
Ndiwo mashoko eŋwadi yaʋakatuma kunamambo Artashasta: Ʋaranda ʋenyu, iʋo ʋarume ʋari mhiri kworwizi, namamŋe mashoko akaɗai.
Mambo ŋgaaziʋiswe kuti ʋaJuda, ʋakabva kwenyu ʋakaȿika ʋuno kwatiri paJerusarema, ʋoʋaka guta rokumukira
Ɀino mambo ŋgaaziʋiswe, kuti kana guta iri rikaʋakwa, namaȿiŋgo aro akapera, haʋaŋgaɓuɗisi mutero, kana ɀipo, kana muripo wenzira, pashure madzimambo acatadzirwa.
Ɀino isu, ɀatinodya munyu unobva paimba yamambo, ʋuye ɀatisiŋgafaniri kuʋona mambo acininipiswa, tatuma
kuti ʋanɀere pabuku yenhau yamadziɓaɓa enyu; mucaʋona mubuku yenhau, kuti guta iri raimukira
Tinoziʋisa mambo kuti kana guta iri rikaʋakwa
mambo akatuma mhinduro kunaRehumi mukuru, naShimshai munyori, nedzimŋe shamŋari dzaʋo dzaigara Samaria napamŋe mhiri kworwizi, aciti: Rugare ŋgaruʋe nemi, namamŋe mashoko akaɗai.
Ŋwadi yamakatitumira, ndairaʋirwa ɀakanaka.
Ndikaraira, ʋakanɀera ʋakaʋona kuti guta iri raimukira madzimambo kubva kare nakare, ʋuye kuti mukati maro maiʋa nokumukira
Ʋuye madzimambo anesimba aiʋa’po paJerusarema, aiɓata ʋushe pose pamhiri porwizi; iʋo ʋaiɓuɗisirwa mutero, neɀipo, nomuripo wenzira.
Ɀino temai cireʋo cokuti ʋanhu aʋo ʋarege ɓasa raʋo, guta iri rirege kuʋakwa, kuȿikira ini ndatema cireʋo.
Cenjerai, musanonoka pacinhu ici; cakaipa cicakurireiko, kuzotadzira madzimambo?
Ɀino mashoko eŋwadi yamambo Artashasta akati araʋirwa Rehumi, naShimshai munyori, neshamŋari dzaʋo, ʋakakurumidza kuenda Jerusarema kuʋaJuda, ʋakaʋadziʋisa nokumanikidza nesimba.
Ipapo ɓasa reimba yaMŋari paJerusarema rakaregwa; rikaregwa kuȿikira pagore recipiri rokuɓata ʋushe kwaDariusi mambo wePersia.
Ɀino ʋaprofita, ʋaiti muprofita Hagai, naZekaria mŋanakomana waIdo, ʋakaprofitera ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋari paJuda neJerusarema; ʋakaprofitera nezita raMŋari waIsraeri.
Ipapo Zerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, naJeshua mŋanakomana waJozadaki, ʋakasimuka, ʋakataŋga kuʋaka imba yaMŋari paJerusarema; ʋaprofita ʋaMŋari, ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋo, ʋaciʋaɓatsira.
Ɀino paŋguʋa iyo Tatenai, muɓati wenyika mhiri kworwizi, naShetari‐bozenai, neshamŋari dzaʋo ʋakaȿika kwaʋari, ʋakati kwaʋari: Makarairwa nani kuʋaka imba iyi, nokupedza ruȿiŋgo urwu here?
Ipapo takataura
Asi ziso raMŋari waʋo rakaŋga rakatarira ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda, ʋakakoniwa kuʋaregesa ɓasa, kuȿikira mhaka yaiswa kunaDariusi nemhinduro pamsoro payo icizodzoka neŋwadi.
Ndiwo mashoko eŋwadi yakatumirwa mambo Dariusi naTatenai muɓati mhiri kworwizi, naShetari‐bozenai, neshamŋari dzake ʋaAfarsaki, ʋakaŋga ʋari mhiri kworwizi;
ʋakamutumira ŋwadi makaŋga makanyorwa kuɗai: Kunamambo Dariusi, rugare rwose

Mambo ŋgaaziʋiswe kuti takaenda kurutiʋi rwenyika yaJuda, kuimba yaMŋari mukuru, inoʋakwa namabge makuru, ʋuye matanda anoiswa mumaȿiŋgo; ɓasa iri rinoshiŋgairirwa, rinopfuʋurira mberi ɀakanaka pamaʋoko aʋo.
Ɀino takabvunza ʋakuru iʋaʋo, tikati kwaʋari: Ndianiko wakakurairai kuʋaka imba iyi nokupedza ruȿiŋgo urwu?
Takaʋabvunza ʋo mazita aʋo, kuti tikuziʋisei, tinyore mazita aʋarume ʋanoʋatuŋgamirira.
Ʋakapindura ʋaciti: Isu tiri ʋaranda ʋaMŋari wokuɗeŋga napasi, tinoʋaka imba yakaɗeya kuʋakwa makore mazhinji akapfuʋura, yakaʋakwa nomumŋe mambo mukuru waIsraeri, ikapera.
Asi madziɓaɓa eɗu akati atsamŋisa Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, iye akaʋaisa mumaʋoko aNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, muKardea; iye akaparadza imba ino, akatapa ʋanhu, ndokuenda naʋo Babironi.
Asi negore rokutaŋga raKoreshi mambo weBabironi, mambo Koreshi akaraira, kuti imba ino yaMŋari iʋakwe.

Nemidziyo yendarama neyesirveri yeimba yaMŋari, yakaŋga yatorwa naNebukadnezari patembere yaiʋa Jerusarema, ikaiswa mutembere yeBabironi, mambo Koreshi wakabvisa iɀoɀo mutembere yeBabironi, ɀikapiwa mumŋe wainzi Sheshbazari, waakaŋga aita muɓati;
akati kwaari: Tora midziyo iyi, undoiisa mutembere iri Jerusarema, imba yaMŋari iʋakwe panɀimbo yayo.
Ipapo uyu Sheshbazari wakaʋuya, akateya nheyo dzeimba yaMŋari iri Jerusarema; ɀino kubva paŋguʋa iyo kuȿikira ɀino yakaramba iciʋakwa, naɀino icigere kupera.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, kana mambo acifara naɀo, ŋgaʋanɀere muimba yefuma yamambo iri Babironi,
Ipapo mambo Dariusi wakaraira, ʋakanɀera paimba yamabuku, paʋaiceŋgeta fuma paBabironi.
Ʋakawana paAkmeta, paimba yamambo yakaŋga iri parutiʋi rwenyika yeMedia, rugwaro rwakapetwa makaŋga makanyorwa kuɗai kuti ʋaraŋgarire:
Pagore rokutaŋga ramambo Koreshi, mambo Koreshi wakaraira,
nemisara mitatu yamabge makuru, nomusara mumŋe wamatanda matȿa; mari yokuʋaka nayo ŋgaitorwe paimba yamambo.

Nemidziyo yendarama nesirveri yeimba yaMŋari, yakaɗeya kutorwa naNebukadnezari patembere paJerusarema, ikaiswa naye Babironi, ŋgaidzoswe, iiswe ɀe patembere iri Jerusarema, cimŋe necimŋe panɀimbo yaco, mugoɀiisa muimba yaMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino imi Tatenai muɓati wenyika mhiri kworwizi, naShetari‐bozenai, neshamŋari dzenyu dzaʋaAfarsaki, imi muri mhiri kworwizi, cibvai ipapo;
ʋaregei paɓasa reimba yaMŋari; muɓati waʋaJuda naʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ŋgaʋaʋake imba iyi yaMŋari panɀimbo yayo.

Ʋuye ndinoraira ɀamunofanira kuitira ʋakuru aʋa ʋaʋaJuda, kuti imba iyi yaMŋari iʋakwe: Mari yokuʋaka nayo ŋgaitorwe pafuma yamambo, pamutero unoripxa mhiri kworwizi, ikurumidze kupiwa ʋarume aʋo, kuti ʋarege kudziʋiswa.

Ʋuye ɀose ɀaʋanoshaiwa, kana nzombe ɗuku, kana makondobge, kana makwaiana, ɀokuita naɀo ɀipiriso ɀinopisirwa Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, kana ɀiyo, kana munyu, kana waini, kana mafuta, seɀinotaura ʋaprista ʋari Jerusarema, ŋgaʋapiwe iɀoɀo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, musiŋgaɗariki;
kuti ʋagone kuʋigira Mŋari wokuɗeŋga ɀiɓayiro ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka, ʋanyeŋgeterere ʋo ʋupenyu bgamambo, nobgaʋanakomana ʋake.
Ndatema ʋo cireʋo, kuti aninani unoshandura shoko iri, ɓaŋgo ribviswe paimba yake, iye aturikwe aroʋerwe pariri; ʋuye imba yake iitwe ɗurunhuru pamsoro pecinhu ici;
Mŋari, wakagarisa zita rake ipapo, ŋgaaparadze madzimambo ose naʋanhu ʋacatambanudza maʋoko aʋo kushandura
Ipapo Tatenai muɓati wenyika mhiri kworwizi, naShetari‐bozenai, neshamŋari dzaʋo, ʋakaita iɀoɀo nokukurumidza, nemhaka yeshoko rakaŋga ratumŋa namambo Dariusi.

Ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ʋakaʋaka, ʋakapfuʋurira mberi ɀakanaka, ʋacisimbiswa nokuprofita kwaHagai muprofita naZekaria mŋanakomana waIdo. Ʋakaʋaka, ʋakaipedza, seɀakarairwa naMŋari waIsraeri, ʋuye necireʋo caKoreshi, naDariusi, naArtashasta mambo wePersia.
Imba iyi ikapedzwa nezuʋa retatu romŋedzi weAdari pagore retanhatu rokuɓata ʋushe kwamambo Dariusi.
Ʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋatapxa ʋakatsaurira Mŋari imba iyi nomufaro.

Ʋakaɓayira pakutsaura imba iyi yaMŋari nzombe dzinezana rimŋe, namakondobge anamazana maʋiri, namakwaiana anamazana manna; ʋuye nhoŋgo dzembudzi dzinegumi nembiri, dzakaenzana namarudzi aʋaIsraeri, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi caʋaIsraeri ʋose.
Ʋakagadza ʋaprista pamakamu aʋo, naʋaRevi pamapoka aʋo, paɓasa raMŋari paJerusarema; seɀakaŋga ɀanyorwa pabuku yaMosesi.
Ʋatapxa ʋakaita paseka ne
Nokuti ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋaɀinatsa nomŋoyo mumŋe; ʋose ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋanatswa; ʋakaɓayira ʋatapxa ʋose paseka, nehama dzaʋo dzaʋaprista, naiʋo ʋamene.
Ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋakaŋga ʋadzoka pakutapxa, ʋakadya, iʋo naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaɀitsaurira kwaʋari ʋacibva pamatȿina aʋahedeni ʋenyika iyo, kuti ʋatȿake Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri;
ʋakaita mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisina‐kuʋiriswa mazuʋa manomŋe; nokuti Jehova wakaŋga aʋafadza, akarereʋudzira mŋoyo wamambo weAsiria kwaʋari, kuti asimbise maʋoko aʋo paɓasa reimba yaMŋari waIsraeri.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo, Artashasta mambo wePersia aciɓata ʋushe, Ezra mŋanakomana waSeraya, mŋanakomana waAzaria, mŋanakomana waHirkia,
mŋanakomana waSharumi, mŋanakomana waZadoki, mŋanakomana waAhitubi,
mŋanakomana waAmaria, mŋanakomana waAzaria, mŋanakomana waMerayoti,
mŋanakomana waZerahia, mŋanakomana waUzi, mŋanakomana waBuki,
mŋanakomana waAbishua, mŋanakomana waPinehasi, mŋanakomana waEreazari, mŋanakomana waAroni, muprista mukuru —

uyu Ezra wakaenda acibva Babironi; iye wakaŋga ari munyori wakaŋgwara pamurairo waMosesi, wakaŋga wapiwa naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri; mambo akamupa ɀose ɀaakakumbira, nokuɗa kworuʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro pake.
Naʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋaimbi, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaNetinimi, ʋakaenda Jerusarema negore recinomŋe ramambo Artashasta.
Akaȿika Jerusarema nomŋedzi wecishanu pagore recinomŋe ramambo.
Nokuti wakataŋga kubva Babironi ne
Nokuti Ezra wakaŋga ashiŋgaira nomŋoyo wake wose kutȿaka murairo waJehova, nokuuita, nokudzidzisa pakati paIsraeri ɀaakatema neɀaakatoŋga.
Ɀino ndiwo mashoko eŋwadi iyo mambo Artashasta yaakapa Ezra muprista nomunyori, iye munyori wamashoko emirairo yaJehova neɀaakatemera Israeri:
Artashasta mambo wamadzimambo, kunaEzra muprista, munyori womurairo waMŋari wokuɗeŋga, wakakwana, namamŋe mashoko akaɗai.
Ini ndinotema cireʋo, kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋaIsraeri, naʋaprista ʋaʋo, naʋaRevi, ʋari paʋushe bgaŋgu, ʋanoɗa nokuɗa kwaʋo kuenda Jerusarema, ŋgaʋaende haʋo newe.
Ɀawatumŋa namambo namakurukota ake manomŋe kundobvunzisisa pamsoro paJuda neJerusarema, seɀakarebga nomurairo waMŋari wako uri muruʋoko rwako;
nokuenda nesirveri nendarama yakapiwa namambo namakurukota ake nokuɗa kwaʋo Mŋari waIsraeri, iye ugere Jerusarema,
nesirveri nendarama yose yauŋgawana parutiʋi rwenyika yose yeBabironi, pamŋe cete neɀipo ɀaʋanhu ɀaʋacapa nokuɗa kwaʋo, neɀaʋaprista, ɀaʋacapa imba yaMŋari waʋo iri paJerusarema nomŋoyo yaʋo;
ɀino unofanira kukurumidza kuteŋga nemari iyo nzombe, namakondobge, namakwaiana, pamŋe cete neɀipiriso ɀaɀo ɀoʋupfu, neɀinoɗururwa, ugoɀiisa paartari paimba yaMŋari wenyu iri Jerusarema.
Kana iri sirveri nendarama yakasara, itai naɀo seɀamunofuŋga, iwe nehama dzako, seɀinoɗikanwa naMŋari wenyu.
Nemidziyo yaunopiwa kundoɓata nayo paimba yaMŋari wako, uiise pamberi paMŋari weJerusarema.
Neɀimŋe ɀinhu ɀipi neɀipi ɀinoɗikanwa paimba yaMŋari wako, ɀaunofanira kuripa, uɀiripe ucitora paimba yefuma yamambo.
Ini, iyeni mambo Artashasta, ndinoraira ʋaceŋgeti ʋose ʋefuma mhiri kworwizi,
kuȿikira pamatarenta esirveri anezana,
Ɀose ɀinorairwa naMŋari wokuɗeŋga, ŋgaɀiitirwe ɀakanaka imba yaMŋari wokuɗeŋga; nokuti ʋushe bgamambo nobgaʋanakomana ʋake ʋucatsamŋirweiko?
Tinokuziʋisai ʋo, kuti kana ʋari ʋaprista ʋose, naʋaRevi, naʋaimbi, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaNetinimi, naʋaranda ʋeimba iyi yaMŋari, haʋaŋgaripiswi mutero, kana ɀipo, kana muripo wenzira.
Ɀino iwe Ezra, nenjere dzaMŋari wako, dzawakapiwa iwe, cigadza ʋatambi ʋemhoȿa, naʋatoŋgi, ʋaŋgatoŋgera ʋanhu ʋose ʋari mhiri kworwizi mhaka dzaʋo,
Aninani, usiŋgaɗi kuita murairo waMŋari wako, nomurairo wamambo, ŋgaakurumidze kupiwa mhaka, kana yorufu, kana yokudziŋgwa, kana yokutorerwa nhumbi dzake, kana yokusuŋgwa mutoroŋgo.
Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu ŋgaakudzwe, iye wakaisa cinhu cakaɗai mumŋoyo wamambo, kuti anatse imba yaJehova iri Jerusarema;

iye wakandinzwisa tsitsi pamberi pamambo, napamberi pamakurukota ake, napamberi pamacinda ose anesimba amambo. Ini ndikasimbiswa nokuti ruʋoko rwaJehova Mŋari waŋgu rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu, ndikakoka ʋarume ʋakuru pakati paIsraeri, kuti ʋaende neni.
Ɀino aʋa ndiʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋuye ndiwo mazita aʋakabva neni Babironi, paŋguʋa yokuɓata ʋushe kwamambo Artashasta:
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaPinehasi, Gershomi; pakati paʋanakomana ʋaItamari, Danieri; pakati paʋanakomana ʋaDavidi, Hatushi.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaShekania, pakati paʋanakomana ʋaParoshi, Zekaria; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋakaʋereŋga mazita aʋarume ʋanezana namakumi mashanu.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaPahati‐moabi, Eriehoenai mŋanakomana waZerahia; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamazana maʋiri.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaShekania, mŋanakomana waJahazieri, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamazana matatu.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaAdini, Ebedi mŋanakomana waJonatani; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamakumi mashanu.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaErami, Jeshaya mŋanakomana waAtaria; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamakumi manomŋe.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaShefatia, Zebadia mŋanakomana waMikaeri; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamakumi masere.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaJoabi, Obadia mŋanakomana waJehieri; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamazana maʋiri negumi naʋasere.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaSheromiti, mŋanakomana waJosifiya; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanezana namakumi matanhatu.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaBebai, Zekaria mŋanakomana waBebai; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋasere.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaAzgadi, Johanani mŋanakomana waHakatani; ʋuye pamŋe cete naye ʋarume ʋanezana negumi rimŋe.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaAdonikami, iʋo ʋokupedzisira, mazita aʋo ndiwo: Erifereti, naJeueri, naShemaya; ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo ʋarume ʋanamakumi matanhatu.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaBigvai, Utai naZabudi; ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋo ʋarume ʋanamakumi manomŋe.
Ndikaʋakokera ʋose parwizi runoenda Ahava; tikagara’po pamisasa mazuʋa matatu; ndikacerekedza ʋanhu naʋaprista, ndikashaiwa’po kunyaŋge nomumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaRevi.
Ipapo ndikatuma

Ndikaʋatuma kunaIdo, waiʋa mukuru panɀimbo yainzi Kasifia; ndikaʋaʋudza ɀaʋaifanira kutaura kunaIdo, nehama dzake ʋaNetinimi, panɀimbo yainzi Kasifia, kuti ʋaʋuye kwatiri naʋaɓatiri ʋeimba yaMŋari weɗu.

Ɀino ruʋoko rwakanaka rwaMŋari weɗu rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro peɗu, saka ʋakaʋuya kwatiri nomunhu wakaŋgwara waʋana ʋaMari, mŋanakomana waRevi, mŋanakomana waIsraeri; naSherebia, naʋanakomana ʋake nehama dzake, ʋose gumi naʋasere;
naHashabiya, ʋuye pamŋe cete naye Jeshaya waʋanakomana ʋaMerari, nehama dzake naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, ʋose makumi maʋiri;
napakati paʋaNetinimi, ʋakaŋga ʋagadzwa naDavidi namacinda paɓasa raʋaRevi, ʋaNetinimi ʋanamazana maʋiri namakumi maʋiri; ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋo.
Ipapo ndakatara

Nokuti ndakanyara kukumbira kunamambo ɓoka raʋarwi naʋataȿi ʋamabiza kutiɓatsira kurwa naʋaʋeŋgi panzira; nokuti takaŋga tataura namambo, ticiti: Ruʋoko rwaMŋari weɗu runoceŋgeta ʋose ʋanomutȿaka, kuʋaitira ɀakanaka; asi simba rake nokutsamŋa kwake ɀinorwa naʋose ʋanomurasha.
Naiɀoɀo takaɀinyima ɀokudya, tikanyeŋgetera kunaMŋari weɗu pamsoro paiɀoɀi, akatinzwa.
Ipapo ndakatsaura ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri pakati paʋakuru ʋaʋaprista, ʋaiti, Sherebia, naHashabia, nedzimŋe hama dzaʋo dzinegumi pamŋe cete naʋo;
ndikaʋayerera sirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo, ico cipo cakaŋga capiwa imba yaMŋari weɗu namambo, namakurukota ake, namacinda, naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari’po.
Ndakayerera pamaʋoko aʋo matarenta esirveri anamazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu,
nembiya dzinamakumi maʋiri dzendarama yakaȿika madariki anecuru cimŋe
Ndikati kwaʋari: Imi muri ʋatȿene ʋaJehova, nemidziyo mitȿene ʋo; ʋuye sirveri nendarama ndiɀo ɀipo ɀokuŋgopa nokuɀiɗira ɀakaʋigirwa Jehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu.
Muɀirindire, nokuɀiceŋgeta, kuȿikira moɀiyera pamberi paʋakuru ʋaʋaprista naʋaRevi, namacinda edzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋaIsraeri paJerusarema, mumakamuri eimba yaJehova.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakagamucira sirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo, ʋayererwa kurema kwaɀo, kuti ʋaɀiise Jerusarema paimba yaMŋari weɗu.
Ipapo takabva parwizi Ahava ne
Tikaȿika Jerusarema, tikagara’po mazuʋa matatu.

Ɀino pazuʋa recinna kurema kwesirveri, nendarama, nemidziyo ɀakayerwa muimba yaMŋari weɗu, ɀikaiswa pamaʋoko aMeremoti mŋanakomana womuprista Uria; Ereazari mŋanakomana waPinehasi wakaŋga anaye, ʋuye Jozabadi mŋanakomana waJeshua, naNoadia mŋanakomana waBinui, iʋo ʋaRevi, ʋakaŋga ʋanaʋo.
Ɀose ɀakaʋereŋgwa nokuyerwa kurema kwaɀo; kurema kwose kukanyorwa neŋguʋa iyo.

Ɀino ʋatapxa, ʋakaŋga ʋadzoka pakutapxa, ʋakapisira Mŋari waIsraeri cipiriso cinopiswa, nzombe dzinegumi nembiri dzaʋaIsraeri ʋose, namakondobge anamakumi mapfumbamŋe namatanhatu, namakwaiana anamakumi manomŋe namanomŋe, nenhoŋgo dzembudzi dzinegumi nembiri, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; iɀoɀo ɀose caiʋa cipiriso cakapisirwa Jehova.
Ɀireʋo ɀamambo ʋakaɀipa macinda amambo, naʋaɓati mhiri kworwizi, iʋo ʋakaɓatsira ʋanhu neimba yaMŋari.

Ɀino iɀi ɀakati ɀapera, macinda akasweɗera kwandiri, akati: Ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi haʋana‐kuɀiraʋura paʋanhu ʋenyika paneɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo, iʋo ʋaKanaani, naʋaHiti, naʋaPerezi, naʋaJebusi, naʋaAmoni, naʋaMoabi, naʋaEgipita, naʋaAmori.
Nokuti ʋakatora ʋakunda ʋaʋo ʋaʋe ʋakadzi ʋaʋo naʋaʋanakomana ʋaʋo; naiɀoɀo rudzi rutȿene rwakaɀiveŋganisa naʋanhu ʋenyika; ɀirokwaɀo maʋoko amacinda naʋaɓati ndiwo akanyanya pakuɗarika uku.
Ɀino ini ndakati ndiciɀinzwa, ndikabvarura ŋguʋo yaŋgu nejasi raŋgu, ndikataʋura vudzi romusoro waŋgu nendebvu dzaŋgu, ndikagara pasi ndakakanuka.
Ipapo ʋakaʋuŋgana kwandiri ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗeɗera nokuɗa kwamashoko aMŋari waIsraeri pamsoro pokuɗarika kwaʋatapxa; ndikagara pasi ndakakanuka kuȿikira paŋguʋa yecipiriso camaɗekwana.
Ɀino paŋguʋa yecipiriso camaɗekwana ndikasimuka pakuɀininipisa kwaŋgu, ndicineŋguʋo yaŋgu nejasi raŋgu ɀakabvaruka; ndikawira pasi namabvi aŋgu, ndikatambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu kunaJehova Mŋari waŋgu;
ndikati: Haiwa, Mŋari waŋgu, ndinonyara, ndinotȿeruka kusimudzira ciso caŋgu kwamuri Mŋari waŋgu; nokuti ɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɀaɗarika misoro yeɗu, mhoȿa yeɗu yakakwira kuȿikira kuɗeŋga.
Kubva pamazuʋa amadziɓaɓa eɗu takapara mhaka kwaɀo kuȿikira nhasi; ɀino nokuɗa kweɀiʋi isu namadzimambo eɗu, naʋaprista ʋeɗu, takaiswa mumaʋoko amadzimambo enyika,

Ɀino takanzwirwa tsitsi naJehova Mŋari weɗu ŋguʋa ɗuku‐ɗuku, akatisiyira ʋamŋe ʋakapukunyuka, nokutipa mbambo panɀimbo yake tȿene, kuti Mŋari weɗu avenekere meso eɗu, nokutiponesa paɗuku paʋuranda bgeɗu.

Nokuti tiri ʋaranda; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Mŋari haana‐kutirasha paʋuranda bgeɗu, asi wakatinzwisa tsitsi pamberi pamadzimambo ePersia, akatiponesa ɀe, kuti timutse ɀe imba yaMŋari weɗu, nokugadzira matoŋgo ayo, nokutipa ruȿiŋgo paJuda napaJerusarema.
Ɀino, Mŋari weɗu, ticareʋeiko shure kwaiɀoɀi? Nokuti takarasha mirairo yenyu,
yamakatiraira naʋaranda ʋenyu ʋaprofita, muciti: Nyika kwamunoenda, kuzoiita yenyu, inyika yakaȿiɓiswa nokuipa kwaʋanhu ʋenyika

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, regai kupa ʋanakomana ʋaʋo ʋakunda ʋenyu, kana kutora ʋakunda ʋaʋo kupa ʋanakomana ʋenyu, kana kuʋatȿakira rugare nomufaro nokusiŋgaperi; kuti muʋe nesimba, mudye ɀakanaka ɀenyika, mugoisiyira ʋana ʋenyu iʋe nhaka yaʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀatakaitirwa iɀi ɀose nokuɗa kwamaɓasa eɗu akaipa, ʋuye nokuɗa kwemhoȿa dzeɗu huru, imi Mŋari weɗu ɀamusina‐kutiroʋa ɀakariŋgana ɀakaipa ɀeɗu, mukatisiyira ʋamŋe ʋakaɗai,

ɀino tiŋgapamhidza ɀe kuɗarika mirairo yenyu here, nokushamŋaridzana naʋanhu ʋanoita iɀi ɀinonyaŋgadza here? Hamuŋgazotitsamŋiri kuȿikira matiparadza here, kuȿikira kusinawakasiyiwa, kana wakapukunyuka?
Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, imi makarurama; nokuti tasiyirwa ʋamŋe ʋakapukunyuka, seɀaɀakaita nhasi; tarirai tiri pamberi penyu nemhoȿa dzeɗu, nokuti hakuna‐uŋgamira pamberi penyu nokuɗa kwecinhu ici.

Ɀino Ezra wakati acinyeŋgetera, aciɀireʋurura, acicema nokuɀiwisira pasi pamberi peimba yaMŋari, ʋuŋgano huru‐huru yaʋarume naʋakadzi naʋana ʋaʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana kwaari; nokuti ʋanhu ʋakacema ɀikuru kwaɀo.

Ipapo Shekania mŋanakomana waJehieri, mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaErami, akapindura, akati kunaEzra: Takatadzira Mŋari weɗu ɀatakawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa ʋendudzi dzenyika iyi; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋaIsraeri ʋacinetariro pamsoro pecinhu ici.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ŋgatiite suŋgano naMŋari weɗu, tibvise ʋakadzi aʋa ʋose, naʋana ʋakaɓerekwa naʋo, seɀatakarairwa naShe, ʋuye naʋanobvundiswa nomurairo waMŋari weɗu; ŋgaɀiitwe seɀinoreʋa murairo.
Simukai, nokuti ndimi muneɓasa iri, isu tinemi; tsuŋgai mŋoyo, muɀiite.
Ipapo Ezra akasimuka, akapikisa ʋakuru ʋaʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋaIsraeri ʋose, kuti ʋacaita neshoko iri. Iʋo ʋakapika.

Ipapo Ezra akasimuka, akabva pamberi peimba yaMŋari, akapinda mukamuri yaJohanani mŋanakomana waEriashibi; akagara’po, akasadya ɀokudya, kana kunwa mvura; nokuti wakaŋga acicema pamsoro pokuɗarika kwaʋatapxa.
Ʋakaparidza shoko kuʋatapxa ʋose pose‐pose paJuda napaJerusarema, kuti ʋaʋuŋgane paJerusarema;
ʋuye kuti aninani usina‐kuʋuya mazuʋa matatu agere kupera, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa namacinda naʋakuru, fuma yake yose itorwe ipiwe

Ipapo ʋarume ʋose ʋaJuda naBenjamini ʋakaʋuŋgana paJerusarema mazuʋa matatu agere kupera; wakaŋga uri mŋedzi wepfumbamŋe, nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri romŋedzi; ʋanhu ʋose ʋakagara paɗare pamberi peimba yaMŋari, ʋacibvunda pamsoro peshoko iro napamsoro pemvura zhinji yainaya.
Ipapo muprista Ezra akasimuka, akati kwaʋari: Imi makaɗarika, mukawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa, mukanyanyisa mhoȿa yaIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciɀireʋururai pamberi paJehova Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa enyu, mumufadze; muɀiraʋure kuʋanhu ʋenyika ino, naʋakadzi ʋatorwa.
Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yakapindura, ikati nenzwi guru: Seɀamataura pamsoro peɗu, ndiɀo ɀatinofanira kuita.
Asi ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋuye iŋguʋa yokunaya kwemvura zhinji, hatigoni kumira kunze; ɓasa iri harizi rezuʋa rimŋe, kana mazuʋa maʋiri, nokuti takaɗarika kwaɀo pacinhu ici.

Ɀino macinda eɗu ŋgaagadzwe paʋuŋgano yose, kuti ʋose ʋakawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa pamaguta eɗu, ʋaʋuye paŋguʋa dzakatarwa ʋanaʋakuru ʋeguta rimŋe nerimŋe, naʋatoŋgi ʋaro, kuȿikira kutsamŋa kukuru kwaMŋari weɗu kwabviswa kwatiri, kuȿikira mhaka iyi yapera.
Asi Jonatani mŋanakomana waAsaheri, naJazeya mŋanakomana waTikva, iʋo ʋoga ʋakaramba

Ʋatapxa ʋakaita saiɀoɀo. Ezra muprista, naʋamŋe ʋaʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋakatsaurwa nedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, naʋose ʋaʋo namazita aʋo; ʋakaʋuŋgana nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wegumi kunɀera cinhu ico.
Ʋakapedza naʋarume ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wokutaŋga.
Napakati paʋanakomana ʋaʋaprista ʋakawana ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa: Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaJeshua
Ʋakapika noruʋoko rwaʋo, kuti ʋacarega ʋakadzi ʋaʋo; ʋuye, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋanemhoȿa,
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaImeri; Hanani naZebadia.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaHarimi: Maaseya, naEria, naShemaya naJehieri, naUzia.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaPashuri: Erioenai, naMaaseya, naIshmaeri, naNetaneri, naJozabadi, naErasa.
Pakati paʋaRevi: Jozabadi, naShimei, naKeraya (ndiye Kerita), naPetahia, naJuda, naEriezeri.
Pakati paʋaimbi: Eriashibi; napakati paʋarindi ʋemikoʋa: Sharumi, naTeremi, naUri.
Napakati paIsraeri: Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaParoshi: Ramia, naIzia, naMarkiya, naMiyamini, naEreazari, naMarkiya, naBenaya.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaErami: Matania, naZekaria, naJehieri, naAbdi, naJeremoti, naEria.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaZatu: Erioenai, naEriasibi, naMatania, naJeremoti, naZabadi, naAziza.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaBebai: Jehohanani, naHanania, naZabai, naAtrai.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaBani: Meshurami, naMaruki, naAdaya, naJashubi, naSheari, naJeremoti.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaPahati‐moabi: Adna, naKerari, naBenaya, naMaaseya, naMatania, naBezareri, naBinui, naManase.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaHarimi: Eriezeri, naIsishiya, naMarkiya, naShemaya, naShimeoni:
naBenjamini, naMaruki, naShemaria.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaHashumi: Matenai, naMatata, naZabadi, naErifereti, naJeremai, naManase, naShimei.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaBani: Maadai, naAmrami, naUeri;
naBenaya, naBedeya, naKeruhi;
naVania, naMeremoti, naEriashibi;
naMatania, naMatenai, naJaasu;
naBani, naBinui, naShimei;
naSheremia, naNatani, naAdaya;
naMaknedabai, naShashai, naSharai;
naAzareri, naSheremia, naShemaria;
naSharumi, naAmaria, naJosefa.
Pakati paʋanakomana ʋaNebo: Jeieri, naMatitia, naZabadi, naZebina, naIdo, naJoeri, naBenaya.
Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋawana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa; ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaɓerekerwa ʋana naʋakadzi ʋaʋo.
Mashoko aNehemia mŋanakomana waHakaria.
Pamŋedzi weKisrevi, pagore ramakumi maʋiri, ndakati ndiri panhare yamambo paShushani,
Hanani, mumŋe wehama dzaŋgu, akaȿika iye naʋamŋe ʋarume, ʋacibva kwaJuda; ndikaʋabvunza pamsoro paʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋapukunyuka, ʋakaŋga ʋasara pakutapxa, napamsoro peJerusarema.
Ʋakati kwandiri: Ʋakasara, ʋakasiyiwa pakutapxa panyika iyo, ʋari pakutambudzika kukuru napakushoʋorwa; ʋuye ruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema ʋo rwakoromoka, namasuʋo aro apiswa nomŋoto.
Ɀino ndakati ndanzwa mashoko iwayo, ndikagara pasi ndikacema, ndikaita mazuʋa ndicicema; ndikaɀinyima ɀokudya, ndikanyeŋgetera pamberi paMŋari wokuɗeŋga,
ndikati: Ndinokumbira kwamuri Jehova Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, Mŋari mukuru unotyisa, iye unoraŋgarira suŋgano

nzeʋe yenyu ŋgaiterere ɀino, nameso enyu aȿinure, munzwe munyeŋgetero womuranda wenyu, wandinonyeŋgetera pamberi penyu, ŋguʋa ino, masikati noʋusiku, pamsoro paʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋaranda ʋenyu, ndicireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ɀatakakutadzirai naɀo; nokuti takatadza, ini naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Takakuitirai ɀakaipa kwaɀo, hatina‐kuceŋgeta mirairo, kana ɀakatemŋa, kana ɀakatoŋgwa, ɀamakaraira muranda wenyu Mosesi.
Ƌoraŋgarirai henyu shoko ramakaraira muranda wenyu Mosesi, muciti: Kana muciɗarika, ndicakuparadzirai pakati pendudzi;

asi kana mukadzokera kwandiri, mukaceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu nokuiita, kunyaŋge ʋadziŋgwa ʋenyu ʋaȿika kumagumisiro okuɗeŋga, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza ʋabve ipapo, ndiʋaise panɀimbo yandakatsaura kuti zita raŋgu rigare’po.
Ɀino aʋa ndiʋaranda ʋenyu naʋana ʋenyu, ʋamakadzikinura nesimba renyu guru, noruʋoko rwenyu runesimba.

Haiwa, Jehova, ndinokumbira kuti nzeʋe yenyu iterere kunyeŋgetera kwomuranda wenyu nokunyeŋgetera kwaʋaranda ʋenyu ʋanofarira kutya zita renyu; fambisai henyu muranda wenyu ɀakanaka nhasi, mumuwanise tsitsi pamberi pomunhu uyu. (Ɀino ini ndakaŋga ndiri muɗiri wamambo.)
Ɀino nomŋedzi weNisani, negore ramakumi maʋiri ramambo Artashasta, paŋguʋa yaakaŋga anewaini pamberi pake, ini ndikatora waini, ndikaipa mambo. Ɀino ndakaŋga ndisina‐kumbopunyaira pamberi pake.
Ipapo mambo akati kwandiri: Ciso cako cinopunyairireiko, ɀausiŋgarwari? Ici cinhu ishuŋgu dzomŋoyo caidzo. Ndikatya kwaɀo.
Ndikati kunamambo: Mambo ŋgaararame nokusiŋgaperi! Ciso caŋgu ciŋgaregereiko kupunyaira, kana guta iro
Ipapo mambo akati kwandiri: Unokumbireiko? Ɀino ndikanyeŋgetera kunaMŋari wokuɗeŋga,
ndikati kunamambo: Kana mambo acifara naɀo, kana muranda wenyu awana tsitsi kwamuri,
Mambo akati kwandiri, (naʋahosi ʋo ʋakaŋga ʋagere naye): Rwendo rwako rucaita ŋguʋa yakaɗiniko? Ucadzoka rini? Ɀino mambo akatenda kundituma; ndikamutarira ŋguʋa.
Ʋuye ndakati ʋo kunamambo: Kana mambo acifara naɀo,
neimŋe ŋwadi ʋo kunaAsafi mutariri weɗondo ramambo, andipe miti yokuita nayo matanda amasuʋo enhare yapaimba
Ɀino ndikaȿika kuʋaɓati mhiri kworwizi, ndikaʋapa ŋwadi dzamambo. Ɀino mambo wakaŋga atuma ʋakuru ʋehondo naʋataȿi ʋamabiza neni.
Asi Sanbarati muHoroni, naTobia muranda, muAmoni, ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti kwakaŋga kwaȿika munhu kuzotȿaka kuitira ʋana ʋaIsraeri ɀakanaka, ɀikaʋaʋodza mŋoyo kwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ndakaȿika Jerusarema ndikagara’po mazuʋa matatu.

Ndikamuka ʋusiku, ini naʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋashoma; asi handinakuʋudza munhu ɀakaŋga ɀaiswa mumŋoyo maŋgu naMŋari waŋgu kuti ndiitire Jerusarema; ʋuye ndakaŋga ndisinecimŋe cipfuwo neni, asi cipfuwo candakaŋga ndicitaȿa.
Ndikaɓuɗa ʋusiku napasuʋo roMupata, ndikaenda nokutsime reShato, nesuʋo raMarara, ndikacerekedza maȿiŋgo eJerusarema akaŋga akoromoka, namasuʋo aro akaŋga atȿa nomŋoto.
Ipapo ndikapfuʋurira kuȿika pasuʋo reTsime, nokudziʋa ramambo; asi pakaŋga pasinenɀimbo paŋgapfuʋura napo cipfuwo candakaŋga ndakataȿa.
Ipapo ndakakwira ʋusiku naparukoʋa, ndikacerekedza ruȿiŋgo; ndikadzoka, ndikapinda napasuʋo roMupata, ndikadzoka saiɀoɀo.
Ʋaɓati haʋana‐kuziʋa kwandakaŋga ndaenda, kana ɀandakaŋga ndandoita; nokuti ndakaŋga ndisinakuʋudza ʋaJuda, kana ʋaprista, kana ʋakuru, kana ʋaɓati, kana ʋamŋe ʋaɓati ʋeɓasa.
Ɀino ndakati kwaʋari: Munoʋona nhamo yeɗu, kuti Jerusarema raʋa ɗoŋgo, namasuʋo aro atȿa nomŋoto; hendei tindoʋaka ɀe ruȿiŋgo rweJerusarema, tirege kugara ticishoʋorwa.
Ndikaʋaʋudza ɀokunaka kworuʋoko rwaMŋari rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu; namashoko amambo aakandiʋudza. Iʋo ʋakati: Ŋgatisimuke, tiʋake. Naiɀoɀo ʋakasimbisa maʋoko aʋo kuɓate‐ɓasa rakanaka.
Asi Sanbarati muHoroni, naTobia muranda, muAmoni, naGeshemi, muArabia, ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakatiseka, nokutininipisa, ʋakati: Cinyiko ici camunoita? Munoɗa kumukira mambo kanhi?
Ipapo ndakaʋapindura, ndikati kwaʋari: Mŋari wokuɗeŋga ucatifambisa ɀakanaka; saka isu ʋaranda ʋake ticasimuka, nokuʋaka; asi imi hamunomugoʋe kana simba kana ciraŋgaridzo paJerusarema.
Ipapo Eriashibi muprista mukuru wakasimuka, nehama dzake ʋaprista, ʋakaʋaka suʋo ramakwai; ʋakarinatsa, nokutimika magonhi aro; ʋakarinatsa kuȿikira pashoŋgwe yeHamea nokushoŋgwe yeHananeri.
Kurutiʋi rwake kwakaʋakwa naʋarume ʋeJeriko. Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakaʋakwa naZakuri mŋanakomana waImri.
Suʋo rehoʋe rakaʋakwa naʋanakomana ʋaHasenaa; iʋo ʋakaisa matanda aro, nokutimika magonhi aro, nekiyi dzaro, namazariro aro.

Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naMeremoti mŋanakomana waUria, mŋanakomana waHakozi. Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naMeshurami mŋanakomana waBerekia, mŋanakomana waMeshezaberi. Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naZadoki mŋanakomana waBaana.
Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naʋaTekoi; asi ʋakuru pakati paʋo haʋana‐kuisa mitsipa yaʋo paɓasa rashe waʋo.
Suʋo rekare rakagadzirwa naJoyada mŋanakomana waPasea, naMeshurami mŋanakomana waBesodeya; iʋo ʋakaisa matanda aro, nokutimika magonhi aro, nekiyi dzaro, namazariro aro.
Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naMeratia muGibeoni, naJadoni muMeronoti, naʋarume ʋeGibeoni neMizpa,

Kurutiʋi rwake kwakagadzirwa naUzieri mŋanakomana waHarhaya, ʋapfuri ʋendarama. Kurutiʋi rwake kwakagadzirwa naHanania, mumŋe waʋaveŋganisi ʋeɀinonhuwira; iʋo ʋakasimbisa Jerusarema kuȿikira paruȿiŋgo rwakafara.
Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naRefaya mŋanakomana waHuri, muɓati wehafu yenyika yeJerusarema.
Kurutiʋi rwaʋo kwakagadzirwa naJedaya mŋanakomana waHarumafi, pakatarisana neimba yake. Kurutiʋi rwake kwakagadzirwa naHatushi mŋanakomana waHashabeneya.
Markia mŋanakomana waHarimi, naHashubi mŋanakomana waPahati‐moabi, ʋakagadzira rumŋe rutiʋi, neshoŋgwe yamaʋira.
Kurutiʋi rwake kwakagadzirwa naSharumi mŋanakomana waHaroheshi, muɓati wehafu yenyika yeJerusarema, iye naʋakunda ʋake.
Suʋo romupata rakagadzirwa naHanuni naʋakaŋga ʋagere Zanoa; iʋo ʋakariʋaka, ʋakatimika magonhi aro, nekiyi dzaro, namazariro aro, namakubiti anecuru cimŋe
Suʋo ramarara rakagadzirwa naMarkiya mŋanakomana waRekabi, muɓati wenyika yeBeti‐hakeremi; iye wakariʋaka, nokutimika magonhi aro, nekiyi dzaro, namazariro aro.

Suʋo retsime rakagadzirwa naSharumi mŋanakomana waKori‐hoze, muɓati wenyika yeMizpa; iye wakariʋaka, akariisa ɗeŋga, akatimika magonhi aro, nekiyi dzaro, namazariro aro, ʋuye ruȿiŋgo rwedziʋa reShera pamunda wamambo, kuȿikira pamatanho anoɓuruka acibva muguta raDavidi.
Wakamuteʋera pakugadzira wakaŋga ari Nehemia mŋanakomana waAzbuki, muɓati wehafu yenyika yeBeti‐zuri, kuȿikira pakatarisana namarinda aDavidi, ʋuye kuȿikira padziʋa rakaŋga raʋakwa, nokuimba yemhare.
Ʋakamuteʋera pakugadzira ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaRevi: Rehumi mŋanakomana waBani, nokurutiʋi rwake kwakagadzirwa naHashabia muɓati wehafu yenyika yeKeira, panɀimbo yenyika yake.
Hama dzaʋo ndidzo dzakamuteʋera pakugadzira, Bavai mŋanakomana waHenadadi, muɓati wehafu yenyika yeKeira.
Kurutiʋi rwake Ezeri mŋanakomana waJeshua, muɓati weMizpa, wakagadzira mumŋe mupanda, pakatarisana neimba yenhumbi dzehondo, pakona
Baruki mŋanakomana waZabai wakamuteʋera akagadzira nokushiŋgaira mumŋe mupanda, kubva pakona
Meremoti mŋanakomana waUria, mŋanakomana waHakozi, wakamuteʋera akagadzira mumŋe mupanda, kubva pamukoʋa weimba yaEriashibi, kuȿikira pakuguma kweimba yaEriashibi.
Ʋaprista, ʋarume ʋeɓani, ʋakamuteʋera iye pakugadzira.
Benjamini naHashubi ndiʋo ʋakaʋateʋera pakugadzira pakatarisana neimba yaʋo. Azaria mŋanakomana waMaaseya, mŋanakomana waAnania, wakaʋateʋera pakugadzira parutiʋi rweimba yake.
Binui mŋanakomana waHenadadi wakamuteʋera pakugadzira mumŋe mupanda, kubva paimba yaAzaria kuȿikira pakona
Parari mŋanakomana waUzai
(Ɀino ʋaNetinimi ʋaigara Oferi, kuȿikira pakatarisana nesuʋo remvura kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rweshoŋgwe yakaɓuɗa kunze.)
ƲaTekoi ʋakamuteʋera pakugadzira mumŋe mupanda pakatarisana neshoŋgwe huru yakaɓuɗa kunze, kundoȿikira paruȿiŋgo rweOferi.
Ʋaprista ʋakagadzira pamsoro pesuʋo ramabiza, mumŋe nomumŋe pakatarisana neimba yake.
Zadoki mŋanakomana waImeri wakaʋateʋera pakugadzira pakatarisana neimba yake. Shemaya mŋanakomana waShekania, murindi wesuʋo rokumabvazuʋa, wakamuteʋera pakugadzira.

Hanania mŋanakomana waSheremia, naHanuni mŋanakomana wecitanhatu waZarafi ndiʋo ʋakamuteʋera pakugadzira mumŋe mupanda. Meshurami mŋanakomana waBerekia, wakamuteʋera pakugadzira pakatarisana nekamuri yake.
Markiya mumŋe waʋapfuri ʋendarama, wakamuteʋera pakugadzira kuȿikira kudzimba dzaʋaNetinimi nedzaʋateŋgesi, pakatarisana nesuʋo raHamifekadi, kuȿikira pakamuri yokumsoro iri pakona.
Pakati pekamuri yokumsoro pakona nesuʋo ramakwai, pakagadzirwa naʋapfuri ʋendarama naʋateŋgesi.
Asi Sanbarati wakati acinzwa kuti toʋaka ruȿiŋgo, akatsamŋa, akaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo, akaseka ʋaJuda.

Akataura nehama dzake nehondo yeSamaria, akati: ƲaJuda aʋa ʋasinesimba ʋanoɓateiko? Ʋacaɀisimbisa panhare here? Ʋacaɓayira here? Ʋacapedza nezuʋa rimŋe here? Ʋacararamisa mabge pamaturunhuru, ɀaatȿa here?
Tobia muAmoni wakaŋga amire naye, akati: Cinhu cipi necipi caʋanoʋaka haʋo, kana gaʋa rikakwira’po, ricakoromora ruȿiŋgo rwaʋo rwamabge.
Inzwai henyu, Mŋari weɗu, nokuti tinoninipiswa; dzoserai kushoʋora kwaʋo pamisoro yaʋo, muʋarege ʋapambge panyika yaʋatapxa.
Regai kufukidza ɀakaipa ɀaʋo, neɀiʋi ɀaʋo ŋgaɀirege kudzimŋa pamberi penyu; nokuti ʋaka
Naiɀoɀo takaʋaka ruȿiŋgo; ruȿiŋgo rwose rukaɓatanidzwa kuȿikira pahafu yokukwirira kwarwo; nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuɓata.
Asi Sanbarati, naTobia, naʋaArabia, naʋaAmoni, naʋaAshdodi, ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti ɓasa rokugadzira maȿiŋgo ropfuʋurira mberi ɀakanaka, kuti pakaŋga pakoromoka podziʋirwa, ʋakatsamŋa kwaɀo;
ʋakaraŋgana ʋose kundorwa neJerusarema, nokuʋakaŋganisa’po.
Asi isu takanyeŋgetera kunaMŋari weɗu, tikaisa ʋarindi kuʋarindira masikati noʋusiku nemhaka yaʋo.
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋakati: Simba raʋatakuri ʋemitoro raɗerera, ʋuye marara ari’po mazhinji; saka hatigoni kuʋaka ruȿiŋgo.
Ʋadziʋisi ʋeɗu ʋakati: Ŋgaʋarege kuziʋa kana kuʋona cinhu, kuȿikira taʋa pakati paʋo, tikaʋaʋuraya nokumisa ɓasa.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋagere naʋo, ʋakati ʋaciȿika
Saka ndakaisa ʋamŋe ʋanhu panɀimbo dzakaɗerera seri kworuȿiŋgo, panɀimbo dzakaŋga dzakashama,

Ndikatarira, ndikasimuka, ndikati kuʋakuru nokuʋatariri nokunaʋamŋe ʋanhu: Regai kuʋatya; raŋgarirai Jehova mukuru unotyisa, murwire hama dzenyu, naʋanakomana ʋenyu, naʋakunda ʋenyu, naʋakadzi ʋenyu, nedzimba dzenyu.
Ɀino ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti ɀazikanwa nesu, ʋuye kuti Mŋari wakakonesa kuraŋgana kwaʋo, isu tikadzokera tose kuruȿiŋgo, mumŋe nomumŋe kuɓasa rake.
Ɀino kubva paŋguʋa iyo hafu yaʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋakaɓata paɓasa, asi hafu yaʋo ʋakaɓata mapfumo, nenhoʋo, noʋuta, neŋguʋo dzamatare; ʋuye ʋarairi ʋakaŋga ʋari shure kwaʋose ʋeimba yaJuda.
Ʋaiʋaka ruȿiŋgo, naʋaitakura mitoro, ʋaitutira; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɓata noruʋoko rwake rumŋe paɓasa, asi norumŋe wakaŋga akaɓata nhumbi yake yokurwa nayo;
ʋuye ʋaʋaki mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga anomunondo wake wakasuŋgirwa paciʋuno cake; ʋakaʋaka saiɀoɀo. Muridzi wehwamanda wakamira neni.
Ndikati kuʋakuru nokuʋaɓati nokunaʋamŋe ʋanhu: Muɓato mukuru wakapararira, isu takataraŋgana pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, mumŋe ari kure nomumŋe;
papi napapi pamunonzwa kurira kwehwamanda, ʋuyai ikoko kwatiri; Mŋari weɗu ucatirwira.
Tikaɓata paɓasa saiɀoɀo; hafu yaʋo ʋaiɓata minondo kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira nyeredzi dziciɓuɗa.
Neŋguʋa iyo ndikati kuʋanhu: Mumŋe nomumŋe anomuranda wake ŋgaaʋate muJerusarema, kuti ʋatirinde ʋusiku, ʋaɓate masikati.
Naiɀoɀo ini, kunyaŋge hama dzaŋgu, kana ʋaranda ʋaŋgu, kana ʋarindi ʋainditeʋera, hakuna‐nomumŋe weɗu wakabvisa ŋguʋo dzake, mumŋe nomumŋe wakandonwa mvura nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo.
Ɀino kunyunyuta kukuru kwakamuka pakati paʋanhu naʋakadzi ʋaʋo pamsoro pehama dzaʋo ʋaJuda. [kuteŋgesa]
Nokuti ʋamŋe ʋakati: Isu naʋanakomana ʋeɗu tiri ʋazhinji; ŋgatipiwe ɀiyo, tidye, tirarame.
Ʋamŋe ɀe ʋakati: Isu takaita minda yeɗu ruɓatso, neminda yeɗu yemizambiriŋga, nedzimba dzeɗu; ŋgatipiwe ɀiyo, nokuɗa kwenzara ino.
Ʋamŋe ɀe ʋakati: Takakwereta mari, yokuripira nayo mutero wamambo,

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ɀino miʋiri yeɗu yakafanana nemiʋiri yehama dzeɗu, naʋana ʋeɗu ʋakafanana naʋana ʋaʋo; tarirai, tosuŋga ʋanakomana ʋeɗu naʋakunda ʋeɗu, ʋaʋe ʋaranda; ʋamŋe ʋakunda ʋeɗu ʋatosuŋgwa, isu hatinesimba rokuɀidziʋisa, nokuti minda yeɗu neminda yeɗu yemizambiriŋga yatoʋa yaʋamŋe.
Ipapo ndakatsamŋa kwaɀo ndicinzwa kucema kwaʋo namashoko iwayo.
Ɀino ndakaraŋgarira mumŋoyo maŋgu, ndikaita nharo naʋakuru naʋarairi, ndikati kwaʋari: Imi munoreʋa mhindu, mumŋe nomumŋe pahama yake. Ipapo ndikakoka ʋuŋgano huru pamsoro paʋo.

Ndikati kwaʋari: Isu takadzikinura hama dzeɗu ʋaJuda dzakaŋga dzateŋgeswa kuʋahedeni patakagona napo; ɀino imi moɗa‐kuteŋgesa hama dzenyu, moɗa kuti dziteŋgeswe kwatiri here? Ipapo ʋakaramba ʋanyerere, ʋakashaiwa neshoko cose.
Ndikati ʋo: Cinhu camunoita cakaipa; ko hamufaniri kufamba mucitya Mŋari weɗu, kuti tirege kushoʋorwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋahedeni?
Neni ʋo, nehama dzaŋgu naʋaranda ʋaŋgu, takaʋapa cikwerete cemari neɀiyo, ticireʋa mhindu. Haiwa, ŋgatirege mhindu iyo.
Dzoserai henyu kwaʋari ikonhasi minda yaʋo, neminda yaʋo yemizambiriŋga, neminda yaʋo yemiorivi, nedzimba dzaʋo, ʋuye nomugoʋe wezana wemari, neɀiyo, newaini, namafuta, wamakatora kwaʋari iri mhindu.
Ipapo ʋakati: Ticaɀidzosa, hatiŋgareʋi cinhu kwaʋari; seɀamunotaura, ndiɀo ɀaticaita. Ɀino ndakaɗana ʋaprista, ndikaʋapikisa kuti ʋacaita iɀoɀo ɀakapikirwa.

Ndikazuza ʋo ŋguʋo dzaŋgu, ndikati: Mŋari ŋgaazuze mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgaiti iɀoɀo ɀakapikirwa abve paimba yake napaɓasa rake; ŋgaazuzwe nokuɗururwa saiɀoɀo. Ipapo ʋuŋgano yose yakati: Ameni! ʋakarumbidza Jehova. Ʋanhu ʋakaita iɀoɀo ɀakapikirwa.

Ʋuye ɀe, kubva paŋguʋa yandakaitwa muɓati waʋo panyika yaJuda, kubva pagore ramakumi maʋiri kuȿikira pagore ramakumi matatu namaʋiri ramambo Artashasta, iwo makore anegumi namaʋiri, ini nehama dzaŋgu hatina‐kudya ɀokudya ɀomuɓati.
Asi ʋaɓati ʋokutaŋga, ʋakanditaŋgira, ʋairemedza ʋanhu, ʋacitora kwaʋari ɀokudya newaini, ʋuye ʋo mashekeri esirveri anamakumi manna
Ʋuye, ndakarambira paɓasa roruȿiŋgo urwu, hatina‐kutoŋgoteŋga nyika: naʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋo paɓasa.
Ʋuye patafura yaŋgu pakaŋga panaʋaJuda naʋaɓati, ʋarume ʋanezana namakumi mashanu, aʋo ʋaiʋuya kwatiri ʋacibva kuʋahedeni ʋakaŋga ʋakatipoteredza ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.

Ɀino zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe kwaigadzirwa nzombe imŋe, namakwai matanhatu akatsaurwa; ndaigadzirirwa ʋo huku, ʋuye kamŋe pamazuʋa anegumi waini zhinji yamarudzi ose; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handina‐kukumbira ɀokudya ɀomuɓati, nokuti ʋanhu aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋaciremedzwa kwaɀo noʋuranda.
Ndiraŋgarirei, Mŋari waŋgu, mundiitire ɀakanaka nokuɗa kweɀose ɀandakaitira rudzi urwu.

Ɀino Sanbarati, naTobia, naGeshemi muArabia, naʋamŋe ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋakati ʋaʋudzwa kuti ndaʋaka ruȿiŋgo, ʋuye kuti takaŋga tisinokusiya pakakoromoka; (kunyaŋge kuȿikira paŋguʋa iyo ndakaŋga ndicigere kutimika magonhi pamasuʋo;)
Sanbarati naGeshemi ndokutuma
Ini ndikatuma nhume kwaʋari, ndiciti: Ndinoɓate‐ɓasa guru, saka handigoni kuɓuruka; ɓasa riŋgamirireiko, kana ndikarirega ndiciɓurukira kwamuri?
Ʋakatumira kwandiri saiɀoɀo kanna, ndikaʋapindura ɀe saiɀoɀo.
Ipapo Sanbarati wakatuma ɀe muranda wake kwandiri saiɀoɀo rwecishanu, akaɓata ŋwadi yakazaruka muruʋoko rwake;
imomo makaŋga makanyorwa, muciti: Ɀinonzi pakati pendudzi, naGashmu unoɗaro ʋo, kuti iwe naʋaJuda munoɗa kumukira
Ʋuye, kuti iwe wakagadza ʋaprofita ʋanoparidza pamsoro pako paJerusarema, ʋaciti: Pakati paJuda panamambo. Ɀino mashoko iwayo acandoziʋiswa mambo. Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciʋuya, tiraŋgane tose.
Ipapo ndakatuma shoko kwaari, ndikati: Hapaitwi ɀinhu ɀakaɗai ɀaunotaura, asi wakaŋgoɀifuŋga hako mumŋoyo mako.
Nokuti ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacitȿaka kutityisa, ʋaciti: Maʋoko aʋo ŋgaashaiswe simba paɓasa, kuti rirege kupedzwa. Asi ɀino,

Ipapo ndakaenda kumba kwaShemaya mŋanakomana waDeraya, mŋanakomana waMehetaberi, wakaŋga aɀipfigira, iye akati: Ŋgatisoŋgane mumba maMŋari, mukati metembere, tipfige mikoʋa yetembere; nokuti ʋacaʋuya kuzokuʋuraya; ʋacaʋuya ʋusiku kuzokuʋuraya.
Ini ndikati: Munhu wakaita seni uŋgatiza here? Ndianiko wakaita seni uŋgapinda mutembere, kuti aɀiraramise? Handiŋgapindi.
Ndikaʋona kwaɀo kuti Mŋari wakaŋga asina‐kumutuma; asi wakandiprofitera iɀoɀo, nokuti wakaŋga afufurwa naTobia naSanbarati.
Wakaŋga afufurwa nemhaka iyo, kuti nditye, ndiite saiɀoɀo, nditadze, kuti ʋawane caʋaŋgandicera naco, ʋagondishoʋora.
Raŋgarirai henyu, Mŋari waŋgu, maɓasa awa aTobia naSanbarati, naNoadia muprofitakadzi, naʋamŋe ʋaprofita, ʋakaidza kundityisa.
Naiɀoɀo ruȿiŋgo rwakapera pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namashanu
Ɀino ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋose ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋahedeni ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakatipoteredza ʋakatya, ʋakaʋora mŋoyo; nokuti ʋakaziʋa kuti ɓasa iri rakaitwa naMŋari weɗu.
Ʋuye, namazuʋa iwayo ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ʋakatuma ʋo ŋwadi zhinji kunaTobia, ʋuye
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋaiʋa’po paJuda ʋakaŋga ʋapika kwaari, nokuti waiʋa mukwambo waShekania mŋanakomana waAra; mŋanakomana wake Jehohanani wakaŋga awana mukunda waMeshurami mŋanakomana waBerekia.
Ʋakarumbidza ʋo maɓasa ake akanaka pamberi paŋgu, nokumuʋudza mashoko aŋgu. Tobia akatuma ŋwadi dzokundityisa.
Ɀino ruȿiŋgo rwakati rwaʋakwa, ini ndatimika magonhi, ʋuye ʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaimbi, naʋaRevi ʋagadzwa,
ndikagadza Hanani munuŋuna waŋgu, naHanania muɓati wenhare, ʋaʋe ʋatariri ʋeJerusarema; nokuti wakaŋga ari munhu wakatendeka, acitya Mŋari kupfuʋura ʋazhinji.

Ndikati kwaʋari: Masuʋo eJerusarema ŋgaarege kuzarurwa kuȿikira zuʋa rapisa; ɀino ʋarindi ʋacimire’po, ŋgaʋapfige mikoʋa, imi mugoikiya; munofanira kugadza ʋo ʋarindi pakati paʋagere Jerusarema, mumŋe nomumŋe paanofanira kurindira, mumŋe nomumŋe pakatarisana neimba yake.
Ɀino guta rakaŋga riri ɓamhi rakakura; asi ʋanhu ʋaiʋa’mo ʋashoma; ʋuye dzimba dzakaŋga dzicigere kuʋakwa.
Ipapo Mŋari waŋgu wakaisa mufuŋgo pamŋoyo paŋgu kuti ndikokere ʋakuru naʋatariri, naʋanhu, kuti ʋaʋereŋgwe namazita aʋo. Ndikawana buku yamazita aʋakataŋga kuȿika, ndikawana makanyorwa kuɗai:
Ndiʋo ʋana ʋorutiʋi rwenyika yaJuda, ʋakadzoka pakutapxa, pakati paʋakaŋga ʋakatapxa, ʋakatapxa naNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, ʋakadzokera Jerusarema nokwaJuda, mumŋe nomumŋe kuguta rake:
Iʋo ʋakaʋuya naZerubaberi, naJeshua, naNehemia, naAzaria, naRaamia, naNahamani, naMordekai, naBirshani, naMispereti, naBigvai, naNehumi, naBaana. Kuwanda kwaʋarume ʋaʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ndiko:
Ʋana ʋaParoshi, ɀuru ɀiʋiri nezana namakumi manomŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaShefatia, mazana matatu namakumi manomŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaAra, mazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaPahati‐moabi, ʋaʋana ʋaJeshua naJoabi, ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana masere negumi naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaErami, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaZatu, mazana masere namakumi manna naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋaZakai, mazana manomŋe namakumi matanhatu.
Ʋana ʋaBinui, mazana matanhatu namakumi manna naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaBebai, mazana matanhatu namakumi maʋiri naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaAzgadi, ɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana matatu namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaAdonikami, mazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu naʋanomŋe.
Ʋana ʋaBigvai, ɀuru ɀiʋiri namakumi matanhatu naʋanomŋe.
Ʋana ʋaAdini, mazana matanhatu namakumi mashanu naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋaAteri, waHezekia, makumi mapfumbamŋe naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaHashumi, mazana matatu namakumi maʋiri naʋasere.
Ʋana ʋaBezai, mazana matatu namakumi maʋiri naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaHarifi, zana rimŋe negumi naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaGibeoni, makumi mapfumbamŋe naʋashanu.
Ʋarume ʋeBeti‐rehemi naʋeNetofa, zana rimŋe namakumi masere naʋasere.
Ʋarume ʋeAnatoti, zana rimŋe namakumi maʋiri naʋasere.
Ʋarume ʋeBeti‐Azmaveti, makumi manna naʋaʋiri.
Ʋarume ʋeKiriati‐jearimi, neKefira, neBeeroti, mazana manomŋe namakumi manna naʋatatu.
Ʋarume ʋeRama neGeba, mazana matanhatu namakumi maʋiri nomumŋe.
Ʋarume ʋeMikmashi, zana rimŋe namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri.
Ʋarume ʋeBeti‐eri neAi, zana rimŋe namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu.
Ʋarume ʋeNebo recipiri, makumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaErami wecipiri, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi mashanu naʋanna.
Ʋana ʋaHarimi, mazana matatu namakumi maʋiri.
Ʋana ʋeJeriko, mazana matatu namakumi manna naʋashanu.
Ʋana ʋeRodi, neHadidi, neOno, mazana manomŋe namakumi maʋiri nomumŋe.
Ʋana ʋeSenaa, ɀuru ɀitatu namazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi matatu.
Ʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaJedaya, ʋeimba yaJeshua, mazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi manomŋe naʋatatu.
Ʋana ʋeImeri, curu cimŋe namakumi mashanu naʋaʋiri.
Ʋana ʋaPashuri, curu cimŋe namazana maʋiri namakumi manna naʋanomŋe.
Ʋana ʋaHarimi, curu cimŋe negumi naʋanomŋe.
ƲaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaJeshua weKadmieri, waʋana ʋaHodeva, makumi manomŋe naʋanna.
Ʋaimbi ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaAsafi, zana rimŋe namakumi manna naʋasere.
Ʋarindi ʋemikoʋa ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaSharumi, naʋana ʋaAteri, naʋana ʋaTarmoni, naʋana ʋaAkubi, naʋana ʋaHatita, naʋana ʋaShobai, zana rimŋe namakumi matatu naʋasere.
ƲaNetinimi ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaZiha, naʋana ʋaHasufa, naʋana ʋaTabaoti,
naʋana ʋaKerosi, naʋana ʋaSia, naʋana ʋaPadoni,
naʋana ʋaRebana, naʋana ʋaHagaba, naʋana ʋaSarmai,
naʋana ʋaHanani, naʋana ʋaGideri, naʋana ʋaGahari,
naʋana ʋaReaya, naʋana ʋaRezini, naʋana ʋaNekoda,
naʋana ʋaGazami, naʋana ʋaUza, naʋana ʋaPasea,
naʋana ʋaBesai, naʋana ʋaMeunimi, naʋana ʋaNefushesimi,
naʋana ʋaBakbuki, naʋana ʋaHakufa, naʋana ʋaHarhuri,
naʋana ʋaBazriti, naʋana ʋaMehida, naʋana ʋaHarsha,
naʋana ʋaBarkosi, naʋana ʋaSisera, naʋana ʋaTema,
naʋana ʋaNezia, naʋana ʋaHatifa.
Ʋana ʋaʋaranda ʋaSoromoni ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaSotai, naʋana ʋaSofereti, naʋana ʋaPerida,
naʋana ʋaJaara, naʋana ʋaDarkoni, naʋana ʋaGideri,
naʋana ʋaShefatia, naʋana ʋaHatiri, naʋana ʋaPokereti‐hazebaimi, naʋana ʋaAmoni.
ƲaNetinimi ʋose naʋana ʋaʋaranda ʋaSoromoni, ʋaiʋa mazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ndiʋo ʋakakwira, ʋacibva Terimera, neTeri‐harsha, neKerubi, neAdoni, neImeri; asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuɗudza dzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kana marudzi aʋo, kana ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaIsraeri:
Ʋana ʋaDeraya, naʋana ʋaTobia, naʋana ʋaNekoda, mazana matanhatu namakumi manna naʋaʋiri.
Pakati paʋaprista ʋakaŋga ʋari: Ʋana ʋaHobaya, naʋana ʋaHakozi, naʋana ʋaBarzirai, wakaŋga awana mukadzi waʋakunda ʋaBarzirai muGireadi, akazotumidzwa zita rokwaʋo.
Aʋa ʋakatȿaka mazita aʋo pakati pamazita amadziteteguru, asi akashaikwa; saka ʋakanzi ʋakaȿiɓiswa, ʋakabviswa paʋuprista.
Ipapo muɓati akaʋaʋudza kuti ʋarege kudya ɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene, kuȿikira kwamuka muprista uneUrimi neTumimi.
Ʋuŋgano yose yakaȿika ɀuru ɀinamakumi manna neɀiʋiri namazana matatu namakumi matanhatu,
ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgi ʋaranda ʋaʋo naʋarandakadzi ʋaʋo, ʋakaȿika ɀuru ɀinomŋe namazana matatu namakumi matatu naʋanomŋe; ʋaiʋa naʋaimbi ʋarume naʋakadzi ʋanamazana maʋiri namakumi manna naʋashanu.
Mabiza aʋo aiʋa namazana manomŋe namakumi matatu namatanhatu; namahesera aʋo mazana maʋiri namakumi manna namashanu;
namakamera
Ʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋo ʋakapa
Ʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋo ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa ʋakapa muciʋigiro cefuma yokuɓate‐ɓasa nayo, madariki
Ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakapa madariki
Ɀino ʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaimbi, naʋamŋe ʋanhu, naʋaNetinimi, naʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakagara pamaguta aʋo.
Mŋedzi wecinomŋe wakati uciȿika, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamaguta aʋo.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana nomŋoyo mumŋe paɗare rakaŋga riri pamberi pesuʋo remvura; ʋakaʋudza Ezra munyori kuti aʋuye nebuku yomurairo waMosesi, wakaŋga warairwa ʋaIsraeri naJehova.
Ezra muprista ndokuʋuya nomurairo pamberi peʋuŋgano yaʋarume naʋakadzi, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kunzwisisa, nezuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi wecinomŋe.
Akaraʋa’mo paɗare rakaŋga riri pamberi pesuʋo remvura, kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira masikati, pamberi paʋarume naʋakadzi naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacigona kunzwisisa; nzeʋe dzaʋanhu ʋose

Ezra munyori akamira pakakwirira pakaŋga pakaʋakirwa iɀoɀo namatanda; ʋuye Matitia, naShema, naAnaya, naUria, naHirkiya naMaaseya ʋakamira kurutiʋi rwake rworudyi, naPedaya, naMishaeri, naMarkiya, naHashumi, naHashbadana, naZekaria, naMeshurami ʋakamira kuruɓoshwe rwake.
Ezra akazarura buku pamberi paʋanhu ʋose; (nokuti wakaŋga amire kumsoro kwaʋanhu ʋose;) ɀino wakati aciizarura ʋanhu ʋose ndokusimuka.
Ipapo Ezra akaʋoŋga Jehova, Mŋari mukuru. Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakapindura, ʋaciti: Ameni, Ameni, ʋacisimudza maʋoko aʋo; ipapo ʋakakotamisa misoro yaʋo, ʋakanamata kunaJehova ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakatarira pasi.

Jeshua, naBani, naSherebia, naJamini, naAkubi, naShabetai, naHodia, naMaaseya, naKerita, naAzaria, naJozabadi, naHanani, naPeraya, naʋaRevi ʋakaɗudzira ʋanhu mirairo; ʋanhu ʋakaramba ʋamire panɀimbo yaʋo.
Ʋakaraʋa ɀicinzwika kwaɀo mubuku yomurairo waMŋari; ʋakaɀiɗudzira, ʋakanzwisisa ɀinorabga.

Ipapo muɓati Nehemia, nomuprista Ezra munyori, naʋaRevi ʋakadzidzisa ʋanhu, ʋakati kuʋanhu ʋose: Zuʋa rino idɀene kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu; musawuŋgudza nokucema; nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakacema ʋacinzwa mashoko omurairo.

Ipapo akati kwaʋari: Endai henyu, mudye ɀakakora, nokunwa ɀinozipa, mugotumira ʋo migoʋe kunaʋasina‐kugadzirirwa cinhu; nokuti zuʋa rino idɀene kunaShe weɗu; musaʋa neshuŋgu, nokuti mufaro waJehova isimba renyu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaRevi ʋakanyaradza ʋanhu ʋose, ʋaciti: Nyararai henyu, nokuti izuʋa dɀene; musaʋa neshuŋgu.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaenda kundodya nokunwa, nokutumira
Ɀino pazuʋa recipiri ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa aʋanhu ʋose, naʋaprista, naʋaRevi, ʋakaʋuŋganira kunaEzra munyori, kuzoterera mashoko omurairo.
Ʋakawana pakanyorwa mumurairo, kuti Jehova wakaraira Mosesi, kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋanofanira kugara pamatumba pamutambo womŋedzi wecinomŋe;
ʋuye kuti ʋanofanira kuziʋisa nokuparidza
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakaʋuya nawo, ʋakaɀiitira matumba, mumŋe nomumŋe pamsoro peɗeŋga reimba yake, napaʋazhe dzaʋo, napaʋazhe dzeimba yaMŋari, napaɗare resuʋo remvura, napaɗare resuʋo raEfraimi.

Ʋuŋgano yose yaʋakaŋga ʋakadzoka pakutapxa ʋakaita matumba, ʋakagara pamatumba; nokuti kubva pamazuʋa aJoshua mŋanakomana waNuni kuȿikira pazuʋa iro, ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kuita iɀoɀo. Pakaʋa nomufaro mukuru.

Ʋuye zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, kubva pazuʋa rokutaŋga kuȿikira pazuʋa rokupedzisira, wakaraʋa pabuku yomurairo waMŋari. Ʋakaita mutambo mazuʋa manomŋe; pazuʋa rorusere ʋakaita ʋuŋgano yokupedzisira, seɀakaŋga ɀatemŋa.
Ɀino pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanna romŋedzi uyu ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya, ʋakafuka magumbu, ʋanevu pamisoro yaʋo.
Ʋorudzi rwaʋaIsraeri ʋakaɀiraʋura paʋatorwa ʋose, ʋakamira ʋakaɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaʋo neɀitadzo ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ʋakasimuka paʋakaŋga ʋagere, ʋakaraʋa mubuku yomurairo waJehova Mŋari waʋo mugoʋe wecinna wezuʋa;
Ipapo Jeshua, naBani, naKadmieri, naShebania, naBuni, naSherebia, naBani, naKenani ʋakamira pamatanho aʋaRevi, ʋakacema nenzwi guru kunaJehova Mŋari waʋo.

Ipapo ʋaRevi, Jeshua, naKadmieri, naBani, naHashabineya, naSherebia, naHodia, naShebania, naPetahiya ʋakati: Simukai, muʋoŋge Jehova Mŋari wenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri; zita renyu rinobginya ŋgarikudzwe, iro rinokunda kuʋoŋga nokurumbidza kwose.

Ndimi Jehova, imi moga; imi makaita ɗeŋga, nokuɗeŋgaɗeŋga, nehondo dzaro dzose, nenyika neɀose ɀiri mukati mayo, namakuŋgwa neɀose ɀiri mukati mawo; imi munoceŋgeta ɀose; hondo dzokuɗeŋga dzinonamata kwamuri.
Ndimi Jehova Mŋari wakatsaura Abrama, mukamuɓuɗisa paUri raʋaKardea, mukamupa zita rinonzi Abrahama;

mukaʋona kuti mŋoyo wake wakatendeka pamberi penyu, mukaita suŋgano naye kuti mucapa ʋana ʋake nyika yaʋaKanani, neyaʋaHiti, neyaʋaAmori, neyaʋaPerezi, neyaʋaJebusi, neyaʋaGirgashi, muciita seɀamakataura, nokuti makarurama.
Mukaʋona kutambudzika kwamadziɓaɓa eɗu paEgipita, mukanzwa kucema kwaʋo paGuŋgwa Dɀuku;
mukaratidza Farao ɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa, naʋaranda ʋake ʋose, naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika yake; nokuti makaziʋa kuti ʋakaʋaitira
Mukaparadzanisa guŋgwa pamberi paʋo; naiɀoɀo ʋakayambuka pakati peguŋgwa pakawoma; mukawisira ʋateʋereri ʋaʋo makadzika, sebge mumvura inesimba.
Makaʋafambisa ʋo masikati neshoŋgwe yegore, noʋusiku neshoŋgwe yomŋoto, kuti ʋavenekerwe panzira yaʋaifanira kufamba nayo.
Makaɓurukira ʋo pagomo reSinai, mukataura naʋo muri kuɗeŋga, mukaʋapa ɀakatoŋgwa ɀakarurama nemirairo yaɀokwaɗi, nemitemo yakanaka, nemirairo.
Mukaʋaziʋisa saɓata renyu dɀene, mukaʋaraira mirairo, nemitemo, nomurau, nomuromo waMosesi muranda wenyu;
mukaʋapa ciŋgwa cakabva kuɗeŋga kuʋagutisa panzara yaʋo, mukaʋaɓuɗisira mvura pabge kupedza nyota yaʋo, mukaʋaraira kuti ʋapinde munyika kuiita yaʋo, iyo yamakaŋga maʋapikira kuʋapa.
Asi iʋo namadziɓaɓa eɗu ʋakaita manyawi, ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo, ʋakasaterera mirairo yenyu,
ʋakaramba kuterera, kana kuraŋgarira ɀinoshamisa ɀenyu ɀamakaita pakati paʋo; asi ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo, ʋakamukira
Kunyaŋge paŋguʋa yaʋakaɀiitira mhuru yakaʋumbga, ʋaciti: Ndiye Mŋari wenyu wakakuɓuɗisai paEgipita, ʋaka

kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, hamunakuʋarasha murenje, nokuɗa kwetsitsi dzenyu zhinji; shoŋgwe yegore hainakubva pamsoro paʋo masikati, icirega kuʋafambisa panzira, kana shoŋgwe yomŋoto ʋusiku, icirega kuʋavenekera nokuʋaratidza nzira yaʋaifanira kufamba nayo.
Makaʋapa ʋo mŋeya wenyu wakanaka kuʋadzidzisa, mukasanyima miromo yaʋo mana yenyu, mukaʋapa mvura kupedza nyota yaʋo.
Makaʋararamisa makore makumi manna murenje, ʋakasashaiwa cinhu; ŋguʋo dzaʋo hadzina‐kusakara, ʋuye tsoka dzaʋo hadzina‐kuɀimba.
Makaʋapa ʋo ʋushe naʋanhu, mukaʋaganhurira nyika yaʋo; naiɀoɀo ʋakapiwa nyika yaSihoni, iyo nyika yamambo weHeshboni, nenyika yaOgi mambo weBashani.
Mukawanza ʋana ʋaʋo ʋakaita senyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga; mukaʋaȿitsa panyika yamakaʋudza madziɓaɓa aʋo kuti ʋacapinda’mo kuzoiita yaʋo.

Naiɀoɀo ʋana ʋakapinda panyika ʋakaiita yaʋo; imi mukaʋakundira ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere munyika iyo, iʋo ʋaKanani; mukaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋo, pamŋe cete namadzimambo aʋo naʋanhu ʋenyika iyo kuti ʋaite naʋo seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa.
Ʋakakunda maguta akakombga, nenyika inefuma, ʋakatora dzimba dzakaŋga dzizere neɀose ɀakanaka,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro haʋana‐kuterera, ʋakakumukirai, ʋakarashira murau wenyu shure kwemisana yaʋo ʋakaʋuraya ʋaprofita ʋenyu ʋaiʋapupurira, ʋaciɗa kuʋadzosera ɀe kwamuri, ʋaka

Saka makaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋadziʋisi ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋamanikidza; ɀino paŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwaʋo, pakucema kwaʋo kwamuri, makaʋanzwa iko kuɗeŋga, netsitsi dzenyu zhinji mukaʋapa ʋarwiri ʋakaʋarwira pamaʋoko aʋadziʋisi ʋaʋo.

Asi ʋakati ʋazorodzwa, ʋakaita ɀakaipa ɀe pamberi penyu; saka makaʋaregera ɀe mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, iʋo ʋakaʋaɓata nesimba; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro pakudzoka kwaʋo, nokucema kwaʋo kwamuri, makaʋanzwa kuɗeŋga, mukaʋarwira kazhinji netsitsi dzenyu;

mukaʋapupurira, kuti muʋadzosere ɀe kumurau wenyu; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaita manyawi, ʋakasaterera mirairo yenyu, asi ʋakatadzira ɀamakaŋga matoŋga, (iɀo ɀinoti kana munhu aciɀiita, ucararama naɀo,) ʋakabvisa fudzi raʋo, ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo, ʋakaramba kunzwa.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro makaʋa netsitsi naʋo makore mazhinji, mukaʋapupurira nomŋeya wenyu naʋaprofita ʋenyu; asi ʋakaramba kuterera; saka makaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋenyika iyo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, netsitsi dzenyu zhinji hamuna‐kuʋapedza cose, kana kuʋarasha, nokuti muri Mŋari unenyasha netsitsi.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Mŋari weɗu, Mŋari mukuru, unesimba, unotyisa, unoceŋgeta suŋgano yake netsitsi, kutambudzika kwose, kwakatiwira isu, namadzimambo eɗu, namacinda eɗu, naʋaprista ʋeɗu, naʋaprofita ʋeɗu, namadziɓaɓa eɗu, naʋanhu ʋenyu ʋose kubva pamazuʋa amadzimambo eAsiria kuȿikira nhasi, ŋgakurege kuita secinhu ciɗuku pamberi penyu.
Asi imi makaita henyu ɀakarurama paɀose ɀakatiwira, nokuti makaita neɀokwaɗi, asi isu takaita ɀakashata.
Kunyaŋge madzimambo eɗu, namacinda eɗu, naʋaprista ʋeɗu, namadziɓaɓa eɗu, haʋana‐kuceŋgeta murau wenyu, kana kuterera mirairo yenyu neɀipupuriro ɀenyu, ɀamakaʋapupurira naɀo.
Nokuti haʋana‐kukushumirai paʋushe bgaʋo, ʋuye nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu ʋukuru bgamakaʋaitira, napanyika huru inefuma yamakaʋapa; haʋana‐kurega maɓasa aʋo akaipa.
Tarirai, tiri ʋaranda nhasi, ʋuye kana iri nyika yamakapa madziɓaɓa eɗu, kuti ʋadye ɀiɓereko ɀayo neɀakanaka ɀayo, tarirai, tiri ʋaranda mairi.
Ɀiɓereko ɀizhinji inoɀiɓerekera madzimambo amakaisa pamsoro peɗu, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀeɗu; iʋo ʋanesimba ʋo pamiʋiri yeɗu, napaŋombe dzeɗu, seɀaʋanoɗa; tiri pakumanikidzwa kukuru.
Kunyaŋge ɀose ɀakaɗaro haɀo, tinoita suŋgano inesimba, ticiinyora; namacinda eɗu, naʋaRevi ʋeɗu, naʋaprista ʋeɗu ʋanoisimbisa.
Ɀino ʋakasimbisa
neSeraya, naAzaria, naJeremia;
naPashuri, naAmaria, naMarkija;
naHatushi, naShebania, naMaruki;
naHarimi, naMeremoti, naObadia;
naDanieri, naGinetoni, naBaruki;
naMeshurami, naAbija, naMijamini;
naMaazia, naBirgai, naShemaya; ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋaprista.
Ʋuye ʋaRevi aʋa: Jeshua, mŋanakomana waAzania, naBinui waʋanakomana ʋaHenadadi, naKadmieri;
nehama dzaʋo: Shebania, naHodia, naKerita, naPeraya, naHanani;
naMika, naRehobi, naHashabia;
naZakuri, naSherebia, naShebania;
naHodia, naBani, naBeninu;
ʋuye ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu aʋa: Paroshi, naPahati‐moabi, naErami, naZatu, naBani;
naBuni, naAzgadi, naBebai;
naAdonija, naBigvai, naAdini;
naAteri, naHezekia, naAzuri;
naHodia, naHashumi, naBezai;
naHarifi, naAnatoti, naNobai;
naMagpiashi, naMeshurami, naHezeri;
naMeshezaberi, naZadoki, naJadua;
naPeratia, naHanani, naAnaya;
naHoshea, naHanania, naHashubi;
naHaroheshi, naPirha, naShobeki;
naRehumi, naHashabna, naMaaseya;
naAhiya, naHanani, naAnani;
naMaruki, naHarimi, naBaana.

Asi ʋamŋe ʋanhu, iʋo ʋaprista, naʋaRevi, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaimbi, naʋaNetinimi, naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiraʋura paʋanhu ʋenyika iyo kuceŋgeta murau waMŋari, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋakunda ʋaʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga aciziʋa nokunzwisisa,

ʋakanamatira hama dzaʋo, iʋo ʋakuru, ʋakaɀisuŋga nokutukwa nokupika kuti ʋacafamba nomurau waMŋari, waʋakapiwa naMosesi muranda waMŋari, nokuraŋgarira nokuita mirairo yose yaJehova Ishe weɗu, neɀaakatoŋga neɀaakatema;
ʋuye kuti hatiŋgapi ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakunda ʋeɗu, kana kutorera ʋanakomana ʋeɗu ʋakunda ʋaʋo;
ʋuye kuti kana ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakaʋuya neɀinhu ɀaʋo, kana ɀokudya ɀipi neɀipi, kuzoteŋgesa nezuʋa resaɓata, isu hatiŋgaʋateŋgeri nesaɓata, kana panerimŋe zuʋa dɀene; ʋuye kuti ticaregera
Takaɀiitira ʋo mutemo kuti ticaripira ɓasa reimba yaMŋari weɗu cetatu ceshekeri

reɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, necipiriso coʋupfu ceŋguʋa dzose, necipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose, rapamasaɓata, napakugara kwemŋedzi, napanemimŋe mitambo yakatarwa, nereɀimŋe ɀinhu ɀitȿene, nereɀipiriso ɀeɀiʋi ɀokuyananisira ʋaIsraeri naɀo, neramaɓasa ose muimba yaMŋari weɗu.

Tikakanda mijenya, isu ʋaprista naʋaRevi naʋanhu, pamsoro peɀipo ɀehuni, kuti tiʋuye nadzo mumba maMŋari weɗu, namadzoro edzimba dzamadziɓaɓa eɗu, paŋguʋa dzakatarwa gore rimŋe nerimŋe, kuti dziʋeserwe paartari yaJehova Mŋari weɗu, seɀakanyorwa pamurairo;
tikaɀisuŋga kuti ticaʋuya neɀitȿa ɀeminda yeɗu, neɀitȿa ɀeɀiɓereko ɀose ɀemiti yamarudzi ose, gore rimŋe nerimŋe kumba kwaJehova;

namataŋgwe aʋanakomana ʋeɗu naʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeɀipfuwo ɀeɗu, seɀakanyorwa pamurau, naʋana ʋemhoŋgora dzeŋombe dzeɗu namakwai eɗu, kuti tiʋuye naɀo kumba kwaMŋari weɗu, nokuʋaprista ʋanoɓata mumba maMŋari weɗu;

ʋuye kuti ticaʋuya neɀitȿa ɀoʋupfu, neɀeɀipiriso ɀinotsaurwa, neɀiɓereko ɀemiti yamarudzi ose, ɀewaini neɀamafuta, kuʋaprista, kumakamuri eimba yaMŋari weɗu, neɀegumi ɀeminda yeɗu kuʋaRevi, nokuti ʋaRevi ndiʋo ʋanopiwa ɀegumi ɀeɀinorimŋa nesu pamaguta ose.
Muprista mŋanakomana waAroni unofanira kuʋa naʋaRevi kana ʋaRevi ʋacitora ɀegumi; ɀino ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kuʋuya necegumi ceɀegumi kuimba yaMŋari weɗu kumakamuri eimba yefuma.

Nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋana ʋaRevi ʋanofanira kuʋuya necipiriso cinotsaurwa ceɀiyo, newaini, namafuta, kumakamuri munemidziyo yeimba tȿene nokuʋaprista ʋanoɓata’mo, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, naʋaimbi; hatiŋgarashi imba yaMŋari weɗu.
Ɀino macinda aʋanhu akagara Jerusarema; ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakakanda mijenya ʋo kuti mumŋe pagumi rimŋe nerimŋe agare Jerusarema, iro guta dɀene, asi ʋamŋe ʋapfumbamŋe
Ʋanhu ʋakarumbidza ʋarume ʋose ʋakatenda nomŋoyo waʋo kugara Jerusarema.
Ɀino ndiʋo ʋakuru ʋorutiʋi rwenyika ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema; asi pamaguta aJuda mumŋe nomumŋe wakagara panɀimbo yake pamaguta aʋo,

PaJerusarema ndipo pakagara ʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋaJuda, naʋaʋana ʋaBenjamini. Ʋana ʋaJuda aʋa: Ataya mŋanakomana waUzia, mŋanakomana waZekariya, mŋanakomana waAmaria, mŋanakomana waShefatia, mŋanakomana waMaharareri waʋana ʋaPerezi;
naMaaseya mŋanakomana waBaruki, mŋanakomana waKori‐hoze, mŋanakomana waHazaya, mŋanakomana waAdaya, mŋanakomana waJoyaribi, mŋanakomana waZekaria, mŋanakomana womuShironi.
Ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaPerezi ʋakaŋga ʋagere Jerusarema ʋakaȿika mazana manna namakumi matanhatu naʋasere, ʋarume ʋoʋumhare.
Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaBenjamini: Saru mŋanakomana waMeshurami, mŋanakomana waJoedi, mŋanakomana waPedaya, mŋanakomana waKoraya, mŋanakomana waMaaseya, mŋanakomana waItieri, mŋanakomana waJeshaya.
Teʋere Gabai, naSarai, mazana mapfumbamŋe namakumi maʋiri naʋasere;
naJoeri mŋanakomana waZikri wakaŋga ari mutariri waʋo, naJuda mŋanakomana waHasenua,
Ʋaʋaprista: Jedaya mŋanakomana waJoyaribi, naJakini,
Seraya mŋanakomana waHirkia, mŋanakomana waMeshurami, mŋanakomana waZadoki, mŋanakomana waMerayoti, mŋanakomana waAhitubi, muɓati weimba yaMŋari,

nehama dzaʋo dzaiɓata maɓasa paimba iyo, ʋakaȿika mazana masere namakumi maʋiri naʋaʋiri; naAdaya mŋanakomana waJerohami, mŋanakomana waPeraria, mŋanakomana waAmzi, mŋanakomana waZekaria, mŋanakomana waPashuri, mŋanakomana waMarkija,
nehama dzake, ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, mazana maʋiri namakumi manna naʋaʋiri; naAmashai mŋanakomana waAzareri, mŋanakomana waAzai, mŋanakomana waMeshiremoti, mŋanakomana waImeri,
nehama dzaʋo, ʋarume ʋanesimba noʋumhare, zana namakumi maʋiri naʋasere; mutariri waʋo wakaŋga ari Zabdieri mŋanakomana waHagedorimi.
Ʋuye ʋaRevi: Shemaya mŋanakomana waHashubi, mŋanakomana waAzrikami, mŋanakomana waHashabia, mŋanakomana waBuni;
naShabetai naJozabadi, ʋaʋakuru ʋaʋaRevi, ʋaitarira maɓasa okunze eimba yaMŋari;
