naMatania mŋanakomana waMika, mŋanakomana waZabdi, mŋanakomana waAsafi, iye mukuru wakataŋga kuʋoŋga pakunyeŋgetera, naBakbukia
ƲaRevi ʋose paguta dɀene ʋakaŋga ʋanamazana maʋiri namakumi masere naʋanna.
Ʋuye ʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, Akubi, naTarmoni, nehama dzaʋo, ʋairinda pamikoʋa, ʋakaŋga ʋanezana rimŋe namakumi manomŋe naʋaʋiri.
Ʋamŋe ʋakasara ʋaʋaIsraeri, ʋaʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakagara pamaguta ose aJuda; mumŋe nomumŋe panhaka yake.
Asi ʋaNetinimi ʋakagara paOferi; Ziha naGishpa ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatariri ʋaʋaNetinimi.

Mutariri ʋo waʋaRevi paJerusarema wakaŋga ari Uzi mŋanakomana waBani, mŋanakomana waHashabia, mŋanakomana waMatania, mŋanakomana waMika, ʋaʋanakomana ʋaAsafi, iʋo ʋaimbi ʋaitarira ɓasa reimba yaMŋari.
Nokuti mambo wakaŋga araira pamsoro paʋo, naʋaimbi ʋaipiwa muɓairo wakatarwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Petahia mŋanakomana waMeshezaberi, waʋana ʋaZera mŋanakomana waJuda, ndiye wakaŋga ari paruʋoko rwamambo pamashoko ose aʋanhu.
Kana iri misha nokuruwa rwayo, ʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋaJuda ʋakagara paKiriati‐araba nemisha yaro, napaDiboni nemisha yaro, napaJekabzeeri nemisha yaro;
napaJeshua, napaMorada, napaBeti‐pereti;
napaHazari‐shuari, napaBeeri‐sheba nemisha yawo;
napaZikragi, napaMekona nemisha yawo;
napaEni‐rimoni, napaZora, napaJarmuti;
neZanoa, neAdurami, nemisha yawo, neRakishi noruwa rwaro, neAzeka nemisha yaro. Naiɀoɀo ʋakaʋaka misasa yaʋo kubva paBeeri‐sheba kuȿikira pamupata weHinomi.
Ʋana ʋaBenjamini
neAnatoti, neNobi, neAnania;
neHazori, neRama, neGitaimi;
neHadidi, neZeboimi, neNebarati;
neRodi, neOno, neGehaharashimi.
Ʋamŋe ʋaRevi ʋamapoka aJuda
Ɀino aʋa ndiʋo ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakaenda naZerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, naJeshua: Seraya, naJeremia, naEzra;
naAmaria, naMaruki, naHatushi;
naShekania, naRehumi, naMeremoti;
naIdo, naGinetoi, naAbija;
naMijamini, naMaadia, naBirga;
naShemaya, naJoyaribi, naJedaya;
naSaru, naAmoki, naHirkiya, naJedaya. Ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋaʋaprista naʋehama dzaʋo pamazuʋa aJeshua.
Ʋuye naʋaRevi aʋa: Jeshua, naBinui, naKadmieri, naSherebia, naJuda, naMatania, iye nehama dzake ndiʋo ʋairaira ʋaimbi.
NaBakbukia, naUno, hama dzaʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋakatarisana naʋo pakurinda.
Jeshua akaɓereka Joyakimi, Joyakimi akaɓereka Eriashibi, Eriashibi akaɓereka Joyada;
Joyada akaɓereka Jonatani, Jonatani akaɓereka Jadua.
Pamazuʋa aJoyakimi ʋaprista, iʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋakaŋga ʋari: WokwaSeraya, Meraya; wokwaJeremia, Hanania;
wokwaEzra, Meshurami, wokwaAmaria, Jehohanani;
wokwaMaruki, Jonatani; wokwaShebania, Josefa;
wokwaHarimi, Adna; wokwaMerayoti, Herkai;
wokwaIdo, Zekaria; wokwaGinetoni, Meshurami;
wokwaAbia, Zikri; wokwaMinyamini waMoadia, Pirtai;
wokwaBirga, Shamua; wokwaShemaya, Jehonatani;
wokwaJoyaribi, Matenai; wokwaJedaya, Uzi;
wokwaSarai, Karai; wokwaAmoki, Eberi;
wokwaHirkiya Hashabia; wokwaJedaya, Netaneri.
ƲaRevi ʋakanyorwa mazita aʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa pamazuʋa aEriashibi, naJoyada, naJohanani, naJadua; naʋaprista ʋo kuȿikira pakuɓata ʋushe kwaDariusi muPersia.
Ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, iʋo ʋakuru ʋedzimba dzamadziɓaɓa, ʋakanyorwa pabuku yamakronike, kuȿikira pamazuʋa aJohanani mŋanakomana waEriashibi.

Ʋakuru ʋaʋaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋari: Hashabia, naSherebia, naJeshua, mŋanakomana waKadmieri, nehama dzaʋo dzakatarisana naʋo pakurumbidza nokuʋoŋga, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naDavidi munhu waMŋari, ʋaciita madzoro pakuimba.
Matania, naBakbukia, naObadia, naMeshurami, naTarmoni, naAkubi ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarindi ʋe mikoʋa, ʋairinda pamatura pamasuʋo.
Ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari’po pamazuʋa aJoyakimi mŋanakomana waJeshua, mŋanakomana waJozadaki, napamazuʋa aNehemia muɓati, nomuprista Ezra munyori.
Ɀino pakutsaurira kwaʋo
Ʋanakomana ʋaʋaimbi ʋakaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete ʋacibva kumapani akapoteredza Jerusarema, nokumisha yaʋaNetofati;
napaBeti‐girgari, naparuwa rweGeba neAzmaveti; nokuti ʋaimbi ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiʋakira misha pamatiʋi ose eJerusarema.
Ɀino ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋakaɀinatsa, ndokunatsa ʋo ʋanhu, namasuʋo, noruȿiŋgo.
Ipapo ndakakwidza macinda aʋaJuda pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, ndikaraira mapoka makuru maʋiri ʋakaʋoŋga ʋacifamba ʋakaita muɗuŋgwe;
shure kwaʋo kwakafamba Hosaya, nehafu yamacinda aJuda,
naAzaria, naEzra, naMeshurami,
naJuda, naBenjamini, naShemaya, naJeremia,
naʋamŋe ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprista ʋanehwamanda: Zekaria mŋanakomana waJonatani, mŋanakomana waShemaya, mŋanakomana waMatania, mŋanakomana waMikaya, mŋanakomana waZakuri, mŋanakomana waAsafi;
nehama dzake: Shemaya, naAzareri, naMirarai, naGirarai, naMaai, naNetaneri, naJuda, naHanani ʋaneɀokuridza ɀaDavidi munhu waMŋari; Ezra munyori wakaŋga ari pamberi paʋo;
napasuʋo retsime, ʋakarurama, ndokukwira namatano eguta raDavidi, pamukwidzwa woruȿiŋgo, pamsoro peimba yaDavidi, kuȿikira pasuʋo remvura, kumabvazuʋa.
Rimŋe ɓoka raʋaʋoŋgi rakandosoŋgana naʋo, ini ndiciʋateʋera, ndinehafu yaʋanhu pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, pamsoro peshoŋgwe yamaʋira, kuȿikira paruȿiŋgo rupamhi;
napamsoro pesuʋo raEfraimi, napasuʋo rekare, napasuʋo rehoʋe, neshoŋgwe yaHananeri, neshoŋgwe yaHamea, kuȿikira pasuʋo ramakwai; ʋakamira pasuʋo raʋarindi.
Mapoka maʋiri aʋaʋoŋgi ʋakamira saiɀoɀo paimba yaMŋari, neni nehafu yaʋatariri,
naʋaprista Eriakimi, naMaaseya, naMiniamini, naMikaya, naErioenai, naZekaria, naHanania, ʋanehwamanda;
naMaaseya, naShemaya, naEreazari, naUzi, naJehohanani, naMarkija, naErami, naEzeri. Ʋaimbi ʋakaimbisa kwaɀo, ʋanaJezrahia mutariri waʋo.
Ʋakaɓayira ɀiɓayiro ɀikuru nezuʋa iro, ʋakafara; nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga aʋafadza nomufaro mukuru; naʋakadzi ʋo naʋana ʋakafara; naiɀoɀo mufaro weJerusarema wakanzwika kure.

Pazuʋa iro ʋarume ʋakagadzwa kutarira makamuri efuma, neɀipiriso ɀinotsaurwa, neɀitȿa, neɀegumi, kuti ʋaʋuŋganidzire’mo migoʋe yaʋaprista neyaʋaRevi yakaŋga yakatarwa nomurau, kuti itorwe paruwa rwamaguta; nokuti ʋaJuda ʋakafarira ʋaprista naʋaRevi ʋaishumira.
Iʋo ʋakaceŋgeta murairo waMŋari waʋo, nomurairo wokunatsa, naʋaimbi naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa ʋo saiɀoɀo, seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naDavidi naSoromoni mŋanakomana wake.
Nokuti pamazuʋa akare aDavidi naAsafi, kwaiʋa nomukuru waʋaimbi, nenziyo dzokurumbidza nokuʋoŋga Mŋari.

Ɀino ʋaIsraeri ʋose pamazuʋa aZerubaberi, napamazuʋa aNehemia, ʋaipa ʋaimbi naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa migoʋe yaʋo, yakaɗikanwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe; iʋo ʋaitsaurira ʋaRevi, ʋuye ʋaRevi ʋaitsaurira ʋanakomana ʋaAroni.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ʋakaraʋa mubuku yaMosesi, ʋanhu ʋose ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakawana makanyorwa, kuti ʋaMoabi naʋaAmoni haʋafaniri kupinda paʋuŋgano yaMŋari nokusiŋgaperi;
nokuti iʋo haʋanakundosoŋgana naʋana ʋaIsraeri neɀokudya nemvura, asi ʋakaripira Barami kuti aʋatuke; asi Mŋari weɗu wakashandura kutuka akakuita kuropafadza.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanzwa murau, ʋakaraʋura ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaveŋgana naʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino iɀi ɀisati ɀaitwa, Eriashibi muprista, wakaŋga aitwa mutariri wamakamuri eimba yaMŋari weɗu, wakashamŋaridzana naTobia,

akamugadzirira kamuri huru paʋaiceŋgeta kare ɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, neɀinonhuwira, nemidziyo, neɀegumi ɀeɀiyo, neɀewaini, neɀamafuta, ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa kuti ɀipiwe ʋaRevi, naʋaimbi, naʋarindi ʋemikoʋa, neɀipiriso ɀaitsaurirwa ʋaprista.

Asi neŋguʋa iyo yose ini ndakaŋga ndisi’po paJerusarema; nokuti negore ramakumi matatu namaʋiri raArtashasta mambo weBabironi, ini ndakaenda kunamambo; ɀino mamŋe mazuʋa akati apfuʋura ndikakumbira kunamambo,
ndikaȿika Jerusarema, ndikanzwa ɀakaipa ɀakaŋga ɀaitwa naEriashibi kuti wakaŋga agadzirira Tobia kamuri paruʋazhe rweimba yaMŋari.
Ndikaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo; saka ndakarashira kunze kwekamuri nhumbi dzose dzaTobia.
Ipapo ndakaraira ʋakanatsa makamuri; ndikadzosera’mo ɀe midziyo yeimba yaMŋari, pamŋe cete neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu neɀinonhuwira.
Ndikaʋona kuti ʋaRevi ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kupiwa migoʋe yaʋo; naiɀoɀo ʋaRevi naʋaimbi, ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa, ʋakaŋga ʋatizira mumŋe nomumŋe kumunda wake.
Ipapo ndakaita nharo naʋatariri, ndikati: Imba yaMŋari yasiyirweiko? Ndikaʋakokera, ndikaʋadzosera ɀe panɀimbo yaʋo.
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaʋuya neɀegumi ɀeɀiyo, neɀewaini, neɀamafuta, ʋakaɀiisa muɀiʋigiro.

Ndikaisa paɀiʋigiro ʋaceŋgeti ʋefuma, Sheremia muprista, naZadoki munyori, naʋaʋaRevi, Pedaya; ʋaciɓatsirwa naHanani mŋanakomana waZakuri, mŋanakomana waMatania; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacinzi ʋakatendeka; ɓasa raʋo rakaŋga riri rokupa hama dzaʋo mugoʋe waʋo.
Cindiraŋgarirai henyu, Mŋari waŋgu, pamsoro paiɀoɀo; regai henyu kupisika maɓasa aŋgu akanaka andakaitira imba yaMŋari waŋgu neɀaifanira kuitwa mairi.

Ɀino pamazuʋa iwayo ndakaʋona paJuda ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋacitsika mazambiriŋga paɀiȿiniro nesaɓata, naʋakaŋga ʋacitora ɀisote ʋaciɀitakudza mboŋgoro; ʋuye waini, namazambiriŋga, namaʋonde, nemitoro yamarudzi ose, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciʋuya naɀo paJerusarema nezuʋa resaɓata; ndikaʋanyeʋera pazuʋa raʋakateŋgesa ɀokudya.
Pakaŋga pagere ʋo ʋarume ʋeTire, ʋaiʋuya nehoʋe, neɀimŋe ɀinoteŋgeswa ɀamarudzi ose; ʋakaɀiteŋgesa kuʋanhu ʋaJuda napaJerusarema pazuʋa resaɓata.
Ipapo ndikaita nharo naʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda, ndikati kwaʋari: Cinhu ici cakaipa camunoita ndeceiko, ɀamunoɀidza zuʋa resaɓata?
Ko madziɓaɓa enyu haana‐kuita saiɀoɀo, Mŋari weɗu akaʋuyisa ɀakaipa iɀi ɀose pamsoro peɗu napamsoro peguta rino here? Asi imi munowedzera kutsamŋa

Ɀino pamasuʋo eJerusarema pakati poȿiɓa, saɓata risati raȿika, ndakaraira kuti mikoʋa ipfigwe, ndikaraira kuti irege kuzarurwa ɀe kuȿikira saɓata rapfuʋura; ndikaisa ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋaŋgu pamasuʋo, kuti mitoro irege kupinzwa pazuʋa resaɓata.
Naiɀoɀo ʋashambadziri naʋateŋgesi ʋeɀinhu ɀamarudzi ose ʋakaʋata kunze kweJerusarema kamŋe kana kaʋiri.
Ipapo ndakaʋanyeʋera ndikati kwaʋari, Munoʋatireiko pamberi poruȿiŋgo? Kana mukaɗaro ɀe ndicakuɓatai. Ɀino kubva paŋguʋa iyo haʋana‐kuzoʋuya ɀe nesaɓata.
Ndikaraira ʋaRevi kuti ʋaɀinatse, ʋaʋuye kuzorinda masuʋo, ʋatsaure zuʋa resaɓata. Ndiraŋgarirei henyu nokuɗa kwecinhu ici ʋo, Mŋari waŋgu, mundinzwire tsitsi nenyasha dzenyu huru.
Namazuʋa iwayo ndakaʋona ʋo ʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋawana ʋakadzi ʋeAshdodi, naAmoni, naMoabi;
ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaitaura ɀimŋe neciAshdodi, ʋasiŋgagoni kutaura rurimi rwaʋaJuda, asi rurimi rwamarudzi iwayo.
Ndikaita nharo naʋo, ndikaʋatuka, ndikaroʋa ʋamŋe ʋaʋo, ndikataʋura vudzi raʋo, ndikaʋapikisa naMŋari,

Ko Soromoni mambo waIsraeri haana‐kutadza paɀinhu iɀi here? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro pakati pendudzi zhinji pakaŋga pasinamambo wakafanana naye, naye wakaŋga akaɗikanwa naMŋari wake, Mŋari akamuita mambo waʋaIsraeri ʋose; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro naiye wakatadziswa naʋakadzi ʋatorwa.
Ko ɀino tiŋgakutererai kuti muite cinhu ici cakaipa cikuru, mutadzire Mŋari weɗu muciwana ʋakadzi ʋatorwa here?
Ɀino mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋaJoyada mŋanakomana waEriashibi muprista mukuru, wakaŋga ari mukwambo waSanbarati muHoroni; saka ndakamudziŋga abve kwandiri.
Muʋaraŋgarirei henyu, Mŋari waŋgu, nokuti ʋakaȿiɓisa ʋuprista nesuŋgano yoʋuprista neyaʋaRevi.
Ndikaʋanatsa saiɀoɀo
napaɓasa reɀipo ɀehuni paŋguʋa dzakatarwa, nereɀitȿa. Ndiraŋgarirei henyu, Mŋari waŋgu, mundiitire ɀakanaka.
Ɀino pamazuʋa aAhashveroshi, (ndiye Ahashveroshi waiɓata ʋushe kubva paIndia kuȿikira Etiopia, pamatiʋi enyika anezana namakumi maʋiri namanomŋe;)
pamazuʋa iwayo mambo Ahashveroshi agere pacigaro cake coʋushe cakaŋga ciri paShushani panhare yamambo,
pagore recitatu rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, wakaitira macinda ake ose naʋaranda ʋake mutambo; hondo dzePersia neMedia, naʋakuru namacinda enyika ʋakaŋga ʋari pamberi pake.
Akaʋaratidza fuma yoʋushe bgake bgakarumbidzwa, nokukudzwa kwoʋumambo bgake bgakaiȿo‐naka mazuʋa mazhinji, ari mazuʋa anezana namakumi masere.
Ɀino mazuʋa iwayo akati apera, mambo akaitira mutambo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari paShushani panhare yamambo, ʋakuru naʋaɗuku, mazuʋa manomŋe paruʋazhe rwomunda panhare yamambo;

pakaŋga panemiceka micena nemipfumbu nemitema yakaŋga yakasuŋgwa neɀisuŋgo ɀemiceka yakaiȿonaka nemishaʋa paɀindori ɀesirveri nembiru dzamabge macena; ɀigaro ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀendarama nesirveri ɀakagadzikwa paguʋa rakaitwa namabge matȿuku, namacena, namashora, namatema.
Ʋakapiwa ɀokunwa mumikombe yendarama, (asi mikombe yakaŋga isinakufanana), newaini yamambo zhinji, mambo asiŋgaʋanyimi napaɗuku.
Ʋakanwa nomurairo wokuti munhu arege kuroʋererwa; nokuti mambo wakaŋga araira ʋaranda ʋose ʋeimba yake, kuti ʋaitire mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakaŋga aciɗa nomŋoyo wake.
Naʋahosi Vashti ʋakaitira ʋo ʋakadzi mutambo paimba yamambo yakaŋga iri yamambo Ahashveroshi.
Ɀino nezuʋa recinomŋe mŋoyo wamambo wakati ucifara newaini, akaraira Mehumani, naBizta, naHarbona, naBigta, naAbagta, naZetari, naKarkasi, iʋo ʋaranda ʋanomŋe ʋaiɓata pamberi pamambo Ahashveroshi,
kuti ʋaʋuye naʋahosi Vashti pamberi pamambo, ʋanekorona yoʋuhosi, kuti ʋanhu namacinda ʋaʋone kunaka kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakanaka pakuʋonekwa.
Asi ʋahosi Vashti ʋakaramba kuʋuya seɀaʋakaŋga ʋarairwa namambo nomuromo waʋaranda; ipapo mambo akatsamŋa kwaɀo, shuŋgu dzake dzikamuka mukati make.
Ipapo mambo akati kuʋarume ʋakaŋgwara ʋaiziʋa ŋguʋa, (nokuti saiɀoɀo mambo wairaŋgana naʋose ʋaiziʋa murau neɀakatoŋgwa;

ʋakaŋga ʋagere peɗo naye ʋaiʋa Karshena, naShetari, naAdmata, naTarshishi, naMeresi, naMarsena, naMemukani, iwo macinda manomŋe ePersia neMedia, ʋaisiʋonana namambo, ʋaigara paɀigaro ɀokutaŋga paʋushe;)
: Murairo unoti kuɗini, ticaitireiko ʋahosi Vashti, ɀaʋakaramba kuita seɀaʋakarairwa namambo Ahashveroshi nomuromo waʋaranda?
Ipapo Memukani akapindura mambo namacinda, akati: Ʋahosi haʋana‐kutadzira mambo ɓedzi, asi namacinda ose ʋo, naʋanhu ʋose ʋari munyika dzose dzamambo Ahashveroshi.

Nokuti ici cakaitwa naʋahosi cicapararira pakati paʋakadzi ʋose, ɀino ʋacashoʋora ʋarume ʋaʋo, kana ɀicinzi: Mambo Ahashveroshi wakaraira ʋahosi Vashti kuti ʋaʋuyiswe pamberi pake, asi ʋakaramba kuʋuya.
Nhasi ʋakadzi ʋamacinda ePersia neMedia, akanzwa ɀakaitwa naʋahosi, acataura ʋo ɀakaɗaro kumacinda ose amambo. Naiɀoɀo kushoʋora nokutsamŋa kukuru

Kana mambo acifara naɀo, mambo ŋgaateme murairo unesimba ramambo, unyorwe pamirairo yaʋaPersia naʋaMedia, urege kushandurwa, kuti Vashti arege kuzoʋuya ɀe pamberi pamambo Ahashveroshi; mambo ŋgaape mumŋe wakanaka kupfuʋura iye ʋuhosi bgake.
Ɀino kana cireʋo camambo caʋacatema, cikaparidzwa paʋushe bgake bgose, (nokuti ʋukuru kwaɀo,) ʋakadzi ʋose ʋacakudza ʋarume ʋaʋo, ʋose ʋakuru naʋaɗuku.
Shoko iro rikafadza mambo namacinda; mambo ndokuita seɀakarebga naMemukani;

nokuti wakatuma ŋwadi kumatiʋi ose enyika dzose dzamambo, ɗiʋi rimŋe nerimŋe renyika nomunyorere wayo, norudzi rumŋe norumŋe norurimi rwarwo, kuti murume mumŋe nomumŋe aʋe murairi mumba make, ataure norurimi rwake.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo, kutsamŋa kwamambo Ahashveroshi kwakati kwanyarara, akaraŋgarira Vashti neɀaakaita, necireʋo cakatemŋa pamsoro pake.
Ipapo ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋaimuɓatira, ʋakati: Mambo ŋgaatȿakirwe mhandara dzakanaka;

mambo ŋgaaise ʋatariri pamatiʋi ose oʋushe bgake, ʋaʋuŋganidze mhandara dzose dzakanaka paShushani nhare yamambo, paimba yaʋakadzi, ʋaceŋgetwe naHegai muranda wamambo, mutariri waʋakadzi; ʋapiwe ʋo ɀaʋaŋgaɀinatsa naɀo;
ɀino musikana unofarirwa namambo ŋgaaʋe ʋahosi panɀimbo yaVashti. Iɀoɀo ɀikafadza mambo, akaita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino paShushani panhare yamambo pakaŋga panomuJuda, wainzi Mordekai, mŋanakomana waJairi, mŋanakomana waShimei, mŋanakomana waKishi, muBenjamini,
wakaŋga atapxa Jerusarema, pamŋe cete naʋatapxa ʋakaŋga ʋatapxa naJekonia mambo waJuda, wakaŋga atapxa naNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi.

Iye wakaŋga arera Hadasa, ndiye Estere, mukunda waɓaɓamunini wake; nokuti wakaŋga asinaɓaɓa namai; ɀino musikana uyu wakaŋga akanaka paʋumiro bgake napaciso cake; pakufa kwaɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake Mordekai ndokumutora, akamuita mukunda wake.

Ɀino murairo wamambo necireʋo cake ɀakati ɀanzwika, ʋasikana ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋganidzwa paShushani nhare yamambo, paʋaiceŋgetwa naHegai, Estere akatorwa ʋo, akaiswa mumba mamambo, akaceŋgetwa naHegai mutariri waʋakadzi.
Musikana uyu akamufadza, akanzwirwa tsitsi naye, akacimbidzika kumupa ɀaaŋgaɀinatsa naɀo, nemigoʋe yake
Asi Estere wakaŋga asina‐kuʋaziʋisa rudzi rwake nehama dzake; nokuti Mordekai wakaŋga amuraira, kuti arege kuʋaziʋisa iɀoɀo.
Ɀino Mordekai waifamba pamberi poruʋazhe rweimba yaʋakadzi mazuʋa ose, agoziʋa kuti Estere wakaɗini, ʋuye kuti ʋacaitei naye.

Ɀino dzoro romusikana mumŋe nomumŋe rakati riciȿika kupinda kunamambo Ahashveroshi, kana aitirwa ɀose nomurairo waʋakadzi mŋedzi inegumi nemiʋiri, (nokuti mazuʋa okunatswa kwaʋo akapera kuɗai: Mŋedzi mitanhatu
ɀino musikana akapinda nomutoʋo wakaɗaro kunamambo, ʋuye cinhu cipi necipi caaiɗa waicipiwa, kuti aɓuɗe naco paimba yaʋakadzi, apinde mumba mamambo.

Waienda maɗekwana, ndokudzokera maŋgwana kuimba yecipiri yaʋakadzi, paaiceŋgetwa naShaashgazi, muranda wamambo, waiceŋgeta ʋaroŋgo; haazaipinda ɀe kunamambo, asi kana aciŋge afarirwa namambo, akaɗanwa nezita rake.

Ɀino dzoro raEstere mukunda waAbihairi, ɓaɓamunini ʋaMordekai, wakaŋga amutora akamuita mukunda wake, rakati riciȿika rokupinda kunamambo, haana‐kukumbira cinhu asi iɀo ɓedzi ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa naHegai muranda wamambo, mutariri waʋakadzi. Ɀino Estere akanzirwa tsitsi naʋose ʋaimuʋona.
Naiɀoɀo Estere akaiswa kunamambo Ahashveroshi muimba yake yoʋushe nomŋedzi wegumi, ndiwo mŋedzi weTebeti, pagore recinomŋe rokuɓata kwake ʋushe.
Mambo akaɗa Estere kupfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋakadzi ʋose, akanzwirwa tsitsi noʋunyoro naye kupfuʋura dzimŋe mhandara dzose; naiɀoɀo akaisa korona yoʋuhosi pamusoro wake, akamuita ʋahosi panɀimbo yaVashti.
Ipapo mambo akaitira macinda ake ose naʋaranda ʋake ʋose mutambo mukuru, uri mutambo waEstere; akaraira zororo pamatiʋi enyika, akagoʋera ɀipo, mambo asiŋganyimi napaɗuku.
Ɀino pakuʋuŋganidzwa kwemhandara rwecipiri, Mordekai wakaŋga agere pasuʋo ramambo.
Estere wakaŋga acigere kuʋaziʋisa hama dzake kana rudzi rwake, seɀaakarairwa naMordekai; nokuti Estere wakaterera murairo waMordekai, seɀaaisiita acarerwa naye.
Ɀino pamazuʋa iwayo Mordekai agere pasuʋo ramambo, ʋaranda ʋaʋiri ʋamambo, Bigtani naTereshi, pakati paʋarindi ʋomukoʋa, ʋakatsamŋa ʋakatȿaka kuʋuraya mambo Ahashveroshi.
Cinhu ico cikazikanwa naMordekai, iye ndokuziʋisa ʋahosi Estere, Estere akandoʋudza mambo nezita raMordekai.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacinɀera cinhu ico, ʋakawana kuti ɀirokwaɀo, ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakasuŋgirirwa pamuti; ɀikanyorwa mubuku yamakoronike pamberi pamambo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo mambo Ahashveroshi wakakudza Hamani mŋanakomana waHamedata muAgagi, akamuita mukuru nokumupfuʋudza aʋe mukuru kumacinda ake ose.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋose ʋamambo ʋakaŋga ʋari pasuʋo ramambo ʋakakotama nokufugamira Hamani; nokuti mambo wakaŋga araira saiɀoɀo pamsoro pake. Asi Mordekai haana‐kukotama kana kumufugamira.
Ipapo ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋakaŋga ʋari pasuʋo ramambo ʋakati kunaMordekai: Iwe unoɗarikireiko murairo wamambo?
Ɀino ʋakati ʋataura naye mazuʋa ose, iye aciramba kuʋaterera, ʋakaʋudza Hamani kuti ʋaʋone kana mashoko aMordekai aŋgaʋa nesimba; nokuti wakaʋaʋudza kuti iye muJuda.
Ɀino Hamani wakati aciʋona kuti Mordekai haakotami kana kumufugamira, Hamani akaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo.
Asi wakashoʋora kuʋuraya Mordekai oga, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋamuziʋisa rudzi rwaMordekai; naiɀoɀo Hamani akatȿaka kuparadza ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari paʋushe bgose bgaAhashveroshi, irwo rudzi rwaMordekai.

Ɀino pamŋedzi wokutaŋga, uri mŋedzi weNisani, pagore regumi namaʋiri ramambo Ahashveroshi, ʋakakanda Puri, ndiyo mijenya, pamberi paHamani zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, pamŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe, kuȿikira pamŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, ndiwo mŋedzi weAdari.

Hamani akati kunamambo Ahashveroshi: Rumŋe rudzi rwaʋanhu ruri’ko, rwakapararira nokutekeshera pakati paʋanhu pamatiʋi ose enyika dzoʋushe bgenyu; mirau yaʋo yakasiyana neyaʋamŋe ʋanhu, haʋaceŋgeti mirau yamambo; saka mambo haafaniri kuʋarega
Kana mambo acifara naɀo,
Ipapo mambo akabvisa cindori cake paruʋoko rwake, akacipa Hamani mŋanakomana waHamedata muAgagi, muʋeŋgi waʋaJuda.
Mambo akati kunaHamani: Iwe naʋanhu ʋako muŋgatora sirveri iyo, muite nayo seɀaunoɗa iwe.

Ipapo ʋanyori ʋamambo ʋakaɗanwa nomŋedzi wokutaŋga, nezuʋa regumi namatatu, ɀose ɀikanyorwa Hamani seɀaakaraira macinda amambo, naʋaɓati ʋaiɓata rutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika naʋakuru ʋorudzi rumŋe norumŋe; rutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika rwakanyorerwa nomunyorere warwo, ʋuye rudzi rumŋe norumŋe norurimi rwarwo; ɀikanyorwa nezita ramambo Ahashveroshi ndokusimbiswa necindori camambo.

Ŋwadi dzikatumŋa nenhume dzinomhanya kumatiʋi ose enyika dzamambo, kuti ʋaJuda ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, naʋana ʋaɗuku, naʋakadzi ʋaparadzwe nokuʋurawa nokupedzwa pazuʋa rimŋe, pazuʋa regumi namatatu romŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, uri mŋedzi weAdari, ʋuye nenhumbi dzaʋo dzose dzipambge;
mashoko orunyoro urwu akatumŋa kuʋanhu ʋose, kuti cireʋo ciparidzwe pamatiʋi ose enyika, kuti ʋaɀigadzirire zuʋa iro.
Nhume dzinomhanya dzikacimbidzikiswa nomurairo wamambo, cireʋo cikaziʋiswa paShushani panhare yamambo; ipapo mambo naHamani ʋakagara pasi ʋakanwa; asi guta reShushani rakadzianiswa.
Ɀino Mordekai wakati acinzwa ɀose ɀaitwa, Mordekai ndokubvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akafuka magumbu nokuisa maɗota
akaȿika ʋo pamberi pesuʋo ramambo; nokuti wakafuka magumbu haana‐kutenderwa kupinda pasuʋo ramambo.

Naparutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika pose pakaȿika murairo wamambo necireʋo cake, pakaŋga pano‐kucema kukuru pakati paʋaJuda, nokuɀinyima ɀokudya, nokucema misodzi, nokuwuŋgudza; ʋazhinji ʋakaʋata pasi ʋakafuka magumbu nokuɀiisa maɗota
Ɀino ʋasikana ʋaEstere naʋaranda ʋake ʋakandomuʋudza iɀoɀo; ʋahosi ʋakaɓatwa neshuŋgu kwaɀo, ʋakatumira Mordekai ŋguʋo, kuti adzifuke, abvise magumbu; asi wakaramba kudzigamucira.
Ipapo Estere akaɗana Hataki, mumŋe waʋaranda ʋamambo, waakaŋga araira kumuɓatira, akamuraira kuti aende kunaMordekai kundonzwa kuti cinyi, ʋuye mhaka yeiko.
Ipapo Hataki akaenda kunaMordekai paɗare reguta, rakaŋga riri pamberi pesuʋo ramambo.
Mordekai akamuʋudza ɀose ɀaakaitirwa, nokuwanda kwemari yakanzi naHamani kuti ucaiisa muɀiʋigiro ɀamambo kuti ʋaJuda ʋaparadzwe.

Akamupa ʋo mashoko orunyoro rwecireʋo cakaŋga catemŋa paShushani cokuti ʋaparadzwe, kuti aciratidze Estere nokumuziʋisa iɀoɀo; akamuraira ʋo kuti apinde kunamambo amunyeŋgetere nokukumbirira ʋanhu ʋake kwaari.
Hataki akandoʋudza Estere mashoko aMordekai.
Ipapo Estere akataura naHataki, akamupa shoko rokundoʋudza Mordekai,

Ʋaranda ʋose ʋamambo naʋanhu ʋamatiʋi enyika dzamambo ʋanoziʋa kuti aninani, kunyaŋge murume kana mukadzi, kana akapinda kunamambo muruʋazhe rwomukati asina‐kuɗanwa, kunoŋgoʋa nomurau mumŋe woga kwaari, kuti aʋurawe; asi kana mambo akamutambunudzira tȿimbo yendarama, ucararama hake; asi ini handina‐kuɗanwa kuti ndipinde kunamambo mazuʋa ano anamakumi matatu.
Ʋakaʋudza Mordekai mashoko aEstere.
Ipapo Mordekai akaʋaraira kuti ʋapindure Estere, ʋati: Usati iwe ucapukunyuka mumba mamambo kupfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋose.
Nokuti kana iwe ukanyarara cose neŋguʋa ino, ʋaJuda ʋacaɓatsirwa nokurwirwa nomumŋe mutoʋo, asi iwe neimba yaɓaɓa ʋako mucaparadzwa; handiti, ɀimŋe wakaȿika paʋushe nokuɗa kweŋguʋa ineŋge seino here?
Ipapo Estere akaraira kuti ʋapindure Mordekai, ʋati:

Endai mukokere ʋaJuda ʋose ʋari paShushani, muɀinyime ɀokudya nokuɗa kwaŋgu; regai kudya kana kunwa mazuʋa matatu, ʋusiku namasikati; neni ʋo naʋasikana ʋaŋgu ticaɀinyima ɀokudya saiɀoɀo; ipapo ndicapinda kunamambo, kunyaŋge ɀisina‐kutenderwa nomurau; kana ndikaparara, ndaparara haŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo Mordekai akaenda hake akandoita ɀose ɀaakarairwa naEstere.

Ɀino pazuʋa recitatu Estere wakafuka ŋguʋo dzake dzoʋuhosi, akandomira paruʋazhe rwomukati rweimba yamambo, pakatarisana neimba yamambo; mambo wakaŋga agere pacigaro cake coʋushe paimba yake yoʋushe, pakatarisana nomukoʋa weimba.

Ɀino mambo wakati aciʋona ʋahosi Estere amire paruʋazhe, iye akanzwirwa tsitsi naye, mambo akatambanudzira Estere tȿimbo yendarama yakaŋga iri muruʋoko rwake. Ipapo Estere akasweɗera, akaɓata muromo wetȿimbo.
Ɀino mambo akati kwaari: Unoreʋeiko ʋahosi Estere? Unokumbireiko? Ucaɀipiwa, kunyaŋge ucikumbira hafu yoʋushe bgaŋgu.
Estere akati: Kana mambo acifara naɀo, mambo naHamani ŋgaʋaʋuye nhasi kumafundo andakamugadzirira.
Ipapo mambo akati: Hamani ŋgaacimbidzike, kuti ɀakarebga naEstere ɀiitwe. Naiɀoɀo mambo naHamani ʋakaenda kumafundo akaŋga agadzirwa naEstere.
Ɀino mambo akati kunaEstere pamafundo ewaini: Cinyiko caunonyeŋgetera? Ucaɀipiwa. Unokumbireiko? Ɀicaitwa, kunyaŋge
Ipapo Estere akapindura akati: Kunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu nokukumbira kwaŋgu ndikoku:
Kana ndanzwirwa tsitsi namambo, kana mambo aciɗa kundipa candinonyeŋgetera, nokuita candinokumbira, mambo naHamani ŋgaʋaʋuye kumafundo andicaʋagadzirira, maŋgwana ndicaita seɀarebga namambo.
Ipapo Hamani wakaenda nezuʋa iro acifara, anomŋoyo mucena; asi Hamani wakati aciʋona Mordekai pasuʋo ramambo, kuti wakaramba kumusimukira, kana kumutya, akaȿotwa kwaɀo pamsoro paMordekai.
Asi Hamani wakaɀidzora hake akaenda kumusha; akatuma
Hamani akaʋarondedzera kubginya kwefuma yake, nokuwanda kwaʋana ʋake, namakudzirwe aakaitwa namambo, namapfuʋudzirwe ake aʋe mukuru kumacinda naʋaranda ʋose ʋamambo.
Hamani akapfuʋura akati: Naʋahosi Estere haʋana‐kutendera mumŋe munhu kupinda namambo kumafundo aʋakagadzira, asi ini ndoga; ʋuye maŋgwana ʋo ndaɗanwa naʋo pamŋe cete namambo.
Asi iɀo ɀose haɀindiɓetseri cinhu, kana ndicigara ndiciʋona Mordekai muJuda agere pasuʋo ramambo.
Ipapo mukadzi wake Zereshi neshamŋari dzake dzose ʋakati kwaari: Rairai kuti ʋagadzire matanda anamakubiti
Ɀino ʋusiku ubgo mambo wakashaiwa hope, akaraira kuti ʋaʋuye nebuku yamashoko amakoronike, akaraʋirwa mambo.
Ʋakawana kuti pakanyorwa kuti Mordekai wakaɗeya kuziʋisa mashoko aBigtana naTereshi, ʋaranda ʋaʋiri ʋamambo pakati paʋarindi ʋomukoʋa, ʋakatȿaka kuʋuraya mambo Ahashveroshi.
Ipapo mambo akati: Mordekai wakakudzwa nokurumbidzwa seiko pamsoro pecinhu ici? Ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋaimuɓatira ʋakati: Haana‐caakaitirwa.
Mambo akati: Ndianiko uri paruʋazhe? Ɀino Hamani wakaŋga apinda paruʋazhe rwokunze rweimba yamambo, aciɗa kukumbira kunamambo kuti Mordekai asuŋgirirwe pamatanda aakaŋga amugadzirira.
Ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, Hamani umire paruʋazhe. Mambo akati: Ŋgaapinde.
Naiɀoɀo Hamani akapinda. Mambo akati kwaari: Munhu mambo waanoɗa kumukudza uŋgaitirweiko? Ɀino Hamani akati mumŋoyo make: Mambo ʋaŋgaɗa kukudza aniko, asi ini?
Hamani akati kunamambo: Iye munhu mambo waanoɗa kukudza,
ŋgaatorerwe ŋguʋo dzoʋushe, idzo dzinosifukwa namambo, nebiza rinositaȿwa namambo, nekorona yoʋushe inosidzikwa pamusoro wake;

ɀino ŋguʋo nebiza ŋgaɀiiswe pamaʋoko omumŋe wamacinda amambo unokudzwa kwaɀo, kuti ʋafukidze munhu uyo mambo waanoɗa kukudza, ʋagomufambisa munzira dzomuguta, akataȿa biza, ʋaɗanidzire pamberi pake, ʋaciti: Munhu mambo waanoɗa kukudza ŋgaaitirwe saiɀoɀo.
Ipapo mambo akati kunaHamani: Cimbidzika utore ŋguʋo nebiza, seɀawataura, undoitira Mordekai muJuda saiɀoɀo, iye ugere pasuʋo ramambo; usarega shoko rimŋe pamashoko ose awataura.
Ɀino Hamani akatora ŋguʋo nebiza, akafukidza Mordekai, akamufambisa panzira dzomuguta akataȿa biza, akaɗanidzira pamberi pake, aciti: Ndiɀo ɀicaitirwa munhu uyo mambo waanoɗa kukudza.
Ɀino Mordekai akadzokera kusuʋo ramambo. Asi Hamani wakacimbidzika kuenda kumba kwake acicema, akafukidza musoro wake.
Hamani akarondedzera kunaZereshi mukadzi wake neshamŋari dzake dzose ɀose ɀaakaitirwa. Ipapo
Ʋakati ʋacataura naye, ʋaranda ʋamambo ʋakaȿika, ʋakacimbidzika kuenda naHamani kumafundo akaŋga agadzirwa naEstere.
Ɀino mambo naHamani ʋakaȿika pamafundo aʋahosi Estere.
Mambo akati ɀe kunaEstere pazuʋa recipiri, pamafundo ewaini: Cinyiko caunonyeŋgetera, ʋahosi Estere? Ucacipiwa. Unokumbireiko? Ɀicaitwa, kunyaŋge

Ipapo ʋahosi Estere ʋakapindura ʋakati: Kana ndiciŋge ndanzwirwa tsitsi nemi mambo, kana mambo acifara naɀo, ndinokumbira kuti ndipiwe ʋupenyu bgaŋgu nokuɗa kwokunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu, nobgaʋanhu ʋaŋgu nokuɗa kwokukumbira kwaŋgu;

nokuti tateŋgeswa, ini naʋanhu ʋaŋgu, kuti tiparadzwe, tiʋurawe, tipedzwe. Ƌai takaŋga tateŋgeswa tiʋe ʋaranda naʋashandiri, ndiŋgaɗai ndanyarara haŋgu, nokuti kutambudzika kweɗu hakuŋgaenzaniswi nokutadzirwa kwamambo.
Ipapo mambo Ahashveroshi akapindura, akati kunaʋahosi Estere: Ndianiko, uripi iye wakafuŋga mumŋoyo make kuita iɀoɀo?
Estere akati: Mudziʋisi nomuʋeŋgi, ndiye Hamani uyu wakaipa! Ipapo Hamani akatya pamberi pamambo naʋahosi.
Mambo akasimuka pamafundo ewaini akatsamŋa,

Ipapo mambo wakadzoka acibva pamunda weimba yamambo akapinda panɀimbo yamafundo ewaini; ɀino Hamani wakaŋga aɀiwisira pacigaro pakaŋga pagere Estere. Mambo akati: Ɀino wotoɗa kucinya ʋahosi muno mumba pamberi paŋgu kanhi? Ɀino shoko iro rakati raɓuɗa mumuromo wamambo, ʋakafukidza ciso caHamani.
Ipapo Harbona, mumŋe muranda wakaŋga ari pamberi pamambo, akati: Tarirai, paimba yaHamani pamire matanda akareɓa anamakubiti makumi mashanu, akamiswa naHamani, kuti
Naiɀoɀo ʋakasuŋgirira Hamani pamatanda aakagadzirira Mordekai. Ipapo kutsamŋa kwamambo kwakanyarara.
Ɀino pazuʋa iro mambo Ahashveroshi wakapa ʋahosi Estere imba yaHamani, iye muʋeŋgi waʋaJuda. Mordekai akaȿika pamberi pamambo, nokuti Estere wakaŋga aʋudza mambo kuti cinyi cake.
Mambo akabvisa cindori cake caakaŋga atora panaHamani, akacipa Mordekai. Estere ndokuita Mordekai mutariri weimba yaHamani.
Estere akataura ɀe pamberi pamambo, akaɀiwisira pasi pamakumbo ake, akacema kwaari nemisodzi kuti aparadze zano rakaipa raHamani muAgagi, nezano rake raakaŋga afuŋga pamsoro paʋaJuda.
Mambo akatambanudzira Estere tȿimbo yendarama. Ipapo Estere akasimuka akamira pamberi pamambo.
Akati: Kana mambo acifara naɀo, kana ndanzwirwa tsitsi naye, kana mambo aciti ɀakanaka, ini ndikamufadza haŋgu,
nokuti ini ndiŋgagona seiko kuʋona ɀakaipa ɀicaitirwa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu? Ndiŋgagona seiko kuʋona kuparadzwa kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu!
Ipapo mambo Ahashveroshi akati kunaʋahosi Estere naMordekai muJuda: Tarirai ndapa Estere imba yaHamani, asi iye ʋakamusuŋgirira pamatanda, nokuti wakaɗa kuʋuraya ʋaJuda.
Ɀino imi ʋo cinyorerai ʋaJuda, seɀamunoɗa, nezita ramambo, muɀisimbise necindori camambo; nokuti rugwaro rwakanyorwa nezita ramambo, rukasimbiswa necindori camambo, haruŋgashandurwi nomunhu.

Ɀino ʋanyori ʋamambo ʋakaɗanwa paŋguʋa iyo, pamŋedzi wecitatu, uri mŋedzi weSivani, pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namatatu; ʋakanyora ɀose Mordekai ɀaakaraira ʋaJuda, namacinda makuru, naʋaɓati, namacinda amatiʋi enyika, kubva paIndia kuȿikira paEtiopia, matiʋi enyika anezana namakumi maʋiri namanomŋe, rutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika nomunyorere warwo, ʋuye rudzi rumŋe norumŋe norurimi rwarwo, naʋaJuda nomunyorere waʋo ʋuye norurimi rwaʋo.
Akanyora nezita ramambo Ahashveroshi, akadzisimbisa necindori camambo, ndokutuma nhume dzinomhanya dzakataȿa mabiza, dzakataȿa mabiza aimhanyisa kwaɀo paɓasa ramambo, akaɓerekwa paɀipfuwo ɀamambo.

Mambo akatendera paŋwadi idzo ʋaJuda paguta rimŋe nerimŋe kuʋuŋgana, nokurwira ʋupenyu bgaʋo, ʋaparadze, ʋaʋuraye, ʋapedze simba rose raʋanhu neramatiʋi enyika kana ʋaiɗa kuʋaʋamba iʋo naʋanana ʋaʋo naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, ʋuye ʋatore nhumbi dzaʋo ʋadzipambare,
ɀose ɀiitwe pazuʋa rimŋe pamatiʋi ose enyika yose yamambo Ahashveroshi, iro zuʋa regumi namatatu romŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, uri mŋedzi weAdari.
Mashoko orugwaro urwu akatumŋa kuʋanhu ʋose, kuti cireʋo ciparidzwe pamatiʋi ose enyika, kuti ʋaJuda ʋaɀigadzirire zuʋa iro ʋatsiʋe ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo nhume, dzakataȿa mabiza anomhanyisa kwaɀo paɓasa ramambo, dzakaenda dzicicimbidzikiswa nokukurudzirwa nomurairo wamambo; cireʋo ico cikatemŋa paShushani nhare yamambo.
Mordekai akaɓuɗa pamberi pamambo, akafuka ŋguʋo dzoʋushe, nhema necena, akadzika korona huru yendarama, aneŋguʋo yomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka mushaʋa; guta reShushani rikapururudza, rikafara.
ƲaJuda ʋakaʋa neciedza, nomufaro, nokufara kukuru, nokukudzwa.

Ɀino parutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika, napaguta rimŋe nerimŋe, pose pakaȿika murairo wamambo necireʋo cake, ʋaJuda ʋakafara nomufaro mukuru, ʋakaita mutambo nezuʋa romufaro. Ʋanhu ʋazhinji pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu dzenyika ʋakazoʋa ʋaJuda; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ʋaJuda kwaɀo.

Ɀino nomŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, iwo mŋedzi weAdari, nezuʋa regumi namatatu, ŋguʋa yakati yasweɗera yokuti murairo wamambo necireʋo cake ɀiitwe, pazuʋa rakafuŋga ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋaJuda kuʋamukira naro; asi ɀakashandurwa, nokuti ʋaJuda ʋakamukira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo;
ʋaJuda ʋakaʋuŋgana pamaguta aʋo pamatiʋi ose enyika dzamambo Ahashveroshi, kuti ʋaʋuraye aʋo ʋakatȿaka kuʋaitira ɀakaipa; hakuna‐wakaŋga acigona kuʋadziʋisa, nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋatya.
Macinda ose amatiʋi enyika, namacinda makuru, naʋaɓati, ʋaiɓate‐ɓasa ramambo, ʋakaɓatsira ʋaJuda; nokuti ʋakatya Mordekai.
Nokuti Mordekai wakaŋga ari mukuru paimba yamambo, nembiri yake yakaŋga yaȿika kumatiʋi ose enyika; nokuti murume uyu Mordekai wakaramba acikura.
ƲaJuda ʋakaparadza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋose, nokuʋatema neminondo, nokuʋaʋuraya, nokuʋaparadza, ʋakaitira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo seɀaʋaiɗa.
NapaShushani nhare yamambo, ʋaJuda ʋakaʋuraya nokuparadza ʋarume ʋanamazana mashanu.
Parshandata, naDarfoni, naAspata,
naPorata, naAdaria, naAridata,
naParmashta, naArisai, naAridai, naVaizata,
iʋo ʋanakomana ʋanegumi ʋaHamani mŋanakomana waHamedata, muʋeŋgi waʋaJuda, ʋakaʋaʋuraya ʋo; asi haʋana‐kupambara nhumbi dzaʋo.
Pazuʋa iro kuwanda kwaʋakaʋurawa paShushani nhare yamambo

Ipapo mambo akati kunaʋahosi Estere: ƲaJuda ʋaʋuraya nokuparadza paShushani nhare yamambo, ʋarume ʋanamazana mashanu, naʋanakomana ʋanegumi ʋaHamani; ndoɗa ɀaʋakaita kunamamŋe matiʋi enyika yamambo! Ɀino cinyiko caunonyeŋgetera? Ucaɀipiwa. Kana cinyiko caunokumbira ɀino? Ɀicaitwa.
Ipapo Estere akati: Kana mambo acifara naɀo, ʋaJuda ʋari paShushani ŋgaʋatenderwe kuita maŋgwana ʋo necireʋo canhasi, naʋanakomana ʋaHamani ʋanegumi ʋasuŋgirirwe pamatanda.
Ipapo mambo akaraira kuti ɀiitwe saiɀoɀo; cireʋo cikatemŋa paShushani, ʋakasuŋgirira ʋanakomana ʋaHamani ʋanegumi.
ƲaJuda ʋaiʋa paShushani ʋakaʋuŋgana ɀe nezuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi weAdari, ʋakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋanamazana matatu paShushani, asi haʋana‐kupambara nhumbi.

Naʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋaiʋa pamatiʋi enyika yamambo ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakarwira ʋupenyu bgaʋo, ʋakazorora paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋuraya pakati paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi manomŋe neɀishanu; asi haʋana‐kupambara nhumbi.
nezuʋa regumi namatatu romŋedzi weAdari, ʋakazorora nezuʋa regumi namanna, ʋakariita zuʋa romutambo neromufaro.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋaiʋa paShushani ʋakaʋuŋgana pazuʋa regumi namatatu napazuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi iwoyo; nezuʋa regumi namashanu romŋedzi uyo ʋakazorora, ʋakariita zuʋa romutambo neromufaro.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaJuda ʋemisha, ʋanogara pamisha isina‐kukombga namaȿiŋgo, ʋanoita zuʋa regumi namanna romŋedzi weAdari zuʋa romufaro neromutambo, ʋuye zuʋa rakanaka, nerokutumirana ɀinonaka.
Ɀino Mordekai wakanyora ɀinhu iɀo, akatuma ŋwadi kuʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari pamatiʋi ose enyika yamambo Ahashveroshi, pedyo nokure,
akaʋaraira kuti ʋaraŋgarire zuʋa iro regumi namanna romŋedzi weAdari, nezuʋa regumi namashanu rawo, gore rimŋe nerimŋe,

nokuti ndiwo mazuʋa ʋaJuda aʋakazorodzwa nawo paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, nomŋedzi waʋakashandurirwa nawo kucema kwaʋo ukaʋa mufaro, ʋuye zuʋa rokucema rikaʋa zuʋa rakanaka; ʋuye kuti ʋaaite mazuʋa omutambo noomufaro, nookutumirana ɀinonaka ʋuye ɀipo kuʋarombo.
ƲaJuda ʋakatenda kuita nomutoʋo waʋakataŋga nawo, seɀaʋakanyorerwa naMordekai;
nokuti Hamani mŋanakomana waHamedata muAgagi, muʋeŋgi waʋaJuda ʋose, wakaŋga afuŋga zano rokuparadza ʋaJuda, akakanda Puri, ndiyo mijenya, kuʋapedza nokuʋaparadza;
asi
Naiɀoɀo ʋakatumidza zita ramazuʋa iwayo Purimi nezita rePuri. Ɀino nokuɗa kwamashoko ose eŋwadi iyo, neɀaʋakaʋona pamsoro pecinhu ico, neɀaʋakaitirwa,

ʋaJuda ʋakatema cireʋo ʋakaɀisuŋga, kuti iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, naʋose ʋaizoɀiisa kwaʋari, haʋaŋgatoŋgoregi kuraŋgarira mazuʋa iwayo maʋiri, seɀakaŋga ɀanyorwa pamsoro pawo, ʋuye paŋguʋa yakaŋga yatarwa gore rimŋe nerimŋe;

ʋuye kuti mazuʋa iwayo araŋgarirwe nokutambga pakati porudzi rumŋe norumŋe, nemhuri imŋe neimŋe, norutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rwenyika, neguta rimŋe nerimŋe; ʋuye kuti mazuʋa iwayo ePurimi arege kutoŋgoregwa pakati paʋaJuda, araŋgarirwe nokusiŋgaperi pakati paʋana ʋaʋo.
Ipapo ʋahosi Estere, mukunda waAbihairi, naMordekai muJuda, ʋakanyora nesimba raʋo rose ʋakasimbisa ŋwadi iyo yecipiri yePurimi.
Akatuma ŋwadi kuʋaJuda, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari pamatiʋi anezana namakumi maʋiri namanomŋe enyika yamambo Ahashveroshi, akaŋga anamashoko orugare neɀokwaɗi,

kuzosimbisa mazuʋa iwayo ePurimi paŋguʋa dzawo dzakatarwa, seɀaʋakarairwa naMordekai muJuda naʋahosi Estere, ʋuye seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaɀisuŋga iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo pamsoro peshoko rokuɀinyima ɀokudya nerokucema kwaʋo.
Murairo waEstere ukasimbisa mashoko iwayo ePurimi; ɀikanyorwa mubuku.
Ɀino mambo Ahashveroshi wakateresa nyika, neɀiwi ɀeguŋgwa.
Ɀino maɓasa ake ose ecikuriri, nesimba rake, ʋuye ɀose ɀoʋukuru bgaMordekai, bgaakakudzwa nabgo namambo, haɀina‐kunyorwa here pabuku yamakoronike amadzimambo eMedia nePersia?

Nokuti Mordekai muJuda wakaŋga ari wecipiri paʋushe aciteʋera mambo Ahashveroshi; waiʋa mukuru pakati paʋaJuda, akaɗikanwa naʋazhinji ʋehama dzake; waitȿakira ʋanhu ʋake ɀakanaka, acitaurira rudzi rwake rwose ɀorugare.
Kwakaŋga kunomunhu panyika yeUzi, wainzi Jobo; munhu uyu wakaŋga akakwana, akarurama, waitya Mŋari acinɀeŋga ɀakaipa.
Iye wakaɓerekerwa ʋanakomana ʋanomŋe naʋakunda ʋatatu.

Ʋuye fuma yake yakaȿika makwai aneɀuru ɀinomŋe, namakamera aneɀuru ɀitatu, neŋombe dzakariŋgana majoko anamazana mashanu, namakadzi emboŋgoro anamazana mashanu, naʋanhu ʋazhinji paimba yake; naiɀoɀo munhu uyu wakaŋga ari mukuru pakati paʋana ʋamabvazuʋa.
Ʋanakomana ʋake ʋaisienda kundoita mutambo paimba yomumŋe nomumŋe waʋo pazuʋa rake; ʋaituma kundoɗana hanɀadzi dzaʋo nhatu kuzodya nokunwa naʋo.
Ɀino kana mazuʋa okutamba kwaʋo apera Jobo waituma
Ɀino rimŋe zuʋa ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari ʋakati ʋacindomira pamberi paJehova, Satani akaȿika ʋo pakati paʋo.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Wabvepiko? Satani akapindura Jehova, akati: Ndabva pakupota‐pota nenyika, napakufamba‐famba pairi.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Wacerekedza muranda waŋgu Jobo here? Nokuti hakunomunhu wakafanana naye panyika, munhu wakakwana, wakarurama, unotya Mŋari, acinɀeŋga ɀakaipa.
Ipapo Satani akapindura Jehova, akati: Jobo unotya Mŋari pasina here?
Hamuna‐kumupoteredza here norumhanda, iye neimba yake, neɀose ɀaanaɀo, pamatiʋi ose? Makaropafadza maɓasa amaʋoko ake, ʋuye fuma yake yakawanda panyika.
Asi tambanudzai henyu ruʋoko rwenyu ɀino, muroʋe ɀose ɀaanaɀo, ipapo iye ucakushoʋorai pacena.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Tarira, ɀose ɀaanaɀo ɀiri paruʋoko rwako; asi usatambanudzira ruʋoko rwako kwaari. Naiɀoɀo Satani akabva pamberi paJehova.
Ɀino rimŋe zuʋa ʋanakomana ʋake naʋanasikana ʋake ʋakati ʋacidya nokunwa waini paimba yomukuru waʋo,
nhume ikaȿika kunaJobo, ikati: Ŋombe dzakaŋga dzicirima, nemboŋgoro dzicicera kurutiʋi rwadzo,
ʋaSabea ʋakadziwira, ndokudzitora, naʋafudzi ʋo ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza; ini ndoga ndapukunyuka,
Iye wakati acataura, mumŋe akaȿika ʋo, akati: Mŋoto waMŋari wakabva kuɗeŋga, ukapisa makwai naʋafudzi, ukaʋapedza; ini ndoga ndapukunyuka,
Iye wakati acataura, mumŋe akaȿika ʋo, akati: ƲaKardea ʋakaita mapoka matatu, ʋakawira makamera, ʋakaatora, naʋafudzi ʋo ʋakaʋaʋuraya neminondo inopinza; ini ndoga ndapukunyuka,
Iye wakati acataura, mumŋe akaȿika ʋo, akati: Ʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu ʋakaŋga ʋacidya nokunwa waini mumba momukuru waʋo,
ɗutu guru ndokubva kurutiʋi rwerenje, ndokuroʋa pamakona manna eimba, iyo ikawira pamsoro paʋana, ʋakafa; ini ndoga ndapukunyuka,
Ipapo Jobo akasimuka, akabvarura ŋguʋo yake, akaʋeʋura musoro wake, akaɀiwisira pasi, akanamata,
akati: Ndakaɓuɗa mumimba mamai ʋaŋgu ndiri mushwi, ndicadzokera’po ndiri mushwi; Jehova wakapa, Jehova wakatora, zita raJehova ŋgarikudzwe.
Paɀinhu iɀi ɀose Jobo haana‐kutadza, haana‐kuti Mŋari wakaita noʋupenzi.
Ɀino rimŋe zuʋa ɀe ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari ʋakati ʋacindomira pamberi paJehova, Satani akaȿika ʋo pakati paʋo, akamira pamberi paJehova.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Wabvepiko? Satani akapindura Jehova, akati: Ndabva pakupota‐pota nenyika, napakufamba‐famba pairi.

Jehova akati kunaSatani: Wacerekedza muranda waŋgu Jobo here? Nokuti hakunomunhu wakafanana naye panyika, munhu wakakwana, wakarurama, unotya Mŋari, acinɀeŋga ɀakaipa; naɀino unorambira pakururama kwake, kunyaŋge iwe wakandikurudzira kuti ndimuparadze asinemhaka.
Satani akapindura Jehova, akati: Ganda
Asi tambanudzai ruʋoko rwenyu ɀino, muroʋe mafupa ake nenyama yake, ipapo ucakushoʋorai pacena.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Tarira, iye uri paruʋoko rwako; asi kwoga urege ʋupenyu bgake.
Naiɀoɀo Satani akabva pamberi paJehova, akaroʋa Jobo namaronda akaipa, kubva patsoka dzake kuȿikira pamusoro wake.
Akatora caeŋga akaɀikwenya naco; akagara pasi pakati pamaɗota.
Ipapo mukadzi wake akati kwaari: Ucarambira naɀino pakururama kwako here? Shoʋora Mŋari, ufe hako.

Asi iye wakati kwaari: Iwe unotaura seɀinotaura mumŋe waʋakadzi mapenzi. Tiŋgagamucira ɀakanaka ɓedzi paruʋoko rwaMŋari, tikasagamucira ɀakaipa ʋo here? Paɀinhu iɀi ɀose Jobo haana‐kutadza nomuromo wake.
Ɀino shamŋari nhatu dzaJobo dzakati dzicinzwa ɀakaipa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀamuwira, dzikaʋuya mumŋe nomumŋe acibva kwake,
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitarira ʋaciri kure, ʋakasamuziʋa, ʋakacema kwaɀo, mumŋe nomumŋe akabvarura ŋguʋo yake, ʋakakushira guruʋa kuɗeŋga pamisoro yaʋo.
Ipapo ʋakagara pasi naye mazuʋa manomŋe noʋusiku ʋunomŋe, asi hakuna‐nomumŋe wakataura naye kunyaŋge shoko rimŋe; nokuti ʋakaʋona kuti njodzi yake yakaŋga iri huru kwaɀo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jobo wakashamisa muromo wake, akatuka zuʋa rake.
Jobo akapindura akati:
Zuʋa randakaɓerekwa naro ŋgariroʋe,
Noʋusiku ubgo bgaʋakati: Mŋana womukomana wagamucirwa.
Zuʋa iro ŋgariʋe rima;
Mŋari ŋgaarege kuriraŋgarira ari kumsoro,
Neciedza ŋgacirege kurivenekera.
Rima nomumvuri worufu ŋgaɀiritore riʋe raɀo;
Gore ŋgarigare pamsoro paro;
Ɀose ɀinoȿiɓisa zuʋa ŋgaɀirivunduse.
Kana ʋuri ʋusiku ubgo, ŋgaʋuɓatwe nerima guru;
Ŋgaʋurege kufara pakati pamazuʋa egore;
Ŋgaʋurege kurabga pakati pemŋedzi.
Ʋusiku ubgo ŋgaʋurege kuɓereka;
Inzwi romufaro ŋgarirege kupinda maʋuri.
Ʋanotuka zuʋa
Iʋo ʋanogona kumutsa shato huru.
Nyeredzi dzamambakwedza abgo ŋgadziȿiɓe;
Ŋgaʋumirire ciedza, asi ʋucishaiwe;
Ŋgaʋurege kuʋona fuŋgiro dzameso amaŋgwanani;
Ɀaʋusina‐kupfiga mikoʋa yemimba
Kana kuʋanza kutambudzika pameso aŋgu.
Ndakaregereiko kufa ndiciri mumimba?
Ndakaregerei kuparara ndiciɓuɗa muɗumbu,
Mabvi akandigamucirireiko?
Kana mazamu, kuti ndimŋe?
Nokuti ndiŋgaɗai ɀino ndakatandaʋara, ndinyerere;
Ndiŋgaɗai ndiʋete: ipapo ndiŋgaɗai ndazorora;
Pamŋe cete namadzimambo namakurukota enyika
Ʋakaɀiʋakira matoŋgo;
Kana namacinda, aiʋa nendarama,
Akazadza dzimba dzawo nesirveri;
Kana ndiŋgaɗai ndisina‐kuʋa’po somŋana wakaponiwa ŋguʋa isina‐kuȿika;
Saʋacece ʋasina‐kutoŋgoʋona ciedza.
Ʋakaipa ʋanorega kutambudza kwaʋo ipapo;
Ʋakaneta ʋanozorora ipapo.
Ʋasuŋgwa ʋanorugare pamŋe cete ipapo;
Haʋanzwi inzwi romutariri.
Ʋaɗuku naʋakuru ʋari’po;
Ʋuye muranda wakasunuŋguka panatenzi wake.
Munhu uri panjodzi unopiyirweiko ciedza,
Noʋupenyu kunouneshuŋgu pamŋoyo;
Aʋo ʋanoshuʋa rufu, asi haruʋuyi;
Ʋanorucera kupfuʋura fuma yakaʋanzwa pasi;
Ʋanopembera kwaɀo,
Nokufara, kana ʋaciwana bgiro?
Munhu, wakadzimira nzira yake,
Iye wakadziʋirirwa norumhanda naMŋari?
Nokuti ndinogomera ndisati ndadya,
Kuʋuʋura kwaŋgu kunoɗururwa semvura.
Nokuti cinhu candaitya candiwira,
Necandinozeza candiʋiŋga.
Handinamufaro, kana kunyarara, kana kuzorora;
Asi njodzi inoŋgosiʋuya.
Ipapo Erifazi muTemani wakapindura, akati:
Kana munhu akaidza kutaurirana newe, iwe ucaʋa neshuŋgu here?
Asi ndiani uŋgaɀidzora, akasataura hake?
Tarira, iwe wakadzidzisa ʋazhinji,
Iwe wakasimbisa maʋoko akashaiwa simba.
Mashoko ako akatsigira wakaŋga aciʋaʋarira kuwa,
Iwe wakasimbisa mabvi akaŋga acigweɗa‐gweɗa.
Asi ɀino ɀaȿika kwauri, iwe woshaiwa simba;
Ɀakuɓata, ɀino wotambudzika.
Ko kutya kwako
Kururama kwenzira dzako haizi tariro yako here?
Raŋgarira hako, ndianiko usinemhaka wakatoŋgoparara?
Kana ʋakarurama ʋakatoŋgoparadzwa papi?
Seɀandakaʋona ini, ʋanhu, ʋanorimira ɀakaipa,
Naʋanodɀara ɀakashata, ndiʋo ʋanokohwa ʋo iɀoɀo.
Ʋanoparadzwa nomŋeya waMŋari,
Ʋanopedzwa nokufema kwokutsamŋa kwake.
Kunduruma kweshumba nenzwi reshumba inehasha,
Nameno enɀanɀa reshumba ɀinoparadzwa.
Shumba, yakwegura, inofa nokushaiwa ɀaiŋgaɓata;
Naʋana ʋeshumbakadzi ʋanoparadzirwa.
Ɀino ndakaziʋiswa shoko rakaʋanda;
Nzeʋe yaŋgu yakanzwa zeʋe‐zeʋe raro.
Pandaŋgariro dzinobva paneɀinoʋonekwa ʋusiku,
Kana ʋanhu ʋaɓatwa nehope huru;
Kutya nokubvunda kwakandiwira,
Kwakabvundisa mafupa aŋgu ose.
Ipapo mŋeya wakapfuʋura pamberi peciso caŋgu;
Mvere dzenyama yaŋgu dzikasimuka.
Wakamira, asi ndakaŋga ndisiŋgagoni kuʋona kuti wakaɗini;
Mufananidzo wakaŋga uri pamberi pameso aŋgu;
Kunyarara
Ko munhu, unofa, uŋgakunda Mŋari pakururama here?
Ko munhu uŋgakunda Muiti wake pakunaka here?
Tarirai, haatendi ʋaranda ʋake;
Ʋatumŋa ʋake unoʋapa mhaka aciti mapenzi;
Ndoɗa ʋanogara mudzimba dzevu,
Nheyo dzadzo dzakateyiwa paguruʋa,
Dzinopxanyiwa seɀiʋundudzi.
Ʋanoparadzwa pakati pamaŋgwanani namaɗekwana;
Ʋanoparara nokusiŋgaperi, pasinomunhu unehanya naɀo.
Ko ɓote retente raʋo harinakuvomorwa pamŋe cete naʋo here?
Ʋanofa ʋasinoʋucenjeri.
Ɀino ciɗana hako; panomumŋe uŋgakupindura here?
Ucaenda kunani pakati paʋatȿene?
Nokuti kutsamŋa kunoʋuraya ɓenzi,
Ʋuye shuŋgu dzinoparadza usineziʋo.
Ndakaʋona ɓenzi riciita midzi;
Asi pakarepo ndakatuka nɀimbo yaro.
Ʋana ʋaro haʋatoŋgoponeswi,
Ʋanopxanyiwa musuʋo;
Hapana‐unoʋarwira.
Ɀaakaceka ɀinodyiwa naʋanenzara,
Ʋanoɀitora kunyaŋge napakati peminzwa;
Ʋanenyota ʋanonwa fuma yaʋo.
Nokuti kutambudzika hakuɓuɗi paguruʋa.
Ʋuye nhamo haibvi pasi.
Asi munhu unoɓerekerwa nhamo,
Seɓariɓari dzomŋoto dzinokwira kumsoro.
Asi kana ndirini, ndaitȿaka Mŋari,
Ndaiisa mhoȿa yaŋgu kunaMŋari;
Iye unoita ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀisiŋganɀerwi;
Ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa ɀisiŋgaʋereŋgwi;
Iye unonisa mvura panyika,
Unotuma mvura paminda;
Ndiye unokwiridza ʋakaɗerera;
Ʋanocema ʋanokundiswa.
Unokaŋganisa mano aʋanyeŋgeri,
Maʋoko aʋo arege kuita ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuita.
Ʋakacenjera unoʋaɓata pamano aʋo,
Nokuraŋgana kwaʋasakarurama kunoputsirwa pasi.
Ʋanosoŋgana nerima masikati.
Ʋanotȿanɀadzira masikati makuru sapaʋusiku.
Asi iye unorwira paminondo yemiromo yaʋo,
Saka murombo unetariro,
Kuipa kunoɀifumbira muromo.
Tarirai, munhu, unorairwa naMŋari, unomufaro;
Saka usaɀidza kuraŋga kwoWamasimba ose.
Nokuti iye unokuʋadza, ndokusuŋga ɀe
Unopxanya, maʋoko ake ndokupodza ɀe.
Iye ucakurwira panjodzi nhanhatu;
Kunyaŋge panomŋe hakuna‐cakaipa ciŋgakugunɀa.
Panzara ucakudzikinura parufu;
Napakurwa
Iwe ucaʋanziwa pakurobga norurimi;
Hauŋgatyi kuparadza kana kuciȿika.
Ucaseka kuparadza nokushaiwa;
Hauŋgatyi ɀikara ɀenyika.
Nokuti iwe ucaita suŋgano namabge esaŋgo;
Ɀikara ɀesaŋgo ɀicaita rugare newe.
Iwe ucaziʋa kuti tente rako rinorugare;
Ucandotarira ɀipfuwo ɀako, ukasashaiwa cimŋe caɀo.
Ucaziʋa ʋo kuti ʋana ʋako ʋacawanda,
Naʋazukuru ʋako ʋacaita soʋuswa bgenyika.
Ucaȿika pabgiro bgako wakwegura kwaɀo,
Secisote ceɀiyo cinoȿika paŋguʋa yaco.
Tarira iɀoɀi takaɀinɀera, ndiɀoɀo;
Ciɀinzwa, uɀiziʋe iwe umene.
Ipapo Jobo akapindura, akati:
Haiwa, ɗai kutambudzika kwaŋgu kwaiyerwa,
Nenjodzi dzaŋgu dzaiʋuŋganidzirwa paciyero!
Nokuti ɀino ɀairema kupfuʋura jeca ramakuŋgwa;
Naiɀoɀo mashoko aŋgu aiʋa okuvurumuka.
Nokuti miseʋe yoWamasimba yakandiɓaya mukati maŋgu,
Mŋeya waŋgu unonwa ʋuturu bgayo;
Ɀinotyisa ɀaMŋari ɀaɀigadzirira kurwa neni.
Ko mbizi iŋgacema kana ineɓumhudza here?
Ko nzombe iŋgakuma paɀokudya ɀayo here?
Ko cisiŋganaki ciŋgadyiwa cisinomunyu here?
Ko ɀicena ɀezai ɀinozipa here?
Mŋeya waŋgu unoramba ku
Kwandiri ɀakafanana neɀokudya ɀinosemesa.
Haiwa! ɗai ndaipiwa ɀandinokumbira;
Ƌai Mŋari aindipa ɀandinoshuʋa.
Ƌai Mŋari aitenda hake kundipxanya,
Ƌai aitambanudza hake ruʋoko rwake, akandiparadza.
Ipapo ndainyaradzwa haŋgu;
Ɀirokwaɀo ndaifara pakurwadziwa kusinetsitsi;
Nokuti handina‐kuramba mashoko oMutȿene.
Simba raŋgu ndereiko, randiŋgamirira naro
Mugumo waŋgu ndoweiko, kuti nditsuŋgirire?
Simba raŋgu rakafanana neramabge here?
Nyama yaŋgu indarira kanhi?
Handizinoshaiwa ruɓatsiro mukati maŋgu here?
Ʋucenjeri kwabgo habguzadziŋgwa cose kwandiri here?
Munhu, unorwisa kuziya, unofanira kuitirwa nyasha neshamŋari dzake;
Uŋgazorega kutya Wamasimba ose.
Hama dzaŋgu dzakaita nokusatendeka sorukoʋa,
Sokuyerera kwehoʋa dzinopfuʋura;
Dzakaȿiɓa nokuɗa kwamazaya ecando,
Kana
Kana kwopisa dzinopedzwa panɀimbo yadzo.
Ʋafambi
Ʋanokwira kurenje ndokuparara.
Ʋafambi ʋeTema ʋakatarira,
Mapoka eSheba akadzimirira.
Ʋakanyadzwa nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋanetariro;
Ʋakaȿika’po ʋakakaŋganiswa.
Nokuti ɀino hamuzi cinhu;
Munoʋona cinotyisa, ndokutya.
Ko ndakati: Ndipei here?
Kana: Ndiʋigirei cipo cinobva pafuma yenyu here?
Kana: Ndirwirei paruʋoko rwomudziʋisi here?
Kana: Ndidzikinurei paruʋoko rwaʋamanikidzi here?
Ndidzidzisei, ndinyarare haŋgu;
Mundiɗudzire pandatadza.
Mashoko akarurama anesimba sei!
Asi kutuka kwenyu kunotukeiko?
Munofuŋga kutuka mashoko here?
Nokuti mashoko omunhu, warasha mŋoyo, anotorwa nemhepo.
Ɀirokwaɀo munoɗa kukanda
Munoɗa kuteŋgesa shamŋari yenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ciɗonditarirai henyu;
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo handiŋgareʋi nhema pamberi penyu.
Dzokai henyu, ndiɀo ɀandinokumbira, kusarurama kurege kuʋa’po,
Dzokai henyu, mhaka yaŋgu yakarurama.
Parurimi rwaŋgu panokusarurama here?
Kuraʋira kwaŋgu hakuŋgasaruri ɀinhu ɀakashata here?
Ko munhu haatambudziki here paɓasa panyika?
Mazuʋa ake haana‐kufanana namazuʋa omuɓatiri here?
Somuranda unoshuʋa mumvuri,
Nomuɓatiri unotarira muɓairo wake;
Saiɀoɀo ini ndakapiwa mŋedzi isinamaturo,
Ndakatarirwa ʋusiku bgenjodzi.
Kana ndoʋata, ndinoti:
Ndicamuka riniko? Asi ʋusiku bgakareɓa;
Ndinoramba ndicishanduka‐shanduka kuȿikira kwoedza.
Nyama yaŋgu yakafukidzwa nehonye namaviŋga evu;
Ganda raŋgu rinofunuka, riciputika ʋurwa.
Mazuʋa aŋgu anokunda cirukiso comuruki pakukurumidza,
Anopera ndisinetariro.
Raŋgarirai henyu kuti ʋupenyu bgaŋgu imhepo hayo;
Ziso raŋgu haricazoʋoni ɀakanaka.
Ziso romunhu unondiʋona haricazonditariri ɀe;
Meso ako acanditarira, asi handicazoʋi’po.
Sokupera kwegore nokunyaŋgarika kwaro,
Saiɀoɀo munhu, unoɓurukira kuSheori, haaŋgazokwiri ɀe.
Haaŋgazodzokeri kumba kwake,
Nenɀimbo yake haiŋgazomuziʋi.
Saka handiŋganyarari nomuromo waŋgu;
Ndicataura pakutambudzika kwomŋeya waŋgu;
Ndicanyunyuta neshuŋgu dzaŋgu dzomŋoyo.
Ndiri guŋgwa kanhi, kana zimhuka reguŋgwa,
Ɀamunoisa ʋanondirindira?
Kana ndikati: Nhoʋo dzaŋgu dzicandinyaradza,
Mubeda waŋgu ucazorodza kunyunyuta kwaŋgu;
Ipapo mondivundusa nokurota hope,
Mondityisa neɀandinoʋona;
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unotsaura kudzipxa,
Nokufa kupfuʋura mafupa aŋgu
Ndinosema
Ndiregei; nokuti mazuʋa aŋgu akafanana nokufema.
Munhu cinyiko, ɀamunomukudza,
Nokumuɗa nomŋoyo wenyu wose,
Ɀamunomushanyira maŋgwanani ose,
Nokumuidza ŋguʋa dzose?
Mucarega riniko kundicerekedza,
Nokundirega kuȿikira ndamedza mate aŋgu?
Kana ndiciŋge ndatadza, ndiŋgakuiteiko imi, mucerekedzi waʋanhu?
Makandiitireiko cinhu camunoʋaʋarira,
Kuti ini ndiɀiremedze?
Munoregereiko kukaŋganwira kuɗarika kwaŋgu, nokubvisa kutadza kwaŋgu?
Nokuti ɀino ndicaʋata pasi muguruʋa;
Mucanditȿaka ɀikuru, asi handicazoʋi’po.
Ipapo Birdadi muShuhi wakapindura akati:
Ucaramba ucitaura mashoko awa kuȿikira riniko?
Mashoko omuromo wako
Ko Mŋari uŋgakaŋganisa pakutoŋga here?
Wamasimba ose uŋgakaŋganisa ɀakarurama here?
Kana ʋana ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋamutadzira iye,
Akaʋaisa pakuɗarika kwaʋo;
Kana iwe ukashiŋgaira kutȿaka Mŋari,
Ukakumbira kunaWamasimba ose;
Kana ukaʋa wakanaka, wakarurama;
Iye uŋgaɗai aimuka ɀino nokuɗa kwako,
Akafambisa ɀakanaka imba yako yakarurama.
Kunyaŋge kutaŋga kwako kwaiʋa kuɗuku,
Asi kuguma kwako kwaiʋa kukuru kwaɀo.
Nokuti ciɗobvunza hako rudzi rwakare,
Ucerekedze ɀakanɀerwa namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
(Nokuti isu tiri ʋazuro heɗu, hatiziʋi cinhu;
Nokuti mazuʋa eɗu panyika akafanana nomumvuri;)
Iʋo haʋaŋgakudzidzisi here, nokukuʋudza,
Nokureʋa mashoko anobva pamŋoyo yaʋo here?
Ko nhokwe iŋgamera pasinenhope here?
Ko rutsaŋga ruŋgamera pasinemvura here?
Ruciri runyoro, rusati rwatemŋa,
Runoȿaʋa mimŋe miriʋo icigere.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita nzira dzaʋose ʋanokaŋganwa Mŋari;
Ʋuye tariro yomunhu usiŋgaɗi Mŋari icapera;
Caakatarira cicaputsanyiwa,
Caakatenda cakafanana namambure eɗandemutande.
Ucasendamira paimba yake, asi haiŋgamiri;
Ucaiɓata, asi haiŋgagari.
Iye
Mataʋi ake anotandaʋarira pamunda wake.
Midzi yake yakapombera patsime,
Unoʋona nɀimbo yorukaŋgarabge.
Kana akaparadzwa panɀimbo yake,
Icamuramba,
Tarira, ndiwo mufaro wenzira yake;
Paguruʋa panoɓuɗa ʋamŋe.
Tarira, Mŋari haaŋgarashi munhu wakarurama,
Haaŋgaɓatsiri ʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Ucazozadza hake muromo wako nokuseka,
Nemiromo yako nokupururudza.
Ʋanokuʋeŋga ʋacafukidzwa nokunyara;
Ʋuye tente raʋakaipa hariŋgazoʋi’po.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoziʋa kuti ndiɀo:
Nokuti munhu uŋgaʋa wakarurama pamberi paMŋari seiko?
Kana iye akaɗa kuita nharo naye,
Haaŋgagoni kumupindura shoko rimŋe pamashoko aneɀuru.
Ndianiko wakamuwomesera
Iye unobvisa makomo, iwo asiŋgaɀiziʋi,
Kana aciashandura pakutsamŋa kwake.
Iye unozunuŋgusa nyika ikabva panɀimbo yayo,
Mbiru dzayo dzinoɗeŋgenyeka.
Iye unoraira zuʋa, rikarega kuɓuɗa;
Iye unodzitira nyeredzi.
Iye oga unotatamura ɗeŋga,
Unotsika pamsoro pamafuŋgu eguŋgwa.
Iye unoita nyeredzi dzeArkturo, nedzeOrioni, nedzeCimutanhatu,
Namakamuri enyasi.
Iye unoita ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀisiŋganɀerwi,
Iɀo ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa, ɀisiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa.
Tarira, unopfuʋura pedyo neni, ndisiŋgamuʋoni;
Unopfuʋura ʋo hake, asi handimuʋoni.
Tarira, unotora hake, ndiani uŋgamudziʋisa?
Ndiani uŋgati kwaari: Unoiteiko?
Mŋari haaŋgadzori kutsamŋa kwake;
Ʋaɓatsiri ʋaRahabi ʋakakotamira pasi pake.
Ko ɀino ini ndicamupindura seiko,
Nditsaure mashoko aŋgu
Kunyaŋge ndaiʋa wakarurama handizaimupindura;
Ndaikumbira
Kana ndiciŋge ndaɗana, akandipindura,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handizaitenda kuti wakanzwa inzwi raŋgu.
Nokuti unondiputsa neɗutu remhepo,
Unowanza maʋaŋga aŋgu ndisinemhoȿa haŋgu.
Haanditenderi kufema mŋeya waŋgu,
Asi unondizadza neɀinoʋaʋa.
Kana riri simba guru, tarira,
Kana iri
Kunyaŋge ndaiʋa wakarurama haŋgu, muromo waŋgu umene ucandipa mhaka;
Kunyaŋge ndaiʋa wakakwana, iye waiti handina‐kururama.
Ndakakwana haŋgu, handiɀiraŋgariri;
Ndinoɀidza ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Ɀose ɀakafanana haɀo; saka ndinoti:
Iye unoparadza ʋakarurama naʋakaipa ʋose.
Kana nyatwa iciŋge yaʋuraya nokukurumidza,
Iye ucaseka njodzi yaʋasinemhoȿa.
Nyika yakaiswa mumaʋoko aʋakaipa;
Iye unofukidza meso aʋatoŋgi ʋayo;
Kana asiri
Ɀino mazuʋa aŋgu anokurumidza kupfuʋura mumhanyi;
Anotiza asina‐kuʋona ɀakanaka.
Apfuʋura seɀikepe ɀinomhanyisa;
Segondo rinokurumidzira ciʋurawa.
Kana ndikati: Ndicakaŋganwa kunyunyuta kwaŋgu,
Ndicarega ciso caŋgu cinopunyaira, ndifare haŋgu;
Ndinotya njodzi dzaŋgu dzose,
Ndinoziʋa kuti hamuŋgati handinemhoȿa.
Ndicapiwa mhoȿa;
Ɀino ndinotamburireiko ɀisinamaturo?
Kana ndikaŋgura nemvura yecando,
Ndikacenesa maʋoko aŋgu kwaɀo;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro imi muŋgandinyudza mumatope,
Neŋguʋo dzaŋgu dzicandisema.
Nokuti iye haazi munhu wakafanana neni, kuti ndimupindure,
Kuti tikwirirane pakutoŋga.
Hakunamununuri pakati peɗu,
Uŋgatiɓata tose noruʋoko rwake.
Ŋgaabvise shamhu yake kwandiri,
Hasha dzake dzirege kundityisa;
Ipapo ndaitaura, ndisiŋgamutyi;
Nokuti handizakaɗaro haŋgu.
Mŋoyo waŋgu waneta noʋupenyu bgaŋgu;
Handiŋgaɀidzori pakunyunyuta kwaŋgu;
Ndicataura neshuŋgu dzomŋoyo waŋgu.
Ndicati kunaMŋari: Musandipa mhoȿa;
Ndiratidzei kuti munorwa neni nemhaka yeiko?
Ɀinokufadzai here kumanikidza,
Nokuɀidza ɓasa ramaʋoko enyu,
Mucivenekera kuraŋgana kwaʋakaipa here?
Munameso enyama here,
Kana munoʋona somunhu here?
Mazuʋa enyu akafanana namazuʋa omunhu here,
Kana makore enyu namakore omunhu here?
Ɀamunobvunza ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu,
Nokunɀera ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu,
Kunyaŋge muciziʋa kuti handizi wakaipa;
Ʋuye kuti hakuna‐unogona kurwira paruʋoko rwenyu here?
Maʋoko enyu akandiita nokundiʋumba,
Nhiʋi dzaŋgu dzose; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro moɗa kundiparadza.
Raŋgarirai, ndiɀo ɀandinokumbira, kuti makandiʋumba sevu;
Ɀino mucandidzosera kuguruʋa here?
Hamuna‐kundiɗurura somukaka here,
Nokundikodza somukaka wakafa?
Makandifukidza neganda nenyama,
Mukandisuŋganidza namafupa namarunda.
Makandipa ʋupenyu netsitsi,
Hanya dzenyu dzakaceŋgeta mŋeya waŋgu.
Asi makaʋanza ɀinhu iɀi mumŋoyo menyu;
Ndinoziʋa kuti cinhu ici caiʋa nemi
Kana ndikatadza munondicerekedza,
Hamuɗi kundikaŋganwira kuɗarika kwaŋgu.
Kana ndiri wakaipa, ndinenhamo;
Kana ndiri wakarurama, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handiŋgasimudzi musoro waŋgu;
Ɀandizere nokunyadzwa
Ndiciŋgotarira kutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Kana ndikaɀikudza, munondironda seshumba;
Munopamha ɀe kundishamisa nesimba renyu.
Munowedzera ɀapupu ɀenyu kuzorwa neni,
Nokuwanza kutsamŋa kwenyu pamsoro paŋgu;
Kushanduka nehondo ɀineni.
Makandiɓuɗisireiko paciɀaro
Ndiŋgaɗai ndaifira haŋgu’mo, ndisanhi ndaʋonekwa neziso romunhu.
Ndaiita haŋgu sendisina‐kuʋa’po;
Ndaitakurirwa kubgiro ndicibva paciɀaro
Ko mazuʋa aŋgu haazi mashoma here? Ɀino gumai,
Ndiregei henyu, kuti ndizorore ɀishoma,
Ndisanhi ndaenda kwandisiŋgazodzoki,
Kunyika yerima nomumvuri worufu;
Iyo nyika yerima guru, rima cairo;
Ipapo ciedza cakafanana nerima.
Ipapo Zofari muNaamati wakapindura, akati:
Ko mashoko mazhinji akaɗai haaŋgapindurwi here?
Munhu unoshoshoma uŋgaruramisirwa here?
Manyawi ako aŋgafanira kunyaradza ʋanhu here?
Kana uciɗaɗira, hakuna‐uŋgakunyadza here?
Nokuti iwe unoti: Ɀandinoparidza ndeɀaɀokwaɗi,
Ndakacena pamberi penyu.
Asi, haiwa! Ƌai Mŋari hake acitaura,
Ashamise miromo yake pamsoro pako;
Akuratidze ɀakaʋanzwa ɀokuŋgwara,
Kuti kunamatiʋi mazhinji.
Uziʋe naiɀoɀo kuti Mŋari unokaŋganwira ɀimŋe ɀakaipa ɀako.
Uŋganzwisisa ɀakadzika ɀaMŋari here?
Uŋgakwanisa kunzwisisa iye Wamasimba ose here?
Ɀakakwirira sokuɗeŋga; iwe uŋgaiteiko?
Ɀakadzika kupfuʋura bgiro; iwe uŋgaziʋeiko?
Kureɓa kwaɀo kunopfuʋura nyika,
Ʋuye ʋupamhi bgaɀo
Kana iye akapfuʋura, akapfigira
Akakokera
Nokuti iye unoziʋa ʋanhu ʋenhema;
Unoʋona ʋo ɀakaipa, kunyaŋge asiŋgaɀifuŋgi.
Asi munhu usakacenjera unoshaiwa kunzwisisa,
Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu unoɀarwa
Kana iwe ukaruramisa mŋoyo wako,
Ukatambanudzira maʋoko ako kwaari;
Kana ɀakaipa ɀiri muruʋoko rwako, uɀiise kure,
Kusarurama ŋgakurege kugara mumatente ako;
Ɀirokwaɀo ipapo uŋgasimudza ciso cako, usinegwapa,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ucasimba, usiŋgatyi cinhu.
Nokuti ucakaŋganwa njodzi yako,
Ucairaŋgarira semvura yapfuʋura;
Ʋupenyu
Kunyaŋge kunerima, kucaʋa samaŋgwanani.
Iwe ucasimba pamŋoyo, nokuti tariro icaʋa’po;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ucariŋgariŋga ndokuzorora hako wakaceŋgetwa.
Ucaʋata hako pasi, hakuna‐uŋgakutyisa;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋazhinji ʋacatȿaka kukufadza.
Asi meso aʋakaipa acapera nokutarira,
Ʋacashaiwa pokutizira’po,
Tariro yaʋo icaʋa yokufa.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Ɀirokwaɀo, imi muri ʋanhu
Kuŋgwara kucafa pamŋe cete nemi.
Asi ini ndinenjere ʋo semi;
Handizi muɗuku kwamuri;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndianiko usiŋgaziʋi ɀinhu ɀakaɗai?
Ndakafanana nomunhu unosekwa nowaanogara naye,
Munhu wakarurama, wakakwana, ndiye wosekwa.
Munhu unogara akafara hake unoshoʋora pamifuŋgo yake munhu uri panjodzi.
Matente amakororo anofara hawo,
Aʋo ʋanotsamŋisa Mŋari ʋanogara haʋo ɀakanaka;
Iʋo ʋanozadzirwa ruʋoko rwaʋo naMŋari.
Asi bvunzai henyu ɀino mhuka, dzicakudzidzisai;
Neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, dzicakuʋudzai;
Kana taurai henyu nenyika, icakudzidzisai;
Nehoʋe dzeguŋgwa dzicakuparidzirai.
Ndianiko usiŋgaziʋi paɀinhu iɀi ɀose,
Kuti ndirwo ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaita iɀi ɀose?
Mŋeya weɀipenyu ɀose uri muruʋoko rwake,
Nokufema kwaʋanhu ʋose.
Ko nzeʋe haiidzi mashoko,
Somukanwa unoraʋira ɀokudya here?
Ʋatana ndiʋo ʋakaŋgwara,
Ʋanamazuʋa mazhinji ndiʋo ʋanonzwisisa.
Iye ndiye unokuŋgwara nesimba,
Ndiye unamano nokunzwisisa.
Tarirai, iye unokoromora, haɀiŋgaʋakwi ɀe;
Iye unopfigira munhu, haaŋgazozarurirwi.
Tarirai, iye unodziʋisa mvura, ndokupxa kwayo;
Ʋuye unoituma ɀe, ndokushandura kwayo nyika.
Iye unesimba nokuŋgwara kukuru;
Wakanyeŋgerwa nounonyeŋgera ndaʋake ʋose.
Unokaŋganisa mano amaneʋanje,
Ʋatoŋgi unoʋaita mapenzi.
Unosunuŋgura simba ramadzimambo,
Ndokusuŋga ɀiʋuno ɀaʋo negwaraɗa.
Unotorera ʋaprista ʋukuru bgaʋo,
Nokukunda ʋanesimba.
Unotorera ʋakatenda mashoko aʋo,
Nokubvisira ʋakuru kunzwisisa kwaʋo.
Unoɗurura kushoʋora
Nokusunuŋgura banhire raʋanesimba.
Unofukura ɀinhu ɀakadzika parima,
Unoɓuɗisira kuciedza mumvuri worufu.
Unowanza ndudzi, ndokudziparadza,
Unoparadzira ndudzi kwose, ndokudzitapa.
Unobvisa kunzwisisa kwaʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋenyika,
Unoʋadzuŋgairisa murenje musinenzira.
Ʋanotȿaŋgadzira murima ʋasineciedza,
Unoʋadzeŋgedzekesa somunhu wakaɓatwa.
Tarirai, ziso raŋgu rakaʋona
Nzeʋe yaŋgu yakaɀinzwa nokuɀinzwisisa.
Ɀamunoziʋa imi, ndino
Handizi muɗuku kwamuri.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoɗa kutaura noWamasimba ose,
Ndinoɗa kuɀiɗaʋirira kunaMŋari.
Asi imi munofukidza ɀose nenhema dzenyu,
Imi mose muri ŋaŋga dzisinamaturo.
Haiwa! Ƌayi mucinyarara mose!
Ndiko kwaiʋa kuŋgwara kwenyu!
Ɀino cinzwai kuɀiɗaʋirira kwaŋgu,
Tererai munzwe ndiciɀireʋera nemiromo yaŋgu.
Munoɗa kurwira Mŋari mucitaura ɀisakarurama here?
Nokureʋa ɀinonyeŋgera nokuɗa kwake here?
Munoɗa kuʋa nehanya naye here?
Munoɗa kurwira Mŋari kanhi?
Ko ɀakanaka kana iye acikunɀerai here?
Imi muŋgamunyeŋgera, seɀamuŋganyeŋgera munhu here?
Ɀirokwaɀo iye ucakutukai,
Kana mukaʋa nehanya pakaʋanda.
Ʋukuru bgake haʋuŋgakutyisiyi here?
Haaŋgakutyisiyi ɀikuru here?
Mashoko enyu enjere ishumo dzamaɗota,
Nhare dzenyu inhare dzevu.
Nyararai, ndiregei nditaure,
Ndiwirwe haŋgu neɀandiŋgawirwa naɀo.
Ndicarumireiko nyama yaŋgu nameno aŋgu,
Nokuɓata ʋupenyu bgaŋgu muruʋoko rwaŋgu?
Kunyaŋge akandiʋuraya hake, ndicamumirira haŋgu;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicaɀiɗaʋirira haŋgu pamberi pake pamsoro pomufambire waŋgu.
Ndirwo ʋo rucaʋa ruponeso rwaŋgu,
Kuti munhu usiŋgatendi Mŋari haaŋgaȿiki pamberi pake.
Inzwai ɀakanaka kutaura kwaŋgu,
Kuparidza kwaŋgu kupinde nzeʋe dzenyu.
Tarirai ɀino, ndaroŋgedza mhaka yaŋgu;
Ndinoziʋa kuti ndicaruramisirwa.
Ndianiko ucaita nharo neni?
Nokuti ɀino ndiŋganyarara haŋgu, ndikafa.
Asi regai henyu kundiitira ɀinhu ɀiʋiri,
Ipapo handiŋgaʋandi pamberi penyu;
Bvisai ruʋoko rwenyu kure neni;
Kutyisa kwenyu kurege kundivundusa.
Ipapo muɗane imi, ini ndicapindura;
Kana ini nditaure haŋgu, imi mundipindure.
Ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu neɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ɀiŋganiko?
Ndiziʋisei kuɗarika kwaŋgu neciʋi caŋgu.
Munoʋanzireiko ciso cenyu,
Muciti ndiri muʋeŋgi wenyu?
Munoɗa kuvundusa shizha rinopepereswa here?
Munoɗa kudziŋgana namakoto akawoma here?
Munotoŋga ɀinhu ɀinoʋaʋa pamsoro paŋgu,
Munondidyisa nhaka yeɀakaipa ɀoʋujaya bgaŋgu;
Munomana makumbo aŋgu mumatanda, nokucerekedza nzira dzaŋgu dzose;
Munotarira tsoka dzamakumbo aŋgu muganho;
Kunyaŋge ndakafanana necinhu cakaʋora cinopera,
Seŋguʋo yapedzwa neɀiʋundudzi.
Munhu wakaɀarwa nomukadzi
Unamazuʋa mashoma, azere nokutambudzika.
Unoɓuɗa seruʋa, ndokuȿaʋa;
Unotiza ʋo somumvuri, haagari.
Ko munotarira munhu wakaɗai nameso enyu,
Mucinditoŋga here?
Ndianiko uŋgaɓuɗisa cinhu cakanaka panecakaipa?
Hakuna.
Mazuʋa ake ɀaakatarwa, mŋedzi yake yakaʋereŋgwa nemi,
Makamutarira miganho yaasiŋgatenderwi kuɗarika;
Regai kumucerekedza, azorore,
Kuȿikira apedza zuʋa rake somuɓatiri.
Nokuti kana muti uciŋge watemŋa, kunetariro kuti ucaɓuɗa ɀe,
Ʋuye kuti ɗaʋi rawo nyoro hariŋgaperi.
Kunyaŋge mudzi wawo ukakwegurira muvu,
Nehunde yawo ikafa pasi;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaɓukira kana wanzwa kunhuwira kwemvura,
Ndokuɓuɗisa mataʋi somuti muɗuku.
Asi munhu unofa, akaparara hake; Ɀirokwaɀo munhu unorega kufema, ɀino uripiko?
Mvura inopera paguŋgwa,
Ʋuye rwizi runopera nokupxa;
Saiɀoɀo munhu unoʋata pasi, akasamuka ɀe;
Haʋazomuki ɀe kuȿikira ɗeŋga rapera,
Haʋaŋgamutswi pahope dzaʋo.
Haiwa! Ƌai mucindiʋanza henyu paSheori,
Mucindiceŋgeta pakaʋanda, kuȿikira hasha dzenyu dzapfuʋura,
Munditemere ŋguʋa yakatarwa, yamuŋgandiraŋgarira nayo.
Kana munhu aciŋge afa, uŋgararama
Ndaimirira haŋgu mazuʋa ose okutambudzika kwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira kusunuŋgurwa kwaŋgu kuciȿika.
Maizoɗana, ini ndikakupindurai;
Maishuʋa ɓasa ramaʋoko enyu.
Asi ɀino munoʋereŋga nhambge dzaŋgu;
Hamuzinocerekedza ciʋi caŋgu here?
Kuɗarika kwaŋgu kwakasuŋgirwa muhomboɗo,
Munosuŋga ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu.
Gomo kana riciwa ɀirokwaɀo rinopfupfunyuka,
Ʋuye ɗombo rinobviswa panɀimbo yaro;
Mvura inocera mabge;
Kuyerera kwayo kunokukura guruʋa renyika;
Imi munoparadza tariro yomunhu.
Munomukunda nokusiŋgaperi, iye akapfuʋura hake;
Munoshandura ciso cake, ndokumudziŋga.
Ʋana ʋake ʋanokudzwa iye asiŋgaɀiziʋi;
Ʋanoɗeredzwa, asi iye haaʋoni
Asi kana ari iye nyama yake inorwadziwa,
Mŋeya wake unocema mukati make.
Ipapo Erifazi muTemani wakapindura, akati:
Ko munhu, unenjere, uŋgapindura nenjere dzisinamaturo,
Nokuzadza ɗumbu rake nemhepo inobva mabvazuʋa here?
Uŋgaita nharo nokutaura ɀisiŋgaɓatsi,
Kana mashoko aasiŋgagoni kuɓate‐ɓasa rakanaka nawo here?
Ɀirokwaɀo iwe unorasha kutya
Nokukaŋganisa ʋanoɗa kufuŋga Mŋari.
Nokuti ɀakaipa ɀako ɀinodzidzisa muromo wako,
Unotsaura rurimi rwaʋanyeŋgeri.
Muromo wako ndiwo unokupemhoȿa, handizi’ni.
Ɀirokwaɀo miromo yako inokupupurira ɀakaipa.
Ko ndiwe wakataŋga kuɀarwa kanhi?
Kana wakaɓerekwa makomo asati aʋa’po here?
Iwe wakanzwa mano akaʋanzika aMŋari kanhi?
Ndiwe woga wakaɀiwanira njere kanhi?
Unoziʋei iwe ɀatisiŋgaziʋi ʋo isu?
Unonzwisisei iwe ɀisati ɀiri matiri ʋo?
Ʋakacena vudzi naʋatana ʋakwegura kwaɀo ʋane’su,
Ʋakapfuʋura ɓaɓa ʋako kwaɀo pazero.
Ko kunyaradza kwaMŋari hakukuriŋgani here,
Neshoko rinotaurwa
Mŋoyo wako unokurashirei?
Meso ako anobgaireiko?
Ɀaunorwa naMŋari nomŋeya wako,
Ucitendera mashoko
Munhu cinyiko? Uŋgaʋa wakanaka sei?
Naiye wakaɀarwa nomukadzi, uŋgaʋa wakarurama sei?
Tarira, haatendi ʋatȿene ʋake;
Ɀirokwaɀo, kuɗeŋga hakuno‐kunaka pamberi pake.
Ndoɗa munhu unosemesa, wakaʋora,
Munhu unonwa ɀakaipa semvura.
Ndicakuratidza, citerera;
Ndicakuɗudzira ɀandakaʋona:
(Ɀakarebga naʋanhu ʋakaŋgwara
Ɀaʋakanzwa kumadziɓaɓa aʋo, ʋasina‐kuɀiʋanza;
Iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋapiwa nyika ʋoga,
Hakuno‐mutorwa wakapinda pakati paʋo;)
Munhu wakaipa unotambudzika acirwadziwa mazuʋa ake ose,
Iwo makore akatarirwa mumanikidzi.
Inzwi reɀinotyisa riri munzeʋe dzake;
Muparadzi ucamuȿikira akafara.
Haatendi kuti ucadzoka ɀe acibva parima,
Unoʋandirwa nomunondo.
Unofamba‐famba acitȿaka ɀokudya,
Unoziʋa kuti zuʋa rerima riri pedyo naye;
Njodzi nokutambudzika ɀinomutyisa;
Ɀinomukunda, samambo wakaɀigadzirira kurwa.
Nokuti wakatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kuzorwa naMŋari,
Akaɀikudza pamberi poWamasimba ose;
Unomhanyira kwaari anomutsipa
Namakwande makobvu enhoʋo dzake.
Nokuti wakafukidza ciso cake namafuta,
Akaʋuŋganidza mafuta mazhinji paciʋuno cake.
Wakagara pamaguta akaŋga aʋa matoŋgo,
Padzimba dzisina‐kufanira kugarwa nomunhu,
Dzaikaro‐kushanduka matoŋgo.
Iye haaŋgaʋi mufumi, fuma yake haiŋgagari,
Neɀiɓereko ɀaɀo haɀiŋgaremberi pasi.
Haaŋgabvi parima;
Muraɀo womŋoto ucawomesa mataʋi ake,
Ucabviswa nomŋeya womuromo
Ŋgaarege kuʋimba neɀisinamaturo, aciɀinyeŋgera;
Nokuti muɓairo wake ucaʋa ɀisinamaturo.
Ɀicaitwa ŋguʋa yake isino‐kuȿika,
Ƌaʋi rake hariŋgaʋi nyoro.
Ucazuka mazambiriŋga ake agere kuibva somuzambiriŋga,
Ucazuka maruʋa ake somuorivi.
Nokuti ʋuŋgano yaʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari haiŋgaɓereki,
Mŋoto ucapedza matente aʋafufuri.
Ʋanemimba yeɀakashata, ʋanoɓereka ɀakaipa,
Ƌumbu raʋo rinogadzira kunyeŋgera.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Ndatonzwa haŋgu mashoko mazhinji akaɗai;
Imi mose muri ʋanyaradzi pasina.
Ko mashoko asinamaturo acapera here?
Cinyiko cinokugombedzera kupindura?
Neni ʋo ndaigona kutaura semi;
Kana mŋeya yenyu yaiʋa panɀimbo yomŋeya waŋgu,
Ndaigona ʋo kuɓatanidza mashoko pamsoro penyu,
Ndaikudzuŋgudzirai musoro waŋgu.
Nokuʋaraidza kwemiromo yaŋgu kwaikuremudzai.
Kunyaŋge ndicitaura haŋgu, kucema kwaŋgu hakuremudzwi;
Kunyaŋge ndikarega haŋgu, ndinotapudzirwa neiko?
Asi ɀino iye wandinetsa;
Imi maparadza imba yaŋgu yose.
Imi makandiɓata nesimba, ndiɀo ɀinondipupurira;
Kuwonda kwaŋgu kunondimukira,
Kunondipupurira ɀakaipa pacena.
Iye wakandibvarura pakutsamŋa kwake, akandiʋeŋga;
Wakarumanya meno ake pamsoro paŋgu;
Mudziʋisi waŋgu unondiwetsera meso ake.
Ʋakandishamisira miromo yaʋo;
Ʋakandiroʋa paɗama, ʋacindituka;
Ʋanoʋuŋgana kuzorwa neni.
Mŋari unondiisa kunaʋasakarurama;
Unondikanda pamaʋoko aʋakaipa.
Ndakaŋga ndicizorora haŋgu, iye akandivuna;
Ɀirokwaɀo wakandiɓata nomumutsipa, akandiputsanya;
Wakandiita ciposherwa cake.
Miseʋe yake inondikomba kumatiʋi ose;
Unopamura itȿo dzaŋgu, asiŋganzwiri nyasha;
Unoɗururira nduru yaŋgu pasi.
Unondikoromora nokukoromorakoromora;
Unomhanyira kwandiri semhare.
Ndakasonera magumbu paganda raŋgu,
Ndakaradzika runyaŋga rwaŋgu muguruʋa.
Ciso caŋgu catȿuka nokucema.
Mumvuri worufu uri pamafuŋgiro ameso aŋgu.
Kunyaŋge maʋoko aŋgu asiŋgaɗi hawo kuparadza,
Nokunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu kwakanaka hako.
Iwe nyika, rega hako kufukidza ropa raŋgu;
Kucema kwaŋgu ŋgakushaiwe nɀimbo
Naɀino, tarirai, capupu caŋgu ciri kuɗeŋga,
Iye, unondipupurira ɀakanaka, uri kumsoro.
Shamŋari dzaŋgu dzinondishoʋora,
Kuti aruramisire munhu pamberi paMŋari,
Nomŋanakomana womunhu pamberi powokwake.
Nokuti kana makore mashoma apfuʋura,
Ndicafamba nenzira yandisiŋgazodzoki ɀe nayo.
Mŋeya waŋgu wapera, mazuʋa aŋgu adzimŋa,
Bgiro bgunondimirira.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋanondiseka ʋaneni;
Ziso raŋgu rinoramba riciʋona kutsamŋa kwaʋo.
Ɀino ndipikirei, muʋe ruɓatso rwaŋgu kwamuri;
Ndianiko ucaɓatana maʋoko neni?
Nokuti makaʋanzira mŋoyo yaʋo kunzwisisa;
Naiɀoɀo hamuŋgaʋakudzi.
Iye, unokwirira shamŋari dzake kuti dzitapxe,
Meso aʋana ʋake acapera.
Iye wakandiita shumo pakati paʋanhu;
Ndinosemŋa pacena.
Ziso raŋgu haricaʋoni nemhaka yokucema,
Mitezo yaŋgu yose yafanana nomumvuri.
Ʋanhu ʋakarurama ʋacakanuka naɀo,
Usinemhaka ucamukira ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakarurama ucarambira panzira yake,
Ʋuye unamaʋoko akanaka ucaramba acisimba.
Asi imi mose dzokai, muʋuye ɀino;
Nokuti handiŋgawani munhu wakaŋgwara pakati penyu.
Mazuʋa aŋgu apfuʋura, ɀandaiʋaʋarira ɀakona,
Iyo mifuŋgo yomŋoyo waŋgu.
Ʋanoshandura ʋusiku aʋe masikati;
Kana ndinetariro, Sheori ndiyo imba yaŋgu;
Ndakawadza nhoʋo yaŋgu murima;
Ndakati kubgiro: Ndiwe ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu;
Nokuhonye:
Ɀino tariro yaŋgu iripiko?
Kana iri tariro yaŋgu, ndianiko uŋgaiʋona?
Icaɓurukira kumazariro eSheori,
Kana zororo yaʋa’po paguruʋa.
Ipapo Birdadi muShuhi wakapindura, akati:
Mucateyana namashoko kuȿikira riniko?
Cimbofuŋgai henyu, tigotaurirana pashure.
Tinonzi mhuka neiko,
Naʋanhu ʋasina‐kunaka pamberi penyu?
Iwe unoɀibvarura nokutsamŋa kwako,
Nyika iŋgarashwa nokuɗa kwako kanhi?
Kana ɗombo riŋgabviswa panɀimbo yaro here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, ciedza caʋakaipa cicadzimŋa,
Muraɀo womŋoto wake hauŋgavenekeri.
Ciedza cicaȿiɓa patente rake,
Mŋenje wake pamsoro pake ucadzimŋa.
Nhambge dzesimba rake dzicadzorwa,
Namano ake acamuwisira pasi.
Nokuti unowisirwa mumumbure namakumbo ake amene,
Unofamba pamsoro peɀakarukwa.
Rugombe rucamuɓata citsitsinho,
Musuŋgo ucamuɓatisa.
Unoʋanzirwa ciswe muvu,
Nomuraʋu panzira.
Ucavunduswa neɀinotyisa pamatiʋi ose,
Ɀicamuteʋerera pedyo‐pedyo.
Simba rake ricarumŋa nenzara,
Njodzi icamugarira parutiʋi rwake.
Icapedza mitezo yomuʋiri wake,
Ƌaŋgwe rorufu ricapedza mitezo yake.
Ucadzurwa patente rake raaiʋimba naro;
Ucaiswa kunamambo unotyisa.
Mutente rake munogara ɀisati ɀiri ɀake;
Surferi icasaswa pamsoro peimba yake.
Midzi yake icawoma pasi,
Ƌaʋi rake ricatemŋa kumsoro.
Haaŋgazoraŋgarirwi panyika;
Zita rake hariŋgazozikanwi panzira
Ucadziŋgwa paciedza aende kurima;
Ucadziŋgwa abve panyika.
Haaŋgaʋi nomŋanakomana kana muzukuru pakati paʋanhu ʋake,
Kana mumŋe wakasara, paakaŋga agere ari mutorwa.
Ʋanogara kumaʋirazuʋa ʋacakanuka
Ʋagere kumabvazuʋa ʋacaɓatwa nokubvunda.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndiɀo ɀakaita panogara ʋasina‐kururama,
Ndiyo nɀimbo yousiŋgaziʋi Mŋari.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Mucatambudza mŋeya waŋgu kuȿikira riniko,
Nokundipxanya namashoko enyu here?
Makandituka ɀino kagumi;
Hamunyari ɀamakanditsuŋgirira.
Kana ndiciŋge ndatadza haŋgu,
Kutadza kwaŋgu kucagara neni.
Kana imi muciɗa kwaɀo kuɀikudza pamsoro paŋgu,
Nokundipe‐mhoȿa muciti ndakatukwa;
Ziʋai ɀino kuti ndiye Mŋari usinakundiruramisira,
Akandikomberedza nomumbure wake;
Tarirai ndinocema ndiciti: Ndakaitirwa ɀakaipa! Asi handinzwiki;
Ndinocema kuti ndiɓatsirwe, asi handiruramisirwi.
Wakadziʋira nzira yaŋgu, kuti ndirege kupfuʋura;
Akaisa rima panzira dzaŋgu.
Wakandibvisira kurumbidzwa kwaŋgu,
Nokunditorera korona yaŋgu pamusoro waŋgu.
Wakandiputsa kumatiʋi ose, ndakaparadzwa;
Wakadzura tariro yaŋgu somuti.
Wakandimutsira ʋo kutsamŋa kwake,
Akati ndiri
Hondo dzake dzinondiʋuŋganira, dzinoɀigadzirira nzira kurwa neni.
Dzinokomberedza tente raŋgu nemisasa yadzo.
Wakaisa hama dzaŋgu kure neni,
Ʋazikani ʋaŋgu ʋaʋa saʋatorwa cose kwandiri.
Hama dzaŋgu dzandinyeŋgera,
Shamŋari dzaŋgu, dzaindiziʋa, dzakandikaŋganwa.
Ʋanogara mumba maŋgu naʋarandakadzi ʋaŋgu ʋanoti ndiri mubvakure;
Ʋanondiʋona ʋaciti ndiri mŋeni.
Ndinoɗana muranda waŋgu, asi haandipinduri,
Kufema kwaŋgu kunosemesa mukadzi waŋgu,
Ndinonyaŋgadza ʋana ʋamai ʋaŋgu.
Kunyaŋge naʋana ʋaɗuku ʋanondishoʋora ʋo;
Kana ndicisimuka, ʋanondipopotera.
Shamŋari dzaŋgu dzose dzaindiziʋa, dzinondinɀeŋga,
Ʋose ʋandaiɗa ʋandifuratira.
Fupa raŋgu rinonamatira ganda raŋgu nenyama yaŋgu,
Ndasiyirwa ganda rameno aŋgu.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, ndinzwirei tsitsi, imi shamŋari dzaŋgu;
Nokuti ruʋoko rwaMŋari rwandiɓata.
Munonditambudzireiko saMŋari,
Musiŋgaguti nenyama yaŋgu?
Haiwa, ɗayi mashoko aŋgu ainyorwa ɀino,
Haiwa, ɗayi ainyorwa pabuku.
Ƌayi
Aitemŋa paɗombo nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi ndinoziʋa kuti Mudzikinuri waŋgu mupenyu,
Ʋuye kuti pakupedzisira ucasimuka panyika;
Kunyaŋge ganda raŋgu riciŋge raparadzwa saiɀoɀo,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicaʋona Mŋari ndisinenyama yaŋgu.
Ndicamuʋona ari kurutiʋi rwaŋgu;
Meso aŋgu acaʋona, asati ari omutorwa;
Itȿo dzaŋgu dzapera mukati maŋgu.
Kana muciti: Ticamutambudza sei!
Mudzi wemhoȿa ɀauri mukati maŋgu!
Ityai munondo;
Nokuti kutsamŋa kucarobga nomunondo,
Kuti muziʋe kuti kutoŋga kuri’po.
Ipapo Zofari muNaamati wakapindura, akati:
Naiɀoɀo ndaŋgariro dzaŋgu dzinondipindura,
Nokuɗa kwokukurumidza kuri mandiri.
Ndakanzwa kutuka kunondinyadza,
Mŋeya wokunzwisisa kwaŋgu unondipindura.
Hauɀiziʋi here kuti kubva karekare,
Kubva pakuiswa kwomunhu panyika,
Kuti kufara kwaʋakaipa hakuneŋguʋa huru,
Nomufaro waʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari kuti ndoweciŋguʋa?
Kunyaŋge kukura kwake kukakwirira kuȿikira kuɗeŋga,
Musoro wake ukaȿikira kumakore;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaparara nokusiŋgaperi sendoʋe yake;
Ʋaimuʋona ʋacati: Uripiko?
Ucabururuka akaenda sokurota, akasawanikwa;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ucadziŋgwa secinhu cinoʋonekwa ʋusiku.
Ziso raimuʋona hariŋgazomuʋoni ɀe;
Nyaŋgwe nenɀimbo yake haiŋgazomuʋoni ɀe.
Ʋana ʋake ʋacatȿaka tsitsi kuʋarombo,
Maʋoko ake acadzosera fuma yake.
Mafupa ake azere
Asi ʋucaʋata pasi naye paguruʋa.
Kunyaŋge kutadza kucitapira mumuromo make,
Kunyaŋge akaɀiʋanza pasi porurimi rwake;
Kunyaŋge akaɀiceŋgeta, akaramba kuɀirega,
Akaramba akaɀiceŋgeta mumuromo make;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ɀokudya ɀake ɀinoshandurwa muʋura bgake,
Ɀaʋa nduru yemvumbi mukati make.
Wamedza fuma,
Mŋari ucaiɓuɗisa muɗumbu rake.
Ucaȿeta ʋuturu bgemvumbi;
Rurimi rwenyoka rucamuʋuraya.
Haaŋgatariri nzizi,
Nehoʋa dzizere noʋuci namafuta.
Ɀaakaɓatira ucaɀidzosa ɀe, haaŋgaɀimedzi;
Haaŋgaʋi nomufaro wakaenzana nefuma yake yaakawana.
Nokuti wakamanikidza nokurasha ʋarombo;
Wakatora imba nesimba, asi haaŋgaiʋaki.
Ɀaakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi kudzikama mukati make,
Haaŋgaceŋgeti cinhu cimŋe caakaŋga acifarira.
Hakunecinhu cakasara caasina‐kuparadza;
Saka kufuma kwake hakuŋgarambi kuri’po.
Pakati peɀakawanda ɀefuma yake ucamanikidzwa;
Ruʋoko rwomumŋe nomumŋe uri panjodzi rucarwa naye.
Kana aciɗa kugutsa ɗumbu rake,
Ucakunisa pamsoro pake, ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀake.
Ucatiza nhumbi yokurwa yamatare,
Ʋuta bgendarira ʋucamubvoʋora.
Unoivomora, ikaɓuɗa pamuʋiri wake;
Muromo wayo unobginya, unoɓuɗa panduru yake;
Unotya kwaɀo.
Wakaceŋgetererwa rima guru iʋe fuma yake,
Mŋoto usina‐kupfutidzwa
Ucapedza ɀakasara patente rake.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kucaratidza ɀakaipa ɀake,
Nyika icamumukira.
Ɀakaʋuŋganidzwa mumba make ɀicabva,
Ndiwo mugoʋe wowakaipa waanopiwa naMŋari,
Nenhaka yaakatemerwa naMŋari.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Inzwai ɀakanaka kutaura kwaŋgu;
Munyaradzwe naɀo.
Ndiregei, nditaure ʋo;
Kana ndapedza kutaura, muŋgandiseka henyu.
Kana ndirini, ndinocema kuʋanhu here?
Ndiŋgaregereiko kupera mŋoyo?
Nditarirei, mushamiswe,
Muise ruʋoko rwenyu pamuromo.
Kunyaŋge ndoɀiraŋgarira ndinotambudzika,
Kutya kukuru kunoɓata nyama yaŋgu.
Ʋakaipa ʋanoraramireiko,
Ʋacikwegura nokuwedzerwa simba here?
Ʋana ʋaʋo ʋanosimbiswa pamŋe cete naʋo pamberi paʋo,
Naʋazukuru ʋaʋo ʋaciɀiʋona nameso aʋo.
Dzimba dzaʋo dzinorugare, hadzityiswi,
Ʋuye shamhu yaMŋari haigari iciʋaroʋa.
Hando yaʋo inoɓerekesa, isiŋgakoni,
Mhou yaʋo inoɓereka, isiŋgaȿodzi.
Ʋanoɓuɗisa pxere dzaʋo seɓoka
Ʋana ʋaʋo ʋanotamba.
Ʋanoimba ʋaciridzirwa ŋgoma nembira,
Ʋanofara ʋaciridzirwa nyere.
Ʋanopedza mazuʋa aʋo ʋacifara,
Ʋanoɓurukira kuSheori kamŋe‐kamŋe.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanoti kunaMŋari: Ibvai kwatiri;
Nokuti hatiɗi kuziʋa nzira dzenyu.
Iye Wamasimba ose ndianiko, kuti timushumire?
Ticaɓatsirwa neiko kana tikanyeŋgetera kwaari?
Tarirai, kufara kwaʋo hakuzi mumaʋoko aʋo;
Mano aʋakaipa ari kure neni.
Ko mŋenje waʋakaipa unodzimŋa kaŋgani?
Njodzi yaʋo inoʋaʋiŋga kaŋganiko?
Ʋanotoŋgofanana namakoto anodziŋgwa nemhepo here?
Nehundi inotorwa neɗutu remhepo?
Ŋgaamutsiʋe iye amene, aɀiziʋe.
Meso ake amene ŋgaaʋone kuparadzwa kwake,
Iye ŋgaanwe kutsamŋa kwoWamasimba ose.
Nokuti ucaʋa nehanya yeiko neimba yake kana aenda,
Kana kuwanda kwemŋedzi yake kwatapudzwa.
Ndianiko uŋgadzidzisa Mŋari kuziʋa,
Ɀaari iye unotoŋga ʋari kumsoro?
Mumŋe unofa acinesimba rake rose,
Akafara cose anorugare.
Hwedza dzake dzizere nomukaka,
Mŋoŋgo wamafupa ake wakanyoroʋa.
Mumŋe unofa aneshuŋgu dzomŋoyo,
Asina‐kutoŋgoraʋira ɀakanaka.
Ʋanoʋata pasi pamŋe cete paguruʋa,
Honye dzinoʋafukidza ʋose.
Tarirai ndinoziʋa kufuŋga kwenyu,
Namano akaipa amunondifuŋgira.
Nokuti munoti: Imba yomucinda iripiko?
Tente raigarwa nowakaipa riripiko?
Hamuna‐kubvunza here ʋanofamba nenzira?
Hamuziʋi ɀiratidzo ɀaʋo here?
Kuti munhu wakaipa unoɗarikwa pazuʋa renjodzi here?
Kuti ʋanobviswa pazuʋa rokutsamŋa here?
Ndianiko uŋgamuziʋisa mufambire wake pacena?
Ndiani ucamutsiʋa ɀaakaita here?
Ɀino unotakurirwa kubgiro,
Ʋanorinda rinda rake.
Maviŋga omupata acamunakira,
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋacamuteʋera,
Seɀaakatuŋgamirirwa naʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Ɀino munondinyaradza sei neɀisinamaturo,
Ɀamasarirwa nenhema
Ipapo Erifazi muTemani wakapindura, akati:
Ko munhu uŋgaɓatsira Mŋari here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu, wakaŋgwara, unoɀiɓatsira hake amene.
Wamasimba ose unehanya nokururama kwako here?
Iye uŋgaɓatsirwa naɀo kana iwe ukakwanisa nzira dzako here?
Iye unokuraira ɀaunomutya here?
Kuti akutoŋge here?
Ɀakaipa ɀako haɀizakakura here?
Ɀisina‐kururama ɀako haɀiperi.
Nokuti wakatora ruɓatso kuhama yako pasina,
Wakakunuŋgura ŋguʋo dzaʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kufuka.
Hauna‐kupa ʋanenyota mvura kuti ʋanwe,
Wakanyima ʋanenzara ɀokudya.
Asi munhu unesimba, nyika ndeyake;
Munhu unokudzwa, ndiye wakagara mairi.
Wakadziŋga cirikadzi dzisinecinhu,
Maʋoko enherera akavuniwa.
Saka iwe wakapotedzwa nemisuŋgo,
Unovunduswa pakarepo nokutya,
Nerima, kuti urege kuʋona,
Ʋuye mvura zhinji inokufukidza.
Ko Mŋari haazi kuɗeŋga kumsoro‐soro here?
Tarira kukwirira kwenyeredzi, dzakakwirira sei!
Iwe unoti: Mŋari unoziʋeiko?
Uŋgagona kutoŋga pakati perima guru here?
Makore matema akamufukidza, haagoni kuʋona;
Unofamba pakutenderera kweɗeŋga.
Iwe unoɗa kuramba ucifamba nenzira yekare
Yakatsikwa naʋanhu ʋakaipa here?
Iʋo ʋakabvutwa ŋguʋa yaʋo isati yaȿika;
Nheyo dzaʋo dzakaɗururwa sorukoʋa rwemvura.
Iʋo ʋakati kunaMŋari: Ibvai kwatiri;
Ʋuye: Wamasimba‐ose uŋgatiiteiko?
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakazadza dzimba dzaʋo neɀakanaka;
Asi mano aʋakaipa ari kure neni.
Ʋakarurama ʋanoɀiʋona, ʋakafara;
Ʋasinemhoȿa ʋanoʋaseka,
Ɀakasara ɀaʋo ɀakapedzwa nomŋoto.
Shamŋaridzana naye ɀino, uʋe norugare;
Ipapo ucaitirwa ɀakanaka.
Gamucira hako murairo womuromo wake,
Uceŋgete mashoko ake mumŋoyo mako.
Kana ukadzokera kuno‐Wamasimba‐ose, ucaʋakwa;
Kana ukabvisa ɀisakarurama kure namatente ako.
Isa fuma
Ipapo Wamasimba‐ose ucaʋa fuma yako,
Nesirveri inokosha kwaɀo kwauri.
Nokuti ipapo ucafarira Wamasimba‐ose,
Ucasimudzira ciso cako kunaMŋari.
Ucanyeŋgetera kwaari, iye ucakunzwa;
Ʋuye ucaripa mhiko dzako.
Ucatema ʋo cireʋo, cikasimbiswa kwauri;
Ʋuye ciedza cicavenekera nzira dzako.
Kana ʋakakusundira pasi, ucati: Ndicasimudzwa;
Iye ucaponesa munhu unoɀininipisa.
Iye ucarwira
Ɀirokwaɀo ucarwirwa iye nokucena kwamaʋoko ako.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Kunyaŋge nanhasi ndinonyunyuta ndineshuŋgu;
Kurobga kwaŋgu kwakanyanya kukunda kugomera kwaŋgu.
Haiwa! ɗai ndaiziʋa kwandiŋgamuwana,
Kuti ndiȿike ipo pacigaro cake.
Ndairondedzera mhaka yaŋgu pamberi pake,
Ndaizadza muromo waŋgu nenharo.
Ndaiziʋa mashoko aanondipindura nawo,
Ndainzwisisa ɀaanondiʋudza.
Uŋgaita nharo neni nesimba rake guru here?
Kwete; asi uŋganditerera hake.
Apo wakarurama uŋgataurirana naye;
Kuti ndisunuŋgurwe nokusiŋgaperi pamutoŋgi waŋgu.
Tarira, ndinopfuʋura mberi, asi haa’po;
Ʋuye shure, asi handimuʋoni;
