Nokuruʋoko rworuɓoshwe, kana aciɓata, asi handigoni kumuʋona;
Unoɀiʋanza paruʋoko rworudyi, kuti ndirege kumuʋona.
Nokuti iye unoziʋa nzira yandinofamba nayo;
Kana akandiidza, ndicaɓuɗa ndakaita sendarama.
Rutsoka rwaŋgu rwakaramba rucitsika paakatsika iye;
Ndakarambira panzira yake, handina‐kutsauka.
Handina‐kudzoka pamurairo wemiromo yake;
Ndakaceŋgeta sefuma mashoko omuromo wake kupfuʋura mugoʋe weɀokudya ɀaŋgu.
Asi iye unoraŋgarira cinhu cimŋe, ndianiko uŋgamudzora?
Ɀinoɗa mŋoyo wake, ndiɀo ɀaanoita.
Nokuti unoita ɀandakatemerwa;
Neɀinhu ɀizhinji ɀakaɗai ɀiri kwaari.
Saka ndinotambudzika pamberi pake;
Kana ndicimufuŋga ndinomutya.
Nokuti Mŋari wakatorera mŋoyo waŋgu simba,
Wamasimba‐ose wakandivundusa.
Nokuti handina‐kuparadzwa nokuɗa kwerima,
Kana nokuɗa kwerima guru rakafukidza ciso caŋgu.
Wamasimba‐ose unoregereiko kutara ŋguʋa
Ʋanomuziʋa ʋanoregereiko kuʋona mazuʋa ake?
Ʋanoshandura miganho ʋari’po;
Ʋanopamba mapoka amakwai, ʋaciafudza.
Ʋanotinha mboŋgoro yenherera,
Ʋanotora nzombe yecirikadzi ʋaciita ruɓatso.
Ʋanodziŋga ʋarombo panzira;
Ʋarombo ʋenyika ʋanoʋanda ʋose.
Tarira, sembizi murenje
Ʋanoɓuɗira kumaɓasa aʋo, ʋacishiŋgairira ɀokwaɗi;
Renje
Ʋanoceka ɀaʋanodya kusaŋgo;
Ʋanoʋuŋganidza mazambiriŋga aʋakaipa.
Ʋanoʋata ʋusiku bgose ʋasina‐ɀaʋakafuka,
Pacando haʋana‐caʋaŋgaɀifukidza naco.
Ʋakanyoroʋa nokupfunha kwemvura yamakomo,
Ʋanombundikira ɗombo nokushaiwa pokutizira.
Ʋari’po ʋanobvuta nherera pazamu
Nokutora ruɓatso rwaʋarombo;
Naiɀoɀo ʋanofamba ʋasina‐ɀaʋakafuka,
Ʋanotakura ɀisote ʋanenzara;
Ʋanoȿina mafuta mukati mamaȿiŋgo aʋanhu aʋa;
Ʋanotsika ɀiȿiniro ɀamazambiriŋga aʋo, ʋacifa nenyota.
Ʋanhu ʋanogomera mukati meguta rinaʋanhu ʋazhinji,
Ʋuye mŋeya yaʋakakuʋadzwa inocema;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Mŋari haanehanya neɀisina‐kururama.
Ndiʋo ʋanoʋeŋga ciedza;
Haʋaziʋi nzira dzaco,
Haʋarambi ʋacifamba pamakwara aco.
Muʋurayi unomuka kana kwoedza, unoʋuraya murombo nounoshaiwa;
Ʋusiku wakafanana nomuɓi.
Ziso remhombge ʋo rinomirira rubvunza‐ʋaeni,
Aciti: Hakuneziso ricandiʋona;
Ndokufukidza ciso cake.
Ʋusiku ʋanopaza dzimba;
Masikati ʋanoɀipfigira;
Haʋaziʋi ciedza.
Nokuti maŋgwanani akaita serima guru kwaʋari ʋose;
Nokuti ʋanoziʋa kutyisa kwerima guru.
Iye unofambisa pamsoro pemvura;
Mugoʋe waʋo wakatukwa panyika;
Haacafambi nenzira yeminda yemizambiriŋga.
Kuwoma nokupisa kunopedza mvura yecando;
Ciɀaro cicamukaŋganwa; honye dzicatapirirwa naye;
Haacazoraŋgarirwi;
Ʋuye kusarurama kucavunwa somuti.
Iye unoparadza haŋa isiŋgaɓereki;
Haaitiri cirikadzi ɀakanaka.
Unobvisa ʋanesimba nesimba rake;
Kana iye acisimuka, hakunomunhu unoziʋa kana acararama.
Mŋari unoʋagarisa ʋakaceŋgetwa, ʋaciʋimba naɀo;
Asi meso ake anotarira nzira dzaʋo.
Ʋanokudzwa; gare‐gare ʋaenda;
Ʋanoɗukupiswa, ʋanobviswa panzira saʋamŋe ʋose,
Ʋanocekwa semisoro yehura dzeɀiyo.
Kana ɀisina‐kuɗaro ɀino, ndiani uŋgati ndinenhema,
Nokushaisa mashoko aŋgu simba here?
Ipapo Birdadi muShuhi wakapindura, akati:
Ʋumambo nokutyisa ɀinaye;
Iye unoyananisa pamatunhu ake akakwirira.
Hondo dzake dziŋgaʋereŋgwa here?
Ndianiko usiŋgavenekerwi neciedza cake?
Ɀino munhu uŋgaʋa wakarurama seiko pamberi paMŋari?
Nomunhu wakaɀarwa nomukadzi uŋgaʋa wakacena sei?
Tarira, nomŋedzi ʋo unoshaiwa kubginya,
Nenyeredzi hadzizakacena kwaɀo pamberi pake.
Ndoɗa munhu, iro gonye!
Nomŋanakomana womunhu, iro gonye!
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura, akati:
Iwe wakaɓatsira sei usinesimba!
Wakaponesa sei ruʋoko rusinesimba!
Wakapa mano sei usina‐kuŋgwara,
Nokuɗudzira kwaɀo ziʋo yaɀokwaɗi!
Wakataurira aniko mashoko awa?
Mŋeya wakaɓuɗa kwauri ndowaniko?
Ʋakafa ʋanoɗeɗera
Pasi pemvura naʋagere mukati mayo.
Sheori rakashama pamberi pake,
Kuparadza hakunecifukidzo.
Unotatamura rutiʋi rwokumsoro pasineciro,
Unoturikira nyika pasinecinhu.
Unosuŋgira mvura mumakore ake makobvu;
Asi gore haribvaruki nokurema kwayo.
Unofukidza cigaro cake coʋushe, cirege kuʋonekwa,
Unowarira gore rake pamsoro paco.
Wakatara muganho pamsoro pemvura,
Kuȿikira pakuparadzana kweciedza nerima.
Mbiru dzeɗeŋga dzinoɗeɗera,
Nokuvunduka nokutuka kwake.
Unomutsa guŋgwa nesimba rake,
Nenjere dzake unoparadza Rahabi.
Ƌeŋga rinoshoŋgedzwa nomŋeya wake;
Ruʋoko rwake rwakaɓaya nyoka inokurumidza.
Tarira, iɀi ndiwo mudziʋo woga wenzira dzake;
Haiwa, tinoŋgonzwa zeʋe‐zeʋe roga renzwi rake!
Asi kutinhira kwesimba rake ndianiko uŋgakunzwisisa?
Ipapo Jobo wakapfuʋura nokutaura kwake, akati:
NaMŋari mupenyu, iye wakanditorera kururama kwaŋgu;
NoWamasimba‐ose wakatambudza mŋeya waŋgu;
(Nokuti ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ʋuciri mandiri cose,
Nomŋeya waMŋari uciri mumhino dzaŋgu;)
Ɀirokwaɀo miromo yaŋgu haiŋgatauri ɀisakarurama,
Ʋuye rurimi rwaŋgu haruŋgareʋi ɀinonyeŋgera.
Mŋari ŋgaandidziʋise ndirege kukururamisirai;
Kuȿikira parufu rwaŋgu handiŋgarashi kusanyeŋgera kwaŋgu.
Ndinoɓatisa kururama kwaŋgu, handiŋgakuregi;
Mŋoyo waŋgu hauŋgandipi mhaka ndiciri mupenyu.
Muʋeŋgi waŋgu ŋgaaite sowakaipa.
Ʋuye unondimukira ŋgaaite sousina‐kururama.
Nokuti usiŋgaɗi Mŋari unetariro yeiko, kunyaŋge aɀiwanira fuma,
Kana atorerwa mŋeya wake naMŋari here?
Ko Mŋari ucanzwa kucema kwake,
Kana aciwirwa nenjodzi here?
Ko iye ucafarira Wamasimba‐ose,
Nokuɗana kunaMŋari ŋguʋa dzose here?
Ini ndicakudzidzisai ɀoruʋoko rwaMŋari;
Iɀo ɀinaWamasimba‐ose handiŋgaɀiʋanzi.
Tarirai imi mose makaɀiʋona henyu;
Ɀino makagoʋa ʋanhu ʋasinamaturo cose neiko?
Ndiwo mugoʋe unopiwa munhu wakaipa naMŋari,
Nenhaka yaʋamanikidzi, yaʋanopiwa noWamasimba‐ose.
Kana ʋana ʋake ʋaciwanda, ʋoʋurawa nomunondo;
Ʋana ʋake haʋaŋgaguti ɀokudya.
Cirikadzi dzake hadziŋgacemi.
Kunyaŋge akaʋuŋganidza sirveri ikaita seguruʋa,
Nokugadzira ɀokufuka ɀikaita sevu;
Uŋgaɀigadzira hake iye, asi wakarurama ndiye ucaɀifuka;
Usinemhoȿa ndiye ucagoʋera sirveri.
Unoʋaka imba yake seciʋundudzi,
Secirindo cinoitwa nomurindi.
Unoʋata pasi akafuma, asi haapamhidzi ɀe;
Unoȿinudza meso ake, asi haaci’po.
Ɀinotyisa ɀinomuɓata semvura zhinji;
Ƌutu remhepo rinomubvuta ʋusiku.
Mhepo inobva mabvazuʋa inomutora, ndokuenda hake;
Inomutȿaira panɀimbo yake.
Unoidza kutiza paruʋoko rwake.
Ʋanhu ʋacaroʋanya maʋoko pamsoro pake,
Ʋacamuridzira muridzo abve panɀimbo yake.
Nokuti mugodi uri’po panobva sirveri,
Nɀimbo iri’po paʋanonatsa ndarama.
Mhaŋgura inocerwa pasi,
Nendarira inonyauswa pabge.
Unotȿakisisa kuȿikira kumatiʋi oseose.
Mabge ari murima guru nomumumvuri worufu.
Unocera mugodi kure napanogara ʋanhu;
Ʋanokaŋganikwa norutsoka rwaʋanopfuʋura;
Ʋanorembera kure naʋanhu, ʋacizeya uku nokuku.
Kana iri nyika, ɀokudya ɀinobva mairi;
Pasi paɀo pakashandurwa ɀineŋge nomŋoto.
Pamabge ayo ndipo panogara
Anoʋupfu bgendarama.
Nzira iyo haizikanwi negondo,
Ziso rorukodzi harina‐kuiʋona;
Ɀikara, ɀinoɀikudza, haɀina‐kupfuʋura napo.
Shumba, inehasha, haina‐kupfuʋura napo.
Iye unotema ɗombo romusarasara noruʋoko rwake;
Unoshandukura makomo nemidzi yawo.
Unocera mugero pamatombo;
Ziso rake rinoʋona ɀinokosha.
Unodziʋira nzizi dzemvura dzirege kuɗonha;
Cinhu cakaʋanzika unociɓuɗisa pacena.
Asi ʋucenjeri ʋucawanikwepiko?
Kunzwisisa kunogarepi?
Munhu haaziʋi muteŋgo wabgo;
Haʋuwanikwi panyika yaʋapenyu.
Pakadzika panoti: Haʋuzi mandiri;
Neguŋgwa rinoti: Haʋuzi mandiri.
Haʋuŋgateŋgwi nendarama,
Nyaŋgwe nesirveri haiŋgaidzirwi muteŋgo wabgo.
Haʋuŋgaenzaniswi nendarama yeOfiri,
Kana
Ndarama negirazi haɀiŋgaenzani nabgo;
Ɀishoŋgo ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka haɀiŋgatsinhaniswi nabgo.
Korari nekristari haɀiŋgatoŋgorebgi;
Ɀirokwaɀo muteŋgo woʋucenjeri unopfuʋura maparera.
Topazi yeEtiopia haiŋgaenzani nabgo,
Haʋuŋgaenzaniswi nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.
Ɀino ʋucenjeri ʋunobvepiko?
Kunzwisisa kunogarepi?
Ɀabgakaʋanzirwa meso aʋapenyu ʋose,
Nokudzitirirwa shiri dzokuɗeŋga.
Kuparadza noRufu ɀinoti:
Takanzwa guhu rabgo panzeʋe dzeɗu.
Mŋari unonzwisisa nzira yabgo,
Ndiye unoziʋa kwaʋunobva.
Nokuti unotarira kumigumo yenyika,
Unoʋona ɀose pasi pokuɗeŋga pose;
Paŋguʋa yaanotarira mhepo kurema kwayo;
Ɀirokwaɀo, unoyera mvura neciyero.
Paŋguʋa yaakatemera mvura cireʋo,
Nemheni yomutinhiro nzira yayo.
Paŋguʋa iyo wakaʋuʋona, akaʋuɗudzira;
Akaʋusimbisa, nokuʋunɀera.
Akaʋudza munhu aciti:
Tarira, Kutya Ishe, ndibgo ʋucenjeri;
Kurega ɀakaipa ndiko kunzwisisa.
Ɀino Jobo akapfuʋura ɀe namashoko ake, akati:
Haiwa, ɗai ndaiita haŋgu sapamŋedzi yakare,
Sapamazuʋa andairindwa naMŋari;
Paŋguʋa iyo mŋenje wake waivenekera pamusoro waŋgu,
Ndaifamba ndicivenekerwa parima neciedza cake;
Seɀandakaŋga ndakaita pamazuʋa okusimba kwaŋgu,
Paŋguʋa iyo ʋushamŋari bgaMŋari ʋuciri patente raŋgu;
Paŋguʋa iyo Wamasimba‐ose aciri neni,
Naʋana ʋaŋgu ʋacakandipoteredza;
Paŋguʋa iyo pandaitsika paisukwa nomukaka wakafa,
Ʋuye ɗombo raindiɗururira nzizi dzamafuta!
Paŋguʋa yandaiɓuɗa kusuʋo reguta,
Paŋguʋa yandaigadzira cigaro caŋgu paɗare,
Majaya akati acindiʋona aiʋanda,
Naʋatana ʋaisimuka ʋakaramba ʋamire;
Macinda ainyarara pakutaura kwawo,
Aifumbira miromo yawo;
Manzwi aʋakuru ainyarara,
Ndimi dzaʋo dzainamatira mumikanwa yaʋo.
Nokuti nzeʋe yakati ici
Ziso rakati rici
Nokuti ndairwira ʋarombo ʋaicema,
Nenherera ʋo, nowaishaiwa muɓatsiri.
Waikaro‐fa waindiropafadza;
Ndaiimbisa mŋoyo wecirikadzi nomufaro.
Ini ndaifuka kururama, naiko kwaindifukidza;
Kururama kwaŋgu kwaiʋa seŋguʋo nekorona.
Ndaiʋa meso amapofu,
Netsoka dzaʋanokamhina.
Ndaiʋa ɓaɓa ʋaʋaishaiwa;
Ndainɀera mhaka yowandakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi.
Ndaivuna meno aʋasina‐kururama,
Nokubvuta caakaŋga aʋuraya mumeno ake.
Paŋguʋa iyo ndakati: Ndicafira muɗendere raŋgu,
Ndicawanza mazuʋa aŋgu aite sejeca,
Mudzi waŋgu wakatandaʋarira kuȿikira kumvura,
Ƌoʋa rinoʋata ʋusiku bgose paɗaʋi raŋgu.
Kukudzwa kwaŋgu kunoramba kuri kutȿa,
Ʋuta bgaŋgu ʋunoramba ʋuciʋandudzwa muruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ʋanhu ʋainditerera nokundimirira,
Ʋainyarara kana ndiciʋaraira.
Haʋazaitaura ɀe kana ini ndareʋa mashoko aŋgu;
Kutaura kwaŋgu kwakaɗonhera pamsoro paʋo.
Ʋaindimirira
Ʋaishamisa miromo yaʋo
Ndaiʋasekerera kana ʋasiŋgatsuŋgi;
Haʋana‐kudzima ciedza ceciso caŋgu.
Ndaiʋasanaŋgurira nzira yaʋo, ndikagara
Ndaigara samambo pahondo,
Somunhu unonyaradza ʋanocema.
Asi ɀino ʋaɗuku kwandiri ʋanondiseka,
Iʋo ʋandaishoʋora kuisa madziɓaɓa aʋo pambga dzamapoka aŋgu.
Simba ramaʋoko aʋo riŋgandiɓatsireiko?
Iʋo ʋakapererwa nesimba kwaɀo.
Ʋawonda nokushaiwa nenzara;
Ʋanotetena ivu rakawoma murima ramataŋgwaza nokuparadzwa.
Ʋanotanha ɀinoʋaʋa pamakwenzi;
Midzi yomurara ndiɀo ɀokudya ɀaʋo.
Ʋanodziŋgwa pakati
Ʋanoʋaȿoʋerera sembava.
Ʋanofanira kugara pamipata yakaȿiɓa,
Pamakomba enyika namatombo.
Ʋanorira pakati pamakwenzi;
Ʋanoʋuŋganira pasi porukato.
Ʋakadziŋgwa panyika ʋacirobga.
Ɀino ndaʋa ciimbo caʋo,
Ndaʋa shumo yaʋo.
Ʋanondisema, ʋanomira kure neni,
Haʋaregi kupfira mate paciso caŋgu.
Nokuti iye wakasunuŋgura rukuŋgiso rwake akanditambudza;
Ʋakarasha tomu pamberi paŋgu.
Ʋasinamaturo ʋanosimuka kurudyi rwaŋgu;
Ʋanosundira makumbo aŋgu,
Ʋanoɀigadzirira nzira dzaʋo kundiparadza.
Ʋanoparadza nzira yaŋgu,
Ʋanowedzera njodzi yaŋgu,
Iʋo ʋanhu ʋasinomuɓatsiri.
Ʋanoʋuya ʋakafanana naʋanopinda pakakoromoka pakuru;
Ʋanomhanyira
Ɀinotyisa ɀandiʋiŋga,
Ʋanodziŋga kukudzwa kwaŋgu semhepo;
Kufara kwangu kwapfuʋura segore.
Ɀino mŋeya waŋgu waɗururwa mukati maŋgu;
Mazuʋa enjodzi andiɓata.
Paŋguʋa yoʋusiku mafupa aŋgu anoʋururwa mukati maŋgu,
Ʋuye ɀinondiɓaya haɀizorori.
Nesimba
Rinondisuŋga sehuro dzejasi raŋgu.
Iye wakandiwisira mumatope,
Ndaʋa seguruʋa neɗota.
Ndinocema kwamuri, asi hamundiɗaʋiri;
Ndimire,
Mashanduka hamunetsitsi neni;
Munonditambudza nesimba roruʋoko rwenyu.
Munondisimudza nemhepo, munonditaȿisa
Munondinyaŋgarisa muɗutu remhepo.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti mucandiisa kurufu,
Nokuimba yakatarirwa ʋapenyu ʋose.
Ko munhu, unonyura, haaŋgatambanudzi ruʋoko here;
Pakutambudzika kwake haaŋgaridzi mhere here?
Ko handina‐kucema wakaŋga ari panjodzi here?
Mŋeya waŋgu wakaŋga usineshuŋgu pamsoro powaishaiwa here?
Ndakati ndicitarira ɀakanaka, ɀakaipa ɀikaȿika:
Ndakati ndicimirira ciedza, rima ndokuȿika.
Ʋura bgaŋgu ʋunoʋira, haʋuzorori;
Mazuʋa okutambudzika andiʋiŋga.
Ndinocema ndisinomushana;
Ndinosimuka pakati peʋuŋgano, ndicicema kuɓatsirwa.
Ndaʋa hama yamakaʋa,
Neshamŋari yemhou
Ganda raŋgu raȿiɓa, rinokwatuka kwandiri;
Mafupa aŋgu atȿa nokupisa.
Naiɀoɀo mbira dzaŋgu dzashanduka kucema,
Ʋuye nyere yaŋgu raʋa inzwi raʋanocema misodzi.
Ndakaita suŋgano nameso aŋgu;
Ɀino ndiŋgatarira musikana seiko?
Nokuti mugoʋe waMŋari unobva kumsoro ndoweiko,
Nenhaka yoWamasimba‐ose inobva kuɗeŋga ndeyeiko?
Ko haizi njodzi kunaʋasina‐kururama here,
Nokuparadzwa kunaʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa here?
Ko iye haaʋoni nzira dzaŋgu,
Nokuʋereŋga nhambge dzaŋgu dzose here?
Kana ndiciŋge ndafamba ne
Norutsoka rwaŋgu rwamhanyira ɀinonyeŋgera;
(Ŋgandiidzwe paciyero cakarurama,
Kuti Mŋari aziʋe kusanyeŋgera kwaŋgu;)
Kana kutsika kwaŋgu kuciŋge kwatsauka panzira,
Nomŋoyo waŋgu ukateʋera meso aŋgu,
Kana gwapa riciŋge ranamatira pamaʋoko aŋgu;
Ipapo ini ndidɀare haŋgu, asi mumŋe ŋgaadye;
Ɀiɓereko ɀomunda waŋgu ŋgaɀidzurwe.
Kana mŋoyo waŋgu uciŋge wanyeŋgerwa nomukadzi,
Kana ndaʋandira pamukoʋa wowandaigara naye;
Ipapo mukadzi waŋgu ŋgaakuyire mumŋe,
Naʋamŋe ŋgaʋakotamire pamsoro pake.
Nokuti cinhu ico ciʋi cakashata,
Ɀirokwaɀo, cinhu cakaipa cinofanira kurobga naʋatoŋgi.
Nokuti ndiwo mŋoto unopedza kuȿikira pakuparadza,
Uŋgadzura ɀiɓereko ɀaŋgu ɀose.
Kana ndiciŋge ndaɀidza mhaka yomuranda waŋgu kana murandakadzi waŋgu,
Paŋguʋa yaʋakaita nharo neni;
Ndicaiteiko kana Mŋari akasimuka?
Kana akandiʋiŋga, ndiŋgapindurei kwaari?
Wakandiita muɗumbu
Ko haazi mumŋe wakatiʋumba isu tose muɗumbu
Kana ndiciŋge ndanyima ʋarombo ɀaʋakakumbira,
Kana kushaisa meso ecirikadzi;
Kana ndiciŋge ndadya cimeɗu caŋgu ndiri ndoga,
Nherera ikasadya ʋo;
(Kwete, kubva paʋujaya bgaŋgu yakakurira kwandiri ndikaita saɓaɓa ʋayo,
Ndaiʋa muperekedzi wayo kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu;)
Kana ndiciŋge ndaʋona munhu aciparara nokushaiwa ŋguʋo,
Kana unoshaiwa asina‐cokufuka;
Kana ciʋuno cake cisina‐kundiʋoŋga,
Kana asina‐kudziyirwa nemvere dzamakwai aŋgu;
Kana ndiciŋge ndasimudzira nherera ruʋoko rwaŋgu,
Nokuti ndakaʋona kuti ndicaɓatsirwa pasuʋo;
Ipapo fudzi raŋgu ŋgaribve paɓendekete,
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu ŋgaruvunike pafupa.
Nokuti njodzi inobva kunaMŋari yakandityisa,
Ndakakoniwa kuita cinhu nokuɗa kwoʋumambo bgake.
Kana ndiciŋge ndaʋimba nendarama ikaʋa tariro yaŋgu,
Ndikati kundarama yakaiȿo‐naka: Ndinoʋimba
Kana ndiciŋge ndakafara nokuti fuma yaŋgu yakaŋga yawanda,
Ʋuye nokuti ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakaŋga rwawana ɀizhinji;
Kana ndiciŋge ndaʋona kubginya kwezuʋa,
Kana mŋedzi ucifamba wakacena;
Mŋoyo waŋgu ukanyeŋgerwa pakaʋanda,
Muromo waŋgu ukaȿeta ruʋoko rwaŋgu;
Necinhu ici ʋo caiʋa cakaipa cinofanira kurobga naʋatoŋgi;
Nokuti ndineŋge ndaramba Mŋari uri kumsoro.
Kana ndiciŋge ndafarira kuparadzwa kwomuʋeŋgi waŋgu,
Kana kuɀikudza paŋguʋa yaakaʋiŋgwa neɀakaipa;
(Ɀirokwaɀo handina‐kutendera muromo waŋgu kutadza,
Ndicikumbira nokupanjira kuti afe;)
Kana ʋanhu ʋetente raŋgu ʋasina‐kutaura,
Ndianiko uŋgawana munhu usinakugutiswa nenyama yake?
Mŋeni haana‐kuʋata ʋusiku panzira dzomumusha;
Asi ndaizarurira mufambi mikoʋa yaŋgu;
Ƌayi ndaifukidza kuɗarika kwaŋgu saAdama,
Ndiciʋanza ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu pacifuʋa caŋgu;
Ɀandaitya ʋanhu ʋazhinji,
Ndikavunduswa nokushoʋorwa namapoka
Ndikanyarara, ndikasaɓuɗa pamukoʋa —
Haiwa, ɗayi ndaiʋa nomunhu unondinzwa!
(Tarirai, ndirwo runyoro rwaŋgu, Wamasimba‐ose ŋgaandipindure;)
Ƌayi ndaiʋa norugwaro rwakanyorwa nomudziʋisi waŋgu!
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndairutakura pafudzi raŋgu;
Ndairudzika
Ndaimuɗudzira kuwanda kwenhambge dzaŋgu;
Ndaisweɗera kwaari somucinda.
Kana munda waŋgu ukaɗanidzira kwandiri, ucindipa mhoȿa,
Nemihoroŋga yawo ikacema yose;
Kana ndiciŋge ndadya ɀiɓereko ɀawo ndisina‐kuteŋga,
Kana ndiciŋge ndarashisa ʋaridzi ʋawo ʋupenyu bgaʋo;
Ipapo ʋutumbambeʋa ŋgaʋumere’po panɀimbo yeɀiyo,
Nesora panɀimbo yebari.
Mashoko aJobo apera.
Ɀino ʋarume aʋa ʋatatu ʋakarega kupindura Jobo, nokuti wakati ndakarurama haŋgu.
Ipapo Erihu mŋanakomana waBarakeri muBuzi, weimba yaRami, wakatsamŋa kwaɀo; wakatsamŋira Jobo kwaɀo, nokuti wakaŋga aɀiruramisa kupfuʋura Mŋari.
Akatsamŋira ʋo kwaɀo shamŋari dzake nhatu, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋashaiwa mhinduro, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaŋga ʋapa haʋo Jobo mhoȿa.
Ɀino Erihu wakaŋga amirira kutaura naJobo, nokuti iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakuru kwaari pazero.
Ɀino Erihu wakati aciʋona kuti hapenemhinduro pamiromo yaʋanhu aʋa ʋatatu, iye akatsamŋa kwaɀo.
Ɀino Erihu mŋanakomana waBarakeri muBuzi wakapindura, akati:
Ini ndiri muɗuku, asi imi maʋa ʋakuru kwaɀo;
Saka ndakaɀidzora haŋgu, ndikatya kukuziʋisai kufuŋga kwaŋgu.
Ndakati: Ʋanamazuʋa mazhinji ŋgaʋataure haʋo,
Ʋanamakore mazhinji ŋgaʋadzidzise ʋamŋe ʋucenjeri.
Asi mŋeya uri’po pamunhu,
Kufuridzira kwoWamasimba‐ose kunoʋapa kunzwisisa.
Haʋazi ʋakuru ʋakacenjera,
Kana ʋatana ʋanonzwisisa kururamisira.
Saka ndakati: Cindinzwai;
Neni ʋo ndica
Tarirai, ndakambomirira mashoko enyu,
Ndakaterera kuti ndinzwe nharo dzenyu,
Ŋguʋa yamakatȿaka ɀamuŋgataura.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakakucerekedzai,
Asi tarirai, hakunomunhu wakapxisa Jobo,
Kana wakapindura mashoko ake pakati penyu.
Cenjerai, murege kuti: Takawana ʋucenjeri;
Mŋari ndiye uŋgamukunda, asi munhu kwete;
Nokuti haana‐kutaura mashoko ake kwandiri;
Neni handiŋgamupinduri iye nokutaura kwenyu.
Ʋashamiswa, haʋacapinduri;
Haʋacineshoko raʋaŋgataura.
Ko ini ndiŋgamirira, ɀaʋasiŋgatauri iʋo,
Ɀaʋanoramba ʋamire, ʋasina‐caʋaŋgapindura here?
Neni ʋo ndicapindura padzoro raŋgu,
Neni ʋo ndicaziʋisa kufuŋga kwaŋgu.
Nokuti ndizere namashoko;
Mŋeya, uri mukati maŋgu, unondimanikidza.
Tarirai, mukati maŋgu makafanana newaini isina‐pokuɓuɗa napo;
Ɀakafanana nehomboɗo itȿa dzinokaro‐paruka.
Ndicataura, kuti ndiremudzwe,
Ndicashamisa miromo yaŋgu ndipindure.
Ndirege haŋgu kutsaura munhu upi noupi;
Ʋuye handiŋgatumidzi ani nani mazita anoɓata kumeso.
Nokuti handiziʋi kutumidza mazita anoɓata kumeso;
Asi Jobo, ciɗonzwai henyu kutaura kwaŋgu,
Tererai mashoko aŋgu ose.
Tarirai ɀino, ndashamisa muromo waŋgu,
Rurimi rwaŋgu rwataura mumuromo waŋgu,
Mashoko aŋgu
Miromo yaŋgu icataura iɀo ɀainoziʋa neɀokwaɗi.
Mŋeya waMŋari wakandiita,
Kufuridzira kwoWamasimba‐ose kunondipa ʋupenyu.
Kana mukagona, cindipindurai henyu;
Gadzirai
Tarirai, ini ndakafanana nemi pamberi paMŋari;
Neni ʋo ndakaʋumbga nevu.
Tarirai, kutyisa kwaŋgu hakuŋgakutyisiyi imi,
Ʋuye handiŋgakuremedziyi.
Ɀirokwaɀo, makataura ini ndiciɀinzwa,
Ndakanzwa inzwi ramashoko
Ndakanaka, handina‐kuɗarika;
Handinemhoȿa, hapaneɀakaipa mukati maŋgu;
Tarirai, iye unowana mhoȿa kuti arwe neni,
Unonditi muʋeŋgi wake.
Unomana makumbo aŋgu mumatanda,
Unocerekedza nzira dzaŋgu dzose.
Tarirai, ndicakupindurai, pacinhu ici hamuna‐kururama,
Nokuti Mŋari mukuru kupfuʋura munhu.
Munorwireiko naye?
Nokuti haaɀiɗaʋiriri pamashoko ake ose.
Nokuti Mŋari unotaura kamŋe cete,
Kana kaʋiri,
Pakurota, kana pane‐ɀinoʋonekwa ʋusiku,
Kana munhu aɓatwa nehope kwaɀo,
Kana aʋete panhoʋo;
Ipapo unodziʋura nzeʋe dzaʋanhu,
Nokusimbisa kurairwa kwaʋo,
Kuti adzore munhu pakuʋaʋarira ɀakaipa,
Nokuʋanzira munhu kuɀikudza;
Kuti adzore mŋeya wake pagomba,
Ʋupenyu bgake ʋurege kuparadzwa nomunondo.
Unoraŋgwa ʋo acirwadziwa panhoʋo yake,
Nokutambudzika ŋguʋa dzose mumafupa ake;
Naiɀoɀo ʋupenyu bgake ʋunosema ɀokudya,
Nomŋoyo wake ɀokudya ɀinonaka.
Nyama yake inopedzwa, haicaʋonekwi,
Mafupa ake, akaŋga asiŋgaʋonekwi, anoɓuɗira kunze.
Ɀirokwaɀo mŋeya wake unosweɗera kugomba,
Noʋupenyu bgake kuʋaparadzi.
Kana mutumŋa akaȿika kwaari,
Ari mushanduri, mumŋe pakati paʋaneɀuru ɀamazana,
Kuti aratidze munhu
Murwirei arege kuɓurukira kugomba,
Ndawana dzikinuro.
Nyama yake icaʋa itȿa kupfuʋura yomŋana;
Ucadzokera kumazuʋa oʋuɗuku bgake.
Unonyeŋgetera kunaMŋari, iye acimufarira;
Naiɀoɀo unotarira ciso cake nomufaro;
Akadzosera munhu kururama kwake.
Ucaimba pamberi paʋanhu, aciti;
Ndatadza, ndakaŋganisa ɀakarurama,
Asi haɀina‐kundiɓatsira;
Iye wakarwira mŋeya waŋgu urege kuɓurukira kugomba,
Ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ʋucaʋona ciedza.
Tarirai, Mŋari unoita ɀinhu iɀi ɀose,
Kaʋiri kana katatu nomunhu,
Kuti adzose mŋeya wake pagomba,
Kuti avenekerwe neciedza caʋapenyu.
Cerekedzai ɀakanaka, Jobo, mundinzwei;
Nyararai, ini nditaure.
Kana muneshoko rokureʋa, ndipindurei;
Taurai, nokuti ndinoɗa kukururamisirai.
Kana musiŋgaɗi, nditererei;
Nyararai, ini ndikudzidzisei ʋucenjeri.
Ipapo Erihu wakapindura, akati:
Inzwai mashoko aŋgu, imi ʋanhu ʋakacenjera;
Rerekerai nzeʋe dzenyu kwandiri, imi muneziʋo.
Nokuti nzeʋe ndiyo inoidza mashoko,
Seɀinoraʋira mukanwa ɀokudya.
Ŋgatiɀisanaŋgurire ɀakarurama;
Ŋgatiziʋe tose kuti ɀakanaka ndeɀipi.
Nokuti Jobo wakati: Ndakarurama,
Asi Mŋari wakanditorera kururama kwaŋgu;
Kunyaŋge ndakarurama haŋgu,
Pandakakuʋadzwa hapaŋgapori,
Ndianiko wakafanana naJobo,
Unonwa kushoʋorwa semvura?
Unofambidzana naʋanoita ɀakaipa,
Unofamba naʋanhu ʋakashata.
Nokuti iye wakati: Munhu haatoŋgoɓatsirwi,
Kana acifarira Mŋari.
Saka cindinzwai, imi ʋarume ʋenjere:
Mŋari haaŋgatoŋgoiti ɀisakarurama;
Wamasimba‐ose haaŋgatoŋgoiti ɀakaipa.
Nokuti ucaripira munhu seɀaakaɓata,
Ucapa mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakafanirwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, Mŋari haaŋgaiti ɀakaipa,
Wamasimba‐ose haaŋgakaŋganisi pakutoŋga.
Ndianiko wakamuita murairi wenyika?
Ndianiko wakamupa nyika yose?
Kana akadzosera mŋoyo wake kwaari,
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋose ʋacaparara pamŋe cete,
Munhu akadzokera ɀe kuguruʋa.
Ɀino kana mukagona kunzwisisa, inzwai shoko iri:
Tererai inzwi ramashoko aŋgu.
Ko munhu, unoʋeŋga ɀakarurama, uŋgaɓata ʋushe here?
Muŋgapa mhoȿa munhu wakarurama, unesimba here?
Ko ɀakanaka kuti kunamambo:
Kana kuʋakuru:
Ndoɗa kumunhu usiŋgakudzi macinda,
Usiŋgatsauri ʋafumi kupfuʋura ʋarombo.
Nokuti iʋo ʋose ndiro ɓasa ramaʋoko ake.
Ʋanofa kamŋe‐kamŋe pakati poʋusiku;
Ʋanhu ʋanozozunuŋguswa ndokuparara haʋo,
Ʋanesimba ʋanobviswa ɀisiŋgaitwi noruʋoko.
Nokuti meso ake anotarira nzira dzomunhu,
Unoʋona kufamba kwake kwose.
Hapanerima kana mumvuri worufu,
Paŋgaʋanda ʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Nokuti haacafaniri kuraŋgarira munhu,
Kuti atoŋgwe pamberi paMŋari.
Unoparadza ʋanhu ʋanesimba asiŋganɀeri,
Ndokugadza ʋamŋe panɀimbo yaʋo.
Saka unocerekedza maɓasa aʋo;
Unoʋaparadza ʋusiku, ʋakapxanyiwa.
Unoʋaroʋa seɀinorobga ʋanhu ʋakaipa
Ʋamŋe ʋose ʋaciɀiʋona pacena;
Nokuti ʋakatsauka pakumuteʋera,
Ʋakasaʋa nehanya nenzira dzake dzose;
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaȿitsa kucema kwaʋarombo kwaari,
Akanzwa kucema kwaʋakatambudzwa.
Kana iye akazorodza, ndianiko uŋgapa mhoȿa?
Kana akaʋanza ciso cake, ndianiko uŋgazomuʋona?
Kana
Kuti munhu usakarurama arege kuɓata ʋushe,
Kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu ucateya ʋanhu.
Nokuti kunomunhu here wakati kunaMŋari:
Ndaraŋgwa haŋgu, kunyaŋge ndisina‐kutadza?
Ndidzidzisei ɀandisiŋgaʋoni;
Kana ndiciŋge ndaita ɀakaipa, handiŋgaɀiiti ɀe?
Ko iye ucatsiʋa seɀaunoɗa iwe, ɀaunoɀiramba here?
Nokuti ndiwe unofanira kusanaŋgura, handizi’ni;
Saka citaura ɀaunoziʋa.
Ʋanhu ʋanenjere ʋacati kwandiri,
Ʋuye ʋose ʋakacenjera, ʋanondinzwa,
Jobo unotaura ɀaasiŋgaziʋi,
Mashoko ake haanoʋucenjeri.
Ƌayi Jobo aiidzwa kuȿikira pakupedzisira,
Ɀaakapindura saʋanhu ʋakaipa.
Nokuti unowedzera kumukira
Unoroʋanya maʋoko ake pakati peɗu,
Aciwanza mashoko ake anorwa naMŋari.
Ɀino Erihu wakapindura, ʋo, akati:
Munoti ndiko kururama
Munoti: Kururama kwaŋgu kunopfuʋura kwaMŋari?
Ɀamunoti: Mucaɓatsirweiko naɀo?
Ndicawaneiko, ɀiŋgapfuʋura ɀandiŋgawana kana ndatadza haŋgu?
Ndicakupindurai,
Pamŋe cete neshamŋari dzenyu.
Tarirai kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga, muʋone;
Tarirai makore okuɗeŋga akakwirira kupfuʋura imi.
Kana muciŋge matadza, ko muŋgamuitei iye?
Kana kuɗarika kwenyu kuciŋge kwawanda, ko muŋgamuitei?
Kana makarurama, muŋgamupeiko?
Kana iye ucapiweiko paruʋoko rwenyu?
Kuipa kwenyu
Kururama kwenyu
Ʋanhu ʋanoridza mhere nokuɗa kwokumanikidza kwakawanda;
Ʋanoridza mhere kuti ʋarwirwe paruʋoko rwounesimba.
Asi hapana‐unoti: Mŋari Muiti waŋgu uripiko?
Iye unotiimbisa ʋusiku;
Iye unotidzidzisa kupfuʋura mhuka dzenyika,
Unotiita ʋakaceŋjera kupfuʋura shiri dzokuɗeŋga?
Ipapo ʋanocema, asi hapanaunopindura,
Nokuɗa kwokuɀikudza kwaʋanhu ʋakaipa.
Ɀirokwaɀo Mŋari haaŋganzwi ɀisinamaturo,
Wamasimba‐ose haaŋgaʋi nehanya naɀo.
Ndoɗa kana muciti, handimuʋoni;
Mhoȿa iri pamberi pake, cimumirirai henyu!
Asi ɀino, ɀaasina‐kutsiʋa pakutsamŋa kwake,
Kana kusaʋa nehanya ɀikuru nokuɀikudza;
Naiɀoɀo Jobo woshamisa muromo wake
Wowanza mashoko asiŋgaziʋi.
Erihu akapfuʋura ʋo, akati:
Nditenderei henyu ɀishoma, ndikuratidzei;
Nokuti ndicineɀimŋe ɀandinoɗa kutaura pamsoro paMŋari.
Ndicatora ziʋo yaŋgu kure,
Ndicaratidza kuti Muiti waŋgu wakarurama.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, mashoko aŋgu haanenhema;
Mumŋe wakakwana paziʋo une’mi.
Tarirai, Mŋari unesimba, asi haashoʋori munhu;
Imhare pasimba renjere.
Haaceŋgeti ʋupenyu bgaʋakaipa;
Asi unoruramisira ʋanotambudzika.
Haaregi kutarira ʋakarurama nameso ake;
Asi unoʋagarisa pacigaro coʋushe pamŋe cete namadzimambo,
Asi kana ʋaciŋge ʋasuŋgwa namaketani,
Kana kuɓatwa namaɓote okutambudzika;
Ipapo unoʋaziʋisa maɓasa aʋo,
Nokuɗarika kwaʋo, kuti ʋakafamba ʋaciɀikudza.
Unodziʋura ʋo nzeʋe dzaʋo ʋanzwe kuraira
Unoʋaraira kuti ʋadzoke paɀakaipa ɀaʋo.
Kana ʋakamunzwa nokumushumira,
Ʋacapedzisa mazuʋa aʋo ʋacifara,
Namakore aʋo ʋari paneɀinofadza.
Asi kana ʋakaramba kuterera, ʋacapera nomunondo,
Ʋacafa ʋasineziʋo.
Asi ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari pamŋoyo ʋanoɀiʋuŋganidzira kutsamŋa;
Haʋaridzi mhere kuti ʋaɓatsirwe kana aciʋasuŋga.
Ʋanofa ʋaciri ʋaɗuku,
Ʋupenyu bgaʋo
Unorwira unotambudzika pakutambudzika kwake,
Unodziʋura nzeʋe dzaʋo pakumanikidzwa
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakaŋga aciɗa kukubvisai panjodzi
Kukuȿitsai panɀimbo yakafara, pasina‐kumanikana;
Kuti ɀinoiswa patafura yenyu ɀiʋe ɀizere namafuta.
Asi imi muzere nokutoŋga ʋakaipa;
Kutoŋga nokururamisira ɀino
Nokuti cenjerai kuti kutsamŋa kurege kukuȿitsai pakuɗaɗira;
Ʋukuru bgedzikinuro ʋurege kukutsausai.
Ko fuma yenyu iŋgariŋgana, kuti murege kutambudzika here,
Ʋuye simba
Musashuʋa ʋusiku,
Paŋguʋa iyo ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzinobviswa panɀimbo yadzo.
Cenjerai, regai kuraŋgarira ɀakaipa;
Nokuti ndiɀo ɀamakasanaŋgura kupfuʋura kutambudzika.
Tarirai, Mŋari unoita ɀinhu ɀikuru nesimba rake;
Ndianiko mudzidzisi wakafanana naye?
Ndianiko wakamuraira nzira yake?
Kana ndianiko uŋgati: Makaita ɀisina‐kururama here?
Raŋgarirai, kuti murumbidze ɓasa rake,
Rakaimbga naʋanhu.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaritarira;
Ʋanhu ʋanoriʋona ʋari kure.
Tarirai, Mŋari mukuru; asi isu hatimuziʋi;
Kuwanda kwamakore ake hakuŋganɀerwi.
Nokuti unokweʋera kumsoro maɗonhedza emvura,
Anoshanduka mvura inonaya icibva pamŋando wawo;
Inoɗururwa namakore
Iciɗonhera yawanda pamsoro paʋanhu.
Ko kunomunhu uŋganzwisisa kudadanurwa kwamakore,
Nokutinhira kwetente rake here?
Tarirai, unodadanura ciedza cake kunhiʋi dzake dzose;
Unofukidza pasi peguŋgwa.
Nokuti naiɀoɀi unotoŋga ndudzi dzaʋanhu;
Unoʋapa ɀokudya ɀizhinji.
Unofukidza maʋoko ake nemheni;
Nokuiraira kuti iroʋe payakaratidzwa.
Mubvumo wayo unomuziʋisa,
Neŋombe ʋo
Ɀirokwaɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unobvunduswa ʋo pamsoro paiɀoɀi,
Ucibviswa panɀimbo yawo.
Tererai kutinhira kwenzwi rake,
Nokuwuŋga kunobva pamuromo wake.
Unokutuma pasi pedeŋga rose,
Nemheni yake kuȿikira pamagumisiro enyika.
Inoteʋerwa nenzwi rinodɀoʋa,
Unotinhira nenzwi roʋumambo bgake.
Haaɀidziʋisi kana inzwi rake ricinzwika.
Mŋari unotinhira nenzwi rake rinoshamisa;
Unoita ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀatisiŋgagoni kunzwisisa.
Nokuti unoti kucando: Ciwira panyika;
Saiɀoɀo ʋo kumvura inopfunhapfunha,
Ʋuye ʋo kumvura inoturuka nesimba.
Unodziʋisa ruʋoko rwomunhu mumŋe nomumŋe,
Kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋaakaita
Paŋguʋa iyo ɀikara ɀinondoʋanda,
Ɀicirambira mumapako aɀo.
Ƌutu remhepo rinoɓuɗa pakamuri
Necando kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Mazaya ecando anopiwa
Ʋuye mvura mhami inogwamba.
Unozadza makore matema nomŋando,
Unodadanura gore rinemheni yake.
Rinotendeʋudzwa nokufambisa kwake,
Kuti ɀiite ɀose ɀaanoɀiraira
Panyika inogarwa naʋanhu;
Ɀimŋe
Tererai shoko iri, nhasi Jobo;
Cimbomirai muraŋgarire maɓasa anoshamisa aMŋari.
Ko munoziʋa marairirwe aɀo naMŋari here,
Nokupenyiswa kwemheni yegore rake here?
Munoziʋa maturikirwe amakore here,
Namaɓasa anoshamisa aiye wakakwana paziʋo here?
Kana nyika yakagadzikana ne
Ko muŋgagona kudadanura ɗeŋga pamŋe cete naye,
Iro rakasimba seciʋoni‐ʋoni cakaʋumbga here?
Tidzidzisei ɀatiŋgareʋa kwaari;
Ko iye unofanira kuʋudzwa kuti ndinoɗa kutaura here?
Kana ndianiko munhu unoɗa kumedzwa?
Ɀino ʋanhu haʋagoni kutarira ciedza cinopenya kuɗeŋga;
Asi mhepo icapfuʋura, ndokurinatsa.
Kunaka sokwendarama kunobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro;
Mŋari unoʋumambo ʋunotyisa kwaɀo.
Haaŋgatambudzi pakutoŋga nokururama kukuru.
Saka ʋanhu ʋanomutya;
Haanehanya naʋanemŋoyo yakacenjera.
Ipapo Jehova wakapindura Jobo, ari pacampupuri, akati:
Ndianiko uya unodzima zano raŋgu aciriita rima
Namashoko asineziʋo here?
Ciɀisuŋga ciʋuno cako ɀino somurume;
Nokuti ndicakubvunzisisa, iwe undiɗudzire.
Iwe wakaŋga uripiko paŋguʋa yandakateya nheyo dzenyika?
Ciɗudzira, kana uneziʋo iwe.
Ndianiko wakatara kukura kwayo, kana uciɀiziʋa?
Kana ndianiko wakaiyera norwonzi?
Ko nheyo dzayo dzakateyiwa pamsoro pei?
Kana ndianiko wakateya ibge rayo rekona?
Paŋguʋa yakaimba nyeredzi dzamambakwedza pamawa,
Ʋuye ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaMŋari ʋacipururudza nomufaro?
Kana ndianiko wakadziʋira guŋgwa nemikoʋa,
Paŋguʋa yokudzutuka kwaro, riciɓuɗa paciɀaro;
Paŋguʋa yandaita gore ŋguʋo yaro,
Ʋuye rima guru uʋe muceka wokuriputira nawo;
Paŋguʋa yandakaritarira muganho waro,
Ndikariisira mazariro nemikoʋa,
Ndikati: Uŋgaȿikira pano, asi hauŋgapfuʋuri;
Mafuŋgu ako, anoɀikudza, acadziʋirirwa pano?
Iwe wakatoŋgoraira maŋgwanani kubva pakutaŋga kwamazuʋa ako here,
Ukaratidza mambakwedza nɀimbo yawo here?
Kuti aɓate migumo yenyika,
Ʋakaipa ʋazuzwe ʋabve pairi here?
Ɀinoshanduka sevu kana ricitsikwa necisimbiso,
Ʋakaipa ʋanodzitirirwa ciedza caʋo,
Ruʋoko, runoɀikudza, runovuniwa.
Iwe wakatoŋgopinda pamatsime eguŋgwa here?
Kana wakatoŋgofamba pakadzikadzika pasi here?
Masuʋo orufu akatoŋgokuzarurirwa here?
Kana wakatoŋgoʋona masuʋo omumvuri worufu here?
Wakatoŋgonzwisisa ʋupamhi bgenyika here?
Ƌudzira, kana uciɀiziʋa ɀose.
Nzira iripiko inoenda kunogara ciedza,
Kana riri rima, nɀimbo yaro iripiko?
Kuti undoɀiisa kumiganho yaɀo,
Ʋuye kuti uziʋe nzira dzinoenda kumusha waɀo here?
Uneŋge unoziʋa hako, nokuti wakaŋga wakaɀarwa paŋguʋa iyo!
Mazuʋa ako aneŋge akawanda kwaɀo!
Wakatoŋgopinda panoʋigwa fuma yamazaya ecando here,
Kana wakatoŋgoʋona panoʋigwa fuma yecimvuramabge here?
Iɀo ɀandakaceŋgetera ŋguʋa yenhamo,
Nezuʋa rokurwa nehondo here?
Ciedza cinoparadzaniswa nomutoʋo upiko,
Ʋuye mhepo inobva mabvazuʋa inopararira seiko panyika?
Ndianiko wakacerera ɓoporodzi remvura mugero,
Kana
Kuti mvura iniswe panyika isinaʋanhu,
Parenje pasinaʋanhu;
Kuti
Ʋuye ɓumhudza rimereswe here?
Ko mvura inonaya inaɓaɓa here?
Kana ndianiko wakaɀara maɗonhedza eɗoʋa?
Mazaya ecando akaɓuɗa muciɀaro caniko?
Ʋuye cando cokuɗeŋga ndianiko wakaciɓereka?
Mvura inogwamba sebge,
Guŋgwa rakadzika rinogwamba pamsoro paro.
Ko iwe uŋgasuŋga sumbu reCinyamutanhatu,
Kana kusunuŋgura ɀisuŋgo ɀeOrioni here?
Iwe uŋgaɓuɗisa Mazaroti paŋguʋa yawo here?
Kana uŋgagona kufambisa Arkturo naʋanakomana ʋayo here?
Iwe unoziʋa mitemo yokuɗeŋga here?
Iwe uŋgagona kuraira ʋushe bgaɀo panyika here?
Ko iwe uŋgaȿitsa inzwi rako kumakore,
Kuti ufukidzwe nemvura yakawanda here?
Iwe uŋgagona kutuma mheni, kuti dzifambe,
Dziciti kwauri: Tiri pano, here?
Ndianiko wakaisa ʋucenjeri mukati mamakore matema?
Kana ndianiko wakapa nyeredzi njere?
Ndianiko uŋgagona kuʋereŋga makore noʋucenjeri bgake here?
Kana ndianiko uŋgagona kuɗurura homboɗo dzemvura dzokuɗeŋga?
Kana guruʋa riciʋuŋgana pamŋe cete,
Namaviŋga acinamatirana here?
Ko iwe uŋgavimira shumbakadzi,
Kana kugutsa ʋana ʋeshumba here?
Kana idzo dzicitsiʋama panɀimba dzadzo,
Nokurambira pakaʋanda dziciʋandira here?
Ndianiko unogadzirira guŋguʋu ɀokudya ɀaro,
Kana ʋana ʋaro ʋacicema kunaMŋari,
Ʋacidzuŋgaira pose‐pose ʋacishaiwa ɀokudya.
Iwe unoziʋa ŋguʋa inoɓereka ŋgururu here?
Iwe uŋgagona kuʋereŋga mŋedzi yokutora kwadzo mazamu here?
Kana iwe unoziʋa ŋguʋa yadzinoɓereka nayo here?
Dzinokotama, ndokuɓereka ʋana ʋadzo,
Dzinorasha ʋushuŋgu bgadzo.
Ʋana ʋadzo ʋanosimba, ʋanokurira kusaŋgo;
Ʋanoenda ʋakasadzoka ɀe.
Ndianiko wakaregedza mbizi isinakusuŋgwa?
Kana ndianiko wakasunuŋgura ɀisuŋgo ɀembizi?
Ndakaita renje imba yayo,
Nenyika yeɓare ʋugaro bgayo.
Inoɀidza ɓope romuguta,
Hainzwi kucaira kwomucairi.
Nyika yamakomo ndiwo mafuro ayo,
Inotȿaka mashizha ose matema.
Ko nyati iŋgatenda kukuɓatira here?
Kana iŋgaʋata pacidyiro
Ko iwe uŋgasuŋga nyati negashu rayo mumuhoroŋga,
Kana iŋgaputsa maviŋga icikuteʋera here?
Uŋgaitenda, ɀainesimba guru here?
Kana kuiregera ɓasa rako here?
Uŋgaʋimba nayo kuti iise ɀiyo ɀako kuguta,
Nokuɀiʋuŋganidzira paɓuriro rako here?
Mhou inofara namapapiro ayo;
Ko mapapiro ayo neminheŋga yayo ɀinoʋunyoro here?
Nokuti inosiya mazai ayo pasi pavu,
Inoadziyisa muguruʋa,
Icikaŋganwa kuti aŋgapxanyiwa netsoka dzaʋanhu,
Kana kuti aŋgatsikwa neɀikara.
Inoʋaŋgararira ʋana ʋayo saʋaneŋge ʋasati ʋari ʋayo;
Kunyaŋge yakatambudzikira pasina, hainehanya;
Nokuti Mŋari wakaitorera ʋucenjeri,
Haana‐kuipa njere.
Paŋguʋa yainosimuka kuti itize,
Inoshoʋora biza nomutaȿi waro.
Iwe wakapa biza simba raro here?
Ndiwe wakashoŋgedza mutsipa waro nezenze rinopepereka here?
Iwe wakaricirikisa semhashu here?
Simba rokupfeza kwaro rinotyisa.
Rinoteta pasi mumupata, ricifarira simba raro;
Rinoɓuɗa kundoshoŋgana naʋarume ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa nadzo.
Rinoseka kutya, harivunduswi;
Haridzoki
Goɓa rinorira pamsoro paro,
Ʋuye pfumo neɓakatwa ɀinopenya.
Rinopedza pasi nokutsamŋa nehasha;
Harimiri kana ricinzwa inzwi rehwamanda.
Ŋguʋa ipi neipi kana hwamanda
Rinofembedza kurwa kana kuciri kure,
Nokutinhira kwamacinda, neɓope.
Ko ruʋaŋgu runoeŋgerera noʋucenjeri bgako here,
Rucitambanudzira mapapiro arwo kurutiʋi rwezasi here?
Ko gondo rinokwira nokuraira kwako,
Ricindoʋaka ɗendere raro pakakwirira here?
Rinogara paɗombo, riciʋata’po,
Pashoŋgwe yeɗombo napanhare.
Rinonaŋanidza ɀokudya ɀaro riri’po,
Meso aro anoɀiʋona ɀiri kure.
Ʋana ʋaro ʋo ʋanoȿeta ropa;
Panecakaʋurawa ndipo pariri.
Ɀino Jehova wakapfuʋura kupindura Jobo, akati:
Ko munhu, unokakaʋara, uŋgaita nharo noWamasimba‐ose here?
Unoita nharo naMŋari ŋgaapindure.
Ipapo Jobo akapindura Jehova, akati:
Tarirai, ini ndiri muɗuku haŋgu; ndiŋgakupindurai here?
Ndinofumbira muromo waŋgu.
Ndakataura kamŋe, asi handiŋgapinduri ɀe;
Ɀirokwaɀo kaʋiri, asi handiŋgapamhidzi ɀe.
Ipapo Jehova wakapindura Jobo ari mucampupuri, akati:
Ciɀisuŋga ciʋuno cako ɀino somurume;
Ndicakubvunzisisa, iwe undipindure.
Ko iwe unoɗa kukaŋganisa kutoŋga kwaŋgu,
Unoɗa kundipa mhoȿa, kuti iwe ururamiswe here?
Iwe unoruʋoko rwakafanana norwaMŋari here?
Iwe uŋgatinhira nenzwi rakafanana nerake here?
Ciɀishoŋgedza ɀino noʋukuru nokukudzwa;
Uɀifukidze nokurumbidzwa noʋumambo.
Ƌurura hasha dzako dzinopfacuka;
Utarire mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀikudza, umuninipise.
Tarira mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀikudza, umuɗeredze.
Tsika pasi ʋakaipa ipapo paʋamire.
Uʋaʋige pamŋe cete paguruʋa;
Suŋga ɀiso ɀaʋo pakaʋanda.
Ipapo ndicakurumbidza ʋo,
Ndiciti ruʋoko rwako rworudyi ruŋgakuponesa.
Tarira ɀino mvuʋu, yandakaita pamŋe cete newe;
Inodya ʋuswa senzombe.
Tarira ɀino simba rayo riri muciʋuno cayo;
Kusimba kwayo kuri pamakakaʋa eɗumbu rayo.
Inotȿikidza muswe wayo somusidari;
Marunda eɀitumbi ɀayo akarukwa-rukwa.
Mafupa ayo akafanana nendarira dzinemhaŋgo;
Mbabvu dzayo dzakafanana namazariro amatare.
Ndiyo huru pamaɓasa aMŋari;
Iye, wakaiita, wakaipa munondo wayo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, makomo anoiʋigira ɀokudya ɀayo;
Ipapo panotamba mhuka dzose dzesaŋgo.
Inoʋata pasi pemiti yemirotusi,
Pamumvuri wetsaŋga napamuroʋe.
Miti yemirotusi inoifukidza nomumvuri wayo;
Mikonacando yomurukoʋa inoipoteredza.
Tarira, kana rwizi rukafema nokunze, haiɗeɗeri;
Haityi, kunyaŋge Joridani rukazara kuȿikira pamuromo wayo.
Ko munhu uŋgaiɓata kana yakarindira here,
Kana kuʋurura mhino dzayo norwauro here?
Ko uŋgagona kuɓata ŋgwena neciredzo,
Kana kutsikirira rurimi rwayo norwonzi here?
Uŋgagona kupinza rwauro pamhino dzayo,
Kana kuʋurura rushaya rwayo necikokoʋonho?
Ko iŋgakunyeŋgetera ɀikuru here?
Kana iŋgataura mashoko manyoro kwauri?
Iŋgaita suŋgano newe here,
Kuti uiite muranda wako nokusiŋgaperi?
Uŋgatamba nayo seɀauŋgaita neshiri here?
Kana uŋgaisuŋga kuti ʋanasikana ʋako ʋatambe nayo?
Mapoka aʋaɓati ʋehoʋe aŋgaiteŋgesa here?
Ʋaŋgaigoʋera ʋateŋgi?
Uŋgagona kuzadza ganda rayo nemiseʋe yenzeʋe here,
Kana musoro wayo namapfumo ehoʋe?
Isa ruʋoko rwako pamsoro payo;
Raŋgarira kurwa, hauŋgapamhidzi ɀe.
Tarira, tariro yake hapana;
Munhu haaŋgaʋori mŋoyo nokuiʋona ɓedzi here?
Hakunomunhu unotyisa uŋgatsuŋga kuiʋamba,
Ɀino ndianiko uŋgagona kumira pamberi paŋgu here?
Ndinaniko wakataŋga kundipa, kuti ndifanire kumuripira ɀe?
Handiŋganyarari kurondedzera mitezo yayo,
Kana simba rayo, kana muturu wayo wakanaka.
Ndianiko uŋgagona kubvisa ŋguʋo yayo yokunze?
Ndianiko uŋgapinda pakati pemisara miʋiri yameno ayo?
Ndianiko uŋgagona kuzarura mikoʋa yeciso cayo?
Pameno payo panotyisa kwaɀo.
Makwande ayo, anesimba, ndiko kuɀikudza kwayo;
Akaɓatanidzwa necisimbiso cakaɓata.
Ari pedyo nepedyo,
Mhepo haigoni kupinda napakati pawo.
Akaɓatanidzwa;
Anonamatirana, haaŋgaparadzaniswi.
Kuhotsira kwayo kunopenya ciedza;
Meso ayo akafanana namafuŋgiro amaŋgwanani.
Mumuromo mayo munoɓuɗa mazhenje anopfuta;
Masasaradzi omŋoto anoɓarika acibva’mo.
Ʋutsi ʋunoɓuɗa pamhino dzayo,
Sapahari inoʋira nenhokwe
Mŋeya wayo unoɓatidza masimbe,
Ʋuye muraɀo womŋoto unoɓuɗa mumuromo mayo.
Simba rinogara mumutsipa wayo,
Kutyisa kunotamba pamberi payo.
Nyama dzayo dzakaɓatanidzwa kumatiʋi ose,
Dzakasimba pairi, hadziŋgazunuŋguswi.
Mŋoyo wayo wakasimba sebge;
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakasimba seguyo.
Kana icisimuka, ʋanesimba ʋanotya;
Ʋanopeŋga nokuvunduswa.
Kana munhu akaitema nomunondo, haunesimba;
Kunyaŋge nepfumo, kana nomuseʋe, kana matare anopinza.
Iyo inoti matare mashaŋga,
Museʋe hauŋgaitizisi;
Mabge anoposhwa necifuramabge inoti makoto.
Tȿimbo dzakaita samakoto;
Inoseka kana icinzwa kuwuŋga kweɓakatwa.
Pasi payo pakafanana neɀaeŋga ɀinoceka;
Inoita sokukwekweredza cireyi cinembambo mumatope.
Inoʋirisa
Inoita guŋgwa samafuta okuzora.
Inotara nzira inopenya shure kwayo;
Ɀimŋe munhu uŋgati,
Panyika hapana‐cakafanana nayo,
Cakaitwa cisina‐kutya.
Inoʋona ɀose ɀakakwirira;
Ndiyo mambo weɀikara ɀose ɀinoɀikudza.
Ipapo Jobo wakapindura Jehova, akati:
Ndinoziʋa kuti imi munogona kuita ɀose,
Ʋuye kuti hakuna‐camunoʋaʋarira ɀiŋgadziʋiswa.
Ndianiko uyu unodzikatira zano
Naiɀoɀo ndakataura ɀandakaŋga ndisiŋganzwisisi,
Ɀinhu ɀakandishamisa kwaɀo, ɀandakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi.
Ciɗonzwai henyu, nditaure ini;
Ndicakubvunzai, imi mundiɗudzire.
Ndakaŋga ndanzwa ɀenyu nokunzwa kwenzeʋe;
Asi ɀino ziso raŋgu rinokuʋonai,
Saka ndinoɀisema, nokuɀiɗemba
Muguruʋa namaɗota.

Ɀino Jehova wakati ataura mashoko iwayo kunaJobo, Jehova akati kunaErifazi muTemani: Ndakutsamŋira kwaɀo iwe neshamŋari dzako mbiri, nokuti imi hamuna‐kutaura ɀakarurama pamsoro paŋgu, seɀakaita muranda waŋgu Jobo.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino citorai nzombe nomŋe namakondobge manomŋe, muende kumuranda waŋgu Jobo, muɀipisire cipiriso cinopiswa; ɀino muranda waŋgu Jobo ucakunyeŋgetererai; nokuti ndicamugamucira iye, kuti ndirege kukuitirai ɀakaenzana noʋupenzi bgenyu; nokuti imi hamuna‐kutaura pamsoro paŋgu ɀakarurama, seɀakaita muranda waŋgu Jobo.
Ɀino Erifazi muTemani, naBirdadi muShuhi, naZofari muNaamati, ʋakandoita seɀaʋakarairwa naJehova; Jehova akagamucira Jobo.
Jehova akashandura kutapxa kwaJobo ŋguʋa yaakanyeŋgeterera shamŋari dzake; Jehova akapa Jobo ɀaakaŋga anaɀo pakutaŋga kaʋiri.

Ipapo ʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋose, nehanɀadzi dzake dzose, naʋazikani ʋake ʋose ʋaimuziʋa kare ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakadya ɀokudya mumba make; ʋakamuɗemba nokumunyaradza pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaʋuyiswa naJehova pamsoro pake; munhu mumŋe nomumŋe wakamupa ʋo cimari, nomumŋe nomumŋe cindori cendarama.

Saiɀoɀo Jehova akaropafadza kupedzisira kwaJobo kupfuʋura kutaŋga kwake; wakaŋga anamakwai aneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀinna, namakamera aneɀuru ɀitanhatu, nenzombe dziŋgasuŋgwa pamajoko dzinecuru cimŋe, namakadzi emboŋgoro anecuru cimŋe.
Akazoʋa ʋo naʋanakomana ʋanomŋe naʋanasikana ʋatatu.
Akatumidza wokutaŋga zita rinonzi Jemima, nowecipiri zita rinonzi Kezia, nowecitatu zita rinonzi Kereni‐hapuki.
Panyika yose hapana‐kuwanikwa ʋakadzi ʋakanaka paɀiso ɀaʋo ʋakapfuʋura ʋakunda ʋaJobo; ɓaɓa ʋaʋo ʋakaʋapa ʋo nhaka pakati pehanɀadzi dzaʋo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jobo wakazogara makore anezana namakumi manna, akaʋona ʋanakomana ʋake, naʋanakomana ʋaʋanakomana ʋake,
Ɀino Jobo akazofa, akwegura, aʋa namazuʋa mazhinji.
Wakakomborerwa munhu usiŋgafambi panoraŋgana ʋakaipa,
Usiŋgamiri panzira yaʋatadzi,
Usiŋgagari panogara ʋaɗaɗi.
Asi unofarira murairo waJehova;
Unofuŋgisisa murairo wake masikati noʋusiku.
Ucafanana nomuti wakasimŋa pahoʋa dzemvura,
Unoɓereka micero yawo neŋguʋa yawo,
Mashizha awo haaȿaʋi;
Cinhu cipi necipi caanoita cicaendika.
Ʋakaipa haʋana‐kuɗaro;
Asi ʋakafanana nehundi inopepereswa nemhepo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaipa haʋaŋgamiri pakutoŋgeswa,
Naʋatadzi paʋuŋgano yaʋakarurama.
Nokuti Jehova unoziʋa nzira yaʋakarurama;
Asi nzira yaʋakaipa icaparadzwa.
Ndudzi dzinoitireiko ɓope,
Naʋanhu ʋanofuŋgireiko ɀisinamaturo?
Madzimambo enyika anoɀigadzira,
Naʋaɓati ʋanoraŋgana,
Kuzorwa naJehova nomuzodziwa wake,
Ŋgatiɗambure ɀisuŋgo ɀaʋo,
Ŋgatirashe maɓote aʋo abve kwatiri.
Iye, ugere kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga, ucaseka;
Ishe ucaʋaɗaɗira.
Ipapo ucataura kwaʋari pakutsamŋa kwake,
Nokuʋavundusa pahasha dzake huru;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ini ndakagadza mambo waŋgu
PaZioni, iro gomo raŋgu dɀene.
Ndicaparidza cireʋo,
Jehova wakati kwandiri: Ndiwe mŋanakomana waŋgu;
Nhasi ndakakuɓereka.
Kumbira kwandiri, ndi
Nemigumo yenyika ɀiʋe ɀako.
Mucaʋapxanya netȿimbo yoʋutare;
Mucaʋaputsanya sehari yomuʋumbi.
Ɀino ciʋai nenjere, imi madzimambo;
Munyeʋerwe, imi ʋatoŋgi ʋenyika.
Shumirai Jehova nokutya,
Mufare muciɗeɗera.
Ȿetai mŋanakomana, arege kutsamŋa, mufire panzira,
Nokuti hasha dzake dziŋgakurumidza kumuka.
Ʋakakomborerwa ʋose ʋanoʋimba naye.
Haiwa Jehova, ʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu ʋawanda sei!
Ʋazhinji ʋanondimukira.
Ʋazhinji ʋari’ko ʋanoti kumŋeya waŋgu:
Haano‐ruponeso kunaMŋari.
Asi imi Jehova muri nhoʋo yaŋgu kumatiʋi ose;
Kudzo yaŋgu, nomusimudzi womusoro waŋgu,
Ndinoɗana kunaJehova nenzwi raŋgu,
Iye unondipindura ari pagomo rake dɀene.
Ndakaʋata pasi ndikaɓatwa nehope;
Ndikamuka; nokuti Jehova unonditsigira.
Handiŋgatyi ɀuru ɀamazana ɀaʋanhu,
Ʋakandikomberedza kuzorwa neni.
Simukai, Jehova; ndirwirei, Mŋari waŋgu;
Nokuti makaroʋa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋose pashaya dzaʋo;
Makavuna meno aʋakaipa.
Ruponeso runobva kunaJehova;
Kukomborera kwenyu ŋgakuʋe pamsoro paʋanhu ʋenyu.
Ndipindurei kana ndiciɗana, Mŋari wokururama kwaŋgu;
Pakumanikidzwa kwaŋgu makandiisa pakafarikana;
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, munzwe munyeŋgetero waŋgu.
Nhai ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu, kukudzwa kwaŋgu kucashandurwa kunyadziswa kuȿikira riniko?
Mucaɗa ɀisinamaturo, nokutȿaka nhema kuȿikira rini?
Asi ziʋai kuti Jehova wakaɀitsaurira munhu unomuɗa:
Jehova ucanzwa kana ndiciɗana kwaari.
Ityai, murege kutadza;
Tauriranai nemŋoyo yenyu panhoʋo dzenyu, muti ŋwii.
Ƃayirai ɀiɓayiro ɀokururama,
Muʋimbe naJehova.
Ʋazhinji ʋari’ko ʋanoti: Ndianiko ucatiratidza ɀakanaka?
Jehova, simudzirai pamsoro peɗu ciedza ceciso cenyu.
Makaisa mufaro mumŋoyo maŋgu,
Unopfuʋura
Ndicaʋata pasi norugare, ndiɓatwe nehope;
Nokuti ndimi moga Jehova munondigarisa pakasimba.
Inzwai mashoko aŋgu, Jehova,
Raŋgarirai kufuŋga kwomŋoyo waŋgu.
Tererai inzwi rokucema kwaŋgu, imi Mambo waŋgu, naMŋari waŋgu;
Nokuti ndinonyeŋgetera kwamuri.
Jehova, mucanzwa inzwi raŋgu maŋgwanani;
Maŋgwanani ndicakuroŋgedzerai
Nokuti hamuzi Mŋari unofarira ɀakaipa;
Munhu, wakashata, haaŋgagari nemi.
Munhu, unoɀikudza, haaŋgamiri pamberi penyu;
Munoʋeŋga ʋose ʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Mucaparadza ʋanoreʋa nhema;
Jehova unosema munhu unoteʋura ropa nounonyeŋgera.
Asi kana ndirini, ndicapinda mumba menyu nokuwanda kwoʋunyoro bgenyu,
Ndicanamata ndakariŋgira kutembere yenyu tȿene ndicikutyai.
Ndifambisei, Jehova, mukururama kwenyu nokuɗa kwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
Gadzirai nzira yenyu pamberi paŋgu.
Nokuti hapana‐kutendeka pamiromo yaʋo;
Mukati maʋo makashata‐shata;
Huro dzaʋo bgiro bgakashama;
Ʋanoɓata kumeso norurimi rwaʋo.
Muʋapei mhoȿa, Jehova;
Ŋgaʋawe namano aʋo;
Muʋadziŋge nokuɗa kwokuwanda kwokuɗarika kwaʋo;
Nokuti ʋakakumukirai.
Asi ʋose ʋanoʋimba nemi ŋgaʋafare,
Ŋgaʋaɗanidzire nomufaro ŋguʋa dzose, nokuti imi munoʋadzitira;
Ʋose ʋanoɗa zita renyu ŋgaʋafare nemi.
Nokuti mucaropafadza wakarurama;
Imi Jehova, mucamukomberedza nenyasha senhoʋo.
Haiwa Jehova, regai kundiraira pakutsamŋa kwenyu,
Musandiroʋa nokusafara kwenyu kukuru.
Ndinzwirei nyasha, Jehova; nokuti ndawonda;
Ndiporisei, Jehova; nokuti mafupa aŋgu anotambudzika.
Mŋeya waŋgu unotambudzika ʋo ɀikuru;
Asi imi Jehova,
Dzokai Jehova, murwire mŋeya waŋgu;
Ndiponesei nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu.
Nokuti parufu hapana‐ucakuraŋgarirai;
Ndiani ucakuʋoŋgai paSheori?
Ndaneta nokugomba kwaŋgu;
Ʋusiku ʋumŋe noʋumŋe ndinoshambirisa nhoʋo dzaŋgu;
Ndinonyoroɀa mubeda waŋgu nemisodzi yaŋgu.
Ziso raŋgu rapera nokucema,
Rinosakara nokuɗa kwaʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu.
Ibvai kwandiri, imi ʋaɓati ʋose ʋeɀakaipa;
Nokuti Jehova wakanzwa inzwi rokucema kwaŋgu.
Jehova wakanzwa kukumbira kwaŋgu;
Jehova ucagamucira munyeŋgetero waŋgu.
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋacanyadzwa nokutambudzika ɀikuru;
Ʋacadzoka, ʋacanyadzwa pakarepo.
Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, ndinoʋimba nemi;
Ndiponesei kunaʋose ʋanonditeʋerera, mundirwirei;
Kuti arege kubvambura mŋeya waŋgu seshumba,
Aubvamburanye, ndicishaiwa unondirwira.
Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, kana ndiciŋge ndakaita iɀoɀi;
Kana ɀakaipa ɀiri’mo mumaʋoko aŋgu;
Kana ndiciŋge ndakaitira ɀakaipa munhu waiʋa noʋukama neni;
(Iɀo, ndakarwira waiʋa mudziʋisi waŋgu ndisinemhoȿa;)
Muʋeŋgi ŋgaateʋerere mŋeya waŋgu, auɓate;
Ŋgaatsikire ʋupenyu bgaŋgu pasi,
Aise kukudzwa kwaŋgu muguruʋa.
Simukai Jehova, pakutsamŋa kwenyu,
Simukirai hasha dzaʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu;
Mumuke nokuɗa kwaŋgu; ndimi makaraira kuti ɀakarurama ɀiitwe.
Ʋuŋgano yendudzi dzaʋanhu ŋgaikupoteredzei;
Mudzokere kumsoro pamsoro paʋo.
Jehova unotoŋga ndudzi dzaʋanhu;
Nditoŋgei Jehova sokururama kwaŋgu, ʋuye neɀokwaɗi iri mandiri.
Haiwa, kuipa kwaʋakaipa ŋgakugume, asi simbisai wakarurama;
Nokuti Mŋari, wakarurama, unoidza mŋoyo netȿo.
Nhoʋo yaŋgu iri kunaMŋari,
Iye unoponesa ʋanemŋoyo yakarurama.
Mŋari mutoŋgi wakarurama,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndiMŋari unoȿotwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Kana munhu asiŋgatendeʋuki, iye ucarodza munondo wake;
Wakakuŋga ʋuta bgake, akaʋugadzira.
Wakaɀigadzirira ʋo nhumbi dzokuʋuraya nadzo;
Unoɀiitira miseʋe inopisa.
Tarira, unotambudzika pakuɓereka ɀakaipa;
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakaʋa nemimba yeɀakashata, akaɓereka nhema.
Wakacera hunza, akaidzikisa,
Akawira mugomba raakacera iye.
Ɀakashata ɀake ɀicadzokera pamusoro wake amene,
Ʋuye kumanikidza kwake kucaʋuya pamsoro peɗehenya rake.
Ndicaʋoŋga Jehova nokuɗa kwokururama kwake;
Ndicaimbira zita raJehova Wokumsoro‐soro.
Haiwa Jehova, Ishe weɗu,
Zita renyu rakaiȿo‐naka sei panyika yose!
Makaisa ʋumambo bgenyu kuɗeŋga.
Pamiromo yaʋacece naʋanomŋa makaisa simba,
Nokuɗa kwaʋadziʋisi ʋenyu,
Kuti munyaradze muʋeŋgi nomutsiʋi.
Kana ndicicerekedza ɗeŋga renyu rose, iro ɓasa reminwe yenyu,
Mŋedzi nenyeredzi ɀamakaroŋgedza;
Munhu cinyiko, ɀamunomufuŋga?
Nomŋanakomana womunhu ɀamunomushanyira?
Nokuti makamuita muɗuku ɀishoma kunaMŋari,
Makamushoŋgedza korona yokubginya nokukudzwa.
Makamuɓatisa ʋushe bgamaɓasa amaʋoko enyu;
Makaisa ɀose pasi petsoka dzake.
Makwai ose nenzombe,
Nemhuka dzesaŋgo;
Neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, nehoʋe dzeguŋgwa,
Iɀo ɀose ɀinofamba nenzira dzeguŋgwa.
Haiwa Jehova, Ishe weɗu,
Zita renyu rakaiȿo‐naka sei panyika yose!
Ndicaʋoŋga Jehova nomŋoyo waŋgu wose;
Ndicaparidza maɓasa enyu ose anoshamisa.
Ndicafara nokukufarirai ɀikuru;
Ndicaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi Wokumsoro‐soro.
Kana ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋacidzokera shure,
Ʋanogumburwa nokupera pamberi penyu.
Nokuti mandiruramisira mhoȿa yaŋgu;
Makagara pacigaro coʋushe mucitoŋga nokururama.
Makatuka ʋahedeni, makaparadza ʋakaipa,
Makadzima zita raʋo nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋakapera, ʋakaparadzwa nokusiŋgaperi;
Makaparadza maguta aʋo,
Neciyeʋudzo cawo cakaparara.
Asi Jehova ugere
Wakagadzira cigaro cake coʋushe kuti atoŋge.
Ucatoŋga nyika nokururama,
Ucatoŋga ʋanhu ɀakafanira.
Jehova ucaʋa nhare yakasimba kunaʋanomanikidzwa,
Nhare yakasimba paŋguʋa yokutambudzika.
Ʋanoziʋa zita renyu ʋacaʋimba nemi;
Nokuti imi Jehova hamuna‐kurasha ʋanokutȿakai.
Imbirai Jehova nziyo dzokumurumbidza, iye ugere paZioni;
Ƌudzirai ɀaakaita pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu.
Nokuti iye, unotsiʋa ropa, unoʋaraŋgarira;
Haakaŋganwi kucema kwaʋarombo.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Jehova;
Tarirai kumanikidzwa kwaŋgu naʋanondiʋeŋga,
Imi munondisimudza pamisuʋo yorufu;
Kuti ndiparidze kurumbidzwa kwenyu kwose;
Pamisuʋo yomukunda weZioni,
Ndicafarira kuponesa kwenyu.
Ʋahedeni ʋakanyura mugomba raʋakacera;
Rutsoka rwaʋo rwakaɓatwa mumumbure, waʋakaʋanza.
Jehova wakaɀiziʋisa, wakatoŋga;
Wakaipa wakateyiwa neɓasa ramaʋoko ake.
Wakaipa ucadzokera kuSheori,
Iʋo ʋahedeni ʋose, ʋakakaŋganwa Mŋari.
Nokuti unoshaiwa haaŋgakaŋganikwi nokusiŋgaperi,
Nokutarira kwomurombo hakuŋgaperi nokusiŋgaperi.
Simukai Jehova; munhu ŋgaarege kukunda;
Ʋahedeni ŋgaʋatoŋgwe pamberi penyu.
Ciʋatyisai, Jehova;
Ʋahedeni ŋgaʋaziʋe kuti ʋanoŋgoʋa ʋanhu.
Munomirireiko kure, Jehova?
Munoɀiʋanzireiko paŋguʋa dzokutambudzika?
Pakuɀikudza kwake wakaipa unotambudza murombo ɀikuru;
Ŋgaʋaɓatwe namano aʋakafuŋga.
Nokuti wakaipa unoɀirumbidza pamsoro peɀinoɗa mŋoyo wake,
Unoruciʋa unoramba Jehova nokumuɀidza.
Nokuɀikudza kweciso cake, wakaipa
Ndaŋgariro dzake dzose dzinoti: HakunaMŋari.
Nzira dzake dzakasimba ŋguʋa dzose;
Ɀamunotoŋga imi ɀiri kure kumsoro, haaɀiʋoni;
Kana ʋari ʋadziʋisi ʋake ʋose, unoʋashoʋora.
Unoti mumŋoyo make: Handiŋgazunuŋguswi;
Handiŋgaʋi panhamo kuȿikira kumarudzi
Muromo wake uzere nokutuka nokunyeŋgera nokumanikidza;
Ɀakashata neɀakaipa ɀiri pasi porurimi rwake.
Unogara panɀimbo dzokuʋanda dzemisha;
Pakaʋanda ndi’po paanoʋuraya usinemhoȿa;
Meso ake anoʋandira usina‐wokumuɓatsira.
Unoʋandira pakaʋanda seshumba panɀimba yayo;
Unoʋanda kuti aɓate murombo;
Unoɓata murombo, kana acimukakatira mumumbure wake.
Unonyaŋgira, unokotama pasi,
Ʋasinomuɓatsiri ʋanowiswa nesimba rake.
Unoti mumŋoyo make: Mŋari wakaŋganwa;
Unoʋanza ciso cake, haaŋgatoŋgoɀiʋoni.
Simukai Jehova; Mŋari simudzai ruʋoko rwenyu;
Regai kukaŋganwa ʋarombo.
Wakaipa unoɀidzireiko Mŋari,
Aciti mumŋoyo wake: Haaŋgabvunzi?
Maɀiʋona henyu; nokuti munoʋona kutambudzika nokucema, kuti muɀiɓate muruʋoko rwenyu;
Usinomuɓatsiri unoɀiisa kwamuri;
Makaʋa muɓatsiri wenherera.
Vunai ruʋoko rwowakaipa.
Kana ari munhu wakashata, nɀerai ɀakaipa ɀake, kuȿikira musiŋgazoɀiwani.
Jehova ndiye Mambo nokusiŋgaperi‐peri;
Ʋahedeni ʋakaparadzwa munyika yake.
Jehova, makanzwa ɀinoɗikanwa naʋanyoro;
Mucasimbisa mŋoyo yaʋo, mucarerekera nzeʋe yenyu;
Kuti mutoŋgere nherera nounotambudzwa,
Kuti munhu wapanyika arege kuramba acivundusa.
Ndinoʋimba naJehova;
Munoreʋa seiko kumŋeya waŋgu,
Tizira kugomo rako seshiri?
Nokuti, tarira, ʋakaipa ʋanowembura ʋuta,
Ʋanogadzira museʋe waʋo parukuŋgiso,
Kuti ʋafure unomŋoyo wakarurama parima.
Kana nheyo dzakaparadzwa,
Wakarurama uŋgaiteiko?
Jehova uri mutembere yake tȿene,
Iye Jehova, cigaro cake coʋushe ciri kuɗeŋga;
Meso ake anotarira, mafuŋgiro ameso ake anoidza ʋana ʋaʋanhu.
Jehova unoidza ʋakarurama;
Asi mŋeya wake unoʋeŋga wakaipa nounomanikidza.
Ucanisira misuŋgo pamsoro paʋakaipa;
Mŋoto nesurferi nemhepo inopisa, ndiwo ucaʋa mukombe waʋo waʋakagoʋerwa.
Nokuti Jehova wakarurama; unoɗa ɀakarurama;
Wakarurama ucaʋona ciso cake.
Ƃatsirai, Jehova; nokuti ʋanoɗa Mŋari ʋopera;
Nokuti ʋakatendeka haʋaci’po pakati paʋana ʋaʋanhu.
Ʋanotaura mumŋe nomumŋe ɀisinamaturo nowokwake;
Ʋanotaura nomuromo unoɓata kumeso, ʋuye nemŋoyo miʋiri.
Jehova ucagura miromo yose inoɓata kumeso,
Norurimi runotaura ɀinhu ɀikuru;
Iʋo ʋakati: Ticakunda norurimi rweɗu;
Miromo yeɗu ndeyeɗu pamakanda; ndianiko uŋgaʋa ishe weɗu?
Nokuɗa kwokumanikidzwa kwaʋarombo, nokugomera kwaʋanoshaiwa,
Ndicamuka ɀino nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo: ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova;
Ndicamuisa pakasimba ipo paanoshuʋa.
Mashoko aJehova mashoko akacena;
Sesirveri yakaidzwa muɓisiro panyika,
Yakanatswa kanomŋe.
Mucaʋaceŋgeta, Jehova,
Mucaʋaceŋgeta parudzi urwu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋakaipa ʋanofamba pamatiʋi ose,
Kana ɀakashata ɀicikudzwa pakati paʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.
Jehova mucandikaŋganwa nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira rini?
Mucandiʋanzira ciso cenyu kuȿikira riniko?
Ndicafuŋga mano mumŋeya maŋgu kuȿikira rini,
Ndineshuŋgu pamŋoyo paŋgu zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe?
Muʋeŋgi waŋgu ucandikurira kuȿikira rini?
Raŋgarirai, mundipindure, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu;
Venekerai meso aŋgu, ndirege kuʋata hope dzokufa;
Muʋeŋgi waŋgu arege kuti: Ndamukunda;
Ʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu ʋarege kufara kana ndicizunuŋguka.
Asi ndakaʋimba nenyasha dzenyu;
Mŋoyo waŋgu ucafara nokuponesa kwenyu;
Ndicaimbira Jehova,
Nokuti wakandiitira ɀakanaka.
Ƃenzi rakati mumŋoyo maro: Mŋari haako.
Ʋakaʋora, ʋakaɓata maɓasa anonyaŋgadza;
Hapana‐unoita ɀakanaka.
Jehova ari kuɗeŋga, wakatarira pasi kuʋana va ʋanhu,
Kuti aʋone kana wakacenjera ari’po,
Unotȿaka Mŋari.
Ʋakatsauka ʋose, ʋakaȿiɓiswa pamŋe cete;
Hapana‐unoita ɀakanaka, kunyaŋge nomumŋe.
Ko ʋaiti ʋose ʋeɀakaipa haʋaneziʋo here?
Iʋo ʋanodya ʋanhu ʋaŋgu seɀaʋanodya ciŋgwa,
Ʋasiŋgaɗani kunaJehova.
Ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ɀikuru ipapo;
Nokuti Mŋari unogara parudzi rwaʋakarurama.
Munonyadzisa zano romurombo,
Asi Jehova ndiye ʋutiziro bgake.
Ƌayi kuponeswa kwaIsraeri kwaibva paZioni!
Kana Jehova acidzosa ʋanhu ʋake pakutapxa,
Ipapo Jakobo ucafarisisa kwaɀo, naIsraeri ucafara.
Jehova, ndianiko uŋgatsaukira mutente renyu?
Ndianiko uŋgagara pagomo renyu dɀene?
Uyo, unofamba asinemhoȿa, unoita ɀakarurama,
Unotaura ɀokwaɗi mumŋoyo make.
Iye usinamakuhwa parurimi rwake,
Usiŋgaitiri shamŋari yake ɀakaipa,
Usiŋgatuki waagere naye.
Munhu wakashata unoɀidzwa naye;
Asi unokudza ʋanotya Jehova.
Iye unoti kana aciŋge apika, haaŋgazoshanduri
Iye usiŋgareʋi mhindu pamari yake,
Kana kugamucira cipo pamsoro pousinemhoȿa.
Munhu unoita ɀinhu iɀeɀi haaŋgatoŋgozunuŋguswi.
Ndiceŋgetei, Mŋari; nokuti ndinoʋimba nemi.
Ndakati kunaJehova: Ndimi Ishe waŋgu;
Kunze kwenyu handinecinhu cakanaka.
Kana ʋari ʋatȿene, ʋari panyika,
Ndiʋo ʋakaiȿo‐naka ʋandinofarira ɀikuru.
Kucema kucawanzwa kwaʋanoʋigira mumŋe
Ɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀinoɗururwa ɀeropa handiŋgaɀiɗururi,
Namazita aʋo handiŋgaareʋi nemiromo yaŋgu.
Jehova ndiye mugoʋe wenhaka yaŋgu nowomukombe waŋgu;
Munoceŋgeta mugoʋe waŋgu.
Rwonzi rwokuyera rwakandiyerera nɀimbo dzakanaka;
Ɀirokwaɀo, nhaka yaŋgu yakaiȿo‐naka.
Ndicarumbidza Jehova wakandipa mano,
Ɀirokwaɀo, itȿo dzaŋgu dzinondidzidzisa paŋguʋa dzoʋusiku.
Ndakaisa Jehova pamberi paŋgu ŋguʋa dzose;
Ɀaari kurudyi rwaŋgu, handiŋgazunuŋguswi.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unofara, kukudzwa kwaŋgu kunofarisisa;
Nyama yaŋgu ʋo icagara yakaceŋgetwa.
Nokuti hamuŋgasiyi mŋeya waŋgu muSheori;
Hamuŋgatenderi mutȿene wenyu kuti aʋone kuʋora.
Mucandiratidza nzira yoʋupenyu;
Mufaro wakazara uri pamberi paŋgu;
Paruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi paneɀinofadza nokusiŋgaperi.
Inzwai ɀakarurama Jehova, muterere kucema kwaŋgu;
Rerekerai nzeʋe dzenyu kumunyeŋgetero waŋgu, unobva pamiromo isiŋganyeŋgeri.
Kutoŋgwa kwaŋgu ŋgakubve pamberi penyu;
Meso enyu ŋgaatarire ɀakarurama.
Makaidza mŋoyo waŋgu; makandishanyira ʋusiku;
Makandiidza, mukasawana kufuŋga kwakaipa mandiri;
Ndakaɀisuŋga kuti muromo waŋgu urege kuɗarika.
Kana ari maɓasa aʋanhu, neshoko remiromo yenyu
Ini ndakanɀeŋga nzira dzomuparadzi.
Kutsika kwaŋgu kwakarambira panzira dzenyu,
Tsoka dzaŋgu hadzina‐kutedzemuka.
Ini ndakaɗana kwamuri, nokuti mucandipindura, imi Mŋari;
Rerekerai nzeʋe dzenyu kwandiri, munzwe kutaura kwaŋgu.
Ratidzai ʋunyoro bgenyu ʋunoshamisa, imi, munoponesa ʋanoʋimba nemi,
Kunaʋanoʋamukira simba.
Ndiceŋgetei semboni yeziso renyu,
Ndiʋanzei pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro enyu,
Kunaʋakaipa, ʋanondiparadza,
Iʋo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋakaipa, ʋanondikomba.
Ʋakadziʋira mŋoyo yaʋo;
Ʋanotaura ʋaciɀikudza nemiromo yaʋo.
Ʋakatikomba ɀino pakufamba kweɗu;
Ʋanocerekedza nameso aʋo kuti ʋatiwisire pasi.
Wakafanana neshumba inokarira kuparadza,
Uneŋge somŋana weshumba inoʋandira panɀimbo dzakaʋanda.
Simukai, Jehova,
Mirai pamberi pake, mumuwisire pasi;
Rwirai mŋeya waŋgu nomunondo wenyu kunaʋakaipa;
Kuʋanhu, noruʋoko rwenyu imi Jehova,
Kuʋanhu ʋenyika, ʋanomugoʋe waʋo paʋupenyu
Ʋamunozadza ɗumbu raʋo nefuma yenyu;
Ʋanaʋana ʋazhinji,
Ʋanosiyira ʋacece ʋaʋo ɀakasara ɀefuma yaʋo.
Ini ndicaʋona ciso cenyu pakururama;
Ndicaguta nomufananidzo wenyu pakumuka kwaŋgu.
Ndinokuɗisai, Jehova, simba raŋgu.
Jehova iɗombo raŋgu, nenhare yaŋgu, nomurwiri waŋgu;
Mŋari waŋgu, ɗombo raŋgu, wandicaʋimba naye;
Nhoʋo yaŋgu, norunyaŋga rwokuponeswa kwaŋgu, shoŋgwe yaŋgu yakakwirira.
Ndicaɗana kunaJehova, iye unofanirwa nokurumbidzwa;
Naiɀoɀo ndicaponeswa kunaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu.
Maɓote orufu akandikomba;
Ʋuye nzizi dzeɀakaipa dzakandivundusa.
Maɓote eSheori akandisuŋga;
Misuŋgo yorufu yakandiwira.
Pakutambudzika kwaŋgu ndakaɗana kunaJehova,
Ndikaɗana kunaMŋari waŋgu;
Akanzwa inzwi raŋgu ari mutembere yake;
Kucema kwaŋgu pamberi pake kukaȿika munzeʋe dzake.
Ipapo nyika yakazunuŋguka, ikaɗeɗera;
Nheyo dzamakomo ʋo dzakaɗeŋgenyeka,
Dzikazunuŋguswa, nokuti wakaŋga akatsamŋa.
Ʋutsi bgakakwira ʋucibva mumhino dzake,
Ʋuye mŋoto wakaɓuɗa mumuromo make, wakaparadza;
Mazimbe akaɓatidzwa nawo.
Wakakotamisa kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ʋo, akaɓuruka;
Nerima guru rakaŋga riri pasi petsoka dzake.
Wakataȿa kerubi, akabururuka;
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakabururuka pamapapiro emhepo.
Rima wakariita nɀimbo yake yokuʋanda, tente rake rakamupoteredza;
Kuȿiɓa kwemvura zhinji, namakore matema okuɗeŋga.
Nokupenya kwakaŋga kuri pamberi pake makore ake matema akapfuʋura,
Necimvuramabge namazimbe omŋoto.
Jehova wakatinhira ʋo kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga,
Wokumsoro‐soro wakataura nenzwi rake;
Cimvuramabge namazimbe omŋoto.
Wakatuma miseʋe yake, akaʋaparadza;
Ɀirokwaɀo, nemheni zhinji, akaʋavundusa.
Ipapo migero yemvura zhinji yakaʋonekwa,
Ʋuye nheyo dzenyika dzakafukurwa,
Nokutuka kwenyu, Jehova,
Nokufema kwomŋeya wemhino dzenyu.
Wakatambunudza
Akandinyukura pamvura zhinji.
Wakandirwira pamuʋeŋgi waŋgu unesimba,
Nokunaʋanondiʋeŋga, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋondikurira.
Ʋakandiʋiŋga nezuʋa renjodzi yaŋgu,
Asi Jehova wakaŋga ari mutsigiri waŋgu.
Wakandiɓuɗisira kunɀimbo yakafarikana,
Akandirwira, nokuti wakaŋga acindifarira.
Jehova wakandiitira ɀakaenzana nokururama kwaŋgu,
Akandipa muɓairo wakaenzana nokucena kwamaʋoko aŋgu.
Nokuti ndakaceŋgeta nzira dzaJehova,
Handina‐kubva kunaMŋari waŋgu nokunyeŋgera.
Nokuti ɀose ɀaakatoŋga ɀakaŋga ɀiri pamberi paŋgu,
Handina‐kusundira kure neni ɀaakatema.
Ndakaŋga ndakarurama ʋo kwaari,
Ndakaɀiceŋgeta ini paɀakaipa ɀaŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova wakandiitira ɀakaenzana nokururama kwaŋgu,
Ɀakaenzana nokucena kwamaʋoko aŋgu pamberi pake.
Uneŋgoni munomuitira ʋo neŋgoni,
Nomunhu wakarurama kwaɀo, munomuitira ʋo ɀakarurama;
Wakanaka munomuitira ʋo ɀakanaka,
Nowakatsauka, munomuitira ʋo nehasha.
Nokuti mucaponesa ʋanhu ʋanotambudzika;
Asi mucaɗeredza meso aʋanoɀikudza.
Nokuti imi mucatuŋgidza mŋenje waŋgu;
Jehova Mŋari waŋgu ucavenekera rima raŋgu.
Nokuti nemi ndicaʋamba hondo,
Kana ndinaMŋari waŋgu ndicaɗarika ruȿiŋgo.
Kana ari Mŋari, nzira yake yakakwana kwaɀo;
Shoko raJehova rakaidzwa;
Ndiye nhoʋo yaʋose ʋanoʋimba naye.
Nokuti ndianiko Mŋari, asi iye Jehova?
Ndianiko ɗombo, asi iye Mŋari weɗu?
Iye Mŋari, unondisuŋga ciʋuno nesimba,
Unokwanisa nzira yaŋgu.
Unoita tsoka dzaŋgu dziʋe se
Unondiisa pamatunhu aŋgu akakwirira.
Unodzidzisa maʋoko aŋgu kurwa;
Naiɀoɀo maʋoko aŋgu anowembura ʋuta bgendarira.
Makandipa ʋo nhoʋo yokuponesa kwenyu;
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi rwakanditsigira,
Ʋuye ʋunyoro bgenyu bgakandiita mukuru.
Makandiitira nɀimbo yakafarikana pandiŋgatsika;
Ʋuye tsoka dzaŋgu hadzina‐kutedzemuka.
Ndicateʋerera ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu nokuʋaɓata,
Handiŋgadzoki ɀe kuȿikira ʋapedzwa.
Ndicaʋaɓaya, ʋakoniwe kusimuka;
Ʋacawira pasi petsoka dzaŋgu.
Nokuti makandisuŋga ciʋuno nesimba rokurwa naro;
Makandikundisa ʋaindimukira.
Makatizisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu,
Kuti ndiparadze ʋanondiʋeŋga.
Ʋakacema, asi kwakaŋga kusinaunoponesa,
KunaJehova, asi haana‐kuʋapindura.
Ipapo ndakaʋapxanya‐pxanya seguruʋa pamberi pemhepo;
Ndakaʋarashira kure samatope enzira dzomumusha.
Makandirwira pakukakaʋadzana kwaʋanhu;
Makandiita mukuru wendudzi;
Ʋanhu ʋandakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi, ʋacandishumira.
Ʋacaterera pakarepo kana ʋacindinzwa,
Ʋatorwa ʋacanamata kwandiri.
Ʋatorwa ʋacatorerwa simba,
Ʋacaɓuɗa paʋaiʋanda ʋaciɗeɗera.
Jehova mupenyu; ɗombo raŋgu ŋgarikudzwe;
Mŋari wokuponeswa kwaŋgu ŋgaarumbidzwe.
Ndiye Mŋari unonditsiʋira,
Unondikundisa ndudzi dzaʋanhu.
Iye unondirwira kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
Ɀirokwaɀo, munondisimudzira kumsoro kwaʋanondimukira.
Munondirwira pamunhu unomanikidza.
Naiɀoɀo ndicakuʋoŋgai Jehova, pakati pendudzi,
Ndicaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokukudza.
Unopa mambo wake kuponeswa kukuru;
Unoitira muzodzwa wake ʋunyoro,
Iye Davidi nomŋana wake nokusiŋgaperi.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kunoparidzira kubginya kwaMŋari;
Ʋuye ɗeŋga rinoratidza ɓasa ramaʋoko ake.
Musi mumŋe unotaurira mumŋe musi,
Ʋuye ʋusiku ʋumŋe ʋunopupurira ʋumŋe ʋusiku njere.
Hapana‐kutaura, kana mashoko;
Inzwi raɀo harinzwiki.
Rwonzi rwokuyera rwaɀo rwakaȿika kunyika yose,
Namashoko aɀo kumugumo wenyika.
Wakagadzirira zuʋa tente mukati maɀo.
Iro rakafanana necikomba cinoɓuɗa mumba maco,
Rinofara semhare kumhanya nenzira yaro.
Kuɓuɗa kwaro kunobva pamugumo weɗeŋga,
Kupota kwaro kunoȿika pakuguma kwaro ɀe;
Hakune‐cinhu cakaʋanzirwa kupisa kwaro.
Murairo waJehova wakakwana, unoponesa mŋeya;
Cipupuriro caJehova ndecaɀokwaɗi, cinopa ʋasinamano njere.
Ɀinorairwa naJehova ɀakarurama, ɀinofadza mŋoyo;
Murau waJehova wakaiȿo‐naka, unovenekera meso.
Kutya Jehova kwakanaka, kunogara nokusiŋgaperi;
Ɀakatoŋgwa naJehova ndeɀaɀokwaɗi, ɀakarurama kwaɀo.
Ɀinofanira kutȿakwa kukunda ndarama, ɀirokwaɀo kukunda ndarama zhinji yakaiȿo‐naka;
Ɀinotapira ʋo kupfuʋura ʋuci nomuȿi wamaziŋga oʋuci.
Ʋuye ɀe, muranda wenyu unonyeʋerwa naɀo;
Pakuɀiceŋgeta panomuɓairo mukuru.
Kana kuri kutsauka, ndiani uŋgakuziʋa?
Ndianiko uŋgaziʋa ɀitadzo?
Ndinatsei imi
Dzorai ʋo muranda wenyu
Ŋgaɀirege kuʋa nesimba pamsoro paŋgu; ipapo ndicaʋa wakakwana,
Handiŋgaʋi nemhoȿa yokuɗarika kukuru.
Mashoko omuromo waŋgu nokuraŋgarira kwomŋoyo waŋgu ŋgaɀifadze pamberi penyu,
Imi Jehova, ɗombo raŋgu, nomudzikinuri waŋgu.
Jehova ŋgaakupindure nomusi wokutambudzika;
Zita raMŋari waJakobo ŋgarikuise pakakwirira;
Ŋgaakutumire ruɓatsiro runobva panɀimbo tȿene,
Akutsigire
Ŋgaaraŋgarire ɀipiriso ɀako ɀose,
Agamucire ɀiɓayiro ɀako ɀinopiswa;
Ŋgaakupe ɀinoɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako,
Ŋgaaite seɀawakafuŋga.
Ticafara kwaɀo nokukunda kwenyu,
Ticasimudza mireza yeɗu nezita raMŋari weɗu;
Jehova ŋgaaite ɀose ɀawakakumbira.
Ɀino ndinoziʋa kuti Jehova unoponesa muzodziwa wake;
Ucamupindura ari kuɗeŋga kwake kutȿene
Nesimba roruʋoko rwake rworudyi, rinoponesa.
Ʋamŋe ʋanoʋimba neŋgoro, ʋamŋe namabiza;
Asi isu ticareʋa zita raJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Iʋo ʋakotamiswa, ʋawira pasi;
Asi isu tasimuka, timire ɀakanaka.
Ponesai, Jehova;
Mambo ŋgaatipindure kana ticiɗana.
Mambo ucafara nesimba renyu, Jehova;
Ucafarira kuponesa kwenyu ɀikuru sei!
Makamupa ɀakaɗikanwa nomŋoyo wake,
Hamuna‐kuramba kukumbira kwemiromo yake.
Nokuti munomuciŋgura nemikomborero yeɀakanaka;
Munodzika korona yendarama yakaiȿo‐naka pamusoro wake.
Wakakumbira ʋupenyu kwamuri, mukamupa ibgo;
Namazuʋa mazhinji nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Kurumbidzwa kwake kukuru nokuɗa kwokuponesa kwenyu,
Makaisa pamsoro pake kukudzwa noʋumambo.
Nokuti munomukomborera ɀikuru nokusiŋgaperi;
Munomufadza nomufaro pamberi penyu.
Nokuti mambo unoʋimba naJehova,
Noʋunyoro bgoWokumsoro‐soro haaŋgazunuŋguswi.
Ruʋoko rwenyu rucawana ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose;
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi rucawana ʋose ʋanokuʋeŋgai.
Mucaʋaita seʋira romŋoto neŋguʋa yokutsamŋa kwenyu.
Jehova ucaʋamedza nehasha dzake,
Mŋoto ucaʋaparadza.
Mucaparadza ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo panyika,
Naʋana ʋaʋo pakati paʋana ʋaʋanhu.
Nokuti ʋakafuŋga kukuitirai ɀakaipa;
Ʋakafuŋga zano
Nokuti mucaʋafuratidza,
Mucagadzira huŋgiso dzoʋuta bgenyu kuʋafura paɀiso ɀaʋo.
Simukai Jehova, nesimba renyu;
Naiɀoɀo ticaimba nokukudza cikuriri cenyu.
Mŋari waŋgu, Mŋari waŋgu, mandisiyireiko?
Munomirireiko kure pakundiɓatsira, napamashoko okugomba kwaŋgu?
Mŋari waŋgu, ndinoɗana masikati, asi hamupinduri;
Noʋusiku, asi handiwani zororo.
Asi imi muri mutȿene,
Imi mugere parumbidzo dzaIsraeri.
Madziɓaɓa eɗu akaʋimba nemi;
Ʋakaʋimba, imi mukaʋarwira.
Ʋakacema kwamuri, ʋakarwirwa;
Ʋakaʋimba nemi, ʋakasanyadziswa.
Asi ini ndiri honye, handizi munhu;
Ndiri cinhu cinoɀidzwa naʋanhu, cinoshoʋorwa naʋanhu ʋose.
Ʋose, ʋanondiʋona ʋanondiseka;
Ʋanoshamisa muromo, ʋanodzuŋgudza misoro,
Ciɀiisai kunaJehova; iye ŋgaamurwire;
Ŋgaamurwire, ɀaanomufarira iye.
Asi ndimi makandiɓuɗisa paciɀaro;
Makandiʋimbisa
Ndakaiswa kwamuri kubva paciɀaro;
Imi muri Mŋari waŋgu kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu.
Regai kuʋa kure neni; nokuti njodzi iri pedyo;
Nokuti hapana‐uŋgaɓatsira.
Hando zhinji dzakandikomba;
Hando dzinesimba dzaBashani dzakandipoteredza.
Dzinondishamisira miromo yadzo,
Seshumba inoparadza iciʋomba.
Ndakaɗururwa semvura,
Mafupa aŋgu ose akaȿoɗogoka;
Mŋoyo waŋgu wakafanana nenamo;
Wakanyauka mukati moʋura bgaŋgu.
Simba raŋgu rakawoma secaeŋga;
Rurimi rwaŋgu rwakanamatira pashaya dzaŋgu;
Makandiisa paguruʋa rorufu.
Nokuti imbga dzakandikomberedza;
Ʋuŋgano yaʋanoita ɀakaipa yakandipoteredza;
Ʋakabvoʋora maʋoko aŋgu namakumbo aŋgu;
Ndiŋgaʋereŋga mafupa aŋgu ose;
Ʋanonditarira nokundinaŋanidza;
Ʋanogoʋana ŋguʋo dzaŋgu pakati paʋo,
Ʋanokanda mijenya pamsoro pehanzu yaŋgu.
Asi imi Jehova, regai kuʋa kure
Imi simba raŋgu, kurumidzai kundiɓatsira.
Rwirai mŋeya waŋgu pamunondo;
Muɗikanwa waŋgu pasimba rembga.
Ndiponesei pamuromo weshumba;
Ɀirokwaɀo, makandipindura ndiri pakati penyaŋga dzenyati.
Ndicaɗudzira zita renyu kuhama dzaŋgu;
Ndicakurumbidzai pakati peʋuŋgano.
Imi munotya Jehova, murumbidzei;
Imi mose ʋana ʋaJakobo, mukudzei;
Mumutyei, imi mose ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti haana‐kuɀidza kana kusema ɗambudziko rounotambudzwa;
Kana kumuʋanzira ciso cake;
Asi paŋguʋa yaakacema kwaari wakamunzwa.
Kurumbidza kwaŋgu paʋuŋgano huru kunobva kwamuri;
Ndicaripa mhiko dzaŋgu pamberi paʋanomutya.
Ʋanyoro ʋacadya ʋakaguta;
Ʋanotȿaka Jehova ndiʋo ʋacamurumbidza;
Mŋoyo yenyu ŋgairarame nokusiŋgaperi.
Migumo yose yenyika icaraŋgarira nokudzokera kunaJehova;
Marudzi ose aʋahedeni acanamata kwamuri.
Nokuti ʋushe ndobgaJehova;
Ndiye muɓati waʋahedeni.
Ʋakuru ʋose ʋenyika ʋacadya nokunamata;
Ʋose ʋanoɓurukira kuguruʋa ʋacafugama pamberi pake,
Naiye usiŋgagoni kuraramisa mŋeya wake.
Ʋana ʋake ʋacanamata kwaari;
Rudzi runoteʋera rucaʋudzwa ɀaJehova.
Ʋacaʋuya ʋaciɗudzira kururama kwake
Kuʋanhu ʋacazoɀarwa, kuti ndiye wakaɀiita.
Jehova ndiye mufudzi waŋgu;
Hapana‐candiŋgashaiwa.
Unondiʋatisa pasi pamafuro manyoro;
Unondisesedza pamvura inozorodza.
Unoponesa mŋeya waŋgu;
Unondifambisa panzira dzokururama nokuɗa kwezita rake.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge ndikafamba mumupata womumvuri worufu,
Handiŋgatoŋgotyi ɀakaipa; nokuti imi mune’ni;
Tȿimbo yenyu nomuɗonɀo wenyu ɀinondinyaradza.
Munondigadzirira tafura pamberi paʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu;
Makazodza musoro waŋgu namafuta; mukombe waŋgu unopfacuka.
Ɀirokwaɀo ʋunyoro nenyasha ɀicanditeʋera mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgaŋgu;
Ini ndicagara mumba maJehova mazuʋa namazuʋa.
Nyika ndeyaJehova, nokuzara kwayo;
Nyika
Nokuti wakaiteya pamsoro pamakuŋgwa,
Nokuisimbisa pamsoro penzizi.
Ndiani uŋgakwira mugomo raJehova?
Ndiani uŋgamira panɀimbo yake tȿene?
Uyo unamaʋoko akacena, nomŋoyo wakanaka kwaɀo;
Usiŋgasimudziri mŋoyo wake kuneɀisinamaturo,
Nousina‐kupika nhema.
Iye ucapiwa mukomborero naJehova,
Nokururamiswa naMŋari muponesi wake.
Urwu ndirwo rudzi rwaʋanomutȿaka,
Ʋanotȿaka ciso cenyu, imi
Simudzai misoro yenyu, imi masuʋo;
Musimudzwe imi, magonhi akarekare;
Kuti Mambo wokubginya apinde.
Ndianiko iye Mambo wokubginya?
Ndiye Jehova unesimba noʋumhare,
Iye Jehova unoʋumhare pakurwa.
Simudzai misoro yenyu, imi masuʋo;
Muisimudze, imi magonhi akarekare;
Kuti Mambo wokubginya apinde.
Ndianiko uyu Mambo wokubginya?
Jehova wehondo,
Ndiye Mambo wokubginya.
Jehova, ndinosimudzira mŋoyo waŋgu kwamuri.
Mŋari waŋgu, ndinoʋimba nemi,
Ŋgandirege kunyadziswa;
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ŋgaʋarege kundikunda.
Ɀirokwaɀo, hapano‐munhu unokumirirai uŋganyadziswa;
Ʋacanyadziswa ndiʋo ʋanonyeŋgera pasinecinhu.
Ndiratidzei nzira dzenyu, Jehova;
Ndidzidzisei nzira dzenyu.
Ndiperekedzei muɀokwaɗi yenyu, mundidzidzise;
Nokuti ndimi Mŋari muponesi waŋgu;
Ndinokutarirai zuʋa rose.
Raŋgarirai, Jehova, nyasha yenyu huru noʋunyoro bgenyu;
Nokuti ɀaiʋa’po kare nakare.
Regai kuraŋgarira ɀiʋi ɀoʋuɗoko bgaŋgu, nokuɗarika kwaŋgu;
Mundiraŋgarire noʋunyoro bgenyu,
Nokuɗa kwokunaka kwenyu, Jehova.
Jehova wakanaka, wakarurama;
Saka ucaraira ʋatadzi panzira.
Ucaperekedza ʋanyoro muneɀakarurama;
Ucadzidzisa ʋanyoro nzira yake.
Nzira dzose dzaJehova ndedzoʋunyoro neɀokwaɗi
Kunaʋanoceŋgeta suŋgano yake neɀipupuriro ɀake.
Nokuɗa kwezita renyu, Jehova,
Kaŋganwirai ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu, nokuti ɀikuru.
Munhu ndoupiko unotya Jehova?
Ndiye waacadzidzisa nzira yaanofanira kusanaŋgura.
Mŋeya wake ucagara ɀakanaka;
Ʋuye ʋana ʋake ʋacagara nhaka yenyika.
Ɀakaʋanzwa ɀaJehova ndeɀaʋanomutya;
Ucaʋaratidza suŋgano yake.
Meso aŋgu anoramba acitarira kunaJehova;
Nokuti unobvisa tsoka dzaŋgu pamumbure.
Riŋgirai kwandiri, mundinzwire nyasha;
Nokuti ndiri ndoga, ndinotambudzika.
Maɗambudziko omŋoyo waŋgu awanda kwaɀo;
Haiwa, ndiɓuɗisei panjodzi dzaŋgu.
Tarirai kutambudzika kwaŋgu nokurwadziwa kwaŋgu;
Mundikaŋganwire ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ɀose.
Tarirai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, nokuti ʋazhinji;
Ʋanondiʋeŋga nehasha dzembeŋgo.
Ceŋgetai mŋeya waŋgu mundirwire;
Ndirege kunyadziswa, nokuti ndinoʋimba nemi.
Kusanyeŋgera nokururama ŋgaɀindiceŋgete,
Nokuti ndinokumirirai.
Dzikinurai Israeri, imi Mŋari,
Panjodzi dzake dzose.
Nditoŋgerei Jehova, nokuti ndakafamba nokusanyeŋgera kwaŋgu;
Ndakaʋimba ʋo naJehova ndisiŋganyunyuti.
Ndinɀerei Jehova, ndiidzei,
Natsai itȿo dzaŋgu nomŋoyo waŋgu.
Nokuti ʋunyoro bgenyu ʋuri pamberi pameso aŋgu,
Ndakafamba muɀokwaɗi yenyu.
Handina‐kugara naʋanhu ʋenhema,
Handiŋgafambidzani naʋanyeŋgeri.
Ndinoʋeŋga ʋuŋgano yaʋanoita ɀakaipa,
Handiŋgagari naʋatadzi.
Ndicashambidza maʋoko aŋgu ndisinemhoȿa;
Ndigopoteredza artari yenyu saiɀoɀo, Jehova.
Kuti ndiparidze nenzwi rokuʋoŋga,
Ndiʋudze ʋanhu ɀamaɓasa enyu ose anoshamisa.
Jehova, ndinoɗa ʋugaro bgeimba yenyu,
Nenɀimbo panogara kubginya kwenyu.
Regai kusaŋganisa mŋeya waŋgu pamŋe cete naʋatadzi,
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu naʋateʋuri ʋeropa;
Ʋakaɓata ɀakashata pamaʋoko aʋo,
Ruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi ruzere nefufuro.
Asi kana ndiri’ni ndicafamba nokusanyeŋgera kwaŋgu;
Ndidzikinurei, mundinzwire tsitsi.
Rutsoka rwaŋgu rumire pakati cecetere;
Ndicarumbidza Jehova paʋuŋgano.
Jehova ndiye ciedza caŋgu noMuponesi waŋgu; ndiŋgagotya aniko?
Jehova ndiye simba roʋupenyu bgaŋgu; ndiŋgagovunduswa naniko?
Ʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa ʋakati ʋaciʋuya kwandiri kuzodya nyama yaŋgu,
Iʋo ʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, ʋakagumburwa ʋakawa.
Kunyaŋge hondo ikandikomba,
Mŋoyo waŋgu hauŋgatyi;
Kunyaŋge ndikaʋiŋgwa nokurwa,
Neŋguʋa iyo ndicaʋimba
Cinhu cimŋe cete ndakakumbira kunaJehova, ndico candicatȿaka;
Kuti ndigare mumba maJehova misi yose yoʋupenyu bgaŋgu,
Kuti ndiʋone kunaka kwaJehova, nokuraŋgarira mutembere yake.
Nokuti nomusi wenjodzi unondiʋiga muɗumba rake,
Ucandiʋanza pakaʋanda patente rake;
Ucandikwiridza paɗombo.
Ɀino musoro waŋgu ucasimudzirwa kumsoro kwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋanondikomba;
Ndicamuɓayira ɀiɓayiro ɀomufaro patente rake.
Ndicaimba, ɀirokwaɀo ndicaimbira Jehova nziyo dzokumurumbidza.
Inzwai Jehova, kana ndiciɗana nenzwi raŋgu;
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, mundipindure.
Ciso cenyu, Jehova, ndicacitȿaka.
Regai kundiʋanzira ciso cenyu;
Musadziŋga muranda wenyu pakutsamŋa kwenyu;
Makaŋga muri muɓatsiri waŋgu;
Regai kundirasha, kana kundisiya, imi Mŋari muponesi waŋgu.
Nokuti ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu namai ʋaŋgu ʋakandirasha,
Asi Jehova ucandigamucira.
Ndidzidzisei nzira yenyu Jehova;
Mundifambise panzira yakati cecetere,
Nokuɗa kwaʋanondiʋandira.
Musandisundira pakuɗa kwaʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu;
Nokuti ɀapupu ɀenhema ɀakandimukira, naʋanofemereka hasha.
Panyika yaʋapenyu.
Rindira Jehova;
Iʋa nesimba, nomŋoyo wako utsuŋge;
Ndinoti, rindira Jehova.
Ndicaɗana kwamuri, Jehova;
Ƌombo raŋgu, regai kundinyararira;
Ɀimŋe, kana mukandinyararira,
Ndiŋgafanana naʋanoɓurukira kugomba.
Inzwai inzwi remikumbiro yaŋgu, kana ndicicema kwamuri,
Kana ndicisimudzira maʋoko aŋgu kunɀimbo yomukati yeimba yenyu tȿene.
Musandibvuta pamŋe cete naʋakaipa,
Naʋanoita ɀakashata;
Iʋo, ʋanotaura rugare kunaʋaʋanogara naʋo,
Asi ɀakashata ɀiri mumŋoyo maʋo.
Muʋape ɀakaenzana neɓasa raʋo, ʋuye ɀakaenzana neɀakaipa ɀaʋakaita,
Muʋape ɀakaenzana nokuɓata kwamaʋoko aʋo;
Muʋaitire seɀakaʋafanira.
Ɀaʋasina‐kuraŋgarira maɓasa aJehova,
Neɀaakaɓata namaʋoko ake,
Iye ucaʋaputsa, akasaʋaʋaka ɀe.
Jehova ŋgaaʋoŋgwe,
Nokuti wakanzwa inzwi rokukumbira kwaŋgu.
Jehova ndiye simba raŋgu nenhoʋo yaŋgu;
Mŋoyo waŋgu wakaʋimba naye, ndikaɓatsirwa;
Saka mŋoyo waŋgu unofara kwaɀo,
Ndicamurumbidza norwiyo rwaŋgu.
Jehova ndiye simba raʋo,
Ndiye nhare yokuponesa kumuzodziwa wake.
Ponesai ʋanhu ʋenyu, muropafadze nhaka yenyu;
Muʋafudze ʋo, muʋatakure nokusiŋgaperi.
Ipai Jehova, imi ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari,
Ipai Jehova kudzo nesimba.
Ipai Jehova kudzo yakafanirwa nezita rake;
Namatai kunaJehova neŋguʋo tȿene.
Inzwi raJehova riri pamsoro pemvura zhinji;
Mŋari wokubginya unotinhira,
Iye Jehova uri pamsoro pemvura zhinji‐zhinji:
Inzwi raJehova rinesimba;
Inzwi raJehova rizere noʋumambo.
Inzwi raJehova rinovuna misidari;
Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova unovunanya misidari yeRebanoni.
Unoipemberesa semhuru;
Iro Rebanoni neSirioni semhuru yenyati.
Inzwi raJehova rinopamura miraɀo yomŋoto.
Inzwi raJehova rinoɗeɗeresa renje;
Jehova unoɗeɗeresa renje reKadeshi.
Inzwi raJehova rinoɓerekesa nondo,
Rinoȿuʋura
Nomutembere yake ɀose ɀinoti: Kubginya.
Jehova wakagara
Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova unogara ari mambo nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova ucapa ʋanhu ʋake simba;
Jehova ucaropafadza ʋanhu ʋake norugare.
Ndicakukudzai ɀikuru, Jehova; nokuti makandisimudza,
Hamuna‐kutendera ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu kufara nokuɗa kwaŋgu.
Jehova, Mŋari waŋgu,
Ndakacema kwamuri, imi mukandiporesa.
Jehova, makaɓuɗisa mŋeya waŋgu paSheori;
Makaceŋgeta ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, kuti ndirege kuɓurukira kugomba.
Imbirai Jehova nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi ʋatȿene ʋake,
Muʋoŋge kana muciraŋgarira zita rake dɀene.
Nokuti kutsamŋa kwake kuri’po ciŋguʋa ciɗuku;
Kucema kuŋgaʋa’po maɗekwana,
Asi mufaro
Kana ndiri’ni, ndakati pakufara kwaŋgu:
Handiŋgatoŋgozunuŋguswi.
Imi Jehova, neŋgoni dzenyu makamisa gomo raŋgu nesimba;
Makaʋanza ciso cenyu; ini ndikatambudzika.
Ndakacema kwamuri, Jehova;
Ʋuye ndakakumbira kunaJehova;
Ropa raŋgu riŋgandiɓatsireiko, kana ndiciɓurukira kugomba?
Guruʋa riŋgakurumbidzai here? Riŋgaɗudzira ɀokwaɗi yenyu here?
Inzwai Jehova, mundinzwirei tsitsi;
Jehova, iʋai muɓatsiri waŋgu.
Makashandura kucema kwaŋgu kukaʋa kutamba;
Makasunuŋgura gumbu raŋgu, mukasuŋga ciʋuno caŋgu nomufaro;
Kuti mŋeya waŋgu ukuimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza, urege kunyarara.
Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, ndicakuʋoŋgai nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova, ndinoʋimba nemi; ŋgandirege kutoŋgo‐nyadziswa;
Ndirwirei pakururama kwenyu.
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu kwandiri; kurumidzai kundirwira;
Iʋai ɗombo raŋgu rakasimba, neimba yenhare yokundiponesa.
Nokuti ndimi ɗombo raŋgu nenhare yaŋgu;
Naiɀoɀo ndituŋgamirirei mundifambise nokuɗa kwezita renyu.
Ndibvutei pamumbure waʋakandidzikira pakaʋanda;
Nokuti ndimi nhare yaŋgu.
Ndinoisa mŋeya waŋgu muruʋoko rwenyu;
Makandidzikinura Jehova, imi Mŋari waɀokwaɗi.
Ndinoʋeŋga ʋanokudza ɀenhema ɀisinamaturo;
Asi ndicaʋimba naJehova.
Ndicafara nokufarisisa netsitsi dzenyu;
Nokuti makaʋona kutambudzika kwaŋgu;
Makaziʋa kumanikidzwa kwomŋeya waŋgu;
Hamuna‐kundiisa muruʋoko rwomuʋeŋgi;
Makamisa tsoka dzaŋgu panɀimbo yakafarikana.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi Jehova, nokuti ndiri panjodzi;
Ziso raŋgu rapera nokucema, ɀirokwaɀo, nomŋeya waŋgu nomuʋiri waŋgu ʋo.
Nokuti ʋupenyu bgaŋgu bgapera nokucema, namakore aŋgu nokugomera;
Simba raŋgu rapera nokuɗa kwokutadza kwaŋgu, ʋuye mafupa aŋgu asakara.
Ndaʋa cinhu cinoɀidzwa nemhaka yaʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu ʋose,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀikuru kunaʋandinogara naʋo, necinotyisa kuʋazikani ʋaŋgu;
Ʋakandiʋona kunze ʋakanditiza.
Ndakaŋganikwa sowakafa usati acafuŋgwa;
Ndaʋa somudziyo wakaputsika.
Ndakanzwa ʋazhinji ʋaci
Ɀinotyisa kumatiʋi ose;
Pakuraŋgana kwaʋo pamsoro paŋgu
Ʋakafuŋga mano kuti ʋanditorere ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Asi ndakaʋimba nemi Jehova;
Ndakati: Ndimi Mŋari waŋgu.
Ŋguʋa dzaŋgu dziri muruʋoko rwenyu;
Ndirwirei paruʋoko rwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, nokunaʋanonditambudza.
Venekesai ciso cenyu pamsoro pomuranda wenyu;
Ndiponesei noʋunyoro bgenyu.
Ŋgandirege kunyadziswa, Jehova; nokuti ndakaɗana kwamuri;
Ʋakaipa ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ŋgaʋanyarare paSheori.
Miromo inoreʋa nhema ŋgainyarare;
Iyo inotaura namanyawi kunaʋakarurama,
Iciɀikudza nokuʋaɀidza.
Haiwa, ɀakanaka ɀenyu ɀamakaceŋgetera ʋanokutyai ɀakakura sei,
Ɀamakaitira ʋanoʋimba nemi, pamberi paʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu!
Mucaʋaʋanza pakaʋanda pamberi penyu, ʋabve pamano aʋanhu;
Mucaʋaceŋgeta pakaʋanda patente ʋabve panharo dzendimi.
Jehova ŋgaaʋoŋgwe:
Nokuti wakandiratidza ʋunyoro bgake ʋunoshamisa paguta rakasimba.
Kana ndiri’ni, ndakati pakukaruka kwaŋgu: Ndabviswa pamberi penyu;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, makanzwa inzwi rokukumbira kwaŋgu pakucema kwaŋgu kwamuri.
Iɗai Jehova, imi ʋatȿene ʋake mose;
Jehova unoceŋgeta ʋakatendeka,
Unotsiʋa ɀikuru munhu unoɀikudza.
Iʋai nesimba, ʋuye mŋoyo yenyu itsuŋge,
Imi mose munorindira Jehova.
Wakakomborerwa wakakaŋganwirwa kuɗarika kwake, wakafukidzirwa ɀiʋi ɀake.
Wakakomborerwa munhu usiŋgaʋereŋgerwi ɀakaipa naJehova;
Usino‐kunyeŋgera pamŋeya wake.
Paŋguʋa yandakaramba ndinyerere, mafupa aŋgu akasakara
Nokuʋuʋura kwaŋgu zuʋa rose.
Nokuti ruʋoko rwenyu rwakaŋga rucirema pamsoro paŋgu masikati noʋusiku;
Ʋunyoro bgaŋgu bgakashandurwa ʋukaʋa kuwoma kwecirimo.
Ndakakuziʋisai ciʋi caŋgu, handina‐kuʋanza cakaipa caŋgu;
Ndakati: Ndicaɀireʋurura kuɗarika kwaŋgu kunaJehova;
Imi mukandikaŋganwira kuipa kweciʋi caŋgu.
Saka ʋose ʋanotya Mŋari ŋgaʋanyeŋgetere kwamuri paŋguʋa yamuŋgawanikwa;
Ɀirokwaɀo kana mvura zhinji icikukura, haiŋgaȿiki kwaari.
Ndi’mi ciʋando caŋgu; mucandiceŋgeta ndirege kuwira pakutambudzika.
Mucandikomberedza nenziyo dzokurwirwa.
Ndicakudzidzisa nokukuraira nzira yaunofanira kufamba nayo;
Ndicakupa njere neziso raŋgu, riri pamsoro pako.
Regai kuʋa sebiza, kana sehesera, ɀisiŋganzwisisi;
Ɀinofanira kufambiswa norwauro netomu pamakashu aɀo,
Haɀiŋgazoɗi kusweɗera kwauri.
Wakaipa ucaʋa nenjodzi zhinji;
Asi unoʋimba naJehova ucakombga netsitsi.
Farai munaJehova, mufarisise, imi makarurama;
Pururudzai nomufaro, imi mose makarurama pamŋoyo.
Farisai munaJehova, imi ʋakarurama;
Kurumbidza kwakafanira ʋakarurama.
Ʋoŋgai Jehova nembira;
Muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza nomuteŋgeranwa unehuŋgiso dzinegumi.
Muimbirei rwiyo rutȿa;
Ridzai ɀakanaka nokuridza kukuru.
Nokuti shoko raJehova rakarurama,
Unoita ɀose nokutendeka.
Iye unoɗa kururama nokururamisa;
Nyika izere noʋunyoro bgaJehova.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kwakaitwa neshoko raJehova,
Ʋuye hondo dzose dzo’ko nokufema kwomuromo wake.
Unoʋuŋganidza mvura zhinji yeguŋgwa pamŋe cete somurwi;
Unoceŋgeta mvura zhinji dzakadzika mumatura.
Nyika yose ŋgaitye Jehova;
Ʋose ʋagere panyika ŋgaʋaɗeɗere pamberi pake.
Nokuti iye wakataura, ɀikaitika;
Wakaraira, ɀikamira ɀikasimba.
Jehova unoparadza zano raʋahedeni;
Mifuŋgo yendudzi dzaʋanhu unoishaisa simba.
Zano raJehova rakasimba nokusiŋgaperi,
Nendaŋgariro dzomŋoyo wake kuȿikira kundudzi dzose.
Rwakakomborerwa rudzi rwakaita Jehova Mŋari warwo;
Rudzi rwaakatsaura kuʋa nhaka yake.
Jehova unotarira ari kuɗeŋga;
Unoʋona ʋanakomana ʋose ʋaʋanhu;
Unotarira ari ipapo paagere
Iye unoʋumba mŋoyo yaʋo ʋose,
Unocerekedza maɓasa aʋo ose.
Hapanamambo unoponeswa nokuwanda kwehondo;
Mhare hairwirwi nesimba guru.
Biza hariɓatsiri pakukunda;
Harigoni kurwira nesimba raro guru.
Tarirai, ziso raJehova rinotarira ʋanomutya,
Iʋo, ʋanorindira tsitsi dzake;
Kurwira mŋeya waʋo parufu,
Nokuʋararamisa paŋguʋa yenzara.
Mŋeya yeɗu yakarindira Jehova;
Ndiye muɓatsiri weɗu nenhoʋo yeɗu.
Nokuti mŋoyo yeɗu icafara kwaɀo maari,
Ɀatakaʋimba nezita rake dɀene.
Tsitsi dzenyu ŋgadziʋe nesu, Jehova,
Seɀatakakurindirai.
Ndicarumbidza Jehova ŋguʋa dzose;
Rumbidzo yake icagara mumuromo maŋgu.
Mŋeya waŋgu ucaɀirumbidza munaJehova;
Ʋanyoro ʋacaɀinzwa, ʋakafara.
Kudzai Jehova pamŋe cete neni,
Ŋgatikudzise zita rake pamŋe cete.
Ndakatȿaka Jehova, akandipindura,
Akandisunuŋgura pakutya kwaŋgu kwose.
Ʋakatarira kwaari, ʋakapenyeswa
Ɀiso ɀaʋo haɀiŋgatoŋgonyadziswi.
Murombo uyu wakacema, Jehova akamunzwa,
Akamuponesa panjodzi dzake dzose.
Mutumŋa waJehova unokomberedza ʋanomutya,
Nokuʋarwira.
Raʋirai henyu, muʋone kuti Jehova wakanaka;
Wakakomborerwa munhu unoʋimba naye.
Ityai Jehova, imi ʋatȿene ʋake;
Nokuti ʋanomutya haʋana‐caʋanoshaiwa.
Ʋana ʋeshumba ʋanoshaiwa, ʋanofa nenzara;
