Asi ʋanotȿaka Jehova haʋanecinhu cakanaka caʋaŋgashaiwa.
Ʋuyai imi ʋana, munditerere;
Ndicakudzidzisai kutya Jehova.
Ndoupi munhu unoɗa ʋupenyu,
Unoɗa mazuʋa
Dzora rurimi rwako pakutaura ɀakaipa,
Nemiromo yako, urege kutaura ɀinonyeŋgera.
Ibva paneɀakaipa, uite ɀakanaka;
Tȿaka rugare, uruteʋere.
Meso aJehova anotarira ʋakarurama,
Ʋuye nzeʋe dzake dzinonzwa kucema kwaʋo.
Ciso caJehova cinoʋeŋga ʋanoita ɀakaipa,
Kuti abvise ciyeʋudziro caʋo panyika.
Akaʋarwira panjodzi dzaʋo dzose.
Jehova uri pedyo naʋanemŋoyo yakaputsika,
Unoponesa ʋanemŋeya yakapxanyika.
Wakarurama unamaɗambudzo mazhinji;
Asi Jehova unomurwira
Unoceŋgeta mafupa ake ose;
Hakuna‐nerimŋe rawo rinovuniwa.
Ɀakaipa ɀicaʋuraya wakaipa;
Ʋuye ʋanoʋeŋga ʋakarurama ʋacapiwa mhoȿa.
Jehova unodzikinura mŋeya yaʋaranda ʋake;
Hapana‐nomumŋe kunaʋanoʋimba naye ucapiwa mhoȿa.
Jehova, kakaʋadzanai naʋanokakaʋadzana neni;
Irwai naʋanorwa neni.
Torai nhoʋo huru neɗuku,
Musimuke kundiɓatsira.
Vomorai ʋo pfumo, mudziʋire nzira yaʋanonditeʋerera,
Itiyi kumŋeya waŋgu: Ndini muponesi wako.
Ʋanotȿaka mŋeya waŋgu ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ʋaɀidzwe;
Ʋanofuŋga kundiitira ɀakaipa ŋgaʋadzoserwe shure ʋakaŋganiswe.
Ŋgaʋafanane nehundi inopupuruswa nemhepo,
Mutumŋa waJehova aciʋasundira.
Nzira yaʋo ŋgaiʋe nerima, itedze,
Mutumŋa waJehova aciʋateʋerera.
Nokuti ndisinemhoȿa ʋakandiʋanzira mimbure yaʋo muhunza,
Ndisinemhoȿa ʋakacerera mŋeya waŋgu
Kuparadzwa ŋgakumuwire akaŋgofara;
Ʋuye mumbure wake waakaʋanza ŋgaumuɓate amene;
Ŋgaawire’mo aparadzwe.
Mŋeya waŋgu ucafarira Jehova
Ucafarira kuponesa kwake.
Mafupa aŋgu ose acati: Jehova ndianiko wakafanana nemi,
Imi munorwira murombo panaiye wakamukurira nesimba,
Iye murombo nomushaiwi panounomupamba?
Ɀapupu ɀisina‐kururama ɀinosimuka;
Ɀinondibvunza ɀinhu ɀandisiŋgaziʋi.
Ɀakanaka ɀaŋgu ʋanoɀitsiʋa neɀakaipa,
Ʋaciɓira mŋeya waŋgu.
Asi kana ndiri’ni, pakurwara kwaʋo ndakafuka gumbu;
Ndakatambudza mŋeya waŋgu ndiciɀinyima ɀokudya;
Munyeŋgetero waŋgu ukadzokera kucifuʋa caŋgu.
Ndakaita seyaiʋa shamŋari yaŋgu kana hama yaŋgu;
Ndakakotama ndicicema, somunhu unocema mai ʋake.
Asi pakugumburwa kwaŋgu ʋakafara, ʋakaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete;
Ʋanhu ʋakashata kwaɀo ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzorwa neni, naʋandakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi;
Ʋakandibvambura, ʋasiŋgaregi;
Saʋaɗaɗiri ʋakaipa pamitambo
Ʋakandirumanyira meno aʋo.
Jehova, mucatarira iɀoɀo kuȿikira riniko?
Rwirai mŋeya waŋgu pakuparadza kwaʋo,
Muɗikanwa waŋgu pashumba.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai paʋuŋgano huru;
Ndicakurumbidzai pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Ʋanondiʋeŋga ndisinemhoȿa ŋgaʋarege kufara pamsoro paŋgu;
Ʋuye ʋanondiʋeŋga ndisinemhoȿa ŋgaʋarege kubgaira neziso.
Nokuti haʋatauri rugare;
Asi ʋanofuŋgira aʋo ʋanyerere panyika mashoko okunyeŋgera.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakandishamisira miromo yaʋo;
Ʋakati: Hekani, hekani! meso eɗu akaɀiʋona.
Makaɀiʋona, Jehova; regai kunyarara;
Ishe, regai kugara kure neni.
Ɀimutsei, mukai mundiruramisire;
Nditoŋgerei, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, nokururama kwenyu;
Ŋgaʋarege kufara pamsoro paŋgu.
Ŋgaʋarege kuti mumŋoyo maʋo: Hekani, ndiɀo ɀataŋga ticiɗa;
Ŋgaʋarege kuti: Tamumedza.
Ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ʋaɀidzwe pamŋe cete, iʋo ʋanofarira kutambudzika kwaŋgu;
Ŋgaʋafukidzwe nokunyara nokuɀidzwa, iʋo ʋanoɀikudza pamsoro paŋgu.
Ŋgaʋaɗanidzire nomufaro, ʋafare, iʋo ʋanoɗa kururamiswa kwemhaka yaŋgu;
Ŋgaʋarambe ʋaciti: Jehova ŋgaakudzwe,
Iye, unofarira kufara kwomuranda wake.
Ipapo rurimi rwaŋgu rucataura ɀokururama kwenyu,
Neɀokurumbidzwa kwenyu zuʋa rose.
Kuɗarika kwowakaipa kunoreʋa mumŋoyo maŋgu,
Hakuno‐kutya Mŋari pamberi pameso ake.
Nokuti unoɀiɓata kumeso kwake,
Aciti ɀakaipa ɀake haɀiŋgazikanwi ɀikaʋeŋgwa.
Mashoko omuromo wake ndiɀo ɀakaipa nokunyeŋgera;
Wakarega kuzoʋa wakacenjera nokuita ɀakanaka.
Unofuŋga ɀakaipa panhoʋo dzake;
Unofamba nenzira isina‐kunaka;
Haasemi ɀakaipa.
Ʋunyoro bgenyu, Jehova, bgakaȿika kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga;
Kutendeka kwenyu kunoȿikira kumakore;
Kururama kwenyu kwakafanana namakomo aMŋari;
Kutoŋga kwenyu kwakadzika ɀikuru;
Jehova, munoceŋgeta ʋanhu nemhuka.
Ʋunyoro bgenyu, Mŋari, bgakanaka‐naka sei!
Ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋanondoʋanda pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro enyu.
Ʋacagutswa kwaɀo neɀakakora ɀeimba yenyu;
Mucaʋanwisa parwizi rweɀinofadza ɀenyu;
Nokuti kwamuri ndiko kunetsime roʋupenyu;
Muciedza cenyu ndi’mo matinoʋona ciedza.
Rambai muciitira ʋanokuziʋai ʋunyoro bgenyu;
Nokururama kwenyu kunaʋanemŋoyo yakarurama.
Rutsoka rwounoɀikudza ŋgarurege kuȿikira kwandiri,
Ruʋoko rwowakaipa ŋgarurege kundidziŋga.
Apo ndo’pakawira pasi ʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa;
Ʋakawisirwa pasi, haʋaŋgagoni kumuka ɀe.
Usaʋa neshuŋgu nokuɗa kwaʋanoita ɀakaipa,
Usagoɗora ʋanoita ɀisina‐kururama.
Nokuti ʋacakurumidza kudzurwa soʋuswa,
Ʋacawoma somuriʋo mutema.
Ʋimba naJehova, uite ɀakanaka;
Gara panyika, ushiŋgairire kutendeka.
Farikanya kwaɀo kunaJehova;
Iye agokupa ɀinoɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako.
Isa nzira yako kunaJehova;
Ʋimba ʋo naye, iye ucaɀiita.
Iye ucaɓuɗisa kururama kwako seciedza,
Nokururamisirwa kwako samasikati.
Nyarara pamberi paJehova, umurindire unyerere;
Usaʋa neshuŋgu pamsoro pounofara panzira yake,
Pamsoro pomunhu unoita mano akaipa aakafuŋga.
Rega kutsamŋa, urashe hasha;
Usaʋa neshuŋgu, ɀinoŋgotadzisa munhu.
Nokuti ʋanoita ɀakaipa ʋacagurwa;
Asi ʋanorindira Jehova ʋacagara nhaka yenyika.
Kwasara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, wakaipa haacazoʋi’po;
Ɀirokwaɀo, iwe ucacerekedza ɀakanaka paaigara, asi haacazoʋi’po.
Asi ʋanyoro ndiʋo ʋacagara nhaka yenyika;
Ndiʋo ʋacafarikanya kwaɀo norugare rukuru.
Wakaipa unofuŋgira wakarurama mano akaipa,
Unomurumanyira meno ake.
Ishe ucamuseka;
Nokuti unoʋona kuti zuʋa rake rinoʋuya.
Ʋakaipa ʋakavomora munondo, ʋakawembura ʋuta bgaʋo;
Kuti ʋawisire pasi ʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa,
Kuti ʋaʋuraye ʋakarurama panzira;
Munondo waʋo ucapinda pamŋoyo yaʋo imene,
Ʋuye ʋuta bgaʋo ʋucavuniwa.
Ɀishoma, ɀakanaka, ɀowakarurama ɀinopfuʋura
Ɀakawanda ɀaʋakaipa ʋazhinji.
Nokuti maʋoko aʋakaipa acavuniwa;
Asi Jehova unotsigira ʋakarurama.
Jehova unoziʋa mazuʋa aʋanemŋoyo yakarurama;
Nhaka yaʋo ndeyokusiŋgaperi.
Haʋaŋganyadziswi neŋguʋa yokuipa;
Pamisi yenzara ʋacagutiswa.
Asi ʋakaipa ʋacaparara,
Ʋuye ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaJehova ʋacafanana nokunaka kwamafuro;
Ʋacaroʋa; ʋacaroʋa soʋutsi.
Wakaipa unokwereta, asiŋgaripi ɀe;
Asi wakarurama uneŋgoni, unopa.
Nokuti ʋanokomborerwa naye ʋacagara nhaka yenyika;
Asi ʋanotukwa naye ʋacaparadzwa.
Mufambire womunhu unosimbiswa naJehova;
Unofarikanya munzira yake.
Kunyaŋge akawa, haaŋgawiswi cose;
Nokuti Jehova unomutsigira noruʋoko rwake.
Ndakaŋga ndiri muɗuku, ɀino ndakwegura;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handina‐kutoŋgoʋona wakarurama acisiyiwa,
Kana ʋana ʋake ʋacipemha ɀokudya.
Zuʋa rose unoramba aneŋgoni, aciposa;
Ʋana ʋake ʋanokomborerwa.
Ibva paneɀakaipa, uite ɀakanaka;
Ugare
Nokuti Jehova unoɗa ɀakarurama,
Haasiyi ʋatȿene ʋake;
Ʋanoceŋgetwa nokusiŋgaperi;
Asi ʋana ʋowakaipa ʋacaparadzwa.
Ʋakarurama ʋacagara nhaka yenyika,
Ʋacagara’mo nokusiŋgaperi.
Muromo wowakarurama unotaura ɀenjere,
Rurimi rwake runotaura ɀakarurama.
Murairo waMŋari wake uri mumŋoyo make;
Pakutsika kwake haaŋgatoŋgotedzemuki.
Wakaipa unoʋandira wakarurama,
Acitȿaka kumuʋuraya.
Jehova haaŋgamuregeri muruʋoko rwake,
Kana kumupa mhoȿa kana atoŋgwa.
Rindira Jehova, urambire panzira yake,
Iye ucakukudza kuti ugare nhaka yenyika;
Kana ʋakaipa ʋaciparadzwa iwe ucaɀiʋona.
Ndakaʋona wakaipa anesimba guru,
Acitandaʋara somuti munyoro panyika yawo.
Ɀino mumŋe wakapfuʋura ɀe, wane haaci’po;
Ndakamutȿaka, asi wakaŋga asicawanikwi.
Cerekedzai munhu wakakwana, mutarire wakarurama;
Nokuti kuguma kwomunhu uyo rugare.
Kana ʋari ʋaɗariki, ʋacaparadzwa pamŋe cete;
Pakuguma kwaʋo ʋakaipa ʋacaparadzwa.
Asi kuponeswa kwaʋakarurama kunobva kunaJehova;
Ndiye nhare yaʋo paŋguʋa yokutambudzika.
Jehova unoʋaɓatsira, nokuʋarwira;
Unoʋarwira kunaʋakaipa, nokuʋaponesa,
Nokuti ʋakandoʋanda maari.
Haiwa Jehova, regai kundiraira pakutsamŋa kwenyu;
Musandiraŋga nokusafara kwenyu kukuru.
Nokuti miseʋe yenyu yandiɓaya,
Ruʋoko rwenyu runonditsikirira kwaɀo.
Hakucino‐ʋukukutu panyama yaŋgu nokuɗa kwehasha dzenyu;
Ʋuye hapacino‐mufaro pamafupa aŋgu nokuɗa kweciʋi caŋgu.
Nokuti ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu ɀafukidza musoro waŋgu;
Ɀinondiremera somutoro unorema.
Maronda aŋgu anonhuwa, akaʋora,
Nokuɗa kwoʋupenzi bgaŋgu.
Ndakakombamiswa, ndakakotamiswa kwaɀo,
Ndinofamba ndicicema zuʋa rose.
Nokuti ciʋuno caŋgu cinopisa ɀikuru;
Hakucino‐ʋukukutu panyama yaŋgu.
Ndakati rukutu, ndavunika kwaɀo;
Ndakagomera nokuɗa kwokutambudzika kwomŋoyo waŋgu.
Ishe, ɀose ɀinoɗa mŋoyo waŋgu ɀiri pamberi penyu;
Hamuna‐kuʋanzirwa kugomba kwaŋgu.
Mŋoyo waŋgu unopfura, ndapererwa nesimba raŋgu;
Kana ciri ciedza cameso aŋgu, naico cabva kwandiri.
Ʋanondiɗa, neshamŋari dzaŋgu, ʋanomira kure nokuɗa kwehosha yaŋgu;
Ʋuye hama dzaŋgu dzimire kure.
Ʋanotȿaka ʋupenyu bgaŋgu ʋanonditeyira misuŋgo;
Ʋuye ʋanotȿaka kundikuʋadza ʋanotaura ɀokuparadzwa
Asi ʋanofuŋga kundinyeŋgera zuʋa rose.
Asi ini ndakafanana nematsi, handinzwi;
Ndakafanana nembeʋeʋe isiŋgashamisi muromo wayo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakafanana nomunhu usiŋganzwi,
Usinemhinduro pamuromo wake.
Nokuti ndimi, Jehova, wandinotarira;
Imi mucapindura, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu.
Nokuti ndakati: Ŋgaʋarege kufara pamsoro paŋgu;
Kana rutsoka rwaŋgu rucitedzemuka, ʋanoɀikudza pamsoro paŋgu.
Nokuti ndinoʋaʋarira kugumburwa,
Ʋuye njodzi yaŋgu iri pamberi paŋgu ŋguʋa dzose.
Nokuti ndicaɀireʋurura ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu;
Ndicacema ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu.
Asi ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋakaȿinuka, ʋanesimba;
Ʋuye ʋanondiʋeŋga ndisinemhoȿa ʋawanda.
Naiʋo ʋo ʋanotsiʋa ɀakaipa neɀakanaka,
Ndiʋo ʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu, nokuti ndinoteʋera cinhu cakanaka.
Regai kundisiya, Jehova;
Mŋari waŋgu, regai kuʋa kure neni.
Kurumidzai kundiɓatsira,
Ishe, imi muponesi waŋgu.
Ndakati: Ndicacenjerera nzira dzaŋgu,
Kuti ndirege kutadza norurimi rwaŋgu;
Ndicaceŋgeta muromo waŋgu netomu,
Kana wakaipa ari pamberi paŋgu.
Ndakaŋga ndiri mbeʋeʋe ndisiŋgatauri,
Ndakanyarara haŋgu, ndiri kure neɀakanaka.
Kucema kwaŋgu kukamutswa.
Mŋoyo waŋgu wakaŋga ucipisa mukati maŋgu;
Ndakati ndicifuŋga, mŋoto ukapfuta;
Ipapo ndakataura norurimi rwaŋgu,
Jehova, ndiziʋisei mugumo waŋgu,
Ʋuye mŋero wamazuʋa aŋgu, kuti akaɗini;
Ndiziʋisei kuti ndinoŋgopfuʋura haŋgu.
Tarirai, makaita mazuʋa aŋgu soʋupamhi bgecanza;
Ʋuye ŋguʋa yokurarama kwaŋgu secinhu cisi’po pamberi penyu;
Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu mumŋe nomumŋe kunyaŋge akasimba kwaɀo, mŋeya ɓedzi.
Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unofamba‐famba somumvuri;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋanoita ɓope pasina;
Unoʋuŋganidza
Ɀino Ishe, ndakarindireiko?
Tariro yaŋgu iri kwamuri.
Ndirwirei pakuɗarika kwaŋgu kwose;
Regai kundiita munhu unosekwa namapenzi.
Ndakaŋga ndiri mbeʋeʋe, handinakushamisa muromo waŋgu;
Nokuti ndi’mi makaɀiita.
Bvisai shamhu yenyu kwandiri;
Ndapera nokurobga noruʋoko rwenyu.
Kana muciraira munhu mucimuraŋga pamsoro peɀakaipa,
Munopedza kunaka kwake seciʋundudzi;
Ɀirokwaɀo munhu mumŋe nomumŋe mŋeya hake.
Inzwai munyeŋgetero waŋgu, Jehova, rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu munzwe kucema kwaŋgu;
Musanyarara
Nokuti ndiri mŋeni kwamuri,
Mutorwa, seɀakaŋga ɀakaita madziɓaɓa aŋgu ose.
Regai kunditarira, kuti ndimbonaya haŋgu,
Ndisati ndabva pano, ndikasazoʋa’po.
Ndakarindira‐rindira Jehova;
Akarerekera kwandiri, akanzwa kucema kwaŋgu.
Akandiɓuɗisa ʋo pagomba rokuparadzwa, nomudziʋa ramatope;
Akamisa tsoka dzaŋgu paɗombo, akasimbisa kufamba kwaŋgu.
Akaisa rwiyo rutȿa mumuromo maŋgu, rwokurumbidza Mŋari weɗu narwo;
Ʋazhinji ʋacaɀiʋona, ʋacitya,
Ʋacaʋimba naJehova.
Wakakomborerwa unoita Jehova ciʋando cake.
Usinehanya naʋanoɀikudza, naʋanotsaukira kunhema.
Jehova Mŋari waŋgu, maɓasa enyu, anoshamisa, amakaita, mazhinji,
Nemifuŋgo yenyu kwatiri;
Hapana‐uŋgaenzaniswa nemi.
Kana ndikaɗa kuɀiɗudzira nokuɀireʋa,
Haɀiŋgaʋereŋgwi nokuwanda kwaɀo.
Imi hamufadzwi neɀiɓayiro neɀipiriso;
Makandidziʋurira nzeʋe dzaŋgu;
Ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀeɀiʋi hamuna‐kuɀireʋa.
Ipapo ndakati: Tarirai, ndaʋuya;
Parugwaro rwakapetwa ndakaɀirairwa:
Ndinofara kwaɀo kuita kuɗa kwenyu, Mŋari waŋgu;
Ɀirokwaɀo murairo wenyu uri mumŋoyo maŋgu.
Ndakaparidza mashoko omufaro paʋuŋgano huru;
Tarirai, handiŋgadzori miromo yaŋgu,
Jehova, munoɀiziʋa.
Handina‐kuʋanza kururama kwenyu mumŋoyo maŋgu;
Ndakaɗudzira kutendeka kwenyu nokuponesa kwenyu;
Handina‐kuʋanzira ʋuŋgano huru ʋunyoro bgenyu neɀokwaɗi yenyu.
Jehova, imi hamuŋgandinyimi ŋgoni dzenyu;
Ʋunyoro bgenyu neɀokwaɗi yenyu ɀicandiceŋgeta ŋguʋa dzose.
Nokuti maɗambudzo asiŋgaʋereŋgwi akandikomberedza,
Ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu ɀakandiɓata, naiɀoɀo handigoni kutarira kumsoro;
Ɀakawanda kupfuʋura vudzi romusoro waŋgu, ndapera mŋoyo.
Jehova, ŋgaɀikufadzei kundirwira;
Kurumidzai kundiɓatsira, Jehova.
Ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ŋgaʋaɀidzwe pamŋe cete
Iʋo ʋanotȿaka mŋeya waŋgu kuti ʋauparadze;
Ŋgaʋadzoserwe shure, ʋashoʋorwe
Iʋo ʋanofarira kundikuʋadza.
Ŋgaʋavunduswe nokuɗa kwenyadzi dzaʋo
Iʋo ʋanoti kwandiri: Hekani, hekani waro!
Ʋose ʋanokutȿakai ŋgaʋafarise ʋaʋe nomufaro mamuri;
Ʋanoɗa kuponesa kwenyu ŋgaʋarambe ʋaciti:
Jehova ŋgaakudzwe!
Asi ini ndiri murombo nomushaiwi;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Ishe unondifuŋga;
Imi muri muɓatsiri waŋgu nomurwiri waŋgu;
Regai kunonoka, Mŋari waŋgu.
Wakakomborerwa unehanya naʋarombo;
Jehova ucamurwira nomusi weɀakaipa.
Jehova ucamuceŋgeta nokumuraramisa, ucakomborerwa panyika;
Hamuŋgamuisi pakuɗa kwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋake.
Jehova ucamutsigira panhoʋo yoʋurwere;
Munoshandura nhoʋo dzake dzose pakurwara kwake.
Ini ndakati: Jehova, ndinzwirei tsitsi;
Poresai mŋeya waŋgu; nokuti ndakakutadzirai.
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋanotaura ɀakaipa pamsoro paŋgu,
Ucagofa riniko, zita rake riroʋe?
Kana mumŋe aciʋuya kuzondiʋona, unotaura ɀisinamaturo;
Mŋoyo wake unoɀiʋuŋganidzira ɀakaipa;
Kana oɓuɗa kumŋe, unoɀiparidza.
Ʋose, ʋanondiʋeŋga, ʋanoita zeʋe‐zeʋe pamŋe cete pamsoro paŋgu;
Ʋanoraŋgana kundikuʋadza.
Cinhu cakaipa cakamunamatira — ndiɀo ɀaʋanotaura;
Ɀino ɀaaʋata pasi, haacazomuki ɀe.
Haiwa, kunyaŋge shamŋari yaŋgu caiyo, wandaiʋimba naye, waidya ɀokudya ɀaŋgu,
Naiye wandisimudzira cicitsinho cake.
Asi imi Jehova, ndinzwirei tsitsi, mundisimudzei,
Kuti ndiʋatsiʋe.
Ndinoziʋiswa necinhu ici kuti munofadzwa neni,
Nokuti muʋeŋgi waŋgu haandikundi.
Kana ndiri’ni munonditsigira pakururama kwaŋgu,
Munondiisa pamberi penyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, ŋgaaʋoŋgwe,
Kubva pakusiŋgaperi kuȿikira pakusiŋgaperi.
Ameni, ɀirokwaɀo Ameni.
Senondo inotakwairira hoʋa dzemvura,
Saiɀoɀo mŋeya waŋgu unokutakwairirai imi Mŋari.
Mŋeya waŋgu unenyota kunaMŋari, iye Mŋari mupenyu:
Ndicaȿika riniko ndiʋonekwe NaMŋari?
Misodzi yaŋgu ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀokudya ɀaŋgu masikati noʋusiku,
Pakutaura kwaʋo zuʋa rose kwandiri ʋaciti: Mŋari wako uripiko?
Ndinoraŋgarira ɀinhu iɀi, ndiciɗurura mŋeya waŋgu mukati maŋgu,
Ɀokuti ndaienda naʋazhinji, ndiciʋatuŋgamirira kuimba yaMŋari
Nenzwi rokufara nokurumbidza, tiri ʋazhinji ʋaitamba mutambo.
Unoshuwireiko, mŋeya waŋgu?
Unoshaiwa rugare neiko mukati maŋgu?
Tarira kunaMŋari; nokuti ndicazomurumbidza haŋgu,
Nokuɗa kwokuponesa kweciso cake.
Haiwa Mŋari, mŋeya waŋgu unoshuwa mukati maŋgu;
Naiɀoɀo ndinokuraŋgarirai ndiri panyika yaJoridani,
Pakadzika panoɗana pakadzika pakutinhira kwamapopopo enyu;
Mafuŋgu enyu namapoporodzi enyu akapfuʋura napamsoro paŋgu.
Ʋusiku rwiyo rwake rucaʋa neni,
Ndicati kunaMŋari, ɗombo raŋgu: Makandikaŋganwireiko?
Ndinofambireiko ndicicema nemhaka yokumanikidza kwomuʋeŋgi
Ɀakafanana nomunondo pamafupa aŋgu, kana ʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu ʋacindiɀidza;
Kana ʋaciramba ʋaciti kwandiri: Mŋari wako uripiko?
Unoshuwireiko, mŋeya waŋgu?
Unoshaiwa rugare neiko mukati maŋgu?
Tarira kunaMŋari; nokuti ndicazomurumbidza haŋgu,
Iye muponesi weciso caŋgu, NaMŋari waŋgu.
Nditoŋgerei Mŋari, mundireʋerere pamhoȿa yaŋgu parudzi rusinetsitsi;
Ndirwirei pamunhu unonyeŋgera usino‐kururama.
Nokuti ndi’mi Mŋari simba raŋgu; mandirashireiko?
Ndinofambireiko ndicicema nokuɗa kwokumanikidza kwomuʋeŋgi?
Tumai ciedza cenyu neɀokwaɗi yenyu; ɀindituŋgamirire;
Ɀindiȿitse kugomo renyu dɀene,
Nokutabernakeri dzenyu.
Ipapo ndicaȿika kuartari yaMŋari,
KunaMŋari, iye mufaro waŋgu mukuru;
Ndicakurumbidzai nembira, imi Mŋari, Mŋari waŋgu.
Unoshuwireiko, mŋeya waŋgu?
Unoshaiwa rugare neiko mukati maŋgu?
Tarira kunaMŋari; nokuti ndicazomurumbidza haŋgu,
Iye muponesi weciso caŋgu, naMŋari waŋgu.
Mŋari, takanzwa nenzeʋe dzeɗu, madziɓaɓa eɗu akatiʋudza,
Ƃasa ramakaɓata pamisi yaʋo, napamisi yekare.
Makadziŋga ʋahedeni noruʋoko rwenyu, mukaʋasima iʋo;
Makatambudza ndudzi dzaʋanhu mukaʋaparadzira iʋo.
Nokuti haʋana‐kuɀiwanira nyika nomunondo waʋo,
Ruʋoko rwaʋo haruna‐kuʋaponesa;
Asi canza cenyu corudyi, noruʋoko rwenyu, neciedza ceciso cenyu,
Nokuti maiʋafarira.
Ndimi Mambo waŋgu, imi Mŋari;
Rairai kuti Jakobo akunde.
Nemi ticawisira pasi ʋadziʋisi ʋeɗu;
Nezita renyu ticatsika pasi ʋanotimukira.
Nokuti handiŋgaʋimbi noʋuta bgaŋgu,
Nomunondo waŋgu hauŋgandiponesi.
Asi imi makatiponesa paʋadziʋisi ʋeɗu,
Mukanyadzisa ʋanotiʋeŋga.
Takaɀirumbidza zuʋa rose munaMŋari,
Ticaʋoŋga zita renyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi ɀino makatirasha henyu, mukatinyadzisa;
Hamucafambi nehondo dzeɗu.
Munotitizisa pamberi paʋadziʋisi;
Ʋanotiʋeŋga ʋanoɀipambira.
Makatiisa samakwai akatarirwa kuɓayiwa;
Makatiparadzira pakati paʋahedeni.
Munoteŋgesa ʋanhu ʋenyu musinacamunopiwa,
Hamuna‐kuwedzera
Munotiita ʋanhu ʋanosekwa naʋatinogara naʋo,
Ʋanhu ʋanoɀidzwa nokusekwa naʋakatikomberedza.
Munotiita shumo pakati paʋahedeni,
Ʋanhu ʋanotidzuŋgudzira misoro.
Zuʋa rose kuɀidzwa kwaŋgu kuri pamberi paŋgu,
Kunyara kweciso caŋgu kwakandifukidza.
Nokuɗa kwenzwi romutuki nomuɀidzi;
Nokuɗa kwomuʋeŋgi nomutsiʋi.
Iɀi ɀose ɀakatiwira; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hatina‐kukukaŋganwai,
Hatina‐kunyeŋgedzera pasuŋgano yenyu.
Mŋoyo yeɗu haina‐kudzokera shure,
Kutsika kweɗu hakuna‐kutsauka panzira yenyu;
Kunyaŋge makatipxanya‐pxanya panɀimbo yamakaʋa,
Mukatifukidza nomumvuri worufu.
Kana ticiŋge takaŋganwa zita raMŋari weɗu,
Kana kutambanudzira maʋoko eɗu kumŋari waʋamŋe;
Ko Mŋari haaŋganɀeri iɀoɀo here?
Nokuti iye unoziʋa ɀakaʋanzika ɀomŋoyo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, nokuɗa kwenyu tinoʋurawa zuʋa rose;
Tinonzi tiri makwai akatarirwa kuɓayiwa.
Mukai, munoʋatireiko, Ishe?
Mukai, musatirasha nokusiŋgaperi.
Munoʋanzireiko ciso cenyu,
Mucikaŋganwa kutambudzika kweɗu nokumanikidzwa kweɗu?
Nokuti mŋeya weɗu wakotamira kuguruʋa;
Ƌumbu reɗu rinonamatira pavu.
Simukai mutiɓatsire,
Mutidzikinure nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu.
Mŋoyo waŋgu unotutuma namashoko akanaka;
Ndinotaura ɀinhu ɀandakaita ɀinoreʋa mambo;
Rurimi rwaŋgu ipeni yomunyori unokurumidza kunyora.
Imi makanaka‐naka kupfuʋura ʋana ʋaʋanhu;
Nyasha yakaɗururirwa pamiromo yenyu;
Saka Mŋari wakakuropafadzai nokusiŋgaperi.
Suŋgai munondo wenyu paciʋuno cenyu, imi wamasimba,
Ʋukuru bgenyu noʋumambo bgenyu.
Fambai noʋumambo bgenyu mucikunda,
Nokuɗa kweɀokwaɗi noʋunyoro nokururama;
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi ŋgarukudzidzisei ɀinotyisa.
Miseʋe yenyu inopinza;
Ʋanhu ʋanokundwa nemi;
Inoɓaya pamŋoyo yaʋaʋeŋgi ʋamambo.
Cigaro cenyu coʋushe, imi Mŋari, ciri’po nokusiŋgaperi‐peri;
Tȿimbo yoʋushe bgenyu itȿimbo yakarurama.
Makaɗa kururama, mukaʋeŋga kusarurama;
Naiɀoɀo Mŋari, Mŋari wenyu, wakakuzodzai
Namafuta okufara kupfuʋura shamŋari dzenyu.
Ŋguʋo dzenyu dzose
Maɗimbga akakufadzai aciridzwa mudzimba dzamambo dzenyaŋga dzenzou.
Ʋakunda ʋamadzimambo ʋari pakati paʋanhukadzi ʋenyu ʋanokudzwa;
Paruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi ʋahosi ʋamire ʋakashoŋga ndarama yeOfiri.
Terera mukunda, raŋgarira, urereke nzeʋe yako;
Kaŋganwa ʋo ʋanhu ʋako, neimba yaɓaɓa ʋako;
Ipapo mambo ucaɗa kunaka kwako;
Nokuti ndiye Ishe wako; unamate kwaari iwe.
Ʋuye mukunda weTiro
Ʋafumi pakati paʋanhu ʋacakumbira ŋgoni dzako.
Mukunda wamambo wakanaka kwaɀo‐kwaɀo mukati meimba yamambo;
Ŋguʋo dzake dzakarukwa nendarama.
Ucaperekwa kunamambo neŋguʋo dzakarukwa dzinamaʋara;
Mhandara, shamŋari dzake dzinomuteʋera,
Ʋacaiswa kwamuri.
Ʋacaperekwa nomufaro nokufarisisa;
Ʋacapinda mumba mamambo.
Panɀimbo yamadziɓaɓa ako ʋana ʋako ʋacaʋa’po,
Ʋaucaita macinda panyika yose.
Ndicayeʋudzira zita renyu kuȿikira kumarudzi ose;
Naiɀoɀo ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzicakuʋoŋgai nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Mŋari ndiye ʋutiziro bgeɗu nesimba reɗu,
Ndiye muɓatsiri uri pedyo‐pedyo paŋguʋa dzokumanikidzwa.
Saka hatiŋgatyi, kunyaŋge nyika ikashanduka,
Ʋuye kunyaŋge makomo akabviswa akaiswa mukati mamakuŋgwa;
Kunyaŋge mvura zhinji yawo ikatinhira nokumutswa,
Kunyaŋge makomo akaɗeɗera nokupupuma kwawo.
Rwizi ruri’po, runehoʋa dzinofadza guta raMŋari,
Mŋari uri mukati maro; hariŋgazunuŋguswi;
Mŋari ucariɓatsira kana ʋutoŋga bgotȿuka.
Ʋahedeni ʋakaita ɓope, ʋushe bgakazunuŋguswa;
Wakataura nenzwi rake, nyika ikanyauka.
Jehova wehondo une’su;
Mŋari waJakobo inhare yeɗu.
Ʋuyai muʋone maɓasa aJehova,
Ɀishamiso ɀaakaita panyika.
Unogumisa kurwa kuȿikira pakuguma kwenyika;
Unovuna ʋuta, nokuvuna‐vuna pfumo;
Unopisa ŋgoro dzokurwa nomŋoto.
Nyararai, muziʋe kuti ndini Mŋari;
Ndicaʋa mukuru pakati paʋahedeni, ndicaʋa mukuru panyika.
Jehova wehondo une’su;
Mŋari waJakobo inhare yeɗu.
Ʋucirai, imi ʋanhu ʋose!
Pururudzai kunaMŋari nenzwi romufaro mukuru!
Nokuti Jehova wokumsoro‐soro unotyisa;
Ndiye Mambo mukuru panyika yose.
Ndiye unotikundisa ndudzi dzaʋanhu,
Nendudzi pasi petsoka dzeɗu.
Ndiye unotitsaurira nhaka yeɗu,
Iyo fuma yaJakobo waanoɗa.
Mŋari wakwira nokuɗanidzira,
Jehova nokurira kwehwamanda.
Imbirai Mŋari nziyo dzokurumbidza, muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza;
Imbirai Mambo weɗu nziyo dzokurumbidza, muimbirei nziyo dzokurumbidza.
Nokuti Mŋari ndiye Mambo wapasi pose;
Muimbirei rwiyo rwakanaka rwokumurumbidza.
Mŋari unoɓata ʋushe bgaʋahedeni;
Mŋari ugere pacigaro cake citȿene coʋushe.
Macinda aʋanhu aʋuŋgana
Pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋaMŋari waAbrahama;
Nokuti nhoʋo dzapasi
Ndiye mukuru‐kuru kwaɀo.
Jehova mukuru, unofanira kurumbidzwa kwaɀo,
Muguta raMŋari weɗu, mugomo rake dɀene.
Rakanaka pakukwirira kwaro, mufaro wapasi pose,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita gomo reZioni, pamatiʋi okumsoro,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita guta raMambo mukuru.
Padzimba dzaro dzamambo Mŋari wakaɀiratidza kuti ndiye nhare.
Nokuti tarirai, madzimambo akaʋuŋgana,
Akapfuʋura pamŋe cete.
Ʋakariʋona, ʋakashamiswa;
Ʋakavunduka, ʋakakurumidza kutiza.
Ʋakaɓatwa’po nokuɗeɗera;
Nokurwadziwa, somukadzi unopona.
Munoputsa ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi,
Nemhepo, inobva mabvazuʋa.
Seɀatakanzwa, ndiɀo ɀatakaʋona
Paguta raJehova wehondo, iro guta raMŋari weɗu;
Mŋari ucarisimbisa nokusiŋgaperi.
Takafuŋga ʋunyoro bgenyu, Mŋari,
Mukati metembere yenyu.
Seɀakaita zita renyu, Mŋari,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋo kurumbidzwa kwenyu kuȿikira kumigumo yapasi
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi ruzere nokururama.
Gomo reZioni ŋgarifare,
Ʋakunda ʋaJuda ŋgaʋafare kwaɀo,
Nokuɗa kweɀamakatoŋga.
Poteredzai Zioni, mupote naro,
Muʋereŋge shoŋgwe dzaro.
Cerekedzai ɀakanaka nhare dzaro,
Fambai pakati pedzimba dzaro dzamambo;
Kuti muzoʋudza ʋazukuru
Nokuti Mŋari uyu ndiye Mŋari weɗu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri;
Iye ucaʋa muperekedzi weɗu kuȿikira pakufa.
Inzwai cinhu ici, imi ʋanhu ʋose;
Tererai, imi mose mugere panyika;
Imi ʋaɗuku naʋanokudzwa,
Ʋafumi naʋarombo pamŋe cete.
Muromo waŋgu ucataura ʋucenjeri;
Ʋuye kufuŋga kwomŋoyo waŋgu kucaʋa nenjere.
Ndicarerekera nzeʋe yaŋgu
Ndicaɗudza shoko raŋgu rakaʋanzika nembira.
Ndicatya neiko pamisi yeɀakaipa,
Kana ɀakaipa, ɀaʋanoɗa kundidziŋga, ɀicindikomba?
Iʋo, ʋanoʋimba nefuma yaʋo,
Ʋanoɀikudza pamsoro pokuwanda kwefuma yaʋo;
Hapana‐uŋgatoŋgodzikinura hama yake,
Kana kupa Mŋari rudzikinuro pamsoro pake;
(Nokuti rudzikinuro rwemŋeya yaʋo runokosha,
Runofanira kuregwa nokusiŋgaperi;)
Kuti arambe ari mupenyu misi yose,
Arege kuʋona kuʋora.
Nokuti unoʋona kuti ʋacenjeri ʋanofa,
Ƃenzi nousinenjere ʋanopera pamŋe cete,
Ʋacisiyira ʋamŋe fuma yaʋo.
Ʋanofuŋga pamŋoyo paʋo kuti dzimba dzaʋo dzicagara nokusiŋgaperi,
Noʋugaro bgaʋo kuȿikira kumarudzi
Nyika dzaʋo ʋanodzitumidza mazita aʋo.
Asi munhu haagari acikudzwa,
Wakafanana nemhuka dzinopera.
Iyi ndiyo nzira yamapenzi;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanhu ʋanoʋateʋera ʋacitenda ɀaʋanotaura.
Ʋakatarirwa Sheori samakwai;
Rufu rucaʋa mufudzi waʋo;
Ʋakarurama ʋacaɓata ʋushe pamsoro paʋo maŋgwanani;
Kunaka kwaʋo kucaŋgoparadzwa neSheori, kuti kurege kuʋa noʋugaro.
Asi Mŋari ucadzikinura mŋeya waŋgu pasimba reSheori;
Nokuti iye ucandigamucira.
Usatya hako iwe kana
Kana fuma yeimba yake iciwedzerwa;
Nokuti kana acifa hapana‐caacaenda naco;
Mukurumbira wake hauŋgaɓuruki ucimuteʋera.
Kunyaŋge paʋupenyu bgake waikorokotedza mŋeya wake,
Ucaenda iye kurudzi rwamadziɓaɓa ake;
Iʋo haʋaŋgatoŋgoʋoni ciedza nokusiŋgaperi.
Munhu, unokudzwa, asinenjere,
Wakafanana nemhuka dzinopera.
Mŋari, iye Mŋari, Jehova, ndiye wakataura,
Akaɗana pasi
Mŋari wakapenya
Ari paZioni, iro rakanaka‐naka kwaɀo.
Mŋari weɗu unoʋuya, haaŋgarambi anyerere;
Mŋoto unoparadza pamberi pake,
Ƌutu guru rinomukomberedza.
Unoɗana ɗeŋga kumsoro,
Napasi, kuti atoŋgere ʋanhu ʋake;
Ʋuŋganidzirai ʋatȿene ʋaŋgu kwandiri;
Iʋo ʋakaita suŋgano neni neɀiɓayiro.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kunoɗudzira kururama kwake;
Nokuti Mŋari ndiye mutoŋgi amene.
Inzwai ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndicataura;
Imi Israeri, ndicakupupurirai:
Ndini Mŋari, iye Mŋari wenyu.
Handiŋgakutukiyi pamsoro peɀiɓayiro ɀenyu;
Ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa ɀiri pamberi paŋgu ŋguʋa dzose.
Handiŋgatori nzombe paimba yako,
Kana nhoŋgo dzembudzi paɀirugu ɀako.
Nokuti mhuka dzose, dziri kuɗondo, ndedzaŋgu,
Neŋombe pamakomo anecuru camazana.
Ndinoziʋa shiri dzose dzomumakomo;
Mhuka dzose, dziri musaŋgo, ndedzaŋgu.
Kana ndaiʋa nenzara, handizaikuʋudza iwe;
Nokuti nyika ndeyaŋgu, neɀaizere naɀo.
Ko ndiŋgadya nyama yehando,
Kana kunwa ropa rembudzi here?
Ƃayirai Mŋari ɀiɓayiro ɀokuʋoŋga;
Uripire Wokumsoro‐soro mhiko dzako;
Uɗane kwandiri pazuʋa rokutambudzika;
Ini ndicakurwira, iwe ugondirumbidza.
Asi kunowakaipa Jehova unoti:
Iwe uŋgaɗudzira seiko ɀandakatema,
Nokureʋa suŋgano yaŋgu nomuromo wako?
Ɀaunoʋeŋga kurairwa,
Nokurasha mashoko aŋgu shure kwako.
Wakati uciʋona mbava, ukafarirana nayo,
Unoshamŋaridzana nemhombge.
Unotendera muromo wako kureʋa ɀakaipa,
Rurimi rwako runotaura nhema.
Unogara ucipomera hama yako;
Unoita makuhwa pamsoro pomŋanakomana wamai ʋako.
Ɀinhu iɀi wakaɀiita, ndikaramba ndinyerere;
Wakafuŋga kuti ini ndakafanana newe cose;
Asi ndicakuraira, ndiciroŋgedzera ɀinhu iɀi pameso ako.
Ɀino fuŋgai cinhu ici, imi ʋokukaŋganwa Mŋari,
Ndirege kukubvamburai, mukashaiwa murwiri:
Munhu, unoɓayira ciɓayiro cokuʋoŋga, unondikudza;
Ʋuye unogadzira nzira yake ɀakanaka
Ndicamuratidza kuponesa kwaMŋari.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Mŋari, nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu;
Dzimai kuɗarika kwaŋgu nokuɗa kweŋgoni dzenyu zhinji.
Ndisukei ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu cose,
Ndinatsei ciʋi caŋgu.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuɗarika kwaŋgu;
Ciʋi caŋgu cinogara ciri pamberi paŋgu.
Ndakakutadzirai imi, iyemi moga,
Ndakaita cinhu cakaipa pamberi penyu;
Kuti munzi makarurama pakutaura kwenyu,
Muʋe usinemhoȿa pakutoŋga kwenyu.
Tarirai, ndakaɓerekerwa muɀakaipa;
Mai ʋaŋgu ʋakandigamucira muɀiʋi.
Tarirai, munoɗa ɀokwaɗi pamŋoyo;
Munoɗa kundidzidzisa ʋucenjeri mukati makaʋanda.
Ndinatsei nehisopi, ndiʋe wakanaka,
Ndishambidzei, ndicene kupfuʋura mazaya ecando.
Ndinzwisei mufaro ndiʋe nomŋoyo mucena;
Kuti mafupa amakavuna afare.
Ʋanzirai ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ciso cenyu,
Dzimai ɀakaipa ɀaŋgu ɀose.
Sikai mukati maŋgu mŋoyo wakacena, Mŋari;
Ʋandudzai mukati maŋgu mŋeya wakarurama.
Regai kundirasha pamberi penyu;
Musabvisa mŋeya wenyu mutȿene kwandiri.
Dzoserai ɀe kwandiri mufaro wokuponesa kwenyu;
Nditsigirei nomŋeya, unoɗa.
Ipapo ndicadzidzisa ʋaɗariki nzira dzenyu;
Ʋuye ʋatadzi ʋacatendeʋukira kwamuri.
Ndirwirei pamhoȿa yeropa, Mŋari, imi Mŋari muponesi waŋgu;
Ipapo rurimi rwaŋgu rucaimbira kururama kwenyu kwaɀo.
Ishe, zarurai miromo yaŋgu;
Ipapo muromo waŋgu ucaparidza kurumbidzwa kwenyu.
Nokuti imi hamufariri ɀiɓayiro; ndiŋgaɗai ndaikupai iɀo;
Hamufadzwi necipiriso cinopiswa.
Ɀiɓayiro ɀaMŋari mŋeya wakaputsika;
Mŋoyo wakaputsika nowakapxanyika, imi Mŋari hamuŋgaushoʋori.
Itirai Zioni ɀakanaka nokuɗa kwenyu;
Ʋakai maȿiŋgo eJerusarema.
Ipapo mucafarira ɀiɓayiro ɀakarurama, necipiriso cinopiswa necipiriso cinopiswa cose;
Ipapo ʋacaɓayira nzombe paartari yenyu.
Unoɀirumbidzireiko neɀakashata, iwe mhare?
Tsitsi dzaMŋari dziri’po misi yose.
Rurimi rwako runofuŋga
Rwakafanana neciȿo cinopinza, ruciita ɀinonyeŋgera.
Unoɗa ɀakaipa kupfuʋura ɀakanaka;
Nokureʋa nhema kupfuʋura kutaura ɀakarurama.
Unoɗa mashoko ose okuparadza,
Iwe rurimi runonyeŋgera.
Mŋari ucakuparadza ʋo saiɀoɀo nokusiŋgaperi,
Ucakuɓata akakubvisa patente rako,
Nokukudzura panyika yaʋapenyu.
Ʋakarurama ʋacaɀiʋona ʋakatya,
Ʋacamuseka, ʋaciti:
Tarirai, hoyu munhu usina‐kuita Mŋari nhare yake,
Asi wakaʋimba nokuwanda kwefuma yake,
Akaɀisimbisa paɀakaipa ɀake.
Asi kana ndiri’ni, ndakafanana nomuorivi munyoro muimba yaMŋari;
Ndinoʋimba netsitsi dzaMŋari nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti ndi’mi makaɀiita;
Ndicamirira zita renyu pamberi paʋatȿene ʋenyu nokuti rakanaka.
Ƃenzi rakati mumŋoyo maro: Mŋari hakuna.
Ʋakaʋora, ʋakaita ɀakaipa ɀinonyaŋgadza;
Hakuna‐unoita ɀakanaka.
Mŋari, ari kuɗeŋga, wakatarira pasi kuʋana ʋaʋanhu,
Kuti aʋone kana wakacenjera ari’po,
Unotȿaka Mŋari.
Mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo wakadzokera shure; ʋakaȿiɓiswa pamŋe cete;
Hakuna‐unoita ɀakanaka, kunyaŋge nomumŋe.
Ko ʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa haʋaneziʋo here?
Iʋo ʋanodya ʋanhu ʋaŋgu seciŋgwa,
Ʋasiŋgaɗani kunaMŋari.
Ʋaitya kwaɀo ipapo, pakaŋga pasina‐cinotyisa;
Nokuti Mŋari wakaparadza mafupa aiye wakaŋga akakukomba;
Iwe wakaʋanyadzisa, nokuti Mŋari wakaʋarasha.
Ƌayi kuponeswa kwaIsraeri kwaibva paZioni!
Kana Mŋari acidzosa ʋanhu ʋake pakutapxa,
Ipapo Jakobo ucafara kwaɀo, naIsraeri ucafara.
Ndirwirei Mŋari, nezita renyu,
Nditoŋgerei nesimba renyu.
Inzwai munyeŋgetero waŋgu, Mŋari;
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu munzwe mashoko omuromo waŋgu.
Nokuti ʋatorwa ʋakandimukira,
Ʋamanikidzi ʋakatȿaka mŋeya waŋgu.
Haʋana‐kuisa Mŋari pamberi paʋo.
Tarirai, Mŋari ndiye muɓatsiri waŋgu.
Ishe uri pakati paʋanotsigira mŋeya waŋgu.
Ucatsiʋa ɀakaipa kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
Muʋaparadze nokutendeka kwenyu.
Ndicakuɓayirai necipiriso cokuŋgopa nokuɀiɗira;
Ndicaʋoŋga zita renyu, Jehova, nokuti rakanaka.
Nokuti wakandirwira pakutambudzika kwose;
Ziso raŋgu rakaʋona
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu kumunyeŋgetero wangu, Mŋari;
Regai kuɀiʋanza pakukumbira kwaŋgu.
Nditererei, mundipindure;
Ndinoshaiwa zororo mukucema kwaŋgu, ndiciʋuʋura;
Nokuɗa kwenzwi romuʋeŋgi,
Nokuɗa kwokumanikidza kwowakaipa;
Nokuti ʋanondipomera ɀakaipa,
Ʋanonditambudza nokutsamŋa
Mŋoyo waŋgu unorwadziwa kwaɀo mukati maŋgu;
Garudzo rorufu rakandiwira,
Kutya nokubvunda ɀakandiwira.
Kutya kukuru kwakandifukidza.
Ini ndikati: Haiwa, ɗayi ndaiʋa namapapiro senjiʋa!
Ndaibururuka, ndikandozorora.
Tarirai, ndiŋgaɗayi ndaitizira kure,
Ndaindogara kurenje.
Ndaikurumidza kundoʋanda,
Nditize mhepo inovuvuta neɗutu guru.
Paradzai, Ishe, mukaŋganise marimi aʋo;
Nokuti ndakaʋona kumanikidza nokurwa muguta.
Masikati noʋusiku ʋanoripoteredza pamaȿiŋgo aro;
Ɀakaipa ʋo neɀakashata ɀiri mukati maro.
Kushata kuri pakati paro;
Kumanikidza nokunyeŋgera haɀibvi panzira dzaro.
Nokuti wakaŋga asi muʋeŋgi wakandishoʋora;
Ipapo ndaigona kutsuŋga;
Wakaŋga asi iye waindiʋeŋga wakaɀikudza kwandiri;
Ipapo ndaimuʋanda.
Asi wakaŋga uri’we, munhu wakaenzana neni,
Shamŋari yaŋgu, nomuzikani waŋgu.
Taisiraŋgana ɀakanaka,
Taifamba mumba maMŋari pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Rufu ŋgaruʋawire kamŋe‐kamŋe,
Ŋgaʋaɓurukire kuSheori ʋari ʋapenyu;
Nokuti kushata kuri paʋugaro bgaʋo, imo mukati maʋo.
Kana ndiri’ni, ndicaɗana kunaMŋari;
Jehova ucandiponesa.
Maɗekwana namaŋgwanani namasikati ndicacema ndiciʋuʋura;
Iye ucanzwa inzwi raŋgu.
Wakadzikinura mŋeya waŋgu norugare, kukasaʋa nomumŋe wakasweɗera kwandiri;
Nokuti
Mŋari ucanzwa, ucaʋapindura,
Iye uri’po kare nakare,
Haʋatyi Mŋari.
Wakatambanudzira maʋoko ake kunaʋaiʋa norugare naye;
Wakashoʋora suŋgano yake.
Mashoko omuromo wake akatedza samafuta,
Asi kurwa kwakaŋga kuri pamŋoyo pake;
Mashoko ake akaŋga ari manyoro kupfuʋura mafuta,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro yaiʋa minondo yakavomorwa.
Kandira mutoro wako pamsoro paJehova, iye ucakusimbisa;
Haaŋgatoŋgotenderi wakarurama kuti azunuŋguswe.
Asi imi Mŋari mucaʋaɓurusira kugomba rokuparadzwa;
Ʋanhu ʋanokarira ropa naʋanonyeŋgera haʋaŋgapedzi hafu yamazuʋa aʋo;
Asi ini ndicaʋimba nemi.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Mŋari; nokuti ʋanhu ʋanotȿaka kundimedza;
Zuʋa rose ʋanorwa neni ʋacindimanikidza.
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋanoɗa kundimedza zuʋa rose;
Nokuti ʋanorwa neni ʋaciɀikudza ʋazhinji.
Paŋguʋa yandinotya,
Ndicaʋimba nemi.
MunaMŋari ndicarumbidza shoko rake;
Ndakaʋimba naMŋari, handiŋgatyi;
Nyama iŋgandiiteiko?
Zuʋa rose ʋanoshandura mashoko aŋgu;
Mifuŋgo yaʋo yose inondifuŋgira ɀakaipa.
Ʋanoʋuŋgana, ʋanoʋanda,
Ʋanocerekedza makwara aŋgu,
Kana ʋaciʋandira mŋeya waŋgu.
Ʋacapukunyuka
Paradzai ʋanhu nokutsamŋa
Imi munoʋereŋga madzuŋgairire aŋgu;
Isai misodzi yaŋgu mumudziyo wenyu;
Haizi murugwaro rwenyu here?
Ipapo ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋacadzokera shure nomusi wandinoɗana;
Ndinoziʋa cinhu ici, kuti Mŋari uri kurutiʋi rwaŋgu.
MunaMŋari ndicarumbidza shoko
MunaJehova ndicarumbidza shoko
Ndakaʋimba naMŋari, handiŋgatyi;
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgandiiteiko?
Ndinosuŋgwa neɀandakakupikirai Mŋari;
Ndicakuʋigirai ɀipiriso ɀokuʋoŋga naɀo.
Nokuti makarwira mŋeya waŋgu parufu;
Namakumbo aŋgu pakugumburwa.
Kuti ndifambe pamberi paMŋari
Muciedza coʋupenyu.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Mŋari, ndinzwirei tsitsi;
Nokuti mŋeya waŋgu unotizira kwamuri;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicatizira kumumvuri wamapapiro enyu,
Kuȿikira njodzi dzapfuʋura.
Ndicaɗanidzira kunaMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro;
KunaMŋari unondiitira
Ucatuma
Kana iye, unoʋaʋarira kundimedza, acindishoʋora;
Mŋari ucatuma tsitsi dzake neɀokwaɗi yake.
Mŋeya waŋgu uri pakati peshumba;
Ndinoʋata pasi pakati paʋanopfuta
Iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu, ʋanameno aneŋge mapfumo nemiseʋe,
Ʋuye rurimi rwaʋo munondo unopinza.
Imi mukudzwe Mŋari, pamsoro pokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga;
Kurumbidzwa kwenyu ŋgakuʋe kumsoro kwapasi pose.
Ʋakateyira tsoka dzaŋgu mumbure;
Mŋeya waŋgu wakakotamiswa;
Ʋakacera hunza pamberi paŋgu;
Ʋawira mukati mayo ʋamene.
Mŋoyo waŋgu wakasimba, Mŋari, mŋoyo waŋgu wakasimba;
Ndicaimba, ɀirokwaɀo, ndicaimba nziyo dzokurumbidza.
Muka iwe mŋoyo waŋgu, muka iwe muteŋgeranwa nembira;
Ini ndimene ndicamuka maŋgwanani.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai, Ishe, pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu;
Ndicakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza pakati paʋahedeni.
Nokuti ŋgoni dzenyu ihuru kuȿikira kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga,
Ɀokwaɗi yenyu inoȿikira kuɗeŋga rose.
Imi mukudzwe Mŋari, kumsoro kwokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga;
Kurumbidzwa kwenyu
Munototaura ɀakarurama here, imi ʋanesimba,
Munotoŋgera ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu ɀakarurama here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, mumŋoyo menyu munoita ɀakaipa;
Munoyerera
Ʋakaipa ʋakaʋa ʋatorwa kubva paɗumbu
Ʋanotsauka ʋacaŋgoɀarwa, ʋacireʋa nhema.
Ʋuturu bgaʋo bgakafanana noʋuturu bgenyoka;
Ʋakafanana neciʋa cisiŋganzwi, cinodziʋira nzeʋe yaco;
Cisiŋgatereri inzwi reŋaŋga,
Kunyaŋge ʋacirapa noʋucenjeri ʋukuru.
Mŋari vunai meno aʋo mumuromo maʋo;
Jehova gurai meno makuru aʋana ʋeshumba.
Ŋgaʋapxe semvura inoyerera;
Kana acishumba nemiseʋe yake, ŋgaiʋe seyakagurika.
Ŋgaʋafanane nehozhwe inonyakatika icipera;
Segambamŋedzi romukadzi risinakuʋona zuʋa.
Hari dzenyu dzisati dzanzwa
Iye ucadzibvisa necampupuri,
Wakarurama ucafara kana aciʋona kutsiʋa;
Ucashambidza tsoka dzake muropa raʋakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋacati: Ɀirokwaɀo muɓairo wowakarurama uri’po;
Ɀirokwaɀo Mŋari uri’po, unotoŋga pasi pose.
Ndirwirei paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu, Mŋari waŋgu;
Ndiisei pakakwirira kure naʋanondimukira.
Ndirwirei paʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa,
Ndiponesei paʋanhu ʋeropa.
Nokuti tarirai, ʋanoʋandira mŋeya waŋgu;
Ʋanesimba ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzorwa neni;
Hakuzi nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwaŋgu kana kweɀiʋi ɀaŋgu, Jehova.
Ʋanomhanya nokuɀigadzira,
Mukai mundiɓatsire, muʋone.
Iyemi Jehova, Mŋari wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri,
Mukai mushanyire ʋahedeni ʋose;
Musanzwira tsitsi muɗariki upi noupi wakaipa.
Ʋanodzoka maɗekwana, ʋanowudza sembga,
Ʋanopota neguta.
Tarirai, ʋanodɀoʋa nemiromo yaʋo;
Minondo iri pamiromo yaʋo;
Nokuti ʋanoti: Ndianiko uŋganzwa?
Asi imi Jehova mucaʋaseka;
Mucaɗaɗira ʋahedeni ʋose.
Imi simba raŋgu, ndicakumirirai;
Nokuti Mŋari ndiye nhare yaŋgu yakakwirira.
Mŋari waŋgu ucandiciŋgura netsitsi dzake;
Mŋari ucandiʋonesa
Musaʋaʋuraya, kuti ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋarege kukaŋganwa;
Muʋaparadzire nesimba renyu, muʋawisire pasi,
Ishe nhoʋo yeɗu.
Nokuɗa kweciʋi comuromo waʋo, namashoko emiromo yaʋo,
Ŋgaʋaɓatwe pakuɀikudza kwaʋo,
Ʋuye nokuɗa kwokutuka nenhema dzaʋanotaura.
Ʋapedzei nehasha, ʋapedzei, ʋarege kuzoʋa’po;
Ŋgaʋaziʋe kuti Mŋari unoɓata ʋushe pakati paJakobo,
Kuȿikira kumigumo yenyika.
Paŋguʋa yamaɗekwana ŋgaʋadzoke, ŋgaʋawudze sembga,
Ŋgaʋapota‐pote neguta.
Ʋacadzuŋgaira ʋacitȿaka ɀokudya,
Ʋacagara ʋusiku bgose kana ʋasiŋgaguti.
Asi ini ndicaimba ndicireʋa simba renyu;
Ɀirokwaɀo ndicarumbidza tsitsi dzenyu maŋgwanani;
Nokuti makaŋga muri nhare yaŋgu yakakwirira,
Noʋutiziro bgaŋgu pazuʋa rokutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Ndicakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi simba raŋgu;
Nokuti Mŋari ndiye nhare yaŋgu yakakwirira, iye Mŋari unondinzwira tsitsi.
Mŋari, makatirasha, makatiparadza;
Makaŋga makatsamŋa; Haiwa, tidzorei.
Makabvundisa nyika; makaitsemura;
Gadzirai mitswe yayo; nokuti inozunuŋguka.
Makaratidza ʋanhu ʋenyu ɀinhu ɀinorema;
Makatinwisa waini inoɓata.
Makapa ʋanokutyai mureza,
Kuti uratidzwe nokuɗa kweɀokwaɗi.
Kuti ʋaɗikanwa ʋenyu ʋarwirwe,
Tiponesei noruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi, mutipindure.
Mŋari wakataura paʋutȿene bgake,
Ndicaganhura Shekemi, ndicayera mupata weSukoti.
Gireadi ndeyaŋgu Manase ndeyaŋgu;

Imi munotȿaka Mŋari, mŋoyo yenyu ŋgairarame.
Nokuti Jehova unonzwa ʋashaiwi,
Haashoʋori ʋasuŋgwa ʋake.
Kuɗeŋga napasi ŋgaɀimurumbidze,
Makuŋgwa, neɀose ɀinopfakanyika’mo.
Nokuti Mŋari ucaponesa Zioni, nokuʋaka maguta aJuda;
Ʋacagara’mo, iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
Icaʋa nhaka yaʋana ʋaʋaranda ʋake;
Ʋanoɗa zita rake ʋacagara’mo.
Kurumidzai kundiɓatsira, Jehova.
Ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ŋgaʋaɀidzwe
Iʋo ʋanotȿaka mŋeya waŋgu;
Ŋgaʋadzoserwe shure, ʋashoʋorwe
Iʋo ʋanofarira kundikuʋadza.
Ŋgaʋadzoserwe shure nokuɗa kwenyadzi dzaʋo
Iʋo ʋanoti: Hekani, hekani! waro!
Ʋose ʋanokutȿakai ŋgaʋafarise ʋaʋe nomufaro mamuri;
Ʋanoɗa kuponesa kwenyu ŋgaʋarambe ʋaciti:
Mŋari ŋgaakudzwe!
Asi ini ndiri murombo nomushaiwi;
Kurumidzai muʋuye kwandiri, Mŋari;
Imi muri muɓatsiri waŋgu nomurwiri waŋgu;
Regai kunonoka, Jehova.
Jehova, ndinoʋimba nemi;
Ŋgandirege kutoŋgonyadziswa.
Ndirwirei mukururama kwenyu, ndisunuŋgurei;
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu kwandiri, mundiponese.
Iʋai ɗombo raŋgu mandiŋgagara, kwandiŋgaramba ndicienda;
Makaraira kuti ndiponeswe;
Nokuti ndi’mi ɗombo raŋgu nenhare yaŋgu.
Ndisunuŋgurei, Mŋari waŋgu, paruʋoko rwowakaipa,
Paruʋoko rwousina‐kururama nomunhu unomanikidza.
Nokuti imi, Ishe Jehova, muri tariro yaŋgu;
Ndi’mi wandinoʋimba naye kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.
Ndakatsigirwa nemi kubva paciɀaro;
Ndi’mi makandiɓuɗisa paɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu;
Ndicasikurumbidzai.
Ndiri cishamiso kunaʋazhinji;
Asi imi muri ʋutiziro bgaŋgu bgakasimba.
Muromo waŋgu ucazadzwa nerumbidzo yenyu,
Nekudzo yenyu zuʋa rose.
Regai kundirasha paŋguʋa yokukwegura kwaŋgu;
Musandisiya kana ndapera simba.
Nokuti ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋanondireʋa;
Ʋanogarira mŋeya waŋgu, ʋanoraŋgana,
Ʋaciti: Mŋari wamusiya;
Teʋerai, mumuɓate; nokuti hakuna‐uŋgamurwira.
Mŋari, regai kuʋa kure neni;
Mŋari waŋgu, kurumidzai kundiɓatsira.
Aʋo ʋanodziʋisa mŋeya waŋgu ŋgaʋanyadziswe ʋapere;
Ʋanotȿaka kundikuʋadza ŋgaʋafukidzwe nokushoʋorwa nokuɀidzwa.
Asi ini ndicaramba ndicitarira,
Ndicaramba ndiciwedzera kukurumbidzai.
Muromo waŋgu ucareʋa kururama kwenyu,
Nokuponesa kwenyu zuʋa rose;
Nokuti handiziʋi kuwanda kwaɀo.
Ndicaʋuya namaɓasa anesimba aShe aJehova;
Ndicaparidza kururama kwenyu, iko kwenyu kwoga.
Mŋari, makandidzidzisa kubva paʋujaya bgaŋgu;
Kuȿikira ɀino ndaɗudzira maɓasa enyu anoshamisa.
Haiwa, kuȿikira ndakwegura ndacena vudzi, Mŋari regai kundisiya;
Kuȿikira ndaɗudzira simba renyu kurudzi
Nesimba renyu kunomumŋe nomumŋe unozoʋuya.
Kururama kwenyu ʋo, Mŋari, kuri kumsoro‐soro;
Iyemi makaita ɀinhu ɀikuru,
Mŋari, ndianiko wakafanana nemi?
Iyemi makatiratidza maɗambudzo mazhinji akaipa,
Ndi’mi mucatiraramisa ɀe,
Nokutikwidza ɀe tibve pakudzika kwapasi.
Wedzerai ʋukuru bgaŋgu,
Dzokai ɀe mundinyaradze.
Ndicakurumbidzai ʋo nemiteŋgeranwa,
Naiyo ɀokwaɗi yenyu, Mŋari waŋgu;
Ndicakuimbirai imi nziyo dzokurumbidza nembira,
Iyemi Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Miromo yaŋgu icafara kwaɀo kana ndicikuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza;
Nomŋeya waŋgu wamakadzikinura.
Rurimi rwaŋgu ʋo rucataura zuʋa rose ɀokururama kwenyu;
Nokuti ʋanotȿaka kundikuʋadza ʋanyadziswa, ʋaɀidzwa.
Ipai mambo ɀamakatoŋga, Mŋari,
Nokururama kwenyu kumŋanakomana wamambo.
Ucatoŋgera ʋanhu ʋenyu nokururama,
Naʋarombo ʋenyu ucaʋaruramisira.
Makomo acaʋigira ʋanhu rugare,
Neɀikomo, nokururama.
Ucatoŋgera ʋarombo ʋaʋanhu,
Ucaponesa ʋana ʋaʋashaiwi,
Nokupxanya mumanikidzi.
Ʋacakutyai kana zuʋa rici’po,
Ʋuye kana mŋedzi uci’po, kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Ucaɓuruka iye semvura paʋushwa bgakagurirwa;
Semvura inonaya iciɗiridza pasi.
Nemisi yake wakarurama ucakura ɀakanaka;
Rugare rwakawanda
Ucaɓata ʋushe kubva paguŋgwa kuȿikira paguŋgwa,
Nokubva paRwizi kuȿikira kumigumo yapasi.
Ʋagere pamarenje ʋacafugama pamberi pake;
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋacananɀa guruʋa.
Madzimambo eTarshishi neeɀiwi acaʋuya neɀipo;
Madzimambo eSheba neSeba ʋaca
Ɀirokwaɀo, madzimambo ose acawira pasi pamberi pake;
Ndudzi dzose dzicamushumira.
Nokuti ucarwira mushaiwi kana aciɗanidzira;
Nomurombo usinomuɓatsiri.
Ucanzwira nyasha murombo nomushaiwi,
Ucaponesa mŋeya yaʋashaiwi.
Ucadzikinura mŋeya yaʋo pakutambudzika napakumanikidzwa;
Ropa raʋo ricaʋa cinhu cinokosha pamberi pake;
Iye ucararama, ucapiwa ndarama yeSheba;
Ʋanhu ʋacaramba ʋacimunyeŋgeterera;
Ʋacamuʋoŋga zuʋa rose.
Kucaʋa neɀiyo ɀizhinji pasi pamsoro pamakomo;
Ɀiɓereko ɀaɀo ɀicawuŋga seRebanoni;
Ʋanogara paguta ʋacakura soʋuswa pasi.
Zita rake ricaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi;
Zita rake ricagara riri’po paŋguʋa yose yokuʋa’po kwezuʋa;
Ʋanhu ʋacaropafadzwa maari;
Ndudzi dzose dzicati: Unomufaro.
Jehova Mŋari, iye Mŋari waIsraeri, ŋgaarumbidzwe,
Iye oga unoita ɀinoshamisa.
Zita rake rinobginya ŋgarirumbidzwe nokusiŋgaperi;
Pasi pose ŋgapazadzwe nokubginya kwenyu.
Ameni, Ameni.
Minyeŋgetero yaDavidi mŋanakomana waJese yapera.
Ɀirokwaɀo Mŋari unoitira Israeri ɀakanaka,
Iʋo ʋanemŋoyo yakacena.
Asi kana ndirini, tsoka dzaŋgu dzakaŋga dzotsauka;
Makumbo aŋgu akaŋga otedzemuka.
Nokuti ndakaŋga ndicigoɗora ʋanamanyawi,
Pakuʋona kwaŋgu kufara kwaʋakaipa.
Nokuti haʋatambudziki pakufa kwaʋo;
Asi muʋiri waʋo unesimba.
Haʋanenjodzi sa
Haʋatambudzwi sa
Saka kuɀikudza kwaʋo kwakafanana noruketani pamitsipa yaʋo;
Kumanikidza kunoʋafukidza seŋguʋo.
Meso aʋo anoɓuɗa nokukora;
Ɀaʋanofuŋga pamŋoyo ɀinofashamira;
Ʋanoseka, ʋacireʋa pakuipa kwaʋo ɀinomanikidza
Ʋanotaura ʋaciɀikudza.
Ʋakataurira kuɗeŋga nemiromo yaʋo,
Ndimi dzaʋo dzinofamba‐famba pasi.
Saka ʋanhu ʋake ʋanodzokera ikoko;
Ʋanoȿinirwa mvura zhinji, mukombe uzere.
Ɀino ʋanoti: Mŋari uŋgaziʋa seiko?
Wokumsoro‐soro uŋgaʋa nokuziʋa here?
Tarirai, ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋakaipa;
Ʋanowedzera fuma yaʋo ʋaciŋgogara ʋasiŋgatamburi.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndakanatsa mŋoyo waŋgu pasina,
Nokushambidza maʋoko aŋgu ndisinemhoȿa;
Nokuti ndakatambudzwa zuʋa rose,
Ndakaraŋgwa maŋgwanani ose.
Kana ndaiti: Ndicataura kuɗai;
Tarirai, ndainyeŋgera rudzi rwaʋana ʋenyu.
Ɀino ndakaramba ndicifuŋga kuti ndiɀinzwisise,
Kuȿikira ndapinda panɀimbo tȿene yaMŋari,
Ndikatarira kuguma kwaʋo.
Ɀirokwaɀo munoʋaisa panotedza;
Munoʋawisira pasi kuti ʋaparadzwe.
Haiwa, ʋanoparadzwa kamŋe‐kamŋe!
Ʋanopedzwa cose neɀinotyisa.
Seɀakarotwa, kana munhu apepuka;
Saiɀoɀo, Ishe, mucashoʋora mufananidzo waʋo, kana mucimuka.
Nokuti mŋoyo waŋgu wakacema,
Ndakaɓayiwa patȿo dzaŋgu.
Ndakaŋga ndiri ɓenzi, ndisiŋgaziʋi cinhu;
Ndakaŋga ndakafanana nemhuka pamberi penyu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndinoramba ndinemi;
Makaɓata ruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi.
Mucandiperekedza nezano renyu,
Ndokuzondigamucira pakubginya.
Ndianiko kuɗeŋga,
Napasi hapana‐wandinoɗa kunze kwenyu.
Nyama yaŋgu nomŋoyo waŋgu ɀinopera;
Asi Mŋari ndiye ɗombo romŋoyo waŋgu nomugoʋe waŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti tarirai, ʋari kure nemi ʋacapera;
Makaparadza ʋose ʋakakusiyai noʋupombge bgaʋo.
Kana ndirini, kusweɗera pedyo ari ndiɀo ɀinondifadza;
Ishe Mŋari ndakamuita nhare yaŋgu,
Kuti ndiparidze maɓasa enyu ose.
Haiwa Mŋari, makatirashireiko nokusiŋgaperi?
Hasha dzenyu dzinopfuŋgairira makwai amafuro enyu nemhaka yeiko?
Raŋgarirai ʋuŋgano yenyu yamakateŋga kare,
Yamakadzikinura kuti ruʋe rudzi rwenhaka yenyu;
Gomo reZioni pamakaŋga mugere.
Simudzai makumbo enyu
Iɀo ɀakaipa ɀose ɀakaitwa naʋaʋeŋgi panɀimbo tȿene.
Ʋadziʋisi ʋenyu ʋakanduruma pakati peʋuŋgano yenyu;
Ʋakamisa mireza yaʋo ɀiʋe ɀiratidzo.
Ʋakafanana naʋanhu ʋakasimudza
Masanhu muɗondo remiti.
Ɀino ɀose ɀakaʋezwa ɀayo
Ʋanoɀiputsa neɗimuro nenyundo.
Ʋakapisa nɀimbo yenyu tȿene nomŋoto;
Ʋakashatisa ʋugaro bgezita renyu ʋaciʋuputsira pasi.
Ʋakati mumŋoyo maʋo: Ŋgatiʋaparadze pamŋe cete;
Ʋakapisa nɀimbo dzose paʋanoʋuŋganira Mŋari munyika.
Haticaʋoni ɀiratidzo ɀeɗu;
Hapacino‐muprofita;
Pakati peɗu hapanomunhu unoziʋa kuti ɀicaȿikira rini.
Haiwa Mŋari, mudziʋisi ucashoʋora kuȿikira riniko?
Muʋeŋgi ucaramba aciɀidza zita renyu nokusiŋgaperi here?
Munodzosereiko ruʋoko rwenyu, irwo ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi?
Rutambanudzei pacifuʋa cenyu, muʋapedze.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro Mŋari ndiye Mambo waŋgu kubva kare,
Iye unoɓata maɓasa okuponesa pakati penyika.
Makapamura guŋgwa nesimba renyu;
Makaputsa misoro yeɀikara ɀeguŋgwa mumvura.
Makaputsanya misoro yeŋgwena,
Makaipa ʋanhu ʋagere murenje kuti iʋe nyama yaʋo.
Makapamura tsime neɓoporodzi;
Makapxisa nzizi huru.
Masikati ndeenyu, noʋusiku ndobgenyu ʋo;
Ndimi makagadzira ciedza nezuʋa.
Ndimi makatara miganho yose yapasi;
Ndimi makaita zhezha necando.
Raŋgarirai cinhi ici, kuti muʋeŋgi waka
Ʋuye kuti rudzi rwamapenzi rwakamhura zita renyu.
Regai henyu kuisa kucikara mŋeya wenjiʋa yenyu;
Musakaŋganwa ʋupenyu bgaʋarombo ʋenyu.
Raŋgarirai suŋgano;
Nokuti nɀimbo dzinerima dzapasi dzizere noʋugaro bgaʋamanikidzi.
Haiwa, ʋanomanikidzwa ŋgaʋarege kudzoka ʋacinyara;
Ʋarombo naʋashaiwi ŋgaʋarumbidze zita renyu.
Simukai Mŋari, muɀireʋerere mhaka yenyu;
Raŋgarirai kuɀidzwa kwenyu neɓenzi zuʋa rose.
Regai kukaŋganwa inzwi raʋadziʋisi ʋenyu;
Ƃope raʋanokumukirai rinogara ricikwira.
Tinokuʋoŋgai, Mŋari;
Tinoʋoŋga, nokuti zita renyu riri pedyo;
Ʋanhu ʋanoparidza maɓasa enyu anoshamisa.
Kana ndiciwana ŋguʋa yakafanira,
Ndicatoŋga ɀakarurama.
Pasi pose panyauka naʋose ʋagere’po;
Ndini ndakamisa mbiru dzayo.
Ndakati kunaʋanamanyawi: Regai kuita namanyawi;
Nokunaʋakaipa: Regai kusimudza runyaŋga.
Regai kusimudza runyaŋga rwenyu kuɗeŋga;
Regai kutaura nomutsipa mukukutu.
Nokuti kunyaŋge kumaɓuɗazuʋa, kana kumaʋirira,
Kana kurenje, hakuzi ikoko kunobva kukudzwa.
Asi Mŋari ndiye mutoŋgi;
Unoninipisa mumŋe acikudza mumŋe.
Nokuti muruʋoko rwaJehova munomukombe, newaini inopupuma;
Uzere neɀakaveŋganiswa, ɀino unoɗurura mauri;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakaipa ʋose ʋenyika ʋacaȿina masese awo, nokuanwa.
Asi ini ndicaparidza nokusiŋgaperi,
Ndicaimbira Mŋari waJakobo nziyo dzokurumbidza.
Nyaŋga dzose dzaʋakaipa ndicadzigura;
Asi nyaŋga dzaʋakarurama dzicasimudzwa.
Mŋari unozikanwa pakati paJuda;
Zita rake iguru pakati paIsraeri.
PaSaremi ʋo ndipo panetabernakeri yake,
NapaZioni ʋugaro bgake.
Ndipo paakavuna miseʋe yoʋuta;
Nenhoʋo, nomunondo, nokurwa.
Imi munokubginya, makanaka kwaɀo,
Kupfuʋura makomo eɀakapambga.
Ʋakatsuŋga pamŋoyo, ʋakapambga, ʋakaʋata hope dzaʋo;
Pakati paʋarume ʋanesimba hakuna‐wakawana maʋoko ake.
Pakutuka kwenyu, Mŋari waJakobo,
Ŋgoro nebiza ɀose ɀinoɓatwa nehope dzorufu.
Imi, iyemi, munofanira kutyiwa;
Ndianiko uŋgamira pamberi penyu kana matsamŋa?
Makanzwisa
Pasi pakatya, pakanyarara,
Paŋguʋa yokumuka kwaMŋari kuzotoŋga,
Kuti aponese ʋanyoro ʋose ʋapasi.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kutsamŋa kwaʋanhu kucakurumbidzai;
Munoɀisuŋga ciʋuno nokutsamŋa kwakasara.
Pikai, muripire Jehova Mŋari wenyu;
Ʋose ʋakamupoteredza ŋgaʋaʋuye neɀipo kunaiye unofanira kutyiwa;
Iye ucagura mŋeya yamacinda;
Unotyisa kwaɀo madzimambo apasi.
Ndicaɗana kunaMŋari nenzwi raŋgu;
Kunaiye Mŋari nenzwi raŋgu, ucarerekera nzeʋe yake kwandiri.
Pazuʋa rokutambudzika kwaŋgu ndakatȿaka Ishe;
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakaŋga rwakatambanudzwa ʋusiku, ndisiŋgaregi;
Mŋeya waŋgu wakaramba kunyaradzwa.
Ndinoraŋgarira Mŋari, ndokushaiwa mufaro;
Ndinofuŋgisisa, mŋeya waŋgu ndokuziya.
Hamutenderi meso aŋgu kutsinzina;
Ndinotambudzika, handigoni kutaura.
Ndakaraŋgarira mazuʋa ekare,
Makore eŋguʋa dzakare‐kare.
Ndinoɀiyeʋudzira kuimba kwaŋgu pakati poʋusiku;
Ndinotaurirana nomŋoyo waŋgu;
Mŋeya waŋgu wakanɀera kwaɀo.

Haacazonzwiri ŋgoni here?
Ko tsitsi dzake dzaenda cose nokusiŋgaperi?
Cipikirwa cake cakakona nokusiŋgaperi here?

Wapfigira tsitsi dzake nyoro pakutsamŋa
Ipapo ndakati: Ndibgo ʋutera bgaŋgu:
Ndicareʋa ɀakaitwa naJehova;
Nokuti ndicaraŋgarira ɀishamiso ɀenyu ɀakare.
Ndicafuŋgisisa ʋo ɓasa renyu rose,
Nokuraŋgarira ɀamakaita.
Nzira yenyu, Mŋari, iri panɀimbo tȿene;
Ndianiko mŋari mukuru, wakafanana naiye Mŋari?
Ndimi Mŋari unoita ɀishamiso;
Makaratidza simba renyu pakati paʋanhu.
Makadzikinura ʋanhu ʋenyu noruʋoko rwenyu,
Iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo naJosefa.
Mvura zhinji yakakuʋonai, Mŋari;
Mvura zhinji yakakuʋonai, ikatya;
Pakadzika pakabvunda.
Makore akaɗurura mvura;
Ƌeŋga rose rakaɓuɗisa inzwi;
Miseʋe yenyu yakafamba‐famba kwose.
Inzwi rokutinhira kwenyu rakaŋga riri mucampupuri;
Mheni dzakavenekera nyika;
Pasi pakabvunda nokuzunuŋguka.
Kufamba kwenyu kwakaŋga kuri muguŋgwa,
Nenzira dzenyu mumvura zhinji‐zhinji,
Makwara enyu akaŋga asiŋgazikanwi.
Makafambisa ʋanhu ʋenyu seɓoka ramakwai,
Noruʋoko rwaMosesi norwaAroni.
Tererai murairo waŋgu, imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu;
Rerekerai nzeʋe dzenyu munzwe mashoko omuromo waŋgu.
Ndicashamisa muromo waŋgu nditaure nomufananidzo;
Ndicaparidza mashoko akaʋanzika ekare,
Ɀatakanzwa neɀatakaziʋa,
Neɀatakaʋudzwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu.
Hatiŋgaɀiʋanziri ʋana ʋaʋo,
Asi ticaʋudza rudzi runoteʋera
Nesimba rake, namaɓasa ake, anoshamisa, aakaita.
Nokuti wakamutsa cipupuriro pakati paJakobo,
Akatema murairo pakati paIsraeri,
Akaɀiraira madziɓaɓa eɗu,
Kuti ʋaɀiziʋise ʋana ʋaʋo;
Kuti rudzi runoteʋera ruɀiziʋe, iʋo ʋana ʋacazoɓerekwa;
Iʋo ʋasimuke ʋaɀiʋudze ʋana ʋaʋo;
Kuti tariro yaʋo iʋe kunaMŋari,
Ʋarege kukaŋganwa maɓasa aMŋari,
Asi ʋaceŋgete mirairo yake;
Ʋarege kufanana namadziɓaɓa aʋo,
Rwakaŋga ruri rudzi rusiŋgatereri, rwakamukira
Rudzi rwakaramba kururamisa mŋoyo yaʋo,
Ʋuye mŋeya yaʋo yakaŋga isinokutendeka kunaMŋari.
Ʋana ʋaEfraimi, kunyaŋge ʋakaŋga ʋakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa noʋuta,
Ʋakadzokera shure pazuʋa rokurwa.
Haʋana‐kuceŋgeta suŋgano yaMŋari,
Ʋakaramba kufamba nomurairo wake;
Ʋakakaŋganwa ɀaakaita,
Namaɓasa ake akashamisa, aakaʋaratidza.
Wakaita ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa pamberi pamadziɓaɓa aʋo,
Panyika yeEgipita, pasaŋgo reZoani.
Wakapamura guŋgwa, akaʋayambusa;
Akamisa mvura ikafanana nomurwi.
Masikati ʋo wakaʋafambisa negore,
Noʋusiku bgose neciedza comŋoto.
Wakapamura matombo murenje,
Akaʋanwisa ɀakanaka kwaɀo sapamvura inobva pakadzika.
Wakaɓuɗisa ʋo hoʋa dzemvura paɗombo,
Akayererisa mvura zhinji yakaita senzizi.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaramba ʋacimutadzira,
Nokumukira Wokumsoro‐soro murenje.
Ʋakaidza Mŋari mumŋoyo maʋo
Ʋacikumbira ɀokudya ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa iʋo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakapopotera Mŋari;
Ʋakati: Mŋari uŋga
Tarirai, wakaroʋa ɗombo, mvura zhinji ikadzutuka,
Hoʋa dzakayerera;
Ko uŋgapa ciŋgwa ʋo here?
Uŋgaʋigira ʋanhu ʋake nyama here?
Saka Jehova wakanzwa, akatsamŋa;
Mŋoto ukaʋeserwa Jakobo,
Kutsamŋa kukamukira Israeri;
Nokuti haʋana‐kutenda Mŋari,
Haʋana‐kuʋimba nokuponesa kwake.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaraira ɗeŋga rose kumsoro,
Akazarura mikoʋa yokuɗeŋga;
Akanisa mana pamsoro paʋo kuti ʋadye,
Akaʋapa ɀiyo ɀokuɗeŋga.
Ʋanhu ʋakadya ciŋgwa caʋatumŋa;
Wakaʋatumira ɀokudya kuȿikira ʋaguta.
Wakaɓuɗisa mhepo yakabva mabvazuʋa, ikarira kuɗeŋga;
Akafambisa mhepo yakabva nyasi nesimba rake.
Wakanisa ʋo nyama pamsoro paʋo ikaita seguruʋa,
Neshiri, dzinamapapiro, dzikaita sejeca reguŋgwa;
Wakaɀiwisira pakati pemisasa yaʋo,
Pose‐pose paʋakaŋga ʋagere.
Ipapo ʋakadya, ʋakaguta kwaɀo;
Akaʋapa ɀaʋakaŋga ʋacikarira.
Ʋakaŋga ʋasati ʋanyaradza kukara kwaʋo,
Ɀokudya ɀaʋo ɀakaŋga ɀiciri mumiromo yaʋo,
Kutsamŋa kwaMŋari kukaʋamukira,
Akaʋuraya ʋakakoresa pakati paʋo,
Akaparadza majaya aIsraeri.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaramba ʋacitadza,
Ʋakasatenda maɓasa ake aishamisa.
Saka wakapedza mazuʋa aʋo paneɀisinamaturo,
Namakore aʋo paneɀinotyisa.
Ɀino wakati aciʋaʋuraya, ipapo ʋakamubvunza;
Ʋakadzoka, ʋakashiŋgaira kutȿaka Mŋari.
Ʋakaraŋgarira kuti Mŋari ndiye ɗombo raʋo,
NaMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro mudzikinuri waʋo.
Asi ʋakamuɓata kumeso nomuromo waʋo,
Ʋakamureʋera nhema nendimi dzaʋo.
Nokuti mŋoyo yaʋo yakaŋga isinakururama kwaari,
Ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kutendeka pasuŋgano yake.
Asi iye, ɀaakaŋga anenyasha huru, wakaʋakaŋganwira kuipa
Ɀirokwaɀo, kazhinji wakadzora kutsamŋa kwake,
Akasamutsa hasha dzake dzose.
Akaraŋgarira kuti ʋakaŋga ʋari nyama ɓedzi;
Nemhepo, inopfuʋura, isiŋgadzoki ɀe.
Ʋakamumukira murenje kazhinji sei,
Nokumunzwisa shuŋgu muciwunde!
Ʋakapamhidza ɀe, ʋakaidza Mŋari,
Ʋakadziʋisa Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Haʋana‐kuraŋgarira ruʋoko rwake,
Kana zuʋa raakaʋadzikinura pamudziʋisi.
Paŋguʋa yaakaʋaratidza ɀiratidzo ɀake paEgipita,
Neɀishamiso ɀake pasaŋgo reZoani;
Akashandura nzizi dzaʋo dzikaʋa ropa,
Nehoʋa dzaʋo, ʋakakoniwa kunwa
Akatuma pakati paʋo mapupira enhunzi, dzakaʋaruma;
Namatafi, akaʋaparadza.
Ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo wakaɀipa mhundururu,
Ɀaʋakaɓatira
Wakaparadza mizambiriŋga yaʋo necimvuramabge,
Nemiʋonde yaʋo necando.
Ŋombe dzaʋo wakadziisa ʋo pacimvuramabge,
Ɀipfuwo ɀavo
Wakatuma pakati paʋo kutsamŋa kwake kukuru,
Nehasha neshuŋgu nokutambudza,
Rikaita ɓoka raʋatumŋa ʋeɀakaipa.
Wakagadzirira kutsamŋa kwake nzira;
Haana‐kubvisa mŋeya waʋo parufu,
Asi wakaisa ʋupenyu bgaʋo kuhosha;
Akaroʋa mataŋgwe ose paEgipita,
Iʋo ʋokutaŋga ʋesimba raʋo pamatente aHami;
Asi wakaɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋake samakwai,
Akaʋaperekedza murenje seɓoka
Akaʋafambisa ʋakafara, ʋakasatya;
Asi guŋgwa rakafukidza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo.
Akaʋaȿitsa panyika yake tȿene,
Pagomo iri, raakateŋga noruʋoko rwake rworudyi.
Akadziŋga ʋo ndudzi pamberi paʋo,
Akaʋaganhurira iʋo ʋaʋe nhaka yaʋo,
Akagarisa ʋaIsraeri pamatente aʋo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaidza Mŋari Wokumsoro‐soro, ʋakamumukira,
Ʋakasaceŋgeta ɀipupuriro ɀake;
Asi ʋakadzoka, ʋakaita ɀinonyeŋgera.
Ʋakatsauka soʋuta ʋunonyeŋgera.
Nokuti ʋakamutsa kutsamŋa kwake namatunhu aʋo akakwirira,
Ʋakamutsa goɗo rake neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀakaʋeziwa.
Ɀino Mŋari wakati aciɀinzwa, akatsamŋa kwaɀo,
Akasema Israeri kwaɀo‐kwaɀo.
Akabva patabernakeri yeShiro,
Tente raakaŋga akaisa pakati paʋanhu;
Akaisa simba rake mukutapxa,
Nokubginya kwake muruʋoko rwomudziʋisi.
Ʋanhu ʋake wakaʋaisa ʋo kumunondo;
Akatsamŋira nhaka yake kwaɀo.
Mŋoto wakapedza majaya aʋo;
Ʋasikana ʋaʋo haʋana‐kuimbirwa pakuwanikwa kwaʋo.
Ʋaprista ʋaʋo ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo;
Cirikadzi dzaʋo hadzina‐kucema.
Ipapo Ishe wakapepuka somunhu wakaŋga aʋete,
Semhare inoridza mhere nokuɗa kwewaini.
Akaroʋa ʋadziʋisi ʋake, ʋakadzokera shure;
Akaʋanyadzisa ɀisiŋgaperi.
Wakaramba ʋo tente raJosefa,
Akasasanaŋgura rudzi rwaEfraimi.
Asi wakasanaŋgura rudzi rwaJuda,
Negomo reZioni raakaŋga aciɗa.
Akaʋaka nɀimbo yake tȿene senhare dzakakwirira,
Sapasi paakateya nokusiŋgaperi.
Wakasanaŋgura ʋo Davidi muranda wake,
Akamubvisa pamataŋga amakwai;
Akandomutora paaifudza matunɀi aimŋisa,
Kuti aʋe mufudzi waʋanhu ʋake Jakobo, naIsraeri nhaka yake.
Naiɀoɀo wakaʋafudza nokururama kwomŋoyo wake;
Akaʋaperekedza noʋucenjeri bgamaʋoko ake.
Haiwa Mŋari, ʋahedeni ʋakapinda panhaka yenyu;
Ʋakaȿiɓisa tembere yenyu tȿene;
Jerusarema ʋakariita ɗoŋgo.
Ɀitunha ɀaʋaranda ʋenyu ʋakaɀipa shiri dzokuɗeŋga ɀiʋe ɀokudya
Ʋuye nyama yaʋatȿene ʋenyu
Ʋakateʋura ropa raʋo pose‐pose paJerusarema semvura;
Ʋakashaiwa unoʋaʋiga.
Taʋa cinhu cinoshoʋorwa naʋatigere naʋo,
Cinhu cinoɀidzwa necinosekwa naʋakatipoteredza.
Haiwa Jehova, mucaramba makatsamŋa nokusiŋgaperi kuȿikira riniko?
Goɗo renyu ricapfuta somŋoto here?
Ƌururai hasha dzenyu pamsoro paʋahedeni ʋasiŋgakuziʋiyi,
Napamsoro poʋushe ʋuzhinji, ʋusiŋgaɗani zita renyu.
Nokuti ʋakapedza Jakobo,
Ʋakaparadza ʋugaro bgake.
Musaraŋgarira kutiroʋa pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀamadziɓaɓa eɗu;
Ŋgoni dzenyu nyoro ŋgadzikurumidze kusoŋgana nesu;
Nokuti taneta kwaɀo.
Tiɓatsirei, Mŋari muponesi weɗu, nokuɗa kwomukurumbira wezita renyu;
Mutirwire, mudzime ɀiʋi ɀeɗu nokuɗa kwezita renyu.
Ʋahedeni ʋacareʋereiko, ʋaciti: Mŋari waʋo uripiko?
Kutsibga kweropa raʋaranda ʋenyu, rakateʋurwa,
Ŋgakuzikanwe pakati paʋahedeni pamberi peɗu.
Kugomera kwomusuŋgwa ŋgakuȿike kwamuri;
Noʋukuru bgesimba renyu ceŋgetai ʋana ʋorufu;
Mutsiʋire ʋagere nesu kanomŋe pacifuʋa caʋo
Kushoʋora kwaʋakakushoʋorai nako, imi Ishe.
Naiɀoɀo isu ʋanhu ʋenyu, namakwai amafuro enyu,
Ticakuʋoŋgai nokusiŋgaperi;
Ticaratidza kurumbidzwa kwenyu kumarudzi namarudzi.
Tererai nenzeʋe, Mufudzi waIsraeri,
Iyemi munotuŋgamirira Josefa seɓoka
Imi mugere pakati pamakerubi, penyai!
Mutsai simba renyu pamberi paEfraimi naBenjamini naManase,
Muʋuye kuzotirwira.
Tidzoserei ɀe, Mŋari;
Penyisai ciso cenyu, isu tiponeswe.
Jehova, Mŋari wehondo,
Mucatsamŋira munyeŋgetero waʋanhu ʋenyu kuȿikira riniko?
Makaʋadyisa ɀokudya ɀemisodzi,
Nokuʋanwisa misodzi yakawanda kwaɀo.
Makatiita cinhu cinoitirwa nharo naʋatigere naʋo;
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋanotiseka pakati paʋo.
Tidzoserei ɀe, Mŋari wehondo;
Penyisai ciso cenyu, isu tiponeswe.
Makandotora muzambiriŋga paEgipita;
Makadziŋga ʋahedeni, mukausima.
Makaugadzirira,
Ukaɓata kwaɀo, ukazadza nyika.
Makomo akafukidzwa nomumvuri wawo,
Nemisidari yaMŋari namataʋi awo.
Wakatandisa mataʋi awo kuȿikira paguŋgwa,
Namashizha awo kuȿikira kuRwizi.
Makaputsireiko mhanda dzawo,
Kuti ʋose ʋanopfuʋura nenzira ʋautanhe?
Ŋguruʋe yomuɗondo inouparadza,
Mhuka dzesaŋgo dzinoudya.
Ƌodzokai henyu, Mŋari wehondo,
Tarirai muri kuɗeŋga, muʋone, muʋe nehanya nomuzambiriŋga uyu.
Muceŋgete cakasimŋa noruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi,
Nomŋanakomana, wamakaɀirerera.
Wapiswa nomŋoto, watemŋa;
Ʋanopera nokutuka kweciso cenyu.
Ruʋoko rwenyu ŋgaruʋe pamsoro pomunhu woruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi,
Pamsoro pomŋanakomana womunhu, wamakaɀirerera.
Ipapo hatiŋgazobvi kwamuri;
Tiraramisei isu, tigoɗana zita renyu.
Tidzoserei ɀe, Jehova Mŋari wehondo;
Penyisai ciso cenyu, isu tiponeswe.
Imbirai Mŋari kwaɀo,
Pururudzai kunaMŋari waJakobo.
Ʋambai rwiyo, muridze ŋgoma,
Nembira dzinonakidza nomuteŋgeranwa.
Ridzai hwamanda pakugara kwomŋedzi,
Napakucena kwomŋedzi, pamutambo weɗu wakatarwa.
Nokuti ndiɀo ɀakatemerwa Israeri,
Ɀakarairwa naMŋari waJakobo.
Wakaɀitema munaJosefa kuti ciʋe cipupuriro,
Paŋguʋa yaakandorwa nenyika yeEgipita;
Ndakabvisa mutoro pafudzi rake;
Maʋoko ake akaregedza ɗeŋgu.
Iwe wakaɗana pakutambudzika, ndikakurwira;
Ndakakupindura ndiri panoʋanda kutinhira;
Ndakakuidza pamvura zhinji yeMeriba.
Inzwai ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndikupupurirei;
Haiwa Israeri, ɗai waiɗa hako kunditerera!
Ŋgakurege kuʋa’po pakati penyu mŋari wokumŋe;
Musanamata kunomumŋe mŋari waʋatorwa.
Ndini Jehova Mŋari wako,
Wakakuɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita;
Shamisa muromo wako kwaɀo, ndigouzadza.
Asi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu haʋana‐kuterera inzwi raŋgu;
Israeri wakandiramba cose.
Saka ndakaʋaregera paʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo,
Kuti ʋafambe namano aʋo.
Haiwa, ɗai ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋainditerera haʋo,
Ƌai Israeri aifamba nenzira dzaŋgu!
Ndiŋgaɗai ndakakurumidza kukunda ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo,
Nokuroʋa ʋadziʋisi ʋaʋo noruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ʋanoʋeŋga Jehova ʋaiɀiisa pasi pake;
Asi ŋguʋa yaʋo yaiʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi.
Uŋgaɗai aiʋadyisa ʋo ɀiyo ɀakaiȿo‐naka;
Ndaikugutsa noʋuci ʋunobva paɗombo.
Mŋari unomira paʋuŋgano yaMŋari;
Unotoŋga pakati paʋamŋari.
Mucatoŋga ɀisina‐kururuma kuȿikira riniko,
Mucisanaŋgura ʋanhu ʋakaipa?
Toŋgerai
Ruramisirai ʋanotambudzika naʋanoshaiwa cose.
Sunuŋgurai ʋarombo naʋashaiwi
Ʋarwirei paruʋoko rwowakaipa.
Haʋaziʋi, haʋanzwisisi;
Ʋanofamba‐famba murima;
Nheyo dzose dzapasi dzinozunuŋguka.
Ndakati: Muri ʋamŋari,
Mose muri ʋanakomana ʋoWokumsoro‐soro.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mucafa saʋanhu,
Mucafa somumŋe wamacinda.
Simukai Mŋari, mutoŋgere pasi;
Nokuti ndudzi dzose dzicaʋa nhaka yenyu.
Haiwa Jehova, regai kuramba munyerere;
Regai kuramba musiŋgatauri, musanyarara Mŋari.
Nokuti tarirai, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋanoita ɓope;
Ʋanokuʋeŋgai ʋakasimudza misoro yaʋo.
Ʋanofuŋga mano kuti ʋanyeŋgere ʋanhu ʋenyu,
Ʋanoraŋgana pamsoro paʋakaʋanzwa nemi.
Ʋakati: Ʋuyai, tiʋaparadze, ʋarege kuzoʋa rudzi;
Kuti zita raIsraeri rirege kuzoraŋgarirwa.
Nokuti ʋakaraŋgana nomŋoyo mumŋe;
Ʋanoita suŋgano kuzorwa nemi.
Matente aEdomi naʋaIshmaeri;
Moabi naʋaHagari;
Gebari, naAmoni, naAmareki;
Firistia pamŋe cete naʋagere Tire;
Asiria ʋo wakasaŋgana naʋo;
Ʋakaɓatsira ʋana ʋaRoti.
Muʋaitire seɀamakaitira Midiani;
NaSisera, naJabini, paRwizi Kishoni;
Iʋo ʋakaparadzwa paEndori;
Ʋakaʋa mupfudze wapasi.
Itai ʋakuru ʋaʋo saOrebi naZeebi;
Ɀirokwaɀo, macinda aʋo ose saZeba naZarmuna;
Iʋo ʋakati: Ŋgatiɀitorere
Ʋugaro bgaMŋari ʋuʋe bgeɗu.
Mŋari waŋgu, muʋaite seguruʋa rinondeyeswa nemhepo;
Samakoto anodziŋgwa nemhepo.
Somŋoto unopisa ɗondo,
Somuraɀo womŋoto unopisa makomo;
Muʋateʋerere saiɀoɀo neɗutu renyu remhepo,
Muʋavunduse necampupuri cenyu.
Fukidzai ɀiso ɀaʋo nokunyadziswa;
Kuti ʋatȿake zita renyu, Jehova.
Ŋgaʋanyadziswe, ʋavunduswe nokusiŋgaperi;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ŋgaʋanyadziswe ʋafe;
Ʋaziʋe kuti imi moga, imi munezita rinonzi Jehova,
Ndimi Wokumsoro‐soro kumsoro kwapasi pose.
Ʋugaro bgenyu ʋunoɗikanwa sei,
Mŋeya waŋgu unoshuʋa, ɀirokwaɀo unopaŋga ʋazhe dzaJehova;
Mŋoyo waŋgu nenyama yaŋgu ɀinoɗana kunaMŋari mupenyu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, shiri yakaɀiwanira imba,
Nyeŋganyeŋga yakaɀiwanira ɗendere, painoisa ʋana ʋayo,
Mambo waŋgu, naMŋari waŋgu.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanogara mumba menyu;
Ʋacagara ʋacikurumbidzai.
Wakaropafadzwa munhu unesimba rake mamuri;
Unemigwagwa
Kana ʋacipfuʋura nomumupata wakawoma, ʋanouita nɀimbo inamatsime;
Ɀirokwaɀo, mvura yomunhuruka inoufukidza nemikomborero.
Ʋanowedzera simba pasimba raʋo,
Mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo unoȿika pamberi paMŋari paZioni.
Haiwa, Jehova wehondo, inzwa munyeŋgetero waŋgu;
Tererai nenzeʋe, Mŋari waJakobo.
Tarirai, Mŋari, nhoʋo yeɗu,
Muʋone ciso comuzodzwa wenyu.
Nokuti zuʋa rimŋe paʋazhe dzenyu rinokunda
Ndinoti ɀirinani kuti ndiʋe murindi womukoʋa mumba maMŋari waŋgu,
Pakuti ndigare pamatente aʋaneɀakaipa.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari izuʋa nenhoʋo;
Jehova ucapa nyasha nokukudzwa;
Hapanecinhu cakanaka caaŋganyima ʋanofamba nokururama.
Jehova wehondo,
Wakaropafadzwa munhu unoʋimba nemi.
Jehova, makafarira nyika yenyu;
Makadzosa Jakobo pakutapxa.
Makakaŋganwira kutadza kwaʋanhu ʋenyu,
Makafukidza ɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀose.
Makabvisa kutsamŋa kwenyu kwose;
Makaɀidzora pahasha dzenyu dzakanyanya.
Tidzosei, Mŋari muponesi weɗu,
Gumisai hasha dzenyu kwatiri.
Ko mucaramba makatitsamŋira nokusiŋgaperi?
Mucaȿitsa kutsamŋa kwenyu kumarudzi namarudzi here?
Imi hamuŋgatiraramisi ɀe here,
Kuti ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋafare nemi?
Tiratidzei ŋgoni dzenyu, Jehova,
Mutipe ruponeso rwenyu.
Ndicanzwa ɀicataura Mŋari Jehova;
Nokuti ucataura rugare kuʋanhu ʋake, nokuʋatȿene ʋake;
Asi ŋgaʋarege kudzokera ɀe kuʋupenzi.
Ɀirokwaɀo kuponesa kwake kuri pedyo naʋanomutya;
Kuti kubginya kugare munyika yeɗu.
Ŋgoni neɀokwaɗi ɀakasoŋgana;
Kururama norugare ɀakaȿetana.
Ɀokwaɗi inomera pasi;
Kururama kwakatarira pasi kuri kuɗeŋga.
Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova ucapa ɀinhu ɀakanaka;
Nyika yeɗu icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Kururama kucamutuŋgamirira;
Kucagadzirira tsoka dzake nzira.
Rerekai nzeʋe dzenyu, Jehova, ndipindurei;
Nokuti ndiri murombo nomushaiwi.
Ceŋgetai mŋeya waŋgu; nokuti ndiri muɗikanwa
Haiwa Mŋari waŋgu, ponesai muranda wenyu unoʋimba nemi.
Ndinzwirei ŋgoni, Ishe;
Nokuti ndinoɗana kwamuri zuʋa rose.
Fadzai mŋeya womuranda wenyu;
Nokuti ndinosimudzira mŋeya waŋgu kwamuri Ishe waŋgu.
Nokuti imi, Ishe, makanaka, munofarira kukaŋganwira,
Muneŋgoni zhinji kunaʋose ʋanoɗana kwamuri.
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu, Jehova kumunyeŋgetero waŋgu;
Tererai inzwi rokukumbira kwaŋgu.
Pazuʋa rokutambudzika kwaŋgu ndicaɗana kwamuri,
Nokuti mucandipindura.
Hapana‐wakafanana nemi pakati paʋamŋari, Ishe,
Ʋuye
Ndudzi dzose dzamakaita dzicaʋuya kuzonamata pamberi penyu, Ishe,
Dzicarumbidza zita renyu.
Nokuti imi muri mukuru, munoita ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa;
Ndimi Mŋari woga.
Ndidzidzisei nzira yenyu, Jehova, ndicafamba muɀokwaɗi yenyu,
Ƃatanidzai mŋoyo waŋgu kuti nditye zita renyu.
Ndicakurumbidzai, Ishe Mŋari waŋgu, nomŋoyo waŋgu wose,
Ndicarumbidza zita renyu nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti ŋgoni dzenyu ihuru kwandiri;
Makarwira mŋeya waŋgu pagomba rakadzika‐dzika.
Mŋari, ʋanoɀikudza ʋakandimukira,
Ʋuŋgano yaʋanhu, ʋanomanikidza, ʋakatȿaka mŋeya waŋgu,
Haʋana‐kukuisai pamberi paʋo.
Asi imi, Ishe, muri Mŋari unetsitsi nenyasha,
Hamukurumidzi kutsamŋa, muneŋgoni zhinji neɀokwaɗi.
Riŋgirai kwandiri, mundinzwire ŋgoni;
Ipai muranda wenyu simba renyu,
Muponese mŋanakomana womurandakadzi wenyu.
Ndiratidzei ciratidzo
Kuti ʋanondiʋeŋga ʋaɀiʋone, ʋanyadziswe;
Nokuti imi Jehova, makandiɓatsira nokundinyaradza.
Nheyo dzake dziri pamakomo matȿene.
Jehova unoɗa masuʋo eZioni
Kupfuʋura pose panogara Jakobo.
Ɀinhu ɀakanakisa ɀinotaurwa pamsoro pako,
Iwe guta raMŋari.
Rahabi neBabironi ndicati ʋari pakati paʋanondiziʋa;
Tarirai, Firistia, neTire, neEtiopia;
Munhu uyu wakaɀarirwa’ko.
Ɀirokwaɀo, pamsoro peZioni ʋacati: Uyu noyoyo ʋakaɀarirwa’mo;
Naiye Wokumsoro‐soro amene ucarisimbisa.
Jehova ucaʋereŋga, pakunyora kwake ndudzi,
Munhu uyu wakaɀarirwa’ko.
Ʋanoimba naʋanotamba,
Matsime aŋgu ose ari mauri.
Jehova, Mŋari muponesi waŋgu,
Ndakacema masikati noʋusiku pamberi penyu;
Munyeŋgetero waŋgu ŋgaupinde pamberi penyu;
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu munzwe kucema kwaŋgu;
Nokuti mŋeya waŋgu uzere namaɗambudziko,
Ʋupenyu bgaŋgu bgosweɗera kuSheori.
Ndinoʋereŋgwa pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba;
Ndakafanana nomunhu unoshaiwa muɓatsiri;
Ndakarashirwa pakati paʋakafa,
Saʋakaʋurawa ʋaʋete mubgiro,
Ʋamusati mucaraŋgarira;
Ʋakagurwa paruʋoko rwenyu.
Makandiisa mugomba rakadzika‐dzika,
Panɀimbo dzinerima, makadzika kwaɀo.
Hasha dzenyu dzinorema kwaɀo pamsoro paŋgu,
Makanditambudza namafuŋgu enyu ose.
Makaisa ʋazikani ʋaŋgu kure neni;
Makandiita cinhu cinonyaŋgadza kwaʋari;
Ndakapfigirwa, handigoni kuɓuɗa.
Ziso raŋgu ropera nemhaka yokutambudzika;
Ndakaɗana kwamuri, Jehova, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe,
Ndakatambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu kwamuri.
Muŋgaitira ʋakafa ɀinoshamisa here?
Ko ʋakaparara ʋaŋgamuka ʋakakurumbidzai here?
Ʋunyoro bgenyu ʋuŋgaparidzwa mubgiro here?
Kana kutendeka kwenyu mukuparadza here?
Ɀishamiso ɀenyu ɀiŋgazikanwa murima here?
Nokururama kwenyu panyika yokukaŋganwa here?
Asi ndakacema kwamuri, Jehova,
Munyeŋgetero waŋgu ucaȿika pamberi penyu maŋgwanani.
Jehova, munorashireiko mŋeya waŋgu?
Munoʋanzireiko ciso cenyu kwandiri?
Kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu ndakaŋga ndicitambudzwa ndicirwiso‐fa;
Kana ndicityiswa nemi ndinoshaiwa mano.
Kutsamŋa kwenyu kukuru kwakapfuʋura napamsoro paŋgu;
Kutyisa kwenyu kwakandiparadza.
Ɀakandikomberedza zuʋa rose semvura;
Ɀakandipoteredza pamŋe cete.
Iye, unondiɗa, neshamŋari yaŋgu, makaʋaisa kure neni,
Nomuzikani waŋgu uri murima.
Ndicaimba
Ndicaparidza nomuromo waŋgu kutendeka kwenyu kumrudzi namarudzi.
Nokuti ndakati: Ŋgoni dzicaʋakwa nokusiŋgaperi;
Mucasimbisa kutendeka kwenyu mukuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga mumene.
Ndakaita suŋgano nomusanaŋgurwa waŋgu,
Ndakapika kumuranda waŋgu Davidi,
Ndicamisa ʋana ʋako nokusiŋgaperi,
Nokuʋaka cigaro cako coʋushe kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kucarumbidza ɀishamiso ɀenyu, Jehova;
Nokutendeka kwenyu ʋo paʋuŋgano yaʋatȿene.
Nokuti ndianiko muɗeŋga rose uŋgaenzaniswa naJehova?
Ndianiko pakati paʋanakomana ʋaMŋari wakafanana naJehova?
Iye Mŋari unotyiwa ɀikuru paʋuŋgano yaʋatȿene,
Unofanira kutyiwa kupfuʋura ʋose ʋanomupoteredza.
Haiwa, Jehova, Mŋari wehondo,
Ndianiko unesimba, wakafanana nemi, Jehova?
Kutendeka kwenyu kunokukomberedzai.
Ndimi munoɓata kuɀikudza kweguŋgwa;
Kana mafuŋgu aro acisimuka, ndimi munoanyaradza.
Makaputsanya Rahabi, somunhu wakaʋurawa;
Makaparadzira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu noruʋoko rwenyu runesimba.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ndokwenyu, napasi ndopenyu ʋo;
Nyika neɀose ɀayo, ndimi makaɀiteya.
Kumsoro nenyasi, ndimi makaɀisika;
Tabori neHermoni anofara nezita renyu.
Munoruʋoko runesimba;
Canza cenyu cinesimba, ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi rwakasimudzwa.
Kururama nokururamisa ndidzo nheyo dzecigaro cenyu coʋushe;
Ŋgoni neɀokwaɗi ɀinokutuŋgamirirai.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanhu ʋanoziʋa inzwi romufaro;
Ʋanofamba, Jehova, muciedza ceciso cenyu.
Ʋanofara muzita renyu zuʋa rose;
Ʋanosimudzwa nokururama kwenyu.
Nokuti imi muri kubginya kwesimba raʋo;
Runyaŋga rweɗu rucasimudzwa netsitsi dzenyu.
Nokuti nhoʋo yeɗu ndeyaJehova;
Namambo weɗu ndowoMutȿene waIsraeri.
Paŋguʋa iyo makataura naʋatsene ʋenyu pakuɀiratidza kwenyu,
Mukati: Ndakaɓatsira mhare;
Ndakasimudza mumŋe wakasanaŋgurwa pakati paʋanhu.
Ndakawana Davidi muranda waŋgu;
Ndakamuzodza namafuta aŋgu matȿene;
Canza caŋgu cicasimbiswa naye;
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu ʋo rucamusimbisa.
Muʋeŋgi haaŋgamumanikidzi;
Mŋanakomana weɀakaipa haaŋgamutambudzi.
Ndicaparadza ʋadziʋisi ʋake pamberi pake,
Ndicaroʋa ʋanomuʋeŋga.
Asi kutendeka kwaŋgu neŋgoni dzaŋgu ɀicaʋa naye;
Runyaŋga rwake rucasimudzwa nezita raŋgu.
Ndicaisa ʋo ruʋoko rwake pamsoro peguŋgwa,
Noruʋoko rwake rworudyi pamsoro penzizi.
Iye ucaɗana kwandiri,
Mŋari waŋgu, neɗombo rokuponeswa kwaŋgu.
Ndicamuita ʋo ɗaŋgwe
Mukuru wamadzimambo apasi.
Ndicamuceŋgetera ŋgoni dzaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi,
Suŋgano yaŋgu icaramba yakasimba kwaari.
Ʋana ʋake ndicaʋagarisa ʋo nokusiŋgaperi,
Cigaro cake coʋushe cicafanana namazuʋa okuɗeŋga.
Kana ʋana ʋake ʋakasiya murairo waŋgu,
Ʋakasafamba neɀandakatoŋga;
Kana ʋakaɀidza ɀandakatema,
Ʋakasaceŋgeta mirau yaŋgu;
Ipapo ndicaʋaraŋga neshamhu pamsoro pokuɗarika kwaʋo,
Ʋuye nokuroʋa pamsoro pokuipa kwaʋo.
Asi handiŋgamutoreri ʋunyoro bgaŋgu cose,
Kana kutendera kutendeka kwaŋgu kuitiswa nhema.
Suŋgano yaŋgu handiŋgaiɀidzi,
Kana kushandura cinhu cakaɓuɗa pamuromo waŋgu.
Ndakapika kamŋe cete noʋutȿene bgaŋgu;
Handiŋgareʋi nhema kunaDavidi;
Ʋana ʋake ʋacaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi,
Cigaro cake coʋushe cicafanana nezuʋa pamberi paŋgu.
Cicasimbiswa nokusiŋgaperi somŋedzi,
Secapupu cakatendeka ciri kuɗeŋga.
Asi imi makarasha nokuramba,
Makatsamŋira muzodzwa wenyu.
Makasema suŋgano yomuranda wenyu;
Makaɀidza korona yake
Makaputsa madziro ake ose;
Makaita nhare dzake matoŋgo.
Ʋose ʋanopfuʋura nenzira ʋanopamba
Waʋa cinhu cinosekwa naʋaanogara naʋo.
Makasimudza ruʋoko rworudyi rwaʋadziʋisi ʋake;
Makafadza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋose.
Ɀirokwaɀo, munodzosa munondo wake unopinza,
Hamuna‐kumusimbisa pakurwa.
Makagumisa kubginya kwake,
Makawisira pasi cigaro cake coʋushe.
Makatapudza mazuʋa oʋujaya bgake;
Makamufukidza nokunyara.
Jehova, mucaɀiʋanza nokusiŋgaperi
Kutsamŋa kwenyu kucapisa somŋoto
Haiwa, raŋgarirai kuti ŋguʋa yaŋgu ifupi kwaɀo;
Kuti makasikira ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋose ɀinhu ɀisinamaturo kwaɀo!
Ndoupiko munhu uŋgararama akasaʋona kufa,
Uŋgarwira mŋeya wake pasimba reSheori here?
Ishe, ʋunyoro bgenyu bgakare ʋuripiko,
Bgamakapika kunaDavidi nokutendeka kwenyu here?
Raŋgarirai, Ishe, kushoʋorwa kwaʋaranda ʋenyu;
Kuti ndinotakura mucifuʋa caŋgu
Uko kwakashoʋora ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu nako, Jehova,
Kwaʋakashoʋora nako makwara omuzodzwa wenyu.
Jehova ŋgaaʋoŋgwe nokusiŋgaperi.
Ameni, ɀirokwaɀo, Ameni.
Ishe, makaŋga muri ʋugaro bgeɗu
Pamarudzi namarudzi.
Makomo asati aɀarwa,
Musati matoŋgosika nyika nevu,
Kubva pakusiŋgaperi kuȿikira pakusiŋgaperi imi muri Mŋari.
Munodzosera munhu kuguruʋa;
Muciti: Dzokai ʋana ʋaʋanhu.
Nokuti kwamuri makore anecuru
Akaŋgofanana nezuʋa razuro kana rapfuʋura,
Seŋguʋa yokurinda yoʋusiku.
Munoʋakukura semvura zhinji; ʋaʋa sehope;
Maŋgwanani ʋakaita soʋuswa ʋunomera.
Maŋgwanani ʋunotumbuka, ʋunomera;
Maɗekwana ʋunodzurwa, ndokuȿaʋa.
Nokuti tinopedzwa nokutsamŋa kwenyu,
Tinotambudzika nehasha dzenyu.
Makaisa ɀakaipa ɀeɗu pamberi penyu,
Ɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɀakaʋanzika paciedza ceciso cenyu.
Nokuti mazuʋa eɗu ose anopfuʋura makatsamŋa;
Makore eɗu anopera soruŋgano.
Mazuʋa amakore eɗu anoȿika makore makumi manomŋe,
Kana tinesimba makore makumi masere;
Asi kunyaŋge acikudzwa ndiko kutambudzika nenhamo ɓedzi.
Nokuti gare‐gare aenda, nesu tabururuka taenda.
Ndianiko unoziʋa simba rokutsamŋa kwenyu,
Nehasha dzenyu, kuti mutyiwe ɀakafanira here?
Tidzidzisei kunatso‐ʋereŋga mazuʋa eɗu,
Kuti tiɀiwanire mŋoyo wakacenjera.
Dzokai Jehova; kuȿikira riniko?
Muɀiɗembe pamsoro paʋaranda ʋenyu.
Tigutsei maŋgwanani neŋgoni dzenyu;
Kuti tifarise, tiʋe nomufaro mazuʋa eɗu ose.
Tifadzei ɀinoenzana namazuʋa amakatitambudza,
Namakore atakaʋona ɀakaipa.
Ɀamakaita ŋgaɀiʋonekwe naʋaranda ʋenyu,
Nokubginya kwenyu pamsoro paʋana ʋaʋo.
Kunaka kwaJehova Mŋari weɗu ŋgakuʋe pamsoro peɗu;
Mutisimbisire ɓasa ramaʋoko eɗu;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɓasa ramaʋoko eɗu murisimbise.
Uyo ugere panɀimbo yokuʋanda yoWokumsoro‐soro
Ucarambira pamumvuri woWamasimba‐ose.
Ndicati pamsoro paJehova: Ndiye ʋutiziro bgaŋgu nenhare yaŋgu;
Iye Mŋari waŋgu, wandinoʋimba naye.
Nokuti iye ucakurwira parugombe rwomuteyi weshiri,
Napahosha inoʋuraya ɀikuru.
Iye ucakufukidza nemhineŋga yake,
Ucatizira pasi pamapapiro ake;
Ɀokwaɗi yake inhoʋo huru neɗuku.
Hauŋgatyi cinhu cinovundusa ʋusiku,
Kana museʋe unofurwa masikati;
Kana hosha inofamba murima,
Kana kuparadza kunoʋuraya masikati.
Kurutiʋi rwako kucawa ʋanegumi ramazana,
Nezana ramazana paruʋoko rwako rworudyi;
Ucaŋgoɀitarira hako nameso ako,
Ukaʋona muɓayiro waʋakaipa.
Nokuti imi Jehova, muri ʋutiziro bgaŋgu!
Iwe wakaita Wokumsoro‐soro ʋugaro bgako.
Hapana cakaipa ciŋgakuwira,
Ʋuye hapanehosha icasweɗera patente rako.
Nokuti iye ucaraira ʋatumŋa ʋake pamsoro pako,
Kuti ʋakuceŋgete panzira dzako dzose.
Ʋacakusimudza pamaʋoko aʋo,
Kuti urege kugumbusa rutsoka rwako pabge.
Ucatsika pamsoro peshumba neciʋa;
Mŋana weshumba nenyoka ucaɀitsikirira pasi.
Ɀaakandiɗa, ndicamurwira;
Ndicamuisa pakakwirira, nokuti wakaziʋa zita raŋgu.
Iye ucaɗana kwandiri, ndicamupindura;
Ini ndicaʋa naye pakutambudzika;
Ndicamurwira, nokumukudza.
Ndicamugutsa noʋupenyu ʋurefu,
Nokumuratidza ruponeso rwaŋgu.
Ɀakanaka kuʋoŋga Jehova,
Nokuimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi Wokumsoro‐soro;
Kuparidza ʋunyoro bgenyu maŋgwanani,
Nokutendeka kwenyu ʋusiku bgose,
Necinoridzwa cinehuŋgiso gumi, nomuteŋgeranwa;
Nenzwi rakanaka pambira.
Nokuti imi, Jehova, makandifadza neɀamakaita;
Ndicafara kwaɀo namaɓasa amaʋoko enyu.
Maɓasa enyu akakura seiko, Jehova!
Mifuŋgo yenyu yakadzika kwaɀo.
Usinenjere haaɀiziʋi;
Ƃenzi harinzwisisi iɀoɀi:
Kana ʋakaipa ʋacimera soʋuswa,
Ʋuye kana ʋaiti ʋose ʋeɀakaipa ʋacikura;
Ɀinoitwa kuti ʋaparadzwe nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi imi Jehova, muri kumsoro nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti tarirai; Jehova, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu,
Nokuti tarirai, Jehova, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋacaparara;
Ʋaiti ʋose ʋeɀakaipa ʋacaparadzirwa.
Asi runyaŋga rwaŋgu makarusimudza
Ndakazodzwa namafuta matȿa.
Ziso raŋgu rakaʋona
Nzeʋe dzaŋgu dzakanzwa
Wakarurama ucamera somucindwe;
Ucakura somusidari paRebanoni.
Ʋakasimŋa mumba maJehova
Ʋacakura muʋazhe dzaMŋari weɗu.
Ʋacaramba ʋaciɓereka ɀiɓereko pakukwegura kwaʋo;
Ʋacaʋa ʋanyoro naʋatȿa;
Kuti ʋaparidze kuti Jehova wakarurama;
Ndiye ɗombo raŋgu, hapanecinhu cisina‐kururama maari.
Jehova unoɓata ʋushe; wakafuka ʋumambo;
Jehova wakafuka simba, wakaɀisuŋga ciʋuno naro;
Nyika ʋo yakateyiwa, haiŋgazunuŋguswi.
Cigaro cenyu coʋushe cakasimbiswa kubva kare;
Imi muri’po kubva pakusiŋgaperi.
Jehova, nzizi dzakanzwisa,
Nzizi dzakanzwisa manzwi adzo;
Nzizi dzinonzwisa kutinhira kwadzo.
Namafuŋgu anesimba eguŋgwa,
Jehova, uri kumsoro, ndiye unesimba.
Ɀipupuriro ɀenyu ndeɀamaɀokwaɗi kwaɀo;
Ʋutȿene ʋunofanira imba yenyu,
Jehova, nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova, imi Mŋari mutsiʋi,
Imi Mŋari mutsiʋi, penyai.
Ɀisimudzei, imi Mutoŋgi wenyika;
Ipai ʋanoɀikudza seɀaʋakafanira.
Jehova, ʋakaipa
Ʋakaipa ʋacafara kwaɀo kuȿikira rini?
Ʋanoŋgotaura haʋo, ʋanotaura ʋaciɀikudza,
Ʋaiti ʋose ʋeɀakaipa ʋanoita manyawi.
Ʋanopxanya ʋanhu ʋenyu, Jehova,
Ʋacitambudza nhaka yenyu.
Ʋanoʋuraya cirikadzi nomŋeni,
Nenherera ʋanodziʋuraya.
Ʋaciti: Jehova haaɀiʋoni,
Mŋari waJakobo haaɀiraŋgariri.
Raŋgarirai imi ʋasinenjere pakati paʋanhu;
Nemi mapenzi, mucaʋa ʋakacenjera riniko?
Iye, wakasima nzeʋe, haaŋganzwi here?
Iye, wakaʋumba ziso, haaŋgaʋoni here?
Iye, unoraŋga ʋahedeni, haaŋgarairi here,
Iye, unodzidzisa ʋanhu ziʋo?
Jehova unoziʋa kufuŋga kwaʋanhu,
Kuti haɀinamaturo.
Wakaropafadzwa munhu, unoraŋgwa nemi, Jehova,
Iye wamunodzidzisa pamurairo wenyu;
Kuti mumuzorodzei pamazuʋa okutambudzika,
Kuȿikira ʋakaipa ʋacererwa gomba.
Nokuti Jehova haaŋgarashi ʋanhu ʋake,
Ʋuye haaŋgasiyi nhaka yake.
Nokuti kutoŋga kucadzokera kukururama;
Ʋose ʋanemŋoyo yakarurama ʋacakuteʋera.
Ndianiko ucandirwira paʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa?
Ndianiko ucandiɓatsira panaʋanoita ɀakaipa?
Ƌai Jehova asaiʋa muɓatsiri waŋgu,
Mŋeya waŋgu uŋgaɗai wakakurumidza kugara pakati ŋwii.
Paŋguʋa yandakati: Rutsoka rwaŋgu rwotedzemuka;
Ŋgoni dzenyu, Jehova, dzakanditsigira.
Mundaŋgariro dzaŋgu zhinji mukati maŋgu
Kunyaradza kwenyu kunofadza mŋeya waŋgu.
Cigaro ceɀakaipa ciŋgashamŋaridzana nemi here,
Ico cinofuŋga kuita ɀakashata nemitemo yaco?
Ʋanoʋuŋganira ʋupenyu bgowakarurama,
Ʋacipa mhoȿa ropa risinemhoȿa.
Asi Jehova ndiye nhare yaŋgu yakasimba;
Mŋari waŋgu iɗombo roʋutiziro bgaŋgu.
Ucadzosera pamsoro paʋo kutadza kwaʋo,
Ucaʋaparadza pakati pokuipa kwaʋo;
Jehova Mŋari weɗu ucaʋaparadza.
Ʋuyai, tiimbire Jehova;
Ŋgatipururudzei ɗombo rokuponeswa kweɗu.
Ŋgatiȿike pamberi pake ticiʋoŋga,
Ŋgatimupururudzei namapisarema,
Nokuti Jehova ndiMŋari mukuru,
Mambo mukuru unokunda ʋamŋari ʋose.
Nɀimbo dzakadzika dzapasi dziri muruʋoko rwake;
Misoro yamakomo ndeyake ʋo.
Guŋgwa nderake, ndiye wakariita;
Maʋoko ake akaʋumba nyika yakawoma.
Ʋuyai, tinamate tikotamire pasi;
Ŋgatifugame pamberi paJehova Muiti weɗu.
Nokuti ndiye Mŋari weɗu,
Isu tiri ʋanhu ʋanofudzwa naye, namakwai oruʋoko rwake.

Maɓasa amaʋoko ake iɀokwaɗi nokururamisira;
Mirairo yake yose yakasimba.
Yakasimbiswa nokusiŋgaperi‐peri,
Yakaitwa neɀokwaɗi nokururama.
Wakatumira ʋanhu ʋake rudzikinuro;
Wakaraira suŋgano yake nokusiŋgaperi;
Zita rake idɀene rinotyisa.
Kutya Jehova ndiko kutaŋga kwoʋucenjeri;
Ʋose ʋanoɀiita ʋanomuraŋgariro wakanaka;
Kurumbidzwa kwake kunogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Hareruya!
Wakaropafadzwa munhu unotya Jehova,
Unofarira ɀikuru mirairo yake.
Ʋana ʋake ʋacaʋa nesimba pasi;
Rudzi rwowakarurama rucaropafadzwa.
Fuma neɀakawanda ɀiri mumba make;
Kururama kwake kunogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Wakarurama unoɓuɗirwa neciedza parima;
Unomufaro munhu uyo unoita nenyasha, unopa cikwerete;
Ucaruramisirwa mhaka yake pakutoŋga.
Nokuti haaŋgatoŋgozunuŋguswi;
Wakarurama ucaramba aciraŋgarirwa nokusiŋgaperi.
Haaŋgatyi mashoko eɀinhu ɀakaipa;
Mŋoyo wake wakasimba, ucaʋimba naJehova.
Mŋoyo wake wakasimbiswa, haaŋgatyi,
Kuȿikira aʋona kukundwa kwaʋadziʋisi ʋake.
Wakaparadzira, akapa ʋashaiwi;
Kururama kwake kunogara nokusiŋgaperi;
Runyaŋga rwake rucakwiridzwa nokukudzwa.
Wakaipa ucaɀiʋona, ndokufa neshuŋgu;
Ucageda‐geɗa meno ake, ndokunyauka;
Kuɗa kwowakaipa kucaparara.
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai, imi ʋaranda ʋaJehova,
Rumbidzai zita raJehova.
Zita raJehova ŋgarikudzwe
Kubva paŋguʋa ino kuȿikira pakusiŋgaperi.
Kubva pakuɓuɗa kwezuʋa kuȿikira pakuʋira kwaro
Zita raJehova rinofanira kurumbidzwa.
Jehova uri kumsoro kwaʋahedeni ʋose,
Nokubginya kwake kumsoro kwokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga.
Ndianiko wakafanana naJehova Mŋari weɗu,
Iye unogara kumsoro,
Iye unoɀiɗukupisa kuti aʋone
Ɀiri kuɗeŋga napasi?
Unosimudza murombo abve muguruʋa,
Nomushaiwi unomumutsa abve paɗurunhuru;
Kuti amugarise pamŋe cete namacinda,
Iwo macinda aʋanhu ʋake.
Unogarisa mukadzi usiŋgaɓereki mumba,
Aʋe mai ʋanofara naʋana.
Hareruya!
Pakuɓuɗa kwaIsraeri paEgipita,
Imba yaJakobo
Juda wakaitwa imba yake tȿene,
NaIsraeri ʋushe bgake.
Guŋgwa rakaɀiʋona, rikatiza;
Joridani rwakadzokera shure.
Makomo akapembera samakondobge,
Neɀikomo samakwaiana.
Unonzweiko iwe guŋgwa, ɀaunotiza iwe?
Newe Joridani, ɀaunodzokera shure?
Nemi makomo, ɀamunopembera samakondobge;
Nemi ɀikomo, samakwaiana?
Bvunda iwe pasi, pamberi paShe,
Pamberi paMŋari waJakobo;
Iye wakashandura ɗombo, rikaʋa dziʋa remvura,
Nomusarasara, rikaʋa tsime remvura.
Isu kwete, Jehova, isu kwete,
Asi zita renyu ŋgarikudzwe,
Nokuɗa kweŋgoni dzenyu, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokutendeka kwenyu.
Ʋahedeni ʋacareʋerei,
Ko Mŋari waʋo ɀino uripi?
Asi Mŋari weɗu uri kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga;
Wakaita ɀose ɀaakaɗa.
Ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo isirveri nendarama,
Ƃasa ramaʋoko aʋanhu.
Ɀinemiromo, asi haɀitauri;
Nameso ɀinawo, asi haɀiʋoni;
Ɀinenzeʋe, asi haɀinzwi;
Nemhino ɀinadzo, asi haɀinhuwidzi;
Ɀinamaʋoko, asi haɀiɓati;

Iʋo ʋanoɀiita ʋacafanana naɀo;
Ɀirokwaɀo, naʋose ʋanoʋimba naɀo.
Iwe Israeri, ʋimba naJehova;
Ndiye muɓatsiri waʋo nenhoʋo yaʋo.
Iwe imba yaAroni, ʋimba naJehova;
