Imi munotya Jehova, ʋimbai naJehova;
Ndiye muɓatsiri waʋo nenhoʋo yaʋo.
Jehova wakatiraŋgarira; iye ucatiropafadza;
Ucaropafadza imba yaIsraeri;
Ucaropafadza imba yaAroni.
Ucaropafadza ʋanotya Jehova,
Ʋaɗuku naʋakuru ʋose.
Jehova ucaramba acikuwanzai,
Imi naʋana ʋenyu.
Imi makaropafadzwa naJehova,
Iye wakaita kuɗeŋga napasi.
Kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga ndiko kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kwaJehova;
Asi pasi wakapa ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.
Ʋakafa haʋarumbidzi Jehova,
Kunyaŋge aninani unoɓurukira kwakanyarara;
Asi isu heɗu ticakudza Jehova
Kubva paŋguʋa ino kuȿika pakusiŋgaperi.
Hareruya!
Ndinoɗa Jehova, nokuti unonzwa

Ɀaakarereka nzeʋe yake kwandiri,
Ndicaɗana kwaari mazuʋa aŋgu

Kurwadziwa kweSheori kwakandiɓata;
Ndakawana kutambudzika nokucema.
Ipapo ndakaɗana zita raJehova;
Haiwa Jehova, ndinonyeŋgetera kuti murwire mŋeya waŋgu.
Jehova unenyasha, wakarurama;
Ɀirokwaɀo, Mŋari weɗu unetsitsi.
Jehova unoceŋgeta ʋasinamano;
Ndakaŋga ndashaiwa simba, iye akandiponesa.
Dzokera kuzororo rako, mŋeya waŋgu;
Nokuti Jehova wakakuitira ɀakanaka.
Nokuti makarwira mŋeya waŋgu parufu,
Nameso aŋgu pamisodzi,
Netsoka dzaŋgu pakugumburwa.
Ndicafamba pamberi paJehova
Panyika yaʋapenyu.
Ndakatenda pakutaura kwaŋgu,
Ndakamanikidzwa kwaɀo;
Ndakati pakuvunduka kwaŋgu:
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋanoreʋa nhema.
Ndicaʋigireiko Jehova
Pamsoro pemikomborero yake yose kwandiri?
Ndicasimudza mukombe wokuponeswa,
Ndiciɗana zita raJehova.
Ndicaripira Jehova mhiko dzaŋgu,
Ndicaɀiita pamberi paʋanhu ʋake ʋose.
Cinhu cinokosha pamberi paJehova,
Ndirwo rufu rwaʋatȿene ʋake.
Haiwa Jehova, ɀirokwaɀo ndiri muranda wenyu;
Ndiri muranda wenyu, mŋanakomana womurandakadzi wenyu;
Makasunuŋgura misuŋgo yaŋgu.
Ndicakuɓayirai ɀiɓayiro ɀokuʋoŋga,
Ndiciɗana zita raJehova.
Ndicaripira Jehova mhiko dzaŋgu,
Ndicaɀiita pamberi paʋanhu ʋake ʋose;
Paʋazhe dzeimba yaJehova,
Mukati mako, iwe Jerusarema.
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehova, imi ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu;
Mukudzei, imi ʋanhu ʋose.
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake kwatiri ihuru;
Kutendeka kwaJehova kunogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Hareruya!
Ʋoŋgai Jehova; nokuti wakanaka;

Israeri ɀino ŋgaʋati:
Ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Imba yaAroni ɀino ŋgaiti:
Ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Aʋo ʋanotya Jehova ɀino ŋgaʋati:
Ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.

Jehova akandipindura,

Pakuʋimba nomunhu.

Ʋahedeni ʋose ʋakandikomba;
Ndicaʋaparadza nezita raJehova.
Ʋakandikomba, ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakandikomba,
Ndicaʋaparadza nezita raJehova.
Ʋakandikomba senyuci; ʋakadzimŋa somŋoto weminzwa;
Ndicaʋaparadza nezita raJehova.
Kundisundidzira wakandisundidzira iwe kuti ndiwe;
Asi Jehova wakandiɓatsira.
Jehova ndiye simba raŋgu norwiyo rwaŋgu;
Iye wakaʋa muponesi waŋgu.

Ruʋoko rworudyi rwaJehova runokunda.
Handiŋgafi, asi ndicararama,
Ndicaɗudzira maɓasa aJehova.
Kundiraŋga Jehova wakandiraŋga;
Asi haana‐kundiisa pakufa.
Ndizarurirei masuʋo okururama;
Ndicapinda nawo, ndiʋoŋge Jehova.
Iri ndiro suʋo raJehova;
Ʋakarurama ʋacapinda naro.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai, nokuti makandipindura,
Mukaʋa muponesi waŋgu.
Ibge rakarashwa naʋaʋaki
Ndiro rakazoʋa musoro wekona.
Ici cinhu cakabva kunaJehova;
Ɀinoshamisa kana ticiɀiʋona.
Rino izuʋa rakaitwa naJehova;
Ŋgatifare kwaɀo tirifarire.
Jehova, tipei mufarwa — ndiɀo ɀatinonyeŋgetera.
Wakaropafadzwa iye unoʋuya nezita raJehova;
Takakuropafadzai
Jehova ndiye Mŋari, ndiye wakativenekera;
Suŋgirai ciɓayiro namaɓote ipo panyaŋga dzeartari pamene.
Imi muri Mŋari waŋgu, ndicakuʋoŋgai;
Muri Mŋari waŋgu, ndicakukudzai.
Ʋoŋgai Jehova; nokuti wakanaka;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋakaropafadzwa aʋo ʋanenzira yakarurama,
Ʋanofamba mumurau waJehova.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanoceŋgeta ɀipupuriro ɀake,
Ʋanomutȿaka nomŋoyo wose.
Ɀirokwaɀo, haʋaiti cinhu cisina‐kururama,
Ʋanofamba munzira dzake.
Makatiraira ɀireʋo ɀenyu,
Kuti tiɀiceŋgete ɀakanaka.
Haiwa, ɗai nzira dzaŋgu dzakagadzirirwa
Kuceŋgeta mitemo yenyu!
Ipapo handiŋganyadziswi,
Kana ndiciraŋgarira mirairo yenyu yose.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai nomŋoyo wakarurama,
Kana ndicidzidza ɀamakatoŋga ɀakarurama.
Ndicaceŋgeta mitemo yenyu;
Haiwa, regai kundirasha cose.
Jaya riŋgaramba ricinatsa nzira yaro neiko?
Kana rici
Ndakakutȿakai nomŋoyo waŋgu wose;
Musanditendera kutsauka pamirairo yenyu.
Shoko renyu ndakariʋiga mumŋoyo waŋgu,
Kuti ndirege kukutadzirai.
Imi munofanira kukudzwa, Jehova; Ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu.
Ndakaɗudzira nemiromo yaŋgu
Ɀose ɀamakatoŋga nomuromo wenyu.
Ndakafara kwaɀo munzira yeɀipupuriro ɀenyu,

Ndicaɀifadza nemitemo yenyu;
Handiŋgakaŋganwi shoko renyu.

Ndiȿinudzei meso aŋgu, kuti ndiʋone

Nokuti ndiri mutorwa panyika;
Regai kundiʋanzira mirairo yenyu.
Mŋeya waŋgu wapera nokushuʋa
Paŋguʋa dzose ɀamakatoŋga.
Makaraira ʋanoɀikudza,
Ŋgaʋatukwe ʋanotsauka pamirairo yenyu.
Bvisai kwandiri kushoʋorwa nokuɀidzwa;
Nokuti ndakaceŋgeta ɀipupuriro ɀenyu.
Macinda ʋo akagara akandireʋa;
Asi muranda wenyu wakafuŋgisisa mitemo yenyu.
Ɀipupuriro ɀenyu ʋo ɀinondifadza kwaɀo,
Ndiɀo ɀinondipa mano.
Mŋeya waŋgu unonamatira guruʋa;
Ndiponesei neshoko renyu.
Ndakaɗudzira nzira dzaŋgu, imi mukandipindura;
Ndidzidzisei mitemo yenyu.
Ipapo ndicafuŋgisisa maɓasa enyu anoshamisa.
Mŋeya waŋgu unonyuŋguruka nokuremerwa;
Ndisimbisei
Bvisai kwandiri nzira yenhema;
Nenyasha
Ndakasanaŋgura nzira yakatendeka;
Ndakaisa ɀamakatoŋga
Ndinonamatira ɀipupuriro ɀenyu;
Jehova, regai kundinyadzisa.
Ndicamhanya nenzira yemirairo yenyu,
Kana muneŋge makurisa mŋoyo waŋgu.
Ndidzidzisei, Jehova, nzira yemitemo yenyu;
Ndigoiceŋgeta kuȿikira pakuguma.
Ndipei njere, ndiceŋgete murau wenyu;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicauceŋgeta nomŋoyo waŋgu wose.
Ndifambisei munzira yemirairo yenyu;

Kweʋerai mŋoyo waŋgu kuɀipupuriro ɀenyu,
Urege
Dzorai meso aŋgu ndirege kuʋona ɀisinamaturo,
Mundiponese panzira dzenyu.
Simbisai Shoko renyu kumuranda wenyu,
Rakakwanira ʋanokutyai.
Bvisai kushoʋorwa kwaŋgu kwandinotya,
Nokuti ɀamakatoŋga ɀakanaka.
Tarirai, ndakashuʋa ɀireʋo ɀenyu;
Ndiponesei mukururama kwenyu.
Ŋgoni dzenyu ŋgadziʋuye ʋo kwandiri, Jehova,
Iko kuponesa kwenyu, seɀinoreʋa shoko renyu.
Naiɀoɀo ndicagona kupindura unondishoʋora;
Nokuti ndinoʋimba neshoko renyu.
Regai kubvisa shoko reɀokwaɗi cose pamuromo waŋgu;

Naiɀoɀo ndicasiceŋgeta murau wenyu
Nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ndicasifamba ndakasunuŋguka,
Nokuti ndakatȿaka ɀireʋo ɀenyu.
Ndicataura ʋo ɀipupuriro ɀenyu pamberi pamadzimambo,
Ndisiŋganyadziswi.
Ndicaɀifadza kwaɀo nemirairo yenyu,
Yandinoɗa.
Ndicasimudzira ʋo maʋoko aŋgu kumirairo yenyu, yandinoɗa;
Ndicafuŋgisisa mitemo yenyu.
Raŋgarirai shoko
Nokuti makandimutsira tariro.

Ndakaraŋgarira ɀamakatoŋga kare‐kare, Jehova,
Ndikaɀinyaradza.
Kutsamŋa kukuru kwakandiɓata,
Nokuɗa kwaʋakaipa ʋanorasha murau wenyu.

Jehova, pasi pazere neŋgoni dzenyu;

Asi ndicafuŋgisisa ɀireʋo ɀenyu.
Ʋanokutyai ŋgaʋadzokere kwandiri,
Ʋagoziʋa ɀipupuriro ɀenyu.
Mŋoyo waŋgu ŋgaururame pamitemo yenyu;

Mŋeya waŋgu unopaŋga kuponesa kwenyu;

Meso aŋgu anopera
Ndiciti: Mucandinyaradza riniko?
Nokuti ndaʋa sehomboɗo iri muʋutsi;

Mazuʋa omuranda wenyu maŋganiko?
Mucatoŋga riniko ʋanonditambudza?
Ʋanoɀikudza ʋakandicerera hunza,
Iʋo ʋasiŋgatereri murau wenyu.
Mirairo yenyu yose yakatendeka;
Ʋanonditambudza ndisinemhoȿa; ndiɓatsirei imi.
Ʋakaŋga ʋoɗa‐kundiparadza pasi;
Asi handina‐kusiya ɀireʋo ɀenyu.
Ndiponesei nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu;

Ndiri wenyu, ndiponesei;

Ndakaʋona kuguma kweɀose ɀakakwana,

Murumbidzei, imi ʋaranda ʋaJehova;
Imi mumire mumba maJehova,
Muʋazhe dzeimba yaMŋari weɗu.
Rumbidzai Jehova; nokuti Jehova wakanaka;
Imbirai zita rake nziyo dzokurumbidza; nokuti ndiɀo ɀinofadza.
Nokuti Jehova wakaɀisanaŋgurira Jakobo,
NaIsraeri kuti aʋe fuma yake caiyo.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti Jehova mukuru,
Ʋuye kuti Ishe weɗu uri kumsoro kwaʋamŋari ʋose.
Ɀose ɀaakaɗa kuita Jehova wakaɀiita,
Kuɗeŋga napasi, nomumakuŋgwa napakadzika pose.
Unokwidza makore pamigumo yapasi;
Unoita mheni
Unoɓuɗisa mhepo panoʋigwa fuma yake.
Ndiye wakaparadza mataŋgwe eEgipita,
Aʋanhu neeɀipfuwo.
Wakatuma ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso mukati mako, iwe Egipita,
Pamsoro paFarao napamsoro paʋaranda ʋake ʋose.
Ndiye wakaparadza ndudzi zhinji,
Nokuʋuraya madzimambo anesimba:
Sihoni mambo waʋaAmori,
NaOgi mambo weBashani,
Noʋushe bgose bgeKanani;
Akapa nyika yaʋo iʋe nhaka,
Zita renyu, Jehova, riripo nokusiŋgaperi;
Munoraŋgarirwa Jehova, kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Nokuti Jehova ucatoŋga ʋanhu ʋake,
Nokuɀiɗemba pamsoro paʋaranda ʋake.
Ɀifananidzo ɀaʋahedeni isirveri nendarama,
Muɓatowa maʋoko aʋanhu.
Ɀinemiromo, asi haɀitauri;
Nameso ɀinawo, asi haɀiʋoni;
Ɀinenzeʋe, asi haɀinzwi;
Hakuna‐kufema pamiromo yaɀo.
Ʋanoɀiita ʋacafanana naɀo;
Ɀirokwaɀo, naʋose ʋanoʋimba naɀo.
Imi ʋeimba yaIsraeri, rumbidzai Jehova;
Imi ʋeimba yaAroni, rumbidzai Jehova;
Imi ʋeimba yaRevi, rumbidzai Jehova;
Imi ʋanotya Jehova, rumbidzai Jehova.
Jehova ŋgaarumbidzwe paZioni,
Iye ugere Jerusarema.
Hareruya!
Ʋoŋgai Jehova, nokuti wakanaka;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋoŋgai Mŋari waʋamŋari;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋoŋgai Ishe wamadzishe;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye oga, unoita ɀishamiso ɀikuru;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye, wakaita kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga nenjere
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye wakatatanura pasi pamsoro pemvura zhinji;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye wakaita ɀiedza ɀikuru;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Zuʋa, kuti riɓate ʋushe masikati;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Mŋedzi nenyeredzi, kuti ɀiɓate ʋushe ʋusiku;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye, wakaroʋa ʋeEgipita pamataŋgwe aʋo;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Akaɓuɗisa Israeri pakati paʋo;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Necanza cinesimba, ʋuye noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye wakaparadzanisa Guŋgwa Dɀuku napakati;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Akayambusa Israeri nomukati maro;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Akawisira Farao nehondo yake muGuŋgwa Dɀuku;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye, wakaperekedza ʋanhu ʋake murenje;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye, wakaparadza madzimambo makuru;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Akaʋuraya madzimambo akakurumbira;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Sihoni mambo waʋaAmori;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
NaOgi mambo weBashani;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Akapa nyika yaʋo iʋe nhaka;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iʋe nhaka yaIsraeri muranda wake;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Iye, wakatiraŋgarira paʋurombo bgeɗu;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi;
Akatirwira paʋadziʋisi ʋeɗu;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndiye unopa ɀinhu ɀose ɀokudya ɀaɀo;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋoŋgai Mŋari wokuɗeŋga;
Nokuti ŋgoni dzake dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Panzizi dzeBabironi,
Ndipo patakagara pasi, ɀirokwaɀo tikacema,
Pakuraŋgarira kweɗu Zioni.
Pamikonacando mukati madzo
Takaturika mbira dzeɗu.
Nokuti ipapo aʋo ʋakatitapa ʋakakumbira kwatiri mashoko orwiyo,
Ʋakatiparadza
Tiimbirei ʋo rwiyo rweZioni.
Tiŋgaimba seiko rwiyo rwaJehova
Munyika yaʋatorwa?
Kana ndikakukaŋganwa, iwe Jerusarema,
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi ŋgarukaŋganwe
Rurimi rwaŋgu ŋgarunamatire kumatadza aŋgu,
Kana ndikarega kukuraŋgarira;
Kana ndisiŋgati Jerusarema
Ndiwo mufaro waŋgu mukuru unopfuʋura ɀose.
Raŋgarirai Jehova, muroʋe ʋana ʋaEdomi
Pamsoro pezuʋa reJerusarema;
Iʋo, ʋakati: Paradzai, paradzai,
Kuȿikira panheyo dzaro.
Iwe mukunda weBabironi, iwe wobva woparadzwa;
Munhu uyo ucaʋa nomufaro, ucakutsiʋira
Seɀawakatiitira iwe.
Munhu uyo ucaʋa nomufaro, ucatora pxere dzako
Nokudziroʋera paɗombo.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai nomŋoyo waŋgu wose;
Ndicakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza pamberi paʋamŋari.
Ndicanamata
Nokuʋoŋga zita renyu nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgenyu nokutendeka kwenyu;
Nokuti makakurisa shoko renyu kupfuʋura zita renyu rose.
Pazuʋa randakaɗana makandipindura,
Makandisimbisa nesimba pamŋeya waŋgu.
Madzimambo ose enyika acakuʋoŋgai, Jehova,
Nokuti ʋakanzwa mashoko omuromo wenyu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacaimba ʋacireʋa nzira dzaJehova;
Nokuti kubginya kwaJehova kukuru.
Nokuti Jehova uri kumsoro, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro unehanya nounoɀininipisa;
Asi unamanyawi
Kana ndicifamba pakati penhamo, imi mucandiponesa;
Mucatambanudza ruʋoko rwenyu kudziʋisa kutsamŋa kwaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu,
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi rucandiponesa.
Jehova ucandikwanisira
Ŋgoni dzenyu, Jehova, dzinogara nokusiŋgaperi;
Musarega maɓasa amaʋoko enyu.
Jehova, imi makandinɀera, nokundiziʋa.
Munoziʋa kugara kwaŋgu pasi nokusimuka kwaŋgu,
Munonzwisisa kufuŋga kwaŋgu muri kure.
Munocerekedza kufamba kwaŋgu nokuʋata kwaŋgu pasi,
Munoziʋa nzira dzaŋgu dzose.
Nokuti shoko risati raʋa’po parurimi rwaŋgu,
Tarirai, imi Jehova, matoriziʋa rose.
Makandikomberedza shure kwaŋgu nemberi,
Nokuisa ruʋoko rwenyu pamsoro paŋgu.
Kuziʋa
Ɀiri kumsoro, handigoni kuȿikira kwaɀiri.
Ndiŋgaendepiko ndibve pamŋeya wenyu?
Kana ndiŋgatizirepiko ndibve pamberi penyu?
Kana ndikakwira kuɗeŋga muri’po;
Kana ndikaɀiwarira nhoʋo paSheori, tarirai muri’po ʋo.
Kana ndikabururuka namapapiro amaŋgwanani,
Ndikandogara pamigumo yeguŋgwa;
Naipapo ʋo ruʋoko rwenyu rucandifambisa,
Ruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi rucandifambisa,
Kana ndikati: Ɀirokwaɀo, rima ricandifukidza,
Ciedza cinondikomberedza cicaʋa soʋusiku;
Kunyaŋge rima hariŋga
Asi ʋusiku ʋunopenya samasikati;
Rima neciedza ɀakafanana.
Nokuti imi makaʋumba itȿo dzaŋgu;
Makandiruka muɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu.
Ndicakuʋoŋgai; nokuti ndakaitwa nomutoʋo unotyisa unoshamisa;
Maɓasa enyu anoshamisa;
Mŋeya waŋgu unoɀiziʋa kwaɀo.
Mafupa aŋgu akaŋga asina kuʋanzwa kwamuri,
Paŋguʋa yandakaitwa pakaʋanda,
Pakuʋumbga kwaŋgu nenjere panɀimbo dzezasi dzapasi.
Meso enyu akaʋona muʋiri waŋgu ucigere kukwaniswa,
Ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀakanyorwa murugwaro rwenyu,
Zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe rokuʋumbga kwaɀo,
Kusati kwaʋa necimŋe caɀo.
Miraŋgariro yenyu, Mŋari, inoɗikanwa sei neni!
Yakakura sei pakuʋereŋgwa kwayo!
Kana ndikaiʋereŋga, iŋgapfuʋura jeca pakuwanda;
Kana ndicipepuka, ndicine’mi.
Ƌai muciʋuraya henyu ʋakaipa, Mŋari;
Naiɀoɀo ibvai kwandiri, imi ʋanhu ʋeropa.
Nokuti ʋanokutaurirai ɀakaipa,
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋanoreʋa
Ko ini handiʋeŋgi aʋo ʋanokuʋeŋgai here, Jehova?
Handineshuŋgu here naʋanokumukirai?
Ndinoʋaʋeŋga nembeŋgo huru;
Ʋaʋa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu.
Ndinɀerei, Mŋari, muziʋe mŋoyo waŋgu;
Ndiidzei, muziʋe ndaŋgariro dzaŋgu;
Mutarire kana panenzira yakaipa mandiri,
Mundifambise munzira isiŋgaperi.
Ndirwirei Jehova, pamunhu wakaipa;
Ndiceŋgetei pamunhu unehasha;
Iʋo, ʋanofuŋga ɀakaipa mumŋoyo yaʋo;
Ʋanogara ʋacimutsa kurwa.
Ʋakarodza rurimi rwaʋo senyoka;
Ʋuturu bgeciʋa ʋuri pasi pemiromo yaʋo.
Ndiceŋgetei, Jehova, pamaʋoko owakaipa;
Ndiceŋgetei pamunhu unomanikidza;
Ʋanofuŋga mano okugumbusa tsoka dzaŋgu.
Ʋanoɀikudza ʋakandiʋanzira musuŋgo namaɓote;
Ʋakadzika mumbure parutiʋi rwenzira:
Ʋakanditeyera rugombe.
Ndakati kunaJehova: Ndimi Mŋari waŋgu;
Tererai, Jehova, munzwe inzwi rokukumbira kwaŋgu.
Mŋari Ishe,
Makafukidza musoro waŋgu pazuʋa rokurwa.
Jehova, regai kupa wakaipa ɀaanotȿaka;
Musapfuʋudza zano rake rakaipa; kuti ʋarege kuɀikudza.
Kana uri musoro waʋanondikomba,
Ɀakashata ɀemiromo yaʋo imene ŋgaɀiʋafukidze.
Mazimbe omŋoto, anopfuta, ŋgaawire pamsoro paʋo;
Ŋgaʋakandirwe mumŋoto;
Nomumakomba akadzika, kuti ʋarege kumuka ɀe.
Munhu, unamakuhwa, haaŋgasimbiswi pasi;
Ɀakaipa ɀicavima munhu unomanikidza kuti ɀimuparadze.
Ndinoziʋa kuti Jehova ucagadzira mhoȿa yaʋanotambudzika,
Nokururamisira ʋashaiwi.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakarurama ʋacaʋoŋga zita renyu;
Ʋanemŋoyo yakarurama ʋacagara pamberi penyu.
Jehova, ndakaɗana kwamuri; kurumidzai kuʋuya kwandiri;
Tererai inzwi raŋgu kana ndiciɗana kwamuri.
Munyeŋgetero waŋgu ŋgauʋe pamberi penyu seɀinonhuwira;
Nokusimudzwa kwamaʋoko aŋgu secipiriso camaɗekwana.
Jehova, isai murindi pamberi pomuromo waŋgu;
Ceŋgetai mukoʋa wemiromo yaŋgu.
Regai kurerekesa mŋoyo waŋgu kucinhu cakaipa,
Kuti ndiite ɀakaipa
Pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋanoita ɀisina‐kururama.
Wakarurama ŋgaandiroʋe netsitsi;
Ŋgaandituke, aʋe mafuta pamusoro
Musoro waŋgu hauŋgaarambi;
Nokuti ndicaramba ndicinyeŋgetera pamsoro pokuipa kwaʋo.
Ʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakawisirwa kumawere eɗombo;
Ʋacanzwa kuti mashoko aŋgu akanaka.
Seɀakaita pasi kana parimŋa nokuparurwa,
Saiɀoɀo mafupa eɗu akaparadzirwa pamuromo weSheori.
Nokuti meso aŋgu anotarira kwamuri, Jehova Ishe;
Ndinoʋimba nemi; regai kuɗurura ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Ndiceŋgetei pamusuŋgo waʋakanditeyera,
Naparugombe rwaʋanoita ɀisina‐kururama.
Ʋakaipa ŋgaʋaɓatwe nemimbure yaʋo ʋamene,
Asi ini ndiɗarike haŋgu.
Ndinoɗanidzira nenzwi raŋgu kunaJehova;
Nenzwi raŋgu ndinonyeŋgetera kunaJehova.
Ndinoɗurura kucema kwaŋgu pamberi pake;
Ndinomuziʋisa kutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Paŋguʋa yokumanikidzwa kwomŋeya waŋgu mukati maŋgu, makaziʋa nzira yaŋgu.
Panzira yandinofamba nayo ʋakandiʋanzira musuŋgo.
Tarirai kurudyi rwaŋgu, muʋone; nokuti hakunomunhu unondiziʋa;
Ndashaiwa ʋutiziro; hakunomunhu unehanya nomŋeya waŋgu.
Ndakaɗanidzira kwamuri, Jehova;
Ndakati: Ndimi ʋutiziro bgaŋgu,
Nomugoʋe waŋgu panyika yaʋapenyu.
Tererai kuɗanidzira kwaŋgu; nokuti ndinoshaiwa simba kwaɀo;
Ndirwirei panaʋanonditambudza; nokuti ʋanondikurira nesimba.
Ƃuɗisai mŋeya waŋgu patoroŋgo, kuti ndiʋoŋge zita renyu;
Ʋakarurama ʋacandipoteredza;
Nokuti mucandiitira ɀakanaka kwaɀo.
Inzwai munyeŋgetero waŋgu, Jehova; tererai kukumbira kwaŋgu;
Ndipindurei nokutendeka kwenyu nokururama kwenyu.
Regai kutoŋga muranda wenyu;
Nokuti hapanomunhu mumŋe mupenyu uŋgaruramiswa pamberi penyu.
Nokuti muʋeŋgi wakatambudza mŋeya waŋgu;
Wakatsikirira ʋupenyu bgaŋgu pasi;
Wakandigarisa panɀimbo dzinerima, saʋanhu ʋakaŋguʋa ʋafa.
Saka mŋeya waŋgu waziya mukati maŋgu;
Mŋoyo waŋgu wavunduswa mukati maŋgu.
Ndinoraŋgarira mazuʋa akare;
Ndinofuŋgisisa ɀose ɀamakaita;
Ndinofuŋga ɓasa ramaʋoko enyu.
Ndinotambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu kwamuri;
Mŋeya waŋgu
Kurumidzai kundipindura, Jehova; mŋeya waŋgu waziya;
Regai kundiʋanzira ciso cenyu;
Ndigosaʋa saʋanoɓurukira kugomba.
Ndinzwisei ʋunyoro bgenyu maŋgwanani;
Nokuti ndinoʋimba nemi;
Ndiziʋisei nzira yandinofanira kufamba nayo;
Nokuti ndinosimudzira mŋeya waŋgu kwamuri.
Ndirwirei Jehova, panaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
Ndinoʋanda nemi.
Ndidzidzisei kuita kuɗa kwenyu; nokuti ndimi Mŋari waŋgu;
Mŋeya wenyu, wakanaka ŋgaundifambise munyika yakati cecetere.
Ndiponesei Jehova, nokuɗa kwezita renyu;
Ƃuɗisai mŋeya waŋgu pakumanikidzwa nokururama kwenyu.
Pedzai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu noʋunyoro bgenyu,
Muparadze ʋose ʋanomanikidza mŋeya waŋgu;
Nokuti ndiri muranda wenyu.
Ŋgaarumbidzwe Jehova, ɗombo raŋgu,
Unodzidzisa maʋoko aŋgu kurwa,
Neminwe yaŋgu kufura;
Ʋunyoro bgaŋgu, nenhare yaŋgu,
Shoŋgwe yaŋgu yakakwirira, nomurwiri waŋgu;
Nhoʋo yaŋgu, ʋuye iye wandinoʋimba naye;
Unoisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu pasi paŋgu.
Jehova, munhu cinyiko, ɀamunehanya naye?
Kana mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀamunomuraŋgarira?
Munhu wakafanana nomŋeya;
Mazuʋa ake aneŋge mumvuri unopfuʋura.
Kotamisai kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga kwenyu Jehova, muɓuruke;
Gunɀai makomo, apfuŋgaire ʋutsi.
Penyesai mheni, muʋaparadze;
Furai miseʋe yenyu, muʋavunduse.
Tambunudzai ruʋoko rwenyu muri kumsoro;
Ndisunuŋgurei, mundirwire pamvura zhinji,
Naparuʋoko rwaʋatorwa;
Aʋo ʋanotaura ɀisinamaturo nomuromo waʋo,
Ʋuye ruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi ndirwo ruʋoko rworudyi rwenhema.
Mŋari ndicakuimbirai rwiyo rutȿa;
Ndicakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza nomuteŋgeranwa unehuŋgiso dzinegumi.
Ndimi munopa madzimambo kuponeswa,
Munorwira Davidi muranda wenyu pamunondo unokuʋadza.
Ndisunuŋgurei, mundirwire paruʋoko rwaʋatorwa,
Ʋanotaura ɀisinamaturo nomuromo waʋo,
Ʋuye ruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi ndirwo ruʋoko rworudyi rwenhema.
Ʋanakomana ʋeɗu ʋacaʋa semiti yakakura kwaɀo paʋutȿa bgayo;
Ʋuye ʋanasikana ʋeɗu samabge ekona akaʋezwa seɀinoʋezerwa imba yamambo;
Matura eɗu acazara neɀiyo ɀamarudzi ose;
Namakwai eɗu acaɓereka ɀuru negumi reɀuru kumafuro eɗu.
Nzombe dzeɗu dzicatakudzwa ɀizhinji;
Hatiŋgaputsirwi
Hakuŋgaʋi nemhere inoridzwa panzira dzomumusha meɗu;
Ʋanomufaro ʋanhu aʋo, ʋanoitirwa saiɀoɀo;
Ʋanomufaro ʋanhu aʋo, Mŋari waʋo ari Jehova.
Ndicakukudzai kwaɀo,
Mŋari waŋgu, imi Mambo;
Ndicarumbidza zita renyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ndicakurumbidzai zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe;
Ndicakudza zita renyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Jehova mukuru, unofanira kurumbidzwa kwaɀo;
Ʋukuru bgake haʋuŋganɀerwi.
Rudzi rumŋe rucarumbidza maɓasa enyu kunorumŋe,
Ʋacaɗudzira ɀamakaita ɀinesimba.
Ndicafuŋgisisa kubginya kwoʋumambo bgenyu ʋunokudzwa,
Namaɓasa enyu anoshamisa.
Ʋanhu ʋacataura ʋacireʋa simba ramaɓasa enyu anotyisa;
Neni ndicaɗudzira ʋukuru bgenyu.
Ʋacareʋa ʋaciyeʋudzira kunaka kwenyu kukuru,
Nokuimbira kururama kwenyu.
Jehova unenyasha, uzere netsitsi,
Haacimbidziki kutsamŋa, uneŋgoni zhinji.
Jehova unomŋoyo wakanaka kunaʋose;
Ŋgoni dzake dziri pamaɓasa ake ose.
Maɓasa enyu ose acakuʋoŋgai Jehova;
Naʋatȿene ʋenyu ʋacakurumbidzai.
Ʋacataura ʋacireʋa kubginya kwoʋushe bgenyu,
Nokuparidza simba renyu;
Kuti ʋaziʋise ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu maɓasa ake anesimba,
Nokubginya kwoʋumambo bgoʋushe bgake.
Ʋushe bgenyu ndibgo ʋushe ʋusiŋgaperi,
Noʋumambo bgenyu ʋucagara nokusiŋgaperi.
Jehova unotsigira ʋose ʋanowa,
Unosimudza ʋose ʋakakotamiswa pasi.
Meso aʋose anotarira kwamuri;
Munoʋapa ɀokudya ɀaʋo paŋguʋa yakafanira.
Munotadzanura ruʋoko rwenyu,
Ndokugutisa ɀipenyu ɀose.
Jehova wakarurama panzira dzake dzose,
Unenyasha paɀose ɀaanoita.
Jehova uri pedyo naʋose ʋanoɗana kwaari,
Ʋose ʋanoɗana kwaari neɀokwaɗi.
Ucaitira ʋanomutya seɀaʋanoɗa;
Ucanzwa ʋo kuɗanidzira kwaʋo, ndokuʋaponesa.
Jehova unoceŋgeta ʋose ʋanomuɗa;
Asi ʋakaipa ucaʋaparadza ʋose.
Muromo waŋgu ucataura kurumbidzwa kwaJehova;
Ʋanhu ʋose ŋgaʋarumbidze zita rake dɀene nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Hareruya!
Rumbidza Jehova, Iwe mŋeya waŋgu!
Ndicarumbidza Jehova ndiciri mupenyu;
Ndicaimbira Mŋari waŋgu nziyo dzokurumbidza, ini ndiciri’po.
Regai kuʋimba namacinda,
Kana nomŋanakomana womunhu, usiŋgagoni kuɓatsira.
Mŋeya wake unoɓuɗa, iye ndokudzokera pasi pake;
Nezuʋa iro mano ake anopera.
Unomufaro munhu uyo kana Mŋari waJakobo ari muɓatsiri wake,
Unotarira kunaJehova Mŋari wake.
Iye, wakaita kuɗeŋga napasi,
Neguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo;
Iye, unoramba akatendeka nokusiŋgaperi;
Unoruramisira ʋanomanikidzwa;
Unopa ʋanenzara ɀokudya;
Jehova unosunuŋgura ʋasuŋgwa;
Jehova unosinudza
Jehova unosimudza ʋakakotamiswa pasi;
Jehova unoɗa ʋakarurama;
Jehova unoceŋgeta ʋatorwa;
Jehova unotsigira nherera necirikadzi;
Asi nzira yaʋakaipa unoipesanisa.
Jehova ucaɓata ʋushe nokusiŋgaperi,
Mŋari wako, iwe Zioni, kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Nokuti ɀakanaka kuti Mŋari weɗu aimbirwe nziyo dzokurumbidza;
Ɀinofadza, ʋuye kurumbidza kwakafanira.
Jehova unoʋaka Jerusarema;
Unoʋuŋganidza ʋakadziŋgwa ʋaIsraeri.
Unoporesa ʋanemŋoyo yakaputsika,
Unosuŋga maʋaŋga aʋo.
Unotara kuwanda kwenyeredzi;
Unodzipa dzose mazita adzo.
Ishe weɗu mukuru, unesimba guru;
Njere dzake hadziperi.
Jehova unoɓatsira ʋanyoro;
Ʋakaipa unoʋawisira pasi.
Imbirai Jehova mucimuʋoŋga,
Imbirai Mŋari weɗu nziyo dzokurumbidza nembira;
Iye unofukidza ɗeŋga namakore,
Unogadzirira pasi mvura,
Unomeresa ʋuswa pamakomo.
Unopa ɀipfuwo ɀokudya ɀaɀo,
Naʋana ʋamakuŋguʋo, ʋanocema.
Haafadzwi nesimba rebiza;
Haafariri makumbo omurume.
Jehova unofara naʋanomutya,
Naʋanotarira ŋgoni dzake.
Rumbidza Jehova, iwe Jerusarema;
Rumbidza Mŋari wako, iwe Zioni.
Nokuti wakasimbisa mazarira amasuʋo ako;
Wakaropafadza ʋana ʋako mukati mako.
Unoisa rugare panyika yako;
Unokugutisa neɀiyo ɀakaiȿo‐naka.
Unotuma mirairo yake panyika;
Shoko rake rinomhanya kwaɀo.
Unopa
Unoparadzira cando samaɗota.
Unokanda cimvuramabge cake seɀimeɗu;
Ndianiko uŋgamira pacando cake?
Unotuma shoko rake, ndokuɀinyausa;
Unovuvutisa mhepo yake, mvura ndokuyerera.
Unoziʋisa Jakobo shoko rake,
NaIsraeri mitemo yake neɀaakatoŋga.
Haana‐kutoŋgoitira rumŋe rudzi saiɀoɀo;
Kana ɀiri ɀaakatoŋga, haʋanakuɀiziʋa.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehova,
Murumbidzei panɀimbo dzokumsoro.
Murumbidzei imi ʋatumŋa ʋake ʋose;
Murumbidzei imi hondo dzake dzose.
Murumbidzei imi zuʋa nomŋedzi;
Murumbidzei imi nyeredzi dzose dzinovenekera.
Murumbidzei imi kuɗeŋga kwokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga,
Newe mvura zhinji, iri kumsoro kwokuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga.
Ŋgaɀirumbidze zita raJehova;
Nokuti iye wakaraira, ɀikasikwa.
Wakaɀisimbisa ʋo nokusiŋgaperi‐peri;
Wakatema cireʋo cisiŋgafaniri kuɗarikwa.
Rumbidzai Jehova imi ʋapasi,
Imi ɀikara ɀeguŋgwa, neɀiri makadzika;
Mŋoto necimvuramabge, cando noʋutsi;
Ƌutu guru, rinoita ɀaakareʋa;
Makomo neɀikomo ɀose;
Miti inoɓereka, nemisidari yose;
Mhuka, neɀipfuwo ɀose;
Ɀinokambaira neshiri dzinobururuka;
Madzimambo apasi nendudzi dzose dzaʋanhu;
Macinda naʋatoŋgi ʋose ʋapasi;
Majaya nemhandara;
Ʋatana naʋana;
Ŋgaʋarumbidze zita raJehova;
Nokuti zita rake roga rakakurumbira;
Ʋumambo bgake ʋuri kumsoro kwapasi nokuɗeŋga.
Wakasimudza runyaŋga rwaʋanhu ʋake,
Kuti arumbidzwe naʋatȿene ʋake ʋose;
Naiʋo ʋana ʋaIsraeri, iʋo ʋanhu ʋari pedyo naye.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Imbirai Jehova rwiyo rutȿa,
Nokurumbidzwa kwake paʋuŋgano yaʋatȿene.
Israeri ŋgaafarire kwaɀo musiki wake;
Ʋana ʋeZioni ŋgaʋaʋe nomufaro naMambo waʋo.
Ŋgaʋarumbidze zita rake ʋaci
Ŋgaʋamuimbire nziyo dzokurumbidza neŋgoma nembira.
Nokuti Jehova unofarira ʋanhu ʋake;
Ucashoŋgedza ʋanyoro noruponeso;
Ʋatȿene ŋgaʋafare kwaɀo nokukudziwa;
Ŋgaʋaimbe nomufaro panhoʋo dzaʋo.
Kurumbidza kukuru kwaMŋari ŋgakuʋe pahuro dzaʋo,
Nomunondo unoceka kwose paruʋoko rwaʋo;
Kuti ʋatsiʋe ʋahedeni;
Ʋaraŋge ndudzi dzaʋanhu;
Kuti ʋasuŋge madzimambo aʋo neketani,
Naʋakuru ʋaʋo neɀisuŋgo ɀamatare.
Kuti ʋaʋaitire ɀaʋakatoŋgerwa ɀakanyorwa;
Ʋatȿene ʋake ʋose ʋacakudzwa naiɀoɀi.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehova panɀimbo yake tȿene;
Murumbidzei muɗeŋga
Murumbidzei nokuɗa kweɀaakaita nesimba rake;
Murumbidzei ɀakafanira ʋukurukuru bgake.
Murumbidzei nenzwi rehwamanda;
Murumbidzei nemiteŋgeranwa nembira.
Murumbidzei neŋgoma nokutamba;
Murumbidzei noʋuɗimbga nenyere.
Murumbidzei namakandira anorira kwaɀo;
Murumbidzei namakandira anorira ɀakanaka.
Ɀinhu ɀose ɀinofema, ŋgaɀirumbidze Jehova.
Hareruya!
Ɀireʋo ɀaSoromoni, mŋanakomana waDavidi, mambo waIsraeri:
Kuti
Nokunzwisisa mashoko enjere;
Ʋarairirwe nzira yokuŋgwara,
Neyokururama, nokururamisa, nokutendeka;
Ʋasinamano ʋapiwe kuŋgwara,
Jaya
Kuti wakacenjera anzwe, awedzere kudzidza;
Nomunhu wenjere awane mano akanaka.
Ʋanzwisise cireʋo nomufananidzo,
Mashoko aʋakacenjera neɀirabge ɀaʋo.
Kutya Jehova ndiko kuʋamba kweziʋo;
Mapenzi anoshoʋora ʋucenjeri nokurairirwa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, inzwa kurairira kwaɓaɓa ʋako;
Usarasha kudzidzisa kwamai ʋako.
Nokuti ɀicaʋa cishoŋgo cakanaka pamusoro wako,
Noʋuketani pamutsipa wako.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, kana ʋatadzi ʋacikugombedzera,
Usatenda iwe.
Kana ʋaciti: Hendei tose,
Ŋgatirindire ropa;
Ŋgatiʋandire ʋasinemhoȿa
Ŋgatiʋamedze ʋari ʋapenyu seSheori,
Ʋari ʋakukutu saiʋo ʋanoɓurukira kugomba.
Ticawana fuma yamarudzi mazhinji;
Ticazadza dzimba dzeɗu neɀatakapamba;
Iwe ucaʋa mumŋe weɗu;
Tose ticaʋa necikwama cimŋe cete;
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, usafamba naʋo nenzira yaʋo;
Dzora rutsoka rwako panzira yaʋo;
Nokuti tsoka dzaʋo dzinoʋaŋgira ɀakaipa;
Ʋanokurumidza kuɗurura ropa.
Nokuti mumbure unodzikirwa pasina
Shiri dzamarudzi ose dziciɀiʋona.
Ʋanoɀiʋandira ʋupenyu bgaʋo.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋo nzira dzaʋose ʋanokarira fuma;
Ɀinotorera mŋene waɀo ʋupenyu bgake.
Ʋucenjeri ʋunoɗanidzira panzira dzomumusha;
Ʋunonzwisa inzwi rabgo panɀimbo dzakafara;
Ʋunoɗana panɀimbo panoʋuŋgana ʋazhinji;
Paʋanopinda pamasuʋo,
Paguta, ndi’po paʋunotaura mashoko abgo,
Nhai imi ʋasinamano, mucaɗa kusaʋa‐namano kuȿikira riniko?
Ne
Namapenzi kuʋeŋga ziʋo?
Dzokai
Tarirai ndicaɗurura mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro penyu;
Ndicakuziʋisai mashoko aŋgu.
Ɀandakaɗana, imi mukaramba;
Ndikatambanudza ruʋoko rwaŋgu, kukasaʋa nomunhu wakaraŋgarira;
Asi makaɀidza mano aŋgu ose,
Mukaramba cose kuraira kwaŋgu,
Naiɀoɀo neni ʋo ndicaseka
Ndicakuɗaɗirai, kana kutya kwenyu kuciȿika.
Kana kutya kwenyu kuciȿika seɗutu guru,
Nenhamo yenyu iciȿika secampupuri;
Kana kutambudzika nokuɗumbirwa ɀicikuwirai.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋacaɗana kwandiri, asi handiŋgapinduri;
Ʋacanditȿaka ɀikuru, asi haʋaŋgandiwani.
Ɀaʋakaʋeŋga ziʋo,
Ʋakasaɀitsaurira kutya Jehova,
Ʋakaramba mano aŋgu ose,
Ʋakashoʋora kuraira kwaŋgu kwose,
Naiɀoɀo ʋacadya ɀiɓereko ɀenzira yaʋo;
Ʋacagutswa namano aʋo.
Nokuti kudzokera shure kwaʋasinamano kucaʋaʋuraya,
Kusaʋa nehanya kwamapenzi kucaaparadza.
Asi aninani unonditerera ucagara ɀakasimba,
Ucagadzikana, asiŋgatyi ɀakaipa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, kana ukagamucira mashoko aŋgu,
Nokuceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu kwauri;
Kuti urerekere nzeʋe yako iterere ʋucenjeri,
Nokurwadza mŋoyo wako, kuti unzwisise;
Kana ukacemera kunzwisisa,
Ukaɗanidzira nenzwi rako kuti
Ɀirokwaɀo kana ukaʋutȿaka sesirveri,
Ukaʋutȿakisisa sefuma yakaʋanzwa;
Ipapo ucanzwisisa kutya Jehova,
Nokuwana ziʋo yaMŋari.
Nokuti Jehova ndiye unopa ʋucenjeri;
Mumuromo make
Unoʋigira ʋakarurama ʋucenjeri caibgo;
Nokuti unorinda makwara okururamisa,
Nokuceŋgeta nzira yaʋatȿene ʋake.
Ipapo ucanzwisisa kururama nokururamisa,
Nokutendeka, idzo nzira dzose dzakanaka.
Nokuti ʋucenjeri ʋucapinda mumŋoyo mako,
Ziʋo icafadza mŋeya wako;
Kuŋgwara kucakurindira,
Njere dzicakuceŋgeta;
Ɀikurwire panzira yeɀakaipa,
Napaʋanhu ʋanotaura ɀisakarurama;
Ʋanorasha makwara okururama,
Kuti ʋafambe nenzira dzerima;
Ʋanofarira kuita ɀakaipa,
Ʋanofadzwa nokunyeŋgera kweɀakaipa.
Ʋanenzira dzakaminama,
Ʋanotsauka pamakwara aʋo;
Kuti ɀikurwire kumukadzi wokumŋe,
Iye, unorasha shamŋari yoʋumhandara bgake,
Acikaŋganwa suŋgano yaMŋari wake.
Nokuti imba yake inonyura kurufu,
Nenzira dzake kuʋakafa;
Hakuna‐unopinda kwaari unozodzoka ɀe;
Haʋaȿiki panzira dzoʋupenyu;
Kuti ufambe nenzira yaʋakanaka,
Uceŋgete makwara aʋakarurama.
Nokuti ʋakarurama ʋacagara panyika,
Ʋakakwana ʋacarambira’po.
Asi ʋakaipa ʋacaparadzwa panyika;
Ʋanoita nokunyeŋgedzera ʋacadzurwa’po.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, usakaŋganwa kudzidzisa kwaŋgu;
Asi mŋoyo wako ŋgauceŋgete mirairo yaŋgu;
Nokuti ɀicakuwedzera mazuʋa mazhinji,
Namakore oʋupenyu, norugare.
Ruɗo neɀokwaɗi ŋgaɀirege kukusiya;
Uɀisuŋgire pamutsipa wako;
Uɀinyore pahwendefa romŋoyo wako;
Nokuɗaro ucawana nyasha nenjere dzakanaka
Pamberi paMŋari naʋanhu.
Ʋimba naJehova nomŋoyo wako wose,
Urege kusendama panjere dzako.
Umutende panzira dzako dzose,
Agoruramisa makwara ako ose.
Usaɀiti wakacenjera;
Itya Jehova, ubve paneɀakaipa;
Ɀicaʋa mushoŋga womuʋiri wako,
Nomŋoŋgo wamafupa ako.
Kudza Jehova neɀaunaɀo,
Ʋuye neɀitȿa ɀaɀose ɀawakawana;
Ipapo matura ako acazadzwa neɀakawanda,
Makate ako acapfacuka newaini itȿa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, usaɀidza kuraŋga kwaJehova;
Usaneta nokuraira kwake.
Nokuti Jehova unoraira muɗikanwa wake;
Seɀinoita ɓaɓa mŋanakomana waʋo waʋanofarira.
Munhu, wawana ʋucenjeri, unomufaro,
Naiye munhu, unowana njere.
Nokuti kuʋuwana ibgo kunopfuʋura kuwana sirveri;
Nokuʋufuma ibgo kunopfuʋura
Ʋunokosha kupfuʋura korari;
Hakunefuma yako iŋgaenzaniswa nabgo.
Mazuʋa mazhinji
Muruʋoko rwabgo rworuɓoshwe munefuma nokukudzwa.
Nzira dzabgo inzira dzeɀinofadza;
Makwara abgo ose ndoorugare.
Ndiwo muti woʋupenyu kunaʋanoʋunamatira;
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoʋuɓata unomufaro.
Jehova wakateya pasi noʋucenjeri;
Wakasimbisa kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga nenjere.
Mvura iri makadzika yakadzutuka neziʋo yake;
Ƌeŋga rose rakaɗonha ɗoʋa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, ŋgaɀirege kubva pameso ako;
Ceŋgeta ʋucenjeri caibgo nokuŋgwara.
Ipapo ɀicaʋa ʋupenyu bgomŋeya wako;
Noʋukomba pamutsipa wako.
Ipapo ucafamba nenzira yako wakasimba;
Rutsoka rwako haruŋgagumburwi.
Kana uciʋata pasi hauŋgatyi;
Ʋuye kana waʋata pasi hope dzako dzicaʋa dzakanaka.
Usatya hako civunduso cinokuwira kamŋe‐kamŋe,
Kunyaŋge kuparadzwa kwaʋakaipa, kana kuciȿika;
Nokuti Jehova ucaʋa ciʋimbo cako;
Ucaceŋgeta rutsoka rwako, kuti rurege kuɓatwa.
Munhu, wakafanirwa, usaramba kumuitira ɀakanaka
Kana ruʋoko rwako ruciŋge runesimba kuɀiita.
Usati kunowokwako: Enda, ugodzoka ɀe,
Maŋgwana ndicakupa;
Kana uciŋge unaɀo’po.
Usafuŋga kuitira wokwako ɀakaipa,
Ɀaanogara hake newe acikutenda.
Usarwa nomunhu pasinemhoȿa,
Kana asina‐kukuitira ɀakaipa.
Usagoɗora munhu unomanikidza;
Usateʋera kunyaŋge nomumŋe wemitoʋo yake.
Nokuti mutsauki inyaŋgadzi kunaJehova;
Asi unoʋukama naʋakarurama.
Kutuka kwaJehova kuri mumba mowakaipa;
Asi unoropafadza ʋugaro bgaʋakarurama.
Kana ʋari ʋaɗaɗi, unoʋaɗaɗira,
Asi ʋanoɀininipisa unoʋaitira nyasha.
Ʋakacenjera ʋacagara nhaka yokukudzwa;
Asi mapenzi anoɀiwanira kunyadziswa.
Imi ʋanakomana, inzwai kurairira kwaɓaɓa
Tererai, muziʋe njere.
Nokuti ndinokupai dzidziso yakanaka;
Regai kurasha murairo waŋgu.
Nokuti ini ndakaŋga ndiri mŋanakomana kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu,
Iʋo
Mŋoyo wako ŋgaunatso‐ɓata mashoko aŋgu;
Ceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu, urarame.
Ɀiwanire ʋucenjeri, ɀiwanire njere;
Rega kukaŋganwa kana kutsauka pamashoko omuromo waŋgu;
Usaʋurasha, ʋugokuceŋgeta;
Uʋuɗe, ʋugokurinda.
Ʋucenjeri cinhu cikuru kuneɀose;
Uɀiwanire njere neɀose ɀaunaɀo.
Uʋukudze, ʋugokukwiridza iwe;
Ʋucakuʋigira kukudzwa, kana uciʋumbundikira.
Ʋucapa musoro wako cishoŋgo cakanaka;
Ʋucakuisira korona inobginya.
Cinzwa iwe mŋanakomana waŋgu, ugamucire ɀandinoreʋa;
Makore oʋupenyu bgako agoʋa mazhinji.
Ndakakudzidzisa panzira yoʋucenjeri;
Ndakakufambisa pamakwara akarurama.
Kana ucifamba, tsoka dzako hadziŋgapiŋganidzwi;
Kana ucimhanya, hauŋgagumburwi.
Natsa kuɓata kurairirwa; usakuregedza;
Ukuceŋgete, nokuti ndibgo ʋupenyu bgako.
Usapinda pagwara raʋakaipa,
Usafamba nenzira yaʋakashata.
Uinɀeŋge, usapinda pairi;
Tsauka pairi, upfuʋure hako.
Nokuti haʋaʋati, kana ʋasiŋgaiti ɀakashata;
Ʋanotorerwa hope dzaʋo, kana ʋasiŋgagumbusi
Nokuti ʋanodya ɀokudya ɀeɀakaipa,
Nokunwa waini yokumanikidza.
Asi gwara raʋakarurama rakaita seciedza camambakwedza,
Cinoramba ciciwedzera kubginya kuȿikira pamasikati makuru.
Nzira yaʋakaipa yakaita serima;
Haʋaziʋi ciŋgaʋagumbusa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, terera mashoko aŋgu;
Rerekera nzeʋe yako kuneɀandinoreʋa.
Urambe uciatarira,
Uaceŋgete mukati momŋoyo mako.
Nokuti ndibgo ʋupenyu kunaʋanoawana,
Noʋukukutu bgenyama yaʋo yose.
Ceŋgeta mŋoyo wako kupfuʋura ɀose ɀinofanira kurindwa;
Nokuti mukati mawo ndi’mo muneɀituɓu ɀoʋupenyu.
Bvisa kwauri nhema dzomuromo;
Kutsauka kwemiromo ŋgakuʋe kure newe.
Meso ako ŋgaarurame pakutarira;
Mafuŋgiro ameso ako ŋgaatarire mberi kwako.
Gadzirira tsoka dzako gwara;
Nzira dzako dzose dziʋe dzakasimba.
Usatsaukira kurudyi kana kuruɓoshwe;
Rutsoka rwako urubvise paneɀakaipa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, terera ʋucenjeri bgaŋgu;
Rerekera nzeʋe yako
Kuti ugare wakaɓata kuŋgwara,
Nemiromo yako iceŋgete ziʋo.
Nokuti miromo yomukadzi wokumŋe inoɗonha ʋuci;
Muromo wake unotedza kupfuʋura mafuta;
Asi pakupedzisira unoʋaʋa segaʋakaʋa;
Unopinza somunondo unenhiʋi mbiri dzinoceka.
Tsoka dzake dzinoɓurukira kurufu;
Nhambge dzake dzinoʋaʋarira kubgiro;
Gwara roʋupenyu, rakati cecetere, haariwani;
Nzira dzake dzinotsauka, iye asiŋgaɀiziʋi.
Saka imi, ʋanakomana
Regai kutsauka pamashoko omuromo waŋgu.
Nzira yako ŋgaiʋe kure naye,
Usasweɗera pamukoʋa weimba yake.
Kuti urege kupa ʋamŋe kunaka kwoʋujaya bgako,
Namakore ako kunounomŋoyo mukukutu;
Kuti ʋatorwa ʋarege kugutswa nefuma yako,
Neɀiɓereko ɀokutambura kwako
Iwe ugocema pakupedzisira kwako,
Kana nyama yako nomuʋiri wako ɀaparadzwa,
Uciti: Ndakaʋeŋgereiko kurairirwa,
Mŋoyo waŋgu wakashoʋorerei kurairwa?
Ndakaregereiko kuterera inzwi raʋadzidzisi ʋaŋgu,
Nokusarerekera nzeʋe yaŋgu kunaʋaindiraira?
Ndakaŋga ndapinda paneɀakaipa ɀose,
Pakati peciʋuŋga neʋuŋgano.
Inwa mvura padziʋa rako cairo,
Nemvura inoyerera patsime rako cairo.
Ko matsime ako anofanira kuparadzirwa here,
Nzizi dzemvura
Ŋgaɀiʋe ɀako ɀoga,
Ɀisaʋa ɀaʋatorwa pamŋe cete newe.
Tsime rako ŋgariropafadzwe;
Ufarire mukadzi woʋujaya bgako.
Mazamu ake ŋgaakufadze ŋguʋa dzose;
Ugare ucigutiswa noruɗo rwake.
Nokuti iwe, mŋanakomana waŋgu, ucagutsirweiko nomukadzi wokumŋe,
Ucambundikireiko cifuʋa comŋeni?
Nokuti nzira dzomunhu dziri pamberi paJehova;
Ndiye unoyera makwara ake ose.
Ɀiʋi ɀake ɀicaɓata muiti waɀo,
Ucaɓatwa namaɓote eɀiʋi ɀake.
Ucafa nokushaiwa kurairirwa;
Ucatsauka noʋukuru bgoʋupenzi bgake.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, kana uciŋge wakaɀiitira wokwako ruɓatso,
Waɀisuŋga nokuɗa kwomutorwa noruʋoko rwako,
Waɀiteya namashoko omuromo wako,
Waɓatwa namashoko omuromo wako,
Ɀino ita kuɗai, mŋanakomana waŋgu, uɀirwire,
Ɀawaɓatwa noruʋoko rwowokwako:
Enda, undoɀininipisa, ukumbire ɀikuru kunowokwako.
Usatendera meso ako hope,
Kana mafuŋgiro ameso ako kutsimŋaira;
Uɀirwire semhara paruʋoko
Seshiri paruʋoko rwomuteyi.
Enda kumujuru, iwe simbe;
Cerekedza nzira dzawo, ugoʋa wakacenjera!
Kunyaŋge iwo usinomutoŋgi,
Kana mutariri kana muɓati,
Unogadzira ɀokudya ɀawo muzhezha,
Nokuʋuŋganidza ɀokudya ɀawo mukukohwa.
Iwe simbe, ucaʋata pasi kuȿikira riniko?
Ucamuka riniko pahope dzako?
Kumboʋata ɀishomanene, kumbotsimŋaira ɀishomanene,
Kumbofuŋgatira maʋoko ɀishomanene, ndizorore;
Saiɀoɀo ʋurombo bgako ʋucaȿika segororo,
Nokushaiwa kwako somunhu wakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa.
Munhu usinamaturo, munhu unoita ɀakaipa,
Ndiye unofamba nomuromo unenhema;
Unobgaira nameso ake, unotendekera netsoka dzake,
Unoɗudzira neminwe yake;
Uneɀisakarurama pamŋoyo pake,
Unosifuŋgira ʋamŋe ɀakaipa,
Unokusha kupesana.
Saka njodzi yake icamuwira kamŋe‐kamŋe;
Ucavuniwa pakarepo, kusina‐ciŋgamuɓatsira.
Ɀinhu ɀitanhatu ɀiri’ko ɀinoʋeŋgwa naJehova;
Ɀirokwaɀo, tiŋgati kuneɀinomŋe, ɀinomunyaŋgadza,
Meso ounoɀikudza, rurimi runoreʋa nhema,
Maʋoko anoɗurura ropa risinemhaka;
Mŋoyo unofuŋga mano akaipa,
Tsoka dzinokurumidza kuʋaŋgira ɀakashata;
Capupu cinonyeŋgera cinoreʋa nhema,
Ʋuye unokusha kupesana pakati pehama.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, ceŋgeta murairo waɓaɓa ʋako;
Usarasha kudzidzisa kwamai ʋako.
Uɀisuŋgire ŋguʋa dzose pamŋoyo wako;
Uɀishoŋge pamutsipa wako.
Kana ucifamba, ɀicakutuŋgamirira;
Kana uciʋata pasi, ɀicakurinda;
Kana womuka, ɀicataurirana newe.
Nokuti murairo ndiwo mŋenje; murau ndico ciedza;
Kuraira kwokurairirwa inzira yoʋupenyu;
Kuti uceŋgetwe pamukadzi wakaipa,
Pakuɓata kumeso kworurimi rwomutorwa.
Usaciʋa kunaka kwake mumŋoyo mako;
Arege kukuɓata namafuŋgiro ameso ake.
Nokuti nokuɗa kwecifeʋe munhu uŋgaȿikira pa
Mukadzi wo
Ko munhu uŋgaisa mŋoto mucifuʋa cake,
Ŋguʋo dzake dzikasatȿa here?
Kana munhu uŋgatsika mazimbe anopisa,
Tsoka dzake dzikasapiswa here?
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unopinda kumukadzi wowokwake;
Aninani unomunyaŋgata
Ʋanhu haʋaŋgaɀidzi muɓi kana aciɓa
Kuti agute kana aciŋge anenzara.
Asi kana akaɓatwa unofanira kudzosera ɀaʋa ɀinomŋe;
Unofanira kuripa nefuma yose yeimba yake.
Unoita ʋupombge nomukadzi, unoshaiwa njere;
Unoɗa kuparadza ʋupenyu bgake ndiye unoita iɀoɀo.
Ucaŋgoɀiwanira maʋaŋga nokusakudzwa;
Kunyadziswa kwake hakuŋgatoŋgopisikwi.
Nokuti goɗo rinomutsa hasha dzomurume;
Haaŋganzwiri tsitsi pazuʋa rokutsiʋa.
Haaŋgaʋi nehanya nomuripo;
Haaŋgatendi, kunyaŋge ukamuʋigira ɀipo ɀizhinji.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, ceŋgeta mashoko aŋgu,
Ʋiga mirairo yaŋgu kwauri.
Ceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu, urarame;
Nomurau waŋgu semboni yeziso rako.
Uɀisuŋgire paminwe yako;
Uɀinyore pahwendefa romŋoyo wako.
Uti kuʋucenjeri: Ndiwe hanɀadzi yaŋgu;
Utumidze njere shamŋari
Kuti ɀikuceŋgete pamukadzi wokumŋe,
Pamutorwa unoɓata kumeso namashoko ake.
Nokuti ndakatarira pawindi yeimba yaŋgu,
Paʋutanda bgewindi yaŋgu;
Ndikatarira pakati paʋasinamano,
Ndikaʋona pakati pamajaya
Rimŋe jaya rakashaiwa njere;
Ricipfuʋura nenzira yomumusha pedyo nekona
Ricifamba nenzira kuimba yomukadzi;
Neŋguʋa yorubvunza‐ʋaeni, neŋguʋa yamaɗeko ezuʋa,
Pakati poʋusiku kwaȿiɓa.
Ɀino tarira, mukadzi akasoŋgana naye,
Wakaŋga akafuka secifeʋe, anokunyeŋgedzera pamŋoyo.
Unopupira, aciita seɀaanoɗa;
Tsoka dzake hadzigari mumba make;
Imŋe ŋguʋa uri munzira dzomumusha, imŋe ŋguʋa pamatare;
Unorindira pamakona ose.
Ɀino iye akamuɓata, akamuȿeta;
Akataura naye neciso cisino‐kunyara, akati kwaari:
Ndaifanira kuʋuya neɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa,
Nhasi ndaripa mhiko dzaŋgu.
Saka ndaɓuɗa kuzokuciŋgamidza,
Nditȿake ciso cako ɀikuru, ɀino ndakuwana.
Ndakawarira macira anoʋukomba pamubeda waŋgu,
Nemiceka inamaʋara inobva Egipita.
Ndakasasa ɀinonhuwira pamubeda waŋgu,
Mura, negaʋakaʋa, nekinamoni.
Ʋuya tigute nokuɗana kuȿikira maŋgwanani;
Ŋgatiɀifadze nokuɗana kukuru.
Nokuti murume haa’po pamusha;
Wakafamba rwendo rukuru;
Wakaenda nehomboɗo inemari;
Ucadzoka pajena guru.
Nokutaura kwake kuzhinji kwakanaka unomutsausa,
Unomugombedzera nokuɓata kumeso kwemiromo yake.
Unomuteʋera pakarepo,
Senzombe inoenda kwainondoɓayiwa,
Kana seɓenzi rakasuŋgwa rinoenda kundoraŋgwa;
Kuȿikira museʋe waɓaya ciropa cake;
Seshiri inokurumidzira kurugombe,
Asiŋgaziʋi kuti ɀinoʋiŋga ʋupenyu bgake.
Ɀino ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu, nditererei,
Inzwai mashoko omuromo waŋgu.
Mŋoyo wako ŋgaurege kutsaukira kunzira dzake;
Usafamba‐famba mumakwara ake.
Nokuti wakawisira pasi ʋazhinji ʋakakuʋadzwa;
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakaʋurawa naye ʋazhinji kwaɀo.
Imba yake inzira dzinoenda Sheori,
Dzinoɓurukira kudzimba dzorufu.
Ko ʋucenjeri haʋuɗanidziri here?
Nenjere hadziɓuɗisi manzwi adzo here?
Pamsoro pemitunhu panzira,
Pamharadzano dzenzira, ndi’po paʋumire;
Parutiʋi rwamasuʋo, panopindwa paguta,
Paʋanopinda pamikoʋa, ndi’po paʋunoɗanidzira;
Ndinoɗanidzira kwamuri, imi ʋarume,
Inzwi raŋgu rinoɗana ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.
Nzwisisai ʋucenjeri, imi ʋasinamano;
Imi mapenzi, iʋai nomŋoyo unenjere.
Inzwai, nokuti ndicataura ɀinhu ɀakaiȿo‐naka;
Nokuti miromo yaŋgu icashamira ɀinhu ɀakarurama.
Nokuti muromo waŋgu unoɓuɗisa ɀokwaɗi;
Cinhu cakaipa cinonyaŋgadza pamiromo yaŋgu.
Mashoko ose omuromo waŋgu akarurama;
Hakunecinhu cakakombama kana cisakarurama maari;
Ɀose ɀiri pacena kunounenjere;
Ɀakarurama kunaiʋo ʋakawana ziʋo.
Gamucirai kuraira kwaŋgu, murege
Neziʋo, kupfuʋura ndarama yakasarurwa.
Nokuti ʋucenjeri bgakanaka kupfuʋura korari;
Ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa haɀiŋgaenzaniswi nabgo.
Ini ʋucenjeri ndakaita kuŋgwara imba yaŋgu,
Ndinowana ziʋo namano akarurama.
Kutya Jehova ndiko kuʋeŋga ɀakaipa;
Kuɀikudza namanyawi nenzira yakaipa,
Nomuromo unonyeŋgedzera, ndinoɀiʋeŋga.
Ndinezano
Ndini kucenjera; ndinesimba.
Madzimambo anoɓata ʋushe neni,
Ʋaɓati ʋanotoŋga ʋanhu
Madzishe anofambisa ʋushe neni,
Naʋakuru,
Ndinoɗa ʋanondiɗa;
Ʋanonditȿaka nomŋoyo wose ʋacandiwana.
Fuma nokukudzwa ɀineni,
Ɀinokosha ɀakaiȿo‐naka nokururama.
Ɀiɓereko ɀaŋgu ɀakanaka kupfuʋura ndarama, kunyaŋge ndarama yakaiȿo‐naka;
Ɀandinowana ɀinopfuʋura sirveri yakasarurwa.
Ndinofamba nenzira yokururama,
Mukati mamakwara okururamisa;
Kuti ndigarise nhaka ʋanondiɗa,
Ndizadze ɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yaʋo.
Jehova wakandiʋumba pakuʋamba kwenzira yake,
Kutaŋgira maɓasa ake akare.
Ini ndakamiswa kubva pakusiŋgaperi, kubva pakutaŋga,
Pasi pasati pasikwa.
Makuŋgwa asati aʋa’po, ini ndakaɓerekwa;
Pasinamatsime anemvura zhinji.
Makomo asati anyudzwa,
Ɀikomo ɀisi’po, ini ndakaɓerekwa;
Iye asati aʋumba pasi namapani,
Kana guruʋa rokutaŋga renyika.
Paŋguʋa yaakagadzira kuɗeŋga‐ɗeŋga, ndakaŋga ndiri’po;
Pakuisa kwake ɗenderedzwa pamsoro pamakuŋgwa;
Paŋguʋa yaakasimbisa ɗeŋga rose kumsoro,
Pakusimba kwamatsime amakuŋgwa;
Paŋguʋa yaakaitira guŋgwa miganho yaro,
Kuti mvura irege kuɗarika murairo wake,
Pakutara kwake nheyo dzapasi;
Neŋguʋa iyo ndaiʋa naye, ndiri mhizha;
Ndai mufadza zuʋa rimŋene rimŋe,
Ndicitamba pamberi pake ŋguʋa dzose,
Ndicitamba panyika yake,
Ndicifadzwa naʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.
Saka ɀino ʋanakomana
Nokuti ʋanoceŋgeta nzira dzaŋgu ʋakaropafadzwa.
Inzwai kurairira muʋe ʋakacenjera,
Regai kukuramba.
Munhu, unondinzwa, wakaropafadzwa,
Unorinda zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe pamasuʋo aŋgu,
Unomira paɀiʋiʋo ɀemikoʋa yaŋgu.
Nokuti wandiwana, wawana ʋupenyu,
Ucapiwa nyasha naJehova.
Asi unondishaiwa, unotadzira mŋeya wake;
Ʋose ʋanondiʋeŋga, ʋanoɗa rufu.
Ʋucenjeri bgakaʋaka imba yabgo;
Bgakaʋeza mbiru dzabgo nomŋe;
Bgakaɓaya ɀipfuwo ɀabgo;
Bgakaveŋganisa waini yabgo;
Bgakagadzira ʋo tafura yabgo.
Bgakatuma ʋarandakadzi ʋabgo;
Ʋunoɗanidzira pamitunhu yeguta,
Usinamano ŋgaatsaukire muno;
Usinenjere ʋunoti kwaari:
Ʋuyai mudye ciŋgwa caŋgu,
Munwe waini yandakaveŋganisa.
Regai kusaȿinuka, murarame;
Mufambe nenzira yenjere.
Munhu, unoraira muɗaɗiri, unoɀitȿakira kunyadziswa;
Unotuka munhu wakaipa ucaȿiɓiswa.
Usaraira muɗaɗiri, kuti arege kukuʋeŋga;
Raira munhu wakacenjera, iye ucakuɗa.
Ipa wakacenjera
Dzidzisa wakarurama, ipapo iye ucawedzerwa ziʋo.
Kuʋamba kwoʋucenjeri ndiko kutya Jehova;
Kuziʋa Mutȿene ndidzo njere.
Nokuti neni mazuʋa ako acaitwa mazhinji,
Makore oʋupenyu bgako acawedzerwa.
Kana wakacenjera, iwe, wakaɀicenjerera hako;
Kana uri muɗaɗiri, iwe woga ucaʋa nemhoȿa yaɀo.
Mukadzi ɓenzi unopupira;
Haanamano, haaziʋi cinhu.
Unogara pamukoʋa weimba yake,
Pacigaro pamitunhu yeguta.
Kuti aɗanidzire kunaʋanopfuʋura napo,
Iʋo ʋanorurama nenzira dzaʋo,
Aninani usinamano, ŋgaatsaukire muno;
Usinenjere, mukadzi unoti kwaari:
Mvura yaɓiwa inozipa,
Ciŋgwa cinodyiwa pakaʋanda cinonaka.
Asi haaziʋi kuti midzimu iri’ko;
Kuti ʋakakokerwa naye ʋari pakadzika paSheori.
Ɀireʋo ɀaSoromoni.
Mŋanakomana, wakacenjera, unofadza ɓaɓa;
Asi mŋanakomana ɓenzi unoshuwisa mai ʋake.
Fuma
Asi kururama kunorwira parufu.
Jehova haaŋgatenderi mŋeya wowakarurama kuti unzwe nzara;
Asi kupaŋga kwaʋakaipa unokusundira kure.
Unoɓata noruʋoko rusinehanya, ucaʋa murombo;
Asi ruʋoko rwousinoʋusimbe runofumisa.
Unoʋuŋganidza muzhezha, ndiye mŋanakomana wakacenjera;
Asi unoʋata hope mukukohwa, mŋakomana unonyadzisa.
Mikomborero iri pamusoro wowakarurama;
Asi muromo wowakaipa unoʋanza kumanikidza.
Kuyeʋukwa kwowakarurama kunoʋigira kuropafadzwa,
Asi zita rowakaipa ricaʋora.
Unomŋoyo wakacenjera, ucagamucira mirairo;
Asi unemiromo yoʋupenzi ucawisirwa pasi.
Unofamba ɀakarurama, unofamba ɀakasimba;
Asi unominamisa nzira dzake, ucazikanwa.
Unoconya neziso rake, unoʋuyisa maɗambudzo;
Asi unemiromo yoʋupenzi, ucawisirwa pasi.
Muromo wowakarurama itsime roʋupenyu;
Asi muromo wowakaipa unoʋanza kumanikidza.
Mbeŋgo dzinomutsa kukakaʋara;
Asi ruɗo runofukidza kuɗarika kwose.
Pamiromo younenjere panowanikwa ʋucenjeri;
Asi shamhu yakafanira musana wounoshaiwa njere.
Ʋakacenjera ʋanoɀiceŋgetera ziʋo;
Asi muromo weɓenzi uri pedyo nokuparadzwa.
Fuma yomufumi ndiro guta rake rakasimba;
Ɀinoparadza ʋarombo ndibgo ʋurombo bgaʋo.
Ɀaakaɓatira
Ɀakawanikwa nowakaipa
Unoterera kurairirwa, uri panzira yoʋupenyu;
Asi unoramba kurairwa, unotsausa
Unoʋanza kuʋeŋga, unemiromo yenhema;
Unamakuhwa, iɓenzi.
Kuɗarika hakuŋgakoni
Asi unodzora miromo yake, unoʋucenjeri.
Rurimi rwowakarurama rwakafanana nesirveri yakasarurwa;
Mŋoyo wowakaipa hauɓatsiri cinhu.
Miromo yowakarurama inosimbisa ʋazhinji;
Asi mapenzi anofa nokushaiwa ziʋo.
Kuropafadza kwaJehova ndiko kunofumisa;
Kutambura paɓasa hakuwedzeri cinhu.
Ƃenzi rinoti kuita ɀakaipa hutamba;
Ndiɀo ɀinoita ʋo ʋucenjeri kunounenjere.
Ɀinotyiwa nowakaipa, ndiɀo ɀicamuwira;
Asi wakarurama ucapiwa ɀaanoɗa.
Kana campupuri capfuʋura, wakaipa haaci’po;
Asi wakarurama unenheyo dzisiŋgaperi.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita simbe kunaʋanomutuma.
Kutya Jehova kunowedzera mazuʋa;
Asi makore owakaipa acatapudzwa.
Tariro yaʋakarurama mufaro;
Asi kutarira kwaʋakaipa kucaparadzwa.
Nzira yaJehova inhare kunowakarurama;
Asi ndiko kuparadzwa kunaʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Wakarurama haaŋgatoŋgozunuŋguswi nokusiŋgaperi;
Asi ʋakaipa haʋaŋgarambi ʋagere panyika.
Muromo wowakarurama unoɓuɗisa ʋucenjeri;
Asi rurimi runenhema rucabviswa.
Miromo yowakarurama inoziʋa ɀinofadza;
Asi muromo wowakaipa
Ciyero cinonyeŋgedzera cinonyaŋgadza kunaJehova;
Asi kurema kwakakwana kunomufadza.
Kana kuɀikudza kuciȿika, kunyadziswa kwaȿika ʋo;
Asi ʋucenjeri ʋuri kunaʋanoɀininipisa.
Kusanyeŋgedzera kwaʋakarurama kucaʋatuŋgamirira;
Asi kusarurama kwaʋanonyeŋgedzera kucaʋaparadza.
Fuma haiɓatsiri cinhu nezuʋa rokutsamŋa;
Asi kururama kunorwira parufu.
Kururama kwowakakwana kucaruramisa nzira yake;
Asi wakaipa ucawiswa neɀakaipa ɀake.
Kururama kwaʋakarurama kucaʋarwira;
Asi ʋanonyeŋgedzera ʋacaɓatwa neɀakashata ɀaʋo.
Kana munhu wakaipa acifa, ɀaanotarira ɀicaparadzwa;
Tariro yaʋakashata inoparadzwa.
Wakarurama unorwirwa pakutambudzika;
Wakaipa unopinda pacigaro cake.
Wakashata unoparadza wokwake nomuromo wake;
Asi wakarurama ucarwirwa neziʋo.
Kana ʋakarurama ʋacipfuʋurira mberi ɀakanaka, guta rinofara kwaɀo;
Kana ʋakaipa ʋaciparadzwa, kunopururudzwa.
Nokuropafadzwa kwaʋakarurama guta rinokudzwa;
Asi rinoputswa nemiromo yaʋakaipa.
Unoninipisa wokwake unoshaiwa ʋucenjeri;
Asi munhu unenjere unoramba anyerere.
Unofamba anamakuhwa, unoɓuɗisa ɀakaʋanda;
Asi unomŋoyo wakatendeka, unofukidza mhaka.
Kana ʋanhu ʋasiŋgatuŋgamirirwi noʋucenjeri, ʋanoɗerera;
Asi paʋarairiri ʋazhinji ndipo panoruponeso.

Fufuro yakaita sebge rinokosha kana icitarirwa nomŋene wayo;
Pose painoriŋgira inofadza.
Munhu unofukidza kuɗarika
Asi unoramba acimutsa shoko, unoparadzanisa shamŋari dzinoɗana.
Munhu unenjere unoɓayiwa nokutukwa
Kupfuʋura ɓenzi nokurobga runezana.
Munhu unomŋoyo wokumukira unoŋgotȿaka ɀakaipa;
Asi ucatumirwa nhume inomŋoyo mukukutu.
Ɀirinani kuti munhu asoŋgane necikara catorerwa ʋana,
Pakuti asoŋgane neɓenzi paʋupenzi bgaro.
Aninani unoripidzira ɀakanaka neɀakaipa,
Ɀakaipa haɀiŋgabvi paimba yake.
Kuʋamba kwokukakaʋara kwakafanana nokudziʋurira mvura;
Saka rega rukaʋe, kurwa kusati kwaȿika.
Unopembedza wakaipa, nounopa wakarurama mhoȿa,
Ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋanonyaŋgadza Jehova.
Mari iri muruʋoko rweɓenzi neiko kuti riteŋge ʋucenjeri,
Ɀarisinenjere.
Shamŋari inoɗa ŋguʋa dzose;
Hama inoɓerekerwa
Munhu unoshaiwa njere, ndiye unoɀisuŋga noruʋoko rwake,
Aciɀiitira wokwake ruɓatso.
Unoɗa kukakaʋara, unoɗa kuɗarika;
Unokurisa suʋo rake, unotȿaka kuparadzwa.
Unomŋoyo usakarurama haawani ɀakanaka;
Unorurimi rusakarurama unowira munjodzi.
Unoɓereka ɓenzi ucazonzwa shuŋgu;
Ƃaɓa ʋeɓenzi haʋanamufaro.
Mŋoyo wakafara unoɓatsira
Asi mŋeya wakaputsika unowomesa mafupa.
Munhu wakaipa unogamucira fufuro inobva mucifuʋa,
Kuti aminamise nzira dzokururamisira.
Ʋucenjeri ʋuri pamberi pounenjere;
Asi meso eɓenzi ari pamigumo yenyika.
Mŋanakomana ɓenzi unocemedza ɓaɓa ʋake,
Unoitira
Ʋuye, kuraŋga wakarurama hakuzakanaka,
Nokuroʋa ʋakuru nokuɗa kwokururama
Unoɀidzora pamashoko ake, uneziʋo;
Ʋuye unomŋeya wakagadzikana, munhu wenjere.
Kunyaŋge neɓenzi, kana rinyerere, riŋganzi rakacenjera;
Unoɓumira muromo wake, ucanzi wakaŋgwara.
Unoɀiparadzanisa naʋamŋe, unoŋgotȿaka kuɗa
Unorwa noʋucenjeri bgose kwabgo.
Ƃenzi harifariri kunzwisisa,
Asi kuti mŋoyo waro ufukurwe.
Kana wakaipa aciȿika, kuɀidza kwaȿika ʋo;
Pamŋe cete neɀinonyadzisa, kushoʋora
Mashoko omuromo womunhu
Kutsaura wakaipa haɀina‐kunaka;
Kana kuramba wakarurama pakutoŋga.
Miromo yeɓenzi inoʋuyisa kukakaʋara;
Muromo waro unoɗana kurobga.
Muromo weɓenzi ndiko kuparadzwa kwaro;
Miromo yaro musuŋgo womŋeya waro.
Mashoko omuceri akaita seɀimeɗu ɀinozipa,
Ɀinoɓurukira mukati‐kati momuʋiri.
Naiye unoʋusimbe pakuɓata kwake,
Munuŋuna womuparadzi.
Zita raJehova inhare yakasimba;
Wakarurama unoʋaŋgira’mo ndokuceŋgetwa.
Fuma yomufumi ndiwo musha wake wakasimba,
Ʋuye soruȿiŋgo rurefu pakufuŋga kwake.
Mŋoyo womunhu unoɀikudza kuparadzwa kusati kwaȿika;
Kuɀininipisa kunotaŋgira kukudzwa.
Unopindura asati anzwa,
Ɀicaʋa kwaari ʋupenzi nokunyadziswa.
Mŋeya womunhu unomusimbisa pakurwara kwake;
Asi mŋeya wakaputsika uŋgamutswa nani?
Mŋoyo wowakacenjera unowana ziʋo;
Nzeʋe yowakacenjera inotȿaka ziʋo.
Cipo comunhu cinomuwanira nɀimbo,
Cinomuisa pamberi paʋakuru.
Unotaŋga kutambirwa mhaka yake
Asi wokwake unoȿika womuferefeta.
Mijenya inogumisa kukakaʋara;
Inotema cireʋo pakati paʋanesimba.
Hama yatadzirwa inopfuʋura guta rakasimba;
Kukakaʋara kwakafanana neɀipfigiso ɀeimba yamambo.
Ƌumbu romunhu rinogutiswa neɀiɓereko ɀomuromo wake;
Ucagutiswa neɀakawanda ɀemiromo yake.
Rurimi runesimba pamsoro porufu noʋupenyu;
Ʋanoruɗa ʋacadya ɀiɓereko ɀarwo.
Wawana mukadzi wawana cinhu cakanaka,
Waʋigirwa nyasha yaJehova.
Murombo unokumbira acinyeŋgetera;
Asi mufumi unopindura nehasha.
Munhu uneshamŋari zhinji unoparadzwa;
Asi shamŋari iri’ko inonamatira kupfuʋura hama.
Murombo, unofamba muɀokwaɗi yake,
Unopfuʋura unemiromo isakarurama, riri ɓenzi.
Ʋuye, kushiŋgaira kusineziʋo hakuna‐kunaka;
Unokurumidza namakumbo ake unorasha nzira.
Ʋupenzi bgomunhu ʋunokaŋganisa nzira yake;
Mŋoyo wake unotsamŋira Jehova.
Fuma inoʋuyisa shamŋari zhinji;
Asi murombo unosiyiwa neshamŋari yake.
Capupu cenhema haciŋgakoni kurobga;
Unoreʋa nhema haaŋgapukunyuki.
Ʋazhinji ʋacatȿaka nyasha yomunhu unopavurira;
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ishamŋari younopa ɀipo.
Hama dzose dzomurombo dzinomuʋeŋga;
Ɀikuru shamŋari dzake dzinoparadzana naye!
Uno
Unowana ʋucenjeri, unoɗa ʋupenyu bgake;
Unoceŋgeta njere, ucawana ɀakanaka.
Capupu cenhema haciŋgakoni kurobga;
Unoreʋa nhema ucaparadzwa.
Kugara pakati peɀakanaka haɀifaniri ɓenzi;
Ndoɗa sei kuti muranda aʋe ishe wamacinda.
Kuŋgwara kwomunhu kunodzora kutsamŋa kwake;
Kukudzwa kwake ndiko kukaŋganwira kuɗarika
Kutsamŋa kwamambo kwakafanana nokuʋomba kweshumba;
Asi nyasha dzake dzakaita seɗoʋa riri paʋuswa.
Mŋanakomana ɓenzi inhamo yaɓaɓa ʋake;
Ʋuye kukakaʋara kwomukadzi kuɗonha kusiŋgaperi kwemvura.
Dzimba nefuma inhaka inobva kunamadziɓaɓa;
Asi mukadzi wakaŋgwara unobva kunaJehova.
Ʋusimbe ʋunowisira munhu pahope huru;
Munhu usiŋgaɓati ucafa nenzara.
Unoceŋgeta murairo, unoceŋgeta ʋupenyu bgake;
Asi usinehanya nenzira dzake ucafa.
Unonzwira ʋarombo tsitsi, unoposana naJehova;
Ucamuripira ɓasa rake rakanaka.
Raŋga mŋanakomana wako, nokuti tariro ici’po;
Usatȿaka kumuʋuraya.
Munhu unehasha ɀikuru ucarobga;
Nokuti kana uci
Terera kana ucirairirwa, unzwe kana ucidzidziswa,
Kuti pashure ugoʋa wakacenjera.
Mumŋoyo womunhu munendaŋgariro zhinji;
Asi kurairira kwaJehova ndiko kucamira.
Munhu unoɗikanwa nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgake;
Murombo kurinani pamureʋi wenhema.
Kutya Jehova
Haaŋgaʋiŋgiwi neɀakaipa.
Simbe inopinza ruʋoko rwayo mundiro,
Isiŋgaɗi kutoŋgorudzosera kumuromo wayo ɀe.
Roʋa muɗaɗi, ipapo usinamano ucaɀiŋgwarira;
Raira unenjere, ipapo ucanzwisisa ziʋo.
Unoitira ɓaɓa ʋake simba, nokudziŋga mai ʋake,
Mŋanakomana unonyadzisa nokuita ɀinonyadza.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, rega kuterera kana ucidzidziswa,
Kana uciɗa hako kutsauka pamashoko eziʋo.
Capupu cisinamaturo cinoɗaɗa nokururama;
Muromo waʋakaipa unomedza ɀakaipa.
Kutoŋgwa kwakagadzirirwa ʋaɗaɗi;
Neshamhu misana yamapenzi.
Waini muɗaɗi, ɗoro mupopoti;
Aninani unoɓatwa naɀo, haana‐kucenjera.
Kuvundusa kwamambo kwakaita sokuʋomba kweshumba;
Unomutsamŋisa, unoɀitadzira ʋupenyu bgake.
Munhu unokudzwa kana acigara kure nokukakaʋara;
Asi ɓenzi rimŋe nerimŋe rinokakaʋara.
Simbe hairimi kana kunecando;
Saka kana acitȿaka
Mano mumŋoyo womunhu
Asi munhu wenjere ucaicera.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanowana munhu unoʋaitira cinhu cakanaka,
Asi ndiani uŋgawana munhu wakatendeka?
Munhu wakarurama, unofamba muɀokwaɗi yake,
Ʋana ʋake ʋanomuteʋera ʋacaropafadzwa.
Mambo, unogara pacigaro cokutoŋga,
Unodziŋga ɀakaipa ɀose nameso ake.
Ndiani uŋgati: Ndacenesa mŋoyo waŋgu,
Ndanatswa ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu?
Ɀiidzo ɀakasiyana, neɀiyero ɀakasiyana,
Iɀoɀo ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova.
Kunyaŋge nomŋanakomana unoɀiziʋisa neɀaanoita,
Kana ɓasa rake rakanaka, kana rakarurama.
Nzeʋe, inonzwa, neziso, rinoʋona,
Jehova wakaɀiita ɀose.
Usaɗa hope, kuti urege kuzoʋa murombo;
Ȿinudza meso ako, kuti ugogutiswa neɀokudya.
Cakaipa, cakaipa! Ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa muteŋgi;
Asi kana woenda woɀirumbidza.
Ndarama iri’ko, nekorari zhinji;
Asi miromo yeziʋo ndico cinhu cinokosha kwaɀo.
Mutorerei ŋguʋo yake, iye wakaɀiita ruɓatso kumutorwa;
Ŋgaaʋe ruɓatso rwaʋatorwa.
Munhu unoti ɀokudya ɀenhema ɀakanaka;
Asi pashure muromo wake ucazara norubge.
Mano anobva pakuraŋgana;
Urwe pfumo wamborairirwa noʋucenjeri.
Unofamba anamakuhwa, unoɓuɗisa ɀakaʋanda;
Saka usashamŋaridzana nomunhu unoshamisa miromo yake.
Unotuka ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake,
Mŋenje wake ucadzimŋa parima rakaȿiɓa.
Nhaka, yakawanikwa nokukurumidza pakutaŋga,
Haiŋgaropafadzwi pakupedzisira.
Usati: Ndicatsiʋa ɀakaipa;
Mirira Jehova, iye ucakuponesa.
Ɀiidzo, ɀakasiyana, ɀinonyaŋgadza Jehova;
Neciyero cinonyeŋgedzera hacina‐kunaka.
Kufamba kwomunhu kunobva kunaJehova;
Ɀino munhu uŋganzwisisa seiko nzira yake?
Musuŋgo kumunhu
Ndokuzofuŋgisisa ambopika.
Mambo wakacenjera unozuŋgura ʋakaipa,
Aciʋapura nomupuro.
Mŋeya womunhu mŋenje waJehova;
Unonɀera ɀose ɀiri mukati‐kati.
Ruɗo nokutendeka ɀinoceŋgeta mambo;
Cigaro cake coʋushe cinotsigirwa noruɗo.
Majaya anokudzwa nokuɗa kwesimba rawo;
Ʋukomba bgaʋatana ndiyo misoro yakacena.
Kurobga, kunokuʋadza, kunonatsa ɀakaipa;
Kurobga
Mŋoyo wamambo uri muruʋoko rwaJehova sehoʋa dzemvura;
Unoufambisa seɀaanoɗa.
Nzira ipi neipi yomunhu unoti yakarurama pakuʋona kwake;
Asi Jehova unoyera mŋoyo.
Kuita ɀakarurama nokururamisira
Ɀinofadza Jehova kupfuʋura ciɓayiro.
Kutarira kwamanyawi nomŋoyo unoɀikudza,
Ndaŋgariro dzaʋashiŋgairi dzinoʋuyisa ɀizhinji;
Asi aninani unokurumidzisa
Kuʋuŋganidza fuma norurimi runoreʋa nhema
Imhute inodziŋgwa kwose‐kwose naʋanotȿaka rufu.
Kumanikidza kwaʋakaipa kunoʋaparadza,
Nokuti ʋanoramba kuita ɀakarurama.
Nzira yomunhu unemhoȿa yakaminama kwaɀo;
Asi kana ari wakacena, kuita kwake kwakarurama.
Ɀirinani kugara pakona reɗeŋga,
Pakugara muimba imŋe nomukadzi unokakaʋara.
Mŋeya wowakaipa unoɗa ɀakaipa;
Wokwake haawani nyasha kwaari.
Kana muɗaɗi aciraŋgwa, usinamano ucaʋa noʋucenjeri;
Kana wakacenjera acidzidziswa, unogamucira ziʋo.
Wakarurama unocerekedza imba yowakaipa;
Unowisira ʋakaipa mukuparadzwa.
Unodziʋira nzeʋe yake, kuti arege kunzwa kucema kwomurombo,
Iye ʋo ucacema, asi haaŋganzwiki.
Cipo, cinopiwa pakaʋanda, cinonyaradza hasha,
Necipiwa, ciri mucifuʋa, kutsamŋa kukuru.
Kuita ɀakarurama ndiwo mufaro kunowakarurama;
Asi ʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa ʋanoparadzwa nako.
Munhu, unotsauka panzira yenjere,
Ucandozorora muʋuŋgano yaʋakafa.
Unofarira ɀinofadza, ucaʋa murombo;
Unofarira waini namafuta haaŋgafumi.
Wakaipa idzikinuro yowakarurama;
Unoita nokunyeŋgedzera unopinda panɀimbo yowakarurama.
Ɀirinani kugara murenje,
Pakugara nomukadzi unokakaʋara nounonetsa.
Mumba mowakacenjera munefuma inokosha namafuta;
Asi ɓenzi rinoɀipedza.
Munhu, unotȿaka kururama noʋunyoro,
Unowana ʋupenyu, nokururama, nokukudzwa.
Munhu wakacenjera unokwira muguta raʋanesimba,
Aciwisira pasi nhare yaʋanoʋimba nayo.
Aninani unoceŋgeta muromo wake norurimi rwake,
Unoceŋgeta mŋeya wake pamaɗambudziko.
Munhu, unoɀikudza unamanyawi, muɗaɗi ndiro zita rake;
Unoita namanyawi okuɀikudza kwake.
Kuɗa kwounoʋusimbe kunomuʋuraya;
Nokuti maʋoko ake anoramba kuɓata.
Zuʋa rose unoramba aciŋgoɗa;
Asi wakarurama unopa asiŋgarambi.
Ciɓayiro cowakaipa cinonyaŋgadza;
Ndoɗa kana aciʋuya naɀo
Capupu cenhema cicaparadzwa;
Asi munhu unoterera, ucaramba acitaura.
Munhu wakaipa uneciso cisiŋganyari;
Asi kana ari wakarurama unogadzira nzira dzake.
Hakunoʋucenjeri, kana njere,
Hakunamano aŋgakunda Jehova.
Biza rinogadzirirwa zuʋa rokurwa,
Asi kukunda kunobva kunaJehova.
Zita
Ʋuye kuɗikanwa kupfuʋura sirveri nendarama.
Ʋafumi naʋarombo ʋanosoŋgana pamŋe cete;
Jehova ndiye muiti waʋo ʋose.
Munhu wakaŋgwara unoʋona ɀakaipa, ndokuʋanda;
Asi ʋasinamano ʋanopfuʋura haʋo, ndokuwira munjodzi.
Muɓairo wokuɀininipisa
Ifuma nokukudzwa noʋupenyu.
Minzwa
Roʋedza mŋana nzira yaanofanira kufamba nayo,
Ipapo kunyaŋge akwegura haaŋgatsauki pairi.
Mufumi unoɓata ʋushe pamsoro pomurombo;
Unotora cikwerete muranda wowakamupa cikwerete.
Unodɀara ɀakaipa, ucaceka ɗambudziko;
Shamhu yokutsamŋa kwake icanyaŋgarika.
Unomŋoyo munyoro ucaropafadzwa;
Nokuti unopa ʋarombo ɀokudya ɀake.
Dziŋga muɗaɗi, kukakaʋara kugoenda ʋo;
Nenharo nokunyadzwa ɀicaguma.
Unoɗa kucena kwomŋoyo,
Nounemiromo inofadza, mambo ucaʋa shamŋari yake.
Meso aJehova anoceŋgeta
Asi ucakonesa mashoko omunhu unonyeŋgedzera.
Simbe inoti: Kuneshumba kunze,
Ndiŋgaʋurawa pakati penzira dzomumusha.
Muromo waʋakadzi ʋokumŋe igomba rakadzika;
Unotsamŋirwa naJehova ucawira’mo.
Ʋupenzi ʋunonamatira mumŋoyo womŋana;
Asi shamhu yokurairira icaʋudziŋgira kure naye.
Unomanikidza murombo, unomufumisa;
Unopa mufumi
Rerekera nzeʋe yako, unzwe mashoko owakaceŋjera,
Mŋoyo wako uraŋgarire ziʋo yaŋgu.
Nokuti cinhu cakanaka, kana ucigara naɀo mukati mako,
Ŋgaɀigare pamŋe cete pamiromo yako.
Ndakakuziʋisa, iyewe, iɀoɀo nhasi,
Kuti uʋimbe naJehova.
Handina‐kukunyorera mashoko akaiȿo‐naka here,
Okurairira neziʋo here?
Kuti uziʋiswe kwaɀo mashoko eɀokwaɗi,
Kuti udzosere mashoko eɀokwaɗi kunaʋanokutuma here?
Usatorera murombo, nokuti murombo;
Usamanikidza unotambudzika pasuʋo;
Nokuti Jehova ucaʋarwira pamhaka dzaʋo,
Nokutadzira ʋupenyu bgaʋanoʋatadzira.
Usashamŋaridzana nomumhu unotsamŋa;
Usafambidzana nomunhu unehasha;
Kuti urege kudzidza tsika dzake,
Uteyire mŋeya wako musuŋgo.
Usaʋa mumŋe waʋanoɀisuŋga noruʋoko,
Kana ʋakaɀiita ruɓatso nokuɗa kwecikwerete.
Kana usina‐cauŋgaripa naco,
Ucagokutorereiko nhoʋo dzako pasi pako?
Usabvisa muganho wekare,
Wakaiswa’po namadziɓaɓa ako.
Unoʋona munhu unoshiŋgaira paɓasa rake here? Ucamira pamberi pamadzimambo;
Haaŋgamiri pamberi paʋanhu ʋasiŋgazikanwi.
Kana ukagara pakudya pamŋe cete nomuɓati,
Cerekedza ɀakanaka ɀiri pamberi pako;
Uɀigure huro dzako,
Kana uri munhu wamadyo.
Usapaŋga ɀinozipa ɀake,
Nokuti ɀokudya iɀo ɀinonyeŋgedzera.
Usaɀinetsa kuwana fuma;
Rega ʋucenjeri bgako.
Unoɗa kuɀitarira nameso ako? Ɀaenda!
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo
Segondo rinobururukira kuɗeŋga.
Usadya ɀokudya ɀomunhu unoruciʋa;
Kana kupaŋga ɀinozipa ɀake.
Nokuti seɀaanofuŋga mumŋoyo make, ndoɀaakaita;
Unoti kwauri: Cidya, cinwa;
Asi mŋoyo wake haunehanya newe.
Musuʋa wawadya, ucaurutsa ɀe,
Ukarashikirwa namashoko ako akanaka.
Usataura paunonzwika neɓenzi;
Nokuti ricaɀidza ʋucenjeri bgamashoko ako.
Usabvisa muganho wekare;
Ʋuye usapinda paminda yenherera;
Nokuti Mudzikinuri waʋo unesimba;
Iye ucaʋarwira pamhaka dzaʋo newe.
Mŋoyo wako ushiŋgaire kudzidziswa,
Nenzeʋe dzako kunzwa mashoko eziʋo.
Usarega kuraŋga mŋana;
Nokuti kunyaŋge ukamuroʋa neshamhu, haaŋgafi.
Umuroʋe neshamhu,
Ugorwira mŋeya wake paSheori.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, kana mŋoyo wako wocenjera,
Nomŋoyo waŋgu ucafara ʋo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, itȿo dzaŋgu dzicafarisisa,
Kana miromo yako icitaura ɀinhu ɀakarurama.
Mŋoyo wako ŋgaurege kugoɗora ʋatadzi;
Asi utye Jehova mazuʋa ose.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo muɓairo uri’po;
Cawakatarira haciŋgaparadzwi.
Inzwa, iwe mŋanakomana waŋgu, ucenjere,
Ururamisire mŋoyo wako munzira.
Usaʋa pakati paʋanokarira waini,
Pakati paʋanokarira nyama.
Nokuti munwi nounamadyo ʋacaʋa ʋarombo;
Hope dzicapfekedza munhu mamvemve.
Terera ɓaɓa ʋako ʋakakuɓereka;
Usaɀidza mai ʋako kana ʋacembera.
Teŋga ɀokwaɗi, urege kuzoiteŋgesa ɀe;
Ʋuye ʋucenjeri, nedzidzo, nenjere.
Ƃaɓa ʋowakarurama ʋacafara kwaɀo;
Ʋuye wakaɓereka mŋana wakacenjera, ucafadzwa naye.
Ƃaɓa ʋako namai ʋako ŋgaʋafare,
Mai ʋakakuɓereka ŋgaʋafare kwaɀo.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, ndipe mŋoyo wako;
Meso ako ŋgaafarire nzira dzaŋgu.
Nokuti cifeʋe igoroŋga rakadzika;
Nomukadzi wokumŋe gomba rakamanikana.
Ɀirokwaɀo unoʋandira segororo;
Unowedzera ʋanyeŋgedzeri pakati paʋanhu.
Ndiani unoti: Haiwa! Ndiani unoti: Maiwe! Ndiani unokukakaʋara?
Ndiani unokucema? Ndiani unamaʋaŋga pasinemhaka?
Ndiani unameso akatȿuka?
Ndiʋo ʋanogarisa pawaini;
Iʋo ʋanondotȿaka waini yakaveŋganiswa.
Usatarira waini kana yakatȿuka,
Kana iciʋaima mumukombe,
Kana icitapira pakunwiwa.
Pakupedzisira inoruma senyoka,
Inoɓaya semvumbi.
Meso ako acaʋona ɀisiŋgazikanwi,
Mŋoyo wako ucaɓuɗisa ɀisakarurama.
Ɀirokwaɀo ucaʋa somunhu uʋete pasi mukati meguŋgwa,
Kana souʋete pamsoro peɗanda recikepe.
Ucati: Ʋakandiroʋa, asi handinakurwadziwa;
Ʋakandiroʋa, asi handina‐kuɀinzwa;
Ndicapepuka riniko? Ipapo ndicandoitȿaka ɀe.
Usagoɗora ʋanhu ʋakaipa;
Usashuʋa kuʋa pakati paʋo.
Nokuti mŋoyo yaʋo inoraŋgarira kuparadza;
Nemiromo yaʋo inotaura ɀakashata.
Imba inoʋakwa noʋucenjeri;
Inosimbiswa nenjere.
Neziʋo dzimba dzomukati dzinozadzwa
Nefuma yose inokosha inofadza.
Munhu wakacenjera unesimba;
Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu weziʋo unowedzera simba.
Nokuti unofanira kurwa pfumo wamborairirwa noʋucenjeri;
Asi kunaʋarairiri ʋazhinji ndiko kunoruponeso.
Ʋucenjeri haʋuȿikirwi neɓenzi;
Harishamisi muromo waro paɗare.
Unoraŋgarira kuita ɀakaipa,
Ucanzi naʋanhu mŋene weɀakashata.
Mufuŋgo woʋupenzi ɀiʋi;
Muɗaɗi unonyaŋgadza ʋanhu.
Kana ukapera simba nezuʋa rokutambudzika,
Simba rako ishoma.
Rwira ʋanoiswa kurufu;
Noʋoʋurawa usarega kuʋadzosa.
Kana ukati: Tarirai, hatina‐kuɀiziʋa;
Ko iye unoidza mŋoyo, haaɀiʋoni here?
Naiye unoceŋgeta mŋeya wako, haaɀiziʋi here?
Ko iye haaŋgapi mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakaɓata here?
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, idya ʋuci, nokuti bgakanaka;
Nomuȿi, unozipa, pamukanwa wako.
Ucaʋona kuti ndiɀo ɀicaita ʋucenjeri kumŋeya wako;
Kana waʋuwana, muɓairo ucaʋa’po,
Neɀawakatarira haɀiŋgaparadzwi.
Iwe munhu wakaipa, usaʋandira panogara wakarurama;
Usaparadza paanozorora.
Nokuti munhu wakarurama uŋgawa kanomŋe, acisimuka ɀe;
Asi ʋakaipa ʋanowisirwa pasi nenjodzi.
Usafarisisa kana muʋeŋgi wako aciwa;
Kana aciwisirwa pasi mŋoyo wako ŋgaurege kufara.
Kuti Jehova arege kuɀiʋona, ɀikasamufadza,
Akazodzora kutsamŋa kwake kwaari.
Usatsamŋa nokuɗa kwaʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa;
Ʋuye usagoɗora ʋakaipa.
Nokuti munhu wakaipa haanamuɓairo;
Mŋenje wowakaipa ucadzimŋa.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, itya Jehova namambo;
Usafambidzana naʋanoŋgosishanduka.
Nokuti nhamo yaʋo icamuka pakarepo;
Nokuguma kwamakore aʋo, ndiani ucaɀiziʋa?
Kutsaura ʋanhu pakutoŋga haɀina‐kunaka.
Unoti kunowakaipa: Wakarurama,
Ʋanhu ʋacamutuka, nendudzi dzicamusema.
Asi ʋanomuraira, ʋacaitirwa ɀakanaka;
Ropafadzo yakanaka icaʋuya pamsoro paʋo.
Unopindura namashoko akarurama,
Unoȿeta miromo.
Gadzira ɓasa rako kunze,
Uɀigadzirire iro pamunda;
Pashure ugoʋaka imba yako.
Usaʋa capupu
Usanyeŋgedzera nemiromo yako.
Usati: Seɀaakandiitira, ndiɀo ɀandicamuitira ʋo;
Ndicaripira munhu seɀaakaita iye.
Ndakapfuʋura napamunda wesimbe,
Napamunda wemizambiriŋga womunhu unoshaiwa njere;
Tarirai, wakaŋga waŋgomera minzwa cete;
Munda wose wakaŋga wakafukidzwa norukato,
Noruȿiŋgo rwawo rwamabge rwakaŋga rwakoromoka.
Ipapo ndakacerekedza, ndikanatsofuŋga;
Ndakaʋona, ndikadzidziswa.
Kumboʋata ɀishomanene, kumbotsimŋaira ɀishomanene,
Kumbofuŋgatira maʋoko ɀishomanene, ndizorore;
Saiɀoɀo ʋurombo bgako ʋucaȿika segororo,
Nokushaiwa kwako somunhu wakashoŋga nhumbi dzokurwa.
Iɀi ʋo ndiɀo ɀireʋo ɀaSoromoni, ɀakanyorwa naʋanhu ʋaHezekia mambo waʋaJuda:
Ndiko kukudzwa kwaMŋari kuti aʋanze cinhu;
Asi kukudzwa kwamadzimambo ndiko kuti ʋanɀere mhaka.
Kukwirira kweɗeŋga, nokudzika kwenyika,
Nemŋoyo yamadzimambo haɀibviri kunɀerwa.
Bvisa marara pasirveri,
Muʋumbi agoɓuɗisirwa hari.
Bvisa wakaipa pamberi pamambo,
Cigaro cake coʋushe cisimbiswe nokururama.
Usaʋa namanyawi pamberi pamambo;
Usamira panɀimbo yaʋakuru.
Nokuti ɀirinani kuti ʋati kwauri: Kwira pano,
Pakuti uninipiswe pamberi pomucinda,
Wawaʋona nameso ako.
Usakurumidza kundoita nharo;
Nokuti ucazoɗini pashure,
Kana wokwako akunyadzisa?
Raŋgana nowokwako pamsoro pemhaka iri pakati penyu,
Asi usareʋurura ɀakaʋanzika ɀomumŋe;
Kuti mumŋe unoɀinzwa arege kukutuka,
Guwa rako rikasaguma.
Shoko rinotaurwa neŋguʋa yakafanira,
Rakafanana namatamba endarama mumidziyo yesirveri.
Murairi wakacenjera panzeʋe inoterera,
Ɀakafanana necindori cenzeʋe cendarama noʋukomba bgendarama yakaiȿo‐naka.
Nhume yakatendeka yakafanana kunaʋanoituma
Nokutonhorera kwecando paŋguʋa yokuceka;
Nokuti inoponesa mŋeya yaʋatenzi ʋayo.
Munhu unoɀirumbidza pamsoro pecipo cenhema,
Wakafanana namakore nemhepo ɀisinemvura.
Muɓati unokundwa kana aciitirwa mŋoyo murefu,
Ʋuye rurimi runyoro runovuna mafupa.
Wawana ʋuci here? Cidya ʋunokuriŋgana,
Kuti urege kumiswa mŋoyo nabgo, ukaʋurutsa.
Rutsoka rwako ŋgarurege kuwanza kupinda paimba yowokwako;
Arege kuzoneta newe, akakuʋeŋga.
Munhu unopupurira wokwake nhema,
Kutenda munhu usino‐kutendeka paŋguʋa yenhamo,
Kwakafanana nezino rakagurika norutsoka rwakashoɗoka.
Somunhu unobvisa ŋguʋo kana kucitonhora, ʋuye sevinega kana iciiswa pasoda,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unoimbira mŋoyo unorwadza nziyo.
Kana muʋeŋgi wako anenzara, umupe ɀokudya adye;
Kana anenyota, umupe mvura anwe.
Nokuti ucatutira mazimbe omŋoto pamusoro wake,
Ʋuye Jehova ucakuripira.
Mhepo inobva kumsoro inoʋuyisa mvura;
Saiɀoɀo rurimi runamakuhwa
Ɀirinani kugara pakona reɗeŋga,
Pakugara muimba imŋe nomukadzi unokakaʋara.
Shoko rakanaka, rinobva kunyika iri kure,
Rakafanana nemvura inotonhorera kumŋeya unenyota.
Munhu wakarurama, unozunuŋguka pamberi paʋakaipa,
Wakafanana netsime rakabvoŋgodzwa necituɓu cinetȿina.
Haɀina‐kunaka kudya ʋuci ʋuzhinji;
Asi kunɀera ɀinorema ndiko kukudzwa.
Munhu usiŋgadzori mŋeya wake,
Wakafanana neguta rakaputswa, risinoruȿiŋgo.
Seɀakaita cando muzhezha, ʋuye seɀakaita mvura mukuceka,
Saiɀoɀo kukudzwa hakufaniri ɓenzi.
Seɀinoita shiri pakupaparika kwayo, nenyeŋganyeŋga pakubururuka kwayo,
Saiɀoɀo kutuka pasinemhoȿa hakuitiki.
Tyaʋa
Neshamhu musana wamapenzi.
Usapindura ɓenzi noʋupenzi bgaro,
Kuti urege kufanana naro.
Pindura ɓenzi noʋupenzi bgaro,
Kuti rirego‐ti rakacenjera.
Unotuma shoko noruʋoko rweɓenzi,
Uno
Makumbo ecirema anoŋgoremberera;
Ndiɀo ɀakaita cireʋo mumuromo weɓenzi.
Somunhu unosuŋgira ibge pacifuramabge,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita iye unokudza ɓenzi.
Se
Ndiɀo ɀakaita cireʋo mumuromo weɓenzi.
Somufuri wemiseʋe, unofura ɀose,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unoseʋenzesa ɓenzi nounoseʋenzesa ʋafambi.
Sembga inodzokera kumarutsi ayo,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita ɓenzi rinopamhidza ʋupenzi bgaro.
Unoʋona munhu unoti ndakacenjera here?
Ƃenzi riri nani kunaiye.
Simbe inoti: Kuneshumba panzira;
Shumba iri munzira dzomumusha.
Gonhi rinotendereka pamahinji aro;
Ndiɀo ɀinoita simbe panhoʋo dzayo.
Simbe inopinza ruʋoko rwayo mundiro,
Inoʋusimbe kurudzosera ɀe kumuromo wayo.
Simbe inoɀiti ndakacenjera
Kupfuʋura ʋanhu ʋanomŋe ʋanogona kupindura nenjere.
Somunhu unoɓata imbga nenzeʋe dzayo, iciŋgopfuʋura hayo,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unoɀipinza pagakaʋa raasinemhoȿa naro.
Somupeŋgo unokanda ɀitsika,
Nemiseʋe, neɀinoʋuraya,
Ndiɀo ɀinoita munhu unonyeŋgedzera wokwake,
Aciti: Ndinoŋgoita ɀaŋgu jeye!
Mŋoto unodzima nokushaiwa huni;
Ʋuye kana kusinomuceri, gakaʋa rinopera.
Seɀakaita mazimbe paɀitsika ɀinopfuta, nehuni pamŋoto,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu wegakaʋa pakupfutidza rukaʋe.
Mashoko omuceri akaita seɀimeɗu ɀinozipa,
Ɀinoɓurukira mukati‐kati momuʋiri.
Miromo inopisa
Ɀakafanana nomudziyo wevu wakanamirwa namarara anobva pasirveri.
Muʋeŋgi unonyeŋgedzera nemiromo yake,
Asi unoʋanza kunyeŋgedzera mumŋoyo make.
Kana acitaura ɀinonaka, usamutenda;
Nokuti mumŋoyo make muneɀinonyaŋgadza ɀinomŋe.
Kunyaŋge kuʋeŋga
Kushata kwake kucaɓuɗiswa pacena pamberi peʋuŋgano.
Aninani unocera gomba, ucawira’mo iye;
Unokuŋgurusa ibge, ricadzokera pamsoro pake.
Rurimi rwenhema runoʋeŋga wakuʋadzwa narwo;
Nomuromo unoɓata kumeso unoparadza.
Usaɀirumbidza pamsoro pezuʋa ramaŋgwana;
Nokuti hauziʋi cauŋgaʋigirwa nezuʋa rimŋe.
Mumŋe ŋgaakurumbidze, urege kuʋa muromo wako;
Ŋgaaʋe mŋeni, irege kuʋa miromo yako.
Ibge rinorema, ʋuye jeca rinorema;
Asi kutsamŋa kweɓenzi kunokurira ɀose nokurema.
Hasha dzinokuʋadza, ʋuye kutsamŋa kunokukura;
Asi ndiani uŋgamira pamberi pegoɗo.
Kurairwa pacena kunopfuʋura
Ruɗo rwakaʋanzwa.
Maʋaŋga
Asi kuȿeta kwomuʋeŋgi kwakawanda.
Mŋeya wakaguta unotsika pasi muȿi woʋuci;
Asi mŋeya unenzara unoti ɀose ɀinozipa kunyaŋge ɀiciʋaʋa.
Seshiri inobururuka icienda kure neɗendere rayo,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unofamba‐famba kure napaanogara.
Mafuta neɀinonhuwira ɀinofadza mŋoyo;
Ndiɀo ɀinoita ʋo kunaka kwoʋushamŋari bgomunhu kunobva pakuyanana kwemŋeya.
Usasiya shamŋari yako neshamŋari yaɓaɓa ʋako;
Usaenda kumba kwomunuŋuna wako nezuʋa renhamo yako;
Wokwako, uri pedyo, unopfuʋura munuŋuna uri kure.
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, iʋa wakacenjera, ufadze mŋoyo waŋgu;
Kuti ndigone kupindura unondishoʋora.
Munhu wakaŋgwara unoʋona ɀakaipa, ndokuʋanda;
Asi ʋasinamano ʋanopfuʋura haʋo, ndokuwira munjodzi.
Munhu unoɀiita ruɓatso kumutorwa, umutorere ŋguʋo yake;
Umuite ruɓatso iye
Unoropafadza shamŋari yake nenzwi guru, acifumira maŋgwanani,
Ucanzi wakatukwa pamsoro paɀo.
Kuɗonha kusiŋgaperi pazuʋa remvura zhinji
Nomukadzi unokakaʋara, ɀakafanana.
Unoɗa kumudziʋisa, unodziʋisa mhepo;
Ruʋoko rwake rworudyi rwakaɓata mafuta.
Simbi inorodza simbi;
Saiɀoɀo munhu unorodza ciso ceshamŋari yake.
Aninani unoceŋgeta muʋonde, ucadya ɀiɓereko ɀawo;
Unoceŋgeta tenzi wake, ucakudzwa.
Ciso
Saiɀoɀo mŋoyo womunhu unotarisana nomunhu.
Sheori neAbadoni haɀitoŋgoguti;
Nameso omunhu haaguti.
Hari yokunyausa ndeyesirveri, neʋira nderendarama;
Saiɀoɀo munhu
Kunyaŋge ukatswa ɓenzi muɗuri nomutsi pakati peɀiyo ɀinotswiwa,
Ʋupenzi bgaro haʋuŋgabvi kwariri.
Shiŋgaira uziʋe kuti makwai ako akaɗini;
Uceŋgete ɀakanaka mapoka ako.
Nokuti fuma haigari nokusiŋgaperi;
Ko korona inogara kuȿikira kumarudzi ose here?
Ʋuswa ʋunoenda, ɓumhudza ndokuɓuɗa,
Nemiriʋo yamakomo inoʋuŋganidzwa.
Makwaiana anokuʋigira ɀokufuka ɀako,
Ʋuye mbudzi ndiwo muteŋgo weminda.
Mukaka wembudzi ucariŋgana ɀokudya ɀako, neɀokudya ɀeimba yako,
Nokuraramisa ʋasikana ʋako.
Wakaipa unotiza kusinaunodziŋgana naye;
Asi ʋakarurama ʋanotsuŋga mŋoyo seshumba.
Nemhaka yokuɗarika kwenyika, macinda ayo anowanda;
Asi nomumŋe, unenjere neziʋo, icaramba iri’po.
Munhu unoshaiwa amene, unomanikidza ʋarombo,
Wakafanana nemvura inokukura, isiŋgasiyi ɀokudya.
Ʋanosiya murairo, ʋanorumbidza ʋakaipa;
Asi ʋanoceŋgeta murairo, ʋanoita nharo naʋo.
Ʋanhu ʋakashata haʋanzwisisi ɀakarurama;
Asi ʋanotȿaka Jehova ʋanonzwisisa ɀose.
Murombo, unofamba muɀokwaɗi yake,
Unopfuʋura usakarurama unofamba nenzira mbiri, kunyaŋge akafuma.
Unoceŋgeta murairo, mŋanakomana wakacenjera;
Asi unofambidzana naʋanhu ʋanamadyo, unonyadzisa ɓaɓa ʋake.
Unowedzera fuma yake nemhindu kana nokuwedzera
Unoʋuŋganidzira mumŋe, ucaʋa netsitsi naʋarombo.
Unoramba kunzwa murairo nenzeʋe yake,
Kunyaŋge nomunyeŋgetero wake unonyaŋgadza.
Aninani unorashisa ʋakarurama ʋafambe nenzira yakaipa,
Ucawira amene mugomba rake;
Asi ʋakarurama ʋacagara nhaka yeɀakanaka.
Mufumi unoti ndakacenjera;
Asi murombo, unenjere, unomuferefeta.
Kana ʋakarurama ʋacikunda, mufaro mukuru uri’ko;
Asi kana ʋakaipa ʋosimba, ʋanhu ʋoʋanda.
Unofukidza kuɗarika kwake, haaŋgaʋi nomufaro;
Asi unoɀireʋurura, aciɀirasha, ucawana nyasha.
Munhu unogara acitya, unomufaro;
Asi unowomesa mŋoyo wake, ucawira munjodzi.
Seshumba inoʋomba, neɓere rinopota‐pota,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita muɓati wakaipa unoɓata ʋanhu ʋarombo.
Mucinda, unoshaiwa njere, unomanikidza
Asi unoʋeŋga kuciʋa, ucawedzera mazuʋa ake.
Munhu, unoremedzwa neropa romumŋe munhu,
Ucatizira kugomba; ŋgaarege kudziʋiswa nomunhu.
Aninani unofamba ɀakarurama, ucarwirwa;
Asi unofamba nenzira dzisakarurama, ucawa pakarepo.
Unorima munda wake, ucaʋa neɀokudya ɀizhinji;
Asi unoʋaŋgira ɀisinamaturo, ucaʋa noʋurombo kwaɀo.
Munhu wakatendeka ucaʋa namaropafadzo mazhinji;
Asi unoɗa kufuma nokukurumidza, haaŋgakoni kurobga.
Kutsaura ʋanhu hakuna‐kunaka;
Nokuti munhu uŋgaɗarika nokuɗa kwecimeɗu ceciŋgwa.
Munhu unoruciʋa, unoʋaŋgira fuma,
Asiŋgaziʋi kuti ucawirwa nokushaiwa.
Unorairira munhu ucazowana nyasha pashure,
Kupfuʋura iye unoɓata kumeso norurimi rwake.
Unoɓira ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake, aciti: Hakuzi kuɗarika,
Uyu ishamŋari younoparadza.
Unomŋeya wokuciʋa unomutsa kukakaʋara;
Asi unoʋimba naJehova, ucasimbiswa.
Unotenda mŋoyo wake, iɓenzi;
Asi unofamba noʋucenjeri, ucarwirwa.
Unopa ʋarombo, haaŋgazoshaiwi;
Asi unotsinzina meso ake, ucatukwa kazhinji.
Kana ʋakaipa ʋosimba, ʋanhu ʋoʋanda;
Asi kana ʋoparara, ʋakarurama ʋowanda.
Munhu wakarairwa kazhinji, aciwomesa mutsipa wake,
Ucaparadzwa pakarepo, kusina‐ciŋgamuɓatsira.
Kana ʋakarurama ʋowanda, ʋanhu ʋanofara;
Asi kana munhu wakaipa aciɓata ʋushe, ʋanhu ʋanogomera.
Aninani unoɗa ʋucenjeri, unofadza ɓaɓa ʋake;
Asi unoshamŋaridzana neɀifeʋe, unorasha fuma yake.
Mambo unosimbisa nyika
Asi munhu wemitero, unoiparadza.
Munhu unoɓata wokwake kumeso,
Unodzikira tsoka dzake mumbure.
Pakuɗarika kwomunhu wakashata panomusuŋgo;
Asi wakarurama ucaimba nokufara kwaɀo.
Wakarurama unoziʋa kururamisira mhaka dzaʋarombo;
Asi wakaipa haanzwisisi ziʋo.
Ʋaɗaɗi ʋanopisira guta;
Asi ʋakacenjera ʋanodzora kutsamŋa.
Kana munhu wakarurama anemhaka neɓenzi,
Iye ucatsamŋa nokuseka, asi hakuŋgaʋi nezororo.
Ʋanhu ʋeropa ʋanoʋeŋga wakarurama;
Asi ʋakarurama ʋanotȿaka kuraramisa mŋeya wake.
Ƃenzi rinoɓuɗisa hasha dzaro dzose;
Asi munhu wakacenjera unodzidzora nokudzinyaradza.
Kana muɓati aciterera nhema,
Ʋaranda ʋake ʋose ʋacaʋa ʋakaipa.
Murombo nomunhu unomanikidza ʋanosoŋgana pamŋe cete;
Jehova unovenekera meso aʋose.
Mambo, unoruramisira ʋarombo nokutendeka,
Cigaro cake cicasimbiswa nokusiŋgaperi.
Shamhu nokuraira ɀinoʋuyisa ʋucenjeri;
Asi mŋana waŋgoregwa hake unonyadzisa mai ʋake.
Kana ʋakaipa ʋowanda, kuɗarika kwowanda ʋo;
Asi ʋakarurama ʋacaʋona kuwa kwaʋo.
Rairira mŋanakomana wako, agokuzorodza;
Ɀirokwaɀo ucafadza mŋeya wako.
Kana
Asi unoceŋgeta murairo, unomufaro.
Muranda uŋgaramba kurairirwa namashoko
Nokuti, kunzwisisa unonzwisisa hake, asi haanehanya naɀo.
Unoʋona munhu unokurumidza kutsamŋa?
Ƃenzi riri nani kunaiye.
Kana munhu acirera muranda wake ɀakanaka kubva paʋuɗuku bgake,
Pakupedzisira
Munhu wakatsamŋa unomutsa kukakaʋara;
Munhu unehasha unokuɗarika kuzhinji.
Kuɀikudza kwomunhu kucamuɗukupisa;
Asi unomŋeya unoɀininipisa, ucakudzwa.
Aninani unoshamŋaridzana nembava, unoʋeŋga mŋeya wake;
Unonzwa kupikwa, asi haareʋururi cinhu.
Kutya munhu kunoʋuyisa musuŋgo;
Asi aninani unoʋimba naJehova, ucaceŋgetwa.
Ʋazhinji ʋanotȿaka nyasha yomuɓati;
Asi kururamisirwa kwomunhu kunobva kunaJehova.
Munhu usakarurama unonyaŋgadza wakarurama;
Ʋuye wakarurama panzira dzake unonyaŋgadza wakaipa.
Mashoko aAguri, mŋanakomana waJake; cireʋo
Murume unoti kunaItieri, kunaItieri naUkari:
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndiri ɓenzi kupfuʋura ʋanhu ʋose;
Handinenjere dzomunhu.
Handina‐kudzidza ʋucenjeri,
Ʋuye handineziʋo yoMutȿene.
Ndiani wakakwira kuɗeŋga, akaɓuruka ɀe?
Ndiani wakaʋuŋganidza mhepo mucanza cake?
Ndiani wakasuŋgira mvura muŋguʋo
Ndiani wakasimbisa migumo yose yenyika?
Zita rake ndiani, nezita romŋanakomana wake, kana uciriziʋa?
Shoko rimŋe nerimŋe raMŋari rakanatswa;
Ndiye nhoʋo yaʋose ʋanoʋanda maari.
Usawedzera pamashoko ake,
Kuti arege kukupa mhoȿa, uwanikwe unenhema.
Ɀinhu ɀiʋiri ndakakumbira kwamuri;
Musandiramba iɀo, ndisati ndafa.
Bvisai kure neni ɀisina‐kutendeka nenhema;
Regai kundipa ʋurombo kana fuma;
Mundigutse neɀokudya ɀakandifanira;
Ndirege kuti kana ndaguta, ndi
Kana ɀimŋe ndiʋe murombo, ndiɓe,
Ndimhure zita raMŋari waŋgu.
Rega kuʋudzisira muranda kunatenzi ʋake,
Arege kukutuka, ukanzi unemhoȿa.
Rudzi ruri’ko runotuka ɓaɓa ʋarwo,
Rusiŋgaropafadzi mai ʋarwo.
Rudzi ruri’ko runoti pakuʋona kweɗu takacena kwaɀo,
Asi rusina‐kunatswa patȿina yarwo.
Rudzi ruri’ko, meso arwo anamanyawi sei!
Mafuŋgiro ameso aʋo akakwidzwa.
Rudzi ruri’ko, meno arwo akafanana neminondo, nameno eshaya dzarwo samapaŋga,
Kuti rupedze ʋarombo panyika, naʋanoshaiwa pakati paʋanhu.
Cikweʋa‐ropa cinaʋakunda ʋaʋiri,
Ɀinhu ɀitatu ɀiri’ko ɀisiŋgatoŋgoguti,
Ɀinna ɀisiŋgatoŋgoti: Ɀariŋgana!
Sheori; neciɀaro cisiŋgaɓereki;
Pasi pasiŋgaguti mvura;
Nomŋoto, usiŋgati: Ɀariŋgana!
Ziso rinoseka ɓaɓa,
Rinoshoʋora kuterera mai,
Makuŋguʋu omupata acarinoŋgora,
Ʋana ʋegondo ʋacaridya.
Ɀinhu ɀitatu ɀiri’ko ɀinondishamisa,
Ɀirokwaɀo ɀinna, ɀandisiŋgaziʋi,
Kufamba kwegondo muɗeŋga;
Kufamba kwenyoka paruware;
Kufamba kwecikepe pakati peguŋgwa;
Nokufamba kwomurume nomusikana.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita kufamba kwomukadzi woʋupombge;
Unodya, ndokupisika muromo wake,
Aciti: Handina‐kuita cinhu cakaipa.
Nyika inoɗeɗera nokuɗa kweɀinhu ɀitatu;
Ʋuye nokuɗa kweɀinna ɀaisiŋgaɗi kuʋona:
Nokuɗa kwomuranda kana acizoʋa mambo;
Nokuɗa kweɓenzi, kana raguta ɀokudya;
Nokuɗa kwomukadzi warambga, kana azowanikwa;
Ʋuye mushandiri, kana azoʋa mugari wenhaka yatenzi wake.
Ɀinhu ɀinna ɀiri’ko panyika ɀiɗuku haɀo,
Asi ɀakacenjera kwaɀo,
Mujuru, rudzi rusinesimba harwo;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro unoʋuŋganidza ɀokudya ɀawo muzhezha;
Mbira, rudzi rusinesimba harwo,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro dzinoita imba yadzo mumatombo;
Mhashu hadzinamambo,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro dzinofamba ɀakanaka dziciita mapoka;
Cipfira uŋgaciɓata namaʋoko ako,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ciri mudzimba dzamadzimambo.
Ɀinhu ɀitatu ɀiri’ko ɀinokufamba kunokudzwa,
Ɀirokwaɀo ɀinna ɀinokufamba kunokudzwa,
Shumba, mhare pakati pemhuka dzose,
Isiŋgatizi mhuka ipi neipi;
Nemhuka ineɀiʋuno ɀakasimba, nenhoŋgo yembudzi;
Namambo kana anaʋarwi ʋake.
Kana uciŋge waita noʋupenzi, waɀikudza,
Kana ɀimŋe waraŋgarira ɀakashata,
Fumbira muromo wako.
Nokuti mukaka waroɀwa unoɓuɗisa mafuta,
Nemhino dzadɀinyiwa dzinoɓuɗisa ropa,
Saiɀoɀo hasha dzaʋambga dzinoɓuɗisa kukakaʋara.
Mashoko amambo Remueri; ɀireʋo ɀaakadzidziswa namai ʋake.
Nhai, mŋanakomana waŋgu! Nhai, mŋanakomana weɗumbu raŋgu!
Nhai, mŋanakomana wemhiko dzaŋgu!
Rega kupa ʋakadzi simba rako,
Nenzira dzako kuneɀinoparadza madzimambo.
Iwe Remueri, haɀifaniri madzimambo, haɀifaniri madzimambo kunwa waini;
Namacinda kuti: Ƌoro riripiko?
Ʋarege kunwa, ʋacizokaŋganwa murairo,
Ʋarege kukaŋganisa kururamisira ʋamŋe ʋanotambudzika.
Ipai woɗo‐kuparara ɗoro,
Nounomŋoyo unorwadza waini;
Ŋgaanwe, akaŋganwe ʋurombo bgake,
Arege kucaraŋgarira kutambudzika kwake.
Shamisira mbeʋeʋe muromo wako,
Shamisa muromo wako, utoŋge ɀakarurama,
Ururamisire murombo nounoshaiwa.
