Ndianiko uŋgawana mukadzi unoita ɀakanaka?
Nokuti muteŋgo wake unokunda kwaɀo
Mŋoyo womurume wake unomutenda,
Naiye haaŋgashaiwi fuma.
Unoitira
Mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Unotȿaka mvere norucinda,
Aciɓata namaʋoko ake nomufaro.
Wakafanana neɀikepe ɀaʋateŋgesi;
Unondotora ɀokudya ɀake kure.
Unomuka ʋuciri ʋusiku,
Nokupa mhuri yake ɀokudya,
Naʋashandiri ʋake ɓasa raʋo.
Unoraŋgarira munda, ndokuuteŋga;
Unosima munda wemizambiriŋga neɀaakawana namaʋoko ake.
Unoɀisuŋga ciʋuno nesimba,
Nokusimbisa maʋoko ake.
Unoʋona kuti kushambadzira kwake kwaɓatsira;
Mŋenje wake haudzimi ʋusiku.
Unotambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kunecokurukisa;
Maʋoko ake anoɓata cinorukwa.
Unotambanudzira murombo ruʋoko rwake;
Unotandaʋadzira unoshaiwa maʋoko ake.
Haatyi cando pamsoro peimba yake,
Nokuti mhuri yake yose yakafuka ŋguʋo tȿuku.
Unoɀiitira mitsamiro inoʋukomba;
Ŋguʋo yake muceka wakaiȿo‐naka nomutȿuku.
Murume wake unozikanwa pamasuʋo eguta,
Kana agere pakati paʋakuru ʋenyika.
Unoita ɀokufuka ɀomuceka aciɀiteŋgesa,
Unoʋigira ʋateŋgesi ɀisuŋgo ɀeɀiʋuno.
Simba nokukudzwa ndiɀo ɀokufuka ɀake;
Unoseka kana acifuŋga ŋguʋa inoʋuya.
Unoshamisa muromo wake noʋucenjeri;
Rurimi rwake runodzidzisa noʋunyoro.
Unotarira ɀakanaka kufamba kwemhuri yake,
Asiŋgadyi ɀokudya ɀoʋusimbe.
Ʋana ʋake ʋanomuka, ʋacimuti: Ʋakaropafadzwa;
Nomurume wake ʋo unomurumbidza,
Ʋakunda ʋazhinji ʋakaita ɀakanaka,
Asi iwe unoʋakunda ʋose.
Ɀinofadza ɀinonyeŋgedzera, ʋunaki haʋunamaturo;
Asi mukadzi unotya Jehova, ndiye unofanira kurumbidzwa.
Cimupai ɀakafanira ɀaakaɓata namaʋoko ake;
Maɓasa ake ŋgaamurumbidze pamasuʋo
Mashoko oMuparidzi, mŋanakomana waDavidi, mambo paJerusarema:
Ɀanzi noMuparidzi: Haɀinamaturo cose, haɀinamaturo cose, ɀose haɀinamaturo cose!
Munhu uŋgaɓatsirweiko nokutambudzika kwake kwose, kwaanotambudzika nako pasi pezuʋa?
Rudzi rumŋe runoenda, rumŋe rudzi runoʋuya; asi pasi panoŋgogara’po nokusiŋgaperi.
Zuʋa rinoɓuɗa ʋo, zuʋa rinoʋira, ricikurumidzira kwarinozoɓuɗa ɀe.
Mhepo inoenda zasi, yodzoka yoenda kumsoro; inoramba icidzoka pakufamba kwayo; mhepo inodzokera ɀe pakupotereka kwayo.
Nzizi dzose dzinoɗira muguŋgwa, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro guŋgwa harizari; kunɀimbo kunoenda nzizi, ndiko kwadzinodzokera ɀe.
Ɀinhu ɀose ɀizere nokuneta; hakunomunhu uŋgaɀitaura; ziso hariguti nokuʋona, nzeʋe haizari nokunzwa.
Cakaŋga ciri’po, ndico cicazoʋa’po; cakamboitwa, ndico cicazoitwa; hapanecinhu citȿa pasi pezuʋa.
Cinhu ciri’ko here, catiŋgati: Tarirai, cinhu ici citȿa? Cakaŋga ciciŋgoʋa’po kare, paŋguʋa dzakatitaŋgira.
Marudzi akapfuʋura haacaraŋgarirwi; namarudzi acazoteʋera, haaŋgatoŋgoraŋgarirwi naʋanozoʋateʋera.
Ini Muparidzi, ndakaŋga ndiri mambo waIsraeri paJerusarema.
Ndikarwadza mŋoyo waŋgu kutȿaka nokunɀera noʋucenjeri ɀose ɀinoitwa pasi peɗeŋga; iɓasa rinotambudza rakapiwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu naMŋari, kuti ʋaɀitambudze naro.
Ndakaʋona maɓasa ose anoitwa pasi pezuʋa; tarirai, ɀose haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Cakakombama hacibviri kururamiswa; cinoshaikwa hacibviri kuʋereŋgwa.
Ndakataurirana nomŋoyo waŋgu, ndiciti: Tarira ndaɀiwanira ʋucenjeri ʋukuru, kukunda ʋose ʋakanditaŋgira paJerusarema; ɀirokwaɀo mŋoyo waŋgu wakaʋona ʋucenjeri ʋuzhinji neziʋo.
Asi ndakati ndicirwadza mŋoyo waŋgu kuti ndiziʋe ʋucenjeri neziʋo, noʋupeŋgo noʋupenzi, ndikaʋona kuti naiɀoɀo ʋo ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Nokuti muʋucenjeri ʋuzhinji munokucema kuzhinji; ʋuye, unowedzera ziʋo, unowedzera shuŋgu.
Ndakati mumŋoyo maŋgu: Ʋuya hako, ndicakuidza nomufaro; cifarira ɀinhu ɀakanaka! Asi tarira, naiɀoɀo ʋo ɀakaŋga ɀisinamaturo.
Kana kuri kuseka, ndakati: Ʋupeŋgo! Kana uri mufaro,

Ndakanɀera mŋoyo waŋgu, ndiʋone kuti ndiŋgafadza nyama yaŋgu sei newaini, mŋoyo waŋgu ucindifambisa hawo noʋucenjeri, ʋuye kuti ndiŋgaramba ndakaɓata ʋupenzi, kuȿikira ndaʋona kuti ɀakanaka ndeɀipi ɀiŋgaitwa naʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu pasi peɗeŋga mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgaʋo.
Ndakaɀiitira maɓasa makuru; ndakaɀiʋakira dzimba; ndakaɀirimira minda yemizambiriŋga;
ndakaɀiitira minda neminda yemiti, ndikasima’mo miti inoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀamarudzi ose;
ndakaɀiitira madziʋa emvura, kuti ndiɗiridze matondo pakaŋga pasimŋa miti;
ndakateŋga ʋaranda naʋarandakadzi, ndikaʋa naʋaranda ʋakaɓerekerwa mumba maŋgu; ndakaŋga ndinefuma zhinji yeŋombe namakwai, kupfuʋura ʋose ʋakanditaŋgira paJerusarema;
ndakaɀiʋuŋganidzira ʋo sirveri nendarama, nefuma yamadzimambo neyenyika dzose; ndakaɀitȿakira ʋaimbi ʋarume naʋakadzi, neɀinofadza ɀaʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu, naʋaroŋgo ʋazhinji.
Saiɀoɀo ndakaŋga ndiri munhu mukuru, ndikaramba ndicikura kupfuʋura ʋose ʋakanditaŋgira paJerusarema; ʋuye ʋucenjeri bgaŋgu bgakagara neni.

Ɀose ɀakaɗikanwa nameso aŋgu handinakuanyima iɀoɀo; handina‐kutoŋgodzora mŋoyo waŋgu pamufaro upi noupi; nokuti mŋoyo waŋgu wakaŋga ucifara nokuɓata kwaŋgu kwose; ndiwo wakaŋga uri mugoʋe waŋgu wakabva pakuɓata kwaŋgu kwose.

Ɀino ndakacerekedza maɓasa ose akaŋga aitwa namaʋoko aŋgu, nokuɓata kwose kwandakatamburakuɓata‐tarira ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀisinamaturo, kwaiʋa kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi, kwakaŋga kusinecinhu cinoɓatsira pasi pezuʋa.
Ɀino ndakatendeʋuka kuti ndicerekedze ʋucenjeri, noʋupeŋgo, noʋupenzi, nokuti cinyi ciŋgaitwa nomunhu unoteʋera mambo? Iɀoɀo ɀakaŋguʋa ɀaitwa.
Ipapo ndakaʋona kuti ʋucenjeri bgakanaka kupfuʋura ʋupenzi, ɀiciita seciedza cakanaka kupfuʋura rima.
Meso omunhu wakacenjera ari mumusoro wake, asi ɓenzi rinofamba murima; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakaʋona kuti ʋose ʋanowirwa necinhu cimŋe cete.
Ipapo ndakati mumŋoyo maŋgu: Seɀinoitirwa ɓenzi, ndiɀo ɀandicaitirwa neni ʋo; ko ini ndaiʋa wakacenjera nei! Ndikati mumŋoyo maŋgu, iɀi ɀose haɀinamaturo ʋo.
Nokuti munhu wakacenjera wakafanana neɓenzi pakusaraŋgarirwa nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti ɀinozokaŋganikwa ɀose pamazuʋa anoʋuya. Wakacenjera haazinofa seɓenzi here?
Saka ndakaʋeŋga ʋupenyu, nokuti ɓasa rinoitwa pasi pezuʋa rakandinzwisa shuŋgu; nokuti ɀose haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Ɀino ndakaʋeŋga kuɓata kwaŋgu kwose kwandakatambura kuɓata pasi pezuʋa, ɀandinofanira kuɀisiyira munhu unonditeʋera.

Ɀino ndiani uŋgaziʋa kana iye acaʋa wakacenjera kana ɓenzi? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaʋa nesimba pamsoro pokuɓata kwaŋgu kwose kwandakatambura kuɓata, neɀandakaita noʋucenjeri pasi peɗeŋga. Naiɀoɀo ʋo hazinamaturo.
Saka ndakatendeʋuka, kuti ndiʋodze haŋgu mŋoyo waŋgu pamsoro pokuɓata kwaŋgu kwose kwandakatambura kuɓata pasi pezuʋa.
Nokuti munhu uri’ko wakaɓata noʋucenjeri neziʋo noʋumhizha; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro unofanira kuɀisiyira mumŋe, uʋe mugoʋe wake, usinakutoŋgoɀitamburira. Naiɀoɀo ʋo haɀinamaturo, cinhu cakaipa kwaɀo.
Nokuti munhu unowanei pamsoro pokuɓata kwake kwose, nokushiŋgaira kwomŋoyo wake, kwaanoɓata nako pasi pezuʋa?
Nokuti mazuʋa ake ose inhamo
Hakunecinhu cinopfuʋura ici, kuti munhu adye, anwe, afadze mŋeya wake neɀakanaka pakati pokuɓata kwake. Ndakaʋona kuti naiɀoɀi ɀinobva kuruʋoko rwaMŋari.
Nokuti ndiani uŋgadya, ndiani uŋgafarira

Nokuti munhu, unomufadza, unopiwa ʋucenjeri, neziʋo, nomufaro; asi mutadzi unopiwa kutambudzika, kuti aʋuŋganidze nokututira, agoɀipa mumŋe unofadza Mŋari. Naiɀoɀo ʋo haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo.
Cinhu cimŋe necimŋe cinomusi waco, ʋuye shoko rimŋe nerimŋe pasi peɗeŋga rineŋguʋa yaro:
Ŋguʋa yokuɓerekwa, neŋguʋa yokufa; ŋguʋa yokusima, neŋguʋa yokudzura cakasimŋa;
ŋguʋa yokuʋuraya, neŋguʋa yokuporesa; ŋguʋa yokuputsa, neŋguʋa yokuʋaka;
ŋguʋa yokucema, neŋguʋa yokuseka; ŋguʋa yokuwuŋgudza, neŋguʋa yokupembera;
ŋguʋa yokurasha mabge, neŋguʋa yokuʋuŋganidza mabge; ŋguʋa yokumbundikira, neŋguʋa yokurega kumbundikira;
ŋguʋa yokutȿaka, neŋguʋa yokurega ɀirashike; ŋguʋa yokuceŋgeta, neŋguʋa yokurasha;
ŋguʋa yokubvarura, neŋguʋa yokusona; ŋguʋa yokunyarara, neŋguʋa yokutaura;
ŋguʋa yokuɗa, neŋguʋa yokuʋeŋga; ŋguʋa yokurwa, neŋguʋa yorugare.
Ko iye unoɓata unoɓatsirwei neɀaanotamburira?
Ndakaʋona kutambudzika kwakapiwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu naMŋari, kuti ʋaɀitambudze naɀo.
Cinhu cimŋe necimŋe wakaciita cakanaka paŋguʋa yaco; wakaisa ʋo ɀisiŋgaperi mumŋoyo maʋo, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munhu haaŋgagoni kunzwisisa ɀakaɓatwa naMŋari kubva pakutaŋga kuȿikira pakupedzisira.
Ndinoziʋa kuti hakunecinhu cakanaka pakati paʋo ciŋgapfuʋura ici, kuti ʋafare, ʋuye kuti ʋaite ɀakanaka ʋupenyu bgaʋo bgose.
Ʋuye ʋo, kuti cipo caMŋari kuti munhu mumŋe nomumŋe adye, anwe, afarire ɀinhu ɀakanaka pakuɓata kwake kwose.
Ndinoziʋa kuti ɀose ɀinoitwa naMŋari, ɀicagara nokusiŋgaperi; hakunecinhu ciŋgawedzerwa, kana ciŋgabviswa paɀiri; Mŋari wakaɀiita iɀoɀo, kuti ʋanhu ʋamutye.
Ɀiri’po ɀino, ɀakaŋguʋa ɀaʋa’po; ʋuye iɀo, ɀicaʋa’po, ɀakaŋguʋa ɀaʋa’po; Mŋari unotȿaka ɀe ɀakaŋga ɀapfuʋura.
Ʋuye ɀe, ndakaʋona pasi pezuʋa, kuti panɀimbo yokururamisira, ɀakaipa ɀakaŋga ɀiri’po; ʋuye panɀimbo yokururama, ɀakaipa ɀakaŋga ɀiri’po.
Ndakati mumŋoyo maŋgu: Mŋari ndiye ucatoŋga wakarurama nowakaipa; nokuti ŋguʋa iri’po yeshoko rimŋe nerimŋe neɓasa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ndakati mumŋoyo maŋgu:

Nokuti ɀinoitirwa ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu ndiɀo ɀinoitirwa ʋo mhuka; ɀose ɀinoitirwa cinhu cimŋe: Mufire womunhu, ndiwo mufire wemhuka, ɀose ɀinomŋeya mumŋe; munhu haana‐paanopfuʋura mhuka; nokuti ɀose haɀinamaturo.
Ɀose ɀinoenda kunɀimbo imŋe; ɀose ɀinobva pavu, ɀose ɀinodzokera ɀe kuvu.
Ndiani uŋgaziʋa kana mŋeya womunhu ucikwira kumsoro, kana mŋeya wemhuka uciɓurukira pasi kunyika?
Saka ndakaʋona kuti hakunecinhu cinopfuʋura ici, kuti munhu afarire maɓasa ake, nokuti ndiwo mugoʋe wake; nokuti ndiani ucamudzosa ɀe kuti aʋone ɀicamuteʋera.

Ɀino ndakadzoka ɀe, ndikaʋona kumanikidzwa kwose kunoitwa pasi pezuʋa; tarira, kwakaŋga kunemisodzi yaʋanomanikidzwa, ʋacishaiwa munyaradzi; ʋamanikidzi ʋaʋo ndiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋanesimba, asi iʋo ʋakashaiwa munyaradzi.
Naiɀoɀo ndakati ʋakafa, ʋakaŋguʋa ʋafa, ʋanomufaro kupfuʋura ʋapenyu ʋaciri ʋapenyu;
Ɀirokwaɀo,
Ɀino ndakaʋona kuɓata kwose noʋumhizha bgose pakuɓata, kuti munhu unoʋeŋgwa nowokwake pamsoro paɀo. Naiɀoɀo haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Ƃenzi rinofuŋgatira maʋoko aro, ricidya nyama yaro.
Tsama imŋe yorugare inopfuʋura nokunaka tsama mbiri dzokutambudzika nokudziŋgana nemhepo.
Ɀino ndakadzoka, ndikaʋona ɀisinamaturo pasi pezuʋa.
Mumŋe uri’ko unoŋgogara ari oga, asinawecipiri; ɀirokwaɀo, haanomŋanakomana kana munuŋuna, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kuɓata kwake hakunomugumo, ʋuye meso ake haaguti nefuma.
Ʋaʋiri ʋanopfuʋura mumŋe, nokuti ʋanomuɓairo wakanaka wokuɓata kwaʋo.
Nokuti kana ʋakawira pasi, mumŋe ucasimudza shamŋari yake; asi uri oga unenhamo kana aciwira pasi, haanomumŋe uŋgamusimudza.
Ʋuye ɀe, kana ʋaʋiri ʋaciʋata pamŋe cete, ʋacadziyirwa; asi mumŋe cete uŋgadziyirwa sei?
Kana munhu akaʋamba mumŋe, ʋaʋiri ʋaŋgamudziʋisa; rwonzi rwakakoshwa mutatu haruŋgakurumidzi kuɗamburwa.
Jaya murombo, rakacenjera, rinopfuʋura mambo mutana ɓenzi, usicaziʋi kutenda kana aciraŋgwa.
Nokuti wakaɓuɗa mutoroŋgo kuzoʋa mambo; ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge paʋushe bgake wakaɓerekwa ari murombo.
Ndakaʋona ʋapenyu ʋose ʋanofamba pasi pezuʋa, ʋaciteʋera jaya, iye wecipiri, wakamuka panɀimbo yake.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi, iʋo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa naye; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ʋanozoteʋera haʋaŋgamufariri. Ɀirokwaɀo, naiɀoɀo ʋo haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Ŋgwarira rutsoka rwako kana ucienda kuimba yaMŋari; nokuti kusweɗera kuzonzwa kunopfuʋura kuɓayira ciɓayiro camapenzi; nokuti haʋaziʋi kuti ʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Usakurumidza nomuromo wako, mŋoyo wako urege kukurumidza kutaura shoko pamberi paMŋari; nokuti Mŋari uri kuɗeŋga, iwe uri pasi; naiɀoɀo mashoko ako ŋgaaʋe mashoma.
Nokuti kurota kunoʋuya namaɓasa mazhinji, nenzwi reɓenzi namashoko mazhinji.
Kana uciŋge wapikira Mŋari mhiko, usanonoka kuiripa; nokuti iye haafariri mapenzi; ripa ɀaunopika.
Ɀirinani kuti urege kupika, pakuti upike usiŋgaripi.
Usatendera muromo wako kutadzisa nyama yako; usati pamberi pomutumŋa
Nokuti pakurota kuzhinji napamashoko mazhinji paneɀisinamaturo ɀizhinji; asi iwe utye Mŋari.
Kana uciʋona murombo acimanikidzwa, nokururamisa nokururama ɀicibviswa nesimba panyika, usashamiswa naɀo; nokuti mukuru kuʋakuru ʋose unocerekedza; ʋamŋe ʋari’ko ʋakuru kwaʋari.
Nokuti nyika inoɓatsirwa ɀikuru necinhu ici, mambo unofarira kurimiwa kweminda.
Unoɗa sirveri, haaŋgagutswi nesirveri, naiye unoɗa ɀakawanda,
Kana fuma iciwanda, ʋadyi ʋanowanda ʋo; mŋene wayo unoɓatsirwei, asi kuŋgoʋona nameso ake.
Hope dzomunhu, unoɓata, dzakanaka, kana acidya ɀishoma kana ɀizhinji; asi kuguta kwomufumi hakumutenderi kuʋata.
Kunecinhu cakaiȿo‐ipa, candakaʋona pasi pezuʋa, fuma inoceŋgetwa nomŋene wayo, icimuʋonesa nhamo.
Fuma iyo inopera necinhu cakaipa cinomuwira; kana aciŋge aɓereka mŋanakomana, haanecinhu muruʋoko rwake.
Seɀaakaɓuɗa muɗumbu ramai ʋake, ucadzoka ɀe asinecinhu, seɀaakaɓuɗa; haana‐caakatamburira, caaŋgatora, caaŋgaenda naco muruʋoko rwake.
Necinhu ici cakaiȿo‐ipa ʋo, kuti paɀose, seɀaakaʋuya, saiɀoɀo ucaenda ɀe; ɀino ucawaneiko, ɀaakatamburira mhepo?
Mazuʋa ake ose ʋo unodya murima, unotambudzika kwaɀo; unoʋurwere neshuŋgu.

Tarirai, ɀandakaʋona kuti ɀakanaka, ɀinofanira munhu, ndiko kuti adye, anwe, afarire ɀinhu ɀakanaka pakuɓata kwake kwose kwaanoɓata pasi pezuʋa, mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake bgaakapiwa naMŋari; nokuti ndiwo mugoʋe wake.
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ʋo, wakapiwa naMŋari fuma neɀakawanda, akapiwa ʋo simba kuti aɀidye, nokutora mugoʋe wake, nokufarira ɀaakaɓatira — ico cipo cinobva kunaMŋari.
Nokuti iye haaŋgaraŋgariri ɀikuru mazuʋa oʋupenyu bgake, nokuti Mŋari unopindura pamufaro womŋoyo wake.
Kunecinhu cakaipa candakaʋona pasi pezuʋa, cinoremedza ʋanhu:
Munhu unopiwa naMŋari fuma neɀakawanda nokukudzwa, saiɀoɀo kuti mŋeya wake hautoŋgoshaiwi cinhu caanoɗa; asi Mŋari haamupi simba rokudya iɀoɀo; asi mutorwa unoɀidya; ici hacinamaturo, ihosha yakaipa.
Kana munhu akaɓereka ʋana ʋanezana, akararama makore mazhinji, mazuʋa amakore ake akaʋa mazhinji, asi mŋeya wake usiŋgagutswi neɀakanaka, ʋuye ɀe akasaʋigwa
nokuti unoʋuya asinamaturo, unoenda ɀe murima, zita rake rinofukidzwa nerima;
ʋuye ɀe, haana‐kuʋona zuʋa kana kuriziʋa;
Ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge akararama makore aneɀuru ɀiʋiri ɀamazana, asiŋgafariri ɀinhu ɀakanaka, ko ʋose haʋaendi kunɀimbo imŋe here?
Kuɓata kwose kwomunhu kunoitirwa muromo wake; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kuɗa kwake ɀokudya hakugutswi.
Nokuti wakacenjera unokurira ɓenzi nei? Kana murombo unei, iye unoziʋa kufamba ɀakanaka pamberi paʋapenyu.
Kuʋona kwameso kunopfuʋura kutȿaka‐tȿaka kwomŋeya. Naiɀoɀo ʋo haɀinamaturo, ndiko kudziŋgana nemhepo ɓedzi.
Cinhu cipi necipi, cakaʋa’po, cakaŋguʋa capiwa zita raco; ɀakatarwa kuti munhu ucaʋa wakaɗini, haaŋgarwi nounomupfuʋura nesimba.
Nokuti mashoko mazhinji ari’ko, anowedzera ɀisinamaturo; munhu unoɓatsirwei naɀo?
Nokuti ndiani unoziʋa ɀakafanira munhu paʋupenyu bgake, iwo mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake ʋusinamaturo, bgaanorarama somumvuri? Nokuti ndiani uŋgaʋudza munhu ɀicazomuteʋera pasi pezuʋa?
Mbiri yakanaka inopfuʋura cizoro cakanaka, nezuʋa rokufa kupfuʋura zuʋa rokuɀarwa.
Ɀirinani kuenda kuimba yokucema, pakuenda kuimba yomutambo; nokuti ndiwo mugumo waʋanhu ʋose; munhu mupenyu ucaɀiraŋgarira pamŋoyo pake.
Kucema kunopfuʋura kuseka, nokuti mŋoyo unofadzwa nokupunyaira kweciso.
Mŋoyo yaʋakacenjera iri paimba yokucema, asi mŋoyo yamapenzi iri paimba yokufara.
Ɀirinani kuti munhu anzwe kutuka kwaʋakacenjera, pakuti anzwe kuimba kwamapenzi.
Nokuti kuseka kweɓenzi kwakafanana nokuputika kweminzwa pasi pehari; naiɀoɀo ʋo haɀinamaturo.
Ɀirokwaɀo kumanikidza kunoita mucenjeri ɓenzi; ʋuye fufuro inoparadza njere.
Kuguma kwecinhu kunopfuʋura kutaŋga kwaco; unomŋoyo murefu unopfuʋura unomŋoyo unoɀikudza.
Usakurumidza pamŋeya wako kutsamŋa, nokuti kutsamŋa kunogara pacifuʋa camapenzi.
Usati: Mazuʋa ekare anopfuʋura aɀino nokunaka neiko? Nokuti hauŋgabvunzi saiɀoɀo noʋucenjeri.
Ʋucenjeri bgakaenzana nenhaka; ɀirokwaɀo, bgaiȿo‐naka kunaʋanoʋona zuʋa.
Nokuti ʋucenjeri citaʋiridzo, mari ʋo citaʋiridzo; asi kunakisa kweziʋo ndiko, kuti ʋucenjeri ʋunoceŋgeta ʋupenyu bgaiye unabgo.
Cerekedza ɓasa raMŋari, nokuti ndiani uŋgaruramisa caakakombamisa iye?
Fara nezuʋa rokugara ɀakanaka, raŋgarira nezuʋa rokutambudzika; Mŋari ndiye wakaita iɀoɀo ɀose ɀiʋiri, kuti munhu arege kuziʋa ɀiri mberi kwake.
Iɀoɀi ɀose ndakaɀiʋona pamazuʋa aŋgu asinamaturo: Wakarurama uri’ko, unoparara pakati pokururama kwake, ʋuye ɀe, munhu wakaipa uri’ko, unorarama ŋguʋa huru pakati peɀakaipa ɀake.
Usaʋa munhu wakaiȿo‐rurama, usaʋa wakaiȿo‐cenjera; ucaɀiparadzireiko?
Usaʋa munhu wakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋuye usaʋa ɓenzi; ucafireiko ŋguʋa yako isati yaȿika?
Ɀakanaka kuti uɓatisise cinhu ici, ʋuye usabvisa ruʋoko rwako panececo; nokuti unotya Mŋari, ucapukunyuka panaiɀoɀo ɀose.
Ʋucenjeri ʋunosimbisa wakacenjera kupfuʋura ʋaɓati ʋanegumi ʋari muguta.
Ɀirokwaɀo, hapanomunhu wakarurama panyika, unoita ɀakanaka, asiŋgatadzi.
Ʋuye ɀe, usaʋa nehanya namashoko ose anotaurwa, kuti urege kunzwa muranda wako acikutuka.
Nokuti kazhinji mŋoyo wako unoziʋa kuti newe ʋo wakatuka ʋamŋe saiɀoɀo.
Iɀoɀi ɀose ndakaɀiidza noʋucenjeri; ndakati: Ndicaʋa wakacenjera; asi ɀakaŋga ɀiri kure neni.
Iɀo, ɀiri’po, ɀiri kure, ɀakadzika kwaɀo, ndiani uŋgaɀiziʋa?
Ndakatendeʋuka, mŋoyo waŋgu
Ndikawana cinhu cinoʋaʋa kukunda rufu, ndiye mukadzi uri musuŋgo, mŋoyo wake ari mambure, namaʋoko ake ɀisuŋgo; aninani unofadza Mŋari, ucapukunyuka kwaari; asi mutadzi ucaɓatwa naye.
Ɀanzi noMuparidzi: Tarirai, ndiɀoɀi ɀandakawana, ndiciʋereŋga cinhu cimŋe necimŋe, kuti ndiwane shumo yaɀo;
ɀinoŋgoramba ɀicitȿakwa nomŋeya waŋgu, asi ndigere kuɀiwana: Ndakawana murume mumŋe pakati pecuru cezana, asi handina‐kuwana mukadzi pakati paʋazhinji ʋakaɗai.
Asi tarirai, cinhu cimŋe ici cete ndico candakawana, kuti Mŋari wakaita munhu akarurama, asi iʋo ʋakatȿaka mano mazhinji.
Ndiani wakafanana nomunhu wakacenjera? Ndiani unoziʋa kuɗudzira cinhu? Ʋucenjeri bgomunhu ʋunobginyisa ciso cake; hasha dzeciso cake dzinoshandurwa.
Ndinoti: Ceŋgeta murairo wamambo, uɀiite nokuɗa kweɀawakapikira Mŋari.
Usakurumidza kubva pamberi pake; usatsuŋgirira pacinhu cakaipa, nokuti unoita ɀose ɀaanoɗa.
Nokuti shoko ramambo rinesimba; ndiani uŋgati kwaari: Munoiteiko?
Munhu unoceŋgeta murairo, haaŋgaʋoni cinhu cakaipa; mŋoyo wowakacenjera unoziʋa ŋguʋa nokutoŋgwa.
Nokuti cinhu cimŋe necimŋe cineŋguʋa
nokuti haaziʋi ɀicazoʋa’po; nokuti ndiani uŋgamuziʋisa kuti ɀicaʋa ɀakaɗini?
Hakunomunhu unesimba pamsoro pemhepo, kuti adziʋirire mhepo; ʋuye haanesimba pamsoro pezuʋa rorufu; hakuna‐kukaŋganwirwa pakurwa; saiɀoɀo ɀakaipa haɀiŋgarwiri iye unoɀiita.
Iɀoɀi ɀose ndakaɀiʋona, ndikaraŋgarira nomŋoyo waŋgu maɓasa ose anoitwa pasi pezuʋa, paŋguʋa kana mumŋe munhu anesimba pamsoro pomumŋe, acimuitira ɀakaipa.
Saiɀoɀo ndakaʋona wakaipa aciʋigwa, ʋanhu ʋakaʋuya kubgiro bgake; asi ʋakaŋga ʋaita ɀakarurama ʋakabva panɀimbo tȿene, ʋakakaŋganikwa muguta; naiɀoɀo haɀinamaturo.
Kutoŋgwa ɀakusiŋgakurumidzi kuʋuya pamsoro peɓasa rakaipa, mŋoyo yaʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu inotsuŋgirira kuita ɀakaipa.
Kunyaŋge mutadzi akaita ɀakaipa runezana, akaʋa namazuʋa mazhinji, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndinoziʋa ɀirokwaɀo kuti ʋanotya Mŋari, ʋanotya pamberi pake, ʋacagara ɀakanaka;
asi wakaipa haaŋgagari ɀakanaka, haaŋgaʋi namazuʋa mazhinji, ɀaakafanana nomumvuri; nokuti haatyi pamberi paMŋari.

Cinhu cisinamaturo ciri’po, cinoitwa panyika, ndico kuti ʋakarurama ʋari’ko ʋanoitirwa seɀinoitirwa maɓasa aʋakaipa, ʋuye ɀe ʋakaipa ʋari’ko ʋanoitirwa seɀinoitirwa maɓasa aʋakarurama; ndikati: Naiɀoɀi haɀinamaturo.
Ipapo ndakarumbidza mufaro, nokuti munhu haanecinhu cinopfuʋura ici, kuti adye, anwe, afare; kuti iɀoɀo ɀigare naye pakuɓata kwake mazuʋa
Ɀino ndakati ndiciraŋgarira nomŋoyo waŋgu kuti ndiziʋe ʋucenjeri nokuʋona kuɓata kunoitwa panyika (nokuti

ndikaʋona maɓasa ose aMŋari, kuti munhu haaŋganzwisisi maɓasa ose anoitwa pasi pezuʋa; nokuti kunyaŋge munhu akatambura hake kuti aɀinɀere, haaŋgaɀinzwisisi hake; ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge munhu, wakacenjera, aciti, ndinoɀiziʋa, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, haaŋgagoni kuɀinzwisisa.

Nokuti iɀoɀo ɀose ndakaɀiraŋgarira nomŋoyo waŋgu, kuti ndinzwisise iɀoɀi ɀose, kuti ʋakarurama naʋakacenjera ʋari paruʋoko rwaMŋari, pamŋe cete namaɓasa aʋo; kana kuri kuɗa kana kuʋeŋga, munhu haaɀiziʋi; ɀose ɀiri mberi kwaʋo.
Ɀose ɀinoenzanisirwa ʋose; cinhu cimŋe cinoitirwa wakarurama nowakaipa, wakanaka nowakacena nounetȿina, unoɓayira nousiŋgaɓayiri, wakanaka nomutadzi, unopika nounotya kupika.

Cinhu ici cakaipa pakati peɀose ɀinoitwa pasi pezuʋa, kuti cinhu cimŋe ciitirwe ʋose; ɀirokwaɀo ʋo, mŋoyo yaʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu izere neɀakaipa, ʋuye ʋupeŋgo ʋuri mumŋoyo yaʋo ʋaciri ʋapenyu; shure kwaiɀoɀo
Nokuti kana munhu aciri pakati paʋapenyu ʋose, ucinecinhu caaŋgatarira; nokuti imbga mhenyu inopfuʋura shumba yakafa.
Nokuti ʋapenyu ʋanoziʋa kuti ʋacazofa, asi ʋakafa haʋana‐caʋanoziʋa, kunyaŋge nomuɓairo haʋacina; nokuti haʋacaraŋgarirwi.
Ruɗo rwaʋo, nokuʋeŋga kwaʋo, negoɗo raʋo, ɀose ɀaŋguʋa ɀapera haɀo; haʋacinomugoʋe nokusiŋgaperi paɀose ɀinoitwa pasi pezuʋa.
Enda ɀako, udye ɀokudya ɀako nomufaro, unwe waini yako nomŋoyo wakafara; nokuti Mŋari watofadzwa namaɓasa ako.
Ŋguʋo dzako dzigare dzakacena; nomusoro wako urege kushaiwa mafuta.
Gara nomufaro nomukadzi wako, waunoɗa, mazuʋa ako ose asinamaturo, aakakupa pasi pezuʋa, mazuʋa ako ose asinamaturo; nokuti ndiwo mugoʋe wako paʋupenyu, ʋuye pakuɓata kwako kwaunoɓata pasi pezuʋa.
Ɀose ɀinowana ruʋoko rwako, kuti ruɀiite, uɀiite nesimba rako rose; nokuti hakuneɓasa, kana zano, kana ziʋo, kana ʋucenjeri paSheori kwaunoenda.

Ndakadzoka, ndikaʋona pasi pezuʋa, kuti unomhanyisa haazi iye unokunda, unesimba haazi iye unokunda pakurwa, wakacenjera haazi iye uneɀokudya, ʋanhu ʋanenjere haʋazi iʋo ʋanefuma, ʋanhu ʋanoʋumhizha haʋazi iʋo ʋanofarirwa; asi ʋanowirwa ʋose neŋguʋa neɀinoitika.
Nokuti nomunhu ʋo haaziʋi ŋguʋa yake; sehoʋe, dzinoɓatwa murutaʋa rwakaipa, kana shiri, dzinoɓatwa murugombe, saiɀoɀo ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu ʋanoteyiwa neŋguʋa yakaipa, kana yaʋawira kamŋe‐kamŋe.
Ndakaʋona ʋo pasi pezuʋa ʋucenjeri bgakaɗai, ndikati ʋukuru:
Kwakaŋga kuneguta ɗuku, maiʋa naʋarume ʋashoma; mumŋe mambo mukuru akarimukira, akarikomba, akariʋakira maȿiŋgo makuru okurwa nawo.
Ɀino mukati maro makawanikwa murombo wakaŋga akacenjera, iye akaponesa guta noʋucenjeri bgake; asi hakunomunhu wakaraŋgarira munhu uyo murombo.
Ipapo ndakati: Ʋucenjeri ʋunopfuʋura simba; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋucenjeri bgomurombo ʋunoshoʋorwa, namashoko ake haatererwi.
Mashoko aʋakacenjera, anonzwika kana kwakadzikama, anopfuʋura kuɗanidzira kwomunhu unoɓata ʋushe pakati pamapenzi.
Ʋucenjeri ʋunopfuʋura nhumbi dzokurwa; asi mutadzi mumŋe unoparadza ɀakanaka ɀizhinji.
Nhunzi dzakafa dzinonhuwisa nokuʋodza cizoro comuveŋganisi weɀinonhuwira;
Mŋoyo womunhu wakacenjera uri kurudyi rwake, asi mŋoyo weɓenzi uri kuruɓoshwe rwake.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kana ɓenzi ricifamba panzira, rinoshaiwa njere; rinoziʋisa ʋose kuti ndiri ɓenzi.
Kana kutsamŋa kwomuɓati kukakumukira, usabva panɀimbo yako; nokuti ʋunyoro ʋunonyaradza mhoȿa huru.
Cinhu cakaipa ciri’po candakaʋona pasi pezuʋa, kuri kutadza kunobva kuʋaɓati:
Ʋupenzi ʋunoiswa pakakwirira, asi ʋafumi ʋanogara pakaɗerera.
Ndakaʋona ʋaranda ʋakataȿa mabiza, namacinda acifamba pasi saʋaranda.
Unocera gomba, ucawira’mo amene; aninani unokoromora ruȿiŋgo, nyoka icamuruma.
Aninani unoputsa mabge, uŋgakuʋadzwa nawo; ʋuye unoɓanzura huni, uri panjodzi.
Kana simbi yakomara, munhu akasairodza, unofanira kunyanya kuɓata nesimba; asi ʋucenjeri ʋunoɓatsira pakururamisa.
Kana nyoka ikaruma isati yarapxa namazaŋgo, ŋaŋga haiɓatsiri.
Mashoko anobva mumuromo wowakacenjera, anofadza; asi miromo yeɓenzi inomumedza iye.
Kutaŋga kwamashoko omuromo waro ʋupenzi; nokuguma kwokutaura kwaro ʋupeŋgo bgakashata.
Ƃenzi rinowanza ʋo mashoko; asi munhu haaziʋi ɀicaʋa’po; ndiani uŋgamuziʋisa ɀicazoʋa’po shure kwake?
Kuɓata kwamapenzi kunonetsa mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo; nokuti haatoŋgoziʋi nzira yokuenda nayo kuguta.
Iwe nyika unenhamo, kana mambo wako ari mŋana, kana macinda ako aciita mutambo maŋgwanani.
Unomufaro, iwe nyika, kana mambo wako ari mŋanakomana waʋakakudzwa, kana macinda ako aciita mutambo paŋguʋa yakafanira, kuti asimbiswe, asiŋgaitiri kuɓatwa.
Noʋusimbe ɗeŋga reimba rinosakara; nokusaɓata kwamaʋoko imba inoɗonha.
Mutambo unoitirwa kuseka, ʋuye waini inofadza ʋupenyu; ɀose ɀiŋgawanikwa nemari.
Usatuka mambo, kunyaŋge pakufuŋga kwako; usatuka mufumi paimba yako yokuʋata; nokuti shiri yokuɗeŋga iŋgatakura inzwi, ʋuye iɀo ɀinamapapiro ɀiŋgaziʋisa shoko.
Kandira ɀokudya ɀako pamsoro pemvura, nokuti ucaɀiwana ɀe mazuʋa mazhinji apfuʋura.
Goʋerana naʋanomŋe, kunyaŋge naʋasere ʋo, nokuti hauziʋi ɀakaipa ɀakaɗini ɀiŋgaʋa panyika.
Kana makore azara nemvura, anoiɗururira panyika; ʋuye kana muti ukawira pasi kurutiʋi rwezasi, kana rwokumsoro, ipo panowira muti ndi’po paucaʋata.
Unogara acicerekedza mhepo haaŋgakushi; ʋuye unotarira makore, haaŋgaceki.
Seɀausiŋgaziʋi mufambire wemhepo, kana mukurire wamafupa muɗumbu romukadzi unemimba, saiɀoɀo ʋo hauziʋi ɓasa raMŋari, unoita ɀose.
Kusha mbeu dzako maŋgwanani, usabvisa ruʋoko rwako maɗekwana; nokuti hauziʋi kuti cicakura ndecipi, kana ici kana ico, kana ɀimŋe ɀiʋiri ɀose ɀicafanana pakunaka.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ciedza cakanaka, ʋuye meso anofara nokuʋona zuʋa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kana munhu akararama makore mazhinji, ŋgaafarire ose; asi ŋgaaraŋgarire mazuʋa erima, kuti acaʋa mazhinji; ɀose ɀinozoʋuya haɀinamaturo.
Fara hako, iwe jaya, paʋuɗuku bgako, mŋoyo wako ŋgaukufadze pamazuʋa oʋujaya bgako; famba nenzira dzomŋoyo wako, napakuʋona kwameso ako; asi uziʋe kuti Mŋari ucazokutoŋga pamsoro paiɀoɀo ɀose.
Dziŋga ɀinonetsa pamŋoyo pako, ubvise ɀakaipa panyama yako, nokuti ʋuɗuku noʋujaya haɀinamaturo.
Raŋgarira ʋo Musiki wako pamazuʋa oʋujaya bgako, mazuʋa akaipa asati aȿika, namakore asati aʋa’po, paŋguʋa yaucazoti: Handifariri iɀoɀo;
zuʋa neciedza, nomŋedzi, nenyeredzi ɀisati ɀaȿiɓiswa, makore acidzoka kana mvura yapfuʋura;
zuʋa iro, kana ʋatariri ʋeimba ʋaciɗeɗera, ʋarume ʋanesimba ʋacikotama, ʋakuyi ʋacirega ɓasa raʋo, nokuti ʋaʋa ʋashoma; naʋanotarira napamawindi ʋaȿiɓirwa;
mikoʋa icizarirwa inoɓuɗira kunzira dzomumusha, nenzwi rokukuya riciɗerera; kana acimuka nenzwi reshiri, naʋaimbi ʋose ʋasiŋganzwiki ɀakanaka.

Ɀirokwaɀo ʋacatya ɀakakwirira, neɀinotyisa ɀicanzi ɀiri panzira; muamanda ucatumbuka maruʋa, nemhashu icaɀikwekweredza, ʋuye kuɗa kwose kucapera; nokuti munhu unoenda kumusha wake usiŋgaperi, ʋacemi ʋacafamba‐famba panzira dzomumusha;
rwonzi rwesirveri rusati rwaɗamburwa, mbiya yendarama isati yaputswa, ciroŋgo cisati caputswa patsime, necicereso cinomonerwa cisati cavunikira pacituɓu,
guruʋa risati radzokera kuvu, seɀarakaŋga rakaita; ʋuye mŋeya usati wadzokera kunaMŋari wakaupa.
Ɀanzi noMuparidzi: Haɀinamaturo cose, ɀose haɀinamaturo!
Ɀino, Muparidzi ɀaakaŋga ari munhu wakacenjera, wakapfuʋura acidzidzisa ʋanhu ziʋo; wakaraŋgarira, nokunɀera, nokuroŋgedza ɀireʋo ɀizhinji.
Muparidzi wakatȿaka kuti awane mashoko anofadza, ʋuye ɀakanyorwa nomŋoyo wakarurama, ari mashoko eɀokwaɗi.
Mashoko aʋakacenjera akafanana neɀiɓayiso; sembambo dzakaroʋerwa kwaɀo, ndiɀo ɀakaita mashoko akaʋuŋganidzwa, akapiwa noMufudzi mumŋe cete.
Ʋuye ɀe, mŋanakomana waŋgu, unyeʋerwe; kuita buku zhinji hakuperi, ʋuye kudzidza kuzhinji kunonetsa muʋiri.
Ɀino shoko guru paɀose ɀatanzwa, heri: Itya Mŋari, uceŋgete mirairo yake; nokuti ndiɀo ɀakafanira ʋanhu ʋose.
Nokuti Mŋari ucatoŋga ɓasa rimŋe nerimŋe, pamŋe cete neɀose ɀakaʋanzika, kunyaŋge ɀakanaka, kunyaŋge ɀakaipa.
Rwiyo rukuru rwaSoromoni.
Ŋgaandiȿete nokuȿeta kwomuromo wake;
Nokuti ruɗo rwako rwakanaka kupfuʋura waini.
Ɀizoro ɀako ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka;
Zita rako rakaita samafuta akaɗururwa;
Saka mhandara dzinokuɗa.
Ndikweʋere
Mambo wakandiisa mudzimba dzake dzomukati;
Ticafara nokukufarira ɀikuru iwe;
Ticarumbidza ruɗo rwako kupfuʋura waini;
Ɀakarurama ɀaʋakakuɗa.
Ndakaȿiɓa, asi ndakanaka haŋgu,
Imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema,
Samatente eKedari,
Semiceka yakaremberedzwa yaSoromoni.
Musanditarira, ɀandakaȿiɓa,
Nokuti zuʋa rakandipisa.
Ʋanakomana ʋamai ʋaŋgu ʋakanditsamŋira,
Ʋakandiita murindi weminda yemizambiriŋga;
Ndiʋudze iwe, unoɗikanwa nomŋeya waŋgu,
Kuti unofudza
Kuti unorizorodza kupi masikati;
Nokuti ndicaitirei somunhu wakafukidzwa kumeso
Pakati pamapoka eshamŋari dzako?
Kana usiŋgaziʋi, iwe unopfuʋura ʋakadzi ʋose nokunaka,
Teʋera makwara amapoka,
Ufudze makwaiana ako kurutiʋi rwamatente aʋafudzi.
Ndakakufananidzira iwe, shamŋari yaŋgu,
Nebiza paŋgoro dzaFarao.
Matama ako akanaka pakati peɀirukwa
Mutsipa wako neɀibge ɀinokosha ɀakatuŋgirwa.
Ticakuitira ɀirukwa ɀendarama
Neɀuma ɀesirveri.
Ŋguʋa
Nardo yaŋgu yakaɓuɗisa kunhuwira kwayo.
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakaita kwandiri sehomboɗo yemura,
Inogara pakati pamazamu aŋgu.
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakaita kwandiri sesumbu ramaruʋa ehena,
Paminda yemizambiriŋga paEngedi.
Tarira, wakanaka, shamŋari yaŋgu;
Tarira, wakanaka;
Meso ako akafanana neenjiʋa.
Tarira, wakanaka, muɗiwa waŋgu,
ɀirokwaɀo, unofadza;
Ʋuʋato bgeɗu ndi’po paɓumhudza.
Matanda eimba yeɗu ndeemisidari,
Mbariro dzayo ndedzemisipresi.
Ndiri ruʋa reɓundo rokuSharoni,
Ndiri ruʋa rokumapani.
Seruʋa pakati peminzwa,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita muɗiwa waŋgu pakati paʋakunda.
Somuapuri pakati pemiti yokuɗondo,
Ndiɀo ɀakaita muɗiwa waŋgu pakati paʋanakomana.
Ndakagara mumumvuri wake nomufaro mukuru;
Ɀiɓereko ɀake ɀakaŋga ɀicinaka pamukanwa waŋgu.
Wakandiisa kuimba yomutambo;
Mureza wake pamsoro paŋgu rwakaŋga ruri ruɗo.
Nditsigirei namazambiriŋga akawomeswa, ndisimbisei namaapuri;
Nokuti ndinorwara noruɗo.
Ruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe ruri pasi pomusoro waŋgu;
Ruʋoko rwake rworudyi runondimbundikira.
Ndinokupikirai, imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema,
Nemharapara nenondo dzokuɓundo,
Kuti murege kupfutidza kana kumutsa ruɗo,
Kuȿikira irwo rwaɗa rumene.
Tarirai, woʋuya,
Acikwakuka pamakomo,
Acicirika paɀikomo.
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakafanana nemharapara kana nomŋana wenondo;
Tarirai, womira seri kworuȿiŋgo rweɗu;
Unotarira napamawindi;
Unoɗoŋgorera napaɀitanda ɀamawindi.
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakataura, akati kwandiri:
Simuka, shamŋari yaŋgu, wakanaka waŋgu, ʋuya!
Nokuti, tarira, cando caenda;
Mvura yapera, yaenda;
Maruʋa oʋonekwa panyika;
Ŋguʋa yokurira kweshiri yaȿika,
Nenzwi renjiʋa rinonzwika panyika yeɗu.
Muʋonde woibvisa maʋonde awo mambishi,
Ʋuye mizambiriŋga yotuŋga maruʋa;
Yoɓuɗisa kunhuwira kwawo;
Simuka, shamŋari yaŋgu, wakanaka waŋgu, ʋuya!
Iwe njiʋa yaŋgu, uri mumikaha yeɗombo,
Pakadzitika pamawere;
Ndiʋone ciso cako,
Ndinzwe inzwi rako;
Nokuti inzwi rako rakanaka, ciso cako cakanaka.
Tiɓatirei makaʋa, makaʋa maɗuku,
Anotadzira minda yemizambiriŋga;
Nokuti minda yeɗu yemizambiriŋga yotuŋga maruʋa.
Muɗiwa waŋgu ndowaŋgu, neni ndiri wake;
Unofudza
Kana zuʋa rotonhorera, nemimvuri yotiza,
Tendeʋuka, muɗiwa waŋgu, uʋe semharapara nomŋana wenondo
Pamsoro pamakomo eBeteri.
Ʋusiku, ndiri panhoʋo dzaŋgu,
Ndakamutȿaka unoɗikanwa nomŋeya waŋgu;
Ndakamutȿaka, asi handina‐kumuwana.
Panzira dzomumusha, napamaɗare
Ndi’po pandicatȿaka unoɗikanwa nomŋeya waŋgu;
Ndikamutȿaka, asi handina‐kumuwana.
Ʋarindi, ʋanofamba‐famba neguta,
ʋakandiwana;
Ndakati ndaŋgobva kwaʋari, ndapfuʋura ɀishoma,
Ndikamuwana iye unoɗikanwa nomŋeya waŋgu;
Ndikamuɓata, ndikaramba kumuregedza,
Kuȿikira ndamuisa mumba mamai ʋaŋgu,
Muimba yomukati yaiye wakandiɓereka.
Ndinokupikirai, imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema,
Nemharapara nenondo dzokuɓundo,
Kuti murege kupfutidza kana kumutsa ruɗo,
Kuȿikira irwo rwaɗa rumene.
Ndianiko uyo unokwira acibva kurenje
Seshoŋgwe dzoʋutsi,
Unonhuwira nemura neɀinonhuwira,
Neɀakakuyiwa ɀose ɀomuteŋgesi?
Tarirai, ndico cigaro caSoromoni cinotakurwa;
Mhare dzinamakumi matanhatu dzakacikomberedza,
Ʋanobva pamhare dzaʋaIsraeri.
Ʋose ʋanoziʋa kuɓata munondo,
ʋakadzidza kurwa;
Murume mumŋe nomumŋe unomunondo wake pahudyu yake,
Nokuɗa kweɀinotyisa ʋusiku.
Mambo Soromoni wakaɀiitira cigaro cinotakurwa
Camatanda eRebanoni.
Wakaita mbiru dzaco nesirveri,
Musana waco nendarama, pokugara kwaco nomuceka mutȿuku,
Mukati maco makaroŋgwa noruɗo
Rwaʋakunda ʋeJerusarema.
Ƃuɗai, imi ʋakunda ʋeZioni, muʋone mambo Soromoni,
Anekorona yaakadzikwa namai ʋake
Pazuʋa rokuwana kwake,
Napazuʋa romufaro womŋoyo wake.
Tarira, wakanaka sei, shamŋari yaŋgu; tarira, wakanaka sei!
Meso ako akafanana neenjiʋa pakutarira kwawo pakati pecifukidzo cako;
Vudzi rako rakafanana neɓoka rembudzi,
Dzinoɓurukira mujiŋga megomo reGireadi.
Meno ako akafanana neɓoka
Anobva pakushambga;
Rimŋe nerimŋe rawo rinaʋana ʋaʋiri,
Hakunerimŋe risinomŋana.
Miromo yako yakafanana norwonzi rwakatȿuka;
Kutaura kwako kwakanaka;
Ɀaʋoʋo ɀako ɀakafanana neɓande reɗamba
Pakutarira kwako pakati pecifukidzo cako.
Mutsipa wako wakafanana nenhare yaDavidi
Yakaʋakirwa nhumbi dzokurwa,
Makaturikwa nhoʋo dzinecuru cezana,
Dzose dziri nhoʋo dzemhare.
Mazamu ako maʋiri akafanana naʋana ʋemharapara,
Ʋari ʋana ʋakaɓerekwa ʋari ʋaʋiri,
Ʋanocera pakati pamaruʋa eɓundo.
Kana zuʋa rotonhorera, mimvuri yotiza,
Ndicaenda kugomo remura,
Nokucikomo ceɀinonhuwira.
Wakaiȿo‐naka, iwe shamŋari yaŋgu;
Hakunegwapa kwauri.
Hendei tose, iwe mŋeŋga
tibve paRebanoni,
Tibve paRebanoni tose;
Tarira uri pamusoro weAmana,
Pamisoro yeSeniri neHermoni,
Panɀimba dzeshumba,
Pamakomo eŋgwe.
Wanditorera mŋoyo waŋgu, hanɀadzi yaŋgu, mŋeŋga
Wanditorera mŋoyo waŋgu nokunditarira kamŋe nameso ako,
Necishoŋgo cimŋe comutsipa wako.
Ruɗo rwako rwakanaka sei, hanɀadzi yaŋgu, mŋeŋga waŋgu!
Ruɗo rwako runopfuʋura waini ɀikuru sei!
Nokunhuwira kweɀizoro ɀako miti yose inonhuwira!
Miromo yako, mŋeŋga
inoɗonha muȿi woʋuci;
Ʋuci nomukaka ɀiri pasi porurimi rwako;
Kunhuwira kweŋguʋo dzako kwakafanana nokunhuwira kweRebanoni.
Hanɀadzi yaŋgu, mŋeŋga
munda wakakomberedzwa,
Cituɓu cakapoteredzwa, tsime rakafunhirwa.
Mataʋi ako munda wamatamba,
uneɀiɓereko ɀakaiȿo‐naka;
Maruʋa ehena nenardo,
Nardo nesafroni,
Karmusi nekinamuni, nemiti yose inonhuwira;
Mura negaʋakaʋa, neɀose ɀinoiȿonhuwira.
Cituɓu cemvura mhenyu,
Nenzizi dzinoyerera dzicibva Rebanoni.
Muka, iwe mhepo yokumsoro;
ʋuya, iwe mhepo yezasi;
Furidzira pamunda waŋgu, kuti ɀinonhuwira ɀawo ɀiɓuɗire kunze.
Muɗiwa waŋgu ŋgaapinde mumunda make,
Ŋgaadye ɀiɓereko ɀake ɀakaiȿo‐naka.
Ndapinda mumunda maŋgu, hanɀadzi yaŋgu, mŋeŋga
Ndaʋuŋganidza mura yaŋgu neɀinonhuwira ɀaŋgu;
Ndadya muȿi woʋuci bgaŋgu noʋuci bgaŋgu;
Ndanwa waini yaŋgu nomukaka waŋgu.
Idyai, shamŋari
Inwai, ɀirokwaɀo, inwai ɀikuru,
ʋaɗiwa
Ndakaŋga ndiʋete, asi mŋoyo waŋgu wakaŋga wakaȿinura;
Inzwi romuɗiwa waŋgu, unogogodza,
Ndizarurire, hanɀadzi yaŋgu, muɗiwa waŋgu, njiʋa yaŋgu, wakakwana waŋgu;
Nokuti musoro waŋgu uzere neɗoʋa,
Vudzi raŋgu namaɗonhedza oʋusiku.
Ndabvisa ŋguʋo yaŋgu; ndiŋgaifuka sei?
Ndashambidza tsoka dzaŋgu; ndiŋgadziȿiɓisa sei?
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakapinza ruʋoko rwake napaʋuri
Mŋoyo waŋgu ukamushuʋa.
Ndakasimuka, ndiciti ndizarurire muɗiwa waŋgu;
Maʋoko aŋgu akaɗonha mura,
Neminwe yaŋgu mura inoyerera,
Paɀiɓato ɀecizarira.
Ndakazarurira muɗiwa waŋgu;
Asi muɗiwa waŋgu wakaŋga atendeʋuka, aenda.
Mŋeya waŋgu wakaŋga watorwa pakutaura kwake;
Ndakamutȿaka, asi handina‐kumuwana;
Ndikamuɗana, asi haana‐kundipindura.
Ʋarindi, ʋanofamba‐famba neguta,
ʋakandiwana;
Ʋakandiroʋa, ʋakandikuʋadza;
Ʋatariri ʋamaȿiŋgo ʋakanditorera jasi raŋgu.
Ndinokupikirai, imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema,
Kana mukawana muɗiwa waŋgu,
Mumuʋudze kuti ndinorwara noruɗo.
Ko muɗiwa wako unopfuʋura
Nhai, iwe, unopfuʋura ʋakadzi ʋose nokunaka?
Ko muɗiwa wako unopfuʋura
Ɀaunotipikira saiɀoɀo?
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakacena nokutȿuka,
Unozikanwa pakati pezana ramazana.
Musoro wake wakaita
Vudzi rake rakapetana, iɗema seguŋguʋu.
Meso ake akaita seenjiʋa pahoʋa dzemvura,
Dzakashambga nomukaka, seɀibge ɀakaroŋgedzwa ɀakanaka.
Matama ake akaita sendima yemiti inonhuwira,
Samatutu emiriʋo inonaka;
Miromo yake yakaita samaruʋa anoɗonha mura inoyerera.
Maʋoko ake akaita samapaŋgo endarama, akaiswa beriri;
Muʋiri wake wakaita senyaŋga dzenzou, dzakafukidzwa nesafiro.
Makumbo ake akaita sembiru dzamabge macena, dzakaiswa paɀigadziko ɀendarama yakaiȿo‐naka;
Kuʋonekwa kwake kwose kwakafanana neRebanoni, kwakaiȿo‐naka semisidari.
Muromo wake wakanaka kwaɀo;
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakaiȿo‐naka kwaɀo‐kwaɀo.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita muɗiwa waŋgu,
ndiɀo ɀakaita shamŋari yaŋgu,
Imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema.
Muɗiwa wako wakaendepiko,
Iwe, unopfuʋura ʋakadzi ʋose nokunaka?
Muɗiwa wako wakariŋgirepiko,
Kuti timutȿake pamŋe cete newe?
Muɗiwa waŋgu wakadzira kumunda wake,
Kundima dzemiti inonhuwira,
Kufudza
nokutanha maruʋa.
Ini ndiri womuɗiwa waŋgu, muɗiwa waŋgu ndowaŋgu;
Unofudza
Wakanaka, shamŋari yaŋgu, saTirza,
Wakanaka seJerusarema,
Unotyisa sehondo inemireza.
Usanditarira nameso ako,
Nokuti andikunda.
Vudzi rako rakafanana neɓoka rembudzi,
Dzinoɓurukira mujiŋga megomo reGireadi.
Meno ako akafanana neɓoka renhunɀi dzamakwai,
Dzinobva pakushambga;
Rimŋe nerimŋe radzo rinaʋana ʋaʋiri,
Hakunerimŋe risinomŋana.
Ɀaʋoʋo ɀako ɀakafanana neɓande reɗamba
Pakutarira kwako pakati pecifukidzo cako.
Ʋahosi ʋanamakumi matanhatu naʋaroŋgo ʋanamakumi masere ʋari’ko,
Nemhandara dzisiŋgaperi.
Njiʋa yaŋgu, wakakwana waŋgu,
ndiye mumŋe oga;
Ndiye mŋana mumŋe woga wamai ʋake;
Ndiye musanaŋgurwa wowakamuɓereka;
Ʋakunda ʋakamuʋona, ʋakati wakaropafadzwa;
Naʋahosi naʋaroŋgo, ʋakamurumbidza.
Ndianiko uyo unotarira samambakwedza,
Wakanaka somŋedzi,
Wakacena sezuʋa,
Unotyisa sehondo inemireza?
Ndakaɓurukira kumunda wenzuŋgu,
Kuti ndiʋone miti mitema mumupata,
Kuti ndiʋone kana muzambiriŋga wotuŋga,
Kana matamba otuŋga maruʋa.
Ndisati ndaɀiziʋa, mŋeya waŋgu wakandiisa
Pakati peŋgoro dzaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakarurama.
Dzoka, dzoka, Shuramiti;
Dzoka, dzoka, kuti tikutarire.
Munoɗa kutarira muShuramiti neiko,
Seɀamunotarira kutamba kweMahanaimi?
Tsoka dzako dzakanaka seiko mushaŋgu, iwe mukunda womucinda!
Hudyu dzako, dzakatendereka, dzakaita seɀishoŋgo,
Ƃasa ramaʋoko emhizha.
Guvu rako rakaita somukombe wakatendereka,
Musiŋgashaikwi waini yakaveŋganiswa;
Ciʋuno cako cakaita seɗutu reɀiyo
Rakakomberedzwa namaruʋa.
Mazamu ako maʋiri akafanana naʋana ʋemharapara,
Ʋana ʋakaɓerekwa ʋari ʋaʋiri.
Mutsipa wako wakaita seshoŋgwe yorunyaŋga rwenzou;
Meso ako samakuʋi paHeshboni,
Pasuʋo reBat‐rabimi;
Mhino dzako dzakafanana neshoŋgwe yeRebanoni
Yakatarisana neDamasko.
Musoro wako pamsoro pako wakafanana neKarmeri;
Nevudzi romusoro wako nomuceka mutȿuku;
Mambo wakasuŋgwa nevudzi rakapetana.
Wakanaka sei, unofadza sei,
Muɗiwa, pakati peɀinofadza.
Ʋumiro bgako bgakafanana nomucindwe,
Namazamu ako namasumbu
Ndakati: Ndicakwira mumucindwe,
Ndiɓate mataʋi awo;
Mazamu ako ŋgaaʋe samasumbu emizambiriŋga,
Nokunhuwira kwemhino dzako sokunhuwira kwamaapuri,
Nomuromo wako sewaini yakaiȿo‐naka,
Inotapira muɗikanwa waŋgu pakunwiwa kwayo,
Inoyerera pamiromo yaʋaʋete.
Ndini womuɗiwa waŋgu;
Kuɗa kwake kunondiʋiŋga.
Ʋuya muɗiwa waŋgu, ŋgatiɓuɗire kusaŋgo,
Ŋgatigare mumisha.
Ŋgatifumire kuminda yemizambiriŋga;
Tindoʋona kana muzambiriŋga watuŋga,
Kana maruʋa akura,
Kana matamba atuŋga maruʋa;
Ndipapo pandicakupa ruɗo rwaŋgu.
Madudayi anoɓuɗisa kunhuwira;
Pamikoʋa yeɗu paneɀinonaka ɀamarudzi ose, ɀitȿa neɀisharu,
Ɀandakakuceŋgetera, iwe muɗiwa waŋgu.
Haiwa, ɗai wakaŋga wakaita sehanɀadzi yaŋgu,
Wakamna mazamu amai ʋaŋgu!
Ƌai ndakuwana panze, ndiŋgaɗai ndakuȿeta;
Ɀirokwaɀo, hakuna‐waindishoʋora.
Ndaienda newe, ndikakuisa mumba mamai ʋaŋgu,
Iʋo ʋandidzidzise;
Ndaikupa waini yakaveŋganiswa neɀinonhuwira kuti uinwe,
Nomukumbi wamatamba aŋgu.
Ruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe ŋgaruʋe pasi pomusoro waŋgu,
Ruʋoko rwake rworudyi ŋgarundimbundikire.
Ndinokupikirai, imi ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema,
Kuti murege kupfutidza kana kumutsa ruɗo,
Kuȿikira irwo rwaɗa rumene.
Ndianiko uyo unokwira acibva kurenje,
Akasendamira pamuɗiwa wake?
Pasi pomuapuri ndi’po pandakakumutsa;
Ndi’po pakakutamburira mai ʋako,
Ndi’po paʋakakutamburira, iʋo ʋakakuɓereka.
Ndishoŋge secisimbiso pamŋoyo pako,
Secisimbiso paruʋoko rwako;
Nokuti ruɗo runesimba sorufu;
Goɗo rinokuʋadza seSheori;
Kupisa kwaro ndiko kupisa kwomŋoto,
Muraɀo caiwo waJehova.
Mvura zhinji haigoni kudzima ruɗo;
Nzizi hadziŋgaruɓitirisi;
Kunyaŋge munhu akapa fuma yose yeimba yake kuti awane ruɗo,
Uŋgaɀidzwa cose.
Tinecinuŋuna,
Cigere kuʋa namazamu;
Ticaɗiniko necinuŋuna ceɗu
Nezuʋa raacakumbirwa?
Kana ari ruȿiŋgo,
Ticaʋaka pamsoro pake kashoŋgwe kwesirveri;
Kana ari mukoʋa,
Ticamukomberedza namapuraŋga emisidari.
Ini ndaiʋa ruȿiŋgo, mazamu aŋgu akaita shoŋgwe
Paŋguʋa iyo ndakaʋa pamberi pake somunhu wakawana rugare.
Soromoni wakaŋga anomunda wemizambiriŋga paBaari‐hamoni;
Wakaisa munda uyo kuʋatariri;
Mumŋe nomumŋe waifanira kumuʋigira masirveri anegumi ramazana pamsoro peɀiɓereko ɀawo.
Munda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga,
iwo waŋgu, uri pamberi paŋgu;
Iwe Soromoni, ucapiwa gumi ramazana,
Naʋanoceŋgeta ɀiɓereko ɀawo ʋacapiwa mazana maʋiri.
Iwe, unogara muminda,
Shamŋari
Nditendere ini ndirinzwe ʋo.
Kurumidza, muɗiwa waŋgu,
Uʋe semharapara kana mŋana wenondo
Pamsoro pamakomo eɀinonhuwira.
Ɀakaʋonekwa naIsaya, mŋanakomana waAmozi, ɀaakaʋona pamsoro paJuda neJerusarema, pamazuʋa aUziya, naJotami, naAhazi, naHezekiya, madzimambo aʋaJuda.
Inzwa ɗeŋga rose, terera iwe nyika, nokuti Jehova wakataura,
Nzombe inoziʋa mŋene wayo, nemboŋgoro inoziʋa cidyiro caʋatenzi ʋayo;
Haiwa, rudzi runotadza, ʋanhu ʋakaremerwa neɀakaipa, ʋana ʋaʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa, ʋana ʋanoita ɀakaʋora! Ʋakasiya Jehova, ʋakashoʋora Mutȿene waIsraeri, ʋadzokera shure.
Munoɗa kugara muciroʋerweiko, ɀamunoŋgoramba mucimukira
Kubvira parutsoka kuȿikira kumusoro hapanapakukutu pauri;
Nyika yenyu yaparadzwa, maguta enyu apiswa nomŋoto, nyika yenyu yopedzwa naʋatorwa imi muri’po, yaparadzwa, seɀinoparadza ʋatorwa.
Mukunda weZioni wasiyiwa seɗumba mumunda wemizambiriŋga, secirindo mumunda wamagaka, seguta rakakombga nehondo.
Ƌai Jehova wehondo asina‐kutisiyira ʋakasara ʋashoma‐shoma, tiŋgaɗai takafanana neSodoma, takaita seGomora.
Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋaɓati ʋeSodoma; tererai murairo waMŋari weɗu, imi ʋanhu ʋeGomora.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀiɓayiro ɀenyu ɀizhinji ɀinondiɓatsirei? Ndagutisa ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa ɀamakondobge, namafuta eɀipfuwo ɀakakodzwa; handifadzwi neropa renzombe, kana ramakwaiana, kana renhoŋgo.
Kana muciʋuya kuzondiʋona, ndianiko unoreʋa iɀoɀo pamaʋoko enyu, kuti mutsike maʋazhe aŋgu?
Musazoʋuya ɀe neɀipo ɀisinamaturo; ɀinonhuwira ɀinondinyaŋgadza;
dzenyu dzokugara kwomŋedzi nemitambo yenyu ɀinoʋeŋgwa nomŋeya waŋgu; ɀinondinetsa; ndaneta nokutambudzika naɀo.
Kana mucitambanudza maʋoko enyu, ndicakuʋanzirai ciso caŋgu; ɀirokwaɀo, kana muciwanza minyeŋgetero, handiŋganzwi; maʋoko enyu azere neropa.
Shambai, muɀinatse; bvisai ɀakaipa ɀamaɓasa enyu pamberi paŋgu; regai kuramba muciita ɀakaipa;
dzidzai kuita ɀakanaka; tȿakai kururamisira, ɓatsirai ʋanomanikidzwa, ruramisirai nherera, mureʋerere cirikadzi.
Ciʋuyai ɀino, titaurirane, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; kunyaŋge ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀikaita so
Kana muciɗa, muciterera, mucadya ɀakanaka ɀenyika;
asi kana muciramba, mucindimukira, mucaparadzwa nomunondo; nokuti muromo waJehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Haiwa, guta rakatendeka rashanduka cifeʋe sei! Iro rakaŋga rizere nokururamisa! Kururama kwaigara mariri, asi ɀino
Sirveri yako aʋa marara, waini yako yakaveŋganiswa nemvura.
Macinda ako akamukira
Saka ɀanzi naShe, Jehova wehondo, iye Wamasimba waʋaIsraeri: Ndicapedza shuŋgu dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋadziʋisi ʋaŋgu, ndicaɀitsiʋira pamsoro paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu;
ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kwauri, ndinatse cose marara ako, ndicabvisa tini yako.
Ndicadzosera ʋatoŋgi ʋako ʋaʋe sapakutaŋga, namakota ako sapakutaŋga; shure kwaiɀoɀo ucanzi Guta rokururama, musha wakatendeka.
Zioni ricadzikinurwa nokururamiswa, naʋanodzoka mariri nokururama.
Asi ʋaɗariki naʋatadzi ʋacaparadzwa pamŋe cete, ʋanosiya Jehova ʋacapedzwa.
Nokuti ʋacanyadziswa pamsoro pemiti yemiouki yamaifarira, mucaʋa nenyadzi pamsoro peminda yamakasanaŋgura.
Nokuti mucaʋa somuouki waȿaʋa mashizha, ʋuye somunda usinemvura.
Unesimba ucaʋa sorwonzi, neɓasa rake sesasaradzi dzomŋoto; ɀose ɀiʋiri ɀicatȿa pamŋe cete, hakunauŋgaɀidzimura.
Shoko rakaʋonekwa naIsaya, mŋanakomana waAmozi, pamsoro paJuda neJerusarema.
Pamazuʋa okupedzisira ɀicaitika kuti gomo reimba yaJehova ricasimbiswa pamsoro pamakomo, ricakwiridzwa kupfuʋura ɀikomo; marudzi ose acamhanyira kwariri.

Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋacaenda’ko ʋaciti: Ʋuyai, ŋgatikwire kugomo raJehova, kuimba yaMŋari waJakobo; iye ucatidzidzisa nzira dzake, ticafamba mumakwara ake; nokuti murairo ucabva paZioni, shoko raJehova ricabva Jerusarema.

Iye ucatoŋga pakati pamarudzi, nokururamisira ʋanhu ʋazhinji; ʋacapfura minondo yaʋo ʋaciiita mapadza, namapfumo aʋo ʋaciaita mapaŋga okucekerera miti; rumŋe rudzi haruŋgazosimudziri rumŋe rudzi munondo, haʋaŋgazodzidzi kurwa.
Iwe imba yaJakobo, ʋuyai tifambe muciedza caJehova.
Nokuti imi
Nyika yaʋo izere nesirveri nendarama, fuma yaʋo haiperi; nyika yaʋo izere ʋo namabiza, neŋgoro dzaʋo dzokurwa hadziperi.
Nyika yaʋo izere ʋo neɀifananidzo; ʋanonamata ɀakaitwa namaʋoko aʋo, iɀo ɀakaitwa neminwe yaʋo.
Ʋanhu ʋaɗuku ʋakakotamiswa, naʋakuru ʋakaninipiswa; saka musaʋakaŋganwira.
Pinda muɗombo, uʋande muguruʋa, nokuɗa kwaJehova unotyisa, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokubginya kwoʋumambo bgake.
Kuɀikudza kwaʋanhu kucaɗeredzwa, namanyawi aʋanhu acaninipiswa, Jehova oga ucakudzwa nezuʋa iro.
Nokuti Jehova wehondo unezuʋa rake pamsoro paʋose ʋanoɗaɗa naʋanoɀikudza, naʋanamanyawi; ʋacaɗeredzwa;
napamsoro pemisidari yose yeRebanoni yakareɓa yakakwirira; napamsoro pemiouki yose yeBashani,
napamsoro pamakomo ose marefu, napamsoro peɀikomo ɀose ɀakakwirira,
napamsoro peshoŋgwe dzose refu, napamsoro pamaȿiŋgo ose akasimbiswa,
napamsoro peɀikepe ɀose ɀeTarshishi, napamsoro peɀifananidzo ɀose ɀinofadza.
Ʋukuru bgaʋanhu ʋucakotamiswa, nokuɀikudza kwaʋanhu kucaɗeredzwa; Jehova oga ucakudzwa nezuʋa iro.
Ɀifananidzo ɀicapera cose.
Ʋanhu ʋacapinda mumapako amatombo, nomumakomba muvu, nokuɗa kwaJehova unotyisa, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokubginya kwoʋumambo bgake, kana acisimuka kuzunuŋgusa nyika nesimba.
Nezuʋa iro ʋanhu ʋacarasha ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀesirveri neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀendarama, ɀaʋakaɀiitira kuti ʋaɀinamate, ʋaciɀiisa kunhukusa neɀiremŋaremŋa;
ʋapinde mumapako amatombo, nomumikaha yamatombo makuru, nokuɗa kwaJehova unotyisa, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokubginya kwoʋumambo bgake, kana acisimuka kuzunuŋgusa nyika nesimba.
Regai munhu, unokufema mumhino dzake; nokuti unoɓatsireiko?
Nokuti tarirai, Ishe, Jehova wehondo unotorera Jerusarema naJuda mutsigiro nomuɗonɀo, mutsigiro wose weɀokudya, nomutsigiro wose wemvura;
munhu wemhare, nomunhu wehondo; mutoŋgi, nomuprofita, nomuʋuki, nomukuru;
mukuru wamakumi mashanu, nounokudzwa, namakota, nemhizha dzakacenjera, nomuʋuki unoziʋa.
Ndicaʋapa ʋanana aʋe macinda aʋo, ʋacaɓatwa naʋacece.
Ʋanhu ʋacamanikidzwa, mumŋe acimanikidza mumŋe, nomumŋe nomumŋe nowokwake; mŋana ucaʋa namanyawi kunaʋakuru, nowakaɀidzwa kunounokudzwa.
Musi uyo munhu ucaɓata munuŋuna wake mumba maɓaɓa ʋake,
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ucaɗanidzira, aciti: Handiɗi kuʋa ŋaŋga, nokuti mumba maŋgu hamuneɀokudya neɀokufuka; musandiita mutoŋgi waʋanhu.
Nokuti Jerusarema raparadzwa, Juda wawa; nokuti marimi aʋo namaɓasa aʋo anopesana naJehova, kutsamŋisa meso ake anokubginya.
Ɀinoʋonekwa paɀiso ɀaʋo ɀinoʋapupurira; ɀiʋi ɀaʋo ʋanoɀiɓuɗisa pacena seSodoma; haʋaɀiʋanzi. Mŋeya yaʋo inenhamo, nokuti ʋakaɀiitira ɀakaipa.
Iti pamsoro powakarurama, kuti ucaʋa nomufaro; nokuti ʋacadya ɀiɓereko ɀamaɓasa aʋo.
Wakaipa unenhamo! iye haaŋgaʋi nomufaro, nokuti ucapiwa muɓairo wamaʋoko ake.
Kana ʋari ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋana ndiʋo ʋamanikidzi ʋaʋo, ʋakadzi ʋanoʋaɓata ʋushe. Haiwa, ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋenyu ʋanokutadzisai, ndiʋo ʋanoparadza nzira dzamaifanira kufamba nadzo.
Jehova wasimuka kutamba mhaka; umire kuti atoŋge ʋanhu.
Jehova ucatoŋga ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋake namacinda aʋo,
Munoiteiko ɀamunopxanya ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, mucikuya ɀiso ɀaʋarombo? Ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe, Jehova wehondo.
Ʋuye ɀe Jehova wakati: Ʋakunda ʋeZioni ɀaʋanamanyawi, ʋacifamba nemitsipa yakati tasa, ʋaciita meso‐meso, ʋacifamba ʋacinzenzeta, ɀiri pamakumbo aʋo ɀiciti ŋgwereŋgwere,
naiɀoɀo Ishe ucaroʋa nhoŋgonya dzemisoro yaʋakunda ʋaZioni negwenu‐kwenu; Jehova ucafukura miʋiri yaʋo.
Nezuʋa iro Ishe ucabvisa ʋukomba bgamakumbo aʋo, neɀizuʋa neɀimŋedzi;
neɀinoremberedzwa, noʋuketani bgamaʋoko, neɀifukidzo;
neɀishoŋgo ɀomusoro, noʋuketani bgamakumbo, neɀisuŋgo, neɀitende ɀeɀinonhuwira, namazaŋgo;
neɀimhete, noʋukomba bgemhino;
neŋguʋo dzomutambo, neɀijasi, neɀijari, neɀikwama;
neɀiʋoni‐ʋoni ɀamaʋoko, nomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, nemiceka yomusoro, neɀifukidzo ɀameso.
Ɀino ɀicaitika kuti panɀimbo yeɀinonhuwira pacaʋa neɀinonhuwa; panɀimbo yebanire pacaʋa norwonzi; panɀimbo yevudzi rakarukwa ɀakanaka,
Ʋarume ʋenyu ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo, nemhare dzenyu pakurwa.
Masuʋo aro acacema nokurira; ricaitwa ɗoŋgo ndokugara pasi.
Nezuʋa iro ʋakadzi ʋanomŋe ʋacaɓata murume mumŋe, ʋaciti: Ticadya ɀokudya ɀeɗu, ticafuka ɀokufuka ɀeɗu; tinoŋgoɗa kuɗanwa zita rako ɓedzi; bvisa kunyadzwa kweɗu.
Nezuʋa iro ɓukira raJehova ricanaka nokubginya, ʋuye ɀiɓereko ɀenyika ɀicaʋa ɀakaiȿo‐naka neɀinorumbidzwa kunaʋakapukunyuka ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋakasiyiwa paZioni, naʋakasara paJerusarema, iʋo ʋacanzi ʋatȿene, aninani wakanyorwa pakati paʋapenyu muJerusarema;
kana Ishe ashambidza tȿina yaʋakunda ʋeZioni, anatsa ropa reJerusarema

Ɀino Jehova ucasika pamsoro peimba imŋe neimŋe pagomo reZioni, napamsoro peʋuŋgano dzaro, gore noʋutsi masikati, nokupenya kwomŋoto unopfuta ʋusiku; nokuti pacaʋa necitaʋiridzo pamsoro pokubginya kwose.
Kucaʋa’po netente,
Ŋgandiimbire muɗiwa waŋgu rwiyo rwomuɗiwa waŋgu pamsoro pomunda wake wemizambiriŋga. Muɗiwa waŋgu waiʋa nomunda wemizambiriŋga pacikomo cakaʋorera;

akautimba, akabvisa mabge awo ose, akasima’mo mizambiriŋga yakaiȿo‐naka, akaʋaka shoŋgwe mukati mawo, ndokucera ʋo ciȿiniro mukati mawo; ɀino wakatarira kuti uɓereke mazambiriŋga, asi wakaɓereka mazambiriŋga eɓundo.
Ɀino imi ʋagere Jerusarema naʋarume ʋaJuda, ndinokumbira kuti mutoŋge pakati paŋgu nomunda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga.
Cinyiko caifanira kuitirwa munda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga, candisina‐kuuitira? Ɀino ndicitarira kuti ucaɓereka mazambiriŋga, wakagoɓerekerei mazambiriŋga eɓundo?
Ɀino ndicakuʋudzai ɀandicaitira munda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga: Ndicabvisa ruzhowa rwawo, udyiwe; ndicaputsa ruȿiŋgo rwawo, utsikwe;
ndicauparadza; hauŋgaraŋgurwi, kana kurimŋa; asi ucamera minzwa norukato; ndicaraira makore, kuti arege kunisa mvura pamsoro pawo.
Nokuti munda wemizambiriŋga waJehova wehondo ndiyo imba yaIsraeri, ʋarume ʋaJuda muti wake unomufadza; ɀino wakatȿaka
Ʋanenhamo ʋanowedzera dzimba nedzimba, ʋanoɓatanidza minda neminda, kuȿikira pasisinenɀimbo, kuȿikira imi mogara muri moga panyika.
Jehova wehondo
Nokuti maekere anegumi emizambiriŋga acaɓereka bati
Ʋanenhamo ʋanomuka maŋgwanani kundotȿaka ɗoro rinoɓata, ʋanoswerera kuȿikira ʋusiku, kuȿikira ʋapeŋgeswa naro.
Ruɗimbga, nembira, neŋgoma, nenyere, newaini ɀiri’po pamitambo yaʋo; asi haʋanehanya neɓasa raJehova, haʋaraŋgariri ɀakaitwa namaʋoko ake.
Saka ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakatapxa nokushaiwa ziʋo; ʋakakudzwa pakati paʋo ʋanoziya nenzara, ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋanofa nenyota.
Saka Sheori rakawedzera kukara kwaro nokushamisa muromo waro ɀikuru; ʋakakudzwa ʋaʋo, naʋazhinji ʋaʋo, naʋanoɀikudza ʋaʋo, nounofara pakati paʋo, ʋanoɓurukira’mo.
Ʋanhu ʋaɗuku ʋakakotamiswa, naʋakuru ʋakaninipiswa, nameso aʋanoɀikudza akaninipiswa.
Asi Jehova wehondo ucakudzwa pakutoŋga kwakarurama, naMŋari iye Mutȿene ucaʋonekwa ari mutȿene nokururama
Ipapo makwaiana acafura saaneŋge ari pamafuro awo, ʋanodzuŋgaira ʋacadya makura aʋafumi.
Ʋanenhamo ʋanokweʋa ɀakaipa norwonzi rwenhema, neɀiʋi seɀineŋge namabote eŋgoro;
ʋanoti: Ŋgaakurumidze, ŋgaacimbidzike neɓasa rake, kuti tiɀiʋone; ɀakafuŋgwa noMutȿene waʋaIsraeri ŋgaɀisweɗere, kuti tiɀiziʋe.

Ʋanenhamo ʋanoti ɀakaipa ndiɀo ɀakanaka, ʋuye ɀakanaka kuti ndiɀo ɀakaipa, ʋanoisa rima panɀimbo yeciedza, neciedza panɀimbo yerima; ʋanoisa ɀinoʋaʋa panɀimbo yeɀinotapira, neɀinotapira panɀimbo yeɀinoʋaʋa.
Ʋanenhamo ʋanoɀiti takacenjera, ʋanoti pakufuŋga kwaʋo tinenjere.
Ʋanenhamo ʋakaita mhare pakunwa waini, naʋarume ʋanesimba pakuveŋganisa ɀinoɓata;
ʋanoti wakaipa haanemhoȿa nokuɗa kwefufuro, ʋanotorera wakarurama kururama kwake.

Naiɀoɀo muraɀo womŋoto seɀaunopedza windi, ʋuye ʋuswa bgakawoma seɀaʋunoŋgoperera mumuraɀo, saiɀoɀo mudzi waʋo ucaʋora, ruʋa raʋo ricatorwa kumsoro seguruʋa; nokuti ʋakaramba murairo waJehova wehondo, nokushoʋora shoko roMutȿene waIsraeri.

Saka kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakamukira ʋanhu ʋake, akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake kwaʋari, akaʋaroʋa; makomo anoɗeɗera, mitumbu yaʋo yafanana namarara pakati penzira dzomumusha. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, kutsamŋa kwake hakuna‐kudzorwa, asi ruʋoko rwake rwakaramba rwakatambanudzwa naɀino.
Ucasimudzira marudzi anobva kure mureza, nokuʋaridzira muridzo iʋo ʋari kumigumo yenyika; tarirai, ʋacakurumidza kuʋuya ʋacicimbidzika.
Hapana‐ucaneta kana kugumburwa pakati paʋo; hakunaucakotsira kana kuʋata; banhire reɀiʋuno ɀaʋo hariŋgasunuŋgurwi, rukanda rweshaŋgu dzaʋo haruŋgaɗambuki.
Miseʋe yaʋo inopinza, ʋuta bgaʋo bgose bgakakuŋgwa; mahwanda amabiza aʋo acaita somusara‐sara, namakumbo eŋgoro dzaʋo secampupuri;
kuʋomba kwaʋo kucaita sokwehadzi yeshumba, ʋacaʋomba saʋana ʋeshumba; ɀirokwaɀo ʋacaʋomba, ʋacaɓata mhuka yaʋo, ndokuenda nayo, hapanauŋgairwira.
Nezuʋa iro ʋacaʋaʋombera sokutinhira kweguŋgwa; kana munhu akatarira nyika, ucaʋona rima nokutambudzika; ciedza cicaȿiɓiswa namakore ayo.
Pagore rokufa kwamambo Uziya, ndakaʋona Ishe agere pacigaro coʋushe, cirefu cakakwirira, mipendero yeŋguʋo dzake icizadza tembere.
Kumsoro kwake kwakaŋga kumire serafimi; imŋe neimŋe yakaŋga inamapapiro matanhatu; namaʋiri yakafukidza ciso cayo, namaʋiri yakafukidza makumbo ayo, namaʋiri yakaŋga icibururuka nawo.
Imŋe yakaɗanidzira kuneimŋe, iciti: Mutȿene, mutȿene, mutȿene, iye Jehova wehondo; nyika yose izere nokubginya kwake.
Nheyo dzeɀikumbaridzo dzikazunuŋguka nenzwi rowakaŋga aciɗana, imba ikazadzwa noʋutsi.
Ipapo ndikati: Ndinenhamo! nokuti ndoparara, nokuti ndiri munhu wemiromo inetȿina, ndigere pakati paʋanhu ʋemiromo inetȿina; nokuti meso aŋgu akaʋona Mambo, Jehova wehondo.
Ipapo imŋe serafimi yakabururukira kwandiri, yakaɓata zimbe rinopfuta muruʋoko rwayo, rayakaŋga yatora nembato paartari;
ikagumura muromo waŋgu naro, ikati: Tarira, zimbe iri ragumura miromo yako, ɀakaipa ɀako ɀabviswa, ziʋi ɀako ɀadzikinurwa.
Ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi raShe riciti: Ndiŋgatuma aniko? Ndiani uŋgatiendira? Ipapo ndakati: Ndiri pano ini, nditumei.
Iye akati: Enda, unondoʋudza ʋanhu aʋa, uti: Rambai henyu mucinzwa, asi musanzwisisa, rambai henyu muciʋona, asi musaʋonesesa.
Kodzai mŋoyo yaʋanhu aʋa, remedzai nzeʋe dzaʋo, tsinzinisai meso aʋo, kuti ʋarege kuʋona nameso aʋo, kana kunzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo, kana kunzwisisa nemŋoyo yaʋo, ʋadzoke ʋapodzwe.
Ɀino ndikati: Ishe kuȿikira riniko? Akapindura,
Jehova abvisira ʋanhu kure, nenɀimbo, dzashanduka matoŋgo, dzaʋa zhinji panyika.
Kana kuciŋge kwasara mukati mayo cegumi, naico ʋo cicadyiwa ɀe; seɀakaita muterebinti nomuouki wasiyirwa hunde kana watemŋa, saiɀoɀo rudzi rutȿene ndiyo hunde yawo.

Ɀino pamazuʋa aAhazi, mŋanakomana waJotami, mŋanakomana waUziya, mambo waJuda, Rezini mambo weSiria, naPeka, mŋanakomana waRemaria, mambo waIsraeri, ʋakaenda kundorwa neJerusarema, asi ʋakakoniwa kurikunda.
Ɀino ʋakaʋudza imba yaDavidi, ʋaciti: ƲaSiria ʋaʋa pakati paʋaEfraimi. Mŋoyo wake nemŋoyo yaʋanhu ʋake ikazunuŋguswa sokuzunuŋguswa kwemiti muɗondo nemhepo.
Ɀino Jehova akati kunaIsaya: Enda ɀino undosoŋgana naAhazi, iwe naSheari‐jashubi, mŋanakomana wako, panoguma rukoroŋga rwedziʋa rokumsoro, panzira huru inoenda kumunda womusuki weŋguʋo;
undoti kwaari: Cenjera, unyarare hako; usatya, nomŋoyo wako urege kupera nokuɗa kwamatsiga awa maʋiri anopfuŋgaira, nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kukuru kwaRezini nokwaʋaSiria, nokwomŋanakomana waRemaria.
Nokuti ʋaSiria naʋaEfraimi, nomŋanakomana waRemaria ʋakaraŋgana kukuitira ɀakaipa, ʋaciti:
Hendei tindorwa naʋaJuda, tiʋatyise, tiʋakunde, tigadze mambo pakati paʋo, iye mŋanakomana waTabeeri.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iɀoɀi haɀiŋgamiri, ʋuye haɀiŋgaitiki.
Nokuti musoro weSiria ndiDamasko, nomusoro weDamasko ndiRezini; makore makumi matanhatu namashanu asati apera, ʋaEfraimi ʋacaputswa‐putswa, kuti ʋarege kuʋa rudzi;
musoro waʋaEfraimi ndiSamaria, nomusoro weSamaria ndimŋanakomana waRemaria. Kana musiŋgaɗi kutenda, ɀirokwaɀo hamuŋgasimbiswi.
Ɀino Jehova wakataura ɀe naAhazi, aciti:
Kumbira ciratidzo kunaJehova Mŋari wako; ucikumbire kunyaŋge pasi pakadzika, kana kumsoro kwakakwirira.
Asi Ahazi wakati: Handiŋgakumbiri, ʋuye handiŋgaidzi Jehova.
Akati: Cinzwai ɀino, imi imba yaDavidi: Cinhu ciɗuku kwamuri kuti munetse ʋanhu, ɀino moɗo‐kunetsa Mŋari waŋgu ʋo here?
Naiɀoɀo Ishe amene ucakupai ciratidzo: Tarirai, mhandara icaʋa nemimba, icaɓereka mŋanakomana, ndokumutumidza Imanueri.
Ucadya ruʋomba noʋuci, paŋguʋa yaanoziʋa kuramba ɀakaipa, nokusanaŋgura ɀakanaka.
Nokuti mŋana asati aziʋa kuramba ɀakaipa nokusanaŋgura ɀakanaka, nyika iyo yaunotya madzimambo ayo maʋiri, icashanduka ɗoŋgo.
Jehova ucaʋuyisa pamsoro pako, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋako, napamsoro peimba yaɓaɓa ʋako, mazuʋa asinakumboʋa’po, kubvira pazuʋa rakaparadzana ʋaEfraimi naʋaJuda —
Ɀino nezuʋa iro Jehova ucaridzira muridzo nhunzi dziri pamigumo yenzizi dzeEgipita, nenyuci dziri panyika yeAsiriya.
Dzicaʋuya, dzicamhara dzose mumipata inamawere, nomumikaha yamatombo, napamsoro peminzwa yose, napamsoro pamafuro ose.
Nezuʋa iro Ishe ucaʋeʋura neciȿo cakakumbirwa mhiri kwoRwizi,
Ɀino nezuʋa iro munhu ucapfuwa mhou imŋe ɗuku namakwai maʋiri;
ɀino nokuɗa kwomukaka muzhinji wadzicamupa, ucadya ruʋomba; nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakasiyiwa panyika iyo ucadya ruʋomba noʋuci.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro nɀimbo imŋe neimŋe paiʋa nemiti yemizambiriŋga inecuru cimŋe, yaiteŋgwa namasirveri anecuru cimŋe, icaʋa norukato neminzwa.
Ʋacaenda’ko nemiseʋe noʋuta, nokuti nyika yose icamera rukato neminzwa.
Hakuna‐uŋgaȿika paɀikomo ɀose ɀairimŋa namapadza nokutya rukato neminzwa; asi ŋombe dzicasundirwa’ko, namakwai acatsika’po.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Tora hwendefa guru, unyore pariri nepeni yaʋanhu,
Ndicatora ɀapupu ɀakatendeka,
Ipapo ndakaenda kumuprofitakadzi, iye akatora mimba, akaɓereka mŋanakomana. Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Mutumidze zita rokuti: Cimbidzikai kutapa, ɀakapambga ɀokurumidza.
Nokuti mŋana asati aziʋa kuti, Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, kana Mai ʋaŋgu, fuma yeDamasko neɀakapambga ɀeSamaria ɀicaiswa pamberi pamambo weAsiria.
Ɀino Jehova akataura ɀe kwandiri, aciti:
Ʋanhu aʋa ɀaʋakaramba mvura yeShiroa, inonatsa kuyerera, ʋacifarira Rezini nomŋanakomana waRemaria;
saka ɀino, tarirai, Ishe ucaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo mvura zhinji yoRwizi, inesimba yakawanda,
rucakukura kuȿikira kwaJuda; rucapafuma, ndokupfuʋura, rucaȿika pamutsipa; kutandaʋara kwamapapiro arwo kucazadza kufara kwenyika yako yose, iwe Imanueri.
Itai ɓope, imi ndudzi, muputswe‐putswe; nemi mose muri kunyika dziri kure, inzwai; ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno, muputswe‐putswe, ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno, muputswe‐putswe.
Raŋganai henyu, asi ɀicakona; taurai shoko, asi hariŋgamiri; nokuti Mŋari unesu.
Nokuti Jehova wakataura saiɀoɀo neni noruʋoko runesimba, akandiraira kuti ndirege kufamba nezira yaʋanhu aʋa, aciti:
Musati: Iraŋgano, pamsoro peɀose ɀinonzi naʋanhu aʋa, iraŋgano; ʋuye musatya ɀaʋanotya, kana kuvunduka.
Jehova wehondo, ndiye wamunofanira kuti mutȿene; mumutye iye, mumuvunduke iye.
Ipapo iye ucaʋa nɀimbo tȿene
Ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋacagumburwa naro, ʋacawa, nokuputswa, nokuteyiwa, nokuɓatwa.
Suŋga cipupuriro, namatidza murairo necisimbiso pakati paʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu.
Ndicamirira Jehova, unoʋanzira imba yaJakobo ciso cake, ndicamutȿaka.
Tarirai, ini naʋana ʋandakapiwa naJehova, tiri ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso pakati paIsraeri ɀaJehova wehondo, ugere mugomo reZioni.
Ɀino kana ʋaciti kwamuri: Bvunzai maȿikiro naʋaʋuki, ʋanorira nokuita zeʋe‐zeʋe — ko ʋanhu haʋafaniri kubvunza Mŋari waʋo here? Ko ʋanofanira kubvunza ʋakafa pamsoro paʋapenyu here?
kumurairo nokuɀipupuriro! Kana ʋasiŋgatauri seɀinoreʋa shoko iri, haʋaŋgaʋi neciedza camaŋgwanani.
Ʋacafamba
Ʋacatarira ʋo pasi, asi tarirai, ʋacaʋona njodzi nerima, nokuȿiɓa kwokumanikidzwa; ʋacadziŋgirwa kurima guru.

Asi iye, waiʋa pakumanikidzwa, haaŋgazoʋi nerima. Paŋguʋa yokutaŋga wakaninipisa nyika yeZeburuni nenyika yeNaftari, asi paŋguʋa yaɀino wakaikudza, kurutiʋi rweguŋgwa, mhiri kwaJoridani, Garirea raʋahedeni.
Ʋanhu ʋaifamba murima ʋakaʋona ciedza cikuru; ʋaigara munyika yomumvuri worufu, ʋakapenyerwa ciedza.
Makawanza rudzi, makawedzera mufaro waʋo; ʋanofara pamberi penyu, sokufara kwaʋanhu paŋguʋa yokuceka, sokufara kwaʋanhu kana ʋacigoʋerana ɀakapambga.
Nokuti makavuna joko raiʋaremedza, netȿimbo yairoʋa mafudzi aʋo, neshamhu yaʋaiʋamanikidza, sapamazuʋa aʋaMidiani.
Nokuti shaŋgu imŋe neimŋe yomurwi, yakatsika nokutinhira, neŋguʋo yakanyikwa muropa, ɀicapiswa, ɀicaʋa sehuni dzomŋoto.
Nokuti takaɀarirwa Mŋana, takapiwa Mŋanakomana; ʋumambo ʋucaʋa pafudzi rake; zita rake ricanzi: Unoshamisa, Gota, Mŋari unesimba, Ƃaɓa ʋokusiŋgaperi, Mucinda worugare.
Kukura kwoʋumambo bgake nokworugare haɀinamugumo,
Jehova wakatuma shoko kunaJakobo, rakaɓurukira pamsoro paʋaIsraeri.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋacaziʋa, iʋo ʋaEfraimi naʋagere Samaria, iʋo ʋanoti namanyawi aʋo nokuɀikudza kwemŋoyo yaʋo:
Ɀitina ɀawa, asi ticaʋaka namabge akaʋezwa; miʋonde yatemŋa, asi ticaisa misidari panɀimbo yayo.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova ucaʋamutsira ʋadziʋisi ʋaRezini, ucasaŋganisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake;
ʋaSiria pamberi, naʋaFiristia mushure, ʋacapedza Israeri nomuromo wakashama. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, kutsamŋa kwake hakuna‐kudzorwa, asi ruʋoko rwake rwakaramba rwakatambanudzwa naɀino.
Asi ʋanhu haʋana‐kutendeʋukira kunaiye wakaʋaroʋa, haʋana‐kutȿaka Jehova wehondo.
Saka Jehova ucagura ʋaIsraeri musoro nomuswe, ɗaʋi romucindwe nenhokwe, nomusi mumŋe.
Mukuru nounokudzwa ndiwo musoro; muprofita, unodzidzisa nhema, ndiwo muswe.
Nokuti ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋaʋanhu aʋa ʋanoʋatsaukisa; ʋanotuŋgamirirwa naʋo ʋanoparadzwa.
Naiɀoɀo Ishe haaŋgafariri majaya aʋo, haaŋgaʋi netsitsi nenherera necirikadzi dzaʋo; nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo mumhuri
Nokuti ɀakaipa ɀinopfuta somŋoto; unopedza rukato neminzwa; ɀirokwaɀo unopisa matenhere eɗondo, ɀicikwira kuɗeŋga iri shoŋgwe yoʋutsi.
Nyika inotȿa nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kwaJehova wehondo; ʋanhu ʋakaita sehuni dzinoʋeswa; hakunomunhu unenyasha nehama yake.
Mumŋe ucabvuta kurudyi, asi ucaʋa nenzara; ucadya kuruɓoshwe, asi haʋaŋgaguti; mumŋe nomumŋe ucadya nyama yoruʋoko rwake.
ƲaManase
Ʋanenhamo ʋanotema mitemo isino‐kururama, naʋanyori ʋanonyora ɀisakarurama;
kuti ʋadziʋise ʋarombo pakururamisirwa, nokutorera ʋarombo ʋaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ɀaʋanofanira kuʋa naɀo, kuti ʋapambe cirikadzi, ʋatorere nherera ɀinhu ɀaʋo.
Asi mucaiteiko pazuʋa rokutoŋgwa, nerokuparadzwa kucabva kure? Mucatizira kunani kundoɓatsirwa? Fuma yenyu mucaiʋigepiko?
Ʋacaŋgokotama haʋo pakati paʋasuŋgwa, ʋacawira pasi pakati paʋakaʋurawa. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, kutsamŋa kwake hakuna‐kudzorwa, asi ruʋoko rwake rwakaramba rwakatambanudzwa naɀino.
Nhaiwe Asiria, shamhu yokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, wakaɓata muruʋoko rwake tȿimbo yeshuŋgu dzaŋgu!
Ndicamutuma kundorwa norudzi runomhura
Asi iye haafuŋgi kuita iɀoɀo, nomŋoyo wake hauraŋgariri ɀakaɗaro; asi iye unoraŋgarira kuparadza nokupedza marudzi mazhinji.
Nokuti iye unoti: Ko macinda aŋgu ose haazi madzimambo here?
Ko Karno harinakuitirwa ɀakaitirwa Karkemishi here? NeHamati seArpadi here? NeSamaria seDamasko here?
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu seɀarwakaȿikira ʋushe bgeɀifananidzo, kunyaŋge ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀakaʋezwa ɀakaŋga ɀicipfuʋura ɀapaJerusarema neSamaria,
handiŋgaitiri Jerusarema neɀifananidzo ɀaro seɀandakaitira Samaria neɀifananidzo ɀaro here?
Saka ɀino kana Ishe apedza ɓasa rake rose pagomo reZioni napaJerusarema, ndicaroʋa ɀiɓereko ɀomŋoyo unoɀikudza wamambo weAsiria, namanyawi okuɀikudza kwake.
Nokuti wakati: Ndakaɀiita nesimba roruʋoko rwaŋgu, ʋuye noʋucenjeri bgaŋgu, nokuti ndinenjere; ndakabvisa miganho yaʋanhu, ndakapamba fuma yaʋo; semhare ndakawisira pasi ʋaigara paɀigaro ɀoʋushe;
ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakawana fuma yamarudzi aʋanhu seɗendere; ndakaʋuŋganidza nyika yose, somunhu unoʋuŋganidza mazai akasiyiwa; hapana‐wakapfakanyisa ɓapiro, kana kushamisa muromo, kana kurira.

Ko sanhu riŋgaɀirumbidza pamsoro pounotema naro here? Kana jeko riŋgaɀikudza pamsoro pounoɓata naro here? Ɀaifanana netȿimbo inozunuŋgusa ʋanoroʋa nayo, kana muɗonɀo unosimudza cinhu cisati ciri huni.
Naiɀoɀo Ishe, Ishe wehondo, ucatuma kuwonda pakati paʋakakora ʋake; pasi pokubginya kwake pacaɓatidzwa cinopisa cakafanana nokupisa kwomŋoto.
Ciedza caʋaIsraeri cicaʋa mŋoto, noMutȿene wake muraɀo womŋoto; ucapisa nokupedza minzwa yake norukato rwake nezuʋa rimŋe.
Ucapedza kubginya kweɗondo rake, nokwomunda wake wakaʋorera, mŋeya nomuʋiri kamŋe, ɀifanane nendonda inoŋgoramba icipera simba.
Miti yakasara yeɗondo rake icaʋa mishoma, iŋganyorwa nomŋana.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri, naʋaneŋge ʋapukunyuka paimba yaJakobo, haʋaŋgazosendamiri kunowakaʋaroʋa, asi ʋacasendamira kunaJehova, Mutȿene waIsraeri, neɀokwaɗi.
Ʋakasara ʋacadzoka, iʋo ʋakasara ʋaJakobo, kunaMŋari unesimba.
Nokuti kunyaŋge ʋanhu ʋenyu, imi Israeri, ʋakaita sejeca reguŋgwa, ʋakasara ʋaʋo ʋoga ʋacadzoka; nokuti ʋakatemerwa kuparadzwa kuzere nokururama.
Nokuti Ishe, Jehova wehondo, ucapedzisa kuparadza, kwakagara kwatemŋa, panyika yose.
Saka ɀanzi naShe, Jehova wehondo: Imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋagere Zioni, musatya muAsiria, kunyaŋge akakuroʋai neshamhu nokukusimudzirai tȿimbo yake, seɀaakaitira Egipita.
Nokuti kwasara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kucapera, hasha dzaŋgu dzicaʋaparadza.
Jehova wehondo ucamusimudzira tyaʋa, sapakurobga kwaʋaMidiani paɗombo reOrebi; shamhu yake icaʋa pamsoro peguŋgwa, ucaisimudza seɀaakaitira Egipita.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro mutoro wake ucabviswa pamafudzi ako, nejoko rake pamutsipa wako, joko ricaparadzwa nokuɗa kwamafuta.
Waȿika paAiati, wapfuʋura napaMigroni, waceŋgeta nhumbi dzake paMikmashi;
ʋakwira napamupata, ʋakaʋata paGeba ʋusiku; Rama rinoɗeɗera, Gibea raSauro ratiza.
Ƌanidzira nenzwi rako, iwe mukunda weGarimi! Terera, iwe Raisha! Iwe Anatoti woʋurombo!
Madmena wotiza, ʋagere Gebimi ʋoroŋgedza kutiza.
Zuʋa ranhasi ucazorora paNobi; unozunuŋgusira gomo romukunda weZioni, ico cikomo ceJerusarema, ruʋoko rwake.
Tarirai, Ishe, Jehova wehondo, ucatema mashizha nokutyisa; akareɓa acatemŋa, naakakwirira acawiswa pasi.
Ucatema neɗare matenhere eɗondo, Rebanoni ricawiswa nounesimba.
Ɀino pahunde yaJese pacaɓuɗa ɓukira, ɗaʋi, rinoɓuɗa pamidzi yake, ricaɓereka ɀiɓereko.
Mŋeya waJehova ucagara pamsoro pake, mŋeya wenjere nowokuŋgwara, mŋeya wamano nesimba, mŋeya wokuziʋa nokutya Jehova.
Mufaro wake ucaʋa pakutya Jehova; haaŋgatoŋgi nokuŋgoʋona nameso ɓedzi, kana kupa mhoȿa nokuŋgonzwa nenzeʋe dzake ɓedzi;
asi ucatoŋgera ʋarombo nokururama, ucatambira ʋanyoro ʋenyika mhaka dzaʋo ɀakarurama; ucaroʋa nyika neshamhu yomuromo wake, ucaʋuraya ʋakaipa nomŋeya wemiromo yake.
Kururama ricaʋa banhire reciʋuno cake, kutendeka ricaʋa banhire reɀidɀa ɀake.
Ƃere ricagara negwaiana, iŋgwe icaʋata pasi nembudzana, nemhuru nomŋana weshumba necipfuwo cakakora pamŋe cete; ʋuye mŋana muɗuku ucadzituŋgamirira.
Mhou neɓere ɀicacera; ʋana ʋadzo ʋacaʋata pamŋe cete; shumba icadya ʋuswa senzombe.
Mŋana unomŋa, ucatamba pamŋena wenyoka, ʋuye mŋana wakarumurwa ucapinza ruʋoko rwake muɓako remvumbi.
Haɀiŋgakuʋadzi kana kuparadza pagomo raŋgu rose dɀene, nokuti nyika yose icazara nokuziʋa Jehova, seɀinofukidza mvura pasi peguŋgwa.
Nezuʋa iro mudzi waJese, iwo umire’po somureza waʋanhu, ucatȿakwa namarudzi aʋanhu; nɀimbo yake yokuzorora icaʋa nembiri.

Ɀino nezuʋa iro Ishe ucatambanudza ɀe ruʋoko rwake rwecipiri kuti adzikinure ʋakasara ʋaʋanhu ʋake, iʋo ʋaneŋge ʋasara, ʋari paAsiria, neEgipita, nePatrosi, neKushi, neErami, neShinari, neHamati, nokuɀiwi ɀeguŋgwa.
Ucasimudzira marudzi mureza, nokuʋuŋganidza ʋadziŋgwa ʋaIsraeri, nokuʋuŋganidza ʋaJuda ʋakaparadzirwa kumatiʋi manna enyika.
Ipapo goɗo raʋaEfraimi ricapera, naʋanomanikidza ʋaJuda ʋacaparadzwa; ʋaEfraimi haʋaŋgagoɗori ʋaJuda, naʋaJuda haʋaŋgamanikidzi ʋaEfraimi.
Asi ʋacabururukira pamsoro pamafudzi aʋaFiristia kumaʋirazuʋa, ʋacapambara pamŋe cete ʋana ʋamabvazuʋa; ʋacatambanudzira maʋoko aʋo kuʋaEdomi naʋaMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni ʋacaʋaterera.
Jehova ucaparadza cose rurimi rweguŋgwa reEgipita, ucasimudzira ruʋoko rwake pamsoro poRwizi nemhepo yake inopisa, ndokururoʋa ruite hoʋa nomŋe, ayambuse ʋanhu ʋakafuka shaŋgu.
Ʋanhu ʋake ʋakasara, ʋakasara Asiria, ʋacaʋa nenzira huru; seɀaɀakaitirwa Israeri nezuʋa raʋakaɓuɗa munyika yeEgipita.
Nezuʋa iro ucati: Ndinokuʋoŋgai Jehova; makaŋga makanditsamŋira, asi kutsamŋa kwenyu kwakadzorwa, munondinyaradza.
Tarirai, Mŋari ndiye ruponeso rwaŋgu; ndicaʋimba
Saka mucacera mvura nomufaro pamatsime oruponeso.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro mucati: Ʋoŋgai Jehova, paridzai zita rake, ziʋisai maɓasa ake pakati paʋanhu, muʋudze
Imbirai Jehova; nokuti wakaita ɀinhu ɀakaiȿo‐naka; iɀi ŋgaɀizikanwe panyika yose.
Ƌanidzira upururudze, iwe ugere paZioni; nokuti Mutȿene waIsraeri mukuru pakati penyu.
Cireʋo
Simudzai mureza pagomo risinemiti; ɗanidzirai kwaʋari, ninirai noruʋoko, kuti ʋapinde pamasuʋo aʋakuru.
Ndakaraira ʋatȿene ʋaŋgu, ndakaɗana mhare dzaŋgu nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, iʋo ʋarume ʋaŋgu ʋanofara ʋaciɀikudza.
Inzwai kutinhira pamakomo, kwakaita sokwaʋanhu ʋazhinji! Kutinhira kweʋuŋgano dzoʋushe bgamarudzi akaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete! Jehova wehondo wogadzira hondo kundorwa.
Ʋanobva kunyika iri kure, kumugumo weɗeŋga, iye Jehova nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa dzeshuŋgu dzake, kuti aparadze nyika yose.
Cemai, nokuti zuʋa raJehova riri pedyo; rinoȿika sokuparadza kunobva kunaWamasimba ose.
Saka maʋoko ose acashaiwa simba, nomŋoyo mumŋe nomumŋe waʋanhu ucanyauka;
ʋacavunduka; ʋacaɓatwa nokurwadziwa namaɗambudziko; ʋacarwadziwa somukadzi unosurumuka; ʋacatarirana ʋacishamiswa; ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀicafanana neɀiso ɀomŋoto.
Tarirai, zuʋa reJehova rinoʋuya, rinotyisa, rinehasha nokutsamŋa kukuru, kuti ashandure nyika riite ɗoŋgo, nokuparadza ʋatadzi ʋayo ʋabve’mo.
Nokuti nyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga, namapoka adzo, hadziŋgaratidzi ciedza cadzo; zuʋa ricaȿiɓiswa pakuɓuɗa kwaro, ʋuye mŋedzi hauŋgavenekeri neciedza cawo.
Ndicaroʋa nyika nokuɗa kwokushata kwayo, naʋakaipa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋo; ndicagumisa manyawi aʋanoɀikudza, nokuwisira pasi kuɗaɗa kwaʋanotyisa.
Ʋanhu ndicaʋaita ʋashoma kupfuʋura ndarama yakaiȿo‐naka, iye munhu kupfuʋura ndarama tȿene yeOfiri.
Saka ndicaɗeɗeresa ɗenga, nyika icazunuŋguswa ibve panɀimbo yayo, nehasha dzaJehova wehondo, napazuʋa rokutsamŋa kwake kukuru.
Ɀino semhara inovimŋa, ʋuye seɀipfuwo ɀisina‐unoɀiʋuŋganidza, saiɀoɀo munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ucadzokera kurudzi rwake, mumŋe nomumŋe ucatizira kunyika yake.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unowanikwa, ucaɓayiwa; mumŋe nomumŋe unoɓatwa, ucaʋurawa nomunondo.
Ʋacece ʋaʋo ʋacaroʋerwa pasi pamberi paʋo, dzimba dzaʋo dzicapambga, ʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋacacinyiwa.
Tarirai, ndicaʋamutsira ʋaMedia, ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri sirveri, kunyaŋge ndarama haʋaifariri.
Ʋuta bgaʋo ʋucawisira pasi majaya aʋo, haʋaŋgaʋi netsitsi neɀiɓereko ɀeciɀaro; ziso raʋo hariŋgaɗariki ʋana.
Ɀino Babironi, rinembiri paʋushe bgose, raiɀikudza ʋaKardea pamsoro pokunaka kwaro, ricaita sapaŋguʋa yakaparadza Mŋari Sodoma neGomora.
Hariŋgatoŋgogarwi naʋanhu, hakuna‐ʋangatoŋgogara’mo kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi; kunyaŋge nomuArabia haaŋgadziki tente rake’mo, naʋafudzi haʋaŋgaʋatisi mapoka aʋo’po.
Asi ɀikara ɀomusaŋgo ɀicaʋata’mo; dzimba dzaʋo dzicazara neɀinorira; mhou dzicagara’mo, nemŋeya yakaipa icatamba’po.
Mapere acarira munhare dzaʋo, namakaʋa mudzimba dzamadzimambo dzaifadza; ŋguʋa yaro yasweɗera pedyo, mazuʋa aro haaŋgawedzerwi.
Nokuti Jehova ucanzwira Jakobo tsitsi, ucasanaŋgura Israeri nokuʋagadza munyika yaʋo; mutorwa ucandogara naʋo, ʋacanamatira imba yaJakobo.
Marudzi acaʋatora, nokuʋaisa kunɀimbo yaʋo; imba yaʋaIsraeri icaʋaɓata panyika yaJehova ʋaʋe ʋaranda naʋashandiri ʋaʋo; ʋacatapa iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋatapi ʋaʋo, ʋacaɓata iʋo ʋaiʋamanikidza.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro kana Jehova acikuzorodza pakucema kwako napakutambudzika kwako, napakuɓata kwako kunorema kwawakaɓatiswa nako,
ucaimba rwiyo urwu pamsoro pamambo weBabironi, uciti: Haiwa, mumanikidzi wapera sei! Kutambudza kwapera sei!
Jehova wavuna muɗonɀo wowakaipa, netȿimbo yoʋushe yaʋaɓati;
iye wairoʋa marudzi aʋanhu nehasha nokuroʋa kusiŋgaperi, waiɓata ndudzi dzaʋanhu nokutambudza kusina‐kudzorwa nomunhu.
Nyika yose yozorora, yanyarara; ʋanofara nokuimba.
Ɀirokwaɀo miti yemisipresi inofara nokuɗa kwako, nemisidari yeRebanoni,
Sheori pasi rinenyoŋgano pamsoro pako kuzosoŋgana newe pakuʋuya kwako; rinokumutsira ʋakafa, iʋo ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋakuru panyika; ramutsa madzimambo ose amarudzi aʋanhu paɀigaro ɀawo ɀoʋushe.
Iʋo ʋose ʋacapindura, ʋaciti kwauri: Newe waʋa usinesimba sesu kanhi? Iwe wafanana nesu kanhi?
Kuɀikudza kwako kwaɗeredzwa kuȿikira paSheori, nokurira kwoʋuɗimbga bgako; honye dziri pasi pako, nehonye dzinokufukidza.
Haiwa, wawa seiko ucibva kuɗeŋga, iwe nyamasase, iwe mŋanakomana wamambakwedza! Wakandwa seiko pasi, iwe wokuwisira marudzi pasi!
Iwe wakati mumŋoyo mako: Ndicakwira kuɗeŋga, ndicakwiridza cigaro caŋgu coʋushe kumsoro kwenyeredzi dzaMŋari; ndicagara pamsoro pegomo reʋuŋgano, pamigumo yamatiʋi okumsoro;
ndicakwira kumsoro kwamakore, ndicaɀienzanisa noWokumsorosoro.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaɗeredzwa kuȿikira paSheori, kuȿikira pakadzika pegomba.
Ʋanokuʋona ʋacakucerekedza, ʋacakutarira,
waishandura nyika ifanane nerenje, waiparadza maguta ayo, wairamba kusunuŋgura ʋasuŋgwa ʋake ʋaende kumusha here?
Madzimambo ose amarudzi, iwo ose, anoʋata acikudzwa, mumŋe nomumŋe paimba yake.
Asi iwe warashwa kure nobgiro bgako, seɗaʋi rinonyaŋgadza, wafukidzwa naʋakaʋurawa, ʋakaɓayiwa nomunondo, ʋanoɓurukira kumabge egomba, somutumbu watsikwa netsoka.
Hauŋgaʋigwi pamŋe cete naʋo, nokuti wakaparadza nyika yako, ʋakaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋako; ʋana ʋaʋakaipa haʋaŋgarebgi nokusiŋgaperi.
Gadzirirai ʋana ʋake paʋaŋgaʋurawa nokuɗa kwokushata kwamadziɓaɓa aʋo; ʋarege kuzomuka, ʋagare nhaka yenyika, ʋazadze pasi pose namaguta.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndicaʋamukira, ndicatorera Babironi zita naʋakasara, naʋana naʋana ʋaʋana, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicariita nɀimbo inogarwa nenuŋgu, ʋuye madziʋa emvura; ndicaritȿaira nomutȿairo wokuparadza, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Jehova wehondo wakapika, aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, seɀandakafuŋga, ndiɀo ɀaɀicaitika; seɀandakaraŋgarira, ɀicamira saiɀoɀo.
Kuti ndicavuna muAsiria munyika yaŋgu, ndicamutsika netsoka dzaŋgu pamakomo aŋgu; neŋguʋa iyo joko rake ricabva kwaʋari, nomutoro wake ucabva pamafudzi aʋo.
Ndico cireʋo cakatemerwa nyika yose; ndirwo ruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa pamsoro pamarudzi ose.
Nokuti Jehova wehondo wakatema cireʋo, ndiani uŋgapindura ɀe? Ruʋoko rwake rwakatambanudzwa, ndiani uŋgarudzosa.
Negore rokufa kwamambo Ahazi cireʋo ici cakarebga:
Iwe nyika yeFiristia, iwe nyika yose, usafara ɀako nokuti shamhu yakaŋga yakuroʋa yavunika; nokuti pamudzi wenyoka pacaɓuɗa mvumbi, ciɓereko cayo cicaʋa nyoka yomŋoto inobururuka.
Mataŋgwe aʋarombo acadya, naʋanoshaiwa ʋacaʋata pasi ʋakafara; ndicaʋuraya mudzi wako nenzara, ʋakasara ʋako ʋacaʋurawa.
Cema, iwe suʋo; ɗanidzira, iwe guta; wanyauka, iwe nyika yeFiristia, iwe nyika yose; nokuti kurutiʋi rwokumsoro kunobva ʋutsi, hapana‐unotiza pahondo dzake.
Ɀino nhume dzorudzi
Cireʋo pamsoro paMoabi. Nokuti ʋusiku Ari reMoabi rakaitwa ɗoŋgo, rakaparadzwa; nokuti ʋusiku Kiri reMoabi rakaitwa ɗoŋgo, rakaparadzwa.
Ʋakwira Bayiti, neDiboni, kumatunhu akakwirira, kundocema’po; ʋaMoabi ʋanocema pamsoro peNebo napaMedeba; misoro yaʋo yose inemhazha, ndebvu dzose dzakaʋeʋurwa.
Panzira dzomumisha yaʋo ʋakaɀisuŋga namakudza, pamsoro pedzimba dzaʋo, napamaɗare aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe unowuŋgudza acicema ɀikuru.
Heshboni rinoɗanidzira, neEreari; inzwi raʋo rinonzwika kuȿikira paJahazi; saka ʋarwi ʋaMoabi ʋanoɗanidzira ɀikuru; mŋeya wake unoɗeɗera mukati make.

Mŋoyo waŋgu unoɗanidzira pamsoro paMoabi; ʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋanotizira Zoari, neEgrati‐sherishiya; nokuti ʋanokwira mukwidzwa waRuhiti ʋacicema; nokuti panzira inoenda Horonaimi ʋanocema nokucema kwokuparadzwa.
Nokuti mvura yeNimrimi icaparadzwa; nokuti ʋuswa bgawoma, ɓumhudza rapera, hapacinacinomera citema.
Saka ɀizhinji ɀaʋakawana, neɀaʋakaceŋgeta, ʋacayambuka naɀo parukoʋa rwemikonacando.
Nokuti kucema kwapotereka kunyika yose yaMoabi; kuwuŋgudza kwake kuȿikira paEgraimi, nokuwuŋgudza kwake kuȿikira paBeeri‐erimi.
Nokuti mvura yeDimoni izere neropa; nokuti ndicawedzera kuroʋa Dimoni,
Tumirai muɓati wenyika makwaiana, abve Sera aende kurenje, kugomo romukunda weZioni.
Nokuti seshiri dzinodzuŋgaira, seɗendere rakaparadzirwa, ndiɀo ɀicaita ʋakunda ʋaMoabi pamazambuko aArnoni.
Ita mano, ruramisira; mumvuri wako uuite soʋusiku pakati pamasikati makuru; ʋanza ʋadziŋgwa, usapandukira unotiza.
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakadziŋgwa ŋgaʋagare newe; kana ari Moabi, uʋe kwaari paaŋgaʋanda pamberi pomuparadzi; nokuti mutambudzi haaci’po, kuparadza kwapera, ʋamanikidzi ʋabva panyika.
Cigaro coʋushe cicamiswa netsitsi; mumŋe ucagara pamsoro paco neɀokwaɗi, mutente raDavidi, acitoŋga, acitȿaka kururamisira
Takanzwa ɀokuɀikudza kwaMoabi, kuti unoɀikudza kwaɀo; ɀamanyawi ake, nokuɀikudza kwake, nehasha dzake; asi kuɀirumbidza kwake hakunamaturo.
Saka Moabi ucacema Moabi, mumŋe nomumŋe ucacema; mucacemera mapundu amazambiriŋga eKiri‐hareseti, mamanikidzwa kwaɀo.
Nokuti minda yeHeshboni yawoma, nomuzambiriŋga weSibma; madzishe amarudzi avuna mataʋi awo akanaka, akaŋga aciȿikira Jazeri, akaŋga atandira kurenje; mataʋi awo akaŋga atandaʋara, ayambukira guŋgwa.

Saka ndicacema nokucema kwaJazeri ndicicemera muzambiriŋga weSibma; ndicakuɗiridza, iwe Heshboni neEreare nemisodzi yaŋgu; nokuti mhere yokurwa yawira pamsoro peɀiɓereko ɀako ɀezhezha napamsoro pokukohwa kwako.
Mufaro wabviswa, nokufara pamunda waiɓereka ɀakanaka; paminda yemizambiriŋga hapacazoʋi nokuimba kana inzwi romufaro; hapacazoʋi muȿiniri unoȿinira mazambiriŋga paɀiȿiniro; ndagumisa kupururudza.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unorira sembira pamsoro paMoabi, neɗumbu raŋgu pamsoro peKiri‐heresi.
Ɀino kana Moabi aciɀiratidza
Ndirori shoko rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro paMoabi paŋguʋa yakare.

Asi ɀino Jehova wakataura aciti: Makore matatu asati apfuʋura, samakore omunhu unoɓatira muɓairo, kukudzwa kwaMoabi kucaɀidzwa, pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji; ʋakasara ʋacaʋa ʋashoma kwaɀo, ʋasinesimba.
Cireʋo pamsoro peDamasko.
Tarirai, Damasko robviswa, rirege kuzoʋa guta, ricaʋa ɗoŋgo rakakoromoka.
Maguta eAroeri asiyiwa; acaʋa mafuro eɀipfuwo, ɀicaʋata’po pasi, ɀisina‐unoɀivundusa.
Nhare icabviswa panaEfraimi, noʋushe paDamasko; ʋakasara ʋeSiria ʋacaʋa sembiri yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ʋukuru bgaJakobo ʋucaitwa ʋutete, ʋuye kukora kwenyama yake kucawonda.
Ɀicafanana neŋguʋa kana muceki aciʋuŋganidza ɀiyo mumunda, aciceka hura noruʋoko rwake; ɀirokwaɀo ɀicafanana nokuʋuŋganidza hura pamupata weRefaimi.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro mimŋe micero icasarira’mo, seɀinoitika kana muorivi ucizuzwa, ɀiɓereko ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu kumuromo weɗaʋi rokumsoro‐soro, ɀinna kana ɀishanu pamataʋi okunze omuti unoɓereka kwaɀo, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri.
Nezuʋa iro ʋanhu ʋacatarira Musiki waʋo, meso aʋo acaʋona Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Haʋaŋgatariri artari, iro ɓasa ramaʋoko aʋo; ɀakaitwa neminwe yaʋo haʋaŋgaʋi nehanya naɀo, kana iri miti yakatsaurwa kana mifananidzo yezuʋa.
Nezuʋa iro maguta aʋo akasimba acaita samatoŋgo kumatondo napamisoro yamakomo, akasiyiwa nokuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri; acaʋa matoŋgo.
Nokuti wakaŋganwa Mŋari Muponesi wako, hauna‐kuraŋgarira ɗombo roʋutiziro bgako. Saka unoɀisimira miti inofadza, unoisa’mo mizambiriŋga yakabva kumŋe.
Nomusi wokusima kwako, unouʋakira ruzhowa, fume maŋgwana unotumbusa mbeu dzako; asi kuceka kunotiza nezuʋa rokutambudzika nerokucema kukuru.
Haiwa, kutinhira kwaʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋanotinhira sokutinhira kweguŋgwa, nokuririma kwamarudzi aʋanhu, anoririma sokuririma kwemvura zhinji!
Marudzi acaririma sokuririma kwemvura zhinji; asi ucaʋatuka, ʋacatizira kure, ʋacadziŋgirirwa sewindi yamakomo pamberi pemhepo, seguruʋa rinopfuŋgaira pamberi peɗutu remhepo.
Neŋguʋa yamaɗekwana, tarirai, kucaʋa nokutyisa; maŋgwanani kusati kwaedza, haʋaci’po. Ndiwo mugoʋe waʋanotipambara, nomuɓairo waʋanotiɓira.
Haiwa, nyika yokuʋirira kwamapapiro, iri mhiri kwenzizi dzeEtiopia;
inotuma nhume
Imi mose muri pasi pose, nemi mugere panyika, kana mureza ucisimudzwa pamakomo, tarirai; kana hwamanda iciridzwa, inzwai!
Nokuti Jehova wakataura kwandiri kuɗai: Ndicanyarara, ndicatarira ndiri paʋugaro bgaŋgu, sokupisa kwezuʋa pamushana, seguti pakupisa kweŋguʋa yokukohwa.
Nokuti kukohwa kusati kwaȿika, kana maruʋa azuka, ruʋa rashanduka zambiriŋga roɗo‐kuibva, ucagura mataʋi namapaŋga; namataʋi anotandira ucaabvisa nokuatema.
Ose pamŋe cete acasiyirwa magora ari pamakomo, neɀikara ɀenyika; magora acagara pamsoro paʋo cirimo cose, neɀikara ɀenyika ɀicapedza cando pamsoro paʋo.
