Neŋguʋa iyo Jehova wehondo ucaʋigirwa ɀipo norudzi rwaʋanhu ʋakareɓa ʋakanaka kumeso, ʋanhu ʋanotyiwa kwose‐kwose, rudzi runesimba, runotsika‐tsika pasi, runenyika inokamurwa nenzizi, kunɀimbo yezita raJehova wehondo, kugomo reZioni.
Cireʋo pamsoro peEgipita.
Tarirai, Jehova wakataȿa gore rinomhanya, wosweɗera Egipita; ɀifananidzo ɀeEgipita ɀicaɗeɗera pamberi pake, nomŋoyo weEgipita ucanyauka mukati mawo.
Ndicamutsa mŋoyo yaʋaEgipita ʋamukire ʋaEgipita; mumŋe nomumŋe ucarwa nehama yake, mumŋe nomumŋe nowakaʋakirana naye; guta ricamukira guta, ʋushe ʋucamukira ʋushe.
Mŋeya weEgipita ucapera mukati mawo; ndicaparadza kufuŋga kwawo; ʋacandobvunza ɀifananidzo, naʋanamazaŋgo, naʋaʋuki neŋaŋga.
Ndicaisa ʋaEgipita muruʋoko rwamambo unehasha; mambo unomŋoyo mukukutu ucaʋaɓata ʋushe, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe, Jehova wehondo.
Mvura icapxa muguŋgwa, rwizi rucaɗerera nokuwoma.
Nzizi dzicanhuwa, hoʋa dzeEgipita dzicaʋa shoma nokupxa; tsaŋga nenhokwe dzicawoma.
Mafuro kunhiʋi dzaNairi, pamhenderekedzo dzaNairi, neminda yose yakadɀarwa yaNairi, ɀicawoma, ɀicatorwa
Ʋaɓati ʋehoʋe ʋacacema, ʋose ʋanokandira ɀiredzo maNairi ʋacawuŋgudza, ʋanokanda ʋutaʋa bgaʋo mumvura ʋacapera simba.
Ʋuye ʋanoɓata necinda yakanatswa, naʋanoruka miceka micena, ʋacanyadziswa.
Mbiru dzicaputswa‐putswa; ʋose ʋanoɓatira muɓairo ʋacaʋa neshuŋgu pamŋeya.
Macinda eZoani mapenzi kwaɀo; mano amakota akaiȿo‐cenjera aFarao ashanduka ʋupenzi; munoreʋa seiko kunaFarao,
Ʋaripiko ɀino iʋo ʋanhu ʋako ʋakacenjera? Ŋgaʋakuʋudze ɀino; ŋgaʋaziʋise ɀakafuŋgwa naJehova wehondo pamsoro peEgipita.
Macinda eZoani aʋa mapenzi, macinda eNofi akanyeŋgerwa; ʋakarashisa Egipita nzira, iʋo ʋaiʋa ibge rekona ramarudzi aʋo.
Jehova wakaɗira mŋeya wokuramba mukati maʋo; ʋakarashisa Egipita nzira pamaɓasa aʋo ose, somunhu wakaɓatwa neɗoro unodzedzereka pakurutsa kwake.
Saka Egipita haiŋgazoʋi neɓasa cose, riŋgaitwa nomusoro kana nomuswe, kana neɗaʋi romucindwe kana nenhokwe.
Nezuʋa iro ʋaEgipita ʋacafanana naʋakadzi; ʋacaɗeɗera nokutya nokuɗa kwokusimudzwa kworuʋoko rwaJehova wehondo, rwaanosimudza pamsoro paʋo.
Nyika yaJuda icaʋa cityiso ceEgipita; mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀiʋudzwa ucatya nokuɗa kwomutemo waJehova wehondo, waakatema pamsoro paʋo.
Nezuʋa iro maguta mashanu acaʋa’po panyika yeEgipita, anotaura rurimi rweKanani, ʋacipika naJehova wehondo; mumŋe ucaidzwa Guta rokuparadzwa.
Nezuʋa iro pakati penyika yeEgipita pacaʋa neartari kunaJehova, nembiru pamuganho waro kunaJehova.
Ɀicaʋa ciratidzo necapupu caJehova wehondo panyika yeEgipita; nokuti ʋacaɗanidzira kunaJehova nemhaka yaʋamanikidzi, ucaʋatumira muponesi nomurwiri, iye ucaʋaponesa.
Jehova ucaɀiratidza kuEgipita, naʋaEgipita ʋacaziʋa Jehova nezuʋa iro; ɀirokwaɀo ʋacamunamata neɀiɓayiro neɀipo, ʋacapikira Jehova mhiko, nokuɀiita.
Jehova ucaroʋa Egipita, aciroʋa nokuporesa ɀe; ɀino ʋacadzokera kunaJehova, iye ucanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo akaʋaporesa.
Nezuʋa iro nzira huru icaʋa’po inobva Egipita icienda Asiria; ʋaAsiria ʋacaenda Egipita, naʋaEgipita ʋacaenda Asiria; ʋaEgipita ʋacanamata pamŋe cete naʋaAsiria.
Nezuʋa iro ʋaIsraeri ʋacaʋa rudzi rwecitatu ʋaciteʋera Egipita neAsiria, ʋacaʋa ruropafadzo pakati penyika;
nokuti Jehova wehondo wakaʋaropafadza, aciti: ƲaEgipita, ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, naʋaAsiria, ɓasa ramaʋoko aŋgu, naʋaIsraeri, nhaka yaŋgu, ŋgaʋaropafadzwe.
Negore rokuȿika kwaTartani paAshdodi, atumŋa naSargoni mambo weAsiria, akarwa neAshdodi nokurikunda;

neŋguʋa iyo Jehova wakataura naIsaya mŋanakomana waAmozi, aciti: Enda, undosunuŋgura gudza riri paɀiʋuno ɀako, ubvise shaŋgu yako parutsoka rwako. Iye akaita saiɀoɀo, akafamba asineŋguʋo, asineshaŋgu.
Ɀino Jehova akati: Muranda waŋgu Isaya seɀaakafamba asineŋguʋo asineshaŋgu makore matatu akaʋa ciratidzo necishamiso pamsoro peEgipita neEtiopia;
saiɀoɀo mambo weAsiria ucaenda naʋatapxa ʋeEgipita naʋakadziŋgwa ʋeEtiopia, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋasineŋguʋo ʋasineshaŋgu, ʋakafukurwa ɀiʋuno, ciʋe cinyadzo ceEgipita.
Ʋacavunduswa nokunyadziswa pamsoro peEtiopia, ciʋimbo caʋo, neEgipita rumbidzo yaʋo.
Ʋagere panyika iyi iri pamhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa ʋacati nezuʋa iro: Tarirai, ndiɀo ɀaita ciʋimbo ceɗu, kwataitizira ticitȿaka kurwirwa kunamambo weAsiria; ko isu ɀino ticapukunyuka sei?
Cireʋo pamsoro perenje reguŋgwa.
Ɀinobva kurenje, kunyika inotyisa, seɀampupuri ɀinopfuʋura kurutiʋi rweZasi.
Ndaratidzwa ciratidzo cinocemedza; munyeŋgeri unoita nokunyeŋgera, nomuparadzi unoparadza. Simuka iwe Erami, komba, iwe Media; ndagumisa kugomera kwaʋo kwose.
Saka ɀiʋuno ɀaŋgu ɀizere nokurwadziwa; ndaɓatwa nokurwadziwa, sokurwadziwa kwomukadzi unosurumuka; ndakotamiswa, saka handigoni kunzwa; ndavunduswa, saka handigoni kuʋona.
Mŋoyo waŋgu unedzuŋgu, ndavunduswa neɀinotyisa; rubvunza‐ʋaeni rwandaiɗa rwashanduka cinhu cinondiɗeɗeresa.
Ʋanogadzira tafura, ʋanoisa ʋarindi, ʋanodya, ʋanonwa. Simukai, imi macinda, muzodze nhoʋo.
Nokuti heɀi ɀandaʋudzwa naShe; Enda, undoisa murindi; ŋgaareʋe ɀaanoʋona;
ɀino kana aciʋona ɓoka, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋakaita ʋaʋiri‐ʋaʋiri, neɓoka remboŋgoro, neɓoka ramakamera, ŋgaaterere ɀakanaka‐naka.
Iye akaɗanidzira seshumba,
ɀino tarirai, kwoʋuya ɓoka raʋanhu, ʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋakaita ʋaʋiri‐ʋaʋiri. Akapindura, akati: Babironi rawa, rawa; mifananidzo yake yose yakaʋezwa yaʋamŋari ʋaʋo yaputsikirwa pasi.
Haiwa, ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakapurwa, ɀiyo ɀeɓuriro raŋgu, ɀandakanzwa kunaJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, ndiɀo ɀandakakuziʋisai.
Cireʋo pamsoro peDuma.
Mumŋe unondiɗana, ari paSeiri,
Murindi ndokuti: Mambakwedza oȿika, noʋusiku ʋo. Kana muciɗa kubvunza, bvunzai; dzokai, ʋuyai.
Cireʋo pamsoro peArabia.
Musaŋgo reArabia ndi’mo mamucaʋata, imi mapoka aʋafambi ʋeDedani.
Ʋigirai unenyota mvura! Ʋagere panyika yeTema ʋakaciŋgamidza ʋatizi neciŋgwa caʋo.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitiza minondo, minondo yakavomorwa, noʋuta bgakakuŋgwa, nokumanikidzwa kwokurwa.
Nokuti heɀi ɀandakaʋudzwa naJehova: Gore risati rapera, samakore omunhu unoɓatira muɓairo, mbiri yose yaKedari icapera;
ʋakasara ʋeɓoka raʋanofura noʋuta, iʋo ʋanhu ʋanesimba ʋaʋana ʋaKedari, ʋacaʋa ʋashoma; nokuti Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, wakaɀitaura.
Cireʋo pamsoro pomupata weɀakaʋonekwa.
Unonzweiko, ɀawakwira naʋanhu ʋako ʋose pamateŋga edzimba?
Haiwa, iwe, uzere nokupururudza, guta rineɓope, musha unomufaro; ʋakaʋurawa ʋako haʋana‐kuʋurawa nomunondo, haʋana‐kufira pakurwa.
Ʋaɓati ʋako ʋose ʋakatiza pamŋe cete, ʋakasuŋgwa ʋasinoʋuta; ʋose ʋako, ʋakawanikwa, ʋakasuŋgwa pamŋe cete; ʋakatizira kure.
Naiɀoɀo ndakati: Regai kunditarira, ndinoɗa kucema kwaɀo; musaramba muciidza kundinyaradza pamsoro pokuparadzwa kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Nokuti izuʋa rokuvundusa, nerokutsikira pasi, nerokukaŋganisa, ɀinobva kunaShe, Jehova wehondo, pamupata wokuratidzwa; rokukoromorwa kwamaȿiŋgo, nerokuɗanidzira kumakomo.
Erami wakaɓata goɓa, pamŋe cete namapoka aʋanhu naʋataȿi ʋamabiza; Kiri wakafuɗugura nhoʋo.
Ipapo mipata yenyu yakaiȿo‐naka yakazara neŋgoro, naʋataȿi ʋamabiza ʋakaɀigadzirira kurwa pasuʋo.
Akabvisa cifukidziro caJuda; nezuʋa iro mukatarira nhumbi dzokurwa muimba yomuɗondo.
Mukaʋona pakakoromoka paguta raDavidi, kuti pakaŋga pari pazhinji; mukaciŋgidzira mvura yedziʋa rezasi;
mukaʋereŋga dzimba dzeJerusarema, mukakoromora dzimba kuti musimbise ruȿiŋgo;
mukaita ʋo gaŋgwa pakati pamaȿiŋgo maʋiri rokuciŋgidzira mvura yedziʋa rakare. Asi hamuna‐kutarira iye wakaɀiita, makaŋga musinehanya naiye wakaɀifuŋga kare.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro Ishe, Jehova wehondo, waka
asi tarirai, makaʋa nomufaro nokupembera, nokuɓayiwa kweŋombe, nokushizhwa kwamakwai, nokudyiwa kwenyama nokunwiwa kwewaini,
Asi Jehova wehondo wakaɀiziʋisa munzeʋe dzaŋgu,
Ɀanzi naShe, Jehova wehondo: Enda kumuceŋgeti uyu wefuma, kunaShebna, unotarira imba
Unoɓateiko pano? Unaniko pano, ɀawaɀiʋezera bgiro pano?
Tarira, Jehova ucakurashira kure nesimba somurume; ɀirokwaɀo, ucakupeta‐peta.
Ɀirokwaɀo ucakupomba‐pomba, ndokukukandira
Ndicakudziŋga paɓasa rako, iye ucakukweʋera pasi ubve panɀimbo yako.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ndicaɗana muranda waŋgu Eriakimi, mŋanakomana waHirkia;
ndicamufukidza ŋguʋo yako, nokumusimbisa nebanhire rako, ndigoisa ʋushe bgako muruʋoko rwake; iye ucaʋa ɓaɓa kunaʋagere Jerusarema, nokuimba yaJuda.
Ndicaisa kiyi yeimba yaDavidi pafudzi rake; iye ucazarura, hapana‐uŋgazarira, iye ucazarira, hapana‐uŋgazarura.
Ndicamuroʋera pakasimba sembambo; ucaʋa cigaro cinokudzwa paimba yaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ʋacaturika paari kukudzwa kwose kweimba yaɓaɓa ʋake, mataʋi namaɓukira, nemidziyo yose miɗuku, kubvira pamikombe kuȿikira pamakate.
Nezuʋa iro, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo, mbambo yakaŋga yaroʋerwa pakasimba, icabva; icatemŋa, ndokuwira pasi; nomutoro wakaŋga wakaturikwa pairi, ucatemŋa; nokuti Jehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Cireʋo pamsoro peTire.
Cemai, imi, ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi; nokuti raparadzwa, hapacineimba, kana paŋgapindwa’po; ʋakaratidzwa iɀoɀo ʋari panyika yeKitimi.
Imi mugere pamhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa, nyararai, iyemi maifumiswa naʋateŋgesi ʋeSidoni, ʋanofamba neguŋgwa.
Fuma yaro ɀaiʋa ɀiyo ɀeShihori, ɀiɓereko ɀeNairi, ɀaiiswa’ko pamsoro pemvura; ndi’po paiteŋgeswa
Nyara, iwe Sidoni, nokuti guŋgwa rataura, nenhare yeguŋgwa,
Kana shoko riciȿika Egipita, ʋacaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo pamsoro peshoko reTire.
Yambukirai Tarshishi; cemai, imi mugere pamhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa.
Gara ndiro
Ndianiko wakafuŋgira Tire iɀoɀo, iro raipavurira korona, ʋateŋgesi ʋaro ʋaiʋa macinda, naʋashambadziri ʋaro ʋaiʋa ʋanokudzwa panyika?
Jehova wehondo ndiye wakaɀifuŋga, kuti amhure kuɀikudza kweɀose ɀinokudzwa, nokuɀidza ʋose ʋanokudzwa panyika.
Pararira panyika yako seNairi, iwe mukunda weTarshishi; hakucinebanhire rinokusuŋga.
Wakatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake pamsoro peguŋgwa, wakazunuŋgusa ʋushe; Jehova wakaraira pamsoro peKanani, kuti nhare dzayo dziparadzwe.
Akati: Haucazofari, iwe mukunda weSidoni, mhandara yakamanikidzwa; simuka, uyambukire Kitimi; naikoko hauŋgawani zororo.
Tarirai nyika yaʋaKardea; rudzi urwo haruci’po; ʋaAsiria ʋakaiita nyika yeɀikara ɀerenje; ʋakamisa shoŋgwe dzaʋo, ʋakawisa dzimba dzoʋushe dzaiʋa’mo; ʋakaiita ɗoŋgo.
Cemai, imi ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi; nokuti nhare yenyu yaparadzwa.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Tire ricakaŋganikwa makore makumi manomŋe, ɀakaenzana namakore amambo mumŋe cete; kana makore makumi manomŋe apera, Tire ricaitirwa seɀinoimbga parwiyo rwecifeʋe,
Iwe cifeʋe, wakaŋganikwa, tora mbira upote neguta; ridza ɀakanaka, imba nziyo dzakanaka, kuti uraŋgarirwe.
Ɀino kana makore makumi manomŋe apera, Jehova ucashanyira Tire, ipapo ricadzokera kumuɓairo waro, ndokufeʋa noʋushe bgose bgenyika ʋuri pasi pose.
Ɀarakashambadzira, nomuɓairo waro, ɀicaʋa ɀitȿene kunaJehova; haɀiŋgaceŋgetwi kana kuʋigwa; nokuti ɀarakashambadzira ɀicaʋa ɀaʋanogara pamberi paJehova, kuti ʋagute kwaɀo, ʋafuke ŋguʋo dzakanaka.
Tarirai, Jehova unobvisa ɀose panyika nokuiparadza, nokuitsindikira, nokuparadzira ʋagere mairi.

Ʋanhu ʋacaitirwa ɀinoitirwa muprista, muranda ɀinoitirwa tenzi wake, mushandiri ɀinoitirwa ʋahosi ʋake, muteŋgi ɀinoitirwa muteŋgesi, unopa cikwerete ɀinoitirwa unokwereta, unoripa mhindu ɀinoitirwa unoreʋa mhindu.
Nyika icabvisirwa ɀose ɀayo, icaparadzwa cose; nokuti Jehova wakataura shoko iro.
Nyika inocema nokuwoma, pasi pose panopera simba nokuwoma, ʋanhu ʋakakudzwa ʋenyika ʋanopera simba.
Nyika yakaȿiɓiswa ʋo naʋagere mairi; nokuti ʋakaɗarika mirairo, ʋakakaŋganisa mitemo, nokuputsa suŋgano isiŋgaperi.
Saka kutuka
Waini itȿa inocema, muzambiriŋga wapera simba, ʋose ʋanomŋoyo unofara ʋanogomera.
Kufara kweŋgoma kwonyarara, inzwi raʋanofara ropera, mufaro wembira wopera.
Haʋaŋganwi waini ʋaciimba; ɀinoɓata ɀicaʋaʋa kunaʋanoɀinwa.
Guta, raʋa ɗoŋgo, rakoromorwa; dzimba dzose dzakapfigwa, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu uŋgapinda’mo.
Kucema kunonzwika panzira dzomumusha nokuɗa kwewaini; mufaro wose waȿiɓa, kufara kwenyika kwaenda.
Muguta masara maŋgoʋa ɗoŋgo, suʋo raputswa nokuparadzwa.
Nokuti ndiɀo ɀaɀicaita panyika pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, ɀicafanana nokuzuzwa kwomuoriʋi, neɀakasara kana mizambiriŋga yakohwiwa.
Iʋo ʋacaɗanidzira, ʋacapururudza; nokuɗa kwoʋumambo bgaJehova ʋanoɗanidzira ʋari paguŋgwa.
Saka rumbidzai Jehova kumabvazuʋa, iro zita raJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, paɀiwi ɀeguŋgwa.
Takanzwa nziyo dziciimbga kumigumo yenyika,
Kutya, negomba, nomusuŋgo ɀicakuwira, iwe ugere panyika.
Ɀino, unotiza ɓope rokutyisa, ucawira mugomba; unokwira acibva mukati megomba, ucaɓatwa nomusuŋgo; nokuti mawindi okumsoro azaruka, nenheyo dzenyika dzinoɗeɗera.
Nyika yaputswa‐putswa cose, nyika yoɗeɗera cose, nyika yozunuŋguswa cose.
Nyika icadzedzereka somunhu wakaɓatwa, icaɗeŋgenyeka seɗumba; kuɗarika kwayo kucairemedza kwaɀo, icawa, ikasasimuka ɀe.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro Jehova ucaroʋa hondo yaʋakakudzwa ʋari kumsoro, namadzimambo enyika panyika.
Ʋacaʋuŋganidzwa pamŋe cete, seɀinoʋuŋganidzwa ʋasuŋgwa mugomba, ʋacapfigirwa mutoroŋgo; ɀino kana mazuʋa mazhinji apfuʋura ʋacashanyirwa.
Ipapo mŋedzi ucanyadziswa, nezuʋa ricanyara; nokuti Jehova wehondo ucaɓata ʋushe pagomo rezioni, napaJerusarema; pamberi paʋakuru ʋake pacaʋa nokukudzwa.
Jehova, ndimi Mŋari waŋgu! Ndicakukudzai, ndicarumbidza zita renyu; nokuti makaita ɀinoshamisa, iɀo ɀamakafuŋga kare nokutendeka neɀokwaɗi.
Nokuti guta makariita ɗutu
Naiɀoɀo rudzi rukuru rucakukudzai; guta ramarudzi aʋanhu ʋanotyisa ricakutyai.
Nokuti imi maiʋa nhare yaʋarombo, nhare younoshaiwa pakutambudzika kwake, ʋutiziro paŋguʋa yemvura zhinji, mumvuri pakupisa kwezuʋa, kana mhepo yaʋanotyisa iciita semvura zhinji.
Mucaɗeredza ɓope raʋatorwa, seɀinoita kupisa kwezuʋa panɀimbo yakawoma; rwiyo rwaʋanotyisa rucaɗeredzwa, seɀinoitwa kupisa nomumvuri wegore.
Pagomo iri Jehova wehondo ucagadzirira marudzi ose aʋanhu mutambo weɀakakora, mutambo wewaini yakagara pamasese, weɀakakora ɀizere nomŋoŋgo, wewaini yakagara pamasese yakaȿinwa ɀakanaka.
Pagomo iri ucaparadza cifukidziro cinofukidzira ʋanhu ʋose, necidzitiro cakatasanurwa pamsoro pamarudzi ose.
Wakaparadza rufu nokusiŋgaperi, Ishe Jehova ucapisika misodzi paɀiso ɀose; ucabvisa kuɀidzwa kwaʋanhu ʋake panyika yose; nokuti Jehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Nezuʋa iro ʋacati: Tarirai, uyu ndiye Mŋari weɗu; takaŋga takamumirira, iye ucatiponesa; uyu ndiye Jehova, takaŋga takamumirira, ticafara, nokufarira ruponeso rwake.
Nokuti ruʋoko rwaJehova rucagara pagomo iri; Moabi ʋacatsikwa pasi panɀimbo yaʋo, seɀinotsikwa mashaŋga mumvura iri mugomba romupfudze.
Ucatambanudza maʋoko ake imomo, somunhu unotambanudza
Nhare yakakwirira yamaȿiŋgo enyu, wakaiwisira pasi, wakaiɗeredza, wakaiputsira muvu, imo muguruʋa.
Nezuʋa iro rwiyo urwu rucaimbga panyika yaʋaJuda: Tineguta rakasimba; iye ucaisa’po maȿiŋgo nenhare ruʋe ruponeso.
Zarurai masuʋo, kuti rudzi rwakarurama, runoceŋgeta ɀokwaɗi, rupinde.
Unomŋoyo wakasimba mucamuceŋgeta murugare rukuru, nokuti unoʋimba nemi.
Ʋimbai naJehova nokusiŋgaperi; nokuti munaJehova, iye Jehova, muneɗombo risiŋgaperi.
Nokuti wakaɗeredza ʋagere pakakwirira,
Ricatsikwa netsoka, idzo tsoka dzaʋarombo, nokutsika kwaʋanoshaiwa.
Nzira yaʋakarurama yakarurama; imi munoruramisa nzira yaʋakarurama.
Ɀirokwaɀo, takakumirirai Jehova, panzira yokutoŋga kwenyu; mŋeya yeɗu inoshuʋa zita renyu neciraŋgaridzo cenyu.
Ndakakushuʋai nomŋeya waŋgu ʋusiku; ɀirokwaɀo, ndicakutȿakai ɀikuru nomŋeya waŋgu uri mukati maŋgu; nokuti kana kutoŋga kwenyu kuri panyika, ʋanhu ʋagere munyika ʋanodzidza ɀakarurama.
Wakaipa kunyaŋge acinzwirwa tsitsi, haaŋgadzidzi ɀakarurama; ucaita hake ɀisakarurama panyika yakarurama, haaŋgaʋoni ʋumambo bgaJehova.
Jehova, ruʋoko rwenyu rwakasimudzwa, asi haʋaʋoni; asi ʋacaʋona kushiŋgaira kwenyu pamsoro paʋanhu, ʋakanyadziswa; ɀirokwaɀo mŋoto ucapedza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu.
Jehova, imi mucatigadzirira rugare; nokuti makatiɓatira ʋo maɓasa eɗu ose.
Jehova Mŋari weɗu, mamŋe madzishe kunze kwenyu akaŋga akatiɓata; asi ticarumbidza zita renyu
Ʋakafa haʋaŋgararami ɀe, ʋaparara, haʋazomuki ɀe; saka makaȿika kwaʋari, mukaʋaparadza, nokugumisa kuraŋgarirwa kwaʋo kwose.
Mawanza rudzi, Jehova, mawanza rudzi; makurumbira, makurisa miganho yose yenyika.
Jehova, ʋakakutȿakai paŋguʋa yokutambudzika; ʋakaɗurura munyeŋgetero muciʋaraŋga.
Mukadzi unemimba, waȿika pedyo pakusurumuka, seɀaanorwadziwa acicema pakurwadziwa kwake, ndiɀo ɀatakaŋga takaita pamberi penyu, Jehova.
Isu takaŋga tinemimba, takaŋga tiri pakurwadziwa, takaɓereka ɀineŋge mhepo
Ʋakafa ʋenyu ʋacararama, ɀitunha ɀaŋgu ɀicamuka. Mukai, muimbe, imi mugere muguruʋa; nokuti ɗoʋa renyu rakaita seɗoʋa reciedza; nyika icaɓuɗisa ʋakafa.
Ʋuyai ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, pindai muimba yenyu yomukati, mupfige mikoʋa yenyu shure kwenyu; muʋande ŋguʋa ɗuku, kuȿikira kutsamŋa kwapfuʋura.
Nokuti tarira, Jehova unoɓuɗa panɀimbo yake kuroʋa ʋagere panyika nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀaʋo; nyika ʋo icafukura ropa rayo, ikasazofukidza ɀe ʋakaʋurawa ʋayo.
Nezuʋa iro Jehova ucaroʋa nomunondo wake mukukutu, mukuru, nounesimba, reviatani, iyo nyoka inokurumidza, nereviatani, nyoka yakagonyana; ucaʋuraya cikara ciri muguŋgwa.
Nezuʋa iro
Ini Jehova ndini muceŋgeti wawo; ndicauɗiridza ŋguʋa imŋe neimŋe; ndicauceŋgeta masikati noʋusiku, kuti urege kutadziwa nomunhu.
Ini handinehasha; ɗai rukato neminzwa ɀairwa neni! Ndaiɀiʋamba, ndaiɀipisa pamŋe cete.
Kana asiŋgaɗaro, ŋgaaɓate simba raŋgu, ayanane neni, ŋgaayanane neni.
Namazuʋa anoʋuya Jakobo ucamera midzi; Israeri ucatuŋga maruʋa nokutumbuka; ʋacazadza nyika yose neɀiɓereko.
Ko wakaʋaroʋa iye seɀaakaroʋa aʋo ʋakaʋaroʋa here? Ko ʋakaʋurawa nokuʋurawa kwaiʋo ʋakaʋurawa naʋo here?
Pakuʋadziŋga kwenyu makarwa naʋo neciyero

Saka nenzira iyi ɀakaipa ɀaJakobo ɀicadzikinurwa; iɀi ndiɀo ɀiɓereko ɀose ɀokubviswa kweɀiʋi ɀake, kana aciita mabge ose eartari aʋe samabge omunyaka akaputswa‐putswa, kuti miti yakatsaurwa nemifananidzo yezuʋa ɀirege kuzomiswa.
Nokuti guta, rakakombga noruȿiŋgo, rasiyiwa riri roga, bgaʋa ʋugaro bgasiyiwa riri ɗoŋgo, serenje; ndipo pacaʋa namafuro emhuru, ndipo paicaʋata pasi, icidya mashizha apo.
Kana mataʋi apo awoma, acavunwa; ʋakadzi ʋacaʋuya ʋaciapisa; nokuti ʋanhu
Ɀino nezuʋa iro Jehova ucapura
Ɀino nezuʋa iro hwamanda huru icaridzwa; ʋakaŋga ʋoparara panyika yeAsiria, naʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgirwa kunyika yeEgipita, ʋacaʋuya; ʋacanamata Jehova pagomo dɀene paJerusarema.
Korona, inoɀikudza, yaʋakaɓatwa ʋokwaEfraimi, inenhamo, ʋuye ruʋa, rinowoma, rokunaka kwake kukuru, riri pamusoro womupata wakaʋorera waʋakakundwa newaini.
Tarirai, Ishe unomumŋe unesimba unokurira; ucawisira pasi noruʋoko rwake seɗutu guru rinecimvuramabge, seɗutu rinoparadza, sokunaya kwemvura zhinji inokukura kwose.
Korona inoɀikudza yaʋakaɓatwa ʋokwaEfraimi icatsikwa pasi netsoka;
ruʋa, rinowoma, rokunaka kwake kukuru, riri pamusoro womupata wakaʋorera, ricaʋa seʋonde rinotaŋga kuibva zhezha ricigere kuȿika; rinoti ricatarirwa nowariʋona, ndokuridya riciri muruʋoko rwake.
Nezuʋa iro Jehova wehondo ucaʋa korona inobginya noʋukomba bgakaiȿo‐naka kunaʋakasara ʋaʋanhu ʋake;
nomŋeya wokururamisa kunougere pakutoŋga, nesimba kunaʋanodzosera ʋanorwa pasuʋo.

Asi naiʋo ʋanodzuŋgunyika newaini, ʋanodzedzereka neɀinoɓata; muprista nomuprofita ʋanodzuŋgunyika neɀinoɓata, ʋakamedzwa newaini, ʋanodzedzereka neɀinoɓata; ʋanokaŋganiswa pakuʋona, ʋanogumburwa pakutoŋga.
Nokuti matafura aʋo azere namarutsi anosemesa, hapana‐pakanaka.
Ndianiko waacadzidzisa ziʋo? Ndianiko waacadzidzisa kunzwisisa shoko? Iʋo ʋakarumurwa pamukaka, ʋakabviswa pazamu here?
Nokuti ɀinoŋgoti cireʋo pamsoro pecireʋo, cireʋo pamsoro pecireʋo, murairo pamsoro pomurairo, murairo pamsoro pomurairo, apa ɀishoma, napapo ɀishoma.
Ɀirokwaɀo ucataura norudzi urwu
akati kwaʋari: Zororo riri pano, zorodzai ʋakaneta; pano ndi’po panokutonhorera; asi ʋakaramba kuterera.

Saka shoko raJehova ricaʋa kwaʋari: Cireʋo pamsoro pecireʋo, cireʋo pamsoro pecireʋo, murairo pamsoro pomurairo, murairo pamsoro pomurairo, apa ɀishoma, napapo ɀishoma; kuti ʋaende, ʋawe nenhenda shure, ʋavunike, ʋaɓatwe nomusuŋgo, ʋatapxe.
Naiɀoɀo inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋaɗaɗi, ʋanoɓata noʋushe ʋanhu aʋa ʋari paJerusarema:
Imi ɀamakati: Takaita suŋgano norufu, takatenderana neSheori, kana shamhu, inokukura, icipfuʋura, haiŋgaȿiki kwatiri, nokuti nhema takadziita ʋutiziro bgeɗu, takandoʋanda pasi pokunyeŋgetera;
naiɀoɀo Ishe Jehova unoti: Tarirai, ndinoisa paZioni ibge riʋe nheyo, riri ibge rakaidzwa, rinokosha rekona kuita nheyo yakasimba; unotenda haakurumidzi.
Kururamisira ndicakuita rwonzi, nokururama ndicakuita cokururamisa naco; cimvuramabge cicakukura ʋutiziro bgenhema, mvura icafukidza nɀimbo yokuʋanda.
Suŋgano yenyu yamakaita norufu icadzimŋa, nokutenderana kwenyu neSheori hakuŋgamiri; kana shamhu, inokukura, icipfuʋura, mucatsikwa pasi nayo.
Ŋguʋa imŋe neimŋe kana icipfuʋura, icakutorai; nokuti masikati noʋusiku, maŋgwanani namaŋgwanani, icapfuʋura; kucaŋgotyisa ɓedzi kunzwisisa mharidzo yakaɗaro.
Nokuti mubeda ucaʋa mufupi, munhu haaŋgagoni kutandaʋara pamsoro pawo, nejira ricaʋa ɗuku, munhu haaŋgagoni kuɀifukidza naro.
Nokuti Jehova ucasimuka seɀaakaita pagomo rePerazimi, ucatsamŋa seɀaakaita pamupata weGibeoni; kuti aɓate ɓasa rake, iro ɓasa rake rinoshamisa, nokuita iɀo ɀaanoita, ɀinoshamisa.
Naiɀoɀo regai kuʋa ʋaɗaɗi, kuti ɀisuŋgo ɀenyu ɀirege kusimbiswa; nokuti ndakanzwa kunaShe Jehova wehondo kuti nyika yose yakatemerwa kuparadzwa.
Rerekai nzeʋe dzenyu, munzwe inzwi raŋgu; tererai, munzwe kutaura kwaŋgu.
Ko murimi, unoɗa kudɀara, unoswera acirima here? Unoswera aciparura munda nokuputsa maviŋga here?
Kana aciŋge aenzanisa ivu rawo, haakushi kumini nhema here, nokudɀara kumini, nokuisa ɀiyo mumisara, nebari pandima dzakatarwa, nesipereti kunhiʋi dzawo here?
Nokuti Mŋari wake unomuziʋisa ɀakanaka nokumudzidzisa.
Nokuti kumini nhema haipurwi nomupuro unopinza, negumbo reŋgoro harikuŋguruswi pamsoro pekumini; asi kumini nhema inopurwa netȿimbo, nekumini neshamhu.
Ɀiyo ɀeciŋgwa ɀinokuyiwa, haaŋgarambi aciɀipura; kunyaŋge gumbo reŋgoro yake namabiza ake ɀiciɀiparadzira, haaŋgaɀikuyi.
Naiɀoɀi ɀinobva kunaJehova wehondo, unoshamisa neɀaanofuŋga, mukuru kwaɀo pakuɓata kwake.
Arieri, Arieri, unenhamo, iwe guta maidzika Davidi matente ake! wedzerai gore pagore, ŋguʋa dzemitambo ŋgadziȿike;
ipapo ndicamanikidza Arieri, kucema nokuwuŋgudza ɀicaʋa’po; ricaʋa kwandiri seArieri.
Ndicakukomba panhiʋi dzose, ndicakukomba naʋarwi ʋanorindira, ndicaʋaka maȿiŋgo okurwa newe.
Ucawiswa pasi, ucataura uri pasi muvu; kutaura kwako kucabva pasi muguruʋa; inzwi rako ricaʋa sereȿikiro rinobva pasi muvu, kutaura kwako kucaita zeʋe‐zeʋe kucibva muguruʋa.
Asi ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋazhinji ʋacaʋa seguruʋa rakatsetseka, naʋanotyisa sehundi inopepereka; ɀirokwaɀo ɀicaitwa kamŋe‐kamŋe, pakarepo.
Ucashanyirwa naJehova wehondo nokutinhira, nokuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika, nomubvumo mukuru, necampupuri, neɗutu guru, nomuraɀo womŋoto unopedza ɀose.
Kuwanda kwamarudzi ose anorwa neArieri, iʋo ʋose ʋanorwa naro nenhare yaro, ʋacaita seɀinorotwa, seɀinoʋonekwa ʋusiku.

Ɀicafanana nokurota kwomunhu unenzara, aciti ndinodya; asi unopepuka, ndokuwana mŋeya wake usinecinhu; kana sokurota kwomunhu unenyota, aciti ndinonwa; asi unopepuka, wanei waziya, mŋeya wake unopaŋga
Mirai mushame! Ɀipofomadzei, muʋe mapofu! Ʋakaɓatwa, asi haʋana‐kuɓatwa newaini, ʋanodzedzereka, asi haʋadzedzereki neɀinoɓata.
Nokuti Jehova wakaɗurura pamsoro penyu mŋeya wokuɓatwa nehope kwaɀo, akafumbira meso enyu, ʋaprofita; nemisoro yenyu, ʋaʋoni, wakaʋafukidza.
Kuʋona kwose kwaʋa kwamuri samashoko orugwaro rwakanamirwa, runopiwa munhu unogona kuraʋa, ɀicinzi: Ƌoraʋa hako iɀoɀi; iye ndokuti: Handigoni, nokuti rwakanamirwa;
ɀino rugwaro runopiwa usina‐kudzidza, ɀicinzi: Ƌoraʋa hako iɀoɀi; iye ndokuti: Handina‐kudzidza.
Ishe akati: Aʋa ʋanhu ɀaʋanosweɗera
naiɀoɀo tarirai, ndicapfuʋura ndiciita pakati paʋanhu aʋa ɓasa rinoshamisa, ɓasa rinoshamisa necishamiso; ʋucenjeri bgaʋakacenjera ʋaʋo ʋucapera, nenjere dzaʋanhu ʋaʋo ʋakaŋgwara dzicaʋanzwa.
Ʋanenhamo ʋanotȿaka kuʋanzira Jehova mano aʋo pakadzika, maɓasa aʋo ari murima, ʋaciti: Ndiani unotiʋona, ndiani unotiziʋa?
Haiwa, kutadza kwenyu! Ko muʋumbi wehari wakaenzana nevu here, kuti cakaitwa citi pamsoro pomuiti waco: Iye haanakundiita; kana cakaʋumbga citi pamsoro pomuʋumbi waco: Iye haanenjere?
Ko hakuna‐kusara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku‐ɗuku here, Rebanoni ricashandurwa riʋe munda unoɓereka ɀakanaka, nomunda unoɓereka ɀakanaka ucanzi iɗondo?
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ʋematsi ʋacanzwa mashoko orugwaro, meso amapofu acaʋona ari pakaȿiɓa napanerima.
Ʋanyoro ʋacawedzera ʋo mufaro waʋo munaJehova, ʋarombo pakati paʋanhu ʋacafara kwaɀo muMutȿene waIsraeri.
Nokuti unotyisa waparadzwa, muɗaɗi waguma, naʋose ʋanogarira ɀakaipa ʋabviswa;
iʋo ʋanopomera munhu mhaka nokuɗa kweshoko, ʋanoteyira munhu musuŋgo, unoraira
Saka ɀanzi naJehova, wakadzikinura Abrahama, pamsoro peimba yaJakobo: Jakobo haaŋganyadziswi ɀino, ciso cake ɀino haciŋgaceneruki.
Asi kana aciʋona ʋana ʋake, iro ɓasa ramaʋoko aŋgu, pakati pake, ʋacati zita raŋgu idɀene; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacati Mutȿene waJakobo mutȿene, ʋacatya Mŋari waIsraeri.
Ʋakarashika pamŋeya ʋo ʋacaʋa nenjere, ʋanonyunyuta ʋacadzidziswa.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋanenhamo ʋana ʋano
ʋanoɀiroŋgedza kuenda Egipita, ʋasino‐kubvunza muromo waŋgu, kuti ʋaɀisimbise nesimba raFarao, nokuʋanda mumumvuri weEgipita.
Naiɀoɀo simba raFarao ricakunyadzisai, kuʋanda kwenyu mumumvuri waFarao kucaʋa kukaŋganisa kwenyu.
Nokuti macinda aʋo ari paZoani, nhume dzake dzaȿika Hanesi.
Ʋose ʋacanyadziswa pamsoro porudzi rwaʋanhu ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋafumisa, ʋasiŋgaʋaɓatsiri kana kuʋafumisa, asi kuʋanyadzisa nokuʋashoʋodza.
Cireʋo pamsoro peɀikara ɀenyika yezasi.

Panyika yokutambudzika neyokucema, kunobva shumba hadzi negonho, nenyoka, nenyoka yomŋoto inobururuka, ndi’po paʋanotakudza fuma yaʋo pamsoro pamafudzi aʋana ʋemboŋgoro, neɀinokosha ɀaʋo panyuŋgwa dzamakamera, ʋaciɀiisa kuʋanhu ʋasiŋgaʋafumisi.
Nokuti Egipita inoɓatsira pasina, ɀisinamaturo; saka ndakaitumidza zita rokuti Rahabi unoŋgogara ɀake.
Ɀino cienda, uɀinyore pamberi paʋo pahwendefa rebge, uɀinyore mubuku, ɀiʋe’po paŋguʋa inoʋuya nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Nokuti aʋa rudzi runo
ʋanoti kuʋaʋoni: Musaʋona; nokuʋaprofita: Musatiprofitera ɀinhu ɀakarurama, tiʋudzei ɀinofadza, tiprofitere ɀinonyeŋgera;
ibvai panzira, tsaukai pagwara, bvisai Mutȿene waIsraeri pamberi peɗu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi noMutȿene waIsraeri: Ɀamunoɀidza shoko iri, muciʋimba nokumanikidzwa nokunyeŋgera, muciɀitenda iɀo;
naiɀoɀo kuipa uku kucaʋa kwamuri sapakakoromoka panoɗa kuwa, panotȿeyama paruȿiŋgo rwakareɓa, panowa kamŋe‐kamŋe pakarepo.
Ucaiputsa seɀinoputswa mudziyo womuʋumbi, ucaiputsa‐putsa asinenyasha, kuȿikira pacishaikwa pakati peɀimeɗu ɀayo caeŋga cokundogoka mŋoto naco pacoto, kana kutekesa mvura naco patsime.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova, Mutȿene waIsraeri: Pakudzoka nokuzorora ndi’po panoruponeso rwenyu, pakunyarara napakutenda ndi’po pacaʋa nesimba renyu; asi makaramba,
mukati: Kwete, ticatiza takataȿa mabiza; saka mucatiza ɀenyu; ʋuye ɀe: Ticataȿa
Ʋanecuru
Naiɀoɀo Jehova ucambomira, kuti akunzwirei tsitsi; naiɀoɀo ucakudzwa, kuti aʋe nenyasha nemi, nokuti Jehova ndiMŋari wokururamisira; ʋakaropafadzwa ʋose ʋanomumirira.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋacagara paZioni paJerusarema; hamuŋgazocemi, ɀirokwaɀo ucakunzwirai tsitsi, kana acinzwa kucema kwenyu; kana acinzwa, ucakupindurai.
Kunyaŋge Ishe akakupai ciŋgwa cenhamo nemvura yokutambudzika, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋadzidzisi ʋenyu haʋaŋgazoʋandi, asi meso enyu acaʋona ʋadzidzisi ʋenyu;
nzeʋe dzenyu dzicanzwa shoko shure kwenyu, riciti: Heyi nzira, fambai nayo! kana muciɗa kutsaukira kurudyi, kana ɀimŋe muciɗa kutsaukira kuruɓoshwe.
Mucashatsa sirveri yakafukidza mifananidzo yenyu yakaʋezwa, nendarama yakanamirwa pamifananidzo yenyu yakaʋumbga; ucairashira kure secinhu cakashata; ucati kwaciri: Ibva pano.
Ucakupa mvura yokumeresa mbeu yako, yaucadɀara muvu; neɀokudya, ɀinoɓerekwa nevu, ɀicaʋa ɀakakora ɀizhinji. Nezuʋa iro ŋombe dzenyu dzicafura pamafuro makuru;
nzombe naʋana ʋemboŋgoro, ɀinorima minda, ɀicadya ɀokudya ɀakaruŋgwa, ɀakarudzwa nemitȿairo nemisero.
Pamsoro pegomo rimŋe nerimŋe rakareɓa, napacikomo cimŋe necimŋe cakakwirira, pacaʋa nenzizi nehoʋa dzemvura, nezuʋa rokuʋurawa kukuru kana shoŋgwe dziciwa.

Ʋuye ɀe, ciedza comŋedzi cicafanana neciedza cezuʋa, ciedza cezuʋa cicawedzerwa kanomŋe, seciedza camazuʋa manomŋe, nezuʋa iro kana Jehova acisuŋga pakakuʋara paʋanhu ʋake, nokuporesa ʋaŋga raʋakarobga.
Tarirai, zita raJehova rinobva kure, ricipisa nokutsamŋa kwake, riciɓuɗisa ʋutsi ʋuzhinji; miromo yake izere nehasha, rurimi rwake rwakafanana nomŋoto unopedza
mŋeya wake wakaita sorwizi runofema kunze, runoȿikira pamutsipa, kuti asere marudzi aʋanhu nomusero wokuparadza; matomu anotsausa
Mucaimba rwiyo, seɀinoitwa ʋusiku kana mutambo mutȿene ucitambga; mucaʋa nokufara kwomŋoyo, wakafanana nowomunhu unoenda aciridza nyere kugomo raJehova, kuɗombo raIsraeri.
Jehova ucanzwisa inzwi rake roʋumambo, ucaratidza kuɓuruka kworuʋoko rwake, nokutsamŋa kwake kukuru, nomuraɀo womŋoto unopedza ɀose, necampupuri, nokunaya kukuru kwemvura, necimvuramabge.
Nokuti muAsiria ucakaŋganiswa nenzwi raJehova; ucamuroʋa neshamhu.
Kuroʋa kwose kwetȿimbo yakatumŋa, yaacarobga nayo naJehova, kucaitwa nokurira kweŋgoma nembira; ucarwa naʋo nokurwa kucaʋazunuŋgusa.
Nokuti Tofeti rakagara ragadzirwa; ɀirokwaɀo rakagadzirirwa mambo; wakaridzikisa nokurikurisa; ɗutu riri’po mŋoto nehuni zhinji; mŋeya waJehova, wakafanana norwizi rwesurferi, ucaɀipfutidza.

Ʋanenhamo ʋanoɓurukira Egipita kundotȿaka kuɓatsirwa, ʋanotenda mabiza, ʋanoʋimba neŋgoro dzokurwa nokuti izhinji, ʋuye naʋataȿi ʋamabiza nokuti ʋanesimba kwaɀo, asi haʋatariri kunoMutȿene waIsraeri, kana kutȿaka Jehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro naiye wakacenjera, ucaʋuyisa nhamo, haaŋgadzosi mashoko ake, asi ucamukira imba yaʋanoita ɀakaipa, naʋanoɓatsirana naʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Ɀino ʋaEgipita ʋanhu, haʋazi Mŋari, namabiza aʋo inyama, haazi mŋeya; ɀino kana Jehova acitambanudza ruʋoko rwake, unoɓatsira ucagumburwa nounoɓatsirwa ucawira pasi, ʋose ʋacapera pamŋe cete.

Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova kwandiri: Ɀakaita seshumba nomŋana weshumba ɀinoʋombera cayaɓata; kunyaŋge ʋafudzi ʋazhinji ʋakakokerwa kuzorwa nayo, haiŋgavunduswi namanzwi aʋo, haiŋgaʋi nehanya nokupopota kwaʋo; saiɀoɀo Jehova wehondo ucaɓurukira pamsoro pegomo reZioni napamsoro pecikomo caro kuzorwa naʋo.
Seshiri dzinoeŋgerera, saiɀoɀo Jehova ucataʋirira Jerusarema; ucaritaʋirira nokurirwira, ucariɗarika nokurisunuŋgura.
Dzokerai kunaiye wamakamukira ɀikuru, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Nokuti nezuʋa iro mumŋe nomumŋe ucarasha ɀifananidzo ɀake ɀe sirveri neɀifananidzo ɀake ɀendarama, ɀamakaɀiitira namaʋoko enyu, ɀikaʋa ɀiʋi kwamuri.
Ipapo muAsiria ucawa nomunondo usati uri womunhu; munondo usati uri waʋanhu ucamudya; ucatiza pamberi pomunondo, namajaya ake acaɓatira cibaro.
Ƌombo rake ricatiza nokutya, macinda ake acavunduswa nomureza, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, unomŋoto wake paZioni, necoto cake paJerusarema.
Tarirai, mambo ucaɓata ʋushe nokururama, macinda acaɓata aciruramisira.
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ucaʋa soʋutiziro pamhepo, seciʋando pakunaya kukuru kwemvura, senzizi dzemvura panɀimbo yakawoma, somumvuri weɗombo guru panyika yafa nenyota.
Meso aʋanoʋona haaŋgatsinzini, nzeʋe dzaʋanonzwa dzicaterera.
Mŋoyo yaʋanotaura ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri ɀakanaka icanzwisisa ziʋo, marimi aʋanokakamira acaziʋa kutaura ɀakanaka.
Ƃenzi haricazonzi munhu wakakudzwa, munyeŋgeri haaŋganzi mukomboreri.
Nokuti ɓenzi rinotaura ɀoʋupenzi, mŋoyo waro unoita ɀakaipa, ɀaanoita ɀinomhura
Mitoʋo yomunyeŋgeri yakaipa; unofuŋga mano akaipa, kuti aparadze ʋanyoro namashoko enhema, kunyaŋge unoshaiwa acitaura ɀakanaka.
Asi wakarurama unofuŋga ɀinhu ɀakarurama; unorambira panzira yeɀakarurama.
Simukai, imi ʋakadzi ʋagere ɀakanaka, munzwe inzwi raŋgu; imi ʋakunda ʋasinehanya, tererai kutaura kwaŋgu.
Nokuti kana kwapfuʋura gore namazuʋa, mucatambudzika, imi ʋasinehanya; nokuti kukohwiwa kwamazambiriŋga kucakona, ŋguʋa yokuʋuŋganidza haiŋgaȿiki.
Ƌeɗerai, imi ʋakadzi ʋagere ɀakanaka; tambudzikai, imi ʋasinehanya; ɀifukurei, mubvise ŋguʋo dzenyu, muɀisuŋge ɀiʋuno
Ʋacaɀiroʋa ɀifuʋa nokuɗa kweminda yaifadza, nomuzambiriŋga waiɓereka ɀakanaka.
Panyika yaʋanhu ʋaŋgu pacamera minzwa norukato; ɀirokwaɀo, pamsoro pedzimba dzose dzomufaro muguta romufaro.
Nokuti imba yamambo icasiyiwa, guta rinaʋanhu ʋazhinji ricaita ɗoŋgo; cikomo nenhare ɀicashanduka mapako nokusiŋgaperi, panofara mbizi, namafuro eɀipfuwo;
kuȿikira mŋeya uciɗururwa pamsoro peɗu ucibva kumsoro, renje rikaita munda unoɓereka ɀakanaka, nomunda unoɓereka ɀakanaka ucinzi iɗondo.
Ipapo kururamisira kucagara murenje, kururama kucagara mumunda unoɓereka ɀakanaka.
Ƃasa rokururama ricaʋa rugare, ɀiɓereko ɀokururama ɀicaʋa kunyarara nokutenda nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋacagara paʋugaro ʋunorugare, napadzimba dzakasimba, napanɀimbo dzokuzorora dzakadzikama.
Asi cimvuramabge cicaʋa’po kana ɗondo riciwa, neguta ricaparadzwa cose.
Makaropafadzwa imi munokusha pose panemvura, munosundira makumbo enzombe neemboŋgoro.

Unenhamo, iwe unoparadza, usino‐kuparadzwa umene; iwe unoita nokunyeŋgera, asi haʋanakukuitira nokunyeŋgera, iwe! Kana wapedza kuparadza, newe ʋo ucaparadzwa, kana wapedza kuita nokunyeŋgera, ʋacakuitira nokunyeŋgera newe ʋo.
Jehova mutinzwirei tsitsi, takakumirirai; iʋai ruʋoko rwaʋo maŋgwanani ose, noruponeso rweɗu paŋguʋa yokutambudzika.
Marudzi aʋanhu akatiza acinzwa mubvumo, marudzi akaparadzirwa imi mucisimuka.
Ɀakapambga ɀenyu ɀicaparadzwa, seɀinoparadza gwatakwata; somumhanyire wemhashu, saiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋacamhanyira kwaɀiri.
Jehova wakakudzwa, nokuti unogara kumsoro; wakazadza Zioni nokururamisira nokururama.
Paŋguʋa dzako pacaʋa nokugarika, nokuwanda kwokuponeswa, noʋucenjeri neziʋo; kutya Jehova ndiyo fuma yake.
Tarirai, mhare dzaʋo dzinoɗanidzira dziri kunze; nhume dzorugare dzinocema ɀikuru.
Migwagwa mikuru yaparadzwa, ʋafambi haʋaci’po; waputsa suŋgano, waɀidza maguta, haanehanya nomunhu.
Nyika inocema, yaziya; Rebanoni ranyadziswa, rowoma; Sharoni rafanana nerenje; Bashani neKarmeri azuka
Ɀino ndicasimuka, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ɀino ndicaɀisimudza, ɀino ndicakudzwa.
Imi mucaʋa nemimba yehundi, mucaɓereka mashaŋga; mŋeya wenyu mŋoto ucakupedzai.
Marudzi aʋanhu acaita sokupiswa kwesuko, seminzwa yakatemŋa, inopiswa nomŋoto.
Inzwai, imi muri kure, ɀandakaita; imi muri pedyo, muziʋe simba raŋgu.
Ʋatadzi ʋari paZioni ʋanotya, ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari, ʋaɓatwa nokuɗeɗera. Ndianiko pakati peɗu uŋgagara nomŋoto unoparadza? Ndiani pakati peɗu uŋgagara nokupisa kusiŋgaperi?
Ndiye unofamba nokururama, unotaura ɀakarurama; iye unoshoʋora fuma yakawanikwa nokunyeŋgera, unozuza maʋoko ake aciramba fufuro, unodziʋira nzeʋe dzake, kuti arege kunzwa
iye ucagara pakakwirira, nhare dzamatombo dzicaʋa ʋutiziro bgake; ɀokudya ɀake ucaɀipiwa, mvura yake haiŋgapxi.
Meso ako acaʋona mambo pakunaka kwake, acaʋona nyika yakakura kwaɀo.
Mŋoyo wako ucaraŋgarira
Hauŋgazoʋoni ʋanhu ʋanehasha, ʋanhu ʋanorurimi runoshamisa, rwausiŋgagoni kunzwa, rurimi rwokumŋe rwausiŋgagoni kunzwisisa.
Tarirai Zioni, iro guta remitambo yeɗu; meso ako acaʋona Jerusarema bgaʋa ʋugaro bgakadzikama, tente risiŋgazobviswi, mbambo dzaro dzisiŋgazovomorwi, neɓote raro rimŋe risiŋgazoɗamburwi.
Asi Jehova ucaʋa’po nesu noʋumambo bgake,
Nokuti Jehova ndiye mutoŋgi weɗu, Jehova ndiye mutemi wemirairo yeɗu, Jehova ndiye mambo weɗu; iye ucatiponesa.
Maɓote ako akati ɗembu‐tembu; haagoni kusimbisa muromo wapasi weɗanda recikepe caʋo, haagoni kutasanura seiri; ipapo ɀakatapxa neɀakapambga ɀizhinji ɀinogoʋerwa; ɀirema ɀinotora ɀakatapxa.
Hakuna‐ugere’mo, ucati: ndinorwara; ʋanhu ʋagere’mo ʋacakaŋganwirwa ɀakaipa ɀaʋo.
Sweɗerai, imi marudzi aʋanhu, munzwe, tererai imi ʋanhu; nyika ŋgainzwe, neɀose ɀayo, pasi pose, neɀose ɀinoɓuɗa’mo.
Nokuti Jehova wakatsamŋira marudzi ose, unehasha nehondo dzawo dzose; wakaʋaparadza cose, wakaʋaisa pakuʋurawa.
Ʋakaʋurawa ʋaʋo ʋacarashwa kunze, kunhuwa kweɀitunha ɀaʋo kucakwira, makomo acanyauswa neropa raʋo.
Hondo dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzicanyakatika, ɗeŋga rose ricapetwa sorugwaro rwakapetwa; hondo dzaro dzose dzicawoma, sokuwoma kwamashizha pamuzambiriŋga, ʋuye seshizha rinowoma pamuʋonde.
Nokuti munondo waŋgu wanwa ukaguta kuɗeŋga; tarirai ucaɓurukira pamsoro paEdomi, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋakatukwa neni, kuti ʋatoŋgwe.
Munondo waJehova uzere neropa, unobginya namafuta, neropa ramakwaiana nerembudzana, namafuta etȿo dzamakondobge; nokuti Jehova uneciɓayiro
Nyati dzicawa pamŋe cete naʋo, nenzombe pamŋe cete nehando; nyika yaʋo icaɓatwa neropa, guruʋa raʋo ricazara namafuta.
Nokuti Jehova unezuʋa rokutsiʋa,
Hoʋa dzayo dzicashanduka namo, guruʋa rayo surferi, nyika yayo icaitwa namo inopfuta.
Haiŋgadzimŋi ʋusiku namasikati; ʋutsi bgayo ʋucakwira nokusiŋgaperi; ricaʋa ɗoŋgo kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi; hakunomunhu uŋgapfuʋura noko nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi ɀicaʋa ɀehukurwizi nenuŋgu; zizi neguŋguʋu ɀicagara’mo; ucatambanudzira’po rwonzi rwokuparadza necokururamisa ceɀisinecinhu.
Ʋakuru ʋayo ʋacaɗanirwa kuʋushe, asi haʋaŋgaʋi’po; macinda ayo ose acaʋa pasina.
Minzwa icamera mudzimba dzamadzimambo ayo, ʋutumbambeʋa norukato munhare dzayo; ʋucaʋa ʋugaro bgamakaʋa, nenɀimbo yemhou.
Ɀikara ɀomusaŋgo ɀicasoŋgana namapere, mŋeya wakaipa ucaɗana shamŋari yawo; ɀirokwaɀo, cikara coʋusiku cicagara’po norugare, ciciwana’po nɀimbo yokuzorora.
Roʋambira icaita ɗendere rayo’po, nokukandira, nokucoconya mazai ayo, nokuʋuŋganidza
Tȿakai pabuku yaJehova, muraʋe; hapanecimŋe ceɀinhu iɀi cicashaikwa, cicashaiwa shamŋari yaco; nokuti muromo waŋgu wakaraira iɀoɀo, nomŋeya wake wakaɀiʋuŋganidza.
Iye wakaɀikandira mijenya, ruʋoko rwake rwakaɀiganhurira nyika norwonzi; icaʋa yaɀo nokusiŋgaperi, ʋacagara’mo kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Renje nenyika yakawoma ɀicafara; saŋgo ricafara kwaɀo, ricatumbuka seruʋa.
Ricatumbuka ɀizhinji, nokufara kwaɀo nomufaro nokuimba; ricapiwa kunaka kukuru kweRebanoni, noʋukomba bgeKarmeri neSharoni; ʋacaʋona kunaka kukuru kwaJehova, ibgo ʋukomba bgaMŋari weɗu.
Simbisai maʋoko asinesimba, mutsigire mabvi anoɗeɗera.
Itiyi kunaʋanemŋoyo inotya: Simbai, musatya! Tarirai, Mŋari wenyu ucaʋuya nokutsiʋa, nokuripira kwaMŋari; ucaʋuya acikuponesai.
Ipapo meso amapofu acaȿinudzwa, nenzeʋe dzematsi dzicadziʋurwa.
Ipapo unokamhina ucakwakuka senondo, rurimi rwembeʋeʋe rucaimba; nokuti mvura zhinji icadzutuka murenje, nehoʋa dzemvura musaŋgo.
Jeca, rinopisa, ricashanduka dziʋa, nevu, rinenyota, ɀituɓu ɀemvura; paʋugaro bgamakaʋa, paaiʋata, pacaʋa noʋuswa, netsaŋga nenhokwe.
Ipapo pacaʋa nomugwagwa, nenzira, icanzi, Nzira yoʋutȿene; unetȿina haaŋgafambi nayo, asi icaʋa yaʋo; ʋanofamba nayo, kunyaŋge ari mapenzi, haʋaŋgarashiki.
Hapaŋgaʋi neshumba, kunyaŋge necikara haciŋgafambi’po; haɀiŋgawanikwi’po, asi ʋakadzikinurwa ndiʋo ʋacafamba’po;
ʋakasunuŋgurwa ʋaJehova ʋacadzoka, ʋacaȿika Zioni ʋaciimba; mufaro usiŋgaperi ucaʋa pamisoro yaʋo; ʋacawana mufaro nomŋoyo mucena, kucema nokusuwa kucatiza.
Ɀino negore regumi namanna ramambo Hezekia, Sanheribi mambo weAsiria, wakandorwa namaguta ose aJuda akakombga namaȿiŋgo, akaakunda.
Ɀino mambo weAsiria akatuma mukuru waʋatariri abve Rakishi aende Jerusarema kunamambo Hezekia nehondo huru. Akamira pamugero wedziʋa rokumsoro pamugwagwa unoenda kumunda womusuki.
Ipapo Eriakimi mŋanakomana waHirkia, waiceŋgeta imba
Mukuru waʋatariri akati kwaʋari: Ɀino imi muti kunaHezekia: Ɀanzi namambo mukuru, mambo weAsiria: Kuʋimba uku kwaunoʋimba nako ndokwei?
Ini ndinoti, mano

Tarira, unoʋimba nomuɗonɀo worutsaŋga urwu rwakavunika, Egipita, runoti kana munhu akasendama kwaruri, rucapinda muruʋoko rwake, rukamuɓaya; ndiɀo ɀakaita Farao mambo weEgipita kunaʋose ʋanoʋimba naye.

Asi kana ukati kwandiri: Tinoʋimba naJehova Mŋari weɗu, ko haazi iye wakabvisirwa matunhu akakwirira namaartari ake naHezekia, akati kunaJuda neJerusarema: Munofanira kunamata pamberi peartari iri here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cipikiranai henyu natenzi waŋgu, mambo weAsiria, ndikupe mabiza aneɀuru ɀiʋiri, kana iwe ukagona kuisa ʋataȿi pamsoro pawo.
Uŋgagona seiko kukunda mukuru mumŋe kuʋaɗuku ʋaʋaranda ʋatenzi waŋgu? Ɀino woʋimba neEgipita kuti upiwe ŋgoro namabiza naʋo?
Ini ndaʋuya kuzorwa nenyika ino kuti ndiiparadze ndisinaJehova kanhi? Ndiye Jehova wakati kwandiri: Enda undorwa nenyika iyo, uiparadze.

Ipapo Eriakimi, mŋanakomana waHirkia, naShebna, naJoa ʋakati kumukuru waʋatariri: Tinokumbira kuti mutaure henyu naʋaranda ʋenyu norurimi rweciAramia, nokuti tinocinzwisisa; murege henyu kutaura nesu norurimi rwaʋaJuda, ʋanhu ʋose ʋari paruȿiŋgo ʋaɀinzwe.

Asi mukuru waʋatariri akati kwaari: Tenzi waŋgu wakandituma kunatenzi wako nokwauri here, kuti nditaure mashoko awa? Haana‐kundituma here kuʋanhu ʋagere pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, kuti ʋadye ndoʋe yaʋo nemvura yaʋo pamŋe cete nemi?
Ipapo mukuru waʋatariri akamira, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru norurimi rwaʋaJuda, akataura akati: Inzwai mashoko amambo mukuru, iye mambo weAsiria.
Ɀanzi namambo: Hezekia ŋgaarege kukunyeŋgerai; nokuti haaŋgagoni kukurwirai;
Hezekia ŋgaarege kukuʋimbisai naJehova, aciti: Jehova ucatirwira ɀirokwaɀo; guta iri hariŋgapiwi mumaʋoko amambo weAsiria.
Musaterera Hezekia, nokuti ɀanzi namambo weAsiria: Yananai neni, muɓuɗirei kwandiri, mudye mumŋe nomumŋe muzambiriŋga wake, mumŋe nomumŋe muʋonde wake, mumŋe nomumŋe mvura yetsime rake;
kuȿikira ini ndaʋuya ndikutorei, ndikuisei kunyika yakafanana neyenyu, nyika ineɀiyo newaini, nyika ineciŋgwa neminda yemizambiriŋga.
Cenjerai kuti Hezekia arege kukugombedzerai, aciti: Jehova ucatirwira. Ko mumŋe waʋamŋari ʋamarudzi wakagona kurwira nyika yake paruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria here?
Ʋamŋari ʋeHamati neArpadi ʋaripi? Ʋamŋari ʋeSefarvaimi ʋaripi? Ʋakarwira Samaria paruʋoko rwaŋgu here?
Ndaʋapi pakati paʋamŋari ʋose ʋenyika idzi ʋakarwira nyika yaʋo paruʋoko rwaŋgu, ɀamunoti Jehova ucarwira Jerusarema paruʋoko rwaŋgu?
Asi ʋakaramba ʋanyerere, haʋana kumupindura shoko rimŋe, nokuti murairo wamambo wakaŋga uciti: Regai kumupindura.
Ɀino Eriakimi mŋanakomana waHirkia, waiceŋgeta imba, naShebna munyori, naJoa mŋanakomana waAsafi, gota guru, ʋakaenda kunaHezekia, ʋakabvarura ŋguʋo dzaʋo, ʋakamuʋudza mashoko omukuru waʋatariri.
Ɀino mambo Hezekia wakati aciɀinzwa, akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akafuka makudza, akapinda mumba maJehova.
Akatuma Eriakimi waiceŋgeta imba, naShebna munyori, naʋakuru ʋaʋaprista, ʋakafuka makudza, kumuprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ɀanzi naHezekia: Nhasi izuʋa rokutambudzika, nerokutukwa, nerokuɀidzwa; nokuti ʋana ʋakaȿika pakuɀarwa, asi hakunesimba rokuɀara naro.

Ɀimŋe Mŋari wenyu ucanzwa mashoko ose omukuru waʋatariri, wakatumŋa namambo weAsiria tenzi wake, kuɀidza Mŋari mupenyu, agoʋatuka pamsoro pamashoko aakanzwa iye Jehova Mŋari wenyu; naiɀoɀo nyeŋgetererai ʋakasara.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaranda ʋamambo Hezekia ʋakaȿika kunaIsaya.
Isaya akati kwaʋari: Ʋudzai tenzi wenyu, muti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Usatya hako mashoko awanzwa, andakamhurwa nawo naʋaranda ʋamambo weAsiria.
Tarira, ndicaisa mŋeya
Naiɀoɀo mukuru waʋatariri akadzoka, akawana mambo weAsiria acirwa neRibna, nokuti wakaŋga anzwa kuti wabva Rakishi.
Ɀino wakanzwa pamsoro paTirhaka mambo weEtiopia, ɀicinzi: Waʋuya kuzorwa newe. Ɀino wakati aɀinzwa, akatuma nhume kunaHezekia, aciti:
Endai mundoʋudza Hezekia mambo waJuda, muti: Mŋari wako, waunoʋimba naye, ŋgaarege kukunyeŋgera, aciti: Jerusarema hariŋgapiwi muruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria.
Tarira, wakanzwa ɀakaitirwa nyika dzose namadzimambo eAsiria, kuti ʋakadziparadza cose; ɀino iwe ucarwirwa here?
Ko ʋamŋari ʋamamŋe marudzi ʋakaʋarwira here, iwo akaparadzwa namadziɓaɓa aŋgu, ʋanoti, Gozani, naHarani, naRezefi, naʋana ʋaEdeni, ʋaiʋa paTerasari?
Mambo weHamati uripiko, namambo weArpadi, namambo weguta reSefarvaimi, neHena, neIva?
Hezekia akagamucira ŋwadi pamaʋoko enhume, akairaʋa; Hezekia akakwira kumba kwaJehova, akaipetenura pamberi paJehova.
Ipapo Hezekia akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, aciti:
Haiwa Jehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, iye ugere pamsoro pamakerubimi! Ndimi Mŋari, imi moga, woʋushe bgose bgenyika, ndimi makaita kuɗeŋga napasi.
Rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu, Jehova, munzwe; ȿinudzai meso enyu, Jehova, muʋone; inzwai mashoko ose aSanheribi, wakatuma
Ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova, madzimambo eAsiria akaparadza marudzi ose nenyika dzawo,
akakandira ʋamŋari ʋaʋo mumŋoto; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋamŋari, asi rakaŋga riri ɓasa ramaʋoko aʋanhu, ari matanda namabge; naiɀoɀo akaʋaparadza.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, Jehova, Mŋari weɗu, tiponesei paruʋoko rwake, kuti ʋushe bgose bgenyika ʋuziʋe kuti ndimi Jehova, iyemi moga.
Ipapo Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi, akatuma shoko kunaHezekia, akati: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri: Ɀawanyeŋgetera kwandiri pamsoro paSanheribi mambo weAsiria,
heri shoko rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro pake: Mhandara, mukunda weZioni, wakakushoʋora nokukuseka; mukunda weJerusarema wakakudzuŋgudzira musoro wake.
Ndianiko wawakatuka nokuɀidza? Wakaɀikudza kunaniko nenzwi rako, meso ako akatarira aniko kuɗeŋga? NdiMutȿene waIsraeri!

Watuka Jehova naʋaranda ʋako, ukati: Ndakwira kumakomo marefu neŋgoro dzaŋgu zhinji, kunɀimbo dzomukati dzeRebanoni; ndicatema misidari mirefu iri’po, nemisipresi yakatsaurwa iri’po, ndicapinda kuȿikira kumsoro‐soro kwaro,
ndakacera ndikanwa mvura, ndicapxisa nzizi dzose dzeEgipita nokutsika kwetsoka dzaŋgu.
Hauna‐kunzwa here kuti ndakaɀiita kare, kuti ndakaɀiraira neŋguʋa dzokutaŋga‐taŋga? Ɀino ndakaraira ɀiitike, kuti iwe uʋe muparadzi wamaguta akakombga namaȿiŋgo, aʋe matoŋgo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo ʋakaŋga ʋanesimba ɗuku, ʋakavunduswa nokunyadzwa; ʋakafanana noʋuswa bgeɓundo, nomuriʋo mutema, noʋuswa ʋuri pamsoro peimba, nomunda
Asi ndinoziʋa kugara kwako pasi, nokuɓuɗa kwako, nokupinda kwako, ʋuye hasha dzako kwandiri.
Nokuɗa kwehasha dzako kwandiri, ʋuye nokuti ndakanzwa, kuɀikudza kwako, ndicaisa rwauro rwaŋgu mumhino dzako, netomu raŋgu mumiromo yako, ndikudzosere nenzira yawakaʋuya nayo.

Ici ndico cicaʋa ciratidzo kwauri: Nhaka mucadya ɀinoŋgomera ɀoga, negore recipiri mucadya ɀinomera ɀe kwaɀiri; asi negore recitatu munofanira kudɀara, nokuceka, nokusima minda yemizambiriŋga, mudye micero yayo.
Ɀino ʋakasara ʋakapukunyuka ʋeimba yaJuda, ʋacaita ɀe midzi pasi, nokuɓereka micero kumsoro.
Nokuti ʋakasara ʋacaɓuɗa Jerusarema, naʋakapukunyuka pagomo reZioni; kushiŋgaira kwaJehova kucaɀiita.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro pamambo weAsiria: Haaŋgapindi muguta rino, kana kuposhera museʋe imomo, kana kuȿika pamberi paro nenhoʋo, kana kututira gomo revu kwariri.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nenzira yaakaʋuya nayo, ucadzokera ɀe nayo; haaŋgapindi muguta rino.
Nokuti ndicadzitira guta rino, ndiriponese nokuɗa kwaŋgu ini, ʋuye nokuɗa kwomuranda waŋgu Davidi.
Ɀino mutumŋa waJehova akaɓuɗa, akaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi masere neɀishanu pamisasa yaʋaAsiria; ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacimuka maŋgwanani, ʋakawana ɀaʋa ɀitunha ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo Sanheribi mambo weAsiria akabva, akaenda, akadzokera kwakare, akandogara Nineve.
Ɀino wakati acinamata mumba maNisroki, mŋari wake, Adramereki naSharezeri ʋanakomana ʋake, ʋakamuʋuraya nomunondo, iʋo ʋakatizira kunyika yeArarati. Esari‐hadoni akamuteʋera paʋushe.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo Hezekia akarwara, akaȿikira pakufa. Muprofita Isaya mŋanakomana waAmozi akaȿika kwaari, akati kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ciraira nhaka yako, nokuti ucafa, hauŋgararami.
Ipapo Hezekia akatendeʋukira kumadziro, akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova,
akati: Ƌoraŋgarirai henyu, Jehova, kuti ndakafamba pamberi penyu neɀokwaɗi nomŋoyo wose, ndikaita ɀakanaka pamberi penyu. Hezekia akacema kwaɀo.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaIsaya, riciti:
Enda undoti kunaHezekia: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waɓaɓa ʋako Davidi: Ndanzwa kunyeŋgetera kwako, ndaʋona misodzi yako; tarira, ndicawedzera pamazuʋa ako makore anegumi namashanu.
Ndicakurwira iwe neguta rino paruʋoko rwamambo weAsiria; ʋuye ndicadzitira guta rino.
Heci ciratidzo caJehova kwauri, kuti Jehova ucaita cinhu ici caakataura:
Tarira, ndicadzosa mumvuri pamitaro, wakaŋga wadzira nezuʋa pacikati caAhazi,
Ndakati: Ndicapinda pamasuʋo eSheori aciri masikati pamazuʋa aŋgu;
Ndatorerwa makore aŋgu akaŋga asara.
Ndakati: Handicazoʋoni Jehova, iye Jehova, panyika yaʋapenyu;
Handicazoʋoni ʋanhu pamŋe cete naʋagere panyika.
Ʋugaro bgaŋgu bgaputswa, bgabviswa kwandiri setente romufudzi;
Ndapeta ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, somuruki; ucandigura pacirukiso;
Mucandigumisa kubvira maŋgwanani kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Ndakaɀinyaradza kuȿikira kwaedza; unovuna mafupa aŋgu ose seshumba;
Mucandigumisa kubvira maŋgwanani kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Ndakarira senyeŋganyeŋga kana kondo;
Ndakacema senjiʋa; meso aŋgu akapera nokutarira kumsoro;
Haiwa Jehova, ndakamanikidzwa, iʋai mumiriri waŋgu imi.
Ndiŋgatiyiko? Ndiye wakataura neni, ndiye wakaɀiita;
Ndicanatsa kufamba makore aŋgu ose, nokuɗa kwokurwadziwa kwomŋoyo waŋgu.
Ishe, ʋanhu ʋanorarama neɀinhu iɀoɀi;
Ʋupenyu bgose bgomŋeya waŋgu ʋuri maɀiri;
Naiɀoɀo ndiporesei, mundiraramise.
Tarirai, kutambudzika kwaŋgu kukuru kwakazondiʋigira rugare;
Asi makarwira mŋeya waŋgu noruɗo pagomba rokuparadzwa;
Nokuti makarashira ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu ɀose shure kwenyu.
Nokuti Sheori harigoni kukuʋoŋgai, rufu harugoni kukurumbidzai;
Ʋanoɓurukira kugomba haʋaŋgagoni kutarira ɀokwaɗi yenyu.
Mupenyu, mupenyu, ndiye ucakuʋoŋgai, seɀandinoita nhasi;
Ƃaɓa ʋacaziʋisa ʋana ʋaʋo ɀokwaɗi yenyu.
Jehova wakaɀigadzira kundiponesa;
Naiɀoɀo ticaimba nziyo dzaŋgu nemiteŋgeranwa
Mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgeɗu mumba maJehova.
Ɀino Isaya wakaŋga ati: Ŋgaʋatore ɓundu ramaʋonde ʋarinamire pamota, ipapo ucapora.
Hezekia ʋo wakaŋga ati: Ciratidzo ndecipi kuti ndicakwira kuimba yaJehova?
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo Merodaki‐baradani mŋanakomana waBaradani, mambo weBabironi, wakatuma ŋwadi necipo kunaHezekia; nokuti wakaŋga anzwa kuti wairwara akapora ɀe.

Hezekia akafara pamsoro paʋo, akaʋaratidza imba yakaŋga ineɀinokosha ɀake, sirveri, nendarama, neɀinonhuwira, namafuta anokosha, neimba yaiʋa nenhumbi dzake dzose dzokurwa nadzo, neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri pafuma yake; kwakaŋga kusisinecinhu mumba make, kana muʋushe bgake bgose, caʋasina‐kuratidzwa naHezekia.
Ɀino muprofita Isaya akaȿika kunamambo Hezekia, akati kwaari: Ʋarume aʋa ʋakati kuɗiniko? Ʋakaȿika kwauri ʋacibvepi? Hezekia akati: Ʋakaŋga ʋabva kunyika iri kure, Babironi ʋaciʋuya kwandiri.
Ipapo akati: Ʋakaʋonei mumba mako? Hezekia akapindura, akati: Ʋakaʋona ɀose ɀiri mumba maŋgu; hakunecinhu pakati pefuma yaŋgu candisina‐kuʋaratidza.
Ipapo Isaya akati kunaHezekia: Inzwa shoko raJehova wehondo:
Tarira, mazuʋa acaȿika, neŋguʋa iyo ɀose ɀiri mumba mako, neɀose ɀakaʋuŋganidzwa namadziɓaɓa ako kuȿikira ɀuʋa ranhasi, ɀicaiswa Babironi; hakunecinhu cicasiyiwa, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋamŋe ʋanakomana ʋako, ʋacabva kwauri, ʋaucaɓereka, ʋacatapxa; ʋacaʋa ʋaranda mumba mamambo weBabironi.
Ipapo Hezekia akati kunaIsaya: Shoko raJehova ramataura rakanaka haro. Akati ʋo: Nokuti rugare neɀokwaɗi ɀicaʋa’po pamazuʋa aŋgu.
Nyaradzai, nyaradzai ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Mŋari wenyu.
Taurai ɀiŋgaʋaraidza Jerusarema, ɗanidzirai kwaʋari kuti kurwa kwaʋo kwapera, kuti ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀakaŋganwirwa, kuti ʋapiwa noruʋoko rwaJehova kurobga kwakariŋgana pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Inzwi rounoɗanidzira,
Mipata yose icazadzwa, makomo ose neɀikomo ɀose ɀicaɗeredzwa; panamakoroŋga pacaenzaniswa; pasakaenzana pacaitwa ɓani;
kubginya kwaJehova kucaratidzwa, nyama yose icaɀiʋona pamŋe cete; nokuti muromo waJehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Inzwi rounoti: Ƌanidzirai! Mumŋe akati: Ndicaɗanidzireiko? Nyama yose ʋuswa, kunaka kwaɀo kwose kwakaita seruʋa rokusaŋgo.
Ʋuswa ʋunowoma, ruʋa rinoȿaʋa, nokuti mŋeya waJehova unofuridza pamsoro paɀo; ɀirokwaɀo ʋanhu ʋuswa.
Ʋuswa ʋunowoma, ruʋa rinoȿaʋa; asi shoko raMŋari weɗu ricagara nokusiŋgaperi.
Nhai, iwe, unoparidzira Zioni mashoko akanaka, kwira pagomo refu; nhai, iwe, unoparidzira Jerusarema mashoko akanaka, ɗanidzira nesimba, ɗanidzira, usatya; uti kumaguta aJuda: Tarirai, Mŋari wenyu!
Tarirai, Ishe Jehova ucaʋuya somunhu unesimba, ruʋoko rwake rucamuɓatira ʋushe; tarirai, muɓairo wake unawo, ɀaanoripira ɀiri pamberi pake.
Ucafudza ɓoka rake somufudzi, ucaʋuŋganidza makwaiana ake mumaʋoko ake, nokuatakura pacifuʋa cake, ucanatsa kutuŋgamirira nhunɀi dzinomnisa.
Ndianiko wakayera mvura zhinji mucanza coruʋoko rwake, nokuyera ɗeŋga napanoȿika minwe, nokuenzanisa guruʋa rapasi neciyero, nokuyera kurema kwamakomo neciidzo, neɀikomo neciyero?
Ndianiko wakayera Mŋeya waJehova, kana wakamudzidzisa acimuraira namano?
Wakaraŋgana nani, ndiani wakamuraira nokumudzidzisa nzira yokururamisira, nokumudzidzisa ziʋo, nokumuratidza nzira yenjere here?
Tarirai, marudzi aʋanhu akaita seɗonwe remvura muciroŋgo, aneŋge guruʋa shomanene paciyero; tarirai, unosimudza ɀiwi secinhu ciɗuku‐ɗuku.
Rebanoni harine
Marudzi ose akaita pamberi pake sapasinecinhu; pakufuŋga kwake akaita saasi’po, cinhu cisinamaturo.
Ɀino muŋgafananidza Mŋari naniko? Kana muŋgamuenzanisa nomufananidzo upiko?
Kana uri mufananidzo, muʋumbi wakauʋumba, mupfuri wendarama unounamira nendarama, ndokuupfurira ʋuketani bgesirveri.
Murombo unoshaiwa cipo
Hamuna‐kuziʋa here? Hamuna‐kunzwa here? Hamuna‐kuɀiʋudzwa kubva pakutaŋga here? Hamuna‐kunzwisisa kubva pakuteyiwa kwenyika here?
Ndiye ugere kumsoro kwenyika yakaʋuruŋgana, ʋanhu ʋagere’po ʋakaita semhashu; ndiye unotatamura ɗeŋga somuceka, nokuriwadza setente kuti agare’mo;
ndiye unoɗeredza macinda kuȿikira oita saasi’po, ʋatoŋgi ʋenyika unoʋaita secinhu cisinamaturo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, haʋana‐kusimŋa, ɀirokwaɀo, haʋana‐kudɀarwa, ɀirokwaɀo, hunde yaʋo haina‐kuɓata pasi; ɀino wofuridza pamsoro paʋo, ʋowoma, necampupuri cinoʋabvisa sehundi.
Ko ɀino muŋgandifananidza nani, kuti ndienzane naye? ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mutȿene.

Tarirai kumsoro nameso enyu, muʋone kuti ndiani wakasika iɀoɀi, unoɓuɗisa hondo yaɀo yakawanda; iye unoɀiɗana ɀose namazita aɀo; nokuɗa kwoʋukuru bgesimba rake, ʋuye ɀaari mukuru pakusimba kwake, hakune‐cimŋe cinoshaikwa.
Unoreʋereiko, iwe Jakobo, unotaurireiko iwe Israeri,
Hauna‐kuziʋa here? Hauna‐kunzwa here? Mŋari usiŋgaperi, Jehova, Musiki wamatiʋi ose enyika, haaziyi, haaneti; njere dzake hadziŋgazikanwi.
ʋanoziya unoʋapa simba; unoshaiwa simba unomuwedzera simba rake.
Kunyaŋge naʋakomana ʋacaziya nokuneta, namajaya acawira pasi cose;
asi ʋanomirira Jehova ʋacawana simba idɀa; ʋacabururuka namapapiro samakondo, ʋacamhanya ʋasiŋganeti, ʋacafamba ʋasiŋgaziyi.
Nyararai pamberi paŋgu, imi ɀiwi; ʋanhu ŋgaʋawane simba idɀa, ŋgaʋasweɗere, ipapo ŋgaʋataure; ŋgatisweɗere pamŋe cete kutoŋgerwa mhaka.

Ndianiko wakamutsa mumŋe kumabvazuʋa, unokunda pose‐pose paanotsika? Ndianiko unomupa marudzi aʋanhu, acimuɓatisa madzimambo paʋushe bgake? Unoʋaisa pamunondo wake seguruʋa, napaʋuta bgake sehundi inodziŋgwa
Unodziŋgana naʋo, ndokupfuʋura hake ɀakanaka nenzira yaasinakumbotsika netsoka dzake.
Ndianiko wakaɓate‐ɓasa iro nokuɀiita? Ndiye unoɗana marudzi kubvira pakutaŋga; ini Jehova, wokutaŋga, nouri kunowokupedzisira, ndini iye.
Ɀiwi ɀakaʋona, ɀikatya; migumo yenyika inoɗeɗera, inosweɗera, yoʋuya.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoɓatsira wokwake; unoti kuhama yake: Tsuŋga hako mŋoyo.
Saiɀoɀo muʋezi unosimbisa mupfuri wendarama, nounopfura nenyundo
Asi iwe Israeri, muranda waŋgu, Jakobo, wandakasanaŋgura, ʋana ʋaAbrahama shamŋari yaŋgu,
iwe wandakatora kumigumo yenyika, ndikakuɗana kumakona ayo, ndikati kwauri: Uri muranda waŋgu, ndakakusanaŋgura, handina‐kukurasha;
usatya, nokuti ndinewe; usavunduka, nokuti ndiri Mŋari wako; ndicakusimbisa, ɀirokwaɀo, ndicakuɓatsira; ɀirokwaɀo, ndicakutsigira noruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi rwokururama.
Tarira, ʋose ʋanokutsamŋira, ʋacanyadziswa ʋaʋe nenyadzi; ʋanokakaʋara newe ʋacaʋa secinhu cisi’po, ʋacaparara.
Ucaʋatȿaka, asi hauŋgaʋawani, iʋo ʋanokakaʋara newe; ʋanorwa newe ʋacaʋa secinhu cisi’po, secinhu cisinamaturo.
Nokuti ini Jehova, Mŋari wako, ndicaɓata ruʋoko rwako rworudyi, ndiciti kwauri: Usatya, ini ndicakuɓatsira.
Usatya, iwe honye Jakobo, nemi ʋarume ʋaIsraeri; ini ndicakuɓatsira, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, mudzikinuri wako ndiye Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Tarira, ndakakuita mupuro mutȿa, unopinza, unameno; ucapura makomo, nokuaputsa‐putsa, ucaita ɀikomo ɀiʋe sehundi.
Ucaarudza, acatorwa nemhepo, campupuri cicaaparadzira kwose; iwe ucafarira Jehova, nokuɀirumbidza noMutȿene waIsraeri.
Ʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa ʋanotȿaka mvura, asi hai’po, marimi aʋo anowoma nenyota; ini, Jehova ndicaʋapindura, ini, Mŋari waIsraeri, handiŋgaʋarashi.
Ndicazarura nzizi pamakomo asinemiti, namatsime pakati pemipata; renje ndicariita dziʋa remvura, nenyika yakawoma ɀituɓu ɀemvura.
Ndicasima parenje
kuti ʋaʋone, nokuziʋa, nokuraŋgarira, nokunzwisisa ʋose, kuti ruʋoko rwaJehova ndirwo rwakaita iɀoɀo, ʋuye kuti Mutȿene waIsraeri ndiye wakaɀisika.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Reʋai mhaka yenyu; ɀanzi namambo waJakobo: Ʋuyai namashoko enyu akasimba.
Ŋgaʋaʋuye nawo, ʋatiʋudze ɀicaitwa; tiʋudzei ɀinhu ɀakare, kuti ndeɀei, kuti tiɀiraŋgarire, tiziʋe kuguma kwaɀo; kana mutiziʋise ɀicazoʋa’po.
Tiʋudzei ɀinhu ɀicazoʋa’po pashure, tiziʋe kuti muri ʋamŋari; ɀirokwaɀo, itai ɀakanaka, kana itai ɀakaipa, kuti tishamiswe, tiɀiʋone tose pamŋe cete.
Tarirai imi hamuzi cinhu, neɓasa renyu harizi cinhu; unokusanaŋgurai unonyaŋgadza.
Ndamutsa mumŋe unobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ɀino waȿika; mumŋe unobva kumaɓuɗazuʋa, unoɗana zita raŋgu; iye ucatsika ʋaɓati samatope, somuʋumbi unokanya ivu.

Ndianiko wakatiʋudza iɀoɀo kubvira pakutaŋga, kuti tiziʋe? Napaŋguʋa yakare, kuti titi: Ɀirokwaɀo? Ɀirokwaɀo, hakuna‐unotiʋudza, ɀirokwaɀo, hakuna‐unotiratidza, ɀirokwaɀo, hakuna‐unonzwa mashoko enyu.
ndicataŋga
Kana ndicitarira, hakunomunhu; pakati paʋo hakuna‐unogona kurairira, uŋgapindura shoko, kana ndiciʋabvunza.
Tarirai, aʋa ʋose haʋanamaturo, maɓasa aʋo haanamaturo, haazi cinhu; mifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋumbga imhepo neɀisinamaturo.
Tarirai muranda waŋgu wandinotsigira, musanaŋgurwa waŋgu unofadza mŋeya waŋgu. Ndakaisa Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro pake, ucaʋigira marudzi kururamisirwa.
Haaŋgaɗani, kana kuɗanidzira nenzwi rake, kana kunzwisa inzwi rake panzira dzomumusha.
Rutsaŋga rwakapxanyika haaŋgaruvuni, nomŋenje unopfuŋgaira haaŋgaudzimi; ucaʋigira
Iye haaŋgapfuŋgairi kana kupxanyiwa, kuȿikira agadza kururama panyika; ɀiwi ɀicamirira murairo wake.
Ɀanzi naMŋari Jehova, iye wakasika ɗeŋga rose, akaritatamura, iye wakatambanudza nyika neɀinobva’mo, iye unopa ʋanhu ʋari’mo kufema, naʋanofamba’po mŋeya
Ini Jehova ndakakuɗana nokururama, ndicaɓata ruʋoko rwako, ndicakuceŋgeta, ndikuite suŋgano yaʋanhu, uʋe ciedza camarudzi;
uȿinudze meso asiŋgaʋoni, uɓuɗise ʋasuŋgwa patoroŋgo, naʋagere murima paimba yokusuŋgwa.
Ndini Jehova, ndiro zita raŋgu; kukudzwa kwaŋgu handiŋgakupi mumŋe, kana kurumbidzwa kwaŋgu kumifananidzo yakaʋezwa.
Tarirai, ɀinhu ɀakare ɀaitika, ndinoparidza ɀinhu ɀitȿa; ndinokuʋudzai iɀoɀo ɀisati ɀaɓukira.
Imbirai Jehova rwiyo rutȿa, murumbidzei kubvira pamigumo yenyika; imi, munoɓurukira kuguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maro, ɀiwi naʋagere paɀiri.
Renje namaguta aro ŋgaɀiɗanidzire, nemisha inogarwa naKedari; ʋagere mumatombo ŋgaʋaimbe, ŋgaʋaɗanidzire ʋari pamsoro pamakomo.
Ŋgaʋakudze Jehova, ʋaparidzire paɀiwi kurumbidzwa kwake.
Jehova ucaɓuɗa semhare, ucamutsa kushiŋgaira somunhu wokurwa; ucaɗana, ɀirokwaɀo, ucaɗanidzira, ucarwa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋake nesimba.
Ndakanyarara ŋguʋa refu, ndakaramba ndinyerere, ndikaɀidzora;
Ndicaparadza makomo neɀikomo, nokuwomesa ɀose ɀinomera’po; nzizi ndicadziita ɀiwi, namadziʋa ndicaapxisa.
Mapofu ndicaafambisa nenzira yaasiŋgaziʋi, pamakwara aasiŋgaziʋi ndicaatuŋgamirira; rima ndicariita ciedza pamberi paʋo, neɀakakombama ndicaɀiruramisa. Ɀinhu iɀi ndicaɀiita, handiŋgaʋasiyi.
Ʋanoʋimba nemifananidzo yakaʋezwa, ʋanoti kumifananidzo yakaʋumbga: Imi muri ʋamŋari ʋeɗu, iʋo ʋacadzoserwa shure, ʋacanyadziswa kwaɀo.
Inzwai, imi matsi; tarirai, imi mapofu, muʋone.
Ndianiko ɓofu, haazi iye muranda waŋgu here?
Unoʋona ɀinhu ɀizhinji, asi haucerekedzi; nzeʋe dzake dzakadziʋuka, asi haanzwi.
Ɀakafadza Jehova, nokuɗa kwokururama kwake, kukudza murairo nokuurumbidza.
Asi aʋa ndaʋanhu ʋakatorerwa nokupambarwa; ʋose ʋakateyiwa mumakomba, ʋakaʋanzwa mudzimba dzokusuŋgwa; ʋaʋa cinhu cakatapxa, hakuna‐unoʋarwira, cinhu cakapambga, hakuna‐unoti: Dzosa!
Ndianiko pakati penyu ucarerekera nzeʋe dzake kunecinhu ici? Ucaterera nokunzwa paŋguʋa inoʋuya?
Ndianiko wakarega Jakobo apambge, naIsraeri awirwe namakororo? Haazi Jehova here? Iye watakatadzira, waʋakaramba kufamba nenzira dzake, waʋakaramba kuterera murairo wake.
Naiɀoɀo wakaɗurura pamsoro pake kutsamŋa kwake kukuru, nesimba rokurwa; ɀikamupisira kumatiʋi ose, asiŋgaɀiziʋi; ɀikamupisa, asi wakaŋga asinehanya naɀo.
Asi ɀino ɀanzi naJehova, wakakusika, iwe Jakobo, wakakuʋumba, iwe Israeri: Usatya hako, nokuti ndakakudzikinura; ndakakuɗana nezita rako, uri waŋgu.
Kana ucipinda nomumvura zhinji, ndicaʋa newe, kana nomunzizi, hadziŋgakunyudzi; kana ucifamba nomumŋoto, hauŋgatȿi, nomuraɀo hauŋgakupisi.
Nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wako, Mutȿene waIsraeri, Muponesi wako; ndakaisa Egipita ruʋe rudzikinuro rwako, Etiopia neSeba panɀimbo yako.
Ɀawakaŋga ucikosha pamberi paŋgu, ucikudzwa nokuɗikanwa neni, naiɀoɀo ndicaisa ʋanhu panɀimbo yako, namarudzi aʋanhu panɀimbo yoʋupenyu bgako.
Usatya hako, nokuti ndinewe; ndicaʋuyisa ʋana ʋako ʋabve kumabvazuʋa, nokukuʋuŋganidza ubve kumaʋirazuʋa;
ndicati kurutiʋi rwokumsoro: Ʋarege; nokurutiʋi rwezasi: Usaʋadziʋisa; ʋuyai naʋanakomana ʋaŋgu ʋari kure, naʋakunda ʋaŋgu ʋari kumigumo yenyika;
mumŋe nomumŋe unoɗanwa nezita raŋgu, wandakasika kuti ndikudzwe, wandakaʋumba, ɀirokwaɀo, wandakaita.
Ʋuyai namapofu, anameso hawo, nematsi, dzinenzeʋe hadzo.
Marudzi ose ŋgaaʋuŋganidzwe pamŋe cete, naʋanhu ʋakokerwe; ndianiko pakati paʋo uŋgatiʋudza iɀoɀi, uŋgatiratidza ɀinhu ɀakare? Ŋgaʋaʋuye neɀapupu ɀaʋo, ʋaruramiswe; ŋgaʋanzwe, ʋati: Iɀokwaɗi.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndimi ɀapupu ɀaŋgu, nomuranda waŋgu, wandakasanaŋgura; kuti muziʋe, mugonditenda, munzwisise kuti ndini iye; hakunomumŋe mŋari wakanditaŋgira pakuʋumbga, shure kwaŋgu hakuŋgazoʋi’po mumŋe.
Ini, iyeni, ndiJehova, kunze kwaŋgu hakunomumŋe muponesi.
Ini ndakaparidza, ini ndakaponesa, ini ndakaratidza; kwakaŋga kusina
Ɀirokwaɀo, kubva zuʋa ranhasi ndini iye; hakuna‐uŋgarwira
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mudzikinuri wenyu, Mutȿene waIsraeri: Ndakatuma
Ndini Jehova, Mutȿene wenyu, Musiki waIsraeri, Mambo wenyu.
Ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, unoita nzira muguŋgwa, negwara pakati pemvura zhinji inesimba;
unoɓuɗisa ŋgoro nebiza, nehondo nounesimba; ʋanoʋata pasi pamŋe cete, haʋaŋgamuki ɀe; haʋacapfuti, ʋadzimŋa somŋenje.
Musaraŋgarira ɀinhu ɀapfuʋura, musafuŋga ɀakare.
Tarirai, ndicaita cinhu citȿa; coɓuɗa ɀino; hamuŋgaciziʋi here? Ndicaita nzira murenje, nenzizi musaŋgo.
Mhuka dzeɓundo dzicandikudza, makaʋa nemhou; nokuti ndinoɓuɗisa mvura zhinji murenje, nenzizi musaŋgo, kuti ndipe ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, iʋo ʋakasanaŋgurwa, ʋanwe,
iʋo ʋanhu ʋandakaɀiʋumbira, kuti ʋaparidze kurumbidzwa kwaŋgu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hauna‐kuɗana kwandiri, iwe Jakobo; asi wakaneta neni, iwe Israeri.
Hauna‐kundiʋigira makwai ako ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀiŋgapiswa; hauna‐kundikudza neɀiɓayiro ɀako. Handina‐kukuremedza kuti uʋuye neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, handina‐kukunetsa ndiciti uʋuye neɀinonhuwira.
Hauna‐kunditeŋgera ipxa nemari, hauna‐kundigutisa namafuta eɀiɓayiro ɀako; asi wakandiremedza neɀiʋi ɀako, wakandinetsa neɀakaipa ɀako.
Ini, iyeni, ndini ndinodzima kuɗarika kwako nokuɗa kwaŋgu, handicaraŋgariri ɀiʋi ɀako.
Ndiyeʋudzire, ŋgatitaurirane; rondedzera, kuti ururamisirwe.
Teteguru ʋako ʋakatadza, naʋaɗudziri ʋako ʋakandiɗarikira.
Naiɀoɀo ndakamhura macinda matȿene; Jakobo ndakamuita cinhu cakatukwa, naIsraeri cinhu cinosekwa.
Asi ɀino cinzwa, iwe Jakobo, muranda waŋgu, naIsraeri wandakasanaŋgura:
Ɀanzi naJehova, wakakuita, wakakuʋumba kubvira paciɀaro, ucakuɓatsira: Usatya hako, iwe Jakobo, muranda waŋgu, newe Jeshuruni, wandakasanaŋgura.
Nokuti ndicaɗira mvura pamsoro penyika inenyota, nenzizi pamsoro pevu rakawoma; ndicaɗira Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro porudzi rwako, nokuropafadza kwaŋgu pamsoro paʋana ʋako;
ʋacamera pakati poʋuswa, semikonacando pamvura inoyerera.
Mumŋe ucati: Ndiri waJehova, mumŋe ɀe ucaɀitumidza nezita raJakobo; mumŋe ɀe ucanyora noruʋoko rwake,
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waʋaIsraeri, noMudzikinuri waʋo, Jehova wehondo: Ndini wokutaŋga nowokupedzisira; kunze kwaŋgu hakunaMŋari.
Ndianiko uŋgaɗana seni, nokuɀiparidza, nokuɀigadzirira iɀo, kubva paŋguʋa yandakagadza ʋanhu ʋakare‐kare? Ɀinhu ɀinoʋuya, neɀinozoitika, ŋgaʋaɀiparidze iɀo.
Musatya henyu, musavunduka; handina‐kukuparidzirai iɀoɀo kare, nokukuratidzai here? Imi muri ɀapupu ɀaŋgu. Kunomumŋe Mŋari kunze kwaŋgu here? Ɀirokwaɀo, hakunerimŋe Ƌombo, ini handiriziʋi.
Ʋose ʋanoita mifananidzo yakaʋezwa haʋanamaturo, ɀinhu ɀaʋanofarira haɀiɓatsiri; ɀapupu ɀaʋo haɀiʋoni ʋuye haɀiziʋi, kuti ʋanyadziswe.
Ndianiko wakaita mŋari, kana mufananidzo wakaʋumbga, ɀisiŋgaɓatsiri cinhu?
Tarirai, ʋose ʋanomunamatira ʋacanyadziswa; ʋaka
Mupfuri
Muʋezi unotambanudza rwonzi, unotara
Ɀino unoɀitemera misidari, ndokutora misipresi nemiouki, aciɀisanaŋgurira mumŋe pakati pemiti yomuɗondo; unosima mupaini, mvura
Ɀino dzaʋa huni dzomunhu, unotora dzimŋe ndokudziya nadzo; ɀirokwaɀo, unoɓatidza mŋoto nadzo, ndokuɓika ciŋgwa; ɀirokwaɀo, unoʋeza mŋari, ndokumunamata; unoita mufananidzo wakaʋezwa, ndokuufugamira.
Rumŋe rutiʋi rwawo unopisa nomŋoto, norumŋe rutiʋi unodya nyama; unogoca nyama, nokuguta; ɀirokwaɀo, unoɀidziyisa, ndokuti: Haiwa, ndadziya, ndaʋona mŋoto.
Neɀakasara unoita mŋari, iwo mufananidzo wake wakaʋezwa; unoufugamira, nokuunamata, nokunyeŋgetera kwauri, aciti: Ndirwirei, nokuti ndimi mŋari waŋgu.
Haʋaziʋi, ʋuye haʋaraŋgariri, nokuti wakanamira meso aʋo, kuti ʋarege kuʋona, nemŋoyo yaʋo, kuti ʋarege kunzwisisa.

Hakuna‐unoraŋgarira, hakuneziʋo kana njere dzinoti: Ndapisa rumŋe rutiʋi rwawo mumŋoto, ɀirokwaɀo, ndaɓika ciŋgwa pamazimbe awo; ndagoca nyama ndikaidya; ɀino ndiŋgaita cinonyaŋgadza neɀakasara ɀawo here? Ndiŋgafugamira ɗanda romuti here?
Unoɀigutisa namaɗota; mŋoyo wakanyeŋgerwa wamutsausa, haagoni kusunuŋgura mŋoyo wake, kana kuti: Hakunenhema muruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi here?
Fuŋga ɀinhu iɀi, iwe Jakobo, naIsraeri, nokuti ndiwe muranda waŋgu; ndakakuʋumba, uri muranda waŋgu; haiwa Israeri, hauŋgakaŋganikwi neni.
Ndakadzima kuɗarika kwako, segore gobvu, neɀiʋi ɀako segore; dzokera kwandiri, nokuti ndakakudzikinura.

Imba, iwe ɗeŋga rose, nokuti Jehova wakaita iɀoɀo; ɗanidzirai, matiʋi ezasi enyika; imbai ɀikuru imi makomo, iwe ɗondo, nomuti mumŋe nomumŋe uri’mo; nokuti Jehova wakadzikinura Jakobo, ucaɀirumbidza munaIsraeri.
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mudzikinuri wako, wakakuʋumba kubva paciɀaro: Ndini Jehova, unoita ɀinhu ɀose, unotatamura ɗeŋga rose iye oga, unotambanudza nyika (ndiani waiʋa neni?);
iye unoparadza ɀiratidzo ɀaʋanenhema, unopeŋgesa ʋaʋuki, unodzosa ʋacenjeri, acishandura ziʋo yaʋo ʋuʋe ʋupenzi;
iye unosimbisa shoko romuranda wake, unoita ɀakarairirwa nenhume dzake; iye unoti pamsoro peJerusarema: Ricagarwa naʋanhu, napamsoro pamaguta aJuda: Acaʋakwa, ini ndicamutsa matoŋgo awo;
iye unoti ku
iye unoti pamsoro paKoreshi:

Ɀanzi naJehova kumuzodzwa wake, kunaKoreshi, wandakaɓata ruʋoko rwake rworudyi, kuti ndikunde marudzi aʋanhu pamberi pake, ndicisunuŋgura ɀiʋuno ɀamadzimambo, ndimuzarurire mikoʋa pamberi pake, namasuʋo arege kuzarirwa:
Ini ndicaenda pamberi pako, ndicienzanisa pasina‐kuenzana; ndicaputsaputsa mikoʋa yendarira, nokuguragura mipfigo yendarama;
ndicakupa fuma iri murima, noʋufumi bgakaʋanzwa panɀimbo dzisiŋgazikanwi, kuti uziʋe kuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, unokuɗana nezita rako.
Nokuɗa kwaJakobo muranda waŋgu, nokwaIsraeri musanaŋgurwa waŋgu, ndakakuɗana nezita rako, ndakakutumidza zita rakanaka, kunyaŋge wakaŋga usiŋgandiziʋi.
Ndini Jehova, hakunomumŋe; kunze kwaŋgu hakunomumŋe Mŋari. Ndicakusuŋga ciʋuno kunyaŋge usina‐kundiziʋa;
kuti ʋaziʋe kubva kumaɓuɗazuʋa nokumaʋirazuʋa, kuti hakunomumŋe kunze kwaŋgu; ndini Jehova, hakunomumŋe.
Ndini ndinoʋumba ciedza, nokusika rima; ndinoita rugare, nokusika njodzi; ndini Jehova, unoita ɀinhu iɀi ɀose.
Iwe ɗeŋga rose, ɗonhedza ɀicibva kumsoro, makore ŋgaaɗurure kururama; nyika ŋgaizaruke, kuti iɓuɗise ruponeso, iɓereke kururama pamŋe cete; ini Jehova ndakaɀisika.
Unenhamo unorwa noMuiti wake, ico caeŋga pakati peɀaeŋga ɀevu! Ko ivu riŋgati kunounoriʋumba: Unoiteiko? Kana ɓasa rako riŋgati: Haanamaʋoko, here?
Unenhamo unoti kunaɓaɓa: Unoɓerekeiko? Kana kumukadzi: Unoɀareiko?
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mutȿene waIsraeri, noMuiti waʋo: Ndibvunzei pamsoro peɀicazoitwa; pamsoro paʋanakomana ʋaŋgu, napamsoro peɓasa ramaʋoko aŋgu, mundiraire.
Ndakaita nyika, nokusika ʋanhu pamsoro payo; ini,
Ndakamumutsa nokururama, ndicaruramisa nzira dzake dzose; iye ucaʋaka guta raŋgu, nokusunuŋgura ʋatapxa ʋaŋgu, asiŋgatȿaki muteŋgo kana muɓairo, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀakaɓatirwa neEgipita, neɀakashambadzirwa neEtiopia, naʋaSabea, iʋo ʋarume ʋarefu, ɀicaʋuya kwauri, ɀicaʋa ɀako; ʋacakuteʋera, ʋacaʋuya ʋakasuŋgwa namatare, ʋacafugama pamberi pako, ʋacikunyeŋgera,
Ɀirokwaɀo, muri Mŋari unoʋanda, imi Mŋari waIsraeri, Muponesi.
Iʋo ʋose ʋacanyadziswa ʋaʋe nenyadzi; ʋaiti ʋeɀifananidzo ʋacanyadziswa pamŋe cete.
ʋaIsraeri ʋacaponeswa naJehova noruponeso rusiŋgaperi; hamuŋganyadziswi kana kuʋa nenyadzi kuȿikira paŋguʋa dzisiŋgaperi.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wakasika ɗeŋga rose, iye Mŋari wakaʋumba nyika nokuiita, wakaisimbisa akasaisika kuti riʋe ɗoŋgo,
Handina‐kutaura pakaʋanda, panɀimbo yenyika yerima; handina‐kuti kurudzi rwaJakobo: Nditȿakei pasina; ini Jehova, ndinotaura ɀakarurama, ndinoparidza ɀaɀokwaɗi.
Ʋuŋganai, muʋuye; sweɗerai pamŋe cete, imi makapukunyuka kumarudzi; ʋanotakura matanda iri mifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋezwa haʋaneziʋo, iʋo ʋanonyeŋgetera mŋari usiŋgagoni kuponesa.
Paridzai, mu
Tarirai kwandiri muponeswe, imi matiʋi ose enyika; nokuti ndini Mŋari, hakunomumŋe.
Ndakapika neni ndimene, shoko raɓuɗa mumuromo maŋgu nokururama, hariŋgadzoki, kuti mabvi ose acandifugamira, marimi ose acapika
Ɀanzi pamsoro paŋgu: Kururama nesimba ɀiri munaJehova ɓedzi; ʋanhu ʋacaʋuya kwaari, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamutsamŋira ʋacanyadziswa.
Rudzi rwose rwaIsraeri rucaruramisirwa munaJehova, nokuɀirumbidza maari.
Beri unowira pasi, Nebo unokotama; ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀiri pamsoro peɀipfuwo neŋombe, ɀinhu ɀamaitakura ɀakaitwa mutoro, wakatakudzwa
Ʋanokotama, ʋanowira pasi pamŋe cete, ʋakakoniwa kurwira mutoro, asi iʋo ʋamene ʋakatapxa.
Nditererei, imi imba yaJakobo, naʋakasara ʋeimba yaIsraeri, ʋakatakurwa
kuȿikira
Mucandifananidza naniko, nokundienzanisa nani, nokunditi ndakaita sani, wandiŋgafanana naye?
Iʋo ʋanoɗurura ndarama pahomboɗo, nokuyera sirveri neciyero, ʋanoripira mupfuri wendarama, iye ndokuita mŋari nayo; ɀino ʋofugama, nokunamata.

Ʋanocikwidza pafudzi, ʋanocitakura, ndokucigadzika panɀimbo yaco, ico ndokumira; hacibvi panɀimbo yaco, ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge munhu akaɗana kwaciri, hacigoni kupindura, kana kumuponesa pakutambudzika kwake.
Raŋgarirai cinhu ici, muʋe ʋarume, fuŋgai ɀe cinhu ici, imi ʋaɗariki.
Raŋgarirai ɀinhu ɀapfuʋura ɀakare; nokuti ndini Mŋari, hakunomumŋe,
iye unoparidza kubva pakutaŋga iɀo ɀicaitika pakupedzisira, nokubva paŋguʋa yekare‐kare ɀinhu ɀicigere kuitwa, ndiciti: Ɀandakaraira ɀicamira, ndicaita ɀose ɀandinoɗa;
ndinoɗana gondo ribve kumabvazuʋa, munhu wandakarairira abve kunyika iri kure; ɀirokwaɀo, ndakataura, ndicaɀiʋuyisa ʋo, ndakaɀitema, ndicaɀiita ʋo.
Nditererei, imi munemŋoyo mikukutu, imi muri kure nokururama;
Ndicasweɗedza kururama kwaŋgu, hakuŋgaʋi kure, noruponeso rwaŋgu haruŋganonoki; ndicaisa ruponeso paZioni, nokubginya kwaŋgu pakati paIsraeri.
Ƃuruka, ugare muguruʋa, iwe mhandara, mukunda weBabironi; gara pasi pasinecigaro coʋushe, iwe mukunda waʋaKardea; nokuti haucazonzi unoʋundere nounamaŋgo.
Tora guyo nehuyo ukuye ʋupfu; bvisa cifukidziro ceciso cako, bvisa ŋguʋo yako yakareɓa, fukura gumbo rako, yambuka nzizi.
Kusafuka kwako kucaʋa pacena, kunyadzwa kwako kucaʋonekwa; ndicaɀitsiʋa, ndisiŋgaraŋgariri munhu.
Mudzikinuri weɗu, zita rake rinonzi Jehova wehondo, Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Gara unyerere, upinde murima, iwe mukunda waʋaKardea; nokuti haucazonzi Ʋahosi bgoʋushe ʋuzhinji.
Ndakaŋga ndakatsamŋira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndakamhura nhaka yaŋgu, ndikaʋaisa mumaʋoko ako; iwe hauna‐kuʋanzwira tsitsi, wakaisa joko rako rinorema kwaɀo pamsoro paʋatana.
Ukati: Ndicaʋa ʋahosi nokusiŋgaperi; naiɀoɀo hauna‐kufuŋga ɀinhu iɀi, hauna‐kuraŋgarira kuguma kwaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cinzwa cinhu ici, iwe unoŋgoraŋgarira ɀinofadza, ugere ɀakasimba, unoti mumŋoyo mako: Ndini
Asi ɀinhu iɀi ɀiʋiri ɀicakuwira neciŋguʋa ciɗuku, nezuʋa rimŋe cete, kufirwa naʋana, noʋucirikadzi; ɀicakuwira neciyero cizere, pakati poʋuŋaŋga bgako ʋuzhinji, noʋuroyi bgako bgakawanda.
Nokuti wakaʋimba neɀakaipa ɀako; wakati: Hakuna‐unondiʋona; wakakaŋganiswa noʋucenjeri bgako neziʋo yako, ukati mumŋoyo mako: Ndini
Naiɀoɀo ɀakaipa ɀicakuwira, ɀausiŋgaziʋi kuʋamba kwaɀo; ucawirwa nenjodzi, yausiŋgagoni kubvisa; kuparadzwa kucakuwira pakarepo, kwausiŋgaziʋi.
Ɀino ʋuya noʋuroyi bgako noʋuŋaŋga bgako ʋuzhinji, bgawakaɓata nabgo kubva paʋuɗuku bgako, ɀimŋe uŋgaɓatsirwa, ɀimŋe uŋgakunda.
Waneta nokuwanda kwamano ako; ɀino, ʋanoɗudzira ɀokuɗeŋga, naʋanocerekedza nyeredzi, naʋanofembera ɀomŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaʋasimuke, ʋakuponese paɀinhu ɀicakuwira.
Tarira, ʋacaita samashaŋga, ʋacapiswa nomŋoto, haʋaŋgagoni kuɀirwira pasimba romuraɀo; hauŋgaʋi zimbe rokudziya, kana mŋoto uŋgagotwa.
Ndiɀo ɀicaita ɀose ɀawakaɓatira; ʋakashambadzirana newe kubva paʋuɗuku bgako, ʋacadzuŋgaira mumŋe nomumŋe nenzira yake; pacashaikwa unokuponesa.
Inzwai iɀi, imi imba yaJakobo, makatumidzwa zita raIsraeri, makaɓuɗa kumvura zhinji, yaJuda; imi, munopika nezita raJehova, mucirumbidza Mŋari waIsraeri, musiŋgaɀiiti neɀokwaɗi kana nokururama.
(nokuti ʋanoɀiidza ʋeguta dɀene, ʋacisendama kunaMŋari waIsraeri; zita rake ndiJehova wehondo):
Ndakaparidza ɀinhu ɀakare kubva pakutaŋga; ɀirokwaɀo, ɀakaɓuɗa mumuromo maŋgu, ndakaɀiziʋisa; ndakaɀiita kamŋe‐kamŋe, ɀikaitika.
Ɀandakaziʋa kuti mŋoyo wako mukukutu, nomutsipa wako runda rweɗare, nehuma yako ndarira;

naiɀoɀo ndakakuparidzira iɀoɀo kubva pakutaŋga; ndakakuziʋisa iɀoɀo ɀisati ɀaitika, kuti urege kuzoti: Cifananidzo caŋgu ndico cakaita iɀoɀo, mufananidzo waŋgu wakaʋezwa nomufananidzo waŋgu wakaʋumbga ndiɀo ɀakaraira iɀoɀo.
Wakaɀinzwa; tarira iɀi ɀose; ɀino imi hamuŋgaɀiparidzi here? Ndakakuziʋisa ɀinhu ɀitȿa kubva paŋguʋa ino, ɀinhu ɀakaʋanzwa, ɀawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi.
Ɀasikwa ɀino, ɀakaŋga ɀisi’po kare; hauna‐kumboɀinzwa zuʋa rino risati raȿika; kuti urege kuti: Tarirai, ndaiɀiziʋa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, hauna‐kunzwa, ɀirokwaɀo, hauna‐kuziʋa; ɀirokwaɀo, nzeʋe dzako dzakaŋga dzisina‐kudziʋurwa kubva paŋguʋa yakare; nokuti ndakaziʋa kuti wakaita nokunyeŋgera, ukanzi muɗariki kubva paciɀaro.
Ndicanonosa kutsamŋa kwaŋgu nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, ndicaɀidzora pamsoro pako nokuɗa kwokurumbidzwa kwaŋgu, kuti ndirege kukuparadza.
Tarira, ndakakunatsa, asi handina‐kuɀiita senesirveri; ndakakuidza mucoto cokutambudzika.
Nokuɗa kwaŋgu, nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ndicaɀiita; nokuti
Nditerere, iwe Jakobo, newe Israeri wandakaɗana: Ndini iye, ndini wokutaŋga, ndini wokupedzisira ʋo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakateya nheyo dzenyika, ruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi rwakatatamura ɗeŋga rose; kana ndiciɀiɗana, ɀinosimuka pamŋe cete.
Ʋuŋganai imi mose, munzwe; ndianiko pakati paʋo wakaparidza ɀinhu iɀi? Iye unoɗikanwa naJehova, ucaita kuɗa kwake pamsoro peBabironi, ruʋoko rwake rucaʋa pamsoro paʋaKardea.
Ini, iyeni, ndini ndakataura
Sweɗerai kwandiri, munzwe cinhu ici; kubva pakutaŋga handina‐kutaura cinyararire; kubva paŋguʋa yokuʋamba kwaɀo, ndaiʋa’po; ɀino Ishe Jehova wakandituma, noMŋeya wake.
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mudzikinuri wako, Mutȿene waIsraeri: Ndini Jehova Mŋari wako, unokudzidzisa ɀinokuɓatsira, unokutuŋgamirira panzira yaunofanira kufamba nayo.
Haiwa! ɗai wakaterera hako mirairo yaŋgu! Rugare rwako ruŋgaɗai rwakaita sorwizi, nokururama kwako samafuŋgu eguŋgwa!
Ʋana ʋako ʋaiʋa sejeca, neɀiɓereko ɀomuʋiri wako setsaŋga dzaro; zita rake harizaibviswa kana kuparadzwa pamberi paŋgu.
Ibvai paBabironi, tizai ʋaKardea; paridzai nenzwi rokuimba, muziʋise iɀi, muɀireʋe kuȿikira kumigumo yenyika; muti: Jehova wakadzikinura muranda wake Jakobo.
Haʋana‐kunzwa nyota ŋguʋa yaakaʋafambisa mumarenje; wakaʋayereresa mvura icibva paɗombo, wakatsemura ʋo ɗombo, mvura zhinji ikadzutuka.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋakaipa haʋanorugare.
Ndinzwei, imi ɀiwi, tererai, imi marudzi aʋanhu ari kure: Jehova wakandiɗana ndiri muciɀaro, wakareʋa zita raŋgu ndiciri muɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu;
wakaita muromo waŋgu somunondo unopinza; wakandiʋanza mumumvuri wecanza cake, akandiita museʋe unopenya, akandiceŋgeta mugoɓa rake;
akati kwandiri: Ndiwe muranda waŋgu; Israeri wandinoɀirumbidza maari.
Asi ndakati: Ndakatambura pasina, ndakapedza simba raŋgu pasina paɀinhu ɀisinamaturo; asi ɀirokwaɀo kururamisirwa kwaŋgu kuri kunaJehova, nomuɓairo waŋgu kunaMŋari waŋgu.

Ɀino ɀanzi naJehova, wakandiʋumba kubva paciɀaro, kuti ndiʋe muranda wake, ndidzosere Jakobo ɀe kwaari, ʋuye kuti Israeri ʋaʋuŋganidzwe ɀe kwaari, (nokuti ndinokudzwa pamberi paJehova, Mŋari waŋgu ndiye waʋa simba raŋgu);

ɀirokwaɀo, iye wakati: Cinhu ciɗuku kuti uʋe muranda waŋgu kuti umutse marudzi aJakobo, nokudzosa ɀe ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri; ndicakuita ʋo ciedza caʋahedeni, kuti kuponesa kwaŋgu kuȿikire kumugumo wenyika.

Ɀanzi naJehova, Mudzikinuri waIsraeri, noMutȿene wake, kunounoɀidzwa naʋanhu, kunounoʋeŋgwa norudzi rwose, kumuranda waʋaɓati: Madzimambo acaʋona ndokusimuka; macinda naiwo acanamata, nokuɗa kwaJehova wakatendeka, iye Mutȿene waIsraeri, wakakusanaŋgura.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakakupindura neŋguʋa yakafanira, ndakakuɓatsira nezuʋa rokuponeswa; ndicakuceŋgeta, nokukuita suŋgano yaʋanhu, kuti umutse nyika, nokuʋagarisa nhaka dzakaŋga dzaparadzwa;
kuti uti kunaʋakasuŋgwa: Ƃuɗai; nokunaʋagere murima: Ɀiratidzei. Ʋacadya ɀokudya panzira, namafuro aʋo acaʋa paɀikomo ɀisineɀiɓereko.
Haʋaŋgaʋi nenzara kana nyota, haʋaŋgaɓayiwi nokupiswa kunyaŋge nezuʋa, nokuti iye, unoʋanzwira nyasha, ucaʋatuŋgamirira, ucaʋafambisa pamatsime emvura.
Ndicaita makomo aŋgu ose nzira, migwagwa yaŋgu icakwiridzwa.
Tarirai, ʋamŋe ʋacaʋuya ʋacibva kure; tarirai, ʋamŋe ʋacabva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro nokumaʋirazuʋa, naʋamŋe kunyika yeSinimi.
Imbai, imi ɗeŋga rose, newe nyika ufare; imi makomo imbai kwaɀo, nokuti Jehova wakanyaradza ʋanhu ʋake, ucanzwira tsitsi ʋanotambudzika.
Asi Zioni rakati: Jehova wakandisiya, Ishe wakandikaŋganwa.
Ko mukadzi uŋgakaŋganwa mŋana wake waanomŋisa, akasaʋa netsitsi nomŋanakomana weciɀaro cake here? Ɀirokwaɀo aʋa ʋaŋgakaŋganwa, asi ini handiŋgakukaŋganwi.
Tarira, ndakakunyora paɀanza ɀaŋgu; maȿiŋgo ako ari pamberi paŋgu ŋguʋa dzose.
Ʋana ʋako ʋanokurumidza; ʋaparadzi ʋako naʋanokuita ɗoŋgo ʋacaɓuɗa mauri.

Riŋgira kwose‐kwose nameso ako, uʋone; aʋa ʋose ʋanoʋuŋgana pamŋe cete, ʋaciʋuya kwauri. Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, ɀirokwaɀo ucaɀifukidza naʋo ʋose secishoŋgo, ucaɀisuŋga ciʋuno naʋo somŋeŋga.
Nokuti, kana ari matoŋgo ako nenɀimbo dzako dzakasiyiwa, nenyika yako yakaparadzwa, ɀirokwaɀo ɀino haiŋgariŋgani ʋagere mairi, naʋanokuminya ʋacaʋa kure.
Ʋana, ʋawakaŋga watorerwa, ʋacaramba ʋaciti munzeʋe dzako: Pano hapatiriŋgani, tiratidzei nɀimbo patiŋgagara.

Ipapo ucati mumŋoyo mako: Ndianiko wakandiɓerekera aʋa, ɀandakatorerwa ʋana ʋaŋgu, ndiri ndoga, ndadziŋgwa, ndicidzuŋgaira kwose‐kwose? Ndianiko wakarera aʋa? Tarirai, ndakaŋga ndasiyiwa ndoga; ko aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋaripi?
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicasimudzira marudzi ruʋoko rwaŋgu, nokumisira ʋanhu mureza waŋgu; ʋacaʋuya naʋanakomana ʋako ʋanaʋo pacifuʋa caʋo, naʋakunda ʋako ʋacatakurwa pamafudzi aʋo.

Madzimambo acaʋa madziɓaɓa anokurerai, naʋahosi ʋaʋo madzimai enyu anokurerai; ʋacakotama pamberi penyu ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakatarira pasi, ʋacinanɀa guruʋa riri patsoka dzenyu; ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova; ʋanondimirira haʋaŋganyadziswi.
Ko unesimba uŋgatorerwa ɀaakapamba here, kana ʋatapxa ʋowakarurama ʋaŋgarwirwa here?
Asi ɀanzi naJehova: Kunyaŋge naʋatapxa ʋounesimba ʋacamutorerwa, neɀakapambga ɀounotyisa ɀicarwirwa; nokuti ndicarwa nounorwa newe, nokuponesa ʋana ʋako.
Ʋanokumanikidza ndicaʋadyisa nyama yaʋo imene, ʋacaɓatwa neropa raʋo, seineŋge iri waini inonaka; nyama yose icaziʋa kuti ini Jehova, ndini Muponesi wako, noMudzikinuri wako, Unesimba waJakobo.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Ruripiko rugwaro rwokuramba mai ʋenyu, rwandakaʋaramba narwo? Kana ndakakuteŋgesai kunani ʋandakaŋga ndinecikwerete naʋo here? Tarirai makateŋgeswa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀenyu, mai ʋenyu ʋakarambga nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwenyu.

Ndakashaiwireiko munhu pakuȿika kwaŋgu? Ndakashaiwireiko wakapindura pakuɗana kwaŋgu? Ko ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwatoŋgofupiswa kuti rukoniwe kudzikinura here? Handinesimba rokurwira here? Tarirai, ndinopxisa guŋgwa kana ndicirituka, nzizi ndinodziita renje; hoʋe dzadzo dzinonhuwa, nokuti hadzinemvura, dzinofa nenyota.
Ƌeŋga rose ndinorifukidza nokuȿiɓa, cifukidziro caro ndinociita makudza.
