Ishe Jehova wakandipa rurimi rwaʋakadzidziswa, kuti ndiziʋe kusimbisa ʋakaneta namashoko; uno
Ishe Jehova wakadziʋura nzeʋe dzaŋgu, handina‐kuramba kana kudzokera shure.
Ndakarinzira ʋaroʋi musana waŋgu, namatama aŋgu kunaʋakataʋura ndebvu
Nokuti Ishe Jehova ucandiɓatsira, naiɀoɀo handina‐kunyadziswa; naiɀoɀo ndakaita ciso caŋgu sebge romusarasara, ndinoziʋa kuti handiŋganyadziswi.
Unondiruramisira uri pedyo; ndiani ucarwa neni? Ŋgatisimukei pamŋe cete; ndiani mudziʋisi waŋgu? Ŋgaasweɗere kwandiri.
Tarirai, Ishe Jehova ucandiɓatsira; ndiani uŋgandipa mhoȿa? Tarirai, aʋo ʋose ʋacasakara seŋguʋo; ʋacadyiwa neɀipfunho.
Ndianiko uri’po pakati penyu unotya Jehova, unoterera inzwi romuranda wake? Unofamba murima, asineciedza, ŋgaaʋimbe nezita raJehova, asendame kunaMŋari wake.
Tarirai, imi mose, munoɓatidza mŋoto, munoɀisuŋga ɀiʋuno neɀitsiga; fambai mumuraɀo womŋoto wenyu, napakati peɀitsiga ɀamakaɓatidza. Mucapiwa iɀoɀo noruʋoko rwaŋgu, mucaʋata pasi mucitambudzika.
Nditererei, imi munoteʋera kururama, imi munotȿaka Jehova; cerekedzai ɗombo pamakatemŋa, negomba romugodi pamakacerwa.
Cerekedzai Abrahama, ɓaɓa ʋenyu, naSara wakakuɓerekai; nokuti ndakamuɗana aciri mumŋe cete, ndikamuropafadza, ndikamuita ʋazhinji.
Nokuti Jehova wakanyaradza Zioni; wakanyaradza matoŋgo aro ose, akashandura renje raro riʋe seEdeni, nesaŋgo raro riʋe somunda waJehova; mufaro nokufarisisa ɀicawanikwa’mo, nokuʋoŋga nenzwi rokuimba.
Ndinzwei, imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu; rerekai nzeʋe dzenyu kwandiri, imi rudzi rwaŋgu; nokuti ndicatema murairo, ɀakarurama ɀaŋgu ndicaɀiita ciedza caʋanhu.
Kururama kwaŋgu kuri pedyo, ruponeso rwaŋgu rwaɓuɗa, maʋoko aŋgu acatoŋga ʋanhu; ɀiwi ɀicandimirira, ɀicaʋimba noruʋoko rwaŋgu.

Tarirai kuɗeŋga nameso enyu, mucerekedze nyika pasi; nokuti ɗeŋga rose ricanyaŋgarika soʋutsi, nyika icasakara seŋguʋo; ʋagere’mo ʋacafa soʋunyunyu; asi ruponeso rwaŋgu rucaʋa nokusiŋgaperi, kururama kwaŋgu hakuŋgaperi.
Nditererei, imi munoziʋa kururama; imi ʋanhu ʋanomurairo waŋgu pamŋoyo yenyu; musatya kuɀidza kwaʋanhu, musavunduswa nokutuka kwaʋo.
Nokuti ɀipfunho ɀicaʋadya seŋguʋo, ɀiʋundudzi ɀicaʋadya semvere; asi kururama kwaŋgu kucaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi, noruponeso rwaŋgu kuȿikira kumarudzi ose.
Muka, muka, ɀifukidze nesimba, iwe ruʋoko rwaJehova; muka sapamazuʋa akare, sapamarudzi eŋguʋa dzakare‐kare. Ko hamuzi imi makagura‐gura Rahabi, mukaɓaya cikara here?
Ko hamuzimi makapxisa guŋgwa, nemvura zhinji yeguŋgwa rakadzika, wakashandura nɀimbo dzakadzika dzeguŋgwa mukapaita nzira paŋgayambuka ʋakadzikinurwa here?
Ʋakasunuŋgurwa ʋaJehova ʋacadzoka, ʋacaenda Zioni ʋaciimba; mufaro usiŋgaperi ucaʋa pamisoro yaʋo, ʋacapiwa mufaro nokufarisisa, kucema nokugomera kucatiza.
Ini, iyeni, ndinokunyaradzai; ndiwe aniko, unotya munhu unozofa, kana mŋanakomana womunhu, ucaitwa soʋuswa;
ukakaŋganwa Jehova Muiti wako, wakatatamura ɗeŋga rose, nokuteya nheyo dzenyika; uciŋgotya zuʋa rose nokuɗa kwehasha dzomumanikidzi, kana aciɀigadzira kuparadza here? Ko hasha dzomumanikidzi dziripi?
Musuŋgwa wakatapxa ucakurumidza kusunuŋgurwa, haaŋgafi nokuɓurukira mugomba, ɀokudya ɀake haɀiŋgashaikwi.
Nokuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wako, unomutsa guŋgwa, kuti mafuŋgu aro atinhire; Jehova wehondo ndiro zita rake.
Ndakaisa mashoko aŋgu mumuromo mako, ndikakufukidza mumumvuri woruʋoko rwaŋgu, kuti ndiʋambe ɗeŋga rose, nokuteya nheyo dzenyika, nditi kuZioni: Imi muri ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Muka, muka, simuka, iwe Jerusarema, wakanwa mukombe wokutsamŋa kwaJehova paruʋoko rwake; wakanwa mukombe wose wokudzedzeresa, ukaupedza kwaɀo.
Hakuna‐nomumŋe pakati paʋanakomana ʋake ʋose ʋaakaɓereka uŋgamutuŋgamirira, hakunauŋgamuɓata noruʋoko pakati paʋanakomana ʋose ʋaakarera.
Ɀinhu iɀi ɀiʋiri ɀakuwira; ndianiko ucakunzwira tsitsi? Kusiyiwa nokuparadzwa, nenzara nomunondo; ndiŋgakunyaradza sei?
Ʋanakomana ʋako ʋaziya, ʋaʋete pamigumo yenzira dzomumusha, semhuka yaɓatwa mumambure; ʋazadzwa nokutsamŋa kwaJehova nokutuka kwaMŋari wako.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino cinzwa cinhu ici, iwe unotambudzika, wakaɓatwa, asi usino‐kuɓatwa newaini:
Ɀanzi naShe wako Jehova, naMŋari wako, unoreʋerera ʋanhu ʋake: Tarirai, ndakabvisa mukombe wokudzedzeresa paruʋoko rwako, iwo mukombe uzere nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, hauŋgazounwi ɀe;
ndicauisa muruʋoko rwaʋanokutambudza, iʋo ʋakati kwauri: Kotama, tifambe napamsoro pako; iwe ukaita musana wako sapasi, senzira yomumusha inofambga naʋanhu.
Muka, muka, iwe Zioni, uɀifukidze nesimba rako; fuka ŋguʋo dzako dzakaiso‐naka, iwe Jerusarema, guta dɀene; nokuti kubva ɀino hakuna‐usinokudziŋgiswa nousakanaka uŋgapinda mukati mako.
Ɀizuze ubve muguruʋa; simuka, ugare
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Makateŋgeswa kusinomuteŋgo; mucadzikinurwa kusinemari.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakaɓurukira Egipita kare kundogara’ko, muAsiria akaʋamanikidza pasinemhoȿa.
Ko ɀino ndinoʋonei pano — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ɀaʋabviswa pasina? Ʋanoʋaɓata ʋushe ʋanopopota, zita raŋgu rinoŋgomhurwa zuʋa rose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Saka ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋacaziʋa zita raŋgu; saka
Dzakanaka sei pamsoro pamakomo tsoka dzounoʋuya namashoko akanaka, unoparidza rugare, unoʋuya namashoko akanaka eɀinhu ɀakanaka, unoparidza ruponeso, unoti kuZioni: Mŋari wako unoɓata ʋushe!
inzwi renharirire dzako! Dzinoɗana namanzwi, dzinoimba pamŋe cete; nokuti dzicaʋonana ɀiso ɀakatarisana, kana Jehova acidzokera Zioni.
Pururudzai nomufaro, imbai pamŋe cete, imi matoŋgo eJerusarema; nokuti Jehova wakanyaradza ʋanhu ʋake, wakadzikinura Jerusarema.
Jehova wakafukura ruʋoko rwake rutȿene pamberi pamarudzi ose; migumo yose yenyika yakaʋona ruponeso rwaMŋari weɗu.
Ibvai, ibvai, ɓuɗai ipapo, musanyaŋgata cinhu cinetȿina; ɓuɗai pakati paro; ɀinatsei, imi munotakura nhumbi dzaJehova.
Nokuti hamuŋgaɓuɗi mucikurumidza, kana kuenda mucitiza; nokuti Jehova ucakutuŋgamirirai; Mŋari waIsraeri ucakurindirai mumashure.
Tarirai, muranda waŋgu ucaita nokucenjera, ucakwiridzwa nokusimudzwa, nokukwirira kwaɀo.
Ʋazhinji seɀaʋakashamiswa pamsoro pako, (ciso cake cakaŋga cakakuʋadzwa kupfuʋura caʋamŋe ʋanhu, necimiro cake kupfuʋura caʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu),
saiɀoɀo ucavundusa marudzi mazhinji; madzimambo acafumbira miromo yawo pamsoro pake, nokuti ʋacaʋona ɀaʋasina‐kumboʋudzwa; ʋacanzwisisa ɀaʋasino‐kumbonzwa.
Ndianiko wakatenda ɀatakaparidzirwa? Ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaratidzwa kunani?
Nokuti wakamera pamberi pake seɓukira nyoro, somudzi unoɓuɗa pavu rakawoma; haanecimiro kana ʋumambo; kana ticimuʋona, hakunokunaka kuti timuɗe.
Wakaɀidzwa, nokurashwa naʋanhu, munhu wokurwadziwa, wakaziʋa ʋurwere, somunhu unoʋanzirwa naʋanhu ɀiso ɀaʋo; wakaɀidzwa, nesu hatina‐kumukudza.
Ɀirokwaɀo, wakatakura matenda eɗu, nokusimudza kurwadziwa kweɗu; asi isu takati wakatambudzwa, wakarobga naMŋari nokumanikidzwa.
Asi wakakuʋadzwa nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kweɗu, wakarwadziwa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀeɗu; kurobga kwakatiʋigira rugare kwakaŋga kuri pamsoro pake, takaporeswa namaʋaŋga ake.
Isu tose takaŋga takarashika samakwai, takatsauka mumŋe nomumŋe nenzira yake; asi Jehova wakaisa pamsoro pake kuipa kweɗu tose.
Wakamanikidzwa, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaɀininipisa, akasashamisa muromo wake; segwaiana rinoiswa kundoɓayiwa, ʋuye segwai risiŋgacemi pamberi paʋaʋeʋuri ʋaro, saiɀoɀo haana‐kushamisa muromo wake.
Wakabviswa pakumanikidzwa nokutoŋgwa; kana ʋari ʋezero rake, ndianiko
Ʋakamupa bgiro bgake pamŋe cete naʋakaipa, akaʋa nomufumi pakufa kwake, kunyaŋge asina‐kuita cisakarurama, kunyeŋgera kusina‐kuwanikwa mumuromo make.
Asi kwaiʋa kuɗa kwaJehova kuti arwadziwe; wakamurwarisa; kana mŋeya wake waʋuya necipiriso ceɀiʋi, ucaʋona ɀiɓereko
Ucaʋona ɀaakatamburira nomŋeya wake, akagutiswa; nokuziʋa kwake muranda waŋgu wakarurama ucaruramisira ʋazhinji; ucatakura ɀakaipa ɀaʋo.

Saka ndicamuganhurira mugoʋe pamŋe cete naʋakuru, ucagoʋerana ɀakapambga naʋanesimba; nokuti wakaɗurura mŋeya wake pakufa, akaʋereŋgwa pamŋe cete naʋaɗariki; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakatakura ɀiʋi ɀaʋazhinji, akanyeŋgeterera ʋaɗariki.
Imba, iwe ŋgomŋa, iwe usino‐kuɓereka; imba kwaɀo, uimbise, iwe usino‐kumbosurumuka; nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋana ʋouri‐oga ʋazhinji kukunda ʋana ʋomukadzi wakawanikwa.
Kurisa nɀimbo yetente rako, ŋgaʋatatanure miceka yoʋugaro bgako; usarega, asi ureɓese maɓote ako, usimbise mbambo dzako.
Nokuti ucapararira kuruʋoko rworudyi nokuruɓoshwe; marudzi aʋanhu acaʋa aʋana ʋako, ʋacagarisa maguta aiʋa matoŋgo naʋanhu.
Usatya hako, nokuti hauŋganyadziswi; usakaŋganiswa, nokuti hauŋgaʋi nenyadzi; nokuti ucakaŋganwa kunyara kwoʋumhandara bgako, hauŋgazoraŋgariri kuɀidzwa kwoʋucirikadzi bgako.
Nokuti Muiti wako ndiye murume wako, Jehova wehondo ndiro zita rake; Mutȿene waIsraeri ndiye Mudzikinuri wako, iye ucanzi Mŋari wenyika yose.
Nokuti Jehova wakakuɗana somukadzi, wakasiyiwa uneshuŋgu pamŋeya, somukadzi wakawanikwa aciri muɗuku ndokuzorambga — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mŋari wako.
Ndakakusiya ŋguʋa ɗuku, asi ndicakuʋuŋganidza ɀe nenyasha huru.
Ndakakuʋanzira ciso caŋgu ŋguʋa ɗuku nehasha dzakapupuma; asi ndicakunzwira nyasha noʋunyoro ʋusiŋgaperi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mudzikinuri wako.
Nokuti iɀi ɀakaita kwandiri
Nokuti makomo aŋgabva, neɀikomo ɀiŋgabviswa, asi ʋunyoro bgaŋgu haʋuŋgabvi kwauri, suŋgano yaŋgu yorugare haiŋgabviswi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova unenyasha newe.
Haiwa, iwe mutambudziki, wakazunuŋguswa neɗutu remhepo, usino‐kunyaradzwa, tarira, ndicaʋakira mabge ako namaʋara akanaka, ndicateya nheyo dzako namabge esafiri.
Ndicaita shoŋgwe dzako namabge anoʋaima, namasuʋo ako namabge anopenya, nomuganho wako wose namabge anokosha.
Ʋana ʋako ʋose ʋacadzidziswa naJehova, rugare rwaʋana ʋako rucaʋa rukuru.
Ucasimbiswa mukururama; ucaʋa kure nokumanikidzwa, nokuti hauna‐cauŋgatya, ʋuye kure neɀinotyisa, nokuti hakuna‐ciŋgaȿika kwauri.
Tarira, kunyaŋge ʋakakuʋamba, haɀiŋgabvi kwandiri; aninani unokuʋamba ucaparadzwa nokuɗa kwako.
Tarira, ndini ndakasika mupfuri unopfutidza mŋoto wamazimbe, ndokuita nhumbi yakakwanira ɓasa rake; ndakasika muparadzi, kuti aparadze.

Hakunenhumbi inoʋumbga kuzorwa newe iŋgaita cinhu; rurimi rumŋe norumŋe runokukwirira pakutoŋgwa, rucakundwa newe. Ndiyo nhaka yaʋaranda ʋaJehova, nokururama kwaʋo kunobva kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nhai, imi mose munenyota, ʋuyai kumvura zhinji, nousinemari, ʋuyai, muteŋge mudye; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋuyai muteŋge waini nomukaka, musinemari, pasinomuteŋgo.
Munoparadzireiko mari muciteŋga ɀisati ɀiri ɀokudya, neɀamakaɓatira muciteŋga ɀisiŋgagutisi? Nditererei ɀakanaka, mudye iɀo ɀakanaka, mŋeya yenyu ifare neɀakakora.
Rerekai nzeʋe yenyu, muʋuye kwandiri; inzwai, mŋeya yenyu igorarama; ndicaita nemi suŋgano isiŋgaperi, nyasha dzaɀokwaɗi
Tarirai, ndakamuita capupu kumarudzi aʋanhu, aʋe mutuŋgamiriri nomuɓati wamarudzi.
Tarira, ucaɗana rudzi rwawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi, norudzi rwakaŋga rusiŋgakuziʋi iwe rucamhanyira kwauri, nokuɗa kwaJehova Mŋari wako, nokwoMutȿene waIsraeri; nokuti iye wakakukudza.
Tȿakai Jehova acawanikwa, ɗanai kwaari aciri pedyo.
Wakaipa ŋgaasiye nzira yake, nomunhu usakarurama miraŋgariro yake; ŋgaadzokere kunaJehova, iye ucamunzwira nyasha, nokunaMŋari weɗu, nokuti ucakaŋganwira ɀikuru.
Nokuti ndaŋgariro dzaŋgu hadzizi ndaŋgariro dzenyu, nenzira dzenyu hadzizi nzira dzaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ɗeŋga seɀarakakwirira kupfuʋura nyika, saiɀoɀo nzira dzaŋgu dzakakwirira kupfuʋura nzira dzenyu, nendaŋgariro dzaŋgu kupfuʋura ndaŋgariro dzenyu.
Nokuti mvura necando seɀaɀinoɓuruka ɀicibva kuɗeŋga, ɀisiŋgazodzokeri’ko, asi ɀinoɗiridza nyika, ɀiciiɓerekesa nokuituŋgisa maruʋa, icipa mudɀari mbeu, nomudyi ɀokudya;
ndiɀo ɀicaita shoko raŋgu rinoɓuɗa mumuromo maŋgu; hariŋgadzokeri kwandiri risina, asi ricaita ɀandinoɗa, riciendika paneɀandakaritumira.
Nokuti mucaɓuɗa nomufaro, nokufambiswa norugare; makomo neɀikomo ɀicaimba nomufaro pamberi penyu; miti yose yokuɗondo icaʋucira.
Panɀimbo yomuti womunzwa pacamera musipresi, panɀimbo yorukato pacamera mumirte; ɀicaʋa kunaJehova mukurumbira neciratidzo cisiŋgaperi, cisiŋgazoparadzwi.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ceŋgetai kururamisa, muite ɀakarurama; nokuti ruponeso rwaŋgu rwoɗokuȿika, kururama kwaŋgu kworatidzwa.
Wakaropafadzwa munhu unoita iɀoɀi, nomŋanakomana womunhu unoɀiɓatisisa, unoceŋgeta saɓata kuti arege kurimhura, nokudzora ruʋoko rwake kuti arege kuita cinhu cakaipa.
Mutorwa wakanamatira Jehova, ŋgaarege kutaura aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo Jehova ucandiparadzanisa naʋanhu ʋake; nowakacekwa ŋgaarege kuti: Tarirai, ndiri muti wakawoma.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paʋakacekwa, ʋanoceŋgeta masaɓata aŋgu, nokusanaŋgura ɀinhu ɀinondifadza, ʋaciɓatisisa suŋgano yaŋgu:
Ndicaʋapa mumba maŋgu nomukati mamaȿiŋgo aŋgu ciyeʋudzo nezita rinopfuʋura raʋanakomana naʋanasikana; ndicaʋapa zita risiŋgaperi, risiŋgazoparadzwi.
Naʋatorwa ʋo ʋanonamatira Jehova, kuti ʋamushumire, nokuɗa zita raJehova, nokuʋa ʋaranda ʋake, mumŋe nomumŋe unoceŋgeta saɓata kuti arege kurimhura, nokuɓatisisa suŋgano yaŋgu;

iʋaʋo ndicaʋaʋuyisa kugomo raŋgu dɀene, nokuʋafadza muimba yaŋgu yokunyeŋgetera; ɀipiriso ɀaʋo ɀinopiswa neɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo ɀicagamucirwa paartari raŋgu; nokuti imba yaŋgu icanzi imba yokunyeŋgetera yaʋanhu ʋose.
Ishe Jehova, unoʋuŋganidza ʋakadziŋgwa ʋaIsraeri, unoti: Ndicaʋuŋganidza ɀe
Imi ɀikara ɀose ɀokusaŋgo, ʋuyai mudye, imi ɀikara ɀose ɀokuɗondo.
Nharirire dzake mapofu, ʋose haʋaneziʋo; dzose imbga dzisiŋgagoni kutaura, dzisiŋgagoni kuʋukura, dzinorota, dzinoʋata pasi, dzinofarira kuʋata.
Ɀirokwaɀo, imbga dzinokara, dzisiŋgatoŋgoguti; aʋa ʋafudzi, ʋasiŋgagoni kunzwisisa, mumŋe nomumŋe wakatsaukira kunzira yake, mumŋe nomumŋe kufuma yake, ʋose‐ʋose.
: Ʋuyai, ndicaʋuya newaini, ticaguta neɀinoɓata, maŋgwana acaita sezuʋa ranhasi, zuʋa guru‐guru kwaɀo.
Wakarurama unoparara, asi hakunomunhu unehanya naɀo; naʋanoɗa Mŋari ʋanobviswa, kusinomunhu unoraŋgarira kuti ʋakarurama ʋanobviswa paɀakaipa.
Unopinda parugare; ʋanozorora panhoʋo dzaʋo, iye mumŋe nomumŋe, unofamba pakururama kwake.
Asi sweɗerai pano, imi ʋanakomana ʋomuroyi, ɀiɓereko ɀemhombge necifeʋe.
Munofara pamsoro pani? Munoshamisirani muromo wenyu, nokuɓuɗisa rurimi
iyemi, munoɀimutsa pakati pemiouki, napasi pomuti mumŋe nomumŋe mutema, imi munoɓaya ʋana mumipata, pasi pemikaha yamatombo?
Pakati pamabge anotedza omupata ndi’po panomugoʋe wako; iwo, iwo ndiɀo ɀawakagoʋerwa; ndiɀo ɀawakaɗururira cipiriso cinoɗururwa, ɀawakaʋigira cipo. Ko ini ndicayananiswa naiɀoɀo here?
Wakawadza nhoʋo dzako pamsoro pegomo rakareɓa rakakwirira; ndi’ko kwawakakwira kundoɓayira ɀiɓayiro.
Wakaisa ciraŋgaridzo cako shure kwemikoʋa neɀiʋiʋo, nokuti wakaɀifukurira mumŋe, asati ari ini, ukakwira; wakakurisa nhoʋo dzako, ukaita suŋgano naʋo; wakaɗa nhoʋo dzaʋo kwawakadziwana.
Ukaenda kunamambo namafuta, ukawedzera ɀinonhuwira ɀako, ukatuma nhume dzako kure, ukaɀininipisa kuȿikira paSheori.
Wakaneta norwendo rwako rukuru; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hauna‐kuti: Haɀinamaturo; wakawana simba rako riciʋandudzwa, naiɀoɀo hauna‐kupera simba.
wakatya nokuvunduka aniko, ɀawareʋa nhema, ukasandiraŋgarira, nokuʋa nehanya? Ko ini handina‐kuramba ndinyerere ŋguʋa refu, ukasanditya here?
Ndicaparidza kururama kwako; kana ari maɓasa ako, haaŋgakuɓatsiri.
Kana uciɗanidzira, aʋo ʋawakaʋuŋganidza, ŋgaʋakurwire; asi mhepo icaʋatora, mŋeya ucaʋabvisa ʋose; asi unoʋimba neni, nyika icaʋa yake, ucagara nhaka yegomo raŋgu dɀene.
Ɀicanzi: Tutirai, tutirai, gadzirai nzira, bvisai cigumbuso panzira yaʋanhu ʋaŋgu.

Nokuti ɀanzi noWakakwirira Urikumsoro, unogara mukusiŋgaperi, unezita rinonzi Dɀene: Ndinogara pakakwirira napanɀimbo tȿene, ʋuye nounomŋeya wakapxanyika unoɀininipisa, kuti ndiponese ɀe mŋeya wounoɀininipisa, ndiponese ɀe mŋoyo wowakapxanyika.
Nokuti handiŋgarwi nokusiŋgaperi, handiŋgatsamŋi ŋguʋa dzose; nokuti mŋeya uŋgapera simba pamberi paŋgu, nemŋeya yandakaita.
Nokuti ndakaŋga ndakatsamŋa nokuɗa kwokuipa kwokuciʋa kwake, ndikamuroʋa; ndakaʋanza
Ndakaʋona nzira dzake, ndicamuporesa, ndicamufambisa ʋo, nokumunyaradza ɀe iye naʋanomucema.
Ndini ndinosika ɀiɓereko ɀemiromo; ɀanzi naJehova: Rugare, rugare kunouri‐kure nokunouri‐pedyo, ndicamuporesa.
Asi ʋakaipa ʋakafanana neguŋgwa rakabvoŋgodzwa; nokuti harigoni kuzorora, asi mvura yaro inoɓuɗisa matope namarara.
Ɀanzi naMŋari waŋgu: Ʋakaipa haʋanorugare.
Ƌanidzira kwaɀo, usarega, ɗanidzira nenzwi rako sehwamanda, uparidzire ʋanhu ʋangu kuɗarika kwaʋo, neimba yaJakobo ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, ʋanonditȿaka zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ʋacifarira kuziʋa nzira dzaŋgu; ʋanokumbira kwandiri mirairo yakarurama, sorudzi runoita ɀakarurama, rusiŋgasiyi ɀakarairwa naMŋari waʋo; ʋanofarira kusweɗera kunaMŋari.
: Takaɀinyimireiko ɀokudya, imi mukasaɀiʋona? Takatambudzireiko mŋeya yeɗu, imi mukasaɀiziʋa? Tarirai, pazuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya munotȿaka kuɀifadza henyu, nokuɓata maɓasa enyu ose.
Tarirai, munoɀinyima ɀokudya, kuti murwe nokukakaʋara, nokuroʋa netsiʋa yeɀakaipa; hamuɀinyimi ɀokudya nhasi, kuti inzwi renyu rinzwike kumsoro.

Ndikoko kuɀinyima ɀokudya kwandakasanaŋgura here? Ndirero zuʋa munhu raanotambudza mŋeya wake naro here? Ndiko kukotamisa musoro wake senhokwe, nokuwarira makudza namaɗota pasi pake here? Iɀeɀo uŋgaɀiti ndiko kuɀinyima ɀokudya, nezuʋa rinoɗikanwa naJehova here?
Ko kuɀinyima ɀokudya kwandakasanaŋgura. hakuzakaɗai here, kuti musunuŋgure ɀisuŋgo ɀeɀakaipa, nokubvisa makashu ejoko, kuti wakamanikidzwa aende hake, ʋuye kuti muvune majoko ose here?
Hakuzi kuti ugoʋane ɀokudya ɀako nounenzara, ʋuye kuti
Ipapo ciedza cako cicaɓuɗa secamambakwedza, kuporeswa kwako kucaɓukira nokukurumidza, kururama kwako kucakutuŋgamirira, nokubginya kwaJehova kucakurindira mumashure.
Ipapo ucaɗana, Jehova uca
kana mŋeya wako ukaʋa nehanya naʋanenzara, nokugutisa mŋeya wounotambudzika; ipapo ciedza cako cicaɓuɗa murima, kuȿiɓirwa kwako kucaita samasikati;
Jehova ucakufambisa ŋguʋa dzose, ucagutisa mŋeya wako panɀimbo dzakawoma, nokusimbisa mafupa ako; ucaʋa somunda wakaɗiridzwa, ʋuye setsime remvura, risiŋgapxi mvura yaro.
Ʋacaɓerekwa newe ʋacaʋaka ɀe matoŋgo akare; ucamutsa nheyo dzamarudzi mazhinji, ʋuye ucatumidzwa: Mugadziri wopakakoromoka, muʋandudzi wenzira, kuti ʋanhu ʋagone kugara’po.

Kana ucidzora gumbo rako pazuʋa resaɓata, kuti urege kuita ɀaunoɗa pazuʋa raŋgu dɀene, uciti, saɓata izuʋa rinofadza, nezuʋa dɀene raJehova rinofanira kukudzwa, ucirikudza, usiŋgaiti ɀaunoɗa, kana kutȿaka ɀinokufadza, kana kutaura mashoko ako;
ipapo ucafarira Jehova kwaɀo; neni ndicakufambisa panɀimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika, ndicakugutisa nenhaka yaɓaɓa ʋako Jakobo, nokuti muromo waJehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Tarirai, ruʋoko rwaJehova haruna‐kufupiswa, kuti rukoniwe kuponesa, nzeʋe yake hainakuremerwa, kuti ikoniwe kunzwa;
asi ɀakaipa ɀenyu ɀakakuparadzanisai naMŋari wenyu, ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀakakuʋanzirai ciso cake, kuti arege kunzwa.
Nokuti maʋoko enyu akaȿiɓiswa neropa, neminwe yenyu neɀakaipa; miromo yenyu yakareʋa nhema, rurimi rwenyu runoŋuŋuna ɀakashata.
Hakunomunhu unokwirira mumŋe nokururama, hakuna‐unoreʋerera
Ʋanococonya mazai emvumbi, ʋanoruka ɗandira reɓuʋe; unodya mazai aʋo ucafa, kana ricipxanyika rinoɓuɗisa nyoka.
Matandira aʋo haaŋgaiti ŋguʋo, haʋaŋgafuki ɀaʋakaita; maɓasa aʋo maɓasa eɀakaipa, kuita nesimba ndiɀo ɀiri pamaʋoko aʋo.
Tsoka dzaʋo dzinomhanyira ɀakaipa, ʋanokurumidza kuteʋura ropa risinemhaka; ndaŋgariro dzaʋo indaŋgariro dzeɀakaipa; kuparadza nokuputsanya ɀiri panzira dzaʋo.
Nzira yorugare haʋaiziʋi; hakunokururama pakufamba kwaʋo; ʋakaɀiitira nzira dzakaminama, aninani unofamba nadzo haaziʋi rugare.
Naiɀoɀo kururamisirwa kuri kure nesu, nokururama hakuȿikiri kwatiri; tinotȿaka ciedza, asi, tarirai, rima ɓedzi;
Tinotȿaŋgadzira pamadziro samapofu; ɀirokwaɀo tinotȿaŋgadzira saʋasinameso; tinogumburwa masikati seɀatinoita kana kwoȿiɓa; pakati paʋapenyu takafanana naʋakafa.
Tinoʋomba tose samapere, tinocema ɀikuru senjiʋa; tinotȿaka kururamisirwa, asi hakuna;
Nokuti kuɗarika kweɗu kwakawanda pamberi penyu, ɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɀinotipupurira; nokuti kuɗarika kweɗu kunesu, kana ɀiri ɀakaipa ɀeɗu tinoɀiziʋa,
Kuɗarikira Jehova nokumuramba, nokutsauka tisiŋgateʋeri Mŋari weɗu, kutaura
Kururamisa kwakadzoswa shure, kururama kumire kure; nokuti ɀokwaɗi yakawira pasi panzira yomumusha, kutendeka hakugoni kupinda.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀokwaɗi inoshaikwa; unotiza ɀakaipa unopambga; Jehova wakaɀiʋona, ɀikasamufadza kuti kwakaŋga kusina‐kururamisa.
Akaʋona kuti hakunomunhu, akashamiswa nokuti kwakaŋga kusinomureʋereri; naiɀoɀo ruʋoko rwake rwakamuʋigira ruponeso, kururama kwake kwakamutsigira.
Wakashoŋga kururama secidzitiro cecifuʋa, neŋgowani yoruponeso pamusoro wake, akafuka ŋguʋo dzokutsiʋa ɀikaʋa ɀokufuka ɀake, akapfekedzwa nokushiŋgaira sejasi.
Seɀaʋakaita, ucaʋaripira saiɀoɀo, kutsamŋa kuʋadziʋisi ʋake, nokutsiʋa kuʋaʋeŋgi ʋake; ɀiwi ucaɀiripira muɓairo wokutsiʋa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋacatya zita raJehova kubva kumaʋirazuʋa, noʋumambo bgake kubva kumabvazuʋa; nokuti ucaʋuya sorwizi runoɗira, runotinhwa nomŋeya waJehova.
Ɀino Mudzikinuri ucaȿika paZioni, nokunaʋanodzoka pakuɗarika pakati paJakobo, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Ɀino kana ndirini, iyi ndiyo suŋgano yaŋgu naʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova: Mŋeya waŋgu, uri pamsoro pako, namashoko aŋgu andakaisa mumuromo mako, haɀiŋgabvi mumuromo mako, kana mumiromo yaʋana ʋako, kana mumiromo yaʋana ʋaʋana ʋako, kubva ɀino kuȿikira nokusiŋgaperi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Simuka, uveneke, nokuti ciedza cako caȿika, kubginya kwaJehova kwaɓuɗa pamsoro pako.
Nokuti, tarira, rima ricafukidza nyika, nerima guru marudzi aʋanhu; asi Jehova ucaɓuɗa pamsoro pako, kubginya kwake kucaʋonekwa pamsoro pako.
Marudzi acaʋuya kuciedza cako, namadzimambo kukubginya kwakakuɓuɗira.
Riŋgira kwose‐kwose nameso ako, uʋone: ʋose ʋanoʋuŋgana pamŋe cete, ʋaciʋuya kwauri; ʋanakomana ʋako ʋacaʋuya ʋacibva kure, ʋakunda ʋako ʋacaɓerekwa pahudyu.
Ipapo ucaɀiʋona ukapenya nomufaro, mŋoyo wako ucaɗeɗera nokufariswa; nokuti ɀakawanda ɀeguŋgwa ɀicaiswa kwauri, fuma yamarudzi aʋanhu icaʋuya kwauri.
Makamera mazhinji‐zhinji acakufukidza, nemhuru dzamakamera eMidiani neEfa; ʋose ʋeSheba ʋacaʋuya, ʋacaʋuya nendarama neɀinonhuwira, ʋacaparidza kurumbidzwa kwaJehova.
Mapoka ose
Ndianiko aʋa ʋanobururuka segore, senjiʋa dzinoʋuya kumawindi
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀiwi ɀicandimirira, neɀikepe ɀeTarshishi ɀicatuŋgamira ɀiciʋuya naʋanakomana ʋako ʋanobva kure, ʋaciʋuya nesirveri yaʋo nendarama yaʋo
Ʋatorwa ʋacaʋaka maȿiŋgo ako, madzimambo aʋo acakushumira; nokuti ndakakuroʋa nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, asi ndakakunzwira nyasha neŋgoni dzaŋgu.
Masuʋo ako acagara akazaruka ŋguʋa dzose, haaŋgazarirwi masikati noʋusiku, kuti ʋaʋuyise kwauri fuma yamarudzi aʋanhu namadzimambo aʋo, akatapxa.
Nokuti rudzi noʋushe, ɀinoramba kukushumira, ɀicaparara; ɀirokwaɀo marudzi iwayo acaparadzwa cose.
Ɀinobginya ɀeRebanoni ɀicaʋuya kwauri, misipresi, nemipaini nemifiri pamŋe cete, kuti ndishoŋgedze nɀimbo yeimba yaŋgu tȿene; ʋuye ndicabginyisa nɀimbo yetsoka dzaŋgu.
Ʋanakomana ʋaʋatambudzi ʋako ʋacaʋuya kwauri ʋacikotama; ʋose ʋaikuɀidza ʋacaɀikotamisa pasi‐pasi petsoka dzako; ʋacakutumidza zita rokuti, Guta raJehova, ɀioni roMutȿene waIsraeri.
Wakaŋga wakasiyiwa nokuʋeŋgwa, kusisinomunhu waipfuʋura nomukati mako, asi ɀino ndicakuita cinhu cinorumbidzwa nokusiŋgaperi, cinofarirwa kuȿikira kumarudzi mazhinji.
Ucamna ʋo mukaka wamarudzi, ucamna mazamu amadzimambo; ipapo ucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova, ndini Muponesi wako, noMudzikinuri wako, Wamasimba‐ose waJakobo.
Panɀimbo yendarira ndicaʋuya nendarama, panɀimbo yeɗare ndicaʋuya nesirveri, panɀimbo yamatanda safuri, napanɀimbo yamabge ɗare. Rugare ndicarugadza ruʋe madzishe ako, noKururama kuʋe ʋaɓati ʋako.
Ɀinoitwa nesimba haɀicazonzwiki panyika yako, kana kurashwa nokuparadzwa pamiganho yako; asi ucatumidza maȿiŋgo ako zita rokuti, Ruponeso, namasuʋo ako Rumbidzo.
Zuʋa haricazoʋi ciedza cako masikati, mŋedzi hauŋgazokuvenekeri nokupenya kwawo; asi Jehova ucaʋa kwauri ciedza cisiŋgaperi, naMŋari wako kunaka kwako.
Zuʋa rako haricazoʋiri, mŋedzi wako hauŋgatapudziki; nokuti Jehova ucaʋa ciedza cako cisiŋgaperi, mazuʋa okucema kwako acaguma.
Ʋanhu ʋako ʋose ʋacaʋa ʋakarurama, ʋacagara nhaka yenyika nokusiŋgaperi,
Muɗuku ucaʋa curu, wakaɗukupa ucaʋa rudzi runesimba; ini Jehova ndicakurumidza kuɀiita neŋguʋa yaɀo.

Mŋeya waShe Jehova uri pamsoro paŋgu; nokuti Jehova wakandizodza kuti ndiparidzire ʋanyoro mashoko akanaka; wakandituma kuti ndirape ʋanemŋoyo yakaputsika, kuti ndiparidzire ʋakatapxa kusunuŋgurwa, nokunaʋakasuŋgwa kuti ʋacazarurirwa;
kuti ndiparidze gore reŋgoni dzaJehova, nezuʋa rokutsiʋa raMŋari weɗu; kuti ndinyaradze ʋose ʋanocema;

kuti ndigadzirire ʋanocema paZioni ʋapiwe korona panɀimbo yamaɗota, mafuta omufaro panɀimbo yokucema, neŋguʋo yokurumbidza panɀimbo yomŋeya waziya; kuti ʋanzi miti yokururama, cakasimŋa caJehova, kuti iye akudzwe.
Ipapo ʋacaʋaka matoŋgo akare, ʋacamutsa ɀe nɀimbo dzakaparadzwa dzokutaŋga, ʋacagadzira maguta akaŋga aitwa matoŋgo, ɀakaparadzwa ɀamarudzi namarudzi.
Ʋatorwa ʋacamira ʋacifudza mapoka enyu amakwai, naʋaeni ʋacaʋa ʋarimi ʋenyu naʋagadziri ʋemizambiriŋga yenyu.
Asi imi mucanzi ʋaprista ʋaJehova, ʋanhu ʋacakutumidzai ʋashumiri ʋaMŋari weɗu; mucadya fuma yamarudzi aʋanhu, mucaɀirumbidza nokukudzwa kwawo.
Panɀimbo yokunyadziswa kwenyu,
Nokuti ini Jehova ndinoɗa ɀakarurama, ndinoʋeŋga kupamba pamŋe cete neɀakaipa; ndicaʋaripira ɀirokwaɀo, ʋuye ndicaita suŋgano isiŋgaperi naʋo.
Ʋana ʋaʋo ʋacazikanwa pakati pamarudzi, neɀiɓereko ɀaʋo pakati paʋanhu; ʋose ʋanoʋaʋona ʋacaʋaziʋa, kuti ndirwo rudzi rwakaropafadzwa naJehova.

Ndicafarira Jehova kwaɀo, mŋeya waŋgu ucaʋa nomufaro munaMŋari waŋgu; nokuti wakandifukidza ŋguʋo dzoruponeso, wakandipfekedza cokufuka cokururama, secikomba cinoshoŋga korona, ʋuye somŋeŋga unoɀishoŋgedza noʋukomba bgake.
Nokuti nyika seɀainoɓuɗisa miti yayo, nomunda seɀaunomeresa ɀakadɀarwa’mo, saiɀoɀo Ishe Jehova ucameresa kururama nokurumbidzwa pamberi pamarudzi ose.
Nokuɗa kweZioni handiŋgarambi ndinyerere, nokuɗa kweJerusarema handiŋgazorori, kuȿikira kururama kwaro kuciɓuɗa secadzera, nokuponeswa kwaro somŋenje unopfuta.
Marudzi aʋanhu acaʋona kururama kwako, namadzimambo ose kurumbidzwa kwako; ucatumidzwa zita idɀa, ricarebga nomuromo waJehova.
Iwe ucaʋa ʋo korona yakanaka muruʋoko rwaJehova, noʋukomba bgoʋumambo muruʋoko rwaMŋari wako.
Haucazonzi, Musiyiwa; nenyika yako haicazonzi Ƌoŋgo; asi iwe ucatumidzwa zita rinonzi Hefziba, nenyika yako Beura; nokuti Jehova unokufarira, nenyika yako icawanikwa.
Nokuti jaya seɀarinowana mhandara, saiɀoɀo ʋanakomana ʋako ʋacakuwana; ʋuye cikomba seɀacinofarira mŋeŋga, saiɀoɀo Mŋari wako ucakufarira.
Ndakagadza nharirire pamsoro pamaȿiŋgo ako, iwe Jerusarema; haʋaŋgatoŋgonyarari masikati noʋusiku; imi ʋayeʋudziri ʋaJehova, regai kunyarara,
ʋuye musamutendera kuzorora, kuȿikira asimbisa
Jehova wakapika noruʋoko rwake rworudyi, ʋuye noruʋoko rwake runesimba,
asi ʋakaɀikohwa ndiʋo ʋacaɀidya, ʋacirumbidza Jehova; ʋakaiʋuŋganidza ndiʋo ʋacainwa pamaʋazhe eimba yaŋgu tȿene.
Pindai, pindai napamasuʋo, gadzirai nzira yaʋanhu; tutirai, tutirai mugwagwa, bvisai mabge, simudzirai ʋanhu mureza.
Tarirai, Jehova wakaparidza
Ʋacaʋatumidza zita rinonzi Ʋanhu ʋatȿene, Ʋakadzikinurwa ʋaJehova; newe ucatumidzwa zita rinonzi Mutȿakwa, Guta risina‐kusiyiwa.
Ndianiko uyu unobva Edomi, unobva Bozra aneŋguʋo dzakatȿuka kwaɀo? Ndiani uyo wakafuka ɀinobginya, unofamba noʋukuru bgesimba rake? Ndini ndinotaura nokururama, ndinesimba rokuponesa.
Ko ŋguʋo yenyu yakatȿuka nei? Ɀokufuka ɀenyu ɀakafanana neɀomunhu unotsika muciȿiniro cewaini neiko?

Ini ndakatsika ciȿiniro cewaini ndoga; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wamarudzi aʋanhu waiʋa neni; ɀirokwaɀo, ndakaʋatsika pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu, ndakaʋapxanya pahasha dzaŋgu; ropa roʋupenyu bgaʋo rikatsatikira paŋguʋo dzaŋgu, ndikaȿiɓisa ɀokufuka ɀaŋgu ɀose.
Nokuti ndakafuŋga zuʋa rokutsiʋa mumŋoyo maŋgu; gore raʋakadzikinurwa ʋaŋgu raȿika.
Ndikatarira, ndikashaiwa unoɓatsira, ndikashamiswa nokuti kwakaŋga kusinaunotsigira; naiɀoɀo ruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakandiʋigira ruponeso, kutsamŋa kwaŋgu ndiko kwakanditsigira.
Ndikatsika‐tsika marudzi aʋanhu pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu, ndikaʋapeŋgesa

Ndicarumbidza ʋunyoro bgaJehova namaɓasa aJehova anofanira kurumbidzwa, nokuɗa kweɀose ɀatakaitirwa naJehova neɀakanaka ɀizhinji kuimba yaIsraeri, ɀaakaʋaitira nokuɗa kwenyasha dzake, ʋuye nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgake.
Nokuti wakati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋana ʋasiŋgazoiti nokunyeŋgera; naiɀoɀo wakaʋa Muponesi waʋo.
Pakutambudzika kwaʋo kwose naiye ʋo wakaŋga acitambudzika, mutumŋa,
Asi ʋakamumukira, nokucemedza Mŋeya wake mutȿene; naiɀoɀo wakashanduka, akaʋa muʋeŋgi waʋo, akarwa naʋo amene.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋake ʋakaraŋgarira mazuʋa akare, Mosesi naʋanhu ʋake,
iye wakafambisa ruʋoko rwake runokudzwa parutiʋi rwaMosesi, wakaparadzanisa mvura zhinji pamberi paʋo kuti aɀiwanire mukurumbira usiŋgaperi?
iye wakaʋafambisa napakadzika, sebiza murenje, ʋakasagumburwa?
Mŋeya waJehova wakaʋazorodza, seŋombe dzinoɓurukira kumupata; saiɀoɀo makafambisa ʋanhu ʋenyu, kuti muɀiwanire mukurumbira mukuru‐kuru.
Tarirai pasi muri kuɗeŋga, muʋone muri paʋugaro bgenyu ʋutȿene ʋunobginya: Kushiŋgaira kwenyu namaɓasa enyu anesimba aripiko? Kushuʋa kwomŋoyo wenyu netsitsi dzenyu ɀadzorwa kwandiri.
Nokuti muri Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, kunyaŋge Abrahama asiŋgatiziʋi, naIsraeri asiŋgatiziʋururi; imi Jehova muri Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu; Mudzikinuri weɗu kubva kare nakare, ndiro zita renyu.
Haiwa, Jehova, munotirega neiko ticitsauka panzira dzenyu, nokuwomesa mŋoyo yeɗu kuti tirege kukutyai? Dzokai nokuɗa kwaʋaranda ʋenyu, iwo marudzi enhaka yenyu.
Ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋatȿene ʋakaŋga ʋanayo ŋguʋa ɗuku hayo; ʋadziʋisi ʋeɗu ʋakatsika pasi imba yenyu tȿene.
Isu tafanana naʋasina‐kutoŋgoɓatwa nemi, naʋasina‐kutumidzwa nezita renyu.
Haiwa, ɗai maibvarura ɗenga, mukaɓuruka, makomo akaɗeɗera pamberi penyu,
seɀinoita mŋoto kana ucipisa ʋutsotso, nomŋoto kana uciʋirisa mvura, kuti muziʋise ʋadziʋisi ʋenyu zita renyu, kuti marudzi aɗeɗere pamberi penyu!
Paŋguʋa yamakaita ɀinhu ɀinotyisa, ɀatakaŋga tisina‐kutarira, mukaɓuruka, makomo akaɗeɗera pamberi penyu.
Nokuti kubva paŋguʋa yakare ʋanhu haʋana‐kunzwa, kana kunzwisisa nenzeʋe, kunyaŋge neziso harina‐kuʋona Mŋari kunze kwenyu, iye unoɓatira ʋanomumirira.
Munosoŋgana nounofarira kuita ɀakarurama, iʋo ʋanokuraŋgarirai panzira dzenyu; tarirai, makaŋga makatsamŋa, nesu takatadza; takaŋga takaɗaro ŋguʋa refu, ɀino tiŋgaponeswa here?
Nokuti isu tose taʋa sounetȿina, kururama kweɗu kwose kwafanana neŋguʋo inetȿina; isu tose tinowoma seshizha, ɀakaipa ɀeɗu ɀinotibvisa semhepo.
Hakuna‐unoɗana zita renyu, unoɀimutsa kuti akunamatireyi; nokuti makatiʋanzira ciso cenyu, mukatinyuŋgurusa neɀakaipa ɀeɗu.
Asi ɀino Jehova, muri Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu; isu tiri ivu, imi muri muʋumbi weɗu, isu tose tiri ɓasa roruʋoko rwenyu.
Regai kutsamŋa ɀikuru, Jehova, ʋuye regai kuraŋgarira ɀakaipa ɀeɗu nokusiŋgaperi; tarirai, ɗoʋonai, tiri ʋanhu ʋenyu.
Maguta enyu matȿene ashanduka renje, Zioni rashanduka renje, Jerusarema raʋa ɗoŋgo.
Imba yeɗu tȿene, yakanakisa, pamakarumbidzwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu, yatȿa nomŋoto; nɀimbo dzeɗu dzose, dzataifarira, dzaparadzwa.
Jehova, muŋgaɀidzora nokuɗa kweɀinhu iɀi here? Mucaramba munyerere, mucititambudza ɀikuru here?
Ndakatendera kuti nditȿakwe naʋasina‐kundibvunza, ndakatendera kuti ndiwanikwe naʋasina‐kunditȿaka; ndakati kurudzi rwakaŋga rusiŋgatumidzwi nezita raŋgu: Tarirai ndini, tarirai ndini.
Ndakatambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu zuʋa rose kurudzi rwaʋanhu rwakandimukira, ʋanofamba nenzira isakanaka, ʋaciteʋera ndaŋgariro dzaʋo;
ʋanhu ʋanogara ʋacinditambudza pacena, ʋanoɓayira ɀiɓayiro paminda, ʋacipisa ɀinonhuwira pamsoro peɀitina;
ʋanogara pakati pamabgiro, ʋaciʋata panɀimbo dzakaʋanda; ʋanodya nyama yeŋguruʋe, ʋuye muto weɀinhu ɀinonyaŋgadza uri mumidziyo yaʋo;
ʋanoti: Mira woga, usasweɗera kwandiri, nokuti ndiri mutȿene kupfuʋura iwe. Aʋa ʋutsi mumhino dzaŋgu, mŋoto unopfuta zuʋa rose.
Tarirai ɀakanyorwa pamberi paŋgu: Handiŋganyarari, asi ndicaripidzira, ɀirokwaɀo ndicaripidzira paɀifuʋa ɀaʋo,

ɀakaipa ɀenyu, neɀakaipa ɀamadziɓaɓa enyu pamŋe cete, ʋakapisa ɀinonhuwira pamsoro pamakomo, nokundimhura pamsoro peɀikomo; naiɀoɀo ndicataŋga kuʋayerera maɓasa aʋo paɀifuʋa ɀaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀakafanana nomunhu kana aciwana waini itȿa musumbu
Ndicaɓuɗisa rudzi kunaJakobo, nomudyi wenhaka yamakomo aŋgu kunaJuda; ʋasanaŋgurwa ʋaŋgu ʋacagara nhaka, naʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacagara’po.
Sharoni ricaʋa mafuro amakwai, nomupata weAkori nɀimbo paŋgaʋata ŋombe pasi, ɀicaʋa ɀaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakanditȿaka.
Asi imi munosiya Jehova, nokukaŋganwa gomo raŋgu dɀene, imi munogadzirira Gadi tafura, nokuɗirira Meni waini yakaveŋganiswa;
ndicakutemerai
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacadya, asi imi mucaʋa nenzara; tarirai, ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacanwa, asi imi mucaʋa nenyota; tarirai, ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacafara, asi imi mucanyadziswa;
tarirai, ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋacaimba nokufara kwomŋoyo, asi imi mucacema nokurwadziwa kwomŋoyo, mucawuŋgudza nokuputsika kwomŋeya.
Imi mucasiyira ʋasanaŋgurwa ʋaŋgu zita renyu, riʋe rokutuka naro; Ishe Jehova ucakuʋuraya, ndokutumidza ʋaranda ʋake rimŋe zita;
kuti aninani unoɀiti ndakaropafadzwa panyika, ucati ndakaropafadzwa naMŋari waɀokwaɗi; nokuti maɗambudziko okutaŋga akakaŋganikwa, nokuti aʋanzirwa meso aŋgu.
Nokuti tarirai, ndinosika ɗeŋga idɀa nenyika itȿa; ɀinhu ɀakare haɀiŋgaraŋgarirwi, kana kufuŋgwa mumŋoyo.
Asi imi farai mufarisise nokusiŋgaperi pamsoro peɀandinosika; nokuti tarirai, ndinosika Jerusarema riʋe
Ndicafarira Jerusarema, nokuʋa nomufaro pamsoro paʋanhu ʋaŋgu; mukati maro hamucazonzwiki inzwi rokucema, kana inzwi rokurira.
Hapaŋgazoʋi’po rushiye runamazuʋa mashoma, kana mutana usino‐kuȿitsa mazuʋa ake; nokuti mŋana ucafa apedza makore anezana, nomutadzi ucarobga nokutukwa kana aȿika makore anezana.
Ʋacaʋaka dzimba nokugara’mo; ʋacasima minda yemizambiriŋga, nokudya micero yayo.
Haʋaŋgaʋaki
Haʋaŋgaɓatiri ɀisinamaturo, kana kuɓereka ʋana, ʋacakurumidza kuparadzwa; nokuti ndiʋo ʋana ʋaʋakaropafadzwa naJehova, ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo ɀicagara naʋo.
Ɀino ndicapindura ʋasati ʋaɗana, ndicanzwa ʋacataura.
Ƃere negwaiana ɀicafura pamŋe cete, shumba icadya ʋuswa senzombe, ʋuye guruʋa ricaʋa ɀokudya ɀenyoka. Haʋaŋgakuʋadzi kana kuparadza pagomo raŋgu rose dɀene — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kuɗeŋga ndico cigaro caŋgu coʋushe, nyika ndico citsiko cetsoka dzaŋgu; muŋgandiʋakira imba yakaɗiniko? Ndeipiko nɀimbo pandiŋgazorora?
Nokuti ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ɀakaitwa noruʋoko rwaŋgu, iɀi ɀinhu ɀose ɀakaitwa
Unoʋuraya nzombe wakaita sounoʋuraya munhu, unoɓayira gwaiana sounovuna mutsipa wembga, unoʋuya necipiriso coʋupfu

Neni ʋo ndicasanaŋgura ɀinoʋaɗaɗira, ndicawisira pamsoro paʋo iɀo ɀaʋanotya; nokuti paŋguʋa yandakaɗana, hakuna‐wakapindura, paŋguʋa yandakataura, haʋana‐kunzwa, asi ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paŋgu, ʋakasanaŋgura ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgandifadzi.

Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi munoɗeɗera neshoko rake: Hama dzenyu, dzinokuʋeŋgai, dzakakudziŋgai nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, dzakati: Jehova ŋgaaratidze ʋumambo bgake, kuti tiʋone mufaro wenyu; asi ndidzo dzicanyadziswa.
mubvumo weɓope riri muguta, mubvumo unobva kutembere, mubvumo waJehova unoripidzira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake.
Wakapona asati arwadziwa, wakaɓereka mŋanakomana kurwadziwa kwake kusati kwaȿika.

Ndianiko wakambonzwa cinhu cakaɗai? Ndiani wakamboʋona ɀinhu ɀakaɗai? Nyika iŋgaɓerekwa nezuʋa rimŋe here? Rudzi rwaʋanhu ruŋgaɀarwa pakarepo? Nokuti Zioni rakaŋgoti kurwadziwa, ndokuɓereka ʋana ʋaro.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndiŋgaȿitsa pakuɓereka, ndikasaɓerekesa here? Ini, ndinoɓerekesa, ndiŋgazarira ciɀaro here? Ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mŋari wako.
Farai pamŋe cete neJerusarema, mufare pamsoro paro, imi mose, munoriɗa; farai nomufaro mukuru naro, imi mose munoricema;
kuti mumne, mugute namazamu okunyaradzwa kwaro; kuti mukame, mufadzwe nokuwanda kwembiri yaro.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaritambanudzira rugare rwakaita sorwizi, nefuma yamarudzi aʋanhu sorwizi runofema kunze; imi mucamna, mucaɓerekwa pahudyu, mucaʋaraidzwa pamabvi.
Somunhu unoʋaraidzwa namai ʋake, saiɀoɀo ndicakuʋaraidzai; mucaʋaraidzwa paJerusarema.
Mucaɀiʋona, mŋoyo wenyu ucafara, namafupa enyu acamera seɓumhudza; ruʋoko rwaJehova rucazikanwa kunaʋaranda ʋake, asi ucaʋa nehasha naʋaʋeŋgi ʋake.
Nokuti tarirai, Jehova ucaʋuya nomŋoto, ŋgoro dzake dzicafanana necampupuri; kuti aratidze kutsamŋa kwake noʋukasha, nokutuka kwake nemiraɀo yomŋoto.
Nokuti Jehova ucatoŋga nyama yose nomŋoto ʋuye nomunondo wake; ʋakaʋurawa naJehova ʋacaʋa ʋazhinji.
Ʋanoɀiita ʋatȿene naʋanoɀinatsa
Nokuti ndinoziʋa maɓasa aʋo nendaŋgariro dzaʋo; ŋguʋa inoȿika yandicaʋuŋganidza marudzi ose namarimi ose, ʋacaʋuya ʋaciʋona kubginya kwaŋgu.

Ndicaisa ciratidzo pakati paʋo, ʋanopukunyuka kwaʋari ndicaʋatumira kunamamŋe marudzi, kunaʋeTarshishi, nePuri, neRudi, ʋanofura noʋuta, kunaʋeTubari neJavani, kuɀiwi ɀiri kure, ɀisina‐kumbonzwa mbiri yaŋgu, kana kuʋona kubginya kwaŋgu; iʋo ʋacaparidza kubginya kwaŋgu pakati pamarudzi.

Ʋacaʋuyisa hama dzenyu dzose dzicibva kumarudzi ose, ciʋe cipo kunaJehova, ʋakataȿa mabiza, ʋari muŋgoro, nomuŋgoro dzinamateŋga, ʋakataȿa mahesera, namakamera, ʋaciʋuya kugomo raŋgu dɀene Jerusarema, seɀinoitwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri kana ʋaciʋuya neɀipo ɀaʋo mumudziyo wakanaka mumba maJehova — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicatora ʋo ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋaʋe ʋaprista naʋaRevi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ɗeŋga idɀa nenyika itȿa, ɀandicaita, seɀaɀicagara ɀiri’po pamberi paŋgu, saiɀoɀo rudzi rwako nezita rako ɀicagara ɀiri’po — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino paŋguʋa iyo nyama yose icaʋuya kuzonamata pamberi paŋgu, pakugara kwomŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe, napasaɓata imŋe neimŋe — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋacaɓuɗa’po ʋacindotarira ɀitunha ɀaʋanhu ʋakandiɗarikira; nokuti honye yaʋo haiŋgafi, ʋuye mŋoto waʋo hauŋgadzimŋi; ʋacaʋa cinhu cinosemesa nyama yose.
Mashoko aJeremia, mŋanakomana waHirkia,
Shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwaari pamazuʋa aJosia, mŋanakomana waAmoni, mambo waJuda, negore regumi namatatu rokuɓata kwake ʋushe.

Rikaʋuya ʋo pamazuʋa aJehoiakimi, mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, kuȿikira pakupera kwegore regumi nerimŋe raZedekia, mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, kuȿikira pakutapxa kwaʋeJerusarema nomŋedzi wecishanu.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri, riciti:
Ndakakuziʋa ndisati ndakuʋumba muɗumbu
Ipapo ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Mŋari, tarirai, handigoni kutaura, nokuti ndiri mŋanana haŋgu.
Asi Jehova wakati kwandiri: Usati ndiri mŋanana; nokuti kunaaninani wandineŋge ndicikutuma, unofanira kuenda, necinhu cipi necipi candineŋge ndicikuraira, unofanira kucitaura.
Usatya nokuɗa kwaʋo, nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ini ndinewe, kuti ndikurwire.
Ipapo Jehova akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akaɓata muromo waŋgu; Jehova akati kwandiri: Tarira, ndaisa mashoko aŋgu mumuromo mako.
Tarira, ndakugadza zuʋa ranhasi uʋe nesimba pamsoro pamarudzi noʋushe, kuti udzure nokukoromora, kuparadza nokuwisira pasi, kuʋaka nokurima.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaʋuya ɀe kwandiri, riciti: Jeremia, unoʋonei? Ndikati: Ndinoʋona ɗaʋi romuamanda.
Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Waʋona ɀakanaka; nokuti ndinoȿinurira shoko raŋgu, kuti ndiriite.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri rwecipiri, riciti: Unoʋonei? Ndikati: Ndinoʋona gate rinoʋira, muromo waro unotarira kuno‐uri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro ndiko kucaɓuɗa ɀakaipa ɀicawira ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere panyika
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndinoɗana marudzi ose oʋushe
Ndicareʋa ɀandakaʋatoŋgera pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose, ɀaʋakandirasha, ʋakapisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira, ʋakanamata maɓasa amaʋoko aʋo.
Ɀino iwe, ciɀisuŋga ciʋuno, usimuke, uʋaparidzire ɀose ɀandakakuraira; usavunduka nokuɗa kwaʋo, kuti ndirege kukuvundusa pamberi paʋo.
Nokuti tarira, ndakakuita zuʋa ranhasi guta rakakomberedzwa, nembiru yeɗare, namaȿiŋgo endarira, urwe nenyika yose, namadzimambo aJuda, namacinda aʋo, naʋaprista ʋaʋo, naʋanhu ʋenyika.
Ʋacarwa newe, asi haʋaŋgakukundi, nokuti ini ndinewe, kuti ndikurwire — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri, riciti:

Enda, undoɗana munzeʋe dzaʋeJerusarema, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakaraŋgarira pamsoro pako ʋunyoro bgoʋuɗuku bgako noruɗo rweŋguʋa yokuwanikwa kwako, kuti wakanditeʋera murenje, munyika yakaŋga isina‐kudɀarwa.
Israeri ʋakaŋga ʋari
Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi imba yaJakobo, nemhuri dzose dzeimba yaIsraeri:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Madziɓaɓa enyu akawana ɀisakarurama ɀipiko kwandiri, ɀaʋakaenda kure neni, ɀaʋakateʋera ɀisinamaturo, iʋo ʋamene ʋakaʋa ʋasinamaturo?
Ʋuye haʋana‐kureʋa,
Ndakakuȿitsai munyika ineminda yakaʋorera, kuti mudye ɀiɓereko ɀayo neɀakanaka ɀayo; asi makati mapinda, mukaȿiɓisa nyika yaŋgu, mukaita nhaka yaŋgu cinhu cinonyaŋgadza.
Ʋaprista haʋana‐kuti: Jehova uripiko? Ʋaifambisa mirairo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgandiziʋi, ʋafudzi ʋaindiɗarikira, ʋaprofita ʋaiprofitera Baari, ʋaciteʋera ɀinhu ɀisiŋgaɓatsiri.
Saka ɀanzi naJehova: Ndicaramba ndicikakaʋara nemi, ndicakakaʋara naʋana ʋaʋana ʋenyu.
Nokuti yambukirai kuɀiwi ɀeKitimi, muʋone; tumai ʋanhu Kedari, mufuŋgisise ɀakanaka, muʋone kana kwakamboʋa’po cinhu cakaɗai.
Ko rudzi ruri’po rwakatsinhanhisa ʋamŋari
Shamiswa necinhu ici, iwe ɗeŋga rose, utye ɀikuru, uvunduswe kwaɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakaita ɀinhu ɀiʋiri ɀakaipa: Ʋakandisiya, ini tsime remvura mhenyu, ʋakaɀiʋezera ɀiroŋgo, ɀiroŋgo ɀakaputsika, ɀisiŋgagoni kuceŋgeta mvura.
Israeri muranda here? Ko ndiye muranda wakaɓerekerwa mumba matenzi wake here? Ko ɀino wapambga seiko?
Ʋana ʋeshumba ʋakamuʋombera, ʋakarira, nokuparadza nyika yake; maguta ake akapiswa, hakuna‐unogara’mo.
Ʋana ʋeNofi naʋeTapanesi ʋakapedza vudzi romusoro wako.
Ko haunakuɀitȿakira iɀoɀo, ɀawakasiya Jehova Mŋari wako paŋguʋa yaakakufambisa panzira
Ɀino unondotȿakei panzira inoenda Egipita, kundonwa mvura yeSihori here? Unondotȿakei panzira inoenda Asiria, kundonwa mvura yoRwizi here?
Ɀakaipa ɀako ɀinokuroʋa, kudzokera kwako shure kunokutuka; naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova wehondo: Ziʋa, uʋone kuti cinhu cakaipa cinoʋaʋa kuti wakasiya Jehova Mŋari wako, ʋuye kuti haundityi.
Nokuti yatoʋa ŋguʋa huru yawakavuna joko rako, nokuɗambura ɀisuŋgo ɀako; ukati: Handiɗi kuɓatira; nokuti wakafugama pacikomo cipi necipi cakakwirira napasi pomuti upi noupi mutema ucifeʋa.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakaŋga ndakusima uri muzambiriŋga wakaiȿo‐naka, mbeu kwayo yaɀokwaɗi; ɀino wandishandukira sei ukaʋa mataʋi akaipa omuzambiriŋga worumŋe rudzi?
Nokuti kunyaŋge ukashamba nesoda, ukatora sipo zhinji, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ɀakaipa ɀako ɀakaita segwapa pamberi paŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Uŋgareʋa seiko, uciti: Handina‐kuȿiɓiswa, handina‐kuteʋera ʋaBaari? Cerekedza nzira yako pamupata, uziʋe cawakaita; uri hadzi yekamera inomhanya, inofamba nenzira dzayo;
hadzi yembizi yakaroʋera renje, inofembedza mhepo nokushuʋa kwayo; ndiani uŋgaidzora pakuʋiŋga kwayo? Dzose, dzinoitȿaka, hadziŋganeti; pamŋedzi wayo dzinoiwana.
Usatendera rutsoka rwako kufamba usineshaŋgu, nehuro dzako kuʋa nenyota. Asi iwe wakati: Haɀinamaturo; kwete, nokuti ndakaɗa ʋatorwa, ndiʋo ʋandicateʋera.
Mbava seɀainonyadziswa kana yaʋonekwa, saiɀoɀo imba yaIsraeri yanyadziswa, iʋo, namadzimambo aʋo, namacinda aʋo, naʋaprista ʋaʋo, naʋaprofita ʋaʋo;
iʋo, ʋanoti kuɗanda: Uri ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu; nokubge: Ndiwe wakandiɓereka; nokuti ʋakandifuratira, haʋana‐kunditarira neɀiso ɀaʋo; asi paŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwaʋo ʋacati: Simukai, mutiponese.
Ɀino ʋaripiko ʋamŋari ʋenyu ʋamakaɀiitira? Ŋgaʋasimuke kana ʋacigona kukuponesai paŋguʋa yokutambudzika; nokuti kuwanda kwaʋamŋari ʋako, iwe Jakobo, kwakaenzana namaguta ako.
Munokakaʋara neni neiko? Imi mose makandiɗarikira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndakaroʋa ʋana ʋenyu pasina, haʋana‐kuterera kuraŋgwa; munondo wenyu ndiwo wakaʋuraya ʋaprofita ʋenyu, seshumba inoparadza.
Haiwa, imi rudzi
Ko mhandara iŋgakaŋganwa ɀishoŋgo ɀayo, kana mŋeŋga mukonde wake here? Asi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakandikaŋganwa mazuʋa asiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Haiwa, unoziʋa ɀakanaka sei kunatsa nzira yako, kuti utȿake kuɗikanwa! Saka wakadzidzisa naʋakadzi ʋakaipa ʋo nzira dzako.
Pamipendero yeŋguʋo dzako pakawanikwa ʋo ropa raʋarombo ʋasinemhaka; handina‐kuriwana pakapaziwa imba, asi paneɀiɀi ɀose.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro iwe wakati: Handinemhaka; ɀirokwaɀo kutsamŋa kwake kwakadzorwa kwandiri. Tarira, ndicakutoŋga, ɀaunoti: Handina‐kutadza.
Unofambireiko pose‐pose, ucishandura nzira yako? Ucanyadziswa neEgipita, seɀawakanyadziswa neAsiria.
Naipapo ʋo ucabva wakaisa maʋoko ako pamusoro wako; nokuti Jehova wakaramba ʋaunoʋimba naʋo, newe hauŋgaɓatsirwi naʋo.
Ɀinonzi: Kana murume akaramba mukadzi wake, iye akabva kwaari, akandowanikwa nomumŋe murume, ko
Riŋgira meso ako kuɀikomo ɀisinemiti, uʋone; paʋasina‐kupombora newe ndapapi? Wakaʋagarira panzira somuArabia parenje; waȿiɓisa nyika nokufeʋa kwako neɀakaipa ɀako.
Naiɀoɀo wakanyimŋa mvura inopfunha, nemvura yokupedzisira yakaŋga isi’po; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaŋga unehuma yecifeʋe, ukaramba kunyadziswa.
Ko hauŋgataŋgi ɀino uciɗana kwandiri here,
Ko ucagara akatsamŋa nokusiŋgaperi here? Ucagara nako kuȿikira pakupedzisira here? Tarira, wakataura

Ɀino Jehova wakati ɀe kwandiri, namazuʋa amambo Josia: Waʋona here ɀakaitwa naIsraeri pakudzokera kwaʋo shure? Ʋakakwira pagomo rimŋe nerimŋe rakakwirira nokupinda pasi pomuti mumŋe nomumŋe mutema, ndokundofeʋa’po.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza kuita iɀoɀo ɀose, ini ndikati: Ʋacadzokera kwandiri, asi haʋana‐kudzokera; nomunuŋuna waʋo, Juda, ʋokusatendeka, ʋakaɀiʋona.

Ɀino ndakaʋona kuti paŋguʋa yandakaramba Israeri, ʋokudzokera shure, ndikaʋapa rugwaro rwokuʋaramba nemhaka yokufeʋa kwaʋo, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munuŋuna waʋo, iʋo ʋaJuda, ʋokusatendeka, haʋana‐kutya; asi naiʋo ʋakandofeʋa ʋo.
Ɀino nokusaraŋgarira kwaʋo nyika yakaȿiɓiswa nokufeʋa kwaʋo, ʋakafeʋa namabge namatanda.
Kunyaŋge ɀinhu iɀi ɀakaɗaro ɀose, munuŋuna waʋo, Juda, haʋana‐kudzokera kwandiri nomŋoyo waʋo wose, asi nokunyeŋgera — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Israeri ʋokudzokera shure, ʋakaita ɀakarurama kukunda Juda ʋokusatendeka.

Enda undoparidza mashoko awa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, uti: Dzokai, imi Israeri ʋokudzokera shure — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; handiŋgakutaririyi ndakatsamŋa, nokuti ndinenyasha, handiŋgarambi ndakatsamŋa nokusiŋgaperi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Asi muziʋe ɀakaipa ɀenyu ɓedzi, kuti makaɗarikira Jehova Mŋari wenyu, mukafambafamba muciteʋera ʋatorwa pasi pemiti yose mitema, mukasaterera inzwi raŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Dzokai imi ʋana ʋokudzokera shure, nokuti ndiri murume wenyu; ndicakutorai, mumŋe paguta rimŋe, ʋaʋiri parudzi
Ndicakupai ʋafudzi ʋanofadza mŋoyo waŋgu, ʋacakufudzai neziʋo nenjere.
Ɀino kana mawanda nokuwedzerwa panyika pamazuʋa iwayo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — haʋaŋgazoti: Areka yesuŋgano yaJehova; haʋaŋgaifuŋgi, haʋaŋgairaŋgariri, haʋaŋgaitȿaki, haʋaŋgaiiti ɀe.
Paŋguʋa iyo ʋacatumidza Jerusarema cigaro coʋushe caJehova; marudzi ose acaʋuŋganidzirwa’po, paJerusarema, nokuɗa kwezita raJehova; haʋacazofambi noʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo yakashata.
Namazuʋa iwayo imba yaJuda icafamba pamŋe cete neimba yaIsraeri, ʋacaʋuya pamŋe cete ʋacibva kunyika yokumsoro kunyika yandakapa madziɓaɓa enyu iʋe nhaka yaʋo.
Asi ndakati: Ndicakuisai sei pakati paʋana
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀirokwaɀo, mukadzi seɀaanosiya murume wake acinyeŋgera, saiɀoɀo imi makandinyeŋgera, imi imba yaIsraeri.
Inzwi rinonzwika kuɀikomo ɀisinemiti, kucema nokunyeŋgetera kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri; nokuti ʋakaminamisa nzira dzaʋo, ʋakakaŋganwa Jehova Mŋari waʋo.
Dzokai, imi ʋana ʋokudzokera shure, ndicapodza kudzokera kwenyu. Tarirai, taʋuya kwamuri, nokuti imi muri Jehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀinobva kuɀikomo nemhere‐mhere inobva kumakomo haɀinamaturo; ɀirokwaɀo kuponeswa kwaIsraeri kuri kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Asi cinhu cinonyaŋgadza cakaparadza ɓasa ramadziɓaɓa eɗu kubva paʋuɗuku bgeɗu, makwai aʋo neŋombe dzaʋo, ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo.

Ŋgatiʋatei pasi nokunyadziswa kweɗu, kunyara kweɗu ŋgakutifukidze; nokuti takatadzira Jehova Mŋari weɗu, isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu, kubva paʋuɗuku bgeɗu kuȿikira pazuʋa ranhasi; hatinakuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana muciɗa kudzoka, imi Israeri, kana muciɗa kudzokera kwandiri, kana muciɗa kubvisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu pamberi paŋgu, hamuŋgafaniri henyu kudzuŋgaira.
Ipapo mucapika,
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova kuʋanhu ʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema: Ɀiʋundirei gombo idɀa, musadɀara pakati peminzwa.

Ɀidziŋgisirei Jehova, mubvise ɀikanda ɀapamberi ɀomŋoyo, imi ʋanhu ʋaJuda naʋagere Jerusarema; kuti kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kukuru kurege kuɓuɗa somŋoto, upise kusinomunhu unogona kuudzimura, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀamakaita.
Taurai pakati paJuda, muparidze muJerusarema, muti: Ridzai hwamanda panyika, ɗanidzirai, muti: Ʋuŋganai, tindopinda mumaguta akakomberedzwa.
Simudzirai mureza kurutiʋi rweZioni, tizai, musamira; nokuti ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa ɀinobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nokuparadza kukuru.
Shumba yaɓuɗa icibva muɗenhere rayo, muparadzi wamarudzi waʋa munzira, waɓuɗa panɀimbo yake, kuti aparadze nyika yenyu, maguta enyu aitwe matoŋgo, kusina‐ʋanogara’mo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno ɀenyu namakudza, muceme nokuwuŋgudza; nokuti kutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova hakuna‐kudzorwa kwatiri.
Ɀino — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — nezuʋa iro mŋoyo wamambo ucaʋora, nemŋoyo yamacinda ʋo; ʋaprista ʋacashamiswa naʋaprofita ʋacakanuka.
Ipapo ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova, ɀirokwaɀo makanyeŋgera kwaɀo ʋanhu aʋa naʋeJerusarema, ɀamakati: Mucaʋa norugare, nyamba munondo unoɓaya kuȿikira pamŋeya.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋanhu aʋa naʋeJerusarema ʋacaʋudzwa,
mhepo inesimba, inobva ikoko, icandiʋuyira; ɀino ndicareʋa ʋo ɀandakatoŋga pamsoro paʋo.
Tarirai, ucaʋuya samakore, ŋgoro dzake dzicaita secampupuri; mabiza ake anokurumidza kukunda makondo. Tinenhamo, nokuti taparadzwa.
Haiwa, Jerusarema, suka ɀakaipa ɀiri pamŋoyo wako, kuti uponeswe. Ndaŋgariro dzako dzakaipa dzicagara mukati mako kuȿikira riniko?
Nokuti inzwi rinotaura ricibva Dani, rinoparidza njodzi ricibva paɀikomo ɀeEfraimi.
Ʋudzai marudzi
Dzinoʋakomberedza saʋarindi ʋanokomberedza munda, nokuti ʋakandimukira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Mufambire wako neɀawakaita ndiɀo ɀakakuʋuyisira ɀinhu iɀi; ndiko kutadza kwako; nokuti ɀinoʋaʋa, nokuti ɀinoȿikira kumŋoyo waŋgu.

Maiwe! ʋura bgaŋgu, ʋura bgaŋgu! Ndinorwadziwa mumŋoyo maŋgu mumene; mŋoyo waŋgu unoɗeɗera mukati maŋgu, handigoni kunyarara, nokuti wanzwa, iwe mŋeya waŋgu, wanzwa kurira kwehwamanda nemhere‐mhere yokurwa.
Kunonzi: Kuparadzwa kunoteʋera kuparadzwa; nokuti nyika yose yaitwa ɗoŋgo; matente aŋgu aparadzwa kamŋe‐kamŋe, namaseiri amatente aŋgu pakarepo.
Ndicaʋona mureza kuȿikira riniko, nokunzwa kurira kwehwamanda?
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋaŋgu mapenzi, haʋandiziʋi; ʋakaita ʋana ʋamapenzi, ʋasinenjere, ʋakacenjera pakuita ɀakaipa, asi haʋaneziʋo pakuita ɀakanaka.
Ndakatarira nyika, ndikaiʋona yaparadzwa, isinecinhu;
Ndakatarira makomo, ndikaʋona aciɗeɗera, neɀikomo ɀose ɀicizunuŋguka.
Ndakatarira, ndikasaʋona munhu, neshiri dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzakaŋga dzatiza.
Ndakatarira, ndikaʋona nyika yakaŋga iciɓereka ɀakanaka yashanduka renje, namaguta ayo ose akaŋga akoromoka pamberi paJehova, napamberi pokutsamŋa kwake kukuru.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Nyika yose icasiyiwa yaparadzwa, asi handiŋgaipedzi cose.
Nemhaka iyi nyika icacema, neɗeŋga rose kumsoro ricaȿiɓa; nokuti ndakaɀitaura, ndakafuŋga kuɀiita, handina‐kuɀiɗemba, handiŋgadzoki pacinhu ici.
Maguta ose anotiza nokuɗa kwomubvumo waʋataȿi ʋamabiza naʋafuri ʋoʋuta; ʋanopinda mumatenhere, ʋanokwira pamatombo; maguta ose akasiyiwa, hakunomunhu unogara’mo.

Ɀino iwe, kana waparadzwa, ucaiteiko? Kunyaŋge ukafuka muceka mutȿuku, kunyaŋge ukashoŋga ɀishoŋgo ɀendarama, kunyaŋge ukazodza meso ako nomuti mutema, uŋgaɀinatsa pasina; ʋaɗikanwa ʋako ʋanokuɀidza, ʋanotȿaka kukuʋuraya.
Nokuti ndakanzwa inzwi seromukadzi unosurumuka, serounotambudzika pakupona ɗaŋgwe rake, inzwi romukunda weZioni, unofemedzeka, unotambanudza maʋoko ake,

Mhanyai kwose‐kwose panzira dzomuguta reJerusarema, muʋone ɀino, muziʋe, mutȿake pamigwagwa mikuru yaro, kana muŋgawana munhu, kana ari’po, unoita ɀakarurama, unotȿaka ɀokwaɗi; ipapo ndicarikaŋganwira.
Kunyaŋge ʋaciti haʋo: NaJehova mupenyu, ɀirokwaɀo ʋanopika nhema.
Haiwa Jehova, meso enyu haazinotȿaka ɀokwaɗi here? Makaʋaroʋa, asi haʋana‐kunzwa kurwadziwa; makaʋapedza, asi ʋakaramba kurairwa; ʋakawomesa ɀiso ɀaʋo kupfuʋura ɗombo, ʋakaramba kudzoka.
Ipapo ndikati: Ɀirokwaɀo, aʋa ʋarombo, mapenzi, nokuti haʋaziʋi nzira yaJehova, kana murairo waMŋari waʋo.
Ndicaenda kuʋakuru, ndicataura naʋo; nokuti iʋo ʋanoziʋa nzira yaJehova, nomurairo waMŋari waʋo. Asi aʋa ʋose pamŋe cete ʋakaputsa joko, ʋakaɗambura ɀisuŋgo.

Saka shumba inobva kuɗondo, icaʋaʋuraya, ɓere rokumarenje ricaʋaparadza, iŋgwe icaʋandira maguta aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɓuɗa’mo, ucabvamburwa; nokuti kuɗarika kwaʋo kuzhinji, nokudzokera kwaʋo kwawedzerwa.
Ndiŋgakukaŋganwira seiko? Ʋana ʋako ʋakandirasha, ʋakapika naʋasati ʋari ʋamŋari. Ŋguʋa yandakaʋagutsa kwaɀo, ʋakapombora, ʋakaʋuŋganira padzimba dzeɀifeʋe ʋaciita mapoka.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakaita samabiza akagutswa, anoŋgoɀifambira; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɗana mukadzi wowokwake.
Ko handiŋgaroʋi pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; Ko mŋeya waŋgu hauŋgaɀitsiʋiri parudzi rwakaɗai here?
Kwirai pamaȿiŋgo aro, muparadze; asi musapedza cose; bvisai mataʋi aro, nokuti haazi aJehova.
Nokuti imba yaIsraeri neimba yaJuda ʋakaita nokunyeŋgera kukuru kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋakaramba Jehova, ʋakati: Haazi iye; hakunecakaipa ciŋgatiwira, hatiŋgaʋoni munondo kana nzara;
ʋaprofita ʋacashanduka mhepo, shoko
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari wehondo: Ɀamunotaura shoko iri, tarirai, ndicaita mashoko aŋgu aʋe mŋoto mumiromo yenyu, naʋanhu aʋa ʋaʋe huni, ʋapedzwe nawo.

Tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro penyu rudzi runobva kure, imi imba yaIsraeri; rudzi runesimba, rudzi rwakare‐kare, rudzi rwamusiŋgaziʋi rurimi rwarwo, kana kunzwisisa ɀaʋanotaura.
Goɓa raʋo bgiro bgakashama, ʋose ʋanhu ʋanesimba.

Ʋacadya ɀamakakohwa neɀokudya ɀenyu ɀaifanira kudyiwa naʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu; ʋacadya makwai enyu neŋombe dzenyu; ʋacadya mizambiriŋga yenyu nemiʋonde yenyu; ʋacaputsira pasi neminondo maguta enyu akakomberedzwa, amaiʋimba nawo.
Asi ɀanzi naJehova: Kunyaŋge napamazuʋa iwayo handiŋgakupedziyi cose.

Ɀino kana muciŋge moti: Ko Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakatiitirei iɀeɀi ɀose? Ipapo uti kwaʋari: Seɀamakandirasha ini, mukashumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari panyika yenyu, saiɀoɀo mucashumira ʋatorwa panyika isati iri yenyu.
Taurai iɀoɀi paimba yaJakobo, muɀiparidzire paJuda, muciti:
Ɀino cinzwai iɀoɀi, imi ʋanhu mapenzi, musinenjere; munameso, asi hamuʋoni, munenzeʋe, asi hamunzwi:

Ɀanzi naJehova: Hamundityi here? Hamuɗeɗeri pamberi paŋgu here, ini ndakaisa jeca riʋe muganho weguŋgwa, ndikatema cireʋo cisiŋgaperi kuti rirege kuudarika? Ɀino kunyaŋge mafuŋgu aro acipeŋga, haaŋgakundi, kunyaŋge akaʋirima, haaŋgaɗariki.
Asi ʋanhu aʋa ʋanomŋoyo wakasindimara unoramba kunzwa; ʋakatsauka, ndokuenda.
Haʋati mumŋoyo yaʋo: Ɀino ŋgatitye Jehova Mŋari weɗu, unotipa paŋguʋa yaɀo mvura yokutaŋga neyokupedzisira, iye unoticeŋgetera maviki akatarwa okukohwa.
Ɀakaipa ɀenyu ɀakatsausa iɀoɀi, kutadza kwenyu kwakadziʋisa kuti ɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀirege kuʋuya kwamuri.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋakaipa ʋari’po pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ʋanorindira, saʋanogarira shiri; ʋanoteya misuŋgo, ʋanoɓata ʋanhu.
Seɗendere, rizere neshiri, saiɀoɀo dzimba dzaʋo dzizere nokunyeŋgera; nemhaka iyo ʋakura, ʋafuma.
Ʋakora, ʋanobginya; ɀirokwaɀo ʋanokurira ʋamŋe namaɓasa akaipa; haʋatambi mhaka, iyo mhaka yenherera, kuti ʋagare ɀakanaka; haʋaruramisiri ʋanoshaiwa.
Ko handiŋgaroʋi pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ko mŋeya waŋgu hauŋgaɀitsiʋiri parudzi rwakaɗai here?
Cinhu cinoshamisa cinosemesa cakaitwa panyika ino;
ʋaprofita ʋanoprofita nhema, naʋaprista ʋanoɓata ʋushe ʋacirairwa naʋo; asi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋanofarira iɀoɀo; ɀino pakupedzisira kwaɀo mucaiteiko?
Tizai, imi ʋana ʋaBenjamini, ibvai pakati peJerusarema, muridze hwamanda paTekoa, mumutse ciratidzo paBeti‐hakeremi; nokuti ɀakaipa ɀinoʋaʋarira ɀiri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nokuparadza kukuru.
Ndicabvisa mukunda weZioni, iye wakanaka, unoʋuneŋgwe.
Ʋafudzi ʋacaenda kwariri ʋanamapoka aʋo; ʋacaridzikira matente aʋo kumatiʋi ose, mumŋe nomumŋe ucafura panɀimbo yake.
Ɀigadzirei kundorwa naro; simukai, tiende masikati. Tinenhamo, nokuti zuʋa roʋira, nokuti mimvuri yamaɗekwana yareɓa.
Simukai, tiende ʋusiku, tindoparadza dzimba dzamadzimambo aro.
Nokuti ɀakanzi naJehova wehondo: Temai miti, mututire Jerusarema murwi wokurwa nawo; ndiro guta rinofanira kurobga, mukati maro munoŋgoʋa nokumanikidza ɓedzi.
Tsime seɀarinoɓuɗisa mvura yaro, saiɀoɀo rinoɓuɗisa ɀakaipa ɀaro; kuita nesimba nokuparadza ndiɀo ɀinonzwika mukati maro, pamberi paŋgu panoŋgoʋa nokurwara namaʋaŋga ŋguʋa dzose.
Tenda kuraŋgwa, iwe Jerusarema, kuti mŋeya waŋgu urege kuparadzana newe, ndirege kukuita ɗoŋgo, nyika isiŋgagari ʋanhu.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ʋacatanha cose ɀakasara ɀaIsraeri, somuzambiriŋga; dzoserai ɀe ruʋoko rwenyu mumateŋgu, seɀinoita mutanhi wemizambiriŋga.
Ndicataura nani nokuʋapupurira ʋanzwe? Tarirai, nzeʋe dzaʋo hadzina‐kudziŋgiswa, haʋagoni kunzwa; tarirai, shoko raJehova raʋa kwaʋari cinhu cinoɗaɗirwa, haʋarifariri.

Naiɀoɀo ndizere nokutsamŋa kwaJehova, ndaneta kuɀidzora; cikuɗururai pamsoro paʋana ʋari munzira dzomuguta, napamsoro peʋuŋgano yamajaya; nokuti murume nomukadzi ʋacaɓatwa pamŋe cete, nomutana pamŋe cete nowaʋa namazuʋa mazhinji.
Dzimba dzaʋo dzicapiwa ʋamŋe, minda yaʋo pamŋe cete naʋakadzi ʋaʋo; nokuti ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro paʋagere panyika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti kubva kuʋaɗuku pakati paʋo kuȿikira kuʋakuru pakati paʋo mumŋe nomumŋe unokarira fuma; ʋuye kubva kuʋaprofita kuȿikira kuʋaprista mumŋe nomumŋe unoita nokunyeŋgera.
Ʋakaŋgopodza ʋaŋga raʋanhu ʋaŋgu ɀishoma ʋaciti: Rugare, rugare! iɀo hakunorugare.
Ko ʋakanyadziswa ŋguʋa yaʋakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza here? Kwete haʋana‐kutoŋgonyara, ʋakakoniwa kuceneruka; naiɀoɀo ʋacawa pakati paʋanowa, paŋguʋa yandinoʋaroʋa ʋacagumburwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Mirai panzira, muʋone; bvunzai nzira dzakare, kuti nzira yakanaka ndeipi; mufambe mairi, mugowanira mŋeya yenyu zororo; asi ʋakati: Hatiɗi kufamba
Ndakagadza nharirire kukurindirai,
Naiɀoɀo inzwai, imi marudzi, newe ʋuŋgano, muziʋe ɀiri pakati paʋo.
Inzwa, iwe nyika, tarira, ndini ndinoʋuyisira ʋanhu aʋa ɀakaipa, iɀo ɀiɓereko ɀemifuŋgo yaʋo, nokuti haʋana‐kuterera mashoko aŋgu; kana uri murairo waŋgu, ʋakauramba.
Ko ɀinonhuwira ɀinoʋuyirei kwandiri ɀicibva Sheba, nekaramusi inobva kunyika iri kure? Ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa handiɀiɗi, neɀiɓayiro ɀenyu haɀindifadzi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaisira ʋanhu aʋa ɀigumbuso, madziɓaɓa naʋanakomana ʋaʋo ʋacagumbuswa naɀo pamŋe cete; munhu neshamŋari yake ʋacaparara pamŋe cete.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ʋanhu ʋacabva kunyika yokumsoro, rudzi rukuru rucamutswa, rucibva kumigumo yenyika.
Ʋakaɓata ʋuta nepfumo, ʋanehasha haʋanenyasha; inzwi raʋo rinotinhira seguŋgwa; ʋanotaȿa mabiza, mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɀigadzira, somunhu unoenda kuhondo, kuzorwa newe, iwe mukunda weZioni.
Takanzwa guhu raɀo, maʋoko eɗu oshaiwa simba, taɓatwa nokutambudzika, nokurwadziwa sokwomukadzi unosurumuka.
Regai kuɓuɗira kuɓundo, kana kufamba nenzira; nokuti munondo womuʋeŋgi neɀinotyisa ɀiri kumatiʋi ose.
Haiwa, mukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ɀisuŋge ciʋuno namakudza, uʋumburuke mumaɗota; cema, somunhu unocema mŋanakomana wake mumŋe cete, nokucema kukuru kwaɀo; nokuti muparadzi ucatiwira pakarepo.
Ndakakuita mushori nenhare pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu, kuti uziʋe nokuidza nzira yaʋo.
Ʋose ʋaʋo ʋamukiri ʋakaiȿo‐ipa, ʋanoŋgofamba‐famba ʋaciita makuhwa; indarira neɗare, ʋanoita ɀakashata ʋose.
Mvuto inovutira kwaɀo, mutobvu wapera nomŋoto, ʋanoramba ʋacinatsa pasina, nokuti ʋakaipa haʋabviswi.
Ʋacanzi sirveri yakarashwa, nokuti Jehova wakaʋaramba.
Shoko rakaʋuya kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Mira pasuʋo reimba yaJehova, uparidzire’po shoko iri, uti: Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋaJuda mose, munopinda napamasuʋo awa kuzonamata Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ruramisai nzira dzenyu neɀamunoita, ndigokugarisai panɀimbo ino.
Musaʋimba namashoko enhema, anoti: Iɀeɀi itembere yaJehova, tembere yaJehova, tembere yaJehova.
Nokuti kana mukaruramisa kwaɀo nzira dzenyu neɀamunoita, kana muciita ɀakarurama munhu
kana musiŋgamanikidzi mutorwa, nenherera, necirikadzi, mukasateʋura ropa risinemhoȿa panɀimbo ino, nokusateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋanokuisai panjodzi;
ipapo ndicakugarisai panɀimbo ino, panyika yandakapa madziɓaɓa enyu, kubvira paŋguʋa yakare kuȿikira nokusiŋgaperi.
Tarirai, munoʋimba namashoko enhema, asiŋgagoni kuɓatsira.
Muŋgaɓa, nokuʋuraya, nokuita ʋupombge, nokupika nhema, nokupisira Baari ɀinonhuwira, nokuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋapirwa ʋamakaŋga musiŋgaziʋi,
ndokuzoʋuya momira pamberi paŋgu muimba ino, panoɗanwa zita raŋgu, muciti: Tasunuŋgurwa; kuti mugoita iɀi ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza here?
Ko imba ino panoɗanwa zita raŋgu raʋa ɓako ramakororo pamberi penyu here? Tarirai, ini, ini ndimene ndaʋona iɀoɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Asi ɀino endai kunɀimbo yaŋgu yaiʋa paShiro, pandakagarisa zita raŋgu pakutaŋga, muʋone ɀandakaiitira nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋanhu ʋaŋgu Israeri.
Ɀino, ɀamakaita maɓasa awa ose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ini ndikataura nemi, ndicifumira maŋgwanani ndicitaura, imi mukasanzwa, ndikakuɗanai, mukasapindura;
naiɀoɀo ndicaitira imba panoɗanwa zita raŋgu, yamunoʋimba nayo, nenɀimbo yandakakupai imi namadziɓaɓa enyu, seɀandakaitira Shiro.
Ndicakurashirai kure neni, seɀandakarasha hama dzenyu dzose, irwo rudzi rwose rwaEfraimi.
Naiɀoɀo iwe cirega kunyeŋgeterera ʋanhu aʋa, usaɗanidzira nokunyeŋgetera nokuɗa kwaʋo, kana kuʋakumbirira kwandiri; nokuti handiŋgakunzwi.
Hauʋoni here ɀaʋanoita mumaguta aJuda nomunzira dzomuJerusarema here?
Ʋana ʋanoʋuŋganidza huni, madziɓaɓa ndokuɓatidza mŋoto, ʋakadzi ʋanokanya ʋupfu kuti ʋaɓikire ʋahosi ʋokuɗeŋga ɀiŋgwa, ʋuye kuti ʋaɗirire ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, kuti ʋanditsamŋise.
Ʋanonditsamŋisa here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; haʋazi

Saka ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari: Tarirai, kutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu ɀicaɗururirwa panɀimbo ino, pamsoro paʋanhu, napamsoro peɀipfuwo, napamsoro pemiti yokuɓundo, napamsoro peɀiɓereko ɀenyika; ɀicapfuta, ɀisiŋgadzimŋi.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Wedzerai ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa paɀiɓayiro ɀenyu, mudye nyama
Nokuti handina‐kutaura namadziɓaɓa enyu, kana kuʋaraira paŋguʋa yandakaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita pamsoro peɀipiriso ɀinopiswa kana ɀiɓayiro;
asi ndakaʋaraira cinhu ici, ndiciti: Tererai inzwi raŋgu, ndigoʋa Mŋari wenyu, nemi mucaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu; mufambe nenzira yose yandicakurairai, mugoʋa nomufaro.
Asi haʋana‐kuterera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo, asi ʋakafamba nokuraŋgarira kwaʋo noʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo, ʋakadzokera shure; haʋana‐kupfuʋura mberi.
Kubvira pazuʋa rokuɓuɗa kwamadziɓaɓa enyu munyika yeEgipita, kuȿikira pazuʋa ranhasi, ndakakutumirai ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋaprofita, ndicifumira maŋgwanani zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ndiciʋatuma;
kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, haʋana‐kunditerera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo, asi ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo; ʋakaita ɀakaipa kukunda madziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀino iwe unofanira kuʋataurira mashoko awa ose; asi haʋaŋgakutereri; unofanira kuɗana ʋo kwaʋari, asi haʋaŋgakupinduri.
Ɀino iwe uti kwaʋari: Urwu ndirwo rudzi rusiŋganzwi shoko raJehova Mŋari waʋo, kana kutenda kuraŋgwa; kutendeka kwapera, kwabva cose pamiromo yaʋo.
Ʋeʋura ʋukomba bgako,
Nokuti ʋana ʋaJuda ʋakaita ɀakaipa pamberi paŋgu, ʋakaisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo muimba pakaɗanwa zita raŋgu, kuti ʋaiȿiɓise — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋakaʋaka nɀimbo dzakakwirira dzeTofeti, dziri mumupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, kuti ʋapise ʋanakomana naʋanasikana ʋaʋo mumŋoto, ɀiri ɀinhu ɀandisina‐kuʋaraira, kana kufuŋga mumŋoyo maŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya, aʋasiŋgazopaidzi Tofeti, kana mupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, asi Mupata wokuʋuraya; nokuti ʋacaʋiga
Mitumbu yaʋanhu aʋa ɀicaʋa ɀokudya ɀeshiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀeɀikara ɀenyika; hakuna‐ucaɀidziŋga.
Ipapo ndicagumisa pamaguta aJuda napanzira dzomuJerusarema inzwi rokuseka, nenzwi romufaro, nenzwi recikomba nenzwi romŋeŋga; nokuti nyika icaʋa ɗoŋgo.
Neŋguʋa iyo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ʋacabvisa pamabgiro aʋo mafupa amadzimambo aʋaJuda, namafupa amacinda aʋo, namafupa aʋaprista, namafupa aʋaprofita, namafupa aʋaigara paJerusarema;
ʋacaaparadzira panopenya zuʋa nomŋedzi nehondo yose yokuɗeŋga, iɀo ɀaʋaiɗa, neɀaʋaishumira, neɀaʋaiteʋera, neɀaʋaiʋiŋga, neɀaʋainamata; haaŋgaʋuŋganidzwi, kana kuʋigwa,
Rufu rucasanaŋgurwa kupfuʋura ʋupenyu naʋose ʋakasara ʋorudzi urwu rwakaipa, ʋakasara panɀimbo dzose kwandakaʋadziŋgira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ɀino unofanira kuti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ko ʋanhu ʋaŋgawa, ʋakasazomuka ɀe here? Munhu uŋgatsauka, akasazodzoka here?
Ɀino ʋanhu aʋa ʋeJerusarema ʋakadzokereiko nokudzokera kusiŋgatoŋgoperi? Ʋanonamatira kunyeŋgera, ʋanoramba kudzoka.
Ndakaterera, ndikanzwa, asi haʋana‐kutaura ɀakarurama; hakunomunhu unocema kuipa kwake, aciti: Ndaiteiko? Mumŋe nomumŋe unotsauka nenzira yake, sebiza rinomhanya kwaɀo pakurwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀimudo, riri kuɗeŋga, rinoziʋa ŋguʋa dzaro dzakatarwa, nenjiʋa nenyeŋganyeŋga nekondo dzinoraŋgarira ŋguʋa yokuʋuya kwadzo, asi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu haʋaziʋi murairo waJehova.
Munoreʋa seiko, muciti: Takacenjera, murairo waJehova tinawo? Asi tarirai, peni yenhema yaʋanyori inonyeŋgera.
Ʋanhu ʋakacenjera ʋakanyadziswa, ʋakavunduka nokuɓatwa; tarirai, ʋakaramba shoko raJehova, ɀino ʋanenjere dzakaɗiniko?

Naiɀoɀo ndicapa ʋamŋe ʋakadzi ʋaʋo, neminda yaʋo ndicaipa ʋamŋe ʋacaiita yaʋo; nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo, kubva kuʋaɗuku kuȿikira kuʋakuru, mumŋe nomumŋe unokarira fuma; kubva kuʋaprofita kuȿikira kuʋaprista mumŋe nomumŋe unoita nokunyeŋgera.
Ʋakaŋgopodza ʋaŋga romukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ɀishoma, ʋaciti: Rugare, rugare! iɀo hakunorugare.
Ko ʋakanyadziswa ŋguʋa yaʋakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza here? Kwete, haʋana‐kutoŋgonyara, ʋakakoniwa kuceneruka; naiɀoɀo ʋacawa pakati paʋanowa; paŋguʋa yokurobga kwaʋo ʋacagumburwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicaʋapedza cose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; hakuŋgaʋi namazambiriŋga pamuzambiriŋga, kana maʋonde pamuʋonde, namashizha acawoma ndakaraira ʋacaʋakukura.
Tinogarireiko pasi? Ʋuŋganai, tipinde mumaguta akakomberedzwa, tifire’po; nokuti Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakatiʋuraya, akatipa mvura inoʋuraya kuti tiinwe; nokuti takatadzira Jehova.
Takaŋga takatarira rugare, asi hakunecakanaka cakaȿika;
Kufemhedza kwamabiza ake kwakanzwika aciri paDani; nyika yose yakaɗeɗera nenzwi rokurira kwaanesimba ake; nokuti aȿika, apedza nyika neɀose ɀiri’mo, neguta naʋose ʋagere’mo.
Nokuti tarirai, ndicatuma pakati penyu nyoka nemvumbi, dzicaramba kuroyiwa; dzicakurumai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Haiwa, ɗai ndaigona haŋgu kuɀinyaradza pakucema kwaŋgu! Mŋoyo waŋgu waziya mukati maŋgu.
Inzwai, inzwi rokucema kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu, rinobva kunyika iri kure‐kure,
Kuceka kwapera, zhezha rapfuʋura, asi tigere kuponeswa.
Ini ndinokuʋadzwa nokuɗa kwokukuʋadzwa kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ndinocema, ndaɓatwa nokuvunduswa.
Ko hakunomuti webarsami muGireadi here? Hakuneŋaŋga’ko here? Nokuti mukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu wakagoregerei kupodzwa?
Haiwa, ɗai musoro waŋgu waiʋa
Haiwa, ɗai ndaiʋa neɗumba rinosigarwa naʋafambi murenje, ndiŋgaɗai ndaisiya ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndikabva kwaʋari! Nokuti ʋose imhombge, iʋuŋgano yaʋanhu ʋanonyeŋgera.
Ʋanokuŋga marimi aʋo, seɀa
Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaacenjerere wokwake, murege kutenda hama ipi neipi; nokuti hama imŋe neimŋe icanyeŋgera, nowokwake mumŋe nomumŋe ucapota‐pota anamakuhwa.
Mumŋe nomumŋe ucanyeŋgera wokwake, haaŋgareʋi ɀokwaɗi; ʋakadzidzisa marimi aʋo kureʋa nhema, ʋanoɀinetsa nokuita ɀakaipa.
Ʋugaro bgenyu ʋuri pakati pokunyeŋgera; ʋanoramba kundiziʋa nokunyeŋgera kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ndicaʋanyausa nokuʋaidza; nokuti ndiŋgaita seiko pamsoro pomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu?
Marimi aʋo miseʋe inoʋuraya, anoreʋa ɀinonyeŋgera; munhu unoreʋa ɀorugare kunowokwake nomuromo wake, asi mumŋoyo make unomuʋandira.
Ko handiŋgaʋaroʋi pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Ko mŋeya waŋgu hauŋgatsibgi parudzi rwakaɗai here?

Ndicacema nokuwuŋgudza pamsoro pamakomo, ndicacema pamsoro pamafuro amarenje, nokuti ɀatȿa, hakuna‐unopfuʋura napo; ʋanhu haʋagoni kunzwa inzwi reɀipfuwo; shiri dzokuɗeŋga nemhuka dzose ɀatiza, ɀaenda haɀo.
Ndicaita Jerusarema mirwi yamabge, panogara makaʋa; namaguta aJuda ndicaaita matoŋgo, asina‐unogara’mo.
Munhu wakacenjera, unonzwisisa iɀoɀi, ndianiko? Muromo waJehova wakataura naniko, kuti aparidze iɀoɀi? Nyika yakapedzwa nokupiswa serenje neiko, pasina‐unopfuʋura napo?
Jehova wakati: Ɀaʋakarasha murairo waŋgu wandakaisa pamberi paʋo, ʋakasaterera inzwi raŋgu, nokufamba naɀo,
asi ʋakateʋera ʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo naʋaBaari, iɀo ɀaʋakadzidziswa namadziɓaɓa aʋo;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicadyisa ʋanhu aʋa gaʋakaʋa, nokuʋanwisa mvura yenduru.
Ndicaʋaparadzira ʋo pakati pamarudzi, aʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi iʋo kunyaŋge namadziɓaɓa aʋo; ndicatuma munondo uʋateʋere, kuȿikira ndaʋapedza.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Raŋgarirai imi, muɗane ʋakadzi ʋaŋgacema, ʋaʋuye; tumai
ŋgaʋakurumidze ʋaceme pamsoro peɗu, kuti meso eɗu ayerere misodzi, namafuŋgiro eɗu aɗurure mvura.
Nokuti inzwi rokucema rinonzwika ricibva Zioni,
Asi inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋakadzi, nzeʋe dzenyu ŋgadzinzwe shoko romuromo wake; dzidzisai ʋakunda ʋenyu kucema, nomumŋe nomumŋe adzidzise wokwake kuwuŋgudza.
Nokuti rufu rwakakwira pamawindi eɗu, rwakapinda mudzimba dzamadzimambo eɗu, kuti rupedze ʋana ʋari kunze, namajaya ari panzira dzomuguta.
Taura, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀitunha ɀaʋanhu ɀicawira pasi somupfudze kuɓundo, setsama yehura dzinosiyiwa nomuceki, dzisina‐unodziʋuŋganidza.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Munhu wakacenjera ŋgaarege kuɀirumbidza pamsoro poʋucenjeri bgake, nomunhu wesimba ŋgaarege kuɀirumbidza pamsoro pesimba rake, nomunhu wakafuma ŋgaarege kuɀirumbidza pamsoro pefuma yake;
asi unoɀirumbidza, ŋgaaɀirumbidze pamsoro pecinhu ici, kuti uno
Tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — mazuʋa anoʋuya, andicaroʋa ʋose ʋakadziŋgiswa pakati pokusadziŋgiswa
; Egipita, naJuda, naEdomi, naʋana ʋaAmoni, naMoabi, naʋose ʋakaʋeʋurwa
Inzwai shoko rinotaura Jehova kwamuri, imi imba yaIsraeri:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Regai kudzidza tsika dzamarudzi aʋanhu, musavunduswa neɀiratidzo ɀokuɗeŋga; nokuti marudzi aʋanhu anovunduswa naɀo.
Nokuti tsika dzaʋanhu hadzinamaturo; nokuti mumŋe unotema muti muɗondo, riri ɓasa ramaʋoko omunhu unoʋeza neɗemo.
Ʋanoushoŋgedza nesirveri nendarama, ʋanouroʋera nembambo nenyundo, kuti urege kuzunuŋguka.
Ɀakafanana nembiru dzakaʋezwa, dzisiŋgatauri; ɀinofanira kutakurwa, nokuti haɀigoni kufamba. Musaɀitya, nokuti haɀigoni kuita ɀakaipa, kunyaŋge kuita ɀakanaka, haɀigoni.
Hakuna‐wakafanana nemi Jehova; imi muri mukuru, zita renyu iguru nesimba raro.
Ndianiko uŋgarega kukutyai, imi Mambo wamarudzi aʋanhu? Nokuti makafanira iɀoɀi; nokuti pakati paʋakacenjera ʋose ʋamarudzi aʋanhu, napaʋushe bgaʋo bgose, hakuna‐wakafanana nemi.
Asi ʋose pamŋe cete haʋanenjere, mapenzi; dzidzo yeɀifananidzo iɗanda ɀaro.

Isirveri yakapfurwa ikaita ɓape, yakatorwa Tarshishi, nendarama inobva Ufazi, riri ɓasa remhizha neramaʋoko omupfuri wendarama; ɀakafukidzwa ŋguʋo dzemiceka mitema nemitȿuku; ɀose iɓasa raʋanhu ʋenjere.
Asi Jehova ndiye Mŋari waɀokwaɗi; ndiye Mŋari mupenyu, naMambo wokusiŋgaperi; kana iye atsamŋa nyika inoɗeɗera, marudzi aʋanhu haagoni kumira pahasha dzake.
Itiyi kwaʋari: Ʋamŋari ʋasina‐kuita ɗeŋga nenyika, ndiʋo ʋacapera panyika napasi peɗeŋga rose.
Ndiye wakaita nyika nesimba rake, wakateya nyika noʋucenjeri bgake, wakatatamura ɗeŋga rose nenjere dzake.
Kana aciɓuɗisa inzwi rake, kunomubvumo wemvura zhinji kuɗeŋga; unokwidza makore pamigumo yenyika, unoita mheni kuʋuyisa mvura, unoɓuɗisa mhepo panoʋigwa fuma yake.
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe waʋa usinenjere, haaneziʋo; mupfuri mumŋe nomumŋe wendarama unonyadziswa necifananidzo cake
Haɀinamaturo, iɓasa rinonyeŋgera; paŋguʋa yokurobga kwaɀo ɀicapera.
Mugoʋe waJakobo haufanani naiɀoɀo, nokuti ndiye muʋumbi waɀose; Israeri ndirwo rudzi rwenhaka yake; Jehova wehondo ndiro zita rake.
Ʋuŋganidza nhumbi dzako, ubve panyika, iwe unogara wakakombga.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ŋguʋa ino ndicaposhera kure ʋanhu ʋagere munyika ino, ndicaʋamanikidza, kuti ʋawanikwe.
Ndinenhamo nokuɗa kwokurwadziwa kwaŋgu! Ʋaŋga raŋgu rakaipa kwaɀo; asi ndakati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndibgo ʋurwere bgaŋgu, ndinofanira kuʋutakura haŋgu.
Tente raŋgu rakaputswa, mabote aŋgu ose akaɗamburwa; ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋabva kwandiri, haʋaciri’po; hakucina‐uŋgatatamura tente raŋgu, kana kumisa ɀe miceka yetente raŋgu.
Nokuti ʋafudzi ʋaʋa ʋasinenjere, haʋana‐kubvunza Jehova; naiɀoɀo haʋana‐kuzofara, namapoka aʋo ose akapararira.
Inzwai, mukurumbira! Tarirai, ɓope guru rinoʋuya ricibva kunyika yokumsoro, kushandura maguta aJuda aʋe matoŋgo, panogara makaʋa.
Haiwa, Jehova, ndinoziʋa kuti nzira yomunhu haizi yake amene; munhu, unofamba, haagoni kururamisa nhano dzake.
Haiwa, Jehova, ndiraŋgei henyu, asi muite nokururama; musaɀiita nokutsamŋa kwenyu, kuti murege kundipedza cose.
Ƌururirai kutsamŋa kwenyu pamsoro pamarudzi aʋanhu ʋasiŋgakuziʋiyi, napamsoro pamarudzi asiŋgaɗani zita renyu; nokuti ʋakadya Jakobo, ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakamudya nokumupedza, ʋakaparadza ʋugaro bgake.
Shoko rakaʋuya kunaJeremia, ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Inzwai mashoko esuŋgano iyi, mutaure naʋanhu ʋaJuda, naʋagere Jerusarema,
uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Munhu usiŋganzwi mashoko esuŋgano iyi, ŋgaatukwe,

aya andakaraira madziɓaɓa enyu nezuʋa randakaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, mucoto camatare, ndiciti: Tererai inzwi raŋgu, muɀiite ɀose seɀandakakurairai; ipapo mucaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari wenyu;
kuti ndisimbise kupika kwandakapikira madziɓaɓa enyu, kuti ndicaʋapa nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci, seɀaɀakaita zuʋa ranhasi. Ipapo ndakapindura, ndikati: Ameni, Jehova!
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Paridza mashoko awa ose pamaguta aJuda, napanzira dzomuJerusarema, uciti: Inzwai mashoko esuŋgano iyi, muaite.
Nokuti ndakarairira madziɓaɓa enyu kwaɀo nezuʋa randakaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, ndicifumira maŋgwanani, ndicirairira, ndiciti: Tererai inzwi raŋgu.

Asi haʋana‐kuterera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo, asi mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo wakaramba acifamba noʋukukutu bgomŋoyo wake wakaipa; naiɀoɀo ndakaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo mashoko ose esuŋgano iyi, andakaʋaraira kuti ʋaaite, asi haʋana‐kuaita.
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Raŋgano yakaipa yawanikwa pakati paʋanhu ʋaJuda, napakati paʋagere Jerusarema.
Ʋakadzokera kuneɀakaipa ɀamadziteteguru aʋo, akaramba kunzwa mashoko aŋgu, ʋakateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari kuti ʋaʋashumire; imba yaIsraeri neimba yaJuda ʋakaputsa suŋgano yaŋgu yandakaita namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro paʋo, ɀaʋasiŋgagoni kutiza; ʋacaɗanidzira kwandiri, asi handiŋgaʋanzwi.
Ipapo ʋamaguta aJuda naʋagere Jerusarema, ʋacandoɗanidzira kunaʋamŋari ʋaʋanopisira ɀinonhuwira; asi haʋaŋgatoŋgoʋaponesi paŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwaʋo.
Nokuti iwe Juda, kuwanda kwaʋamŋari ʋako kwakafanana nokuwanda kwamaguta ako; ʋuye makaʋakira cinhu cinonyadzisa maartari, iwo maartari okupisira Baari ɀinonhuwira, akawanda senzira dzomuJerusarema.
Saka iwe usanyeŋgeterera ʋanhu aʋa, kana kuɗana nokuɗa kwaʋo nenzwi rako kana munyeŋgetero wako; nokuti handiŋgaʋanzwi neŋguʋa yaʋanoɗanidzira kwandiri nokuɗa kwokutambudzika kwaʋo.
Muɗikanwa waŋgu unotȿakeiko mumba maŋgu, ɀaakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza naʋazhinji? Mhiko nenyama tȿene ɀiŋgabvisa njodzi yako here? Ipapo uŋgafara kwaɀo.
Jehova wakakutumidza zita rinonzi, Muorivi mutema, wakanaka neɀiɓereko ɀakanaka;
Nokuti Jehova wehondo, iye wakakusima, wakareʋa ɀakaipa pamsoro pako, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀeimba yaIsraeri, neimba yaJuda, ɀaʋakaita ʋacinditsamŋisa nokupisira kwaʋo Baari ɀinonhuwira.
Jehova wakandiziʋisa iɀoɀo, ndikaɀiziʋa; ipapo mukandiratidza ɀaʋanoita.
Asi ini ndakaŋga ndakafanana negwaiana nyoro rinoiswa kundoɓayiwa; ndakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi kuti ʋakaŋga ʋaraŋgana mano akaipa pamsoro paŋgu,
Asi imi Jehova wehondo, imi munotoŋga ɀakarurama, munoidza itȿo nomŋoyo, ndicaʋona kutsiʋa kwenyu kwaʋari, nokuti ndakakuzarurirai mhaka yaŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paʋanhu ʋeAnatoti, ʋanotȿaka kukuʋuraya, ʋaciti: Haufaniri kuprofita nezita raJehova, kuti urege kuʋurawa namaʋoko eɗu;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ndicaʋaroʋa; majaya acaʋurawa nomunondo, ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo ʋacaʋurawa nenzara;
haʋaŋgasarirwi naʋanhu, nokuti ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro paʋanhu ʋeAnatoti pagore rokurobga kwaʋo.
Imi Jehova, makarurama kana ndicikakaʋara nemi; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndinoɗa kutaurirana nemi pamsoro pokururamisa
Imi makaʋasima, ɀirokwaɀo midzi yaʋo yakaɓata; ʋanokura, ɀirokwaɀo ʋanoɓereka ɀiɓereko; imi muri pedyo nemiromo yaʋo, asi muri kure nemŋoyo yaʋo.
Asi imi Jehova munondiziʋa; munondiʋona, munoidza mŋoyo waŋgu kuti wakaɗini kwamuri; muʋakweʋe samakwai anondoɓayiwa, muʋagadzirire zuʋa rokuɓayiwa.
Nyika icacema, nemiriʋo yenyika yose icaȿaʋa kuȿikira riniko? Mhuka neshiri ɀinopedzwa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋagere’mo, nokuti ʋakati: Haaŋgaʋoni kuguma kweɗu.
Kana uciŋge wakamhanya naʋanofamba namakumbo, ukaneta, uŋgagona seiko kuʋiʋana namabiza? Kana uciŋge wakagara ɀakanaka panyika yorugare, uŋgaita seiko pamatenhere aJoridani?
Nokuti naidzo hama dzako naʋeimba yaɓaɓa ʋako ʋakaita nokunyeŋgera kwauri; naiʋo ʋakaɗanidzira kwauri, usaʋatenda, kunyaŋge ʋacitaura mashoko akanaka newe.
Ndasiya imba yaŋgu, ndarasha nhaka yaŋgu; ndaisa muɗikanwa womŋoyo waŋgu mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋake.
Nhaka yaŋgu yaʋa kwandiri seshumba iri muɗondo; yakandiʋombera, saka ndakaiʋeŋga.
Ko nhaka yaŋgu yaʋa kwandiri segondo rinamaʋara here? Makondo akaikomba kumatiʋi ose here? Endai mundokokera ɀikara ɀose ɀokusaŋgo, muʋuye naɀo ɀidye.
Ʋafudzi ʋazhinji ʋakaparadza munda waŋgu wemizambiriŋga, ʋakatsika mugoʋe waŋgu namakumbo aʋo, ʋakaita mugoʋe waŋgu unoɗikanwa riʋe renje risinecinhu.
Ʋakauita ɗoŋgo; unocema kwandiri, ɀawakaitwa ɗoŋgo; nyika yose yakaitwa ɗoŋgo, nokuti hakunomunhu unehanya nayo.
Ʋaparadzi ʋakaȿika paɀikomo ɀose ɀisinemiti murenje; nokuti munondo waJehova unopedza kubva kumugumo mumŋe wenyika kuȿikira kunomumŋe mugumo wenyika; hakunenyama inorugare.
Ʋakakusha ɀiyo, asi ʋakaceka minzwa; ʋakaɀitambudza, asi haʋana‐kuwana cinhu; mucanyadziswa pamsoro peɀiɓereko ɀeminda yenyu, nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro poʋokwaŋgu ʋose ʋakaipa ʋanopamba nhaka yandakagarisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicaʋadzura panyika yaʋo, ndicadzura ʋeimba yaJuda pakati paʋo.
Ɀino kana ndaʋadzura, ndicadzoka, ndikaʋanzwira tsitsi, ndicaʋadzosera mumŋe nomumŋe kunhaka yake, nomumŋe nomumŋe kunyika yake.
Ɀino kana ʋacidzidza ɀakanaka tsika dzaʋanhu ʋaŋgu, kupika nezita raŋgu,
Asi kana ʋasiŋganzwi, ndicadzura rudzi urwo, ndicarudzura nokuruparadza — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova kwandiri: Enda undoɀiteŋgera banhire romuceka, uɀisuŋge ciʋuno naro; asi usaruisa mumvura.
Ipapo ndakateŋga banhire, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova, ndikaɀisuŋga ciʋuno naro.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri rwecipiri, riciti:
Tora banhire rawateŋga, riri paciʋuno cako, usimuke uende
Ipapo ndakaenda, ndikandoriʋiga pa
Ɀino mazuʋa mazhinji akati apfuʋura, Jehova akati kwandiri: Simuka, uende kwaUfratesi, utore’po banhire randakakuraira kuti uriʋige’po.
Ipapo ndakaenda kwaUfratesi, ndikacera, ndikatora banhire pandakaŋga ndariʋiga; ɀino tarira, banhire rakaŋga raʋora, risineɓasa cose.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Saiɀoɀo ndicaʋodza kuɀikudza kwaJuda, nokuɀikudza kukuru kweJerusarema.
Ʋanhu aʋa ʋakaipa, ʋanoramba kunzwa mashoko aŋgu, ʋanofamba noʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo, ʋakateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari kuti ʋaʋashumire nokuʋanamata, ʋacafanana nebanhire iri, risineɓasa cose.

Nokuti banhire seɀarinonamatira paciʋuno comunhu, saiɀoɀo ndakaŋga ndanamatidza imba yaIsraeri yose neimba yaJuda kwandiri, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuti ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, nembiri yaŋgu, nokurumbidzwa kwaŋgu, nokubginya kwaŋgu; asi ʋakaramba kuterera.

Naiɀoɀo unofanira kutaura shoko iri kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Mudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe ucazadzwa newaini; ɀino iʋo ʋacati kwauri: Hatiziʋi kanhi kuti mudziyo mumŋe nomumŋe ucazadzwa newaini?
Ipapo uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ʋose ʋagere munyika ino, iwo madzimambo agere pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, naʋaprista naʋaprofita, naʋose ʋagere Jerusarema, ndicaʋazadza nokuɓatwa
Ndicaʋagumirisana, madziɓaɓa naʋanakomana
Inzwai, murerekere nzeʋe; musaɀikudza, nokuti Jehova wakataura.
