Rumbidzai Jehova, Mŋari wenyu, asati aʋuyisa rima, tsoka dzenyu dzisati dzagumburwa pamakomo erima, iye asati ashandura ciedza camakamirira, akaciita mumvuri worufu, nokuciita rima guru.
Asi kana musiŋgaɗi kuɀinzwa, mŋeya waŋgu ucakucema pakaʋanda nokuɗa kwokuɀikudza kwenyu; meso aŋgu acacema kwaɀo, acayerera misodzi, nokuti ɓoka raJehova ratapxa.
Iti kunamambo nokunamai ʋamambo: Garai pasi‐pasi kwaɀo, nokuti ɀishoŋgo ɀemisoro yenyu ɀawira pasi, iyo korona yokukudzwa kwenyu.
Maguta okurutiʋi rwezasi akazarirwa, hakuna‐unoazarura; ʋaJuda ʋakatapxa ʋose, ʋakatapxa cose‐cose.
Riŋgira meso ako, uʋone ʋanobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro. Ko ɓoka rawakapiwa, iro ɓoka rako rakanaka kwaɀo, riripi?
Ucati kuɗiniko kana aciisa pamsoro pako iʋo ʋawakadzidzisa kuʋa shamŋari dzako ʋaʋe ʋaɓati ʋako? Hauŋgaɓatwi nokurwadziwa sokwomukadzi unopona here?
Ɀino kana ukati mumŋoyo mako: Iɀoɀi ɀandiwira neiko? Ŋguʋo dzako dzakafukurwa, neɀitsitsino ɀako ɀakuʋadzwa nemhaka yoʋukuru bgeɀakaipa ɀenyu.
Ko muEtiopia uŋgashandura ganda rake, kana iŋgwe maʋara ayo here? Kana ɀaibvira, nemi ʋo maigona kuita ɀakanaka, iyemi makaroʋera kuita ɀakaipa.
Saka ndicaʋaparadzira sehundi inopepereswa nemhepo murenje.
Ndiɀo ɀawakagoʋerwa, ndiwo mugoʋe wawakayererwa neni — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti wakandikaŋganwa, ukaʋimba neɀenhema.
Saka ndicafukura ʋo ŋguʋo dzako pamberi pako, kunyadziswa kwako kuʋonekwe.
Ndakaʋona kunyaŋgadza kwako, ibgo ʋupombge bgako, nokufemhedza kwako, nokunyadza kwokupombora kwako paɀikomo ɀokuɓundo. Unenhamo, iwe Jerusarema! Unoramba kunatswa; ɀicaɗaro kuȿikira riniko?
Shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kunaJeremia pamsoro pokusanaya kwemvura.
Juda ʋanocema, namasuʋo aʋo anoshaiwa simba, ʋagere pasi ʋakafuka ŋguʋo nhema; kucema kweJerusarema kwakwira kumsoro.
Ʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋanotuma ʋaranda ʋaʋo kumvura; ʋanoȿika kumadziʋa, ndokushaiwa mvura, ʋanodzoka neɀiroŋgo ɀisina; ʋakanyadziswa nokukaŋganiswa, ʋanofukidza misoro yaʋo.
Ʋarimi ʋanonyadziswa, ʋanofukidza misoro yaʋo, nokuɗa kwenyika yakaparuka, nokuti mvura haina‐kunaya panyika.
Ɀirokwaɀo, hadzi yenondo inoɓereka ʋo musaŋgo, ndokurasha
Mbizi dzinomira paɀikomo ɀisinemiti, dzicifema mhepo samakaʋa; meso adzo aneta, nokuti hakunoʋuswa.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaipa ɀeɗu ɀicitipupurira, imi Jehova, ɓatai nokuɗa kwezita renyu; nokuti kudzokera kweɗu kuzhinji; takakutadzirai.
Imi citariro caIsraeri, Muponesi waʋo neŋguʋa yokutambudzika, munoitireiko somutorwa panyika, ʋuye somufambi unotsauka kuzoʋata ʋusiku cete?
Munoitireiko somunhu unotya, somunhu unesimba usiŋgagoni kuponesa? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro imi Jehova muri pakati peɗu, takatumidzwa nezita renyu; regai kutisiya.
Ɀanzi naJehova kuʋanhu aʋa: Saiɀoɀo ʋakafarira kudzuŋgaira, haʋana‐kudzora tsoka dzaʋo; naiɀoɀo Jehova haana‐kuʋafarira; ɀino ucaraŋgarira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo, nokuʋaroʋa pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Usanyeŋgeterera ʋanhu aʋa
Kana ʋaciɀinyima ɀokudya, handiŋganzwi kucema kwaʋo; kana ʋaciʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, handiŋgaɀigamuciri; asi ndicaʋapedza nomunondo, nenzara, ʋuye nehosha.
Ipapo ndakati: Haiwa, Jehova Mŋari, tarirai, ʋaprofita ʋanoti kwaʋari: Hamuŋgaʋoni munondo, kana kunzwa nzara; asi ndicakupai rugare rwaɀokwaɗi panɀimbo ino.

Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Ʋaprofita ʋanoprofita nhema muzita raŋgu; ini handina‐kuʋatuma, ini handina‐kuʋaraira, kana kutaura naʋo; ʋanokuprofiterai ɀinonzi ɀakaʋonekwa asi dziri nhema, neɀakaʋukwa, neɀisinamaturo, nokunyeŋgera kwemŋoyo yaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paʋaprofita ʋanoprofita muzita raŋgu, ndisina‐kuʋatuma haŋgu, ʋaciti: Munondo nenzara haɀiŋgaʋi munyika ino;

Naʋanhu ʋaʋanoprofitera ʋacarashwa munzira dzomuJerusarema nemhaka yenzara nomunondo; ʋacashaiwa unoʋaʋiga iʋo, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo, naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, naʋanasikana ʋaʋo; nokuti ndicaɗurura ɀakaipa ɀaʋo pamsoro paʋo.
Ɀino iwe ciʋaʋudza shoko iri,
Kana ndicifamba musaŋgo, tarirai, ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo! Kana ndicipinda muguta, tarirai, ʋanorwara nenzara! nokuti ʋaprofita naʋaprista ʋose ʋanopota nenyika, ʋasiŋgaziʋi cinhu.
Maramba Juda cose here? Mŋeya wenyu wasema Zioni here? Matiroʋereiko, tikashaiwa kuporeswa? Takatarira rugare, asi hakunecakanaka cakaʋuya, neŋguʋa yokuporeswa, asi tarirai, kuvunduswa ɓedzi!
Haiwa Jehova, tinoziʋa ɀakaipa ɀeɗu, nokutadza kwamadziɓaɓa eɗu; nokuti takakutadzirai.
Regai kutisema nokuɗa kwezita renyu; regai kushoʋora cigaro cokukudzwa kwenyu; raŋgarirai henyu, musaputsa suŋgano yenyu nesu.
Ʋaripo here pakati paʋamŋari ʋasinamaturo ʋaʋahedeni ʋaŋganisa mvura? Ƌeŋga riŋganisa mvura here? Hamuzimi here, imi Jehova Mŋari weɗu? Naiɀoɀo ticakumirirai, nokuti ndimi makaita ɀinhu iɀi ɀose.
Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Kunyaŋge Mosesi naSamueri ʋamire pamberi paŋgu, mŋoyo waŋgu hauŋgaʋi nehanya naʋanhu aʋa; uʋadziŋge pamberi paŋgu, ʋaende.

Ɀino kana ʋakati kwauri: Ticaendepiko? Uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋakafanirwa norufu ŋgaʋaende kurufu, ʋakafanirwa nomunondo, kumunondo, ʋakafanirwa nenzara, kunzara, naʋakafanirwa nokutapxa, kukutapxa.
Ndicaʋatumira njodzi dzamarudzi manna — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — munondo kuʋaʋuraya, nembga kuʋakwekweredza, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀenyika kuʋadya nokuʋaparadza.
Ndicaʋadzuŋgaidza pakati poʋushe bgenyika, nemhaka yaManase, mŋanakomana waHezekia, mambo waJuda, pamsoro peɀaakaita paJerusarema.
Nokuti ndiani ucakunzwira tsitsi, iwe Jerusarema? Ndiani ucakucema? Ndianiko ucatsauka kuzobvunza mufaro wako?
Ɀanzi naJehova: Wakandiramba, wakadzokera shure; saka ndakatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kurwa newe, ndikakuparadza; ndaneta nokuɀiɗemba.
Ndakaʋarudza necokurudza pamasuʋo enyika; ndakaʋatorera ʋana ʋaʋo, ndakaparadza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu;
Cirikadzi dzaʋo dzandiwandira kupfuʋura jeca reguŋgwa; ndakaʋuyisira mai namajaya muparadzi paŋguʋa yamasikati; ndakawisira

Iye, wakaɓereka ʋanomŋe, wapera simba, waɓuɗisa mŋeya wake; zuʋa rake rakaʋira aciri masikati; wakanyadziswa nokukaŋganiswa; ʋakasara ʋaʋo ndicaʋaʋurayisa nomunondo pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndinenhamo mai ʋaŋgu, ɀamakandiɓereka ndiʋe munhu wenharo nomunhu wegakaʋa panyika yose! Handina‐kupa cikwerete, naʋanhu haʋana‐kutora cikwerete kwandiri;
Jehova akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicakusimbisira ɀakanaka; ɀirokwaɀo, ndicanyeŋgeteresa muʋeŋgi wako kwauri neŋguʋa yeɀakaipa, ʋuye neŋguʋa yokutambudzika.
Ko ɗare riŋgavuniwa here, iro ɗare rinobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, kana ndarira here?
Nhumbi dzako nefuma yako ndicaɀiisa kukutapxa, ɀisiŋgateŋgwi, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀako ɀose pamiganho yako yose.
Ndica
Haiwa Jehova, imi munoziʋa; ndiraŋgarirei, mundishanyire, munditsiʋire ʋatambudzi ʋaŋgu; musandibvisa pakuitira kwenyu
Mashoko enyu akawanikwa, ndikaadya; mashoko enyu akaʋa mufaro waŋgu nokufadzwa kwomŋoyo waŋgu; nokuti ndakatumidzwa nezita renyu, imi Jehova, Mŋari wehondo.
Handina‐kugara pakati peʋuŋgano yaʋanoseka, kana kufara
Kurwadziwa kwaŋgu kunorambireiko kuri’po nokusiŋgaperi, ʋaŋga raŋgu rinorambirei kurapxa, risiŋgaɗi kupora? Mucaʋa kwandiri ɀirokwaɀo so
Saka ɀanzi naJehova: Kana ukadzoka, ndicakudzosa, kuti umire pamberi paŋgu; kana ukatsaura ɀakanaka uciɀibvisa paneɀakaipa, ucaʋa somuromo waŋgu; iʋo ʋacadzokera kwauri, asi iwe usadzokera kwaʋari.
Ndicakuita kunaʋanhu aʋa ruȿiŋgo rwendarira rwakasimbiswa; ʋacarwa newe asi haʋaŋgakukundi, nokuti ini ndinewe ndikuponese nokukurwira.
Ndicakurwira pamaʋoko aʋakaipa, nokukudzikinura pamaʋoko aʋanotyisa.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri ɀe, riciti:
Rega kuwana mukadzi kana kuʋa naʋanakomana kana ʋanasikana panɀimbo ino.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paʋanakomana napamsoro paʋanasikana ʋanoɓerekerwa panɀimbo ino, napamsoro pamadzimai aʋo akaʋaɓereka, napamsoro pamadziɓaɓa aʋo akaʋaɓereka panyika ino:
Ʋacafa norufu rwakaipa kwaɀo; haʋaŋgacemŋi kana kuʋigwa; ʋacaʋa somupfudze panyika; ʋacapedzwa nomunondo ʋuye nenzara; ɀitunhu ɀaʋo ɀicaʋa ɀokudya ɀeshiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀenyika.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Usapinda muimba yokucema, usaʋawuŋgudzira kana kuʋacema; nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ndabvisa rugare rwaŋgu paʋanhu aʋa, ibgo ʋunyoro
Ʋakuru naʋaɗuku ʋose ʋacafa munyika ino; haʋaŋgaʋigwi, naʋanhu haʋaŋgaʋacemi, kana kuɀiceka nokuɀiʋeʋura nokuɗa kwaʋo;
ʋanhu haʋaŋgaʋameɗuriri
Newe usapinda muimba yomutambo, kuti ugare naʋo, ucidya nokunwa.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicagumisa panɀimbo ino, muciɀiʋona pamazuʋa enyu, inzwi rokuseka, nenzwi romufaro, nenzwi recikomba nenzwi romŋeŋga.
Ɀino kana uciziʋisa ʋanhu aʋa mashoko awa ose, iʋo ʋacati kwauri: Jehova wakareʋereiko ɀakaipa iɀi ɀikuru ɀose pamsoro peɗu? Kutadza kweɗu ndokwei? Ɀiʋi ɀeɗu ndeɀei, ɀatakaitira Jehova Mŋari weɗu?
Ipapo iwe uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Nokuti madziɓaɓa enyu akandisiya, ʋakateʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, nokuʋashumira nokuʋanamata, ʋakandisiya ini, ʋakasaceŋgeta murairo waŋgu;
ɀino imi makaita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura madziɓaɓa enyu; nokuti tarirai, munofamba mumŋe nomumŋe noʋukukutu bgomŋoyo wake wakaipa, muciramba kunditerera.
Saka ndicakudziŋgai panyika ino
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya, aʋacasizoti: NaJehova mupenyu, wakabvisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri panyika yeEgipita;
asi: NaJehova mupenyu, wakabvisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri kunyika yokumsoro, nokunyika dzose dzaakaŋga aʋadziŋgira kwadziri. Ndicaʋadzosera ɀe kunyika yaʋo yandakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicandoɗana ʋaɓati ʋazhinji ʋehoʋe, iʋo ʋacaʋaɓata sehoʋe; pashure ndicandoɗana ʋavimi ʋazhinji, iʋo ʋacaʋavima pamakomo ose neɀikomo ɀose, napamapako ose amatombo.
Nokuti meso aŋgu anoʋona nzira dzaʋo dzose, haɀina‐kuʋanzika pamberi paŋgu, ɀakaipa ɀaʋo haɀina‐kuʋanziwa pameso aŋgu.
Ndicataŋga kuʋatsiʋira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo neɀiʋi ɀaʋo kaʋiri, nokuti ʋakaȿiɓisa nyika yaŋgu neɀitunha ɀeɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀinosemesa, nokuzadza nhaka yaŋgu neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo.

Imi Jehova, simba raŋgu, nenhare yaŋgu, noʋutiziro bgaŋgu pazuʋa rokutambudzika, marudzi acaʋuya kwamuri acibva kumigumo yenyika, aciti: Madziɓaɓa eɗu akagara nhaka yenhema dzoga, ɀinhu ɀisinamaturo, neɀinhu ɀisiŋgaɓatsiri.
Ko munhu uŋgaɀiitira ʋamŋari ʋasati ʋari ʋamŋari here?
Naiɀoɀo, tarirai, ndicaʋaziʋisa, ndicaʋaziʋisa paŋguʋa ino cete ruʋoko rwaŋgu nesimba raŋgu; ʋacaziʋa kuti zita raŋgu ndiJehova.
Ɀiʋi ɀaJuda ɀakanyorwa nepeni yamatare, nomuromo wedaimani; ɀakatemŋa pamahwendefa emŋoyo yaʋo, napanyaŋga dzamaartari enyu;
ŋguʋa dzose kana ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaciraŋgarira maartari aʋo nemiti yaʋo yakatsaurwa pamiti mitema paɀikomo ɀakakwirira.
Iwe gomo raŋgu riri kusaŋgo, nhumbi dzako nefuma yako yose ndicaɀitapisa, nenɀimbo dzako dzakakwirira, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀiri mumiganho yenyu yose.
Nemi, iyemi mumene, mucarega nhaka yenyu yandakakupai; ndicakuitai ʋaranda ʋaʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu munyika yamusiŋgaziʋi, nokuti makaɓatidza mŋoto pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu, ucapfuta nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ŋgaatukwe iye munhu unoʋimba nomumŋe munhu, unoita nyama
Nokuti ucafanana negwenzi murenje, haaŋgaʋoni kana ɀakanaka ɀiciȿika, asi ucagara panɀimbo dzakawoma kwaɀo murenje, munyika yeɓare isiŋgagarwi naʋanhu.
Wakaropafadzwa iye munhu unoʋimba naJehova, wakaita Jehova ciʋimbo

Nokuti ucaʋa somuti wakasimŋa pamvura, unotuma midzi yawo kurwizi, usiŋgatyi kana kupisa kuciȿika, asi mashizha awo acaʋa matema; hauŋgaraŋgariri pagore rokusanaya kwemvura, kana kurega kuɓereka ɀiɓereko.
Mŋoyo unonyeŋgera kupfuʋura ɀinhu ɀose, wakaʋora cose, ndiani uŋgauziʋa?
Ini Jehova, ndinonɀera mŋoyo, ndinoidza itȿo, kuti ndipe mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakafanira mugarire wake, ʋuye ɀakafanira ɀiɓereko ɀamaɓasa ake.
Segwari rinogarira
Nɀimbo yeimba yeɗu tȿene cigaro coʋushe cakaiȿo‐naka, cakaŋga cakakwirira kubva pakutaŋga.
Imi Jehova, tariro yaIsraeri, ʋose ʋanokurashai ʋacanyadziswa; ʋanotsauka kwandiri ʋacanyorwa muvu, nokuti ʋakarasha Jehova, iro tsime remvura mhenyu.
Ndiporesei Jehova, ipapo ndicaponeswa; ndiponesei, ipapo ndicaponeswa; nokuti ndimi wandinorumbidza.
Tarirai, ʋanoti kwandiri: Shoko raJehova riripiko? Ŋgariʋuye ɀino.
Kana ndirini, handina‐kukurumidza kusakuteʋerai somufudzi, handina‐kushuʋa zuʋa renjodzi; imi munoziʋa; ɀakaɓuɗa mumuromo maŋgu ɀakaŋga ɀiri pamberi penyu.
Musaʋa kwandiri cinhu cinotyisa; imi muri ʋutiziro bgaŋgu nezuʋa reɀakaipa.
Ʋanonditambudza ŋgaʋanyadiswe, asi ini ndirege kunyadziswa; ŋgaʋavunduswe iʋo, asi ini ndirege kuvunduswa; ʋuyisai kwaʋari zuʋa reɀakaipa, muʋaparadze nokuparadza kwakapamhidzirwa.
Jehova wakati kwandiri: Enda undomira musuʋo raʋana ʋaʋanhu, panopinda madzimambo aJuda, napaʋanoɓuɗa, napamasuʋo ose eJerusarema;
uti kwaʋari: Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi madzimambo aJuda, naʋaJuda ʋose, naʋose ʋagere Jerusarema, ʋanopinda napamasuʋo awa:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀicenjerei, murege kutakura mutoro nezuʋa resaɓata, kana kupinda nawo napamasuʋo eJerusarema;
musaɓuɗa makatakura mutoro padzimba dzenyu nezuʋa resaɓata, kana kuɓate‐ɓasa ripi neripi; asi mutsaure zuʋa resaɓata, seɀandakaraira madziɓaɓa enyu.
Asi haʋana‐kuterera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo; asi ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo kuti ʋarege kunzwa, ʋarege kudzidziswa.
Ɀino ɀanzi naJehova: Kana mukanatsa kunditerera, mukasapinda nomutoro napamasuʋo eguta rino nezuʋa resaɓata, asi mucitsaura zuʋa resaɓata, musiŋgaɓati ɓasa ripi neripi naro;

ipapo pacapinda napamasuʋo eguta rino madzimambo namacinda anogara pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, anofamba neŋgoro namabiza, iwo, namacinda awo, naʋarume ʋaJuda, naʋagere Jerusarema; guta rino ricaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi.

Ʋacabva kumaguta aJuda, napanɀimbo dzakapoteredza Jerusarema, napanyika yaBenjamini, napanyika yamapani, napanyika yamakomo, nokurutiʋi rwezasi, ʋaciʋuya neɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, neɀiɓayiro, neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, neɀinonhuwira, ʋaciʋuya neɀokuʋoŋga naɀo kuimba yaJehova.

Asi kana mukaramba kunditerera, mukaramba kutsaura zuʋa resaɓata, mucitakura mutoro mucipinda nawo napamasuʋo eJerusarema nezuʋa resaɓata, ipapo ndicaɓatidza mŋoto pamasuʋo aro, ucapedza dzimba dzamambo dzeJerusarema, usiŋgazodzimŋi.
Shoko rakaʋuya kunaJeremia, ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Simuka, uɓurukire kuimba yomuʋumbi wehari, ipapo ndicakuziʋisa mashoko aŋgu.
Ɀino ndakaɓurukira kuimba yomuʋumbi wehari, ndikamuwana aciɓate‐ɓasa pamakuyo.
Ɀino mudziyo waakaŋga aciita nevu wakati washatiswa mumaʋoko omuʋumbi, akaʋumba ɀe naro mumŋe mudziyo, seɀaakafuŋga iye muʋumbi wehari.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri riciti:

Ɀanzi naJehova: Nhai, imi imba yaIsraeri, handiŋgagoni kuita nemi seɀinoita muʋumbi uyu wehari here? Tarirai, ivu seɀarakaita muruʋoko rwomuʋumbi wehari, ndiɀo ɀamakaita muruʋoko rwaŋgu, imi imba yaIsraeri.
Neŋguʋa yandicataura pamsoro porudzi rwaʋanhu, napamsoro poʋushe, kuti ndicarudzura, nokuruputsa, nokuruparadza;
kana rudzi urwo, rwandakataura
Ʋuye neŋguʋa yandicataura pamsoro porudzi rwaʋanhu, napamsoro poʋushe, kuti ndicaruʋaka nokurusima;
kana ʋakaita ɀinhu ɀakaipa pamberi paŋgu, ʋakasaterera inzwi raŋgu, ipapo ndicaɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakanaka ɀandakaŋga ndiciti ndicaʋaitira.

Naiɀoɀo ɀino, taura naʋanhu ʋaJuda naʋagere Jerusarema, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndinokufuŋgirai ɀakaipa, ndinoraŋgana mano akaipa pamsoro penyu; ɀino dzokai mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa, mugadzire nzira dzenyu namaɓasa enyu.
Asi iʋo ʋanoti: Haɀinamaturo, nokuti ticafamba seɀatinofuŋga, mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu ucaita noʋukukutu bgomŋoyo wake wakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀino bvunzai pakati pamarudzi, kuti ndiani wakambonzwa ɀakaɗai; mhandara yaIsraeri yakaita cinhu cakaipa kwaɀo.
Ko cando cakacena capaRebanoni ciŋgashaikwa paɗombo rokusaŋgo here? Mvura inotonhora, inoyerera icibva kure, iŋgapxa here?
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakandikaŋganwa, ʋakapisira
kuti ʋaite nyika yaʋo cishamiso necinoridzirwa murudzi nokusiŋgaperi; mumŋe nomumŋe unopfuʋura’po ucashamiswa, nokudzuŋgudza musoro wake.
Ndicaʋaparadzira pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo seɀinoita mhepo inobva kumabvazuʋa; ndicaʋafuratira, handiŋgaʋatariri neciso, nezuʋa rokutambudzika kwaʋo.

Ipapo ʋakati: Ʋuyai, tiraŋgane mano akaipa pamsoro paJeremia; nokuti murairo hauŋgashaikwi kumuprista, kana kurairira kunowakacenjera, kana shoko kumuprofita. Ʋuyai, timuroʋe norurimi, tirege kuʋa nehanya nerimŋe ramashoko ake.
Jehova, nditererei, munzwe inzwi raʋanokakaʋara neni.
Ɀakaipa ɀiŋgatsibga neɀakanaka here? Nokuti ʋakacerera mŋeya waŋgu gomba. Raŋgarirai kumira kwaŋgu pamberi penyu kuti ndiʋareʋerere ɀakanaka, kuti nditsause kutsamŋa kwenyu kwaʋari.
Saka sundirai ʋana ʋaʋo panzara, muʋaregere pasimba romunondo; ʋakadzi ʋaʋo ŋgaʋatorerwe ʋana ʋaʋo, ʋaʋe cirikadzi; ʋarume ʋaʋo ŋgaʋaʋurawe norufu, namajaya aʋo aʋurawe nomunondo pakurwa.
Kucema ŋgakunzwike padzimba dzaʋo, kana muciʋaʋuyisira kamŋe‐kamŋe ɓoka raʋarwi; nokuti ʋakacera gomba, kuti ʋandiɓate; ʋakaʋanzira tsoka dzaŋgu misuŋgo.
Asi imi Jehova munoziʋa mano aʋo ose aʋakaɗa kundiʋuraya nawo; musaʋakaŋganwira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo, kana kudzima ɀiʋi ɀaʋo pamberi penyu; asi ŋgaʋawisirwe pasi pamberi penyu; muʋaitire
Ɀanzi naJehova: Enda undoteŋga ciroŋgo cakaʋumbga nomuʋumbi wehari, unaʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu naʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋaʋaprista;
ipapo uende kumupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, uri’po paʋanopinda pasuʋo reɀaeŋga ɀehari, uparidzire’po mashoko andicakuʋudza;

uti: Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi madzimambo aJuda naʋagere Jerusarema: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro penɀimbo ino, nzeʋe dzomumŋe nomumŋe unoɀinzwa dzicawuŋga.
Nokuti ʋakandisiya, ʋakashandura nɀimbo ino, ʋakapisira’po ɀinonhuwira kunaʋamŋe ʋamŋari ʋaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi, iʋo namadziɓaɓa aʋo namadzimambo aJuda, ʋakazadza nɀimbo ino neropa raʋasinemhoȿa,
ʋakaʋaka nɀimbo dzakakwirira dzaBaari, kuti ʋapisire Baari ʋanakomana ʋaʋo pamŋoto ɀiʋe ɀipiriso ɀinomupisirwa; iɀo, ɀandisina‐kuʋaraira, kana kuɀitaura, ɀandisina‐kufuŋga mumŋoyo maŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — nɀimbo ino haicazonzi Tofeti, kana Mupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, asi Mupata woKuʋurawa.

Ndicakonesa mano aJuda naʋeJerusarema panɀimbo ino; ndicaʋawisa nomunondo pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ʋuye namaʋoko aʋanotȿaka kuʋaʋuraya; ɀitunha ɀaʋo ndicaɀipa shiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀikara ɀenyika, ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀaɀo.
Guta rino ndicariita cishamiso ne
Ndicaʋadyisa nyama yaʋanakomana ʋaʋo nenyama yaʋanasikana ʋaʋo; mumŋe nomumŋe ucadya nyama yeshamŋari yake pakukombga
Ɀino unofanira kuputsa ciroŋgo pamberi paʋarume ʋakaenda newe,
ugoti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Saiɀoɀo ndicaputsa ʋanhu aʋa neguta rino, seɀinoputswa mudziyo womuʋumbi wehari, usiŋgabviri kuzogadzirwa ɀe; ɀino ʋacaʋiga
Ndiɀo ɀandicaitira nɀimbo ino naʋagere’po, ndiite guta rino seTofeti — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Dzimba dzeJerusarema, nedzimba dzamadzimambo aJuda, dzakaȿiɓiswa, dzicaita senɀimbo yeTofeti, idzo dzimba dzose dzaʋakapisira pamateŋga adzo ɀinonhuwira kuhondo dzokuɗeŋga, nokuɗururira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa.
Ipapo Jeremia wakabva Tofeti, kwaakaŋga atumŋa naJehova kundoprofita; akandomira muruʋazhe rweimba yaJehova, akati kuʋanhu ʋose:

Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro peguta rino napamsoro pemisha yaro yose, ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandakataura pamsoro paro; nokuti ʋakawomesa mitsipa yaʋo, kuti ʋarege kunzwa mashoko aŋgu.
Ɀino Pashuri, mŋanakomana womuprista Imeri, mutariri mukuru mumba maJehova, wakanzwa Jeremia aciprofita ɀinhu iɀi.
Ipapo Pashuri wakaroʋa muprofita Jeremia, akamusuŋga mumatanda aiʋa pasuʋo rokumsoro raBenjamini, raiʋa mumba maJehova.
Ɀino fume maŋgwanani Pashuri akasunuŋgura Jeremia pamatanda. Ipapo Jeremia akati kwaari: Jehova haanakukutumidza zita rinonzi Pashuri, asi rinonzi Magori‐misabibi.

Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, ndinokuita cinhu cinotyisa, cicakutyisa iwe umene neshamŋari dzako dzose; ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo waʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, meso ako acaɀiʋona; ndicaisa Juda rose mumaʋoko amambo weBabironi, iye ucaʋatapira Babironi, nokuʋaʋuraya nomunondo.

Ʋuye ɀe, ndicaisa fuma yose yeguta rino, neɀose ɀaʋakawana, neɀose ɀaʋo ɀinokosha, ɀirokwaɀo, nefuma yose yamadzimambo aJuda, ndicaɀiisa mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; iʋo ʋacaʋapamba, nokuʋatapa, nokuenda naʋo Babironi.
Newe Pashuri, naʋose ʋagere mumba mako, mucatapxa; iwe ucandoȿika Babironi, ucandofira’po, nokuʋigwa’po, iwe neshamŋari dzako dzose, dzawaiprofitera nhema.
Imi Jehova makandigombedzera, ndikagombedzerwa; imi munesimba kupfuʋureni, mukakunda; ndakaitwa cinhu cinosekwa zuʋa rose, mumŋe nomumŋe unondiseka.
Nokuti ndinoti kana ndotaura, ndoɗanidzira; ndinoɗanidzira, ndiciti: Ɀinoitwa nesimba nokuparadza! nokuti shoko raJehova rakaitwa kwandiri cinhu cinoshoʋorwa, necinhu cinosekwa zuʋa rose.
Kana ndiciti: Handicamuraŋgariri, kana kutaura nezita rake, ipapo mumŋoyo maŋgu maʋa somŋoto unopfuta, wakapfigirwa mumafupa aŋgu; ndaneta nokutsuŋgirira, handicagoni.

Nokuti ndakanzwa makuhwa aʋazhinji, ɀinotyisa pamatiʋi ose. Pomerai, isu tigomupomera, ndiɀo ɀinotaura shamŋari dzaŋgu dzose dzinoɗikanwa neni, ʋanotarira kuparadzwa kwaŋgu; ɀimŋe ucanyeŋgerwa, tikamukunda, tikaɀitsiʋira kwaari.
Asi Jehova uneni semhare inotyisa; saka ʋamanikidzi ʋaŋgu ʋacagumburwa, haʋaŋgakundi; ʋacanyadziswa kwaɀo, nokuti haʋana‐kuita noʋucenjeri, nokunyadzwa kusiŋgaperi, kusiŋgazokaŋganikwi.
Asi imi Jehova wehondo, imi, munoidza ʋakarurama, munoʋona itȿo nomŋoyo, ŋgandiʋone kutsiʋa kwenyu kwaʋari; nokuti ndakakuzarurirai imi mhaka yaŋgu.
Imbirai Jehova, rumbidzai Jehova; nokuti wakarwira mŋeya wounoshaiwa pamaʋoko aʋaiti ʋeɀakaipa.
Zuʋa randaɓerekwa naro ŋgaritukwe; zuʋa randakaɓerekwa namai ʋaŋgu ŋgarirege kuropafadzwa.
Munhu ŋgaatukwe wakaziʋisa ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu shoko rokuti: Maɓerekerwa mŋanakomana, akaʋafadza kwaɀo.
Munhu uyo ŋgaaʋe samaguta akaparadzwa naJehova, akasaɀiɗemba; ŋgaanwe kucema maŋgwanani nemhere paŋguʋa yamasikati;
ɀaakarega kundiʋuraya ndiciri muciɀaro; saiɀoɀo mai ʋaŋgu ʋaŋgaɗai ʋaiʋa bgiro bgaŋgu, ʋairamba ʋanemimba.
Ndakaɓuɗireiko paciɀaro, kuti ndiʋone kutambudzika nokucema, kuti mazuʋa aŋgu apere nokunyadziswa?
Shoko, rakaʋuya kunaJeremia, ricibva kunaJehova, paŋguʋa yakatuma mambo Zedekia kwaari Pashuri mŋanakomana waMarkija, naZefania mŋanakomana waMaaseya muprista, aciti:
ɗotibvunzirai ʋo kunaJehova, nokuti Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi worwa nesu; ɀimŋe Jehova uŋgatiitira
Ipapo Jeremia akati kwaʋari: Itiyi kunaZedekia:

Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicadzosa nhumbi dzokurwa dziri mumaʋoko enyu, dzamunorwa nadzo namambo weBabironi naʋaKardea ʋanokukombai kunze kwamaȿiŋgo; ndicadziʋuŋganidzira mukati meguta rino.
Ini ndimene ndicarwa nemi necanza cakatambanudzwa noruʋoko runesimba, nokutsamŋa nehasha, neshuŋgu kwadzo.
Ndicaroʋa ʋagere muguta rino, ʋanhu neɀipfuwo ɀose; ɀicafa nehosha yakaipa.
Pashure — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaisa Zedekia mambo waJuda, naʋaranda ʋake naʋanhu
Iwe uti kuʋanhu aʋa: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndinoisa pamberi penyu nzira yoʋupenyu nenzira yorufu.
Aninani unorambira muguta rino ucaʋurawa nomunondo nenzara nehosha; asi aninani unoɓuɗa akaenda kuʋaKardea ʋanokukombai, iye ucararama, ʋupenyu bgake ʋucaʋa kwaari cinhu caakapamba.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ndakarinzira guta rino ciso caŋgu kuti ndiriitire ɀakaipa, ndirege kuriitira ɀakanaka; ricaiswa mumaʋoko amambo weBabironi, iye ucaripisa nomŋoto.
Ɀino kana iri imba yamambo waJuda, inzwai shoko raJehova:

Nhai imba yaDavidi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — toŋgai ɀakarurama maŋgwanani, murwire wakaɓirwa muruʋoko rwounomumanikidza, kuti kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kurege kuɓuɗa somŋoto, kucipfuta kusina‐uŋgakudzima, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀamaɓasa enyu.
Tarira, ndinemhoȿa newe, iwe ugere mumupata, paɗombo romuɓani — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; imi, munoti: Ndiani uŋgaɓuruka kuzorwa nesu? Ndiani ucapinda mudzimba dzeɗu?
Ndicakuroʋai ɀakaenzana neɀiɓereko ɀamaɓasa enyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicaɓatidza mŋoto muɗondo raro, ucapedza ɀose ɀakaripoteredza.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ƃurukira kumba kwamambo waJuda, undotaura’po shoko iri,
uti: Inzwa shoko raJehova, iwe mambo waJuda, ugere pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, iwe naʋaranda ʋako, naʋanhu ʋako ʋanopinda napamasuʋo awa.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Toŋgai ɀakarurama neɀakatendeka, murwire wakaɓirwa muruʋoko rwounomumanikidza; mutorwa, nenherera, necirikadzi, regai kuʋaitira ɀisakarurama, regai kuʋaitira nesimba; ʋuye musateʋura ropa risinemhoȿa panɀimbo ino.
Nokuti kana muciita cinhu ici nomŋoyo wose, pamasuʋo eimba iyi pacapinda madzimambo, acagara pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, acifamba neŋgoro nokutaȿa mabiza, iye naʋaranda ʋake naʋanhu ʋake.
Asi kana mukaramba kunzwa mashoko awa, ndinopika neni ndimene, kuti imba ino icaʋa ɗoŋgo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro peimba yamambo waJuda: Uri Gireadi kwandiri, nomusoro weRebanoni;
Ndicakugadzirira ʋaparadzi, mumŋe nomumŋe anenhumbi dzake dzokurwa; ʋacatema misidari yenyu inoɗikanwa, ʋaciikandira mumŋoto.
Marudzi mazhinji aʋanhu acapfuʋura napaguta rino, mumŋe nomumŋe ucati kunowokwake: Jehova wakaitireiko guta rino guru ɀakaɗaro?
Ipapo ʋacapindura, ʋaciti: Nokuti ʋakasiya suŋgano yaJehova, Mŋari waʋo, ʋakanamata ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋaciʋashumira.
Musacema wakafa, kana kumuwuŋgudzira; asi muceme kwaɀo iye unoenda, nokuti haaŋgadzoki ɀe, kana kuʋona ɀe nyika yake yaakaɓerekerwa.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paSharumi, mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, wakaɓata ʋushe panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake Josia, akaɓuɗa panɀimbo ino: Iye haaŋgadzokeri’po ɀe;
asi kwaakatapirwa, ndiko kwaacandofira’ko; haaŋgazoʋoni ɀe nyika ino.
Unenhamo iye unoʋaka imba yake nokusarurama, namakamuri ake okumsoro aciita ɀisakarurama; unoɓatisa wokwake asiŋgamupi cinhu, asiŋgamupi muɓairo wokuɓata kwake;
iye, unoti: Ndicaɀiʋakira imba huru namakamuri okumsoro akafara, aciɀiitira mawindi; ɀino yoitirwa ɗeŋga romusidari, icizodzwa muti mutȿuku.
Ko uŋgaɓata ʋushe, ɀaunotȿaka kupfuʋura ʋamŋe nemisidari here? Ko ɓaɓa ʋako haʋana‐kudya nokunwa, ʋaciita ɀakarurama neɀakatendeka here? Ipapo ʋakagara nomufaro.
Ʋaitamba mhaka dzaʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa; ipapo ʋaiʋa nomufaro. Ko iɀoɀi hakuzi kundiziʋa here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Asi meso ako nomŋoyo wako haɀiraŋgariri ɀimŋe, asi kuciʋa kwako nokuteʋura ropa risinemhoȿa, nokumanikidza, nokuita nesimba; kuti uɀiite.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda: Haʋaŋgamucemi,
Ucaʋigwa sokuʋigwa kwemboŋgoro, ucakweʋerwa nokurashwa kunze kwamasuʋo eJerusarema.
Kwirai Rebanoni, muɗanidzire; ɗanidzirai nenzwi renyu paBashani; ɗanidzirai muri paAbarimi; nokuti ʋaɗikani ʋenyu ʋose ʋakaparadzwa.
Ndakataura newe pakufara kwako; asi iwe wakati: Handiɗi kunzwa. Ndiwo wakaŋga uri mutoʋo wako kubvira paʋuɗuku bgako, kuti hauna‐kuterera inzwi raŋgu.
Mhepo icaparadza ʋafudzi ʋako ʋose, naʋaɗikani ʋako ʋacatapxa; ɀirokwaɀo neŋguʋa iyo ucanyadziswa nokukaŋganiswa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀako ɀose.
Haiwa, iwe, ugere Rebanoni, unoʋaka ɗendere rako mumisidari, ucanzwisa ʋurombo kwaɀo sei kana ucizowirwa nokurwadziwa, sokurwadziwa kwomukadzi unosurumuka!
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kunyaŋge Konia, mŋanakomana waJehoiakimi, mambo waJuda, aiʋa cindori cokutsikisa naco paruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndaikubvisa ’po.
Ndicakuisa muruʋoko rwaʋanotȿaka kukuʋuraya, nomuruʋoko rwaiʋo ʋaunotya, muruʋoko rwaNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, nomumaʋoko aʋaKardea.
Iwe namai ʋako ʋakakuɓereka ndicakudziŋgirai kuneimŋe nyika kwamusina‐kuɓerekerwa; ipapo mucandofira’po.
Asi kunyika kunopaŋga mŋoyo yaʋo kudzokera, haʋaŋgadzokeri’ko.
Ko munhu uyu Konia mudziyo wakaputsika unoɀidzwa here? Iye mudziyo usiŋgafadzi munhu here? Ʋakadziŋgirweiko, iye naʋana ʋake, ʋakadziŋgirwa kunyika yaʋasiŋgaziʋi?
Iwe nyika, nyika, nyika, inzwa inzwi raJehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nyora kuti munhu uyu haanaʋana, munhu usiŋgazofari pamazuʋa ake; nokuti hakucinomurume pakati paʋana ʋake ucaʋa nomufaro, ucagara pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, aciɓata ʋushe bgaJuda.
Ʋanenhamo ʋafudzi ʋanoparadza nokuparadzira makwai amafuro aŋgu! ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, pamsoro paʋafudzi ʋanofudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu: Makaparadzira makwai aŋgu, mukaadziŋga, mukasaatarira; tarirai, ndicakuroʋai nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀamaɓasa enyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋakasara ʋamakwai aŋgu kunyika dzose kwandakaŋga ndaadziŋgira, ndicaadzosera kumafuro awo; acaɓerekana nokuwanda.
Ndicaagadzira ʋafudzi ʋanoafudza; haaŋgazotyi kana kuvunduswa, hakuna‐nerimŋe riŋgashaikwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Tarirai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — mazuʋa acaʋuya, andicamutsira Davidi Ƃukira rakarurama, iye ucaɓata ʋushe ari mambo, ucaita noʋucenjeri acitoŋga nokururama aciita ɀakarurama panyika.
Pamazuʋa ake Juda ʋacaponeswa, naIsraeri ʋacagara ʋakaceŋgetwa; zita rake raacatumidzwa ndireri: Jehova ndiye kururama kweɗu.
Naiɀoɀo, tarirai, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — mazuʋa anoʋuya, aʋasiŋgazoti: NaJehova mupenyu, wakaɓuɗisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri munyika yeEgipita;
asi: NaJehova mupenyu, wakaɓuɗisa rudzi rweimba yaIsraeri munyika yokumsoro, aciʋaperekedza, nomunyika dzose kwandakaŋga ndaʋadziŋgira. Iʋo ʋacagara munyika yaʋo.
Kana ʋari ʋaprofita, mŋoyo waŋgu wakaputsika mukati maŋgu; mafupa aŋgu ose anozunuŋguka, ndakaita somunhu wakaɓatwa, somunhu wakundwa newaini, nokuɗa kwaJehova, ʋuye nokuɗa kwamashoko ake matȿene.
Nokuti nyika izere nemhombge; nokuti nyika inocema nemhaka yokutuka; mafuro erenje akawoma; ɀaʋanoʋaʋarira ɀakaipa, simba raʋo harizakarurama.
Nokuti ʋaprofita naʋaprista ʋose ʋanomhura
Naiɀoɀo nzira yaʋo icaʋa kwaʋari senɀimbo dzinotedza murima; ʋacatinhwa, ndokuwira’mo; nokuti ndicaʋaʋuyisira ɀakaipa pagore rokurobga kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndakaʋona ʋupenzi kuʋaprofita ʋeSamaria; ʋakaprofita naBaari, ʋakarashisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu Israeri.

Kuʋaprofita ʋeJerusarema ndakaʋona ʋo cinhu cinonyaŋgadza: Ʋanoita ʋupombge, nokufamba nenhema; ʋanosimbisa maʋoko aʋanoita ɀakaipa, naiɀoɀo hakuna‐nomumŋe unodzoka paɀakaipa ɀake; ʋose ʋaʋa kwandiri seSodoma, naʋagere’po seGomora.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo pamsoro paʋaprofita: Tarirai, ndicaʋadyisa gaʋakaʋa, ndicaʋanwisa mvura yenduru; nokuti kumhura
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Regai kuterera mashoko aʋaprofita ʋanokuprofiterai; ʋanokudzidzisai ɀisinamaturo, ʋanotaura ɀaʋakaʋona pamŋoyo yaʋo, ɀisati ɀiri iɀo ɀinoɓuɗa mumuromo waJehova
Ʋanoramba ʋaciti kunaʋanondiɀidza: Jehova wakati: Mucaʋa norugare; ʋuye kunomumŋe nomumŋe unofamba noʋukukutu bgomŋoyo wake, ʋanoti: Hakunecakaipa ciŋgakuwira.
Nokuti ndiani wakamira paraŋgano yaJehova, akaʋona nokunzwa shoko rake? Ndiani wakaterera akanzwa shoko rake?
Tarirai, ɗutu remhepo raJehova,
Kutsamŋa kwaJehova hakuŋgadzoki, kuȿikira aɀiita, apedza ndaŋgariro dzomŋoyo wake; pamazuʋa okupedzisira mucaɀinzwisisa kwaɀo.
Ini handina‐kutuma ʋaprofita aʋa, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakamhanya; ini handina‐kutaura naʋo, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakaprofita.
Asi ɗai ʋakaŋga ʋamira paraŋgano yaŋgu, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋakanzwisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu mashoko aŋgu, ʋakaʋadzora panzira yaʋo yakaipa, napaɀakaipa ɀamaɓasa aʋo.
Ko ini ndiri Mŋari uri pedyo, ndisati ndiri Mŋari uri kure here? ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ko munhu uri’po uŋgaʋanda panɀimbo dzisiŋgazikanwi, ini ndikasamuʋona here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Ko ini handizadzi ɗeŋga nenyika here? ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndakanzwa ɀakarebga naʋaprofita, ʋanoprofita nhema muzita raŋgu, ʋaciti: Ndarota hope, ndarota hope.
Ko iɀi ɀicaʋa’po pamŋoyo yaʋaprofita ʋanoprofita nhema kuȿikira rini, iʋo ʋaprofita ʋeɀinonyeŋgera ɀemŋoyo yaʋo?
Iʋo, ʋanofuŋga kukaŋganwisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu zita raŋgu nokurota kwaʋo, kwaʋanoʋudza mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake, madziɓaɓa aʋo seɀaʋakakaŋganwa zita raŋgu no
Muprofita, wakarota, ŋgaaʋudze kurota
Shoko raŋgu harina‐kufanana nomŋoto here? ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ʋuye senyundo inoputsanya ɗombo here?
Naiɀoɀo, tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — handinoʋukama naʋaprofita, ʋanoɓa mashoko aŋgu mumŋe nomumŋe kunowokwake.
Tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — handinoʋukama naʋaprofita, ʋanoreʋa namarimi aʋo, ʋaciti: Ndiye unoɗaro.
Tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — handinoʋukama naʋanoprofita kurota
Ɀino kana ʋanhu aʋa, kana muprofita kana muprista, ʋakakubvunza, ʋaciti: Cireʋo caJehova ndecipiko? Ipapo uti kwaʋari: Cireʋo cei! Ini ndicakurashai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Kana ari muprofita, kana muprista, kana ʋanhu, kana ʋaciti: Cireʋo caJehova; ndicaroʋa munhu uyo neimba yake.
Ndiɀo ɀamunofanira kuti, mumŋe nomumŋe kunowokwake, nomumŋe nomumŋe kuhama yake: Jehova wakapindurei? Jehova wakataurei?
Musazoti cireʋo caJehova; nokuti shoko romunhu mumŋe nomumŋe ndico cireʋo cake; nokuti makakaŋganisa mashoko aMŋari mupenyu, aJehova wehondo, Mŋari weɗu.
Uti kumuprofita: Jehova wakakupindurei? Jehova wakataurei?
Asi kana mukati: Cireʋo caJehova; ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀamunoreʋa shoko iri,
naiɀoɀo tarirai, ndicakukaŋganwai cose, ndicakurashai kure neni, imi, neguta randakakupai imi namadziɓaɓa enyu;
ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro penyu kushoʋorwa kusiŋgaperi, nokunyadziswa kusiŋgaperi, ɀisiŋgazokaŋganikwi.

Ɀino Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi wakati atapa Jekonia mŋanakomana waJehoiakimi, mambo waJuda, namacinda aJuda, pamŋe cete naʋaʋezi naʋapfuri, paJerusarema, akaʋaisa Babironi, Jehova akandiratidza, ndikaʋona tswanda mbiri dzinamaʋonde dzakaŋga dzakaiswa pamberi petembere yaJehova.
Imŋe tswanda yakaŋga inamaʋonde akanaka kwaɀo, samaʋonde anotaŋga kuibva; asi imŋe tswanda yakaŋga inamaʋonde akaipa kwaɀo, asiŋgabviri kudyiwa nokuipa kwawo.
Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Unoʋoneiko Jeremia? Ini ndikati: Maʋonde; maʋonde akanaka, akanaka kwaɀo, asi akaipa, akaipa kwaɀo, asiŋgabviri kudyiwa nokuipa kwawo.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Seɀakaita maʋonde awa akanaka, ndiɀo ɀandicaraŋgarira nomŋoyo wakanaka ʋatapxa ʋaJuda, ʋandakatuma ʋabve panyika ino ʋaende kunyika yaʋaKardea.
Nokuti ndicaʋatarira nameso aŋgu nomŋoyo wakanaka, ndiʋadzosere ɀe kunyika ino; ndicaʋaʋaka, handiŋgaʋakoromori; ndicaʋasima, handiŋgaʋadzuri.
Ndicaʋapa mŋoyo wokundiziʋa, kuti ndini Jehova; iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo; nokuti ʋacadzokera kwandiri nomŋoyo waʋo wose.

Ʋuye, seɀakaita maʋonde akaipa, asiŋgabviri kudyiwa nokuipa kwawo, ɀirokwaɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndiɀo ɀandicaita Zedekia mambo waJuda, namacinda ake, naʋakasara ʋeJerusarema, ʋakasara panyika ino, naʋagere panyika yeEgipita.
Ndicaʋaita cinhu cinotyisa pakati poʋushe bgose bgenyika, ʋaitirwe ɀakaipa, ʋaʋe cinhu cinoshoʋorwa, neshumo, necinosekwa necinotukwa panɀimbo dzose kwandicaʋadziŋgira.
Ndicatuma pakati paʋo munondo, nenzara, nehosha, kuȿikira ʋapera panyika yandakaʋapa iʋo namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Shoko, rakaʋuya kunaJeremia pamsoro paʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda, negore recinna raJehoiakimi, mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda; ndiro gore rokutaŋga raNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi,
iro rakataurwa nomuprofita Jeremia kuʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda, naʋose ʋagere Jerusarema, aciti:

Kubva pagore regumi namatatu raJosia mŋanakomana waAmoni, mambo waʋaJuda, kuȿikira pazuʋa rino, makore awa anamakumi maʋiri namatatu, shoko raJehova raiʋuya kwandiri, ndikakutaurirai, ndicimuka maŋgwanani, ndicitaura; asi imi hamuna‐kuterera.
Jehova wakatuma kwamuri ʋaranda ʋake ʋose ʋaprofita, acimuka maŋgwanani, aciʋatuma, asi imi hamuna‐kuterera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzenyu kuti munzwe,
ʋaciti: Dzokai ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa, napaɀakaipa ɀamunoita, mugare munyika yamakapiwa naJehova, imi namadziɓaɓa enyu, kubva kare nakare kuȿikira pakusiŋgaperi;
regai kuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari kuti muʋashumire, nokuʋanamata, murege kunditsamŋisa namaɓasa amaʋoko enyu; ini ndigorega kukuitirai ɀakaipa.
Asi hamuna‐kunditerera — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuti munditsamŋise namaɓasa amaʋoko enyu, muitirwe ɀakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ɀamusina‐kunzwa mashoko aŋgu,
tarirai, ndicatuma
Ndicabvisa ʋo kwaʋari inzwi rokuseka nenzwi rokufara, nenzwi recikomba, nenzwi romŋeŋga, nenzwi ramakuyo, neciedza comŋenje.
Nyika ino yose ricaʋa ɗoŋgo, necishamiso; marudzi awa acaɓatira mambo weBabironi makore anamakumi manomŋe.
Ɀino kana makore anamakumi manomŋe apera — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaroʋa mambo weBabironi, norudzi urwo pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaʋo, nenyika yaʋaKardea; ndicaiita matoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro penyika iyo mashoko aŋgu ose andakataura pamsoro payo, ɀose ɀakanyorwa mubuku iyi, ɀakaprofitiwa naJeremia pamsoro pamarudzi ose.
Nokuti marudzi mazhinji namadzimambo makuru ʋacaʋasuŋga iʋo ʋamene ʋaʋe ʋaranda ʋaʋo; ini ndicaʋaripira ɀakaenzana nokuɓata kwaʋo, neɀakaenzana neɓasa ramaʋoko aʋo.
Nokuti Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri, wakati kwandiri: Tora mukombe uyu wewaini yokutsamŋa kwaŋgu paruʋoko rwaŋgu, unwise’po marudzi ose andinokutumira kwaari.
Ʋacanwa, nokudzedzereka, nokupeŋga, nokuɗa kwomunondo wandicatuma pakati paʋo.
Ipapo ndakatora mukombe paruʋoko rwaJehova, ndikanwisa marudzi ose, andakatumirwa kwaari naJehova;
Jerusarema, namaguta aJuda, namadzimambo awo, namacinda awo, kuti ʋaitwe ɗoŋgo, necishamiso, necinoridzirwa muridzo, necinotukwa, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.
NaFarao mambo weEgipita, naʋaranda ʋake, namacinda ake, naʋanhu ʋake ʋose;
namarudzi ose akaveŋgana, namadzimambo ose enyika yeUzi, namadzimambo ose enyika yaʋaFiristia, neAshkeroni, neGaza, neEkroni, naʋakasara ʋeAshdodi;
naEdomi, naMoabi, naʋana ʋaAmoni;
namadzimambo ose eTire, namadzimambo ose eSidoni, namadzimambo eciwi ciri mhiri kweguŋgwa;
neDedani, neTema, neBuzi, naʋose ʋakaʋeʋurwa
namadzimambo ose eArabia, namadzimambo ose amarudzi akaveŋgana ʋanogara kurenje;
namadzimambo ose eZimri, namadzimambo ose eErami, namadzimambo ose aʋaMedia;
namadzimambo ose okumsoro, kure napedyo, mumŋe nomumŋe; noʋushe bgose bgenyika, ʋuri pasi pose; mambo weSheshaki ucanwa shure kwaʋo.
Ɀino iwe uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Inwai, muɓatwe, murutse, muwe, murege kuzosimuka ɀe, nokuɗa kwomunondo wandicatuma pakati penyu.
Ɀino kana ʋaciramba kutora mukombe paruʋoko rwako kuti ʋanwe, ipapo uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Munofanira kunwa, ɀirokwaɀo!

Nokuti tarirai ndinotaŋga kuitira ɀakaipa guta rakatumidzwa nezita raŋgu; ɀino imi muŋgaregwa cose musiŋgarobgi here? Hamuŋgaregwi musiŋgarobgi; nokuti ndicaɗana munondo pamsoro paʋose ʋagere panyika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.

Naiɀoɀo iwe uʋaprofitere mashoko awa ose, uti kwaʋari: Jehova ucaʋomba ari kumsoro, ucaɓuɗisa inzwi rake ari paʋugaro bgake ʋutȿene; ucaʋombera mafuro ake; ucapururudzira ʋose ʋagere panyika, seɀinoita ʋanotsika mazambiriŋga.
Mubvumo ucaȿika pamugumo wenyika pamene; nokuti Jehova unegakaʋa namarudzi, ucatoŋga nyama yose; kana ʋari ʋakaipa, ucaʋaisa kumunondo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ɀakaipa ɀicaɓuɗa kunorumŋe rudzi ɀicienda kunorumŋe rudzi, neɗutu guru remhepo ricamutswa kumigumo yenyika.
Nezuʋa iro ʋakaʋurawa naJehova ʋacaʋa’po kubva kunomumŋe mugumo wenyika kuȿikira kunomumŋe mugumo wenyika; haʋaŋgacemŋi, kana kuʋuŋganidzwa, kana kuʋigwa; ʋacaʋa mupfudze pasi pose.
Wuŋgudzai, imi ʋafudzi, muceme; ʋumburukai
Ʋafudzi ʋacashaiwa matizire, naʋakuru ʋamapoka mapukunyukire.
Inzwai inzwi rokucema kwaʋafudzi, nokuwuŋgudza kwaʋakuru ʋamapoka! Nokuti Jehova unoparadza mafuro aʋo.
Mafuro orugare anoparadzwa nokutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova.
Wakabva paanoʋanda seshumba; nokuti nyika yaʋo yaʋa cishamiso, nokuɗa kwokunyanya kwomunondo unomanikidza, ʋuye nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kwake kukuru.
Ɀino pakuʋamba kwokuɓata ʋushe kwaJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, shoko iri rakabva kunaJehova, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Mira paruʋazhe rweimba yaJehova, uʋudze maguta ose aJuda, anoʋuya kuzonamata mumba maJehova, mashoko ose andinokuraira kuti uʋaʋudze; usatapudza kunyaŋge neshoko rimŋe.
Ɀimŋe ʋaŋgaterera, ʋakadzoka mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa; kuti ndiɀiɗembe pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀandinofuŋga kuʋaitira nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀaʋanoita.
Uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana musiŋgaɗi kundinzwa, kuti mufambe nomurairo waŋgu, wandakaisa pamberi penyu,
kuti munzwe mashoko aʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋaprofita, ʋandinotuma kwamuri, ndicimuka maŋgwanani ndiciʋatuma, asi hamuna‐kunzwa;
ɀino ndicaita imba ino iʋe seShiro, neguta rino ndicariita cinhu cinotukwa namarudzi ose enyika.
Ʋaprista naʋaprofita naʋanhu ʋose ʋakanzwa Jeremia acitaura mashoko awa mumba maJehova.
Ɀino Jeremia wakati apedza kutaura ɀose ɀaakaŋga arairwa naJehova kuti aʋudze ʋanhu ʋose, ʋaprista naʋaprofita naʋanhu ʋose ʋakamuɓata, ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, ucafa iwe.
Wakaprofiterei nezita raJehova, uciti: Imba ino icaʋa seShiro, guta rino ricaʋa ɗoŋgo, risina‐unogara’mo? Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuŋganira Jeremia mumba maJehova.
Ɀino macinda aJuda akati anzwa ɀinhu iɀi, ʋakaʋuya ʋacibva kuimba yamambo ʋakaenda kuimba yaJehova, ʋakagara pasi panopindwa pasuʋo idɀa
Ipapo ʋaprista naʋaprofita ʋakataura namacinda ʋuye naʋanhu ʋose, ʋaciti: Munhu uyu wakafanira rufu, nokuti wakaprofitera guta rino ɀakaipa, seɀamakanzwa nenzeʋe dzenyu.
Ipapo Jeremia wakataura namacinda ose ʋuye naʋanhu ʋose, aciti: Jehova ndiye wakandituma kuti ndiprofitere imba ino neguta rino mashoko ose amakanzwa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino natsai nzira dzenyu neɀamunoita, muterere inzwi raJehova Mŋari wenyu; ipapo Jehova ucaɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaakareʋa pamsoro penyu.
Asi kana ndirini, tarirai, ndiri mumaʋoko enyu; ndiitirei ɀakanaka neɀakarurama pakuʋona kwenyu.
Asi muziʋe ɀirokwaɀo, kuti kana mukandiʋuraya ini, mucaʋuyisa
Ipapo macinda naʋanhu ʋose ʋakati kuʋaprista naʋaprofita: Munhu uyu haafaniri rufu, nokuti wakataura nesu nezita raJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaʋakuru ʋenyika ʋakasimuka, ʋakataura neʋuŋgano yose yaʋanhu, ʋaciti:
Mikaya muMorashtiti wakaprofita pamazuʋa aHezekia mambo waJuda; akataura naʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda, aciti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Zioni ricarimŋa somunda, neJerusarema ricaʋa mirwi yamabge, negomo reimba

Ko Hezekia mambo waJuda, naʋaJuda ʋose ʋakamuʋuraya here? Ko haana‐kutya Jehova, akanyeŋgetera Jehova, Jehova akaɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaakaŋga areʋa pamsoro paʋo here? Saiɀoɀo tiŋgatadzira mŋeya yeɗu kwaɀo.
Ʋuye ɀe, kwakaŋga kunomunhu waiprofita nezita raJehova,
Ɀino mambo Jehoiakimi, naʋakuru ʋake ʋose, namacinda ose, ʋakati ʋanzwa mashoko ake, mambo akatȿaka kumuʋuraya; asi Uria wakati aciɀinzwa, akatya, akatizira Egipita.
Mambo Jehoiakimi akatuma ʋanhu Egipita,
akandotora Uria Egipita, ʋakaʋuya naye kuna mambo Jehoiakimi, iye ndokumuʋuraya nomunondo, akakandira citunha cake mumarinda aʋanhu ʋasiŋgakudzwi.
Asi ruʋoko rwaAhikami mŋanakomana waShafani rwakaɓatsira Jeremia, ʋakasamuisa mumaʋoko aʋanhu kuti ʋamuʋuraye.
Pakuʋamba kwokuɓata ʋushe kwaJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, shoko iri rakaȿika kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova kwandiri: Ɀiitire ɀisuŋgo namatanda, uɀiise pamutsipa wako;
uɀitumire kunamambo waEdomi, nokunamambo waMoabi, nokunamambo waʋana ʋaAmoni, nokunamambo weTire, nokunamambo weSidoni, noruʋoko rwenhume dzinoʋuya Jerusarema kunaZedekia mambo waJuda;
utume shoko naʋo kunatenzi waʋo, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Mundoti kunatenzi wenyu:
Ini ndakaita nyika, naʋanhu neɀipfuwo ɀiri pasi pose, nesimba raŋgu guru ʋuye noruʋoko rwaŋgu rwakatambanudzwa; ɀino ndinoɀipa wandinoti ndiye wakafanirwa naɀo.
Ɀino ini ndakaisa nyika idzi dzose muruʋoko rwaNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, muranda waŋgu; nemhuka dzose dzeɓundo ndakamupa ʋo kuti dzimushumire.
Marudzi ose acamushumira, iye nomŋanakomana wake, nomŋanakomana womŋanakomana wake, kuȿikira ŋguʋa yenyika yake yaȿika ʋo; ipapo marudzi mazhinji namadzimambo makuru acamuita muranda waʋo.

Ɀino rudzi rupi norupi noʋushe bgupi nobgupi ʋanoramba kushumira iye Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, ʋanoramba kuisa mutsipa waʋo pasi pejoko ramambo weBabironi, rudzi urwo ndicaruroʋa nomunondo ʋuye nenzara, nehosha yakaipa, kuȿikira ndaʋapedza noruʋoko rwake — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Asi kana muri’mi, regai kuterera ʋaprofita ʋenyu, kana ʋaʋuki ʋenyu, kana kurota kwenyu, kana ʋafemberi ʋenyu, kana ʋaroyi ʋenyu, ʋanotaura nemi, ʋaciti: Hamuŋgashumiri mambo weBabironi;
nokuti ʋanokuprofiterai nhema, kuti muiswe kure nenyika yenyu, kuti ini ndikudziŋgirei kunze, muparare.
Asi rudzi, rucaisa mutsipa warwo pasi pejoko ramambo weBabironi, nokumushumira, rudzi urwo ndicarutendera kugara munyika yarwo, ʋacairima, nokugara’mo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino ndikataura naZedekia mambo waJuda mashoko awa ose, ndiciti: Isai mitsipa yenyu pasi pejoko ramambo weBabironi, mumushumire iye naʋanhu ʋake, murarame.
Mucafireiko, imi naʋanhu ʋenyu, nomunondo, ʋuye nenzara, nehosha yakaipa, seɀakataura Jehova pamsoro porudzi runoramba kushumira mambo weBabironi?
Regai kuterera mashoko aʋaprofita ʋanotaura kwamuri ʋaciti: Hamuŋgashumiri mambo weBabironi; nokuti ʋanokuprofiterai nhema.
Nokuti ini handina‐kuʋatuma — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — asi ʋanoprofita nhema nezita raŋgu; kuti ndikudziŋgirei kunze, mupere, imi naʋaprofita ʋanokuprofiterai.

Ndakataura ʋo naʋaprista, ʋuye naʋanhu aʋa ʋose, ndikati: Ɀanzi naJehova: Regai kuterera mashoko aʋaprofita ʋenyu ʋanokuprofiterai, ʋaciti: Tarirai, midziyo yeimba yaJehova yoɗo‐kudzoswa icibva Babironi; nokuti ʋanokuprofiterai nhema.
Regai kuʋaterera; shumirai mambo weBabironi, murarame; guta rino ricaitwa ɗoŋgo neiko?
Asi kana ʋari ʋaprofita, kana shoko raJehova rinaʋo, ŋgaʋanyeŋgetere Jehova wehondo ɀino, kuti midziyo yakasara mumba maJehova nomumba mamambo waJuda, napaJerusarema, irege kuenda Babironi.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo pamsoro pembiru, napamsoro peguŋgwa, napamsoro peɀigadziko, napamsoro pemidziyo yakasara muguta rino;

ɀisina‐kutorwa naNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, paŋguʋa yaakatapa Jekonia, mŋanakomana waJehoiakimi, mambo waʋaJuda, paJerusarema, akamuisa Babironi, pamŋe cete naʋakuru ʋose ʋaʋaJuda naʋeJerusarema;
nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, pamsoro pemidziyo yakasara mumba maJehova, nomumba mamambo waJuda, napaJerusarema:
Icandoiswa Babironi, ikagara’ko, kuȿikira zuʋa randicaʋashanyira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ipapo ndicaʋaʋuyisa ɀe, ndikaʋadzosera kunɀimbo ino.

Ɀino pagore irero, pakuʋamba kwokuɓata ʋushe kwaZedekia mambo waJuda, pagore recinna, nomŋedzi wecishanu, Hanania mŋanakomana waAzuri muprofita, waiʋa weGibeoni, akataura neni mumba maJehova, ʋaprista naʋanhu ʋose ʋari’po, akati:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndavuna joko ramambo weBabironi.
Makore maʋiri asati apera kwaɀo, ndicadzosera ɀe kunɀimbo ino midziyo yose yeimba yaJehova, yakatorwa naNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi panɀimbo ino, akaiisa Babironi;
ndicadzosera ɀe kunɀimbo ino Jekonia mŋanakomana waJehoiakimi mambo waJuda, pamŋe cete naʋatapxa ʋose ʋaJuda, ʋakaenda Babironi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndicavuna joko ramambo weBabironi.
Ipapo muprofita Jeremia akati kumuprofita Hanania, ʋaprista naʋanhu ʋose ʋari’po ʋamire mumba maJehova,
iye muprofita Jeremia akati: Ameni, Jehova ŋgaaite ɀakaɗaro; Jehova ŋgaasimbise mashoko ako awakaprofita, adzosere ɀe midziyo yeimba yaJehova, naʋose ʋakatapxa, ʋabve Babironi ʋaʋuye kunɀimbo ino.
Asi ɀino cinzwa shoko iri randinotaura munzeʋe dzako, nomunzeʋe dzaʋanhu ʋose:
Ʋaprofita, ʋakanditaŋgira ini newe, ʋakaprofitera nyika zhinji, noʋushe ʋukuru,
Muprofita, unoprofita ɀorugare, kana shoko romuprofita uyo rikaitika, muprofita uyo ucazikanwa kuti wakatumŋa naJehova ɀirokwaɀo.
Ipapo muprofita Hanania wakabvisa joko pamutsipa womuprofita Jeremia, akarivuna.

Ɀino Hanania akataura pamberi paʋanhu ʋose, aciti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Saiɀoɀo ndicavuna joko raNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi pamitsipa yamarudzi ose makore maʋiri asati apera kwaɀo. Muprofita Jeremia ndokuenda ɀake.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kunaJeremia, muprofita Hanania apedza kuvuna joko pamutsipa womuprofita Jeremia, ɀicinzi:
Enda undoʋudza Hanania, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Wavuna majoko amatanda, asi waita panɀimbo yaɀo majoko esimbi.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakaisa joko resimbi pamitsipa yamarudzi awa ose, kuti ashumire Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi; acamushumira, ʋuye ndakamupa ʋo mhuka dzeɓundo.
Ipapo muprofita Jeremia wakati kumuprofita Hanania: Cinzwa ɀino, Hanania: Jehova haana‐kukutuma, asi iwe unotendisa ʋanhu aʋa nhema.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, ndicakudziŋga pasi pose; ucafa nhaka, nokuti wakataura ɀinomukira Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo muprofita Hanania wakafa negore iro nomŋedzi wecinomŋe.

Ɀino awa ndiwo mashoko orugwaro rwakatumŋa nomuprofita Jeremia ari paJerusarema kuʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋasara kunaʋakatapxa, nokuʋaprista nokuʋaprofita, nokuʋanhu ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋakatapxa paJerusarema naNebukadnezari, ʋakaiswa Babironi,
(Shure kwokubva paJerusarema kwamambo Jekonia, namai ʋake, naʋaranda, namacinda aJuda neeJerusarema, naʋaʋezi, naʋapfuri),
noruʋoko rwaErasa, mŋanakomana waShafani, naGemaria, mŋanakomana waHirkia, ʋakaŋga ʋatumŋa Babironi naZedekia mambo waJuda kunaNebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, aciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, kunaʋose ʋakatapxa, ʋandakatapisa Jerusarema ʋaiswe Babironi:
Ɀiʋakirei dzimba, mugare’mo; simai minda, mudye ɀiɓereko ɀayo;
wanai ʋakadzi, muɓereke ʋanakomana naʋanasikana; wanisai ʋanakomana ʋenyu ʋakadzi, naʋanasikana ʋenyu muʋaise kuʋarume, kuti ʋaɓereke ʋanakomana naʋanasikana, muwande’ko, murege kutapudzwa.
Mutȿake rugare rweguta kwandakakutapisai, murinyeŋgeterere kunaJehova; nokuti norugare rwaro imi mucaʋa norugare ʋo.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ʋaprofita ʋenyu, ʋari pakati penyu, naʋaʋuki ʋenyu, ŋgaʋarege kukunyeŋgerai; regai kuterera kurota kwenyu kwamunoroteswa.
Nokuti ʋanokuprofiterai nhema nezita raŋgu; ini handina‐kuʋatuma, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Kana makore makumi manomŋe aperera Babironi, ndicakushanyirai, nokukusimbisirai shoko raŋgu rakanaka, ndicikudzoserai kunɀimbo ino.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa ndaŋgariro dzandinoraŋgarira pamsoro penyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndaŋgariro dzorugare, dzisati dziri dzeɀakaipa, kuti ndikupei mugumo unetariro.
Mucaɗana kwandiri, mucandonyeŋgetera kwandiri, neni ndicakunzwai.
Mucanditȿaka, mukandiwana, kana mucinditȿaka nomŋoyo wenyu wose.

Ndicawanikwa nemi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicakudzosai pakutapxa kwenyu, nokukuʋuŋganidzai kumarudzi ose, nokunɀimbo dzose kwandakaŋga ndakudziŋgirai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicakudzoserai ɀe kunɀimbo kwandakaŋga ndakutapisai.
Ɀamakati: Jehova wakatimutsira ʋaprofita paBabironi;
ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro pamambo ugere pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋose ʋagere muguta rino, idzo hama dzenyu dzisina‐kuenda nemi pakutapxa kwenyu;
ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ndicatuma pamsoro paʋo munondo, nenzara, nehosha yakaipa, ndicaʋaita samaʋonde akaipa kwaɀo, asiŋgabviri kudyiwa nokuipa kwawo.

Ndicaʋateʋerera nomunondo, nenzara, nehosha yakaipa; ndicaʋaita cinhu cinotyisa ʋushe bgose bgenyika, ʋaʋe cinhu cinotukwa, necishamiso, necinoridzirwa muridzo, necinoshoʋorwa pakati pamarudzi ose kwandakaʋadziŋgira;
ɀaʋasina‐kuterera mashoko aŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — andakatuma kwaʋari naʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋaprofita, ndicimuka maŋgwanani ndiciʋatuma; asi makaramba kuterera — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo cinzwai shoko raJehova, imi mose makatapxa, ʋandakadziŋga paJerusarema ndikaʋaisa Babironi.

Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, pamsoro paAhabi mŋanakomana waKoraia, napamsoro paZedekia mŋanakomana waMaaseia, ʋanokuprofiterai nhema nezita raŋgu: Tarirai, ndinoʋaisa muruʋoko rwaNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi; iye ucaʋaʋuraya pamberi penyu;
ʋatapxa ʋose ʋaJuda, ʋari Babironi, ʋacatora kwaʋari
nokuti ʋakaita noʋupenzi pakati paIsraeri, ʋakaita ʋupombge naʋakadzi ʋoʋokwaʋo, ʋakareʋa mashoko enhema nezita raŋgu, andisina‐kuʋaraira; ini ndini ndinoziʋa, ndini capupu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino kunaShemaia muNeheramite, unofanira kutaura uciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ɀawakatuma magwaro nezita rako kuʋanhu ʋose ʋari paJerusarema, nokunaZefania mŋanakomana womuprista Maaseia, nokuʋaprista ʋose, uciti:
Jehova wakakuita muprista panɀimbo yomuprista Jehoiada, kuti mumba maJehova muʋe naʋatariri, kuti usuŋge mumatanda namaketani mumŋe nomumŋe unopeŋga, aciɀiita muprofita;
ko ɀino wakaregerei kutuka Jeremia weAnatoti, unoɀiita muprofita pamberi penyu,
ɀaakatuma
Ɀino muprista Zefania akaraʋira muprofita Jeremia rugwaro urwu.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kunaJeremia, riciti:
Tumira ʋakatapxa ʋose

naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaroʋa Shemaia muNeheramiti, naʋana ʋake; haaŋgaʋi nomunhu uŋgagara pakati paʋanhu aʋa, ʋuye haaŋgaʋoni ɀakanaka ɀandicaitira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — nokuti wakataura zinomukira Jehova.
Shoko, rakaʋuya kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Nyora mashoko ose andakakuʋudza mubuku.
Nokuti, tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — andicadzosa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri naJuda pakutapxa kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicaʋadzosera kunyika yandakapa madziɓaɓa aʋo, iʋe yaʋo.
Awa ndiwo mashoko akataura Jehova pamsoro paIsraeri napamsoro paJuda.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Takanzwa inzwi rinoɗeɗeresa, rinotyisa, risati riri rorugare.
Bvunzai ɀino muʋone kana murume uŋgagona kusurumuka; ndinoʋonereiko murume mumŋe nomumŋe akaisa maʋoko ake paciʋuno cake somukadzi unosurumuka, neɀiso ɀose ɀakaceneruka?
Maiwe! Nokuti zuʋa iro iguru, hakuna‐rakafanana naro; iŋguʋa yokutambudzika kwaJakobo; asi ucasunuŋgurwa paɀiri.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicavuna joko rake pamutsipa wako, ndicaɗambura ɀisuŋgu ɀako; ʋatorwa haʋaŋgazomuiti muranda waʋo;
asi ʋacashumira Jehova Mŋari waʋo, naDavidi mambo waʋo, wandicaʋamutsira.

Naiɀoɀo usatya hako, iwe Jakobo muranda waŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; usavunduka hako, iwe Israeri, nokuti tarira, ndicakuponesa uri kure, naʋana ʋako kunyika kwaʋakatapirwa; Jakobo ucadzoka, ucagara akagadzikana anorugare, hakuna‐uŋgamutyisa.

Nokuti ndinewe, kuti ndikuponese — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndicagumisa cose marudzi ose kwandakakuparadzira, asi iwe handiŋgakugumisi cose; asi ndicakuraŋga nokururama, handiŋgatoŋgokuregi usinokurobga.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Kukuʋadzwa kwako hakubviri kuporeswa, ʋaŋga rako rakaipa kwaɀo.
Hakuna‐unoreʋerera mhaka yako, kuti urapxe; haunemishoŋga inoporesa.
Ʋose ʋaikuɗa ʋakukaŋganwa, haʋakuʋiŋgi, nokuti ndakakukuʋadza neʋaŋga romuʋeŋgi, ʋuye nokuroʋa kwounehasha, nokuɗa kwoʋukuru bgeɀakaipa ɀako, nokuti ɀiʋi ɀako ɀakaŋga ɀawanda.
Unocemeiko pamsoro pokukuʋadzwa kwako? Kurwadziwa kwako hakubviri kuporeswa. Ndakakuitira ɀinhu iɀi, nokuɗa kwoʋukuru bgeɀakaipa ɀako, nokuti ɀiʋi ɀako ɀakaŋga ɀawanda.
Naiɀoɀo ʋose ʋanokudya ʋacadyiwa ʋo; ʋadziʋisi ʋako ʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo, ʋacatapxa; ʋanokupamba ʋacapambga, ʋose ʋanokuparadza, ndicaʋaisa kukuparadzwa.
Nokuti ndicakudzosera mufaro pamuʋiri, ndicakuporesa maʋaŋga ako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ɀaʋakakutumidza zita rinonzi Murashwa,
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndicadzosa ɀe kutapxa kwamatente aJakobo, nokunzwira ʋugaro bgake tsitsi; guta ricaʋakwa pamsoro pegomo raro, imba yamambo icagarwa seɀakafanira.
Kuʋoŋga nenzwi raʋanofara ricaɓuɗa’po; ndicaʋawanza, haʋaŋgaʋi ʋashoma, ndicaʋakudza ʋarege kuʋa ʋaɗuku.
Ʋana ʋaʋo ʋacaʋa sakare, neʋuŋgano yaʋo icamiswa pamberi paŋgu, ndicaroʋa ʋose ʋanoʋamanikidza.
Mucinda waʋo ucaʋa mumŋe waʋo, muɓati waʋo ucaɓuɗa pakati paʋo; ndicamusweɗedza, asweɗere kwandiri; nokuti ndianiko wakatsuŋga kusweɗera kwandiri? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Imi mucaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari wenyu.
Tarirai, ɗutu guru remhepo yaJehova,
Kutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova hakuŋgadzoki, kuȿikira apedza, kuȿikira aita ɀose ɀaakafuŋga mumŋoyo make; mucaɀinzwisisa pamazuʋa okupedzisira.
Neŋguʋa iyo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaʋa Mŋari wamarudzi ose aIsraeri, naiʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ʋanhu ʋakapukunyuka pamunondo, iʋo ʋaIsraeri, ʋakawana nyasha murenje, paŋguʋa yandakandoʋazorodza.
Jehova wakaɀiratidza kwandiri ari kure, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakakuɗa noruɗo rusiŋgaperi, naiɀoɀo ndakakukweʋa noʋunyoro.
Ndicakuʋaka ɀe, ipapo ucaʋa wakaʋakwa, iwe mhandara yaIsraeri; ucashoŋgedzwa ɀe ŋgoma dzako, ucaɓuɗa kundotamba naʋanofara.
Ucasima ɀe minda yemizambiriŋga pamakomo eSamaria; ʋasimi ʋacasima nokudya
Nokuti zuʋa ricaȿika, naro nharirire dzicaɗana pamakomo aEfraimi,
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Imbirai Jakobo nomufaro, pururudzirai mukuru wamarudzi; paridzirai, rumbidzai, muti: Jehova, ponesai ʋanhu ʋenyu, iʋo ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri.

Tarirai, ndicaʋaʋuyisa ʋacibva kunyika yokumsoro, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza kumigumo yenyika, pamŋe cete namapofu, naʋanokamhina, naʋakadzi ʋaʋa nomuʋiri pamŋe cete naʋanosurumuka; ʋacadzokera ʋuno riri ɓoka guru.
Ʋacaʋuya ʋacicema, ndicaʋaperekedza ʋacinyeŋgetera; ndicaʋafambisa panzizi dzemvura zhinji, nenzira yakarurama, paʋasiŋgazogumburwi; nokuti ndiri ɓaɓa kunaIsraeri, Efraimi iɗaŋgwe raŋgu.
Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi marudzi, muriparidzire paɀiwi ɀiri kure, muti: Wakaparadzira Israeri, ndiye ucaʋaʋuŋganidza, nokuʋaceŋgeta, seɀinoita mufudzi ɓoka rake.
Nokuti Jehova wakadzikinura Jakobo, akamurwira muruʋoko rwounopfuʋura nesimba.

Ʋacaʋuya ʋaciimba panɀimbo yakakwirira yeZioni, ʋacayerera semvura kuneɀakanaka ɀaJehova, kuɀiyo, nokuwaini itȿa, nokumafuta, nokuɀiɓereko ɀamakwai neŋombe; mŋeya waʋo ucaʋa somunda wakaɗiridzwa, haʋaŋgatoŋgoʋi nokusuwa ɀe.
Ipapo mhandara icafara nokutamba, namajaya naʋatana pamŋe cete; nokuti ndicashandura kucema kwaʋo uʋe mufaro, ndicaʋanyaradza, nokuʋafadza pakusuwa kwaʋo.
Ndicagutisa mŋeya yaʋaprista namafuta, ʋuye ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋacaguta neɀakanaka ɀaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Inzwi rinonzwika muRama, rokuwuŋgudza nokucema kukuru, Rakeri unocema ʋana ʋake; unoramba kunyaradzwa pamsoro paʋana ʋake, nokuti haʋaci’po.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Dzora inzwi rako pakucema, nameso ako pamisodzi, nokuti ɓasa rako ricaripirwa muɓairo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ʋacadzoka ɀe ʋacibva kunyika yaʋaʋeŋgi
Mugumo wako unetariro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ʋana
Ɀirokwaɀo ndakanzwa Efraimi aciɀicema,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakati ndadzoka, ndikatendeʋuka, ndakati ndarairirwa, ndikaɀiroʋa pahudyu; ndakanyadziswa, ɀirokwaɀo, ndakanyara, nokuti ndakatakura kushoʋorwa kwoʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.

Ko Efraimi ndiye mŋanakomana waŋgu unoɗikanwa here? Ndiye mŋana unondifadza here? Nokuti ŋguʋa dzose kana ndicimutuka, ndinoramba ndicimuraŋgarira kwaɀo; naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unomucemera; ɀirokwaɀo, ndicamunzwira nyasha — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀimisirei shoŋgwe dzenzira, ɀiitirei ɀani; rerekerai mŋoyo yenyu kunzira huru, iyo nzira yamakafamba nayo; dzoka ɀe, mhandara yaIsraeri, dzokera ɀe kumaguta ako awa.
Ucaramba ucifambiro’mo kuȿikira riniko, iwe mukunda wokudzokera shure? Nokuti Jehova wakasika cinhu citȿa panyika,
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ʋacataura ɀe shoko iri munyika yaJuda nomumaguta ayo, kana ndicidzosa ɀe kutapxa kwaʋo,
Juda namaguta aʋo ose ʋacagara’mo pamŋe cete, ʋarimi naʋanofamba namapoka aʋo.
Nokuti ndakagutsa mŋeya wakaneta, nomŋeya mumŋe nomumŋe, unokusuwa, ndakausimbisa.
Ipapo ndakamuka, ndikaʋona; hope dzaŋgu dzikandizipira.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya, andicadɀara paimba yaIsraeri napaimba yaJuda mbeu dzaʋanhu nembeu dzeɀipfuwo.
Ɀino seɀandakaʋarindira, ndicidzura nokukoromora nokuwisira pasi nokuparadza nokutambudza, saiɀoɀo ndicaʋarindira ndiʋake nokusima — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Namazuʋa awo haʋaŋgazoti: Madziɓaɓa akadya mazambiriŋga anoʋaʋa, meno aʋana ndokubgadzira.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe ucafira ɀakaipa ɀake; mumŋe nomumŋe, unodya mazambiriŋga anoʋaʋa, meno ake acabgadzira.
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — andicaita suŋgano itȿa neimba yaIsraeri, ʋuye neimba yaJuda.

Haiŋgafanani nesuŋgano yandakaita namadziɓaɓa aʋo namazuʋa andakaʋaɓata ruʋoko ndikaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, ʋakaputsa suŋgano yaŋgu iyo, kunyaŋge ndakaŋga ndiri murume kwaʋari — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Asi heyi suŋgano yandicaita neimba yaIsraeri shure kwamazuʋa iwayo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova: Ndicaisa murairo waŋgu mukati maʋo, ndicaunyora pamŋoyo yaʋo; ini ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo, iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.

Haʋaŋgazodzidzisani, mumŋe nomumŋe nowokwake, mumŋe nomumŋe nehama yake, aciti: Ziʋa Jehova; nokuti ʋacandiziʋa ʋose, kubva kuʋaɗuku pakati paʋo kuȿikira kuʋakuru pakati paʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndicakaŋganwira kuipa kwaʋo, neɀiʋi ɀaʋo handiŋgazoɀiraŋgariri.
Ɀanzi naJehova, iye unopa zuʋa riʋe ciedza masikati, nemirairo yomŋedzi neyenyeredzi ɀiʋe ciedza ʋusiku, iye unomutsa guŋgwa, kuti mafuŋgu aro atinhire, Jehova wehondo ndiro zita rake:
Kana mirairo iyi ikabva pamberi paŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ipapo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋo ʋaŋgaguma ʋo kuʋa rudzi pamberi paŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana ɗeŋga kumsoro ricibvira kuyerwa, nenheyo dzenyika pasi dzicibvira kunɀerwa, ipapo neni ʋo ndicarasha ʋana ʋose ʋaIsraeri nokuɗa kweɀose ɀaʋakaita — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — acaʋakirwa Jehova guta kubva pashoŋgwe yaHananeri kuȿikira kusuʋo rekona.
Ʋuye rwonzi rwokuyera narwo rucapfuʋura ruciruramira kucikomo ceGarebi, ndokudzoka kuȿikira paGoa.

Mupata wose weɀitunha nowamaɗota, neminda yose kuȿikira kurukoʋa Kidroni, kuȿikira kukona resuʋo ramabiza kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, ɀicaʋa ɀitȿene kunaJehova; haɀiŋgazodzurwi, kana kuparadzwa nokusiŋgaperi.
Shoko rakaʋuya kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova negore regumi raZedekia mambo waJuda, riri gore regumi namasere raNebukadrezari.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo mambo wehondo yeBabironi wakaŋga akakomberedza Jerusarema; asi muprofita Jeremia wakaŋga akapfigirwa muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi, rwakaŋga ruri mumba mamambo waJuda.
Nokuti Zedekia mambo waJuda wakaŋga amupfigira, aciti: Unoprofitereiko uciti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaisa guta rino muruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi, iye ucarikunda;
Zedekia mambo waJuda haaŋgapukunyuki pamaʋoko aʋaKardea, asi ucaiswa ɀirokwaɀo muruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi, ʋacataurirana nemiromo yaʋo, nokuʋonana nameso aʋo;
iye ucandoisa Zedekia Babironi, agare’ko kuȿikira ndicimushanyira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; kunyaŋge mukarwa naʋaKardea hamuŋgakundi?
Jeremia akati: Shoko raJehova rakaʋuya kwandiri, riciti:
Tarira, Hanameri mŋanakomana waSharumi, sekuru ʋako, ucaʋuya kwauri, aciti: Ɀiteŋgere munda waŋgu uri paAnatoti, nokuti ndiwe unesimba rokuudzikinura nokuuteŋga.

Naiɀoɀo Hanameri mŋanakomana wasekuru ʋaŋgu wakaʋuya kwandiri muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi, seɀakarebga neshoko raJehova, akati kwandiri: Ƌonditeŋgera hako munda waŋgu uri paAnatoti, riri munyika yaBenjamini, nokuti ndiwe unesimba rokugara nhaka, ndiwe unofanira kudzikinura; ciɀiteŋgera iwo. Ipapo ndakaziʋa kuti ishoko raJehova.
Ndikateŋga munda wakaŋga uri paAnatoti kunaHanameri mŋanakomana wasekuru ʋaŋgu, ndikamuyerera mari, mashekeri esirveri anegumi namanomŋe.
Ndikanyora rugwaro rwokuteŋga, ndikarunamatidza, ndikaɗana ɀapupu, ndikamuyerera mari paciyero.
Ipapo ndikatora rugwaro rwokuteŋga, irwo rwakaŋga rwakanamatidzwa, seɀakarebga nomurairo netsika, norumŋe rwakaŋga rwakashama,
ndikapa Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria, mŋanakomana waMaseia, rugwaro rwokuteŋga, Hanameri
Ndikaraira Baruki pamberi paʋo, ndiciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tora magwaro awa okuteŋga, rugwaro urwu rwokuteŋga rwakanamatidzwa, norugwaro urwu rwakashama, uɀiise mumudziyo wevu, ɀigare’mo mazuʋa mazhinji.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Dzimba neminda neminda yemizambiriŋga ɀicazoteŋgwa ɀe munyika ino.
Ɀino ndakati ndapa Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria rugwaro rwokuteŋga, ndikanyeŋgetera kunaJehova, ndiciti:
Haiwa, Ishe Jehova! Tarirai, imi makaita ɗeŋga rose napasi nesimba renyu guru noruʋoko rwenyu rwakatambanudzwa, hakunecinhu ciŋgakukonai imi;
imi, munonzwira tsitsi ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana, nokutsiʋa ɀakaipa ɀamadziɓaɓa mucifuʋa caʋana ʋaʋo ʋanoʋateʋera, iye mukuru, Mŋari unesimba, Jehova wehondo, ndiro zita rake;
wakakura panjere, unesimba pakuɓata, meso ake anoȿinurira nzira dzose dzaʋana ʋaʋanhu, kuti ape mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakaɓata, neɀakafanira ɀiɓereko ɀamaɓasa ake;
iye, wakaisa ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso panyika yeEgipita kuȿikira pazuʋa ranhasi, pakati paIsraeri napakati paʋamŋe ʋanhu; mukaɀiitira mbiri seɀaɀakaita nezuʋa ranhasi;
mukaɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri panyika yeEgipita, neɀiratidzo neɀishamiso necanza cinesimba, noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ʋuye nokutyisa kukuru;
mukaʋapa nyika ino, yamakapikira madziɓaɓa aʋo kuti mucaʋapa, iri nyika inoyerera mukaka noʋuci;
ʋakapinda, ʋakaiita yaʋo; asi haʋana‐kuterera inzwi renyu, kana kufamba nemirairo yenyu; haʋana‐kutoŋgoita cinhu cimŋe ceɀose ɀamakaʋaraira kuti ʋaɀiite; naiɀoɀo makaʋuyisa iɀi ɀose pamsoro paʋo.
Tarirai, mirwi yokurwa yaȿika paguta kuti ʋarikunde; guta raiswa mumaʋoko aʋaKardea ʋanorwa naro, nokuɗa kwomunondo nenzara nehosha yakaipa; ɀamakataura ɀaitika, tarirai, munoɀiʋona.
Ɀino imi Ishe Jehova, makati kwandiri: Ciɀiteŋgera munda nemari, uɗane ɀapupu, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro guta raiswa mumaʋoko aʋaKardea.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, riciti:
Tarira, ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyama yose, kunecinhu ciŋgandikona here?
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, ndicaisa guta rino mumaʋoko aʋaKardea, nomumaʋoko aNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, iye ucarikunda;

ƲaKardea, ʋanorwa neguta rino, ʋacaʋuya ʋacituŋgidza guta rino, ʋaciripisira, pamŋe cete nedzimba dzaʋakaɓayira pamateŋga adzo ɀinonhuwira kunaBaari, nokuɗururira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, kuti ʋanditsamŋise.
Nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋana ʋaJuda ʋaiŋgoita ɀakaipa ɀoga pamberi paŋgu kubva paʋuɗuku bgaʋo; nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋakaŋgonditsamŋisa ɓedzi namaɓasa amaʋoko aʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti guta rino rakamutsa kutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu kubva pazuʋa raʋakariʋaka kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, kuti ndiribvise pamberi paŋgu,
nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀose ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋana ʋaJuda, ɀaʋakaita ʋacinditsamŋisa, iʋo namadzimambo aʋo, namacinda aʋo, naʋaprista ʋaʋo, naʋaprofita ʋaʋo, naʋanhu ʋaJuda, naʋagere Jerusarema.
Ʋakandifuratira, haʋana‐kunditarira neɀiso ɀaʋo; kunyaŋge ndaiʋadzidzisa, ndicimuka maŋgwanani ndiciʋadzidzisa, asi haʋana‐kuterera nokutenda kuraŋgwa.
Asi ʋakaisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo muimba yakatumidzwa zita raŋgu, kuti ʋaiȿiɓise.
Ʋakaʋaka mitunhu yaBaari, iri mumupata womŋanakomana waHinomi, kuti ʋapinzire Moreki ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri pamsoro peguta rino, ramunoti rakaiswa muruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi nomunondo, nenzara ʋuye nehosha yakaipa:
Tarirai, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza kunyika dzose kwandakaŋga ndaʋadziŋgira nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu, ʋuye neshuŋgu dzaŋgu huru, ndicaʋadzosera ɀe kunɀimbo ino, nokuʋagarisa ʋakaceŋgetwa.
Iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Ndicaʋapa mŋoyo mumŋe nenzira imŋe, kuti ʋanditye nokusiŋgaperi, ʋaitirwe ɀakanaka iʋo, naʋana ʋaʋo ʋanoʋateʋera.
Ndicaita naʋo suŋgano isiŋgaperi, handiŋgadzoki pakuʋateʋera kuti ndiʋaitire ɀakanaka; ndicaisa
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicaʋafarira kuti ndiʋaitire ɀakanaka, ndicaʋasima ɀirokwaɀo munyika ino nomŋoyo waŋgu wose ʋuye nomŋeya waŋgu wose.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Seɀandakaʋuyisa ɀakaipa iɀi ɀikuru ɀose pamsoro paʋanhu aʋa, saiɀoɀo ʋo ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo ɀakanaka ɀose ɀandakaʋapikira.
Minda icateŋgwa munyika ino yamunoti iɗoŋgo, hainaʋanhu kana ɀipfuwo, yaiswa mumaʋoko aʋaKardea.

Ʋanhu ʋacateŋga minda nemari, nokunyora magwaro okuteŋga, nokuanamatidza, nokuɗana ɀapupu, panyika yaBenjamini, napanɀimbo dzakapoteredza Jerusarema, nomumaguta aJuda, nomumaguta enyika yamakomo, nomumaguta amapani, nomumaguta orutiʋi rwezasi; nokuti ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe rwecipiri kunaJeremia, acakapfigirwa muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, iye unoɀiita, iye Jehova unoɀiʋumba nokuɀisimbisa, Jehova ndiro zita rake:
Ƌanai kwandiri, ndicakupindurai, ndicakuratidzai ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀakaʋanzika, ɀamusiŋgaziʋi.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri pamsoro pedzimba dzeguta rino, napamsoro pedzimba dzamadzimambo aJuda, dzakakoromorwa kuzorwa nemirwi yokurwa neminondo:
Ʋanoʋuya haʋo kurwa naʋaKardea, asi ʋanodzizadza neɀitunha ɀaʋanhu ʋandakaʋuraya nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu, ndikaʋanzira guta rino ciso caŋgu nokuɗa kwokuipa kwaʋo kwose.
Tarirai, ndicaʋaʋigira mufaro pamuʋiri nokupora, ini ndicaʋaporesa; ndicaʋaratidza rugare rwakawanda neɀokwaɗi yakawanda.
Ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaJuda nokutapxa kwaIsraeri, ndicaʋaʋaka sapakutaŋga.
Ndicaʋanatsa paɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose ɀaʋakanditadzira naɀo, ndicakaŋganwira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose ɀaʋakanditadzira naɀo, neɀaʋakandiɗarikira naɀo.

ricaʋa kwandiri mbiri yomufaro, nokurumbidzwa nokukudzwa, pamberi pamarudzi ose enyika, acanzwa ɀakanaka ɀose ɀandicaʋaitira; ʋacatya nokuɗeɗera pamsoro peɀakanaka ɀose norugare rwose ɀandicariʋigira.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Panɀimbo ino yamunoti yakaparadzwa, hainaʋanhu kana ɀipfuwo, imo mumaguta aJuda, nomunzira dzomuJerusarema, maŋgoʋa neɗoŋgo, musinaʋanhu ʋagere’mo, kana ɀipfuwo, pacanzwika ɀe
inzwi romufaro nokufarisisa, inzwi recikomba nenzwi romŋeŋga, nenzwi raʋanoti: Ʋoŋgai Jehova wehondo, nokuti Jehova wakanaka, nokuti ŋgoni dzake dziri’po nokusiŋgaperi; ʋuye neraʋanoʋuya ne
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Panɀimbo ino yakaparadzwa, isinaʋanhu kana ɀipfuwo, napamaguta ari’po, pacaʋa ɀe namafuro aʋafudzi, ʋanoʋatisa makwai aʋo pasi.

Mumaguta enyika yamakomo, mumaguta amapani, mumaguta orutiʋi rwezasi, napanyika yaBenjamini, napanɀimbo dzakapoteredza Jerusarema, nomumaguta aJuda, makwai acapfuʋura ɀe pasi poruʋoko rwounoaʋereŋga — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — andicaita shoko iro rakanaka randakataura pamsoro peimba yaIsraeri napamsoro peimba yaJuda.
Namazuʋa iwayo, neŋguʋa iyo, ndicamedzera Davidi ɗaʋi rokururama; iye ucaruramisira
Namazuʋa iwayo Juda ʋacaponeswa, Jerusarema ricagara rakaceŋgetwa;
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Davidi haaŋgatoŋgoshaiwi munhu unogara pacigaro coʋushe ceimba yaIsraeri;
naʋaprista ʋaRevi haʋaŋgashaiwi munhu pamberi paŋgu uŋgapisa ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa nokupisa ɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, nokugara aciɓayira.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana muŋgagona kuputsa suŋgano yaŋgu yamasikati nesuŋgano yaŋgu yoʋusiku, kukarega kuʋa namasikati noʋusiku neŋguʋa yaɀo;
ipapo suŋgano yaŋgu naDavidi muranda waŋgu iŋgaputswa ʋo, akasaʋa nomŋanakomana uŋgaɓata ʋushe pacigaro cake coʋushe; saiɀoɀo ʋo naʋaRevi, ʋaprista, ʋashumiri ʋaŋgu.
Hondo yokuɗeŋga seɀaisiŋgabviri kuʋereŋgwa, kana jeca reguŋgwa kuyerwa, saiɀoɀo ndicawanza ʋana ʋaDavidi muranda waŋgu, naʋaRevi ʋanondishumira.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, riciti:
Hauraŋgariri ɀakataurwa naʋanhu aʋa, ɀaʋakati: Marudzi maʋiri akatsaurwa naJehova, akarashwa naye? Saiɀoɀo ʋanoɀidza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋaciti haʋaci rudzi pamberi paʋo.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kana suŋgano yaŋgu yamasikati noʋusiku isi’po, kana ndisinakutemera ɗeŋga napasi mirairo;
ipapo ndicarasha ʋo ʋana ʋaJakobo, naʋaDavidi muranda waŋgu, kuti ndirege kutora ʋamŋe ʋaʋana ʋake ʋaʋe ʋaɓati ʋaʋana ʋaAbrahama naIsaka naJakobo; nokuti ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaʋo nokuʋanzwira nyasha.

Shoko, rakaȿika kunaJeremia, ricibva kunaJehova, paŋguʋa iyo Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, nehondo yake yose, noʋushe bgose bgenyika bgakaŋga bgakaɓatwa naye, namarudzi ose, ʋacirwa neJerusarema namaguta ose aro, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Enda, undotaura naZedekia mambo waJuda, uti kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, ndicaisa guta rino muruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi, iye ucaripisa nomŋoto;
newe hauŋgapukunyuki paruʋoko rwake, asi ɀirokwaɀo ucaɓatwa, nokuiswa muruʋoko rwake; meso ako acaʋona meso amambo weBabironi, mucataurirana nemiromo yenyu, iwe ucaenda Babironi.
Asi cinzwa shoko raJehova, iwe Zedekia mambo waJuda: Ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro pako: Iwe hauŋgaʋurawi nomunondo;
iwe ucafa norugare; seɀaʋakapisira madziɓaɓa ako, iwo madzimambo akare akakutaŋgira, saiɀoɀo ʋacakupisira ʋo; ʋacakucema
Ipapo muprofita Jeremia akataura mashoko awa ose kunaZedekia mambo waJuda paJerusarema,
neŋguʋa yakarwa hondo yamambo weBabironi neJerusarema ʋuye namaguta ose aJuda akaŋga asara, neRakishi neAzeka, nokuti ndiyo yakaŋga yasara pamaguta aJuda, ari maguta akakombga noruȿiŋgo.
Shoko, rakaȿika kunaJeremia, ricibva kunaJehova, mambo Zedekia aita suŋgano naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari Jerusarema, aciʋaparidzira kuti ʋakasunuŋgurwa,
kuti mumŋe nomumŋe unofanira kutendera muranda wake, nomumŋe nomumŋe mushandiri wake, waiʋa muHeberu, murume kana mukadzi, kuti aende hake; kuti kurege kuʋa nomuJuda unoita hama yake muranda.

Macinda ose naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaterera, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋatenda suŋgano, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe atendere muranda wake nomumŋe nomumŋe mushandiri wake kuti ʋaende haʋo, kuti kurege kuzoʋa nomunhu unoʋaita ʋaranda; ʋakaterera, ʋakaʋatendera kuenda.
Asi pashure ʋakashanduka, ʋakadzosa ʋaranda naʋashandiri, ʋaʋakaŋga ʋambotendera kuenda, ʋakaʋamanikidza ɀe kuti ʋaʋe ʋaranda naʋashandiri.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ndakaita suŋgano namadziɓaɓa enyu, paŋguʋa yandakaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, muimba yoʋuranda, ndiciti:

Kana makore manomŋe apera, munofanira mumŋe nomumŋe kutendera hama yake muHeberu kuti aende hake, iye wakaŋga akateŋgeswa kwauri, akakuɓatira makore matanhatu, unofanira kumutendera kuti aende hake, abve kwauri; asi madziɓaɓa enyu haanakunditerera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo.
Ɀino imi makaŋga madzoka henyu, mukaita ɀakarurama pamberi paŋgu, ɀamakaparidzira mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake kuti uŋgasunuŋgurwa; makaŋga maita suŋgano pamberi paŋgu muimba panoɗanwa zita raŋgu;

asi makadzoka, mukamhura zita raŋgu, mukadzosa mumŋe nomumŋe muranda wake nomumŋe nomumŋe mushandiri wake, ʋamakaŋga matendera kuti ʋaende haʋo nokuɗa kwaʋo, mukaʋamanikidza ɀe kuti ʋaʋe ʋaranda naʋashandiri ʋenyu.

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Hamuna‐kunditerera, mukaparidzira mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake nomumŋe nomumŋe wokwake kuti uŋgasunuŋgurwa hake; tarirai, ini ndinokuparidzirai kuti mucasunuŋgurirwa munondo, nehosha yakaipa, nenzara — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicakuitai cinhu cinotyisa ʋushe bgose bgenyika.
Ʋarume ʋakaɗarika suŋgano yaŋgu, ʋakasaita mashoko esuŋgano yaʋakaita neni, ndicaʋaita semhuru yaʋakagura napakati ʋakapfuʋura napakati penhindi dzayo;
macinda aJuda, namacinda eJerusarema, naʋaranda
iʋo ndicaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, nomumaʋoko aʋanotȿaka kuʋaʋuraya, ɀitunha ɀaʋo ɀicaʋa ɀokudya ɀeshiri dzokuɗeŋga neɀeɀikara ɀenyika.
Naiye Zedekia mambo waJuda namacinda ake ndicaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo nomumaʋoko aʋanotȿaka kuʋaʋuraya, nomumaʋoko ehondo yamambo weBabironi, ʋakaenda ʋacibva kwamuri.
Tarirai, ndicaʋaraira nokuʋadzosera kuguta rino — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ʋacarwa naro, nokurikunda, nokuripisa nomŋoto; ndicaita maguta aJuda matoŋgo, asinaʋanogara’mo.
Shoko, rakaȿika kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova namazuʋa aJehoiakimi, mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, riciti:
Enda kuimba yaʋaRekabi, utaure naʋo, uʋuye naʋo mumba maJehova, muneimŋe kamuri, uʋape waini ʋanwe.
Ipapo ndakatora Jaazania mŋanakomana waJeremia, mŋanakomana waHabazinia, nehama dzake, naʋanakomana ʋake ʋose, neimba yose yaʋaRekabi,

ndikaʋaisa mumba maJehova, mukamuri yaʋanakomana ʋaHanani mŋanakomana waIgdaria, munhu waMŋari, yaiʋa pedyo nekamuri yamacinda, yakaŋga iri pamsoro pekamuri yaMaaseia mŋanakomana waSharumi, mutariri wecikumbaridzo.
Ndikagadza pamberi paʋanakomana ʋeimba yaʋaRekabi mbiya dzizere newaini nemikombe, ndikati kwaʋari: Inwai waini.
Asi iʋo ʋakati: Hatiŋganwi waini, nokuti Jonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, ʋakatiraira ʋaciti: Regai kunwa waini, imi, naʋanakomana ʋenyu nokusiŋgaperi;

ʋuye musaʋaka dzimba, kana kudɀara mbeu, kana kurima minda yemizambiriŋga, kana kuʋa naɀo; asi munofanira kugara mumatente mazuʋa enyu ose, kuti mugare mazuʋa mazhinji munyika mamunogara muri ʋatorwa.
Ɀino takaterera inzwi raJonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, paɀose ɀaʋakatiraira, ʋaciti tirege kunwa waini mazuʋa eɗu ose, isu, naʋakadzi ʋeɗu, naʋanakomana ʋeɗu, naʋakunda ʋeɗu;
kana kuɀiʋakira dzimba matiŋgagara; ʋuye hatineminda yemizambiriŋga, kana mimŋe minda, kana mbeu;
asi takagara mumatente, tikaterera, tikaita ɀose seɀatakarairwa naJonadabi ɓaɓa ʋeɗu.
Asi Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi wakati aciȿika munyika
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Enda undoʋudza ʋarume ʋaJuda, naʋagere Jerusarema,

Mashoko aJonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi, aakaraira ʋanakomana ʋake, kuti ʋarege kunwa waini, anotererwa; kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi haʋanwi, nokuti ʋanoterera murairo waɓaɓa ʋaʋo. Asi ini ndakataura nemi, ndicimuka maŋgwanani ndicitaura; asi hamuna‐kunditerera.

Ndakatuma ʋo kwamuri ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋaʋaprofita, ndicimuka maŋgwanani, ndiciʋatuma, ndiciti: Dzokai ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa, munatse ɀamunoita, murege kuteʋera ʋamŋe ʋamŋari muciʋashumira, ipapo mucagara panyika yandakakupai imi namadziɓaɓa enyu; asi hamuna‐kurerekera nzeʋe dzenyu, kana kunditerera.
Ʋanakomana ʋaJonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi ʋakaterera murairo waɓaɓa ʋaʋo, waakaʋaraira, asi ʋanhu aʋa haʋana‐kunditerera;

naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri; Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro paJuda napamsoro paʋose ʋagere Jerusarema ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandakareʋa pamsoro paʋo; nokuti ndakataura naʋo, asi haʋana‐kunzwa, ndakaʋaɗana, asi haʋana‐kuɗaʋira.
Ɀino Jeremia akati kuimba yaʋaRekabi: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ɀamakaterera murairo waJonadabi ɓaɓa ʋenyu, mukaceŋgeta ɀireʋo ɀaʋo ɀose, mukaita ɀose seɀamakarairwa naʋo;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, iye Mŋari waIsraeri: Jonadabi mŋanakomana waRekabi haaŋgashaiwi munhu uŋgamira pamberi paŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino negore recinna raJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, shoko iri rakaȿika kunaJeremia ricibva kunaJehova, riciti:
Tora rugwaro rwakapetwa unyore’mo mashoko ose andakakuʋudza pamsoro paIsraeri, napamsoro paJuda, napamsoro pamarudzi ose, kubva pazuʋa randakataura newe, kubva pamazuʋa aJosia kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀimŋe imba yaJuda ʋacanzwa ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandinofuŋga kuʋaitira, kuti ʋadzoke mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa, ndiʋakaŋganwire kuipa kwaʋo neɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Ipapo Jeremia wakaɗana Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria, Baruki akanyora parugwaro rwakapetwa mashoko ose aJehova akabva mumuromo waJeremia, aakataura kwaari.
Jeremia akaraira Baruki, aciti: Ini ndakadziʋiswa, handigoni kupinda mumba maJehova.
Naiɀoɀo cienda iwe, undoraʋa murugwaro rwakapetwa, mawanyora ɀakabva pamuromo waŋgu, mashoko aJehova
Ɀimŋe kunyeŋgetera kwaʋo kucaȿika pamberi paJehova, ʋakadzoka mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa; nokuti kutsamŋa nehasha ɀakarebga naJehova pamsoro paʋanhu aʋa kwakakura kwaɀo.
Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria akaita ɀose seɀaakarairwa nomuprofita Jeremia, akaraʋa mubuku mashoko aJehova mumba maJehova.

Ɀino negore recishanu raJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, nomŋedzi wepfumbamŋe, ʋanhu ʋose ʋeJerusarema, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋabva kumaguta aJuda ʋaciʋuya Jerusarema, ʋakatara zuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya pamberi paJehova.

Ipapo Baruki akaraʋa mubuku mashoko aJeremia mumba maJehova, mukamuri yaGemaria mŋanakomana womunyori Shafani, muruʋazhe rwokumsoro, paʋaipinda pasuʋo idɀa reimba yaJehova, ʋanhu ʋose ʋaciɀinzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo.
Ɀino Micaia mŋanakomana waGemaria, mŋanakomana waShafani, wakati anzwa mashoko ose aJehova mubuku,
akaɓurukira kumba kwamambo, mukamuri yomunyori, wanei, macinda ose agere’po,
Ipapo Mikaia akaʋaparadzira mashoko ose aakanzwa, Baruki aciraʋa mubuku ʋanhu ʋaciɀinzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo.

Naiɀoɀo macinda ose akatuma Jehudi mŋanakomana waNetania, mŋanakomana waSheremia, mŋanakomana waKushi, kunaBaruki, aciti: Ƃata muruʋoko rwako rugwaro rwakapetwa mawakaraʋa ɀicinzwika nenzeʋe dzaʋanhu, uʋuye. Ipapo Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria wakaɓata rugwaro rwakapetwa muruʋoko rwake, akaenda kwaʋari.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ɀino cigara pasi, uiraʋe tinzwe nenzeʋe dzeɗu. Ipapo Baruki wakaʋaraʋira ʋakanzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanzwa mashoko ose, ʋakatarirana ʋacitya, ʋakati kunaBaruki: Ɀirokwaɀo ticaʋudza mambo mashoko awa ose.
Ʋakabvunza Baruki, ʋaciti: Ɀino citiʋudza kuti wakanyora mashoko awa ose sei, acibva mumuromo make.
Ipapo Baruki akaʋapindura, akati: Wakandiparidzira mashoko awa ose nomuromo wake, ndikaanyora neiŋgi mubuku.
Ipapo macinda akati kunaBaruki: Endai mundoʋanda, iwe naJeremia, kurege kuʋa nomunhu unoziʋa kwamuri.
Iʋo ndokupinda kunamambo muruʋazhe, asi ʋakaŋga ʋaʋiga rugwaro rwakapetwa mukamuri yomunyori Erishama; ʋakaʋudza mambo mashoko ose aciɀinzwa nenzeʋe dzake.

Ipapo mambo akatuma Jehudi kundotora rugwaro rwakapetwa, iye akandorutora mukamuri yomunyori Erishama. Jehudi akaraʋira mambo aciɀinzwa nenzeʋe dzake, namacinda ose akaŋga amire namambo iʋo ʋacinzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo.
Ɀino mambo wakaŋga agere muimba
Ɀino Jehudi wakati apedza kuraʋa ɀikamu ɀitatu kana ɀinna,
Asi haʋana‐kutya, kana kubvarura ŋguʋo dzaʋo, kunyaŋge mambo kunyaŋge nomumŋe waʋaranda ʋake ʋakanzwa mashoko awa ose.
Ernatani naDeraia naGemaria ʋakaŋga ʋanyeŋgetera haʋo mambo kuti arege kupisa rugwaro rwakapetwa, asi haana‐kuʋaterera.
