Mambo akaraira Jerameeri mŋanakomana wamambo, naSeraia mŋanakomana waAzrieri, naSheremia mŋanakomana waAbdeeri, kuti ʋaɓate munyori Baruki nomuprofita Jeremia; asi Jehova wakaʋaʋanza.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, mambo apisa rugwaro rwakapetwa, namashoko akaŋga anyorwa naBaruki acibva mumuromo waJeremia, riciti:
Citora ɀe rumŋe rugwaro rwakapetwa unyore’mo ɀe mashoko ose okutaŋga, akaŋga ari murugwaro rwakapetwa rwokutaŋga, rwakapiswa naJehoiakimi mambo waJuda.

Ʋuye pamsoro paJehoiakimi mambo waʋaJuda, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Wapisa rugwaro urwu rwakapetwa, uciti: Wanyorerei’mo uciti: Ɀirokwaɀo mambo weBabironi ucaʋuya kuparadza nyika ino, nokubvisa’po ʋanhu neɀipfuwo?
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paJehoiakimi mambo waJuda: Haaŋgaʋi nomumŋe ucagara pacigaro coʋushe caDavidi; citunha cake cicakandirwa kunze masikati kana kucipisa, noʋusiku kana kunecando.

Ndicamuroʋa iye naʋana ʋake naʋaranda ʋake nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋo; ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo, napamsoro paʋagere Jerusarema, napamsoro paʋarume ʋaJuda, ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandakareʋa pamsoro paʋo, asi haʋana‐kuterera.

Ipapo Jeremia wakatora rumŋe rugwaro rwakapetwa, akarupa munyori Baruki, mŋanakomana waNeria, iye akanyora’mo mashoko ose akabva mumuromo waJeremia, aiʋa mubuku yakapiswa mumŋoto naJehoiakimi mambo waJuda; mamŋe mashoko mazhinji akafanana nawo akawedzerwa ʋo.
Ɀino Zedekia mŋanakomana waJosia wakaɓata ʋushe ari mambo panɀimbo yaKonia mŋanakomana waJehoiakimi, wakaŋga apiwa ʋushe munyika yaJuda naNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi.
Asi iye, kunyaŋge ʋaranda ʋake, kana ʋanhu ʋenyika, haʋana‐kuterera mashoko aJehova, aakataura nomuprofita Jeremia.
Ɀino mambo Zedekia wakatuma Jehukari mŋanakomana waSheremia, naZefania mŋanakomana womuprista Maaseia, kunomuprofita Jeremia, aciti: Tinyeŋgeterere hako ɀino kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀino Jeremia wakaŋga aciŋgopinda nokuɓuɗa hake pakati paʋanhu, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacigere kumusuŋga mutoroŋgo.
Hondo yaFarao yakaŋga yabva ʋo Egipita; ɀino ʋaKardea, ʋakaŋga ʋakakomba Jerusarema, ʋakati ʋacinzwa ɀaʋo, ʋakarega
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kumuprofita Jeremia, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri: Itiyi kunamambo waJuda wakakutumai kuzondibvunza: Tarirai, hondo yaFarao, yakaʋuya kuzokuɓatsirai, icadzokera Egipita kunyika yaʋo.
ƲaKardea ʋacaʋuya ɀe ʋacirwa neguta rino; ʋacarikunda, nokuripisa nomŋoto.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Musaɀinyeŋgera henyu, muciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋaKardea ʋacabva kwatiri, nokuti haʋaŋgabvi.
Nokuti kunyaŋge maikunda henyu hondo yose yaʋaKardea, ʋanorwa nemi, kukaŋgosara kwaʋari ʋanhu ʋakakuʋadzwa ɓedzi, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋaisimuka, mumŋe nomumŋe mutente rake, ʋakapisa guta rino nomŋoto.
Ɀino hondo yaʋaKardea yakati yarega
Jeremia akaɓuɗa Jerusarema aciɗa kuenda kunyika yaʋaBenjamini, kuzopiwa mugoʋe wake’po pakati paʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀino wakati ari pasuʋo raBenjamini, mumŋe mukuru waʋarindi akaȿika’po, wainzi Irija mŋanakomana waSheremia, mŋanakomana waHanania, iye akaɓata muprofita Jeremia, aciti: Iwe wo
Jeremia akati: Inhema, handi
Macinda akaitira Jeremia hasha, akamuroʋa, ndokumuisa mutoroŋgo mumba momunyori Jonatani; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaiita toroŋgo.
Ɀino Jeremia wakati apinda mutoroŋgo yegomba, nomumakamuri ayo, Jeremia agara’mo mazuʋa mazhinji,
mambo Zedekia akatuma
Jeremia akati ʋo kunamambo Zedekia: Ndakakutadzirai neiko, imi, kana ʋaranda ʋenyu, kana ʋanhu aʋa, ɀamakandisuŋga mutoroŋgo?
Ko ɀino ʋaprofita ʋenyu ʋaripi, iʋo ʋaikuprofiterai, ʋaciti: Mambo weBabironi haaŋgaʋuyi kuzorwa nemi, kana kurwa nenyika ino?
Ɀino ciɗonzwai henyu, ishe waŋgu mambo; kunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu ŋgakuȿike pamberi penyu, kuti murege kundidzosa ɀe kumba kwomunyori Jonatani, ndirege kufira’po.

Ipapo mambo Zedekia wakatema cireʋo, ʋakaisa Jeremia kuruʋazhe rwaʋarindi, ʋakamupa zuʋa rimŋe nerime ɓundu reciŋgwa, raibva munzira yomuguta yainzi yaʋaɓiki ʋeciŋgwa, kuȿikira ciŋgwa cose capera muguta. Saiɀoɀo Jeremia akagara muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi.
Ɀino Shefatia mŋanakomana waMatani, naGedaria mŋanakomana waPashuri, naJukari mŋanakomana waSheremia, naPashuri mŋanakomana waMarkija, ʋakanzwa mashoko akataurwa naJeremia kuʋanhu ʋose, aciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova: Aninani unorambira muguta rino ucaʋurawa nomunondo, nenzara, ʋuye nehosha yakaipa, asi unoɓuɗa akaenda kuʋaKardea ucararama, ʋupenyu bgake ʋucaʋa kwaari cinhu cakapambga, ucararama.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ɀirokwaɀo guta rino ricaiswa mumaʋoko ehondo yamambo weBabironi, iye ucarikunda.

Ipapo macinda akati kunamambo: Tinokumbira kuti munhu uyu aʋurawe, nokuti unoshaisa simba maʋoko aʋarwi ʋakasara muguta rino, namaʋoko aʋanhu ʋose nokutaura kwake mashoko akaɗai kwaʋari; nokuti munhu uyu haatȿaki mufaro waʋanhu aʋa asi kuti ʋaʋe nenjodzi.
Mambo Zedekia ndokuti: Tarirai, uri pamaʋoko enyu, nokuti mambo haaŋgaiti cinhu camusiŋgaɗi.

Ipapo ʋakatora Jeremia, ʋakamukandira mugomba raMarkija mŋanakomana wamambo, rakaŋga riri muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi; ʋakaɓurusa Jeremia namaɓote. Mugomba makaŋga musinemvura asi matope; Jeremia akanyura mumatope.
Ɀino muEtiopia Ebedi‐mereki, waiʋa muranda mumba mamambo, wakati anzwa kuti ʋakaisa Jeremia mugomba (ɀino mambo wakaŋga agere musuʋo raBenjamini),
Ebedi‐mereki akaɓuɗa mumba mamambo, akataura namambo, aciti:
Ishe waŋgu mambo, ʋanhu aʋa ʋakaita ɀakaipa paɀose ɀaʋakaitira muprofita Jeremia, waʋakakandira mugomba; ɀino iye uneŋge ucafira panɀimbo iyo paari, nemhaka yenzara; nokuti hakucineciŋgwa muguta.
Ipapo mambo akaraira muEtiopia Ebedi‐mereki, akati: Tora pano ʋanhu ʋanamakumi matatu, undoɓuɗisa muprofita Jeremia mugomba asati afa.
Ipapo Ebedi‐mereki akatora ʋanhu iʋaʋo, akaenda naʋo mumba mamambo pasi peciʋigiro cefuma, akatora’po mamvemve neŋguʋo dzakasakara, akaɀiɓurusira namaɓote mugomba kunaJeremia.
MuEtiopia Ebedi‐mereki akati kunaJeremia: Ɀino ciisai mamvemve awa neŋguʋo dzakasakara muhapxa dzenyu munyasi mamaɓote. Jeremia akaita saiɀoɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakakwidza Jeremia namaɓote, ʋakamuɓuɗisa mugomba, Jeremia akagara muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi.
Ipapo mambo Zedekia akatuma
Ipapo Jeremia akati kunaZedekia: Kana ndikakuziʋisai iɀoɀo, hamuŋgatoŋgondiʋurayi here? Kana ndikakupai zano, hamuŋganditereri.
Naiɀoɀo mambo Zedekia wakapikira Jeremia cinyerere, akati: NaJehova mupenyu, wakatipa ʋupenyu ubgu, handiŋgakuʋurayi, kana kukuisa mumaʋoko aʋanhu aʋa ʋanotȿaka kukuʋuraya.

Ipapo Jeremia akati kunaZedekia: Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Kana mukatenda kuenda kumacinda amambo weBabironi, mŋeya wenyu ucararama, neguta rino hariŋgapiswi nomŋoto; imi mucararama, neimba yenyu.
Asi kana mukaramba kuenda kumacinda amambo weBabironi, ipapo guta rino ricaiswa mumaʋoko aʋaKardea, iʋo ʋacaripisa nomŋoto, nemi hamuŋgapukunyuki pamaʋoko aʋo.
Ipapo mambo Zedekia akati kunaJeremia: Ndinotya ʋaJuda, ʋaka
Asi Jeremia wakati: Haʋaŋgakuisiyi
Asi kana mukaramba kuenda, heri shoko randakaziʋiswa naJehova:
Tarirai, ʋakadzi ʋose ʋakasara mumba mamambo waJuda, ʋacaɓuɗisirwa kumacinda amambo weBabironi; ɀino ʋakadzi aʋo ʋacati: Shamŋari dzenyu dzinoɗikanwa nemi ndidzo dzakakunyeŋgerai, dzikakukundai;
Ʋacaɓuɗisira ʋakadzi ʋenyu ʋose naʋana ʋenyu kuʋaKardea; nemi ʋo hamuŋgapukunyuki pamaʋoko aʋo asi mucaɓatwa noruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi; imi mucapisisa guta rino nomŋoto.
Ipapo Zedekia akati kunaJeremia: Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unoziʋiswa mashoko awa, ipapo iwe hauŋgaʋurawi.
Asi kana macinda akanzwa kuti ndakataura newe, ʋakaʋuya kwauri, ʋaciti: Citiziʋisa ɀino ɀawaʋudza mambo; usatiʋanzira iɀoɀo, isu tigosakuʋuraya; ʋuye ʋo ɀose ɀawakaʋudzwa namambo;
ipapo uti kwaʋari: Ndakaȿitsa munyeŋgetero waŋgu kunamambo, kuti arege kundidzosa kumba kwaJonatani, kuti ndifire’ko.
Ɀino macinda ose akaʋuya kunaJeremia, akamubvunza, akaʋaʋudza mashoko awa ose seɀakaŋga ɀarairwa namambo. Naiɀoɀo ʋakarega kuzotaura naye, nokuti shoko rakaŋga risina‐kuzikanwa.
Naiɀoɀo Jeremia wakaramba agere muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi kuȿikira zuʋa rakakundwa Jerusarema.
Ɀino Jerusarema rakati rakundwa, negore repfumbamŋe raZedekia mambo waJuda, nomŋedzi wegumi, Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi akaʋuya nehondo yake yose kuzorwa neJerusarema, ndokurikomba.
Ɀino negore regumi nerimŋe raZedekia, nomŋedzi wecinna, nezuʋa repfumbamŋe romŋedzi ʋakakoromora ruȿiŋgo rweguta,
macinda ose amambo weBabironi akapinda, akagara pasi musuʋo rapakati,
Ɀino Zedekia mambo waJuda naʋarwi ʋose ʋakati ʋaciʋaʋona ʋakatiza, ʋakaɓuɗa muguta ʋusiku, ʋacienda nenzira yokumunda wamambo, napasuʋo raiʋa pakati pamaȿiŋgo maʋiri; akaɓuɗa acienda kumapani.
Asi hondo yaʋaKardea yakadziŋgana naʋo, ʋakaɓata Zedekia pamapani eJeriko; ɀino ʋakati ʋamuɓata, ʋakaenda naye kunaNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi paRibra munyika yeHamati, iye akamutoŋga.
Ipapo mambo weBabironi akaʋuraya ʋanakomana ʋaZedekia paRibra iye akataririra; ʋuye mambo weBabironi wakaʋuraya ʋo ʋakuru ʋose ʋaJuda.
Akatumbura ʋo meso aZedekia, akamusuŋga namaketani kuti amuise Babironi.
ƲaKardea ʋakapisa imba yamambo, nedzimba dzaʋanhu nomŋoto, ʋakakoromora maȿiŋgo eJerusarema.
Ipapo Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akatapa ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasara muguta, naʋashanduki ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kwaari, naʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasara, akaʋaisa Babironi.
Asi Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi wakasiya munyika yaJuda ʋamŋe ʋarombo ʋaʋanhu, ʋakaŋga ʋasinecinhu, akaʋapa minda yemizambiriŋga nemimŋe minda neŋguʋa iyo.
Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi akaraira Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi pamsoro paJeremia, aciti:
Mumuɓate, mumuceŋgete ɀakanaka, murege kumuitira cakaipa; asi mumuitire seɀaanotaura kwamuri.
Naiɀoɀo Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akatuma
iʋo ʋakatuma
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia, paŋguʋa yaakaŋga akapfigirwa muruʋazhe rwaʋarindi, riciti:

Enda, utaure naEbedi‐mereki muEtiopia, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarira, ndicaitira guta rino seɀandakareʋa, ndicariitira ɀakaipa, handiŋgariitiri ɀakanaka; ɀicaitika nezuʋa iro iwe uciɀiʋona.
Asi iwe ndicakurwira nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; iwe hauŋgaiswi mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋaunotya.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndicakuponesa, hauŋgaʋurawi nomunondo, asi ʋupenyu bgako ʋucaʋa kwauri cinhu cakapambga, ɀawakaʋimba neni — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Shoko rakabva kunaJehova, rikaȿika kunaJeremia, asunuŋgurwa paRama naNebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi, ŋguʋa yaakaŋga amuɓata akasuŋgwa namaketani pakati paʋatapxa ʋose ʋeJerusarema naʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋotapxa ʋaciiswa Babironi.
Mukuru waʋarindi akatora Jeremia, akati kwaari: Jehova Mŋari wako wakareʋa ɀakaipa iɀi pamsoro penɀimbo ino;
ɀino Jehova waɀiȿitsa, akaita seɀaakataura; ɀamakatadzira Jehova, mukasaterera inzwi rake, nemhaka iyo cinhu ici cakaʋuya pamsoro penyu.

Ɀino tarira, ndinokusunuŋgurira nhasi maketani ari paruʋoko rwako. Kana uciti ɀakanaka kuenda neni Babironi, ciʋuya, ini ndicakuceŋgeta ɀakanaka; asi kana uciti ɀakaipa kuenda neni Babironi, cirega hako; tarira, nyika yose iri pamberi pako; cienda hako kwaunoti ɀakanaka neɀakarurama kuti uende.
Ɀino wakati acigere kuenda,
Ipapo Jeremia akaenda kunaGedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami paMizpa, akagara naye pakati paʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakasiyiwa munyika.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo, ʋakaŋga ʋari kumasaŋgo, iʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo, ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti mambo weBabironi wakaŋga agadza Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami aʋe muɓati munyika iyo, akaisa
ʋakaʋuya kunaGedaria paMizpa,
Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, mŋanakomana waShafani, akaʋapikira, iʋo naʋanhu ʋaʋo, aciti: Musatya kushumira ʋaKardea; garai henyu panyika, mushumire mambo weBabironi, mugoʋa nomufaro.

Kana ndirini, tarirai, ndicagara paMizpa, kuti ndimire pamberi paʋaKardea, ʋacaʋuya kwatiri; asi imi, ʋuŋganidzai waini neɀiɓereko ɀezhezha namafuta, muɀiise mumidziyo yenyu, mugare mumaguta enyu amakakunda.

Saiɀoɀo ʋo, ʋaJuda ʋose, ʋaiʋa paMoabi, naʋaiʋa pakati paʋana ʋaAmoni, napaEdomi, naʋaiʋa panyika dzose, ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti mambo weBabironi wakaŋga asiya ʋamŋe ʋaJuda, akagadza Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, mŋanakomana waShafani aʋe muɓati waʋo;
ipapo ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakadzoka pose paʋakaŋga ʋadziŋgirwa, ʋakaʋuya kunyika yaJuda, kunaGedaria paMizpa, ʋakaʋuŋganidza waini neɀiɓereko ɀizhinji kwaɀo ɀezhezha.
NaJohanani ʋo, mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo ʋaiʋa kumasaŋgo, ʋakaʋuya kunaGedaria paMizpa,
ʋakati kwaari: Munoziʋa here kuti Baarisi, mambo waʋana ʋaAmoni, wakatuma Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania kuzokuʋurayai? Asi Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami haana‐kuʋatenda.

Ipapo Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea akataura naGedaria paMizpa cinyerere, akati: Nditenderei henyu kuenda ndindoʋuraya Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania, hakuŋgaʋi nomunhu ucaɀiziʋa; ko iye uŋgakuʋurayirei, kuti ʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaʋuŋgana kwamuri ʋapararire, naʋakasara ʋaJuda ʋaparare?
Asi Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami akati kunaJohanani mŋanakomana waKarea: Usaita cinhu ici, nokuti unoreʋa nhema pamsoro paIshmaeri.
Ɀino nomŋedzi wecinomŋe Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania, mŋanakomana waErishama worudzi rwamambo,

Ipapo Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania naʋarume ʋanegumi ʋaiʋa naye ʋakasimuka, ʋakaɓaya Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, mŋanakomana waShafani, nomunondo, ʋakamuʋuraya, iye wakaŋga agadzwa namambo weBabironi aʋe muɓati wenyika iyo.
Ishmaeri akaʋuraya ʋo ʋaJuda ʋose ʋaiʋa naye, naiye Gedaria paMizpa, naʋaKardea ʋakawanikwa’po, ʋaiʋa ʋarwi.
Ɀino nezuʋa recipiri rokuʋuraya kwake Gedaria, kusisinomunhu wakaɀiziʋa,

ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakaȿika’po ʋacibva Shekemi neShiro neSamaria, ʋarume ʋanamakumi masere, ndebvu dzaʋo dzakaʋeʋurwa neŋguʋo dzaʋo dzakabvarurwa, ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiceka‐ceka ʋo, ʋakaɓata mumaʋoko aʋo ɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu neɀinonhuwira, kuti ʋaɀiise mumba maJehova.
Ipapo Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania wakaɓuɗa paMizpa kundoʋaciŋgamidza, akafamba aciŋgocema; ɀino wakati acisoŋgana naʋo, akati kwaʋari: Ʋuyai kunaGedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika pakati peguta, Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania akaʋaʋuraya,
Asi pakati paʋo pakaŋga panaʋarume ʋanegumi ʋakati kunaIshmaeri: Musatiʋuraya, nokuti tineɀimŋe ɀatakaʋiga kusaŋgo,

Ɀino gomba iro makakandira Ishmaeri ɀitunha ɀaʋanhu ʋaakaŋga aʋuraya, pamŋe cete naGedaria (ndiro rakaŋga raitwa namambo Asa nemhaka yokutya Baasha mambo waIsraeri), Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania wakarizadza naʋakaʋurawa.

Ipapo Ishmaeri akatapa ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara paMizpa, ʋakaiswa naNebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi kunaGedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, iʋo ʋakunda ʋamambo, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara paMizpa; Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania wakaʋatapa, akabva’po aciɗa kuenda kuʋana ʋaAmoni.
Asi Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakati ʋacinzwa ɀakaipa ɀose ɀakaitwa naIshmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania,
ʋakatora ʋarume ʋose, ʋakandorwa naIshmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania, ʋakamuwana ari pamvura zhinji iri paGibeoni.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa naIshmaeri ʋakati ʋaciʋona Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakafara.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋatapxa naIshmaeri paMizpa ʋakatendeʋuka ʋakadzoka, ʋakaenda kunaJohanani mŋanakomana waKarea.
Asi Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania wakatiza Johanani anaʋarume ʋasere, akaenda kuʋana ʋaAmoni.

Ipapo Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo ʋaiʋa naye ʋakatora ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara, ʋaakaŋga arwira kunaIshmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania paMizpa, amboʋuraya Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami,
Ʋakabva, ʋakandogara paGeruti‐Kimhami, riri paBeti‐rehema, ʋaciti ʋagozoenda Egipita,
nokuɗa kwaʋaKardea, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciʋatya, Ishmaeri mŋanakomana waNetania ɀaakaʋuraya Gedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, wakaŋga aitwa muɓati wenyika iyo namambo weBabironi.
Ɀino ʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo, naJohanani mŋanakomana waKarea naJezania mŋanakomana waHoshaia, naʋanhu ʋose kubva kuʋaɗuku kuȿikira kuʋakuru, ʋakasweɗera,

ʋakati kumuprofita Jeremia: Tinokumbira kuti munyeŋgetero weɗu uȿitswe pamberi penyu, mutinyeŋgeterere kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu, munyeŋgeterere aʋa ʋose ʋakasara (nokuti takasara tiri ʋashoma kunaʋaiʋa ʋazhinji, seɀamunotiʋona nameso enyu),
kuti Jehova Mŋari wenyu atiratidze nzira yatinofanira kufamba nayo necinhu catinofanira kuita.

Ipapo muprofita Jeremia akati kwaʋari: Ndakunzwai; tarirai, ndicanyeŋgetera kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu seɀamakareʋa namashoko enyu; ɀino cinhu cipi necipi camunopindurwa naJehova, ndicakuziʋisai ico, handiŋgatoŋgokuʋanziriyi cinhu.
Ipapo ʋakati kunaJeremia: Jehova ŋgaaʋe capupu caɀokwaɗi cakatendeka pakati peɗu, kana tikarega kuita mashoko ose amunozotumŋa nawo kwatiri naJehova Mŋari wenyu.
Kana riciŋge rakanaka, kana riciŋge rakaipa, ticaterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari weɗu, watinokutumirai kwaari; kuti tiʋe nomufaro, kana ticiterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Ɀino mazuʋa anegumi akati apera, shoko raJehova rikaȿika kunaJeremia.
Ipapo akaɗana Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo ʋaiʋa naye naʋanhu ʋose, kubva kuʋaɗuku kuȿikira kuʋakuru,
akati kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waIsraeri, wamakanditumira kwaari kuti ndiȿitse munyeŋgetero wenyu pamberi pake:
Kana muciŋge mucaɗa kugara munyika ino, ini ndicakuʋakai, handiŋgakukoromoriyi, ndicakusimai, handiŋgakudzuriyi; nokuti ndinoɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀandakakuitirai.
Musatya henyu mambo weBabironi, iye wamunotya; musamutya henyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndinemi, kuti ndikuponesei nokukurwirai paruʋoko rwake.
Ndicakunzwirai nyasha, kuti iye aʋe nenyasha nemi, akudzosei kunyika yenyu.
Asi kana mukati: Hatiɗi kugara munyika ino, saiɀoɀo musiŋgatereri inzwi raJehova Mŋari wenyu,
muciti: Kwete, ticaenda kunyika yeEgipita, kwatisiŋgazoʋoni kurwa, kana kunzwa inzwi rehwamanda, kana kunzwa nzara yeɀokudya, ticandogara’ko;
naiɀoɀo ɀino cinzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋakasara ʋaJuda: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Kana muciramba makarinzira ɀiso ɀenyu kuti muende Egipita, kundogara’ko muri ʋatorwa;
ipapo munondo wamunotya ucakuɓatai’po panyika yeEgipita; nenzara yamunotya icakuteʋererai kwaɀo paEgipita, ndipapo pamucandofira.

Ndiɀo ɀicaitirwa ʋarume ʋose ʋanorinzira ɀiso ɀaʋo kuti ʋaende Egipita, kundogara’ko ʋari ʋatorwa; ʋacafa nomunondo, nenzara, ʋuye nehosha; hakunomumŋe waʋo ucasara kana kupukunyuka paɀakaipa ɀandicaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo.

Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Kutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu seɀaɀakaɗururwa pamsoro paʋagere Jerusarema, saiɀoɀo hasha dzaŋgu dzicaɗururwa pamsoro penyu, kana mucipinda Egipita; mucaʋa cinhu cinotukwa, necishamiso, necinomhurwa, necinoshoʋorwa; nenɀimbo ino hamuŋgazoiʋoni ɀe.
Jehova wakataura pamsoro penyu, imi ʋakasara ʋaJuda,
Nokuti makanyeŋgera mŋeya yenyu; nokuti makanditumira kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu, muciti: Tinyeŋgetererei kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu, ɀose ɀicarebga naJehova Mŋari weɗu, mutiziʋise iɀoɀo, ticaɀiita.
Ɀino nhasi ndakuziʋisai iɀoɀo, asi hamuna‐kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari wenyu pacinhu cimŋe caakanditumira naco kwamuri.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ziʋai kwaɀo kuti mucafa nomunondo, nenzara, ʋuye nehosha yakaipa panɀimbo iyo yamunoɗa kuenda kwairi kundogara’ko muri ʋatorwa.
Ɀino Jeremia wakati apedza kuʋudza ʋanhu mashoko ose aJehova Mŋari waʋo, aakaŋga atumŋa nawo kwaʋari naJehova Mŋari waʋo, iwo mashoko awa ose,

ipapo Azaria mŋanakomana waHoshaia, naJohanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋarume ʋose, ʋaiɀikudza, ʋakataura ʋaciti kunaJeremia: Unoreʋa nhema, Jehova Mŋari weɗu haana‐kukutuma kuzoti: Musaenda Egipita kundogara’po muri ʋatorwa;
asi Baruki mŋanakomana waNeria ndiye unokumutsa pamsoro peɗu, kuti tiiswe mumaʋoko aʋaKardea, kuti ʋatiʋuraye nokutitapira Babironi.
Naiɀoɀo Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo, naʋanhu ʋose, haʋana‐kuterera inzwi raJehova, kuti ʋagare munyika yaJuda.
Asi Johanani mŋanakomana waKarea, naʋakuru ʋose ʋehondo, ʋakatora ʋose ʋakasara ʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋadzoka kumarudzi ose kwaʋakadziŋgirwa, ʋaciɗa kugara ʋari ʋatorwa munyika yaJuda,

, ʋarume naʋakadzi naʋana naʋakunda ʋamambo nomunhu upi noupi wakaŋga asiyiwa naNebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi kunaGedaria mŋanakomana waAhikami, mŋanakomana waShafani, pamŋe cete naJeremia muprofita, naBaruki mŋanakomana waNeria,
ʋakandoȿika kunyika yeEgipita; nokuti haʋana‐kuterera inzwi raJehova; ʋakandoȿika Tapanesi.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJeremia paTapanesi, riciti:
Tora mabge makuru muruʋoko rwako, uaʋige muvu pakati peɀitina, paʋanopinda napo paimba yaFarao paTapanesi, ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda ʋaciɀiʋona;
ugoti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicatuma
Ucaʋuya aciroʋa nyika yeEgipita; ʋakafanira rufu
Ndicaɓatidza mŋoto mudzimba dzaʋamŋari ʋeEgipita; ucadzipisa nokuʋatapa; ucafuka nyika yeEgipita somufudzi unofuka ŋguʋo yake, ucabva’po norugare.
Ucaputsa ʋo shoŋgwe dzeBeti‐shemeshi, riri munyika yeEgipita; dzimba dzaʋamŋari ʋeEgipita ucadzipisa nomŋoto.
Shoko rakaȿika kunaJeremia pamsoro paʋaJuda ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika yeEgipita, ʋakaŋga ʋagere Migdori neTapanesi neNofi nomunyika yePatrosi, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Makaʋona ɀakaipa ɀose ɀandakaʋuyisa pamsoro peJerusarema napamsoro pamaguta ose aJuda; ɀino tarirai, nhasi aʋa matoŋgo, hapacinomunhu unogara’mo,
nemhaka yeɀakashata ɀaʋo ɀaʋakaita, ɀaʋakanditsamŋisa, ʋacindopisa ɀinonhuwira, nokushumira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi, iʋo kana imi kana madziɓaɓa enyu.
Asi ndakakutumirai ʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋaprofita, ndicimuka maŋgwanani ndiciʋatuma, ndiciti: Haiwa, regai kuita cinhu ici cinonyaŋgadza, candinoʋeŋga.
Asi haʋana‐kuterera, kana kurerekera nzeʋe dzaʋo kuti ʋadzoke paɀakashata ɀaʋo, ʋakarega kupisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira.
Naiɀoɀo hasha dzaŋgu nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu ɀakaɗururwa, ɀikatuŋgidzwa mumaguta aJuda nomunzira dzomuJerusarema; ɀino aparadzwa aʋa matoŋgo, seɀaɀakaita nhasi.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Munotadzirireiko mŋeya yenyu necinhu cakaipa cikuru

ɀamunonditsamŋisa namaɓasa amaʋoko enyu, mucipisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira munyika yeEgipita kwamakaenda kundogara muri ʋatorwa; mugoparadzwa, muʋe cinotukwa necinoshoʋorwa pakati pamarudzi ose enyika?

Makaŋganwa here ɀakashata ɀamadziɓaɓa enyu neɀakashata ɀamadzimambo aJuda, neɀakashata ɀaʋakadzi ʋaʋo, neɀakashata ɀenyu, neɀakashata ɀaʋakadzi ʋenyu, ɀaʋakaita munyika yaJuda nomunzira dzomuJerusarema?
Kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi haʋana‐kuɀininipisa, kana kutya, kana kufamba nomurairo waŋgu kana neɀireʋo ɀaŋgu, ɀandakaisa pamberi penyu napamberi pamadziɓaɓa enyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicakurinzirai ciso caŋgu kuti ndikuitirei ɀakaipa, kuti ndiparadze Juda rose.

Ndicabvisa ʋakasara ʋose ʋaJuda, ʋakarinzira ɀiso ɀaʋo kuti ʋaende kunyika yeEgipita kundogara’ko ʋari ʋatorwa, ʋacaparadzwa ʋose; ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo nenzara, ʋacafa nomunondo nenzara kubva kuʋaɗuku kuȿikira kuʋakuru; ʋacaʋa cinhu cinotukwa, necishamiso, necinomhurwa, necinoshoʋorwa.
Nokuti ndicaroʋa ʋagere munyika yeEgipita, seɀandakaroʋa Jerusarema nomunondo nenzara ʋuye nehosha yakaipa;
kuti kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wakasara waJuda, ʋakaenda kunyika yeEgipita kundogara’ko ʋari ʋatorwa, uŋgapukunyuka kana uŋgasara, kuti adzokere kunyika yaJuda, kwaʋanoshuʋa kudzokera kuti ʋagare’ko

Ipapo ʋarume ʋose, ʋaiziʋa kuti ʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋanopisira ʋamŋe ʋamŋari ɀinonhuwira, naʋakadzi ʋose, ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, ʋuŋgano huru, iʋo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere munyika yeEgipita, paPatrosi, ʋakapindura Jeremia, ʋaciti:
Kana riri shoko rawakatiʋudza nezita raJehova, hatiŋgakutereri.

Asi ɀirokwaɀo ticaita shoko rimŋe nerimŋe rakaɓuɗa mumiromo yeɗu, ticapisira ʋahosi ʋokuɗeŋga ɀinonhuwira, nokuʋaɗururira ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, seɀatakaita isu namadziɓaɓa eɗu namadzimambo eɗu namacinda eɗu, pamaguta aJuda nomunzira dzomuJerusarema; nokuti neŋguʋa iyo taiʋa neɀokudya ɀizhinji, taifara
Asi kubvira paŋguʋa yatakarega kupisira ʋahosi ʋokuɗeŋga ɀinonhuwira, nokuʋaɗururira ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, takashaiwa ɀose, tikapedzwa nomunondo nenzara.
Ɀino paŋguʋa yatakapisira ʋahosi ʋokuɗeŋga ɀinonhuwira, nokuʋaɗururira ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, ko taiʋaitira ɀiŋgwa ɀokuʋanamata naɀo, tikaʋaɗururira ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa, tisinaʋarume ʋeɗu here?
Ipapo Jeremia akati kuʋanhu ʋose, kuʋarume nokuʋakadzi, kunaiʋo ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋamupindura saiɀoɀo, akati:

Ɀinonhuwira ɀamaipisa mumaguta aJuda nomunzira dzomuJerusarema, imi namadziɓaɓa enyu namadzimambo enyu namacinda enyu naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, ko Jehova haana‐kuɀiraŋgarira here? Haɀina‐kufuŋgwa mumŋoyo make here?

Kuȿikira Jehova akakoniwa kuzoʋa nomŋoyo murefu, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀamaɓasa enyu, ʋuye nokuɗa kweɀinonyaŋgadza ɀamaiita; naiɀoɀo nyika yenyu raʋaɗoŋgo, necinoshamisa necinotukwa, isina‐unogara’mo, seɀaɀakaita zuʋa ranhasi.

Ɀamakapisa ɀinonhuwira, ɀamakatadzira Jehova, mukasaterera inzwi raJehova, mukasafamba nomurairo wake, kana neɀireʋo ɀake, kana neɀaakapupura, naiɀoɀo ɀakaipa iɀi ɀakakuwirai, seɀaɀakaita zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino Jeremia akati ʋo kuʋanhu ʋose nokuʋakadzi ʋose: Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋaJuda ʋose ʋari munyika yeEgipita:

Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Imi naʋakadzi ʋenyu makataura nemiromo yenyu, mukaɀiita namaʋoko enyu, muciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, mhiko dzeɗu dzatakapika ticadziita, kuti ticapisira ʋahosi ʋokuɗeŋga ɀinonhuwira, nokuʋaɗururira ɀipiriso ɀinoɗururwa; ɀino cisimbisai henyu mhiko dzenyu, itai henyu mhiko dzenyu.

Ɀino cinzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋaJuda ʋose ʋagere munyika yeEgipita: Tarirai, ndakapika nezita raŋgu guru — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuti zita raŋgu haricazorebgi nomuromo womunhu upi noupi waJuda munyika yose yeEgipita, ɀicinzi: NaShe Jehova mupenyu!
Tarirai, ndinoʋarindira ndiʋaitire ɀakaipa, ndirege kuʋaitira ɀakanaka; ʋanhu ʋose ʋaJuda ʋari munyika yeEgipita ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo nenzara, kuȿikira ʋapera ʋose.

Ʋanopukunyuka pamunondo ʋacabva munyika yeEgipita ʋacidzokera kunyika yaJuda, ʋaʋa ʋashoma; ʋakasara ʋose ʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋaenda kunyika yeEgipita kundogara’ko ʋari ʋatorwa, ʋacaziʋa kuti shoko ricaʋa nesimba nderani, raŋgu kana raʋo.
Ɀino ici ndico cicaʋa ciratidzo kwamuri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuti ndicakuroʋai panɀimbo ino, kuti muziʋe kuti mashoko aŋgu acaʋa nesimba kukuitirai ɀakaipa:

Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicaisa Farao Hofra mambo weEgipita, mumaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋake, nomumaʋoko aʋanotȿaka kumuʋuraya, seɀandakaisa Zedekia mambo waJuda mumaʋoko aNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, waiʋa muʋeŋgi wake, waitȿaka kumuʋuraya.

Shoko, rakataurwa nomuprofita Jeremia kunaBaruki mŋanakomana waNeria, paŋguʋa yaakanyora mashoko awa mubuku, ɀicibva mumuromo waJeremia, negore recinna raJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova, Mŋari waIsraeri, kwauri, iwe Baruki:
Iwe wakati: Ndinenhamo ɀino, nokuti Jehova wakawedzera kucema pakurwadziwa kwaŋgu; ndaneta nokugomera kwaŋgu, ndinoshaiwa zororo.
Ɀino citi kwaari: Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, candakaʋaka ndicacikoromora ɀe, candakasima ndicacidzura ɀe; ndiɀo ɀandicaitira nyika yose.

Iwe unoɀitȿakira ɀinhu ɀikuru here? Usaɀitȿaka; nokuti tarira, ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro penyama yose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; asi ndicakupa ʋupenyu bgako ciʋe cinhu cakapambga panɀimbo dzose kwaunoenda.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kumuprofita Jeremia pamsoro pamarudzi.

Pamsoro peEgipita; pamsoro pehondo yaFarao‐neko mambo weEgipita, yakaŋga iri parwizi Ufratesi paKarkemishi, yakakundwa naNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi negore recinna raJehoiakimi mŋanakomana waJosia, mambo waJuda.
Gadzirai nhoʋo ɗuku nenhoʋo huru, musweɗere kunorwiwa.
Suŋgai mabiza, kwirai imi ʋataȿi, mumire makadzika ŋgowani dzenyu; rodzai mapfumo, pfekai ŋguʋo dzamatare.
Ndakaɀiʋonereiko? Ʋakaŋganiswa, ʋadzokera shure; mhare dzaʋo dzakundwa, dzatiza, hadziceukiri shure, kutya kuri pamatiʋi ose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋanomhanyisa ŋgaʋarege kutiza, mhare ŋgadzirege kupukunyuka; kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, parwizi rwaUfratesi, ʋakagumburwa ʋakawira pasi.
Ndianiko uyo unokwira so
Egipita rinokwira saNairi, mvura yarwo inotamba senzizi; rinoti: Ndicakwira, ndicafukidza nyika, ndicaparadza maguta naʋagere’mo.
Kwirai, imi mabiza, fambisai imi ŋgoro, mhare ŋgadziɓuɗe, ʋanoti, Kushi naPuti ʋanoshoŋga nhoʋo, naʋaRudi ʋanoɓata nokuwembura ʋuta.
Nokuti zuʋa iro
Kwira uende Gireadi, undotora’ko muti webarsami, iwe mhandara, mukunda weEgipita; wawanza mishoŋga mizhinji isinamaturo, hauporeswi.
Marudzi akanzwa ɀokunyadziswa kwako, nyika izere nokucema kwako; nokuti mhare dzakaɓonderana nemhare, ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri ʋakawira pasi.
Shoko, rakaʋudzwa muprofita Jeremia naJehova, ricireʋa muʋuyire waNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi nomukundire wake nyika yeEgipita.
Paridzirai paEgipita, ziʋisai paMigdori, ziʋisai paNofi napaTapanesi, muti: Simukai muɀigadzire, nokuti munondo wakadya ɀiri kumatiʋi ako ose.
Mhare dzako dzakabviswa neiko? Haʋana‐kumira, nokuti Jehova wakaʋadziŋga.
Wakagumbusa ʋazhinji, ɀirokwaɀo mumŋe wakawira pamsoro pomumŋe; ʋakati: Simukai, tiende ɀe kuʋanhu ʋeɗu, nokunyika kwatakaɓerekerwa, titize munondo unomanikidza.
Ʋakaɗanidzira’ko,
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mambo, unezita rinonzi Jehova wehondo, — ɀirokwaɀo ucaʋuya akaita seTabori pakati pamakomo, ʋuye seKarmeri paguŋgwa.
Iwe mukunda unogara Egipita, ɀigadzirire kutapxa, nokuti Nofi ricaitwa ɗoŋgo, ricapiswa, risina‐unogara’mo.
Egipita imhorombe yakaiȿo‐naka, asi ʋuʋu rinobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro raȿika, raȿika.

Naʋanhu ʋaro ʋanoripirwa, ʋari mukati maro, ʋakafanana nemhuru dzomuɗaŋga, nokuti naiʋo ʋakadzoka, ʋakatiza pamŋe cete, haʋana‐kumira; nokuti zuʋa renjodzi yaʋo rakaʋuya pamsoro paʋo, iyo ŋguʋa yokurobga kwaʋo.
Mubvumo waro ucaʋa sowenyoka, nokuti ʋacafamba nehondo, ʋacandorwa naʋo namatemo, saʋatemi ʋemiti.
Ʋacatema ɗondo raro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — nokuti haʋaŋganɀerwi, nokuti ʋakawanda kupfuʋura mhashu, haʋaŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Mukunda weEgipita ucanyadziswa, ucaiswa mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋanobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Jehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri, unoti: Tarirai, ndicaroʋa Amoni weNo, naFarao, neEgipita naʋamŋari ʋaro, namadzimambo aro, iye Farao naʋose ʋanoʋimba naye.
Ndicaʋaisa mumaʋoko aʋanotȿaka kuʋaʋuraya, nomumaʋoko aNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, nomumaʋoko aʋaranda ʋake; ɀino pashure ricagarwa, sapamazuʋa akare — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Asi usatya hako, iwe Jakobo, muranda waŋgu, usavunduswa, iwe Israeri; nokuti tarira, ndicakuponesa uri kure, naʋana ʋako ʋari panyika kwaʋakatapirwa; Jakobo ucadzoka, ucanyarara nokuzorora, hakuna‐uŋgamutyisa.

Usatya hako, iwe Jakobo, muranda waŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — nokuti ndinewe; nokuti ndicapedza kwaɀo marudzi ose kwandakakudziŋgira; asi iwe handiŋgakupedzi, asi ndicakuraŋga ndiciita nokururama, handiŋgakuregi usina‐kurobga.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kumuprofita Jeremia pamsoro paʋaFiristia, Farao acigere kukunda Gaza.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, mvura zhinji inokwira icibva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, icaʋa rwizi runopafuma, icafukidza nyika neɀose ɀiri’mo, neguta naʋagere’mo; ʋanhu ʋacacema, naʋose ʋagere munyika ʋacawuŋgudza.
Kana ʋacinzwa kutinhira kwokutsika kwamahwanda amabiza ake anesimba, nokumhanyisa kweŋgoro dzake, nokuʋirima kwamakumbo eŋgoro dzake, madziɓaɓa haaceukiri kuʋana ʋawo nokuneta kwamaʋoko aʋo;
nemhaka yezuʋa iro, rinoʋuya kuparadza ʋaFiristia ʋose, nokuparadza paTire neSidoni muɓatsiri mumŋe nomumŋe wakasara; nokuti Jehova ucaparadza ʋaFiristia, iʋo ʋakasara ʋeciwi ceKaftori.
Gaza raʋa nemhazha, Ashkeroni raparadzwa, iɀo ɀakaŋga ɀasara ɀomupata waʋo; ucaramba uciɀitema kuȿikira riniko?
Haiwa, iwe munondo waJehova, ucashaiwa zororo kuȿikira riniko? Dzokera mumuhara wako, zorora, unyarare.
Uŋganyarara seiko, Jehova ɀaakakuraira? Pamsoro peAshkeroni napamsoro pemhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa, ndi’po paakaɀiraira.
Pamsoro paMoabi. Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Nebo rinenhamo, nokuti raparadzwa; Kiriataimi ranyadziswa, rakundwa; Mishgabi ranyadziswa, ravunduswa.
Mbiri yaMoabi haici’po; paHeshboni ʋakaraŋgana ɀakaipa pamsoro paʋo,
inzwi rokucema rinobva Horonaimi, kuparadzwa nokukoromorwa kukuru!
Moabi ʋaparadzwa; ʋanana ʋaʋo ʋakanzwika ʋacicema.
Nokuti ʋacakwira nomukwidzwa weRuhiti ʋaciŋgocema; nokuti pamatenusirwa eHoronaimi ʋakanzwa njodzi yokucema kwokuparadzwa.
Tizai, muponese mŋeya yenyu, mufanane negwenzi murenje.
Nokuti ɀamakaʋimba namaɓasa enyu nefuma yenyu, mucakundwa ʋo; Kemoshi ʋacaenda kwaʋanotapxa, ʋaprista ʋaʋo namacinda aʋo pamŋe cete.
Muparadzi ucawira guta rimŋe nerimŋe, hakuneguta ricapukunyuka; mupata ucaparara ʋo, neɓani ricaparadzwa, seɀakataura Jehova.
Ipai Moabi mapapiro, ʋabururuke, ʋaende; maguta aʋo acaʋa matoŋgo, anoshaiwa unogara’mo.
Ŋgaatukwe unoɓate‐ɓasa raJehova asinehanya naro; ŋgaatukwe unodzora munondo wake paropa.

Moabi ʋakaŋga ʋanezororo kubva paʋuɗuku bgaʋo, ʋakagara pamasese aʋo, haʋana‐kuɗururwa ʋacibviswa mumudziyo mumŋe ʋaciiswa munomumŋe mudziyo, ʋuye haʋana‐kutapxa; naiɀoɀo kuzipa kwaʋo kwakarambira mukati maʋo, nokunhuwira kwaʋo hakuna‐kushanduka.
Naiɀoɀo tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — andicatuma kwaʋari ʋanomimina; iʋo ʋacaʋamimina, ʋacaɗurura midziyo yaʋo cose, nokuputsanya hari dzaʋo.
Moabi ʋacanyara pamsoro peKemoshi, seɀakanyadziswa imba yaIsraeri pamsoro peBeti‐eri, raʋaiʋimba naro.
Munotaura seiko,
Moabi ʋaparadzwa, ʋakwira mumaguta aʋo, majaya aʋo akasanaŋgurwa akaɓuruka kundoʋurawa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Mambo, unezita rinonzi Jehova wehondo.
Njodzi yaMoabi yaʋa pedyo yoɗo‐kuʋuya, nhamo yaʋo yokurumidza kuʋuya.
Ʋacemei, imi mose makaʋapoteredza, imi mose munoziʋa zita raʋo; muti: Haiwa, tȿimbo yakasimba, iwo muɗonɀo wakanaka, ɀavunika sei!
Iwe mukunda unogara Diboni, ɓuruka pakukudzwa kwako, ugare panenyota, nokuti muparadzi waMoabi waʋuya kuzorwa newe, waparadza nhare dzako.
Iwe unogara Aroeri, mira panzira utarire; bvunza unotiza nounopukunyuka, uti: Cinyiko caitwa?
Moabi ʋakanyadziswa, nokuti ʋakakoromorwa. Wuŋgudzai muceme, muɀiparidzire paArnoni kuti Moabi ʋaparadzwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kutoŋgwa kwaȿika panyika yamapani, paHoroni, napaJaza, napaMefaati,
napaDiboni, napaNebo, napaBeti‐dibrataimi,
napaKiriataimi, napaBeti‐gamuri, napaBeti‐meoni,
napaKerioti, napaBozra, napamaguta ose enyika yaʋaMoabi, kure kana pedyo.
Runyaŋga rwaMoabi rwagurwa, ruʋoko rwaʋo rwavuniwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Muʋapei ɗoro ʋaɓatwe, nokuti ʋakaita manyawi pamberi paJehova; Moabi ʋacaʋumburuka mumarutsi aʋo, ʋacasekwa ʋo.
Nokuti Israeri haʋana‐kusekwa nemi here? Ʋakawanikwa pakati pamakororo here? Nokuti ŋguʋa dzose kana mucimureʋa iye munodzuŋgudza misoro yenyu.
Imi mugere
Takanzwa kuɀikudza kwaMoabi, kuti ʋanoɀikudza kwaɀo; manyawi aʋo, nokuɀikudza kwaʋo, nokuɀirumbidza kwaʋo, namanyawi omŋoyo waʋo.
Ndinoziʋa hasha dzaʋo, kuti hadzinamaturo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; kuɀirumbidza kwaʋo haɀina‐kuita cinhu.
Naiɀoɀo ndicawuŋgudza pamsoro paMoabi, ɀirokwaɀo ndicaɗanidzira pamsoro paʋaMoabi ʋose; ʋacacema ʋanhu ʋeKiri‐heresi.
Ndicakucemera, iwe muzambiriŋga weSibma, nokucema kunopfuʋura kucema kwaJazeri; mataʋi ako akaɗarika guŋgwa, akandoȿika paguŋgwa raJazeri; muparadzi wawira ɀiɓereko ɀako ɀezhezha namazambiriŋga ako.
Mufaro nokufara ɀabviswa pamunda wakaŋga uciɓereka ɀakanaka napanyika yaMoabi; ndakagumisa waini paɀiȿiniro, hakuna‐ʋacatsika ʋacipururudza, kupururudza hakuŋgaʋi kupururudza.
Kubva pakucema kweHeshboni kuȿikira Ereare, nokuȿikira Jahazi, ʋakanzwisa inzwi raʋo, kubva Zoari kuȿikira Horonaimi neEgrati‐sherishiya; nokuti nemvura zhinji yeNimrimi icaparadzwa.
Ndicagumisa ʋo pakati paMoabi aninani unoɓayira panɀimbo dzakakwirira, naiye unopisira ʋamŋari ʋake ɀinonhuwira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu unorira pamsoro paMoabi senyere, nomŋoyo waŋgu unorira senyere pamsoro paʋanhu ʋeKiri‐heresi; naiɀoɀo ɀakawanda ɀaakaɀiwanira ɀapera.
Nokuti misoro yose yaʋa nemhazha, nendebvu dzose dzaʋeʋurwa; maʋoko ose atemŋa, neɀiʋuno ɀose ɀinamasaga.
Pamateŋga edzimba dzaMoabi, napanzira dzomumisha yaʋo kuwuŋgudza kuri’po pose; nokuti ndaputsa Moabi somudziyo usiŋgafadzi munhu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋakoromorwa sei! Ʋanowuŋgudza sei! Moabi ʋakafuratira sei nokunyadziswa! Saiɀoɀo Moabi ʋacaʋa cinhu cinosekwa necinotyisa pakati paʋose ʋanoʋapoteredza.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ucabururuka segondo, ucatambanudzira mapapiro ake kuzorwa naMoabi.
Maguta akundwa, nhare dzakundwa, nezuʋa iro mŋoyo yemhare dzaMoabi icaita somŋoyo womukadzi pakurwadziwa kwake.
Moabi ʋacaparadzwa, ʋarege kuʋa rudzi rwaʋanhu, nokuti ʋakaɀikudza pamberi paJehova.
Kutya nehuzha nomusuŋgo ɀaȿika kwauri, iwe ugere
Unotiza cinotyisa ucawira muhuzha; unokwira aciɓuɗa muhuzha ucaɓatwa nomusuŋgo, nokuti ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro paʋo, ipo pamsoro paMoabi, gore rokurobga kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋakatiza ʋamire pamumvuri weHeshboni ʋasinesimba, nokuti mŋoto waɓuɗa paHeshboni, nomuraɀo pakati paSihoni, waparadza matiʋi aMoabi nemisoro yaʋanoɗa kurwa.
Munenhamo, imi Moabi! Ʋanhu ʋeKemoshi ʋapera; nokuti ʋanakomana ʋenyu ʋatapxa, naʋakunda ʋenyu ʋaiswa kukutapxa.
Asi namazuʋa okupedzisira ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaMoabi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Ndi’po panoȿika kutoŋgwa kwaMoabi.
Pamsoro paʋana ʋaAmoni. Ɀanzi naJehova: Ko Israeri haʋanaʋanakomana here? Haʋanaʋagari ʋenhaka here? Ko Markami wagarireiko nhaka yaGadi, ʋanhu ʋake ʋanogarirei mumaguta ake?

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, mazuʋa anoȿika, andicanzwisa ʋanhu mhere yokurwa neRaba raʋana ʋaAmoni; ricaitwa murwi wamatoŋgo, naʋakunda ʋaro ʋacapiswa nomŋoto; ipapo ʋaIsraeri ʋacadya nhaka yaʋakambodya nhaka yaʋo.

Wuŋgudza iwe Heshboni, nokuti Ai raparadzwa; cemai imi ʋakunda ʋeRaba, ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno namasaga, wuŋgudzai, mumhanye kwose kwose pakati pezhowa, nokuti Markami ucatapxa, iye naʋaprista namacinda ake pamŋe cete.
Unoɀirumbidzireiko pamsoro pemipata, pamsoro pomupata wako unoyerera, iwe mukunda wokudzokera shure, iwe wokuʋimba nefuma yako,
Tarira, ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro pako kutya ʋose ʋanokupoteredza — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe, Jehova wehondo; mucadziŋgwa mumŋe nomumŋe ipo paakatarira, hakuna‐uŋgazoʋuŋganidza ʋanodzuŋgaira.
Asi pashure ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaʋana ʋaAmoni — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Pamsoro paEdomi. Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ko paTemani hapacinoʋucenjeri here? Mano aroʋa kunaʋakaŋgwara here? Ʋucenjeri bgaʋo bganyaŋgarika here?
Tizai, mudzoke, garai makadzika, imi mugere paDedani; nokuti ndicaʋuyisa njodzi yaEsau pamsoro pake neŋguʋa yandicamuroʋa nayo.
Kana ʋakohwi ʋamizambiriŋga ʋakaȿika kwauri, haʋaŋgasiyi mamŋe mazambiriŋga aŋgazokohiwa here? Kana mbava
Ndakafukura Esau, ndazarura nɀimbo dzake dzakaʋanda, haaŋgagoni kuʋanda; ʋana ʋake ʋaparadzwa, nehama dzake noʋokwake; iye haaci’po.
Siya nherera dzako, ini ndicadziraramisa, cirikadzi dzako ŋgadziʋimbe neni.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kufanira kunwa pamukombe, ʋacanwa ɀirokwaɀo; ko ɀino iwe ndiwe ucaregwa cose usiŋgarobgi here? Hauŋgaregwi usiŋgarobgi, asi ucanwa ɀirokwaɀo.
Nokuti ndakapika neni ndimene — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuti Bozra ricaitwa cishamiso necinoshoʋorwa, neɗoŋgo necinotukwa; maguta aro ose acaʋa matoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndakanzwa mashoko anobva kunaJehova, nhume yakatumŋa pakati pamarudzi,
Nokuti tarirai, ndakakuita muɗuku pakati pamarudzi, nounoɀidzwa pakati paʋanhu.

Kana kuri kutyisa kwako, kuɀikudza kwomŋoyo wako kwakakunyeŋgera, iwe ugere mumikaha yeɗombo, unoɀisimbisa pakakwirira paɀikomo; kunyaŋge ukaʋaka ɗendere rako pakakwirira segondo, ndicakubvisa’po — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Edomi ʋacaitwa cishamiso, mumŋe nomumŋe unopfuʋura napo ucashamiswa, ucaridza muridzo pamsoro pamaɗambudziko aʋo ose.
Sapakutsindikirwa kweSodoma neGomora namamŋe maguta akaŋga ari pedyo nawo, saiɀoɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — hakunomunhu ucagara’mo, hakunomŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋa’mo ari mutorwa.

Tarirai, ucaʋuya seshumba acibva mumatenhere aJoridani kuzorwa noʋugaro bgakasimba; nokuti ndicaʋatizisa’po pakarepo; wakatsaurwa ndiye wandicagadza’po; nokuti ndiani wakafanana neni? Ndiani ucanditarira ŋguʋa? Mufudzi uŋgamira pamberi paŋgu ndiani?

Naiɀoɀo cinzwai cireʋo caJehova caakatema pamsoro paEdomi, nemifuŋgo yake yaakafuŋga pamsoro paʋagere paTemani: Ɀirokwaɀo ʋacaʋakwekweredza, iʋo ʋaɗuku ʋamapoka aʋo; ɀirokwaɀo mafuro aʋo acashamiswa pamsoro paʋo.
Nyika inoɗeɗera nokuɗa kwomubvumo wokuwira kwaʋo pasi; kucema kuri’po kunonzwika kuȿikira kuGuŋgwa Dɀuku.
Tarirai, ucakwira acibururuka segondo, ucatambanudzira mapapiro ake kuzorwa neBozra, nezuʋa iro mŋoyo yemhare dzaEdomi icaita somŋoyo womukadzi pakurwadziwa kwake.
Pamsoro peDamasko. Hamati ranyadziswa, neArpadi, nokuti akanzwa mashoko akaipa, akanyauka; kutambudzika kuri’po paguŋgwa, harigoni kuzorora.
Damasko rapera simba, rakatendeʋukira kutiza, rakaɓatwa nokuɗeɗera; rakaɓatwa nokurwadziwa nokucema somukadzi unosurumuka.
Haiwa, guta rairumbidzwa rakasiyiwa sei, iro guta romufaro waŋgu?
Naiɀoɀo majaya aro acawira pasi munzira dzaro, ʋarwi ʋose ʋacanyarara nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ndicaɓatidza mŋoto muruȿiŋgo rweDamasko, ucaparadza dzimba dzoʋushe dzaBeni‐hadadi.
Pamsoro paKedari napamsoro poʋushe bgeHazori bgakakundwa naNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Simukai, muende kunaKedari, mundoparadza ʋanhu ʋokumabvazuʋa.
Ʋacatora matente aʋo namapoka aʋo amakwai, ʋacaɀitorera miceka yaʋo inoremberedzwa, nemidziyo yaʋo yose, namakamera aʋo ʋacienda naɀo; ʋacaɗanidzira kwaʋari,
Tizai, endai kure, garai makadzika, imi ʋagere Hazori — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi wakaraŋgana pamsoro penyu, wakakufuŋgirai mano akaipa.
Simukai, muende kundorwa norudzi rwakazorora, runogara rusinehanya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — rusinamasuʋo kana ɀipfigiso, runogara rwoga.
Makamera aʋo acatapxa neɀipfuwo ɀaʋo ɀizhinji ɀicapambga; ndicaʋaparadzira kumatiʋi ose kunobva mhepo, iʋo ʋakaʋeʋurwa matiʋi
Hazori ʋucaʋa ʋugaro bgamakaʋa, neɗoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi; hakunomunhu uŋgagara’mo, hakunomŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋa’mo ari mutorwa.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kumuprofita Jeremia pamsoro paErami, pakutaŋga kwokuɓata ʋushe kwaZedekia mambo waJuda, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ndicavuna ʋuta bgaErami, ico cinhu cikuru cesimba raʋo.
Ndicaʋuyisira pamsoro paErami mhepo inna dzicibva kumatiʋi manna okuɗeŋga, ndicaʋaparadzira kumatiʋi iwo manna kunobva mhepo; hakuŋgaʋi norudzi rumŋe kusiŋgaȿiki iʋo ʋakadziŋgwa ʋaErami.

Ndicavundusa Erami pamberi paʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo napamberi paʋanotȿaka kuʋaʋuraya; ndicaʋuyisa ɀakaipa pamsoro paʋo, iko kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kukuru — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicatuma munondo uʋateʋerere kuȿikira ndaʋapedza.
Ndicaisa cigaro caŋgu coʋushe maErami, ndiparadze mambo namacinda ʋabve’po — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Asi namazuʋa okupedzisira ndicadzosa ɀe kutapxa kwaErami — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Shoko, rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro peBabironi, napamsoro penyika yaʋaKardea nomuprofita Jeremia.

Paridzirai pakati pamarudzi, muɀiziʋise, musimudze mureza, muɀiziʋise, murege kuʋanza, muti: Babironi rakundwa, Beri wanyadziswa, Merodaki wavunduswa; ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀanyadziswa, matanda aʋo avunika.
Nokuti rudzi ruri’ko runobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro kuzorwa naro, rucaita nyika yaro ɗoŋgo, hakuna‐ucagara’mo; ʋatiza, ʋaenda, ʋanhu neɀipfuwo.
Namazuʋa iwayo, neŋguʋa iyo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacaʋuya, iʋo naʋana ʋaJuda pamŋe cete; ʋacafamba ʋaciŋgocema, ʋacitȿaka Jehova Mŋari waʋo.
Ʋacabvunza Zioni, ʋakariŋgira ɀiso ɀaʋo ikoko,
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu akaŋga ari makwai akarashika, ʋafudzi ʋaʋo ʋakaʋarashisa, ʋakaʋatsausira kumakomo, ʋakafamba ʋacibva kumakomo ʋacienda kuɀikomo, ʋakakaŋganwa nɀimbo yaʋo yokuzorora.
Ʋose ʋaiʋawana ʋaiʋadya, naʋadziʋisi ʋaʋo ʋaiti: Hatinemhoȿa, nokuti ʋakatadzira Jehova, ibgo ʋugaro bgokururama, iye Jehova, tariro yamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Tizai mubve pakati peBabironi, ɓuɗai panyika yaʋaKardea, muʋe senhoŋgo pamberi pamapoka amakwai.

Nokuti tarirai, ndicamutsira Babironi nokuʋuyisira ɓoka ramarudzi makuru anobva kunyika yokumsoro; ʋacaɀigadzira kuzorwa naro, ricakundwa no’ko; miseʋe yaʋo icaʋa seyemhare yakaŋgwara, isiŋgadzoki isina‐cayakaɓata.
yeKardea icaʋa cinhu cakapambga; ʋose ʋanoipamba ʋacaguta — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Kunyaŋge makafara, kunyaŋge mucifarisisa, iyemi munoparadza nhaka yaŋgu, kunyaŋge mucikwakuka setsiru rinopura
mai ʋenyu ʋacanyadziswa kwaɀo, iʋo ʋakakuɓerekai ʋacakaŋganiswa; tarirai, ʋacaʋa rudzi ruri shure kwaose, nesaŋgo, nenyika yakawoma, nerenje.
Nemhaka yokutsamŋa kwaJehova hariŋgagarwi, asi ricaʋa ɗoŋgo cose; mumŋe nomumŋe unopfuʋura napaBabironi ucashamiswa, ucaridza muridzo pamsoro pamaɗambudziko aro ose.
Muɀigadzire imi mose munofura noʋuta kuzorwa neBabironi kumatiʋi ose, rifurei, regai kuceŋgeta miseʋe, nokuti rakatadzira Jehova.
Pururudzai kumatiʋi aro ose, raɀirega, shoŋgwe dzaro dzawa, maȿiŋgo aro akoromorwa; nokuti ndiko kutsiʋa kwaJehova; ɀitsiʋei pamsoro paro, seɀarakaita muriitire ʋo.
Paradzai mudɀari paBabironi, naiye unoɓata nejeko paŋguʋa yokuceka; nemhaka yokutya munondo unomanikidza, mumŋe nomumŋe ucatendeʋukira kunoʋokwake, mumŋe nomumŋe ucatizira kunyika yake.
Israeri igwai rakadziŋgwa‐dziŋgwa, shumba dzakaridziŋga; pakutaŋga mambo weAsiria wakamudya, ɀino pakupedzisira Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi wakavuna mafupa ake.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Tarirai, ndicaroʋa mambo weBabironi nenyika yake, seɀandakaroʋa mambo weAsiria.
Ndicadzosera Israeri ɀe kumafuro aʋo, ʋacafura paKarmeri napaBashani, mŋeya waʋo ucagutiswa paɀikomo ɀaEfraimi napaGireadi.
Namazuʋa iwayo neŋguʋa iyo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ɀakaipa ɀaIsraeri ɀicatȿakwa, asi haɀiŋgaʋi’po, neɀiʋi ɀaJuda, asi haɀiŋgawanikwi; nokuti ndicakaŋganwira ʋandakasiya.
Endai mundorwa nenyika yeMerataimi, murwe nayo ʋuye naʋagere Pekodi; ʋurayai, muparadze cose ɀiri shure kwaʋo, muite ɀose ɀandakakurairai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Mubvumo wokurwa uri munyika, nowokuparadza kukuru.
Nyundo yenyika yose yagurwa‐gurwa nokuvuniwa sei! Babironi raʋa ɗoŋgo sei pakati pamarudzi!
Ndakakuteyera musuŋgo, ukaɓatwa ʋo, iwe Babironi, ukasaɀiziʋa; wakawanikwa, ukaɓatwa ʋo, nokuti wakarwa naJehova.
Jehova wakazarura ciʋigiro cefuma yake, akaɓuɗisa nhumbi dzokurwa dzokutsamŋa kwake, nokuti Ishe Jehova wehondo uneɓasa
Ʋuyai murwe nayo mucibva kumatiʋi ose, zarurai matura aro, muite mirwi, muriparadze cose, regai kusiya cinhu caro.
Ʋurayai nzombe dzaro dzose, ŋgadziɓurukire kundoʋurawa. Ʋanenhamo, nokuti zuʋa raʋo raȿika, iyo ŋguʋa yokurobga kwaʋo.
inzwi raʋanotiza naʋanopukunyuka panyika yeBabironi, kundoparidzira paZioni kutsiʋa kwaJehova Mŋari weɗu, iko kutsiʋa kwetembere yake.

Kokerai ʋafuri ʋarwe neBabironi, iʋo ʋose ʋanofura noʋuta; rikomberedzei nemisasa yenyu yokurwa, kurege kuʋa nomumŋe unopukunyuka; muritsiʋe parakaɓata napo, ɀose ɀarakaita iro muriitire saiɀoɀo, nokuti rakaita manyawi pamberi paJehova, pamberi poMutȿene waIsraeri.
Naiɀoɀo majaya aro acawira pasi munzira dzaro, naʋarwi ʋaro ʋose ʋacanyarara nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Tarira, ndinemhoȿa newe, iwe wokuɀikudza — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova wehondo; nokuti zuʋa rako raȿika, ŋguʋa yandicakuroʋa nayo.
Unoɀikudza ucagumburwa nokuwira pasi, hakuna‐uŋgamusimudza; ini ndicaɓatidza mŋoto mumaguta ake, ucapedza ʋose ʋakamupoteredza.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ʋana ʋaIsraeri naʋana ʋaJuda ʋakamanikidzwa pamŋe cete; ʋose, ʋakaʋatapa, ʋakaʋaɓata, ʋanoramba kuʋaregedza.
Mudzikinuri waʋo unesimba, Jehova wehondo ndiro zita rake; iye ucaʋareʋerera mhaka yaʋo kwaɀo, kuti azorodze nyika, nokushaisa ʋagere Babironi zororo.
Munondo uri pamsoro paʋaKardea, napamsoro paʋagere Babironi, napamsoro pamacinda aro, napamsoro paʋacenjeri ʋaro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Munondo uri pamsoro paʋanamanyawi, ʋacaʋa mapenzi; munondo uri pamsoro pemhare dzaro, ʋacavunduka.
Munondo uri pamsoro pamabiza aʋo, napamsoro peŋgoro dzaʋo, napamsoro paʋanhu ʋose ʋakaveŋgana mukati maro, ʋacaʋa saʋakadzi; munondo uri pamsoro pefuma yaro, icapambga.
Kuwoma kuri pamsoro pemvura yaro, icapxa; nokuti inyika yemifananidzo yakaʋezwa, ʋanopeŋgera ɀifananidzo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀikara ɀamarenje ɀicagara’mo, pamŋe cete namapere, nemhou dzicagara’mo; hapaŋgazogarwi nokusiŋgaperi, hakuna‐uŋgagara’mo kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Mŋari seɀaakaparadza Sodoma neGomora namamŋe maguta akaŋga akaɓatana nawo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — saiɀoɀo hakunomunhu uŋgagara’mo, hakunomŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋa’mo ari mutorwa.
Tarirai, rudzi rwaʋanhu runobva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, rudzi rukuru namadzimambo mazhinji acamutswa abve kumigumo yenyika.
Ʋakaɓata ʋuta nepfumo, ʋanehasha, haʋanenyasha; manzwi aʋo anotinhira seguŋgwa, ʋakataȿa mabiza, mumŋe nomumŋe wakashoŋgedzwa somurwi, kuzorwa newe, iwe mukunda weBabironi.
Mambo weBabironi wakanzwa guhu raʋo, maʋoko ake akashaiwa simba, waɓatwa nokutambudzika nokurwadziwa sokwomukadzi unosurumuka.

Tarirai, ucaʋuya seshumba acibva kumatenhere aJoridani kuzorwa noʋugaro bgakasimba; nokuti ndicaʋatizisa’po pakarepo; wakatsaurwa ndiye wandicagadza’po; nokuti ndiani waka. fanana neni? Ndiani ucanditarira ŋguʋa? Mufudzi uŋgamira pamberi paŋgu ndiani?

Naiɀoɀo cinzwai cireʋo caJehova caakatema pamsoro peBabironi, nemifuŋgo yake yaakafuŋga pamsoro penyika yaʋaKardea: Ɀirokwaɀo ʋacaʋakwekweredza, iʋo ʋaɗuku ʋamapoka aʋo; ɀirokwaɀo mafuro aʋo acashamiswa pamsoro paʋo.
Nyika inoɗeɗera nomubvumo wokukundwa kweBabironi, kucema kunonzwika pakati pamarudzi
Ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndicamutsira Babironi naʋagere Rebi‐kamai mhepo inoparadza.
Ndicatumira Babironi ʋarudzi ʋacarirudza, ʋacaɓuɗisa ɀose ɀiri munyika yaro, nokuti nezuʋa rokutambudzika ʋacarikomberedza kumatiʋi ose.
Mufuri ŋgaafure noʋuta bgake aninani unofura noʋuta nounoɀisimudza aneŋguʋo dzake dzokurwa, regai kunzwira tsitsi majaya aro, paradzai cose hondo yaro yose.
Ʋacawira pasi ʋaʋurawa panyika yaʋaKardea, ʋaɓayiwa munzira dzaro.
Nokuti Israeri naJuda haʋana‐kurashwa naMŋari waʋo, naJehova wehondo, kunyaŋge nyika yaʋo izere nemhoȿa pamberi poMutȿene waIsraeri.
Tizai mubve mukati meBabironi, mumŋe nomumŋe aponese ʋupenyu bgake; regai kuparadzwa mukati meɀakaipa ɀaro, nokuti iŋguʋa yokutsiʋa kwaJehova, iye ucariripidzira.
Babironi wakaŋga uri mukombe wendarama muruʋoko rwaJehova, wakaɓatisa nyika yose; marudzi aʋanhu akanwa waini yawo, saka marudzi akapeŋga.
Baberi rakawira pasi pakarepo rikaparadzwa; wuŋgudzai pamsoro paro, torai muti webarsami kurapa kurwadziwa kwaro, ɀimŋe riŋgapora.
Taiɗa kuporesa Babironi, asi harina‐kupora; risiyei, mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu aende kunyika yake, nokuti mhoȿa yaro yaȿikira kuɗeŋga, yasimudzirwa kumakore.
Jehova wakaratidza kururama kweɗu; ʋuyai, tiparidze paZioni ɓasa raJehova Mŋari weɗu.
Rodzai miseʋe, ɓatisai nhoʋo! Jehova wakamutsa mŋeya yamadzimambo aʋaMedia, nokuti muraŋgariro wake ndowokuparadza Babironi, nokuti ndiko kutsiʋa kwaJehova, iko kutsiʋa kwetembere yake.
Simudzirai maȿiŋgo eBabironi mureza, simbisai ʋarindi, isai’po nharirire, gadzirai ʋanoʋandira, nokuti Jehova wakafuŋga nokuita ɀaakataura pamsoro paʋagere Babironi.
Iwe ugere pamvura zhinji, unefuma zhinji, kuguma kwako kwaȿika, ico ciyero ceɀawakawana nokunyeŋgera.
Jehova wehondo wakapika naiye amene,
Ndiye wakaita nyika nesimba rake, wakateya nyika noʋucenjeri bgake, wakatatamura ɗeŋga rose nenjere dzake.
Kana aciɓuɗisa inzwi rake, kunomubvumo wemvura zhinji kuɗeŋga; unokwidza makore pamigumo yenyika, unoita mheni kuʋuyisa mvura, unoɓuɗisa mhepo panoʋigwa fuma yake.
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe waʋa usinenjere, haaneziʋo; mupfuri mumŋe nomumŋe wendarama unonyadziswa necifananidzo cake
Haɀinamaturo, iɓasa rinonyeŋgera; paŋguʋa yokurobga kwaɀo ɀicapera.
Mugoʋe waJakobo haufanani naiɀoɀi, nokuti ndiye muʋumbi waɀose;
Iwe uri nyundo yaŋgu nenhumbi dzaŋgu dzokurwa; newe ndicaputsanya marudzi aʋanhu; newe ndicaparadza ʋushe;
newe ndicaputsanya biza nomutaȿi waro; newe ndicaputsanya ŋgoro nounofamba nayo;
newe ndicaputsanya murume nomukadzi; newe ndicaputsanya mutana nomuɗuku; newe ndicaputsanya mujaya nemhandara;
newe ndicaputsanya mufudzi neɓoka rake; newe ndicaputsanya murimi nenzombe dzake mbiri; newe ndicaputsanya ʋaɓati naʋakuru.
Ndicaripidzira Babironi naʋose ʋagere Kardea ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose ɀaʋakaita Zioni pamberi penyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Tarira, ndinemhoȿa newe, iwe gomo rokuparadza, rinoparadza nyika yose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kwauri, ndicakukuŋgurusa pamabge, ndicakuita gomo rakatȿa.
Haʋaŋgatori kwauri ibge rekona, kana ibge renheyo; asi ucaʋa ɗoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Simudzai mureza panyika, ridzai hwamanda pakati pamarudzi, gadzirai marudzi kuzorwa naro, kokerai ʋushe bgeArarati neMini neAshkenazi kuzorwa naro, gadzai mukuru wehondo kuzorwa naro, ʋuyisai mabiza semhashu dzinoparadza.
Gadzirai marudzi kuzorwa naro, iwo madzimambo aʋaMedia, naʋaɓati ʋaʋo, naʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋose, nenyika yose yaʋakaɓata.
Nyika inoɗeɗera nokurwadziwa; nokuti ɀakafuŋga Jehova kuitira Babironi ɀakasimba, kuti aite nyika yeBabironi ɗoŋgo, isina‐unogara’mo.
Mhare dzeBabironi dzarega kurwa, ʋakarambira munhare dzaʋo, simba raʋo rakapera, ʋaʋa saʋakadzi; ʋakapisa dzimba dzaro, ɀipfigiso ɀaro ɀakavuniwa.
Imŋe nhume icamhanya kundosoŋgana neimŋe, mumŋe wakatumŋa kundosoŋgana nomumŋe, kuziʋisa mambo weBabironi kuti guta rake rakundwa kumatiʋi ose.
Ʋuye kuti mazambuko aɓatwa, kuti mapani eshaŋga apiswa nomŋoto, kuti ʋarwi ʋavunduswa.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Mukunda weBabironi wakaita seɓuriro neŋguʋa yokupura; kwasara ŋguʋa ɗuku, iye ndokuȿikirwa neŋguʋa yokuceka.
Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi wandidya, wandipxanya, wandiita mudziyo usinecinhu, wandimedza seshato, razadza ziɗumbu raro neɀinozipa ɀaŋgu, wandidziŋga.
Ugere Zioni ucati: Ɀakaipa ɀandakaitirwa ini nenyama yaŋgu ŋgaɀiʋe pamsoro peBabironi; Jerusarema ricati: Ropa raŋgu ŋgariʋe pamsoro paʋagere Kardea.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarira, ndicakureʋerera mhaka yako, ndicakutsiʋa; ndicapxisa guŋgwa raro, ndicawomesa tsime raro.
Babironi ricaitwa mirwi
ʋacaʋomba pamŋe cete saʋana ʋeshumba, ʋacagannya saʋanana ʋeshumba.
Kana ʋamutswa
Ndicaʋaɓurusira kwaʋanondoɓayiwa samakwaiana, samakondobge pamŋe cete nenhoŋgo.
Sheshaki rakundwa sei!
Guŋgwa rakwira raȿika Babironi, rafukidzwa namafuŋgu aro mazhinji.
Maguta aro aʋa matoŋgo, nyika yakawoma nerenje, nenyika musiŋgagari munhu, hakunomŋanakomana womunhu unopfuʋura napo.
Ndicatoŋga Beri paBabironi, ndicaɓuɗisa mumuromo make caakaŋga amedza, marudzi aʋanhu haacazoʋaŋgiri kwariri; ɀirokwaɀo ruȿiŋgo rwaBabironi rucawa.
Imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ɓuɗai mukati maro, muɀiponese mumŋe nomumŋe pakutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova.
Mŋoyo yenyu irege kuʋora, musatya guhu ricanzwika panyika, nokuti guhu ricaʋuya rimŋe gore, nerimŋe guhu ɀe nerimŋe gore shure kwaiɀoɀo; panyika ʋacaitirana simba, muɓati mumŋe acirwa nomumŋe.
Naiɀoɀo tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya andicatoŋga mifananidzo yakaʋezwa yaBabironi; nyika yaro yose icanyadziswa, ʋakaʋurawa ʋaro ʋose ʋacawira pasi mukati maro.
Ipapo ɗeŋga nenyika neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo ɀicaimba nomufaro pamsoro peBabironi, nokuti ʋaparadzi ʋacaʋuya kwariri ʋacibva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Imi ʋakaʋurawa ʋaIsraeri, Babironi rinofanira kuwa ʋo, seɀakawira pasi paBabironi ʋakaʋurawa ʋenyika yose.
Imi makapukunyuka pamunondo, endai, musamira; raŋgarirai Jehova muri kure, fuŋgai Jerusarema pamŋoyo yenyu.
Takanyadziswa, nokuti takanzwa kushoʋorwa, kunyara kwakafukidza ɀiso ɀeɗu, nokuti ʋatorwa ʋakapinda munɀimbo tȿene dzeimba yaJehova.
Naiɀoɀo, tarirai, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — mazuʋa anoʋuya andicatoŋga mifananidzo yaro yakaʋezwa; ʋakakuʋadzwa ʋacagomera kwose panyika yaro.
Kunyaŋge Babironi rikakwira kuɗeŋga, kunyaŋge rikasimbisa pakakwirira panesimba raro, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋaparadzi ʋacabva kwandiri ʋacienda’ko — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
inzwi rokucema rinobva Babironi, nerokuparadzwa kukuru rinobva panyika yaʋaKardea!
Nokuti Jehova unoparadza Babironi, ucanyaradza’mo mubvumo mukuru; mafuŋgu aʋo anotinhira semvura zhinji, mubvumo wamanzwi aʋo anonzwika.
Nokuti muparadzi waȿika kwariri, iko Babironi, mhare dzaro dzakundwa, ʋuta bgaʋo bgavuniwa‐vuniwa; nokuti Jehova ndiMŋari wokutsiʋa, ucaripidzira ɀirokwaɀo.
Ndicaɓatisa
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Maȿiŋgo akafara eBabironi acakoromorwa cose, namasuʋo aro marefu acapiswa nomŋoto; ʋanhu ʋacaɓatira ɀisinamaturo, namarudzi
Jeremia akanyora mubuku ɀakaipa ɀose ɀaifanira kuwira Babironi, iwo mashoko ose akanyorwa pamsoro peBabironi.
Jeremia akati kunaSeraia: Kana waȿika Babironi raŋgarira kuti uraʋe mashoko awa ose,
uti: Haiwa Jehova, makataura pamsoro penɀimbo ino, kuti mucaiparadza, kuti kusaʋa nounogara’mo, kana munhu kana ɀipfuwo, asi kuti ricaʋa ɗoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino kana wapedza kuraʋa buku iyi, unofanira kusuŋgira ibge pairi, ndokuikandira mukati
uciti: Saiɀoɀo Babironi ricanyura, hariŋgazoɓuɗi ɀe, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀandicaʋuyisa pamsoro paro; ʋacaneta.
Ndi’po panoguma mashoko aJeremia.
Zedekia wakataŋga kuɓata ʋushe aʋa namakore anamakumi maʋiri nerimŋe, akaɓata ʋushe paJerusarema makore anegumi nerimŋe; zita ramai ʋake rakaŋga riri Hamutari mukunda waJeremia weRibna.
Akaita ɀakaipa pamberi paJehova netsika dzose dzaJehoiakimi.
Nokuti iɀoɀo ɀakaitirwa Jerusarema naJuda nokuɗa kwokutsamŋa kwaJehova, kuȿikira aʋarashira kure kwaari; Zedekia akamukira mambo weBabironi.

Ɀino negore repfumbamŋe rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, nomŋedzi wegumi, nezuʋa regumi romŋedzi, Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi akaȿika, iye nehondo yake yose, kuzorwa neJerusarema, ʋakadzika matente aʋo’po, ʋakarikomba nenhare.
Naiɀoɀo guta rakakombga kuȿikira pagore regumi nerimŋe ramambo Zedekia.
Ɀino nomŋedzi wecinna, nezuʋa repfumbamŋe romŋedzi, nzara ikanyanya kwaɀo paguta, ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakashaiwa ɀokudya.

Ʋakaputsa ruȿiŋgo rweguta, ʋanhu ʋose ʋehondo ʋakatiza, ʋakaɓuɗa muguta ʋusiku nenzira yesuʋo, pakati pamadziro maʋiri aiʋa pamunda wamambo; (ɀino ʋaKardea ʋakaŋga ʋakakomba guta); ʋakaenda nenzira yokurenje.
Asi hondo yaʋaKardea yakateʋera mambo, ʋakaɓata Zedekia pamapani eJeriko, hondo yake yose ikapararira ikabva kwaari.
Ɀino ʋakaɓata mambo, ʋakaenda naye kunamambo weBabironi paRibra munyika yeHamati, iye akamutoŋgera’
Mambo weBabironi akaʋuraya ʋanakomana ʋaZedekia iye aciɀiʋona, akaʋuraya ʋo macinda ose aJuda paRibra.
Akatumbura meso aZedekia, mambo weBabironi akamusuŋga namatare, akamuisa Babironi, akamusuŋga mutoroŋgo kuȿikira pazuʋa rokufa kwake.

Ɀino nomŋedzi wecishanu, nezuʋa regumi romŋedzi, negore regumi namapfumbamŋe ramambo Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi, waimira pamberi pamambo weBabironi, wakaȿika Jerusarema.
Akapisa imba yaJehova, neimba yamambo; akapisa ʋo dzimba dzose dzeJerusarema, dzimba dzose huru, nomŋoto.
Hondo yose yaʋaKardea, yakaŋga inomukuru waʋarindi, ikaputsa maȿiŋgo ose eJerusarema kunhiʋi dzose.
Ipapo Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akatapa ʋamŋe ʋarombo caiʋo ʋaʋanhu, naʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasara muguta, naʋakaŋga ʋanyeŋgera ʋakaenda kunamambo weBabironi, naʋakaŋga ʋasara kuʋazhinji.
Asi Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akasiya ʋamŋe ʋarombo caiʋo ʋenyika, kuti ʋaʋe ʋarimi ʋeminda yemizambiriŋga nemimŋe minda.
ƲaKardea ʋakaputsanya mbiru dzendarira dzakaŋga dziri mumba maJehova, neɀiŋgoro, nedziʋa rendarira, ɀakaŋga ɀiri mumba maJehova, ʋakaenda nendarira yaɀo yose Babironi.
Ʋakatora ʋo hari nefoshoro nembato dzemŋenje, nembiya, neɀiroŋgo, nenhumbi dzose dzendarira dzaʋaiɓata nadzo.
Nemikombe, neɀaeŋga ɀomŋoto, nembiya, nehari, neɀitimiko ɀemŋenje, neɀiroŋgo, nemidziyo, ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀendarama neɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀesirveri, mukuru waʋarindi akaɀitora.
Mbiru mbiri, nedziʋa rimŋe, nehando gumi nembiri dzendarira dzaiʋa pasi peɀiŋgoro, ɀakaŋga ɀaitirwa imba yaJehova naSoromoni, kurema kwendarira yenhumbi idzi dzose kwakaŋga kusiŋgagoni kuyerwa.

Ɀino kana dziri mbiru, kureɓa kwembiru imŋe kwakaȿika makubiti anegumi namasere; pakuyera rwonzi rwakaȿika makubiti anegumi namaʋiri rwakarupoteredza; pakukora yakaȿika minwe minna; mukati makaŋga munemhaŋgo.

Yakaŋga inomusoro wendarira pamsoro payo, kureɓa kwomusoro mumŋe kwakaȿika makubiti mashanu, ʋuye kwakaŋga kuneɀakarukwa namatamba ɀaipoteredza musoro, ɀose ɀiri ɀendarira; nembiru yecipiri yakaŋga yakafanana neyiyi, namatamba ʋo.
Pamatiʋi pakaŋga panamatamba makumi mapfumbamŋe namatanhatu; matamba ose akaȿika zana paneɀakarukwa pamatiʋi ose.
Mukuru waʋarindi akatora Seraia muprista mukuru, naZefania muprista wecipiri, naʋarindi ʋatatu ʋomukoʋa;

napaguta akatora mukuru waitarira ʋarume ʋehondo, naʋarume ʋanomŋe ʋaisiʋonana namambo, ʋaakawana muguta, nomunyori womukuru wehondo, waiʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋenyika, naʋarume ʋanamakumi matanhatu ʋaʋanhu ʋenyika, ʋaakawana mukati meguta.
Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi akaʋatora, akaʋaisa kunamambo weBabironi paRibra.
Mambo weBabironi akaʋaɓaya, akaʋaʋuraya paRibra, panyika yeHamati. Naiɀoɀo ʋaJuda ʋakatapxa panyika yaʋo.
Ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋakatapxa naNebukadrezari; negore recinomŋe ʋaJuda ʋaneɀuru ɀitatu namakumi maʋiri naʋatatu;
negore regumi namasere raNebukadrezari wakatapa paJerusarema ʋanhu ʋanamazana masere namakumi matatu naʋaʋiri, akaenda naʋo;
negore ramakumi maʋiri namatatu raNebukadrezari, Nebuzaradani mukuru waʋarindi wakatapa kuʋaJuda ʋanhu ʋanamazana manomŋe namakumi manna naʋashanu; ʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa ɀuru ɀinna namazana matatu.
Ɀino negore ramakumi matatu namanomŋe rokutapxa kwaJehoiakini mambo waJuda, nomŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namashanu romŋedzi, Eviri‐merodaki mambo weBabironi negore
akataura naye nomŋoyo munyoro, akakudza cigaro cake coʋushe kukunda ɀigaro ɀoʋushe ɀamadzimambo akaŋga anaye paBabironi,
akashandura ŋguʋo dzake dzokusuŋgwa.
Kana ɀiri ɀokurarama naɀo, waisipiwa ɀokurarama naɀo namambo weBabironi ŋguʋa dzose, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe mugoʋe waro, kuȿikira zuʋa rokufa kwake, mazuʋa ose oʋupenyu bgake.
Haiwa, guta, rakaŋga rizere naʋanhu, rinogara sei riri roga!
Iro, rakaŋga riri guru pakati pamarudzi, raʋa secirikadzi!
Iro, rakaŋga riri ʋamŋoyo pakati penyika, roʋigira mutero.
Rinocema ɀikuru ʋusiku, misodzi yaro iri pamatama aro;
Pakati paʋaɗiwa ʋaro ʋose rinoshaiwa muʋaraidzi,
Shamŋari dzaro dzose dzarinyeŋgera, dzashanduka ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaro.
Juda ʋaenda kuʋutorwa nokuɗa kwokutambudzika, nokuɗa kwokuɓatiswa ɀikuru;
Ʋanogara pakati pamarudzi,
Ʋose ʋaidziŋgana naʋo ʋakaʋaɓata pakamanikana.
Nzira dzeZioni dzinocema, nokuti hakuna‐wakaʋuya kumutambo,
Masuʋo aro ose akaparadzwa, ʋaprista ʋaro ʋanogomera,
Mhandara dzaro dzinotambudzika, iro rimene rinoʋaʋirwa.
Ʋadziʋisi ʋaro ndiʋo ʋaʋa ʋakuru, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaro ʋanofara;
Nokuti Jehova wakaritambudza nemhaka yokuɗarika kwaro kuzhinji;
Ʋana ʋaro ʋaɗuku ʋakaenda kuʋutorwa pamberi pomudziʋisi.
Kunaka kwake kwose kwabva pamukunda weZioni;
Macinda ake aita senondo dzinoshaiwa mafuro,
Akatiza asinesimba pamberi pounodziŋgana nawo.
Namazuʋa okutambudzika nokudzuŋgaira kwaro, Jerusarema rinoraŋgarira ɀose ɀairifadza kubva pamazuʋa akare;
Paŋguʋa yakawira ʋanhu ʋaro pamaʋoko omudziʋisi, kusinawakariɓatsira,
Ʋadziʋisi ʋakariʋona, ʋakaseka kuparadzwa kwaro.
Jerusarema rakatadza ɀikuru kwaɀo, naiɀoɀo raitwa secinhu cisakanaka;
Ʋose ʋairikudza, ʋorishoʋora, nokuti ʋakaʋona kushama kwaro;
Ɀirokwaɀo, rakagomera, rikadzokera shure.
Tȿina yaro yakaŋga iri paŋguʋo yaro, harina‐kuraŋgarira kuguma kwaro;
Naiɀoɀo rakanyura ɀinoshamisa, harinamunyaradzi;
Tarirai, Jehova, kutambudzika kwaŋgu, nokuti muʋeŋgi waɀikudza.
Mudziʋisi watambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kuneɀose ɀaro ɀinofadza;
Nokuti rakaʋona marudzi acipinda panɀimbo yaro tȿene,
Ʋamakaŋga maraira pamsoro paʋo kuti ʋarege kupinda paʋuŋgano yenyu.
Ʋanhu ʋaro ʋose ʋanogomera, ʋanotȿaka ɀokudya;
Ʋakapa ɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀinofadza kuti ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀokusimbisa mŋeya yaʋo;
Tarirai, Jehova, muʋone; nokuti ndaitwa wakaɀidzwa.
Nhai, imi mose munopfuʋura, hamunehanya naɀo here?
Tarirai muʋone kana kucema kuri’po kwakafanana nokucema kwaŋgu, kwakaʋuyiswa pamsoro paŋgu,
Kwandakatambudzwa nako naJehova nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwake kukuru.
Wakatuma mŋoto mumafupa aŋgu, ɀicibva kumsoro, ukaʋakunda;
Wakadzikira tsoka dzaŋgu mumbure, akandidzosera shure;
Wakandiparadza nokundishaisa simba zuʋa rose.
Joko rokuɗarika kwaŋgu kuzhinji rakasuŋgwa noruʋoko rwake;
Ɀakarukwa, ɀaiswa pamutsipa waŋgu, ɀandishaisa simba raŋgu;
Ishe wakandiisa mumaʋoko aʋandisiŋgagoni kudziʋisa.
Ishe wakashaisa simba mhare dzaŋgu dzose mukati maŋgu;
Wakakokera ʋuŋgano yakatarwa kuzondipxanyira majaya aŋgu;
Ishe wakatsika mukunda mhandara yaJuda sapaciȿiniro.
Ndinocema nokuɗa kweɀinhu iɀi, ziso raŋgu, ziso raŋgu rinoyerera mvura,
Nokuti munyaradzi, waifanira kusimbisa mŋeya waŋgu, uri kure neni;
Ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋasiyiwa, nokuti muʋeŋgi wakunda.
Zioni rinotambanudza maʋoko aro, hakuna‐uŋgarinyaradza;
Jehova wakaraira pamsoro paJakobo, kuti ʋakamupoteredza ʋaʋe ʋadziʋisi ʋake;
Jerusarema riri pakati paʋo secinhu cisakanaka.
Jehova wakarurama, nokuti ndakamukira murairo wake;
Ƌotererai imi ʋanhu ʋose, muʋone kucema kwaŋgu;
Mhandara dzaŋgu namajaya aŋgu aenda kuʋutorwa.
Ndakaɗana ʋaindiɗa, asi ʋakandinyeŋgera;
Ʋaprista ʋaŋgu naʋakuru ʋaŋgu ʋakaparara muguta,
Paŋguʋa yaʋakaŋga ʋaciɀitȿakira ɀokudya kusimbisa mŋeya yaʋo.
Tarirai, Jehova, nokuti ndiri panjodzi, mŋoyo waŋgu unotambudzika;
Mŋoyo waŋgu washanduka mukati maŋgu, nokuti ndaka
Kunze munondo uno
Ʋakandinzwa ndicigomera, hakuna‐unondiyaradza;
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu ʋose ʋakanzwa nhamo dzaŋgu, ʋanofara kuti makaɀiita;
Mucaʋuyisa zuʋa ramakatara, ipapo ʋacafanana neni.
Ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose ŋgaɀiʋuye pamberi penyu;
Muʋaitire iʋo seɀamakandiitira ini nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwaŋgu kwose;
Nokuti kugomera kwaŋgu kuzhinji, mŋoyo waŋgu washaiwa simba.
Ishe wakafukidza sei mukunda weZioni negore rokutsamŋa kwake!
Wakabvisa kunaka kwaIsraeri akaɀikandira pasi,
Akasaraŋgarira citsiko cake nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwake.
Ishe wakamedza ʋugaro bgose bgaJakobo, akasanzwira tsitsi;
Pakutsamŋa kwake wakawisira pasi nhare dzomukunda waJuda;
Wakadziwisira pasi; wakamhura ʋushe namacinda abgo.
Nokutsamŋa kukuru wakagura nyaŋga dzose dzaIsraeri;
Wakadzosa ruʋoko rwake rworudyi pamberi pomuʋeŋgi,
Akapisa munaJakobo somuraɀo womŋoto unopedza ɀose kumatiʋi ose.
Wakawembura ʋuta bgake somuʋeŋgi, wakamira noruʋoko rwake somudziʋisi,
Akaʋuraya ʋose ʋaifadza meso;
Wakaɗurura kutsamŋa kwake somŋoto patente romukunda weZioni.
Ishe waʋa somuʋeŋgi, wakamedza Israeri;
Wakamedza dzimba dzaʋo dzose dzoʋushe, wakaparadza nhare dzaʋo;
Akawanzira mukunda waJuda kucema nokurira.
Wakabvisa ruzhowa rwake nesimba sorwomunda; wakaparadza nɀimbo yake yokuʋuŋgana;
Jehova wakakaŋganwisa paZioni ʋuŋgano yakatarwa nesaɓata,
Akashoʋora madzimambo naʋaprista neshuŋgu dzokutsamŋa kwake.
Jehova wakarasha artari yake, wakasema nɀimbo yake tȿene,
Wakaisa maȿiŋgo edzimba dzaʋo dzoʋushe mumaʋoko omuʋeŋgi;
Ʋakaita ɓope mumba maJehova, sapazuʋa reʋuŋgano yakatarwa.
Jehova wakafuŋga kuparadza ruȿiŋgo rwomukunda weZioni;
Wakatatanura rwonzi rwokuyera, haana‐kudzosa ruʋoko rwake pakuparadza;
Wakacemedza nhare noruȿiŋgo, ɀinopera simba pamŋe cete.
Masuʋo aro akanyura pasi, wakaparadza nokuvuna ɀipfigiso ɀaro;
Mambo waro namacinda aro ʋari pakati pamarudzi asinomurairo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ʋaprofita ʋaro haʋana‐ɀaʋanoratidzwa naJehova.
Ʋakuru ʋomukunda weZioni ʋagere pasi, ʋanoramba ʋanyerere;
Ʋakakushira guruʋa pamisoro yaʋo, ʋakaɀisuŋga ɀiʋuno namasaga;
Mhandara dzeJerusarema dzakakotamisa misoro yadzo pasi.
Meso aŋgu apera nemisodzi, mŋoyo waŋgu unotambudzika;
Ciropa caŋgu caɗururirwa pasi, nemhaka yokuparadzwa kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu,
Nokuti ʋanana naʋanomna ʋanoziya munzira dzomuguta.
Ʋanoti kunamadzimai aʋo: Ɀiyo newaini ɀiripiko?
Ʋaciŋgoziya munzira dzomuguta saʋakakuʋadzwa,
Mŋeya yaʋo iciɗururirwa mucifuʋa camadzimai aʋo.
Ndicakupupureiko? Ndicakufananidza nei, iwe mukunda weJerusarema?
Ndicakuenzanisa nei, kuti ndikunyaradze, iwe mhandara mukunda weZioni?
Nokuti pawakaparadzwa pakakura seguŋgwa, ndiani ucakuporesa?
Ʋaprofita ʋako ʋakakuʋonera ɀiratidzo ɀenhema neɀoʋupenzi;
Haʋana‐kuɓuɗisa ɀakaipa ɀako, kuti ʋadzose kutapxa kwako,
Asi ʋakakuʋonera ɀireʋo ɀenhema neɀinokutapisa.
Ʋose ʋanopfuʋura ʋacaita nondo pamsoro pako;
Ʋanoridza muridzo nokudzuŋgudzira mukunda weJerusarema misoro yaʋo,
Ko ndiro guta rainzi naʋanhu: Rakanaka‐naka kwaɀo, mufaro wenyika yose?
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋose ʋakakushamisira miromo yaʋo;
Ʋanoridza muridzo nokugeɗa‐geɗa meno, ʋanoti: Tarimedza;
Ɀirokwaɀo ndiro zuʋa ratakaŋga takatarira; tariwana, tariʋona.
Jehova wakaita iɀo ɀaakafuŋga, wakapedzisa shoko rake raakaraira pamazuʋa akare;
Wakawisira pasi, akasaʋa netsitsi;
Wakafadza muʋeŋgi pamsoro pako, wakasimudza runyaŋga rwaʋadziʋisi ʋako.
Mŋoyo yaʋo yakaɗana kunaShe.
Iwe ruȿiŋgo rwomukunda weZioni, misodzi ŋgaiyerere sorwizi masikati noʋusiku,
Usazorora, mboni yeziso rako isarega
Muka, ɗanidzira ʋusiku, pakutaŋga kweŋguʋa
Ƌurura mŋoyo wako semvura pamberi paJehova;
Simudzira maʋoko ako kwaari nokuɗa kwoʋupenyu bgaʋanana ʋako, ʋanoziya nenzara pakuʋamba kwenzira imŋe neimŋe yomuguta.
Tarirai, Jehova, muʋone ʋamakaitira ɀakaɗai!
Ko ʋakadzi ʋaŋgadya ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo, iʋo ʋana ʋari pamaʋoko here?
Ko ʋaprista naʋaprofita ʋaŋgaʋurawa panɀimbo tȿene yaShe here?
Majaya naʋatana ʋaʋete pasi munzira dzomuguta;
Mhandara dzaŋgu namajaya aŋgu ʋaʋurawa nomunondo;
Makaʋaʋuraya nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwenyu, makaɓaya, hamuna‐kunzwira tsitsi.
Makaɗana ɀinondityisa pamatiʋi ose, sapazuʋa reʋuŋgano yakatarwa;
Hakuna‐wakapukunyuka kana wakasara pazuʋa rokutsamŋa kwaJehova;
Ʋandakaɓata
Ndini munhu wakaʋona kutambudzika neshamhu yokutsamŋa kwake.
Wakandituŋgamirira akandifambisa murima ndisineciedza.
Ɀirokwaɀo unogara aciŋgondiramba zuʋa rose noruʋoko rwake.
Wakasakadza nyama yaŋgu neganda raŋgu, wakavuna mafupa aŋgu.
Wakandiʋakira
Wakandigarisa panɀimbo dzinerima, saʋanhu ʋakaŋguʋa ʋafa.
Wakandikomberedza noruȿiŋgo, kuti ndirege kugona kuɓuɗa; wakaremesa maketani aŋgu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kana ndiciɗana nokuridza mhere, unodziʋisa munyeŋgetero waŋgu.
Wakadziʋira nzira dzaŋgu noruȿiŋgo rwamabge akaʋezwa, wakakaŋganisa nzira dzaŋgu.
Kwandiri wakaita seɓere rinoʋandira, seshumba iri panɀimbo dzisiŋgazikanwi.
Wakatsausa nzira dzaŋgu, akandibvarura‐bvarura, wakandiita renje.
Wakawembura ʋuta bgake, akandiita cinhu cokuposhera nomuseʋe.
Wakapinza miseʋe yegoɓa rake mutȿo dzaŋgu.
Ndaʋa cinhu cinosekwa naʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋose, neciimbo caʋo zuʋa rose.
Wakandigutisa neɀinoʋaʋa, wakandinwisa gaʋakaʋa.
Wakapedza meno aŋgu norubge, wakandifukidza namaɗota.
Makarashira mŋeya waŋgu kure norugare, ndakakaŋganwa kuti ɀakanaka ɀakaɗini.
Ini ndikati: Simba raŋgu rapera, neɀandakaŋga ndakatarira kunaJehova.
Raŋgarirai kutambudzika kwaŋgu nenhamo yaŋgu, iro gaʋakaʋa nenduru.
Mŋeya waŋgu ucaŋgoɀiraŋgarira naɀino, wakakotama mukati maŋgu.
Ndinoɀifuŋga iɀo, naiɀoɀo ndinetariro.
Nokuɗa kwoʋunyoro bgaJehova tigere kupedzwa, nokuti tsitsi dzake hadziperi.
Maŋgwanani ose ɀaʋa ɀitȿa; kutendeka kwenyu kukuru.
Jehova ndiwo mugoʋe waŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura mŋeya waŋgu; naiɀoɀo ndicaʋimba naye.
Jehova unoitira ɀakanaka ʋanomumirira, naiwo mŋeya unomutȿaka.
Ɀakanaka kuti munhu aʋimbe
Ɀakanaka kuti munhu atakure joko rake aciri muɗuku.
Ŋgaagare ari oga anyerere, nokuti ndiye wakariisa pamsoro pake.
Ŋgaaise muromo wake muguruʋa; ɀimŋe tariro ici’po.
Ŋgaarinzire ɗama rake kunounomuroʋa, ŋgaagutiswe nokushoʋorwa.
Nokuti Ishe haaŋgadziŋgi nokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti kunyaŋge akacemedza, ucanzwira tsitsi nokuwanda kweŋgoni dzake.
Nokuti haatambudzi nomŋoyo wake, haacemedzi ʋana ʋaʋanhu.
Kuti ʋasuŋgwa ʋose ʋenyika ʋatsikwe pasi petsoka,
Kuti ɀakarurama ɀomunhu ɀikaŋganiswe pamberi poWokumsoro‐soro,
Kuti munhu arege kururamisirwa pamhaka yake, Ishe haafari naiɀoɀo.
Ndianiko uŋgataura, ɀikaitika, kana Ishe asiŋgaɀirairi?
Ko ɀakaipa neɀakanaka haɀiɓuɗi pamuromo woWokumsoro‐soro here?
Ko munhu mupenyu unonyunyutirei, kana iye munhu acirobga pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake?
Ŋgatinɀere nokuidza nzira dzeɗu, titendeʋukire ɀe kunaJehova.
Ŋgatisimudze mŋoyo yeɗu namaʋoko eɗu kunaMŋari uri kuɗeŋga.
Takaɗarika noku
Maka
Makaɀifukidza negore kuti kurege kuʋa nomunyeŋgetero uŋgapinda’po.
Makatiita marara neɀinorashwa pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu.
Ʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu ʋose ʋakatishamisira miromo yaʋo.
Kutya nehuzha ɀaȿika kwatiri nokupedzwa nokuparadzwa.
Ziso raŋgu rinoyerera nzizi dzemvura pamsoro pokuparadzwa kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ziso raŋgu rinoɗurura
Kuȿikira Jehova acitarira aciʋona ari kuɗeŋga.
Ziso raŋgu rinorwadzisa mŋeya waŋgu nemhaka yaʋakunda ʋose ʋeguta raŋgu.
Ʋakadziŋgana neni ɀikuru seshiri, iʋo, ʋanondiʋeŋga ndisinemhaka.
Ʋakaparadza ʋupenyu bgaŋgu mugomba, ʋakakandira ibge pamsoro paŋgu.
Mvura zhinji yakafukidza musoro waŋgu; ndakati: Ndapera.
Ndakaɗana zita renyu, Jehova, ndiri mugomba rakadzika kwaɀo.
Makanzwa inzwi raŋgu; regai kundiʋanzira nzeʋe yenyu pakufema kwaŋgu nokucema kwaŋgu.
Makasweɗera nezuʋa randakaɗana kwamuri, makati: Usatya.
Ishe, imi makandireʋerera mhaka dzomŋeya waŋgu, makadzikinura ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Haiwa Jehova, makaʋona kusaruramisirwa kwaŋgu, nditoŋgerei mhaka yaŋgu.
Makaʋona kutsiʋa kwaʋo kwose, namano aʋo ose pamsoro paŋgu.
Makanzwa kushoʋora kwaʋo, Jehova, namano aʋo ose pamsoro paŋgu,
Iyo miromo yaʋakandimukira neɀaʋakandifuŋgira zuʋa rose.
Tarirai kugara kwaʋo pasi nokusimuka kwaʋo; ndiri ciimbo caʋo.
Imi mucaʋatsiʋa, Jehova, ɀakafanira ɓasa ramaʋoko aʋo.
Mucaʋapa kuwoma kwomŋoyo, ndiko kutuka kwenyu pamsoro paʋo.
Mucadziŋgana naʋo makatsamŋa, nokuʋaparadza pasi peɗeŋga raJehova.
Haiwa, ndarama yaȿiɓa sei! Ndarama yakaiȿo‐naka yashanduka sei!
Mabge enɀimbo tȿene arashirwa pamharadzano dzenzira dzomuguta.
Ʋanakomana ʋanoɗikanwa ʋeZioni ʋakafanana nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka,
Haiwa ʋakanzi ʋakaita seɀiroŋgo ɀevu sei, iro ɓasa romuʋumbi wehari!
Kunyaŋge namakaʋa anoɓuɗisa mazamu, acimŋisa ʋana ʋawo;
Mukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu waʋa nehasha semhou murenje.
Rurimi rwomŋana unomŋa runonamatira mumukanwa womuromo wake nenyota;
Ʋanana ʋanokumbira ciŋgwa, asi hakunomunhu unoʋameɗurira.
Aʋo ʋaisidya ɀinozipa, ʋarashwa munzira dzomuguta;
Ʋairerwa ʋakafuka miceka mitȿuku, ɀino ʋotsiʋama pamaturunhuru.
Nokuti ɀakaipa ɀomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ɀinopfuʋura ɀiʋi ɀeSodoma,
Iro rakaparadzwa kamŋe‐kamŋe kusinamaʋoko akariɓata.
Macinda aro akaŋga akapfuʋura cando nokunaka, akaŋga akacena kupfuʋura mukaka,
Akaŋga akatȿuka pamuʋiri kupfuʋura makorari, pakuʋonekwa akaŋga akaita sesafiri.
Ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀaȿiɓa kupfuʋura mazimbe, haʋazikanwi munzira dzomuguta;
Ganda raʋo rinonamatira mafupa aʋo, rawoma, rafanana neɗanda.
Ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo ʋakaita nani kunaʋakaʋurawa nenzara;
Nokuti aʋa ʋawonda, ʋaɓayiwa nokushaiwa ɀiɓereko ɀeminda.
Maʋoko aʋakadzi ʋaiʋa nomŋoyo munyoro ʋakaɓika ʋana ʋaʋo,
Ɀikaʋa ɀokudya ɀaʋo pakuparadzwa kwomukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Jehova wakaita ɀaakaŋga aciɗa nokutsamŋa kwake, wakaɗurura hasha dzake huru;
Wakaɓatidza mŋoto paZioni, wakapedza nheyo dzaro.
Madzimambo enyika haana‐kutenda, kunyaŋge naʋose ʋagere panyika
Kuti mudziʋisi nomuʋeŋgi ʋacapinda pamasuʋo eJerusarema.
Ɀakaitwa nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀaʋaprofita ʋaro, neɀakaipa ɀaʋaprista ʋaro,
Ʋakateʋura ropa raʋakarurama pakati paro.
Ʋanodzuŋgaira samapofu munzira dzomuguta, ʋakaȿiɓiswa neropa,
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu haʋagoni kuɓata ŋguʋo dzaʋo.
Ʋakaɗanidzira kwaʋari ʋaciti: Ibvai, munetȿina! Ibvai, ibvai, regai ku
Paŋguʋa yokutiza nokudzuŋgaira kwaʋo, ʋanhu ʋakati pakati pamarudzi: Haʋaŋgazogari ɀe
Kutsamŋa kwaJehova kwakaʋaparadzira; haacaʋi nehanya naʋo;
Haʋana‐kuraŋgarira ʋaprista, haʋana‐kukudza ʋakuru.
Meso eɗu anoŋgopera naɀino
Pakutarira kweɗu takatarira rudzi rusiŋgagoni kutiponesa.
Ʋanoronda makwara eɗu, naiɀoɀo hatigoni kufamba munzira dzomuguta reɗu;
Kuguma kweɗu kwaʋa pedyo, mazuʋa eɗu aȿika, nokuti kuguma kweɗu kwaȿika.
Aʋo ʋakadziŋgana nesu, ʋakamhanyisa kupfuʋura makondo okuɗeŋga;
Ʋakadziŋgana nesu pamakomo, ʋakatigarira murenje.
Mŋeya wemhino dzeɗu, iye muzodzwa waJehova, wakaɓatwa muhuzha dzaʋo;
Iye watakati: Pamumvuri wake ndi’po paticararama pakati pamarudzi.
Farisisa, uʋe nomufaro, iwe mukunda weEdomi, ugere panyika yeUzi;
Mukombe ucaȿika kwauri ʋo; ucaɓatwa
Kurobga kweɀakaipa ɀako kwapera, iwe mukunda weZioni; haacazokutapisi ɀe;
Iye uca
Raŋgarirai Jehova, ɀakatiwira;
Tarirai, muʋone kushoʋorwa kweɗu.
Nhaka yeɗu yaenda kuʋatorwa,
Nedzimba dzeɗu kunoʋokumŋe.
Tiri nherera naʋasinaɓaɓa;
Madzimai eɗu akaita secirikadzi.
Takanwa mvura yeɗu ticiita ɀokuteŋga nemari;
Huni dzeɗu takadziteŋgeserwa.
Ʋanodziŋgana nesu ʋari pamitsipa yeɗu;
Taneta, hatinezororo.
Takatambanudzira ruʋoko rweɗu kunaʋaEgipita,
NokunaʋaAsiria, kuti tigute ɀokudya.
Madziɓaɓa eɗu akatadza, ɀino haʋaci’po;
Isu takatakura ɀakaipa ɀaʋo.
Ʋaranda ʋanotiɓata ʋushe;
Hakuna‐uŋgatirwira pamaʋoko aʋo.
Tinoɀiwanira ɀokudya ɀeɗu ʋupenyu bgeɗu ʋuri panjodzi,
Nemhaka yomunondo uri kurenje.
Ganda reɗu raȿiɓa secoto,
Nemhaka yokupisa kukuru kwenzara.
Ʋakacinyira ʋakadzi paZioni,
Nemhandara pamaguta aJuda.
Macinda akasuŋgirirwa namaʋoko aʋo,
Ʋakuru haʋana‐kukudzwa.
Majaya akatakura guyo,
Ʋana ʋakagumburwa nokurema kwehuni.
Ʋakuru ʋakarega kuȿika pasuʋo,
Majaya
Mufaro womŋoyo weɗu waguma;
Kutamba kweɗu kwashanduka kucema.
Korona yawa pamisoro yeɗu;
Tinenhamo! nokuti takatadza.
Nemhaka iyi mŋoyo yeɗu yapera simba;
Nemhaka yeɀinhu iɀi meso eɗu haacaʋoni ɀakanaka;
Nokuɗa kwegomo reZioni, raʋa ɗoŋgo;
Makaʋa anofamba’po.
Imi Jehova muri’po nokusiŋgaperi;
Cigaro cenyu coʋushe ciri’po kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Munotikaŋganwireiko nokusiŋgaperi,
Munotirashireiko ŋguʋa huru yakaɗai?
Tidzoserei kwamuri, Jehova, ipapo ticadzoka;
Ʋandudzai mazuʋa eɗu aʋe sakare.
Asi makatirasha cose here?
Makatitsamŋira ɀikuru here?
Ɀino negore ramakumi matatu, no
Nezuʋa recishanu romŋedzi, riri gore recishanu rokutapxa kwamambo Jehoiakini,
shoko raJehova rakaȿika kumuprista Ezekieri, mŋanakomana waBuzi, munyika yaʋaKardea, parwizi rwaKebari; ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro pake ipapo.
Ndikatarira, ndikaʋona ɗutu remhepo ricibva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, riri gore guru rinomŋoto wairamba ucipenya, rakakomberedzwa nokubginya, nomukati maro, imo mukati momŋoto, munecinhu caipenya seɗare.
Ɀino mukati maɀo mukaɓuɗa ɀakaŋga ɀakaita seɀipenyu ɀinna. Ɀakaŋga ɀakaɗai: Ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana nomunhu;
cimŋe necimŋe caiʋa neɀiso ɀinna, necimŋe necimŋe caɀo caiʋa namapapiro manna.
Makumbo aɀo akaŋga akarurama, pasi petsoka dzaɀo pakaŋga pakaita sapasi petsoka dzemhuru; dzaipenya sendarira yakabginyiswa.
Ɀakaŋga ɀinamaʋoko omunhu pasi pamapapiro aɀo kumatiʋi aɀo manna; ɀose ɀiri ɀinna ɀakaŋga
Mapapiro aɀo akaŋga akaɓatana; haɀina‐kutsauka pakufamba kwaɀo, asi cimŋe necimŋe cairuramira mberi pakufamba kwaco.

Kana ɀiri ɀiso ɀaɀo pakuʋonekwa kwaɀo, ɀaiʋa neciso comunhu; ɀose ɀiri ɀinna ɀaiʋa neciso ceshumba kurutiʋi rworudyi; ɀose ɀiri ɀinna ɀaiʋa neciso cenzombe kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe; ɀose ɀiri ɀinna ɀaiʋa neciso cegondo ʋo.
Ɀiso ɀaɀo namapapiro aɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaparadzana kumsoro;
Cimŋe necimŋe cairuramira mberi pakufamba kwaco; kwaiɗa kufamba mŋeya, ndiko kwaɀaifamba; haɀina‐kutsauka pakufamba kwaɀo.
Kana ɀiri ɀipenyu pakuʋonekwa kwaɀo, ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana namazimbe omŋoto anopfuta, ɀakafanana namazhenje;
Ɀipenyu ɀaimhanya ɀicidzoka, ɀakafanana nokupenya kwemheni.
Ɀino ndakati ndicitarira ɀipenyu iɀo, ndikaʋona gumbo rimŋe reŋgoro riri pasi kurutiʋi rweɀipenyu iɀo, kurutiʋi rumŋe norumŋe rweɀiso ɀaco.
Makumbo awo pakuʋonekwa kwawo nomuitirwe wawo ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana neberiri; ose ari manna akaŋga akafanana; pakuʋonekwa kwawo napamuitirwe wawo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita segumbo rimŋe mukati merimŋe gumbo.
Pakufamba kwawo akafamba kumatiʋi awo manna; haana‐kutsauka pakufamba kwawo.
Kana ari makaŋgo awo, akaŋga akakwirira ʋuye akatyisa; makaŋgo awo iwo manna akaŋga azere nameso kwose‐kwose.
Ɀino kana ɀipenyu ɀofamba, makumbo ofamba ʋo parutiʋi rwaɀo, kana ɀipenyu ɀokwidzwa ɀicibva pasi, naiwo makumbo okwidzwa ʋo.
Pose‐pose kwaiɗa kufamba mŋeya, ndiko kwaɀaifamba, iko kwaiɗa kufamba mŋeya; makumbo ndokukwidzwa pamŋe cete naɀo, nokuti mŋeya wecipenyu wakaŋga uri mumakumbo.
Kana iɀo ɀofamba, iwo ofamba; kana iɀo ɀomira, iwo omira, kana iɀo ɀokwidzwa ɀicibva pasi, makumbo okwidzwa pamŋe cete naɀo; nokuti mŋeya wecipenyu wakaŋga uri mumakumbo.
Kumsoro kwemisoro yeɀipenyu kwakaŋga kunecinhu cakafanana neɗeŋga, rakaŋga rakaita sekristaro inotyisa, rakatatamurwa pamsoro pemisoro yaɀo.

Pasi peɗeŋga mapapiro aɀo akaŋga akarurama, rimŋe rakaɓatana nerimŋe; cimŋe necimŋe caɀo cakaŋga cinamaʋiri aifukidza muʋiri waco kurutiʋi rwoʋuno, necimŋe necimŋe caiʋa namaʋiri aifukidza kurutiʋi rweseri.
Ɀino kana ɀofamba, ndainzwa kuwuŋga kwamapapiro aɀo ɀiciita sokuwuŋga kwemvura zhinji, senzwi roUnesimba rose, somubvumo weɓope wakaita sokutinhira kwehondo; kana ɀomira, ɀaiɗeredza mapapiro aɀo.
Kwakaŋga kunenzwi kumsoro kweɗeŋga raiʋa pamsoro pemisoro yaɀo; kana ɀomira, ɀaiɗeredza mapapiro aɀo.

Kumsoro kweɗeŋga rakaŋga riri pamsoro pemisoro yaɀo, kwakaŋga kunecinhu cakafanana necigaro coʋushe, cakaita sebge resafiri; pacinhu cakafanana necigaro coʋushe kwakaŋga kunomufananidzo womunhu ugere pamsoro paco.

Ɀino ndakaʋona ɀakaita seɗare rinopenya, ɀakafanana nomŋoto mukati maɀo kumatiʋi ose, ɀakabva pakaita seciʋuno cake ɀicikwira kumsoro; ɀino kubva ipapo pakaita seciʋuno cake ɀicienda pasi ndakaʋona cakaita somŋoto; iye wakaŋga akakomberedzwa nokubginya kumatiʋi ose.
