Seɀakaita muraraʋuŋgu uri mugore nezuʋa remvura, ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita kubginya pakuʋonekwa kwabgo kumatiʋi ose. Ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita kubginya kwaJehova. Ɀino ndakati ndiciɀiʋona, ndikawira pasi neciso caŋgu, ndikanzwa inzwi romumŋe wakaŋga acitaura.
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, mira namakumbo ako, ini nditaure newe.
Ɀino wakati acitaura neni, Mŋeya ndokupinda mukati maŋgu, akandimisa namakumbo aŋgu; ndikanzwa wakaŋga acitaura neni.
Iye akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, ndinokutumira kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, kumarudzi anomukira simba, akandimukira simba ini; iʋo namadziɓaɓa aʋo ʋakandiɗarikira, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ʋana ʋaneɀiso ɀisinokunyara nemŋoyo mikukutu; ndinokutumira kwaʋari, iwe uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova.
Ɀino iʋo, kana ʋaciɗa kunzwa, kana ʋasiŋgaɗi (nokuti iʋo iimba ino
Asi iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, usaʋatya iʋo, usatya mashoko aʋo, kunyaŋge uri pakati porukato neminzwa, ugere pakati peɀinyaʋaɗa; usatya mashoko aʋo, usavunduswa neɀiso ɀaʋo, nokuti iʋo iimba ino
Asi iwe unofanira kuʋaʋudza mashoko aŋgu, kana ʋaciɗa kunzwa, kana ʋasiŋgaɗi; nokuti ʋano
Asi iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, terera ɀandinokuʋudza; usandimukira simba, seɀinondimukira imba iyo; shamisa muromo wako udye ɀandicakupa.
Ɀino ndakati ndicitarira, ndikaʋona ruʋoko rwakatambanudzirwa kwandiri; tarira, buku yakapetwa yakaŋga iri’mo;
akaipetenura pamberi paŋgu; yakaŋga yakanyorwa mukati nokunze, makaŋga makanyorwa mariro, nokucema, nenhamo.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, cidya caunowana; cidya rugwaro urwu rwakapetwa, uende, undotaura neimba yaIsraeri.
Ipapo ndakashamisa muromo waŋgu, iye akandidyisa rugwaro rwakapetwa.
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, dyisa ɗumbu rako, ugutise ʋura bgako norugwaro rwakapetwa urwu rwandinokupa. Ipapo ndikarudya, rukaʋa mumukanwa waŋgu soʋuci nokuzipa.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, famba uende kuimba yaIsraeri, utaure kwaʋari mashoko aŋgu.
Nokuti hautumŋi kurudzi runomutaurire usiŋgazikanwi norurimi runogozha, asi kuimba yaIsraeri;
kumarudzi mazhinji anomutaurire usiŋgazikanwi norurimi runogozha, ʋausiŋgagoni kunzwisisa mashoko aʋo. Ɀirokwaɀo, ɗai ndaikutuma kwaʋari ʋaŋgaɗai ʋaikunzwa.
Asi imba yaIsraeri icaramba kukunzwa, nokuti haʋaɗi kundinzwa ini, nokuti imba yose yaIsraeri ʋanehuma dzakawoma, nemŋoyo mikukutu.
Tarira, ndinowomesa ciso cako seɀakaita ɀiso ɀaʋo, nehuma yako seɀakaita huma dzaʋo.
Ndakawomesa huma yako sedaimani rinokunda musarasara; usaʋatya, usavunduswa neɀiso ɀaʋo, nokuti iʋo iimba ino
Wakati ʋo kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, mashoko aŋgu ose andicataura kwauri, uagamucire mumŋoyo mako, uanzwe nenzeʋe dzako.
Famba, uende kunaʋari pakutapxa, kuʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako, utaure naʋo, uʋaʋudze,
Ipapo Mŋeya wakandisimudza, ndikanzwa shure kwaŋgu mubvumo wokuwuŋga kukuru,
mubvumo wamapapiro eɀipenyu, acigunɀana, nomubvumo wamakumbo eŋgoro kumatiʋi aɀo, uri mubvumo wokuwuŋga kukuru.
Ipapo Mŋeya wakandisimudza, ndokundibvisa’po; ndikaenda ndineshuŋgu, mŋeya waŋgu wakatsamŋa; ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu nesimba.
Ɀino ndakaȿika kunaʋaiʋa pakutapxa paTeri‐abibi, ʋakaŋga ʋagere parwizi rwaKebari, ipapo paʋakaŋga ʋagere; ini ndikagara’po pakati paʋo mazuʋa manomŋe ndicishaiwa mashoko.
Ɀino mazuʋa manomŋe akati apera, shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwandiri riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ndakakuita nharirire yeimba yaIsraeri; naiɀoɀo cinzwa shoko rinobva mumuromo maŋgu, uʋanyeʋere panɀimbo yaŋgu.

Kana ini ndikati kunowakaipa: Ɀirokwaɀo ucafa, iwe ukasamunyeʋera, kana kutaura ɀinonyeʋera wakaipa panzira yake yakaipa, kuti aponese ʋupenyu bgake, munhu uyu wakaipa ucafira muɀakaipa ɀake, asi ropa rake ndicaribvunza paruʋoko rwako.
Asi kana iwe ukanyeʋera wakaipa, akasatendeʋuka paɀakaipa ɀake, kana panzira yake yakaipa, iye ucafira muɀakaipa ɀake, asi iwe warwira hako mŋeya wako.

Ʋuye ɀe, kana munhu wakarurama akatsauka pakururama kwake, akaita ɀakaipa, ini ndikaisa cigumbuso pamberi pake, ucafa; ɀausina‐kumunyeʋera, ucafira muɀiʋi ɀake; ɀakarurama ɀaakaita haɀiŋgaraŋgarirwi, asi ropa rake ndicaribvunza paruʋoko rwako.
Asi kana ukanyeʋera munhu wakarurama, kuti wakarurama arege kutadza, iye akasatadza, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama, nokuti wakaterera kunyeʋerwa, newe warwira mŋeya wako.
Ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu ipapo, akati kwandiri: Simuka, uende kuɓani, ndicataura newe ipapo.
Ɀino ndakasimuka, ndikaenda kuɓani, ndikaʋona kubginya kwaJehova kumire’po, kwakafanana nokubginya kwandakaʋona parwizi rwaKebari; ndikawira pasi neciso caŋgu.
Ipapo Mŋeya wakapinda mandiri, akandimisa namakumbo aŋgu, akataura neni, akati kwandiri: Enda, undoɀipfigira mumba mako.
Asi iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, tarira, ʋacaʋuya neɀisuŋgo kwauri, ʋacakusuŋga naɀo, kuti urege kuɓuɗira pakati paʋo;
ini ndicanamatirisa rurimi rwako mumukanwa wako, kuti uʋe mbeʋeʋe, urege kuʋa murairi waʋo; nokuti iʋo iimba ino
Asi kana ndicitaura newe, ndicashamisa muromo wako, iwe ugoti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Unonzwa, ŋgaanzwe, unoramba, ŋgaarambe; nokuti iʋo iimba ino
Ɀino iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, tora citina ucigadzike pamberi pako, ufananidzire’po guta, iro reJerusarema.
Ɀino urikombe nehondo, uriʋakire nhare dzokurwa naro, uritutire murwi wokurwa nawo; uriisire misasa, nokurikomberedza kumatiʋi ose neɀokugumura
Ɀino utore gaŋgo reɗare, urigadze pakati pako neguta, ruʋe ruȿiŋgo rweɗare; ɀino urinzire ciso cako kwariri, ipapo ricaʋa
Ʋuye ɀe, uʋate pasi parutiʋi rwako rworuɓoshwe, uise pamsoro parwo ɀakaipa ɀeimba yaIsraeri; mazuʋa aunoʋata pa
Nokuti ndakatara makore eɀakaipa ɀaʋo aenzane namazuʋa ako, mazuʋa anamazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamŋe; saiɀoɀo ucatakura ɀakaipa ɀeimba yaIsraeri.
Ɀino kana wapedza mazuʋa awa, uʋate pasi norutiʋi rwako rworudyi, kuti utakure ɀakaipa ɀeimba yaJuda; ndakakutarira mazuʋa anamakumi manna, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe rifananidze gore.
Urinzire ciso cako wakatarira kukombga kweJerusarema, ruʋoko rwako rwakafukurwa; ugoprofita pamsoro paro.
Tarira, ndinokusuŋga neɀisuŋgo, urege kushandukurira kunorumŋe rutiʋi, kuȿikira wapedza mazuʋa okukomba kwako.

Ɀino utore ʋo ɀiyo nebari nenyimo nenyemba namapfunde nesipereti uɀiise mumudziyo mumŋe, ugoɀiitira ciŋgwa naɀo; unofanira kucidya mazuʋa aunoʋata pasi parutiʋi rwako, iwo mazuʋa anamazana matatu namakumi mapfumbamŋe.
Ɀokudya ɀako ɀaunofanira kudya, ɀicayerwa kurema kwaɀo, mashekeri anamakumi maʋiri
Unofanira kunwa ʋo mvura yakayerwa, cecitanhatu cehini;
Unofanira kuɀidya ɀakafanana neɀiŋgwa ɀebari, unofanira kuɀiɓika pamberi paʋo nendoʋe inoɓuɗiswa naʋanhu.
Jehova akati: Saiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacadya ɀokudya ɀaʋo ɀinetȿina pakati pamarudzi kwandicaʋadziŋgira.

Ipapo ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova! Tarirai mŋeya waŋgu hauna‐kumboȿiɓiswa; nokuti kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu kuȿikira ɀino, handina‐kumbodya cakafa coga, kana cakaʋurawa neɀikara, nenyama inonyaŋgadza haina‐kumbopinda mumuromo maŋgu.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Tarira, ndakupa ndoʋe yeŋombe panɀimbo yendoʋe yaʋanhu, unofanira kugadzira ɀokudya ɀako nayo.
Akati ʋo kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, tarira ndicavuna muɗonɀo weɀokudya paJerusarema; ʋacadya ɀokudya ɀakayerwa ʋacitya, ʋacanwa mvura yakayerwa, ʋacivunduka;
kuti ʋashaiwe ɀokudya nemvura, ʋavunduke mumŋe nomumŋe, ʋapere muɀakaipa ɀaʋo.
Ɀino iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, tora munondo unopinza; uutore ciʋe ciȿo kwauri, ugoʋeʋura nawo musoro wako nendebvu dzako, ipapo utore ciyero cokuyera naco, ndokukamura vudzi.
Ɀino cetatu caro upise nomŋoto pakati peguta, kana mazuʋa okukombga
Ɀino utore ʋo rimŋe shomanene, urisuŋgire muŋguʋo dzako.
Ipapo utore ɀe rimŋe raro, urikandire mumŋoto, uciripisa mumŋoto; ipapo pacaɓuɗira mŋoto kuimba yose yaIsraeri.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iri ndiro Jerusarema; ndakariisa pakati pamarudzi, rakapoteredzwa nedzimŋe nyika kumatiʋi ose.
Asi rakaramba mitemo yaŋgu riciita ɀakaipa kupfuʋura mamŋe marudzi,
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀamunehasha kupfuʋura marudzi akakukomberedzai, mukasafamba muneɀandakaraira nokusaceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu, kunyaŋge kuita nemitemo yamarudzi akakupoteredzai;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ini, iyeni, ndinemhaka nemi, ndicaita ɀandakatoŋga pakati penyu mamŋe marudzi aciɀiʋona.
Ndicaita pakati penyu ɀandisina‐kumboita, ʋuye handiŋgatoŋgoiti ɀe ɀakaɗai, nemhaka yeɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo madziɓaɓa acadya ʋanakomana ʋaʋo mukati mako, naʋanakomana ʋacadya madziɓaɓa aʋo; ndicakuitira ɀandakatoŋga, ndicaparadzira ʋakasara ʋako kumhepo dzose.
Saka noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ɀirokwaɀo, ɀawakaȿiɓisa nɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene neɀose ɀako ɀinosemesa neɀose ɀako ɀinonyaŋgadza, saka neni ndicabva

Cetatu cako cicafa nehosha yakaipa, ʋuye ʋacapedzwa nenzara mukati mako; cetatu cicaparadzwa nomunondo kumatiʋi ako, necimŋe cikamu cetatu ndicaciparadzira kumhepo dzose, nokuvomora munondo shure kwaʋo.
Saiɀoɀo kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kucapera, nehasha dzaŋgu kwaʋari ndicadzigumisa, ndikanyaradzwa; ʋacaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakataura nokushiŋgaira kwaŋgu, kana ndapedza hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo.
Ndicakuita ɗoŋgo necinoshoʋorwa pakati pamarudzi anokupoteredza, ɀiciʋonekwa naʋose ʋanopfuʋura

Saiɀoɀo cicaʋa cinhu cinoshoʋorwa necinosekwa, cinonyeʋera necinoshamisa, kumarudzi ose anokupoteredza, kana ndicikuitira ɀandakatoŋga ndakatsamŋa, ndinehasha, ndicikutukai nehasha; (ini Jehova, ndini ndakataura iɀoɀo);
kana ndicituma pamsoro paʋo miseʋe yakaipa yenzara, ineɓasa rokuparadza, yandicatuma kuti ikuparadzeyi. Ndicawedzera nzara pamsoro penyu, nokuvuna muɗonɀo wenyu weɀokudya.
Ndicatuma pamsoro penyu nzara neɀikara ɀakaipa ɀicakutorerai ʋana; hosha yakaipa neropa ɀicapfuʋura napakati pako; ndicaʋuyisa munondo pamsoro pako. Ini Jehova, ndini ndakataura iɀoɀo.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kumakomo aIsraeri, uprofite pamsoro pawo,

uti: Imi makomo aʋaIsraeri, inzwai shoko raShe Jehova: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova kumakomo nokuɀikomo, kumipata nokumapani: Tarirai, ini, iyeni, ndicaʋuyisa munondo pamsoro penyu, ndicaparadza nɀimbo dzenyu dzakakwirira.
Maartari enyu acaitwa matoŋgo, neɀifananidzo ɀenyu ɀezuʋa ɀicakoromorwa; ʋanhu ʋenyu, ʋakaʋurawa, ndicaʋawisira pasi pamberi peɀifananidzo ɀenyu.
Ndicaradzika ɀitunha ɀaʋana ʋaIsraeri pamberi peɀifananidzo ɀaʋo; ndicaparadzira mafupa enyu pamatiʋi ose amaartari enyu.

Pose pamugere maguta acaparadzwa, nenɀimbo dzakakwirira dzicaitwa matoŋgo, kuti maartari enyu aparadzwe aitwe matoŋgo, neɀifananidzo ɀenyu ɀikoromorwe ɀigume, neɀifananidzo ɀenyu ɀezuʋa ɀitemŋe, neɀamakaɓata ɀose ɀiparadzwe.
Ʋakaʋurawa ʋacawira pasi pakati penyu, nemi mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicaceŋgeta ʋakasara, nokuti ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋacaʋa’po ʋacapukunyuka pamunondo pakati pamarudzi kana muciparadzirwa kunyika dzose.

Ɀino ʋakapukunyuka pakati penyu ʋacandiraŋgarira pakati pamarudzi, kwaʋacatapirwa, kana ndaputsa mŋoyo yaʋo yokufeʋa, yakandirasha, nameso aʋo aipata aciteʋera ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo; ʋacaɀisema iʋo ʋamene pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaʋakaita paɀinyaŋgadzo ɀaʋo ɀose.
Ɀino iʋo ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova; handina‐kureʋa pasina kuti ndicaʋaitira ɀakaipa iɀoɀo.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Roʋa noruʋoko rwako, tsikisa norutsoka rwako, uti: Maiwe! nokuɗa kweɀinonyaŋgadza ɀakaipa ɀose ɀeimba yaIsraeri; nokuti ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo nenzara nehosha yakaipa.
Uri kure ucafa nehosha yakaipa, uri pedyo ucaʋurawa nomunondo, wakasara akaceŋgetwa ucafa nenzara; saiɀoɀo ndicapedza hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo.

Imi mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ʋanhu ʋaʋo, ʋakaʋurawa, ʋari pakati peɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ʋakakomberedza maartari aʋo, pacikomo cimŋe necimŋe cakakwirira, napamsoro pemisoro yose yamakomo, napasi pomuti mumŋe nomumŋe mutema, napasi pomuouki mumŋe nomumŋe mukobvu, ipo panɀimbo dzose paʋaipisira ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ɀose ɀinonhuwira ɀakanaka.
Ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo, nyika ndicaiita ɗoŋgo nokuiparadza, kubva parenje kuȿikira Dibra, pose paʋanogara; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀanzi naShe Jehova kunyika yaIsraeri: Kuguma, kuguma kwaȿika pamakona manna enyika.
Ɀino kuguma kwaȿika kwauri, ini ndicatuma kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro pako, ndicakutoŋga ɀakafanira nzira dzako; ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro pako ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀose.
Ziso raŋgu hariŋgakupembedzi, handiŋgaʋi netsitsi ʋo; asi ndicaʋuyisa nzira dzako pamsoro pako, neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀicaʋa pakati pako; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Njodzi, njodzi imŋe cete, tarirai, inoʋuya.
Kuguma kwaȿika, kuguma kwaȿika; kunokumukira maŋgwanani; tarirai, kwaȿika.
Dzoro rako raȿika, iwe ugere panyika; ŋguʋa yaȿika, zuʋa raʋa pedyo,
Ɀino ndobva ndoɗururira hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro pako, ndicapedza kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro pako, nokukutoŋga ɀakafanira nzira dzako; ndicaʋuyisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀose pamsoro pako.
Ziso raŋgu hariŋgapembedzi, handiŋgaʋi netsitsi ʋo; ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro pako ɀakafanira nzira dzako; ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀicaʋa pakati pako; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndinoroʋa.
Tarirai zuʋa, tarirai roȿika; dzoro rako raɓuɗa; shamhu yatumbuka, kuɀikudza kwaɓukira.
Kuita nesimba kwamuka, kwaita shamhu yeɀakashata; hakuna
Ŋguʋa yaȿika, zuʋa raʋa pedyo; muteŋgi ŋgaarege kufara, muteŋgesi ŋgaarege kucema; nokuti kutsamŋa kuri pamsoro paʋanhu ʋose
Nokuti muteŋgesi haaŋgadzokeri kunecakateŋgeswa, kunyaŋge ʋaciri ʋapenyu; nokuti ɀakaʋonekwa pamsoro paʋazhinji ʋose
Ʋakaridza hwamanda, ʋakagadzira ɀose, asi hakunaunoenda kundorwa; nokuti kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kuri pamsoro paʋazhinji ʋose
Munondo uri kunze, hosha yakaipa nenzara ɀiri mukati; uri kusaŋgo ucaʋurawa nomunondo; uri muguta ucapedzwa nenzara nehosha yakaipa.
Asi ʋanopukunyuka pakati paʋo ʋacapukunyuka; ʋacaʋa pamakomo senjiʋa dzemipata, ʋacicema ʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀake.
Maʋoko ose acashaiwa simba, mabvi ose acati rukutu semvura.
Ʋacaɀisuŋga ɀiʋuno namasaga, ʋacafukidzwa nokutya kukuru, kunyara kucaʋa paɀiso ɀose, nemhazha pamisoro yaʋo yose.

Ʋacarasha sirveri yaʋo panzira dzomumusha, nendarama yaʋo icaʋa secinhu cisino‐kunaka; sirveri yaʋo nendarama yaʋo haɀiŋgagoni kuʋarwira nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwaJehova; haɀiŋgagutisi mŋeya yaʋo kana kuzadza ʋura bgaʋo, nokuti ndico caiʋa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa ɀaʋo.
Kana ʋuri ʋukomba bgaʋo bgakanaka, ʋakaita manyawi naɀo; asi ʋakaita naɀo ɀifananidzo ɀeɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo neɀeɀinosemesa ɀaʋo; naiɀoɀo ndakaciita kwaʋari secinhu cisino‐kunaka.
Ndicaciisa mumaʋoko aʋatorwa ciʋe cinhu cakatapxa, nokunaʋakaipa ʋenyika ciʋe cinhu cakapambga, iʋo ʋacaciȿiɓisa.
Ndicaramba ʋo kuʋatarira neciso caŋgu, ʋacaȿiɓisa fuma yaŋgu; mbava dzicapinda’mo, dziciiȿiɓisa.
Itai ketani, nokuti nyika izere nemhaka dzeropa, guta rizere nokuita nesimba.
Naiɀoɀo ndicaʋuyisa marudzi akanyanya kuipa kwaɀo, iʋo ʋacatora dzimba dzaʋo; ndicagumisa ʋo manyawi aʋanesimba, nenɀimbo dzaʋo tȿene dzicaȿiɓiswa.
Njodzi inoʋuya; ʋacatȿaka rugare, asi haruŋgaʋi’po.
Njodzi icateʋerwa nenjodzi, guhu ricateʋerwa neguhu; ʋacandotȿaka kumuprofita ɀaakaʋona, asi murairo ucanyaŋgarikira muprista, namano
Mambo ucacema, mucinda ucafuka kuparadza, namaʋoko aʋanhu ʋenyika acakaŋganiswa; ndicaʋaitira ɀakafanira nzira dzaʋo, ndicaʋatoŋga seɀaʋakafanira; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino negore recitanhatu,
Ipapo ndikatarira ndikaʋona mufananidzo uneŋge somŋoto; kubva pakaita seciʋuno cake ɀicienda pasi, kwakaŋga kunomŋoto, kubva paciʋuno cake ɀicikwira kumsoro ɀineŋge kubginya, seɗare rinopenya.
Akatambanudza ɀakaŋga ɀakaita soruʋoko, akandiɓata neɓumu romusoro waŋgu, Mŋeya akandisimudza pakati peɗeŋga nenyika, ndokundiisa paJerusarema ndiciratidzwa ɀiratidzo naMŋari, kumukoʋa wesuʋo ro
Ɀino tarira, kubginya kwaMŋari waIsraeri kwakaŋga kuri’po, ɀakafanana neɀandakaʋona muɓani.

Ipapo akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira meso ako kurutiʋi rwokumsoro. Ipapo ndakariŋgira meso aŋgu kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ndikaʋona kurutiʋi rwokumsoro rwesuʋo reartari cifananidzo ici cegoɗo cimire panopindwa napo.

Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, unoʋona ɀaʋanoita here? Iɀo ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀikuru ɀinoitwa pano neimba yaIsraeri, kuti ini ndibve ndiende kure nenɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene here? Asi ucaʋona ɀe ɀimŋe ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀikuru.
Akandiisa kumukoʋa woruʋazhe; ɀino ndakati ndicitarira, ndikaʋona pakakoromoka paruȿiŋgo.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, cera ɀino paruȿiŋgo; ɀino ndakati ndacera paruȿiŋgo, ndikaʋona mukoʋa.
Akati kwandiri: Pinda, undoʋona ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀakashata ɀaʋanoita pano.
Ipapo ndakapinda, ndikaʋona; tarira, mifananidzo yamarudzi ose eɀinokambaira pasi, nemhuka dzinonyaŋgadza, neɀifananidzo ɀose ɀeimba yaIsraeri ɀakafananidzwa paruȿiŋgo kumatiʋi ose.

Pamberi paɀo pakaŋga pamire ʋarume ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋaʋakuru ʋeimba yaIsraeri; pakati paʋo pakaŋga pamire Jaazania mŋanakomana waShafani, mumŋe nomumŋe akaɓata haryana yake yeɀinonhuwira muruʋoko rwake; munhuwi wegore reɀinonhuwira ukaramba ucikwira.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, waʋona here ɀinoitwa naʋakuru ʋeimba yaIsraeri murima, mumŋe nomumŋe mukamuri yake yemifananidzo? Nokuti ʋanoti: Jehova haatiʋoni; Jehova wakabva panyika
Akati ʋo kwandiri: Ucaʋona ɀe ɀimŋe ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀikuru ɀaʋanoita.
Ipapo akandiisa kumukoʋa wesuʋo reimba yaJehova rakaŋga riri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro; ndikaʋona ʋakadzi ʋagere’po ʋacicema Tamuzi.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Waɀiʋona here, iwe mŋanakomana womunhu? Ucaʋona ɀimŋe ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀinopfuʋura iɀi.

Ipapo akandiisa muruʋazhe rwomukati rweimba yaJehova; tarira, pamukoʋa wetembere yaJehova pakati peɓiraʋira neartari, kwakaŋga kunaʋarume ʋaneŋge makumi maʋiri naʋashanu, ʋakafuratira tembere yaJehova, ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakariŋgira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; ʋakaŋga ʋacinamata zuʋa kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Wa
Naiɀoɀo neni ʋo ndicaita nehasha; ziso raŋgu hariŋgapembedzi, handiŋgaʋi netsitsi; kunyaŋge ʋakaɗanidzira munzeʋe dzaŋgu nenzwi guru, handiŋgaʋanzwi.
Ipapo akaɗanidzira munzeʋe dzaŋgu nenzwi guru, aciti: Sweɗedzai ʋatariri ʋeguta, mumŋe nomumŋe anenhumbi yake yokuparadza muruʋoko rwake.

Ɀino tarira, ʋarume ʋatanhatu ʋakabva nenzira yesuʋo rokumsoro, riri kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, mumŋe nomumŋe anehubga yake muruʋoko rwake, nomumŋe murume pakati paʋo akafuka muceka, anorunyaŋga rweiŋgi rwomunyori paciʋuno cake. Ʋakapinda, ʋakandomira parutiʋi rweartari yendarira.

Ɀino kubginya kwaMŋari waIsraeri kwakaŋga kwakwira kucibva pakerubi, pakwakaŋga kuri, kukaȿika kucikumbaridzo ceimba; akaɗana murume wakaŋga akafuka muceka, wakaŋga anorunyaŋga rweiŋgi rwomunyori paciʋuno cake.
Jehova akati kwaari: Pfuʋura napakati peguta, napakati peJerusarema, uise ciratidzo pahuma dzaʋanhu ʋanogomera nokucema pamsoro peɀinonyaŋgadza ɀose ɀinoitwa mukati maro.
Asi kunaʋamŋe wakati, ini ndiciɀinzwa: Pfuʋurai nomuguta mucimuteʋera, muʋuraye; ziso renyu ŋgarirege kupembedza, musaʋa netsitsi;
ʋurayai cose ʋatana namajaya nemhandara naʋanana naʋakadzi; asi regai kusweɗera kunomumŋe uneciratidzo; mutaŋge panɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene. Ipapo ʋakataŋga naʋatana ʋakaŋga ʋari pamberi peimba.
Akati kwaʋari: Ȿiɓisai imba, muzadze maʋazhe naʋakaʋurawa; ciɓuɗai. Ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakaʋuraya muguta.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciʋuraya, ini ndasiyiwa ndiri ndoga, ndikawira pasi neciso caŋgu, ndikacema, ndiciti: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova! Ko moparadza ʋose ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri pakuɗurura kwenyu hasha dzenyu pamsoro peJerusarema here?
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Ɀakaipa ɀeimba yaIsraeri naJuda ɀakakura kwaɀo, nyika izere neropa, neguta rizere neɀisakarurama; nokuti ʋanoti: Jehova wakabva panyika, Jehova haaʋoni.
Neni, kana ndirini, ziso raŋgu hariŋgapembedzi, handiŋgaʋi netsitsi, asi ndicaʋuyisa ɀaʋakaita pamisoro yaʋo.
Ɀino tarira, murume wakaŋga akafuka muceka, wakaŋga anorunyaŋga rweiŋgi paciʋuno cake, wakadzoka neshoko, akati: Ndaita seɀamakandiraira.
Ɀino ndakatarira, ndikaʋona paɗeŋga rakaŋga riri pamsoro pemisoro yamakerubi cinhu cakaʋonekwa pamsoro pawo cakaita sebge resafire, cakaŋga cakafanana necigaro coʋushe.
Akataura nomunhu wakaŋga akafuka muceka, akati: Pinda pakati
Ɀino makerubi akaŋga amire parutiʋi rworudyi rweimba, paŋguʋa yokupinda kwomurume uyu; gore rikazadza ruʋazhe rwomukati.
Kubginya kwaJehova kukakwira kucibva pakerubi,
Mubvumo wamapapiro amakerubi wakanzwika kuȿikira kuruʋazhe rwokunze, senzwi raMŋari Wamasimba‐ose, kana acitaura.
Ɀino wakati araira murume wakaŋga akafuka muceka, aciti: Tora mŋoto pakati pa
Kerubi rikatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaro ruciɓuɗa napakati pamakerubi kumŋoto wakaŋga uri pakati pamakerubi, rikatora’po
Ɀino mukati mamakerubi makaʋonekwa cakafanana noruʋoko rwomunhu pasi pamapapiro awo.

Ɀino ndakatarira, ndikaʋona makumbo manna eŋgoro pamatiʋi amakerubi, rimŋe gumbo kurutiʋi rwekerubi rimŋe, nerimŋe gumbo kurutiʋi rwerimŋe kerubi; pakuʋonekwa kwawo makumbo akaŋga akaita sebge reberiri.
Pakuʋonekwa kwawo ose ari manna akaŋga akafanana, ɀakaita segumbo rimŋe reŋgoro mukati merimŋe gumbo reŋgoro.
Pakufamba kwawo akafamba kumatiʋi awo manna; haana‐kutsauka pakufamba kwawo, asi kwakaŋga kwakatarira musoro ndiko kwaakaenda; haana‐kutsauka pakufamba kwawo.
Muʋiri wawo wose, nemisana yawo, namaʋoko awo, namapapiro awo, namakumbo eŋgoro, ɀakaŋga ɀizere nameso kumatiʋi ose, pamakumbo awo ose ari manna.
Kana ari makumbo, ndakanzwa acitumidzwa ɀinomonereka.
Rimŋe nerimŋe rakaŋga rineɀiso ɀinna; ciso cokutaŋga cakaŋga ciri ciso cekerubi, ciso cecipiri cakaŋga ciri ciso comunhu, cecitatu ciso ceshumba, nececinna ciso cegondo.
Ɀino makerubi ndokubururuka acikwira; ndico cipenyu candakaʋona parwizi Kebari.
Ɀino kana makerubi ofamba, makumbo eŋgoro ofamba kurutiʋi rwawo; kana makerubi aciŋge osimudza mapapiro awo aciɗa kubururuka acibva panyika, namakumbo awo ʋo haana‐kubva kurutiʋi rwawo.
Kana omira naiwo omira ʋo; kana obururuka acikwira naiwo obururuka ʋo acikwira nawo; nokuti mŋeya wecipenyu wakaŋga uri mukati mawo.
Ipapo kubginya kwaJehova kwakaɓuɗa pacikumbaridzo ceimba, ndokumira pamsoro pamakerubi.

Makerubi ndokusimudza mapapiro awo, ndokubururuka acibva panyika, ini ndiciaona aciɓuɗa, anamakumbo eŋgoro pamatiʋi awo; akamira pamukoʋa wesuʋo rokumabvazuʋa reimba yaJehova; kubginya kwaMŋari waIsraeri kwakaŋga kuri necokumsoro kwawo.
Ndico cipenyu candakaʋona panyasi paMŋari waIsraeri parwizi rwaKebari; ndikaziʋa kuti makerubi.
Rimŋe nerimŋe rakaŋga rineɀiso ɀinna, nerimŋe nerimŋe rakaŋga rinamapapiro manna; pasi pamapapiro awo pakaŋga paneɀakafanana namaʋoko omunhu.
Kana ɀiri ɀiso ɀaʋo pakuʋonekwa kwaɀo, ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀiso ɀiya ɀandakaʋona parwizi rwaKebari, pakuʋonekwa kwaɀo naiɀo ɀimene; rimŋe nerimŋe rairuramira mberi pakufamba kwaro.

Ɀino Mŋeya wakandisimudza, ndokundiisa kusuʋo ramabvazuʋa reimba yaJehova, raitarira kumabvazuʋa; ndikaʋona pamukoʋa wesuʋo ʋarume ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋashanu, ndikaʋona pakati paʋo Jaazania mŋanakomana waAzuri, naPeratia mŋanakomana waBenaia, macinda aʋanhu.
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, aʋa ndiʋo ʋarume ʋanofuŋga ɀakaipa, ʋanorairira mano akaipa muguta rino;
ʋanoti:
Naiɀoɀo ciʋaprofitera, mŋanakomana womunhu, ciprofita.
Ipapo Mŋeya waJehova wakawira pamsoro paŋgu, akati kwandiri: Taura, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndiɀo ɀamakataura, imi imba yaIsraeri; nokuti ndinoziʋa ɀamunofuŋga mumiraŋgariro yenyu.
Makawanza ʋamakaʋuraya muguta rino, makazadza nzira dzaro naʋakaʋurawa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ʋamakaʋuraya, ʋamakaradzika mukati maro, ndiyo nyama,
Makatya munondo; ini ndicaʋuyisa munondo pamsoro penyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ini ndicakuɓuɗisai mukati maro, ndicakuisai mumaʋoko aʋatorwa, ndicaita ɀandakatoŋga pakati penyu.
Mucaʋurawa nomunondo; ndicakutoŋgai munyika yaIsraeri: ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
rino hariŋgaʋi gate renyu, nemi hamuŋgaʋi nyama mukati maro; ndicakutoŋgai munyika yaIsraeri.
Ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, nokuti hamuna‐kufamba nemitemo yaŋgu kana kuita ɀandakaraira, asi makateʋera mirairo yamarudzi anokupoteredzai.
Ɀino ndakati ndiciprofita, Peratia mŋanakomana waBenaia akafa. Ipapo ndakawira pasi neciso caŋgu, ndikacema nenzwi guru ndiciti: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova! Moɗa kupedza cose ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri here?
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, hama dzako, idzo hama dzako, ʋanhu ʋorudzi rwako, neimba yose yaIsraeri, iʋo ʋose, ndiʋo ʋakanzi naʋagere Jerusarema: Ibvai kure naJehova, nyika ino yakapiwe’su, iʋe yeɗu.
Naiɀoɀo uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀandakaʋabvisa, ndikaʋaisa kure pakati pamarudzi, ʋuye ɀandakaʋaparadzira pakati penyika, ndicaʋa kwaʋari nɀimbo tȿene ŋguʋa ɗuku kunyika idzo kwaʋakaenda kwadziri;
naiɀoɀo uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicakuʋuŋganidzai mubve pakati pamarudzi, ndicakukokerai mubve panyika kwamakaparadzirwa, ndigokupai nyika yaIsraeri.
Ʋacadzokera’ko nokubvisa’mo ɀose ɀayo ɀinosemesa neɀose ɀayo ɀinonyaŋgadza.
Ndicaʋapa mŋoyo mumŋe, nokuisa mŋeya mutȿa mukati menyu; ndicabvisa mŋoyo webge munyama yaʋo, ndokuʋapa mŋoyo wenyama;
kuti ʋafambe nemitemo yaŋgu, ʋaceŋgete ɀandakaraira nokuɀiita; iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Asi kana ʋari iʋo, ʋanemŋoyo inoteʋera mŋoyo yeɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀinosemesa neɀinonyaŋgadza, ndicaʋuyisa ɀaʋakaita pamisoro yaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ipapo makerubi akasimudza mapapiro awo, namakumbo eŋgoro akaŋga ari pamatiʋi awo; kubginya kwaMŋari waIsraeri kwakaŋga kuri necokumsoro kwaʋo.
Kubginya kwaJehova ndokukwira kucibva mukati meguta, ndokumira pamsoro pegomo riri kumabvazuʋa eguta.
Ipapo Mŋeya wakandisimudza ndokundiisa Kardea kunaʋakatapxa, ndiciɀiʋoneswa noMŋeya waMŋari. Ɀino ciratidzo candakaŋga ndaʋona cakakwidzwa cicibva kwandiri.
Ipapo ndakaʋudza ʋakatapxa ɀinhu ɀose ɀandakaratidzwa naJehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ugere pakati paʋanhu ʋeimba ino

Naiɀoɀo iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀiroŋgedzere nhumbi dzokutama nadzo, utame masikati, ʋaciɀiʋona; unofanira kutama ucibva panɀimbo yako ucienda kuneimŋe nɀimbo, ʋaciɀiʋona; ɀimŋe ʋaŋgazofuŋga, kunyaŋge iri imba ino
Unofanira kuɓuɗisa nhumbi dzako masikati ʋaciɀiʋona, dziite senhumbi dzokutama nadzo; ɀino maɗekwana iwe umene unofanira kuɓuɗa ʋaciɀiʋona, seɀinoita ʋanhu kana ʋotama.
Ɀino uɓoʋore ruȿiŋgo ʋaciɀiʋona, uɓuɗise
Unofanira kudzitakura pafudzi rako ʋaciɀiʋona, ndokudziɓuɗisa kwaȿiɓa; unofanira kufukidza ciso cako, kuti urege kuʋona ɀenyika; nokuti ndakakuita ciratidzo kuimba yaIsraeri.

Ini ndikaita seɀandakarairwa; ndakaɓuɗisa nhumbi dzaŋgu masikati, dzakaita senhumbi dzokutama nadzo, maɗekwana ndikaɓoʋora ruȿiŋgo noruʋoko rwaŋgu; ndakadziɓuɗisa kwaȿiɓa, ndikadzitakura pafudzi raŋgu ʋaciɀiʋona.
Ɀino maŋgwanani shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, imba yaIsraeri, iyo imba ino
Uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Cireʋo ici
Uti: Ndini ciratidzo cenyu; seɀandakaita ini, ndiɀo ɀaʋacaitirwa iʋo; ʋacatama ʋacitapxa.
Mucinda uri pakati paʋo ucatakura
Ndicakanda ʋo mumbure waŋgu pamsoro pake, ucaɓatwa mumusuŋgo waŋgu; ndicamuisa Babironi kunyika yaʋaKardea; asi haaŋgaiʋoni, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucafira’ko.
Ndicaparadzira kumhepo dzose ʋose ʋakamupoteredza ʋaŋgamuɓatsira, namapoka ake ose ndicaavomorera munondo ndiciʋateʋerera.
Ipapo ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndiciʋadziŋgira pakati pamarudzi, nokuʋaparadzira kunyika dzose.
Asi ndicapukunyusa ʋashoma ʋaʋo pamunondo nenzara nehosha yakaipa; kuti ʋandoparidza pakati pamarudzi kwaʋanoȿika ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo ɀose; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ʋo kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, idya ɀokudya ɀako nokubvunda nokunwa mvura yako nokuɗeɗera nokutya;
uti kuʋanhu ʋenyika iyi: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova pamsoro paʋagere Jerusarema nenyika yaIsraeri: Ʋacadya ɀokudya ɀaʋo ʋacitya nokunwa mvura yaʋo ʋacikaŋganiswa, kuti nyika yaro iitwe ɗoŋgo,
Maguta anogarwa naʋanhu acaparadzwa, nenyika icaitwa ɗoŋgo; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, shumo ndeyeiko yamunayo munyika yaIsraeri, inoti: Mazuʋa anoramba aciwedzerwa, asi ɀakaʋoneswa ɀose haɀiitiki?
Naiɀoɀo ʋaʋudze,
Nokuti pakati peimba yaIsraeri hapaŋgazoʋi kuʋoneswa kwenhema kana kuʋuka kunoɓata kumeso.
Nokuti ndini Jehova; ndicataura, neshoko randicataura ricaitika, hariŋgazononoswi; nokuti pamazuʋa enyu, iwe imba ino
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, tarira, ʋeimba yaIsraeri ʋanoti: Ɀaakaʋoneswa ndeɀamazuʋa ari kure anozoʋuya, unoprofita ɀeŋguʋa dziri kure.
Naiɀoɀo uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Hakuneshoko rimŋe ramashoko aŋgu ricazononoswa, asi shoko randicataura ricaitika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, profitera ʋaprofita ʋaIsraeri ʋanoprofita, uti kunaiʋo ʋanoprofita ɀinobva mumŋoyo maʋo: Inzwai imi shoko raJehova:
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ʋanenhamo ʋaprofita mapenzi, ʋanoteʋera mŋeya yaʋo, ʋasina‐caʋakaʋona.
Haiwa Israeri, ʋaprofita ʋenyu ʋakafanana namakaʋa pamatoŋgo.
Hamuna‐kukwira mucipinda pakakoromorwa, kana kugadzira ruȿiŋgo rweimba yaIsraeri, kuti mumire pakurwa pazuʋa raJehova.
Ʋakaʋona ɀinonyeŋgera nokuʋuka kwenhema, iʋo ʋanoti: Jehova unoti! Asi Jehova haana‐kuʋatuma, ɀino ʋakati shoko
Hamuna‐kuʋona ɀinonyeŋgera here, hamuna‐kutaura kuʋuka kwenhema here, ɀamakati: Jehova unoti; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro handina‐kutaura?
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀamakataura ɀinonyeŋgera, nokuʋona nhema, naiɀoɀo, tarirai, ndinemhaka nemi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ruʋoko rwaŋgu rucarwa naʋaprofita ʋanoʋona ɀinonyeŋgera naʋanoʋuka nhema; haʋaŋgaraŋgani naʋanhu ʋaŋgu, haʋaŋganyorwi
Nokuti, ɀirokwaɀo nokuti ʋakanyeŋgera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋaciti: Rugare! iɀo hakunorugare; kana ʋoʋaka ruȿiŋgo, tarira, ʋoʋuwa nesuko.
Ciʋudza aʋo ʋanoruʋuwa nesuko, kuti rucakoromoka; mvura icaʋuya icinaya kwaɀo, nemi, mabge makuru ecimvuramabge, mucawa, ɗutu remhepo ricarutsemusa.
Ɀino tarirai, kana ruȿiŋgo rwakoromoka, haʋaŋgati kwamuri here: Ko suko ramakaʋuwa naro riripiko?
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicarutsemusa ɀirokwaɀo neɗutu remhepo nehasha dzaŋgu; mvura icanaya kwaɀo nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, namabge makuru ecimvuramabge nehasha
Saiɀoɀo ndicakoromora ruȿiŋgo rwamakaʋuwa nesuko, nokuruwisira pasi, kuȿikira nheyo dzarwo dzafukurwa; rucakoromoka, nemi mucapedzwa mukati marwo; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Saiɀoɀo ndicapedza hasha dzaŋgu paruȿiŋgo, napamsoro paʋakaruʋuwa nesuko; ndicati kwamuri: Ruȿiŋgo haruci’po, naʋakaruʋuwa haʋaci’po;
iʋo ʋaprofita ʋaIsraeri ʋanoprofita pamsoro peJerusarema, ʋaciriʋonera ɀiratidzo ɀorugare, iɀo hakunorugare — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Asi iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kuʋakunda ʋaʋanhu ʋako, iʋo ʋanoprofita ɀinobva mumŋoyo yaʋo, uprofite pamsoro paʋo,

uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ʋanenhamo ʋakadzi ʋanosonera ɀifukidzo pafundo dzamaʋoko, ʋanoita miceka yokufukidza misoro yaʋanhu ʋapi naʋapi, kuti ʋavime mŋeya. Munoɗa kuvima mŋeya yaʋanhu ʋaŋgu, muciɗa kuɀiponesera mŋeya iyeyo!

Makandimhura pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu nokuɗa kwetsama dzebari neɀimeɗu ɀeɀiŋgwa, kuti muʋuraye mŋeya isiŋgafaniri kufa, nokuponesa mŋeya isiŋgafaniri kurarama, mucireʋera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu nhema, iʋo ʋanoterera nhema
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndinemhaka neɀifukidzo ɀenyu ɀamunovima naɀo mŋeya yaʋanhu seshiri, ndicaɀibvarura pamaʋoko enyu; ndicaregedza mŋeya, iyo mŋeya yamunovima seshiri.
Nemiceka yenyu ndicaibvarura ʋo, ndirwire ʋanhu ʋaŋgu pamaʋoko enyu, ʋarege kuzoʋa mumaʋoko enyu kuti muʋavime; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Nokuti nenhema
naiɀoɀo hamucazoʋoni ɀe ɀiratidzo ɀinonyeŋgera kana kuʋuka ɀinoʋukwa; ini ndicarwira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu pamaʋoko enyu; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuya kwandiri, ʋakagara pasi pamberi paŋgu.
Shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ʋanhu aʋa ʋakapinza ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo mumŋoyo yaʋo, nokuisa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa ɀaʋo pamberi paʋo; ɀino ndiŋgatoŋgotenda kubvunzwa naʋo here?

Naiɀoɀo taura naʋo, uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe weimba yaIsraeri unopinza ɀifananidzo ɀake mumŋoyo make, nokuisa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa ɀake pamberi pake, akaʋuya kumuprofita, ini Jehova ndicamupindura ɀakafanira iɀoɀo, ɀakafanira kuwanda kweɀifananidzo ɀake;
kuti ndiɓate imba yaIsraeri mumŋoyo yaʋo, nokuti ʋaʋa ʋatorwa kwandiri nemhaka yeɀifananidzo ɀaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo iti kuimba yaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Dzokai, mufuratire ɀifananidzo ɀenyu, mufuratidze ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu ɀose ɀiso ɀenyu.

Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe weimba yaIsraeri, kana waʋatorwa ʋagere panyika yaIsraeri, unoparadzana neni, acipinza ɀifananidzo ɀake mumŋoyo make, nokuisa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa ɀake pamberi pake, akaʋuya kumuprofita kuti iye andibvunze nokuɗa kwake, ini Jehova ndicamupindura ndimene;
ndicarinzira munhu uyo ciso caŋgu ndimuitire ɀakaipa, ndicamuita cishamiso neciratidzo neshumo, ndicamubvisa pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino kana muprofita akanyeŋgerwa, akataura shoko, ini Jehova, ndini ndanyeŋgera muprofita uyo, ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro pake, ndimuparadze pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yaʋo; ɀakaipa ɀomuprofita ɀicaenzana neɀakaipa ɀounobvunza
kuti imba yaIsraeri irege kuzotsauka kwandiri, kana kuzoɀiȿiɓisa nokuɗarika kwaʋo kwose, asi ʋaʋe ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndiʋe Mŋari waʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:

Mŋanakomana womunhu, kana kunenyika iciŋge yanditadzira nokuɗarika, ini ndikatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro payo, ndikavuna muɗonɀo weɀokudya ɀayo, ndikatuma nzara pamsoro payo, nokuparadza’po ʋanhu neɀipfuwo;
kunyaŋge ʋanhu aʋa ʋatatu, Noa naDanieri naJobo, ʋakaʋa’mo, ʋaŋgarwira mŋeya yaʋo yoga nokururama kwaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Kana ndikafambisa ɀikara munyika, ɀikaipedzera ʋana, ikaitwa ɗoŋgo, kukasaʋa nomunhu uŋgagona kufamba’mo nemhaka yeɀikara;
kunyaŋge ʋarume aʋa ʋatatu ʋaiʋa’mo, noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — haʋaŋgarwiri ʋanakomana kana ʋanasikana; iʋo ʋoga ʋaŋgarwirwa, asi nyika icaitwa ɗoŋgo.
Ɀimŋe kana ndikaʋuyisa munondo pamsoro penyika iyo, ndikati: Munondo, pfuʋura napakati penyika! ndikaparadza’mo ʋanhu neɀipfuwo;
kunyaŋge ʋarume aʋa ʋatatu ʋaiʋa’mo, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — haʋaŋgarwiri ʋanakomana kana ʋanasikana; asi iʋo ʋamene ʋoga ʋaŋgarwirwa.
Ɀimŋe kana ndikatuma hosha yakaipa munyika iyo, ndikaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro payo neropa, kuti ndiparadze’mo ʋanhu neɀipfuwo;
kunyaŋge Noa naDanieri naJobo ʋaiʋa’mo, noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova, — haʋaŋgarwiri mŋanakomana kana mŋanasikana; ʋaŋgarwira mŋeya yaʋo yoga nokururama kwaʋo.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndoɗa, kana ndikatuma pamsoro peJerusarema ɀakaipa ɀinna ɀandakaʋatoŋgera, ɀinoti, munondo nenzara neɀikara ɀakaipa nehosha yakaipa, kuti ndiparadze’mo ʋanhu neɀipfuwo!

Asi tarirai, ʋamŋe ʋakasara ʋacaregwa’mo ʋacapukunyuka, ʋacatapxa, ʋari ʋanakomana naʋanasikana; tarirai, ʋacaȿika kwamuri, mucaʋona nzira yaʋo neɀaʋanoita; ipapo mucanyaradzwa pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀandakaʋuyisa pamsoro peJerusarema, pamsoro peɀose ɀandakaʋuyisa pamsoro paro.
Iʋo ʋacakunyaradzai, kana muciʋona nzira yaʋo neɀaʋanoita; ipapo mucaziʋa kuti handina‐kuita pasina ɀose ɀandakaita’mo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, muti womuzambiriŋga unopfuʋura mimŋe miti yose neiko,
Ƌanda riŋgatorwa’po rokuita ɓasa naro here? Kana ʋanhu ʋaŋgatora’po mbambo yokuturikisa mudziyo upi noupi here?
Tarirai, unokandirwa mumŋoto dziʋe huni; mŋoto wapedza miromo miʋiri yawo, napakati watȿa ʋo, ɀino ucaɓatsira paɓasa here?
Tarirai, ucakanaka hauna‐kukwanira ɓasa cose; ndoɗa ɀino kana mŋoto waupedza, kana watȿa, hauŋgakwaniri ɓasa!
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Somuti womuzambiriŋga pakati pemiti iri kuɗondo, wandakaisa kumŋoto dziʋe huni, saiɀoɀo ndakaisa ʋagere Jerusarema
Ndicaʋarinzira ciso caŋgu ndiʋaitire ɀakaipa; ʋakaɓuɗa pamŋoto, asi mŋoto ucaʋapedza; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndiciʋarinzira ciso caŋgu ndiʋaitire ɀakaipa.
Ndicaparadza nyika, nokuti ʋaka
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ziʋisa Jerusarema ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaro.
uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova kuJerusarema: Kwawakabva nokwawakaɓerekwa ndiko kunyika yaʋaKanani; ɓaɓa ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋari muAmori, namai ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋari muHiti.
Kana kuri kuɓerekwa kwako, pazuʋa rokuɀarwa kwako cikuvu cako hacina‐kugurwa, ʋuye haunakushambidzwa nemvura kuti unake; hauna‐kutoŋgokwizwa nomunyu, kana kuputirwa.
Hakuneziso rakakunzwira tsitsi, kukuitira cinhu cimŋe ceɀinhu iɀi, nokuʋa neŋgoni newe; asi wakarashirwa kusaŋgo, nokuti ʋakasema ʋupenyu bgako nezuʋa rokuɀarwa kwako.
Ndakapfuʋura kwauri, ndikakuʋona ucipfakanyika muropa rako, ndikati kwauri uri muropa rako: Rarama! Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakati kwauri uri muropa rako: Rarama!
Ndakakuita ʋazhinji kwaɀo seɀinomera kusaŋgo, ukawanda nokukura, ukaȿikira paʋukomba bgakaiȿo‐naka; mazamu ako akakura, nevudzi rako rakamera, asi wakaŋga usino‐kufuka, wakashama.

Ndakapfuʋura kwauri, ndikakutarira, ndikaʋona kuti ŋguʋa yako yakaŋga iri ŋguʋa yoruɗo. Ipapo ndakawarira ŋguʋo yaŋgu pamsoro pako, ndikafukidza kushama kwako; ɀirokwaɀo, ndakakupikira, ndikaita suŋgano newe, iwe ukaʋa waŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ipapo ndakakushambidza nemvura; ɀirokwaɀo, ndakashambidza ropa rako kwauri, ndikakuzodza namafuta.
Ndakakufukidza ʋo neɀakarukwa, ndikakupfekedza shaŋgu dzamatebge amatenhe, ndakakusuŋga ciʋuno nomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, ndikakufukidza nesiriki.
Ndakakushoŋgedza ʋukomba, ndikaisa ɀishoŋgo ɀamaʋoko paɀanza ɀako, neketani pamutsipa wako.
Ndikaisa cindori pamhino dzako, neɀishoŋgo ɀenzeʋe panzeʋe dzako, nekorona yakanaka pamusoro wako.

Wakaɀishoŋgedza nendarama nesirveri, ɀokufuka ɀako ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka nesiriki neɀakarukwa; wakadya ʋupfu bgakatsetseka noʋuci namafuta; wakaŋga wakanaka kwaɀo, ukapfuʋurira mberi kuȿikira kuʋushe.
Mbiri yako yokunaka kwako yakapararira pakati pamarudzi, nokuti yakaŋga yakakwana kwaɀo nokuɗa kwoʋumambo bgaŋgu bgandakaŋga ndaisa pamsoro pako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Asi iwe wakaʋimba nokunaka kwako, ukapata nokuɗa kwembiri yako, ukaɗurura kupata kwako kunomumŋe nomumŋe waipfuʋura napo, kukaʋa kwake.
Wakatora dzimŋe ŋguʋo dzako, ukaɀiitira nɀimbo dzakakwirira, dzakashoŋgedzwa namaʋara mazhinji, ukandopata pamsoro padzo. Ɀinhu
Ɀishoŋgo ɀako ɀakanaka wakaɀitora pandarama yaŋgu nesirveri yaŋgu, ɀandakaŋga ndakupa, ukaɀiitira ɀifananidzo ɀaʋarume, ukapata naɀo;
ukatora ŋguʋo dzako dzakarukwa, uka
Ɀokudya ɀaŋgu ɀandakakupa, ibgo ʋupfu bgakatsetseka namafuta noʋuci ɀandakakupa kuti uɀidye, wakaɀigadza pamberi paɀo, ɀiite bgema ʋunonhuwira; ndiɀo ɀawakaita — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ʋuye ɀe, wakatora ʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako, ʋawakandiɓerekera, ukaɀiɓayira iʋo, kuti ʋadyiwe. Ko kupata kwako cakaŋga ciri cinhu ciɗuku here,
ɀawakazoʋuraya ʋana ʋangu, ukaɀipa iʋo, kuti uɀipinzire iʋo
Ɀino pakati peɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀose nokupata kwako hauna‐kuraŋgarira mazuʋa oʋuɗuku bgako, paŋguʋa yawakaŋga usino‐kufuka, wakashama, ucipfakanyika muropa rako.
Ɀino shure kweɀakaipa ɀako ɀose (haiwa, unenhamo, unenhamo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova),
wakaɀiʋakira nɀimbo yokufeʋa nokuɀiitira nɀimbo yakakwirira panzira dzose dzomumusha.
Wakaʋaka nɀimbo yako yakakwirira pakuʋamba kwenzira imŋe neimŋe, ukashandura kunaka kwako ɀikaʋa ɀinonyaŋgadza, ukafukurira ʋose ʋanopfuʋura tsoka dzako, ukawanza kupata kwako.
Wakafeʋa ʋo naʋaEgipita, ʋakaŋga ʋagere pedyo newe, ʋanemiʋiri mikuru; ukawanza kupata kwako, kuti unditsamŋise.
Naiɀoɀo tarira, ndakatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro pako, ndikatapudza
Wakapata ʋo naʋaAsiria, nokuti wakaŋga usiŋgagoni kuguta; ɀirokwaɀo, wakapata naʋo, asi hauna‐kuriŋganiswa naɀo.
Wakawanza ʋo kupata kwako kuȿikira kunyika yaʋashambadziri, iko kuKardea; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hauna‐kuriŋganiswa naɀo.
Mŋoyo wako unoshaiwa simba sei — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ɀaunoita ɀinhu iɀi ɀose, ɀinoitwa necifeʋe cisiŋganyari;
ɀaunoʋaka nɀimbo yako yokufeʋa pakuʋamba kwenzira imŋe neimŋe, nokuita nɀimbo yako yakakwirira panzira imŋe neimŋe yomumusha; asi hauna‐kuita secifeʋe, ɀawakashoʋora muripo.
Haiwa! Mukadzi wakawanikwa unofeʋa! Unogamucira ʋatorwa panɀimbo yomurume wake!
Ɀifeʋe ɀose ɀinopiwa ɀipo, asi iwe unopa ʋaɗikani ʋako ʋose ɀipo, uciʋaripira, kuti ʋaʋuye kwauri ʋacibva kumatiʋi ose nokuɗa kwokupata kwako.
Iwe wakasiyana na
Naiɀoɀo iwe cifeʋe, cinzwa shoko raJehova:
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndarira yako ɀayakaɗururwa, nokunyadza kwako ɀakwakafukurwa nokupata kwako naʋaɗikani ʋako, ʋuye nokuɗa kweɀifananidzo ɀose ɀeɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako, neropa raʋana ʋako, rawakaɀipa;

naiɀoɀo tarira, ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋaɗikani ʋako ʋose, ʋawakafarirana naʋo, naʋose ʋawakaŋga uciɗa, pamŋe cete naʋose ʋawakaŋga uciʋeŋga; ndicakuʋuŋganidzira iʋo ʋacibva kumatiʋi ose, nokuʋafukurira kunyadza kwako, kuti ʋaʋone kunyadza kwako kwose.
Ndicakutoŋga seɀinotoŋgwa ʋakadzi ʋoʋutere naʋanoteʋura ropa; ndicaʋuyisa pamsoro pako ropa rehasha negoɗo.

Ndicakuisa ʋo mumaʋoko aʋo; ʋacakoromora nɀimbo yako yokufeʋa, nokuputsa nɀimbo dzako dzakakwirira; ʋacakubvisira ŋguʋo dzako, nokukutorera ɀishoŋgo ɀako ɀakanaka; ʋacakusiya usina‐cokufuka wakashama.
Ʋacaʋuya ʋo neʋuŋgano kuzorwa newe, iʋo ʋacakutaka namabge nokukubvoʋora neminondo yaʋo.
Ʋacapisa dzimba dzako nomŋoto, nokukuitira ɀakatoŋgwa pamberi paʋakadzi ʋazhinji; ndicakuregesa kupata kwako, iwe haucazo
Saiɀoɀo ndicazorodza hasha dzaŋgu kwauri, goɗo raŋgu ricabva kwauri; ndicanyarara, ndikasazoʋa nokutsamŋa.

Ɀausina‐kuraŋgarira mazuʋa oʋuɗuku bgako, asi wakanditsamŋisa neɀinhu iɀi ɀose, naiɀoɀo, tarira, ndicaʋuyisa ɀawakaita pamusoro wako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; hauŋgazoiti ɀakashata iɀoɀo neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀose.
Tarira, mumŋe nomumŋe unoɓata neshumo, ucaɓata neshumo iyi pamsoro pako, aciti: Seɀakaita mai, ndiɀo ɀakaita mŋanasikana waʋo.
Iwe uri mŋanasikana wamai ʋako, ʋanosema murume waʋo naʋana ʋaʋo; iwe uri munuŋuna waʋakoma ʋako, ʋakasema ʋarume ʋaʋo naʋana ʋaʋo; mai ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋari muHiti, naɓaɓa ʋako muAmori.
Mukoma wako ndiSamaria, unogara kuruɓoshwe rwako, iye naʋanasikana ʋake; munuŋuna wako unogara kurudyi rwako, ndiSodoma naʋanasikana ʋake.
Asi hauna‐kufamba nenzira dzaʋo, kana kuita ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo; asi iɀo
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — munuŋuna wako Sodoma, iye naʋanasikana ʋake, haʋana‐kuita seɀawakaita iwe naʋanasikana ʋako.
Tarira, ɀakaipa ɀomunuŋuna wako Sodoma heɀi: Kuɀikudza, ɀokudya ɀakawandisa, nokuzorora kusinehanya necinhu, ndiɀo ɀaakaŋga anaɀo naʋanasikana ʋake; haana‐kusimbisa ruʋoko rwaʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa.
Ʋakaŋga ʋanamanyawi ʋakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza pamberi paŋgu; saka ndiciɀiʋona ndakaʋabvisa.
Kunyaŋge neSamaria harina‐kuita hafu yeɀiʋi ɀako; asi iwe wakawanza ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako kupfuʋura ɀaʋo, ukapembedza ʋanuŋuna ʋako neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako ɀose ɀawakaita.

Iwe ciʋa nemhoȿa yeɀinonyadzisa ɀako, ɀawakapembedza ʋanuŋuna ʋako; nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀako ɀawakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza kupfuʋura ɀaʋo, iʋo ʋaʋa ʋakarurama kupfuʋura iwe; ɀirokwaɀo, ciȿoɗeswa iwe, uʋe nokunyadziswa kwako, ɀawakapembedza ʋanuŋuna ʋako.
Ndicadzosa ɀe kutapxa kwaʋo, iko kutapxa kweSodoma naʋanasikana ʋaro, nokutapxa kweSamaria naʋanasikana ʋaro, nokutapxa kwaʋatapxa ʋako ʋari pakati paʋo;
kuti iwe uʋe nokunyadziswa kwako, unyare pamsoro peɀose ɀawakaita uciʋanyaradza.
Ʋanuŋuna ʋako Sodoma naʋanasikana ʋake ʋacadzokera kumugariro waʋo wakare, naSamaria naʋanasikana ʋake ʋacadzokera kumugariro waʋo wakare, newe naʋanasikana ʋako mucadzokera kumugariro wenyu wakare.
Nokuti munuŋuna wako Sodoma haana‐kurebga nomuromo wako nezuʋa rokuɀikudza kwako,
ɀakashata ɀako ɀisati ɀafukurwa, sapaŋguʋa yokushoʋorwa
Unemhoȿa yeɀakashata ɀako neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicakuitira ʋo seɀawakaita iwe, wakashoʋora kupika pakuputsa kwako suŋgano.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicaraŋgarira suŋgano yaŋgu yandakaita newe pamazuʋa oʋuɗuku bgako, ndisimbise suŋgano isiŋgaperi newe.
Ipapo ucaraŋgarira nzira dzako; ucanyara, kana ucigamucira ʋakoma ʋako naʋanuŋuna ʋako; ndicakupa iʋo, ʋaʋe ʋanasikana ʋako, asi haɀiŋgaitwi pamsoro pesuŋgano yako.
Ndicasimbisa suŋgano yaŋgu newe; ɀino ucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova;
kuti uraŋgarire, uȿoɗeswe, urege kuzoshamisa muromo wako ɀe nokuɗa kwokunyara kwako, kana ndakukaŋganwira ɀose ɀawakaita — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, taurira ʋeimba yaIsraeri cirabge, ureʋe mufananidzo kwaʋari;
uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Gondo guru rinamapapiro makuru neminheŋga mirefu, rinamambaʋa mazhinji anamaʋara‐maʋara, rakaȿika Rebanoni, rikatora musoro womusidari;
rikavuna ɗaʋi rokumsoro pamataʋi aro manyoro, rikaenda naro kunyika yaʋashambadziri, ndokuriisa muguta raʋateŋgesi.
Rakatora ʋo dzimŋe mbeu dzenyika, ndokudzikaʋira pavu rakaʋorera, rikadziisa parutiʋi rwemvura zhinji, rikadzisima semiti yemikonacando.
rikamera, rikaita muzambiriŋga unotanda wakafupika, kuti mataʋi awo atarire kwariri, nemidzi yawo iʋe pasi paro; saiɀoɀo rakaita muzambiriŋga, wakaɓuɗisa mataʋi nokutuŋgira ʋutaʋi ʋuɗuku.

Ɀino kwakaŋga kunerimŋe gondo ɀe rinamapapiro makuru namambaʋa mazhinji; ɀino tarira muzambiriŋga uyu wakarerekera midzi yawo kwariri nokutuŋgira ʋo mataʋi aro kwariri, ɀicibva pandima pawakaŋga wakasimŋa, kuti riuɗiridze.
Wakaŋga wakasimŋa pavu rakanaka panemvura zhinji, kuti uɓuɗise mataʋi, nokuɓereka ɀiɓereko, uʋe muzambiriŋga wakanaka.
Ɀino iwe uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova:
Ɀirokwaɀo, tarira, ɀawasimŋa ucaramba ucifara here? Hauŋgawomi cose kana ukarobga nemhepo inobva mabvazuʋa here? Ucawomera pandima pawakaŋga wamera.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri riciti:
Ɀino uti kuimba ino
Akatora mumŋe worudzi rwamambo, akaita suŋgano naye; wakamupikisa ʋo, akabvisa ʋanesimba ʋenyika;
kuti ʋushe ʋuɗerere, kuti ʋurege kukura, asi ʋurambe ʋuri’po ʋuciceŋgeta suŋgano yake.
Asi wakazomumukira acituma nhume dzake Egipita, kuti apiwe mabiza naʋanhu ʋazhinji. Ko ucaramba aciŋgofara here? Unoita ɀinhu ɀakaɗai ucapukunyuka here? Uŋgaputsa suŋgano akapukunyuka here?
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ɀirokwaɀo, panɀimbo panogara mambo, wakamuita mambo, waakashoʋora kupika kwake, nokuputsa suŋgano yake, ipapo paari, pakati peBabironi, ndipo paacafira.
Kunyaŋge naFarao nehondo yake inesimba neɓoka rake guru haaŋgamuɓatsiri pakurwa, kana ʋacitutira mirwi yokurwa nokuʋaka nhare, kuti ʋaparadze ʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Nokuti wakashoʋora kupika nokuputsa kwake suŋgano; tarira, wakapika noruʋoko rwake, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaita iɀoɀi ɀose; haaŋgapukunyuki.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, kupika kwaŋgu kwaakashoʋora nesuŋgano yaŋgu yaakaputsa, ɀirokwaɀo ndicaʋuyisa mhoȿa yaɀo pamsoro pomusoro wake.
Ndicakanda mumbure waŋgu pamsoro pake, ucaɓatwa nomusuŋgo waŋgu, ndicamuisa Babironi ndimutoŋge’ko pamsoro pokuɗarika kwake kwaakandiɗarikira nako.
Ʋose ʋanotiza ʋamapoka ake ose ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo, naʋakasara ʋacaparadzirwa kunobva mhepo dzose; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndini ndakataura iɀoɀo.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicatora ini

pagomo refu raIsraeri ndi’po pandicarusima; rucaɓuɗisa mataʋi, nokuɓereka ɀiɓereko, nokuʋa musidari wakanaka kwaɀo, pasi pawo pacagara shiri dzinamapapiro amarudzi ose; dzicagara mumumvuri wamataʋi awo.
Ɀino miti yose yokusaŋgo icaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakaɗeredza muti murefu, ndikakwiridza muti wakaɀidzwa, nokuwomesa muti munyoro, ndikameresa muti wakawoma. Ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura, ndikaɀiita.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Ndokuɗiniko kana muciɓata neshumo iyi panyika yaIsraeri, muciti: Madziɓaɓa akadya mazambiriŋga anoʋaʋa, meno aʋana ndokubgadzira?
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — hamuŋgagoni kuzoɓata neshumo iyi pakati paIsraeri.
Tarirai, mŋeya yose ndeyaŋgu; mŋeya waɓaɓa ndowaŋgu, saiɀoɀo nomŋeya womŋanakomana ʋo; mŋeya unotadza, ucafa.
Asi kana munhu aciŋge akarurama, aciita ɀomurairo neɀakarurama,
asinokudya pamakomo, kana kutarira nameso ake kuɀifananidzo ɀeimba yaIsraeri, kana kucinyira mukadzi wowokwake, kana kusweɗera kumukadzi uri kumŋedzi kwake,
usino‐kuitira ʋamŋe ɀakaipa, wakadzosera ruɓatso rwake kunowakadya cikwerete, usino‐kutora cinhu acipamba, wakapa ʋanenzara ɀokudya ɀake, akafukidza wakashama neŋguʋo;
usino‐kuita mhindu, kana kutora mhindu yemicero, wakadzora ruʋoko rwake paɀakaipa, akaruramisa kwaɀo pamhaka yomunhu nehama yake,
wakafamba nemitemo yaŋgu, akaceŋgeta ɀandakaraira, kuti aite ɀamaɀokwaɗi; iye wakarurama, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Kana iye akaɓereka mŋanakomana riri gororo, kana muteʋuri weropa, kana unoita cinhu cimŋe ceɀinhu iɀi,
usiŋgaiti cinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀo
wakaitira ʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa ɀakaipa, wakatora acipamba, usino‐kudzosera ruɓatso, wakatarira ɀifananidzo nameso ake, wakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza,
wakaita mhindu, kana kutora mhindu yemicero; ko iye ucararama here? Haaŋgararami. Wakaita iɀi ɀose ɀinonyaŋgadza, ɀirokwaɀo ucafa; ropa rake ricaʋa pamsoro pake.
Ɀino, tarira, kana akaɓereka mŋanakomana, unoʋona ɀiʋi ɀose ɀaɓaɓa ʋake, ɀaʋakaita, akaɀiʋona hake, akasaita ɀakaɗai;
usino‐kudya pamakomo, kana kutarira nameso ake ɀifananidzo ɀeimba yaIsraeri, kana kucinyira mukadzi wowokwake,
usino‐kuitira ʋamŋe ɀakaipa, usino‐kutora cinhu acireʋa ruɓatso, usino‐kutora cinhu acipamba, asi wakapa ʋanenzara ɀokudya ɀake, nokufukidza wakashama necokufuka;

wakadzora ruʋoko rwake pakuitira ʋarombo ɀakaipa, usino‐kutora mhindu kana mhindu yemicero, wakaita ɀandakaraira, nokufamba nemitemo yaŋgu; iye haaŋgafi nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaɓaɓa ʋake, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama.
Kana ʋari ɓaɓa ʋake, ɀaakamanikidza ɀikuru, nokupamba
Asi imi munoti: Mŋanakomana unoregereiko kuʋa nemhoȿa yeɀakaipa ɀaɓaɓa ʋake? Kana mŋanakomana aciŋge aita ɀinorebga nomurairo neɀakarurama, akaceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu yose, akaiita, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama.

Mŋeya unotadza, ndiwo ucafa; mŋanakomana haaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa yeɀakaipa ɀaɓaɓa ʋake, naɓaɓa haʋaŋgaʋi nemhoȿa yeɀakaipa ɀomŋanakomana waʋo; kururama kwowakarurama kucaʋa pamsoro pake, nokuipa kwowakaipa kucaʋa pamsoro pake.
Asi kana wakaipa akatendeʋuka paɀiʋi ɀake ɀose ɀaakaita, akaceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu yose, akaita ɀinorebga nomurairo neɀakarurama, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama, haaŋgafi.
Kuɗarika kwake kwose kwaakaita hakuŋgaraŋgarirwi pamsoro pake; ucararama nokuɗa kweɀakarurama ɀaakaita.
Ko ini ndiŋgatoŋgofarira rufu rwowakaipa here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; handizinofarira kudzoka kwake panzira yake, ararame here?

Asi kana wakarurama akatsauka pakururama kwake, akaita ɀakaipa, akaita ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀose ɀinoitwa nomunhu wakaipa, ko uŋgararama here? Maɓasa ake akarurama aakaita haaŋgatoŋgoraŋgarirwi; nokuɗa kwokuɗarika kwake, kwaakaɗarika nako, neɀiʋi ɀake ɀaakaita, ucafa nokuɗa kwaɀo.
Asi imi munoti: Nzira yaShe haina‐kururama. Ɀino cinzwai, imi imba yaʋaIsraeri: Nzira yaŋgu haina‐kururama here? Ko nzira dzenyu hadzizi idzo dzisino‐kururama here?
Kana munhu wakarurama akatsauka pakururama kwake, akaita ɀakaipa, akafa nokuɗa kwaɀo; ucafa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaakaita.
Ʋuye ɀe, kana munhu wakaipa akatsauka paɀakaipa ɀake ɀaakaita, akazoita ɀinorebga nomurairo neɀakarurama, ucaponesa mŋeya wake.
Ɀaakaraŋgarira, akatsauka pakuɗarika kwake kwose kwaakaita, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama, haaŋgafi.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, imba yaIsraeri inoti: Nzira yaShe haina‐kururama. Nhai, imba yaIsraeri, nzira dzaŋgu hadzina‐kururama here? Hadzizi nzira dzenyu dzisakarurama here?

Naiɀoɀo ndicakutoŋgai, imi imba yaIsraeri, mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakafanira nzira dzake — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova. Dzokai, mutendeʋuke pakuɗarika kwenyu kwose; kuti cirege kuʋa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa kwamuri.
Rashai kure nemi kuɗarika kwenyu kwose, kwamakaɗarika nako, muɀiitire mŋoyo mitȿa nemŋeya mitȿa; nokuti mucafireiko, imi imba yaIsraeri?
Nokuti handifariri rufu rwounofa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; naiɀoɀo tendeʋukai, murarame.
Ɀino iwe, imba mariro pamsoro pamacinda aIsraeri,
Uti: Mai ʋako ʋaiʋa aniko? Ʋaiʋa shumbakadzi, yaiʋata pakati peshumba, icirera ʋana ʋayo pakati peshumba ɗuku.
Ɀino yakarera mumŋe mŋana wayo, ikaʋa shumba ɗuku, ikadzidza kuɓata ɀaiŋgaʋuraya, ikapedza ʋanhu.
Marudzi aʋanhu akainzwa ʋo ikaɓatwa muhuzha yaʋo, ʋakaiisa kunyika yeEgipita neɀikokoʋono.
Ɀino yakati iciʋona kuti yanyeŋgerwa, kuti tariro yanyaŋgarika, ikatora ɀe mumŋe mŋana wayo, ikaiita shumba ɗuku.
Iyo ikafambafamba pakati peshumba; ikaʋa shumba ɗuku, ikadzidza kuɓata ɀaiŋgaʋuraya, ikapedza ʋanhu.
Ikaziʋa dzimba dzaʋo dzoʋushe, ikaparadza maguta aʋo; nyika neɀose ɀayo ikaʋa ɗoŋgo, nokuɗa kwokuʋomba kwayo.
Ipapo marudzi aʋanhu ʋenyika dzakapoteredza akarwa nayo, ʋakakandira mumbure waʋo pamsoro payo, ikaɓatwa muhuzha yaʋo.
Ʋakaiisa mucirugu cineɀikokoʋono, ʋakandoiisa kunamambo weBabironi; ʋakaiisa munhare, kuti inzwi rayo rirege kuzonzwika pamakomo aIsraeri.
Mai ʋako ʋakaŋga ʋakaita somuzambiriŋga, paŋguʋa yokuzorora kwako, wakaŋga wakasimŋa pamvura; wakaɓereka ɀakanaka, unamataʋi mazhinji, nokuɗa kwemvura zhinji.
Ukaʋa namatanda makobvu okuita tȿimbo dzaʋaiɓata ʋushe, musoro wawo ukakwirira kumsoro pakati pamataʋi makobvu, ukaʋonekwa kumsoro‐soro pamŋe cete namashizha awo mazhinji.
Asi wakadzurwa nehasha, ukakandirwa pasi, mhepo inobva mabvazuʋa ikawomesa micero yawo, matanda awo makobvu akavuniwa, ndokuwoma, mŋoto ukaapedza.
Ɀino wasimŋa murenje, munyika yakawoma inenyota.
Mŋoto waɓuɗa paɗandaramataʋiawo, ukapedza micero yawo, hapacineɗanda rinesimba riŋgaita tȿimbo yokuɓata ʋushe. Awa ndiwo mariro, ʋuye acazoʋa mariro.
Ɀino negore recinomŋe,
Shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, taura naʋakuru ʋaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Maʋuya kuzondibvunza ini here? Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — handiɗi kubvunzwa nemi.
Ciʋatoŋga, mŋanakomana womunhu, ciʋatoŋga! Ciʋaziʋisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo;

uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nezuʋa randakasanaŋgura Israeri, ndikasimudzira ʋana ʋeimba yaJakobo ruʋoko rwaŋgu, nokuɀiziʋisa kwaʋari munyika yeEgipita, musi wandakaʋasimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndiciti: Ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu;
nezuʋa iro ndakaʋasimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu, kuti ndicaʋaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita ndiʋaise kunyika yandakaʋatȿakira, kunoyerera mukaka noʋuci, iyo yaiʋa ʋukomba bgenyika dzose.
Ndikati kwaʋari: Rashai, mumŋe nomumŋe, ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀameso ake, murege kuɀiȿiɓisa neɀifananidzo ɀeEgipita; ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.

Asi ʋakandimukira simba, ʋakaramba kunditerera; haʋana‐kurasha, mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo, ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀameso aʋo, haʋana‐kusiya ɀifananidzo ɀeEgipita. Ipapo ndakati ndicaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo, kuti ndipedze kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo pakati penyika yeEgipita.
Asi ndakaɀiita nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, kuti rirege kumhurwa pamberi pamarudzi aʋanhu, maʋakaŋga ʋagere, ʋandakaɀiziʋisa kwaʋari pamberi paʋo, ndiciʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita.
Naiɀoɀo ndakaʋaɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, ndikaʋaisa kurenje.
Ndikaʋapa mitemo yaŋgu, nokuʋaratidza ɀandakaraira, ɀinoti kana munhu aciɀiita ararame naɀo.
Ndakaʋapa ʋo masaɓata aŋgu, ciʋe ciratidzo pakati paŋgu naʋo, kuti ʋaziʋe kuti ndini Jehova, unoʋaita ʋatȿene.

Asi imba yaIsraeri yakandimukira simba murenje; haʋana‐kufamba nemitemo yaŋgu, ʋakaramba ɀandakaraira, ɀinoti kana munhu aciɀiceŋgeta, ucararama naɀo; ʋakamhura ɀikuru masaɓata aŋgu. Ipapo ndakati ndicaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo murenje, kuti ndiʋapedze.
Asi ndakaɀiita nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, kuti rirege kumhurwa pamberi pamarudzi andakaʋaɓuɗisa pamberi pawo.
Ndakaʋasimudzira ʋo ruʋoko rwaŋgu parenje, kuti handiŋgaʋaisi kunyika yandakaŋga ndaʋapa, kunoyerera mukaka noʋuci, iyo yaiʋa ʋukomba bgenyika dzose;
nokuti ʋakaramba ɀandakaraira, ʋakasafamba nemitemo yaŋgu, ʋakamhura masaɓata aŋgu; nokuti mŋoyo yaʋo yakateʋera ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ziso raŋgu rakaʋapembedza, ndikasaʋaparadza, kana kuʋapedza cose parenje.
Ndikati kuʋana ʋaʋo murenje: Regai kufamba nemitemo yamadziɓaɓa enyu, kana kuceŋgeta ɀaʋakaraira, kana kuɀiȿiɓisa neɀifananidzo ɀenyu.
Ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu; fambai nemitemo yaŋgu, muceŋgete ɀandakaraira, muɀiite;
masaɓata aŋgu ŋgaaʋe matȿene kwamuri; ɀigoʋa ciratidzo pakati paŋgu nemi, kuti muziʋe kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu.

Asi ʋana ʋakandimukira simba, haʋana‐kufamba nemitemo yaŋgu, kana kuceŋgeta ɀandakaraira kuti ʋaɀiite, ɀinoti kana munhu akaɀiita, ucararama naɀo; ʋakamhura masaɓata aŋgu. Ipapo ndakati ndicaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo, kuti ndipedze kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo parenje.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakadzosa ruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndikaita nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, kuti rirege kumhurwa pamberi pamarudzi, andakaʋaɓuɗisa pamberi pawo.
Ndakaʋasimudzira ʋo ruʋoko rwaŋgu parenje, kuti ndicaʋaparadzira pakati pamarudzi nokuʋadziŋgira kunyika dzose;
nokuti haʋana‐kuita ɀandakaraira, asi ʋakaramba mitemo yaŋgu, nokumhura masaɓata aŋgu, meso aʋo akatarira ɀifananidzo ɀamadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Ndakaʋapa ʋo mitemo yakaŋga isino‐kunaka, neɀakarairwa ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kurarama naɀo;
ndikaʋaȿiɓisa neɀipo ɀaʋo, ɀaʋakapinza mu
Naiɀoɀo mŋanakomana womunhu, taura neimba yaIsraeri, uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Madziɓaɓa enyu akandimhura ʋo pacinhu ici, kuti ʋakandiɗarikira.
Nokuti ndakati ndaʋaisa kunyika, yandakaʋasimudzira ruʋoko kuti ndicaʋapa iyo, ʋakatȿaka ɀikomo ɀose ɀirefu nemiti yose mikobvu, ʋakaɓayira’po ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo, ʋakaʋuya’po neɀipo ɀaʋo ɀai
Ipapo ndikati kwaʋari: Ko nɀimbo yakakwirira kwamunoenda, inoti kuɗiniko? Naiɀoɀo zita rayo rinonzi Bama kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Naiɀoɀo citi kuimba yaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ko munoɀiȿiɓisa seɀakaita madziɓaɓa enyu here? Munopata muciteʋera ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo here?

Kana muciʋuya neɀipo ɀenyu, kana mucipinza ʋanakomana ʋenyu mumŋoto, munoɀiȿiɓisa neɀifananidzo ɀenyu kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi here? Ɀino ndiŋgabvunzwa nemi here, imi imba yaIsraeri? Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova, handiɗi kubvunzwa nemi;
iɀo ɀinopinda mumiraŋgariro yenyu haɀiŋgatoŋgoitiki cose, ɀamunoti: Tinoɗa kufanana na
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ɀirokwaɀo ndicaʋa mambo wenyu necanza cinesimba noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ʋuye nehasha dzakaɗururwa.
Ndicakuɓuɗisai pakati pamarudzi, nokukuʋuŋganidzai kunyika kwamakaŋga makaparadzirwa, necanza cinesimba noruʋoko rwakatambanudzwa, ʋuye nehasha dzakaɗururwa;
ndicakuisa kurenje ramarudzi aʋanhu, ndigokutoŋgai’po, ticiʋonana nameso.
Seɀandakatoŋga madziɓaɓa enyu murenje renyika yeEgipita, saiɀoɀo ndicakutoŋgai imi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndicakuʋereŋgai netȿimbo
ndicabvisa pakati penyu ʋaka

Kana muri’mi, imba yaIsraeri, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — endai imi mundoshumira mumŋe nomumŋe ɀifananidzo ɀake, asi pashure mucanditerera; hamucazomhuri zita raŋgu dɀene neɀipo ɀenyu ʋuye neɀifananidzo ɀenyu.

Nokuti pagomo raŋgu dɀene, pagomo rakakwirira raIsraeri, ndi’po pandicashumirwa munyika neimba yose yaIsraeri, iʋo ʋose; ndi’po pandicaʋagamucira, ndi’po pandicareʋa ɀiɓayiro ɀenyu, neɀitȿa ɀeɀipo ɀenyu, pamŋe cete neɀinhu ɀenyu ɀose ɀitȿene.

Ndicakugamucirai sobgema ʋunonhuwira, paŋguʋa yandinokuɓuɗisai pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, ndicikuʋuŋganidzai panyika kwamakaŋga makaparadzirwa; ndicaɀiratidza kwamuri ndiri Mutȿene pamberi pamarudzi aʋanhu.
Ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndicikuisai munyika yaIsraeri, kunyika yandakasimudzira madziɓaɓa enyu ruʋoko rwaŋgu ndiciti ndicaʋapa iyo.
Ɀino mucaraŋgarira’po nzira dzenyu, neɀose ɀamakaita, ɀamakaɀiȿiɓisa naɀo; mucaɀisema mumene pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀenyu ɀose ɀamakaita.
Ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndicikuitirai
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kurutiʋi rwezasi, uɗonhedze

uti kuɗondo kurutiʋi rwezasi: Inzwa shoko raJehova: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndicaɓatidza mŋoto mukati mako, ucapedza muti mumŋe nomumŋe mutema mukati mako, nomuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakawoma; muraɀo unopfuta hauŋgadzimŋi, asi ɀiso ɀose kubva kurutiʋi rwezasi kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro ɀicapiswa nawo.
Nyama yose icaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndini ndakauɓatidza; hauŋgadzimŋi.
Ipapo ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova! Ʋanoti pamsoro paŋgu: Ko haazi mutauri wemifananidzo here?
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kurutiʋi rweJerusarema, uɗonhedze
uti kunyika yaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, ndicavomora munondo waŋgu mumuhara wawo, ndicaparadza pakati penyu ʋakarurama naʋakaipa.
Ɀino ɀandicaparadza pakati penyu ʋakarurama naʋakaipa, munondo waŋgu ucaɓuɗa mumuhara wawo kundorwa nenyama yose kubva kurutiʋi rwezasi kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro;
nyama yose icaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakavomora munondo waŋgu mumuhara wawo; haucazodzokeri’po ɀe.
Naiɀoɀo, gomera, iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, gomera pamberi paʋo, ciʋuno cako civunike nokucema kukuru kuʋe’po.

Ɀino kana ʋaciti kwauri: Unogomera neiko? uti kwaʋari: Nemhaka yamashoko, nokuti anoʋuya; mŋoyo mumŋe nomumŋe ucanyauka, maʋoko ose acashaiwa simba, mŋeya mumŋe nomumŋe ucati rukutu, mabvi ose acashaiwa simba semvura; tarirai, anoʋuya, acaitika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, profita, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova: Iti: Munondo, munondo! warodzwa, wabginyiswa;
warodzwa, kuti uʋuraye, wabginyiswa, kuti uʋe semheni; ɀino isu tiŋgagofara here? Itȿimbo yoʋushe yomŋanakomana waŋgu, inoɀidza miti yose.
Wakapiwa kuti ubginyiswe, kuti uɓatwe nawo; munondo warodzwa, ɀirokwaɀo wabginyiswa, kuti uiswe muruʋoko rwomuʋurayi.
Cema, uwuŋgudze, iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, nokuti iwe uri pamsoro paʋanhu ʋaŋgu, uri pamsoro pamacinda ose aIsraeri, akaiswa kumunondo pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋaŋgu; naiɀoɀo uɀiroʋe pahudyu.
Nokuti kuidzwa kwaʋa’po; ɀino toɗiniko kana iwo munondo, unoɀidza, wapera ʋo? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, profita, roʋanya maʋoko ako; munondo ŋgauwedzerwe kuȿikira katatu, iwo munondo waʋakakuʋadzwa ɀikuru; ndiwo munondo womukuru, wakakuʋadzwa ɀikuru, unoʋamanikidza.
Ndakaisa munondo wakavomorwa pamasuʋo aʋo ose, kuti mŋoyo yaʋo inyauswe, nokugumburwa kwaʋo kuwande; haiwa! wakaitwa semheni, wakateȿererwa kuʋuraya.
Ɀiroŋgedze,
Neni ʋo ndicaroʋanya maʋoko aŋgu, ndicanyaradza hasha dzaŋgu; ini Jehova, ndakaɀitaura.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:

Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, ciɀitarira nzira mbiri, dziŋgaʋuya nadzo munondo wamambo weBabironi; idzedzo mbiri dzinofanira kubva kunyika imŋe; ɀino uʋeze ruʋoko, uruʋezere pakuʋamba kwenzira inoenda kuguta.
Utare nzira, iŋgaʋuya nawo munondo, kuȿikira Raba raʋana ʋaAmoni, naJuda mukati meJerusarema rakakombga noruȿiŋgo.
Nokuti mambo weBabironi wakaŋga amire pamharadzano dzenzira, pakuʋamba kwenzira mbiri, kuti abvunze nokuʋuka; akazunuŋgusa miseʋe, akabvunza terafimi, ndokucerekedza ciropa.
Muruʋoko rwake rworudyi makaŋga muneɀakaʋukwa pamsoro peJerusarema, kuti ʋaise ɀokugumura, ʋashamise muromo
Asi ɀicaʋa kwaʋari sokuʋuka kwenhema pamberi paʋo, iʋo ʋakaʋapikira mhiko; asi iye ucaraŋgarira kusarurama kwaʋo, kuti ʋaɓatwe.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀamaka
Ɀino iwe, iwe wakaipa, wakakuʋadzwa ɀikuru, mucinda waIsraeri, wakaȿikirwa nezuʋa rako paŋguʋa yeɀakaipa ɀokupedzisira,
ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ŋgowani
Matoŋgo, matoŋgo, ndicaɀiita matoŋgo, neɀiɀi haɀiŋgarambi ɀiri’po, kuȿikira iye mŋene waɀo aciȿika; ndica

Ɀino iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, ciprofita, uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova pamsoro paʋana ʋaAmoni, pamsoro pokushoʋorwa kwaʋo; iwe uti: Munondo, munondo wavomorwa, wabginyisirwa kuʋuraya, kuti upedze, uʋe semheni;
ʋacikuʋonera ɀakaratidzwa ɀenhema, ʋacikuʋukira nhema, kuti uiswe pamitsipa yaʋakaipa ʋakakuʋadzwa ɀikuru, ʋaȿikirwa nezuʋa raʋo paŋguʋa yeɀakaipa ɀokupedzisira.
Ŋgaudzoserwe mumuhara wawo. Apo pawakasikwa iwe, panyika yawakaɓerekerwa, ndi’po pandicakutoŋga.
Ndicaɗurura kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro pako, ndicafuridzira pamsoro pako nomŋoto wehasha dzaŋgu, ndicakuisa mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋanopeŋga, ʋanoziʋa kwaɀo kuparadza.
Iwe ucaʋa huni dzomŋoto; ropa rako ricaʋa pakati penyika; haucazoraŋgarirwi, nokuti ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura.
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀino iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, toŋga, citoŋga guta reropa, uriziʋise ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaro ɀose.
Uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iwe guta, rinoteʋura ropa mukati maro, kuti ŋguʋa yaro iȿike, rinoɀiitira ɀifananidzo, kuti riȿiɓiswe naɀo!

Wapara mhaka nokuɗa kweropa rako rawakateʋura, waȿiɓiswa neɀifananidzo ɀawakaita; wasweɗedza mazuʋa ako, waȿika pamakore ako; naiɀoɀo ndakakuita cinhu cinoshoʋorwa pamberi pamamŋe marudzi, necinosekwa nenyika dzose.
Ʋari pedyo newe, naʋari kure, ʋacakuseka, iwe unezita rakaȿiɓiswa, uzere neɓope.
Tarira, macinda aIsraeri akapinda mukati mako, mumŋe nomumŋe nesimba rake, kuzoteʋura ropa.
Ƃaɓa namai ʋakaɀidzwa mukati mako, ʋatorwa ʋakamanikidzwa mukati mako, nherera necirikadzi dzakaitirwa ɀakaipa mukati mako.
Iwe wakashoʋora ɀinhu ɀaŋgu ɀitȿene, wakamhura masaɓata aŋgu.
Ʋanhu ʋanamakuhwa ʋakapinda mukati mako kuzoteʋura ropa, ʋakadya pamsoro pamakomo mukati mako, ʋakaita ɀinonyadzisa mukati mako.
Ʋakafukura kunyadza kwamadziɓaɓa aʋo mukati mako, ʋakaninipisa mukati mako mukadzi wakaŋga asino‐kunaka nokuʋa kumŋedzi kwake.
Mumŋe wakaita ɀinonyaŋgadza nomukadzi womunuŋuna wake, mumŋe wakacinyira mukadzi womŋana wake, mumŋe ɀe mukati mako wakaninipisa hanɀadzi yake, mukunda waɓaɓa ʋake.
Ʋakagamucira ɀipo mukati mako kuzoteʋura ropa; iwe wakatora mhindu yemari neyemicero, wakaɀifumisa ucimanikidza wokwako, ukandikaŋganwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo, tarira, ndakaroʋanya maʋoko aŋgu pamsoro pefuma yako yawakawana nokunyeŋgera, napamsoro peropa rako rakaŋga riri mukati mako.
Ko mŋoyo wako uŋgatsuŋga, kana maʋoko ako aŋgasimba here pamazuʋa andicakutoŋga? Ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura, ndicaɀiita.
Ndicakuparadzira pakati pamarudzi, nokukudziŋgira kunyika dzose; ndicapedza tȿina yako mukati mako.
Ucaɀimhurisa pamberi pamamŋe marudzi; ɀino ucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, imba yaIsraeri yaita samarara kwandiri; ʋose ʋakaita
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Mose ɀamaʋa marara, naiɀoɀo, tarirai, ndicakuʋuŋganidzirai mukati meJerusarema.

Seɀaʋanoʋuŋganidzira sirveri nendarira neɗare nomutobvu netini mukati meʋira, kuti ʋapfutidzire mŋoto pamsoro paɀo, ʋaɀinyause, saiɀoɀo ndicakuʋuŋganidzai nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu, ndikuisei’mo, ndikunyausei.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicakuʋuŋganidzai, nokupfutidza mŋoto wehasha dzaŋgu pamsoro penyu; mucanyauswa mukati maro.
Sirveri seɀainonyauswa mukati meʋira, saiɀoɀo imi mucanyauswa mukati maro; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro penyu.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, uti kwairi: Iwe uri nyika isino‐kunatswa, isino‐kunisirwa mvura nezuʋa reshuŋgu
Ʋaprofita ʋayo ʋakaita raŋgano mukati mayo; seshumba inoʋomba icibvanzura cayaɓata, saiɀoɀo ʋakapedza mŋeya

Ʋaprista ʋayo ʋakaparadza murairo waŋgu, ʋakamhura ɀinhu ɀaŋgu ɀitȿene; haʋana‐kutsaura pakati peɀitȿene neɀisati ɀiri ɀitȿene, kana kuziʋisa ʋanhu kusiyana kweɀisino‐kunaka neɀakanaka, ʋakatsinzina meso aʋo ʋarege kuʋona masaɓata aŋgu; ini ndamhurwa pakati paʋo.
Macinda ayo mukati mayo ʋakafanana namapere anobvanzura ɀaaɓata, ʋaciteʋura ropa nokuparadza mŋeya, kuti ʋawane fuma ʋacinyeŋgera.
Ʋaprofita ʋayo ʋakaʋaʋuwira nesuko, ʋaciʋona ɀinonyeŋgera nokuʋaʋukira ɀenhema, ʋaciti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova, iɀo Jehova haana‐kutaura.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakamanikidza nokupamba; ɀirokwaɀo ʋakatambudza ʋarombo naʋanoshaiwa, ʋakamanikidza mutorwa asinemhaka hake.
Ɀino ndakatȿaka pakati paʋo munhu uŋgagadzira ruȿiŋgo, uŋgamira pakakoromoka pamberi paŋgu acirwira nyika, kuti ndirege kuiparadza; asi handina‐kuwana nomumŋe.
Naiɀoɀo ndakaɗurura shuŋgu dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo; ndakaʋapedza nomŋoto wehasha dzaŋgu; ndakaʋuyisa ɀaʋakaita pamisoro yaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, kwakaŋga kunaʋakadzi ʋaʋiri, ʋanasikana ʋamai ʋamŋe;
iʋo ʋakapata paEgipita, ʋakapata ʋaciri ʋaɗuku; mazamu aʋo akanyaŋgatwa ipapo, minyato yoʋumhandara bgaʋo yakaɓatwa‐ɓatwa’po.
Mazita aʋo akaŋga ari Ohora, mukuru, naOhoriba munuŋuna wake; iʋo ʋakazoʋa ʋaŋgu, ʋakaɓereka ʋanakomana naʋanasikana. Ɀino kana ari mazita aʋo, Samaria ndiOhora, Jerusarema ndiOhoriba.
Ohora wakapata, ari waŋgu, akaɗana naʋaɗikani ʋake, iʋo ʋaAsiria ʋaigara pedyo naye,
ʋaifuka miceka mitema, ʋaiʋa ʋaɓati namadzishe, ose ari majaya anoɗikanwa, ʋataȿi ʋaifamba namabiza.
Iye akapata naʋo, iʋo ʋarume ʋakatsaurwa ʋose pakati peAsiria; ɀino waiɀiȿiɓisa neɀifananidzo ɀaʋose ʋaiɗikanwa naye.
Ʋuye haana‐kuzorega kupata kwake kwaakabva nako Egipita; nokuti ʋakaʋata naye aciri muɗuku, ʋakaɓata‐ɓata minyato yoʋumhandara bgake, ʋakaɗurura ʋupombge bgaʋo pamsoro pake.
Naiɀoɀo ndakamuisa mumaʋoko aʋaɗikani ʋake, mumaʋoko aʋaAsiria, ʋaakaɗana naʋo.
Iʋo ʋakafukura kunyadza kwake, ʋakatora ʋanakomana naʋanasikana ʋake, ʋakamuʋuraya iye nomunondo, zita rake rikazosekwa pakati paʋakadzi; nokuti ʋakamutoŋga.
Ɀino munuŋuna wake Ohoriba wakaɀiʋona hake, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro iye wakaŋga akanyanya pakuɗana kwake
Iye wakaɗana naʋaAsiria, ʋaiʋa ʋaɓati namadzishe, ʋaigara pedyo naye, ʋakafuka ɀakaiȿo‐naka kwaɀo, ʋari ʋataȿi ʋanofamba namabiza, ose ari majaya anoɗikanwa.
Ɀino ndakaʋona kuti wasiɓiswa; iʋo ʋose ʋakafamba nenzira imŋe.
Akawedzera kupata kwake; nokuti wakaʋona ɀifananidzo ɀaʋarume pamadziro, ɀiri ɀifananidzo ɀaʋaKardea, ɀakaitwa nomuti mutȿuku,
ʋakasuŋga ɀiʋuno ɀaʋo nebanhire, ʋaneŋgowani dzemiceka pamisoro yaʋo, ʋose ʋakaita samacinda kana ʋaciʋonekwa, ʋakafanana naʋaBabironi paKardea, iyo nyika yokuɓerekwa kwaʋo.
Ɀino wakati aciʋaʋona, akaʋaɗa kwaɀo, akatuma nhume kwaʋari paKardea.
ƲaBabironi ʋakaʋuya kwaari ari panhoʋo dzoruɗo, ʋakamuȿiɓisa noʋupombge bgaʋo, iye akaȿiɓiswa pamŋe cete naʋo, mŋeya wake ukazorambana naʋo.
Ɀino wakati afukura kupata kwake, nokufukura kunyadza kwake, mŋeya waŋgu ukarambana naye, mŋeya waŋgu seɀawakarambana nomukuru wake.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro wakaramba aciwedzera kupata kwake, aciraŋgarira mazuʋa oʋuɗuku bgake, aakapata nawo panyika yeEgipita.
Akaɗana ɀikuru naʋaɗikani ʋake, ʋanenyama yakaita senyama yemboŋgoro, ʋuye ɀinoɓuɗiswa naʋo ɀakaita seɀinoɓuɗiswa namabiza.
Ɀino ukayeʋudzwa ɀakashata ɀoʋuɗuku bgako, paŋguʋa yawakaɓatwa‐ɓatwa minyato yako naʋaEgipita nokuɗa kwamazamu oʋumhandara bgako.
Naiɀoɀo iwe Ohoriba, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — tarira, ndicakumutsira ʋaɗikani ʋako, ʋakazorambga nomŋeya wako; ndicaʋaʋuyisa kwauri kuzorwa newe kumatiʋi ose;
, ʋaBabironi, naʋaKardea ʋose, Pekodi naShoa naKoa, naʋaAsiria pamŋe cete naʋo, iwo majaya anoɗikanwa, ʋose ʋari ʋaɓati namadzishe, macinda naʋarume ʋanembiri, ʋose ʋakataȿa mabiza.

Ʋacaʋuya kuzorwa newe nenhumbi dzokurwa, neŋgoro, neɀinofamba namakumbo eŋgoro, neɓoka raʋanhu ʋazhinji; ʋacaɀiroŋgedza kuzorwa newe nenhoʋo huru nenhoʋo ɗuku neŋgowani kumatiʋi ose; ini ndicaʋapa simba rokutoŋga, ʋakutoŋge nokutoŋga kwaʋo.

Ndicamutsa goɗo raŋgu kuzorwa newe, iʋo ʋakuitire hasha; ʋacabvisa mhino dzako nenzeʋe dzako, ʋakasara kwauri ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo; ʋacatora ʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako; ʋakasara kwauri ʋacapera nomŋoto.
Ʋacakubvisira ʋo ŋguʋo dzako, nokukutorera ʋukomba bgako bgakanaka.
Saiɀoɀo ndicakugumisira ɀakashata ɀako nokupata kwako kwawakabva nako kunyika yeEgipita, kuti urege kuzoɀitarira ɀe nameso ako, kana kuzoraŋgarira Egipita.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndicakuisa mumaʋoko aʋaunoʋeŋga, mumaʋoko aiʋo ʋakarambga nomŋeya wako;
iʋo ʋacakuitira ruʋeŋgo, ʋacakutorera ɀose ɀawakaɓatira, ʋakakurega usina‐cawakafuka wakashama; kunyadza kwokupata kwako kucafukurwa, ɀakaipa ɀako pamŋe cete nokupata kwako.
Ucaitirwa ɀinhu iɀi nemhaka yokuti wakapata namarudzi aʋanhu, ʋuye nemhaka yokuti wakaȿiɓiswa neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo.
Iwe wakafamba nenzira yomukuru wako; saka ndicaisa mukombe wake muruʋoko rwako.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ucanwira pamukombe womukuru wako, wakadzika mukuru; ucasekwa nokuɗaɗirwa, nokuti iwo uneɀizhinji ɀiri’mo.
Ucazara nokuɓatwa nokucema; mukombe womukuru wako Samaria mukombe wokushamiswa nokuparadzwa.
Ucaunwa nokuupedza cose, ucatseŋga ɀaeŋga ɀawo, nokubvanzura mazamu ako; nokuti ndini ndakataura iɀoɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀawakandikaŋganwa, ukandirashira shure kwako, naiɀoɀo ciʋa nemhoȿa yeɀakashata ɀako, neyokupata kwako.
Jehova akati ʋo kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, citoŋga Ohora naOhoriba, uʋaziʋise ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo.
Nokuti wakafeʋa, ropa riri pamaʋoko aʋo; wakafeʋa neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo; ʋakapinza ʋo ʋanakomana ʋaʋo ʋaʋakandiɓerekera
Ʋakandiitira ʋo cinhu ici: ʋakaȿiɓisa ʋo nɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene nezuʋa iro, ʋakamhura masaɓata aŋgu.
Nokuti ʋakati ʋaɓayira ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo ʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakapinda nezuʋa iro munɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene kuti ʋaimhure; tarirai, ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita mukati meimba yaŋgu.
Makatuma ʋo nhume kundoɗana ʋarume ʋanobva kure — nhume yakatumŋa’ko kwaʋari — iʋo ʋakaʋuya, iwe ukaɀishamba nokuɗa kwaʋo, ukazodza meso ako nomuti, nokuɀishoŋgedza neɀishoŋgo,
ukagara panhoʋo dzakaiȿo‐naka, dzakaŋga dzakagadzirirwa tafura pamberi padzo, pawakagadzika ɀinonhuwira ɀaŋgu namafuta aŋgu.

Inzwi raʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋacifara rakaŋga rinaye; ɀino pamŋe cete naʋarume ʋakabva kuʋazhinji, ʋakaʋuya naʋakariri ʋeɗoro, ʋaibva kurenje, ʋakaisa ɀishoŋgo pamaʋoko aʋo, nekorona dzakanaka pamisoro yaʋo.
Ɀino ndakati kunaiye wakaŋga apera nokufeʋa kwake: Ɀino ʋacaita ʋupombge naye, naiye naʋo.
Ipapo ʋakapinda kwaari, seɀaʋanopinda kucifeʋe; saiɀoɀo ʋakapinda kunaOhora naOhoriba, iʋo ʋakadzi ʋakashata.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋakarurama ʋacaʋatoŋga seɀinotoŋgwa ɀifeʋe, seɀinotoŋgwa ʋakadzi ʋakateʋura ropa, nokuti ɀifeʋe, ropa riri pamaʋoko aʋo.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicaʋuyisa ɓoka
Ƃoka iro ricaʋataka namabge, nokuʋaɓaya neminondo yaʋo; ʋacaʋuraya ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo, nokupisa dzimba dzaʋo nomŋoto.
Saiɀoɀo ndicagumisa ɀakashata panyika, kuti ʋakadzi ʋose ʋadzidziswe kuti ʋarege kuteʋera ɀakashata ɀenyu.
Ʋacakutsiʋirai ɀakashata ɀenyu, imi mucaʋa neɀiʋi ɀeɀifananidzo ɀenyu; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino negore repfumbamŋe, nomŋedzi wegumi, ne
Mŋanakomana womunhu, nyora zita rezuʋa, rezuʋa iro rino. Mambo weBabironi wakasweɗera Jerusarema nezuʋa irero.
Ureʋe mufananidzo kuimba ino
ʋuŋganidzira ’mo nhindi dzaro, nhindi dzose dzakanaka, cidɀa neɓandaʋuko; rizadze namafupa akasanaŋgurwa.
Tora rakasanaŋgurwa pakati pamakwai, neȿiŋga
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Guta reropa rinenhamo, negate rineŋgura mukati maro, risina‐kubvisirwa ŋgura yaro! Ƃuɗisa’mo nhindi imŋe neimŋe; rigere kutoŋgerwa.
Nokuti ropa raro riri mukati maro, rakariisa paruware rusinecinhu, harina‐kuriɗururira pasi, kuti ririfukidze neguruʋa.
Ndakaisa ropa raro paruware rusinecinhu, rirege kufukidzwa, kuti hasha
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Guta rineropa rinenhamo! Ndicakurisa ʋo ȿiŋga
Tutirai huni, pfutidzai mŋoto, ɓikai nyama ɀakanaka, kodzai muto, mafupa atȿe.
Ɀino urigadze pamazimbe awo risineciro, ripise, ndarira yaro itȿuke, matȿina aro anyauke mukati maro, kuti ŋgura yaro ipere.
Raka
Tȿina yako ineɀakashata; ɀandakakunatsa, ukasanatswa, hauŋgazonatswi patȿina yako, kuȿikira ndanyaradza hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro pako.
Ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura, ɀicaitika, ini ndicaɀiita, handiŋgadzoki, handiŋgapembedzi, kana kuɀiɗemba; ʋacakutoŋga seɀakafanira nzira dzako, seɀakafanira ɀawakaita — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ʋo kwandiri riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, tarira, ndinokutorera pakarepo norufu unoɗikanwa nameso ako, asi haufaniri kucema kana kuwuŋgudza, nemisodzi yako haifaniri kuyerera.
Gomera, asi ŋgaɀirege kunzwika, usacema wakafa; suŋgira ɀishoŋgo mumusoro wako, upfeke shaŋgu dzako patsoka dzako; usafumbira muromo wako, kana kudya ɀokudya ɀaʋanhu.
Ipapo ndakataura naʋanhu maŋgwanani, maɗekwana mukadzi waŋgu akafa, ndikaita maŋgwanani seɀandakarairwa.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati kwandiri: Ko hauŋgatiʋudzi ʋo kuti ɀinhu iɀi ɀinoti kuɗini kwatiri, ɀaunoita ɀakaɗaro here?
Ɀino ndikati kwaʋari: Shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Taura neimba yaIsraeri,
Ipapo mucaita seɀandakaita ini, hamuŋgafumbiri miromo yenyu, kana kudya ɀokudya ɀaʋanhu.
Ɀishoŋgo ɀenyu ɀicaʋa pamisoro yenyu, neshaŋgu dzenyu patsoka dzenyu; hamuŋgacemi kana kuwuŋgudza, asi mucapera muɀakaipa ɀenyu, mucigomerana.
Saiɀoɀo Ezekieri ucaʋa ciratidzo kwamuri; ɀose ɀaakaita iye, nemi mucaɀiita ʋo; kana ɀiciȿika, mucaziʋa kuti ndini Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino kana uri’we, mŋanakomana womunhu, nomusi wandicaʋatorera simba raʋo, iwo mufaro wecakanaka caʋo, cinoɗikanwa nameso aʋo, ico cinoɗikanwa nemŋeya yaʋo, ʋanakomana ʋaʋo naʋanasikana ʋaʋo,
ko nomusi uyo unopukunyuka haaŋgaʋuyi kwauri kuti akuʋudze iɀoɀo munzeʋe dzako here?
Nomusi uyo muromo wako ucashamisirwa wakapukunyuka, ucataura, hauŋgazoʋi mbeʋeʋe; saiɀoɀo ucaʋa ciratidzo kwaʋari; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kuʋana ʋaAmoni, uprofite pamsoro paʋo;

uti kuʋana ʋaAmoni: Inzwai shoko raShe Jehova: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Imi ɀamakati Toko! pamsoro penɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene, paŋguʋa yokumhurwa kwayo, napamsoro penyika yaIsraeri paŋguʋa yokuitwa kwayo ɗoŋgo, napamsoro peimba yaJuda, paŋguʋa yokutapxa kwaʋo;
naiɀoɀo tarirai, ndicakuisai kuʋana ʋamabvazuʋa muʋe ʋaʋo, ʋacaisa misasa yaʋo pakati penyu, ʋacaʋaka dzimba dzaʋo pakati penyu; ʋacadya micero yenyu, nokunwa mukaka wenyu.
Raba ndicariita mafuro amakamera,
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀamakaroʋanya maʋoko enyu, nokutsikisa netsoka dzenyu, mukafara pamsoro penyika yaIsraeri muciʋaɀidza nemŋeya yenyu yose;

ɀino tarirai, ndakatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro penyu, ndicakuisai kumarudzi muʋe secinhu cakapambga; ndicakubvisai pakati pamarudzi, ndicakupedzai panyika dzose; ndicakuparadzai, ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Moabi naSeiri ɀaʋanoti: Tarirai, imba yaJuda yakafanana namarudzi ose;
naiɀoɀo, tarirai, ndicazarura rutiʋi
ndicaɀipa ʋana ʋokumabvazuʋa, pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaAmoni, iʋe yaʋo, kuti ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋarege kuzoraŋgarirwa pakati pamarudzi;
ndicatoŋga Moabi; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Edomi ɀaʋakatsiʋa imba yaJuda, ʋakapara mhaka kwaɀo, ʋakaɀitsiʋira kwaʋari;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro paEdomi, ndicaparadza’po ʋanhu neɀipfuwo, ndicaiita ɗoŋgo kubva paTemani, ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo kuȿikira paDedani.
Ndicaɀitsiʋira kunaEdomi namaʋoko aʋanhu ʋaŋgu Israeri; ʋacaitira Edomi ɀakarebga nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu nehasha dzaŋgu, ʋacaziʋa kutsiʋa kwaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: ƲaFiristia ɀaʋakaɀitsiʋira, ʋakatsiʋa ʋaciɀidza nemŋeya yaʋo, ʋaciɗa kuparadza nokuʋeŋga kusiŋgaperi,
naiɀoɀo, ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro paʋaFiristia, ndicabvisa ʋaKereti nokuparadza ʋakasara pamhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa.
Ndicaɀitsiʋira kwaʋari nokutsiʋa kukuru nokutuka kwehasha; ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndiciʋuyisa kutsiʋa kwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo.
Ɀino negore regumi nerimŋe, ne
Mŋanakomana womunhu, Tire ɀarakati pamsoro peJerusarema: Toko! Raputsika, iro
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, iwe Tire, ndicaʋuyisa marudzi mazhinji kuzorwa newe, seɀinoʋuyisa guŋgwa mafuŋgu aro.
Ʋacaparadza maȿiŋgo eTire, nokukoromora shoŋgwe dzaro; ndicaritȿairira guruʋa raro, riite soruware rusinecinhu.
Ricaʋa nɀimbo panonikwa mimbure pakati peguŋgwa, nokuti ndakaɀitaura ini — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; ricaʋa kumarudzi secinhu cakapambga.
Ʋakunda ʋaro ʋari kuruwa ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicaʋuyisira Tire Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, mambo wamadzimambo, acibva kurutiʋi rwokumsoro anamabiza neŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza, nehondo naʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Iye ucaʋuraya nomunondo ʋakunda ʋako ʋari kuruwa, ucakuʋakira nhare dzokurwa newe, nokukututira murwi wokurwa newe, nokukusimudzira nhoʋo yokurwa.
Ucamisa ɀokugumura pamaȿiŋgo ako, ucakoromora shoŋgwe dzako nehubga.

Nokuwanda kwamabiza ake guruʋa rawo ricakufukidza; maȿiŋgo ako acaɗeŋgenyeka nomubvumo waʋataȿi ʋamabiza, namakumbo eŋgoro, neŋgoro, paŋguʋa yaacapinda pamasuʋo ako, somupindirwe weguta rakakoromorerwa ruȿiŋgo.
Ucatsika nzira dzako dzose dzomuguta namahwanda amabiza ake, ucaʋuraya ʋanhu ʋako nomunondo, neshoŋgwe
Ʋacapamba fuma yako nokukutorera ɀokushambadzira ɀako, ʋacakoromora maȿiŋgo ako, nokuparadza dzimba dzako dzinofadza; ʋacaisa mabge ako namatanda ako neguruʋa rako mukati memvura zhinji.
Ndicagumisa manzwi enziyo dzako, kurira kwembira dzako hakuŋgazonzwiki.
Ndicakuita ruware rusinecinhu, ucaʋa nɀimbo panonikwa mimbure; haucazoʋakwi ɀe, nokuti ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova kuTire: Ko ɀiwi haɀiŋgaɗeŋgenyeki here nomubvumo wokuwa kwako, kana ʋakakuʋadzwa ʋacigomera, kana
