Neŋguʋa iyo macinda ose okuguŋgwa acaɓuruka paɀigaro ɀawo ɀoʋushe, ʋacaisa pasi ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzoʋushe nokubvisa ɀokufuka ɀaʋo ɀakarukwa; ʋacafuka kuɗeɗera, ʋacagara pasi ʋaciŋgoɗeɗera ʋacishamiswa pamsoro pako.

Ʋacaita mariro pamsoro pako, ʋaciti kwauri: Haiwa, wakaparadzwa sei, iwe wakaŋga wakagarwa naʋanhu ʋaiziʋa kufamba neguŋgwa, iro guta rakaŋga rinembiri, rakaŋga rinesimba paguŋgwa, iro naʋanhu ʋaro, ʋaityisa ʋose ʋagere’ko.
Ɀino ɀiwi ɀicaɗeŋgenyeka nezuʋa rokuwa kwako; ɀirokwaɀo, ɀiwi ɀiri muguŋgwa ɀicavunduka nokubviswa kwako.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Neŋguʋa yandicakuita guta ɗoŋgo, seɀakaita maguta asinaʋanhu, neŋguʋa yandicaʋuyisa

neŋguʋa iyo ndicakuɓurusa pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira mugomba, kuʋanhu ʋekare; ndicakugarisai panɀimbo dziri pasi dzenyika, pakaŋga panamatoŋgo kare nakare, pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira mugomba, kuti urege kugarwa naʋanhu; asi ndicaisa mufaro munyika yaʋapenyu.
iwe ndicakuita cinhu cinotyisa, hauŋgazoʋi’po; kunyaŋge ukatȿakwa, hauŋgawanikwi ɀe nokusiŋgaperi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, ita mariro pamsoro peTire;
uti kuTire: Nhai iwe ugere paʋanopinda paguŋgwa, iwe unoshambadzirana namarudzi aʋanhu paɀiwi ɀizhinji, ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iwe Tire, wakati: Ndakakwana pakunaka.
Nyika yako iri mumŋoyo wamakuŋgwa; ʋaʋaki ʋako ʋakakwanisa kunaka kwako.
Ʋakaita mapuraŋga ako ose nemisipresi inobva Seniri; ʋakatora musidari weRebanoni kukuitira ɗanda recikepe.
Matanda ako okukwaȿa nawo ʋakaaita nemiouki yeBashani; ʋakaita ɀigaro ɀako
Maseiri ako aiʋa omuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, wakasonerwa ʋukomba, aibva Egipita, kuti uʋe mureza wako; ɗeŋga rako raiʋa romuceka mutema nomutȿuku waibva kuɀiwi ɀeErisha.
Ʋakaŋga ʋagere Sidoni neArvadi ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋakwaȿi ʋako; ʋanhu ʋako ʋakacenjera, iwe Tire, ʋakaŋga ʋari mukati mako, ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ʋafambisi ʋeɀikepe ɀako.
Ʋakuru ʋeGebari naʋakacenjera ʋaro ʋaiʋa mukati mako ʋacikugadzirira paisinirira mvura; ɀikepe ɀose ɀeguŋgwa ɀaiʋa mukati mako pamŋe cete naʋafambisi ʋaɀo kuti ʋashambadzirane newe.
Persia neRudi nePuti ʋaiʋa muhondo yako,
Ʋarume ʋeArvadi ʋaiʋa pamsoro pamaȿiŋgo ako kumatiʋi ose pamŋe cete nehondo yako, nemhare dzaiʋa pamsoro peshoŋgwe dzako; ʋaiturika nhoʋo dzaʋo pamaȿiŋgo ako kumatiʋi ose, ʋaikwanisa kunaka kwako.
Tarshishi raishambadzirana newe nokuɗa kwefuma zhinji yamarudzi ose, ʋakateŋga nhumbi dzako nesirveri neɗare netini nomutobvu.
Javani, Tubari, neMesheki ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe, ʋaiteŋga nhumbi dzako nemiʋiri yaʋanhu nemidziyo yendarira.
Ʋeimba yaTogarma ʋakateŋga nhumbi dzako namabiza namabiza ehondo namahesera.
Ʋarume ʋeDedani ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe; ɀiwi ɀizhinji ɀaiʋa nɀimbo pawaiteŋgesa noruʋoko rwako; ʋaiʋuya nenyaŋga dzenzou namatanda omushuma kuzotsinhanha newe.
Siria yaishambadzirana newe nokuɗa kweɀizhinji ɀako ɀakaitwa namaʋoko; ʋakateŋga nhumbi dzako namabge esmaragdino, nomuceka mutema, neɀakarukwa, nomuceka wakaiȿo‐naka, nekorari, namabge anoʋaima.
Juda nenyika yaIsraeri ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe; ʋaiteŋga nhumbi dzako neɀiyo ɀeMiniti, neɀinotapira, noʋuci, namafuta, nebarsami.
Damasko raishambadzirana newe
Vedani neJavani dzakateŋga nhumbi dzako necinda; ɗare rinobginya, nekasia, nekaramo ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀiri pakati penhumbi dzako.
Dedani raikuteŋgesera miceka inokosha yokutaȿisa mabiza nayo.
Arabia namacinda ose enyika yeKedari ndiʋo ʋaiteŋga pamaʋoko enyu; makwaiana namakondobge nembudzi ndiɀo ɀaʋaiteŋga kwauri.
Ʋateŋgesi ʋeSheba neRaama ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe; ʋaishambadzira nhumbi dzako neɀinonhuwira ɀakaiȿo‐naka, namabge ose anokosha, nendarama.
Harani neCane neEdeni iʋo ʋateŋgesi ʋeSheba neAshuri neKirmadi ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe.
Ndiʋo ʋaiteŋgerana newe nenhumbi dzakatsaurwa, neŋguʋo dzemiceka mitema neɀakarukwa, namabokisi eɀokufuka ɀinokosha, akasuŋgwa namaɓote, akaʋezwa nemisidari, pakati penhumbi dzako.
Ɀikepe ɀeTarshishi ndiɀo ɀaitakura nhumbi dzako, iwe ukazadzwa, ukaitirwa mbiri mumŋoyo yamakuŋgwa.
Ʋakwaȿi ʋako ʋakakuisa kumvura zhinji; mhepo yokumabvazuʋa yakakuputsa mumŋoyo wamakuŋgwa.

Fuma yako, nenhumbi dzako, neɀokuteŋgesa ɀako, ʋafambisi ʋeɀikepe ɀako, naʋarairi ʋaɀo, naʋagadziri ʋako panosinirira mvura, naʋashambadziri ʋenhumbi dzako, naʋarwi ʋako ʋose, ʋari mukati mako, naʋanhu ʋako ʋazhinji ʋari mukati mako, ɀose ɀicawira mumŋoyo wamakuŋgwa nezuʋa rokuparadzwa kwako.
Mafuŋgu acaɗeŋgenyeka nomubvumo wokuɗanidzira kwaʋarairi ʋeɀikepe ɀako.
Ʋose ʋanoɓata namatanda okukwaȿa, iʋo ʋafambisi naʋarairi ʋose ʋapaguŋgwa, ʋacaɓuruka paɀikepe ɀaʋo; ʋacamira pamhenderekedzo,
ʋacaɗana namanzwi aʋo pamsoro pako, ʋacacema kwaɀo, ʋacikushira guruʋa pamisoro yaʋo; ʋacaʋumburukira mumaɗota;
ʋacaɀiʋeʋurira misoro nokuɗa kwako, ʋacaɀisuŋga ɀiʋuno namasaga, ʋacikucema nemŋeya ineshuŋgu kwaɀo nokucema kukuru.
Pakucema kwaʋo ʋacakuitira mariro, ʋacacema pamsoro pako,
Paŋguʋa yakaenda nhumbi dzako kumakuŋgwa, wakagutisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji; wakafumisa madzimambo enyika nefuma yako zhinji neɀawaiteŋgesa.
Paŋguʋa yawakaputswa namakuŋgwa mukati memvura zhinji yakadzika, nhumbi dzako naʋanhu ʋako ʋose ɀakawira pasi mukati mako.
Ʋose ʋagere paɀiwi ʋanoshamiswa pamsoro pako, madzimambo aʋo anotya kwaɀo; ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀinoɗeɗera.
Ʋateŋgesi pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu ʋanokuridzira muridzo, waʋa cinhu cinotyisa, hauŋgatoŋgozoʋi’po.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:

Mŋanakomana womunhu, iti kumucinda weTire: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Mŋoyo wako ɀawakaɀikudza, iwe ukati: Ini ndiri mŋari, ndigere pacigaro caMŋari pakati pamakuŋgwa, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, uri munhu hako, hauzi Mŋari, kunyaŋge wakamisa mŋoyo wako somŋoyo waMŋari;
tarira, unokunda Danieri pakucenjera kwako, hakune‐cakaʋanzika causiŋgaziʋi iwe;
wakaɀiwanira fuma noʋucenjeri bgako ʋuye nokuziʋa kwako, ukaɀiwanira ndarama nesirveri muɀiʋigiro ɀefuma yako;
wakawedzera fuma yako noʋucenjeri bgako ʋukuru ʋuye nokushambadzira kwako, mŋoyo wako ukaɀikudza nokuɗa kwefuma yako;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀawakamisa mŋoyo wako somŋoyo waMŋari,
naiɀoɀo tarira, ndinoʋuyisa ʋatorwa pamsoro pako, iʋo ʋanotyisa pakati pamarudzi
Ʋacakuɓurusira kugomba; ucafa norufu rwaʋanoʋurawa mumŋoyo wamakuŋgwa.
Ko uŋgazoreʋa pamberi pounokuʋuraya,
Ucafa norufu rwousina‐kudziŋgiswa namaʋoko aʋatorwa; nokuti ndini ndakataura iɀoɀo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, itira mambo weTire mariro, uti kwaari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iwe wokuisa cisimbiso cako paciyero, uzere noʋucenjeri, wakakwana pakunaka.
Wakaŋga uri paEdeni, mumunda waMŋari; wakaŋga wakafukidzwa namabge anokosha amarudzi ose,
Iwe wakaŋga uri kerubi rakazodzwa, raifukidzira
Wakaŋga wakakwana panzira dzako kubva pazuʋa rokusikwa kwako, kuȿikira kusarurama kwakawanikwa mukati mako.
Nokuwanda kwokushambadzira kwako ʋakazadza mukati mako nokuita nesimba, ukatadza; naiɀoɀo ndakakudziŋga pagomo raMŋari ndiciti uri cinhu cinomhurwa, ndikakuparadza, iwe kerubi raifukidzira
Mŋoyo wako wakaɀikudza nokuɗa kwokunaka kwako; wakaʋodza ʋucenjeri bgako nokuɗa kwokubginya kwako; ndakakuwisira pasi, ndakakuisa pamberi pamadzimambo kuti ʋakuʋone.

Nokuwanda kweɀakaipa ɀako, nokusarurama kwokushambadzira kwako, wakamhura nɀimbo dzako tȿene; naiɀoɀo ndakaɓuɗisa mŋoto mukati mako; wakakupedza, ndikakushandura ukaʋa maɗota panyika pamberi paʋose ʋanokuʋona.
Ʋose, ʋanokuziʋa pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, ʋacashamiswa pamsoro pako; waʋa cinhu cinotyisa, hauŋgazoʋi cinhu nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kurutiʋi rweSidoni, uprofite pamsoro paro,
uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, iwe Sidoni; ndicakudzwa mukati mako;
Nokuti ndicatuma hosha yakaipa mukati maro, neropa munzira dzaro; ʋakakuʋadzwa ʋacawira pasi mukati maro, kana munondo uciʋuya pamsoro paro kumatiʋi ose; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Hapacazoʋi norukato runoɓaya imba yaIsraeri, kana munzwa unokuʋadza pakati paʋaiʋakomberedza, ʋaiʋashoʋora; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Ishe Jehova.

Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Neŋguʋa yandineŋge ndaʋuŋganidza imba yaIsraeri kumarudzi aʋanhu kwaʋakaŋga ʋakaparadzirwa, ndikaitwa mutȿene pakati paʋo pamberi pamarudzi, neŋguʋa iyo ʋacagara munyika yaʋo yandakapa muranda waŋgu Jakobo.

Ʋacagara’mo ʋakaceŋgetwa; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacaʋaka dzimba, nokusima minda yemizambiriŋga, ʋacagara ʋakaceŋgetwa, kana ndaita ɀandakatoŋga pamsoro paʋose ʋakaʋapoteredza ʋanoʋashoʋora; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari waʋo.
Ɀino negore regumi, no
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kunaFarao mambo weEgipita, uprofite pamsoro pake napamsoro peEgipita rose.
Taura, uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, iwe Farao mambo weEgipita, iwe shato huru uʋete pakati penzizi dzako, ukati: Rwizi rwaŋgu ndorwaŋgu, ndakaɀiitira irwo.
Ndicaisa ɀikokoʋono mushaya dzako, ndicanamatidza hoʋe dzenzizi dzako pamakwande ako, ndicakubvisa mukati menzizi dzako pamŋe cete nehoʋe dzose dzenzizi dzako dzakanamatira pamakwande ako.
Ndicakurashira kurenje, iwe nehoʋe dzose dzenzizi dzako, ucawira pasi paɓani pakacena, hauŋgakokerwi kana kuʋuŋganidzwa; ndakakuisa kuɀikara ɀapasi neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, uʋe ɀokudya ɀaɀo.
Ʋose ʋagere Egipita ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋakaita setȿimbo yorutsaŋga kuimba yaIsraeri.
Ʋakati ʋaciɓata ruʋoko rwako, iwe ukavunika, ukatsemura mafudzi aʋo ose; ʋakati ʋacisendama pamsoro pako, iwe ukavunika, ukamisa ɀiʋuno ɀaʋo ɀiri ɀoga.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinoʋuyisa munondo pamsoro pako, ndicaparadza pakati pako ʋanhu neɀipfuwo.
Nyika yeEgipita icaʋa ɗoŋgo nenɀimbo yakaparadzwa ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova. Ɀayakati: Rwizi ndorwaŋgu, ndini ndakaruita,
naiɀoɀo, tarira, ndinemhaka newe ʋuye nenzizi dzako, ndicaita nyika yeEgipita nɀimbo yakaparadzwa cose neɗoŋgo, kubva pashoŋgwe yeSevene kuȿikira pamuganho weEtiopia.
Hakunomunhu ucapfuʋura napo norutsoka rwake, norutsoka rwecipfuwo haruŋgapfuʋuri napo, haiŋgagarwi naʋanhu makore makumi manna.

Nyika yeEgipita ndicaiita ɗoŋgo pakati penyika dzakaitwa matoŋgo, namaguta ayo acaitwa matoŋgo makore makumi manna pakati pamaguta akaitwa matoŋgo; ndicaparadzira ʋaEgipita pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, nokuʋadziŋgira kunyika dzose.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Kana makore makumi manna apera, ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋaEgipita kumarudzi aʋanhu kwandakaŋga ndaʋaparadzira;
ndicadzosa ɀe kutapxa kweEgipita, ndicaʋadzosera ɀe kunyika yePatrosi, kunyika kwaʋakaɓerekerwa; ʋacaʋa’po ʋushe bgakaɀidzwa.
Ʋucaʋa ʋushe ʋunoɀidzwa kupfuʋura ʋushe bgose, haʋuŋgazoɀimisi ɀe kukunda mamŋe marudzi; ndicaʋatapudza, ʋarege kuzoɓata ɀe mamŋe marudzi paʋushe bgaʋo.
Imba yaIsraeri haiŋgazoʋimbi nabgo, ʋuci
Ɀino negore ramakumi maʋiri namanomŋe, no

Mŋanakomana womunhu, Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi, wakaɓatisa hondo yake ɓasa guru rokurwa neTire; misoro yose yakaȿotorwa namafudzi ose akaȿuʋuka; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro iye nehondo yake haʋana‐kupiwa muɓairo neTire pamsoro peɓasa raakaɓata acirwa naʋo.

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, nyika yeEgipita ndicaipa Nebukadrezari mambo weBabironi; iye ucatapa ʋanhu ʋayo ʋazhinji, nokutora ɀaacapamba, nokutora ɀaacatapa; ndiɀo ɀicaʋa muɓairo wehondo yake.
Ndakamupa iye nyika yeEgipita, uʋe muripo wake weɀaakaɓatira, nokuti ʋakandiɓatira ini — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Nezuʋa iro ndicamedzera imba yaIsraeri runyaŋga, newe ndicakupa muromo wakashamiswa pakati paʋo; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, profita, uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Wuŋgudzai! Haiwa, zuʋa rakaipa sei!
Nokuti zuʋa raʋa pedyo, zuʋa raJehova raʋa pedyo, izuʋa ramakore; icaʋa ŋguʋa yamarudzi aʋanhu.
Munondo ucaʋuya pamsoro peEgipita, kurwadziwa kukuru kucaʋa’po paEtiopia, kana ʋakaʋurawa ʋaciparadzwa paEgipita; ʋacabvisa ʋanhu ʋayo ʋazhinji, nenheyo dzayo dzicakoromorwa.
Etiopia nePuti, neRudi, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaveŋgana, neKubi, naʋana ʋenyika ʋakaita suŋgano, ʋacaparadzwa pamŋe cete naʋo nomunondo.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Naiʋo ʋanotsigira Egipita ʋacaparadzwa; kuɀikudza kwesimba rayo kucaɗerera; ʋacaparadzwa’mo nomunondo kubva paMigdori kuȿikira paSevene.
Ʋacaʋa ɗoŋgo pakati penyika dzakaitwa matoŋgo, namaguta ayo acaʋa pakati pamaguta akaitwa matoŋgo.
Ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndaisa mŋoto paEgipita, ʋaɓatsiri ʋayo ʋose ʋaparadzwa.
Nezuʋa iro nhume dzicabva kwandiri neɀikepe kundotyisa ʋaEtiopia ʋasinehanya; ʋacaʋa nokurwadziwa kukuru, sapazuʋa reEgipita; nokuti, tarirai, ɀinoʋuya.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicagumisa ʋo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋeEgipita noruʋoko rwaNebukadrezari mambo weBabironi.
Iye naʋanhu ʋake ʋaanaʋo, ʋanotyisa ɀikuru pakati pamarudzi, ʋacaʋuyiswa’mo kuzoparadza nyika; ʋacavomorera Egipita minondo yaʋo, nokuzadza nyika naʋakaʋurawa.
Ndicapxisa mvura yenzizi, nokuteŋgesa nyika mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋakaipa; nyika ndicaiita ɗoŋgo, neɀose ɀiri’mo, noruʋoko rwaʋatorwa; ini Jehova, ndakataura iɀoɀo.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicaparadza ʋo ɀifananidzo, nemifananidzo ndicaigumisa paNofi; hapaŋgazoʋi nomucinda kunyika yeEgipita; ndicaisa kutya panyika yeEgipita.
Patrosi ndicariita ɗoŋgo, paZoani ndicaisa mŋoto, ndicaita ɀandakatoŋga pamsoro peNo.
Ndicaɗurura hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro peSini, iyo nhare yeEgipita; ndicaparadza ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋeNo.
Ndicaisa mŋoto paEgipita; Sini ricaɓatwa nokurwadziwa kukuru, No ricaparadzwa, Nofi
Majaya eAveni neePibeseti acaʋurawa nomunondo,
PaTapanesi masikati acaita rima, kana ndicivuna’po majoko eEgipita, kuɀikudza kwesimba raro kucapera mukati maro; kana riri iro, ricafukidzwa negore, ʋakunda ʋaro ʋacatapxa.
Saiɀoɀo ndicaita ɀandakatoŋga pamsoro peEgipita; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino negore regumi nerimŋe, no
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ndavuna ruʋoko rwaFarao mambo weEgipita; ɀino tarira, harunakupomberwa, kuti rurapxe nemishoŋga, rupomberwe muceka, kuti ruʋe nesimba rokuɓata munondo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndinemhaka naFarao mambo weEgipita, ndicavuna maʋoko ake, irwo runesimba norumŋe rwakavunika; ndicawisa pasi munondo uri paruʋoko rwake.
Ndicaparadzira ʋaEgipita pakati pamarudzi, ndicaʋadziŋgira kunyika
Asi ndicasimbisa maʋoko amambo weBabironi, nokuisa munondo waŋgu muruʋoko rwake; asi ndicavuna maʋoko aFarao, ucagomera pamberi pake seɀinogomera munhu wakakuʋadzwa uri pakufa.

Ndicatsigira maʋoko amambo weBabironi, asi maʋoko aFarao acaremberera pasi; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndiciisa munondo waŋgu muruʋoko rwamambo weBabironi, iye akautambanudzira pamsoro penyika yeEgipita.
Ndicaparadzira ʋaEgipita pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, nokuʋadziŋgirira kunyika
Ɀino negore regumi nerimŋe, no
Mŋanakomana womunhu, iti kunaFarao mambo weEgipita, nokuʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji: Iwe wakafanana nani paʋukuru bgako?
Tarira, muAsiria wakaŋga ari musidari paRebanoni, wakaŋga unamashizha akanaka, nomumvuri wakaita soweɗondo, wakareɓa kwaɀo; musoro wawo wakaŋga uri kumakore.
Mvura zhinji yakaumeresa,
Naiɀoɀo wakakura kupfuʋura miti yose yokusaŋgo, mataʋi awo akawanda, ʋutaʋi bgawo ʋukareɓa nemvura zhinji, neŋguʋa yokumera kwawo.
Shiri dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzakaʋaka matendere adzo mumataʋi awo, nemhuka dzose dzokusaŋgo dzakaɓereka ʋana ʋadzo pasi pamataʋi awo; marudzi makuru ose aʋanhu akagara mumumvuri wawo.
Saiɀoɀo wakaŋga wakanaka paʋukuru bgawo, napakureɓa kwamataʋi awo; nokuti mudzi wawo wakaŋga uri mumvura zhinji.

Misidari mumunda waMŋari yakaŋga isiŋgagoni kuudzitira; miti yemisipresi haina‐kufanana noʋutaʋi bgawo, nemiprani yakaŋga isina‐kufanana namataʋi awo; kwakaŋga kusinomuti mumunda waMŋari wakaŋga wakafanana nawo pakunaka kwawo.
Ndakauita ɀakanaka nokuwanda kwamataʋi awo, naiɀoɀo miti yose yeEdeni, yaiʋa mumunda waMŋari, yaiugoɗora.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀawakakura ɀikuru iwe, akaisa musoro wake pakati pamakore, mŋoyo wake ukaɀikudza nokuɗa kwokureɓa kwake,
ndicamuisa muruʋoko rwounesimba pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, iye ucamuitira ɀawakafanira; ndakamudziŋga nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀake.

Ʋatorwa, iʋo ʋanotyisa pakati pamarudzi, ʋakamutema ʋakamurega, mataʋi ake akawira pamsoro pamakomo nomumipata yose, ʋutaʋi bgake bgakavunikira pahoʋa dzose dzenyika; ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋabva pamumvuri wake, ʋakamusiya.
Shiri dzose dzokuɗeŋga dzicagara paɗanda rake rakawa, mhuka dzose dzesaŋgo dzicaʋa pamataʋi ake;
kuti miti yose iri pamvura irege kuɀikudza nokureɓa kwayo, kana kuȿitsa misoro yayo mumakore, neinesimba pakati payo irege kumira iciɀikudza — iyo

Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nezuʋa raakaɓurukira kuSheori, ndakaraira kuti ʋanhu ʋaceme; ndakafukidza pakadzika nokuɗa kwake, ndikadzora nzizi dza’po, mvura zhinji ikamiswa; ndakaraira Rebanoni kumucema, miti yose yokusaŋgo ikati rukutu nokuɗa kwake.

Ndakaɗeɗeresa marudzi ose nokutinhira kwokuwa kwake, neŋguʋa yandakamukandira muSheori, pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba; miti yose yeEdeni, iyo yakatsaurwa yakaiȿo‐naka yeRebanoni, iyo yose inonwa mvura, ikaʋaraidzwa panɀimbo dzapasi dzenyika.
Yakaɓurukira ʋo naye kuSheori kunaiʋo ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo; ɀirokwaɀo, ndiʋo ʋaiʋa ruʋoko rwake, ʋaigara mumumvuri wake pakati pamarudzi.

Iwe wakafanana naniko pakubginya noʋukuru pakati pemiti yeEdeni? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaɓuruswa pamŋe cete nemiti yeEdeni kunɀimbo dzapasi dzenyika; ucaʋata pasi pakati paʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, pamŋe cete naʋakaʋurawa nomunondo. Ndiye Farao naʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino negore regumi namaʋiri, nomŋedzi wegumi nemiʋiri, ne

Mŋanakomana womunhu, itira Farao mambo weEgipita mariro, uti kwaari: Iwe wakaŋga wakafananidzwa neshumba ɗuku pakati pamarudzi; asi uri shato huru mumakuŋgwa; wakaɓuɗa munzizi dzako, ukabvoŋgodza mvura netsoka dzako, nokuȿiɓisa nzizi dzaʋo.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndicakanda mumbure waŋgu pamsoro pako neɓoka raʋanhu ʋazhinji, iʋo ʋacakuɓata nomumbure waŋgu.
Ndicakusiya panyika, ndicakurashira kusaŋgo pakacena, ndicamharisa shiri dzose dzokuɗeŋga pamsoro pako, ndicagutisa ɀikara ɀenyika dzose newe.
Ndicanika nyama yako pamsoro pamakomo, nokuzadza mipata nokukwirira kwako.
Ndicaɗiridza ʋo nyika neropa rako rinoyerera ricibva kwauri, kuȿikira kumakomo; hoʋa dzicazara newe.
Kana ndicikudzima, ndicafukidza ɗeŋga, nokudzima nyeredzi dzaro; ndicafukidza zuʋa negore, nomŋedzi hauŋgaɓuɗisi ciedza cawo.
Ɀiedza ɀose ɀeɗeŋga, ɀinopenya, ndicaɀidzima pamsoro pako, ndiciisa rima panyika yako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndicaʋodza ʋo mŋoyo yamarudzi mazhinji aʋanhu, kana ndiciȿitsa kuparadzwa kwako pakati pamarudzi, nokunyika dzawakaŋga usiŋgaziʋi iwe.

Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicashamisa marudzi mazhinji aʋanhu pamsoro pako, madzimambo aʋo acakutya ɀikuru kwaɀo, kana ndicitendeka munondo waŋgu pamberi paʋo; ʋacaɗeɗera ŋguʋa dzose, mumŋe nomumŋe nokuɗa kwoʋupenyu bgake, nezuʋa rokuparadzwa kwako.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Munondo wamambo waBabironi ucaʋuya pamsoro pako.
Ndicaraira minondo yaʋanesimba kuparadza ʋanhu ʋako ʋazhinji; iʋo ʋose ndiʋo ʋanotyisa pakati pamarudzi, ʋacaparadza kuɀikudza kweEgipita, naʋanhu ʋayo ʋazhinji ʋacaparadzwa.
Ndicaparadza ʋo ɀipfuwo ɀayo ɀose ɀiri kunhiʋi dzemvura zhinji, hakuŋgazoʋi norutsoka rwomunhu rucaibvoŋgodza, kana mahwanda eɀipfuwo aŋgazoibvoŋgodza.
Ipapo ndicacenesa mvura yaʋo, nokuyeredza nzizi dzaʋo samafuta — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino neŋguʋa yandicaita nyika yeEgipita ɗoŋgo rakaparadzwa, nyika yakatorerwa ɀayakaŋga izere naɀo, neŋguʋa yandicaroʋa ʋose ʋagere’mo, neŋguʋa iyo ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Awa ndiwo mariro aʋacacema nawo; ʋakunda ʋamarudzi ʋacacema nawo; ʋacacema nawo pamsoro peEgipita naʋanhu ʋose ʋayo ʋazhinji — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino negore regumi namaʋiri, ne
Mŋanakomana womunhu, wuŋgudza pamsoro paʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋeEgipita, uʋawisire pasi, iyo
Unopfuʋuraniko pakunaka? Ƃuruka, ugondoradzikwa kunaʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa.
Ʋacawa pakati paʋakaʋurawa nomunondo; yakatemerwa munondo, ciikweʋerai pasi, iyo naʋanhu ʋayo ʋazhinji.
Ʋanesimba pakati pemhare ʋacataura naye naʋanomuɓatsira, ʋari pakati peSheori; ʋaɓurukira’
Ashuri riri’po neɓoka raro rose; marinda aro akarikomberedza, ʋose ʋakaʋurawa, ʋakawiswa pasi nomunondo;
marinda aro akaiswa kumiceto yegomba, ɓoka raro rakakomberedza rinda raro; ʋose ʋakaʋurawa, ʋakawiswa pasi nomunondo, iʋo ʋaityisa panyika yaʋapenyu.

Erami riri’po naʋanhu ʋaro ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakakomberedza rinda raro, ʋose ʋakaʋurawa, ʋakawiswa pasi nomunondo, iʋo ʋakaɓurukira kunɀimbo dzapasi dzenyika ʋasino‐kudziŋgiswa, iʋo ʋaityisa panyika yaʋapenyu, ʋakaʋa nemhoȿa yeɀinonyadzisa ɀaʋo, pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba.

Rakaisirwa nhoʋo pakati paʋakaʋurawa pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋaro ʋazhinji ʋose, marinda aro akarikomberedza; ʋose haʋana‐kudziŋgiswa, ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo; nokuti ʋaityisa panyika yaʋapenyu, ʋakaʋa nemhoȿa yeɀinonyadzisa ɀaʋo, pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba; rakaiswa pakati paʋakaʋurawa.
Mesheki neTubari ari’po naʋanhu ʋaʋo ʋose ʋazhinji; marinda awo akaakomberedza; ʋose haʋana‐kudziŋgiswa, ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo, nokuti ʋaityisa panyika yaʋapenyu.

Haʋaŋgaʋati pakati pemhare dzakaʋurawa dzaʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, ʋakaɓurukira kuSheori ʋanenhumbi dzaʋo dzokurwa, ʋakaisa minondo yaʋo pasi pemisoro yaʋo, ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀiri pamsoro pamafupa aʋo; nokuti ʋaityisa mhare panyika yaʋapenyu.
Asi iwe ucaputswa pakati paʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, ucaʋata pakati paʋakaʋurawa nomunondo.
Edomi riri’po, namadzimambo aro namacinda aro ose, akaradzikwa pakati paʋakaʋurawa nomunondo, kunyaŋge aiʋa nesimba; ʋacaʋata pakati paʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, ʋuye pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba.

Macinda okurutiʋi rwokumsoro ari’po, iwo ose, naʋaSidoni ʋose ʋakaɓurukira pasi pamŋe cete naʋakaʋurawa; ʋakanyadziswa nokuɗa kwokutyisa kwakabva pasimba raʋo, ʋaʋete, ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, pamŋe cete naʋakaʋurawa nomunondo, ʋanemhoȿa yeɀinonyadzisa ɀaʋo pamŋe cete naʋanoɓurukira kugomba.
Farao ucaʋaʋona, ndokunyaradzwa pamsoro paʋanhu ʋake ʋose ʋazhinji, iye Farao nehondo yake yose, yakaʋurawa nomunondo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Nokuti ndakaisa kutyisa kwake panyika yaʋapenyu; iye ucaradzikwa pakati paʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, pakati paʋakaʋurawa nomunondo, iye Farao naʋanhu ʋake ʋose ʋazhinji — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, taura naʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako, uti kwaʋari: Kana ndiciʋuyisa munondo panyika, ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋakaɀitsaurira munhu pakati paʋo, ʋakamuita nharirire yaʋo;
ɀino kana iye akaʋona munondo uciȿika panyika, akaridza hwamanda, akanyeʋera ʋanhu;
ipapo aninani unonzwa kurira kwehwamanda, akasatenda kunyeʋerwa, kana munondo ukaȿika, ukamubvisa, ropa rake ricaʋa pamusoro wake, iye amene.
Wakanzwa kurira kwehwamanda, akasatenda kunyeʋerwa, ropa rake ricaʋa pamsoro pake; ɗai akatenda kunyeʋerwa, uŋgaɗai akaponesa mŋeya wake.

Asi kana nharirire ikaʋona munondo uciʋuya, akasaridza hwamanda, ʋanhu ʋakasanyeʋerwa, munondo ukaȿika, ukabvisa mumŋe pakati paʋo, wabviswa hake nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀake, asi ropa rake ndicaribvunza paruʋoko rwenharirire.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, ndakakuita nharirire paimba yaIsraeri; naiɀoɀo cinzwa shoko rinoɓuɗa mumuromo maŋgu, uʋanyeʋere panɀimbo yaŋgu.

Kana ini ndikati kunowakaipa: Iwe munhu wakaipa, ucafa ɀirokwaɀo, iwe ukasataura kuti unyeʋere munhu wakaipa panzira yake, munhu uyo wakaipa ucafa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀake, asi ropa rake ndicaribvunza paruʋoko rwako.
Asi kana ukanyeʋera wakaipa pamsoro penzira yake, uciti atendeʋuke pairi, akasatendeʋuka panzira yake, iye ucafa nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀake, asi iwe warwira hako mŋeya wako.
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, uti kuimba yaIsraeri: Imi munotaura, muciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, kuɗarika kweɗu neɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɀiri pamsoro peɗu, tinopera nokuɗa kwaɀo; ɀino ticararama seiko?

Uti kwaʋari: Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — handifariri rufu rwowakaipa, asi kuti wakaipa atendeʋuke panzira yake; tendeʋukai, tendeʋukai panzira dzenyu dzakaipa, nokuti mucafireiko, imi imba yaIsraeri?

Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, uti kuʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako: Kururama kwowakarurama hakuŋgamurwiri nezuʋa rokuɗarika kwake; ʋuye kana kuri kuipa kwowakaipa, haaŋgaparadzwi nako nezuʋa raanotendeʋuka pakuipa kwake; nowakarurama haaŋgararami nako nezuʋa raanotadza.

Kana ndiciti kunowakarurama, kuti ɀirokwaɀo ucararama, kana akaʋimba nokururama kwake, akaita ɀakaipa, hakuna‐ɓasa rimŋe rake rakarurama ricaraŋgarirwa; asi nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀake ɀaakaita, ucafa nokuɗa kwaɀo.
Ʋuye ɀe, kana ndikati kunowakaipa: Ɀirokwaɀo ucafa; kana akatendeʋuka paɀiʋi ɀake, akazoita ɀakarairwa neɀakarurama;
kana wakaipa akadzosa ɀe ruɓatso, akadzosera ɀe ɀaakaŋga apamba, akafamba nemitemo yoʋupenyu, asiŋgaiti ɀakaipa, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama, haaŋgafi.
Hakunaciʋi cimŋe cake caakaita cicaraŋgarirwa pamsoro pake; wakaita ɀakarairwa neɀakarurama, ɀirokwaɀo ucararama.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako ʋanoti: Nzira yaShe haina‐kururama; asi kana ʋari iʋo, nzira yaʋo ndiyo isina‐kururama.
Kana wakarurama akatsauka pakururama kwake, akaita ɀakaipa, ucafa nokuɗa kwaɀo.
Ʋuye kana wakaipa akatendeʋuka pakuipa kwake, akaita ɀakarairwa neɀakarurama, ucararama naɀo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munoti: Nzira yaShe haina‐kururama. Haiwa, imba yaIsraeri, ndicakutoŋgai mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakafanira nzira dzake.
Ɀino negore regumi namaʋiri rokutapxa kweɗu, no

Ɀino ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu maɗekwana, iye wakapukunyuka asati aȿika; wakaŋga ashamisa muromo waŋgu, kuȿikira iye aciȿika kwandiri maŋgwanani; muromo waŋgu ukashamiswa, ndikasazoʋa mbeʋeʋe.
Shoko raJehova rikaȿika kwandiri, riciti:

Mŋanakomana womunhu, ʋanhu ʋagere panɀimbo idzo dzakaparadzwa panyika yaIsraeri, ʋanotaura ʋaciti: Abrahama wakaŋga ari mumŋe cete, akagara nhaka yenyika; asi isu tiri ʋazhinji, nyika yapiwe’su iʋe nhaka yeɗu.
Naiɀoɀo citi kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Munodya
Munoʋimba nomunondo wenyu, munoita ɀinonyaŋgadza, munocinya mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu mukadzi wowokwake; ɀino muŋgapiwa nyika sei?

Citi kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, ɀirokwaɀo ʋari panɀimbo dzakaparadzwa ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo, uri kuɓani ndicamuisa kuɀikara kuti adyiwe naɀo; ʋari munhare nomumapako ʋacafa nehosha yakaipa.
Nyika ndicaiita ɗoŋgo necishamiso, kuɀikudza
Ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndaita nyika ɗoŋgo necishamiso, nokuɗa kweɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo ɀose ɀaʋakaita.
Asi kana uri’we, mŋanakomana womunhu, ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako ʋanokureʋa
Ʋanoʋuya kwauri seɀinoita ʋanhu, ʋanogara pamberi pako seɀinoita ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋanonzwa mashoko ako, asi haʋaaiti; nokuti ʋanotaura ɀoruɗo nemiromo yaʋo, asi mŋoyo yaʋo inoteʋera fuma yaʋo.
Ɀino tarira, iwe wakaita kwaʋari sorwiyo rworuɗo runoimbga nounenzwi rinofadza, unogona kuridza mbira kwaɀo, nokuti ʋanonzwa mashoko ako, asi haʋaaiti.
Ɀino kana iɀi ɀiciitwa (tarirai ɀinoʋuya!), neŋguʋa iyo ʋacaziʋa kuti muprofita wakaŋga ari pakati paʋo.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri riciti:

Mŋanakomana womunhu, profita pamsoro paʋafudzi ʋaIsraeri, profita, uti kwaʋari, kunaiʋo ʋafudzi: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: ʋanenhamo iʋo ʋafudzi ʋaIsraeri ʋanoɀifudza! Ko ʋafudzi haʋafaniri kufudza makwai here?
Munodya mafuta, munofuka makushe
Hamuna‐kusimbisa anoshaiwa simba, kana kurapa anorwara, kana kupombera akavunika, kana kudzosa akadziŋgwa, kana kundotȿaka akarashika, asi makaaɓata nesimba nehasha.
Akapararira, nokuti akaŋga asinomufudzi, akaʋa ɀokudya ɀeɀikara ɀose ɀokusaŋgo, akapararira.
Makwai aŋgu akadzuŋgaira pamakomo ose, napacikomo cimŋe necimŋe cakakwirira, ɀirokwaɀo makwai aŋgu akapararira pasi pose, hakunawakaaronda nokuatȿaka.
Naiɀoɀo imi ʋafudzi, inzwai shoko raJehova:

Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ɀirokwaɀo, makwai aŋgu ɀaakapambga, ɀaakaʋa ɀokudya ɀeɀikara ɀose ɀokusaŋgo, nokuti kwakaŋga kusinomufudzi, naʋafudzi ʋaŋgu ɀaʋasina‐kuronda makwai aŋgu, asi ʋafudzi ʋaŋgu ʋakaɀifudza iʋo, ʋakasafudza makwai aŋgu;
naiɀoɀo, imi ʋafudzi, inzwai shoko raJehova:

Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndinemhaka naʋafudzi, ndicabvunza makwai aŋgu pamaʋoko aʋo, nokuʋadziʋisa kuzofudza makwai, ʋuye ʋafudzi haʋaŋgazoɀifudzi iʋo; ndicarwira makwai aŋgu pamiromo yaʋo, kuti arege kuzoʋa ɀokudya ɀaʋo.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ini, ini ndimene, ndicaronda makwai aŋgu nokuatȿaka.
Mufudzi seɀaanotȿaka ɓoka rake, nezuʋa raari pakati pamakwai ake akapararira kwose, saiɀoɀo ndicatȿaka makwai aŋgu, ndicaarwira panɀimbo dzose kwaakapararira nezuʋa ramakore nererima.
Ndicaaɓuɗisa pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, nokuaʋuŋganidza kunyika
Ndicaafudza namafuro akanaka, ɗaŋga rawo ricaʋa pamakomo akakwirira aIsraeri; acaʋata ipapo pasi muɗaŋga rakanaka, acafura pamafuro akamera kwaɀo pamakomo aIsraeri.
Ini ndimene ndicaʋa mufudzi wamakwai aŋgu, ndicaaʋatisa pasi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndicatȿaka akarashika, ndicadzosa akadziŋgwa, ndicapombera akavunika, ndicasimbisa anorwara; asi akakora naanesimba ndicaaparadza; ndicaafudza ɀakarurama.
Kana muri’mi ɓoka raŋgu, — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — tarirai ndinotoŋga pakati pamakwai namakwai, pakati pamakondobge nenhoŋgo.
Ko munoti cinhu ciɗuku here ɀamakafura pamafuro akanaka, ɀino motsika netsoka dzenyu mafuro enyu akasara?
Kana ari makwai aŋgu, anodya ɀamakatsika netsoka dzenyu, nokunwa ɀamakabvoŋgodza netsoka dzenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova kwaʋari: Tarirai, ini, iyeni, ndicatoŋga pakati pamakwai akakora namakwai akawonda.
Ɀamunosunda norutiʋi nefudzi, mucituŋga asinesimba nenyaŋga dzenyu, kuȿikira maaparadzira kwose,
naiɀoɀo ndicaponesa ɓoka raŋgu, kuti arege kuzopambga; ndicatoŋga pakati pamakwai namakwai.
Ndicaamutsira mufudzi mumŋe woga, iye ucaafudza, iye muranda waŋgu Davidi; iye ucaafudza, iye ucaʋa mufudzi wawo.
Ini Jehova ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo, nomuranda waŋgu Davidi ucaʋa mucinda pakati paʋo; ini Jehova ndakataura iɀoɀo.
Ndicaita naʋo suŋgano yorugare, ndicapedza ɀikara panyika
Ndicaʋaita ropafadzo iʋo nenɀimbo dzakapoteredza cikomo caŋgu; ndicapfunhisa mvura neŋguʋa yayo, mishoko inoropafadza icaʋa’po.

Miti iri kusaŋgo icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo, nenyika icaɓereka ɀayo, ʋacagara ɀakanaka panyika yaʋo; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, neŋguʋa yandinovuna matanda ejoko raʋo, nokuʋarwira pamaʋoko aʋaiʋaɓatisa.
Haʋaŋgazoʋi cinhu cinopambga namarudzi aʋanhu, neɀikara ɀenyika haɀiŋgaʋaparadzi; asi ʋacagara ɀakanaka, hakuna‐uŋgaʋatyisa.
Ndicaʋamedzera miti inorumbidzwa, haʋaŋgazopedzwi nenzara panyika
Ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ini Jehova Mŋari waʋo ndinaʋo, ʋuye kuti iʋo, iyo imba yaIsraeri, ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Asi imi, makwai aŋgu, makwai anofudzwa neni, muri ʋanhu, neni ndiri Mŋari wenyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kugomo reSeiri, uprofite pamsoro paro,
uti kwariri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, iwe gomo reSeiri, ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kwauri, ndicakuita ɗoŋgo necishamiso.
Ndicaparadza maguta ako, iwe ucaʋa ɗoŋgo; ɀino ucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Nokuti wakaʋeŋga ʋana ʋaIsraeri nokuʋeŋga kusiŋgaperi, ukaʋaisa pasimba romunondo neŋguʋa yenjodzi yaʋo, neŋguʋa yeɀakaipa ɀokupedzisira;
naiɀoɀo noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ndicakugadzirira ropa, ropa ricakuteʋerera; ɀausina‐kuʋeŋga ropa, ropa ricakuteʋerera.
Saiɀoɀo ndicaita gomo reSeiri cishamiso neɗoŋgo; ndicaparadza mariri ʋanofamba napo naʋanodzoka napo.
Ndicazadza makomo aro naʋanhu ʋaro ʋakaʋurawa; muɀikomo ɀako nomumipata yako napahoʋa dzako dzose ndi’po pacawa ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo.
Ndicakuita ɗoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi, maguta ako haaŋgagarwi; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀawakati: Marudzi awa maʋiri nenyika idzi mbiri ɀicaʋa ɀaŋgu, icaʋa nhaka yeɗu, kunyaŋge Jehova wakaŋga ari’po;

naiɀoɀo noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ndicaita ɀakafanira kutsamŋa kwako, ʋuye ɀakafanira goɗo rako rawakaʋaitira nokuʋeŋga kwako; ɀino ini ndicaɀiziʋisa pakati paʋo, kana ndicikutoŋga iwe.
Iwe ucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakanzwa kumhura kwako kwose kwawakataura pamsoro pamakomo aIsraeri, uciti: Akaparadzwa, takaapiwa isu ɀiʋe ɀokudya ɀeɗu.
Makaɀikudza kwandiri nemiromo yenyu, makawanza mashoko enyu kwandiri; ndaɀinzwa.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Kana nyika yose icifara, ndicakuita iwe ɗoŋgo.
Seɀawakafara pamsoro penhaka yeimba yaIsraeri, nemhaka yokuti yakaitwa ɗoŋgo, saiɀoɀo ndicakuitira ʋo; ucaʋa ɗoŋgo, iwe gomo reSeiri, neEdomi rose, iɀo ɀose ɀaro; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, profita pamsoro pamakomo aIsraeri, uti: Imi makomo aIsraeri, inzwai shoko raJehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Muʋeŋgi

naiɀoɀo profita, uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nemhaka iyi, ɀaʋakakuitai ɗoŋgo, nokukumedzai kumatiʋi ose, kuti muʋe nhaka yamarudzi aʋanhu akasara, ɀamakarebga nemiromo yaʋanotaura, mukaitirwa makuhwa naʋanhu;

naiɀoɀo, imi makomo aIsraeri, inzwai shoko raShe Jehova: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova kumakomo nokuɀikomo nokuhoʋa nokumipata nokunɀimbo dzakaparadzwa nokumaguta akasiyiwa, aʋa cinhu cinopambga necinosekwa namarudzi akasara anoapoteredza;

naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndakataura nomŋoto wegoɗo raŋgu pamsoro paʋakasara ʋamarudzi napamsoro peEdomi rose, iʋo ʋakaɀitorera nyika yaŋgu ʋaciti iʋe nhaka yaʋo, ʋaciŋgofara nomŋoyo waʋo wose ʋacishoʋora nemŋeya yaʋo, kuti ʋairashire kure ipambge.
Naiɀoɀo profita pamsoro penyika yaIsraeri, uti kumakomo nokuɀikomo, nokuhoʋa nokumipata: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai ndakataura negoɗo raŋgu nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu, nokuti makashoʋorwa namarudzi;
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ndakapika
Asi imi, makomo aIsraeri, mucaɓuɗisa mataʋi enyu, nokuɓerekera ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri ɀiɓereko ɀenyu; nokuti ʋoɗo‐kuȿika.
Nokuti tarirai, ndinemi, ndicatsaukira kwamuri, mucarimŋa nokudɀarwa;
ndicawanza ʋanhu pamsoro pako, iyo imba yose yaIsraeri, iʋo ʋose; maguta acagarwa, namatoŋgo acaʋakwa;

ndicawanza pamsoro penyu ʋanhu neɀipfuwo, ʋacawanda nokuɓereka; ndicagarisa ʋanhu mukati menyu, seɀamakaŋga makaita kare, nokukuitirai ɀakanaka ɀinopfuʋura ɀapakuʋamba kwenyu; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndicafambisa ʋanhu pamsoro penyu, iʋo ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri; ʋacakuita waʋo, ucaʋa nhaka yaʋo, kubva ɀino hauŋgazoʋatoreri ʋana ʋaʋo.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀaʋanoti kwauri: Iwe uri
naiɀoɀo haucazopedzi ʋanhu, kana kuzotorera rudzi rwako ʋana — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova;
handicazokunzwisi kunyadziswa kwamarudzi, hauŋgazoshoʋorwi naʋanhu, hauŋgazogumbusi rudzi rwake — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, ŋguʋa yaʋakagara panyika yaʋo, imba yaIsraeri yakaiȿiɓisa nomufambire waʋo neɀaʋaiita; mufambire waʋo pamberi paŋgu wakaŋga wakaita setȿina yomukadzi uri kumŋedzi kwake.
Naiɀoɀo ndakateʋurira hasha dzaŋgu pamsoro paʋo nemhaka yeropa raʋakateʋurira pamsoro penyika, ɀaʋakaiȿiɓisa neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo;
ndikaʋaparadzira pakati pamarudzi, ʋakadziŋgirwa kunyika dzose; ndakaʋatoŋga ɀakafanira mufambire waʋo neɀaʋakaita.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika kumarudzi, kwaʋakaenda, ʋakamhura zita raŋgu dɀene, nokuti ʋanhu ʋakati pamsoro paʋo: Aʋa ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋaJehova, ʋakaɓuɗa panyika yake.
Asi ndakaŋga ndinehanya nezita raŋgu dɀene, rakaŋga ramhurwa neimba yaIsraeri pakati pamarudzi kwaʋakaenda.
Naiɀoɀo citi kuimba yaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Handiiti cinhu ici nokuɗa kwako, iwe imba yaIsraeri, asi nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu dɀene ramakamhura pakati pamarudzi kwamakaenda.

Zita raŋgu guru ndicariita dɀene, iro rakamhurwa pakati pamarudzi, ramakamhura imi pakati paʋo; ɀino marudzi acaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, neŋguʋa yandicaitwa mutȿene mamuri pamberi paʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Nokuti ndicakubvisai pakati pamarudzi, nokukuʋuŋganidzai kunyika dzose, ndikuisei kunyika yenyu.
Ndicasasa mvura yakacena pamsoro penyu, muʋe ʋakacena; ndicakunatsai matȿina enyu ose neɀifananidzo ɀenyu ɀose.
Ndicakupai ʋo mŋoyo mutȿa, nokuisa mukati menyu mŋeya mutȿa; ndicabvisa mŋoyo webge panyama yenyu, ndikupei mŋoyo wenyama.
Ʋuye ndicaisa Mŋeya waŋgu mukati menyu, nokukufambisai nemitemo yaŋgu; mucaceŋgeta ɀandakaraira nokuɀiita.
Mucagara munyika yandakapa madziɓaɓa enyu; mucaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari wenyu.
Ndicakuponesai patȿina yenyu yose; ndicaɗana ɀiyo, nokuɀiwanza, handiŋgakuremedziyi nenzara.
Ndicawanza ɀiɓereko ɀemiti, neɀinomera paminda, kuti murege kuzoshoʋorwa namarudzi aʋanhu ɀicinzi munenzara.
Ipapo mucaraŋgarira mufambire wenyu wakaipa, neɀamakaita ɀisino‐kunaka; mucaɀisema mumene pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀenyu neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu.
Handiiti iɀoɀi nokuɗa kwenyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — muziʋe iɀoɀo; nyarai muʋe nenyadzi pamsoro pomufambire wenyu, imi imba yaIsraeri.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nezuʋa randicakunatsai paɀakaipa ɀenyu ɀose, ndicagarisa ʋanhu mumaguta, namatoŋgo acaʋakwa.
Nyika yakaŋga iri ɗoŋgo icarimŋa, iyo yakaŋga iri ɗoŋgo pamberi paʋose ʋaipfuʋura napo.
Ipapo ʋacati: Nyika iyi yaiʋa ɗoŋgo, yafanana nomunda weEdeni; maguta akaŋga akaparadzwa akasiyiwa aiʋa matoŋgo, iwo aʋakirwa ogarwa.
Ipapo marudzi akasara kumatiʋi enyu ose acaziʋa kuti ini Jehova, ndini ndakaʋaka nɀimbo idzo dzaiʋa matoŋgo, ndikasima ɀe pakaŋga pakaparadzwa; ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura, ndicaɀiita.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Asi ndinoɗa kukumbirwa cinhu ici neimba yaIsraeri, kuti ndiʋaitire iɀoɀo; ndicaʋawanzira ʋanhu, ʋaʋe seɓoka ramakwai.
Seɀakaita ɓoka ramakwai anoɓayirwa
Ruʋoko rwaJehova rwakaŋga ruri pamsoro paŋgu, akandiɓuɗisa noMŋeya waJehova, akandondiisa pakati pomupata; iwo wakaŋga uzere namafupa;
akandipfuʋudza napakati pawo kumatiʋi ose; tarirai, aiʋa’po akawanda kwaɀo pakacena pamupata; ʋuye, tarirai, akaŋga akawoma kwaɀo.
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana, mafupa awa aŋgararama here? Ndikapindura,
Ɀino akati kwandiri ɀe: Profita pamsoro pamafupa awa, uti kwaari: Imi mafupa akawoma, inzwai shoko raJehova.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova kumafupa awa: Tarirai, ndicapinza mŋeya mukati menyu, mucararama
Ndicaisa marunda pamsoro penyu, nokuʋuyisa nyama pamsoro penyu, nokukufukidzai neganda, nokuisa mŋeya mukati menyu, murarame; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ipapo ndakaprofita seɀandakarairwa; ɀino ndakati ndiciprofita, mubvumo ukaʋa’po, ʋuye, tarira, kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika kwakaʋa’po ʋo; mafupa akasweɗerana, fupa rimŋe kunerimŋe fupa raro.
Ndikatarira, wane marunda aʋa’po pamsoro pawo, nyama ikaʋuya, ganda rikaafukidza pamsoro
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Profitera kumhepo, profita, mŋanakomana womunhu, uti kumhepo: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ʋuya ucibva kumatiʋi manna
Ipapo ndakaprofita seɀaakandiraira, mŋeya ukapinda mukati maʋo, ʋakararama, ʋakamira netsoka dzaʋo, iri hondo huru kwaɀo.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, mafupa awa ndiyo imba yose yaIsraeri. Tarira iʋo ʋanoti: Mafupa eɗu awoma, tariro yeɗu yaenda, taparadzwa cose.
Naiɀoɀo profita, uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicazarura marinda enyu, ndicakukwidzai mubve mumarinda enyu, imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ndicakuȿitsai munyika yaIsraeri.
Mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, kana ndazarura marinda enyu, ndikakukwidzai mubve mumarinda enyu, imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ndicaisa Mŋeya waŋgu mukati menyu, murarame, ndicakuisai munyika yenyu; ɀino mucaziʋa kuti ini Jehova ndakaɀitaura ndikaɀiita — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, tora rutanda rumŋe, unyore pamsoro parwo,
ɀino uɀiɓatanidzire
Ɀino kana ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako ʋakataura newe ʋaciti kwauri: Hauŋgatiziʋisi ɀaunoɗakuratidza neɀinhu iɀi here?

Iwe uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicatora rutanda rwaJosefa, ruri muruʋoko rwaEfraimi, namarudzi aIsraeri shamŋari dzake; ndicaʋaisa kwaruri, kurutanda rwaJuda, ndiʋaite rutanda rumŋe, ʋacaita rumŋe muruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ɀino matanda aunonyora pamsoro pawo anofanira kuʋa muruʋoko rwako ʋaɀiʋone.
Ipapo uti kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarirai, ndicabvisa ʋana ʋaIsraeri pakati pamarudzi, kwaʋakaenda, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza ʋabve kumatiʋi ose, ndiʋaise kunyika yaʋo;
ndicaʋaita rudzi rumŋe panyika, pamakomo aIsraeri; mambo mumŋe ucaʋa mambo waʋose, haʋaŋgazoʋi marudzi maʋiri, ʋuye haʋaŋgatoŋgozoʋi ʋushe ʋuʋiri bgakaparadzana;

haʋaŋgazoɀiȿiɓisi neɀifananidzo ɀaʋo, kana neɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀinosemesa, kana necinhu cipi necipi caʋanoɗarika naco; asi ndicaʋaponesa pose paʋagere, paʋaitadza, nokuʋanatsa; saiɀoɀo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo.
Muranda waŋgu Davidi ucaʋa mambo waʋo; ʋose ʋacaʋa nomufudzi mumŋe; ʋacafamba ʋo neɀandakaraira, nokuceŋgeta mitemo yaŋgu, ʋaciiita.
Ʋacagara munyika yandakapa Jakobo muranda waŋgu, maigara madziɓaɓa enyu; ʋacagara’mo, iʋo naʋana ʋaʋo, naʋana ʋaʋana ʋaʋo, nokusiŋgaperi; Davidi muranda waŋgu ucaʋa mucinda waʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndicaita ʋo suŋgano yorugare naʋo, icaʋa suŋgano isiŋgaperi naʋo; ndicaʋaisa’po, nokuʋawanza, nokuisa nɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene pakati paʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Tabernakeri yaŋgu ʋo icaʋa pakati paʋo; ini ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo, naiʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ɀino marudzi acaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, unoita ʋaIsraeri ʋatȿene, kana nɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene iri pakati paʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri riciti:
Mŋanakomana womunhu, rinzira ciso cako kunaGogi, wenyika yaMagogi, mucinda waRoshi naMesheki naTubari, uprofite pamsoro pake,
uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira ndinemhaka newe, iwe Gogi, mucinda waRoshi naMesheki naTubari;

ndicakutsausa, nokukuisa ɀikokoʋono mushaya dzako; ndicakuɓuɗisa, iwe nehondo yako yose, mabiza naʋataȿi ʋamabiza, ʋose ʋakafuka ŋguʋo dzose dzokurwa, ɓoka guru ʋanenhoʋo huru nenhoʋo ɗuku, ʋose ʋakaɓata minondo;
ʋaPersia naʋaKushi naʋaPuti pamŋe cete naʋo, ʋose ʋanenhoʋo neŋgowani dzokurwa;
naGomeri namapoka ake ose, neimba yaTogarma kumatiʋi okumsoro‐soro, namapoka ake ose, marudzi mazhinji aʋanhu anewe.
Gara wakaɀigadzira, ɀirokwaɀo uɀigadzire, iwe namapoka ako ose akaʋuŋgana kwauri, iwe uʋe mutuŋgamiriri waʋo.

Kana mazuʋa mazhinji apfuʋura, ucashanyirwa; pamakore okupedzisira ucapinda munyika yakarwirwa pamunondo, yakaʋuŋganidzwa icibva kumarudzi mazhinji, pamakomo aIsraeri, aigara akaparadzwa; asi yadzoswa icibva kumarudzi aʋanhu, ʋose ʋacagara ɀakanaka.
Ipapo iwe ucakwira, ucaʋuya seɗutu remhepo, ucaʋa segore rinofukidza nyika, iwe, namapoka ako ose, naʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanewe.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nezuʋa iro mŋoyo wako ucapindwa nemiraŋgariro, ucafuŋga zano rakaipa;
ucati: Ndicaenda kunyika inemisha isina‐kuʋakirwa; ndicaenda kunaʋanorugare, ʋagere ɀakanaka, ʋose ʋagere ʋasinamaȿiŋgo, ʋasineɀipfigiso kana masuʋo;
nditore’ko ɀandiŋgapamba neɀandiŋgatapa; kuti utambanudzire ruʋoko rwako kuzorwa nenɀimbo dzakaŋga dzaparadzwa dzinogarwa

Sheba neDedani naʋashambadziri ʋeTarshishi, pamŋe cete neshumba ɗuku dzose dza’po, ʋacati kwauri: Waʋuya kuzotora ɀakapambga here? Waʋunganidza ɓoka rako kuzotora ɀakatapxa here? Kuti utore sirveri nendarama, kuti utore ɀipfuwo nefuma, kuti utore ɀakapambga ɀizhinji here?
Naiɀoɀo, mŋanakomana womunhu, profita uti kunaGogi: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Zuʋa iro kana ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri ʋacigara ɀakanaka, ko iwe hauŋgaɀiziʋi here?
Ɀino iwe ucaʋuya, ucibva kuʋugaro bgako kumatiʋi okumsoro‐soro, iwe naʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanewe, ʋose ʋakataȿa maɓiza, riri ɓoka guru nehondo inesimba;

ucaʋuya kuzorwa naʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, wakaita segore rinofukidza nyika; ɀino namazuʋa okupedzisira ndicakuʋuyisa kuti urwe nenyika yaŋgu, kuti marudzi andiziʋe, kana ndaitwa mutȿene pakati pako, iwe Gogi, iʋo ʋaciɀiʋona.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ko ndiwe wandakareʋa neŋguʋa yakare naʋaranda ʋaŋgu ʋaprofita ʋaIsraeri, ʋaiprofita namazuʋa iwayo
Ɀino nezuʋa iro kana Gogi aciʋuya kuzorwa nenyika yaIsraeri, hasha dzaŋgu dzicakwira mumhino dzaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Nokuti ndakataura negoɗo raŋgu ʋuye nomŋoto wehasha dzaŋgu,

nokuɗaro kuti hoʋe dzeguŋgwa, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, nemhuka dzesaŋgo, neɀinokambaira ɀose ɀinokambaira panyika, naʋanhu ʋose ʋari pasi pose, ɀicazunuŋguka pamberi paŋgu, namakomo acawiswa pasi, namawere acawira pasi, noruȿiŋgo rumŋe norumŋe rucawira pasi.
Ndicaɗana munondo uʋuye kuzorwa naye kumakomo aŋgu ose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; munondo womunhu mumŋe nomumŋe ucarwa nehama yake.
Ndicamutoŋga nehosha yakaipa neropa; ndicanisa pamsoro pake, napamsoro pamapoka ake, napamsoro pamarudzi mazhinji aʋanhu ʋanaye, mvura inoturuka, necimvuramabge cikuru, nomŋoto nesurferi.
Ini ndicaɀikurisa, nokuɀiita mutȿene, nokuɀiziʋisa pamberi pamarudzi mazhinji; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, profita pamsoro paGogi, uti: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Tarira, ndinemhaka newe, iwe Gogi, mucinda waRoshi, naMesheki naTubari;
ndicakutsausa, nokukutuŋgamirira, nokukuʋuyisa ucibva kumatiʋi okumsoro‐soro; ndicakuȿitsa pamakomo aIsraeri;
ndicaroʋa ʋuta bgako ʋubve muruʋoko rwako rworuɓoshwe, nokuwisa miseʋe yako iri muruʋoko rwako rworudyi.
Ucaparadzwa pamakomo aIsraeri, iwe namapoka ako ose, namarudzi aʋanhu anewe; ndicakupa iwe shiri dzamakondo dzamarudzi ose, neɀikara ɀesaŋgo, kuti udyiwe naɀo.
Ucawira pakacena paɓani; nokuti ini ndakaɀitaura — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndicatuma mŋoto kunaMagogi, nokunaʋagere ɀakanaka paɀiwi; ɀino ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova.
Ndicaziʋisa zita raŋgu dɀene pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri; handicatenderi kuti zita raŋgu dɀene rimhurwe; marudzi aʋanhu acaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, iye Mutȿene waIsraeri.
Tarirai, ɀinoʋuya, ɀicaitwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ndiro zuʋa randareʋa.
Ʋagere pamaguta aIsraeri ʋacaɓuɗa, ʋacaʋesa mŋoto nenhumbi dzokurwa nokudzipisa, ɀinoti nhoʋo ɗuku nenhoʋo huru, noʋuta nemiseʋe, netȿimbo namapfumo; ʋacaʋesa mŋoto naɀo ʋaciita makore manomŋe;
naiɀoɀo haʋaŋgandotori huni kusaŋgo, kana kundodzitema kumatondo, nokuti ʋacaʋesa mŋoto nenhumbi dzokurwa; ʋacaparadza ʋaiʋaparadza, nokupamba ʋaiʋapamba — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.

Ɀino nezuʋa iro ndicapa Gogi nɀimbo yamarinda pakati paIsraeri, iwo mupata waʋafambi kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rweguŋgwa; iɀeɀo ɀicadziʋisa ʋanopfuʋura napo; ipapo ʋacaʋiga Gogi naʋanhu ʋake ʋazhinji ʋose, ndokupatumidza zita rinonzi Hamoni‐Gogi.
Imba yaIsraeri icapedza mŋedzi minomŋe iciʋaʋiga, kuti ʋanatse nyika.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋacaʋaʋiga; icaʋa mbiri kwaʋari nezuʋa randicakudzwa naro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ʋacatsaura ʋanhu ʋanoɓata misi yose, ʋacapota nenyika pamŋe cete naʋanopfuʋura napo, ʋaciʋiga ʋakasiyiwa pacena, kuti ʋanatse nyika; kana mŋedzi minomŋe yapera ʋacacerekedza
Ʋanopfuʋura nap nyika ʋacapfuʋura haʋo; ɀino aninani kana aciŋge aciʋona fupa romunhu, ucaisa’po ciratidzo, kuȿikira ʋaʋigi ʋaciriʋiga pamupata waHamoni‐Gogi.
Hamona ricaʋa zita ʋo reguta. Saiɀoɀo ʋacanatsa nyika.
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Taura neshiri dzamarudzi ose, nemhuka dzose dzesaŋgo,
Mucadya nyama yaʋanesimba, nokunwa ropa ramacinda enyika, ramakondobge, neramakwaiana, nerembudzi, nerenzombe, ɀose ɀiri ɀakakodzwa ɀeBashani.
Mucadya ɀakakora kuȿikira maguta, nokunwa ropa kuȿikira maɓatwa, ɀeciɓayiro candakakuɓayirai.
Mucaguta patafura raŋgu namabiza neŋgoro, naʋanhu ʋanesimba, naʋarwi ʋamarudzi ose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndicaisa mbiri yaŋgu pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, marudzi ose acaʋona kutoŋga kwandakaita, noruʋoko rwaŋgu rwandakaisa pamsoro paʋo.
Naiɀoɀo imba yaIsraeri icaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari waʋo, kubva pazuʋa iro ɀicienda mberi.
Marudzi
Ndakaʋaitira ɀakafanira kusanaka kwaʋo nokuɗarika kwaʋo, ndicaʋaʋanzira ciso caŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ɀino ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaJakobo, nokunzwira imba yose yaIsraeri nyasha; ndicashiŋgairira zita raŋgu dɀene.
Ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yokunyadziswa kwaʋo neyokuɗarika kwaʋo kwaʋakandiɗarikira nako, kana ʋacizogara ɀakanaka panyika yaʋo, kusina‐unozoʋatyisa;
kana ndaʋadzosa kumarudzi aʋanhu, nokuʋaʋuŋganidza kunyika dzaʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ndikaɀiita mutȿene pamberi pamarudzi mazhinji.
Ipapo ʋacaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari waʋo, ɀandakaʋatapisa pakati pamarudzi, ndikaʋaʋuŋganidzira
ʋuye handiŋgazoʋaʋanziri ciso caŋgu; nokuti ndakaɗurura Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro peimba yaIsraeri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀino negore ramakumi maʋiri namashanu rokutapxa kweɗu, pakutaŋga kwegore, ne
Paneɀandakaratidzwa naMŋari, wakandiȿitsa munyika yaIsraeri, akandiisa pagomo refu‐refu, pakaŋga panecinhu cakaŋga cakafanana neguta kurutiʋi rwezasi.
Akandiisa’ko; ɀino tarira, kwakaŋga kunomurume, pakuʋonekwa kwake wakaŋga akaita sendarira, anorwonzi rwecinda muruʋoko rwake, norutsaŋga rwokuyeresa narwo; akamira pasuʋo.

Murume uyo akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, tarira nameso ako, inzwa nenzeʋe dzako, uraŋgarire nomŋoyo wako ɀose ɀandicakuratidza; nokuti wakaȿitswa pano kuti ndikuratidze iɀoɀo; paridzira imba yaIsraeri ɀose ɀaunoʋona.
Ɀino tarira, kwakaŋga kunoruȿiŋgo rwakapoteredza imba necokunze; muruʋoko rwomurume uyo makaŋga munorutsaŋga rwokuyeresa narwo, rwakaȿika makubiti
Ɀino wakaȿika pasuʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, akakwira neɀikwiriso ɀaro, akayera cikumbaridzo cesuʋo, ɀikaita rutsaŋga rumŋe, necimŋe cikumbaridzo ɀe, ɀikaita rutsaŋga rumŋe.

Kamuri imŋe neimŋe yaʋarindi yakaŋga yakaita rutsaŋga rumŋe pakureɓa, norutsaŋga rumŋe paʋupamhi; pakati pamakamuri pakaŋga panamakubiti mashanu; ʋuye cikumbaridzo cesuʋo paɓiraʋira resuʋo kurutiʋi rweimba cakaita rutsaŋga rumŋe.
Wakayera ʋo ɓiraʋira resuʋo kurutiʋi rweimba, ɀikaita rutsaŋga rumŋe.
Ipapo akayera ɓiraʋira resuʋo, ɀikaita makubiti masere, nembiru dzaro, makubiti maʋiri; ɓiraʋira resuʋo rakaŋga riri kurutiʋi rweimba.
Makamuri esuʋo rokumabvazuʋa aiʋa matatu necoʋuno namatatu neceseri, ose matatu aiʋa neciyero cimŋe, nembiru dzaiʋa neciyero cimŋe necoʋuno neceseri.
Akayera ʋupamhi bgomukoʋa wesuʋo, ɀikaita makubiti anegumi; nokureɓa kwesuʋo, makubiti anegumi namatatu.
Kawkaŋga kunorumhanda pamberi pamakamuri, rwakaita kubiti rimŋe
Akayera suʋo kubva paɗeŋga rekamuri imŋe kuȿikira paɗeŋga reimŋe, ɀikaita makubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu pakufara; mukoʋa
Akaita ʋo mbiru, dzakaȿika makubiti makumi matanhatu; ruʋazhe rwakaŋga rwakapoteredza suʋo kuȿikira pambiru.
Ɀino kubva pamberi pesuʋo, paʋanopinda napo, kuȿikira pamberi peɓiraʋira resuʋo romukati, ɀakaita makubiti makumi mashanu.
Mumakamuri makaŋga munamawindi akapfigwa, nomumbiru dzawo mukati mesuʋo kumatiʋi ose, saiɀoɀo ʋo pamaɓiraʋira; mawindi akaŋga ari’po ʋo kumatiʋi ose necomukati; pambiru
Ɀino wakandiisa muruʋazhe rwokunze, ndikaʋona makamuri neguʋa rakaroŋgwa namabge, ɀakaitirwa ruʋazhe kumatiʋi ose; kwakaŋga kunamakamuri makumi matatu paguʋa rakaroŋgwa.
Guʋa rakaroŋgwa rakaŋga riri kurutiʋi rwamasuʋo, rakaenzana pakureɓa kwaro namasuʋo, iro guʋa rakaroŋgwa rapasi.
Ɀino wakayera ʋupamhi kubva pamberi pesuʋo rapazasi kuȿikira kunze pamberi poruʋazhe rwomukati, ɀikaita makubiti aneɀana, kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa nokurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Wakayera ʋo kureɓa noʋupamhi bgesuʋo roruʋazhe rwokunze rakatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.

Makamuri aro aiʋa matatu necoʋuno, namatatu neceseri; mbiru dzaro namaɓiraʋira aro ɀakaŋga ɀakaenzana neciyero cesuʋo rokutaŋga; kureɓa kwaro kwakaȿika makubiti makumi mashanu noʋupamhi makubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu.
Mawindi aro, namaɓiraʋira aro, nemicindwe yaro ɀakaŋga ɀakaenzana neciyero cesuʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; ʋanhu ʋaikwira’ko neɀikwiriso ɀinomŋe; maɓiraʋira aro akaŋga ari pamberi paro.
Muruʋazhe rwomukati makaŋga munesuʋo rakatarisana nerimŋe suʋo, kurutiʋi rwokumsoro nokurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; akayera kubva kunerimŋe suʋo kuȿikira kunerimŋe suʋo ɀikaita makubiti anezana.
Ɀino akaenda neni kurutiʋi rwezasi, ndikaʋona suʋo kurutiʋi rwezasi; akayera mbiru dzaro namaɓiraʋira aro neɀiyero iɀeɀo.
Mawindi aiʋa’po mukati maro nomumaɓiraʋira aro kumatiʋi ose, akafanana namawindi iwayo; pakureɓa kwaɀo ɀakaita makubiti makumi mashanu, nokufara kwaɀo makubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu.
Kwakaŋga kuneɀikwiriso ɀinomŋe ɀokukwira naɀo kwariri; maɓiraʋira aro akaŋga ari pamberi paro; ʋuye rakaŋga rinemicindwe pambiru dzaro, mumŋe necoʋuno nomumŋe neceseri.
Kwakaŋga kunesuʋo paruʋazhe rwomukati kurutiʋi rwezasi; akayera kubva kunerimŋe suʋo kuȿikira kunerimŋe suʋo kurutiʋi rwezasi ɀikaita makubiti anezana.
Ɀino wakandiisa kuruʋazhe rwomukati kusuʋo rezasi; akayera suʋo rezasi neɀiyero iɀeɀi;

namakamuri aro, nembiru dzaro, namaɓiraʋira aro neɀiyero iɀeɀi; kwakaŋga kunamawindi mukati maro nomumaɓiraʋira aro kumatiʋi ose; ɀakaŋga ɀakaita makubiti makumi mashanu pakureɓa, namakubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu paʋupamhi.
Kwakaŋga kunamaɓiraʋira kumatiʋi ose, akaita makubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu pakureɓa, namakubiti mashanu paʋupamhi.
Maɓiraʋira aro akaŋga akatarira kuruʋazhe rwokunze; kwakaŋga kunemicindwe pambiru dzaro; cikwiriso caro cakaŋga cineɀikwiriso ɀisere.
Ɀino wakandiisa muruʋazhe rwomukati kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, akayera suʋo neɀiyero iɀeɀi;

namakamuri aro, nembiru dzaro, namaɓiraʋira aro neɀiyero iɀeɀi; makaŋga munamawindi mukati maro nomumaɓiraʋira aro kumatiʋi ose; ɀakaita makubiti makumi mashanu pakureɓa, namakubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu paʋupamhi.
Maɓiraʋira aro akaŋga akatarira kuruʋazhe rwokunze; kwakaŋga kunemicindwe pambiru dzaro, necoʋuno neceseri; cikwiriso caro cakaŋga cineɀikwiriso ɀisere.
Ɀino wakandiisa kusuʋo rokumsoro, akariyera neɀiyero iɀi;
makamuri aro, nembiru dzaro, namaɓiraʋira aro; makaŋga munamawindi mukati maro kumatiʋi ose; pakureɓa ɀakaita makubiti makumi mashanu, napaʋupamhi makubiti makumi maʋiri namashanu.
Mbiru dzaro dzakaŋga dzakatarira kuruʋazhe rwokunze; kwakaŋga kunemicindwe pambiru dzaro, necoʋuno neceseri; cikwiriso caro cakaŋga cineɀikwiriso ɀisere.
Pambiru pamasuʋo pakaŋga panekamuri yaiʋa nomukoʋa wayo; ndi’po paʋaisuka ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa.
Muɓiraʋira resuʋo makaŋga munamatafura maʋiri necoʋuno, namatafura maʋiri neceseri, pokuɓayira ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀiɓayiro ɀeɀiʋi neɀiɓayiro ɀemhoȿa.
Kurutiʋi rwokunze, kana munhu acikwira kundopinda pasuʋo kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, kwakaŋga kunamatafura maʋiri, ʋuye kunorumŋe rutiʋi rweɓiraʋira resuʋo, kwakaŋga kunamatafura maʋiri.
Kwakaŋga kunamatafura manna kurutiʋi rwoʋuno, namatafura manna kurutiʋi rweseri, kurutiʋi rwesuʋo, matafura masere paiɓayirwa

Kwakaŋga kunamatafura manna amabge akaʋezwa, eɀipiriso ɀinopiswa; pakureɓa akaȿika kubiti nehafu, paʋupamhi kubiti nehafu, pakukwirira kubiti nehafu; ndi’po paʋakaisa nhumbi dzaʋaiɓayira nadzo ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa neɀiɓayiro.
Ɀikokoʋono, ɀakaŋga ɀakaita soʋupamhi bgecanza pakureɓa kwaɀo, ɀakaŋga ɀakasuŋgirwa mukati kumatiʋi ose; pamatafura pakaŋga panenyama yokuʋoŋga.

Kunze kwesuʋo romukati kwakaŋga kunamakamuri aʋaimbi ʋoruʋazhe rwomukati, rwaiʋa kurutiʋi rwesuʋo rokumsoro; iwo akatarira kurutiʋi rwezasi, rimŋe kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa ricitarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Kamuri iri, rakatarira kurutiʋi rwezasi, nderaʋaprista, iʋo ʋaceŋgeti ʋeɓasa reimba;
kamuri, rakatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, nderaʋaprista, ʋaceŋgeti ʋeɓasa reartari; ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋaZadoki, ʋanobva pakati paʋanakomana ʋaRevi, ʋacisweɗera kunaJehova kuzomushumira.
Ɀino akayera ruʋazhe, ɀikaita makubiti anezana pakureɓa, namakubiti anezana paʋupamhi, matiʋi manna akaenzana; artari yakaŋga iri pamberi peimba.

Ɀino wakandiisa paɓiraʋira reimba, akayera mbiru imŋe neimŋe yeɓiraʋira, ɀikaita makubiti mashanu kurutiʋi rwoʋuno, namakubiti mashanu kurutiʋi rweseri; ʋupamhi bgesuʋo bgakaita makubiti matatu kurutiʋi rwoʋuno namakubiti matatu kurutiʋi rweseri.
Kureɓa kweɓiraʋira kwakaŋga kuciita makubiti makumi maʋiri, noʋupamhi makubiti anegumi nerimŋe, ipapo paɀikwiriso ɀaʋaikwira naɀo; pambiru
Ɀino wakandiisa kutembere, akayera mbiru, ɀikaita makubiti matanhatu paʋupamhi kurutiʋi rumŋe, namakubiti matanhatu paʋupamhi kunorumŋe rutiʋi, ndibgo ʋupamhi bgetabernakeri.

Ʋupamhi bgomukoʋa bgakaita makubiti anegumi; matiʋi omukoʋa akaita makubiti mashanu kurutiʋi rumŋe, namakubiti mashanu kunorumŋe rutiʋi; akayera kureɓa kwaɀo, ɀikaita makubiti makumi manna, noʋupamhi makubiti makumi maʋiri.
Ɀino akapinda mukati, akayera mbiru imŋe neimŋe yomukoʋa, ɀikaita makubiti maʋiri, nomukoʋa makubiti matanhatu, noʋupamhi bgomukoʋa makubiti manomŋe.
Akayera kureɓa kwawo ɀikaita makubiti makumi maʋiri, noʋupamhi, makubiti makumi maʋiri pamberi petembere; akati kwandiri: Iyi ndiyo nɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene.
Ipapo akayera madziro eimba, ɀikaita makubiti matanhatu, ʋuye ʋupamhi bgekamuri rimŋe nerimŋe rokumatiʋi, ɀikaita makubiti manna, ɀicipoteredza imba kumatiʋi ose.

Makamuri okumatiʋi akaŋga akaturikidzwa akaita matatu, rimŋe riri pamsoro perimŋe, ɀikaitwa runamakumi matatu; akaŋga akaʋakirwa mukati mamadziro eimba aiʋa kurutiʋi rwamakamuri okumatiʋi, kuti atsigirwe nawo; haana‐kutsigirwa namadziro eimba.
Makamuri okumatiʋi akawedzera ʋupamhi pakupoteredza kwawo
Ndakaʋona ʋo kuti paimba pakaŋga panapamŋe pakakwirira kumatiʋi ose; nheyo dzamakamuri okumatiʋi dzakaȿika rutsaŋga rwose, makubiti matanhatu kuȿikira pakusoŋgana
Ʋukobvu bgecidziro camakamuri okumatiʋi necokunze, bgakaita makubiti mashanu; saiɀoɀo ʋo nɀimbo, yakasiyiwa, yaiʋa yamakamuri okumatiʋi eimba.
Pakati pamakamuri paiʋa nenɀimbo yakaita makubiti anamakumi maʋiri yaipoteredza imba kumatiʋi ose.

Mikoʋa yamakamuri okumatiʋi yakaŋga icitarira kurutiʋi rwenɀimbo yaiʋa yoga, mumŋe mukoʋa kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, mumŋe mukoʋa kurutiʋi rwezasi, ʋupamhi bgenɀimbo yaiʋa yoga bgakaita makubiti mashanu kumatiʋi ose.

Imba yakaŋga iri pamberi penɀimbo, yaiʋa yoga kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, yakaita makubiti makumi manomŋe paʋupamhi bgayo; cidziro ceimba kumatiʋi ose cakaita makubiti mashanu paʋukobvu, namakubiti makumi mapfumbamŋe pakureɓa.
Saiɀoɀo akayera imba, ikaita makubiti anezana pakureɓa; ʋuye nɀimbo yaiʋa yoga, neimba namadziro ayo, ɀikaita makubiti anezana pakureɓa;
ʋuye ʋupamhi bgeimba necemberi kwayo, nokwenɀimbo yaiʋa yoga kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, ɀikaita makubiti anezana.

Ɀino wakayera kureɓa kweimba pamberi penɀimbo yaiʋa yoga, yakaŋga iri shure kwayo, namaɓiraʋira ayo kunorutiʋi rumŋe nokunorumŋe rutiʋi, ɀikaita makubiti anezana; ʋuye tembere yomukati, namaɓiraʋira oruʋazhe;

neɀikumbaridzo, namawindi akaŋga akapfigwa, namaɓiraʋira akapoteredza makamuri matatu akaturikidzwa, akatarisana necikumbaridzo, akaŋga akaroʋerwa matanda kumatiʋi ose, kubva pasi kuȿikira kumawindi, (asi mawindi akaŋga akafukidzwa),
kuȿikira kumsoro kwomukoʋa, kuȿikira kuimba yomukati nokunze, nokucidziro cose kumatiʋi ose mukati nokunze, neɀiyero
Ɀakaŋga ɀakaitwa ɀinamakerubi nemicindwe; kwakaŋga kunomucindwe pakati pekerubi rimŋe nerimŋe kerubi, ʋuye kerubi rimŋe nerimŋe rakaŋga rineɀiso ɀiʋiri;
naiɀoɀo kwakaŋga kuneciso comunhu cakatarira kumucindwe kurutiʋi rumŋe, neciso ceshumba ɗuku cakatarira kumucindwe kunorumŋe rutiʋi; ndiɀo ɀaɀakaŋga ɀakaitwa paimba yose kumatiʋi ose;
kubva pasi kuȿikira kumsoro kwomukoʋa kwakaŋga kunamakerubi nemicindwe; saiɀoɀo ʋo pacidziro cetembere.
Kana iri tembere, mbiru dzemikoʋa dzakaŋga dzinamatiʋi manna akaenzana; kana iri nɀimbo tȿene pamberi payo yakaŋga yakafanana

Artari yakaŋga yakaʋezwa namatanda, yakaȿika makubiti matatu pakukwirira kwayo, nokureɓa kwayo makubiti maʋiri; makona ayo, nokureɓa kwayo, namadziro ayo, ɀakaŋga ɀakaʋezwa namatanda; akati kwandiri: Iri ndiro tafura riri pamberi paJehova.
Tembere nenɀimbo tȿene ɀakaŋga ɀinemikoʋa miʋiri.
Mukoʋa mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga unamasasa maʋiri, masasa maʋiri aitendereka; masasa maʋiri pamukoʋa mumŋe, ʋuye masasa maʋiri panomumŋe.
Paari, ipo pamasasa etembere, pakaŋga pakaʋezwa makerubi nemicindwe, ɀakafanana neɀakaitwa pamadziro; pakaŋga panecikumbaridzo camatanda necapamberi peɓiraʋira necokunze.
Kwakaŋga kunamawindi akapfigwa nemicindwe kurutiʋi rumŋe nokunorumŋe rutiʋi, kumatiʋi eɓiraʋira; ndiɀo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita makamuri okumatiʋi eimba neɀikumbaridzo.
Ɀino wakandiɓuɗisira kuruʋazhe rwokunze, nenzira inoenda kurutiʋi rwokumsoro; akandiisa mukamuri rakatarisana nenɀimbo yaiʋa yoga, yakaŋga yakatarisana neimba kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Pamberi porutiʋi rwakareɓa, rwakaȿika makubiti anezana, kwakaŋga kunomukoʋa worutiʋi rwokumsoro, ʋuye ʋupamhi bgakaita makubiti makumi mashanu.
Pakatarisana na
Pamberi pamakamuri pakaŋga panenɀimbo yokufamba icipinda mukati yakaita makubiti anegumi, iri nzira yakaita makubiti anezana; mikoʋa yaɀo yakaŋga yakatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Asi makamuri okumsoro akaŋga ari maɗuku kunamamŋe, nokuti maɓiraʋira akaŋga aciatapudzira, kupfuʋura apasi naapakati mukati meimba.
Nokuti akaŋga akaturikidzwa, ari matatu, asinembiru dzakaita sembiru dzamaʋazhe; naiɀoɀo okumsoro akaŋga akamanikana kupfuʋura apasi naapakati ɀicibva pasi.
Ruȿiŋgo rwakaŋga ruri kunze kurutiʋi rwamakamuri kuruʋazhe rwokunze pamberi pamakamuri, rwakaȿika makubiti makumi mashanu pakureɓa.
Nokuti kureɓa kwamakamuri akaŋga ari muruʋazhe rwokunze kwakaȿika makubiti makumi mashanu, asi tarira, pamberi petembere akaita makubiti anezana.
Pasi pamakamuri awa ndi’po pakaŋga panomukoʋa wokurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, kana munhu acipinda kwaari acibva kuruʋazhe rwokunze.
Mukati moʋupamhi bgoruȿiŋgo rworuʋazhe kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, pamberi penɀimbo yaiʋa yoga, napamberi peimba, pakaŋga panamakamuri.
Nzira yakaŋga iri pamberi pawo yakaŋga yakafanana

Seɀakaŋga ɀakaita mikoʋa yamakamuri akaŋga ari kurutiʋi rwezasi, saiɀoɀo kwakaŋga kunomukoʋa pakuguma kwenzira, iyo nzira yakaŋga yakaruramira pamberi poruȿiŋgo kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, kana munhu acipinda mukati mawo.

Ɀino akati kwandiri: Makamuri okurutiʋi rwokumsoro namakamuri okurutiʋi rwezasi, ari pamberi penɀimbo iri yoga, ndiwo makamuri matȿene, panofanira kudyiwa ɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene naʋaprista ʋari pedyo naJehova; ndi’po paʋacafanira kuisa ɀinhu ɀitȿene‐tȿene, neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀeɀiʋi, neɀipiriso ɀemhoȿa; nokuti inɀimbo tȿene.

Kana ʋaprista ʋapinda, haʋafaniri kuzoɓuɗa panɀimbo tȿene ʋacienda kuruʋazhe rwokunze, asi ʋanofanira kuisa’po ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzaʋanoshumira nadzo, nokuti idzo itȿene; asi ʋanofanira kufuka dzimŋe ŋguʋo, ndokuzosweɗera kuneɀaʋanhu.
Ɀino wakati apedza kuyera imba yomukati, akandiɓuɗisa nenzira yesuʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, akapayera kumatiʋi ose.
Akayera kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa norutsaŋga rwokuyera narwo, ɀikaita tsaŋga dzinamazana mashanu, norutsaŋga rwokuyera narwo kumatiʋi ose.
Akayera kurutiʋi rwokumsoro norutsaŋga rwokuyera narwo kumatiʋi ose, ɀikaita tsaŋga dzinamazana mashanu.
Akayera kurutiʋi rwezasi norutsaŋga rwokuyera narwo, ɀikaita tsaŋga dzinamazana mashanu.
Akadzoka kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, akayera norutsaŋga rwokuyera narwo, ɀikaita tsaŋga dzinamazana mashanu.
Akapayera kumatiʋi
Pashure wakandiisa kusuʋo, iro suʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa.
Ɀino tarira, kubginya kwaMŋari waIsraeri kwakabva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; inzwi rake rakaŋga rakaita somubvumo wemvura zhinji; pasi pakapenya nokubginya kwake.
Ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana neɀandakaʋona, iɀo ɀandakaʋona ŋguʋa yandakaʋuya kuzoparadza guta; ɀandakaʋona
Kubginya kwaJehova kukapinda mumba nenzira yesuʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa.
Mŋeya ukandisimudza, ukandiisa muruʋazhe rwomukati; ɀino tarira, kubginya kwaJehova kwakazadza imba.
Ɀino ndikanzwa mumŋe acitaura neni ari mumba; mumŋe murume akamira neni.
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu,

nokuisa cikumbaridzo caʋo pacikumbaridzo caŋgu, nembiru dzemikoʋa yaʋo parutiʋi rwembiru dzemikoʋa yaŋgu, kukaŋgoʋa necidziro pakati paŋgu naiʋo; ʋakaȿiɓisa zita raŋgu neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀaʋo ɀaʋakaita; naiɀoɀo ndakaʋapedza nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu.
Ɀino ŋgaʋarashe kufeʋa kwaʋo, neɀitunha ɀamadzimambo aʋo, ɀiʋe kure neni, ndigogara pakati paʋo nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino iwe, mŋanakomana womunhu, ratidza imba yaIsraeri imba

Ɀino kana ʋacinyara pamsoro peɀose ɀaʋakaita, uʋaziʋise cimiro ceimba, nokuroŋgerwa kwayo, napanoɓuɗiwa napo, napanopindwa napo, neɀimiro ɀayo ɀose, nemitemo yayo yose, neɀimiro ɀayo ɀose, nemirairo yayo yose; uɀinyore ʋaciɀiʋona, kuti ʋaceŋgete cimiro cayo cose, nemitemo yayo yose, ʋaɀiite.
Uwu ndiwo murairo weimba: Pamsoro pegomo kumuganho waro wose kumatiʋi ose pacaʋa patȿene kwaɀo. Tarirai, ndiwo murairo weimba.

Ubgu ndibgo ʋukuru bgeartari ɀiciyerwa namakubiti (kubiti ndiro kubiti rimŋe noʋupamhi bgecanza): Cigadziko cinofanira kuita kubiti rimŋe, noʋupamhi kubiti rimŋe; citenderedzo cayo panhiʋi dzayo cinofanira kuita ʋupamhi bgecanza; ndi’po pasi peartari.

Kubva pacigadziko pasi kuȿikira pamusara wapanyasi ɀinofanira kuita makubiti maʋiri, noʋupamhi kubiti rimŋe; kubva pamusara muɗuku kuȿikira pamusara mukuru ɀinofanira kuita makubiti manna, noʋupamhi kubiti rimŋe.
Artari yokumsoro inofanira kuita makubiti manna; kubva pacoto ceartari ɀicienda kumsoro kunofanira kuʋa nenyaŋga inna.
Coto ceartari cinofanira kuita
Musara unofanira kuita
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iyi ndiyo mitemo yeartari nezuʋa raʋanoriita, kuzopisira’po ɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa, nokusasira’po ropa.
Unofanira kupa ʋaprista ʋaRevi ʋorudzi rwaZadoki, ʋanosweɗera kwandiri kuzondishumira, nzombe ɗuku ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino unofanira kutora rimŋe ropa rayo, ndokuriisa panyaŋga dzaro inna, napamakona manna omusara, napacitenderedzo cakapoteredza; saiɀoɀo unofanira kurinatsa nokuriyananisira.
Unofanira kutora ʋo nzombe yecipiriso ceɀiʋi, ipiswe panɀimbo yakatarwa yeimba kunze kwenɀimbo tȿene.
Nezuʋa repiri unofanira kuɓayira nhoŋgo isinemhoȿa, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi; ɀino ʋanofanira kunatsa artari, seɀaʋakarinatsa nenzombe.
Kana wapedza kurinatsa, unofanira kuɓayira nzombe ɗuku isinemhoȿa, negondobge rakatorwa kumakwai.
Unofanira kuɀisweɗedza pamberi paJehova, ʋaprista ʋagokushira munyu pamsoro paɀo, ndokuɀiɓayira ciʋe cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova.
Uite mazuʋa manna ucigadzira nhoŋgo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ciʋe ciɓayiro ceɀiʋi; ʋanofanira ʋo kugadzira nzombe ɗuku negondobge rinotorwa kumakwai ɀisinemhoȿa.
Ʋanofanira kuita mazuʋa manomŋe ʋaciyananisira artari nokurinatsa, nokuritsaurira
Ɀino kana ʋapedza mazuʋa, nezuʋa rorusere, naanoteʋera, ʋaprista ʋanofanira kuʋuya neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa paartari, neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀokuyananisa; ipapo ndicakugamucirai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀino wakandidzosa nenzira yesuʋo rokunze renɀimbo tȿene, rakaŋga rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; asi rakaŋga rakapfigwa.

Jehova akati kwandiri: Suʋo iri rinofanira kugara rakapfigwa, harifaniri kuzarurwa, ʋuye hakunomunhu unofanira kupinda naro, nokuti Jehova Mŋari waIsraeri wapinda naro; saka rinofanira kuramba rakapfigwa.
Kana ari mucinda, iye unofanira kugara’mo ari mucinda, adye ɀokudya pamberi paJehova; unofanira kupinda nenzira yeɓiraʋira resuʋo, ndokuɓuɗa ɀe nenzira iyeyo.
Ipapo akaenda neni nenzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwokumsoro pamberi peimba; ndikatarira, ndikaʋona kubginya kwaJehova kucizadza imba yaJehova; ndikawira pasi neciso caŋgu.

Jehova akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, cerekedza ɀakanaka, utarire nameso ako, unzwe nenzeʋe dzako ɀose ɀandinokuʋudza pamsoro pemitemo yose yeimba yaJehova, nemirairo yayo yose; cerekedza ɀakanaka panopindwa napo paimba, napanoɓuɗiwa napo pose panɀimbo tȿene.
Ɀino uti kunaʋakandimukira, kuimba yaIsraeri: Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Nhai, imi imba yaIsraeri, ciriŋganiswai neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu,

iɀo ɀokupinza kwenyu ʋatorwa, ʋanemŋoyo isino‐kudziŋgiswa nenyama isino‐kudziŋgiswa, kuti ʋaʋe munɀimbo yaŋgu, mucimhura iyo imba yaŋgu, kana mucindiʋigira ɀokudya, namafuta neropa; ʋakaputsa suŋgano yaŋgu, ʋacinyanyisa ɀinonyaŋgadza ɀenyu.
Hamuna‐kuceŋgeta ɀinhu ɀaŋgu ɀitȿene, asi makagadza ʋatariri ʋanokuceŋgeterai imi ɀinhu ɀaŋgu munɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Mutorwa unomŋoyo usino‐kudziŋgiswa nenyama isino‐kudziŋgiswa ŋgaarege kupinda munɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene, aninani waʋatorwa ʋari pakati paʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Asi ʋaRevi, ʋakaenda kure neni paŋguʋa yokutsauka kwaIsraeri, ʋakatsauka kwandiri ʋaciteʋera ɀifananidzo ɀaʋo, iʋo ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yeɀakaipa ɀaʋo.

Asi ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋashumiri munɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene, naʋatariri pamasuʋo eimba, naʋanoshumira mumba; iʋo ʋanofanira kuɓayira cipiriso cinopiswa, neɀinoɓayirwa ʋanhu, nokumira pamberi paʋo kuʋashumirira.
Ɀaʋakaʋashumirira pamberi peɀifananidzo ɀaʋo, ʋakazoʋa cigumbuso ceɀakaipa kuimba yaIsraeri; naiɀoɀo ndakaʋasimudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yeɀakaipa ɀaʋo.

Haʋaŋgasweɗeri kwandiri, kundiitira ɓasa roʋuprista, kana kusweɗera kucinhu cipi necipi ceɀinhu ɀaŋgu ɀitȿene, kuɀinhu ɀitȿene kwaɀo; asi ʋacaʋa nemhoȿa yokunyadziswa kwaʋo, neyeɀinonyadzisa ɀaʋo ɀaʋakaita.
Asi ndicaʋaita ʋatariri ʋanoceŋgeta imba, ʋaite ɓasa rayo rose, neɀose ɀinofanira kuitwa’mo.

Asi ʋaprista ʋaRevi, iʋo ʋanakomana ʋaZadoki, ʋaiceŋgeta ɓasa renɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene paŋguʋa yokutsauka kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacibva kwandiri, ndiʋo ʋacasweɗera kwandiri kuzondishumira; iʋo ʋacamira pamberi paŋgu kuzondiɓayira mafuta neropa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova;
ʋacapinda munɀimbo yaŋgu tȿene, ʋacasweɗera kutafura yaŋgu, kuti ʋandishumire, ʋuye ʋacaceŋgeta ɓasa raŋgu.
Ɀino kana ʋacipinda pamasuʋo oruʋazhe rwomukati, ʋacafanira kufuka ŋguʋo dzemiceka; makushe ŋgaarege kuʋa pamiʋiri yaʋo, kana ʋacishumira mumasuʋo oruʋazhe rwomukati, nomukati
Ʋacafanira kufuka ŋgowani dzemiceka pamisoro yaʋo, ʋuye ʋacafanira kuʋa namaburuku emiceka paɀiʋuno ɀaʋo; ŋgaʋarege kuɀisuŋga ciʋuno ne

Kana ʋaciɓuɗira kuruʋazhe rwokunze, iko kuruʋazhe rwokunze kuʋanhu, ʋanofanira kubvisa ŋguʋo dzaʋo dzaʋanoshumira nadzo, ndokudziisa mumakamuri matȿene; ʋanofanira kufuka dzimŋe ŋguʋo, kuti ʋarege kuita ʋanhu ʋatȿene neŋguʋo dzaʋo.
Ŋgaʋarege kuʋeʋura misoro yaʋo, kana kurega vudzi raʋo ricireɓa; ŋgaʋagunde cete misoro yaʋo.
Muprista upi noupi ŋgaarege kunwa waini, kana acipinda muruʋazhe rwomukati.
Haʋafaniri kuwana cirikadzi, kana mukadzi wakarambga
Ʋanofanira kudzidzisa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kusiyana kweɀitȿene neɀisi ɀitȿene, nokuʋadzidzisa kutsaura pakati peɀisino‐kunaka neɀakanaka.
Kana panegakaʋa ʋanofanira kuʋa ʋatoŋgi; ʋanofanira kutoŋga nemitemo yaŋgu; ʋacafanira kuceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu nemitemo yaŋgu pamitambo yaŋgu yose yakatarwa; masaɓata aŋgu ŋgaaʋe matȿene kwaʋari.
Ŋgaʋarege kupinda kuneɀitunha, kuti ʋarege kuɀiȿiɓisa; asi ʋaŋgaɀiȿiɓisa nokuɗa kwaɓaɓa, kana mai, kana mŋanakomana, kana mŋanasikana, kana mukoma nomunuŋuna, kana hanɀadzi yakaŋga icigere kuwanikwa.
Ɀino kana iye apera kunatswa, unofanira kutarirwa mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nezuʋa raanozopinda munɀimbo tȿene, muruʋazhe rwomukati, kundoshumira munɀimbo tȿene, ucafanira kuɓayira cipiriso cake ceɀiʋi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ʋacaʋa nenhaka; ini ndini nhaka yaʋo; hamufaniri kuʋapa fuma pakati paIsraeri, ini ndini fuma yaʋo.
Ʋanofanira kudya cipiriso coʋupfu, necipiriso ceɀiʋi, necipiriso cemhoȿa; cinhu cipi necipi cakatsaurirwa

Cakaiȿo‐naka paɀiɓereko ɀokutaŋga ɀeɀose, neɀipiriso ɀakatsaurwa ɀeɀose, ɀeɀipo ɀenyu ɀose, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀaʋaprista; munofanira kupa ʋo ʋaprista ɀokutaŋga ɀoʋupfu bgenyu bgakakuyiwa, kuti mugarise ropafadzo paimba yenyu.
Ʋaprista ŋgaʋarege kudya cinhu cipi necipi cakaŋgofa coga, kana cakabvamburanyiwa, kana iri shiri kana cipfuwo.
Ɀino kana muciganhura nyika nemijenya, kuti iʋe nhaka yenyu, munofanira kuʋigira Jehova cipo,
Ipapo panofanira kuʋa nɀimbo tȿene yakaita tsaŋga dzinamazana mashanu
Ɀino pamugoʋe wakaganhurwa unofanira kuyera

Uyu unofanira kuʋa mugoʋe mutȿene wenyika; unofanira kuʋa waʋaprista, iʋo ʋanoshumira panɀimbo tȿene, ʋanosweɗera kunaJehova kumushumira; inofanira kuʋa nɀimbo yedzimba dzaʋo, nenɀimbo tȿene yenɀimbo tȿene.
inoȿika ɀiyero ɀineɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀishanu pakureɓa, neɀuru ɀinegumi paʋupamhi, inofanira kuʋa yaʋaRevi, iʋo ʋanoshumira paimba, iʋe nhaka yaʋo, paʋaŋgaʋaka maguta okugara’mo.
Nhaka

Mugoʋe womucinda unofanira kuʋa kurutiʋi rumŋe nokunorumŋe rutiʋi rwecipo citȿene, nokwenhaka iri muguta, pamberi pecipo citȿene, napamberi penhaka iri muguta, kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa ɀicienda kumaʋirazuʋa, nokurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa ɀicienda kumabvazuʋa; pakureɓa unofanira kuenzana nomugoʋe mumŋe, kubva kumuganho wokumaʋirazuʋa kuȿikira kumuganho wokumabvazuʋa.
Nyika iyo inofanira kuʋa nhaka yake pakati paIsraeri; macinda aŋgu haaŋgazomanikidzi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, asi acapa imba yaIsraeri nyika ʋacienzanisa namarudzi aʋo.

Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Ciriŋganiswai naɀo, imi macinda aIsraeri; bvisai kuita nesimba nokupamba, toŋgai ɀakarurama neɀakatendeka; bvisai kumanikidza kwenyu pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Munofanira kuʋa neɀiyero ɀakarurama, neefa yakarurama, nebati rakarurama.
Efa nebati ɀinofanira kuʋa neciyero cimŋe, kuti bati riite cegumi cimŋe cehomeri,
Shekeri
Ici ndico cipo camunofanira kuʋuya naco: Mugoʋe wecitanhatu weefa pahomeri imŋe yeɀiyo; ʋuye munofanira kupa mugoʋe wecitanhatu ceefa pahomeri yebari;
ʋuye mugoʋe wakatarwa wamafuta, webati ramafuta, unofanira kuʋa mugoʋe wegumi webati wakatorwa pakori,

ʋuye gwaiana rimŋe paɓoka ramakwai anamazana maʋiri, ari pamafuro akanatso‐ɗiridzwa aʋaIsraeri; ɀiʋe cipiriso coʋupfu, necipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso cokuyananisa, kuʋayananisira — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika ʋanofanira kuʋigira mucinda waIsraeri cipo ici.

Mucinda ndiye unofanira kuisa ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa, neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, neɀipiriso ɀinonwiwa pamitambo napakugara kwomŋedzi, napamasaɓata, pamitambo yose yakatarwa yeimba yaIsraeri; iye unofanira kugadzira cipiriso ceɀiʋi, necipiriso coʋupfu, necipiriso cinopiswa, necipiriso cokuyananisa, kuti ayananisire imba yaIsraeri.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: No
Ɀino muprista unofanira kutora ropa recipiriso ceɀiʋi, ndokuriisa pambiru dzemikoʋa yeimba, napamakona manna omusara weartari, napambiru dzesuʋo roruʋazhe rwomukati.
Munofanira kuita ʋo saiɀoɀo ne
No
Nezuʋa iro mucinda unofanira kuɀigadzirira iye, naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, nzombe ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.

Namazuʋa manomŋe omutambo unofanira kugadzirira Jehova cipiriso cinopiswa, ɀinoti nzombe nomŋe namakondobge manomŋe ɀisinemhoȿa, zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe pamazuʋa iwayo manomŋe; ʋuye nhoŋgo imŋe zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, ciʋe cipiriso ceɀiʋi.
Ʋuye unofanira kugadzira cipiriso coʋupfu, efa imŋe panzombe imŋe neimŋe, neefa imŋe pagondobge rimŋe nerimŋe, nehini yamafuta paefa imŋe neimŋe.
No

Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Suʋo roruʋazhe rwomukati rakatarira kumabvazuʋa rinofanira kugara rakapfigwa mazuʋa matanhatu anoɓatwa nawo; asi nezuʋa resaɓata rinofanira kuzarurwa, ʋuye nezuʋa rokugara kwomŋedzi rinofanira kuzarurwa.

Mucinda unofanira kupinda napanzira yeɓiraʋira resuʋo rokunze, ndokumira pambiru yesuʋo; ɀino ʋaprista ʋanofanira kumugadzirira cipiriso cake cinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa, iye agonamata pacikumbaridzo cesuʋo; ipapo unofanira kuɓuɗa; asi suʋo harifaniri kupfigwa kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋanofanira kunamata pamukoʋa wesuʋo iro pamberi paJehova pamasaɓata napakugara kwomŋedzi.
Cipiriso cinopiswa, cinoʋigirwa Jehova nomucinda nomusi wesaɓata cinofanira kuita makwaiana matanhatu asinemhoȿa negondobge risinemhoȿa;
ʋuye cipiriso coʋupfu cinofanira kuita efa imŋe pagondobge, ʋuye cipiriso coʋupfu pamakwaiana seɀaanogona kupa, nehini
Nezuʋa rokugara kwomŋedzi ɀinofanira kuita nzombe ɗuku isinemhoȿa, namakwaiana matanhatu, negondobge; ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀisinemhoȿa.
Ɀino iye unofanira kugadzira cipiriso coʋupfu, efa imŋe panzombe, neefa imŋe pagondobge, napamakwaiana seɀaanogona, nehini yamafuta paefa imŋe neimŋe.
Kana mucinda acipinda, unofanira kupinda nenzira yeɓiraʋira resuʋo, ʋuye unofanira kuɓuɗa nenzira iyo.

Asi kana ʋanhu ʋenyika ʋaciʋuya pamberi paJehova pamitambo yakatarwa, unopinda nenzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwokumsoro kuzonamata, unofanira kuɓuɗa nenzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwezasi; unopinda napanzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwezasi, unofanira kuɓuɗa nenzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwokumsoro; haafaniri kudzoka nenzira yaakaʋuya nayo, asi unofanira kufamba akatarira mberi.
Kana ʋacipinda, mucinda unofanira kupinda ari pakati paʋo; kana ʋaciɓuɗa ʋanofanira kuɓuɗa
Pamitambo napaŋguʋa dzemitambo cipiriso coʋupfu cinofanira kuita efa imŋe panzombe, neefa imŋe pagondobge, napamakwaiana seɀaanogona kupa, nehini yamafuta paefa imŋe neimŋe.

Kana mucinda acigadzira cipiriso cokuŋgopa nokuɀiɗira, kana cipiriso cinopiswa, kana ɀipiriso ɀokuyananisa, ciʋe cipiriso cokuŋgopa Jehova nokuɀiɗira, mumŋe unofanira kumuzarurira suʋo rakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; unofanira kugadzira cipiriso cake cinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀake ɀokuyananisa, seɀaanoita nomusi wesaɓata; ipapo unofanira kuɓuɗa; kana aɓuɗa mumŋe unofanira kupfiga suʋo.
Unofanira kugadzira ʋo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe gwaiana regore rimŋe risinemhoȿa, ciʋe cipiriso cinopisirwa Jehova; unofanira kurigadzira maŋgwanani ose.

Pamŋe cete naro unofanira kugadzira maŋgwanani ose cipiriso coʋupfu, cinoti mugoʋe wecitanhatu weefa, nomugoʋe wecitatu wehini yamafuta kunyoroʋesa nawo ʋupfu bgakatsetseka; ciʋe cipiriso coʋupfu kunaJehova ŋguʋa dzose nomutemo usiŋgaperi.
Saiɀoɀo ʋanofanira kugadzira gwaiana, necipiriso coʋupfu, namafuta, maŋgwanani ose, ciʋe cipiriso cinopiswa ŋguʋa dzose.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Kana mucinda akapa mumŋe waʋanakomana ʋake cipo, yaʋa nhaka yake, cicaʋa caʋanakomana ʋake; caʋa caʋo nokugara nhaka.
Asi kana akapa mumŋe waʋaranda ʋake cipo cinobva panhaka yake, cicaʋa cake kuȿikira pagore rokusunuŋgurwa; ipapo cinofanira kudzokera kumucinda; asi kana iri nhaka yake icaʋa yaʋanakomana ʋake.
Ʋuye mucinda haafaniri kutorera ʋanhu nhaka yaʋo, kuti aʋadziŋge
Ɀino wakapinda neni napamukoʋa, wakaŋga uri parutiʋi rwesuʋo, mumakamuri matȿene aʋaprista, akatarira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro; ɀino tarira, kwakaŋga kunenɀimbo necemberi kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa.
Akati kwandiri: Iyi ndiyo nɀimbo panofanira kuɓika ʋaprista cipiriso cemhoȿa necipiriso ceɀiʋi, ʋuye paʋanofanira kuɓika cipiriso coʋupfu; kuti ʋarege kuɓuɗa naɀo kuruʋazhe rwokunze, kuzonatsa ʋanhu
Ɀino akaenda neni kuruʋazhe rwokunze, akandifambisa napamakona manna oruʋazhe; ɀino tarira, pakona rimŋe nerimŋe roruʋazhe pakaŋga panoruʋazhe.
Pamakona manna oruʋazhe pakaŋga panamaʋazhe akakomberedzwa, akaita
Mukati mawo makaŋga munecidziro kumatiʋi ose, cakaŋga cakakomberedza iwo manna, ʋuye pakaŋga paneɀoto ɀokuɓikira munyasi mecidziro kumatiʋi ose.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Idzi ndidzo dzimba dzokuɓikira, panofanira kuɓikirwa ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋanhu naʋanoshumira paimba.

Ɀino wakandidzosera kumukoʋa weimba, ndikaʋona mvura zhinji iciɓuɗa pasi pecikumbaridzo ceimba kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa, nokuti imba yakaŋga yakatarira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa necemberi kwayo; mvura yakayerera icibva necapasi, kurutiʋi rworudyi rweimba, kurutiʋi rwezasi rweartari.
Ɀino akandiɓuɗisa nenzira yesuʋo rokurutiʋi rwokumsoro, akapota neni nenzira yokunze kuȿikira kusuʋo rokunze, nenzira ye
Ɀino murume uyo wakati aciɓuɗira kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa anorwonzi muruʋoko rwake, akayera makubiti anecuru cimŋe, akandiyambusa nomumvura, mvura ikaȿikira kuɀiziso ɀamakumbo.
Ɀino akayera ɀe
Shure kwaiɀoɀo akayera
Akati kwandiri: Mŋanakomana womunhu, waʋona cinhu
Ndakati ndadzoka, ndikaʋona pamhenderekedzo yorwizi miti mizhinji kwaɀo ʋuno nemhiri.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mvura iyi zhinji inoɓuɗa icienda kunyika iri kumabvazuʋa, icayerera kuȿikira kuAraba, ndokuenda kurutiʋi rweguŋgwa; ɀino icandoɗira muguŋgwa, kuti mvura iporeswe.
Ɀino ɀipenyu ɀose ɀinopfakanyika pose panoȿika nzizi idzi mbiri, ɀicararama; hoʋe zhinji kwaɀo dzicaʋa’po, nokuti mvura iyi yakaȿika’ko,
Ʋateyi ʋehoʋe ʋacamira’po, kubva Engedi kuȿikira Enegraimi ʋacateya’po ʋutaʋa; hoʋe dzicaʋa’po dzakafanana nehoʋe dzeguŋgwa guru namarudzi adzo, dziri zhinji kwaɀo.
Asi panamatope napanamacakwi hapaŋgaporeswi; acaregererwa munyu.

Parwizi, pamhenderekedzo dzarwo, ʋuno nemhiri, pacamera miti yamarudzi ose inodyiwa, isiŋgawomi mashizha ayo, ʋuye isiŋgashaiwi ɀiɓereko ɀayo; icaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀitȿa mŋedzi mumŋe nomumŋe, nokuti mvura yarwo inoɓuɗa panɀimbo tȿene; ɀiɓereko ɀayo ɀicaʋa ɀokudya, namazhizha ayo acaporesa.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Iyi ndiyo miganho, yamunofanira kuganhura nyika nayo iʋe nhaka yamarudzi anegumi namaʋiri aIsraeri: Josefa
Munofanira kuigara nhaka, mumŋe acienzaniswa nomumŋe; nokuti ndakapika kuti ndicaipa madziɓaɓa enyu; nyika iyi icaʋa nhaka yenyu.
Iyi ndiyo miganho yenyika: Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, kubva kuguŋgwa guru, nenzira yeHetroni, kuȿikira paʋanopinda ʋacienda Zedadi;
neHamati, neBerota, neSibraimi, riri pakati pomuganho weDamasko nomuganho weHamati; neHazeri‐hatikoni, riri pamuganho weHaurani.
Muganho unobva kuguŋgwa ndiHazari‐enoni pamuganho weDamasko; kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ɀicienda kumsoro, muganho ndiHamati. Ndirwo rutiʋi rwokumsoro.
Kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa pakati peHaurani neDamasko neGireadi nenyika yaIsraeri,
Rutiʋi rwezasi ɀicienda zasi, muganho ucabva paTamari kuȿikira kumvura yeMeriboti‐kadeshi, kuȿikira kurukoʋa
Kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa
Saiɀoɀo munofanira kuɀiganhurira nyika iyi, ɀicienzana namarudzi aIsraeri.

Munofanira kuiganhura nemijenya, iʋe nhaka yenyu neyaʋatorwa ʋagere pakati penyu, ʋanozoɓereka ʋana pakati penyu; iʋo ʋanofanira kuʋa kwamuri saʋakaɓerekerwa pakati paIsraeri; ʋanofanira kugara nhaka pamŋe cete nemi pakati pamarudzi aIsraeri.
Pakati porudzi pagere mutorwa ndi’po pamunofanira kumupa nhaka yake — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
