Ɀino awa ndiwo mazita amarudzi: Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ɀicienda nenzira yeHetroni kuȿikira paʋanopinda ʋacienda Hamati neHazari‐enani pamuganho weDamasko, ɀicienda kurutiʋi rwokumsoro napaHamati (matiʋi aʋo anofanira kuenda kumabvazuʋa nokumaʋirazuʋa), ndiwo
Pamuganho waDani, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waAsheri, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waNaftari, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waManase, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waEfraimi, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waRubeni, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamavirazuva, ndiwo
Pamuganho waJuda, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, cicaʋa cipo camunofanira kuʋigira
Cipo camunofanira kuʋigira Jehova cinofanira kuita
Cipo ico citȿene cinofanira kupiwa aʋa, iʋo ʋaprista; kurutiʋi rwokumsoro
caʋaprista ʋakaitwa ʋatȿene pakati paʋanakomana ʋaZadoki, ʋakaceŋgeta ɀandakaʋaraira, ʋasino‐kutsauka neŋguʋa yokutsauka kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, seɀakatsauka ʋaRevi.
Cicaʋa cipo kwaʋari
ƲaRevi ʋanofanira kupiwa
Haʋafaniri kutoŋgoiteŋgesa, kana kuitsinhanha
dzineɀuru ɀishanu dzakasara paʋupamhi
Kukura kwayo kunofanira kuʋa kuɗai: Rutiʋi rwokumsoro,
Guta rinofanira kuʋa noruwa ʋo: Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro
Ɀakasara pakureɓa kwayo, iɀo ɀakaenzana necipo citȿene, ɀinofanira kuita
Ʋanoɓata muguta, iʋo ʋanobva kumarudzi ose aIsraeri, ʋanofanira kuirima.
Cipo cose cinofanira kuita
Ɀakasara ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀomucinda, necoʋuno neceseri kwecipo citȿene nenɀimbo yeguta; pamberi
Ʋuye ʋo, kubva panyika yaʋaRevi, nokubva panɀimbo yeguta, iɀo ɀiri pakati penyika yomucinda, pakati pomuganho waJuda nomuganho waBenjamini, ɀinofanira kuʋa ɀomucinda.
Kana ari marudzi mamŋe akasara: Kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waBenjamini, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waSimeoni, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waIsakari, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waZeburuni, kubva kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa kuȿikira kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa, ndiwo
Pamuganho waGadi, kurutiʋi rwezasi, ɀicienda zasi, muganho unofanira kubva paTamari kuȿikira kumvura zhinji yeMeribati‐kadeshi, kurukoʋa
Ndiyo nyika yamunofanira kuganhura nemijenya pakati pamarudzi aIsraeri iʋe nhaka
Iyi ndiyo migumo yeguta: Kurutiʋi rwokumsoro
masuʋo eguta anofanira kutumidzwa mazita amarudzi aIsraeri; masuʋo matatu kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, anoti: Suʋo raRubeni, rimŋe, suʋo raJuda, rimŋe, ʋuye suʋo raRevi, rimŋe.
Kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa,
Kurutiʋi rwezasi,
Kurutiʋi rwamaʋirazuʋa,
Ɀose ɀinofanira kuita
Negore recitatata ʋushe kwaJehoiakimo waJuda, Nebukadnezari mambo weBabironi, wakaȿika Jerusarema, akarikomba.

Ishe akaisa Jehoiakimi mambo waJuda muruʋoko rwake, pamŋe cete nedzimŋe nhumbi dzeimba yaMŋari, iye akaenda nadzo kunyika yeShinari, kuimba yamŋari wake, akaisa nhumbi muimba yokuceŋgeta fuma yamŋari wake.
Mambo akaʋudza Ashpenazi, mutariri waʋaranda ʋake, kuti aʋuye na

majaya akaŋga asinemhoȿa, asi akaŋga akanaka pameso, akacenjera panjere dzose, akaŋgwara pakuziʋa, nokunzwisisa ʋucenjeri bgose, akaŋga akakwana kumira mumba mamambo; ʋuye kuti aʋadzidzise magwaro norurimi rwaʋaKardea.
Mambo akaraira kuti ʋapiwe mumŋe mugoʋe weɀokudya ɀamambo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, nowewaini yaainwa, ʋuye kuti ʋaceŋgetwe makore matatu, kuti kana apera ʋagomira pamberi pamambo.
Ɀino pakati paʋo pakaŋga panaDanieri naHanania naMishaeri naAzaria, ʋari ʋana ʋaJuda.
Mucinda waʋaranda akaʋatumidza mazita, Danieri akamutumidza zita rinonzi Berteshazari, naHanania rinonzi Shadraki, naMishaeri rinonzi Meshaki, naAzaria rinonzi Abedi‐nego.
Asi Danieri wakaɀisuŋga mumŋoyo make kuti haaŋgaɀiȿiɓisi neɀokudya ɀamambo kana newaini yaainwa; saka wakakumbira kunomucinda waʋaranda kuti arege kuɀiȿiɓisa.
Ɀino Mŋari wakanzwisa Danieri ʋunyoro netsitsi pamberi pomucinda waʋaranda.

Mucinda waʋaranda akati kunaDanieri: Ndinotya ishe waŋgu mambo, wakaraira ɀamunofanira kudya nokunwa; nokuti ucaʋonereiko ɀiso ɀenyu ɀakawonda kupfuʋura ɀamajaya ezero renyu? Kana ɀakaɗaro mucaparisa musoro waŋgu mhoȿa kunamambo.
Ipapo Danieri akati kumutariri wakaŋga arairwa nomucinda waʋaranda kuceŋgeta Danieri naHanania naMishaeri naAzaria:
Ƌoidzai henyu ʋaranda ʋenyu mazuʋa anegumi; ŋgaʋatipei miriʋo tidye, nemvura tinwe.
Ipapo muŋgacerekedza ɀiso ɀeɗu neɀiso ɀamajaya anodya ɀokudya ɀamambo, mugoita naʋaranda ʋenyu seɀamunoʋona.
Naiɀoɀo wakatenda shoko raʋo pamsoro pecinhu ici, akaʋaidza mazuʋa anegumi.
Mazuʋa anegumi akati apera ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀikaʋonekwa kuti ɀakanaka, nemiʋiri yaʋo yakakura, ʋacipfuʋura majaya ose aidya ɀokudya ɀamambo.
Naiɀoɀo mutariri wakabvisa ɀokudya ɀaʋo
Ɀino kana ari majaya awa manna, Mŋari wakaʋapa ziʋo nokuŋgwara pamagwaro ose noʋucenjeri bgose; asi Danieri wakaŋga acigona kunzwisisa ɀose ɀairatidzwa
Ɀino mazuʋa akati apera akaŋga atarwa namambo okuti ʋaʋuyiswe nawo, mucinda waʋaranda akapinda naʋo pamberi paNebukadnezari.
Mambo akataurirana naʋo, pakati paʋose kukasawanikwa ʋakaŋga ʋakafanana naDanieri naHanania naMishaeri naAzaria; saka iʋo ʋakamira pamberi pamambo.
Pamashoko ose oʋucenjeri nookunzwisisa, aʋaivunzwa namambo, wakawana kuti iʋo ʋaipfuʋura kagumi ʋacenjeri ʋose neŋaŋga dzose dzaiʋa paʋushe bgake.
Danieri akaramba ari’po kuȿikira pagore rokutaŋga ramambo Koreshi.
Negore recipiri rokuɓata ʋushe kwaNebukadnezari, Nebukadnezari wakarota hope; mŋeya wake ukatambudzika, hope dzake dzikatiza.
Ipapo mambo akaraira kuti ʋacenjeri neŋaŋga naʋaroyi naʋaKardea ʋaɗanwe kuzoɗudzira mambo kurota kwake. Ipapo ʋakapinda ʋakamira pamberi pamambo.
Mambo akati kwaʋari: Ndarota hope, ɀino mŋeya waŋgu unotambudzika ndiciti ndinzwisise kurota
Ipapo ʋaKardea ʋakataura namambo norurimi rwaʋaSiria, ʋakati: Mambo ŋgaararame nokusiŋgaperi! Ʋudzai ʋaranda ʋenyu kurota kwenyu, isu tigokuziʋisai kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Mambo akapindura, akati kunaʋaKardea: Shoko ratemŋa neni; kana mukasandiziʋisa kurota kwaŋgu nokuɗudzirwa kwaɀo, mucagurwa‐gurwa, ʋuye dzimba dzenyu dzicaitwa ɗurunhuru.
Asi kana muka
Iʋo ʋakapindura rwecipiri, ʋaciti: Mambo ŋgaaʋudze ʋaranda ʋake kurota kwake, isu tigo
Mambo akapindura, akati: Ndinoziʋa kwaɀo kuti imi munoŋgotȿaka kuwedzerwa ŋguʋa, nokuti munoʋona kuti shoko iri ratemŋa neni.

Asi kana mukasandiziʋisa kurota kwaŋgu, mucarobga nomurairo mumŋe cete, nokuti makaɀigadzira kutaura mashoko enhema akashata pamberi paŋgu, kuȿikira ŋguʋa yashanduka; naiɀoɀo cindiʋudzai kurota kwaŋgu, ipapo ndicaziʋa kuti muŋgandiziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.

ƲaKardea ʋakapindura pamberi pamambo, ʋakati: Hakunomunhu pasi pose uŋgagona kuziʋisa shoko iri ramambo, nokuti hakunamambo kana ishe, kana muɓati, wakatoŋgotȿaka cinhu cakaɗai kunowakacenjera kana ŋaŋga, kana muKardea upi noupi.
Cinhu cinobvunzwa namambo cikuru kwaɀo, hakuna‐uŋgaciziʋisa kunamambo, asi ʋamŋari ʋasiŋgagari naʋanhu.
Nemhaka iyi mambo akatsamŋa, akaʋa nehasha kwaɀo, akaraira kuti ʋacenjeri ʋose ʋeBabironi ʋaʋurawe.
Naiɀoɀo cireʋo cakatemŋa kuti ʋacenjeri ʋaʋurawe, ʋakatȿaka ʋo Danieri neshamŋari dzake kuti ʋaʋurawe.
Ipapo Danieri akapindura Arioki nenjere nokuŋgwara, iye mukuru waʋarindi ʋamambo, wakaŋga aɓuɗa kundoʋuraya ʋacenjeri ʋeBabironi;
wakapindura, akati kunaArioki mukuru wamambo: Cireʋo ici camambo cinehasha neiko? Ipapo Arioki akaziʋisa Danieri shoko iro.
Ɀino Danieri akapinda kunamambo, akakumbira kwaari, kuti amutarire ŋguʋa, aziʋise mambo kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Ipapo Danieri akaenda kumba kwake, akandoziʋisa shamŋari dzake Hanania naMishaeri naAzaria, shoko iro;
kuti ʋakumbire nyasha kunaMŋari wokuɗeŋga pamsoro pecinhu ici cakaʋanzika, kuti Danieri neshamŋari dzake ʋarege kuparadzwa pamŋe cete naʋamŋe ʋacenjeri ʋeBabironi.
Ipapo cinhu ico cakaʋanzika cakaziʋiswa Danieri panecaakaratidzwa ʋusiku. Danieri akaʋoŋga Mŋari wokuɗeŋga.
Danieri akapindura, akati: Zita raMŋari ŋgariʋoŋgwe nokusiŋgaperi‐peri, nokuti ʋucenjeri nesimba ndeɀake.
Ndiye unoshandura ŋguʋa nenhambo; ndiye unobvisa madzimambo, nokugadza madzimambo; ndiye unopa ʋakacenjera ʋucenjeri, naʋanenjere ziʋo;
ndiye unoziʋisa ɀinhu ɀakadzika neɀakaʋanzika; ndiye unoziʋa ɀiri murima; ciedza cinogara kwaari.
Ndinokuʋoŋgai nokukurumbidzai, imi Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa aŋgu, makandipa ʋucenjeri nesimba, mukandiziʋisa ɀino ɀatakakumbira kwamuri; nokuti makatiziʋisa shoko ramambo.

Naiɀoɀo Danieri akapinda kunaArioki, wakaŋga arairwa namambo kuparadza ʋacenjeri ʋeBabironi; akandoti kwaari: Rega hako kuparadza ʋacenjeri ʋeBabironi; ndiise pamberi pamambo, ndicaziʋisa mambo kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Ipapo Arioki akaisa Danieri pamberi pamambo nokukasira, akati kwaari: Ndawana munhu pakati paʋana ʋokutapxa ʋaJuda, ucaziʋisa mambo kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Mambo akapindura, akati kunaDanieri, wainzi Berteshazari: Iwe unogona kundiziʋisa kurota kwandakaʋona, nokuɗudzirwa kwaɀo here?
Danieri akapindura pamberi pamambo, akati: Cinhu cakaʋanzika, cakarebga namambo, hakunaʋanenjere, kana ŋaŋga, kana ʋacenjeri, kana ʋafemberi ʋaŋgaziʋisa mambo iɀoɀo;
asi kuɗeŋga kunaMŋari unoziʋisa ɀakaʋanzika; ndiye wakaziʋisa mambo Nebukadnezari ɀicazoʋa’po pamazuʋa okupedzisira. Kurota kwenyu, neɀamakaratidzwa mumusoro wenyu panhoʋo dzenyu, heɀi:
Kana muri’mi, mambo, pfuŋgwa dzenyu dzakaʋuya kwamuri muri panhoʋo dzenyu,

Asi kana ndiri’ni, cinhu ici cakaʋanzika hacina‐kundiziʋiswa nokuɗa kwenjere dzandinadzo dzinopfuʋura dzaʋamŋe ʋapenyu ʋose, asi kuti mambo aziʋiswe kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo, ʋuye kuti muziʋiswe pfuŋgwa dziri mumŋoyo wenyu.
Imi mambo makatarira, mukaʋona cifananidzo cikuru. Cifananidzo ici, caiʋa cikuru kwaɀo, caiʋa nokubginya kwakaiȿo‐naka, cakaŋga cimire pamberi penyu; cakaŋga cicityisa pakuʋonekwa kwaco.
Kana ciri cifananidzo ici, musoro waco wakaŋga uri wendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, cifuʋa caco namaʋoko aco ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀesirveri, ɗumbu raco neciʋuno caco ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀendarira,
makumbo aco akaŋga ari eɗare, ʋuye tsoka dzaco dzaiti pamŋe ɗare pamŋe ivu.
Makaramba mucitarira kuȿikira

Ipapo ɗare nevu nendarira nesirveri nendarama ɀakaputsanyiwa pamŋe cete, ɀikafanana nehundi iri pamapuriro neŋguʋa yezhezha; ɀikatorwa nemhepo, ɀikasawanirwa nɀimbo; asi ibge, rakaŋga raroʋa cifananidzo, rakazoita gomo guru, rikazadza pasi pose.
Ndiɀo ɀamakarota; ɀino ticaɀiɗudzira pamberi pamambo.
Imi mambo muri mambo wamadzimambo, makapiwa naMŋari wokuɗeŋga ʋushe noʋumambo nesimba nokubginya;
pose panogara ʋana ʋaʋanhu, wakaisa paruʋoko rwenyu mhuka dzeɓundo neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, akakuitai muɓati waɀo ɀose; imi ndimi musoro wendarama.
Shure kwenyu ʋumŋe ʋushe ʋucamuka, ʋuɗuku kwamuri; teʋere ʋushe bgecitatu bgendarira, ʋucaɓata panyika yose.
Ʋushe bgecinna ʋucaʋa nesimba seɗare, seɀinoita ɗare rinoputsanya nokuparadza ɀose; seɀinoita ɗare rinopxanya iɀi ɀose, saiɀoɀo ʋucaputsanya nokupxanya.
Ɀamakaʋona tsoka neɀigunwe, ɀakaitwa pamŋe nevu romuʋumbi wehari, pamŋe neɗare, ʋucaʋa ʋushe bgakaganhurwa; asi simba reɗare ricaʋa’mo, ɀamakaʋona ɗare rakaveŋganiswa nevu rokuʋumba naro.
Ɀigunwe ɀamakumbo ɀaɀakaŋga ɀakaitwa pamŋe neɗare pamŋe nevu, saiɀoɀo ʋushe ʋucaʋa pamŋe nesimba, pamŋe haʋuŋgatani kuputsika.
Ʋuye ɀamakaʋona ɗare rakaveŋganiswa nevu rokuʋumba naro, saiɀoɀo ʋacaveŋgana namarudzi aʋanhu, asi haʋaŋganamatirani, seɀinoita ɗare risiŋganamatirani nevu.

Ɀino namazuʋa amadzimambo iwayo Mŋari wokuɗeŋga ucamutsa ʋushe, ʋusiŋgatoŋgozoparadzwi, ʋuye simba rabgo hariŋgapfuʋuri kunorumŋe rudzi rwaʋanhu; asi ibgo ʋucaputsanya nokuparadza ʋushe ubgo bgose, ibgo ʋucamira nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀamakaʋona ibge riciʋezwa mugomo, ɀisiŋgaitwi namaʋoko
Ipapo mambo Nebukadnezari akawira pasi neciso cake, akanamata Danieri, akaraira kuti ʋamuʋigire cipo neɀinonhuwira ɀinozipa.
Mambo akapindura Danieri, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, Mŋari wako ndiye Mŋari waʋamŋari, naShe wamadzimambo, nomuziʋisi weɀakaʋanzika, iwe ɀawakagona kuziʋisa cinhu ici cakaʋanzika.
Ipapo mambo akaita Danieri mukuru, akamupa ɀipo ɀikuru ɀizhinji, akamuita muɓati wenyika yose yeBabironi, nokumuita ʋo mutariri mukuru waʋakacenjera ʋose ʋeBabironi.
Danieri akakumbira kunamambo, akagadza Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego ʋakaʋa ʋarairi ʋeɀinhu
Ɀino mambo Nebukadnezari wakaita cifananidzo cendarama; cakaŋga cakaita makubiti makumi matanhatu pakureɓa, namakubiti matanhatu paʋupamhi; akacimisa paɓani reDura munyika yaBabironi.
Ipapo mambo Nebukadnezari akatuma

Ipapo macinda naʋarairi namadzishe naʋatoŋgi naʋaceŋgeti ʋefuma namakurukota naʋaziʋi ʋemirairo naʋaɓati ʋose ʋamatiʋi enyika ʋakaʋuŋganira kumutambo wokugadzwa kwecifananidzo cakaŋga camiswa naNebukadnezari; ʋakamira pamberi pecifananidzo cakaŋga camiswa naNebukadnezari.
Ɀino muɗanidziri wakaɗanidzira

kuti neŋguʋa yamunonzwa kurira kwomumanzi nomutopota nembira noruɗimbga nomuteŋgeranwa namarimba, neɀimŋe ɀose ɀinoridzwa, muwire pasi mucinamata cifananidzo cendarama cakamiswa namambo Nebukadnezari;
aninani usiŋgawiri pasi acinamata, neŋguʋa iyo ucawisirwa mukati mecoto comŋoto unopfuta kwaɀo.

Naiɀoɀo neŋguʋa iyo ʋanhu ʋose ʋacinzwa kurira kwomumanzi nomutopota nembira noruɗimbga nomuteŋgeranwa neɀimŋe ɀose ɀinoridzwa, ʋanhu ʋose namarudzi ose namarimi ose ʋakawira pasi ʋakanamata cifananidzo cendarama cakaŋga camiswa namambo Nebukadnezari.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo ʋamŋe ʋaKardea ʋakasweɗera ʋakapomera ʋaJuda.
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kunamambo Nebukadnezari: Imi mambo, raramai nokusiŋgaperi.

Imi mambo makatema cireʋo, kuti munhu mumŋe nomumŋe kana aciŋge acinzwa kurira kwomumanzi nomutopota nembira noruɗimbga nomuteŋgeranwa namarimba, neɀimŋe ɀose ɀinoridzwa, awire pasi acinamata cifananidzo cendarama;
asi aninani usiŋgawiri pasi acinamata, ucawisirwa mukati mecoto comŋoto unopfuta kwaɀo.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋari’po, ʋamakagadza ʋaʋe ʋarairi ʋeɀinhu
Ipapo Nebukadnezari akaraira nehasha nokutsamŋa kwake kuti Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego ʋaʋuyiswe. Ɀino ʋakaʋuyisa ʋarume aʋa pamberi pamambo.
Nebukadnezari akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Maʋune here, imi Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego, ɀamunoramba kushumira mŋari waŋgu, nokunamata cifananidzo cendarama candakamisa ini?
Ɀino kana mucitenda kuwira pasi mucinamata cifananidzo candakaita neŋguʋa yamunonzwa kurira kwomumanzi nomutopota nembira noruɗimbga nomuteŋgeranwa namarimba, neɀimŋe ɀose ɀinoridzwa,
Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego ʋakapindura, ʋakati kunamambo: Imi Nebukadnezari, hatiŋgafaniri heɗu kukupindurai pamsoro peshoko iri.
Kana ɀikaitika haɀo, Mŋari weɗu watinoshumira uŋgagona kutirwira pacoto comŋoto unopfuta kwaɀo; iye ucatirwira paruʋoko rwenyu, imi mambo.
Asi kana ɀikasaitika, ziʋai imi mambo, kuti hatiŋgashumiri ʋamŋari ʋenyu kana kunamata cifananidzo cendarama camakamisa imi.
Ipapo Nebukadnezari wakatsamŋa kwaɀo, ciso cake cikashandukira Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego; akataura akaraira kuti coto comŋoto ciʋeserwe mŋoto unopisa kwaɀo kukunda unosiʋeserwa’mo kanomŋe.
Akaraira ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋanesimba guru ʋaiʋa pahondo yake, kuti ʋasuŋge Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego, ʋaʋawisire mucoto comŋoto unopfuta kwaɀo.
Ipapo ʋarume aʋo ʋakasuŋgwa ʋanamajasi aʋo namaburuku aʋo neŋgowani dzaʋo nedzimŋe ŋguʋo dzaʋo, ʋakawisirwa mukati mecoto comŋoto unopfuta kwaɀo.
Ɀino murairo wamambo ɀawakaŋga unehasha, ʋuye coto ɀacakaŋga cicipisisa kwaɀo, muraɀo womŋoto wakaʋuraya ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋaciisa’ko Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego.
Ʋarume aʋa ʋatatu, ʋana‐Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego, ʋakawira pasi ʋakasuŋgwa mukati mecoto comŋoto waipfuta kwaɀo.

Ipapo mambo Nebukadnezari wakavunduswa, ndokukasira kusimuka, akataura, akati kumakurukota ake: Hatina‐kuwisira ʋarume ʋatatu ʋakasuŋgwa mukati momŋoto here? Iʋo ʋakapindura, ʋakati kunamambo: Ndiɀoɀo, imi mambo.
Iye akapindura, akati: Tarirai, ndinoʋona ʋarume ʋanna, ʋakasunuŋguka, ʋacifamba mumŋoto, ʋasina‐paʋakakuʋadzwa; wecinna pakuʋonekwa kwake wakaita somŋanakomana waʋamŋari.

Ipapo Nebukadnezari akasweɗera kumuromo wecoto comŋoto wakaŋga ucipfuta kwaɀo, akataura, akati: Nhai imi Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego, imi ʋaranda ʋaMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro, ɓuɗai muʋuye pano. Ipapo Shadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego ʋakaɓuɗa mukati momŋoto.

Ɀino macinda naʋarairi namadzishe namakurukota amambo ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋakaʋona ʋarume aʋa, kuti mŋoto wakaŋga washaiwa simba pamiʋiri yaʋo, kunyaŋge nevudzi remisoro yaʋo rakaŋga risina‐kufuwurwa, namajasi aʋo akaŋga asina‐kushanduka; kunyaŋge nomunhuwi womŋoto wakaŋga usina‐kuȿika kwaʋari.

Nebukadnezari akataura akati: Mŋari waShadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, iye wakatuma mutumŋa wake, akarwira ʋaranda ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaciʋimba naye, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaramba shoko ramambo, ʋakaisa miʋiri yaʋo, kuti ʋarege kushumira kana kunamata mŋari upi noupi, asi iye Mŋari waʋo.

Naiɀoɀo ndinotema cireʋo, kuti ʋanhu ʋose namarudzi ose namarimi ose, ʋanotaura ɀisino‐kufanira pamsoro paMŋari waShadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego, ʋatemŋe‐temŋe, nedzimba dzaʋo dziitwe maturunhuru; nokuti hakuno‐mumŋe mŋari unogona kurwira saiɀoɀo.
Ipapo mambo akawedzera ʋukuru bgaShadraki naMeshaki naAbedi‐nego panyika yeBabironi.
Mambo Nebukadnezari kuʋanhu ʋose, namarudzi ose, namarimi ose, ʋagere pasi pose: Muwanzirwe rugare!
Ndakati ɀakanaka kuti ndi
Ɀiratidzo ɀake ɀakakura sei! Ɀishamiso ɀake ɀinesimba guru sei! Ʋushe bgake ʋushe ʋusiŋgaperi, kuɓata kwake ʋushe kunoȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Ini Nebukadnezari ndakaŋga ndigere norugare mumba maŋgu, ndinomufaro muimba yaŋgu yoʋushe.
Ndikaʋona kurota kwakandityisa, pfuŋgwa dzaŋgu panhoʋo dzaŋgu, neɀandakaratidzwa mumusoro maŋgu ɀikanditambudza.
Naiɀoɀo ndakatema cireʋo kuti ʋacenjeri ʋose ʋeBabironi ʋaʋuyiswe pamberi paŋgu, kuti ʋandiziʋise kuɗudzirwa kwokurota.
Ipapo ʋakacenjera neŋaŋga naʋaKardea naʋafemberi ʋakaʋuya, ndikaʋaʋudza kurota kwaŋgu, asi haʋana‐kundiziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Asi pakupedzisira Danieri wakaʋuya pamberi paŋgu, iye unezita rinonzi Berteshazari, wakatumidzwa nezita ramŋari waŋgu, unomŋeya waʋamŋari ʋatȿene mukati make; ini ndikamuʋudza kurota kwaŋgu,

Iwe Berteshazari, mukuru waʋakacenjera, ɀandinoziʋa kuti mŋeya waʋamŋari ʋatȿene uri mukati mako, ʋuye kuti hakune‐cakaʋanzika cinokutambudza, cindiʋudza ɀandakaʋona pakurota kwaŋgu nokuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Ɀandakaʋona mumusoro maŋgu, ndiri panhoʋo dzaŋgu, ndiɀeɀi: Ndakatarira, ndikaʋona muti pakati penyika, kureɓa kwawo kwakaŋga kuri kukuru.
Muti ukakura, ukasimba, kureɓa kwawo kukaȿika kuɗeŋga, ʋuye wakaŋga uciʋonekwa kuȿikira kumigumo yenyika yose.

Mashizha awo akaŋga akanaka, neɀiɓereko ɀawo ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀizhinji, ɀose ɀaiwana’po ɀokudya; mhuka dzesaŋgo dzakawana mumvuri pasi pawo, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga dzaigara mumataʋi awo, ʋuye ɀipenyu ɀose ɀaidya’po.
Ndikaʋona paneɀandakaʋona mumusoro maŋgu ndiri panhoʋo dzaŋgu, ndikaʋona murindi, iye ari mutȿene, aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga.
Akaɗanidzira, akati: Temai muti, raŋgurai mataʋi awo, pururai mashizha awo, paradzirai ɀiɓereko ɀawo; mhuka ŋgadzibve pasi pawo, neshiri pamataʋi awo.
Asi siyai hunde yemidzi yawo muvu,
mŋoyo wake ŋgaushandurwe, urege kuʋa womunhu, apiwe mŋoyo wemhuka, ŋguʋa nomŋe dzipere ari’po.
Kutoŋga uku kwaʋuya necireʋo caʋarindi, cinhu ici
Ndiko kurota kwandakaʋona, ini mambo Nebukadnezari; ɀino iwe Berteshazari, ci

Ɀino Danieri, wakaŋga anezita rinonzi Berteshazari, wakashaiwa shoko ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, pfuŋgwa dzake dzikamuvundusa. Mambo akapindura, akati: Berteshazari, kurota uku nokuɗudzirwa kwaɀo ŋgaɀirege kukuvundusa. Berteshazari akapindura, akati: Ishe waŋgu, kurota uku ŋgakuitirwe ʋanokuʋeŋgai, nokuɗudzirwa kwaɀo ʋadziʋisi ʋenyu.
Muti wamakaʋona, iwo wakakura ukasimba, wakaȿika kuɗeŋga pakureɓa kwawo, wakaŋga uciʋonekwa kuȿikira kumigumo yenyika yose;
wakaŋga unamashizha akanaka, neɀiɓereko ɀawo ɀiri ɀizhinji, paiwana ɀose ɀokudya, waigara mhuka dzesaŋgo pasi pawo, ʋuye paigara shiri dzokuɗeŋga mumataʋi awo,
ndiyemi mambo; imi makakura, mukaʋa nesimba, nokuti ʋukuru bgenyu bgakakura, ʋunoȿikira kuɗeŋga, ʋuye ʋushe bgenyu ʋunoȿikira kumugumo wenyika.
Ɀino mambo ɀaakaʋona murindi, ari mutȿene, aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga aciti: Temai muti, muuparadze, asi musiye hunde yemidzi yawo muvu,
uku ndiko kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo, imi mambo, ndico cireʋo coWokumsoro‐soro, cicaʋuya pamsoro pashe waŋgu mambo:

Mucadziŋgwa pakati paʋanhu, ʋugaro bgenyu ʋucaʋa pakati pemhuka dzesaŋgo, mucadyiswa ʋuswa senzombe, mucanyoroʋeswa neɗoʋa rokuɗeŋga, ʋuye ŋguʋa nomŋe dzicapera muri’po, kuȿikira maziʋa kuti Wokumsoro‐soro unoɓata ʋushe pakati paʋanhu, unoʋupa waanoɗa.
Ʋuye ɀaʋakaraira kuti hunde yemidzi yomuti isiyiwe, ʋushe bgenyu ʋucakumutsirwai ɀe, kana matenda kuti
Naiɀoɀo imi mambo, tendai ɀandinokurairai, muparadzane neɀiʋi ɀenyu muciita ɀakarurama, ʋuye neɀakaipa ɀenyu, muciitira ʋarombo nyasha; ɀimŋe ŋguʋa yenyu yorugare iŋgawedzerwa.
Iɀeɀi ɀose ɀakawira mambo Nebukadnezari.
Mŋedzi inegumi nemiʋiri yakati yapera, wakaŋga acifamba paimba yoʋushe paBabironi.
Mambo akataura, akati: Ko iri harizi Babironi, guta guru, randakaʋaka ini nesimba raŋgu guru, ndikurise ʋumambo bgaŋgu, ʋuʋe ʋugaro bgamadzimambo, here?
Shoko iri rakaŋga riciri mumuromo wamambo, inzwi rikabva kuɗeŋga,

Ucadziŋgwa pakati paʋanhu, ʋugaro bgako ʋucaʋa pakati pemhuka dzesaŋgo; ucadyiswa ʋuswa senzombe; ŋguʋa nomŋe dzicapera uri’po, kuȿikira watenda kuti Wokumsoro‐soro unoɓata ʋushe pakati paʋanhu, unoʋupa waanoɗa.
Neŋguʋa iyo cinhu ici cakaitika pamsoro paNebukadnezari; wakadziŋgwa pakati paʋanhu, akadya ʋuswa senzombe, muʋiri wake ukanyoroʋeswa neɗoʋa rokuɗeŋga, kuȿikira vudzi rake rareɓa se
Ɀino mazuʋa
ʋose ʋagere panyika ʋakaita saʋasinamaturo; iye unoita seɀaanoɗa pahondo yokuɗeŋga, napakati paʋagere panyika; hakunauŋgadzora ruʋoko rwake, kana uŋgati kwaari: Unoiteiko?

Neŋguʋa iyeyo simba raŋgu rokufuŋga rakadzokera kwandiri; ʋuye kana iri mbiri yoʋushe bgaŋgu, ʋumambo bgaŋgu nokubginya kwaŋgu ɀakadzokera kwandiri; makurukota aŋgu namadzishe aŋgu akandishanyira ɀe, ndikagadzwa ɀe paʋushe bgaŋgu, ʋukuru bgakaiȿo‐naka ʋukandiwedzerwa.
Ɀino ini Nebukadnezari ndinorumbidza nokuwombera nokukudza Mambo wokuɗeŋga; nokuti maɓasa ake ose ndeeɀokwaɗi, nzira dzake dzakarurama; iye unogona kuɗeredza ʋanofamba ʋaciɀikudza.
Ɀino mambo Bershazari wakaitira madzishe ake anecuru cezana mutambo mukuru, akanwa waini pamberi paiʋo ʋanecuru cezana.

Ɀino Bershazari, wakati aɓatwa newaini, akaraira kuti ʋaʋuye nemidziyo yendarama nesirveri, yakaŋga yabviswa naɓaɓa ʋake Nebukadnezari patembere yaiʋa paJerusarema, kuti iye mambo namadzishe ake naʋakadzi ʋake naʋaroŋgo ʋake ʋanwe nayo.
Ipapo ʋakaʋuya nemidziyo yendarama yakaŋga yabviswa patembere yeimba yaMŋari yaiʋa paJerusarema; iye mambo namadzishe ake naʋakadzi ʋake naʋaroŋgo ʋake ʋakanwa nayo.
Ʋakanwa waini, ʋakarumbidza ʋamŋari ʋendarama nesirveri nendarira neɗare namatanda namabge.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyeyo minwe yoruʋoko rwomunhu yakaʋuya ikanyora pakatarisana necigadziko comŋenje pasuko ramadziro eimba yamambo, mambo akaʋona canza coruʋoko rwakaŋga rucinyora.
Ipapo ciso camambo cakashanduka maari, pfuŋgwa dzake dzikatambudzwa, ɀifundo ɀeciʋuno cake ɀikasunuŋguka, mabvi ake akaroʋana.
Mambo akaɗanidzira aciti ʋaʋuye neŋaŋga naʋaKardea naʋafemberi. Mambo akataura akati kunaʋakacenjera ʋeBabironi: Aninani uŋgaraʋa iɀi ɀakanyorwa, akandiziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo, ucafukidzwa
Ipapo ʋakacenjera ʋose ʋamambo ʋakapinda, asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kuraʋa ɀakanyorwa, kana kuziʋisa mambo kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Ɀino mambo Bershazari akatambudzika kwaɀo, ciso cake cikashanduka maari, namadzishe ake akakaŋganiswa.

Ipapo ʋahosi ʋakapinda muimba yomutambo, nokuɗa kwamashoko amambo naamadzishe ake; ʋahosi ʋakataura, ʋakati: Imi mambo, raramai nokusiŋgaperi; pfuŋgwa dzenyu ŋgadzirege kukutambudzai, ciso cenyu ŋgacirege kushanduka.

Muʋushe bgenyu munomurume, unomŋeya waʋamŋari ʋatȿene mukati make; pamazuʋa aɓaɓa ʋenyu ciedza neziʋo nenjere, ɀakafanana nenjere dzaʋamŋari, ɀakawanikwa maari; mambo Nebukadnezari, ɓaɓa ʋenyu, iʋo mambo, ɓaɓa ʋenyu, ʋakamuita mukuru waʋacenjeri neŋaŋga naʋaKardea naʋafemberi;

nokuti kunaDanieri, wakatumidzwa Berteshazari namambo, kwakawanikwa mŋeya wakanaka kwaɀo, neziʋo, nokunzwisisa, nokuɗudzira kurota, nokuɓuɗisa mashoko akaʋanzika, nokusunuŋgura fundo. Ɀino Danieri ŋgaaɗanwe, iye uca
Ipapo Danieri akaʋuyiswa pamberi pamambo. Mambo akataura, akati kunaDanieri: Ndiwe uya Danieri, waʋana ʋaJuda ʋakatapxa, wakandotapxa kuʋaJuda naɓaɓa ʋaŋgu here?
Ndakanzwa ɀako, kuti mŋeya waʋamŋari uri mukati mako, ʋuye kuti ciedza neziʋo nenjere kwadzo ɀinowanikwa mauri.
Ɀino ʋakacenjera, idzo ŋaŋga, ʋakaʋuyiswa pamberi paŋgu, kuti ʋaraʋe ɀakanyorwa iɀi, ʋandiziʋise kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo; asi ʋakakoniwa kundiziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwecinhu ici.
Asi ndakanzwa ɀako, kuti unogona kuɗudzira, nokusunuŋgura fundo; ɀino kana ukagona kuraʋa ɀakanyorwa, nokundiziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo, ucafukidzwa
Ipapo Danieri akapindura, akati pamberi pamambo: Garai henyu neɀipo ɀenyu, ipai henyu mumŋe miɓairo yenyu; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicaraʋira mambo ɀakanyorwa, nokumuziʋisa kuɗudzirwa kwaɀo.
Imi mambo, Mŋari Wokumsoro‐soro wakapa ɓaɓa ʋenyu Nebukadnezari ʋushe noʋukuru, nembiri noʋumambo;
ɀino nokuɗa kwoʋukuru, bgaakamupa, ʋanhu ʋose namarudzi ose namarimi ose ʋakaɗeɗera nokutya pamberi pake; waiʋuraya waaiɗa
Asi mŋoyo wake wakati uciɀikudza, nomŋeya wake uciɀiwomesa, kuȿikira aciita manyawi, wakabviswa pacigaro cake coʋushe, ʋakamutorera kubginya kwake;

akadziŋgwa pakati paʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu, mŋoyo wake ukaitwa sowemhuka, akandogara nembizi, akadyiswa ʋuswa senzombe, muʋiri wake ukanyoroʋeswa neɗoʋa rokuɗeŋga, kuȿikira aziʋa kuti Mŋari Wokumsoro‐soro unoɓata ʋushe pakati paʋanhu, aciʋupa waanoɗa.
Asi imi Bershazari mŋanakomana wake, hamuna‐kuɀininipisa nomŋoyo wenyu, kunyaŋge makaŋga muciɀiziʋa ɀose,

asi makaɀikudza pamberi paShe wokuɗeŋga; midziyo yeimba yake yakaʋuyiswa pamberi penyu, imi namadzishe enyu naʋakadzi ʋenyu naʋaroŋgo ʋenyu mukanwa waini nayo; makarumbidza ʋamŋari ʋesirveri nendarama neɗare namatanda namabge, ɀisiŋgaʋoni kana kunzwa kana kuziʋa; asi iye Mŋari, wakaɓata mŋeya wenyu muruʋoko rwake, unoziʋa nzira dzenyu dzose, hamuna‐kumukudza iye.
Naiɀoɀo canza coruʋoko cakatumŋa cicibva kwaari, ɀakanyorwa iɀi ɀikanyorwa.
Ɀino ɀakanyorwa ndiɀeɀi: MENE, MENE, TEKERE, UFARSINI.
Kuɗudzirwa kwecinhu ici, ndikoku: MENE, Mŋari wakaʋereŋga
TEKERI, iwe wayerwa paciyero, ukawanikwa wakareruka.
PERESI, ʋushe bgako bgakamurwa, bgapiwa ʋaMedia naʋaPersia.
Ipapo Bershazari akaraira, ʋakafukidza Danieri
Noʋusiku ubgo mambo Bershazari muKardea wakaʋurawa.
Dariusi muMedia akapiwa ʋushe, anamakore aneŋge makumi matanhatu namaʋiri.
Ɀino Dariusi wakaʋona kuti ɀakanaka kugadza macinda anezana namakumi maʋiri paʋushe
pamsoro paʋo
Ɀino Danieri uyu wakapfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋakuru namacinda, nokuti maari makaŋga munomŋeya wakanaka kwaɀo; mambo akaɗa kumuita mukuru woʋushe bgake bgose.
Ipapo ʋakuru namacinda ʋakatȿaka mhoȿa yaʋaŋgapomera Danieri pamsoro poʋushe, asi ʋakashaiwa shoko kana mhoȿa, nokuti wakaŋga akatendeka, ʋuye kwakaŋga kusinakutadza kana mhoȿa kwaari.
Ɀino ʋarume aʋa ʋakati: Hatiŋgatoŋgowani shoko pamsoro paDanieri uyu, kana tisiŋgamutȿakiri iro pamsoro pomurairo waMŋari wake.
Ipapo ʋakuru aʋa namacinda ʋakaʋuŋganira kunamambo ʋari ʋazhinji, ʋakati kwaari: Mambo Dariusi, raramai nokusiŋgaperi.

Ʋakuru ʋose ʋoʋushe, naʋarairi namacinda namakurukota namadzishe ʋakaraŋgana kuti mambo aite murairo nokutema cireʋo cakasimba, kuti aninani unokumbira cinhu kunamŋari upi noupi kana munhu upi noupi namazuʋa anamakumi matatu, asi kwamuri, imi mambo, awisirwe mugomba reshumba.
Ɀino citemai cireʋo, imi mambo, muise zita renyu parunyoro, kuti cirege kuzoshandurwa, nomurairo waʋaMedia naʋaPersia usiŋgashandurwi.
Naiɀoɀo mambo Dariusi akaisa zita rake parunyoro necireʋo.
Ɀino Danieri wakati anzwa kuti runyoro rwaiswa zita
Ipapo ʋarume aʋo ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋari ʋazhinji, ʋakawana Danieri acikumbira nokunyeŋgetera pamberi paMŋari wake.
Ipapo ʋakasweɗera, ʋakataura pamberi pamambo pamsoro pecireʋo camambo,
Ɀino ʋakapindura, ʋakati pamberi pamambo: Uya Danieri waʋana ʋaJuda ʋakatapxa, haane‐hanya nemi, imi mambo, kana necireʋo camakaisa zita renyu, asi unokumbira katatu nezuʋa.
Ɀino mambo wakati acinzwa mashoko iwayo, akatsamŋa kwaɀo, akafuŋga mano pamŋoyo pake okurwira Danieri; akatambudzika kuȿikira zuʋa riciʋira aciidza kumurwira.

Ipapo ʋarume aʋa ʋakaʋuŋganira kunamambo ʋari ʋazhinji, ʋakati kunamambo: Ziʋai imi mambo, kuti ndiwo murairo waʋaMedia naʋaPersia, kuti cireʋo cipi necipi kana murau upi noupi wakatemŋa namambo, haɀiŋgashandurwi.
Ipapo mambo wakaraira, ʋakaʋuya naDanieri ʋakamuwisira mugomba reshumba. Mambo akataura, akati kunaDanieri: Mŋari wako waunosishumira ŋguʋa dzose, ucakurwira.
Ibge rikaʋuyiswa, rikaiswa pamuromo wegomba, mambo akarisimbisa necindori cake ʋuye necindori camadzishe ake; kuti kurege kuʋa necinhu cimŋe pamsoro paDanieri ciŋgashandurwa.
Ipapo mambo akaenda kuimba yake yoʋushe, akaʋata aciɀinyima ɀokudya; kunyaŋge neɀinoridzwa ɀipi neɀipi haɀina‐kuʋuyiswa pamberi pake; hope dzake dzikatiza.
Ɀino mambo akafumirisa kwaɀo maŋgwanani, akakasira kuenda kugomba reshumba.

Wakati acisweɗera kugomba kunaDanieri, akaɗana nenzwi rokucema; mambo akataura, akati kunaDanieri: Nhai Danieri, iwe muranda waMŋari mupenyu, Mŋari wako waunosishumira ŋguʋa dzose, unesimba rokukurwira pashumba here?
Ipapo Danieri akati kunamambo: Imi mambo, raramai nokusiŋgaperi.
Mŋari waŋgu wakatuma mutumŋa wake, akadziʋira miromo yeshumba, dzikasandikuʋadza; nokuti pamberi pake ndakawanikwa kuti handinemhoȿa, napamberi penyu ʋo, imi mambo, hakune‐cakaipa candakaita.
Ipapo mambo akafara ɀikuru kwaɀo, akaraira kuti ʋaɓuɗise Danieri mugomba. Naiɀoɀo Danieri wakaɓuɗiswa mugomba, ʋakashaiwa cose paakakuʋadzwa, nokuti wakaŋga aʋimba naMŋari wake.

Ipapo mambo akaraira, ʋakaʋuya naʋaya ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋapomera Danieri, ʋakaʋawisira mugomba reshumba, iʋo, naʋana ʋaʋo, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo; shumba dzikaʋakunda, dzikavuna‐vuna mafupa aʋo, ʋacigere kuȿika pasi mugomba.
Ipapo Dariusi akanyorera ʋanhu ʋose, namarudzi ose, namarimi ose, ʋagere panyika yose,

Ndinotema cireʋo, kuti panyika yose yoʋushe bgaŋgu ʋanhu ʋose ʋaɗeɗere ʋatye pamberi paMŋari waDanieri; nokuti ndiye Mŋari mupenyu, uri’po nokusiŋgaperi, ʋushe bgake haʋuŋgaparadzwi; kuɓata kwake ʋushe kucaʋa’po kuȿikira pakuguma.
Ndiye unorwira nokusunuŋgura, ndiye unoita ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso kuɗeŋga napanyika, ndiye wakarwira Danieri pasimba reshumba.
Saiɀoɀo Danieri uyu wakagara ɀakanaka pakuɓata ʋushe kwaDariusi napakuɓata ʋushe kwaKoreshi muPersia.
Negore rokutaŋga raBershazari mambo weBabironi Danieri akarota, akaratidzwa ɀimŋe mumusoro make ari panhoʋo dzake; akanyora ɀaakarota, akaʋudza ʋanhu mashoko makuru aɀo.
Danieri akataura, akati: Ndakaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa ʋusiku, tarirai, mhepo inna dzokuɗeŋga dzakamutsa guŋgwa guru.
Mhuka huru inna dzikakwira dziciɓuɗa muguŋgwa, dzisina‐kufanana.
Yokutaŋga yakaŋga yakafanana neshumba, inamapapiro egondo; ndikaramba ndakatarira kuȿikira mapapiro ayo ataʋurwa, ikasimudzwa icibva panyika, ikamiswa namakumbo maʋiri somunhu, ikapiwa mŋoyo womunhu.

Ndikaʋona ɀe imŋe mhuka, yecipiri, yakafanana neɓere; iyo yakaŋga yakasimudza rumŋe rutiʋi rwayo, ʋuye mumuromo mayo yakaŋga yakaruma mbabvu nhatu pakati pameno ayo; ʋakati kwariri: Simuka, upedze nyama zhinji.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ndakatarira, ndikaʋona imŋe ɀe, yakafanana neŋgwe, yakaŋga inamapapiro manna pamusana wayo akafanana neeshiri; mhuka iyi yakaŋga inemisoro minna ʋo; ikapiwa simba.

Shure kwaiɀoɀo ndakaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa ʋusiku, ndikaʋona mhuka yecinna, yaityisa nokuvundusa, inesimba guru kwaɀo; yakaŋga inameno makuru oʋutare; ikapedza, nokuvuna‐vuna, nokupxanya ɀakaŋga ɀasara netsoka dzayo; iyi yakaŋga yakasiyana nemhuka dzose dzakaitaŋgira; yakaŋga inenyaŋga gumi.

Ndikacerekedza nyaŋga, ndikaʋona rumŋe runyaŋga ruciɓuɗa pakati pedzimŋe, ruri ruɗuku, dzimŋe nyaŋga nhatu panedzokutaŋga dzikadzurwa nemidzi yadzo pamberi parwo; ndikaʋona kuti parunyaŋga urwo pakaŋga panameso omunhu, nomuromo wakaŋga ucitaura ɀinhu ɀikuru.

Ndikaramba ndakatarira kuȿikira ɀigaro ɀoʋushe ɀagadzwa’po, mumŋe wakakwegura pamazuʋa ake akagara’po; ŋguʋo yake yakaŋga yakacena secando, ʋuye vudzi romusoro wake rakaŋga rakaita samakushe akanatswa; cigaro cake coʋushe yakaŋga iri miraɀo yomŋoto, makumbo aco uri mŋoto unopfuta.
Rwizi rwomŋoto rwakaŋga ruciɓuɗa rucibva pamberi pake; ɀuru neɀuru ɀakaŋga ɀicimuɓatira, ʋuye pamberi pake pakaŋga pamire ɀuru ɀinegumi ɀeɀuru ɀinegumi; kutoŋga kukataŋga, buku dzikazarurwa.

Ndikaramba ndakatarira neŋguʋa iyo nemhaka yokuɗana kwamashoko makuru akaŋga acitaurwa norunyaŋga; ndikaramba ndakatarira kuȿikira mhuka yaʋurawa, muʋiri wayo uciparadzwa, uciiswa kumŋoto kuti upiswe.
Kana dziri dzimŋe mhuka, dzakatorerwa ʋushe bgadzo, asi ʋupenyu bgadzo bgakawedzerwa kuȿikira nhambo neŋguʋa.
Ndikaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa ʋusiku, ndikaʋona mumŋe wakafanana nomŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya namakore okuɗeŋga, akaȿika kunowakakwegura pamazuʋa ake, ʋakamusweɗedza pamberi pake.
Akapiwa simba, nokubginya, noʋushe, kuti ʋanhu ʋose namarudzi ose namarimi ose ʋamushumire; simba rake roʋushe isimba risiŋgaperi, risiŋgazopfuʋuri, ʋuye ʋushe bgake haʋuŋgazoparadzwi.
Kana ndiri’ni Danieri, mŋeya waŋgu wakatambudzika mukati momuʋiri waŋgu, ʋuye ɀandakaʋona mumusoro maŋgu ɀakandivundusa.
Ndikasweɗera kunomumŋe wakaŋga amire’po, ndikamubvunza
Mhuka idzi huru, idzo inna, ndiwo madzimambo manna acamuka panyika.
Asi ʋatȿene ʋoWokumsoro‐soro ʋacapiwa ʋushe, ʋushe ʋucaʋa bgaʋo nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ipapo ndakaɗa kuziʋa
ʋuye pamsoro penyaŋga dzinegumi dzakaŋga dziri pamusoro wayo, norumŋe
Ndakatarira, ndikaʋona runyaŋga urwu rucirwa naʋatȿene, nokuʋakunda;
kuȿikira wakakwegura pamazuʋa ake aciȿika, ʋatȿene ʋoWokumsoro‐soro ʋakaruramisirwa, ŋguʋa ikaȿika yokuti ʋatȿene ʋapiwe ʋushe.
Akati: Mhuka yecinna ʋucaʋa ʋushe bgecinna panyika, ʋucasiyana noʋumŋe ʋushe bgose, ʋucapedza nyika yose, nokuʋupxanya nokuʋuputsanya.
Kana dziri nyaŋga dzinegumi, paʋushe ubgu pacamuka madzimambo anegumi, asi mumŋe ɀe ucamuka shure kwaʋo; iye ucasiyana naʋamŋe ʋokutaŋga, ucakunda madzimambo matatu.
Ucataura mashoko
Asi kutoŋga kucataŋga, ʋacabvisa simba rake, kuti ʋaripedze nokuriparadza kuȿikira pakuguma.
Ipapo ʋushe nesimba noʋukuru bgoʋushe bgose pasi peɗeŋga rose, ɀicapiwa ʋanhu ʋaʋatȿene ʋoWokumsoro‐soro; ʋushe bgake ndobgokusiŋgaperi, masimba ose acamushumira nokumuterera.
Ndi’ko kuguma kweshoko. Kana ndiri’ni Danieri, pfuŋgwa dzaŋgu dzakandivundusa kwaɀo, ciso caŋgu cikashandurwa mukati maŋgu; asi ndakaceŋgeta shoko iri mumŋoyo maŋgu.
Negore recitatu rokuɓata ʋushe kwamambo Bershazari, ini Danieri ndakaratidzwa ciratidzo, shure kweciya candakaratidzwa pakutaŋga.
Ndikaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa; ɀino ndakati ndicitarira, ndakaŋga ndiri paShushani, paimba yamambo, iri panyika yeErami; ndikaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa, ndiri parwizi Urai.

Ndikarinzira meso aŋgu, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona gondobge rimire pamberi porwizi, rinenyaŋga mbiri; nyaŋga mbiri dzakaŋga dzakareɓa, asi rumŋe rwakaŋga rwakapfuʋura rumŋe nokureɓa; rwakaŋga rwakareɓa ndirwo rwakaɓuɗa shure.

Ndikaʋona gondobge ricituŋga kumatiʋi amaʋirazuʋa, nokumsoro, nezasi; hakuneɀipfuwo ɀaigona kuramba ɀimire pamberi paro, ʋuye kwakaŋga kusina‐waigona kurwira pasimba raro; asi rakaita parakaɗa napo, rikaɀikudza.
Ɀino ndakati ndicafuŋga iɀoɀo, ndikaʋona nhoŋgo icibva kumaʋirazuʋa icifamba panyika pose, asi isiŋgatsiki pasi; ɀino nhoŋgo yakaŋga inorunyaŋga rukuru pakati pameso ayo.
Ikaȿika pagondobge, raiʋa nenyaŋga mbiri, randakaʋona rimire pamberi porwizi, ikamhanyira kwariri nehasha dzesimba rayo.

Ndikaʋona icisweɗera pedyo negondobge, hasha dzayo dzikarimutsirwa, ikatuŋga gondobge, ikavuna nyaŋga dzaro mbiri; gondobge rakaŋga risinesimba kumira pamberi payo; asi yakariwisira pasi, ikatsika pamsoro paro, hakuna‐wakagona kurwira gondobge pasimba rayo.
Nhoŋgo ikaɀikudza ɀikuru kwaɀo; ɀino yakati yasimba, runyaŋga rukuru ndokuvunika,
Ɀino kunorumŋe rwadzo kwakaɓuɗa runyaŋga ruɗuku, rwakazokura kwaɀo, kumatiʋi ezasi, nokumaʋirazuʋa, no
Rukakura kuȿikira iko kuhondo dzokuɗeŋga, rukawisira pasi dzimŋe hondo nenyeredzi, ndokutsika pamsoro paɀo.
Rukaɀikudza kuȿikira kumucinda wehondo; rukamutorera
Hondo ikamutswa kuzorwa
Ipapo ndakanzwa mumŋe mutȿene acitaura; ɀino mumŋe mutȿene ɀe akati kunaiye wakaŋga acitaura: Ko iɀo ɀakaratidzwa ɀicaȿika rini, iɀo
Akati kwandiri: Kuȿikira maɗekwana namaŋgwanani aneɀuru ɀiʋiri namazana matatu; ipapo nɀimbo tȿene icanatswa.
Ɀino ini, iyeni Danieri, ndakati ndaʋona ɀandaratidzwa, ndikatȿaka kuɀinzwisisa, ndikaʋona mumŋe wakaŋga akaita somunhu amire pamberi paŋgu.
Ndikanzwa inzwi romunhu ricibva pakati pe

Ipapo akasweɗera kwandakaŋga ndimire; ɀino wakati aciȿika, ndikatya, ndokuwira pasi neciso caŋgu; asi wakati kwandiri: Cinzwisisa, iwe mŋanakomana womunhu, nokuti ɀawakaratidzwa ndeɀeŋguʋa yokupedzisira.
Ɀino wakati acataura neni, ndikaɓatwa nehope kwaɀo ndiʋete neciso caŋgu pasi; asi wakandiɓata, akandimisa.
Akati: Tarira, ndicakuziʋisa ɀicaʋa’po paŋguʋa yokupedzisira yokutsamŋa
Gondobge rawakaʋona, rakaŋga rinenyaŋga mbiri, ndiwo madzimambo aʋaMedia naʋaPersia.
Ʋuye nhoŋgo inemvere ndiye mambo weGirisi; runyaŋga rukuru ruri pakati pameso ayo ndiye mambo wokutaŋga.
Kana ruri
Ɀino paŋguʋa yokupedzisira yoʋushe bgaʋo, kana ʋaɗariki ʋazadza
Simba rake ricaʋa guru, asi haɀiŋgaitwi nesimba rake cairo; ucaparadza ɀinoshamisa, asi ucafara paneɀose ɀaanoita; ucaparadza ʋanesimba naʋanhu ʋatȿene.
Ɀino nokuŋgwara kwake ucafambisa nhema noruʋoko rwake; ucaɀikudza mumŋoyo make, nokuparadza ʋazhinji ʋakafara haʋo; ucamukira ʋo mucinda waʋacinda, asi ucaputswa ɀisiŋgaitwi noruʋoko
Ɀawakaratidzwa ɀamaɗekwana neɀamaŋgwanani, ɀawakaʋudzwa, ndeɀaɀokwaɗi; asi iwe ʋanza ɀawaʋona, nokuti ndeɀamazuʋa mazhinji
Ini Danieri ndikapera simba, ndikarwara mazuʋa; ipapo ndikamuka, ndikaɓata maɓasa amambo, ndikashamiswa neɀandakaratidzwa, asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waiɀinzwisisa.
Ɀino negore rokutaŋga raDariusi mŋanakomana waAhasuerosi, worudzi rwaʋaMedia, wakaŋga aitwa mambo woʋushe bgaʋaKardea,

negore rokutaŋga rokuɓata kwake ʋushe, ini Danieri ndakanzwisisa paɓuku kuti makore maŋgani akaŋga aʋudzwa muprofita Jeremia neshoko raJehova kuȿikira pakupera kwokuparadzwa kweJerusarema, kuti aiʋa makore makumi manomŋe.
Ndikarinzira ciso caŋgu kunaShe Mŋari, ndika
Ndikanyeŋgetera kunaJehova Mŋari waŋgu, ndikaɀireʋurura ɀiʋi, ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe, Mŋari mukuru unotyisa, unosimbisa suŋgano yake nenyasha dzake kunaʋanomuɗa, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yake,
takatadza, takaita ɀisakarurama neɀakashata, takakumukirai, tikatsauka paɀireʋo ɀenyu neɀamakaraira;
hatina‐kuterera ʋo ʋaranda ʋenyu ʋaprofita, ʋakataura nezita renyu kunamadzimambo eɗu, namacinda eɗu, namadziɓaɓa eɗu nokuʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika.

Haiwa, Ishe, kururama kuri kwamuri, asi kwatiri isu kunyara kweɀiso ɀeɗu, sapazuʋa ranhasi; kuʋanhu ʋaJuda, nokunaʋagere Jerusarema, nokuʋaIsraeri ʋose, ʋari pedyo naʋari kure, panyika dzose kwamakaʋadziŋgira, nemhaka yokuɗarika kwaʋakakuɗarikirai imi.
Haiwa, Ishe, kunyara kweɀiso kuri kwatiri isu, kumadzimambo eɗu, namacinda eɗu, namadziɓaɓa eɗu, nokuti takakutadzirai.
KunaShe Mŋari weɗu ndi’ko kunenyasha nokukaŋganwira, nokuti takamumukira;
ʋuye hatina‐kuterera inzwi raJehova Mŋari weɗu, kuti tifambe nemirairo yake yaakaisa pamberi peɗu naʋaranda ʋake ʋaprofita.
Ɀirokwaɀo ʋaIsraeri ʋose ʋakaɗarika murairo wenyu, ʋacitsauka, kuti ʋarege kuterera inzwi renyu; nemhaka iyo kutuka
Wakasimbisa mashoko ake aakatitaurira isu naʋatoŋgi ʋeɗu ʋaititoŋga, aciʋuyisa pamsoro peɗu cinhu cikuru cakaipa; nokuti pasi peɗeŋga rose hakuna‐kumboitwa cinhu cakaɗai cakaitirwa Jerusarema.
Seɀaɀakanyorwa pamurairo waMosesi, ɀakaipa iɀi ɀose ɀakatiwira; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hatina‐kukumbira tsitsi kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu, kuti titsauke paɀakaipa ɀeɗu nokuŋgwarira ɀokwaɗi yenyu.
Naiɀoɀo Jehova wakarindira ɀakaipa, akaɀiʋuyisa pamsoro peɗu; nokuti Jehova Mŋari weɗu wakarurama pamaɓasa ake ose aanoita, asi isu hatina‐kuterera inzwi rake.
Ɀino imi Ishe Mŋari weɗu, makaɓuɗisa ʋanhu ʋenyu panyika yeEgipita noruʋoko runesimba, mukaɀiwanira mukurumbira, sapazuʋa ranhasi; takatadza, takaita ɀakashata.

Haiwa Ishe, nokuɗa kwokururama kwenyu kwose, ndinokunyeŋgeterai kuti kutsamŋa kwenyu nehasha dzenyu ɀidzorwe paguta renyu reJerusarema, iro gomo renyu dɀene; nemhaka yeɀiʋi ɀeɗu, ʋuye nemhaka yeɀakaipa ɀamadziɓaɓa eɗu, Jerusarema naʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakaitwa cinhu cinoshoʋorwa pakati paʋose ʋanotipoteredza.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, imi Mŋari weɗu, inzwai kunyeŋgetera kwomuranda wenyu, neɀaanokumbira, muvenekere neciso cenyu panɀimbo yenyu tȿene, yaʋa ɗoŋgo, nokuɗa kwaShe.

Haiwa, Mŋari waŋgu, rerekerai nzeʋe yenyu, munzwe; ȿinudzai meso enyu, muʋone kuparadzwa kweɗu, neguta rakatumidzwa zita renyu; nokuti hatiȿitsi mikumbiro yeɗu pamberi penyu nokuɗa kweɀakarurama ɀeɗu, asi nokuɗa kwenyasha dzenyu huru.
Haiwa, Ishe, inzwai; Ishe, kaŋganwirai; Ishe, tererai, muite; regai kunonoka, nokuɗa kwenyu, imi Mŋari waŋgu, nokuɗa kweguta renyu naʋanhu ʋenyu ʋakatumidzwa zita renyu.
Ɀino ndakati ndicataura nokunyeŋgetera nokuɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaŋgu neɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, nokuisa kukumbira kwaŋgu pamberi paJehova Mŋari waŋgu pamsoro pegomo dɀene raMŋari waŋgu;
ndakati ndicataura pakunyeŋgetera, uya murume Gabrieri, wandakaŋga ndaʋona paneɀandakaratidzwa pakutaŋga, ndaneta kwaɀo, wakaȿika kwandiri neŋguʋa ineŋge yecipo camaɗekwana.
Akandiɗudzira, akataura neni, akati: Danieri, ndaʋuya ɀino kukuʋigira njere nokunzwisisa.
Cireʋo cakatemŋa, ucaŋgotaŋga kukumbira, ɀino ndaʋuya kuzokuʋudza; nokuti uri murume unoɗikanwa kwaɀo; naiɀoɀo fuŋga shoko iri, unzwisise ɀawakaratidzwa.

Viki dzinamakumi manomŋe dzakatemerwa ʋanhu ʋako neguta rako dɀene, kupedzisa kuɗarika nokugumisa ɀiʋi, nokuyananisira ɀakaipa, nokuʋuyisa kururama kusiŋgaperi, nokusimbisa ɀakaratidzwa noʋuprofita, nokuzodza nɀimbo tȿene‐tȿene.

Naiɀoɀo ciziʋa unzwisise, kuti kubva pakutemŋa kwomurairo wokuʋandudza nokuʋaka Jerusarema kuȿikira kunowakazodzwa, iye mucinda, ɀicaita viki nomŋe; ʋuye viki dzinamakumi matanhatu nembiri dzicaʋa’po dzokuʋakwa kwaro, rinenɀimbo mhamhi nemigero, asi ɀicaitwa neŋguʋa yokutambudzika.

Ɀino kana viki idzo dzinamakumi matanhatu nembiri dzapera, wakazodzwa ucabviswa, akasara asinecinhu; ʋanhu ʋomucinda, unozoʋuya, ʋacaparadza guta nenɀimbo tȿene; asi kuguma kwaɀo kucaʋuya nokukukurwa, kurwa kucaʋa’po kuȿikira pakuguma; kuparadzwa kwakatemŋa.
Ɀino iye ucaita suŋgano yakasimba naʋazhinji viki imŋe; pakati peviki ucagumisa ciɓayiro necipo, ɀino muparadzi ucaȿika neɓapiro reɀinonyaŋgadza; kuȿikira pakuguma kwaɀo kwakagara kwatarwa,

Negore recitatu raKoreshi mambo wePersia, cimŋe cinhu cakaratidzwa Danieri, wainzi Berteshazari; cinhu ico cakaŋga ciri caɀokwaɗi, ciri cokurwa kukuru; akanzwisisa cinhu ico, nokuziʋa kuɗudzirwa kweɀaakaratidzwa.
Namazuʋa iwayo ini Danieri ndakaŋga ndicicema viki nhatu dzose.
Ndakaŋga ndisiŋgadyi ɀokudya ɀinozipa, kunyaŋge nenyama newaini haɀina‐kupinda mumuromo maŋgu, ʋuye handina‐kutoŋgozora mafuta kuȿikira viki nhatu dzose dzapera.
Ɀino nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanna romŋedzi wokutaŋga, ndakati ndiri pamhenderekedzo yorwizi rukuru, irwo Hidekeri,
ndikarinzira meso aŋgu, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona murume akapfeka muceka, akasuŋgwa ciʋuno cake nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka yeUfazi;

muʋiri wake wakaŋga wakaita seberiri, ciso cake cakapenya semheni, meso ake akapfuta samazhenje, maʋoko ake netsoka dzake ɀakaŋga ɀakafanana nendarira yakakweshwa, ʋuye kutinhira kwamashoko ake kwakaita sokutinhira kwaʋazhinji.
Ɀino ini Danieri ndakaʋona iɀo ɀakaratidzwa ini ndoga; nokuti ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋaneni haʋana‐kuʋona ɀakaratidzwa; asi ʋakaɓatwa nokuɗeɗera kukuru, ʋakatiza kundoʋanda.
Ini ndikasiyiwa ndiri ndoga, ndikaʋona cinhu ici cikuru candakaratidzwa, ndikapererwa nesimba; nokuti kunaka
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakanzwa kutinhira kwamashoko ake; ɀino ndakati ndicinzwa kutinhira kwamashoko ake, ndikaɓatwa nehope kwaɀo ndiʋete paciso caŋgu, ciso caŋgu cakatarira pasi.
Ipapo tarira, ruʋoko rwakandiɓata, rukandimisa namabvi aŋgu neɀanza ɀamaʋoko aŋgu ndicidzedzereka.
Akati kwandiri: Iwe Danieri, murume unoɗikanwa kwaɀo, cinzwisisa mashoko andinotaura kwauri, umire kwaɀo; nokuti ndatumŋa kwauri iwe ɀino. Wakati ataura shoko iro kwandiri, ndikamira ndiciɗeɗera.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Usatya Danieri, nokuti kubva pazuʋa rokutaŋga rawakafuŋga nomŋoyo wako wose kunzwisisa nokuɀininipisa pamberi paMŋari wako, mashoko ako akanzwika; ndaʋuya nokuɗa kwamashoko ako.
Asi mucinda woʋushe bgaʋaPersia wakandidziʋisa mazuʋa anamakumi maʋiri nerimŋe; asi tarira, Mikaeri, mumŋe wamacinda makuru, wakaʋuya kuzondiɓatsira, ndikasara’ko kunamadzimambo aʋaPersia.
Ɀino ndaʋuya kuzokuziʋisa ɀicaitirwa ʋanhu ʋako namazuʋa okupedzisira; nokuti ɀawakaratidzwa ndeɀamazuʋa
Ɀino wakati ataura neni namashoko iwayo, ndikaramba ndakatarira pasi neciso caŋgu, ndikashaiwa shoko.

Ipapo tarira, mumŋe wakafanana naʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu akagunɀa miromo yaŋgu; ɀino ndikashamisa muromo waŋgu, ndikataura, ndikati kunaiye wakaŋga amire pamberi paŋgu: Haiwa, ishe waŋgu, ndaɓatwa nokutya kukuru, handicinesimba nokuɗa kweɀandakaratidzwa.
Nokuti muranda washe waŋgu uyu uŋgataura seiko nashe waŋgu uyu? Nokuti kana ndiri’ni, pakarepo ndakasara ndisinesimba, ʋuye ndakaŋga ndisisina‐mŋeya mukati maŋgu.
Ipapo mumŋe wakafanana nomunhu wakandiɓata ɀe, akandisimbisa.
Akati: Iwe murume unoɗikanwa kwaɀo, usatya hako; rugare ruʋe newe, iʋa nesimba, iʋa nesimba. Ɀino wakati acitaura neni, ndikasimbiswa, ndikati: Ishe waŋgu ŋgaataure hake, nokuti makandisimbisa.
Ɀino akati: Unoziʋa candakaʋuyira kwauri here? Ɀino ndicadzokera kundorwa nomucinda wePersia; kana ndabva’po, tarira, mucinda weGirisi ucaʋuya.
Asi ndicakuʋudza ɀakanyorwa murugwaro rwaɀokwaɗi; asi hakuna‐unoɀisimbisa kundorwa naʋaʋa pamŋe cete neni, asi Mikaeri mucinda wenyu.
Kana ndiri’ni, negore rokutaŋga raDariusi muMedia, ini ndakasimuka kundomutsigira nokumusimbisa.
Ɀino ndicakuziʋisa ɀokwaɗi. Tarira, paPersia pacamuka ɀe madzimambo matatu; wecinna ucaʋa mufumi kupfuʋura iʋaʋo ʋose; ɀino kana asimba kwaɀo nefuma yake, ucamutsa
Ɀino mambo unesimba ucamuka, ucaɓata ʋushe nesimba guru, aciita seɀaanoɗa.

Kana amuka, ʋushe bgake ʋucaputswa, ndokuparadzirwa kumhepo inna dzokuɗeŋga, asi haʋuŋgaendi kuʋazukuru ʋake, ʋuye haʋuŋgaenzani nesimba raakaɓata naro iye; nokuti ʋushe bgake ʋucadzurwa, ndokupiwa ʋamŋe kunze kwaiʋaʋo.
Mambo wezasi ucaʋa nesimba, nomumŋe wamacinda ake; ɀino iye ucamupfuʋura nesimba, ndokuɓata ʋushe; ʋushe bgake ʋucaʋa ʋushe ʋukuru.
Kana mamŋe makore apfuʋura, ʋacaita suŋgano; mukunda wamambo wezasi ucaenda kunamambo wokumsoro kuzotȿaka suŋgano, asi iye
Asi paɓukira remidzi yake mumŋe ucamuka panɀimbo yake; iye ucarwa nehondo, ndokupinda munhare yamambo wokumsoro, ucarwa naʋo nokuʋakunda.
Ucatapa ʋo ʋamŋari ʋaʋo, pamŋe cete nemifananidzo yaʋo yakaʋumbga, nemidziyo yaʋo yakanaka yesirveri nendarama, acindoɀiisa Egipita; ipapo ucarega mambo wokumsoro mamŋe makore.
Ucapinda ʋo muʋushe bgamambo wezasi, asi ucazodzokera kunyika yake.
Ʋanakomana ʋake ʋacandorwa, ʋacaʋuŋganidza ɓoka guru raʋarwi, ricaʋuya, nokupararira, ndokupfuʋura neseri; ipapo ricadzoka ndokuzorwa kuȿikira panhare yake.
Ɀino mambo wezasi ucatsamŋa, ucandorwa naye, naiye mambo wokumsoro; asi iye ucakokera ɓoka guru, ɓoka iro ricaiswa mumaʋoko ake.
Ƃoka iro ricatapxa, ɀino mŋoyo wake ucaɀikudza; ucaparadza ʋanamakumi eɀuru, asi haaŋgakundi.
Ɀino mambo wokumsoro ucadzoka, ndokukokera ɓoka guru kunerokutaŋga; ucaʋuya pakupera kweŋguʋa dziya, dziya dzamakore, anehondo huru nenhumbi zhinji.
Neŋguʋa idzo ʋazhinji ʋacamukira mambo wezasi; ʋuye ʋana ʋaʋanopeŋga pakati paʋanhu ʋako ʋacaɀikudza, kuti ʋasimbise ɀawakaratidzwa; asi ʋacaparadzwa.

Ɀino mambo wokumsoro ucaȿika, ndokuʋatutira murwi wokurwa, ndokukunda guta rakaʋakirwa kwaɀo; hondo dzezasi hadziŋgagoni kumira, kunyaŋge naʋanhu ʋake ʋakatsaurwa, ʋuye ʋacashaiwa simba rokumira naro.
Asi uyo unoʋuya kuzorwa naye ucaita seɀaanoɗa, hakuna‐uŋgamira pamberi pake; ɀino iye ucamira panyika yakaiȿo‐naka, akaɓata kuparadza muruʋoko rwake.
Ipapo ucashiŋgaira kuʋuya nesimba roʋushe bgake bgose, anesuŋgano yake; ucaita iɀoɀo, ucamupa mŋanasikana waʋakadzi, kuti amuparadze; asi ɀicakona, haana‐caacawana.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ucarinzira ciso cake kuɀiwi, ndokukunda ɀizhinji; asi mumŋe mukuru wehondo ucagumisa kushoʋora kwake; ucadzosera kushoʋora kwake kunaiye amene.
Ipapo ucarinzira ciso cake kunhare dzenyika yake; asi ucagumburwa nokuwa, ndokushaikwa.
Ɀino panɀimbo yake kucamuka mumŋe ucatuma muteresi kupfuʋura napakaiȿo‐naka paʋushe
Panɀimbo yake kucamuka munhu unofanira kuɀidzwa, wakaŋga asinokupiwa kukudzwa kwoʋushe; asi iye ucaȿika neŋguʋa yokufara kwaʋanhu, ndokutora ʋushe nokuɓata kumeso.
Hondo dzinokukura dzicakukurwa pamberi pake, dzicaparadzwa; ɀirokwaɀo, naiye mucinda wesuŋgano ʋo.
Kana apedza kuita suŋgano naʋo, ucaʋanyeŋgera; nokuti ucakwirira, nokuʋanesimba naʋanhu ʋashoma.

Neŋguʋa yokufara kwaʋanhu ucapinda pamatiʋi akaʋorera enyika; ucaita ɀisino‐kumboitwa namadziɓaɓa ake, kunyaŋge namadziɓaɓa amadziɓaɓa ake; ucaparadzira pakati paʋo ɀaakatapa neɀaakapamba nenhumbi; ucatanda mano ake pamsoro penhare, asi neŋguʋa ɓedzi.
Ipapo ucamutsira mambo wezasi simba rake nomŋoyo wake, anehondo huru; mambo wezasi ucarwa anehondo huru kwaɀo inesimba; asi haaŋgamiri, nokuti ʋacamutandira mano.
Ʋanodya ɀokudya ɀake, ndiʋo ʋacamuparadza; hondo yake icapararira, ʋazhinji ʋacawira pasi ʋaʋurawa.
Kana ari madzimambo awo maʋiri, mŋoyo yaʋo icaɗa kuita ɀakashata, ʋacareʋa nhema ʋari patafura rimŋe; asi haɀiŋgaɓatsiri, nokuti kuguma kucaȿika neŋguʋa yakatarwa.
Ipapo ucadzokera kunyika yake nenhumbi zhinji; mŋoyo wake ucaʋeŋga suŋgano, ucaita seɀaanoɗa, ndokudzokera kunyika yake.
Neŋguʋa yakatarwa ucadzoka, ndokuȿika kunyika yezasi; asi neŋguʋa yokupedzisira haɀiŋgaiti sapakutaŋga.
Nokuti ɀikepe ɀeKitimi ɀicaʋuya kuzorwa naye; naiɀoɀo ucaʋora mŋoyo, ndokudzoka akatsamŋa pamsoro pesuŋgano, ndokuita seɀaanoɗa; ucadzoka, ndokuʋa nehanya naʋakaramba suŋgano tȿene.
Hondo dzicamutswa naye, dzicamhura nɀimbo tȿene, iyo nhare, ʋacabvisa
Ʋanoitira suŋgano ɀakaipa, ucaʋatsausa nokuɓata kumeso; asi ʋanhu ʋanoziʋa Mŋari waʋo, ʋacaʋa nesimba, ʋacaita
Ʋakacenjera pakati paʋanhu ʋacadzidzisa ʋazhinji; asi ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo, ʋuye nomuraɀo womŋoto, ʋuye nokutapxa, ʋuye nokupambga mazuʋa
Ɀino kana ʋoparadzwa ʋacaɓatsirwa nokuɓatsirwa kuɗuku; asi ʋazhinji ʋacaɀiisa kwaʋari nokuɓata kumeso.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakacenjera ʋacaparadzwa, kuti ʋaidzwe, ʋanatswe, ʋaceneswe, kuȿikira kuŋguʋa yokupedzisira; nokuti ŋguʋa yokupedzisira icigere kuȿika.

Mambo uyo ucaita seɀaanoɗa; ucaɀiita mukuru, ucaɀikudza aciti ndinopfuʋura ʋamŋari ʋose, ucataura ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa pamsoro paMŋari waʋamŋari; iye ucafara paneɀaanoita kuȿikira kutsamŋa kwapera, nokuti ɀakatemŋa ɀicaitika.
Ʋuye haaŋgaʋi nehanya naʋamŋari ʋamadziɓaɓa ake, kana noruɗo rwaʋakadzi, haaŋgaʋi nehanya namŋari upi noupi; nokuti ucaɀikudza aciti ndakapfuʋura ʋose.
Asi panɀimbo yaɀo ucakudza mŋari wenhare; mŋari wakaŋga asiŋgazikanwi namadziɓaɓa ake, ndiye waacakudza nendarama nesirveri namabge anokosha neɀinhu ɀinoɗikanwa.
Ucarwa nenhare dzakaiȿo‐ɓata aciɓatsirwa namŋari waʋatorwa; aninani unoɗikanwa naye, iye ucakudzwa naye ɀikuru; ucaʋaɓatisa ʋushe pamsoro paʋanhu ʋazhinji, aciʋagoʋera nyika uʋe muɓairo waʋo.

Ɀino neŋguʋa yokupedzisira mambo wezasi ucapesana naye; mambo wokumsoro ucaʋuya kuzorwa naye secampupuri, aneŋgoro naʋataȿi ʋamabiza neɀikepe ɀizhinji; ucapinda munyika idzo, ndokupararira, ndokupfuʋura neseri.
Ucapinda ʋo munyika yakaiȿo‐naka,
Ucatambanudzira ʋo ruʋoko rwake kunedzimŋe nyika; nyika yeEgipita haiŋgapukunyuki.
Asi ucaʋa unesimba pamsoro pefuma yendarama nesirveri, napamsoro peɀinhu ɀose ɀinokosha ɀeEgipita; ʋaRibia naʋaEtiopia ʋacateʋera makwara ake.
Asi mashoko anobva kumabvazuʋa nokumsoro acamuvundusa; ipapo ucaɓuɗa nehasha kwaɀo kundoparadza nokupedza cose ʋazhinji.
Ucadzika matente ake oʋushe pakati peguŋgwa negomo dɀene rakaiȿo‐naka; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ucaȿika pakuguma kwake, ucashaiwa unomuɓatsira.

Neŋguʋa iyo Mikaeri ucasimuka, iye mucinda mukuru unorindira ʋana ʋaʋanhu ʋako; ipapo ŋguʋa yenjodzi icaʋa’po, isinakumboʋa’po yakaɗaro kubva pakumuka kwamarudzi aʋanhu kuȿikira ŋguʋa iyo; neŋguʋa iyo ʋanhu ʋako ʋacarwirwa, iʋo ʋose ʋakanyorwa mubuku.
Ɀino ʋazhinji ʋaʋaʋete muguruʋa rapasi ʋacamuka, ʋamŋe ʋacamukira ʋupenyu ʋusiŋgaperi, ʋamŋe kukunyadziswa nokuɀidzwa kusiŋgaperi.
Ʋakacenjera ʋacapenya sokupenya kwokuɗeŋga, ʋuye ʋanodzorera ʋazhinji kukururama ʋacapenya senyeredzi nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Asi iwe Danieri, ʋanza mashoko, unamire buku necisimbiso, kuȿikira kuŋguʋa yokupedzisira; ʋazhinji ʋacamhanya pose‐pose, neziʋo icawanda.
Ipapo ini Danieri ndakatarira, ndikaʋona ʋamŋe ʋaʋiri, mumŋe pamhenderekedzo yorwizi necoʋuno mhiri, mumŋe pamhenderekedzo yorwizi necemhiri.
Mumŋe akati kumurume wakaŋga akapfeka muceka, wakaŋga ari pamsoro pemvura yorwizi: Iŋguʋa yakaɗini kuȿikira pakuguma kweɀishamiso iɀi?

Ndikanzwa murume wakaŋga akapfeka muceka, wakaŋga ari pamsoro pemvura yorwizi, acisimudzira kuɗeŋga ruʋoko rwake rworudyi noruʋoko rwake rworuɓoshwe, acipika naiye unorarama nokusiŋgaperi, kuti ɀicaita ŋguʋa
Ndikanzwa, asi handinakuɀinzwisisa; ipapo ndikati: Haiwa ishe waŋgu, kupera kweɀinhu iɀi ndokweiko?
Iye akati: Cienda hako, iwe Danieri; nokuti mashoko awa akaʋanzwa nokunamirwa necisimbiso kuȿikira paŋguʋa yokupedzisira.
Ʋazhinji ʋacaɀinatsa nokuɀicenesa nokubviswa tȿina, asi ʋakaipa ʋacaita ɀakaipa; hakuna pakati paʋakaipa ucanzwisisa, asi ʋakacenjera ndiʋo ʋacanzwisisa.
Kubva paŋguʋa yokubviswa kwe
Wakaropafadzwa unoramba acimirira kuȿikira pamazuʋa anecuru cimŋe namazana matatu namakumi matatu namashanu.
Asi iwe cienda hako kuȿikira kuguma kwaʋa’po; nokuti iwe ucazorora, ndokumukira ɀe mugoʋe wako pakupera kwamazuʋa iwayo.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kunaHosea mŋanakomana waBeeri, namazuʋa aUzia naJotami naAhazi naHezekia, madzimambo aJuda, ʋuye namazuʋa aJeroboami mŋanakomana waJoashi, mambo waIsraeri.
Pakutaŋga kwokutaura kwaJehova naHosea, Jehova wakati kunaHosea: Enda undoɀitorera mukadzi woʋufeʋe naʋana ʋoʋufeʋe; nokuti nyika inofeʋa ɀikuru, ɀaʋakasiyana naJehova.
Naiɀoɀo wakaenda akatora Gomeri mukunda waDibraimi, iye akanaka pamuʋiri akamuɓerekera mŋanakomana.
Jehova akati kwaari: Mutumidze zita rinonzi Jezreeri, nokuti kwasara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, ipapo ndicatsiʋa ropa reJezreeri paimba yaJehu, nokugumisa ʋushe bgeimba yaIsraeri.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ndicavuna ʋuta bgaIsraeri mumupata weJezreeri.
Akanaka ɀe pamuʋiri, ndokuɓereka mŋanasikana.
Asi ndicanzwira imba yaJuda nyasha, ndicaʋaponesa naJehova Mŋari waʋo, handiŋgaʋaponesi noʋuta, kana nomunondo, kana nokurwa, kana namabiza, kana naʋataȿi ʋamabiza.
Ɀino wakati arumura Ro‐ruhama, akanaka
akati: Mutumidze zita rinonzi Ro‐ami; nokuti imi hamuzi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni handiŋgaʋi
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kuwanda kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri kucaita sejeca reguŋgwa, risiŋgabviri kuyerwa kana kuʋereŋgwa; ɀicaitika kuti paya pakaŋga panzi kwaʋari: Hamuzi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndipapo paɀicanzi kwaʋari:
Ʋana ʋaJuda naʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacaʋuŋganidzwa pamŋe cete, ʋacaɀigadzira mukuru mumŋe, ndokubva panyika
Itiyi kuʋanuŋuna ʋenyu: Ami; nokuhanɀadzi dzenyu: Ruhama.
Kakaʋarai namai ʋenyu, kakaʋarai; nokuti haazi mukadzi waŋgu, neni handizi murume wake; ŋgaabvise kufeʋa kwake paciso cake, nokupata kwake pakati pamazamu ake;
kuti ndirege kumukumurira ŋguʋo dzake dzose, ndimuite seɀaakaŋga akaita nezuʋa rokuɀarwa kwake, ndimuite serenje, ndimushandure aʋe nyika yakawoma, ndimuʋuraye nenyota.
Ɀirokwaɀo handiŋganzwiri ʋana ʋake nyasha, ɀaʋari ʋana ʋoʋufeʋe;

nokuti mai ʋaʋo ʋakafeʋa; wakaʋaɓereka wakaita ɀinonyadzisa, nokuti wakati: Ndicateʋera ʋaɗikani ʋaŋgu, ʋanondipa ɀokudya ɀaŋgu nemvura yaŋgu, namakushe aŋgu necinda yaŋgu, namafuta aŋgu neɀokunwa ɀaŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo tarira, ndicasosera nzira yako neminzwa, ndicamuʋakira ruȿiŋgo, kuti arege kuwana nzira dzake.
Ucateʋera ʋaɗikani ʋake, asi haaŋgaʋaɓati; ucaʋatȿaka, asi haaŋgaʋawani; ipapo ucati: Ndicadzokera kumurume waŋgu wokutaŋga, nokuti neŋguʋa iyo ndaifara kupfuʋura ɀino.
Nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi kuti ndini ndaimupa ɀiyo, newaini itȿa, namafuta, nokumuwanzira sirveri nendarama, ɀaʋaiɓatira Baari naɀo.
Saka ndicamutorera ɀiyo ɀaŋgu neŋguʋa yaɀo, newaini yaŋgu itȿa nenhambo yaɀo, ndicabvisa makushe aŋgu necinda yaŋgu ɀaifanira kufukidza kushama kwake.
Ɀino ndicafukura kunyadzisa kwake pamberi paʋaɗikani ʋake, hakuna‐uŋgamurwira paruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ndicagumisa ʋo mufaro wake wose, nemitambo yake,
Ndicaparadza mizambiriŋga yake nemiʋonde yake, yaaiti: Ndiwo muɓairo waŋgu wandakapiwa naʋaɗikani ʋaŋgu; ndicaɀiita ɗondo, mhuka dzokusaŋgo dzicaɀidya.
Ndicamuraŋga nokuɗa kwamazuʋa aʋaBaari, ʋaaipisira ɀinonhuwira, acishoŋga ɀindori ɀake ɀenzeʋe neɀishoŋgo ɀake, akateʋera ʋaɗikani ʋake, akandikaŋganwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Saka tarirai, ndicamunyeŋgera nokumuisa kurenje, ndicitaura ɀinofadza mŋoyo wake.
Ndicamupa minda yake yemizambiriŋga ɀicibva ipapo, nomupata waAkori uʋe mukoʋa wetariro kwaari; ucapindura ari’po, sapamazuʋa oʋusikana bgake, ʋuye sapazuʋa raakaɓuɗa panyika yeEgipita.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ucandiidza Ishi, hauŋgazondiidzi Baari.
Nokuti ndicabvisa mazita aʋaBaari mumuromo make, haʋaŋgazozikanwi namazita aʋo.
Nezuʋa iro ndicaʋaitira suŋgano nemhuka dzokusaŋgo, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga, neɀinokambaira ɀapasi; ndicavuna ʋuta nomunondo nehondo panyika, ndiʋaʋatise pasi ʋakaceŋgetwa.
Ndicakunyeŋga uʋe waŋgu nokusiŋgaperi; ɀirokwaɀo ndicakunyeŋga uʋe waŋgu nokururama, nokururamisira, noʋunyoro, nenyasha.
Ndicakunyeŋga uʋe waŋgu nokutendeka; ipapo ucaziʋa Jehova.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ndicapindura — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicapindura ɗeŋga rose, iro ricapindura nyika;
nyika icapindura ɀiyo, newaini itȿa, namafuta; iɀo ɀicapindura Jezreeri.
Ndicaɀisimira iye panyika; ndicamunzwira nyasha, iye wakaŋga asina‐kunzwirwa nyasha; ndicati kunaiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu: Imi muri ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, iʋo ʋacati:
Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Cienda ɀe, undoɗa mukadzi unoɗikanwa nomurume wake, asiciri cifeʋe, seɀinoɗa Jehova ʋana ʋaIsraeri, kunyaŋge ʋacitsaukira kunaʋamŋe ʋamŋari, ʋaciɗa mapundu amazambiriŋga.
Naiɀoɀo ndakamuteŋga namasirveri anegumi namashanu, nehomeri yebari, nehomeri hafu yebari;
ndikati kwaari: Ucafanira kundimirira mazuʋa mazhinji; haufaniri kupata, haufaniri kuʋa mukadzi womumŋe murume; neni ʋo ndicaita saiɀoɀo kwauri.
Nokuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacagara mazuʋa mazhinji ʋasinamambo, ʋasinomucinda, ʋasineɀiɓayiro, ʋasineshoŋgwe, ʋasineefodi kana terafimi.
Pashure ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacadzoka ʋacitȿaka Jehova Mŋari waʋo naDavidi mambo waʋo; ʋacaʋuya kunaJehova ʋacitya, nokuʋunyoro bgake namazuʋa okupedzisira.
Inzwai shoko raJehova, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, nokuti Jehova unegakaʋa naʋanhu ʋagere munyika ino, nokuti hakuneɀokwaɗi, kana ʋunyoro, kana kuziʋa Mŋari munyika ino.
Hakuneɀimŋe asi kupika, nokunyeŋgera, nokuʋuraya, nokuɓa, nokuita ʋupombge; ʋanopaza dzimba, kuteʋura ropa kunoramba kuciteʋera kuteʋura ropa.
Saka nyika icacema, mumŋe nomumŋe ugere’mo ucapera simba, pamŋe cete nemhuka dzesaŋgo neshiri dzokuɗeŋga; naidzo hoʋe dzeguŋgwa dzicabviswa.
Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unokakaʋara kana munhu unotuka; nokuti ʋanhu ʋako ʋakaita saʋanokakaʋara nomuprista.
Iwe ucagumburwa masikati, nomuprofita ucagumburwa ʋo pamŋe cete newe ʋusiku; ndicaparadza mai ʋako.
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaparadzwa nokushaiwa ziʋo; ɀawaramba ziʋo, neni ndicakuramba ʋo, kuti urege kuʋa muprista waŋgu; ɀawakaŋganwa murairo waMŋari wako, neni ʋo ndicakaŋganwa ʋana ʋako.
Ʋakati ʋaciwanda, kunditadzira kwaʋo kukawanda ʋo, ndicashandura kukudzwa kwaʋo ndikuite kunyadziswa.
Ʋakaguta ne
Saka ɀakaita ʋanhu, ndiɀo ɀicaita muprista ʋo; ndicaʋaroʋa pamsoro penzira dzaʋo, ndicaʋaripidzira ɀaʋanoɓata.
Ʋacadya, asi haʋaŋgaguti; ʋacapata, asi haʋaŋgawandi, nokuti ʋakarega kuʋa nehanya naJehova.
Kufeʋa newaini newaini itȿa ɀinobvisa njere.
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋanobvunza mano paɗanda raʋo, ʋanoziʋiswa netȿimbo yaʋo; nokuti mŋeya wokufeʋa wakaʋatadzisa, ʋakapata, ndokurasha Mŋari waʋo.
Ʋanoɓayira pamsoro pamakomo, ʋanopisira ɀinonhuwira paɀikomo, napasi pemiouki, nemipoprari, nemiterebini, nokuti mimvuri yayo yakanaka; naiɀoɀo ʋakunda ʋenyu ʋanopata, mŋeŋga yenyu inofeʋa.
Handiŋgaroʋi ʋakunda ʋenyu kana ʋacipata, nemŋeŋga yenyu kana icifeʋa; nokuti
Kunyaŋge imi, Israeri, mucipata, Juda ŋgaʋarege kupara mhaka; musaȿika Girgari, musakwira Beti‐aveni, ʋuye musapika,
Nokuti Israeri ʋanokoma, setsiru rinokoma; ɀino Jehova ucaʋafudza segwaiana panɀimbo mhamhi.
Efraimi unonamatirana neɀifananidzo, muregei.
Ɀaʋanonwa ɀinoʋaʋa; ʋanoramba ʋacipata; ʋaɓati ʋaʋo ʋanofarira ɀikuru ɀinonyadzisa.
Mhepo yakaʋaputira namapapiro ayo; ʋacanyadziswa nokuɗa kweɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo.
Inzwai shoko iri, imi ʋaprista, tererai imi imba yaIsraeri, rerekerai nzeʋe
Ʋaka
Ndinoziʋa Efraimi, Israeri haʋana‐kuʋanzika pamberi paŋgu; nokuti ɀino, iwe Efraimi, wakapata, Israeri ʋakaȿiɓiswa.
Ɀaʋakaita haɀiʋatenderi kudzokera kunaMŋari waʋo; nokuti mŋeya wokufeʋa uri mukati maʋo, haʋaziʋi Jehova.
Kuɀikudza kwaIsraeri kunoʋapupurira pacena; saka Israeri naEfraimi ʋacagumburwa paɀakaipa ɀaʋo, Juda ʋacagumburwa ʋo pamŋe cete naʋo.
Ʋacaenda namakwai aʋo neŋombe dzaʋo kundotȿaka Jehova, asi haʋaŋgamuwani; wakaenda kure naʋo.
Ʋakanyeŋgera Jehova, nokuti ʋakaɓereka ʋana ʋasati ʋari ʋaʋo; ɀino mutambo wokugara kwomŋedzi ucaʋapedza pamŋe cete neminda yaʋo.
Ridzai mumanzi paGibea, nehwamanda paRama; ridzai mhere paBeti‐aveni: Ʋari shure kwako, iwe Benjamini!
Efraimi icaitwa matoŋgo nezuʋa rokutukwa; ndakaziʋisa pakati paIsraeri ɀicazoʋa’po ɀirokwaɀo.
Macinda aJuda akafanana naʋanobvisa ciratidzo cemiganho; ndicaɗurura kutsamŋa kwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo semvura.
Efraimi wakamanikidzwa, wakapxanyiwa nokutoŋgwa, nokuti wakaŋga acitenda kuteʋera murairo
Naiɀoɀo ndicaʋa kunaEfraimi secipfunho, ʋuye sokuʋora kuimba yaJuda.
Efraimi wakati aciʋona kurwara kwake, naJuda ʋaŋga rake, Efraimi akaenda Asiria, akatuma
Nokuti ndicaʋa seshumba kunaEfraimi, ʋuye seshumba ɗuku kuimba yaJuda; ini, iyeni, ndicabvambura ndokuenda; ndica
Ndicaenda ndicidzokera kunɀimbo yaŋgu, kuȿikira ʋatenda kutadza kwaʋo, ʋakatȿaka ciso caŋgu; pakutambudzika kwaʋo ʋacanditȿaka nomŋoyo wose.
Ʋuyai, tidzokere kunaJehova; nokuti wakabvambura, asi ucatipodza
Kana mazuʋa maʋiri apera ucatiraramisa, nezuʋa recitatu ucatimutsa ɀe, tirarame pamberi pake.
Ŋgati
Haiwa, Efraimi, ndicakuitei? Haiwa, Juda ndicakuitei? Nokuti kunaka kwenyu kwakaita semhute yamaŋgwanani, ʋuye seɗoʋa rinokurumidza kuenda.
Naiɀoɀo ndakaʋatema naʋaprofita; ndakaʋaʋuraya namashoko omuromo waŋgu, ɀandakatoŋga ɀakaita seciedza cinoɓuɗa.
Nokuti ndinoɗa ruɗo, handiɗi ɀiɓayiro, ʋuye kuziʋa Mŋari kupfuʋura ɀipiriso ɀinopiswa.
Asi ʋakaɗarika suŋgano saAdama, ndipapo paʋakandinyeŋgera.
Gireadi iguta raʋanoita ɀakaipa, rinamakwapa eropa.
Seɀakaita makororo anoʋandira munhu, saiɀoɀo ɓoka raʋaprista rinoʋuraya panzira inoenda Shekemi; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakaita ɀinonyadzisa.
Paimba yaIsraeri ndakaʋona cinhu cinonyaŋgadza kwaɀo: Pakati paEfraimi panoʋufeʋe, Israeri ʋakaȿiɓiswa.
Newe ʋo, Juda, wakagadzirirwa kukohwa, neŋguʋa yandinodzosa kutapxa kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Kana ndicirapa Israeri, kuipa kwaEfraimi kwoʋonekwa neɀakashata ɀeSamaria; nokuti ʋanonyeŋgera, mbava inopinda mukati, ʋuye ɓoka ramakororo rinoparadza kunze.
Asi haʋafuŋgi mumŋoyo yaʋo kuti ndinoraŋgarira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose; ɀino ɀaʋakaita ɀinoʋakomberedza, ɀiri pamberi paŋgu.
Ʋanofadza mambo neɀakashata ɀaʋo, namacinda nenhema dzaʋo.
Ʋose imhombge; ʋakafanana necoto cakaʋeserwa nomuɓiki weciŋgwa; unorega kukucidzira mŋoto, kana akanya ɓundu reciŋgwa, kuȿikira raʋira.
Nezuʋa ramambo weɗu macinda akarwariswa nokupisa kwewaini; iye wakatambanudza ruʋoko rwake pamŋe cete naʋaseki.
Nokuti ʋakagadzira mŋoyo yaʋo secoto, ʋaciʋandira; muɓiki waʋo weciŋgwa unoʋata ʋusiku bgose, maŋgwanani cinopfuta somuraɀo womŋoto.
Ʋanopisa ʋose secoto, ʋanoparadza ʋatoŋgi ʋaʋo; madzimambo aʋo ose akawira pasi, hakuna‐nomumŋe pakati paʋo unoɗana kwandiri.
Efraimi ndiye unoɀiveŋganisa namamŋe marudzi; Efraimi ciŋgwa cisino‐kushandurwa.
Ʋatorwa ʋakapedza simba rake, asi iye haaɀiziʋi; ɀirokwaɀo vudzi rake rocena pose‐pose, asi iye haaɀiziʋi.
Kuɀikudza kwaIsraeri kunopupura pamberi pake, asi haʋana‐kudzokera kunaJehova Mŋari waʋo, kana kumutȿaka, kunyaŋge iɀi ɀose ɀakaɗaro.
Efraimi wakaita senjiʋa isinamano, isinenjere; ʋanoɗana Egipita, ʋanoenda Asiria.
Kana ʋacienda, ndicakandira mumbure waŋgu pamsoro paʋo, ndicaʋakweʋera pasi seshiri dzokuɗeŋga; ndicaʋaraŋga seɀaʋakaʋudzwa paʋuŋgano yaʋo.
Ʋanenhamo iʋo, nokuti ʋakatsauka kwandiri; ŋgaʋaparadzwe, nokuti ʋakandiɗarikira; kunyaŋge ndakaŋga ndiciɗa kuʋadzikinura, ʋakandireʋera nhema.
Haʋana‐kuɗana kwandiri nemŋoyo yaʋo, asi ʋanowuŋgudza panhoʋo dzaʋo; ʋanoʋuŋganira ɀiyo newaini itȿa, ʋanondimukira.
Kunyaŋge ndakaʋadzidzisa nokusimbisa maʋoko aʋo, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanofuŋga kundiitira ɀakaipa.
Ʋanodzoka, asi haʋadzokeri kunaiye uri kumsoro; ʋakafanana noʋuta ʋunonyeŋgera; macinda aʋo acaparadzwa nomunondo nokuɗa kwehasha dzamarimi aʋo; ndiko kucaʋa kusekwa kwaʋo panyika yeEgipita.
Ʋacaɗana kwandiri,
Israeri ʋakarasha ɀakanaka; muʋeŋgi waʋo ucaʋateʋerera.
Ʋakagadza madzimambo, asi haʋana‐kurairwa neni; ʋakaɀitsaurira macinda, ini ndisiŋgaɀiziʋi; ʋakaɀiitira ɀifananidzo nesirveri ʋuye nendarama yaʋo, kuti ɀiparadzwe.
Mhuru yako, iwe Samaria, inonyaŋgadza; kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kwakaʋamukira; ʋacanonoka kuȿikira riniko kuʋa ʋakanaka?
Nokuti cinhu ici cakabva ʋo kuʋaIsraeri; mupfuri wakaciita, hacizi Mŋari; ɀirokwaɀo, mhuru yeSamaria icaputswa‐putswa.
Nokuti ʋanodɀara mhepo, ʋacaceka campupuri; haʋaneɀiyo
Israeri ʋakamedzwa; ɀino ʋaʋa pakati pamarudzi somudziyo usiŋgaɗikanwi nomunhu.
Nokuti ʋakaenda Asiria, sembizi inoŋgoɀifambira iri yoga; ʋaEfraimi ʋakaɀitȿakira shamŋari ʋacidziripira.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge ʋaciɀitȿakira idzo pakati pamarudzi, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza ɀino, ʋotaŋga kutapudzwa nemhaka yokuremedzwa namambo wamacinda.
Efraimi ɀaakawanza maartari okutadza nawo, maartari
Ndakamunyorera mashoko aneɀuru ɀinegumi omurairo waŋgu, asi ʋanoti ndeɀaʋatorwa.
Kana ɀiri ɀiɓayiro ɀeɀipiriso ɀaŋgu, ʋanoɓayira nyama ndokuidya; asi Jehova haana‐kuɀigamucira; ɀino ucaraŋgarira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo, nokuʋaroʋa pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo; ʋacadzokera Egipita.
Nokuti Israeri ʋakakaŋganwa Muiti waʋo, ʋakaʋaka dzimba dzoʋushe; Juda ʋakawanza maguta akakomberedzwa namaȿiŋgo; asi ini ndicatuma mŋoto kumaguta aʋo, ucapedza dzimba dzoʋushe dzawo.
Regai kufara, imi Israeri, mucifarisisa samarudzi aʋanhu; nokuti makapata, mucisiya Mŋari wenyu; makaɗa muɓairo wokufeʋa pamapuriro ose eɀiyo.
Ƃuriro neciȿiniro cewaini haɀiŋgaʋagutsi, waini itȿa icaʋanyeŋgera.
Haʋaŋgagari munyika yaJehova; asi Efraimi ʋacadzokera Egipita, ʋacadya ɀokudya ɀinetȿina paAsiria.

Haʋaŋgaɗiriri Jehova waini, ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo haɀiŋgamufadzi; ɀiɓayiro ɀaʋo ɀicaita kwaʋari seɀokudya ɀaʋanocema; ʋose, ʋanoɀidya, ʋacaȿiɓiswa, nokuti ɀokudya ɀaʋo ndeɀaʋo ɀoga, haɀiŋgaȿiki muimba yaJehova.
Mucaɓateiko nezuʋa reʋuŋgano dzakatarwa, nezuʋa remitambo yaJehova?
Nokuti tarirai, ʋakabva nokuɗa kwokuparadzwa, asi ʋaEgipita ʋacaʋaʋuŋganidza, ʋeMemfisi ʋacaʋaʋiga; rukato rucaʋatorera ɀinhu ɀaʋo ɀesirveri ɀinofadza; minzwa icaʋa mumatente aʋo.
Mazuʋa okurobga aȿika, mazuʋa okutsiʋa aȿika; Israeri ʋacaɀiziʋa; muprofita iɓenzi, munhu unomŋeya unopeŋga, nemhaka yokuwanda kweɀakaipa ɀenyu, ʋuye nokuti ruʋeŋgo rukuru.
Efraimi mushori kunaMŋari waŋgu; kana ari muprofita, rugombe rwomuteyi weshiri ruri munzira dzake dzose, noruʋeŋgo muimba yaMŋari wake.
Ʋakaɀishatisa ɀikuru kwaɀo, sapamazuʋa eGibea; ucaraŋgarira ɀakaipa ɀaʋo, ucaʋaroʋa pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo.

Ndakawana Israeri ʋakaita samazambiriŋga murenje; ndakaʋona madziɓaɓa enyu ʋakaita seɀiɓereko ɀakataŋga kuibva pamuʋonde paŋguʋa yawo yokuɓereka yokutaŋga; asi ʋakaȿika paBaari‐peori, ʋakaɀiisa kuneɀinonyadzisa, ʋakaitwa ɀinonyaŋgadza ʋacifanana neɀaiɗikanwa naʋo.
Kana ʋari Efraimi, kukudzwa kwaʋo kucabururuka seshiri; kuɓereka hakuŋgaʋi’po, kana kukurirwa, kana kunaka pamuʋiri.
Kunyaŋge ʋakarera ʋana ʋaʋo, ndicaʋatorera iʋo, kuȿikira kusisinomunhu; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacaʋa nenhamo ʋo, kana ini ndaʋasiya.
Seɀandakatsaura Tire, Efraimi ʋakasimŋa pakanaka; asi Efraimi ʋacaɓuɗisira muʋurayi ʋana ʋaʋo.
Ciʋapai, Jehova — mucaʋapeiko? Ciʋapai ɀiɀaro ɀinoshaya namazamu asinomukaka.
Ɀakaipa ɀaʋo ɀose ɀiri paGirgari, nokuti ndi’po pandakaʋaʋeŋga; nemhaka yeɀakaipa ɀaʋanoita ndicaʋadziŋga paimba yaŋgu, handicaʋaɗi; macinda aʋo ose aka
Efraimi ʋarobga, mudzi waʋo wawoma, haʋaŋgazoɓereki ɀiɓereko; ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge ʋakaɓereka, ndicaʋuraya ʋaɗikanwa ʋakaɓerekwa neɀiɀaro ɀaʋo.
Mŋari waŋgu ucaʋarasha, nokuti haʋana‐kumunzwa; ʋacaʋa ʋadzuŋgairi pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu.
ƲaIsraeri muzambiriŋga unotanda ɀakanaka, unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀawo; ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo ɀakati ɀiciwanda, ʋakawanza ʋo maartari aʋo; nyika yaʋo yakati icifara, iʋo ʋakaɀiitira ʋo shoŋgwe dzakanaka.
Mŋoyo yaʋo inonyeŋgera, ɀino ʋacapiwa mhaka; ucaroʋa maartari aʋo, ucaparadza shoŋgwe dzaʋo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀino ʋacati: Hatinamambo, nokuti hatityi Jehova; kana ari mambo uŋgatiitireiko?
Ʋanotaura mashoko asinamaturo, ʋanopika nhema pakuita kwaʋo suŋgano; naiɀoɀo kutoŋgwa kwaʋo kunomera somuti unoʋuraya mumihoroŋga yomunda.
Ʋagere Samaria ʋacatya mhuru dzeBeti‐aveni; nokuti ʋanhu ʋaro ʋacaicema, naʋaprista ʋaro ʋaiifarira, nokuɗa kwokukudzwa kwayo, nokuti kwabva kwairi.
Icaiswa ʋo Asiria, ciʋe cipo camambo Jarebi; Efraimi ʋacanyadziswa, Israeri ʋacanyadziswa namano aʋo.
Kana riri Samaria, mambo waro waparadzwa secipande pamsoro pemvura.
Nɀimbo dzakakwirira dzeAveni ʋo, iɀo ɀiʋi ɀaIsraeri, dzicaparadzwa; munzwa norukato ɀicamera pamaartari aʋo; ɀino ʋacati kumakomo: Tifukidzei, nokuɀikomo: Wirai pamsoro peɗu.
Haiwa, Israeri, makatadza kubva pamazuʋa eGibea; ndi’po paʋakamira; ko ʋacakundwa nehondo inorwa naʋana ʋeɀakaipa paGibea here?
Ŋguʋa yandinoɗa ndicaʋaraŋga; marudzi aʋanhu acaʋaʋuŋganira kana ʋakasuŋgirwa paɀisakarurama ɀaʋo ɀiʋiri.
Efraimi itsiru rakapiŋgudzwa, rinofarira kupura ɀiyo; asi ini ndimene ndaȿika pamutsipa waro wakanaka, ndaisa mutaȿi pamsoro paEfraimi; Juda ʋacarima, Jakobo ucaputsa maviŋga ake.
Ɀidɀarirei mukururama, mugoceka ɀoruɗo; ʋundai makombo enyu, nokuti iŋguʋa yokutȿaka Jehova, kuȿikira aciʋuya acikunisirai ɀakarurama.
Makarima ɀakashata, makaceka ɀakaipa, makadya ɀiɓereko ɀenhema, nokuti makaŋga muciʋimba nenzira yenyu, ʋuye nokuwanda kwemhare dzenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ɓope ricamuka pakati paʋanhu ʋenyu, nhare dzenyu dzose dzicaparadzwa, Sharmani seɀaakaparadza Beti‐arberi nezuʋa rokurwa; mai ʋakaputsanyiwa pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaʋo.
Ndiɀo ɀamucaitirwa neBeti‐eri nemhaka yokushata kwenyu kukuru; mambo waIsraeri ucaparadzwa cose mambakwedza.
Israeri aciri mŋana muɗuku, ndaimuɗa, ndikaɗana mŋanakomana waŋgu abve Egipita.
ʋacinyanya kuʋaɗana, iʋo ʋakanyanya kuʋatiza; ʋakaɓayira ʋaBaari, nokupisira ɀifananidzo ɀakaʋezwa ɀinonhuwira.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ini ndakadzidzisa Efraimi kufamba; ndakaʋatakura mumaʋoko aŋgu, asi haʋana‐kuziʋa kuti ndini ndakaʋaporesa.
Ndakaʋakakata namaɓote omunhu, neɀisuŋgo ɀoruɗo; ndakaʋa kwaʋari somunhu unobvisa joko pashaya dzaʋo, ndikagadza ɀokudya pamberi paʋo.
Haʋaŋgadzokeri kunyika yeEgipita, asi muAsiria ndiye ucaʋa mambo waʋo, nokuti ʋakaramba kudzokera
Munondo ucaʋa nehasha pakati pamaguta aʋo, ucapedza ɀipfigiso ɀaʋo noku
Ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋanoramba ʋaciɗa kudzokera shure ʋacindisiya; kunyaŋge ʋaciɗanwa kunoWokumsoro, haʋatoŋgosimuki.

Ndiŋgakuregedza seiko, iwe Efraimi? Ndiŋgakurasha seiko, iwe Israeri? Ndiŋgakuita seiko seAdma? Ndiŋgakuenzanisa seiko neZeboimi? Mŋoyo waŋgu washandukurwa mukati maŋgu, tsitsi dzaŋgu dzamutswa pamŋe cete.
Handiŋgaiti nokutsamŋa kwaŋgu kukuru, handiŋgadzoki ndiciti ndiparadze Efraimi; nokuti ndiri Mŋari, handizi munhu, ndini Mutȿene pakati penyu, handiŋgaʋuyi ndakatsamŋa.
Ʋacateʋera Jehova, aciʋomba seshumba; nokuti ucaʋomba, ʋana ʋacaʋuya ʋaciɗeɗera ʋacibva maʋirazuʋa.
Ʋacaʋuya ʋaciɗeɗera seshiri ʋacibva Egipita, senjiʋa ʋacibva panyika yeAsiria; ini ndicaʋagarisa mudzimba dzaʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Efraimi ʋakandikombera nenhema, ʋuye imba yaIsraeri nokunyeŋgera; Juda ʋanoŋgoramba ʋacipeŋga pamberi paMŋari, pamberi paiye Mutȿene wakatendeka.
Efraimi ʋanoɀigutisa nemhepo, ʋanoteʋerera mhepo yokumabvazuʋa; ʋanoramba ʋaciwedzera nhema nokuparadza; ʋanoita suŋgano neAsiria, ʋuye mafuta anoiswa Egipita.
Jehova unegakaʋa naJuda ʋo, ucaroʋa Jakobo pamsoro penzira dzake, ucamuripira pamsoro peɀaakaita.
Muciɀaro wakaɓata cicitsinho comukuru wake, aʋa nesimba romurume wakaita mitsimba naMŋari;
ɀirokwaɀo, wakaita mitsimba nomutumŋa akakunda; wakacema, akamunyeŋgetera; wakamuwana paBeti‐eri, akataura’po nesu,
iye Jehova, Mŋari wehondo; Jehova ndiro zita rokumuraŋgarira naro.
Naiɀoɀo cidzokera kunaMŋari wako; ceŋgeta ruɗo nokururamisa, urambe ucimirira Mŋari wako.
Iye muKanani, ɀiyero ɀinonyeŋgera ɀiri muruʋoko rwake, unofarira kumanikidza.
Asi Efraimi unoti: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndafuma, ndaɀiwanira fuma; pamaɓasa aŋgu ose haʋaŋgawani kwandiri ɀakaipa ɀeɀiʋi.
Asi ndini Jehova Mŋari wako, kubva panyika yeEgipita; ndicakugarisai ɀe mumatente, sapamazuʋa emitambo yakatarwa.
Ndakataura ʋo naʋaprofita, ndikawanza ɀandakaʋaratidza; ndakaʋataurira ɀifananidzo nemiromo yaʋaprofita.
Ko
Jakobo wakatizira kunyika yeArami, Israeri wakaɓatira mukadzi, wakafudza
Jehova wakaɓuɗisa Israeri paEgipita nomuprofita, akazoceŋgetwa nomuprofita.
Efraimi ʋakatsamŋisa
Efraimi ʋakati ʋacitaura, kuɗeɗera kukaʋa’po; ʋakaɀikudza pakati paIsraeri; asi wakati apara mhaka naBaari, akafa.

Asi ɀino ʋanoŋgoramba ʋaciwedzera ɀiʋi ɀaʋo, ʋakaɀiitira ɀifananidzo ɀakaʋumbga nesirveri yaʋo, ɀiri ɀifananidzo ɀenjere dzaʋo, ɀose ɀiri ɓasa remhizha; ɀino ʋanoti pamsoro paɀo: Ʋanoɓayira mhuru ŋgaʋadziȿete.
Saka ʋacaita semhute yamaŋgwanani, seɗoʋa rinokurumidza kunyaŋgarika, sehundi inopepereswa necampupuri paɓuriro, soʋutsi bgecoto ʋunoɓuɗa napaʋuri.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndini Jehova Mŋari wako kubva panyika yeEgipita; hamuziʋi mumŋe mŋari asi ini, hakunomumŋe muponesi kunze kwaŋgu.
Ndakakuziʋai murenje, munyika yakawoma kwaɀo.
Ɀaʋakapiwa mafuro
Saka ndaʋa kwaʋari seshumba, ndicaʋagarira panzira seŋgwe;
ndicarwa naʋo seɓere rakatorerwa ʋana ʋaro, ndicatsemura cifukidziro comŋoyo waʋo; ndicaʋadyira’po seshumbakadzi; ɀikara ɀicaʋabvamburanya.
Ndiɀo ɀicakuparadzai, imi Israeri, ɀamunorwa neni, ini muɓatsiri wenyu.
Ko ɀino mambo wenyu uripi, akuponesei mumaguta enyu ose? Ko ʋatoŋgi ʋenyu
Ndakakupai mambo pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu, ndikamubvisa ɀe nehasha dzaŋgu.
Ɀakaipa ɀaEfraimi ɀakasuŋgwa pamŋe cete, ɀiʋi ɀake ɀakaceŋgetwa.
Kurwadziwa kwomukadzi unosurumuka kucaȿika kwaari; iye mŋanakomana usinenjere; nokuti kana ŋguʋa iciȿika, haasweɗeri pakuɀarwa.
Ndicaʋadzikinura pasimba reSheori, ndicaʋadzikinura parufu. Haiwa, rufu, hosha dzako dziripiko? Haiwa, Sheori, kuparadza kwako kuripi? Kuɀiɗemba hakuŋgaʋonekwi nameso aŋgu.

Kunyaŋge akaɓereka ɀiɓereko pakati pehama dzake, mhepo yokumabvazuʋa icaȿika, iri mhepo yaJehova inobva kurenje; cituɓu cake cicapxa, tsime rake ricawoma; iye ucapamba fuma yenhumbi dzose dzinoɗikanwa.
Samaria ricaʋa nemhoȿa yaro, nokuti ʋakamukira Mŋari waʋo; ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo, ʋacece ʋaʋo ʋacaputsanyiwa, ʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋanemimba ʋacatumburwa.
Haiwa, imi Israeri, dzokerai kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu, nokuti makagumburwa neɀakaipa ɀenyu.
Endai namashoko, mudzokere kunaJehova, muti kwaari: Bvisai ɀakaipa ɀose, mugamucire ɀinhu ɀakanaka, ipapo ticakupai miromo yeɗu, ɀiʋe ɀiɓayiro
Asiria haʋaŋgatiponesi; hatiŋgataȿi mabiza, hatiŋgazoti kuɓasa ramaʋoko eɗu:
Ndicaporesa kudzokera kwaʋo shure, ndicaʋaɗa nokuɗa kwaŋgu; nokuti kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kwabviswa kwaʋari.
Ndicaʋa seɗoʋa kunaIsraeri, ʋacatuŋga seruʋa, ʋacatanda midzi yaʋo seRebanoni.
Mataʋi aʋo acatanda, kunaka kwaʋo kucafanana nomuorivi, nokunhuwira kwaʋo sokweRebanoni.
Ʋanogara mumumvuri waʋo ʋacadzoka, ʋacararama seɀiyo, nokutuŋga maruʋa somuzambiriŋga; kurumbidzwa kwaʋo kucafanana newaini yeRebanoni.
Efraimi, ndicineiko neɀifananidzo? Ndakapindura, ndinehanya naye; ndakafanana nomuʋonde mutema, ɀiɓereko ɀako ɀicawanikwa kwandiri.
Ndianiko wakacenjera, anzwisise ɀinhu iɀi, kana wakaŋgwara, aɀiziʋe? Nokuti nzira dzaJehova dzakarurama, ʋakarurama ʋacafamba nadzo; asi ʋaɗariki ʋacawa madziri.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kunaJoere mŋanakomana waPetueri.
Inzwai cinhu ici, imi ʋatana, murereke nzeʋe dzenyu, imi mose mugere munyika ino. Ko ɀakaɗai ɀakamboitwa pamazuʋa enyu, kana pamazuʋa amadziɓaɓa enyu here?
Ʋudzai ʋana ʋenyu iɀoɀo, ʋana ʋenyu ʋaʋudze ʋo ʋana ʋaʋo, naʋana ʋaʋo
Ɀakasiyiwa nomuteteni, ɀakadyiwa nemhashu; ɀakasiyiwa nemhashu, ɀakadyiwa negwatakwata; ɀakasiyiwa negwatakwata, ɀakadyiwa nomupedzacose.
Mukai, imi ʋakaɓatwa neɗoro, muceme; wuŋgudzai, imi mose munonwa waini, nemhaka yewaini inonaka, nokuti yabviswa pamiromo yenyu.
Nokuti rumŋe rudzi rwaȿika panyika yaŋgu, rwakasimba, rusiŋgaʋereŋgwi; meno arwo meno eshumba, runameno makuru eshumbakadzi.
Rwakaparadza muzambiriŋga waŋgu, nokuvuna muʋonde waŋgu; rwakauȿuʋura kwaɀo, nokuuwisira pasi; mataʋi awo aceneswa.
Cemai semhandara yakaɀisuŋga ciʋuno namasaga nokuɗa kwomurume woʋumhandara bgayo.
Cipiriso coʋupfu necipiriso cinonwiwa ɀabviswa paimba yaJehova; ʋaprista, iʋo ʋashumiri ʋaJehova, ʋanocema.
Munda waparadzwa, nyika inocema; nokuti ɀiyo ɀaparadzwa, waini itȿa yapxa, mafuta apera.
Nyarai imi ʋarimi, wuŋgudzai imi ʋarimi ʋemizambiriŋga, nokuɗa kweɀiyo nebari; nokuti ɀakaɓerekwa neminda ɀaparadzwa.
Muzambiriŋga waȿaʋa, muʋonde unoshaiwa simba; mutamba nomucindwe ʋo, nomuapuri, nemiti yose yomunda yawoma; mufaro waʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu wapera.
Ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno
Tsaurai zuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya, ɗanai ʋanhu kuʋuŋgano yakatarwa, kokerai ʋakuru naʋose ʋagere panyika kuimba yaJehova Mŋari wenyu, muɗane kunaJehova.
Haiwa, zuʋa iro here! Nokuti zuʋa raJehova raʋa pedyo, ricaȿika riciparadza ricibva kunaWamasimba‐ose.
Ko ɀokudya haɀinakubviswa pamberi peɗu, nomufaro nokufarisisa paimba yaMŋari weɗu here?
Mbeu dzinoʋorera pasi pamaviŋga adzo; matura aparadzwa, tsapi dzaputswa; nokuti ɀiyo ɀafa.
Ɀipfuwo ɀinogomera sei! Mapoka eŋombe akaŋganiswa, nokuti haɀicinamafuro; ɀirokwaɀo, mapoka amakwai aparadzwa.
Haiwa, Jehova, ndinoɗana kwamuri, nokuti mŋoto wapedza mafuro erenje, muraɀo wapisa miti yose yokusaŋgo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, mhuka dzokusaŋgo dzinocemera kwamuri, nokuti hoʋa dzemvura dzapxa, ʋuye mŋoto wapedza mafuro erenje.
Ridzai hwamanda paZioni, muridze mhere pagomo raŋgu dɀene; ʋose ʋagere panyika ŋgaʋaɗeɗere, nokuti zuʋa raJehova rinoʋuya, nokuti raʋa pedyo;
zuʋa rerima nokuȿiɓa, zuʋa ramakore nerima guru, samambakwedza akawarirwa pamakomo;
Mŋoto unoparadza pamberi paʋo, muraɀo unopfuta shure kwaʋo; nyika yakaita somunda weEdeni pamberi paʋo, ʋuye serenje rakaparadzwa shure kwaʋo; ɀirokwaɀo, hakuna‐wakapukunyuka kwaʋari.
Pakuʋonekwa kwaʋo ʋakafanana namabiza; saʋataȿi ʋamabiza, ndiko kumhanya kwaʋo.
Kuuruka kwaʋo pamsoro pamakomo kunoita somubvumo weŋgoro, somubvumo womuraɀo womŋoto unoparadza mashaŋga, saʋanhu ʋanesimba ʋakagadzirirwa kurwa.
Kana ʋaciȿika, ʋanhu ʋose ʋanotya kwaɀo, ɀiso ɀose ɀinoceneruka.
Ʋanomhanya saʋanhu ʋanesimba, ʋanokwira ruȿiŋgo saʋarwi, ʋanofamba mumŋe nomumŋe nenzira yake, haʋatoŋgotsauki pamisara yaʋo.
Haʋasundidzirani, mumŋe nomumŋe unofamba negwara rake; ʋanopxanya napakati penhumbi dzokurwa, ʋasiŋgatsauki.
Ʋanowira guta, ʋanomhanyira pamsoro poruȿiŋgo, ʋanokwira ʋacipinda mudzimba, ʋanopinda napamawindi sembava.
Nyika inoɗeɗera pamberi paʋo, ɗeŋga rose rinobvunda, zuʋa nomŋedzi ɀinoȿiɓa, nyeredzi dzinodzora kupenya kwadzo.
Jehova unoɓuɗisa inzwi rake pamberi pehondo yake, nokuti hondo yake ihuru kwaɀo; nokuti muiti weɀaakataura unesimba; nokuti zuʋa raJehova iguru, rinotyisa kwaɀo, ndianiko uŋgatsuŋga naro?
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — naɀino tendeʋukirai kwandiri nemŋoyo yenyu yose, muciɀinyima ɀokudya, mucicema nokuwuŋgudza;
bvarurai mŋoyo yenyu, murege kubvarura ŋguʋo dzenyu, mutendeʋukire kunaJehova Mŋari wenyu; nokuti uneŋgoni nenyasha, unononoka kutsamŋa, unetsitsi zhinji, ʋuye unoɀiɗemba pa
Ndiani uŋgaziʋa, ɀimŋe uŋgadzoka akaɀiɗemba, akasiya mukomborero kana acibva, ɀimŋe cipiriso coʋupfu kana cipiriso cinonwiwa ɀamuŋgaʋigira Jehova Mŋari wenyu?
Ridzai hwamanda paZioni, tsaurai zuʋa rokuɀinyima ɀokudya, ɗanai ʋanhu kuʋuŋgano yakatarwa;
kokerai ʋanhu, natsai ʋuŋgano, kokerai ʋakuru, ʋuŋganidzai ʋana, naʋanomna pamazamu; cikomba ŋgaciɓuɗe paimba yaco nomŋeŋga paimba yake yokuʋata.
