Ʋaprista, iʋo ʋashumiri ʋaJehova, ŋgaʋaceme pakati peɓiraʋira neartari, ʋati: Haiwa, Jehova, regai ʋanhu ʋenyu, musaisa nhaka yenyu pakushoʋorwa, kuti marudzi aʋanhu aʋaseke; ʋaŋgareʋereiko pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu, ʋaciti: Mŋari waʋo uripiko?
Ipapo Jehova akaʋa negodo pamsoro penyika yake, akanzwira ʋanhu ʋake tsitsi.
Jehova akapindura, akati kuʋanhu ʋake: Tarirai, ndicakutumirai ɀiyo, newaini itȿa, namafuta, mugoguta naɀo; handicakuitiyi cinhu cinoshoʋorwa pakati pamarudzi;
asi ndicabvisa kure nemi
Rega hako kutya, iwe nyika, fara ufarisise; nokuti Jehova wakaita ɀinhu ɀikuru.
Regai kutya, imi mhuka dzesaŋgo; nokuti mafuro erenje anoɓukira, nokuti miti inoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo, miʋonde nemizambiriŋga ɀinoʋigira
Naiɀoɀo farai, imi ʋana ʋeZioni, mufarisise munaJehova Mŋari wenyu; nokuti unokupai mudzidzisi wokururama, ʋuye unokunisirai mvura, mvura yokutaŋga nemvura yokuteʋerera, no
Mapuriro acazara neɀiyo, ʋuye ɀiȿiniro ɀicapafuma waini namafuta.
Ndicakudzoserai ɀe makore amakadyirwa nemhashu, negwatakwata, nomupedzacose, nomuteteni, iyo hondo yaŋgu huru yandakatuma pakati penyu.
Mucadya ɀakawanda, mukaguta, mukarumbidza zita raJehova Mŋari wenyu, wakakuitirai ɀinoshamisa; ʋanhu ʋaŋgu haʋaŋgatoŋgonyadziswi nokusiŋgaperi.
Ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndiri pakati paIsraeri, kuti ndini Jehova Mŋari wenyu, ʋuye kuti hakunomumŋe; ʋanhu ʋaŋgu haʋaŋgatoŋgonyadziswi nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo ndicaɗurura Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro penyama yose; ʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu ʋacaprofita, ʋatana ʋenyu ʋacarota hope, namajaya enyu acaʋona ɀiratidzo;
ndicaɗurura ʋo Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro paʋaranda napamsoro paʋashandiri namazuʋa iwayo.
Ndicaratidza ɀishamiso kuɗeŋga napanyika, ɀinoti: Ropa nomŋoto neshoŋgwe dzoʋutsi.
Zuʋa ricashanduka rima, mŋedzi
Ɀino aninani unoɗana zita raJehova ucarwirwa; nokuti pagomo reZioni napaJerusarema ndi’po pacaʋa naʋakapukunyuka, seɀakataura Jehova, napakati paʋakasara ndi’po pacaʋa ʋakaɗanwa naJehova.
Nokuti tarirai, namazuʋa iwayo neŋguʋa iyo, kana ndicidzosa kutapxa kwaJuda neJerusarema,

ndicaʋuŋganidza marudzi ose aʋanhu, nokuaɓurusira kumupata waJehoshafati; ndicaʋatoŋga’po pamsoro paʋanhu ʋaŋgu napamsoro penhaka yaŋgu Israeri, ʋakaparadzirwa naʋo pakati pamarudzi aʋanhu; ʋakagoʋana nyika yaŋgu,
ʋakakanda mijenya pamsoro paʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋakateŋga cifeʋe nomukomana, ʋakateŋgesa musikana ʋacipiwa waini, kuti ʋainwe.
Ɀirokwaɀo, imi Tire neSidoni nenyika dzose dzaFiristia, munoreʋeiko kwandiri? Munoɗa kunditsiʋa here? Kana mukanditsiʋa, ndicakudzoserai ɀamakaita pamisoro yenyu pakarepo nokukasira.
Ɀamakatora sirveri yaŋgu nendarama yaŋgu, mukandoisa mutembere dzenyu ɀinhu ɀaŋgu ɀakanaka ɀinoɗikanwa,
mukateŋgesa ʋana ʋaJuda naʋana ʋeJerusarema kuʋanakomana ʋaʋaGiriki, kuti muʋabvisire kure nenyika yaʋo;
tarirai, ndicaʋamutsa panɀimbo kwamakandoʋateŋgesa, ndidzosere pamisoro yenyu ɀamakaita;
ndicateŋgesa ʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu mumaʋoko aʋana ʋaJuda, iʋo ʋacandoʋateŋgesa kuʋanhu ʋeSheba, kurudzi ruri kure, nokuti Jehova wakataura iɀoɀo.
Paridzirai iɀoɀi pakati pamarudzi; ɀigadzirirei kurwa; kurudzirai ʋarume ʋanesimba; ʋarwi ʋose ŋgaʋasweɗere, ʋaende
Pfurai mapadza enyu iʋe minondo, namapaŋga enyu okucekerera miti aʋe mapfumo; usinesimba ŋgaati: Ndinesimba.
Cimbidzikai, muʋuye, imi marudzi ose akapoteredza, muʋuŋgane; imi Jehova, mhare dzenyu ŋgadziɓurukire’ko.
Marudzi aʋanhu ŋgaamuke, aende kumupata waJehoshafati; nokuti ndi’po pandicagara ndicitoŋga marudzi ose akapoteredza.
Isai ɓaŋga renyu
Ʋazhinji‐zhinji, ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋari’po mumupata wokutoŋga! Nokuti zuʋa raJehova raʋa pedyo mumupata wokutoŋga.
Zuʋa nomŋedzi ɀaȿiɓa, nyeredzi dzinobvisa kupenya kwadzo.
Jehova ucaʋomba ari paZioni, ucanzwisa inzwi rake ari paJerusarema; ɗeŋga rose nenyika ɀicaɗeŋgenyeka; asi Jehova ucaʋa ʋutiziro bgaʋanhu ʋake, nenhare yaʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini Jehova, Mŋari wenyu, ugere paZioni, iro gomo raŋgu dɀene; ipapo Jerusarema ricaʋa
Ɀino nezuʋa iro makomo acaɗonha waini inotapira, ɀikomo ɀicayerera mukaka, ʋuye hoʋa dzose dzaJuda dzicayerera mvura zhinji; mumba maJehova mucaɓuɗa tsime, ricaɗiridza mupata weShitimi.
Egipita ricaʋa ɗoŋgo, ʋuye Edomi ricaʋa renje rakaparadzwa, nemhaka yesimba rakaitirwa ʋana ʋaJuda, ɀaʋakateʋura ropa risinemhoȿa panyika yaʋo.
Asi Juda ʋacaʋa’po nokusiŋgaperi, ʋuye Jerusarema kuȿikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Ndicapembedza ropa raʋo randisina‐kumbopembedza; nokuti Jehova unogara paZioni.

Mashoko aAmosi, waiʋa mumŋe waʋafudzi ʋeTekoa, aakaʋona pamsoro paIsraeri namazuʋa aUzia mambo waJuda, ʋuye namazuʋa aJeroboami mŋanakomana waJoashi mambo waIsraeri, makore maʋiri acigere okuȿika kwokuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika.
Akati: Jehova ucaʋomba ari paZioni, ucanzwisa inzwi rake ari paJerusarema; mafuro aʋafudzi acacema, musoro weKarmeri ucawoma.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Damasko ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakapura Gireadi nemipuro yamatare.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto mumba maHazaeri, ucapedza dzimba dzoʋushe dzaBeni‐hadadi.
Ndicavuna cipfigiso ceDamasko, nokuparadza ʋagere mumupata weAveni nowakaɓata tȿimbo yoʋushe paBeti‐Edeni; ʋanhu ʋeSiria ʋacatapirwa Kiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Gaza ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakatapa rudzi rwose, kundoʋaisa kunaEdomi.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto kuruȿiŋgo rweGaza, ucapedza dzimba dzaro dzoʋushe.
Ndicaparadza ʋagere Ashdodi nowakaɓata tȿimbo yoʋushe paAshkeroni; ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kurwa naEkroni; ʋakasara ʋaʋaFiristia ʋacaparadzwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Tire ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakaisa rudzi rwose kunaEdomi ʋakasaraŋgarira suŋgano yoʋukama bgaʋo.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto kuruȿiŋgo rweTire, ucapedza dzimba dzaro dzoʋushe.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Edomi ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakateʋerera munuŋuna waʋo nomunondo, ʋakarasha tsitsi dzose, kutsamŋa kwake kukaramba kuciŋgobvambura, akaramba anehasha nokusiŋgaperi.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto paTemani, ucapedza dzimba dzoʋushe dzeBozra.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti ʋana ʋaAmoni ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakatumbura ʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋanemimba ʋeGireadi, kuti ʋakurise nyika yaʋo.
Asi ndicaɓatidza mŋoto paruȿiŋgo rweRaba, ucapedza dzimba dzaro dzoʋushe, ʋaciɗanidzira nezuʋa rokurwa, neɗutu guru remhepo nezuʋa recampupuri;
mambo waʋo ucatapxa, iye pamŋe cete namacinda ake — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Moabi ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakapisa mafupa amambo waEdomi kuȿikira aita maɗota.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto kuʋaMoabi, ucapedza dzimba dzoʋushe dzeKerioti; Moabi ʋacafa neɓope nokuɗanidzira ʋuye nokurira kwehwamanda;
ndicaparadza ʋatoŋgi pakati paʋo, nokuʋuraya macinda aʋo ose pamŋe cete naʋo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Juda ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakaramba murairo waJehova, ʋakasaceŋgeta mitemo yake, ʋakarashiswa nenhema dzaʋo dzakateʋerwa namadziɓaɓa aʋo.
Asi ndicatuma mŋoto kunaJuda, ucapedza dzimba dzoʋushe dzeJerusarema.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Nemhaka yokuti Israeri ʋakaɗarika katatu, ɀimŋe kanna, handiŋgadzori kurobga kwaʋo; nokuti ʋakateŋgesa ʋakarurama nesirveri, ʋuye unoshaiwa,
ndiʋo ʋanoshuʋa kuʋona guruʋa rapasi pamusoro womurombo, ʋacitsausa nzira yomunhu munyoro; munhu naɓaɓa ʋake ʋacienda ʋose kumusikana mumŋe, kuti ʋamhure zita raŋgu dɀene;
ʋanoʋata pasi pamaartari ose paŋguʋo dzakatorwa dziciitwa ruɓatso, ʋanonwa waini yaʋakaripiswa mumba maMŋari waʋo.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakaparadza ʋaAmori pamberi paʋo, iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakareɓa semisidari, ʋanesimba semiouki; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndakaparadza ɀiɓereko ɀaʋo kumsoro nemidzi yaʋo pasi.
Ndakakuɓuɗisai ʋo munyika yeEgipita, ndikakufambisai murenje makore makumi manna, kuti mundopiwa nyika yaʋaAmori.
Ndakamutsa ʋo ʋaprofita pakati paʋanakomana ʋenyu, naʋaNaziri pakati pamajaya enyu. Ha ndiɀo here, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri?
Asi makapa ʋaNaziri waini ʋanwe, nokuraira ʋaprofita, muciti: Regai kuprofita.
Tarirai, ndicakutsikirirai pasi, seɀinotsikirira ŋgoro izere nemŋanda.
Unomhanyisa ucakoniwa kutiza, unesimba haaŋgasimbisi simba rake, kunyaŋge nemhare haiŋgaɀirwiri.
Kunyaŋge unoɓata ʋuta haaŋgamiri, unetsoka dzinomhanyisa haaŋgaɀirwiri; kunyaŋge wakataȿa biza haaŋgarwiri ʋupenyu bgake;
unomŋoyo mukuru pakati pemhare ucatiza akashama nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Inzwai shoko iri rakataurwa naJehova pamsoro penyu, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, pamsoro porudzi rwose rwandakaɓuɗisa panyika yeEgipita, ndiciti:
Ndimi moga ʋandakaziʋa pakati pamarudzi ose enyika; naiɀoɀo ndicakuroʋai pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀenyu ɀose.
Ko ʋaʋiri ʋaŋgafamba pamŋe cete ʋasina‐kumbotenderana here?
Ko shumba iŋgaʋomba muɗondo isinacayakaruma here? Ko shumba ɗuku iŋgarira muɓako rayo isina‐cayakaɓata here?
Ko shiri iŋgawira pasi mumusuŋgo paisina‐kudzikirwa rugombe here? Ko musuŋgo uŋgaurukira kumsoro usina‐cawakaɓata here?
Ko hwamanda iŋgaridzwa muguta, ʋanhu ʋakasatya here? Ko guta riŋgawirwa neɀakaipa, Jehova asina‐kuɀiita here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, Ishe Jehova haaŋgaiti cinhu, asina‐kumboziʋisa ʋaranda ʋake ʋaprofita ɀakaʋanzika ɀake.
Shumba yaʋomba; ndiani uŋgarega kutya? Ishe Jehova wakataura; ndiani uŋgarega kuprofita?
Paridzirai mudzimba dzoʋushe paAshdodi, nomudzimba dzoʋushe munyika yeEgipita, muti: Ʋuŋganai pamakomo eSamaria, muʋone ɓope guru riri’po, nokumanikidzwa kuri mukati maro.
Nokuti haʋaziʋi kuita ɀakarurama — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — iʋo ʋanoʋuŋganidza kumanikidza nokupamba mudzimba dzaʋo dzoʋushe.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Muʋeŋgi

Ɀanzi naJehova: Mufudzi seɀaanobvuta pamuromo weshumba makumbo maʋiri kana cipande cenzeʋe, saiɀoɀo ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋacabvutwa ʋo, iʋo ʋagere Samaria pamuceto woʋuʋato, ʋuye pamitsamiro yemiceka yesiriki yomubeda.
Inzwai, mupupurire imba yaJakobo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova, Mŋari wehondo.
Nokuti nezuʋa randicaroʋa Israeri pamsoro pokuɗarika kwaʋo, ndicaroʋa ʋo maartari eBeti‐eri; nyaŋga dzeartari dzicagurwa nokuwira pasi.
Ndicaputsa dzimba dzecando pamŋe cete nedzimba dzezhezha; dzimba dzenyaŋga dzenzou dzicaparadzwa, ʋuye dzimba huru dzicapera — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Inzwai shoko iri, imi mhou dzeBashani, dziri mugomo reSamaria, imi munomanikidza ʋarombo, munopxanya ʋanoshaiwa, munoti kumadzishe enyu: Ʋuyai
Ishe Jehova wakapika noʋutȿene bgake, aciti: Tarirai, mazuʋa acaʋuya pamsoro penyu, aʋacakukweʋai neɀikokoʋono, ʋuye ʋakasara ʋenyu neɀiredzo ɀehoʋe.
Mucaɓuɗa napakakoromoka, mumŋe nomumŋe paakatarisana napo; mucarashirwa Harmoni — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ʋuyai Beti‐eri, muɗarike;
ʋuyai neciɓayiro cokuʋoŋga ceɀakaʋiriswa, muraire ɀipiriso ɀomŋoyo, muɀiparidze; nokuti ndiɀo ɀinokufadzai, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova.
Ndakakupai ʋo meno akacena pamaguta enyu ose, nokushaiwa ɀokudya panɀimbo dzenyu dzose; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hamuna‐kudzokera kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndakakunyimai ʋo mvura, kukohwa kucigere mŋedzi mitatu; ndikainisa paguta rimŋe, ndikasainisa panerimŋe guta; imŋe nɀimbo ikanisirwa mvura, nɀimbo isina‐kunisirwa mvura ikawoma.
Naiɀoɀo

Ndakakuroʋai nenyunje nokuvuva; muteteni wakapedza minda yenyu mizhinji, neminda yenyu yemizambiriŋga, nemiʋonde yenyu, nemiorivi yenyu; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hamuna‐kudzokera kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Ndakatuma pakati penyu hosha yakaipa seɀaɀakaitwa Egipita; majaya enyu ndakaaʋuraya nomunondo, ndikatapa mabiza enyu; ndakaȿitsa kunhuwa kwemisasa yenyu imo mumhino dzenyu; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro hamuna‐kudzokera kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndakaparadza
Saka ndicakuitirai iɀi, imi Israeri; ɀino ɀandicakuitirai iɀi, ɀigadzirei kusoŋgana naMŋari wenyu, imi Israeri.

Nokuti tarirai, iye, unoʋumba makomo, unosika mhepo, unoziʋisa munhu ɀiri mumuraŋgariro wake, unoshandura maŋgwanani rikaʋa rima, unotsika panɀimbo dzenyika dzakakwirira, Jehova Mŋari wehondo, ndiro zita rake.
Inzwai shoko iri randinokucemai naro, imi imba yaIsraeri.
Mhandara yaIsraeri yawira pasi; haaŋgazomuki ɀe; wawiswa pasi panyika yake, hakuna‐uŋgamumutsa ɀe.
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova: Paimba yaIsraeri guta, rakaɓuɗa
Nokuti ɀanzi naShe Jehova kuimba yaIsraeri: Nditȿakei, murarame;
asi regai kutȿaka Beti‐eri, kana kupinda Girgari, kana kupfuʋurira Beerisheba; nokuti Girgari ricatapxa ɀirokwaɀo, Beti‐eri ricaroʋa.
Tȿakai Jehova, murarame; kuti arege kupfuta paimba yaJosefa somŋoto unopedza ɀose, kukasaʋa nomunhu unoudzima paBeti‐eri.
Imi, munoshandura kururamisira mucikuita segaʋakaʋa, muciwisira kururama pasi,

, wakaita nyeredzi dzeCimutanhatu nedzeOrioni, unoshandura mumvuri worufu aciuita maŋgwanani, unodzima masikati aciaita ʋusiku, unoɗana mvura yeguŋgwa, ndokuiɗururira panyika (Jehova ndiro zita rake);
unoʋuyisira ʋanesimba kuparadza kunokurumidza, kuparadza ndokuwira nhare.
Ʋanoʋeŋga unoʋaraira pasuʋo, ʋanosema unotaura ɀakarurama.
Ɀino ɀamunotsika murombo pasi, mucitora kwaari muripo weɀiyo, imi makaʋaka dzimba dzamabge akaʋezwa, asi hamuŋgagari’mo, makasima minda yemizambiriŋga inofadza, asi hamuŋganwi waini yayo.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti kuɗarika kwenyu kuzhinji, ʋuye kuti ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀikuru, kwaɀo, iyemi, munomanikidza ʋakarurama, munogamucira fufuro, muciramba unoshaiwa pasuʋo.
Saka wakaŋgwara ucanyarara neŋguʋa yakaɗai, nokuti iŋguʋa yakaipa.
Tȿakai ɀakanaka, murege kutȿaka ɀakaipa, kuti murarame, ipapo Jehova, Mŋari wehondo ucaʋa nemi, seɀamunoreʋa.
Ʋeŋgai ɀakaipa, muɗe ɀakanaka, mururamisire

Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova, iye Mŋari wehondo, iye Ishe: Kucema kucaʋa’po panzira dzose huru, panzira dzose dzomumusha ʋacati: Maiwe! Maiwe! Ʋacaɗana ʋarimi kuzocema, naʋanoziʋa nziyo dzemariro kuzowuŋgudza.
Kuwuŋgudza kucaʋa’po paminda yose yemizambiriŋga; nokuti ndicapfuʋura napakati penyu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Munenhamo imi munoshuʋa zuʋa raJehova! Zuʋa raJehova munoriɗa neiko? Ricaʋa rima, haciŋgaʋi ciedza.
Ɀicaita somunhu unotiza shumba, ndokusoŋgana neɓere; kana sounopinda mumba, akaɓata pamadziro noruʋoko rwake, ndokurumŋa nenyoka.
Ko zuʋa raJehova hariŋgaʋi rima, rikarega kuʋa ciedza here? Hariŋgati, Ɀi! kwaɀo, risino‐kupenya here?
Ndinoʋeŋga nokuɀidza mitambo yenyu, handiŋgatoŋgofadzwi neʋuŋgano dzenyu dzakatarwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge mukandiʋigira ɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀinopiswa neɀipiriso ɀoʋupfu, handiŋgaɀigamuciri; handiŋgaʋi nehanya neɀipiriso ɀenyu ɀokuʋoŋga ɀeɀipfuwo ɀenyu ɀakakodzwa.
Bvisai pamberi paŋgu ruzha rwenziyo dzenyu, nokuti handiɗi kunzwa kurira kwembira dzenyu.
Asi kururamisa ŋgakuyerere semvura, ʋuye kururama sorwizi runoŋgoramba ruciɗira.
Nhai imba yaIsraeri, makandiʋigira ɀiɓayiro neɀipo murenje makore anamakumi manna here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, makatakura Sikuti mambo wenyu, neKijuni ɀifananidzo ɀenyu, iyo nyeredzi yamŋari wenyu, wamakaɀiitira.
Naiɀoɀo ndicakutapisai mberi kweDamasko — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, unezita rinonzi Mŋari wehondo.
Ʋanenhamo ʋagere ɀakanaka paZioni, naʋagere pakasimba mugomo reSamaria, iʋo ʋanhu ʋanembiri ʋorudzi rukuru pakati pamarudzi, kunoenda imba yaIsraeri!
Pfuʋurirai Karne, muʋone; kubva ipapo endai Hamati, iro
Iyemi, munoti zuʋa rakaipa riciri kure, mucisweɗedza ɀigaro
imi, munoʋata pamibeda yenyaŋga dzenzou, mucizamura paʋuʋato bgenyu, mucidya makwaiana amapoka, nemhuru dziri mukati mecirugu;
munoimba nziyo dzisinamaturo mbira dziciridzwa, munoɀiitira ɀinoridzwa saDavidi;
imi, munonwa waini nemidziyo
Naiɀoɀo ɀino ʋacatapxa noʋokutaŋga ʋanotapxa; ipapo ruzha rwaʋanozamura rucapfuʋura.
Ishe Jehova wakapika naiye amene‐ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, iye Mŋari wehondo —
Ɀino kana ʋarume ʋanegumi ʋakasara muimba imŋe ʋacafa.
Kana hama yomunhu
Nokuti tarirai, Jehova unoraira, iye ucakoromora imba huru, neimba ɗuku icaita mitswe.
Ko mabiza aŋgamhanya paruware here? Ko paŋgarimŋa neŋombe here? Nokuti makashandura kururamisa mukakuita nduru, neɀiɓereko ɀokururama mukaɀiita gaʋakaʋa;
iyemi, munofarira cinhu cisinamaturo, muciti: Hatinakuɀiwanira nyaŋga nesimba reɗu here?
Nokuti tarirai, ndicakumutsirai
Heɀi ɀandakaratidzwa naShe Jehova: Tarira, wakaʋumba mhashu, maɓukira okupedzisira acitaŋga kuɓukira; tarirai, akaŋga ari maɓukira okupedzisira kuceka kwamambo kwapera.
Ɀino dzakati dzapedza kudya ʋuswa bgenyika, ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova, cikaŋganwirai henyu; Jakobo uŋgamira seiko, ɀaari muɗuku?
Jehova akaɀidya mŋoyo pamsoro pecinhu ici, Jehova akati: Haɀiŋgaitwi.
Heɀi ɀandakaratidzwa naShe Jehova: Tarirai, Ishe Jehova wakaɗana mŋoto kuti arwe nawo; ukapedza guŋgwa rakadzika, ukaʋaʋarira kudya nenyika ʋo.
Ipapo ndikati: Haiwa, Ishe Jehova, ciregai henyu; Jakobo uŋgamira seiko, ɀaari muɗuku?
Jehova akaɀiɗemba pamsoro pecinhu ici, Ishe Jehova akati: Neɀiɀi ʋo haɀiŋgaitwi.
Heɀi ɀaakandiratidza: Tarirai, Ishe wakaŋga amire pamadziro akaŋga akaitwa norwonzi rwokuyera narwo, akaɓata rwonzi rwokuyera muruʋoko rwake.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Amosi, unoʋoneiko? Ini ndikati: Rwonzi rwokuyera narwo. Ɀino Ishe akati: Tarirai, ndicaisa rwonzi rwokuyera pakati paʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, handicatoŋgoʋaɗariki ɀe;
nɀimbo dzakakwirira dzaIsaka dzicaitwa matoŋgo, ʋuye nɀimbo tȿene dzaIsraeri dzicaparadzwa; ndicamukira imba yaJeroboami nomunondo.
Ɀino Amazia muprista weBeti‐eri wakatuma
Nokuti Amosi unoti: Jeroboami ucaʋurawa nomunondo, Israeri ʋacatapxa ɀirokwaɀo ʋacibviswa panyika yaʋo.
Amazia akati ʋo kunaAmosi: Iwe muʋoni, enda, utizire kunyika yaJuda, undodya’po ɀokudya, uprofite’po;
asi urege kuzoprofita ɀe paBeti‐eri; nokuti inɀimbo tȿene yamambo, iimba yamadzimambo.
Ipapo Amosi akapindura, akati kunaAmazia: Ini ndakaŋga ndisi muprofita, ndakaŋga ndisi mŋanakomana womuprofita; asi ndakaŋga ndiri mufudzi nomurimi wemiʋonde,
Jehova akanditora ndiciteʋera makwai, Jehova akati kwandiri: Enda, undoprofita kuʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino iwe cinzwa shoko raJehova: Iwe unoti: Rega kuprofita pamsoro paIsraeri, rega kuɗonhedza
naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Mukadzi wako ucaʋa cifeʋe muguta, ʋanakomana ʋako naʋanasikana ʋako ʋacaparadzwa nomunondo, ʋuye nyika yako icaganhurwa norwonzi
Heɀi ɀandakaratidzwa naShe Jehova: Tarirai, tswanda ineɀiɓereko ɀezhezha.
Akati: Amosi, unoʋoneiko? Ini ndikati: Tswanda ineɀiɓereko ɀezhezha. Ɀino Jehova akati kwandiri: Kuguma kwaȿikira ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, handicatoŋgoʋaɗariki ɀe.
Nziyo dzetembere dzicashanduka kuwuŋgudza nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova; ɀitunha ɀicaʋa’po ɀizhinji, ʋacaɀikandira kunze kwose ʋanyerere.
Inzwai cinhu ici, iyemi, munoɗa kumedza ʋanoshaiwa, nokuparadza ʋarombo ʋenyika,
muciti: Kugara kwomŋedzi kucapfuʋura riniko, kuti titeŋgese ɀiyo? ʋuye saɓata, kuti tizarure matura eɀiyo? ticitapudza efa, nokukurisa shekeri, ticinyeŋgera neɀiyero ɀinonyeŋgera;
kuti titeŋge ʋarombo nesirveri, naʋanoshaiwa
Jehova wakapika noʋukuru bgaJakobo,
Ko nyika haiŋgaɗeɗeri pamsoro pecinhu ici, mumŋe nomumŋe ugere’po haaŋgacemi here? Ɀirokwaɀo, icakwira yose soRwizi, icatutuma ndokuɗerera ɀe, soRwizi rweEgipita.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — ndicaʋirisa zuʋa masikati makuru, ndicaisa rima panyika aciri masikati.

Ndicashandura mitambo yenyu kuʋe kucema, nenziyo dzenyu dzose kuʋe kurira kwokucema; ndicafukidza ɀiʋuno ɀose masaga, nokuita misoro yose mhazha; ndicaɀiita sapanocemŋa mŋanakomana wakaɀarwa ari mumŋe cete, nokuguma kwaɀo sezuʋa rakaipa kwaɀo.
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe Jehova — andicatuma nzara panyika, isati iri nzara yeɀokudya, kana nyota yemvura, asi yokunzwa mashoko aJehova.
Ʋacadzuŋgaira ʋacibva kuguŋgwa ʋacienda kuguŋgwa, ʋacibva kumsoro ʋacienda mabvazuʋa; ʋacamhanya pose‐pose ʋacitȿaka shoko raJehova, asi haʋaŋgariwani.
Nezuʋa iro mhandara dzakanaka namajaya ʋacaziya nenyota.
Ʋanopika neɀiʋi ɀeSamaria, ʋaciti: Namŋari wako mupenyu, iwe Dani; ʋuye, Nenzira yeBeeri‐sheba mhenyu, iʋo ʋacawira pasi, ʋakasazomuka ɀe.
Ndakaʋona Ishe amire parutiʋi rweartari, akati: Roʋa misoro
Kunyaŋge ʋakacera kuȿikira paSheori, ruʋoko rwaŋgu rucandoʋatora’po; kunyaŋge ʋakakwira kuȿikira kuɗeŋga, ndicaʋaɓurusa’po.
Kunyaŋge ʋakandoʋanda pamsoro peKarmeri, ndicaʋatȿaka nokuʋabvisa’po; kunyaŋge ʋakaʋanda meso aŋgu pakudzika kweguŋgwa, ndicaraira nyoka kundoʋaruma’po.
Kunyaŋge ʋakatapxa naʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo, ndicaraira munondo kundoʋaʋuraya’po; ndicarinzira meso aŋgu kwaʋari kuti ndiʋaitire ɀakaipa, ndirege kuʋaitira ɀakanaka.
Nokuti Ishe Jehova wehondo ndiye unogunɀa nyika ikanyauka, ʋose ʋagere’mo ʋacacema; icakwira yose soRwizi, icaɗerera ɀe soRwizi rweEgipita;
ndiye unoʋaka makamuri ake kuɗeŋga, wakateya ɗeŋga rake panyika; iye unoɗana mvura zhinji yeguŋgwa aciiɗururira panyika pose; Jehova ndiro zita rake.
Nhai, imi ʋana ʋaIsraeri, ko hamuzi kwandiri saʋana ʋeEtiopia here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Handizi’ni ndakaɓuɗisa Israeri panyika yeEgipita here, naʋaFiristia paKaftori, naʋaSiria paKiri here?
Tarirai, meso aShe Jehova anoʋona ʋushe ʋunotadza, ndicaʋuparadza ndiʋubvise panyika pose, asi handiŋgaparadzi cose imba yaJakobo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nokuti tarirai, ndicaraira, ndicapepeta imba yaIsraeri pakati pamarudzi ose, seɀinopepetwa
Ʋatadzi ʋose ʋaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋacaʋurawa nomunondo, iʋo ʋanoti: Ɀakaipa haɀiŋgatiɓati, haɀiŋgaȿikiri kwatiri.
Nezuʋa iro ndicamutsa tabernakeri yaDavidi yakawira pasi, nokudziʋira’po pakakoromorwa; ndicamutsa ɀe matoŋgo ayo, ndicaiʋaka ɀe seɀayakaŋga yakaita pamazuʋa akare;
kuti ʋaɀitorere ɀakasara ɀaEdomi, namarudzi ose akatumidzwa nezita raŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, unoita iɀoɀi.
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — murimi ucaɓata muceki, nomuȿini wemizambiriŋga ucaɓata unodɀara mbeu; makomo acaɗonha waini inozipa, ʋuye ɀikomo ɀose ɀicanyauka.
Ndicadzosa kutapxa kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri, ʋacaʋaka maguta akaparadzwa, ʋacigara’mo; ʋacasima minda yemizambiriŋga, ʋacinwa waini yayo; ʋacarima ʋo
Ndicaʋasima panyika yaʋo, haʋaŋgazodzurwi ɀe panyika yaʋo yandakaʋapa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova Mŋari wenyu.
Ɀakaʋonekwa naObadia.
Ɀanzi naShe Jehova pamsoro paEdomi: Takanzwa mashoko akabva kunaJehova, nhume yatumŋa pakati pamarudzi,
Tarirai, ndakakuitai ʋaɗuku pakati pamarudzi, makaɀidzwa kwaɀo.
Kuɀikudza kwemŋoyo yenyu kwakakunyeŋgerai, iyemi, mugere mumikaha yamatombo, munoʋugaro bgakakwirira, ʋanoti mumŋoyo yaʋo: Ndianiko uŋgatiwisira pasi?
Kunyaŋge mukabururukira kumsoro segondo, ʋuye kunyaŋge ɗendere renyu rakaiswa pakati penyeredzi, ndicakuwisirai’po pasi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Ƌai mbava dzaiȿika kwamuri, kana makororo ʋusiku (haiwa, makaparadzwa sei!) haʋazaiɓa kuȿikira ʋariŋganiswa here? Ƌai ʋatanhi ʋamazambiriŋga ʋaiȿika kwamuri, haʋazaisiya mamŋe mazambiriŋga ari’po here?
Esau ɀakanɀerwa sei! Fuma yaʋo, yakaʋanzwa, yakafukunurwa sei!
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋaiʋa nesuŋgano nemi, ʋakakuperekedzai kuȿikira kumuganho; ʋanhu, ʋaigara norugare nemi, ʋakakunyeŋgerai, ʋakakukundai;
Ko handiŋgaparadzi nezuʋa iro ʋacenjeri pakati paEdomi, nenjere pagomo raEsau here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Mhare dzako, iwe Temani, dzicavunduka, kuti ʋose ʋapere nokuʋurawa pagomo raEsau.
Ucafukidzwa nokunyara nemhaka yokuti wakamukira munuŋuna wako simba, ucaparadzwa nokusiŋgaperi.
Nezuʋa ramakaŋga mumire’po makatarisana
Asi regai kutarira zuʋa romunuŋuna wenyu,
Regai kupinda pasuʋo raʋanhu ʋaŋgu nezuʋa renhamo yaʋo; regai kutarira njodzi yaʋo nezuʋa renhamo yaʋo, regai kuʋatorera fuma yaʋo nezuʋa renhamo yaʋo.
Regai kumira pamharadzano, kuti muparadze
Nokuti zuʋa raJehova rasweɗera kumarudzi ose; seɀamakaitira ʋamŋe, mucaitirwa ʋo saiɀoɀo; ɀamakaita ɀicadzokera pamisoro yenyu.
Nokuti seɀamakanwa pagomo raŋgu dɀene, saiɀoɀo marudzi ose acaramba acinwa; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacanwa, nokumedza, ʋacaita saʋasina‐kumboʋa’po.
Asi pagomo reZioni ndi’po pacaʋa naʋakapukunyuka, ricaʋa
Imba yaJakobo icaʋa mŋoto, imba yaJosefa muraɀo womŋoto, ʋuye imba yaEsau mashaŋga; ʋacapisa
Ʋokurutiʋi rwezasi ʋacatora gomo raEsau, ʋokumapani
Ʋatapxa ʋehondo iyi yaʋana ʋaIsraeri, ʋagere pakati paʋaKanani,
Ʋaponesi ʋacakwira pagomo reZioni kuzotoŋga gomo raEsau; ʋushe ʋucaʋa bgaJehova.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaJona mŋanakomana waAmitai, riciti:
Simuka, uende Nineve, riya guta guru, undoriparidzira, nokuti kuipa kwaʋo kwakwira pamberi paŋgu.

Asi Jona wakasimuka aciɗa kutizira Tarshishi abve pamberi paJehova; akaɓurukira Jopa, akawana cikepe cakaŋga coenda Tarshishi, akaɓuɗisa mari yaco yokufamba, ndokupinda mukati maco, kuti aende naʋo Tarshishi abve pamberi paJehova.
Asi Jehova wakatuma mhepo inopeŋga paguŋgwa, ɗutu guru rikamuka paguŋgwa, cikepe cikashumba kuputsika.

Ipapo ʋafambisi ʋecikepe ʋakatya, mumŋe nomumŋe akaɗana kunamŋari wake, ʋakarashira muguŋgwa nhumbi dzakaŋga dziri mucikepe, kuti ʋacireruse. Asi Jona wakaŋga aɓurukira mukati‐kati mecikepe, akaʋata pasi, ndokuɓatwa nehope caidzo.
Ipapo mŋene wecikepe wakaʋuya kwaari, akati kwaari: Nhai, iwe muʋati, wakaita seiko? Simuka, ɗana kunaMŋari wako, ɀimŋe Mŋari uŋgatiraŋgarira, tikasaparara.
Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe wakati kushamŋari yake: Ʋuyai tikande mijenya, tiziʋe kuti njodzi iyi yatiwira nokuɗa kwaani. Ipapo ʋakakanda mijenya, mujenya ukaɓata Jona.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Citiʋudza hako, kuti njodzi iyi yatiwira nokuɗa kwaani; ɓasa rako ndereiko? wabvepiko? nyika yako ndeipi? uri worudzi rupi?
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ndiri muHeberu, ndinotya Mŋari wokuɗeŋga, wakaita guŋgwa nenyika yakawoma.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋakatya kwaɀo‐kwaɀo, ʋakati kwaari: Cinyiko ici cawaita? Nokuti ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋaciziʋa kuti unotiza pamberi paJehova, nokuti wakaʋaʋudza.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ticakuiteiko, kuti guŋgwa ritinyararire? Nokuti guŋgwa rakaramba ricinyanya kupeŋga.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ndisimudzei, mundikandire muguŋgwa, ipapo guŋgwa ricakunyararirai; nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti ɗutu iri guru rakakuwirai nokuɗa kwaŋgu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋarume ʋakakwaȿa nesimba ʋaciidza kudzokera kunyika; asi ʋakakoniwa, nokuti guŋgwa rakaramba ricinyanya kuʋapeŋgera.

Naiɀoɀo ʋakaɗana kunaJehova, ʋakati: Tinokunyeŋgeterai, imi Jehova, tinokunyeŋgeterai, kuti tirege kuparara nokuɗa kwoʋupenyu bgomunhu uyu, murege kutisundira mhoȿa yeropa risinemhaka; nokuti imi Jehova makaita seɀamakaɗa henyu.
Ipapo ʋakasimudza Jona, ʋakamukandira muguŋgwa, guŋgwa rikanyarara pakupeŋga kwaro.
Ipapo ʋarume ʋakatya Jehova kwaɀo‐kwaɀo, ʋakaɓayira Jehova ciɓayiro, noku
Jehova akatuma hoʋe huru kundomedza Jona, Jona akaʋa muɗumbu rehoʋe mazuʋa matatu noʋusiku ʋutatu.
Ipapo Jona akanyeŋgetera kunaJehova Mŋari wake ari muɗumbu rehoʋe.
Akati:
Ndakaɗana kunaJehova ndiri munhamo yaŋgu,
Akandipindura;
Ndakaɗana ndiri muɗumbu reSheori,
Imi mukanzwa inzwi raŋgu.
Nokuti makandikandira makadzika, mukati momŋoyo weguŋgwa,
Mvura zhinji yakaŋga yandikomberedza;
Mafuŋgu enyu namapoporodzi enyu akapfuʋura napamsoro paŋgu.
Ndikati: Ndarashwa, hamucandiʋoni;
Asi ndicariŋgira ɀe kutembere yenyu tȿene.
Mvura zhinji yakandikomberedza, kuȿikira kumŋeya
Pakadzika pakaŋga pandipoteredza;
Maharaŋgwe akaŋga amonera musoro waŋgu.
Ndakaɓurukira kumaʋambiso amakomo;
Nyika neɀipfigiso ɀayo ɀakandipfigira’mo nokusiŋgaperi;
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro makaɓuɗisa ʋupenyu bgaŋgu pagomba, imi, Jehova Mŋari waŋgu.
Mŋeya waŋgu wakati uciziya mukati maŋgu, ndikaraŋgarira Jehova;
Munyeŋgetero waŋgu ukapinda kwamuri mutembere yenyu tȿene.
Ʋanoraŋgarira ɀisinamaturo ɀenhema
Ʋanorasha nyasha yaʋo.
Asi ndicakuɓayirai nenzwi rokuʋoŋga;
Ndicaripa ɀandapika.
Ruponeso runobva kunaJehova.
Jehova akataura nehoʋe, ikandorutsira Jona panyika yakawoma.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika rwecipiri kunaJona, riciti:
Simuka, uende Nineve, riya guta guru, undoriparidzira ɀandicakuraira kuti uparidze.
Ipapo Jona akasimuka, akaenda Nineve, seɀaakarairwa neshoko raJehova. Ɀino Nineve raiʋa guta guru‐guru, rwendo rwamazuʋa matatu
Jona akataŋga kupinda muguta, acifamba rwendo rwezuʋa rimŋe, akaɗana, aciti: Kwasara mazuʋa anamakumi manna, ipapo Nineve ricaparadzwa.
Ʋanhu ʋeNineve ʋakatenda Mŋari, ʋakatara ŋguʋa yokuɀinyima ɀokudya, ʋakafuka masaga, kubva kuʋakuru pakati paʋo kuȿikira kuʋaɗuku pakati paʋo.
Shoko rikaȿika kunamambo weNineve, akasimuka pacigaro cake coʋushe, akabvisa ŋguʋo yake, akafuka saga, nokugara mumaɗota.
Akaraira, akaparidza muNineve rose cireʋo camambo necaʋakuru ʋake, aciti: Ʋanhu kana ɀipfuwo, kana ŋombe kana makwai, ŋgaɀirege kutoŋgoraʋira cinhu, ŋgaɀirege kufura kana kunwa mvura;
asi ʋanhu neɀipfuwo ŋgaɀifukidzwe masaga, ŋgaʋaɗane kunaMŋari nesimba; ŋgaʋatendeʋuke mumŋe nomumŋe panzira yake yakaipa napakuita nesimba namaʋoko ake.
Ndianiko uŋgaziʋa, ɀimŋe Mŋari uŋgadzoka akaɀiɗemba, akadzoka pakutsamŋa kwake kukuru, tikarega kuparadzwa?
Mŋari akaʋona ɀaʋakaita, kuti ʋakatendeʋuka panzira yaʋo yakaipa, Mŋari akaɀiɗemba pamsoro peɀakaipa ɀaakati ndicaʋaitira; akasaɀiita.
Asi ɀakaʋodza mŋoyo waJona kwaɀo, akatsamŋa.

Akanyeŋgetera Jehova, akati: Haiwa, Jehova, ha ndiɀo ɀandakataura, ndiciri munyika yaŋgu here? Saka ndakacimbidzika kutizira Tarshishi; nokuti ndakaŋga ndiciziʋa kuti muri Mŋari unenyasha, uneŋgoni, usiŋgacimbidziki kutsamŋa, uzere noʋunyoro, muciɀiɗemba
Saka Jehova, ɀino cinditorerai henyu ʋupenyu bgaŋgu; nokuti ɀirinani kwandiri kuti ndife pakuti ndirarame.
Jehova akati: Ɀakanaka here ɀawatsamŋa?
Ipapo Jona akaɓuɗa muguta, akandogara kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa rweguta, akaɀiʋakira’po musasa, ndokugara’mo mumumvuri, aciti ndigoʋona ɀicaitirwa guta.
Jehova Mŋari ndokuraira muti womucindwe, akaumeresa kumsoro kwaJona, kuti uʋe mumvuri pamusoro wake, shuŋgu dzake dzinyaradzwe. Ɀino Jona akafarira kwaɀo muti womucindwe.
Asi nezuʋa rakateʋera Mŋari wakaraira gonye maŋgwanani, rikamunya mucindwe, ukaȿaʋa.
Ɀino zuʋa rakati riciɓuɗa, Mŋari akaraira mhepo inopisa inobva mabvazuʋa; zuʋa rikaɓaya musoro waJona, akaziya, akakumbira kuti afe hake, akati: Ɀirinani kwandiri kuti ndife pakuti ndirarame.
Mŋari akati kunaJona: Ɀakanaka here ɀawatsamŋira mucindwe? Akati: Ɀakanaka kuti nditsamŋe, kuȿikira parufu pamene.
Jehova akati: Iwe wakaŋga unetsitsi nomuti womucindwe wausina‐kutamburira, kana kuumeresa, iwo, wakamera noʋusiku ʋumŋe, ukaparara ɀe noʋusiku ʋumŋe;

ko ɀino ini handizaifanira kuʋa netsitsi neNineve, riya guta guru, munaʋanhu ʋanopfuʋura ɀuru ɀinezana namakumi maʋiri, ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuti ruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi kana ruʋoko rwaʋo rworuɓoshwe ndorupi, ʋuye ɀipfuwo ɀizhinji here?
Shoko raJehova, rakaʋuya kunaMika weMoresheti namazuʋa aJotami naAhazi naHezekia, madzimambo aJuda, raakaʋona pamsoro peSamaria neJerusarema.
Inzwai imi marudzi aʋanhu, imi mose; terera iwe nyika, neɀose ɀiri’mo; Ishe Jehova ŋgaakupupurirei, iye Ishe ari mutembere yake tȿene.
Nokuti tarirai, Jehova unoɓuɗa panɀimbo yake, ucaɓuruka nokutsika panɀimbo dzakakwirira dzenyika.
Makomo acanyauka pasi pake, mipata icapamuka senamo yakaiswa pamŋoto, semvura inoɗururwa pamawere.
Ɀose iɀi
Saka Samaria ndicariita somurwi

Mifananidzo yaro yose yakaʋezwa icaputswa‐putswa, miɓairo yaro yose icapiswa nomŋoto, ʋuye ndicaparadza ɀifananidzo ɀaro ɀose; nokuti rakaɀiʋuŋganidza iɀo uri muɓairo wecifeʋe, naiɀoɀo ɀicadzokera ɀe kumuɓairo wecifeʋe.
Nemhaka iyi ndicacema nokuwuŋgudza, ndicafamba ndisineŋguʋo ndakashama, ndicawuŋgudza samakaʋa nokurira semhou.
Nokuti maʋaŋga aro haaɗi kupora, nokuti ɀaȿika kunaJuda ʋo; ɀaȿikira pasuʋo raʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ipo paJerusarema.
Musaɀireʋa paGati, regai kutoŋgocema; paBeti‐re‐Afra ndakaʋumburuka muguruʋa.
Cibva uende, iwe ugere Shafiri, wakashama ucinyara; ugere Zaanani haana‐kuɓuɗa; kuwuŋgudza kweBeti‐ezeri kucakutorera pokumira.
Nokuti ugere Maroti unomirira ɀikuru cinhu cakanaka, nokuti ɀakaipa ɀakaɓuruka ɀicibva kunaJehova ɀikaȿikira kusuʋo reJerusarema.
Iwe ugere Rakishi, suŋga mabiza paŋgoro; ndiro rakataŋga kuisa mukunda weZioni paɀiʋi, nokuti kuɗarika kwaIsraeri kwakawanikwa mauri.
Saka iwe ucapa Moresheti‐gati cipo cokuwonekana; dzimba dzeAkzibi dzicaʋa cinhu cinonyeŋgera madzimambo aIsraeri.
Iwe ugere Maresha, ndicakuʋuyisira mumŋe ucakukunda; ʋakakudzwa ʋaIsraeri ʋacaȿika paAdurami.
Ɀiitire mhazha, ʋeʋura vudzi rako pamsoro paʋana ʋaunofarira; kurisa mhazha yako seyegondo, nokuti ʋakatapxa kure newe.
Ʋanenhamo ʋanofuŋga ɀakaipa ʋaciita ɀisakarurama panhoʋo dzaʋo! Ʋanoɀiita maŋgwanani kana kwoedza, nokuti simba rokuɀiita riri mumaʋoko aʋo.
Ʋanociʋa minda, ndokuipamba, nedzimba, ndokuɀitorera idzo; ʋanomanikidza murume neimba yake, murume nenhaka yake.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Tarirai, ndinofuŋgira rudzi urwu ɀakaipa, hamuŋgagoni kubvisa mitsipa yenyu paɀiri, hamuŋgafambi namanyawi, nokuti iŋguʋa yakaipa.

Nezuʋa iro ʋacataura mufananidzo pamsoro penyu, nokucema nokucema kwokurira, ʋaciti: Takaparadzwa cose, iye unopa ʋamŋe mugoʋe waʋanhu ʋaŋgu, haiwa wanditorera ini sei! Minda yeɗu unoigoʋera ʋanomumukira.
Saka iwe ucashaiwa munhu unokukandira rwonzi rwokuyera nhaka yako paʋuŋgano yaJehova.
Regai kuprofita — ndiɀo ɀaʋanoprofita iʋo. Kana ʋasiŋgaprofiti pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi, kushoʋora
Nhai imi munonzi imba yaJakobo, Mŋeya waJehova wafupiswa here? Ndiwo maɓasa ake here? Ko mashoko aŋgu haaŋgaitiri ɀakanaka unofamba nokururama here?
Asi mazuʋa ano ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakandimukira somuʋeŋgi; munobvisa jasi paŋguʋo dzaʋanopfuʋura haʋo norugare ʋasiŋgaɗi kurwa.
Munodziŋga ʋakadzi ʋaʋanhu ʋaŋgu padzimba dzaʋo dzinofadza; munoterera ʋana ʋaʋo ʋaɗuku mbiri yaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi.
Simukai, muende, nokuti haizi nɀimbo yokuzorora pano, nemhaka yetȿina inoparadza nokuparadza kwakaipa kwaɀo.
Kana munhu ari’po, unofambira mhepo nenhema, unoreʋa nhema
Ɀirokwaɀo ndicakuʋuŋganidzai imi mose, imi Jakobo; ɀirokwaɀo ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri; ndicaʋaisa pamŋe cete samakwai mucirugu, seɓoka ramakwai pakati pamafuro awo; ʋacaita ruzha rukuru no
Mupasanuri wakaʋatuŋgamirira; ʋakapasanura, ʋakapfuʋurira kusuʋo, ʋakaɓuɗa na’po; mambo waʋo wakaʋatuŋgamirira, Jehova ari pamberi paʋo.
Ini ndakati: Cinzwai henyu, imi ʋakuru ʋaJakobo, naʋaɓati ʋeimba yaIsraeri: Ko hamuzaifanira kuziʋa kururamisira
Iyemi, munoʋeŋga ɀakanaka, muciɗa ɀakaipa, munoviya ʋanhu ganda raʋo, mucibvambura nyama yaʋo pamafupa aʋo;
imi, munodya ʋo nyama yaʋanhu ʋaŋgu, muciȿuʋura ganda raʋo, munovuna mafupa aʋo, muciaguranya, seɀinoiswa muhari, senyama iri mugate.
Ipapo ʋacaɗana kunaJehova, asi haaŋgaʋapinduri; ɀirokwaɀo ucaʋaʋanzira ciso cake neŋguʋa iyo, nokuɗa kweɀakaipa ɀaʋakaita pamaɓasa aʋo.
Ɀanzi naJehova pamsoro paʋaprofita, ʋakatsausa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋanoruma nameno aʋo, ʋaciɗana
Naiɀoɀo mucaȿikirwa noʋusiku, kuti murege kuʋa necamunoʋona; mucaʋa nerima, kuti murege kuʋuka; zuʋa ricaʋirira ʋaprofita, ciedza camasikati cicaʋaȿiɓira.
Ʋaʋoni ʋacanyadziswa, naʋaʋuki ʋacakaŋganiswa; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋose ʋacafumbira ndebvu dzaʋo, nokuti hakunemhinduro inobva kunaMŋari.
Asi kana ndiri’ni, ndizere nesimba pamŋe cete noMŋeya waJehova, nokutoŋga nokutsuŋga, kuti ndiparidzire Jakobo kuɗarika kwaʋo, ʋuye Israeri ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Cinzwai henyu cinhu ici, imi ʋakuru ʋeimba yaJakobo, naʋaɓati ʋeimba yaIsraeri, iyemi, munosema kururamisa, nokuminamisa ɀose ɀakarurama.
Munoʋaka Zioni neropa, ʋuye Jerusarema neɀakaipa.

Ʋakuru ʋaro ʋanotamba mhaka kuti ʋapiwe ɀipo, ʋaprista ʋaro ʋanodzidzisa kuti ʋapiwe muɓairo, ʋaprofita ʋaro ʋanoʋuka kuti ʋapiwe mari; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanosendamira kunaJehova, ʋaciti: Ko Jehova haazi pakati peɗu here? Hatiŋgawirwi neɀakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo Zioni ricarimŋa somunda nemhaka yenyu, Jerusarema ricaitwa mirwi
Asi namazuʋa okupedzisira gomo reimba yaJehova ricagadzwa pamisoro yamakomo, ricakwiridzwa kumsoro kweɀikomo; marudzi aʋanhu acamhanyira kwariri.

Marudzi mazhinji acaenda, aciti: Ʋuyai, hendei kugomo raJehova nokuimba yaMŋari waJakobo; iye ucatidzidzisa nzira dzake, ʋuye isu ticafamba namakwara ake. Nokuti paZioni ndi’po pacaɓuɗa murairo, napaJerusarema shoko raJehova.

Iye ucatoŋga pakati pamarudzi mazhinji, ucaruramisira marudzi anesimba ari kure; ʋacapfura minondo yaʋo ʋaciiita mapadza, namapfumo aʋo ʋaciaita mapaŋga okucekerera miti; rudzi rumŋe haruŋgazosimudziri rumŋe rudzi munondo, haʋaŋgazodzidzi kurwa.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe ucagara pasi pomuzambiriŋga wake napasi pomuʋonde wake, hakuna‐uŋgazoʋatyisa, nokuti muromo waJehova wehondo wakataura iɀoɀo.
Nokuti marudzi ose aʋanhu anofamba, rumŋe norumŋe nezita ramŋari warwo; asi isu ticafamba nezita raJehova Mŋari weɗu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋanokamhina, ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋakadziŋgwa, naʋakatambudzwa neni;
ʋaikamhina ndicaʋaita ʋakasara, ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋakarashirwa kure
Ɀino iwe, rutura rwamakwai, iwe cikomo comukunda weZioni, ɀicaȿika kwauri, ɀirokwaɀo ʋushe bgokutaŋga ʋucaȿika, ibgo ʋushe bgomukunda weJerusarema.
Ɀino munoɗanidzireiko? Hakunamambo pakati penyu here, gota renyu raparara here, ɀamaɓatwa nokurwadziwa sokwomukadzi unosurumuka?

Cirwadziwa, utambure nokusurumuka, iwe mukunda weZioni, somukadzi uri pakusurumuka; nokuti ɀino ucaɓuɗa muguta, ucandogara kusaŋgo, ucandoȿika Babironi; ipapo ucandorwirwa, Jehova ucakudzikinura’po pamaʋoko aʋaʋeŋgi ʋako.
Ɀino marudzi mazhinji aʋanhu akakuʋuŋganira, anoti: Ŋgaaȿiɓiswe, meso eɗu ŋgaaʋone Zioni.
Asi haʋaziʋi ɀinofuŋgwa naJehova, haʋanzwisisi ɀaakatema; nokuti wakaʋaʋuŋganidza semŋanda paɓuriro.
Simuka upure, iwe mukunda weZioni, nokuti runyaŋga rwako ndicaruita ɗare, ʋuye mahwanda ako ndicaaita ndarira; ucaputsanya marudzi mazhinji; ɀaʋakaɀiwanira ndicaɀitsaurira Jehova, fuma yaʋo
Ɀino mucafanira kuʋuŋgana makaita mapoka, iwe mukunda wamapoka;
Asi iwe Beti‐rehema Efrata, muɗuku kwaɀo pakati peɀuru ɀamazana ɀaJuda, kwauri kucandiɓuɗira mumŋe ucaʋa muɓati pakati paIsraeri; maɓuɗiro ake ndaakare, pamazuʋa akare‐kare.
Naiɀoɀo ucaʋaisa
Ucamira, ndokufudza
Iye ucaʋa rugare
Iʋo ʋacaparadza nyika yeAsiria nomunondo, nenyika yaNimrodi painopindwa napo; iye ucatirwira kumuAsiria, kana aciŋge acipinda nyika yeɗu nokutsika mukati memiganho yeɗu.
Ipapo ʋakasara ʋaJakobo ʋacaʋa pakati pamarudzi mazhinji aʋanhu seɗoʋa rinobva kunaJehova, semvura inonaya paʋuswa, ɀisiŋgamiriri munhu kana kugarira ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu.

Ʋakasara ʋaJakobo ʋacaʋa pakati pendudzi pakati pamarudzi mazhinji aʋanhu, seshumba pakati pemhuka dzomuɗondo, seshumba ɗuku pakati pamapoka amakwai, inoti kana icipfuʋura’po, inotsika nokubvamburanya, kusina‐unorwira.
Ruʋoko rwenyu ŋgarusimudzirwe kumsoro kwaʋadziʋisi ʋenyu, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose ŋgaʋaparadzwe.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaparadza mabiza enyu pakati penyu, nokuputsa ŋgoro dzenyu;
ndicaparadza maguta enyika yenyu, nokukoromora nhare dzenyu dzose.
Ndicaparadza ʋuroyi pamaʋoko enyu, hamuŋgazoʋi naʋafemberi;
ndicaparadza mifananidzo yenyu yakaʋezwa neshoŋgwe dzenyu pakati penyu; hamuŋgazonamati maɓasa amaʋoko enyu;
ndicadzura miti yenyu yakatsaurwa pakati penyu, ndicaparadza maguta enyu.
Ndicatsiʋa marudzi asina‐kuterera
Cinzwai ɀino ɀinorebga naJehova: Simuka, ita nharo pamberi pamakomo, ɀikomo ŋgaɀinzwe inzwi rako.
Cinzwai, imi makomo, rukaʋe rwaJehova, nemi nheyo dzenyika dzinogara dziri’po; nokuti Jehova unorukaʋe naʋanhu ʋake, ucaita nharo naIsraeri.
Nhai, imi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ndakakuiteiko? Ndakakunetsai neiko? Ndipindurei.
Nokuti ndakakuɓuɗisai panyika yeEgipita, ndikakudzikinurai paimba yoʋuranda, ndikatuma pamberi penyu Mosesi naAroni naMiriami.
Haiwa, ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, raŋgarirai ɀino ɀakaraŋganwa naBaraki mambo waMoabi, ʋuye ɀaakapindurwa naBarami mŋanakomana waBeori;
Ndicaʋuya nei pamberi paJehova, ndicikotamira pamberi paMŋari wokumsoro? Ndicaʋuya pamberi pake neɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa, nemhuru dzakaita gore rimŋe here?
Ko Jehova uŋgafadzwa namakondobge anecuru cezana, kana nenzizi dzamafuta dzineɀuru ɀinegumi here? Ndiŋga
Iye wakakuziʋisa, iwe munhu, kuti ɀakanaka ndeɀipi; cinotȿakwa naJehova kwauri cinyiko, asi kuti uite ɀakarurama, uɗe ʋunyoro, ʋuye ufambe uciɀininipisa pamberi paMŋari wako?
Inzwi raJehova rinoɗana kuguta, wakacenjera ucatya zita renyu; tererai shamhu, nowakairaira.
Ko fuma yeɀakashata ici’po muimba yowakashata here, ʋuye ciyero cakatapudzwa cinonyaŋgadza here?
Ko ndiŋgaʋa wakacena kana ndineɀiyero ɀakashata, nehomo yeɀiyereso ɀinonyeŋgera here?
Nokuti ʋafumi
Saka neni ʋo ndakakuroʋai ʋaŋga rakaipa kwaɀo; ndakakuitai ɗoŋgo nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Mucadya, asi hamuŋgaguti, kushoʋorwa kwenyu kucaʋa pakati penyu; mucabvisa
Mucakusha, asi hamuŋgaceki, mucaȿina maoriʋi, asi hamugazori mafuta,

Nokuti ɀakatemŋa naOmri ɀinoceŋgetwa, namaɓasa ose eimba yaAhabi, imi munofamba nokuraŋgarira kwaʋo, kuti ndikuitei ɗoŋgo imi, naʋagere’mo cinhu cinoridzirwa muridzo; imi mucaʋa nemhoȿa yokushoʋorwa kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ndinenhamo ini! nokuti ndaʋa sapaŋguʋa kana ɀiɓereko ɀezhezha ɀakohwiwa, kana ɀakasara ɀamazambiriŋga ɀaʋuŋganidzwa; hakucinesumbu rimŋe riŋgadyiwa, mŋeya waŋgu unopaŋga ʋonde rinotaŋga kuibva.
Ʋanhu ʋanoɗa Mŋari ʋakaparara panyika, hakucina‐ʋakarurama pakati paʋanhu; ʋose ʋakaʋandira
Maʋoko aʋo anoŋgotȿaka ɀakaipa kuti ʋaɀiite nomŋoyo wose; macinda anokumbira, ʋatoŋgi
Wakanaka kupfuʋura ʋose wakaita sorukato, wakarurama kupfuʋura ʋose unopfuʋura ruzhowa rweminzwa; zuʋa renharirire dzenyu raȿika, iro zuʋa rokurobga kwenyu, ɀino kukaŋganiswa kwaʋo kucaʋa’po.
Regai kuʋimba nowamunogara naye, regai kutenda shamŋari, dzora miromo yako kumukadzi uʋete pacifuʋa cako.
Nokuti mŋanakomana unoɀidza ɓaɓa, mŋanasikana unomukira mai ʋake, nomukadzi womŋana ʋamŋene ʋake; ʋaʋeŋgi ʋomunhu ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋeimba yake.
Asi kana ndiri’ni ndicatarira kunaJehova, ndicamirira Mŋari woruponeso rwaŋgu; Mŋari waŋgu ucandinzwa.
Usafara pamsoro paŋgu iwe muʋeŋgi waŋgu; kana ndikawira pasi, ndicasimuka ɀe; kana ndigere murima, Jehova ucaʋa ciedza caŋgu.
Ndicatakura kutsamŋa kwaJehova, nokuti ndakamutadzira, kuȿikira acindireʋerera mhoȿa yaŋgu, nokundiruramisira mhaka yaŋgu; ucandiɓuɗisira kuciedza, ndicaʋona kururama kwake.
Ipapo muʋeŋgi waŋgu ucaɀiʋona, kunyara kucafukidza iye unoti kwandiri: Jehova Mŋari wako uripiko? Meso aŋgu acamuʋona; ɀino ucatsikirwa pasi samatope ari panzira dzomumusha.
Zuʋa rokuʋaka maȿiŋgo enyu ricaȿika, nezuʋa iro miganho icatarwa nokure.
Nezuʋa iro ʋacaʋuya kwamuri, ʋacibva Asiria nokumaguta eEgipita, noku
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro nyika icaʋa ɗoŋgo, nemhaka yaʋagere’mo, nemhaka yeɀiɓereko ɀamaɓasa aʋo.
Fudzai ʋanhu ʋenyu netȿimbo yenyu, iwo makwai ari nhaka yenyu, anogara ari oga muɗondo pakati peKarmeri; ŋgaacere paBashani neGireadi, sapamazuʋa akare.
Ndicaʋaratidza ɀinhu ɀinoshamisa sapamazuʋa okuɓuɗa kwenyu munyika yeEgipita.
Marudzi aʋanhu acaɀiʋona akanyara pamsoro pesimba raʋo rose; ʋacafumbatira miromo yaʋo namaʋoko aʋo, nzeʋe dzaʋo hadziŋganzwi.
Ʋacananɀa guruʋa senyoka; ʋacaɓuɗa panɀimbo dzaʋo dzokuʋanda ʋaciɗeɗera seɀinokambaira ɀenyika; ʋacaʋuya kunaJehova Mŋari weɗu ʋacitya, ʋacakutyai.
Ndianiko Mŋari wakafanana nemi, unokaŋganwira ɀakaipa, unopfuʋura kuɗarika kwaʋakasara ʋenhaka yake? Haaŋgagari akatsamŋa nokusiŋgaperi, nokuti unofarira kuʋa nenyasha.
Ucatinzwira tsitsi ɀe, ucatsika ɀakaipa ɀeɗu pasi petsoka dzake; mucakandira ɀiʋi ɀaʋo ɀose mukudzika kweguŋgwa.
Mucaitira Jakobo ɀokwaɗi
Cireʋo
Jehova ndiye Mŋari unegoɗo, unotsiʋa; Jehova unotsiʋa, uzere nehasha; Jehova unotsiʋa ʋadziʋisi ʋake, unoceŋgetera ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake
Jehova haakurumidzi kutsamŋa, unesimba guru, haaŋgatoŋgopembedzi
Unotuka guŋgwa, aciriwomesa, unopxisa nzizi dzose; Bashani rinoshaiwa siniba, ʋuye Karmeri, ruʋa reRebanoni rinoshaiwa simba.
Makomo anoɗeɗera pamberi pake, ɀikomo ɀinonyauka; nyika inosimuka pamberi pake, ɀirokwaɀo, iyo nyika naʋose ʋagere’po.
Ndiani uŋgamira pamberi pehasha dzake? Ndiani uŋgaramba amire pakutsamŋa kwake kukuru? Hasha dzake dzakaɗururwa somŋoto, matombo akaputsanyiwa naye.
Jehova wakanaka, inhare nezuʋa rokutambudzika; iye unoziʋa ʋanotizira kwaari.
Asi ucaparadza kwaɀo nɀimbo ye
Munoraŋgarireiko pamsoro paJehova? Iye ucaparadza cose; nhamo haiŋgamuki ɀe rwecipiri.
Nokuti kunyaŋge ʋakakorekana seminzwa, kana kuita saʋakaɓatwa neɀaʋakanwa, ʋacaparadzwa cose samashaŋga akawoma.
Mumŋe wakaɓuɗa pakati penyu unoraŋgarira ɀakaipa pamsoro paJehova, unoraŋgana ɀisinamaturo.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Kunyaŋge ʋanesimba raʋo rose, ʋakawanda ʋo, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋacatemŋa, iye ucaparara. Kunyaŋge ndakakutambudzai, handiŋgazokutambudziyi ɀe.
Ɀino ndicavuna joko rake, ribve kwamuri, ndicaɗamburanya ɀisuŋgo ɀenyu.

Jehova wakaraira pamsoro penyu, kuti ʋezita renyu ʋarege kuzodɀarwa ɀe; mumba maʋamŋari ʋenyu ndicaparadza ɀifananidzo ɀakaʋezwa neɀifananidzo ɀakaʋumbga; ndicakucererai bgiro; nokuti makashata kwaɀo.
Tarirai pamakomo tsoka dzounoʋuya namashoko akanaka, unoparidza rugare! Itai mitambo yenyu, imi Juda, itai ɀamakapika, nokuti wakaipa haaŋgazopfuʋuri ɀe napakati penyu; wakaparadzwa cose.
Muputsanyi waʋuya kuzorwa nemi; rindirai nhare, tarirai nzira, simbisai ɀiʋuno ɀenyu, itai nesimba renyu kwaɀo.
Nokuti Jehova unodzosa kurumbidzwa kukuru kwaJakobo sokurumbidzwa kukuru kwaIsraeri; nokuti ʋaɗururi ʋakaʋaɗurura, ʋakaparadza mataʋi emizambiriŋga yaʋo.
Nhoʋo dzemhare dzake dzakatȿukiswa, ʋarume ʋakatsuŋga ʋakapfeka
Ŋgoro dzinoʋirima munzira dzomumusha, dzinoɓonderana pamapani, dzakafanana namazhenje, dzinomhanya semheni.
Unoraŋgarira ʋakuru ʋake, ʋanogumburwa pakufamba kwaʋo, ʋanomhanyira kuruȿiŋgo rwaro pakagadzirwa citaʋiridzo.
Masuʋo enzizi akazarurwa, imba yamambo yakanyauka.
Shoko ratemŋa,
Asi kubva kare Nineve rakaŋga rakaita sedziʋa remvura; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋanotiza.
Pambai sirveri, pambai ndarama; nokuti kuwanda kwaɀo hakuperi, iyo fuma yenhumbi dzakaiȿo‐naka.
Harinecinhu, rinoshaiwa ɀose, raʋa ɗoŋgo; mŋoyo unonyauka, mabvi anoɓonderana, kurwadziwa kuri’po paɀiʋuno ɀose, ɀiso ɀaʋose ɀaceneruka.
Nɀimba yeshumba iripi? Panodyira shumba ɗuku ndapapi? Ndapapi panofamba shumba nehadzi yayo nomŋana weshumba, kusina‐unodzikarudza?
Shumba yaibvamburanya ɀakariŋgana ʋana ʋayo, yaidzipira hadzi dzayo, yaizadza mapako ayo neɀayairuma, nenɀimba dzayo neɀayaiɓata.

Tarirai, ndinemhaka nemi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicapisa ŋgoro dzaro dziite ʋutsi, munondo ucapedza shumba dzenyu ɗuku; ndicabvisa ɀawakapamba panyika, inzwi renhume dzako hariŋgatoŋgonzwiki ɀe.
Guta reropa rinenhamo! Rizere nenhema nokupamba; ɀakapambga haɀiperi’mo.
Kurira kwetyaʋa, nomubvumo wokutinhira kwamakumbo eŋgoro, nowokutsika kwamabiza, neŋgoro dzinojata,
nowaʋataȿi ʋanomhanyisa, nomunondo unopenya, nepfumo rinoʋaima, naʋazhinji ʋakaʋurawa, nomurwi mukuru weɀitunha; ɀitunha haɀiperi, ʋanogumburwa neɀitunha ɀaʋo;
nemhaka yokufeʋa kuzhinji kwecifeʋe cakanaka pakuɗikanwa, iye mŋene woʋuroyi, unoteŋgesa marudzi aʋanhu nokufeʋa kwake, nemhuri dzaʋanhu noʋuroyi bgake.
Tarira, ndinemaka newe — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicakufukura ndiise ŋguʋo dzako kuciso cako; ndicaratidza marudzi
Ndicakandira pamsoro pako tȿina inosemesa, nokukushatisa, nokukuita cinhu cinotarirwa
Ipapo ʋose ʋanokuʋona ʋacakutiza, ʋaciti: Nineve raparadzwa, ndiani ucaricema? Ndicakutȿakirepi ʋanyaradzi?
Ko iwe unopfuʋura No‐amoni, rakaŋga rakaʋakwa pakati penzizi, rakaŋga rakapoteredzwa nemvura; ruȿiŋgo rwaro raiʋa guŋgwa, namadziro aro raiʋa guŋgwa
Etiopia neEgipita raiʋa simba raro, rakaŋga risinomugumo; Puti neRubimi ʋaiʋa ʋaɓatsiri ʋako.

Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋakazoenda naro, rakatapxa; ʋana ʋaro ʋaɗuku ʋakaputsanyiwa pakuʋamba kwenzira dzose dzomumusha; ʋakakanda mijenya pamsoro paʋaikudzwa pakati paʋo, ʋakuru ʋaro ʋose ʋakasuŋgwa namaketani.
Newe ʋo ucaɓatwa
Nhare dzako dzose dzicafanana nemiʋonde inamaʋonde otaŋga kuibva; kana icizuzwa, anowira mumuromo wounodya.
Tarira, ʋanhu ʋako pakati pako ʋakaita
Ɀicerere mvura
Mŋoto ucakupedza’po, munondo ucakuparadza, ucakupedza segwatakwata; ɀiitei ʋazhinji segwatakwata, ɀiitei ʋazhinji semhashu.
Makawanza ʋateŋgesi ʋenyu ʋakapfuʋura nyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga; gwatakwata rinoparadza, ndokubururuka ricienda.
Macinda enyu akaita semhashu, ʋakuru ʋenyu semhashu zhinji‐zhinji, dzinoʋata pazhowa kana kunecando, asi kana zuʋa raɓuɗa dzinobururuka dzicienda, hadzicazikanwi kwadzaʋari.
Ʋafudzi ʋako ʋanotsimŋaira, iwe mambo weAsiria, ʋakakudzwa ʋako ʋanyarara, ʋanhu ʋako ʋakapararira pamakomo, hakunauŋgaʋaʋuŋganidza.
Kukuʋadzwa kwako hakuŋgarapxi, ʋaŋga rako rakaipa kwaɀo; ʋose ʋanonzwa guhu rako ʋacakuitira nondo; nokuti ndianiko wakaŋga asiŋgatambudzwi ŋguʋa dzose neɀakashata ɀako?
Cireʋo
Haiwa, Jehova, ndicaɗana kuȿikira riniko, imi musiŋganzwi? Ndinoɗana kwamuri pamsoro pokuitirwa simba, asi hamundiponesi.
Munondiratidzireiko ɀakaipa, munotarireiko ɀisakarurama? Nokuti kuparadza nokuita nesimba ɀiri pamberi paŋgu; rukaʋe ruri’po, ʋuye kukakaʋara kunomuka.
Saka murairo haunesimba, ʋuye kururamisira
Tarirai pakati pamarudzi, muʋone, mushamiswe kwaɀo‐kwaɀo; nokuti ndinoɓate‐ɓasa pamazuʋa enyu, ramucaramba kutenda kunyaŋge muciɀiʋudzwa.
Nokuti tarirai, ndinomutsa ʋaKardea, rudzi runehasha runopeŋga, ʋanofamba panyika pose, kuti ʋaɀitorere ʋugaro ʋusati ʋuri bgaʋo.
Ʋanotyisa nokukarudza; kutoŋga kwaʋo nokukudzwa kwaʋo kunobva kwaʋari ʋamene.

Mabiza aʋo ʋo anomhanya acipfuʋura iŋgwe, anehasha kupfuʋura mapere amaɗekwana; ʋataȿi ʋaʋo ʋamabiza ʋanomhanya ʋaciuruka, ɀirokwaɀo ʋataȿi ʋaʋo ʋamabiza ʋanoʋuya ʋacibva kure, ʋanobururuka segondo rinokurumidzira kudya.
Ʋanoʋuya ʋose kuzoita nesimba; ɀiso ɀaʋo ɀakatarira mberi; ʋanoʋuŋganidza ʋatapxa sejeca.
Ɀirokwaɀo ʋanoɗaɗira madzimambo, macinda anosekwa naʋo; ʋanoseka nhare dzose, nokuti ʋano
Ipapo ʋanopfuʋura semhepo, ndokuenda, asi ʋanemhoȿa, iʋo ʋanoita simba raʋo mŋari waʋo.
Imi Jehova, Mŋari waŋgu, Mutȿene waŋgu, hamuzakaʋa’po kubva pakutaŋga‐taŋga here? Isu hatiŋgafi. Jehova, imi makatema kuti ʋatoŋge, nemi ɗombo, makaʋaisa’po kuti ʋaraŋge.
Imi, munameso akaiȿo‐naka, asiŋgaɗi kutarira ɀakaipa, musiŋgaɗi kuʋona ɀisakarurama, munotaririreiko ʋanonyeŋgera, mucinyarara kana wakashata acimedza wakamupfuʋura nokururama;
muciita ʋanhu sehoʋe dzeguŋgwa, seɀinokambaira, ɀisinomuɓati?
Ʋanoʋaredza ʋose neciredzo caʋo, ʋanoʋaɓata mumumbure waʋo, ʋaciʋaʋuŋganidzira murutaʋa rwaʋo; naiɀoɀo ʋanofara kwaɀo ʋanomufaro.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanoɓayira mumbure waʋo, nokupisira rutaʋa rwaʋo ɀinonhuwira, nokuti mugoʋe waʋo wakakora naɀo, ɀokudya ɀaʋo ɀawanda.
Ɀino ʋaŋgaɗurura ɀiri mumumbure waʋo, ʋakaramba ʋaciʋuraya marudzi aʋanhu here?
Ndicandomira panɀimbo yaŋgu yokutaririra, ndicaɀiisa parutura rwaŋgu, ndicatarira ndiʋone ɀaacataura neni, ʋuye ɀandiŋgapindura pamsoro pokucema kwaŋgu.
Jehova akandipindura, akati: Nyora ɀawaratidzwa, ɀiʋonekwe kwaɀo pamahwendefa, kuti ɀigone kurabga nounomhanya.
Nokuti ɀakaratidzwa iɀi ndeɀeŋguʋa yakatarwa, ɀoʋaʋarira kuguma, haɀiŋgareʋi nhema; kunyaŋge ɀikanonoka, uɀimirire, nokuti ɀicaʋuya ɀirokwaɀo, haɀiŋgaiti ŋguʋa huru.
Tarirai, mŋeya waʋo unamanyawi, hauna‐kururama mukati maʋo; asi wakarurama ucararama nokutenda kwake.

Ʋuye ɀe, ɀirokwaɀo, waini inonyeŋgera, murume unoɀikudza, usiŋgagari kumba kwake, wakashamisa kukara kwake seSheori, wakafanana norufu; haaŋgaguti, asi unoɀiʋuŋganidzira marudzi ose, unoɀikokerera marudzi ose aʋanhu.
Ko aʋa ʋose haʋaŋgaimbi rwiyo pamsoro pake, nokumuɗaɗira necirabge, ʋaciti: Unenhamo unowanza ɀisati ɀiri ɀake! Kuȿikira riniko? Ʋuye unoɀiremedza noʋuɓatso!
Ʋacakurumai haʋaŋga simuki pakarepo, ʋanokumanikidzai haʋaŋgamuki here, imi mukapambga naʋo?
Imi ɀamakapamba marudzi mazhinji, ʋose ʋakasara ʋamarudzi aʋanhu ʋacakupambai imi, nemhaka yeropa raʋanhu, ʋuye nemhaka yokuti makaitira nyika simba, neguta naʋose ʋagere’mo.
Unenhamo unoɀiwanira imba yake fuma yakaipa, kuti aise ɗendere rake kwakakwirira, kuti arwirwe paruʋoko rweɀakaipa!
Makaraŋganira imba yenyu ɀinonyadza, ɀamakaparadza marudzi mazhinji aʋanhu, mukatadzira mŋeya wenyu.
Nokuti ibge ricaɗanidzira riri paruȿiŋgo, ɗanda riri muɗeŋga ricapindura.
Unenhamo unoʋaka musha neropa, unoʋamba guta neɀakaipa!
Tarirai, haɀina‐kubva kunaJehova wehondo here kuti ʋanhu ʋaɓatire mŋoto, ʋuye kuti marudzi aʋanhu aɀinetse nokuɗa kweɀisinamaturo?
Nokuti nyika yose icazadzwa nokuziʋa kubginya kwaJehova, mvura seɀainofukidza pasi peguŋgwa.
Unenhamo unopa wokwake ɀinoɓata aɀinwe, unoveŋganisira’mo ʋuturu bgenyu, mucimudakisa ʋo, kuti muʋone kushama kwaʋo!
Maɀigutisa neɀinonyadzisa panɀimbo yeɀinokudzwa; cinwai nemi ʋo, muʋe sousina‐kudziŋgiswa; mukombe worudyi rwaJehova ucaȿikira kwamuri, ɀinonyadzisa ɀakaipa ɀicaʋuya pamsoro pokukudzwa kwenyu.
Nokuti ɀakaipa ɀakaitirwa Rebanoni ɀicakufukidzai imi, ʋuye kuparadzwa kweɀipfuwo kwakaɀityisa; nemhaka yeropa raʋanhu, nemhaka yeɀakaipa ɀakaitirwa nyika, neguta, naʋose ʋagere’mo.
Mufananidzo wakaʋezwa unoɓatsireiko, ɀawaʋezwa nomuʋezi wawo; kana mufananidzo wakaʋumbga, iwo mudzidzisi wenhema, iye wakauʋumba ɀaanoʋimba nawo, ɀaakaita ɀifananidzo ɀisiŋgagoni kutaura?
Unenhamo unoti kuɗanda: Muka! kana kubge risiŋgagoni kutaura: Simuka! Ɀinhu iɀi ɀiŋgadzidzisa here? Tarirai, ɀakanamirwa nendarama nesirveri, asi hakunomŋeya mukati maɀo napaɗuku.
Asi Jehova uri mutembere yake tȿene, nyika yose ŋgairambe inyerere pamberi pake.
Munyeŋgetero womuprofita Habakuki,
Haiwa, Jehova, ndakanzwa mashoko enyu, ndikatya;
Haiwa, Jehova, mutsai ɓasa renyu pakati pamakore;
Riziʋisei pakati pamakore;
Pakutsamŋa kwenyu raŋgarirai nyasha.
Mŋari unoʋuya acibva Temani,
Naiye Mutȿene acibva pagomo reParani. Sera.
Ʋumambo bgake ʋunofukidza ɗeŋga rose,
Nyika izere nokurumbidzwa kwake.
Kupenya kuri’po kwakafanana neciedza;
Bgerazuʋa ʋunoɓuɗa paruʋoko rwake,
Simba rake rinoʋanda’po.
Hosha yakaipa inomutuŋgamirira,
Mazimbe omŋoto anoɓuɗa patsoka dzake.
Unomira aciyera nyika;
Unotarira, ndokuparadza marudzi aʋanhu;
Makomo asiŋgaperi anopararira;
Ɀikomo ɀisiŋgaperi ɀinokotama;
Nzira dzake ndedzekare‐kare.
Ndinoʋona matente eKushani ari panhamo;
Miceka yamatente enyika yeMidiani anoɗeɗera.
Ko Jehova wakatsamŋira nzizi here?
Hasha dzenyu dzakamukira nzizi here?
Kutsamŋa kwenyu kwakamukira guŋgwa here,
Ɀamunotaȿa mabiza enyu,
Mucifamba neŋgoro dzenyu dzoruponeso?
Ʋuta bgenyu bgakafukurwa kwaɀo;
Shamhu dzakapikirwa neshoko
Makaparura nyika nenzizi.
Makomo akakuʋonai akatya,
Kuɗira kwemvura kwakapfuʋura;
Pakadzika pakaɓuɗisa inzwi rapo,
Pakasimudzira maʋoko apo kumsoro.
Zuʋa nomŋedzi ɀakamira paʋugaro bgaɀo,
Ɀiciʋona ciedza cemiseʋe yenyu icipfuʋura,
Ɀiciʋona kupenya kwepfumo renyu rinobginya.
Makatsika nyika makatsamŋa,
Makapura ndudzi munehasha.
Makaɓuɗa kuzoponesa ʋanhu ʋenyu,
Kuzoponesa muzodziwa wenyu;
Makakuʋadza musoro weimba yowakaipa,
Mucifukura nheyo kuȿikira kumutsipa
Makabvoʋora misoro yaʋarwi ʋake namapfumo ake;
Ʋakaʋuya secampupuri kundiparadza;
Kufara kwaʋo kwakaita sokwaʋanopedza ʋarombo pakaʋanda.
Makatsika guŋgwa namabiza enyu,
Iwo murwi wemvura zhinji.
Ndakanzwa, muʋiri waŋgu ukaɗeɗera,
Miromo yaŋgu yakaɗeɗera ndicinzwa inzwi;
Kuʋora kwakapinda mumafupa aŋgu, ndikaɗeɗera pandakaŋga ndiri,
Nokuti ndinofanira kumirira zuʋa renjodzi ndinyerere,
Kana iye, unozorwa naʋanhu, aciʋawira.
Nokuti kunyaŋge muʋonde ukasatuŋga maruʋa,
Nemizambiriŋga ikashaiwa ɀiɓereko,
Kunyaŋge kuɓereka kwomuorivi kukakona,
Neminda ikasaɓereka ɀokudya;
Kunyaŋge makwai akapera mucirugu,
Neŋombe dzikashaikwa mumataŋga,
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ndicafara kwaɀo munaJehova,
Ndicaʋa nomufaro munaMŋari woruponeso rwaŋgu.
Jehova Ishe isimba raŋgu,
Unoita tsoka dzaŋgu dziʋe se
Unondifambisa pamatunhu aŋgu akakwirira.
Kumutuŋgamiriri wokuimba, nemiteŋgeranwa yaŋgu.
Shoko raJehova, rakaȿika kunaZefania, mŋanakomana waKushi, mŋanakomana waGedaria, mŋanakomana waAmaria, mŋanakomana waHezekia, namazuʋa aJosia, mŋanakomana waAmoni, mambo waJuda.
Ndicaparadza cose ɀinhu ɀose ɀiri pasi pose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicaparadza ʋanhu neɀipfuwo; ndicaparadza shiri dzokuɗeŋga, nehoʋe dzeguŋgwa, neɀigumbuso pamŋe cete naʋakaipa; ndicabvisa ʋanhu pasi pose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kunaJuda, nokunaʋose ʋagere Jerusarema; ndicabvisa ʋakasara ʋaBaari panɀimbo ino, nezita raʋaKemarimi pamŋe cete naʋaprista;
naʋanonamata hondo dzokuɗeŋga pamateŋga edzimba, naʋanamati, ʋanopika naJehova ʋacipika
naʋakadzoka pakuteʋera Jehova, naʋasina‐kutȿaka Jehova kana kumubvunza.
Nyararai pamberi paShe Jehova, nokuti zuʋa raJehova raʋa pedyo; nokuti Jehova wakagadzira ciɓayiro, ʋakakokwa naye wakaʋaita ʋatȿene.
Ɀino nezuʋa reciɓayiro caJehova ndicaroʋa macinda naʋanakomana ʋamambo, naʋose ʋakapfeka ŋguʋo dzaʋatorwa.
Nezuʋa iro ndicaroʋa ʋose ʋanoɗarika cikumbaridzo, ʋanozadza imba yatenzi waʋo nokupambara nokunyeŋgera.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kucanzwika mhere inobva pasuʋo rehoʋe, nokucema kunobva kurutiʋi rutȿa rweguta, nokukoromoka kukuru kunobva kumakomo.
Cemai imi mugere Makteshi; nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋeKanani ʋapera, ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakafuma sirveri ʋabviswa.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo ndicanɀera Jerusarema nemŋenje; ndicaroʋa ʋarume ʋagere pamasese aʋo, ʋanoti mumŋoyo yaʋo: Jehova haaŋgaiti ɀakanaka, ʋuye haaŋgaiti ɀakaipa.
Fuma yaʋo icaitwa ɀakapambga, nedzimba dzaʋo matoŋgo; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋacaʋaka dzimba, asi haʋaŋgagari’mo; ʋacasima minda yemizambiriŋga, asi haʋaŋganwi waini yayo.
Zuʋa guru raJehova raʋa pedyo, raʋa pedyo, rinokurumidza kwaɀo, iro inzwi rezuʋa raJehova; mhare inocema’po ɀikuru kwaɀo.
Zuʋa iro izuʋa rokutsamŋa, zuʋa rokutambudzika nokumanikidzwa, zuʋa rokurashwa nokuparadzwa, zuʋa rerima nerokuȿiɓa, zuʋa ramakore nerezarima guru,
zuʋa rehwamanda neremhere, ɀinoridzirwa maguta akakomberedzwa namaȿiŋgo neshoŋgwe dzakakwirira.
Ndicaʋuyisira ʋanhu kumanikidzwa, kuti ʋafambe samapofu, nokuti ʋakatadzira Jehova; ropa raʋo ricaɗururwa seguruʋa, nenyama yaʋo sendoʋe.
Sirveri yaʋo kunyaŋge ndarama yaʋo haɀiŋgagoni kuʋarwira nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwaJehova; asi nyika yose icapedzwa nomŋoto wegoɗo rake; nokuti ucapedza, ɀirokwaɀo ucapedza ɀinotyisa, ʋose ʋagere panyika.
Ʋuŋganai, ɀirokwaɀo ʋuŋganai, imi rudzi rusiŋganyari;
cireʋo cisati caɓereka, zuʋa risati rapfuʋura sehundi, kutsamŋa kukuru kwaJehova kusati kwaʋuya pamsoro penyu, zuʋa rokutsamŋa kwaJehova risati raʋuya pamsoro penyu.
Tȿakai Jehova, imi mose ʋanyoro ʋenyika, imi makaceŋgeta mitemo yake; tȿakai kururama, tȿakai ʋunyoro; ɀimŋe muŋgaʋandika nezuʋa rokutsamŋa kwaJehova.
Nokuti Gaza ricasiyiwa, Ashkeroni ricaitwa ɗoŋgo; ʋacadziŋga Ashdodi masikati makuru, Ekroni ricadzurwa.
Ʋanenhamo ʋagere panyika iri paguŋgwa, irwo rudzi rwaʋaKereti! Shoko raJehova rinokutuka, iwe Kanani, nyika yaʋaFiristia; ndicakuparadza, kuti parege kuzoʋa unogara’po.
Mhenderekedzo dzeguŋgwa dzicaʋa mafuro anamapako aʋafudzi neɀirugu ɀamakwai.
Mhenderekedzo dzicaʋa dzaʋakasara ʋeimba yaJuda; ʋacafudza’po
Ndakanzwa kuɀidza kwaMoabi, nokutuka kwaʋana ʋaAmoni, kwaʋakaɀidza nako ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, ʋaciita manyawi pamuganho waʋo.

Naiɀoɀo noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo, Mŋari waIsraeri: Ɀirokwaɀo, Moabi ʋacaita seSodoma, naʋana ʋaAmoni seGomora, nyika yorukato, namakomba omunyu, namatoŋgo nokusiŋgaperi; ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakasara ʋacaʋaita cinhu cakatapxa, ʋakasara ʋorudzi rwaŋgu ʋacaʋagara nhaka.
Ndiɀo ɀaʋacapiwa nokuɗa kwokuɀikudza kwaʋo, nokuti ʋakaɀidza ʋanhu ʋaJehova wehondo nokuɀikudza kwaʋari.
Jehova ucaʋatyisa kwaɀo, nokuti ucaparadza ʋamŋari ʋose ʋenyika; ʋanhu ʋacamunamata iye, mumŋe nomumŋe acibva panɀimbo yake, naiɀo ɀiwi ɀose ɀendudzi.
Nemi ʋo ʋeEtiopia, mucaʋurawa nomunondo waŋgu.
Ucatambanudzira ruʋoko rwake kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, ndokuparadza Asiria; Nineve ucariita ɗoŋgo, riwome serenje.

Ɀipfuwo ɀicaʋata pasi mukati maro, idzo mhuka dzamarudzi ose; hukurwizi nenuŋgu ɀicaʋata pamisoro yembiru dzaro; inzwi rokurira kwaɀo ricanzwika pamawindi; kuparadzwa kucaʋa’po paɀikumbaridzo; nokuti wakafukunura ɀakaʋezwa ɀemisidari.

Iri ndiro guta raigara nomufaro risinehanya, raiti mumŋoyo maro: Ndini, hakucinomumŋe kunze kwaŋgu! Haiwa, raitwa ɗoŋgo sei, nɀimbo inoʋata mhuka! Mumŋe nomumŋe unopfuʋura napo ucaridza muridzo, acizunuŋgusa ruʋoko rwake.
Rinenhamo iro guta rinomukira
Harina‐kuterera inzwi, harina‐kutenda kuraŋgwa, harina‐kuʋimba naJehova, harina‐kusweɗera kunaMŋari waro.
Macinda aro mukati maro ishumba dzinoʋomba, ʋatoŋgi ʋaro mapere amaɗekwana, asiŋgasiyi cinhu kuȿikira maŋgwanani.
Ʋaprofita ʋaro ʋanhu ʋakareruka ʋanonyeŋgera; ʋaprista ʋaro ʋakamhura nɀimbo tȿene, ʋakaitira murairo simba.
Jehova uri mukati maro wakarurama, haaŋgaiti ɀakaipa; zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe maŋgwanani unoɓuɗisa pacena kururamisa kwake, asiŋgaɗariki; asi usina‐kururama haaziʋi kunyara.
Ndakaparadza ndudzi, shoŋgwe dzaʋo aʋa matoŋgo; nzira dzaʋo dzomumisha ndakadziparadza, hakucina‐unopfuʋura napo; maguta aʋo akaparadzwa, hakunaʋanhu’mo, hakuna‐ugere’po.
Ndakati: Unditye cete; tenda kuraŋgwa; ipapo paanogara hapazaiparadzwa, seɀandakaraira ɀose pamsoro pake; asi ʋakafumira maŋgwanani, ʋakaȿiɓisa ɀose ɀaʋakaita.

Naiɀoɀo, ndimirirei — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — kuȿikira zuʋa randicasimuka kuzopamba; nokuti ndatoŋga kuti ndicaʋuŋganidza ndudzi dzaʋanhu, kuti ndikokere ʋushe bgose, ndiɗire pamsoro paʋo hasha dzaŋgu, iko kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kukuru; nokuti nyika yose icapedzwa nomŋoto wegoɗo raŋgu.
Nokuti neŋguʋa iyo ndicaʋigira ʋanhu rurimi rwakacena, kuti ʋose ʋaɗane zita raJehova, ʋamushumire nomŋoyo mumŋe.
Ʋanamati ʋaŋgu, iye mukunda waʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋakaparadzirwa, ʋacandiʋigira cipiriso caŋgu ʋacibva mhiri kwenzizi dzeEtiopia.
Nezuʋa iro hauŋganyadziswi pamsoro pamaɓasa ako ose, awakandiɗarikira nawo; nokuti neŋguʋa iyo ndicabvisa pakati pako ʋanhu ʋako ʋanofarisisa ʋaciɀikudza; hauŋgazoʋi namanyawi pagomo raŋgu tȿene.
Asi ndicarega mukati mako ʋanhu ʋanotambudzika naʋarombo; iʋo ʋacaʋimba nezita raJehova.
Ʋakasara ʋaIsraeri haʋaŋgaiti ɀakaipa, kana kureʋa nhema; rurimi runonyeŋgera haruŋgawanikwi mumiromo yaʋo; nokuti ʋacafura nokuʋata pasi, hakuna‐uŋgaʋatyisa.
Imba, iwe mukunda weZioni, pururudza, iwe Israeri; fara ufarisise nomŋoyo wako wose, iwe mukunda weJerusarema.
Jehova wakabvisa ɀawakatoŋgerwa, wakadziŋga muʋeŋgi wako; mambo waIsraeri, iye Jehova, uri pakati pako, hauŋgazoʋoni ɀe ɀakaipa.
Nezuʋa iro ʋacati kuJerusarema: Usatya hako iwe; iwe Zioni, maʋoko ako ŋgaarege kushaiwa simba.
Jehova Mŋari wako uri mukati mako, iye unesimba, ucaponesa; ucakufarira nomufaro; ucanyarara paruɗo rwake; ucakufarira nokupururudza.
Ndicaʋuŋganidza ʋanocemera ʋuŋgano yakatarwa, iʋo ʋaibva kwamuri, ʋairemerwa nokuɀidzwa kwaʋo.
Tarirai, neŋguʋa iyo ndicatoŋga ʋose ʋanokumanikidza, ndicaponesa ʋanokamhina, nokuʋuŋganidza ʋakadziŋgwa; ndicaʋaitira mbiri nezita rakanaka, iʋo ʋainyadziswa panyika yose.

Neŋguʋa iyo ndicakuʋuyisai, neŋguʋa iyo ndicakuʋuŋganidzai, nokuti ndicakuitirai zita rakanaka nembiri pakati pendudzi dzose dzenyika, kana ndicidzosa kutapxa kwenyu, imi muciɀiʋona — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Negore recipiri ramambo Dariusi, nomŋedzi wecitanhatu, pazuʋa rokutaŋga romŋedzi, shoko raJehova rakaȿika nomuprofita Hagai kunaZerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, muɓati waJuda, nokunaJoshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru, riciti:
Jehova wehondo unotaura, aciti: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋanoti: Ŋguʋa icigere kuȿika, iyo ŋguʋa yokuʋakwa kweimba yaJehova.
Ipapo shoko raJehova rakaȿika nomuprofita Hagai, riciti:
Ko ɀino iŋguʋa yamuŋgagara imi mudzimba dzenyu dzakashoŋgedzwa namatanda, imba ino riri ɗoŋgo here?
Ɀino ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Cerekedzai ɀamakaita.
Makakusha ɀizhinji, asi makaceka ɀishoma; munodya, asi hamuguti; munonwa, asi hamuguŋgwi; munofuka, asi hakunaunodziyirwa; unoɓatira muɓairo unoɓatira kuti aɀiceŋgete muhomboɗo yakabvoʋoka.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Cerekedzai ɀamakaita.
Kwirai mugomo, muʋuye namatanda, muʋake imba iyi; ini ndicaifarira, ʋuye ini ndicakudzwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Makafuŋga kuwana ɀizhinji, tarirai, ɀakaŋgoita ɀishoma; makati maɀiisa kumusha, ini ndikafuridzira pamsoro paɀo. Nemhaka yeiko? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo. Nemhaka yeimba yaŋgu riri ɗoŋgo, mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu acimhanyira kumba kwake.
Saka ɗeŋga rakaramba nedoʋa nemhaka yenyu, nenyika inoramba neɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Ndakaɗana kuwoma kuʋuye panyika, napamakomo, napaɀiyo, napawaini itȿa, napamafuta, napaneɀinoɓerekwa nevu, napaʋanhu, napaɀipfuwo, napamaɓasa ose amaʋoko

Ipapo Zerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, naJoshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara, ʋakateerera inzwi raJehova Mŋari waʋo, namashoko omuprofita Hagai, seɀaakaŋga atumŋa naJehova Mŋari waʋo; ʋanhu ʋakatya pamberi paJehova.
Ipapo Hagai, nhume yaJehova, wakataura naʋanhu seɀaakarairwa neshoko rakatumŋa naJehova, akati: Ndinemi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Jehova akamutsa mŋeya waZerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, muɓati waJuda, nomŋeya waJoshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru, nomŋeya waʋanhu ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋasara, ʋakaʋuya ʋakaɓata paimba yaJehova wehondo, Mŋari waʋo,
nezuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanna romŋedzi wecitanhatu, negore recipiri ramambo Dariusi.
No
Ɀino citaura naZerubaberi mŋanakomana waSheartieri, muɓati waJuda, naJoshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru, naʋanhu ʋose ʋakasara, uti:
Ndiani wakasara pakati penyu, wakaɗeya kuʋona imba ino pakubginya kwayo kwokutaŋga? Ɀino munoiʋona yakaɗiniko? Pakuʋona kwenyu haina‐kuita sapasina here?

Asi ɀino ciʋa nesimba, iwe Zerubaberi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; newe Joshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru, iʋa nesimba; nemi ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika, iʋai nesimba, muɓate — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndinemi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
shoko resuŋgano yandakaita nemi, ŋguʋa yamakaɓuɗa Egipita, mŋeya waŋgu ucigere pakati penyu; regai kutya.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Kamŋe cete, kwasara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, ndicazunuŋgusa ɗeŋga rose, nenyika neguŋgwa, nenyika yakawoma;
ndicazunuŋgusa ndudzi dzose; ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa nendudzi dzose ɀicaʋuya; ndicazadza imba ino nokubginya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Sirveri ndeyaŋgu, nendarama ndeyaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Kubginya kwokupedzisira kweimba ino kucapfuʋura kwokutaŋga — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo; panɀimbo ino ndicapa rugare — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ne
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Cibvunza ʋaprista pamsoro pomurairo, uti:

Kana munhu acitakura nyama tȿene mumupendero weŋguʋo yake, akagunɀa nomupendero ciŋgwa, kana ɀakaɓikwa, kana waini, kana mafuta, kana ɀokudya ɀipi neɀipi, ko ɀaʋa ɀitȿene here? Ʋaprista ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Kwete.
Ipapo Hagai akati: Kana munhu, wakaȿiɓiswa nemhaka yokuɓata citunha, akagunɀa cinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀi, ko caȿiɓiswa here? Ʋaprista ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Caȿiɓiswa.
Ipapo Hagai akapindura, akati: Ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋanhu aʋa norudzi urwu pamberi paŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; ndiɀo ɀakaita ɀose ɀaʋanoita namaʋoko aʋo, ʋuye ɀaʋanoɓayira’po ɀakaȿiɓiswa.
Ɀino fuŋgai henyu kubva pazuʋa ranhasi mucidzokera shure, ibge rimŋe ricigere kuiswa pamsoro pebge mutembere yaJehova.
Neŋguʋa iyo yose kana munhu aciŋge aȿika pamurwi
Ndakakuroʋai nenyunje nokuvuva necimvuramabge pamaɓasa ose amaʋoko enyu; asi hamuna‐
Cifuŋgai henyu kubva pazuʋa ranhasi mucidzokera shure, kubva pazuʋa ramakumi maʋiri namanna ro
Ko mbeu ici’mo muɗura here? Ɀirokwaɀo, muzambiriŋga nomuʋonde nomutamba nomuorivi haɀina‐kuɓereka; kubva pazuʋa rino ndica
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika rwecipiri kunaHagai ne
Taura naZerubaberi, muɓati waJuda, uti: Ndicazunuŋgusa ɗeŋga rose nenyika;
ndicawisira pasi ɀigaro ɀoʋushe; ndicaparadza simba roʋushe bgendudzi; ndicawisira pasi ŋgoro naʋanofamba nadzo; mabiza naʋanoataȿa acawira pasi, mumŋe nomumŋe nomunondo wehama yake.

Nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicakutora iwe, Zerubaberi, muranda waŋgu, mŋanakomana waSheartieri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicakuita secisimbiso; nokuti ndakakusanaŋgura — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Nomŋedzi worusere, negore recipiri raDariusi, shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaZekaria, mŋanakomana waBerekia, mŋanakomana womuprofita Ido, riciti:
Jehova wakatsamŋira madziɓaɓa enyu ɀikuru.
Naiɀoɀo citi kwaʋari: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Dzokerai kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — neni ndicadzokera kwamuri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Regai kuʋa samadziɓaɓa enyu,
Madziɓaɓa enyu aripiko? Naiʋo ʋaprofita ʋaŋgararama nokusiŋgaperi here?

Asi mashoko aŋgu nemitemo yaŋgu, ɀandakaraira ʋaranda ʋaŋgu, iʋo ʋaprofita, haɀina‐kuɓata madziɓaɓa enyu here? Iʋo ʋakadzoka, ʋakati: Jehova wehondo seɀaakafuŋga kutiitira, ɀakafanira maɓasa eɗu neɀakafanira ɀatakaita, ndiɀo ɀaakatiitira.
Nezuʋa ramakumi namanna romŋedzi wegumi nomumŋe, uri mŋedzi weShebati, negore recipiri raDariusi, shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaZekaria mŋanakomana waBerekia, mŋanakomana womuprofita Ido, riciti:
Ndakatarira ʋusiku, ndikaʋona murume wakataȿa biza dɀuku, akamira pakati pemiti yemimirte yaiʋa mumupata; shure kwake kwakaŋga kunamabiza matȿuku namashora namacena.
Ipapo ndikati: Nhai, ishe waŋgu, ɀinyiko iɀi? Mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni akati kwandiri: Ndicakuratidza kuti iɀi ɀinyi.
Murume wakaŋga amire pakati pemiti yemimirte akapindura, akati: Aʋa ndiʋo ʋakatumŋa naJehova kupota‐pota nenyika
Iʋo ʋakapindura mutumŋa waJehova wakaŋga amire pakati pemiti yemimirte, ʋakati: Takapota‐pota nenyika
Ipapo mutumŋa waJehova wakapindura, akati: Haiwa, Jehova wehondo, mucaramba musiŋganzwiri nyasha Jerusarema namaguta aJuda amakatsamŋira makore ano anamakumi manomŋe kuȿikira riniko?
Ipapo Jehova wakapindura mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni, mashoko akanaka anonyaradza.
Ipapo mutumŋa, wakaŋga acitaurirana neni, akati kwandiri: Ƌanidzira, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndinegoɗo pamsoro peJerusarema, goɗo guru.
Ndakatsamŋira kwaɀo ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzakazorora, nokuti ndakaŋga ndakatsamŋa ɀishoma, asi iʋo ʋakanyanyisa nhamo.
Naiɀoɀo ɀanzi naJehova: Ndadzokera Jerusarema ndinenyasha zhinji; imba yaŋgu icaʋakwa’mo — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ʋuye rwonzi rwokuyera rucatambanudzirwa pamsoro peJerusarema.
Ƌanidzira ɀe, uti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Maguta aŋgu acapafuma mufaro ɀe, Jehova ucanyaradza ɀe Zioni, ucaɀisanaŋgurira ɀe Jerusarema.
Ɀino ndakarinzira meso aŋgu ndikatarira, ndikaʋona nyaŋga inna.
Ipapo ndikati kumutumŋa, wakaŋga acitaurirana neni: Ɀinyiko iɀi? Akandipindura,
Jehova akandiratidza ʋapfuri ʋanna.

Ipapo ndikati: Aʋa ʋaʋuya kuzoɓateiko? Iye akataura, akati: Ndidzo nyaŋga dzakaparadzira Juda, kuȿikira kusinomunhu wakasimudza musoro wake; asi aʋa ʋaʋuya kuzoʋatyisa, kuwisira pasi nyaŋga dzendudzi dzaʋanhu dzakasimudzira nyika yaJuda runyaŋga rwaʋo ʋaciɗa kuʋaparadzira.
Ɀino ndakarinzira meso aŋgu, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona murume akaɓata rwonzi rwokuyera muruʋoko rwake.
Ipapo ndikati: Unoendepiko? Iye akati kwandiri: Kundoyera Jerusarema, ndiʋone kufara kwaro nokureɓa kwaro.
Ɀino tarira, mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni, akaɓuɗa, mumŋe mutumŋa akandomuciŋgamidza,
akati kwaari: Mhanya, undotaura nejaya iri, uti: Jerusarema ricagara semisha isinamaȿiŋgo, nokuɗa kwokuwanda kwaʋanhu neɀipfuwo ɀiri’mo.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova: Ini ndicaʋa kwariri soruȿiŋgo rwomŋoto rwakapoteredza, ini ndicaʋa kubginya
Nhai, imi, tizai panyika yokumsoro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; nokuti ndakakuparadzirai semhepo inna dzokuɗeŋga — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Nhai, Zioni, tiza, iwe ugere nomukunda weBabironi.
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Wakanditumira kundudzi dzakakupambai imi, kuti ndiwane kukudzwa; nokuti unokugunɀai imi, unogunɀa mboni yeziso rake.
Nokuti tarirai, ndicazunuŋgusa ruʋoko rwaŋgu pamsoro paʋo, ʋacaʋa cinhu cakapambga kunaiʋo ʋaiʋaɓatira; ipapo mucaziʋa kuti Jehova wehondo ndiye wakandituma.
Imba ufare, iwe mukunda weZioni; nokuti tarira, ndinoʋuya, ndicagara mukati mako — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Ndudzi zhinji dzicanamatira Jehova nezuʋa iro, ʋakaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu; ndicagara mukati mako, ipapo iwe ucaziʋa kuti ndiye Jehova wehondo wakandituma kwauri.
Juda ʋacagarwa nhaka naJehova, ucaʋa mugoʋe wake munyika tȿene, ucaɀisanaŋgurira ɀe Jerusarema.
Nyararai imi nyama yose pamberi paJehova; nokuti wamuka paʋugaro bgake ʋutȿene.
Ɀino wakandiratidza Joshua muprista mukuru, amire pamberi pomutumŋa waJehova, Satani amire paruʋoko rwake rworudyi, kuti aʋe mudziʋisi wake.
Jehova akati kunaSatani: Jehova ŋgaakutuke, iwe Satani; ɀirokwaɀo, Jehova, wakaɀisanaŋgurira Jerusarema, ŋgaakutuke; ko ici hacizi citsika cakabvutwa pamŋoto here?
Ɀino Joshua wakaŋga akafuka ŋguʋo dzinetȿina, amire pamberi pomutumŋa.
Akapindura, akataura naʋakaŋga ʋamire pamberi pake, aciti: Bvisai ŋguʋo dzake dzinetȿina. Akati kwaari: Tarira, ndakabvisa ɀakaipa ɀako, ndicakupfekedza ŋguʋo dzomutambo.
Ini ndikati: Ŋgaʋamudzike ŋgoani yakacena pamusoro wake. Ipapo ʋakamudzika ŋgoani yakacena pamusoro wake, ʋakamupfekedza ŋguʋo; ɀino mutumŋa waJehova wakaŋga amire’po.
Mutumŋa waJehova akapupura kunaJoshua, aciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Kana ukafamba nenzira dzaŋgu, kana ukaceŋgeta ɀandakakuraira, ipapo ucatoŋga imba yaŋgu, ʋuye ucaceŋgeta ʋo maʋazhe aŋgu, ini ndicakupa mapindire pakati paʋamire pano.
Ɀino cinzwa iwe Joshua, muprista mukuru, iwe neshamŋari dzako dzigere pamberi pako; nokuti ʋarume aʋa ciratidzo; nokuti tarirai, ndicaʋuyisa muranda waŋgu, Ƌaʋi.
Nokuti tarirai ibge randakaisa pamberi paJoshua; pabge rimŋe panameso manomŋe; tarirai, ndicatema runyoro rwaro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicabvisa ɀakaipa ɀenyika iyo nezuʋa rimŋe.
Nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — mucaɗana mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu shamŋari yake
Ɀino mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni wakaȿika ɀe, akandimutsa, somunhu unomutswa pahope dzake.

Akati kwandiri: Unoʋoneiko? Ini ndikati: Ndakatarira, ndikaʋona cigadziko comŋenje cendarama yose, cineharyana yaco pamsoro paco, nemŋenje yaco minomŋe iri pamsoro paco; mŋenje mumŋe nomumŋe uri pamsoro paco unempombi nomŋe;
ʋuye miti miʋiri yemiorivi parutiʋi rwaco, mumŋe kurutiʋi rworudyi rweharyana, nomumŋe kurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe.
Ndikapindura ndikataura nomutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni, ndiciti: Iɀi ɀinyiko, ishe waŋgu?
Ipapo mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni, wakapindura, akati kwandiri: Hauziʋi here kuti iɀi ɀinyiko? Ini ndikati: Kwete, ishe waŋgu.
Ipapo akapindura, akataura neni, aciti: Ndiro shoko raJehova kunaZerubaberi, rinoti:
Ndiwe aniko, iwe gomo guru? Pamberi paZerubaberi
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika ɀe kwandiri, riciti:
Maʋoko aZerubaberi akateya nheyo dzeimba ino, maʋoko ake acaipedzisa ʋo; ipapo iwe ucaziʋa kuti Jehova wehondo ndiye wakandituma kwauri.
Nokuti ndiani wakashoʋora zuʋa reɀinhu ɀiɗuku? Nokuti awa manomŋe acafara ɀikuru, acaʋona rwonzi rwokuyera muruʋoko rwaZerubaberi;
Ipapo ndakapindura, ndikati kwaari: Ko miorivi iyi miʋiri kurutiʋi rworudyi rwecigadziko nokurutiʋi rworuɓoshwe ɀinoti kuɗiniko?
Ndikapindura ɀe rwecipiri, ndikati kwaari: Ko mataʋi awa maʋiri omuorivi ari kumatiʋi emiromo miʋiri, inoɗira
Akandipindura, akati: Hauziʋi here kuti iɀi ɀinyiko? Ini ndikati: Kwete, ishe waŋgu.
Ɀino akati: Aʋa ndiʋo ʋaʋiri ʋakazodzwa, ʋamire pamberi paShe wenyika yose.
Ɀino ndakarinzira meso aŋgu ɀe, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona rugwaro rwakapetwa rucibururuka.
Akati kwandiri: Unoʋoneiko? Ndikapindura,
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Ndiko kutuka kunoɓuɗira pamsoro penyika yose; nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unoɓa ucaparadzwa kunorumŋe rutiʋi seɀa
Ndicaɓuɗisa
Ɀino mutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni wakaɓuɗa, akati kwandiri: Cirinzira meso ako ɀino, uʋone cinoɓuɗa’po.
Ini ndikati: Cinyiko? Iye akati: Ndiyo efa inoɓuɗa’po. Akati ɀe: Ndiɀo ɀaʋakaita panyika yose;
(ɀino ndikaʋona tarenta romutobvu ricisimudzwa);
Akati: Uyu ndiye Ɀakashata; akamuwisira pasi mukati meefa, akakandira mutobvu unorema pamsoro pomuromo wayo.

Ipapo ndakarinzira meso aŋgu, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona ʋakadzi ʋaʋiri ʋaciɓuɗa, mhepo iri mumapapiro aʋo; ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋanamapapiro akafanana namapapiro ezimudo; iʋo ʋakasimudza efa, ikaʋa pakati penyika neɗeŋga.
Ipapo ndikati kumutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni: Ʋanondoisepiko efa?
Iye akati kwandiri: Kundomuʋakira imba panyika yeShinari; kana yapera ucandoiswa’po panɀimbo yake.
Ɀino ndakarinzira meso aŋgu ɀe, ndikatarira, ndikaʋona ŋgoro inna dziciɓuɗa pakati pamakomo maʋiri; makomo iwayo akaŋga ari makomo endarira.
Ŋgoro yokutaŋga yakaŋga inamabiza matȿuku; ŋgoro yecipiri mabiza matema;
ŋgoro yecitatu mabiza macena, ŋgoro yecinna mabiza mapfumbu anesimba.
Ipapo ndakapindura, ndikati kumutumŋa wakaŋga acitaurirana neni: Ɀinyiko iɀi, ishe waŋgu?
Mutumŋa akapindura, akati kwandiri: Iɀeɀi ndidzo mhepo inna dzokuɗeŋga, dzinoɓuɗa padzakaŋga dzimire pamberi paShe wenyika yose.
inamabiza matema inoɓuɗira kunyika yokumsoro; macena akaateʋera; namapfumbu akaɓuɗira kunyika yezasi.
Anesimba akaɓuɗa ʋo, akatȿaka kuenda kuti apote‐pote nenyika yose; akati: Ibvai pano, mupote‐pote nenyika yose. Ipapo akapota‐pota nenyika yose.
Ipapo akaɗanidzira kwandiri, akataura neni, aciti: Tarirai, ʋanoenda kunyika yokumsoro, ʋakanyaradza mŋeya waŋgu kunyika yokumsoro.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Tora ʋamŋe kunaʋakatapxa, ʋanoti Herdai, naTobija, naJedaia; uʋuye nezuʋa irero upinde mumba maJosia mŋanakomana waZefania, kwaʋakaȿika ʋacibva Babironi;
utore kwaʋari sirveri nendarama, uite korona, uidzike pamusoro waJoshua mŋanakomana waJehozadaki, muprista mukuru;
utaure naye, uciti: Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarira, murume unezita rinonzi Ƌaʋi; iye ucakura panɀimbo yake, iye ucaʋaka tembere yaJehova;
ndiye ucaʋaka tembere yaJehova; iye ucaʋa noʋumambo, ʋuye ucagara pacigaro cake aciɓata ʋushe; ucaʋa muprista pacigaro cake coʋushe; raŋgano yorugare icaʋa pakati paʋo iʋo ʋaʋiri.
Korona dzicaʋa dzaHeremi, naTobija, naJedaia, naHeni mŋanakomana waZefania, ciʋe ciyeʋudzo mutembere yaJehova.
Ʋari kure ʋacaʋuya ʋaciʋaka mutembere yaJehova; ipapo mucaziʋa kuti Jehova wehondo ndiye wakanditumira kwamuri.
Ɀino negore recinna ramambo Dariusi shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaZekaria ne
Ɀino
nokutaura naʋaprista ʋeimba yaJehova wehondo, naʋaprofita, ʋaciti: Ko ndocema nomŋedzi wecishanu, ndiciɀiparadzanisa naʋamŋe, seɀandaiita makore awa mazhinji here?
Ipapo shoko raJehova wehondo rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Taura naʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika
Kana mucidya, kana mucinwa, hamuɀidyiri nokuɀinwira here?
Ko haazi mashoko aJehova aakaɗanidzira naʋaprofita ʋakare, Jerusarema ricakagarwa naʋanhu ricinomufaro, iro namaguta aro ose akaripoteredza, nenyika yezasi nenyika yamapani dzicinaʋanhu.
Ɀino shoko raJehova rakaȿika kunaZekaria, riciti:
Ndiɀo ɀakataura Jehova wehondo, aciti: Ruramisirai kwaɀo pakutoŋga, mumŋe nomumŋe aitire hama yake ʋunyoro netsitsi;
regai kumanikidza cirikadzi, kana nherera, kana mutorwa, kana murombo; kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu unofuŋgira hama yake ɀakaipa pamŋoyo pake.
Asi ʋakaramba kuterera, ʋakabvisa fudzi raʋo, nokudziʋira nzeʋe dzaʋo kuti ʋarege kunzwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo, mŋoyo yaʋo ʋakaiita sedaimani, kuti ʋarege kunzwa murairo namashoko akatumŋa naJehova wehondo noMŋeya wake naʋaprofita ʋakare; saka kutsamŋa kukuru kwakaɓuɗa kunaJehova wehondo.
Ɀino seɀaakaɗana, iʋo ʋakaramba kunzwa, saiɀoɀo iʋo ʋacaɗana ʋo, ini ndiciramba kunzwa — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo;

asi ndicaʋaparadzira necampupuri pakati pendudzi dzose dzaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi. Naiɀoɀo nyika yakaʋa ɗoŋgo shure kwaʋo, kukasaʋa nomunhu wakaenda kana kudzoka noko; nokuti ʋakaparadza nyika yakaŋga icifadza.
Ɀino shoko raJehova wehondo rakaȿika
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndinegoɗo pamsoro peZioni, goɗo guru, ndinegoɗo pamsoro paro, dziri shuŋgu kwadzo.
Ɀanzi naJehova: Ndadzokera paZioni, ndicagara pakati peJerusarema; Jerusarema ricanzi guta reɀokwaɗi, ʋuye gomo raJehova
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ʋatana naʋacembere ʋacagara ɀe munzira dzomuguta reJerusarema, murume mumŋe nomumŋe anomuɗonɀo wake nemhaka yokukwegura kwake.
Nzira dzomuguta dzicazara naʋakomana naʋasikana ʋanotamba munzira dzaro.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Kana ɀicishamisa pamberi paʋanhu aʋa ʋakasara namazuʋa iwayo, ko ɀiŋgashamisa pamberi paŋgu here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Tarirai, ndicaponesa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu kunyika yamabvazuʋa, nokunyika yamaʋirira;
ndicaʋaʋuyisa, ʋagare pakati peJerusarema; ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, neni ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo neɀokwaɗi nokururama.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Maʋoko enyu ŋgaasimbe, iyemi munonzwa mashoko awa mazuʋa ano pamiromo yaʋaprofita, ʋaiʋa’po nezuʋa rakateyiwa nheyo dzeimba yaJehova wehondo, iyo tembere, kuti iʋakwe.

Nokuti mazuʋa iwayo asati aȿika, kwakaŋga kusinomuɓairo womunhu kana muɓairo weɀipfuwo; kwakaŋga kusinorugare kunowaiɓuɗa kana kunowaipinda, nemhaka yomudziʋisi; nokuti ndairwisanisa ʋanhu ʋose mumŋe nomumŋe nowokwake.
Asi ɀino handicazoʋi kunaʋanhu aʋa ʋakasara sapamazuʋa akare — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Nokuti mbeu yorugare
Ɀino seɀamaiʋa cinhu cakatukwa pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu, imi imba yaJuda nemi imba yaIsraeri, saiɀoɀo ndicakuponesai, muʋe cinhu cinoropafadza. Regai kutya,
Nokuti ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Seɀandakafuŋga kukuitirai ɀakaipa, ŋguʋa yandakatsamŋiswa namadziɓaɓa enyu, ini ndikasaɀiɗemba — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo;
saiɀoɀo ʋo ndakafuŋga mazuʋa ano kuitira Jerusarema ɀakanaka ʋuye neimba yaJuda ʋo; regai kutya.
Heɀi ɀinhu ɀamunofanira kuita: Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaareʋe ɀokwaɗi kunowokwake; toŋgai neɀokwaɗi norugare mumasuʋo enyu;
kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu unofuŋgira wokwake ɀakaipa mumŋoyo make; musaɗa kupika kwenhema; nokuti ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ndinoɀiʋeŋga — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
