Ɀino shoko raJehova wehondo rakaȿika kwandiri, riciti:
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Kuɀinyima ɀokudya no
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzicaʋuya ɀe, naʋagere mumaguta mazhinji;
ʋagere mu
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndudzi zhinji dzaʋanhu namarudzi anesimba acaʋuya kuzotȿaka Jehova wehondo paJerusarema, nokukumbira nyasha kunaJehova.
Ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Namazuʋa iwayo ʋarume ʋanegumi pandimi dzose dzendudzi dzaʋanhu ʋacaɓata ŋguʋo yomunhu uri muJuda, ʋaciti: Ticaenda nemi, nokuti takanzwa kuti Mŋari unemi.
Cireʋo ceshoko raJehova pamsoro penyika yeHadraki, ʋuye paDamasko ndi’po paricagara; nokuti ziso raJehova rinotarira ʋanhu nendudzi dzose dzaIsraeri;
ʋuye Hamati ʋo, rakaɓatana naʋo; ʋuye Tire neSidoni, nokuti ʋakacenjera kwaɀo.
Tire rakaɀiʋakira nhare, rikaɀiʋuŋganidzira sirveri seguruʋa, nendarama yakaiȿo‐naka samatope ari munzira dzomumusha.
Tarirai, Jehova ucarikunda, ucawisira simba raro muguŋgwa; ricapedzwa nomŋoto.
Ashkeroni ricaɀiʋona, ndokutya; ʋuye Gaza ʋo, rikarwadziwa ɀikuru; ʋuye Ekroni, nokuti ricanyadziswa paneɀarakatarira; mambo ucaparara paEkroni, Ashkeroni hariŋgagarwi naʋanhu.
Mŋanakomana woʋupombge ucagara paAshdodi, ʋuye ndicaparadza kuɀikudza kwaʋaFiristia.
Ndicabvisa ropa rake mumuromo make, neɀinonyaŋgadza ɀake ɀiri pakati pameno ake; iye ʋo ucasarira Mŋari weɗu; ucaʋa somucinda paJuda, ʋuye Ekroni somuJebusi.
Ndicakomberedza imba yaŋgu nemisasa ndidziʋirire hondo, kurege kuʋa nomunhu unopfuʋura napo kana kudzoka napo; hakuŋgazoʋi nomumanikidzi unofamba napo; nokuti ɀino ndaɀiʋona nameso aŋgu.
Fara kwaɀo, iwe mukunda weZioni; pururudza iwe mukunda weJerusarema; tarira, mambo wako unoʋuya kwauri; ndiye wakarurama, ndiye unokunda; unoɀininipisa, akataȿa mboŋgoro, iyo mhuru mŋana wemboŋgoro.

Ndicaparadza ŋgoro pakati paEfraimi, namabiza paJerusarema; ʋuta bgokurwa ʋucaparadzwa; ucataurira ndudzi dzaʋanhu rugare; ʋushe bgake ʋucabva paguŋgwa kuȿikira paguŋgwa, nokubva kuRwizi kuȿikira kumigumo yenyika.
Kana uri’we ʋo, nokuɗa kweropa resuŋgano yako, ndakasunuŋgura ʋasuŋgwa ʋako mugomba risinemvura.
Dzokerai kunhare imi ʋasuŋgwa ʋanetariro; ikonhasi ndinokuʋudzai kuti ndicakupai migoʋe miʋiri.
Nokuti ndakaɀikuŋgira Juda soʋuta, ndikaisa’mo Efraimi
Jehova ucaʋonekwa pamsoro paʋo, museʋe wake ucaɓuɗa semheni; Ishe Jehova ucaridza hwamanda, ucafamba neɀampupuri ɀinobva zasi.
Jehova wehondo ucaʋadzitira; ʋacaparadza, ʋacatsika pasi mabge ecipfuramabge; ʋacanwa, ʋaciita ruzha sa
Jehova Mŋari waʋo ucaʋaponesa nezuʋa iro seɓoka raʋanhu ʋake; nokuti
Nokuti kufara kwaʋo kucaʋa kukuru sei, nokunaka kwaʋo kucaʋa kukuru sei! Ɀiyo ɀicakurisa majaya, waini itȿa
Kumbirai kunaJehova mvura neŋguʋa yemvura yokupedzisira, kunaiye Jehova unoita mheni; iye ucaʋapa mvura inonaya kwaɀo, mumŋe nomumŋe aʋe neɀinomera mumunda.
Nokuti terafimi dzakataura ɀisinamaturo, ʋaʋuki ʋakaʋona nhema, ʋakaʋudza
Kutsamŋa kwaŋgu kwakamukira ʋafudzi, ndicaroʋa nhoŋgo; nokuti Jehova wehondo wakashanyira ɓoka rake, iyo imba yaJuda, ucaʋaita sebiza rake rakanaka pakurwa.
Kwaari kucabva ibge rekona, kwaari mbambo, kwaari ʋuta bgehondo, kwaari ʋaɓati ʋose pamŋe cete.
Ʋacaʋa semhare dzinotsika
Ndicasimbisa imba yaJuda, ndicaponesa imba yaJosefa, nokuʋadzosera ɀe, nokuti ndicaʋanzwira nyasha; ʋacaʋa
ƲaEfraimi ʋacaʋa semhare, mŋoyo yaʋo icafara sa
Ndicaʋaridzira muridzo, ndiʋaʋuŋganidze; nokuti ndakaʋadzikinura; ʋacawanda seɀaʋaiwanda
Ndicaʋakusha pakati pendudzi dzaʋanhu; ʋacandiraŋgarira kunyika dziri kure; ʋacararama pamŋe cete naʋana ʋaʋo, ʋakadzoka.
Ndicaʋadzosa ɀe panyika yeEgipita, ndicaʋaʋuŋganidza ndiciʋabvisa paAsiria; ndicaʋaȿitsa kunyika yeGireadi neRebanoni; ʋacashaiwa pokugara.
Ucafamba nomuguŋgwa rokutambudzika, ucaroʋa mafuŋgu muguŋgwa, pakadzika pose muNairi pacapxa; kuɀikudza kweAsiria kucaɗeredzwa, tȿimbo yoʋushe yeEgipita icabviswa.
Ndicaʋasimbisa munaJehova, ʋacafamba muzita raŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.
Zarura mikoʋa yako, iwe Rebanoni, kuti mŋoto upedze misidari yako.
Wuŋgudza iwe musipresi, nokuti musidari wawira pasi, nokuti miti yakanaka kwaɀo yaparadzwa; wuŋgudzai, imi miouki yeBashani, nokuti ɗondo risiŋgabviri kupindwa ratemŋa.
inzwi rokuwuŋgudza kwaʋafudzi! nokuti kukudzwa kwaʋo kwaparadzwa;
Ɀanzi naJehova Mŋari waŋgu: Fudza makwai anozoʋurawa;
iwo anoʋurawa naʋene ʋawo, ʋasinemhoȿa; ʋanoateŋgesa ʋanoti: Jehova ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, nokuti ndakafuma; ʋafudzi ʋawo haʋanetsitsi nawo.

Nokuti handicazoʋi netsitsi naʋagere munyika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; asi tarirai, ndicaisa ʋanhu aʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe muruʋoko rwowokwake, nomuruʋoko rwamambo wake; ʋacaparadza nyika, ini ndisiŋgaʋarwiri paruʋoko rwaʋo.

Saka ini ndakafudza makwai aizoʋurawa, ɀirokwaɀo aiʋa makwai anonzwisa ʋurombo. Ndikatora tȿimbo mbiri, imŋe ndikaitumidza zita rinonzi Kunaka, imŋe ndikaitumidza zita rinonzi Ɀisuŋgo; ndikafudza makwai.
Ndikaparadza ʋafudzi ʋatatu nomŋedzi mumŋe, nokuti mŋeya waŋgu wakaŋga waneta naʋo, nemŋeya yaʋo yakandisema ʋo.
Ipapo ndikati: Handicaɗi kukufudzai; cinoɗa kufa ŋgacife haco, cinofanira kuparadzwa, ŋgaciparadzwe haco; akasara ŋgaadye mumŋe nomumŋe nyama yomumŋe.
Ipapo ndikatora tȿimbo yaŋgu yainzi Kunaka, ndikaivuna‐vuna, kuti ndiputse suŋgano yaŋgu yandakaŋga ndaita nendudzi dzose dzaʋanhu.
Ikavuniwa nezuʋa iro; naiɀoɀo marombo pakati pamakwai, akanditerera, akaziʋa kuti ishoko raJehova.
Ndikati kwaʋari: Kana muciti ɀakanaka, cindipai muɓairo waŋgu; kana ɀisakanaka, regai. Ipapo ʋakandiyerera muɓairo waŋgu, masirveri anamakumi matatu.
Jehova akati kwandiri: Ciɀikandira kumuʋumbi wehari; ndiwo muteŋgo wakanaka wandakateŋgwa nawo naʋo. Ini ndikatora masirveri anamakumi matatu, ndikaakandira kumuʋumbi wehari mumba maJehova.
Ipapo ndikavuna‐vuna imŋe tȿimbo yaŋgu, yainzi Ɀisuŋgo, kuti ndiputse ʋukama bgaiʋa pakati paJuda naIsraeri.
Ipapo Jehova akati kwandiri: Citora ɀe nhumbi dzomufudzi ɓenzi.

Nokuti tarirai, ndicamutsa panyika ino mufudzi usiŋgaʋi nehanya naakarashika, kana kutȿaka akapararira, kana kurapa akavunika, kana kufudza anofara; asi ucadya nyama yaakakora, nokubvamburanya mahwanda awo.
Unenhamo mufudzi usinamaturo, unosiya makwai! Munondo ucatema ruʋoko rwake neziso rake rorudyi; ruʋoko rwake rucawoma cose, ʋuye ziso rake rorudyi ricaȿiɓirwa cose.
Cireʋo ceshoko raJehova pamsoro paIsraeri.
Ɀanzi naJehova, iye unotatamura ɗeŋga rose, unoteya nheyo dzenyika, nokuʋumba mŋeya womunhu mukati make:
Tarirai, ndicaita Jerusarema mukombe wokudzedzeresa ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu ʋakapoteredza; ucaʋa ʋo pamsoro paJuda pakukombga kweJerusarema.
Nezuʋa iro ndicaita Jerusarema ibge rinoremedza ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu; ʋose ʋanoɀitakudza iro ʋacakuʋadzwa kwaɀo; ndudzi dzose dzenyika dzicariʋuŋganira kuzorwa naro.
Nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — ndicaroʋa biza rimŋe nerimŋe nokutya, nomutaȿi waro nokupeŋga; ndicaȿinudzira imba yaJuda meso aŋgu, nokuroʋa biza rimŋe nerimŋe rendudzi dzaʋanhu nokupofumara.
Ipapo madzishe aJuda acati mumŋoyo maʋo: Ʋagere Jerusarema ndiʋo simba reɗu munaJehova wehondo, Mŋari waʋo.

Nezuʋa iro ndicaita madzishe aJuda segaŋgo romŋoto pakati pehuni, ʋuye sezhenje romŋoto pakati peɀisote; ʋacaparadza ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu ʋakapoteredza, kuruʋoko rworudyi nokuruʋoko rworuɓoshwe; ʋeJerusarema ʋacagara ɀe panɀimbo yaʋo, ipo paJerusarema.
Jehova ucataŋga kuponesa ʋo matente aJuda, kuti kukudzwa kweimba yaDavidi nokukudzwa kwaʋagere Jerusarema kurege kupfuʋura kukudzwa kwaJuda.
Nezuʋa iro Jehova ucadzitira ʋagere Jerusarema; unoshaiwa simba pakati paʋo nezuʋa iro ucaʋa saDavidi; imba yaDavidi icaʋa saMŋari, somutumŋa waJehova pamberi paʋo.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ndicatȿaka kuparadza ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu dzinomukira Jerusarema.

Ndicaɗira mŋeya wenyasha nowokunyeŋgetera pamsoro peimba yaDavidi, napamsoro paʋagere Jerusarema; ʋacanditarira ini, waʋakabvoʋora; ʋacamucema iye, somunhu unocema mŋanakomana wake mumŋe cete, ʋacaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo pamsoro pake, somunhu uneshuŋgu pamsoro pomŋana wake weɗaŋgwe.
Nezuʋa iro paJerusarema pacaʋa nokucema kukuru, sokucema kweHadadi‐Rimoni mumupata waMegidoni.
Nyika icacema, ʋeimba imŋe neimŋe ʋari ʋoga; ʋeimba yaDavidi ʋari ʋoga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋari ʋoga, ʋeimba yaNatani ʋari ʋoga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋari ʋoga;
naʋeimba yaRevi ʋari ʋoga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋari ʋoga; ʋeimba yaʋaShimei ʋari ʋoga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋari ʋoga;
nedzimba dzose dzakasara, ʋeimba imŋe neimŋe ʋari ʋoga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋari ʋoga.
Nezuʋa iro imba yaDavidi naʋagere Jerusarema ʋacadziʋurirwa tsime, rokusuka ɀiʋi netȿina.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — ndicabvisa mazita eɀifananidzo panyika, arege kuzoraŋgarirwa; ndicaɓuɗisa ʋo ʋaprofita nemŋeya yetȿina panyika.
Ɀino kana aninani aciprofita, ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, ʋakamuɓereka, ʋacati kwaari: Hauŋgararami, nokuti unoreʋa nhema nezita raJehova; ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, ʋakamuɓereka, ʋacamubvoʋora kana aciprofita.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ʋaprofita ʋacanyadziswa mumŋe nomumŋe necaanoʋona, kana aciprofita, haʋaŋgapfeki ŋguʋo yemvere ʋaciti tinonyeŋgera
asi ucati: Handizi muprofita, ndiri murimi wevu; nokuti ndakaitwa muranda kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.
Kana mumŋe akati kwaari: Ko maʋaŋga awa ari pakati peɀanza ɀako ndeeiko? Ipapo ucapindura,
Muka, iwe munondo, urwe nomufudzi waŋgu, ʋuye nomunhu shamŋari yaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo; roʋa mufudzi, makwai agoparadzirwa; ini ndicatambanudzira ruʋoko rwaŋgu kuʋaɗuku.
Ɀino munyika yose — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova — migoʋe miʋiri icaparadzwa ndokufa; asi wecitatu ucaregwa’mo.

Mugoʋe wecitatu ndicaupinza mumŋoto, ndicaʋanatsa seɀinonatswa sirveri, ndicaʋaidza seɀinoidzwa ndarama. Ʋacaɗana zita raŋgu, ini ndicaʋanzwa; ini ndicati: Ndiʋo ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, iʋo ʋacati: Jehova ndiMŋari waŋgu.
Tarirai, zuʋa raJehova rinoȿika, neŋguʋa iyo ɀawakapamba ɀicagoʋerwa mukati mako.
Nokuti ndicaʋuŋganidza ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu kuzorwa neJerusarema; guta ricakundwa, dzimba dzicapambga, naʋakadzi ʋaʋo ʋacacinyiwa; hafu yeguta ʋacatapxa, asi ʋakasara ʋaʋanhu haʋaŋgabviswi muguta.
Ipapo Jehova ucaɓuɗa, ndokurwa nendudzi idzedzo, seɀaakarwa nezuʋa rehondo.

Nezuʋa iro tsoka dzake dzicamira pagomo reMiorivi, riri pamberi peJerusarema kurutiʋi rwamabvazuʋa; gomo reMiorivi ricapamuka napakati, ɀicibva kumabvazuʋa ɀicienda kumaʋirazuʋa, kukaʋa’po mupata mukuru kwaɀo; imŋe hafu yegomo icatseɗukira kurutiʋi rwokumsoro, imŋe hafu yaro kurutiʋi rwezasi.

Mucatiza nomumupata wamakomo aŋgu, nokuti mupata wamakomo ucandoȿika paAzeri; ɀirokwaɀo mucatiza, seɀamakatiza kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika pamazuʋa aUzia mambo waJuda; ipapo Jehova Mŋari waŋgu ucaʋuya, naʋatȿene ʋose pamŋe cete newe.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro ciedza cicashaikwa, ɀinopenya ɀicadzimŋa.
Asi ricaʋa zuʋa rimŋe rinozikanwa naJehova, hapaŋgaʋi namasikati kana ʋusiku, asi neŋguʋa yamaɗekwana ciedza cicaʋa’po.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro mvura mhenyu zhinji icaɓuɗa muJerusarema; imŋe hafu yayo
Jehova ucaʋa Mambo wenyika yose; nezuʋa iro Jehova ucaʋa mumŋe cete, nezita rake rimŋe cete.

Nyika yose icaita seɓani, ɀicibva Geba kuȿikira paRimoni, kurutiʋi rwezasi rweJerusarema; iro ricakwiridzwa, ricagara panɀimbo yaro, kubva pasuʋo raBenjamini kuȿikira kunɀimbo yesuʋo rokutaŋga, kuȿikira kusuʋo rekona, nokubva kurutura rwaHananeri kuȿikira kuɀiȿiniro ɀewaini ɀamambo.
Ʋanhu ʋacagara’mo; kutukwa hakuŋgazoʋi’po, asi Jerusarema ricagara rakaceŋgetwa.

Uku ndiko kuroʋa Jehova kwaacaroʋa nako ndudzi dzose dzaʋanhu dzakarwa neJerusarema: nyama yaʋo icaʋora ʋamire namakumbo aʋo, meso aʋo acaʋorera mumakomba awo, norurimi rwaʋo rucaʋorera mumiromo yaʋo.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro kunyoŋganiswa kukuru kunobva kunaJehova kucaʋa’po pakati paʋo; mumŋe nomumŋe ucaɓata ruʋoko rwowokwake, ʋuye ruʋoko rwake rucasimudzirwa ruʋoko rwowokwake.
Juda ʋacarwa ʋo paJerusarema; fuma yendudzi dzose dzaʋanhu ʋakapoteredza icaʋuŋganidzwa,
Seɀakaita kurobga uku, ndiɀo ɀicaita ʋo kurobga kwamabiza namahesera, namakamera, nemboŋgoro, neɀipfuwo ɀose ɀicaʋa’po pamisasa iyo.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakasara ʋendudzi dzose dzakarwa neJerusarema, ʋacakwira gore rimŋe nerimŋe kundonamata Mambo, iye Jehova wehondo, nokutamba mutambo wamatumba.
Aninani pamarudzi enyika usiŋgakwiri Jerusarema kundonamata Mambo, Jehova wehondo, haaŋganisirwi mvura.
Kana rudzi rwaʋaEgipita rusiŋgakwiri, ʋakasaȿika’po, naiʋo ʋacaʋiŋgwa nokurobga Jehova waacaroʋa nako ndudzi dzaʋanhu dzinoramba kukwira kundotamba mutambo wamatumba.
Uku ndiko kurobga kwaʋaEgipita nokurobga kwendudzi dzose dzinoramba kukwira kundotamba mutambo wamatumba.
Nezuʋa iro pamatare anorira amabiza pacanyorwa,
Ɀirokwaɀo, hari imŋe neimŋe paJerusarema napaJuda icaʋa tȿene kunaJehova wehondo; ʋose ʋanoɗa kuɓayira ʋacaʋuya ʋacidzitora, kuzoɓikira’mo; nezuʋa iro hapacazoʋi nomuKanani mumba maJehova wehondo.
Cireʋo ceshoko raJehova kunaIsraeri
Ndakakuɗai — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro imi munoti: Makatiɗa neiko? Ko Esau wakaŋga asi mukoma waJakobo here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ini ndakaɗa Jakobo;
asi Esau ndakamuʋeŋga, ndikaita makomo ake matoŋgo, ndikapa makaʋa amarenje nhaka yake.

Kunyaŋge Edomi ʋakati: Takaparadzwa heɗu, asi ticadzoka tikaʋaka ɀe matoŋgo; ɀanzi naJehova wehondo: Ʋacaʋaka, asi ini ndicakoromora; ʋanhu ʋacaʋatumidza, nyika yeɀakaipa, ʋuye ʋanhu ʋakatsamŋirwa naJehova nokusiŋgaperi.
Meso enyu acaʋona, mukati: Jehova unokudzwa munyika yose yaIsraeri.
Mŋanakomana unokudza ɓaɓa ʋake, nomuranda
Munondiʋigira ciŋgwa cinetȿina paartari yaŋgu. Ɀino moti: Takakuȿiɓisai neiko? Pakutaura kwenyu muciti: Tafura yaJehova ŋgaiɀidzwe hayo.

Kana mucindiʋigira cakapofumara ciʋe ciɓayiro, haɀina‐kuipa here! Kana mucindiʋigira cinokamhina necinorwara haɀina‐kuipa here? Ciɀiʋigirai muɓati wenyu; uŋgakufarirai here? Kana uŋgakugamucirai here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ɀino cikumbirai henyu nyasha dzaMŋari, kuti atinzwire ŋgoni. Ndiɀo ɀakaitwa namaʋoko enyu; ko uŋgagamucira mumŋe wenyu here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Haiwa, ɗai kwaiʋa nomumŋe wenyu waizarira hake mikoʋa, kuti murege kuɓatidza

Nokuti kubva pakuɓuɗa kwezuʋa kuȿikira pakuʋira kwaro zita raŋgu ricakudzwa pakati paʋahedeni; pose‐pose ɀinonhuwira ɀicaʋigirwa zita raŋgu, ʋuye cipiriso cisinetȿina; nokuti zita raŋgu ricakudzwa pakati paʋahedeni — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Asi imi munoɀimhura, ɀamunoti: Tafura yaJehova yakaȿiɓiswa, ɀiɓereko ɀayo, iɀo ɀokudya ɀayo, ŋgaɀiɀidzwe haɀo.

Munoti ʋo: Tarirai ɀinonetsa sei! Maɀishoʋora — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo; makandiʋigira ɀakapambga, neɀinokamhina, neɀinorwara; ndiɀo ɀamunondiʋigira cipiriso; ɀino ndiŋgaɀigamucira pamaʋoko enyu here? — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova.

Asi munyeŋgeri ŋgaatukwe unegondobge pakati pamakwai ake, ndokupika nokuɓayira Ishe cinhu cakaremara; nokuti ndiri Mambo mukuru — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — zita raŋgu rinotyisa pakati paʋahedeni.
Ɀino imi ʋaprista,
Kana imi musiŋgaɗi kunzwa, kana musiŋgaɗi kuita nomŋoyo wenyu
Tarirai, ndicatuka ʋana ʋenyu, ndicamhamira ndoʋe kuɀiso ɀenyu, iyo ndoʋe yemitambo yenyu; mucabviswa pamŋe cete naro.
Ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini ndakakutumirai murairo uyu, kuti suŋgano yaŋgu iʋe naRevi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Suŋgano yaŋgu naʋo yakaŋga iri yoʋupenyu norugare; ndakaʋapa iɀo kuti ʋa
Murairo weɀokwaɗi wakaŋga uri mumuromo waʋo, kusarurama hakuna‐kuwanikwa pamiromo yaʋo; ʋakafambidzana neni norugare nokururama, ʋakadzora ʋazhinji paɀakaipa.
Nokuti miromo yomuprista inofanira kuceŋgeta ziʋo, ʋanhu ʋanofanira kubvunza murairo pamuromo wake; nokuti ndiye nhume yaJehova wehondo.
Asi imi makatsauka panzira; makagumbusa ʋazhinji pamurairo; makaȿiɓisa suŋgano yaRevi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Saka ndakakuitai ʋanhu ʋanoɀidzwa naʋanorambga naʋanhu ʋose, ɀamusina‐kuceŋgeta nzira dzaŋgu, mukatsaura ʋanhu pa
Ko isu tose hatinaɓaɓa ʋamŋe here? Haazi Mŋari mumŋe wakatisika here? Tinogonyeŋgerana neiko mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake, ticimhura suŋgano yamadziɓaɓa eɗu?
Juda ʋakanyeŋgera, cinhu cinonyaŋgadza cakaitwa pakati paIsraeri napaJerusarema; nokuti Juda ʋakamhura nɀimbo tȿene yaJehova, inoɗikanwa naye, ʋakawana mukunda wamŋari waʋatorwa.
Munhu unoita ɀakaɗai, Jehova ucamubvisira pamatente aJakobo, unoɗana nounopindura, nounoʋigira Jehova wehondo ɀipiriso.
Munoita ʋo iɀoɀi: Munofukidza artari yaJehova nemisodzi, nokucema, nokugomera, naiɀoɀo haacaraŋgariri cipiriso, kana kucigamucira nomufaro pamaʋoko enyu.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munoti: Nemhaka yeiko? Nokuti Jehova wakaŋga ari capupu pakati pako nomukadzi woʋujaya bgako, wawakanyeŋgera, kunyaŋge ari shamŋari yako, nomukadzi wako wawakaita suŋgano yako naye.
Ko haana‐kuita mumŋe cete, kunyaŋge akaŋga ano

Nokuti ndinoʋeŋga kurambana — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova, Mŋari waIsraeri — ʋuye munhu unofukidza ŋguʋo yake nokumanikidza — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo; saka cenjererai mŋeya yenyu, kuti murege kunyeŋgera.
Makanetsa Jehova namashoko enyu. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munoti: Takamunetsa neiko? Pakutaura kwenyu,

Tarirai, ndinotuma nhume yaŋgu, iye ucandigadzirira nzira yaŋgu pamberi paŋgu; ipapo Ishe, wamunotȿaka, ucaȿika pakarepo patembere yake, iye Mutumŋa wesuŋgano, wamunoshuʋa, tarirai, unoʋuya — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Asi ndiani uŋgatsuŋga nezuʋa rokuʋuya kwake? Ndiani uŋgamira kana aciʋonekwa? Nokuti wakafanana nomŋoto womunatsi, nesipo yomusuki.
Iye ucagara pasi akafanana nomunatsi nomucenesi wesirveri; ucacenesa ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, nokuʋanatsa sendarama nesirveri; ipapo ʋacaʋigira Jehova ɀipiriso nokururama.
Ipapo cipiriso caJuda neJerusarema ɀicafadza Jehova, sapamazuʋa akare, sapamakore apakutaŋga taŋga.

Ndicasweɗera kwamuri kuti nditoŋge; ndicaʋa capupu cinokurumidza pamsoro paʋaroyi, napamsoro pemhombge, napamsoro paʋanopika nhema, napamsoro paʋanomanikidza muɓatiri pamuɓairo wake, necirikadzi, nenherera, napamsoro paʋanodziŋga ʋatorwa, ʋasiŋgandityi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Nokuti ini Jehova handishanduki, saka imi, ʋanakomana ʋaJakobo, mugere kuparadzwa.
Kubva pamazuʋa amadziɓaɓa enyu makatsauka paneɀandakaraira, mukasaɀiceŋgeta. Dzokerai kwandiri, neni ndicadzokera kwamuri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo. Asi imi munoti: Ticadzoka paɀinhu ɀipi?
Ko munhu uŋgaɓira Mŋari here? Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munondiɓira. Asi imi munoti: Takakuɓirai paɀinhu ɀipi? Paneɀegumi neɀipiriso ɀinotsaurwa.
Makatukwa nokutuka; nokuti munondiɓira, irwo rudzi urwu rwose.
Ʋuyai neɀegumi ɀose muimba yokuʋigira, kuti ɀokudya ɀiʋe’po mumba maŋgu, mundiidze naiɀoɀi ɀino — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo —
Ndicatuka ʋo ʋudyi nokuɗa kwenyu, ʋurege kuparadza ɀiɓereko ɀeminda yenyu; nemizambiriŋga yenyu haiŋgazuki ɀiɓereko ɀayo mumunda, ŋguʋa isati yaȿika — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Ndudzi dzose dzicati muri ʋanhu ʋakafara; nokuti mucaʋa nyika inofadza — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Mashoko enyu akaŋga ari makukutu kwandiri — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova. Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, munoti: Takataureiko pamsoro penyu?
Imi makati: Haɀinamaturo kushumira Mŋari; takawaneiko ɀatakaceŋgeta ɀaakaraira, ɀatakafamba takapfeka ŋguʋo dzokucema pamberi paJehova wehondo?
Ɀino tinoti ʋanoɀikudza ndiʋo ʋakafara; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋanoita ɀakaipa ndiʋo ʋanoʋakiswa; ɀirokwaɀo, ʋanoidza Mŋari ʋacipukunyuka.
Ipapo ʋaitya Jehova ʋakataurirana, Jehova akaterera, akanzwa, buku yokuraŋgaridza ikanyorwa pamberi pake, nokuɗa kwaʋanotya Jehova, ʋaciraŋgarira zita rake.
Ʋacaʋa ʋaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo — iʋo ʋaŋgu caiʋo, nezuʋa randica
Ipapo mucaʋona ɀe kusiyana kwowakarurama nowakaipa, kwounoshumira Mŋari nousiŋgamushumiri.

Nokuti tarirai, zuʋa rinoʋuya; rinopisa secoto; ipapo ʋose ʋanoɀikudza, naʋose ʋanoita ɀakaipa, ʋacaʋa samashaŋga; zuʋa, rinoʋuya, ricaʋapisa, rikasaʋasiyira mudzi kana ɗaʋi — ndiɀo ɀinotaura Jehova wehondo.
Asi imi, munotya zita raŋgu, mucaɓuɗirwa nezuʋa rokururama, rinokuporesa pasi pamapapiro aro; mucaɓuɗa mucitamba semhuru dzomucirugu.
Mucatsikira ʋakaipa pasi; nokuti ʋacaʋa maɗota pasi petsoka dzenyu, nezuʋa randicaita
Raŋgarirai murairo waMosesi muranda waŋgu, wandakamuraira paHorebi, waʋaIsraeri ʋose, iɀo ɀandakatema neɀandakaraira.
Tarirai, ndicakutumirai muprofita Eria, zuʋa iro guru raJehova, rinotyisa, risati raȿika.
Iye ucadzorera mŋoyo yamadziɓaɓa kuʋana, nemŋoyo yaʋana kunamadziɓaɓa aʋo, kuti ndirege kuʋuya ndiroʋe nyika nokutuka.
Mazita amadziteteguru aJesu Kristu, mŋanakomana waDavidi, mŋanakomana waAbrahama:
Abrahama wakaɓereka Isaka; Isaka akaɓereka Jakobo; Jakobo akaɓereka Juda naʋanuŋuna ʋake;
Juda akaɓereka Faresi naZara
Arami akaɓereka Aminadabi; Aminadabi akaɓereka Nasoni; Nasoni akaɓereka Saremoni;
Saremoni akaɓereka Boasi
Jesi akaɓereka mambo Davidi.
Davidi akaɓereka Soromoni
Soromoni akaɓereka Roboami; Roboami akaɓereka Abia; Abia akaɓereka Asafa;
Asafa akaɓereka Josafati; Josafati akaɓereka Joramu; Joramu akaɓereka Ozia;
Ozia akaɓereka Jotamu; Jotamu akaɓereka Ahazi; Ahazi akaɓereka Ezekia;
Ezekia akaɓereka Manase; Manase akaɓereka Amoni; Amoni akaɓereka Josia;
Josia akaɓereka Jekonia naʋanuŋuna ʋake neŋguʋa yokutapxa kwaʋo Babironi.
Shure kwokutapxa kwaʋo Babironi Jekonia akaɓereka Saratieri; Saratieri akaɓereka Zorobaberi;
Zorobaberi akaɓereka Abiudi; Abiudi akaɓereka Eriakimi; Eriakimi akaɓereka Azori;
Azori akaɓereka Sadoki; Sadoki akaɓereka Akimi; Akimi akaɓereka Eriudi;
Eriudi akaɓereka Ereazari; Ereazari akaɓereka Matani; Matani akaɓereka Jakobo;
Jakobo akaɓereka Josefa, murume waMaria, iye akaɓereka Jesu, unonzi Kristu.

Naiɀoɀo marudzi ose kubva kunaAbrahama kuȿikira kunaDavidi aiʋa marudzi anegumi namanna; kubva kunaDavidi kuȿikira pakutapxa Babironi marudzi anegumi namanna; kubva pakutapxa Babironi kuȿikira kunaJesu Kristu marudzi anegumi namanna.
Kuɓerekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwaiʋa kuɗai: Maria, mai ʋake, wakati anyeŋgwa naJosefa, ʋasati ʋasoŋgana, wakaʋonekwa aʋa nemimba noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino Josefa, murume wake, ɀaakaŋga ari munhu wakarurama, asiŋgaɗi kumunyadzisa, wakafuŋga kumurega cinyararire.

Ɀino wakati acaraŋgarira iɀoɀo, tarira, mutumŋa waShe akaɀiratidza kwaari pakurota, akati: Josefa, mŋanakomana waDavidi, usatya kutora Maria, mukadzi wako; nokuti cakagamucidzwa mukati make ndecoMŋeya Mutȿene.
Iye ucaɀara mŋanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu; nokuti ndiye ucaponesa ʋanhu ʋake paɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Iɀoɀo ɀose ɀakaitwa kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga naShe,
Tarira, mhandara icaʋa nemimba,
icaɀara mŋanakomana,
Ʋacamutumidza zita rinonzi Emanueri;
ndokuti kana ɀicishandurwa: Mŋari unesu.
ino Josefa akamuka pahope dzake akaita seɀaakarairwa nomutumŋa waShe, akatora mukadzi wake;
akasamuziʋa kuȿikira aɀara mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe, ndokumutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu.
Jesu wakati aɓerekwa paBetrehema reJudea, pamazuʋa amambo Herode, tarira, ʋacenjeri ʋakaȿika Jerusarema ʋacibva mabvazuʋa,
ʋakati: Uripiko Mambo waʋaJuda wakaɀarwa? nokuti takaʋona nyeredzi yake kumabvazuʋa, taʋuya kuzomunamata.
Mambo Herode aciɀinzwa, wakamanikidzwa, neJerusarema rose naye.
Akakokera ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋose naʋanyori ʋaʋanhu, akaʋabvunza kuti Kristu ucaɓerekwepi.
Ʋakati kwaari: PaBetrehema reJudea; nokuti ndiɀo ɀakanyorwa nomuprofita,
Newe Betrehema, nyika yeJudea,
Hauzi muɗuku kwaɀo kuʋaɓati ʋaJuda;
Nokuti kwauri Kucaɓuɗa Mutuŋgamiriri,
Ucafudza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Herode wakaɗana ʋacenjeri, ʋari ʋoga, akaʋabvunzisisa ŋguʋa yakaʋonekwa nyeredzi nayo,
akaʋatuma Betrehema, akati: Endai munatsobvunzisisa ɀomŋana; kana mamuwana, mundiʋudze, kuti neni ʋo ndiʋuye kuzomunamata.
Ʋakati ʋanzwa mambo, ʋakaenda; ɀino, tarira, nyeredzi yaʋakaŋga ʋaʋona kumabvazuʋa, yakaʋatuŋgamirira, kuȿikira yandomira pamsoro peimba pakaŋga panomŋana.
Ʋakati ʋaʋona nyeredzi. ʋakafara nomufaro mukuru‐kuru.
Ʋakapinda mumba, ʋakawana mŋana naMaria mai ʋake; ʋakawira pasi, ʋakamunamata; ʋakasunuŋgura fuma yaʋo, ʋakamupa ɀipo ɀendarama, neɀinonhuwira, nemura.
Ʋakati ʋanyeʋerwa pakurota naMŋari, kuti ʋarege kudzokera kunaHerode, ʋakaenda kunyika yaʋo neimŋe nzira.

Ʋakati ʋaenda, tarira, mutumŋa waShe wakaʋonekwa naJosefa pakurota, aciti: Simuka, utore mŋana namai ʋake, utizire Egipita, ugare’ko kuȿikira ndicikuʋudza; nokuti Herode ucatȿaka mŋana kuti amuʋuraye.
Akasimuka, akatora mŋana namai ʋake ʋusiku, akaenda Egipita,
akagara’ko kuȿikira Herode afa, kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga naShe
Ɀino Herode, wakati aʋona kuti wanyeŋgerwa naʋacenjeri, akatsamŋa kwaɀo‐kwaɀo; akatuma
Ɀikaitika ɀakarebga nomuprofita Jeremia, aciti:
Inzwi rakanzwika muRama,
Rokucema nokurira kukuru;
Rakeri acicema ʋana ʋake,
Asiŋgaɗi kunyaradzwa, nokuti haʋaci’po.
Herode wakati afa, tarira, mutumŋa waShe akaʋonekwa naJosefa pakurota paEgipita,
akati: Simuka, utore mŋana namai ʋake, uende kunyika yaʋaIsraeri, nokuti ʋaitȿaka kuʋuraya mŋana ʋafa.
Akasimuka, ndokutora mŋana namai ʋake, akaȿika kunyika yaʋaIsraeri.
Asi, wakati acinzwa kuti Arkerao waʋa mambo panɀimbo yaɓaɓa ʋake Herode, akatya kuenda’ko; akanyeʋerwa pakurota, akaenda kumatiʋi enyika yeGarirea;
akandogara muguta rinonzi Nazareta, kuti ɀakarebga naʋaprofita ɀiitike, kuti ucanzi muNazareta.
Namazuʋa iwayo Johane mubapatidzi wakaʋuya aciparidza parenje reJudea, aciti:
Tendeʋukai, nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bg sweɗera pedyo.
Nokuti uyu ndi wakarebga nomuprofita Isaya, aciti:
Inzwi rounoɗana murenje:
Gadzirai nzira yaShe,
Ruramisai migwagwa yake.
Iye Johane waiʋa neŋguʋo yamakushe ekamera, nebanhire reganda paciʋuno cake; ɀokudya ɀake ɀaiʋa mhashu noʋuci bgeɓundo.
Ɀino ʋeJerusarema neJudea rose ʋakaɓuɗira kwaari, nenyika yose yapaJordani;
ʋakabapatidzwa naye murwizi rwaJoridani ʋaciɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Asi wakati aciʋona ʋazhinji ʋaʋaFarise naʋaSaduse ʋaciʋuya kuzobapatidzwa, akati kwaʋari: Ʋana ʋenyoka, ndianiko wakakunyeʋerai kuti mutize kutsamŋa kunoʋuya?
Naiɀoɀo ɓerekai ɀiɓereko ɀakafanira kutendeʋuka.
Musafuŋga kutaura mumŋoyo menyu, muciti: Abrahama ndiɓaɓa ʋeɗu; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri, Mŋari uŋgamutsira Abrahama ʋana pamabge awa.
Ɀino sanhu ratoiswa pamudzi wemiti; saka muti mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀakanaka, unotemŋa, ukakandirwa mumŋoto.
Ini ndinokubapatidzai nemvura, mutendeʋuke; asi unoʋuya shure kwaŋgu, unesimba, kupfuʋureni, uyo wandisakafanira kutakura shaŋgu dzake; iye ucakubapatidzai noMŋeya Mutȿene nomŋoto.
Rusero rwake ruri muruʋoko rwake; ucanatsa ɓuriro rake kwaɀo; ucaʋuŋganidzira ɀiyo muɗura, asi hundi ucaipisa mumŋoto usiŋgadzimŋi.
Ɀino Jesu wakabva Garirea, akaȿika paJoridani kunaJohane kuzobapatidzwa naye.
Asi Johane wakaidza kumudziʋisa, akati: Ndini ndinofanira kubapatidzwa nemi, ko moʋuya kwandiri sei?
Asi Jesu wakapindura, akati kwaari: Cirega hako ɀino, nokuti saiɀoɀo ɀakafanira kuti tizadzise kururama kwose. Ipapo akamurega.
Jesu, wakati abapatidzwa, pakarepo akaɓuɗa mumvura; ɀino, tarira, ɗeŋga rakamuzarurirwa, akaʋona Mŋeya waMŋari aciɓuruka senjiʋa, akaʋuya pamsoro pake.
Ɀino tarira, inzwi rakabva kuɗeŋga, riciti: Uyu ndiye Mŋanakomana waŋgu unoɗikanwa, wandinofarira!
Ɀino Jesu wakatuŋgamirirwa noMŋeya kurenje, kuzoidzwa naDiaborosi.
Wakati aɀinyima ɀokudya mazuʋa anamakumi manna, noʋusiku bgunamakumi manna, akabva oziya.
Ɀino muidzi akaʋuya kwaari, akati kwaari: Kana uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari, taura kuti mabge awa ɀiʋe ɀiŋgwa.
Asi wakapindura, akati: Kwakanyorwa
Ɀino Diaborosi akamuisa muguta dɀene, akamumisa paciruʋu cetembere,
akati kwaari: Kana uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari, uɀiwisire pasi; nokuti kwakanyorwa
Iye ucaraira ʋatumŋa ʋake pamsoro pako,
Pamaʋoko
Kuti urege kugumbusa rutsoka rwako pabge.
Jesu akati kwaari: Kwakanyorwa ʋo: Usaidza Ishe, Mŋari wako.
Diaborosi akamuisa ɀe pagomo refu‐refu, akamuratidza ʋushe bgose bgenyika, nokubginya kwabgo;
akati kwaari: Iɀi ɀose ndicakupa, kana ukawira pasi ukandinamata.
Ipapo Jesu akati kwaari: Ibva, Satani, nokuti kwakanyorwa
Ɀino Diaborosi akamurega, ʋatumŋa ʋakaʋuya ʋakamushumira.
Jesu wakati anzwa kuti Johane wasuŋgwa, akaenda Garirea.
Ɀino, wakabva Nazareta, akandogara Kapernaume paguŋgwa, munyika yeZaburoni neNeftarimi;
kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga nomuprofita Isaya, aciti:
Nyika yeZaburoni, nenyika yeNeftarimi,
Panzira yeguŋgwa, mhiri kwaJoridani,
Garirea raʋahedeni;
Ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere murima
Ʋakaʋona ciedza cikuru;
Naʋakaŋga ʋagere panyika
Ciedza cakaʋaɓuɗira.
Kubva paŋguʋa iyeyo Jesu wakataŋga kuparidza, aciti: Tendeʋukai, nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgasweɗera pedyo.
Wakati acifamba paguŋgwa reGarirea, akaʋona
Akati kwaʋari: Nditeʋerei, ndigokuitai ʋaɓati ʋaʋanhu.
Pakarepo ʋakasiya ʋutaʋa bgaʋo, ʋakamuteʋera.
Ɀino wakati apfuʋura mberi, akaʋona ʋamŋe
Pakarepo ʋakasiya igwa naɓaɓa ʋaʋo, ʋakamuteʋera.
Jesu akapota neGarirea rose, akadzidzisa mumasinagoge aʋo, aciparidza Evaŋgeri yoʋushe, aciporesa hosha dzose namarwere ose aʋanhu.

Mukurumbira wake ukanzwika kunyika yose yeSiria; ʋakaʋuya kwaari naʋairwara ʋose, naʋakaɓatwa nehosha dzamarudzi mazhinji namarwadzi, naʋakaŋga ʋanemŋeya yakaipa, naʋaneɀipusha, naʋakaŋga ʋakafa mitezo, akaʋaporesa.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋaibva Garirea, neDekapori, neJerusarema, neJudea, nemhiri kwaJo ridani ʋakamuteʋera.
Wakati aciʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akakwira mugomo; akagara pasi, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakasweɗera kwaari.
Akashamisa muromo wake, akaʋadzidzisa, aciti:
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋarombo pamŋeya; nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga ndobgaʋo.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanocema; nokuti ʋacanyaradzwa.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanyoro; nokuti ʋacagara nhaka yenyika.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanenzara nenyota yokururama; nokuti ʋacagutiswa kwaɀo.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋaneŋgoni; nokuti ʋacaitirwa ŋgoni.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋakacena pamŋoyo; nokuti ʋacaʋona Mŋari.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanoyananisa; nokuti ʋacanzi ʋana ʋaMŋari.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanotambudzwa nokuɗa kwokururama; nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga ndobgaʋo.
Makaropafadzwa imi, kana ʋacikuɀidzai, ʋacikutambudzai, ʋacikupomerai ɀakaipa ɀose nenhema, nokuɗa kwaŋgu.
Farai, mufarise kwaɀo; nokuti muɓairo wenyu mukuru kuɗeŋga; nokuti ʋakatambudza saiɀoɀo ʋaprofita ʋakakutaŋgirai.
Imi muri munyu wenyika; asi kana munyu waɗuruŋgunda, ucaruŋgwa neiko? Haucaɓatsiri cinhu, asi kurashirwa kunze, utsikwe naʋanhu.
Imi muri ciedza cenyika. Guta rakaʋakwa pagomo hariŋgaʋanziki.
Nomŋenje haʋaŋgautuŋgidzi, ʋakauisa pasi peɗeŋgu, asi pacigadziko, uvenekere ʋose ʋari mumba.
Saiɀoɀo ciedza cenyu ŋgacivenekere pamberi paʋanhu, kuti ʋaʋone maɓasa enyu akanaka, ʋakudze Ƃaba ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Musafuŋga kuti ndakaʋuya kuparadza murairo kana ʋaprofita: Handina‐kuʋuya kuparadza, asi kuzadzisa.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, kuȿikira ɗeŋga napasi ɀicipfuʋura, yota imŋe kana tsaŋga imŋe yomurairo haɀiŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri, ɀisati ɀaitika ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo aninani unoputsa mumŋe wemirairo miɗuku iyi, akadzidzisa ʋanhu kuita saiɀoɀo, ucanzi muɗuku muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga; asi unoiita, akaidzidzisa, ucanzi mukuru muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Kana kururama kwenyu kusiŋgapfuʋuri kwaʋanyori nokwaʋaFarise, hamuŋgatoŋgopindi muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga.
Makanzwa kuti ɀakanzi kunaʋekare: Usaʋuraya; aninani unoʋuraya ucapara mhoȿa iŋgatoŋgwa;
asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Unotsamŋira hama yake, ucapara mhoȿa iŋgatoŋgwa; unoti kuhama yake: Raka, ucapara mhoȿa pamakurukota; unoti: Ƃenzi, ucapara mhoȿa
Naiɀoɀo kana iwe uciʋuya necipo cako paartari, ukaraŋgarira ipapo kuti hama yako inemhoȿa newe,
usiye cipo cako ipapo pamberi peartari, uende, umbondoyanana nehama yako, ugozoʋuya woisa cipo cako.
Kurumidza kutenderana nomudziʋisi wako, uciri munzira naye; kuti mudziʋisi arege kukukwirira kumutoŋgi, mutoŋgi kumutariri, ukasuŋgwa mutoroŋgo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwauri, hauŋgatoŋgoɓuɗi’mo, usati waripa kamari kwokupedzisira.
Makanzwa kuti ɀakanzi: Usaita ʋupombge.
Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe unotarira mukadzi acimuciʋa, watoita ʋupombge naye mumŋoyo make.
Kana ziso rako rorudyi ricikugumbusa, uribvise, urirashire kure kwauri; nokuti ɀirinani kwauri kuti mutezo wako mumŋe ufe, muʋiri wako wose urege kukandirwa muGehena.
Kana ruʋoko rwako rworudyi rucikugumbusa, urugure, ururashire kure kwauri, nokuti ɀirinani kwauri kuti mutezo wako mumŋe ufe, muʋiri wako wose urege kukandirwa muGehena.
Ɀakanzi ʋo: Aninani unorasha mukadzi wake, ŋgaamupe rugwaro rwokumuramba.
Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe unorasha mukadzi wake, asi nemhoȿa yoʋupombge, unomuitisa ʋupombge; aninani unowana warashwa, unoita ʋupombge.
Makanzwa ʋo kuti ɀakanzi kunaʋekare: Usapika nhema, asi uripire Ishe pawakapika napo.
Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Musatoŋgopika, kana nokuɗeŋga, nokuti ndico cigaro coʋushe caMŋari;
kana nenyika, nokuti ndico citsiko cetsoka dzake; kana neJerusarema, nokuti ndiro guta raMambo mukuru.
Usapika kana nomusoro wako, nokuti haugoni kushandura ruvudzi rumŋe kuti ruʋe rucena kana rutema.
Asi shoko renyu riʋe: Hoŋo, hoŋo; kwete, kwete; ɀinopfuʋura iɀoɀo ɀinobva kunowakaipa.
Makanzwa kuti ɀakanzi: Ziso rinotsibga neziso, zino nezino.
Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Musadziʋisa wakaipa, asi unokuroʋa paɗama rorudyi, umurinzire rimŋe ʋo.
Kana munhu aciɗa kukukwirira, kuti akutorere ŋguʋo yako yomukati, umutendere neŋguʋo yokunze ʋo.
Aninani unokumanikidza
Unokumbira kwauri umupe, usafuratira unoɗa kukwereta kwauri.
Makanzwa kuti ɀakanzi: Uɗe wokwako, uʋeŋge muʋeŋgi wako.
Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Iɗai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, munyeŋgeterere ʋanokutambudzai;
kuti muʋe ʋanakomana ʋaƋaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga; nokuti ʋanoɓuɗisira ʋakaipa naʋakanaka zuʋa raʋo, nemvura ʋanoinisira ʋakarurama naʋasakarurama.
Nokuti kana muciɗa ʋanokuɗai, munomuɓairo weiko? Ko ʋateresi haʋaiti saiɀoɀo ʋo here?
Kana mucikwazisa hama dzenyu ɓedzi, munopfuʋura ʋamŋe neiko? Ko naʋahedeni haʋaiti saiɀoɀo ʋo here?
Naiɀoɀo muʋe ʋakakwana, saƋaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga ʋakakwana.
Cenjerai, kuti murege kuita kururama kwenyu pamberi paʋanhu, kuti muʋonekwe naʋo; kana maɗaro hamunamuɓairo kunaƂaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino kana ucipa
Asi iwe, kana ucipa ɀipo, ruʋoko rwako rworuɓoshwe ŋgarurege kuziʋa cinoitwa norudyi rwako,
kuti kupa kwako kuʋe pakaʋanda; ipapo Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋanoʋona pakaʋanda ʋacakupa muɓairo.

Kana mucinyeŋgetera, musaʋa saʋanyeŋgeri, nokuti ʋanofarira kunyeŋgetera ʋamire mumasinagoge napamharadzano dzenzira dzomumusha, kuti ʋaʋonekwe naʋanhu. Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋapiwa muɓairo waʋo.
Asi iwe, kana ucinyeŋgetera, pinda muimba yako yomukati; kana wazarira mukoʋa wako, unyeŋgetere kunaƂaɓa ʋako ʋari pakaʋanda; ɀino Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋanoʋona pakaʋanda, ʋacakupa muɓairo.
Pakunyeŋgetera kwenyu, musapamhidza ɀisinamaturo saʋahedeni; nokuti iʋo ʋanofuŋga kuti ʋacanzwika nokutaura kwaʋo kuzhinji.
Naiɀoɀo musafanana naʋo; nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋanoziʋa ɀamunoshaiwa, musati makumbira kwaʋari.
Ɀino imi nyeŋgeterai kuɗai: Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu ʋari kuɗeŋga, zita renyu ŋgarikudzwe noʋutȿene.
Ʋushe bgenyu ŋgabguʋuye, kuɗa kwenyu ŋgakuitwe panyika seɀa
Mutipei nhasi ɀokudya ɀeɗu ɀinotiriŋgana.
mutikaŋganwirei mhoȿa dzeɗu seɀatinokaŋganwira ʋo ʋanemhoȿa nesu.
Regai kutiisa pakuidzwa, asi mutirwirei panowakaipa. [Nokuti ʋushe ndobgenyu, nesimba, nokubginya, nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.]
Nokuti kana mucikaŋganwira ʋanhu kuɗarika kwaʋo, Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga ʋacakukaŋganwirai ʋo.
Asi kana musiŋgakanwiri ʋanhu kuɗarika kwaʋo, Ƃaɓa ʋenyu haʋaŋgakukaŋganwiriyi ʋo kuɗarika kwenyu.
Kana muciɀinyima ɀokudya, regai kuʋa neciso cinopunyaira, saʋanyeŋgeri; nokuti ʋanoipisa ɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋaʋonekwe naʋanhu kuti ʋanoɀinyima ɀokudya. Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋapiwa muɓairo waʋo.
Asi iwe, kana uciɀinyima ɀokudya, zodza musoro wako, ushambe ciso cako;
kuti urege kuʋonekwa naʋanhu kuti unoɀinyima ɀokudya, asi naƂaɓa ʋako ʋari pakaʋanda; ɀino Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋanoʋona pakaʋanda, ʋacakupa muɓairo.
Regai kuɀiʋuŋganidzira fuma panyika, paneɀipfunho neŋgura ɀinopedza, napanembava dzinopaza dziciɓa.
Asi muɀiʋuŋganidzire fuma kuɗeŋga, pasineɀipfunho neŋgura ɀinopedza, pasinembava dzinopaza dziciɓa.
Nokuti panefuma yako, nomŋoyo wako ucaʋa’po ʋo.
Mŋenje womuʋiri iziso; ɀino kana ziso rako rakanaka, muʋiri wako wose ucavenekerwa.
Asi kana ziso rako rakaipa, muʋiri wako wose ucaʋa nerima. Ɀino kana ciedza ciri mauri riri rima, rima
Hapano
Saka ndinoti kwamuri: Regai kufuŋganya pamsoro poʋupenyu bgenyu, muciti, ndicadyei, kana ndicanwei; kana pamsoro pomuʋiri wenyu, muciti, ndicafukeiko? Ʋupenyu habgupfuʋuri ɀokudya here, kana muʋiri
Tarirai shiri dzokuɗeŋga, hadzidɀari, hadziceki, hadziʋuŋganidziri mumatura; asi Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋokuɗeŋga ʋanodzipa ɀokudya. Imi hamudzipfuʋuri ɀikuru here?
Ndianiko kwamuri uŋgawedzera kubiti
Munofuŋganyireiko pamsoro peɀokufuka? Fuŋgai maruʋa eɓundo, kumera kwawo; haaɓati, haaruki;
asi ndinoti kwamuri, kuti kunyaŋge naSoromoni pakubginya kwake kwose, haana‐kushoŋgedzwa serimŋe rawo.
Ɀino kana Mŋari acifukidza saiɀoɀo ʋuswa bgeɓundo, bguri’po nhasi, bgucikandirwa mucoto maŋgwana,
Naiɀoɀo musafuŋganya muciti: Ticadyei? Kana: Ticanwei? Kana: Ticafukeiko?
Nokuti ʋahedeni ʋanotȿaka iɀoɀi ɀose, nokuti Ƃaba ʋenyu ʋokuɗeŋga ʋanoziʋa kuti munoshaiwa iɀoɀi ɀose.
Asi taŋgai kutȿaka ʋushe bgaMŋari, nokururama kwake; iɀoɀi ɀose ɀicawedzerwa kwamuri.
Naiɀoɀo musafuŋganya pamsoro peɀamaŋgwana; nokuti maŋgwana acaɀifuŋganyira ɀawo; zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe rinokwanirwa nenhamo yaro.
Musatoŋga, kuti murege kutoŋgwa;
nokuti nokutoŋga kwamunotoŋga nako, mucatoŋgwa nako, neciyero camunoyera naco, mucayerwa naco.
Unotarireiko ruɓanzu ruri muziso rehama yako, asi hauʋoni ɗanda riri muziso rako?
Kana uŋgataura seiko kuhama yako,
Iwe munyeŋgeri, taŋga kubvisa ɗanda muziso rako; ugoʋona kwaɀo kubvisa ruɓanzu muziso rehama yako.
Musapa imbga ɀinhu ɀitȿene, ʋuye, musakanda maparera enyu pamberi peŋguruʋe, kuti dzirege kuatsika netsoka dzadzo, dzikatendeʋuka dzikakubvamburai.
Kumbirai, mucapiwa; tȿakai, mucawana; gogodzai, mucazarurirwa.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unokumbira unopiwa; unotȿaka unowana; unogogodza unozarurirwa.
Munhu ndoupiko kwamuri, kana mŋanakomana wake akakumbira ciŋgwa, uŋgamupa ibge?
Kana akakumbira hoʋe, uŋgamupa nyoka?
Ɀino kana imi makaipa muciziʋa kupa ʋana ʋenyu ɀipo ɀakanaka, Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga ʋacapfuʋurisa seiko kupa ɀinhu ɀakanaka iʋo ʋanokumbira kwaari!
Saka ɀinhu ɀose ɀamunoɗa kuti ʋanhu ʋakuitirei, muʋaitire nemi ʋo saiɀoɀo, nokuti ndiwo murairo naʋaprofita.
Pindai nesuʋo rakamanikana; nokuti suʋo rakafara, nzira yakapamhamha, inoenda kukuparadzwa; ʋanopinda naro ʋazhinji.
Nokuti suʋo rakamanikana, nenzira inhete, inoenda kuʋupenyu, ʋanoiwana ʋashoma.
Cenjerai ʋaprofita ʋenhema, ʋanoʋuya kwamuri ʋaneŋguʋo dzamakwai, asi mukati ari mapere anoparadza.
Mucaʋaziʋa neɀiɓereko ɀaʋo. Mazambiriŋga anombotanhwa paminzwa here, kana maʋonde parukato?
Saiɀoɀo muti mumŋe nomumŋe wakanaka unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀakanaka, asi muti wakaipa unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀakaipa.
Muti wakanaka hauŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀakaipa, nomuti wakaipa hauŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀakanaka.
Muti mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko ɀakanaka, unotemŋa, ukakandirwa mumŋoto.
Saka mucaʋaziʋa neɀiɓereko ɀaʋo.
Haʋazi ʋose ʋanoti kwandiri, Ishe, Ishe, ʋacapinda muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga; asi unoita kuɗa kwaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Ʋazhinji ʋacati kwandiri nezuʋa iro: Ishe, Ishe, hatina‐kuprofita muzita renyu here? Nokudziŋga mŋeya yakaipa muzita renyu here? Nokuita maɓasa esimba mazhinji muzita renyu here?
Ɀino ndicaʋaʋudza pacena: Handina‐kutoŋgokuziʋai; ibvai kwandiri, imi ʋaiti ʋokusarurama.
Naiɀoɀo mumŋe nomumŋe unonzwa mashoko aŋgu awa, akaaita, uŋgafananidzwa nomurume wakacenjera, wakaʋaka imba yake paruware.
Mvura ikanaya, mvura zhinji ikaʋuya, mitutu ikavuvuta, ikaroʋa imba iyo; ikasawa, nokuti yakaŋga yakateyiwa paruware.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unonzwa mashoko aŋgu awa, akasaaita, uŋgafananidzwa nomurume ɓenzi, wakaʋaka imba yake pajeca.
Mvura ikanaya, mvura zhinji ikaʋuya, mitutu ikavuvuta, ikaroʋa imba iyo, ikawa, kuwa kwayo kukaʋa kukuru.
Jesu wakati apedza mashoko iwaya, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake;
nokuti wakaŋga aciʋadzidzisa somunhu unesimba, asiŋgaiti saʋanyori ʋaʋo.
Wakati aɓuruka pagomo, ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamuteʋera.
Tarira,
Akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akamuɓata, akati: Ndinoɗa; cinatswa! Pakarepo maperembudzi ake akanatswa.
Jesu akati kwaari: Tarira, usaʋudza munhu; asi enda, uɀiratidze kumuprista, uɓayire cipo cakarairwa naMosesi, ciʋe capupu kwaʋari.
Wakati apinda Kapernaume, mumŋe mukuru wezana akaʋuya kwaari, akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari,
aciti: Ishe, muranda waŋgu uʋete kumba, akafa mitezo, asi unotambudzika kwaɀo.
Akati kwaari: Ndicaʋuya kuzomuporesa.
Mukuru wezana akapindura, akati: Ishe, handina‐kufanirwa kuti mupinde mumba maŋgu; asi taurai henyu shoko
Nokuti neni ʋo ndiri munhu unorairwa, ndinaʋarwi pasi paŋgu; ndinoti kunomumŋe: Enda! unoenda; kunomumŋe: Ʋuya! unoʋuya; nokumuranda waŋgu: Ita cici! unoita.
Jesu, wakati acinzwa iɀoɀo, akashamiswa, akati kunaʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋera: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Handina‐kumboʋona kutenda kwakaɗai, kunyaŋge napakati paʋaIsraeri.
Ndinoti kwamuri, ʋazhinji ʋacaʋuya ʋacibva kumabvazuʋa, nokumaʋirira, ʋacagara naAbrahama, naIsaka, naJakobo, muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga,
asi ʋanakomana ʋoʋushe ʋacaɓuɗiswa kurima rokunze; apo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
Ɀino Jesu akati kumukuru wezana: Enda, uitirwe pawakatenda napo. Muranda wake akapora neŋguʋa iyo.
Jesu, wakati acipinda mumba maPetro, akaʋona mai ʋomukadzi wake ʋaʋete, ʋacinzwa fiviri.
Akaɓata ruʋoko rwaʋo, fiviri ikabva kwaʋari, ʋakasimuka, ʋakamushandira.
Aʋa maɗekwana, ʋakaʋuya kwaari naʋazhinji ʋaiʋa nemŋeya yakaipa; akaɓuɗisa mŋeya neshoko, akaporesa ʋose ʋairwara.
Kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga nomuprofita Isaya, aciti: Iye wakatora ʋutera bgeɗu, akatakura marwere
Jesu, wakati aciʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamukomba, akaraira kuti ʋayambukire mhiri.
Ɀino mumŋe munyori akaʋuya akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, ndicakuteʋerai kwose kwamunoenda.
Jesu akati kwaari: Mhuŋgubge dzinemŋena, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga dzinamatendere: asi Mŋanakomana womunhu haana‐paaŋgatsamidza musoro wake.
Mumŋe waʋadzidzi akati kwaari: Ishe, nditenderei henyu, ndimbondoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Asi Jesu wakati kwaari: Nditeʋere; rega ʋakafa ʋaʋige ʋakafa ʋaʋo.
Wakati apinda mugwa, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamuteʋera.
Ipapo ɗutu guru remhepo rikamuka muguŋgwa, nokuɗaro igwa rakafukidzwa namafuŋgu; asi iye wakaŋga aʋete.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya, ʋakamumutsa, ʋakati: Ishe, tiponesei, tofa!
Akati kwaʋari: Munotyireiko, imi ʋokutenda kushoma? Ɀino akamuka, akaraira mitutu neguŋgwa; kudzikama kukuru kukaʋa’po.
Ʋanhu ʋakashamiswa, ʋakati: Uyu munhu kunyi, ɀaanotererwa nemitutu neguŋgwa?

Wakati aȿika mhiri kunyika yaʋaGadara, ʋanhu ʋaʋiri ʋaiʋa nemŋeya yakaipa ʋakasoŋgana naye, ʋacibva kumarinda; ʋakaŋga ʋanehasha kwaɀo‐kwaɀo, naiɀoɀo kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waigona kupfuʋura nenzira iyo.
Ɀino ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Tinemhaka yeiko nemi, Mŋanakomana waMŋari? Maʋuya pano kuzotirwadzisa, ŋguʋa isati yaȿika here?
Kwakaŋga kuneɓoka guru reŋguruʋe dzakaŋga dzicifura kure naʋo.
Mŋeya yakaipa ikakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, iciti: Kana mucitiɓuɗisa, mutitumire kuɓoka reŋguruʋe.
Akati kwairi: Endai. Ikaɓuɗa, ikapinda muŋguruʋe; ɓoka rose rikamhanyira kumawere kuguŋgwa, dzikafira mumvura.
Ipapo ʋaidzifudza ʋakatiza, ʋakaenda kuguta, ʋakataura ɀose, neɀakaitirwa ʋakaŋga ʋanemŋeya yakaipa.
Ɀino guta rose rikaɓuɗa kundosoŋgana naJesu; ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti abve munyika yaʋo.
Wakapinda mugwa, akayambuka, ndokuȿika kuguta rake.
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya kwaari nomunhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo, aʋete panhoʋo; Jesu wakati aciʋona kutenda kwaʋo, akati kumunhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo: Mŋana, tsuŋga mŋoyo, wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaʋanyori ʋakati mumŋoyo yaʋo: Munhu uyu unomhura
Asi Jesu aciziʋa mifuŋgo yaʋo, akati: Munofuŋgireiko ɀakaipa mumŋoyo yenyu?
Nokuti cinyiko cakareruka, kuti: Wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako, kana kuti: Simuka, ufambe?
Asi kuti muziʋe kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unesimba panyika rokukaŋganwira ɀiʋi, (akati kumunhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo:) Simuka, tora nhoʋo dzako, uende kumba kwako!
Akasimuka, akaenda kumba kwake.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakatya, ʋakarumbidza Mŋari, wakapa ʋanhu simba rakaɗai.
Jesu wakati acibva’po, akaʋona munhu, wainzi Mateo, agere panotereswa, akati kwaari: Nditeʋere! Ipapo akasimuka, akamuteʋera.
Ɀino wakati agere pakudya mumba, tarira, ʋateresi ʋazhinji naʋatadzi ʋakaʋuya ʋakagara pakudya naJesu naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Mudzidzisi wenyu unodyireiko naʋateresi naʋatadzi?
, aciɀinzwa, akati: Ʋasiŋgarwari haʋatȿaki ŋaŋga, asi ʋanorwara.
Asi endai, mudzidze kuti ndokuɗiniko kuti: Ndinoɗa ŋgoni,
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋaJohane ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Isu, naʋaFarise, tinoɀinyimireiko ɀokudya kazhinji, asi ʋadzidzi ʋenyu haʋaɀinyimi neiko?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Shamŋari dzecikomba dziŋgacema seiko cikomba ciciri naʋo? Asi mazuʋa acaȿika, acabviswa cikomba kwaʋari; neŋguʋa iyo ʋacaɀinyima ɀokudya.
Hakunomunhu unoisa ciremo citȿa paŋguʋo yakasakara; nokuti cakasonerwa cinobvarura ŋguʋo, ʋuri rikanyanya.
Haʋaɗiri ʋo waini itȿa muhomboɗo tsaru, nokuti homboɗo dziŋgaparuka, waini ikateʋuka, nehomboɗo dzikafa ʋo; asi ʋanoɗira waini itȿa muhomboɗo itȿa, ɀiʋiri ɀose ɀiceŋgeteke.
Wakati acaʋaʋudza iɀoɀo, mumŋe muɓati akaȿika’po, akamunamata, akati: Mukunda waŋgu wafa ikoɀino, asi ʋuyai muise ruʋoko rwenyu pamsoro pake, ararame.
Ipapo Jesu akasimuka, akamuteʋera naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Ɀino
nokuti wakati mumŋoyo make: Kana ndikaɓata ŋguʋo yake ɓedzi, ndicaponeswa.
Asi Jesu wakatendeʋuka, akamuʋona, akati: Mukunda, tsuŋga mŋoyo, kutenda kwako kwakuponesa. Mukadzi akaponeswa kubva paŋguʋa iyo.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aȿika mumba momuɓati, akaʋona ʋaridzi ʋenyere naʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaciita mhere‐mhere,
akati kwaʋari: Ibvai, nokuti musikana haana‐kufa, asi uʋete. Ʋakamuseka.
Asi ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋaɓuɗiswa, akapinda, akaɓata ruʋoko rwake, musikana ndokumuka.
Mukurumbira waɀo ukaɓuɗira kunyika iyo yose.
Ɀino Jesu wakati acibva’po, mapofu maʋiri akamuteʋera, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Mŋanakomana waDavidi, tinzwirei ŋgoni!
Akati kupinda mumba, mapofu akaʋuya kwaari; Jesu akati kwaari: Munotenda kuti ndinogona kuita iɀoɀo here? Akati kwaari: Hoŋo, Ishe!
Ɀino wakaɓata meso aʋo, akati: Muitirwe pamakatenda napo.
Meso aʋo akaȿinudzwa. Jesu akaʋaraira ɀikuru, akati: Cenjerai kuti ɀirege kuzikanwa nomunhu.
Asi ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakamurumbidza munyika iyo yose.
Ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗa, tarira, ʋakaʋuya kwaari nomunhu wakaŋga ari mbeʋeʋe waiʋa nomŋeya wakaipa.
Mŋeya wakaipa ukati waɓuɗiswa, mbeʋeʋe ikataura; ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakashamiswa, ʋakati: Hakuna‐kumboʋonekwa ɀakaɗai pakati paʋaIsraeri.
Asi ʋaFarise ʋakati: Unoɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa nomukuru wemŋeya yakaipa.
Ɀino Jesu wakapota namaguta ose nemisha, acidzidzisa mumasinagoge aʋo, aciparidza Evaŋgeri yoʋushe, nokuporesa kurwara kwose noʋukosha bgose.
Asi wakati aciʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akaʋanzwira tsitsi, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaneta, ʋarashwa, samakwai asinomufudzi.
Ɀino akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Ɀirokwaɀo kuceka kukuru, asi ʋaɓati ʋashoma.
Naiɀoɀo kumbirai kunaShe wokuceka kuti aɓuɗise ʋaɓati pakuceka kwake.
Ɀino wakaɗanira kwaari ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akaʋapa simba pamsoro pemŋeya yetȿina, kuti ʋaiɓuɗise, nokuporesa kurwara kwose noʋukosha bgose.
Mazita aʋaapostora ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ndiwawa: Wokutaŋga Simoni, wainzi Petro, naAndrea, munuŋuna wake; Jakobo, mŋanakomana waZebedi, naJohane, munuŋuna wake;
Firipo naBartoromeo; Tomasi naMateo, muteresi; Jakobo,
Simoni muKanani, naJudasi Iskarioti, uya wakamupandukira.
Aʋa ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri Jesu wakaʋatuma, akaʋaraira, aciti:
Musaenda munzira yaʋahedeni, musapinda muguta raʋaSamaria;
asi ɀirinani muende kumakwai akarashika eimba yaʋaIsraeri.
Mufambe, muparidze, muciti: Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgasweɗera.
Poresai ʋanorwara, mutsai ʋakafa, natsai ʋanamaperembudzi, ɓuɗisai mŋeya yakaipa. Makaŋgopiwa henyu, ciŋgopai henyu.
Musatora ndarama kana sirveri, kana ndarira muɀikwama ɀenyu;
kana homboɗo yorwendo, kana ŋguʋo mbiri, kana shaŋgu, kana tȿimbo; nokuti muɓati wakafanirwa neɀokudya ɀake.
Muguta kana musha pose pamunopinda, bvunzai kuti ndiani uri’mo wakafanira; mugare’po kuȿikira mucibva.
Kana mucipinda mumba muikwazise.
Kana imba yakafanira, rugare rwenyu ŋgaruʋuye pamsoro payo, asi kana isina‐kufanira, rugare rwenyu ŋgarudzokere kwamuri.
Aninani usiŋgakugamuciriyi, kana kunzwa mashoko enyu, kana mucibva paimba iyo kana paguta iro, muzuze guruʋa
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, nyika dzeSodoma neGomora dzicarerukirwa nezuʋa rokutoŋgwa, kupfuʋura guta iro.
Tarirai, ndinokutumai samakwai pakati pamapere; saka cenjerai senyoka, mururame senjiʋa.
Asi cenjerai ʋanhu, nokuti ʋacakuisai kuʋuŋgano dzamakurukota, nokukuroʋai ɀikuru mumasinagoge aʋo.
Mucaiswa ʋo pamberi paʋaɓati namadzimambo nokuɗa kwaŋgu, muʋe ɀapupu kwaʋari nokuʋahedeni.
Asi kana ʋacikuisai, musafuŋganya muciti mucataura sei, kana inyiko, nokuti mucapiwa neŋguʋa iyo ɀamunofanira kutaura.
Nokuti hamuzimi munotaura, asi Mŋeya waƂaɓa ʋenyu unotaura mukati menyu.
Mukoma ucaisa munuŋuna parufu, naɓaɓa mŋana
Mucaʋeŋgwa naʋose nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu; asi unotsuŋgirira kuȿikira pakuguma, ucaponeswa.
Asi kana ʋacikutambudzai muguta rimŋe, tizirai kunerimŋe; nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Hamuŋgapedzi maguta aʋaIsraeri, Mŋanakomana womunhu asati aȿika.
Mudzidzi haakundi mudzidzisi wake, kana muranda ishe wake.
Ɀakariŋganira mudzidzi kuti aʋe somudzidzisi wake, nomuranda aʋe sashe wake. Ɀaʋakaidza mŋene weimba Beerzeburi,
Naiɀoɀo musaʋatya; nokuti hakunecinhu cakafukidzwa, cisiŋgazozarurwi; kana cakaʋanzika, cisiŋgazozikanwi.
Ɀandinokuʋudzai murima, taurai pacena; ɀamunonzwa munzeʋe, paridzirai pamsoro pedzimba.
Musatya ʋanoʋuraya muʋiri, asi ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋuraya mŋeya; ɀikuru mutye uyo unogona kuʋuraya mŋeya nomuʋiri ɀose muGehena.
Ko shiri ɗuku mbiri hadziteŋgeswi nehafu yepeni here? Asi imŋe yaɀo haiŋgawiri pasi kunze kwaƂaɓa ʋenyu.
Kana muri’mi, nevudzi romusoro wenyu rakaʋereŋgwa rose.
Naiɀoɀo musatya; munopfuʋura shiri zhinji.
Mumŋe nomumŋe ucandipupura pamberi paʋanhu, neni ndicamupupura ʋo pamberi paƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe unondiramba pamberi paʋanhu, neni ndicamuramba ʋo pamberi paƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Musafuŋga kuti ndakaʋuya kuisa rugare panyika; handina‐kuʋuya kuisa rugare, asi kurwa.
Nokuti ndakaʋuya kupesanisa munhu naɓaɓa ʋake, nomŋanasikana namai ʋake, nomukadzi womŋana naʋamŋene ʋake;
naʋaʋeŋgi ʋomunhu ʋacaʋa ʋeimba yake.
Unoɗa ɓaɓa kana mai kupfuʋureni, haana‐kufanireni; nounoɗa mŋanakomana nomŋanasikana kupfuʋureni, haana‐kufanireni.
Usiŋgatori mucinjikwa wake, akanditeʋera, haana‐kufanireni.
Unowana ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo; asi unorashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ucabguwana.
Unokugamucirai imi, unondigamucireni; nounogamucireni, unogamucira wakandituma.
Unogamucira muprofita muzita romuprofita, ucapiwa muɓairo womuprofita; nounogamucira wakarurama muzita rowakarurama, ucapiwa muɓairo wowakarurama.
Aninani unopa muzita romudzidzi mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa mukombe ɓedzi wemvura inotonhora anwe, ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, haaŋgatoŋgorashikirwi nomuɓairo wake.
Jesu wakati apedza kuraira ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akapfuʋura kundodzidzisa nokuparidza pamaguta aʋo.
Ɀino Johane, ari mutoroŋgo, wakaŋga anzwa maɓasa aKristu, akatuma
aciti kwaari: Ko ndimi iye wakaŋga acinzi unoʋuya here, kana ticakatarira mumŋe?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Endai, mundoʋudza Johane ɀamunonzwa neɀamunoʋona;
, mapofu anoȿinudzwa, ʋanokamhina ʋanofamba, ʋanamaperembudzi ʋanonatswa, ʋematsi ʋanonzwa, ʋakafa ʋanomutswa, naʋarombo ʋanoparidzirwa Evaŋgeri.
Wakaropafadzwa iye usiŋgagumbuswi neni.
Aʋa ʋakati ʋacienda, Jesu akataŋga kuʋudza ʋanhu ʋazhinji pamsoro paJohane, akati: Makaŋga maɓuɗa kundoʋoneiko kurenje? Rutsaŋga runozunuŋguswa nemhepo here?
Ko makaŋga maɓuɗa kundoʋoneiko? Munhu wakapfeka
Asi makaŋga maɓuɗireiko? Kuzoʋona muprofita here? Hoŋo, ndinoti kwamuri, unopfuʋura kwaɀo muprofita.
Nokuti ndiye wakanyorwa pamsoro pake,
Tarira, ndinotuma munyai waŋgu pamberi pako,
Ucakugadzirira nzira yako pamberi pako.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Kunaʋakaɓerekwa naʋakadzi, hakuna‐kumuka mukuru kunaJohane Mubapatidzi; asi muɗuku muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga mukuru kwaari.
Kubva pamazuʋa aJohane Mubapatidzi kuȿikira ɀino, ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgunopambga, ʋapambi ʋanobgutora nesimba.
Nokuti ʋaprofita ʋose nomurairo ʋakaprofita kuȿikira kunaJohane.
Kana muciɗa kuɀigamucira, ndiye Eria wakaŋga acinzi unoʋuya.
Unenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Asi ndicafananidza rudzi urwu neiko? rwakafanana naʋana ʋagere paɗare, ʋanoɗanidzira kushamŋari dzaʋo, ʋaciti:
Takakuridzirai nyere, mukasatamba; takakuririrai, mukasacema.
Nokuti Johane wakaʋuya, asiŋgadyi, asiŋganwi,
Mŋanakomana womunhu wakaʋuya, acidya, acinwa,
Ɀino wakataŋga kutuka maguta makaŋga maitwa maɓasa ake esimba mazhinji, nokuti haana‐kutendeʋuka, akati:
Unenhamo iwe, Korazini! Unenhamo iwe, Betsaida! Nokuti maɓasa akaitwa mukati menyu, ɗai aiitwa muTire neSidoni, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋatendeʋuka kare
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Tire neSidoni acarerukirwa nezuʋa rokutoŋgwa kupfuʋuremi.
Iwe Kapernaume, ucasimudzirwa kuɗeŋga here? Ucaɓurukira kuHadesi, nokuti ɗai iwo maɓasa esimba akaitwa mukati mako, akaitwa muSodoma, riŋgaɗai rici’po nanhasi.
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Nyika yeSodoma icarerukirwa nezuʋa rokutoŋgwa kupfuʋura iwe.
Neŋguʋa iyo Jesu akapindura, akati: Ndinokutendai, Ƃaɓa, Ishe wokuɗeŋga napasi, kuti makaʋanzira ʋakacenjera naʋakaŋgwara ɀinhu iɀoɀi, mukaɀizarurira ʋacece.
Hoŋo, Ƃaɓa, nokuti ndiɀo ɀakakufadzai.
Ɀinhu ɀose ndakaɀipiwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, hakuna‐unoziʋa Mŋanakomana, asi Ƃaɓa; hakuna‐unoziʋa Ƃaɓa, asi Mŋanakomana, naiye Mŋanakomana waaneŋge aciɗa kumuzarurira iye.
Ʋuyai kwandiri, imi mose makaneta, makaremerwa, ini ndicakuzorodzai.
Muise joko raŋgu pamsoro penyu, mudzidze kwandiri; nokuti ndiri munyoro, ndinomŋoyo unoɀininipisa, kuti muwane zororo pamŋeya yenyu.
Nokuti joko raŋgu rakanaka, nomutoro waŋgu unorerukira.
Neŋguʋa iyo Jesu wakafamba napakati peminda yeɀiyo nomusi wesaɓata; ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋanenzara, ʋakataŋga kutanha hura, ʋacidya.
ƲaFarise ʋakatiʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakati kwaari: Tarira, ʋadzidzi ʋako ʋanoita ɀisina‐kutenderwa nomusi wesaɓata.
Asi wakati kwaʋari: Ko hamuna‐kuraʋa here ɀakaitwa naDavidi, musi waakaŋga aziya,
kuti wakapinda mumba maMŋari, akadya ɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, ɀakaŋga ɀisina‐kutenderwa kudyiwa naye, naʋaiʋa naye, asi naʋaprista ɓedzi?
Ko hamuna‐kuraʋa pamurairo, kuti nesaɓata ʋaprista ʋanoputsa
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Unokurira tembere uri pano.
Asi ɗai maiziʋa kuti ɀinoti kuɗini kuti: Ndinoɗa ŋgoni, handiɗi ciɓayiro, muŋgaɗai musina‐kutoŋga ʋasinemhoȿa.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu ndiye Ishe wesaɓata ʋo.
Wakabva’po, akapinda musinagoge raʋo.
Ɀino tarira, kwakaŋga kunomunhu wakaŋga anoruʋoko rwakawonyana. Ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Ɀakatenderwa kuporesa nesaɓata here? kuti ʋamupomere mhoȿa.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndiani kwamuri uŋgaʋa negwai rimŋe, kana rikawira mugomba nesaɓata, uŋgarega kuriɓata akariɓuɗisa here?
Munhu unopfuʋura gwai ɀikuru sei! Saka ɀakatenderwa kuita ɀakanaka nesaɓata.
Ɀino akati kumunhu: Tambanudza ruʋoko rwako! Akarutambanudza, rukaʋandudzwa,
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakaraŋgana pamsoro pake, kuti ʋaŋgamuʋuraya sei.
Jesu wakati aciɀiziʋa, akabva’po; ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamuteʋera, akaʋaporesa ʋose,
akaʋaraira kuti ʋarege kumuziʋisa pacena,
kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga nomuprofita Isaya, aciti:
Tarira, muranda waŋgu wandakasanaŋgura;
Muɗikanwa waŋgu, unofarirwa nomŋeya waŋgu:
Ndicaisa Mŋeya waŋgu pamsoro pake,
Iye ucaziʋisa ʋahedeni kutoŋga.
Haaŋgarwi, haaŋgaiti mhere‐mhere;
Hakunomunhu ucanzwa inzwi rake munzira dzomumusha.
Rutsaŋga rwakapxanyika haaŋgaruvuni,
Nomŋenje unopxititika haangaudzimi,
Kuȿikira acituma kutoŋga kuti kukunde.
Ʋahedeni ʋacaita zita rake tariro yaʋo.
Ɀino ʋakaisa kwaari munhu waiʋa nomŋeya wakaipa, raiʋa ɓofu nembeʋeʋe; akamuporesa, naiɀoɀo mbeʋeʋe yakataura nokuʋona ʋo.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakashamiswa, ʋakati: Ko uyu haazi mŋanakomana waDavidi here?
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakati: Munhu uyu haaɓuɗisi mŋeya yakaipa, asi naBeerzeburi, mucinda wemŋeya yakaipa.
Ɀino Jesu aciziʋa kufuŋga kwaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Ʋushe bgumŋe nobgumŋe bgunoɀipesanisa, bgunoparadzwa; neguta kana imba inoɀipesanisa, haiŋgamiri.
NaSatani kana aciɓuɗisa Satani, unoɀipesanisa; ʋushe bgake bgucamira seiko?
Neni, kana ndiciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa naBeerzeburi, ko ʋanakomana ʋenyu ʋanoiɓuɗisa nani? Saka iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋatoŋgi ʋenyu.
Asi kana ndiciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa noMŋeya waMŋari, ipapo ʋushe bgaMŋari bgaȿika kwamuri.
Munhu uŋgapinda seiko paimba younesimba, akatora nhumbi dzake, kana asati ambosuŋga
Usi neni, unopesana neni, nousiŋgaʋuŋganidzi neni, unoparadza.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋanhu ʋacakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀose nokumhura, asi kumhura Mŋeya, haʋaŋgakukaŋganwirwi.
Aninani unotaura shoko
Itai muti uʋe wakanaka, neɀiɓereko ɀawo ɀakanaka ʋo; kana itai muti uʋe wakaipa, neɀiɓereko ɀawo ɀakaipa ʋo; nokuti muti unozikanwa neɀiɓereko ɀawo.
Imi, ɀiɓereko ɀenyoka, muŋgagona seiko kutaura ɀinhu ɀakanaka, ɀamuri ʋakaipa? Nokuti muromo unotaura ɀizere pamŋoyo.
Munhu wakanaka unoɓuɗisa ɀinhu ɀakanaka pafuma
Ndinoti kwamuri: Shoko rimŋe nerimŋe risinamaturo, rakarebga naʋanhu, ʋacaɀiɗaʋirira pamsoro paro nezuʋa rokutoŋga.
Nokuti namashoko ako ucaruramiswa, ʋuye namashoko ako ucagurwa.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Mudzidzisi, tinoɗa kuʋona ciratidzo kwamuri.
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Rudzi rwakaipa rwoʋupombge runotȿaka ciratidzo, asi haruŋgapiwi ciratidzo, asi ciratidzo comuprofita Jona.
Nokuti Jona seɀaakaʋa muɗumbu rehoʋe huru mazuʋa matatu noʋusiku bgutatu, saiɀoɀo Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋa mumŋoyo wenyika mazuʋa matatu noʋusiku bgutatu.
Ʋarume ʋeNinivi ʋacasimuka pakutoŋgwa norudzi urwu, ʋacarupa mhoȿa, nokuti ʋakatendeʋuka nokuparidza kwaJona; tarirai, mukuru kunaJona uri pano.
Mambokadzi weZasi ucasimuka pakutoŋgwa norudzi urwu, ucarupa mhoȿa, nokuti wakabva pamagumisiro enyika kuzonzwa kucenjera kwaSoromoni; tarirai, mukuru kunaSoromoni uri pano.
Ɀino kana mŋeya wetȿina waɓuɗa kumunhu, unopota panɀimbo dzisinemvura, ucitȿaka zororo, ucirishaiwa.
Ɀino unoti: Ndicadzokera kumba kwaŋgu kwandakaɓuɗa; asi uciȿika, unoiwana isineciro, yakatȿairwa, yanatswa.
Ɀino unoenda, ndokutora mimŋe mŋeya minomŋe inoupfuʋura nokuipa, ndokupinda, ndokugara’mo; kupedzisira kwomunhu uyu kwakaipa kupfuʋura kutaŋga
Wakati acataura naʋanhu ʋazhinji, tarira, mai ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakamira kunze, ʋacitȿaka kutaura naye.
Mumŋe akati kwaari: Haʋo mai ʋenyu naʋanuŋuna ʋenyu ʋamire kunze, ʋacitȿaka kutaura nemi.
Akapindura, akati kunaiye wamuʋudza: Mai ʋaŋgu ndianiko, naʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu ndiʋananiko?
Ndokutambanudza ruʋoko rwake kuʋadzidzi ʋake, akati: Tarirai, mai ʋaŋgu naʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu!
Nokuti aninani unoita kuɗa kwaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga, ndiye munuŋuna waŋgu, nehanɀadzi, namai.
Nezuʋa iro Jesu wakaɓuɗa mumba, akandogara paguŋgwa.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana kwaari, nokuɗaro akapinda mugwa, akagara; ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakamira pamhenderekedzo.
Ipapo akaʋaʋudza ɀinhu ɀizhinji nemifananidzo, akati: Tarirai, mukushi wakaɓuɗa kundokusha.
Ɀino pakukusha kwake dzimŋe
Dzimŋe dzakawira parukaŋgarabge, padzakaŋga dzisinevu zhinji, dzikamera pakarepo, nokuti dzakaŋga dzisinevu rakadzika.
Asi zuʋa rakati raɓuɗa, dzikapiswa; dzikawoma, nokuti dzakaŋga dzisinomudzi.
Dzimŋe dzakawira muminzwa; minzwa ikamera, ikadzivuŋga.
Asi dzimŋe dzakawira muvu rakanaka, dzikaɓereka ɀiɓereko; dzimŋe zana, dzimŋe makumi matanhatu, dzimŋe makumi matatu.
Unenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya, ʋakati kwaari: Munotaurireiko kwaʋari nemifananidzo?
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Nokuti imi makapiwa kuziʋa ɀakaʋanzika ɀoʋushe bgokuɗeŋga, asi aʋa haʋana‐kupiwa.
Nokuti aninani unaɀo ucapiwa, aʋe neɀakawanda; asi aninani usina, ucatorerwa neɀaanaɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ndinotaura kwaʋari nemifananidzo, nokuti ʋanoʋona, asi haʋaʋoni; ʋanonzwa, asi haʋanzwi, kana kunzwisisa.
Kuprofita kwaIsaya kwakaitika kwaʋari, kunoti:
Nokunzwa, mucanzwa, musiŋgatoŋgonzwisisi;
Nokuʋona, mucaʋona, musiŋgatoŋgoʋonesesi;
Nokuti mŋoyo yaʋanhu aʋa yaʋa mikukutu,
Nzeʋe dzaʋo dzakadziʋira;
Nameso aʋo ʋakaatsinzina.
Kuti ɀimŋe ʋarege kuʋona nameso,
Nokunzwa nenzeʋe,
Nokunzwisisa nomŋoyo,
Ʋakadzoka,
Ndiʋaporese.
Asi meso enyu akaropafadzwa, nokuti anoʋona; nenzeʋe dzenyu, nokuti dzinonzwa.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ʋaprofita naʋakarurama ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuʋona ɀinhu ɀamunoʋona, asi haʋanakuɀiʋona; nokunzwa ɀamunonzwa, asi haʋana‐kuɀinzwa.
Naiɀoɀo imi inzwai mufananidzo womukushi.
Kana munhu akanzwa shoko roʋushe, asiŋgarinzwisisi, wakaipa unoȿika, ndokubvuta cakakushwa mumŋoyo make. Ndiye wakakushwa panzira.
Asi wakakushwa parukaŋgarabge, ndiye unonzwa shoko, ndokurigamucira pakarepo nomufaro.
Asi haanomudzi mukati make, ndiye weciŋguʋa ciɗuku; kana kutambudzika nokuʋeŋgwa ɀiciʋuya nokuɗa kweshoko, pakarepo unogumburwa.
Wakakushwa pakati peminzwa, ndiye unonzwa shoko; ɀino kufuŋganya kwenyika nokunyeŋgera kwefuma ɀinovuŋga shoko, rikashaiwa ɀiɓereko.
Wakakushwa muvu rakanaka, ndiye unonzwa shoko, akarinzwisisa;
Wakaisa pamberi paʋo mumŋe mufananidzo, aciti: Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgunofananidzwa nomunhu wakakusha mbeu yakanaka mumunda make.
Asi ʋanhu ʋaʋete, muʋeŋgi wake akaʋuya, akakusha mashawi pakati peɀiyo, akaenda.
Asi cipande cakati camera nokuɓereka, ɀino mashawi akaʋonekwa ʋo.
Ɀino ʋaranda ʋomŋene weimba ʋakaʋuya, ʋakati kwaari: Ishe, hamuna‐kukusha mbeu yakanaka mumunda menyu here?
Akati kwaʋari: Munhu unondiʋeŋga waita iɀoɀo. Ʋaranda ʋakati kwaari: Ko munoɗa kuti tindoaʋuŋganidza here?
Akati: Kwete, ɀimŋe kana muciʋuŋganidza mashawi, muŋgadzura neɀiyo ʋo.
Regai ɀikure ɀose ɀiri ɀiʋiri kuȿikira pakuceka; neŋguʋa yokuceka ndicati kuʋaceki: Taŋgai kuʋuŋganidza mashawi, muasuŋge mŋanda kuti apiswe, asi muʋuŋganidze ɀiyo muɗura raŋgu.
Wakaisa pamberi paʋo mumŋe mufananidzo, aciti: Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana netsaŋga yembeu yemastarda, yakatorwa nomunhu, akaidɀara mumunda make;
iyo iɗuku kumbeu dzose, asi kana yakura, ihuru pamiriʋo yose, inoita muti wakakura ukaɗaro kuti shiri dzokuɗeŋga dzinoʋuya, dzicigara pamataʋi awo.
Akaʋaʋudza mumŋe mufananidzo, akati: Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana nembiriso yakatorwa nomukadzi, akaiisa muɀiyero ɀitatu
Ɀinhu ɀose Jesu wakaʋudza ʋanhu ʋazhinji nemifananidzo; haana‐kutaura cinhu kwaʋari asiŋgafananidzi;
kuti ɀiitike ɀakarebga nomuprofita, aciti:
Ndicashamisa muromo waŋgu nemifananidzo,
Ndicataura ɀakaŋga ɀakaʋanzika kubva pakuʋambga kwenyika.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aendisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akapinda mumba, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Tiɗudzirei mufananidzo wamashawi omumunda.
Akapindura, akati: unokusha mbeu yakanaka ndiye Mŋanakomana womunhu.
Munda inyika; mbeu yakanaka ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋoʋushe; mashawi ndiʋo ʋanakomana ʋowakaipa.
Muʋeŋgi wakakusha ndiye Diaborosi; kuceka ndiko kuguma kwenyika; ʋaceki ndiʋo ʋatumŋa.
Ɀino mashawi seɀaanoʋuŋganidzwa acipiswa mumŋoto, ndiɀo ɀicaitwa pakuguma kwenyika.
Mŋanakomana womunhu ucatuma ʋatumŋa ʋake, ʋagoʋuŋganidza muʋushe bgake ɀose ɀinogumbusa, naʋanoita ɀisakarurama,
ʋacaʋakandira muʋira romŋoto; ipapo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
Ipapo ʋakarurama ʋacapenya sezuʋa muʋushe bgaƂaɓa ʋaʋo. Unenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana nefuma yakaʋanzwa mumunda, iyo yakawanikwa nomunhu, akaiʋanza
Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana ɀe nomuteŋgi unotȿaka maparera akanaka;
akati awana parera rimŋe rinomuteŋgo mukuru, akaenda, akandoteŋgesa ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, akariteŋga iro.
Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana ɀe norutaʋa runokandirwa muguŋgwa, runoʋuŋganidza marudzi ose
kana rwazara ʋanorukweʋera pamhenderekedzo, ʋakagara pasi, ʋakaʋuŋganidzira dzakanaka mumidziyo, asi dzakaipa ʋanodzirasha.
Ndiɀo ɀicaitwa pakuguma kwenyika; ʋatumŋa ʋacaɓuɗa, ʋacaɓuɗisa ʋakaipa pakati paʋakarurama,
ʋacaʋakandira muʋira romŋoto; ipapo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
[Jesu akati kwaʋari:] Manzwisisa iɀoɀo ɀose here? Ʋakati kwaari: Hoŋo, [Ishe].
Akati kwaʋari: Naiɀoɀo munyori mumŋe nomumŋe wakadzidziswa ɀoʋushe bgokuɗeŋga, wakafanana nomunhu, mŋene weimba, unoɓuɗisa ɀinhu ɀitȿa neɀekare pafuma yake.
Jesu wakati apedza mifananidzo iyo, akabva’po.
Akaȿika kunyika yake, akaʋadzidzisa musinagoge raʋo, nokuɗaro ʋakakatyamara, ʋakati: Munhu uyu wawanepiko kucenjera uku namaɓasa esimba?
Ko haazi mŋanakomana womuʋezi here? Ko mai ʋake haʋaidzwi Maria here, naʋanuŋuna ʋake Jakobo, naJosefa, naSimoni, naJudasi here?
Nehanɀadzi dzake hadzizi pakati patiri dzose here? Ko iye wakagowanepi ɀinhu iɀoɀo ɀose?
Ʋakagumburwa naye. Asi Jesu akati kwaʋari: Muprofita haaŋgashaiwi kukudzwa, asi munyika yake, nomumba make.
Akasaita maɓasa esimba mazhinji ipapo nokusatenda kwaʋo.
Neŋguʋa iyo Herode, muɓati, wakanzwa mukurumbira waJesu,
akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Uyu ndiJohane mubapatidzi; wakamuka kuʋakafa, saka masimba
Nokuti Herode wakaŋga aɓata Johane, akamusuŋga, akamuisa mutoroŋgo, nokuɗa kwaHerodiasi, mukadzi waFiripo, munuŋuna wake.
Nokuti Johane wakati kwaari: Haunakutenderwa kuti uʋe naye.
Ɀino wakaŋga aciɗa kumuʋuraya, asi wakatya ʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuti ʋaiti muprofita.
Asi zuʋa rokuɓerekwa kwaHerode rakati raȿika, mukunda waHerodiasi akatamba pakati paʋo, akafadza Herode.
Naiɀoɀo wakamupikira nemhiko kuti ucamupa cinhu cipi necipi caaneŋge acakumbira.
Ɀino iye, wakati arairwa namai ʋake, akati: Ndipei pano mundiro musoro waJohane Mubapatidzi.
Mambo akaɀidya mŋoyo, asi nokuɗa kwokupika kwake, ʋuye
Akatuma
Ʋakaʋuya nomusoro wake uri mundiro, musikana akapiwa; iye akaenda nawo kunamai ʋake.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya ʋakatora mutumbu, ʋakauʋiga; ndokuenda kundoʋudza Jesu.
Jesu wakati aɀinzwa, akabva’po negwa, akaenda kurenje ari oga. Ɀino ʋanhu ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakabva kumaguta, ʋakamuteʋera netsoka.
Ɀino wakati aciɓuɗa
Ɀino aʋa maɗekwana, ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Pano irenje, zuʋa roɗa kuʋira, endisai ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋaende kumisha, ʋandoɀiteŋgera ɀokudya.
Asi Jesu wakati kwaʋari: Haʋafaniri haʋo kuenda; imi muʋapei ɀaʋaŋgadya.
Ʋakati kwaari: Hatinecinhu pano, asi ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu ɓedzi nehoʋe mbiri.
Iye akati: Ʋuyai naɀo ʋuno kwandiri
Akaraira ʋanhu ʋazhinji kuti ʋagare pasi paʋuswa, akatora ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu nehoʋe mbiri, ndokutarira kuɗeŋga, akaʋoŋga, akameɗura ɀiŋgwa, ndokupa ʋadzidzi ʋake, ʋadzidzi ʋakapa ʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Ʋakadya ʋose, ʋakaguta; ʋakaʋuŋganidza ɀimeɗu ɀakasara, mateŋgu anegumi namaʋiri azere.
Ʋakaŋga ʋadya ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀishanu, ʋakadzi naʋana ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Pakarepo wakagombedzera ʋadzidzi ʋake kuti ʋapinde mugwa, ʋamutuŋgamirire mhiri, iye ndokusara kuendisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Ɀino wakati aendisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akakwira mugomo ari oga kundonyeŋgetera; aʋa maɗekwana wakaŋga ari’po ari oga.
Asi igwa ɀino rakaŋga raʋa pakati peguŋgwa, ricitambudzika namafuŋgu, nokuti mhepo yakaŋga iciʋadziʋisa.
Neŋguʋa yecinna yoʋusiku akaʋuya kwaʋari, acifamba pamsoro peguŋgwa.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋacimuʋona acifamba pamsoro peguŋgwa, ʋakamanikidzwa, ʋaciti madzimudzaŋgara, ʋakaɗanidzira nokutya.
Pakarepo Jesu akataura naʋo, akati: Tsuŋgai mŋoyo ndini, musatya.
Ɀino Petro akamupindura, akati: Ishe, kana muri’mi, ndiraire kuti ndiʋuye kwamuri pamsoro pemvura.
Iye akati: Ʋuya! Petro akaɓuruka mugwa, akafamba pamsoro pemvura, akaenda kunaJesu.
Asi wakati aciʋona mhepo inesimba, akatya; ɀino wakati otaŋga kunyura, akaɗanidzira aciti: Ishe, ndiponesei!
Pakarepo Jesu akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akamuɓata, akati kwaari: Iwe unokutenda kuɗuku, wanyunyutireiko?
Ʋakati ʋapinda mugwa, mhepo ikanyarara.
Ipapo ʋakaŋga ʋari mugwa ʋakamunamata, ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndimi Mŋanakomana waMŋari!
Ʋakati ʋayambukira mhiri, ʋakaȿika panyika yeGenesareti.
Ʋarume ʋenɀimbo iyo ʋakamuziʋa, ʋakatuma
ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti ʋaɓate cete mupendero weŋguʋo yake; ʋose ʋakaɓata ʋakaporeswa.
Ɀino ʋaFarise naʋanyori ʋakaʋuya kunaJesu ʋacibva Jerusarema, ʋakati:
Ʋadzidzi ʋenyu ʋanoɗarikireiko tsika dzaʋakuru, nokuti haʋashambi maʋoko kana ʋacidya ɀokudya?
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Nemi ʋo munoɗarikireiko murairo waMŋari nokuɗa kwetsika dzenyu?
Nokuti Mŋari wakati: Kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako; ʋuye, Unotuka ɓaɓa kana mai, ŋgaafe norufu.
Asi imi munoti: Aninani unoti kunaɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake: Cinhu cipi necipi camaiti munoɓatsirwa naco kwandiri, caʋa cipo
haacakudzi ɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake,
Imi ʋanyeŋgeri, Isaya wakaprofita kwaɀo pamsoro penyu, aciti:
Ʋanhu aʋa ʋanondikudza nemiromo yaʋo,
Asi mŋoyo yaʋo iri kure neni.
Asi ʋanondinamata pasina,
Ʋacidzidzisa dzidziso
Ɀino akaɗana ʋanhu ʋazhinji kwaari, akati kwaʋari: Tererai, munzwisise:
Iɀo ɀinopinda mumuromo, haɀiȿiɓisi munhu, asi ɀinoɓuɗa mumuromo, ndiɀo ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Munoziʋa kuti ʋaFarise ʋakagumburwa ʋacinzwa shoko iri here?
Akapindura, akati: Muti mumŋe nomumŋe usina‐kusimŋa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga ucadzurwa.
Ʋaregei; mapofu anotuŋgamirira mapofu. Ɀino kana ɓofu ricituŋgamirira ɓofu, acawira mugomba ose ari maʋiri.
Petro akapindura, akati kwaari: Tiɗudzirei ʋo mufananidzo uyu.
Iye akati: Naɀino nemi ʋo mucigere kunzwisisa here?
Hamunzwisisi here kuti ɀose ɀinopinda mumuromo, ɀinoenda muɗumbu, ɀikazorashwa kunze?
Asi ɀinoɓuɗa mumuromo, ɀinobva mumŋoyo; ndiɀo ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu.
Nokuti mumŋoyo munoɓuɗa mifuŋgo yakaipa, nokuʋuraya, noʋufeʋe, noʋupombge, nokuɓa, nokupupura nhema, nokumhura
ndiɀo ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu; asi kudya namaʋoko asati ashambga, haɀiȿiɓisi munhu.
Ɀino Jesu wakabva’po, akaenda kumatiʋi enyika yeTire neSidoni.
Ɀino, tarira, mukadzi muKanani wakabva kunyika iyo, akaɗana, aciti: Ndinzwirei ŋgoni, Ishe, Mŋanakomana waDavidi; mŋanasikana waŋgu wakaɓatwa kwaɀo nomŋeya wakaipa.
Asi haana‐kumupindura neshoko rimŋe. Ipapo ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya ʋakakumbira kwaari, ʋaciti: Mumuendisei, nokuti unoɗanidzira shure kweɗu.
Asi wakapindura, akati: Ndakaŋgotumirwa kumakwai akarashika eimba yaʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino akaʋuya, akamunamata, akati: Ishe, ɗondiɓatsirai henyu.
Akapindura, akati: Haɀina‐kunaka kutora ciŋgwa caʋana, ndokucikandira imbganana.
Akati: Hoŋo, Ishe, kunyaŋge nembganana ʋo dzinodya ɀimeɗu ɀinoɗonha patafura raʋatenzi ʋadzo.
Ɀino Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Haiwa, mai, kutenda kwako kukuru, ɀaunoɗa ŋgaɀiitwe. Mŋanasikana wake akapora kubva paŋguʋa iyo.
Jesu wakati acibva ipapo, akaenda napaguŋgwa reGarirea, akakwira mugomo, akagara’po pasi.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuya kwaari naʋanokamhina, neɀirema, namapofu, nembeʋeʋe, naʋamŋe ʋazhinji, ʋakaʋaisa pamberi paJesu; akaʋaporesa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakashamiswa ʋaciʋona mbeʋeʋe dzicitaura, neɀirema ɀapora, naʋanokamhina ʋacifamba, namapofu aciʋona; ʋakarumbidza Mŋari waʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino Jesu wakaɗanira ʋadzidzi ʋake kwaari, akati: Ndinetsits inaʋanhu ʋazhinji aʋa, nokuti atoʋa mazuʋa matatu aʋakagara neni ʋasinaɀaʋaŋgadya; handiɗi kuʋaendisa ʋanenzara, ɀimŋe ʋaŋgaziya panzira.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Ticawanepiko murenje ɀiŋgwa ɀakawanda ɀakaɗaro, kuti tigutise ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaɗai?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Muneɀiŋgwa ɀiŋganiko? Ʋakati: Ɀinomŋe, nehoʋe ɗuku shomanene.
Ɀino akaraira ʋanhu ʋazhinji kuti ʋagare pasi;
akatora ɀiŋgwa ɀinomŋe nehoʋe, akaʋoŋga, akaɀimeɗura, ndokupa ʋadzidzi ʋake, ʋadzidzi
Ʋakadya ʋose, ʋakaguta; ʋakanoŋga ɀimeɗu ɀakasara, mateŋgu manomŋe azere.
Ʋakadya ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀinna, ʋakadzi naʋana ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi.
Ɀino wakati aendisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akapinda mugwa, akaȿika munyika yeMagadani.
ƲaFarise naʋaSaduse ʋakaʋuya kuzomuidza, ʋakakumbira kwaari kuti aʋaratidze ciratidzo cinobva kuɗeŋga.
Asi wakapindura, akati kwaʋari: Paŋguʋa yamaɗekwana munoti: Kucacena, nokuti ɗeŋga rakatȿuka.
Maŋgwana
Rudzi rwakaipa rwoʋupombge runotȿaka ciratidzo, asi haruŋgapiwi ciratidzo, asi ciratidzo caJona. Ipapo akaʋasiya, akabva.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakaenda mhiri, ʋakakaŋganwa kutora ɀiŋgwa.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, mucenjere mbiriso yaʋaFarise naʋaSaduse.
Ʋakaraŋgana pakati paʋo, ʋaciti:
Ɀino Jesu, aciɀiziʋa, akati kwaʋari: Imi ʋokutenda kuɗuku, munoraŋgana pakati penyu nemhaka yeiko, kuti hamuneɀiŋgwa?
Hamunzwisisi naɀino here, kana kuraŋgarira ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu
Kana ɀiŋgwa ɀinomŋe
Hamunzwisisi neiko, kuti handina‐kutaura kwamuri pamsoro peɀiŋgwa? Asi mucenjere mbiriso yaʋaFarise naʋaSaduse.
Ɀino ʋakanzwisisa kuti haana‐kutaura kuti ʋacenjere mbiriso yeɀiŋgwa, asi dzidziso yaʋaFarise naʋaSaduse.
Jesu wakati aȿika kumatiʋi enyika yeKesaria Firipo, akabvunza ʋadzidzi ʋake, akati: Ʋanhu ʋanoti Mŋanakomana womunhu ndianiko?
Ʋakati: Ʋamŋe
Akati kwaʋari: Ko imi munoti ndini ani?
Ipapo Simoni Petro akapindura, akati: Ndimi Kristu Mŋanakomana waMŋari mupenyu.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Wakaropafadzwa iwe, Simoni Bar‐Jona, nokuti nyama neropa haɀinakukuziʋisa iɀoɀo, asi Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Neni ndinoti kwauri, ndiwe Petro, pamsoro poruware urwu ndicaʋaka kereke yaŋgu, masuʋo eHadesi haaŋgaikundi.
Ndicakupa kiyi dzoʋushe bgokuɗeŋga; cinhu cipi necipi caucasuŋga panyika, cicasuŋgwa kuɗeŋga, necinhu cipi necipi caucasunuŋgura panyika, cicasunuŋgurwa kuɗeŋga.
Ipapo akaraira ʋadzidzi ʋake kuti ʋarege kuʋudza munhu kuti ndiye Kristu.
Kubva paŋguʋa iyo Jesu wakataŋga kuratidza ʋadzidzi ʋake, kuti unofanira kuenda Jerusarema, kundotambudzwa ɀizhinji naʋakuru naʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori, nokuʋurawa, nokumutswa
Petro akaenda naye ʋari ʋoga, akataŋga kumuraira, akati:
Asi wakatendeʋuka, akati kunaPetro: Ibva shure kwaŋgu, Satani! Uri cigumbuso kwandiri, nokuti hauraŋgariri ɀinhu ɀaMŋari, asi ɀinhu ɀaʋanhu.
Ɀino Jesu akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Kana munhu aciɗa kuʋuya shure kwaŋgu, ŋgaaɀirambe, asimudze mucinjikwa wake, anditeʋere.
Nokuti aninani unoɗa kuponesa ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo; asi aninani unorashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ucabguwana.
Nokuti munhu ucaɓatsirweiko kana awana nyika yose, akarashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake? Kana munhu ucaripeiko kuti adzikinure ʋupenyu bgake?
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋuya naʋatumŋa ʋake nokubginya kwaƂaɓa ʋake; ipapo ucaripira mumŋe nomumŋe paakaɓata napo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋamŋe ʋari’po kunaʋamire pano, ʋasiŋgazonzwi rufu, ʋasati ʋaʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya muʋushe bgake.
Mazuʋa matanhatu akati apfuʋura, Jesu akatora Petro, naJakobo, naJohane munuŋuna wake, akaenda naʋo mugomo refu ʋari ʋoga.
Akashanduka pamberi paʋo; ciso cake cikapenya sezuʋa, ŋguʋo dzake dzikacena seciedza.
Pakarepo Mosesi naEria ʋakaʋonekwa naʋo, ʋacitaurirana naye.
Ɀino Petro akapindura, akati kunaJesu: Ishe, ɀakanaka ɀatiri pano; kana muciɗa, ndicaʋaka matumba matatu pano, rimŋe renyu, rimŋe raMosesi, rimŋe raEria.
Wakati acataura naʋo, tarira, gore rinobginya rikaʋafukidza; inzwi
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋakatya ɀikuru.
Jesu akasweɗera, akaʋaɓata, akati: Simukai, musatya.
Ʋakati ʋacitarira, haʋana‐kuzoʋona munhu, asi Jesu ɓedzi.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuruka mugomo, Jesu akaʋaraira, akati: Musaʋudza munhu ɀamaratidzwa, kuȿikira Mŋanakomana womunhu amuka kuʋakafa.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Ʋanyori ʋanotaurireiko, ʋaciti, Eria unofanira kutaŋga kuʋuya?
Akapindura, akati: Eria ucaʋuya hake, aʋandudze ɀinhu ɀose.
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Eria wakatoȿika,
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakanzwisisa kuti wakaʋaʋudza ɀaJohane Mubapatidzi.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika kuʋanhu ʋazhinji, mumŋe munhu akaʋuya kwaari, akamufugamira, akati:
Ishe, ɗonzwirai mŋanakomana waŋgu ŋgoni, nokuti uneɀipusha, unotambudzika kwaɀo. Nokuti kazhinji unowira mumŋoto, kazhinji mumvura.
Ndakaʋuya naye kuʋadzidzi ʋenyu, ʋakasagona kumuporesa.
Jesu akapindura, akati: Haiwa! rudzi rusiŋgatendi, rwakatsauka, ndicagara nemi kuȿikira riniko? Ndicakuitirai mŋoyo murefu kuȿikira riniko? Ʋuyai naye pano kwandiri.
Ɀino Jesu akamuraira, mŋeya wakaipa ukaɓuɗa kwaari, mukomana akapora kubva paŋguʋa iyo.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya kunaJesu ʋari ʋoga, ʋakati: Ko isu takaŋga tisiŋgagoni neiko kuuɓuɗisa?

Akati kwaʋari: Nemhaka yokutenda kwenyu kuɗuku, nokuti ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Kana munokutenda kwakaita setsaŋga yemastarda, muŋgati kugomo iri: Ibva pano, enda koko! riŋgaenda; hakunecinhu ciŋgakukundai.
[Asi rudzi urwu runoŋgobva cete nokunyeŋgetera, nokuɀinyima ɀokudya.]
Ɀino ʋacafamba muGarirea, Jesu akatikwaʋari: Mŋanakomana womunhu ucabva woiswa mumaʋoko aʋanhu;
ʋacamuʋuraya,
Ʋakati ʋaciȿika Kapernaume, ʋanhu ʋaigamucira muripo wetembere ʋakaʋuya kunaPetro, ʋakati: Mudzidzisi wenyu haaripi muripo wetembere here?
Akati: Hoŋo. Ɀino wakati acipinda mumba, Jesu akataŋga kutaura kwaari, aciti: Simoni, unofuŋgeiko? Madzimambo enyika anotora muripo nomutero kunaʋananiko? Kuʋanakomana ʋaʋo kana kuʋaeni?
Akati: Kuʋaeni. Jesu akati kwaari: Saka ʋanakomana ʋakasunuŋguka.
Asi, kuti tirege kuʋagumbusa, enda kuguŋgwa, ukande ciredzo, uɓate hoʋe inotaŋga kuɓuɗa; kana washamisa muromo wayo, ucawana stateri
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya kunaJesu, ʋakati: Ndianiko mukuru paʋushe bgokudeŋga?
Akaɗanira kwaari mŋana muɗuku, akamuisa pakati paʋo,
akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musiŋgashanduki, mukaʋa saʋana ʋaɗuku, hamuŋgatoŋgopindi muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga.
Naiɀoɀo aninani unoɀininipisa somŋana uyu muɗuku, ndiye mukuru muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga.
Aninani unogamucira mŋana muɗuku mumŋe wakaɗai nezita raŋgu, unondigamucira ini.
Asi aninani unogumbusa mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa, ʋanotenda kwandiri, ɀirinani kwaari kuti guyo guru risuŋgirirwe pamutsipa wake, anyudzwe muguŋgwa rakadzika.
Nyika inenhamo nemhaka yeɀigumbuso! Nokuti ɀigumbuso ɀinofanira kuʋuya haɀo; asi unenhamo munhu uyo unogumbusa ʋamŋe.

Kana ruʋoko rwako kana rutsoka rucikugumbusa, urugure, ururashire kure newe; ɀirinani kwauri kuti upinde muʋupenyu uri cirema, kana ucikamhina, pakukandirwa mumŋoto usiŋgagumi, unamaʋoko maʋiri kana tsoka mbiri.
Kana ziso rako ricikugumbusa, uribvise, urirashire kure newe. Ɀirinani kwauri kuti upinde muʋupenyu, uneziso rimŋe, pakukandirwa muGehena romŋoto, unameso maʋiri.
Cenjerai kuti murege kuɀidza mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri, kuɗeŋga ʋatumŋa ʋaʋo ʋanosiʋona misi yose ciso caƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
[Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu wakaʋuya kuzoponesa cakarashika.]
Munofuŋgeiko? Kana munhu anamakwai anezana, rimŋe rawo rikatsauka, haaŋgasiyi makumi mapfumbamŋe namapfumbamŋe, akaenda kumakomo kundotȿaka rakatsauka here?
Kana ariwana, ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, unorifarira kupfuʋura makumi mapfumbamŋe namapfumbamŋe asakatsauka.
Nokuɗaro hakuzi kuɗa kwaƂaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga, kuti mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa afe.
Kana hama yako yakutadzira, enda umuʋudze mhoȿa yake, iwe naiye muri moga; kana akakunzwa, wadzora hama yako.
Asi kana asiŋganzwi, tora mumŋe kana ʋaʋiri newe, kuti mashoko ose asimbiswe nemiromo yeɀapupu ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu.
Kana asiŋgaʋanzwi, uʋudze ʋuŋgano; kana asiŋganzwi ʋo ʋuŋgano, ŋgaaʋe kwauri somuheɗeni nomuFarise.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ɀose ɀamunosuŋga panyika, ɀicasuŋgwa kuɗeŋga; neɀose ɀamunosunuŋgura panyika, ɀicasunuŋgurwa kuɗeŋga.
Ndinoti kwamuri ɀe: Kana ʋaʋiri ʋenyu ʋakatenderana panyika pamsoro pecimŋe cinhu caʋanokumbira, ʋacaciitirwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Nokuti apo pakaʋuŋgana ʋaʋiri kana ʋatatu muzita raŋgu, ndiri’po pakati paʋo.
Ɀino Petro wakaʋuya akati kwaari: Ishe, hama yaŋgu icanditadzira kaŋganiko, ndikaikaŋganwira? Kuȿikira kanomŋe here?
Jesu akati kwaari: Handiti kwauri, kuȿikira kanomŋe; asi kuȿikira makumi manomŋe anoʋereŋgwa kanomŋe.
Saka ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bguŋgafananidzwa nomumŋe mambo, wakaŋga aciɗa kugadzira maŋgaʋa naʋaranda ʋake.
Ɀino wakati acitaŋga kugadzira, mumŋe wakaŋga anecikwerete camatarenta aneɀuru ɀamazana ɀinegumi
Asi wakati acishaiwa caaŋgaripa naco, ishe wake akaraira kuti ateŋgeswe, iye nomukadzi naʋana, neɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo, kuti cikwerete ciripxe.
Ɀino muranda akawira pasi, akamunamata, akati: Ishe, iʋai nomŋoyo murefu neni, ndicazokuripirai ɀose.
Ishe womuranda uyo akamunzwira tsitsi, akamusunuŋgura, akamukaŋganwira cikwerete.
Asi muranda uyo wakati aciɓuɗa, akawana mumŋe muranda waiɓata pamŋe cete naye, wakaŋga anecikwerete kwaari camadenari anezana
Ɀino muranda uyo waiɓata pamŋe cete naye, akawira pasi, akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, akati: Uʋe nomŋoyo murefu neni, ndicazokuripira.
Asi iye wakaramba, akaenda, akamuisa mutoroŋgo, kuȿikira acizoripa cikwerete.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋaiɓata pamŋe cete naye ʋakati ʋaciʋona ɀaitwa, ʋakafa neshuŋgu kwaɀo, ʋakaenda kundoʋudza ishe waʋo ɀose ɀakaitwa.
Ɀino ishe wake akamuɗana, akati kwaari: Iwe muranda wakaipa, ndakakukaŋganwira cikwerete ico cose, nokuti iwe wakakumbira ɀikuru kwandiri.
Ko iwe hauzaifanira kunzwira tsitsi mumŋe muranda unoɓata pamŋe cete newe, seni ndakakunzwira tsitsi here?
Ɀino ishe wake akatsamŋa, akamuisa kuʋarwadzi, kuȿikira acizoripa cikwerete cake cose.
Saiɀoɀo Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋari kuɗeŋga ʋacakuitirai ʋo, kana musiŋgakaŋganwiriyi mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake nomŋoyo wenyu
Jesu wakati apedza mashoko iwayo, akabva Garirea, akaenda kunyika yeJudea mhiri kweJoridani.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamuteʋera, akaʋaporesa’po.
ƲaFarise ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakamuidza, ʋaciti: Ko munhu unotenderwa kurasha mukadzi wake nemhaka ipi neipi here?
Akapindura, akati: Hamuna‐kuraʋa here, kuti uyo wakaʋasika pakutaŋga, wakaʋaita murume nomukadzi?
Akati: Nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo murume ucasiya ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, akanamatira mukadzi wake; aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa nyama imŋe.
Nokuɗaro haʋaciri ʋaʋiri, asi nyama imŋe. Ɀino, iɀo Mŋari ɀaakasoŋganisa, munhu ŋgaarege kuɀiparadzanisa.
