Ʋakati kwaari: Mosesi wakagoraireiko kuti
Akati kwaʋari: Nokuɗa kwoʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yenyu Mosesi wakakutenderai kurasha ʋakadzi ʋenyu, asi kubva pakutaŋga ɀakaŋga ɀisina‐kuɗaro.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Aninani unorasha mukadzi wake, asi nemhaka yoʋupombge, akawana mumŋe, unoita ʋupombge; nounowana wakarashwa, unoita ʋupombge.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Kana ɀakaɗaro pakati pomurume nomukadzi, haɀina‐kunaka kuwana.
Asi iye akati kwaʋari: Ʋose haʋagamuciri shoko iri, asi aʋo ʋakaɀipiwa.
Nokuti ŋgomŋa dziri’po, dzakaɓerekwa dzakaɗaro kubva muɗumbu ramai; ŋgomŋa dziri’po, dzakaitwa ŋgomŋa naʋanhu; ŋgomŋa dziri’po dzakaɀiita ŋgomŋa nokuɗa kwoʋushe bgokuɗeŋga. Uŋgagamucira
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya naʋana ʋaɗuku kwaari, kuti aise maʋoko pamsoro paʋo, aʋanyeŋgeterere; ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋaraira.
Asi Jesu wakati kwaʋari: Regai ʋana ʋaɗuku, musaʋadziʋisa kuʋuya kwandiri; nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga ndobgaʋakaɗai.
Akaisa maʋoko pamsoro paʋo, akabva’po.
Tarira, mumŋe munhu wakaʋuya kwaari, akati: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndiŋgaita cinhu cakanaka cipi, kuti ndiʋe noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi?
Akati kwaari: Unondibvunzireiko pamsoro peɀakanaka? Uri’po mumŋe wakanaka. Asi kana uciɗa kupinda paʋupenyu, ceŋgeta mirairo.
Akati kwaari: Ipiko? Jesu akati: Usaʋuraya, usaita ʋupombge, usaɓa, usapupura nhema;
kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako, uɗe wokwako seɀaunoɀida iwe.
Jaya rikati kwaari: Iɀoɀo ɀose ndakaɀiceŋgeta; ndicakashaiweiko?
Jesu akati kwaari: Kana uciɗa kukwana, enda uteŋgese ɀose ɀaunaɀo, upe ʋarombo, ugoʋa nefuma kuɗeŋga; ugoʋuya unditeʋere.
Asi jaya rakati ricinzwa shoko iri, rikaenda rineshuŋgu; nokuti rakaŋga rinefuma zhinji.
Jesu akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ɀinoremera mufumi kupinda muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga.
Ndinoti kwamuri ɀe: Kamera iŋgarerukirwa kupinda paʋuri reɗumho, kumufumi kupinda muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakakahadzika kwaɀo, ʋakati: Ndianiko uŋgagoponeswa?
Jesu ndokuʋatarira, akati kwaʋari: Kuʋanhu iɀi haɀibviri, asi kunaMŋari ɀose ɀinobvira.
Ɀino Petro akapindura, akati kwaari: Tarirai, isu takasiya ɀose, tikakuteʋerai; ticagopiweiko?

Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, imi makanditeʋera pakuɓerekwa kutȿa, kana Mŋanakomana womunhu acizogara pacigaro coʋushe cokubginya kwake, imi ʋo mucagara paɀigaro ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri, mucitoŋga marudzi anegumi namaʋiri aʋaIsraeri.
Mumŋe nomumŋe wakasiya dzimba, kana ʋanuŋuna, kana hanɀadzi, kana ɓaɓa, kana mai, kana mukadzi, kana ʋana, kana minda, nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, ucapiwa ɀinezana, akagara nhaka yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Asi ʋazhinji ʋokutaŋga ʋacaʋa ʋokupedzisira, noʋokupedzisira ʋacaʋa ʋokutaŋga.
Nokuti ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bgakafanana nomŋene weimba, wakaɓuɗa maŋgwanani kundotȿakira munda wake wemizambiriŋga ʋaɓati.
Wakati atenderana naʋaɓati
Akaɓuɗa neŋguʋa ineŋge yecitatu, akaʋona ʋamŋe ʋamire paɗare, ʋasiŋgaɓati;
akati kwaʋari: Endai imi ʋo mumunda wemizambiriŋga, ndigokupai ɀakafanira. Ʋakaenda.
Akaɓuɗa ɀe neŋguʋa ineŋge yecitanhatu neyepfumbamŋe, akaɗaro ɀe.
Akaɓuɗa neŋguʋa ineŋge yegumi neimŋe, akawana ʋamŋe ʋamire; akati kwaʋari: Makamirireiko pano zuʋa rose musiŋgaɓati?
Ʋakati kwaari: Nokuti hapanomunhu wakatipa ɓasa. Akati kwaʋari: Endai nemi ʋo mumunda wemizambiriŋga.
Aʋa maɗekwana, mŋene womunda wemizambiriŋga akati kumutariri wake: Ƌana ʋaɓati, uʋape muɓairo waʋo, ucitaŋga kunoʋokupedzisira,
Ɀino ʋeŋguʋa ineŋge yegumi neimŋe ʋakati ʋaciʋuya, mumŋe nomumŋe akapiwa denari.
Ʋokutaŋga ʋakati ʋaciʋuya, ʋakati ʋacapiwa nokupfuʋura; iʋo ʋakapiwa ʋo mumŋe nomumŋe denari.
Ʋakati ʋacipiwa, ʋakapopotera mŋene weimba,
ʋakati: Aʋa ʋokupedzisira, ʋakaɓata ŋguʋa imŋe cete, maʋaenzanisa nesu, takatambudzika zuʋa rose, ticipiswa nezuʋa.
Akapindura, akati kunomumŋe waʋo: Shamŋari, handikuitiri ɀisakarurama; hauna‐kutenderana neni
Tora ɀako, uende, ndinoɗa kupa wokupedzisira sewe.
Ko handina‐kutenderwa kuita neɀaŋgu pandinoɗa napo here? Ziso rako rakaipa, nokuti ini ndakanaka here?
Saiɀoɀo ʋokupedzisira ʋacaʋa ʋokutaŋga, noʋokutaŋga ʋacaʋa ʋokupedzisira.
Jesu wakati okwira Jerusarema, akatora ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋari ʋoga, akati kwaʋari panzira:
Tarirai, tinokwira Jerusarema, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaiswa kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori, ʋacamutoŋgera rufu.
Ʋacamuisa kuʋahedeni, kuti asekwe, aroʋeswe, aroʋerwe pamucinjikwa, asi nezuʋa retatu ucamutswa
Ɀino mai ʋaʋanakomana ʋaZebedi ʋakaʋuya kwaari naʋanakomana ʋaʋo, ʋacimunamata, kuzokumbira cinhu kwaari.
Akati kwaʋari: Munotȿakeiko? Ʋakati kwaari: Rairai kuti ʋanakomana ʋaŋgu aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋagare, mumŋe kuruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi, mumŋe kuruɓoshwe, muʋushe bgenyu.
Asi Jesu akapindura, akati: Hamuziʋi ɀamunokumbira. Muŋgagona kunwira pamukombe pandinozonwira ini, here? Ʋakati kwaari: Tiŋgagona.
Akati kwaʋari: Mucanwira henyu pamukombe waŋgu, asi kugara kuruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi, nokuruɓoshwe, handizini ndinopa, asi
Ʋanegumi ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakatsamŋira aʋo ʋana ʋaʋiri ʋomunhu mumŋe.
Asi Jesu akaʋaɗanira kwaari, akati: Munoziʋa kuti macinda aʋahedeni anoʋaraira, naʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋanoita simba naʋo.
Pakati penyu ŋgaɀirege kuʋa kuɗaro; asi aninani unoɗa kuʋa mukuru pakati penyu, ŋgaaʋe mushumiri wenyu.
Aninani unoɗa kuʋa wokutaŋga pakati penyu, ŋgaaʋe muranda wenyu.
soMŋanakomana womunhu usina‐kuʋuya kuzoshumirwa, asi kushumira, nokupa ʋupenyu bgake ruʋe rudzikinuro rwaʋazhinji.
Ʋakati ʋacibva Jeriko, ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamuteʋera.
Ɀino tarira, mapofu maʋiri akaŋga agere panzira, akati acinzwa kuti Jesu wopfuʋura, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Ishe, Mŋanakomana waDavidi, tinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaaraira kuti anyarare; asi akanyanya kuɗanidzira, aciti: Ishe, Mŋanakomana waDavidi, tinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ipapo Jesu akamira, akaaɗana, akati: Munoɗa kuti ndikuitireiko?
Akati kwaari: Ishe, kuti meso eɗu aȿinudzwe.
Jesu akaanzwira tsitsi, akaɓata meso awo; pakarepo akaȿinudzwa, akamuteʋera.
Ʋakati ʋacisweɗera Jerusarema, ʋakaȿika Betefage, pagomo reMiorivi, Jesu akatuma ʋadzidzi ʋaʋiri,
akati kwaʋari: Endai kumusha wakatarisana nemi, pakarepo mucawana mboŋgoro yakasuŋgirwa, inemhuru yayo; mudzisunuŋgure, muʋuye
Kana aninani acitaura cinhu kwamuri, muti: Ishe unodziɗa; pakarepo ucadzituma.
Iɀoɀo ɀakaitwa, kuti ɀakataurwa nomuprofita ɀiitike, paakati:
Ʋudzai mŋanasikana weZioni:
Tarira Mambo wako unoʋuya kwauri,
Ari munyoro, akataȿa mboŋgoro,
Nemhuru yecipfuwo cinokweʋa.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakaenda, ʋakaita seɀaʋakarairwa naJesu,
ʋakaʋuya nemboŋgoro nemhuru, ʋakaisa ŋguʋo dzaʋo pamsoro padzo; akagara pamsoro padzo.
Ʋazhinji pakati paʋanhu ʋakawarira ŋguʋo dzaʋo munzira; ʋamŋe ʋakatema mataʋi emiti ʋakaawarira munzira.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋakamutuŋgamirira, naʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋera, ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Hosana kuMŋanakomana waDavidi! Ŋgaakudzwe iye unoʋuya muzita raShe! Hosana kumsoro‐soro!
Wakati apinda Jerusarema, guta rose rikapesaniswa,
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati: NdiJesu muprofita weNazareta reGarirea.
Ɀino Jesu wakapinda mutembere, akaɓuɗisa ʋose ʋaiteŋgesa naʋaiteŋga mutembere; akawisa matafura aʋaitsinhanhisa mari, neɀigaro ɀaʋaiteŋgesa njiʋa,
akati kwaʋari: Kwakanyorwa
Ɀino mapofu naʋaikamhina ʋakaʋuya kwaari mutembere, akaʋaporesa.
Asi ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋakati ʋaciʋona ɀinoshamisa ɀaakaŋga aciita, naʋana ʋaciɗanidzira mutembere, ʋaciti: Hosana kuMŋanakomana waDavidi! ʋakafa neshuŋgu,
ʋakati kwaari: Unonzwa ɀaʋanotaura iʋaʋo here? Jesu akati kwaʋari: Hoŋo, hamuna‐kutoŋgoraʋa here,
Akaʋasiya, akabva muguta, akaenda Betania, ndokuʋata’po.
Maŋgwanani wakati acidzokera kuguta, akanzwa nzara.
Ɀino, wakati aciʋona muʋonde mumŋe panzira, akaenda kwauri, akasawana cinhu kwauri, asi mashizha ɓedzi; akati kwauri: Ŋgakurege kuʋa neɀiɓereko kwauri nokusiŋgaperi. Muʋonde ukawoma pakarepo.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakashamiswa, ʋakati: Muʋonde wawoma pakarepo seiko?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ƌai maiʋa nokutenda, musiŋganyunyuti, hamuŋgaiti iɀi ɀomuʋonde ɓedzi, asi kana mukati kugomo iri: Simudzwa, ukandirwe muguŋgwa, ɀicaitwa.
Neɀose ɀamunokumbira mucinyeŋgetera, kana mucitenda, mucaɀipiwa.
Wakati acipinda mutembere, ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋakaʋuya kwaari acidzidzisa, ʋakati: Munoita ɀinhu iɀoɀi nesimba ripiko? Ndiani wakakupai simba iri?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Neni ndicakubvunzai ʋo shoko rimŋe; kana mukandiʋudza iro, neni ndicakuʋudzai ʋo simba randinoita naro ɀinhu iɀi.
Rubapatidzo rwaJohane rwakabvepiko? Kuɗeŋga kana kuʋanhu here? Ʋakataurirana ʋaciti: Kana tikati, Kuɗeŋga, ucati kwatiri: Makagoregerei kumutenda?
Asi kana tikati, Kuʋanhu, tinotya ʋanhu ʋazhinji; nokuti ʋose ʋanoti, Johane muprofita.
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kunaJesu: Hatiziʋi. Akati kwaʋari: Neni handiŋgakuʋudziyi ʋo simba randinoita naro ɀinhu iɀi.
Ɀino munofuŋgeiko?
Iye akapindura, akati: Handiɗi; asi pashure akaɀidya mŋoyo, akaenda.
Akaenda kunowecipiri, akataura saiɀoɀo. Iye akapindura, akati: Ndinoenda, ishe; akasaenda.
Ndoupiko kunaiʋaʋo ʋaʋiri wakaita kuɗa kwaɓaɓa ʋake? Ʋakati: Wokutaŋga. Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋateresi neɀifeʋe ʋanokutaŋgirai kupinda muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Nokuti Johane wakaʋuya kwamuri nenzira yokururama, mukasamutenda, asi ʋateresi neɀifeʋe ʋakamutenda. Imi makati muciʋona iɀoɀo, hamuna‐kuzoɀidya mŋoyo mukamutenda.
Inzwai mumŋe mufananidzo:
Ŋguʋa yeɀiɓereko yakati yoȿika, akatuma ʋaranda ʋake kuʋarimi, kundotora ɀiɓereko ɀake.
Asi ʋarimi ʋakaɓata ʋaranda ʋake, ʋakaroʋa mumŋe, ʋakaʋuraya mumŋe, ʋakataka mumŋe namabge.
Akatuma ɀe ʋamŋe ʋaranda, ʋazhinji kunoʋokutaŋga; ʋakaʋaitira saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino pashure akatuma mŋanakomana wake kwaʋari, aciti: Mŋanakomana waŋgu ʋacaʋa nehanya naye.
Asi ʋarimi ʋakati ʋaciʋona mŋanakomana, ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; ʋuyai timuʋuraye, titore nhaka yake.
Ɀino ʋakamuɓata ʋakamuɓuɗisa kunze kwomunda wemizambiriŋga, ʋakamuʋuraya.
Ɀino kana mŋene womunda wemizambiriŋga acizoʋuya, ucaiteiko naʋarimi iʋaʋo?
Ʋakati kwaari: Ucaparadza kwaɀo ʋanhu aʋo ʋakaipa, akaisa ʋamŋe ʋarimi mumunda wemizambiriŋga, ʋacazomupa ɀiɓereko neŋguʋa dzaɀo.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Hamuna‐kutoŋgoraʋa here paMagwaro panoti:
Ibge rakarashwa naʋaʋaki,
Ndiro rakazoʋa musoro wekona;
Iɀoɀo
Ɀinoshamisa pameso eɗu?
Naiɀoɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Mucatorerwa imi ʋushe bgaMŋari, bgukapiwa ʋanhu ʋanoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀabgo.
Unowira pamsoro pebge iri, ucavunikanya; asi ricaparadza warinowira.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaFarise ʋakati ʋacinzwa mifananidzo yake, ʋakaziʋa kuti unoʋareʋa iʋo.
ʋakatȿaka kumuɓata, asi ʋakatya ʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciti muprofita.
Ɀino Jesu wakapindura, akataura ɀe naʋo nemifananidzo, akati:
Ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bguŋgafananidzwa nomumŋe mambo, wakaitira mŋanakomana wake mutambo wokuwana;
akatuma ʋaranda ʋake kundoɗana aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋakokerwa kumutambo wokuwana; ʋakaramba kuʋuya.
Akatuma ɀe ʋamŋe ʋaranda, akati: Ʋudzai ʋakakokerwa, muti: Tarirai, ndagadzira ciȿuȿuro caŋgu; nzombe dzaŋgu neɀakakora ɀaŋgu ɀaɓayiwa, ɀinhu ɀose ɀagadzirwa; ʋuyai kumutambo wokuwana.
Asi haʋana‐kuraŋgarira, ʋakaenda, mumŋe kumunda wake, mumŋe kukuteŋgesa kwake;
ʋamŋe ʋakaɓata ʋaranda ʋake, ʋakaʋaitira ɀakaipa, ʋakaʋaʋuraya.
Ɀino mambo wakatsamŋa, akatuma hondo dzake, akaparadza ʋaya ʋakaʋaʋuraya, akapisa guta raʋo.
Ɀino akati kuʋaranda ʋake: Mutambo wokuwana wakagadzirwa, asi ʋakaŋga ʋakokerwa ʋakaŋga ʋasina‐kufanirwa.
Naiɀoɀo, endai kumharadzano dzenzira, mukokere kumutambo ʋose ʋamunowana.
Ʋaranda iʋaʋo ʋakaɓuɗira kunzira, ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋose ʋaʋakawana, ʋakaipa naʋakanaka; imba yokuwana ikazara naʋagere pakudya.
Ɀino mambo wakati acipinda kuzoʋona ʋagere pakudya, akaʋona munhu usina‐kupfeka ŋguʋo yomutambo wokuwana;
akati kwaari: Shamŋari, wapinda pano seiko, usineŋguʋo yomutambo wokuwana? Akanyarara.
Ɀino mambo akati kuʋaranda: Mumusuŋgei makumbo namaʋoko, mumukandirei kunze murima; apo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋakaɗanwa, asi ʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋashoma.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakaenda kundoraŋgana kuti ʋaŋgamuɓata sei pakutaura kwake.

Ʋakatuma kwaari ʋadzidzi ʋaʋo naʋaHerode, ʋaciti: Mudzidzisi, tinoziʋa kuti ndimi waɀokwaɗi, munodzidzisa nzira yaMŋari neɀokwaɗi, musiŋgaraŋgariri ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu; nokuti hamutariri ɀiri kunze kwomunhu.
Ɀino tiʋudzei, munofuŋgeiko? Munhu unotenderwa kuripira Kesari mutero here, kana kwete?
Asi Jesu wakaziʋa kuipa kwaʋo, akati: Munondiidzireiko, imi ʋanyeŋgeri?
Ndiratidzei mari yomutero. Ʋakaʋuya kwaari nedenari.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Mufananidzo uyu norunyoro urwu ndeɀani?
Ʋakati kwaari: ⱿaKesari. Akati kwaʋari: Naiɀoɀo, ipai Kesari ɀaKesari, naMŋari ɀaMŋari.
Ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakashamiswa, ʋakamusiya, ʋakaenda.
Nezuʋa iro ʋaSaduse ʋakaȿika kwaari, iʋo ʋanoti hakuna‐kumuka kwaʋakafa, ʋakamubvunza,
ʋaciti: Mudzidzisi, Mosesi wakati, kana munhu akafa asinaʋana, munuŋuna wake ŋgaawane mukadzi wake, agomutsira mukoma wake ʋana.
Kwatiri kwakaŋga kunaʋanakomana ʋomunhu mumŋe ʋanomŋe; weɗaŋgwe akawana mukadzi, akafa asinaʋana, akasiyira munuŋuna wake mukadzi wake;
nokuɗaro ʋo wecipiri, nowecitatu, kuȿikira kunowecinomŋe.
Shure kwaʋose mukadzi akafa ʋo.
Ɀino pakumuka kwaʋakafa, ucaʋa mukadzi waniko waʋanomŋe
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Marashika, nokusaziʋa Magwaro, kana simba raMŋari.
Nokuti pakumuka
Asi kana kuri kumuka kwaʋakafa, hamuna‐kuraʋa here ɀamakaʋudzwa naMŋari, paakati:
Ini ndiri Mŋari waAbrahama, naMŋari waIsaka, naMŋari waJakobo? Haazi Mŋari waʋakafa, asi waʋapenyu.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake.
ƲaFarise ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti wapxisa ʋaSaduse, ʋakaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete.
Mumŋe waʋo, muɗudziri womurairo, akamubvunza, acimuidza,
Mudzidzisi, murairo mukuru pamirairo ndoupiko?
Akati kwaari: Iɗa Ishe, Mŋari wako, nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose, nokufuŋga kwako kwose.
Ndiwo murairo mukuru nowokutaŋga.
Wecipiri unofanana nawo, ndiwoyu: Iɗa wokwako, seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe.
Murairo wose naʋaprofita ɀakaɓatanidzwa pamirairo iyi miʋiri.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋacakaʋuŋgana, Jesu akaʋabvunza,
akati: Munofuŋgeiko pamsoro paKristu? Mŋanakomana waniko? Ʋakati kwaari: WaDavidi.
Akati kwaʋari: Davidi wakagomutumidza seiko noMŋeya, Ishe wake, aciti:
Ishe wakati kunaShe waŋgu:
Gara kurudyi rwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira ndaisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako pasi petsoka dzako?
Ɀino, kana Davidi acimutumidza Ishe, uŋgagoʋa mŋanakomana wake seiko?
Kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakagona kumupindura shoko, ʋuye kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakatsuŋga kumubvunza cinhu pazuʋa iro.
Ɀino Jesu wakataura kuʋanhu ʋazhinji naʋadzidzi ʋake,
akati: Ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋagere pacigaro caMosesi;
saka ɀose ɀaʋanokuʋudzai, muɀiite nokuɀiceŋgeta, asi musateʋera maɓasa aʋo; nokuti ʋanotaura, asi haʋaiti.
Ʋanosuŋga mitoro inorema, inotambudza kutakura, ʋaciiisa pamafudzi aʋanhu, asi iʋo ʋamene haʋaɗi kuiɓata nomunwe waʋo.
Asi maɓasa aʋo ose ʋanoaita kuti ʋaʋonekwe naʋanhu; nokuti ʋanofarisa mafirakitera aʋo, ʋanokurisa mipeto
ʋanofarira ɀigaro ɀapamberi pamitambo, neɀigaro ɀapamberi mumasingagoge,
nokukwaziswa paɗare, nokuidzwa Rabi naʋanhu.
Asi imi musaidzwa Rabi; nokuti mudzidzisi wenyu ndomumŋe, imi mose muri hama.
Musaidza munhu uri panyika ɓaɓa ʋenyu, nokuti mumŋe cete ndiƂaɓa ʋenyu, iʋo ʋari kuɗeŋga.
Musaidzwa ʋo ʋatenzi, nokuti mumŋe cete ndiTenzi wenyu,
Asi mukuru pakati penyu ŋgaaʋe muranda wenyu.
Aninani unoɀikudza ucaninipiswa, naaninani unoɀininipisa, ucakudzwa.
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munopfigira ʋanhu ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga; nokuti imi hamupindi mumene, naiʋo, ʋopinda, hamuʋatenderi kupinda.
[Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munoparadza dzimba dzecirikadzi muciita mano‐mano eminyeŋgetero mirefu; naiɀoɀo mucatoŋgerwa ɀakaipa nokupfuʋurisa.]
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munofamba paguŋgwa napanyika kuzotapa mudzidzi mumŋe; kana awanikwa, munomuita mŋanakomana weGehena kukunda imi kaʋiri.
Munenhamo, imi ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋakapofumara, munoti: Aninani unopika netembere, haɀina haɀo; asi aninani unopika nendarama yetembere, ndiye unemhoȿa.
Imi mapenzi namapofu! Cikuru ndecipiko, ndarama kana tembere, inoita ndarama iʋe tȿene?
ɀe: Aninani unopika neartari, haɀina haɀo; asi aninani unopika necipo ciri pamsoro payo, ndiye unemhoȿa.
Imi mapenzi namapofu! Cikuru ndecipiko, cipo kana artari, inoita cipo ciʋe citȿene?
Naiɀoɀo, unopika neartari, unopika nayo, neɀose ɀiri pamsoro payo.
Nounopika netembere, unopika nayo, nounogara mairi.
Nounopika nokuɗeŋga, unopika necigaro coʋushe caMŋari, nounogara pamsoro paco.
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munopa cegumi ceminte, neanise, nekumini, mucirega ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀomurairo,
ʋatuŋgamiri ʋakapofumara, munomimina runyunyu, mucimedza kamera.
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munonatsa kunze kwomukombe nendiro, asi mukati muzere nokukara nokusaɀidzora.
muFarise wakapofumara, taŋga kunatsa mukati momukombe, nendiro, kuti kunze kwaɀo kugocena ʋo.
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise, ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti makafanana namarinda akaceneswa, anoʋonekwa saakanaka kunze kwawo, asi mukati muzere namafupa aʋakafa netȿina yose.
Saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo munoʋonekwa naʋanhu kunze kwenyu makaita samakarurama, asi mukati muzere nokunyeŋgera nokuipa.
Munenhamo, imi ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋanyeŋgeri! Nokuti munoʋaka marinda aʋaprofita, nokushoŋgedza marinda aʋakarurama,
muciti: Ƌai taiʋa’po pamazuʋa amateteguru eɗu, tiŋgaɗai tisina‐kuʋaɓatsira kuʋuraya ʋaprofita.
Saka munoɀipupurira kuti muri ʋanakomana ʋaʋakaʋuraya ʋaprofita.
Ɀino cizadzisai ciyero camateteguru enyu.
Imi nyoka, imi ʋana ʋenyoka! Mucatiza seiko kutoŋga kweGehena?
Saka, tarirai, ndinotumira kwamuri ʋaprofita, naʋakacenjera, naʋanyori; mucaʋuraya ʋamŋe ʋaʋo, nokuʋaroʋer cinjikwa; mucaroʋesa ʋamŋe ʋaʋo mumasinagoge enyu, nokuʋadziŋgirira mumaguta ose.

Kuti ropa rose raʋakarurama, rakateʋurirwa panyika, riʋuye pamsoro penyu, kubva paropa raAberi wakaŋga akarurama, kuȿikira paropa raZakaria, mŋanakomana waBarakia, wamakaʋuraya pakati petembere neartari.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri Iɀi ɀose ɀicaʋuya pamsoro porudzi urwu.

Jerusarema! Jerusarema! iwe unoʋuraya ʋaprofita, nokutaka namabge aʋo ʋakatumŋa kwauri! Ndakaŋga ndiciɗa kazhinji sei kuʋuŋganidza ʋana ʋako, semhambo inoʋuŋganidza hukwana dzayo munyasi mamapapiro ayo, mukaramba!
Tarirai, masiyirwa imba yenyu raʋa ɗoŋgo.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva ɀino hamucazondiʋoni, kuȿikira muciti: Ŋgaarumbidzwe iye unoʋuya nezita raShe.
Ɀino Jesu wakaɓuɗa patembere, akati oenda, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya kwaari kuzomuratidza dzimba dzetembere.
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Munoʋona ɀinhu iɀi ɀose here? Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuŋgaregwi ibge pamsoro pebge, risiŋgazowisirwi pasi.
Wakati agara pagomo reMiorivi, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋari ʋoga, ʋakati: Tiʋudzei, kuti iɀoɀi ɀicagoʋa riniko? Neciratidzo cokuʋuya kwenyu necokuguma kwenyika cicaʋa cipiko?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Cenjerai kuti murege kutsauswa nomunhu.
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋacaʋuya nezita raŋgu, ʋaciti: Ndini Kristu; ʋacitsausa ʋazhinji.
Mucanzwa ɀokurwa neguhu rokurwa; cenjerai, musavunduka, nokuti iɀoɀi ɀose ɀinofanira kumboitwa, asi kuguma kucigere kuȿika.
Nokuti rudzi rucamukira rudzi, noʋushe
Asi ɀinhu iɀoɀi ɀicaʋa kutaŋga kwenhamo.
Ɀino ʋacakuisai kumaɗambudziko, ʋacakuʋurayai, mucaʋeŋgwa namarudzi ose nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu.
Ʋazhinji ʋacagumburwa, ʋacaisana
Ʋaprofita ʋazhinji ʋenhema ʋacamuka, ʋacitsausa ʋazhinji.
Ruɗo rwaʋazhinji rucatonhora, nokuti kusarurama kucawanda.
Asi unotsuŋgirira kuȿikira pakuguma, ucaponeswa.
Evaŋgeri iyi yoʋushe icaparidzirwa munyika dzose, ciʋe capupu kumarudzi ose; ipapo kuguma kucaȿika.
Naiɀoɀo kana muciʋona nyaŋgadzi yokuparadza, yakarebga nomuprofita Daniere, imire panɀimbo tȿene (unoraʋa ŋgaacerekedze);
ɀino ʋari muJudea ŋgaʋatizire kumakomo;
uri pamsoro peɗeŋga reimba, ŋgaarege kuɓuruka kuzotora ɀiri mumba make;
nouri mumunda, ŋgaarege kudzokera shure kuzotora ŋguʋo yake.
Ʋacaʋa nenhamo ʋanemimba naʋanomŋisa namazuʋa iwayo;
nyeŋgeterai kuti kutiza kwenyu kurege kuʋa pacando kana nesaɓata.
Nokuti neŋguʋa iyo kucaʋa’po kutambudzika kukuru, kusati kwakamboʋa’po kwakaɗaro, kubva pakutaŋga kwenyika kuȿikira ɀino, ʋuye hakucazoʋi’po.
Ƌai mazuʋa iwayo asaitapudzwa, hakunenyama yairarama; asi nokuɗa kwaʋakasanaŋgurwa mazuʋa iwayo acatapudzwa.
Ɀino kana munhu akati kwamuri: Tarirai, Kristu uri pano, kana apo; regai kutenda.
Nokuti ʋacamuka ʋanaKristu ʋenhema, naʋaprofita ʋenhema, ʋacaratidza ɀiratidzo ɀikuru neɀinoshamisa, kuti kana ɀicibvira, ʋatsause naʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋo.
Tarirai, ndagara ndakuʋudzai.
Ɀino, kana ʋakati kwamuri: Tarirai, uri kurenje, regai kuɓuɗa; Tarirai, uri mudzimba dzomukati, regai kutenda.
Nokuti semheni inobva mabvazuʋa, icipenyera kumaʋirira, ndiɀo ɀicaita kuʋuya kwoMŋanakomana womunhu.
Apo panomutumbu, ndi’po pacaʋuŋganira magora.
Pakarepo, shure kwokutambudzika kwamazuʋa iwayo, zuʋa ricaȿiɓa, mŋedzi haucazobginyi, nyeredzi dzicawa kuɗeŋga, namasimba okuɗeŋga acazunuŋguswa.
Ipapo ciratidzo coMŋanakomana womunhu cicaʋonekwa kuɗeŋga; ɀino marudzi ose enyika acacema, aciʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya pamsoro pamakore okuɗeŋga nesimba nokubginya kukuru.
Ucatuma ʋatumŋa ʋake nehwamanda huru, ʋacaʋuŋganidza ʋasanaŋgurwa ʋake
Dzidzai pamuʋonde mufananidzo wawo: Kana ɗaʋi rawo raʋa nyoro, mashizha acituŋga, munoziʋa kuti zhezha raʋa pedyo.
Saiɀoɀo, nemi ʋo, kana moʋona iɀoɀo ɀose, ziʋai kuti waʋa pedyo pamukoʋa.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Rudzi urwu haruŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri kuȿikira iɀoɀi ɀose ɀaitika.
Ƌeŋga nenyika ɀicapfuʋura, asi mashoko aŋgu haaŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri.
Asi kana riri zuʋa iro neŋguʋa iyo, hakuna‐unoɀiziʋa, kunyaŋge ʋatumŋa ʋokuɗeŋga, kunyaŋge Mŋanakomana, asi Ƃaɓa ʋoga.
Sapamazuʋa aNoa, ndiɀo ɀicaita kuʋuya kwoMŋanakomana womunhu.
Nokuti sapamazuʋa iwayo, mvura zhinji isati yaȿika, ʋaidya nokunwa, nokuwana, nokuwaniswa, kuȿikira zuʋa Noa raakapinda naro muareka,
ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuȿikira mvura zhinji yaʋuya, ikaʋabvisa ʋose; ndiɀo ɀicaita kuʋuya kwoMŋanakomana womunhu.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa mumunda, mumŋe ucatorwa, mumŋe akasiyiwa.
ʋaʋiri ʋacakuya paguyo rimŋe, mumŋe ucatorwa, mumŋe akasiyiwa.
Rindai naiɀoɀo, nokuti hamuziʋi zuʋa, Ishe wenyu raanoʋuya naro.
Asi ziʋai iɀi, kuti mŋene weimba, ɗai aiziʋa ŋguʋa yokuȿika kwembava, uŋgaɗai airinda, akasatendera kuti imba yake ipazwe.
Naiɀoɀo nemi ʋo, garai makaɀigadzira; nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋuya neŋguʋa yomusiŋgamutariri.
Ndianiko muranda wakatendeka, wakaŋgwara, wakagadzwa nashe wake aʋe mutariri weimba yake, kuti aʋape ɀokudya neŋguʋa yakafanira?
Wakaropafadzwa muranda uyo, unoti kana ishe wake aciȿika, akamuwana aciita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, ucamugadza aʋe mutariri weɀose ɀaanaɀo.
Asi kana muranda uyo wakaipa akataura mumŋoyo make,
akataŋga kuroʋa ʋamŋe ʋaranda ʋanoɓata pamŋe cete naye, akadya, akanwa pamŋe cete naʋakaɓatwa;
ishe womuranda uyo ucaȿika nezuʋa raasiŋgamutariri, neŋguʋa yaasiŋgaziʋi;
akamuroʋesa kwaɀo, akamupa mugoʋe wake pamŋe cete naʋanyeŋgeri; apo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
Ɀino ʋushe bgokuɗeŋga bguŋgafananidzwa naʋasikana ʋanegumi, ʋakatora mŋenje yaʋo, ʋakaɓuɗa kundociŋgamidza cikomba.
Ʋashanu ʋaʋo akaŋga ari mapenzi, ʋashanu ʋakaŋga ʋakacenjera.
Nokuti mapenzi akatora mŋenje yawo, akasatora mafuta.
Asi ʋakacenjera ʋakatora mafuta mumidziyo yaʋo nemŋenje yaʋo.
Ɀino, cikomba cakati cicinonoka, ʋakakotsira ʋose, ʋakaʋata.
Pakati poʋusiku ʋakanzwa mhere‐mhere: Cikomba coʋuya! Ƃuɗai mumuciŋgamidzei!
Ɀino ʋasikana ʋose ʋakamuka, ʋakagadzira mŋenje yaʋo.
Mapenzi akati kunaʋakacenjera: Tipeiʋo mamŋe mafuta enyu, nokuti mŋenje yeɗu yodzima.
Asi ʋakacenjera ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Kwete, ɀimŋe haaŋgakwaniri isu nemi tose; endai henyu kunaʋanoteŋgesa, muɀiteŋgere.
Ʋakati ʋacienda kundoteŋga, cikomba ndokuȿika; ɀino, ʋakaŋga ʋakaɀigadzira ʋakapinda naco pamutambo wokuwana, mukoʋa ukapfigwa.
Pashure ʋamŋe ʋasikana ʋakaȿika, ʋakati: Ishe, Ishe, tizarurirei!
Akapindura, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Handikuziʋiyi imi.
Naiɀoɀo rindai, nokuti hamuziʋi zuʋa kana ŋguʋa.
Nokuti ɀakafanana nomunhu wakaenda kuneimŋe nyika, akaɗana ʋaranda ʋake, akaʋapa fuma yake.
Akapa mumŋe matarenta mashanu, mumŋe maʋiri, mumŋe rimŋe, mumŋe nomumŋe ɀakakwanira simba rake; akaenda kuneimŋe nyika.
Pakarepo iye, wakapiwa matarenta mashanu, akaenda akaita mhindu nawo, akawana mamŋe mashanu.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo,
Asi wakapiwa rimŋe, wakaenda, akacera pasi, akaʋiga mari yashe wake.
Ŋguʋa huru yakati yapfuʋura, ishe waʋaranda iʋaʋo akaȿika, akagadzira mashoko naʋo.
Wakaŋga apiwa matarenta mashanu, akaʋuya namamŋe matarenta mashanu, akati: Ishe, makandipa matarenta mashanu, tarirai, ndawana mamŋe matarenta mashanu.
Ishe wake akati kwaari: Ɀakanaka, muranda wakanaka, wakatendeka; wakaŋga wakatendeka paɀinhu ɀishoma, ndicakuisa pamsoro peɀinhu ɀizhinji; pinda pamufaro washe wako.
matarenta maʋiri akaʋuya ʋo, akati. Ishe, makandipa matarenta maʋiri; tarirai, ndawana mamŋe matarenta maʋiri.
Ishe wake akati kwaari: Ɀakanaka, muranda wakanaka, wakatendeka; wakaŋga wakatendeka paɀinhu ɀishoma, ndicakuisa pamsoro peɀinhu ɀizhinji; pinda pamufaro washe wako.
Wakaŋga apiwa tarenta rimŋe, naiye akaʋuya ʋo, akati: Ishe, ndakaŋga ndicikuziʋai imi, kuti muri munhu unehasha, munoceka pamusati makadɀara, munoʋuŋganidza pamusati makakusha;
ɀino ndakatya, ndikandoʋiga tarenta renyu pasi; heco, cinhu cenyu!
Ishe wake akapindura, akati kwaari: Iwe, muranda wakaipa, unoʋusimbe, wakaŋga uciziʋa kuti ndinoceka pandisina‐kudɀara, ndiciʋuŋganidza pandisina‐kukusha;
saka waifanira kuisa mari yaŋgu kunaʋebaŋga, kuti pakuȿika kwaŋgu ndiŋgaɗai ndapiwa ɀaŋgu ɀawanda.
Naiɀoɀo mutorerei tarenta rake, mupe unamatarenta anegumi.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unaɀo, ucapiwa, aʋe neɀizhinji; asi usina, ucatorerwa neɀaanaɀo.
Ƃuɗisirai muranda pasina, murima rokunze; ipapo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno.
Ɀino kana Mŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya nokubginya kwake, naʋatumŋa ʋose ʋanaye, ucagara pacigaro cake coʋushe cinobginya;
namarudzi ose acaʋuŋganidzwa pamberi pake; ucaʋaraʋura somufudzi unoraʋura makwai nembudzi.
Ucaisa makwai kurudyi rwake, mbudzi kuruɓoshwe.
Ɀino Ishe ucati kunaʋari kurudyi: Ʋuyai imi, makaropafadzwa naƂaɓa, mugare nhaka yoʋushe bgakagadzirirwemi kubva pakuʋamba kwenyika.
Nokuti ndakaŋga ndinenzara, mukandipa cokudya; ndakaŋga ndinenyota, mukandipa cokunwa; ndakaŋga ndiri mŋeni, mukandigamucira;
ndakaŋga ndisineŋguʋo, mukandipfekedza; ndakaŋga ndicirwara, mukandifambira; ndakaŋga ndiri mutoroŋgo, mukaʋuya kwandiri.
Ɀino ʋakarurama ʋacamupindura, ʋaciti: Ishe, takakuʋonai riniko munenzara, tikakupai cokudya? kana munenyota, tikakupai cokunwa?
Takakuʋonai riniko muri mŋeni, tikakugamucirai? kana musineŋguʋo, tikakupfekedzai?
Takakuʋonai riniko mucirwara, kana muri mutoroŋgo, tikaʋuya kwamuri?
Ishe ucapindura, aciti kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Pamakaɀiitira mumŋe waʋaɗuku ʋehama dzaŋgu idzi, makaɀiitireni.
Ɀino ucati kunaʋari kuruɓoshwe: Ibvai kwandiri, imi makatukwa, muende kumŋoto usiŋgaperi, wakagadzirirwa Diaborosi naʋatumŋa ʋake.
Nokuti ndakaŋga ndinenzara, mukasandipa cokudya; ndakaŋga ndinenyota, mukasandipa cokunwa;
ndakaŋga ndiri mŋeni, mukasandigamucira; ndisineŋguʋo, mukasandipfekedza; ndicirwara, nomutoroŋgo, mukasandifambira.
Ɀino naiʋaʋa ʋacapindura, ʋaciti: Ishe, takakuʋonai riniko munenzara, kana munenyota, kana muri mŋeni, kana musineŋguʋo, kana mucirwara, kana muri mutoroŋgo, tikasakushumirai?
Ɀino ucaʋapindura, aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri, pamusati makaɀiitira mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa, hamuzakaɀiitireni.
Aʋa ʋacaenda kukurobga kusiŋgaperi; asi ʋakarurama kuʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Jesu wakati apedza mashoko iwayo ose, akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake:
Munoziʋa kuti kana mazuʋa maʋiri apfuʋura paseka inoȿika, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaiswa
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru, naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋakaʋuŋgana muruʋazhe rwomuprista mukuru, wainzi Kayafasi.
Ʋakaraŋgana kuti ʋaɓate Jesu namano, ʋagomuʋuraya.
Asi ʋakati: Ɀirege kuitwa pamutambo, kuti kurege kuʋa neɓope pakati paʋanhu.
Ɀino Jesu wakati ari paBetania, mumba maSimoni wamaperembudzi,
mumŋe mukadzi akaʋuya kwaari anecinu cearbastera caiʋa necizoro cinomuteŋgo mukuru, akaciɗurura pamusoro wake, agere pakudya.
Asi ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakafa neshuŋgu, ʋakati: Kuparadzwa kwakaɗaro kwaitirweiko?
Nokuti cizoro ici ciŋgaɗai cateŋgeswa nemari zhinji, ikapiwa ʋarombo.
Asi Jesu, aciɀinzwa, akati kwaʋari: Munotambudzireiko mukadzi
Nokuti ʋarombo munaʋo ŋguʋa dzose, asi ini hamuneni ŋguʋa dzose.
Nokuti ɀaakaɗira cizoro ici pamuʋiri waŋgu, wakaɀiitira kuʋigwa kwaŋgu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kwose kunozoparidzirwa Evaŋgeri iyi panyika dzose, iɀi ɀakaitwa naye ɀicarebga ʋo, ʋamuraŋgarire naɀo.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, wainzi Judasi Iskarioti, wakaenda kuʋaprista ʋakuru,
akati: Mucandipeiko, kana ndikamuisa kwamuri? Ʋakamuyerera masirveri anamakumi matatu.
Ɀino kubva ipapo akatȿaka ŋguʋa yakafanira yokumuisa
Nezuʋa rokutaŋga reɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso, ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya kunaJesu, ʋakati: Munoɗa kuti tikugadzirireipiko pamuŋgadya paseka?
Akati: Endai muguta kunanyakuti, muti kwaari: Ɀanzi noMudzidzisi: Ŋguʋa yaŋgu yaʋa pedyo; ndicadya paseka paimba yako, naʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakaita paʋakarairwa napo naJesu, ʋakagadzira paseka.
Aʋa maɗekwana, akagara pakudya naʋadzidzi ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri.
Ʋakati ʋacidya, akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe wenyu ucandipandukira.
Ɀino ʋakaʋa neshuŋgu kwaɀo, ʋakataŋga mumŋe nomumŋe kutaura kwaari, aciti: Ishe, ndini here?
Akapindura, akati: Waisa ruʋoko neni mundiro, ndiye ucandipandukira.
Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaenda hake, seɀaɀakanyorwa pamsoro pake; asi unenhamo uyo, Mŋanakomana womunhu waanopandukirwa naye; ɀaiʋa nani kumunhu uyu kana asina‐kuɓerekwa.
Ɀino Judasi, uyo wakamupandukira, akapindura, akati: Rabi, ndini here? Akati kwaari: Ndiɀo ɀawataura.
Ʋakati ʋodya, Jesu akatora ciŋgwa, akaciropafadza, akacimeɗura, ndokupa ʋadzidzi ʋake, aciti kwaʋari: Torai, mudye; ici ndiwo muʋiri waŋgu.
Akatora mukombe, akaʋoŋga, akaʋapa, aciti: Inwai mose pauri.
Nokuti ici iropa raŋgu resuŋgano
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Handicatoŋgonwi ɀe ɀiɓereko ɀomuzambiriŋga, kuȿikira zuʋa iro randicazonwa naro nemi, ɀaʋa ɀitȿa, muʋushe bgaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaimba rwiyo, ʋakaɓuɗa
Ɀino Jesu wakati kwaʋari: Imi mose mucagumburwa kwandiri ʋusiku bguno; nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Asi kana ndamutswa, ndicakutuŋgamirirai Garirea.
Ɀino Petro wakapindura, akati kwaari: Kana ʋose ʋakagumburwa kwamuri, ini handiŋgatoŋgogumburwi.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwauri, kuti ʋusiku bguno, joŋgwe risati rarira, ucandiramba katatu.
Petro akati kwaari: Kunyaŋge ndikafanira kufa nemi, handiŋgatoŋgokurambiyi ini. Ʋadzidzi ʋose ʋakaɗaro ʋo.
Ɀino Jesu wakaȿika naʋo panɀimbo inonzi Getsemani, akati kuʋadzidzi: Garai pano, ini ndicaenda kundonyeŋgetera uko.
Akatora Petro naʋanakomana ʋaZebedi ʋaʋiri, akataŋga kuʋa neshuŋgu nokuɗumbirwa.
Akati kwaʋari: Mŋeya waŋgu uneshuŋgu kwaɀo, kuȿikira pakufa; garai pano, murinde neni.
Akapfuʋura mberi ɀishomanene, akawira pasi neciso cake, akanyeŋgetera, aciti: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, kana ɀicibvira, mukombe uyu ŋgaupfuʋure kwandiri; kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kurege kuʋa kuɗa kwaŋgu, asi kuɗa kwenyu.
Akaenda kuʋadzidzi, akaʋawana ʋaʋata; akati kunaPetro: Makaŋga musiŋgagoni seiko kurinda neni ŋguʋa imŋe cete?
Rindai, munyeŋgetere, kuti murege kupinda mukuidzwa; mŋeya unoɗa hawo, asi nyama hainesimba.
Akaenda ɀe rwecipiri, akanyeŋgetera, aciti: Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu, kana mukombe uyu usiŋgagoni kupfuʋura ndisiŋgaunwi, kuɗa kwenyu ŋgakuitwe.
Akaenda ɀe, akaʋawana ʋaʋata; nokuti meso aʋo akaŋga aɓatwa nehope.
Akaʋasiya ɀe, akandonyeŋgetera rwecitatu, acitaura ɀe mashoko iwayo
Ɀino akaenda kuʋadzidzi, akati kwaʋari: Ciʋatai henyu, muzorore; tarirai, ŋguʋa yaȿika, Mŋanakomana womunhu woiswa mumaʋoko aʋatadzi.
Simukai, tiende; tarirai, wondiisa
Acataura, tarira Judasi, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akaȿika, anaʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaɓata minondo, netȿimbo, ʋacibva kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu.
Ɀino iye, wakamupandukira, wakaŋga aʋapa ciratidzo, aciti: Uyo wandicaȿeta, ndiye; mumuɓate.
Pakarepo akaȿika kunaJesu, akati: Kwaziwai, Rabi! Akamuȿeta ɀikuru.
Jesu akati kwaari: Shamŋari,
Ɀino tarira, mumŋe waʋaiʋa naJesu, akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akavomora munondo wake, akatema muranda womuprista mukuru, akagura nzeʋe yake.
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaari: Dzosera munondo wako mumuhara wawo, nokuti ʋose ʋanoɓata munondo, ʋacafa nomunondo.
Unofuŋga here kuti handigoni kukumbira kunaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, ʋakandipa ikoɀino ʋatumŋa ʋanopfuʋura mapoka makuru‐kuru anegumi namaʋiri?
Magwaro aŋgagoitika seiko, anoti ɀinofanira kuitwa kuɗaro?
Neŋguʋa iyo Jesu akati kuʋanhu ʋazhinji: Maɓuɗa neminondo netȿimbo kuzondiɓata sendiri gororo here? Ndaigara mutembere mazuʋa ose, ndicidzidzisa, mukasandiɓata.
Asi iɀi ɀose ɀaitwa kuti magwaro aʋaprofita aitike. Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋose ʋakamusiya, ʋakatiza.
Aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋaɓata Jesu, ʋakamuisa kunaKayafasi, muprista mukuru, apo pakaŋga paʋuŋgana ʋanyori naʋakuru.
Asi Petro wakamuteʋera ari kure, kuȿikira paruʋazhe rwomuprista mukuru, akapinda mukati, akagara naʋatariri kuzoʋona kupera
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru namakurukota ose ʋakatȿaka ʋucapupu bgenhema kuti ʋapomere Jesu, ʋamuʋuraye;
asi haʋana‐kuwana, kunyaŋge ɀapupu ɀizhinji ɀenhema ɀakaʋuya. Pashure ɀiʋiri ɀakaȿika, ɀikati:
Munhu uyu wakati: Ndinogona kuputsa tembere yaMŋari, ndikaiʋaka ɀe namazuʋa matatu.
Ɀino muprista mukuru akasimuka, akati kwaari: Haupinduri cinhu here? Cinyiko ici caʋanokupomedzera?
Asi Jesu wakaramba anyerere. Muprista mukuru akati kwaari: Ndinokupikisa naMŋari mupenyu, kuti utiʋudze kana uri Kristu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ndiɀo ɀawataura; asi ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva ɀino mucaʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu agere kurudyi rwesimba, aciʋuya namakore okuɗeŋga.
Ipapo muprista mukuru akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akati: Wamhura Mŋari! Ticatȿakireiko ɀapupu? Tarirai, manzwa ɀino kumhura kwake.
Munoti kuɗiniko? Ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Unofanira kufa.
Ɀino ʋakamupfira mate paciso, ʋakamuroʋa netsiʋa, ʋamŋe noruʋoko,
ʋaciti: Profita, iwe Kristu, kuti ndiani wakuroʋa.
Petro wakaŋga agere panze paruʋazhe. Ɀino mushandiri akaʋuya kwaari, akati: Newe ʋo wakaŋga unaJesu weGarirea.
Asi iye wakaramba pamberi paʋose, aciti: Handiziʋi ɀaunoreʋa.
Ɀino wakati aɓuɗa pasuʋo, mumŋe mushandiri akamuʋona, akati kunaʋaiʋa’po: Uyu
Akaramba ɀe nokupika,
Caʋa ciŋguʋa ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po ʋakaʋuya, ʋaciti kunaPetro: Ɀirokwaɀo, newe ʋo uri
Ɀino wakataŋga kutuka nokupika, aciti: Handimuziʋi munhu uyu. Pakarepo joŋgwe rikarira.
Ipapo Petro akaraŋgarira shoko rakaŋga rarebga naJesu, rokuti: Joŋgwe risati rarira, ucandiramba katatu. Ipapo akaɓuɗa panze, akandocema ɀikuru.
Aʋa maŋgwana, ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋose naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋakaraŋgana pamsoro paJesu kuti ʋamuʋuraye;
ʋakamusuŋga, ʋakaenda naye, ʋakamuisa kunaPirato, muɓati.
Ɀino Judasi, uyo wakamupandukira, wakati aciʋona kuti watoŋgerwa kufa, ndokuɀidya mŋoyo, akadzosera masirveri aya anamakumi matatu kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru,
aciti: Ndatadza, ndapandukira ropa risinemhoȿa. Ʋakati: Tinemhaka yeiko naɀo? Imhaka yako.
Akakandira pasi masirveri mutembere; akabva, akaenda ndokuɀisuŋgirira.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakatora masirveri, ʋakati: Haɀina‐kufanira kuti tiaise muciʋigiro cemari, ɀauri muteŋgo weropa.
Ʋakaraŋgana, ʋakateŋga nawo munda womuʋumbi wehari, kuzoʋiga’po ʋatorwa.
Naiɀoɀo munda uyo wakanzi munda weropa kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino ɀakarebga nomuprofita Jeremia ɀakaitika, ɀinoti:
Ʋakatora masirveri anamakumi matatu,
Muteŋgo waiye wakatarirwa muteŋgo,
Uyo wakatarwa naʋana ʋaIsraeri;
Ʋakateŋga nawo munda womuʋumbi wehari,
Seɀandakarairwa naShe.
Ɀino Jesu wakamira pamberi pomuɓati, muɓati akamubvunza, akati: Ndiwe mambo waʋaJuda here? Jesu akati kwaari: Ndiɀo ɀamataura.
Asi wakati acipomerwa mhoȿa naʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru, haana‐kupindura cinhu.
Ɀino Pirato akati kwaari: Haunzwi ɀinhu ɀizhinji ɀaʋanokupomedzera here?
Asi haana‐kuʋapindura, kunyaŋge neshoko rimŋe cete, muɓati akashamiswa kwaɀo‐kwaɀo naɀo.
Ɀino, pamutambo muɓati waisisunuŋgurira ʋanhu ʋazhinji musuŋgwa mumŋe, waʋaneŋge ʋaiɗa.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋaiʋa nomusuŋgwa wakakurumbira, wainzi Barabasi.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana, Pirato akati kwaʋari: Munoɗa kuti ndikusunuŋgurirei aniko? Barabasi, kana Jesu, unonzi Kristu?
Nokuti wakaŋga aciziʋa kuti ʋakaŋga ʋamuisa
Ɀino wakati agere pacigaro cokutoŋga, mukadzi wake akatumira kwaari, aciti: Usaʋa nemhaka nomunhu uyo wakarurama; nokuti ndakatambudzika ɀikuru nhasi pakurota nokuɗa kwake.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋakagombedzera ʋanhu ʋazhinji kuti ʋakumbire Barabasi, Jesu aʋurawe.
Muɓati akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Munoɗa kuti ndikusunuŋgurirei aniko kunaiʋaʋo ʋaʋiri? Ʋakati: Barabasi.
Pirato akati kwaʋari: Ndicagoiteiko naJesu, unonzi Kristu? Ʋose ʋakati kwaari: Ŋgaaroʋerwe pamucinjikwa.
Iye akati: Cakaipa caakagoita ndeceiko? Ʋakanyanyisa kuɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Ŋgaaroʋerwe pamucinjikwa!
Ɀino Pirato, aciʋona kuti haɀiɓatsiri, asi kuti pomuka ɓope, wakatora mvura, akashamba maʋoko ake pamberi paʋanhu ʋazhinji, aciti: Handinemhaka neropa romunhu uyu wakarurama; mhaka yenyu!
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Ropa rake ŋgariʋe pamsoro peɗu napaʋana ʋeɗu.
Ɀino akaʋasunuŋgurira Barabasi, asi Jesu wakamuroʋesa kwaɀo, akamuisa kwaʋari, kuti aroʋerwe pamucinjikwa.
Ɀino ʋarwi ʋomuɓati ʋakaisa Jesu mumba momuɓati, hondo yose ikaʋuŋganira kwaari.
Ʋakamubvisa ŋguʋo dzake, ʋakamufukidza ŋguʋo tȿuku;
ʋakaruka korona yeminzwa, ndokuiisa pamusoro wake; norutsaŋga muruʋoko rwake rworudyi; ʋakafugama pamberi pake, ʋakamuseka, ʋaciti: Kwaziwai, Mambo waʋaJuda!
Ʋakamupfira mate, ʋakatora rutsaŋga, ʋakaramba ʋacimuroʋa musoro.
Ʋakati ʋamuseka, ʋakamubvisa ŋguʋo
Ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗa, ʋakawana munhu weKurini, wainzi Simoni; ʋakamumanikidza iye kuti atakure mucinjikwa wake.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika panɀimbo inonzi Gorgota, ndokuti nɀimbo yeɗehenya,
ʋakamupa waini yakaveŋganiswa nenduru, kuti anwe; asi wakati araʋira, akaramba kunwa.
Ʋakati ʋamuroʋera pamucinjikwa, ʋakagoʋana ŋguʋo dzake pakati paʋo, ʋacikanda mijenya, [kuti ɀakarebga nomuprofita ɀiitike,
Ʋakagara, ʋakamurinda’po.
Ʋakaisa pamsoro pomusoro wake rugwaro rwemhoȿa yake,
Ʋakaroʋera pamŋe cete naye makororo maʋiri, mumŋe kurudyi, mumŋe kuruɓoshwe.
Ʋakaŋga ʋacipfuʋura, ʋakamutuka, ʋacidzuŋgudza misoro yaʋo,
ʋaciti: Iwe wokuputsa tembere, nokuiʋaka ɀe namazuʋa matatu, ciɀiponesa. Kana uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari, ɓuruka pamucinjikwa.
Saiɀoɀo ʋaprista ʋakuru, naʋanyori naʋakuru, ʋakamuseka, ʋaciti:
Wakaponesa ʋamŋe; haagoni kuɀiponesa! Ndiye Mambo waʋaIsraeri! Ŋgaaɓuruke ɀino pamucinjikwa, titende kwaari.
Waiʋimba naMŋari; ŋgaacimusunuŋgura ɀino pamucinjikwa, kana acimuɗa; nokuti wakati: Ndiri Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
namakororo akaŋga aroʋerwa pamucinjikwa pamŋe cete naye, akamuɀidza saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino kubva paŋguʋa yecitanhatu kuȿikira paŋguʋa yepfumbamŋe, rima rakaʋa’po panyika yose.
Neŋguʋa ineŋge yepfumbamŋe, Jesu akaɗana nenzwi guru, aciti: Eri, Eri, rama sabaktani? Ndokuti: Mŋari waŋgu, Mŋari waŋgu, mandisiyireiko?
Ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakati: Uyo unoɗana Eria.
Pakarepo mumŋe waʋo wakamhanya, akatora cipanje, akacizadza nevinega, ndokuciisa parutsaŋga, akamunwisa.
Ʋamŋe ʋakati: Regai, timboʋona kana Eria acizoʋuya kumuponesa.
Ɀino Jesu akaɗanidzira ɀe nenzwi guru, akarega mŋeya wake.
Ipapo tarira, cidzitiro cetembere cakabvaruka napakati, kubva kumsoro kuȿikira pasi; nyika ikaɗeŋgenyeka, mabge akatsemuka;
mabgiro akazaruka, nemitumbu mizhinji yaʋatȿene, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋete, yakamutswa;
ʋakaɓuɗa pamabgiro, iye amuka, ʋakapinda muguta dɀene, ʋakaʋonekwa naʋazhinji.
Ɀino mukuru wezana, naʋairinda Jesu naye, ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika, neɀakaitwa, ʋakatya ɀikuru, ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo uyu wakaŋga ari Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Ʋakadzi ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋari’po, ʋakatarira ʋari kure, ʋakaŋga ʋateʋera Jesu, ʋacibva Garirea ʋacimushandira.
Pakati paʋo kwakaŋga kunaMaria Magdarene, naMaria mai ʋaJakobo naJose, namai ʋaʋanakomana ʋaZebedi.
Ɀino aʋa maɗeko kukaȿika mumŋe mufumi weArimatea, wainzi Josefa, wakaŋga ari mudzidzi waJesu amene,
akaenda kunaPirato, akakumbira mutumbu waJesu. Pirato akaraira kuti apiwe.
Josefa akatora mutumbu, akauputira nomuceka mucena,
akauʋiga mubgiro bgake bgutȿa, bgaakaŋga acera pabge; akakuŋgurusira ibge guru pamuromo wobgiro, akabva.
Maria Magdarene, nomumŋe Maria, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋagere ʋakatarisana nobgiro.
Fume maŋgwana — ndiro
ʋakati: Ishe, tinoraŋgarira kuti munyeŋgeri uyu, aciri mupenyu, wakati: Mazuʋa matatu apfuʋura, ndicamuka.
Saka rairai kuti bgiro bguceŋgetwe kuȿikira pazuʋa retatu, kuti ʋadzidzi ʋarege kuʋuya kumuɓa, ʋagoti kuʋanhu: Wakamutswa kuʋakafa; kurashika kwokupedzisira kukazopfuʋura kwokutaŋga.
Pirato akati kwaʋari: Imi munaʋarindi; endai, mubguceŋgete seɀamunoziʋa.
Ʋakaenda, ʋakandoceŋgeta bgiro, ʋakaisa ciratidzo cokusimbisa pabge, ʋarindi ʋanaʋo.
Nokupera kwesaɓata, kwoedza,
Ɀino kukaʋa’po kuɗeŋgenyeka kukuru kwenyika, nokuti mutumŋa waShe wakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga, akaʋuya, akakuŋgurusa ibge, ndokugara pamsoro paro.
Kuʋonekwa kwake kwakaŋga kwakaita semheni, neɀokufuka ɀake ɀaiʋa ɀicena secando.
Ɀino ʋarindi ʋakaɗeɗera ʋacimutya, ʋakaita saʋakafa.
Ɀino mutumŋa akapindura, akati kuʋakadzi: Musatya imi, nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti munotȿaka Jesu, wakaŋga akaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa.
Haa’po pano, nokuti wakamuka, seɀaakareʋa. Ʋuyai, muʋone pakaŋga paʋete Ishe.
Kurumidzai muende mundoʋudza ʋadzidzi ʋake, kuti wakamuka kuʋakafa; tarirai unokutuŋgamirirai Garirea, mucandomuʋona’po. Tarirai, ndakuʋudzai.
Ɀino ʋakakurumidza kubva pabgiro, ʋacitya nokufara ɀikuru, ʋakamhanyira kundoʋudza ʋadzidzi ʋake.
Ɀino tarira, Jesu wakasoŋgana naʋo, akati: Kwaziwai! Ʋakaʋuya, ʋakaɓata tsoka dzake, ʋakamunamata.
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari: Musatya, endai mundoʋudza hama dzaŋgu, kuti ʋaende Garirea, ʋagondiʋona’ko.
Ɀino ʋaciri munzira, ʋamŋe ʋarindi ʋakaȿika muguta, ʋakaʋudza ʋaprista ʋakuru ɀose ɀakaitwa.
Ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana naʋakuru, ʋakaraŋgana, ʋakapa ʋarwi mari zhinji,
ʋaciti: Taurai muciti: Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya ʋusiku ʋakamuɓa, isu tiʋete.
Kana ɀikanzwika nomuɓati, ticamutendisa, imi murege kusundirwa mhoȿa.
Ɀino ʋakatora mari, ʋakaita seɀaʋakadzidziswa, shoko iri rikaparidzirwa pakati paƲaJuda, kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋanegumi nomumŋe ʋakaenda Garirea, kugomo raʋakarairwa naJesu.
Ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakamunamata, asi ʋamŋe ʋakanyunyuta.
Ipapo Jesu wakaȿika, akataura kwaʋari, akati: Ndakapiwa simba rose kuɗeŋga napanyika.
Endai naiɀoɀo, mudzidzise marudzi ose, muʋabapatidze muzita raƂaɓa, neroMŋanakomana, neroMŋeya Mutȿene;
muʋadzidzise kuceŋgeta ɀose ɀandakakurairai imi; tarirai, ndinemi mazuʋa ose, kuȿikira pakuguma kwenyika.
Kutaŋga kweEvaŋgeri yaJesu Kristu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Seɀaɀakanyorwa mumuprofita Isaya,
Tarira, ndinotuma munyai waŋgu pamberi pako,
Ucakunatsira nzira yako;
Inzwi rounoɗana murenje,
Gadzirai nzira yaShe,
Ruramisai migwagwa yake.
Johane wakaʋuya acibapatidza murenje, aciparidza rubapatidzo rwokutendeʋuka ʋakaŋganwirwe ɀiʋi.
Nyika yose yeJudea, naʋeJerusarema ʋose ʋakaɓuɗira kwaari, ʋakabapatidzwa naye murwizi rwaJoridani, ʋaciɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Johane wakaŋga akapfeka
Akaparidza, aciti: Shure kwaŋgu kunoʋuya mumŋe unesimba kupfuʋureni, wandisino‐kufanira kukotama kuti ndisunuŋgure rukanda rweshaŋgu dzake.
Ini ndakakubapatidzai nemvura, asi iye ucakubapatidzai noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Namazuʋa iwayo Jesu wakabva Nazareta muGarirea, akabapatidzwa naJohane muJordani.
Pakarepo aciɓuɗa mumvura, akaʋona ɗeŋga ricizarurwa, noMŋeya uciɓurukira pamsoro pake senjiʋa;
inzwi rikabva kuɗeŋga,
Pakarepo Mŋeya wakamuɓuɗisira kurenje;
akaʋa murenje mazuʋa makumi manna, aciidzwa naSatani; wakaŋga ari kuɀikara, ʋatumŋa ʋakamushumira.
Johane wakati asuŋgwa, Jesu akaȿika Garirea, aciparidza Evaŋgeri yaMŋari,
aciti: Ŋguʋa yazad ziswa, ʋushe bgaMŋari bgasweɗera pedyo; tendeʋukai, mutende Evaŋgeri.
Wakati acifamba paguŋgwa re Garirea, akaʋona Simoni, naAndrea, m unuŋuna waSimoni, ʋacikandira ʋutaʋ muguŋgwa, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋaɓati ʋehoʋe.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Nditeʋerei, kuti ndikuitei ʋaɓati ʋaʋanhu.
Ʋakasiya ʋutaʋa bgaʋo pakarepo, ʋakamuteʋera.
Wakati apfuʋura ɀishoma, akaʋona Jakobo,
Akaʋaɗana pakarepo, ʋakasiya ɓaɓa ʋaʋo Zebedi mugwa naʋaranda, ʋakamuteʋera.
Ʋakapinda Kapernaume; pakarepo nomusi wesaɓata akapinda musinagoge, akadzidzisa.
Ʋakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake, nokuti wakaʋadzidzisa somunhu unesimba, asiŋgaiti saʋanyori.
Ɀino musinagoge raʋo makaŋga munomunhu wakaŋga anomŋeya wetȿina, wakaɗanidzira,
aciti: Tinemhaka yeiko nemi, Jesu weNazareta? maʋuya kuzotiparadza kanhi? Ndinokuziʋai kuti ndimi ani;
Ɀino Jesu akamuraira, akati: Nyarara, uɓuɗe kwaari!
Mŋeya wetȿina ukamubvundisa, ndokuɗanidzira nenzwi guru, ndokuɓuɗa kwaari.
Ʋakatya ɀikuru ʋose, nokuɗaro ʋakaita nyaya, ʋaciti: Cinyiko ici? Kudzidzisa kutȿa kunesimba! Unoraira kunyaŋge nemŋeya yetȿina ikamuterera.
Pakarepo mukurumbira wake ukanzwika panyika yose yakapoteredza yeGarirea.
Pakarepo ʋakati ʋacibva musinagoge, ʋakapinda mumba maSimoni naAndrea, Jakobo naJohane ʋanaʋo.
Mai ʋomukadzi waSimoni ʋakaŋga ʋaʋete ʋacirwara nefiviri; pakarepo ʋakamuʋudza iɀoɀo.
Akaenda, akaʋaɓata noruʋoko, akaʋamutsa; fiviri ikaʋarega, ʋakaʋashandira.
Maɗekwana, zuʋa raʋira, ʋakaisa kwaari ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacirwadziwa, naʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa nemŋeya yakaipa.
Guta rose rakaŋga raʋuŋgana pamukoʋa.
Akaporesa ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋacirwadziwa namarudzi ehosha, akaɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa mizhinji; asi wakaŋga asiŋgatenderi mŋeya yakaipa kutaura, nokuti yakaŋga icimuziʋa.
Maŋgwanani kucinerima, wakamuka akaɓuɗa, akaenda kunɀimbo murenje, akandonyeŋgetera’po.
Simoni, naʋakaŋga ʋanaye, ʋakamuteʋera.
Ʋakamuwana, ʋakati kwaari: Ʋose ʋanokutȿakai.
Akati kwaʋari: Ŋgatiende kumŋe kumisha iri pedyo, kuti ndindoparidza ikoko ʋo, nokuti ndiɀo ɀandakaʋuyira.
Akaenda, akaparidza mumasinagoge aʋo paGarirea rose aciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa.
Ɀino munhu unamaperembudzi akaʋuya kwaari, akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, ndokufugama pamberi pake, akati kwaari: Kana muciɗa, munogona kundinatsa.
Akamunzwira ŋgoni, akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akamuɓata, akati kwaari: Ndinoɗa, cinatswa.
Pakarepo maperembudzi akabva kwaari, akanatswa.
Ɀino akamuraira kwaɀo, akamuendisa pakarepo.
Akati kwaari: Cenjera kuti urege kuʋudza munhu cinhu; asi enda uɀiratidze kumuprista, uɓayire pamsoro pokunatswa kwako ɀakarairwa naMosesi, ciʋe capupu kwaʋari.
Asi iye wakaɓuɗa, akataŋga kuɀiʋudza ʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuparidzira shoko
Kwakati mazuʋa apfuʋura, akapinda ɀe Kapernaume;
Ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana nokuɗaro ʋakashaiwa nɀimbo, kunyaŋge pamukoʋa; akaʋataurira shoko.
Ʋakaʋuya ʋakaisa kwaari munhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo, akatakurwa na
Ɀino ʋakati ʋasiŋgagoni kusweɗera kwaari nokuɗa kwaʋazhinji, ʋakazarura ɗeŋga paakaŋga ari; ʋakati ʋariputsa, ʋakaɓurusa nhoʋo, pakaŋga paʋete munhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo;
Jesu wakati aciʋona kutenda kwaʋo, akati kunowakaŋga akafa mitezo: Mŋana, wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋanyori ʋakaŋga ʋagere’mo, ʋakafuŋga mumŋoyo yaʋo,
Uyu unoreʋereiko kuɗaro? Unomhura
Pakarepo Jesu aciziʋa mumŋeya make kuti ʋanofuŋga kuɗaro mumŋoyo yaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Munofuŋgireiko ɀinhu iɀi mumŋoyo yenyu?
Cinyiko cakareruka, kuti kunowakafa mitezo: Wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako, kana kuti: Simuka, tora nhoʋo dzako, ufambe?
Asi kuti muziʋe kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unesimba panyika rokukaŋganwira ɀiʋi, (akati kumunhu wakaŋga akafa mitezo:)
Ndinoti kwauri: Simuka, tora nhoʋo dzako, uende kumba kwako!
Pakarepo akasimuka, akatora nhoʋo, ndokuɓuɗa pamberi paʋo ʋose; naiɀoɀo ʋose ʋakashamiswa, ʋakarumbidza Mŋari, ʋaciti: Hatina‐kumboʋona ɀakaɗai.
Wakaɓuɗa ɀe
Wakati acipfuʋura, akaʋona Revi,
Ɀino wakati agere pakudya mumba make, ʋateresi ʋazhinji naʋatadzi ʋakagara naJesu naʋadzidzi ʋake; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋazhinji ʋaimuteʋera.
Ɀino ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakati ʋacimuʋona acidya naʋatadzi naʋateresi, ʋakati kuʋadzidzi ʋake:
Jesu wakati aciɀinzwa, akati kwaʋari: Ʋasiŋgarwari haʋatȿaki ŋaŋga, asi ʋanorwara; handina‐kuʋuya kuzoɗana ʋakarurama, asi ʋatadzi.
Ʋadzidzi ʋaJohane naʋaFarise ʋakaŋga ʋaciɀinyima ɀokudya; ʋakaʋuya ʋakati kwaari: Ʋadzidzi ʋaJohane naʋadzidzi ʋaʋaFarise ʋanoɀinyimireiko ɀokudya, asi ʋadzidzi ʋenyu haʋaɀinyimi neiko?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: shamŋari dzecikomba dziŋgaɀinyima ɀokudya seiko ciciri kwaʋari? Haʋaŋgaɀinyimi ɀokudya cikomba ciciri kwaʋari.
Asi mazuʋa acaȿika, acazobviswa cikomba kwaʋari; ɀino neŋguʋa iyo ʋacaɀinyima ɀokudya.
Hakunomunhu unosonera ciremo citȿa paŋguʋo yakasakara, nokuti ciremo citȿa cinobvarura ŋguʋo yakasakara, ʋuri rikanyanya.
Hakunomunhu unoɗira waini itȿa muhomboɗo tsaru; nokuti waini inoparusa homboɗo, waini nehomboɗo ɀikafa; asi waini itȿa inoɗirwa muhomboɗo itȿa.
Kwakati nomusi wesaɓata, acifamba napakati peminda, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakataŋga kutanha hura ʋacifamba.
ƲaFarise ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, ʋanoitireiko ɀisina‐kutenderwa nomusi wesaɓata?
Akati kwaʋari: Hamuna‐kuraʋa here ɀakaitwa naDavidi, musi waakaŋga ashaiwa, aziya, iye naʋakaŋga ʋanaye?
Kuti wakapinda mumba maMŋari, Abiatari ari muprista mukuru, akadya ɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza ɀakaŋga ɀisina‐kutenderwa kudyiwa, asi naʋaprista ʋoga, akapa ʋo ʋaiʋa naye?
Akati kwaʋari: Saɓata yakaitirwa munhu, munhu haana‐kuitirwa saɓata;
naiɀoɀo Mŋanakomana womunhu ndiye Ishe wesaɓata ʋo.
Wakapinda ɀe musinagoge; ɀino kwakaŋga kunomunhu wakaŋga anoruʋoko rwakawonyana.
Ʋakamutarisisa
Ɀino akati kumunhu wakaŋga anoruʋoko rwakawonyana: Simuka pakati
Akati kwaʋari: Ɀakatenderwa here nesaɓata kuita ɀakanaka kana ɀakaipa, kuponesa munhu kana kuʋuraya? Ʋakanyarara.
Ɀino wakati ariŋga‐riŋga aciʋatarira nokutsamŋa, aneshuŋgu nokuɗa kwokuwoma kwemŋoyo yaʋo, akati kumunhu: Tambanudza ruʋoko rwako. Akarutambanudza, ruʋoko rwake rukaʋandudzwa.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa, ʋakandoraŋgana pakarepo naʋaHerode pamsoro pake kuti ʋaŋgamuʋuraya sei.
Ɀino Jesu wakaenda naʋadzidzi ʋake kuguŋgwa; ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamuteʋera ʋacibva Garirea; nokuJudea,
neJerusarema, neIdumea, nemhiri kwaJoridani, noku
Akaʋudza ʋadzidzi ʋake kuti kagwa kamugarire nokuɗa kwaʋazhinji, kuti ʋarege kumumanikidza.
Nokuti wakaŋga aporesa ʋazhinji; naiɀoɀo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋanamarwere ʋakamumanikidza, kuti ʋamunyaŋgate.
Nemŋeya yetȿina yakati kana yamuʋona, yaiwira pasi pamberi pake, ikaɗanidzira iciti: Ndiwe Mŋanakomana waMŋari!
Akairaira ɀikuru kuti irege kumuziʋisa pacena.
Ɀino wakakwira mugomo akaɗana ʋaakaŋga aciɗa, ʋakaʋuya kwaari.
Akagadza ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri kuti ʋagare naye, aʋatume kuti ʋaparidze,
ʋuye ʋaʋe nesimba rokuɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa.
Akatumidza Simoni zita rinonzi Petro,
naJakobo,
naAndrea, naFiripo, naBartoromeo, naTomasi, naJakobo
naJudasi Iskarioti wakamupandukira ʋo.
Ɀino wakapinda mumba;
ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana ɀe, nokuɗaro ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kunyaŋge kudya ciŋgwa.
Ʋanhu ʋokwake ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakaɓuɗa kuzomuɓata, nokuti ʋakati: Unopeŋga.
Naʋanyori ʋakaŋga ʋaɓuruka ʋacibva Jerusarema, ʋakati: UnaBeerzeburi, unoɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa nomucinda wemŋeya yakaipa.
Ɀino akaʋaɗanira kwaari, akati kwaʋari nemifananidzo: Satani uŋgaɓuɗisa Satani seiko?
Kana ʋushe bguciɀipesanisa, ʋushe ubgo habguŋgagoni kumira.
Kana imba iciɀipesanisa, imba iyo haiŋgagoni kumira.
Kana Satani aciɀimukira, akaɀipesanisa, haaŋgagoni kumira, asi unopera.
Hakunomunhu uŋgapinda mumba mounesimba, akatora nhumbi dzake, asati ambosuŋga unesimba; ɀino uŋgaparadza imba yake.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu ʋacakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀose, nokumhura kwose kwaʋanomhura
asi aninani wamhura Mŋeya Mutȿene, haaŋgakaŋganwirwi nokuirŋgaperi, asi unemhoȿa yeciʋi cisiŋgapesi.
Nokuti ʋakati: Unomŋeya wetȿina.
Ɀino mai ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaʋuya, ʋakamira kunze, ʋakatumira
Ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋagere, ʋakamukomba, ʋakati kwaari: Tarirai, mai ʋenyu naʋanuŋuna ʋenyu nehanɀadzi dzenyu ʋari kunze ʋacikutȿakai.
Akaʋapindura, akati: Mai ʋaŋgu, naʋanuŋuna
Ɀino akariŋga‐riŋga ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋagere, ʋakamukomba, akati: Tarirai mai ʋaŋgu naʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu!
Nokuti aninani unoita kuɗa kwaMŋari, ndiye munuŋuna waŋgu, nehanɀadzi, namai.
Ɀino wakataŋga ɀe kudzidzisa paguŋgwa; ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaʋuŋganira kwaari, nokuɗaro wakapinda mugwa, akagara’
Akaʋadzidzisa ɀizhinji nemifananidzo, akati kwaʋari pakudzidzisa kwake:
Tererai: Mukushi wakaɓuɗa kundokusha.
Wakati acikusha, dzimŋe
Dzimŋe dzakawira parukaŋgarabge, padzakaŋga dzisinevu zhinji; dzikamera pakarepo, nokuti dzakaŋga dzisinevu rakadzika;
asi zuʋa rakati raɓuɗa, dzikapiswa; dzikawoma, nokuti dzakaŋga dzisinomudzi.
Dzimŋe dzakawira muminzwa; minzwa ikamera, ikadzivuŋga, dzikasaɓereka ɀiɓereko.
Dzimŋe dzakawira muvu rakanaka, dzikaɓereka ɀiɓereko,
Akati: Unenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Wakati ari oga, ʋakaŋga ʋanaye naʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋakamubvunza
Akati kwaʋari: Imi makapiwa ɀakaʋanzika ɀoʋushe bgaMŋari, asi kunaaʋa, ʋari kunze, ɀose ɀinoitwa nemifananidzo.
Kuti kuʋona ʋaʋone, asi ʋarege kuʋonesesa, nokunzwa ʋanzwe, asi ʋarege kunzwisisa, kuti ɀimŋe ʋarege kutendeʋuka, ʋakaŋganwirwe.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Hamuziʋi here mufananidzo uyu? Mucaziʋa seiko mifananidzo yose?
Mukushi unokusha shoko.
Ʋari munzira panokushwa shoko ndiʋo ʋanoti kana ʋanzwa, pakarepo Satani unoʋuya, ndokubvisa shoko rakakushwa mukati maʋo.
Naʋakakushwa parukaŋgarabge ʋakaita saiɀoɀo, ndiʋo ʋanoti kana ʋanzwa shoko rakakushwa, ʋanorigamucira pakarepo nomufaro,
asi haʋanomudzi maʋari, asi ndiʋo ʋeciŋguʋa ciɗuku; pashure kana kutambudzika nokuʋeŋgwa ɀiciʋuya nokuɗa kweshoko, pakarepo ʋanogumburwa.
Ʋamŋe ʋanokushwa muminzwa, ndiʋo ʋanonzwa shoko,
asi kufuŋganya kwenyika, nokunyeŋgera kwefuma, nokuciʋa ɀimŋe, ɀinopinda, ɀicivuŋga shoko, rikashaiwa ɀiɓereko.
Ʋakakushwa muvu rakanaka, ndiʋo ʋanonzwa shoko, ʋakarigamucira, ʋakaɓereka, mumŋe makumi matatu, mumŋe makumi matanhatu, mumŋe zana.
Ɀino wakati kwaʋari: Mŋenje uri’po kuti uiswe pasi peɗeŋgu, kana pasi pomubeda here?
Nokuti hapanecinhu cakaʋanzika cisiŋgazoʋoneswi, hapana‐cakaʋigwa cisiŋgazoɓuɗi pacena.
Kana munhu anenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Cenjerai ɀamunonzwa. Ciyero camunoyera naco, nemi mucayerwa naco; mukawedzerwa.
Nokuti unaco ucapiwa, asi usina, ucatorerwa necaanaco.
Ɀino akati: Ʋushe bgaMŋari bgakafanana nomunhu unodɀara mbeu muvu,
akaʋata, akamuka, ʋusiku namasikati; mbeu inomera, icikura, iye asiŋgaziʋi kuti
ivu rinoŋgoɓereka haro, pakutaŋga cipande, pashure hura, pashure ɀiyo ɀakakora pahura.
Kana ɀiɓereko ɀaibva, pakarepo unoceka neɓaŋga, nokuti kuceka kwaȿika.
Ɀino akati: Ʋushe bgaMŋari ticabgufananidza neiko? Ticabguenzanisira nomufananidzo upiko?
Bgakafanana netsaŋga yemastarda, iyo kana icidɀarwa muvu iɗuku kumbeu dzose dzapanyika;
asi kana yadɀarwa, inomera, iciʋa huru kumiriʋo yose iciita mataʋi makuru, akaɗaro kuti shiri dzokuɗeŋga dzinogara pamumvuri wayo.
Akasireʋa shoko kwaʋari nemifananidzo mizhinji yakaɗaro, paʋaigona kunzwa napo.
Haana‐kutaura naʋo kunze kwemifananidzo, asi waiɗudzira ʋadzidzi ʋake ɀose ʋari ʋoga.
Ɀino nezuʋa iro, aʋa maɗekwana, wakati kwaʋari: Ŋgatiyambukire mhiri.
Ʋakasiya ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakaenda naye mugwa akaŋgoɗaro; mamŋe magwa akaŋga aiʋa naye.
Ɀino ɗutu guru remhepo rakamuka, mafuŋgu emvura akaroʋa mugwa, rikaŋga roɗo‐kuzara.
Asi iye wakaŋga ari mushure megwa aʋete pamutsago; ʋakamumutsa, ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, hamunehanya kunyaŋge tofa here?
Akamuka, akaraira mhepo, akati kuguŋgwa: Nyarara, ugadzikane! Mhepo ikanyarara, kudzikama kukuru kukaʋa’po.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Munotyireiko kuɗaro? Hamunokutenda here?
Ʋakatya nokutya kukuru, ʋakataurirana ʋaciti: Ndianiko uyu, nokuti mhepo kunyaŋge neguŋgwa ɀinomuterera?
Ʋakaȿika mhiri kweguŋgwa kunyika yaʋaGerasa.
Ɀino wakati aɓuɗa mugwa, pakarepo akasoŋgana nomunhu waiʋa nomŋeya wetȿina, acibva kumarinda.
Uyo waigara mumarinda; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakaŋga acagona kumusuŋga kunyaŋge neketani.
Nokuti kazhinji waisuŋgwa neɀisuŋgo ɀamakumbo namaketani, asi waiɗambura maketani, nokuɗashura ɀisuŋgo; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waigona kumunyoroʋesa.
Ŋguʋa dzose, ʋusiku namasikati, waigara mumarinda nomumakomo, aciɗanidzira, aciɀiceka namabge.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona Jesu ari kure, akamhanya, ndokumunamata;
akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, akati: Ndinemhaka yeiko nemi Jesu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro? Ndinokupikirai naMŋari kuti murege kunditambudza.
Nokuti wakati kwaari: Ƃuɗa pamunhu, iwe mŋeya wetȿina!
Akamubvunza, akati: Zita rako ndianiko? Akati kwaari: Regioni ndiro zita raŋgu, nokuti tiri ʋazhinji.
Akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti arege kuidziŋga panyika iyo.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kuri’po pagomo ɓoka guru reŋguruʋe dzakaŋga dzicifura.
Ikakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, iciti: Titumirei kuŋguruʋe, kuti tindopinda madziri.
Akaitendera. Mŋeya yetȿina ikaɓuɗa, ikapinda muŋguruʋe; ɓoka rikamhanyira kumawere kuguŋgwa, dzineŋge dzaiʋa ɀuru ɀiʋiri, dzikafira muguŋgwa.
Ʋaidzifudza ʋakatiza, ʋakandoʋudza iɀoɀo muguta naparuwa. Ʋakaʋuya kuzoʋona ɀaitwa.
Ʋakaʋuya kunaJesu, ʋakaʋona wakaŋga anemŋeya yakaipa agere, apfeka, ari munhu kwaye — iye waiʋa neregioni; ʋakatya.
Ʋaya ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiʋona, ʋakarondedzera ɀaakaitirwa, iye wakaŋga anemŋeya yakaipa, neŋguruʋe ʋo.
Ʋakataŋga kukumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti abve munyika yaʋo.
Ɀino wakati acipinda mugwa, iye waiʋa nemŋeya yakaipa akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti agare naye.
Asi haana‐kumutendera, asi wakati kwaari: Enda kumba kwako, kuhama dzako, uʋaʋudze ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀawakaitirwa naShe, napawakaitirwa ŋgoni napo.
Akaenda, akataŋga kuparidza
Jesu wakati ayambukira ɀe mhiri negwa, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋganira kwaari; wakaŋga ari paguŋgwa.
Mumŋe waʋakuru ʋesinagoge, wainzi Jairosi, akaȿika; akati acimuʋona, akaɀiwisira pasi petsoka dzake,
akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, aciti: Mukunda waŋgu muɗuku wotandadza, ʋuyai, muise maʋoko enyu pamsoro pake aporeswe, ararame.
Akaenda naye; ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamuteʋera, ʋacimumanikidza.
Ɀino mumŋe mukadzi waiʋa nokurwara kwokuɓuɗa ropa makore anegumi namaʋiri,
wakaŋga aʋoneswa nhamo neŋaŋga zhinji, akapedza ɀose ɀaakaŋga anaɀo asina‐kutoŋgoɓatsirwa, asi kuŋgonyanyiswa,
wakati anzwa ɀaJesu, akaʋuya pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaiʋa mashure, akaɓata ŋguʋo yake.
Nokuti wakati: Kana ndikaɓata ŋguʋo yake ɓedzi, ndicaponeswa.
Pakarepo tsime rake reropa rikapxa, akanzwa pamuʋiri wake kuti waporeswa pakurwara kwake.
Pakarepo Jesu wakati aciziʋa mukati make kuti simba rakaɓuɗa kwaari, akatendeʋuka pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji, akati: Ndianiko waɓata ŋguʋo dzaŋgu?
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Munoʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanokumanikidzai, ɀino muŋgati seiko: Ndiani wandiɓata?
Ɀino akariŋga‐riŋga kuti aʋone wakaita iɀoɀo.
Mukadzi akatya, akaɗeɗera, aciziʋa ɀaaitirwa, akaʋuya, ndokuɀiwisira pamberi pake, ndokumuʋudza ɀirokwaɀo ɀose.
Akati kwaari: Mukunda, kutenda kwako kwakuponesa; enda norugare, upore pakurwara kwako.
Wakati acataura, ʋamŋe
Jesu wakati acinzwa shoko rataurwa, akati kumukuru wesinagoge: Usatya, tenda ɓedzi.
Akasatendera munhu kumuteʋera, asi Petro, naJakobo, naJohane munuŋuna waJakobo.
Ʋakaȿika mumba momukuru wesinagoge; akawana iri mhere‐mhere, naʋanocema ɀikuru, naʋanorira.
Akapinda, akati kwaʋari: Munoitireiko mhere‐mhere, mucicema? Mŋana haana‐kufa, asi uʋete.
Ʋakamuseka. Akaʋaɓuɗisa ʋose, akatora ɓaɓa ʋomŋana namai, naʋaakaŋga anaʋo, akapinda kwakaŋga kunomŋana.
Akaɓata ruʋoko rwomŋana, akati kwaari: Tarita kumi! ndokuti, kana ɀicishandurwa, Musikana, ndinoti kwauri: Muka!
Pakarepo musikana akasimuka, akafamba; nokuti waiʋa namakore anegumi namaʋiri; ʋakashamiswa nokushama kukuru.
Akaʋaraira ɀikuru kuti ɀirege kuzikanwa nomunhu; akati, ŋgaapiwe ɀokudya.
Wakabva’po, akaȿika kunyika yake, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamuteʋera.

Musi wesaɓata wakati waȿika, akataŋga kudzidzisa musinagoge; ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋacimunzwa, ʋakashamiswa, ʋaciti: Munhu uyu wawanepiko iɀoɀi? Kucenjera kwakapiwa munhu uyu ndokweiko? Namaɓasa esimba akaɗai anoitwa namaʋoko ake?
Ko uyu haazi muʋezi here, mŋanakomana waMaria, nomukoma waJakobo, naJose, naJuda, naSimoni? Nehanɀadzi dzake hadzizi pano pakati patiri here? Ʋakagumburwa naye.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Muprofita haaŋgashaiwi kukudzwa, asi munyika yake, nokuhama dzake, nomumba make.
Akasagona kuɓate‐ɓasa resimba ipapo, asi wakaisa maʋoko ake pamsoro paʋairwara ʋashoma, akaʋaporesa.
Akashamiswa nokusatenda kwaʋo.
Ipapo wakapota nemisha, acidzidzisa.
Ɀino wakaɗanira kwaari ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akataŋga kuʋatuma ʋaʋiri ʋaʋiri, akaʋapa simba pamsoro pemŋeya yetȿina;
akaʋaraira kuti ʋarege kutoŋgotora ɀomunzira, asi muɗonɀo ɓedzi; ʋarege
Asi ʋafuke shaŋgu, ʋarege kupfeka ŋguʋo mbiri.
Akati kwaʋari: Pose pamunopinda mumba, mugare’mo, kuȿikira mucibva’po.
Pose paʋasiŋgakugamuciriyi nokukunzwai, kana mucibva’po, muzuze guruʋa
Ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakaparidza kuti ʋanhu ʋatendeʋuke.
Ʋakaɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa mizhinji, ʋakazodza ʋazhinji ʋairwara mafuta, ʋaciʋaporesa.
Ɀino mambo Herode waka
Ʋamŋe ʋakati: NdiEria; ʋamŋe ʋakati: Muprofita wakafanana nomumŋe waʋaprofita.
Asi Herode wakati aci
Nokuti Herode wakaŋga atuma
Nokuti Johane wakaŋga ati kunaHerode: Haunakutenderwa kuti uʋe nomukadzi womunuŋuna wako.
Herodiasi akamuʋeŋga, akaɗa kumuʋuraya, akasagona;
nokuti Herode wakaŋga acitya Johane, aciziʋa kuti munhu wakarurama, mutȿene, akamuceŋgeta ɀakanaka. Wakati amunzwa, akakaŋganiswa kwaɀo, akasifara kumunzwa.
Asi zuʋa rakafanira rakati raȿika, Herode nezuʋa rokuɓerekwa kwake akaitira madzishe ake naʋakuru ʋeɀuru ɀamazana naʋaɓati ʋakuru ʋeGarirea mutambo mukuru;
ɀino mŋanasikana waHerodiasi amene wakapinda, akatamba, akafadza Herode naʋakaŋga ʋagere
Akamupikira,
Akaɓuɗa, akati kunamai ʋake: Ndicakumbireiko? Ʋakati: Musoro waJohane Mubapatidzi.
Pakarepo akakurumidza kupinda kunamambo, akakumbira aciti: Ndinoɗa kuti mundipe mundiro ikoɀino musoro waJohane Mubapatidzi.
Ipapo mambo akaɀidya mŋoyo kwaɀo, asi wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kumurambira nokuɗa kwokupika kwake, ʋuye
Pakarepo mambo akatuma murwi, akaraira kuti aʋuye nomusoro wake.
Akaenda, akamugura musoro mutoroŋgo, akaʋuya nomusoro wake mundiro, akaupa musikana, musikana ndokuupa mai ʋake.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakaʋuya ʋakatora mutumbu wake, ʋakauʋiga mubgiro.
Ɀino ʋaapostora ʋakaʋuŋganira kunaJesu, ʋakamuʋudza ɀose ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaita, neɀaʋakaŋga ʋadzidzisa.
Akati kwaʋari: Ʋuyai imi muri moga kunɀimbo murenje, muzorore ɀishoma; nokuti kwakaŋga kunaʋazhinji ʋaiʋuy naʋaienda, ʋakasaʋa neŋguʋa kunyaŋge yokudya.
Ʋakaenda negwa kunɀimbo murenje ʋari ʋoga.
ʋakaʋaʋona ʋacienda, ʋazhinji ʋakamuziʋa, ʋakamhanyira ʋose ikoko, ʋacibva pamaguta ose, ʋakaʋataŋgira kuȿika.
Ɀino wakati aciɓuɗa
Ɀino zuʋa roɗo‐kuʋira, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Pano inɀimbo murenje, zuʋa roɗo‐kuʋira;
ʋaendisei, kuti ʋaende kuruwa nemisha yakapoteredza, ʋandoɀiteŋgera ɀokudya.
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Imi muʋapei ɀaʋaŋgadya. Ʋakati kwaari: Tiŋgaenda kundoteŋga ɀiŋgwa namadenari anamazana maʋiri,
Akati kwaʋari: Muneɀiŋgwa ɀiŋganiko? Endai mutarire. Ʋakati ʋaziʋa, ʋakati: Ɀishanu, nehoʋe mbiri.
Ɀino akaʋaraira kuti ʋagarise ʋose pasi paʋuswa bgunyoro ʋakaita mapoka‐mapoka.
Ʋakagara pasi ʋakaita mapoka‐mapoka anezana naanamakumi mashanu.
Ɀino akatora ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu nehoʋe mbiri, akatarira kuɗeŋga, akaʋoŋga, akameɗura ɀiŋgwa, akapa ʋadzidzi ʋake, kuti ʋa
Ʋakadya ʋose, ʋakaguta.
Ʋakaʋuŋganidza ɀimeɗu, mateŋgu anegumi namaʋiri akazadzwa, neɀehoʋe ʋo.
Ʋakaŋga ʋadya ɀiŋgwa ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋaneɀuru ɀishanu.
Pakarepo akagombedzera ʋadzidzi ʋake kuti ʋapinde mugwa, ʋamutuŋgamirire kuyambukira mhiri Betsaida, iye aciendisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Akati awonekana naʋo, akaenda mugomo kundonyeŋgetera.
Aʋa maɗekwana igwa rakaŋga riri pakati peguŋgwa, iye ari oga panyika.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti ʋanotambudzika nokukwaȿa, nokuti mhepo yakaŋga iciʋadziʋisa, neŋguʋa ineŋge seyecinna yoʋusiku, akaʋuya kwaʋari acifamba pamsoro peguŋgwa; akaɗa kupfuʋura.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacimuʋona acifamba pamsoro peguŋgwa, ʋakati madzimudzaŋgara, ʋakaridza mhere.
Nokuti ʋose ʋakamuʋona, ʋakamanikidzwa; akataura naʋo, akati kwaʋari: Tsuŋgai mŋoyo, ndini, musatya.
Akakwira kwaʋari mugwa, mhepo ikanyarara; ʋakashamiswa kwaɀo‐kwaɀo mumŋoyo yaʋo.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasati ʋanzwisisa shoko reɀiŋgwa, nokuti mŋoyo yaʋo yakaŋga iri mikukutu.
Ʋakati ʋayambukira mhiri, ʋakaȿika kunyika yeGenesareti, ʋakasuŋgira
Ʋakati ʋaɓuɗa mugwa, pakarepo
ʋakamhanyira munyika yose iyo, ʋakataŋga kutakura ʋairwara panhoʋo dzaʋo,
Pose paakapinda pamisha napamaguta, naparuwa, ʋakaradzika ʋairwara paɗare, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti ʋaɓate kunyaŋge mupendero weŋguʋo dzake cete; ʋose ʋakamuɓata ʋakaporeswa.
Ɀino ʋaFarise naʋamŋe ʋaʋanyori ʋaibva Jerusarema, ʋakaʋuŋganira kwaari;
ʋakaʋona ʋamŋe ʋaʋadzidzi ʋake ʋacidya namaʋoko anetȿina, ndokuti asina‐kushambga.
Nokuti ʋaFarise, naʋaJuda ʋose haʋadyi ʋasinakumboshamba maʋoko kwaɀo, ʋaciceŋgeta tsika dzaʋakuru.
Kana ʋacidya paɗare haʋaŋgadyi ʋasinakumboshamba; neɀimŋe ɀizhinji ɀiri’po ɀaʋakaŋga ʋagamucira, kuti ʋaɀiceŋgete,
Ipapo ʋaFarise naʋanyori ʋakamubvunza,
Akati kwaʋari: Isaya wakaprofita kwaɀo pamsoro penyu, imi ʋanyeŋgeri, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Ʋanhu aʋa ʋanondikudza nemiromo yaʋo,
Asi mŋoyo yaʋo iri kure neni.
Asi ʋanondinamata pasina,
Ʋacidzidzisa dzidziso,
Munosiya mirairo yaMŋari, muciceŋgeta tsika dzaʋanhu.
Akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, munoramba murairo waMŋari, kuti muceŋgete tsika dzenyu;
nokuti Mosesi wakati: Kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai ʋako, ʋuye, unotuka ɓaɓa namai, ŋgaafe norufu.
Asi imi munoti: Kana munhu aciti kunaɓaɓa ʋake kana mai ʋake: Cinhu cipi necipi camaiti munoɓatsirwa naco kwandiri caʋa Korbani, ndokuti caʋa cipo
hamucamutenderi kuitira ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake cinhu,
mucitorera shoko raMŋari simba netsika dzenyu dzamakaceŋgeta, neɀinhu ɀizhinji ɀakaɗaro munoɀiita.
Akaɗanira ɀe kwaari ʋanhu ʋazhinji akati kwaʋari: Nditererei mose, munzwisise!
Hapanecinhu kunze kwomunhu ciŋgamuȿiɓisa, kana cicipinda maari; asi ɀinoɓuɗa maari, ndiɀo ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu. [
Kana munhu anenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe.]
Ɀino wakati abva kuʋanhu ʋazhinji, apinda mumba, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamubvunza ɀomufananidzo
Akati kwaʋari: Nemi ʋo hamunzwisisi saiɀoɀo here? Hamunzwisisi here kuti ɀose ɀiri kunze, kana ɀicipinda mumunhu, haɀigoni kumuȿiɓisa?
Nokuti haɀipindi mumŋoyo make asi muɗumbu, ɀicirashwa kunze;
Ipapo akati: Ɀinoɓuɗa mumunhu ndiɀo ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu.
Nokuti mukati, mumŋoyo yaʋanhu munoɓuɗa mifuŋgo yakaipa, noʋupombge, nokuɓa, nokuʋuraya,
noʋufeʋe, noruciʋa, nokuipa, nokunyeŋgera, noʋutere, neziso rinegoɗo, nokutuka, namanyawi, noʋupenzi;
ɀakaipa iɀoɀo ɀose ɀinobva mukati, ɀinoȿiɓisa munhu.
Wakasimuka ipapo, akaenda kunyika yeTire neSidoni; akapinda mumba, asiŋgaɗi kuzikanwa nomunhu; akakoniwa kuɀiʋanza.
Nokuti
Ɀino iye mukadzi waiʋa muGiriki, worudzi rwaʋeSirofenike; akaramba acikumbira kwaari kuti aɓuɗise mŋeya wakaipa pamŋanasikana wake.
Akati kwaari: Ʋana ŋgaʋataŋge kuguta, nokuti haɀina‐kunaka kutora ciŋgwa caʋana, ndokucikandira imbganana.
Akapindura, akati kwaari: Hoŋo, Ishe, kunyaŋge nembganana ʋo dzinodya pasi petafura ɀimeɗu ɀaʋana.
Akati kwaari: Nokuɗa kweshoko iro, enda; mŋeya wakaipa wabva pamŋanasikana wako.
Akaenda kumba kwake, akawana mŋana aʋete pamubeda, mŋeya wakaipa wabva.
Ɀino wakati acibva ɀe munyika yeTire, akaenda napakati peSidoni kuguŋgwa reGarirea, napakati penyika yeDekapori.
Ʋakaisa kwaari munhu wematsi, waikakamira, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kuti aise ruʋoko rwake pamsoro pake.
Akamubvisa pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji, ndokuenda naye parutiʋi, akapinza munwe munzeʋe dzake, akapfira mate, ndokuɓata rurimi rwake.
Ipapo akatarira kuɗeŋga, akagomera, akati kwaari: Efata, ndokuti: Dziʋuka.
Pakarepo nzeʋe dzake dzakadziʋuka, cisuŋgo corurimi rwake cikasunuŋguka, akataura ɀakanaka.
Ɀino wakaʋaraira, kuti ʋarege kuʋudza ʋanhu; asi iye acinyanya kuʋaraira, iʋo ʋakanyanyisa kuparidza iɀoɀo.
Ʋakashamiswa ɀikuru‐kuru, ʋaciti: Wakaita ɀose ɀakanaka; wakaita matsi kuti dzinzwe, nembeʋeʋe kuti dzitaure.
Namazuʋa iwayo ɀe kwakaŋga kunaʋazhinji‐zhinji, ʋakaŋga ʋasinaɀaʋaŋgadya, akaɗanira ʋadzidzi ʋake kwaari, akati kwaʋari:
ndinetsitsi naʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuti atoʋa mazuʋa matatu aʋakagara neni ʋasinaɀaʋaŋgadya.
Kana ndikaʋaendisa kumusha kwaʋo ʋanenzara, ʋacaziya panzira; ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋanobva kure.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Munhu uŋgawanepiko murenje muno, ɀiŋgwa ɀiŋgagutisa ʋanhu aʋa?
Akaʋabvunza, akati: Muneɀiŋgwa ɀiŋganiko? Ʋakati: Ɀinomŋe.
Ɀino akaraira ʋanhu ʋazhinji kuti ʋagare pasi, akatora ɀiŋgwa ɀinomŋe, akaʋoŋga, akaɀimeɗura, ndokupa ʋadzidzi ʋake, kuti ʋaise pamberi paʋo; ʋaka
Ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋanehoʋe ɗuku shomanene; ɀino akadziropafadza, akati ɀiiswe ʋo pamberi
Ʋakadya, ʋakaguta, ndokuʋuŋganidza ɀimeɗu ɀakasara, mateŋgu manomŋe.
Ʋaneŋge ʋaiʋa ɀuru ɀinna; akaʋaendisa.
Pakarepo akapinda mugwa naʋadzidzi ʋake, akaȿika kumatiʋi enyika yeDarmanuta.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakataŋga kuita nyaya naye, ʋacitȿaka kwaari ciratidzo cinobva kuɗeŋga, ʋacimuidza.
Akagomera ɀikuru pamŋeya wake, akati: Rudzi urwu runotȿakireiko ciratidzo? Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Rudzi urwu haruŋgapiwi ciratidzo.
Ipapo akaʋasiya, akapinda ɀe mugwa, akayambukira mhiri.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakaŋganwa kutora ɀiŋgwa; ʋakaŋga ʋasineɀiŋgwa, asi cimŋe ɓedzi.
Ɀino akaʋaraira, akati: Cenjerai, mutye mbiriso yaʋaFarise nembiriso yaHerode.
Ʋakaraŋgana ʋakati:
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciɀiziʋa, akati kwaʋari: Munoraŋgana nemhaka yeiko kuti hamuneɀiŋgwa? Hamuziʋi, nokunzwisisa here? Mŋoyo yenyu iciri mikukutu here?
Ɀamunameso, hamuʋoni here? Ɀamunenzeʋe, hamunzwi here? Hamuraŋgariri here?
Musi wandakameɗurira ʋaneɀuru ɀishanu ɀiŋgwa ɀishanu, makanoŋga mateŋgu maŋganiko azere neɀimeɗu? Ʋakati kwaari: Gumi namaʋiri.
Nomusi
Akati kwaʋari: Ko hamunzwisisi naɀino here?
Ɀino ʋakaȿika Betsaida; ʋakaʋuya neɓofu, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, kuti amunyaŋgate.
Akaɓata ruʋoko rweɓofu, akamuisa kunze kwomusha, ndokupfira mate mumeso ake, akaisa maʋoko pamsoro pake, akamubvunza aciti: Unoʋona cinhu here?
akatarira, akati: Ndinoʋona ʋanhu, ndinoʋaʋona ʋacifamba ʋakafanana nemiti.
Ɀino akaisa ɀe maʋoko pamsoro pameso ake, iye akatarisisa, akaporeswa, akaʋona ɀose ɀakanaka.
Akamuendisa kumba kwake akati: Usatoŋgopinda mumusha.
Ɀino Jesu naʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaenda kumisha yeKesaria Firipo; munzira akabvunza ʋadzidzi ʋake akati kwaʋari: Ʋanhu ʋanoti ndini aniko?
Ʋakapindura ʋaciti kwaari:
Ɀino akaʋabvunza, akati: Ko imi munoti ndini ani? Petro akapindura, akati kwaari: Ndimi Kristu.
Akaʋaraira ɀikuru kuti ʋarege kuziʋisa munhu
Ɀino akataŋga kuʋadzidzisa kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unofanira kutambudzika ɀizhinji nokurashwa naʋakuru, naʋaprista ʋakuru, naʋanyori, aʋurawe, amuke ɀe mazuʋa matatu apfuʋura.
Akataura shoko iro pacena. Ɀino Petro akaenda naye ʋari ʋoga, akataŋga kumuraira.
Asi iye wakatendeʋuka, ndokutarira ʋadzidzi ʋake, akaraira Petro, akati: Ibva shure kwaŋgu, Satani, nokuti hauraŋgariri ɀinhu ɀaMŋari, asi ɀinhu ɀaʋanhu.
Ɀino wakaɗanira kwaari ʋanhu ʋazhinji naʋadzidzi ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Kana munhu aciɗa kuʋuya shure kwaŋgu, ŋgaaɀirambe, asimudze mucinjikwa wake, anditeʋere.
Nokuti aninani unoɗa kuponesa ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo; asi aninani unorashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake nokuɗa kwaŋgu nokweEvaŋgeri, ucabguponesa.
Nokuti munhu ucagoɓatsirweiko, kana awana nyika yose, akarashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake?
Nokuti munhu ucaripeiko kuti adzikinure ʋupenyu bgake?
Nokuti aninani unonyara pamsoro pamashoko aŋgu parudzi urwu rwoʋupombge nokutadza, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucanyara ʋo pamsoro pake, musi waanoʋuya nokubginya kwake naƂaɓa ʋake naʋatumŋa ʋatȿene.
Ɀino wakati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋamŋe ʋari’po kunaʋamire pano, ʋasiŋgazoʋoni rufu, ʋasati ʋaʋona ʋushe bgaMŋari bguciʋuya nesimba.
Mazuʋa matanhatu akati apfuʋura, Jesu akatora Petro, naJakobo, naJohane, akaenda naʋo kurutiʋi mugomo refu ʋari ʋoga; akashanduka pamberi paʋo.
Ŋguʋo dzake dzikapenya, dzikacena ɀikuru; hakunomusuki pano panyika, uŋgagona kudzicenesa dzikaɗaro.
Ipapo Eria naMosesi ʋakaʋonekwa naʋo, ʋacitaurirana naJesu.
Petro akapindura, akati kunaJesu: Rabi, ɀakanaka ɀatiri pano; ŋgatiʋake matumba matatu, rimŋe renyu, rimŋe raMosesi, rimŋe raEria.
Nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi caanotaura, nokuti ʋakatya ɀikuru.
Ɀino gore rikaʋuya rikaʋafukidza, inzwi rikaɓuɗa mugore,
Kamŋe, ʋakati ʋaciriŋgariŋga, haʋana‐kuzoʋona munhu, asi Jesu ɓedzi anaʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuruka mugomo, akaʋaraira kuti ʋarege kuʋudza munhu ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaʋona kuȿikira Mŋanakomana womunhu amuka kuʋakafa.
Ʋakariceŋgeta shoko
Ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Ʋanyori ʋanotaurireiko ʋaciti, Eria unofanira kutaŋga kuʋuya?
Akati kwaʋari: Eria ucataŋga kuʋuya hake, aʋandudze ɀinhu ɀose, asi kwakagonyorwa seiko ɀoMŋanakomana womunhu, kuti ucatambudzika ɀikuru nokuɀidzwa?
Asi ndinoti kwamuri, Eria wakatoȿika, ʋakamuitira ɀose paʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa napo, seɀaɀakanyorwa pamsoro pake.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika kuʋadzidzi, ʋakaʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji, ʋakaʋakomba, naʋanyori ʋaciita nyaya naʋo.
Pakarepo ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakashamiswa kwaɀo, ʋakamhanyira kwaari, ʋakamukwazisa.
Akaʋabvunza, akati: Munoita nyaya neiko naʋo?
Mumŋe waʋazhinji akamupindura, akati: Mudzidzisi, ndaʋuya kwamuri nomŋanakomana waŋgu, unomŋeya wembeʋeʋe.
Kwose kwaanomuɓata, unomuwisira pasi, acipupuma furo, acigeɗa‐geɗa meno, ʋuye unowonda kwaɀo; ndakataura naʋadzidzi ʋenyu kuti ʋauɓuɗise, ʋakasagona.
Akaʋapindura, akati: Haiwa, rudzi rusiŋgatendi, ndicagara nemi kuȿikira riniko? Ndicakuitirai mŋoyo murefu kuȿikira riniko? Ʋuyai naye kwandiri.
Ʋakaʋuya naye kwaari; wakati acimuʋona, pakarepo mŋeya ukamubvundisa, akawira pasi, akakuŋguruka, acipupuma furo.
Ɀino akabvunza ɓaɓa ʋake,
Kazhinji wakamuwisira mumŋoto kana mumvura kuti umuparadze; asi kana mucigona kuita cinhu, mutinzwire tsitsi, mutiɓatsire.
Jesu akati kwaari: Kana iwe ucigona
Pakarepo ɓaɓa ʋomŋana ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Ndinotenda, ndiɓatsirei pakusatenda kwaŋgu.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋacimhanyirana pamŋe cete, akaraira mŋeya wetȿina, akati kwauri:
Ukaɗanidzira, ukamubvundisa ɀikuru, ukaɓuɗa; akafanana nomunhu wakafa, nokuɗaro ʋazhinji ʋakati: Wafa.
Asi Jesu wakaɓata ruʋoko rwake, akamusimudza, iye akasimuka.
Ɀino wakati apinda mumba, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamubvunza ʋari ʋoga ʋaciti: Isu takaŋga tisiŋgagoni neiko kuuɓuɗisa?
Akati kwaʋari: Rudzi urwu haruŋgatoŋgoɓuɗi, asi nokunyeŋgetera.
Ʋakabva ipapo, ʋakagura neGarirea, akaramba kuti ɀizikanwe nomunhu.
Nokuti wakadzidzisa ʋadzidzi ʋake, akati kwaʋari: Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaiswa mumaʋoko aʋanhu, ʋacamuʋuraya; kana aʋurawa, ucamuka ɀe mazuʋa matatu apfuʋura.
Asi haʋana‐kunzwisisa shoko iro, ʋakatya kumubvunza.
Ʋakaȿika Kapernaume; ɀino wakati aʋa mumba, akaʋabvunza,
Ʋakaramba ʋanyerere, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaita nharo pakati paʋo munzira, kuti mukuru ndiani.
Ipapo akagara pasi, akaɗana ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akati kwaʋari: Kana munhu aciɗa kuʋa wokutaŋga, ucazoʋa weshure kunaʋose nomuranda waʋose.
Akatora mŋana muɗuku, akamuisa pakati paʋo; akamufuŋgatira mumaʋoko, akati kwaʋari:
Aninani unogamucira mumŋe waʋaɗuku ʋakaɗai nezita raŋgu, unondigamucireni; aninani unondigamucira ini, haandigamuciri ini, asi uyo wakandituma.
Johane akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, taʋona munhu aciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa muzita renyu, tikamudziʋisa, nokuti haana‐kutiteʋera.
Jesu akati: Musamudziʋisa, nokuti hakunomunhu uŋgaita ɓasa resimba nezita raŋgu, uŋgakurumidza kutaura ɀakaipa pamsoro paŋgu.
Nokuti usiŋgapesani nesu, unesu.
Nokuti aninani unokunwisai mukombe wemvura muzita
Aninani unogumbusa mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa ʋanotenda
Kana ruʋoko rwako rucikugumbusa, urugure; ɀirinani kwauri kuti upinde muʋupenyu uri cirema, pakuenda muGehena, mumŋoto usiŋgadzimŋi, unamakumbo maʋiri. [
Apo pasiŋgafi honye yaʋo, napasiŋgadzimŋi mŋoto.]
Kana rutsoka rwako rucikugumbusa, urugure; ɀirinani kwauri kuti upinde muʋupenyu ucikamhina, pakukandirwa muGehena, unetsoka mbiri. [
Apo pasiŋgafi honye yaʋo, napasiŋgadzimŋi mŋoto.]
Kana ziso rako ricikugumbusa, urirashe; ɀirinani kwauri kuti upinde muʋushe bgokuɗeŋga uneziso rimŋe, pakukandirwa muGehena, unameso maʋiri.
Apo pasiŋgafi honye yaʋo, napasiŋgadzimŋi mŋoto.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe ucaruŋgwa nomŋoto.
Munyu wakanaka; asi kana munyu usicaʋaʋi, muŋgauruŋga neiko? Iʋai nomunyu mukati menyu, mugare norugare pakati penyu.
Ɀino wakasimuka’po, akaȿika munyika yeJudea, nemhiri kwaJoridani, ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaʋuŋganira ɀe kwaari; akaʋadzidzisa ɀe seɀaakaŋga acisiita.
ƲaFarise ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakamubvunza, ʋacimuidza,
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Mosesi wakakuraireiko?
Ʋakati: Mosesi wakatendera
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Wakakunyorerai murairo iwoyo nokuɗa kwoʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yenyu.
Asi kubva pakutaŋga kwokusikwa wakaʋaita murume nomukadzi.
Nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo murume ucasiya ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, akanamatira mukadzi wake;
aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa nyama imŋe; nokuɗaro haʋaciri ʋaʋiri, asi nyama imŋe.
Ɀino iɀo Mŋari ɀaakasoŋganisa, munhu ŋgaarege kuɀiparadzanisa.
Ɀino mumba ʋadzidzi ʋakamubvunza ɀe pamsoro paiɀoɀo.
Akati kwaʋari: Aninani unorasha mukadzi wake, akawana mumŋe, unoita ʋupombge kwaari.
Ʋuye kana iye
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya naʋana ʋaɗuku kwaari, kuti aʋanyaŋgate; asi ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋaraira.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciɀiʋona, akatsamŋa, akati kwaʋari: Regai ʋana ʋaɗuku ʋaʋuye kwandiri, musaʋadziʋisa, nokuti ʋushe bgaMŋari ndobgaʋakaɗai.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Aninani usiŋgagamuciri ʋushe bgaMŋari somŋana muɗuku, haaŋgatoŋgopindi mabguri.
Ipapo akaʋafuŋgatira mumaʋoko, akaʋaropafadza, ndokuisa maʋoko pamsoro paʋo.
Ɀino wakati aciɓuɗa kunzira, mumŋe akamhanyira kwaari, akafugama pamberi pake akamubvunza, aciti: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndiŋgaiteiko kuti ndigare nhaka yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi?
Jesu akati kwaari: Unondiidzireiko wakanaka? Hakuna‐wakanaka, asi mumŋe cete,
Mirairo unoiziʋa,
Akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, iɀi ɀose ndakaɀiceŋgeta kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.
Jesu akamutarira akamuɗa, akati kwaari: Unoshaiwa cinhu cimŋe cete; enda, uteŋgese ɀose ɀaunaɀo, upe ʋarombo, uʋe nefuma kuɗeŋga; ugoʋuya, unditeʋere.
Asi wakaȿiɓa mŋoyo neshoko iro, akaenda neshuŋgu, nokuti wakaŋga anefuma zhinji.
Ipapo Jesu akariŋga‐riŋga, akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Ʋanefuma ʋacaremerwa sei kupinda paʋushe bgaMŋari!
Ʋadzidzi ʋakashamiswa namashoko ake. Asi Jesu wakapindura ɀe, akati kwaʋari: Ʋana, ɀinorema sei kunaʋanoʋimba nefuma kupinda paʋushe bgaMŋari!
Kamera iŋgarerukirwa kupinda paʋuri reɗumho, kumufumi kupinda muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ipapo ʋakakahadzika ɀikuru, ʋakati kwaari: Ndianiko uŋgagoponeswa?
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciʋatarira, akati: Kuʋanhu iɀi haɀibviri, asi kunaMŋari
Petro akataŋga kutaura kwaari, aciti: Tarirai isu takasiya ɀose tikakuteʋerai.
Jesu akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakunomunhu wakasiya imba, kana ʋanuŋuna, kana hanɀadzi, kana mai, kana ɓaɓa, kana ʋana, kana minda, nokuɗa kwaŋgu nokweEvaŋgeri,
usiŋgazopiwi ɀinezana neŋguʋa ino, dzimba naʋanuŋuna, nehanɀadzi, namadzimai, naʋana, neminda, pamŋe cete nokuʋeŋgwa, noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi neŋguʋa inoʋuya.
Asi ʋazhinji ʋokutaŋga ʋacaʋa ʋokupedzisira, noʋokupedzisira ʋacaʋa ʋokutaŋga.

Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋari munzira, ʋacikwira Jerusarema; Jesu wakaŋga aciʋatuŋgamirira; ʋakashamiswa; naʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋera, ʋakatya. Ipapo akatora ɀe ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akataŋga kuʋaʋudza iɀo ɀaakaŋga oɗo‐kuitirwa,
Tarirai tinokwira Jerusarema, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaiswa kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori; ʋacamutoŋgera rufu, nokumuisa kuʋahedeni.
Ʋacamuseka, nokumupfira mate, nokumuroʋesa, nokumuʋuraya; kana mazuʋa matatu apfuʋura, ucamuka ɀe.
Ɀino Jakobo naJohane, ʋanakomana ʋaZebedi, ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tinoɗa kuti mutiitire seɀatinokumbira kwamuri.
Akati kwaʋari: Munoɗa kuti ndikuitireiko?
Ʋakati kwaari: Tigarisei pakubginya kwenyu, mumŋe kuruʋoko rwenyu rworudyi, mumŋe kuruɓoshwe.
Asi Jesu wakati kwaʋari: Hamuziʋi ɀamunokumbira. Muŋgagona kunwira pamukombe pandinonwira ini, nokubapatidzwa norubapatidzo rwandinobapatidzwa narwo here?
Ʋakati kwaari: Tiŋgagona. Jesu akati kwaʋari: Mucanwira henyu pamukombe pandinonwira ini, nokubapatidzwa norubapatidzo rwandinobapatidzwa narwo ini;
asi kugara kuruʋoko rwaŋgu rworudyi, kana kuruɓoshwe, handizini ndinopa, asi
Ʋanegumi ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakataŋga kutsamŋira Jakobo naJohane.
Ipapo Jesu akaʋaɗanira kwaari, akati kwaʋari: Munoziʋa kuti aʋo ʋanonzi macinda aʋahedeni anoʋaraira, naʋakuru ʋaʋo ʋanoita simba naʋo.
Ɀino pakati penyu ŋgaɀirege kuʋa kuɗaro; asi aninani unoɗa kuʋa mukuru pakati penyu, ŋgaaʋe mushumiri wenyu;
aninani unoɗa kuʋa wokutaŋga pakati penyu, ŋgaaʋe muranda waʋose.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu naiye haana‐kuʋuya kuzoshumirwa, asi kushumira, nokupa ʋupenyu bgake ruʋe rudzikinuro rwaʋazhinji.
Ʋakaȿika Jeriko; ɀino wakati aciɓuɗa Jeriko naʋadzidzi ʋake naʋazhinjizhinji, Bartimeo, mŋanakomana waTimeo, raiʋa ɓofu riri rombe, wakaŋga agere panzira.
wakati anzwa, kuti ndiJesu weNazareta, akataŋga kuɗanidzira, aciti: Mŋanakomana waDavidi, ndinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ʋazhinji ʋakamuraira kuti anyarare, asi iye wakanyanya kuɗanidzira kwaɀo, aciti: Mŋanakomana waDavidi, ndinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ipapo Jesu akamira, akati: Muɗanei. Ʋakaɗana ɓofu, ʋaciti kwariri: Tsuŋga mŋoyo, simuka, unokuɗana.
Ipapo akarasha ŋguʋo yake, akasimuka, akaenda kunaJesu.
