Jesu akamupindura, akati kwaari: Unoɗa kuti ndikuitireiko? Ƃofu rikati kwaari: Raboni, kuti ndiʋone.
Jesu akati kwaari: Enda hako, kutenda kwako kwakuponesa. Pakarepo akaʋona, akateʋera Jesu munzira.
Ʋakati ʋacisweɗera Jerusarema, paBetfage neBetania, pagomo reMiorivi, akatuma ʋaʋiri ʋaʋadzidzi ʋake,
akati kwaʋari: Endai kumusha wakatarisana nemi; pakarepo kana mucipinda mauri, mucawana mhuru
Kana munhu akati kwamuri: Munoitireiko kuɗaro? muti: Ishe unoiɗa. Pakarepo ucaitumira ɀe pano.
Ʋakaenda, ʋakandowana mhuru
Ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, ʋakati kwaʋari: Munoiteiko ɀamunosunuŋgura mhuru
Ʋakaʋaʋudza seɀaʋakarairwa naJesu; ʋakaʋarega.
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya nemhuru
Ʋazhinji ʋakawarira ŋguʋo dzaʋo panzira, naʋamŋe mashizha aʋakaŋga ʋatema kuɓundo.
Aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋacituŋgamira, naʋakaŋga ʋaciteʋera ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Hosana, ŋgaakudzwe iye unoʋuya muzita raShe.
ŋgabgukudzwe ʋushe bgaƂaɓa ʋeɗu Davidi, bgunoʋuya! Hosana kumsoro‐soro!
Ipapo Jesu wakapinda Jerusarema mutembere; akati ariŋga‐riŋga ɀinhu ɀose, zuʋa ɀarakaŋga raʋira, akaɓuɗa, akaenda Betania naʋanegumi naʋaʋiri.
Fume maŋgwana ʋakati ʋacibva Betania, akaziya;
ɀino wakati aciʋona muʋonde uri kure. unamashizha, akaenda’
Akapindura, akati kwauri: Kusaʋa nomunhu, unozodya ɀiɓereko pauri nokusiŋgaperi. Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaɀinzwa.
Ʋakaȿika Jerusarema; akapinda mutembere, akataŋga kuɓuɗisa ʋaiteŋgesa, naʋaiteŋga mutembere; akawisa matafura aʋaitsinhanhisa mari, neɀigaro ɀaʋaiteŋgesa njiʋa.
Akasatendera munhu kuti atakure nhumbi mutembere.
Akadzidzisa, aciti kwaʋari: Hakunakunyorwa here kucinzi: Imba yaŋgu icanzi imba yokunyeŋgetera yamarudzi ose? Asi imi makaiita ɓako ramakororo.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakatȿaka paʋaŋgamuʋuraya napo; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacimutya, nokuti ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake.
Ɀino, ŋguʋa dzose kana aʋa maɗekwana, waienda kunze kweguta.
Ʋakati ʋacipfuʋura napo maŋgwanani, ʋakaʋona muʋonde wawoma kubva pamidzi.
Petro akaraŋgarira, akati kwaari: Rabi, tarirai muʋonde wamakatuka wawoma.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Iʋai nokutenda kunaMŋari.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe unoti kugomo iri: Simudzwa, ukandwe muguŋgwa, asiŋganyunyuti mumŋoyo make, asi acitenda kuti ɀaanoreʋa ɀicaitika, ucaʋa naɀo.
Saka ndinoti kwamuri: Ɀinhu ɀose ɀose ɀamunonyeŋgeterera nokukumbira, tendai kuti maɀigamucira, mugoʋa naɀo.
Kana mukamira mucinyeŋgetera, kaŋganwirai kana munemhaka nomumŋe, kuti naƂaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga, ʋakukaŋganwirei kuɗarika kwenyu; [
asi kana musiŋgakaŋganwiriyi imi, naƂaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga haʋaŋgakukaŋganwiriyi imi kuɗarika kwenyu.]
Ʋakaȿika ɀe Jerusarema. Ɀino wakati acifamba mutembere, ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori naʋakuru ʋakaʋuya kwaari;
ʋakati kwaari: Munoita ɀinhu iɀoɀi nesimba ripiko? Ndianiko wakakupai simba iri, kuti muite iɀi?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Neni ndicakubvunzai ʋo shoko rimŋe, mundipindure, neni ndicakuʋudzai ʋo simba randinoita naro ɀinhu iɀoɀi.
Rubapatidzo rwaJohane rwakabva kuɗeŋga here kana kuʋanhu? Ndipindurei.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Kana tikati, Kuɗeŋga, ucati: Makagoregerei kumutenda?
Asi tiŋgati, Kuʋanhu, here? Ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ʋanhu ʋazhinji, nokuti ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciti Johane muprofita ɀirokwaɀo.
Ʋakapindura ʋaciti kunaJesu: Hatiziʋi. Jesu akati kwaʋari: Neni handiŋgakuʋudziyi ʋo simba randinoita naro ɀinhu iɀi.
Ɀino wakataŋga kutaura naʋo nemifananidzo,
Neŋguʋa yeɀiɓereko akatuma muranda kuʋarimi, kuti apiwe naʋarimi ɀiɓereko ɀomunda wemizambiriŋga.
Ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamuroʋa, ʋakamudzosa asina.
Akatuma ɀe mumŋe muranda kwaʋari; ʋakamutaka namabge, ʋakamutema musoro, ʋakamunyadza.
Akatuma ɀe mumŋe, ʋakamuʋuraya; naʋamŋe ʋazhinji, ʋakaroʋa ʋamŋe, nokuʋuraya ʋamŋe.
wakaŋga acinomŋanakomana mumŋe, muɗikanwa; akamutuma kwaʋari pakupedzisira, aciti: Ʋacakudza mŋanakomana waŋgu.
Asi ʋarimi iʋaʋo ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; ʋuyai timuʋuraye, nhaka igoʋa yeɗu.
Ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamuʋuraya, ʋakamuɓuɗisa kunze kwomunda wemizambiriŋga.
mŋene womunda wemizambiriŋga ucaiteiko? Ucaʋuya, akaparadza ʋarimi iʋaʋo, akapa ʋamŋe ʋarimi munda wemizambiriŋga.
Ko hamuna‐kutoŋgoraʋa here rugwaro urwu,
Ibge rakarashwa naʋaʋaki,
Ndiro rakazoʋa musoro wekona;
Iɀoɀo ɀakaitwa naShe,
Ɀinoshamisa pameso eɗu?
Ipapo ʋakatȿaka kumuɓata, asi ʋakatya ʋanhu ʋazhinji; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciziʋa kuti wakaʋareʋa iʋo nomufananidzo iwoyo; ʋakamusiya, ʋakabva’
Ɀino ʋakatuma kwaari ʋamŋe ʋaʋaFarise naʋaHerode, kuti ʋamuɓate pakutaura

Ʋakaʋuya, ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tinoziʋa kuti ndimi waɀokwaɗi, musiŋgaraŋgariri ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu; hamutariri ɀiri kunze kwomunhu, asi munodzidzisa nzira yaMŋari neɀokwaɗi: Munhu Unotenderwa kuripira Kesari mutero here, kana kwete?
Ticaripa here, kana tirege kuripa? Asi iye aciziʋa kunyeŋgera kwaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Munondiidzireiko? Ʋuyai nedenari
Ʋakaʋuya naro. Ipapo akati kwaʋari: Mufananidzo uyu norunyoro urwu ndeɀani? Ʋakati kwaari: ⱿaKesari.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ipai Kesari ɀaKesari, naMŋari ɀaMŋari. Ʋakashamiswa ɀikuru naye.
Ɀino ʋaSaduse ʋakaʋuya kwaari, iʋo ʋanoti hakuna‐kumuka kwaʋakafa, ʋakamubvunza ʋaciti:
Mudzidzisi, Mosesi wakatinyorera kuti, kana mukoma womunhu akafa, akasiya mukadzi asinomŋana, munuŋuna wake atore mukadzi wake, amutsire mukoma wake ʋana.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunaʋanakomana ʋomunhu mumŋe ʋanomŋe; weɗaŋgwe akatora mukadzi, akafa asinaʋana.
Wecipiri akamutora, akafa asiŋgasiyi ʋana; nowecitatu akaɗaro ʋo.
Naʋanomŋe
Ɀino pakumuka
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Hamuna‐kurashika here, nemhaka yokusaziʋa magwaro nesimba raMŋari?
Nokuti kana ʋacimuka kuʋakafa, haʋawani kana kuwaniswa; asi ʋakaita saʋatumŋa kuɗeŋga.
Kana kuri kumutswa kwaʋakafa, hamuna‐kuraʋa here pabuku yaMosesi
Haazi Mŋari waʋakafa, asi waʋapenyu; marashika kwaɀo.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋanyori wakaŋga anzwa kutaurirana kwaʋo, aciziʋa kuti wakaŋga aʋapindura ɀakanaka, wakaʋuya, akamubvunza,
Jesu akapindura, akati: Wokutaŋga ndiwoyu: Inzwai ʋaIsraeri, Ishe Mŋari weɗu, ndiye Ishe mumŋe cete!
Iɗa Ishe Mŋari wako, nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose, nokufuŋga kwako kwose, nesimba rako rose.
Wecipiri ndiwoyu: Iɗa wokwako seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe. Hakunomurairo mukuru kunaiyeyo.
Ɀino munyori akati kwaari: Ɀakanaka Mudzidzisi, mareʋa ɀirokwaɀo, kuti ndiye mumŋe cete, hakunomumŋe kunze kwake;
nokumuɗa iye nomŋoyo wose, nokufuŋga kwose, nesimba rose, nokuɗa wokwake seɀaanoɀiɗa iye, ɀinopfuʋura ɀikuru ɀipiriso ɀose ɀinopiswa cose, neɀiɓayiro.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciʋona kuti wapindura nokufuŋga, akati kwaari: Hauzi kure noʋushe bgaMŋari. Kukasaʋa nomunhu wakazotsuŋga kumubvunza
Ɀino Jesu wakati acidzidzisa mutembere, akapindura, akati: Ʋanyori ʋanoreʋa seiko kuti Kristu ndiye mŋanakomana waDavidi?
Davidi amene wakati noMŋeya Mutȿene:
Ishe wakati kunaShe waŋgu:
Gara kurudyi rwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira ndaisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako pasi petsoka dzako.
Davidi amene unomuidza Ishe, uŋgagoʋa mŋanakomana wake seiko? Ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaŋga ʋacifara kumunzwa.
Ɀino pakudzidzisa kwake wakati: Cenjerai ʋanyori, ʋanoɗa kufamba neŋguʋo refu, nokukwaziswa paɗare,
neɀigaro ɀapamberi mumasinagoge, nenɀimbo dzapamberi pamitambo;
ʋaciparadza dzimba dzecirikadzi, ʋacinyeŋgetera neminyeŋgetero mirefu. Iʋaʋa ʋacatoŋgerwa ɀakaipa nokupfuʋurisa.
Ɀino wakaŋga agere akatarisana neciʋigiro cemari, akatarira ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaciisa mari muciʋigiro; ʋafumi ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋaciisa ɀizhinji.
Kukaȿika cirikadzi, waiʋa murombo, akaisa tumari tuʋiri tuɗuku tunoita fadini.
Akaɗanira ʋadzidzi ʋake kwaari, akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Cirikadzi iyi, iri murombo, yakaisa ɀizhinji kunaaʋo ʋose ʋakaisa muciʋigiro;
nokuti
Wakati aciɓuɗa mutembere, mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tarirai mabge, kunaka! nedzimba kunaka!
Jesu akati kwaari: Unoʋona dzimba idzi huru? Hakuŋgaregwi ibge pamsoro pebge, risiŋgazowisirwi pasi.
Ɀino wakati agere pagomo reMiorivi, pakatarisana netembere, Petro, naJakobo, naJohane, naAndrea ʋakamubvunza ʋari ʋoga,
Tiʋudzei kuti iɀoɀi ɀicagoʋa riniko? Neciratidzo cicaʋa cipiko, kana iɀoɀi ɀose ɀoɗo‐kuitwa?
Ɀino Jesu akataŋga kuʋaʋudza,
Ʋazhinji ʋacaʋuya nezita raŋgu, ʋaciti: Ndini
Kana mucinzwa ɀokurwa, neguhu rokurwa, musavunduka; iɀoɀo ɀinofanira kumboitika; asi kuguma kucigere kuȿika.
Nokuti rudzi rucamukira rudzi, ʋushe
Ɀicenjerei imi, nokuti ʋacakuisai kumakurukota, ʋuye mucarobga mumasinagoge, mucaiswa pamberi paʋaɓati namadzimambo nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ciʋe capupu kwaʋari.
NeEvaŋgeri inofanira kutaŋga kumboparidzirwa marudzi ose.
Kana ʋacienda nemi
Mukoma ucaisa munuŋuna kurufu, naɓaɓa mŋana waʋo; naʋana ʋacamukira ʋaɓereki ʋaʋo nokuʋaʋurayisa.
Mucaʋeŋgwa naʋose nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu; asi unotsuŋga kuȿikira pakuguma ucaponeswa.
Ɀino kana muciʋona nyaŋgadzi yokuparadza imire paisina‐kufanira
uri pamsoro peɗeŋga reimba ŋgaarege kuɓuruka, kana kupinda kuzotora cinhu mumba make.
Nouri mumunda ŋgaarege kudzokera shure kuzotora ŋguʋo yake.
Ʋacaʋa nenhamo ʋanemimba naʋanomŋisa namazuʋa iwayo!
Nyeŋgeterai kuti ɀirege kuʋa pacando.
Nokuti namazuʋa iwayo kucaʋa’po kutambudzika, kusati kwakamboʋa’po kwakaɗaro, kubva pakutaŋga kwokusikwa kwakasikwa naMŋari, kuȿikira ɀino, ʋuye hakucazoʋi’po.
Ƌai Ishe asaitapudza mazuʋa iwayo, hakunenyama yairarama; asi nokuɗa kwaʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋaakasanaŋgura, wakatapudza mazuʋa iwayo.
Ɀino kana munhu aciti kwamuri: Tarirai Kristu uri pano, tarirai uri papo, regai kutenda.
Nokuti ʋanaKristu ʋenhema ʋacamuka, naʋaprofita ʋenhema, ʋacaita ɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa, kuti ʋatsause ʋakasanaŋgurwa, kana ɀicibvira.
Asi cenjerai imi; tarirai, ndagara ndakuʋudzai ɀose!
Asi namazuʋa iwayo, shure kwokutambudzika ikoko, zuʋa ricaȿiɓa, Nomŋedzi haucazobginyi,
nenyeredzi dzicawa kuɗeŋga, namasimba ari kuɗeŋga acazunuŋguswa.
Ipapo ʋacaʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya mumakore nesimba guru nokubginya.
Ipapo ucatuma ʋatumŋa, akaʋuŋganidza ʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋake
Dzidzai pamuʋonde mufananidzo wawo; kana ɗaʋi rawo raʋa nyoro, mashizha acituŋga, munoziʋa kuti zhezha raʋa pedyo.
Saiɀoɀo imi ʋo, kana moʋona iɀoɀo ɀiciitwa, ziʋai kuti waʋa pedyo pamukoʋa.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Rudzi urwu haruŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri, kuȿikira iɀoɀo ɀose ɀaitika.
Ƌeŋga nenyika ɀicapfuʋura, asi mashoko aŋgu haaŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri.
Asi kana riri zuʋa iro neŋguʋa iyo, hakuna‐unoɀiziʋa, kunyaŋge ʋatumŋa ʋokuɗeŋga, kunyaŋge Mŋanakomana, asi Ƃaɓa.
Cenjerai, murinde, nokunyeŋgetera; nokuti hamuziʋi kuti ŋguʋa icaȿika rini.
somunhu wakaenda kuneimŋe nyika, akasiya imba yake, akapa ʋaranda ʋake simba, mumŋe nomumŋe ɓasa rake, akaraira murindi womukoʋa kuti arindire.
Naiɀoɀo rindai, nokuti hamuziʋi musi mŋene weimba waanoʋuya nawo, kana maɗeko, kana pakati poʋusiku, kana pakurira kwehuku, kana maŋgwanani;
kuti arege kuʋuya kamŋe‐kamŋe, akakuwanai muʋete.
Ɀandinokuʋudzai imi, ndinoʋudza ʋose,
Ɀino mazuʋa maʋiri akaŋga asara pakuȿika kwepaseka
Nokuti ʋakati: Ɀirege

Ɀino wakati ari paBetania, mumba maSimoni wamaperembudzi, agere pakudya, mumŋe mukadzi akaʋuya anecinu cearbastera caiʋa necizoro cenardo cakanakisa, cinomuteŋgo mukuru; akaputsa cinu cearbastera, akaciɗurura pamusoro wake.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋakatsamŋa pamŋoyo yaʋo, ʋakati: Kuparadza ikoko kwecizoro kwakaitirweiko?
Nokuti cizoro ici ciŋgaɗai cateŋgeswa namadenari anopfuʋura mazana matatu,
Asi Jesu wakati: Muregei. Munomutambudzireiko? Wakandiitira ɓasa rakanaka.
Nokuti ʋarombo munaʋo ŋguʋa dzose, ŋguʋa ipi neipi yamunoɗa, muŋgaʋaitira ɀakanaka; asi ini hamuneni ŋguʋa dzose.
Wakaita paakagona napo; wakagara azodzera muʋiri waŋgu kuʋigwa.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Kwose kunozoparidzirwa Evaŋgeri panyika dzose, ɀakaitwa naye ɀicarebga ʋo, ʋamuraŋgarire naɀo.
Judasi Iskarioti, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, wakaenda kuʋaprista ʋakuru, kuti amuise kwaʋari.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakafara, ʋakamupikira kuti ʋacamupa mari. Ipapo akatȿaka mutoʋo waaŋgamuisa
Nezuʋa rokutaŋga reɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso, musi waʋaiɓayira paseka nawo, ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Munoɗa kuti tikugadzirirepiko pamuŋgadya paseka?
Akatuma ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋaʋiri, akati kwaʋari: Endai muguta, ipapo mucasoŋgana nomunhu akatakura ciroŋgo cemvura; mumuteʋere iye.
Paaneŋge acipinda, muti kumŋene weimba: Ɀanzi nomudzidzisi: Imba yaŋgu yaʋaeni iripiko, mandiŋgadyira paseka naʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu?
Ipapo iye amene ucakutaridzai imba huru yokumsoro, yakaroŋgedzwa, yakagadzirwa; mutigadzirire’po.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakaȿika muguta, ʋakandowana seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaʋudzwa naye; ʋakagadzira paseka.
Aʋa maɗekwana, akaʋuya naʋanegumi naʋaʋiri.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋagere pakudya, Jesu akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe wenyu ucandipandukira, iye unodya neni.
Ipapo ʋakataŋga kuʋa neshuŋgu, mumŋe nomumŋe akati kwaari: Ndini here?
Akati kwaʋari: Ndomumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, unoisa ruʋoko neni mundiro.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unoenda hake, seɀaɀakanyorwa pamsoro pake; asi unenhamo munhu uyo, Mŋanakomana womunhu waanopandukirwa naye; kwaiʋa nani kumunhu uyu kana asina‐kuɓerekwa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacidya, Jesu akatora ciŋgwa, aka
Akatora mukombe, akaʋoŋga, akaʋapa, ʋakanwa ʋose pauri.
Akati kwaʋari: Ici iropa raŋgu resuŋgano itȿa, rinoɗururirwa ʋazhinji.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Handicazonwi ɀe ɀiɓereko ɀomuzambiriŋga, kuȿikira zuʋa iro randicazonwa naro, ɀaʋa ɀitȿa, muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaimba rwiyo, ʋakaɓuɗa,
Ɀino Jesu wakati kwaʋari: Imi mose mucagumburwa kwandiri, nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Asi kana ndamutswa, ndicakutuŋgamirirai Garirea.
Ɀino Petro akati kwaari: Kunyaŋge ʋose ʋakagumburwa, ini kwete.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwauri, kuti nhasi, ʋusiku bguno, joŋgwe risati rarira kaʋiri, ucandiramba katatu.
Asi iye wakareʋa nokusimbisa,
Ɀino ʋakaȿika panɀimbo inonzi Getsemani, akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Garai pano, ini ndicindonyeŋgetera.
Akatora Petro naJakobo naJohane, akataŋga kuvunduka kwaɀo nokuɗumbirwa.
Akati kwaʋari: Mŋeya waŋgu uneshuŋgu kwaɀo, kuȿikira pakufa; garai pano murinde.
Akapfuʋura mberi ɀishoma, akawira pasi, akayeŋgetera kuti, kana ɀicibvira, ŋguʋa ipfuʋure kwaari.
Akati: Aba, Ƃaɓa, ɀose ɀinobvira kwamuri, bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri, asi kuɗa kwaŋgu ŋgakurege
Ɀino akaȿika, akaʋawana ʋaʋata; akati kunaPetro: Simoni, uʋete here? Wakaŋga usiŋgagoni kurinda ŋguʋa imŋe cete here?
Rindai, munyeŋgetere, kuti murege kupinda mukuidzwa; mŋeya unoɗa hawo, asi nyama hainesimba.
Akaenda ɀe, akanyeŋgetera acireʋa mashoko iwayo.
Akaenda ɀe, akaʋawana ʋaʋata, nokuti meso aʋo akaŋga aɓatwa nehope kwaɀo; ʋakasaziʋa ɀaʋaŋgamupindura.
Akaenda ɀe rwecitatu, akati kwaʋari: Ciʋatai henyu, muzorore; ɀariŋgana, ŋguʋa yaȿika, tarirai, Mŋanakomana womunhu woiswa mumaʋoko aʋatadzi.
Simukai, tiende; tarirai, wondiisa
Pakarepo, acataura, Judasi, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akaȿika, anaʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaɓata minondo netȿimbo, ʋacibva kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori naʋakuru.
Ɀino iye, wakamupandukira, wakaŋga aʋapa ciratidzo, aciti: Uyo wandinoȿeta ndiye, mumuɓate muende naye
Ɀino wakati aȿika, pakarepo akasweɗera kwaari, akati: Rabi! Akamuȿeta ɀikuru.
Ipapo ʋakaisa maʋoko kwaari, ʋakamuɓata.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, wakavomora munondo wake, akatema muranda womuprista mukuru, akagura nzeʋe yake.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Maɓuɗa kuzondiɓata neminondo netȿimbo,
Ndakaŋga ndinemi mazuʋa ose, ndicikudzidzisai mutembere, mukarega kundiɓata, asi
Ipapo ʋakamusiya ʋose, ʋakatiza.
Ɀino rimŋe jaya rakamuteʋera, rakapfeka muceka ɓedzi pamuʋiri, ʋakariɓata;
asi rakasiya muceka, rikatiza risineŋguʋo.
Ɀino ʋakaisa Jesu kumuprista mukuru; ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋose naʋakuru naʋanyori ʋ kaʋuŋganira kwaari.
Petro wakaŋga amuteʋera ari kure kuȿikira paruʋazhe rwomuprista mukuru; akaŋga agere naʋatariri, acidziya mŋoto.
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru namakurukota ose ʋakatȿaka capupu pamsoro paJesu kuti ʋamuʋuraye, asi haʋana‐kuwana.
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋaimupupurira nhema, asi kupupura kwaʋo kwakapesana.
Ʋamŋe ʋakasimuka, ʋakamupupurira nhema, ʋaciti:
Takamunzwa isu aciti: Ndicaputsa tembere iyi yakaʋakwa namaʋoko, ndikaʋaka imŋe namazuʋa matatu, isina‐kuʋakwa namaʋoko.
Asi kupupura kwaʋo kwakapesana.
Ɀino muprista mukuru akasimuka pakati
Asi iye wakaramba anyerere, asiŋgapinduri cinhu. Muprista mukuru akamubvunza ɀe, akati kwaari: Ndiwe Kristu, Mŋanakomana wounokudzwa here?
Jesu akati: Ndini Nemi mucaʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu agere kurudyi rwesimba, aciʋuya namakore okuɗeŋga.
Ipapo muprista mukuru akabvarura ŋguʋo dzake, akati: Ticatȿakireiko ɀapupu?
Manzwa kumhura kwake
Ʋamŋe ʋakataŋga kumupfira mate, ʋakafukidza meso ake, ʋakamuroʋa netsiʋa, ʋaciti kwaari: Profita; naʋatariri ʋakamuroʋa namaʋoko.
Ɀino Petro aciri panze paruʋazhe, mumŋe waʋashandiri ʋomuprista mukuru akaȿika,
akaʋona Petro acidziya mŋoto, akamutarira, akati: Newe ʋo wakaŋga unaJesu weNazareta!
Asi iye wakaramba, aciti: Handiziʋi kana kunzwisisa ɀaunoreʋa; akaɓuɗa panze kuruʋazhe rwapamberi, joŋgwe rikarira.
Ɀino mushandiri akamuʋona, akataŋga ɀe kureʋa kunaʋakaŋga ʋari’po, aciti: Uyu ndo
Asi iye wakaramba ɀe. Ŋguʋa ɗuku yakati yapfuʋura, ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po ʋakati ɀe kunaPetro: Ɀirokwaɀo, uri
Ipapo akataŋga kutuka nokupika, aciti: Handimuziʋi munhu uyu wamunoreʋa.
Pakarepo joŋgwe rikarira rwecipiri; ipapo Petro akaraŋgarira shoko rakaŋga rarebga kwaari naJesu
Pakarepo maŋgwanani ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakaraŋgana naʋakuru naʋanyori namakurukota ose, ʋakasuŋga Jesu, ʋakaenda naye, ʋakamuisa kunaPirato.
Pirato akamubvunza, akati: Ndiwe Mambo waʋaJuda here? Akapindura, akati kwaari:
Ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakaramba ʋacimupomera ɀizhinji.
Pirato akamubvunza ɀe akati: Haupinduri cinhu here? Cinzwa, ʋanokupomera ɀizhinji seiko!
Asi Jesu haana‐kuzopindura cinhu, Pirato akashamiswa naɀo.
Ɀino pamutambo waisiʋasunuŋgurira musuŋgwa mumŋe, waʋaneŋge ʋaikumbira.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe wainzi Barabasi, wakaŋga asuŋgwa pamŋe cete naʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋamutsa ɓope, ʋakaʋuraya
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakakwira, ʋakataŋga kukumbira kunaPirato kuti aʋaitire saiɀoɀo.
Pirato akaʋapindura, akati: Munoɗa kuti ndikusunuŋgurirei Mambo waʋaJuda here?
Nokuti wakaŋga aciziʋa kuti ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋamuisa
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakakurudzira ʋanhu ʋazhinji,
Pirato akapindura ɀe, akati kwaʋari: Ndicagoiteiko naiye, wamunoti ndiye Mambo waʋaJuda?
Ʋakaɗanidzira ɀe, ʋaciti: Muroʋere pamucinjikwa!
Pirato akati kwaʋari: wakagotadzeiko? Ʋakanyanyisa kuɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Muroʋere pamucinjikwa!
Ɀino Pirato, nokuti wakaŋga aciɗa kufadza ʋanhu ʋazhinji, akaʋasunuŋgurira Barabasi, asi Jesu wakamuroʋesa, akamuisa
Ɀino ʋarwi ʋakamuisa mukati moruʋazhe, imo muimba yomuɓati, ʋakaʋuŋganidza hondo yose;
ʋakamupfekedza ŋguʋo tȿuku, ʋakaruka korona yeminzwa, ʋakamudzika iyo.
Ʋakataŋga kumukwazisa,
Ʋakamuroʋa musoro norutsaŋga, ʋakamupfira mate, ʋakafugama namabvi, ʋakamunamata.
Ʋakati ʋamuseka, ʋakamubvisa ŋguʋo tȿuku, ndokumupfekedza ŋguʋo dzake, ʋakaenda naye kundomuroʋera pamucinjikwa.
Ɀino ʋakamanikidza mumŋe, wakaŋga acipfuʋura acibva kuruwa,
Ʋakamuisa kunɀimbo
Ʋakamupa waini, yakaveŋganiswa nemura, asi iye wakaɀiramba.
Ʋakati ʋamuroʋera pamucinjikwa, ʋakagoʋana ŋguʋo dzake, ʋacikanda mijenya pamsoro padzo, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe apiwe cake.
Yakaŋga iri ŋguʋa yecitatu, ʋakamuroʋera pamucinjikwa.
Norugwaro rwemhoȿa yake rwakaŋga rwakanyorwa pamsoro
Ʋakaroʋera pamucinjikwa pamŋe cete naye makororo maʋiri, mumŋe kurudyi rwake, mumŋe kuruɓoshwe. [
Rugwaro rukaitika, runoti: Wakarabga naʋaɗariki ʋomurairo.]
Naʋaipfuʋura ʋakamutuka, ʋacidzuŋgudza misoro yaʋo, ʋaciti: Iwe, wokuputsa tembere, nokuiʋaka ɀe namazuʋa matatu,
ciɀiponesa iwe, uɓuruke pamucinjikwa!
Saiɀoɀo ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋaka
Kristu, Mambo waʋaIsraeri, ŋgaaɓuruke ɀino pamucinjikwa, kuti tiʋone titende. Naʋakaŋga ʋaroʋerwa pamŋe cete naye ʋakamuɀidza.
Ɀino yakati yaʋa ŋguʋa yecitanhatu, rima rikaʋa’po panyika yose kuȿikira paŋguʋa yepfumbamŋe.
Neŋguʋa yepfumbamŋe Jesu akaɗana nenzwi guru, aciti: Eroi, Eroi, rama Sabaktani! Ndokuti, kana ɀicishandurwa: Mŋari waŋgu, Mŋari waŋgu, mandisiyireiko?
Ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po ʋakati ʋaci
Ipapo mumŋe wakamhanya, akazadza cipanje nevinega, akaciisa parutsaŋga, ndokumunwisa, aciti: Regai timboʋona kana Eria acizoʋuya kumuɓurusa.
Ipapo Jesu akaɗana nenzwi guru, akaɓuɗisa mŋeya
Cidzitiro cetembere cikabvaruka napakati, kubva kumsoro kuȿikira pasi.
Ɀino mukuru wezana wakaŋga amire’po, akatarisana naye, wakati aciʋona mutoʋo wokufa kwake, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu uyu wakaŋga ari Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Naʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋari’po, ʋakatarira ʋari kure; pakati paʋo
ndiʋo ʋaimuteʋera aciri muGarirea ʋacimushandira, naʋamŋe ʋakadzi ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋakwira Jerusarema naye.
Ɀino aʋa maɗeko, ɀarakaŋga riri zuʋa rokugadzirira, ndokuti rinotaŋgira saɓata,
Josefa weArimatea,
Pirato akashamiswa
Ɀino wakati aɀinzwa kumukuru wezana, akapa Josefa mutumbu.
Iye akateŋga muceka, akamuɓurusa, akamuputira nomuceka, ndokumuʋiga mubgiro bgakaŋga bgakacerwa pabge, ndokukuŋgurusira ibge pamuromo wobgiro.
Maria Magdarene, naMaria mai ʋaJose, ʋakaʋona paakaʋigwa.
Saɓata yakati yapfuʋura, Maria Magdarene, naMaria mai ʋaJakobo, naSarome, ʋakateŋga ɀinonhuwira, kuti ʋaende kuzomuzodza.
Maŋgwanani nomusi wokutaŋga weviki, ʋakaenda kubgiro, zuʋa roɓuɗa.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Ndianiko ucatikuŋgurusira ibge pamukoʋa wobgiro?
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitarira, ʋakaʋona kuti ibge rakaŋga ratokuŋguruswa, nokuti raiʋa guru‐guru.
Ʋakapinda mubgiro, ʋakaʋona jaya, rakaŋga rigere kurudyi, rakapfeka ŋguʋo cena yakareɓa, ʋakavunduka.
Rikati kwaʋari: Musavunduka, munotȿaka Jesu weNazareta, wakaŋga aroʋerwa pamucinjikwa; wamuka, haa’po pano; tarirai paʋakaŋga ʋamuisa.
Asi endai, mundoʋudza ʋadzidzi ʋake naPetro, kuti unokutuŋgamirirai Garirea, mucandomuʋona’ko, seɀaakakuʋudzai.
Ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakatiza
Ɀino wakati amuka maŋgwanani nomusi wokutaŋga weviki, akaɀiratidza pakutaŋga kunaMaria Magdarene, waakaŋga aɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa minomŋe kwaari.
Iye akaenda kundoʋudza aʋo ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakaŋga ʋacicema nokurira.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti uri mupenyu, ʋuye kuti wakaʋonekwa naye, ʋakasatenda.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo wakaɀiratidza nomumŋe mutoʋo kunaʋaʋiri ʋaʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋacifamba muruwa.
Naiʋo ʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakandoʋudza ʋamŋe; naiʋo ʋakasaʋatenda ʋo.
Pashure wakaɀiratidza kunaʋanegumi nomumŋe, ʋagere pakudya; akaʋapa mhaka pamsoro pokusatenda kwaʋo noʋukukutu bgemŋoyo yaʋo, nokuti haʋana‐kutenda ʋaya ʋakaŋga ʋamuʋona amuka.
Akati kwaʋari: Endai munyika yose, muparidzire ɀisikwa ɀose Evaŋgeri.
Unotenda, akabapatidzwa, ucaponeswa; asi usiŋgatendi ucatoŋgwa.
Ɀiratidzo iɀi ɀicaʋa naʋanotenda: Ʋacaɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa nezita raŋgu, ʋacataura nendimi itȿa;
ʋacaɓata nyoka; kunyaŋge ʋakanwa cinhu cinoʋuraya, haciŋgaʋarwadzi; ʋacaisa maʋoko pamsoro paʋarwere, ʋakapora.
Ɀino Ishe Jesu wakati ataura naʋo, akagamucirwa kuɗeŋga, akagara kuruʋoko rworudyi rwaMŋari.
Iʋo ʋakaenda, ʋakaparidza kwose‐kwose, Ishe aciɓata naʋo, acisimbisa shoko neɀiratidzo ɀaiʋa naʋo.
Ʋazhinji ɀaʋakaidza kurondedzera mashoko eɀinhu iɀo ɀakaitika pakati peɗu,
seɀaʋakatipa iʋo ʋaka
neni ʋo, ndakati ndanatso‐feya ɀose kubva pakutaŋga, ndakati ɀakanaka kuti ndikunyorerei ʋo nokuteʋedzanisa, imi Teofiro, makakurumbira;
kuti muziʋe kuti mashoko amakadzidziswa ndeeɀokwaɗi.
Namazuʋa aHerode, mambo weJudea, mumŋe muprista waiʋa’po, wainzi Zakaria, wegoʋero raAbia; mukadzi wake waiʋa waʋanasikana ʋaAroni, zita rake rainzi Erisabete.
Ʋakaŋga ʋakarurama ʋose, ʋari ʋaʋiri, pamberi paMŋari, ʋacifamba nemirairo neɀakarurama ɀose ɀaShe, ʋasina‐caʋaŋgapomerwa.
Ʋakaŋga ʋasinomŋana, nokuti Erisabete wakaŋga asiŋgaɓereki, ʋuye ʋakaŋga ʋacembera ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri.
Ɀino, wakati aciɓate‐ɓasa roʋuprista pamberi paMŋari, padzoro regoʋero rake,
akagoʋerwa netsika dzoʋuprista, kuti apinde mutembere yaShe, kuzopisa ɀinonhuwira.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacinyeŋgetera kunze neŋguʋa yokupisa ɀinonhuwira.
Ipapo mutumŋa waShe wakaʋonekwa naye, amire kurudyi rweartari yeɀinonhuwira.
Zakaria akamanikidzwa acimuʋona; kutya kukamuwira.
Mutumŋa akati kwaari: Usatya Zakaria, nokuti kukumbira kwako kwanzwika, mukadzi wako Erisabete ucakuɓerekera mŋanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Johane.
Iwe ucaʋa nomufaro nokufarisisa, naʋazhinji ʋacafarira kuɓerekwa kwake.
Nokuti iye ucaʋa mukuru pamberi paShe; haaŋgatoŋgonwi waini neɀinoɓata; ucazadzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋake.
Ucadzorera ʋazhinji ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri kunaShe, Mŋari waʋo.
Ucafamba pamberi pake noMŋeya nesimba raEria, kuti adzorere mŋoyo yamadziɓaɓa kuʋana, naʋasiŋgatereri kuʋucenjeri bgaʋakarurama, agadzirire Ishe ʋanhu ʋaka
Zakaria akati kumutumŋa: Iɀoɀi ndicaɀiziʋa seiko? Nokuti ini ndaʋa mutana, nomukadzi waŋgu wacembera.
Mutumŋa akapindura, akati kwaari: Ndini Gabrieri, ndinomira pamberi paMŋari; ndatumŋa kuti nditaure newe, ndikuparidzire mashoko awa akanaka.
Tarira, ucanyarara, usiŋgagoni kutaura, kuȿikira zuʋa rinoitwa ɀinhu iɀi, nokuti hauna‐kutenda mashoko aŋgu, acaitika neŋguʋa yawo.
Ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakamirira Zakaria ʋakashamiswa nokunonoka kwake mutembere.
Ɀino wakati aciɓuɗa, akasagona kutaura naʋo; ʋakaziʋa kuti wakaŋga aʋona ciratidzo mutembere; iye akaramba acininira namaʋoko, akaramba ari mbeʋeʋe.
Ɀino mazuʋa okushumira kwake akati apera, akaenda kumba kwake.
Mazuʋa iwayo akati apfuʋura, Erisabete mukadzi wake akatora mimba, akaɀiʋanza mŋedzi mishanu, aciti:
Ndiɀo ɀandakaitirwa naShe namazuʋa aaka
Nomŋedzi wecitanhatu mutumŋa Gabrieri wakatumŋa naMŋari kuguta reGarirea, rinonzi Nazareta,
kumhandara yakaŋga yanyeŋgwa nomurume, wainzi Josefa, weimba yaDavidi; zita remhandara rainzi Maria.
Mutumŋa akapinda kwaari, akati: Kwaziwa,
Iye akavunduswa kwaɀo neshoko iro, akafuŋga kuti kukwazisa kwakaɗaro ndokweiko.
Ipapo mutumŋa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria, nokuti wanzwirwa nyasha naMŋari.
Tarira, ucaʋa nemimba, ucaɀara mŋanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu.
Iye ucaʋa mukuru, ucanzi Mŋanakomana woWokumsoro‐soro; Ishe Mŋari ucamupa cigaro coʋushe caɓaɓa ʋake Davidi.
Ucaɓata imba yaJakobo nokusiŋgaperi, noʋushe bgake habguŋgaʋi nomugumo.
Ipapo Maria akati kumutumŋa: Iɀoɀi ɀiŋgaʋa seiko, ɀandisiŋgaziʋi murume?
Mutumŋa akapindura, akati kwaari: Mŋeya Mutȿene ucaʋuya pamsoro pako, nesimba roWokumsoro‐soro ricakufukidza; saka ico citȿene cicaɓerekwa cicanzi: Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Ʋuye tarira, Erisabete, hama yako, naiye waʋa nemimba ʋo yomŋanakomana pakucembera kwake; mŋedzi uno waʋa wecitanhatu kunaiye wainzi haaɓereki.
Nokuti hakuneshoko raMŋari ricashaiwa simba.
Ipapo Maria akati: Tarirai,
Namazuʋa iwayo Maria akasimuka, akakurumidza kuenda kunyika yamakomo, kuguta reJudea;
akapinda mumba maZakaria, akakwazisa Erisabete.
Ɀino Erisabete wakati acinzwa kukwazisa kwaMaria, mŋana akakwakuka muɗumbu rake; ipapo Erisabete akazadzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene,
akaɗana nenzwi guru, akati: Wakaropafadzwa iwe pakati paʋakadzi, neciɓereko ceɗumbu rako cakaropafadzwa!
Ɀaita seiko kwandiri, kuti ndamutswa namai ʋaShe waŋgu?
Nokuti, tarira, inzwi rokukwazisa kwako rakati riciȿika munzeʋe dzaŋgu, mŋana akakwakuka nomufaro muɗumbu raŋgu.
Wakaropafadzwa iye
Maria akati:
Mŋoyo waŋgu unokudza Ishe,
Mŋeya waŋgu wakafara naMŋari, Muponesi waŋgu;
Ɀaakaʋona ʋurombo bgomushandiri wake;
Nokuti, tarira, kubva ɀino marudzi ose acati, ndakaropafadzwa;
Nokuti uyo unamasimba wakandiitira ɀinhu ɀikuru;
Zita rake idɀene.
Ŋgoni dzake dziri kumarudzi namarudzi
Aʋanhu ʋanomutya.
Wakaratidza simba
Wakaparadza ʋaiɀikudza mundaŋgariro dzemŋoyo yaʋo;
Wakabvisa madzimambo paɀigaro ɀaʋo ɀoʋushe,
Akasimudza ʋakaninipiswa;
Ʋanenzara wakaʋagutsa neɀakanaka,
Akadzosera ʋafumi ʋasina;
Wakaɓatsira Israeri, muranda wake,
Kuti araŋgarire ŋgoni
(Seɀaakareʋa kumadziɓaɓa eɗu),
KunaAbrahama nokurudzi rwake nokusiŋgaperi.
Maria akagara naye mŋedzi ineŋge semitatu, akadzokera kumusha kwake.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yaErisabete yokuɀara kwake yakaȿika; akaɓereka mŋanakomana.
Ɀino ʋakaʋakirana naʋo nehama dzake ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti Ishe wakaŋga amuitira ŋgoni huru, ʋakafara naye.
Ɀino nezuʋa rorusere ʋakaʋuya kuzodziŋgisa mŋana, ʋakaɗa kumutumidza zita raɓaɓa ʋake, Zakaria.
Ipapo mai ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Kwete, ucatumidzwa Johane.
Ʋakati kwaari: Hakunomunhu kuhama dzenyu wakatumidzwa zita iro.
Ʋakabvunza ɓaɓa ʋake, ʋaciɗudzira namaʋoko, kuti anzi aniko.
Ʋakakumbira ibge rokunyora pariri, ʋakanyora ʋaciti: Johane, ndiro zita rake. Ʋakashamiswa ʋose.
Kamŋe‐kamŋe muromo wake ukashamiswa, norurimi rwake
Kutya kukawira ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere naʋo; namashoko iwayo ose akanzwika kunyika yose yamakomo eJudea.
Ʋose ʋaka
Ƃaɓa ʋake, Zakaria, ʋakazadzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene, ʋakaprofita, ʋaciti:
Ishe, Mŋari waʋaIsraeri, ŋgaakudzwe;
Nokuti wakamutsa ʋanhu ʋake, nokuʋadzikinura,
Akatisimudzira runyaŋga rwokuponeswa
Mumba momuranda wake, Davidi;
(Seɀaakataura nomuromo waʋaprofita ʋake ʋatȿene, ʋakaŋga ʋari’po kubva pakuʋamba kwenyika),
Kutiponesa paʋaʋeŋgi ʋeɗu, napamaʋoko aʋose ʋanotiʋeŋga;
Kunzwira madziɓaɓa eɗu ŋgoni,
Nokuraŋgarira suŋgano yake tȿene;
Kupika kwaakapika nako kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu Abrahama,
Kutipa
Kuti timushumire tisiŋgatyi,
Noʋutȿene nokururama pamberi pake mazuʋa eɗu ose.
Iwe, Mŋana, ucanzi muprofita woWokumsoro‐soro,
Nokuti iwe ucatuŋgamira pamberi paShe, kumugadzirira nzira dzake;
Kuziʋisa ʋanhu ʋake
Ʋacikaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀaʋo,
Nomŋoyo munyoro waMŋari weɗu,
Ucatishanyira namambakwedza okuɗeŋga,
Kuvenekera ʋagere murima nomumumvuri worufu;
Nokuraramisa tsoka dzeɗu munzira yorugare.
Mŋana akakura, akasimba mumŋeya, akagara mumarenje, kuȿikira zuʋa rokuratidzwa kwake kuʋaIsraeri.
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo cireʋo cakaitwa naKesari Augusto, kuti nyika yose inyorwe
Uku ndokwaiʋa kunyorwa kwokutaŋga, kwakaitwa Kuriniosi ari muɓati weSiria.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaenda kundonyorwa, mumŋe nomumŋe kuguta rake.
NaJosefa ʋo wakabva Garirea, muguta reNazareta, akaenda Judea, kuguta raDavidi, rinonzi Betrehema, nokuti waiʋa weimba yaDavidi, noworudzi rwake;
kuti anyorwe naMaria, wakaŋga anyeŋgwa naye, aʋa nemimba.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋari’po, mazuʋa okuɀara kwake akaȿika;
akaɀara ɗaŋgwe rake mŋanakomana, akamuputira nemiceka, akamuʋanzarika mucidyiro
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunaʋafudzi munyika iyo, ʋaigara kuʋuragu ʋacirinda mapoka aʋo ʋusiku.
Mutumŋa waShe akamira naʋo, nokubginya kwaShe kukaʋakomba, ʋakatya nokutya kukuru.
Ipapo mutumŋa akati kwaʋari: Musatya; nokuti tarirai, ndinokuparidzirai
nokuti nhasi maɀarirwa muguta raDavidi Muponesi, ndiye Kristu Ishe.
Ici ndico ciratidzo kwamuri: Mucandowana rushiye, rwakaputirwa nemiceka, ruʋete mucidyiro
Ipapo kamŋe‐kamŋe kukaʋa’po pamŋe cete nomutumŋa, ʋazhinji ʋehondo yokuɗeŋga, ʋacirumbidza Mŋari, ʋaciti:
Mŋari ŋgaarumbidzwe kumsoro‐soro,
Norugare ŋgaruʋe naʋanhu ʋaanofarira.
Ɀino ʋatumŋa ʋakati ʋabva kwaʋari,
Ipapo ʋakakurumidza kuenda, ʋakawana Maria naJosefa, norushiye ruʋete mucidyiro
Ʋakati ʋaʋona, ʋakaziʋisa kwose shoko raʋakaŋga ʋaʋudzwa romŋana uyo.
Ʋose ʋakanzwa ʋakashamiswa neɀaʋakaʋudzwa naʋafudzi.
Asi Maria wakaceŋgeta mashoko iwayo ose, aciafuŋgisisa mumŋoyo make.
Ɀino ʋafudzi ʋakadzokera kwakare, ʋacikudza nokurumbidza Mŋari pamsoro peɀose ɀaʋakanzwa neɀaʋakaʋona, seɀaʋakaŋga ʋaʋudzwa.
Mazuʋa masere akati apfuʋura,
Ɀino mazuʋa okuɀinatsa kwaʋo nomurairo waMosesi akati apera, ʋakaenda naye Jerusarema, kuti ʋamuise pamberi paShe;
(seɀaɀakanyorwa pamurairo waShe, ɀicinzi: Mŋanarume mumŋe nomumŋe unotaŋga kuzarura ciɀaro, ucanzi mutȿene waShe),
ʋuye kuɓayira ciɓayiro; seɀaɀakarebga pamurairo waShe, ɀinoti, njiʋa mbiri, kana haŋgaiʋa mbiri ɗuku.
Ɀino, kwakaŋga kunomunhu paJerusarema, wainzi Simeoni; waiʋa munhu wakarurama waiɗa Mŋari, waitarira kunyaradzwa kwaʋaIsraeri; noMŋeya Mutȿene wakaŋga anaye.
Iye wakaŋga aratidzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene, kuti haaŋgaʋoni rufu, asati aʋona Kristu waShe.
Iye wakaʋuya mutembere noMŋeya; ɀino ʋaɓereki ʋakati ʋaciʋuya nomŋana Jesu, kuti ʋaite naye nomutoʋo womurairo,
akamuɓata mumaʋoko ake akarumbidza Mŋari, aciti:
Ɀino, Tenzi, muranda wenyu ŋgaaende hake
Norugare seɀamakareʋa;
Nokuti meso aŋgu aʋona ruponeso rwenyu,
Rwamakagadzira pamberi paʋanhu ʋose;
Ciedza cokuvenekera ʋahedeni,
Nokurumbidzwa kwaʋanhu ʋenyu ʋaIsraeri.
Ƃaɓa ʋake namai ʋake ʋakashamiswa neɀakarebga pamsoro pake.
Ipapo Simeoni akaʋaropafadza, akati kunaMaria, mai ʋake: Tarira,
ʋuye munondo ucaɓaya mŋeya wako ʋo; kuti ndaŋgariro dzemŋoyo mizhinji dzizikanwe.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunaAna ʋo, muprofitakadzi, mukunda waFanueri, worudzi rwaAsheri; (iye wakaŋga acembera kwaɀo, wakaŋga anomurume makore manomŋe kubvira paʋumhandara bgake,
wakaŋga ari cirikadzi yaiʋa namakore makumi masere namanna), wakaŋga asiŋgabvi mutembere, acishumira Mŋari nokuɀinyima ɀokudya nokukumbira ʋusiku namasikati.
Naiye wakati aciȿika neŋguʋa iyo, akatenda Mŋari, akataura pamsoro pake kunaʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacitarira kusunuŋgurwa kweJerusarema.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza ɀose ɀomurairo waShe, ʋakadzokera Garirea, kuguta raʋo Nazareta.
Mŋana akakura, akasimba, akazara nenjere; nenyasha dzaMŋari dzikaʋa pamsoro pake.
Ɀino ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋaisienda Jerusarema makore ose kumutambo wepaseka.
Ɀino iye wakati aʋa namakore anegumi namaʋiri, ʋakakwira’ko netsika yomutambo.
Ʋakati ʋapedza mazuʋa, pakudzoka kwaʋo mŋana Jesu akasara Jerusarema, ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋasiŋgaziʋi.
Asi ɀaʋaiti ɀimŋe uri kunaʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋari panzira naʋo, ʋakafamba zuʋa rimŋe, ʋakazomutȿaka kuhama dzaʋo nokuʋazikani ʋaʋo.
Ʋakati ʋamushaiwa, ʋakadzokera Jerusarema ʋacimutȿaka.
Mazuʋa matatu akati apfuʋura, ʋakamuwana ari mutembere, agere pakati paʋadzidzisi aciterera nokuʋabvunza.
Ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacimunzwa, ʋakashamiswa nokuziʋa kwake ʋuye nokupindura kwake.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋamuʋona, ʋakakatyamara; mai ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Mŋana, watiitireiko ɀakaɗai? Tarira, ɓaɓa ʋako neni takakutȿaka ticicema.
Akati kwaʋari: Makaŋga mucinditȿakireiko? Makaŋga musiŋgaziʋi kuti ndinofanira kuʋa paɀinhu ɀaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu here?
Ʋakasanzwisisa shoko raakaʋaʋudza.
Ipapo akaɓuruka naʋo, akaȿika Nazareta, akaʋaterera. Mai ʋake ʋakaceŋgeta mashoko
Jesu akaramba acienda mberi pakucenjera, napakukura, napakufadza Mŋari naʋanhu.
Negore regumi namashanu rokuɓata kwaTiberio Kesari, Pontio Pirato ari muɓati weJudea, Herode ari muɓati weGarirea, Firipo munuŋuna wake, ari muɓati weIturea neTrakoniti, Risanio ari muɓati weAbirene,
Anasi naKayafasi ʋari ʋaprista ʋakuru, shoko raMŋari rakaʋuya kunaJohane, mŋanakomana waZakaria, murenje.
Iye akaenda munyika yose yakapoteredza yaJoridani, akaparidza rubapatidzo rwokutendeʋuka kuzokaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi;
seɀaɀakanyorwa mubuku yamashoko aIsaya muprofita,
Inzwi rounoɗana murenje,
Gadzirai nzira yaShe,
Ruramisai migwagwa yake.
Mipata yose icafusirwa,
Makomo ose neɀikomo ɀose ɀicaɗeredzwa;
Ɀakakombama ɀicaruramiswa,
Pasakaenzana
Nyama yose icaʋona ruponeso rwaMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo wakati kuʋazhinji ʋaiʋuya kuzobapatidzwa naye: Imi ʋana ʋenyoka, ndianiko wakakunyeʋerai kuti mutize kutsamŋa kunoʋuya?
Naiɀoɀo ɓerekai ɀiɓereko ɀakafanira kutendeʋuka; musataŋga kureʋa mumŋoyo menyu, muciti: Abrahama ndiɓaɓa ʋeɗu; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Mŋari uŋgamutsira Abrahama ʋana pamabge awa.
Ɀino sanhu ratoiswa pamudzi wemiti; naiɀoɀo muti mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgaɓereki ciɓereko cakanaka, unotemŋa, ukakandirwa mumŋoto.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Ɀino toɗiniko?
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Uneŋguʋo mbiri ŋgaagoʋane nousina; nouneɀokudya ŋgaaite saiɀoɀo.
Naʋateresi ʋakaʋuya ʋo kuzobapatidzwa, ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, toɗiniko?
Akati kwaʋari: Musareʋa
Naʋarwi ʋo ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Nesu ʋo toɗiniko? Akati kwaʋari: Musatorera munhu cinhu nesimba, kana kupomera
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋacatarira, ʋose ʋaciraŋgarira mumŋoyo maʋo pamsoro paJohane, kuti ɀimŋe ndiKristu,

Johane akapindura, akati kunaʋose: Ini ndinokubapatidzai nemvura, asi uyu unoʋuya, unesimba kupfuʋureni, wandisina‐kufanira kusunuŋgura rukanda rweshaŋgu dzake; iye ucakubapatidzai noMŋeya Mutȿene nomŋoto.
Rusero rwake ruri muruʋoko rwake; ucanatsa ɓuriro rake kwaɀo; ucaʋuŋganidzira ɀiyo muɗura rake; asi hundi ucaipisa nomŋoto usiŋgadzimŋi.
Akaparidzira ʋanhu Evaŋgeri, aciʋaraira namamŋe mashoko mazhinji;
asi Herode muɓati, wakati arairwa naye pamsoro paHerodiasi, mukadzi womunuŋuna wake, neɀakaipa ɀose ɀaakaŋga aita iye Herode,
wakawedzera pamsoro peɀose cinhu ici, kuti wakapfigira Johane mutoroŋgo.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋabapatidzwa, naiye Jesu abapatidzwa ʋo, acinyeŋgetera, ɗeŋga rikazarurwa,
Mŋeya Mutȿene akaɓurukira pamsoro pake nomufananidzo wakaita sowenjiʋa, inzwi rikabva kuɗeŋga,
Ɀino iye Jesu wakaŋga anamakore aneŋge makumi matatu, ŋguʋa yaakataŋga
mŋanakomana waMatati, mŋanakomana waRevi, mŋanakomana waMerki, mŋanakomana waJanai, mŋanakomana waJosefa,
mŋanakomana waMatatiasi, mŋanakomana waAmosi, mŋanakomana waNaumi, mŋanakomana waEsri, mŋanakomana waNagai,
mŋanakomana waMaati, mŋanakomana waMatatiasi, mŋanakomana waSemeini, mŋanakomana waJoseki, mŋanakomana waJoda,
mŋanakomana waJoanani, mŋanakomana waResa, mŋanakomana waZorobaberi, mŋanakomana waSaratieri, mŋanakomana waNeri,
mŋanakomana waMerki, mŋanakomana waAdi, mŋanakomana waKosamu, mŋanakomana waErmadamu, mŋanakomana waEri,
mŋanakomana waJesu, mŋanakomana waEriezeri, mŋanakomana waJorimu, mŋanakomana waMatati, mŋanakomana waRevi,
mŋanakomana waSimeoni, mŋanakomana waJuda, mŋanakomana waJosefa, mŋanakomana waJonamu, mŋanakomana waEriakimu,
mŋanakomana waMerea, mŋanakomana waMena, mŋanakomana waMatata, mŋanakomana waNatamu, mŋanakomana waDavidi,
mŋanakomana waJese, mŋanakomana waJobedi, mŋanakomana waBoosi, mŋanakomana waSara, mŋanakomana waNasoni,
mŋanakomana waAminadabi, mŋanakomana waAdmini, mŋanakomana waArni, mŋanakomana waEsromi, mŋanakomana waFaresi, mŋanakomana waJuda,
mŋanakomana waJakobo, mŋanakomana waIsaka, mŋanakomana waAbrahama, mŋanakomana waTara, mŋanakomana waNahori,
mŋanakomana waSeruki, mŋanakomana waRagau, mŋanakomana waFareki, mŋanakomana waEberi, mŋanakomana waSara,
mŋanakomana waKainami, mŋanakomana waArfaksadi, mŋanakomana waSemu, mŋanakomana waNoa, mŋanakomana waRameki,
mŋanakomana waMatusara, mŋanakomana waEnoki, mŋanakomana waJareti, mŋanakomana waMarereeri, mŋanakomana waKainami,
mŋanakomana waEnosi, mŋanakomana waSeti, mŋanakomana waAdama, mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Ɀino Jesu azere noMŋeya Mutȿene, wakadzoka ɀe
aciidzwa naDiaborosi mazuʋa anamakumi manna. Wakaŋga asiŋgadyi cinhu namazuʋa iwayo; ɀino akati apera, akaziya.
Ɀino Diaborosi akati kwaari: Kana uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari, ʋudza ibge iri kuti riʋe ciŋgwa.
Jesu akamupindura,
Ɀino akamutuŋgamirira kumsoro, akamuratidza ʋushe bgose bgenyika neŋguʋa ɗuku‐ɗuku.
Diaborosi akati kwaari: Ndicakupa simba iri rose nokubginya kwaɀo, nokuti ndakabgupiwa ini, kuti ndibgupe wandinoɗa.
Ɀino, iwe, kana ukandinamata, ɀose ɀicaʋa ɀako.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Kwakanyorwa
Akaenda naye Jerusarema, akamuisa paciruʋu cetembere, akati kwaari: Kana uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari, uɀiwisire pasi pano;
Nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Ucaraira ʋatumŋa ʋake pamsoro pako, kuti ʋakuceŋgete;
Pamaʋoko
Kuti urege kugumbusa rutsoka rwako pabge.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Kwakanzi: Usaidza Ishe, Mŋari wako.
Diaborosi akati apedza kuidza kwose, akamusiya kuȿikira imŋe ŋguʋa.
Ɀino Jesu wakadzokera Garirea nesimba roMŋeya; mukurumbira wake ukanzwika nenyika yose yakapoteredza.
Waidzidzisa mumasinagoge aʋo, acikudzwa naʋanhu ʋose.
Akaȿika paNazareta, paakaŋga arerwa, akapinda musinagoge nomusi wesaɓata seɀaaisiita, akasimuka kuti araʋe.
Akapiwa buku yomuprofita Isaya; ɀino wakati aipetenura, akawana pakanyorwa panoti:
Mŋeya waShe uri pamsoro paŋgu,
Nokuti wakandizodza, kuti ndiparidzire ʋarombo Evaŋgeri;
Wakandituma kuti ndiziʋise ʋakatapxa kusunuŋgurwa
Namapofu kuti ʋaʋone ɀe;
Ndiregedze ʋakatsikirirwa;
Nokuziʋisa gore raShe rakanaka.
Akapeta buku, akaidzosera kumutariri, akagara pasi; meso aʋose ʋaiʋa musinagoge akamutarisisa.
Ɀino akataŋga kuʋaʋudza, aciti: Nhasi rugwaro urwu rwaitika munzeʋe dzenyu.
Ʋose ʋakamupupurira
Akati kwaʋari: Ndinoziʋa, mucareʋa shumo iyi kwandiri: Ŋaŋga uɀiporese; ɀose iɀo ɀatakanzwa ɀakaitwa paKapernaume, uɀiite ʋo nomuno munyika yako.
Akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Hakunomuprofita unogamucirwa munyika yake.
Ndinokuʋudzai
asi Eria haana‐kutumŋa kunomumŋe waʋo, asi
Kwakaŋga kunaʋaiʋa namaperembudzi ʋazhinji pakati paʋaIsraeri
Ipapo ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋari musinagoge, ʋakatsamŋa ɀikuru, ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo,
ʋakasimuka, ʋakamudziŋgira kunze kweguta, ʋakaenda naye kumawere egomo, pakaŋga pakaʋakwa guta raʋo, kuti ʋamuwisire pasi.
Asi iye wakapinda napakati paʋo, akaenda.
Ɀino wakaɓurukira Kapernaume,
ʋakashamiswa nokudzidzisa kwake; nokuti shoko rake rakaŋga rinesimba.
Ɀino musinagoge makaŋga munomunhu wakaŋga anomŋeya wakaipa wetȿina; iye akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, aciti:
Haiwa, tinemhaka yeiko nemi, Jesu weNazareta? Maʋuya kuzotiparadza kanhi? Ndinokuziʋai kuti ndimi ani;
Ipapo Jesu akauraira, aciti: Nyarara, uɓuɗe kwaari! Mŋeya wakaipa ukamuwisira pasi pakati paʋo, ukaɓuɗa kwaari, usina‐kutoŋgomukuʋadza.
Kutya kukaʋawira ʋose, ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Shoko iri ndereiko? Nokuti unoraira mŋeya yetȿina necikuriri nesimba, ikaɓuɗa.
Mukurumbira wake ukanzwika kumatiʋi ose enyika yakapoteredza.
Ɀino wakasimuka musinagoge, akapinda mumba maSimoni. Mai ʋomukadzi waSimoni ʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa nefiviri ɀikuru; ʋakaʋakumbirira kwaari.
Ipapo akakotamira pamsoro paʋo, akaraira fiviri, ikaʋarega; ʋakasimuka pakarepo, ʋakaʋashandira.
Ɀino zuʋa rakati roʋira, ʋose ʋaiʋa naʋanorwara nehosha zhinji ʋakaʋuya naʋo kwaari; akaisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pomumŋe nomumŋe waʋo, akaʋaporesa.
Nemŋeya yakaipa yakaɓuɗa kuʋazhinji, iciɗanidzira, iciti: Ndimi Mŋanakomana waMŋari! Asi wakairaira, akasaitendera kutaura, nokuti yakaŋga iciziʋa kuti ndiye Kristu.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, akaɓuɗa, akaenda kwakaŋga kunerenje; ʋazhinji ʋakamutȿaka, ʋakaȿika kwaari, ʋakaidza kumudziʋisa, kuti arege kubva kwaʋari.
Asi wakati kwaʋari: Ndinofanira kuparidzira mamŋe maguta ʋo Evaŋgeri yoʋushe bgaMŋari; nokuti ndiɀo ɀandakatumirwa.
Akasiparidza mumasinagoge eGarirea.
Ɀino, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋacimumanikidza kuti ʋanzwe shoko raMŋari, iye amire paguŋgwa reGenesareta,
akaʋona magwa maʋiri ari paguŋgwa, asi ʋaɓati
Akapinda munerimŋe igwa, raiʋa raSimoni, akakumbira kwaari kuti abve pamhenderekedzo paɗuku
Wakati apedza kutaura, akati kunaSimoni: Pindai kwakadzika, mukande ʋutaʋa bgenyu, kuti muɓate.
Simoni akapindura, akati: Tenzi, takatambura ʋusiku bgose, tisiŋgaɓati cinhu; asi ɀamaɗaro imi, ndicakanda ʋutaʋa.
Ʋakati ʋaita iɀoɀo, ʋakakomba hoʋe zhinji; ʋutaʋa bgaʋo bgukabvaruka.
Ʋakaninira shamŋari dzaʋo munerimŋe igwa, kuti ʋaʋuye kuzoʋaɓatsira. Ʋakaʋuya, ʋakazadza magwa ose ari maʋiri, akaŋga onyura.
Ɀino, Simoni Petro wakati aciɀiʋona, akaɀiwisira pasi pamabvi aJesu, akati: Ishe, ibvai kwandiri, nokuti ndiri mutadzi.
Nokuti wakaŋga ashamiswa iye, naʋose ʋaakaŋga anaʋo nokuwanda kwehoʋe dzaʋakaŋga ʋaɓata.
Ndiɀo ɀaŋga ɀaita ʋo Jakobo naJohane, ʋanakomana ʋaZebedi, ʋaiʋa shamŋari dzaSimoni. Ipapo Jesu akati kunaSimoni: Usatya, kubva ɀino ucaɓata ʋanhu.
Ɀino, ʋakati ʋaisa magwa kunyika, ʋakasiya ɀose ʋakamuteʋera.
Wakati ari kunerimŋe guta, tarira,
Ipapo akatambanudza ruʋoko, akamuɓata, aciti: Ndinoɗa, cinatswa! Pakarepo maperembudzi akabva kwaari.
Akamuraira kuti asaʋudza munhu,
Asi mukurumbira
Asi iye wakaenda mumarenje, akandonyeŋgetera.
Nerimŋe ramazuʋa iwayo wakaŋga acidzidzisa; ʋaFarise naʋadzidzisi ʋomurairo ʋakaŋga ʋagere’po, ʋaibva kumisha yose yeGarirea neJudea neJerusarema; simba raShe rokuporesa rakaŋga rinaye.
Ɀino, tarira,
Ɀino, ʋakati ʋacishaiwa paʋaŋgamupinza napo, nokuɗa kwaʋazhinji, ʋakakwira pamsoro peimba, ʋakamuɓurusira mukati nenhoʋo
Iye akati aciʋona kutenda kwaʋo, akati: Murume, wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako.
Ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakataŋga kufuŋga, ʋaciti: Ndianiko uyu unotaura acimhura
Ɀino Jesu, ɀaaiziʋa mifuŋgo yaʋo, akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Munofuŋgeiko mumŋoyo yenyu?
Cinyiko cakareruka, kuti: Wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako, kana kuti: Simuka, ufambe?
Asi kuti muziʋe kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unesimba panyika rokukaŋganwira ɀiʋi, (akati kunowakafa mitezo:) Ndinoti kwauri: Simuka, utore nhoʋo yako, uende kumba kwako.
Akasimuka pakarepo pamberi paʋo, akatora caakaŋga aʋete pamsoro paco, akaenda kumba kwake, acirumbidza Mŋari.
Ʋakashamiswa ʋose, ʋakarumbidza Mŋari, ʋakatya kwaɀo, ʋaciti: Taʋona maɗambi nhasi!
Shure kwaiɀoɀo, wakaɓuɗa, akaʋona muteresi, wainzi Revi, agere panotereswa, akati kwaari: Nditeʋere!
Iye akasiya ɀose, akasimuka, akamuteʋera.
Revi akamuitira mutambo mukuru mumba make; kukaʋa’po ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋaʋateresi naʋamŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋagere naʋo pakudya.
ƲaFarise naʋanyori ʋaʋo ʋakanyunyutira ʋadzidzi ʋake, ʋaciti: Munodyireiko naʋateresi naʋatadzi, nokunwa naʋo?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Ʋasiŋgarwari haʋatȿaki ŋaŋga, asi ʋanorwara.
Handina‐kuʋuya kuzoɗana ʋakarurama, asi ʋatadzi, kuti ʋatendeʋuke.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ʋadzidzi ʋaJohane ʋanoɀinyima ɀokudya kazhinji, ʋacikumbira; naʋaʋaFarise ʋanoɗaro ʋo, asi ʋenyu ʋanodya nokunwa.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Muŋgadziʋisa shamŋari dzecikomba kudya, cikomba ciri kwaʋari here?
Asi mazuʋa acaȿika; ɀino kana cikomba cazobviswa kwaʋari, ʋacaɀinyima ɀokudya namazuʋa iwayo.
Akataura naʋo nomufananidzo, akati: Hakunomunhu ucabvarura ciremo paŋguʋo itȿa, akaciisa paŋguʋo yakasakara; nokuti ucabvarura
Hakunomunhu ucaɗira waini itȿa muhomboɗo tsaru; nokuti waini itȿa icaparusa homboɗo, ikateʋuka, nehomboɗo dzikafa ʋo;
asi waini itȿa inofanira kuɗirwa muhomboɗo itȿa.
Hakunomunhu unoti kana anwa tsaru, uŋgazoɗa itȿa; nokuti unoti: Tsaru ndiyo yakaiȿo‐naka.
Ɀino nomusi wesaɓata wakafamba napakati peminda yeɀiyo; ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakatanha hura, ʋakadya, ʋacidzipukuta namaʋoko.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaʋaFarise ʋakati kwaʋari: Munoitireiko ɀisina‐kutenderwa kuitwa nomusi wesaɓata?
Jesu akaʋapindura, akati: Ko hamuna‐kuraʋa here ɀakaitwa naDavidi, musi waakaŋga aziya,
kuti wakapinda mumba maMŋari, akatora ɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza, aka
Akati kwaʋari: Mŋanakomana womunhu ndiye Ishe wesaɓata ʋo.
Ɀino neimŋe saɓata wakapinda musinagoge, akadzidzisa; ɀino kwakaŋga kunomunhu ipapo wakaŋga anoruʋoko rworudyi rwakawonyana.
Ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakamutarisisa,
Asi iye wakaziʋa mifuŋgo yaʋo, akati kumunhu wakaŋga anoruʋoko rwakawonyana: Simuka, umire pakati
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ndino
Ipapo akariŋga‐riŋga aciʋatarira ʋose, akati kwaari: Tambanudza ruʋoko rwako. Akaɗaro, ruʋoko rwake rukaʋandudzwa.
Ɀino ʋakatsamŋa kwaɀo, ʋakaraŋgana ʋose kuti Jesu ʋaŋgamuitei.
Namazuʋa iwayo wakaɓuɗira kugomo kundonyeŋgetera, akapedza ʋusiku bgose pakunyeŋgetera kunaMŋari.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, akaɗana ʋadzidzi ʋake; akasanaŋgura kwaʋari ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, ʋaakatumidza zita rokuti ʋaapostora;
Simoni, waakatumidza ʋo Petro, naAndrea, munuŋuna wake, naJakobo, naJohane, naFiripo, naBartoromeo,
naMateo, naTomasi, naJakobo
naJudasi
Akaɓuruka naʋo, akamira pakati cecetere, naʋadzidzi ʋake ʋazhinji, naʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji, ʋaibva Judea rose neJerusarema, napamhenderekedzo yeguŋgwa reTire neSidoni,
ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kuzomunzwa, nokuporeswa hosha dzaʋo. Naʋakaŋga ʋacitambudzika nemŋeya yetȿina ʋakaporeswa.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakatȿaka kumunyaŋgata, nokuti simba rakaɓuɗa kwaari rikaʋaporesa ʋose.
Ɀino wakatarisisa ʋadzidzi ʋake, akati: Makaropafadzwa imi ʋarombo, nokuti ʋushe bgaMŋari ndobgenyu.
Makaropafadzwa imi munenzara ɀino, nokuti mucagutiswa. Makaropafadzwa imi munocema ɀino, nokuti mucaseka.
Makaropafadzwa, kana ʋanhu ʋacikuʋeŋgai, ʋacikudziŋgai, ʋacikuɀidzai, ʋacirasha zita renyu se
Farai nezuʋa iro, mupembere, nokuti tarirai, muɓairo wenyu kuɗeŋga mukuru; nokuti madziɓaɓa aʋo akaitira ʋaprofita ɀakaɗaro.
Asi munenhamo imi ʋafumi, nokuti mapiwa kunyaradzwa kwenyu.
Munenhamo imi makaguta ɀino, nokuti mucaʋa nenzara. Munenhamo imi munoseka ɀino, nokuti mucacema nokurira.
Munenhamo kana ʋanhu ʋose ʋacitaura ɀakanaka pamsoro penyu, nokuti madziɓaɓa aʋo akaitira ʋaprofita ʋenhema ɀakaɗaro.
Asi ndinoti kwamuri imi munonzwa: Iɗai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu; muitire ɀakanaka ʋanokuʋeŋgai.
Ropafadzai ʋanokutukai, munyeŋgeterere ʋanokumhurai.
Unokuroʋa paɗama, umurinzire rimŋe ʋo; unokutorera ŋguʋo yokunze, usamuramba neŋguʋo yomukati ʋo.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unokumbira kwauri, umupe; nounokutorera ɀako, usaɀikumbira ɀe kwaari.
Seɀamunoɗa kuti ʋanhu ʋakuitirei, muʋaitire ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Kana muciŋgoɗa aʋo ʋanokuɗai, munokuʋoŋgwa kwakaɗiniko? Nokuti naʋatadzi ʋo ʋanoɗa ʋanoʋaɗa.
Kana muciŋgoitira ɀakanaka aʋo ʋanokuitirai ɀakanaka, munokuʋoŋgwa kwakaɗiniko? Nokuti naʋatadzi ʋanoɗaro ʋo.
Kana muciŋgopa iʋo cikwerete, ʋamunoti mucadzoserwa ɀe naʋo, munokuʋoŋgwa kwakaɗiniko? Nokuti naʋatadzi ʋanopa ʋo ʋatadzi cikwerete, kuti ʋapiwe ɀe ɀakaenzana
Asi iɗai ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu, muʋaitire ɀakanaka. Mupe cikwerete musiŋgaʋori mŋoyo; muɓairo wenyu ucaʋa mukuru, mugoʋa ʋanakomana ʋoWokumsoro‐soro; nokuti iye unomŋoyo munyoro kunaʋasiŋgaʋoŋgi naʋakaipa.
Iʋai netsitsi, saƂaɓa ʋenyu ʋanetsitsi ʋo.
Musatoŋga, nemi hamuŋgazotoŋgwi; musapa mhaka, nemi hamuŋgazopiwi mhaka; sunuŋgurai, nemi mucasunuŋgurwa ʋo.
Ipai, nemi mucapiwa; ʋacakupai pamaʋoko enyu ciyero cakanaka, cakatsikirirwa, cakazuŋguzirwa, cakaita mupfuŋga; nokuti neciyero camunoyera naco, mucayerwa ʋo naco.
Wakaʋaʋudza ʋo mufananidzo,
Mudzidzi haapfuʋuri mudzidzisi wake. Asi mumŋe nomumŋe, kana akwaniswa, ucaʋa somudzidzisi wake.
Unotarireiko ruɓanzu ruri muziso rehama yako, iɀo, ɗanda riri muziso rako hauriʋoni?
Kana uŋgareʋa seiko kuhama yako,
Nokuti hakunomuti wakanaka unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀakaipa, kana muti wakaipa unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀakanaka;
nokuti muti mumŋe nomumŋe unozikanwa neɀiɓereko ɀawo. Nokuti ʋanhu haʋatanhi maʋonde paminzwa, kana mazambiriŋga haatanhwi parukato.
Munhu wakanaka unoɓuɗisa ɀakanaka pafuma yakanaka yomŋoyo wake; wakaipa unoɓuɗisa ɀakaipa
Munondiidzireiko Ishe! Ishe! musiŋgaiti ɀandinoreʋa?
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoʋuya kwandiri, akanzwa mashoko aŋgu, akaaita, ndicakuratidzai waakafanana naye.
Wakafanana nomunhu wakaʋaka imba, akacera, akadzikisa, akaiteya paruware; mvura zhinji ikaʋuya, mvura ikaroʋa imba iyo, ikasagona kuizunuŋgusa, nokuti yakaŋga yakaʋakwa kwaɀo.
Asi unonzwa, asiŋgaiti, wakafanana nomunhu wakaʋaka imba pavu, isinenheyo; mvura yakati iciiroʋa, ikawa pakarepo, kuputsika kweimba iyo kukaʋa kukuru.
Ɀino wakati apedzisa mashoko ake ose, ʋanhu ʋacianzwa, akapinda Kapernaume.
Muranda womumŋe mukuru wezana waiɗikanwa naye, wakaŋga acirwara, acitandadza.
Ɀino wakati anzwa ɀaJesu, akatuma ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda kwaari acikumbira kuti aʋuye kuzoporesa muranda wake.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋaciȿika kunaJesu, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, ʋaciti: Iye wakafanira kuti mumuitire iɀoɀo;
nokuti unoɗa rudzi rweɗu, ndiye wakatiʋakira sinagoge reɗu.
Jesu akaenda naʋo. Ɀino aʋa pedyo neimba, mukuru wezana akatuma shamŋari
naiɀoɀo ndakati handifaniri kuʋuya kwamuri; asi taurai henyu shoko, muranda waŋgu ucapora.
Nokuti neni ʋo ndiri munhu wakaiswa pasi paʋamŋe, ndinaʋarwi pasi paŋgu; kana ndikati kunomumŋe: Enda! unoenda; kunomumŋe: Ʋuya! unoʋuya; nokumuranda waŋgu: Ita cici, unoita.
Jesu wakati acinzwa iɀoɀo, akashamiswa naye, akatendeʋuka, akati kuʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋacimuteʋera: Ndinoti kwamuri: Handina‐kumboʋona kutenda kwakaɗai, kunyaŋge napakati paʋaIsraeri.
Ʋakaŋga ʋatumŋa ʋacidzokera kumba, ʋakandowana muranda apora.
Ɀino nezuʋa rinoteʋera, wakaenda kuguta rainzi Naini; ʋadzidzi ʋake naʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakaenda naye.
Ɀino, wakati acisweɗera pedyo nesuʋo reguta, akaʋona ʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋakatakura wakafa, mŋanakomana mumŋe woga wamai ʋake, yaiʋa cirikadzi; naʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋeguta ʋakaŋga ʋanaye.
Ɀino Ishe wakati acimuʋona, akamunzwira tsitsi, akati kwaari: Usacema.
Ipapo akasweɗera, akaɓata bganyanza; ʋakaŋga ʋacitakura ʋakamira. Akati: Jaya, ndinoti kwauri: Muka.
Iye wakaŋga afa akagara, akataŋga kutaura; akamupa mai ʋake.
Ʋakaɓatwa ʋose nokutya; ʋakarumbidza Mŋari, ʋaciti: Muprofita mukuru wakamuka pakati peɗu; ʋuye ɀe: Mŋari wakashanyira ʋanhu ʋake.
Shoko iri pamsoro pake rikanzwika muJudea rose nenyika yose yakapoteredza.
Ʋadzidzi ʋaJohane ʋakamuʋudza iɀoɀo ɀose.
Johane akaɗana ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋaʋiri, akaʋatuma kunaShe neshoko rokuti: Ko ndimi iye wakaŋga acinzi unoʋuya here, kana ticakatarira mumŋe?
Ɀino ʋarume ʋaciȿika kwaari, ʋakati: Johane Mubapatidzi wakatitumira kwamuri neshoko rokuti: Ko ndimi iye wakaŋga acinzi unoʋuya here, kana ticakatarira mumŋe?
Neŋguʋa iyo akaporesa ʋazhinji hosha
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Endai, mundoʋudza Johane ɀamakaʋona neɀamakanzwa;
Wakaropafadzwa usiŋgagumbuswi neni.
Nhume dzaJohane dzakati dzabva, akataŋga kuʋudza ʋanhu ʋazhinji pamsoro paJohane,
Asi makaŋga maɓuɗa kundoʋoneiko? Munhu wakapfeka ŋguʋo nyoro here? Tarirai, ʋaneŋguʋo dzinobginya, naʋanogara ɀinonaka, ʋari mudzimba dzamadzimambo.
Asi makaŋga maɓuɗa kundoʋoneiko? Muprofita here? Hoŋo, ndinoti kwamuri: Unopfuʋura ɀikuru muprofita.
Uyu ndiye wakanyorwa pamsoro pake,
Tarira, ndinotuma munyai waŋgu pamberi pako,
Ucakugadzirira nzira yako pamberi pako.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Kunaʋakaɓerekwa naʋakadzi, hakunomukuru kunaJohane Mubapatidzi; asi muɗuku muʋushe bgaMŋari mukuru kwaari.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋose naʋateresi ʋakati ʋaci
Asi ʋaFarise naʋaɗudziri ʋomurairo ʋakaramba kufuŋga kwaMŋari pamsoro paʋo, ʋakasabapatidzwa naye.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanhu ʋorudzi urwu ndicaʋafananidza neiko? Ʋakafanana nei?
Ʋakafanana naʋana ʋagere paɗare, ʋanoɗanidzirana, ʋaciti: Takakuridzirai nyere, mukasatamba; takakuririrai, mukasacema.
Nokuti Johane Mubapatidzi wakaʋuya, asiŋgadyi ciŋgwa, asiŋganwi waini,
Mŋanakomana womunhu wakaʋuya acidya, acinwa,
Asi ʋucenjeri bgunoruramiswa naʋana ʋabgo ʋose.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋaFarise wakakumbira kuti adye naye. Akapinda mumba momuFarise uyo, akagara pakudya.
Ɀino tarira, muguta iro makaŋga munomukadzi waiʋa mutadzi; iye wakati anzwa kuti ugere pakudya mumba momuFarise, akaʋuya necinu cearbastera caiʋa necizoro,
akamira patsoka dzake mashure
Ɀino muFarise wakaŋga amuɗana, wakati aciɀiʋona, akareʋa mumŋoyo make, aciti: Munhu uyu, ɗai aiʋa muprofita, uŋgaɗai aiziʋa mukadzi uyu unomuɓata kuti ndiani, ʋuye kuti wakaɗini, nokuti mutadzi.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Simoni ndineshoko newe. Akati: Reʋai henyu, Mudzidzisi.
Ʋanhu ʋaʋiri ʋakaŋga ʋanecikwerete kumunhu mumŋe; mumŋe wakaŋga anecikwerete camadenari anamazana mashanu,
Ʋakati ʋashaiwa cokuripa naco, akaŋgoʋakaŋganwira ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri. Ɀino ndoupiko kwaʋari ucanyanya kumuɗa?
Simoni akapindura, akati: Handiti ndiye wakakaŋganwirwa ɀizhinji here? Akati kwaari: Wareʋa kwaɀo.

Ɀino akatendeʋukira kumukadzi, akati kunaSimoni: Unoʋona mukadzi uyu here? Ndakapinda mumba mako, ukasandipa mvura yetsoka dzaŋgu; asi uyu wakanyoroʋesa tsoka dzaŋgu nemisodzi yake, akadzipisika nevudzi rake.
Hauna‐kundiȿeta, asi uyu ciŋguri candapinda, naana‐kurega kuseta tsoka dzaŋgu.
Hauna‐kundizodza musoro waŋgu namafuta, asi uyu wakazodza tsoka dzaŋgu necizoro.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoti kwauri: Ɀiʋi ɀake, ɀiya ɀizhinji, waɀikaŋganwirwa, nokuti wakaɗa ɀikuru; asi unokaŋganwirwa ɀishoma, unoɗa ɀishoma.
Ɀino akati kwaari: Wakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi ɀako.
Ʋakaŋga ʋagere naye pakudya ʋakataŋga kureʋa mumŋoyo yaʋo,
Akati kumukadzi: Kutenda kwako kwakuraramisa; enda hako norugare.
Ɀino shure kwaiɀoɀo, wakapota nokumaguta nemisha, aciparidza nokureʋa ɀeEvaŋgeri yoʋushe bgaMŋari, ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋanaye.
Naʋamŋe ʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋaporeswa pamŋeya yakaipa napamarwere,
naJohana, mukadzi waKuza, mutariri waHerode, naSusana, naʋamŋe ʋazhinji, ʋaimushumira neɀaʋo.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana, naʋakaŋga ʋabva kumaguta ose ʋaȿika kwaari, akataura nomufananidzo,
Mukushi wakaɓuɗa kundokusha mbeu dzake; wakati acikusha, dzimŋe
Dzimŋe dzakawira paruware; dzikamera, dzikawoma, nokushaiwa mŋando.
Dzimŋe dzakawira pakati peminzwa; minzwa ikakura pamŋe cete nadzo, ikadzivuŋga.
Dzimŋe dzakawira muvu rakanaka, dzikamera, dzikaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀinezana. Akati ataura iɀoɀo, akaɗanidzira,
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamubvunza, kuti mufananidzo uyo waireʋei.
Akati: Imi makapiwa kuziʋa ɀakaʋanzika ɀoʋushe bgaMŋari; asi ʋamŋe
Ɀino mufananidzo ndiwo: Mbeu ishoko raMŋari.
Aʋo ʋapanzira ndiʋo ʋakanzwa; ɀino Diaborosi unoʋuya, akabvisa shoko pamŋoyo yaʋo, kuti ʋarege kutenda, ʋakaponeswa.
Aʋo ʋaparuware ndiʋo ʋanoti kana ʋanzwa shoko, ʋanorigamucira nomufaro; haʋanomudzi, ʋanoŋgotenda ŋguʋa ɗuku; neŋguʋa yokuidzwa ʋanotsauka.
Dzakawira pakati peminzwa ndiʋo ʋakanzwa; ɀino ʋanoenda, ʋakavuŋgiwa nokufuŋganya nefuma, neɀinofadza ɀoʋupenyu
Asi dzomuvu rakanaka, ndiʋo ʋakanzwa shoko mumŋoyo wakarurama nowakanaka, ʋanoriceŋgeta, ʋaciɓereka ɀiɓereko nokutsuŋgirira.
Hakunomunhu, unoti kana atuŋgidza mŋenje, unozoufukidzira nomudziyo, kana kuuisa pasi pomubeda; asi unouisa pacigadziko, kuti ʋanopinda ʋaʋone ciedza.
Nokuti hakuna‐cakaʋanzika, cisiŋgazoʋoneswi, hakuna‐cakaʋigwa, cisiŋgazozikanwi, nokuɓuɗa pacena.
Naiɀoɀo, cenjerai mutoʋo wamunonzwa nawo; nokuti unaɀo, ucapiwa; usina, ucatorerwa naiceco ʋo caanoti ndinaco.
Ɀino mai ʋake naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakasagona kuȿika kwaari nemhaka yaʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Akaʋudzwa,
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Mai ʋaŋgu naʋanuŋuna ʋaŋgu ndiʋo ʋanonzwa shoko raMŋari ʋaciriita.
Ɀino nerimŋe ramazuʋa
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacienda, iye akaʋata; ɗutu guru remhepo rikaʋuya paguŋgwa; ʋakataŋga kuzarirwa
Ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakamumutsa, ʋaciti: Tenzi! Tenzi! tofa! Ipapo akamuka, akaraira mhepo namafuŋgu emvura; ɀikaguma, kukadzikama.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Kutenda kwenyu kuripiko? Ʋakatya nokushamiswa, ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Ndianiko uyu, ɀaanoraira kunyaŋge nemhepo nemvura, ɀicimuterera?
Ɀino ʋakaȿika kunyika yaʋaGerasa, yakatarisana neGarirea.
Wakati aciɓuɗa
Ɀino iye wakati aciʋona Jesu, akaɗanidzira, ndokuɀiwisira pamberi pake, akati nenzwi guru: Ndinemhaka yeiko nemi Jesu, Mŋanakomana woWokumsoro‐soro? Ndinokumbira kwamuri kuti musanditambudza.
Nokuti wakaraira mŋeya wetȿina kuti uɓuɗe kumunhu. Nokuti kazhinji wakaŋga waɓatwa nawo; akasuŋgwa neɀisuŋgo namaketani akarindiwa; akaɗambura ɀisuŋgo, akadziŋgirwa kumarenje nomŋeya wakaipa.
Jesu akamubvunza,
Ikakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, kuti arege kuiraira kuti iende kwakadzika‐dzika.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kuri’po ɓoka guru reŋguruʋe zhinji, raifura mugomo; ikakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, kuti aitendere kupinda madziri; akaitendera.
Mŋeya yakaipa ikaɓuɗa kumunhu, ikapinda muŋguruʋe; ipapo ɓoka rakamhanyira kumawere kuguŋgwa, rikaɓitirirwa.
Ʋaidzifudza ʋakati ʋaʋona ɀaitwa, ʋakatiza, ʋakandoʋudza iɀoɀo muguta naparuwa.
Ʋakaɓuɗa kundoʋona ɀaitwa; ʋakasika kunaJesu, ʋakandowana munhu, makaŋga maɓuɗa mŋeya yakaipa maari, agere patsoka dzaJesu, apfeka, aʋa munhu kwaye; ʋakatya.
Ʋakaŋga ʋaɀiʋona ʋakaʋaʋudza mutoʋo waakaporeswa nawo, iye waiʋa nemŋeya yakaipa.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋenyika yakapoteredza yaʋaGerasa ʋakakumbira kwaari kuti abve kwaʋari, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaɓatwa nokutya kukuru. Akapinda mugwa, akadzoka.
Asi munhu uyo, makaŋga maɓuɗa mŋeya yakaipa maari, wakakumbira kwaari kuti agare naye. Asi wakamudzosa, aciti:
Dzokera kumba kwako, undotaura ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀawaitirwa naMŋari. Akaenda, akandoparidza muguta rose ɀinhu ɀikuru ɀaakaitirwa naJesu.
Ɀino Jesu wakati acidzoka, ʋazhinji ʋakamugamucira; nokuti ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakamumirira.
Ipapo mumŋe murume, wainzi Jairosi, wakaŋga ari mukuru wesinagoge, wakaʋuya akaɀiwisira patsoka dzaJesu, akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari kuti apinde mumba make.
Nokuti wakaŋga anomukunda mumŋe cete, waiʋa namakore aneŋge gumi namaʋiri, wakaŋga otandadza. Ɀino wakati acienda, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamumanikidza.
Ipapo mumŋe mukadzi, waiʋa
akaʋuya mashure
Jesu akati: Ndianiko wandiɓata? Ɀino ʋose ʋakati ʋaciramba, Petro akati: Tenzi, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanokumanikidzai nokukutsikirirai.
Asi Jesu wakati: Mumŋe wandiɓata, nokuti ndanzwa kuti simba raɓuɗa kwandiri.
Ɀino mukadzi wakati aciʋona kuti haana‐kuʋanzika, akaʋuya, aciɗeɗera, akaɀiwisira pasi pamberi pake, akamuʋudza pamberi paʋose kuti wakaŋga amuɓata nemhaka yei, ʋuye kuti wakaporeswa pakarepo.
Akati kwaari: Mukunda, kutenda kwako kwakuporesa, enda hako norugare.
Wakati acataura, mumŋe akaȿika, acibva
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciɀinzwa, akapindura, akati: Usatya, tenda ɓedzi,
Ɀino wakati aȿika kumba, akasatendera munhu kupinda naye, asi Petro, naJohane, naJakobo, naɓaɓa ʋomusikana, namai.
Ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋacicema, ʋacimuririra. Iye akati: Musacema, haana‐kufa, asi uʋete.
Ʋakamuseka, ʋaciziʋa kuti wafa.
Ɀino iye wakaɓata ruʋoko rwake, akaɗana, aciti: Musikana, muka!
Ipapo mŋeya wake wakadzoka, akamuka pakarepo. Akaraira kuti apiwe ɀokudya.
Ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋakashamiswa, asi wakaʋaraira kuti ʋarege kuʋudza munhu ɀakaitwa.
Ɀino wakaʋuŋganidza ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akaʋapa simba necikuriri pamsoro pemŋeya yakaipa yose, nokuporesa kurwara.
Akaʋatuma kuparidza ʋushe bgaMŋari nokuporesa.
Akati kwaʋari: Musatoŋgotora ɀomunzira, kana muɗonɀo, kana homboɗo, kana ciŋgwa, kana mari; musaʋa neŋguʋo mbiri.
Imba ipi neipi yamunopinda mairi, garai’mo, mugozobva’po.
Ʋuye ʋose ʋasiŋgakugamuciriyi, kana mobva paguta iro, muzuze guruʋa
Ipapo ʋakabva, ʋakapota nemisha, ʋakaparidza Evaŋgeri, nokuporesa panɀimbo dzose.
Ɀino Herode, muɓati, wakanzwa ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiciitwa; akakaŋganiswa, nokuti ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋaciti, Johane wakamuka kuʋakafa;
ʋamŋe kuti Eria waʋonekwa; naʋamŋe ɀe, kuti mumŋe waʋaprofita ʋekare wamuka.
Herode akati: Johane ndakamugura musoro; ɀino ndianiko uyu, wandinonzwa ɀinhu ɀakaɗai pamsoro pake? Akatȿaka kumuʋona.
Ʋaapostora ʋakati ʋadzoka, ʋakamurondedzera ɀose ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaita; akaʋatora, akaenda naʋo ʋari ʋoga kuguta rainzi Betsaida.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaciɀiziʋa, ʋakamuteʋera; akaʋagamucira, akaʋaʋudza ɀoʋushe bgaMŋari, akaporesa ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuporeswa.
Zuʋa rakatiroʋira, ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋakaʋuya, ʋakati kwaari: Endisai ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋaende kumisha nokuruwa rwakapoteredza, ʋagare’ko, ʋawane ɀokudya; nokuti pano tiri murenje.
Asi iye akati kwaʋari: Muʋapei imi, ʋadye. Ʋakati: Isu hatineɀiŋgwa ɀiŋgapfuʋura ɀishanu, nehoʋe mbiri, asi kana tikaenda kundoteŋgera ʋanhu aʋa ʋose ɀokudya.
Nokuti ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀishanu. Akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Ʋagarisei pasi ʋaite mapoka, anaʋanhu ʋaneŋge makumi mashanu.
Ʋakaita kuɗaro, ʋakaʋagarisa ʋose.
Ipapo akatora ɀiŋgwaɀishanu nehoʋe mbiri, akatarira kuɗeŋga, akaʋoŋga, akaɀimeɗura, ndokupa ʋadzidzi kuti ʋaise pamberi paʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Ʋakadya, ʋakaguta ʋose; ʋakaʋuŋganidza ɀimeɗu ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasarirwa naɀo, mateŋgu anegumi namaʋiri.
Ɀino wakati acinyeŋgetera ari oga, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋanaye; akaʋabvunza, aciti: Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋanoti ndini aniko?
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati:
Akati kwaʋari: Ko imi munoti ndini ani? Ipapo Petro akapindura, akati:
Akaʋaʋudza ɀikuru, nokuʋaraira kuti ʋarege kuziʋisa munhu iɀoɀo;
aciti: Mŋanakomana womunhu unofanira kutambudzika ɀizhinji, nokurashwa naʋakuru naʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori, nokuʋurawa, nokumutswa nezuʋa retatu.
Ɀino wakati kunaʋose: Kana munhu aciɗa kuʋuya shure kwaŋgu, ŋgaaɀirambe, asimudze mucinjikwa wake zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, anditeʋere.
Nokuti aninani unoɗa kuponesa ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo; asi unorashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake nokuɗa kwaŋgu, ucabguponesa.
Nokuti munhu ucaɓatsirweiko, kana awana nyika yose, akaɀirasha nokuɀitadzira?
Nokuti aninani unonyara pamsoro paŋgu namashoko aŋgu, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucanyara ʋo pamsoro pake musi waanoʋuya nokubginya kwake nokwaƂaɓa, nokwaʋatumŋa ʋatȿene.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋamŋe ʋari’po kunaʋamire
Mashoko iwayo akati apera kutaurwa mazuʋa aneŋge masere, akatora Petro naJohane naJakobo, akakwira mugomo kundonyeŋgetera.
Ɀino wakati acinyeŋgetera, mugarire weciso cake ukashanduka, ŋguʋo dzake dzikacena dzikapenya.
Ɀino tarira, ʋarume ʋaʋiri, ʋanaMosesi naEria, ʋakaʋonekwa ʋacitaurirana naye.
Ʋakaʋonekwa ʋacibginya, ʋakataura ɀokuenda kwake, kwaakaŋga ondopedzisa paJerusarema.
Ɀino Petro, naʋaiʋa naye, ʋakaŋga ʋaɓatwa nehope; asi ʋakati ʋacipepuka, ʋakaʋona kubginya kwake, naʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋamire naye.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋoparadzana naye, Petro akati kunaJesu: Tenzi, ɀakanaka ɀatiri pano; ŋgatiʋake matumba matatu, rimŋe renyu, rimŋe raMosesi, rimŋe raEria, asiŋgaziʋi ɀaanoreʋa.
Wakati acataura iɀoɀo, gore rikaʋuya, rikaʋafukidza; ʋakatya ʋacipinda mugore.
Ipapo inzwi rakabva mugore, riciti: Uyu Mŋanakomana waŋgu, musanaŋgurwa waŋgu, mumunzwei!
Inzwi rakati raenda, Jesu akaʋonekwa ari oga. Ʋakanyarara, ʋakasaʋudza munhu namazuʋa iwayo cinhu
Nezuʋa rinoteʋera ʋakati ʋaɓuruka mugomo, ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamugamucira.
Ɀino
Tarirai, mŋeya unomuɓata, ɀino woridza mhere pakarepo; unomubvundisa, acipupuma furo; hauɗi kumurega,
Ndakakumbira kuʋadzidzi ʋenyu kuti ʋauɓuɗise, ʋakasagona.
Jesu akapindura, akati: Haiwa! rudzi rusiŋgatendi, rwakatsauka; ndicagara nemi kuȿikira riniko, nokukuitirai mŋoyo murefu? Ʋuya pano nomŋanakomana wako.
Akati acaʋuya, mŋeya wakaipa ukamuwisira pasi, ukamubvundisa ɀikuru. Asi Jesu wakaraira mŋeya wetȿina, akaporesa mŋana, akamudzosera kunaɓaɓa ʋake.
Ʋose ʋakashamiswa noʋukuru bgaMŋari.
Ɀino ʋose ʋacashamiswa neɀose ɀaakaita, akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake:
Mashoko awa ŋgaapinde munzeʋe dzenyu; nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaiswa mumaʋoko aʋanhu.
Asi iʋo haʋana‐kunzwisisa kutaura uku; ʋakaŋga ʋakuʋanzirwa, kuti ʋarege kukunzwisisa; ʋakatya kumubvunza pamsoro pokutaura uku.
Ɀino nharo dzikamuka pakati paʋo, kuti ndiani mukuru kwaʋari.
Asi Jesu, ɀaakaŋga aciziʋa kufuŋga kwemŋoyo yaʋo, akatora mŋana muɗuku, akamuisa parutiʋi rwake,
akati kwaʋari: Aninani unogamucira mŋana uyu muɗuku muzita raŋgu, unondigamucira ini, ʋuye aninani unondigamucira ini, unogamucira wakandituma; nokuti muɗuku kwamuri mose, ndiye mukuru.
Johane akapindura, akati: Tenzi, taʋona munhu aciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa muzita renyu, tikamudziʋisa, nokuti haateʋeri nesu.
Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Musamudziʋisa; nokuti usiŋgapesani nemi, unemi.
Mazuʋa okukwidzwa kwake akati osweɗera, wakaramba akarinzira ciso cake kuenda Jerusarema,
akatuma nhume pamberi pake. Idzo dzikaenda, dzikapinda mumusha waʋaSamaria kundomugadzirira.
haʋana‐kumugamucira, nokuti ciso cake cakaŋga cakariŋgira Jerusarema.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake, Jakobo naJohane, ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakati: Ishe, munoɗa kuti titi mŋoto uɓuruke kuɗeŋga, uʋaparadze here?
Asi iye wakatendeʋuka, akaʋaraira.
Ipapo ʋakaenda kunomumŋe musha.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacifamba munzira, mumŋe munhu akati kwaari: Ndicakuteʋerai pose pamunoenda.
Jesu akati kwaari: Mhuŋgubge dzinemŋena, neshiri dzokuɗeŋga dzinamatendere, asi Mŋanakomana womunhu haana‐paaŋgatsamidza musoro wake.
Akati kunomumŋe: Nditeʋere. Iye akati: Nditenderei henyu ndimbondoʋiga ɓaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Asi iye akati kwaari: Rega, ʋakafa ŋgaʋaʋige ʋakafa ʋaʋo; asi iwe, enda undoparidza ʋushe bgaMŋari.
Mumŋe ɀe akati: Ndicakuteʋerai Ishe, asi munditenderei henyu ndimbondowonekana naʋari mumba maŋgu.
Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Hakunomunhu uŋgati kana aisa ruʋoko rwake paɓadza, akaceukira shure, uŋgafanirwa noʋushe bgaMŋari.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Ishe wakagadza ɀe ʋamŋe ʋanamakumi manomŋe, akaʋatuma ʋaʋiri ʋaʋiri pamberi pake mumaguta ose, ʋuye kwose kwaakaŋga aciɗa kuenda.
Akati kwaʋari: Kuceka kukuru, asi ʋaɓati ʋashoma; naiɀoɀo kumbirai kunaShe wokuceka kuti aɓuɗise ʋaɓati pakuceka kwake.
Fambai henyu; tarirai, ndinokutumai samakwaiana pakati pamapere.
Musatora cikwama, kana homboɗo, kana shaŋgu; musakwazisa munhu panzira.
Paimba ipi neipi yamunopinda, mutaŋge kuti: Rugare
Kana munhu worugare aneŋge ari’po, rugare rwenyu rucazorora pamsoro pake; kana kusina, rucadzokera kwamuri.
Garai muimba iyo, mucidya nokunwa ɀaʋanaɀo; nokuti muɓati wakafanirwa nomuɓairo wake; musapota‐pota nedzimba.
Paguta ripi neripi, pamunopinda, kana ʋakakugamucirai, idyai ɀamunopakurirwa.
Poresai ʋarwere ʋari’mo, muciti kwaʋari: Ʋushe bgaMŋari bgasweɗera kwamuri.
Asi guta ripi neripi pamunopinda, kana ʋasiŋgakugamuciriyi, ɓuɗirai munzira dzaro, muti:
Kunyaŋge neguruʋa reguta renyu rakanamatira tsoka dzeɗu, tinorikuhumurira kwamuri; asi muziʋe
Ndinoti kwamuri: Sodoma ricarerukirwa nezuʋa iro kupfuʋura guta iro.
Unenhamo, iwe Korazeni! Unenhamo, iwe Betsaida! Nokuti maɓasa esimba akaitwa mukati menyu, ɗai akaitwa muTire neSidoni, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋatendeʋuka kare, ʋakagara ʋanamasaga neɗota.
Asi Tire neSidoni acarerukirwa pakutoŋgwa kupfuʋuremi.
Newe Kapernaume, ucasimudzirwa kuɗeŋga here? Ucaɓurukira kuHadesi.
Unokunzwai imi, unondinzwa ini; unokurambai imi, unondiramba ini; unondiramba ini, unoramba iye wakandituma.
Ʋanamakumi manomŋe ʋakadzoka nomufaro, ʋaciti: Ishe, kunyaŋge nemŋeya yakaipa inoɀiisa pasi peɗu muzita renyu.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndakaʋona Satani aciwa kuɗeŋga semheni.
Tarirai, ndakakupai simba rokutsika pamsoro penyoka neɀinyaʋaɗa, napamsoro pesimba rose romuʋeŋgi; hakunecinhu ciŋgatoŋgokukuʋadzai.
Asi, musafara ɓedzi necinhu ici, kuti mŋeya inoɀiisa pasi penyu; asi mufare kuti mazita enyu akanyorwa kuɗeŋga.

Neŋguʋa iyo wakafara noMŋeya Mutȿene, akati: Ndinokuʋoŋgai Ƃaɓa, Ishe wokuɗeŋga napasi, kuti makaʋanzira ʋakacenjera naʋakaŋgwara ɀinhu iɀi, mukaɀizarurira ʋacece. Hoŋo Ƃaɓa, nokuti ndiɀo ɀakakufadzai.
Ɀinhu ɀose ndakaɀipiwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu; hakuna‐unoziʋa kuti Mŋanakomana ndiani, asi Ƃaɓa, ʋuye kuti Ƃaɓa ndiani, asi Mŋanakomana, naiye Mŋanakomana waaneŋge aciɗa kumuzarurira iye.
Ipapo akatendeʋukira kuʋadzidzi ʋake, akati kwaʋari, ʋari ʋoga: Meso, anoʋona ɀamunoʋona, akaropafadzwa.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋaprofita ʋazhinji namadzimambo ʋaiɗa kuʋona ɀamunoʋona, ʋakasaɀiʋona, nokunzwa ɀamunonzwa, ʋakasaɀinzwa.
Ɀino mumŋe muɗudziri womurairo wakasimuka, akamuidza, aciti: Mudzidzisi, ndiŋgaiteiko kuti ndigare nhaka yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi?
Akati kwaari: Pamurairo pakanyorweiko? Unoraʋa sei?
Iye akapindura, akati: Iɗa Ishe, Mŋari wako, nomŋoyo wako wose, nomŋeya wako wose, nesimba rako rose, nokufuŋga kwako kwose, nowokwako seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe.
Akati kwaari: Wapindura ɀakanaka; ita iɀoɀo, ugorarama.
Asi iye, aciɗa kuɀiruramisa, akati kunaJesu: Wokwaŋgu ndianiko?
Jesu akapindura, akati: Mumŋe munhu wakabva Jerusarema, akaɓurukira Jeriko; akawirwa namakororo, akamupamba ŋguʋo, akamuroʋa, akaenda, ndokumusiya oɗa kufa.
Ɀino mumŋe muprista wakaŋga aciŋgoɓuruka hake nenzira iyo; akati acimuʋona, akanyenyeredza.
Nokuɗaro muRevi ʋo wakaȿika’po, aka
Ɀino mumŋe muSamaria, wakaŋga ari parwendo, wakaȿika kwaari; akati acimuʋona, akamunzwira tsitsi,
akaenda
Ɀino, aʋa maŋgwana, akaɓuɗisa madenari maʋiri,
Unofuŋgei, ndoupiko kunaʋatatu aʋa wakaŋga ari wokwake waiye wakawirwa namakororo?
Akati: Ndiye wakamuitira ŋgoni. Jesu akati kwaari: Enda, undoita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacifamba, akapinda munomumŋe musha; mumŋe mukadzi wainzi Marta, akamugamucira mumba make.
Iye wakaŋga anomunuŋuna wainzi Maria, wakagara ʋo pamakumbo aJesu, akanzwa shoko rake.
Asi Marta wakaŋga acitambudzika nokushanda ɀikuru, akaʋuya, akati: Ishe, hamunehanya
Ishe akapindura, akati kwaari: Marta! Marta! unofuŋganya, nokuɀitambudza neɀinhu ɀizhinji,
asi cinhu cimŋe cinoɗikanwa; nokuti Maria wakasanaŋgura mugoʋe wakanaka, waasiŋgazotorerwi.
Ɀino wakati acinyeŋgetera paneimŋe nɀimbo, apedza, mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake akati kwaari: Ishe, tidzidzisei kunyeŋgetera, Johane seɀaakadzidzisa ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋo.
Akati kwaʋari: Kana mucinyeŋgetera, muti: Ƃaɓa, zita renyu ŋgarikudzwe noʋutȿene; ʋushe bgenyu ŋgabguʋuye;
mutipei zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ɀokudya ɀeɗu ɀinotiriŋgana;
mutikaŋganwirei ɀiʋi ɀeɗu, nokuti nesu tinokaŋganwira ʋose ʋanemhoȿa nesu; musatiisa pakuidzwa.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndianiko kwamuri uŋgaʋa neshamŋari, akaenda kwaari pakati poʋusiku, akati kwaari: Shamŋari, ndipose ʋo ɀiŋgwa ɀitatu;
nokuti shamŋari yaŋgu iri parwendo yakaȿika kwandiri, ɀino handina‐candiŋgamupakurira.
Uri mukati akapindura, akati: Usandinetsa; mukoʋa watopfigwa, naʋana ʋaŋgu ʋaʋa neni panhoʋo; handiŋgamuki ndikakupa.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyaŋge asiŋgamuki akamupa, nokuɗa kwokuti ishamŋari yake, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, nokuɗa kwokutsuŋgirira kwake, ucamuka, akamupa ɀose ɀaanoshaiwa.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Kumbirai, mucapiwa; tȿakai, mucawana; gogodzai, mucazarurirwa.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unokumbira, unopiwa; unotȿaka, unowana; nounogogodza, unozarurirwa.
Ndaʋapiko ɓaɓa pakati penyu, kana mŋanakomana acikumbira ciŋgwa, ʋaŋgamupa ibge here? Kana hoʋe, ʋaŋgamupa nyoka panɀimbo yehoʋe here?
Kana akakumbira zai, ʋaŋgamupa cinyaʋaɗa here?
Naiɀoɀo kana imi makaipa muciziʋa kupa ʋana ʋenyu ɀipo ɀakanaka, Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋari kuɗeŋga ʋacapa ɀikuru sei Mŋeya Mutȿene ʋanokumbira kwaari.
Ɀino wakaŋga aciɓuɗisa mŋeya wakaipa, waiʋa mbeʋeʋe; mŋeya wakaipa ukati wabva, mbeʋeʋe ikataura, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakashamiswa.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakati: Unoɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa naBeerzeburi, mukuru wemŋeya yakaipa.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakamuidza, ʋakakumbira ciratidzo kwaari cinobva kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino iye wakati aciziʋa kufuŋga kwaʋo, akati kwaʋari: Ʋushe bgumŋe nobgumŋe bgunoɀipesanisa, bgunoparadzwa; neimba
NaSatani, kana aciɀipesanisa, ʋushe bgake bguŋgamira seiko, ɀamunoti, ndinoɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa naBeerzeburi?
Kana ini ndiciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa naBeerzeburi, ko ʋanakomana ʋenyu ʋanoiɓuɗisa nani? Naiɀoɀo iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋatoŋgi ʋenyu.
Asi kana ndiciɓuɗisa mŋeya yakaipa nomunwe waMŋari, ipapo ʋushe bgaMŋari bgaȿika kwamuri.
Kana
Asi kana
Usi neni, unopesana neni, nousiŋgaʋuŋganidzi neni, unoparadza.
Mŋeya wetȿina kana waɓuɗa kumunhu, unopota nenɀimbo dzakawoma, ucitȿaka zororo; kana ukashaiwa, unoti: Ndicadzokera kumba kwaŋgu kwandaɓuɗa.
Kana waȿika, unoiwana yatȿairwa, yanatswa.
Ipapo unoenda, ndokundotora mimŋe mŋeya minomŋe inoukunda nokuipa, ndokupinda, ndokugara’mo; kuguma kwomunhu uyo kwakaipa kupfuʋura kutaŋga
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, mumŋe mukadzi pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji akaɗanidzira, akati kwaari: Rakaropafadzwa ɗumbu rakakutakurai, namazamu amakamŋa.
Asi iye akati: Hoŋo, ɀikuru ʋakaropafadzwa ʋanonzwa shoko raMŋari, ʋaciriceŋgeta.
Ɀino ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋaciʋuŋganira kwaari, akataŋga kuti: Rudzi urwu, rudzi rwakaipa; runotȿaka ciratidzo, asi haruŋgapiwi ciratidzo, asi ciratidzo caJona.
Nokuti Jona seɀaakaŋga ari ciratidzo kunaʋaNinivi, ndiɀo ɀicaita ʋo Mŋanakomana womunhu kurudzi urwu.
Mambokadzi weZasi ucasimuka pakutoŋgwa naʋarume ʋorudzi urwu, akaʋapa mhoȿa, nokuti wakabva pamigumo yenyika, kuzonzwa kucenjera kwaSoromoni; tarirai, mukuru kunaSoromoni uri pano.
Ʋarume ʋeNinivi ʋacasimuka pakutoŋgwa norudzi urwu, ʋakarupa mhoȿa, nokuti ʋakatendeʋuka nokuparidza kwaJona; tarirai, mukuru kunaJona uri pano.
Hakunomunhu unoti kana atuŋgidza mŋenje, uŋgauisa pakaʋanda, kana pasi peɗeŋgu, asi pacigadziko, kuti ʋanopinda ʋaʋone ciedza.
Mŋenje womuʋiri iziso rako; kana ziso rako rakanaka, muʋiri wako wose ucavenekerwa; asi kana rakaipa, muʋiri wako wose ucaʋa nerima.
Naiɀoɀo cenjera kuti ciedza ciri mukati mako cirege kuʋa rima.
Ɀino kana muʋiri wako wose wakavenekerwa, pasinarutiʋi runerima, ucavenekerwa wose, somŋenje unokuvenekera nokupenya
Wakati acataura, mumŋe muFarise akakumbira kwaari kuti aȿuȿure naye; akapinda, akagara pakudya.
Ɀino muFarise akashamiswa, aciʋona kuti haana‐kumboshamba asati aȿusura.
Ishe akati kwaari: Ɀino imi ʋaFarise, munosuka kunze kwomukombe nendiro, asi mukati menyu muzere nokukara nokuipa.
Imi mapenzi! Ko uyo wakaita ɀiri kunze, haazi iye wakaita ɀiri mukati ʋo here?
Asi ipai iɀo ɀiri mukati ɀiʋe ɀipo; ipapo tarirai ɀose ɀicaʋa ɀakanaka kwamuri.
Asi munenhamo, imi ʋaFarise, nokuti munopa cegumi ceminte neruyi nemiriʋo yose, mucirega kururamisira
Munenhamo, imi ʋaFarise, nokuti munoɗa ɀigaro ɀapamberi mumasinagoge, nokukwaziswa paɗare.
Munenhamo, imi, nokuti makaita samarinda asiŋgaʋonekwi; ʋanhu ʋanofamba pamsoro pawo, ʋasiŋgaziʋi.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋaɗudziri ʋomurairo wakapindura, akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, kana mucitaura iɀoɀo, munotituka nesu ʋo.
Iye akati: Munenhamo nemi ʋo, ʋaɗudziri ʋomurairo; nokuti munotakudza ʋanhu mitoro inorema, inotambudza kutakura, asi imi mumene hamuɓati mitoro iyo kunyaŋge nomunwe wenyu mumŋe.
Munenhamo, imi, nokuti munoʋaka marinda aʋaprofita ʋakaʋurawa namadziɓaɓa enyu.
Naiɀoɀo muri ɀapupu, mucitenderana ʋo namaɓasa amadziɓaɓa enyu; nokuti iʋo ʋakaʋaʋuraya, nemi munoʋaka
Saka nokucenjera kwaMŋari ʋo kwakati: Ndicatumira kwaʋari ʋaprofita naʋaapostora, ʋacaʋuraya ʋamŋe ʋaʋo, nokuʋatambudza;
kuti
kubva paropa raAberi, kuȿikira paropa raZakaria, wakaʋurawa pakati peartari neImba
Munenhamo, imi ʋadudziri ʋomurairo; nokuti makabvisa kiyi yokuziʋa; hamuna‐kupinda mumene, ʋuye makadziʋisa aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋacipinda.
Wakati acibva’po, ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakataŋga kumumanikidza kwaɀo, nokumubvunzisisa pamsoro peɀimŋe ɀizhinji,
ʋacimurindira, kuti ʋamuɓate
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀizhinji ʋakati ʋaʋuŋganira pamŋe cete kuȿikira ʋotsikirirana, akaʋamba kutaura kuʋa dzidzi ʋake pakutaŋga,
Hakunecinhu cakafukidzwa, cisiŋgazozarurwi; kana cakaʋanzika, cisiŋgazozikanwi.
Saka ɀose ɀamakataura murima, ɀicanzwika muciedza; neɀamakataura munzeʋe mudzimba dzomukati, ɀicaparidzwa pamsoro pedzimba.
Ndinoti kwamuri, hama dzaŋgu: Musatya ʋanoʋuraya muʋiri, ʋasiŋgazogoni kuita cimŋe cinhu shure kwaiɀoɀo.
Asi ndicakuratidzai wamunofanira kutya; mumutyei iye, unoti kana aʋuraya, unesimba
Ko shiri ɗuku shanu hadziteŋgeswi nepeni here? Hakunaimŋe yadzo inokaŋganikwa pamberi paMŋari.
Asi nevudzi romusoro wenyu rakaʋereŋgwa rose. Musatya, munopfuʋura shiri ɗuku zhinji.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe unondipupura pamberi paʋanhu, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucamupupura ʋo pamberi paʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari.
Asi unondiramba pamberi paʋanhu, ucarambga ʋo pamberi paʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoreʋa shoko
Kana ʋacikuisai pamberi pamasinagoge naʋatoŋgi naʋakuru, musafuŋganya kuti mucapindura sei, kana inyiko, kana mucataurei.
Nokuti Mŋeya Mutȿene ucakudzidzisai neŋguʋa iyo ɀamunofanira kutaura.
Ɀino mumŋe pakati paʋazhinji wakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, ʋudzai munuŋuna waŋgu kuti agoʋane nhaka neni.
Iye akati kwaari:
Akati kwaʋari: Cenjerai, muɀiceŋgete pakuciʋa kwose, nokuti ʋupenyu bgomunhu habguzi paɀinhu ɀakawanda ɀaanaɀo.
Akaʋataurira mufananidzo, akati: Nyika yomumŋe mufumi yakaŋga yaɓereka kwaɀo;
akafuŋga mumŋoyo make, akati: Ndicaita seiko? Nokuti handina‐pandiŋgaʋuŋganidzira ɀiɓereko ɀaŋgu.
Akati: Ndicaita kuɗai: Ndicaputsa matura aŋgu, ndikaʋaka makuru; ndicaʋuŋganidzira’po ɀiyo ɀaŋgu, neɀose ɀaŋgu ɀakanaka,
ndigoti kumŋeya waŋgu: Mŋeya, uneɀakawanda ɀakanaka, ɀakaʋigirwa makore mazhinji; zorora, udye, unwe, ufare.
Asi Mŋari akati kwaari: Iwe ɓenzi, noʋusiku ubgu ʋacakutorera mŋeya wako; iɀo ɀawagadzira, ɀicagoʋa ɀani?
Ndiɀo ɀakaita munhu unoɀiʋuŋganidzira fuma, asiŋgafumi kunaMŋari.
Ɀino wakati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Naiɀoɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Musafuŋganya pamsoro poʋupenyu
Nokuti ʋupenyu bgunopfuʋura ɀokudya, nomuʋiri
Fuŋgai makuŋguʋu, kuti haadɀari, haaceki, haanetsapi kana ɗura; asi Mŋari unoapa ɀokudya. Imi munokunda shiri ɀikuru sei!
Ndianiko kwamuri uŋgawedzera kubiti
Ɀino kana imi musiŋgagoni kuita cinhu ciɗuku, munofuŋganyireiko pamsoro peɀimŋe?
Fuŋgai maruʋa, kumera kwawo; haaɓati, haaruki; asi ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyaŋge naSoromoni pakubginya kwake kwose, haana‐kushoŋgedzwa serimŋe rawo.
Ɀino kana Mŋari acipfekedza saiɀoɀo ʋuswa bgenyika, bguri’po nhasi, maŋgwana bgokandirwa mucoto,
Imi musatȿaka ɀamucadya, neɀamucanwa; musaɀidya mŋoyo.
Nokuti ɀinhu iɀoɀi ɀose ɀinotȿakwa naʋahedeni; asi Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋanoziʋa kuti munoshaiwa iɀoɀi.
Asi tȿakai ʋushe bgaʋo, naiɀoɀo ɀose mucaɀiwedzerwa.
Musatya henyu, imi kapoka kaɗuku, nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋenyu ʋanofara nokukupai ʋushe.
Teŋgesai ɀamunaɀo, mupe ɀipo; muɀiitire ɀikwama ɀisiŋgasakari, fuma isiŋgaperi kuɗeŋga, pasiŋgaȿiki mbava, pasiŋgaparadzi ɀipfunho.
Nokuti panefuma yenyu, nomŋoyo wenyu ucaʋa’po ʋo.
Ɀiʋuno ɀenyu ŋgaɀigare ɀakasuŋgwa, nemŋenje yenyu ipfute.
Nemi muʋe saʋanhu ʋakarindira ishe waʋo pakudzoka kwake kumutambo wokuwana; kuti kana akaȿika, akagogodza, ʋamuzarurire pakarepo.
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋaranda aʋo, ʋanoti, kana ishe aciȿika, unoʋawana ʋakarindira. Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, ucaɀisuŋga ciʋuno iye, akaʋagarisa pakudya, akaʋuya akaʋashandira.
Kana akaȿika neŋguʋa yokurindira yecipiri, kana yecitatu yoʋusiku, akaʋawana ʋakaɗaro, ʋakaropafadzwa ʋaranda iʋaʋo.
Asi muziʋe iɀi, kuti ɗai mŋene weimba aiziʋa ŋguʋa inoʋuya nayo mbava, haazaitendera kuti imba yake ipazwe.
Nemi ʋo mugare makaɀigadzira, nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaʋuya neŋguʋa yamusiŋgafuŋgi.
Ɀino Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, mufananidzo uyu munoutaura kwatiri, kana kunaʋose here?
Ishe akati: Ndianiko mutariri wakatendeka, wakacenjera, ucaiswa nashe wake pamsoro paʋaranda ʋake, kuti aʋape mugoʋe weɀokudya ɀaʋo neŋguʋa yakafanira?
Wakaropafadzwa muranda uyo, unoti, kana ishe wake aciȿika, akamuwana aciita saiɀoɀo.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ucamugadza aʋe mutariri weɀose ɀaanaɀo.
Asi kana muranda uyo akareʋa mumŋoyo make,
ishe womuranda uyo ucaȿika nezuʋa raasiŋgatariri, neŋguʋa yaasiŋgaziʋi, akamuroʋesa ɀikuru, akamupa mugoʋe wake pamŋe cete naʋasakatendeka.
Muranda uyo wakaziʋa kuɗa kwashe wake, akasagadzira, kana kuita kuɗa kwake, ucarobga ɀizhinji.
Asi usina‐kuziʋa, akaita ɀakafanira kurobga, ucarobga ɀishoma. Wakapiwa ɀizhinji, ɀizhinji ɀicatȿakwa kwaari; unotendwa neɀizhinji, ʋacareʋa ɀinopfuʋurisa kwaari.
Ndakaʋuya kuzokanda mŋoto panyika; ɀino ndinoti: Ƌai watoɓatidzwa hawo!
Ndinorubapatidzo rwandicabapatidzwa narwo; ndinomanikidzwa sei kuȿikira ɀiciitika.
Munofuŋga kuti ndakaʋuya kuzopa rugare panyika here? Ndinoti kwamuri: Kwete, asi kupesanisa.
Nokuti kubva ɀino ʋashanu ʋeimba imŋe ʋacapesana, ʋatatu
