Ƃaɓa ʋacapesana nomŋanakomana waʋo, nomŋanakomana naɓaɓa ʋake; mai nomŋanasikana waʋo, nomŋanasikana namai ʋake; ʋamŋene nomukadzi womŋanakomana waʋo, nomukadzi womŋanakomana naʋamŋene ʋake.
Akati kuʋanhu ʋazhinji: Kana muciʋona gore ricikwira kumaʋirira, pakarepo munoti: Mvura icanaya; ɀoitika saiɀoɀo.
Kana
Imi ʋanyeŋgeri, munoziʋa kuɗudzira ɀamunoʋona ɀenyika neɀokuɗeŋga, asi hamuziʋi nei kuɗudzira ŋguʋa ino?
Munoregereiko kuɀitoŋgera mumene ɀakarurama?
Nokuti kana uciendakunashe nomudziʋisi wako, idza kuti uregedzwe naye muciri munzira; kuti arege kukukwirira kumutoŋgi, mutoŋgi akuise kumupurisa, mupurisa akusuŋge mutoroŋgo.
Ndinoti kwauri, hauŋgatoŋgoɓuɗi’mo, usati waripa kamari kwokupedzisira.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋakamuʋudza
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Munoti ʋaGarirea aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋatadzi here kupfuʋura ʋaGarirea ʋose, ɀaʋakatambudzika saiɀoɀo?
Ndinokuʋudzai: Kwete; asi kana musiŋgatendeʋuki, imi mose mucaʋurawa saiɀoɀo.
Kana ʋaya ʋanegumi naʋasere, ʋakawirwa neȿiŋgo yeSiroami, ikaʋaʋuraya, munoti ʋakaŋga ʋanemhoȿa kukunda ʋanhu ʋose ʋaigara Jerusarema here?
Ndinokuʋudzai: Kwete; asi kana musiŋgatendeʋuki, imi mose mucaʋurawa saiɀoɀo.
Ɀino wakataura mufananidzo uyu: Mumŋe munhu wakaŋga anomuʋonde, wakaŋga wakasimŋa mumunda wake wemizambiriŋga; akaʋuya acitȿaka ɀiɓereko kwauri, akashaiwa.
Ipapo akati kumurimi womunda wemizambiriŋga: Tarira, ndaʋuya makore matatu ndicitȿaka ɀiɓereko pamuʋonde uyu, ndikashaiwa; uuteme, unotadzireiko pasi?
Akapindura, akati kwaari: Ishe, muuregei henyu nhaka, kuȿikira ndiciurimira, nokuuisa mupfudze;
kana ukazoɓereka ɀiɓereko,
Ɀino wakaŋga acidzidzisa munerimŋe sinagoge nomusi wesaɓata.
Ɀino tarira,
Jesu akati acimuʋona, akamuɗana, akati kwaari: Mai, wasunuŋgurwa paʋurwere bgako.
Akaisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake; akatasanudzwa pakarepo, akarumbidza Mŋari.
Ɀino mukuru wesinagoge akatsamŋa, nokuti Jesu wakaporesa nomusi wesaɓata, akapindura, akati kuʋanhu ʋazhinji: Mazuʋa matanhatu ari’po, anofanira kuɓatwa nawo; ʋuyai naiwayo, muporeswe; asi
Asi Ishe wakamupindura, akati: Imi, ʋanyeŋgeri! Ko mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu haaŋgasunuŋguri ŋombe yake kana mboŋgoro yake pacidyiro nomusi wesaɓata, akaenda nayo kundoinwisa here?
Ɀino mukadzi uyu, mŋanasikana waAbrahama, wakaŋga akasuŋgwa naSatani makore anegumi namasere, haazaifanira kusunuŋgurwa nomusi wesaɓata pacisuŋgo ici here?
Ɀino wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, ʋadziʋisi ʋake ʋose ʋakanyadziswa; asi ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakafara neɀinhu ɀose ɀakaiȿo‐naka ɀakaitwa naye.
Ɀino akati: Ʋushe bgaMŋari bgakafanana neiko? Ndicabgufananidza nei?
Bgakafanana netsaŋga yembeu yemastarda, yakatorwa nomunhu, akaikanda mumunda make, ikamera, ikaita muti, shiri dzokuɗeŋga dzikagara pamataʋi awo.
Akati ɀe: Ʋushe bgaMŋari ndicabgufananidza neiko?
Bgakafanana nembiriso yakatorwa nomukadzi akaiisa muɀiyero ɀitatu
Ɀino wakafamba namaguta nemisha, acidzidzisa, aciŋgoenda Jerusarema.
Mumŋe akati kwaari: Ishe, ʋacazoponeswa ʋashoma here?
Akati kwaʋari: Irwai kupinda nesuʋo rakamanikana; nokuti ʋazhinji, ndinoti kwamuri, ʋacatȿaka kupinda, asi haʋaŋgagoni.
Paŋguʋa iyo kana mŋene weimba asimuka, azarira suʋo, imi mukataŋga kumira kunze, mukagogodza pasuʋo, muciti: Ishe! tizarurirei! Iye akapindura, aciti kwamuri: Handikuziʋiyi imi kwamakabva.
Ɀino mucataŋga kuti: Taidya, tainwa pamberi penyu, ʋuye maidzidzisa panzira dzomumisha yeɗu.
Asi iye ucati: Ndinokuʋudzai: Handiziʋi kwamakabva; ibvai kwandiri, imi mose, ʋaiti ʋeɀisakarurama!
Apo pacaʋa nokucema nokugeɗa‐geɗa kwameno, kana muciʋona Abrahama naIsaka naJakobo naʋaprofita ʋose
Ʋacabva mabvazuʋa, nokumaʋirira, nokumsoro, nezasi, ʋakagara muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Tarirai, ʋari’po ʋokupedzisira ʋacaʋa ʋokutaŋga, noʋokutaŋga ʋacaʋa ʋokupedzisira.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋamŋe ʋaFarise ʋakaȿika, ʋakati kwaari: Ƃuɗai, mubve pano, nokuti Herode unoɗa kukuʋurayai.
Akati kwaʋari: Endai, mundoʋudza mhuŋgubge iyo,
Asi ndinofanira kufamba nhasi namaŋgwana, nerinoteʋera, nokuti haɀiŋgaitiki kuti muprofita aʋurawe kunze kweJerusarema.
Jerusarema, Jerusarema, unoʋuraya ʋaprofita, nokutaka namabge aʋo ʋakatumŋa kwauri; ndakaŋga ndiciɗa kazhinji sei kuʋuŋganidza ʋana ʋako semhambo
Tarirai, masiyirwa imba yenyu raʋa ɗoŋgo; asi ndinoti kwamuri: Hamucazondiʋoni, kuȿikira muciti: Ŋgaarumbidzwe iye unoʋuya nezita raShe!
Ɀino wakati apinda mumba momumŋe waʋakuru ʋaʋaFarise nomusi wesaɓata kuzodya ɀokudya, ʋakamucerekedza.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe munhu pamberi pake waiʋa norukandwe.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akataura kuʋaɗudziri ʋomurairo nokuʋaFarise, aciti: Kwakatenderwa kuporesa nomusi wesaɓata here, kana kwete?
Ʋakaramba ʋanyerere. Ɀino akamutora, akamuporesa, ndokumuendisa.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndianiko pakati penyu, uŋgati, kana mŋanakomana wake, kana ŋombe yake yawira mugomba, uŋgarega kuiɓuɗisa pakarepo nomusi wesaɓata?
Ʋakasagona kupindura ɀe pamsoro paiɀoɀi.
Ɀino wakataura mufananidzo kunaʋakakokerwa, nokuti wakaʋona ʋaciɀisanaŋgurira ɀigaro ɀapamberi, akati kwaʋari:
Kana iwe uciŋge wakokerwa nomunhu kumutambo wokuwana, usagara pacigaro capamberi; ɀimŋe mumŋe, unokudzwa kupfuʋurewe, wakokerwa
ɀino wakakukokera iwe naye, uŋgaȿika, akati kwauri: Ibva’po, munhu uyu agare; ipapo ucataŋga kugara kucigaro ceshure ucinyara.
Asi kana wakokerwa, enda ugare pacigaro ceshure, kuti uyo wakakukokera, kana aciȿika, agoti kwauri: Shamŋari, pinda mberi! Ɀino ucakudzwa we pamberi paʋose ʋagere pakudya newe.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀikudza, ucaninipiswa; ʋuye mumŋe nomumŋe unoɀininipisa, ucakudzwa.
Akati ʋo kunowakamukokera: Kana wagadzira ciȿuȿuro kana cirayiro, usaɗana shamŋari dzako, kana ʋanuŋuna ʋako, kana hama dzako, naʋafumi ʋokwako, kuti ʋarege kukukokera ɀe, ugoripirwa.
Asi kana wagadzira mutambo wokudya, ukokere ʋarombo, neɀirema, naʋanokamhina, namapofu.
Ipapo ucaropafadzwa, ɀaʋasinaɀaʋaŋgakuripira naɀo, nokuti ucaripirwa pakumuka kwaʋakarurama.
Mumŋe waʋakaŋga ʋagere naye pakudya wakati aciɀinzwa, akati kwaari: Wakaropafadzwa uyo ucadya ɀokudya paʋushe bgaMŋari!
Iye akati kwaari: Mumŋe munhu wakagadzira cirayiro cikuru, akakokera ʋazhinji.
Akatuma muranda wake neŋguʋa yokurayira kuti aʋudze ʋakaŋga ʋakakokerwa,
Ipapo ʋose ʋakataŋga nomŋoyo mumŋe kuɀireʋera. Wokutaŋga akati kwaari: Ndateŋga munda, ndinofanira kumbondouʋona; ndinokumbira kuti undireʋere.
Mumŋe akati: Ndateŋga nzombe dzamajoko mashanu, ndinoenda kundodziidza; ndinokumbira kuti undireʋere.
Mumŋe akati: Ndawana mukadzi, naiɀoɀo handiŋgaʋuyi.

Muranda akaʋuya, akaʋudza ishe wake iɀoɀo. Ipapo mŋene weimba akatsamŋa, akati kumuranda wake: Kurumidza, uɓuɗe kunzira huru neɗuku dzomumusha, uʋuye pano naʋarombo, neɀirema, namapofu, naʋanokamhina.
Muranda akati: Ishe, iɀo ɀamaraira, ɀaitwa, asi nɀimbo ici’po.
Ishe akati kumuranda: Ƃuɗa kunzira nokuʋuzhowa, u
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Hakunomumŋe kunaʋarume aʋo ʋandakokera, ucaraʋira cirayiro caŋgu.
Ɀino ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakafamba naye; akatendeʋuka, akati kwaʋari:
Kana munhu aciʋuya kwandiri, asiŋgaʋeŋgi ɓaɓa ʋake namai, nomukadzi, naʋana, naʋanuŋuna, nehanɀadzi, kunyaŋge noʋupenyu bgake ʋo, haaŋgaʋi mudzidzi waŋgu.
Aninani usiŋgatakuri mucinjikwa wake, akaʋuya shure kwaŋgu, haaŋgaʋi mudzidzi waŋgu.
Nokuti ndiani kwamuri, kana aciɗa kuʋaka ȿiŋgo, usiŋgataŋgi kugara pasi, akaʋereŋga kukosha kwayo,
Kuti ɀimŋe kana ataŋga nheyo, akakoniwa kupedzisa, ʋose ʋano
ʋaciti: Uyu munhu wakataŋga kuʋaka, akakoniwa kupedzisa.
Kana ndoupiko mambo, kana acienda kundorwa nomumŋe mambo, usiŋgataŋgi kugara pasi, akaraŋgarira kana iye, unaʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ɀinegumi, aŋgagona kundosoŋgana nounoʋuya kuzorwa naye, ana
Kana asiŋga
Saiɀoɀo ʋo, aninani kwamuri usiŋgasiyi ɀose ɀaanaɀo, haaŋgaʋi mudzidzi waŋgu.
Munyu wakanaka; asi kana munyu waɗuruŋgunda, ucaruŋgwa neiko?
Haucineɓasa pamunda, kana paɗutu romupfudze; ʋanourashira kunze. Unenzeʋe dzokunzwa, ŋgaanzwe.
Ɀino ʋateresi ʋose naʋatadzi ʋakasweɗera kwaari, kuzomunzwa.
Ʋafarise naʋanyori ʋose ʋakaŋuŋuna, ʋaciti: Uyu munhu unogamucira ʋatadzi, acidya naʋo.
Ɀino wakaʋaʋudza mufananidzo uyu, aciti:
Ndianiko kwamuri unamakwai anezana, kana akarashikirwa nerimŋe rawo, uŋgasasiya makumi mapfumbamŋe namapfumbamŋe murenje, akateʋera rakarashika kuȿikira ariwana?
Kana ariwana, unoriisa pamafudzi ake, acifara.
Kana aȿika kumusha, unokokera shamŋari dzake naʋakaʋaka naye, akati kwaʋari: Farai neni, nokuti ndawana gwai raŋgu rakaŋga rakarashika.
Ndinoti kwamuri, saiɀoɀo mufaro ucaʋa kuɗeŋga pamsoro pomutadzi mumŋe unotendeʋuka,
Ndoupiko mukadzi unamadrakema
Kana ariwana, unokokera hama dzake naʋakaʋaka naye, akati kwaʋari: Farai neni, nokuti ndawana drakema randakaŋga ndarashikirwa naro.
Ndinoti kwamuri, saiɀoɀo mufaro uri’po pamberi paʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari pamsoro pomutadzi mumŋe unotendeʋuka.
Ɀino wakati: Mumŋe munhu waiʋa naʋanakomana ʋaʋiri.
Muɗuku waʋo akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Ƃaɓa, ndipei mugoʋe wenhaka ucazoʋa waŋgu. Akaʋagoʋera fuma yake.
Mazuʋa mashoma akati apfuʋura, mŋanakomana muɗuku akaʋuŋganidza ɀose, akaenda kunyika iri kure; akaparadza’ko nhaka yake acifamba nemitoʋo yakaipa.
Ɀino wakati apedza ɀose, nzara huru ikaȿika panyika iyo, akataŋga kushaiwa.
Ipapo akaenda, akandoɀiisa kunomumŋe waʋanhu ʋenyika iyo; iye akamutumira kuminda yake, kundofudza ŋguruʋe.
Wakaŋga aciɗa kuɀigutsa namateko aidyiwa neŋguruʋe; asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waimupa.
Ɀino wakati aciɀifuŋga, akati: Ʋaranda ʋazhinji sei ʋaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋaneɀokudya ɀakawandisa, asi ini ndofa pano nenzara.
Ndicasimuka, ndiende kunaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu, nditi kwaʋari: Ƃaɓa, ndatadzira kuɗeŋga, napamberi penyu,
handicafaniri kunzi mŋanakomana wenyu; mundiite somumŋe waʋaranda ʋenyu.
Akasimuka, akaenda kunaɓaɓa ʋake. Wakati aciri kure, ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakamuʋona, ʋakamunzwira tsitsi, ʋakamhanya, ndokumufuŋgatira, nokumuȿeta.
Mŋanakomana akati kwaʋari: Ƃaɓa, ndatadzira kuɗeŋga napamberi penyu, handicafaniri kunzi mŋanakomana wenyu.
Asi ɓaɓa ʋakati kuʋaranda ʋaʋo: Kurumidzai, muʋuye neŋguʋo yakaiȿo‐naka, mumupfekedze iyo; muise mhete pamunwe wake, neshaŋgu patsoka dzake;
muʋuye nemhure yakakodzwa, muiɓaye, tidye, tifare;
nokuti mŋanakomana waŋgu uyu wakaŋga afa, wararama ɀe; wakaŋga arashika, wawanika ɀe Ɀino ʋakataŋga kufara.
Mŋanakomana wake weɗaŋgwe wakaŋga ari kumunda; ɀino wakati aciȿika, acisweɗera paimba, ndokunzwa kuimba nokutamba.
Ipapo akaɗanira kwaari mumŋe waʋaranda, akamubvunza kuti iɀi ɀinyiko.
Akati kwaari: Munuŋuna wako waȿika, ɀino ɓaɓa ʋako ʋaɓaya mhuru yakakodzwa, nokuti ʋamuwana ɀe ari mupenyu.
Asi iye wakatsamŋa, akaramba kupinda. Ɀino ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaari.
Asi iye wakapindura, akati kunaɓaɓa ʋake: Tarirai, ndakakuɓatirai makore awa mazhinji, ndisiŋgatoŋgoɗariki murairo wenyu, asi hamuna‐kutoŋgondipa mbudzana, kuti ndifare neshamŋari dzaŋgu.
Asi mŋanakomana wenyu uyu, wakaparadza fuma yenyu neɀifeʋe, wakati aciȿika, mamuɓayira mhuru yakakodzwa.
Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Mŋana
Kwaifanira kuti tifare nokufarisisa, nokuti munuŋuna wako uyu wakaŋga afa, wararama; wakaŋga arashika, akawanika.
Ɀino wakati ʋo kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Kwakaŋga kunomufumi, waiʋa nomutariri; iye akacerwa kwaari, ɀicinzi unoparadza fuma yake.
Ipapo akamuɗana, akati kwaari: Iɀi ɀandinonzwa pamsoro pako ndeɀeiko? Ciɀiɗaʋirira pamsoro poʋutariri bgako; nokuti hauŋgazoʋi mutariri.
Ɀino mutariri akati mumŋoyo make: Ndicaiteiko, ishe waŋgu ɀowonditorera ʋutariri bgaŋgu? Handinesimba rokurima naro; kukumbira ndinonyara.
Ndinoziʋa ɀandicaita, kuti kana ndaɓuɗiswa paʋutariri, ʋandigamucire mudzimba dzaʋo.
Ɀino akaɗana mumŋe nomumŋe wakaŋga anecikwerete nashe wake, akati kunowokutaŋga: Unecikwerete cakaɗiniko kunashe waŋgu?
Iye akati: Makate anezana amafuta. Akati kwaari: Tora runyoro rwako, gara pasi pakarepo, unyore makumi mashanu.
Akati kunomumŋe: Ko iwe, unecikwerete cakaɗiniko? Iye akati: Mateŋgu anezana eɀiyo. Akati kwaari: Tora runyoro rwako, unyore makumi masere.
Ishe wake akarumbidza mutariri usakarurama, nokuti wakaŋga aita nokucenjera; nokuti ʋana ʋenyika ino ʋakacenjera parudzi rwaʋo kukunda ʋana ʋeciedza.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Muɀiitire shamŋari neFuma isakarurama, kuti, kana yapera, ʋakugamucirei mudzimba dzisiŋgaperi.
Wakatendeka paɀinhu ɀiɗuku‐ɗuku, wakatendeka ʋo paɀikuru; asi usakarurama paɀinhu ɀiɗuku‐ɗuku, haaŋgarurami ʋo paɀikuru.
Naiɀoɀo kana musina‐kuʋa ʋakatendeka pafuma isakarurama, ndianiko ucakutendai
Kana musina‐kuʋa ʋakatendeka paɀinhu ɀomumŋe, ndianiko ucakupai ɀenyu?
Hakunomuranda uŋgagona kuɓatira ʋatenzi ʋaʋiri: nokuti ucaʋeŋga mumŋe, akaɗa mumŋe; kana ucanamatira mumŋe, akaɀidza mumŋe; hamuŋgaɓatiri Mŋari neFuma.
Ɀino ʋaFarise, ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa mari, ʋakanzwa iɀoɀo ɀose, ʋakamuseka.
Akati kwaʋari: Imi munoɀiruramisa pamberi paʋanhu, asi Mŋari unoziʋa mŋoyo yenyu; nokuti iɀo ɀinokudzwa pakati paʋanhu, ɀinonyaŋgadza pamberi paMŋari.
Murairo naʋaprofita ɀakaŋga ɀiri’po kuȿikira kunaJohane; kubva paŋguʋa iyo ʋushe bgaMŋari bgunoparidzwa, mumŋe nomumŋe unopinda mabguri nesimba.
Asi ɀakareruka kuti kuɗeŋga nenyika ɀipfuʋure, pakuti tsaŋga imŋe yomurairo ikoneswe.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unorasha mukadzi wake, akawana mumŋe, unoita ʋupombge; ʋuye mumŋe nomumŋe unowana wakarashwa nomurume, unoita ʋupombge.
Mumŋe mufumi wakaŋga ari’po, waipfeka ŋguʋo tȿuku nemiceka yakanaka, nokufarira ɀakaiȿo‐naka misi yose.
Ɀino mumŋe murombo, wainzi Razaro, wakaŋga anamaronda mazhinji, akaiswa pasuʋo rake,
aciɗa kuɀigutisa neɀaiwa patafura romufumi; kunyaŋge nembga dzaiʋuya dzicinanɀa maronda ake.
Ɀino murombo wakati afa, ʋatumŋa ʋakamuisa pacifuʋa caAbrahama. Mufumi akafa ʋo, akaʋigwa.
Ɀino ari paHadesi, ari pakurwadziwa, akatarira kumsoro, akaʋona Abrahama ari kure, naRazaro
Akaɗanidzira, akati: Ƃaɓa Abrahama, ndinzwirei ŋgoni; tumai Razaro, kuti anyike muromo womunwe wake mumvura, atonhodze rurimi rwaŋgu, nokuti ndinorwadziwa nomuraɀo uyu
Abrahama akati: Mŋana, fuŋga kuti
Ʋuye paɀinhu iɀi ɀose, mukaha mukuru wakaiswa pakati peɗu nemi, kuti ʋoʋuno ʋanoɗa kuenda mhiri kwamuri, ʋakoniwe, noʋo’ko ʋarege kuyambukira kwatiri.
Ipapo akati: Ndinokumbira kwamuri Ƃaɓa, kuti mumutumire kumba kwaɓaɓa ʋaŋgu;
nokuti ndinaʋanuŋuna ʋashanu; kuti andonatso‐ʋapupurira, kuti ʋarege kuʋuya ʋo panɀimbo ino yokurwadziwa.
Abrahama akati: Mosesi naʋaprofita ʋanaʋo, ŋgaʋaʋanzwe iʋo.
Iye akati: Kwete, Ƃaɓa Abrahama, asi kana mumŋe akabva kuʋakafa, akaenda kwaʋari, ʋaŋgatendeʋuka.
Akati kwaari: Kana ʋasiŋganzwi Mosesi naʋaprofita, haʋaŋgatendiswi, kunyaŋge mumŋe akamuka kuʋakafa.
Ɀino wakati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Haɀiŋgaitiki kuti ɀigumbuso ɀisaʋuya. Asi unenhamo iye waɀinoʋuya naye.
Ɀaiʋa nani kwaari, kuti guyo risuŋgirirwe pamutsipa wake, awisirwe muguŋgwa, pakuti agumbuse mumŋe waʋaɗuku aʋa.
Cenjerai; kana hama yako ikatadza, umuraire; kana akatendeʋuka, umukaŋganwire.
Kunyaŋge akutadzira kanomŋe nezuʋa rimŋe, akadzokera kwauri kanomŋe, aciti: Ndatendeʋuka; umukaŋganwire.
Ɀino ʋaapostora ʋakati kunaShe: Tiwedzerei kutenda kweɗu.
Ishe akati: Kana maiʋa nokutenda kwakaita setsaŋga yemastarda, maiti kumuʋonde uyu: Dzurwa, usimŋe muguŋgwa! ucakutererai.
Ndiani kwamuri uŋgaʋa nomuranda unorima, kana unofudza
Handiti uŋgati kwaari: Ndigadzirire ɀokudya, uɀisuŋge ciʋuno, undishandire, kuȿikira ini ndadya, ndikanwa; iwe ugozodya, nokunwa?
Ko uŋgatenda muranda, ɀaaita ɀakaŋga ɀarairwa here?
Saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo, kana maita ɀose ɀamarairwa, muti: Tiri ʋaranda pasina, takaita seɀataifanira kuita.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacienda Jerusarema, akapfuʋura napaSamaria neGarirea.
Ɀino acipinda munomumŋe musha, akasoŋgana naʋarume ʋanegumi ʋaiʋa namaperembudzi, ʋamire kure.
Ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Jesu, Tenzi, tinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ɀino wakati aciʋaʋona, akati kwaʋari: Endai mundoɀiratidza kuʋaprista. Ʋakati ʋacienda, ʋakapora.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋo, wakati aciʋona kuti ndaporeswa, akadzoka, acikudza Mŋari nenzwi guru;
akawira pasi neciso patsoka dzake, akamuʋoŋga. Ɀino iye wakaŋga ari muSamaria.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akati: Haʋana‐kuporeswa ʋanegumi here? Ʋapfumbamŋe ʋaripiko?
Hapanawakawanikwa wadzokera kuzokudza Mŋari, asi uyu mutorwa here?
Ipapo akati kwaari: Simuka, uende; kutenda kwako kwakuponesa.
Ɀino wakati acibvunzwa naFarise kuti ʋushe bgaMŋari bgunoȿika rini, akapindura, akati: Ʋushe bgaMŋari habguʋuyi bguciʋonekwa.
Haʋaŋgati: Tarirai pano! kana: Uko! Nokuti tarirai, ʋushe bgaMŋari bguri mukati menyu.
Akati kuʋadzidzi
Ʋacati kwamuri: Tarirai uko! Tarirai pano! Regai kuenda, kana ku
nokuti semheni inopenya, icibva kunorumŋe rutiʋi pasi peɗeŋga, icivenekera kuȿikira kunorumŋe rutiʋi pasi peɗeŋga; ndiɀo ɀicaita Mŋanakomana womunhu ʋo nezuʋa rake.
Asi unofanira kumbotambudzika ɀizhinji, nokurashwa norudzi urwu.
seɀaɀakaŋga ɀakaita namazuʋa aNoa, ndiɀo ɀaɀicaita ʋo namazuʋa oMŋanakomana womunhu;
ʋaidya, nokunwa, nokuwana, nokuwaniswa, kuȿikira zuʋa rakapinda Noa muareka, mvura zhinji ikaȿika, ikaparadza ʋose.
seɀaɀakaŋga ɀakaita ʋo namazuʋa aRoti; ʋaidya, nokunwa, nokuteŋga, nokuteŋgesa, nokusima, nokuʋaka;
asi nomusi wakaɓuɗa Roti muSodoma, mŋoto nesurferi ɀakanaya, ɀicibva kuɗeŋga, ɀikaʋaparadza ʋose.
Ndiɀo ɀaɀicaita ʋo nezuʋa
Nezuʋa iro, uri pamsoro peimba, nhumbi dzake dziri mumba, ŋgaarege kuɓuruka kundodzitora; saiɀoɀo ʋo, uri kumunda ŋgaarege kudzokera kuneɀiri shure.
Raŋgarirai mukadzi waRoti.
Aninani unotȿaka kuŋgwarira ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo, ʋuye aninani unorashikirwa nabgo, ucabguraramisa.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Ʋusiku ubgo ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa panhoʋo imŋe, mumŋe ucatorwa, mumŋe ucasiyiwa.
Ʋakadzi ʋaʋiri ʋacakuya pamŋe cete, mumŋe ucatorwa, mumŋe ucasiyiwa.
Ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa kumunda, mumŋe ucatorwa, mumŋe ucasiyiwa.
Ipapo ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Ipiko, Ishe? Akati kwaʋari: Apo panomutumbu, ndi’po panoʋuŋganira ʋo magora.
Ɀino wakaʋaʋudza mufananidzo wokuti ʋanofanira kunyeŋgetera ŋguʋa dzose, ʋasiŋgarashi mŋoyo;
akati: Munerimŋe guta makaŋga munomumŋe mutoŋgi, wakaŋga asiŋgatyi Mŋari, kana kuʋa nehanya nomunhu.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunecirikadzi muguta iro, yairamba iciʋuya kwaari, iciti: Ndiruramisire kumuʋeŋgi waŋgu.
Iye akamboramba ŋguʋa; asi pashure akati mumŋoyo make: Kunyaŋge ndisiŋgatyi Mŋari, kana kuʋa nehanya nomunhu;
iyi cirikadzi ɀainonditambudza, ndicairuramisira, kuti irege kuzoʋuya pashure indiroʋe kumeso.
Ishe akati: Inzwai ɀinorebga nomutoŋgi usakarurama.
Ko ɀino Mŋari haaŋgaruramisiri ʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋake, ʋanoɗanidzira kwaari masikati noʋusiku, kunyaŋge acinonoka pamsoro paʋo here?
Ndinoti kwamuri: Ucakurumidza kuʋaruramisira. Asi Mŋanakomana womunhu kana aciȿika, ucawana kutenda panyika here?
Wakareʋa ʋo mufananidzo uyu kunaʋamŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋaciɀitenda, ʋaciti takarurama, ʋaciɀidza ʋamŋe, akati:
Ʋanhu ʋaʋiri ʋakakwira kutembere kundonyeŋgetera, mumŋe
MuFarise akandomira, akanyeŋgetera kuɗai, aciɀireʋa,
Ndinoɀinyima ɀokudya kaʋiri neviki, ndinopa cegumi ceɀose ɀandinowana.
Asi muteresi wakamira kure, asiŋgaɗi kunyaŋge nokutarira kuɗeŋga, akaɀiroʋa cifuʋa, akati: Mŋari, ndinzwirei tsitsi, ini mutadzi!
Ndinoti kwamuri: Uyu wakaɓurukira kumba kwake aruramiswa kupfuʋura uya. Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɀikudza, ucaninipiswa, nomumŋe nomumŋe, unoɀininipisa ucakudzwa.
Ɀino ʋakaʋuya naʋacece ʋo kwaari, kuti aʋanyaŋgate; asi ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakaʋaraira.
Ipapo Jesu akaʋaɗanira kwaari, akati: Regai ʋana ʋaɗuku, ʋaʋuye kwandiri, musaʋadziʋisa, nokuti ʋushe bgaMŋari ndobgaʋakaɗai.
Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Aninani usiŋgagamuciri ʋushe bgaMŋari somŋana muɗuku, haaŋgatoŋgopindi mabguri.
Ɀino mumŋe mukuru wakamubvunza, akati: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndiŋgaiteiko kuti ndigare nhaka yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi?
Jesu akati kwaari: Unondiidzireiko wakanaka? Hakuna‐wakanaka, asi mumŋe cete,
Mirairo unoiziʋa,
Iye akati: Iɀi ɀose ndakaɀiceŋgeta kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu.
Ɀino Jesu aciɀinzwa, akati kwaari: Unoshaiwa cinhu cimŋe cete; teŋgesa ɀose ɀaunaɀo, upe ʋarombo, uʋe nefuma kuɗeŋga; ugoʋuya, unditeʋere.
Ɀino wakati acinzwa iɀoɀo, akaɓatwa neshuŋgu kwaɀo; nokuti wakaŋga anefuma zhinji.
Ɀino Jesu, acimuʋona, akati: Ʋanefuma ʋacaremerwa sei kupinda muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Nokuti kamera iŋgarerukirwa kupinda paʋuri rorunji, kumufumi kupinda muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋaɀinzwa, ʋakati: Ndianiko uŋgagoponeswa?
Iye akati: Iɀo ɀisiŋgabviri kuʋanhu, ɀinobvira kunaMŋari.
Ipapo Petro akati: Tarirai, isu takasiya ɀose, tikakuteʋerai.
Akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Hakunomunhu wakasiya imba, kana mukadzi, kana ʋanuŋuna, kana ʋaɓereki, kana ʋana, nokuɗa kwoʋushe bgaMŋari,
usiŋgazopiwi ɀizhinji kunaiɀoɀo neŋguʋa ino, ʋuye ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi neŋguʋa inoʋuya.
Ɀino wakatora ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, tinokwira Jerusarema, Mŋanakomana womunhu ucaitirwa ɀose ɀakanyorwa naʋaprofita.
Nokuti ucaiswa kuʋahedeni, nokusekwa, nokuitirwa ɀakaipa, nokupfirwa mate,
ʋacamuroʋesa, nokumuʋuraya, asi nezuʋa retatu ucamuka ɀe.
Asi haʋana‐kunzwisisa cinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀo; shoko iri rakaŋga rakaʋanzika kwaʋari, ʋuye haʋana‐kunzwisisa iɀo ɀakarebga.
Ɀino wakati asweɗera Jeriko, rimŋe ɓofu raigara panzira ricikumbira,
rakanzwa ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋacipfuʋura, rikabvunza, riciti: Cinyiko?
Ʋakariʋudza, ʋaciti: NdiJesu weNazareta unopfuʋura.
Ipapo rakaɗanidzira, riciti: Jesu, Mŋanakomana waDavidi, ndinzwirei ŋgoni!
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋakatuŋgamira ʋakariraira, kuti rinyarare; asi rakanyanya kuɗanidzira,
Ɀino Jesu wakamira, akaraira kuti ʋaʋuye naro kwaari; rikati rasweɗera, akaribvunza,
aciti: Unoɗa kuti ndikuitireiko? Rikati: Ishe, kuti ndiʋone.
Jesu akati kwariri: Ciʋona, kutenda kwako kwakuponesa.
Pakarepo rikaʋona, rikamuteʋera, ricirumbidza Mŋari. Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakati ʋaciɀiʋona, ʋakakudza Mŋari.
Wakapinda Jeriko, akapfuʋura napakati.
Ɀino murume
akatȿaka kuʋona Jesu, kuti ndiye ani; asi wakaŋga asiŋgagoni, nokuti wakaŋga akafupika.
Ipapo akamhanyira mberi, akakwira mumuʋonde kuti amuʋone, nokuti wakaŋga opfuʋura napo.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciȿika’po, akatarira kumsoro, akati kwaari: Zakeo, kurumidza uɓuruke; nokuti nhasi ndinofanira kugara mumba mako.
Iye akakurumidza kuɓuruka, akamugamucira nomufaro.
Ʋose ʋakaɀiʋona, ʋakaŋuŋuna, ʋaciti: Wapinda kundogara nomurume
Ipapo Zakeo akamira, akati kunaShe: Tarirai, Ishe, ndinopa ʋarombo hafu yefuma yaŋgu, ʋuye kana ndatorera mumŋe cinhu
Jesu akati kwaari: Nhasi ruponeso rwaȿika paimba ino; nokuti naiye ʋo mŋanakomana waAbrahama.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu wakaʋuya kuzotȿaka nokuponesa cakarashika.
Ʋakati ʋacanzwa iɀoɀo, akawedzera akataura
Naiɀoɀo akati: Mumŋe munhu mukuru wakaenda kunyika yakaŋga iri kure, kuti andopiwa ʋushe, agodzoka ɀe.
Akaɗana ʋaranda ʋake ʋanegumi, akaʋapa pondo dzinegumi, akati kwaʋari: Shambadzirai, kuȿikira ndiciʋuya ɀe.
Asi ʋanhu ʋenyika yake ʋakaŋga ʋacimuʋeŋga, ʋakatuma nhume kumuteʋera, kundoti: Hatiɗi kuti uyu munhu aʋe ishe weɗu.
Ɀino wakati adzoka kuya kwaakaŋga andopiwa ʋushe, akaraira kuti ʋaya ʋaranda ʋaakaŋga apa mari, ʋaɗanirwe kwaari, anzwe kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakawanei nokushambadzira
Wokutaŋga akaȿika, akati: Ishe, pondo yenyu yakawana dzimŋe pondo dzinegumi ɀe.
Akati kwaari: Ɀakanaka, muranda wakanaka; ɀawakaŋga wakatendeka paɀiɗuku‐ɗuku, uɓate maguta anegumi.
Wecipiri akaȿika, akati: Ishe, pondo yenyu yakawedzera ɀe pondo shanu.
Akati kwaari ʋo: Newe, uɓate maguta mashanu.
Ɀino mumŋe akaȿika, akati: Ishe, tarirai pondo yenyu heyi, yandakaŋga ndaceŋgeta mumuceka.
Nokuti ndakaŋga ndicikutyai, ɀamuri munhu unehasha, munotora ɀamusakaisa’po, munoceka ɀamusakakusha.
Akati kwaari: Ndicakutoŋga namashoko ako amene, iwe muranda wakaipa! Wakaŋga uciziʋa kuti ndiri munhu unehasha, ndicitora ɀandisakaisa, ndiciceka ɀandisakakusha;
ɀino wakaregereiko kuisa mari yaŋgu mubaŋga, ndikazoitora pakudzoka kwaŋgu yawanda.
Ipapo akati kunaʋakaŋga ʋamire’po: Mutorerei pondo iyo, muipe unepondo dzinegumi.
Ʋakati kwaari: Ishe, watoʋa nepondo dzinegumi.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Mumŋe nomumŋe unecinhu, ucapiwa; asi usina, ucatorerwa neɀaanaɀo.
Asi ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaŋgu aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɗi kuti ndiʋe ishe waʋo, ʋuyai naʋo pano, muʋaʋuraye pamberi paŋgu.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akatuŋgamirira mberi, acikwira Jerusarema.
Wakati osweɗera Betfage neBetania, kugomo rinonzi reMiorivi, akatuma ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋaʋiri,
aciti: Endai kumusha wakatarisana nemi; kana mucipinda mauri, mucawana mhuru yemboŋgoro yakasuŋgirwa, isina‐kumbotaȿwa nomunhu; muisunuŋgure, mugoʋuya nayo.
Kana mumŋe akakubvunzai,
Aʋo ʋakatumŋa ʋakaenda, ʋakandowana seɀaakaŋga aʋaʋudza.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacisunuŋgura mhuru, ʋene ʋayo ʋakati kwaʋari: Munosunuŋgurireiko mhuru?
Ʋakati: Ishe unoiɗa.
Ʋakaʋuya nayo kunaJesu, ʋakaisa ŋguʋo dzaʋo pamsoro pemhuru, ʋakataȿisa Jesu pamsoro payo.
Ɀino acifamba, ʋakawarira ŋguʋo dzaʋo munzira.
Akati osweɗera pamaɓurusiro egomo reMiorivi, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakataŋga kufara nokurumbidza Mŋari nenzwi guru pamsoro pamaɓasa ose esimba aʋakaŋga ʋaʋona,
ʋaciti: Mambo ŋgaakudzwe, iye unoʋuya muzita raShe! Rugare ŋgaruʋe kuɗeŋga, nokubginya kumsoro‐soro!
Ʋamŋe ʋaFarise pakati paʋazhinji ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, rairai ʋadzidzi ʋenyu!
Akapindura, akati: Ndinokuʋudzai, kana aʋa ʋakanyarara, mabge aŋgaɗanidzira.
Ɀino wakati asweɗera pedyo, akaʋona guta, akacema pamsoro paro,
aciti: Ƌai waiziʋa iwe zuʋa rino ɀinhu
Nokuti ucaȿikirwa namazuʋa, aucaʋakirwa nawo mucinjiziri naʋaʋeŋgi ʋako, ʋacakukomba, nokukumanikidza pamatiʋi ose;
ʋacakuparadzira pasi, iwe naʋana ʋako mukati mako; haʋaŋgaregi mukati mako ibge rimŋe riri pamsoro perimŋe; nokuti hauna‐kuziʋa ŋguʋa yokushanyirwa kwako.
Ɀino wakapinda mutembere, akataŋga kuɓuɗisira kunze ʋakaŋga ʋaciteŋgesa’mo,
aciti kwaʋari: Kwakanyorwa kuti imba yaŋgu icaʋa imba yokunyeŋgetera; asi imi makaiita ɓako ramakororo.
Waidzidzisa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe mutembere; asi ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori naʋakuru ʋaʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋacitȿaka kumuʋuraya.
Asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgawani ɀaʋaŋgaita, nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamunamatira, ʋaci
Ɀino panerimŋe ramazuʋa
ʋakataura, ʋakati kwaari: Tiʋudzei, kuti munoita ɀinhu iɀi nesimba ripi, kana ndianiko wakakupai simba iri?
Akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Neni ndicakubvunzai ʋo shoko; ndiʋudzei:
Rubapatidzo rwaJohane rwakabva kuɗeŋga kana kuʋanhu here?
Ʋakataurirana pakati paʋo, ʋaciti: Kana tikati, Kuɗeŋga, ucati: Makagoregerei kumutenda?
Asi kana tikati, Kuʋanhu, ʋanhu ʋose ʋacatitaka namabge; nokuti iʋo ʋanotenda kuti Johane waiʋa muprofita.
Ʋakapindura,
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari: Neni ʋo handiŋgakuʋudziyi simba randinoita naro ɀinhu iɀi.
Ɀino wakataŋga kuʋudza ʋanhu mufananidzo uyu:
Neŋguʋa yeɀiɓereko akatuma muranda kuʋarimi, kuti ʋamupe ɀiɓereko ɀomunda wemizambiriŋga; asi ʋarimi ʋakamuroʋa, ʋakamudzosa asina.
Akatuma ɀe mumŋe muranda; naiye ʋo ʋakamuroʋa, ʋakamunyadzisa, ʋakamudzosa asina.
Akatuma ɀe wecitatu; naiye ʋakamukuʋadza, ʋakamuɓuɗisa kunze.
Ɀino mŋene womunda wemizambiriŋga akati: Ndicaiteiko? Ndicatuma mŋanakomana waŋgu unoɗikanwa, ɀimŋe ʋacamukudza iye.
Asi ʋarimi ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakaraŋgana, ʋakati: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; ŋgatimuʋuraye, nhaka igoʋa yeɗu.
Ʋakamuɓuɗisa kunze kwomunda wemizambiriŋga, ʋakamuʋuraya. Ɀino, mŋene womunda wemizambiriŋga ucaʋaiteiko?
Ucaʋuya, akaparadza ʋarimi iʋaʋa; munda wemizambiriŋga akaupa ʋamŋe. Ɀino ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakati: Haiȿa!
Wakati aʋatarisisa, akati: Ɀino cinyiko ico cakanyorwa,
Ibge rakarashwa naʋaʋaki,
Ndiro rakazoʋa musoro wekona?
Mumŋe nomumŋe unowira pamsoro pebge iro, ucavunikanya; asi ricaparadza warinowira.
Ɀino ʋanyori naʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakatȿaka neŋguʋa iyo kumuɓata, asi ʋakatya ʋanhu; nokuti ʋakaziʋa kuti wakaʋareʋa iʋo nomufananidzo uyo.
Ʋakamucerekedza, ʋakatuma ʋashori, ʋakaɀiita saʋanhu ʋakarurama, kuti ʋamuɓate pakutaura kwake, ʋamuise kuʋushe nesimba romutoŋgi.
Ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Mudzidzisi, tinoziʋa kuti munotaura nokudzidzisa ɀakarurama, musiŋgatendi ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu, asi munodzidzisa nzira yaMŋari neɀokwaɗi.
Ko ɀino takatenderwa kuripira Kesari mutero here, kana kwete?
Asi iye aciziʋa kunyeŋgera kwaʋo, akati kwaʋari:
Ndiratidzei denari.
Ipapo akati kwaʋari: Naiɀoɀo ipai Kesari ɀaKesari, naMŋari ɀaMŋari.
Ʋakakoniwa kumuɓata pakutaura kwake pamberi paʋanhu; ʋakashamiswa nokupindura kwake, ndokunyarara.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaSaduse, iʋo ʋanoramba kumuka kwaʋakafa ʋaciti hakuna, ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakamubvunza,
ʋaciti: Mudzidzisi, Mosesi wakatinyorera kuti kana mukoma womunhu akafa, anomukadzi, asi iye asinaʋana, munuŋuna wake atore mukadzi wake, amutsire mukoma wake ʋana.
Ɀino, kwakaŋga kunaʋanakomana ʋomunhu mumŋe ʋanomŋe; weɗaŋgwe akatora mukadzi, akafa asinaʋana;
nowecipiri;
nowecitatu akamutora; nokuɗaro naʋanomŋe
Pashure mukadzi akafa ʋo.
Ɀino pakumuka ucaʋa mukadzi waniko kwaʋari? Nokuti wakaŋga ari mukadzi wa
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ʋanakomana ʋenyika ino ʋanowana, ʋuye ʋanowaniswa;
asi aʋo ʋacanzi
Nokuti haʋazofi ɀe; nokuti ʋacaenzana naʋatumŋa; ʋaʋa ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari ɀaʋari ʋanakomana ʋokumuka.
Naiye Mosesi ʋo wakaratidza
Ɀino Mŋari haazi
Ipapo ʋamŋe ʋanyori ʋakamupindura, ʋakati: Mudzidzisi, mataura ɀakanaka.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya kuzomubvunza cinhu.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Ʋanoreʋa seiko kuti Kristu ndiye Mŋanakomana waDavidi?
Nokuti Davidi wakareʋa amene mubuku yaMapisarema,
Ishe wakati kunaShe waŋgu:
Gara kurudyi rwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira ndaisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako
Naiɀoɀo, Davidi unomuidza Ishe, ɀino uŋgagoʋa Mŋanakomana wake seiko?
Ɀino akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake, ʋanhu ʋose ʋaciɀinzwa:
Cenjerai ʋanyori, ʋanoɗa kufamba neŋguʋo refu, ʋacifarira kukwaziswa paɗare, neɀigaro ɀapamberi mumasinagoge, noʋugaro bgapamberi pamitambo;
ʋanoparadza dzimba dzecirikadzi, ʋaciita mano‐mano eminyeŋgetero mirefu; iʋaʋo ʋacatoŋgerwa ɀakaipa ɀinopfuʋurisa.
Ɀino wakati acitarira, akaʋona ʋafumi ʋaciisa ɀipo ɀaʋo muciʋigiro cemari.
Akaʋona imŋe cirikadzi, waiʋa murombo, aciisa’mo tumari tuʋiri tuɗuku.
Akati: Ɀirokwaɀo ndinoti kwamuri: Cirikadzi iyi, iri murombo, yakaisa kupfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋose;
nokuti aʋo ʋose ʋakaisa paɀipo,
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakati ʋacitaura pamsoro petembere, kuti yakaŋga yakashoŋgedzwa namabge akanaka neɀipo, iye akati:
Kana ɀiri iɀi ɀamunoʋona, mazuʋa acaȿika, asiŋgazoregwi ibge pamsoro pebge, risiŋgazowisirwi pasi.
Ɀino ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Mudzidzisi, iɀoɀi ɀicagoʋa riniko? Neciratidzo cicaʋa cipi, kana iɀoɀi ɀoɗo‐kuitwa?
Akati: Cenjerai, kuti murege kutsauswa; nokuti ʋazhinji ʋacaʋuya nezita raŋgu, ʋaciti: Ndini
Kana mucinzwa ɀokurwa, nenyoŋganiso, musavunduka henyu, nokuti iɀoɀi ɀinofanira kumboitwa; asi kuguma hakuȿiki pakarepo.
Akati kwaʋari: Rudzi
Kuɗeŋgenyeka kukuru kwenyika kucaʋa’po, nokunedzimŋe nɀimbo nzara nehosha, neɀinotyisa, ʋuye ɀiratidzo ɀikuru, ɀicabva kuɗeŋga, ɀicaʋa’po.
Asi iɀoɀi ɀose ɀisati ɀaȿika, ʋacakuɓatai, nokukutambudzai, ʋacikuisai kumasinagoge nomumatoroŋgo, nokukuisai pamberi pamadzimambo naʋaɓati, nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu.
Ici cicaʋa capupu kwamuri.
Naiɀoɀo simbai mumŋoyo menyu, kuti murege kumbofuŋgisisa pamucapindura napo.
Nokuti ndicakupai muromo nokucenjera, kucakonesa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋenyu ʋose kukukundai nokuramba
Mucaiswa
Mucaʋeŋgwa naʋanhu ʋose nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu.
Asi ruvudzi rumŋe rwomusoro wenyu haruŋgarashiki.
Nokutsuŋgirira kwenyu mucawana ʋupenyu bgenyu.
Ɀino kana muciʋona Jerusarema rakombga nehondo, ziʋai kuti roɗokuparadzwa.
Musi uyo ʋari muJudea ŋgaʋatizire kumakomo; naʋari pakati paro ŋgaʋaɓuɗe; naʋari kuruwa ŋgaʋarege kupinda’mo.
Nokuti iwayo ndiwo mazuʋa okutsiʋa, kuti ɀose ɀakanyorwa ɀiitike.
Asi ʋacaʋa nenhamo ʋanemimba naʋanomŋisa namazuʋa iwayo, nokuti kutambudzika kukuru kucaʋa’po panyika, nokutsamŋa pamsoro paʋanhu iʋaʋo.
Ʋacaparadzwa nomuromo womunondo, nokutapxa kumarudzi ose; Jerusarema ricatsikwa naʋahedeni, kuȿikira ŋguʋa dzaʋahedeni dzazadzika.
Ɀiratidzo ɀicaʋa’po pazuʋa napamŋedzi, napanyeredzi; napanyika ʋurombo bgaʋanhu, ʋacikaŋganiswa nokutinhira kweguŋgwa namafuŋgu;
ʋanhu ʋacapera nokutya nokutarira ɀinowira nyika; nokuti masimba okuɗeŋga acaɗeŋgenyeka.
Ipapo ʋacaʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu aciʋuya negore, nesimba rokubginya kukuru.
Asi kana iɀoɀi ɀicitaŋga kuitika, tarirai kumsoro, musimudze misoro yenyu, nokuti kusunuŋgurwa kwenyu kwasweɗera.
Ɀino akaʋataurira mufananidzo, aciti: Tarirai muʋonde nemiti yose;
Kana yotuŋga, mukaɀiʋona, munoziʋa mumene, kuti ɀino zhezha raʋa pedyo.
Saiɀoɀo, nemi ʋo, kana moʋona iɀoɀo ɀoitwa, ziʋai kuti ʋushe bgaMŋari bgaʋa pedyo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Rudzi urwu haruŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri, kuȿikira ɀose ɀaitika.
Ƌeŋga nenyika ɀicapfuʋura, asi mashoko aŋgu haaŋgatoŋgopfuʋuri.
Cenjerai, kuti mŋoyo yenyu irege kuremedzwa nokudyisa nokuɓatwa, nokufuŋganya pamsoro peɀinhu ɀoʋupenyu bguno, kuti zuʋa iro rirege kukuwirai seriʋa.
Nokuti ricawira ʋose ʋagere panyika yose.
Asi rindai neŋguʋa dzose, mukumbire, kuti mugone kupukunyuka paɀinhu iɀi ɀose ɀinozoitwa, mugomira pamberi poMŋanakomana womunhu.
Ɀino waidzidzisa masikati mutembere, asi ʋusiku waiɓuɗa, akandoʋata mugomo rinonzi reMiorivi.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuya kwaari mutembere maŋgwanani, kuzomunzwa.
Ɀino mutambo weɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso, unonzi paseka, wakasweɗera.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋakatȿaka kuti ʋaŋgamuʋuraya sei; nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ʋanhu.
Ɀino Satani wakapinda kunaJudasi wainzi Iskarioti, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri.
Akaenda, akandoraŋgana naʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru
Ʋakafara, ʋakatenderana naye ʋose kuti ʋamupe mari.
Akatenda, akatȿaka ŋguʋa yokumuisa nayo
Ɀino zuʋa reɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso rakati raȿika, rakafanira kuɓayirwa paseka naro,
akatuma Petro naJohane, aciti: Endai, mundotigadzirira paseka, kuti tidye.
Ʋakati kwaari: Munoɗa kuti tigadzirirepiko?
Akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, kana mapinda muguta, mucasoŋgana nomunhu akatakura ciroŋgo cemvura; mumuteʋere iye kumba kwanoenda;
muti kumŋene weimba: Mudzidzisi unoti kwauri: Imba yaʋaeni iripiko, mandiŋgadyira paseka naʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu?
Ucakuratidzai imba huru iri kumsoro, yakaroŋgedzwa; gadzirai ipapo.
Ʋakaenda, ʋakandowana seɀaakaŋga aʋaʋudza; ʋakagadzira paseka.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yaȿika, akagara pakudya naʋaapostora.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndakaŋga ndiciɗa ɀikuru kudya paseka iyi nemi ndisati ndatambudzika.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Handicazoidyi, kuȿikira yaitika muʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ɀino akatora mukombe; akaʋoŋga, akati: Torai ici, mugoʋane pakati penyu.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva ɀino handicatoŋgonwi ɀe ɀiɓereko ɀomuzambiriŋga, kuȿikira ʋushe bgaMŋari bgaȿika.
Akatora ciŋgwa, akaʋoŋga, akameɗura, akaʋapa, aciti: Ici muʋiri waŋgu, unopiwemi; itai iɀi, mugondiraŋgarira.
Nokuɗaro ʋo, ʋapedza kurayira,
Asi tarirai, ruʋoko rwaiye, unondipandukira, runeni patafura.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unoenda hake, seɀaɀakatemŋa; asi unenhamo munhu uyo waanopandukirwa naye.
Ipapo ʋakataŋga kubvunzana kuti ndianiko kwaʋari uŋgaita cinhu ico.
Ɀino nharo dzakamuka pakati paʋo kuti ndiani kwaʋari ucanzi mukuru.
Akati kwaʋari: Madzimambo aʋahedeni anesimba pamsoro paʋo, naʋaɓati ʋaʋo ʋanonzi ʋaɓatsiri.
Ɀino imi musaɗaro, asi mukuru kwamuri ŋgaaʋe somuɗuku, nomutuŋgamiri sounoshumira.
Nokuti ndianiko mukuru, ugere pakudya, kana unomushumira? Haazi iye ugere pakudya here? Asi ini ndiri pakati penyu sounoshumira.
Ɀino imi ndimi makagara neni pamiidzo yaŋgu.
Ndinokugarisai nhaka yoʋushe saƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋakandigarisa nhaka,
kuti mugodya nokunwa patafura raŋgu muʋushe bgaŋgu; mucagara paɀigaro ɀoʋushe, mucitoŋga marudzi anegumi namaʋiri aʋaIsraeri.
Simoni! Simoni! tarira Satani wakakumbira kuti akuzuŋgurei imi seɀiyo;
asi ini ndakakukumbirira iwe, kuti kutenda kwako kurege kupera; iwe kana watendeʋuka, usimbise hama dzako.
Akati kwaari: Ishe, ndakaɀigadzirira kuenda nemi mutoroŋgo, kunyaŋge kurufu.
Akati: Petro, ndinoti kwauri: Nhasi, joŋgwe risati rarira, ucaramba katatu uciti haundiziʋi.
Ɀino akati kwaʋari: Musi wandakakutumai, musinecikwama nehomboɗo neshaŋgu, makashaiwa cinhu here? Ʋakati: Hakuna.
Akati kwaʋari: Asi ɀino, unecikwama, ŋgaacitore, nokuɗaro ʋo unehomboɗo; usinomunondo, ŋgaateŋgese ŋguʋo yake, auteŋge.
Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri, kuti iɀi ɀakanyorwa ɀinofanira kuitika kwandiri,
Ipapo ʋakati: Ishe, tarirai, heyi minondo miʋiri. Akati kwaʋari: Ɀariŋgana.
Ɀino wakaɓuɗa, akaenda kugomo reMiorivi, seɀaaisiita; naʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamuteʋera.
Wakati aȿika panɀimbo iyo, akati kwaʋari: Nyeŋgeterai kuti murege kupinda pakuidzwa.
Akaparadzana naʋo, cinhambo ciŋgaȿika ibge, kana rikaposherwa; akafugama, akanyeŋgetera,
aciti: Ƃaɓa, kana muciɗa, bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri! Asi kuɗa kwaŋgu kurege kuitwa, asi kwenyu.
Ipapo mutumŋa akaʋonekwa naye, wakabva kuɗeŋga, akamusimbisa.
Ɀino, ari pakutambudzika kukuru, wakanyanya kunyeŋgetera; ziya rake rikaita samaɗonhwe eropa, akaɗonhera pasi.
Akasimuka pakunyeŋgetera, akaenda kuʋadzidzi, akaʋawana ʋaʋata neshuŋgu dzomŋoyo.
Akati kwaʋari: Maʋatireiko? Mukai, munyeŋgetere, kuti murege kupinda pakuidzwa.
Wakati acataura, tarira, ʋanhu ʋazhinji, naiye wainzi Judasi, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, akaʋatuŋgamirira; akasweɗera kunaJesu, kuti amuȿete.
Jesu akati kwaari: Judasi, unopandukira Mŋanakomana womunhu nokuȿeta here?
Ɀino ʋaiʋa naye ʋakati ʋaciʋona ɀicaitika, ʋakati: Ishe, totema neminondo here?
Ipapo mumŋe waʋo akatema muranda womuprista mukuru, akamugura nzeʋe yorudyi.
Jesu akapindura, akati: Regai, ɀariŋgana. Akaɓata nzeʋe yake, akamuporesa.
Ɀino Jesu akati kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋetembere, naʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kwaari
Ndaiʋa nemi mutembere mazuʋa ose mukasandiɓata; asi ɀino iŋguʋa yenyu nesimba rerima.
Ɀino ʋakamuɓata, ʋakaenda naye, ʋakandomuisa kumba kwomuprista mukuru. Petro akateʋera ari kure.
Ʋakati ʋaʋesa mŋoto pakati poruʋazhe, ʋakagara pasi pamŋe cete, naPetro akagara pakati paʋo.
Ɀino mumŋe mushandiri wakati acimuʋona agere muciedza
Asi iye wakaramba, aciti: Iwe mukadzi, handimuziʋi.
Garegare, mumŋe ɀe akamuʋona, akati: Iwe uri mumŋe waʋo. Petro akati: Iwe munhu, handizati.
Ŋguʋa ineŋge seimŋe yakati yapfuʋura, mumŋe ɀe akasimbisa, aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, uyu wakaŋga anaye ʋo; nokuti muGarirea.
Petro akati: Iwe munhu, handiziʋi ɀaunoreʋa! Pakarepo, acataura, joŋgwe rikarira.
Ipapo Ishe akatendeʋuka, akatarira Petro. Petro akaraŋgarira shoko raShe, raakaŋga amuʋudza, aciti: Joŋgwe risati rarira nhasi, ucandiramba katatu.
Akaɓuɗa, akacema ɀikuru.
Ʋarume ʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaɓata Jesu, ʋakamuseka, nokumuroʋa.
Ʋakafukidzira meso
Neɀimŋe ɀizhinji ʋakareʋa kwaari, ʋacimutuka.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, ʋakuru ʋaʋanhu naʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakamuisa kumakurukota aʋo,
ʋaciti: Kana uri Kristu, utiʋudze. Iye akati kwaʋari: Kana ndikakuʋudzai, hamuŋgatendi.
Kana ndikakubvunzai, hamuŋgandipinduri.
Asi kubva ɀino Mŋanakomana womunhu ucagara kurudyi rwesimba raMŋari.
Ipapo ʋose ʋakati: Uri Mŋanakomana waMŋari kanhi? Akati kwaʋari: Mareʋa kuti ndini iye.
Iʋo ʋakati: Ticatȿakireiko capupu? Nokuti taɀinzwira timene pamuromo wake.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakasimuka, ʋakaenda naye kunaPirato.
Ʋakataŋga kumupomera mhoȿa, ʋaciti: Takawana munhu uyu acitsausa rudzi rweɗu, aci
Ipapo Pirato akamubvunza, akati: Ko uri Mambo waʋaJuda here? Akamupindura, akati:
Pirato akati kuʋaprista ʋakuru nokuʋazhinji: Handiwani mhoȿa kumunhu uyu.
Iʋo ʋakanyanya, ʋaciti: Unomutsa ʋanhu, acidzidzisa muJudea rose, acitaŋga paGarirea kuȿikira pano.
Pirato wakati acinzwa iɀoɀo, akabvunza kana munhu uyu ari muGarirea.
Akati anzwa kuti unobva
Ɀino Herode wakafara kwaɀo‐kwaɀo aciʋona Jesu; nokuti waiɗa kumuʋona kare, ɀaakaŋga anzwa ɀake; akafuŋga kuti ucaʋona cimŋe ciratidzo ciŋgaitwa naye.
Akamubvunza mashoko mazhinji; asi iye haana‐kumupindura cinhu.
Ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋanyori ʋakamira ʋakamupomera mhoȿa ɀikuru.
NaHerode naʋarwi ʋake ʋakamuɀidza, nokumuseka; ʋakazomupfekedza ŋguʋo dzinobginya, ʋakamudzosera kunaPirato.
Nomusi uyo Pirato naHerode ʋakayanana; nokuti ʋaiʋeŋgana.
Ɀino Pirato akaʋuŋganidza ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaɓati naʋanhu,
akati kwaʋari: Maʋuya kwandiri nomunhu uyu, muciti: Unotsausa ʋanhu; tarirai ini ndamubvunzisisa pamberi penyu, ndikasawana kumunhu uyu mhoȿa yeɀinhu ɀamunomupomera naɀo;
kunyaŋge naHerode ʋo; nokuti wamudzosera kwatiri; tarirai, hakunecinhu cakaitwa naye, cakafanira rufu.
Naiɀoɀo ndicamuroʋa, ndigomusunuŋgura. [
Nokuti waifanira kuʋasunuŋgurira mumŋe pamutambo.]
Asi ʋose ʋakaɗanidzira pamŋe cete, ʋaciti: Bvisai munhu uyu, mutisunuŋgurire Barabasi!
Iye wakaŋga asuŋgwa mutoroŋgo nemhaka yeɓope rakaŋga ramutswa muguta, neyokuʋuraya.
Ɀino Pirato akataura ɀe naʋo, aciɗa kusunuŋgura Jesu.
Asi iʋo ʋakaramba ʋaciɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Roʋerai pamucinjikwa, mumuroʋere pamucinjikwa!
Akati kwaʋari rwecitatu: Uyu wakagotadzeiko? Handina‐kuwana mhoȿa yorufu kwaari. Naiɀoɀo ndicamuroʋa, ndigomusunuŋgura.
Asi iʋo ʋakasimbisa namanzwi makuru, ʋacikumbira kuti aroʋerwe pamucinjikwa. Manzwi aʋo akakunda.
Ɀino Pirato akatoŋga kuti ɀaʋakakumbira ɀiitwe;
akaʋasunuŋgurira uyo waʋakakumbira, wakaŋga asuŋgwa mutoroŋgo nemhaka yeɓope neyokuʋuraya; akaʋapa Jesu
Ʋakati ʋacienda naye, ʋakaɓata mumŋe, wainzi Simoni weKurini, acibva kuruwa, ʋakaisa mucinjikwa pamsoro pake, kuti autakure shure kwaJesu.
Akateʋerwa naʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji, naʋakadzi ʋaimuririra nokumucema.
Asi Jesu wakatendeʋukira kwaʋari, akati: Ʋakunda ʋeJerusarema, musandicema ini, asi muɀiceme imi naʋana ʋenyu;
nokuti tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya, aʋacati: Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋasiŋgaponi, neɀiɀaro ɀisinakutoŋgoɓereka, namazamu asina‐kumŋisa.
Musi uyo mucataŋga kureʋa kumakomo,
Nokuti kana ʋaciita iɀi kumuti munyoro, wakawoma ucaitirweiko?
Kwakaŋga kunaʋamŋe ʋatadzi ʋaʋiri ʋo, ʋaʋakaenda naʋo pamŋe cete naye kundoʋurawa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika panɀimbo inonzi Ƌehenya, ʋakamuroʋera’po naʋatadzi, mumŋe kurudyi mumŋe kuruɓoshwe.
Ipapo Jesu akati: Ƃaɓa, muʋakaŋganwire, nokuti haʋaziʋi caʋanoita. Ʋakagoʋana ŋguʋo dzake, ʋacikanda mijenya pamsoro padzo.
Ʋanhu ʋakamira, ʋacitarira; naʋaɓati ʋakamuseka ʋo, ʋaciti: Wakaponesa ʋamŋe; ŋgaaɀiponese, kana ari Kristu waMŋari, Musanaŋgurwa wake.
Naʋarwi ʋo ʋakamuseka, ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakamupa vinega,
ʋaciti: Kana uri Mambo waʋaJuda, uɀiponese.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunorunyoro ʋo pamsoro pake,
Mumŋe waʋatadzi ʋakaŋga ʋakaturikwa, wakamutuka, aciti: Hauzi Kristu here? Uɀiponese, nesu ʋo.
Mumŋe akapindura, akamuraira, aciti: Hautyi kunyaŋge naMŋari kanhi, ɀauri pakutoŋgwa kumŋe naye?
Kana tirisu,
Ipapo akati: Jesu mundiraŋgarire, kana moȿika muʋushe bgenyu!
Iye akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo, nhasi ucaʋa neni muParadiso.
Ɀino yakaŋga yaʋa ŋguʋa ineŋge yecitanhatu; rima rikaʋa’po panyika yose, kuȿikira paŋguʋa yepfumbamŋe,
Zuʋa rikaȿiɓa; cidzitiro cetembere cikabvaruka napakati.
Ɀino Jesu akaɗana nenzwi guru, aciti: Ƃaɓa, ndinoisa mŋeya waŋgu pamaʋoko enyu! Akati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaɓuɗisa mŋeya
Ipapo mukuru wezana wakati aʋona ɀaitwa, akarumbidza Mŋari, aciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, munhu uyu wakaŋga akarurama.
Ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋuŋgana kuzoʋona iɀoɀo, ʋakati ʋaʋona ɀaitwa, ʋakadzoka ʋaciroʋa ɀifuʋa
Naʋazikani ʋake ʋose, naʋakadzi, ʋaimuteʋera ʋacibva Garirea, ʋakamira kure, ʋaciʋona iɀoɀo.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe, wainzi Josefa, mumŋe wamakurukota, murume wakanaka wakarurama,
(iye wakaŋga asina‐kutenderana naʋo pakuraŋgana nokuita kwaʋo), waiʋa weArimatia, guta raʋaJuda, wakaŋga acimirira ʋushe bgaMŋari;
iye akaenda kunaPirato, akandokumbira mutumbu waJesu,
akauɓurusa, akauputira nomuceka, akauisa mubgiro bgakaŋga bgakacerwa pabge, makaŋga musina‐kumboʋigwa munhu.
Waiʋa musi woKugadzirira, saɓata roɗokutaŋga.
Naʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya naye, ʋacibva Garirea, ʋakaʋateʋera, ʋakaʋona bgiro, nomuisirwe womutumbu wake.
Ʋakadzoka, ʋakagadzira ɀinonhuwira namafuta.
Ʋakazorora nomusi wesaɓata ʋaciterera murairo.
Nomusi wokutaŋga weviki, mambakwedza, ʋakaʋuya kubgiro, ʋakaɓata ɀinonhuwira, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋagadzira.
Ʋakawana ibge rakuŋguruswa,
ʋakapinda, ʋakashaiwa mutumbu waShe Jesu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacakaŋganiswa naɀo, tarira, ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋakamira naʋo ʋaneŋguʋo dzinopenya;
ɀino nokutya kwaʋo ʋakakotamira pasi neɀiso
Haa’po pano, wamuka. Fuŋgai ɀaakakuʋudzai aciri Garirea,
kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu unofanira kuiswa mumaʋoko aʋanhu ʋakaipa, aroʋerwe pamucinjikwa, agomuka nezuʋa retatu.
Ipapo ʋakaraŋgarira mashoko ake,
ʋakadzoka ʋacibva kubgiro, ʋakaʋudza ʋanegumi nomumŋe naʋamŋe ʋose ɀinhu iɀoɀo ɀose.
Ʋaiʋa Maria Magdarene naJohana naMaria,
Mashoko awa akaita sooʋupenzi kwaʋari; ʋakasaatenda.
Ɀino Petro akasimuka, akamhanyira kubgiro; akakotama, akaʋona miceka iri yoga; ndokudzoka
Pazuʋa irero ʋamŋe ʋaʋiri ʋaʋo ʋakaŋga ʋacienda kumusha wainzi Emausi, wakaŋga uri kure neJerusarema mastadia anamakumi matanhatu;
ʋakaŋga ʋacitaurirana pamsoro peɀinhu ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitika.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacataurirana nokubvunzana, Jesu amene akasweɗera, akafamba naʋo.
Asi meso aʋo akaŋga aɓatwa, ʋakasamuziʋa.
Akati kwaʋari: Mashoko amunotaurirana pamsoro pawo mucifamba, ndeeiko? Ʋakamira ʋaneshuŋgu
Mumŋe waʋo, wainzi Kreopasi, akapindura, akati kwaari: Ko ndiwe woga ugere muJerusarema
Akati kwaʋari: Ɀinyiko? Ʋakati kwaari: ⱿaJesu weNazareta, waiʋa muprofita unesimba paɓasa napashoko pamberi paMŋari napaʋanhu ʋose;
ʋuye kuti ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaɓati ʋeɗu ʋakamuisa
Takaŋga ticiti ndiye waizodzikinura ʋaIsraeri; ʋuye pamsoro paiɀoɀo ɀose, nhasi raʋa zuʋa retatu kubva pakuitwa kwaɀo.
Ʋuye ɀe, ʋamŋe ʋakadzi ʋokweɗu, ʋakaŋga ʋafumira kubgiro, ʋakatishamisa;
ʋakati ʋacishaiwa muʋiri wake, ʋakaʋuya ʋaciti, ʋaʋona ciratidzo caʋatumŋa ʋaiti mupenyu.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaiʋa nesu, ʋakaenda kubgiro, ʋakandoɀiwana seɀaʋakareʋa ʋakadzi; asi iye haʋana‐kumuʋona.
Ɀino iye akati kwaʋari: Imi ʋokusafuŋga, munemŋoyo inononoka kutenda ɀose ɀakarebga naʋaprofita!
Ko Kristu wakaŋga asiŋgafaniri kutambudzika saiɀoɀo, agopinda pakubginya kwake here?
Ipapo akataŋga kunaMosesi naʋaprofita ʋose, akaʋaɗudzira ɀakanyorwa pamsoro pake muMagwaro ose.
Ɀino ʋakasweɗera kumusha kwaʋakaŋga ʋacienda; iye akaita sowoɗa kupfuʋura.
Ʋakamugombedzera, ʋaciti: Garai nesu, nokuti aʋa maɗekwana, zuʋa raʋira. Ipapo akapinda kundogara naʋo.
Ɀino wakati agara naʋo pakudya, akatora ciŋgwa, akaciropafadza, akacimeɗura, ndokuʋapa.
Ipapo meso aʋo akaȿinudzwa, ʋakamuziʋa; akanyaŋgarika kwaʋari.
Ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Ko mŋoyo yeɗu yakaŋga isiŋgapisi mukati meɗu, acitaura nesu munzira, nokutizarurira Magwaro here?
Ʋakasimuka neŋguʋa iyo, ʋakadzokera Jerusarema, ʋakawana ʋanegumi nomumŋe naʋaiʋa naʋo ʋakaʋuŋgana.
Iʋo ʋakati: Ishe wamuka ɀirokwaɀo; waʋonekwa naSimoni.
Ʋakarondedzera
Ʋakati ʋacataura iɀoɀo, akamira pakati
Asi ʋakavunduka, ʋakatya kwaɀo, ʋakati ɀimŋe ʋaʋona mŋeya.
Akati kwaʋari: Munomanikidzwa neiko? Mifuŋgo inomukireiko mumŋoyo yenyu?
Tarirai ɀanza ɀaŋgu netsoka dzaŋgu, kuti ndini ndimene. Ndiɓatei, muʋone, nokuti mŋeya haunenyama namafupa, seɀamunondiʋona ndinaɀo ini.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaʋaratidza ɀanza ɀake netsoka dzake.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacigere kutenda nokufara
Ʋakamupa nhindi yehoʋe yakagocwa.
Akatora, akadya ʋaciɀiʋona.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndiwo mashoko aŋgu, andakakuʋudzai ndiciri nemi, kuti ɀose ɀakanyorwa pamsoro paŋgu pamurairo waMosesi, napaʋaprofita, napaMapisarema, ɀinofanira kuitika.
Ipapo akadziʋura kuziʋa kwaʋo, kuti ʋanzwisise Magwaro.
Akati kwaʋari: Ndiɀo ɀakanyorwa, kuti Kristu ucatambudzika, agomuka kuʋakafa nezuʋa retatu;
kuti marudzi ose aparidzirwe nezita rake kutendeʋuka nokukaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi, ʋacitaŋga paJerusarema.
Imi muri ɀapupu ɀeɀinhu iɀi.
Tarirai, ndinotuma pamsoro penyu cipikirwa caƂaɓa ʋaŋgu; asi imi garai muguta, kuȿikira mafukidzwa nesimba rinobva kumsoro.
Ɀino akaʋatuŋgamirira kunze
Wakati acaʋaropafadza, akaparadzana naʋo, akakwidzwa kuɗeŋga.
Ipapo ʋakamunamata, ʋakadzokera Jerusarema ʋanomufaro mukuru.
Ʋakarambira mutembere, ʋacirumbidza Mŋari.
Pakutaŋga Shoko rakaŋga riri’po, Shoko rakaŋga riri kunaMŋari, Shoko rakaŋga riri Mŋari.
Ireri pakutaŋga rakaŋga riri kunaMŋari.
Ɀinhu ɀose ɀakaitwa naye; kunze kwake hakuna‐kuitwa kunyaŋge cinhu cimŋe cakaitwa.
Ʋupenyu bgaiʋa maari; ʋupenyu bgaiʋa ciedza caʋanhu.
Ciedza cinovenekera murima; asi rima harina‐kucikunda.
Kwakaŋga kunomunhu wakatumŋa naMŋari, zita rake rainzi Johane.
Iye wakaʋuya kuzopupura, kuti apupurire ciedza, kuti ʋose ʋatende naye.
Uyo wakaŋga asati ari ico ciedza, asi
Ici caiʋa ciedza caɀokwaɗi, cinovenekera munhu mumŋe nomumŋe, pakuȿika
Wakaŋga ari panyika, asi nyika haina‐kumuziʋa.
Wakaʋuya kuneɀake, asi
Asi ʋose ʋakamugamucira, wakaʋapa simba kuti ʋaʋe ʋana ʋaMŋari, iʋaʋo ʋanotenda kuzita rake;
aʋo ʋasina‐kuɓerekwa neropa, kana nokuɗa kwenyama, kana nokuɗa kwomurume, asi naMŋari.
Shoko rakazoʋa nyama, rikagara pakati peɗu, (tikaʋona kubginya kwake, kubginya sokwowakaɓerekwa mumŋe cete waƂaɓa), azere nenyasha neɀokwaɗi.
Johane akamupupurira, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Ndiye wandaireʋa,
Nokuti pakuzara kwake isu tose takapiwa nyasha pamsoro penyasha.
Nokuti murairo wakapiwa naMosesi, nyasha neɀokwaɗi ɀakaʋuya naJesu Kristu.
Hakunomunhu wakatoŋgoʋona Mŋari; Mŋari wakaɓerekwa ari mumŋe woga, uri pacifuʋa caƂaɓa, ndiye waka
Uku ndiko kupupura kwaJohane, musi ʋaJuda ʋakatumira kwaari ʋaprista naʋaRevi, ʋacibva Jerusarema, kundomubvunza,
Akatenda pacena, haana‐kuramba, akatenda pacena,
Ʋakamubvunza,
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ndiwe aniko? Tigondopindura ʋakatituma. Unoɀiti aniko?
Akati: Ndini inzwi rounoɗana murenje,
Aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋatumŋa ʋaiʋa ʋaʋaFarise.
Ʋakamubvunza, ʋakati kwaari: Kana usi Kristu, kana Eria, kana muprofita uya, unogobapatidzireiko?
Johane akapindura, akati: Ini ndinobapatidza nemvura; asi pakati penyu pamire mumŋe wamusiŋgaziʋi;
ndiye unoʋuya shure kwaŋgu, wandisina‐kufanira kuti ndisunuŋgure rukanda rweshaŋgu yake.
Iɀoɀi ɀakaitwa paBetania, mhiri kwaJoridani, kwaibapatidza Johane.
Aʋa maŋgwana wakaʋona Jesu aciʋuya kwaari, akati: Tarirai, Gwaiana raMŋari, rinobvisa ɀiʋi ɀenyika.
Ndiye wandaireʋa,
Neni ndakaŋga ndisiŋgamuziʋi; asi ndiɀo ɀandakaʋuyira, ndicibapatidza nemvura, kuti aʋoneswe kuʋaIsraeri.
Johane akapupura, akati: Ndakaʋona Mŋeya aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga senjiʋa, akagara pamsoro pake.
Neni ndakaŋga ndisiŋgamuziʋi; asi wakandituma kubapatidza nemvura, ndiye wakati kwandiri: Uyo waunoʋona Mŋeya aciɓuruka pamsoro pake, akagara pamsoro pake, ndiye unobapatidza noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ini ndikaʋona, ndikapupura kuti uyu ndiye Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Aʋa maŋgwana ɀe Johane wakaŋga amire naʋadzidzi ʋake ʋaʋiri;
akatarisisa Jesu acifamba, akati: Tarirai, Gwaiana raMŋari!
ʋadzidzi ʋaʋiri, ʋakamunzwa acitaura, ʋakateʋera Jesu.
Jesu akatendeʋuka akaʋaʋona ʋaciteʋera, akati kwaʋari: Munotȿakeiko? Ʋakati kwaari: Rabi (ndokuti Mudzidzisi, kana ɀicishandurwa), munogarepiko?
Akati kwaʋari: Ʋuyai, muʋone. Ʋakaenda, ʋakandoʋona kwaaigara, ʋakagara naye zuʋa iro; yakaŋga iri ŋguʋa ineŋge yegumi.
Mumŋe waiʋaʋo ʋaʋiri, ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa Johane, ʋakamuteʋera, waiʋa Andreasi, munuŋuna waSimoni Petro.
Iye akataŋga kuwana Simoni, mukoma wake, akati kwaari: Tawana Mesiasi (ndokuti Kristu, kana ɀicishandurwa).
Akamuisa kunaJesu. Jesu akamutarira, akati: Ndiwe Simoni, mŋanakomana waJona, ucanzi Kefasi (ɀinoshandurwa, ɗombo).
Aʋa maŋgwana akaɗa kuenda Garirea, akawana Firipo; Jesu akati kwaari: Nditeʋere.
Firipo wakaŋga ari weBetsaida, guta raAndreasi naPetro.
Firipo akawana Natanaeri, akati kwaari: Tamuwana iye, wakanyorwa ɀake naMosesi pamurairo naʋaprofita,
Natanaeri akati kwaari: Kunecinhu cakanaka ciŋgabva Nazareta here? Firipo akati kwaari: Ʋuya, uʋone.
Jesu akaʋona Natanaeri aciʋuya kwaari, akamuti: Tarirai, muIsraeri waɀokwaɗi, usinokunyeŋgera maari.
Natanaeri akati kwaari: Mandiziʋirepiko? Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Firipo asati akuɗana, uri munyasi momuʋonde, ndakakuʋona.
Natanaeri akamupindura,
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Unotenda iwe, nokuti ndakati kwauri, ndakakuʋona munyasi momuʋonde here? Ucazoʋona ɀikuru kunaiɀoɀi.
Akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mucaʋona kuɗeŋga kwazarurwa, naʋatumŋa ʋaMŋari ʋacikwira, nokuɓurukira pamsoro poMŋanakomana womunhu.
Nezuʋa retatu mutambo wokuwana waiʋa’po paKana yeGarirea; namai ʋaJesu ʋakaŋga ʋari’po.
NaJesu naʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaɗanwa ʋo kumutambo wokuwana.
Waini yakati icizoshaikwa, mai ʋaJesu ʋakati kwaari: Haʋacinewaini.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ndineiko nemi, mai? Ŋguʋa yaŋgu icigere kuȿika.
Mai ʋake ʋakati kuʋaranda: Itai ɀose ɀaanokuʋudzai.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunamakate matanhatu amabge, akaŋga aiswa’po netsika yaʋaJuda yokuɀinatsa, rimŋe nerimŋe raizadzwa neɀiyero ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Zadzai makate nemvura. Iʋo ʋakaazadza kuȿikira pamiromo.
Akati kwaʋari: Cerai ɀino muise kumukuru womutambo. Ʋakandoisa.
Ɀino mukuru womutambo wakati araʋira mvura yakashanduka waini, asiŋgaziʋi payabva, (asi ʋaranda, ʋakaŋga ʋacera mvura, ʋaiziʋa), mukuru womutambo akaɗana cikomba,
akati kwaari: Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unositaŋga aɓuɗisa waini yakanaka, neisiŋganaki kana ʋanwa kwaɀo; asi iwe waceŋgeta waini yakanaka kuȿikira ɀino.
Ici ciratidzo cake cokutaŋga Jesu wakaita paKana yeGarirea, akaratidza kubginya kwake; ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakatenda kwaari.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo wakaɓurukira Kapernaume, iye namai ʋake naʋanuŋuna, naʋadzidzi ʋake; akagara’po mazuʋa mashomanene.
Paseka yaʋaJuda yakaŋga yaʋa pedyo; ɀino Jesu akakwira Jerusarema.
Akawana mutembere ʋaiteŋgesa ŋombe namakwai nenjiʋa, naʋaitsinhanha mari, ʋagere’mo.
Akaruka tyaʋa yorwonzi, akaɓuɗisa mutembere makwai neŋombe ɀose; akaparadza mari yaʋaitsinhanha, nokuwisa matafura aʋo.
Akati kunaʋaiteŋgesa njiʋa: Bvisai ɀinhu iɀoɀo muno; musaita imba yaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu imba yokuteŋgesera.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaraŋgarira kuti kwakanyorwa,
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Uŋgatiratidza ciratidzo ceiko, ɀaunoita ɀinhu iɀoɀo?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Putsai tembere iyi, ini ndicaimutsa ɀe namazuʋa matatu.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati: Tembere iyi yakaʋakwa namakore anamakumi manna namatanhatu, ɀino iwe uŋgaimutsa namazuʋa matatu here?
Asi iye wakaŋga acireʋa tembere yomuʋiri wake
Ɀino wakati amutswa kuʋakafa, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaraŋgarira, kuti wakaŋga areʋa iɀoɀo; ʋakatenda Rugwaro neshoko rakaŋga rarebga naJesu.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yaakaŋga ari Jerusarema pamutambo wepaseka, ʋazhinji ʋakatenda kuzita rake, ʋaciʋona ɀiratidzo ɀaaiita.
Asi Jesu haana‐kuɀiisa
Wakaŋga asiŋgatȿaki kuti munhu mumŋe apupure ɀomunhu; nokuti wakaŋga aciziʋa iye ɀiri mumunhu.
Kwaiʋa’po mumŋe waʋaFarise, wainzi Nikodimo, mukuru waʋaJuda.
Iye akaʋuya kwaari ʋusiku, akati kwaari: Rabi, tinoziʋa kuti muri Mudzidzisi wakabva kunaMŋari; nokuti hakunomunhu unogona kuita ɀiratidzo iɀoɀo ɀamunoita, kana Mŋari asi naye.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwauri: Kana munhu asiŋgaɓerekwi kutȿa, haaŋgaʋoni ʋushe bgaMŋari.
Nikodimo akati kwaari: Munhu uŋgagoɓerekwa seiko aʋa mukuru? Uŋgapinda ɀe muɗumbu ramai ʋake rwecipiri, akaɓerekwa here?
Jesu akapindura,
Cakaɓerekwa nenyama inyama, cakaɓerekwa noMŋeya, mŋeya.
Usashamiswa, nokuti ndakati kwauri: Munofanira kuɓerekwa kutȿa.
Mhepo inovuvuta painoɗa napo, unonzwa inzwi rayo, asi hauziʋi painobva napainoenda; mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɓerekwa noMŋeya wakaɗaro.
Nikodimo akapindura, akati kwaari: Ɀinhu iɀi ɀiŋgagoitwa seiko?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Iwe uri mudzidzisi waʋaIsraeri, haunzwisisi ɀinhu iɀoɀi here?
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwauri: Tinotaura ɀatinoziʋa, tinopupura ɀatakaʋona; asi imi hamugamuciri kupupura kweɗu.
Kana ndakakuʋudzai ɀinhu ɀenyika, mukasatenda, muŋgagotenda seiko, kana ndicikuʋudzai ɀinhu ɀokuɗeŋga?
Hakunomunhu wakakwira kuɗeŋga, asi iye wakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga, iye Mŋanakomana womunhu.
Mosesi seɀaakasimudza nyoka murenje, saiɀoɀo Mŋanakomana womunhu unofanira kusimudzwa ʋo,
kuti aninani unotenda kwaari, aʋe noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti Mŋari wakaɗa nyika nokuɗaro, kuti wakapa Mŋanakomana wake wakaɓerekwa mumŋe woga, kuti aninani unotenda kwaari, arege kufa, asi aʋe noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti Mŋari haana‐kutumira Mŋanakomana wake panyika, kuti atoŋge nyika, asi kuti nyika iponeswe naye.
Unotenda kwaari, haatoŋgwi; asi usiŋgatendi kwaari, watotoŋgwa, nokuti haana‐kutenda kuzita roMŋanakomana waMŋari wakaɓerekwa mumŋe woga.
Kutoŋgwa ndokuku, kuti ciedza cakaȿika panyika, asi ʋanhu ʋakaɗa rima kupfuʋura ciedza, nokuti maɓasa aʋo akaŋga akaipa.
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe, unoita ɀakaipa, unoʋeŋga ciedza, haaʋuyi paciedza, kuti maɓasa ake arege kuɓuɗiswa pacena.
Asi unoita ɀokwaɗi, unoʋuya paciedza, kuti maɓasa ake aʋonekwe, kuti akaitwa munaMŋari.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jesu wakaȿika munyika yeJudea, naʋadzidzi ʋake, akagara’ko naʋo acibapatidza.
NaJohane wakaŋga acibapatidza ʋo paAinoni, pedyo neSarimi, nokuti kwaiʋa nemvura zhinji ipapo; ʋakaʋuya, ʋakabapatidzwa.
Nokuti Johane wakaŋga acigere kuiswa mutoroŋgo.
Ɀino nharo dzikamuka pamsoro pokuɀinatsa pakati paʋadzidzi ʋaJohane nomumŋe muJuda.
Ʋakaʋuya kunaJohane, ʋakati kwaari: Rabi, uya waiʋa nemi mhiri kwaJoridani, wamaimbopupurira, tarirai, iye unobapatidza, ʋuye ʋose ʋanoʋuya kwaari.
Johane akapindura, akati: Munhu haaŋgagamuciri cinhu, kana asina‐kucipiwa cicibva kuɗeŋga.
Imi mumene muŋgandipupurira, kuti ndakati: Handizi Kristu ini, asi kuti ndakatumŋa pamberi pake.
Unomŋeŋga ndico cikomba; asi shamŋari yecikomba inomira icimunzwa, inofara ɀikuru nenzwi recikomba. Naiɀoɀo kufara kwaŋgu uku kwazadzika.
Iye unofanira kukura, asi ini
Unobva kumsoro ndiye uri pamsoro paʋose; nounobva panyika ndowenyika, unotaura ɀenyika; unobva kuɗeŋga ndiye uri pamsoro paʋose.
Ɀaakaʋona neɀaakanzwa, ndiɀo ɀaanopupura; asi hakunomunhu unogamucira kupupura kwake.
Uyo wakagamucira kupupura kwake, wakasimbisa kuti Mŋari ndowaɀokwaɗi.
Nokuti wakatumŋa naMŋari, ndiye unotaura mashoko aMŋari; nokuti haapi Mŋeya aciyera.
Ƃaɓa ʋanoɗa Mŋanakomana, ʋakamupa ɀose muruʋoko rwake.
Unotenda kuMŋanakomana, unoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; asi usiŋgatereri Mŋanakomana, haaŋgaʋoni ʋupenyu, asi kutsamŋa kwaMŋari kunogara pamsoro pake.
Ɀino Ishe wakati aziʋa kuti ʋaFarise ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa kuti Jesu wakaita nokubapatidza ʋadzidzi kupfuʋura Johane,
(kunyaŋge Jesu wakaŋga asiŋgabapatidzi amene, asi ʋadzidzi ʋake),
akabva Judea, akaenda ɀeGarirea.
Wakaŋga acifanira kupfuʋura neSamaria.
Ɀino akaȿika paguta reSamaria, rainzi Sikari, pedyo nenyika yakaŋga yapa Jakobo mŋanakomana wake Josefa.
Tsime raJakobo rakaŋga riri’po. Ɀino Jesu aneta nokufamba, ndokuŋgogara ɀake patsime. Yaiʋa ŋguʋa ineŋge yecitanhatu.
Ɀino
Nokuti ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaenda muguta kundoteŋga ɀokudya.
Ipapo mukadzi muSamaria akati kwaari: Ko iwe muJuda, unokumbira seiko kwandiri kunwa, ini mukadzi muSamaria? (Nokuti ʋaJuda haʋafambidzani naʋaSamaria).
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Ƌai waiziʋa cipo caMŋari, ʋuye kuti ndiani unoti kwauri, ndipei ʋo ndinwe, uŋgaɗai waikumbira kwaari, akakupa mvura mhenyu.
Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, hamuna‐camuŋgacera naco, tsime rakadzika, ɀino mvura mhenyu muŋgaiwanepiko?
Ko muri mukuru kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu Jakobo, ʋakatipa tsime
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Mumŋe nomumŋe, unonwa mvura iyi, ucaʋa nenyota ɀe.
Asi aninani, unonwa mvura yandicamupa ini, haacazoʋi nenyota nokusiŋgaperi; asi mvura, yandicamupa, icaʋa mukati make tsime remvura, inovaira kuʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, ndipei mvura iyi, kuti ndirege kuzoʋa nenyota, kana kuʋuya kucera pano.
Jesu akati kwaari: Enda, undoɗana murume wako, ugoʋuya pano.
Mukadzi akapindura, akati kwaari: Handinomurume. Jesu akati kwaari: Wareʋa ɀakanaka,
Nokuti watoʋa naʋarume ʋashanu; uyo, waunaye ɀino, haazi murume wako; apo wareʋa ɀokwaɗi.
Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, ndinoʋona kuti muri muprofita.
Madziɓaɓa eɗu ainamata pagomo iri; imi munoti muJerusarema ndimo munofanira kunamatwa.
Jesu akati kwaari: Mai, nditende kuti ŋguʋa inoʋuya, yamusiŋgazonamati Ƃaɓa pagomo iri, kana paJerusarema.
Imi munonamata camusiŋgaziʋi; isu tinonamata catinoziʋa, nokuti ruponeso runobva kuʋaJuda.
Asi ŋguʋa inoʋuya, naɀino yatoʋa’po, yokuti ʋanonamata neɀokwaɗi ʋacanamata Ƃaɓa mumŋeya neɀokwaɗi; nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋanotȿaka ʋakaɗaro kuzomunamata.
Mŋari ndiMŋeya; ʋanomunamata, ʋanofanira kumunamata mumŋeya neɀokwaɗi.
Ɀino mukadzi akati kwaari: Ndinoziʋa kuti Mesiasi unoʋuya, unonzi Kristu; kana iye aȿika, ucatiʋudza ɀose.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ini, ndinotaura newe, ndini iye.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaȿika, ʋakashamiswa
Ipapo mukadzi akasiya ciroŋgo cake, akaenda muguta, akati kuʋanhu:
Ʋuyai muʋone munhu, wakandiʋudza ɀose ɀandakaita. Ko uyu handiti ndiye Kristu here?
Ʋakaɓuɗa muguta, ʋakaenda kwaari.
Neŋguʋa iyo ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakafano‐munyeŋgetera, ʋaciti: Rabi, cidyai.
Iye akati kwaʋari: Ini ndineɀokudya, ɀandinodya, ɀamusiŋgaziʋi.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakataurirana,
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀokudya ɀaŋgu ndiɀo, kuti ndiite kuɗa kwowakandituma, nokupedza ɓasa rake.
Ko imi hamuti: Kwasara mŋedzi minna, kuceka kwaȿika? Tarirai, ini ndinoti kwamuri: Simudzai meso enyu, ʋonai minda, kuti yatoibvira kuceka.
Unoceka unopiwa muɓairo, unoʋuŋganidza ɀiɓereko muʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; kuti unokusha nounoceka ʋafare ʋose.
Nokuti shumo ndeyaɀokwaɗi, inoti: Mumŋe unokusha, mumŋe aciceka.
Ndakakutumai kundoceka ɀamusakaɓatira; ʋamŋe ʋakaɓata, ɀino imi mapinda paneɀaʋakaɓatira iʋo.
Ɀino ʋaSamaria ʋazhinji ʋeguta iro ʋakatenda kwaari neshoko romukadzi, wakapupura,
Ɀino ʋaSamaria ʋakati ʋaciȿika kwaari, ʋakamunyeŋgetera kuti agare naʋo; akagara’po mazuʋa maʋiri.
Naʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋakatenda neshoko rake.
Ʋakati kumukadzi: Haticatendi nokureʋa kwako; taɀinzwira timene, tinoziʋa kuti uyu ndiye Muponesi wenyika ɀirokwaɀo.
Mazuʋa maʋiri akati apfuʋura, akabva’po; akaenda Garirea
Nokuti Jesu amene wakapupura, kuti muprofita haakudzwi munyika yake.
Ɀino wakati aciȿika Garirea, ʋaGarirea ʋakamugamucira, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaʋona ɀose ɀaakaita Jerusarema pamutambo, nokuti naiʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaenda ʋo kumutambo.
Ɀino Jesu wakaȿika ɀe paKana yeGarirea, paakaŋga ashandura mvura ikaita waini.
Iye wakati acinzwa kuti Jesu wabva Judea, waȿika Garirea, akaenda kwaari, akamunyeŋgetera kuti aɓuruke kundoporesa mŋanakomana wake; nokuti wakaŋga wotandadza.
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaari: Kana musiŋgaʋoni ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso, hamuŋgatoŋgotendi.
Mutariri washe akati kwaari: Ishe, ɓurukai henyu, mŋana waŋgu asati afa.
Jesu akati kwaari: Enda hako, mŋanakomana wako mupenyu. Munhu
Wakati acaɓuruka, ʋaranda ʋake ʋakasoŋgana naye, ʋakati: Mŋana wenyu mupenyu.
Ɀino akaʋabvunza ŋguʋa yaakataŋga kunaya nayo. Ʋakati kwaari: Zuro neŋguʋa yecinomŋe fiviri yakabva kwaari.
Ɀino ɓaɓa ʋakaziʋa kuti ndiyo ŋguʋa Jesu yaakati kwaari: Mŋanakomana wako mupenyu. Iye akatenda nemhuri yake yose.
Ici ndico ciratidzo cecipiri cakaitwa naJesu, abva Judea, aȿika Garirea.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo, mutambo waʋaJuda waiʋa’po; Jesu akakwira Jerusarema.
Ɀino paJerusarema pedyo nesuʋo ramakwai kwaiʋa nedziʋa rainzi Betesda neciHeberu, raiʋa namaɓiraʋira mashanu.
Mukati mawo makaŋga muʋete ʋazhinji ʋairwara namapofu, neɀirema, naʋakawonyana, [ʋaigarira kubvoŋgodzwa kwemvura.
Nokuti mutumŋa waiɓurukira mudziʋa iro neimŋe ŋguʋa, acibvoŋgodza mvura; ɀino uyo waitaŋga kupinda mumvura yabvoŋgodzwa waiporeswa, kunyaŋge akaŋga akaɓatwa nokurwara kupi nokupi.]
Ɀino kwaiʋa’po mumŋe munhu, wakaŋga aɓatwa nokurwara kwake makore makumi matatu namasere.
Jesu wakati aʋona munhu uyo aʋete pasi, ɀaaiziʋa kuti wakaŋga
Murwere akamupindura,
Jesu akati kwaari: Simuka, tora nhoʋo dzako, ufambe.
Pakarepo munhu uyo akaporeswa, akatora nhoʋo dzake, akafamba.
Musi uyo waiʋa wesaɓata.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati kunowakaporeswa: isaɓata, hautenderwi kutakura nhoʋo dzako.
Iye akapindura,
Ʋakamubvunza,
Ɀino wakaŋga aporeswa, haana‐kuziʋa kuti ndiani; nokuti Jesu wakaŋga abva, ɀakwaiʋa naʋanhu ʋazhinji panɀimbo iyo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jesu akamuwana mutembere, akati kwaari: Tarira, waporeswa; usatadza ɀe, kuti urege kuɓatwa necinhu cakaipa cinokunda cici.
Ɀino munhu uyo akandoʋudza ʋaJuda, kuti ndiJesu wakamuporesa.
Saka ʋaJuda ʋakatambudza Jesu, nokuti wakaɀiita iɀoɀo nesaɓata.
Asi iye wakapindura, akati: Ƃaɓa ʋangu ʋacaɓata kuȿikira ɀino, neni ndinoɓata ʋo.
Saka ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakatȿaka ɀikuru kumuʋuraya, nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaputsi

Ɀino Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mŋanakomana haagoni kuita cinhu oga, kana asiŋgaʋoni Ƃaɓa ʋaciciita; nokuti ɀose ɀaʋanoita iʋo, Mŋanakomana unoɀiita saiɀoɀo ʋo.
Nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋanoɗa Mŋanakomana, ʋanomuratidza ɀose ɀaʋanoita ʋamene; ʋacamuratidza maɓasa makuru kunawawa, kuti mushamiswe.
Nokuti Ƃaɓa sezaʋanomutsa ʋakafa, ʋaciʋararamisa, saiɀoɀo Mŋanakomana unoraramisa ʋo ʋaanoɗa
Nokuti naƂaɓa haʋatoŋgi munhu, asi ʋakapa Mŋanakomana kutoŋga kwose,
kuti ʋose ʋakudze Mŋanakomana seɀaʋanokudza Ƃaɓa. Usiŋgakudzi Mŋanakomana, haakudzi naƂaɓa, ʋakamutuma.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Unonzwa shoko raŋgu, nokutenda wakandituma, unoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; haaʋuyi mukutoŋgwa, asi wabva murufu, waenda muʋupenyu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ŋguʋa inoʋuya, naɀino yatoʋa’po, nayo ʋakafa ʋacanzwa inzwi roMŋanakomana waMŋari; ʋanonzwa ʋacararama.
Nokuti Ƃaɓa seɀaʋanoʋupenyu maʋari, saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋakapa Mŋanakomana, kuti aʋe noʋupenyu maari.
Ʋakamupa simba rokutoŋga, ɀaari Mŋanakomana womunhu.
Musashamiswa naiɀoɀo; nokuti ŋguʋa inoʋuya, nayo ʋose ʋari mumabgiro ʋacanzwa inzwi rake,
ʋacaɓuɗa; aʋo ʋakaita ɀakanaka, kukumuka kwoʋupenyu, aʋo ʋakaita ɀakaipa, kukumuka kwokutoŋgwa.
Handigoni kuita cinhu ndoga; ndinotoŋga seɀandinonzwa; kutoŋga kwaŋgu kwakarurama, nokuti handitȿaki kuɗa kwaŋgu, asi kuɗa kwowakandituma.
Kana ndiciɀipupurira, kupupura kwaŋgu hakuzi kwaɀokwaɗi.
Mumŋe uri’po unondipupurira; ndinoziʋa kuti kupupura kwake kwaanondipupurira ndokwaɀokwaɗi.
Makatuma kunaJohane, iye akapupurira ɀokwaɗi.
Ini handigamuciri kupupura kunobva kumunhu, asi ndinoreʋa iɀoɀo kuti muponeswe.
Iye wakaŋga ari mŋenje unopfuta nounoveneka; imi makaŋga muciɗa kufara ŋguʋa ɗuku muciedza cake.
Ini ndinecapupu cikuru kunaJohane; nokuti maɓasa andakapiwa naƂaɓa kuti ndiapedze, iwo maɓasa andinoita, ndiwo anondipupurira kuti Ƃaɓa ʋakandituma.
Naiʋo Ƃaɓa, ʋakandituma, ndiʋo ʋakandipupurira ʋo. Hamuna‐kutoŋgonzwa inzwi raʋo, kana kuʋona mufananidzo waʋo.
Shoko raʋo harigari mukati menyu, nokuti hamutendi waʋakatuma.
Munonɀera Magwaro, nokuti munoti ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi munabgo maari; ndiwo anondipupurira ini.
Asi hamuɗi kuʋuya kwandiri, kuti muʋe noʋupenyu.
Handigamuciri kukudzwa kunobva kuʋanhu;
asi ndinokuziʋai, kuti hamunoruɗo rwaMŋari mukati menyu.
Ndakaʋuya nezita raƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, asi hamundigamuciri; kana mumŋe akaȿika nezita rake amene, mucamugamucira iye.
Muŋgatenda seiko imi, iyemi munogamucira kukudzwa mumŋe kunomumŋe, asi kukudzwa kunobva kunaMŋari, uri oga, hamukutȿaki?
Musati ndicakupomerai mhoȿa kunaƂaɓa; mumŋe uri’ko unokupomerai mhoȿa,
Nokuti ɗai maitenda Mosesi, muŋgaɗai mainditenda ini, nokuti iye wakanyora ɀaŋgu.
Asi kana musiŋgatendi manyoro ake, muŋgatenda seiko mashoko aŋgu?
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jesu wakenda mhiri kweguŋgwa reGarirea,
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakamuteʋera, nokuti ʋakaʋona ɀiratidzo ɀaaiita kuʋarwere.
Jesu akakwira mugomo, akagara’mo naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Paseka, mutambo waʋaJuda, wakaŋga uri pedyo.
Ɀino Jesu wakati acitarira, akaʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋaciʋuya kwaari, akati kunaFiripo: Tiŋgateŋgepiko ɀiŋgwa, kuti ʋanhu aʋa ʋadye?
Wakareʋa iɀoɀo kuti amuidze, nokuti iye wakaziʋa amene ɀaakaŋga aciɗa kuita.
Firipo akamupindura,
Ɀino mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake, Andreasi, munuŋuna waSimoni Petro, akati kwaari:
Pano panomukomana, uneɀiŋgwa ɀishanu ɀebari nehoʋe mbiri; asi iɀi ɀiŋgakwanira sei ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaɗai?
Jesu akati: Garisai ʋanhu pasi. Ɀino kwakaŋga kunoʋuswa bguzhinji ipapo. Naiɀoɀo ʋarume ʋakagara pasi, kuwanda kwaʋo kuneŋge ɀuru ɀishanu.
Ɀino Jesu akatora ɀiŋgwa; akaʋoŋga, akaɀipa ʋakaŋga ʋagere pasi; nehoʋe ʋo saiɀoɀo paʋaiɗa napo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaguta, akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Ʋuŋganidzai ɀimeɗu ɀakasara, kuti kurege kurashika cinhu.
Ipapo ʋakaɀiʋuŋganidza, ʋakazadza mateŋgu anegumi namaʋiri neɀimeɗu ɀeɀiŋgwa ɀishanu ɀebari, ɀakaŋga ɀasara kunaʋakadya.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋakati ʋaʋona ciratidzo caakaita, ʋakati: Ɀirokwaɀo uyu muprofita, unoʋuya panyika.
Ɀino Jesu, ɀaakaziʋa kuti ʋoɗokuʋuya kumuɓata nesimba kuzomuita mambo, akabva ɀe, akaenda mugomo ari oga.
Ɀino aʋa maɗekwana, ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaɓurukira kuguŋgwa;
ʋakapinda mugwa, ʋakataŋga kuyambuka guŋgwa kuenda Kapernaume. Ɀino kwakaŋga kwaȿiɓa, asi Jesu wakaŋga asati aȿika kwaʋari.
Guŋgwa rikataŋga kumutswa nemhepo huru yaivuvuta.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋakwaȿa ɀikuru mastadia aneŋge makumi maʋiri namashanu, kana makumi matatu,
Asi iye akati kwaʋari: Ndini, musatya.
Ɀino ʋakafara kumugamucira mugwa, igwa rikaȿika pakarepo kunyika kwaʋakaŋga ʋacienda.

Aʋa maŋgwana ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakaŋga ʋamire mhiri kweguŋgwa, ʋakaʋona kuti pakaŋga pasinerimŋe igwa ɗuku ipapo, asi iro rimŋe makaŋga mapinda ʋadzidzi ʋake, mariri, ʋuye kuti Jesu haana‐kupinda mugwa naʋadzidzi ʋake, asi kuti ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋaenda ʋoga.
(Asi mamŋe magwa maɗuku akaŋga abva Tiberiasi, akaȿika pedyo paʋakadyira ɀiŋgwa, Ishe amboʋoŋga).
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋaʋona, kuti Jesu haa’po, naʋadzidzi ʋake, ʋakapinda ʋamene mumagwa maɗuku, ʋakaȿika Kapernaume, ʋacitȿaka Jesu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋamuwana mhiri kweguŋgwa, ʋakati kwaari: Rabi, maʋuya pano riniko?
Jesu akaʋapindura, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Hamunditȿaki nokuti makaʋona ɀiratidzo, asi nokuti makadya ɀiŋgwa mukaguta.
Musaɓatira ɀokudya ɀinopera, asi ɀokudya ɀinogara kuʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, ɀamucapiwa noMŋanakomana womunhu; nokuti Ƃaɓa, Mŋari, ʋakaisa cisimbiso kwaari.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ticaiteiko, kuti tiɓate maɓasa aMŋari?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Ƃasa raMŋari ndiro, kuti mutende kunaiye waakatuma.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Munoita ciratidzo cipiko, kuti tiʋone, tikutendei? Imi munoɓateiko?
Madziɓaɓa eɗu akadya mana murenje, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Wakaŋga asi iye Mosesi, wakakupai ciŋgwa cakabva kuɗeŋga, asi ndiƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋanokupai ciŋgwa caɀokwaɗi, cinobva kuɗeŋga.
Nokuti ciŋgwa caMŋari ndico cinoɓuruka kuɗeŋga, cinopa nyika ʋupenyu.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ishe, tipei ciŋgwa ici misi yose.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ndini ciŋgwa coʋupenyu; unoʋuya kwandiri, haaŋgatoŋgoʋi nenzara, nounotenda kwandiri haaŋgatoŋgoʋi nenyota.
Asi ndakakuʋudzai, kuti makandiʋona,
Ɀose Ƃaɓa ɀaʋanondipa ɀicaʋuya kwandiri; nounoʋuya kwandiri, handiŋgatoŋgomurashiri kunze.
Nokuti handina‐kuɓuruka kuɗeŋga, kuti ndiite kuɗa kwaŋgu, asi kuɗa kwowakandituma.
Kuɗa kwowakandituma ndiko, kuti paɀose ɀaakandipa, ndirege kurashikirwa necimŋe, asi kuti ndicimutse nezuʋa rokupedzisira.
Nokuti kuɗa kwaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ndiko, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe, unotarira Mŋanakomana, nokutenda kwaari, aʋe noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; neni ndicamumutsa nezuʋa rokupedzisira.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakaŋuŋuna pamsoro pake, nokuti wakati: Ndini ciŋgwa cakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga.
Ʋakati: Uyu haazi Jesu, Mŋanakomana waJosefa, watinoziʋa ɓaɓa namai ʋake here? Ɀino uŋgagoti seiko: Ndakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Musaŋuŋuna pakati penyu.
Hakunomunhu uŋgaʋuya kwandiri, kana Ƃaɓa, ʋakandituma, ʋasiŋgamukweʋi; neni ndicamumutsa nezuʋa rokupedzisira.
Muʋaprofita makanyorwa,
Ha
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Unotenda, unoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Ndini ciŋgwa coʋupenyu.
Madziɓaɓa enyu akadya mana murenje, akafa.
Ici ndico ciŋgwa, cinoɓuruka kuɗeŋga, kuti munhu acidye, arege kufa.
Ndini ciŋgwa cipenyu, cakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga; kana munhu acidya ciŋgwa ici, ucararama nokusiŋgaperi; ciŋgwa candicapa, inyama yaŋgu,
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakakakaʋara pakati paʋo, ʋaciti: Munhu uyu uŋgatipa seiko nyama yake, tidye?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musiŋgadyi nyama yoMŋanakomana womunhu, nokunwa ropa rake, hamunoʋupenyu mamuri.
Unodya nyama yaŋgu, nounonwa ropa raŋgu, unoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; ini ndicamumutsa nezuʋa rokupedzisira.
Nokuti nyama yaŋgu ndiɀo ɀokudya ɀaɀokwaɗi, neropa raŋgu ɀokunwa ɀaɀokwaɗi.
Unodya nyama yaŋgu, nounonwa ropa raŋgu, unogara mandiri, neni maari.
Ƃaɓa ʋapenyu, seɀaʋakandituma, neni ndicirarama naƂaɓa; saiɀoɀo unondidya, ucararama neni.
Ici ndico ciŋgwa cakaɓuruka kuɗeŋga; haɀina‐kuita samadziɓaɓa akadya, akafa; unodya ciŋgwa ici ucararama nokusiŋgaperi.
Wakareʋa ɀinhu iɀi musinagoge, acidzidzisa paKapernaume.
Ɀino ʋazhinji ʋaʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakati: Iri shoko igukutu; ndianiko uŋgarinzwa?
Asi Jesu, ɀaakaŋga aciziʋa mumŋoyo make kuti ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋanoŋuŋuna
Mucagoɗiniko kana muciʋona Mŋanakomana womunhu acikwira kwaaiʋa pakutaŋga?
Mŋeya ndiye unoraramisa, nyama hainamaturo; mashoko andakataura kwamuri, ndiwo mŋeya noʋupenyu.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋari’ko ʋasiŋgatendi; nokuti Jesu wakaŋga aciziʋa kubva pakutaŋga, kuti ʋaisatenda ndiʋanani, ʋuye kuti ndiani waizomupandukira.
Akati: Nemhaka iyi ndakati kwamuri, kuti hakunomunhu uŋgaʋuya kwandiri, kana asina‐kuɀipiwa naƂaɓa.
Ipapo ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋazhinji ʋakadzokera shure, ʋakasazofamba naye.
Jesu akati kunaʋanegumi naʋaʋiri: Nemi munoɗa kubva ʋo here?
Simoni Petro akamupindura, akati: Ishe, ticagoenda kunaniko? Ndimi munamashoko oʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Isu takatenda, tikaziʋa kuti ndimi Mutȿene waMŋari.
Jesu akapindura, akati: Handina‐kukusanaŋgurai, imi ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri here? Asi mumŋe wenyu ndo
Wakareʋa Judasi,
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jesu wakafamba muGarirea; nokuti wakaŋga asiŋgaɗi kufamba muJudea, nokuti ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kumuʋuraya.
Ɀino mutambo waʋaJuda wamatumba wakaŋga uri pedyo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakati kwaari: Ibva pano, uende Judea, kuti ʋadzidzi ʋako ʋaʋone ʋo maɓasa ako aunoita.
Nokuti hakunomunhu unoita cinhu cinyararire, kana iye amene aciɗa kuzikanwa; kana iwe uciita iɀi, uɀiratidze kunyika.
Nokuti naʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgatendi kwaari.
Ipapo Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ŋguʋa yaŋgu icigere kuȿika; asi ŋguʋa yenyu inogara yakagadzirwa.
Nyika haiŋgakuʋeŋgiyi imi; asi inondiʋeŋga ini, nokuti ndinoipupurira, kuti maɓasa ayo akaipa.
Kwirai kumutambo imi; ini handiti ndokwira kumutambo, nokuti ŋguʋa yaŋgu icigere kuȿika kwaɀo.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo kwaʋari, akagara Garirea.
Ɀino ʋanuŋuna ʋake ʋakati ʋakwira kumutambo, iye akabva okwira ʋo, asiŋgaendi pacena, asi paneŋge sapakaʋanda.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakamutȿaka pamutambo, ʋakati: Uripiko iye?
Kuŋuŋuna kukuru kukaʋa’po pakati paʋazhinji pamsoro pake, ʋamŋe ʋaciti: Wakanaka; ʋamŋe ʋaciti: Kwete, unotsausa ʋanhu ʋazhinji.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro kwakaŋga kusinomunhu waitaura pacena pamsoro pake, nokuti ʋakatya ʋaJuda.
Ɀino kwakati paʋa pakati pomutambo, Jesu akakwira kutembere, akataŋga kudzidzisa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaJuda ʋakashamiswa, ʋaciti: Munhu uyu unoziʋa seiko manyoro, ɀaasina‐kumbodzidza?
Jesu akapindura, akati: Kudzidzisa kwaŋgu hakuzi kwaŋgu, asi ndokwowakandituma.
Kana munhu aciɗa kuita kuɗa kwake, ucaziʋa kana kudzidzisa
Unoɀitaurira, unotȿaka kukudzwa kwake; asi unotȿaka kukudzwa kwowakamutuma, ndiye waɀokwaɗi, hapanakusarurama maari.
Mosesi haana‐kukupai murairo here? Asi hakunomumŋe wenyu unoita murairo. Munotȿakireiko kundiʋuraya?
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakapindura,
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Ndakaita ɓasa rimŋe, mukashamiswa mose.
Nemhaka iyi Mosesi wakakupai dziŋgiso, (handiti ndeyaMosesi, asi yamadziɓaɓa); ɀino imi munodziŋgisa munhu nesaɓata.
Ɀino kana munhu aŋgadziŋgiswa nesaɓata, kuti murairo waMosesi urege kuputswa, ko imi monditsamŋira nokuti ndakaporesa munhu wose nesaɓata here?
Musatoŋga neɀinoʋonekwa, asi toŋgai nokutoŋga kwakarurama.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋeJerusarema ʋakati: Ko haazi iye waʋaitȿaka kuʋuraya here?
Tarirai, unotaura pacena, ʋasiŋgareʋi cinhu kwaari. Ko ʋakuru ʋanoziʋa kwaɀo kanhi kuti ndiye Kristu?
Ɀino uyu tinoziʋa kwaanobva, asi Kristu kana aciȿika, hakunomunhu uŋgaziʋa kwaanobva.
Ɀino Jesu akaɗanidzira mutembere, akadzidzisa, aciti: Munondiziʋa, munoziʋa napandakabva; handina‐kuʋuya ini ndimene, asi wakandituma ndiye waɀokwaɗi, wamusiŋgaziʋi imi.
Ini ndinomuziʋa, nokuti ndinobva kwaari; ndiye wakandituma.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakatȿaka kumuɓata, asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakaisa ruʋoko kwaari, nokuti ŋguʋa yake yakaŋga isati yaȿika.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋakatenda kwaari, ʋakati: Kana Kristu acizoȿika, uŋgaita ɀiratidzo ɀizhinji kuneɀiɀi ɀakaitwa noyuyu here?
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakanzwa ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaciŋuŋuna iɀoɀo pamsoro pake; ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaFarise ʋakatuma ʋatariri kundomuɓata.
Ipapo Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ndiciri nemi ŋguʋa ɗuku, ndigoenda kunowakandituma.
Mucanditȿaka, asi hamuŋgandiwani; ʋuye apo pandiri, imi hamuŋgaȿiki’po.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakataurirana,
Rinoti kuɗiniko shoko iri raareʋa,
Ɀino nezuʋa rokupedzisira, zuʋa guru romutambo, Jesu wakamira, akaɗanidzira, akati: Aninani, kana anenyota, ŋgaaʋuye kwandiri, anwe.
Unotenda kwandiri, seɀaɀakarebga noRugwaro, nzizi dzemvura mhenyu dzicayerera dzicibva mukati make.
Asi iɀi wakareʋa ɀoMŋeya, waizopiwa aʋo ʋaitenda kwaari, nokuti Mŋeya wakaŋga usati waʋa’po, nokuti Jesu wakaŋga asati akudzwa.
Ɀino
Ʋamŋe ʋakati: Uyu ndiye Kristu. Asi ʋamŋe ʋakati: Ko Kristu uŋgabva Garirea here?
Rugwaro haruna‐kureʋa here, kuti Kristu ucabva kurudzi rwaDavidi, napamusha weBetrehema, paiʋa naDavidi?
Naiɀoɀo kupesana kwakamuka pamsoro pake pakati paʋazhinji.
Ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kumuɓata; asi kwakaŋga kusina‐wakaisa maʋoko kwaari.
Ɀino ʋatariri ʋakaʋuya kuʋaprista ʋakuru nokuʋaFarise, iʋo ʋakati kwaʋari: Makaregereiko kuʋuya naye?
Ʋatariri ʋakapindura,
Naiɀoɀo ʋaFarise ʋakaʋapindura,
Kuʋakuru nokuʋaFarise kunomumŋe wakatoŋgotenda kwaari here?
Asi ʋanhu aʋa ʋazhinji, ʋasiŋgaziʋi murairo, ʋakatukwa.
Nikodimo, (uya wakamboʋuya kwaari, waiʋa mumŋe waʋo), akati kwaʋari:
Murairo weɗu unotoŋga munhu, usati wambomunzwa, nokuziʋa caanoita here?
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Ko newe ʋo uri weGarirea here? Nɀera, uʋone kuti hakunomuprofita, unobva Garirea.
[Ipapo mumŋe nomumŋe wakaenda kumba kwake.
Jesu akaenda kugomo reMiorivi.
Maŋgwanani akadzokera ɀe kutembere, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaʋuya kwaari; akagara pasi akaʋadzidzisa.
Ʋanyori naʋaFarise ʋakaʋuya kwaari nomukadzi wakaŋga aɓatwa acifeʋa ʋakamuisa pakati
Ʋakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, mukadzi uyu wakaɓatwa acifeʋa, ipapo pamene.
Ɀino Mosesi wakatiraira pamurairo kuti
Ʋakareʋa iɀoɀo, ʋacimuidza, kuti ʋawane caʋaŋgamupomera mhoȿa naco. Asi Jesu wakakotama, akanyora pasi nomunwe.
Ɀino iʋo ʋakati ʋaciramba ʋacimubvunza, akakotoroka, akati kwaʋari: Usineciʋi pakati penyu, ŋgaataŋge kukande‐bge kwaari.
Akakotama ɀe, akanyora pasi.
Ɀino iʋo ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, hana dzaʋo dzikaʋaroʋa, ʋakaɓuɗa mumŋe‐mumŋe, kutaŋga ʋakuru kuȿikira kunowokupedzisira; Jesu akasara ari oga, nomukadzi wakaŋga amire pakati
Jesu akakotoroka; ɀino asiŋgaʋoni munhu, asi mukadzi oga, akati kwaari: Mai, ʋaya ʋakupomera mhoȿa ʋaripiko? Hakuna‐wakutoŋga here?
Iye akati: Hakuna, Ishe! Jesu akati kwaari: Neni ʋo handikupi mhoȿa. Enda hako, usatadza ɀe.]
Ɀino Jesu wakataura ɀe naʋo, akati: Ndini ciedza cenyika; unonditeʋera haaŋgatoŋgofambi murima, asi ucaʋa neciedza coʋupenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaFarise ʋakati kwaari: Unoɀipupurira iwe; kupupura kwako hakuzi kwaɀokwaɗi.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Kunyaŋge ndiciɀipupurira, kupupura kwaŋgu ndokwaɀokwaɗi; nokuti ndinoziʋa kwandakabva, nokwandinoenda; asi imi hamuziʋi kwandakabva, nokwandinoenda.
Imi munotoŋga nenyama; ini handitoŋgi munhu.
Asi kunyaŋge ndicitoŋga, kutoŋga kwaŋgu ndokwaɀokwaɗi; nokuti handizi ndoga, asi ini naƂaɓa ʋakandituma.
Ʋuye mumurairo wenyu makanyorwa, kuti kupupura kwaʋanhu ʋaʋiri ndokwaɀowaɗi.
Ndini ndinoɀipupurira, naƂaɓa ʋakandituma, ʋanondipupurira ʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Ƃaɓa ʋako ʋaripiko? Jesu akapindura,
Wakataura mashoko awa paciʋigiro cemari acidzidzisa mutembere; kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakamuɓata, nokuti ŋguʋa yake yakaŋga isati yaȿika.
Ɀino wakati ɀe kwaʋari: Ndinoenda, mucanditȿaka, mukafira muɀiʋi ɀenyu; pandinoenda, imi hamuŋgaʋuyi’po.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati: Ucaɀiʋuraya kanhi, ɀaanoti: Pandinoenda, imi hamuŋgaʋuyi’po?
Akati kwaʋari: Imi muri ʋapasi, ini ndiri wokumsoro; imi muri ʋenyika ino, ini handizi wenyika ino.
Naiɀoɀo ndakati kwamuri: Mucafira muɀiʋi ɀenyu, nokuti kana musiŋganditendi, kuti ndini
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Iwe ndiwe aniko? Jesu akati kwaʋari: Iɀo ɀandinoŋgoramba ndicikuʋudzai kubva pakutaŋga.
Ndineɀizhinji ɀandinoɗa kureʋa nokutoŋga pamsoro penyu; asi wakandituma ndowaɀokwaɗi; iɀo ɀandakanzwa kwaari, ndiɀo ɀandinoʋudza nyika.
haʋana‐kunzwisisa kuti unoʋaʋudza ɀaƂaɓa.
Naiɀoɀo Jesu akati: Kana masimudza Mŋanakomana womunhu, ipapo mucaziʋa kuti ndini
Wakandituma uneni. Haana‐kundisiya ndiri ndoga; nokuti ini ndinoita ŋguʋa dzose ɀinomufadza.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, ʋazhinji ʋakatenda kwaari.
Ɀino Jesu wakati kuʋaJuda aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋamutenda: Kana imi mucigara mushoko raŋgu, muri ʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu ɀirokwaɀo.
Mucaziʋa ɀokwaɗi, neɀokwaɗi icakusunuŋgurai.
Ʋakamupindura,
Jesu akapindura,
Muranda haagari mumba nokusiŋgaperi; mŋanakomana ndiye unogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Naiɀoɀo kana Mŋanakomana acikusunuŋgurai, mucaʋa ʋakasunuŋguka kwaɀo.
Ndinoziʋa kuti muri rudzi rwaAbrahama; asi munotȿaka kundiʋuraya, nokuti shoko raŋgu hariendiki mukati menyu.
Ini ndinoreʋa iɀo ɀandakaʋona kunaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu; imi munoita ʋo ɀamanzwa kunaɓaɓa ʋenyu.
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu ndiAbrahama. Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ƌai maiʋa ʋana ʋaAbrahama, maiita maɓasa aAbrahama.
Asi ɀino munotȿaka kundiʋuraya,
Imi munoita maɓasa aɓaɓa ʋenyu. Ʋakati kwaari: Hatina‐kuɓerekwa noʋupombge; tinaƂaɓa ʋamŋe,
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ƌai Mŋari aiʋa Ƃaɓa ʋenyu, maindiɗa ini; nokuti Ndakaɓuɗa, ndikabva kunaMŋari. Nokuti handina‐kuɀiʋuyira ini ndimene, asi ndiye wakandituma.
Hamunzwisisi seiko kutaura kwaŋgu? Nokuti hamugoni kunzwa shoko raŋgu.
