Imi muri ʋaɓaɓa ʋenyu Diaborosi, munoɗa kuita kuɗa kwakaipa kwaɓaɓa ʋenyu. Iye wakaŋga ari muʋurayi kubva pakutaŋga; haamiri muɀokwaɗi, nokuti maari hamuneɀokwaɗi. Kana acireʋa nhema, unoreʋa ɀake, nokuti ndiye wenhema, ʋuye ɓaɓa ʋadzo.
Asi ini, ɀandinoreʋa ɀokwaɗi, hamunditendi.
Ndianiko kwamuri uŋganditendisa kuti ndineɀiʋi? Kana ndicireʋa ɀokwaɗi, munoregereiko kunditenda?
Uri waMŋari, unonzwa mashoko aMŋari; imi hamunzwi nemhaka iyi, nokuti hamuzati muri ʋaMŋari.
ƲaJuda ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Hatinakureʋa kwaɀo here, ticiti: Uri muSamaria, unomŋeya wakaipa?
Jesu akapindura,
Ini handitȿaki kuti ndikudzwe; uri’ko mumŋe unoɀitȿaka, acitoŋga.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana munhu akaceŋgeta shoko raŋgu, haaŋgatoŋgoʋoni rufu.
ƲaJuda ʋakati kwaari: Tinoziʋa ɀino kuti unomŋeya wakaipa; Abrahama wakafa, naʋaprofita ʋo; ɀino iwe unoti: Kana munhu akaceŋgeta shoko raŋgu, haaŋgatoŋgoʋoni rufu.
Ko iwe uri mukuru kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu Abrahama, ʋakafa, kanhi? naʋaprofita ʋakafa? Unoɀiita aniko?
Jesu akapindura,
Hamuna‐kuʋaziʋa imi, asi ini ndinoʋaziʋa; kana ini ndikati handiʋaziʋi, ndaʋa mureʋi wenhema semi; asi ndinoʋaziʋa ini, ndinoceŋgeta shoko raʋo.
Abrahama, ɓaɓa ʋenyu, ʋakafara,
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋakati kwaari: Iwe ugere kuȿika makore anamakumi mashanu, wakaʋona Abrahama sei?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Abrahama asati aʋa’po, ini ndaiʋa’po.
Ipapo ʋakanoŋga mabge kuti ʋamutake nawo; asi Jesu wakaɀiʋanza, akaɓuɗa mutembere.
Wakati acipfuʋura, akaʋona munhu wakaŋga ari ɓofu kubva pakuɓerekwa
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Rabi, ndianiko wakatadza, uyu kana ʋaɓereki ʋake, ɀaakaɓerekwa riri ɓofu?
Jesu akapindura,
Tinofanira kuɓate‐ɓasa rowakandituma, aciri masikati; ʋusiku bgunoʋuya, bgusiŋgagoni munhu kuɓate‐ɓasa nabgo.
Ndiciri panyika, ndiri ciedza cenyika.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akapfira mate pasi, akakanya ɗope namate, akazodza ɗope rawo pameso
akati kwaari: Enda undoshamba mudziʋa reSiroami, (ndokuti, kana ɀicishandurwa, Kutumŋa). Ipapo akaenda, akandoshamba, akadzoka aciʋona.
Ʋakaŋga ʋagere naye, naʋaimuʋona kare, kuti ndiye waikumbira, ʋakati: Ko uyu haazi iye waigara acikumbira here?
Ʋamŋe ʋakati: Ndiye; ʋamŋe ʋakati: Kwete, asi wakatodzana naye. Iye akati: Ndini.
Ɀino ʋakati kwaari: Meso ako akagoȿinudzwa seiko?
Akapindura,
Ʋakati kwaari: Iye uripiko? Akati: Handiziʋi.
Ʋakamuisa kuʋaFarise, iye wakaŋga ari ɓofu kare.
Ɀino raiʋa saɓata zuʋa iro Jesu raakakanya ɗope naro, akaȿinudza meso ake.
Ɀino ʋaFarise ʋakamubvunza ɀe, kuti wakaʋoneswa sei. Akati kwaʋari: Wakaisa ɗope pameso aŋgu, ndikandoshamba, ndikaʋona.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaʋaFarise ʋakati: Munhu uyu haazi waMŋari, nokuti haaceŋgeti saɓata. Asi ʋamŋe ʋakati: Ko munhu mutadzi uŋgaita seiko ɀiratidzo ɀakaɗai? Ipapo kupesana kwakamuka pakati paʋo.
Ɀino ʋakati ɀe kuɓofu: Iwe unoti kuɗiniko pamsoro pake, ɀaakaȿinudza meso ako? Akati: Muprofita.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaJuda haʋana‐kutenda pamsoro pake, kuti wakaŋga ari ɓofu, akazoʋona, kuȿikira ʋaɗana ʋaɓereki ʋowakaʋoneswa,
ʋakaʋabvunza, ʋaciti: Uyu ndiye mŋanakomana wenyu, wamunoti wakaɓerekwa riri ɓofu here? Ɀino unogoʋona seiko?
Ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Tinoziʋa kuti uyu mŋanakomana weɗu, ʋuye kuti wakaɓerekwa riri ɓofu;
asi hatiziʋi kuti ɀino woʋona sei; nowakaȿinudza meso ake, hatimuziʋi; mubvunzei henyu; waaruka, ucaɀireʋera hake.
Ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋakareʋa iɀoɀo, nokuti ʋaitya ʋaJuda, nokuti ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋatotenderana, kuti kana kuciŋge
Naiɀoɀo ʋaɓereki ʋake ʋakati: Waaruka hake, mubvunzei henyu.
Ɀino ʋakamuɗana ɀe rwecipiri, iye munhu wakaŋga ari ɓofu, ʋakati kwaari: Rumbidza Mŋari; isu tinoziʋa kuti munhu uyu mutadzi.
Ipapo iye akapindura,
Ipapo ʋakati kwaari: Wakakuiteiko? Wakaȿinudza meso ako sei?
Akaʋapindura,
Ʋakamutuka, ʋaciti: Iwe ndiwe mudzidzi wake, asi isu tiri ʋadzidzi ʋaMosesi.
Tinoziʋa kuti Mŋari wakataura naMosesi; asi uyu hatiziʋi kwaakabva.
munhu akapindura, akati kwaʋari: Nyambera cinhu ici cinoshamisa, kuti imi hamuziʋi kwaanobva, kunyaŋge akaȿinudza meso aŋgu.
Tinoziʋa kuti Mŋari haanzwi ʋatadzi; asi kana munhu acishumira Mŋari, aciita kuɗa kwake, unomunzwa iye.
Kubvira pakutaŋga hakunakumbonzwika, kuti mumŋe wakaȿinudza meso omunhu, wakaɓerekwa riri ɓofu.
Ƌai uyu asati ari waMŋari, haazaigona kuita cinhu.
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Iwe wakaɓerekerwa kwaɀo muɀiʋi, ɀino iwe wotidzidzisa su? Ʋakamudziŋgira kunze.
Jesu akanzwa kuti ʋamudziŋgira kunze; akati amuwana, akati kwaari: Iwe unotenda kuMŋanakomana waMŋari here?
Akapindura, akati: Iye ndianiko Ishe, kuti nditende kwaari?
Jesu akati kwaari: Wamuʋona, ʋuye, ndiye unotaura newe.
Ipapo akati: Ndinotenda, Ishe. Akamunamata.
Jesu akati: Kutoŋga ndiko kwandaʋuyira panyika ino, kuti ʋasiŋgaʋoni, ʋaʋone; naʋanoʋona ʋaʋe mapofu.
Aʋo ʋaʋaFarise ʋaiʋa naye, ʋakaɀinzwa, ʋakati kwaari: Ko nesu ʋo tiri mapofu here?
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ƌai maiʋa mapofu, hamuzaiʋa neɀiʋi, asi ɀino munoti: Tinoʋona; ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀinoramba ɀiri’po.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Usiŋgapindi nomukoʋa muɗaŋga ramakwai, asi unokwira nokumŋe, imbava negororo.
Asi unopinda nomukoʋa,
Murindi womukoʋa unomuzarurira iye, makwai anonzwa inzwi rake, unoɗana makwai ake namazita awo, nokuaperekedzera kunze.
Kana aɓuɗisa
Asi mŋeni haaŋgatoŋgomuteʋeri, asi anomutiza; nokuti haaziʋi inzwi raʋaeni.
Jesu akareʋa mufananidzo uyu kwaʋari, asi haʋana‐kunzwisisa, kuti ɀaakaʋataurira ndeɀei.
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari ɀe: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ndini mukoʋa wamakwai.
Ʋose ʋakanditaŋgira kuʋuya, imbava namakororo, asi makwai haana‐kuʋanzwa.
Ndini mukoʋa; kana munhu apinda neni, ucaponeswa, ucapinda, ucaɓuɗa, ucawana mafuro.
Mbava inoŋgoʋuya, kuti iɓe nokuʋuraya nokuparadza. Ini ndakaʋuya, kuti aʋe noʋupenyu, ʋuye aʋe nobgakawanda.
Ndini mufudzi wakanaka; mufudzi wakanaka unorashira makwai ake ʋupenyu bgake.
Muranda, usati ari mufudzi wamakwai, makwai asati ari ake, unoti kana aciʋona ɓere riciʋuya, unosiya makwai, ndokutiza; ɓere rinoabvuta, nokuaparadza;
, ɀaari muranda; haanehanya namakwai.
Ndini mufudzi wakanaka, ndinoziʋa
Ƃaɓa seɀaʋanondiziʋa, neni ndiciziʋa Ƃaɓa; ndinorashira makwai aŋgu ʋupenyu bgaŋgu.
Namamŋe makwai ndinawo, asati ari eɗaŋga rino. Naiwo ndinofanira kuʋuya nawo ʋo, acanzwa inzwi raŋgu; ricaʋa ɓoka rimŋe, nomufudzi mumŋe.
Saka Ƃaɓa ʋanondiɗa, nokuti ndinorasha ʋupenyu bgaŋgu, ndigobgutora ɀe.
Hakunomunhu uŋganditorera ibgo; asi ndinobgurasha ndimene. Ndinesimba rokubgurasha, ʋuye ndinesimba rokubgutora ɀe. Uyu murairo ndakaupiwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ipapo kupesana kukamuka ɀe pakati paʋaJuda pamsoro pamashoko iwayo.
Ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋakati: Unomŋeya wakaipa, unopeŋga; munomuterereiko?
Ʋamŋe ʋakati: Mashoko awa haati ari omunhu wakaɓatwa nomŋeya wakaipa; ko mŋeya wakaipa uŋgagona kuȿinudza meso amapofu here?
Yaiʋa ŋguʋa yomutambo wokuʋandudzwa
Jesu akafamba mutembere paɓiraʋira raSoromoni.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakamukomba, ʋakati kwaari: Ucatiʋetsa kuȿikira riniko? Kana uri Kristu iwe, tiʋudze pacena.
Jesu akaʋapindura,
Asi imi hamutendi, nokuti hamuzi ʋamakwai aŋgu.
Makwai aŋgu anonzwa inzwi raŋgu; neni ndinoaziʋa, ʋuye anonditeʋera.
Ndinoapa ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; haaŋgafi nokusiŋgaperi, ʋuye hakunomunhu uŋgaabvuta muruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ɀandakapiwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ɀikuru kuneɀose; hakunomunhu uŋgaabvuta muruʋoko rwaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ini naƂaɓa tiri ʋamŋe.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakanoŋga ɀe mabge, kuti ʋamutake.
Jesu akaʋapindura,
ƲaJuda ʋakamupindura,
Jesu akaʋapindura,
Ɀino kana akaʋaidza ʋamŋari, iʋo shoko raMŋari rakaȿika kwaʋari, (Rugwaro haruŋgaputswi);
imi moti seiko kunaiye wakaitwa mutȿene naƂaɓa, nokutumŋa panyika: Unomhura
Kana ndisiŋgaiti maɓasa aƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, regai kunditenda ini;
asi kana ndiciaita, kunyaŋge musiŋganditendi ini, tendai maɓasa, mugoziʋa nokuziʋisisa, kuti Ƃaɓa ʋari mandiri, neni ndiri munaƂaɓa.
Ɀino ʋakatȿaka ɀe kumuɓata, asi iye wakapukunyuka pamaʋoko aʋo.
Ɀino wakaenda ɀe mhiri kwaJoridani, paya paibapatidza Johane pakutaŋga; akagara’po.
Ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋakati: Johane haana‐kuita ciratidzo, asi ɀose ɀakareʋa Johane pamsoro poyuyu ndeɀaɀokwaɗi.
Ʋazhinji ʋakatenda kwaari ipapo.
Mumŋe munhu wakaŋga acirwara,
Ndiye Maria uya, wakazodza Ishe namafuta, akapisika tsoka dzake nevudzi rake; hanɀadzi yake Razaro, wakaŋga acirwara.
Ɀino hanɀadzi dzake dzakatuma
Jesu wakati aɀinzwa, akati: Kurwara uku hakuzi kwokufa, asi kuti Mŋari akudzwe, noMŋanakomana waMŋari akudzwe ʋo naɀo.
Jesu wakaŋga aciɗa Marta, nomunuŋuna wake, naRazaro.
Ɀino wakati anzwa kuti unorwara, akambogara mazuʋa maʋiri paakaŋga ari.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo akati kuʋadzidzi ʋake: Hendei ɀe Judea.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Rabi, ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋacikutȿakai ikoɀino, kuti ʋakutakei namabge; ɀino moenda ɀe ikoko here?
Jesu akapindura, akati: Ŋguʋa hadzizi gumi nembiri pazuʋa here? Kana munhu acifamba masikati, haagumburwi, nokuti unoʋona ciedza cenyika ino.
Asi kana munhu acifamba ʋusiku, unogumburwa, nokuti hakuneciedza maari.
Ndiɀoɀo ɀaakareʋa, akazoti kwaʋari: Razaro, hama yeɗu, waʋata; asi ndinoenda, kuti ndimumutse pahope.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Ishe, kana aciʋata, ucanaya.
Jesu wakaŋga areʋa kufa kwake, asi iʋo ʋakaŋga ʋaciti, unoreʋa kuʋata hope.
Ipapo Jesu akaʋaʋudza pacena: Razaro wafa.
Ndinofara nokuɗa kwenyu, kuti ndakaŋga ndisi’po, kuti mugotenda; asi
Ipapo Tomasi, wainzi Didimo, akati kunaʋamŋe ʋadzidzi: Hendei nesu ʋo, kuti tindofa naye.
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciȿika, akamuwana atoʋa mubgiro mazuʋa manna.
Betania rakaŋga riri pedyo neJerusarema, mastadia aneŋge gumi namashanu
ʋazhinji ʋaʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kunaMarta naMaria, kuti ʋaʋaɓate ruʋoko pamsoro pehanɀadzi yaʋo.
Ɀino Marta wakati acinzwa kuti Jesu woʋuya, akaenda kundomuciŋgamidza; asi Maria wakagara mumba.
Marta akati kunaJesu: Ishe, ɗai maiʋa pano, hanɀadzi yaŋgu iŋgaɗai isina‐kufa.
Kunyaŋge ɀino ndinoziʋa, kuti ɀose ɀamunokumbira kunaMŋari, Mŋari ucakupai.
Jesu akati kwaari: Hanɀadzi yako icamuka ɀe.
Marta akati kwaari: Ndinoziʋa kuti ucamuka ɀe pakumuka nezuʋa rokupedzisira.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ndini kumuka noʋupenyu; unotenda kwandiri, kunyaŋge akafa, ucararama.
Mumŋe nomumŋe uri mupenyu, unotenda kwandiri, haaŋgatoŋgofi. Unotenda iɀoɀo here?
Akati kwaari: Hoŋo, Ishe, ndakatenda kuti ndimi Kristu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari, uyo
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akandoɗana Maria, munuŋuna wake, akati
Iye wakati aciɀinzwa, akakurumidza kusimuka, akaenda
(Ɀino Jesu wakaŋga asati aȿika pamusha, asi wakaŋga aciri paya paakaciŋgamidzwa naMarta.)
Ɀino ʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋari mumba naye ʋacimuɓata ruʋoko, ʋakati ʋaciʋona Maria acikurumidza kusimuka aciɓuɗa, ʋakamuteʋera, ʋaciti, unoenda kubgiro kundocema’ko.
Ɀino Maria wakati aciȿika kunaJesu, acimuʋona, akawira pasi patsoka dzake, akati kwaari; Ishe, ɗai maiʋa pano, hanɀadzi yaŋgu iŋgaɗai isina‐kufa.
Ɀino Jesu wakati acimuʋona acicema, naʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya naye, ʋacicema ʋo, akafa neshuŋgu mumŋeya, akatambudzika,
akati: Mamuisepiko? Ʋakati kwaari: Ishe, ʋuyai, muʋone.
Jesu akacema misodzi.
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋakati: Tarirai, waimuɗa sei!
Asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakati: Uyu wakaȿinudza meso eɓofu, haazaigona kudziʋisa kuti uyu munhu arege kufa here?
Ipapo Jesu akafa ɀe neshuŋgu mukati make, akaȿika pabgiro. Iro raiʋa ɓako, nebge rakaŋga riri pamsoro paro.
Jesu akati: Bvisai ibge! Marta, hanɀadzi yowakafa, akati kwaari: Ishe, wotonhuwa ɀino, nokuti waʋa namazuʋa manna okufa kwake.
Jesu akati kwaari: Handina‐kukuʋudza here, kuti kana ukatenda, ucaʋona kubginya kwaMŋari?
Ipapo ʋakabvisa ibge. Ɀino Jesu akatarira kuɗeŋga, akati: Ƃaɓa, ndinokuʋoŋgai, nokuti mandinzwa.
Asi ndakaŋga ndiciziʋa, kuti munosindinzwa ŋguʋa dzose; asi ndakaɀireʋa nokuɗa kwaʋazhinji ʋakandikomba, kuti ʋatende kuti makandituma.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru,
Wakaŋga afa akaɓuɗa, akapombga makumbo namaʋoko nemiceka yobgiro, neciso cake cakapombga nomuceka. Jesu akati kwaʋari: Mumusunuŋgurei, aende.
Naiɀoɀo ʋazhinji ʋaʋaJuda, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kunaMaria, ʋakati ʋaʋona ɀaaita, ʋakatenda kwaari.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakaenda kuʋaFarise, ʋakandoʋaʋudza ɀakaŋga ɀaitwa naJesu.
Naiɀoɀo ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaFarise ʋakaʋuŋganidza makurukota, ʋakati: Toɗiniko? nokuti uyu unoita ɀiratidzo ɀizhinji.
Kana tikamurega aciɗaro, ʋanhu ʋose ʋacatenda kwaari; naʋaRoma ʋacaʋuya ʋakatitorera nɀimbo yeɗu norudzi rweɗu.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋo, Kayafasi, wakaŋga ari muprista mukuru gore iro, akati kwaʋari: Hamuziʋi cinhu, imi,
ʋuye hamuraŋgariri kuti ɀirinani kwamuri, kuti munhu mumŋe afire ʋanhu, rudzi rwose rurege kufa.
Haana‐kureʋa iɀoɀo pacake, asi, ɀaakaŋga ari muprista mukuru gore iro, wakaprofita kuti Jesu waifanira kufira rudzi;
rusati ruri rudzi rwoga, asi kuti aʋuŋganidze pamŋe cete ʋana ʋaMŋari ʋakapararira.
Ɀino kubva pazuʋa iro ʋakaraŋgana, kuti ʋamuʋuraye.
Naiɀoɀo Jesu haana‐kuzofamba pacena pakati paʋaJuda, asi wakabva’po, akaenda kunyika iri pedyo nerenje, kuguta rainzi Efraimi; akagara’ko naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Ɀino paseka yaʋaJuda yakaŋga yaʋa pedyo, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋenyika
Ɀino ʋakatȿaka Jesu, ʋakataurirana ʋamire mutembere,
Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaFarise ʋakaŋga ʋaraira, kuti, aninani kana aciziʋa kwaari, aʋaziʋise, kuti ʋandomuɓata.
Ɀino mazuʋa matanhatu paseka icigere kuȿika, Jesu wakaȿika Betania, paiʋa naRazaro, wakaɗeya kumutswa naJesu kuʋakafa.
Ʋakamuitira’po cirayiro; Marta akaʋashandira; naRazaro wakaŋga ari mumŋe waʋakaŋga ʋagere naye pakudya.
Ɀino Maria akatora paundi yamafuta enardo, anomuteŋgo mukuru, akazodza tsoka dzaJesu, akapisika tsoka dzake nevudzi rake; imba ikazadzwa nokunhuwira kwamafuta.
Ipapo mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake, Judasi Iskarioti, wakaŋga acazomupandukira, akati:
Mafuta awa akaregereiko kuteŋgeswa namadenari mazana matatu,
Asi haana‐kureʋa iɀoɀo kuri kuti wakaraŋgarira ʋarombo, asi nokuti waiʋa mbava; waigara necikwama, acisiɓa ɀaiiswa’mo.
Asi Jesu wakati: Muregei, aɀiceŋgetere zuʋa rokuʋigwa kwaŋgu.
Nokuti ʋarombo munaʋo ŋguʋa dzose; asi ini hamuneni ŋguʋa dzose.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋokuʋaJuda ʋakanzwa kuti uri’po; ʋakaʋuya,
Asi ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋakaraŋgana kuti ʋaʋuraye naRazaro ʋo,
nokuti nokuɗa kwake ʋaJuda ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋacibva
Ɀino aʋa maŋgwana ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya kumutambo, ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti Jesu woʋuya Jerusarema,
ʋakatora mashizha emicindwe, ʋakaɓuda kundomuciŋgamidza, ʋakaɗanidzira,
Jesu akati awana mŋana wemboŋgoro, akagara pamsoro payo, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Usatya, mukunda weZioni; tarira Mambo wako unoʋuya, agere pamsoro pemhuru yemboŋgoro.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake haʋana‐kunzwisisa iɀoɀi pakutaŋga; asi Jesu wakati akudzwa, ʋakazoraŋgarira, kuti iɀoɀo ɀakaŋga ɀanyorwa pamsoro pake, ʋuye kuti ʋakaŋga ʋamuitira iɀoɀo.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaiʋa naye pakuɗana kwake Razaro kuti abve mubgiro, nokumumutsa kuʋakafa, ʋakapupura.
Saka ʋazhinji ʋakamuciŋgamidza ʋo, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa, kuti wakaita ciratidzo iceco.
Ipapo ʋaFarise ʋakataurirana,
Ɀino kwaiʋa naʋamŋe ʋaGiriki pakati paʋakaŋga ʋakwira kumutambo kundonamata’ko;
iʋo ʋakaʋuya kunaFiripo weBetsaida reGarirea, ʋakakumbira kwaari, ʋaciti: Ishe, tinoɗa kuʋona Jesu.
Firipo akaenda, akandoʋudza Andreasi; Andreasi akaenda naFiripo, ʋakandoʋudza Jesu.
Jesu akaʋapindura, akati: Ŋguʋa yaȿika, kuti Mŋanakomana womunhu akudzwe.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana tsaŋga yeɀiyo ikasawira muvu, ikafa, icagara iri yoga; asi kana ikafa, inoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀizhinji.
Unoɗa ʋupenyu bgake, ucarashikirwa nabgo; nounoʋeŋga ʋupenyu bgake panyika ino, ucabguceŋgeta kuʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Kana munhu acindishumira, ŋgaanditeʋere; napandineŋge ndiri, nomuranda waŋgu ucaʋa’po ʋo. Kana munhu acindishumira, Ƃaɓa ʋacamukudza.
Ɀino mŋeya waŋgu unomanikidzwa; ndicatiyiko? Ƃaɓa ndiponesei paŋguʋa ino. Asi ndiɀo ɀandaʋuyira paŋguʋa ino.
Ƃaɓa, kudzai zita renyu. Ipapo inzwi rakaʋuya, ricibva kuɗeŋga,
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakati: Kwatinhira. Ʋamŋe ʋakati: Mutumŋa wataura naye.
Jesu akapindura, akati: Inzwi iri harina‐kuʋuya nokuɗa kwaŋgu, asi nokuɗa kwenyu.
Ɀino kutoŋgwa kwenyika ino kwaʋa’po, ɀino mucinda wenyika ino ucadziŋgwa.
Neni, kana ndasimudzwa panyika, ndicakweʋera ʋose kwandiri.
Wakareʋa iɀoɀi, aciratidza kufa, kwaaizofa nako.
Ɀino ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakamupindura,
Ipapo Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ciedza cici’po pakati penyu ciŋguʋa ciɗuku. Fambai mucineciedza, kuti murege kukundwa nerima; unofamba murima haaziʋi kwaanoenda.
Mucineciedza, tendai kuciedza, mugoitwa ʋana ʋeciedza.
Jesu wakareʋa iɀoɀi, akabva, akaɀiʋanza kwaʋari.
Ɀino kunyaŋge akaŋga aita ɀiratidzo ɀizhinji ɀakaɗaro pamberi paʋo, haʋana‐kutenda kwaari;
kuti shoko romuprofita Isaya riitike, raakareʋa,
Ishe, ndianiko wakatenda caʋakanzwa kwatiri?
Noruʋoko rwaShe rwakaratidzwa kunaniko?
Saka ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kutenda, nokuti Isaya wakati ɀe:
Wakapofumadza meso aʋo, akawomesa mŋoyo yaʋo;
Kuti ʋarege kuʋona nameso aʋo,
nokunzwisisa nemŋoyo yaʋo,
Ʋadzoke,
Ndiʋaporese.
Isaya wakareʋa iɀoɀi, nokuti wakaʋona kubginya kwake; akamureʋa iye.
Asi kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ʋazhinji ʋaʋaɓati ʋakatenda kwaari; asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgamureʋururi nokuɗa kwaʋaFarise, kuti ʋarege kuɓuɗiswa musinagoge;
nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kukudzwa naʋanhu kupfuʋura kukudzwa naMŋari.
Ɀino Jesu akaɗana, akati: Unotenda kwandiri, haatendi kwandiri, asi kunowakandituma.
Unondiʋona, unoʋona wakandituma.
Ini ndakaʋuya munyika,
Kana munhu acinzwa mashoko aŋgu, akasaaceŋgeta, handimutoŋgi ini, nokuti handina‐kuʋuya kuzotoŋga nyika, asi kuti ndiponese nyika.
Unondiramba, asiŋgagamuciri mashoko aŋgu, uno
Nokuti handina‐kureʋa pacaŋgu, asi Ƃaɓa, ʋakandituma, ndiʋo ʋakandipa murairo, ɀandicareʋa neɀandicataura.
Ndinoziʋa kuti murairo waʋo ndibgo ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; naiɀoɀi ɀandinotaura, ndinotaura seɀandakaʋudzwa naƂaɓa.
Ɀino mutambo wepaseka usati waȿika, Jesu wakaziʋa kuti ŋguʋa yake yaȿika, kuti abve munyika ino, aende kunaƂaɓa, ɀaakaŋga aiɗa
Ɀino ʋakati ʋorayira, Diaborosi atoisa mumŋoyo maJudasi Iskarioti, mŋanakomana waSimoni, kuti amupandukire;
aciziʋa kuti Ƃaɓa ʋakamupa ɀinhu ɀose mumaʋoko ake, ʋuye kuti wakabva kunaMŋari, ʋuye kuti unoenda kunaMŋari;
akasimuka pakurayira, akabvisa ŋguʋo dzake, akatora muceka, akaɀisuŋga ciʋuno.
Ɀino akaɗira mvura mumudziyo, akataŋga kushambidza tsoka dzaʋadzidzi ʋake, akadzipisika nomuceka, waakaŋga akaɀisuŋga nawo.
Akaȿika kunaSimoni Petro, iye akati kwaari: Ishe, imi moshambidza tsoka dzaŋgu kanhi?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Candinoita hauciziʋi ɀino; asi ucaɀinzwisisa pashure.
Petro akati kwaari: Hamuŋgatoŋgoshambidzi tsoka dzaŋgu nokusiŋgaperi. Jesu akamupindura,
Simoni Petro akati kwaari: Dzirege kuʋa tsoka dzaŋgu dzoga, asi maʋoko aŋgu nomusoro waŋgu ʋo.
Jesu akati kwaari: Wakashambidzwa
Nokuti wakaŋga aciziʋa uyo waizomupandukira, saka akati: Hamuna‐kunaka mose.
Ɀino wakati ashambidza tsoka dzaʋo, akatora ŋguʋo dzake, akagara ɀe, akati kwaʋari: Munoziʋa ɀandakakuitirai here?
Munondiidza Mudzidzisi, ʋuye Ishe; munoreʋa ɀakanaka, nokuti ndini iye.
Ɀino kana ini, Ishe noMudzidzisi, ndakashambidza tsoka dzenyu, nemi ʋo munofanira kushambidzana tsoka dzenyu.
Ndakakuratidzai makwara kuti muite imi seɀandakakuitirai ini.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Muranda haazi mukuru kunashe wake, ʋuye wakatumŋa mukuru kunowakamutuma.
Kana muciɀiziʋa iɀi, makaropafadzwa kana muciɀiita.
handireʋi imi mose; ini ndinoziʋa aʋo ʋandakasanaŋgura; asi kuti Rugwaro ruitike,
Kubva ɀino ndinokuʋudzai ɀisati ɀaitika, kuti kana ɀiciitwa, mugotenda kuti ndini.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Unogamucira wandinotuma, unogamucireni, nounondigamucira ini, unogamucira wakandituma.
Ɀino Jesu wakati areʋa kuɗaro, akamanikidzwa mumŋeya, akapupura, akati: Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri, mumŋe wenyu ucandipandukira.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakatarirana, ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuti wareʋa ani.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake wakaŋga akasendamira pacifuʋa caJesu, waiɗikanwa naJesu.
Simoni Petro akamuninira, akati kwaari:
Iye akaʋata pacifuʋa caJesu, akati kwaari: Ishe, ndianiko?
Ipapo Jesu akapindura,
Iye wakati
Asi kwakaŋga kusinomumŋe kunaʋakaŋga ʋagere naye pakudya, wakaziʋa kuti wakareʋerei iɀoɀi kwaari.
Ʋamŋe ʋakaŋga ʋaciti, Judasi ɀaaigara ane cikwama, kuti Jesu wakati kwaari: Teŋga ɀatinoɗa pamutambo; kana kuti ape ʋarombo cinhu.
Iye akati agamucira cimeɗu, akaɓuɗa pakarepo; bgakaŋga bguri ʋusiku.
Ɀino wakati aɓuɗa, Jesu akati: Ɀino Mŋanakomana womunhu wakudzwa, naMŋari wakudzwa maari;
kana Mŋari akudzwa maari, Mŋari ucamukudza
Ʋana ʋaɗuku, ndiciri nemi ciŋguʋa ciɗuku; mucanditȿaka, asi seɀandakareʋa kuʋaJuda,
Ndinokupai murairo mutȿa, wokuti mudane; seɀandakakuɗai imi, nemi muɗane ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Ʋose ʋacaziʋa naiɀoɀi kuti muri ʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu, kana munoruɗo pakati penyu.
Simoni Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, munoendepiko? Jesu akapindura,
Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, handiŋgakuteʋeriyi ɀino neiko? Ndicakufirai ini.
Jesu akapindura,
Mŋoyo yenyu irege kumanikidzwa; tendai kunaMŋari, mutende ʋo kwandiri.
Mumba maƂaɓa ʋaŋgu munenɀimbo zhinji dzokugara; ɗai kusaiʋa kuɗaro, ndiŋgaɗai ndaikuʋudzai; nokuti ndinoenda kundokugadzirirai pokugara.
Kana ndaenda kundokugadzirirai pokugara, ndinozoʋuya ɀe, ndikugamucirei kwandiri; kuti apo pandiri, nemi mugoʋa’po ʋo.
Napandinoenda’po, imi munoziʋa nzira.
Tomasi akati kwaari: Ishe, hatiziʋi pamunoenda; nzira tiŋgaiziʋa seiko?
Jesu akati kwaari: Ndini nzira, neɀokwaɗi, noʋupenyu; hapanomunhu unoʋuya kunaƂaɓa, asi nokwandiri.
Ƌai makaŋga mucindiziʋa, muŋgaɗai maiziʋa ʋo Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu; kubva ɀino munoʋaziʋa, makaʋaʋona.
Firipo akati kwaari: Ishe, tiratidzei Ƃaɓa ɀigotiriŋgana.
Jesu akati kwaari: Ndakaʋa nemi ŋguʋa refu yakaɗai, ko hauzati wandiziʋa here, Firipo? Wandiʋona ini, waʋona Ƃaɓa; ɀino unoreʋa seiko,
Hautendi here kuti ndiri munaƂaɓa naƂaɓa ʋari mandiri? Mashoko andinoreʋa kwamuri, handiareʋi pacaŋgu; asi Ƃaɓa, ʋanogara mandiri, ndiʋo ʋanoita maɓasa aʋo.
Nditendei kuti ndiri munaƂaɓa, naƂaɓa ʋari mandiri; kana kusi kuɗaro, nditendei nokuɗa kwamaɓasa amene.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Unotenda kwandiri, maɓasa andinoita, iye ucaaita ʋo, ucaita makuru kunawawa; nokuti ndinoenda kunaƂaɓa.
Cinhu cipi necipi camunokumbira muzita raŋgu, ndicaciita, kuti Ƃaɓa ʋakudzwe muMŋanakomana.
Kana mucikumbira cinhu kwandiri muzita raŋgu, ndicaciita.
Kana mucindiɗa, mucaceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu.
Neni ndicakumbira Ƃaɓa, ʋacakupai mumŋe Munyaradzi, kuti agare nemi nokusiŋgaperi;
Mŋeya waɀokwaɗi; nyika haigoni kumugamucira, nokuti haimuʋoni, kana kumuziʋa; imi munomuziʋa, nokuti ugere nemi, ucaʋa mukati menyu.
Handiŋgakusiyi muri nherera; ndinoʋuya kwamuri.
Kucineŋguʋa ɗuku, nyika haicazondiʋoni; asi imi munondiʋona, nokuti ini ndiri mupenyu, nemi ʋo mucaʋa ʋapenyu.
Nezuʋa iro mucandiziʋa, kuti ndiri munaƂaɓa, nemi mandiri, neni mamuri.
Unemirairo yaŋgu, akaiceŋgeta, ndiye unondiɗa; unondiɗa ucaɗikanwa naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu; neni ndicamuɗa ʋo, ndicaɀiratidza kwaari.
Judasi (usati ari iye Iskarioti) akati kwaari: Ishe, ndokuɗiniko kuti mucaɀiratidza kwatiri, musiŋgaɀiratidzi kunyika?
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Kana munhu acindiɗa, ucaceŋgeta shoko raŋgu; naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋacamuɗa, ticaʋuya kwaari, tikaita ʋugaro bgeɗu maari.
Usiŋgandiɗi, haaceŋgeti mashoko aŋgu; shoko ramunonzwa, harizi raŋgu, asi nderaƂaɓa ʋakandituma.
Ɀinhu iɀoɀi ndakakuʋudzai ndicigere nemi.
Asi Munyaradzi, Mŋeya Mutȿene, ucatumŋa naƂaɓa muzita raŋgu, iye ucakudzidzisai ɀose, nokukuyeʋudzirai ɀose, ɀandakareʋa kwamuri.
Ndinokusiyirai rugare; ndinokupai rugare rwaŋgu; handikupiyi sokupa kwenyika. Mŋoyo yenyu irege kumanikidzwa, irege kutya.
Makanzwa kuti ndakati kwamuri: Ndinoenda, ndigodzokera ɀe kwamuri. Ƌai maindiɗa, muŋgaɗai maifara, nokuti ndinoenda kunaƂaɓa; nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋakuru kwandiri.
Ɀino ndakuʋudzai ɀisati ɀaitika, kuti musi waɀinoitika mugotenda.
Handicazotauri ɀizhinji nemi, nokuti mucinda wenyika unoʋuya; asi haanecinhu kwandiri;
asi
Ndini muzambiriŋga waɀokwaɗi, Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu murimi.
Ƌaʋi rimŋe nerimŋe riri mandiri, risiŋgaɓereki ɀiɓereko, ʋanoribvisa; rimŋe nerimŋe, rinoɓereka ɀiɓereko, ʋanorinatsa, kuti riwedzere ɀiɓereko.
Imi matonatswa neshoko randakareʋa kwamuri.
Garai mandiri, neni mamuri. Seɗaʋi risiŋgagoni kuɓereka ɀiɓereko roga, kana risiŋgagari mumuzambiriŋga; saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo, kana musiŋgagari mandiri.
Ini ndiri muzambiriŋga, imi muri mataʋi. Unogara mandiri, neni maari, ndiye unoɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀakawanda; nokuti kunze kwaŋgu hamugoni kuita cinhu.
Kana munhu asiŋgagari mandiri, unorashwa kunze seɗaʋi, ndokuwoma; ʋanoaʋuŋganidza, ndokuakandira mumŋoto, atȿe.
Kana mucigara mandiri, namashoko aŋgu acigara mamuri, kumbirai ɀamunoɗa, mucaɀiitirwa.
Ƃaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋanokudzwa naiɀoɀi, kuti muɓereke ɀiɓereko ɀakawanda; ʋuye mucaʋa ʋadzidzi ʋaŋgu.
Ƃaɓa seɀaʋakandiɗa, neni ndakakuɗai; garai muruɗo rwaŋgu.
Kana muciceŋgeta mirairo yaŋgu, mucagara muruɗo rwaŋgu, seni ndaiceŋgeta mirairo yaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndicigara muruɗo rwaʋo.
Ɀinhu iɀoɀi ndakaɀitaura kwamuri, kuti mufaro waŋgu ugare mamuri, nomufaro wenyu uzadzike.
Uyu ndiwo murairo waŋgu, kuti muɗane, seni ndakakuɗai imi.
Hakunomunhu unoruɗo rukuru kunourwu, kuti munhu arashire hama dzake ʋupenyu bgake.
Im muri hama dzaŋgu, kana muciita ɀandinokurairai ini.
Handicakuidziyi ʋaranda; nokuti muranda haaziʋi ɀinoitwa nashe wake; asi ndinokuidzai hama; nokuti ɀose ɀandakanzwa kunaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, ndakakuziʋisai iɀo.

Imi hamuna‐kundisanaŋgura, asi ini ndakakusanaŋgurai imi, ndikakuisai kuti muende muɓereke ɀiɓereko, ʋuye kuti ɀiɓereko ɀenyu ɀigare; kuti cinhu cipi necipi camuneŋge mucikumbira kunaƂaɓa muzita raŋgu, ʋakupei ico.
Ndiɀoɀi ɀandinokurairai, kuti muɗane.
Kana nyika icikuʋeŋgai, muziʋe kuti yakandiʋeŋga ini, isati yakuʋeŋgai imi.
Kana maiʋa ʋenyika, nyika yaiɗa ʋayo; ɀino ɀamusati muri ʋenyika, asi ini ndakakusanaŋgurai panyika, saka nyika inokuʋeŋgai.
Raŋgarirai shoko randakareʋa kwamuri,
Asi iɀi ɀose ʋacakuitirai nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, nokuti haʋaziʋi wakandituma.
Ƌai ndisina‐kuʋuya, ndikataura naʋo, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋasineɀiʋi; asi ɀino haʋanepembedzo yeɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Unondiʋeŋga, unoʋeŋga naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu ʋo.
Ƌai ndisina‐kuita pakati paʋo maɓasa asina‐kumboitwa nomumŋe munhu, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋasineɀiʋi; asi ɀino ʋakaʋona, nokundiʋeŋga ini naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Asi
Kana Munyaradzi aʋuya, wandicatuma kwamuri, acibva kunaƂaɓa, iye Mŋeya waɀokwaɗi, unoɓuɗa kunaƂaɓa, ucandipupurira.
Nemi ʋo pupurai, nokuti maiʋa neni kubva pakutaŋga.
Ɀinhu iɀi ndakakuʋudzai, kuti murege kugumburwa.
Ʋacakuɓuɗisai mumasinagoge; asi ŋguʋa inoȿika, mumŋe nomumŋe wakakuʋurayai, ucati unoɓatira Mŋari ɓasa.
Ɀinhu iɀi ʋacaita, nokuti haʋana‐kuziʋa Ƃaɓa, kana ini.
Asi ndakakuʋudzai iɀi, kuti kana ŋguʋa yaɀo yaȿika, mugoɀiraŋgarira, kuti ndakakuʋudzai. Handina‐kukuʋudzai iɀi kubva pakutaŋga, nokuti ndaiʋa nemi.
Asi ɀino ndinoenda kunowakandituma; hakunomumŋe wenyu unondibvunza,
Asi ɀino mŋoyo yenyu yafa neshuŋgu ɀandakakuʋudzai iɀi.
Asi ini ndinokuʋudzai ɀokwaɗi,
Iye kana aȿika, ucaziʋisa nyika pamsoro peɀiʋi, napamsoro pokururama, napamsoro pokutoŋgwa;
pamsoro peɀiʋi, nokuti haʋatendi kwandiri;
pamsoro pokururama, nokuti ndinoenda kunaƂaɓa, hamuŋgazondiʋoni;
pamsoro pokutoŋgwa, nokuti mucinda wenyika ino watoŋgwa.
Ndineɀizhinji ɀandinoɗa kukuʋudzai; asi hamugoni kuɀigamucira ɀino.
Asi kana aȿika, iye Mŋeya waɀokwaɗi, ucakutuŋgamirirai muɀokwaɗi yose; nokuti haaŋgatauri ɀake, asi ɀaakanzwa, ndiɀo ɀaacataura, ʋuye ucakuparidzirai ɀinoʋuya.
Ucandikudza, nokuti ucatora paneɀaŋgu, akakuparidzai
Ɀose Ƃaɓa ɀaʋanaɀo, ndeɀaŋgu; naiɀoɀo ndakati: Ucatora paneɀaŋgu, akakuparidzai
Ciŋguʋa ciɗuku casara, hamucazondiʋoni; ʋuye ɀe ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, mucandiʋona.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakataurirana, ʋaciti: Cinyiko ici caanoreʋa kwatiri, kuti: Ciŋguʋa ciɗuku casara, hamucazondiʋoni; ʋuye ɀe, ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, mucandiʋona, ʋuye: Nokuti ndinoenda kunaƂaɓa?
Naiɀoɀo ʋakati: Cinyiko caanoti: Casara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku? Hatiziʋi caanotaura.
Jesu akaziʋa kuti ʋanoɗa kumubvunza, akati kwaʋari: Munobvunzana here pamsoro pecinhu ici candareʋa,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mucarira nokucema imi, asi nyika icafara; imi mucanzwa shuŋgu, asi shuŋgu dzenyu dzicashanduka mufaro.
Mukadzi kana acipona, unonzwa shuŋgu, nokuti ŋguʋa yake yaȿika; asi kana apona mŋana, haacafuŋgi kutambudzika, nokufara kwake nokuti munhu waponerwa panyika.
Nemi ɀino muneshuŋgu; asi ndicakuʋonai ɀe, nomŋoyo yenyu icafara; hakunomunhu uŋgakutorerai mufaro wenyu.
Nezuʋa iro hamuŋgazondibvunzi cinhu. Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinot kwamuri: Ɀose ɀamuneŋge mucakumbira kunaƂaɓa, ʋacakupai iɀo muzita raŋgu.
Kuȿikira ɀino hamuna‐kukumbira cinhu muzita raŋgu; kumbirai, mucapiwa, mufaro wenyu uzadzike.
Iɀi ndakataura kwamuri nemifananidzo, ŋguʋa inoʋuya yandisiŋgazotauri kwamuri nemifananidzo; asi ndicakuparidzirai pacena ɀaƂaɓa.
Nezuʋa iro mucakumbira muzita raŋgu; handikuʋudziyi, kuti ndicakunyeŋgeterera ini kunaƂaɓa;
nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋamene ʋanokuɗai, nokuti makandiɗa ini, mukatenda, kuti ini ndakabva kunaƂaɓa.
Ndakabva kunaƂaɓa, ndikaʋuya panyika; ndinobva ɀe panyika, ndicienda kunaƂaɓa.
Ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakati: Tarirai, ɀino motaura pacena, hamucareʋi nemifananidzo.
Ɀino toziʋa, kuti munoziʋa ɀose, hamutȿaki kuti munhu akubvunzei; tinotenda naiɀoɀi kuti makabva kunaMŋari.
Jesu akaʋapindura,
Tarirai, ŋguʋa inoʋuya, yatoȿika, yamucaparadzirwa, mumŋe nomumŋe kuneɀake, mukandisiya ndiri ndoga; asi handizi ndoga, nokuti Ƃaɓa ʋaneni.
Ndakareʋa iɀoɀi kwamuri, kuti muʋe norugare mandiri. Panyika munotambudzika; asi tsuŋgai mŋoyo, ini ndakakunda nyika.
Jesu wakataura iɀoɀi, akatarira kuɗeŋga, akati: Ƃaɓa, ŋguʋa yaȿika; kudzai Mŋanakomana wenyu, kuti Mŋanakomana akukudzei imi,
seɀamakamupa simba pamsoro penyama yose, kuti ʋose ʋamakamupa, aʋape ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi ndibgo, kuti ʋakuziʋei imi, Mŋari uri woga waɀokwaɗi, naJesu Kristu, wamakatuma.
Ndakakukudzai panyika, ndapedza ɓasa ramakandipa kuti ndiriite.
Ɀino imi Ƃaɓa, mundikudzei pamberi penyu nokukudzwa kwandaiʋa nako kwamuri, nyika isati yaʋa’po.
Ndakaratidza ʋanhu, ʋamakandipa panyika, zita renyu. Ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋenyu, mukandipa iʋo, ʋakaceŋgeta shoko renyu.
Ɀino ʋanoziʋa kuti ɀose‐ɀose, ɀamakandipa, ɀinobva kwamuri.
Nokuti ndakaʋapa mashoko amakandipa, ʋakaagamucira, ʋakaziʋa ɀirokwaɀo kuti ndakabva kwamuri, ʋakatenda kuti ndakatumŋa nemi
Ndinoʋanyeŋgeterera iʋo; handinyeŋgetereri nyika, asi aʋo ʋamakandipa, nokuti ndiʋo ʋenyu.
Ɀose ɀaŋgu ndeɀenyu, neɀenyu ndeɀaŋgu; ndakudzwa maʋari.
Ini handiciri munyika, asi iʋo ʋari munyika; ini ndinoʋuya kwamuri. Ƃaɓa ʋatȿene, muʋaceŋgete muzita renyu, ramakandipa, kuti ʋaʋe ʋamŋe, sesu.
Ndiciri naʋo, ini ndaiʋaceŋgeta muzita renyu, ramakandipa; ndakaʋarinda, hapanomumŋe waʋo wakarashika, asi mŋanakomana wokurashwa, kuti Rugwaro ruitike.
Asi ɀino ndoʋuya kwamuri; ndinotaura iɀi panyika, kuti ʋaʋe nomufaro waŋgu, wakazadzika maʋari.
Ini ndakaʋapa shoko renyu, nyika ikaʋaʋeŋga, nokuti haʋazi ʋenyika, seni ndisi wenyika.
Handinyeŋgeteri kuti muʋabvise panyika, asi kuti muʋaceŋgete panowakaipa.
Haʋazi ʋenyika, seni ndisi wenyika.
Muʋaite ʋatȿene muɀokwaɗi; shoko renyu iɀokwaɗi.
Seɀamakandituma panyika imi, saiɀoɀo neni ndakaʋatuma panyika.
Ndinoɀiita mutȿene nokuɗa kwaʋo, kuti naiʋo ʋaitwe ʋatȿene muɀokwaɗi.
Handinyeŋgetereri aʋa ɓedzi, asi naiʋo ʋanotenda ʋo kwandiri neshoko raʋo,
kuti ʋose ʋaʋe ʋamŋe; semi Ƃaɓa muri mandiri, neni mamuri; kuti naiʋo ʋaʋe matiri, kuti nyika itende kuti makandituma.
Neni ndakaʋapa kubginya kwamakandipa; kuti ʋaʋe ʋamŋe, sesu tiri ʋamŋe;
ini maʋari, nemi mandiri, ʋakwaniswe kuʋa ʋamŋe; kuti nyika iziʋe kuti makandituma, ʋuye kuti makaʋaɗa, seɀamakandiɗa ini.
Ƃaɓa, ndinoɗa kuti aʋo ʋamakandipa, ʋaʋe ʋo neni apo pandiri, kuti ʋaʋone kubginya kwaŋgu, kwamakandipa, nokuti makandiɗa nyika isati yaʋambga.
Ƃaɓa ʋakarurama, nyika hainakukuziʋai; asi ini ndakakuziʋai; naiʋaʋa ʋakaziʋa kuti makandituma.
Ndakaʋaziʋisa zita renyu, ʋuye ndicariziʋisa, kuti ruɗo, rwamakandiɗa narwo, ruʋe maʋari, neni
Jesu wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaɓuɗa naʋadzidzi ʋake, akaenda mhiri kworukoʋa runonzi Kedroni, paiʋa nomunda, akapinda mauri, iye naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Ɀino Judasi, wakamupandukira, wakaŋga aciziʋa ʋo nɀimbo iyo; nokuti Jesu kazhinji waiʋuŋgana’po naʋadzidzi ʋake.
Naiɀoɀo Judasi akatora ɓoka raʋarwi, naʋatariri, ʋaibva kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋaFarise, akaenda’po nemŋenje namazhenje, neɀokurwa naɀo.
Ɀino Jesu, ɀaakaŋga aciziʋa ɀose ɀaifanira kumuwira, akaɓuɗa, akati kwaʋari: Munotȿaka aniko?
Ʋakamupindura,
Ɀino wakati areʋa kwaʋari, aciti: Ndini, ʋakasuɗurukira shure, ʋakawira pasi.
Ɀino akaʋabvunza ɀe, aciti: Munotȿaka aniko? Ʋakati: Jesu weNazareta.
Jesu akapindura,
kuti shoko, raakareʋa, riitike, rokuti: Handina‐kurashikirwa nomumŋe kunaiʋaʋo ʋamakandipa.
Ɀino Simoni Petro, wakaŋga anomunondo, akauvomora, akatema muranda womuprista mukuru, akamugura nzeʋe yorudyi. Zita romuranda uyo rainzi Markosi.
Ɀino Jesu akati kunaPetro: Isa munondo wako mumuhara; mukombe wandakapiwa naƂaɓa, handiŋgaunwi here?
Ɀino ɓoka raʋarwi, nomukuru wecuru cezana, naʋatariri ʋaʋaJuda ʋakaɓata Jesu, ʋakamusuŋga,
ʋakataŋga kumuisa kunaAnasi; nokuti wakaŋga ari mukarabga waKayafasi, waiʋa muprista mukuru gore iro.
Ɀino Kayafasi ndiye wakaŋga apa ʋaJuda zano, kuti ɀirinani kuti munhu mumŋe afire ʋanhu.
Ɀino Simoni Petro wakaŋga aciteʋera Jesu, nomumŋe mudzidzi ʋo. Mudzidzi uyu waizikanwa nomuprista mukuru, akapinda naJesu muruʋazhe rwomuprista mukuru.
Asi Petro wakaŋga amire panze pamukoʋa. Ɀino uya mumŋe mudzidzi, waizikanwa nomuprista mukuru, akaɓuɗa, akataura nomurindi womukoʋa, akapinza Petro.
Ɀino musikana, wairinda mukoʋa, akati kunaPetro: Newe ʋo uri mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋomunhu uyu here? Akati: Handizati.
Ɀino ʋaranda naʋatariri ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po, ʋamboʋesa mŋoto wamazimbe, nokuti kwaitonhora; ʋakadziya
Ɀino muprista mukuru akabvunza Jesu ɀaʋadzidzi ʋake, neɀokudzidzisa kwake.
Jesu akamupindura,
Munondibvunzireiko ini? bvunzai aʋa ʋainzwa ɀandaitaura kwaʋari; tarirai, aʋa ʋanoziʋa ɀandaireʋa.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, mumŋe waʋatariri, wakaŋga amire’po, akaroʋa Jesu noruʋoko, aciti: Unopindura muprista mukuru uciɗaro nhai?
Jesu akamupindura,
Ɀino Anasi akamutumira akasuŋgwa kunaKayafasi, muprista mukuru.
Ɀino Simoni Petro wakaŋga amire’po, acidziya mŋoto. Ʋakati kwaari: Newe ʋo uri mumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake here? Akaramba, akati: Handizati.
Mumŋe muranda womuprista mukuru, hama yowakaŋga agurwa nzeʋe naPetro, akati: Ini handina‐kukuʋona unaye mumunda here?
Petro akaramba ɀe. Pakarepo joŋgwe rikarira.
Ɀino ʋakabva kunaKayafasi, ʋakaenda naJesu kuimba yomuɓati; aiʋa maŋgwanani. Asi iʋo haʋana‐kupinda mumba momuɓati, kuti ʋarege kuȿiɓiswa, kuti ʋagodya paseka.
Ipapo Pirato akaɓuɗira kwaʋari, akati: Munoti, munhu uyu unemhoȿa yeiko?
Ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaari: Ƌai munhu uyu asaiʋa mutadzi, tiŋgaɗai tisina‐kumuisa kwamuri.
Ɀino Pirato akati kwaʋari: Cimutorai imi, mumutoŋge nomurairo wenyu. ƲaJuda ʋakati kwaari: Hatina‐kutenderwa isu kuti tiʋuraye munhu;
kuti shoko raJesu raakareʋa riitike, aciɗudzira kufa kwaaifanira kufa nako.
Ɀino Pirato akapinda ɀe mumba momuɓati, akaɗana Jesu, akati kwaari: Ndiwe mambo waʋaJuda here?
Jesu akapindura,
Pirato akapindura,
Jesu akapindura,
Ipapo Pirato akati kwaari: Iwe uri mambo su? Jesu akapindura,
Pirato akati kwaari: Ɀokwaɗi cinyiko?
Akati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaɓuɗira ɀe kuʋaJuda, akati kwaʋari: Ini handiwani mhoȿa kwaari.
Asi imi munetsika kuti ndikusunuŋgurirei mumŋe nepaseka; ɀino munoɗa kuti ndikusunuŋgurirei mambo waʋaJuda here?
Ipapo ʋakaɗanidzira ʋose, ʋaciti: Munhu uyu kwete, asi Barabasi! Ɀino Barabasi wakaŋga ari gororo.
Ɀino Pirato wakatora Jesu, akamuroʋesa.
Ʋarwi ʋakaruka korona yeminzwa, ʋakaiisa pamusoro wake, ʋakamupfekedza ŋguʋo tȿuku,
ʋakaʋuya kwaari, ʋaciti: Kwaziwai, Mambo waʋaJuda! Ʋakamuroʋa namaʋoko.
Ipapo Pirato akaɓuɗa ɀe, akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, ndamuɓuɗisira kwamuri, muziʋe kuti handiwani mhoȿa kwaari.
Jesu akaɓuɗa, akadzika korona yeminzwa, aneŋguʋo tȿuku.

Ɀino ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋatariri ʋakati ʋacimuʋona, ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Roʋerai pamucinjikwa, roʋerai pamucinjikwa! Pirato akati kwaʋari: Cimutorai imi, mumuroʋerei pamucinjikwa; nokuti ini handiwani mhoȿa kwaari.
ƲaJuda ʋakamupindura,
Ɀino Pirato wakati anzwa shoko iri, akanyanya kutya.
Akapinda ɀe mumba momuɓati, akati kunaJesu: Uri wepiko? Asi Jesu haana‐kumupindura.
Ipapo Pirato akati kwaari: Hautauri neni here? Hauziʋi su kuti ndinesimba rokukusunuŋgura, nesimba rokukuroʋera pamucinjikwa?
Jesu akamupindura,
Ɀino Pirato akatȿaka kumusunuŋgura; asi ʋaJuda ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Kana mukasunuŋgura munhu uyu, hamuzi shamŋari yaKesari; mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɀiita mambo, unoramba Kesari.
Ɀino Pirato wakati anzwa mashoko iwayo, akaɓuɗisa Jesu, akagara pacigaro cokutoŋga, panɀimbo yainzi Pakaroŋgwa naMabge, asi neciHeberu Gabata.
Ɀino wakaŋga uri
Iʋo ʋakaɗanidzira,
Ipapo akamuisa kwaʋari, kuti aroʋerwe pamucinjikwa.
Ɀino ʋakaenda naJesu;
akaɓuɗa, acitakura mucinjikwa wake,
paʋakamuroʋera pamucinjikwa, naʋamŋe ʋaʋiri naye, mumŋe kunorumŋe rutiʋi, mumŋe kunorumŋe rutiʋi, Jesu pakati.
Pirato akanyora ʋo rugwaro, akaruisa pamucinjikwa; kwakaŋga kwakanyorwa,
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋazhinji ʋakaraʋa rugwaro urwo; nokuti nɀimbo iyo pakaŋga pakaroʋerwa Jesu pamucinjikwa, yaiʋa pedyo neguta; rwakaŋga rwakanyorwa neciHeberu, neciRoma, neciGiriki.
Ipapo ʋaprista ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ʋakati kunaPirato: Musanyora muciti: Mambo waʋaJuda, asi kuti, Iye wakati: Ndiri mambo waʋaJuda.
Pirato akapindura,
Ɀino ʋarwi ʋakati ʋaroʋera Jesu pamucinjikwa, ʋakatora ŋguʋo dzake, ʋakaita migoʋe minna, murwi mumŋe nomumŋe mugoʋe
Ɀino ʋakataurirana,
Ʋakagoʋana ŋguʋo dzaŋgu pakati paʋo,
Ʋakakanda mijenya pamsoro pecokufuka caŋgu.
Ndiɀo ɀakaitwa naʋarwi.
Ɀino pamucinjikwa waJesu pakaŋga pamire mai ʋake, nomunuŋuna wamai ʋake, Maria,
Ɀino Jesu wakati aciʋona mai ʋake, nomudzidzi waaiɗa, amire’po, akati kunamai ʋake: Mai, tarirai, mŋanakomana wenyu.
Ipapo akati kumudzidzi: Tarira mai ʋako. Kubva paŋguʋa iyo mudzidzi akaʋatora, akaʋaisa
Shure kwaiɀoɀo, Jesu wakati aciziʋa kuti ɀose ɀapera, kuti Rugwaro ruitike, akati: Ndinenyota.
Pakaŋga pamire’po hari izere nevinega; ɀino ʋakaisa cipanje cizere nevinega
Ɀino Jesu wakati agamucira vinega, akati: Ɀapera! akakotamisa musoro wake, akapa
Ɀino ɀawaiʋa
Naiɀoɀo ʋarwi ʋakaʋuya, ʋakavuna makumbo owokutaŋga, noomumŋe wakaŋga aroʋerwa pamucinjikwa pamŋe cete naye;
asi ʋakati ʋaciȿika kunaJesu, ʋaciʋona kuti watofa hake, haʋana‐kuvuna makumbo ake,
asi mumŋe murwi wakaɓaya rutiʋi rwake nepfumo, pakarepo ropa nemvura ɀikaɓuɗa.
Uyo wakaʋona,
Nokuti iɀoɀo ɀakaitwa, kuti Rugwaro ruitike,
Norumŋe Rugwaro ɀe runoti: Ʋacatarira uyo waʋakabvoʋora.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Josefa weArimatia, waiʋa mudzidzi waJesu, asi cinyararire nokutya ʋaJuda, wakakumbira kunaPirato kuti abvise mutumbu waJesu; Pirato akamutendera. Ipapo akaʋuya, akabvisa mutumbu wake
NaNikodimo ʋo, iye wakamboʋuya kwaari pakutaŋga ʋusiku, wakaʋuya anemura nearosi ɀakaveŋganiswa, mapaundi aneŋge zana.
Ipapo ʋakatora mutumbu waJesu, ʋakauputira nemiceka pamŋe cete neɀinonhuwira, seɀinoita ʋaJuda pakuʋiga kwaʋo.
Panɀimbo iyo, paakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa, pakaŋga panomunda; mumunda imomo maiʋa nobgiro bgutȿa, makaŋga musinakumboiswa munhu.
Ɀino ʋakaisa Jesu ipapo, ɀawakaŋga uri
Ɀino no
Akamhanya, akaenda kunaSimoni Petro nokunomumŋe mudzidzi, waiɗikanwa naJesu, akati kwaʋari: Ʋabvisa Ishe mubgiro, hatiziʋi paʋakamuisa.
Ɀino Petro akaɓuɗa nouya mumŋe mudzidzi, ʋakaenda kubgiro.
Ʋakamhanya ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri; uya mumŋe mudzidzi akamhanyisa akakunda Petro, akataŋga kuȿika pabgiro,
akakotama aciɗoŋgorera, akaʋona miceka iri pasi, asi haana‐kupinda.
Ɀino Simoni Petro akaȿika ʋo, akapinda mubgiro, akaʋona miceka iri pasi;
nomuceka muɗuku, wakaŋga uri mumusoro wake, usati uri kunemimŋe miceka, asi wakapetwa uri pamŋe woga.
Ɀino uya mumŋe mudzidzi akapinda ʋo, iye wakataŋga kuȿika pabgiro, akaʋona, akatenda.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacigere kunzwisisa Rugwaro, runoti unofanira kumuka kuʋakafa.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋakadzokera ɀe kumusha kwaʋo.
Asi Maria wakaramba amire kunze kwobgiro, acicema; ɀino acacema, akakotama, akaɗoŋgorera mubgiro.
Akaʋona ʋatumŋa ʋaʋiri, ʋane
Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Mai, munocemeiko? Akati kwaʋari: Nokuti ʋakabvisa Ishe waŋgu, ɀino handiziʋi kwaʋakamuisa.
Ɀino wakati acireʋa iɀoɀo, akatendeʋukira shure, akaʋona Jesu amire; asi haana‐kuziʋa kuti ndiJesu.
Jesu akati kwaari: Mai, munocemeiko? Munotȿaka aniko? Iye aciti ndiye murimi womunda, akati kwaari: Ishe, kana muri imi mamubvisa, ndiʋudzei pamamuisa, ndindomutora.
Jesu akati kwaari: Maria! Iye akatendeʋuka, akati kwaari neciHeberu: Raboni; ndokuti: Mudzidzisi.
Jesu akati kwaari: Usandiɓata, nokuti ndicigere kukwira kunaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu; asi enda kuhama dzaŋgu, uti kwaʋari: Ndinokwira kunaƂaɓa ʋaŋgu naƂaɓa ʋenyu, kunaMŋari waŋgu naMŋari wenyu.
Maria Magdarene akaenda, akaʋudza ʋadzidzi, aciti: Ndaʋona Ishe, ʋuye kuti wakaŋga aʋudzwa ɀinhu iɀi naye.
Ɀino aʋa maɗeko pazuʋa iro rokutaŋga reviki, mikoʋa yapfigwa paʋakaŋga ʋari ʋadzidzi nokutya ʋaJuda, Jesu akaʋuya, akamira pakati
Ɀino wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akaʋaratidza ɀanza
Jesu akati ɀe kwaʋari: Rugare kwamuri! Ƃaɓa seɀaʋakandituma, neni ndinokutumai ʋo.
Ɀino wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akafemera
Aʋo, ʋamunokaŋganwira ɀiʋi
Ɀino Tomasi, wainzi Didimo, mumŋe waʋanegumi naʋaʋiri, wakaŋga asi’po paʋari, pakuʋuya kwaJesu.

Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋadzidzi ʋakati kwaari: Taʋona Ishe. Iye akati kwaʋari: Kana ndikasaʋona maʋaŋga embambo muɀanza ɀake, nokuisa munwe waŋgu paiʋa nembambo, nokuisa ruʋoko rwaŋgu murutiʋi rwake, handiŋgatoŋgotendi.
Ɀino mazuʋa masere akati apfuʋura ɀe, ʋadzidzi ʋakaŋga ʋari’mo mukati, naTomasi anaʋo. Jesu akaʋuya, mikoʋa yapfigwa, akamira pakati
Ipapo akati kunaTomasi: Ʋuya pano nomunwe wako, uʋone ɀanza ɀaŋgu; ʋuya noruʋoko rwako, u
Tomasi akapindura, akati kwaari: Ishe waŋgu, naMŋari waŋgu!
Jesu akati kwaari: Watenda, nokuti wandiʋona? Ʋacaropafadzwa ʋanotenda,
Ɀino Jesu wakaita ɀimŋe ɀiratidzo ɀizhinji pamberi paʋadzidzi ʋake, ɀisina‐kunyorwa mubuku iyi;
asi iɀi ɀakanyorwa, kuti mutende kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari; ʋuye kuti, mucitenda, muʋe noʋupenyu muzita rake.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo Jesu wakaɀiratidza ɀe kuʋadzidzi ʋake paguŋgwa reTiberiasi; akaɀiratidza kuɗai:
ƲanaSimoni Petro, naTomasi, wainzi Didimo, naNatanaeri, weKana yeGarirea,
Simoni Petro akati kwaʋari: Ndondoɓata hoʋe. Ʋakati kwaari: Nesu tinoenda ʋo newe. Ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakapinda mugwa; asi ʋusiku ubgo haʋana‐kuɓata cinhu.
Ɀino kwakati kwoedza, Jesu akamira pamhenderekedzo, asi ʋadzidzi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi kuti ndiJesu.
Ɀino Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ʋana, muneciseʋo here? Ʋakamupindura,
Akati kwaʋari: Kandai rutaʋa kurutiʋi rworudyi rwegwa mugowana. Ipapo ʋakakanda, ʋakasagona ɀino kurukweʋa nokuwanda kwehoʋe.
Ɀino mudzidzi uya, waiɗikanwa naJesu, akati kunaPetro: NdiShe. Ipapo Simoni Petro wakati acinzwa kuti ndiShe, akasuŋga ŋguʋo yake, nokuti wakaŋga asina, akaɀiwisira muguŋgwa.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋadzidzi ʋakaʋuya nekagwa, ʋacikweʋa rutaʋa runehoʋe, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋasi kure nenyika asi makubiti aneŋge mazana maʋiri.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika panyika, ʋakaʋona mŋoto wamazimbe waʋeswa, nehoʋe yakaiswa pamsoro pawo, neciŋgwa.
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ʋuyai nedzimŋe hoʋe dzamakaɓata ɀino.
Simoni akakwira
Jesu akati kwaʋari: Ʋuyai, muȿuȿure. Kwakaŋga kusinomumŋe waʋadzidzi ʋake wakatsuŋga kumubvunza,
Ɀino Jesu akaenda, akatora ciŋgwa, akaʋapa, nehoʋe ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Urwu rwaiʋa rwecitatu, Jesu rwaakaɀiratidza kuʋadzidzi ʋake amuka kuʋakafa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿuȿura, Jesu akati kunaSimoni Petro: Simoni,
Akati kwaari ɀe rwecipiri: Simoni,
Akati kwaari rwecitatu: Simoni,
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoti kwauri: Uciri jaya, waiɀisuŋga ciʋuno, ucifamba kwawaiɗa; asi kana wakwegura, ucatambanudza maʋoko ako, mumŋe ucakusuŋga ciʋuno, acikuisa kwausiŋgaɗi.
Wakareʋa iɀoɀo, acifananidza kufa kwaaizokudza Mŋari nako. Ɀino wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akati kwaari: Nditeʋere.
Petro akatendeʋuka, akaʋona uya mudzidzi, waiɗikanwa naJesu, aciteʋera;
Ɀino Petro wakati acimuʋona, akati kunaJesu: Ishe, ko uyu ucaitweiko?
Jesu akati kwaari: Kana ndikaɗa kuti agare kuȿikira ndiciʋuya, uneiko naɀo iwe? Unditeʋere iwe.
Ɀino shoko iro rakapararira pakati pehama, kuti mudzidzi uyu haaŋgazofi. Asi Jesu haana‐kureʋa kwaari, kuti haaŋgazofi, asi kuti: Kana ndikaɗa kuti agare kuȿikira ndiciʋuya, uneiko naɀo iwe?
Ndiyoyu mudzidzi unopupura iɀoɀi, wakaɀinyora ʋo; tinoziʋa kuti kupupura kwake ndokwaɀokwaɗi.
Ɀimŋe ɀizhinji ɀiri’ko, ɀakaitwa ʋo naJesu; kana ɀainyorwa cimŋe necimŋe, ndinoti kunyaŋge nenyika yose haiŋgariŋgani buku dziŋganyorwa.
Teofiro, ndakanyora rugwaro rwokutaŋga rweɀose ɀakataŋga kuitwa nokudzidziswa naJesu,
kuȿikira zuʋa raakakwidzwa, amboraira noMŋeya Mutȿene ʋaapostora ʋaakaŋga asanaŋgura;
ʋaakaɀiratidza ʋo kwaʋari neɀiratidzo ɀizhinji, ari mupenyu, shure kwokutambudzika kwake, aciʋonekwa naʋo mazuʋa anamakumi manna, acitaura ɀinhu ɀoʋushe bgaMŋari;
akaʋaraira, aʋuŋgana naʋo, kuti ʋarege kubva Jerusarema, asi ʋagarire cipikirwa caƂaɓa,
nokuti Johane, ɀirokwaɀo, wakabapatidza nemvura; asi imi mucabapatidzwa noMŋeya Musente, mazuʋa mazhinji asati apera.
Ɀino iʋo, ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana, ʋakamubvunza, ʋaciti: Ishe, modzosera ʋushe kunaʋaIsraeri neŋguʋa ino here?
Akati kwaʋari: Haɀina‐kufanira kuti muziʋe ŋguʋa kana misi yakatarwa naƂaɓa ʋamene nesimba raʋo.
Asi mucapiwa simba, kana Mŋeya Mutȿene waʋuya pamsoro penyu; ipapo mucaʋa ɀapupu ɀaŋgu paJerusarema, napaJudea rose, napaSamaria, nokuȿikira kumugumo wenyika.
Ɀino wakati areʋa iɀoɀi, akakwidzwa, ʋacitaririra; gore rikamubvisa, ʋakasazomuʋona.
Ɀino ʋacitarisisa kuɗeŋga, iye acikwira, tarira, ʋarume ʋaʋiri ʋamira naʋo ʋakafuka ŋguʋo cena;
iʋo ʋakati: Imi ʋarume ʋeGarirea, makamirireiko makatarira kuɗeŋga? Uyu Jesu,
Ɀino ʋakadzokera Jerusarema, ʋacibva
Ʋakati ʋapinda, ʋakakwira muimba yaiʋa pamsoro, paʋakaŋga ʋagere,
Aʋa ʋose ʋakatsuŋgirira nomŋoyo mumŋe pakunyeŋgetera, ʋanaʋakadzi, naMaria, mai ʋaJesu, naʋanuŋuna ʋake.
Namazuʋa iwayo Petro wakasimuka pakati pehama, (ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaiʋa’po pamŋe cete, ʋaneŋge zana namakumi maʋiri), akati:
Ʋarume, hama, rugwaro rwakafanira kuitika, rwakaprofitwa noMŋeya Mutȿene nomuromo waDavidi, pamsoro paJudasi, wakaŋga ari muperekedzi waʋaya ʋakaɓata Jesu.
Nokuti wakaŋga aʋereŋgwa pamŋe cete nesu, akapiwa mugoʋe wake paɓasa iri.
(Ɀino munhu uyu wakateŋga munda nomuɓairo weɀisakarurama, akawira pasi neciso, akaparuka napakati, ʋura bgake bgukaɓuɗa bgose.
Ɀikanzwika naʋose ʋaigara Jerusarema; naiɀoɀo munda uyu ukatumidzwa Akerdama norurimi rwaʋo, ndokuti: Munda weropa.)
Nokuti mubuku yaMapisarema makanyorwa,
Musha wake ŋgauitwe ɗoŋgo,
Kurege kuʋa nomunhu unogara’mo;
ʋuye:
Mumŋe ŋgaapinde paʋutariri bgake.
Ɀino pakati paʋarume ʋaiʋuŋgana nesu ŋguʋa yose, Ishe Jesu yaakapinda nokuɓuɗa nayo pakati peɗu,
kutaŋga pakubapatidza kwaJohane, kuȿikira pazuʋa
Ɀino ʋakaisa’
Ʋakanyeŋgetera, ʋaciti: Imi Ishe, munoziʋa mŋoyo yaʋanhu ʋose, ratidzai kuti wamakasanaŋgura kunaiʋaʋa ʋaʋiri ndoupi;
kuti apiwe nɀimbo paɓasa iri noʋuapostora ubgu, bgaakarashikirwa nabgo
Ɀino ʋakaʋakandira mijenya, mujenya ukaɓata Matia; iye akaʋereŋgwa pamŋe cete naʋaapostora ʋanegumi nomumŋe.
Ɀino zuʋa rePentekosta rakati raȿika, ʋakaŋga ʋakaʋuŋgana ʋose pamŋe cete panɀimbo imŋe.
Pakarepo kutinhira sokwemhepo inovuvuta nesimba kwakabva kuɗeŋga, kukazadza imba yose maʋakaŋga ʋagere.
Ʋakaʋona ʋo ndimi dziciparadzana, dzineŋge dzomŋoto; ndokumhara pamusoro womumŋe nomumŋe waʋo.
Ʋose ʋakazadzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene, ʋakataŋga kutaura nedzimŋe ndimi, paʋakapiwa napo noMŋeya kureʋa.
Ɀino paJerusarema pakaŋga pagere ʋaJuda, ʋarume ʋakarurama, ʋaibva kumarudzi ose pasi peɗeŋga.
Ɀino kutinhira uku kwakati kwanzwika, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋakakaŋganiswa, nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakaʋanzwa, ʋacitaura norurimi rwake.
Ʋakakatyamara ʋose, nokushamiswa, ʋaciti: Tarirai, aʋa ʋose ʋanotaura haʋazi ʋaGarirea here?
Ɀino tinogoʋanzwa seiko mumŋe nomumŋe norurimi rweɗu, rwatakaɓerekwa narwo?
ƲaPartia, naʋaMedia, naʋaErami, naʋanogara Mesopotamia, neJudea, neKapadokia, nePonto, neAsia,
neFrigia, nePamfiria, neEgipita, namatiʋi enyika dzeRibia, dziri pedyo neKurine, naʋaeni ʋabva Roma, naʋaJuda, naʋaproserite,
naʋaKrete, naʋaArabia, tinoʋanzwa ʋacitaura nendimi dzeɗu maɓasa makuru aMŋari.
Ʋakakatyamara ʋose, ʋakakaŋganiswa, ndokutaurirana, ʋaciti: Iɀi ɀinoti kuɗiniko?
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakaseka, ʋaciti: Ʋaguta waini itȿa.
Ɀino Petro amire naʋanegumi nomumŋe, akaɗanidzira, akaparidza kwaʋari,
nokuti aʋa haʋana‐kuɓatwa, seɀamunofuŋga imi, ɀaiciri ŋguʋa yecitanhatu yezuʋa,
asi ici ndico cakarebga nomuprofita Joeri,
Mŋari unoti: Namazuʋa okupedzisira,
Ndicaɗurura ɀoMŋeya waŋgu pamsoro penyama yose;
Ʋanakomana ʋenyu naʋanasikana ʋenyu ʋacaprofita;
Majaya enyu acaʋona ɀiratidzo,
Naʋatana ʋenyu ʋacarota hope.
Napamsoro paʋaranda ʋaŋgu napamsoro paʋashandiri ʋaŋgu,
Ndicaɗurura ɀomŋeya waŋgu namazuʋa iwayo; ʋacaprofita.
Ndicaita ɀinoshamisa kuɗeŋga kumsoro,
Neɀiratidzo panyika pasi;
Ropa, nomŋoto, nemhute yoʋutsi.
Zuʋa ricashandurwa rima,
Nomŋedzi
Zuʋa guru raShe rinobginya risati raȿika.
Ɀino kucaitika kuti aninani unoɗana zita raShe ucaponeswa.
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, ɗonzwai mashoko awa: Jesu weNazareta, murume wakaratidzwa naMŋari kwamuri namaɓasa esimba, neɀishamiso, neɀiratidzo ɀakaitwa naMŋari pakati penyu naye, seɀamunoziʋa imi mumene;
iye, wakaiswa
iye wakamutswa naMŋari, a
Nokuti Davidi wakataura pamsoro pake,
Ndakaʋona Ishe pamberi paŋgu misi yose,
Nokuti uri kurudyi rwaŋgu, kuti ndirege kuzunuŋguswa.
Naiɀoɀo mŋoyo waŋgu wakafara, norurimi rwaŋgu rwakafarisisa;
Ʋuye ɀe, nenyama yaŋgu icazorora netariro.
Nokuti hamuŋgasiyi mŋeya waŋgu muHadesi;
Hamuŋgaisi Mutȿene wenyu kuti aʋone kuʋora.
Makandiziʋisa nzira dzoʋupenyu;
Mucandizadzisa nomufaro
Ʋarume, hama, ndiŋgakuʋudzai pacena ɀateteguru Davidi, kuti ʋakafa, ʋakaʋigwa, bgiro bgaʋo bguri pakati peɗu kuȿikira nhasi.
Ɀino ɀaakaŋga ari muprofita, aciziʋa ʋo kuti Mŋari wakamupikira nemhiko kuti ucagadza pacigaro cake coʋushe
ɀaaiʋona ɀiri mberi, wakareʋa pamsoro pokumuka kwaKristu, kuti haanakusiyiwa paHadesi, nenyama yake hainakuʋora.
Uyu Jesu wakamutswa naMŋari, isu tiri ɀapupu ɀake tose.
Ɀino wakati asimudzirwa kurudyi rwaMŋari, apiwa naƂaɓa cipikirwa coMŋeya Mutȿene, akaɗurura iɀi ɀamunoʋona neɀamunonzwa.
Nokuti Davidi haana‐kukwira kuɗeŋga, asi unoti amene:
Ishe wakati kunaShe waŋgu:
Gara kurudyi rwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira ndiciita ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋaʋe citsiko cetsoka dzako.
Ɀino imba yose yaʋaIsraeri ŋgaiziʋe kwaɀo, kuti uyu Jesu wamakaroʋera pamucinjikwa, Mŋari wakamuita Ishe naKristu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacinzwa
Petro
Nokuti cipikirwa ndecenyu, naʋana ʋenyu, naʋose ʋari kure, ʋanozoɗanwa naShe, Mŋari weɗu.
Akapupura kwaɀo namamŋe mashoko mazhinji, akaʋaraira, aciti: Muɀiponese parudzi urwu rwakakombama.
Ɀino aʋo ʋakagamucira shoko rake, ʋakabapatidzwa; nezuʋa iro ʋanhu ʋaneŋge ɀuru ɀitatu ʋakawedzerwa.
Ʋakatsuŋgirira pakudzidzisa kwaʋaapostora, napakuyanana kwaʋo, napakumeɗura ciŋgwa, napaminyeŋgetero.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakaɓatwa nokutya; ɀinoshamisa ɀizhinji neɀiratidzo ɀikaitwa naʋaapostora.
Naʋaitenda ʋose, ʋaiʋa pamŋe cete, ʋakati ɀinhu ɀose ndeɀaʋose;
ʋakateŋgesa fuma yaʋo nenhumbi, ʋakagoʋana naʋose, mumŋe nomumŋe paakashaiwa napo.
Ɀuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe ʋakaŋga ʋacitsuŋgirira mutembere nomŋoyo mumŋe, ʋacimeɗura ciŋgwa mudzimba
ʋacirumbidza Mŋari, ʋaciɗikanwa naʋanhu ʋose. Ishe akawedzera kwaʋari zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe aʋo ʋaiponeswa.
Ɀino Petro naJohane ʋakakwira kutembere neŋguʋa yokunyeŋgetera yepfumbamŋe.
Ɀino mumŋe murume, waikamhina kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋake, wakaŋga acitakurwa; ʋaimuisa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe pamukoʋa wetembere, wainzi Wakanaka, kuti akumbire ɀipo kunaʋaipinda mutembere.
Iye wakati aciʋona Petro naJohane ʋoɗa kupinda mutembere, akakumbira kuti apiwe cipo.
Ɀino Petro akamutarisisa, naJohane ʋo, akati: Titarire.
Akaʋatarira, aciti ndicapiwa cinhu naʋo.
Asi Petro akati: Sirveri nendarama handina; asi candinaco ndinokupa: Nezita raJesu weNazareta, cifamba.
Akamuɓata ruʋoko rworudyi, akamusimudza; pakarepo tsoka dzake neɀiziso ɀetsoka dzake ɀakasimba.
Akavazuka, akamira, ndokufamba; ndokupinda naʋo mutembere, akafamba acipembera, acirumbidza Mŋari.
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamuʋona acifamba, acirumbidza Mŋari.
Ʋakamuziʋa, kuti ndiye waigarira ɀipo pamukoʋa Wakanaka wetembere; ʋakakatyamara ɀikuru nokushamiswa neɀaakaitirwa.
Ɀino wakati acakaɓata Petro naJohane, ʋanhu ʋose ʋakamhanyira kwaʋari paɓiraʋira, rainzi raSoromoni, ʋakashamiswa kwaɀo.
Ɀino Petro wakati aciʋona iɀoɀo, akapindura ʋanhu,
Mŋari waAbrahama, nowaIsaka, nowaJakobo, Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu, ndiye wakakudza Muranda wake Jesu, wamakaisa
Asi imi makaramba
mukaʋuraya Muʋambi woʋupenyu; iye, wakamutswa naMŋari kuʋakafa; iye, watiri ɀapupu ɀake isu.
Nokutenda kuzita rake, zita rake rakasimbisa munhu uyu wamunoʋona, nowamunoziʋa; ʋuye, kutenda kunobva kwaari, ndiko kwakamuporesa ɀakanaka kuɗai pamberi penyu mose.
Asi ɀino, hama
asi saiɀoɀo Mŋari wakapedzisa ɀaakamboreʋa nomuromo waʋaprofita ʋose, kuti Kristu wake ucazotambudzika.
Naiɀoɀo tendeʋukai, mudzoke, kuti ɀiʋi ɀenyu ɀidzimŋe, kuti ŋguʋa dzokusimbiswa dzinobva kunaShe, dziȿike;
atume Kristu, iye Jesu, wakagadzwa kare nokuɗa kwenyu;
iye unofanira kugamucirwa kuɗeŋga kuȿikira ŋguʋa yokugadzirwa kweɀinhu ɀose, yakarebga naMŋari nomuromo waʋaprofita ʋake ʋatȿene kubva pakutaŋga.
Nokuti Mosesi wakati: Ishe, Mŋari wenyu, ucakumutsirai Muprofita pakati pehama dzenyu, wakafanana neni; mucamuterera paɀose, ɀaanotaura kwamuri.
Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe kana asiŋgatereri Muprofita uyo, ucaparadzwa kwaɀo pakati paʋanhu.
Naʋaprofita ʋose kubva kunaSamueri, naʋakamuteʋera, naiʋo ʋose ʋakataura nokuparidza ɀamazuʋa ano.
Imi muri ʋanakomana ʋaʋaprofita, naʋesuŋgano, yakaitwa naMŋari namadziɓaɓa enyu, aciti kunaAbrahama: Marudzi ose enyika acaropafadzwa muʋana ʋako.
Mŋari wakataŋga kukumutsirai imi Muranda wake, akamutuma kukuropafadzai, acidzora mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu paɀakaipa ɀenyu.
Ʋakati ʋacataura naʋanhu, ʋaprista nomukuru wetembere naʋaSaduse ʋakaʋuya kwaʋari,
ʋafa neshuŋgu, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacidzidzisa ʋanhu, ʋaciparidza kumuka kwaʋakafa munaJesu.
Ʋakaʋaɓata, ʋakaʋaisa mutoroŋgo kuȿikira maŋgwana; nokuti akaŋga aʋa maɗekwana.
Asi ʋazhinji kunaʋakanzwa shoko ʋakatenda; ʋarume ʋakazoȿika ɀuru ɀineŋge ɀishanu pakuʋereŋgwa kwaʋo.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋaɓati ʋaʋo, naʋakuru, naʋanyori ʋakaʋuŋgana paJerusarema;
naAnasi, muprista mukuru, naKayafasi, naJohane, naAreksandro, nehama dzose dzomuprista mukuru,
ʋakaʋaisa pakati
Ɀino Petro, azere noMŋeya Mutȿene, akati kwaʋari: Imi ʋaɓati ʋaʋanhu,
kana tikabvunzwa nhasi pamsoro peɓasa rakanaka, rakaitirwa munhu cirema, napaakaponeswa napo;
muziʋe imi mose, naʋanhu ʋose ʋaIsraeri, kuti nezita raJesu Kristu weNazareta, wamakaroʋera pamucinjikwa, iye wakamutswa naMŋari kuʋakafa,
Ndiye ibge rakaɀidzwa nemi ʋaʋaki, rikaitwa musoro wekona.
Nokuti hakunakuponeswa kunomumŋe; nokuti hakunerimŋe zita pasi peɗeŋga, rakapiwa pakati paʋanhu, ratiŋgasunuŋgurwa naro.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciʋona kusatya kwaPetro naJohane, ʋacinzwisisa kuti ʋaiʋa ʋanhu ʋasina‐kudzidza, ʋasiŋgaziʋi
Ʋakaʋona ʋo munhu, wakaŋga aporeswa, amire naʋo, ʋakashaiwa caʋaŋgapindura naco.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋaraira kuti ʋaɓuɗe paʋuŋgano, ʋakaraŋgana pakati paʋo,
ʋaciti: Ʋanhu aʋa ticaʋaita seiko? Nokuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋagere Jerusarema ʋaʋona kwaɀo kuti ciratidzo caitwa naʋo; hatigoni kuramba isu.
Asi ŋgatiʋanyeʋere kuti ʋarege kuzotaura nomunhu upi noupi nezita iri, kuti ɀirege kuramba ɀiciparadzirwa pakati paʋanhu.
Ʋakaʋaɗana, ʋakaʋaraira kuti ʋarege cose kutaura kana kudzidzisa nezita raJesu.
Asi Petro naJohane ʋakapindura, ʋakati kwaʋari: Toŋgai henyu imi, kana ɀiŋgaʋa ɀakarurama pamberi paMŋari, kuti titerere imi kupfuʋura Mŋari.
Nokuti hatigoni isu kurega kutaura ɀatakaʋona, neɀatakanzwa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋawedzera kuʋanyeʋera, ʋakaʋaregedza, ʋasiŋgawani mhoȿa yaʋaŋgaʋaroʋa nayo nokuɗa kwaʋanhu; nokuti ʋose ʋairumbidza Mŋari pamsoro peɀakaitwa;
nokuti munhu wakaŋga aitirwa ciratidzo ici wakaŋga anamakore makumi manna anemiraʋudzo.
Ʋakati ʋaregedzwa, ʋakaenda kunoʋokwaʋo, ʋakando
Iʋo ʋakati ʋaɀinzwa, ʋakaɗana kunaMŋari nomŋoyo mumŋe, ʋaciti: Tenzi, ndimi makaita ɗeŋga napasi, neguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo;
makareʋa noMŋeya Mutȿene, nomuromo waɓaɓa ʋeɗu Davidi, muranda wenyu,
Ʋahedeni ʋakaitireiko hasha,
Naʋanhu ʋakafuŋgireiko ɀisinamaturo?
Madzimambo enyika akamuka,
Naʋaɓati ʋakaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete,
Kurwa naShe naKristu wake.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo Herode, naPontio Pirato, naʋahedeni, naʋanhu ʋaIsraeri ʋakaʋuŋganira muguta iri, kuzorwa naJesu Muranda wenyu mutȿene, wamakazodza;
kuti ʋaite ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀatemŋa noruʋoko rwenyu, napakufuŋga kwenyu, kuti ɀiitwe.
Ɀino, Ishe, tarirai kunyeʋera kwaʋo, muɓatsire ʋaranda ʋenyu kuti ʋataure shoko renyu ʋasiŋgatoŋgotyi,
mutambanudze ruʋoko rwenyu kuzoporesa; neɀiratidzo neɀishamiso ɀiitwe nezita raJesu, Muranda wenyu mutȿene.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanyeŋgetera, nɀimbo yaʋakaŋga ʋakaʋuŋgana pairi ikazunuŋguswa; ʋakazadzwa ʋose noMŋeya Mutȿene, ʋakataura shoko raMŋari ʋasiŋgatyi.
Ɀino ʋazhinji ʋose ʋaʋaitenda ʋaiʋa nomŋoyo mumŋe nomŋeya
Ʋaapostora ʋaipupurira kumuka kwaJesu nesimba guru; nyasha huru ikaʋa’po pamsoro paʋo ʋose.
Nokuti pakaŋga pasinawaishaiwa pakati paʋo, nokuti ʋose ʋaiʋa neminda kana dzimba, ʋakaɀiteŋgesa, ʋakaʋuya nomuteŋgo weɀakateŋgeswa,
ʋakaɀiisa pamberi paʋaapostora; mumŋe nomumŋe akagoʋerwa paakashaiwa napo.
NaJosefa, wakatumidzwa naʋaapostora acinzi Barnabasi, (ndokuti Mŋanakomana wokunyaradza, kana ɀicishandurwa), muRevi, munhu weKupro parudzi rwake,
waiʋa nomunda; akauteŋgesa, akaʋuya nemari, akaiisa pamberi paʋaapostora.
Ɀino mumŋe murume, wainzi Ananiasi, wakateŋgesa fuma yake, anaSafira mukadzi wake,
akaɀikamurira ɀimŋe pamuteŋgo, mukadzi wake aciɀiziʋa ʋo, akaʋuya nomumŋe mugoʋe, ndokuuisa pamberi paʋaapostora.
Asi Petro akati: Ananiasi, Satani wazadzireiko mŋoyo wako, kuti ureʋe nhema kuMŋeya Mutȿene, nokuɀikamurira ɀimŋe pamuteŋgo womunda?
Iwo uciri’po, wakaŋga usi wako here? Wateŋgeswa, wakaŋga usinesimba naɀo here? Waita seiko, ɀawafuŋga cinhu ici mumŋoyo mako? Hauna‐kureʋa nhema kuʋanhu, asi kunaMŋari.
Ananiasi, wakati acinzwa mashoko iwayo, akawira pasi, akaɓuɗisa mŋeya
Majaya akasimuka, akamuputira, ndokumutakurira kunze, ndokumuʋiga.
Ŋguʋa dzineŋge senhatu dzakati dzapfuʋura, mukadzi wake akapinda, asiŋgaziʋi ɀaitwa.
Petro akapindura kwaari,
Petro
Ipapo akawira pasi pakarepo patsoka dzake, akaɓuɗisa mŋeya
Kutya kukuru kukawira kereke yose naʋose ʋakaɀinzwa.
Ɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa ɀizhinji ɀikaitwa pakati paʋanhu namaʋoko aʋaapostora; ʋose ʋaiʋa nomŋoyo mumŋe paɓiraʋira raSoromoni.
Asi pakati paʋamŋe kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakatsuŋga kuɀiisa kwaʋari; asi ʋanhu ʋaiʋakudza.
Ʋatendi ʋazhinji kwaɀo, ʋarume naʋakadzi, ʋairamba ʋaciwedzerwa kunaShe.
Nokuɗaro ʋakatakurira ʋarwere munzira dzomumusha, ʋakaʋaradzika pamibeda napanhoʋo, kuti kana Petro acisweɗera’po, kunyaŋge nomumvuri wake ɓedzi udzikatire mumŋe waʋo.
Naʋazhinji ʋamaguta akapoteredza Jerusarema ʋakaʋuŋgana, ʋaciʋuya naʋarwere, naʋaitambudzika nemŋeya yetȿina, ʋakaporeswa.
Ɀino muprista mukuru akasimuka, naʋose ʋaiʋa naye (ʋaiʋa ʋedzidziso yaʋaSaduse), ʋanegoɗo kwaɀo;
ʋakaɓata ʋaapostora ʋakaʋaisa mutoroŋgo
Asi mutumŋa waShe wakazarura mikoʋa yetoroŋgo ʋusiku, akaʋaɓuɗisa, akati:
Endai, mumire mutembere mucitaura kuʋanhu mashoko ose oƲupenyu ubgu.
Ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakapinda mutembere maŋgwanani, ʋakadzidzisa. Ɀino muprista mukuru naʋaiʋa naye, ʋakaȿika, ʋakakokera makurukota neʋuŋgano yose yaʋakuru ʋaʋana ʋaIsraeri; ʋakatumira
Asi ʋaranda ʋakati ʋaciȿika’po, ʋakawana ʋasi’mo mutoroŋgo; ʋakadzoka, ʋaka
Toroŋgo takaiwana yakazarirwa ɀakasimba kwaɀo, naʋarindi ʋakarindira pamikoʋa; asi takati ticizarura, tikasawana munhu mukati.
Ɀino mukuru wetembere, naʋaprista ʋakuru, ʋakati ʋacinzwa mashoko iwayo, ʋakakaŋganiswa pamsoro paɀo,
Ipapo mumŋe munhu akaȿika, akaʋaʋudza,
Ɀino mukuru naʋatariri ʋakaenda, ʋakaʋuya naʋo, ʋasiŋgaiti nesimba, nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋacitya ʋanhu, kuti ʋaŋgatakwa namabge.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika naʋo, ʋakaʋaisa kumakurukota. Muprista mukuru akaʋabvunza,
aciti: Takakurairai ɀikuru kuti murege kudzidzisa nezita iri, ɀino tarirai, mazadza Jerusarema nokudzidzisa kwenyu, muciɗa kuti ropa romunhu uyu riʋuye pamsoro peɗu.
Ɀino Petro naʋaapostora ʋakapindura, ʋakati: Tinofanira kuterera Mŋari kupfuʋura ʋanhu.
Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu wakamutsa Jesu, iye wamakaʋuraya mucimuturika pamuti.
Mŋari wakamusimudza iye noruʋoko rwake rworudyi,
Isu tiri ɀapupu ɀamashoko iwayo; noMŋeya Mutȿene ʋo, waʋakapiwa naMŋari iʋo ʋanomuterera.
Ɀino iʋo ʋakati ʋaciɀinzwa, ʋakafa neshuŋgu, ʋakaɗa kuʋaʋuraya.
Ipapo mumŋe muFarise, wainzi Gamarieri, mudzidzisi womurairo, waikudzwa naʋanhu ʋose, akasimuka pamakurukota, akaraira kuti ʋanhu ʋaɓuɗiswe ciŋguʋa ciɗuku;
akati kwaʋari: Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, cenjerai ɀamunoɗa kuitira ʋanhu aʋa.
Nokuti kare kwakambomuka Tudasi, aciti, ndiri munhu
Shure
Ɀino ndinoti kwamuri: Musaɓata ʋanhu aʋa, muʋarege, nokuti kana kufuŋga uku neɓasa iri ɀiri ɀaʋanhu, ɀicaparadzwa.
Asi kana ɀiri ɀaMŋari, hamuŋgagoni kuɀiparadza; kuti ɀimŋe muŋgaɗai mucirwa naMŋari ʋo.
Ʋakamunzwa; ipapo ʋakati ʋaɗana ʋaapostora, ʋakaʋaroʋa, ʋakaʋaraira kuti ʋarege kutaura nezita raJesu; ʋakaʋaregedza.
Ipapo ʋakaɓuɗa pamakurukota, ʋacifara, ɀaʋakanzi ʋakafanirwa iʋo kuɀidzwa nokuɗa kwezita
Haʋana‐kurega kudzidzisa, nokuparidza mazuʋa ose ɀaKristu Jesu, mutembere kana kudzimba
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo, ʋadzidzi ʋaciwanda, ʋaJuda, ʋaitaura ciGiriki, ʋakanyunyutira ʋaHeberu, nokuti cirikadzi dzaʋo dzaiɗarikwa pakugoʋerwa kwomusi mumŋe nomumŋe.
Ɀino ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋakaɗana ʋadzidzi ʋazhinji, ʋakati: Hakuzakafanira kuti isu tirege shoko raMŋari, tishumire pamatafura.
Ɀino hama
Asi isu ticatsuŋgirira pakunyeŋgetera napaɓasa reshoko.
Shoko iri rikafadza ʋazhinji ʋose, ʋakasanaŋgura Stefano, murume wakaŋga azere nokutenda noMŋeya Mutȿene, naFiripo, naProkoro, naNikanori, naTimoni, naParmenasi, naNikorasi, muproserite weAntiokia.
Ʋakaʋaisa pamberi paʋaapostora; ʋakanyeŋgetera, ʋakaisa maʋoko pamsoro paʋo.
Shoko raMŋari rikakura, ʋadzidzi ʋakawanda ɀikuru paJerusarema; naʋaprista ʋazhinji ʋakagamucira kutenda.
Ɀino Stefano, azere nenyasha nesimba, akaita ɀinoshamisa neɀiratidzo ɀikuru pakati paʋanhu.
Ipapo ʋamŋe ʋaʋo, ʋaiʋa ʋesinagoge rainzi raʋasunuŋguki, naʋaKureni, naʋaAreksandria, naʋeKirikia, naʋeAsia, ʋakasimuka ʋakaita nharo naStefano.
Asi ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kukunda kucenjera kwake, noMŋeya waaitaura naye.
Ipapo ʋakamutsa ʋarume, ʋaiti: Takamunzwa acitaura mashoko anomhura Mosesi naMŋari.
Ʋakakurudzira ʋanhu, naʋakuru, naʋanyori; ʋakamuwira, ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamuisa kumakurukota,
ʋakaisa’po ɀapupu ɀenhema, ɀaiti: Munhu uyu haaregi kutaura mashoko anomhura imba iyi tȿene nomurairo.
Nokuti takamunzwa aciti: Uyu Jesu weNazareta ucaparadza nɀimbo iyi nokushandura tsika dzatakapiwa naMosesi.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere pamakurukota, ʋakamutarisisa, ʋakaʋona ciso cake
Muprista mukuru akati: Ɀinhu iɀi ndiɀo nhai?
Iye akati: Ʋarume, hama, namadziɓaɓa, inzwai: Mŋari wokubginya wakaɀiratidza kunaɓaɓa ʋeɗu Abrahama, ʋaciri Mesopotamia, ʋasati ʋagara Harani,
akati kwaʋari: Ibva munyika yako, nokuhama dzako, uende kunyika yandinozokuratidza.
Ipapo akaɓuɗa munyika yaʋaKardia, akagara Harani. Ɀino ɓaɓa ʋake ʋakati ʋafa,
Asi haana‐kumupa nhaka imomo, kunyaŋge paaŋgatsika norutsoka rwake, asi wakamupikira kuti ucamupa iyo, iʋe yake neyaʋana ʋake ʋaizomuteʋera, asati atoŋgoʋa nomŋana.
Mŋari akataura, aciti, ʋana ʋake ʋacaʋa ʋatorwa kunyika yaʋamŋe; ʋacaʋaita ʋaranda, nokuʋaʋonesa nhamo makore anamazana manna.
Rudzi rwaʋacaʋa ʋaranda ʋarwo, ndicarutoŋgesa, ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Mŋari; shure kwaiɀoɀo ʋacaɓuɗa, ʋacandishumira panɀimbo iyi.
Akamupa suŋgano yedziŋgiso. Ɀino
Mateteguru ɀaakaŋga acigoɗora Josefa, ʋakamuteŋgesa, akaiswa Egipita; Mŋari akaʋa naye.
Akamurwira panhamo dzake dzose, akamuɓatsira kuti aɗikanwe naFarao, mambo weEgipita, aʋe nokucenjera pamberi pake; iye akamuita mutariri weEgipita noweimba yake yose.
Ɀino nzara ikaȿika paEgipita yose neKanani, nenhamo huru; madziɓaɓa eɗu akashaiwa ɀokudya.
Ɀino Jakobo, wakati anzwa kuti Egipita kuneɀiyo, pakutaŋga akatuma madziɓaɓa eɗu.
Pa
Ɀino Josefa aka
Jakobo akaɓurukira Egipita; akazofa, iye namadziɓaɓa eɗu;
ʋakaiswa Shekemi, ʋakaʋigwa pabgiro bgakaŋga bgateŋgwa naAbrahama nomuteŋgo wesirveri kuʋanakomana ʋaEmori paShekemi.
Ɀino ŋguʋa yecipikirwa cakaŋga capikirwa Abrahama naMŋari, yakati icisweɗera, ʋanhu ʋakawanda, ʋakaita ʋazhinji muEgipita;
kuȿikira mumŋe mambo akamuka muEgipita, wakaŋga asina‐kuziʋa Josefa.
Iye akaɓata rudzi rweɗu namano, akatambudza madziɓaɓa eɗu, akaʋaraira kuti ʋarashe ʋacece ʋaʋo, kuti ʋarege kuraramiswa.
Neŋguʋa iyo Mosesi akaɓerekwa, wakaŋga akaiȿo‐naka kwaɀo; akarerwa mŋedzi mitatu mumba maɓaɓa ʋake;
ɀino wakati arashwa, mukunda waFarao akamunoŋga, akamurera kuti aʋe mŋanakomana wake.
Mosesi akadzidziswa ʋucenjeri bgose bgaʋaEgipita; akaʋa nesimba pamashoko napamaɓasa ake.
Ɀino wakati aȿika makore anamakumi manna, mŋoyo wake ukaɗa kushanyira hama dzake, ʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Akaʋona mumŋe aciitirwa ɀisakarurama, ndokumurwira, akaʋuraya muEgipita, acitsiʋa wakaŋga acitambudzwa.
Akati, ɀimŋe hama dzake dzicanzwisisa kuti Mŋari wakaŋga aciɗa kuʋaponesa noruʋoko rwake; asi haʋana‐kunzwisisa.
Fume maŋgwana akaʋaʋona ʋacikakaʋara, akaidza kuʋayananisa, aciti: Ʋarume, muri hama, munoitirana ɀisakarurama neiko?
Ɀino iye wakaŋga aciitira wokwake ɀisakarurama akamusundira kure, aciti: Ndianiko wakakuita muɓati nomutoŋgi weɗu?
Unoɗa kundiʋuraya, seɀawakaʋuraya muEgipita zuro kanhi?
Mosesi akatiza
Ɀino makore makumi manna akati apera, mutumŋa akaʋonekwa naye murenje regomo reSinai, mumuraɀo womŋoto mugwenzi.
Mosesi akati aciɀiʋona, akashamiswa neɀaakaʋona; ɀino akati acisweɗera kuzocerekedza, inzwi raShe rikanzwika,
Ndini Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa ako, Mŋari waAbrahama, nowaIsaka, nowaJakobo. Ipapo Mosesi akaɗeɗera, akatya kucerekedza.
Ɀino Ishe akati kwaari: Bvisa shaŋgu patsoka dzako, nokuti apo paunomira ivu dɀene.
Ndakaʋona haŋgu kwaɀo kutambudzika kwaʋanhu ʋaŋgu ʋari muEgipita, ndakanzwa kugomera kwaʋo, ndaɓuruka kuzoʋarwira; ɀino ʋuya ndikutume Egipita.
Uyu Mosesi waʋakaramba, ʋaciti: Ndiani wakakuita muɓati nomutoŋgi? ndiye wakatumŋa naMŋari nomutumŋa wakaʋonekwa naye mugwenzi, kuti aʋe muɓati nomudzikinuri.
Iye akaʋaɓuɗisa, akaita ɀinoshamisa neɀiratidzo munyika yeEgipita, napaGuŋgwa Dɀuku, nomurenje, makore anamakumi manna.
Ndiyeye Mosesi wakati kuʋana ʋaIsraeri: Mŋari ucakumutsirai Muprofita pakati pehama dzenyu, wakafanana neni.
Ndiyeye wakaŋga ari kuʋuŋgano murenje, anomutumŋa wakataura naye mugomo reSinai, anamadziɓaɓa eɗu ʋo, wakagamucira mashoko mapenyu kuzotipa.
Ndiye, waʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɗi kumuterera iʋo madziɓaɓa eɗu; ʋakamuramba, ʋakadzokera Egipita nemŋoyo yaʋo.
Ʋakati kunaAroni: Tiitire ʋamŋari, ʋaŋgatituŋgamirira; nokuti kana ari Mosesi uyu, wakatiɓuɗisa munyika yeEgipita, hatiziʋi ɀakaitika naye.
Ɀino ʋakaita mhuru namazuʋa iwayo, ʋakaʋuya neciɓayiro kucifananidzo caʋo, ʋakafarira maɓasa amaʋoko aʋo.
Ɀino Mŋari akaʋafuratira, akaʋarega kuti ʋashumire hondo yokuɗeŋga, seɀaɀakanyorwa mubuku yaʋaprofita,
Ko makandiʋigira ɀipfuwo ɀakaɓayiwa neɀiɓayiro
Makore makumi manna murenje,
imi, imba yaʋaIsraeri here?
Makatakura tabernakeri yaMoroki,
Nenyeredzi yamŋari wenyu Remfani,
Ɀifananidzo ɀamakaita kuti muɀinamate;
Ndicakutamisai mberi kweBabironi.
Madziɓaɓa eɗu aiʋa netabernakeri yoʋucapupu murenje,
Yakati yagamucirwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu, ʋakapinda nayo naJoshua munyika yaʋahedeni, ʋakadziŋgwa naMŋari pamberi pamadziɓaɓa eɗu, kuȿikira pamazuʋa aDavidi;
iye akanzwirwa nyasha pamberi paMŋari, akakumbira kuʋakira Mŋari waJakobo pokugara.
Soromoni akamuʋakira imba.
Asi Wokumsoro‐soro haagari
Ƌeŋga ndico cigaro caŋgu coʋushe,
Nenyika citsiko cetsoka dzaŋgu;
Mucandiʋakira imba yakaɗiniko?
Ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Ishe;
Kana nɀimbo yandiŋgazorora pairi ndeipi?
Ko ruʋoko rwaŋgu haruna‐kuita iɀoɀi ɀose here?
Imi ʋemitsipa mikukutu, musinakudziŋgiswa pamŋoyo nenzeʋe, munogara mucidziʋisa Mŋeya Mutȿene; samadziɓaɓa enyu, nemi ʋo.
Ndoupiko pakati paʋaprofita, usina‐kutambudzwa namadziɓaɓa enyu? Ʋakaʋuraya aʋo ʋaiparidza kuʋuya kwoWakarurama, iye wamakapandukira nokumuʋuraya ɀino.
Iyemi, makapiwa murairo seɀawakarairwa naʋatumŋa, mukasauceŋgeta.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakafa neshuŋgu kwaɀo, ʋakamugeɗa‐geɗera meno.
Asi iye azere noMŋeya Mutȿene, akatarisisa kuɗeŋga, akaʋona kubginya kwaMŋari, naJesu amire kuruʋoko rworudyi rwaMŋari,
akati: Tarirai, ndinoʋona ɗeŋga rakazarurwa, noMŋanakomana womunhu amire kuruʋoko rworudyi rwaMŋari.
Ɀino ʋakaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, ʋakadziʋira nzeʋe dzaʋo, ʋakamhanyira kwaari ʋose pamŋe cete;
ʋakamuɓuɗisira kunze kweguta, ndokumutaka namabge; ɀapupu ɀikaisa ŋguʋo dzaɀo patsoka dzejaya, rainzi Sauro.
Ʋakataka Stefano, aciɗana aciti: Ishe Jesu, gamucirai mŋeya waŋgu.
Akafugama, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru,
Sauro wakaŋga acitenda kuʋurawa kwake.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo kereke yapaJerusarema yakatambudzwa ɀikuru, ʋakaparadzirwa ʋose kunyika yeJudea neSamaria, ʋakasara ʋaapostora ɓedzi.
Ʋarume ʋakarurama ʋakaʋiga Stefano, ʋakamucema ɀikuru.
Ɀino Sauro akaparadza kereke, acipinda mudzimba dzose, acikakata ʋarume naʋakadzi, nokuʋaisa mutoroŋgo.
Ɀino aʋo ʋakaparadzirwa, ʋakapotenyika, ʋaciparidza shoko.
NaFiripo wakaɓurukira kuguta reSamaria, akaʋaparidzira Kristu.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaterera nomŋoyo mumŋe ɀairebga naFiripo, ʋacinzwa nokuʋona ɀiratidzo ɀaakaŋga aciita.
Nokuti mŋeya yetȿina yakaɓuɗa kuʋazhinji ʋaiʋa nayo, iciɗanidzira nenzwi guru; naʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋakafa mitezo naʋaikamhina ʋakaporeswa.
Mufaro mukuru ukaʋa’po paguta iro.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe murume, wainzi Simoni, waiʋa ŋaŋga kare paguta iro, waishamisa ʋanhu ʋeSamaria, aciɀiita munhu mukuru.
Ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋakamuterera, ʋaciti: Uyu munhu isimba guru raMŋari.
Ʋakamuterera, nokuti wakaŋga aʋashamisa noʋuŋaŋga bgake ŋguʋa huru.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋatenda Firipo, waiparidza mashoko oʋushe bgaMŋari nezita raJesu Kristu, ʋakabapatidzwa ʋarume naʋakadzi.
Naiye Simoni akatenda ʋo, ndokubapatidzwa ʋo, akagara naFiripo; akashamiswa, aciʋona ɀiratidzo namaɓasa esimba makuru, akaŋga aciitwa.
Ɀino ʋaapostora ʋaiʋa paJerusarema, ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti ʋaSamaria ʋakaŋga ʋagamucira shoko raMŋari, ʋakatuma Petro naJohane kwaʋari.
Iʋo ʋakaɓurukira’ko, ʋakaʋanyeŋgeterera kuti ʋapiwe Mŋeya Mutȿene;
nokuti wakaŋga asina‐kuɓurukira pamsoro pomumŋe waʋo; ʋakaŋga ʋaŋgobapatidzwa muzita raShe Jesu ɓedzi.
Ipapo ʋakaisa maʋoko aʋo pamsoro paʋo, ʋakapiwa Mŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino Simoni wakati aciʋona kuti Mŋeya Mutȿene wapiwa nokuiswa kwamaʋoko aʋaapostora, akaʋuya kwaʋari nemari,
aciti: Ndipei neni ʋo simba iri, kuti wandineŋge ndiciisa maʋoko pamsoro pake, apiwe Mŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino Petro akati kwaari: Sirveri yako ŋgaiparadzwe newe, nokuti wakafuŋga kuteŋga cipo caMŋari nemari.
Haunomugoʋe, kana cikamu, pacinhu ici, nokuti mŋoyo wako haunakururama pamberi paMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo tendeʋuka pakuipa kwako, ukumbire kunaShe, kuti ɀimŋe ukaŋganwirwe muraŋgariro womŋoyo wako.
Nokuti ndinoʋona kuti wapinda munduru inoʋaʋa, napakusuŋgwa kusakarurama.
Simoni akapindura, akati: Mundikumbirire ɀikuru imi kunaShe, kuti ndirege kuwirwa necimŋe caiɀoɀo ɀamareʋa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapupura kwaɀo nokutaura shoko raShe, ʋakadzokera ɀe Jerusarema, ʋaciparidza Evaŋgeri mumisha mizhinji yaʋaSamaria.
Ɀino mutumŋa waShe akataura naFiripo, akati: Simuka, uende Zasi kunzira inobva Jerusarema iciɓurukira Gaza; iyo
Akasimuka, akaenda; ɀino kwakaŋga kunomurume weEtiopia, muranda mukuru kwaɀo waKandase, mambokadzi weEtiopia, waiceŋgeta fuma yake yose, wakaŋga aʋuya Jerusarema kuzonamata;
wakaŋga acidzoka, agere muŋgoro yake aciraʋa muprofita Isaya.
Mŋeya akati kunaFiripo: Sweɗera, urambire paŋgoro iyo.
Firipo akamhanyira’ko, akamunzwa aciraʋa muprofita Isaya, akati: Unonzwisisa ɀaunoraʋa here?
Iye akati: Ndiŋgagona seiko, kana mumŋe asiŋgandiɗudziri? Akakumbira ɀikuru kunaFiripo kuti akwire, agare naye.
Ɀino paakaŋga aciraʋa paRugwaro paiti:
Wakaiswa pakuɓayiwa segwai;
Segwaiana rinyerere pamberi pomuʋeʋuri waro,
Saiɀoɀo haana‐kushamisa muromo wake;
Pakuɀidzwa kwake kutoŋgwa kwake kwakabviswa;
Ndianiko ucarondedzera rudzi rwake?
Nokuti ʋupenyu bgake bgunobviswa panyika.
Muranda akapindura Firipo, akati: Ndinokumbira kwauri,
Ipapo Firipo akashamisa muromo wake, akataŋga parugwaro urwu, akamuparidzira Jesu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacifamba munzira, ʋakaȿika panemvura; muranda akati: Heyi mvura; cinyiko ciŋgadziʋisa ndirege kubapatidzwa?
[Firipo akati: Kana ucitenda nomŋoyo wako wose, ɀiŋgaitwa. Akapindura, akati: Ndinotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Mŋanakomana waMŋari.]
Akaraira kuti ŋgoro imire; ʋakaɓurukira ʋose mumvura, iye Firipo nomuranda; akamubapatidza.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗa mumvura, Mŋeya waShe ukabvisa Firipo; muranda akasazomuʋona ɀe; nokuti wakafamba rwendo rwake, acifara.
Asi Firipo wakawanika paAzoto, akapota nyika aciparidza Evaŋgeri pamaguta ose, kuȿikira paKesaria.
Asi Sauro aciŋgoraŋgarira kutyisa nokuʋuraya ʋadzidzi ʋaShe, wakaenda kumuprista mukuru,
akakumbira kwaari magwaro
Ɀino wakati ari parwendo, osweɗera pedyo neDamasko, kamŋe‐kamŋe ciedza cakabva kuɗeŋga cikamupenyera pamatiʋi ose,
akawira pasi, akanzwa inzwi riciti kwaari: Sauro, Sauro, unonditambudzireiko?
Iye akati: Ndimi aniko, Ishe?
Iye aciɗeɗera nokutya, akati: Ishe, munoɗa kuti ndiiteiko? Ishe
Ʋarume ʋaiʋa parwendo naye, ʋakamira ʋanyerere, ʋacinzwa inzwi, asi ʋasiŋgaʋoni munhu.
Ɀino Sauro akasimuka pasi; asi aciȿinudza meso ake, haana‐kuʋona cinhu; ʋakamuɓata ruʋoko, ʋakaenda naye Damasko.
Akaita mazuʋa matatu, asiŋgaʋoni, asiŋgadyi, asiŋganwi cinhu.
Ɀino paDamasko pakaŋga panomumŋe mudzidzi, wainzi Ananiasi; Ishe akati kwaari neɀaakaratidzwa: Ananiasi! Iye akati: Ndiri pano Ishe!
Ishe
naiye wakaʋona murume, unonzi Ananiasi acipinda, aciisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake, kuti aʋone ɀe.
Ɀino Ananiasi akapindura, akati: Ishe, ndakanzwa naʋanhu ʋazhinji ɀomunhu uyu, kuti wakaitira ʋatȿene ʋenyu paJerusarema ɀakaipa ɀizhinji;
napano unesimba
Asi Ishe akati kwaari: Enda, nokuti iye mudziyo wakasanaŋgurwa neni, kuti aende nezita raŋgu kuʋahedeni, namadzimambo, nokuʋana ʋaIsraeri;
nokuti ndicamuratidza ɀose, ɀaacafanira kutamburira nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu.

Ipapo Ananiasi akaenda akapinda mumba, akaisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake, akati: Sauro, hama, Ishe Jesu, wakaɀiratidza kwauri munzira yawakaʋuya nayo, wakandituma, kuti uʋone ɀe, uzadzwe noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Pakarepo pameso ake pakabva
akadya ɀokudya, ndokusimbiswa.
Akagara naʋadzidzi paDamasko mamŋe mazuʋa.
Pakarepo akaparidza Jesu mumasinagoge, kuti ndiye Mŋanakomana waMŋari.
Ʋose ʋakaɀinzwa ʋakashamiswa, ʋakati: Ko uyu haazi iye waiparadza ʋaiɗana kuzita iri paJerusarema here, akaʋuyira iɀoɀo pano, kuti aende naʋo ʋakasuŋgwa kuʋaprista ʋakuru?
Asi Sauro wakaramba acisimbiswa, akakunda ʋaJuda ʋakaŋga ʋagere Damasko, aciratidza kuti
Ɀino mazuʋa mazhinji akati apera, ʋaJuda ʋakaraŋgana kuti ʋamuʋuraye.
Asi kuraŋgana kwaʋo kwakazikanwa naSauro. Ʋakarinda ʋo masuʋo masikati noʋusiku, kuti ʋamuʋuraye.
Ɀino ʋadzidzi ʋake ʋakamutora ʋusiku, ʋakamuɓurasa naparuȿiŋgo, ʋamuisa mudeŋgu.
Ɀino wakati aȿika Jerusarema, akaidza kufambidzana naʋadzidzi; asi iʋo ʋakamutya ʋose, ʋasiŋgatendi kuti waʋa mudzidzi.
Ɀino Barnabasi akamutora, akaenda
Akagara naʋo paJerusarema, acifambidzana naʋo,
akaparidza nezita raShe asiŋgatyi. Akataura nokuita nharo naʋaJuda ʋaitaura ciGiriki; asi iʋo ʋakaidza kumuʋuraya.
Ɀino hama dzakati dziciɀiziʋa, dzikamuɓurusira Kesaria, ndokumutumira Tarso.
Ɀino kereke yakaŋga inorugare paJudea rose, neGarirea, neSamaria, ikasimbiswa; ikawedzerwa, icifamba icitya Ishe, icinyaradzwa noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino Petro wakati acipote‐nyika kwose, akaɓurukira ʋo kuʋatȿene ʋakaŋga ʋagere Rida.
Akawana’po mumŋe munhu, wainzi Eneasi, wakaŋga aʋete panhoʋo makore masere, mitezo yake yakafa.
Petro akati kwaari: Eneasi, Jesu Kristu unokuporesa; simuka, uɀiwarire nhoʋo dzako! Akasimuka pakarepo.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere Rida neSaroni ʋakamuʋona, ʋakatendeʋukira kunaShe.
Ɀino paJopa pakaŋga panomukadzi
Ɀino namazuʋa iwayo iye akarwara, ndokufa. Ʋakati ʋamushambidza, ʋakamuisa muimba yokumsoro.
Ɀino Rida ɀawakaŋga uri pedyo neJopa, ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋanzwa kuti Petro uri’po, ʋakatumira kwaari ʋanhu ʋaʋiri, kuti ʋandokumbira ɀikuru kwaari,
Ipapo Petro akasimuka, akaenda naʋo. Wakati aȿika, ʋakamuisa kuimba yokumsoro; cirikadzi dzose dzikamira naye dzicicema, ʋakamuratidza ɀokufuka neŋguʋo, dzaʋakaŋga ʋaitirwa naDorkasi, aciri naʋo.
Ɀino Petro akaʋaɓuɗisira panze ʋose, akafugama, akanyeŋgetera, ndokutendeʋukira kumutumbu, akati: Tabita, muka! Akaȿinura meso ake; ɀino wakati aciʋona Petro, akagara.
Akamuɓata noruʋoko rwake, akamusimudza; akaɗana ʋatȿene necirikadzi, akamuisa pamberi paʋo ari mupenyu.
Ɀikazikanwa naʋose paJopa; ʋazhinji ʋakatenda kunaShe.
Ipapo akagara mazuʋa mazhinji paJopa, kunomumŋe Simoni, musuki wamatebge.
Ɀino kwakaŋga kunomumŋe murume paKesaria, wainzi Kornerio, mukuru wezana wehondo yainzi yeItaria,
munhu, wainamata nowaitya Mŋari, iye naʋeimba yake yose, waipa ʋanhu ɀipo ɀizhinji, nokunyeŋgetera kunaMŋari misi yose.
Ɀino neŋguʋa ineŋge yepfumbamŋe yezuʋa akaʋona kwaɀo, neɀaakaratidzwa, mutumŋa waMŋari acipinda kwaari, aciti kwaari: Kornerio!
Iye akamutarisisa, akatya, akati: Cinyiko Ishe? Akati kwaari: minyeŋgetero yako neɀipo ɀako ɀakwira pamberi paMŋari, ɀaraŋgarirwa.
Ɀino tuma ʋarume Jopa kundoɗana Simoni, unotumidzwa Petro.
Unogara nomumŋe
Ɀino mutumŋa, wakataura naye, wakati abva, akaɗana ʋaranda ʋake ʋaʋiri nomurwi wakarurama pakati paʋaisimushumira,
akaʋaʋudza ɀose, ndokuʋatumira Jopa.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana ʋaciri parwendo, ʋaʋa pedyo neguta, Petro akakwira pamsoro peimba kundonyeŋgetera neŋguʋa ineŋge yecitanhatu.
Akaziya kwaɀo, akaɗa kudya; ɀino ʋakati ʋacagadzira, akaɓatwa mŋeya;
akaʋona ɗeŋga razarurwa, necimŋe cinhu ciciɓuruka somuceka mukuru unoɓurusirwa pasi
Maiʋa nemhuka dzose dzinamakumbo manna neɀinokambaira ɀenyika, neshiri dzeɗeŋga.
Inzwi rikaʋuya kwaari,
Asi Petro akati: Kwete, Ishe, nokuti handina‐kutoŋgodya cinhu cisakanaka, cinetȿina.
Ipapo inzwi
Iɀoɀo ɀikaitwa katatu, cinhu cikakwidzwa pakarepo kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino Petro wakati acakaŋganiswa mumŋoyo make, kuti ciratidzo caakaŋga aʋona caireʋei, tarira ʋarume ʋakaŋga ʋatumŋa naKornerio, ʋamira pasuʋo ʋacibvunza imba yaSimoni;
ʋakaɗana, ʋakabvunza kana Simoni, unonzi Petro, agere’po.
Ɀino Petro, acafuŋga ciratidzo, Mŋeya akati kwaari: Tarira, ʋarume ʋatatu ʋanokutȿaka.
Ɀino simuka, uɓuruke, uende naʋo, usiŋganyunyuti, nokuti ndini ndaʋatuma.
Ipapo Petro akaɓurukira kuʋarume aʋo, akati kwaʋari: Tarirai, ndini wamunotȿaka; shoko ramaʋuyira ndereiko?

Ʋakati: Kornerio, mukuru wezana, murume wakarurama, unotya Mŋari, unorumbidzwa norudzi rwose rwaʋaJuda, wakarairwa naMŋari nomutumŋa mutȿene, kuti akuɗanei kuzoʋuya mumba make, kuti anzwe mashoko kwamuri.
Ipapo akaʋaɗana mumba, akati ʋagare’po.
Fume maŋgwana akasimuka, akaenda naʋo; nedzimŋe hama dzapaJopa dzikamuperekedza.
Fume ɀe maŋgwana akapinda Kesaria.
Ɀino Petro wakati acipinda, Kornerio akamuciŋgamidza, akawira pasi petsoka dzake, akamunamata.
Asi Petro wakamusimudza, akati: Simuka, neni ndiri munhu ʋo.
Ɀino wakati acataura naye, akapinda, akawana ʋazhinji ʋakaʋuŋgana,
akati kwaʋari: Imi munoziʋa kuti haɀina‐kufanira kuti muJuda afambidzane nomunhu worumŋe rudzi, kana kuʋuya kwaari. Asi Mŋari wakandiratidza, kuti ndirege kuti munhu haana‐kunaka, kana kuti unetȿina;
naiɀoɀo ndaʋuya, ndisiŋgarambi, ɀandaɗanwa; ɀino ndinobvunza kuti mandiɗanireiko.
Kornerio akati: Aʋa mazuʋa manna kuȿikira ŋguʋa ino, ini ndakaŋga ndicinyeŋgetera mumba maŋgu neŋguʋa yepfumbamŋe; ipapo ndikaʋona murume amire pamberi paŋgu, aneŋguʋo dzinopenya,
akati: Kornerio, kunyeŋgetera kwako kwanzwika, neɀipo ɀako ɀaraŋgarirwa naMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo citumira ʋanhu Jopa, uɗane Simoni, unonzi Petro; unogara mumba maSimoni musuki wamatebge, paguŋgwa.
Naiɀoɀo ndakakurumidza kutuma kwamuri; ɀino maita ɀakanaka, ɀamaʋuya. Ɀino isu tose tiri pano pamberi paMŋari, kuti tinzwe ɀose ɀamarairwa naShe.
Ipapo Petro akashamisa muromo wake, akati:
Ɀirokwaɀo, ndinoʋona kuti Mŋari haazi mutsauri waʋanhu;
asi parudzi rupi norupi, munhu, unomutya, aciita ɀakarurama, unogamucirwa naye.
shoko, raakatuma kuʋana ʋaIsraeri, aciparidza mashoko akanaka orugare naJesu Kristu (ndiye Ishe waʋose).
Imi munoziʋa shoko iro rakaparidzwa paJudea rose, rakataŋga paGarirea, shure kwokubapatidza kwakaparidzwa naJohane;
raJesu weNazareta, kuti Mŋari wakamuzodza noMŋeya Mutȿene nesimba; iye waipote‐nyika, aciita ɀakanaka, aciporesa ʋose ʋakamanikidzwa naDiaborosi; nokuti Mŋari waiʋa naye.
Nesu tiri ɀapupu ɀaɀose, ɀaakaita munyika yaʋaJuda nomuJerusarema; ndiye waʋakaʋuraya, ʋacimuturika pamuti.
Ndiye wakamutswa naMŋari nezuʋa retatu, akamupa
naʋanhu ʋose, asi neɀapupu ɀakagara ɀatsaurwa naMŋari, iyesu, taidya nokunwa naye, amuka kuʋakafa.
Akatiraira kuti tiparidzire ʋanhu, nokupupura kwaɀo kuti ndiye wakagadzwa naMŋari,
