Ʋaprofita ʋose ʋanomupupurira kuti nezita rake mumŋe nomumŋe unotenda kwaari ucapiwa kaŋganwiro yeɀiʋi.
Petro wakati acataura mashoko awa, Mŋeya Mutȿene akaɓuruka pamsoro paʋose, ʋakanzwa shoko.
Ɀino ʋatendi ʋokudziŋgisa, ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuya naPetro, ʋakashamiswa, nokuti cipo coMŋeya Mutȿene cakaŋga caɗururwa pamsoro paʋahedeni ʋo;
nokuti ʋakaʋanzwa ʋacitaura ne
Kunomunhu here uŋgadziʋisa mvura, kuti aʋa, ʋakapiwa Mŋeya Mutȿene sesu, ʋarege kubapatidzwa?
Ɀino akaraira kuti ʋabapatidzwe muzita raJesu Kristu. Ipapo ʋakakumbira kwaari, kuti ambogara mamŋe mazuʋa.
Ɀino ʋaapostora nehama, ʋaiʋa paJudea, ʋakanzwa kuti ʋahedeni ʋakagamucira ʋo shoko raMŋari.
Ɀino Petro wakati akwira Jerusarema,
ʋaciti: Wakapinda iwe kuʋarume ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, ukadya naʋo.
Ɀino Petro akataŋga kuʋarondedzera
Ndakaŋga ndiri muguta reJopa, ndicinyeŋgetera; ndikaɓatwa mŋeya, ndikaʋona ciratidzo; cimŋe cinhu cakaɓuruka, cineŋge muceka mukuru unoɓuruswa kuɗeŋga
ndakati ndacitarisisa, nokucerekedza, ndikaʋona mhuka dzenyika dzinamakumbo manna neɀikara, neɀinokambaira, neshiri dzeɗeŋga,
ndikanzwa ʋo inzwi riciti kwandiri: Simuka Petro, ɓaya, udye.
Asi ini ndikati: Kwete Ishe, nokuti mumuromo maŋgu hamuna‐kumbopinda cinhu cisakanaka, cinetȿina.
Asi inzwi rakapindura rwecipiri, ricibva kuɗeŋga,
Iɀoɀi ɀakaitwa katatu, ɀose ɀikakwidzwa ɀe kuɗeŋga.
Ipapo, tarira, pakarepo ʋarume ʋatatu ʋamira pamberi peimba, matakaŋga tiri, ʋakaŋga ʋatumirwa kwandiri, ʋacibva Kesaria.
Ipapo Mŋeya wakandiʋudza, kuti ndiende naʋo, ndisiŋganyunyuti. Nehama idzi nhanhatu ʋo dzakandiperekedza, tikapinda mumba momurume
Iye akatiʋudza ʋo kuti wakaʋona mutumŋa amire mumba make, aciti: Tumira Jopa, uɗane Simoni, unonzi Petro;
iye ucakuʋudza mashoko aucaponeswa nawo, iwe nemhuri yako yose.
Ɀino ndakati ndicataŋga kutaura, Mŋeya Mutȿene akaɓuruka pamsoro paʋo, sapamsoro peɗu ʋo pakutaŋga.
Ini ndikaraŋgarira shoko raShe, rokuti: Johane wakabapatidza nemvura, asi imi mucabapatidzwa muMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino kana Mŋari akaʋapa cipo ico caakatipa isu, pakutenda kweɗu kunaShe Jesu Kristu, ini ndaigoʋa ani, waigona kudziʋisa Mŋari?
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakanyarara, ʋakakudza Mŋari, ʋaciti: Ɀirokwaɀo, Mŋari wakapa ʋahedeni ʋo kutendeʋuka kwoʋupenyu.
Ɀino aʋo ʋakaparadzirwa nokutambudzika kwakamuka pamsoro paStefano, ʋakaenda kuȿikira paFenikia, neKupro, neAntiokia, ʋasiŋgatauri shoko kumunhu, asi kunaʋaJuda ɓedzi
Ɀino pakati paʋo paiʋa naʋamŋe ʋarume ʋeKupro neKurini; iʋo ʋakati ʋaȿika Antiokia, ʋakataura kuʋaGiriki ʋo, ʋaciparidza Ishe Jesu.
Ruʋoko rwaShe rukaʋa naʋo, ʋazhinji ʋakatenda, ʋakatendeʋukira kunaShe.
Mashoko aʋo akanzwika nekereke paJerusarema, ʋakatuma Barnabasi kuti aende Antiokia.
Iye wakati aȿika, akaʋona nyasha dzaMŋari, akafara; akaraira ʋose kuti ʋanamatire Ishe nomŋoyo wakasimba;
nokuti waiʋa murume wakanaka, azere noMŋeya Mutȿene nokutenda; ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋakawedzerwa kunaShe.
Iye akaenda Tarso acindotȿaka Sauro.
Ɀino wakati amuwana, akaʋuya naye Antiokia. Ipapo ʋakaʋuŋgana nekereke gore rose, ʋakadzidzisa ʋanhu ʋazhinji‐zhinji; paAntiokia ʋadzidzi ʋakataŋga kunzi Ʋakristu.
Namazuʋa iwayo ʋaprofita ʋakaɓuruka ʋacibva Jerusarema, ʋakaenda Antiokia.
Mumŋe waʋo wainzi Agabo, akasimuka, ndoku
Ipapo ʋadzidzi ʋakatenderana, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe paaigona napo atume ɀiŋgaɓatsira hama dzigere Judea.
Ʋakaita kuɗaro, ʋakaɀitumira naBarnabasi naSauro kuʋakuru.
Ɀino neŋguʋa ineŋge iyeyo mambo Herode akatambanudza maʋoko ake kuti atambudze ʋamŋe ʋekereke;
akaʋuraya Jakobo, mukuru waJohane, nomunondo.
Ɀino wakati aciʋona kuti ɀafadza ʋaJuda, ndokupfuʋura akaɓata Petro ʋo. Aiʋa mazuʋa eɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso.
Ɀino wakati amuɓata, akamusuŋga mutoroŋgo, akamuisa kumapoka manna,
Naiɀoɀo Petro akaceŋgetwa mutoroŋgo; asi wakaŋga acinyeŋgetererwa ɀikuru nekereke kunaMŋari.
Ɀino Herode wakati oɗa kumuɓuɗisa, ʋusiku ibgobgo Petro wakaŋga aʋete pakati paʋarwi ʋaʋiri, akasuŋgwa namaketani maʋiri; naʋarindi ʋakaŋga ʋacirinda toroŋgo pamberi pomukoʋa.
Ipapo, tarira, mutumŋa waShe akamira’po, ciedza cikapenya mumba; akaroʋa Petro parutiʋi, ndokumumutsa, aciti: Muka, ukurumidze. Ipapo maketani akawa pamaʋoko ake.
Mutumŋa akati kwaari: Ɀisuŋge ciʋuno, usuŋgire shaŋgu dzako. Akaita saiɀoɀo. Akati kwaari: Fuka ŋguʋo yako, unditeʋere.
Akaɓuɗa, akamuteʋera, asiŋgaziʋi kuti ɀirokwaɀo ɀinoitwa nomutumŋa; asi wakati ndinoʋona ciratidzo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapfuʋura murindi wokutaŋga nowecipiri, ʋakaȿika pasuʋo ramatare, paʋaipinda napo paguta; rikaŋgoʋazarukira roga; ʋakaɓuɗa, ʋakapfuʋura neimŋe nzira, mutumŋa ndokubva kwaari pakarepo.
Petro wakati apeŋgenuka, akati: Ɀino ndinoziʋa ɀirokwaɀo kuti Ishe wakatuma mutumŋa wake, akandirwira paruʋoko rwaHerode napaɀose ɀakaŋga ɀicifuŋgwa naʋanhu ʋaʋaJuda.
Ɀino wakati araŋgarira
Ɀino wakati agogodza pagonhi resuʋo, musikana wainzi Rode akaʋuya kuzoterera.
Iye akati acinzwa inzwi raPetro, akasazarura suʋo nomufaro, asi wakamhanyira mukati akaʋaʋudza kuti Petro umire pasuʋo.
Iʋo ʋakati kwaari: Unopeŋga. Asi iye wakasimbisa aciti ndiɀoɀo. Iʋo ʋakati: Mutumŋa wake.
Asi Petro wakaramba acigogodza; ʋakazozarura, ʋakamuʋona, ʋakashamiswa.
Ɀino iye akaʋaninira noruʋoko kuti ʋanyarare, akaʋarondedzera mutoʋo waakaɓuɗiswa nawo naShe patoroŋgo. Akati: Ʋudzai Jakobo nehama ɀinhu iɀoɀi; ndokubva akaenda kumŋe.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, ɓope guru rikaʋa’po pakati paʋarwi, ʋaciti Petro wanzinwi.
Herode wakati amutȿaka, akamushaiwa, ndokubvunzisisa ʋarindi, akaraira kuti ʋandoʋurawa. Ɀino akaɓuruka Judea, akaenda Kesaria, akandogara’
Ɀino akatsamŋira ɀikuru ʋanhu ʋeTire neSidoni; iʋo ndokuʋuya kwaari ʋose pamŋe cete, ʋakaita ʋushamŋari naBrasto, mutariri weimba yamambo, ʋakakumbira rugare, nokuti nyika yaʋo yaipiwa ɀokudya ne
Ipapo nezuʋa rakaŋga ratarwa, Herode akafuka ŋguʋo dzoʋumambo, akagara pacigaro cake coʋushe, akataura kwaʋari.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋakaɗanidzira
Pakarepo mutumŋa waShe ukamuroʋa, nokuti wakaŋga asinakukudza Mŋari; akadyiwa nehonye, akafa.
Asi shoko raMŋari rakakura, rikawanda.
Ɀino Barnabasi naSauro, ʋakati ʋapedzisa ɓasa
Ɀino pakereke yapaAntiokia paiʋa naʋaprofita naʋadzidzisi, ʋaiti: Barnabasi naSimeoni, wainzi Nigeri, naRukio weKurini, naManaeni wakaŋga arerwa pamŋe cete naHerode muɓati, naSauro.
Ʋakati ʋacishumira Ishe, nokuɀinyima ɀokudya, Mŋeya Mutȿene akati: Nditsaurirei Barnabasi naSauro kuɓate‐ɓasa randakaʋaɗanira.
Ipapo ʋakaɀinyima ɀokudya, ʋakanyeŋgetera, ʋakaisa maʋoko pamsoro paʋo, ndokuʋaendisa.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakati ʋatumŋa noMŋeya Mutȿene, ʋakaɓurukira Serukia; ʋakabva’po, ʋakaenda Kupro necikepe.
Ʋaciȿika paSarami, ʋakaparidza shoko raMŋari mumasinagoge aʋaJuda. Ʋakaŋga ʋanaJohane ʋo, waiʋa muɓatsiri waʋo.
Ʋakati ʋagura ciwi cose kuȿikira paPafosi, ʋakawana imŋe ŋaŋga, waiʋa muprofita wenhema, muJuda, zita rake rainzi Bari‐Jesu.
Waigara pamuɓati wenyika,
Asi ŋaŋga
Asi Sauro (ndiye Pauro ʋo), azere noMŋeya Mutȿene, akamutarisisa, akati:
Iwe, uzere nokunyeŋgera kwose namano akaipa ose, mŋanakomana waDiaborosi, muʋeŋgi wokururama kwose, hauregi here kutsausa nzira dzakarurama dzaShe?
Ɀino, tarira, ruʋoko rwaShe ruri pamsoro pako; ucaʋa ɓofu, ucaita ŋguʋa usiŋgaʋoni zuʋa. Pakarepo mhute nerima ɀikamuwira; akapota‐pota, acitȿaka ʋaŋgamusesedza noruʋoko.
Ɀino muɓati wakati aciʋona ɀaitika, akatenda, akashamiswa nedzidziso yaShe.
Ɀino Pauro naʋaiʋa naye, ʋakabva Pafosi, ndokuȿika Perga muPamfiria; Johane akabva kwaʋari, ndokudzokera Jerusarema.
Asi iʋo ʋakabva Perga, ʋakaȿika Antiokia paPisidia; ʋakapinda musinagoge nezuʋa resaɓata, ndokugara pasi.
Ɀino murairo naʋaprofita ɀakati ɀarabga, ʋaɓati ʋesinagoge ʋakatuma
Ipapo Pauro akasimuka, akaʋaninira noruʋoko, akati:
Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, nemi munotya Mŋari, tererai:
Mŋari waʋanhu aʋa ʋaIsraeri wakasanaŋgura madziɓaɓa eɗu, akakudza ʋanhu
akaʋa nomŋoyo murefu nemitoʋo yaʋo murenje makore aneŋge makumi manna,
akaparadza marudzi manomŋe munyika yeKanani, akaʋagoʋera nyika yaʋo nemijenya, iʋe nhaka yaʋo makore aneŋge mazana manna namakumi mashanu.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo aka
Pashure ʋakakumbira mambo; Mŋari akaʋapa Sauro, mŋanakomana waKisi murume worudzi rwaBenjamini, makore makumi manna.
Akamubvisa akamutsa Davidi, kuti aʋe mambo waʋo, waakapupura, aciti: Ndawana Davidi, mŋanakomana waJese murume womŋoyo waŋgu, ucaita kuɗa kwaŋgu kwose
Parudzi rwaiyeyo, Mŋari akamutsira ʋaIsraeri Muponesi Jesu, seɀaakaŋga a
iye asati aȿika, Johane akamboparidzira ʋanhu ʋaIsraeri rubapatidzo rwokutendeʋuka.
Ɀino Johane wakati opedzisa ɓasa rake, akati: Munoti, ndini aniko? Handizi
Ʋarume, hama, ʋana ʋorudzi rwaAbrahama, naʋari pakati penyu ʋanotya Mŋari, shoko roruponeso urwu rakatitumirwa isu.
Nokuti ʋaigara Jerusarema naʋaɓati ʋaʋo, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgamuziʋi iye, kana manzwi aʋaprofita, anorabga saɓata rimŋe nerimŋe, ʋaka
Kunyaŋge ʋasina‐kuwana mhoȿa yorufu
Ɀino ʋakati ʋapedza ɀose ɀakanyorwa pamsoro pake, ʋakamuturura pamuti, ʋakamuʋiga mubgiro.
Asi Mŋari wakamumutsa kuʋakafa;
akaʋonekwa mazuʋa mazhinji naʋakaŋga ʋakwira naye Jerusarema, ʋacibva Garirea, aʋo ʋari ɀapupu ɀake ɀino kuʋanhu.
Isu tinokuparidzirai cipikirwa cakaitirwa madziɓaɓa
Kuti Mŋari wakaciita kuʋana ʋeɗu, acimutsa Jesu; seɀakanyorwa ʋo paPisarema recipiri,
Ʋuye
Nokuti unoreʋa panerimŋe
Nokuti Davidi wakati aita kuɗa kwaMŋari parudzi rwake, akaʋata
Asi uyu, wakamutswa naMŋari haanakuʋora.
Naiɀoɀo ʋarume, hama, muziʋe imi, kuti kaŋganwiro yeɀiʋi noyuyu inokuparidzirwai imi.
Noyuyu, mumŋe nomumŋe unotenda, unoruramiswa paɀose, ɀamakaŋga musiŋgagoni kururamiswa paɀiri nomurairo waMosesi.
Naiɀoɀo cenjerai, kuti murege kuwirwa neɀakarebga naʋaprofita,
Tarirai, imi ʋaɀidzi, mushamiswe,
muparare;
Nokuti ndinoɓate‐ɓasa pamazuʋa enyu,
Ƃasa ramucaramba kutoŋgotenda,
kana muciɀiʋudzwa nomunhu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciɓuɗa
Ɀino
Nesaɓata rakateʋera guta rineŋge rose rakaʋuŋgana kuzonzwa shoko raMŋari.
Ɀino ʋaJuda ʋakati ʋaciʋona ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakazara negoɗo, ʋakaramba ɀakarebga naPauro, ʋacimhura

Ipapo Pauro naBarnabasi ʋakataura ʋasiŋgatyi, ʋakati: Ɀakaŋga ɀakafanira kuti shoko raMŋari ritaŋge kutaurirwa imi, asi ɀamariramba, muciti, hamufanirwi noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, tarirai, ɀino toenda kuʋahedeni.
Nokuti Ishe wakatiraira saiɀoɀo,
Ndakakuisa kuti uʋe ciedza caʋahedeni,
Kuti uʋe ruponeso kuȿikira kumugumo wenyika.
Ɀino ʋahedeni ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakafara, ʋakakudza shoko raShe; naʋose ʋakaŋga ʋatarirwa ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi ʋakatenda.
Shoko raShe rikaparidzirwa kunyika yose.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋakakurudzira ʋakadzi ʋainamata
Asi iʋo ʋakazuza guruʋa patsoka dzaʋo, ʋakaenda Ikonio.
Ʋadzidzi ʋakaramba ʋacizadzwa nomufaro noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino paIkonio ʋakapinda kamŋe ʋose musinagoge raʋaJuda, ʋakataura nokuɗaro kuti ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋaʋaJuda naʋaGiriki ʋakatenda.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋasina‐kuterera, ʋakamutsa mŋoyo yaʋahedeni, kuti ʋaʋeŋge hama.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakagara’po ŋguʋa refu, ʋacitaura munaShe ʋasiŋgatyi; iye akapupurira shoko renyasha dzake, akaʋapa
Asi ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋeguta ʋakapesana, ʋamŋe ʋakaʋa kuʋaJuda, ʋamŋe kuʋaapostora.
Ɀino ʋahedeni, naʋaJuda, naʋaɓati ʋaʋo ʋakati ʋaciʋaʋarira kuʋaitira ɀakaipa nokuʋataka namabge;
iʋo ʋakaɀiziʋa, ʋakatizira Ristra neDerbe,
ʋakaparidzira Evaŋgeri ikoko.
Ɀino paRistra paigara mumŋe murume wakaŋga asinesimba patsoka dzake, cirema kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋake, asina‐kutoŋgofamba.
Iye wakanzwa Pauro acitaura; ɀino iye wakati acimutarisisa, akaʋona kuti unokutenda kuti uŋgaporeswa,
akati nenzwi guru: Mira kwaɀo netsoka dzako. Iye akavazuka, akafamba.
Ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakati ʋaʋona ɀaitwa naPauro, ʋakaɗanidzira norurimi rwaʋaRikaonia, ʋaciti: Ʋamŋari ʋaɓurukira kwatiri, ʋaita saʋanhu.
Barnabasi ʋakamutumidza Jupiteri, naPauro Merkurio, nokuti ndiye waiʋa mutauri mukuru.
Ipapo muprista waJupiteri waiʋa
Ɀino ʋaapostora, Barnabasi naPauro, ʋakati ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakabvarura ŋguʋo dzaʋo, ʋakamhanyira pakati paʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakaɗanidzira,

ʋaciti: Ʋarume, munoitireiko iɀoɀi? Nesu tiri ʋanhu semi ʋo; tinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka, kuti mubve panaiɀoɀo ɀisinamaturo, mutendeʋukire kunaMŋari mupenyu wakaita ɗeŋga napasi, neguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo.
Iye, paŋguʋa dzakapfuʋura wakatendera ʋahedeni ʋose kufamba nenzira dzaʋo.
Asi haana‐kurega kuɀipupurira, aciita ɀakanaka, acikupai mvura yokuɗeŋga, neŋguʋa dzeɀiyo ɀizhinji, acizadza mŋoyo yenyu neɀokudya nomufaro.
Nokutaura kwaʋo saiɀoɀo, ʋakatambura kwaɀo kudziʋisa ʋanhu kuti ʋarege kuʋaɓayira.
Ipapo ʋaJuda ʋakabva Antiokia neIkonio, ʋakaȿika, ʋakamutsa mŋoyo yaʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakataka Pauro namabge, ʋakamukweʋera kunze kweguta ʋaciti wafa.
Asi ʋadzidzi ʋakati ʋamukomba, iye akasimuka, akapinda muguta. Fume maŋgwana akaenda Derbe naBarnabasi.
Ʋakati ʋaparidza Evaŋgeri paguta iro, ʋakaita ʋadzidzi ʋazhinji, ndokudzokera Ristra, neIkonio, neAntiokia,
ʋacisimbisa mŋeya yaʋadzidzi, ʋaciʋaraira kuti ʋatsuŋgirire pakutenda,
Ʋakaʋasanaŋgurira ʋakuru pakereke imŋe neimŋe, ʋakanyeŋgetera, ʋaciɀinyima ɀokudya, ʋakaʋaisa kunaShe, waʋaitenda.
Ʋakagura nePisidia, ndokuȿika Pamfiria.
Ʋakati ʋaparidza shoko paPerga, ʋakaɓurukira Ataria.
Ʋakabva’po, ʋakaenda Antiokia necikepe, apo paʋakaŋga ʋaiswa panyasha dzaMŋari
Ʋakati ʋaȿika, ʋakaʋuŋganidza kereke, ʋakarondedzera ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀaitwa naMŋari naʋo, ʋuye kuti wakaŋga azarurira ʋahedeni mukoʋa wokutenda.
Ʋakagara ŋguʋa huru naʋadzidzi.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakaɓuruka Judea, ʋakadzidzisa hama,
Asi Pauro naBarnabasi ʋakapesana kwaɀo naʋo, nokuita nharo naʋo, ʋakazotenderana kuti Pauro naBarnabasi naʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakwire Jerusarema kuʋaapostora naʋakuru pamsoro peshoko iri.
Naiɀoɀo ʋakaperekedzwa nekereke, ʋakagura neFenike neSamaria, ʋakataura ɀokutendeʋuka kwaʋahedeni; ʋakafadza ɀikuru hama dzose.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika Jerusarema, ʋakagamucirwa nekereke, naʋaapostora, naʋakuru; ʋakarondedzera ɀose ɀakaitwa naMŋari naʋo.
Asi
Ipapo ʋaapostora naʋakuru ʋakaʋuŋgana kuti ʋaraŋgane pamsoro peshoko iri.
Ɀino, nharo huru dzakati dzaʋa’po, Petro akasimuka akati kwaʋari:
Ʋarume, hama, munoziʋa kuti kubva pamazuʋa akare Mŋari wakandisanaŋgura pakati penyu, kuti ʋahedeni ʋanzwe shoko reEvaŋgeri nomuromo waŋgu, ʋatende.
Ɀino Mŋari, muziʋi womŋoyo, wakaʋapupurira, akaʋapa Mŋeya Mutȿene sesu;
haanakutsaura pakati peɗu naʋo, ɀaakanatsa mŋoyo yaʋo nokutenda.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino, munoidzireiko Mŋari, muciisa pamitsipa yaʋadzidzi joko, rakaŋga risiŋgagoni kutakurwa namadziɓaɓa eɗu kunyaŋge nesu?
Asi tinotenda kuti isu ticaponeswa nenyasha dzaShe Jesu nomutoʋo mumŋe naʋo.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋose ʋakaramba ʋanyerere, ʋakaterera ʋanaBarnabasi naPauro ʋacirondedzera ɀiratidzo neɀishamiso, ɀakaitwa naMŋari naʋo pakati paʋahedeni.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋanyarara, Jakobo akapindura, akati:
Ʋarume, hama, nditererei.
Simeoni wakarondedzera mutaŋgire waMŋari kumutsa ʋahedeni, kuti atore kwaʋari ʋanhu ʋezita rake.
Namashoko aʋaprofita anobvumira iɀoɀi; seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Shure kwaiɀoɀi ndicadzoka,
Ndiʋake tabernakeri yaDavidi, yakawa;
Ndicaʋaka ɀe matoŋgo ayo,
Ndiciimutsa;
Kuti ʋakasara kuʋanhu ʋatȿake Ishe,
Naʋahedeni ʋose ʋakaɗanwa nezita raŋgu,
Ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe, unoziʋisa iɀoɀi ɀose kubva pakutaŋga kwenyika.
Naiɀoɀi ini ndinoti, ŋgatirege kugumbusa aʋo pakati paʋahedeni ʋakatendeʋukira kunaMŋari;
asi tiʋanyorere kuti ʋarege ɀakashatiswa neɀifananidzo, noʋupombge, neɀakadzipxa, neropa.
Nokuti Mosesi kubva pamarudzi ekare, waiʋa naʋanomuparidza paguta rimŋe nerimŋe, acirabga mumasinagoge saɓata rimŋe nerimŋe.
Ipapo ʋaapostora, naʋakuru, nekereke yose, ʋakati ɀakanaka kuti ʋasanaŋgure ʋarume pakati paʋo, ʋaʋatumire Antiokia pamŋe cete naPauro naBarnabasi,
Ʋakanyora
Ɀatakanzwa, kuti ʋamŋe ʋakabva kwatiri, ʋatisina‐kuraira, ʋakakukaŋganisai namashoko, ʋacidziyanisa mŋeya yenyu,
takati nomŋoyo mumŋe ɀakanaka kuti tisanaŋgure ʋarume, tiʋatumire kwamuri, pamŋe cete naBarnabasi naPauro, ʋaɗikanwa ʋeɗu;
ʋanhu ʋakaɀidza ʋupenyu bgaʋo nokuɗa kwezita raShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu.
Ɀino tatuma Judasi naSirasi, iʋo ʋanozokuʋudzai ʋamene iɀoɀi nomuromo.
Nokuti Mŋeya Mutȿene nesu takati ɀakanaka, kuti tirege kukutakudzai mutoro mukuru kuneɀinhu iɀi ɀakafanira,
: Regai ɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo, neropa, neɀakadzipxa, noʋupombge; kana mukaɀidzora paɀiri, mucaita ɀakanaka. Sarai ɀakanaka.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaendiswa, ʋakaɓurukira Antiokia; ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakaʋapa ŋwadi.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋairaʋa, ʋakafara ɀikuru pamsoro pokuʋaraidzwa.
Judasi naSirasi, ʋaiʋa ʋaprofita ʋamene, ʋakaʋaraidza hama namashoko mazhinji, nokuʋasimbisa.
Ʋakati ʋagara’
[Asi Sirasi wakati ɀakanaka kusara’po.]
Pauro naBarnabasi ʋakagara Antiokia, ʋacidzidzisa nokuparidza shoko raShe, naʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋo.
Ɀino mamŋe mazuʋa akati apfuʋura, Pauro akati kunaBarnabasi: Ŋgatidzoke ɀe tindoshanyira hama muguta rimŋe nerimŋe matakaparidza shoko raShe,
Ɀino Barnabasi wakaŋga aciɗa kutora Johane ʋo, wainzi Marko;
asi Pauro wakati haɀina‐kunaka kumutora iye, wakamboʋasiya paPamfiria, akasaenda naʋo kuɓasa.
Ipapo kutsamŋirana kukaʋa’po, nokuɗaro ʋakaparadzana, Barnabasi akatora Marko, akaenda Kupro necikepe;
asi Pauro wakasanaŋgura Sirasi; akaenda, akaiswa nehama panyasha dzaShe;
akagura neSiria neKirikia, acisimbisa kereke.
Akaȿika ʋo paDerbe neRistra. Ɀino ipapo paiʋa nomumŋe mudzidzi, wainzi Timotio, mŋanakomana womukadzi mutendi, waiʋa muJuda; asi ɓaɓa ʋake ʋaiʋa muGiriki.
Iye waipupurirwa
Pauro akaɗa kuti aende naye, akamutora, akamudziŋgisa nokuɗa kwaʋaJuda ʋaiʋa kunɀimbo idzo; nokuti ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋaciziʋa kuti ɓaɓa ʋake muGiriki.
Ʋakafamba namaguta, ʋakaʋapa ɀireʋo ɀakatemŋa naʋaapostora naʋakuru ʋapaJerusarema, kuti ʋaɀiceŋgete.
Naiɀoɀo kereke dzakasimbiswa pakutenda, dzikawanda pakuʋereŋgwa
Ʋakagura nenyika yeFrigia neyeGaratia, ʋambodziʋiswa noMŋeya Mutȿene kuparidza shoko paAsia.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaȿika pakatarisana neMisia, ʋakaidza kuenda Bitinia, asi Mŋeya waJesu haana‐kuʋatendera.
Ʋakati ʋapfuʋura Misia, ʋakaɓurukira Troa.
Ciratidzo cikaʋonekwa naPauro ʋusiku; murume weMakedonia wakaŋga amire, akakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, aciti: Yambukira Makedonia, utiɓatsire.
Ɀino wakati aʋona ciratidzo, pakarepo tikatȿaka kuenda Makedonia, ticiti, Mŋari watiɗana kuti tindoʋaparidzira Evaŋgeri.
Naiɀoɀo takabva Troa necikepe, tikaruramira Samotrake; fume maŋgwana tikaȿika Neapori;
tikabva’po, tikaenda Firipi, guta guru renyika yeMakedonia, raiʋa koroni
Nezuʋa resaɓata tikaɓuɗa kunze kwesuʋo kurwizi, pataiti ʋaneŋge ʋanonyeŋgetera’po; tikagara pasi, tikaparidzira ʋakadzi ʋakaŋga ʋaʋuŋgana’po.
Ɀino mumŋe mukadzi, wainzi Ridia, muteŋgesi we
Wakati abapatidzwa, iye naʋeimba yake, akakumbira ɀikuru, aciti: Kana muciti ndakatenda kunaShe, pindai mumba maŋgu mugare. Akatitendisa.
Ɀino takati ticipinda panɀimbo yokunyeŋgetera, tikasoŋgana nomumŋe musikana waiʋa nomŋeya wokuʋuka, waiwanira ʋatenzi ʋake mari zhinji nokuʋuka kwake.
Iye akateʋera Pauro nesu, akaɗanidzira, aciti: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋaranda ʋaMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro, ʋanokuparidzirai nzira yokuponeswa nayo.
Akaita iɀoɀo mazuʋa mazhinji. Ɀino Pauro akafa neshuŋgu, akatendeʋuka, akati kumŋeya: Ndinokuraira muzita raJesu Kristu kuti uɓuɗe kwaari. Ukaɓuɗa neŋguʋa iyeyo.
Ɀino ʋatenzi ʋake ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti tariro yokufumiswa kwaʋo yaenda, ʋakaɓata Pauro naSirasi, ʋakaʋakakatira kuɗare pamberi paʋaɓati,
ʋakaenda naʋo kuʋatoŋgi, ʋakati: Ʋanhu aʋa ʋaJuda, ʋanopesanisa guta reɗu,
ʋaciparidza tsika. dzatisinakutenderwa kugamucira, kana kuita, isu ʋaRoma.
Ipapo ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakaʋamukira ʋose, ʋatoŋgi ʋakaʋabvarurira ŋguʋo dzaʋo, ʋakaraira kuti ʋarobge neshamhu.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋaroʋa ɀikuru, ʋakaʋaisa mutoroŋgo, ʋakaraira murindi wetoroŋgo kuti aʋaceŋgete kwaɀo.
Iye akati arairwa kuɗaro, akaʋaisa mutoroŋgo yomukati, akasuŋga makumbo aʋo mumatanda.
Ɀino paneŋge pakati poʋusiku, Pauro naSirasi ʋakaŋga ʋacinyeŋgetera nokuimbira Mŋari nziyo; ʋakaŋga ʋakasuŋgwa ʋakaʋaterera.
Pakarepo kuɗeŋgenyeka kwenyika kukuru kukaʋa’po, naiɀoɀo nheyo dzeimba dzikazunuŋguswa; pakarepo mikoʋa yose yeimba ikazarurwa, nemisuŋgo yaʋose ikasunuŋguka.
Ipapo murindi wetoroŋgo akapepuka, ndokuʋona mikoʋa yetoroŋgo yakazaruka, akavomora munondo wake, akaɗa kuɀiʋuraya, aciti ʋasuŋgwa ʋatiza.
Ipapo Pauro akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, akati: Usaɀikuʋadza, nokuti tiri muno tose.
Ɀino wakati akumbira mŋenje, akamhanyira’mo, ndokuwira pasi pamberi paPauro naSirasi, acibvunda;
akaʋaɓuɗisira kunze, akati: Ʋatenzi, ndinofanira kuitei kuti ndiponeswe?
Ʋakati: Tenda kunaShe Jesu, ugoponeswa, iwe nemhuri yako.
Ʋakaparidza shoko raMŋari kwaari naʋose ʋaiʋa mumba make.
Akaʋatora neŋguʋa iyeyo yoʋusiku, akakupa maʋaŋga aʋo, ndokubapatidzwa pakarepo, iye naʋose ʋake.
Akaenda naʋo mumba make, ndokuisa ɀokudya pamberi paʋo, akafara ɀikuru, iye nemhuri yake yose, acitenda kunaMŋari.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, ʋatoŋgi ʋakatuma mapurisa, ʋaciti: Sunuŋgurai ʋanhu ʋaya.
Murindi wetoroŋgo akaʋudza Pauro mashoko iwayo,
Asi Pauro wakati kwaʋari: Ʋakatiroʋa pacena, isu ʋanhu ʋaRoma tisina‐kutoŋgwa, ʋakatiisa mutoroŋgo; ɀino ʋoɗokutiɓuɗisa cinyararire here? Haiwa, kwete! Ŋgaʋaʋuye ʋamene ʋatiɓuɗise.
Mapurisa akaʋudza ʋatoŋgi mashoko iwayo; ʋakatya ʋacinzwa kuti ʋaRoma;
ʋakaȿika, ʋakakumbira ɀikuru kwaʋari; ʋakaʋaɓuɗisa, ndokukumbira kuti ʋabve muguta
Ipapo ʋakaɓuɗa mutoroŋgo, ʋakapinda
Ɀino ʋakati ʋagura neAmfipori neAporonia, ʋakaȿika paTesaronika paiʋa nesinagoge raʋaJuda.
Ɀino Pauro, seɀaaisiita, akapinda kwaʋari; akataurirana naʋo ɀapaMagwaro masaɓata matatu,
aciʋazarurira nokuʋaziʋisa, kuti Kristu waifanira kutambudzika nokumuka kuʋakafa, ʋuye kuti Jesu uyu, wandinokuparidzirai, ndiye Kristu.
Ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakatendiswa, ʋakateʋera Pauro naSirasi, naʋazhinji ʋaʋaGiriki, ʋainamata Mŋari, naʋakadzi ʋaikudzwa ʋazhinji.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋaiʋa negoɗo, ʋakatora ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakaipa, dzaiʋa simbe, ʋakaʋuŋganidza ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakakaŋganisa guta; ʋakawira imba yaJasoni, ʋaciɗa kuʋaɓuɗisira kuʋanhu.
Ʋakati ʋaciʋashaiwa, ʋakakakatira Jasoni nedzimŋe hama pamberi paʋaɓati ʋeguta, ʋakaɗana,
Jasoni akaʋagamucira; aʋa ʋose ʋanoita ɀinopesana neɀireʋo ɀaKesari, ʋaciti, mumŋe mambo uri’ko,
Ʋakapesanisa ʋanhu naʋaɓati ʋeguta, ʋacinzwa iɀoɀo.
Ɀino, ʋakati ʋatora ruɓatso kunaJasoni naʋamŋe, ʋakaʋarega.
Pakarepo hama dzikatuma Pauro naSirasi Berea ʋusiku. Iʋo ʋakati ʋaciȿika’po, ʋakapinda musinagoge raʋaJuda.
Aʋa ʋakaŋga ʋakanaka kukunda ʋeTesaronika, ʋakagamucira shoko nomŋoyo wose, ʋacinɀera Magwaro zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, kana ɀinhu iɀoɀo ɀiri iɀo.
Naiɀoɀo ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋakatenda, naʋakadzi ʋaikudzwa ʋaʋaGiriki, naʋarume ʋazhinji.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋeTesaronika, ʋakati ʋacinzwa kuti shoko raMŋari roparidzwa naPauro paBerea, ʋakaȿika ʋo ipapo, ʋakamutsa nokupesanisa ʋazhinji.
Ipapo hama dzakatuma Pauro pakarepo kuȿikira kuguŋgwa, asi Sirasi naTimotio ʋakasara’po.
Ɀino aʋo ʋakaperekedza Pauro, ʋakamuȿitsa Atene; ʋakati ʋarairwa kuʋudza Sirasi naTimotio, kuti ʋakurumidze kuʋuya kwaari, ʋakabva.
Ɀino Pauro, acakaʋagarira paAtene, akanzwa shuŋgu pamŋoyo, aciʋona kuti guta rizere neɀifananidzo.
Naiɀoɀo akataurirana musinagoge naʋaJuda, naʋainamata
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakacenjera ʋaʋaEpikuro naʋaStoiko, ʋakaita nharo naye; ʋamŋe ʋakati: Ko uyu mutauri weɀisinamaturo unoɗa kureʋeiko? Ʋamŋe ɀe
Ipapo ʋakamuɓata, ʋakamuisa paAreopago, ʋakati: Ŋgatinzwe ʋo kuti kudzidzisa uku kutȿa, kunotaurwa newe, ndokweiko?
Nokuti unoreʋa ɀimŋe ɀinoshamisa panzeʋe dzeɗu; naiɀoɀo tinoɗa kunzwa, kuti ɀinhu iɀi ndeɀeiko?
(Ɀino ʋaAtene ʋose, naʋatorwa ʋaigara’po, ʋaiŋgofarira cinhu cimŋe cete, kutaura kana kunzwa cinhu citȿa.)
Ɀino Pauro, amire pakati peAreopago, akati:
Imi ʋarume ʋeAtene, paɀinhu ɀose ndinoʋona kuti munonamata ɀikuru.
Nokuti ndakati ndicipfuʋura, ndicicerekedza ɀamunonamata, ndakawana ʋo artari yakanyorwa: KUNAMŊARI USIŊGAZIKANWI. Ɀino camunonamata musiŋgaciziʋi, ndico candinokuparidzirai.
Mŋari wakasika nyika neɀose ɀiri mairi, iye Tenzi weɗeŋga napasi, haagari mutembere dzakaitwa namaʋoko.
Haashumirwi namaʋoko aʋanhu, saaciŋge acishaiwa cinhu, ɀaari iye amene unopa ʋose ʋupenyu, nokufema, neɀose;
wakaita marudzi ose aʋanhu, acibva kunomumŋe cete, kuti agare pose panyika; ambotara ŋguʋa dzaʋakatemerwa, nemiganhu yokugara kwaʋo;
kuti ʋatȿake Mŋari, ɀimŋe ʋamutȿaŋgadzire, ʋamuwane, kunyaŋge asiri kure nomumŋe nomumŋe weɗu.
Nokuti maari tinoʋupenyu, tinofamba, tiri’po; seɀaʋakareʋa ʋamŋe ʋanyori ʋenziyo ʋokwenyu,
Ɀatiri rudzi rwaMŋari, hatifaniri kuti ʋuMŋari bgakafanana nendarama, kana sirveri, kana ibge, ɀakaʋezwa noʋumhizha kana kucenjera kwomunhu.
Naiɀoɀo Mŋari wakarega hake kuraŋgarira ŋguʋa dzokusaziʋa; asi ɀino unoraira ʋanhu ʋose kwose‐kwose kuti ʋatendeʋuke.
Nokuti wakatara zuʋa, raacatoŋga nyika naro nokururama, nomurume waakagadza; akasimbisa
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacinzwa ɀokumuka kwaʋakafa, ʋamŋe ʋakaseka, asi ʋamŋe ʋakati: Ticazokunzwa ɀe pamsoro paiɀoɀi.
Naiɀoɀo Pauro akaɓuɗa pakati paʋo.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakamunamatira, ʋakatenda; pakati paʋo kwaiʋa naDionisio, muAreopago, nomukadzi wainzi Damari, naʋamŋe pamŋe cete naʋo.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo,
akawana mumŋe muJuda, wainzi Akwira, worudzi rwaʋePonto, acaŋgobva Itaria, naPrisira mukadzi wake; (nokuti Kraudio wakaŋga araira kuti ʋaJuda ʋose ʋabve Roma); akaenda kwaʋari;
ɀino ɀaakaŋga aneɓasa rimŋe naʋo, akagara naʋo ʋaciɓata; nokuti ɓasa raʋo raiʋa rokuita matente.
Saɓata rimŋe nerimŋe akataurirana naʋo musinagoge, akaidza kugombedzera ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki.
Ɀino Sirasi naTimotio ʋakati ʋacizoɓuruka
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaci
Akabva’po, akapinda mumba momumŋe, wainzi Tito Justo, wainamata Mŋari, imba yake yaiʋa pedyo nesinagoge.
NaKrispo, mukuru wesinagoge, akatenda kunaShe naʋeimba yake yose; naʋazhinji ʋeKorinte ʋakanzwa, ʋakatenda, ʋakabapatidzwa.
Ɀino Ishe akati kunaPauro ʋusiku neciratidzo: Usatya hako, asi taura, usanyarara;
nokuti ini ndinewe; hapanomunhu uŋgakumukira akakuitira ɀakaipa, nokuti ndinaʋanhu ʋazhinji muguta rino.
Akagara’po gore rimŋe nemŋedzi mitanhatu, acidzidzisa shoko raMŋari pakati paʋo.
Ɀino Gario wakati aʋa muɓati weAkaya, ʋaJuda ʋakamukira Pauro nomŋoyo mumŋe, ʋakaʋuya naye pacigaro cokutoŋga,
ʋaciti: Uyu unogombedzera ʋanhu kuti ʋanamate Mŋari
Ɀino Pauro wakati oɗa kushamisa muromo wake, Gario akati kuʋaJuda: Ƌai yaiʋa mhoȿa yeɀisakarurama, kana kutadza kwakaipa, ndaifanira kuʋa nomŋoyo murefu kwamuri, imi ʋaJuda.
Asi kana dziri nharo pamsoro pamashoko namazita nomurairo wenyu, tambai henyu imi
Akaʋadziŋga pacigaro cokutoŋga.
Ɀino ʋose ʋakaɓata Sosteni, mukuru wesinagoge, ʋakamuroʋa pamberi pecigaro cokutoŋga; asi Gario haana‐kuʋa nehanya necinhu cimŋe caiɀoɀo.
Pauro wakati agara’po mazuʋa mazhinji, akawonekana nehama, akabva’po, akaenda Siria necikepe, anaPrisira naAkwira, aʋeʋura musoro
Ʋakaȿika Efeso, akaʋasiya’po; asi iye amene wakapinda musinagoge, akataurirana naʋaJuda.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacikumbira kuti agare
asi wakawonekana naʋo, aciti: Ndicadzokera ɀe kwamuri, kana Mŋari aciɗa, akabva paEfeso necikepe.
Wakati aȿika Kesaria, akakwira kundokwazisa kereke, akaɓurukira Antiokia.
Wakati agara’po ŋguʋa, akabva, akagura nenyika dzeGaratia neFrigia acidziteʋedzanisa, acisimbisa ʋadzidzi ʋose.
Ɀino mumŋe muJuda wainzi Aporo, worudzi rwapaAreksandria, murume wakaŋga akadzidza ɀikuru, wakaȿika Efeso; wakaŋga anesimba pamagwaro.
Uyu wakaŋga adzidziswa nzira yaShe, akashiŋgaira nomŋeya, acitaura nokunatso‐dzidzisa ɀaJesu, aciziʋa rubapatidzo rwaJohane ɓedzi.
Iye akataŋga kutaura musinagoge asiŋgatyi. Ɀino Prisira naAkwira ʋakati ʋamunzwa, ʋakamutora, ʋakanatsomuɗudzira nzira yaMŋari.
Ɀino wakati aciɗa kuyambukira Akaya, hama dzikamusimbisa, ʋakanyorera ʋadzidzi kuti ʋamugamucire. Ɀino wakati aȿika, akaɓatsira ɀikuru iʋo ʋakatenda nenyasha.
Nokuti wakakunda ʋaJuda nesimba pacena, aciratidza naMagwaro, kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu.
Ɀino Aporo aciri paKorinte, Pauro wakati agura namatiʋi enyika okumsoro, akaȿika Efeso, akawana ʋamŋe ʋadzidzi,
akati kwaʋari: Makagamucira Mŋeya Mutȿene pakutenda kwenyu here? Ʋakati kwaari: Kwete, hatina‐kutoŋgonzwa kuti Mŋeya Mutȿene uri’po.
Akati: Ko makabapatidzwa
Ɀino Pauro akati: Johane wakabapatidza norubapatidzo rwokutendeʋuka, aciʋudza ʋanhu kuti ʋatende kunaiye unozoʋuya shure kwake, iye Jesu.
Ʋakati ʋaɀinzwa iɀoɀo, ʋakabapatidzwa muzita raShe Jesu.
Ɀino Pauro wakati aisa maʋoko
Iʋaʋo ʋose ʋaiʋa ʋarume ʋaneŋge gumi naʋaʋiri.
Ɀino wakapinda musinagoge, akataura asiŋgatyi mŋedzi mitatu, acitaurirana
Asi ʋamŋe ʋakati ʋaciwomesa mŋoyo, ʋasiŋgatereri, ʋaciɀidza Nzira iyo pamberi paʋazhinji, akabva kwaʋari, akatsaura ʋadzidzi, akataurirana naʋo zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe mucikoro caTirano.
Iɀoɀo ɀikaitwa makore maʋiri; nokuɗaro ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋagere paAsia ʋakanzwa shoko raShe, ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki.
NaMŋari wakaita masimba anoshamisa namaʋoko aPauro,
nokuɗaro miceka neŋguʋo, ɀaibva pamuʋiri wake, ɀaiiswa kuʋarwere, hosha dzikabva kwaʋari, nemŋeya yakaipa ikaɓuɗa.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋaJuda, ʋaʋuki, ʋaipota‐pota, ʋakaidza kuɗana zita raShe Jesu pamsoro paʋaiʋa nemŋeya yakaipa, ʋaciti: Ndinokupikirai naJesu unoparidzwa naPauro.
Ʋaiʋa ʋanakomana ʋanomŋe ʋomumŋe muJuda, wainzi Skeva, muprista mukuru, ʋaiita iɀoɀo.
Mŋeya wakaipa ukapindura, ukati kwaʋari: Jesu ndinomuziʋa, naPauro ndinomuziʋa, asi imi ndimi ʋananiko?
Ipapo munhu waiʋa nomŋeya wakaipa akaʋamukira simba, akaʋakurira ʋose ʋari ʋaʋiri, akaʋakunda; nokuɗaro ʋakatiza mumba imomo, ʋasineŋguʋo, ʋakuʋadzwa.
Iɀoɀo ɀikazikanwa naʋose, ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki, ʋakaŋga ʋagere Efeso ʋakatya ʋose, zita raShe Jesu rikakudzwa.
Ɀino ʋazhinji ʋaʋakaŋga ʋatenda ʋakaʋuya, ʋakaɀireʋurura, nokurondedzera maɓasa aʋo.
Naʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋaiita ʋuŋaŋga, ʋakaʋuŋganidza buku dzaʋo, ʋakadzipisa pamberi paʋose; ʋakaʋereŋga muteŋgo wadzo, ʋakawana kuti waiʋa masirveri aneɀuru ɀinamakumi mashanu.
Naiɀoɀo shoko raShe rikakura nesimba, rikakunda.
Iɀoɀo ɀakati ɀapedziswa, Pauro akafuŋga mumŋoyo make kuenda Jerusarema, kana ambogura napaMakedonia neAkaya, aciti: Kana ndamboenda ikoko, ndinofanira kundoʋona Roma ʋo.
Ɀino akatumira Makedonia ʋaʋiri ʋaʋaimushumira, ʋanaTimotio naErasto, iye amene akagara Asia ŋguʋa ɗuku.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo ɓope guru rikaʋa’po pamsoro peNzira
Nokuti mumŋe, wainzi Demetrio, mupfuri wesirveri, waiita ɀitembere ɀaDiana ɀesirveri, waifumisa ɀikuru mhizha
Akaʋaʋuŋganidza iʋo pamŋe cete naʋamŋe ʋaɓati ʋeɀakaɗaro, akati: Ʋarume, munoziʋa kuti neɓasa iri tinowana fuma yeɗu.
Ɀino munoʋona, nokunzwa, kuti Pauro uyu wakatendisa nokutsausa ʋazhinji, pasati pari paEfeso ɓedzi, asi paneŋge paAsia yose, aciti, ɀakaitwa namaʋoko haʋazi ʋamŋari.
Ɀino njodzi ndiyo kuti habguzi ʋumhizha bgeɗu ɓedzi bguŋgaɀidzwa, asi kuti tembere yamŋarikadzi mukuru Diana icashoʋorwa, naiye amene, unonamatwa paAsia yose nenyika
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacinzwa
Guta rikakaŋganiswa kwaɀo; ʋakamhanyira nomŋoyo mumŋe panɀimbo paitambga, ʋaɓata Gayo naAristarko, ʋarume ʋeMakedonia, ʋaiperekedza Pauro.
Ɀino Pauro akaɗa kupinda kuʋanhu, ʋadzidzi ʋakasamutendera.
Naʋamŋe ʋakuru ʋeAsia, ʋaiʋa shamŋari dzake, ʋakatuma
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋakaɗanidzira ɀimŋe, ʋamŋe ɀimŋe
Ipapo ʋakaɓuɗisa Areksandro mukati maʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋaJuda ʋacimusundira mberi; ɀino Areksandro akaninira noruʋoko, aciɗa kuɀiɗaʋirira pamberi paʋanhu.
Ipapo ʋakati ʋaciʋona kuti iye muJuda, inzwi rimŋe rikamuka kunaʋose, ʋakaɗanidzira ŋguʋa dzineŋge mbiri,
Ɀino munyori weguta wakanyaradza ʋanhu, akati: Ʋarume ʋeEfeso, munhu ndoupiko usiŋgaziʋi, kuti guta raʋaEfeso ndiwo muceŋgeti wetembere yaDiana mukuru nowo
Ɀaɀisiŋgagoni kurambga iɀoɀi, maifanira kunyarara musiŋgaiti cinhu nokusaraŋgarira kwaɀo.
Nokuti maʋuya naʋarume aʋa, ʋasati ʋari mbava dzetembere kana ʋamhuri ʋamŋarikadzi weɗu.
Ɀino kana Demetrio nedzimŋe mhizha naye ʋanemhoȿa nomunhu, misi yokutoŋga iri’po, naʋatoŋgi ʋari’po; ŋgaʋakwirirane haʋo.
Asi kana mucitȿaka cimŋe cinhu pamsoro pedzimŋe
Nokuti njodzi ndiyo kuti tiŋgakwirirwa pamsoro peɓope ranhasi, ɀakusinemhoȿa; kana ciri cinhu ici hatiŋgagoni kupindura pamsoro pemhere‐mhere iyi.
Wakati ataura iɀoɀo, akaendisa ʋuŋgano.
Ƃopoto rakati ranyarara, Pauro akaɗana ʋadzidzi, akaʋaraira, ndokuwonekana naʋo, akabva aciɗa kuenda Makedonia.
Akagura namatiʋi enyika idzo, akaraira
Akati agara mŋedzi mitatu, raŋgano
Akaperekedzwa naSopatro weBerea,
Iʋo ʋakatuŋgamira, ʋakatimirira paTroa.
Isu tikabva Firipi necikepe mazuʋa eɀiŋgwa ɀisinembiriso apfuʋura; tikasika kwaʋari paTroa namazuʋa mashanu; tikagara’po mazuʋa manomŋe.
Ɀino nomusi wokutaŋga weviki, takaʋuŋgana kuti timeɗure ciŋgwa, Pauro akataurirana naʋo, aciɗa kuenda maŋgwana; akaramba aciparidza shoko kuȿikira pakati poʋusiku.
Kwakaŋga kunemŋenje mizhinji muimba yokumsoro, matakaŋga taʋuŋgana.

Ɀino pawindi pakaŋga pagere rimŋe jaya, rainzi Yutiko, rikaɓatwa nehope kwaɀo; ɀino Pauro, wakati aciŋgoramba aciparidza, iye akaɓatwa nehope, akawira pasi, acibva paimba yecitatu yokumsoro, akasimudzwa afa.
Ipapo Pauro akaɓuruka, akaɀiwisira pamsoro pake, akamufuŋgatira, akati: Musaita ɓopoto, nokuti mŋeya wake uciri maari.
Akakwira, akameɗura ciŋgwa, akadya, akataura naʋo ŋguʋa refu kuȿikira kuciedza, ndokuenda.
Ʋakaʋuya nomukomana ari mupenyu, ʋakanyaradzwa kwaɀo.
Asi isu takatuŋgamirira kucikepe, tikaenda Aso, ticiɗa kutora Pauro ipapo, nokuti wakaŋga araira saiɀoɀo, iye aciɗa kufamba namakumbo.
Takati tasoŋgana naye paAso, tikamutora, tikandoȿika Mitirene;
tikabva ipapo necikepe, fume maŋgwana tikaȿika pakatarisana neKiyo; fume maŋgwana tikapfuʋura napaSamo; fume maŋgwana ɀe tikaȿika Mireto.
Nokuti Pauro wakaŋga ati: Ndicapfuʋura Efeso necikepe, kuti arege kunonoka paAsia; nokuti wakaŋga acikurumidza kuti kana aiɀigona aʋe Jerusarema nezuʋa rePentekosta.
Ɀino iye ari paMireto, akatumira Efeso kundoɗana ʋakuru ʋekereke.
Ʋakati ʋaȿika kwaari, akati kwaʋari:
Imi munoziʋa mugarire waŋgu pakati penyu ŋguʋa dzose, kubva pazuʋa rokutaŋga randakaȿika naro paAsia;
ndiciɓatira Ishe nokuɀininipisa ɀikuru, nemisodzi, namaɗambudziko akandiwira neraŋgano
kuti handina‐kutya kukuparidzirai ɀiŋgakuɓatsirai nokukudzidzisai pacena padzimba
ndicipupurira kwaɀo ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki, kuti ʋatendeʋukire kunaMŋari, nokutenda kunaShe weɗu Jesu.
Ɀino tarirai, ndinoenda Jerusarema, ndasuŋgwa mŋeya
asi kuti Mŋeya Mutȿene unondipupurira kwaɀo muguta rimŋe nerimŋe, kuti kusuŋgwa nenhamo ɀakandigarira.
Asi handinehanya noʋupenyu bgaŋgu, handibguɗi, kuti ndipedze rwendo rwaŋgu neɓasa randakapiwa naShe Jesu, rokupupura kwaɀo Evaŋgeri yenyasha dzaMŋari.
Ɀino tarirai, ndinoziʋa kuti imi mose, ʋandakafamba pakati penyu, ndiciparidza ʋushe
Naiɀoɀo ndinokupupurirai nhasi kuti ndakacena paropa ra
Nokuti handina‐kutya kukuparidzirai kuɗa kwose kwaMŋari.
Ɀicenjerei imi, neɓoka rose ramakaitirwa ʋatariri ʋaro noMŋeya Mutȿene, kuti mufudze kereke yaMŋari, yaakateŋga neropa rake.
Ini ndinoziʋa kuti kana ndaenda, mapere anoparadza acapinda pakati penyu, asiŋgaregi ɓoka.
Ʋuye, napakati penyu pamene pacamuka ʋarume, ʋacataura ɀinopesanisa, kuti ʋatsause ʋadzidzi ʋaʋateʋere.
Naiɀoɀo rindai, muraŋgarire kuti makore matatu handina‐kurega ʋusiku namasikati kuraira mumŋe nomumŋe nemisodzi.
Ɀino ndinokuisai kunaShe, neshoko renyasha dzake, iye unesimba roku
Handinakucocora sirveri, kana ndarama, kana ŋguʋo dzomunhu mumŋe.
Munoziʋa imi mumene, kuti maʋoko awa akaɓatira kushaiwa kwaŋgu nokwaʋanhu ʋandaiʋa naʋo.
Paɀinhu ɀose ndakakuratidzai, kuti muciɓata muciɗai, munofanira kuɓatsira ʋasinesimba, nokuraŋgarira mashoko aShe Jesu, seɀaakataura amene
Wakati ataura iɀoɀo, akafugama, akanyeŋgetera naʋo ʋose.
Ʋakacema ɀikuru ʋose; ʋakawira pamutsipa waPauro, ʋakawonekana naye nokumuȿeta,
ʋaneshuŋgu kwaɀo neshoko raakataura rokuti haʋacazoʋoni ciso cake. Ipapo ʋakamuperekedzera kucikepe.
Ɀino takati taparadzana naʋo, tikabva necikepe, tikarurama, tikaȿika Kose; fume maŋgwana tikaȿika Rode; tikabva’po, tikaȿika Patara.
Takati tawana’po cikepe, caiyambukira Finikia, tikapinda mukati maco, tikaenda.
Takati taʋona Kupro, tikaisiya kuruɓoshwe, ticienda Siria, tikaȿika Tire; nokuti cikepe caifanira kututunura mutoro ipapo;
ɀino takati tawana’
Ɀino takati tapedza’
Tikawonekana, isu tikaenda kucikepe, iʋo ʋakadzokera
Isu takati tapedza rwendo ticibva Tire, tikaȿika Toremai, tikakwazisa hama, ndokuswera zuʋa rimŋe naʋo.
Fume maŋgwana tikabva’po, tikaȿika Kesaria; ipapo tikapinda mumba maFiripo, Muevaŋgeri, mumŋe waʋanomŋe, tikagara naye.
Iye wakaŋga anaʋakunda ʋanna, mhandara, ʋaiprofita.
Ɀino takati ticigara’po mazuʋa mazhinji, mumŋe muprofita, wainzi Akabo, akaɓuruka

akaʋuya kwatiri, akatora banhire raPauro, akaɀisuŋga makumbo namaʋoko ake, akati: Mŋeya Mutȿene unoreʋa kuɗai: Saiɀoɀo ʋaJuda paJerusarema ʋacasuŋga murume, mŋene webanhire iri, nokumuisa pamaʋoko aʋahedeni.
Takati ticinzwa iɀoɀo, isu naʋamŋe ʋaipapo tikakumbira ɀikuru kwaari, kuti arege kukwira Jerusarema.
Ipapo Pauro akapindura,
Ɀino wakati aciramba kukundwa, tikanyarara, tikati: Kuɗa kwaShe ŋgakuitwe.
Mazuʋa iwayo akati apera, tikaroŋgedza, tikakwira Jerusarema.
Na
Ɀino takati ticiȿika Jerusare ma, hama dzikatigamucira nomufaro.
Fume maŋgwana Pauro akapinda nesu kunaJakobo; naʋakuru ʋakaŋga ʋari’po ʋose.
Akaʋakwazisa, ndokuʋarondedzera, cimŋe necimŋe, ɀakaitwa naMŋari pakati paʋahedeni neɓasa rake.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋaɀinzwa, ʋakakudza Mŋari, ʋakati kwaari: Hama, unoʋona kuti ʋari’po ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana ɀizhinji ɀaʋaJuda ʋakatenda; ʋose ʋanoshiŋgairira murairo;
ɀino ʋakaʋudzwa kuti iwe unodzidzisa ʋaJuda ʋose, ʋari pakati paʋahedeni, kuti ʋarambe Mosesi, uciti, ʋarege kudziŋgisa ʋana ʋaʋo, kana kufamba netsika
Ɀino toɗiniko? Ʋacanzwa haʋo kuti waȿika.
Naiɀoɀo ita iɀi ɀatinotaura kwauri: Tinaʋarume ʋanna ʋakaɀisuŋga nokupika;
uʋatore, uɀinatse pamŋe cete naʋo, uʋaripire, ʋagoʋeʋura misoro
Asi kana ʋari ʋahedeni ʋakatenda, taka
Ipapo Pauro akatora ʋarume
Ɀino mazuʋa manomŋe akati opera, ʋaJuda ʋeAsia ʋakamuʋona mutembere, ʋakamutsa ʋanhu ʋazhinji, ʋakamuɓata,

ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: Ʋarume ʋaIsraeri, ɓatsirai! Uyu ndiye munhu unodzidzisa ʋanhu kwose‐kwose ɀinopesana naʋanhu, nomurairo, nenɀimbo ino; ʋuye ɀe, wakaʋuya naʋaGiriki mutembere, akaȿiɓisa nɀimbo ino tȿene.
Nokuti ʋakaŋga ʋaʋona Trofimo muEfeso, anaye muguta, ʋakati ɀimŋe Pauro wapinda naye mutembere.
Ipapo guta rose rakanyoŋganiswa, ʋanhu ʋakamhanyira pamŋe cete; ʋakaɓata Pauro, ʋakamukweʋera kunze kwetembere, mikoʋa ikazarirwa pakarepo.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋacitȿaka kumuʋuraya, shoko rikakwira kumukuru wecuru camazana, kuti Jerusarema rose ranyoŋganiswa.
Iye akatora pakarepo ʋarwi naʋakuru ʋezana, akaɓuruka acimhanyira kwaʋari; iʋo ʋakati ʋaciʋona mukuru wecuru camazana naʋarwi, ʋakarega kuroʋa Pauro.
Ɀino mukuru wecuru camazana akasweɗera, akamuɓata, ndokuraira kuti asuŋgwe namaketani maʋiri; akabvunza kuti ndiani, ʋuye kuti waiteiko.
Ɀino ʋamŋe pakati paʋazhinji ʋakaɗanidzira cimŋe cinhu, ʋamŋe cimŋe cinhu; ɀino iye asiŋgagoni kuziʋa ɀokwaɗi nokuɗa kweɓopoto, akaraira kuti ʋamuise kuimba yaʋarwi.
Wakati aciȿika paɀikwiriso, akaita sokutakurwa naʋarwi, nokuɗa kwesimba raʋanhu ʋazhinji;
nokuti ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakateʋera, ʋaciɗanidzira,
Ɀino oɗa kupinzwa muimba yaʋarwi, Pauro akati kumukuru wecuru camazana: Ndiŋgataura cimŋe nemi here? Iye akati: Unoziʋa ciGiriki here?
Ko hauzi uya muEgipita, wakaɗeya kukaŋganisa
Ipapo Pauro akati: Ini ndiri muJuda weTarso muKirikia, munhu weguta rakakurumbira. Ndinokumbira kuti munditendere nditaure naʋanhu.
Ɀino wakati amutendera, Pauro akamira paɀikwiriso, akaninira ʋanhu noruʋoko
Ʋarume, hama, namadziɓaɓa, inzwai kuɀiɗaʋirira kwaŋgu pamberi penyu ɀino.
Iʋo ʋakati ʋacinzwa, kuti wotaura naʋo norurimi rweciHeberu, ʋakanyanya kunyarara. Iye akati:
Ini ndiri muJuda, ndakaɓerekwa paTarso muKirikia, asi ndakarerwa muguta rino, pamakumbo aGamarieri, ndikadzidziswa netsika kwadzo dzomurairo wamadziɓaɓa eɗu, ndicishiŋgairira Mŋari, semi mose nhasi;
ndikatambudza
muprista mukuru seɀaaŋgandipupurira ʋo namakurukota ose; ndikapiwa ŋwadi naʋo kuhama, ndikaenda Damasko kuti ndiise Jerusarema aʋo ʋaigara’ko, ʋakasuŋgwa, kuti ʋarobge.
Ɀino ndakati ndicifamba, ndosweɗera Damasko, aneŋge masikati, pakarepo ndikapenyerwa kwose neciedza cikuru, caibva kuɗeŋga.
Ndikawira pasi, ndikanzwa inzwi riciti kwandiri: Sauro, Sauro, unonditambudzireiko?
Ndikapindura,
Ɀino ʋaiʋa neni ʋakaʋona ciedza, asi haʋanakunzwa inzwi rowakataura neni.
Ndikati: Ndoɗiniko, Ishe? Ishe akati kwandiri: Simuka, uende Damasko; apo ucaʋudzwa ɀose ɀakatarwa kuti uɀiite.
Ɀino ɀandakaŋga ndisiŋgagoni kuʋona nokupenya kweciedza ico, ndikasesedzwa noruʋoko naʋaiʋa neni, ndikaȿika Damasko.
Ɀino mumŋe murume, wainzi Ananiasi, munhu wainamata
akaʋuya kwandiri, akamira, akati kwandiri: Sauro, hama, ciʋona! Neŋguʋa iyo ndikamuʋona.
Iye akati: Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu wakakusanaŋgura, kuti uziʋe kuɗa kwake, nokumuʋona
Nokuti iwe ucaʋa capupu cake kuʋanhu ʋose ceɀawakaʋona neɀawakanzwa.
Ɀino ucanonokereiko? Simuka, ubapatidzwe, usukwe ɀiʋi ɀako, uɗane zita rake.
Ɀino ndakati ndadzokera Jerusarema, ndicinyeŋgetera mutembere,
ndikamuʋona, aciti kwandiri: Kurumidza, ubve Jerusarema ɀino‐ɀino, nokuti haʋaŋgagamuciri kupupura kwako pamsoro paŋgu.
Ipapo ndikati: Ishe, ʋanoziʋa ʋamene kuti ini ndaiisa mutoroŋgo, nokuroʋa mumasinagoge, aʋo ʋaitenda kwamuri;
ʋuye, musi wakaɗururwa ropa raStefano, capupu cenyu, neni ʋo ndakaŋga ndimire’po, ndicibvumira, ndikaceŋgeta ŋguʋo dzaʋaimuʋuraya.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Enda, ndicakutuma kure kuʋahedeni.
Ʋakamuterera kuȿikira pashoko iro; ipapo ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋaciti: wakaɗai ŋgaabviswe panyika; nokuti haafaniri kurarama.
Ʋakaɗanidzira, ʋakakandira ŋguʋo dzaʋo pasi, ʋacikushira ivu kuɗeŋga,
mukuru wecuru camazana akaraira, kuti aiswe kuimba yaʋarwi, aciti abvunzwe nokurobga ɀikuru, kuti aziʋe mhoȿa yaʋakaŋga ʋamupopoterera kuɗai.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋamusuŋga namakashu, Pauro akati kumukuru wezana, wakaŋga amire’po: Makatenderwa kuroʋa munhu uri muRoma, asina‐kutoŋgwa here?
Ɀino mukuru wezana wakati aciɀinzwa, akaenda kumukuru wecuru camazana, akamuʋudza akati: Munoɗa kuiteiko? Nokuti munhu uyu muRoma.
Mukuru wecuru camazana akaʋuya akati kwaari: Ndiʋudze, uri muRoma here? Akati: Hoŋo.
Mukuru wecuru camazana akati: Ini ndakateŋga simba iri
Ɀino ʋakaŋga ʋomubvunzisisa, ʋakabva kwaari pakarepo, nomukuru wecuru camazana wakatya ʋo aciziʋa kuti iye muRoma, ʋuye nokuti wakaŋga amusuŋga.
Ɀino fume maŋgwana, aciɗa kuziʋa kwaɀo kuti ʋaJuda ʋakamupomera mhoȿa yei, akamusunuŋgura, akaraira kuti ʋaprista ʋakuru namakurukota ose ʋaʋuŋgane, akaɓurusa Pauro, ndokumuisa pamberi paʋo.
Ɀino Pauro wakati acitarisisa kumakurukota, akati: Ʋarume, hama, ini ndakafamba pamberi paMŋari nehana yakarurama kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi.
Ipapo Ananiasi, muprista mukuru, akaraira ʋakaŋga ʋamire naye, kuti ʋamuroʋe muromo.
Ipapo Pauro akati kwaari: Mŋari ucakuroʋa iwe, ruȿiŋgo rwakaceneswa; ugere’
Ʋakaŋga ʋamire’po ʋakati: Ko unotuka muprista mukuru waMŋari here?
Pauro akati: Hama
Ɀino Pauro wakati aciʋona kuti ʋamŋe ndiʋaSaduse naʋamŋe ʋaFarise, akaɗanidzira mumakurukota,
Wakati aɗaro, kupesana kukaʋa’po pakati paʋaFarise naʋaSaduse; ʋuŋgano ikaparadzana.
Nokuti ʋaSaduse ʋaiti hapana‐kumuka kwaʋakafa, kana mutumŋa, kana mŋeya; asi ʋaFarise ʋaitenda iɀoɀo ɀose.
Ɀino ɓope guru rikaʋa’po; ʋamŋe ʋanyori ʋokuʋaFarise ʋakasimuka, ʋakaita nharo, ʋaciti: Hatiʋoni cinhu cakaipa kumunhu uyu; ɀimŋe mŋeya wakataura naye, kana mutumŋa.
Ɀino kupesana kukuru kuciɗa kumuka, mukuru wecuru camazana akatya kuti Pauro uŋgabvamburwa naʋo, akaraira ʋarwi kuti ʋaɓuruke, ʋamubvute pakati paʋo, ʋamuise muimba yaʋarwi.
Ʋusiku bgakateʋera, Ishe akamira naye, akati: Tsuŋga mŋoyo, seɀawakandipupurira kwaɀo paJerusarema, unofanira kupupura paRoma ʋo.
Ɀino kwakati kwaedza, ʋaJuda ʋakaita raŋgano, ʋakaɀisuŋga nokupika, ʋaciti, haʋaŋgadyi kana kunwa kuȿikira ʋaʋuraya Pauro.
Ʋakaŋga ʋaita raŋgano iyo, ʋakapfuʋura makumi manna.
Aʋa ʋakaenda kuʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru, ʋakati: Taɀisuŋga nokupika kukuru, kuti hatiŋgadyi cinhu, kuȿikira taʋuraya Pauro.
Naiɀoɀo ɀino imi, namakurukota, muziʋise mukuru wecuru camazana, kuti amuɓurusire kwamuri, muciita somunoɗa kunatso‐bvunzisisa mhoȿa yake; isu taɀigadzira kuti timuʋuraye, asati asweɗera.
Ɀino mŋanakomana wehanɀadzi yaPauro akanzwa ɀokuʋandira kwaʋo, akaenda, akapinda mumba maʋarwi, akaʋudza Pauro.
Ipapo Pauro akaɗana mumŋe waʋakuru ʋezana, akati: Isa jaya iri kumukuru wecuru camazana; nokuti uneshoko raanoɗa kumuʋudza.
Naiɀoɀo akamutora, akaenda naye kumukuru wecuru camazana, akati: Pauro musuŋgwa, wakandiɗana, akakumbira, kuti ndiʋuye nejaya iri kwamuri; uneshoko raanoɗa kukuʋudzai.
Mukuru wecuru camazana akaɓata ruʋoko rwake, akaenda naye ʋari ʋoga, akamubvunza ʋari ʋoga, akati: Uneshoko reiko, raunoɗa kundiʋudza?
Iye akati: ƲaJuda ʋakatenderana Kukumbira kwamuri, kuti muɓuruse Pauro kumakurukota maŋgwana, muciita somunoɗa kunatso‐bvunzisisa mhoȿa yake.

Naiɀoɀo musaʋatenda; nokuti pakati paʋo kunaʋarume ʋanopfuʋura makumi manna ʋanomuʋandira ʋakaɀisuŋga nokupika, kuti haʋaŋgadyi, kana kunwa, kuȿikira ʋamuʋuraya; ɀino ʋakaɀigadzira, ʋakatarira tendero inobva kwamuri.
Naiɀoɀo mukuru wecuru camazana akaendisa jaya, akamuraira,
Ɀino akaɗana ʋakuru ʋezana ʋaʋiri, akati: Gadzirai ʋarwi ʋanamazana maʋiri, naʋanotaȿa mabiza ʋanamakumi manomŋe, naʋanamapfumo ʋanamazana maʋiri, ʋaende Kesaria neŋguʋa yecitatu yoʋusiku;
mu
Akanyora ŋwadi yakaŋga iciti:
Kraudio Risia, kunaFeriksi, muɓati wakakurumbira kwaɀo, kwaziwai!
Uyu munhu wakaɓatwa naʋaJuda, akaŋga oɗo‐kuʋurawa naʋo, ini ndikaȿika naʋarwi, ndikamurwira, ɀandakanzwa kuti muRoma.
Ɀino ndakati ndiciɗa kuziʋa mhoȿa yaʋakamukwirira nayo, ndikamuɓurusira kumakurukota aʋo;
ndikawana kuti wakwirirwa pamsoro pamashoko omurairo waʋo, asi asinemhoȿa yecinhu ciŋgafanira rufu kana kusuŋgwa.
Ɀino ndakati ndaʋudzwa, kuti ʋoɗa kuʋandira munhu uyu, ndikamutumira kwamuri pakarepo, ndikaraira ʋanomukwirira kuti ʋataure pamberi penyu mhoȿa yake.
Ɀino ʋarwi ʋakatora Pauro seɀaʋakarairwa, ʋakamuisa Antipatri ʋusiku.
Fume maŋgwana ʋakarega ʋataȿi ʋamabiza, kuti ʋaende naye, iʋo ʋakadzokera kuimba yaʋarwi.
Ʋaya ʋakati ʋaȿika Kesaria, ʋakapa muɓati ŋwadi, ʋakaisa ʋo Pauro pamberi pake.
Wakati araʋa, akabvunza kuti ndowenyika ipi; ɀino wakati anzwa kuti ndoweKirikia,
akati: Ndicakunzwa kwaɀo, kana ʋanokukwirira ʋaȿika ʋo; akaraira kuti aceŋgetwe mumba maHerode.
Ɀino mazuʋa mashanu akati apfuʋura, Ananiasi, muprista mukuru, akaɓuruka naʋamŋe ʋakuru, nomumŋe mureʋeri, wainzi Terturo; ʋakamhaŋarira Pauro kumuɓati.
Iye akati aɗanwa, Terturo akataŋga kumupomera mhoȿa aciti:
Ɀatinoʋona rugare rukuru nemi, norudzi urwu ɀarunoruramisirwa mhoȿa nokuɓata kwenyu kwakanaka;
tinoɀigamucira nemitoʋo yose napanɀimbo dzose nokuʋoŋga kukuru,
Asi, ɀandisiŋgaɗ’i kukunonosai, ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, kuti mutinzwei neŋgoni dzenyu ɀishomanene.
Nokuti takaʋona kuti murume uyu wakashata kwaɀo, unomutsa ɓope paʋaJuda ʋose panyika
Iye wakaidza ʋo kushatisa tembere, tikamuɓata, [ticiɗa kumutoŋga nomurairo weɗu.
Asi Risia, mukuru wecuru camazana, ndokuʋuya, akamubvisa mumaʋoko eɗu nesimba guru,
akaraira ʋanomupomera kuti ʋaʋuye pamberi penyu.] Kana mukamubvunzisisa mumene, mucagona kuziʋa iɀoɀo ɀose ɀatakamukwirira naɀo.
NaʋaJuda ʋakabvumira ʋo pakumhaŋara, ʋakasimbisa kuti ɀinhu iɀoɀo ndiɀo.
Ɀino muɓati wakati amuninira, kuti ataure, Pauro akapindura,
Ɀandinoziʋa kuti maʋa mutoŋgi waʋanhu aʋa makore mazhinji, ndinoɀiɗaʋirira nomufaro,
nokuti munzwe kuti mazuʋa acigere kupfuʋura gumi namaʋiri, kubvira paŋguʋa yandakakwira Jerusarema kundonamata.
Haʋana‐kundiwana ndiciita nharo mutembere nomunhu, kana kumutsa ɓope mumasinagoge kana muguta;
haʋaŋgagoni ʋo kusimbisa kwamuri iɀo ɀaʋanondipomera naɀo ɀino.
Asi ndinotenda haŋgu kwamuri, kuti ndinoshumira Mŋari wamadziɓaɓa eɗu neNzira, yaʋanoti idzidziso
ndinetariro kunaMŋari, iyo yaʋanotenda ʋo ʋamene, kuti kucaʋa’po kumuka kwaʋakafa kwaʋakarurama naʋasakarurama.
Pacinhu ici ndinoidza ɀikuru kuti misi yose ndiʋe nehana isinemhoȿa kunaMŋari nokuʋanhu.
Ɀino makore mazhinji akati apfuʋura, ndakaʋuya neɀipo neɀiɓayiro kuʋanhu ʋaŋgu.
Ndiɀoɀo ɀaʋakandiwana ndiciita mutembere, ndanatswa, ndisinaʋanhu ʋazhinji, kana ɓopoto;
asi ʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋeAsia ʋaiʋa’po, — iʋo ʋaifanira kuʋa
Kunyaŋge naʋaʋa ŋgaʋareʋe ʋamene cisakarurama caʋakawana, musi wandakamira pamberi pamakurukota,
asi shoko iri ɓedzi, randakaɗanidzira, ndimire pakati paʋo,
Asi Feriksi, ɀaakaziʋisisa ɀakanaka Nzira iyo, akaʋaʋetsa, aciti: Kana Risia, mukuru wecuru camazana aɓurukira
Akaraira mukuru wezana kuti Pauro aceŋgetwe, arerusirwe, ʋuye kuti ʋarege kudziʋisa mumŋe wokwake kumushumira.
Ɀino mamŋe mazuʋa akati apfuʋura, Feriksi akaȿika, nomukadzi wake Drusira, waiʋa muJuda, akaɗana Pauro, akamunzwa pamsoro pokutenda kunaKristu Jesu.
Ɀino wakati acitaura ɀokururama, nokuɀidzora, nokutoŋga kunoʋuya, Feriksi akatya ɀikuru, akapindura,
Wakati ʋo ɀimŋe ucazopiwa mari naPauro; naiɀoɀo wakamuɗana kazhinji, acitaura naye.
Asi makore maʋiri akati apera, Porkio Festo akapinda panɀimbo yaFeriksi, ɀino Feriksi aciɗa kufadza ʋaJuda, akasiya Pauro akasuŋgwa.
Ɀino Festo wakati aȿika panyika iyo, mazuʋa matatu apfuʋura, akakwira Jerusarema, acibva Kesaria,
ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ʋakamhaŋarira Pauro kwaari, ʋakamunyeŋgetera,
ʋakakumbira kuti aʋafadze pamsoro pake, amuɗanire Jerusarema, kuti ʋamuʋandire ʋamuʋuraye panzira.
Asi Festo wakapindura, aciti Pauro wakaceŋgetwa Kesaria, ʋuye kuti iye amene wakaŋga okurumidza kuenda’
Akati: Aʋo ʋanesimba pakati penyu, ŋgaʋaɓuruke neni; kana kunecinhu cisakafanira kumunhu uyu, ŋgaʋamupomere mhoȿa.
Akagara pakati paʋo mazuʋa asiŋgapfuʋuri masere kana gumi, ndokuɓurukira Kesaria; fume maŋgwana akagara pacigaro cokutoŋga, akaraira kuti ʋaʋuye naPauro.
Wakati aȿika, ʋaJuda ʋakabva Jerusarema, ʋakamukomba, ʋakamupomera mhoȿa zhinji dzakaipa, dzaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kusimbisa.
Ɀino Pauro akaɀiɗaʋirira,
Ɀino Festo aciɗa kufadza ʋaJuda, akapindura Pauro akati: Unoɗa here kukwira Jerusarema, undotoŋgwa’ko pamberi paŋgu pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi?
Ipapo Pauro akati: Ndinomira pamberi pecigaro cokutoŋga caKesari, pandinofanira kutoŋgwa; handina‐kuitira ʋaJuda ɀisakarurama, seɀamunoziʋa nemi ʋo ɀakanaka.
Ɀino kana ndineŋge ndisakarurama, ndaita cinhu cinofanira rufu, handirambi kufa; asi kana pasinecinhu
Ipapo Festo akataurirana namakurukota, akapindura,
Ɀino mamŋe mazuʋa akati apfuʋura, mambo Agripa naBerinike ʋakaȿika Kesaria kuzokwazisa Festo.
Ʋakati ʋagara mazuʋa mazhinji, Festo akaisa mhoȿa yaPauro kunamambo, aciti: Kunomumŋe murume wakasiyiwa
ndiciri paJerusarema, ʋaprista ʋakuru naʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda ʋakamumhaŋarira, ʋacikumbira kuti atoŋgerwe rufu.
ndikaʋapindura, ndikati haizi tsika yaʋaRoma kuisa
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana pano, handina‐kunonoka, asi fume maŋgwana ndakagara pacigaro cokutoŋga, ndikaraira kuti ʋaʋuye nomurume uyo.
Ɀino ʋapomeri ʋakasimuka, asi haʋana‐kumupomera mhoȿa yeɀinhu ɀakaipa ɀandakaŋga ndiciti
asi ʋakaŋga ʋanamamŋe mashoko okupira kwaʋo, noomumŋe Jesu wakaŋga afa, wainzi naPauro mupenyu.
Ɀino ini, ɀandakaŋga ndisiŋgaziʋi mubvunzire weɀinhu ɀakaɗai, ndikabvunza kana aciɗa kuenda Jerusarema kundotoŋgwa ikoko pamsoro peɀinhu iɀoɀo.
Asi Pauro wakati akumbira kuti aceŋgetwe kuzotoŋgwa namambo mukuru, ndikaraira kuti aceŋgetwe kuȿikira ndicimutumira kunaKesari.
Ipapo Agripa
Fume maŋgwana Agripa wakati aȿika naBerinike, ʋashoŋga kwaɀo, ʋapinda mumba maitambirwa mhaka, naʋakuru ʋecuru camazana, naʋakuru ʋeguta, ʋakaʋuya naPauro ʋarairwa naFesto.
Ɀino Festo akati: Mambo Agripa,
Asi ini ndakawana kuti haana‐kuita cinhu cakafanira rufu, ʋuye ɀaakakumbira kuiswa kunamambo mukuru, ndakati, ndicamutuma.
Asi handineshoko kwaro reɀokwaɗi randiŋganyorera ishe pamsoro pake; saka ndaʋuya naye pamberi penyu, ɀikuru pamberi penyu, imi mambo Agripa, kuti kana abvunziswa
Nokuti kwandiri ɀakaita seɀisina‐kufanira kutuma musuŋgwa, mhoȿa dzaakakwirirwa nadzo dzisiŋgaziʋiswi ʋo.
Ɀino Agripa akati kunaPauro: Unotenderwa kuɀiɗaʋirira. Ipapo Pauro akatambanudza ruʋoko rwake, akaɀiɗaʋirira,
Mambo Agripa, ndinoɀikorokotedza, ɀandiŋgaɀiɗaʋirira nhasi pamberi penyu pamsoro peɀose ɀandinokwirirwa naɀo naʋaJuda;
ɀikuru nokuti munoziʋa tsika dzose namashoko
ƲaJuda ʋose ʋanoziʋa mufambire waŋgu, kubva paʋuɗuku bgaŋgu, waiʋa pakati porudzi rwaŋgu napaJerusarema kubva pakutaŋga;
ʋakandiziʋa kare, kana ʋaciɗa kupupura, kuti ndaiʋa muFarise, nedzidziso yokupira kweɗu yakaiȿo‐rurama.
Naɀino ndinomira
Marudzi eɗu anegumi namaʋiri anoshumira
Munofuŋgireiko imi kuti haɀiŋgatendwi kuti Mŋari uŋgamutsa ʋakafa?
Ɀino neni nnaiti ndinofanira kuita ɀinhu ɀizhinji ɀinopesana nezita raJesu weNazareta.
Ndakaɀiita ʋo paJerusarema, ndikapfigira ʋatȿene ʋazhinji mutoroŋgo, ndapiwa simba naʋaprista ʋakuru; ʋuye kana ʋaiʋurawa, neni ndaibvumira ʋo.
Nomumasinagoge ose ndaiʋatambudza, ndiciʋaroʋerera kuti ʋamhure
Ndakati ndicaita iɀoɀi, ndikaenda Damasko nesimba ʋuye nomurairo waʋaprista ʋakuru,
, mambo, masikati makuru, ndiri munzira, ndikaʋona ciedza caibva kuɗeŋga, caikunda kupenya kwezuʋa, cicindipenyera kumatiʋi ose naʋandaifamba naʋo.
Ɀino takati tawira pasi tose, ndikanzwa inzwi riciti kwandiri norurimi rweciHeberu: Sauro! Sauro! unonditambudzireiko? Ɀinokuremera kupfura ɀiɓayiso.
Ndikati: Ndimi aniko, Ishe? Ishe akati: Ndini Jesu, waunotambudza.
Asi simuka, umire namakumbo ako; nokuti ndaɀiratidza kwauri neɀiɀi, kuti ndikuite munyai necapupu ceɀawakaʋona, neɀandicaɀiratidza naɀo kwauri;
ndicakurwira kuʋanhu nokuʋahedeni, ʋandinokutumira kwaʋari;
kuti uȿinudze meso aʋo, ʋabve murima, ʋaende kuciedza, nokubva pasimba raSatani, ʋaende kunaMŋari, kuti ʋagamucire kaŋganwiro yeɀiʋi ɀaʋo, nenhaka pakati paʋakaitwa ʋatȿene, nokutenda kwandiri.
Naiɀoɀo, mambo Agripa handina‐kuramba kuterera ciratidzo cokuɗeŋga;
asi ndakataŋga kuparidza kunaʋeDamasko, nokunaʋeJerusarema, nenyika yose yeJudea, nokuʋahedeni, kuti ʋatendeʋuke, ʋariŋgire kunaMŋari, ʋaite maɓasa akafanira kutendeʋuka.
Pamsoro paiɀoɀi ʋaJuda ʋakandiɓata mutembere, ʋakaidza kundiʋuraya.
Asi ndakaɓatsirwa naMŋari, ndikamira kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, ndicipupurira ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ndisiŋgareʋi ɀimŋe ɀinhu asi ɀakataurwa naʋaprofita naMosesi, kuti ɀicaitika;
ɀokuti Kristu wakafanira kutambudzika, nokutaŋga kumuka kuʋakafa, aparidzire ʋanhu naʋahedeni ciedza.
Ɀino wakati aciɀiɗaʋirira saiɀoɀo, Festo akati nenzwi guru: Pauro, unopeŋga; kudzidza
Asi Pauro akati: Handipeŋgi, Festo wakakurumbira; asi ndinotaura mashoko amaɀokwaɗi noʋucenjeri.
Nokuti mambo wandinotaura naye ndisiŋgatyi, ʋanoziʋa iɀoɀi, nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti hapanecinhu caiɀoɀo cakaʋanzika kwaari, nokuti cinhu ici hacina‐kuitwa pakaʋanda.
Mambo Agripa, munotenda ʋaprofita here? Ndinoziʋa kuti munotenda.
Agripa
Pauro
Ipapo mambo akasimuka, nomuɓati, naBerinike, naʋakaŋga ʋagere naʋo;
ʋakaɓuɗa ʋakataurirana, ʋakati: Munhu uyu haaiti cinhu cakafanira rufu kana kusuŋgwa.
Ipapo Agripa akati kunaFesto: Munhu uyu ɗai asina‐kuɀiisa kunaKesari uŋgaɗai asunuŋgurwa.
Ɀino kwakati kwatemŋa kuti tiende Itaria necikepe, ʋakaisa Pauro naʋamŋe ʋasuŋgwa kumukuru wezana, wainzi Jurio, wehondo yaAugusto.
Ɀino takati tapinda mucikepe ceAdramiteni, cakaŋga coenda napamisha yemhenderekedzo dzeAsia, tikabva tinaAristarko muMakedonia, waibva Tesaronika.
Fume maŋgwana tikaȿika Sidoni, Jurio akaitira Pauro ɀakanaka, akamutendera kuti aende kushamŋari dzake, aceŋgetwe
Tikabva ipapo, tikapfuʋura nenyasi kweKupro, nokuti mhepo yakatidziʋisa.
Ɀino tikayambuka guŋgwa reKirikia nePamfiria, tikaȿika Mira,
Mukuru wezana akawana’po cikepe ceAreksandria, caienda Itaria, ndokutipinza’mo.
Ɀino takanatsofamba mazuʋa mazhinji, tikaȿika pakatarisana neKinido ticitambudzika, mhepo ɀayakaŋga isiŋgatitenderi kufamba, tikapfuʋura nenyasi kweKrita, pakatarisana neSarmoni.
Tikapfuʋura napo ticitambudzika, ndokuȿika pamŋe painzi Zororo Rakanaka, pedyo neguta reRasea.
Ɀino ŋguʋa huru yakati yapfuʋura, nokufamba neguŋgwa kwaʋa nenjodzi, nokuti ŋguʋa yokuɀinyima ɀokudya yakaŋga yatopfuʋura, Pauro akaʋaraira,
akati kwaʋari: Ʋarume, ndinoʋona kuti rwendo
Asi mukuru wezana wakaterera mufambisi wecikepe, nomŋene waco, kupfuʋura ɀakarebga naPauro,
nokuti zororo ɀarakaŋga risina‐kunaka kuti ʋagare’po cando, ʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋakati ɀirinani kuti ʋabve’po, kuti ɀimŋe ʋaŋgaȿika Fenika ʋagare’
Ɀino mhepo yezasi yakati icirira ɀishoma, ʋakati tawana ɀatakaŋga ticiʋiŋga, ʋakabva’po, ʋakafamba pedyo neKrita.
Ɀino gare‐gare mhepo inesimba, yainzi Yurakuro, ikaɓuruka icibva kwairi, ikatiwira.
Ɀino cikepe cakati ciciɓatwa, tisiŋgagoni
Ɀino tikafamba nyasi kwecimŋe ciwi ciɗuku, cainzi Krauda, tikaŋga tokoniwa kusuŋga igwa.
Ʋakati ʋarisimudza, ʋakatora ɀiɓatsiro, ʋakasuŋga cikepe nenyasi; ɀino ɀaʋakatya kuti ʋacakandirwa pa
Fume maŋgwana, ɀatakatambura kwaɀo neɗutu remhepo, ʋakakandira nhumbi kunze;
ne
Ɀino ɀatakaŋga tisina‐kuɓuɗirwa nezuʋa kana nyeredzi mazuʋa mazhinji, neɗutu guru remhepo ricirambira riri’po, takatorerwa kutarira kwose kwokuti ticaponeswa.
Ɀino ʋakati ʋagara ŋguʋa refu ʋasiŋgadyi, Pauro akamira pakati paʋo, akati: Ʋarume, maifanira kunditerera, mukasabva Krita, mukasawirwa nokutambudzika nokurashikirwa uku.
Asi ɀino ndinokurairai kuti mutsuŋge mŋoyo; nokuti hakunauŋgarashikirwa noʋupenyu bgake pakati penyu, asi cikepe ɓedzi.
Nokuti ʋusiku bguno mutumŋa waMŋari, wandiri wake, nowandinoshumira ʋo, wakamira neni,
akati: Pauro, usatya; unofanira kumira pamberi paKesari; tarira, Mŋari wakakupa ʋose ʋanofamba newe mucikepe.
Naiɀoɀo, ʋarume, tsuŋgai mŋoyo, nokuti ndinotenda Mŋari, kuti ɀicaitika seɀandakaʋudzwa.
Asi tinofanira kukandirwa panecimŋe ciwi.
Ɀino ʋusiku bgegumi noʋunna bgakati bgaȿika, ticaŋgotorwa‐torwa mu
Ʋakayera kudzika
Ɀino ʋakatya kuti ɀimŋe ticawira pamabge, ʋakakanda ɀimiso ɀinna neshure
Ɀino ʋafambisi ʋakati ʋaciɗa kutiza mucikepe, ʋakaɓurusira igwa muguŋgwa, ʋaciita saʋaneŋge ʋokanda ɀimiso kumuromo waco.
Pauro akati kumukuru wezana naʋarwi: Hamuŋgararami kana aʋa ʋasiŋgagari mucikepe.
Ipapo ʋarwi ʋakagura maɓote egwa, ʋakarirega, rikawa.
Ɀino kwakati kwoedza, Pauro akakumbira ɀikuru kwaʋari ʋose kuti ʋadye, aciti: Nhasi raʋa zuʋa regumi nerecinna, ramakagara muciɀinyima kudya, musiŋgadyi cinhu.
Saka ndinokumbira ɀikuru kuti mudye, nokuti ndiɀo ɀicakuponesai; nokuti hakunoruvudzi rumŋe rucaparadzwa pamusoro womumŋe wenyu.
Wakati areʋa iɀoɀo, akatora ciŋgwa, akaʋoŋga Mŋari pamberi paʋo ʋose, akacimeɗura, ndokutaŋga kudya iye.
Ipapo ʋakatsuŋga mŋoyo ʋose, ʋakadya ʋo ʋamene.
Isu tose taiʋa mucikepe, taiʋa mazana maʋiri namakumi manomŋe naʋatanhatu
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaguta, ʋakarerusa cikepe, ʋacikandira ɀiyo muguŋgwa.
Kwakati kwoedza, ʋakasaziʋa nyika; asi ʋakaʋona zororo raiʋa nejeca, ʋakaraŋgana kana ɀaibvira kuitika, kuti ʋaise cikepe pariri.
Ipapo ʋakagura ɀimiso, ʋakaɀisiya muguŋgwa, ʋakasunuŋgura ɀisuŋgo
Ɀino ʋakati ʋaciȿika paiɗira makuŋgwa maʋiri, ʋakagumirisa cikepe pasi; muromo waco ukaɓatwa kwaɀo usiŋgazunuŋguki, asi rutiʋi rwaco rweshure rukavunika nesimba
Ɀino ʋarwi ʋakati ɀirinani kuti ʋasuŋgwa ʋaʋurawe, kuti ʋamŋe ʋarege kutiza ʋacishambira.
Asi mukuru wezana wakaɗa kuponesa Pauro, akaʋadziʋisa ɀaʋakaŋga ʋaciɗa kuita; akaraira kuti ʋanogona kushambira, ʋataŋge kuɀiwisira
, ʋasara, ʋaɓuɗe ʋamŋe pamatanda, ʋamŋe paneɀimŋe ɀinhu ɀecikepe. Naiɀoɀo ɀakaitika kuti ʋose
Ɀino takati taponeswa, tikaziʋa kuti ciwi cinonzi Merita.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakatiitira ʋunyoro kwaɀo; nokuti ʋakaɓatidza mŋoto, ʋakatigamucira tose, nokuɗa kwemvura yakaŋga icinaya, ʋuye nokuɗa kwecando.
Ɀino Pauro wakati aʋuŋganidza ȿiŋga roʋutsotso, akabguisa pamŋoto, kukaɓuɗa nyoka nokudziya, ikanamatira paruʋoko rwake.
Ʋanhu ʋenyika iyo ʋakati ʋaciʋona cikara cakaremberera paruʋoko rwake, ʋakataurirana,
Asi iye wakazuzira cikara mumŋoto, akasanzwa kurwadzwa.
Iʋo ʋakati ucaɀimba, kana kuwira pasi pakarepo, akafa; ɀino ʋakati ʋatarira ŋguʋa refu, ʋakaʋona kuti haana‐kusikirwa nenjodzi, ʋakashanduka ʋoti: Iye mŋari.
Ɀino pedyo ipapo paiʋa neminda yomukuru weciwi, wainzi Pubrio; iye wakatigamucira, akatigarisa ɀakanaka mazuʋa matatu.
Ɀino ɓaɓa ʋaPubrio ʋakaŋga ʋaʋete pasi, ʋakaɓatwa nefiviri nokuɓuɗisa ropa; Pauro akapinda kwaʋari, akanyeŋgetera, ndokuisa maʋoko ake pamsoro pake, akamuporesa.
Iɀo ɀakati ɀaitwa, naʋamŋe ʋo ʋeciwi, ʋairwara, ʋakaʋuya, ʋakaporeswa.
Ʋakatikudza nokukudza kukuru; ticizoenda, ʋakaisa
Mŋedzi mitatu yakati yapfuʋura, tikaenda necikepe ceAreksandria, cakaŋga cagara cando paciwi, caiʋa neciratidzo cokuti Dioskuri.
Ɀino tikaenda napaSirakuse, tikagara’po mazuʋa matatu.
Tikabva’po, tikapota, ndokuȿika Regio; zuʋa rimŋe rikati rapfuʋura, mhepo yaibva zasi ikamuka, tikaȿika Puteori nezuʋa repiri;
tikawana’po hama, dzakakumbira ɀikuru kuti tigare nadzo mazuʋa manomŋe; naiɀoɀo tikaȿika Roma.
Ɀino hama dzakati dzatinzwa, dzikabva’po, dzikaʋuya kuzoticiŋgamidza, dzikaȿika Apio Foro napaTaberne Nhatu; Pauro akati adziʋona idzo, akaʋoŋga Mŋari, akatsuŋga mŋoyo.
Ɀino takati tapinda Roma, Pauro akatenderwa kugara ari oga, anomurwi waimurinda.

Mazuʋa matatu akati apfuʋura, akakokera aʋo, ʋakaŋga ʋari ʋakuru ʋaʋaJuda. Ʋakati ʋaʋuŋgana, akati kwaʋari: Ʋarume, hama, ini kunyaŋge ndisina‐kuita cinhu cakatadzira ʋanhu, kana tsika dzamadziɓaɓa eɗu, ndakabva Jerusarema ndakasuŋgwa, ndaiswa pamaʋoko aʋaRoma;
iʋo, ʋakati ʋandibvunzisisa, ʋakaɗa kundisunuŋgura, nokuti pakaŋga pasinemhoȿa yorufu kwandiri.
Asi ʋaJuda ʋakaramba, ndikaroʋererwa kuɀiisa kunaKesari; kusi kuti ndaiʋa necinhu cokupomera rudzi rwaŋgu.
Ɀino ndakakuɗanai pamsoro pemhoȿa iyi, kuti ndikuʋonei, nditaurirane nemi, nokuti ndakasuŋgwa neketani iri nokuɗa kwetariro yaʋaIsraeri.
Ʋakati kwaari: hatina‐kugamucira ŋwadi pamsoro pako, dzaibva Judea, ʋuye hakunomumŋe wehama wakaȿika akatiʋudza
Asi tinoɗa kunzwa kwauri ɀaunofuŋga; nokuti kana iri dzidziso iyi, tinoziʋa kuti inorambga kwose‐kwose.

Ɀino ʋakati ʋamutarira zuʋa, ʋakaʋuya kwaari ʋari ʋazhinji, kwaakaŋga agere, akaʋaɗudzira, aciʋapupurira kwaɀo ʋushe bgaMŋari, akaʋagombedzera pamsoro paJesu, nomurairo waMosesi naʋaprofita, kubva maŋgwanani kuȿikira maɗekwana.
Ʋamŋe ʋakatenda ɀakataurwa, asi ʋamŋe haʋana‐kutenda.
Ɀino ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋganzwani, ʋakaenda, Pauro ataura shoko rimŋe cete kwaʋari
aciti:
Enda kuʋanhu aʋa uti:
Nokunzwa mucanzwa, musiŋgatoŋgonzwisisi;
Nokuʋona, mucaʋona, musiŋgaʋonesesi.
Nokuti mŋoyo yaʋanhu aʋa yaʋa mikukutu,
Nzeʋe dzaʋo hadzinzwi ɀakanaka,
Ʋakatsinzina meso aʋo;
Kuti ʋarege kutoŋgoʋona nameso aʋo,
Nokunzwa nenzeʋe dzaʋo,
Nokunzwisisa nemŋoyo yaʋo,
Ʋatendeʋuke,
Ndiʋaporese.
Ɀino ziʋai imi, kuti ruponeso urwu rwakatumirwa ʋahedeni; iʋo ʋacanzwa ʋo.
[Wakati ataura iɀoɀo, ʋaJuda ʋakaenda, ʋaciita nyaya huru pakati paʋo.]
Iye akapedza makore maʋiri agere
aciparidza ʋushe bgaMŋari, acidzidzisa ɀaShe Jesu Kristu, asiŋgatoŋgotyi, asiŋgadziʋiswi nomunhu.
Pauro, muranda waKristu Jesu, wakaɗanwa kuti aʋe muapostora, wakatsaurirwa Evaŋgeri yaMŋari,
yaakapikira kare naʋaprofita ʋake muMagwaro matȿene,
ɀoMŋanakomana wake, wakabva kurudzi rwaDavidi panyama,
wakaratidzwa nesimba paMŋeya woʋutȿene,
watakagamucira naye nyasha noʋuapostora, kuti pakati paʋahedeni ʋose, paʋe nokuterera kwokutenda nokuɗa kwezita rake;
nemi ʋo muri pakati paʋo, makaɗanwa
kunaʋose ʋari muRoma, ʋaɗikanwa ʋaMŋari, ʋakaɗanwa kuti
Pakutaŋga, ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari waŋgu munaJesu Kristu, pamsoro penyu mose, nokuti kutenda kwenyu kunoparidzirwa panyika yose.
Nokuti Mŋari capupu caŋgu, iye wandinoshumira mumŋeya waŋgu muEvaŋgeri yoMŋanakomana wake, kuti handiregi kukuraŋgarirai,
ndicikumbira ŋguʋa dzose pakunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu, kuti ɀimŋe ndifambiswe haŋgu ɀakanaka ndiʋuye kwamuri nokuɗa kwaMŋari.
Nokuti ndinoɗa ɀikuru kukuʋonai, kuti ndikupei cimŋe cipo comŋeya, kuti musimbiswe.
Ndokuti ini ndinyaradzwe pamŋe cete nemi pakati penyu, mumŋe nomumŋe nokutenda kwomumŋe, kwenyu nokwaŋgu.
Handiɗi kuti musaziʋa, hama
Ndineŋgaʋa kuʋaGiriki nokuʋatorwa, kuʋakacenjera naʋasina‐kucenjera.
Naiɀoɀo, kana ndirini, ndakaɀigadzira kukuparidzirai ʋo Evaŋgeri, imi muri paRoma.
Nokuti handinyari pamsoro peEvaŋgeri; nokuti isimba raMŋari rokuponesa mumŋe nomumŋe unotenda, kutaŋga muJuda, ʋuye muGiriki ʋo.
Nokuti mairi kururama kwaMŋari kunoratidzwa kunobva pakutenda
Nokuti kutsamŋa kwaMŋari kunoratidzwa, kucibva kuɗeŋga, pamsoro pokusaɗa Mŋari kwose nokusarurama kwaʋanhu, ʋanodziʋisa ɀokwaɗi nokusarurama;
nokuti iɀo ɀiŋgazikanwa ɀaMŋari ɀinoʋonekwa mukati maʋo, nokuti Mŋari wakaɀiratidza iɀo kwaʋari.
Nokuti kubvira pakusikwa kwenyika, iɀo ɀake ɀisiŋgaʋonekwi, iro simba rake risiŋgaperi noʋuMŋari bgake, ɀinoʋonekwa kwaɀo, ɀicizikanwa paɀinhu ɀakaitwa; kuti ʋarege kuʋa nepembedzo;
nokuti ʋaiziʋa Mŋari, asi haʋana‐kumukudza saMŋari, kana kumuʋoŋga; asi ʋakafuŋga ɀisinamaturo, nemŋoyo yaʋo isineziʋo, ikaȿiɓiswa.
Ʋaciti, takacenjera, ʋakaʋa mapenzi;
ʋakashandura kubginya kwaMŋari usiŋgafi, ʋakakuita mufananidzo wakafanana nomunhu unofa, neshiri, nemhuka dzinamakumbo manna, neɀinokambaira.
Saka Mŋari, mukuciʋa kwemŋoyo yaʋo, akaʋaisa kutȿina, kuti ʋanyadzise miʋiri yaʋo pakati paʋo.
Aʋo ʋakatsinhanha ɀokwaɗi yaMŋari nenhema, ʋakanamata nokushumira cisikwa kupfura Musiki, iye unokudzwa nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Saka Mŋari wakaʋaisa pakuciʋa kunonyadzisa; nokuti ʋanhukadzi ʋaʋo ʋakashandura ɓasa raʋakasikirwa, riʋe ɓasa raʋasina‐kusikirwa;
saiɀoɀo ʋanhurume ʋo ʋakasiya ɓasa rakasikirwa munhukadzi, ʋakakundwa nokuciʋa pakati paʋo, ʋanhurume ʋaciita ɀinonyadza naʋanhurume, ʋakapiwa mukati maʋo muɓairo wakafanira wokurashika kwaʋo.
Seɀaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɗi kugara ʋaciziʋa Mŋari, Mŋari akaʋaisa kumuraŋgariro wakarashika, kuti ʋaite ɀisakafanira;
ʋakazadzwa nokusarurama kwose, nokuipa, noruciʋa, nokuʋeŋga; ʋakazara negoɗo, nokuʋuraya, norukaʋe, nokunyeŋgera, necinya;
naʋaceri, naʋanoʋeŋga Mŋari, naʋanoɗaɗa, naʋanoɀikudza, naʋanoɀirumbidza, naʋaʋambi ʋeɀakaipa, naʋasiŋgatereri ʋaɓereki,
namapenzi, naʋanoputsa suŋgano, naʋasinoruɗo kwarwo, ʋasineŋgoni.
Aʋo, kunyaŋge ʋaciziʋa haʋo cireʋo caMŋari, kuti ʋanoita ɀakaɗai ʋakafanirwa norufu, haʋaiti iɀo ɓedzi, asi ʋanotenderana naʋanoɀiita.
Saka haunepembedzo iwe munhu, upi noupi, unotoŋga
Tinoziʋa kuti kutoŋga kwaMŋari ndokwaɀokwaɗi kunaʋanoita ɀinhu ɀakaɗai.
Iwe munhu, unotoŋga
Unoɀidza kanhi fuma yoʋunyoro bgake, nomŋoyo wake munyoro, nomŋoyo wake murefu, usiŋgaziʋi here kuti ʋunyoro bgaMŋari bgunokuisa pakutendeʋuka?
Asi noʋukukutu bgako, nomŋoyo usiŋgaɗi kutendeʋuka, unoɀiʋuŋganidzira kutsamŋa nezuʋa rokutsamŋa, nokuratidzwa kwokutoŋga kwakarurama kwaMŋari;
iye ucapa mumŋe nomumŋe paakaita napo:
Ʋanotȿaka kubginya, nokukudzwa, nokusafa, ʋacitsuŋgirira pakuita ɀakanaka,
Asi kunaʋanenharo, ʋasiŋgatereri ɀokwaɗi, ʋanoterera ɀisakarurama,
nokutambudzika nenhamo kumŋeya mumŋe nomumŋe womunhu unoita ɀakaipa, pakutaŋga womuJuda, nowomuGiriki;
asi kubginya, nokukudzwa, norugare kunomumŋe nomumŋe unoita ɀakanaka, kumuJuda pakutaŋga, nomuGiriki ʋo.
Nokuti Mŋari haatendi ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu.
Nokuti ʋose ʋakatadza ʋasinomurairo, ʋacaparadzwa ʋo ʋasinomurairo; ʋose ʋakatadza ʋanomurairo, ʋacatoŋgwa nomurairo;
nokuti ʋanzwi ʋomurairo haʋazi iʋo ʋakarurama pamberi paMŋari, asi ʋaiti ʋomurairo ndiʋo ʋanoruramiswa;
(nokuti kana ʋahedeni ʋasinomurairo ʋaciita pacaʋo ɀinhu ɀomurairo, ʋaʋa murairo waʋo ʋamene;
nokuti ʋanoratidza ɓasa romurairo wakanyorwa mumŋoyo yaʋo, hana yaʋo icipupura pamŋe cete naɀo, neɀaʋanofuŋga pakati paʋo ɀiciʋapa mhoȿa kana kuʋapembedza;)
nezuʋa iro, Mŋari raanozotoŋga naro ɀakaʋanzika ɀaʋanhu, naJesu Kristu, seɀinoreʋa Evaŋgeri yaŋgu.
Ɀino kana iwe unonzi muJuda, unoʋimba nomurairo, unoɀirumbidza munaMŋari,
unoziʋa kuɗa
unoɀiti iwe uri mutuŋgamiriri wamapofu,
nomurairi wamapenzi, nomudzidzisi waʋacece, ɀaunomufananidzo wokuziʋa noweɀokwaɗi pamurairo;
ɀino iwe unodzidzisa mumŋe, unoregereiko kuɀidzidzisa? Iwe unoparidza kuti munhu arege kuɓa, unoɓireiko iwe?
Iwe unoti munhu arege kuita ʋupombge, unoitireiko ʋupombge iwe? Iwe unosema ɀifananidzo, unoɓireiko iwe tembere
Iwe unoɀirumbidza nomurairo, unoshoʋora Mŋari nokuɗarika murairo neiko?
Nokuti, seɀaɀakanyorwa, zita raMŋari rinomhurwa pakati paʋahedeni nokuɗa kwenyu.
Nokuti kudziŋgiswa kunoɓatsira, kana iwe uri muiti womurairo; asi kana uri muɗariki womurairo, kudziŋgiswa kwako kwaʋa kusadziŋgiswa.
Ɀino, kana iye usina‐kudziŋgiswa aciceŋgeta ɀireʋo ɀomurairo, ko kusadziŋgiswa kwake hakuŋganzi kudziŋgiswa here?
Nousina‐kudziŋgiswa kubva pakuɀarwa kwake, kana aciceŋgeta murairo, haaŋgakutoŋgi here iwe unoɗarika murairo, iwe
Nokuti uyo haazi muJuda, uri
asi muJuda ndiye uri
Ko muJuda unopfuʋura ʋamŋe neiko? Kana kudziŋgiswa kunoɓatsireiko?
Ɀizhinji, nemitoʋo yose: Pakutaŋga, kuti ndiʋo ʋakapiwa mashoko aMŋari.
Nokuti ɀinoɗiniko kana ʋamŋe ʋasinokutenda? Ko kusatenda kwaʋo kucakonesa kutendeka kwaMŋari here?
Haiȿa! Mŋari ŋgaaʋe waɀokwaɗi, asi ʋanhu ʋose ʋaʋe ʋenhema; seɀaɀakanyorwa, ɀicinzi:
Kuti mururamiswe pamashoko enyu,
Mukunde pakutoŋga kwenyu.
Asi kana kusarurama kweɗu kuciratidza kururama kwaMŋari, ticatiyiko?
Haiȿa! Mŋari uŋgagozotoŋga nyika seiko?
Ɀino kana ɀokwaɗi yaMŋari yawanzwa nenhema dzaŋgu, iye akakudzwa naɀo, ko neni ʋo ndicatoŋgerwei somutadzi?
Ticaregereiko
Ɀino toɗiniko? Tinoʋapfuʋura here? Kwete napaɗuku; nokuti tambopa ʋose mhoȿa, ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki, ticiti ʋose ʋakasuŋgwa neɀiʋi;
seɀaɀakanyorwa, ɀicinzi:
Hakuna‐wakarurama, kunyaŋge nomumŋe;
Hakuna‐unonzwisisa,
Hakuna‐unotȿaka Mŋari;
Ʋakatsauka ʋose, ʋakaʋa ʋanhu ʋasinamaturo,
Hakuna‐unoita ɀakanaka, kunyaŋge nomumŋe cete;
Huro dzaʋo bgiro bgakashama;
Ʋakanyeŋgera nendimi dzaʋo;
Ʋuturu bgenyoka bguri mumiromo yaʋo;
Muromo waʋo uzere nokutuka nokuʋaʋa;
Tsoka dzaʋo dzinokurumidza kuteʋura ropa;
Kuparadza nenhamo ɀiri munzira dzaʋo;
Nenzira yorugare haʋana‐kuiziʋa.
Kutya Mŋari haku’po pamberi paʋo.
Ɀino tinoziʋa kuti ɀose ɀinorebga nomurairo, uno
Nokuti hakunenyama iŋgaruramiswa pamberi pake namaɓasa omurairo; nokuti ɀiʋi ɀinoziʋiswa nomurairo.
Asi ɀino kururama kwaMŋari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwomurairo, kucipupurirwa nomurairo naʋaprofita;
ndiko kururama kwaMŋari
nokuti ʋose ʋakatadza, ʋakasaȿika pakubginya kwaMŋari.
Ʋanoŋgoruramiswa nenyasha dzake nokudzikinura kuri munaKristu Jesu;
iye wakagadzwa naMŋari, kuti aʋe muyananiso nokutenda muropa rake, kuti kururama kwake kuratidzwe, nokuti ɀiʋi ɀakaitwa kare ɀakaregerwa, Mŋari aciʋaitira mŋoyo murefu;
kuti kururama kwake kuratidzwe neŋguʋa ino, kuti arurame iye amene, ʋuye aruramise uyo unotenda kunaJesu.
Ɀino kuɀikudza kuripiko? Kwabviswa. Nomurairo upiko? Wamaɓasa here? Kwete, asi nomurairo wokutenda.
Naiɀoɀo tinoti, munhu unoruramiswa nokutenda kunze kwamaɓasa omurairo.
Ko Mŋari ndiye waʋaJuda ʋoga here? Haazi waʋahedeni ʋo here? Hoŋo, waʋahedeni ʋo;
Mŋari ɀaari mumŋe cete, ucaruramisa ʋakadziŋgiswa pamsoro pokutenda, naʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa nokutenda.
Ɀino tinokonesa murairo nokutenda here? Haiȿa! Asi tinosimbisa murairo.
Ɀino ticati Abrahama, teteguru ʋeɗu panyama, wakawaneiko?
Nokuti ɗai Abrahama akaruramiswa namaɓasa
Nokuti Rugwaro runoti kuɗiniko?
Ɀino kunounoɓate‐ɓasa, muɓairo haunzi ndowenyasha, asi ndoweŋgaʋa.
Kunousiŋgaɓati, asi unotenda kunaiye unoruramisa
Seɀinoreʋa ʋo Davidi, kuti wakaropafadzwa munhu unonzi naMŋari wakarurama, kunze kwamaɓasa,
Ʋakaropafadzwa ʋakakaŋganwirwa ɀisakarurama ɀaʋo,
Naʋakafukidzirwa ɀiʋi ɀaʋo;
Wakaropafadzwa munhu usiŋganzi naShe uneɀiʋi.
Ɀino kuropafadzwa uku ndokwaʋakadziŋgiswa, kana kwaʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa here? Nokuti tinoti, kunaAbrahama kutenda
Ɀino ɀakanzarwo seiko? Atodziŋgiswa, kana asina‐kudziŋgiswa here? Haɀina‐
wakapiwa ciratidzo cokudziŋgiswa, kuti ciʋe cisimbiso cokururama kwokutenda, kwaakaŋga ana’ko asati adziŋgiswa; kuti aʋe ɓaɓa ʋaʋose ʋanotenda, kunyaŋge ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, kuti ʋagonzi ʋakarurama;
ɓaɓa ʋokudziŋgiswa kunaiʋo ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa ɓedzi, asi ʋanofamba ʋo mumakwara okutenda kwaɓaɓa ʋeɗu Abrahama, kwaʋaiʋa nako ʋasati ʋadziŋgiswa.
Nokuti cipikirwa cokuti ucaʋa mugari wenhaka yenyika hacina‐kupiwa Abrahama kana rudzi rwake nomurairo, asi nokururama kwokutenda.
Nokuti ɗai ʋomurairo
nokuti murairo unoʋuyisa kutsamŋa; asi pasinomurairo hapana‐kuɗarika ʋo.
Saka ndeɀokutenda, kuti,
(seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Wakatenda netariro pasinetariro, kuti aʋe ɓaɓa ʋamarudzi mazhinji, seɀakaŋga ɀarebga,
Haana‐kushaiwa simba pakutenda, acifuŋga muʋiri wake wakaŋga watofa hawo (ɀaaiʋa namakore aneŋge zana), nokufa kweciɀaro caSara;
akatarira cipikirwa caMŋari, haanakunyunyuta nokusatenda, asi wakasimbiswa pakutenda, akakudza Mŋari,
aciziʋa kwaɀo, kuti ico caakapikira, wakaŋga anesimba rokuciita ʋo.
Saka ɀakanzi kwaari ndiko kururama.
Ɀino haɀina‐kunyorwa nokuɗa kwake ɓedzi, kuti ɀakanzarwo kwaari;
asi nokuɗa kweɗu ʋo; nesu ticanzarwo, iyesu, tinotenda kunowakamutsa Jesu, Ishe weɗu, kuʋakafa,
iye wakaiswa
Naiɀoɀo ɀatinoruramiswa nokutenda ŋgatiʋe norugare kunaMŋari naShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu;
watakawana naye mapindire nokutenda munyasha idzi, dzatinomira madziri; ŋgatifare netariro
Ɀisati ɀiri iɀo ɓedzi, asi ŋgatifare ʋo mumaɗambudziko, ticiziʋa kuti kutambudzika kunoʋuyisa kutsuŋgirira;
kutsuŋgirira
tariro hainyadzisi; nokuti ruɗo rwaMŋari rwakaɗirwa mumŋoyo yeɗu noMŋeya Mutȿene watakapiwa.
Nokuti ticiri pakushaiwa simba, Kristu paŋguʋa yakafanira wakafira ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari.
Nokuti ɀinorema kuti munhu afire wakarurama; nokuti ɀimŋe mumŋe uŋgatsuŋga kufira wakanaka.
Asi Mŋari unoratidza ruɗo rwake kwatiri pakuti Kristu wakatifira, ticiri ʋatadzi.
Ɀino, ɀatakaruramiswa muropa rake, ticaponeswa ɀikuru sei naye pakutsamŋa.
Nokuti ɀatakayananiswa naMŋari nokufa kwoMŋanakomana wake, ticiri ʋaʋeŋgi
ɀisati ɀiri iɀo ɓedzi, asi tinofara ɀikuru ʋo munaMŋari naShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, watakapiwa ɀino naye iko kuyananiswa.
Saka, ɀiʋi seɀaɀakapinda munyika nomunhu mumŋe, norufu
nokuti murairo usati waʋa’po, ɀiʋi ɀakaŋga ɀiri panyika; asi ɀiʋi haɀiʋereŋgerwi
Asi rufu rwakaɓata ʋushe kubva kunaAdama kuȿikira kunaMosesi, kunyaŋge napakati ʋo paʋasina‐kutadza nokuɗarika kwaAdama, waiʋa mufananidzo wowakaŋga acizoʋuya.
Asi cipo cokuŋgopiwa hacifanani nokuɗarika. Nokuti kana ʋazhinji ʋakafa nokuɗarika kwomumŋe, ɀikuru nyasha dzaMŋari necipo
Ʋuye cipo hacifanani ne
Nokuti kana nokuɗarika kwomumŋe rufu rwakaɓata ʋushe nomunhu uyu mumŋe; ɀikuru aʋo, ʋakapiwa kuwanda kwenyasha nokwecipo cokururama, ʋacaɓata ʋushe paʋupenyu nomumŋe, iye Jesu Kristu.
Naiɀoɀo,
Nokuti ʋazhinji sezaʋakaitwa ʋatadzi nokusaterera kwomumŋe, saiɀoɀo ʋazhinji ʋacaitwa ʋakarurama nokuterera kwomumŋe.
Murairo wakapinda ʋo kuti kuɗarika kuwande; ɀino ɀiʋi paɀakawanda, nyasha dzakawanda nokupfuʋurisa;
kuti ɀiʋi seɀaɀakaɓata ʋushe parufu, saiɀoɀo nyasha dziɓate ʋushe nokururama,
Ɀino ticatiyiko? Torambira muɀiʋi kuti nyasha dziwande here?
Haiȿa! Isu takafa kuɀiʋi, ticagara seiko mukati maɀo?
Ko hamuziʋi here kuti isu takabapatidzwa munaKristu Jesu, takabapatidzwa murufu rwake?
Naiɀoɀo pakubapatidzwa takaʋigwa pamŋe cete naye murufu; kuti saiye Kristu akamutswa kuʋakafa nokubginya kwaƂaɓa, saiɀoɀo nesu ʋo tifambe noʋupenyu bgutȿa.
Nokuti kana takaʋa ʋamŋe naye pakufanana naye parufu rwake, ticaɗaro ʋo pakumuka kwake;
ticiziʋa iɀi, kuti munhu weɗu wekare wakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa pamŋe cete naye, kuti muʋiri weɀiʋi ushaiswe simba, tirege kuzoʋa ʋaranda ʋeɀiʋi;
nokuti wakafa, waruramiswa paɀiʋi.
Ɀino kana takafa pamŋe cete naKristu, tinotenda kuti ticararama ʋo pamŋe cete naye;
ticiziʋa kuti Kristu, amutswa kuʋakafa, haacazofi; rufu harucaʋi nesimba pamsoro pake.
Nokuti pakufa kwake, wakafa kamŋe kwaɀo kuɀiʋi; ɀino pakurarama kwake, unorarama kunaMŋari.
Saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo muɀiti makafa kuɀiʋi, asi kuti muri ʋapenyu kunaMŋari, munaKristu Jesu.
Naiɀoɀo ɀiʋi ŋgaɀirege kuɓata ʋushe mumuʋiri wenyu unofa, kuti muterere kuciʋa kwawo;
ʋuye musapa ɀiʋi mitezo yenyu, kuti dziʋe nhumbi
Nokuti ɀiʋi haɀiŋgaʋi nesimba pamsoro penyu; nokuti hamuzi pasi pomurairo asi pasi penyasha.
Ɀino
Hamuziʋi here, kuti uyo wamunoɀipa kwaari kuti muʋe ʋaranda ʋake kumuterera, kuti muri ʋaranda ʋaiye wamunoterera; kana ʋeɀiʋi ɀinoisa kurufu, kana ʋokuterera kunoisa kukururama?
Asi Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, nokuti imi maiʋa ʋaranda ʋeɀiʋi, mukazoterera nomŋoyo rudzi
Makasunuŋgurwa paɀiʋi, mukaʋa ʋaranda ʋokururama.
Ndinotaura nokutaura kwaʋanhu, nokuɗa kwokushaiwa simba kwenyama yenyu; nokuti seɀamakapa mitezo yenyu kuti
Nokuti paŋguʋa iyo muciri ʋaranda ʋeɀiʋi, makaŋga makasunuŋguka pakururama.
Ɀino maiʋa neɀiɓereko ɀeiko paŋguʋa iyo paɀinhu iɀo ɀamunonyadziswa naɀo ɀino? Nokuti kuguma kwaɀo ndirwo rufu.
Asi ɀino makasunuŋgurwa paɀiʋi, maʋa ʋaranda ʋaMŋari, muneɀiɓereko ɀenyu ɀinoisa kuʋutȿene, ʋuye kuguma
Nokuti muɓairo weɀiʋi ndirwo rufu; asi cipo cokuŋgopiwa caMŋari ndibgo ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi munaKristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu.
Hamuziʋi here, hama
Nokuti mukadzi, unomurume, wakasuŋgwa nomurairo kumurume wake,
Naiɀoɀo ɀino kana akawanikwa nomumŋe murume, murume
Saka, hama dzaŋgu nemi ʋo makaitwa ʋakafa kumurairo nomuʋiri waKristu; kuti muʋe womumŋe, iye wakamutswa paʋakafa, kuti tiɓerekere Mŋari ɀiɓereko.
Nokuti paŋguʋa iyo ticiri munyama, kuciʋa kweɀiʋi, kwakamutswa nomurairo, kwakaɓata mumitezo yeɗu kuti kuɓereke ɀiɓereko
Asi ɀino takasunuŋgurwa pamurairo, takafa kunaiɀoɀo ɀatakaŋga takasuŋgwa naɀo; naiɀoɀo tinoɓatira
Ɀino ticatiyiko? Murairo ɀiʋi here? Haiȿa! Asi handizaiziʋa ɀiʋi kana murairo usaiʋa’po; nokuti handizaiziʋa kuciʋa, kana murairo usina‐kuti: Usaciʋa;
ɀino ɀiʋi ɀakawana nzira nomurairo, ɀikaita mandiri mitoʋo yose yokuciʋa; nokuti kunze kwomurairo ɀiʋi ɀakafa.
Ini ndaiʋa mupenyu kare kunze kwomurairo, asi mutemo ucizoȿika, ɀiʋi ɀakamuka, ini ndikafa;
nomutemo iwo
nokuti ɀiʋi ɀakawana nzira nomutemo, ɀikandinyeŋgera, ɀikandiʋuraya nawo.
Naiɀoɀo murairo mutȿene, nomutemo mutȿene, wakarurama, wakanaka.
Ko ɀino ɀakanaka ɀakazoʋa rufu kwandiri here? Haiȿa! Asi ndiɀo ɀiʋi, kuti ɀiratidzwe kuti ɀiʋi, ɀakandiitira rufu neɀakanaka; kuti nomutemo ɀiʋi ɀiʋe ɀakaipa kwaɀo‐kwaɀo.
Nokuti tinoziʋa kuti murairo ndowomŋeya; asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakateŋgeswa pasi peɀiʋi.
Nokuti ɀandinoita handiɀiziʋi; nokuti ɀandinoita haɀizi ɀandinoɗa; asi ɀandinoʋeŋga, ndiɀo ɀandinoita.
Ɀino kana ndiciita ɀandisiŋgadi, ndinobvumira kuti murairo wakanaka.
Ɀino handicini ndinoɀiita, asi ɀiʋi ɀinogara mandiri.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti mukati maŋgu, imo munyama yaŋgu, hamugari cinhu cakanaka; nokuti kuɗa kuri’po kwandiri, asi kuita ɀakanaka haku’po.
Nokuti ɀakanaka, ɀandinoɗa, handiɀiiti; asi ɀakaipa, ɀandisiŋgaɗi, ndiɀo ɀandinoita.
Ɀino kana ndiciita ɀandisiŋgaɗi, handicini ndinoɀiita, asi ɀiʋi ɀinogara mandiri.
Naiɀoɀo ndinowana murairo uyu kuti kana ndiciɗa kuita ɀakanaka, ɀakaipa ɀiri’po kwandiri.
Nokuti ndinofarira murairo waMŋari nomunhu womukati;
asi ndinoʋona mumŋe murairo pamitezo yaŋgu, unorwa nomurairo womuraŋgariro waŋgu, unonditapira kumurairo weɀiʋi uri pamitezo yaŋgu.
Ndiri munhu uri pakutambudzika! Ndianiko ucandisunuŋgura pamuʋiri worufu urwu?
Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, naJesu Kristu, Ishe weɗu. Naiɀoɀo nomuraŋgariro ndinoɓatira Mŋari, asi nenyama murairo weɀiʋi.
Naiɀoɀo hakucina‐kupiwa mhoȿa kunaʋari munaKristu Jesu.
Nokuti murairo woMŋeya woʋupenyu munaKristu Jesu wakandisunuŋgura pamurairo weɀiʋi noworufu.
Nokuti, ɀakaŋga ɀisiŋgakwaniswi nomurairo, pakushaiwa kwawo simba nokuɗa kwenyama, Mŋari pakutuma kwake Mŋanakomana wake nomufananidzo wenyama yeɀiʋi, nokuɗa kweɀiʋi, wakapa mhoȿa ɀiʋi ɀiri munyama;
kuti ɀakarebga nomurairo ɀiitike matiri, isu tisiŋgafambi nenyama, asi nomŋeya.
Nokuti ʋari ʋenyama ʋanofuŋga ɀenyama: asi ʋari ʋomŋeya,
Nokuti kufuŋga kwenyama ndirwo rufu; asi kufuŋga kwomŋeya ndibgo ʋupenyu norugare;
nokuti kufuŋga kwenyama kunoʋeŋgana naMŋari; nokuti hakuɀiisi pasi pomurairo waMŋari; hakugoni ʋo;
ɀino ʋari munyama haʋagoni kufadza Mŋari.
Asi imi hamuzi munyama, asi mumŋeya, kana Mŋeya waMŋari acigara ɀirokwaɀo mukati menyu. Asi kana munhu asinoMŋeya waKristu, haazi wake.
Kana Kristu ari mukati menyu, muʋiri wakafa nokuɗa kweɀiʋi, asi mŋeya mupenyu nokuɗa kwokururama.
Ɀino kana Mŋeya waiyeyo wakamutsa Jesu kuʋakafa acigara mukati menyu, iye wakamutsa Kristu Jesu kuʋakafa, ucaponesa miʋiri yenyu inofa noMŋeya wake, unogara mukati menyu.
Naiɀoɀo, hama
Nokuti kana mucifamba netsika dzenyama, mucafa; asi kana muciʋuraya maɓasa omuʋiri noMŋeya, mucararama;
nokuti ʋose ʋanotuŋgamirirwa noMŋeya waMŋari, ndiʋo ʋana ʋaMŋari.
Nokuti hamuna‐kupiwa mŋeya woʋuranda kuti mutye ɀe, asi makapiwa mŋeya wokuitwa ʋana, watinoɗana nawo,
Mŋeya amene unopupurirana nomŋeya weɗu, kuti tiri ʋana ʋaMŋari;
ɀino kana
Nokuti ndinoti maɗambudziko eŋguʋa ino haana‐kufanira kuenzaniswa nokubginya kucazoratidzwa kwatiri.
Nokuti ɀisikwa ɀinotarisisa ɀikuru ɀicimirira kuratidzwa kwaʋanakomana ʋaMŋari.
Nokuti ɀisikwa ɀakaiswa pasi peɀisiŋgagari, ɀisiŋgaɗi haɀo, asi nokuɗa kwaiye wakaɀiisa pasi paɀo,
ɀicitarira kuti ɀisikwa ɀimene ɀisunuŋgurwe ʋo paʋuranda bgokuʋora,
Nokuti tinoziʋa kuti ɀisikwa ɀose ɀinogomera nokurwadziwa pamŋe cete kuȿikira ɀino.
Ɀisati ɀiri iɀo ɓedzi, asi nesu ʋo,
Nokuti takaponeswa netariro; asi tariro inoʋonekwa, haizi tariro; nokuti ndiani unotarira caanoʋona?
Asi kana ticitarira catisiŋgaʋoni, tinocimirira nokutsuŋgirira.
Saiɀoɀo Mŋeya unoɓatirana ʋo nokusaʋa‐nesimba kweɗu; nokuti hatiziʋi kunyeŋgetera ɀakafanira; asi Mŋeya amene unotinyeŋgeterera nokugomera kusiŋgataurwi;
