uyo unonɀera mŋoyo, ndiye unoziʋa kufuŋga kwoMŋeya, nokuti unonyeŋgeterera ʋatȿene seɀinoɗa Mŋari.
Tinoziʋa kuti ɀinhu ɀose ɀinoɓatirana kuti ɀiitire ɀakanaka aʋo ʋanoɗa Mŋari, aʋo ʋakaɗanwa seɀaakafuŋga.
Nokuti ʋaakaziʋa kare, ndiʋo ʋaakatemera ʋo kare, kuti ʋafanane nomufananidzo woMŋanakomana wake, kuti aʋe ɗaŋgwe pakati pehama zhinji;
aʋo ʋaakatemera kare, ndiʋo ʋaakaɗana ʋo; ʋaakaɗana, ndiʋo ʋaakaruramisa ʋo; ʋaakaruramisa, ndiʋo ʋaakakudza ʋo.
Ɀino ticatiyiko paɀinhu iɀi? Kana Mŋari acitirwira, ndianiko ucatirwisa?
Iye usina‐kuramba kunyaŋge noMŋanakomana wake, asi wakamupa cose nokuɗa kweɗu tose, uŋgarega seiko kutipa ʋo ɀose pamŋe cete naye?
Ndianiko ucakwirira ʋasanaŋgurwa ʋaMŋari? Mŋari ndiye unoruramisa;
ndianiko uca
Ndianiko ucatiparadzanisa noruɗo rwaKristu? Kutambudzika, kana nhamo, kana kuʋeŋgwa, kana nzara, kana kushaiwa ɀokufuka, kana njodzi, kana munondo here?
Seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Nokuɗa kwenyu tinoʋurawa zuʋa rose;
Takanzi tiri makwai anoɓayiwa.
Kwete, paɀinhu iɀi ɀose tiri ʋakundi nokupfuʋurisa naiye wakatiɗa.
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kwaɀo kuti kunyaŋge rufu, kana ʋupenyu, kana ʋatumŋa, kana ʋakuru, kana ɀaɀino, kana ɀinoʋuya, kana masimba,
kana kwakakwirira, kana kwakadzika, kana cinhu cimŋe cakasikwa, haɀiŋgagoni kutiparadzanisa noruɗo rwaMŋari, ruri munaKristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu.
Ndinotaura ɀirokwaɀo munaKristu, handireʋi nhema, hana yaŋgu icindipupurira muMŋeya Mutȿene,
kuti ndineshuŋgu kwaɀo nokucema kusiŋgaperi mumŋoyo maŋgu.
Nokuti ndaiɗa kuti ini ndimene ndiʋe munhu wakatukwa, wakaparadzaniswa naKristu nokuɗa kwehama dzaŋgu, iʋo ʋorudzi rwaŋgu panyama;
ndiʋo ʋaIsraeri; kuʋa ʋana, nokubginya, nesuŋgano, nokupiwa murairo, nokunamata Mŋari, neɀipikirwa, ndeɀaʋo;
madziɓaɓa ndaaʋo, naKristu wakabva kwaʋari panyama, uri pamsoro paʋose, Mŋari unokudzwa nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Asi handiti shoko raMŋari rakakona. Nokuti ʋakabva kuʋaIsraeri haʋazi ʋaIsraeri ʋose;
naʋari ʋorudzi rwaAbrahama haʋazi ʋana
Ndokuti haʋazi ʋana ʋenyama ʋari ʋana ʋaMŋari; asi ʋana ʋokupikirwa, ndiʋo ʋanonzi rudzi.
Nokuti shoko rakapikirwa ndirori: Neŋguʋa yakaita seino ndicaʋuya, Sara ucaʋa nomŋanakomana.
Haɀizi iɀoɀo ɓedzi; asi Rebeka ʋo, wakati aʋa nemimba kunomumŋe,
nokuti
ɀakanzi kwaari: Mukuru ucaʋa muranda womuɗuku.
Seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Ɀino ticatiyiko? Kusarurama kuri’po kunaMŋari here? Haiȿa!
Nokuti unoti kunaMosesi: Ndicanzwira ŋgoni wandinonzwira ŋgoni, ndicanzwira tsitsi wandinonzwira tsitsi.
Naiɀoɀo haɀi
Nokuti Rugwaro runoti kunaFarao: Ndiɀo ɀandakakumutsira, kuti ndiratidze simba raŋgu kwauri, ʋuye kuti zita raŋgu riparidzwe panyika yose.
Naiɀoɀo unonzwira ŋgoni waanoɗa; ʋuye unowomesera
Ɀino iwe uŋgati kwandiri: Iye ucapireiko mhoȿa? Nokuti ndianiko unoramba kuɗa kwake?
Ko ɀino iwe munhu, ndiwe aniko, unopindura Mŋari? Ko cakaʋumbga ciŋgati kunowakaciʋumba: Wandiitireiko kuɗai?
Ko muʋumbi wehari haanesimba pamsoro pevu here, kuti neɓundu rimŋe aite mudziyo mumŋe wakakudzwa, nomumŋe usina‐kukudzwa?
Ɀino ticatiyiko kana Mŋari, kana akaŋga aciɗa kuratidza kutsamŋa kwake, nokuziʋisa simba rake, akaita nomŋoyo murefu ɀikuru pamsoro pemidziyo yokutsamŋirwa, yakagadzirirwa kuparadzwa,
kuti aziʋise kufuma kwokubginya kwake pamsoro pemidziyo yeŋgoni, yaakaŋga agadzirira kubginya,
iyesu ʋakaɗanwa ʋo naye, tisiŋgabvi kuʋaJuda ɓedzi, asi kuʋahedeni ʋo?
Seɀaanoreʋa ʋo
Aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu,
ndicaʋaidza ʋanhu ʋaŋgu;
Naiye wakaŋga asi muɗikanwa,
ndicamuidza muɗikanwa.
Ɀicaitika kuti paya pakaŋga parebga kwaʋari: Hamuzi ʋanhu ʋaŋgu,
Ipapo ʋacaidzwa ʋanakomana ʋaMŋari mupenyu.
NaIsaya unoɗana pamsoro paʋaIsraeri,
nokuti Ishe ucaita panyika shoko
Seɀaakamboreʋa Isaya ʋo,
Ƌai Ishe wehondo asina‐kutisiyira rudzi,
Tiŋgaɗai takaʋa seSodoma, takaitwa seGomora.
Ɀino ticatiyiko?
asi ʋaIsraeri ʋakati ʋacitȿaka murairo wokururama, haʋanakuȿika pamurairo iwoyo.
Neiko? Nokuti
Seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Tarira, ndinoisa paZioni ibge rokugumbusa, neɗombo rokupiŋganidza;
Unotenda kwaari, haaŋganyadziswi.
Hama
Nokuti ndinoʋapupurira kuti ʋanoshiŋgairira Mŋari, asi
Nokuti, ɀaʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaziʋi kururama kwaMŋari, ʋakatȿaka kumisa
Nokuti Kristu ndimugumo womurairo, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe unotenda aruramiswe.
Nokuti Mosesi unonyora, aciti, munhu, unoita kururama, kunorebga nomurairo, ucararama naɀo.
Asi kururama kunobva pakutenda, kunoreʋa kuɗai: Usati mumŋoyo mako: Ndianiko ucakwira kuɗeŋga? (ndiko kuɓurusa Kristu;)
kana, ndianiko ucaɓurukira kwakadzika‐dzika? (ndiko kuɓuɗisa Kristu kuʋakafa.)
Asi kunoreʋeiko? Shoko riri pedyo newe, mumuromo mako, nomumŋoyo mako; ndiro shoko rokutenda ratinoparidza;
kuti, kana ucipupura nomuromo wako
nokuti munhu unotenda nomŋoyo, ndokururamiswa; unopupura nomuromo, ndokuponeswa.
Nokuti Rugwaro runoti: Aninani unotenda kwaari, haaŋganyadziswi.
Nokuti muJuda nomuGiriki haʋasiyani; nokuti mumŋe ndiye Ishe waʋose, wakafuma kunaʋose ʋanoɗana kwaari;
nokuti aninani unoɗana kuzita raShe, ucaponeswa.
Ɀino ʋacagoɗana seiko kunaiye, waʋasina‐kutenda kwaari? Ʋacatenda seiko kunaiye, waʋasina‐kunzwa? Ʋacanzwa seiko
Ʋacaparidza seiko, kana ʋasiŋgatumŋi? Seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Asi ʋose haʋana‐kuterera mashoko omufaro. Nokuti Isaya unoti: Ishe, ndianiko wakatenda ɀatakaparidza?
Naiɀoɀo kutenda
Asi ndinoti: Haʋanakunzwa here? Hoŋo, ɀirokwaɀo,
Inzwi raʋo rakaɓuɗa kunyika yose,
Namashoko aʋo kumigumo yenyika.
Asi ndinoti: ƲaIsraeri haʋana‐kuziʋa here? Pakutaŋga Mosesi unoti:
Ndicamutsa goɗo renyu no
Ndicamutsa kutsamŋa kwenyu norudzi rusiŋganzwisisi.
NaIsaya, asiŋgatyi, unoti:
Ndakawanikwa naʋasina‐kunditȿaka,
Ndakaʋonekwa naʋasina‐kundibvunza.
Asi kuʋaIsraeri unoti: Ndakatambanudzira maʋoko aŋgu zuʋa rose kuʋanhu ʋasiŋgatereri, naʋanokakaʋara.
Ɀino ndinoti: Ko Mŋari wakarasha ʋanhu ʋake here? Haiȿa! Nokuti neni ʋo ndiri muIsraeri, worudzi rwaAbrahama, weimba yaBenjamini.
Mŋari haanakurasha ʋanhu ʋake ʋaakaziʋa pakutaŋga. Ko hamuziʋi kuti Rugwaro runoti kuɗini pamashoko aEria here? Kuti unokumbira kunaMŋari pamsoro paʋaIsraeri,
Ishe, ʋakaʋuraya ʋaprofita ʋenyu, ʋakaputsa artari dzenyu; ini ndakasiyiwa ndoga, ɀino ʋanotȿaka kundiʋuraya.
Asi Mŋari unomupindureiko?
Ɀino, saiɀoɀo neŋguʋa ino ʋo ʋari’ko ʋakasara, ʋakasanaŋgurwa nenyasha.
Ɀino kana
Ɀino ticatiyiko? ƲaIsraeri haʋana‐kuwana ɀaʋakaŋga ʋacitȿaka, asi ʋakasanaŋgurwa ndiʋo ʋakaɀiwana; ʋamŋe ʋakawomeswa,
seɀaɀakanyorwa,
NaDavidi ʋo unoti:
Tafura yaʋo ŋgaiitwe musuŋgo,
neriʋa,
Necigumbuso, necinotsiʋa kwaʋari:
Meso aʋo ŋgaaȿiɓirwe, ʋarege kuʋona;
Mukotamise misana yaʋo misi yose.
Ɀino ndinoti: Ʋakagumbuswa kuti ʋawe here? Haiȿa! Asi nokuwa kwaʋo ruponeso
Ɀino kana kuwa kwaʋo kwakafumisa nyika, nokutapudzwa kwaʋo kwakafumisa ʋahedeni, ɀikuru sei kuzara kwaʋo?
Ndinotaura kwamuri,
Ɀimŋe ndiŋgamutsa goɗo kunaʋenyama yaŋgu, ndiponese ʋamŋe ʋaʋo.
Nokuti kana kurashwa kwaʋo kuri kuyananiswa kwenyika, kugamucirwa
Ɀino kana ciɓereko cokutaŋga ciri citȿene, ɓundu
Ɀino, kana mamŋe mataʋi akavuniwa, iwe, muorivi wokuɗondo ukaɓatanidzwa pakati pawo, ukaʋa nomugoʋe pamŋe cete nawo pamudzi napamafuta omuorivi;
usaɀikudza pamsoro pamataʋi; kana uciɀikudza, hauzi iwe unotakura mudzi, asi mudzi ndiwo unoku
Ɀino iwe ucati, mataʋi akavuniwa, kuti ini ndiɓatanidzwe.
Ndiɀoɀo; ʋakavuniwa nokusatenda kwaʋo, iwe unomira nokutenda kwako. Usaɀikudza, asi utye;
nokuti kana Mŋari asina‐kurega mataʋi okutaŋga, haaŋgakuregi newe ʋo.
Ɀino tarira ʋunyoro nokukasharara kwaMŋari; kukasharara kunaʋakawa, asi kwauri ʋunyoro bgaMŋari, kana ucigara paʋunyoro bgake; kana ɀisakaɗaro, newe ucatemŋa ʋo.
Naiʋo ʋo, kana ʋasiŋgagari pakusatenda kwaʋo, ʋacaɓatanidzwa; nokuti Mŋari unogona kuʋaɓatanidza ɀe.
Nokuti kana iwe wakatemŋa kumuorivi, uri wokuɗondo pakusikwa
Nokuti hama
naiɀoɀo
PaZioni pacaɓuɗa Musunuŋguri;
Ucabvisa kusaɗa‐Mŋari kunaJakobo;
Iyi ndiyo suŋgano yaŋgu naʋo,
Musi wandicabvisa ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Kana iri Evaŋgeri, iʋo ʋaʋeŋgi
Nokuti ɀipo ɀaMŋari nokuɗana
Nokuti semi kare makaŋga musiŋgatereri Mŋari, asi ɀino makanzwirwa ŋgoni nokusaterera kwaʋo,
saiɀoɀo naiʋo ɀino haʋana‐kuterera, kuti neŋgoni dzakaitirwa imi naiʋo ʋanzwirwe ʋo ŋgoni.
Nokuti Mŋari wakaʋapfigira ʋose pakusaterera
Haiwa kufuma kwokucenjera nokuziʋa kwaMŋari kwakadzika sei! Kutoŋga kwake hakuŋganɀerwi, nenzira dzake hadziŋgarondwi!
Nokuti ndianiko wakaziʋa muraŋgariro waShe? Ndianiko wakaŋga ari murairi wake?
Ndianiko wakataŋga kumupa, kuti aripirwe ɀe?
Nokuti ɀose ɀinobva kwaari, ɀiri’po naye, ɀiri’po nokuɗa kwake. Ŋgaaʋe nokubginya nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Naiɀoɀo ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, hama
Musaenzaniswa nenyika ino; asi mushandurwe muraŋgariro wenyu uciʋandudzwa, kuti muidze muziʋe kuɗa kwaMŋari kwakanaka, kunofadza, kwakakwana.

Nokuti nenyasha dzandakapiwa, ndinoʋudza mumŋe nomumŋe uri pakati penyu, kuti arege kuɀifuŋga mukuru kupfuʋura paanofanira kufuŋga napo; asi afuŋge nokufuŋga kwakacenjera, mumŋe nomumŋe neciyero cokutenda, seɀaakagoʋerwa naMŋari.
Nokuti seɀatinemitezo mizhinji pamuʋiri mumŋe, asi mitezo yose haineɓasa rimŋe cete;
saiɀoɀo isu, tiri ʋazhinji, tiri muʋiri mumŋe cete munaKristu, mumŋe nomumŋe ari mutezo waʋamŋe.
Tineɀipo ɀakasiyana, patakapiwa nyasha napo; kana kuri kuprofita,
kana kuri kushumira,
kana kuri kuraira, pakuraira
Ruɗo ŋgarurege kuʋa nokunyeŋgera. Ʋeŋgai ɀakaipa; namatirai ɀakanaka.
Kana ruri ruɗo pakati paʋatendi, ɗanai noruɗo rukuru; pakukudzana tuŋgamiriranai.
Regai kuʋa noʋusimbe pakushiŋgaira; pisai pamŋeya; ɓatirai Ishe;
farai patariro; tsuŋgirirai pakutambudzika; rambai mucinyeŋgetera;
goʋanai naʋatȿene pakushaiwa kwaʋo; itirai ʋaeni ruɗo.
Ropafadzai ʋanokutambudzai; ropafadzai, musatuka.
Farai naʋanofara; cemai naʋanocema.
Iʋai nomŋoyo mumŋe pakati penyu. Musatȿaka ɀinorumbidzwa, asi mufambidzane naʋanoɀininipisa. Musati pamŋoyo yenyu makacenjera.
Musatsiʋa munhu cakaipa
Kana ɀicibvira, pamunogona napo, iʋai norugare naʋanhu ʋose.
Musatsiʋa, ʋaɗikanwa, asi mudziʋurire kutsamŋa; nokuti kwakanyorwa, kucinzi: Kutsiʋa ndokwaŋgu, ini ndicaripira — ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Ishe.
Asi kana muʋeŋgi wako aziya, umupe kudya; kana afa nenyota, umupe kunwa; nokuti kana uciita iɀoɀo, ucatutira mazimbe omŋoto pamusoro wake.
Usakundwa neɀakaipa, asi ukunde ɀakaipa neɀakanaka.
Munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaaɀiise pasi pamasimba makuru; nokuti hakunesimba
Saka unoramba simba, unodziʋisa ɀakaiswa’po naMŋari; ɀino iʋo ʋanodziʋisa, ʋanoɀitorera mhoȿa.
Nokuti ʋaɓati haʋatyisi
nokuti ndiye mushumiri waMŋari kwauri, kuti
Naiɀoɀo munofanira kuɀiisa pasi
Nokuti nemhaka iyo munoripa ʋo mutero; nokuti ndiʋo ʋaranda ʋaMŋari, ʋanoramba ʋaciŋgoɓatira cinhu ico.
Ripirai ʋose ɀaʋanofanira kuripirwa: Mutero kunaʋanofanira kutererwa; muripo kunaʋanofanira kuripirwa; kutya kunaʋanofanira kutyiwa; kukudza kunaʋanofanira kukudzwa.
Musaʋa necikwerete nomunhu, asi cokuɗana; nokuti unoɗa mumŋe, wazadzisa murairo.
Nokuti iɀo
Ruɗo haruitiri wokwako ɀakaipa; naiɀoɀo ruɗo runozadzisa murairo.
Ʋusiku bgapfuʋura, kwoedza; naiɀoɀo ŋgatirashe maɓasa erima, ŋgatishoŋge nhumbi dzokurwa dzeciedza.
Ŋgatifambe nenzira yakafanira sapamasikati; tisiŋgafambi nokutamba kwakaipa, nokuɓatwa, kana noʋupombge, noʋutere, kana negakaʋa, negoɗo.
Asi pfekai Ishe Jesu Kristu, musatȿaka kufadza nyama pakuciʋa kwayo.
Ɀino gamucirai usinesimba pakutenda
Mumŋe munhu unokutenda kuti uŋgadya ɀose; asi usinesimba unodya miriʋo.
Unodya ŋgaarege kuɀidza usiŋgadyi; usiŋgadyi ŋgaarege kupa mhoȿa unodya; nokuti Mŋari wakamugamucira.
Iwe ndiwe aniko unopa muranda womumŋe munhu mhoȿa? Iye unomira kana unowa pamberi paShe wake. Ucamiswa hake, nokuti Ishe unesimba rokumumisa.
Mumŋe munhu unoti zuʋa rimŋe rinopfuʋura rimŋe; mumŋe unoti mazuʋa ose
Uyo unoceŋgeta zuʋa, unoriceŋgeta nokuɗa kwaShe; uyo unodya, unodya nokuɗa kwaShe, nokuti unoʋoŋga Mŋari; uyo usiŋgadyi, haadyi nokuɗa kwaShe,
Nokuti hakunomumŋe weɗu unoɀiraramira iye oga, hakuna‐unoɀifira iye oga.
Nokuti kana ticirarama tinoraramira Ishe; kana ticifa, tinofira Ishe; ɀino kana ticirarama, kana ticifa, tiri ʋaShe.
Nokuti Kristu wakafira iɀoɀi, akararama ɀe kuti aʋe Ishe waʋose — ʋakafa naʋapenyu.
Ɀino iwe, unopireiko hama yako mhoȿa? Kana newe ʋo, unoɀidzireiko hama yako? Nokuti isu tose ticamira pacigaro cokutoŋga caMŋari.
Nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Noʋupenyu bgaŋgu — ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Ishe — ibvi rimŋe nerimŋe ricandifugamira,
Rurimi rumŋe norumŋe rucakudza Mŋari.
Naiɀoɀo mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu ucaɀiɗaʋirira kunaMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatirege kuramba ticitoŋgana; asi ɀirinani kuti mutoŋge, kuti munhu arege kuisa cigumbuso kana cinopiŋganidza pamberi pehama yake.
Ndinoziʋa, nokuziʋisisa kwaɀo munaShe Jesu, kuti hakunecinhu cinetȿina cimeme; asi uyo unoti, cinetȿina, kwaari cinetȿina.
Nokuti kana hama yako iciȿiɓiswa mŋoyo nokuɗa kweɀokudya, iwe haucafambi noruɗo. Usaparadza neɀokudya ɀako uyo wakafirwa naKristu.
Naiɀoɀo kunaka kwenyu ŋgakurege kuɀidzwa.
Nokuti ʋushe bgaMŋari haɀizi ɀokudya kana ɀokunwa, asi kururama, norugare, nomufaro muMŋeya Mutȿene.
Nokuti unoɓatira Kristu paɀinhu iɀi, unofadza Mŋari, ʋuye unotendwa naʋanhu.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatitȿake iɀo
Regai kuparadza ɓasa raMŋari nokuɗa kweɀokudya. Ɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka
Ɀakanaka kusadya nyama, kana kusanwa waini, kana
Kana uri iwe, kutenda kwaunako uʋe nako umene pamberi paMŋari. Wakaropafadzwa munhu uyo usiŋgaɀipi mhoȿa paɀinhu ɀaano
Asi uyo unonyunyuta waʋa nemhoȿa kana acidya, nokuti
Ɀino isu, tinesimba, tinofanira kutakura ʋutera bgaʋasinesimba, tisiŋgaɀifadzi.
Mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu ŋgaafadze wokwake paneɀakanaka ɀinosimbisa.
Nokuti Kristu ʋo haana‐kuɀifadza; asi seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Nokuti ɀose ɀakanyorwa kare, ɀakanyorwa kuti isu tidzidze kuti tiʋe netariro inobva pakutsuŋgirira napakunyaradza kwaMagwaro.
Ɀino Mŋari wokutsuŋgirira nowokunyaradza ŋgaakupei mŋoyo mumŋe pakati penyu, seɀinoɗa Kristu Jesu;
kuti mukudze Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, nomŋoyo mumŋe ʋuye nomuromo mumŋe.
Saka gamuciranai, Kristu seɀaakatigamucira, kuti Mŋari akudzwe.
Nokuti ndinoti: Kristu wakaitwa mushumiri wokudziŋgiswa
Ʋuye, kuti ʋahedeni ʋakudze Mŋari nokuɗa kweŋgoni dzake; seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Naiɀoɀo ndicakurumbidzai pakati paʋahedeni,
Nokukuimbirai zita renyu.
Ʋuye ɀe unoti:
Farai imi ʋahedeni, naʋanhu ʋake.
Ʋuye ɀe:
Rumbidzai Ishe, imi ʋahedeni ʋose;
Marudzi ose ŋgaamukudze.
Ʋuye ɀe, Isaya unoti:
Mudzi waJese ucaʋa’po,
Naiye unomuka, kuti aɓate ʋahedeni;
Ʋahedeni ʋacamutarira iye.
Ɀino Mŋari wetariro ŋgaakuzadzei nomufaro wose norugare pakutenda
Ɀino, hama dzaŋgu, ini ndimene ndinoziʋa kwaɀo pamsoro penyu, kuti imi mumene muzere nokunaka, makazadzwa nokuziʋa kwose, munogona ʋo kurairana.
Asi ndinokunyorerai ɀimŋe ndicinyanya kutsuŋga,
kuti ndiʋe muranda waKristu Jesu kuʋahedeni, ndiciita ɓasa roʋuprista paEvaŋgeri yaMŋari, kuti ciɓayiro caʋahedeni cifadze
Naiɀoɀo ndiŋgaɀirumbidza munaKristu Jesu paɀinhu ɀaMŋari.
Nokuti ndiŋgatya kutaura ɀimŋe ɀinhu, asi iɀo Kristu ɀaakaita neni, kuti ʋahedeni ʋaterereswe neshoko namaɓasa,
nesimba reɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa, nesimba roMŋeya Mutȿene; nokuɗaro kubva Jerusarema nenyika yakapoteredza, kuȿikira Iririko, ndakaparidza kwaɀo Evaŋgeri yaKristu;
ndicishiŋgairira cinhu ici kuti ndiparidze Evaŋgeri, apo pasina‐kumborebga zita raKristu, kuti ndirege kuʋaka pamsoro penheyo dzomumŋe munhu;
asi, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Aʋo, ʋasina‐kuʋudzwa ɀake, ʋacaʋona;
Naiʋo ʋasina‐kunzwa ʋacanzwisisa.
Naiɀoɀo ndakadziʋiswa ʋo kazhinji kuʋuya kwamuri;
ɀino ɀandisinapokuɓata panyika idzi, ʋuye ɀaaʋa makore mazhinji ndiciɗa ɀikuru kuʋuya kwamuri,
kana ndicienda Spania,
Asi ɀino ndomboenda Jerusarema kundoshumira ʋatȿene.
Nokuti ʋeMakedonia naʋeAkaya ʋakati ɀakanaka kuti ʋagoʋane naʋarombo paʋatȿene ʋari paJerusarema.
Nokuti ʋakati ɀakanaka; ʋaneŋgaʋa naʋo. Nokuti kana ʋahedeni ʋakaitwa ʋagoʋani naʋo paɀinhu ɀoMŋeya, ʋaneŋgaʋa ʋo rokuʋashumira paɀinhu ɀenyama.
Naiɀoɀo kana ndapedza cinhu ici, ndikaʋaʋigira ciɓereko ici, ndicaenda Spania nokwenyu.
Ndinoziʋa kuti kana ndiciʋuya kwenyu, ndicaʋuya nokuropafadza kwakazara kwaKristu.
Ɀino ndinokumbira ɀikuru, hama
kuti ndisunuŋgurwe kunaʋasiŋgatereri muJudea, ʋuye kuti kushumira kwaŋgu kunaʋeJerusarema kufadze ʋatȿene;
kuti ndiʋuye kwamuri nomufaro nokuɗa kwaMŋari, ndiwane zororo pamŋe cete nemi.
Ɀino Mŋari worugare ŋgaaʋe nemi mose. Ameni.
Ndinoreʋerera kwamuri Fibi, hanɀadzi yeɗu, mushandiri wekereke iri paKenkrea.
Kuti mumugamucire munaShe, seɀinofanira ʋatȿene, nokumuɓatsira paɀinhu ɀose ɀaaŋgashaiwa; nokuti iye amene wakaɓatsira ʋazhinji, neni ʋo ndimene.
ʋakaisa mitsipa yaʋo kurwira ʋupenyu bgaŋgu; ʋandisiŋgaʋoŋgi ini ndoga, asi nekereke dzose dzaʋahedeni.
kwazisirei ʋo kereke iri paimba yaʋo.
kwazisirei Maria, wakakuɓatsirai ɀikuru.
kwazisirei Androniko naJunia, worudzi rwaŋgu, ʋakasuŋgwa pamŋe cete neni, ʋakakurumbira pakati paʋaapostora, ʋakanditaŋgira ʋo kuʋa munaKristu.
kwazisirei Ampriato, muɗikanwa waŋgu munaShe.
kwazisirei Urbano, unoɓata nesu munaKristu, naStako, muɗikanwa waŋgu.
wazisirei Apere, wakatendwa munaKristu.
kwazisirei Herodio worudzi rwaŋgu.
kwazisirei Trifaina naTrifosa, ʋanoɓata munaShe.
kwazisirei Rufosi, musanaŋgurwa munaShe, namai ʋake, naʋaŋgu.
kwazisirei Asinkrito, naFregoni, naHermesi, naPatrobasi, naHermasi, nehama dziri kwaʋari.
kwazisirei Firorogosi, naJuria, naNerea, nehanɀadzi yake, naOrimpasi, naʋatȿene ʋose ʋari kwaʋari.
Kwazisanai nokuȿeta kutȿene. Kereke dzose dzaKristu dzinokukwazisai.
Ɀino ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, hama
Nokuti ʋakaɗaro haʋaɓatiri Ishe weɗu Kristu, asi ɗumbu raʋo; ʋanonyeŋgera mŋoyo yaʋasina‐ɀakaipa namashoko aʋo akanaka, anoɓata kumeso.
Nokuti kuterera kwenyu kwakaȿika kuʋanhu ʋose. Naiɀoɀo ndinofara pamsoro penyu; asi ndinoɗa kuti muʋe ʋakacenjera kuneɀakanaka, asi ʋasinenjere kuneɀakaipa.
Ɀino Mŋari worugare ucakurumidza kupxanya Satani pasi petsoka dzenyu.
Nyasha dzaShe weɗu Jesu ŋgadziʋe nemi.
Timotio, unoɓata neni, unokukwazisai; naRukio, naJasoni, naSosipatrosi, ʋorudzi rwaŋgu.
Ini Tertiosi, unonyora ŋwadi iyi, ndinokukwazisai munaShe.
Gaiosi, wakandigamucira ini nekereke yose, unokukwazisai.
Erastosi, muceŋgeti wemari yeguta, unokukwazisai, naKwartosi ʋo, hama.
Ɀino iye, unogona kukusimbisai, seɀinoreʋa Evaŋgeri yaŋgu, nokuparidzwa kwaJesu Kristu, nokuzarurwa kweɀakaʋanzika, ɀisina‐kurebga ŋguʋa dzisiŋgaperi,
asi ɀino ɀinoratidzwa nokuziʋiswa kumarudzi ose, naMagwaro aʋaprofita, seɀakarairwa naMŋari usiŋgaperi, kuti ʋaterere nokutenda;
iye Mŋari wakacenjera oga, ŋgaaʋe nokubginya naJesu Kristu nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Pauro, wakaɗanwa nokuɗa kwaMŋari,
kukereke yaMŋari iri paKorinte, kunaʋakaitwa ʋatȿene munaKristu Jesu, ʋakaɗanwa
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare runobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Ndinogara ndiciʋoŋga Mŋari ŋguʋa dzose nokuɗa kwenyu, pamsoro penyasha dzaMŋari dzamakapiwa munaKristu Jesu;
kuti makafumiswa paɀose maari, pakutaura kwose, napakuziʋa kwose;
nokuɗaro ʋucapupu bgaKristu bgakasimbiswa mamuri;
kuti hamushaiwi cipo cimŋe; mucimirira kuratidzwa kwaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu;
ucakusimbisai kuȿikira pakuguma, muʋe ʋasiŋgapomerwi pazuʋa raShe Jesu Kristu.
Mŋari ndiye wakatendeka, wamakaɗanwa naye kuyanana noMŋanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu, Ishe weɗu.
Ɀino ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, hama
Nokuti ndakaʋudzwa pamsoro penyu, hama dzaŋgu, naʋari ʋokwaKroe, kuti kunegakaʋa pakati penyu.
Ɀandinoreʋa ndiɀo, kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu unoti: Ini ndiri waPauro, ini waAporo, ini waKefasi, ini waKristu.
Ko Kristu wakaparadzaniswa here? Ko Pauro wakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa nokuɗa kwenyu here? Ko makabapatidzwa muzita raPauro here?
Ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari, kuti handina‐kubapatidza mumŋe wenyu, asi Krispo naGayo;
kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu uŋgati, makabapatidzwa muzita raŋgu.
Ndakabapatidza ʋo ʋeimba yaStefana; asi ʋamŋe, handiziʋi kana ndakabapatidza mumŋe.
Nokuti Kristu haana‐kundituma kubapatidza, asi kuti ndiparidze Evaŋgeri; ndisiŋgaiti nenjere dzamashoko, kuti mucinjikwa waKristu urege kukoneswa.
Nokuti shoko romucinjikwa ʋupenzi kunaʋanoparadzwa; asi kwatiri, isu tinoponeswa, isimba raMŋari.
Nokuti kwakanyorwa
Ndicaparadza ʋucenjeri bgaʋakacenjera,
Ndicakonesa kuziʋa kwaʋanoziʋa.
Wakacenjera uripiko? Munyori uripiko? Muiti wenharo wenyika ino uripiko? Mŋari haana‐kuita ʋucenjeri bgenyika bguʋe ʋupenzi here?
Nokuti noʋucenjeri bgaMŋari, nyika noʋucenjeri
Nokuti ʋaJuda ʋanokumbira ɀiratidzo, naʋaGiriki ʋanotȿaka ʋucenjeri;
asi isu tinoparidza Kristu, wakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa, cigumbuso kuʋaJuda, noʋupenzi kuʋahedeni;
asi kunaʋakaɗanwa, ʋaJuda naʋaGiriki, Kristu isimba raMŋari, noʋucenjeri bgaMŋari.
Nokuti ʋupenzi bgaMŋari bgunopfuʋura ʋanhu noʋucenjeri; noʋutera bgaMŋari bgunopfuʋura ʋanhu nesimba.
Nokuti tarirai kuɗanwa kwenyu, hama
asi Mŋari wakatsaura ɀinhu ɀoʋupenzi ɀenyika, kuti anyadzise ʋakacenjera; Mŋari wakatsaura ɀinhu ɀisinesimba ɀenyika, kuti anyadzise iɀo ɀinesimba;
Mŋari wakatsaura ɀinhu ɀinoɀidzwa ɀenyika, neɀinoshoʋorwa, neɀinhu ɀisi’po, kuti ashaise ɀiri’po simba
kuti kurege kuʋa nenyama iŋgaɀikudza pamberi paMŋari.
Asi naye muri munaKristu Jesu, iye wakatiitirwa isu ʋucenjeri bgunobva kunaMŋari, nokururama, noʋutȿene, norudzikinuro.
Kuti unoɀirumbidza, ngaaɀirumbidze munaShe, seɀaɀakanyorwa.
Ɀino ini, hama
Nokuti ndakati, handiŋgaziʋi cinhu pakati penyu, asi Jesu Kristu, iye wakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa.
Ndakaŋga ndiri pakati penyu noʋutera, nokutya, nokuɗeɗera kukuru,
neshoko raŋgu nokuparidza kwaŋgu haɀizaiʋa namashoko okugombedzera oʋucenjeri; asi nokuratidza kwoMŋeya nokwesimba;
kuti kutenda kwenyu kurege kuʋa muʋucenjeri bgaʋanhu, asi musimba raMŋari.
Ɀino tinotaura ʋucenjeri pakati paʋakakura; asi ʋucenjeri bgusati bguri bgenyika ino, kana bgaʋaɓati ʋenyika ino ʋanoshaiswa simba.
Asi tinotaura ʋucenjeri bgaMŋari bgakaʋanzika, bgakafukidzwa, bgakatemerwa kubginya kweɗu naMŋari, nyika isati yaʋa’po;
bgusina‐kuzikanwa nomumŋe waʋaɓati ʋenyika ino; nokuti ɗai ʋaibguziʋa, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋaisaroʋera Ishe wokubginya pamucinjikwa.
Asi seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Iɀo ɀisina‐kuʋonekwa neziso, kana kunzwika nenzeʋe,
Neɀisina‐kupinda mumŋoyo womunhu,
Ndiɀo Mŋari ɀaakagadzirira ʋanomuɗa.
Nokuti Mŋari wakaɀiratidza iɀo kwatiri isu noMŋeya; nokuti Mŋeya unonɀera ɀose, neɀakadzika ɀaMŋari.
Nokuti munhu ndoupiko unoziʋa ɀomunhu, asi mŋeya womunhu uri maari? Saiɀoɀo hakunomunhu unoziʋa ɀaMŋari, asi Mŋeya waMŋari.
Ɀino isu hatina‐kugamucira mŋeya wenyika, asi Mŋeya unobva kunaMŋari; kuti tiziʋe iɀo ɀatakaŋgopiwa heɗu naMŋari.
Ndiɀo ɀatinotaura ʋo, tisiŋgatauri namashoko a
Ɀino munhu seɀaakaɓerekwa haagamuciri ɀinhu ɀoMŋeya waMŋari; nokuti ʋupenzi kwaari; haaɀinzwisisi, nokuti ɀinonzwisiswa noMŋeya.
Asi uri woMŋeya unonzwisisa ɀose, asi iye amene haanzwisiswi nomunhu.
Nokuti ndianiko wakaziʋa muraŋgariro waShe, kuti amudzidzise? Asi isu tinomuraŋgariro waKristu.
Ini, hama
Ndakakupai mukaka munwe, handina‐
Nokuti muciri ʋenyama; nokuti ɀapacinegoɗo pakati penyu, negakaʋa, ko hamuzi ʋenyama, mucifamba nomutoʋo waʋanhu here?
Nokuti kana mumŋe aciti: Ini ndiri waPauro; mumŋe: Ini ndiri waAporo; ko hamuzi ʋanhu here?
Ɀino Aporo cinyiko? Pauro cinyiko? Ʋashumiri ʋamakatenda naʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakapiwa naShe.
Ini ndakasima, Aporo wakaɗiridza; asi Mŋari wakameresa.
Naiɀoɀo unosima haazi cinhu, kana unoɗiridza; asi Mŋari unomeresa.
Ɀino unosima nounoɗiridza ndaʋamŋe; asi mumŋe nomumŋe ucapiwa muɓairo wake, seɀaakaɓata.
Nokuti tiri ʋaɓati pamŋe cete naMŋari; muri munda waMŋari, muri imba yaMŋari.
Nenyasha dzaMŋari dzandakapiwa, ndakaroŋga nheyo somuʋaki wakacenjera; mumŋe unoʋaka pamsoro padzo. Ɀino mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaacenjere kuti unoʋaka sei pamsoro padzo.
Nokuti hakunomumŋe uŋgaroŋga dzimŋe nheyo, asi idzo dzakaroŋgwa kare, ndiye Jesu Kristu.
Ɀino kana munhu aciʋaka pamsoro penheyo idzi, ndarama,
ɓasa romumŋe nomumŋe ricaʋonekwa; nokuti zuʋa
Kana ɓasa romunhu raakaʋaka pamsoro padzo, ricigara, ucapiwa muɓairo.
Kana ɓasa romunhu rikapiswa, ucarashikirwa, asi iye amene ucaponeswa, asi sowakaɓuɗa pamŋoto.
Ko hamuziʋi kuti muri tembere yaMŋari, ʋuye kuti Mŋeya waMŋari unogara mukati menyu here?
Kana munhu acitadzira tembere yaMŋari, Mŋari ucamutadzira ʋo; nokuti tembere yaMŋari itȿene, ndimi iyo.
Kurege kuʋa nomunhu unoɀinyeŋgera. Kana munhu aciti ndakacenjera pakati penyu panyika ino, ŋgaaʋe ɓenzi, kuti aʋe wakacenjera.
Nokuti ʋucenjeri bgenyika ino ʋupenzi kunaMŋari. Nokuti kwakanyorwa
Ʋuye ɀe: Ishe unoziʋa ndaŋgariro dzaʋakacenjera, kuti hadzinamaturo.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unoʋimba naʋanhu. Nokuti ɀinhu ɀose ndeɀenyu;
kana Pauro, kana Aporo, kana Kefasi, kana nyika, kana ʋupenyu, kana rufu, kana ɀaɀino, kana ɀinoʋuya; ɀose ndeɀenyu;
imi muri ʋaKristu; naKristu ndowaMŋari.
Munhu
Ɀino, paɀinhu iɀi, paʋatariri panotȿakwa, kuti munhu awanikwe akatendeka.
Ɀino cinhu ciɗuku‐ɗuku kwandiri, kuti nditoŋgwe nemi, kana nokutoŋga kwomunhu; handiɀitoŋgi ini ndimene.
Nokuti handiziʋi mhoȿa yandinayo; asi handiruramiswi naiɀoɀo; asi unonditoŋga ndiye’She.
Saka regai kutoŋga cinhu ŋguʋa isati yaȿika, kuȿikira Ishe aʋuya, iye ucaɓuɗisa pacena ɀinhu ɀakaʋanzika ɀerima, nokuratidza mifuŋgo yomŋoyo; ipapo munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ucarumbidzwa naMŋari.
Ɀino, hama
Nokuti ndianiko wakakutsaura iwe? Cinyiko caunaco causina‐kupiwa? Ɀino kana wakapiwa, unoɀikudzireiko sousina‐kupiwa?
Matoguta, matofuma, maɓata ʋushe kunze kweɗu; ɗai maiɓata ʋushe henyu, kuti isu tiɓate ʋo pamŋe cete nemi.
Nokuti ndinoti Mŋari wakatigadza isu ʋaapostora pakupedzisira, sa
Isu tiri mapenzi nokuɗa kwaKristu, asi imi makacenjera munaKristu; isu tinoshaiwa simba, asi imi munesimba; imi munokudzwa, asi isu tinoɀidzwa.
Kuȿikira ŋguʋa ino isu tinenzara, tinenyota, hatina‐catiŋgafuka, tinorobga netsiʋa, hatinenɀimbo kwayo yokugara;
tinotambudzika, ticiɓata namaʋoko eɗu; kana ticitukwa, tinoropafadza, kana ticitambudzwa, tinotsuŋga mŋoyo;
kana ticipomerwa, tinoʋaraidza; takaitwa setȿina yenyika, marara aʋose kuȿikira ɀino.
Handikunyoreriyi ɀinhu iɀi, kuti ndikunyadzisei, asi kuti ndikurairei saʋana ʋangu ʋanoɗikanwa.
Nokuti kunyaŋge maiʋa naʋadzidzisi ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi munaKristu, ha
Naiɀoɀo ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, kuti muʋe ʋateʋeri ʋaŋgu.
Nemhaka iyi ndakatuma Timotio kwamuri, mŋana waŋgu unoɗikanwa, wakatendeka munaShe; iye ucakuyeʋudzai mitoʋo yaŋgu iri munaKristu Jesu, seɀandinodzidzisa kwose pakereke dzose.
Ɀino ʋamŋe ʋanoɀikudza,
Ndicakurumidza kuʋuya kwamuri, kana Ishe aciɗa; handiŋgaziʋi shoko raiʋaʋo ʋanoɀikudza, asi simba
Nokuti ʋushe bgaMŋari habguzi pamashoko, asi pasimba.
Munotȿakeiko? Ndiʋuye kwamuri neshamhu, kana noruɗo nomŋeya woʋunyoro here?
Ʋanhu ʋose ʋanoti ʋupombge bguri’po pakati penyu, ʋupombge bgakaɗaro bgusiŋgazikanwi kunyaŋge pakati paʋahedeni, bgokuti mumŋe unogara nomukadzi waɓaɓa ʋake.
Munoɀikudza, haɀizaiʋa nani here kana makacema, kuti uyo wakaɓateɓasa iri abviswe pakati penyu?
Nokuti ini, ɀirokwaɀo, kunyaŋge ndisi’po nomuʋiri, asi ndiri’po haŋgu nomŋeya, ndatotoŋgesa uyo wakaita cinhu ici, sendineŋge ndiri’po,
nemi, makaʋuŋgana pamŋe cete nomŋeya waŋgu nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, nesimba raShe weɗu Jesu,
kuti
Kuɀirumbidza kwenyu hakuna‐kunaka. Ko hamuziʋi kuti mbiriso shoma inoʋirisa ɓundu rose here?
Bvisai mbiriso yekare, kuti muʋe ɓundu idɀa, seɀamusina‐kuʋiriswa. Nokuti paseka yeɗu, yakatiɓayirwa, ndiKristu;
saka ŋgatiite mutambo, tisiŋgaiti nembiriso yekare, kana nembiriso yokushata nokuipa; asi neciŋgwa cisina‐kuʋiriswa cokururama neɀokwaɗi.
Ndakakunyorerai neŋwadi
ha

Asi ɀino ndinokunyorerai, kuti murege kufambidzana nomunhu unoidzwa hama, kana ari mhombge, kana unoruciʋa, kana unonamata ɀifananidzo, kana mutuki, kana unosinwa ɗoro, kana gororo; musadya nowakaɗai.
Nokuti ini ndicatoŋgereiko ʋari kunze? Ko imi hamutoŋgi ʋari pakati
Asi aʋo ʋari kunze. Mŋari unoʋatoŋga. Bvisai pakati penyu munhu uyo wakaipa.
Ko kana mumŋe wenyu anemhoȿa nomumŋe, uŋgatsuŋga kumukwirira kunaʋasakarurama,
Hamuziʋi here kuti ʋatȿene ʋacatoŋga nyika? Ɀino kana nyika icitoŋgwa nemi, ko imi hamufaniri kutoŋga mhoȿa ɗuku‐ɗuku here?
Hamuziʋi here kuti ticatoŋga ʋatumŋa? Ɀikuru sei iɀo ɀoʋupenyu bguno!
Ɀino kana munemhoȿa dzoʋupenyu bguno dzinofanira kutoŋgwa, munogadza seiko aʋo ʋanoɀidzwa pakereke, kuti iʋo ʋatoŋge?
Ndinoɗaro kuti munyadziswe. Ko hakuna‐wakacenjera pakati penyu uŋgagona kutoŋga pakati pehama nehama yake here?
Asi hama inokwirira hama,
Ɀino matoʋa nemhoȿa kwaɀo pakati penyu, ɀamunokwirirana. Munoregereiko kutenda kuitirwa ɀisakarurama? Munoregereiko kutenda kuɓirwa?
Asi imi munoita ɀisakarurama, munonyeŋgera,
Ko hamuziʋi kuti ʋasakarurama haʋaŋgagari nhaka yoʋushe bgaMŋari here? Musarashika; nokuti mhombge, kana ʋanonamata ɀifananidzo, kana ʋanofeʋa, kana ʋakapata, kana ʋanoita ɀakaipa naʋarume,
kana mbava, kana ʋanoruciʋa, kana ʋanosinwa ɗoro, kana ʋatuki, kana makororo, haʋaŋgagari nhaka yoʋushe bgaMŋari.
Ʋamŋe ʋenyu ʋakaŋga ʋakaɗaro; asi makashambidzwa, asi makaitwa ʋatȿene, asi makaruramiswa nezita raShe Jesu Kristu, noMŋeya waMŋari weɗu.
Ndakatenderwa ɀinhu ɀose; asi ɀinhu ɀose haɀindiɓatsiri. Ndakatenderwa ɀinhu ɀose, asi handiɗi kukundwa necinhu cimŋe.
Ɀokudya ndeɀeɗumbu, neɗumbu ndereɀokudya; asi Mŋari ucaparadza iro naiɀo, ɀose. Asi muʋiri hauzi woʋupombge, asi ndowaShe; naShe ndowomuʋiri;
Mŋari wakamutsa Ishe, ʋuye ucatimutsa isu nesimba rake.
Hamuziʋi kuti miʋiri yenyu mitezo yaKristu here? Ɀino ndobvisa mitezo yaKristu, ndiiite mitezo yemhombge here? Haiȿa!
Hamuziʋi kuti wakasoŋganiswa nemhombge waʋa muʋiri mumŋe naye here? Nokuti
Asi wakasoŋganiswa naShe, waʋa mŋeya mumŋe
Tizai ʋupombge. Ɀiʋi ɀose, ɀinoitwa nomunhu, ɀiri kunze kwomuʋiri; asi unoita ʋupombge, unotadzira muʋiri wake.
Hamuziʋi here kuti muʋiri wenyu itembere yoMŋeya Mutȿene, uri mukati menyu, wamakapiwa naMŋari? Hamuzi ʋenyu;
nokuti makateŋgwa nomuteŋgo; naiɀoɀo kudzai Mŋari mumuʋiri wenyu.
Ɀino kana ɀiri ɀamakandinyorera,
Asi nokuɗa kwoʋupombge,
Murume ŋgaape mukadzi ɀakafanira; nomukadzi ŋgaaɗaro ʋo kumurume.
Mukadzi haanesimba pamsoro pomuʋiri wake, asi murume; saiɀoɀo ʋo murume haanesimba pamsoro pomuʋiri wake, asi mukadzi.
Musanyimana, asi muciita ŋguʋa ɗuku, mambotenderana, kuti muʋe neŋguʋa yokunyeŋgetera, ndokusoŋgana ɀe, kuti Satani arege kukuidzai pakusagona kwenyu kuɀidzora.
Asi ndinotaura iɀi, ndicikutenderai, ndisiŋgarairi.
Nokuti ndinoɗa kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋaʋe seni. Asi munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unecipiwa cake, cinobva kunaMŋari, mumŋe corudzi urwu, mumŋe corumŋe rudzi.
Asi ndinoti kunaʋasina‐kuwana, nokucirikadzi: Ɀakanaka kuti ʋagare seni.
Asi kana ʋasiŋgagoni kuɀidzora, ŋgaʋawane; nokuti ɀirinani kuti ʋawane pakutȿa.
Ɀino ʋakawana ndinoʋaraira, asi handizini, ndiShe, kuti mukadzi arege kubva kumurume
(kana acibva, ŋgaagare asiŋgawanikwi, kana ayanane nomurume wake); nomurume ŋgaarege kurasha mukadzi
Ɀino kunaʋamŋe ndinoti ini, haazi Ishe: Kana hama inomukadzi usiŋgatendi, kana iye aciɗa hake kugara naye, ŋgaarege kumurasha.
Nomukadzi unomurume usiŋgatendi, kana iye aciɗa hake kugara naye, ŋgaarege kurasha murume wake,
nokuti murume usiŋgatendi unoitwa mutȿene nomukadzi wake, nomukadzi usiŋgatendi unoitwa mutȿene nomurume; kana ɀisina‐kuɗaro, ʋana ʋenyu ʋaiʋa netȿina; asi ɀino ʋatȿene.
Ɀino kana usiŋgatendi acienda, ŋgaaende hake. Hama, kana iri murume kana mukadzi, haisuŋgwi neɀakaɗaro; asi Mŋari wakakuɗanai kuti muʋe norugare.
Nokuti iwe mukadzi unoziʋa seiko kuti ucaponesa murume wako? Kana iwe murume, unoziʋa seiko kuti ucaponesa mukadzi wako?
Asi, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakagoʋerwa naShe, mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakaɗanwa naMŋari, ŋgaafambe saiɀoɀo. Ndiɀo ɀandinoraira pakereke dzose.
Kana mumŋe aciŋge akaɗanwa akadziŋgiswa, ŋgaarege kuitwa usakadziŋgiswa; kana mumŋe aciŋge akaɗanwa asakadziŋgiswa, ŋgaarege kudziŋgiswa.
Kudziŋgiswa hacizi cinhu, nokusadziŋgiswa hacizi cinhu, asi kuceŋgeta mirairo yaMŋari.
Mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaagare pakuɗanwa kwaakaɗanwa nako.
Wakaɗanwa uri muranda here? Usaɀidya mŋoyo; asi kana uŋgasunuŋgurwa, ɀirinani kuti uɗaro hako.
Nokuti wakaɗanwa munaShe, ari muranda, waʋa musunuŋgurwa waShe; saiɀoɀo ʋo, wakaɗanwa akasunuŋguka, waʋa muranda waKristu.
Makateŋgwa nomuteŋgo; regai kuʋa ʋaranda ʋaʋanhu.
Hama dzaŋgu, mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaagare pamberi paMŋari ipapo paakaɗanwa napo.
Ɀino, pamsoro pemhandara, handinomurairo waShe; asi ndinotaura somunhu wakapiwa ŋgoni naShe kuti aʋe wakatendeka.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoti nokuɗa kwenhamo ino, ɀakanaka kuti munhu agare akaɗaro.
Wakaɓatanidzwa nomukadzi here? Usatȿaka kusunuŋgurwa. Wakasunuŋgurwa pamukadzi here? Usatȿaka mukadzi.
Ɀino kana wawana, hauna‐kutadza; nemhandara kana yawanikwa, hainakutadza. Asi ʋakaɗaro ʋacaʋa neɗambudziko panyama; asi ini ndinoɗa kukutaʋirai.
Ɀino ndinoɀitaura iɀi, hama
naʋanocema ʋaʋe saʋasiŋgacemi; naʋanofara saʋasiŋgafari; naʋanoteŋga saʋasinecinhu;
naʋanoɓata ne
Ɀino ndinoɗa kuti murege kuʋa nokufuŋganya. Usina‐kuwana, unofuŋga ɀaShe, kuti uŋgafadza Ishe wake sei.
Asi wakawana, unofuŋga ɀenyika, kuti uŋgafadza mukadzi wake sei.
Nomukadzi nemhandara ʋakasiyana; usina‐kuwanikwa unofuŋga ɀaShe, kuti aʋe mutȿene pamuʋiri napamŋeya; asi wakawanikwa unofuŋga ɀenyika, kuti uŋgafadza murume wake sei.
Iɀi ndinotaura kuti muɓatsirwe imi; ndisiŋgaɗi kukusuŋgai nomusuŋgo, asi nokuɗa kweɀakafanira, ʋuye kuti munamatire Ishe, musiŋgakaŋganiswi.
Asi kana mumŋe acifuŋga kuti haaitiri
Asi uyo unomira akasimba pamŋoyo pake, asiŋgamanikidzwi necinhu, asi anesimba pamsoro pokuɗa kwake, akatema mumŋoyo make cinhu ici, kuti ucaceŋgeta mhandara yake, iye unoita ɀakanaka.
Naiɀoɀo, unomuwanisa unoita ɀakanaka; nousiŋgamuwanisi, unoita ɀinopfuʋura nokunaka.
Mukadzi wakasuŋgwa
Asi uŋganyanya kufara kana acigara akaɗaro, pakufuŋga kwaŋgu ini; ɀino ndinoti neni ʋo ndinoMŋeya waMŋari.
Ɀino, pamsoro peɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo, tinoziʋa kuti tose tinako kuziʋa. Kuziʋa kunoʋuyisa kuɀikudza, asi ruɗo runosimbisa.
Kana munhu aciti, ndinoziʋa cinhu, ugere kutoŋgoziʋa seɀaakafanira kuziʋa.
Asi kana munhu aciɗa Mŋari, iye unozikanwa naye.
Ɀino kana kuri kudya ɀinhu ɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo, tinoziʋa kuti cifananidzo hacizi cinhu panyika, ʋuye kuti hakunaMŋari, asi iye mumŋe cete.
Nokuti kunyaŋge ʋari’po ʋanonzi ʋamŋari, kana kuɗeŋga kana panyika; seɀaʋari’po ʋamŋari ʋazhinji, namadzishe mazhinji;
asi isu tinoŋgoʋa naMŋari mumŋe
Asi ʋose haʋano‐kuziʋa
Ɀino ɀokudya haɀiŋgatiȿitsi kunaMŋari; nokuti kana tisiŋgadyi, hatiipiswi, kana ticidya, hatinatswi.
Asi cenjerai, kuti simba renyu iri rirege kuʋa cigumbuso kunaʋasinesimba.
Nokuti kana mumŋe acikuʋona iwe, unako kuziʋa, ugere pakudya mutembere yecifananidzo, ko hana yaiyeye usinesimba haiŋgatsuŋgiswi, kuti adye iɀo ɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo here?
Nokuti nokuziʋa kwako uyo usinesimba unoparadzwa,
Ɀino kana mucitadzira hama saiɀoɀo, mucirwadzisa hana yaʋo isinesimba, munotadzira Kristu.
Saka kana ɀokudya ɀicigumbusa hama yaŋgu, handiŋgatoŋgodyi nyama nokusiŋgaperi, kuti ndirege kugumbusa hama yaŋgu.
Handizi wakasunuŋguka here? Handizi muapostora here? Handina‐kuʋona Jesu, Ishe weɗu here? Imi hamuzi ɓasa raŋgu munaShe here?
Kana ndisati ndiri muapostora kunaʋamŋe, kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro ɀirokwaɀo ndiri
Kuɀiɗaʋirira kwaŋgu kunaiʋo ʋanonditoŋga ndikoku:
Hatinesimba rokudya nokunwa here?
Hatinesimba rokufamba nomukadzi iri hama, saʋamŋe ʋaapostora naʋanuŋuna ʋaShe, naKefasi here?
Ko ini ndoga naBarnabasi hatinesimba rokurega kuɓate‐ɓasa here?
Ndianiko uŋgandorwa aciɀiripira muɓairo? Ndianiko unorima munda wemizambiriŋga, akasadya ɀiɓereko ɀawo? Ndianiko unofudza ɓoka, akasadya mukaka weɓoka?
Iɀi ndinoɀitaura nokutaura kwaʋanhu here? Ko murairo haureʋi saiɀoɀo ʋo here?
Nokuti pamurairo waMosesi pakanyorwa, paciti: Usasuŋga muromo wenzombe inopura ɀiyo. Ko Mŋari unehanya nenzombe here?
Kana unoreʋa
Kana isu takakudɀarirai ɀinhu ɀomŋeya, ciŋgaʋa cinhu cikuru here kana ticiceka ɀinhu ɀenyu ɀenyama?
Kana ʋamŋe ʋacipiwa simba pamsoro penyu, ko isu hati
Hamuziʋi here kuti ʋanoshumira paɀinhu ɀitȿene, ʋanodya ɀetembere? Ʋuye kuti ʋanoɓate‐ɓasa paartari, ʋanogoʋana neartari here?
Saiɀoɀo ʋo Ishe wakaraira kuti ʋanoparidza Evaŋgeri, ʋararame neEvaŋgeri.
Asi ini handina‐kuɀiɓatira necimŋe ceɀinhu iɀo. Handinyori iɀi kuti ndiitirwe saiɀoɀo ini; nokuti ɀirinani kuti ndife, pakuti mumŋe akonese ico candinoɀirumbidza naco.
Nokuti kana ndiciparidza Evaŋgeri, handina‐candiŋgaɀirumbidza naco, nokuti ndinoroʋererwa; ndinenhamo, kana ndisiŋgaparidzi Evaŋgeri.
Nokuti kana ndiciɀiita ndiciɗa ini, ndinomuɓairo; asi kana
Ɀino muɓairo waŋgu ndoweiko?
Nokuti kunyaŋge ndakasunuŋguka kunaʋose, ndakaɀiita muranda waʋose, kuti ndiwane ʋazhinji kwaɀo.
KuʋaJuda ndakaʋa somuJuda, kuti ndiwane ʋaJuda; kunaʋari pasi pomurairo, ndakaʋa so
kunaʋasinomurairo,
Kunaʋasinesimba ndakaʋa usinesimba, kuti ndiwane ʋasinesimba; ndakaʋa ɀose kuʋanhu ʋose, kuti ndiponese ʋamŋe nemitoʋo yose.
Ɀinhu ɀose ndinoɀiita nokuɗa kweEvaŋgeri, kuti ndigoʋerwe iyo pamŋe cete
Hamuziʋi here kuti aʋo ʋanoita nhaŋgemutaŋge, ʋanomhanya ʋose, asi mumŋe cete unopiwa muɓairo? Mhanyai saiɀoɀo, kuti mu
Mumŋe nomumŋe, unoshiŋgaira pakutamba, unoɀidzora paɀose. Ɀino iʋo
Ɀino ini handimhanyi somunhu usiŋgaziʋi; handirwi somunhu unoroʋa mhepo;
asi ndinorwadzisa muʋiri waŋgu, ndiciuita muranda; kuti ɀimŋe ini, ndamboparidzira ʋamŋe, ndirege kuʋa wakarashwa ndimene.
Nokuti handiɗi, hama
ʋose ʋakabapatidzwa munaMosesi mugore nomuguŋgwa;
ʋose ʋakadya ɀokudya ɀimŋe ɀomŋeya;
ʋose ʋakanwa ɀokunwa ɀimŋe ɀomŋeya; nokuti ʋakanwa paɗombo romŋeya rakaʋateʋera; ɗombo iro rakaŋga riri Kristu.
Asi Mŋari haana‐kufadzwa naʋazhinji ʋaʋo; nokuti ʋakaparadzwa murenje.
Ɀino, ɀinhu iɀi ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀiratidzo kwatiri, kuti isu tirege kuciʋa ɀakaipa, seɀaʋakaciʋa iʋo.
Imi regai kunamata ɀifananidzo, saʋamŋe ʋaʋo; seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Ɀino ŋgatirege kuita ʋupombge, saʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakaita ʋupombge, ʋakafa nezuʋa rimŋe ʋaneɀuru ɀinamakumi maʋiri neɀitatu.
Ŋgatirege kuidza Ishe, saʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋaka
Murege kuŋuŋuna saʋamŋe ʋaʋo ʋakaŋuŋuna, ʋakaparadzwa nomuparadzi.
Ɀino, iɀi ɀakaʋawira, kuti ʋaʋe ɀiratidzo; ɀakanyorwa kuti tinyeʋerwe isu, takaȿikirwa nokuguma kwenyika.
Naiɀoɀo, unoti ndinomira, ŋgaacenjere kuti arege kuwa.

Hakunomuidzo wakakuɓatai imi, asi waʋanhu ʋose; asi Mŋari, wakatendeka, haaŋgatenderi kuti muidzwe kupfuʋura pamunogona napo; asi pamŋe cete nomuidzo, iye ucakupai ʋo nzira yokuɓuɗa nayo, muʋe nesimba rokutsuŋga.
Naiɀoɀo, ʋaɗikanwa ʋaŋgu, tizai kunamata ɀifananidzo.
Ndinotaura sokunaʋakacenjera; fuŋgai ɀandinotaura.
Mukombe wokuʋoŋga watinoʋoŋga, hakuzi kusoŋgana neropa raKristu here? Ciŋgwa catinomeɗura, hakuzi kusoŋgana nomuʋiri waKristu here?
Ɀaciri ciŋgwa cimŋe cete, isu ʋazhinji tiri muʋiri mumŋe; nokuti tinogoʋana tose paciŋgwa cimŋe.
Tarirai ʋaIsraeri panyama; aʋo ʋanodya ɀiɓayiro haʋagoʋani neartari here?
Ɀino ndotiyiko? Kuti cinoɓayirwa ɀifananidzo cinhu here, kana cifananidzo cinhu here?
, asi ndinoti iɀo ɀinoɓayirwa naʋahedeni, haʋaɀiɓayiri Mŋari, asi mŋeya yakaipa; ɀino handiɗi kuti muyanane nemŋeya yakaipa.
Hamuŋganwiri pamukombe waShe, napamukombe wemŋeya yakaipa; hamuŋgadyiri patafura yaShe napatafura yemŋeya yakaipa.
Ko tinoɗa kumutsa goɗo raShe here? Tinomukunda nesimba here?
Ndakatenderwa ɀinhu ɀose; asi ɀose haɀindiɓatsiri. Ndakatenderwa ɀinhu ɀose; asi ɀose haɀisimbisi.
Munhu ŋgaarege kuɀitȿakira ɀake, asi ɀomumŋe.
Idyai ɀose ɀinoteŋgwa panoteŋgeswa nyama, musingabvunzi cinhu nokuɗa kwehana;
nokuti nyika ndeyaShe nokuzara kwayo.
Kana mumŋe waʋasiŋgatendi akakukokerai kuzodya, kana mukaɗa kuenda, idyai ɀose ɀinoiswa pamberi penyu, musiŋgabvunzi cinhu nokuɗa kwehana.
Asi kana mumŋe akati kwamuri: Ici cakaɓayirwa
handireʋi hana yako, asi yomumŋe; nokuti kusunuŋguka kwaŋgu kunotoŋgerweiko nehana yomumŋe?
Kana im ndicidya ndiciʋoŋga, ndiŋgagotukirweiko nokuɗa kwecinhu candinoʋoŋga pamsoro paco?
Naiɀoɀo, kana mucidya, kana mucinwa, kana muciita cinhu cipi necipi, itai ɀose kuti Mŋari akudzwe.
Regai kugumbusa kana ʋaJuda, kana ʋaGiriki, kana kereke yaMŋari.
Seni ʋo ndinofadza ʋanhu ʋose paɀinhu ɀose, ndisiŋgatȿaki ɀiŋgandiɓatsira ini, asi
Iʋai ʋateʋeri ʋangu, seni ndiri
Ɀino, ndinokurumbidzai, nokuti munondiraŋgarira paɀinhu ɀose, muciceŋgeta tsika, seɀandakakupai idzo.
Asi ndinoɗa kuti muziʋe kuti musoro womumŋe nomumŋe ndiye Kristu; ʋuye musoro womukadzi ndiye murume; ʋuye musoro waKristu ndiye Mŋari.
Murume mumŋe nomumŋe, unonyeŋgetera kana kuprofita musoro wake wakafukidzwa, unoninipisa musoro wake.
Asi mukadzi mumŋe nomumŋe, unonyeŋgetera kana kuprofita musoro wake usina‐kufukidzwa, unoninipisa musoro wake; nokuti ndiɀo ɀimŋe nokuʋeʋurwa.
Nokuti kana mukadzi asiŋgafukidzwi, ŋgaacekerwe vudzi rake ʋo; asi kana ɀisiŋgafaniri kuti mukadzi acekerwe vudzi, kana aʋeʋurwe, ŋgaafukidzwe.
Nokuti murume haafaniri kufukidza musoro, ɀaari mufananidzo nokubginya kwaMŋari; asi mukadzi ndiye kubginya kwomurume.
Nokuti murume haabvi kumukadzi; asi mukadzi unobva kumurume;
ʋuye murume haana‐kusikirwa mukadzi, asi mukadzi wakasikirwa murume;
nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo mukadzi unofanira kuʋa
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro munaShe mukadzi haazi kunze kwomurume, nomurume kunze kwomukadzi.
Nokuti mukadzi seɀaanobva kumurume, nokuɗaro ʋo murume
Toŋgai imi mumene: Ɀakafanira kuti mukadzi anyeŋgetere kunaMŋari asina‐kufukidzwa here?
Ko hamudzidziswi naiwo musikirwe
Asi kana mukadzi anevudzi refu, ndiko kubginya kwake; nokuti wakapiwa vudzi rake, ciʋe cifukidzo.
Ɀino kana mumŋe aneŋge aciɗa kuita gakaʋa, hatinetsika yakaɗaro isu, kunyaŋge kereke dzaMŋari.
Ɀino kana ndicikuʋudzai iɀi, handikurumbidziyi, nokuti hamuʋuŋganiri ɀinopfuʋura nokunaka, asi ɀakaipa.
Nokuti shoko rokutaŋga, kana muciʋuŋgana mukereke, ndinonzwa kuti kupesana kuri’po pakati penyu; pamŋe ndinotenda kuti ndiɀo.
Nokuti dzidziso
Ɀino kana muciʋuŋgana pamŋe cete, hakuzi kuti mudye cirayiro caShe;
nokuti kana modya, mumŋe nomumŋe unotaŋgira ʋamŋe kudya cirayiro cake; mumŋe unenzara, mumŋe unoɓatwa.
Ko hamunedzimba kwamuŋgadyira nokunwira here? Munoɀidza kereke yaMŋari, mucinyadzisa aʋo ʋasinecinhu here? Ndicaiteiko kwamuri? Ndiŋgakurumbidzai here? Handiŋgakurumbidziyi.
Nokuti ini ndakagamucira kunaShe ico candakakupai ʋo, kuti Ishe Jesu noʋusiku bgaakapandukirwa, wakatora ciŋgwa;
akati aʋoŋga, akacimeɗura, akati: Ici ndiwo muʋiri waŋgu unomeɗurirwa imi; itai iɀi mucindiraŋgarira.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo, ʋakati ʋapedza kurayira,
Nokuti ŋguʋa dzose, kana mucidya ciŋgwa ici, kana kunwa mukombe uyu, munoparidza rufu rwaShe, kuȿikira aciʋuya.
Naiɀoɀo mumŋe nomumŋe unodya ciŋgwa ici, kana kunwa mukombe waShe, nomutoʋo usina‐kufanira, ucaʋa nemhoȿa yomuʋiri neropa raShe.
Ɀino munhu ngaaɀiidze, kuti adye ciŋgwa ici aciɗaro, nokunwa mukombe uyu.
Nokuti unodya nokunwa, asiŋganatsi kunzwisisa muʋiri
Nemhaka iyi ʋazhinji ʋari’po pakati penyu ʋasinesimba, ʋanorwara; ʋazhinji ʋaʋete.
Nokuti ɗai taiɀiidza isu timene, hatizairobga.
Ɀino kana ticitoŋgwa, tinoraŋgwa naShe, kuti tirege kutoŋgerwa kurashwa pamŋe cete nenyika.
Naiɀoɀo, hama dzaŋgu, kana muciʋuŋganira pakudya, miriranai.
Kana munhu anenzara, ŋgaadye kumusha
Ɀino, kana ɀiri ɀipo ɀoMŋeya, hama
Munoziʋa kuti paŋguʋa yamaiʋa ʋahedeni, makaŋga mucikweʋerwa kuɀifananidzo, ɀisiŋgagoni kutaura, seɀamaituŋgamirirwa.
Saka ndinokuziʋisai kuti hakunomunhu unotaura noMŋeya waMŋari, uŋgati: Jesu ŋgaatukwe! Ʋuye, hakunomunhu uŋgati: Jesu ndiye Ishe, asi noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Ɀino marudzi mazhinji eɀipo ari’po, asi Mŋeya ndomumŋe.
Marudzi mazhinji okushumira ari’po, ʋuye Ishe mumŋe.
Marudzi mazhinji amaɓasa ari’po, asi Mŋari mumŋe, iye unoɓata ɀose munaʋose.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe unopiwa kuratidzwa kwoMŋeya, kuti ʋose ʋaɓatsirwe.
Nokuti mumŋe unopiwa noMŋeya shoko roʋucenjeri, mumŋe shoko rokuziʋa noMŋeya iwoyu;
mumŋe, kutenda muMŋeya iwoyu; mumŋe, ɀipo ɀokuporesa muMŋeya iwoyu;
mumŋe, kuita maɓasa esimba; mumŋe, kuprofita; mumŋe, kuziʋisisa mŋeya; mumŋe, marudzi endimi; mumŋe kuɗudzira ndimi;
asi iɀi ɀose ɀinoitwa noMŋeya iwoyu mumŋe cete, unogoʋera mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaanoɗa.
Nokuti somuʋiri uri mumŋe, unemitezo mizhinji, nemitezo yose yomuʋiri, kunyaŋge iri mizhinji, muʋiri ndomumŋe cete; wakaɗaro ʋo Kristu.
Nokuti muMŋeya mumŋe isu tose takabapatidzirwa mumuʋiri mumŋe; kana tiri ʋaJuda, kana ʋaGiriki, kana ʋaranda, kana ʋakasunuŋguka; isu tose takanwiswa paMŋeya mumŋe.
Nokuti muʋiri hauzi mutezo mumŋe, asi mizhinji.
Kana rutsoka rukati: Ɀandisati ndiri ruʋoko, handizi womuʋiri; ko haruzi rwomuʋiri, ɀarwaɗaro here?
Nenzeʋe kana ikati: Ɀandisati ndiri ziso, handizi womuʋiri; ko haizi yomuʋiri here?
Kana muʋiri wose raiʋa ziso, kunzwa kwaiʋepiko? Kana wose kwaiʋa kunzwa, kunhuwidza kwaiʋepiko?
Asi ɀino Mŋari wakaisa mutezo mumŋe nomumŋe pamuʋiri seɀaakaɗa.
Kana yose waiʋa mutezo mumŋe, muʋiri waiʋepiko?
Asi ɀino kunemitezo mizhinji, asi muʋiri mumŋe.
Ziso hariŋgati kuruʋoko: Handikuɗi; kana musoro ʋo kutsoka: Handikuɗiyi imi.
Kwete, ɀikuru mitezo iyo yomuʋiri ineŋge isinesimba, ndiyo inoɗikanwa;
ne
asi
kuti pamuʋiri parege kuʋa nokupesana; asi kuti mitezo iceŋgetane ɀakaenzana.
Kana mutezo mumŋe ucitambudzika, mitezo yose inotambudzika pamŋe cete nawo; kana mutezo mumŋe ucikudzwa, mitezo yose inofara pamŋe cete nawo.
Ɀino, imi muri muʋiri waKristu, nomumŋe nomumŋe mitezo yawo.
Mŋari wakaisa ʋamŋe pakereke, pakutaŋga ʋaapostora, rwecipiri ʋaprofita, rwecitatu ʋadzidzisi, teʋere
Ʋose ʋaapostora here? Ʋose ʋaprofita here? Ʋose ʋadzidzisi here? Ʋose
Ʋose ʋaneɀipo ɀokuporesa here? Ʋose ʋanotaura nendimi here? Ʋose ʋanoɗudzira here?
Asi shiŋgairirai ɀipo ɀikuru.
Ndinokuratidzai ʋo nzira yakaiȿo‐naka inopfuʋura dzose.
Kunyaŋge ndikataura nendimi dzaʋanhu nedzaʋatumŋa, ndisinoruɗo, ndaʋa sendarira dzinorira, neɗare rinoŋgoti: Ŋgwereŋgwere!
Kunyaŋge ndine
Kunyaŋge ndagoʋera
Ruɗo runomŋoyo murefu, runomŋoyo munyoro; ruɗo harunegoɗo; ruɗo harunamanyawi, haruɀikudzi;
haruiti ɀisiŋgafaniri, haruɀitȿakiri ɀarwo; harutsamŋi, haruneɀishura;
harufariri ɀisakarurama, asi runofarira ɀokwaɗi;
runofukidza ɀose, runotenda ɀose, runetariro paɀose, runotsuŋgirira paɀose.
Ruɗo harutoŋgoperi; ɀino kana kuri kuprofita, kucabviswa; kana dziri ndimi, dzicaguma; kana kuri kuziʋa, kucabviswa.
Nokuti tinoziʋa ɀisakakwana, tinoprofita ɀisakakwana;
asi kana ɀakakwana ɀaȿika, iɀo ɀisakakwana ɀicabviswa.
Ini ndiciri mŋana, ndaitaura somŋana, ndaifuŋga somŋana, ndairaŋgarira somŋana; ɀino ɀandaʋa murume, ndabvisa ɀinhu ɀomŋana.
Nokuti ɀino tinoʋona paciʋoni‐ʋoni, tisiŋgaʋoni kwaɀo; asi neŋguʋa iyo ticaʋona neɀiso ɀakatarisana; ɀino ndinoziʋa ɀisakakwana, asi neŋguʋa iyo ndicaziʋa seɀandakazikanwa neni ʋo.
Ɀino kutenda, netariro, noruɗo, ɀitatu iɀi, ndiɀo ɀinogara; asi cikuru pakati paɀo ndirwo ruɗo.
Teʋerai ruɗo; shiŋgairirai
Nokuti unotaura no
Asi unoprofita, unotaura kuʋanhu, kuti ʋasimbiswe nokurairwa, nokunyaradzwa.
Unotaura norurimi, unoɀisimbisa iye; asi unoprofita, unosimbisa kereke.
Ɀino ndinoɗa kuti imi mose mutaure nendimi, asi ɀikuru kuti muprofite; unoprofita mukuru kunounotaura nendimi, asi kana aciɗudzira, kuti kereke isimbiswe.
Asi ɀino, hama
Kunyaŋge ɀinhu ɀisinoʋupenyu, ɀinorira — kana iri nyere, kana ruɗimbga — kana ɀisiŋgasiyani pakurira kwaɀo, ɀiŋgazikanwa seiko cinoridzwa nenyere kana noruɗimbga?
Nokuti kana hwamanda isiŋgariri kwaɀo, ndianiko uŋgaɀigadzira kundorwa?
Ɀakaɗaro ʋo nemi, kana musiŋgatauri norurimi mashoko anonatso‐zikanwa, ɀinotaurwa ɀicazikanwa seiko? Nokuti mucaŋgotaura henyu mumhepo.
Manzwi anamarudzi mazhinji sei panyika, hakunecinhu cisinenzwi raco.
Ɀino kana ndisiŋgaziʋi kuti inzwi rinoreʋei, ini ndicaʋa somunhu worumŋe rurimi kunounotaura, nounotaura ucaʋa kwandiri somunhu worumŋe rurimi.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo imi, ɀamunoshiŋgairira ɀinhu ɀoMŋeya, tȿakai ɀikuru kuti musimbise kereke.
Saka unotaura no
Nokuti kana ndicinyeŋgetera no
Ɀino cinyiko? Ndicanyeŋgetera nomŋeya waŋgu, ʋuye ndicanyeŋgetera nokufuŋga kwaŋgu ʋo; ndicaimba nomŋeya waŋgu, ʋuye ndicaimba nokufuŋga kwaŋgu ʋo.
Kana ɀisakaɗaro, kana iwe uciʋoŋga nomŋeya, ko uyo ugere pacigaro caʋasina‐kudzidza, ucati Ameni seiko pakuʋoŋga kwako, ɀaasiŋgaziʋi caunotaura iwe?
Nokuti iwe unoʋoŋga hako ɀakanaka, asi mumŋe haasimbiswi.
Ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari, kuti ini ndinotaura nendimi zhinji kukunda imi mose;
asi pakereke ndinoɗa ɀikuru kutaura mashoko mashanu nokufuŋga kwaŋgu, kuti ndidzidzise ʋamŋe ʋo, pa
Hama
pamurairo pakanyorwa,
Saka ndimi hadzizi ciratidzo kunaʋanotenda, asi kunaʋasiŋgatendi; nokuprofita
Naiɀoɀo, kana kereke yose yaʋuŋgana, ʋose ʋakataura nendimi, ʋasina‐kudzidza kana ʋasina‐kutenda ʋakapinda, haʋati munopeŋga here?
Asi kana ʋose ʋakaprofita, mumŋe usiŋgatendi kana usina‐kudzidza akapinda, ucatendiswa naʋose, ucatoŋgwa naʋose;
ɀakaʋanzika ɀomŋoyo wake ɀinoratidzwa; naiɀoɀo ucawira pasi neciso cake, acinamata Ishe, nokupupura kuti Mŋari uri pakati penyu ɀirokwaɀo.
Ɀino ticatiyiko, hama
Kana mumŋe acitaura norurimi,
Asi kana pasina‐unoɗudzira, ŋgaanyarare mukereke; ŋgaaɀitaurire iye, nokunaMŋari.
Ʋaprofita ŋgaʋataure ʋaʋiri, kana ʋatatu, naʋamŋe ŋgaʋaidze.
Ɀino kana cimŋe cinhu cikazarurirwa mumŋe ugere’po, wokutaŋga ŋgaanyarare.
Nokuti muŋgaprofita mose,
Mŋeya yaʋaprofita inoɀiisa pasi paʋaprofita;
nokuti Mŋari haazi
Ʋakadzi ŋgaʋanyarare pakereke; nokuti haʋatenderwi kutaura; asi ŋgaʋaɀiise pasi, seɀinoreʋa ʋo murairo.
Kana ʋaciɗa kudzidza cinhu, ŋgaʋabvunze ʋarume ʋaʋo kumusha; nokuti haɀifaniri kuti mukadzi ataure mukereke.
Ko shoko raMŋari rakabva kwamuri here? Kana rakaȿika kwamuri moga here?
Kana munhu aciti, ndiri muprofita, kana ndiri womŋeya, ŋgaatende kuti iɀo ɀandinokunyorerai, murairo waShe.
Asi kana munhu asiŋgaziʋi, ngaaʋe usiŋgaziʋi hake.
Saka, hama dzaŋgu, shiŋgairirai kuprofita, musiŋgadziʋisi
Asi ɀinhu ɀose ŋgaɀiitwe nomutoʋo wakafanira ɀinemirairo
Ɀino, hama
iyo yamunoponeswa ʋo nayo, kana muciiɓatisa nomutoʋo wandakaiparidza kwamuri, kana musina‐kutenda pasina.
Nokuti pakutaŋga ndakakupai iɀo ɀandakagamucira ʋo, kuti Kristu wakafira ɀiʋi ɀeɗu, seɀakanyorwa paMagwaro;
ʋuye kuti wakaʋigwa, akamutswa nezuʋa retatu, seɀakanyorwa paMagwaro;
akaɀiratidza kunaKefasi, ipapo kunaʋanegumi naʋaʋiri;
ipapo akaɀiratidza kuhama dzinopfuʋura mazana mashanu kamŋe — ʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋapenyu kuȿikira ɀino, asi ʋamŋe ʋaʋata.
Ipapo akaɀiratidza kunaJakobo; ipapo kunaʋaapostora ʋose;
pakupedzisira akaɀiratidza kwandiri ʋo, sokunowakaɀarwa ŋguʋa isati yaȿika.
Nokuti ini ndiri muɗuku kuʋaapostora
Asi nenyasha dzaMŋari ndiri
Naiɀoɀo, kana ndirini, kana ʋari iʋo, tinoparidza kuɗai, nemi makatenda kuɗai.
Ɀino kana Kristu aciparidzwa, kuti wakamutswa kuʋakafa, ʋamŋe pakati penyu ʋanoreʋa seiko, kuti hakuna‐kumuka kwaʋakafa?
Ɀino, ɗai pasinakumuka kwaʋakafa, naKristu uŋgaɗai asina‐kumutswa ʋo;
ʋuye, ɗai Kristu asina‐kumutswa, kuparidza kweɗu kuŋgaɗai kuciʋa pasina, nokutenda kwenyu kuŋgaɗai kuciʋa pasina ʋo.
Nesu taiwanikwa tiri ɀapupu ɀaMŋari ɀenhema; nokuti takapupura kuti Mŋari wakamutsa Kristu, iye waasina‐kumumutsa, kana
Nokuti kana ʋakafa ʋasiŋgamutswi, naKristu haana‐kumutswa ʋo;
kana Kristu asina‐kumutswa, kutenda kwenyu hakunamaturo; muciri muɀiʋi ɀenyu.
Ɀino naiʋo ʋakafa munaKristu ʋakarashika ʋo.
Kana tinetariro kunaKristu paʋupenyu ubgu ɓedzi, tinonzwisa ʋurombo kukunda ʋanhu ʋose.
Asi ɀino Kristu wakamutswa kuʋakafa, akaʋa ciɓereko cokutaŋga caʋaʋata.
Nokuti rufu
Nokuti ʋose seɀaʋanofa munaAdama, saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋose ʋacararamiswa munaKristu.
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe padzoro rake: Kristu — ciɓereko cokutaŋga; teʋere, aʋo ʋari ʋaKristu pakuʋuya kwake.
Ipapo kuguma
Nokuti unofanira kuɓata ʋushe, kuȿikira aisa ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋose pasi petsoka dzake.
Muʋeŋgi wokupedzisira, ucaparadzwa, ndirworufu.
Nokuti wakaisa ɀinhu ɀose pasi petsoka dzake. Ɀino kana aciti: Ɀose ɀakaiswa pasi pake, ɀinoʋonekwa pacena kuti iye, wakaisa ɀose pasi pake, haaiswi’po.
Ɀino kana ɀose ɀaiswa pasi pake, ipapo noMŋanakomana ʋo amene ucaiswa pasi paiye wakaisa ɀose pasi pake, kuti Mŋari aʋe ɀose kunaʋose.
Kana ɀisina‐kuɗaro, ko aʋo ʋanobapatidzirwa ʋakafa, ʋacagoita seiko? Kana ʋakafa ʋasiŋgatoŋgomutswi, ʋakagobapatidzirweiko iʋo
Nesu tiri panjodzi ŋguʋa dzose neiko?
Ndinopika, hama
Kana ndakarwa neɀikara paEfeso somunhu ɀaindiɓatsireiko? Kana ʋakafa ʋasiŋgamutswi, ŋgatidye, ŋgatinwe, nokuti maŋgwana tinofa.
Musanyeŋgerwa; ʋushamŋari bgakaipa bgunoʋodza tsika dzakanaka.
Peŋgenukai ɀakarurama, murege kutadza, nokuti ʋamŋe haʋaziʋi Mŋari; ndinotaura
Asi mumŋe uŋgati: Ʋakafa ʋanogomutswa seiko? Ʋacaʋuya nomuʋiri wakaita sei?
Iwe ɓenzi, ico caunodɀara hacimeri, kana cisiŋgafi.
Caunodɀara, haudɀari muʋiri ucaʋa’po, asi tsaŋga ɓedzi, kana yamapfunde, kana yeɀimŋe;
asi Mŋari unoipa muʋiri paanoɗa napo, nembeu imŋe neimŋe muʋiri wayo.
Nyama yose haizi nyama imŋe; asi imŋe ndeyaʋanhu, imŋe inyama yemhuka, imŋe inyama yeshiri, imŋe ndeyehoʋe.
Kunemiʋiri yokuɗeŋga, nemiʋiri yenyika; asi kubginya kweyokuɗeŋga ndokumŋe, nokwenyika ndokumŋe.
Kubginya kwezuʋa ndokumŋe, nokubginya kwomŋedzi ndokumŋe, nokubginya kwenyeredzi ndokumŋe; nokuti nyeredzi imŋe haifanani neimŋe nyeredzi pakubginya.
Ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋo kumuka kwaʋakafa.
unodɀarwa pakuɀidzwa, unomutswa pakubginya; unodɀarwa paʋutera, unomutswa pasimba.
Unodɀarwa uri muʋiri wokuɓerekwa, unomutswa uri muʋiri womŋeya. Muʋiri wokuɓerekwa uri’po, no
Ɀakanyorwa ʋo saiɀoɀo,
Asi ɀomŋeya haɀizi ɀokutaŋga, asi ɀokuɓerekwa; teʋere ɀomŋeya.
Munhu wokutaŋga ndowenyika, wevu; munhu wecipiri wakabva kuɗeŋga.
Saiye wevu, ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋo aʋo ʋevu; saiye wokuɗeŋga, ndiɀo ɀakaita ʋo iʋo ʋokuɗeŋga.
Ʋuye, seɀatakaŋga tinomufananidzo wo
Ɀino, hama
Tarirai, ndinokuʋudzai cakaʋanzika: Hatiŋgaʋati tose, asi ticashandurwa tose;
pakarepo, nokubgairo kweziso, nehwamanda yokupedzisira; nokuti hwamanda icarira, ipapo ʋakafa ʋacamutswa nokusaʋora; nesu ticashandurwa;
nokuti ici cinoʋora cinofanira kufuka kusaʋora; necici cinofa cinofanira kufuka kusafa.
Ɀino kana ici cinoʋora cafuka kusaʋora, necici cinofa cafuka kusafa, ipapo shoko rakanyorwa ricaitika,
Iwe rufu, kukunda kwako kuripiko? Iwe rufu, rumborera rwako ruripiko?
Rumborera rworufu ndiɀo ɀiʋi; nesimba reɀiʋi ndiwo murairo.
Ɀino Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, uyo unotipa kukunda naShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu.
Saka, hama dzaŋgu dzinoɗikanwa, mirai makasimba, murege kuzunuŋguswa, muɓatire Ishe ɀikuru ŋguʋa dzose, muciziʋa kuti kuɓata kwenyu hakuŋgaʋi pasina munaShe.
Ɀino, kana ɀiri ɀipo ɀakaʋuŋganidzirwa ʋatȿene, seɀandakaraira kereke dzeGaratia, itai nemi ʋo saiɀoɀo.
Nomusi wokutaŋga weviki, mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ŋgaakamure
Kana ndaȿika, ndicatuma aʋo ʋamunotenda neŋwadi, ʋagondoisa ɀipo ɀenyu Jerusarema
Kana ɀakafanira kuti ini ndiende ʋo, ʋaŋgaenda neni.
Ɀino ndicaʋuya kwamuri, kana ndagura neMakedonia; nokuti ndinogura neMakedonia.
Ɀimŋe ndicagara nemi, kunyaŋge ndipedze cando, kuti mugondiperekedza pose pandinoenda.
Nokuti handiɗi kukuʋonai ɀino ndiri parwendo; nokuti ndinoti ndicazogara nemi ciŋguʋa, kana Ishe acinditendera.
Asi ndicagara paEfeso kuȿikira paPentekosta.
Nokuti ndazarurirwa mukoʋa mukuru uneɓasa guru; naʋadziʋisi ʋazhinji
Ɀino kana Timotio aciȿika, cenjerai kuti agare nemi asiŋgatyi; nokuti unoɓate‐ɓasa raShe, sendandinoita neni ʋo.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unomuɀidza. Asi mumuperekedzei norugare, kuti aʋuye kwandiri; nokuti ndakamutarira pamŋe cete nehama.
Ɀino kana ari Aporo, hama
Rindai, mirai nesimba pakutenda, itai saʋarume, musimbiswe.
Ɀose ɀamunoita ŋgaɀiitwe noruɗo.
Ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, hama
Kuti nemi ʋo muɀiise pasi paʋakaɗaro, na
Ndinofara nokuʋuya kwaStefana, naFortunato, naAkaiako; nokuti iʋo ʋaka
Nokuti ʋakazorodza mŋeya waŋgu nowenyu; naiɀoɀo kudzai ʋakaɗaro.
Kereke dzapaAsia dzinokukwazisai. Akwira naPrisira ʋanokukwazisai ɀikuru munaShe, pamŋe cete nekereke iri mumba maʋo.
Hama dzose dzinokukwazisai. Kwazisanai nokuȿeta kutȿene.
Ndiko kukwazisa kwaŋgu, ini Pauro, noruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Kana munhu asiŋgaɗi Ishe, ŋgaaʋe wakatukwa. Ishe unoʋuya!
Nyasha dzaShe Jesu ŋgadziʋe nemi.
Ruɗo rwaŋgu ŋgaruʋe nemi mose munaKristu Jesu.
Pauro, muapostora waKristu Jesu, nokuɗa kwaMŋari, naTimotio, hama yeɗu kukereke yaMŋari iri paKorinte, pamŋe cete naʋatȿene ʋose ʋari paAkaya yose:
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare runobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe,
iye unotinyaradza pakutambudzika kweɗu kwose, kuti isu tiʋe nesimba rokunyaradza ʋari mukutambudzika kupi nokupi, nokunyaradzwa kwatinonyaradzwa nako naMŋari.
Nokuti maɗambudziko aKristu seɀaakaʋa mazhinji kwatiri, saiɀoɀo ʋo kunyaradzwa kweɗu kwakaʋa kuzhinji naKristu.
Ɀino kana ticitambudzika heɗu isu,
Tariro yeɗu pamsoro penyu yakasimba, nokuti tinoziʋa kuti seɀamunosoŋgana
Nokuti hatiɗi, hama
asi pamŋoyo peɗu isu takaŋga tatoɀitoŋgera rufu, kuti tirege kuʋimba nesimba reɗu, asi naMŋari unomutaa ʋakafa;
iye wakatisunuŋgura parufu rukuru rwakaɗai, ʋuye ucatisunuŋgura
nemi ʋo muciɓatsirana pakutikumbirira kwenyu, kuti ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋaʋoŋge pamsoro peɗu nokuɗa kwecipo ceɗu cenyasha catakapiwa
Nokuti kuɀirumbidza kweɗu ndikoku: Kupupura kwehana yeɗu, kuti takafamba panyika, ɀikuru kwamuri, noʋutȿene neɀokwaɗi yaMŋari, tisiŋgafambi noʋucenjeri bgenyama, asi nenyasha dzaMŋari.
Nokuti hatikunyoreriyi ɀimŋe ɀinhu, asi iɀo ɀamunoraʋa neɀamunotenda; ndinoti ɗai muciɀitenda kuȿikira pakuguma;
seɀamakatitenda ʋo paneɀimŋe, kuti isu tiri kurumbidzwa kwenyu, semi ʋo mucaʋa
Ndiciziʋa iɀoɀi, ndakaŋga ndiciɗa kutaŋga kuʋuya kwamuri, kuti mukomborerwe rwecipiri;
ndipfuʋure nokwenyu ndicienda Makedonia, nokuʋuya nokwenyu ɀe, ndicibva Makedonia, ndiperekedzwe nemi ndicienda Judea.
Ɀino ɀandakaŋga ndiciɗa kuita iɀoɀo, ndakaita nokushanduka mŋoyo here? Kana, ɀandinoɗa kuita ndinoɀiɗa nenyama here, kuti ini pamŋe nditi: Hoŋo, hoŋo, pamŋe: Kwete, kwete?
NaMŋari wakatendeka, shoko reɗu kwamuri harizi hoŋo nakwete.
Nokuti Mŋanakomana waMŋari, Jesu Kristu, uyo wakaparidzwa pakati penyu nesu — neni naSirvano naTimotio — wakaŋga asiri hoŋo nakwete, asi wakaŋga ari hoŋo maari.
Nokuti ɀipikirwa ɀaMŋari, kunyaŋge ɀiri ɀizhinji sei, maari ndihoŋo; naiɀoɀo naiye ʋo ndiAmeni, kuti Mŋari akudzwe nesu.
Ɀino, uyo unotisimbisa munaKristu pamŋe cete nemi, nokutizodza, ndiMŋari;
uyo wakatiisira ʋo cisimbiso, akatipa ruɓatso rwoMŋeya mumŋoyo meɗu.
Asi ndinoɗana Mŋari, aʋe capupu pamŋoyo waŋgu, kuti handina‐kuzoʋuya Korinte, nokuti ndakakunzwirai tsitsi.
Hatiiti simba nokutenda kwenyu, asi tinokuɓatsirai kuti mufare; nokuti mumire nokutenda.
Asi ndakati mumŋoyo maŋgu, kuti handiɗi kuʋuya ɀe kwamuri nokucema.
Nokuti kana ndicikucemedzai, ndianiko ucandifadza, kana asiri iye wakacemedzwa neni?
Ɀino ndakanyora cinhu ici kuti kana ndaȿika, ndirege kucemedzwa naiʋo ʋaifanira kundifadza; ndicikutendai mose, kuti kufara kwaŋgu ndokwenyu mose.
Nokuti ndakakunyorerai nemisodzi mizhinji pakutambudzika kukuru nenhamo yomŋoyo; ndisiŋgati mucemedzwe, asi kuti muziʋe ruɗo rukuru rwandinokuɗai narwo.
Ɀino kana mumŋe akacemedza hake, haana‐kundicemedza ini, asi
Kuroʋa uku kwaʋanhu ʋazhinji kunoriŋgana munhu wakaɗai.
Naiɀoɀo ɀirinani kuti mumukaŋganwire nokumunyaradza, kuti arege kuʋodzwa mŋoyo kwaɀo neshuŋgu huru.
Naiɀoɀo ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri kuti musimbise ruɗo rwenyu kwaari.
Nokuti ndakanyora ʋo iɀi, kuti ndikuidzei, ndiziʋe kana munoterera paɀinhu ɀose.
Ɀino iye wamunokaŋganwira, neni
kuti tirege kunyeŋgerwa naSatani; nokuti mano ake tinoaziʋa.
Ɀino, ndakati ndiciȿika paTroasi
ndakaŋga ndisinezororo pamŋeya waŋgu, nokuti handina‐kuwana’po Tito, hama yaŋgu; asi ndakawonekana naʋo, ndikaenda Makedonia.
Asi Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, unotikundisa ŋguʋa dzose munaKristu, unoratidza nesu kwose‐kwose bgema bgokuziʋa kwake.
Nokuti isu tiri bgema bgakanaka bgaKristu kunaMŋari, pakati paiʋo ʋanoponeswa naʋanoparara.
Kunaʋamŋe tiri bgema bgorufu
Nokuti hatifanani naʋamŋe ʋazhinji ʋanokaŋganisa shoko raMŋari; asi tinotaura munaKristu neɀokwaɗi, seɀinobva kunaMŋari, pamberi paMŋari.
Tinotaŋga ɀe kuɀirumbidza kwamuri here? Tinotȿaka here saʋamŋe ŋwadi dzinoenda kwamuri, kana dzinobva kwamuri, dziŋgatirumbidza?
Imi muri ŋwadi yeɗu yakanyorwa mumŋoyo meɗu, inozikanwa nokurabga naʋanhu ʋose;
makaʋonekwa kuti muri ŋwadi yaKristu, yakagadzirwa nesu, isina‐kunyorwa neinki, asi noMŋeya waMŋari mupenyu;
Kutenda kwakaɗai tinako naKristu, kunaMŋari;
hatiti takakwana isu timene, kuti titeme cinhu timene; asi kukwana kweɗu kunobva kunaMŋari;
iye wakatikwanisa kuti tiʋe ʋashumiri ʋesuŋgano itȿa, isati iri yeɀakanyorwa asi yoMŋeya; nokuti ɀakanyorwa ɀinoʋuraya, asi Mŋeya unopa ʋupenyu.
Ɀino kana kushumira,
ko kushumira kwoMŋeya hakuŋgaʋi nokubginya kukuru here?
Nokuti kana kushumira,
Nokuti naico cakabginyiswa, hacina‐kubginyiswa, kana pacinhu ici ticicifananidza nokubginya kunokunda.
Nokuti kana ico cinopfuʋura caiʋa nokubginya, ɀikuru sei ico cinogara ndico ciri pakubginya.
Naiɀoɀo, ɀatinetariro yakaɗai, tinotaura tisiŋgatyi napaɗuku,
tisiŋgaiti saMosesi, waiisa cifukidziro paciso cake, kuti ʋana ʋaIsraeri ʋarege kutarisisa kuguma kweɀinopfuʋura.
Asi ndaŋgariro dzaʋo dzakakomara; nokuti kuȿikira zuʋa ranhasi, kana suŋgano yakare icirabga, cifukidziro ico ciri’po,
Asi kuȿikira nhasi, kana Mosesi acirabga, cifukidziro ciri’po pamŋoyo yaʋo.
Ɀino kana
Ishe ndiMŋeya; ɀino panoMŋeya waShe, panesunuŋguko.
Ɀino isu tose tinoti ticitarira neciso cisina‐kufukidzirwa kubginya kwaShe sapaciʋoni‐ʋoni, tinoshandurwa
Saka, ɀatinako kushumira uku, patakanzwirwa ŋgoni napo, hatineti;
asi takaramba ɀinhu ɀakaʋanzika ɀinonyadza, tisiŋgafambi nokunyeŋgera, tisiŋgashatisi shoko raMŋari; asi pakuratidza
Ɀino kana Evaŋgeri yeɗu yakafukidzwa, yakafukidzwa kunaʋanorashika;
kunaʋasiŋgatendi ʋakapofumadzirwa ndaŋgariro namŋari wenyika ino, kuti ʋarege kuvenekerwa neciedza ceEvaŋgeri yokubginya kwaKristu, uri mufananidzo waMŋari.
Nokuti hatiɀiparidzi isu, asi Kristu Jesu kuti ndiye Ishe; nesu kuti tiri ʋaranda ʋenyu nokuɗa kwaJesu
Nokuti Mŋari, wakareʋa kuti ciedza ciɓuɗe parima, ndiye wakavenekera mumŋoyo yeɗu, kuti atipe ciedza cokuziʋa kubginya kwaMŋari
Asi fuma iyi tinayo mumidziyo yevu, kuti ʋukuru bgesimba bguʋe bgaMŋari, bgurege kuʋa bgeɗu.
tinotambudzika pamatiʋi ose, asi hatimanikidzwi; tinokaŋganiswa, asi hatina‐kurasha mŋoyo;
tinotambudzwa, asi hatinakusiyiwa; takawisirwa pasi, asi hatinakuparadzwa;
tinoramba ticitakura ŋguʋa dzose mumuʋiri weɗu kufa kwaJesu, kuti noʋupenyu ʋo bgaJesu bguratidzwe mumuʋiri weɗu.
Nokuti isu ʋapenyu tinogara ticiŋgoiswa pakufa nokuɗa kwaJesu, kuti noʋupenyu ʋo bgaJesu bguratidzwe munyama yeɗu inofa.
Saiɀoɀo kufa kunoɓata matiri, asi ʋupenyu mamuri.
Ɀino ɀatinomŋeya iwoyu wokutenda, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
ticiziʋa kuti iye wakamutsa Ishe Jesu, ucatimutsa ʋo isu pamŋe cete naJesu; agotiisa
Nokuti ɀinhu ɀose
Saka hatineti, asi kunyaŋge munhu weɗu wokunze ucipera hawo, munhu womukati unoʋandudzwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe.
Nokuti kutambudzika kweɗu, kwakareruka, kuri’po ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, kunotiitira kubginya kukuru kwakaiȿo‐naka kusiŋgaperi;
tisiŋgatariri ɀinoʋonekwa, asi ɀisiŋgaʋonekwi; nokuti ɀinoʋonekwa ɀinopfuʋura, asi ɀisiŋgaʋonekwi ndeɀokusiŋgaperi.
Nokuti tinoziʋa kuti kana imba yeɗu yenyika, tabernakeri
Nokuti tinogomera ʋo mairi, ticishuʋa kuti tifukidzwe neimba yeɗu inobva kuɗeŋga;
kuti kana takafukidzwa heɗu, hatiŋgawanikwi tisina‐catakafuka.
Nokuti nesu, tiri mutabernakeri iyi tinogomera, ticiremerwa; tisiŋgaɗi kuti tikutunurwe, asi kuti tifukidzwe, kuti cinofa cimedzwe noʋupenyu.
Ɀino, uyo wakatigadzirira cinhu ici ndiMŋari, wakatipa ʋo ruɓatso rwoMŋeya.
Naiɀoɀo tinotsuŋga mŋoyo ŋguʋa dzose, ticiziʋa kuti kana ticigara mumuʋiri hatigari kunaShe;
nokuti tinofamba nokutenda, hatifambi nokuʋona;
tinotsuŋga mŋoyo ʋo, ticiti ɀirinani tirege kugara pamuʋiri, kuti tigare kunaShe.
Saka tinoshiŋgaira kuti timufadze iye, kunyaŋge ticigara’mo, kunyaŋge tisiŋgagari’mo.
Nokuti isu tose tinofanira kuratidzwa pamberi pecigaro cokutoŋga caKristu; kuti mumŋe nomumŋe apiwe
Naiɀoɀo ɀatinoziʋa kutya kwaShe, tinogombedzera ʋanhu; asi tinoratidzwa heɗu kunaMŋari; ʋuye ɀino ndinoti ɗai ticiratidzwa ʋo pahana dzenyu.
Hatiɀirumbidzi ɀe kwamuri, asi tinokupai nzira yokurumbidza nokuɗa kweɗu, kuti mugone kupindura aʋo ʋanoʋimba neɀinoʋonekwa, ʋasiŋgaʋimbi neɀomŋoyo.
Nokuti kana ticipeŋga,
Nokuti ruɗo rwaKristu runotimanikidza; ɀatinoziʋa cinhu ici kuti mumŋe wakafira ʋose, ɀino ʋose ʋakafa;
ɀino iye wakafira ʋose, kuti aʋo ʋanorarama ʋarege kuzoɀiraramira iʋo, asi uyo wakafa nokumutswa nokuɗa kwaʋo.
Naiɀoɀo, kubvira ɀino hatitoŋgoziʋi munhu panyama; ʋuye kunyaŋge takaziʋa Kristu panyama, kubvira ɀino haticamuziʋi saiɀoɀo.
Saka kana munhu ari munaKristu, waʋa cisikwa citȿa; ɀinhu ɀakare ɀapfuʋura; tarirai, ɀose ɀaʋa ɀitȿa.
Asi ɀinhu ɀose ɀakabva kunaMŋari, wakatiyananisa naye naKristu, akatipa kushumira kwokuyananisa;
ndiko kuti Mŋari wakaŋga aciyananisa nyika naye munaKristu, akasaʋaʋereŋgera kuɗarika kwaʋo, akatipa isu shoko rokuyananisa.
Naiɀoɀo tiri nhume nokuɗa kwaKristu, Mŋari saaneŋge acikumbira ɀikuru nesu; tinokumbira nokuɗa kwaKristu,
Uyo, wakaŋga asiŋgaziʋi ɀiʋi, wakamuita kuti aʋe ɀiʋi nokuɗa kweɗu; kuti isu tiʋe kururama kwaMŋari maari.
Ɀino ɀatinoɓatsirana
(Nokuti iye unoti:
Ndakakunzwa iwe neŋguʋa yakafanira,
Ndakakuɓatsira pazuʋa rokuponeswa;
tarirai, ɀino iŋguʋa yakafanira; tarirai, ɀino ndiro zuʋa rokuponeswa.)
Hatigumbusi
asi paɀinhu ɀose tinoɀiratidza saʋashumiri ʋaMŋari, pakutsuŋgirira kukuru, panhamo, pakushaiwa, pamaɗambudziko,
pakurobga, pakusuŋgwa, pakunyoŋganiswa, pamaɓasa, pakusaʋata, pakuɀinyima ɀokudya;
pakucena
pashoko raɀokwaɗi, pasimba raMŋari, nenhumbi dzokurwa dzokururama, kurudyi nokuruɓoshwe,
nokukudzwa, nokusakudzwa, neguhu rakaipa, neguhu rakanaka; saʋanyeŋgeri, asi tiri ʋeɀokwaɗi heɗu;
saʋasiŋgazikanwi, asi ticizikanwa heɗu ɀikuru; saʋanofa, asi, tarirai, tiri ʋapenyu heɗu; saʋanorobga, asi tisiŋgaʋurawi heɗu;
saʋanocema, asi ticigara ticifara heɗu; saʋarombo, asi ticifumisa ʋazhinji heɗu; saʋasinecinhu, asi tinaɀo ɀose heɗu.
Imi, ʋaKorinte, muromo weɗu wakashama kwamuri, mŋoyo weɗu wakuriswa.
Hamumanikidzwi kwatiri, asi munomanikidzwa mumŋoyo menyu.
Ɀino, mundidzosere saiɀoɀo (ndinotaura sokunaʋana
Musasuŋgwa ɀisina‐kufanira pajoko pamŋe cete naʋasiŋgatendi; nokuti kururama kuŋgaʋa noʋukama bgeiko nokusarurama? Ciedza ciŋgayanana seiko nerima?
Kristu uŋganzwana seiko naBeriari? Unotenda uŋgaʋa nomugoʋe weiko nousiŋgatendi?
Tembere yaMŋari iŋgatenderana seiko neɀifananidzo? Nokuti isu tiri tembere yaMŋari mupenyu; Mŋari seɀaakareʋa,
Saka
Ƃuɗai pakati paʋo, muɀiraʋure,
ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe,
Musaɓata cinhu cinetȿina;
Ini ndicakugamucirai,
Ndicaʋa Ƃaɓa ʋenyu,
Nemi mucaʋa ʋanakomana naʋanasikana ʋaŋgu,
ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe unesimba rose.
Ɀino, ʋaɗikanwa, ɀatineɀipikirwa iɀi, ŋgatiɀinatse pamatȿina ose enyama noomŋeya, tikwanise ʋutȿene pakutya Mŋari.
Mutizarurirei mŋoyo yenyu; hatinakuitira munhu ɀisakarurama, hatina kutadzira munhu, hatina‐kunyeŋgera munhu.
Handireʋi iɀi, kuti ndikupei mhoȿa; nokuti ndamboreʋa kuti imi muri mumŋoyo meɗu, kuti tife nokurarama pamŋe cete nemi.
Kusatya kwaŋgu kukuru pakutaura kwamuri, nokuɀirumbidza kwaŋgu kukuru pamsoro penyu; ndizere nokunyaradzwa, ndinofara kwaɀo pakutambudzika kweɗu kwose.
Nokuti takati taȿika Makedonia, nyama yeɗu haina‐kuzorora, asi takatambudzika pamatiʋi ose; kunze
Asi Mŋari, unonyaradza ʋakaʋora mŋoyo, wakatinyaradza nokuȿika kwaTito;
handiti nokuȿika kwake ɓedzi, asi ʋo nokunyaradzwa, kwaakanyaradzwa nako pamsoro penyu, acitiʋudza ɀecishuʋo cenyu, nokucema kwenyu, nokushiŋgaira kwenyu pamsoro paŋgu; saka ndakanyanya kufara.
Nokuti kunyaŋge ndakakucemedzai neŋwadi
Ɀino, handifari kuti makacemedzwa, asi nokuti makacemedzwa mukatendeʋuka; nokuti makacemedzwa seɀinoɗa Mŋari, kuti murege kurashikirwa necinhu nokuɗa kweɗu.
Nokuti kucema seɀinoɗa Mŋari kunoʋuyisa kutendeʋuka, kunoisa kukuponeswa kusiŋgaɀidyi mŋoyo; asi kucema kwenyika kunoʋuyisa rufu.

Nokuti tarirai kuti cinhu ico cokuti makacemedzwa seɀinoɗa Mŋari, cakaʋuyisa mukati menyu kushiŋgaira kukuru sei, nokuɀiɗaʋirira, nokutsamŋa, nokutya, necishuʋo, nokurwadza mŋoyo, nokutsiʋa. Paɀinhu ɀose makaɀiratidza kuti makacena pacinhu ici

Ɀino, kana ndakakunyorerai, handina‐kuɀiita nokuɗa kwaiye wakaita ɀisakarurama, kana nokuɗa kwaiye wakaitirwa ɀisakarurama, asi kuti kushiŋgaira kwenyu nokuɗa kweɗu kuʋonekwe nemi mumene pamberi paMŋari.
Nemhaka iyi isu tinonyaradzwa; ɀino pakunyaradzwa kweɗu takafara ɀikuru kwaɀo pamsoro pomufaro waTito, nokuti mŋeya wake wakasimbiswa nemi mose.
Nokuti kana ndakaɀirumbidza necinhu kwaari pamsoro penyu, handina‐kunyadziswa; asi seɀatakataura kwamuri ɀose neɀokwaɗi, saiɀoɀo ʋo kuɀirumbidza kweɗu pamberi paTito kwakaʋonekwa kuti ndokwaɀokwaɗi.
Nehanya dzake dzawedzerwa kwamuri, aciraŋgarira kuterera kwenyu mose, pamakamugamucira napo nokutya nokuɗeɗera.
Ndinofara kuti paɀinhu ɀose ndiŋgakutendai.
Ɀino tinokuziʋisai, hama
kuti pakati pokuidzwa kukuru kwokutambudzika, mufaro waʋo mukuru, pamŋe cete noʋurombo bgaʋo bgukuru, ɀakawanza ɀikuru kusanyima kwaʋo.
Nokuti ndinopupura, kuti ʋakapa nokuɗa kwaʋo paʋakagona napo, kunyaŋge kupfuʋura paʋakagona napo;
ʋakakumbira nokunyeŋgetera kukuru kwatiri kuti tiʋatendere
haʋana‐kuita seɀatakafuŋga
Naiɀoɀo takakumbira ɀikuru kunaTito, kuti seɀaakaŋga ataŋga, apedzise
Ɀino seɀamakapfuʋurira paɀinhu ɀose, pakutenda, napakutaura, napakuziʋa, napakushiŋgaira kwose, naparuɗo rwenyu kwatiri,
Handireʋi ndiciraira, asi kuti ndiidze ndiziʋe nokushiŋgaira kwaʋamŋe kana ruɗo rwenyu ndorwaɀokwaɗi ʋo.
Nokuti munoziʋa nyasha dzaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu, kuti kunyaŋge akaŋga akafuma, wakaʋa murombo nokuɗa kwenyu, kuti imi noʋurombo bgake muʋe ʋafumi.
Pacinhu ici ndinokuʋudzai kufuŋga
Asi ɀino pedzisai kuita ʋo; seɀamakaŋga munomŋoyo unoɗa, saiɀoɀo pedzisai ʋo pamunogona napo.
Nokuti kana mŋoyo
Nokuti
kuti paŋguʋa ino kuwanda kwenyu kuɓatsire kushaiwa kwaʋo, kuti kuwanda kwaʋo kuɓatsire kushaiwa kwenyu ʋo; kuti kuʋe nokuenzana;
seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Ɀino Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe, wakaisa mumŋoyo maTito kushiŋgaira kwakaɗaro kwamuri.
Nokuti wakanzwa bake kuraira kweɗu, asi ɀaakaŋga acishiŋgaira ɀikuru, wakaenda kwamuri, nokuɗa kwake hake.
Ɀino takatuma pamŋe cete naye hama iya, inorumbidzwa paEvaŋgeri pakereke dzose;
ɀisati ɀiri iɀoɀo ɓeɗzi, asi iye wakasanaŋgurwa ʋo nekereke kuti atiperekedze
ticiɀicenjerera, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu uŋgatipa mhoȿa pamsoro peɀakawanda iɀi, ɀatinoɓata naɀo.
Nokuti hatitȿaki ɀinhu ɀakanaka pamberi paShe ɓeɗzi, asi pamberi paʋanhu ʋo.
Takatuma ʋo naʋo hama yeɗu, yatakaidza kazhinji tikaʋona kuti unoshiŋgaira paɀinhu ɀizhinji; asi ɀino unonyanya kushiŋgaira nokuɗa kwokutenda kukuru kwaanako kwamuri.
Kana ari Tito, ndiye shamŋari yaŋgu, nomuɓatsiri waŋgu kwamuri; kana dziri hama dzeɗu, ndiʋo ʋaapostora ʋekereke, ʋuye kukudzwa kwaKristu.
Naiɀoɀo muʋaratidze pamberi pekereke ciratidzo coruɗo rwenyu, necokurumbidza kweɗu pamsoro penyu.
Nokuti kana kuri kushumira ʋatȿene, handifaniri kuti ndikunyorerei;
nokuti ndinoziʋa kuɗa kwomŋoyo yenyu, kwandinorumbidza pamsoro penyu kunaʋaMakedonia, kuti ʋaAkaya ʋakaŋga ʋaɀigadzira kubvira makei; nokushiŋgaira kwenyu kwakamutsa ʋazhinji.
Ɀino, ndakatuma hama idzi, kuti kuɀirumbidza kweɗu pamsoro penyu kurege kuitwa pasina pacinhu ici; kuti, seɀandakareʋa, mugare makaɀigadzira;
kuti ɀimŋe kana ʋamŋe ʋeMakedonia ʋaciʋuya neni, ʋakakuwanai musina‐kuɀigadzira, isu (hatireʋi imi) tirege kunyadziswa pakutenda uku.

Naiɀoɀo ndakati ɀakafanira kuti ndiraire hama idzi, kuti ʋataŋge kuenda kwamuri, ʋataŋge kumbogadzira cipo cokuʋoŋga camakapikira kare, kuti ici cigare cakagadzirwa ciri cipo cokuʋoŋga, cirege kuʋa cinhu cakatorwa nesimba.
Ɀino
Mumŋe nomumŋe
Mŋari unogona kukuwanzirai nyasha dzose kuti ŋguʋa dzose muʋe nokuriŋgana kwose paɀose, kuti muwanze maɓasa ose akanaka;
seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Iye wakaparadzira, iye wakapa ʋarombo;
Kururama kwake kunogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino iye, unopa mudɀari mbeu neciŋgwa, kuti ɀiʋe ɀokudya, ucakupai ʋo mbeu dzokudɀara acidziwanza, nokuwedzera ɀiɓereko ɀokururama kwenyu;
mucifumiswa paɀose mugoziʋa kupa ɀakawanda, ɀinoti,
Nokuti kushumira kwokuɓatsira uku hakuzadzisi kushaiwa kwaʋatȿene ɓedzi, asi kunowanzisa ʋo kuʋoŋga kunaMŋari;
nokuɗa kweɀinoʋonekwa pakushumira uku ʋanorumbidza Mŋari, pamsoro pokupupura kwenyu kwakaterera Evaŋgeri yaKristu, napamsoro pokupa
Naiʋo ʋamene ʋanokushuʋai, ʋacikukumbirirai, nokuɗa kwenyasha huru‐huru dzaMŋari pamsoro penyu.
Mŋari ŋgaaʋoŋgwe pamsoro pecipo cake, cisiŋgagoni kurondedzerwa.
Ɀino ini Pauro ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri noʋunyoro netsitsi dzaKristu — ini muɗuku kana ndiri pakati penyu, asi ndinotsuŋga kwamuri kana ndisi’po —
Ndinokumbira kwamuri, kuti kana ndaʋa’po, ndirege kuzotsuŋga, nokutenda kwandinoti
Nokuti, kunyaŋge ticifamba ne
nokuti nhumbi dzeɗu dzokurwa nadzo hadzizi dzenyama, asi dzinesimba pamberi paMŋari rokuputsa nhare;
isu tinoti ticiputsa njere, neɀakakwirira ɀose ɀinomutswa kuzorwa nokuziʋa Mŋari, tinotapa mifuŋgo yose kuti iterere Kristu;
takaɀigadzira kuraŋga Kusaterera kwose, kana kuterera kwenyu kwazadziswa.
Imi munotarira ɀinhu ɀiri pamberi penyu. Kana munhu aciʋimba naɀo aciti ndiri waKristu, ŋgaaraŋgarire ɀe
Nokuti kunyaŋge ndainyanya kuɀirumbidza pamsoro pesimba reɗu ratakapiwa naShe kukusimbisai, risati riri rokukuputsai, handiŋganyadziswi;
kuti ndirege kuita sendinokutyisai neŋwadi dzaŋgu.
Nokuti ʋanoti, ŋwadi dzake dzinamashoko makuru, dzinesimba, asi muʋiri wake kana ari’po, unoʋutera, nokutaura kwake kunoɀidzwa.
Munhu wakaɗaro ŋgaaraŋgarire
Nokuti tinotya kuɀienzanisa nokuɀifananidza naʋamŋe ʋanoɀikudza; asi iʋo haʋanenjere, ɀaʋanoɀienzanisa naiʋo ʋamene, nokuɀifananidza naiʋo ʋamene.
Ɀino isu hatiŋgaɀirumbidzi ticipfuʋura ciyero, asi neciyero
Nokuti hatinyanyi kuɀitambanudza, seɀatisiŋgaȿikiri kwamuri; nokuti tisu takataŋga kuȿikira kwamuri neEvaŋgeri yaKristu;
hatiɀirumbidzi ticipfuʋura ciyero pamsoro peɓasa raʋamŋe; asi tinetariro kuti, kana kutenda kwenyu kucikura, isu ticakuriswa pakati penyu
tigoparidza Evaŋgeri panyika dziri mberi kwenyu, tirege kuɀirumbidza pacitanda comumŋe pamsoro peɀatoitwa haɀo.
Asi unoɀirumbidza, ŋgaaɀirumbidze munaShe.
Nokuti wakatendeka haazi iye unoɀirumbidza, asi ndiye unorumbidzwa naShe.
Ƌai mucindiitira mŋoyo murefu paɗuku paʋupenzi bgaŋgu; asi munondiitira henyu mŋoyo murefu.
Nokuti ndinegoɗo pamsoro penyu negoɗo raMŋari; nokuti ndakakuwanisai nomurume mumŋe, kuti ndikuisei kunaKristu semhandara yakacena.
Asi ndinotya kuti, senyoka yakanyeŋgera Eva namano ayo, ɀimŋe saiɀoɀo ndaŋgariro dzenyu dziŋgaȿiɓiswa,
Nokuti kana mumŋe aciʋuya unoparidza mumŋe Jesu, watisina‐kumboparidza isu,
Nokuti ndinoti handizi muɗuku napaɗuku‐ɗuku kuʋaapostora ʋanopfuʋura ʋamŋe ʋose.
Ɀino kunyaŋge ndisiŋganatsi pakutaura, handina‐kuɗaro pakuziʋa; asi paɀinhu ɀose takaratidza
Ndakatadza here ɀandakaɀininipisa kuti imi mukudzwe, ɀandakakuparidzirai Evaŋgeri yaMŋari ndisiŋgapiwi muɓairo?
Dzimŋe kereke ndakadzitorera, ndicireʋa muɓairo, kuti ndikushumirei imi.
Ʋuye, paŋguʋa yandakaŋga ndiri kwamuri, ndicishaiwa, handinakuremedza munhu; nokuti ɀandakashaiwa ndakapiwa nehama dzaibva Makedonia; paɀinhu ɀose ndakacenjera kuti ndirege kukuremedzai, ʋuye
Ɀokwaɗi yaKristu iri mandiri,
Nemhaka yeiko? Nokuti handikuɗiyi here? Mŋari unoziʋa.
Asi cinhu ici candinoita, ndinociita, kuti ndishaise nzira iʋo ʋanotȿaka nzira; kuti ʋawanikwe ʋakaita sesu paɀinhu iɀoɀo ɀaʋanoɀirumbidza naɀo.
Nokuti ʋakaɗaro ʋaapostora ʋenhema, ʋanoɓata nokunyeŋgera, ʋanoɀishandura
Na
Naiɀoɀo hacizi cinhu cikuru, kana ʋashumiri ʋake ʋaciɀishandura ʋo,
Ndinopamhidza,
Ɀandinotaura, handiɀitauri seɀinobva kunaShe, asi sapaʋupenzi
Ʋazhinji ɀaʋanoɀirumbidza panyama, neni ʋo ndicaɀirumbidza.
Nokuti munoitira mapenzi mŋoyo murefu nomufaro, imi muri ʋakacenjera;
nokuti munoita nomŋoyo murefu kana munhu acikuitai ʋaranda, kana acikuparadzai, kana acikutapai, kana aciɀikudza, kana acikuroʋai kumeso.
Ndinoreʋa ndici
Iʋo ʋaHeberu here? Neni ʋo. Iʋo ʋaIsraeri here? Neni ʋo. Iʋo ʋana ʋaAbrahama here? Neni ʋo.
Iʋo ʋashumiri ʋaKristu here? (Ndinotaura somunhu unopeŋga), ɀikuru ini; pamaɓasa ndinoʋapfuʋura,
Ndakarobga naʋaJuda kashanu,
Katatu ndakarobga netȿimbo, kamŋe ndakatakwa namabge, katatu ndakaputsikirwa necikepe, ʋusiku bgumŋe namasikati ndakaŋga ndiri muguŋgwa;
panzendo kazhinji, panjodzi dzenzizi, panjodzi dzamakororo, panjodzi dzoʋorudzi rwaŋgu, panjodzi dzaʋahedeni, panjodzi muguta, panjodzi murenje, panjodzi muguŋgwa, panjodzi pakati pehama dzenhema;
pakuɓata napakutambura, pakuʋata kazhinji takarindira, panzara nenyota, pakuɀinyima ɀokudya kazhinji, pacando napakushaiwa ɀokufuka.
Kunze kwaiɀoɀi, ndinoremedzwa zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe nokuraŋgarira kereke dzose.
Ndianiko usinesimba, neni ndikasaʋa nesimba? Ndianiko unogumburwa, neni ndikasatȿa?
Kana ndikafanira kuɀirumbidza, ndicaɀirumbidza neɀinhu ɀoʋutera bgaŋgu.
Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋaShe Jesu, unokudzwa nokusiŋgaperi, unoziʋa kuti handireʋi nhema.
paDamasko muɓati pasi pamambo Areta wakarinda guta raʋeDamasko, acitȿaka kundiɓata;
ndikaɓuruswa ndiri muɗeŋgu napawindi paruȿiŋgo, ndikatiza pamaʋoko ake.
Ndinofanira haŋgu kuɀirumbidza, kunyaŋge ɀisina‐kunaka, asi ndicaȿika paɀiratidzo neɀakazarurwa ɀaShe.
Ndinoziʋa munhu uri munaKristu, aʋa makore anegumi namanna apfuʋura, (kana
Ʋuye ndinoziʋa munhu wakaɗai (kana
kuti wakakwidzwa muparadiso, akanzwa mashoko asiŋgagoni kutaurwa, asina‐kutenderwa munhu kuti aareʋe.
Pamsoro pomunhu wakaɗai ndicaɀirumbidza; asi pamsoro paŋgu handiɀirumbidzi; asi pamsoro poʋutera
Nokuti kana ndiciɗa kuɀirumbidza, handiŋgaʋi ɓenzi; nokuti ndicareʋa ɀamaɀokwaɗi; asi ndinorega haŋgu, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu, uŋgati ndiri mukuru kuneɀaakaʋona kana ɀaakanzwa kwandiri;
ɀino, kuti ini ndirege kunyanya kuɀikudza nokuɗa kwoʋukuru kwaɀo bgeɀaka
Pamsoro pecinhu ici ndakakumbira Ishe ɀikuru katatu, kuti cibve kwandiri.
Iye akati kwandiri: Nyasha dzaŋgu dzinokuriŋgana; nokuti simba raŋgu rinozadziswa paʋutera
Naiɀoɀo ndinofara noʋutera, nokuɀidzwa, nokushaiwa, nokutambudzika, nenhamo nokuɗa kwaKristu; nokuti kana ndinoʋutera, ipapo ndinesimba.
Ndaʋa ɓenzi; imi mandiroʋerera. Nokuti ini ndaifanira kurumbidzwa nemi; nokuti handizi muɗuku napaɗuku kuʋaapostora ʋanopfuʋura ʋose, kunyaŋge ndisi cinhu.
Ɀirokwaɀo, ɀiratidzo ɀomuapostora ɀakaitwa pakati penyu nokutsuŋgirira kukuru, neɀiratidzo, neɀishamiso, namaɓasa esimba.
Nokuti makapfuʋurwa neiko nedzimŋe kereke, asi pakuti ini handina‐kukuremedzai? Ndikaŋganwirei henyu kusarurama uku.
Tarirai, ino ndiyo ŋguʋa yecitatu yandakaɀigadzira kuʋuya kwamuri; handiŋgakuremedziyi; nokuti handitȿaki ɀenyu, asi
Nokuti ndiŋgafara ɀikuru kupedza
Ɀino, ŋgaɀiʋe
Ndakakutorerai cinhu here nomumŋe waiʋo ʋandakatuma kwamuri?
Ndakaraira Tito, ndikatuma hama iya naye; ko Tito wakakutorerai cinhu here? Hatina‐kufamba nomŋeya mumŋe here? Ʋuye namakwara mamŋe here?
Ŋguʋa yose makaŋga muciti tinoɀiɗaʋirira kwamuri here? Tinotaura pamberi paMŋari munaKristu; asi

Nokuti ndinotya kuti ɀimŋe kana ndiciȿika, ndiŋgakuwanai musina‐kuita seɀandinoɗa, neni ndiŋgawanikwa nemi ndakaita seɀamusiŋgaɗi; ɀimŋe kuŋgaʋa’po gakaʋa, negoɗo, nokutsamŋa, nokupesana, nokucera, namakuhwa, namanyawi, nenyoŋganiso;
kuti kana ndiciȿika ɀe, Mŋari waŋgu arege kundininipisa pamberi penyu, ndiceme pamsoro paʋazhinji ʋaʋo ʋatotadza, ʋakasatendeʋuka patȿina
Iyi iŋguʋa yecitatu, yandinoʋuya kwamuri. Mumiromo yeɀapupu ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu mashoko ose acasimbiswa.
Aʋo, ʋatotadza, naʋamŋe ʋose, ndamboʋaʋudza, ɀino ndoʋaʋudza
ɀamunotȿaka ciratidzo caKristu, unotaura mandiri, iye usiŋgashaiwi simba kwamuri, asi unesimba mamuri.
Nokuti wakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa nokushaiwa simba, asi unorarama nesimba raMŋari. Nokuti nesu ʋo tinoshaiwa simba maari, asi ticararama kwamuri pamŋe cete naye nesimba raMŋari.
Ɀiidzei imi mumene,
Asi ndinoti mucaziʋa henyu kuti isu hatina‐kuʋa ʋakarashwa.
Ɀino tinonyeŋgetera Mŋari kuti murege kuita cinhu cimŋe cakaipa; handiɗaro kuti isu tiwanikwe kuti takatendeka, asi kuti imi muite ɀakarurama, kunyaŋge isu takaita saʋakarashwa.
Nokuti hatigoni kuita cinhu cinopesana neɀokwaɗi, asi cinoɓatsira ɀokwaɗi.
Nokuti tinofara kana isu ticishaiwa simba, imi muciʋa nesimba; ndiɀo ɀatinokumbira ʋo, kuti mukwaniswe.
Saka ndinonyora iɀi ndisi’po, kuti kana ndaʋa’po, ndirege kuita nehasha, seɀandakapiwa naShe simba rokusimbisa, risati riri rokuputsa.
Pakupedzisira, hama
Kwazisanai nokuȿeta kutȿene.
Ʋatȿene ʋose ʋanokukwazisai.
Nyasha dzaShe Jesu Kristu, noruɗo rwaMŋari, nokuyanana kwoMŋeya Mutȿene, ŋgaɀiʋe nemi mose.
Pauro, muapostora, (usina
nehama dzose dziri kwandiri, kukereke dzeGaratia:
Nyasha norugare ŋgaɀiʋe nemi, ɀinobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu,
wakaɀipa nokuɗa kweɀiʋi ɀeɗu, kuti atisunuŋgure kunyika yakaipa yaɀino, nokuɗa kwaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu;
ŋgaaʋe nokubginya nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Ndinoshamiswa kuti munokurumidza mukaɗai kushandukira uyo wakakuɗanai munyasha dzaKristu, kuti
isati iri imŋe hayo; asi kuti ʋamŋe ʋari’po ʋanokukaŋganisai, ʋaciɗa kushandura Evaŋgeri yaKristu.
Asi kunyaŋge isu, kana mutumŋa unobva kuɗeŋga, akakuparidzirai imŋe evaŋgeri, inopesana neyatinokuparidzirai isu, ŋgaaʋe wakatukwa.
Seɀatakamboreʋa, ɀino ndinoreʋa ɀe saiɀoɀo: Kana kunomunhu unokuparidzirai imŋe evaŋgeri, inopesana neiyo yamakagamucira, ŋgaaʋe wakatukwa.
