Nokuti ɀino ndinoita ʋushamŋari naʋanhu here, kana naMŋari? Kana ndinotȿaka kufadza ʋanhu here? Kana ndaifadza ʋanhu naɀino, handizaiʋa muranda waKristu.
Nokuti ndinokuziʋisai, hama
Nokuti handina‐kuipiwa kana kuidzidziswa nomunhu, asi ndakairatidzwa naJesu Kristu.
Nokuti makanzwa ɀomufambire waŋgu kare pakunamata kwaʋaJuda, kuti ndaitambudza kereke yaMŋari ɀikuru kwaɀo, ndikaiparadza;
pakunamata kwaʋaJuda ndaipfuʋura ʋazhinji ʋezero raŋgu parudzi rwaŋgu, ndicinyanya kushiŋgairira tsika dzamadziɓaɓa aŋgu.
Ɀino Mŋari, iye wakandisanaŋgura kubva paɗumbu ramai ʋaŋgu, akandiɗana nenyasha dzake, wakati afadzwa naɀo,
kuti aratidze Mŋanakomana wake mandiri, ndimuparidze pakati paʋahedeni, pakarepo handina‐kuraŋgana nenyama neropa;
handina‐kukwira Jerusarema kunaaʋo ʋakanditaŋgira kuʋa ʋaapostora, asi ndakaenda Arabia, ndikadzokera Damasko ɀe.
Ipapo, makore matatu akati apfuʋura, ndikakwira Jerusarema kundoʋona Kefasi, ndikagara naye mazuʋa anegumi namashanu.
Asi handina‐kuʋona mumŋe waʋaapostora, asi Jakobo ɓedzi, munuŋuna waShe.
Iɀi ɀandinokunyorerai, tarirai, pamberi paMŋari handireʋi nhema.
Ipapo ndakaȿika kunyika dzeSiria neKirikia.
Asi ndakaŋga ndisiŋgazikanwi paciso nekereke dzeJudea dziri munaKristu;
asi ʋakaŋga ʋanzwa ɓedzi, kuti uya, waititambudza kare, ɀino woparidza kutenda kwaaiparadza kare;
ʋakarumbidza Mŋari mandiri.
Ɀino, makore anegumi namanna akati apfuʋura, ndikakwira ɀe Jerusarema naBarnabasi, ndikaenda ʋo naTitosi.

Ndakakwira nokuɗa kwokuratidzwa; ndikarondedzera pamberi paʋo Evaŋgeri yandinoparidza pakati paʋahedeni, asi kunaʋakaŋga ʋacikudzwa ʋari ʋoga, kuti ɀimŋe ndirege kumhanyira pasina, kana kuti ɀimŋe ndatomhanyira
Asi naTito, waiʋa neni, ari muGiriki, haanakuroʋererwa kuti adziŋgiswe;
nokuɗa kwehama dzenhema, ʋakaŋga ʋapinzwa nokunyaŋga, ʋakaŋga ʋapinda pakaʋanda kuti ʋashore kusunuŋguka kweɗu kwatinako munaKristu Jesu, kuti ʋatisuŋge;
hatina‐kuʋatseɗukira iʋaʋa, ticiʋaterera ŋguʋa imŋe; kuti ɀokwaɗi yeEvaŋgeri irambe icigara nemi.
Ɀino kana ʋari iʋo ʋanonzi ʋakuru — handinemhaka kuti ʋaiʋa ʋakaɗini kare; Mŋari haatendi ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu — kana ʋari iʋo ʋanonzi ʋakuru, haʋana‐kundiwedzera cinhu;
asi iʋo ʋakati ʋaʋona kuti ini ndakapiwa Evaŋgeri kunaʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa, saPetro kunaʋakadziŋgiswa;
(nokuti iye wakapa Petro simba rokuʋa muapostora kunaʋakadziŋgiswa, ndiye wakapa ʋo ini simba rokuʋa muapostora kuʋahedeni);
ʋakati ʋaʋona nyasha dzandakaŋga ndapiwa, Jakobo, naKefasi, naJohane — aʋo ʋainzi mbiru — ʋakatiɓata isu tose naBarnabasi namaʋoko orudyi okuyanana, kuti isu tiende kuʋahedeni, iʋo kunaʋakadziŋgiswa;
cete kuti tiraŋgarire ʋarombo; ndiɀo ɀandakashiŋgairira ʋo kuti ndiɀiite.
Ɀino Kefasi wakati aȿika Antiokia ndakamudziʋisa pacena, nokuti wakaŋga anemhoȿa.
Nokuti ʋamŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋabva kunaJakobo, ʋasati ʋaȿika, iye waidya naʋahedeni; asi ʋakati ʋaȿika, akadzoka, akaɀiraʋura, acitya ʋakadziŋgiswa.
Naʋamŋe ʋaJuda ʋakaita mano‐mano ʋo pamŋe cete naye; ɀikaitwa kuti naiye Barnabasi ʋo akatsauswa namano‐mano aʋo.

Asi ndakati ndiciʋona kuti haʋafambi ɀakarurama neɀokwaɗi yeEvaŋgeri, ndakati kunaKefasi pamberi paʋose: Kana iwe, uri muJuda, ucifamba saʋahedeni, usiŋgaiti saʋaJuda, unoroʋerera seiko ʋahedeni, kuti ʋafambe saʋaJuda?
Isu ʋaJuda pakuɀarwa
ɀatinoziʋa kuti munhu haaruramiswi namaɓasa omurairo, asi nokutenda kunaKristu Jesu, nesu ʋo takatenda kunaKristu Jesu, kuti tiruramiswe nokutenda kunaKristu, tirege
Ɀino kana isu pakutȿaka kweɗu kururamiswa munaKristu, tikawanikwa tiri ʋatadzi ʋo timene, ko Kristu waʋa mushumiri weɀiʋi here? Haiȿa!
Nokuti kana ndikaʋaka ɀe iɀo ɀandamboputsa, ndinoɀiita muɗariki.
Nokuti nomurairo ini ndakafa kumurairo, kuti ndirarame kunaMŋari.
Ndakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa pamŋe cete naKristu; handiciri ini ndinorarama, asi Kristu unorarama mandiri;
Handikonesi nyasha dzaMŋari; nokuti kana kururamiswa kucibva kumurairo, Kristu wakafa pasina.
Imi ʋaGaratia ʋokusafuŋga, ndianiko wakakurunzirai, iyemi, makaratidzwa Jesu Kristu pacena pamberi pameso enyu akaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa?
Iceci ɓedzi ndinoɗa kunzwa kwamuri: Makapiwa Mŋeya namaɓasa omurairo here, kana nokunzwa kwokutenda?
Muri ʋokusafuŋga ʋakaɗaro seiko? Makataŋga muMŋeya, ko ɀino mopedzisa munyama here?
Makatambudzika ɀikuru mukaɗai pasina here? Kana ɀaiʋa pasina haɀo!
Naiɀoɀo uyo unokupai Mŋeya, nokuita maɓasa esimba pakati penyu,
Abrahama seɀaakatenda kunaMŋari, kukanzi kwaari ndiko kururama.
Naiɀoɀo ziʋai kuti ʋokutenda ndiʋo ʋana ʋaAbrahama.
NoRugwaro, ɀarwakaziʋa ɀiri mberi, kuti Mŋari ucaruramisa ʋahedeni nokutenda, rwakaparidza Evaŋgeri kare kunaAbrahama,
Naiɀoɀo ʋokutenda ʋanoropafadzwa pamŋe cete naAbrahama, wakatenda.
Nokuti ʋose ʋari ʋamaɓasa omurairo, ʋari pakutukwa; nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Ɀino, ɀinoʋonekwa kuti hakunomunhu unoruramiswa nomurairo pamberi paMŋari, nokuti: Wakarurama ucararama noku tenda.
Ɀino murairo haubvi pakutenda; asi uyo wakaita ɀinhu iɀoɀi ucararama naɀo.
Kristu wakatidzikinura pakutuka kwomurairo, iye akaitwa cakatukwa nokuɗa kweɗu, nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Kuti kuropafadzwa kwaAbrahama kuȿike kuʋahedeni munaJesu Kristu; kuti tipiwe nokutenda cipikirwa coMŋeya.
Hama
Ɀino, iɀo ɀipikirwa ɀakarebga kunaAbrahama nokumŋana wake. Haareʋi,
Ɀino ndinoreʋa cinhu ici,
Nokuti kana nhaka icibva kumurairo, haicabvi kucipikirwa; asi Mŋari wakaipa Abrahama nokupikira.
Naiɀoɀo murairo cinyiko? Wakazowedzerwa nokuɗa kweɀiʋi, kuȿikira mŋana wakapikirwa iɀoɀo acizoʋuya;
Ɀino mureʋereri haazi womumŋe cete; asi Mŋari ndomumŋe.
Naiɀoɀo asimurairo unorwisa ɀipikirwa ɀaMŋari here? Haiȿa! Nokuti ɗai ʋakaŋga ʋapiwa murairo waigona kuraramisa, ɀirokwaɀo kururamiswa kwaibva kumurairo.
Asi Rugwaro rwakapfigira ɀose pasi peɀiʋi, kuti cipikirwa cinobva pakutenda munaJesu Kristu cipiwe ʋanotenda.
Asi kutenda kusati kwaȿika, taiceŋgetwa pasi pomurairo, takapfigirwa nokuɗa kwokutenda kwaizoratidzwa.
Saiɀoɀo murairo wakaŋga uri muperekedzi weɗu, kutiisa kunaKristu kuti tiruramiswe nokutenda.
Ɀino kutenda ɀakwakaȿika, haticiri pasi pomuperekedzi.
Nokuti imi mose muri ʋana ʋaMŋari nokutenda munaKristu Jesu;
nokuti ʋose pakati penyu, ʋakabapatidzwa munaKristu, makafuka Kristu.
Hakucina‐muJuda kana muGiriki, hakucina‐wakasuŋgwa kana wakasunuŋguka, hakucina‐munhurume kana munhukadzi; nokuti imi mose muri ʋamŋe munaKristu Jesu.
Ɀino kana muri ʋaKristu, muri ʋana ʋaAbrahama, ʋadyi ʋenhaka seɀamakapikirwa.
Ɀino ndinoti, mudyi wenhaka, kana aciri mŋana, haatoŋgosiyani nomuranda, kunyaŋge ari ishe waɀose;
asi uri pasi paʋatariri naʋaceŋgeti kuȿikira paŋguʋa yakatarwa naɓaɓa.
Saiɀoɀo nesu ʋo, ticiri ʋana, takaŋga takasuŋgwa pasi peɀokuʋamba ɀenyika;
ɀino ŋguʋa yakati yazara kwaɀo, Mŋari akatuma Mŋanakomana wake, wakaɓerekwa nomukadzi, wakaɓerekwa pasi pomurairo,
kuti adzikinure ʋari pasi pomurairo, kuti tipiwe ʋumŋana bgeɗu.
Ɀino ɀamuri ʋanakomana, Mŋari wakatuma Mŋeya woMŋanakomana wake mumŋoyo meɗu, unoɗana,
Saka iwe hauciri muranda, asi mŋanakomana; kana
Asi neŋguʋa iyo, ɀamakaŋga musiŋgaziʋi Mŋari, maiʋa ʋaranda ʋaʋamŋari ʋasati ʋari ʋeɀokwaɗi;
asi ɀino, ɀamunoziʋa Mŋari, ɀikuru ɀamunozikanwa naMŋari, modzokera ɀe seiko kuneɀokuʋamba ɀisinesimba, ɀoʋurombo, muciɗa ɀe kutaŋga kuʋa ʋaranda ʋaɀo?
Munoceŋgeta misi nemŋedzi, neŋguʋa namakore.
Ndinotya pamsoro penyu, kuti ɀimŋe ndakaɓate‐ɓasa kwamuri pasina.
Ndinokumbira kwamuri, hama
ɀino munoziʋa kuti ndakakuparidzirai Evaŋgeri pakutaŋga nokuɗa kwokurwara panyama;
necinhu ico panyama yaŋgu, cakaŋga ciri muidzo kwamuri, hamuna‐kuciɀidza, kana kucisema; asi makandigamucira somutumŋa waMŋari, saiye Kristu Jesu.
Ɀino kufara kwenyu kuripiko? Nokuti ndinokupupurirai, kuti kana maigona, maitumbura meso enyu mukandipa iwo.
Ɀino ndaʋa muʋeŋgi wenyu, ɀandakakuʋudzai ɀokwaɗi here?
Ʋanokushiŋgairirai nomutoʋo usakanaka; asi ʋanoɗa kukupfigirai kunze, kuti imi muʋashiŋgairire.
Ɀino ɀakanaka kuti pacinhu cakanaka kushiŋgairirwe ŋguʋa dzose, ɀirege kuitwa kana ndiri kwamuri ɓedzi.
Ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋaɗuku, ʋandinotamburira ɀe kuɓereka, kuȿikira Kristu aʋumbga mukati menyu.
Ndaiɗa kuti ndiʋe nemi ɀino, ndishandure inzwi raŋgu; nokuti ndinokaŋganiswa nokuɗa kwenyu.
Ndiʋudzei, imi munoɗa kuʋa pasi pomurairo, hamutereri murairo here?
Nokuti kwakanyorwa kuti Abrahama wakaŋga anaʋanakomana ʋaʋiri, mumŋe womurandakadzi, mumŋe womukadzi wakasunuŋguka.
Ɀino womurandakadzi wakaɓerekwa nenzira yenyama; asi womukadzi wakasunuŋguka
Ɀinhu iɀi ɀinofananidzira; nokuti
ɀino Agari ndiro gomo reSina muArabia, rakaenzana neJerusarema raɀino; nokuti uri paʋuranda iye naʋana ʋake.
Ɀino Jerusarema riri kumsoro rakasunuŋguka, ndiʋo mai ʋeɗu;
nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Fara, iwe usiŋgaɓereki, usiŋgaɀari,
Pururudza, uɗanidzire, iwe usiŋgatamburi nokuɓereka,
Nokuti ʋana ʋomusiyiwa ʋazhinji kunowaiye unomurume.
Ɀino imi, hama
Asi sapaŋguʋa iyo, uyo wakaɓerekwa nenzira yenyama wakatambudza
Asi Rugwaro runotiyiko? Dziŋga murandakadzi nomŋanakomana wake; nokuti mŋanakomana womurandakadzi haaŋgadyi nhaka pamŋe cete nomŋanakomana wowakasunuŋguka.
Saka, hama
Kristu wakatisunuŋgura kuti tiʋe ʋakasunuŋguka; naiɀoɀo mirai nesimba, murege kusuŋgwa ɀe nejoko roʋuranda.
Tarirai, ini Pauro, ndinoti kwamuri, kuti kana mucidziŋgiswa, Kristu haaŋgakuɓatsiriyi cinhu.
Ndinopupurira mumŋe nomumŋe unodziŋgiswa, kuti iye uneŋgaʋa rokuti aite murairo wose.
Makaparadzaniswa naKristu, iyemi munoɗa kururamiswa nomurairo; maɓuɗiswa panyasha.
Nokuti isu noMŋeya tinomirira nokutenda tariro yokururamiswa.
Nokuti munaKristu Jesu kudziŋgiswa kana kusadziŋgiswa haɀiɓatsiri cinhu; asi kutenda kunoɓata noruɗo.
Makaŋga mucimhanya ɀakanaka; ndianiko wakakudziʋisai kuti murege kuterera ɀokwaɗi?
Hamunakugombedzerwa naiye wakakuɗanai.
Mbiriso shoma inoʋirisa ɓundu rose.
Ndinotenda pamsoro penyu munaShe, kuti hamuŋgatoŋgoraŋgariri cimŋe cinhu; asi uyo, unokupesanisai ucafanira hake kutoŋgwa, kunyaŋge ari aninani.
Asi ini, hama
Ƌai aʋo ʋanokupesanisai ʋaciɀigura ʋo.
Nokuti imi, hama
Nokuti murairo wose unozadziswa neshoko rimŋe cete, rokuti: Uɗe wokwako seɀaunoɀiɗa iwe;
asi kana mucirumana nokudyana, cenjerai kuti murege kupedzana.
Ɀino ndinoti: Fambai noMŋeya, ipapo hamuŋgaiti kuciʋa kwenyama.
Nokuti nyama inociʋa icirwa noMŋeya; noMŋeya ucirwa nenyama; nokuti iɀi ɀinorwisana; kuti murege kuita ɀamunoɗa.
Asi kana mucituŋgamirirwa noMŋeya, hamuzi pasi pomurairo.
Ɀino maɓasa enyama anoʋonekwa, anoti: Ʋupombge, netȿina, noʋutere,
nokunamata ɀifananidzo, noʋuroyi, nokuʋeŋgana, negakaʋa, negoɗo, nokutsamŋa, nokupesana, nokuparadzana, nedzidziso
nokugoɗorana, nokuɓatwa, nokutamba kwakaipa, neɀinhu ɀakaɗai; iɀo ɀandinokuʋudzai
Ɀino ciɓereko coMŋeya ndirwo ruɗo, nomufaro, norugare, nomŋoyo murefu, nomŋoyo munyoro, nokunaka, nokutendeka,
noʋunyoro, nokuɀidzora: hakunomurairo unodziʋisa ɀinhu ɀakaɗai.
Asi aʋo ʋari ʋaKristu Jesu ʋakaroʋera pamucinjikwa nyama, pamŋe cete nokuɗa kwayo, nokuciʋa kwayo.
Kana ticirarama noMŋeya, ŋgatifambe ʋo noMŋeya,
tirege kuɀikudza, ticimutsana mŋoyo, ticigoɗorana.
Hama
Takuriranai mitoro
Nokuti kana munhu aciti, ndiri cinhu, asati ari cinhu, unoɀinyeŋgera iye.
Ɀino munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaaidze ɓasa rake amene, ipapo uŋgaɀirumbidza pamsoro pake iye amene oga, asiŋgaɀiiti pamsoro pomumŋe.
Nokuti munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ucafanira kutakura mutoro wake.
Ɀino unodzidziswa Shoko, ŋgaagoʋane nounodzidzisa paɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka.
Musanyeŋgerwa; Mŋari haasekwi; nokuti iɀo ɀinodɀara munhu, ndiɀo ɀaanoceka ɀe.
Nokuti unodɀarira nyama yake, ucaceka kuʋora, kunobva panyama; asi unodɀarira Mŋeya, ucaceka ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, bgunobva kuMŋeya.
Ɀino ŋgatirege kuneta pakuita ɀakanaka; nokuti tinozoceka neŋguʋa yakafanira, kana tisiŋgaʋori mŋoyo.
Ɀino ɀatineŋguʋa, ŋgatiitire ʋose ɀakanaka, ɀikuru kunaʋeimba yokutenda.
Tarirai, kukura kwamaretere andinokunyorerai nawo noruʋoko rwaŋgu.
Ʋose ʋanoɗa kunzi ʋakanaka pane‐ɀinoʋonekwa panyama, ndiʋo ʋanokuroʋererai kuti mudziŋgiswe;
Nokuti kunyaŋge ʋakadziŋgiswa, haʋaceŋgeti murairo ʋamene; asi ʋanoɗa kuti imi mudziŋgiswe, kuti ʋaɀirumbidze panyama yenyu.
Asi kana ndirini, ŋgandirege kutoŋgoɀirumbidza napaɗuku, asi ɓedzi mumucinjikwa waShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu; naye nyika yakaroʋerwa pamucinjikwa kwandiri, neni
Nokuti kudziŋgiswa kana kusadziŋgiswa hacizi cinhu, asi cisikwa citȿa.
Ʋose ʋanofamba nomurairo uyu, rugare ŋgaruʋe pamsoro paʋo, nenyasha, napamsoro paʋaIsraeri ʋaMŋari.
Kubvira ɀino ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unonditambudza; nokuti ndinamaʋaŋga aJesu pamuʋiri waŋgu.
Nyasha dzaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, ŋgadziʋe nomŋeya wenyu, hama
Pauro, muapostora waKristu Jesu, nokuɗa kwaMŋari, kuʋatȿene ʋari [paEfeso], nokunaʋanotenda munaKristu Jesu:
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare runobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Ŋgaaʋoŋgwe Mŋari naƂaɓa ʋaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, wakatiropafadza nokuropafadza kwose kwoMŋeya, kuɗeŋga munaKristu,
seɀaakatisanaŋgura maari nyika isati yaʋambga, kuti tiʋe ʋatȿene ʋasinemhoȿa pamberi pake muruɗo;
akatitemera kare, kuti naJesu Kristu tiitwe ʋanakomana
kuti kunaka kukuru kwenyasha dzake dzaakaŋgotipa hake muMuɗikanwa
uyo watinedzikinuro maari neropa rake,
dzaakawanza kwatiri nokucenjera kwose nokuziʋa;
akatiziʋisa ɀakaʋanzika ɀokuɗa kwake, seɀaakafadzwa pakufuŋga
kuti afambise kuzara kweŋguʋa, aʋuŋganidze munaKristu ɀose ɀiri kuɗeŋga, neɀiri pasi;
munaiye, watakaitwa ʋo nhaka maari, yatakatemerwa kare nokuraira kwaiye, unoita ɀose nokufuŋga kwokuɗa kwake;
kuti tirumbidze kubginya kwake, isu takatarira kare kunaKristu;
munaiye, nemi ʋo, makanzwa shoko reɀokwaɗi maari,
uri ruɓatso rwenhaka yeɗu,
Saka neni ʋo, ndakati ndanzwa kutenda munaShe Jesu kuri pakati penyu, noruɗo kuʋatȿene ʋose,
handiregi kuʋoŋga pamsoro penyu, ndicikuraŋgarirai paminyeŋgetero yaŋgu;
kuti Mŋari waShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, Ƃaɓa ʋokubginya kukuru, akupei mŋeya wokucenjera nowokuzarurirwa pakumuziʋa;
mavenekerwa meso omŋoyo wenyu, kuti muziʋe kuti kuɗana kwake kunetariro yei, nefuma yokubginya kwenhaka yake pakati paʋatȿene,
noʋukuru bgakapfuʋurisa bgesimba rake kwatiri isu tinotenda, nokuɓata kwesimba rake guru,
raakaɓata munaKristu, acimumutsa kuʋakafa, nokumugarisa kurudyi rwake kuɗeŋga,
kumsoro‐soro kwaʋaɓati ʋose, noʋukuru, nesimba, noʋushe, namazita ose anorebga, pasati pari panyika ino ɓedzi, asi paneinozoʋuya ʋo;
akaisa ɀose pasi petsoka dzake, akapa kereke iye, kuti aʋe musoro waɀose,
ndiwo muʋiri wake, kuzara kwaiye unozadzisa ɀose munaʋose.
iɀo ɀamaifamba mukati maɀo kare, netsika dzenyika ino, nenzira dzomucinda wesimba reɗeŋga, dzomŋeya unoɓata ɀino muʋana ʋokusaterera;
ʋataifamba tose pakati paʋo kare, mukuciʋa kwenyama yeɗu, ticiita kuɗa kwenyama nokwokufuŋga
Ɀino Mŋari unenyasha zhinji‐zhinji, nokuɗa kworuɗo rwake rukuru, rwaakatiɗa narwo,
kunyaŋge takaŋga takafa mukuɗarika kweɗu, wakatiraramisa pamŋe cete naKristu (makaponeswa nenyasha);
akatimutsa pamŋe cete naye, akatigarisa kuɗeŋga pamŋe cete naye munaKristu Jesu;
kuti neŋguʋa dzinoʋuya aratidze fuma huru‐huru yenyasha dzake paʋunyoro
nokuti makaponeswa nenyasha, nokutenda; iɀo ɀisiŋgabvi kwamuri,
haɀibvi pamaɓasa, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu unoɀikudza.
Nokuti tiri ɓasa rake, takasikwa kuti munaKristu Jesu
Naiɀoɀo raŋgarirai, kuti imi ʋahedeni munyama, mainzi ʋasina‐kudziŋgiswa naiʋo ʋanonzi ʋokudziŋgiswa, kuri munyama, kunoitwa namaʋoko;
kuti neŋguʋa iyo makaŋga musinaKristu, muri ʋatorwa paʋushe bgaʋaIsraeri, muri ʋaeni pasuŋgano dzecipikirwa, musinetariro, musinaMŋari panyika.
Asi ɀino munaKristu Jesu imi, makaŋga muri kure kare, makasweɗedzwa muropa raKristu.
Nokuti ndiye rugare rweɗu, iye wakaita ɀinhu ɀiʋiri kuti ciʋe cinhu cimŋe, akaputsa ruȿiŋgo rwapakati rwaiparadzanisa;
ɀaakaparadza munyama yake kuʋeŋgana, iwo murairo weɀakarairwa paɀireʋo; kuti asike aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋaʋe munhu mutȿa maari, aite rugare
kuti mumucinjikwa ayananise ɀe ʋose ʋaʋiri, ʋaʋe muʋiri mumŋe kunaMŋari, ɀaakaʋuraya kuʋeŋgana naiwo
akaȿika, akaparidza rugare kwamuri, imi maiʋa kure, norugare kunaiʋo ʋaiʋa pedyo;
nokuti isu tose tinopinda naiye noMŋeya mumŋe kunaƂaɓa.
Naiɀoɀo, hamuzati muciri ʋaeni naʋatorwa, asi ʋobgo pamŋe cete naʋatȿene, naʋeimba yaMŋari.
Makaʋakwa pamsoro penheyo dzaʋaapostora naʋaprofita, Kristu Jesu amene ari ibge rapakona.
Maari imba yose yakasoŋganiswa kwaɀo, inokura, iʋe tembere tȿene munaShe.
Maari nemi ʋo makaʋakwa pamŋe cete, kuti muʋe ʋugaro bgaMŋari muMŋeya.
Nemhaka iyi, ini Pauro,
kana makanzwa henyu kugoʋerwa kwenyasha dzaMŋari dzandakapiwa pamsoro penyu;
kuti ɀakaŋga ɀakaʋanzika ɀakandiziʋiswa pakuzarurirwa, seɀandakambokunyorerai namashoko mashoma;
kana muciaraʋa iwo, muŋgaʋona kuziʋa kwaŋgu paneɀakaʋanzika ɀaKristu;
ɀakaŋga ɀisina‐kuziʋiswa ʋanakomana ʋaʋanhu panedzimŋe ŋguʋa, seɀaɀakazarurirwa ʋaapostora ʋatȿene, naʋaprofita ɀino muMŋeya;
: Ʋahedeni ʋadyi ʋenhaka pamŋe cete nesu, nemitezo yomuʋiri pamŋe cete nesu, ʋakagoʋerwa ʋo pamŋe cete nesu cipikirwa munaKristu Jesu neEvaŋgeri;
yandakaitwa mushumiri wayo necipo cenyasha dzaMŋari, candakapiwa nokuɓata kwesimba rake.
Ini, muɗuku kwaɀo kuʋatȿene ʋose, ndakapiwa nyasha idzi, kuti ndiparidzire ʋahedeni fuma isiŋganɀerwi yaKristu,
nokuratidza ʋose kuti kugoʋerwa kwakaɗiniko kweɀakaʋanzika, ɀakaŋga ɀakafukidzwa munaMŋari, wakasika ɀose, kubva paŋguʋa yokutaŋga;
kuti ɀino ʋaɓati naʋanesimba kuɗeŋga ʋaziʋiswe nekereke kucenjera kukuru kwaMŋari;
secireʋo cokutaŋga‐taŋga caakatema munaKristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu;
maari tinokutsuŋga
Saka ndinokumbira kuti murege kupera mŋoyo nokutambudzika kwaŋgu pamsoro penyu; ndiko kukudzwa kwenyu.
Nemhaka iyi ndinofugama namabvi aŋgu kunaƂaɓa,
aʋo, rudzi rwose kuɗeŋga napanyika runotumidzwa nezita raʋo,
kuti ʋakupei pafuma yokubginya kwaʋo kukuru, simba kuti musimbiswe noMŋeya waʋo mumunhu womukati;
kuti Kristu agare pamŋoyo yenyu nokutenda; kuti imi, munemidzi yenyu nenheyo dzenyu muruɗo;
muʋe nesimba rokunzwisisa pamŋe cete naʋatȿene ʋose, kuti kufara, nokureɓa, nokukwirira, nokudzika kwakaɗiniko,
nokuziʋa ruɗo rwaKristu, runopfuʋura kuziʋa, kuti muzadziswe nokuzara kwose kwaMŋari.
Ɀino, iye unesimba rokuita ɀikuru kwaɀo ɀinopfuʋura ɀose ɀatinokumbira kana ɀatinofuŋga, nesimba rinoɓata mukati meɗu,
ŋgaaʋe nokubginya mukereke munaKristu Jesu, kuȿikira kumarudzi ose nokusiŋgaperi‐peri, Ameni.
Naiɀoɀo ini musuŋgwa munaShe, ndinokumbira ɀikuru kuti mufambe ɀakafanira kuɗanwa kwamakaɗanwa nako,
nokuɀininipisa kwose noʋunyoro, nomŋoyo murefu, muciitirana mŋoyo murefu muruɗo;
mucishiŋgaira kuceŋgeta ʋumŋe bgoMŋeya mucisuŋgo corugare.
Kunomuʋiri mumŋe, noMŋeya mumŋe, seɀamakaɗanwa ʋo mutariro imŋe yokuɗanwa kwenyu;
Ishe mumŋe, nokutenda kumŋe, norubapatidzo rumŋe,
naMŋari mumŋe, naƂaɓa ʋaʋose, uri pamsoro paʋose,
Asi mumŋe nomumŋe weɗu wakapiwa nyasha neciyero cecipo caKristu.
Naiɀoɀo unoti:
Wakakwira kumsoro akatapa ʋatapxa,
Akapa ʋanhu ɀipo.
(Ɀino kuti: Wakakwira, cinyiko, asi kuti, wakaɓuruka ʋo kumatiʋi ari pasi penyika?
Wakaɓuruka ndiye wakakwira ʋo kumsoro‐soro kweɗeŋga rose, kuti azadzise ɀose).
Ɀino wakapa ʋamŋe kuti ʋaʋe ʋaapostora, ʋamŋe ʋaprofita, ʋamŋe ʋaevaŋgeri, ʋamŋe ʋafudzi naʋadzidzisi;
kuti ʋatȿene ʋakwanisirwe ɓasa raʋo rokushumira, nerokuʋaka muʋiri waKristu;
kudzimana isu tose tiȿike paʋumŋe bgokutenda nokuziʋa Mŋanakomana waMŋari, napamunhu wakura, napaciyero coʋukuru bgokuzara kwaKristu;
kuti tirege kuramba ticiŋgoʋa ʋacece, ticizunuŋguswa nokudziŋgwa nemhepo ipi neipi yokudzidzisa nokunyeŋgera kwaʋanhu, namano, kuti ʋatsause nokunyeŋgera;
asi tireʋe ɀokwaɗi muruɗo, tigokura maari paɀose, iye Kristu, Musoro;
muʋiri wose wakasoŋganiswa ɀakanaka maari nokuɓatanidzwa nenheŋgo dzose dzinosimbisa, mutezo mumŋe nomumŋe uciɓata neciyero cawo, kuti muʋiri ukuriswe pakuʋakwa kwawo muruɗo.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoreʋa nokupupura cinhu ici munaShe,
ʋakaȿiɓirwa pakunzwisisa kwaʋo, ʋari ʋatorwa paʋupenyu bgaMŋari nokuɗa kwokusaziʋa kuri mukati maʋo, nokuɗa kwoʋukukutu bgomŋoyo yaʋo;
ʋakaɀipa ʋasinehanya kuʋutere, kuti ʋaɓate maɓasa ose etȿina nokuciʋa.
Asi imi hamuna‐kudzidza Kristu saiɀoɀo,
kana ari iye hake wamakanzwa, nokudzidziswa maari, seiri ɀokwaɗi munaJesu:
kuti pamufambire wenyu wokutaŋga mubvise munhu wekare, unoʋodzwa nokuciʋa kwokunyeŋgera;
muʋandudzwe mumŋeya wokuraŋgarira kwenyu,
mufuke munhu mutȿa, wakasikwa akafanana naMŋari pakururama, noʋutȿene bgeɀokwaɗi.
Naiɀoɀo bvisai nhema, mutaure ɀokwaɗi, mumŋe nomumŋe kunowokwake; nokuti tiri mitezo, mumŋe womumŋe.
Tsamŋai, musiŋgatadzi; zuʋa ŋgarirege kuʋira mucakatsamŋa;
musapa Diaborosi nɀimbo.
Wakaɓa, ŋgaarege kuɓa ɀe; asi ɀirinani kuti atambudzike, aɓate namaʋoko ake
Mumuromo menyu murege kuɓuɗa shoko rakaʋora, asi rakanaka, riŋgasimbisa pakafanira, riʋigire nyasha aʋo ʋanonzwa.
Regai kucemedza Mŋeya Mutȿene waMŋari, wamakaisirwa cisimbiso maari kuȿikira pazuʋa rokudzikinurwa.
Shuŋgu dzose, nokutsamŋa, nehasha, nokupopota, nokutuka, neɀakaipa ɀose, ŋgaɀibviswe kwamuri;
muitirane mŋoyo munyoro, munzwirane tsitsi, mukaŋganwirane, seɀamakakaŋganwirwa naMŋari munaKristu.
Naiɀoɀo iʋai ʋateʋeri ʋaMŋari saʋana ʋanoɗikanwa;
fambai muruɗo, Kristu seɀaakakuɗai ʋo, akaɀipa nokuɗa kweɗu, kuti aʋe cipo neciɓayiro kunaMŋari, ɀiite bgema bgunonhuwira.
Asi ʋupombge, netȿina yose, kana kuciʋa, ŋgaɀirege kurebga pakati penyu, seɀinofanira ʋatȿene;
neɀakaipa, nokutaura ɀoʋupenzi, nokunemera, iɀo ɀisina‐kufanira; asi ɀirinani kuʋoŋga.
Nokuti munoziʋa kwaɀo, kuti hakunemhombge, kana munhu unetȿina, kana unociʋa, ndiye unonamata ɀifananidzo, uŋgadya nhaka muʋushe bgaKristu naMŋari.
Ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unokunyeŋgerai namashoko asinamaturo; nokuti nemhaka yeɀinhu iɀi kutsamŋa kwaMŋari kunoʋuya pamsoro paʋanakomana ʋokusaterera.
Naiɀoɀo regai kushamŋaridzana naʋo;
nokuti kare maiʋa rima, asi ɀino muri ciedza munaShe; fambai saʋana ʋeciedza.
(Nokuti ciɓereko ceciedza ciri mukunaka kwose, nokururama, neɀokwaɗi),
muciidza muziʋe ɀinofadza Ishe.
Regai kuyanana namaɓasa erima asineɀiɓereko, asi ɀirinani kuti muaraire;
nokuti iɀo, ɀinoitwa naʋo pakaʋanda, ɀinonyadza kana ɀicirebga.
Asi ɀinhu ɀose, kana ɀarairwa, ɀinoratidzwa neciedza; nokuti ɀose, ɀinoratidzwa, caʋa ciedza.
Saka iye unoti: Muka iwe uʋete, muka kuʋakafa, Kristu ucakuvenekera.
Naiɀoɀo cenjerai kwaɀo pakufamba kwenyu, kuti murege kufamba saʋasinakucenjera asi saʋakacenjera;
muŋgwarire ŋguʋa
Saka musaʋa mapenzi, asi muziʋe kuɗa kwaShe.
Regai kuɓatwa newaini,
mutaurirane pakati penyu namapisarema, nenziyo, neɀiimbo ɀoMŋeya, muimbire, muridzire Ishe mumŋoyo yenyu;
muciʋoŋga Mŋari, Ƃaɓa, ŋguʋa dzose pamsoro peɀinhu ɀose, muzita raShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu;
muciɀiisa mumŋe pasi pomumŋe, mucitya Kristu.
Imi ʋakadzi,
Nokuti murume musoro womukadzi, saKristu ʋo musoro wekereke; iye amene ndiye muponesi womuʋiri.
Asi kereke seɀairi pasi paKristu, ʋakadzi ŋgaʋaɗaro paɀinhu ɀose kuʋarume ʋaʋo.
Imi ʋarume, iɗai ʋakadzi ʋenyu, Kristu seɀaakaɗa ʋo kereke, akaɀipa nokuɗa kwayo;
kuti aiite tȿene aciinatsa nokushambidza kwemvura pashoko,
kuti aɀiisire pamberi pake kereke, inobginya, isinegwapa, kana kuwonyana, kana cinhu cakaɗai; asi iʋe tȿene, isinemhosa.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋarume ʋanofanira kuɗa ʋakadzi ʋaʋo semiʋiri yaʋo. Unoɗa mukadzi wake, unoɀiɗa;
nokuti hakunomunhu wakatoŋgoʋeŋga nyama yake; asi unoipa ɀokudya nokuiceŋgeta, Kristu seɀa
nokuti isu tiri mitezo yomuʋiri wake.
Naiɀoɀo munhu ucasiya ɓaɓa ʋake namai ʋake, anamatire mukadzi wake; iʋaʋo ʋaʋiri ʋacaʋa nyama imŋe.
Cakaʋanzika ici, cikuru; asi ndinotaura ɀaKristu neɀekereke.
Asi imi ʋo, mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaaɗe mukadzi wake seɀa
Imi ʋana, tererai ʋaɓereki ʋenyu munaShe; nokuti ndiɀo ɀakarurama.
Kudza ɓaɓa ʋako namai — ndiwo murairo wokutaŋga unecipikirwa —
kuti uitirwe ɀakanaka, ugare ŋguʋa refu panyika.
Nemi madziɓaɓa, regai kutsamŋisa ʋana ʋenyu; asi ʋarerei pakuraŋga nokuraira kwaShe.
Imi ʋaranda, tererai aʋo ʋari ʋatenzi ʋenyu panyama, nokutya nokuɗeɗera, nemŋoyo yakarurama,
musiŋgaɓati kana muciʋonekwa
muciɓata nomŋoyo wakanaka,
muciziʋa kuti cinhu cipi necipi cakanaka, cinoitwa nomunhu mumŋe nomumŋe, ucacipiwa ɀe naShe, kana akasuŋgwa kana akasunuŋguka.
Nemi madzishe, muʋaitire saiɀoɀo, murege kuʋatyisa; nokuti munoziʋa kuti Ishe waʋo nowenyu uri kuɗeŋga; haatendi ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu.
Pakupedzisira iʋai nesimba munaShe, nomusimba rake guru.
Shoŋgai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMŋari, mugone kumira mucirwa namano aDiaborosi.
Nokuti hatirwi nenyama neropa, asi naʋaɓati, naʋanesimba, namadzishe enyika erima rino, nemŋeya yakaipa yeɗeŋga.
Saka torai nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo dzaMŋari, kuti mugone kudziʋisa pazuʋa rakaipa, nokuramba mumire mapedza ɀose.
Naiɀoɀo mirai makasuŋga ɀiʋuno ɀenyu neɀokwaɗi, makapfeka cidzitiro cecifuʋa cokururama,
makasuŋga patsoka dzenyu kugadzirwa kweEvaŋgeri yorugare;
pamsoro paiɀoɀi makatora nhoʋo huru yokutenda, yamuŋgagona kudzima nayo miseʋe yose yomŋoto yowakaipa.
Torai ŋgowani yoruponeso, nomunondo woMŋeya, iro Shoko raMŋari;
munyeŋgetere ŋguʋa dzose nokunyeŋgetera kwose nokukumbira muMŋeya, mucirinda paɀinhu iɀi nokutsuŋga kwose nokukumbirira ʋatȿene ʋose,
neni ʋo, kuti ndipiwe shoko kana ndicishamisa muromo waŋgu, kuti ndiɗudzire ndisiŋgatyi ɀakaʋanzika ɀeEvaŋgeri,
yandiri nhume yayo yakasuŋgwa namatare; kuti ndiɀitaure ndisiŋgatyi, seɀandinofanira kutaura.
Ɀino kuti muziʋe ʋo ɀaŋgu, kuti ndakaɗiniko, Tikiko, hama inoɗikanwa, nomushumiri wakatendeka munaShe, ucakuziʋisai ɀose;
ndakamutuma kwamuri neshoko iri, kuti muziʋe ɀinhu ɀeɗu, anyaradze mŋoyo yenyu.
Rugare ŋgaruʋe nehama, noruɗo pamŋe cete nokutenda, ɀinobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe naʋose ʋanoɗa Ishe weɗu, Jesu Kristu,
Pauro naTimotio, ʋaranda ʋaKristu Jesu, kuʋatȿene ʋose munaKristu Jesu, ʋari paFiripi, naʋatariri naʋaranda ʋekereke:
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare runobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari waŋgu ŋguʋa imŋe neimŋe kana ndicikufuŋgai, —
ndicikumbira nomufaro ŋguʋa dzose pakukumbira kwaŋgu kwose, pamsoro penyu mose —
nokuɗa kwokusoŋgana kwenyu paEvaŋgeri kubva pazuʋa rokutaŋga kuȿikira ɀino;
ndiciziʋa cinhu ici, kuti iye wakataŋga ɓasa rakanaka mukati menyu, ucaripedzisa kuȿikira pazuʋa raKristu Jesu;

seɀaɀakanaka kwandiri kuti ndifuŋge saiɀoɀo pamsoro penyu mose, ɀandinokuraŋgarirai mumŋoyo maŋgu, nokuti pakusuŋgwa kwaŋgu napakutaʋirira nokusimbisa Evaŋgeri, imi makagoʋerwa nyasha pamŋe cete neni.
Nokuti Mŋari capupu caŋgu kuti ndinokushuʋai mose ɀikuru netsitsi dzaKristu Jesu.
Ndiɀo zandinonyeŋgetera, kuti ruɗo rwenyu rurambe ruciŋgowanda pakuziʋa nokunzwisisa kwose;
kuti muidze muziʋe kuti ɀinhu ɀakanaka ndeɀipi, kuti muʋe ʋakarurama, ʋasinemhoȿa, kuȿikira pazuʋa raKristu;
muzere neciɓereko cokururama, cinoʋuya naJesu Kristu, kuti Mŋari aʋe nokubginya nokurumbidzwa.
Ɀino ndinoɗa kuti muziʋe, hama
nokuɗaro kuti kusuŋgwa kwaŋgu kwakazikanwa muimba yashe yose, nokunaʋamŋe ʋose kuti kuri munaKristu.
Nehama zhinji munaShe, dzakasimbiswa nokusuŋgwa kwaŋgu, ʋonyanya kutsuŋga kuparidza shoko raMŋari ʋasiŋgatyi.
Ʋamŋe haʋo ʋanoparidza Kristu negoɗo negakaʋa, ʋamŋe nomŋoyo wakanaka;
ʋamŋe haʋo ʋanoita noruɗo, ʋaciziʋa kuti ndakagadzwa kuti nditaʋirire Evaŋgeri.
Asi ʋamŋe ʋanoparidza Kristu nenharo, ʋasiŋgaiti nomŋoyo wakacena, ʋaciti ʋawedzere nhamo pakusuŋgwa kwaŋgu.
Ɀinei haɀo?
Nokuti ndinoziʋa kuti nokuɗa kwokukumbira kwenyu nokusimbiswa kwoMŋeya waJesu Kristu, iɀoɀi ɀicaʋa kuponeswa kwaŋgu,
ɀandinotarira ɀikuru netariro, kuti handiŋganyadziswi pacinhu cimŋe; asi kuti ɀino, sapaŋguʋa dzose, nokusatya
Nokuti kwandiri kurarama ndiKristu, kufa kufuma.
Ɀino kana ndicirarama panyama, iɀo
ɀino ndinomanikidzwa neɀinhu ɀiʋiri: ndinoɗa kubva, kuti ndiʋe naKristu, nokuti ndiɀo ɀinopfuʋura nokunaka;
asi nokuɗa kwenyu ɀakanaka kuti ndigare panyama.
Ɀino ndicitenda cinhu ici, ndinoziʋa kuti ndicagara, ndicaramba ndigere nemi mose, kuti mupfuʋurire mberi, mufare pakutenda;
kuti muɀirumbidze ɀikuru munaKristu Jesu pamsoro paŋgu nokuɗa kwokudzokera kwaŋgu kwamuri.

Asi fambai ɓedzi ɀakafanira Evaŋgeri yaKristu; kuti kunyaŋge ndikaʋuya ndikakuʋonai, kunyaŋge ndisi’po, ndinzwe pamsoro penyu kuti mumire nesimba nomŋeya mumŋe, nomŋoyo mumŋe, mucirwira kutenda kweEvaŋgeri;
musiŋgatyiswi pacinhu cimŋe naʋanorwa nemi. Ndiɀo ɀicaʋa ciratidzo cokuparadzwa kwaʋari, asi kwamuri cokuponeswa; cinhu ici cinobva kunaMŋari.
Nokuti nokuɗa kwaKristu imi makatenderwa kuti murege kutenda kwaari ɓedzi, asi kuti mutambudzike ʋo nokuɗa kwake;
imi mucirwa ʋo nokurwa uku kwamakaʋona kwandiri, kwamunonzwa kuti ndinorwa naɀino.
Ɀino kana kuʋaraidzwa kuri’po kunaKristu, kana kunyaradza kworuɗo, kana kuyanana kwoMŋeya, kana mŋoyo munyoro nokunzwira tsitsi,
zadzisai mufaro waŋgu, muʋe nokufuŋga kumŋe, muciʋa noruɗo rumŋe, nomŋeya mumŋe, nendaŋgariro imŋe,
musiŋgaiti cinhu nenharo, kana nokuɀikudza, asi mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaati nomŋoyo unoɀininipisa, ʋamŋe ʋanomupfuʋura iye pakunaka;
mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaarege kutarira ɀake, asi ŋgaatarire ɀaʋamŋe ʋo.
Iʋai nomŋoyo uyo, wakaŋga uri munaKristu Jesu ʋo;
iye, kunyaŋge akaŋga akafanana naMŋari, haana‐kuti kuenzana naMŋari ndicinhu
asi wakaɀiɗurura iye, akaɀiita muranda, akafanana naʋanhu;
akati awanikwa nomufananidzo womunhu, akaɀininipisa, akaterera kuȿikira parufu, irwo rufu rwomucinjikwa.
Saka Mŋari wakamukudza ɀikuru, akamupa zita rinopfuʋura mazita ose;
kuti muzita raJesu mabvi ose afugame, aʋari kuɗeŋga naʋari panyika, naʋari pasi penyika,
kuti ndimi dzose dzibvumire dziti, Jesu Kristu ndiyeShe, kuti Mŋari, Ƃaɓa, arumbidzwe.
Naiɀoɀo, ʋaɗikanwa ʋaŋgu, seɀamakaterera ŋguʋa dzose, ndisati ndiri’po ɓedzi, asi ɀikuru ɀino kana ndisi’po, pedzisai kuponeswa kwenyu nokutya nokuɗeɗera;
nokuti ndiye Mŋari unoita mukati menyu kuɗa nokuita nokuɗa kwake kwakanaka.
Itai ɀose musiŋganyunyuti, musinenharo;
kuti muʋe ʋanhu ʋasina‐caʋaŋgapomerwa, naʋasina‐kusarurama, ʋana ʋaMŋari ʋasinemhoȿa pakati porudzi rwakakombama, rwakatsauka, rwamunoʋonekwa pakati parwo seɀiedza panyika;
makaɓatisisa shoko roʋupenyu, kuti ndiʋe necandiŋgaɀirumbidza naco nezuʋa raKristu,
Kunyaŋge ndikaɗururwa pamsoro peciɓayiro nokushumira kwokutenda kwenyu, ndinofara nokufarisisa nemi mose.
Nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀo nemi ʋo mufare nokufarisisa neni.
MunaShe Jesu ndinoti ndicakurumidza kutuma Timotio kwamuri, kuti neni ndifare kana ndanzwa ɀenyu.
Nokuti handino
Nokuti ʋose ʋanoɀitȿakira ɀaʋo, ɀisati ɀiri ɀaKristu Jesu.
Asi munoziʋa kutendeka kwake, kuti wakaɓata pamŋe cete neni paEvaŋgeri, somŋana
Ɀino ndiye wandinoti ndicatuma kwamuri pakarepo, kana ndaʋona kuti ɀaŋgu ɀakaɗini;
asi ndinotenda munaShe kuti neni ʋo ndimene ndicakurumidza kuʋuya.
Asi ndakati ndinofanira kutuma kwamuri Epafrodito, hama
ɀaakaŋga acikushuʋai ɀikuru imi mose, akatambudzika kwaɀo, nokuti imi makaŋga manzwa kuti unorwara.
Nokuti wakaŋga acirwara kwaɀo, ari pakufa; asi Mŋari wakamunzwira tsitsi; asati ari iye ɓedzi, asi neni ʋo, kuti ini ndirege kuwedzerwa nhamo pamsoro penhamo.
Naiɀoɀo ndakashiŋgaira kumutuma kwamuri, kuti mumuʋone, mufare ɀe, neni ndirege kuʋa nenhamo.
Naiɀoɀo mumugamucirei munaShe nomufaro wose, ʋuye mukudze ʋakaɗai;
nokuti nokuɗa kweɓasa raKristu wakaŋga oɗo‐kufa, akasaraŋgarira ʋupenyu bgake, aciɗa kukwanisa pamakaŋga musiŋgagoni kundishumira imi.
Pakupedzisira, hama dzaŋgu, farai munaShe. Ini handinetswi nokukunyorerai ɀe ɀinhu ɀiya, asi ɀinokusimbisai imi.
Ityai imbga, ityai ʋaɓati ʋakaipa, ityai ʋokuceka;
nokuti isu tiri ʋokudziŋgiswa, tinonamata noMŋeya waMŋari, tinoɀirumbidza munaKristu Jesu, tisiŋgaʋimbi nenyama,
kunyaŋge ini haŋgu ndiŋgaʋimba nenyama; kana kunomumŋe munhu unoti ndinoʋimba nenyama, ɀikuru ini.
Ndakadziŋgiswa nomusi worusere, ndiri worudzi rwaʋaIsraeri ʋeimba yaBenjamini, muHeberu waʋaHeberu; pamurairo ndiri muFarise;
pakushiŋgaira
Asi iɀoɀo, ɀaiʋa fuma kwandiri, ndakati ndiko kurashikirwa hako nokuɗa kwaKristu.
Hoŋo, ɀirokwaɀo, ndinototi ɀinhu ɀose kurashikirwa hako nokuɗa kwokunaka kwokuziʋa Kristu Jesu, Ishe waŋgu, wandakarashikirwa neɀinhu ɀose nokuɗa kwake, ndikaɀiidza marara, kuti ndiwane Kristu;
ndiwanikwe maari, ndisina‐kururama kwaŋgu kuri kwomurairo, asi kuri kwokutenda kunaKristu, ndiko kururama kunobva kunaMŋari nenzira yokutenda;
kuti ndimuziʋe iye, nesimba rokumuka kwake, nokusoŋgana
kuti ɀimŋe ndiȿike pakumuka kwaʋakafa.
Handiti ndato
Hama
ndinoshiŋgairira kunharidzano,
Naiɀoɀo isu tose, takakura, ŋgatiʋe nomŋoyo wakaɗaro; kana imi munomumŋe mŋoyo, Mŋari ucakuratidzai naiɀoɀo ʋo.
Asi, ŋgatirambe ticifamba ɓedzi
Hama
Nokuti ʋazhinji, ʋandakakuʋudzai ɀizhinji, naɀino ndinokuʋudzai ʋo nokucema, ʋanofamba ʋari ʋaʋeŋgi ʋomucinjikwa waKristu;
kuguma kwaʋo ndiko kuparadzwa, mŋari waʋo iɗumbu raʋo, ʋanoɀirumbidza pamsoro peɀinonyadzisa ɀaʋo, ʋanofuŋga ɀenyika.
Nokuti nyika yeɗu iri kuɗeŋga, uko kwatakatarira
uyo ucaʋandudza muʋiri wokuninipiswa kweɗu, kuti ufanane nomuʋiri wokubginya kwake, nesimba iro raanogona ʋo naro kuɀiisira ɀose pasi pake.
Naiɀoɀo, hama dzaŋgu, ʋaɗikanwa ʋandinoshuʋa kwaɀo, mufaro waŋgu, nekorona yaŋgu, mirai nesimba saiɀoɀo munaShe, ʋaɗikanwa.
Ndinokumbira ɀikuru Yuodia, ndinokumbira ɀikuru Sintike, kuti ʋaʋe nomŋoyo mumŋe munaShe.

Hoŋo, newe ʋo, shamŋari yaŋgu yaɀokwaɗi paɓasa, ndinokumbira kwauri kuti uɓatsire ʋanhukadzi aʋa, nokuti ʋakaɓatirana neni paEvaŋgeri, pamŋe cete naKremensi, naʋamŋe ʋakaɓata pamŋe cete neni, mazita aʋo ari mubuku yoʋupenyu.
Farai munaShe ŋguʋa dzose; ndicapamhidza ɀe: Farai.
Ʋunyoro bgenyu ŋgabguzikanwe naʋanhu ʋose. Ishe uri pedyo.
Musafuŋganya pamsoro pecinhu cimŋe; asi paɀinhu ɀose, mikumbiro yenyu ŋgaiziʋiswe Mŋari nokunyeŋgetera nokukumbira, pamŋe cete nokuʋoŋga.
Ɀino rugare rwaMŋari runopfuʋura kunzwisisa kwose, rucarinda mŋoyo yenyu nemifuŋgo yenyu munaKristu Jesu.
Pakupedzisira, hama
Ɀinhu iɀo ɀamakadzidza, neɀamakapiwa, neɀamakanzwa, neɀamakaʋona kwandiri, itai iɀoɀo; Mŋari worugare ŋgaaʋe nemi.
Ndakafara ɀikuru munaShe, nokuti ɀino makapepuka ɀe mukandiraŋgarira; makaŋga maraŋgarira henyu, asi makashaiwa ŋguʋa.
Handireʋi
Ndinoziʋa ʋurombo, ndinoziʋa ʋo kuʋa neɀakawanda; pacinhu cipi necipi napaɀinhu ɀose ndakadzidziswa kuti ndiziʋe kuguta nokunzwa nzara, kuʋa neɀizhinji nokushaiwa.
Ndiŋgaita ɀose naiye unondipa simba.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, makaita ɀakanaka ɀamakasoŋgana neni pakutambudzika kwaŋgu.
Munoziʋa ʋo, imi ʋaFiripi, kuti pakutaŋga kweEvaŋgeri, ndicibva Makedonia, pakaŋga pasinekereke imŋe yakasoŋgana neni pashoko rokupa nokugamucira, asi imi moga;
nokuti napaTesaronika makanditumira kamŋe, norwecipiri ɀe, pakushaiwa kwaŋgu.
Handi
Ɀino ndaʋa neɀose, ndafumiswa; ndaguta, ndagamucira kunaEpafrodito iɀo, ɀinobva kwamuri,
Ɀino Mŋari waŋgu ucazadzisa kushaiwa kwenyu kwose pafuma yake, mukubginya, munaKristu Jesu.
Ɀino Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, ŋgaaʋe nokubginya nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Ʋatȿene ʋose ʋanokukwazisai, ɀikuru aʋo ʋeimba yaKesari.
Nyasha dzaShe Jesu Kristu ŋgadziʋe nomŋeya wenyu.
Pauro, muapostora waKristu Jesu nokuɗa kwaMŋari, naTimotio, hama yeɗu,
kuʋatȿene nehama dzakatendeka munaKristu ʋari paKorose: Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare ɀinobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu.
Tinoʋoŋga Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, ŋguʋa dzose kana ticikunyeŋgetererai,
ɀatakanzwa ɀokutenda kwenyu munaKristu Jesu, noruɗo rwamunarwo kuʋatȿene ʋose,
pamsoro petariro yamakaceŋgeterwa kuɗeŋga, yamakanzwa kare pashoko reɀokwaɗi reEvaŋgeri;
iyo yakaȿika kwamuri, seɀa
seɀamakadzidza kunaEpafrasi, muranda pamŋe cete nesu, unoɗikanwa, mushumiri wakatendeka waKristu nokuɗa kwenyu,
iye wakatiʋudza ʋo ɀoruɗo rwenyu muMŋeya.
Saka nesu ʋo, kubvira pazuʋa ratakanzwa, hatiregi kukunyeŋgetererai, nokukumbira kuti muzadziswe nokuziʋa kwaɀo kuɗa kwake, pakucenjera nokunzwisisa kwose kwomŋeya;
kuti mufambe seɀinofanira Ishe, muci
mucisimbiswa nesimba rose, nesimba rokubginya kwake,
muʋoŋge Ƃaɓa, ʋakatikwanisa kuti tipiwe nhaka yaʋatȿene muciedza;
ʋakatisunuŋgura pasimba rerima, ʋakatiisa muʋushe bgoMŋanakomana woruɗo rwaʋo;
watinedzikinuro maari,
Ndiye mufananidzo waMŋari usiŋgaʋonekwi, ɗaŋgwe reɀisikwa ɀose;
nokuti maari ɀinhu ɀose ɀakasikwa, ɀiri kuɗeŋga napanyika, ɀinoʋonekwa neɀisiŋgaʋonekwi, kana ɀiri ɀigaro ɀoʋushe, kana ʋushe, kana ʋaɓati, kana masimba; ɀinhu ɀose ɀakasikwa naye,
Ndiye unotaŋgira ɀose, ɀose ɀakaɓatana maari.
Ndiye musoro womuʋiri,
Nokuti
kuti naye ayananise ɀinhu ɀose kwaari, amboita rugare neropa romucinjikwa wake; naiye, kunyaŋge ɀiri panyika, kunyaŋge ɀiri kuɗeŋga.
Nemi ʋo, kare maiʋa ʋaeni naʋaʋeŋgi pakufuŋga kwenyu pamaɓasa enyu akaipa,
asi ɀino waka
kana muciŋgorambira pakutenda, makateyiwa, mumire makasimba, musiŋgabviswi patariro yeEvaŋgeri yamakanzwa, yakaparidzirwa ɀisikwa ɀose pasi pokuɗeŋga; iyo
Ɀino ndinofara pakutambudzika kwaŋgu nokuɗa kwenyu, ndicizadzisa panyama yaŋgu ɀakasara pamaɗambudziko aKristu, nokuɗa kwomuʋiri wake, iyo kereke;
iyo yandakaitwa mushumiri wayo seɀandakagoʋerwa naMŋari pamsoro penyu, kuti ndizadzise shoko raMŋari;
cakaʋanzika, cakaŋga cakafukidzwa kubvira pakutaŋga kweŋguʋa nendudzi, asi ɀino cakaratidzwa ʋatȿene ʋake;
kunaiʋo Mŋari waakaɗa kuʋaziʋisa ʋufumi bgokubginya kwecakaʋanzika icoci pakati paʋahedeni, cokuti, Kristu mukati menyu, tariro yokubginya;
iye watinoparidza isu, ticiraira munhu mumŋe nomumŋe, ticidzidzisa munhu mumŋe nomumŋe noʋucenjeri bgose, kuti tiise munhu mumŋe nomumŋe akakwana munaKristu;
ndiɀo ɀandinoɓatira ʋo, ndicirwa,
Nokuti ndinoɗa kuti muziʋe kurwa kukuru kwandinako pamsoro penyu, naʋari paRaodikia, naʋose ʋasina‐kumboʋona ciso caŋgu panyama;
kuti mŋoyo yaʋo isimbiswe, ʋasuŋganidzwe muruɗo,
maari fuma yose yoʋucenjeri nokuziʋa yakaceŋgetwa.
Ndinoreʋa iɀi, kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu unokurashai namashoko anonyeŋgera.
Nokuti kunyaŋge ndisi’po panyama, ndiri’po nemi pamŋeya, ndinofara ndiciʋona kunzwana kwenyu, nokusimba kwokutenda kwenyu munaKristu.
Naiɀoɀo seɀamakagamucira Kristu Jesu, Ishe, fambai maari,
munemidzi
Cenjerai, kuti murege kutapxa nomunhu noʋucenjeri, nokunyeŋgera kusinamaturo, aciteʋera tsika dzaʋanhu neɀokuʋamba ɀenyika, asiŋgateʋeri Kristu.
Nokuti kuzara kwoʋuMŋari kunogara maari pamuʋiri.
Maari nemi ʋo makazadzwa, iye musoro waʋaɓati ʋose namasimba;
iye wamakadziŋgiswa ʋo maari nokudziŋgiswa kusiŋgaitwi namaʋoko, muʋiri wenyama ucibviswa, nokudziŋgiswa kuri kwaKristu;
makaʋigwa pamŋe cete naye pakubapatidzwa, pamakamutswa ʋo pamŋe cete naye nokutenda kwenyu simba raMŋari wakamumutsa kuʋakafa.
Nemi, imi makaŋga makafa pakuɗarika kwenyu napakusadziŋgiswa kwenyama yenyu, wakakupai ʋupenyu pamŋe cete naye, akatikaŋganwira kuɗarika kweɗu kwose,
akadzima rugwaro rwakaŋga rucirwa nesu paɀireʋo
akaparadza ʋaɓati namasimba, akaʋaɓuɗisa pacena, akaʋakunda mauri.
Naiɀoɀo munhu ŋgaarege kuʋa’po unokutoŋgai paɀokudya, kana ɀokunwa, kana nokuɗa kwomusi womutambo, kana pakugara kwomŋedzi, kana pasaɓata;
iɀi mumvuri weɀicaʋuya; asi muʋiri ndowaKristu.
Munhu ŋgaarege kuʋa’po unokutorerai muɓairo wenyu namaʋune, nokuɀininipisa nokunamata ʋatumŋa, aciʋimba neɀaakaʋona, aciɀikudza pasina nokufuŋga kwenyama,
asiŋgaɓatisisi Musoro, uyo, maari muʋiri wose unosimbiswa nokusuŋganidzwa neɀisuŋgo namarunda, ndokukura nokukurisa kwaMŋari.
usaɓata, usaraʋira, usagunɀa,
(iɀi ɀose ɀinofanira kuparadzwa kana ɀoɓatwa naɀo); muciteʋera mirairo nedzidziso dzaʋanhu?
Ɀinhu ɀakaɗai ɀakaita seɀinoʋucenjeri, pakunamata
Naiɀoɀo, kana makamutswa pamŋe cete naKristu, tȿakai ɀiri kumsoro, uko kunaKristu, ugere kurudyi rwaMŋari.
Fuŋgai ɀiri kumsoro, musafuŋga ɀiri pasi.
Nokuti makafa, ʋupenyu bgenyu bgakaʋigwa pamŋe cete naKristu munaMŋari.
Kana Kristu, iye ʋupenyu bgeɗu, aciʋonekwa, nemi ʋo mucaʋonekwa pamŋe cete naye pakubginya.
Naiɀoɀo ʋurayai mitezo yenyu iri panyika,
Nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀi kutsamŋa kwaMŋari kunoʋuya pamsoro paʋana ʋokusaterera;
nemi ʋo maifamba maɀiri kare, maigara muɀinhu iɀi.
Asi ɀino, imi ʋo, bvisai iɀi ɀose,
Regai kureʋerana nhema, ɀamakabvisa munhu wekare namaɓasa ake,
mukafuka munhu mutȿa, unoʋandudzwa pakuziʋa, afanane nowakamusika;
apo hapana‐muGiriki nomuJuda, kudziŋgiswa nokusadziŋgiswa, mutorwa nomuSitia, musuŋgwa nowakasunuŋguka; asi Kristu ndiye ɀose, ʋuye uri munaʋose.
Naiɀoɀo, saʋasanaŋgurwa ʋaMŋari, ʋatȿene naʋanoɗikanwa, fukai mŋoyo unetsitsi, nomŋoyo munyoro, nokusaɀikudza, noʋunyoro, nomŋoyo murefu;
muitirane mŋoyo murefu, mucikaŋganwirana, kana munhu anemhoȿa nomumŋe; Ishe seɀaakakukaŋganwirai, muite saiɀoɀo nemi ʋo.
Ɀino pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi ɀose
norugare rwaKristu ŋgaruteme ɀireʋo mumŋoyo yenyu, ndirwo rwamakaɗanirwa ʋo mumuʋiri mumŋe; iʋai nokuʋoŋga.
Shoko raKristu ŋgarigare mukati menyu riwande; nokucenjera kwose mudzidzisane, nokurairana namapisarema, nenziyo, neɀiimbo ɀomŋeya, muimbire Mŋari nenyasha mumŋoyo menyu;
ʋuye ɀose ɀamunoita, kana ɀiri ɀeshoko kana ɓasa, itai ɀose nezita raShe Jesu, muciʋoŋga Mŋari Ƃaɓa naye.
Ʋakadzi, muɀiise pasi paʋarume ʋenyu, seɀaɀakafanira munaShe.
Ʋarume, iɗai ʋakadzi ʋenyu, regai kuʋa nehasha naʋo.
Ʋana, tererai ʋaɓereki ʋenyu paɀinhu ɀose, nokuti ndiɀo ɀakanaka munaShe.
Madziɓaɓa, regai kunetsa ʋana ʋenyu, kuti ʋarege kuʋora mŋoyo.
Ʋaranda, tererai paɀinhu ɀose ʋatenzi ʋenyu panyama; regai kuɓata pamberi pameso aʋo, saʋafadzi ʋaʋanhu, asi nomŋoyo wakarurama mucitya Ishe.
Ɀose ɀamunoita, muɀiitei nomŋoyo
muciziʋa kuti mucapiwa naShe muɓairo wenhaka;
Nokuti unoita ɀisakarurama, ucapiwa ɀisakarurama ɀaakaita; haɀizi ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu ɀinotendwa.
Madzishe, itirai ʋaranda ʋenyu ɀakarurama, ɀakariŋgana; muziʋe kuti nemi ʋo munaShe kuɗeŋga.
Tsuŋgirirai pakunyeŋgetera, murinde pakuri nokuʋoŋga;
mutinyeŋgeterere nesu ʋo kamŋe, kuti Mŋari atizarurire mukoʋa weshoko, titaure cakaʋanzika caKristu, candakasuŋgirwa ico;
kuti ndiciratidze, seɀandinofanira kutaura.
Fambai nokucenjera kunaʋari kunze, muciŋgwarira ŋguʋa
Kutaura kwenyu ŋgakuʋe nenyasha ŋguʋa dzose, kwakaruŋgwa nomunyu, kuti muziʋe kupindura mumŋe nomumŋe seɀamunofanira kuita.
Mucaziʋiswa ɀaŋgu ɀose naTikiko, hama inoɗikanwa, mushumiri wakatendeka, nomuranda pamŋe cete neni munaShe.
Ndakamutuma iye kwamuri nemhaka iyi, kuti muziʋe ɀeɗu, anyaradze mŋoyo yenyu;
pamŋe cete naOnesimo, hama yakatendeka, inoɗikanwa, mumŋe wokwenyu. Iʋo ʋacakuziʋisai ɀose ɀapano.
Aristarko, musuŋgwa pamŋe cete neni, unokukwazisai, naMarko, hama yaBarnabasi, (makarairwa pamsoro pake; kana aciȿika, mumugamucirei);
naJesu, unonzi Justo, ʋari ʋokudziŋgiswa; ndiʋaʋa ɓedzi ʋanoɓata neni paʋushe bgaMŋari, iʋo ʋakandinyaradza.
Epafrasi, mumŋe wokwenyu, muranda waKristu Jesu, unokukwazisai, acirwa ŋguʋa dzose pakunyeŋgetera nokuɗa kwenyu, kuti mumire makakwana, muciziʋa kwaɀo kuɗa kwose kwaMŋari.
Nokuti ndinomupupurira, kuti unotambudzika ɀikuru nokuɗa kwenyu, naʋeRaodikia, naʋeHirapori.
Ruka, ŋaŋga inoɗikanwa, naDemasi, ʋanokukwazisai.
kwazisirei hama dziri Raodikia, naNimfa, nekereke iri mumba maʋo.
Kana ŋwadi iyi yarabga pakati penyu, ŋgairabge ʋo mukereke yaʋaRaodikia; imi ʋo muraʋe ŋwadi inobva Raodikia.
Ʋudzai Arkipo,
Ndiko kukwazisa kwaŋgu, ini Pauro, noruʋoko rwaŋgu. Raŋgarirai kusuŋgwa kwaŋgu. Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi.
Pauro, naSirvano, naTimotio, kukereke yaʋaTesaronika, iri munaMŋari, Ƃaɓa, naShe Jesu Kristu: Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi norugare.
Tinoʋoŋga Mŋari ŋguʋa dzose nokuɗa kwenyu mose, ticikuraŋgarirai pakunyeŋgetera kweɗu;
ticiramba ticiraŋgarira ɓasa renyu rinobva pakutenda, nokutamburira
tinoziʋa, hama dzinoɗikanwa naMŋari, kusanaŋgurwa kwenyu.
Nokuti Evaŋgeri yeɗu haina‐kuʋuya kwamuri neshoko ɓedzi, asi nesimba ʋo, nomumŋeya Mutȿene, nokuziʋa kwaɀo; seɀamunoziʋa kuti takaŋga takaɗini pakati penyu nokuɗa kwenyu.
Nemi makaʋa ʋateʋeri ʋeɗu naʋaShe, ɀamakagamucira Shoko mumaɗambudziko mazhinji, nomufaro woMŋeya Mutȿene;
naiɀoɀo makatuŋgamirira ʋose ʋanotenda muMakedonia neAkaya.
Nokuti shoko raShe, rakabva kwamuri, rakanzwika, kusati kuri kuMakedonia neAkaya ɓedzi, asi kutenda kwenyu kunaMŋari kwakaȿika kwose; naiɀoɀo hatifaniri kutaura cinhu.
Nokuti iʋo ʋamene ʋanoparidza kupinda kweɗu kwamuri, kuti kwakaŋga kwakaɗini; ʋuye, kuti makatendeʋukira kunaMŋari, mucibva paɀifananidzo, kuti muɓatire Mŋari mupenyu waɀokwaɗi,
nokumirira Mŋanakomana wake pakubva kwake kuɗeŋga, iye waakamutsa kuʋakafa, ndiye Jesu unotisunuŋgura pakutsamŋa kunoʋuya.
Nokuti nemi, hama
Asi takati tatambudzika nokuitirwa ɀakaipa paFiripi, seɀamunoziʋa, takatsuŋga munaMŋari weɗu, tikakuparidzirai Evaŋgeri yaMŋari pakati pokudziʋiswa kukuru.
Nokuti kuraira kweɗu hakuna‐kubva pakurashika, kana pakufuŋga kwakaipa, kana pakunyeŋgera;
asi seɀatakatendiwa naMŋari, kuti tipiwe Evaŋgeri, ndiɀo ɀatinotaura; tisiŋgaiti kuti tifadze ʋanhu, asi Mŋari unoidza mŋoyo yeɗu.
Nokuti, seɀamunoziʋa, hatina‐kutoŋgoreʋa namashoko okuɓata kumeso, kana namano‐mano okukarira fuma, Mŋari capupu;
tisiŋgatȿaki kukudzwa naʋanhu kana nemi, kana naʋamŋe, kunyaŋge taigona kukuremedzai, ɀatiri ʋaapostora ʋaKristu.
Asi takaŋga tiri ʋanyoro pakati penyu, somureri kana aciʋaraidza ʋana ʋake;
saiɀoɀo takakushuʋai kwaɀo, tikati ɀakanaka kuti tirege kugoʋana nemi Evaŋgeri yaMŋari ɓedzi, asi kunyaŋge nemŋeya yeɗu ʋo, nokuti makaŋga maɗikanwa nesu kwaɀo.
Nokuti, hama
Imi muri ɀapupu, naMŋari ʋo, kuti taifamba noʋutȿene nokururama, tisina‐catiŋgapomerwa kwamuri, imi ʋanotenda.
Seɀamunoziʋa kuti
ticikurairai, ticikusimbisai, ticikupupurirai, kuti mufambe ɀakafanira Mŋari, iye unokuɗanirai kuʋushe bgake nokubginya

Saka isu ʋo tinoramba ticiʋoŋga Mŋari, kuti paŋguʋa yamakagamucira shoko, iro shoko raMŋari, ramakanzwa kwatiri, hamuna‐kurigamucira seshoko raʋanhu, asi seshoko raMŋari, (riri iro ɀirokwaɀo) rinoɓata ʋo mukati menyu, imi munotenda.
Nokuti imi, hama
Ndiʋo ʋakaʋuraya Ishe Jesu naʋaprofita, ʋakatidziŋga isu, ʋasiŋgafadzi Mŋari, ʋacirwa naʋanhu ʋose;
ʋanotidziʋisa kuti tirege kuparidzira ʋahedeni, kuti ʋaponeswe; kuti ʋarambe ʋacizadzisa ɀiʋi ɀaʋo; asi kutsamŋa kwakaɓurukira pamsoro paʋo kuȿikira pakuguma.
Ɀino isu, hama
naiɀoɀo taiɗa kuʋuya kwamuri, ini Pauro, kamŋe ʋuye ɀe rwecipiri, asi Satani wakatidziʋisa.
Nokuti tariro yeɗu ndeipiko, kana mufaro, kana korona yokuɀirumbidza nayo? Hamuzimi here, pamberi paShe weɗu Jesu pakuʋuya kwake?
Nokuti imi muri kubginya kweɗu nomufaro weɗu.
Saka ɀatakaŋga tisiŋgagoni kutsuŋga, takati ɀakanaka kuti tisiyiwe tiri toga paAtene;
tikatuma Timotio, hama yeɗu, mushumiri waMŋari paEvaŋgeri yaKristu, kuti akusimbisei, nokukutsuŋgisai mŋoyo pakutenda kwenyu;
kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu unozunuŋguswa nenhamo idzi, nokuti munoziʋa mumene kuti takagadzirirwa iɀoɀo.
Nokuti ticiri kwamuri takambokuʋudzai kuti ticatambudzwa; seɀaɀakaitika, nemi munoziʋa.
Saka ini ʋo, ɀandakaŋga ndisicagoni kutsuŋga, ndaka

Asi ɀino Timotio wakati aȿika kwatiri acaŋgobva kwamuri, akatiʋudza mashoko akanaka okutenda kwenyu noruɗo rwenyu, ʋuye kuti munoŋgositifuŋga nomuraŋgariro wakanaka, muciɗa ɀikuru kutiʋona isu, sesu ʋo ticiɗa kukuʋonai imi;
saka, hama
nokuti ɀino isu tinorarama, kana imi mumire makasimba munaShe.
Nokuti tiŋgaʋoŋga Mŋari neiko pamsoro penyu, nomufaro wose watinofara nawo pamberi paMŋari weɗu nokuɗa kwenyu,
ticiŋgokumbira ɀikuru ʋusiku namasikati kuti tiʋone ciso cenyu, kuti tizadzise ɀakatairira pakutenda kwenyu?
Ɀino iye Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe weɗu Jesu, ŋgaaruramisire nzira yeɗu kwamuri;
ishe akukurisei, akuwanzisirei ruɗo pakati penyu nokunaʋose, seɀatinoita isu kwamuri,
asimbise mŋoyo yenyu kuti iʋe isina‐caiŋgapomerwa paʋutȿene pamberi paMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, pakuʋuya kwaShe weɗu Jesu pamŋe cete naʋatȿene ʋake ʋose.
Naiɀoɀo pakupedzisira, hama
Nokuti munoziʋa mirairo yatakakupai naShe Jesu.
Nokuti kuɗa kwaMŋari ndibgo ʋutȿene bgenyu, murege ʋupombge;
kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu aziʋe kuɀiwanira mudziyo wake noʋutȿene nokukudzwa,
asiŋgaiti nokukara kwokuciʋa, saʋahedeni, ʋasiŋgaziʋi Mŋari;
munhu ŋgaarege kuitira hama yake ɀakaipa kana kumunyeŋgera pacinhu ici, nokuti Ishe ndiye mutsiʋi weɀinhu iɀoɀo ɀose, seɀatakakuʋudzai ʋo nokukupupurirai kwaɀo.
Nokuti Mŋari haana‐kutiɗanira tȿina, asi muʋutȿene.
Naiɀoɀo unoramba
Ɀino, kana ruri ruɗo pakati pehama, hamufaniri kuti munyorerwe, nokuti imi mumene makadzidziswa naMŋari kuti muɗane;
nokuti ndiɀo ɀamunoitira hama dzose dzeMakedonia yose, asi tinokurairai, hama
shiŋgairirai
kuti mufambe nomutoʋo wakafanira kunaʋari kunze, musiŋgashaiwi cinhu.
Ɀino, hama
Nokuti kana ticitenda kuti Jesu wakafa, akamuka ɀe, saiɀoɀo ʋo aʋo ʋakaʋata munaJesu, Mŋari ucaʋaʋuyisa pamŋe cete naye.
Nokuti tinokuʋudzai neshoko raShe, kuti isu ʋapenyu, ʋakasara kuȿikira pakuʋuya kwaShe, hatiŋgatoŋgotaŋgiri ʋakaʋata.
Nokuti Ishe amene ucaɓuruka kuɗeŋga nokuɗanidzira, nenzwi romutumŋa mukuru, nehwamanda yaMŋari; ʋakafa munaKristu ʋacataŋga kumuka;
ɀino isu ʋapenyu, ʋakasara, ticatorwa pamŋe cete naʋo mumakore, kuti ticiŋgamidze Ishe muɗeŋga; naiɀoɀo ticaʋa naShe ŋguʋa dzose.
Naiɀoɀo nyaradzanai namashoko awa.
Asi kana dziri ŋguʋa nemisi, hama
nokuti imi mumene munoziʋa kwaɀo, kuti zuʋa raShe rinoȿika sembava ʋusiku.
Kana ʋaciti, Rugare, nokugarika — ipapo kuparadzwa kucakurumidza kuʋawira, sokurwadzwa kwomukadzi unemimba; haʋaŋgatoŋgopukunyuki.
Asi imi, hama
Nokuti imi mose muri ʋana ʋeciedza, naʋana ʋamasikati; hatizi ʋoʋusiku, kana ʋerima.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatirege kuʋata saʋamŋe, asi tirinde, tiȿinuke.
Nokuti ʋanoʋata, ʋanoʋata ʋusiku; ʋanoɓatwa neɗoro, ʋanoɓatwa ʋusiku.
Asi isu, ɀatiri ʋamasikati, ŋgatiȿinuke, takapfeka cidzitiro cecifuʋa cokutenda noruɗo; neŋgowani iʋe tariro yoruponeso.
Nokuti Mŋari haana‐kutiisira kutsamŋa, asi kuti tiwane ruponeso naShe weɗu Jesu Kristu;
wakatifira isu, kuti, kana ticirinda, kana ticiʋata, tirarame pamŋe cete naye.
Saka nyaradzanai, musimbisane, seɀamunoita ʋo.
Ɀino tinokumbira kwamuri, hama
muʋakudze ɀikuru noruɗo, nokuɗa kweɓasa raʋo. Iʋai norugare pakati penyu.
Tinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, hama
Cenjerai kuti mumŋe arege kutsiʋa mumŋe ɀakaipa neɀakaipa; asi ŋguʋa dzose muteʋere ɀinhu ɀakanaka, mumŋe kunomumŋe, nokunaʋose.
Farai ŋguʋa dzose.
Rambai mucinyeŋgetera.
Ʋoŋgai paɀinhu ɀose; nokuti ndiko kuɗa kwaMŋari kwamuri munaKristu Jesu.
Musadzima Mŋeya;
musaɀidza ɀinoprofitwa;
idzai ɀinhu ɀose; muɓatisise ɀakanaka;
regai marudzi ose eɀakaipa.
Mŋari worugare amene ŋgaakuitei ʋatȿene kwaɀo; Mŋeya wenyu, nomŋoyo, nomuʋiri, ɀiceŋgetwe kwaɀo, ɀisina‐ɀaɀiŋgapomerwa pakuʋuya kwaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu.
Wakatendeka ndiye unokuɗanai, ucaɀiita ʋo.
Hama
Kwazisai hama dzose nokuȿeta kutȿene.
Ndinokupikirai naShe, kuti ŋwadi iyi iraʋirwe hama dzose.
Nyasha dzaShe weɗu Jesu ŋgadziʋe nemi.
Pauro, naSirvano, naTimotio, kukereke yaʋaTesaronika munaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu:
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare runobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa, naShe Jesu Kristu
Tinofanira kuʋoŋga Mŋari ŋguʋa dzose pamsoro penyu, hama
nokuɗaro isu timene tinoɀirumbidza mamuri pakereke dzaMŋari pamsoro pokutsuŋgirira kwenyu, nokutenda
Ndiɀo ɀinoratidza kutoŋga kwakarurama kwaMŋari; kuti mugonzi makafanirwa noʋushe bgaMŋari, bgamunotambudzikira ʋo;
ɀaɀakarurama kunaMŋari, kuti atsiʋe nokutambudzika iʋaʋo ʋanokutambudzai;
nemi munotambudzwa, kuti mupiwe kuzorora pamŋe cete nesu pakuʋonekwa kwaShe Jesu, kana acibva kuɗeŋga naʋatumŋa ʋesimba rake,
mumŋoto unopfuta, acitsiʋa aʋo ʋasiŋgaziʋi Mŋari, naʋasiŋgatereri Evaŋgeri yaShe weɗu, Jesu;
iʋo ʋacarobga nokuparadzwa kusiŋgaperi, kuti ʋabve pamberi paShe, napakubginya kwesimba rake,
kana aciʋuya kuzorumbidzwa muʋatȿene ʋake, nokukanukirwa munaʋose ʋanotenda nezuʋa irero; (nokuti kupupura kweɗu kwamuri kwakatendwa).
Naiɀoɀo tinokunyeŋgetererai ʋo ŋguʋa dzose, kuti Mŋari weɗu ati, makafanirwa nokuɗanwa kwenyu, akwanise nesimba rake kuɗa kwenyu kwose kuita ɀakanaka namaɓasa ose okutenda;
kuti zita raShe weɗu Jesu rirumbidzwe mamuri, nemi maari, seɀadzakaita nyasha dzaMŋari weɗu nedzaShe Jesu Kristu.
Ɀino tinokumbira kwamuri, hama
kuti murege kukurumidza kuzunuŋguswa pakufuŋga kwenyu, kana kuvunduswa, kana nomŋeya, kana neshoko, kana neŋwadi, inonzi inobva kwatiri, muciti zuʋa raKristu ratoȿika;
ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unokunyeŋgerai nomutoʋo upi noupi; nokuti
iye, unorwa aciɀikudza pamsoro peɀose ɀinonzi Mŋari, kana ɀinonamatwa; nokuɗaro kuti unogara mutembere yaMŋari, aciɀiita Mŋari.
Hamuraŋgariri here kuti, ndiciri kwamuri, ndakakuʋudzai iɀoɀi?
Ɀino munoziʋa cinodziʋisa, kuti aratidzwe neŋguʋa yake.
Nokuti cakaʋanzika cokusarurama cotoɓate‐ɓasa
Ipapo iye usakarurama ucaʋonekwa, iye ucaʋurawa naShe Jesu nomŋeya womuromo wake, aciparadza nokuʋonekwa kwokuʋuya kwake;
kuʋuya kwake iye kwakaita seɓasa raSatani nesimba rose, neɀiratidzo, neɀinoshamisa ɀenhema,
nokunyeŋgera kwose kwokusarurama kunaʋanorashika; nokuti haʋana‐kugamucira ruɗo rweɀokwaɗi, kuti ʋaponeswe.
Saka Mŋari unoʋatumira simba rokukaŋganisa, kuti ʋatende nhema,
kuti ʋose ʋasina‐kutenda ɀokwaɗi, asi ʋakafarira ɀisakarurama, ʋatoŋgwe.
Asi isu tinofanira kuʋoŋga Mŋari ŋguʋa dzose pamsoro penyu, hama
Iɀo ɀaakakuɗanirai neEvaŋgeri yeɗu, kuti muwane kubginya kwaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu.
Naiɀoɀo, hama
Ɀino, Ishe weɗu Jesu Kristu amene, naMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, ʋakatiɗa, ʋakatipa nenyasha dzaʋo kuʋaraidzwa kusiŋgaperi netariro yakanaka,
ŋgaʋaʋaraidze mŋoyo yenyu, ʋakusimbisei pamaɓasa ose namashoko ose akanaka.
Pakupedzisira, hama
ʋuye, kuti tisunuŋgurwe kuʋanhu ʋasakarurama, ʋakaipa; nokuti haʋazi ʋose ʋanotenda.
Asi Ishe ndiye wakatendeka, ucakusimbisai, nokukuceŋgetai kunowakaipa.
Tinokutendai munaShe, kuti munoita, ʋuye mucaramba muciita, iɀo ɀatinokurairai.
Ishe ŋgaaruramise mŋoyo yenyu muruɗo rwaMŋari, nomukutsuŋgirira kwaKristu.
Ɀino, hama
nokuti imi munoziʋa mumene, kuti munofanira kutiteʋera isu, nokuti hatina‐kufamba netsika dzisakafanira pakati penyu;
hatina‐kutoŋgodya ɀokudya ɀomunhu tisiŋgaripi, asi takaɓate‐ɓasa ʋusiku namasikati, ticitambudzika nokushiŋgaira, kuti tirege kuremedza mumŋe wenyu;
hakuzi kuti hatinesimba, asi kuti tikutuŋgamirirei, mutiteʋere.
Nokuti, neŋguʋa yataiʋa kwamuri, takakurairai iɀoɀo, kuti kana munhu aciramba kuɓate‐ɓasa, ŋgaarege kudya ʋo.
Nokuti tinonzwa kuti ʋamŋe pakati penyu haʋafambi netsika dzakafanira, ʋasina‐caʋanoɓata, ʋasiŋgaregi ɀaʋamŋe.
Ʋanhu ʋakaɗaro tinoʋaraira nokukumbira kwaʋari munaShe Jesu Kristu, kuti ʋaɓate nokunyarara, ʋadye ɀokudya ɀaʋo ɀimene.
Asi imi, hama
Kana panomunhu usiŋgatereri shoko reɗu reŋwadi iyi, mutarisise munhu uyo, kuti murege kufambidzana naye, anyadzwe.
Regai henyu kumuidza muʋeŋgi, asi mumuraire sehama.
Ɀino, Ishe worugare amene ŋgaakupei rugare misi yose nemitoʋo yose. Ishe ŋgaaʋe nemi mose.
Nyasha dzaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu ŋgadziʋe nemi mose.
Pauro, muapostora waKristu Jesu nokuraira kwaMŋari, Muponesi weɗu, naKristu Jesu, tariro yeɗu;
kunaTimotio, mŋana waŋgu caiye pakutenda: Nyasha, neŋgoni, norugare, ɀinobva kunaMŋari Ƃaɓa, naKristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu,
Seɀandakakumbira ɀikuru kwauri, ini ndicienda Makedonia,
kana kuraŋgarira ŋgano namazita amadziteteguru asiŋgaperi, ɀinoŋgomutsa nharo, ɀisiŋga
Asi cinoʋaʋarirwa nomurairo ndirwo ruɗo runobva pamŋoyo wakacena, napahana yakanaka, napakutenda kusiŋganyeŋgeri;
ʋamŋe ʋakarashika paɀinhu iɀoɀi, ʋakatsaukira kukutaura kusinamaturo;
ʋacitȿaka kuti ʋaʋe ʋadzidzisi ʋomurairo, ʋasiŋgaziʋi ɀaʋanoreʋa kana ɀaʋanosimbisa.
Asi tinoziʋa kuti murairo wakanaka, kana munhu aciita nawo seɀinoreʋa murairo,
aciziʋa kuti murairo hauna‐kuitirwa wakarurama, asi ʋasinehanya nomurairo, naʋasiŋgatereri, naʋasiŋgaɗi
nemhombge, naʋanopombora naʋarume, naʋanoɓa ʋanhu, naʋanoreʋa nhema, naʋanopika nhema, ʋuye kana cimŋe ciri’ko cinopesana nedzidziso yakarurama;
seɀinoreʋa Evaŋgeri yokubginya kwaMŋari womufaro, yandakapiwa ini.
Ndinomuʋoŋga iye Kristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu, wakandipa simba, nokuti wakati ndakatendeka, akandiisa paɓasa rake;
kunyaŋge ini ndaiʋa mumhuri
asi nyasha dzaShe weɗu dzakawanda ɀikuru nokutenda, noruɗo ruri munaKristu Jesu.
Ishoko raɀokwaɗi, rinofanira kutendwa kwaɀo, kuti Kristu Jesu wakaʋuya panyika kuzoponesa ʋatadzi; aʋo, ini ndiri mukuru waʋo;
asi naiɀoɀo ndakaitirwa ŋgoni, kuti Jesu Kristu aratidze mŋoyo wake wose murefu mandiri, ini mukuru
Ɀino iye Ishe usiŋgaperi, usiŋgafi, usiŋgaʋonekwi, Mŋari woga, ŋgaaʋe nokukudzwa nokubginya nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Ƃasa iri, rakarairwa, ndinokupa iro, iwe Timotio, mŋana
wakaɓata kutenda nehana yakarurama; iyo yakarashwa naʋamŋe, ʋakarashikirwa nokutenda;
ʋamŋe ʋaʋo ndiHimenio naAreksandro, ʋandakaisa kunaSatani, ʋadzidziswe kuti ʋarege kumhura
Naiɀoɀo pakutaŋga kweɀose ndinoraira kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋakumbirirwe, ʋanyeŋgetererwe, ʋareʋererwe, ʋaʋoŋgerwe;
madzimambo, naʋose ʋari ʋakuru, kuti tigare norugare nokunyarara pakunamata
Ndiɀo ɀakanaka, ɀinofadza pamberi paMŋari, Muponesi weɗu;
uyo unoɗa kuti ʋanhu ʋose ʋaponeswe, ʋaȿike pakuziʋa ɀokwaɗi.
Nokuti kunoŋgoʋa naMŋari mumŋe cete, noMureʋeri mumŋe cete ʋo, pakati paMŋari naʋanhu, ndiye munhu Kristu Jesu,
wakaɀipa iye, kuti aʋe rudzikinuro rwaʋose,
ico candakaitirwa muparidzi nomuapostora (ndinoreʋa ɀirokwaɀo, handireʋi nhema), nomudzidzisi waʋahedeni pakutenda neɀokwaɗi.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoɗa kuti ʋarume ʋanyeŋgetere panɀimbo dzose, ʋacisimudza maʋoko matȿene, ʋasinakutsamŋa nenharo.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo, kuti ʋakadzi ʋashoŋge ŋguʋo dzakafanira, ʋanokunyara nokuɀidzora; ʋasaʋa nevudzi rakarukwa, nendarama, kana maparera, kana ŋguʋo dzinodya mari zhinji;
asi
Mukadzi ŋgaadzidze nokunyarara nokuɀiisa pasi kwose.
Asi handitenderi mukadzi kuti adzidzise, kana kuti aʋe nesimba pamsoro pomurume, asi ŋgaanyarare.
Nokuti Adama wakataŋga kuʋumbga, teʋere Eva;
naAdama haanakunveŋgerwa, asi mukadzi wakanyeŋgerwa akapinda pakuɗarika;
asi ucaponeswa nokuɓereka ʋana, kana ʋacirambira mukutenda noruɗo, noʋutȿene pamŋe cete nokuɀidzora.
Ishoko raɀokwaɗi, rokuti, kana munhu acitȿaka ɓasa romutariri, unoɗa ɓasa rakanaka.
Naiɀoɀo mutariri unofanira kuʋa munhu usina‐caaŋgapomerwa, murume womukadzi mumŋe cete, wakaŋgwara, wakacenjera, unomugarire wakafanira, unoitira ʋaeni ruɗo, unoziʋa kudzidzisa,
usiŋgaɗi waini, usiŋgarwi; asi munyoro, usinegakaʋa, usiŋgakariri mari;
unoɓata imba yake ɀakanaka, unaʋana ʋanoɀiisa pasi nomugarire wose unokudzwa;
(kana munhu asiŋgaziʋi kuɓata imba yake, uŋgaceŋgeta seiko kereke yaMŋari?)
Asaʋa
Ʋuye ɀe, unofanira kupupurirwa ɀakanaka naʋari kunze, kuti arege kuɀidzwa, nokuɓatwa mumusuŋgo waDiaborosi.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋashumiri ŋgaʋaʋe ʋanokudzwa, ʋasinamanzwi maʋiri, ʋasiŋgaɗi waini zhinji, ʋasiŋgakariri fuma yakaipa;
ʋanoceŋgeta ɀakaʋanzika ɀokutenda muhana yakanaka.
Naiʋo ŋgaʋataŋge kuidzwa ʋo, ipapo ʋashumire, kana ʋasina‐caʋaŋgapomerwa.
Saiɀoɀo naʋakadzi ŋgaʋaʋe ʋanokudzwa, ʋasiŋgaceri
Ʋashumiri ŋgaʋaʋe ʋarume ʋanomukadzi mumŋe cete, ʋanoɓata ʋana ʋaʋo nedzimba dzaʋo ɀakanaka;
nokuti aʋo ʋakashumira ɀakanaka, ʋanoɀiwanira zita rinokudzwa, nokutsuŋga kukuru pakutenda
Ɀinhu iɀi ɀose ndinokunyorera, ndiciti ndicakurumidza kuʋuya kwauri;
ɀino kana ndikanonoka,
Hakuna‐uŋgaramba kuti cakaʋanzika cokunamata cikuru kwaɀo,
Ɀino Mŋeya unoreʋa pacena, kuti paŋguʋa dzinoʋuya ʋamŋe ʋacatsauka pakutenda, ʋaciterera mŋeya inonyeŋgera nedzidziso dzemŋeya yakaipa,
ʋacinyeŋgerwa naʋanoreʋa nhema, ʋakapiswa pahana dzaʋo neɗare rinopisa,
ʋacidziʋisa ʋanhu kuwanana, nokuraira kuti
Nokuti ɀose ɀakasikwa naMŋari ɀakanaka, hakunecinhu ciŋgafanira kurashwa, kana cicigamucirwa nokuʋoŋga;
nokuti cinoitwa citȿene neshoko raMŋari nokunyeŋgetera.
Kana uciyeʋudzira hama ɀinhu iɀi, ucaʋa mushumiri wakanaka waKristu Jesu, wakarerwa namashoko okutenda needzidziso yakanaka, yawakateʋera nomŋoyo wose.
Asi urambe ŋgano dzisinehanya naMŋari nedzecembere. Uɀiroʋedze kunamata Mŋari.
Nokuti kuroʋedza muʋiri kunoɓatsira ɀishoma haɀo, asi kunamata Mŋari kunoɓatsira paɀinhu ɀose, ɀakunecipikirwa coʋupenyu bgaɀino nobgunoʋuya.
Ishoko raɀokwaɗi, rinofanira kutendwa kwaɀo.
Nokuti ndiɀo ɀatinotambudzikira nokurwira, nokuti tariro yeɗu iri kunaMŋari mupenyu, Muponesi waʋanhu ʋose, ɀikuru waʋanotenda.
Raira nokudzidzisa ɀinhu iɀi.
Munhu ŋgaarege kuʋa’po unoɀidza ʋuɗuku bgako, asi uitire ʋanotenda makwara, pashoko napamufambire, naparuɗo, napakutenda, napakucena
Shiŋgaira pakuraʋa, napakuraira, napakudzidzisa, kuȿikira ndiciʋuya.
Usarega kuceŋgeta cipiwa ciri mauri, cawakapiwa nokuprofita, nokuiswa maʋoko aʋakuru.
Shiŋgairira ɀinhu iɀi, uɀiite nomŋoyo wose, kuti kupfuʋurira mberi kwako kuʋonekwe naʋanhu ʋose.
Uɀiceŋgete iwe nedzidziso yako. Urambire paɀinhu iɀi, nokuti kana uciita iɀoɀi, ucaɀiponesa iwe naʋanokunzwa.
Usatuka mukuru, asi umuraire saɓaɓa, naʋaɗuku saʋanuŋuna,
naʋakadzi ʋakuru samadzimai, naʋaɗuku sehanɀadzi nokucena
Kudza cirikadzi, dziri cirikadzi caidzo.
Asi kana cirikadzi inaʋana kana ʋazukuru, ŋgaʋataŋge iʋo kudzidza kunamata Mŋari paimba yaʋo, ʋadzosere ɀakafanira kuʋaɓereki ʋaʋo, nokuti ndiɀo ɀinofadza Mŋari.
Ɀino kana iri cirikadzi caiyo, yakasiyiwa iri yoga, ndiyo inoʋimba naMŋari, inogara icikumbira nokunyeŋgetera ʋusiku namasikati.
Asi iyo inokarira ɀinofadza, yakafa iciri mhenyu.
Raira ʋo ɀinhu iɀi, kuti ʋarege kuʋa necaʋaŋgapomerwa.
Asi kana munhu asiŋgaceŋgeti ʋokwake, ɀikuru ʋeimba yake, warasha kutenda, wakaipa kukunda usiŋgatendi.
Cirikadzi ŋgairege kunyorwa
inorumbidzwa pamsoro pamaɓasa akanaka, kana yakarera ʋana, kana yaifarira ʋaeni, kana yaishambidza tsoka dzaʋatȿene, kana yaiɓatsira ʋari munjodzi, kana yaishiŋgairira maɓasa ose akanaka.
Asi urambe cirikadzi kana ʋaciri ʋakadzi ʋaɗuku, nokuti kana dzopesana naKristu, dzotȿaka kuwanikwa;
dzaʋa nemhoȿa, nokuti dzaramba kutenda kwokutaŋga;
ʋuye ɀe, dzinodzidza kuʋa noʋusimbe dzicipota nedzimba; hadzizi simbe ɓedzi, asi ʋaiti ʋo ʋamakuhwa, dzisiŋgaregi ɀaʋamŋe, dzicitaura ɀisakafanira.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoɗa kuti
Nokuti ʋamŋe ʋatotsauka ʋaciteʋera Satani.
Kana mukadzi mutendi anecirikadzi, ŋgaadziɓatsire, kereke irege kuremedzwa, kuti igoɓatsira cirikadzi caidzo.
Ʋakuru ʋanoɓata
Nokuti Rugwaro runoti: Usasuŋga muromo wenzombe inopura; ʋuye ɀe: Muɓati wakafanirwa nomuɓairo wake.
Usaŋgotenda mhaka inopomerwa mukuru, asi
Ʋanotadza uʋaraŋge pamberi paʋose, kuti ʋamŋe ʋagotya.
Ndinokuraira kwaɀo pamberi paMŋari, naKristu Jesu, naʋatumŋa ʋakasanaŋgurwa, kuti uceŋgete ɀinhu iɀi usiŋgatoŋgi usati wambonzwa kwaɀo, kana kuita cinhu ucitsaura
Usakurumidza kuisa maʋoko pamsoro pomunhu, kana kusoŋgana paɀiʋi ɀaʋamŋe; uɀiceŋgete kuti uʋe wakacena.
Usaramba uciŋgonwa mvura ɓedzi, asi unwe waini shoma nokuɗa kwomuɗumbu
Ɀiʋi ɀaʋamŋe ʋanhu ɀinoʋonekwa pacena, ɀinotuŋgamirira kutoŋgwa kwaʋo, ʋamŋe ɀe ʋanoteʋerwa naɀo
Saiɀoɀo ʋo kunamaɓasa akanaka anoʋonekwa pacena, naasina‐kuɗaro haaŋgaʋanzwi.
Ʋose ʋari ʋaranda pasi pejoko, ŋgaʋati ʋatenzi ʋaʋo ʋanofanirwa nokukudzwa kwose, kuti zita raMŋari nedzidziso ɀirege kumhurwa.
Aʋo ʋanaʋatenzi ʋanotenda, ŋgaʋarege kuʋaɀidza ɀadziri hama, asi ɀikuru ŋgaʋaʋaɓatire, ɀaʋari ʋatendi naʋanoɗikanwa ʋanoɓatsirwa nokuɓata
Kana kunomunhu unodzidzisa imŋe dzidziso, asiŋgabvumiri mashoko akarurama, mashoko aShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu, nedzidziso inonzwana nokunamata Mŋari,
unoŋgoɀikudza, asiŋgaziʋi cinhu, asi unoŋgokarira mibvunzo nenharo dzinomutsa goɗo, negakaʋa, nokutuka, nokufuŋgidzira kwakaipa,
nokukakaʋadzana kusiŋgaperi kwaʋanhu ʋanomuraŋgariro wakaʋodzwa, ʋakatorerwa ɀokwaɗi, ʋaciti kunamata Mŋari ndiɀo ɀinofumisa.
Ɀino kunamata Mŋari pamŋe cete nokutenda
nokuti hatina‐kuʋuya necinhu panyika, hatigoni ʋo kuɓuɗa tinecinhu;
asi kana tineɀokudya neɀokufuka, ticatenda naɀo.
Asi ʋanotȿaka kufuma, ʋanowira mukuidzwa nomumusuŋgo, nomukuciʋa kwoʋupenzi kuzhinji kunokuʋadza, ɀinonyudza ʋanhu mukuparadzwa nokurashwa.
Nokuti kuɗa mari ndiwo mudzi weɀakaipa ɀose; ʋamŋe ʋakati ʋaciiɗa ɀikuru ʋakatsauswa pakutenda, ʋakaɀiɓaya neshuŋgu zhinji.
Asi iwe, munhu waMŋari, tiza ɀinhu iɀi; uteʋere kururama nokunamata Mŋari, nokutenda, noruɗo, nokutsuŋgirira, noʋunyoro.
Urwe kurwa kwakanaka kwokutenda, uɓatisise ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, bgawakaɗanirwa kwabguri, ukapupura kupupura kwakanaka pamberi peɀapupu ɀizhinji.
Ndinokuraira pamberi paMŋari, unopa ɀinhu ɀose ʋupenyu
kuti uceŋgete murairo, usinoruʋara, usina‐cauŋgapomerwa, kuȿikira pakuʋonekwa kwaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu;
kwaacazoratidza paŋguʋa dzake, iye oga wakaropafadzwa noWamasimba‐ose, Mambo wamadzimambo, Ishe wamadzishe;
iye oga usiŋgafi, ugere paciedza cisiŋgasweɗerwi, usina‐kumboʋonekwa nomunhu, ʋuye usiŋgagoni kuʋonekwa; kukudzwa nesimba risiŋgaperi ŋgaɀiʋe kwaari. Ameni.
Raira ʋafumi panyika yaɀino, kuti ʋarege kuɀikudza, kana kuʋimba nefuma isiŋgagari, asi naMŋari, unotipa ɀose aciwanza, kuti tifare naɀo;
kuti ʋaite ɀakanaka, ʋaʋe ʋafumi pamaɓasa akanaka, ʋafarire kupa ʋamŋe, nokugoʋana;
ʋaɀiroŋgedzere nheyo dzakanaka dzeŋguʋa inoʋuya, kuti ʋaɓatisise ʋupenyu caibgo.
Iwe, Timotio, ceŋgeta ico cawakapiwa, ufuratire kutaura kusinehanya naMŋari nokuramba kunobva paziʋo inonzi
iyo yakapupurwa naʋamŋe, ʋakazorashika pakutenda. Nyasha ngadziʋe nemi.
Pauro, muapostora waKristu Jesu, nokuɗa kwaMŋari, nokuɗa kwecipikirwa coʋupenyu bguri munaKristu Jesu,
kunaTimotio, mŋana waŋgu unoɗikanwa: Nyasha, neŋgoni, norugare, ɀinobva kunaMŋar Ƃaɓa, naKristu Jesu, Ishe weɗu,
Ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari, wandinoshumira samadziteteguru aŋgu, nehana yakacena, kana ndiciramba ndicikuraŋgarira pakukumbira kwaŋgu ʋusiku namasikati,
ndicishuʋa ɀikuru kukuʋona, ndiciraŋgarira misodzi yako, kuti ndizadzwe nomufaro;
ndiciyeʋudzwa kutenda kusiŋganyeŋgeri kuri mauri, kwaimbogara munambuya ʋako, ʋaRoisi, nomunamai ʋako, ʋaJuniki, kwandinoziʋa kwaɀo kuti
Nemhaka iyi ndinokuyeʋudzira kuti ukucidzire cipiwa caMŋari ciri mauri nokuiswa kwamaʋoko aŋgu.
Nokuti Mŋari haana‐kutipa mŋeya wokutya, asi wesimba, noworuɗo, nowokuɀidzora.
Naiɀoɀo usanyadziswa nokupupurira Ishe weɗu, kana ini, musuŋgwa wake, asi utambudzike pamŋe cete
wakatiponesa, akatiɗana nokuɗana kutȿene, ɀisiŋgabvi pamaɓasa eɗu, asi nokufuŋga kwake, nenyasha dzaakatiitira munaKristu Jesu ŋguʋa dzisati dzaʋa’po,
asi kwakaratidzwa ɀino nokuʋonekwa kwoMuponesi weɗu, Kristu Jesu, iye wakaparadza rufu, akaɓuɗisa pacena ʋupenyu nokusaʋora nenzira yeEvaŋgeri,
yandakaitwa muparidzi, nomuapostora, nomudzidzisi wayo.
Nemhaka iyi ndinotambudzika ʋo neɀinhu iɀi, asi handinyadziswi, nokuti ndinoziʋa wandakatenda, ndinoziʋa kwaɀo kuti unogona kuceŋgeta candakamupa kuȿikira zuʋa irero.
Ƃatisisa ɀawakaratidzwa ɀamashoko akarurama, iɀo ɀawakanzwa kwandiri mukutenda noruɗo ruri munaKristu Jesu.
Ico cakanaka, cawakapiwa, uciceŋgete noMŋeya Mutȿene unogara matiri
Unoɀiziʋa hako kuti ʋose ʋari paAsia ʋakandifuratira; pakati paʋo panaFigero naHermogene.
Ishe ŋgaaitire imba yaOnesiforo ŋgoni, nokuti kazhinji wakandisimbisa, asiŋganyadziswi neketani yaŋgu.
Asi wakati aȿika Roma, akanditȿaka ɀikuru, akandiwana.
(Ishe ŋgaamuitire
Naiɀoɀo iwe, mŋana waŋgu, iʋa nesimba munyasha dziri munaKristu Jesu.
Iɀo ɀawakanzwa kwandiri pamberi peɀapupu ɀizhinji, uɀipe ʋanhu ʋakatendeka, ʋanogona ʋo kudzidzisa ʋamŋe.
Utambudzike pamŋe cete neni, somurwi wakanaka waKristu Jesu.
Hakunomunhu unorwa papfumo unoɀipiŋganidza namaɓasa oʋupenyu
Nomunhu ʋo kana aciʋiʋana naʋamŋe, haashoŋgedzwi korona, kana asina‐kuʋiʋana seɀakarairwa.
Murimi unoɓate‐ɓasa ndiye unofanira kutaŋga kudya ɀiɓereko.
Fuŋga ɀandinoreʋa, nokuti Ishe ucakupa kunzwisisa paɀinhu ɀose.
Raŋgarira Jesu Kristu wakamuka kuʋakafa, worudzi rwaDavidi, seɀa
yandinotambudzikira kuȿikira pakusuŋgwa somunyaŋgadzi; asi shoko raMŋari harinakusuŋgwa.
Saka ndinotsuŋgirira paɀinhu ɀose nokuɗa kwaʋakasanaŋgurwa, kuti naiʋo ʋawane kuponeswa kuri munaKristu Jesu, pamŋe cete nokubginya kusiŋgaperi.
Ishoko raɀokwaɗi; nokuti kana tikafa pamŋe cete naye, ticararama ʋo pamŋe cete naye.
Kana tikatsuŋgirira, ticaɓata ʋushe pamŋe cete naye; kana tikamuramba, iye ucatiramba ʋo.
Kana isu tisakatendeka, iye unoramba akatendeka, nokuti haaŋgaɀirambi iye.
U
Shiŋgaira kuti uɀiratidze pamberi paMŋari uri munhu wakatendeka, muɓati usiŋgafaniri hake kunyadziswa, unonatsa kururamisa shoko raɀokwaɗi.
Nɀeŋga kutaura kusinehanya naMŋari; nokuti ʋacaramba ʋaciŋgonyanya pakusanamata Mŋari,
neshoko raʋo ricanyeŋga seronda; pakati paʋo kunaHimenayo naFireto;
iʋo ʋakarashika paɀokwaɗi, ʋaciti, kumuka kwaʋakafa kwatopfuʋura, ʋacikaŋganisa kutenda kwaʋamŋe.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, nheyo dzakasimba dzaMŋari dzinomira, dzinecisimbiso ici: Ishe unoziʋa ʋanhu ʋake; ʋuye: Mumŋe nomumŋe unoreʋa zita raShe ŋgaabve pakusarurama.
Ɀino muimba huru hamunamidziyo yendarama neyesirveri ɓedzi, asi mimŋe yamatanda ʋo, neyevu; mimŋe inokudzwa, mimŋe isiŋgakudzwi.
Naiɀoɀo kana munhu aciɀinatsa kwaɀo paɀinhu iɀi, ucaʋa mudziyo unokudzwa, wakaitwa mutȿene, wakakwanira ɓasa raTenzi, wakagadzirirwa maɓasa ose akanaka.
Asi tiza kuciʋa kwoʋujaya, uʋiŋge kururama, nokutenda, noruɗo, norugare, pamŋe cete naʋanoɗana kunaShe nomŋoyo wakacena.
Asi urambe mibvunzo yoʋupenzi nokusaziʋa, uciziʋa kuti ɀinoɓereka kukakaʋara.
Ɀino muranda waShe haafaniri kukakaʋara, asi aʋe munyoro kuʋanhu ʋose, unoziʋa kudzidzisa, unotsuŋgirira pakuitirwa ɀakaipa,
unodzidzisa noʋunyoro aʋo ʋano
ʋapeŋgenuke ɀe, ʋabve pamusuŋgo waDiaborosi, waʋakaŋga ʋakaɓatwa naye kuti ʋaite kuɗa kwake.
Ɀino uziʋe cinhu ici, kuti namazuʋa okupedzisira ŋguʋa dzokutambudzika dzicaȿika.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋacaʋa ʋanoɀiɗa, ʋanoɗa mari, ʋanoɀirumbidza, ʋanoɀikudza, ʋanotuka, ʋasiŋgatereri ʋaɓereki, ʋasiŋgaʋoŋgi, ʋasati ʋari ʋatȿene,
ʋasinoruɗo cairwo, ʋasiŋgaɗi kuyanana, ʋanocera
ʋanonyeŋgera, ʋasiŋgaraŋgariri, ʋanoita manyawi, ʋanoɗa ɀinofadza
ʋanomufananidzo
Nokuti pakati paʋo ʋari’po ʋanopinda mudzimba ʋaciʋereʋedza, ʋacitapa ɀikadzi ɀakaremedzwa neɀiʋi, ɀinokwebga nokuciʋa kuzhinji,
ɀinoŋgogara ɀicidzidza, asi haɀitoŋgogoni kuȿika pakuziʋa ɀokwaɗi.
Jane naJambre seɀaʋakadziʋisa Mosesi, saiɀoɀo iʋo ʋanodziʋisa ɀokwaɗi, ʋari ʋanhu ʋanendaŋgariro dzakaʋodzwa, ʋakarashika pakutenda.
Asi haʋacapfuʋuriri mberi, nokuti ʋupenzi bgaʋo bgucaʋonekwa naʋose, seɀakazoita bgaʋo.
Asi iwe wakateʋera kudzidzisa kwaŋgu, nomufambire, nokufuŋga, nokutenda, nomŋoyo murefu, noruɗo, nokutsuŋgirira,
namaɗambudziko, nenhamo, iɀo ɀakandiwira paAntiokia, napaIkonio, napaRistra; maɗambudziko
Ɀino, naʋose ʋanoɗa kunamata
Asi ʋanhu ʋakaipa naʋanyeŋgeri ʋacanyanyisa pakuipa, ʋacitsausa
Asi iwe, rambira paneɀawakadzidza neɀawakatendiswa, uziʋe kuti waka
kuti kubvira paʋucece
Rugwaro rwose rwakafuridzirwa naMŋari, runoɓatsira pakudzidzisa, nokuraira, nokururamisa, nokuraŋga kuri mukururama,
kuti munhu waMŋari akwane, agadzirirwa kwaɀo maɓasa ose akanaka.
Ndinokupupurira kwaɀo pamberi paMŋari, naKristu Jesu, iye ucatoŋga ʋapenyu naʋakafa pakuʋonekwa kwake noʋushe bgake;
paridza shoko; ramba uciɗaro neŋguʋa yakafanira, kunyaŋge isakafanira; raira, tuka, raŋga nomŋoyo murefu ɀikuru nokudzidzisa.
Nokuti ŋguʋa icaȿika yaʋacaramba kutendera dzidziso yakarurama, asi, ʋaciɗa kufadzwa panzeʋe dzaʋo, ʋacaɀiʋuŋganidzira ʋadzidzisi pakuciʋa kwaʋo,
ʋacifuratidza nzeʋe dzaʋo paɀokwaɗi, ʋacitsaukira kuŋgano.
Asi iwe ȿinura paɀinhu ɀose, tambudzika, ɓata ɓasa romuevaŋgeri, upedzise ɓasa rako kwaɀo.
Nokuti ini ndotoɗururwa, ŋguʋa yokuenda kwaŋgu yaȿika.
Ndarwa kurwa kwakanaka, ndapedza rwendo
Kubva ɀino ndakaceŋgeterwa korona yokururama, yandicapiwa naShe, Mutoŋgi wakarurama, nezuʋa irero; ndisini ndoga, asi naʋose ʋakaɗa kusinehanya kwake.
Shiŋgaira kuti ukurumidze kuʋuya kwandiri.
Nokuti Demasi wakandisiya, akaɗa nyika yaɀino, akaenda Tesaronika; Kreske wakaenda Garatia, naTito wakaenda Darmatia.
Ruka oga uneni. Tora Marko uʋuye naye, nokuti unondiɓatsira kwaɀo paɓasa.
Asi Tikiko ndakamutuma Efeso.
Ŋguʋo yandakasiya paTroa kunaKarpo, uʋuye nayo pakuʋuya kwako, nebuku, ɀikuru magwaro amatebge.
Areksandro, mupfuri wendarira, wakandiitira ɀakaipa ɀizhinji; Ishe ucamutsiʋa paakaita napo;
newe ʋo umucenjere, nokuti wakadziʋisa ɀikuru mashoko eɗu.
Pakuɀiɗaʋirira kwaŋgu kwokutaŋga kwakaŋga kusinomunhu wakandiɓatsira, asi ʋose ʋakandisiya. Ŋgaʋarege kuraʋirwa iɀoɀi.
Asi Ishe wakamira neni, akandisimbisa, kuti ndipedzise kwaɀo kuparidza kwaŋgu, ʋahedeni ʋose ʋanzwe; ndikarwirwa pamuromo weshumba.
Ishe ucandirwira pamaɓasa ose akaipa, ucandiponesa
Erasto wakasara paKorinte, asi Trofimo ndakamusiya paMireto acirwara.
Shiŋgaira kuʋuya, cando cisati caȿika. Yuburo, naPude, naRina, naKraudia nehama dzose ʋanokukwazisa.
Ishe ŋgaaʋe nomŋeya wako. Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi.
Pauro, muranda waMŋari, nomuapostora waJesu Kristu, nokuɗa kwokutenda kwaʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋaMŋari, nokwokuziʋisa ɀokwaɗi iri pakunamata Mŋari,
patariro yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, bgaakapikira iye Mŋari, usiŋgatoŋgoreʋi nhema, ŋguʋa dzisiŋgaperi dzisati dzaʋa’po,
asi paŋguʋa dzaɀo wakaziʋisa shoko rake nokuparidza kwandakapiwa nomurairo waMŋari, Muponesi weɗu;
kunaTito, mŋana waŋgu caiye pakutenda kweɗu tose: Nyasha norugare, ɀinobva kunaMŋari Ƃaɓa, naKristu Jesu, Muponesi weɗu,
Ndakakusiya paKrete nemhaka iyi, kuti upedzise kugadzira iɀo ɀakaŋga ɀasara, nokugadza ʋakuru mumaguta ose, seɀandakakuraira;
kana
Nokuti mutariri unofanira kuʋa munhu usina‐caaŋgapomerwa, somuceŋgeti weimba yaMŋari; asiŋgaiti kuɗa kwake, asiŋgakurumidzi kutsamŋa, asiŋgaɗi waini, asiŋgarwi, asiŋgakariri fuma yakaipa;
asi unoitira ʋaeni ruɗo, unoɗa ɀakanaka, wakacenjera, wakarurama, mutsene, unoɀidzora;
unoɓatisisa shoko raɀokwaɗi, seɀarinodzidziswa, kuti agone kuraira nedzidziso yakarurama, nokukunda ʋanokakaʋara.
Nokuti ʋazhinji ʋari’po ʋasiŋgatereri, ʋanotaura ɀisinamaturo, ʋanonyeŋgera, ɀikuru aʋo ʋokudziŋgiswa,
ʋanofanira kudziʋirirwa miromo yaʋo; ʋanoparadza mhuri kwaɀo, ɀaʋanodzidzisa ɀisakafanira nokuɗa kwefuma yakaipa.
Mumŋe waʋo, muprofita wokwaʋo, wakati: ƲaKrete ʋanogara ʋacireʋa nhema, ɀikara ɀakaipa, naʋanokara ʋanoʋusimbe.
Kupupura uku ndokwaɀokwaɗi. Nemhaka iyi uʋaraŋge ɀikuru, kuti ʋarurame pakutenda,
ʋarege kuterera ŋgano dzaʋaJuda, nemirairo yaʋanhu ʋanofuratira ɀokwaɗi.
Kunaʋakacena ɀose ɀakacena; asi kunaʋakaȿiɓiswa, ʋasiŋgatendi, hakunecinhu cakacena, asi kufuŋga kwaʋo nehana yaʋo ɀakaȿiɓiswa.
Ʋanoti, tinoziʋa Mŋari, asi ʋanomuramba namaɓasa
Ɀino iwe, taura ɀakafanira dzidziso yakarurama.
Ʋarume ʋakuru ŋgaʋaʋe ʋakaȿinuka, ʋanokudzwa, ʋakaŋgwara, ʋakarurama pakutenda, naparuɗo, napakutsuŋgirira;
saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋakadzi ʋakuru ŋgaʋaʋe nomufambire wakafanira ʋatȿene, ʋasiŋgaceri, kana kuɗa waini zhinji,
kuti ʋadzidzise
ʋaʋe ʋakaŋgwara, ʋakacena, ʋanoceŋgeta imba, ʋanyoro, ʋanoɀiisa pasi paʋarume ʋaʋo, kuti shoko raMŋari rirege kumhurwa.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo ʋarume ʋaɗuku uʋaraire kuti ʋaʋe ʋakaŋgwara;
paɀinhu ɀose iwe umene uʋaratidze makwara amaɓasa akanaka; uʋe nokusakaŋganisa pakudzidzisa, nomugarire unokudzwa,
nokutaura kwakarurama, kusiŋgagoni kushoʋorwa, kuti unopesana
Ʋaranda ŋgaʋaɀiise pasi paʋatenzi ʋaʋo, ʋaʋafadze paɀinhu ɀose, ʋasiŋgakakaʋari;
ʋasiŋgaɓi, asi ʋaratidze kutendeka kwakanaka kwose, kuti ʋashoŋgedze dzidziso yaMŋari, Muponesi weɗu, paɀinhu ɀose.
Nokuti nyasha dzaMŋari dzakaʋonekwa, dzinoʋigira ʋanhu ʋose kuponeswa,
dzicitidzidzisa isu kuti tirambe kusanamata Mŋari nokuciʋa ɀenyika, tirarame nokuŋgwara, nokururama, nokunamata Mŋari paŋguʋa ino,
takatarira tariro inofadza, nokuʋonekwa kwokubginya kwaMŋari mukuru, noMuponesi weɗu, Kristu Jesu,
wakaɀipa nokuɗa kweɗu, kuti atidzikinure paɀisakarurama ɀose, kuti aɀinatsire ʋanhu
Taura ɀinhu iɀi, uraire, uraŋge nesimba rose; ŋgakurege kuʋa nomunhu unokuɀidza.
Uʋayeʋudzire kuti ʋaɀiise pasi paʋaɓati naʋanesimba, kuti ʋaterere, kuti ʋaʋe
ʋarege kureʋera mumŋe ɀakaipa, ʋarege kuʋa negakaʋa, ʋaʋe ʋanyoro, ʋaitire ʋanhu ʋose ʋunyoro bgose.
Nokuti nesu ʋo kare taiʋa ʋokusafuŋga, tisiŋgatereri, takarashika, tiri ʋaranda ʋokuciʋa kuzhinji naʋeɀose ɀinofadza, tigere mukati mokushata negoɗo, ticiʋeŋgwa, ticiʋeŋgana.
Asi ʋunyoro bgaMŋari, Muponesi weɗu, noruɗo rwake kuʋanhu, ɀakati ɀaʋonekwa,
wakatiponesa,
waakaɗurura aciwanza pamsoro peɗu, naJesu Kristu Muponesi weɗu,
kuti isu, taruramiswa nenyasha dzake, tiitwe ʋadyi ʋenhaka nokuɗa kwetariro yoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Ishoko raɀokwaɗi, ʋuye ndinoɗa kuti usimbise kwaɀo ɀinhu iɀi, ɀokuti aʋo ʋakatenda Mŋari ʋacenjere kuti ʋarambe ʋaciita maɓasa akanaka. Ndiɀo ɀakanaka, ɀinoɓatsira ʋanhu;
asi unɀeŋge mibvunzo yoʋupenzi, namazita amadziteteguru, negakaʋa, nokukakaʋara pamsoro pomurairo, nokuti haɀinamaturo, haɀineɓasa.
Munhu unodzidzisa ɀakatsauka, kana arairwa kamŋe norwecipiri, umurambe,
ɀaunoziʋa kuti wakaɗaro wakatsauka, unotadza, waɀipa mhoȿa amene.
Kana ndicituma Artema kwauri, kana Tikiko, ushiŋgaire kuʋuya kwandiri Nikopori; nokuti ndakati ndicagara cando ikoko.
Zenasi, muɗudziri womurairo, naAporo, uʋaise ɀakanaka
ʋeɗu ŋgaʋadzidze ʋo kuramba ʋaciita maɓasa akanaka, kuti ʋaɓatsire panoshaikwa ɀinofanira kuʋa’po, kuti ʋarege kuʋa ʋanhu ʋasineɀiɓereko
Ʋose ʋari kwandiri ʋanokukwazisa.
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi mose.
Pauro, musuŋgwa waKristu Jesu, naTimotio, hama yeɗu, kunaFiremoni, muɗikanwa weɗu nounoɓata nesu,
nokunaApfia, hanɀadzi yeɗu, nokunaArkipo, murwi pamŋe cete nesu, nokukereke iri mumba mako:
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi, norugare ɀinobva kunaMŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋeɗu, naShe Jesu Kristu.
Ndinoʋoŋga Mŋari waŋgu ŋguʋa dzose, kana ndicikuraŋgarira pakunyeŋgetera kwaŋgu,
ɀandinonzwa ɀoruɗo rwako nokutenda kwaunako kunaShe Jesu nokuʋatȿene ʋose;
kuti kugoʋana kwokutenda kwako kuʋe nesimba, kuti ɀakanaka ɀose ɀiri mukati meɗu kunaKristu ɀizikanwe;
nokuti ndakaŋga ndinomufaro mukuru nokunyaradzwa nokuɗa kworuɗo rwako, nokuti mŋoyo yaʋatȿene yakazorodzwa newe, hama
Naiɀoɀo, kunyaŋge ndisiŋgatoŋgotyi munaKristu kukuraira
kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro, nokuɗa kworuɗo ndinoita ɀokukumbira ɀikuru, ɀandakaɗai haŋgu, ini Pauro, mutana, ʋuye ɀino musuŋgwa waKristu Jesu.
Ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwauri pamsoro pomŋana waŋgu, wandakaɓereka pakusuŋgwa kwaŋgu, Onesimo,
wakaŋga asiŋgakuɓatsiri kare, asi ɀino unokuɓatsira ɀikuru, iwe neni;
ndinomudzosera kwauri, iye amene, mŋoyo waŋgu caiwo;
ndaiɗa kuti agare neni, kuti panɀimbo yako andishumire pakusuŋgwa
asi ndakaŋga ndisiŋgaɗi kuita cinhu, iwe usati watenda, kuti ɀakanaka
Nokuti ɀimŋe wakaparadzaniswa
arege kuzoʋa muranda, asi
Ɀino kana uciti ndiri mugoʋani newe, umugamucire seɀa
Asi kana akakuitira cinhu cisakarurama, kunyaŋge aneŋgaʋa newe, undiraʋireni iɀoɀo.
Ini Pauro, ndinoɀinyora noruʋoko rwaŋgu, ndicaripa; ndisiŋgareʋi haŋgu kuti pamsoro peɀose uneŋgaʋa kwandiri, ndiyewe umene.
Hoŋo, hama, ŋgandiʋe nomufaro kwauri munaShe; uzorodze mŋoyo waŋgu munaKristu.
Ndinokunyorera, nokuti ndinotenda kuterera kwako, ndiciziʋa kuti ucaita ʋo kupfuʋura pandinoreʋa napo.
Asi ndigadzirire ʋo pokugara, nokuti ndinotarira kuti mucandipiwa ini nokuɗa kwokunyeŋgetera kwenyu.
Epafrasi, musuŋgwa pamŋe cete neni munaKristu, unokukwazisa.
NaMarko, naAristarko, naDemasi, naRuka, ʋanoɓate‐ɓasa pamŋe cete neni.
Nyasha dzaShe Jesu Kristu ŋgadziʋe nomŋeya wenyu.
Mŋari wakataura kare kunamadziɓaɓa muʋaprofita nemigoʋe mizhinji, ʋuye nemitoʋo mizhinji,
pakupedzisira kwamazuʋa ano wakataura kwatiri muMŋanakomana wake, waakaita mudyi wenhaka yeɀinhu ɀose, waakaita ʋo naye nyika;
iye cadzera cokubginya kwake, nomufananidzo wake caiye, unoceŋgeta ɀinhu ɀose nenzwi resimba rake, wakati apedzisa kunatswa kweɀiʋi, akagara kurudyi rwoƲumambo kuɗeŋga,
akapfuʋura ʋatumŋa nokunaka saiɀoɀo, sezita raakagara nhaka yaro, rakanyanya kunaka kupfuʋura raʋo.
Nokuti wakambotaura kunani waʋatumŋa,
Ndiwe Mŋanakomana waŋgu,
Nhasi ndakakuɓereka?
Ʋuye ɀe:
Ndicaʋa Ƃaɓa ʋake,
Iye ucaʋa Mŋanakomana waŋgu?
Ʋuye, kana acizoʋuyisa ɀe ɗaŋgwe rake panyika, unoti: Ʋatumŋa ʋose ʋaMŋari ŋgaʋamunamate.
Napamsoro paʋatumŋa unoti:
Iye unoita ʋatumŋa ʋake kuti ʋaʋe mhepo,
Naʋaranda ʋake, kuti ʋaʋe muraɀo womŋoto;
Asi pamsoro poMŋanakomana,
Cigaro cenyu coʋushe, imi Mŋari, ciri’po nokusiŋgaperi‐peri,
Netȿimbo yokururama ndiyo tȿimbo yoʋushe bgako.
Makaɗa kururama, mukaʋeŋga kusarurama;
Saka Mŋari, iye Mŋari wenyu, wakakuzodzai
Namafuta okufara kupfuʋura shamŋari dzenyu.
Ʋuye,
Imi, Ishe, makateya nheyo dzenyika pakutaŋga,
Neɗeŋga ndiro ɓasa ramaʋoko enyu;
Iro ricapera, asi imi mucaramba muri’po;
Ricasakara rose seŋguʋo;
Mucaripeta secinofukwa,
Seŋguʋo, rikashandurwa;
Asi imi hamushanduki, namakore enyu haaŋgagumi.
Asi wakambotaura kunani waʋatumŋa,
Gara kurudyi rwaŋgu,
Kuȿikira ndiciita ʋaʋeŋgi ʋako ʋaʋe citsiko cetsoka dzako?
Ko haʋazi ʋose mŋeya inoshumira, yakatumŋa kuzoɓata nokuɗa kwaʋanodya nhaka yokuponeswa here?
Saka tinofanira kuterera ɀikuru iɀo ɀatakanzwa, kuti tirege kukukurwa.
Nokuti kana shoko, rakaŋga rataurwa naʋatumŋa, rakaŋga rakasimba, ʋuye kana kuɗarika nokusaterera kwose kwakapiwa muɓairo wakarurama,
ko isu ticatiza sei, kana tisinehanya nokuponeswa kukuru kwakaɗai? uku kwakaparidzwa pakutaŋga naShe, kukasimbiswa kwatiri naiʋo ʋakanzwa;
naiye Mŋari ʋo acipupurirana naʋo neɀiratidzo neɀinoshamisa, namaɓasa esimba mazhinji, neɀipo ɀoMŋeya Mutȿene, nokuɗa kwake.
Nokuti nyika, inozoʋuya, yatinoreʋa, haana‐kuiisa pasi paʋatumŋa.
Asi mumŋe wakapupura kwaɀo paneimŋe nɀimbo, aciti:
Ko munhu cinyiko, ɀamunomufuŋga?
Kana mŋanakomana womunhu, ɀamunomushanyira?
Makamuita muɗuku ɀishoma kuʋatumŋa,
Makamushoŋgedza korona yokubginya nokukudzwa,
Mukaisa ɀinhu ɀose pasi petsoka dzake.
Nokuti pakuisa kwake ɀinhu ɀose pasi pake, haana‐kusiya cinhu cimŋe, cisinakuiswa pasi pake. Asi ɀino tigere kuʋona kuti ɀinhu ɀose ɀakaiswa pasi pake.
Asi tinomuʋona, iye Jesu, wakaitwa muɗuku ɀishoma kuʋatumŋa, akashoŋgedzwa korona yokubginya nokukudzwa nokuɗa kwokutambudzika kworufu, kuti nenyasha dzaMŋari anzwe rufu nokuɗa kwaʋose.
