Nokuti ɀakaŋga ɀakafanira kuti iye, wakaitirwa ɀinhu ɀose, ʋuye wakaita ɀinhu ɀose, pakuisa kwake ʋanakomana ʋazhinji pakubginya, akwanise Mutuŋgamiriri wokuponeswa kwaʋo
Nokuti uyo, uno
Ɀaanoti:
Ndicaparidzira hama dzaŋgu zita renyu,
Ndicakuimbirai pakati pekereke.
Ʋuye ɀe: Ndicatenda kwaari. Ʋuye ɀe: Tarira, ndini naʋana ʋandakapiwa naMŋari.
Naiɀoɀo, ʋana ɀaʋakagoʋerwa ropa nenyama, naiye ʋo wakagoʋana naʋo panaiɀoɀi; kuti nokufa
agosunuŋgura aʋo ʋaiʋa ʋaranda paʋupenyu bgaʋo bgose nokuɗa kwokutya rufu.
Nokuti ɀirokwaɀo, haaɓatsiri ʋatumŋa, asi unoɓatsira ʋana ʋaAbrahama.
Naiɀoɀo wakafanira kuti aenzaniswe nehama dzake paɀinhu ɀose, kuti aʋe muprista mukuru Uneŋgoni, wakatendeka paɀinhu ɀaMŋari, kuti adzikinure ɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu.
Nokuti ɀaakatambudzika iye amene pakuidzwa kwake, unogona kuɓatsira ʋanoidzwa.
Naiɀoɀo, hama tȿene, ʋagoʋerani
wakaŋga akatendeka kunaiye wakamugadza, saMosesi ʋo muimba yake yose.
Nokuti uyu wakanzi wakafanira kukudzwa kupfuʋura Mosesi, muʋaki weimba seɀaanokudzwa kupfuʋura imba;
nokuti imba imŋe neimŋe inoʋakwa nomunhu, asi iye, wakaʋaka ɀose, ndiye Mŋari.
Ɀino Mosesi wakaŋga akatendeka muimba yake yose somuranda, kuti aʋe capupu ceɀinhu ɀaifanira kuzotaurwa,
asi Kristu soMŋanakomana,
Naiɀoɀo, seɀinotaura Mŋeya Mutȿene,
Nhasi, kana mucinzwa inzwi rake,
Musawomesa mŋoyo yenyu, sapa
Napazuʋa rokuidzwa murenje;
Pa
Ʋakaʋona maɓasa aŋgu makore anamakumi manna.
Naiɀoɀo ndakanzwa shuŋgu pamsoro porudzi urwu,
Ndikati: Ʋanogara ʋacitsauka pamŋoyo yaʋo;
Asi haʋana‐kuziʋa nzira dzaŋgu;
Naiɀoɀo ndakapika pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu,
Haʋaŋgapindi pazororo raŋgu.
Hama
asi simbisanai zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, kana kucanzi Nhasi; kuti kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu unowomeswa nokunyeŋgera kweɀiʋi.
Nokuti taʋa ʋagoʋerani pamŋe cete naKristu, kana ticiɓatisisa kuʋamba kwokutenda kweɗu kuȿikira pakuguma;
ɀicinzi:
Nhasi, kana mucinzwa inzwi rake,
Musawomesa mŋoyo yenyu, sapa
Nokuti ndiʋanani ʋakanzwa, ʋakamutsamŋisa? Haʋazi iʋo ʋose ʋakabva Egipita naMosesi here?
Wakanzwa shuŋgu makore anamakumi manna pamsoro paʋanani? Haʋazi iʋo ʋakatadza, mitumbu yaʋo ikawira murenje here?
Wakapika pamsoro paʋanani kuti haʋaŋgapindi pazororo rake? Haʋazi iʋo ʋasina‐kuterera here?
Ɀino tinoʋona kuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgagoni kupinda nokusatenda
Naiɀoɀo, cipikirwa cokupinda muzororo rake ɀacici’po, tinofanira kutya kuti ɀimŋe kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu ucawanikwa asiŋgaȿiki
Nokuti nesu ʋo takaparidzirwa Evaŋgeri, saiʋo; asi shoko raʋakanzwa, harina‐kuʋaɓatsira, nokuti harina‐kuveŋganiswa nokutenda kwaiʋo ʋakanzwa.
Nokuti isu ʋakatenda, tinopinda pazororo irero, seɀaakareʋa,
Naiɀoɀo ndakapika pakutsamŋa kwaŋgu,
Haʋaŋgapindi muzororo raŋgu;
kunyaŋge maɓasa ake akaŋga akwaniswa kubva pakuʋambga kwenyika.
Nokuti paneimŋe nɀimbo wakataura pamsoro pezuʋa recinomŋe, aciti: Mŋari wakazorora nezuʋa recinomŋe pamaɓasa ake ose;
napano ɀe:
Haʋaŋgapindi muzororo raŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo,
unotara ɀe rimŋe zuʋa,
Nhasi, kana mucinzwa inzwi rake,
Musawomesa mŋoyo yenyu.
Nokuti ɗai Joshua akaŋga aʋapa zororo, haazaizoreʋa rimŋe zuʋa pashure.
Ɀino zororo resaɓata raʋanhu ʋaMŋari rici’po.
Nokuti uyo wakapinda muzororo rake, wakazorora iye amene pamaɓasa ake, saMŋari panaake.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatishiŋgaire kuti tipinde muzororo irero, kuti munhu arege kuʋa’po unozowa aciteʋera nzira iyo yokusaterera.
Nokuti shoko raMŋari iɓenyu, rinesimba, rinopinza kukunda munondo unoceka kumatiʋi maʋiri, rinoɓaya kuȿikira panoparadzana mŋoyo nomŋeya, namafundo nomŋoŋgo; rinotoŋga mifuŋgo nendaŋgariro dzomŋoyo.
Hakunecisikwa cisiŋgaʋonekwi naye, asi ɀinhu ɀose ɀakafukurwa nokuzarurwa pameso aiye watinofanira kuɀiɗaʋirira kwaari.
Naiɀoɀo, ɀatinomuprista mukuru kwaɀo, wakapinda napakati pokuɗeŋga, iye Jesu, Mŋanakomana waMŋari, ŋgatiɓatisise kupupura kweɗu.
Nokuti hatinomuprista mukuru usiŋgagoni kutinzwira tsitsi paʋutera bgeɗu, asi wakaidzwa paɀinhu ɀose sesu, asineɀiʋi.
Naiɀoɀo, ŋgatisweɗerei tisiŋgatyi kucigaro coʋushe cenyasha, kuti tinzwirwe ŋgoni, tiwane nyasha, tiɓatsirwe neŋguʋa yakafanira.
Nokuti muprista mukuru mumŋe nomumŋe, wakatorwa kuʋanhu, unogadzwa nokuɗa kwaʋanhu paɀinhu ɀaMŋari, kuti aɓayire ɀipo neɀiɓayiro pamsoro peɀiʋi;
iye unogona kunzwira tsitsi aʋo ʋasiŋgaziʋi naʋakatsauka, nokuti naiye ʋo amene wakakomberedzwa noʋutera.
Nemhaka iyo iye amene unofanira kuɀiɓayira pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀake, seɀa
Hakunomunhu uŋgaɀitorera
Saiɀoɀo ʋo Kristu haana‐kuɀikudza iye, aciitwa muprista mukuru, asi
Ndiwe Mŋanakomana waŋgu,
Nhasi ndakakuɓereka;
Seɀaanoreʋa ʋo paneimŋe nɀimbo,
Ndiwe Muprista nokusiŋgaperi
Unorudzi naMerkisedeki.
Iye, pamazuʋa enyama yake, wakaʋuya kunaiye wakaŋga acigona kumurwira parufu, neminyeŋgetero nemikumbiro, acicema nokucema kukuru nemisodzi, akanzwika nokuɗa kwokutya kwake Mŋari;
kunyaŋge aiʋa Mŋanakomana, wakadzidza kuterera neɀaakatambudzika;
akati akwaniswa, akazoʋa muʋambi wokuponeswa kusiŋgaperi kunaʋose ʋanomuterera;
akanzi naMŋari Muprista mukuru unorudzi naMerkisedeki.
Tinamashoko mazhinji atiŋgataura pamsoro pake, anorema kuɗudzira, ɀamaʋa ʋanhu ʋasicagoni kunzwisisa kwaɀo.
Nokuti, kunyaŋge maifanira kuʋa ʋadzidzisi
Nokuti mumŋe nomumŋe unodya mukaka haanzwisisi shoko rokururama, nokuti mucece hake.
Asi ɀokudya ɀikukutu ndeɀaʋakuru, ʋanokuziʋa kwakadzidziswa, nenzira yokuroʋedzwa, kuziʋisisa ɀakanaka neɀakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatisiye shoko rokutaŋga kwaKristu, tipfuʋurire mberi pakukwaniswa, tisiŋgaisi ɀe nheyo dzokutendeʋuka pamaɓasa akafa, nedzokutenda kunaMŋari,
nedzedzidziso yokubapatidza, nedzokuisa maʋoko, nedzokumuka kwaʋakafa, nedzokutoŋgwa kusiŋgaperi.
Ndiɀo ɀaticaita, kana Mŋari acitendera.
Nokuti kana ʋari iʋo, ʋakambovenekerwa, ʋakaraʋira cipo cokuɗeŋga, ʋakagoʋerwa Mŋeya Mutȿene,
ʋakaraʋira shoko rakanaka raMŋari, namasimba enyika inoʋuya,
kana ʋakazotsauka, haɀibviri kuʋaʋandudza ɀe kuti ʋatendeʋuke, nokuti ʋanoɀiroʋerera ɀe Mŋanakomana waMŋari pamucinjikwa, ʋacimunyadzisa pacena.
Nokuti nyika iyo, inoti
asi kana ikaɓereka minzwa norukato, inorashwa, yobva yotukwa; kuguma kwayo ndiko kupiswa.
Asi ʋaɗikanwa, kunyaŋge ticitaura kuɗai, tinoziʋa kwaɀo pamsoro penyu ɀinhu ɀinopfuʋura nokunaka, ɀinoisa kukuponeswa.
Nokuti Mŋari haazati ari usakarurama, uŋgakaŋganwa ɓasa renyu noruɗo rwamakaratidza nokuɗa kwezita rake, ɀamakashumira ʋatȿene, muciʋashumira
Ɀino tinoɗa kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu ashiŋgaire saiɀoɀo, kuti muʋe netariro yakakwana kuȿikira pakuguma.
Kuti murege kuʋa noʋusimbe, asi muʋe ʋateʋeri ʋaiʋo ʋanodya nhaka yeɀipikirwa nenzira yokutenda nokutsuŋgirira.
Nokuti Mŋari pakupikira Abrahama, wakapika naiye amene, nokuti wakaŋga asinomukuru kwaari waaŋgapika naye,
akati: Ɀirokwaɀo nokuropafadza ndicakuropafadza, nokuwanza ndicakuwanza.
Nokuɗaro, wakati atsuŋgirira, akawana cipikirwa.
Nokuti ʋanhu ʋanopika nomukuru kwaʋari; nemhiko inosimbisa ndiyo inogumisa gakaʋa rose pakati paʋo.
Saiɀoɀo Mŋari wakati aciɗa ɀikuru kuratidza ʋadyi ʋenhaka yecipikirwa, kuti cireʋo cake hacishandurwi, wakapinda pakati nokupika;
kuti neɀinhu ɀiʋiri ɀisiŋgashandurwi, (
yatinayo seciɓatiso coMŋeya,
pakapinda mutuŋgamiriri nokuɗa kweɗu, iye Jesu wakaitwa muprista mukuru nokusiŋgaperi, unorudzi naMerkisedeki.
Nokuti Merkisedeki uyo, mambo weSaremi, muprista waMŋari Wokumsoro‐soro, wakasoŋgana naAbrahama pakudzoka kwake andoʋuraya madzimambo, akamuropafadza;
Abrahama akamupa ʋo cegumi ceɀose; iye pakutaŋga ari mambo wokururama, kana ɀicishandurwa, ʋuye ɀe, mambo weSaremi, ndokuti, mambo worugare;
asinaɓaɓa, asinamai, asinamadzisekuru, asina‐kutaŋga kwamazuʋa, kana kuguma kwoʋupenyu, asi wakafananidzwa noMŋanakomana waMŋari, unogara ari muprista nokusiŋgaperi.
Ɀino fuŋgai kukura kwomunhu uyu, wakapiwa nateteguru Abrahama cegumi ceɀaakapamba.
Ɀino aʋo, ʋari ʋanakomana ʋaRevi, ʋanopiwa ɓasa roʋuprista, ʋakarairwa nomurairo kuti ʋatore cegumi kuʋanhu, iko kuhama dzaʋo, kunyaŋge ʋakabva muciʋuno caAbrahama;
asi uyu, usinakuraʋirwa rudzi rwake kwaʋari, wakapiwa ɀegumi naAbrahama, akamuropafadza iye wakaŋga aneɀipikirwa.
Ɀino hatiŋgarambi kuti muɗuku ndiye unoropafadzwa nounopfuʋura nokunaka.
Ʋuye pano, ʋanhu, ʋanofa, ʋanopiwa ɀegumi; asi apo uyo
Ɀino tiŋgati, naRevi, unopiwa ɀegumi, iye ʋo wakapa ɀegumi munaAbrahama;
nokuti wakaŋga aciri muciʋuno caɓaɓa ʋake, pakusoŋgana kwaMerkisedeki naye.

Naiɀoɀo, kana kukwaniswa kwaiʋa’po nenzira yoʋuprista bgaRevi (nokuti ʋanhu ʋakapiwa murairo nokuɗa kwabgo), ko mumŋe muprista waifanira kuzomuka seiko unorudzi naMerkisedeki, asiŋganzi unorudzi naAroni?
Nokuti kana ʋuprista bgucishandurwa, nomurairo unofanira kuti ushandurwe ʋo.
Nokuti uyo unorebga ɀinhu iɀi pamsoro pake, wakaŋga ari worumŋe rudzi, rwakaŋga rusinomunhu wakamboɓate‐ɓasa paartari.
Nokuti ɀinoʋonekwa pacena, kuti Ishe weɗu wakabva kunaJuda; pamsoro porudzi urwu Mosesi haana‐kureʋa ɀaʋaprista.
Iɀi ɀinoratidzwa ʋo kwaɀo, kana kucimuka mumŋe muprista wakafanana naMerkisedeki,
usinakuitwa
Nokuti iye unopupurirwa,
Iwe uri muprista nokusiŋgaperi,
Unorudzi naMerkisedeki.
Nokuti murau wokutaŋga unokoneswa nokuɗa kwoʋutera bgawo, ʋuye nokuti haunamaturo,
(nokuti murairo hauna‐kukwanisa cinhu), ɀino tariro, inopfuʋura nokunaka, ikaiswa’po, yatinosweɗera nayo kunaMŋari.
Ʋuye ɀe, ɀaasina‐kuitwa
(nokuti iʋo ʋakaitwa ʋaprista kusinemhiko, asi iye nokupika kwaiye, wakati kwaari:
Ishe wakapika, haaŋgaɀidyi mŋoyo ɀe,
Iwe uri muprista nokusiŋgaperi);
Saiɀoɀo Jesu wakaitwa ruɓatso rwesuŋgano inopfuʋura nokunaka.
Iʋo ʋaiʋa ʋaprista ʋazhinji, nokuti ʋakadziʋiswa norufu kugara nokusiŋgaperi;
asi iye, ɀaanogara nokusiŋgaperi, unoʋuprista bgusiŋgapfuʋudzwi
Naiɀoɀo unesimba rokuponesa kwaɀo‐kwaɀo aʋo ʋanosweɗera kunaMŋari naye, ɀaanorarama nokusiŋgaperi kuti aʋareʋerere.
Nokuti muprista mukuru wakaɗai ndiye wataifanira kuʋa naye, mutȿene, usinecakaipa, usina‐kuȿiɓiswa, wakaparadzaniswa naʋatadzi, wakakwidzwa kumsoro kweɗeŋga;
usiŋgafaniri, saʋaya ʋaprista ʋakuru, kuɓayira zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe, pakutaŋga pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋo, pashure pamsoro peɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu; nokuti wakaita iɀoɀi kamŋe cete, ɀikapera, pakuɀiita kwake ciɓayiro.
Nokuti murairo unogadza ʋanhu ʋanoʋutera, kuti ʋaʋe ʋaprista ʋakuru; asi shoko rokupika, rakateʋera murairo,
Ɀino, shoko guru panaiɀoɀo ɀatataura, ndiro kuti: Tinomuprista mukuru wakaɗai wakagara kurudyi rwecigaro coʋushe coƲumambo kuɗeŋga;
mushumiri weɀinhu ɀitȿene, nowetabernakeri caiyo, yakamiswa naShe, isina‐kumiswa nomunhu.
Nokuti muprista mukuru mumŋe nomumŋe wakagadzwa, kuti aɓayire
nokuti ɗai aiʋa panyika, uŋgaɗai asina‐kuʋa muprista, nokuti
iʋo ʋanoshumira mufananidzo nomumvuri weɀokuɗeŋga, seɀaakarairwa iye Mosesi oɗa kuita tabernakeri; nokuti wakati: Tarira, uite ɀose nomufananidzo, wawakaratidzwa mugomo.
Asi ɀino wakapiwa ɓasa rakanyanya kunaka, seɀaari Mureʋereri wesuŋgano inopfuʋura nokunaka, yakasimbiswa neɀipikirwa ɀinopfuʋura nokunaka.
Nokuti ɗai iya yokutaŋga yakaŋga isina‐caiŋgapomerwa, yecipiri iŋgaɗai isina‐kutȿakirwa nɀimbo.
Nokuti unoʋapa mhoȿa, aciti:
Tarirai, mazuʋa anoʋuya, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe,
Andicaita nawo suŋgano itȿa neimba yaIsraeri, ʋuye neimba yaJuda;
Isina‐kuita sesuŋgano yandakaita namadziɓaɓa aʋo,
Pazuʋa randakaɓata ruʋoko rwaʋo, kuti ndiʋaɓuɗise munyika yeEgipita;
Nokuti haʋana‐kurambira musuŋgano yaŋgu,
Neni ndikasaʋa nehanya naʋo, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe.
Nokuti ndiyo suŋgano yandicaita neimba yaIsraeri
Kana mazuʋa iwayo apfuʋura, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe;
Ndicaisa mirairo yaŋgu pakufuŋga kwaʋo,
Napamŋoyo yaʋo ndicainyora,
Ndicaʋa Mŋari waʋo,
Iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋaŋgu;
Mumŋe nomumŋe haaŋgazodzidzisi wokwake,
Kana mumŋe nomumŋe hama yake, aciti: Ziʋa Ishe;
Nokuti ʋose ʋacandiziʋa,
Kubva kumuɗuku kuȿikira kumukuru pakati paʋo.
Nokuti ndicaʋa neŋgoni nokusarurama kwaʋo,
Neɀiʋi ɀaʋo handicazoɀiraŋgariri.
Ɀaanoti:
Ɀino, neyiyi
Nokuti tabernakeri, yaiʋa yokutaŋga, yakagadzirwa, makaŋga munecigadziko cemŋenje, netafura, neɀiŋgwa ɀokuratidza; ndipo panonzi Patȿene.
Ɀino mberi kwecidzitiro cecipiri pakaŋga panetabernakeri yainzi Patȿene‐tȿene;

pakaŋga panendiro yendarama yeɀinonhuwira, neareka yesuŋgano, yakaŋga yakanamŋa nhiʋi dzose nendarama, imomo makaŋga munehari yendarama, yakaŋga inemana, netȿimbo yaAroni yakaɗeya kutuŋgira, namahwendefa esuŋgano;
pamsoro payo pakaŋga panamakerubi okubginya, akadzikatidza cifunhiro ceŋgoni; hatigoni kurondedzera iɀoɀo ticiita cimŋe‐cimŋe ɀino.
Ɀinhu iɀi ɀakati ɀagadzirwa saiɀoɀo, ʋaprista ʋaipinda mutabernakeri yokutaŋga ŋguʋa dzose, ʋaciɓata maɓasa okushumira Mŋari;
asi muneyecipiri muprista mukuru
Mŋeya Mutȿene aciratidza cinhu ici, kuti nzira inoenda kuNɀimbo Tȿene yakaŋga isati yataridzwa, tabernakeri yokutaŋga icimire;
wakaŋga uri mufananidzo weŋguʋa ino — ʋanoɓayira nayo ɀipo neɀiɓayiro, ɀisiŋgagoni kukwanisa pahana yake iye unoshumira;
nokuti yaiŋgoʋa mirairo yenyama, yeɀokudya, neɀokunwa, nokushamba kuzhinji, yaʋakatemerwa kuȿikira paŋguʋa yokuʋandudzwa.
Asi Kristu wakati aȿika ari muprista mukuru weɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀinozoʋuya, akapinda napatabernakeri yakapfuʋura pakukura napakukwana, isinakuitwa namaʋoko, ndiko kuti, isati iri yokusikwa kuno,
haana‐
Nokuti kana ropa rembudzi nerenzombe namaɗota etsiru, kana ɀicisaswa pamsoro paʋakaȿiɓiswa, ɀiciʋaita ʋatȿene, kuti ʋanatswe panyama,
ɀikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye wakaɀiita noMŋeya usiŋgaperi ciɓayiro kunaMŋari, cisina‐caciŋgapomerwa, ricanatsa hana dzeɗu pamaɓasa akafa, kuti tishumire Mŋari mupenyu.
Nemhaka iyo, iye ndiMureʋereri wesuŋgano itȿa, kuti, rufu ɀarwakaȿika kuzodzikinura aʋo ʋakaɗarika pasuŋgano yokutaŋga, ʋakaɗanwa ʋagopiwa cipikirwa cenhaka isiŋgaperi.
Nokuti apo panetestamente, panofanira kuʋa’po ʋo rufu rwaiye wakaiita.
Nokuti testamente inesimba kana ʋanhu ʋafa; nokuti haitoŋgoʋi nesimba kana wakaiita aciri mupenyu.
Naiɀoɀo ne
Nokuti ɀireʋo ɀose ɀakati ɀataurwa kuʋanhu ʋose naMosesi seɀakareʋa murairo, iye akatora ropa remhuru nerembudzi, pamŋe cete nemvura namakushe matȿuku, nehisopi, akasasa buku imene naʋanhu ʋose,
aciti: Iri iropa resuŋgano, yamakarairwa naMŋari.
Ʋuye ɀe, wakasasa saiɀoɀo neropa tabernakeri nemidziyo yose yokushumira nayo.
Ɀirokwaɀo, tiŋgati pamurairo ɀinhu ɀineŋge ɀose ɀinonatswa neropa; ʋuye kana kusineropa rinoteʋurwa, hakunekaŋganwiro.
Naiɀoɀo mifananidzo yeɀiri kuɗeŋga yaifanira kuti inatswe ne
Nokuti Kristu haana‐kupinda panɀimbo tȿene yakaitwa namaʋoko, inofananidza iyo iri caiyo, asi
ʋuye
nokuti ɗai ɀakaŋga ɀakaɗaro, uŋgaɗai aitambura kazhinji kubva pakuʋambga kwenyika; asi ɀino wakaʋonekwa kamŋe cete pakupedzisira kweŋguʋa, kuti aparadze ɀiʋi, nokuɀiita ciɓayiro kwake.
Ʋuye ʋanhu ɀaʋakatemerwa kuti ʋafe kamŋe cete, kutoŋgeswa kugoteʋera,
saiɀoɀo Kristu ʋo, ɀaakaitwa ciɓayiro kamŋe cete, kuti atakure ɀiʋi ɀaʋanhu ʋazhinji, ucazoʋonekwa rwecipiri, asi
Nokuti murairo ɀaunomumvuri weɀinhu ɀakanaka ɀinoʋuya usati uri mufananidzo caiwo weɀinhu
ɗai ɀakaŋga ɀakaɗaro, ɀiŋgaɗai ɀisina‐kupera kuɓayirwa here? Nokuti ʋanonamata, kana ʋakaŋga ʋanatswa kamŋe cete, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋasina‐kuzoyeʋudzwa ɀiʋi ɀaʋo.
Asi ne
Nokuti ropa renzombe nerembudzi haritoŋgogoni kubvisa ɀiʋi.
Saka pakuȿika kwake panyika, unoti:
Ciɓayiro necipo makaɀiramba,
Asi makandigadzirira muʋiri;
hamuna‐kuɗa ɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa, ne
Ɀino ndikati: Tarirai, ndaʋuya,
(Pabuku yakapetwa pakanyorwa ɀaŋgu)
Kuti ndiite kuɗa kwenyu, imi Mŋari.
Ɀaanoti pakutaŋga: Ɀiɓayiro neɀipo, neɀiɓayiro ɀinopiswa, ne
ndokuzoti: Tarirai, ndaʋuya kuzoita kuɗa kwenyu. Unobvisa cokutaŋga, kuti aise cecipiri.
Nokuɗa ikoku takaitwa ʋatȿene neciɓayiro comuʋiri waJesu Kristu,
Muprista mumŋe nomumŋe unomira zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe acishumira, nokuɓayira kazhinji ɀiɓayiro iɀoɀo ɀimŋe‐ɀimŋe, ɀisiŋgagoni kubvisa ɀiʋi;
asi iye wakati aɓayira ciɓayiro cimŋe cete pamsoro peɀiʋi, akagara nokusiŋgaperi kurudyi rwaMŋari;
kubva ɀino acimirira kuȿikira ʋaʋeŋgi ʋake ʋaitwa citsiko cetsoka dzake.
Nokuti neciɓayiro cimŋe cete wakakwanisa nokusiŋgaperi aʋo ʋanoitwa ʋatȿene.
NoMŋeya Mutȿene unotipupurira ʋo; nokuti wakataŋga, aciti:
Iyi ndiyo suŋgano yandicaita naʋo
Shure kwamazuʋa iwayo, ndiɀo ɀinotaura Ishe;
Ndicaisa mirairo yaŋgu pamŋoyo yaʋo,
Nokuinyor pakufuŋga kwaʋo;
Ɀiʋi ɀaʋo nokuɗarika kwaʋo handicatoŋgoɀiraŋgariri.
Ɀino, kana ɀinhu iɀi ɀakaŋganwirwa, ɀiʋi haɀicaɓayirwi.
Naiɀoɀo, hama
nenzira itȿa mhenyu, yaakatiʋambira iye
ʋuye ɀatinomuprista mukuru paimba yaMŋari,
ŋgatisweɗere nomŋoyo waɀokwaɗi, nokutenda kwakasimba, mŋoyo yeɗu yasaswa
Ŋgaticeŋgete kwaɀo kupupura kwetariro yeɗu, kuti irege kuzunuŋguka; nokuti iye, wakapikira, wakatendeka;
ŋgatiraŋgarirane, timutsane mŋoyo
tisarega kuʋuŋgana kweɗu, seɀinoita ʋamŋe, asi tirairane; ɀikuru ɀamunoʋona kuti zuʋa rosweɗera.
Nokuti kana ticitadza nobgoni, kana tambogamucira ziʋo yeɀokwaɗi, hakucineciɓayiro pamsoro peɀiʋi,
asi kuŋgomirira ticitya kutoŋgeswa nokutsamŋa kunopfuta somŋoto, kucapedza ʋaʋeŋgi.
Munhu, wakaramba murairo waMosesi, unofa asiŋganzwirwi tsitsi, kana paneɀapupu ɀiʋiri kana ɀitatu;
hamufuŋgi here kuti munhu, wakatsika Mŋanakomana waMŋari pasi petsoka
Nokuti tinomuziʋa iye wakati: Kutsiʋa ndokwaŋgu, ini ndicaripira. Ʋuye ɀe: Ishe ucatoŋga mhoȿa dzaʋanhu ʋake.
Ɀinotyisa kuwira pamaʋoko aMŋari mupenyu.
Asi raŋgarirai mazuʋa okutaŋga, amakati mavenekerwa, mukatsuŋga pakurwa kukuru kweɗambudziko;
pamŋe nokuti makaitwa
Nokuti makanzwira tsitsi aʋo ʋakasuŋgwa, mukatenda ʋo nomufaro kuti nhumbi dzenyu dzipambge, muciziʋa kuti imi mumene munefuma yakapfuʋura nokunaka, inogara.
Naiɀoɀo regai kurasha kusatya kwenyu kunomuɓayiro mukuru.
Nokuti munofanira kuʋa nokutsuŋgirira, kuti, kana maita kuɗa kwaMŋari, mugopiwa cipikirwa.
Nokuti kaŋguʋa kaɗuku‐ɗuku kaci’ko,
Iye unoʋuya, ucaʋuya, asiŋganonoki.
Asi wakarurama waŋgu ucaponeswa nokutenda;
Ɀino kana akadzokera shure, mŋoyo waŋgu hauŋgafari naye.
Ɀino isu hatizi iʋo ʋokudzokera shure, kuti tiparadzwe; asi
Ɀino kutenda ndirwo rusimbiso rwe
Nokuti naiko ʋanhu ʋakare ʋakapupurirwa ɀakanaka.
Nokutenda tinonzwisisa kuti nyika dzakanatso‐roŋgedzwa nenzwi raMŋari, naiɀoɀo ɀinhu, ɀinoʋonekwa, hazina‐kuitwa neɀinhu ɀinoʋonekwa.
Nokutenda Aberi wakaɓayira Mŋari ciɓayiro cakanaka kunecaKaini; akapupurirwa naco kuti wakaŋga akarurama, Mŋari acipupurira ɀipo ɀake; naiko
Nokutenda Enoki wakatorwa, kuti arege kuʋona rufu; akasaʋonekwa, nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga amutora; nokuti asati atorwa wakapupurirwa kuti wakaŋga acifadza Mŋari.
Kana kusina‐kutenda haɀibviri kumufadza; nokuti unoʋuya kunaMŋari, unofanira kutenda kuti iye uri’po, ʋuye kuti unopa ʋanomutȿaka muɓairo
Nokutenda Noa wakati anyeʋerwa pamsoro peɀinhu ɀicigere kuʋonekwa, akagadzira areka nokutya
Nokutenda Abrahama, wakati aɗanwa, akaterera, akaɓuɗa, akaenda kunɀimbo yaakanzi ucaipiwa iʋe nhaka yake; akaɓuɗa akaenda, asiŋgaziʋi kwaanoenda.
Nokutenda wakandogara somutorwa munyika yecipikirwa, sapa
nokuti wakaŋga acitarira guta rinenheyo, Mŋari ari mhizha nomuʋaki waro.
Nokutenda naiye Sara wakapiwa simba rokutora mimba, kunyaŋge akaŋga acembera, nokuti wakati iye wakamupikira wakatendeka.
Saka ku
Iʋaʋa ʋose ʋakafa ʋacitenda, ʋasina‐kupiwa ɀipikirwa, asi ʋakaɀiʋona ɀiri kure, ʋakaɀikwazisa, ʋakatenda kuti iʋo ʋaeni naʋafambi panyika.
Nokuti ʋanotaura ɀakaɗaro, ʋanoratidza kuti ʋanotȿaka nyika yaʋo caiyo.
Nokuti kana ʋairamba ʋacifuŋga
Asi ɀino ʋanoɗa
Nokutenda Abrahama, aciidzwa, wakaɓayira Isaka; iye wakaŋga agamucira kwaɀo ɀipikirwa, wakaŋga aciɓayira
iye wakaŋga aʋudzwa,
nokuti wakati Mŋari unogona kumutsa
Nokutenda Isaka wakaropafadza Jakobo naEsau pamsoro peɀinozoitwa.
Nokutenda Jakobo pakufa kwake wakaropafadza mŋanakomana mumŋe nomumŋe waJosefa; akanamata
Nokutenda Josefa, ofa, wakataura ɀokuɓuɗa kwaʋana ʋaIsraeri, akaʋaraira pamsoro pamafupa ake.
Nokutenda Mosesi pakuɓerekwa kwake wakaʋanzwa naʋaɓereki ʋake mŋedzi mitatu, nokuti ʋakaʋona kuti wakaŋga ari mŋana wakanaka; haʋana‐kutya murairo wamambo.
Nokutenda Mosesi, akura, wakaramba kunzi mŋanakomana womukunda waFarao,
akati ɀirinani kuitirwa ɀakaipa pamŋe cete naʋanhu ʋaMŋari pakufarira ɀiʋi ŋguʋa ɗuku;
akati kuɀidzwa kwaKristu ifuma huru kukufuma kwose kweEgipita; nokuti wakatarira muɓairo.
Nokutenda wakabva Egipita, asiŋgatyi kutsamŋa kwamambo; nokuti wakatsuŋgirira somunhu unoʋona
Nokutenda wakaʋamba paseka nokusasa ropa, kuti muʋurayi wamataŋgwe aʋarege iʋo.
Nokutenda ʋakayambuka Guŋgwa Dɀuku, sapanyika yakawoma; ʋaEgipita ʋaciidza iɀoɀo, ʋakaɓitirirwa.
Nokutenda maȿiŋgo eJeriko akawira pasi, apoteredzwa mazuʋa manomŋe.
Nokutenda Rakabi cifeʋe, haana‐kufa pamŋe cete naʋasinakuterera, nokuti wakaŋga agamucira ʋashori norugare.
Ndicataurireiko ɀimŋe? Nokuti ndicapererwa neŋguʋa, kana ndikataura ɀaGideoni, naBaraki, naSamsoni, naJefta, naDavidi, naSamueri, naʋaprofita;
aʋo ʋakakunda ʋushe nokutenda
Ʋakadzima simba romŋoto, ʋakatiza minondo inopinza, ʋakasimbiswa paʋutera, ʋakaʋa nesimba pakurwa, ʋakadziŋga hondo dza
Ʋakadzi ʋakapiwa ɀe ʋakafa ʋaʋo, ʋamutswa; ʋamŋe ʋakapurwa, ʋakaramba kusunuŋgurwa, kuti ʋawane kumuka kwakapfuʋura nokunaka;
ʋamŋe ʋakaidzwa, ʋacisekwa, ʋacirobga ɀikuru, ʋuye ɀe ʋacisuŋgwa, ʋaciiswa mutoroŋgo;
ʋakatakwa namabge, ʋakatemŋa‐temŋa nejeko, ʋakaidzwa, ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo; ʋakafamba ʋakafuka matebge amakwai, neŋguʋo dzembudzi; ʋasinecinhu, ʋacitambudzika, ʋaciitirwa ɀakaipa;
(nyika haina‐kufanirwa naʋo), ʋacidzuŋgaira mumarenje, nomumakomo, nomumapako, nomumakomba enyika.
Aʋa ʋose ʋakaŋga ʋapupurirwa nokutenda kwaʋo,
nokuti Mŋari wakaŋga atigadzirira cimŋe cinhu cinopfuʋura nokunaka, kuti iʋo ʋarege kukwaniswa kunze kweɗu.
Naiɀoɀo, nesu ʋo, ɀatakakomberedzwa negore reɀapupu rakakura rikaɗai, ŋgatibvisei ɀose ɀinoremedza, neɀiʋi ɀinoŋgotinamatira, ŋgatimhanye nokutsuŋgirira nhaŋgemutaŋge yatakaisirwa,

ticitarira kunaJesu, muʋambi nomukwanisi wokutenda kweɗu, iye wakatsuŋga pamucinjikwa nokuɗa kwomufaro wakaiswa pamberi pake, akashoʋora kunyadziswa kwawo, akandogara kurudyi rwecigaro coʋushe caMŋari.
Nokuti cerekedzai uyo wakatsuŋga pakukakaʋara kwakaɗai kwaʋatadzi, kuti imi murege kuneta nokupera simba pamŋeya yenyu.
Mucigere kudziʋirira kuȿikira ropa riciɓuɗa pakurwa kwenyu neɀiʋi.
Ʋuye makakaŋganwa kwaɀo kuraira kunotaura kwamuri sokuʋanakomana,
Mŋanakomana waŋgu, usaɀidza kuraŋga kwaShe,
Usapera mŋoyo kana ucirairwa naye;
Nokuti waanoɗa Ishe unomuraŋga,
Unoroʋa ɀikuru mŋanakomana mumŋe nomumŋe waanogamucira.
Tsuŋgai henyu mŋoyo kuti muraŋgwe; Mŋari unoɓata nemi saʋanakomana; nokuti mŋanakomana ndoupi usiŋgaraŋgwi naɓaɓa?
Asi kana musiŋgaraŋgwi, seɀinoitirwa ʋose, muri ʋana ʋoʋupombge, hamuzi ʋanakomana
Ʋuye ɀe isu taiʋa namadziɓaɓa eɗu enyama, ʋaitiraŋga, tikaʋakudza; ko hatiŋgaɀiisi ɀikuru pasi paƂaɓa ʋemŋeya, kuti tirarame here?
Nokuti iʋo, ɀirokwaɀo, ʋakatiraŋga mazuʋa mashoma, seɀaʋaifuŋga: asi iye
Ɀino kuraŋga kwose, kana kucaitwa, kwakaita sokusiŋgafadzi, kunocemedza; asi pashure kunoɓerekera iʋo, ʋakadzidziswa nako, ɀiɓereko ɀorugare,
Saka simbisai ɀe maʋoko akarembera pasi, namabvi anoshaiwa simba;
gadzirirai tsoka dzenyu nzira dzakarurama, kuti ico cinokamhina cirege kushoɗoka, asi ciporeswe.
Tȿakai rugare naʋanhu ʋose, noʋutȿene,
mucenjere kuti kurege kuʋa nomunhu unodzokera shure panyasha dzaMŋari; kuti mudzi wokuʋaʋa urege kumuka, ukutambudzei, ʋazhinji ʋagoȿiɓiswa nawo;
kurege kuʋa’po nemhombge, kana nousinehanya naMŋari, saEsau wakateŋgesa ʋuɗaŋgwe bgake nokudya kamŋe cete.
Nokuti munoziʋa kuti acizoɗa hake pashure kugara nhaka yokuropafadzwa, wakarambga; nokuti haana‐kuwana ŋguʋa yokutendeʋuka, kunyaŋge akaitȿaka ɀikuru nemisodzi.
Nokuti hamuna‐kusweɗera
nokukurira kwehwamanda, nokunzwi ramashoko; iʋo ʋakarinzwa ʋakakumbira kuti shoko rimŋe rirege kuzoʋataurirwa;
nokuti ʋakakoniwa kuteʋera cakaŋga carairwa,
ico cakaʋonekwa cakatyisa kuɗai, kuti naMosesi wakati: Ndinotya kwaɀo, ndinoɗeɗera;
asi imi makasweɗera kugomo reZioni, nokuguta raMŋari mupenyu, Jerusarema riri kuɗeŋga, nokumazana namazana aʋatumŋa ʋasiŋgaʋereŋgwi,
nokuʋuŋgano huru, nokukereke yamataŋgwe akanyorwa kuɗeŋga, nokunaMŋari, mutoŋgi waʋose, nokumŋeya yaʋakarurama ʋakakwaniswa,
nokunaJesu, Mureʋereri wesuŋgano itȿa, nokuropa rakasaswa, rinotaura ɀakanaka kupfuʋura Aberi.
Cenjerai kuti murege kuramba unotaura; nokuti kana aʋo ʋakamuramba ŋguʋa yaakaʋaraira panyika, ʋasina‐kupukunyuka, ɀikuru isu kana tikafuratira iye wokuɗeŋga;
inzwi rake rakazunuŋgusa nyika neŋguʋa iyo; asi ɀino wakapikira, aciti: Ndicabvundisa ɀe kamŋe cete, isati iri nyika ɓedzi, asi neɗeŋga ʋo.
Ɀino
Saka, ɀatinopiwa ʋushe bgusiŋgazunuŋguki, ŋgatiʋe nokuʋoŋga, kuti tishumire Mŋari nako, ticimufadza nokukudza nokutya.
Nokuti Mŋari weɗu mŋoto unoparadza.
Ruɗo pakati pehama ŋgarugare.
Musakaŋganwa kuitira ʋaeni ruɗo; nokuti ʋaciɗaro ʋamŋe ʋakagarisa ʋatumŋa mumba, ʋasiŋgaɀiziʋi.
Fuŋgai ʋakasuŋgwa, somuneŋge makasuŋgwa pamŋe cete naʋo; naiʋo ʋanoitirwa ɀakaipa, somuneŋge muri mumuʋiri imi ʋo.
Kuwanana
Musakarira mari pamugarire wenyu; tendai neɀamunaɀo; nokuti iye amene wakati: Handiŋgatoŋgokuregeri, handiŋgatoŋgokusiyi.
Naiɀoɀo tinotsuŋga mŋoyo, ticiti:
Ishe ndiye muɓatsiri waŋgu; handiŋgatyi;
Munhu uŋgandiiteiko?
Raŋgarirai ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋenyu ʋaikuparidzirai shoko raMŋari; cerekedzai kuguma kwokufamba kwaʋo, mugoteʋera kutenda kwaʋo.
Jesu Kristu unogara akaɗaro zuro, nanhasi, nokusiŋgaperi.
Musatorwa nedzidziso dzimŋe dzisiŋgazikanwi; nokuti ɀakanaka kuti mŋoyo usimbiswe nenyasha; urege kusimbiswa neɀokudya ɀisinakuɓatsira ʋakafamba maɀiri.
Isu tineartari, pasiŋgatenderwi kudyiwa naʋanoshumira tabernakeri.
Nokuti mitumbu yeɀipfuwo, ɀakaisirwa ropa raɀo panɀimbo tȿene nomuprista mukuru nokuɗa kweɀiʋi, inopiswa kunze kwemisasa.
Saka naiye Jesu ʋo wakatambudzika kunze kwesuʋo, kuti aite ʋanhu ʋaʋe ʋatȿene neropa rake.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatiɓuɗire kwaari kunze kwemisasa, titakure kunyadziswa kwake.
Nokuti pano hatineguta ricagara, asi tinotȿaka ricazoʋa’po.
Naiɀoɀo ŋgatirambe ticiɓayira Mŋari naye ciɓayiro cokumurumbidza, ndico ciɓereko cemiromo inopupura zita rake.
Asi musakaŋganwa kuita ɀakanaka nokugoʋana; nokuti Mŋari unofara neɀiɓayiro ɀakaɗai.
Tererai ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋenyu, muɀiise pasi paʋo; nokuti ʋanorinda mŋeya yenyu, saʋanhu ʋanozobvunzwa pamsoro penyu, kuti ʋaite iɀoɀo nomufaro, ʋasiŋgaiti neshuŋgu; nokuti iɀoɀo haɀikuɓatsiriyi cinhu.
Tinyeŋgetererei; nokuti tinoziʋa kwaɀo kuti tinehana yakanaka, ɀatinoɗa kufamba ɀakanaka paɀinhu ɀose.
Ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri kuti muite iɀoɀo, kuti ndikurumidze kudzoserwa kwamuri.
Ɀino Mŋari worugare, wakadzosa kuʋakafa mufudzi mukuru wamakwai, iye Ishe weɗu Jesu Kristu, neropa resuŋgano isiŋgaperi,
ŋgaakukwanisei paɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka, kuti muite kuɗa kwake, iye aciita mukati meɗu iɀo ɀinofadza pamberi pake, naJesu Kristu — ŋgaaʋe nokubginya nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Asi ndinokurairai, hama
Ziʋai kuti hama yeɗu Timotio wakasunuŋgurwa; kana akakurumidza kuȿika, ndinozokuʋonai pamŋe cete naye.
Nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi mose. Ameni.
Jakobo, muranda waMŋari nowaShe Jesu Kristu, kumarudzi anegumi namaʋiri akapararira: Farai!
Hama dzaŋgu, muti mufaro ɓedzi kana muciwira mumiidzo mizhinji;
muciziʋa kuti kuidzwa kwokutenda kwenyu kunoɓereka kutsuŋgirira.
Asi kutsuŋgirira ŋgakuʋe neɓasa rakakwaniswa, kuti mukwane, mururame kwaɀo, musiŋgashaiwi cinhu.
Ɀino kana mumŋe wenyu acishaiwa kucenjera ŋgaakumbire kunaMŋari, unoŋgopa ʋose asiŋgazotuki; ucapiwa hake.
Asi ŋgaakumbire nokutenda, asiŋganyunyuti napaɗuku; nokuti munhu unonyunyuta wakaita sefuŋgu reguŋgwa rinosundwa nemhepo ricimutswa‐mutswa.
Munhu uyu ŋgaarege kufuŋga kuti ucazowana cinhu kunaShe;
munhu, unemŋoyo miʋiri, unoshanduka‐shanduka panzira dzake dzose.
Asi hama iri muɗuku ŋgaafare nokukudzwa kwake;
nomufumi nokuninipiswa kwake, nokuti ucapfuʋura seruʋa roʋuswa.
Nokuti zuʋa rinoɓuɗa pamŋe cete nemhepo inopisa, ndokuwomesa ʋuswa; ruʋa rabgo rinowira pasi, nokunaka kwabgo kwakanga kwaʋonekwa kunopera; saiɀoɀo ʋo mufumi ucaȿaʋa panzira dzake.
Wakaropafadzwa munhu uyo unotsuŋga mŋoyo pakuidzwa; nokuti kana atendwa, ucapiwa korona yoʋupenyu yakapikirwa aʋo ʋanomuɗa.
Kana munhu aciidzwa, ŋgaarege kuti ndinoidzwa naMŋari; nokuti Mŋari haaŋgaidzwi neɀakaipa, naiye amene haaŋgaidzi munhu.
Asi munhu mumŋe nomumŋe unoidzwa kana acikwebga nokuciʋa kwake acinyeŋgerwa.
Ɀino kuciʋa, kana kwarema, kunoɀara ɀiʋi; neɀiʋi, kana ɀakura, ɀinoɓereka rufu.
Musanyeŋgerwa, hama dzaŋgu dzinoɗikanwa.
Ɀipo ɀose ɀakanaka neɀipiwa ɀose ɀakakwana ɀinobva kumsoro, ɀiciɓuruka kunaƂaɓa ʋeɀiedza, uyo usina‐kupinduka kana mumvuri wokushanduka.
Nokuɗa kwake wakatiɓereka neshoko reɀokwaɗi, kuti isu tiite seciɓereko cokutaŋga ceɀisikwa ɀake.
Munoɀiziʋa henyu iɀoɀi, hama dzaŋgu dzinoɗikanwa. Asi munhu mumŋe nomumŋe ŋgaakurumidze kunzwa, anonoke kutaura, anonoke kutsamŋa;
nokuti kutsamŋa kwomunhu hakuiti kururama kwaMŋari.
Saka bvisai tȿina yose nokuipa kwakawanda, mugamucire nomŋoyo munyoro shoko rakasimŋa mukati
Asi iʋai ʋaiti ʋeshoko, musaʋa ʋanzwi ʋoga, muciɀinyeŋgera.
Nokuti kana munhu ari munzwi weshoko, asati ari muiti
Nokuti unoɀiʋona, ndokuenda, ndokukaŋganwa pakarepo kuti wakaɗini iye.
Asi munhu unocerekedza murairo wakakwana,
Kana munhu aciti ndinonamata
Kunamata, kwakarurama, kusinemhoȿa pamberi paMŋari weɗu naƂaɓa, ndiko kufambira nherera necirikadzi pakutambudzika kwaʋo,
Hama dzaŋgu, kutenda kwenyu kunaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu,
Nokuti kana musinagoge renyu mukapinda munhu unemhete yendarama, akapfeka ŋguʋo dzakanaka, mukapinda ʋo murombo, wakapfeka ŋguʋo dzakaipa;
mukatarira uyo wakapfeka ŋguʋo dzakanaka, mukati: Gara pano pakanaka; mukati kumurombo: Mira papo, kana: Gara pasi pecitsiko cetsoka dzaŋgu;
ko hamuna‐kutsaura mumŋoyo yenyu, mukaʋa ʋatoŋgi ʋanemifuŋgo yakaipa here?
Inzwai, hama dzaŋgu dzinoɗikanwa: Ko Mŋari haana‐kusanaŋgura ʋarombo ʋenyika here kuti ʋaʋe ʋafumi pakutenda, naʋadyi ʋenhaka yoʋushe bgaakapikira ʋanomuɗa?
Asi imi makaɀidza murombo. Ko haʋazi ʋafumi ʋanokuremedzai, naiʋo ʋanokukwirirai kuɀigaro ɀokutoŋga here?
Ko haʋazi iʋo ʋanomhura zita rakanaka ramunotumidzwa naro here?
Asi ɀino kana mucizadzisa murairo woʋushe, seɀaɀakanyorwa,
Asi kana mucitenda ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu, munoita ɀiʋi, munopiwa mhoȿa nomurairo mucinzi ʋaɗariki.
Nokuti munhu unoceŋgeta murairo wose, akagumburwa kunecinhu cimŋe cete, waʋa nemhoȿa kuneɀose.
Nokuti iye, wakati: Usaita ʋupombge, ndiye ʋo, wakati: Usaʋuraya. Ɀino, kana usiŋgaiti ʋupombge, asi uciʋuraya, waʋa muɗariki womurairo.
Taurai, ʋuye itai saʋanhu ʋanozotoŋgwa nomurairo wokusunuŋgurwa.
Nokuti kutoŋga hakuŋgaʋi neŋgoni kunousina‐kuitira
Ɀinoɓatsirei hama dzaŋgu, kana munhu aciti: Ndinokutenda, asi asinamaɓasa? Ko kutenda uko kuŋgamuponesa here?
Kana kune
mumŋe wenyu akati kwaʋari: Endai henyu nomufaro, mudziyirwe, mugute, musiŋgaʋapi iɀo ɀinoɗikanwa nomuʋiri, ɀinogoɓatsirei?
Saiɀoɀo, ʋo, nokutenda kana kusinamaɓasa, kwakafa hako.
Asi mumŋe uŋgati: Iwe unokutenda, neni ndinamaɓasa; ndiratidze kutenda kwako kusinamaɓasa, neni ndigokuratidza namaɓasa aŋgu kutenda
Iwe unotenda kuti Mŋari ndiye mumŋe cete; unoita ɀakanaka; mŋeya yakaipa inotenda ʋo
Ɀino iwe munhu woʋupenzi, unoɗa kuziʋa here kuti kutenda kusinamaɓasa kwakafa?
Ko Abrahama, ɓaɓa ʋeɗu, haana‐kururamiswa namaɓasa here, ŋguʋa yaakaɓayira mŋanakomana wake Isaka paartari?
Unoʋona kuti kutenda kwake kwakaɓata pamŋe cete namaɓasa ake, ʋuye kuti kutenda kwake kwakakwaniswa namaɓasa;
rugwaro rukaitika, runoti: Abrahama wakatenda Mŋari, kukanzi kwaari ndiko kururama; akanzi hama yaMŋari.
Munoʋona kuti munhu unoruramiswa namaɓasa, haaruramiswi nokutenda ɓedzi.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo, Rakabi, cifeʋe, haana‐kururamiswa here namaɓasa, ŋguʋa yaakaciŋgamidza nhume, nokuʋaendisa neimŋe nzira?
Nokuti somuʋiri usinomŋeya wakafa, saiɀoɀo kutenda kusinamaɓasa kwakafa ʋo.
Hama dzaŋgu, musaʋa ʋadzidzisi ʋazhinji, ɀamunoziʋa kuti ticatoŋgwa nokupfuʋurisa.
Nokuti tinogumburwa tose paɀinhu ɀizhinji. Kana munhu asiŋgagumburwi pakutaura, iye munhu wakakwana, unogona kudzora muʋiri wose ʋo.
Ɀino kana ticiisa matare amabiza mumiromo yawo, kuti atiterere, tinodzora ʋo muʋiri wawo wose.
Tarirai magwa makuru, kunyaŋge ari makuru akaɗai, acidziŋgwa nemhepo dzinesimba guru, anodzorwa necidzoreso ciɗuku‐ɗuku kwose‐kwose nokuɗa kwomŋoyo womufambisi wawo.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo rurimi mutezo muɗuku, runoɀirumbidza ɀikuru. Tarirai, mŋoto muɗuku unotuŋgidza huni zhinji sei!
Rurimi mŋoto,
Nokuti marudzi ose emhuka, neeshiri, neeɀinokambaira, neeɀiri muguŋgwa aŋgapiŋgudzwa, ʋuye akambopiŋgudzwa naʋanhu;
asi hakunomunhu uŋgapiŋgudza rurimi; ndico cinhu cakaipa cinoshanduka‐shanduka, cizere nomuti unoʋuraya.
Narwo tinorumbidza Ishe Ƃaɓa; narwo tinotuka ʋanhu, ʋakaitwa nomufananidzo waMŋari;
mumuromo mumŋe munobva kurumbidza nokutuka. Hama dzaŋgu, hatifaniri kuɗaro.
Tsime rinoɓuɗisa pacituɓu cimŋe mvura inonaka neinoʋaʋa here?
Hama dzaŋgu, muʋonde uŋgaɓereka maorivi, kana muzambiriŋga maʋonde here? Kunyaŋge nemvura inoʋaʋa haiŋgaɓuɗisi inonaka.
Ndiani pakati penyu wakacenjera, wakaŋgwara? Ŋgaaratidze nomufambire wake wakanaka maɓasa ake noʋunyoro bgoʋucenjeri.
Asi kana munegoɗo rinoʋaʋa norukaʋe mumŋoyo menyu, musaɀirumbidza nokureʋera ɀokwaɗi nhema.
Kucenjera uku hakuɓuruki kucibva kumsoro, asi ndokwenyika, kwatakamuka nako, kwomŋeya wakaipa.
Nokuti panegoɗo norukaʋe, ndi’po panenyoŋganiso namaɓasa ose akaipa.
Asi kucenjera, kunobva kumsoro, ɀikuru kwakacena, ʋuye kunorugare, kunyoro, kunoterera, kuzere neŋgoni neɀiɓereko ɀakanaka, kusiŋgatsauri kusiŋganyeŋgeri.
Ciɓereko cokururama cinodɀarwa parugare naʋanoita rugare.
Kurwa nokukakaʋara pakati penyu ɀinobvepiko? Haɀibvi pakuciʋa kwenyu, kunorwa pamitezo yenyu here?
Munociʋa, asi hamune
Munokumbira, musiŋgapiwi; nokuti munokumbira ɀakaipa, kuti muɀiparadze pakuciʋa kwenyu.
Imi ʋoʋutere, hamuziʋi here kuti ʋushamŋari bgenyika bgunoʋeŋgana naMŋari? Naiɀoɀo mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɗa kuʋa shamŋari yenyika, unoɀiita muʋeŋgi waMŋari.
Munofuŋga kuti Rugwaro runotaura pasina here,
Asi unopa nyasha dzakapfuʋura. Saka
Naiɀoɀo muɀiise pasi paMŋari: dziʋisai Diaborosi, agokutizai.
Sweɗerai kunaMŋari, iye agosweɗera kwamuri. Shambai maʋoko enyu, imi ʋatadzi; natsai mŋoyo yenyu, imi munemŋoyo miʋiri.
Shuwai, muceme, murire; kuseka kwenyu ŋgakushandurwe kuʋe kucema, nokufara kwenyu dziʋe shuŋgu.
Muɀininipise pamberi paShe, agokukudzai.
Hama
Mumŋe cete ndiye mutemi womurairo nomutoŋgi, iye unogona kuponesa nokuparadza; asi iwe ndiwe aniko unotoŋga wokwako?
Nhai imi, munoti: Nhasi, kana maŋgwana ticaenda kuguta rokuti, tigogara’ko gore, ticishambadzira, tifume —
imi musiŋgaziʋi ɀamaŋgwana. Ʋupenyu bgenyu cinyiko? Nokuti muri mhute, inoʋonekwa ŋguʋa ɗuku, ndokunyaŋgarika.
Muŋgaɗai muciti: Kana Ishe aciɗa, ticararama tiite ɀokuti neɀokuti.
Asi ɀino munoɀirumbidza pakuɀikudza kwenyu; kuɀirumbidza kwose kwakaɗai kwakaipa.
Naiɀoɀo uyo, unoziʋa kuita ɀakanaka, akasaɀiita, iye uneɀiʋi.
Nhai, imi ʋafumi, cemai muridze mhere nokuɗa kwamaɗambudziko acakuwirai.
Fuma yenyu yakaʋora, ŋguʋo dzenyu dzapera neɀiʋundudzi.
Ndarama yenyu nesirveri yenyu ɀineŋgura; ŋgura yaɀo icakupupurirai ɀakaipa, icapedza nyama yenyu somŋoto. Makaɀiceŋgetera fuma pamazuʋa okupedzisira.
Tarirai, muɓairo waʋaranda ʋenyu ʋakaceka minda yenyu, wamakaramba nawo nokunyeŋgera, unoɗanidzira; nokuɗana kwaʋaceki kwakaȿika kunzeʋe dzaShe wehondo.
Makagara ɀinonaka panyika mucikarira ɀinofadza; makakodza mŋoyo yenyu nezuʋa rokuɓaya.
Makatoŋgera wakarurama, mukamuʋuraya; haakudziʋisiyi.
Naiɀoɀo hama
Nemi ʋo tsuŋgirirai; simbisai mŋoyo yenyu, nokuti kuʋuya kwaShe kwaʋa pedyo.
Hama
Hama
Tarirai, ʋakatsuŋga mŋoyo tinoti ʋakaropafadzwa; makanzwa ɀokutsuŋgirira kwaJobo, makaʋona Ishe ɀaakaʋaʋarira naye, kuti Ishe unomŋoyo munyoro kwaɀo, unetsitsi.
Asi, hama dzaŋgu, kupfuʋura ɀinhu ɀose, musapika, kunyaŋge neɗeŋga, kana nenyika, kana nokupika kumŋe kwose; asi hoŋo, yenyu ŋgaiʋe hoŋo, kwete yenyu ŋgaiʋe kwete; kuti murege kutoŋgwa.
Kunomumŋe unotambudzika pakati penyu here? Ŋgaanyeŋgetere. Kunomumŋe unofara here? Ŋgaaimbe nziyo.
Kunomumŋe unorwara pakati penyu here? Ŋgaaɗane ʋakuru ʋekereke; ŋgaʋamunyeŋgeterere, ʋamuzodze namafuta nezita raShe.
Kunyeŋgetera kwokutenda kucaponesa unorwara, Ishe ucamumutsa; kana akaita ɀiʋi, ucaɀikaŋganwirwa.
Naiɀoɀo reʋururanai ɀiʋi ɀenyu, munyeŋgetererane kuti muporeswe. Kukumbira kwomunhu wakarurama kunesimba guru pakuɓata kwako.
Eria wakaŋga ari munhu wakaita sesu, akanyeŋgetera nomunyeŋgetero kuti mvura irege kunaya; ikasanaya panyika makore matatu nemŋedzi mitanhatu.
Akanyeŋgetera ɀe; ɗeŋga rikanisa mvura, nyika ikaɓereka ɀiɓereko ɀayo.
Hama dzaŋgu, kana kunomunhu pakati penyu wakatsauka paɀokwaɗi, mumŋe akamudzora,
ŋgaaziʋe kuti unodzora mutadzi panzira yokutsauka kwake, ucaponesa mŋeya parufu nokufukidza ɀiʋi ɀizhinji.
Petro, muapostora waJesu Kristu, kunaʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋari ʋaeni, ʋakapararira paPonto, neGaratia, neKapadokia, neAsia, neBitinia,
nokuziʋa ɀiri mberi kwaMŋari Ƃaɓa, muʋutȿene bgoMŋeya, kuti ʋaterere, ʋasaswe neropa raJesu Kristu: Nyasha norugare ŋgaɀiwanzwe kwamuri.
Mŋari, Ƃaɓa ʋaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu, ŋgaatendwe, wakatiɓereka ɀe neŋgoni dzake huru, kuti
kuti
munorindwa nesimba raMŋari nokutenda, kuti mupiwe ruponeso, rwakagara rwakagadzirwa, kuti ruratidzwe neŋguʋa yokupedzisira.
Iyo yamunofarira ɀikuru, kunyaŋge ɀino, kana ɀicifanira, mucicemedzwa ŋguʋa ɗuku nemiidzo mizhinji;
kuti kuidzwa kwokutenda kwenyu kunokosha ɀikuru kupfuʋura ndarama inopera hayo, kunyaŋge inoidzwa nomŋoto, kuwanikwe
iye wamunoɗa, kunyaŋge musina‐kumuʋona; iye wamunotenda kwaari, kunyaŋge musiŋgamuʋoni ɀino, mucifara ɀikuru nomufaro usiŋgagoni kutaurwa, uzere nokubginya;
mucipiwa cinoʋaʋarirwa nokutenda
Ruponeso urwu rwakabvunzisiswa nokunɀerwa kwaɀo naʋaprofita, ʋakaprofita ɀenyasha
ʋacinɀera kuti ŋguʋa ndeipi, kana yakaɗini, yakataurwa noMŋeya waKristu, wakaŋga uri mukati maʋo, ŋguʋa yaakapupura kare ɀokutambudzika kwaKristu, nokubginya kunozoteʋera iɀoɀo.
Aʋo, ʋakaratidzwa kuti ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɀiɓatiri iʋo, asi imi,
Saka ɀisuŋgei ɀiʋuno ɀendaŋgariro dzenyu, muȿinure, mutarire nomŋoyo wose kunyasha dzamucazopiwa pakuʋonekwa kwaJesu Kristu;
saʋana ʋanoterera, musiŋgaenzanisi mufambire
asi saiye mutȿene wakakuɗanai, nemi ʋo mumene muʋe ʋatȿene pamufambire wenyu wose;
nokuti kwakanyorwa,
Ɀino kana mucimuidza Ƃaɓa, iye unotoŋga acitarira ɀakaitwa nomumŋe nomumŋe asiŋgatariri ɀinoʋonekwa ɀomunhu, garai paŋguʋa yoʋutorwa bgenyu mucitya;
muciziʋa kuti hamuna‐kudzikinurwa neɀinoʋora, nesirveri kana ndarama, pamufambire wenyu usinamaturo, wamakasiyirwa namadziɓaɓa enyu;
asi neropa raKristu, seregwaiana risina‐cariŋgapomerwa, risinoruʋara;
iye wakazikanwa kare, nyika isati yaʋambga, asi wakaratidzwa pakuguma kweŋguʋa nokuɗa kwenyu,
, munotenda naye kunaMŋari, wakamumutsa kuʋakafa, akamupa kubginya; kuti kutenda kwenyu netariro yenyu ɀiʋe kunaMŋari.
Ɀamakanatsa mŋeya yenyu muciterera ɀokwaɗi, kuti muɗe hama nokusanyeŋgera, munofanira kuɗana ɀikuru nomŋoyo wose;
nokuti makaɓerekwa kutȿa, ɀisiŋgabvi pambeu inoʋora, asi paneisiŋgaʋori, neshoko raMŋari ɓenyu rinogara
Nokuti,
Nyama yose yakaita soʋuswa,
Nokunaka kwose seruʋa roʋuswa.
Ʋuswa bgunoȿaʋa, neruʋa rinowira pasi;
Asi shoko raShe rinogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ndireri shoko romufaro ramakaparidzirwa.
Naiɀoɀo rashai ɀakaipa ɀose, nokunyeŋgera kwose, namano‐mano, negoɗo, nokucera kwose,
saʋacece ʋacaŋgoɓerekwa, paŋgai mukaka womŋeya, usina‐kushatiswa, kuti mukure nawo, mugoponeswa;
kana makaraʋira kuti Ishe unomŋoyo munyoro.
Ʋuyai kwaari, iye ibge ɓenyu, rakarashwa naʋanhu, asi rakasanaŋgurwa naMŋari, rinokosha.
Nemi ʋo, samabge mapenyu, muʋakwe
Nokuti muRugwaro ɀiri’mo,
Tarira, ndinoisa muZioni ibge rekona, rakasanaŋgurwa, rinokosha;
Nounotenda kwaari haaŋganyadziswi.
Naiɀoɀo imi, munotenda, munako kukudzwa; asi kunaʋasiŋgatendi,
Ibge rakarashwa naʋaʋaki,
Ndiro rakaitwa musoro wekona;
ʋuye
Ibge rokugumbusa,
Neɗombo rokupiŋganidza;
Asi imi muri rudzi rwakasanaŋgurwa, ʋuprista bgamambo, rudzi rutȿene, ʋanhu ʋaakaɀiwanira, kuti muparidze kunaka kwaiye wakakuɗanai, kuti mubve parima muʋuye kuciedza cake cinoshamisa.
Imi kare makaŋga musi ʋanhu; asi ɀino muri ʋanhu ʋaMŋari; makaŋga musiŋganzwirwi ŋgoni, asi ɀino manzwirwa ŋgoni.
Ʋaɗikanwa, ndinokumbira ɀikuru kwamuri, ɀamuri ʋatorwa naʋaeni, kuti muɀidzore pakuciʋa kwenyama kunorwa nomŋeya;
mufambire wenyu uʋe wakanaka pakati paʋahedeni; kuti paʋanokupomerai ʋaciti munoita ɀakaipa, ʋarumbidze Mŋari nezuʋa rokushanyira, kana ʋaciʋona maɓasa enyu akanaka.
Muɀiise pasi pecireʋo cimŋe necimŋe caʋanhu nokuɗa kwaShe: kana ari mambo, nokuti ndiye mukuru;
kana ʋari ʋaɓati, nokuti ʋakatumŋa naye kuti ʋatsiʋe ʋanoita ɀakaipa, ʋuye ʋarumbidze ʋanoita ɀakanaka.
Nokuti ndiko kuɗa kwaMŋari, kuti nokuita kwenyu ɀakanaka munyaradze kusaziʋa kwamapenzi;
saʋanhu ʋakasunuŋguka, musiŋgaiti kusunuŋguka kwenyu kuti ciʋe cifukidzo ceɀakaipa, asi
Kudzai ʋanhu ʋose. Iɗai hama dzose. Ityai Mŋari. Kudzai mambo.
Ʋaranda, tererai ʋatenzi ʋenyu nokutya kwose,
Nokuti ndidzo nyasha kana munhu acitsuŋgirira pakutambudzika nokuɗa kwehana kunaMŋari, acitambudzika asinemhoȿa.
Nokuti kunerumbidzo yeiko, kana mucitsuŋgirira matadza, mukarobga? Asi kana mukatsuŋgirira kana muciita ɀakanaka mukatambudzika, iɀoɀo inyasha kunaMŋari.
Nokuti makaɗanirwa iɀoɀo, Kristu ɀaakakutambudzikirai ʋo, akakusiyirai mufananidzo, kuti muteʋere makwara ake;
iye usina‐kuita ɀiʋi, nokunyeŋgera hakunakuʋonekwa mumuromo make;
iye wakati acitukwa, haana‐kutuka ɀe; wakati acitambudzika, haana‐kutyisidzira; asi wakaisa
iye wakatakura amene ɀiʋi ɀeɗu mumuʋiri wake pamuti, kuti isu, kana tafa kuɀiʋi, tiraramire ɀakarurama; iye wamakaporeswa namaʋaŋga ake.
Nokuti makaŋga makatsauka samakwai; asi ɀino madzokera kumufudzi nomutariri wemŋeya yenyu.
Saiɀoɀo, imi ʋakadzi, iʋai pasi paʋarume ʋenyu; kuti kunyaŋge kana ʋamŋe ʋasiŋgatereri shoko, ʋadzorwe nomufambire waʋakadzi ʋaʋo pasineshoko
kana ʋaciʋona mufambire wenyu, wakacena pamŋe cete nokutya
kushoŋga kwenyu ŋgakurege kuʋa kwokunze, kwokuruka vudzi, nokushoŋga ndarama, kana kupfeka ŋguʋo;
asi
Nokuti saiɀoɀo ʋo kare ʋakadzi ʋatȿene, ʋaitarira kunaMŋari, ʋakaɀishoŋgedza, ʋaciɀiisa pasi paʋarume ʋaʋo,
saSara waiterera Abrahama, acimuidza ishe; maʋa ʋana ʋake ɀino, kana muciita ɀakanaka, musiŋgatyiswi necinhu cipi necipi cinovundusa.
Saiɀoɀo imi ʋarume, garai
Pakupedzisira, muʋe nomŋoyo mumŋe mose, munzwirane ŋgoni, muɗe hama, muʋe nomŋoyo munyoro, muɀininipise;
musiŋgatsiʋi ɀakaipa neɀakaipa, kana kutuka nokutuka; asi muropafadze, nokuti ndiɀo ɀamakaɗanirwa, kuti mugare nhaka yokuropafadzwa.
Nokuti,
Uyo, unoɗa ʋupenyu,
Nokuʋona mazuʋa akanaka,
Ŋgaadzore rurimi rwake paneɀakaipa,
Nemiromo yake, kuti irege kutaura ɀinonyeŋgera.
Ŋgaanɀenge ɀakaipa, aite ɀakanaka;
Ŋgaatȿake rugare, aruteʋere.
Nokuti meso aShe ari pamsoro paʋakarurama,
Nenzeʋe dzake pakukumbira kwaʋo.
Asi ciso caShe ciri pamsoro paʋanoita ɀakaipa.
Ndianiko ucakuitirai ɀakaipa, kana mucishiŋgairira ɀakanaka?
Asi kana mucitambudzika nokuɗa kwokururama, makaropafadzwa; musatya kutyisa kwaʋo, ʋuye musakaŋganiswa.
Asi itai Kristu mutȿene mumŋoyo menyu aʋe Ishe; mugare makaɀigadzira kupindura mumŋe nomumŋe unokubvunzai pamsoro petariro iri mukati menyu, asi
iʋai nehana yakanaka, kuti paʋanokucerai, iʋo ʋanomhura mufambire wenyu wakanaka munaKristu, ʋanyadziswe.
Nokuti ɀirinani, kana kuri kuɗa kwaMŋari, kuti mutambudzike kana muciita ɀakanaka, pakuti kana muciita ɀakaipa.
Nokuti naKristu wakatambudzika ʋo kamŋe cete pamsoro peɀiʋi,
mauri wakandoparidzira ʋo mŋeya iri pakusuŋgwa,
yakaŋga isinakuterera kare, paŋguʋa iya mŋoyo murefu waMŋari ucimirira kugadzirwa kweareka pamazuʋa aNoa; mukati mayo ʋashoma, iʋo ʋanhu ʋasere, ʋakaponeswa nemvura.
Naiwo mufananidzo worubapatidzo, runokuponesai ɀino, rusiŋgareʋi kubviswa kwetȿina yenyama, asi kutȿaka hana yakanaka kunaMŋari nokumuka kwaJesu Kristu;
iye uri kurudyi rwaMŋari; wakapinda kuɗeŋga, ʋatumŋa namadzishe namasimba ɀikaiswa pasi pake.
Naiɀoɀo, Kristu ɀaakatambudzika panyama, nemi ʋo mushoŋge muraŋgariro iwoyo; nokuti munhu wakatambudzika panyama warega ɀiʋi;
kuti paŋguʋa yakasara panyama arege kurarama nokuciʋa kwaʋanhu, asi nokuɗa kwaMŋari.
Nokuti ŋguʋa yakapfuʋura yakariŋgana kuita kuɗa kwaʋahedeni, nokufamba noʋutere, nokuciʋa, nokunwa waini, nokutamba kwakaipa, namaɓira, nokunamata ɀifananidzo ɀisakafanira;
ʋanoshamiswa necinhu ici, kuti hamufambidzani naʋo pakusaɀidzora kwaʋo uku kwakawanda, ʋaci
Iʋo ʋacaɀiɗaʋirira kunaiye wakaɀigadzira kutoŋga ʋapenyu naʋakafa.
Nokuti nokuɗa kwaiɀoɀi Evaŋgeri yakaparidzirwa ʋakafa, kuti ʋatoŋgwe haʋo panyama nomutoʋo waʋanhu, asi ʋararame nomutoʋo waMŋari pamŋeya.
Ɀino kuguma kweɀinhu ɀose kwaʋa pedyo; naiɀoɀo iʋai ʋakacenjera, muȿinure kuti munyeŋgetere.
Ɀikuru kuneɀose ɗanai noruɗo rukuru, nokuti ruɗo runofukidzira ɀiʋi ɀizhinji.
Itiranai ruɗo pakati penyu
Mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakapiwa cipo cenyasha, shumiranai naco saʋatariri ʋakanaka ʋenyasha zhinji dzaMŋari.
Kana munhu acitaura,
Ʋaɗikanwa, musashamiswa nokunyanyisa
asi farai ɀamunogoʋana naKristu pakutambudzika kwake, kuti pakuʋonekwa kwokubginya kwake mufare ʋo nomufaro mukuru.
Kana muciɀidzwa nokuɗa kwezita raKristu, makaropafadzwa, nokuti Mŋeya wokubginya waMŋari ugere pamsoro penyu;
nokuti kurege kuʋa nomumŋe wenyu ucatambudzika nemhaka yokuti muʋurayi, kana mbava, kana unoita ɀakaipa, kana usiŋgaregi ɀaʋamŋe;
asi kana munhu acitambudzika nokuɗa kwokuti mukristu, ŋgaarege kunyadziswa; asi ŋgaakudze Mŋari nezita iri.
Nokuti ŋguʋa
Ʋuye kana ɀiciremera wakarurama kuti aponeswe, ko uyo, usiŋgaɗi Mŋari, nomutadzi, ʋacagoʋonekwepi?
Naiɀoɀo naiʋo, ʋanotambudzika nokuɗa kwaMŋari, ŋgaʋaise mŋeya yaʋo kuMusiki wakatendeka ʋaciita ɀakanaka.
Naiɀoɀo ndinoraira ʋakuru pakati penyu, ini mukuru pamŋe cete naʋo necapupu camaɗambudziko aKristu, nomugoʋani naʋo wokubginya kucazoratidzwa,
Fudzai ɓoka raMŋari riri pakati penyu, musiŋgaɀiiti nokuroʋererwa, asi nomŋoyo unoɗa nokuɗa kwaMŋari, musiŋgaɀiiti nokuɗa kwokukarira fuma yakaipa;
musiŋgaiti nesimba neɀamakagoʋerwa, asi muʋe ʋatuŋgamiriri ʋeɓoka.
Kana Mufudzi mukuru acizoʋonekwa, mucawana korona yokubginya isiŋgaȿaʋi.
Saiɀoɀo imi ʋaɗuku, muɀiise pasi paʋakuru, nemi mose pfekai kuɀininipisa mumŋe kunomumŋe, nokuti Mŋari unodziʋisa ʋanoɀikudza, asi unopa nyasha ʋanoɀininipisa.
Naiɀoɀo ɀininipisei pasi poruʋoko runesimba rwaMŋari, kuti akukudzei neŋguʋa yakafanira;
kandirai pamsoro pake kufuŋganya kwenyu kwose, nokuti iye unokuceŋgetai.
Ȿinurai, murinde; muʋeŋgi wenyu Diaborosi, unofamba‐famba seshumba inorira, icitȿaka waiŋgaparadza.
Mumudziʋisei, makamira nesimba pakutenda, muciziʋa kuti kutambudzika ikoko kunoitirwa hama dzose dziri panyika.
Ɀino Mŋari wenyasha dzose, iye wakakuɗanirai kukubginya kwake kusiŋgaperi munaKristu, kana mambotambudzika kaŋguʋa kaɗuku, ucakukwanisai, nokukumisai, nokukusimbisai, nokukuteyai.
Ŋgaaʋe nesimba nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Ndakakunyorerai mashoko mashomanene naSirvano, hama yakatendeka pakufuŋga kwaŋgu, ndiciraira, nokupupura kuti idzi ndidzo nyasha dzaɀokwaɗi dzaMŋari; mirai madziri.
iri muBabironi, yakasanaŋgurwa pamŋe cete nemi, naMarko, mŋanakomana waŋgu, ʋanokukwazisai.
Kwazisanai nokuȿeta kworuɗo.
Rugare ŋgaruʋe nemi mose muri munaKristu.
Simeoni Petro, muranda nomuapostora waJesu Kristu, kunaʋakagoʋerwa kutenda kumŋe nokweɗu, kunokosha, nokururama kwaMŋari weɗu noMuponesi Jesu Kristu;
nyasha ŋgadziʋe nemi norugare ŋgaruwanzwe pakuziʋa Mŋari naJesu, Ishe weɗu;
nokuti nesimba roʋuMŋari bgake takapiwa ɀose ɀinoɗikanwa paʋupenyu napakunamata Mŋari, nenzira yokumuziʋa iye wakatiɗana nokubginya kwake nokunaka;
akatipa naɀo ɀi kirwa ɀinokosha ɀakakura kwaɀo; kut naɀo muʋe ʋanhu ʋakagoʋerwa ʋuMŋari, matiza kuʋora kuri panyika nokuciʋa.
Ɀino nemhaka iyi mucishiŋgaira kwaɀo wedzerai kunaka pakutenda kwenyu, napakunaka
napakuziʋa, kuɀidzora; napakuɀidzora, kutsuŋgirira; napakutsuŋgirira, kunamata Mŋari;
napakunamata Mŋari, kuɗa ʋatendi, napakuɗa ʋatendi, ruɗo.
Nokuti kana muneɀinhu iɀi, ɀiciramba ɀiciwanzwa, ɀicakuitai ʋanhu ʋasinoʋusimbe naʋasiŋgashaiwi ɀiɓereko pakuziʋa Ishe weɗu, Jesu Kristu.
Nokuti munhu, usinaiɀoɀi iɓofu, unoʋona ɀiri pedyo ɓedzi, wakaŋganwa kusukwa kweɀiʋi ɀake ɀakare.
Saka, hama
nokuti muciɀiita mucazarurirwa ɀakanaka kuti mupinde muʋushe bgusiŋgaper bgaShe weɗu, noMuponesi Jesu Kristu.
Saka handiŋgaregi kukuyeʋudzai ɀinhu iɀi ŋguʋa dzose, kunyaŋge muciɀiziʋa henyu, ʋuye makasimba paɀokwaɗi
Ndinoti ɀakanaka, kuti ndiciri mutabernakeri ino ndikumutsei nokukuyeʋudzai;
ndiciziʋa kuti kubviswa kwetabernakeri yaŋgu kwaʋa pedyo, seɀandakaratidzwa naShe weɗu Jesu Kristu.
Ɀino ndicashiŋgaira, kuti mugogona kuraŋgarira ɀinhu iɀi ŋguʋa dzose kana ndaenda.
Nokuti hatina‐kuteʋera ŋgano dzokufuŋgwa nenjere, ŋguʋa yatakakuziʋisai simba nokuʋuya kwaShe weɗu Jesu Kristu, asi takaŋga tiri ʋanhu ʋakaʋona ʋumambo bgake.
Nokuti iye wakapiwa kukudzwa nokubginya naMŋari, Ƃaɓa, paŋguʋa iya, yakaʋuya inzwi rakaɗai kwaari, ricibva kukubginya kukuru‐kuru,
Inzwi iri takarinzwa isu, ricibva kuɗeŋga, ŋguʋa yatakaŋga tinaye mugomo dɀene.
Ʋuye tineshoko roʋuprofita rakasimba kwaɀo, ramunoita ɀakanaka kana muciriterera, rakaita somŋenje unovenekera munerima, kuȿikira ʋutoŋga bgucitȿuka, nenyamasase iciɓuɗira mŋoyo yenyu;
muciziʋa pakutaŋga, kuti hakunoʋuprofita bgorugwaro bgunoŋgoɗudzirwa nomunhu;
nokuti hakunoʋuprofita bgakatoŋgoʋuya nokuɗa kwomunhu, asi ʋanhu ʋaMŋari ʋakataura, ʋacimutswa noMŋeya Mutȿene.
Asi kwakaŋga kunaʋaprofita ʋenhema pakati paʋanhu, seɀaʋacaʋa’po pakati penyu ʋo ʋadzidzisi ʋenhema, ʋacapinza pakaʋanda dzidziso
Ʋazhinji ʋacateʋera ʋutere bgaʋo; nokuɗa kwaʋo nzira yeɀokwaɗi icaɀidzwa.
Pakukarira kwaʋo mari ʋacakunyeŋgerai namashoko amano-mano; kutoŋgwa kwaʋo,
Nokuti kana Mŋari asina‐kurega ʋatumŋa ʋakatadza, asi wakaʋakandira muTartaro nokuʋaisa kumakomba erima, kuti ʋaceŋgeterwe kutoŋgwa;
akasarega ʋo nyika yekare, asi wakaponesa Noa muparidzi wokururama pamŋe cete naʋamŋe ʋanomŋe, ŋguʋa yaakaʋuyisa mvura zhinji panyika yaʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari;
akashandura maguta eSodoma neGomora akaaita maɗota, akaatoŋgera kuti aparadzwe, akaaita ciʋe ciratidzo kunaiʋo ʋacagara ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari;
akasunuŋgura Roti, wakaŋga akarurama, wakaŋga afa neshuŋgu nokuɗa kwomufambire woʋutere waʋakashata,
(nokuti munhu uyu wakarurama, agere pakati paʋo aciʋona nokunzwa, wakarwadzisa mŋeya wake wakarurama zuʋa rimŋe nerimŋe namaɓasa aʋo akaŋga asino‐kururama).
Ishe unoziʋa kusunuŋgura pamiidzo ʋanonamata Mŋari, nokuceŋgeta ʋasakarurama ʋaʋe pakurobga kuȿikira pazuʋa rokutoŋgwa;
ɀikuru iʋo ʋanofamba nomutoʋo wenyama pakuciʋa kunoȿiɓisa nokuɀidza ʋukuru; ʋanotsuŋga, ʋaciita nokuɗa kwaʋo, ʋasiŋgatyi kutuka aʋo ʋanokubginya;
ʋatumŋa, kunyaŋge ʋanoʋapfuʋura nesimba noʋukuru, haʋaʋuyi pamberi paShe nemhoȿa yokuʋapomera nayo.
Asi aʋa ɀaʋanotuka ɀaʋasiŋgaziʋi, ʋakaita semhuka dzisinomuraŋgariro, dzakaɓerekwa kuti dziɓatwe, dziparadzwe, naiʋo ʋacaparadzwa pakuʋora kwaʋo,
ʋaciitirwa ɀisakarurama, uri muɓairo wokusarurama
ʋanameso azere noʋupombge, asiŋgaregi kutadza; ʋanonyeŋgera ʋanhu ʋasinesimba; ʋanomŋoyo wakadzidziswa kuciʋa; iʋo ʋana ʋokutukwa;
ʋakasiya nzira yakarurama, ʋakatsauka, ʋakateʋera nzira yaBarami,
asi wakarairwa pamsoro pokuɗarika kwake,
Iʋaʋa matsime asinemvura, mhute rinodziŋgwa nemhepo; iʋo ʋakaceŋgetererwa kuȿiɓa kwerima.
Nokuti nokutaura kwaʋo mashoko mazhinji okuɀikudza asinamaturo, ʋanonyeŋgera pakuciʋa kwenyama noʋutere, aʋo ʋacaŋgotiza ʋacibva kunaʋanogara pakutsauka;
ʋaciʋapikira kusunuŋgurwa, nyamba iʋo ʋamene ʋaranda ʋokuʋora; nokuti waakundwa naye, munhu unoitwa muranda wake.
Nokuti iʋo, kana nenzira yokuziʋa Ishe, Muponesi Jesu Kristu, ʋambotiza haʋo ɀinoȿiɓisa ɀenyika, kana ʋakaɓatwa nokukundwa ɀe naɀo, kuguma kwaʋo kwaipa kupfuʋura kutaŋga kwaʋo.
Nokuti ɀaiʋa nani kwaʋari kana ʋasaiziʋa nzira yokururama, pakuti ʋadzoke pamurairo mutȿene waʋakapiwa, waʋakaŋga ʋambouziʋa haʋo.
Ɀinorebga neshumo yaɀokwaɗi ndiɀo ɀakaitwa kwaʋari, ɀinoti: Imbga yakadzokera kumarutsi ayo, neŋguruʋe yakaŋga yashambidzwa, kukuʋumburuka mumatope.
Ʋaɗikanwa, iyi ndiyo ŋwadi yecipiri yandinokunyorerai ɀino; panaidzedzi dzose mbiri ndinomutsa ndaŋgariro dzenyu ndicikuyeʋudzirai;
kuti mugoraŋgarira mashoko akataurwa kare naʋaprofita ʋatȿene, nomurairo waShe, Muponesi,
pakutaŋga muziʋe henyu cinhu ici, kuti pamazuʋa okupedzisira ʋaseki ʋacaʋuya ʋaciseka, ʋacifamba nokuciʋa kwaʋo,
ʋaciti: Cipikirwa cokuʋuya kwake ciripiko
Nokuti ʋanokaŋganwa nobgoni cinhu ici, kuti kare ɗeŋga raiʋa’po, nenyika yakaɓuɗiswa mumvura, yakaitwa nemvura neshoko raMŋari;
naɀo nyika, yaiʋa’po ŋguʋa iyo, yakafukidzwa nemvura ikaparadzwa;
asi ɗeŋga, riri’po ɀino, nenyika, ɀakaʋigirwa mŋoto neshoko ireri, ɀinoceŋgetererwa zuʋa rokutoŋga, nerokuparadzwa kwaʋanhu ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari.
Asi ʋaɗikanwa, musakaŋganwa cinhu cimŋe ici, kuti kunaShe zuʋa rimŋe rakaita samakore anecuru, namakore anecuru sezuʋa rimŋe.
Ishe haanonoki kuita seɀaakapikira, seɀinoreʋa ʋamŋe
Asi zuʋa raShe ricaʋuya sembava; naro ɗeŋga ricapfuʋura nokutinhira kukuru, neɀeɗeŋga ɀicaparadzwa ɀicipiswa, nenyika namaɓasa ari mairi acapiswa.
Iɀi ɀose ɀaɀicaparadzwa saiɀoɀo, imi munofanira kuʋa ʋanhu ʋakaɗiniko pamufambire wenyu mutȿene nokunamata Mŋari,
munotarira nokushuʋa ʋo kwaɀo kuʋuya kwezuʋa raMŋari; naro ɗeŋga ricaparadzwa nokutȿa, neɀeɗeŋga ɀicanyauka ɀicipiswa.
Asi seɀaakapikira, tinotarira ɗeŋga idɀa nenyika itȿa, munogara kururama maɀiri.
Saka ʋaɗikanwa, ɀamunotarira ɀinhu iɀi, shiŋgairai kuti muwanikwe naye munorugare, musinoruʋara, musinemhoȿa;
muciti, mŋoyo murefu waShe weɗu ruponeso; saPauro, hama yeɗu inoɗikanwa, akakunyorerai ʋo nokucenjera kwaakapiwa;
seɀaanotaura muŋwadi dzake dzose pamsoro peɀinhu iɀi; madziri muneɀimŋe ɀikukutu kunzwisiswa; ɀinominamiswa, samamŋe magwaro ʋo, naʋasiŋgaziʋi naʋasinesimba, kuȿikira ʋaparadzwa.
Naiɀoɀo imi ʋaɗikanwa, ɀamunoziʋa
Asi kurai panyasha napakuziʋa Ishe weɗu, Muponesi Jesu Kristu. Ŋgaaʋe nokubginya ɀino, nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Iɀo ɀakaŋga ɀiri’po kubva pakutaŋga, ɀatakanzwa, ɀatakaʋona nameso eɗu, ɀatakatarira, neɀatakaɓata namaʋoko eɗu, ɀeShoko roʋupenyu —
(ʋupenyu bgakaratidzwa, tikabguʋona, tinopupura nokukuparidzirai ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, bgakaŋga bguri kunaƂaɓa, bgukaratidzwa kwatiri):
Iɀo ɀatakaʋona, neɀatakanzwa, ndiɀo ɀatinokuparidzirai ʋo, kuti nemi ʋo muyanane nesu; kuyanana kweɗu
Ɀinhu iɀi tinokunyorerai, kuti mufaro weɗu uzadziswe.
Heyi mharidzo yatakanzwa kwaari, yatinokuparidzirai ʋo, kuti Mŋari ciedza, hamunerima maari.
Kana ticiti, tinoyanana naye, ticifamba murima, tinoreʋa nhema, hatiiti ɀokwaɗi;
asi kana ticifamba muciedza, saiye ari paciedza, tinoyanana isu; neropa raJesu Kristu, Mŋanakomana wake, rinotinatsa paɀiʋi ɀose.
Kana ticiti, hatineɀiʋi, tinoɀinyeŋgera, ɀokwaɗi haizi matiri.
Kana ticiɀireʋurura ɀiʋi ɀeɗu, iye wakatendeka wakarurama,
Kana ticiti, hatina‐kutadza, tinomuita mureʋi wenhema, neshoko rake harizi matiri.
Ʋana ʋangu ʋaɗuku, ndinokunyorerai ɀinhu iɀi, kuti, murege kutadza. Kana munhu acitadza, tinoMureʋereri kunaƂaɓa,
ndiye mudzikinuri weɀiʋi ɀeɗu; haazi weɀiʋi ɀeɗu ɓedzi, asi we
Ndiɀo ɀinotiziʋisa kuti tinomuziʋa, kana ticiceŋgeta mirairo yake.
Uyo, unoti, ndinomuziʋa, asiŋgaceŋgeti mirairo yake, mureʋi wenhema, ɀokwaɗi haizi maari;
asi uyo, unoceŋgeta shoko rake, ruɗo rwaMŋari rwakwaniswa maari ɀirokwaɀo. Ndiɀo ɀinotiziʋisa kuti tiri maari;
uyo, unoti, ndinogara maari, unofanira kufamba ʋo seɀaakafamba iye.
Ʋaɗikanwa, handikunyoreriyi murairo mutȿa, asi murairo wekare, wamakaŋga munawo kubva pakutaŋga; murairo wekare ndiro shoko ramakanzwa.
Pamŋe ɀe ndinokunyorerai murairo mutȿa, ciri cinhu caɀokwaɗi kwaari nokwamuri; nokuti rima ropfuʋura, ciedza caɀokwaɗi cotovenekera.
Uyo, unoti, ndiri muciedza, aciʋeŋga hama yake, uciri murima kuȿikira ɀino.
Unoɗa hama yake, unogara muciedza, hapanecigumbuso maari.
Asi unoʋeŋga hama yake, uri murima, unofamba murima haaziʋi kwaanoenda, nokuti rima rakapofumadza meso ake.
Ndinokunyorerai, ʋana ʋaɗuku, nokuti makakaŋganwirwa ɀiʋi nokuɗa kwezita rake.
Ndinokunyorerai, madziɓaɓa, nokuti munoziʋa iye wakaŋga ari’po kubva pakutaŋga. Ndinokunyorerai, majaya, nokuti makakunda wakaipa. Ndakunyorerai, ʋana ʋaɗuku, nokuti munoziʋa Ƃaɓa.
Ndakunyorerai, madziɓaɓa, nokuti munoziʋa iye wakaŋga ari’po kubva pakutaŋga. Ndakunyorerai, majaya, nokuti munesimba, neshoko raMŋari rinogara mamuri, makakunda wakaipa.
Musaɗa nyika kunyaŋge neɀinhu ɀiri munyika. Kana munhu aciɗa nyika, ruɗo rwaƂaɓa haruzi maari.
Nokuti ɀose ɀiri munyika, ɀinoti, kuciʋa kwenyama, nokuciʋa kwameso, nokuɀikudza kwoʋupenyu, haɀibvi kunaƂaɓa, asi panyika.
Nyika inopfuʋura nokuciʋa kwayo; asi unoita kuɗa kwaMŋari, unogara nokusiŋgaperi.
Ʋanana, iŋguʋa yokupedzisira; seɀamakanzwa kuti antikristu unoʋuya, naɀino ʋanaantikristu ʋazhinji ʋaʋa’po; ndiɀo ɀinotiziʋisa kuti yaʋa ŋguʋa yokupedzisira.
Ʋakabva kwatiri, asi ʋakaŋga ʋasati ʋari ʋeɗu, nokuti ɗai ʋaiʋa ʋeɗu, ʋaŋgaɗai ʋaigara nesu; asi
Imi munokuzodzwa kunobva kunaiye Mutȿene, munoziʋa mose.
Handina‐kukunyorerai ndiciti hamuziʋi ɀokwaɗi, asi nokuti munoiziʋa, ʋuye nokuti hakunenhema dziŋgabva paɀokwaɗi.
Ndianiko mureʋi wenhema, kana asati ari iye unoramba kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu? Ndiye antikristu, unoramba Ƃaɓa noMŋanakomana.
Aninani unoramba Mŋanakomana, naiye haanaƂaɓa ʋo.
Kana muri’mi, iɀo ɀamakanzwa kubva pakutaŋga, ŋgaɀigare mamuri. Kana iɀo ɀamakanzwa kubva pakutaŋga ɀicigara mamuri, nemi ʋo mucagara muMŋanakomana, nomunaƂaɓa.
Ndicoci cipikirwa caakatipikira, ndibgo ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Ɀinhu iɀi ndakakunyorerai pamsoro paʋanokutsausai.

Kana muri’mi, kuzodzwa kwamakagamucira kwaari kunogara mamuri, hamufaniri kuti mudzidziswe nomunhu; asi kuzodza kwake, seɀakunokudzidzisai pamsoro peɀinhu ɀose, kuri kwaɀokwaɗi, dzisati dziri nhema, seɀakwakakudzidzisai, garai maari.
Ɀino, ʋana ʋaɗuku, garai maari, kuti, kana acizoʋoneswa, tiʋe nokusatya, tirege kunyadziswa ʋo pamberi pake pakuʋuya kwake.
Kana muciziʋa kuti iye wakarurama, ziʋai ʋo kuti mumŋe nomumŋe unoita ɀakarurama wakaɓerekwa naye.
Tarirai kukura kworuɗo rwatakaitirwa naƂaɓa, kuti tinzi ʋana ʋaMŋari; ndiɀo ɀatiri ʋo; saka nyika haitiziʋi, nokuti haina‐kumuziʋa iye.
Ʋaɗikanwa, ɀino tiri ʋana ʋaMŋari, ʋuye ɀicigere kuratidzwa kuti ticazoʋei. Tinoziʋa kuti kana acizoʋoneswa, isu ticafanana naye; nokuti ticamuʋona seɀaakaita.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unetariro iyi kwaari, unoɀicenesa seɀaakacena iye.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoita ɀiʋi, unoɗarika nomurairo ʋo; ɀiʋi ndiko kuɗarika murairo.
Munoziʋa kuti iye wakaʋoneswa kuti abvise ɀiʋi; maari hamuneɀiʋi.
Mumŋe nomumŋe unogara maari, haaiti ɀiʋi; mumŋe nomumŋe unoita ɀiʋi, haanakumuʋona kana kumuziʋa.
Ʋana ʋaɗuku, musatsauswa nomunhu; uyo, unoita ɀakarurama, wakarurama, saiye akarurama.
Uyo, unoita ɀiʋi, ndowaDiaborosi, nokuti Diaborosi unoita ɀiʋi kubva pakutaŋga. Mŋanakomana waMŋari wakaʋoneswa nemhaka iyi kuti aparadze maɓasa aDiaborosi.
Mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɓerekwa naMŋari haaiti ɀiʋi, nokuti mbeu yake inogara maari, haagoni kuita ɀiʋi, nokuti wakaɓerekwa naMŋari.
Ʋana ʋaMŋari ʋanoʋoneswa naiɀoɀi, naʋana ʋaDiaborosi; mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgaiti ɀakarurama, haazi waMŋari, naiye ʋo usiŋgaɗi hama yake.
Nokuti ndiro shoko ramakanzwa kubva pakutaŋga, kuti tiɗane;
tisiŋgaiti saKaini, wakaŋga ari wowakaipa, akaʋuraya munuŋuna wake. Wakamuʋurayireiko? Nokuti maɓasa ake akaŋga akaipa, asi omunuŋuna wake akaŋga akarurama.
Musashamiswa, hama
Tinoziʋa kuti takabva murufu,
Mumŋe nomumŋe unoʋeŋga hama yake, muʋurayi; munoziʋa kuti hakunomuʋurayi unoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi bgugere maari.
Ndoɀatinoziʋa ruɗo naɀo, kuti wakatipa ʋupenyu bgake; nesu ʋo tinofanira kupa hama ʋupenyu bgeɗu.
Asi kana munhu anefuma yenyika, akaʋona hama yake icishaiwa, akamupfigira tsitsi dzake, ruɗo rwaMŋari runogara seiko maari?
Ʋana ʋaɗuku, ŋgatirege kuɗa neshoko kana norurimi, asi neɓasa neɀokwaɗi.
Ndoɀaticaziʋa naɀo kuti tiri ʋeɀokwaɗi, tigosimbisa mŋoyo yeɗu pamberi pake;
nokuti kana mŋoyo yeɗu icitipa mhaka, Mŋari mukuru kumŋoyo yeɗu, unoziʋa ɀose.
Ʋaɗikanwa, kana mŋoyo usiŋgatipi mhaka, tinako kusatya pamberi paMŋari;
ʋuye ɀose ɀatinokumbira tinopiwa naye, nokuti tinoceŋgeta mirairo yake, ticiita ɀinomufadza.
Ndiwo murairo wake, kuti titende kuzita roMŋanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu, ʋuye tiɗane, seɀaakatiraira.
Unoceŋgeta mirairo yake, unogara maari, naiye maari. Ndiɀo ɀatinoziʋa naɀo kuti unogara matiri, noMŋeya waakatipa.
Ʋaɗikanwa, musatenda mŋeya yose, asi muidze mŋeya,
Ndiɀo ɀamunoziʋa naɀo Mŋeya waMŋari: Mŋeya mumŋe nomumŋe unopupura kuti Jesu Kristu wakaʋuya munyama, ndowaMŋari.
Mŋeya mumŋe nomumŋe usiŋgapupuri Jesu, hauzi waMŋari; iwo ndowaantikristu, wamakanzwa kuti unoʋuya; naɀino watoʋa panyika.
Ʋana ʋaɗuku, imi, muri ʋaMŋari, makaʋakunda, nokuti uyo, uri mamuri, mukuru kunaiye, uri munyika.
Iʋo ndoʋenyika, naiɀoɀo ʋanotaura saʋenyika, nenyika inoʋanzwa.
Isu tiri ʋaMŋari; unoziʋa Mŋari, unotinzwa; usi waMŋari, haatinzwi. Ndiɀo ɀatinoziʋa naɀo Mŋeya waɀokwaɗi, nomŋeya wokutsauka.
Ʋaɗikanwa, ŋgatiɗane; nokuti ruɗo runobva kunaMŋari; mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɗa, wakaɓerekwa naMŋari, unoziʋa Mŋari.
Usiŋgaɗi, haaziʋi Mŋari, nokuti Mŋari ruɗo.
Ruɗo rwaMŋari rwakaratidzwa kwatiri necinhu ici, kuti Mŋari wakatuma Mŋanakomana wake, wakaɓerekwa ari mumŋe cete, munyika, kuti tiʋe noʋupenyu naye.
Ruɗo ruri pacinhu ici, kuti hatizisu takaɗa Mŋari, asi kuti ndiye wakatiɗa, akatuma Mŋanakomana wake kuti aʋe rudzikinuro rweɀiʋi ɀeɗu.
Ʋaɗikanwa, kana Mŋari akatiɗa saiɀoɀo, nesu ʋo tinofanira kuɗana.
Hakunomunhu wakamboʋona Mŋari; kana ticiɗana, Mŋari unogara matiri, noruɗo rwake runokwaniswa matiri.
Ndiɀo ɀatinoziʋa naɀo kuti tinogara maari, naiye matiri, nokuti wakatipa ɀoMŋeya wake,
Isu takaʋona, ʋuye tinopupura kuti Ƃaɓa ʋakatuma Mŋanakomana, kuti aʋe Muponesi wenyika.
Aninani unopupura kuti Jesu ndiye Mŋanakomana waMŋari, Mŋari unogara maari, naiye munaMŋari.
Nesu takaziʋa, tikatenda ruɗo urwu, Mŋari rwaanarwo kwatiri. Mŋari ruɗo; unogara muruɗo, unogara munaMŋari, naMŋari maari.
Ruɗo rwakakwaniswa matiri pacinhu ici, kuti tirege kutya nezuʋa rokutoŋgwa; nokuti seɀaakaita iye, ndiɀo ɀatakaita ʋo panyika ino.
Hakunokutya muruɗo; asi ruɗo, rwakakwana, runodziŋga kutya, nokuti kutya kunorobga; munhu, unotya, haana‐kukwaniswa paruɗo.
Isu tinoɗa, nokuti iye wakataŋga kutiɗa.
Kana munhu aciti, ndinoɗa Mŋari, aciʋeŋga hama yake, mureʋi wenhema; nokuti usiŋgaɗi hama yake yaakaʋona, uŋgaɗa seiko Mŋari, waasina‐kumuʋona?
Iwoyu murairo wakabva kwaari, tinawo, wokuti unoɗa Mŋari, ŋgaaɗe ʋo hama yake.
Mumŋe nomumŋe, unotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu, iye wakaɓerekwa naMŋari; mumŋe nomumŋe, unoɗa iye wakaɓereka, unoɗa ʋo wakaɓerekwa naye.
Ndiɀo ɀatinoziʋa naɀo kuti tinoɗa ʋana ʋaMŋari, kana ticiɗa Mŋari, ticiita mirairo yake.
Nokuti ruɗo rwaMŋari ndirwo, kuti ticeŋgete mirairo yake; mirairo yake hairemi.
Nokuti cinhu cipi necipi, cinoɓerekwa naMŋari cinokunda nyika; kukunda kwakakunda nyika, ndiko kutenda kweɗu.
Ndianiko unokunda nyika? Haazi iye unotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Mŋanakomana waMŋari here?
Ndiye wakaʋuya nemvura neropa, iye Jesu Kristu; haana‐kuʋuya nemvura ɓedzi, asi nemvura neropa.
Ndiye Mŋeya unopupura, nokuti Mŋeya ndiye ɀokwaɗi.
Nokuti kuneɀitatu ɀinopupura,
Kana ticigamucira kupupura kwaʋanhu, kupupura kwaMŋari kukuru; nokuti kupupura kwaMŋari ndiko, kuti wakapupura pamsoro poMŋanakomana wake.
Uyo, unotenda kuMŋanakomana waMŋari, kupupura unako mukati make; usiŋgatendi Mŋari, wakamuita mureʋi wenhema; nokuti haana‐kutenda kupupura kwakapupurirwa naMŋari pamsoro poMŋanakomana wake.
Kupupura ndiko, kuti Mŋari wakatipa ʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi; ɀino ʋupenyu ubgu bguri muMŋanakomana wake.
UnoMŋanakomana, unoʋupenyu; usinoMŋanakomana waMŋari, haanoʋupenyu.
Ndakakunyorerai ɀinhu iɀi kuti mugoziʋa kuti munoʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi, iyemi munotenda kuzita roMŋanakomana waMŋari.
Ndiko kusatya, kwatinako kwaari, kuti kana ticikumbira cinhu nokuɗa kwake, unotinzwa;
ɀino kana ticiziʋa kuti unotinzwa paɀose ɀatinokumbira, tinoziʋa kuti tapiwa mikumbiro yatakakumbira kwaari.
Kana munhu aciʋona hama yake iciita cinhu cisati ciri corufu, ucakumbira,
kusarurama kwose ciʋi; ɀino ciʋi ciri’po cisati ciri corufu.
Tinoziʋa kuti mumŋe nomumŋe wakaɓerekwa naMŋari haaiti ɀiʋi; asi wakaɓerekwa naMŋari unoceŋgetwa naye, wakaipa haaŋgamuɓati.
Tinoziʋa kuti tiri ʋaMŋari, nenyika yose igere munaiye wakaipa.
Tinoziʋa kuti Mŋanakomana waMŋari wakaʋuya, akatipa kuziʋa, kuti tiziʋe iye waɀokwaɗi; nesu tiri munaiye waɀokwaɗi, muMŋanakomana wake, Jesu Kristu. Ndiye Mŋari waɀokwaɗi, noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Ʋana ʋaɗuku, ɀicenjerei paɀifananidzo.
Mukuru kunamai ʋakasanaŋgurwa naʋana ʋaʋo ʋandinoɗa neɀokwaɗi; ndisati ndiri ini ndoga, asi naʋose ʋo ʋanoziʋa ɀokwaɗi;
nokuɗa kweɀokwaɗi, inogara matiri, icagara ʋo nesu nokusiŋgaperi.
Nyasha, neŋgoni, norugare ɀicaʋa nesu, ɀinobva kunaMŋari Ƃaɓa, nokunaJesu Kristu, Mŋanakomana waƂaɓa, muɀokwaɗi noruɗo.
Ndinofara ɀikuru, nokuti ndakawana
Ɀino ndinokumbira kwamuri, mai, ndisiŋgaiti sendinokunyorerai murairo mutȿa, asi uyo watakaŋga tinawo kubva pakutaŋga, wokuti tiɗane.
Ndirwo ruɗo, kuti tifambe nemirairo yake. Ndiwoyu murairo, seɀamakanzwa kubva pakutaŋga, kuti mufambe mauri.
Nokuti ʋanyeŋgeri ʋazhinji ʋakaɓuɗira munyika, ʋasiŋgapupuri kuti Jesu Kristu wakaʋuya panyama. Ndiye munyeŋgeri naantikristu.
Ɀicenjerei imi, kuti murege kurashikirwa neɀatakaɓatira, asi kuti mupiwe muɓairo wakakwana.
Mumŋe nomumŋe, unotuŋgamirira
Kana mumŋe aciʋuya kwamuri, asiŋgaʋuyi nokudzidzisa uku, musamugamucira mumba, kana kuti kwaari, Kwaziwa!
Nokuti unoti kwaari, Kwaziwa! unofambidzana naye pamaɓasa ake akaipa.
Kunyaŋge ndineɀizhinji ɀandaiɗa kukunyorerai, handiɗi
Ʋana ʋomunuŋuna wenyu ʋakasanaŋgurwa ʋanokukwazisai.
Mukuru kunaGayo, muɗikanwa, wandinoɗa neɀokwaɗi.
Muɗikanwa, ndinokunyeŋgetera kuti ufare paɀinhu ɀose, ʋuye uʋe mukukutu, sokufara kwomŋeya wako.
Nokuti ndakafara ɀikuru hama dziciȿika dzicipupurira ɀokwaɗi yako,
Handinomufaro unopfuʋura uyu, wokuti ndinzwe kuti ʋana ʋaŋgu ʋanofamba muɀokwaɗi.
Muɗikanwa, unoɓate‐ɓasa rakatendeka paɀinhu ɀose ɀaunoitira hama naʋaeni ʋo;
ʋakapupurira ruɗo rwako pamberi pekereke; ucaita ɀakanaka kana uciʋaperekedza nomutoʋo wakafanira Mŋari.
Nokuti ʋakaɓuɗa nokuɗa kweZita
Naiɀoɀo isu tinofanira kugamucira ɀakanaka ʋakaɗaro, kuti tiɓatsirane paɀokwaɗi.
Ndakanyorera kereke; asi Diotrefe, unoɗa kuʋa mukuru pakati paʋo, unotiramba isu.
Naiɀoɀo, kana ndiciʋuya, ndicayeʋudza maɓasa ake aanoita, kuti unotiitira makuhwa namashoko akaipa; ʋuye, haatendi naiɀoɀo
Muɗikanwa, usateʋera cakaipa, asi cakanaka. Uyo, unoita ɀakanaka, ndowaMŋari; unoita ɀakaipa, haana‐kuʋona Mŋari.
Demetrio unopupurirwa naʋanhu ʋose, ʋuye neɀokwaɗi imene; nesu tinopupura ʋo, iwe unoziʋa kuti kupupura kweɗu ndokwaɀokwaɗi.
Ndakaŋga ndineɀizhinji ɀandaiɗa kukunyorera, asi handiɗi kukunyorera. neiŋgi nepeni;
asi ndinotarira kuti ndicakurumidza kukuʋona, tigotaurirana nomuromo.
Rugare ŋgaruʋe newe. Hama dzinokukwazisa.
Judasi, muranda waJesu Kristu, munuŋuna waJakobo, kunaʋakaɗanwa, ʋakaɗikanwa munaMŋari Ƃaɓa, ʋakaceŋgetererwa Jesu Kristu:
Ŋgoni, norugare, noruɗo ŋgaɀiwanzwe kwamuri.
Ʋaɗikanwa, ndakati ndicishiŋgaira ɀikuru kukunyorerai pamsoro pokuponeswa kweɗu tose, ndakaʋona kuti ndinofanira kukunyorerai, ndicikurairai kuti murwire kwaɀo kutenda kwakaɗeya kupiwa ʋatȿene kamŋe.
Nokuti kunaʋamŋe ʋarume ʋakapinda pakaʋanda, ʋakagara ʋaisirwa kare kutoŋgwa uku, ʋanhu ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari, ʋanoshandura nyasha dzaMŋari weɗu ʋacidziita ʋutere, ʋaciramba Tenzi
Ɀino ndinoɗa kukuyeʋudzai, kunyaŋge maiɀiziʋa henyu kamŋe kare ɀose, kuti Ishe, wakati amborwira ʋanhu munyika yeEgipita, akazoparadza aʋo ʋakaŋga ʋasiŋgatendi.
Naʋatumŋa, ʋasinakuceŋgeta ʋukuru bgaʋo, asi ʋakasiya paʋaifanira kugara, wakaʋaceŋgeta muɀisuŋgo ɀisiŋgaperi pasi perima guru kuȿikira pakutoŋgwa kwezuʋa guru;
seSodoma neGomora, namaguta akapoteredza, akaɀipa kwaɀo saiʋo kuʋupombge nokuteʋera imŋe nyama, akaitwa ciratidzo, akarobga nomŋoto usiŋgaperi.
Kunyaŋge ɀakaɗaro,
Asi Mikaeri, mutumŋa mukuru, ŋguʋa yaakarwa naDiaborosi, akaita nharo naye pamsoro ʋomuʋiri waMosesi, wakatya kumupa mhoȿa namashoko okutuka, asi wakati: Ishe ŋgaakuraire.
Asi
Ʋanenhamo, nokuti ʋakafamba nenzira yaKaini, ʋakapeŋgera kukutsauka kwaBarami nokuɗa kwomuɓairo, ʋakaparadzwa nokukakaʋara kwaKora.
aʋa mabge akaʋanzika pamitambo yenyu yoruɗo, kana ʋodya nemi ʋasiŋgatyi,
mafuŋgu eguŋgwa anopeŋga, anopupuma nyadzi dzawo; nyeredzi dzinofamba‐famba, ʋakaceŋgetererwa kuȿiɓa kwerima nokusiŋgaperi.
Enoki, wecinomŋe kubva kunaAdama, wakaprofitera iʋaʋa, aciti: Tarira, Ishe wakaʋuya naʋatȿene ʋake ʋaneɀuru ɀamazana,
kuti atoŋge ʋose, nokuroʋa ʋose ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari pamsoro pamaɓasa aʋo ose okusaɗa Mŋari, aʋakaita nokusaɗa kwaʋo Mŋari, napamsoro pamashoko ose makukutu akataurwa naʋatadzi ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari.
Iʋo ʋaŋuŋuni naʋasiŋgatendi
Asi imi ʋaɗikanwa, raŋgarirai mashoko akaɗeya kutaurwa naʋaapostora ʋaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu;
kuti ʋakakuʋudzai kuti neŋguʋa yokupedzisira ʋaseki ʋacaʋa’ko, ʋanofamba nokuciʋa kwaʋo ʋasiŋgaɗi Mŋari.
Ndiʋo ʋanoparadzansia, ndoʋenyama, ʋasinoMŋeya.
Asi imi ʋaɗikanwa, muɀiʋake pakutenda kwenyu kutȿene‐tȿene, munyeŋgetere muMŋeya Mutȿene,
muɀiceŋgete muruɗo rwaMŋari, mucitarira ŋgoni dzaShe weɗu, Jesu Kristu, muʋe noʋupenyu bgusiŋgaperi.
Iʋai neŋgoni naʋamŋe ʋanenyunyuto,
muʋaponese muciʋabvuta pamŋoto; ʋamŋe muʋe neŋgoni naʋo nokutya, muciʋeŋga kunyaŋge neŋguʋo yakaȿiɓiswa nenyama.
Ɀino kunaiye unogona kukuceŋgetai, kuti murege kugumburwa, nokukuisai pamberi pokubginya kwake musinacamuŋgapomerwa, mucifara kwaɀo,
kunaMŋari iye mumŋe, Muponesi weɗu, naJesu Kristu, Ishe weɗu, ŋgakuʋe kubginya, noʋumambo, nesimba, noʋushe, ŋguʋa isati yaʋa’po, naɀino, nokusiŋgaperi. Ameni.
Ɀakazarurwa ɀaJesu Kristu, ɀaakapiwa naMŋari, kuti aratidze ʋaranda ʋake ɀinhu iɀo ɀinofanira kukurumidza kuitwa; akaɀituma nomutumŋa wake, ndokuziʋisa muranda wake Johane;
wakapupurira shoko raMŋari, neɀokupupura kwaJesu Kristu,
Wakaropafadzwa uyo unoraʋa, naʋanonzwa mashoko okuprofita, ʋaciceŋgeta ɀakanyorwa imomo, nokuti ŋguʋa yaʋa pedyo.
Johane kukereke nomŋe dziri paAsia: Nyasha ngadziʋe nemi, norugare, ɀinobva kunaiye uri’po, wakaŋga ari’po, noucazoʋa’po; nokunemŋeya minomŋe iri pamberi pecigaro cake coʋushe;
nokunaJesu Kristu, capupu cakatendeka, ɗaŋgwe kuʋakafa, muɓati wamadzishe enyika. Kunaiye unotiɗa, akatisunuŋgura paɀiʋi ɀeɗu neropa rake,
akatiita ʋushe, naʋaprista kunaMŋari naƂaɓa ʋake, kwaari ŋgakuʋe kubginya nesimba nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni.
Tarirai, unoʋuya namakore, meso ose acamuʋona, naiʋo ʋakamuɓaya; marudzi ose enyika acamucema. Hoŋo, Ameni.
Ndini Arfa neOmega, ndiɀo ɀinoreʋa Ishe Mŋari, uri’po, wakaŋga ari’po, noucazoʋa’po, wamasimba ose.
Ini Johane, hama yenyu, mugoʋerani pamŋe cete nemi pakutambudzika, noʋushe, nokutsuŋgirira munaJesu, ndakaŋga ndiri paciwi cinonzi Patmosi, nokuɗa kweshoko raMŋari, nokwokupupura kwaJesu.
Ndakaŋga ndiri muMŋeya nezuʋa raShe, ndikanzwa shure kwaŋgu inzwi guru, rineŋge serehwamanda,
riciti: Iɀo ɀaunoʋona, ɀinyore mubuku, uɀitumire kereke nomŋe, paEfeso, napaSmirna, napaPergamo, napaTiatira, napaSardisi, napaFiraderfia, napaRaodikia.
Ndikatendeʋuka kuti ndiʋone inzwi rakataura neni. Ndakati ndatendeʋuka, ndikaʋona ɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀinomŋe ɀendarama;
napakati peɀigadziko ɀemŋenje, mumŋe wakafanana noMŋanakomana womunhu, akafuka ŋguʋo yakaȿikira kutsoka, akaɀisuŋga napacifuʋa nebanhire rendarama.
Musoro wake nevudzi rake ɀakaŋga ɀiri ɀicena samakushe macena, secando; meso ake akaita somuraɀo womŋoto;
tsoka dzake dzakaŋga dzakafanana nesafuri inopenya, ineŋge yakanatswa muʋira; inzwi rake rakaŋga rakaita senzwi remvura zhinji.
Muruʋoko rwake rworudyi wakaŋga akaɓata nyeredzi nomŋe; mumuromo make makaɓuɗa munondo unopinza, unoceka kwose; ciso cake caiʋa sezuʋa rinopenya nesimba raro.
Ndakati ndicimuʋona, ndikawira pasi patsoka dzake sendineŋge ndafa; akaisa ruʋoko rwake rworudyi pamsoro paŋgu, akati: Usatya, ndini wokutaŋga nowokupedzisira,
naiye Mupenyu; ndakaŋga ndafa, tarira, ndiri mupenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri; ndinekiyi dzorufu neHadesi.
Naiɀoɀo nyora ɀawaʋona, neɀiri’po, neɀicazoʋa’po shure kwaiɀoɀi;
ɀakaʋanzika ɀenyeredzi nomŋe dzawaʋona muruʋoko rworudyi rwaŋgu, neɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀinomŋe ɀendarama. Nyeredzi nomŋe ndiʋo ʋatumŋa ʋekereke nomŋe; neɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀinomŋe ndidzo kereke nomŋe.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paEfeso,
Ɀanzi naiye wakaɓata nyeredzi nomŋe muruʋoko rwake rworudyi, unofamba pakati peɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀinomŋe ɀendarama:
Ndinoziʋa maɓasa ako, nokutambudzika kwako, nokutsuŋgirira kwako, ʋuye kuti hauɗi kuʋonana naʋanhu ʋakaipa; wakaʋaidza iʋo ʋanoti, tiri ʋaapostora, ʋasi iʋo caiʋo, ukaʋawana ʋari ʋenhema;
ukatsuŋgirira nokuʋa nomŋoyo murefu nokuɗa kwezita raŋgu, ukasaneta.
Asi handifari necinhu ici kwauri, kuti wakasiya ruɗo rwako rwokutaŋga.
Naiɀoɀo raŋgarira pawakawa, utendeʋuke, ugoita maɓasa ako okutaŋga; kana usiŋgaiti saiɀoɀo, ndicaʋuya kwauri, ndikabvisa cigadziko cako comŋenje panɀimbo yaco, kana usiŋgatendeʋuki.
Asi cinhu ici unaco, kuti unoʋeŋga maɓasa aʋaNikoraiti, andinoʋeŋga neni ʋo.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke; unokunda, ndicamutendera kuti adye muti woʋupenyu, uri muParadiso yaMŋari.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paSmirna,
Ɀanzi naiye wokutaŋga nowokupedzisira, wakaŋga afa, akararama
Ndinoziʋa kutambudzika kwako noʋurombo bgako, (asi uri mufumi), nokutuka kwaiʋo ʋanoti, tiri ʋaJuda, ʋasi iʋo caiʋo, asi isinagoge raSatani,
usatya iɀo ɀaucatambudzika naɀo. Tarira, Diaborosi woɗo‐kuisa ʋamŋe ʋenyu mutoroŋgo, kuti muidzwe; mucatambudzika mazuʋa anegumi. Uʋe wakatendeka kuȿikira parufu, ndigokupa korona yoʋupenyu.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke; unokunda, haaŋgakuʋadzwi norufu rwecipiri.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paPergamo,
Ɀanzi naiye unomunondo, unopinza, unoceka kwose:
Ndinoziʋa paunogara, ndi’po panecigaro coʋushe caSatani; wakaɓatisisa zita raŋgu, ukasaramba kutenda kwaŋgu, kunyaŋge napamazuʋa aAntipasi, capupu caŋgu,

Asi handifari neɀimŋe ɀinhu ɀishoma kwauri, nokuti unaʋamŋe’po ʋanoɓatisisa dzidziso yaBarami, wakadzidzisa Baraki kuisa cigumbuso pamberi paʋana ʋaIsraeri, cokuti ʋadye ɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo, nokuita ʋupombge.
Nokuɗaro unaʋamŋe ʋo ʋanoɓatisisa saiɀoɀo dzidziso yaʋaNikoraiti.
Naiɀoɀo tendeʋuka; kana usiŋgaiti saiɀoɀo, ndicakurumidza kuʋuya kwauri, ndigorwa naʋo nomunondo womuromo waŋgu.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke. Unokunda, ndicamupa mana yakaʋanzika, ʋuye ndicamupa ibge jena, napabge iro zita idɀa rakanyorwa’po, risiŋgazikanwi nomunhu, asi naiye unoripiwa.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paTiatira,
Ɀanzi noMŋanakomana waMŋari, unameso akafanana nomuraɀo womŋoto, netsoka dzake dzakaita sesafuri inopenya:
Ndinoziʋa maɓasa ako, noruɗo, nokutenda, nokushumira, nokutsuŋgirira kwako, ʋuye kuti maɓasa ako okupedzisira anopfuʋura okutaŋga.
Asi handifari necinhu ici kwauri, kuti unotendera uya mukadzi Jesaberi, unoɀiidza muprofitakadzi, ʋuye unodzidzisa nokutsausa ʋaranda ʋaŋgu, kuti ʋaite ʋupombge, nokudya ɀakaɓayirwa ɀifananidzo.
Ndakamupa ŋguʋa kuti atendeʋuke; akaramba kutendeʋuka pakufeʋa kwake.
Tarira, ndoɗa kumukandira panhoʋo, naʋanoita ʋupombge naye panhamo huru, kana ʋasiŋgatendeʋuki pamaɓasa ake.
Naʋana ʋake ndicaʋaʋuraya norufu; nekereke dzose dzicaziʋa kuti ndini ndinonɀera itȿo nemŋoyo; ndicapa mumŋe nomumŋe wenyu paakaɓata napo.
Asi kwamuri, imi makasara paTiatira, ʋose ʋasinedzidziso iyi, ʋasiŋgaziʋi iɀo ɀaʋanoti ɀakadzika ɀaSatani, ndinoti kwamuri: Handiŋgakutakudziyi mumŋe mutoro.
Asi ɓatisai iɀo ɀamunaɀo kuȿikira ndiciʋuya.
Unokunda aciceŋgeta maɓasa aŋgu kuȿikira pakupedzisira, ndicamupa simba pamsoro pamarudzi;
ucaafudza netȿimbo yeɗare, sehari dzomuʋumbi dzinoputsanyiwa; seɀandakapiwa ʋo naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu.
Ʋuye ndicamupa nyamasase.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paSardisi,
Ɀanzi naiye unemŋeya minomŋe yaMŋari, nenyeredzi nomŋe: Ndinoziʋa maɓasa ako, kuti unonzi uri mupenyu, asi wakafa.
Pepuka, usimbise iɀo ɀakasara, ɀakaŋga ɀoɗo‐kufa; nokuti handina‐kuwana maɓasa ako kuti akakwana pamberi paMŋari waŋgu.
Naiɀoɀo raŋgarira kuti wakagamucira nokunzwa sei; uɀiceŋgete, utendeʋuke. Naiɀoɀo kana usiŋgapepuki, ndicaʋuya sembava, hauŋgaziʋi nguʋa yandicakuwira nayo.
Asi unamazita mashoma paSardisi aʋanhu ʋasina‐kuȿiɓisa ŋguʋo dzaʋo; ʋacafamba neni ʋaneŋguʋo cena, nokuti ʋakafanirwa
Unokunda, ucapfekedzwa saiɀoɀo ŋguʋo cena; handiŋgatoŋgodzimi zita rake pabuku yoʋupenyu, ndicapupura zita rake pamberi paƂaɓa ʋaŋgu, napamberi paʋatumŋa ʋake.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paFiraderfia,
Ɀanzi naiye mutȿene, iye waɀokwaɗi, iye unekiyi yaDavidi, iye unoti kana acizarura, hakuna‐unopfiga, kana acipfiga, hakuna‐unozarura:
Ndinoziʋa maɓasa ako, (tarira, ndakaisa pamberi pako mukoʋa wakazaruka, hakuna‐uŋgagona kuupfiga), kuti unesimba shoma hako; wakaceŋgeta shoko raŋgu, ukasaramba zita raŋgu.
Tarira ndinokupa ʋamŋe ʋari ʋesinagoge raSatani, ʋanoti, tiri ʋaJuda, ʋasi iʋo caiʋo, asi ʋanoreʋa nhema; tarira, ndicaʋaʋuyisa kuti ʋanamate pamberi petsoka dzako, ʋuye ʋaziʋe kuti ndakakuɗa.
Ɀawakaceŋgeta shoko rokutsuŋgirira kwaŋgu, ndicakuceŋgeta ʋo paŋguʋa yokuidzwa yoɗo‐kuʋuya panyika yose, kuidza ʋanogara panyika.
Ndinokurumidza kuʋuya; ɓatisisa ico caunaco, kuti urege kutorerwa korona yako.

Unokunda ndicamuita mbiru mutembere yaMŋari waŋgu, haaŋgazoɓuɗi’mo ɀe; ndicanyora pamsoro pake zita raMŋari waŋgu, nezita reguta raMŋari waŋgu, Jerusarema idɀa rinoɓuruka kuɗeŋga kunaMŋari waŋgu, nezita raŋgu idɀa.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke.
Nyorera mutumŋa wekereke iri paRaodikia,
Ɀanzi naAmeni, capupu cakatendeka, caɀokwaɗi, kutaŋga kweɀisikwa ɀaMŋari:
Ndinoziʋa maɓasa ako, kuti hautonhori kana kupisa. Ƌai ucitonhora kana kupisa.
Ɀino ɀaunodziya, usiŋgatonhori kana kupisa, ndicakuȿiȿina mumuromo maŋgu.
Nokuti unoti, ndakafuma, ndakafumiswa, handishaiwi cinhu; usiŋgaziʋi, kuti ndiwe unoʋurombo nenhamo, uri murombo neɓofu usine‐cokufuka.
Ndinokupa zano kuti uteŋge kwandiri ndarama yakaidzwa mumŋoto, kuti uʋe nefuma, neŋguʋo cena, kuti uɀifukidze, nyadzi dzokusafuka kwako dzirege kuʋonekwa; necizoro cameso, kuti uzore meso ako, uʋone.
Ʋose ʋandinoɗa ndinoʋaraŋga nokuʋaroʋa; naiɀoɀo shiŋgaira utendeʋuke.
Tarira, ndimire pamukoʋa, ndicigogodza; kana munhu akanzwa inzwi raŋgu, akazarura mukoʋa, ndicapinda kwaari, ndicarayira naye, naiye neni.
Unokunda ndicamupa cinhu ici, kuti agare neni pacigaro caŋgu coʋushe, seni ʋo ndakakunda, ndikagara pamŋe cete naƂaɓa ʋaŋgu pacigaro caʋo coʋushe.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe ɀinoreʋa Mŋeya kukereke.
Shure kwaiɀoɀi, ndakatarira ndikaʋona mukoʋa wakazaruka kuɗeŋga; nenzwi rokutaŋga randakanzwa rakaita sehwamanda ricitaura neni, riciti: Kwira pano, ndigokuratidza ɀinofanira kuitwa shure kwaiɀoɀi.
Pakarepo ndakaʋa muMŋeya; tariracigaro coʋushe cakagadzwa kuɗeŋga, nomumŋe agere pacigaro.
Iye wakaŋga agere’po wakaŋga akafanana nebge rejaspisi neresardio; kwakaŋga kunomuraraʋuŋgu wakakomberedza cigaro coʋushe, wakafanana

Kwakaŋga kuneɀigaro ɀoʋushe ɀinamakumi maʋiri namanna ɀakaŋga ɀakakomberedza cigaro coʋushe; napaɀigaro pakaŋga pagere Ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna, ʋakapfeka ŋguʋo cena; ʋakaŋga ʋanekorona dzendarama pamisoro yaʋo.
Napacigaro coʋushe pakaŋga paciɓuɗa mheni, namanzwi, nokutinhira; nemŋenje minomŋe yakaŋga icipfuta pamberi pecigaro coʋushe, iri Mŋeya minomŋe yaMŋari.

Pamberi pecigaro coʋushe pakaŋga paneguŋgwa rakaʋonekera, rakafanana nekristaro; napakati pecigaro coʋushe, napamatiʋi ose ecigaro coʋushe, pakaŋga paneɀisikwa ɀinna ɀipenyu, ɀizere nameso mberi neshure kwaɀo.

Cisikwa cipenyu cokutaŋga cakaŋga cakafanana neshumba, cisikwa cipenyu cecipiri cakaŋga cakafanana nemhuru, cisikwa cipenyu cecitatu cakaŋga cineciso cakaita secomunhu, necisikwa cipenyu cecinna cakaŋga cakafanana negondo rinobururuka.

Neɀisikwa ɀipenyu iɀi ɀinna ɀakaŋga ɀinamapapiro matanhatu, cimŋe necimŋe; ɀakaŋga ɀizere nameso kunhiʋi dzose nomukati; haɀizorori masikati noʋusiku, ɀiciti: Mutȿene, mutȿene, mutȿene, iye Ishe Mŋari, wamasimba ose, iye wakaŋga ari’po, uri’po, noucazoʋuya.
Ɀino kana ɀisikwa ɀipenyu iɀi ɀoʋigira iye unogara pacigaro coʋushe, iye uri mupenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri, kubginya, nokukudzwa, nokuʋoŋga,
Ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna ʋowira pasi pamberi paiye ugere pacigaro coʋushe, ʋacimunamata iye, uri mupenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri, ʋacikandira korona dzaʋo pamberi pecigaro coʋushe, ʋaciti:
Imi Ishe, Mŋari weɗu, makafanira kuti muʋigirwe kubginya, nokukudzwa, nesimba, nokuti ndimi makasika ɀinhu ɀose, ɀakaʋa’po, ɀikasikwa nokuɗa kwenyu.
Ɀino ndakaʋona muruʋoko rworudyi rwaiye wakaŋga agere pacigaro coʋushe buku yakanyorwa mukati nokunze kwayo, yakanamatidzwa neɀisimbiso ɀinomŋe.
Ipapo ndakaʋona mutumŋa, unesimba, aciɗanidzira nenzwi guru,
Asi kwakaŋga kusinomunhu kuɗeŋga napanyika, kana napasi penyika, wakagona kuzarura buku iyo, kana kutarira mairi.
Ipapo ndakacema ɀikuru, ɀakusina‐kuwanikwa munhu, wakafanira kuti azarure buku, kana kutarira mairi.
