Ɀino mumŋe waƲakuru akati kwandiri; Usacema hako, tarira, shumba yorudzi rwaJuda, Mudzi waDavidi, yakakunda kuti izarure buku neɀisimbiso ɀayo ɀinomŋe.

Ɀino ndakaʋona pakati pecigaro coʋushe neɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna, napakati paƲakuru, Gwaiana rimire, rakaita serakaɓayiwa, rinenyaŋga nomŋe nameso manomŋe, iri Mŋeya minomŋe yaMŋari, yakatumŋa kunyika yose.
Iro rikaʋuya, rikatora buku muruʋoko rworudyi rwaiye wakaŋga agere pacigaro coʋushe.

Ɀino rakati ratora buku, ɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna naƲakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna ʋakawira pasi pamberi peGwaiana, mumŋe nomumŋe anoruɗimbga, nendiro dzendarama, dzakaŋga dzizere neɀinonhuwira, iri minyeŋgetero yaʋatȿene.
Ʋakaimba rwiyo rutȿa, ʋaciti: Ndimi makafanira kuti mutore buku nokuzarura ɀisimbiso ɀayo; nokuti makaɓayiwa, mukateŋgera Mŋari neropa renyu
mukaʋaitira Mŋari weɗu, kuti ʋaʋe ʋushe naʋaprista, ʋaɓate ʋushe panyika.
Ɀino ndakaʋona, ndikanzwa inzwi raʋatumŋa ʋazhinji ʋakaŋga ʋakakomberedza cigaro coʋushe neɀisikwa ɀipenyu, naƲakuru — kuwanda kwaʋo kwakaŋga kuri ɀuru ɀeɀuru neɀuru ɀamazana —
ʋaciti nenzwi guru: Gwaiana rakaɓayiwa rakafanira kuti riʋigirwe ʋushe, nefuma, nokucenjera, nesimba, nokukudzwa, nokubginya, nokurumbidzwa.

Ndikanzwa ɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀose ɀiri kuɗeŋga, napanyika, neɀiri pasi penyika, napaguŋgwa, neɀose ɀiri mukati maɀo, ɀiciti: Kurumbidzwa, nokukudzwa, nokubginya, nesimba ŋgaɀiʋe kunaiye ugere pamsoro pecigaro coʋushe, nokuGwaiana nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ipapo ɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna ɀakati: Ameni. Ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna ʋo ʋakawira pasi, ʋakanamata.
Ɀino ndakaʋona Gwaiana ricizarura cimŋe ceɀisimbiso ɀinomŋe, ndikanzwa cimŋe ceɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna ciciti nenzwi romutinhiro: Ʋuya!
Ndikatarira, ndikaʋona biza jena, naiye wakaŋga akaritaȿa, wakaŋga anoʋuta; akapiwa korona, akaɓuɗa acikunda, ʋuye kuti akunde.
Wakati azarura cisimbiso cecipiri, ndikanzwa cisikwa cipenyu cecipiri ciciti: Ʋuya!
Ipapo rimŋe
Wakati azarura cisimbiso cecitatu, ndikanzwa cisikwa cipenyu cecitatu ciciti: Ʋuya! Ndikatarira, ndikaʋona biza ɗema; wakaŋga akaritaȿa wakaŋga aneciyereso muruʋoko rwake.
Ndikanzwa inzwi pakati peɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna, riciti: Ciyero
Wakati azarura cisimbiso cecinna, ndikanzwa inzwi recisikwa cipenyu cecinna riciti: Ʋuya!

Ndikatarira, ndikaʋona biza rakacenuruka; wakaŋga akaritaȿa, zita rake Rufu; ʋuye Hadesi rakamuteʋera. Iʋo ʋakapiwa simba pamsoro pececinna cenyika, kuti ʋaʋuraye nomunondo, nenzara, norufu, neɀikara ɀenyika.
Wakati azarura cisimbiso cecishanu, ndikaʋona panyasi peartari mŋeya yaʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaʋurawa nokuɗa kweshoko raMŋari, nokupupura kwaʋo kwaʋakapupura;
ʋakaɗana nenzwi guru ʋaciti: Tenzi mutȿene waɀokwaɗi, mucarega kutoŋga ʋanogara panyika nokuʋatsiʋa ropa reɗu kuȿikira riniko?
Ipapo mumŋe nomumŋe waʋo wakapiwa ŋguʋo cena; ʋakaʋudzwa kuti ʋambozorora ciŋguʋa ciɗuku, kuȿikira
Ɀino ndakaʋona pakuzarura kwake cisimbiso cecitanhatu, kwakaŋga kunokuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika kukuru, zuʋa rikaȿiɓa segudza remvere, mŋedzi wose ukaita seropa;
nenyeredzi dzeɗeŋga dzikawira pasi, somuʋonde unozuza magaŋga awo, kana ucizunuŋguswa nomututu mukuru.
Ƌeŋga rikabva sebuku, kana icipetwa; namakomo ose neɀiwi ɀose ɀakabviswa panɀimbo dzaɀo.
Namadzimambo enyika, naʋakuru, naʋatuŋgamiriri ʋehondo, naʋafumi, naʋanesimba, naʋaranda ʋose, naʋakasunuŋguka ʋose, ʋakandoʋanda mumapako nomumabge amakomo;
ʋakati kumakomo nokumabge: Tiwirei, mutiʋige pameso aiye unogara pacigaro coʋushe, napakutsamŋa kweGwaiana;
nokuti zuʋa guru rokutsamŋa kwaʋo raȿika; ndianiko unogona kumira?
Shure kwaiɀoɀi ndakaʋona ʋatumŋa ʋanna, ʋamire kumatiʋi manna enyika, ʋakaɓata mhepo inna dzenyika, kuti mhepo irege kurira panyika, kana paguŋgwa, kana pamiti yose.
Ipapo ndakaʋona mumŋe mutumŋa acikwira acibva kumabvazuʋa, anecisimbiso caMŋari mupenyu; akaɗana nenzwi guru kuʋatumŋa ʋanna, ʋaya ʋakaŋga ʋapiwa simba kuti ʋatadzire nyika neguŋgwa,
aciti: Musatadzira nyika, kana guŋgwa, kana miti, kuȿikira taisa cisimbiso pahuma dzaʋaranda ʋaMŋari.
Ndikanzwa kuwanda kwaʋakaiswa cisimbiso; ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi manna neɀinna, ʋakaiswa cisimbiso ʋacibva kumarudzi ose aʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Kurudzi rwaJuda ʋakaiswa cisimbiso ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaRubeni ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaGadi ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaAseri ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaNeftarimi ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaManase ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaSimeoni ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaRevi ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaIsakari ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaZaburoni ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaJosefa ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri;
Kurudzi rwaBenjamini ʋakaiswa cisimbiso ʋaneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri.

Shure kwaiɀoɀo ndakatarira, ndikaʋona ʋazhinji‐zhinji ʋasiŋgagoni kuʋereŋgwa nomunhu, ʋakabva kundudzi dzose, namarudzi, naʋanhu, nendimi, ʋamire pamberi pecigaro coʋushe, napamberi peGwaiana, ʋakapfeka ŋguʋo cena, ʋakaɓata micindwe mumaʋoko aʋo;
ʋakaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, ʋaciti: Ruponeso ŋgaruʋe kunaMŋari unogara pacigaro coʋushe, nokuGwaiana.
Ipapo ʋatumŋa ʋose ʋakamira, ʋakakomba cigaro coʋushe, naƲakuru, neɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna, ʋakawira pasi neciso pamberi pecigaro coʋushe, ʋakanamata Mŋari,
ʋaciti: Ameni: Kurumbidzwa, nokubginya, nokucenjera, nokuʋoŋga, nokukudzwa, noʋushe, nesimba, ŋgaɀiʋe kunaMŋari nokusiŋgaperi‐peri. Ameni!
Ipapo mumŋe waƲakuru wakapindura, akati kwandiri: Aʋa ʋakapfeka ŋguʋo cena ndiʋananiko? Ʋakabvepiko?
Ndikati kwaari: Ishe waŋgu, imi munoziʋa. Akati kwandiri: Ndiʋo ʋanobva kukutambudzika kukuru, ʋakasuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo ʋakadzicenesa muropa reGwaiana.
Naiɀoɀo ʋari pamberi pecigaro coʋushe caMŋari, ʋanomushumira masikati noʋusiku mutembere yake; iye, unogara pacigaro coʋushe, ucaʋadzitira netabernakeri.
Haʋacazoziyi nenzara, haʋacazofi nenyota; haʋaŋgapiswi nezuʋa kana nokumŋe kupisa;
nokuti Gwaiana riri pakati pecigaro coʋushe ricaʋafudza, ricaʋatuŋgamirira kumatsime emvura yoʋupenyu; Mŋari ucapisika misodzi yose kumeso aʋo.
Wakati azarura cisimbiso cecinomŋe, kunyarara kukaʋa’po kuɗeŋga kuneŋge sehafu yeŋguʋa.
Ipapo ndakaʋona ʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe ʋamire pamberi paMŋari; ʋakapiwa hwamanda nomŋe.

Ɀino mumŋe mutumŋa wakaʋuya, akamira paartari, anomudziyo wendarama weɀinonhuwira; akapiwa ɀinouhuwira ziɀhinji kuti aɀiise pamŋe cete neminyeŋgetero yaʋatȿene ʋose pamsoro peartari yendarama, yakaŋga iri pamberi pecigaro coʋushe.
Ʋutsi bgeɀinonhuwira bgukakwira pamberi paMŋari bgucibva muruʋoko rwomutumŋa pamŋe cete neminyeŋgetero yaʋatȿene.
Mutumŋa akatora mudziyo weɀinonhuwira, akauzadza nomŋoto weartari, akaukandira panyika; ipapo kwakaʋuya kutinhira, namanzwi, nemheni, nokuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika.
Ipapo ʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋanehwamanda nomŋe, ʋakaɀigadzira kuti ʋaridze.
Wokutaŋga wakaridza, kukaʋuya cimvuramabge nomŋoto ɀakaveŋganiswa neropa, ɀikakandirwa panyika; ipapo cetatu cenyika cikatȿa, necetatu cemiti cikatȿa, noʋuswa bgutema bgose bgakatȿa.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecipiri wakaridza, cimŋe cakaita segomo guru rinopfuta nomŋoto cikakandwa muguŋgwa; ipapo cetatu ceguŋgwa cikashanduka ropa;
cetatu ceɀisikwa ɀakaŋga ɀiri muguŋgwa ɀikafa, iɀo, ɀakaŋga ɀinoʋupenyu; necetatu ceɀikepe cikaparadzwa.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecitatu wakaridza, nyeredzi huru, yakapfuta sezhenje, ikawa kuɗeŋga, ikawira pamsoro pecetatu cenzizi napamatsime emvura;
zita renyeredzi rakaŋga ricinzi, Cinoʋaʋa; ipapo cetatu cemvura cikaʋaʋiswa, ʋanhu ʋazhinji ʋakafa nemvura, nokuti yakaŋga yaʋaʋiswa.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecinna wakaridza, cetatu cezuʋa cikarobga, necetatu comŋedzi, necetatu cenyeredzi, kuti cetatu caɀo ciȿiɓiswe, ʋuye kuti cetatu camasikati cirege kuvenekera, noʋusiku saiɀoɀo.
Ipapo ndakatarira, ndikanzwa gondo rimŋe ricibururuka pakati peɗeŋga, riciti nenzwi guru: Nhamo, nhamo, nhamo, kunaʋanogara panyika, nokuɗa kwamanzwi mamŋe ehwamanda aʋatumŋa ʋatatu ʋacazoridza.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecishanu wakaridza, ndikaʋona nyeredzi, yakabva kuɗeŋga, yawira pasi; ikapiwa kiyi yegomba rakadzika‐dzika.
Ikazarura gomba rakadzika‐dzika, ʋutsi bgukakwira bgucibva mugomba, soʋutsi bgeʋira guru; zuʋa neɗeŋga ɀikaȿiɓiswa noʋutsi bgegomba.
Muʋutsi makaɓuɗa mhashu
Dzikaʋudzwa kuti dzirege kutadzira ʋuswa bgenyika, necinhu cinyoro, kana miti yose, asi ʋanhu ɓedzi ʋasinecisimbiso caMŋari pahuma dzaʋo.
Hadzina‐kupiwa
Namazuʋa iwayo ʋanhu ʋacatȿaka rufu, asi haʋaŋgatoŋgoruwani, ʋacaʋiŋga kufa, asi rufu rucaʋatiza.
Pakuʋonekwa kwadzo mhashu dzakaŋga dzakaita samabiza akagadzirirwa kurwa; pamisoro yadzo pakaŋga paneɀimŋe ɀakaita sekorona dzakafanana nendarama; ɀiso ɀadzo ɀakaŋga ɀakaita seɀiso ɀaʋanhu.
Dzakaŋga dzinevudzi rakaita sevudzi raʋakadzi, nameno adzo akaŋga akaita seeshumba.
Dzakaŋga dzineɀidzitiro ɀecifuʋa ɀakaita seɀamatare; nokutinhira kwamapapiro adzo kwakaita sokutinhira kweŋgoro dzamabiza mazhinji anomhanyira kurwa.
Dzakaŋga dzinemiswe, yakaita seyeɀinyaʋaɗa, noʋumborera; pamiswe yadzo pakaŋga panesimba rokukuʋadza ʋanhu mŋedzi mishanu.
Dzakaŋga dzinamambo wadzo, ari mutumŋa wegomba rakadzika‐dzika, zita rake neciHeberu ndiAbadoni, neciGiriki zita rake ndiAporioni.
Nhamo imŋe yapfuʋura; tarira, nhamo dzimŋe mbiri dzinoteʋera shure kwaiɀoɀi.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecitanhatu wakaridza, ndikanzwa inzwi ricibva panyaŋga inna dzeartari yendarama yakaŋga iri pamberi paMŋari,
riciti kumutumŋa wecitanhatu wakaŋga anehwamanda: Sunuŋgura ʋatumŋa ʋanna ʋakasuŋgwa parwizi rukuru
Ipapo ʋatumŋa ʋanna ʋakasunuŋgurwa, ʋakaŋga ʋakagadzirirwa ŋguʋa, nezuʋa, nomŋedzi, negore, kuti ʋaʋuraye cetatu caʋanhu.
Kuwanda kwehondo dzaʋataȿi ʋamabiza kwakaŋga kuri ɀuru ɀeɀuru ɀamazana maʋiri; ndikanzwa kuʋereŋgwa kwaʋo.
Saiɀoɀo ʋo ndakaʋona mabiza pakuratidzwa
Cetatu caʋanhu cakaʋurawa namaɗambudziko awa matatu, anoti, mŋoto noʋutsi nesurferi, ɀakaɓuɗa mumiromo yawo.
Nokuti simba ramabiza riri mumiromo yawo, nomumiswe yawo; nokuti miswe yawo yakaita senyoka, inemisoro; anokuʋadza nayo.

Ʋamŋe ʋanhu ʋasina‐kuʋurawa namaɗambudziko awa, haʋana‐kutendeʋuka pamaɓasa amaʋoko aʋo, kuti ʋarege kunamata mŋeya yakaipa, neɀifananidzo ɀendarama, neɀesirveri, neɀendarira, neɀamabge, neɀemiti, ɀisiŋgagoni kuʋona, kana kunzwa, kana kufamba;
haʋana‐kutendeʋuka ʋo pakuʋuraya kwaʋo, kana pakurowa kwaʋo, kana paʋupombge bgaʋo, kana pakuɓa kwaʋo.
Ɀino ndakaʋona mumŋe mutumŋa unesimba aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga, akapfeka gore; muraraʋuŋgu wakaŋga uri pamusoro wake, ciso cake cakaŋga cakaita sezuʋa, netsoka dzake sembiru dzomŋoto.
Wakaŋga akaɓata buku ɗuku yakazaruka muruʋoko rwake, akaisa rutsoka rwake rworudyi pamsoro peguŋgwa, norworuɓoshwe pamsoro penyika;
akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru seshumba inorira; iye wakati aɗanidzira, kutinhira kunomŋe kukaɓuɗisa manzwi ako.
Ɀino kutinhira kunomŋe kwakati kwareʋa, ndakaŋga ndonyora, ndikanzwa inzwi ricibva kuɗeŋga, riciti: Zarira ɀarebga nokutinhira kunomŋe, usaɀinyora.
Ipapo mutumŋa uya wandakaʋona amire pamsoro peguŋgwa napamsoro penyika, wakasimudzira ruʋoko rwake rworudyi kuɗeŋga,
akapika naiye uri mupenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri, wakasika ɗeŋga neɀiri’mo, nenyika neɀiri’mo, neguŋgwa neɀiri’mo, kuti ŋguʋa haiŋgazoʋi’po.
Asi namazuʋa enzwi romutumŋa wecinomŋe, kana ʋoɗo‐kuridza, ɀakaʋanzika ɀaMŋari ɀicapedziswa, seɀaakaparidzira ʋaranda ʋake, iʋo ʋaprofita.
Ipapo inzwi riya randakanzwa ricibva kuɗeŋga, rakataura ɀe kwandiri, riciti: Enda utore buku yakazaruka iri muruʋoko rwomutumŋa, umire pamsoro peguŋgwa napamsoro penyika.
Ndikaenda kumutumŋa, ndikati kwaari: Ndipei buku ɗuku. Iye akati kwandiri: Tora, uidye; icaʋaʋisa muɗumbu mako, asi mumuromo mako icanaka soʋuci.
Ipapo ndakatora buku ɗuku muruʋoko rwomutumŋa, ndikaidya; ikanaka mumuromo maŋgu soʋuci; asi ndakati ndaidya, muɗumbu maŋgu mukaʋaʋiswa.
Ʋakati kwandiri: Unofanira kuprofita ɀe pamsoro paʋanhu ʋazhinji, nendudzi, nendimi, namadzimambo.
Ɀino ndakapiwa rutsaŋga rwakaita somuɗonɀo; ɀikanzi: Simuka, uyere tembere yaMŋari, neartari, naʋanonamata mairi.
Asi siya ruʋazhe ruri kunze kwetembere, usaruyera; nokuti rwakapiwa ʋahedeni; ʋacatsika guta dɀene mŋedzi inamakumi manna nemiʋiri.
ndicaraira ɀapupu ɀaŋgu ɀiʋiri kuti ɀiprofite, ɀakapfeka masaga, mazuʋa anecuru cinamazana maʋiri namakumi matanhatu.
Aʋa ndiyo miorivi miʋiri neɀigadziko ɀemŋenje ɀiʋiri ɀimire pamberi paShe wenyika.
Kana kunomunhu unoɗa kuʋakuʋadza, mŋoto ucaɓuɗa mumiromo yaʋo uciparadza ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo; kana kunomunhu unoɗa kuʋakuʋadza, unofanira kuʋurawa saiɀoɀo.
Ʋanesimba rokuzarira ɗeŋga, kuti mvura irege kunaya namazuʋa okuprofita kwaʋo; ʋanesimba pamsoro pemvura kuti ʋaishandure iʋe ropa, nokuroʋa nyika namaɗambudziko ose neŋguʋa dzose dzaʋanoɗa.
Kana ʋapedza kupupura kwaʋo, cikara cinokwira cicibva mugomba rakadzika‐dzika cicarwa naʋo, ciciʋakunda nokuʋaʋuruya.
Mitumbu yaʋo
Ʋanobva kuʋanhu, namarudzi, nendimi, nendudzi, ʋacaʋona mitumbu yaʋo mazuʋa matatu nehafu, ʋasiŋgatenderi kuti iʋigwe mubgiro.
Naʋanogara panyika ʋacafara nokupembera pamsoro paʋo, ʋacitumirana ɀipo, nokuti ʋaprofita aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋakatambudza aʋo ʋanogara panyika.
Ɀino mazuʋa matatu nehafu akati apfuʋura, mŋeya woʋupenyu, wakabva kunaMŋari, ukapinda mukati maʋo, ʋakamira netsoka dzaʋo, kutya kukuru kukawira ʋose ʋakaʋaʋona.
Ipapo ʋakanzwa inzwi guru, rinobva kuɗeŋga, riciti kwaʋari: Kwirai pano. Ʋakakwira kuɗeŋga negore, ʋaʋeŋgi ʋaʋo ʋakaʋaʋona.
Ɀino neŋguʋa iyo kuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika kwakaʋa’po, cegumi ceguta cikaputsikira pasi, naʋanhu ʋaneɀuru ɀinomŋe ʋakaʋurawa nokuɗeŋgenyika; ʋakasara ʋakatya, ʋakarumbidza Mŋari wokuɗeŋga.
Nhamo yecipiri yapfuʋura; tarira, nhamo yecitatu inokurumidza kuȿika.
Ɀino mutumŋa wecinomŋe wakaridza; manzwi makuru akaʋa’po kuɗeŋga, aciti: Ʋushe bgenyika bgaʋa bgaShe weɗu, naKristu wake; ucabguɓata nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ipapo Ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna ʋanogara paɀigaro ɀaʋo ɀoʋushe pamberi paMŋari, ʋakawira pasi neɀiso ɀaʋo, ʋakanamata Mŋari,
ʋaciti: Tinokuʋoŋgai imi, Ishe Mŋari wamasimba ose, muri’po, namakaŋga muri’po; nokuti makatora simba renyu guru, mukaɓata ʋushe.

Marudzi akatsamŋa, nokutsamŋa kwenyu kwakaȿika, neŋguʋa yaʋakafa, kuti ʋatoŋgwe, ʋuye kuti mupe ʋaranda ʋenyu muɓairo, iʋo ʋaprofita, naʋatȿene, naʋanotya zita renyu, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru; ʋuye kuti muparadze aʋo ʋanoparadza nyika.
Ipapo tembere yaMŋari iri kuɗeŋga yakazarurwa; areka yesuŋgano ikaʋonekwa mutembere yake; ipapo kwakaʋa’po mheni, namanzwi, nokutinhira, nokuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika, necimvuramabge cikuru.
Ɀino kuɗeŋga kwakaʋonekwa ciratidzo cikuru
iye wakaŋga anemimba, akaɗanidzira pakupona kwake, acitambudzika pakuɀara.
Ipapo kuɗeŋga kwakaʋonekwa cimŋe ciratidzo
Rumhinda rwayo rukakweʋa cetatu cenyeredzi dzokuɗeŋga, ndokudzikandira pasi panyika; shato iyo ikamira pamberi pomukadzi wakaŋga oɀara, kuti iparadze mŋana wake kana aɀara.
Akaɀara mŋana womukomana, unozofudza marudzi ose netȿimbo yeɗare; mŋana wake ndokutorwa kunaMŋari, nokucigaro cake coʋushe.
Mukadzi akatizira kurenje, paakagadzirirwa nɀimbo naMŋari, kuti ʋamuceŋgete’po mazuʋa anecuru cinamazana maʋiri namakumi matanhatu.
Ɀino kurwa kwakaʋa’po kuɗeŋga; Mikaeri naʋatumŋa ʋake ʋakarwa neshato, shato ikarwa inaʋatumŋa ʋayo;
ʋakasakunda, nenɀimbo yaʋo hainakuzowanikwa kuɗeŋga.
Ɀino shato huru yakakandirwa pasi, iyo nyoka yekare, inonzi Diaborosi, naSatani, munyeŋgeri wenyika yose; yakakandirwa panyika, naʋatumŋa ʋayo ʋakakandirwa pasi pamŋe cete nayo.

Ndikanzwa inzwi guru kuɗeŋga, riciti: Ɀino ruponeso rwaȿika, nesimba, noʋushe bgaMŋari weɗu, noʋumambo bgaKristu wake; nokuti mupomeri wehama dzeɗu wakakandirwa pasi, wakaʋapomera pamberi paMŋari weɗu masikati noʋusiku.
Iʋo ʋakamukunda neropa reGwaiana, ʋuye neshoko rokupupura kwaʋo; haʋana‐kuɗa ʋupenyu bgaʋo kuȿikira parufu.
Saka farai kuɗeŋga
Shato yakati yaʋona kuti yakandirwa pasi panyika, ikatambudza mukadzi wakaɀara mŋana womukomana.
Ipapo mukadzi akapiwa mapapiro maʋiri egondo guru, kuti abururukire kurenje kunɀimbo yake, kwaanoceŋgeterwa ŋguʋa nedzimŋe ŋguʋa nehafu yeŋguʋa, kwaasiŋgaʋonekwi nenyoka.
Ipapo nyoka yakaɓuɗisa mvura mumuromo mayo, yakaita sorwizi shure kwomukadzi, kuti akukurwe norwizi.
Ipapo nyika yakaɓatsira mukadzi, nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo, ikamedza rwizi rwakaɓuɗiswa neshato mumuromo mayo.
Ɀino shato yakatsamŋira mukadzi, ikaenda kundorwa naʋamŋe ʋana ʋake, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yaMŋari, naʋanoɓata kupupura kwaJesu.
Ikamira pajeca reguŋgwa.
Ɀino ndakaʋona cikara cicikwira cicibva muguŋgwa, cinenyaŋga dzinegumi nemisoro minomŋe; napamsoro penyaŋga dzaco pakaŋga panekorona dzinegumi, napamsoro pemisoro yaco mazita okumhura Mŋari.
Cikara
Mumŋe musoro waco wakaŋga wakaita sowakakuʋadzwa kuȿikira parufu; asi ʋaŋga, raifanira kuʋuraya, rakaŋga rapora; nyika yose ikashamiswa ikateʋera cikara.
Ʋakanamata shato, nokuti yakapa cikara masimba; ʋakanamata cikara, ʋaciti: Ndianiko wakafanana necikara? Ndianiko unogona kurwa naco?
Ipapo cakapiwa muromo unotaura
Cikashamisa muromo waco kuti cimhure Mŋari, nokumhura zita rake netabernakeri yake naiʋo ʋanogara kuɗeŋga.
Cikapiwa
Ʋose ʋanogara panyika ʋacacinamata, iʋo ʋasinakunyorerwa zita raʋo mubuku yeGwaiana rakaɓayiwa kubva pakusikwa kwenyika.
Unenzeʋe, ŋgaanzwe.
Kana munhu acitapa, ucatapxa; kana munhu aciʋuraya nomunondo unofanira kuʋurawa nomunondo. Ndipo panokutsuŋgirira nokutenda kwaʋatȿene.
Ɀino ndakaʋona cimŋe cikara cicikwira, cicibva panyika; cakaŋga cinenyaŋga mbiri segwaiana, cikataura seshato.
Cinoɓata namasimba ose ecikara cokutaŋga pamberi paco. Cinomanikidza nyika naʋagere mukati mayo kuti ʋanamate cikara cokutaŋga, ciya cakapora ʋaŋga rokuʋuraya raco.
Cinoita ɀiratidzo ɀikuru, ɀokuti cinoɓurusira mŋoto unobva kuɗeŋga panyika pamberi paʋanhu;
cinonyeŋgera ʋanogara panyika neɀiratidzo ɀacakapiwa kuti ciɀiite pamberi pecikara; ciciti kunaʋanogara panyika kuti ʋaitire cikara mufananidzo, ciya cakaŋga cineʋaŋga romunondo cikararama.
Cikapiwa
Cinomanikidza ʋose, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋafumi naʋarombo, ʋakasunuŋguka naʋaranda, kuti ʋapiwe ciratidzo muruʋoko rwaʋo rworudyi, kana pahuma yaʋo;
kuti munhu arege kuʋa’po unogona kuteŋga nokuteŋgesa, asi iye uneciratidzo, iro zita recikara kana ciʋereŋgo cezita raco.
Ndipo panokucenjera. Unoziʋa, ŋgaaʋereŋge ciʋereŋgo cecikara; nokuti ciʋereŋgo ndecomunhu; ciʋereŋgo caco ndimazana matanhatu namakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu.
Ɀino ndakatarira, ndikaʋona Gwaiana rimire pagomo reZioni, rina
Ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi ricibva kuɗeŋga, senzwi remvura zhinji, ʋuye senzwi rokutinhira kukuru; nenzwi randakanzwa

Ʋakaimba rwiyo rutȿa pamberi pecigaro coʋushe, napamberi peɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna, naƲakuru; hakunomunhu wakagona kudzidza rwiyo urwu, asi ʋaya ʋaneɀuru ɀinezana namakumi manna naʋanna, ʋakadzikinurwa ʋacibva panyika.
Ndiʋo ʋasina‐kuȿiɓiswa naʋakadzi; nokuti
Mumuromo maʋo hamuna‐kuʋonekwa nhema, haʋana‐caʋaŋgapomerwa.
Ɀino ndakaʋona mumŋe mutumŋa acibururuka pakati peɗeŋga, aneEvaŋgeri isiŋgaperi, kuti aiparidzire ʋanogara panyika, namarudzi ose, nendudzi dzose, nendimi dzose, naʋanhu ʋose.
Akati nenzwi guru: Ityai Mŋari, mumurumbidzei; nokuti ŋguʋa yake yokutoŋga yaȿika; namatai iye, wakasika ɗeŋga, nenyika, neguŋgwa, namatsime emvura.
Ipapo mumŋe mutumŋa wakateʋera, aciti: Rawa, Rawa, Babironi,
Ipapo mumŋe mutumŋa wecitatu wakateʋera, akati nenzwi guru: Kana munhu akanamata cikara nomufananidzo waco, nokugamucira ciratidzo pahuma yake kana paruʋoko rwake,
naiye ucanwa ʋo waini yokutsamŋa kwaMŋari, yakaɗirwa isina‐kuveŋganiswa mumukombe wehasha dzake; ucatambudzwa mumŋoto nesurferi pamberi paʋatumŋa ʋatȿene, napamberi peGwaiana.
Ʋutsi bgokutambudzika kwaʋo bgunokwira nokusiŋgaperi‐peri; haʋanezororo masikati noʋusiku, iʋo ʋanonamata cikara nomufananidzo waco, nounogamucira ciratidzo cezita raco.
Ndipo panokutsuŋgirira kwaʋatȿene, ʋanoceŋgeta mirairo yaMŋari nokutenda kwaJesu.
Ipapo ndakanzwa inzwi ricibva kuɗeŋga, riciti: Nyora,
Ipapo ndakatarira, ndikaʋona gore jena, nomumŋe wakaita soMŋanakomana womunhu agere pamsoro paro, anekorona yendarama pamusoro wake, naparuʋoko rwake anejeko rinopinza.
Ɀino mumŋe mutumŋa wakaɓuɗa mutembere, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru kunaiye wakaŋga agere pamsoro pegore,
Ipapo wakaŋga agere pamsoro pegore akakandira jeko rake panyika, nyika ikacekwa.
Ɀino mumŋe mutumŋa wakaɓuɗa mutembere iri kuɗeŋga, naiye ʋo anejeko rinopinza.

Nomumŋe mutumŋa wakaŋga anesimba pamsoro pomŋoto, akaɓuɗa paartari, akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru kunaiye wakaŋga anejeko rinopinza, aciti: Tumai jeko renyu rinopinza, muceke masumbu omuzambiriŋga wenyika, nokuti mazambiriŋga ayo aibva.
Ipapo mutumŋa wakakandira jeko rake panyika, akaceka muzambiriŋga wenyika, akaɀikandira muciȿiniro cikuru cokutsamŋa kwaMŋari.
Ciȿiniro cikatsikwa kunze kweguta, ropa rikaɓuɗa muciȿiniro rikaȿika pamatomo amabiza,
Ɀino ndakaʋona cimŋe ciratidzo kuɗeŋga, cikuru cinoshamisa,
Ndikaʋona cakaita seguŋgwa rinoʋonekera rakaveŋganiswa nomŋoto, naiʋo ʋakaʋuya ʋakunda cikara nomufananidzo waco, neciʋereŋgo cezita raco, ʋamire pamsoro peguŋgwa rinoʋonekera, ʋanoʋuɗimbga bgaMŋari.
Ʋakaŋga ʋaciimba rwiyo rwaMosesi, muranda waMŋari, norwiyo rweGwaiana, ʋaciti: Ishe, Mŋari wamasimba ose, maɓasa enyu akakura, anoshamisa; Mambo wamarudzi, nzira dzenyu dzakarurama, ndedzaɀokwaɗi.
Ndianiko uŋgarega kutya nokukudza zita renyu, Ishe? Nokuti imi moga muri mutȿene; nokuti marudzi ose acaʋuya, acinamata pamberi penyu; nokuti kururama kwenyu kwakaratidzwa.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ndakaʋona tembere yetabernakeri yoʋucapupu yokuɗeŋga yakazarurwa;
mutembere mukaɓuɗa ʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe ʋanamaɗambudziko manomŋe, ʋakafuka muceka wakacena unopenya, ʋakasuŋgwa paɀifuʋa ɀaʋo namabanhire endarama.
Ipapo cimŋe ceɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna cakapa ʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe ndiro nomŋe dzendarama, dzizere nokutsamŋa kwaMŋari, iye mupenyu nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Tembere ikazara noʋutsi bgunobva pakubginya kwaMŋari napasimba rake; kukasaʋa nomunhu wakagona kupinda patembere, kuȿikira maɗambudziko manomŋe aʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe apera.
Ɀino ndakanzwa inzwi guru ricibva mutembere, riciti kuʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe: Endai, mundoɗurura panyika ndiro nomŋe dzokutsamŋa dzaMŋari.
Wokutaŋga akaenda, akaɗurura ndiro yake panyika; ronda rakaipa rinorwadza rikaʋa’po paʋanhu ʋakaŋga ʋaneciratidzo cecikara, ʋakanamata mufananidzo waco.
Wecipiri akaɗurura ndiro yake paguŋgwa; rikashanduka ropa seromunhu wakafa; neɀipenyu ɀose ɀakaŋga ɀiri muguŋgwa ɀikafa.
Wecitatu akaɗurura ndiro yake panzizi nomumatsime emvura, ikashanduka ropa.
Ndikanzwa mutumŋa wemvura aciti: Imi, Makarurama, muri’po, namakaŋga muri’po, Mutȿene, nokuti makatoŋga saiɀoɀo.
Nokuti ʋakaɗurura ropa raʋatȿene neraʋaprofita, mukaʋapa ropa, kuti ʋanwe; ʋakafanirwa
Ndikanzwa artari riciti: Hoŋo, Ishe, Mŋari wamasimba ose, kutoŋga kwenyu ndokwaɀokwaɗi kwakarurama.
Ɀino wecinna akaɗurura ndiro yake pamsoro pezuʋa, rikapiwa
Ʋanhu ʋakapiswa nokupisa kukuru, ʋakamhura zita raMŋari, unesimba pamsoro pamaɗambudziko awa; haʋana‐kutendeʋuka, kuti ʋamukudze.
Wecishanu akaɗurura ndiro yake pamsoro pecigaro coʋushe cecikara; ʋushe bgaco bgukaȿiɓiswa, ʋakatseŋga marimi aʋo nokurwadzwa;
ʋakamhura Mŋari wokuɗeŋga pamsoro pokurwadzwa kwaʋo namaronda aʋo; asi haʋana‐kutendeʋuka pamaɓasa aʋo.
Ɀino wecitanhatu akaɗurura ndiro yake pamsoro porwizi rukuru,
Ipapo ndakaʋona mŋeya yetȿina mitatu yakaita samatafi icibva mumuromo weshato nomumuromo wecikara, nomumuromo womuprofita wenhema;
nokuti ndiyo mŋeya yakaipa inoita ɀiratidzo; inoenda kumadzimambo enyika yose, kuʋakokera kukurwa pazuʋa iro guru raMŋari wamasimba ose.
Tarira, ndinoʋuya sembava. Wakaropafadzwa unorinda, unoceŋgeta ŋguʋo dzake, kuti arege kufamba asina‐kupfeka, ʋaʋone nyadzi dzake.
Akaʋaʋuŋganidzira panɀimbo inonzi Harmagedoni neciHeberu.
Ɀino wecinomŋe akaɗurura ndiro yake muɗeŋga, inzwi guru rikaɓuɗa mucigaro coʋushe, riciti: Ɀapera!
Ipapo mheni yakaʋa’po, namanzwi nokutinhira; nokuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika kukuru kwakaʋa’po; kuɗeŋgenyika kwenyika kwakakura‐kura kukaɗai hakuna‐kumboʋa’po kubva pakusikwa kwaʋanhu panyika.
Guta guru rikakamurwa rikaita ɀikamu ɀitatu, maguta amarudzi akaputsika; Babironi guta guru rikaraŋgarirwa pamberi paMŋari, kuti ripiwe mukombe wewaini yokutsamŋa kwehasha dzake.
Ɀiwi ɀose ɀikatiza, namakomo haana‐kuwanikwa.
Cimvuramabge cikuru, cinobva kuɗeŋga, cikawira pamsoro paʋanhu, kurema
Ɀino mumŋe waʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋanendiro nomŋe, akaʋuya akataura neni, aciti: Ʋuya pano, ndicakuratidza kutoŋgwa kwemhombge huru, inogara pamsoro pemvura zhinji;
madzimambo enyika akaita ʋupombge nayo, naʋanogara panyika ʋakaɓatwa newaini yoʋupombge bgayo.
Ipapo wakandiisa kurenje mumŋeya, ndikaʋona mukadzi akataȿa cikara citȿuku, cizere namazita okumhura
Mukadzi wakaŋga akapfeka ŋguʋo tȿuku neshaʋa, akashoŋga ndarama namabge anokosha, namaparera, nomuruʋoko rwake makaŋga munomudziyo wendarama uzere neɀinonyaŋgadza netȿina yoʋupombge bgake.
Pahuma yake pakaŋga pakanyorwa zita rakaʋanzika
Ipapo ndakaʋona mukadzi akaɓatwa neropa raʋatȿene, ʋuye neropa reɀapupu ɀaJesu; ndikati ndicimuʋona ndikashamiswa nokushamiswa kukuru.
Ipapo mutumŋa akati kwandiri: Washamiswa neiko? Ndicakuʋudza ɀakaʋanzika ɀomukadzi, neɀecikara cinomutakura cinemisoro minomŋe nenyaŋga dzinegumi.
Cikara cawaʋona, caiʋa’
Ndipo panokufuŋga kunenjere. Misoro minomŋe ndiwo makomo manomŋe, anogarwa nomukadzi.
Ndiwo madzimambo manomŋe; ʋashanu ʋawa, mumŋe uri’po, mumŋe ugere kuȿika; kana aciȿika, unofanira kugara ciŋguʋa ciɗuku.
Cikara caiʋa’
Nyaŋga dzinegumi dzawaʋona, ndiwo madzimambo anegumi, acigere kupiwa ʋushe, asi ʋacapiwa simba samadzimambo pamŋe cete necikara ŋguʋa imŋe.
Iʋo ʋanendaŋgariro imŋe, ʋanopa cikara simba raʋo noʋushe bgaʋo.
Aʋa ʋacarwa neGwaiana, Gwaiana ricaʋakunda; nokuti iro ndiShe wamadzishe, namambo wamadzimambo; naiʋo ʋanaro ndiʋanhu ʋakaɗanwa, ʋatȿene, ʋakatendeka.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mvura yawaʋona, inogarwa nemhombge, ndiʋo ʋanhu, naʋazhinji, namarudzi, nendimi.
Nyaŋga dzinegumi dzawaʋona, necikara, ndiʋo ʋacaʋeŋga mhombge, ʋacaiparadza, nokuitorera ŋguʋo; ʋacadya nyama yayo, nokuipisa nomŋoto.
Nokuti Mŋari wakaisa mumŋoyo yaʋo kuti ʋaite kuraŋgarira kwake, ʋaʋe nokuraŋgarira kumŋe, ʋape cikara ʋushe bgaʋo, kuȿikira mashoko aMŋari aitika.
Mukadzi wawaʋona ndiro guta guru, rinoɓata ʋushe bgamadzimambo enyika.
Shure kwaiɀoɀi ndakaʋona mumŋe mutumŋa aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga, anesimba guru; nyika ikavenekerwa nokubginya kwake.
Akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, aciti: Rawa, Rawa, Babironi, guta guru, yaʋa nɀimbo munogara mŋeya yakaipa, nenhare yemŋeya yose yetȿina, nenhare yeshiri dzose dzinetȿina dzinoʋeŋgwa.
Nokuti marudzi ose akawa newaini yokutsamŋa kwoʋupombge bgaro, namadzimambo enyika akaita ʋupombge naro, naʋateŋgesi ʋenyika ʋakafuma nesimba rokuɀirasha kwaro.
Ɀino ndakanzwa rimŋe inzwi rinobva kuɗeŋga, riciti: Ƃuɗai mariri, ʋanhu ʋaŋgu, kuti murege kuwadzana naro paɀiʋi ɀaro, mugorega kupiwa maɗambudziko aro.
Nokuti ɀiʋi ɀaro ɀaȿika kuɗeŋga, Mŋari waraŋgarira ɀisakarurama ɀaro.
Muritsiʋei parakakutsiʋai napo, muciriitira kaʋiri parakaɓata napo; mumudziyo iwoyo marakaɗira iro, muriɗirire kaʋiri.
Parakaɀikudza nokuɀifadza napo, murirwadzise nokuricemedza; nokuti rinoti mumŋoyo maro: Ndinogara
Saka maɗambudziko aro acaȿika nezuʋa rimŋe, rufu, nokucema, nenzara; ricapiswa kwaɀo nomŋoto, nokuti Ishe Mŋari unoritoŋga, unesimba.
Madzimambo enyika, akaita ʋupombge nokuɀifadza naro, acarira nokucema pamsoro paro, kana aciʋona ʋutsi bgokupiswa kwaro;
iʋo ʋamire kure nokutya kurwadzwa kwaro, ʋaciti: Nhamo, nhamo,
Ʋateŋgesi ʋenyika ʋacarira nokucema pamsoro paro, nokuti hakucinomunhu unoteŋga nhumbi dzaʋo;

nhumbi dzendarama, nesirveri, nedzamabge anokosha, nedzamaparera nedzomuceka wakanaka, nedzemiceka mitȿuku, nedzesiriki, nedzemiceka mishaʋa, namarudzi ose emiti inonhuwira, namarudzi ose emidziyo yenyaŋga dzenzou, namarudzi ose emidziyo yamatanda anokosha, nedzesafuri, nedzeɗare, nedzamabge macena;
nekinamoni, nomuamumoni, neɀinonhuwira, namafuta okuzora, namafuta omuribanoni, newaini, namafuta omuorivi, noʋupfu bgakatsetseka, neɀiyo, neŋombe, namakwai,
Micero yaiɗikanwa nomŋoyo wako, yakabva kwauri, neɀinhu ɀose ɀakanaka neɀinopenya, ɀakabva kwauri, ʋanhu haʋaŋgatoŋgoɀiwani ɀe.
Ʋateŋgesi ʋeɀinhu iɀi, ʋakaŋga ʋafumiswa naro, ʋacamira kure nokutya kurwadzwa kwaro, ʋacirira nokucema,
ʋaciti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru rakaŋga rakapfeka muceka wakanaka, mutȿuku nomushaʋa, rakaŋga rakashoŋga ndarama, namabge anokosha, namaparera!
Nokuti neŋguʋa imŋe fuma huru yakaɗai yaparadzwa. Ɀino ʋafambisi ʋose ʋeɀikepe, naʋose ʋanofamba neɀikepe papi napapi, naʋafambi naʋaɓati paguŋgwa, ʋakamira kure,
ʋakaɗanidzira ʋaciʋona ʋutsi bgokutȿa kwaro, ʋaciti: Guta rakafanana neguta iri guru nderipiko?

Ipapo ʋakakandira guruʋa pamisoro yaʋo, ʋakaɗanidzira ʋacirira nokucema, ʋaciti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru, kwaifumiswa neɀinokosha ɀaro ʋose ʋaiʋa neɀikepe ɀaʋo paguŋgwa; nokuti rakaparadzwa neŋguʋa imŋe.
Farai pamsoro paro iwe ɗeŋga, nemi ʋatȿene naʋaapostora, naʋaprofita, nokuti Mŋari wakaritoŋgera kutoŋga kwenyu.
Ɀino mumŋe mutumŋa unesimba akasimudza ibge rakaita seguyo guru, akarikandira muguŋgwa, aciti: Saiɀoɀo guta guru, Babironi, ricaputsirwa pasi nesimba, rikasatoŋgowanikwa ɀe.

Nenzwi raʋanoridza ʋuɗimbga, neraʋanoimba, neraʋanoridza nyere, neraʋanoridza hwamanda, haricatoŋgonzwiki mauri, nemhizha yeɓasa ripi neripi haicatoŋgowanikwi mauri, nenzwi reguyo haricatoŋgonzwiki mauri;
ciedza comŋenje hacicatoŋgovenekeri mauri, nenzwi recikomba kana romŋeŋga haricatoŋgonzwiki mauri; nokuti ʋateŋgesi ʋako ʋaiʋa ʋakuru ʋenyika; nokuti noʋuroyi bgako marudzi ose akanyeŋgerwa.
Mukati maro mukawanikwa ropa raʋaprofita neraʋatȿene, neraʋose ʋakaʋurawa panyika.
Shure kwaiɀoɀo ndakanzwa inzwi guru seraʋazhinji‐zhinji kuɗeŋga, riciti: Hareruya! Ruponeso, nokubginya, nesimba ndeɀaMŋari weɗu;
nokuti kutoŋga kwake ndokwaɀokwaɗi kwakarurama; nokuti wakatoŋga mhombge huru yakaʋodza nyika noʋupombge bgayo, akatsiʋa ropa raʋaranda ʋake paruʋoko rwayo.
Ipapo ʋakapamhidza,
Ɀino Ʋakuru ʋanamakumi maʋiri naʋanna neɀisikwa ɀipenyu ɀinna ʋakawira pasi ʋakanamata Mŋari wakaŋga agere pacigaro coʋushe, ʋakati: Ameni, Hareruya!
Inzwi rikabva pacigaro coʋushe, riciti: Rumbidzai Mŋari, imi mose ʋaranda ʋake, imi munomutya, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru.
Ipapo ndakanzwa senzwi raʋazhinji‐zhinji, senzwi remvura zhinji, senzwi rokutinhira kukuru, riciti: Hareruya! Nokuti Ishe Mŋari weɗu wamasimba ose woɓata ʋushe.
Ŋgatifarei, tifarisise, timukudze; nokuti mutambo wokuwana weGwaiana waȿika, mukadzi waro waɀigadzira.
Wakapiwa
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Nyora,

Ipapo ndakawira pasi pamberi petsoka dzake, kuti ndimunamate. Akati kwandiri: Rega kuɗaro, nokuti ndiri muranda pamŋe cete newe nehama dzako dzinoɓata kupupura kwaJesu; namata Mŋari, nokuti kupupura kwaJesu ndiwo mŋeya wokuprofita.
Ipapo ndakaʋona kuɗeŋga kwakazarurwa, ndikaʋona biza jena; naiye wakaŋga agere pamsoro paro wakanzi: Wakatendeka noWaɀokwaɗi; unotoŋga nokurwa ɀakarurama.
Meso ake akaŋga akaita somuraɀo womŋoto; pamusoro wake pakaŋga panekorona zhinji; wakaŋga anezita rakanyorwa, risina‐kuzikanwa nomunhu, asi naiye ɓedzi.
Wakaŋga akapfeka ŋguʋo yakanyikwa muropa; zita rake rinonzi Shoko raMŋari.
Hondo dzokuɗeŋga dzakamuteʋera, dzakataȿa mabiza macena, dzakafuka muceka wakanaka mucena, usinetȿina.
Mumuromo make makaɓuɗa munondo unopinza, kuti aroʋe marudzi nawo; ucaafudza netȿimbo yeɗare; unotsika ciȿiniro cehasha dzokutsamŋa kwaMŋari wamasimba ose.
Paŋguʋo yake napacidɀa cake pakaŋga pakanyorwa zita rinoti: MAMBO WAMADZIMAMBO, NASHE WAMADZISHE.
Ɀino ndakaʋona mutumŋa amire muzuʋa; akaɗanidzira nenzwi guru, aciti kushiri dzose dzinobururuka pakati peɗeŋga: Ʋuyai, muʋuŋgane pacirayiro cikuru caMŋari,
kuti mudye nyama yamadzimambo, nenyama yaʋakuru ʋeɀuru ɀamazana, nenyama yaʋanesimba, nenyama yamabiza, neyaʋataȿi ʋawo, nenyama yaʋanhu ʋose ʋakasunuŋguka naʋakasuŋgwa, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru.
Ɀino ndakaʋona cikara ciya namadzimambo enyika nehondo dzaʋo, ʋakaʋuŋgana kuti ʋarwe naiye wakaŋga akataȿa biza, nehondo dzake.

Ipapo cikara cakaɓatwa pamŋe cete nomuprofita wenhema, wakaita ɀiratidzo pamberi paco, ɀaakanyeŋgera naɀo ʋaya ʋakapiwa ciratidzo cecikara, naʋainamata mufananidzo waco. Aʋa ʋaʋiri ʋakakandirwa ʋari ʋapenyu mugomba romŋoto unopfuta nesurferi.
Ʋakasara ʋakaʋurawa nomunondo waiye wakaŋga akataȿa biza, wakaɓuɗa mumuromo make; shiri dzose dzikaguta nyama yaʋo.
Ɀino ndakaʋona mutumŋa aciɓuruka kuɗeŋga, anekiyi yegomba rakadzika‐dzika, neketani huru muruʋoko rwake.
Akaɓata shato, nyoka yakare, ndiye Diaborosi naSatani, akamusuŋga makore anegumi ramazana,
akamukandira mugomba rakadzika‐dzika, akamupfigira’
Ipapo ndakaʋona ɀigaro ɀoʋushe, ʋakagara pamsoro paɀo, ʋakapiwa
Ʋamŋe ʋakafa haʋanakurarama kuȿikira makore anegumi ramazana apera. Ndiko kumuka kwokutaŋga.

Munhu unomugoʋe pakumuka kwokutaŋga wakaropafadzwa, mutȿene; rufu rwecipiri harunesimba pamsoro paiʋaʋa; asi ʋacaʋa ʋaprista ʋaMŋari naʋaKristu, ʋacaɓata ʋushe pamŋe cete naye makore anegumi ramazana.
Ɀino kana makore anegumi ramazana apera, Satani ucasunuŋgurwa mutoroŋgo yake,
ucaɓuɗa kundonyeŋgera marudzi ose ari kumatiʋi manna enyika, iʋo Gogi naMagogi, aaʋuŋganidzire kundorwa; kuwanda kwaʋo kwakaita sejeca reguŋgwa.
Ʋakakwira pakufara kwenyika, ʋakakomba misasa yaʋatȿene neguta rinoɗikanwa; ipapo mŋoto wakaɓuruka ucibva kuɗeŋga, ukaʋaparadza.
Ɀino Diaborosi, wakaʋanyeŋgera, akakandwa mudziʋa romŋoto nesurferi, panecikara nomuprofita wenhema, kuti ʋarwadzwe masikati noʋusiku nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ɀino ndakaʋona cigaro coʋushe cikuru cicena, naiye wakaŋga agere pamsoro paco, iye, nyika neɗeŋga ɀakatiza pamberi pake, ɀikasawanirwa nɀimbo.
Ipapo ndakaʋona ʋakafa, ʋaɗuku naʋakuru, ʋamire pamberi pecigaro coʋushe; buku dzikazarurwa, neimŋe buku yoʋupenyu ikazarurwa; ʋakafa ʋakatoŋgwa neɀakaŋga ɀakanyorwa mubuku, seɀaʋakaɓata.
Guŋgwa rikaɓuɗisa ʋakafa ʋakaŋga ʋari mariri; norufu neHadesi ɀikaɓuɗisa ʋakafa ʋakaŋga ʋari maɀiri; mumŋe nomumŋe akatoŋgwa seɀaakaɓata.
Ipapo rufu neHadesi ɀakakandirwa mudziʋa romŋoto. Ndirwo rufu rwecipiri, ndiro dziʋa romŋoto.
Ɀino kana munhu akawanikwa asina‐kunyorwa mubuku yoʋupenyu, wakakandirwa mudziʋa romŋoto.
Ɀino ndakaʋona ɗeŋga idɀa nenyika itȿa, nokuti ɗeŋga rokutaŋga nenyika yokutaŋga ɀakaŋga ɀapfuʋura; neguŋgwa rakaŋga risisi’
Ndikaʋona guta dɀene, Jerusarema idɀa, riciɓuruka kuɗeŋga ricibva kunaMŋari, rakagadzirwa somŋeŋga wakashoŋgerwa murume wake.
Ndikanzwa inzwi ricibva kuɗeŋga, riciti: Tarirai, tabernakeri yaMŋari iri pakati paʋanhu, iye ucagara naʋo, iʋo ʋacaʋa ʋanhu ʋake; Mŋari amene ucaʋa naʋo, aʋe Mŋari waʋo.
Ucapisika misodzi yose pameso aʋo; rufu harucaʋi’
Wakaŋga agere pacigaro coʋushe akati: Tarirai, ndinoʋandudza ɀose. Akati: Nyora, nokuti mashoko awa aŋgatendwa, ndaaɀokwaɗi.
Akati kwandiri: Ɀaitwa. Ndini Arfa neOmega, kutaŋga nokuguma. Ini ndicapa unenyota ɀinobva patsime remvura yoʋupenyu asiŋgateŋgi.
Unokunda ucagara nhaka yeɀinhu iɀi; ndicaʋa Mŋari wake, iye ucaʋa mŋanakomana waŋgu.

Asi kana ʋari ʋanotya, naʋasiŋgatendi naʋanyaŋgadzi, naʋaʋurayi, nemhombge, naʋaroyi, naʋanonamata ɀifananidzo, naʋose ʋanoreʋa nhema, mugoʋe waʋo uri mudziʋa rinopfuta nomŋoto nesurferi; ndirwo rufu rwecipiri.
Ɀino mumŋe waʋatumŋa ʋanomŋe, ʋakaŋga ʋanendiro nomŋe dzizere namaɗambudziko manomŋe okupedzisira, wakaȿika, akataura neni, aciti: Ʋuya pano, ndigokuratidza mŋeŋga, mukadzi weGwaiana.
Ipapo wakandiisa muMŋeya kugomo guru refu, akandiratidza guta dɀene, Jerusarema, riciɓuruka kuɗeŋga, ricibva kunaMŋari,
rinokubginya kwaMŋari; ciedza caro cakaŋga cakaita sebge rinokosha kwaɀo, sebge rejaspisi, rinoʋonekera sekristaro;
rakaŋga rinoruȿiŋgo rukuru, rurefu, rakaŋga rinamasuʋo anegumi namaʋiri; naʋatumŋa ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri pamasuʋo, namazita akanyorwa pamsoro pawo, ari mazita amarudzi anegumi namaʋiri aʋana ʋaIsraeri.
Kumabvazuʋa kwakaŋga kunamasuʋo matatu; kumsoro masuʋo matatu, zasi masuʋo matatu; nokumaʋirira masuʋo matatu;
ruȿiŋgo rweguta rwakaŋga runenheyo dzinegumi nembiri; napamsoro padzo mazita aʋaapostora ʋanegumi naʋaʋiri ʋeGwaiana.
Uyo, wakataura neni, wakaŋga anorutsaŋga rwendarama rwokuyera guta narwo, namasuʋo aro noruȿiŋgo rwaro.
Guta rakaŋga rakaʋakwa namatiʋi manna akaenzana, kureɓa kwaro kwakaenzana nokufara kwaro; akayera guta norutsaŋga, ɀikaȿika pamastadia aneɀuru ɀinegumi neɀiʋiri
Akayera ruȿiŋgo rwaro, makubiti anezana namakumi manna namanna
Ruȿiŋgo rwaro rwakaŋga rwakaʋakwa nejaspisi, ʋuye guta rakaŋga riri
Nheyo dzoruȿiŋgo rweguta dzakaŋga dzakashoŋgedzwa namabge amarudzi ose anokosha. Nheyo yokutaŋga yakaŋga iri yejaspisi; yecipiri yesafiri; yecitatu yekarsidoni; yecinna yesmaragdino;
yecishanu yesardoniksi; yecitanhatu yesardio; yecinomŋe yekrisoriti; yorusere yeberiri; yepfumbamŋe yetopasi; yegumi yekrisoprasi; yegumi neimŋe yehiakinti; yegumi nembiri yeametesti.
Masuʋo anegumi namaʋiri akaŋga ari amaparera anegumi namaʋiri; suʋo rimŋe nerimŋe rakaŋga riri reparera rimŋe; nzira yomuguta yakaŋga iri yendarama yakaiȿo‐naka, inoita seinoʋonekera.
Handina‐kuʋona tembere mukati maro, nokuti Ishe Mŋari wamasimba ose neGwaiana itembere yaro.
Guta haritȿaki zuʋa kana mŋedzi, kuti rivenekerwe naɀo; nokuti kubginya kwaMŋari ndiko kwairivenekera, nomŋenje waro ndiro Gwaiana.
Ndudzi dzinofamba neciedza caro; madzimambo enyika anoʋuyisa kubginya kwawo mukati maro.
Masuʋo aro haaŋgatoŋgozarirwi masikati, nokuti ʋusiku habgucazoʋi’po.
Ʋacaʋuyisa mukati maro kubginya nokukudzwa kwendudzi.
Mukati maro hamuŋgatoŋgopindi cinhu cinoȿiɓisa, kana cinonyaŋgadza, kana cinenhema; asi aʋo ɓeɗzi ʋakanyorwa mubuku yoʋupenyu yeGwaiana.
Ɀino akandiratidza rwizirwemvura yoʋupenyu, yakapenya sekristaro, inoɓuɗa pacigaro coʋushe caMŋari neceGwaiana,
pakati penzira yaro. Kumatiʋi maʋiri orwizi kwakaŋga kunomuti woʋupenyu, unoɓereka ɀiɓereko
Hakucaʋi necinhu cakatukwa; cigaro coʋushe caMŋari neceGwaiana cicaʋa mukati maro; ʋaranda ʋake ʋacamushumira; ʋacaʋona ciso cake;
ʋuye zita rake ricaʋa pahuma dzaʋo.
Ʋusiku habgucazoʋi’po; haʋatȿaki ciedza comŋenje, kana ciedza cezuʋa; nokuti Ishe Mŋari ucaʋavenekera; ʋacaɓata ʋushe nokusiŋgaperi‐peri.
Ɀino akati kwandiri: Mashoko awa aŋgatendwa, ndaaɀokwaɗi; Ishe, Mŋari wemŋeya yaʋaprofita, wakatuma mutumŋa wake kuti aratidze ʋaranda ʋake ɀinhu ɀoɗo‐kuitwa.
Tarirai, ndokurumidza kuʋuya; unoceŋgeta mashoko okuprofita kwebuku iyi wakaropafadzwa.
Ini Johane, ndini ndakanzwa, ndikaʋona iɀoɀi. Ɀino ndakati ndicinzwa, nokuʋona, ndikawira pasi kuti ndinamate pamberi petsoka dzomutumŋa wakandiratidza iɀoɀi.
Akati kwandiri: Rega kuɗaro; ndiri muranda pamŋe cete newe, nehama dzako, ʋaprofita, naʋanoceŋgeta mashoko ebuku iyi; namata Mŋari.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Usazarira mashoko okuprofita kwebuku iyi, nokuti ŋguʋa yaʋa pedyo.
Usina‐kururama ŋgaarambe aciita ɀisakarurama; unetȿina, ŋgaarambe aciȿiɓiswa; wakarurama ŋgaarambe aciita ɀakarurama; mutȿene ŋgaarambe aciitwa mutȿene.
Tarirai, ndinokurumidza kuʋuya; muɓairo waŋgu ndinawo, kuti ndipe mumŋe nomumŋe seɀaakaɓata.
Ndini Arfa neOmega, wokutaŋga nowokupedzisira, kutaŋga nokuguma.
Ʋanosuka ŋguʋo dzaʋo ʋakaropafadzwa, kuti ʋaʋe nesimba rokuʋuya kumuti woʋupenyu, ʋapinde napamasuʋo eguta.
Kunze ndiko kunembga, naʋaroyi, nemhombge, naʋaʋurayi, naʋanonamata ɀifananidzo, naʋose ʋanoɗa nhema ʋacidziita.
Ini Jesu, ndakatuma mutumŋa waŋgu, kuti akupupurirei iɀoɀi pakereke. Ndini mudzi worudzi rwaDavidi, nyamasase inopenya.
Mŋeya nomŋeŋga ʋanoti: Ʋuya! Naiye unonzwa ŋgaati: Ʋuya! Unenyota ŋgaaʋuye. Unoɗa ŋgaatore mvura yoʋupenyu asiŋgateŋgi.
Ndinopupurira mumŋe nomumŋe unonzwa mashoko okuprofita kwebuku iyi,
kana munhu akabvisa mashoko ebuku yokuprofita uku, Mŋari ucabvisa mugoʋe wake pamuti woʋupenyu, nomuguta dɀene, napaɀinhu ɀakanyorwa mubuku iyi.
Iye unopupura iɀoɀi unoti: Hoŋo, ndinokurumidza kuʋuya. Ameni, ʋuyai Ishe Jesu.
Nyasha dzaShe Jesu ŋgadziʋe naʋose. Ameni.
